column2: Lino nyika yakalipilingene akubula zintu, nkabela kauli mudima atala lyamaanzi malamfu. Alakwe Muuya wa-Leza wakali kukumba-kumba atala lyamaanzi.
Lino Leza wakaamba kuti, Akube mumuni. Mpoonya awo mumuni wakaba.
Nkabela Leza wakabona mumuni kuti mubotu, alimwi Leza wakaanzaanya mumuni amudima.
Lino mumuni Leza wakauulika kuti ndisikati, awalo mudima wakauulika kuti masiku. Aboobo kwakaba igoko, alimwi kwakaba cifumo, buzuba bomwe.
Elyo Leza wakacita mulengalenga oyo, waanzaanya maanzi aali ansi lyamulengalenga amaanzi aali kujulu lyamulengalenga. Mbuboobo mbukwakaba.
Lino oyo mulengalenga Leza wakauulika kuti ndijulu. Aboobo kwakaba igoko alimwi kwakaba cifumo, buzuba bwabili.
Lino intundubwi Leza wakaiulika kuti ninyika, aalo maanzi mpaakayobolokela wakaaulika kuti ndwizi. Nkabela Leza wakabona kuti ncintu cibotu.
Lino Leza wakaamba kuti, nyika isyusye mweemvwe, azisyu zizyala imbuto, amisamu iizyala micelo, umwi aumwi mbuli musyobo wawo, iijisi imbuto mukati, atala anyika, Nkabela kwakaba obo.
Nyika yakasyusya mweemvwe, azisyu zizyala imbuto cimwi acimwi mbuli musyobo waco, amisamu iizyala micelo iijisi imbuto mukati, umwi aumwi mbuli musyobo wawo. Nkabela Leza wakabona kuti ncintu cibotu.
Aboobo kwakaba igoko, alimwi kwakaba cifumo, buzuba bwatatu.
Ibe malampi mumwenya wakujulu aakumunisya ansi. Nkabela kwakaba obo.
Leza wakacita mimuni yobile mipati, mumuni mupati wakweendelezya isikati amumuni muniini wakweendelezya masiku; azyalo inyenyeezi wakazicita.
Nkabela Leza wakazibika mumweenya wakujulu, kuti zimunike ansi,
ziendelezye isikati amasiku akwaanzaanya mumuni amudima, Nkabela Leza wakabona kuti ncintu cibotu.
Aboobo kwakaba igoko, alimwi kwakaba cifumo, buzuba bwane.

Nkabela Leza wakalenga banyama bapati bamulwizi azintu zyoonse zyuumi ziputauka, maanzi nzyaakavuzya cimwi acimwi mbuli musyobo waco, abayuni boonse bauluka umwi aumwi mbuli musyobo wakwe. Nkabela Leza wakabona kuti ncintu cibotu.
Elyo Leza wakazilongezya, wati, Amuzyalisye, muvule, muzuzye maanzi aamulwizi, abalo bayuni bavule munyika.
Aboobo kwakaba igoko, alimwi kwakaba cifumo, buzuba bwasanu.
Leza wakacita banyama baansi, umwi aumwi mbuli musyobo wakwe, aŋombe zyamisyobo misyobo, abauka boonse baansi bamisyobo misyobo, Nkabela Leza wakabona kuti ncintu cibotu.
Nkabela Leza wakalenga muntu mucinkozya cakwe, Wakamulenga mucinkozya caLeza. Wakabalenga baalumi abanakazi.
Lino Leza wakabalongezya, Leza wakabaambila kuti, Amuzyalisye, muvule, muzuzye nyika akwiibombya. Amweendelezye inswi zyamulwizi abayuni bakujulu abanyama boonse baputauka ansi.
Alimwi Leza wakati, Amubone! Zisyu zyoonse zizyala imbuto ziboneke ansi, amisamu yoonse iili amicelo yamisamu iizyala imbuto, zyoonse buyo ndamupa, zibe zilyo zyanu.
Aboobo banyama boonse baansi abayuni boonse bakujulu abauka boonse baansi bajisi muuya wabuumi, ndabapa zisyu zyoonse zisyuuka, zibe zyakulya zyabo. Nkabela kwakaba obo.
Elyo Leza naakabona zintu zyoonse nzyaakacita, wakabona kuti zyoonse zyabota loko. Aboobo kwakaba igoko, alimwi kwakaba cifumo, buzuba bwamusanu abumwi.
Lino ijulu anyika zyakamana, azyoonse zili mumo.
Nkabela mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili Leza wakaleka milimo yakwe njaakacitide. Mubuzuba obo bwamusanu aabili wakalyokezya kuzwa kumilimo yakwe yoonse njaakacita.
Aboobo Leza wakakondezya buzuba bwamusanu aabili akubusalazya, nkaambo mulimbubo wakalyokezya kuzwa kumilimo yakwe yoonse Leza njaakalenga akucita.
Ngaaya makani aajulu anyika mbuzyakatalika nizyakalengwa, Mubuzuba obuya Jehova Leza naakacita nyika ajulu,
ziziki zyamusokwe zyoonse nizyatakalina kuboneka munyika, amisamu yamusokwe niyatakalina kumena, (nkaambo Jehova Leza katana kuwisya imvula anyika, alimwi katakwe muntu wakupanda nyika,
pele mwakazwa izambangulwe munyika, lyakali kutetya nyika yoonse),
Jehova Leza wakabumba muntu, Wakamubumbya bulongo bwaansi, wamufulida mumpemu zyakwe muuya wabuumi, nkabela mpawo muntu wakaba muumi.
Lino Jehova Leza wakalima muunda kujwe ku-Edeni, nkabela mpempawo mpaakabika oyo muntu ngwaakabumba.
Elyo Jehova Leza wakameneka mpoonya awo anyika misamu yoonse iiebeka kumeso amisamu mibotu yakulya. Awalo musamu wabuumi wakaumeneka akati kamuunda, amusamu wakuziba bubotu abubi.
Izina lyacitaanzi ngu-Pisoni, ncencico cizyunguluka nyika yoonse ya-Havila, ingolida nkwiibede.
Ingolida yanyika eyo nimbotu, alimwi nkukonya oko kuli mundaalila amabwe mayandisi aaonukisi.
Azina lyamulonga wabili ngu-Gihoni, ngonguwo uuzyunguluka nyika yoonse ya-Kusi.
Azina lyamulonga watatu ngu-Hidekeli, ngonguwo uutola kujwe ku-Asuri. Amulonga wane ngu-Firate.
Lino Jehova Leza wakabweza oyo muntu, wamubika mumuunda wa-Edeni kuti aulime akuubamba.
Nkabela Jehova Leza wakalailila muntu kuti, Misamu yoonse yamumuunda ncobeni uyooilya,
cita musamu wakuziba bubotu abubi. Toelede kulya kulinguwo pe, nkaambo mubuzuba obo mboyoolya kulinguwo ncobeni uyoofwa.
Lino Jehova Leza wakati, Tacili cibotu kuti muntu akale alike pe, Atumucitile sikumugwasya uumweelede.

Mpawo Jehova Leza wakabumba bulongo, wacita banyama boonse bamusokwe, abayuni boonse bakujulu, wabaleta kumuntu, abone na ulabaulika buti. Nkabela banyama boonse, kufumbwa mazina muntu ngaakabaulika, bakaulikwa mbubonya.
Aboobo muntu wakaulika iŋombe zyoonse abayuni bakujulu abanyama boonse bamusokwe mazina. Nekubaboobo teekwakajaninwa muntu sikugwasya uumweelede.
Elyo Jehova Leza wakaoneka muntu iŋonzi impati, Nkabela naakacili mukoona, wakabweza kamwi katumpango twakwe, wasinka cipulo cako.
Lino ako kampango nkaakagwisya mumuntu, Jehova Leza wakakabumbya mwanakazi, wamuleta kumuntu.
Mpawo muntu wakaamba kuti, Ma! Ncobeni oyu ulijisi zifuwa mbubonya mbuli zifuwa zyangu anyama mbubonya mbuli nyama yangu. Uleelede kuulikwa mukaintu, nkaambo wazwa mumuntu.
Nkaambo kako mwaalumi uleelede kusia wisi abanyina akukakatila kumwanakazi wakwe, babe nyama yomwe buyo.
Nkabela boonse bobile bakali basizinswe, mwaalumi abanakwe, pele kabatakwe insoni.
Elyo mwanakazi wakaambila inzoka kuti, Micelo yamisamu yamumuunda tulailya,
pele micelo yamusamu oyo uuli mukati kamuunda, Leza waamba kuti, Tamweelede kulya njiyo pe, alimwi tamweelede kwiiguma, kuti mutafwi.
Mpawo inzoka yakaambila mwanakazi kuti, Ne! Tamukonzyi kufwa pe.
Nkaambo Leza ulizi kuti mubuzuba obo mbubonya mbomuyooulya, meso aanu ayoojuka, lino muyooba mbuli Leza, muyooziba bubotu abubi mbububede.

Lino mwanakazi wakabona kuti musamu mubotu kukuulya, alimwi ulabotezya meso, alimwi ulayandika kukupa muntu busongo. Nkabela mpawo wakabweza micelo yawo, walya. Alakwe mulumaakwe, wakamupa, alakwe wakalya.
Mpoonya awo meso aabo boonse bobile akajaluka, nkabela bakaziba kuti bali azinswe, Lino bakatalika kusuma matu aamukuyu akulicitila zilivumbilizyo.
Elyo Jehova Leza wakaita Adamu, wati, Uli kuli?
Wakavuwa kuti, Ndamvwa ijwi lyako mumuunda, lino ndafwa bweeme nkaambo kakuti ndisicinswe, aboobo ndayuba.
Wakati, Ino ngwani wakakulwiida kuti uli sicinswe? Sa walya micelo yamusamu oyo ngundakakulailila kuti, Utalyi kulinguwo?
Mpawo Adamu wakati, Oyo mwanakazi nguwakandipa kuti tube awe nguwandipa micelo yamusamu, elyo ndalya.
Lino Jehova Leza wakaambila mwanakazi kuti, Ino ncinzi eci ncowacita? Mwanakazi wakati, Inzoka njiyakandoongelezya, aboobo ndalya.
Mpawo Jehova Leza wakaambila inzoka kuti, Mbowacita obo, ulitukidwe kwiinda iŋombe zyoonse abanyama boonse bamusokwe. Uyooenda abula bwako, abulongo buyooba zilyo zyako, mazuba oonse aabuponi bwako.
Nkabela njoobusya inkondo akati kanduwe amwanakazi, akati kalunyungu lwako alunyungu lwakwe. Walo uyookuuma amutwe, ayebo uyoomuluma kukasinde.
Lino mwanakazi wakamwaambila kuti, Njookuvuzizya macise aako akuminta kwako, uyoozyala bana amacise, alimwi uyoosukama mulumaako, ngonguwe uuti kakweendelezye.

Alakwe Adamu wakamwaambila kuti, Mbowaswiilila ijwi lyamukaako akulya micelo njindakulailila kuti toelede kwiilya, nyika ilitukidwe nkaambo kanduwe, Uyoolya micelo yayo mumacise mazuba oonse aabuponi bwako.
Iyookuzyalila mamvwa amitubetube. Uyoolya zisyu zyamusokwe.
Uyoolya insima cakufwa mitukuta mane ukapiluke kunyika, nkaambo mulinjiyo mowakagwisigwa, nkaambo uli bulongo buyo, akooko kubulongo nkoelede kupiluka.
Lino Adamu wakaulika izina lyamukaakwe kuti ngu-Eva, nkaambo mbebanyina baumi boonse.
Nkabela Jehova Leza wakacitila Adamu amukaakwe zibaki zyazikanda, wabasamika nzizyo.
Elyo Jehova Leza wakamutanda kuzwa kumuunda wa-Edeni kuti akalime nyika eyo njiyonya njaakagwisigwa mulinjiyo.
Wakatanda muntu, alimwi kulubazu lwakujwe lwa-Edeni wakabika baangelo bakerebimu apanga lyamabekabeka ilyakali kuyumbana koonse koonse kusinkila inzila yamusamu wabuumi.
Lino Adamu wakaswanana a-Eva banakwe, nkabela wakaminta, wazyala Kaini, wati, Ndajana muntu kuli-Jehova.
Alimwi wakazyala lwabili, wazyala munyina Abelo. Nkabela Abelo wakaba sikweembela imbelele, pele Kaini wakaba sikupanda nyika.
Lino necakaba ciindi, Kaini wakaletela Jehova cituuzyo camicelo yanyika.
Alakwe Abelo wakaleta kabalwebalwe wambelele amafuta aazyo. Lino Jehova wakabotelwa Abelo acituuzyo cakwe,
pele Kaini acituuzyo cakwe takwakamubotelwa pe. Nkabela Kaini wakakalala loko, abusyu bwakwe bwakasyulungana.
Mpawo Jehova wakaambila Kaini kuti, Ino wakalalilanzi? Nkaambonzi busyu bwako bulisyulungene?
Na wacita kabotu, sa tokooyoonyampuzigwa na? Pele na tociti kabotu, zibi zilakubutilila kumulyango, Lino uyoosukama nduwe, nkabela uyoomweendelezya.
Elyo Jehova wakabuzya Kaini kuti, Uli kuli Abelo mwanike wako? Wakaamba kuti, Nsimubwene pe. Sa ndime sikulela mwanike wangu?
Lino wakati, Ma! Wacitanzi? Ijwi lyabulowa bwamwanike wako lilandikwiilila kuzwa muvu.
Lino sunu wajana lutuko kuvu elyo ndilyonya ilyanywa bulowa bwamwanike wako buzwa kujanza lyako.
Nozoolima ivu, talikooyookupa limbi inguzu zyalyo. Uyooba sikweendeenda asimutuntuli ansi.
Mpawo Kaini wakaambila Jehova kuti, Kuumwa kwangu nkunjumwide nkupati kampatila.
Ncobeni buzuba obuno wanditanda kuzwa kunyika, aboobo njoosiswa kumeso aako, Njooba sikweendeenda asimutuntuli munyika, nkabela kufumbwa muntu uundijana uyoondijaya.

Mpawo Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Mbubo, Kufumbwa muntu uujaya Kaini uyooindulwidwa kupegwa mulandu ziindi zili musanu azibili, Nkabela Jehova wakabikila Kaini citondezyo, kuti umwi aumwi uumujana atamujayi.
Elyo Kaini wakaswanana amukaakwe, nkabela wakaminta, wazyala Enoki. Alimwi wakayaka munzi, lino oyo munzi wakauulika izina lya-Enoki mbubonya mbuli izina lyamwaanakwe.
Lino Enoki alakwe wakazyalilwa Iradi, alakwe Iradi wakazyala Mehujaeli, alakwe Mehujaeli wakazyala Metusaeli, alakwe Metusaeli wakazyala Lameki.
Lino Lameki wakakwata banakazi bobile; izina lya umwi kali Ada, azina lyawabili kali Zila.
Nkabela Ada ngowakazyala jabali, ngonguwe wisaabo boonse bakala mumatente akweembela iŋombe.
Azina lyamwanike wakwe kali Jubali, ngonguwe wisaabo boonse balizya kantimbwa anyeele.
Alakwe Zila wakazyala Tubala-Kaini, ngonguwe iwakali kufula zibelesyo zyoonse zyamukuba azyabutale. Amucizi wa-Tubela-Kaini kali Naama.
Lino Lameki wakaambila banakazi bakwe kuti,
Ada a-Zila, amuswiilile ijwi lyangu.
Nubanakazi ba-Lameki amuteelele majwi angu.
Nkaambo ndajaya muntu iwakandiyasa,
Ndanyonyoona mulombe nkaambo kakunduuma.
Kaini ulatemwa mulandu ziindi zili musanu azibili.
Sa Lameki takooyootemwa ziindi zili makumi aali musanu aabili amusanu azibili na?
Lino Adamu wakaswanana alimwi abanakwe, nkabela wakazyala mwana mulombe. Lino wakamuulika izina lya-Seti, nkaambo wakati, Leza wandipa mwana umbi mucibaka ca-Abelo, Kaini ngwaakajaya.
Alakwe Seti wakazyalilwa mwana, nkabela wakamuulika izina lya-Enosi. Mpoonya awo bantu bakatalika kukomba muzina lya-Jehova.
Wakabalenga boonse, mwaalumi amwanakazi, alimwi wakabalongezya akubaulika izina lyaAdamu mubuzuba obo nibakalengwa.
Lino Adamu, naakamana kupona myaka iili mwanda amakumi otatwe, wakazyala mwana mucinkezya cakwe, iwakali mbubonya mbuli nguwe, wamuulika izina lya-Seti.
Lino mazuba Adamu ngaakapona naakamana kuzyala Seti akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aitatu, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Aboobo mazuba oonse Adamu ngaakapona akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aine amakumi otatwe, elyo wakafwa.
Nkabela Seti, naakamana kupona myaka iili mwanda amusanu, wakazyala Enosi.
Lino myaka Seti njaakapona naakamana kuzyala Enosi yakasika kumyanda iili musanu aitatu amyaka iili musanu aibili.
Aboobo mazuba oonse Seti ngaakapona akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musana aine akumi aibili, elyo wakafwa.
Nkabela Enosi, naakamana kupona myaka iili makumi aali musanu aane, wakazyala Kenani.
Alimwi mazuba Enosi ngaakapona naakamana kuzyala Kenani akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aitatu amyaka iili ikumi aisanu, nkabela wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Aboobo mazuba oonse Enosi ngaakapona akasika kumyanda iili musanu aine amyaka yosanwe, elyo wakafwa.
Nkabela Kenani, naakamana kupona myaka iili makumi aali musanu aabili, wakazyala Mahalalele.
Alimwi mazuba Kenani ngaakapona naakamana kuzyala Mahalalele akasika kumyanda iili musanu aitatu amakumi one, nkabela wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Aboobo mazuba oonse Kenani ngaakapona akasika kumyanda iili musanu aine akumi, elyo wakafwa.
Alakwe Mahalalele, naakamana kupona myaka iili makumi aali musanu alimwi amyaka yosanwe, wakazyala jaredi.
Lino mazuba Mahalalele ngaakapona naakamana kuzyala Jaredi, akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aitatu amakumi otatwe; alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Aboobo mazuba oonse Mahalalele ngaakapona akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aitatu amakumi aali musanu aane amyaka yosanwe, elyo wakafwa,
Nkabela mazuba Jaredi ngaakapona naakamana kuzyala Enoki akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aitatu, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Aboobo mazuba oonse Jaredi ngaakapona akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aine amakumi aali musanu alimwi aibili, elyo wakafwa.
Lino Enoki, naakamana kupona myaka iili makumi aali musanu alimwi amyaka yosanwe, wakazyala Metusela.
Nkabela naakamana kuzyala Metusela, Enoki wakali kweenda a-Leza myaka iili myanda yotatwe, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Aboobo mazuba oonse aa-Enoki akasika kumyaka iili myanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu.
Nkabela Enoki wakali kweenda a-Leza mane lumwi kataciwo, nkaambo Leza wakamutola.
Lino Metusela, naakamana kupona myaka iili mwanda amakumi aali musanu aatatu amusanu aibili, wakazyala Lameki.
Alimwi mazuba Metusela ngaakapona naakamana kuzyala Lameki akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi aali musanu aatatu amyaka yobile, nkabela wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Aboobo mazuba oonse Metusela ngaakapona akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aine amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu aine; elyo wakafwa.
Lino Lameki, naakamana kupona myaka iili mwanda amakumi aali musanu aatatu amyaka yobile, wakazyala mwana mulombe.
Nkabela wakamuulika izina lya-Nowa, nkaambo wakati, Oyu mwana nguukonzya kutuumbulizya mumilimo yesu akutulemununa makataazyo ngaajana maanza esu nkaambo kanyika Jehova njaatukide.
Nkabela mazuba Lameki ngaakapona naakamana kuzyala Nowa akasika kumyaka iili myanda yosanwe amakumi aali musanu aane amusanu, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Aboobo mazuba oonse Lameki ngaakapona akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi aali musanu aabili amyaka iili musanu aibili, elyo wakafwa.
Lino Nowa naakaba amyaka iili myanda yosanwe, wakazyala Semu a-Hamu a-Jafeti.
bana ba-Leza bakabona bana basimbi babantu kuti mbabotu, nkabela bakakwata kufumbwa mbobakali kuyanda akati kabo.
Mpawo Jehova wakaamba kuti, Muuya wangu tuukooyookazyanya lyoonse amuntu pe, nkaambo ninyama buyo. Mazuba aakwe ayooba myaka iili mwaanda amakumi obile.
Mumazuba alya kakuli babbabbani ansi. Nkabela kusule lyayaaya, bana ba-Leza nibakaswanana abana basimbi babantu, bakabazyalila bana, mbombabo bakaba basinguzu baciindi, bantu basimpuwo.
aboobo­ Jehova wakausa nkaambo kakulenga muntu, wakapenga mumoyo wakwe.
Nkabela Jehova wakaamba kuti, Bantu mbondakalenga, nzoobaziminganya ansi. Nzooziminganya bantu abanyama, bauka abayuni bakujulu boonse, nkaambo nda usa kuti ndakabalenga.
Pele Nowa wakafwidwa luzyalo mumeso aa-Jehova.
Nkabela Nowa wakazyala bana botatwe, Semu, Hamu a-Jafeti.
Lino nyika yakabija kumeso aa-Leza, alimwi nyika yakazula luuni.
Lino Leza wakabona kuti nyika yabija, nkaambo bantu boonse bakalibisizye inzila zyabo ansi,
nkabela Leza wakaambila Nowa kuti, Ndakanza kumanisya bantu boonse, nkaambo nyika ilizwide luuni nkaambo kabo. Ncobeni njoobanyonyoona anyika yoonse.
Kolipangila bwaato bwazisamu zyagofa. Obu bwaato ubucite azimpetu, alimwi uleelede kubuziluluzya mukati aanze insakizi.
Mbuboobu mboelede kubucita. Bulamfu bwabwaato buleelede kuba tukokola tuli myanda yotatwe, bwaamba bwabo bube tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, abwiime bwabo bube tukokola tuli makumi otatwe.
Ucite impulunguzyo mubwaato, zibe kakokola komwe kuzwa kulululi, Awalo mulyango wabwaato uubike mulubazu lwabo. Alimwi yaka zimpetu zyaansi, azimwi zyabili zyakujulu, azimwi zyatatu kujulu lyazeezyo.
Lino mebo ndaleta izambangulwe lyamaanzi ansi lyakunyonyoozya nyama yoonse yabaumi baputa ansi, Boonse buyo bali munyika bayoozanga.
Pele webo tuyootangana cizuminano ayebo, aboobo uyoonjila mubwaato, webo abana bako amukaako abamukabana bako.
Alimwi akati kabanyama bamisyobo yoonse, uyoonjizya bobile bobile mubwaato kuti baponesegwe anduwe, Bayooba mweenze amuzyazi.
Abalo bayuni bamisyobo misyobo, abanyama bamisyobo misyobo, abauka bamisyobo misyobo bayavula ansi bobile bobile baleelede kuba ayebo kuti baponesegwe.
Alimwi bweza zilyo zyamisyobo yoonse, kufumbwa ziligwa, ukazilondole, kuti zibe bulilu bwako abulilu bwabo.
Lino Nowa wakacita obo. Wakacita mbubonya mbuli Leza mbwakamulailila.
Tolelela banyama bamisyobo yoonse iisalala, musanu ababili mumusyobo umwi aumwi, beenze abazyazi, Abalo banyama batasalali, tola bobile bobile, beenze abazyazi.
Abalo bayuni bakujulu, tola musanu ababili mumusyobo umwi aumwi, beenze anseke, kuti ulondole inyungu zyabo ansi.
Nkaambo kwasyaala mazuba aali musanu aabili buyo, lino njoowisya imvula ansi mazuba aali makumi one, isikati amasiku, nkabela njoozizaanya baumi boonse mbendakalenga ansi.
Mpawo Nowa wakacita zyoonse Jehova nzyaakamulailila.
Nowa kajisi myaka iili myanda iili musanu aumwi, izambangulwe nilyakasika ansi.
Lino Nowa wakanjila mubwaato, walo abanakwe abana bakwe abamukabana bakwe, kuti bavunwe kumaanzi aazambangulwe.
Nkabela banyama basalala, abanyama batasalali, abayuni, abauka boonse bayavula ansi,
akati kamisyobo yoonse biyo mwakanjila mubwaato kuli-Nowa bobile bolile, mweenze amuzyazi, mbubonya mbuli Leza mbwaakalailila Nowa.
Lino mazuba aali musanu aabili naakamana, maanzi aazambangulwe akasika ansi.
Nkabela mucobocobo wakali kuwa ansi mazuba aali makumi one, isikati amasiku.
Mubuzuba obo mbubonya Nowa wakanjila mubwaato, walo, a-Semu a-Hamu a-Jafeti bana ba-Nowa, amuka-Nowa, abanakazi botatwe babana bakwe.
Bakatolelela banyama bamisyobo yoonse, iŋombe zyamisyobo yoonse amisyobo yoonse yabauka bayavula ansi, amisyobo yoonse yabayuni, atuyuni toonse twamisyobo misyobo.
Boonse bakanjila mubwaato kuli-Nowa, bobile bobile bamisyobo yoonse iili abuumi.
Nkabela abo ibakanjila bakali beenze abazyazi bamisyobo yoonse, mbubonya mbuli Leza mbwaakamulailila. Mpawo Jehova wakamujalila.
Lino izambangulwe lyamaanzi lyakali ansi mazuba aali makumi one, nkabela maanzi akavula, akasumpula bwaato akubutola kujulu kuzwa ansi.
Maanzi akavwandauka, avula loko ansi, aboobo bwaato bwakali kuya bweenda atala amaanzi.
Maanzi akavwandauka loko malaa ansi, mane lumwi malundu malamfu oonse aamunyika akabbila.
Elyo maanzi akacili kuvwandauka mane akaba abulamfu bwatukokola tuli ikumi amusanu, twakusotoka zilundu zyoonse.
Lino baumi boonse baputa ansi bakafwa, nebaba bayuni neziba iŋombe nebaba banyama nebaba bauka bayavula ansi, abalo bantu boonse.
Boonse ibakali ampemo zyakuyooya, boonse ibakali anyika injumu, boonse buyo bakafwa.
Boonse baumi bakali ansi bakaziminganizigwa, nebaba bantu neziba iŋombe nebaba bauka nebaba bayuni bakujulu. Boonse bakaziminganizigwa. Kwasyaala Nowa alike abaabo mbaakali abo mubwaato.
Nkabela maanzi akali kuvwandauka ansi mazuba aali mwanda amakumi osanwe.
Tusensa toonse twamatoolo azipulo zyakujulu zyoonse zyakasinkwa, awalo mucobocobo wakalesegwa.
Maanzi akali kuya buunguluka ansi, mane lumwi kumamanino aamazuba aali mwanda amakumi osanwe maanzi akaceya.
Lino mumwezi wamusanu aibili, mubuzuba bwakumi amusanu aabili bwamumwezi, bwaato bwakacuta azilundu zyaArarati.
Nkabela maanzi akacili kuya buceya mane kusikila kumwezi wakumi, lino mumwezi wakumi, mubuzuba butaanzi bwamumwezi, mitwe yazilundu yakaboneka.
watuma cikwangala. Nkabela wakauluka-uluka koonse koonse mane maanzi akayuminina ansi.
Alimwi wakatuma inziba, kuti abone na maanzi atalika kuceya ansi.

Pele inziba teeyakajana mpiikonzya kukalila amyeendo yayo, aboobo yakapiluka kulinguwe mubwaato, nkaambo maanzi akacili manji atala anyika. Mpawo wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe, waijata, waiboozya mubwaato mwaakabede.
Lino wakalindila alimwi mazuba aali musanu aabili, watuma inziba lwabili kuzwa mubwaato.
Elyo kuciindi cakumazuba inziba yakaboola kulinguwe, amumulomo wayo kiijisi itu lyaolifa ndeyakaakucela. Mpawo Nowa wakaziba kuti maanzi atalika kuceya ansi.
Lino wakalindila alimwi mazuba aali musanu aabili, watuma inziba, pele tiikwe neyakaboola limbi pe.

Lino mumwaka wamyanda iili musanu aumwi amwaka omwe, mumwezi mutaanzi, mubuzuba butaanzi bwamumwezi, maanzi akayuminina ansi. Mpawo Nowa wakavumbula lululi lwabwaato, wasondela, wabona kuti nyika yayuma.
Nkabela mumwezi wabili, mubuzuba bwakumi amusanu aibili bwamumwezi, nyika yakayuma ntantalu.
Lino Leza wakaambila Nowa kuti,
Kamuzwa mubwaato, yebo abanako, abana bako abamukabana bako boonse.
Banyama boonse mboli abo bamisyobo misyobo, bayuni aŋombe abauka boonse bayavula ansi, uzwe abo, kuti babe isaula ansi, bazyalisye akuvula ansi.
Mpawo Nowa wakazwa abana bakwe abanakwe abamukabana bakwe boonse.
Banyama boonse, abauka boonse abayuni boonse, boonse baumi bamisyobo misyobo bayavula ansi, boonse biyo bakazwa mubwaato.

Mpawo Jehova naakamvwa bweema bubotu, Jehova wakaamba mumoyo wakwe kuti, Nsikooyootuka limbi nyika nkaambo kabantu pe, nkaambo miyeeyo yamoyo wamuntu mibi lyoonse kuzwa kubwanike bwakwe, alimwi nsikooyoouma limbi baumi boonse mbuli mbondakacita.
Nyika niiciliwo, ciindi cakubyala aciindi cakutebula, impeyo ankasaalo, cilimo amainza, isikati amasiku, zyoonse tazikooyooleka.
Banyama boonse baansi abayuni boonse bakujulu bamuyoowe akukankama kubusyu bwanu. Boonse biyo, abauka bayavula ansi answi zyamulwizi, baabwa mumaanza aanu.
Baumi boonse bayavula ansi bayoomubeda zilyo, mbubonya mbuli zisyu zisia-sia. Zyoonse biyo ndamupa nzizyo.
Pele tamweelede kulya nyama antoomwe abuumi bwayo, nkokuti bulowa bwayo.

Ncobeni bulowa bwanu, bulowa bwabuumi bwanu, njoobuyandaula. Kumaanza aabanyama boonse njoobuyandaula, akumaanza aamuntu njoobuyandaula. Muntu umwi aumwi, kumaanza aamweenzinyina njooyandaula buumi bwakwe.
Kufumbwa muntu uutila bulowa bwamuntunyina, bulowa bwakwe alakwe buyootilwa kumaanza aamuntu, nkaambo muntu wakalengwa mucinkozya ca-Leza.
Elyo Leza wakaambila Nowa abana bakwe mbaakali abo kuti,
Amubone! Mebo ndatangana anywe cizuminano cangu, nywebo alunyungu lwanu luciza,
abanyama boonse mbomuli abo, bayuni bakujulu abanyama baansi aboonse mbomuli abo mubwaato, banyama boonse biyo baansi.
Njootangana anywe cizuminano, nkabela bantu boonse tabakooyoonyonyoonwa limbi mumaanzi aazambangulwe. Takukooyooba limbi izambangulwe lyakuvwinyauna nyika.
Alimwi Leza wakaamba kuti, Nceeci citondezyo cacizuminano cangu ncitutangene anywe, inywe abaumi boonse mbomuli abo mumazyalani oonse.
Ndabika fulicoongo wangu mujoba, abe citondezyo cacizuminano cangu ncitutangene anyika.
Kuyooba kuti, na ndabusya ijoba ajulu lyanyika, fulicoongo wangu uyooboneka mujoba,
elyo njooyeeya cizuminano ncitutangene anywe, inywe abaumi boonse bamisyobo yoonse, Takukooyoosika limbi maanzi aazambangulwe kuzoovwinyauna bantu boonse.
Fulicoongo uyooba mukati kajoba, lino njoomulanga akuyeeya cizuminano citeeli ca-Leza ncatangene abaumi boonse bamisyobo yoonse yaansi.
Leza wakaambila Nowa kuti, Nceeci citondezyo cacizuminano cangu ncintangene abaumi boonse baansi.
Aba botatwe bakali bana baNowa, nkabela mbembabo ibakazuzya nyika yoonse.
Lino naakanywa waini, wakakolwa, walivumbulula mucilao cakwe.
Nkabela Hamu wisi Kanana wakabona cinswe cawisi, walwiida babunyina bakwe bobile ibakali anze.
Lino Semu a-Jafeti bakabweza cikobela, bacibika amakuko aabo bobile, beenda cibundasule, bavumba cinswe cawisaabo. Masyu aabo akali futete, aboobo teebakabona cinswe cawisaabo.
Elyo Nowa naakasinsimuka kuzwa kukukolwa kwakwe, wakaziba mwanaakwe muniini ncaakamucitila,
nkabela wakati,
Aombolozekwe Kanana!
Uzooba muzike wabazike akati kabanyina!
Alumbwe Jehova Leza wa-Semu,
Kanana abe muzike wakwe.
Akale muzilao zya-Semu.
Alakwe Kanana abe muzike wakwe.
Nkabela izambangulwe nilyakamana, Nowa wakacili kupona myaka iili myanda yotatwe amakumi osanwe.
Aboobo mazuba oonse aa-Nowa akasika kumyaka iili myanda iili musanu aine amakumi osanwe, elyo wakafwa.
Ngaaya mazyalani aabana ba-Nowa, Semu, Hamu a-Jafeti. Izambangulwe nilyakamana, bakazyalilwa bana.
Abana ba-Gomeri mbaaba: Asikenazi a-Rifati a-Togarima.
Abana ba-Javani mbaaba: Elisa a-Tarisisi, Kitimu a-­Dodanimu.
Inyungu zyabaaba nzezyakaabana nyika zyabamasi zili kunkomwe yalwizi, umwi aumwi mbuli mwaambo wakwe aluzubo lwakwe akati kabamasi,
Abana ba-Hamu mbaaba: Kusi a-Mizraimu a-Puti a-Kanana.
Abana ba-Kusi mbaaba: Seba a-Havila a-Sabeta a-Raama a-Sabeteka. Abana ba-Raama mbaaba: Seba a-Dedani.
Nkabela Kusi wakazyala Nimrodi, ngonguwe iwakataanguna kuba mwaalumi sintaze ansi.
Kali muvwimi singuzu kumeso aa-Jehova. Nciceeco ncicaambilwa kuti, Mbuli Nimrodi muvwimi singuzu kumeso aa-Jehova.
Kumatalikilo bwami bwakwe bwakali Babuloni a-Ereki a-Akadi a-Kalene munyika ya-Sinara.
Kuzwa kunyika eyo wakainka ku-Asuri, waakuyaka Nineve a-Rehoboti-Iri a-Kala,
a-Reseni akatikati ka-Nineve a-Kala, ngonguwo munzi mupati.
Alakwe Mizraimu wakazyala Ludi a-Anamimu a-Lehabimu a-Nafituhimu,
a-Paturusimu a-Kasiluhimu (mulunyungu lwakwe mobakazwa ba-Filisti) a-Kafitorimu.
Alakwe Kanana wakazyala Zidoni mwanaakwe mutaanzi, a-Heti,
aba-Jebusi, aba-Amori, aba-Girigasi,
aba-Hivi aba-Ariki aba-Sini,
aba-Arivadi, aba-Zemari, aba-Hamati. Nkabela nicakaba ciindi inzubo zyaba-Kanana zyakapalangana.
Mugaano waba-Kanana wakali kuzwa ku-Zidoni kuya kulubbazu lwaku-Gerari kusikila ku-Gaza, alimwi kuya ku-Sodoma a-Gomora a-Adima a-Zeboimu, kusikila ku-Lasa.
Mbaabo bana ba-Hamu, munzubo zyabo amyambo yabo azisi zyabo amisyobo yabo.
Alakwe Semu, wisi bana ba-Eberi, munyina jafeti mupati, wakazyalilwa bana.
Bana ba-Semu mbaaba: Elamu a-Asuri a-Arifakisidi a-Ludi a-Aramu.
Abana ba-Aramu mbaaba: Uzi a-Huli a-Geteri a-Masi.
Nkabela Arifakisidi wakazyala Sela, alakwe Sela wakazyala Eberi.
Lino Eberi wakazyalilwa bana bobile. Izina lyaumwi kali Pelegi, nkaambo mumazuba aakwe nyika yakaandaanisigwa, azina lyaumunyina kali Jokitani.
Nkabela jokitani wakazyala Alimodadi a-Selefi a-Hazaramaveti a-Jera,
a-Hadoramu, a-Uzali, a-Dikila,
a-Obali, a-Abimaeli a-Seba,
a-­Ofiri, a-Havila, a-Jobabi. Abo boonse bakali bana ba-Jokitani.
Nkabela nyika njebakakala njeeyi: kuzwa ku-Mesa kuya ku-Sefari cilundu cakujwe.
Mbaaba bana ba-Semu munzubo zyabo amyaambo yabo anyika zyabo azisi zyabo.
Nkabela bantu nebakali kuya kujwe bakajana ibanda munyika ya-Sinara, baakukala nkuko.
Lino bakaamba umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina kuti, Amuboole, tubumbe zitina, tuzitente kabotu. Aboobo zitina zyakababeda mabwe, amulambo wakababeda ciyosyo.
Alimwi bakati, Amuboole, tuliyakile munzi aŋanda indamfu jisika akujulu, Atulicitile impuwo, kuti tutapalanganisigwi koonse koonse ansi.
Nkabela Jehova wakaseluka kuzoobona munzi aŋanda indamfu bana ba-Adamu njibakali kuyaka.
Lino Jehova wakati, Bona! Bantu mbamusyobo omwe biyo, alimwi boonse balaamba mwaambo omwe biyo, Batalika kucita cintu eci, lino taakwe cikonzya kubakasya muzintu zyoonse nzebayeeya.
Atweende, tuseluke, tupilinganye mwaambo wabo, kuti batateelezyanyi nekuba kumvwa mwaambo umwi aumwi wamweenzinyina.
Elyo Jehova wakabamwaisya nkukonya oko, koonse koonse ansi, aboobo bakaleka kuyaka munzi.
Nciceeco oyo munzi ncowakaambilwa kuti ngu-Babelo, nkaambo nkukonya oko Jehova nkwaakapilinganinya mwaambo wanyika, alimwi kuzwa oko Jehova wakabapalanganya koonse koonse ansi.
Nkabela naakamana kuzyala Arifakisadi, Semu kacipona myaka iili myanda yosanwe, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Amane kuzyala Sela, Arifakisadi wakapona myaka iili myanda yone aitatu, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi,
Alakwe Sela naakajisi myaka iili makumi otatwe wakazyala Eberi.
Amane kuzyala Eberi, Sela wakapona myaka iili myanda yone aitatu, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Amane kuzyala Pelegi, Sela wakapona myaka iili myanda yone amakumi otatwe, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Alakwe Pelegi naakajisi myaka iili makumi otatwe, wakazyala Reu.
Amane kuzyala Reu, Pelegi waka pona myaka iili myanda yobile amusanu aine, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Alakwe Reu naakajisi myaka iili makumi otatwe aibili, wakazyala Serugi.
Amane kuzyala Serugi, Reu wakapona myaka iili myanda yobile amusanu aibili, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi,
Alakwe Serugi naakajisi myaka iili makumi otatwe, wakazyala Nahori.
Amane kuzyala Nahori, Serugi wakapona myaka iili myanda yobile, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Alakwe Nahori naakajisi myaka iili makumi obile amusanu aine, wakazyala Tera.
Amane kuzyala Tera, Nahori waka pona myaka iili mwanda akumi amusanu aine, wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi,
Nkabela Harani wakafwa, wisi Tera naakacili muumi, munyika yakuzyalwa kwakwe, nkokuti mu-Uri waba-Kasidi.
Lino Abramu a-Nahori bakakwata banakazi. Izina lyamuka-Abramu kali Sarai, azina lyamuka-Nahori kali Milika mwana musimbi wa-Harani wisi Milika awisi jisika.
Nkabela Sarai kali musundi, taakwe naakazyala.

Nkabela Tera wakatola Abramu mwanaakwe a-Loti mwana wa-Harani muzukulu wakwe, a-Sarai mukamwanaakwe, muka-Abramu mwanaakwe, wainka abo kuzwa ku-Uri waba-Kasidi kuya kunyika yaKanana. Lino bakasika ku-Harani akukala nkuko.
Lino mazuba aaTera akasika kumyaka iili myanda yobile amusanu, nkabela Tera wakafwa mu-Harani.
Njoocita kuti ube musyobo mupati. Njookupa coolwe akulemya izina lyako, ube coolwe.
Kufumbwa muntu uukulongezya njoomulongezya, ayooyo uukusampaula Njoomusampaula. Alimwi mulinduwe misyobo yoonse yabantu iyoojana coolwe.
Lino Abramu wakainka, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamwaambila. Alakwe Loti wakainka awe. Nkabela Abramu kajisi myaka iili makumi aali musanu aabili amyaka yosanwe naakazwa ku-Harani.

Nkabela Abramu wakatolelela Sarai banakwe, a-Loti mwana wamwanike wakwe, ambono zyabo zyoonse nzibakavubide, abasiŋanda boonse mbobakajene ku-Harani, Bakainka kuya kunyika ya-Kanana, nkabela bakasika nkukonya oko kunyika ya-Kanana.
Lino Abramu wakainda akati kanyika mane wasika kuSekemu, kumubanga waku-More. Nkabela ba-Kanana bakacili munyika.
Lino Jehova wakalibonya kuli-Abramu, wakati, Nyika eyi njooipa lunyungu lwako. Elyo wakayakila Jehova cipaililo mpoonya awo Jehova mpaakalibonenya kulinguwe.

Nkabela kuzwa oko wakalongela kucilundu cakujwe lya-Beteli, wayaka cilao cakwe nkuko, akatikati kaminzi yobile, Beteli kuuli kububbila, Ai kuuli kubuzwezuba. Aalo awo wakayakila Jehova cipaililo, wakomba muzina lya-Jehova.
Pele Abramu kaciya bweenda, kaciya buya kumusanza.
Lino naakasika afwaafwi kumugaano wa-Egepita, wakaambila Sarai mukaakwe kuti, Bona! Ndizi kuti uli mwanakazi mubotu uuebeka loko.
Ncobeni ba-Egepita, bakubona biyo, balaamba kuti, Ngooyu mwanakazi wakwe, Lino balandijaya, pele uwe balakusia.
Amba kuti, Ndime mucizi wakwe; aboobo makani alabota kulindime nkaambo kako. Muuya wangu upone nkaambo kanduwe.
Lino Abramu naakasika ku-Egepita, ba-Egepita bakabona mwanakazi, babona kuti mubotu loko.
Nkabela bapati baFarao nebakamubona, bakamutembaula kubusyu bwa-Farao, aboobo mwanakazi wakatolwa kuŋanda ya-Farao.
Alakwe Abramu wakacitilwa kabotu nkaambo kakwe, nkabela wakajana imbelele aŋombe ambongolo abazike abalanda banakazi ambongolo inzyazi ankamele.
Lino Farao wakaita Abramu, wati, Ino ncinzi eci ncowandicitila? Nkaambonzi tokwe kundaambila kuti ngumukaintu wangu?
Nkaambonzi nowakaamba kuti mucizi wangu? mane ndakamutola kulindime kuti abe mwanakazi wangu. Ncobeni ngumukaintu wako. Umutole, uinke awe.
Nkabela Farao wakalailila bantu bakwe, nkabela bakamusindikizya, walo abanakwe aboonse mbaakali abo.
Lino Abramu wakazwa ku-Egepita, walo abanakwe aboonse mbaakali abo a-Loti, wasika ku-Negebi.
Nkabela Abramu kali muvubi loko, kajisi iŋombe ansiliva angolida.
Lino wakali kweendeenda kuzwa kuNegebi mane wakasika ku-Beteli, oko nkukonya nkwaakataanguna kuyaka zilao zyakwe, akatikati ka-Beteli a-Ai,
nkucakabede cipaililo ncaakayaka akutaanguna. Oko Abramu wakakomba muzina lya-Jehova.
Alakwe Loti iwakali kweenda a-Abramu kajisi imbelele aŋombe amatente.
Nkabela nyika yakaceya; teebakakonzya kukala antoomwe pe, nkaambo kabajisi imbono zinji, aboobo bakakacilwa kukala antoomwe.
Lino kwakabuka inkondo akati kabasikweembela iŋombe zya-Abramu abasikweembela iŋombe zya-Loti. Kuciindi eco ba-Kanana aba-Perizi kabacikede munyika.
Sa nyika yoonse tiili kubusyu bwako na? Atupambukane ambebo, Na ulayanda kuya kucimwesi, mebo ndaya kululyo; na ulayanda kuya kululyo, mebo ndaya kucimwesi.

Mpawo Loti wakatambya meso aakwe, wabona nkwaalale yoonse ya-Jordano, wabona kuti, koonse koonse ili amaanzi. Kuciindi eco, Jehova natakalina kunyonyoona Sodoma a-Gomora, yakali mbubonya mbuli muunda wa-Jehova, mbuli nyika ya-Egepita noya ku-Zoari.
Lino Loti wakalisalila inkwaalale yoonse ya-Jordano, watozya kujwe. Mbuboobo mbubakaanzaana amweenzinyina.
Abramu kakede munyika ya-Kanana; Loti kakede muminzi yankwaalale, kaya buyakayaka zilao zyakwe mane wakasika ku-Sodoma.
Pele bantu ba-Sodoma bakali basizibi, bakali babi loko kumeso aa-Jehova,
nkaambo nyika yoonse njowabona, njoipa nduwe alunyungu lwako, mane kukabe kutamani.
Njoovuzya lunyungu lwako, lube mbuli lusuko lwaansi. Na muntu ulakonzya kubala lusuko lwaansi, lino lunyungu lwako alwalo luyoobalika.
Buka, koya bweendeenda mubulumfu boonse bwanyika akubwaamba bwayo boonse, nkaambo njooipa nduwe.
Mpawo Abramu wakalonzya itente lyakwe, wiinka, waakukala kumibanga ya-Mamre iili ku-Hebroni, nkabela wakayakila Jehova cipaililo mpoonya awo.
bakacita inkondo a-Bera mwami wa-Sodoma, a-Birasa mwami wa-Gomora, a-Sinabi mwami wa-Adima a-Semebere mwami wa-Zeboimu, amwami wa-Bela (ngonguwo Zoari).
Aba boonse bakalibungene mukuti lya-Sidimu (ndondulo Lwizi lwa-Munyo).
Myaka iili ikumi aibili bakali bazike ba-Kedorelaomere, pele mumwaka wakumi aitatu bakapapila.
Lino mumwaka wakumi aine bakeza ba-Kedorelaomere abami mbaakali abo, bazunda ba-Refaimu mu-Aseterote-kamaimu, aba-Zuzi mu-Hamu, aba-Emi mu-Savekiriyataimu,
aba-Hori mucilundu cabo caku-Seiri, akusikila ku-Eliparana uuli munkanda.
Lino kuzwa oko bakaboola, basika ku-Eni-Misipati (ngonguwo Kadesi), bazunda cisi coonse cabaAmaleki, abalo ba-Amori ibakakede mu-Hazezoni-tamara.
Mpawo kwakazwa mwami wa-Sodoma, amwami wa-Gomora, amwami wa-Adima, amwami wa-Zeboimu, amwami wa-Bela (ngonguwo Zoari), baswanana akubamba mindando yabo yakulwisya mukuti lya-Sidimu,
balwisye Kedorelaomere mwami wa-Elamu, a-Tidala mwami wa-Goimu, a-Amarafele mwami wa-Sinara, a-Arioki mwami wa-Elasara, Bami bone bakalwisya bami bosanwe.
Nkabela ikuti lya-Sidimu kalizwide migodi yamulambo. Lino bami ba-Sodoma a-Gomora bakacija, bawida mumonya, abaabo ibakacisyeede bakacijila kucilundu.
Elyo bakatola imbono zyoonse zyaku-Sodoma azyaku-Gomora, azilyo zyabo zyoonse, bainka.
Alakwe Loti mwana wamunyina Abramu, iwakakede ku-Sodoma, bakamutolelela ambono zyakwe, bainka.
Nkabela Abramu naakamvwa kuti mwanaakwabo watolwa mubuzike, wakayobolola basilumamba bakwe bazyale muŋanda yakwe, bantu bali myanda yotatwe akumi amusanu abatatu, wabatobela mane kusikila ku-Dani.
Lino ciindi camasiku bakalipambukanya tukamu tukamu akubalwisya, walo abalanda bakwe, babauma, babatobela mane kusikila ku-Hoba uuli kulubazu lwalumwesi lwaDamasko.
Nkabela wakaboozya imbono zyoonse, alakwe Loti munyina wakamuboozya ambono zyakwe abanakazi abantu boonse.
Nkabela Melkisideke mwami wa-Salemu wakaleta zinkwa awaini. Kali mupaizi wa-Leza Mupatikampatila.
Lino wakamulongezya, wati, Akondezegwe Abramu kuli-Leza Mupatikampatila, muvubi wajulu anyika.
Alumbwe Leza Mupatikampatila iwakaaba basinkondonyoko mumaanza aako. Elyo wakamupa cipanzi cakumi cambono zyoonse,
Lino mwami wa-Sodoma wakaambila Abramu kuti, Kondipa bantu, pele imbono uzitole biyo.
Abramu wakavwiila mwami wa-Sodoma kuti, Ndatambika ijanza lyangu cakukonka kuliJehova Leza Mupatikampatila, muvubi wajulu anyika.
Ncobeni nsikooyootola nekaba katali nekaba kaanzyo kansangu neciba cintu cili buti cambono zyako, kuti utaambi kuti, Ndime ndavubya Abramu.
Cita eco ncibakalya basimisela, azyaabilo zyabantu aba mbendakaya abo, nkokuti Aneri, a-Esikoli a-Mamre—batole zyaabilo zyabo.
Pele Abramu wakati, O Mwami Jehova, uyoondipanzi? Nsijisi mwana, asikulya izina lyaŋanda yangu ngooyu Eliezere wakuDamasko.
Alimwi Abramu wakati, Bona! Tondipede lunyungu, aboobo muzike wamuŋanda yangu nguuyoondilida izina.
Mpawo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakamusikila, liti, Oyu muntu takooyoolya izina lyako pe, mwanaako uuzyalwa mumaala aako nguuyoolya izina lyako.
Lino wakamutola anze, wati, Langa kujulu, ubale tunyenyeezi, na ulakonzya kutubala. Nkabela wakamwaambila kuti, Mbubonya obo mbuluyooba lunyungu lwako.
Mpawo wakasyoma Jehova, nkabela lusyomo lwakwe lwakeelezegwa mbuli bululami.
Pele wakati, O Mwami Jehova, ndaziba buti kuti njooivuba.
Wakamuvwiila kuti, Undiletele impwizi iili amyaka yotatwe, impongo iili amyaka yotatwe, mugutu uuli amyaka yotatwe, inziba ankwilimba.
Elyo wakamuletela ezi zyoonse, wazyaandula akati, wabika cipanzi cimwi acimwi kucipanzinyina, pele bayuni takwakabaandula pe.
Lino makubi naakaseluka kuzoolya nyama, Abramu wakaatanda.
Elyo wakaambila Abramu kuti, Koziba calusinizyo kuti, basilunyungu lwako bayooba beenzu mucisi cimbi. Oko bayooba bazike, nkabela bayoobapenzya myaka iili myanda yone.
Pele oyo musyobo uubanjizya mubuzike njooubeteka, lino kusule lyaceeci bayoopola ambono zinji.
Ayebo, uyoosika kulibamauso caluumuno, uyoozikwa muboongozi bubotu.
Nkabela bayooboola okuno mumusela wane, nkaambo milandu yaba-Amori tiina kuzula,
Lino izuba nelyakamana kubbila, kwakasia mbi, nkabela kwakaboneka mulilo uusuka alampi lyamulilo, zyakainda akatikati kazipanzi.
Mubuzuba obo Jehova wakatanga cizuminano a-Abramu, wati, Lunyungu lwako ndalupa nyika eyi, nkokuti nyika yoonse kuzwa kumulonga wa-Egepita kusikila kumulonga mupati, mulonga Firate,
nyika yaba-Keni ayabaKenizi ayaba-Kadimoni,
ayaba-Hiti, ayaba-Perizi, ayaba-Refaimu,
ayaba-Amori, ayaba-Kanana, ayaba-Girigasi ayaba-Jebusi.
Lino Sarai wakaa­ mbila Abramu kuti, Bona! Jehova wandikasya kuzyala bana, Wence swanana amulanda wangu; ambweni kulinguwe nkonjoopegwa bana. Mpawo Abramu wakaswiilila ijwi lya-Sarai.
Aboobo Sarai muka-Abramu wakabweza Hagare mu-Egepita, mulanda wakwe musimbi, Abramu naakamana kukala myaka iili ikumi munyika ya-Kanana, wamupa Abramu mulumaakwe kuti amukwate.
Elyo wakaswanana a-Hagare, nkabela wakaminta, Abone buyo kuti waminta, bamalelo aakwe bakasampaulwa mumeso aakwe.

Lino Sarai wakaambila Abramu kuti, Ma! Wandibisizya, Ndakakupa mulanda wangu musimbi kuti mukumbatane, lino naakabona kuti waminta, ndakasampaulwa mumeso aakwe. Jehova abeteke makani esu, yebo ambebe.
Abramu wakavwiila Sarai kuti, Musimbi wako uli mumaanza aako. Komucitila kufumbwa cibotu mumeso aako, Lino Sarai wakamufwabya, mane lumwi wakacija kuzwa kulinguwe,
Wakati, Hagare, mulanda musimbi wa-Sarai, wazwida kuli? Uya kuli? Wakavuwa kuti, Ndacija kuzwa kuli-Sarai namalelo wangu.
Mpoonya awo angelo wa-Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Pilu ka kulinamalelo aako, ukalibombye mumaanza aakwe.
Alimwi angelo wa-Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Ncobeni njoovuzya lunyungu lwako; luyoovula cakutabalika.
Alimwi angelo waJehova wakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Ulimisi. Uyoozyala mwana mulombe. Lino uleelede kumuulika izina lya-Ismayeli, nkaambo Jehova ulimvwide mapenzi aako.
Uyooba bwizu bwesaka. Uyooba intimbwamisako uulwanisigwa kubantu boonse. Uyookala cabusinkazi akati kabeenzinyina boonse.
Nciceeco cikala eco ncecaambilwa kuti Cikala ca-Lahai-roi, Cili akatikati ka-Kadesi a-Beredi.
Abramu kajisi myaka iili makumi aali musanu aatatu amusanu aumwi kuciindi eco Hagare naakazyala Ismayeli.
Lino njootanga cizuminano ayebo, nkabela njookuvuzya loko malaa.
Mpawo Abramu wakavundama ansi, nkabela Leza wakamwaambila, wati,
Bona! Ndatanga cizuminano ayebo, nkabela uyooba wisi wamisyobo minji.
Lino izina lyako talikooyooambwa limbi kuti Abramu, pe, izina lyako liyooba Abrahamu, nkaambo ndikubikide kuti ube wisi wamisyobo minji.
Njoocita kuti uzyalisye loko, ube zisi zinji, alimwi mulinduwe muyoozwa bami.
Njootanga cizuminano cangu ayebo amulunyungu lwako luciboola mumazyalani conse, cibe cizuminano citamani, kuti mbe Leza wako a-Leza walunyungu lwako luciza.
Alimwi njookupa, webo alunyungu lwako luciza, nyika yabutuntulisi bwako, nkokuti nyika yoonse ya-Kanana, mwiivube lyoonse, nkabela njooba Leza wabo.
Nceeci cizuminano cangu ncimweelede kubamba, cili akati kandime anywebo alunyungu lwako luciza. Baalumi banu boonse baleelede kupalulwa.
Muleelede kupalulwa mulukanda lwandomo zyanu, Eci ciyooba citondezyo cacizuminano cili akati kesu, mebo anywebo.

Mwana mulombe uuli amazuba aali musanu aatatu uleelede kupalulwa. Baalumi boonse mumazyalani aanu oonse baleelede kucitilwa obo, nibaba bazyedwe mumaanda aanu nibaba baulidwe amali kubeenzu batali balunyungu lwako.
Oyo uuzyedwe muŋanda yako ayooyo uulidwe amali aako, boonse buyo baleelede kupalulwa. Aboobo cizuminano cangu cili munyama yanu ciyooba cizuminano citamani.
Mwaalumi silulomo uutapalwidwe mulukanda lwalulomo lwakwe, oyo muntu uyooandanizigwa abantu bakwe, nkaambo wa mwaya cizuminano cangu.

Alimwi Leza wakaambila Abrahamu kuti, Alakwe Sarai mukaako, izina lyakwe talikooyooambwa limbi kuti ngu-Sarai, pe, izina lyakwe liyooba Sara. Nkabela njoomupa coolwe, njookupa mwana mulombe mulinguwe.
Njoomupa coolwe, nkabela uyooba nacaanzo. Mulinguwe momuyoozwa bami bazisi.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakavundama ansi, waseka, waamba mumoyo wakwe kuti, Sa muntu uuli amyaka iili mwanda ulakonzya kuzyala? Alakwe Sara uuli amyaka iili makumi aali musanu aane, sa ulakonzya kuzyala?
Abrahamu wakaambila Leza kuti, Nicakabota Ismayeli naakapona kubusyu bwako.
Pele Leza wakavuwa kuti, Pe, Sara mukaako uyookuzyalila mwana, elyo uyoomuulika izina lya-Izaka. Njootangana awe cizuminano, walo alunyungu lwakwe luciza musule lyakwe.
Mumakani aa-Ismayeli, ndamvwa, Ncobeni njoomupa coolwe kuti azyalisye akuvula loko. Uyoozyala bami bali ikumi ababili, nkabela njoocita kuti abe musyobo mupati.
Pele cizuminano cangu njoocitanga a-Izaka, ngonguwe Sara ngwati kuzyalile mbuli lino mumwaka uuboola.

Mpoonya awo Abrahamu wakabweza Ismayeli mwanaakwe aboonse ibakazyalwa muŋanda yakwe aboonse mbaakaulide amali aakwe, baalumi boonse bamuŋanda ya-Abrahamu, wapalula lukanda lwandomo zyabo mubuzuba obo mbubonya, mbuli Leza mbwaakamulailila.
Abrahamu­ kajisi myaka iili makumi aali musanu aane amusanu aine naakapalulwa mulukanda lwalulomo lwakwe.
Alakwe Ismayeli mwanaakwe kajisi myaka iili ikumi aitatu naakapalulwa mulukanda lwalulomo lwakwe.
Mubuzuba obo mbubonya Abrahamu a-Ismayeli mwanaakwe bakapalulwa boonse,
abalo basiŋanda bakwe boonse, nibaba bazyedwe muŋanda yakwe nibaba baulidwe amali kubazwakule, bakapalulwa awe.
Wakatambya meso aakwe, walanga, wabona baalumi botatwe baimvwi kunembo lyakwe. Elyo naakababona wakazuzaana kuzwa kumulyango wacilao kuyoobaswanaana akukotama ansi.
Wakati, O mwami wangu, na ndijene coolwe mumeso aako, utaindilili kuzwa kumulanda wako.
Kuletwe twaanzi, mukasambe kuma ulu akulyokezya munsi lyamusamu,
lino ndete tusima, kuti mukatalusye myoyo yanu, Mwamana buyo, mulaindilila, nkaambo mwainda kulindime ndemulanda wanu, Lino bakavuwa kuti, Mbubo, kocita mbubonya mboamba.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakafwambaana kunjila mucilao mwakabede Sara, wati, Fwambaana, ubambe insangwa zyotatwe zyabusu bunante, ubukande, ujike zibunge.
Alimwi Abrahamu wakazuzaanina kucimpati, wabweza cinyonkonyonko camoombe mubotu, wapa mulombe, nkabela wakafwambaana kucibamba.
Elyo wakabweza mabisi amalili acinyonkonyonko camoombe ncaakabambide, wazibika kunembo lyabo, alimwi kaimvwi kumbali lyabo kunsi lyamusamu nibakali kulya.
Wakaamba kuti, Ncobeni njooboola alimwi kulinduwe mbuli lino mwakali, lino Sara mukaako uyooba amwana. Nkabela Sara wakamvwa majwi aya kumulyango wacilao kusule lyakwe.
Lino Abrahamu­ a-Sara boonse bakalicembeede loko loko, alimwi Sara kalekede kuba mbuli banakazi.
Aboobo Sara wakaseka mumoyo wakwe, wati, Ma! Mebo ndazakala, alakwe mulumaangu wacembaala! Sa ndakonzya kuba acoolwe cili boobu?
Mpawo Jehova wakaambila Abrahamu kuti, Ino nkaambonzi Sara waseka cakwaamba kuti, Sa ncobeni ndakonzya kuzyala mwana, mebo ndemucembele?
Sa kuli cintu niciba comwe ciyumu kuliJehova? Kuciindi ceelede njooboola alimwi kulinduwe, mbuli lino mwakali, lino Sara uyooba amwana.
Mpawo Sara wakatama, wati, Nee! Teenda-seka pe. Nkaambo wakayoowa. Nkabela wakaamba kuti, Pe, ncobeni waseka.
Lino abo bantu bakanyampuka akutozya munzila yakuya ku-Sodoma. Alakwe Abrahamu wakabasindikila.
Elyo Jehova wakati, Sa ndakonzya kusisila Abrahamu milimo njincita?
Nkaambo Abrahamu uyooba cisi cipati ciyumu, azisi zyoonse zyaansi ziyoojana coolwe mulinguwe.
Ndimusalide, kuti alailile bana bakwe abasiŋanda bakwe baciza, babambe inzila ya-Jehova akucita bululami ambeta, kuti Jehova aletele Abrahamu ncaakasyomezya aanguwe.
Mpawo Jehova wakati, Kulila kwa-Sodoma akwaGomora kulayoosya malaa, azyalo zibi zyabo nzipati loko.
Ndakati, Nkaseluke, nkabone na ncobeni balacita zyoonse zimvwigwa mukulila kusika kulindime. Na embo obo, njooziba.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakaswena afwiifwi, wati, Sa ncobeni uyoomanisya baluleme antoomwe abasizibi?
Ambweni nkubali baluleme bali makumi osanwe mukati kamunzi. Sa ulabamanisya boonse? Sa tokonzyi kufwida munzi luzyalo nkaambo kabaluleme bali makumi osanwe bakede mulinguwo?
Ncobeni cilatondwa kulinduwe kucita obo, kujaya uululeme antoomwe asizibi, uululeme acitilwe mbubonya mbuli sizibi, Ncobeni cilatondwa kulinduwe, Sa oyo uubeteka nyika yoonse takooyoocita cakululama?
Jehova wakavuwa kuti, Na ndajana omo mumunzi wa-Sodoma baluleme bali makumi osanwe, njoofwida munzi woonse luzyalo nkaambo kambabo.
Lino Abrahamu wakaamba alimwi kuti, Bona! Ndalitakata kwaambaula a-Mwami wangu, mebo ndebulongo atwe buyo!

Ambweni kulabula bantu bosanwe akati kabaluleme bali makumi osanwe. Sa ulanyonyoona munzi woonse nkaambo kakubula musanu? Wakati, Na ndajana mumo baluleme bali makumi one amusanu, mikooyoounyonyoona pe.
Mpawo wakamwaambila alimwi kuti, Ambweni kulajanwa makumi one. Wakati, Nsikooyoocita makani nkaambo kamakumi one.
Lino wakaamba wati, Wence, O Mwami wangu, utakalali. Dambe. Ambweni kulajanwa makumi otatwe, Wakati, Nsikooyoocita makani na ndajana makumi otatwe nkuko.
Mpawo wakati, Bona! Ndalitakata kwaambaula a-Mwami wangu, Ambweni kulajanwa makumi obile. Wakati, Nsikooyoonyonyoona munzi nkaambo kamakumi obile.
Lumwi wakati, Wence, O Mwami wangu, utakalali, Dambe komwe buyo, Ambweni kulajanwa ikumi, Wakati, Nsikooyoonyonyoona munzi nkaambo kabaluleme bali ikumi.
Lino naakamana kwaambaula a-Abrahamu­, Jehova wakainka, alakwe Abrahamu wakapiluka kulinguwe.
Elyo wakati, Amuswiilile, nobami bangu. Amuleye, munjile muŋanda yangu ndemulanda wanu, kuti mulale ukusamba kumaulu. Bwaca, mulafuma akutola lweendo lwanu. Bakati, Pe, pe, tula lala anze.
Pele wakabasungilizya loko mane lumwi bakaleya akunjila muganda yakwe. Nkabela wakabacitila ipobwe akujika zibunge kuti balye.
Pele kabatana kulala, bantu bamunzi, nkokuti bantu ba-Sodoma boonse buyo, nibaba banike nibaba bapati, bakazyunguluka iŋanda.
Bakoongolola Loti kuti, Bali kuli bantu basika kulinduwe sunu mangolezya? Kobagwisya kulindiswe, kuti tubazibe.
Mpawo Loti wakaya anze kumulyango nkubakabede, wajala ikoma kusule lyakwe,
wati, Wence bakwesu, mutabisyi obo.

Amubone! Ndijisi bana basimbi bobile batana kuziba mwaalumi. Ndabaleta kulindinywe, lino mulabacitila kufumbwa cibotu mumeso aanu. Pele bantu aba, mutabacitili cintu pe, nkaambo mbeenzu bamuŋanda yangu.

Lino bakati, Tantamukila oko. Alimwi bakati, Oyu muntu wakeza kukala-kala akati kesu, lino sunu ulayanda kuba mubetesi wesu, Mbubo. Tulabisizya nduwe kwiinda mbabo. Mpawo bakatalika kufumpisya oyo muntu Loti akuswena kufwaafwi kuzoopwaya ikoma.
Pele abo beenzu bakatambika maanza aabo, baboozya Loti muŋanda mubakabede, bajala mulyango.
Nkabela bantu ibakali kumulyango waŋanda, baniini abapati boonse buyo, bakabaofwaazya, aboobo cakabakataazya kujana mulyango nkuubede.
nkaambo tulanyonyoona busena obuno. Nkaambo kulila kwabo kulayoosya kunembo lya-Jehova, aboobo Jehova watutuma kukunyonyoona munzi.

Mpawo Loti wakainka kuyooambila bakwaansa bakwe ibakaamba kukwata bana basimbi bakwe, wati, Amubuke, muzwe okuno, nkaambo Jehova ulayanda kunyonyoona munzi. Pele mumeso aabakwaansa bakwe kali mbuli sikusobana.
Nibwakaca, baangelo bakasungilizya Loti kuti, Buka, tola mukaako abana basimbi bako bobile mboli abo, kuti utasyukuti mumilandu yamunzi.
Lino naakacili kuzyozyoka, bantu abo bakajata ijanza lyakwe ajanza lyamukaakwe amaanza aabana bakwe basimbi bobile, (nkaambo Jehova wakamufwida luzyalo), bamutola anze lyamunzi.
Bamane kubasisya anze, bakati, Cija lufu. Utacebuki musule nikuba kulindila abuniini moonse mubbuwa, Cijila kucilundu, kuti utasyukuti.
Pele Loti wakuti, Pe, nobami bangu.
Amubone! Mulanda wako wajana luzyalo mumeso aako. Ncobeni wavuzya buuya mbowandicitila kukufutusya buumi bwangu. Lino mebo nsikonzyi kucijila kucilundu pe; ambweni bubi bulanditobela mane nkafwe.
Bona! Ulya munzi uli afwaafwi kucijila nkuko, alimwi muniini. Ncijile nkuko, Sa tuuli muniini? Lino buumi bwangu buyoofutuka.
Elyo wakamwaambila kuti, Mbubo, ndakuzuminina mucintu eci acalo. Nsikooyoomwaya munzi ulya ngoamba.
Fwambaana kucijila nkuko, nkaambo nsikonzyi kucita cintu niciba cimwi mane ukasike nkuko. Nciceeco oyo munzi ncoambilwa kuti ngu-Zoari.
Lino izuba nilyakamana kupata, Loti wakanjila mu-Zoari,
Aboobo wakamwaya minzi eyo, acisi coonse ceengelede, abantu boonse ibakakede muminzi, azisyuuka muvu.
Pele mukaakwe wakacebuka musule, nkabela mpawo wakaba indomba yamunyo.
Nkabela Abrahamu wakafuma loko kuya oko nkwaakaimvwi kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Nkabela naakalanga kubbazu lya­-Sodoma a-Gomora acisi ceengelede, wakabona busi bwanyika bulauntumuka mbuli busi bwaceengelo.
Elyo mupati wakaambila mwanike wakwe kuti, Tateesu wacemaala, alimwi taakwe mwaalumi naba omwe ansi uukonzya kutukwata mbuli muciyanza canyika.
Koza, tukanywisye tateesu waini, kuti tulale awe, aboobo tulakonzya kubusya lunyungu kuzwa kulitateesu.
Mpoonya awo bakanywisya wisaabo waini masiku ayo ngaonya, nkabela mupati wakasika, walala uwisi, pele takazibide na wakalala lili nanka wakabuka lili.

Lino nibwakaca, mupati wakaambila mwanike wakwe kuti, Bona! Jilo ndakalede ataata, Atumunywisye waini alimwi masiku ano, ukasike akulala awe ayebo, aboobo tulakonzya kubusya lunyungu kuzwa kulitateesu.
Lino bakanywisya wisaabo waini alimwi masiku ayo, nkabela mwanike wakasika, walala awe, pele takazibide na wakalala lili nanka wakabuka lili.
Aboobo bana basimbi boonse bobile ba-Loti bakaminta kuzwa kuliwisaabo.
Nkabela mupati wakazyala mwana mulombe, wamuulika izina lya-Moabu. Ngonguwe wisaabo ba-Moabu boonse kusikila asunu.
Alakwe mwanike wakazyala mwana mulombe, wamuulika izina lya-Beni-Ami. Ngonguwe wisaabo ba-Amoni boonse kusikila asunu.
Lino Abrahamu wakaamba aa-Sara mukaakwe kuti, Ngumucizi wangu, Mpawo Abimeleki mwami wa-Gerari wakatuma batumwa, watola Sara.
Nkabela Leza wakasikila Abimeleki muciloto camasiku, wati, Bona! Uli mufu buyo nkaambo kamwanakazi ngotolede, nkaambo ulikwetwe mwaalumi,
Nkabela Abimeleki katanaswanana awalo, aboobo wakaamba kuti, Akaka Mwami! Sa ulayanda kujaya musyobo uululeme?
Sa teensi nguwe iwakandaambila kuti, Ngumucizi wangu? Alakwe mwanakazi wakaamba kuti, Ngumunyinandumi wangu. Cintu eci ncindacita, ndacicita amoyo uululeme amaanza aasalala.
Leza wakamwaambila muciloto kuti, Ambebo ndakaziba kuti wacicita amoyo uululeme. Nkaambo kako ndakakukasya kubisya kulindime, teendakakuzumizya kumuguma.
Lino bweedezezya muntu mwanakazi wakwe, nkaambo mulunguzi, Uyookukombela, aboobo uyoopona. Pele na wakaka kumubweedezya, zibisya kuti ncobeni ulafwa, webo aboonse mboli abo.
Nibwakaca, Abimeleki wakafuma, waita balanda bakwe boonse, wabalwiida makani aya oonse. Nkabela bantu bakayoowa loko.

Elyo Abimeleki wakaita Abrahamu, wamubuzya kuti, Ino ncinzi eci ncowatucitila? Ndakabisyanzi kulinduwe? Nkaambonzi noyanda kutuletela, mebo acisi cangu, mulandu mupati. Wandicitila zintu ziteelede kucitwa.
Alimwi Abimeleki wakaambila Abrahamu kuti, Waba anzi noyanda kucita cintu cili obo?
Lino Abrahamu wakamuvwiila kuti, Ndakacita obo nkaambo kakuti ndakali kuyeeya kuti, Ncobeni banti bakookuno tabayoowi Leza, balandijaya nkaambo kamukaangu.
Alimwi ngumucizi wangu ncobeni, nkaambo ngumwana wataata nekuba kuti tali mwana wabama, nkabela ndakamukwata.
Lino Leza naakandituntulisya kuzwa kuŋanda yataata, ndakamwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mboelede kundigwasya. Kufumbwa oko nkutusika, amba kuti, Ngumunyinandumi wangu.
Mpawo Abimeleki wakabweza imbelele aŋombe abalanda balombe abasimbi, wapa Abrahamu, alimwi wakamubweedezya Sara mwanakazi wakwe.
Nkabela Abimeleki wakati, Bona! Nyika yangu ili kubusyu bwako, Kala kufumbwa kukubotela.
Alakwe Sara, wakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Ndapa munyinandumi wako mali aansiliva aali cuulu. Ncitanzyansoni kulinduwe akuliboonse mboli abo, makani aako alulame mumeso aabantu boonse.
Elyo Abrahamu wakakomba Leza, nkabela Leza wakaponya Abimeleki amwunakazi wakwe abalanda bakwe, nkabela bakazyala.
Nkaambo Jehova wakalisinkide inzyalilo zyoonse zyaluzubo lwa-Abimeleki nkaambo kamakani aa-Sara muka-Abrahamu.
Elyo Sara wakamima, wazyalila Abrahamu mwana mulombe mubucembele bwakwe, kuciindi ceelede Leza ncaakamwaambilide.
Nkabela Abrahamu wakaulika oyo mwanaakwe ngwaakazyalilwa, Sara ngwaakamuzyalila, izina lya-Izaka.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakapalula mwanaakwe Izaka naakajisi mazuba aali musanu aatatu aakuzyalwa, mbubonya mbuli Leza mbwaakamulailila.
Abrahamu kajisi myaka iili mwanda, mwanaakwe Izaka naakazyalwa.
Lino Sara wakati, Leza wandipa cisesyo; kufumbwa uumvwa impuwo ulaseka ambebo.
Wakati, Nguni wakakonzya kwaambila Abrahamu kuti Sara uyoonyonsya bana? Nkaambo ndamuzyalila mwana mubucembele bwakwe.
Elyo mwana wakakula. Cibe ciindi wakalesegwa, nkabela Abrahamu wakacita ipobwe ipati mubuzuba obo Izaka naakalesegwa.
Lino Sara wakabona mwana wa-Hagare mu-Egepita ngwaakazyalila Abrahamu ulaseka.
Mpawo wakaambila Abrahamu kuti, Tanda oyu mwanakazi muzike amwanaakwe, nkaambo mwana wamuzike oyu takooyooba alukono antoomwe amwanaangu Izaka.
Lino makani akabija loko mumeso aa-Abrahamu nkaambo kamwanaakwe.

Pele Leza wakaambila Abrahamu kuti, Makani atabiji mumeso aako. Utalipenzyi nkaambo kamwanaako amwanakazi muzike wako. Zyoonse buyo Sara nzyaakwaambila, swiilila ijwi lyakwe muzintu zyoonse, nkaambo muli-Izaka moziyooambwa imbuto zyako.
Alakwe mwana wamwanakazi muzike, njoocita kuti abe cisi cipati, nkaambo nimbuto yako.
Lino nibwakaca, Abrahamu wakafuma, wabweza zinkwa ankomo yamaanzi, wapa Hagare, wazibika akuko lyakwe, amwana, aboobo wakamutanda. Nkabela naakainka, wakali kuya bweendeenda munkanda ya-Bcereseba,
waakukala alike kulekule, mbuli intaamu yamuvwi, nkaambo wakati, Ntaboni kufwa kwamwana. Wakakala bulangene awe, woomoka, walila.
Mpawo Leza wakamvwa ijwi lyamulombe, nkabela angelo wa-Leza wakaita Hagare kuzwa kujulu, wamwaambila kuti, Waba anzi, Hagare? Utayoowi, nkaambo Leza wamvwa ijwi lyamulombe awo mpabede.
Nyampuka, bweza mulombe, umujate kujanza, nkaambo njoocita kuti abe musyobo mupati.
Elyo Leza wakabbanuna meso aakwe, nkabela wakabona cikala camaanzi, wainka, wazuzya inkomo maanzi, wanywisya mulombe.
Lino Leza kali amulombe, nkabela naakakomena wakakala munkanda, waba simata.
Kakede munkanda ya-Parani, nkabela banyina bakamujanina mukazi munyika ya-Egepita.

Lino kondikonkela muzina lya-Leza mpoonya ano kuti tokooyoocita cakweena kulindime nikuba kubana bangu nikuba kulibasikamukowa bangu boonse. Mbubonya mbundakakufwida luzyalo, ayebo uleelede kucita mbubonya kulindime akucisi nkokala-kala.
Abrahamu wakati, Ndakonka.
Pele Abimeleki wakati, Nsizi na ngwani wakacita obo. Tokwe nowakandaambila pe, akumvwa nsina kunvwa pe mane sunu.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakabweza imbelele aŋombe, wapa Abimeleki, nkabela boonse bobile bakatangana cizuminano.
Alimwi Abrahamu wakabweza intumbe zyambelele zili musanu azibili, wazibika zilike.
Lino Abimeleki wakabuzya kuli-Abrahamu kuti, Ino nkokutyeni ezi intumbe zili musanu azibili nzowabika zilike?
Wakavuwa kuti, Ezi intumbe zili musanu azibili, uleelede kuzitambula kumaanza aangu, zibe citondezyo cakuti ndime ndasya cikala eci.
Nkaambo kako kuntu oko kwakaulikwa izina lya-Beereseba, nkaambo nkonkuko boonse bobile nkubakakonkela.
Bakatangana cizuminano oko ku-Beereseba, elyo Abimeleki a-Fikolo silutwe wampi yakwe bakanyamuka, bapiluka kunyika yaba­-Filisti.
Lino Abrahamu wakazikila musika nkukonya oko ku-Beereseba, wakomba izina lya-Jehova Leza Uuteeli.
Nkabela Abrahamu kakede munyika yaba-Filisti mazuba manji.
Wakati, Tola mwanaako simuzyalwaalike ngoyandisya, nkokuti Izaka, ukainke kunyika ya-Menya akumutuula mbuli cipaizyo atala lyacimwi cazilundu ncenjookutondezya.
Lino nibwakaca, Abrahamu wakafuma, wabopa imbongolo, wabweza bobile babalanda bakwe a-Izaka mwanaakwe, waandula inkuni zyakupaizya, wanyamuka, waya kubusena obo Leza mbwaakamwaambila.
Nkabela mubuzuba bwatatu Abrahamu wakatambya meso aakwe, wabona busena kulekule.
Mpoonya awo Abrahamu wakaambila balanda bakwe kuti, Amulindile ano ambongolo. Mebo amwana tulaya kunembo kuyookomba. Tulaboola kulindinywe.
Lino Abrahamu wakatola inkuni zyacipaizyo, wamukoleka Izaka mwanaakwe, alimwi mujanza lyakwe wakatola mulilo acifulo, aboobo bakainka boonse bobile.
Nkabela Izaka wakaambila Abrahamu wisi kuti, Taata! Wakati, Mpondi, mwanaangu. Wakati, Bona! Inkuni nkuzili, amulilo nkuuli. Pele kabelele kakupaizya kali kuli?
Lino Abrahamu wakavuwa kuti, Leza mwini ulalibambila kabelele kakupaizya, mwanaangu. Elyo bakacili kuya bweenda boonse bobile.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe, wabweza cifulo kuti ajaye mwanaakwe.
Pele angelo wa-Jehova wakamoongolola kuzwa kujulu, wati, Abrahamu! Abrahamu! Wakati, Mpondi.
Elyo wakati, Utatandabiki ijanza lyako kumwana nikuba kumucitila cintu, nkaambo lino ndaziba ncobeni kuti ulamuyoowa Leza, nkaambo tokwe nowandikakila mwanaako simuzyalwa alike.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakatambya meso aakwe, wabona mugutu ulipatide muciteo ameja aakwe. Nkabela Abrahamu wakaya, wajata oyo mugutu, wamutuula mbuli cituuzyo mucibaka camwanaakwe.
Lino oko kuntu Abrahamu wakakuulika izina lya-Jehova-Jire. Asunu kucaambwa obo. Mucilundu ca-Jehova mulaboneka.
Lino angelo wa-Jehova wakoongolola Abrahamu lwabili kuzwa kujulu,
wati, Ndakonkezya muzina lyangu ndemwini, mbwaamba Jehova, kuti mbubonya mbowacita obo akutakasya mwanaako simuzyalwaalike,
ncobeni njookupa coolwe loko, akuvuzya njoovuzya lunyungu lwako mbuli inyenyeezi zyakujulu ambuli musec wakunkomwe yalwizi, nkabela basilunyungu bako bayoovuba mulyango wabasinkondonyina.
Mulunyungu lwako zisi zyoonse zyaansi moziyoojana coolwe, nkaambo kakuti waswiilila ijwi lyangu.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakapiluka kubalanda bakwe, banyamuka, baya boonse antoomwe ku-Beereseba, Nkabela Abrahamu kakede nkukonya oko ku-Beereseba.
Uzi mutaanzi, a-Buzi mwanike wakwe, a-Kemueli wisi Aramu,
Kesedi, a-Hazo, a-Pilidasi, a-Jidilafi a-Betuele,
Betuele nguwakazyala Rebeka. Aba bana bali musanu abatatu, Milika mbaakazvalila Nahori mwanaakwanu Abrahamu.
Alakwe simamambe wakwe, izina lyakwe kali Reuma, wakazyala Tebaki a-Gahamu a-Tahasi a-Maaka.
Lino Sara wakapona myaka iili mwanda amakumi obile amusanu aibili. Mbuyakabede myaka yabuumi bwa-Sara.
Elyo Sara waka­ fwa mu-Kiriyati-ariba (ngonguwo Hebroni) munyika ya-Kanana, nkabela Abrahamu wakanjila kukulila Sara akoomoka.
Mpawo Abrahamu, naakabuka kuzwa kumufu wakwe, wakaambila bana ba-Heti kuti,
Ndi mweenzu asikukalakala buyo akati kanu. Amundipe mavwikilo akati kanu, nkaavube, nkazike mufu wangu kuzwa kumeso aangu.
Elyo bana ba-heti bakavwiila Abrahamu kuti,
Utuswiilile, mwami. Uli silutwe mupati akati kesu. Kozika mufu wako kufumbwa nkosala mumavwikilo esu mabotu. Taakwe muntu naba omwe akati kesu uukonzya kukukasya mavwikilo aakwe kuti uzike mufu wako.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakabuka, wakotamina bantu banyika, bana ba-Heti.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Na ncobeni mwazumina kuti nzike mufu wangu, amundiswiilile. Amundikumbilile kuli-Efroni mwana wa-Zohari,
kuti andipe isempo lya-Makipela ndyajisi, lili kumagolelo aamuunda wakwe. Anduuzizye muulo uuzwide kumeso aanu, kuti nkalivube, libe mavwikilo aangu.
Lino Efroni kakede akati kabana ba-Heti. Nkabela Efroni mu-Hiti wakavwiila Abrahamu mumatwi aabana ba-Heti, mumatwi aaboonse ibakanjila mumulyango wamunzi, wati,
Pe, mwami. Amundiswiilile. Ndakupa muunda, alyalo isempo lili mulinguwo. Zyoonse buyo ndakupa okuno kumeso aabantu bangu, kuti uzike mufu wako.
Mpawo Abrahamu wakakotamina bantu banyika,
nkabela wakaambila Efroni mumatwi aabantu banyika kuti, Wence undiswiilile, Ndakupa mali aamuunda. Tambula kuzwa kumaanza aangu, kuti nzike mufu wangu nkukonya oko.
Lino Efroni wakavwiila Abrahamu kuti,
Swiilila, mwami, nyika yamasyekeli aansiliva aali myanda yone, ncecinzi akati kangu ayebo? Kozika mufu wako.

Mpawo Abrahamu wakaswiilila Efroni, nkabela Abrahamu wakapimina Efroni bulemu bwamali aansiliva mbubonya mbwaakaamba mumatwi aabana ba-Heti, nkukuti masyekeli aansiliva aali myanda yone, mbubakali kupima basambazi.
mbuwakaba civubo ca-Abrahamu mumeso aabana boonse ba-Heti aboonse ibakali kunjila mumulyango wamunzi wakwe.
Lino naakamana makani aya, Abrahamu wakazika Sara mukaakwe omo musempo lyamumuunda waku-Makipela kunembo lya-Mamre (ngonguwo Hebroni) munyika ya-Kanana.
Muunda asempo lili mulinguwo, zyoonse zyakapegwa mumaanza aa-Abrahamu, azivube, zibe mavwikilo aakwe, mbubakacita bana ba-Heti.
Lino Abrahamu wakaambila mulanda wakwe, mupati wabasiŋanda bakwe, iwakali kulanga imbono zyakwe zyoonse, kuti, Bika ijanza lyako kunsi lyacibelo cangu;
lino ndakucita kuti ukonkezye muzina lya-Jehova Leza wakujulu a-Leza waansi kuti tokooyookwatya mwanaangu umwi wabana basimbi baba-Kanana mbenkede akati kabo.
Uleelede kuya kucisi cangu akuluzubo lwangu, ukajanine mwanaangu Izaka mukazi nkukonya oko.
Lino mulanda wakamwaambila kuti, Ambweni mwanakazi takonzyi kuzumina kunditobela kuza okuno kunyika ino, Sa ndeelede kupilusya mwanaako kucisi eco nkowakazwa,
Abrahamu wakamuvwiila kuti, Ne! Toelede kupilusya mwanaangu oko abuniini.

Jehova Leza wakujulu, iwakandigwisya munanda yataata amu nyika yabuzyalwe bwangu, iwakandaambila akukonka kuti, Njoopa lunyungu lwako nyika eyi, ulatuma angelo wakwe kunembo lyako, nkabela uyoobwezela mwanaangu mukazi kuzwa oko.
Pele na mwanakazi tazumini kukutobela, yooangunuka kuzwa kucikonke cangu. Toelede kupilusya mwanaangu oko pe.
Mpawo mulanda wakabika ijanza lyakwe kunsi acibelo-ca-Abrahamu simalelaakwe, wakonkezya mumakani aya.
Nkabela wakafugamya inkamele anze amunzi kumbali kucikala camaanzi Kuciindi camangolezya, banakazi nibakali kuteka maanzi.
Nkabela wakaamba kuti, O Jehova, Leza wasimalelaangu Abrahamu, undipe coolwe buzuba obuno akucitila simalelaangu Abrahamu caluzyalo.
Bona! Ndiimvwi kumbali akasensa kamaanzi, abana basimbi babantu bamunzi baleza kukuteka maanzi.

Lino na ndaambila musimbi kuti, Wence sendeka inongo yako, nywe alimwi oyo musimbi ulaamba kuti, Nywa, nkabela njootekela inkamele zyako azyaloabe ngonguwe ngosalilide mulanda wako Izaka. Mbuboobo mbunjooziba kuti wacitila simalelaangu luzyalo.
Oyo musimbi keebeka loko, alimwi kali nakalindu, katana kweebwa mwaalumi, Nkabela naakasika kukasensa, wakazuzya nongo yakwe, wazwa.
Mpawo mulanda wakazuzaana kuyoomuswana, wati, Wence undinywisye twaanzi munongo yako.
Wakavuwa kuti, Nywa, mwami. Nkabela wakafwambaana kusendeka nongo yakwe mujanza lyakwe, wamunywisya.
Amane kumunywisya, wakati, Ndatekela inkamele zyako azyalo, mane zimane kunywa zyoonse.
Mpawo wakafwambaana kutulida nongo yakwe mucinywido, wazuzaanina kucikala kukuteka alimwi. Nkabela wakatekela inkamele zyoonse.
Lino muntu wakali kumulangisya cakuumuna, wali kulindila kuziba na Jehova wabotezya lweendo lwakwe na pe,
Nkabela wakabuzya kuti, Wence undaambile na uli mwana wani? Sa tulakonzya kujana busena bwakoona kuliuso?
Wakavuwa kuti, Ndime mwana musimbi waBetueli, mwana wa-Milika ngwaakazyalila Nahori.
Alimwi wakati, Bwizu nkubuli kulindiswe, azilyo zinji, abusena bwakoona.
Mpawo muntu wakakotama, wakomba Jehova,
wati, Alumbwe Jehova Leza wasimalelaangu Abrahamu! Tana kuleka buuya bwakwe alusyomo lwakwe kulisimalelaangu. Lino mebo, Jehova wandeenzya munzila, wandisisya kuŋanda yamunyina simalelaangu.
Lino musimbi wakazuzaana, walwiida basiŋanda babanyina aya makani.
Nkabela Rebeka kajisi munyinandumi, izina lyakwe kali Labani. Oyo Labani wakazuzaanina kucikala muntu nkwaakabede.

Abone buyo kasita ankaya zyakumaboko aamucizi wakwe, alimwi naakamvwa majwi aa-Rebeka mucizi wakwe aakuti, Mbuboobu muntu mbwaandaambila, wakainka oko muntu nkwaakabede. Wakamujana uliimvwi kunembo lyankamele kukasensa.
Mpawo wakati, Njila, webo opedwe coolwe kuliJehova! Nkaambonzi noima anze? Ndabamba iŋanda abusena bwankamele.
Elyo muntu wakanjila waangununa inkamele, Nkabela wakaleta bwizu abulilu bwankamele, amaanzi kuti asambe kumaulu, walo abantu mbaakeza abo.
Mpawo wakabambilwa zyakulya, pele wakati, Nsikoolya, cita ntaangune kwaamba makani aangu, Wakati, Amba.
Lino wakaamba kuti, Ndime mulanda wa-Abrahamu.
Jehova ulipede. Simalelaangu coolwe cipati abulemu. Ulimupede imbelele aŋombe, insiliva angolida, balanda baalumi abanakazi, ankamele ambongolo.
Lino Sara mukazi wasimalelaangu wakazyalila simalelaangu mwana mulombe naakacembaala, nkabela zyoonse nzyaajisi wazipa oyo mwana.
Lino simalelaangu wakandisungilizya kukonkezya kuti, Toelede kukwatya mwanaangu mwanakazi wabana basimbi baba-Kanana mbendikede abo munyika ino, pe.
Uleelede kuya kunaada yataata akuluzubo lwangu, ukaselele mwanaangu nkuko,
Mpoonya awo ndakaambila simalelaangu kuti, Ambweni mwanakazi tayandi kunditobela.
Pele wakati, Jehova ngunjenda awe ulatuma angelo wakwe kubusyu bwako kuti abotye lweendo lwako, mane ukajanine mwanaangu mukazi kuzwa kuluzubo lwangu akuŋanda yataata.
Wamana kucita obo waangunuka kucikonke cangu, Pele wasika kuluzubo lwangu, na tabakupi, mbubo, waangunuka kuzwa kucikonke cangu.
Lino sunu, nindasika kukasensa, ndaamba kuti, O Jehova Leza wasimalelaangu Abrahamu, na wabotya lweendo lwangu ndundatola,
bona! Ndiimvwi kumbali lyakasensa kamaanzi. Na kwasika kamwale kuzooteka maanzi, alimwi na ndamwaambila kuti, Kondinywisya twaanzi twamunongo yako,
na ulandaambila kuti, Nywa, nkabela ndatekela inkamele zyako azyalo—oyo abe mwanakazi Jehova ngwasalilide mwana wasimalelaangu.
Lino nindacili kwaamba mumoyo wangu, kwasika Rebeka, weza anongo yakwe akuko lyakwe, waya kukasensa kuti ateke, Mpawo ndamwaambila kuti, Wence undinywisye.
Nkabela wafwambaana kusendeka nongo yakwe, wati, Nywa, nkabela ndatekela inkamele zyako azyalo. Aboobo ndanywa, azyalo inkamele zyanywa.
Mpawo ndamubuzya kuti, Ino uli mwana wani? Wavuwa kuti, Ndime mwana waBetueli mwana wa-Nahori, ngwaakamuzyalila Milika. Elyo ndamusamika kasita mumpemu yakwe ankaya amaboko aakwe.
Mpawo ndakotama, ndakomba Jehova, ndalumba Jehova Leza wasimalelaangu Abrahamu iwakandeenzya munzila iiluleme kuti nkwatye mwana wasimalelaangu mwana musimbi wamunyina.
Lino amundaambile. Sa mulacitila simalelaangu caluzyalo acakusyomeka? Na mwazumina na mwakaka, amundaambile, nkazibe inzila njinjeelede kutola, niiba yalulyo niiba yalumwensi.
Bona! Ngooyu Rebeka. Komutola, akwiinka awe, abe mukazi wamwana wasimalelaako, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaamba,
Lino mulanda wa-Abrahamu, naakamvwa majwi aabo, wakavundama ansi, wakomba Jehova.
Nkabela mulanda wakagwisya zintu zyansiliva azintu zyangolida azyakusama, wapa Rebeka. Alakwe munyinandumi wakwe, abanyina, wakabapa zintu ziyandisi.
Lino bakalya akunywa, walo abantu mbaakali abo, nkabela bakoona nkukonya oko. Nibwakaca, bakabuka, elyo wakati, Amundisungule kuya kulisimalelaangu,
Pele munyinandumi wakwe abanyina bakati, Musimbi kacikede kulindiswe mazuba mace nanka ikumi, Amana, ulaya.
Wakabaambila kuti, Mutandicelezyi, nkaambo Jehova wandipa coolwe mulweendo lwangu. Amundisungule, njiinke kulisimalelaangu.
Bakati, Atwiite musimbi, tuswiilile mbwaamba mwini.
Mpawo bakaita Rebeka, bamubuzya kuti, Sa ulayanda kwiinka amuntu oyo? Wakavuwa kuti, Ndainka.
Aboobo bakasungula Rebeka mucizi wabo asikumulela wakwe amulanda wa-Abrahamu abantu bakwe.
Nkabela bakalongezya Rebeka, bati, O mucizi wesu, koba banyina bazyuulu zyazyuulu zyabantu, alunyungu lwako luvube mulyango wabaabo balusulide.
Mpawo Rebeka wakanyampuka abasimbi bakwe, batanta ankamele, batobela muntu oyo. Mbuboobo mulanda mbwaakatola Rebeka akwiinka awe.
Nkabela Izaka wakali kuya bweendeenda musokwe ciindi cagoko; elyo naakatambya meso aakwe wakabona inkamele zileza.
Alakwe Rebeka wakatambya meso aakwe, wabona Izaka, elyo wakaseluka kuzwa kunkamele yakwe,
wabuzya mulanda kuti, Ino nguni oyu mwaalumi uuza bweendeenda musokwe kuzootuswanaanya? Mulanda wakati, Ngonguwe simalelaangu, Mpawo wakabweza kaputi, walivumba kumeso.
Lino mulanda wakalwiida Izaka zintu zyoonse nzyaakacitide.
Nkabela Izaka wakanjizya Rebeka mutente lya-Sara banyina. Wakatola Rebeka, abe mukazi wakwe, nkabela wakamuyandisya. Aboobo lzaka wakaumbulizigwa.
Lino Abrahamu wakakwata aumwi mwanakazi, izina lyakwe kali Ketura.
Nkabela wakamuzyalila Zimirani, a-Jokisani, a-Medani, a-Midyani, a-Isibaki, a-Sua,
Alakwe Jokisani wakazyala Seba a-Dedani. Abana ba-Dedani mbaaba: ba-Asuri aba-Letusi aba-Leumi.
Abana ba-Midyani mbaaba: Efa a-Eferi a-Hanoki a-Abida a-Elidaa, Aba boonse kabali bana ba-Ketura.
Nkabela zintu zyoonse nzyaakajisi, Abrahamu wakazipa Izaka.
Bana babasimamambe Abrahamu mbaakajisi, Abrahamu wakabapa zipo akubamwaisya kuzwa kuli-Izaka mwanaakwe naakacili muumi, nkabela bakaya kujwe kunyika yakujwe.
Lino mazuba aabuumi bwa-Abrahamu ngaakapona akasika kumyaka iili mwanda amakumi aali musanu aabili amusanu.
Nkabela kumamanino, Abrahamu naakafwa, kali abucekulu bubotu, kacembeede loko, Elyo wakaya kulibasinsiku bakwe.
Lino Izaka a-Ismayeli bana bakwe bakamuzika musempo lya-Makipela kumuunda wa-Efroni mwana wa-Zohari mu-Hiti uuli kunembo lya-Mamre,
ngonguwo muunda Abrahamu ngwaakaulide kubana ba-Heti, Nkuko Abrahamu nkwaakazikwa a-Sara mukaakwe.
Lino Abrahamu naakamana kufwa, Leza wakalongezya Izaka mwanaakwe, Nkabela Izaka kakede ku-Cikala ca-Lahai-roi.
Ngaaya mazina aabana ba-Ismayeli, balilembedwe mbubakazyalwa: mwana mutaanzi wa-Ismayeli kali Nebayoti, a-Kedara, a-Adibeli, a-Mibisamu,
a-Misma, a-Duma, a-Masa,
Hadada, a-Tema, a-Jeturi, a-Nafisi, a-Kedema,
Mbaabo bana ba-Ismayeli. Ngaayo mazina aabo mutunzuunzi twabo amumakalilo aabo, bami bali ikumi ababili muzisi zyabo.
Lino ngooyu mweelwe wamyaka yabuumi bwa-Ismayeli: myaka iili mwanda amakumi otatwe amusanu aibili, Elyo lumwi wakafwa, waya kulibasinsiku bakwe.
Bakali kukala koonse koonse kuzwa ku-Havila kusikila ku-Suri, kunembo lya-Egepita kulubazu lwakuya ku-Asuri.
nkabela Izaka naakaba amyaka iili makumi one, wakakwata Rebeka mwana musimbi wa-Betueli mu-Aramu waku-Padanaramu, mucizi wa-Labani mu-Aramu.
Nkabela Izaka wakakumbilila mukazi wakwe kuli-Jehova, nkaambo kali musundi, nkabela Jehova wakaswiilila, elyo Rebeka mukaakwe wakaminta.
Lino bana bakali kuzundana mwida lyakwe. Mpawo wakati, Na makani ali boobo, nkaambonzi nencipona? Lino wakaya kukubuzya kuli-Jehova.
Nkabela Jehova wakamwaambila kuti,
Muli misyobo yobile muzyalilo lyako;
Amikowa yobile iyoozwa mwida lyako.
Umwi musyobo uyoojata inguzu kwiinda musyobonyina,
Amupati uyoobelekela muniini milimo.
Lino ciindi cakutumbuka nicakasika, kwakabonwa mayanga muzyalilo lyakwe.
Mutaanzi wakazwa kasalala, amubili akwe woonse kauli mbuli cibaki caboya, nkabela bakamuulika izina lya-Esau.
Musule lyayooyo kwakazwa mwanike wakwe, nkabela ijanza lyakwe lyakalijisi kasindi ka-Esau, aboobo bakamuulika izina lya-Jakobo. Nkabela Izaka kajisi myaka iili makumi aali musanu aumwi naakabazyala.
Nkabela Izaka kayandisya Esau, nkaambo wakali kulya nyama yakwe, pele Rebeka kayandisya Jakobo.
Cimwi ciindi Jakobo naakali kujika musinza, Esau wakazwa musokwe, ulikateede.
Mpawo Esau wakaambila Jakobo kuti, Wence undisusuzye oyo musinza uusalala, nkaambo ndakataala. (Nciceeco ncaakapedwa izina lya-Edomu.)
Jakobo wakavuwa kuti, Taanguna kunduuzizya bupati bwako.
Esau wakati, Langa! Ndaamba kufwa. Obu bupati bulandigwasyanzi?
Elyo Jakobo wakati, Taanguna kukonka. Wakakonka, wauzizya Jakobo bupati bwakwe.
Mpawo Jakobo wakapa Esau insima amusinza wanyangu. Lino wakalya, wanywa, wanyampuka, waya. Mbuboobo Esau mbwaakasampaula bupati bwakwe.
Lino Jehova wakamubonekela, wati, Utainki ku-Egepita pe, kala munyika njindakwaambila.
Kala-kala munyika ino, nkabela njooba ayebo, njookupa coolwe, nkaambo webo alunyungu lwako njoomupa zisi ezi zyoonse, aboobo njoozuzikizya cikonke ncindakakonka kuli-Abrahamu uso.
Njoovuzya lunyungu lwako mbuli inyenyeezi zyakujulu, alimwi njoopa lunyungu lwako nyika ezi zyoonse, elyo mulunyungu lwako zisi zyoonse moziyoojana coolwe,
nkaambo kakuti Abrahamu wakaswiilila ijwi lyangu akubamba imbeta zyangu, milazyo yangu, indayo zyangu amulao wangu.
Lino Izaka wakakala ku-Gerari.

Nkabela bantu bakooko, nibakamubuzya makani aamukaakwe, wakati, Ngumucizi wangu. Wakayoowa kwaamba kuti, Ngumukazi wangu, nkaambo wakati, Ambweni bantu bakookuno balandijaya nkaambo ka-Rebeka, nkaambo kali aciwa cibotu.
Lino nicakaba ciindi cilamfu, Abimeleki mwami waba-Filisti wakasondela mumpulungwizyo, nkabela wakabona Izaka ulasobana a-Rebeka mukaakwe.
Mpoonya awo Abimeleki wakaita lzaka, waamba kuti, Ve! Ngumukazi wako. Waambilanzi kuti, Ngumucizi wangu? Izaka wakamuvwiila kuti, Ndakaamba kuti, Ambweni ndafwa nkaambo kakwe.
Lino Abimeleki wakaamba kuti, Ma! Ncinzi ncowakatucitila? Ambweni umwi wabantu bangu kaba lala amukaako, aboobo wali kunootuletela mulandu.
Mpawo Abimeleki wakalailila bantu boonse kuti, Kufumbwa muntu uuguma mwaalumi oyo amwanakazi wakwe, ncobeni ulafwa.
aboobo muntu wakaba mupati, Wakali kuya bukomena lyoonse, mane lumwi wakaba mulemu loko.
Kajisi imbono zinji, imbelele aŋombe, abasimilimo banji, aboobo ba-Filisti bakamufwida ibbivwe.
(Lino zikala zyoonse balanda bawisi nzibakasya mumazuba aa-Abrahamu wisi, ba-Filisti bakazisinka akuzivwikila.)
Nkabela Abimeleki wakaambila Izaka kuti, Atupambu-kane ayebo, nkaambo uli singuzu loko kwiinda ndiswe.
Mpawo Izaka wakalonga kuzwa nkuko, waakuyaka zilao mukuti lya-Gerari akukala mpoonya awo,

Nkabela Izaka wakafumbulula zikala zyamaanzi nzibakataangwine kusya mumazuba aa-Abrahamu wisi, nkaambo ba-Filisri bakalizisinkide musule lyalufu lwa-Abrahamu. Nkabela wakazipa mazina ayo ngaonya ngaakazipede wisi.
Pele balanda ba-Izaka, niba-kafumba mudonga akujana kasensa kamaanzi aacomoka,
basikweembela baku-Gerari bakakazyanya abasikweembela ba-Izaka, bati, Maanzi ngeesu. Lino cikala eco wakacuulika izina lya-Eseki (Inkondo), nkaambo bakali kukazyanya awe.
Elyo bakasya cikala acimwi. Acalo bakali kucilwanina, nkabela wakacuulika izina lya-Sitina.
Kuzwa oko wakalonga, waakusya cikala acimwi, Lino eco, teebakali kucilwanina pe, Nkaambo kako wakacuulika izina lya-Rehoboti, nkaambo wakati, Lino Jehova watupa busena kuti tuvule munyika.
Kuzwa oko wakainka ku-Beereseba.
Lino Jehova wakamubonekela masiku ayo ngaonya, wati, Ndime Leza wa-Abrahamu uso. Utayoowi, nkaambo ndi ayebo. Njookupa coolwe akuvuzya lunyungu lwako nkaambo kamulanda wangu Abrahamu.
Elyo wakayaka cipaililo nkukonya oko, wakomba izina lya-Jehova, wayaka cilao cakwe nkukonya. Akwalo balanda ba-Izaka bakasya cikala.
Lino Izaka wakababuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi mweza kulindime? Sa tamundisulide akunditanda kuzwa kulindinywe?
Bakavuwa kuti, Ncobeni twabonesya kuti Jehova uli ayebo, Lino twaamba kuti, Kube kukonka akati kesu, swebo ayebo, Atutangane ayebo cizuminano.
Kosyomezya kuti tokooyootucitila bubi, mbubonya mbuli iswe mbututana kukubisizya, nkaambo twakucitila bubotu bulike, alimwi twakaanzaana ayebo caluumuno. Sunu wajana coolwe kuli-Jehova.
Mpawo wakabacitila ipobwe. Bakaiya, banywa.
Nibwakaca, bakafuma, bakonkezyanya. Bamane kucita obo, bakalayana a-Izaka, bainka kulimbabo caluumuno.
Lino mubuzuba obo mbubonya balanda ba-Izaka bakeza kulinguwe kuzoomulwiida makani aacikala ncibakaside. Bakati, Twajana maanzi.
Lino wakacuulika izina lya-Siba. Nciceeco izina lyamunzi ncuuambilwa kuti ngu-Beereseba, mbucaambwa asunu.
Aba bakakataazya myoyo ya-Izaka a-Rebeka.
Wakati, Bona! Ndacemaala, Nsizi buzuba bwalufu lwangu na buyooba lili.
Lino bweza zivwimyo zyako, inkomo yako abuta bwako, uinke musokwe, undijayile nyama,
undijikile nyama iili amunse mbubonya mbunjandisya, akwiileta kulindime, kuti ndye, nkakulongezye nencipona.
Lino Rebeka wakali kuswiilila, ciindi eco Izaka naakali kwaambila mwanaakwe Esau, nkabela Esau naakainka musokwe kuyoovwima nyama akwiileta,
Rebeka wakaambila Jakobo mwanaakwe kuti, Swiilila! Ndamvwa uso ulaambila mupati wako Esau, wati,
Kondijayila nyama, undijikile nyama iili amunse, ndye, kuti nkulongezye muzina lya-Jehova nentana kufwa.
Mbubo, mwanaangu, swiilila ijwi lyangu akucita mbubonya mbunsi kulailile.
Koya kutanga, ulete tupongo tobile tubotu, nkajikile uso nyama yamunse mbuli mbwayanda.
Lino uleelede kwiitola kuli uso, alye, akulongezye naatana kufwa.
Mpawo Jakobo wakaambila banyina Rebeka kuti, Bona! Mupati wangu Esau ngusimavwele, mebo ndinkwizinge.
Ambweni taata ulandaampa-ampa, lino njooba mbuli sikweena mumeso aakwe, aboobo njooliletela loombololo, nsikooyooliletela lukondezyo pe.
Banyina bakamwaambila kuti, Loombololo lwako lube alindime, mwanaangu. Koswiilila buyo ijwi lyangu; koya, ukazilete.
Mpawo wakainka, wazibweza, wazileta kulibanyina, nkabela banyina bakajika nyama yamunse mbubonya mbuli wisi mbwaakali kuyandisya.
Lino Rebeka wakabweza zyakusama zibotu zya-Esau mwanaakwe mupati, nzyaakajisi muŋanda, wazisamika Jakobo mwanaakwe muniini.
Azyalo zikutu zyatupongo, wakazisamika kumaanza aakwe, akunsingo yakwe nkwaakali nkwizinge,
elyo nyama yamunse ansima njaakajikide wakazibika mumaanza aaJakobo mwanaakwe.
Lino wakanjila mwaakabede wisi, wati, Taata! Wakavuwa kuti, Mpondi.
Nduweni, mwanaangu?
Nkabela Jakobo wakaambila wisi kuti, Ndime Esau, mwanaako mutaanzi, Ndacita mbubonya mbowandaambila. Buka, ukale, ulye nyama yangu, undilongezye.
Elyo Izaka wakaambila mwanaakwe kuti, Ino wafwambaana buti kwiijana, mwanaangu? Wakavuwa kuti, Nkaambo kakuti Jehova Leza wako wandipa coolwe.
Lino Izaka wakaambila Jakobo kuti, Swena afwiifwi, kuti nkwaampa-ampe, mwanaangu, nzibe na ncobeni nduwe mwanaangu Esau na pe.
Mpawo Jakobo wakaswena afwaafwi kuli-Izaka wisi, nkabela wakamwaampa-ampa. Lino wakati, Ijwi ndijwi lya-Jakobo, pele maanza ngaa-Esau.
Takwakamuziba pe, nkaambo maanza aakwe akali mbuli maanza aa-Esau mukulana wakwe, akali aboya, aboobo wakamulongezya.
Wakamubuzya kuti, Sa ncobeni nduwe mwanaangu Esau? Wakati, Ndime.
Elyo wakati, Swena kufwaafwi, kuti ndye nyama yamwanaangu, nkulongezye. Mpawo wakaswena kufwaafwi kulinguwe, nkabela wakalya. Alimwi wakamuletela waini, nkabela wanywa,
Elyo Izaka wisi wakamwaambila kuti, Swena afwaafwi, undimyonte, mwanaangu.
Lino wakaswena afwaafwi, wamumyonta. Mpawo wakamvwa bweema bwazyakusama zyakwe, nkabela wakamulongezya, wati,
Bona bweema bwamwanaangu mbububede!
Buli mbuli bweema bwamuunda Jehova ngwaalongezya,
Azintu zilweela zyaansi,
Amaila manji awaini.
Amasi oonse akukotamine.
Koba mwami akati kamukowa wako,
Abalo bana babanyoko bakukotamine.
