Lino Israyeli wakaambila Josefa kuti, Bona! Mebo ndaamba kufwa. Pele Leza uyooba anywebo, uyoomupilusya kunyika yabamausowanu.
Alimwi ndapa nduwe caabilo ncimwi kwiinda bananyokwe; ncencico ncindakanyanzya ba-Amori apanga lyangu abuta bwangu.
Amuswiilile majwi aa-Israyeli usowanu.
Nduwe inguzu zyangu amatalikilo aabupati bwangu.
Nduwe ooinda mubulemu amunguzu,
Nkaambo wakatanta abulo bwauso,
Wabusofwaazya.
Wakalala abwiinga bwangu.
Mapanga aabo nzilwisyo zyalumamba.
O bulemu bwangu, utaswanaani abo;
Nkaambo mubukali bwabo bakajaya muntu,
Amukunyema kwabo bakatyola musune,
Alunyemo lwabo, nkaambo lulayoosya.
Njoobapambula muli-Jakobo,
Akubamwaisya muba-Israyeli.
Juda, ibanyoko bayookutembaula.
Ijanza lyako liyooba atala lyansingo zyabasinkondonyoko.
Bana bauso bayookukotamina.
Kundume, mwanaangu, nkozwa.
Wasobelela, wabwandama mbuli mulavu,
Ambuli syagumpu, ngwani uyoomubusya?
Nuuba musako wabwami waakati kazituta zyakwe,
Mane Siluumuno akasike,
Ngonguwe bantu ngobayooswiilila,
Ulaanga kambongolo kakwe kumisaansa,
Amwana wambongolo yakwe inzyazi kumisaansa mibotu,
Wasanzya zyakusama zyakwe muwaini,
Acikobela cakwe mumusinza wamasaansa.
Meso aakwe ayoosalala pyu nkaambo kawaini,
Ameno aakwe ayootuba buu amalili.
Uyooba inkomwe yamaato,
Acisi cakwe ciyoosika aku-Zidoni,
Isakara nimbongolo injumu,
Iilala akati kazimpati zyambelele,
Wakabona kuti cilyokezezyo ncibotu,
Ayalo nyika ilabotezya,
Aboobo wakagogomeka ikuko lyakwe kukuyumuna,
Wakaba sicibbalo.
Mbuli umwi wamisyobo ya-Israyeli.
Cipile kumbali lyamugwagwa,
Uuluma insumba zyambizi,
Kuti sikutanta waya awide musule.
Pele alakwe uyoofumpa tusindi twabo.
Aseri, zilyo zyakwe ziyoonencesya,
Uyoopa zinono zyamwami.
Nafatali ninsya iiangunukide,
Iizyala bana beebeka.
Josefa ngumutabi uuzyalisya micelo,
Mutabi uuzyalisya micelo kumbali lyakasensa:
Mitabi yakwe ilatandabala abulambo,
Bamupenzya, bamulapula.
Amaanza aamaboko aakwe akajata inguzu,
Nkaambo kamaanza aa-Singuzu wa-Jakobo,
Muzina lya-Mweembeli, Igale lya-Israyeli.
Azwa kuli-Singuzuzyoonse uukupa coolwe, Uukupa zyoolwe zyakujulu,
Azyuulu zyamubbonze lili ansi,
Zyoolwe zyankolo azyazyalilo.
Zyoolwe zyauso zyavula,
Zyainda zyoolwe zyamalundu aaciindi,
Zintu ziyandika zyazilundu ziteeli,
Zibe amutwe wa-Josefa,
Amutwe wayooyo iwakaandeene ababunyina.
Cifumofumo ulalya indume,
Igoko ulaabila nyama.
Njeeyo misyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli iili ikumi aibili, alimwi ngaayo makani wisaabo ngaakaamba aakubalongezya. Wakabalongezya umwi aumwi mbwaakeelede.
Lino wakabalaya, wati, Mebo ndainka kulibasinsiku bangu. Amundizike abamataata musempo lili mumuunda waEfroni mu-Hiti,
musempo lyamumuunda waku-Makipela kunembo lya-Mamre munyika ya-Kanana. Ndendilyo Abrahamu ndyaakaula antoomwe amuunda kuli-Efroni mu-Hiti, kuti alivube, libe mavwikilo,
Nkukonya oko nkobakavwikila Abrahamu a-Sara mukaakwe; nkukonya oko nkubakavwikila Izaka a-Rebeka mwanakazi wakwe; alimwi nkukonya oko nkondakavwikila Leya.
Muunda asempo lili mulinguwo, zyoonse zyakaulwa kuba-Hiti.
Elyo Jakobo, naakamana kulaya bana bakwe, wakaboozya zituta zyakwe abulo, wazanga, wainka kulibasinsiku bakwe.
Lino Josefa wakalailila balanda bakwe basilisi kuti bayanike mutunta wawisi, aboobo basilisi bakayanika mutunta wa-Israyeli.
Kwakamana mazuba aali makumi one, nkaambo ngomweelwe wamazuba aakuyanika mutunta. Nkabela ba-Egepita bakamulila mazuba aali makumi aali musanu aabili.
Taata wakandikonkezya, wati, Ndaamba kufwa; kukabanda kangu nkendakalisida munyika ya-Kanana nkooko nkumweelede kundivwikila, Lino njiinke, nkazike taata. Njooboola.
Nkabela Farao wakati, Mbubo, inka, ukavwike uso, mbubonya mbwaakakukonkezya.
Elyo Josefa wakainka kuyoovwika wisi. Abalo balanda boonse ba-Farao bakainka awe, bapati baŋanda yakwe, abapati boonse banyika ya-Egepita,
aluzubo loonse lwa-Josefa, ababunyina, aluzubo lwawisi. Bacece babo luzutu, ambelele zyabo aŋombe zyabo, nzebakasia munyika ya-Goseni.
Wakaya ankalaki abasimbizi, inkamu impati loko.
Basike kubbuwa lyacipolelo lya-Atadi, kutala lya-Jordano, bakalila nkukonya oko akulila kupati kuyoosya loko,

Nkabela bantu banyika ya-Kanana, nibakabona kulila oko kwakucipolelo ca-Atadi, bakati, Oku kulila kwaba-Egepita kulayoosya loko. Nciceeco kuntu oko ncikwakapedwa izina lya-Abeli-mizraimu. Kuli mutala lya-Jordano,
Aboobo bana bakwe bakamucitila mbubonya mbwaakabalailila.
Bana bakwe bakamutola kunyika ya-Kanana, bamuvwika musempo lyamumuunda wa-Makipela, kunembo lya-Mamre, muunda Abrahamu ngwaakaula kuli-Efroni mu-Hi ti, kuti auvube, ube mavwikilo.
Amane kuzika wisi, Josefa wakapiluka ku-Egepita ababunyina aboonse mbaakainkide abo kuyoovwika wisi.
Elyo bakatumina Josefa mulazyo wakuti, Uso naatakalina kufwa wakalailila kuti,

Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila Josefa. Wence ulekelele bakulana bako milandu yabo azibi zyabo, nkaambo bakakucitila bubi. Lino twakumbila kuti utulekelele milandu yesu tobalanda ba-Leza wauso. Mpawo Josefa wakalila naakamvwa majwi aabo.
Nkabela bakulana bakwe bakasika kuzoovundama kubusyu bwakwe, bati, Bona! Tuli balanda bako.
Lino Josefa wakabaambila kuti, Mutayoowi. Sa mebo ndi mucibaka caLeza?
Inywe mwakayeeya kundicitila bubi, pele Leza wakabusandula kuba bubotu, kuti acite makani ngemubwene sunu, kukuponya bantu banji.
Lino mutayoowi pe, Njoomulela, nywebo abacece banu. Mbuboobo mbwaakabaumbulizya akutontozya myoyo yabo.
Lino Josefa kakede mu-Egepita, walo aluzubo lwawisi. Nkabela Josefa wakapona myaka iili mwa nda akumi,
Nkabela Josefa wakabona bana ba-Efraimu bamuzukulu watatu; abalo bana ba-Makiri mwana waManase bakazyalwa amazwi aa-Josefa.
Lino Josefa wakaambila baku la na bakwe kuti, Mebo ndaamba kufwa, pele Leza ncobeni unoomuswaya akumupozya munyika ino kuti muye kunyika eyo njaakakonkezya kuli-Abrahamu­ akuli-Izaka akuli-Jakobo.
Lino Josefa wakakonkya bana baIsrayeli kuti, Ncobeni Leza unooyoomuswaya, lino zifuwa zyangu muleelede kuzitola kuzwa okuno,
Elyo Josefa wakafwa, Kali amyaka iili mwanda akumi lyomwe, Nkabela bakayanika mutunta wakwe akumubika mucilondwedo mu-Egepita.
Rubeni, Simeoni, Levi, a-Juda,
Isakara, Zebuloni, a-Benjamini,
Dani, a-Nafitali, Gadi, a-Aseri.
Bantu aba boonse ibakazwa mucikungu ca-Jakobo bakali makumi aali musanu aabili, nkaambo Josefa kali kale mu-Egepita.
Lino Josefa wakafwa, abakulana bakwe boonse, abamusdanyina boonse.
Pele bana ba-Israydi bakazyalisya akuvulisya, bakaba banji akujata inguzu loko loko, mane nyika yakazula mbabo.
Oyu wakaambila bantu bakwe kuti, Amubone! Bantu babana ba-Israydi mbanji, alimwi mbayumu kwiinda ndiswe,
Atubacitile camaanu, nkaambo na kabaciya buvula, ambweni tulasikilwa inkondo, lino abalo bayoosangana abasinkondoma, bayootulwisya, bayooloboka kuzwa mucisi cesu.
Nkaambo kako bakababikila basikubabelesya cibbalo, kuti babapenzye amikuli, nkabela bakayakila Farao minzi yazilondwedo, Pitomu a-Ramese.
Pele nebakainda kubapenzya, balo bakainda kuzyalisya akuvula. Aboobo bakali kubayoowa loko.
Lino ba-Egepita bakabelesya bana ba-Israyeli milimo yalunya.
Bakaminya buumi bwabo amilimo miyumu yabulongo ayazitina amilimo yoonse yamyuunda. Mumilimo yoonse njibakali kumana, bakali kubabelesya calunya.
Lino mwami wa-Egepita wakaambila basikutumbusya ba-Hebrayo. Izina lyaumwi kali Sifra aumwi kali Puwa.
Wakati, Mwatumbusya banakazi ba-Hebrayo, mwababona azitumbukilo, na ngumulombe muleelede kumujaya, pele na musimbi, mumuleke apone.
Nekubaboobo basikutumbusya bakayoowa Leza, teebakacita mwami wa-Egepita mbwaakabalailila, bakali kufutusya balombe.
Elyo mwami wa-Egepita wakaita basikutumbusya, wabaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nemwacita obo? Nkaambonzi mwafutula bana balombe?
Basikutumbusya bakavwiila Farao kuti, Nkaambo kakuti banakazi ba-Hebrayo tabali mbuli banakazi baEgepita pe. Balafwamba kutumbuka, sikutumbusya katana kunjila mobabede.
Nkabela Leza wakacitila basikutumbusya kabotu, abalo bantu bakavulisya akujata inguzu loko.
Alimwi basikutumbusya mbubakali kuyoowa Leza, wakabacitila inzubo.
Lino Farao wakalailila bantu bakwe boonse kuti, Boonse balombe bazyalwa amubawaale mulwizi, basimbi boonse amubafutule.
Nkabela oyo mwanakazi wakaminta, wazyala mwana mulombe. Abone kuti mubotu, wakamusisa myezi yotatwe
Elyo naatakacili kukonzya kumusisa, wakabweza cinzuma camatete, wacisyungulula abulongo abunzuka, wabika mwana mulincico, wacibika akati kamatete kunkomwe yalwizi.
Nkabela mucizi wakwe kaimvwi kulekule kuti abone cisi citike kulinguwe.
Elyo mwana musimbi wa-Farao wakeza kuzoosamba kulwizi, abalanda bakwe basimbi bakali kweenda kumbali lyalwizi. Lino wakabona cinzuma akati kamatete, watuma mulanda wakwe musimbi, wacibweza.
Elyo naakacivununa, wakabona mwana, nkabela mulombe wakali kulila. Mpoonya awo wakamufwida luzyalo, wati, Nguumwi wabana baba-Hebrayo.
Lino mucizi wakwe wakaambila mwana wa-Farao kuti, Sa njiinke kuyookuyandawida sikumulela akati kabanakazi ba-hebrayo, kuti akulelele mwana?
Mwana wa-Farao wakamuvwiila kuti, Koya. Mpawo musimbi wakaya, waita banyina mwana.
Nkabela mwana wa-Farao wakamwaambila kuti, Bweza oyu mwana, undilelele; nookuvozya mali, Lino mwanakazi wakabweza mwana, waakumulela.
Aboobo mwana wakakula, nkabela wakamubweedezya kumwana wa-Farao. Wakaba mwana wakwe. Nkabela wakamuulika izina lya-Musa, nkaambo wakati, Ndakamununa mumaanzi.
Elyo wakalanga koonse koonse. Abene kuti taakwe muntu, wakajaya mu-Egepita, wamusisa mumusec.
Lino nebwakaca, wakali kuya bweenda alimwi, wabona bantu bobile ba-Hebrayo balalwana, wabuzya sikubisya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nouma munyoko?
Wakati, Ma! Ngwani wakubika kuti ube silutwe wesu na mubetesi wesu? Sa ulayanda kundijaya mbubonya mbowakajaya mu-Egepita? Amvwe obo, Musa wakayoowa, wati, Ncobeni aya makani alizibidwe.
Alakwe Farao wakamvwa makani, elyo wakali kuyanda kujaya Musa,
Pele Musa wakaloboka kuzwa kuli-Farao, waakukala munyika ya-Midyani. Lino wakakala kumbali lyacikala.
Nkabela mupaizi waku-Midyani kajisi bana basimbi bali musanu ababili. Abo basimbi bakeza, bateka maanzi, bazuzya zinywido kuti banywisye imbelele zyawisaabo.
Elyo beembeli bakasika, babatanda, pele Musa wakanyampuka, wabavuna, wabanywisizya imbelele.
Basike buyo kuli-Reueli wisaabo, wakababuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi mwafwambaana sunu?
Bakavuwa kuti, Umwi muntu mu-Egepita watuvuna mumaanza aabeembeli, alimwi watutekela maanzi akutunywisizya imbelele.
Wakabuzya bana bakwe basimbi kuti, Uli kuli muntu? mwamusiilanzi? Amukamwiite, azoolye insima.
Lino Musa wakazumina kukala amuntu oyo, nkabela wakapa Musa mwanaakwe musimbi Zipora.
Oyo wakazyala mwana mulombe, nkabela wakamuulika izina lya-Gerisomu, nkaambo wakati, Ndali mweenzu munyika imbi.
Leza wakamvwa kunyontauka kwabo, elyo Leza wakaibalukwa cizuminano cakwe ncaakatangene a-Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo,
Leza wakabona bana ba-Israyeli. Leza waka ziba makani aabo.
Nkabela angelo waJehova wakalibonya kulinguwe mumabangabanga aamulilo muciteo. Lino wakabona kuti citeo kaciyaka amulilo, nekubaboobo citeo kacitapyi.
Mpawo Musa wakati, Njiinke kuyoobona malweza aya mapati. Nkaambonzi citeo tacipyi,
Elyo Jehova naakabona ulainka kuyoobona, Leza wakamwiita kuzwa mukati kaciteo, wati, Musa, Musa, Wakati, Mpondi.
Wakati, Utasweni afwiifwi okuno pe, Samununa insangu zyakumaulu aako, nkaambo antu awa mpoimvwi mbusena busalalisya.
Alimwi wakati, Ndime Leza wabamauso, Leza wa-Abrahamu a-Leza wa-Isaka, a-Leza wa-Jakobo. Mpawo Musa wakalivumba kumeso, nkaambo wakayoowa kulanga Leza.

lino ndaseluka kuzoobavuna mumaanza aaba-Egepita akubapozya munyika eyo, mbatole kunyika imbotu iikwazeme, kunyika iikunka malili abuci, nkobabede ba-Kanana aba-Hiti aba-Amori aba-Perizi aba-Hivi aba-Jebusi.
Lino bona! Kulila kwabana ba-Israyeli kwasika kulindime, alimwi ndibwene mafwabi ngebabafwabya ba-Egepita.
Lino koya. Ndakutuma kuli-Farao, ukapozye bantu bangu ba-Israyeli kuzwa ku-Egepira,
Pele Musa wakaambila Leza kuti, Ma! Mebo inga ndainka buti kuli-Farao? Ingandapozya buti bana ba-Israyeli kuzwa ku-Egepita?
Wakati, Ncobeni ndaba ayebo. Lino nceeci citondezyo cakuti ndime ndakutuma. Wapozya bantu kuzwa ku-Egepita, muzoobelekela Leza milimo mpoonya ano acilundu ecino.
Mpawo Leza wakaambila Musa kuti, NDIME UULIWO LYOONSE. Wakati, Mbuboobu mboelede kwaambila bana ba-Israyeli, NDIME ngowakandituma kulindinywe.

Alimwi Leza wakaambila Musa kuti, Mbuboobu mboelede kwaambila bana ba-Israyeli, Jehova Leza wabamausowanu, Leza wa-Abrahamu, Leza wa-Izaka, Leza wa-Jakobo, wandituma kulindinywe, Ndendilyo izina lyangu lyoonse; mbuboobo mbunjeelede kwiibalukwa mumazyalani amazyalani.
Koya, ukabunganye bapati baba-Israyeli, ukabaambile kuti, Jehova Leza wabamausowanu wandibonekela, Leza waAbrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo, wati, Ncobeni ndimubwene mbomucitilwa mu-Egepita.
Lino ndaamba kumugwisya mumapenzi aaku-Egepita, ndimutole kunyika yaba-Kanana ayaba-Hiti ayaba-Amori ayaba-Perizi ayaba-Hivi ayaba-Jebusi, kunyika iikunka malili abuci.

Lino bayooswiilila ijwi lyako, nkabela mukaye kumwami wa-Egepita, yebo abapati ba-Israyeli, mukamwaambile kuti, Jehova Leza waba-Hebrayo waswanaana aswe. Lino twakumbila kuti utuleke, tutole lweendo lwamazuba otatwe kuya munkanda, tukapailile Jehova Leza wesu.
Ndizi kuti mwami waEgepita takooyoomuzuminina kuya, pe, cita asinikizigwe ajanza ijumu.
Aboobo njootandabika ijanza lyangu akuuma ba-Egepita amalweza aangu oonse ngenti cite akati kabo. Musule lyayaayo uyoomuzumizya kuya.
Lino njoocita kuti aba bantu bafwidwe luzyalo mumeso aaba-Egepita, nkabela mukwiinka kwanu tamukooyooinka acinkwamaanza pe.

Mwanakazi uyookumbila kumweenzinyina akuliyooyo uukala-kala muŋanda yakwe kuti amupe zibelesyo zyansiliva, azibelesyo zyangolida, azyakusama; elyo muyoozisamika bana banu balombe abasimbi, aboobo muyoosaala ba-Egepita.
Lino Musa wakavuwa kuti, Tabakooyoozumina nekuba kuswiilila ijwi lyangu, nkaambo bayooamba kuti, Jehova tana kulibonya kulinduwe pe.
Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Ncinzi cili mujanza lyako? Wakati, Ngumusako.
Wakati, Uwaale ansi. Wauwaala ansi, Mpawo wakasanduka kuba inzoka, nkabela Musa wakaicija,
Pele Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Tandabika ijanza lyako, uijate kumucila, (lino wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe, waijata, nkabela yakasanduka kuba musako mujanza lyakwe)
kuti bazumine kuti wakakubonekela Jehova Leza wabamawisaabo, Leza wa-Abrahamu, Leza wa-Izaka, a-Leza wa-Jakobo.
Alimwi Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Bika ijanza lyako akaango kako. Wakabika ijanza lyakwe akaango kakwe, Elyo naakaligwisya, wakajana kuti ijanza lyakwe lyakatuba buu, lyaba acinsenda.
Elyo wakati, Pilusya ijanza lyako akaango kako. Wakapilusya ijanza lyakwe akaangu kakwe, elyo naakaligwisya akaungu kakwe, wakajana kuti lyasanduka alimwi kuba mbuli nyamanyina.
Wakati, Na bakaka kuzumina nanka kuswiilila ijwi lyacitondezyo citaanzi, bayooswiilila ijwi lyacitondezyo cabili.

Pele na bakaka kuswiilila zitondezyo ezi zyoonse zyobile, na bacikaka kuswiilila ijwi lyako, uleelede kuteka maanzi aamulwizi akwaatila ansi, elyo maanzi ayo ngoyooteka mulwizi ayoosanduka kuba bulowa ansi.
Mpawo Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Ma! Nguni wakalenga mulomo wamuntu? Nguni wacita kuti abe syataambi na musinkematwi na uubonesya na moofu? Sa teensi ndime nde-Jehova?
Mbubo, koya. Njooba amulomo wako, njookwiisya mboelede kwaamba.
Wakati, Akaka Mwami! Tuma kujanza lyamuntu umbi, kufumbwa ngokonzya.
Mpoonya awo bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila Musa. Wakati, Sa Aroni mu-Levi teensi munyoko? Ndizi kuti walo ncobeni ulizi kwaamba. Alimwi bona! Uleza kuzookutambula, Akubona, uyookondwa mumoyo wakwe.
Lino uleelede kwaambaula awe akubika majwi mukanwa lyakwe, Ambebo njooba amulomo wako amulomo wakwe, njoomwiisya mbumweelede kucita.
Ngonguwe uuyooambila bantu mucibaka cako, Uyooba mulomo wako, ayebo uyoomubeda mbuli Leza,
Awalo musako oyu, koutola mujanza lyako, nkaambo ngonguwo ngoyoocitya malele.
Elyo Musa wakapiluka kuli-Jetero syanyinazyala, wamwaambila kuti, Njiinke, mpiluke kubakwesu bali mu-Egepita, mbone na bacili baumi. Nkabela Jetero wakamwaambila Musa kuti, Mbubo, koya aluumuno.
Alakwe Jehova wakaambila Musa oko ku-Midyani, wati, Koya, ukapiluke ku-Egepita, nkaambo bafwa abo bantu boonse ibakali kuyanda kukujaya.
Mpawo Musa wakatola mukaakwe abana bakwe, wabatantika ambongolo, wapiluka kunyika ya-Egepita, Awalo musako wa-Leza, Musa wakautolelela mujanza lyakwe.
Ndakwaambila kuti, Leka mwanaangu, ainke kuyoondimanina milimo. Na wakaka kumuleka, njoojaya mwana wako mutaanzi.
Elyo Zipora wakabweza cibezo cabbwe, wakosola lukanda lwalulomo lwamwana wakwe, walugumya zituta zyakwe, wati, Ncobeni uli sikukwata wabulowa kulindime.
Mpoonya awo wakamuleka, Wakamwaambila kuti, Ncobeni uli sikukwata wabulowa kulindime nkaambo kabupalule,
Nkabela Musa wakalwiida Aroni majwi oonse aa-Jehova ngaakamutumina, azitondezyo zyoonse nzyaakamulailila.
Lino Musa a-Aroni bakaya, baakubunganya bapati boonse babana ba-Israyeli.
Nkabela Aroni wakaamba majwi oonse aa-Jehova ngaakaambila Musa, azyalo zitondezyo wakazicita mumeso aabantu.
Lino bantu bakazumina, Bamvwe buyo kuti Jehova waswaya bana ba-Israyeli, alimwi ulibwene kupenga kwabo, bakakotama akukomba.
Pele Farao wakati, Ma! Nguni Jehova? Sa ndakonzya kuswiilila ijwi lyakwe akuleka ba-Israyeli? Nsizi Jehova na nguni, abalo ba-Israyeli nsikoobaleka pe.
Lino bakati, Leza waba-Hebrayo waswanaana aswebo, Utuleke, tutole lweendo lwamazuba otatwe kuya munkanda, tupailile Jehova Leza wesu, kuti atatuumyi malwazi na ipanga.
Pele mwami wa-Egepita wakabaambila kuti, Nywebo, Musa a-Aroni, mwalesezyanzi bantu kubeleka? Kamuya kumilimo yanu.
Alimwi Farao wakati, Ncobeni sunu bantu banyika bavula, lino mulabalesya milimo yabo.
Lino mubuzuba obo mbubonya Farao wakalailila basikubelesya bantu abasilutwe babo kuti,
Mutapi bantu limbi bwizu bwakuumya zitina, mbumwali kucita mazuba aakainda. Baye kuyoomwa beni.
Nekubaboobo mweelwe wazitina ngubakali kucita, bacicite mbubonya obo, Mutacesyi mweelwe pe, nkaambo mbatolo; nciceeco ncibalilila cakuti, Katuya, tukapailile Leza wesu.
Bantu balemezegwe milimo miyumu, baicite, batabiki myoyo yabo kumajwi aakubeja.
Kamuya, mukamwe bwizu nobeni kufumbwa nkomukonzya kubujana. Nekubaboobo milimo yanu tiielede kuceya, pe, abuniini.
Mpawo bantu bakamwaika munyika yoonse ya-Egepita kuyooyandaula zisikosiko zyabwizu.
Abalo basikubabelesya bakali kubafwanzya-fwanzya cakwaamba kuti, Amumanisye milimo yanu, milimo iielede yabuzuba bumwi abumwi mbubonya mbumwakali kucita nemwakajisi bwizu.
Abasilutwe babana baIsrayeli, basikubabelesya ba-Farao mbobakabikide, bakaumwa, Bakabuzigwa kuti, Nkaambonzi tamuna kumanisya mweelwe wanu wazitina sunu mbumwakali kucita muciindi cakamana?
Elyo basilutwe babana ba-Israyeli bakaakulila kuli-Farao, bati, Ino nkaambonzi notucitila obo tobalanda bako?
Tobalanda bako tatupegwi bwizu, nekubaboobo balatwaambila kuti, Amubumbe zitina. Swebo tobalanda bako tulaumwa, anukuti mulandu uli kubantu bako omwini.
Wakati, Muli batolo, muli batolo, aboobo mulaamba kuti, Katuya, tukapailile Jehova.
Lino kamuya, mukabeleke. Bwizu tamukooyoobupegwa pe, nekubaboobo muleelede kuzulizya mweelwe wazitina.
Elyo basilutwe babana ba-Israyeli bakabona kuti makani abija, nkaambo bakaambilwa kuti, Tamukonzyi kuceesya mweelwe wazitina wabuzuba bumwi abumwi, tamukonzyi kuceesya abuniini.
Nkabela nebakaswanaana a-Musa a-Aroni, ibakali kubalindila ciindi cakuzwa kuli-Farao,
bakabaambila kuti, Jehova alange, abeteke makani esu, nywebo aswebo, nkaambo mwasampauzya bwema bwesu mumeso aa-Farao amumeso aabalanda bakwe. Wabika ipanga mumaanza aabo, kuti batujaye.
Kuzwa kuciindi eco nindakataanguna kusika kuli-Farao kuzooamba muzina lyako, wacitila bantu aba bubi. Kuvuna tona kuvuna bantu bako pe.
Mpoonya awo Leza wakaambila Musa kuti, Ndime Jehova.
Ndakalibonya kuli-Abrahamu akuli-Izaka akuli-Jakobo mbuli Leza Singuzuzyoonse, pele izina lyangu lya-Jehova teelyakazibwa kulimbabo.
Alimwi ndakatangana abo cizuminano cakusyomezya kubapa nyika ya-Kanana, nyika yabubala bwabo njibakali kukala-kala mulinjiyo.
Alimwi ndimvwide kutongela kwabana ba-Israyeli bajeswi mubuzike kuba-Egepita, ndaibaluka cizuminano cangu.
Nkaambo kako ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Ndime Jehova. Njoomulemununa kumikuli milemu yaba-Egepita akumuvuna kubuzike bwabo. Njoomufutula akuboko kutandabikidwe ambeta impati,
Njoomutambula, mube bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wanu, Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova Leza wanu iwamulemununa mi kuli milemu yaba-Egepita.
Nkabela njoomusisya kunyika eyo njindakakonkezya kupa Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo, Ndaipa kulindinywe, mukaivube. Ndime Jehova.
Elyo Musa wakaambila bana ba-Israyeli mbubonya obo, pele teebakamvwa Musa, pe, nkaambo kakupenga kumyoyo yabo akaambo kamilimo miyumu.
Mpoonya awo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Njila, ukaambile Farao mwami wa-Egepita, kuti aleke bana ba-Israyeli, bazwe mucisi cakwe.
Pele Musa wakaamba mumatwi aa-Jehova kuti, Bona! Bana ba-Israyeli tabandimvwi. Ulandimvwa buti Farao, mebo ndemuntu sikamama?
Pele Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni, wabalailila mbubeelede kwaambila bana ba-Israyeli a-Farao mwami wa-Egepita, kuti bapozye bana ba-Israyeli kuzwa kunyika ya-Egepita.
Abana ba-Simeoni mbaaba: Jemueli a-Jamini a-Ohadi a-Jakini a-Zohari a-Saulo mwana wamwanakazi muKanana. Nzeezyo inzubo zya-Simeoni.
Amazina aabana ba-Levi mumazyalani aabo ngaaya: Gerisoni a-Kohati a-Merari, Nkabela myaka yabuumi bwa-Levi yakasika kumwanda amakumi otatwe amusanu aibili.
Abana ba-Gerisoni mumazyalani aabo mbaaba: Libini a-Simei.
Abana ba-Kohati mbaaba: Amramu a-Izara a-Hebroni a-Uzieli. Myaka yabuumi bwa-Kohati yakasika kumwanda amakumi otatwe aitatu.
Abana baMerari mbaaba: Mali a-Musi. Nzeezyo inzubo zyaba-Levi mumazyalani aabo.
Lino Amramu wakakwata Jokebedi mujwa wawisi, nkabela wakamuzyalila Aroni a-Musa, Nkabela myaka yabuumi bwa-Amramu yakasika kumwanda amakumi otatwe amusanu aibili.
Abana ba-Izara mbaaba: Kora a-Nefegi a-Zikiri.
Abana ba-Uzieli mbaaba: Misayeli a-Elisafana a-Sitiri.
Nkabela Aroni wakakwata Eliseba mwana musimbi wa-Aminadabu mucizi wa-Nasoni, elyo wakamuzyalila Nadabu a-Abihu a-Eleazara a-Itamara.
Abana ba-Kora mbaaba: Asiri a-Elikana aAbiasafu. Nzeezyo inzubo zyaba-Kora.
Lino Eleazara mwana waAroni wakakwata umwi wabana basimbi ba-Puteeli, nkabela wakamuzyalila Pinehasi. Mbaabo basilutwe banzubo zyaba-Levi mumazyalani aabo.
Mbombabo bakaambila Farao mwami wa-Egepita kuti bapozye bana ba-Israyeli kuzwa ku-Egepita, Mbombabo ba-Musa a-Aroni.
Lino mubuzuba obo Jehova naakaambila Musa munyika ya-Egepita,
Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Ndime Jehova. Ambila Farao mwami wa-Egepira zyoonse nzendakwaambila.
Pele Musa wakaambila Jehova kuti, Bona! Mebo ndisikamama. Ino Farao ulandimvwa buti?
Uleelede kwaamba zyoonse nzendakwaambila. Munyoko Aroni ulaambila Farao kuti aleke bana ba-Israyeli, bazwe mucisi cakwe.
Pele njooyumya moyo wa-Farao, aboobo njoovuzya zitondezyo zyangu amalele aangu munyika ya-Egepita.
Farao uyookaka kumumvwa, aboobo njoobika ijanza lyangu ku-Egepita, nkabela njoopozya impi zyangu abantu bangu bana ba-Israyeli kuzwa kunyika ya-Egepita ambeta impati.
Lino baEgepita bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova nenjootandabika ijanza lyangu ku-Egepita akupozya bana ba-Israyeli kuzwa akati kabo.
Mpawo ba-Musa a-Aroni bakacita obo. Bakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakabalailila.
Musa kajisi myaka iili makumi aali musanu aatatu, alakwe Aroni kajisi myaka iili makumi aali musanu aatatu aitatu kuciindi eco nebakaambila Farao.
Lino Jehova wakaambila ba-Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Farao aamwaambila kuti, Amupe citondezyo, uleelede kwaambila Aroni kuti, Bweza musako wako, uuwaale kumeso aa-Farao, elyo uyooba inzoka.
Mpawo ba-Musa a-Aroni bakainka kuli-Farao, bacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila. Aroni wakawaala musako wakwe kumeso aa-Farao akumeso aabalanda bakwe, nkabela wakaba inzoka.
Elyo Farao wakaita basongo abamucapi, nkabela abo basimabibo ba-Egepita abalo bakacita mbubonya kumabibo aabo.
Bakawaala umwi aumwi musako wakwe ansi, elyo yakaba inzoka. Pele musako wa-Aroni wakamena misako yabo yoonse.
Lino moyo wa-Farao wakayuma, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba,
Koya kuli-Farao cifumo aakuya kumaanzi, ukamulindilile kunkomwe yalwizi. Amujanza lyako tola oyo musako iwakasanduka kuba inzoka.
Lino uleelede kumwaambila kuti, Jehova Leza waba-Hebrayo watutuma kulinduwe, wati, Leka bantu bangu, baye, bandimanine milimo munkanda, Pele tona kumvwa alino.
Mbuboobo mbwaamba Jehova. Mbuboobu mbokonzya kuziba kuti ndime Jehova. Bona! Musako oyu uuli mujanza lyangu ndauumya maanzi aali mulwizi, asanduke kuba bulowa.
Azyalo inswi zyoonse zyamulwizi zilafwa, alwizi lulanunka, nkabela ba-Egepita balasesemwa kunywa maanzi aamulwizi.

Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Ambila Aroni kuti, Bweza musako wako, uvungulule ijanza lyako kumaanzi aa-Egepita, kumilonga yabo akulwizi lwabo akumaziba aabo akumikalo yabo yoonse, kuti maanzi abe bulowa. Munyika yoonse ya-Egepita muyooba bulowa muzinywido zyoonse, niziba zinywido zyazisamu niziba zinywido zyamabwe.
Azyalo inswi zyamulwizi zyakafwa, alimwi lwizi lwakanunka. Ba-Egepita bakakacilwa kunywa maanzi aamulwizi. Mucisi coonse buyo ca-Egepita mwakali bulowa.
Pele basimabibo ba-Egepita abalo bakacita mbubonya abo amabibo aabo, aboobo moyo wa-Farao wakayuma, nkabela wakakaka kubaswiilila, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba.
Elyo Farao wakafutamuka, wanjila muŋanda yakwe, katabiki moyo wakwe kumakani aya.
Nkabela ba-Egepita boonse bakali kusya mikalo yakunywa maanzi kumbali alwizi, nkaambo bakakacilwa kunywa maanzi aamulwizi.
Elyo kwakamana mazuba aali musanu aabili, Jehova naakamana kusofwaazya lwizi.
Na wakaka kubaleka, mebo ndauma nyika yako abacaande.
Lwizi lulazula bacaande. Balazwa nkuko, akunjila muŋanda yako, amukaanda kako kakoona, aatala lyabulo bwako oonse, amumaanda aabalanda bako, aakati kabantu bako, amuziko zyako, amuzyaambikwa zyako.
Alinduwe aabantu bako aabalanda bako boonse buyo, bacaande balamusikila.
Elyo Jehova wakaambila ba-Musa a-Aroni kuti, Tandabika ijanza lyako amusako wako atala lyamilonga alwizi amalambwa, kuti kuze bacaande munyika yoonse ya-Egepita.
Mpawo Aroni wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe atala lyamaanzi aa-Egepita, nkabela kwakasika bacaande kuzuzya nyika yoonse ya-Egepita.
Pele basimabibo abalo bakacita mbubonya amabibo aabo akuleta bacaande munyika ya-Egepita,

Lino Musa wakaambila Farao kuti, Mbubo, bulemu abube bwako. Kondaambila na ndeelede kukukumbilila lili, yebo abalanda bako abantu bako, kuti bacaande bamane kuzwa kulinduwe akumaanda aako, basyaale mulwizi amulike.
Wakati, Kube junza. Wakati, Ncibotu, kuyooba mbubonya mbuli majwi aako, kuti uzibe kuti taakwe naba omwe uuelene a-Jehova Leza wesu.
Bacaande balazwa kulinduwe akumaanda aako akubalanda bako akubantu bako, balasyaala mulwizi luzutu.
Mpawo ba-Musa a-Aroni bakazwa kuli-Farao, nkabela Musa wakakwiilila Jehova nkaambo kabacaande mbaakabikilide Farao.
Lino Jehova wakacita mbubonya mbuli mbwaakaamba Musa, nkabela bacaande bakafwa mumaanda amumbuwa amunyuunda.
Elyo bakababungika muzilwi zilwi mane cisi cakanunka.
Pele Farao naakabona kuti wajana buyoyelo, wakayumya moyo wakwe, wakaka kubaswiilila mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Ambila Aroni kuti, Tandabika musako wako, uume bulongo bwaansi, kuti busanduke kuba mansenya mucisi coonse ca-Egepita.

Mpoonya awo Aroni waka cita obo: wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe amusako wakwe, wauma bulongo bwacisi, nkabela bwakasanduka kuba mansenya akati kabantu aakati kabanyama. Bulongo boonse bwacisi bwakaba mansenya mucisi coonse ca-Egepita.
Abalo basimabibo bakasoleka kucita mansenya mubucapi bwabo, pele bakakacilwa, aboobo kwakajanwa mansenya koonse koonse kubantu akubanyama.
Mpawo basimabibo bakaambila Farao kuti, Ngooyu munwe wa-Leza. Pele moyo wa-Farao wakayumisigwa, wakaka kubaswiilila, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba.
Na wakaka kuleka bantu bangu, bona! Ndamutumina, yebo abalanda bako abantu bako amumaanda aako, matanga matanga aamazi. Maanda aabaEgepita alazula mazi, aalo ansi mpobeenda.
Pele mubuzuba obo njooanzaanya cisi ca-Goseni, nkobakede bantu bangu, kuti kutabi mazi oko, kuti muzibe kuti ndime Jehova mukati kanyika.
Njooanzaanya bantu bangu abantu bako. Eci citondezyo ciyooba junza.
Nkabela Jehova wakacita obo. Kwakasika matanga mapati aamazi muŋanda ya-Farao amumaanda aabalanda bakwe. Mucisi coonse ca-Egepita nyika yakanyonyooka nkaambo kamazi.
Mpawo Farao wakaita ba-Musa a-Aroni, wati, Kamuya, mukapaile Leza wanu mumonya omuno munyika.
Pele Musa wakati, Tacicitiki obo pe, nkaambo tulapaizizya Jehova Leza wesu zintu zisesemya ba-Egepira. Na twapaizya zintu zibasesemya kumeso aabo, sa tabakootufusa mabwe?
Tuleelede kutola lweendo lwamazuba otatwe kuya munkanda, kuti tuka-paile Jehova Leza wesu mbubonya mbwaatulailila.
Farao wakati, Mbubo, ndamuleka, kuti mukapaile Jehova Leza wanu munkanda, pele mutainki kule. Amundikumbilile.

Musa wakati, Bona! Ndakusia buyo, ndakumbila kuli-Jehova, kuti junza agwisye matanga aamazi kuzwa kuli-Farao akubalanda bakwe akubantu bakwe. Pele Farao atatweeni limbi kukutaleka bantu kuti bakapaile Jehova.
Mpawo Musa naakazwa kuliFarao, wakakumbila kuli-Jehova.
Nkabela Jehova wakacita mbubonya mbwaakaamba Musa. Wakagwisya matanga aamazi kuzwa kuli-Farao akubalanda bakwe akubantu bakwe. Taakwe neliba lyomwe lyakasyaala.
Nekubaboobo kuciindi eco acalo Farao wakayumya moyo wakwe, taakwe naakaleka bantu kuti baye.
Na wakaka kubaleka, waakucibajisi,
ncobeni ijanza lya-Jehova lilaba aŋombe zyako zili musokwe, ambizi ambongolo ankamele abasune ambelele, nkabela kuyooba bulwazi buyoosya loko.
Pele Jehova ulaanzaanya iŋombe zyaba-Israyeli aŋombe zyaba-Egepita. Takukoofwa cintu neciba comwe akati kambono zyabana ba-Israyeli.
Alimwi Jehova wakabika ciindi, wati, Junza Jehova ulacita cintu eci munyika.
Lino nebwakaca Jehova wakacita obo, nkabela iŋombe zyoonse zyabaEgepita zyakafwa, pele akati kaŋombe zyabana ba-Israyeli taakwe niiba yomwe iyakafwa.
Lino Farao wakatuma, wajana kuti taakwe niiba yomwe akati kaŋombe zyaba-Israyeli iyakafwa. Elyo moyo wa-Farao wakayumisigwa, taakwe naakaleka bantu kuti baye.
Lino Jehova wakaambila ba-Musa a-Aroni kuti, Amubweze inkankamaanza zyatwe lyaciko, kuti Musa akalyuululule kujulu kumeso aa-Farao.
Elyo lilaba lusuko munyika yoonse ya-Egepita, akuba zilonda zitulaula mibili yabantu ayabanyama mucisi coonse ca-Egepita.
Elyo bakabweza itwe lyaciko, baakwiima kubusyu bwa-Farao, nkabela Musa wakalyuululula kujulu, mane lyakaba zilonda zitulaula mibili yabantu ayabanyama boonse.
Abalo basimabibo bakakacilwa kwiima kubusyu bwa-Musa nkaambo kazilonda, nkaambo zilonda zyakalibajisi basimabibo aba-Egepita boonse.
Nekubaboobo Jehova wakayumya moyo wa-Farao, nkabela wakakaka kubaswiilila, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaambila Musa.
Nkaambo ciindi ecino ndaamba kukutumina mapenzi aangu oonse, yebo abalanda bako abantu bako, kuti muzibe kuti taakwe uukozyene ambebo munyika yoonse.
Nkaambo nendakayanda nendakakonzya kutandabika ijanza lyangu akukuumya bulwazi, yebo abantu bako, elyo nowakanyonyooka.
Nekubaboobo nciconya eci ncindakakubusizya, kuti nkakutondezye inguzu zyangu, kukuzibya izina lyangu munyika yoonse.
Ucilisumpwida bantu bangu kukutabaleka kuti baye.
Bona! Junza mbuli eno njoowisya civulamabwe cipati loko, Eco tacina bwenwe mucisi ca-Egepita kuzwa kumatalikilo aaco kusikila sunu.
Lino tuma, ukalete iŋombe zyako azyoonse nzojisi musokwe. Bantu boonse abanyama boonse bajanwa musokwe, na teebaletwa kumaanda, bayoowidwa civulamabwe, aboobo bayoofwa.
Lino kufumbwa muntu akati kabalanda ba-Farao iwakayoowa ijwi lya-Jehova wakayobolola balanda bakwe aŋombe zyakwe kumaanda.
Pele kufumbwa iwatakabika moyo wakwe kujwi lya-Jehova wakasia balanda bakwe aŋombe zyakwe musokwe.
Mpawo Musa wakatandabika musako wakwe kujulu, nkabela Jehova wakapa mizumo acivulamabwe, awalo mulilo wakakalaba ansi. Jehova wakawisya civulamabwe anyika ya-Egepita.
Kwakaboneka civulamabwe, amulilo uuvwelene acivulamabwe, civulamabwe cipati loko, Kacitanabwenwe cili boobu mucisi coonse ca-Egepita kuzwa kuciindi eco nicakaba cisi.

Elyo civulamabwe cakanyonyoona zintu zyoonse zyamunyika ya-Egepita, zyoonse izyakali musokwe, bantu abanyama boonse, amisamu yoonse yamusokwe, zyoonse buyo civulamabwe cakazinyonyoona, amasamu oonse aamusokwe cakaavwinyauna.
Mucisi ca-Goseni luzutu, bana ba-Israyeli mobakakede, kamutakwe civulamabwe.
Amukumbile kuli-Jehova, nkaambo mizumo yavulisya, acivulamabwe. Ndamuleka, kuti mwiinke. Tamukooyookala limbi pe.
Elyo Musa wakamwaambila kuti, Ndazwa buyo mumunzi, ndatandabika maanza aangu cakukomba Jehova, elyo mizumo ilaleka, acalo civulamabwe cilamana, kuti uzibe kuti nyika yoonse njiya-Jehova.
Nekubaboobo yebo abalanda bako, ndizi kuti tamuyoowi Jehova Leza.
(Butonge bwakanyonyooka, alyalo bbaale, nkaambo bbaale lyakalijisi makunka, abwalo butonge kabujisi maluba.
Pele bulotwe teebwakanyonyooka, naaba maila, nkaambo kazitana kumena.)
Elyo Musa wakazwa kuli-Farao, wazwa mumunzi, watandabika maanza aakwe cakukomba Jehova, nkabela mizumo acivulamabwe zyoonse zyakaleka, ayalo imvula yakaleka kuwa ansi.
Pele Farao naakabona kuti imvula yaleka acivulamabwe amizumo, wakapilukila kububi alimwi akuyumya moyo wakwe, walo abalanda bakwe.
Moyo wa-Farao wakayuma. Takwakaleka bana ba-Israyeli kuti baye, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba kumulomo wa-Musa.
mukaluule mumatwi aabana banu amumizukulu yanu makani aayoosya ngendacitila ba-Egepita azitondezyo zyangu nzindakabika akati kabo, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Nkaambo na wakaka kuleka bantu bangu kuti baye, ncobeni junza ndaleta cisozi mucisi cako.
Cisozi ciyoovumba busyu bwanyika, aboobo nyika tiikooyooboneka, alimwi ciyoolya zilyo zyoonse izyakasyaala izyakatanyonyoonwa kucivulamabwe. Ciyoolya masamu aanu oonse aamena mumyuunda.

Maanda aako ayoozula ncico, amaanda aabalanda bako boonse, amaanda aaba-Egepita boonse. Bamausowanu abasyanyokulu boonse tababwene cisozi cili boobu kuzwa kuciindi nebakatalika kuba ansi kusikila kubuzuba obuno. Amane kwaamba obo, wakafutamuka, wazwa kuli-Farao.
Aboobo ba-Musa a-Aroni bakaitwa kuli-Farao, nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya, mukakombe Jehova Leza wanu. Pele mbani basi inke?
Musa wakavuwa kuti, Tulainka abana besu abacembele besu; tulainka abana besu balombe abasimbi, aŋombe zyesu ambelele zyesu, nkaambo tuleelede kucitila Jehova ipobwe.
Wakabaambila kuti, Ma! Jehova abe anywebo. Nsikonzyi kumuleka kuti muye atwana twanu pe, Ncobeni mulayeeya bubi.
Nee! Kamuya nobaalumi, mukakombe Jehova, nkaambo ncencico ncemusukeme. Mpoonya awo bakatandwa kuzwa kubusyu bwa-Farao.
Mpawo Musa wakatandabika musako wakwe atala lyacisi ca-Egepita, nkabela Jehova wakaungya muuwo wakujwe munyika buzuba obo boonse isikati amasiku, Lino nebwakaca, oyo muuwo wakujwe wakaleta cisozi.
Cisozi cakasika mucisi coonse ca-Egepita, akukala munyika yoonse ya-Egepita. Eco cisozi cakayoosya loko. Taakwe nikwakabede cisozi cili boobu, pe, alimwi takukooyooba cimbi cili boobu.

Nkaambo cakavumba nyika yoonse, aboobo nyika yakasizigwa, nkabela cakalya mani oonse aanyika amicelo yoonse yamisamu civulamabwe njicakasia. Teekwakasyaala cintu citete neciba comwe, nemuba mumisamu nemuba mumani aamusokwe, munyika yoonse yaEgepita.
Mpawo Farao wakafwamba kwiita ba-Musa a-Aroni, wati, Ndabisizya Jehova Leza wanu, anywebo ndamubisizya.
Lino amundilekelele bubi bwangu ciindi ecino luzutu, mundikumbilile Jehova Leza wanu kuti andigwisizye lufu olu,
Elyo wakazwa kuli-Farao, waakukumbila kuli-Jehova.
Nkabela Jehova wakabusya luuwo luungisya lwakumbo ilwakapepulula cisozi akuciwaala mu-Lwizi Lusalala, Teekwakasyaala cisozi ne ciba comwe mucisi coonse ca-Egepita.
Pele Jehova wakayumya moyo wa-Farao, aboobo takwakaleka bana ba-Israyeli kuti baye,
Aboobo Musa wakatondeka ijanza lyakwe kujulu, nkabela kwakaba mudima uusia mbi munyika yoonse ya-Egepita mazuba otatwe.
Teebakali kubonana umwi aumwi amweenzinyina, alimwi teebakabuka umwi aumwi mpaakabede mazuba otatwe, Pele bana boonse ba-Israyeli kabajisi mumuni mumakalilo aabo.
Mpawo Farao wakaita Musa, wati, Kamuya, mukakombe Jehova. Imbelele zyanu aŋombe zyanu zilike zisyaale. Bacece banu abalo kamuya aabo.
Pele Musa wakavuwa kuti, Uleelede kupa mumaanza esu zipaizyo azituuzyo, tuzibambile Jehova Leza wesu.
Azyalo iŋombe zyesu tuleelede kuya azyo; takukooyoosyaala insumba niiba yomwe, nkaambo mulinzizyo motweelede kugwisya zyakupaizya Leza wesu, Tatuzi ncitweelede kupaizya Jehova mane tukasike oko.
Pele Jehova wakayumya moyo wa-Farao, aboobo wakakaka kuleka bantu kuti baye.
Mpawo Farao wakamwaambila kuti, Zwa kulindime. Cenjela kuti utaboni busyu bwangu limbi, nkaambo mubuzuba obo mboyoobona busyu bwangu uyoofwa.
Musa wakati, Waamba kabotu. Nsikooyoobona busyu bwako limbi.
Lino amba mumatwi aabantu kuti bakumbile, mwaalumi umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina, amwanakazi umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina, zintu zyansiliva azintu zyangolida.
Nkabela Jehova wakapa bantu luzyalo mumeso aaba-Egepita. Alakwe oyo muntu Musa kali mulemu loko munyika ya-Egepita mumeso aabalanda ba-Farao amumeso aabantu.

nkabela bana bataanzi boonse bamucisi ca-Egepita balafwa, kuzwa kumwana mutaanzi wa-Farao uukede acuuno cabwami kusikila kumwana mutaanzi wamwanakazi muzike sikuziya, abalo bana bataanzi boonse baŋombe.
Kuyooba kulila kupati munyika yoonse ya-Egepita kutanabwenwe, alimwi takukooyooba limbi.
Pele bana ba-Israyeli, takukooyooba naba mubwa uubavulumina, naba muntu naba munyama, mukazibe kuti Jehova waanzaanya ba-Egepita aba-Israyeli.
Aba balanda bako boonse bayooza kukundikotamina, cakuti, Zwa, yebo abantu boonse bakutobela, Kusule lyayaaya njoozwa. Mpawo wakazwa kuli-Farao kafundilide bukali.
Elyo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Farao takooyooswiilila pe, kuti maleele aangu avule munyika yaEgepita.
Mwezi uno uyoomubeda mwezi mutaanzi; uyooba mwezi mutaanzi wamwaka kulindinywe.
Ambila imbungano yoonse ya-Israyeli kuti, mubuzuba bwakumi bwamwezi uno baleelede kubweza umwi aumwi kabelele mbuli ziinga zyabamawisaabo, ciinga cimwi acimwi cibe akabelele komwe.
Na ciinga caceya kukuba akabelele, ciswanaane aciinga ncecibambene aco, mweelwe wabantu mbuubede. Amubale bantu mbubalya, mubone na kabelele kalazulila?
Kabelele kanu kaleelede kuba kagutu kamwaka omwe katakwe kampenda; amukagwisye kumbelele na kumpongo,
mukakayobole mane kusikila kubuzuba bwakumi aane bwamwezi uno, Lino bantu boonse bambungano ya-Israyeli baleelede kujaya, umwi aumwi kabelele kakwe ciindi calundindiwana.
Lino baleelede kukombola bulowa akububika kuminsende yoonse yobile akucikunguzyo kumaanda nkobayoolida.
Baleelede kulya nyama masiku ayo ngaonya iiyokedwe. Bailye antoomwe azinkwa zitakwe bumena azisyu zilula.
Mutailyi abuniini imbisi na iijikidwe amaanzi; amulye iiyokedwe mumulilo, mutwe amyeendo azyamukati zyoonse buyo.
Alimwi mutasii imbutikwa pe, Na kwasyaala imbutikwa, ileelede kutentwa mumulilo.
Alimwi mbuboobu mbumweelede kwiilya, Amulye kamulyaangide muzikungu, ansangu kumaulu aanu, amisako mumaanza aanu. Amulye cakubindaana; ngupasika wa-Jehova.
Nkaambo masiku ayo ngaonya njooinda akati kanyika ya-Egepita, akujaya bana bataanzi boonse bacisi ca-Egepita, nebaba bantu nebaba banyama, abaleza boonse ba-Egepita njoobabeteka. Ndime Jehova.
Nkabela bulowa buyoomubeda citondezyo mumaanda momubede. Ndabona buyo bulowa, ndaindilila, aboobo tamukooyoosikilwa luumo lwakumunyonyoona ciindi eco ncensi ume nyika ya-Egepita,

Mazuba aali musanu aabili muleelede kulya zinkwa zitakwe bumena, Mubuzuba butaanzi muleelede kugwisya bumena boonse bwamumaanda aanu, Kufumbwa muntu uulya bumena, kuzwa kubuzuba butaanzi kusikila kubuzuba bwamusanu aabili, oyo muntu ulanyanzigwa bu-Israyeli.

Mubuzuba buta an zi kuleelede kuba ambungano iisalalisya, alimwi mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili kuleelede kuba imbungano iisalalisya, Takukooyoocitwa milimo niiba imwi mumazuba ayo, cita kubamba zilyo muntu nzyeelede kulya.

Lino muleelede kujatisya eci ciyanza cazinkwa zitakwe bumena, nkaambo mubuzuba obu mbubonya ndakagwisya makamu aanu munyika ya-Egepita, aboobo muleelede kubamba buzuba obuno mumazyalani aanu oonse, bube ipobwe lyalyoonse.
Mumwezi mutaanzi, mubuzuba bwakumi aane bwamwezi, ciindi cagoko, munoolya zinkwa zitakwe bumena, mane kusikila kubuzuba bwamakumi obile abumwi, ciindi cagoko.
Mazuba aali musanu aabili takweelede kujanwa bumena mumaanda aanu. Nkaambo kufumbwa muntu uulya bumena, oyo muntu uyootandwa kuzwa kumbungano ya-Israyeli, naba mweenzu naba muzyalwe mucisi.
Tamukooyoolya zilyo neziba zimwi zili abumena. Mumaanda aanu oonse muleelede kulya zinkwa zitakwe bumena.
Alimwi amubweze cisankanya cahisopo, akucinika mubulowa bwamumutiba, mukazile cikunguzyo aminsende yobile abulowa bwamumutiba, Lino kutabi naba omwe akati kanu uuzwa muŋanda yakwe mane bukace.
Jehova ulainda kuti aume ba-Egepita, Abona bulowa bwakucikunguzyo abwakuminsende yobile, Jehova ulaindilila amulyango oyo, takooyoozumizya sikujaya kuti anjile mumaanda aanu kukumuuma.
Eci ciyanza muleelede kucijatisya, nywebo abana banu, cibe mulao walyoonse.
Lino mwaakusika kunyika eyo Jehova njayoomupa, mbubonya mbwaakasyomezya, muleelede kujatisya milimo eyi.
Nkabela bana banu nebayoomubuzya kuti, Ino milimo eyi ilaambanzi?

muleelede kuvuwa kuti, Ncecipaizyo ca-Pasika ca-Jehova, nkaambo wakaindilila maanda aabana ba-Israyeli bamu-Egepita ciindi eciya naakajaya ba-Egepita; wakavuna maanda esu. Elyo bantu bakakotama, bakomba.
Nkabela bana baIsrayeli bakaakucita obo mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila ba-Musa a-Aroni. Mbubonya obo mbubakacita.
Mpawo Farao wakabuka masiku, walo abalanda bakwe boonse aba-Egepita boonse, nkabela kwakaba kulila kupati mu-Egepita, nkaambo katakwe iŋanda niiba yomwe iyatakajisi mufu.
Nkabela wakaita ba-Musa a-Aroni masiku, wati, Amunyampuke, muzwe akati kabantu bangu, nywebo abana ba-Israyeli boonse. Kamuya, mukakombe Jehova, mbubonya mbumwaamba.
Azyalo imbelele zyanu aŋombe zyanu, kamuya azyo, mbubonya mbumwakaamba, mwiinke. Ambebo amundikombele.
Aboobo bantu bakabweza mimpelela yabo kaitana kufu ta, azijikilo zyabo zyakaangwa azisani zyabo amakuko aabo.
Alimwi bana ba-Israyeli bakacita mbubonya mbuli Musa mbwaakabaambila. Bakakumbila kuba-Egepita zibelesyo zyansiliva azibelesyo zyangolida azyakusama.
Nkabela Jehova wakapesya bantu luse mumeso aaba-Egepita. Bakabapa nzebakakumbila, aboobo ba-Egepita bakasaalwa.
Amakamu amwi aabantu bamisyobo misyobo akali abo, ambelele aŋombe, matanga manji loko.

Nkabela bakajika mimpelela yabo njebakaletelela kuzwa ku-Egepita, bacita zibunge zitakwe bumena, nkaambo teezyakasasa, nkaambo nebakatandwa kuzwa ku-Egepita, bakabula ciindi cakulindila-lindila acakulibambila bulilu.
Neyakamana myaka iili myanda yone amakumi otatwe, mubuzuba obo mbubonya makamu oonse aa-Jehova akazwa mucisi ca-Egepita.
Kali masiku aakulindila Jehova, kuti abapozye kuzwa kunyika ya-Egepita, aboobo masiku ayo ngaonya aba masiku aakuli­ ndila Jehova kubana boonse ba-Israyeli mumazyalani aabo oonse.
Pele muzike uulidwe amali ulakonzya kulya, amana kupalulwa.
Mweenzu na mubelesi teelede kulya pe,
Ipobwe lileelede kuligwa muŋanda yomwe. Nyama yalyo tiielede kugwisigwa anze. Alimwi kutatyolwi cifuwa cayo neciba comwe.
Imbungano yoonse ya-Israyeli ilacita obo.

Na kuli mweenzu uukala-kala kulinduwe, alimwi ulayanda kulya Pasika wa-Jehova, baalumi bakwe boonse bataangune kupalulwa. Bamane kupalulwa, baswene afwaafwi kukulya, abe mbubonya mbuli muzyalwe mucisi. Pele uutapalwidwe atalyi pe.
Kulaba mulao omwe buyo kumuzyalwe mucisi akumweenzu uuswayaswaya akati kanu.
Lino bana ba-Israyeli boonse bakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila ba-Musa a-Aroni.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo mbubonya Jehova wakapozya bana ba-Israyeli kuzwa kunyika ya-Egepita ankamu zyabo.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Undisalazizye mwana umwi aumwi mutaanzi uujalula mulyango wazyalilo akati kabana ba-Israyeli, naba muntu naba munyama. Boonse buyo babe bangu.
Buzuba obuno bwamumwezi wa-Abibi mwazwa.

Lino Jehova naayoomusisya kunyika yaba-Kanana ayaba-Hiti ayaba-Amori ayabaHivi ayaba-Jebusi, nyika njindakasyomezya kulibamauso kumupa, nyika iikunka malili abuci, muleelede kubamba milimo eyi mumwezi uno.
Mazuba aali musanu aabili muleelede kulya zinkwa zitakwe bumena, lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili kuyooba ipobwe lya-Jehova.
Zinkwa zitakwe bumena nzezyeelede kuligwa mazuba aali musanu aabili; takweelede kubonwa zinkwa zili abumena akati kanu; takweelede kubonwa bumena mucisi canu coonse.
Elyo mubuzuba obo uleelede kupandulwida mwana wako kuti, Nkaambo kaceeco Jehova ncaakandicitila nendakazwa ku-Egepita.
Ciyoomubeda mbuli citondezyo cakujanza lyako na mbuli ciibalusyo akati kameso aako, kuti mulao wa-Jehova ube mukanwa lyako, nkaambo Jehova wakamupozya kuzwa ku-Egepita ajanza ijumu.
Nkaambo kako uleelede kubamba ciyanza eci kuciindi ceelede myaka yoonse.
uleelede kulondweda Jehova kufumbwa uujalula izyalilo. Boonse bataanzi kuzyalwa baŋombe zyako, nkokuti bapoho, bayooba ba-Jehova.
Amutaanzi umwi aumwi wambongolo uleelede kumununuzya kabelele; watamununuzya uleelede kutyola insingo yakwe. Abalo bataanzi babana bako balombe uleelede kubanununa.
Lino kuciindi ciboola, mwanaako aakubuzya kuti, Nkutyeni eci? uleelede kumwaambila kuti, Kunguzu zyajanza lyakwe Jehova wakatupozya kuzwa ku-Egepita kuŋanda yabuzike.

Nkaambo Farao naakaliyumya kukutukasya kuya, Jehova wakajaya bana bataanzi boonse bamucisi ca-Egepita, bana bataanzi babantu abana bataanzi baŋombe. Nkaambo kako ndapaizizya Jehova boonse baalumi bajalula izyalilo, pele boonse bataanzi akati kabana bangu ndabanununa.
Eci ciyanza cibe mbuli citondezyo cakujanza lyako na mbuli ciibalusyo akati kameso aako, nkaambo kunguzu zyajanza lyakwe Jehova wakatupozya kuzwa ku-Egepita.
Leza wakeenzya bantu munzila iizyunguluka kunkanda ku-Lwizi Lusalala, Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakazwa kunyika ya-Egepita balilibambide kunkondo.
Alimwi Musa wakatolelela zifuwa zya-Josefa, nkaambo Josefa wakakonkezya loko bana ba-Israyeli, wati, Ncobeni Leza uyoomuswaya; lino muleelede kutolelela zifuwa zyangu kuzwa okuno.
Elyo bakalonga kuzwa ku-Sukoti, baakukala-kala ku-Etamu kumagolelo nankanda.
Nkabela Jehova wakali kubazulwida isikati amusumpululu wajoba kuti abatondezye inzila, amasiku amusumpululu wamulilo kuti abamunikile, kuti kabeenda amasiku asikati.
Taakwe naakabanyanzya musumpululu wajoba wasikati nuuba musumpululu wamulilo wamasiku.
Mpoonya awo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana baIsrayeli kuti bapiluke, bayake zilao zyabo kunembo lya-Pihahiroti, akatikati ka-Migidoli alwizi kunembo lya-Baala-Zefoni. Amuyake zilao zyanu nkukonya oko kumbali lyalwizi.
Nkaambo Farao ulaamba aabana ba-Israyeli kuti, Balipatide munyika eyo; inkanda yabajalila.
Lino ndayumya moyo wa-Farao, nkabela ulabatobela; lino njoojana bulemu kuli-Farao akumpi yakwe yoonse, nkabela ba-Egepita bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova. Elyo bakacita obo.
Lino mwami wa-Egepita naakalwiidwa kuti bantu baloboka, moyo wa-Farao abalanda bakwe wakasandukila bantu. Bakati, Ma! Twacitanzi? Twalekelanzi ba-Israyeli kuti batanoocitumanina milimo?
Mpawo wakabopa inkalaki yakwe, abalo bantu bakwe wakabatolelela.
Wakatola inkalaki zisalidwe zili myanda iili musanu aumwi, ankalaki zyoonse zyaku-Egepita, abasilutwe bazyo boonse.
Jehova wakayumya moyo wa-Farao mwami wa-Egepita, aboobo wakatobela bana ba-Israyeli, nkaambo ba-Israyeli bakali kuya ajanza ijumu.
Ba-Egepita bakabatobela, imbizi zyoonse zya-Farao ankalaki zyakwe abasimbizi bampi yakwe, babeenzya kulwizi nkubakayakide zilao, ku-Pihahiroti kunembo lya-Baala-Zefoni.
Nkabela bakaambila Musa kuti, Sa taakwe tubanda ku-Egepita? Watuletelanzi okuno kuti tufwe munkanda? Watugwisizyanzi ku-Egepita?
Sa teensi ngemakani aya ngaonya ngetwakakwaambila ku-Egepita? Sa teetwakaamba kuti, Tuleke, tubelekele baEgepita? Nkaambo kubelekela ba-Egepita nkubotu kulindiswe kwiinda kufwa munkanda.
Pele Musa wakaambila bantu kuti, Mutayoowi, amwiime, mubone lufutuko Jehova ndwasi mucitile buzuba obuno, Aba ba-Egepita mbomubwene sunu tamukooyoobabona limbi.
Jehova ulamulwida. Nywebo amuumune buyo.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Ulandikwiililanzi? Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti baye kunembo.
Ayebo, sumpula musako wako, utandabike ijanza lyako atala alwizi, ulwaandule, kuti bana ba-Israyeli bainde anyika injumu akati kalwizi.
Lino mebo ndayumya myoyo yaba-Egepita, kuti babatobele, aboobo njoojana bulemu kuli-Farao akumpi yakwe yoonse, kunkalaki zyakwe akulibasimbizi bakwe,
Nkabela ba-Egepita bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova nenjoolemekwa kuli-Farao akunkalaki zyakwe akuli basimbizi bakwe.
weza akatikati lyamakamu aaba-Egepita amakamu aaba-Israyeli, nkabela kali ijoba amudima. Lino masiku akamana, nkabela masiku oonse inkamu ezi zyobile tazikwe nezyakaswanaana.
Lino bana ba-Israyeli bakainda akati kalwizi anyika injumu, amaanzi akababeda mbuli bulambo kululyo akucimwensi.
Mpawo ba-Egepita bakabatobela, imbizi zyoonse zya-Farao ankalaki zyakwe abasimbizi bakwe, banjila mukati kalwizi.
Lino kubucedo Jehova wakalanga makamu aaba-Egepita kuzwa kumusumpululu wajoba awamulilo, wapilinganya makamu oonse aabaEgepita.
Nkabela wakaangatizya mavwili aankalaki zyabo, wazyeenzya cakusililika. Lino ba-Egepita bakaamba kuti, Atucije ba-Israyeli, nkaambo Jehova nguubalwida kuba-Egepita.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Tandabika ijanza lyako atala alwizi, kuti maanzi aboole aba-Egepita, ankalaki zyabo abasimbizi babo.

Elyo Musa wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe atala alwizi, nkabela izuba nelyakapasula, maanzi aalwizi akaswanaana mbuli mbwaakabede lyoonse, aboobo ba-Egepita mukucija kwabo bakanjila mulindulo, nkabela Jehova wakabatapwida mulwizi.
Maanzi akapi luka, avumba inkalaki abasimbizi ampi yoonse ya-Farao, iyakabatobede mulwizi. Teekwakasyaala naba omwe,
Pele bana ba-Israyeli bakeenda anyika injumu akati kalwizi, amaanzi akababeda bulambo kululyo akulumwensi.
Mbuboobu Jehova mbwaakafutula ba-Israyeli buzuba obo kuzwa kumaanza aaba-Egepita, Ba-Israyeli bakabona ba-Egepita bafwide ankomwe yalwizi.
Elyo ba-Israyeli nebakabona milimo mipati Jehova njaakacitila ba-Egepita, bantu bakayoowa Jehova akusyoma Jehova amulanda wakwe Musa.
Ndaimbila Jehova, nkaambo ulisumpukide loko;
Imbizi asikwiitanta wabawaala boonse mulwizi.
Waba lufutuko lwangu.
Ngonguwe Leza wangu, ndamutembaula:
Ngu-Leza wabamatata, ndamulemeka.
Jehova ndizina lyakwe,
Inkalaki zya-Farao ampi yakwe, zyoonse waziwaala mulwizi;
Abasilutwe bakwe basalidwe bainkila mumaanzi aamu-Lwizi Lusalala.
Impwampwa yabamena,
Babbila mumaanzi malamfu mbuli ibbwe.
Ijanza lyako ndendilyo, O Jehova, ndelityolaula basinkondonyoko.
Ula tuma bukali bwako, lino bulabatenta mbuli zisiko.
Lwizi lwakaima mbuli mulwi,
Impwampwa yakaandwa akati kalwizi.
Nkajane cisaalo, moyo wangu ukakute kulimbabo.
Nsomone ipanga lyangu, ijanza lyangu libanyonyoone.
Elyo wakaungya muuwo wako, alwizi lwakabamena,
Bakabbila mbuli ibbwe mumaanzi malamfu,
Nguni uuli mbuli nduwe, mulemu kukusalala,
Uuyoosya mumilimo, uucita maleele?
Wakatandabika ijanza lyako lyalulyo,
Elyo nyika yakabamena,
Munguzu zyako wabasisya kucikalilo cako cisalala,
Bantu bakede mu-Filisitiya bajatwa macise,
Abalo bapati ba-Moabu kukankama kwabajaya,
Abantu boonse ba-Kanana balebuluka.
Nkaambo kunguzu zyajanza lyako batontola mbuli ibbwe,
Mane bantu bako bakaindilile, O Jehova,
Mane bakaindilile bantu mbowakanununa.
Busena mbobambide kuti bube cikalilo cako,
Cikombelo, O Mwami, maanza aako ncaakacita.
Jehova ngunooendelezya lyoonse alyoonse.
Nkaambo imbizi zya-Farao, ankalaki zyakwe abasimbizi bakwe, nizyakanjila mulwizi, Jehova wakaboozya maanzi aalwizi alimbabo, pele bana ba-Israyeli bakeenda anyika injumu akati kalwizi.
Mpoonya awo Miriamu musinsimi, mucizi wa-Aroni, wakabweza insaka mujanza lyakwe, abanakazi boonse bakamutobela ansaka akuzyana.
Nkabela Miriamu wakabatungila cakwaamba kuti,
Amwiimbile Jehova, nkaambo ulisumpukide loko,
Imbizi asikwiitanta waba wa ala boonse mulwizi,
Elyo Musa wakasungula ba-Israyeli kuzwa ku-Lwizi Lusalala, nkabela bakaya kunkanda ya-Suri, Lino bakeenda mazuba otatwe mu nkanda kabatajene maanzi,
Basike buyo ku-Mata, bakakacilwa kunywa maanzi aaku-Mara, nkaambo akalula. Nciceeco oko kuntu ncikwakaulikilwa kuti ngu-Mara.
Elyo bantu bakatongaukila Musa cakwaamba kuti, Ino tunywe nzi?
Lino wakakwiilila Jehova, nkabela Jehova wakamutondezya musamu. Auwaale mumaanzi musamu, maanzi akabota. Lino nkukonya oko bakabikilwa mulao amulazyo. Wakabasunka,

wati, Ncobeni na ulaswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wako, akucita milimo iiluleme mumeso aakwe akuswiilila milazyo yakwe, akubamba imbeta zyakwe, nsikooyookuletela malwazi ayo ngendakabikila ba-Egepita, Nkaambo ndime Jehova uukuponya.
Lino imbungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli yakatongaukila Musa a-Aroni oko kunkanda.

Bana ba-Israyeli bakabaambila kuti, Necakabota netwakafwa kujanza lya-Jehova kunyika ya-Egepita, netwakali kukala kumbali lyazijikilo zyanyama akulya insima cakukuta, nkaambo watusisya okuno kunkanda kuti ujazye imbungano yoonse inzala.
Nkabela mubuzuba bwamusanu abumwi, babambe ncibaleta; cilainda kuli ncibabweza mazuba amwi, cilaba camazuba obile.
Elyo ba-Musa a-Aroni bakaambila bantu boonse ba-Israyeli kuti, Igoko muyooziba kuti Jehova nguwakamupozya kuzwa kunyika ya-Egepita,
alimwi cifumofumo muyoobona bulemu bwa-Jehova, nkaambo wamvwa kutongauka kwanu nkomumutongaukila Jehova, Swebo tuli anzi nemututongaukila?

Musa wakati, Jehova ulamupa nyama yakulya kuciindi cagoko, akumukutya insima cifumo, nkaambo Jehova wamvwa kutongauka kwanu nkomututongaukila. Aswebo tuli anzi? Teensi ndiswe mbemutongaukila pe, ngu-Jehova,
Lino Musa wakaambila Aroni kuti, Ambila imbungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli kuti, Amuswene afwiifwi kuli-Jehova, nkaambo wamvwa kutongauka kwanu.
Nkabela Aroni naakali kwaambila imbungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli, bakalanga kunkanda, babona bulemu bwa-Jehova bwaboneka mujoba.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa,
wati, Ndamvwa kutongauka kwabana ba-Israyeli, Kobaambila kuti, Ciindi calundindiwana muyoolya nyama, alimwi cifumo muyookuta insima, muzibe kuti ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Elyo mume nowakakunkumuka, kwakaboneka ansi, awo ankanda, tuntu tuniini-niini mbuli caandwa cituba.
Bana ba-Israyeli batubone buyo, bakabuzyanya kuti, Ino ntuntunzi otu? Nkaambo kabatezi na ninzi. Nkabela Musa wakavuwa kuti, Ncecilyo Jehova ncamupa kuti mulye.
Lino mbuboobu Leza mbwaalailila. Amucibweze, umwi aumwi mbwakonzya kulya. Umwi aumwi abwezele bantu bamuŋanda yakwe, ceelelo caomeri comwe kumuntu umwi aumwi.
Elyo bana ba-Israyeli bakacita obo. Bamwi bakabweza tunji, bamwi bakabweza tuniini,
pele nebakapima aceelesyo, oyo iwakabwezede tunji katajisi twiindilila, ayooyo iwakabwezede tuniini taakwe ncaakabulila. Bakabweza umwi aumwi mbuli kulya kwakwe.
Mpawo Musa wakabaambila kuti, Kutabi muntu uusi sie kusikila cifumo.
Neku-baboobo teebakabika myoyo yabo kumajwi aa-Musa. Bantu bamwi bakasia twacifumo, Lino twakaba amvunyu, twanunka, Nkabela Musa wakabakalalila.
Mazuba oonse bakali kubweza-bweza cifumo, umwi aumwi mbuli kulya kwakwe. Pele izuba nelyakakasaazya, twakeenzunuka.
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu abumwi bakabweza zipanzi zyobile, nkokuti zyeelelo zyobile kumuntu umwi aumwi. Nkabela basilutwe bambungano nebakasika kuzoolwiida Musa,

wakabaambila kuti, Ncencico Jehova ncaakalailila. Junza mbobuzuba bwakulyokezya, buzuba busalalisya bwa-Sabata bwa-Jehova, Kufumbwa ncemuyanda kuyoka, amuciyoke; kufumbwa ncimuyanda kujika amucijike; lino cisyeede amucibambe, cibe cacifumo.
Elyo bakacibamba, mbubonya mbuli Musa mbwaakaamba. Teecakabija nekuba kuba amvunyu, pe.
Lino Musa wakati, Amucilye sunu, nkaambo sunu mbobuzuba bwa-Sabata bwa-Jehova, Sunu tamukooyoocijana musokwe pe.
Mazuba aali musanu abumwi munoobweza, pele buzuba bwamusanu aabili mbobuzuba bwa-Sabata, Tamukoonoojana mubuzuba obo pe.
Lino nebwakaca buzuba bwamusanu aabili, bamwi bantu bakainka kuti babweze, pele teebakajana pe.
Mpoonya awo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Ino mulaleka lili kukaka ku bamba milao yangu ambeta zyangu?

Amubone! Jehova wamupa buzuba bwa-Sabata. Nkaambo kako mubuzuba bwamusanu aumwi ulamupa zilyo zyamazuba obile. Muntu umwi aumwi akale mpoonya awo mpabede. Kutabi muntu uuzwa kubukalo bwakwe mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili.
Aboobo bantu bakalyokezya mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili.
Elyo Musa wakati, Mbuboobu Jehova mbwa-lailila. Zuzya ceelekelo, cibambilwe mazyalani aanu aaciza, kuti babone cilyo ncendakamusanizya munkanda nendakamupozya munyika ya-Egepita.
Nkabela Musa wakaambila Aroni kuti, Bweza cilongo, ucizuzye ceelekelo comwe ca-Mana, ucibike kunembo lya-Jehova, cibambilwe mazyalani aanu aaciza.
Lino mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa, Aroni wakacibika kunembo lyabbokesi lyacizuminino, cilondolwe.
Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakali kulya Mana myaka iili makumi one, mane bakasika kunyika iili abantu, Bakali kulya mana mane bakasika kumugaano wacisi ca-Kanana.
(Ceelelo caomeri ncecipanzi cakumi caefa.)
Mpoonya awo bantu bakatalika kwaambana a-Musa, bati, Kotupa maanzi aakunywa. Nkabela Musa wakababuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi mwaambwida ndime? Nkaambonzi nomusunka Jehova?
Pele bantu bakakolwa nyota, aboobo bantu bakatongaukila Musa, bati, Wakatugwisizyanzi mu-Egepita, kuti utujazye nyota, swebo abana besu aŋombe zyesu?
Mpawo Musa wakakwiilila Jehova, wati, Mbacitilenzi aba bantu? Baamba kundifusa mabwe,
Elyo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Inda kunembo lyabantu, utolelele bamwi babapati ba-Israyeli. Awalo musako wako ngowakaumya lwizi uutole mujanza lyako, uende.
Bona! Ndaima kubusyu bwako agale oko ku-Horebi, lino ukaume igale; mulindilyo maanzi alazwa, abantu balanywa, Elyo Musa wakacita mbubonya obo kumeso aabapati ba-Israyeli.
Nkabela oko kuntu wakakuulika izina lyaMasa, a-Meriba, nkaambo kakwaambana kwabana ba-Israyeli, akaambo kakuti bakasunka Jehova cakwaamba kuti, Sa Jehova mpali akati kesu na pe.
Nkabela Musa wakaambila Joshua kuti, Kotusalila bantu, uinke, ukalwanye ba-Amaleki. Junza njooima atala lyacilundu, amusako wa-Leza mujanza lyangu.
Elyo Joshua wakacita mbubonya mbwaakamulailila Musa, waakulwisya ba-Amaleki, Nkabela ba-Musa a-Aroni a-Huri bakatanta atala lyacilundu.
Lino kufumbwa ciindi Musa naakasumpula ijanza lyakwe, ba-Israyeli bakali kuzunda, pele kufumbwa ciindi naakaleka kusumpula ijanza lyakwe, ba-Amaleki bakali kuzunda.

Pele maanza aa-Musa akalema; nkaambo kako bakabweza ibbwe, balibika munsi lyakwe, wakala mpawo, nkabela ba-Aroni a-Huri bakatabilila maanza aakwe, umwi kulubazu oko aumwi kulubazu oko, aboobo maanza aakwe akaliimvwi nji mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Lino Joshua wakawisya Amaleki abantu bakwe kupanga.
Elyo Musa wakayaka cipaililo, wacuulika izina lya-Jehova-nisi,
nkaambo wakati, Jehova wakonkezya kuti ulaba sinkondonyina Amaleki mumazyalani oonse.
Lino jetero mupaizi waku-Midyani, syanyinazyala Musa, wakamvwa makani oonse Leza nga aka citila Musa aba-Israyeli bantu bakwe, Wakamvwa makani aa-Jehova mbwaakapozya ba-Israyeli kuzwa ku-Egepita.
Mpawo jetero syanyinazyala Musa wakatolelela Zipora, mwanakazi wa-Musa, Musa naakamupilusizye,
abana bakwe bobile, Izine lyamwana umwi kali Gerisomu (nkaambo wakati, Ndakali mweenzu mucisi cabantu),
azina lyawabili kali Eliezere (nkaambo wakati, Leza wataata nguwakandigwasya, wakandivuna kupanga lya-Farao).
Elyo Jetero syanyinazyala Musa abana bakwe amwanakazi wakwe bakasika kuli-Musa, kunkanda nkwaakakede kucilundu ca-Leza.
Lino wakatumina Musa mulazyo wakuti, Mebo nde-Jetero syanyokozyala ndeza kulinduwe, ndeza abanako abana bako bobile.
Amvwe obo Musa wakainka kuyoobaswana syanyinazyala, wamukotamina, wamumyonta, Lino bakajuzyanya, banjila mutente.
Nkabela Musa wakaambila syanyinazyala zintu zyoonse Jehova nzyaakacitila Farao aba-Egepita kukugwasya ba-Israyeli, amapenzi oonse ngebakajana munzila, a-Jehova mbwaakabavuna.
Elyo Jetero wakakondwa kumvwa milimo mibotu yoonse Jehova njaakacitila ba-Israyeli kukubavuna kumaanza aaba-Egepita.
Lino jetero wakati, Alumbwe Jehova iwakamuvuna kumaanza aabaEgepita akumaanza aa-Farao.
Lino ndazibisya kuti Jehova mupati kwiinda baleza boonse, nkaambo wakavuna bantu bakwe kumaanza aabaEgepita nebakabacitila cakulisumpula.
Elyo Jetero syanyinazyala Musa wakatolela Leza cipaizyo azituuzyo, nkabela ba-Aroni abapati boonse baIsrayeli bakeza kuzoolya insima asyanyinazyala Musa kunembo lya-Leza,
Nebwakaca, Musa wakabika lubeta kuti abeteke bantu. Nkabela bantu bakaliimvwi kunembo lya-Musa kuzwa cifumofumo kusikila igoko.

Lino syanyinazyala Musa naakabona coonse ncaakacitila bantu, wakati, Ino ncinzi eci ncocitila bantu? Wacitilanzi lubeta olike? Nkaambonzi bantu baliimvwi kunembo lyako kuzwa cifumofumo kusikila igoko?
Nkabela Musa wakaambila syanyinazyala kuti, Nkaambo bantu baleza kulindime kuzoobuzya Leza.
Na balijisi makani baleza kulindime. Ndime embeteka makani aamuntu umwi aumwi amweenzinyina. Alimwi ndime embazibya imbeta zya-Leza amilao yakwe,
Pele syanyinazyala Musa wakamwaambila kuti, Eci ncocita tacili cibotu.
Ncobeni ulalijaya, yebo abantu mboli abo, nkaambo makani akulemena; tokonzyi kwaacita olike pe.
Swiilila ijwi lyangu, Ndakulaya. Lino Leza uyooba ayebo, Yebo kobeda bantu mbuli Leza, utole makani aabo kuli-Leza.
Nduwe oelede kubaiisya imbeta amilao akubazibya inzila njibeelede kweenda anzebeelede kucita.

Lino langaula akati kabantu, ujane bantu bacenjede bayoowa Leza, bantu basyomeka basulide masinkamulomo, ubabike babe basilutwe bazyuulu abasilutwe bamyanda abasilutwe bamakumi osanwe abasilutwe bamakumi.
Lino aba bantu bayoobeteka bantu ciindi coonse, Makani aakataazya bayooaleta kulinduwe, pele makani maniini buyo bayooakosola beni, Kucita obo kuyookuubila, nkaambo bayookugwasya kunyampula mikuli.
Na wacita obo, a-Leza wazumina, ulakonyza kwiima nji, lino aba bantu boonse bayoosika kubusena bwabo aluumuno,
Mpawo Musa wakaswiilila ijwi lyasyanyinazyala, wa cita mbubonya mbwaakaamba.
Musa wakasala bantu bacenjede akati kaba-Israyeli boonse, wababika kuti babe basilutwe babantu, Bamwi bakali basilutwe bazyuulu, bamwi bamyanda, bamwi bamakumi osanwe, abamwi bamakumi.
Bakali kubeteka bantu ciindi coonse. Makani aakataazya bakaaleta kuliMusa pele makani maniini bakaabeteka beni.
Lumwi Musa wakaleka syanyinazyala kuti ainke, nkabela wakaya kulinguwe.
Mumwezi watatu, bana ba-Israyeli kabazwide munyika ya-Egepita, mubuzuba obo mbubonya bakasika kunkanda ya-Sinai.
Elyo nebakazwa ku-Refidimu bakasika kunkanda ya-Sinai, akuyaka zilao zyabo oko kunkanda. Nkabela bantu bakakala-kala kunembo lyacilundu.
Lino Musa wakatanta nkwaakabede Leza, Jehova wakamwiita kuzwa kucilundu, wati, Mbuboobu mboelede kwaambila luzubo lwa-Jakobo akulwiida luzubo lwa-Israyeli.
Mulibwene ncindakacitila ba-Egepita, ambundakamunyampula amababa aamusika akumuleta kulindime.
Lino ncobeni, na mwazumina kuswiilila ijwi lyangu akubamba cizuminano cangu, muyeeyandika mumeso aangu kwiinda bamasi boonse; nkaambo nyika yoonse njiyangu.
Muyoondibeda cisi cabapaizi, musyobo uusalalisya. Ngaayo majwi ngoelede kwaambila bana ba-Israyeli,
Mpawo Musa wakaakwiita bapati babantu, wabaambila majwi aya oonse Jehova ngaakamulailila.
Nkabela bantu boonse bakavuwa camoyo womwe kuti, Coonse buyo Jehova ncaamba tulacicita. Elyo Musa wakapilusizya Jehova majwi aabantu.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Bona! Ndeza kulindinywe mujoba idemu, kuti bantu bateelele nenambaula ayebo, kuti bakusyome lyoonse.
Lino Musa wakaambila Jehova majwi aabantu.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Koya kubantu, ubasalazye sunu ajunza, Basanzye zyakusama zyabo,
balibambile buzuba bwatatu, nkaambo mubuzuba bwatatu Jehova uyooseluka acilundu ca-Sinai mumeso aabantu boonse.
Lino uleelede kubikila bantu migaano koonse koonse akubaambila kuti, Amucenjele kuti mutatanti mucilundu nekuba kusika akumugaano waco. Kufumbwa uulyata acilundu ncobeni ulafwa.
Takooyooumwa ajanza pe, uyoofuswa mabwe nanka kuyaswa mivwi. Naba munyama naba muntu, takooyoopona pe. Mweembo waakulila ciindi cilamfu, baboole kucilundu.
Elyo Musa wakaseluka kuzwa kucilundu, wasalazya bantu; nkabela bakasanzya zyakusama zyabo.
Wakaambila bantu kuti, Amulibambile buzuba bwatatu. Kutabi uuguma mwanakazi.
Elyo Musa wakaita bantu kuti bazwe muzilao kuzooswanaana a-Leza, nkabela bakaima munsi acilundu.
Lino cilundu coonse ca-Sinai cakali kuuntumuka busi, nkaambo Jehova wakaselukila mpawo mumulilo. Busi bwaco bwakali kulundumuka mbuli busi bwaceengelo, acilundu coonse cakali kukankama loko.
Lino ijwi lyamweembo nelyakali kuya bukomenesya, Musa wakatalika kwaamba, alakwe Leza wakamuvwiila akudilima.
Jehova wakaselukila acilundu ca-Sinai atala lyacilundu, elyo Jehova wakaita Musa kuti atante atala lyacilundu, nkabela Musa wakatanta.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Seluka, ubacenjezye bantu, ambweni inga balalisinikizya kwaandula inzila yakuzooebela Jehova, aboobo banjibanji akati kabo balafwa.
Abalo bapaizi baswenenena kuli-Jehova abalisalazye, kuti Jehova ataboonzomokeli.
Nkabela Musa wakaambila Jehova kuti, Bantu tabakonzyi kutanta ano acilundu ca-Sinai, pe, nkaambo wakatulailila kuti, Amubikile cilundu migaano, citondwe.
Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Koya, seluka, ukatante yebo a-Aroni. Pele bapaizi abantu boonse bataanduli inzila yakutanta kuli-Jehova pe, kuti ataboonzomokeli.
Mpawo Musa wakaseluka, waakwaambila bantu.

Utazikotamini nekuba kuzimanina milimo, nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wako, ndi Leza sibuzuba. Ndabweedezya milandu yabamawisi amitwe yabana babo mane kusikila kumuzukulu watatu awane wabaabo bandisulide,
pele ndabafwida luzyalo bantu bali zyuulu akati kabaabo bandiyanda akulondola milazyo yangu.
Mazuba aali musanu abumwi uleelede kubeleka akumana milimo yako yoonse,

pele buzuba bwamusanu aabili mbobuzuba bwa-Sabata bwa-Jehova Leza wako; mulimbubo utabi nocita milimo, noba nduwe, naba mwana wako mulombe, naba mwana wako musimbi, naba mulanda wako mwaalumi, naba mulanda wako mwanakazi, neziba iŋombe zyako, naba mweenzu uukede kulinduwe.

Nkaambo mumazuba aali musanu abumwi Jehova wakalenga ijulu anyika alwizi azintu zyoonse zili mumo, pele mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili wakalyokezya, Nkaambo kako Jehova wakalongezya buzuba bwa-Sabata, wabusalazya­.
Nkabela bakaambila Musa kuti, Kotwaambila yebo, tulaswiilila, Pele Leza atatwaambili pe; ambweni tulafwa.
Lino Musa wakavwiila bantu kuti, Mutayoowi, nkaambo nkumusunka Leza ncaazida, kuti mumuyoowe, mutaciti zibi.
Lino bantu kabaimvwi kule, pele Musa wakaswena afwaafwi kumudima usia mbi Leza nkwakabede.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Mbuboobu mboelede kwaambila bana ba-Israyeli, Mulibwene mbundaamba ula anywebo kuzwa kujulu.
Mutalibezeli baleza bambi kuti mubeelanisye ambebo, nebaba baleza bansiliva nebaba baleza bangolida.

Amundiyakile cipaililo cabulongo, mundipailile mpawo zipaizyo azituuzyo zyakutontozya, imbelele aŋombe. Lino kufumbwa kuntu nkunjoosala kuti njibalukwe, njooboola kulindinywe nkukonya oko akumulongezya.
Na mwandiyakila cipaililo camabwe, mutayasyi mabwe aabezedwe, nkaambo na wanyamuna cibezyo cako alincico, wacisofwaazya.
Alimwi mutatanti amatantilo kucipaililo cangu, kuti mutabonwi cinswe alincico.
Na waula muzike muHebrayo, uleelede kukumanina milimo myaka iili musanu aumwi, pele mumwaka wamusanu aibili uleelede kwaangunuka, alyeendele.
Na waletwa katakwete, ainke alike buyo; na waletwa kakwete, ainke amwanakazi wakwe.
Na simalelaakwe wamupa mwanakazi, alimwi wazyala bana balombe na basimbi, mwanakazi abana bayooba basimalelaakwe; ulainka buyo alike.
Pele oyo muzike aamba kuti, Ndayandisya simalelaangu amukaangu, abana bangu nsikonzyi kwaangunuka,
elyo simalelaakwe uleelede kumutola kuli-Leza, amuswenye kumulyango na kumunsende; lino simalelaakwe adonkole kutwi kwakwe ansunda, amubelekele milimo lyoonse.
Na tali mubotu mumeso aasimalelaakwe iwakayandide kumukwata, anunuke. Takonzyi kumuuzya kubazwamasi, pe, nkaambo wamucitila calweeno.
Na ulayanda kumukwatya kumwanaakwe, uleelede kumucitila mbuli mwanaakwe musimbi mbwacitilwa.
Na wakwata aumbi, teelede kucesa kulya kwakwe na zyakusama zyakwe na zyeelelo zyauukwetwe.
Na wakaka kumupa zintu ezi zyotatwe, aangunuke buyo, ainke.
Nekubaboobo na katakwe kucita caali, pele canunzuunzu, njoomupa kuntu nkwakonzya kucijila.
Pele na muntu ulalindila mweenzinyina caali akumujaya calweeno, amumugwisye kucipaililo cangu kuti afwe.
Kufumbwa muntu uuma wisi na banyina, ncobeni uleelede kujayigwa.
Kufumbwa muntu uubba muntunyina, na wamuuzya na wajanwa buyo mumaanza aakwe, ncobeni uleelede kujayigwa.
Na bantu balwana na umwi wauma mweenzinyina abbwe na ntuku, nekubaboobo oyo muntu tafwi, waciswa buyo,
lino na wabuka akweenda amusako, oyo iwakamuuma ulalekwa buyo, pele ulamuliya ciindi ncaakamusowela akumusilisya kabotu.
Pele na muzike ucipona buzuba bomwe na mazuba obile, atapegwi mulandu pe, nkaambo muzike ngemali aakwe.
Pele na waciswa, kulaliigwa buumi kubuumi,
liso kuliso, lino kulino, ijanza kujanza, cituta kucituta,
kupya kukupya, luumo kuluumo, mubunda kumubunda.
Na wakulumbula lino lyamuzike wakwe, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, uleelede kwaangununa oyo muzike nkaambo kalino lyakwe,
Pele iŋombe na yazibila kuyasa, alimwi muleeyo wakacenjezegwa kale nekubaboobo taibambi, eyo iŋombe na yajaya mwaalumi na mwanakazi, iŋombe ileelede kufuswa mabwe, alakwe muleeyo uleelede kujayigwa,
Na wabbadela buyo, ulanunuzya buumi bwakwe kufumbwa cintu ncabikilwa.
Na yayasa mwana, naba mulombe naba musimbi, kuleelede kucitwa mbubonya mbuli mulao oyo.
Na yayasa muzike, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, muleeyo uleelede kuliya simalelo wamuzike oyo mali aali makumi otatwe, ayalo iŋombe ileelede kufuswa mabwe,
Na muntu wasya mulindi nanka cikala, pele tacivumbi, nkabela iŋombe na imbongolo yawida mumo,
mwinimulindi uleelede kuliya; uleelede kupa mwali munyama mali, pele mutunta ulaba wakwe.
Na iŋombe yamuntu yayasa iŋombe yamweenzinyina, nkabela yafwa, baleelede kuulisya iŋombe iicipona akwaabana mali, ayalo iifwide baiabane.
Pele na kulizibidwe kuti eyo iŋombe ilizibide kuyasa, nekubaboobo muleeyo taibambi, ncobeni uleelede kuliya inembe kuŋombe, alimwi iifwide ilaba yakwe.
Na mubbi wajanwa uladonkola, alimwi waumwa calufu, taakwe mulandu wabulowa.
Pele na izuba lyamupaswida mpawo, kuli mulandu wabulowa, ncobeni uleelede kuliya, Na wabula cakuliya, auzigwe nkaambo kakubba kwakwe.
Na cakubba cajanwa mujanza lyakwe, niiba iŋombe niiba imbongolo niiba imbelele, uleelede kuliya zyobile.
Na muntu walisya muunda na masaansa, nanka kuyandilila kwaŋombe zyakwe zyalida mumuunda wamweenzinyina, uleelede kuliya bubotu bwamuunda wakwe na bwamasaansa aakwe.
Na mulilo wabuka akutenta lubaya lwamamvwa, aboobo kulatentwa milwi yamaila na maila aaciimvwi na muunda, ncobeni oyo muntu iwatenta mulilo uleelede kuliya.
Na muntu wabika mali na imbono mumaanza amweenzinyina kuti azibambe, alimwi zyabbigwa kuŋanda yasikuzibamba, na mubbi wajanwa ncobeni uleelede kuliya kobile.
Pele na mubbi tajanwi, mwiniŋanda aswene kuli-Leza, kuti kuzibwe na engwe wakabika ijanza lyakwe kumbono zyamweenzinyina.

Alimwi mumilandu yoonse yazintu ziswekede, naba musune niiba imbongolo niiba imbelele neziba zyakusama niciba cintu cimwi cili buti muntu ncaamba kuti, Nceeci, makani aabantu boonse bobile aletwe kuli-Leza. Lino oyo uupegwa mulandu kuli-Leza aliye mweenzinyina kobile.
Na muntu wasisya imbongolo naba musune niiba imbelele naba munyama umwi kumweenzinyina kuti amubambile, alimwi oyo munyama wafwa nanka kulumwa nanka kutandwa katakwe uubona,
aba bantu bobile baleelede kukonkezyanya cikonke ca-Jehova, kuti kuzibwe na engwe iwakabika ijanza lyakwe kulubono lwamweenzinyina. Lino mwalimunyama alamwe. Takooliya pe.
Pele na ncobeni wabbigwa, uleelede kuliya mukamwini wayo.
Na walumwa banyama bamusokwe, alete citondezyo. Takooliya cilume pe.
Na muntu wakumbila cintu kumweenzinyina, lino canyonyooka nanka kufwa mulaaco natawo, ncobeni uleelede kuliya.
Na mulaaco mpali, takooliya pe, nkaambo ncinga sikuvola, cakazida mali buyo.
Pele na wisi wakakilila kumupa, aliye mali aaelene alubono lwanakalindu.
Mutapenzyi mukamufu nanka mucaala naba umwi.
Na mwabapenzya, alimwi na bakwiilila ndime, ncobeni ndamvwa kukwiila kwabo,
lino bukali bwangu bulabuka, nkabela njoomujazya ipanga, elyo banakazi banu bayooba bamukabafu, abana banu bayooba bamucaala.
Na watola cikobela camweenzinyoko, cibe citondezyo, uleelede kucipilusya kulinguwe izuba kalitana kubbila,
nkaambo ncencico luzutu ncalivumbya kumubili wakwe, Aone buti? Na wakwiilila ndime, njoomvwa, nkaambo ndisiluzyalo,
Azyalo iŋombe zyako ambelele zyako, undicitile mbubonya obo. Mazuba aali musanu aabili mwana akale abanyina, lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu mulandipa.
Amube bantu basalala kulindime. Nyama indume musokwe mutailyi pe; amwiisowele babwa.
Utatobeli buleya kukucita zibi. Utaambi makani mulubeta kuti upambuke abantu banji kukubisya.
Utavundikizyi abusyu bwako kumakani aamucete.
Na wabona imbongolo yayooyo uukusulide iliimbidwe mukuli wayo, toelede kumulekelezya pe, ncobeni uleelede kumugwasya.
Cenjela makani aakubeja, Utajayi muntu uutakwe mulandu na muntu uululeme, nkaambo mebo nsikonzyi kululamika basizibi.
Utalyi makulo, nkaambo makulo aloofwaazya meso akubisizya makani aabaluleme.

pele mumwaka wamusanu aibili uleke, ione, kuti bacete babantu bako balye abalo, aceeco cisyeede banyama bamusokwe bacilye. Ayalo myuunda yako yamasaansa amyuunda yamaolifa, uleelede kwiicitila mbubonya.
Amucenjele makani oonse ngendamwaambila. Mutaambi makani aabaleza bambi. Mazina aabo atamvwigwi mumilomo yanu.

Muleelede kucita ipobwe lyazinkwa zitakwe bumena; mazuba aali musanu aabili amulye zinkwa zitakwe bumena, mbubonya mbundakamulailila, kuciindi ceelede camumwezi wa-Abibi, nkaambo mulinguwo mwakazwa ku-Egepita. Kutabi uuza kulindime acinkwamaanza.

Alimwi amucite ipobwe lyakutebula, ipobwe lyakabalwebalwe kamilimo yako, micelo njowakabyala mumuunda wako; alyalo ipobwe lyalwiindi kumamanino aamwaka, nowamana kulimuna micelo yako yoonse yamumuunda.
Ziindi zyotatwe mumwaka baalumi bako boonse baboneke kubusyu bwa-Mwami Jehova.
Bulowa bwacipaizyo cangu toelede kubupaizya antoomwe abuswezyo. Aalo mafuta aamapobwe aangu taelede kusyaala mane bukace.
Micelo mitaanzi njiizyala nyika yako, uleelede kwiileta kuŋanda ya-Jehova Leza wako, Utajiki mwana wampongo mumukupa wabanyina.
Amubone! Ndatuma angelo kunembo lyanu, kuti amubambe munzila akumusisya kubusena mbondakamubambila.
Amucenjele, muswiilile ijwi lyakwe, mutamukalazyi, nkaambo takooyoomulekelela milandu yanu, nkaambo izina lyangu molili mulinguwe.
Na ncobeni mwaswiilila ijwi lyakwe akucita zyoonse nzinamba, njooba sinkondonyina basinkondonyoko, njoobalwanya bamulwisya.
Lino angelo wangu namuzulwida akumusisya kuba-Amori akuba-Hiti akuba-Perizi akuba-Kanana akuba-Hivi akubaJebusi, njoobanyonyoona aba boonse.
Mutakotamini mizimu yabo nekuba kwiikomba. Mutaciti mbubacita pe. Amubamanisye, akumwaya minsemu yabo yamabwe.
Amukombe Jehova Leza wanu, lino njoolongezya zilyo zyanu amaanzi aanu, alimwi njoogwisya malwazi akati kanu.
Takukooyooba naba omwe mucisi canu uusowa nanka uutazyali, Njoozuzikizya mazuba aanu.
Njootuma ziyoosya zyangu kunembo lyanu, zipilinganye bantu boonse oko nkomuyoosika, nkabela basinkondonyoko boonse bayoomupa matako.
Njootuma manko kunembo lyanu, akabatande ba-Hivi aba-Kanana aba-Hiti.
Nsikooyoobatanda mumwaka omwe pe, kuti cisi citabi matongo, abanyama bamusokwe batamuvulili.
Njoobatanda buniini buniini mane mukavule akuvuba nyika.
Nkabela njookukosweda migaano kuzwa ku-Lwizi Lusalala kusikila kulwizi lwabaFilisti, akuzwa kunkanda kusikila ku-Firate, nkaambo bantu bakede munyika njoobaaba mumaanza aanu, mubatande kubusyu bwanu.
Mutatangani cizuminano ambabo nanka abaleza babo.
Tabeelede kukala munyika yanu, kuti batamuciti kuti mundibisizye, nkaambo na mwakomba baleza babo, ncobeni ciyoomubeda cilebyo.
Musa alike nguelede kuswena afwaafwi kuli-Jehova. Bamwi batasweni afwiifwi pe, abalo bantu tabeelede kumusindikila.
Mpawo Musa wakaakulwiida bantu majwi oonse aa-Jehova, ambeta zyoonse, nkabela bantu boonse bakavuwa ajwi lyomwe, bati, Makani oonse Jehova ngaamba tulaacita.
Lino Musa wakalemba majwi oonse aa-Jehova. Nkabela nebwakaca, wakafumina kuyooyaka cipaililo munsi acilundu, amisumpululu iili ikumi aibili mbubonya mbuli mweelwe wamisyobo yabana ba-Israyeli.
Lino wakatuma bamwi balombe babana ba-Israyeli kuyoopaizya zipaizyo, nkabela bakatuulila Jehova iŋombe, zibe zipaizyo azituuzyo zyakutontozya.
Lino cisela cabulowa, Musa wakacibweza akucibika mumutiba, acimwi cisela wakacisansaila acipaililo.
Mpawo wakabweza ibbuku lyacizuminano akulibala mumatwi aabantu, Nkabela bakaamba kuti, Coonse Jehova ncaamba, tulacicita, tulaswiilila.
Elyo Musa wakabweza bulowa, wabusansaila abantu, wati, Amubone! Mboobu bulowa bwacizuminano Jehova ncatangene anywebo mbuli majwi aya oonse.
Mpawo Musa a-Aroni, Nadabu a-Abihu, abapati bali makumi aali musanu aabili babana ba-Israyeli, bakatanta,
nkabela bakabona Leza wa-Israyeli. Kunsi lyamaulu aakwe kwakabonwa mbuli cibuye camabwe casafiri, cisalala mbuli kujulu kwini.
Takwakabika maanza aakwe kubapati abo baba-Israyeli pe. Bakabona Leza, alimwi bakaiya akunywa.
Elyo Musa wakanyamuka a-Joshua similimo wakwe, nkabela Musa wakatanta kucilundu kuli-Leza.
Wakaambila bapati kuti, Amutulindile okuno mane tuboole kulindinywe. Amubone! Aroni a-Huri mpobali; uujisi makani aatole kulimbabo.
Bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakalikede acilundu ca-Sinai, ajoba lyakalicivumbide mazuba aali musanu abumwi, elyo mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili wakaita Musa mujoba.
Nkabela bulemu bwa-Jehova atala acilundu bwakaboneka mumeso aabana ba-Israyeli mbuli mulilo uuyakisya.
Elyo Musa wakanjila mujoba. Wakatanta acilundu, nkabela Musa wakakala awo acilundu mazuba aali makumi one isikati amasiku.
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti bandiletele mulumbo. Amutambule mulumbo kubantu boonse bazumina mumyoyo yabo.
Ngooyu mulumbo ngumweelede kutambula kulimbabo: ingolida ansiliva amukuba,
masani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu, amasani aatuba, aboya bwampongo,
zikanda zyabagutu zisalazidwe, amatobo, azisamu zyamuunga,
mafuta aamumalampi, misamu yamafuta aakunana, atununkilizyo twakutenta,
mabwe aaonukisi, amabwe aakusyomaika mucikombelo cabupaizi amukatobo kacamba.
Lino bandicitile cikombelo, nkale akati kabo.
Cikombelo azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, amuzicite mbubonya mbundamutondezya.
Uliziluluzye ingolida iisalala, mukati aanze, alimwi ulibikile moombe wangolida cakuzinguluka.
Alimwi ufule incoko zyone zyangolida, zibikwe kumaulu aalyo, incoko zyobile kulubazu lumwi ancoko zyobile kulubazu alumwi.
Lino beza miziyo yamuunga akwiiziluluzya ingolida.
Eyi miziyo ulaisyomeka muncoko zyakumabazu aabbokesi, mwiiyumuzye ibbokesi.
Miziyo ileelede kusyaala muncoko zyabbokesi, tazyeelede kugwisigwa pe.
Alimwi omo mubbokesi ubike milao njensi kupe.
Lino beza cuuno caluzyalo cangolida iisalala, Bulamfu bwaco bube tukokola tobile acisela, abwaamba bwaco kakokola komwe acisela.
Alimwi cita baangelo bakerubi bobile bangolida, bacifula mubisi, kumpela zyobile zyacuuno caluzyalo.
Ucite kerubi umwi kumpela imwi aimwi; bakerubi bacitwe antoomwe acuuno caluzyalo ampela zyaco zyobile.
Lino bakerubi balatandabika mababa aabo akuvumbilila cuuno caluzyalo; amasyu aabo alangane; masyu aabakerubi alange cuuno caluzyalo.
Lino bika cuuno caluzyalo atala lyabbokesi; alimwi mukati kabbokesi bika milao njensi kupe.

Nkukonya oko nkotuyooswanaanina. Njooambaula ayebo kuzwa kujulu lyacuuno caluzyalo akatikati kabakerubi bobile bali abbokesi lyacizuminano. Nkukonya oko nkonjookwaambila milao yoonse njoelede kulailila bana ba-Israyeli.
Uiziluluzye ingolida iisalala akwiicitila moombe uuzingulukide wangolida.
Uicitile mubala uuzingulukide uuli abwaamba bwajanza, ayooyo mubalo ube amoongola wangolida koonse koonse.
Alimwi uicitile ncoko zyone zyangolida akubika incoko kuzyooko zyone zyakumaulu aayo.
Kufwaafwi kumubalo kuyooba incoko, zijate miziyo yakuyumuzya intafule.
Amiziyo, ubeze miziyo yamuunga akwiiziluluzya ingolida, elyo intafule ilanyampuzigwa njiyo.
Alimwi ukacite mitiba, amyuungo, azilongo, amfulu zyakupaizya; zyoonse uzicite angolida iisalala.
Lino zinkwa zyamabonwabonwa uzibike antafule kubusyu bwangu ciindi coonse.
Nkabela mumabazu aaco muyoozwa mitabi iili musanu aumwi, mitabi yotatwe kulubazu lumwi lwaciimikilo, amitabi yotatwe kulubazu alumwi lwaciimikilo.
Mutabi umwi aumwi ubezedwe ankomeki zyotatwe zili mbuli micelo yaalmondi, zili atunkuli amalubaluba; mitabi yoonse iili musanu aumwi iizwa kuciimikilo ibe mbubonya obo.
Aalo aciimikilo cini abezwe inkomeki zyone zili mbuli micelo yaalmondi, zili atunkuli amalubaluba.
