Alimwi kube kankuli kunsi lyamitabi yobile, akamwi kunsi lyamitabi yobile, akamwi kunsi lyamitabi yobile, kumitabi yoonse iili musanu aumwi iizwa kuciimikilo.
Tunkuli amitabi, zyoonse zilajatilila mulincico, coonse cacifulamubisi, ingolida iisalala.
Alimwi kocicitila malampi aali musanu aabili, ubike malampi kuti amunikile kunembo lyaco.
Amano zyaco ankayi zyaco zyoonse zibe zyangolida iisalala.
Cicitwe atalenta lyangolida iisalala, ciimikilo azibe Jesyo zyaco ezi zyoonse.
Uleelede kucicita mbubonya mbuli cinkozya ncowakatondezegwa­ mucilundu.
Bulamfu bwacisitilizyo comwe bube tukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu atutatu, abwaamba bwaco tukokola tone; zisitilizyo zyoonse zikabe amweelwe omwe uuelene.
Zisitilizyo zyosanwe ziyooswanaanizigwa, azisitilizyo zimwi zyosanwe ziyooswanaanizigwa.
Alimwi ucite zyaanzikilo zyanyanzabili kumoombe wacisitilizyo caanze cacipanzi citaanzi; acalo cisitilizyo caanze cacipanzi cabili ucicitile mbubonya.
Cita zyaanzikilo zili makumi osanwe mucisitilizyo cimwi, azyaanzikilo zili makumi osanwe mumoombe wacisitilizyo camucipanzi cabili; zyaanzikilo zilangane.
Alimwi ucite zijatilizyo zyangolida zili makumi osanwe zyakuswanaanya zisitilizyo cimwi acimwi aceenzinyina­, kuti itente libe lyomwe.
Bulamfu bwacisitilizyo cimwi acimwi bube tukokola tuli makumi otatwe, abwaamba bwacisitilizyo cimwi acimwi cibe tukokola tone, Zyoonse zili ikumi acimwi zielane.
Uswanizye zisitilizyo zyosanwe azilike, azisitilizyo zimwi zili musanu acimwi azilike, lino cisitilizyo camusanu acimwi ucivunge kunembo lyatente.
Alimwi ucite zyaanzikilo zili makumi osanwe kumoombe wacisitilizyo cili kumamanino aacipanzi cimwi, azyaanzikilo zili makumi osanwe kumoombe wacisitilizyo cili kumamanino aacipanzi cabili.
Alimwi ucite zijatilizyo zili makumi osanwe zyamukuba, ukanjizye zyaanzikilo muzijatilizyo, ukaswanizye itente lyoonse, libe lyomwe.
Lino cipanzi cacisitilizyo cisyaala, cisela cacisitilizyo cisyaala, cileelede kulengelela kusule lyatente.
Kakokola komwe kulubazu lumwi, akakokola komwe kulubazu lumwi, nkokuti eco cisyaala cabulamfu bwazisitilizyo zyatente, cilengelela kumabazu aatente, kumwi akumwi, kuti cilivumbe.
Alimwi ucite cakuvumba itente camatobo aabagutu aasalazidwe, acakuvumba cazipaya kujulu,
Alimwi ucitile itente minsende yamuunga.
Bulamfu bwamunsende omwe bube tukokola tuli ikumi, abwaamba bwamunsende bube kakokola acisela.
Munsende umwi aumwi ube aziswanizizyo zyobile, kuti iswanaane umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina. Mboelede kucitila minsende yoonse yatente,
Minsende yatente ibe obo. Beza minsende iili makumi obile yakulubazu lwamusanza.
Alimwi kunsi lyaminsende iili makumi obile panga zikazikilo zyansiliva zili makumi one, nkokuti zikazikilo zyobile kunsi lyamunsende umwi aumwi aziswanizizyo zyawo zyobile.
Akwalo kulubazu lwabili lwatente, nkokuti lubazu lwakunyika, beza minsende iili makumi obile,
azikazikilo zyayo zili makumi one zyansiliva, zikazikilo zyobile kunsi lyamunsende umwi aumwi.
Alimwi kulubazu lwatente lwakujwe beza minsende iili musanu aumwi,
akuzyooko zyatente zyakusule, minsende yobile,
iipambukanye ansi akuswanaana kujulu kumubalo mutaanzi. Mbwiiyooba yoonse yobile. Iyooba kuzyooko zyobile.
Kuyooba minsende iili musanu aitatu, azikazikilo zyayo zyansiliva zili ikumi amusanu aumwi, zikazikilo zyobile kumi lyamunsende umwi aumwi.
aminkulu yosanwe kulubazu lwabili lwatente, aminkulu yosanwe kulubazu lwatente lwakusule kumbo.
Nkabela munkulu waakati, akatikati kaminsende, ulapola koonse koonse.
Lino minsende uleelede kwiiziluluzya ingolida, ancoko zyayo uzipanzye ingolida, zijate minkulu, ayalo minkulu uiziluluzye ingolida.
Yaka itente lyakukombela mbubonya mbuli mampyali aalyo ngowakatondezegwa mucilundu.
Uleelede kucaanzika amisumpululu yone yamuunga iizilulwidwe ingolida iili amanembe aangolida azikazikilo zyone zyansiliva.
Cisitilizyo eco ucaanzike azijatilizyo. Lino unjizye mukati kaco ibbokesi lyamilao. Cisitilizyo nceciyoopambukanya kuntu kusalala akusalalisya loko.
Acalo cuuno caluzyalo ucibike atala lyabbokesi lyamulao mubusena busalalisya loko.
Ayalo intafule ibikwe anze lyacisitilizyo, acikazikilo camalampi bulangene antafule kulubazu lwatente lwakumusanza; yalo intafule ibikwe kulubazu lwakunyika.
Acisitilizyo eco ucibezele misumpululu yosanwe yamuunga, uiziluluzye ingolida. Manembe abe aangolida, alimwi ukaafulile zikazikilo zyosanwe zyamukuba.
Akwalo kuzyooko zyaco zyone ukabike meja aali antoomwe acipaililo; lino uciziluluzye mukuba.
Alimwi ucite zilongo zyaco zyatwe, amaliko aaco, amitiba yaco, aziyasyo zyaco, anzilo zyaco; zibelesyo zyaco zyoonse uzicitye mukuba,
Alimwi ucifulile kansabwe kamukuba. Awo akansabwe ucite incoko zyone zyamukuba kuzyooko zyako zyone.
Lino uleelede kukabika kunsi lyalupimpito lwacipaililo, kansabwe kalengelele bulamfu bwacisela cacipaililo.
Alimwi ubezele cipaililo miziyo, miziyo yamuunga akwiiziluluzya mukuba.
Eyi miziyo injizigwe muncoko, ibe kumabazu oonse obile aacipaililo necibwezegwa.
Yaka cipaililo cifokokede amapulanga. Kociyaka mbubonya mbowakatondezegwa mucilundu.
Misumpululu ibe makumi obile, azyalo zikazikilo zyayo zibe makumi obile; zibe zyamukuba, pele manembe aamisumpululu aminkulu yayo zyoonse zibe zyansiliva.

Akwalo kulubazu lwakunyika kube masani aalengelela aali abulamfu bwatukokola tuli mwanda; misumpululu ibe makumi obile azikazikilo zyayo zibe makumi obile; zibe zyamukuba, pele manembe aamisumpululu aminkulu yayo zyoonse zibe zyansiliva.
Akulubazu lwakumbo kube masani aalengelela aali abulamfu bwatukokola tuli makumi osanwe; misumpululu ibe ikumi, azikazikilo zyayo zibe ikumi.
Akulubazu lwakujwe bwaamba bwalubuwa bube tukokola tuli makumi osanwe.
Kuntu kulengelela masani kulubazu lumwi lwamulyango kube abulamfu bwatukokola tuli ikumi amusanu; misumpululu yakooko ibe yotatwe, azikazikilo zyayo zibe zyotatwe.
Akwalo kuntu kulengelela masani kulubazu lwabili lwamulyango kube abulamfu bwatukokola tuli ikumi amusanu; misumpululu yakooko ibe yotatwe, azikazikilo zyayo zibe zyotatwe.

Amulyango walubuwa ube acisitilizyo cili abulamfu bwatukokola tuli makumi obile, camasani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aalukidwe kabotu, masani aamanyengwe-manyengwe. Misumpululu yawo ibe yone, azikazikilo zyayo zibe zyone.
Misumpululu yoonse yakulubuwa kumabazu oonse ibe aminkulu yansiliva; manembe aayo abe ansiliva, azikazikilo zyayo zibe zyamukuba.
Bulamfu bwalubuwa bube tukokola tuli mwanda, bwaamba bube tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, abwiime bube tukokola tosanwe. Lube amasani aalengelela aalukidwe kabotu, azikazikilo zyamukuba.
Azibelesyo zyamilimo yoonse yacikombelo, amanembe aaco, amanembe oonse aalubuwa, zyoonse zibe zyamukuba,

Mutente lyakubunganina, anze lyacisitilisyo, kunembo lyamagwalo aamulao, Aroni abana bakwe kabalibamba cifumo amangolezya kubusyu bwa-Jehova, Nceciimbo ceelede kubambwa lyoonse akati kabana ba-Israyeli mumazyalani aabo oonse.
Lino ucitile munyoko Aroni zyakusama zisalala zyabulemu akweebeka.
Ambila bantu boonse bacenjede, mbendakazuzya muuya wabusongo, kuti batunge zyakusama zya-Aroni akumusalazya, andicitile milimo yabupaizi.

Zyakusama nzibeelede kutunga nzeezi: cakusama cakaango, efodi, cikobela, cibaki camanyengwe-manyengwe, citambala, alukumba. Bacitile munyoko Aroni abana bakwe zyakusama zisalala, kuti bandimanine milimo yabupaizi.
Batambule ingolida, amasani aanyanzabili, amasani aakamwemvwe, amasani aasalala pyu, amasani aalukidwe kabotu.
Lino efodi, bacipange angolida amasani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu cabusongo.
Cibe antambo zyobile zyamakuko kumpela zyaco zyakuciswanizya.
Alwalo lutambo lweebeka lwakucaanzya lupangwe mbubonya, angolida amasani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu
Lino bweza mabwe obile aa-onukusi, akulemba alingawo mazina aabana ba-Israyeli.
Mazina aali musanu alimwi alembwe abbwe lyomwe, amazina amwi aali musanu alimwi abbwe lyabili, mbubonya mbuli kuzyalwa kwabo.
Mbuli mufuzi mbwalemba anwenwe, mbubonya obo uleelede kulemba mazina aabana ba-Israyeli amabwe ayo obile, alimwi cakuzinguluka bika tuwayile twangolida.
Lino uleelede kubika mabwe ayo obile antambo zyamakuko zyaefodi, abe mabwe aakwiibalusya aabana ba-Israyeli. Aroni ulatola mazina aabo kubusyu bwa-Jehova amakuko aakwe obile kube ciibalusyo.
Alimwi ucite tuwayile twangolida,
anketani zyobile zyangolida iisalala, zyoosedwe mbuli tukole, lino otu tukole twanketani twaangwe atuwayile.
Cibe azyooko zyone zyeelene; bulamfu bwaco bube cisela cakakokola abwaamba bwaco bube cisela cakakokola.
Mukati mubikwe milongo yone yamabwe. Mumulongo mutaanzi mube ibbwe lisalala-pyu abbwe lyatopazi abbwe lyasmaragido.
Mumulongo wabili mube ibbwe lyanofeki abbwe lya-Safiro abbwe lyajaspi.
Mumulongo watatu mube ibbwe lyaliguri abbwe lyaagate abbwe lyaamutusto.
Mumulongo wane mube ibbwe lyaberulo abbwe lyaonukusi abbwe lyakrusalito. Oonse abikwe mutuwayile twangolida.
Mabwe abe ikumi aabili amazina aawo mbuli mazina aabana ba-Israyeli. Alembwe mbuli inwenwe mbwiilembwa; limwi alimwi libe azina lyamusyobo walyo akati kamisyobo iili ikumi aibili.
Acalo cisani cakaango ucicitile inketani zyangolida iisalala zyoosedwe mbuli tukole.
Alimwi ucitile cisani cakaango incoko zyobile zyangolida. Ezi incoko zyobile zibikwe azyooko zyobile zyacisani cakaango.
Alimwi usome tukole tobile twangolida muncoko zyobile zyakuzyooko zyacisani cakaango;
lino impela zyatukole tobile ziswanizigwe atuwayile tobile, aboobo cilaangwa kunembo kumaanza obile aaefodi.
Alimwi ucite ncoko zyobile zyangolida, ziangwe mumpimpito zyobile zyacisani cakaango, kulubazu lwaco lubambene aefodi mukati.
Alimwi ucite ncoko zyobile zyangolida, uzibike antambo zyamakuko zyaefodi, kumeso, ansi, nkociswaninana alukumba lwaefodi loosedwe camaanu,
Lino cisani cakaango baleelede kucaanzya incoko zyaco kuncoko zyaefodi alukole lwakamwemvwe, kuti cibe atala lyalukumba lwaefodi, cisani cakaango citaangununwi kuli efodi.
Aboobo Aroni ulatola mazina aabana ba-Israyeli acisani cakaango calubeta amoyo wakwe naanjila mubusena busalala, kuti kube ciibalusyo can lyoonse kubusyu bwa-Jehova.

Aalo acisani cakaango calubeta mpoelede kubika zisonzyo zya-Urimu a-Tumimu, zibe amoyo wa-Aroni naanjila kubusyu bwa-Jehova, aboobo Aroni ulatola lyoonse imbeta zyabana ba-Israyeli amoyo wakwe kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Cibe acipulo camutwe mukati kaco. Cigomenwe koonse koonse kuti citazambuluki.
Amoombe waco utungwe micelo yapomegranite amasani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu. Itungwe koonse koonse kumoombe waco, alimwi akati kayo kubikwe milangu yangolida.
Kube mulangu wangolida amucelo wapomegranite, mulangu wangolida amucelo wapomegranite, koonse koonse kumoombe wacikobela.
Aroni acisame ciindi cakupaizya. Kulila kwaco kumvwigwe naanjila mubusena busalala kubusyu bwa-Jehova, anazwa kuti atafwi,
Lino uleelede kwiiwanga alukole lwakamwemvwe acitambala; ibe kunkumu atala acitambala.
Libe ankumu ya-Aroni, lino Aroni ulatola milandu yazintu zisalala bana baIsrayeli nzibayoosalazya zibe zipo zisalala, Libe ankumu yakwe lyoonse, kuti zitambulike kuli-Jehova.
Alimwi utunge cikobela camanyengwe-manyengwe, amasani aatuba, acitambala camasani aatuba, akupanga lukumba lunyekawidwe.
Usamike Aroni munyoko abana bakwe, ubananike, ubasalazye, ubabike kuti bandicitile milimo yabupaizi.
Ubacitile tubbudula twamasani aatuba twakusamika zinswe zyabo kuzwa kuzikungu kusikila kuzibelo.

Aroni abana bakwe bazisame ciindi cakunjila mutente lyakubunganina akuciindi cakuswena kucipaililo kuzoocita milimo yazintu zisalala kuti batalipi mulandu akufwa. Uyoomubeda mulao, walo abana bakwe lyoonse.
azinkwa zitakwe bumena, azibunge zitakwe bumena zikandidwe amafuta, atubunge tutakwe bumena tunanikidwe mafuta, Zyoonse zicitwe abusu bwabulotwe butwidwe kabotu.
Uzibike mucinzuma comwe akuzileta mumonya mucinzuma antoomwe amucende abagutu bobile.
Lino Aroni abana bakwe, ubaswenye kufwaafwi kumulyango watente lyambunganino akubasanzya maanzi.
Lino bweza zyakusama akusamika Aroni cikobela camanyengwe acibaki aefodi acisani cakaango, alimwi umusamike lukumba lwaefodi Iutungidwe camaanu.
Lino umusamike citambala amutwe wakwe, akubika munsini uusalala acitambala.
Lino bweza mafuta aakunanika, akwaatila amutwe wakwe, umunanike.
Abalo bana bakwe ubaswenye afwiifwi, ubasamike zikobela zyamanyengwe,
ubasamike inkumba akubazwaatika insulumani, Bupaizi buyooba bwabo: ngomulao walyoonse. Mbuboobo mboelede kubikila Aroni abana bakwe maanza.
mukajaye musune nkukonya oko kunembo lya-Jehova kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Lino kombola bulowa bwamusune, ulambe ameja aacipaililo amunwe wako, abulowa bumwi boonse ubutile atako lyacipaililo.
Alimwi bweza lufuko alulyaŋanga lwamuni, ansa zyobile amafuta aazyo, uzitente acipaililo.
Pele nyama yamusune, atobo lyakwe, acifusi cakwe, zyoonse zitentwe mumulilo anze lyamalabba: ncecipaizyo cazibi.
Nkabela ujaye mugutu, ubweze bulowa bwakwe akubutila koonse koonse cakuzinguluka cipaililo.
Wamana buyo, tendaula mugutu, sanzya mala aakwe amyeendo yakwe akuzibika zyoonse antoomwe azituli zimwi amutwe,
utente mugutu woonse acipaililo: ncecipaizyo cakupaizya Jehova, cinunko cibotu citentelwa Jehova.

ukajaye mugutu, ukombole bulowa bwakwe akulamba impela yakutwi kwalulyo kwa-Aroni, ampela zyamatwi aalulyo aabana bakwe, azyaala zyamaanza aabo aalulyo azyaala zyakumaulu aabo aalulyo. Lino bulowa busyeede ubutile koonse koonse cakuzinguluka cipaililo.

Wamana obo, kombola bulowa buli acipaililo amafuta aakunana, usansaile Aroni azyakusama zyakwe abana bakwe azyakusama zyabana bakwe, aboobo ulasalala, walo azyakusama zyakwe, abana bakwe azyakusama zya bana bakwe boonse,
Alimwi bweza mafuta aamugutu, amucila, alufuko, alulyaŋanga lwamuni, ansa zyobile, amafuta aazyo, amweendo walulyo, (nkaambo ngomugutu wakusalazya),
acinkwa comwe, acibunge comwe cikandidwe amafuta, akabunge komwe kuzwa kucinzuma cazinkwa zitakwe bumena zili kumeso aa-Jehova.
Ezi zyoonse uzibike mumaanza aa-Aroni amumaanza aabana bakwe, muziyumbe kubusyu bwa-Jehova, zibe cipaizyo cakuyumba.
Kozitambula kuzwa kumaanza aabo akuzitenta acipaililo atala lyacipaizyo citentwa, kube cinunko cibotezya Jehova: ncecipaizyo citentelwa Jehova.
Usalazye katiti kacipaizyo cakuyumba amweendo wacituuzyo ciyumbwa cipaizigwa kuzwa kumugutu wakusalazya Aroni abana bakwe.
Ezi zilaba zya-Aroni azyabana bakwe: ngumulao walyoonse akati kabana ba-Israyeli; ncecaabilo cabapaizi neebayoopegwa kuzwa kuzipaizyo zyabana ba-Israyeli; ncecituuzyo cabo kuli-Jehova.
Oyo mwana uulya izina lyakwe uyoozisama mazuba aali musanu aabili naayoonjila mutente lyambunganino kukupaila mubusena busalala.
nkabela Aroni abana bakwe bayoolya nyama yamugutu azinkwa zyamucinzuma kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Bayoolya zintu ezyo izyakabelesegwa kukumanya milandu yabo akukubabika mumilimo akubasalazya. Mweenzu teelede kuzilya pe, nkaambo zilasalala.
Pele na kwasyaala nyama yakusalazya nanka cinkwa kusikila cifumo eco cisyeede uleelede kucitenta mumulilo; taciligwi pe, nkaambo cilasalala,
Buzuba bumwi abumwi uleelede kupaizya musune wakumanya milandu, Acalo cipaililo, uleelede kucipaizizya cipaizyo cakumanya zibi zyaco, akucinanika, kuti ucisalazye.
Mazuba aali musanu aabili amupaizizye cipaililo akucisalazya, aboobo cipaililo cilasalalisya loko. Kufumbwa cintu ciguma cipaililo cilasalala.
kabelele komwe kacifumo akabelele kabili kagoko;
antoomwe akabelele kataanzi amutuule cipanzi cakumi cacisuwo cabusu bwabulotwe butwidwe, bukandidwe acipanzi cane cansazi yamafuta, acipanzi cane cansazi yawaini, cibe cipanzi cakutila,
Akabelele kabili, amukapaizye ciindi cagoko; kabe acipaizyo cako cabusu acipaizyo cako cawaini, mbubonya mbuli eco cacifumo, kabe cinunko cibotu citentelwa Jehova.
Mbuboobo mbokweelede kupaizigwa lyoonse, mumazyalani aanu oonse, kumulyango watente lyambunganino kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Nkukonya oko nkonjoomuswanina, akwaambaula ayebo.
Nkukonya oko nkonjooswanaana abana ba-Israyeli. Kuyoosalazigwa abulemu bwangu.
Njoosalazya itente lyambunganino, acipaililo; alakwe Aroni abana bakwe njoobasalazya kuti bandicitile milimo yabupaizi.
Njookala akati kabana ba-Israyeli, njooba Leza wabo,
nkabela bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova Leza wabo iwakabagwisya munyika ya-Egepita kuti nkale akati kabo, Ndime Jehova Leza wabo.
Bulamfu bwaco bube kakokola komwe, abwaamba bwaco bube kakokola komwe; cibe azyooko zyone zyeelene, abwiime bwaco bube tukokola tobile. Ameja aaco kaakumbetene.
Uciziluluzye ingolida iisalala, atala akumabazu akumeja koonse, Alimwi ucicitile moombe wangolida koonse koonse,
akunsi lyamoombe ucite incoko zyobile zyangolida kumabazu obile aalangene; mulinzizyo mulasomwa miziyo yakuciyumuzya.
Alimwi ucite miziyo yamuunga akwiiziluluzya ingolida.
Lino eco cipaililo ucibike kunembo lyacisitilizyo cili kubbokesi lyacizuminano, kunembo lyacuuno caluzyalo caatala lyabbokesi nkotunooswanaana ayebo.
Nkabela Aroni unootenta misamu iinunka kabotu alincico. Cifumo cimwi acimwi, kuciindi cakubamba malampi, uleelede kwiitenta.
Alimwi magolezya, naayasya malampi, Aroni uleelede kwiitenta, Ibe tununkilizyo twalyoonse kubusyu bwa-Jehova mumazyalani aanu oonse.
Tamweelede kupaizya awo misamu imbi, neciba cituuzyo citentwa neciba cipaizyo cabusu; azipaizyo zyakunywa tazyeelede kutilwa alincico.

Nkabela komwe mumwaka Aroni uleelede kumanya milandu ameja aaco; bulowa bwacituuzyo cazibi, mbombubo mbweelede kubelesya kukumanya milandu, komwe mumwaka mumazyalani aanu oonse. Cilasalalisya kumeso aa-Jehova.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ciindi cakubala mweelwe wabana ba-Israyeli, boonse baleelede kuletela Jehova umwi aumwi cinunuzyo cabuumi bwakwe, kuti kutabi bulwazi akati kabo kuciindi cakubalwa.
Umwi aumwi uubalwa, cipo nceelede kuleta nceeci: cisela casyekeli, nkokuti syekeli lyacikombelo (isyekeli lili amagera aali makumi obile). Alete cisela casyekeli, cibe mulumbo kuli-Jehova.
Kufumbwa muntu uubalwa uuli amyaka iili makumi obile na kwiinda uleelede kuleta oyu mulumbo wa-Jehova.
Bavubi batakapi ciinda, abatengwana batakapi tuniini: boonse buyo bape cisela casyekeli ciindi cakuleta oyu mulumbo wa-Jehova wakununuzya maumi aabo.
Nkabela ayo mali aakumanya milandu ngemutambula kubana ba-Israyeli, muleelede kwaabelesya milimo yatente lyambunganino. Ayoobeda Jehova ciibalusyo cabana ba-Israyeli cakumanya milandu yanu.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Panga cisambilo camukuba atako lyaco lyamukuba, cakusambila, ucibike akati katente lyambunganino acipaililo, akubika maanzi mulincico,
kuti Aroni abana bakwe basambe kumaanza akumaulu.
Kufumbwa ciindi nebanjila mutente lyambunganino, nanka kuswena afwaafwi kucipaililo kuzoopaizizya Jehova na kumutentela tununkilizyo,
sansi basambe kumaanza akumaulu kuti batafwi. Ngomulao walyoonse kulimbabo, kuli-Aroni akubana bakwe mumazyalani aabo oonse.

Bweza misamu mibotu: mungwimba wamuro uuli abulemu bwamasyekeli aali myanda yosanwe, amusamu uununka wakinamono uuli abulemu bwacisela, nkokuti masyekeli aali myanda yobile amakumi osanwe, amisale iili myanda yobile amakumi osanwe,
atununkilizyo twakasiya masyekeli aali myanda yosanwe (weeleke kusyekeli lyacikombelo), ansazi yamafuta aamaolifa.
Ezi zyoonse uzivwelanye, zibe mafuta aasalala aakunanika, mbubonya mbwacita simisamu. Abe mafuta aasalala aakunanika.
Unanike ngao itente lyambunganino, abbokesi lyacizuminano,
antafule azibelesyo zyayo zyoonse, acikazikilo camalampi azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, acipaililo catununkilizyo,
acipaililo cazituuzyo azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, acisambilo atako lyaco.
Uzisalazye zyoonse kuti zisalalisye loko, Kufumbwa uuziguma ulasalazigwa.
Alakwe Aroni abana bakwe, ubananike, ubasalazye, kuti bandimanine milimo yabupaizi.
Lino ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Oyu mungwimba uyooba mungwimba wangu uusalalisya wakunanika mumazyalani aanu oonse.
Tuukooyootilwa amubili wamuntu buyo, pe, alimwi tamweelede kweenga umwi uukozyene anguwo. Ulasalalisya. Usalalisye kulindinywe.
Kufumbwa muntu uuenga umwi uuli mbubo, nanka kunanika mweenzu anguwo, ulatandwa muciinga cakwe.
Lino ukacite tununkilizyo tuvwelene mbubonya mbwavwelanya simisamu. Tulungwe munyo mubotu uusalalisya.
Lino tumwi ututwe, ubike kunembo lyamagwalo aamilao mutente lyambunganino nkotunooswaninana ayebo. Tube cintu cisalalisya kulindinywe.
Atwalo tununkilizyo ntomucita, mutalicitili tumwi tuli boobu, pe. Tulamubeda cintu cisalalisya ca-Jehova.
Kufumbwa muntu uucita tumwi tuli boobu twakulinanika ulatandwa muciinga cakwe.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Bona! Ndaita Bezaleli mwana wa-Uri muzukulu wa-Huri, muntu wamusyobo wa-Juda.
Ndamuzuzya muuya wa-Leza, maanu abuuza, aluzibo lwamilimo yoonse,
acite zintu zyeebeka zyangolida azyansiliva azyamukuba,
akunyungaula mabwe aakunamatika, akubeza zisamu, akucita milimo yamisyobo yoonse,
Alimwi bona! Antoomwe ayooyo ndabika Aholiabu mwana wa-Ahisamaki, muntu wamusyobo wa-Dani, Alimwi mumyoyo yabasongo boonse ndabika busongo kuti bacite milimo yoonse njindakulailila:
Itente lyambunganino, abbokesi lyamulao, acuuno caluzyalo cili alindilyo, azibelesyo zyoonse zyatente,
antafule azibelesyo zyayo, acikazikilo cisalala camalampi azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, acipaililo cakutentela tununkilizyo,
acipaililo cazituuzyo zitentwa azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, acisambilo atako lyaco,
azyakusama zilukidwe, azyakusama zisalala zya-Aroni mupaizi, azyakusama zyabana bakwe zyakucitya milimo yabupaizi,
amafuta aakunanika, atununkilizyo tuli abweema twakubusena busalala. Zyoonse buyo nzindakulailila balazicira.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Ncobeni muleelede kubamba masabata aangu, nkaambo ncitondezyo akati kesu, nywebo ambebo, mumazyalani aanu oonse, muzibe kuti ndime Jehova uumusalazya.
Amubambe buzuba bwangu bwa-Sabata, nkaambo bulasalalisya kulindinywe. Kufumbwa uubusofwaazya ncobeni ulafwa. Kufumbwa muntu uubeleka milimo mubuzuba obo, oyo muntu ulatandwa muciinga cakwe.

Mazuba aali musanu abumwi kulacitwa milimo, pele mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili mbobuzuba bwa-Sabata bwakulyokezya, buzuba busalala kuli-Jehova, Kufumbwa muntu uucita milimo mubuzuba bwa-Sabata ncobeni uleelede kufwa.
Bana ba-Israyeli baleelede kubamba buzuba bwa-Sabata. Babambe Sabata mumazyalani aabo oonse, bube cizuminano citamani.
Ncitondezyo citamani akati kesu, mebo abana ba-Israyeli, nkaambo kakuti mamazuba aali musanu abumwi Jehova wakalenga ijulu anyika, pele mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili wakalyokezya akukatalukwa.
Mpoonya awo Aroni wakabaambila kuti, Amugwisye mankwintankwinta aangolida aali kumatwi aabanakazi banu abana banu balombe abasimbi, mwaalete kulindime.
Lino bantu boonse bakagwisya mankwinta-nkwinta­ aangolida aamumatwi aabo akwaaleta kuli-Aroni.
Amane kwaatambula kumaanza aabo, wakaabumba-bumba acibelesyo, wapanga moombe uufulidwe. Elyo bakati, Mbaaba baleza bako, O Israyeli, ibakamupozya mucisi ca-Egepita,
Alakwe Aroni, naakabona, wakayaka cipaililo kunembo lyakwe. Nkabela Aroni wakalailila kuti, Junza kuli ipobwe lyaJehova.
Lino nebwakaca, bakafuma kubuka, batuula zipaizyo, baleta zipaizyo zyakutontozya. Elyo bantu bakakala kukulya akunywa, alimwi bakanyampuka kukusobana.
Bafwambaana kusia inzila njindakabalailila, balicitila moombe uufulidwe, bamukomba, bamupaizizya, bati, Mbaaba baleza bako, O Israyeli, ibakamupozya mucisi ca-Egepita.
Alimwi Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Ndibwene bantu aba. Mbantu bayumu myoyo.
Undileke kuti bukali bwangu bubabukile canguzu, nkabanyonyoone, lino ndakucita yebo ube musyobo mupati.
Sa ncibotu kuti ba-Bgepita baambe kuti, Wakabapozezya bubi, kuti abajaye muzilundu akubanyonyoona, batabonwi limbi ansi. Leka bukali bwako buyoosya, utabisizyi bantu bako.

Ibaluka Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Israyeli balanda bako, mbowakakonkezya muzina lyako omwini cakwaamba kuti, Njoovuzya inyungu zyanu mbuli inyenyeezi zyakujulu, anyika eyi yoonse njendakasyomezya njooipa inyungu zyanu baivube lyoonse.
Mpawo Jehova wakalekelela bantu bakwe bubi mbwaakali kuyeeya kubacitila,
Mabwe akali mulimo wa-Leza, amalembo aalembedwe alingao Leza nguwakaalemba.
Lino Joshua naakamvwa kuyobayoba kwabantu, wakaambila Musa kuti, Ndamvwa lupyopyongano lwankondo kumalabba.
Pele wakati, Teensi majwi aabaabo bazunda nekuba bazundwa, pe. Ndamvwa majwi aabasikwiimba.
Nkabela naakasika kufwaafwi kuzilao aku bona moombe akuzyana, bukali bwaMusa bwakabuka, nkabela mabwe wakaasowa kuzwa kumaanza aakwe, akwaapwaya nkukonya oko kunsi lyacilundu.
Lino wakabweza moombe ngubakacitide, wamutenta mumulilo. Alimwi wakamuziya, wamwaya busu amaanzi, wanywisya bana ba-Israyeli.
Lino Musa wakaambila Aroni kuti, Ino bantu aba bakubisizyanzi? Nkaambonzi wabacitya bubi obu bupati?
Nkabela Aroni wakavuwa kuti, Bukali bwasimalelaangu butabuki. Ulizi bantu mbubabede. Myoyo yabo ilaanzikidwe kububi.
Bakandaambila kuti, Utucitile baleza bakutuzulwida, nkaambo oyo Musa, muntu iwakatugwisya munyika ya-Egepita, tatuzi na wasikilwanzi.
Elyo ndakabaambila kuti, Kufumbwa uujisi ingolida, aigwisye, ailete kulindime, Lino ndakaiwaala mumulilo, nkabela kwakazwa oyu moombe.
Elyo Musa naakabona kuti bantu tabaciyoowi abuniini kucita zitondwa, nkaambo Aroni wakabalekelela, kuti abausye insoni kuli basinkondonyina,
Musa wakaima kumulyango wamalabba, wati, Kufumbwa uuli kulubazu lwa-Jehova aboole kulindime. Elyo kwakamuyobolokela bana boonse ba-Levi.

Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza waIsrayeli, Soma umwi aumwi ipanga lyakwe akasolo kakwe, lino kamuya bweendeenda kumulyango umwi aumwi koonse kumalabba, mukajaye umwi aumwi mwanaakwabo, aumwi aumwi mweenzinyina, aumwi aumwi sikamukowanyina.
Elyo bana ba-Levi bakacita mbubonya mbwaakabalailila Musa, nkabela mubuzuba obo kwakajayigwa akati kabantu mbuli zyuulu zyotatwe.
Lino Musa wakati, mwalikazika kuti mube bapaizi ba-Jehova, umwi aumwi kumwanaakwe akumwanaakwabo, aboobo ulamupa coolwe buzuba obuno.
Nebwakaca Musa wakaambila bantu kuti, Mwacita zibi zipati. Lino ndainka kuli-Jehova, Ambweni ndakonzya kumuliyila mulandu.
Elyo Musa wakapiluka kuli-Jehova, wati, Maawe! Bantu aba bacitazibi zipati. Balipangila baleza bangolida.
Sa inga ulakonzya kubalekelela zibi zyabo? Na tokonzyi, uziminganye izina lyangu mubbuku lyako ndowakalemba.
Pele Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Oyo uundibisizya ngonguwe ngonjooziminganya mubbuku lyangu.
Mbubo, koya, ukazulwide bantu akubasisya kubusena mbdundakakwaambila, Ncobeni angelo wangu ulamuzulwida, Nekubaboobo mubuzuba bwakubauma njoobauma nkaambo kazibi zyabo.
Ndatuma angelo kumuzulwida, atande ba-Kanana aba-Amori aba-Hiti aba-Perizi aba-Hivi aba-Jebusi.
Kamuya kunyika iikunka malili abuci. Pele mebo nsikooinka akati kanu, pe, nkaambo muli bantu bayumu mumyoyo, Ambweni ngandaba nemujaya munzila.

Nkaambo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Muli bantu bayumu mumyoyo. Na ndeenda akati kanu kaindi kaniini buyo, inga ndamujaya. Lino amusamunune zyakucaula zyanu, nzibe na ndamucitilanzi.
Nkaambo kako bana ba-Israyeli bakasamununa zyakucaula zyabo kuzwa kucilundu ca-Horebu akuya kunembo.
Lino Musa naakainka kuya kutente, bantu oonse bakali kunyampuka akwiimikila umwi aumwi kumulyango wacilao cakwe, nkabela bakali kulangilizya Musa mane wanjila mutente.
Lino Musa naakanjila mutente, musumpululu wajoba wakali kuseluka akwiimikila kumulyango watente, Elyo Jehova wakali kwaambaula a-Musa mpoonya awo.
Nkabela bantu boonse nebakabona kuti musumpululu wajoba uliimvwi kumulyango watente, bantu boonse bakanyampuka, bakomba, umwi aumwi kumulyango wacilao cakwe.
Aboobo Jehova wakali kwaambaula a-Musa kubusyu abusyu mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwaambaula amweenzinyina, Elyo Musa naakapiluka kumalabba, mulanda wakwe mulombe Joshua mwana wa-Nuni, katazwi mutente.
Na ncobeni ndijene luzyalo mumeso aako, kondizibya inzila zyako, nkakuzibe akujana luzyalo mumeso aako. Alimwi bona! Aba bantu musyobo wako.
Wakati, Tulaya anywebo, alimwi ndakupa kulyokezya.
Wakaamba kuti, na tatwiinki ayebo, utatugwisyi kuzwa ano.
Nkaambo kulazibwa buti kuti ndijene luzyalo kumeso aako, mebo abantu bako? Sa: takuli kuya aswe, kuti twaandaane, mebo abantu bako, kubantu boonse bali ansi.
Wakati, Unditondezye bulemu bwako.

Wakati, Ndainzya bubotu bwangu boonse kumeso aako, alyalo izina lyangu lya-Jehova ndaliyubulula mumatwi aako. Kufumbwa ngunjanda kweetelela njoomweetelela, akufumbwa ngonjanda kufwida luzyalo njoomufwida luzyalo.
Pele wakati, Tokonzyi kubona busyu bwangu pe, nkaambo taakwe muntu uukonzya kubona busyu bwangu akupona.
Nkabela Jehova wakati, Bona! Busena nkobuli okuno nkombede. Ndakwiimika atala andomba.
Lino bulemu bwangu bwanooinda, ndakubika mulwaanzi lwandomba, ndakuvumba ajanza lyangu mane nkaindilile.
Ndamana kwiinda ndagwisya ijanza lyangu, aboobo ulabona isule lyangu, pele busyu bwangu tokoobubona pe.
Kolibambila cifumo. Bwaca buyo, utante kucilundu ca-Sinai, ukaime mpoonya awo kubusyu bwangu atala acilundu.
Kutabi muntu uukusindikila, alimwi kutaboneki muntu moonse mucilundu; azyalo imbelele aŋombe zitaceli kucilundu.

Elyo Musa wakabeza mabwe obile aapapalete mbubonya mbuli mataanzi, nkabela buce buyo, wakafuma, watanta kucilundu ca-Sfnai mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamulailila, wabweza mabwe obile aapapalete mujanza lyakwe.
Mpawo Jehova wakaseluka mujoba, waimikila awe mpoonya awo, wamuyubunwida izina lya-Jehova.
Jehova wakainda kubusyu bwakwe, waamba, wati, Jehova! Jehova! Leza siluzyalo asibuuya uutafwambi kukalala, uuzwide luse alusyomo,
uufwida bantu bali zyuulu luzyalo, uujatila milandu andeyo azibi, nekubaboobo talulamiki bataluleme; ulauma bana abazukulu nkaambo kazibi zyabamawisi mane kusikila kuzyalani lyatatu na lyane.
Elyo Musa wakafwambaana kukotamika mutwe ansi, wakomba.
Nkabela wakati, Na ncobeni ndijene luzyalo mumeso aasimalelaangu, simalelaangu aende akati kesu, nekuba kuti bantu mbayumu myoyo. Utulekelele milandu yesu azibi zyesu, utubambe tube bako.
Lino bika moyo wako kumakani ngendakulailila buzuba obuno, Bona! Ndatanda kubusyu bwako ba-Amori, ba-Kanana, ba-Hiti, ba-Perizi, ba-Hivi, aba-Jebusi.
Cenjela! Utatangi cizuminano abantu bakede munyika eyo nkoyoosika, kuti makani atamubedi kakole.
Zipaililo zyabo muleelede kuzimwaya, minsemu yabo muleelede kwiijaya, azisamu zyabo zya-Asera muleelede kuzigonka.
Tamweelede kukomba Leza umbi pe, nkaambo Jehova ngu-Leza sibufwi: izina lyakwe ngu-Sibufwi.
Amucenjele kuti mutatangi cizuminano abantu bakede munyika; ambweni ngabaya buvuula abaleza babo akupaizizya baleza babo balamutamba kuti mulye zipaizyo zyabo,
lino mulaselela bana banu balombe bana babo basimbi kuti babakwate, nkabela bana babo basimbi balavuula abaleza babo akuvuuzya abalo bana banu balombe abaleza babo,
Boonse bazyale bataanzi mbibangu; iŋombe zyanu zyaalumi zyoonse, bazyale bataanzi baŋombe abambelele.

Mwana mutaanzi wambongolo uleelede kumununuzya kabelele, Na wabula kumunununa, uleelede kumutyola insingo, Bana balombe banu bataanzi muleelede kubanununa, alimwi tabeelede kuboneka kubusyu bwangu acinkwamaanza.
Alimwi ulye ipobwe lya-Pentekoste, notebula kabalwebalwe kabulotwe bwako, apobwe lyakutebula kumamanino aamwaka.
Ziindi zyotatwe mumwaka baalumi banu boonse baleelede kulibonya kubusyu bwa-Mwami Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Nkaambo njootanda misyobo imwi kubusyu bwanu akukomezya nyika yanu, alimwi takukooyooba muntu uuyanda kutola nyika yanu kuziindi zyakuboneka kubusyu bwaJehova Leza wako, ziindi zyotatwe mumwaka.
Kabalwebalwe kamicelo yanyika yako kaletwe kuŋanda ya-Jehova Leza wako. Utajiki mwana wampongo mumalili aabanyina.
Elyo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Lemba majwi aya, nkaambo nditangene cizuminano ayebo aba-Israyeli mbubonya mbuli majwi aya.

Nkabela wakalikede nkukonya oko kuliJehova mazuba aali makumi one, isikati amasiku. Taakwe naakalya insima nekuba kunywa maanzi, Nkabela wakalemba amabwe aapapalete majwi aacizuminano, majwi aamilazyo iili ikumi.
Pele Aroni abana boonse ba-Israyeli nebakabona Musa, bakabona kuti cikanda cabusyu bwakwe cakali kumweka, nkabela bakayoowa kuswena afwaafwi.
Lino Musa wakabaita, mane lumwi Aroni abapati boonse bambungano bakaboola kulinguwe, elyo wakaambaula abo.
Kusule lyayaaya abalo bana ba-Israyeli boonse bakaswena afwiifwi, nkabela wakabalailila makani oonse Jehova ngaakamwaambila mucilundu ca-Sinai.
Amane kubaambila, Musa wakalivumba cisani kubusyu bwakwe.
Pele Musa naakanjila kukwaambaula a-Jehova, wakalivumbulula cisani mane wazwa. Nkabela naakazwa kuzooambila bana ba-Israyeli makani malailile,
bana ba-Israyeli nebakabona busyu bwa-Musa, bakabona kuti cikanda cabusyu bwa-Musa cilamweka, aboobo Musa wakalivumba alimwi isani kubusyu bwakwe mane wakapiluka kuyooambaula awe.
Mazuba aali musanu abumwi mubeleke milimo, pele buzuba bwamusanu aabili mbobuzuba busalalisya bwa-Sa bata, buzuba bwakulyokezya bwaJehova. Kufumbwa muntu uucita milimo mulimbubo ajayigwe.
Mutadukuli mililo mumaanda aanu oonse mubuzuba bwa-Sabata.
Amubwezele Jehova cipaizyo akati kanu, Kufumbwa muntu uuli amoyo uuzumina aletele Jehova cipaizyo: ingolida ansiliva amukuba,
masani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu, amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu, aboya bwampongo,
azikanda zyabagutu zisalazidwe, amatobo, azisamu zyamuunga,
mafuta aamalampi, misamu yamafuta aakunana ayatununkilizyo,
amabwe aaonukusi amabwe aakusyomaika mu-efodi amusani lyakaango.
cikombelo atente lyaco acivumbilizyo caco, zijatilizyo zyaco aminsende yaco, minkulu yaco amisumpululu yaco azikazikilo zyaco,
ibbokesi lyacizuminano amiziyo yalyo, acuuno caluzyalo acisitilizyo cakuvumba,
intafule amiziyo yalyo azibelesyo zyalyo zyoonse, azinkwa zyamabonwabonwa,
acikazikilo camalampi azibelesyo zyaco amalampi aaco, amafuta aakumunisya,
acipaililo catununkilizyo amiziyo yaco, amafuta aakunana atununkilizyo tubotu, acisitilizyo camulyango kumulyango watente;
cipaililo cazituuzyo zyakutenta, akansabwe kaco kamukuba, miziyo yaco azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, cisambilo atako lyaco;
zisitilizyo zyalubuwa amisumpululu yalo azikazikilo zyalo, acisitilizyo cakumulyango walubuwa;
manembe aacikombelo amanembe aalubuwa antambo zyaco;
zikobela zyamanyengwe zyakucitya milimo yabupaizi mubusena busalala, zikobela zisalala zya-Aroni mupaizi azikobela zyabana bakwe zyakupaizya.
Mpawo imbungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli yakamwaika kuzwa kuliMusa.

Nkabela muntu umwi aumwi, na moyo wakwe wakamubusya, alimwi miyeeyo yakwe yakamuzuminizya, wakeza kuletela Jehova cipaizyo cakubelesya milimo yatente lyambunganino amilimo yalyo yoonse azikobela zisalala.
Kwakeza baalumi abanakazi, boonse ibakayandisya mumyoyo yabo, akuleta zisita atucoco anwenwe amakwaza azintu zyoonse zyangolida. Boonse bakatuula ingolida kuli-Jehova.

Alimwi kufumbwa muntu iwakajisi masani aanyanzabili, na masani aakamwemvwe, na masani aasalalapyu, na masani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu, na boya bwampongo, na zikanda zyabagutu zisalazidwe na zitobo, bakazileta.
Alimwi kufumbwa muntu iwakakonzya kutuula cituuzyo cansiliva na camukuba wakaleta cituuzyo cakwe kuli-Jehova, Ayooyo iwakajisi zisamu zyamuunga zyakucitya milimo imwi aimwi wakazileta.
Abanakazi boonse ibakacenjede mumyoyo bakali kuluka, elyo ziluko zyabo bakazileta, masani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu.
Abanakazi boonse ibakayandisya ibakezi kuluka bakali kuluka boya bwampongo.
Abalo basilutwe bakaleta mabwe aaonukusi amabwe aakusyomaika muefodi amusani lyakaango,
amisamu yatununkilizyo, amafuta aamalampi, amafuta aakunana, atununkilizyo tubotu.
Boonse baalumi abanakazi, bana ba-Israyeli ibakayandisya mumyoyo yabo kuleta cintu cakugwasya milimo yoonse Jehova njaakalailila kucitwa kujanza lya-Musa, bakazileta camoyo woonse kuli-Jehova.
Wamuzuzya muuya wa-Leza, busongo amaanu aluzibo lwamilimo yoonse,
acite zintu zyeebeka zyangolida azyansiliva azyamukuba,
agonkaule mabwe aakusyomaika, akubeza zisamu, akucita milimo yoonse yamisyobo misyobo.
Alimwi wamupa moyo wakwiisya bamwi, walo a-Aholiabu mwana wa-Ahisamaki muntu wamusyobo wa-Dani.

Wabazuzya busongo bwakucita milimo yoonse, milimo yabubezi, na milimo yakunyembanyemba, na milimo yakutunga masani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu, na milimo yakuluka. Balibwene kucita milimo yoonse akupanga zintu zyoonse.
nkabela bakatambula kumaanza aa-Musa inkambilizyo yoonse bana ba-Israyeli njibakaleta kukubelesya milimo yacikombelo. Bakacili kuleta zipo cifumo cimwi acimwi,
mane lumwi bantu bacenjede ibakali kucita milimo yoonse yacikombelo, balaleka umwi aumwi milimo yakwe njaakali kucita, beza,
baambila Musa kuti, Zintu nzibaleta bantu zyavula kwiinda mweelwe uuyandwa kukucita milimo Jehova njaakalailila.
Mpawo Musa wakalailila, nkabela mulazyo wakatumwa kumalawo oonse wakuti, Kutabi mwaalumi naba mwanakazi uuleta limbi cituuzyo camilimo yacikombelo. Aboobo bantu bakalesegwa kuleta,
nkaambo zintu nzibakaletede zyakazulila milimo yoonse akwiindilila,
Bulamfu bwacisitilizyo cimwi acimwi bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu atutatu, abwaamba bwacisitilizyo cimwi acimwi bwakali tukokola tone, Zisitilizyo zyoonse zyakali amweelwe omwe uuelene.
Nkabela zisitilizyo zyosanwe wakaziswanaanya cimwi acimwi kuceenzinyina, azyalo zisitilizyo zimwi zyosanwe wakaziswanaanya cimwi acimwi kuceenzinyina.
Alimwi wakacita zyaanzikilo zyanyanzabili kumoombe wacisitilizyo caanze cacipanzi citaanzi; akwalo kumoombe wacisitilizyo caanze cacipanzi cabili wakacita mbubonya.

Wakacita zyaanzikilo zili makumi osanwe kumoombe wacisitilizyo citaanzi, azyaanzikilo zili makumi osanwe kumoombe wacisitilizyo cacipanzi cabili, Zyaanzikilo zyakali kulungana cimwi acimwi kuceenzinyina.
Alimwi wakacita zijatilizyo zyangolida zili makumi osanwe, zyakuswanaanya zisitilizyo cimwi acimwi kuceenzinyina aboobo itente lyakaba lyomwe.
Bulamfu bwacisitilizyo cimwi acimwi bwakali tukokola tuli makumi otatwe, abwaamba bwacisitilizyo bwakali tukokola tone, Zisitilizyo zyoonse zili ikumi acimwi zyakaleelene.
Nkabela wakaswanaanya zisitilizyo zyosanwe zilike, azisitilizyo zili musanu acimwi azilike.
Alimwi wakacita zyaanzikilo zili makumi osanwe kumoombe wacisitilizyo caanze cacipanzi citaanzi, azyaanzikilo zili makumi osanwe kumoombe wacisitilizyo caanze cacipanzi cabili.
Nkabela wakacita zijatilizyo zyamukuba zili makumi osanwe zyakuswanaanya itente kuti libe lyomwe.
Alimwi wakacitila itente cakuvumbya camatobo aabagutu aasalazidwe acakuvumba cazipaya kujulu.
Bulamfu bwamunsende umwi bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi, abwaamba bwamunsende bwakali kakokola komwe acisela.
Munsende umwi aumwi kaujisi ziswanizizyo zyobile kuti iswanaane umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina, Mbuboobo mbwaakacita minsende yoonse yacikombelo.
Aminsende yacikombelo njaakacita njeeyi: minsende iili makumi obile kulubazu lwakumusanza,
alimwi kunsi lyaminsende eyo iili makumi obile waka panga zikazikilo zyansiliva zili makumi one, nkokuti zikazikilo zyobile kunsi lyamunsende umwi aumwi aziswanizizyo zyawo zyobile.
Akwalo kulubazu lwabili lwacikombelo, lubazu lwakunyika, wakacita minsende iili makumi obile,
azikazikilo zyayo zyansiliva, zikazikilo zyobile kunsi lyamunsende umwi aumwi.
Akusule lyacikombelo kumbo wakacita minsende iili musanu aumwi,
alimwi kuzyooko zyacikombelo kusule wakacita minsende yobile.
Yakalaanzeene ansi, pele kujulu yakaliswaneene kuncoko intaanzi. Mbwaakacita yoonse yobile kuzyooko zyobile.
Minsende yakali musanu aitatu azikazikilo zyayo zyansiliva, nkokuti zikazikilo zili ikumi amusanu acimwi, zikazikilo zyobile kunsi lyamunsende umwi aumwi,
aminkulu yosanwe yaminsende yakulubazu lwabili, aminkulu yosanwe yaminsende yakusule lyacikombelo kumbo.
Amunkulu waakati wakaucita kuti usike kumpela zyoonse zyobile akatikati kaminsende.
Lino wakaziluluzya minsende ingolida akwiicitila incoko zyangolida zyakujatya minkulu. Ayalo minkulu wakaiziluluzya ingolida.
Alimwi wakacicitila misumpululu yone yamuunga akwiiziluluzya ingolida, Manembe aayo akali aangolida, alimwi wakaifulila zikazikilo zyone zyansiliva.
Nkabela wakacita civumbyo kumulyango watente. Cakatungwa amasani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu;
amisumpululu yaco amanembe aayo. Mitwe yayo azijatyo zyayo zyakali zyangolida, pele zikazikilo zyayo zyosanwe zyakali zyamukuba.
Nkabela wakaliziluluzya ingolida iisalala koonse koonse, mukati aanze; alimwi wakalicitila moombe wangolida cakuzinguluka.
Lino wakalifulila incoko zyone zyangolida amabazu aalyo one: incoko zyobile kulubazu lumwi, ancoko zyobile kulubazu alumwi.
Alimwi wakabeza miziyo yamuunga, waiziluluzya ingolida,
wabika miziyo muncoko kumabazu aabbokesi, ibe yakuyumuzya ibbokesi.
Alimwi wakacita cuuno caluzyalo cangolida iisalala. Bulamfu bwaco bwakali tukokola tobile acisela, abwaamba bwaco kakokola komwe acisela.
Nkabela wakapanga bakerubi bobile bangolida yacifulamubisi kumpela zyobile zyacuuno caluzyalo;
umwi kerubi kali kumpela imwi akerubi umwi kumpela imwi; bakalijatilide mucuuno caluzyalo kumpela zyaco zyobile.
Bakerubi bakalitandabikide maboko aabo kujulu cakuvumbilila cuuno caluzyalo, amasyu aabo akalilangene. Masyu aabakerubi­ akali kulanga cuuno caluzyalo,
Wakaiziluluzya ingolida iisalala, akwiifulila moongola wangolida cakuzyunguluka.
Alimwi wakaicitila mubalo uuzingulukide uuli abwaamba bwajanza, ayooyo mubalo kauli amoongola wangolida koonse koonse.
Alimwi wakaifulila incoko zyone zyangolida akubika incoko kuzyooko zyone zyakumaulu aayo.
Kufwaafwi kumubalo kwakabikwa incoko, zijate miziyo yakuyumuzya intafule.
Miziyo wakaibezya muunga, waiziluluzya ingolida, ibe yakuyumuzya intafule.
Azyalo zibelesyo zyantafule wakazicitya ingolida iisalala: mitiba yayo, azilongo zyayo, amfulu zyayo zyakupaizya.
Nkabela mumabazu aaco mwakazwa mitabi iili musanu aumwi; yotatwe kulubazu lumwi alumwi lwaciimikilo.
Mutabi umwi aumwi kaubezedwe ankomeki zyotatwe zili mbuli micelo yaalmondi, zili atunkuli amalubaluba; mitabi yoonse iili musanu aumwi iizwa kuciimikilo mbuyakacitidwe.
Aalo aciimikilo cini akabezwa inkomeki zyone zili mbuli micelo yaalmondi, zili atunkuli amalubaluba.
Alimwi kwakali kankuli kunsi lyamitabi yobile, akamwi kunsi lyamitabi yobile, akamwi kunsi lyamitabi yobile, kumitabi yoonse iili musanu aumwi iizwa kuciimikilo.
Tunkuli amitabi, zyoonse kazijatilide mulincico, coonse cacifulamubisi, ingolida iisalala.
Alimwi wakacicitila malampi aali musanu aabili, amano zyaco ankaye zyaco; zyoonse zyakali zyangolida iisalala.
Ciimikilo azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse wakazicita atalenta lyomwe lyangolida.
Wakaciziluluzya ingolida iisalala: mutwe waco amabazu aaco ameja aaco. Alimwi wakacifulila moongola wangolida koonse koonse.
Akunsi lyamoongola kumabazu aaco, kumabazu aaco oonse obile, wakacita incoko zyangolida zyakuseka miziyo yakuyumuzya.
Ayalo miziyo wakaibezya muunga akwiiziluluzya ingolida.
Alimwi wakakondola mafuta aasalala aakunana, atununkilizyo tusalala tubotu, mbubonya mbwacita mweengi wamafuta.
Nkabela wakacicitila meja azyooko zyaco zyone. Meja aaco akalikumbetene aco. Lino wakaciziluluzya mukuba.
Alimwi wakacita zibelesyo zyoonse zyacipaililo: zilongo zyaco, amaliko aaco, amitiba yaco, aziyasyo zyaco, anzila zyaco. Zibelesyo zyoonse wakazicitya mukuba.
Alimwi wakacitila cipaililo kansabwe kamukuba, Ako kansabwe wakakabika kunsi lyalupimpito lwacipaililo, kakalengelela bulamfu bwacisela cacipaililo.
Alimwi wakafula incoko zyone kuzyooko zyone zyakansabwe kamukuba, zibe zyakujatilizya miziyo.
Ayalo miziyo wakaibeza amuunga akwiiziluluzya mukuba.
Elyo wakasekka miziyo muncoko zyakumabazu aacipaililo, kuti ibe yakuciyumuzya, Wakaciyaka bufokokede amapulanga.
Misumpululu yazyo yakuli makumi obile, azikazikilo zyazyo zyakali makumi obile; zyoonse zyakalicitidwe amukuba, pele nembe zyamisumpululu aminkulu yayo zyakalicitidwe ansiliva.

Akwalo kulubazu lwakunyika kakuli tukokola tuli mwanda. Misumpululu yazyo yakali makumi obile, azikazikilo zyazyo zyakali makumi obile. Zyakali zyamukuba, pele nembe zyamisumpululu aminkulu yayo zyakali zyansiliva.
Akulubazu lwakumbo kakuli zisitilizyo, tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, Misumpululu yazyo yakali ikumi, azikazikilo zyazyo zyakali ikumi. Inembe zyamisumpululu aminkulu yayo zyakali zyansiliva.
Alimwi kulubazu lwakujwe kakuli tukokola tuli makumi osanwe.
Kuntu kulengelela masani kulubazu lumwi lwamulyango kakuli abulamfu bwatukokola tuli ikumi amusanu, Oko misumpululu yakali yotatwe, azikazikilo zyakali zyotatwe.
Akwalo kuntu kulengelela masani kulubazu lwabili lwamulyango kakuli abulamfu bwatukokola tuli ikumi amusanu, Misumpululu yakali yotatwe, azikazikilo zyakali zyotatwe.
Zisitilizyo zyoonse zyalubuwa kumabazu oonse zyakalitungidwe amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu.

Matako aamisumpululu akali aamukuba, pele nembe zyamisumpululu aminkulu yayo zyakali zyansiliva. Ayalo mitwe yamisumpululu yakalizilulwidwe insiliva, amisumpululu yoonse yalubuwa yakali aminkulu yansiliva.

Nkabela cisitilizyo camulyango walubuwa cakalitungidwe amasani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu. Bulamfu bwaco bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile, abwaamba bwaco, nkokuti bwiime bwaco, bwakali tukokola tosanwe.
Alimwi misumpululu yaco yakali yone, azikazikilo zyayo zyakali zyamukuba, Inembe zyazyo zyakali zyansiliva, ayalo mitwe yazyo aminkulu yazyo yakalizilulwidwe insiliva.
Zyoonse inkambilizyo zyatente azyalubuwa loonse zyakali zyamukuba,
Bezaleli mwana wa-Uri muzukulu wa-Huri waluzubo lwa-Juda nguwakacita zintu zyoonse Jehova nzyaakalailila Musa.
Kali antoomwe a-Aholiabu mwana waAhisamaki waluzubo lwa-Dani, similimo muuza, sikutunga masani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu.
Ayalo insiliva njibakapa basimbungano yakali matalenta aali mwanda amasyekeli aali cuulu amyanda iili musanu aibili amakumi aali musanu aabili amusanu, mbubonya mbuli isyekeli lyacikombelo.

Muntu umwi aumwi wakaliya beka (nkokuti cisela casyekeli, mbubonya mbuli isyekeli lyacikombelo), Mbubakacita boonse buyo ibakalembedwe, ibakali amyaka iili makumi obile na kusotoka, bantu bali zyuulu zili myanda iili musanu aumwi azyuulu zyotatwe amyanda yosanwe amakumi osanwe:

Ayo matalenta aansiliva aali mwanda akali aakufuzya zikazikilo zyacikombelo azikazikilo zyacisitilizyo. Zikazikilo zili mwanda zyakafulidwe amatalenta aali mwanda, nkokuti italenta lyomwe kucikazikilo cimwi acimwi.
Alimwi masyekeli aali cuulu amyanda iili musanu aibili amakumi aali musanu aabili amusanu, ngengao ngaakabelesya kukufulila misumpululu inembe akukuziluluzya mitwe yayo akukwiicitila minkulu.
Awalo mukuba iwakapegwa wakaba matalenta aali makumi aali musanu aabili amasyekeli aali zyuulu zyobile amyanda yone.
Ngonguwo wakabelesegwa kukucita matako aamulyango watente lyambunganino, cipaililo camukuba akansabwe kaco kamukuba azibelesyo zyoonse zyacipaililo,
azikazikilo zyalubuwa lwaanze, azikazikilo zyamulyango walubuwa, anembe zyoonse zyacikombelo anembe zyoonse zyalubuwa lwaanze.
Bakabambasika ingolida, baiandaula, bacita tukole twatuwayile twakutunga mumasani aanyanzabili­ amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu kukucita mampyali.
Alimwi bakacita intambo zyamakuko kumpela zyaco zyobile zyakuciswanizya.

Alwalo lutambo lwaco lweebeka lwakucaanzya lwakapangwa mbubonya, angolida amasani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Alimwi wakabweza mabwe aaonukusi, waazyungulusya tuwayile twangolida, walemba alingawo mbubonya mbukulembwa anwenwe, walemba mazina aabana ba-Israyeli.
Aya mabwe wakaabika antambo zyamakuko, abe mabwe aaciibalusyo aabana ba-Israyeli, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Cakacitwa azyooko zyone zyeelene, alimwi kacipimpidwe; bulamfu bwaco bwakali cisela cakakokola, abwaamba bwaco bwakali cisela cakakokola, necakapimpwa.
Nkabela mukati kaco bakabika milongo yone yamabwe. Mumulongo mutaanzi kamuli ibbwe lisalala pyu abbwe lyatopazi abbwe lyasmaragido.
Mumulongo wabili kamuli ibbwe lyanofeki abbwe lya-Safiro abbwe lyajaspi.
Mumulongo watatu kamuli ibbwe lyaliguri abbwe lyaagate abbwe lyaamutusto.
Mumulongo wane kamuli ibbwe lyaberulo abbwe lyaonukusi abbwe lyakrusalito. Oonse akabikwa mutuwayile twangolida.

Mabwe akali ikumi aabili, akali amazina mbubonya mbuli mazina aabana ba-Israyeli. Akalembwa mbubonya mbuli inwenwe mbwiilembwa; limwi alimwi kalili azina lyamusyobo walyo akati kamisyobo iili kumi aibili.
Alimwi cisani cakaango bakacicitila inketani zyangolida iisalala zyoosedwe mbuli tukole.
Nkabela bakacita mawayile obile aangolida ancoko zyobile zyangolida; bakabika incoko zyobile kuzyooko zyobile zyacisani cakaango.
Lino bakaseka intambo zyobile zyangolida muncoko zyobile zyakuzyooko zyacisani cakaango.
Nkabela impela zyobile zyantambo bakazyaanzya mawayile obile, aboobo bakaciswanizya amaanza aacisani cakaango kunembo.
Elyo bakafula incoko zyobile zyangolida, bazibika mumpimpito zyobile zyacisani cakaango kulubazu lwaco lubambene aefodi mukati.
Alimwi bakafula incoko zyobile zyangolida, bazibika antambo zyamakuko zyaefodi, kumeso, ansi, nkociswaninana alukumba lwaefodi luosedwe camaanu,

Elyo cisani cakaango bakacaanzya incoko zyaco kuncoko zyaefodi alukole lwakamwemvwe, kuti cibe atala lyalukumba lwaefodi, cisani cakaango citaangununwi kuli efodi, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Cikobela kacijisi cipulo camutwe akati mbuli cipulo cankausu, Cakagomenwa koonse koonse kuti citazambuluki.
Akwalo kunsi lyacikobela bakatungilila micelo yamapomegranite amasani aanyanzabili amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu amasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu.
Alimwi bakapanga milangu yangolida iisalala, babika milangu koonse koonse akati kamapomegranite kumoombe wacikobela:
mulangu apomegranite, mulangu apomegranite, koonse koonse kumoombe wacikobela cabupaizi, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
acitambala camasani aatuba, ansulumani zyamasani aatuba, atubbudula twamasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu,
alukumba lunyekawidwe lwamasani aatuba aalukidwe kabotu amasani aanyanzabili­ amasani aakamwemvwe amasani aasalala pyu, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Bakalanga alukole lwakamwemvwe lwakwiianzya kucitambala kujulu, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Elyo bakaletela Musa cikombelo, itente azibelesyo zyalyo zyoonse, zijatilizyo zyaco, minsende yaco, minkulu yaco, misumpululu yaco, azikazikilo zyaco;
zyakuvumbya itente zyazikanda zyabagutu zisalazidwe, azipaya, acisitilizyo cakuvumbilizya;
ibbokesi lyacizuminano amiziyo yalyo, acuuno caluzyalo;
intafule azibelesyo zyayo zyoonse, azinkwa zyamabonwabonwa;
cikazikilo camalampi cangolida iisalala, amalampi aakubika mpawo, azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse; amafuta aakumunisya;
cipaililo cangolida, amafuta aakunanika, atununkilizyo tubotu, acisitilizyo cakumulyango watente;
cipaililo camukuba akansabwe kaco kamukuba, miziyo yaco azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse; cisambilo atako lyaco;
zisitilizyo zyalubuwa, misumpululu yalo azikazikilo zyalo, acisitilizyo cakumulyango walubuwa, antambo zyawo, anembe zyawo, azibelesyo zyoonse zyacikombelo catente lyambunganino,
zikobela zyamanyengwe zyakucitya milimo yabupaizi mubu sena busalalisya, zyakusama zya-Aroni mupaizi, azyakusama zyabana bakwe zyakucitya milimo yabupaizi.
Mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa, bana ba-Israyeli bakacita milimo yoonse buyo.
Nkabela Musa naakabona milimo yoonse njibakacita, wakajana kuti bacita zintu zyoonse mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila. Elyo Musa wakabalongezya.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Mubuzuba butaanzi bwamwezi mutaanzi uleelede kwiimika cikombelo catente lyambunganino.
Bika mulincico ibbokesi lyamilao, alimwi usitilizye ibbokesi acisitilizyo.
Njizya intafule akwiibamba mbokweelede. Acalo cikazikilo camalampi, ucinjizye akwiimika malampi aaco.
Alimwi bika cipaililo cangolida cakutentela tununkilizyo kunembo lyabbokesi lyamilao, akwiimika cisitilizyo camulyango wacikombelo.
Acalo cipaililo cazituuzyo uciimike kunembo lyamulyango wacikombelo catente lyambunganino.
Alimwi bika cisambilo akatikati katente lyambunganino acipaililo, ubike maanzi mulincico.
Alimwi bamba lubuwa lwakuzyungulusya akubika cisitilizyo kumulyango walubuwa.
Lino bweza mafuta aakunanika, ukananike cikombelo azintu zyoonse zili mulincico. Ucisalazye azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, zisalale.
Alimwi unanike cipaililo cazituuzyo azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, ukasalazye cipaililo, aboobo cipaililo cilasalalisya loko.
Acalo cisambilo atako lyaco, uzinanike akuzisalazya.
Wamana obo, leta Aroni abana bakwe kumulyango watente lyambunganino, ubasanzye amaanzi.
Lino samika Aroni zyakusama zisalalisya, alimwi umunanike akumusalazya, andibelekele milimo yabupaizi.
Abalo bana bakwe ubaswenye afwaafwi akubasamika zibaki,
alimwi ubananike mbubonya mbowananika wisaabo, kuti bandibelekele milimo yabupaizi. Kunanikwa kwabo kunoobapa bupaizi butamani mumazyalani aabo oonse,
Lino Musa wakacita obo. Wakacita zintu zyoonse buyo nzyaakamulailila Jehova.
Nkabela mumwezi mutaanzi wamwaka wabili, mubuzuba butaanzi bwamumwezi, cikombelo cakaimikwa.
Musa wakaimika cikombelo, wakakazika zikazikilo zyaco, waimika impanda zyaco, wabika minkulu yaco, waimika misumpululu yaco.
Alimwi wakavungulula itente atala lyacikombelo, wacivumbya itente, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Elyo wakabweza ibbuku lyamilao, walibika mubbokesi. Alimwi wakanjizya miziyo yabbokesi, akubika cuuno caluzyalo atala lyabbokesi.
Lino wakanjizya ibbokesi mucikombelo, waanzika cisitilizyo cakusitilizya ibbokesi lyacizuminano, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila.
Alimwi wakabika intafule mutente lyambunganino, kulubazu lwacikombelo lwakunyika, anze lyacisitilizyo,
nkabela wakabamba zinkwa alindilyo kubusyu bwa-Jehova, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Alimwi wakabika cikazikilo camalampi mutente lyambunganino cilangene antafule, kulubazu lwakumusanza lwacikombelo,
nkabela wakabika malampi alincico kubusyu bwa-Jehova, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Lino wakabika cipaililo cangolida mutente lyambunganino kunembo lyacisitilizyo,
watenta tununkilizyo tubotu alincico, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Alimwi wakabamba cisitilizyo cakuvumbya mulyango wacikombelo.
Acalo cipaililo cazituuzyo wakacibika kumulyango wacikombelo catente lyambunganino, watuula alincico cituuzyo citentwa acituuzyo cabusu, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Alimwi wakabika cisambilo akatikati katente lyambunganino acipaililo, wabika maanzi aakusamba mulincico,
kuti Aroni abana bakwe basambe kumaanza akumaulu.
Kufumbwa ciindi nebakali kunjila mutente lyambunganino, nanka kuswena afwaafwi kucipaililo, bakali kusamba, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Alimwi wakaimika lubuwa lwakuzyungulusya cikombelo acipaililo, akubika cisitilizyo cakusitilizya mulyango walubuwa, Aboobo Musa wakamanisya milimo yoonse,
Musa wakakacilwa kunjila mutente lyambunganino, nkaambo kakuti ijoba lyakalikede ajulu, abulemu bwaJehova bwakazuzya cikombelo.
Lino mukweenda kwabo koonse, na ijoba lyakazwa kucikombelo, bana ba-Israyeli bakatola lweendo lwabo,
pele na ijoba teelyakagwisigwa, kabateendi pe mane kusikila kubuzuba bwakugwisigwa kwalyo.
Nkaambo ijoba lya-Jehova lyakalikede acikombelo ciindi casikati, amulilo ciindi camasiku, mumeso aaluzubo lwa-Israyeli, mukweenda kwabo koonse.
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Na kuli muntu akati kanu uuyanda kuletela Jehova cituuzyo, amusale zituuzyo zyanu kuzwa kumatanga aaŋombe nanka aambelele.
Abike ijanza lyakwe amutwe wacituuzyo, lino cilatambulika kukumanya milandu yakwe.
Amane kucita obo, ajaye iŋombe kubusyu bwa-Jehova, Lino bapaizi bana ba-Aroni batambule bulowa, basansaile bulowa koonse koonse cakuzyunguluka cipaililo cili kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Lino afunde cituuzyo akucitendaula muzipanzi zyaco,
abalo bana ba-Aroni mupaizi babike mulilo acipaililo akubamba inkuni amulilo.
Lino bapaizi, bana ba-Aroni, babambe zipanzi, mutwe amafuta atala ankuni zili amulilo uuli acipaililo;
pele mala amyeendo bazisanzye amaanzi. Lino mupaizi atente zyoonse buyo acipaililo, zibe cituuzyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Na cituuzyo cakwe cakutenta nimbelele nanka impongo, asale mucende uutakwe kampenda.
Lino uleelede kumujaya kulubazu lwakunyika lwacipaililo kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Bapaizi, bana ba-Aroni, basansaile bulowa bwakwe koonse koonse cakuzyunguluka cipaililo.
Amutendaule muzipanzi, antoomwe amutwe amafuta, elyo mupaizi amubambe atala ankuni zili amulilo uuli acipaililo.
Pele mala amyeendo, uleelede kuzisanzya amaanzi, Lino mupaizi acipaizye coonse, acitente acipaililo, cibe cituuzyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Lino mupaizi alete kayuni kucipaililo, anyone mutwe, autente acipaililo, pele bulowa bwako butilwe kulubazu lwacipaililo.
Amana obo, agwisye ciyangilo amapepe, azisowe kulubazu lwakujwe lwacipaililo, kusowelwa itwe.
Lino akwamaune mababa pele atapambauli, Elyo mupaizi acitente acipaililo, ankuni zili amulilo, cibe cituuzyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.

Lino acilete kubapaizi, bana ba-Aroni; agwisye inkankamanza yabusu bunante amafuta, atununkilizyo toonse, kuti mupaizi azitente azipaililo, zibe ciibalusyo, cipaizyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Lino eco cisyeede ciyooba ca-Aroni acabana bakwe: ncecipanzi cisalalisya cazipaizyo zitentelwa Jehova.
Alimwi na cituuzyo cako cabusu ciliyokedwe aciyokelo, cibe cabusu bunante buvwelene amafuta.
Ucikwamaune akutila mafuta alincico, Ncecipaizyo cabusu.
Alimwi na cituuzyo cako cabusu cilikangidwe mucikangilo, cibe cabusu bunante amafuta.
Lino cituuzyo cabusu ncojika azintu ezi, ucilete kuli-Jehova, ucipe mupaizi, acilete kucipaililo.
Lino mupaizi agwisye mucituuzyo kapanzi kaciibalusyo, acitente acipaililo, cibe cipaizyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Lino coonse cisyeede cilaba ca-Aroni acabana bakwe; ncecipaizyo cisalalisya cazipaizyo zitentelwa Jehova.
Zintu ezi, mulakonzya kuzileta kuliJehova zibe cipaizyo cakabalwebalwe, pele kutenta acipaililo kuti kube bweema bubotezya, mutatenti pe.
Zipaizyo zyanu zyabusu zyoonse zilungwe munyo; kutabuliki munyo wacizuminano ca-Leza wanu muzipaizyo zyanu zyabusu; muzipaizyo zyanu zyoonse buyo amulunge munyo.
Ubike mafuta alincico, atununkilizyo twalibano, Ncipaizyo cabusu.
Lino mupaizi atente ciibalusyo ca co: tusu atufuta awoonse musamu walibano, Ncipaizyo citentelwa Jehova.
Elyo abike ijanza lyakwe amutwe wacipaizyo, acijaye ku mulyango watente lyambunganino. Abalo bapaizi, bana ba-Aroni, basansaile bulowa koonse koonse cakuzyunguluka cipaililo.
Lino mucipaizyo cakwe cakutontozya agwisye cituuzyo cakutentela Jehova: lufuko amafuta oonse aamumala,
ansa zyobile amafuta aazyo, aabambene acikungu, alulyaŋanga lwamuni; ezi zyoonse azigwisye antoomwe ansa.
Lino bana ba-Aroni bazitente acipaililo atala lyacituuzyo cakutenta atala lyankuni zili amulilo. Ncipaizyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Na waleta kabelele kakupaizya, akapaizye kunembo lya-Jehova.
Abike ijanza lyakwe amutwe wacipaizyo cakwe, acijaye kunembo lyatente lyambunganino. Lino bana ba-Aroni basansaile bulowa koonse koonse cakuzyunguluka cipaililo.
Lino mucipaizyo cakwe cakutontozya agwisye cituuzyo cakutentela Jehova: mafuta aaco, amucila woonse buyo kunyungwida munsi amoongola, alufuko amafuta oonse aamumala,
ansa zyobile amafuta aazyo aabambene acikungu, alulyaŋanga lwamuni; ezi zyoonse azigwisye antoomwe ansa.
Mupaizi azitente acipaililo, zibe cilyo citentelwa Jehova.
Na cipaizyo cakwe nimpongo, acituule kunembo lya-Jehova.
Abike ijanza lyakwe amutwe waya aijaye kunembo lyatente lyambunganino. Lino bana ba-Aroni basansaile bulowa bwayo koonse koonse cakuzyunguluka cipaililo.
Lino agwisye mulinjiyo cituuzyo cakutentela Jehova: lufuko amafuta oonse aamumala,
ansa zyobile amafuta aazyo aabambene acikungu, alulyaŋanga lwamuni; ezi zyoonse azigwisye antoomwe ansa,
mupaizi azitente acipaililo, zibe zitentwa zili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya, Mafuta oonse ngaa-Jehova.
Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu oonse mumakalilo aanu oonse: cilatondwa kulya mafuta na musiya.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Na muntu wabisya cakulubya kukusotoka mulazyo nuuba umwi wa­ Jehova akucita cintu citondwa, mbuboobu mbumweelede kucita.
Alete kapoho kumulyango watente lyambunganino kunembo lya-Jehova, abike ijanza lyakwe amutwe wakapoho, ajaye kapoho kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Lino mupaizi munanike akombole bulowa bwakapoho, anjile abo mutente lyambunganino.
Lino mupaizi atompe munwe wakwe mubulowa, asansaile bulowa ziindi zili musanu azibili kunembo lya-Jehova kunembo lyacisitilizyo cacikombelo.

Alimwi mupaizi abike bulowa ameja aacipaililo catununkilizyo tubotu cili, mutente lyambunganino kunembo lya-Jehova, elyo bulowa bwakapoho boonse busyeede abutile atako lyacipaililo cazituuzyo cili kumulyango watente lyambunganine.
Aalo mafuta oonse aakapoho kacipaizyo cazibi uleelede kwaagwisya: lufuko amafuta oonse aamumala,
ansa zyobile amafuta aazyo aabambene acikungu, alulyaŋanga lwamuni; ezi zyoonse azigwisye antoomwe ansa,
(mbubonya mbuzigwisigwa kuŋombe yacipaizyo cakutontozya), kuti mupaizi azitente acipaililo cazituuzyo.
Pele itobo lyakapoho anyama yako yoonse, amutwe wako, amyeendo yako, atwamukati twako toonse, abufumba bwako,
kapoho koonse akatole anze lyamalabba kubusena busalala nkubasowela itwe, akatente amulilo wankuni. Itwe nkulisowelwa, nkukonya oko nkwaelede kutentela.
cibi ncibabisya cazibwa buyo, imbungano yoonse ilete kapoho kabe cipaizyo cazibi. Bakalete kunembo lyatente lyambunganino,
elyo bapati bambungano babike maanza aabo amutwe wakapoho oko kubusyu bwa-Jehova, bajaye kapoho kubusyu bwa ­Jehova.
Lino mupaizi munanike akombole bulowa bwakapoho akunjila abo mutente lyambunganino.
Lino mupaizi atompe munwe mubulowa, asansaile ziindi zili musanu azibili kubusyu bwa-Jehova kunembo lyacisitilizyo.
Alimwi alambe bulowa ameja aacipaililo cili kunembo lya-Jehova mutente lyambunganino, abulowa bumwi busyeede abutile boonse kutako lyacipaililo cazituuzyo cili kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Alimwi agwisye mafuta aako, aatente acipaililo.
Mbuboobu mbweelede kucitila kapoho. Uleelede kukacitila mbubonya mbwaakacitila kapoho kacituuzyo cazibi. Aboobo mupaizi ulamanya milandu yabo, balekelelwe.
Elyo atole kapoho anze lyamalabba akukatenta, mbubonya mbwaakatenta kapoho kataanzi. Ncecituuzyo cazibi cambungano yabantu.
cibi cakwe ncabisya cazibwa buyo, alete cipaizyo cakwe casijembwe wampongo uutakwe kampenda.
Abike ijanza lyakwe amutwe wasijembwe, amujaye nkukonya oko nkobajayila zipaizyo kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Ncipaizyo cazibi.
Lino mupaizi akombole bulowa bwacipaizyo cazibi amunwe wakwe, alambe ameja aacipaililo cazituuzyo zitentwa, abwalo bulowa busyeede abutile boonse kutako lyacipaililo.
Aalo mafuta aaco, aatente oonse acipaililo mbubonya mbwatenta mafuta aazipaizyo zyakutontozya. Aboobo mupaizi ulamanya mulandu wakwe, alekelelwe.
cibi cakwe ncabisya cazibwa buyo, alete cipaizyo cakwe campongo impwizi iitakwe kampenda, nkaambo kacibi cakwe ncaakabisya.
Abike ijanza lyakwe amutwe wacipaizyo eco cazibi, aijaye kubusena bwazipaizyo zitentwa.
Elyo mupaizi akombole bulowa bwaco amunwe wakwe, alambe ameja aacipaililo cazituuzyo, abulowa bumwi busyeede abutile boonse kutako lyacipaililo.

Aalo mafuta aaco, aagwisye mbubonya mbwagwisya mafuta aazipaizyo zyakutontozya, Elyo mupaizi aatente acipaililo, abe cinunkilizyo cibotu cakubotezya Jehova, Aboobo mupaizi ulamanya mulandu wakwe, alekelelwe,
Abike ijanza lyakwe amutwe wacipaizyo cazibi, acijaye akucipaizizya zibi zyakwe nkukonya oko nkobajayila zipaizyo zitentwa.
Elyo mupaizi akombole bulowa bwacipaizyo amunwe wakwe, alambe ameja aacipaililo cazituuzyo, abulowa bumwi busyeede abutile boonse kutako lyacipaililo.

Aalo mafuta, aagwisye oonse, mbubonya mbukugwisigwa mafuta aatubelele twazipaizyo zyakutontozya. Elyo mupaizi aatente acipaililo atala lyazipaizyo zitentelwa Jehova, Aboobo mupaizi ulamanya mulandu wakwe, mulandu wacibi ncaakabisya, kuti alekelelwe.

Nanka muntu uuampa cintu neciba cimwi cisofweede, mbuli mutunta wamunyama uusofweede na mutunta waŋombe zisofweede na mutunta wabauka basofweede, alimwi makani alisiseme, aboobo wasofwaazigwa, ulijisi mulandu.
Nanka uuguma busofwaazi bwamuntu, kufumbwa cintu cikonzya kusofwaazya muntu, alimwi makani alisiseme, azibwa buyo ulijisi mulandu.
Nanka muntu uufwanzya amilomo yakwe kukukonka kucita cintu, neciba cibotu neciba cibi, kufumbwa cintu bantu ncibakonka cakufwanzya, alimwi makani alisisidwe kulinguwe, aziba buyo ulijisi mulandu.
Muntu uujisi mulandu muzintu zyoonse zili boobu, alyaambe cibi ncaakabisya,
aletele Jehova cipaizyo cakwe cakupaizizya cibi ncaakabisya, kabelele nanka kapongo kapwizi, kabe cipaizyo cazibi, kuti mupaizi amanye mulandu wakwe.
Azilete kumupaizi, lino mupaizi sansi apaizye yacipaizyo cazibi. Anyone mutwe wayo kunsingo, pele ataunyunguli.
Lino akombole bulowa bwacipaizyo cazibi, asansaile amabazu aacipaililo, aboonse bulowa busyeede abuminunwide kutako lyacipaililo. Ncipaizyo cazibi.
Ayalo yabili aipaizye mbubonya mbuli zipaizyo zyakutenta mbuzipaizigwa, aboobo: nupaizi ulamumanina mulandu wa cibi ncaakabisya, alekelelwe.
Acilete kumupaizi, lino mupaizi abweze inkankamanza, ibe ciibalusyo cakutenta acipaililo atala lyazituuzyo zitentelwa Jehova. Ncipaizyo cazibi.
Aboobo mupaizi ulamanya mulandu wacibi ncaakabisya, na wabisya mumakani naaba aali buti akati kayaayo, kuti alekelelwe, Abusu busyeede bube bwamupaizi, mbubonya mbuli cipaizyo cabusu.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,

Kufumbwa muntu uubisya cakulubya mumakani aazintu zisalala zya-Jehova, aletele Jehova cipaizyo cakwe candubo. Alete mugutu uutakwe kampenda wakumatanga aakwe, Umubikile muulo mumasyekele aansiliva mbuli masyekele mbwapimwa mucikombelo. Ncipaizyo cakulubya.
Alimwi kufumbwa cintu ncaakaluba, aciboozye akubika cipanzi casanu alincico. Acilete kumupaizi, lino mupaizi amanye mulandu wakwe amugutu wacituuzyo candubo kuti alekelelwe,

Alete mugutu uutakwe kampenda wakumatanga aakwe, mbuli muulo ngobika, cibe cipaizyo candubo, Acilete kumupaizi, kuti mupaizi amanye mulandu wandubo zyakwe nzyaakalubya cakutaziba, aboobo ulalekelelwa.
Ncecipaizyo candubo, nkaambo ulijisi mulandu kumeso aa-Jehova.
Kufumbwa muntu uubisizya Jehova kukweena mweenzinyina mumakani aambono zyakubambya na zyakujatilizya, nanka kukubba na mukazundila,
nanka kukonka cakubeja aamakani aacintu ciswekede ncaakabweza, na cintu cimwi cili boobo muntu ncakonzya kubisya,
na muntu wabisya akuba amulandu, uleelede kupilusya ncaakabba, nanka ncaakanyanzya, nanka ncaakabambide, nanka cintu ciswekede ncaakabweza,
nanka cintu cili buti ncaakakonka bakubeja. Uleelede kupilusya cintu eco akuciyungizizya impindu yacipanzi casanu, ape muneco mubuzuba bwakuleta cipaizyo cakwe candubyo zyakwe.
Alimwi aletele Jehova cipaizyo cakwe candubyo: mugutu uutakwe kampenda wakumatanga aakwe, mbubonya mbuli muulo ngobikide. Alete cipaizyo kumupaizi,
lino mupaizi amanye mulandu wakwe kubusyu bwa-Jehova, kuti alekelelwe cibi neciba cimwi ncaakabisya akati kazintu ezi, kufumbwa cibi cakamupesya mulandu.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Lailila Aroni abana bakwe kuti, Ngooyu mulao wazipaizyo zitentwa, Cipaizyo cisyaale acitentelo cacipaililo busiku boonse mane bukace, awalo mulilo wacipaililo unooyaka alincico.
Lino mupaizi asame cikobela cakwe cituba akabbudula katuba mucibuno, agwisye itwe lyacipaizyo citentedwe mumulilo waacipaililo, alibike kumbali lyacipaililo.
Amana obo, asamunune zyakusama zyakwe akusama zyakusama zimbi, atole itwe anze lyamalabba kubusena busalala.
Amulilo wacipaililo uleelede kuyaka lyoonse; utazimwi pe. Mupaizi atente inkuni alincico cifumo cimwi acimwi, abambe cipaizyo cakutenta mpoonya awo, akutenta alincico mafuta aazituuzyo zyakutontozya.
Mulilo uleelede kunooyaka lyoonse acipaililo-kuzimwa pe.

Lino kugwisigwe inkankamanza yabusu bunante bwacipaizyo cabusu, amafuta aaco, amusamu woonse walibano uuli atala lyacipaizyo cabusu, kuti zitentwe acipaililo, zibe ciibalusyo cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Lino eco cisyeede, bacilye ba-Aroni abana bakwe. Ciligwe kacitakwe bumena mubusena busalala. Ciligwe mulubanza lwatente lyambunganino.
Taceelede kujikwa abuswezyo pe. Ncencico cipanzi cazipaizyo zyangu zyakutenta ncindabapa, cibe cipanzi cabo. Ncintu cisalalisya loko mbuli zipaizyo zyazibi azipaizyo zyandubo.
Baalumi boonse akati kabana ba-Aroni bacilye. Ngomulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu conse. Cigwisigwe muzipaizyo zitentelwa Jehova. Kufumbwa uuziguma wasalazigwa.
Alimwi Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,

Nceeci cipaizyo ca-Aroni abana bakwe, ncibeelede kuletela Jehova mubuzuba bwakunanikwa kwabo: cipanzi cakumi cacisuwo cabusu bunante, cibe cipaizyo cabusu calyoonse. Cisela caco cituulwe cifumo, acisela cimwi mangolezya.
Cikandwe amafuta akuyokwa aciyokelo, ciletwe ciliyokedwe kabotu. Eco cipaizyo cabusu cipaizigwe tubungebunge, cibe abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Lino mupaizi munanike, mwana wa-Aroni uulya izina lyakwe, uleelede kucipaizizya Jehova. Ngumulao walyoonse, Citentwe coonse buyo.
Zipaizyo zyabusu zyamupaizi zyoonse buyo zileelede kutemwa, taziligwi pe.
Alimwi Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila Aroni abana bakwe kuti, Ngooyu mulao wacipaizyo cazibi, Nkobajayila cipaizyo cakutenta, acalo cipaizyo cazibi cijayigwe nkukonya oko kubusyu bwa-Jehova Ncintu cisalalisya.
Lino mupaizi uucipaizizya zibi nguelede kucilya, Acilye mubusena busalalisya mulubuwa lwatente lyambunganino.
Kufumbwa ciguma nyama yaco cilasalala, alimwi na bulowa bwaco bwakutapaukila ali cakusama, eco cakusama citapaukilidwe cileelede kusanzigwa mubusena busalalisya.
Na cijikwa mucilongo cabulongo, eco cilongo cileelede kupwayigwa; na cajikwa mucilongo camukuba, eco cilongo cileelede kukuzwa akusanzigwa mumaanzi.
Baalumi boonse akati kabapaizi bacilye. Ncintu cisalalisya loko.
Pele cipaizyo cazibi, na bulowa bwaco bwaletwa mutente lyambunganino kukumanya milandu mubusena busalalisya taciligwi pe, Cileelede kutentwa mumulilo.
Cipaizyo candubo cijayigwe nkukonya oko nkobajayila cipaizyo cakutenta, abulowa bwakwe busansailwe acipaililo cakuzyunguluka.
Mafuta aaco oonse atentwe, amucila, alufuko,
ansa zyobile amafuta aazyo aabambene acikungu, alulyaŋanga lwamuni; zyoonse zigwisigwe antoomwe ansa.
Mupaizi azitente acipaililo. Ncipaizyo candubo citentelwa Jehova,
Baalumi boonse akati kabapaizi bacilye. Ciligwe mubusena busalalisya. Ncintu cisalalisya loko.
Cipaizyo candubo cilikozyene acipaizyo cazibi; zyoonse zilijisi mulao omwe. Mupaizi uumanya milandu ancico, cilaba cakwe.
Alimwi mupaizi uutuula cipaizyo camuntu cakutenta, itobo lyacipaizyo ncatuuzya cilaba camupaizi.
Acipaizyo cabusu ciyokelwa muciyokelo, acoonse cikangwa mucikangilo nanka acibulo, ncamupaizi uucipaizya, acibweze.
Zipaizyo zyoonse zyabusu, neziba zivwelene amafuta neziba ziyumu, zilaba zyabana ba-Aroni. Boonse kabeelene.
Na muntu wapaizya cilumbyo, antoomwe acilumbyo apaizye azinkwa zitakwe bumena zikandidwe amafuta, azibunge zitakwe bumena zinanikidwe mafuta, azibunge zyabusu bunante buvwelene amafuta.
Alimwi antoomwe azipaizyo zyakutontozya zyakulumbya apaizye zinkwa zila abumena.
Kucipaizyo cakwe agwisye cinkwa comwe, cibe cilumbyo ca-Jehova; eco cilaba camupaizi uusansaila bulowa bwazipaizyo zyakutontozya.
Anyama yacipaizyo cakutontozya cakulumbya cileelede kuligwa mubuzuba obo mbubonya bwakupaizya; takweelede kusyaala mane cifumo pe.
Pele na cipaizyo cakwe ncacikonkezyo na cipaizyo camoyo, ilaligwa mubuzuba bwakupaizya, alimwi iisyaala inooligwa mubuzuba butobela bwabili,
pele na kwasyaala nyama mubuzuba bwatatu, ileelede kutentwa mumulilo.
Na kwaligwa nyama yacipaizyo cakwe cakutontozya mubuzuba obo bwatatu, oyo uupaizya takoonootambulika nekuba kweelezegwa bululami. Cilaba cisesemyo, ayooyo uucilya uyooba amulandu.
Nyama iiguma cintu neciba comwe cisofweede tiiligwi, ileelede kutemwa mumulilo, Boonse bantu basalala balakonzya kulya nyama,
pele kufumbwa muntu uulya nyama yazipaizyo zyakutontozya zya-Jehova naacili abusofwaazi, oyo muntu uleelede kutandwa muciinga cakwe,

Alimwi na muntu waguma cintu cimwi acimwi cisofweede, mbuli busofwaazi bwamuntu na busofwaazi bwamunyama uusofweede na cisesemyo cisofweede, nkabela amana kuguma walya nyama yazipaizyo zyakutontozya zya-Jehova, oyo muntu uleelede kutandwa k uciinga cakwe,
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mutalyi mafuta pe, naaba mafuta aaŋombe naaba aambelele naaba aampongo.
Mafuta aamunyama uulifwida nanka uulumwa alakonzya kubelesegwa milimo imwi, pele kuligwa takoonooligwa pe.
Nkaambo kufumbwa muntu uulya mafuta aaŋombe bantu nzebatentela Jehova, oyo muntu uleelede kutandwa kuciinga cakwe.
Abwalo bulowa, tamweelede kubulya abuniini mumakalilo aanu oonse, nebuba bulowa bwamunyama nebuba bulowa bwamuyuni.
Kufumbwa muntu uulya bulowa, oyo muntu uleelede kutandwa kuciinga cakwe.
Alimwi Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Kufumbwa uupaizizya Jehova cipaizyo cakutontozya, aletele Jehova cipaizyo cakwe, Agwisye mucipaizyo cakutontozya
cakutentela Jehova akucileta amaanza aakwe mwini. Alete mafuta akatiti, kuti katiti kavukuzigwe kunembo lya-Jehova, cibe cipaizyo cakuvukauzya.
Lino mupaizi atente mafuta acipaililo, pele katiti kalaba ka-Aroni abana bakwe.
Alimwi mweendo wacikungu walulyo muleelede kuugwisya muzipaizyo zyakutontozya, mupe mupaizr.
Kufumbwa muntu wabana ba-Aroni uupaizya bulowa bwazipaizyo zyakutontozya amafuta aazyo, mweendo wacikungu walulyo ncaabilo cakwe.

Nkaambo katiti kavukuzigwa amweendo wacikungu walulyo cipaizigwa, zyoonse ndazigwisya muzipaizyo zyakutontozya nzebaleta bana ba-Israyeli, ndazipa Aroni mupaizi abana bakwe. Ngumulao walyoonse akati kabana ba-Israyeli.
Ncecaabilo ca-Aroni acaabilo cabana bakwe akati kazipaizyo zitentelwa Jehova; neebakapegwa mubuzuba bwakubikwa mumilimo yabupaizi bwa-Jehova.
Jehova wakalailila kuti bapegwe ncico kubana ba-Israyeli mubuzuba obo naakabananika mafuta. Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aabo oonse.
Njemilao Jehova njaakalailila Musa mucilundu ca-Sinai, mubuzuba obo naakalailila bana ba-Israyeli kuti baletele Jehova zipaizyo zyabo, munkanda ya-Sinai.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Tola Aroni abana bakwe, azyakusama, amafuta aakunanika, amucende wacipaizyo cazibi, abagutu bobile, acinzuma cazinkwa zitakwe bumena,
alimwi yobolola imbungano yoonse kumulyango watente lyambunganino,
Mpawo Musa wakacita mbubonya obo mbuli Jehova mbwaakamulailila, nkabela imbungano yoonse yakayoboloka kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Lino Musa wakaambila imbungano yabantu kuti, Mbuboobu Jehova mbwaakalailila kuti kucitwe.
Elyo Musa wakaleta Aroni abana bakwe, wabasanzya amaanzi.
Lino wakamusamika cibaki, wamwaanzya lukumba, wamusamika cikobela, wamubikila efodi, wamubikila lutambo lwebeka lwaefodi akucaanzya ndulo alinguwe.
Alimwi wamubikila isani lyakaango, amoomo musani lyakaango wakabika Urimu a-Tumimu.
Lino wakamusamika citambala amutwe, nkabela atala lyacitambala kunkumu wakabika impande yangolida, musini uusalalisya, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila­ Musa.
Alimwi wakasansaila amwi acipaililo ziindi zili musanu azibili, wananika cipaililo azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, acisambilo atako lyaco, kuti acisalazye.
Aamwi mafuta aakunanika wakaatila amutwe wa-Aroni, wamunanika, wamusalazya.
Abalo bana ba-Aroni, Musa wakabaleta, wabasamika zibaki, wabaanzya inkumba, wabasamika insulumani, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila.

Nkabela Musa wakamujaya, wabweza bulowa, wabulamba ameja aacipaililo koonse koonse amunwe wakwe, kuti asalazye cipaililo. Abulowa boonse ibwakasyeede wakabutila kutako lyacipaililo, wacisalazya, wamanya milandu yaco.
Elyo wakabweza lufuko loonse, alulyaŋanga lwamuni, ansa zyobile amafuta aazyo, nkabela ezi zyoonse Musa wakazitenta acipaililo.
Pele mucende atobo lyakwe, anyama yakwe, abufumba bwakwe, zyoonse wakazitenta anze lyamalabba, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila.
Lino Musa wakamujaya, wasansaila bulowa acipaililo koonse koonse.
Alimwi mugutu naakamana kutendaulwa, Musa wakatenta mutwe azituli amafuta.
Elyo mala amyeendo wakazisanzya amaanzi. Amane obo, Musa wakatenta mugutu woonse acipaililo, cipaizyo icakali abweema bubotu icakatentelwa Jehova, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Lino Musa wakamujaya, wakombola bulowa bwakwe, walamba impela yakutwi kwalulyo kwa-Aroni acaala cajanza lyakwe lyalulyo acaala cacituta cakwe calulyo.

Abalo bana ba-Aroni bakaletwa, nkabela Musa wakalambya bulowa kumpela zyamatwi aabo aalulyo, akuzyaala zyamaanza aabo aalulyo, akuzyaala zyazituta zyabo zyalulyo. Alimwi Musa wakasansaila bulowa koonse koonse cakuzyunguluka cipaililo.
Elyo wakabweza mafuta, amucila, alufuko loonse, alulyaŋanga lwamuni, ansa zyobile amafuta aazyo, amweendo wacikungu walulyo.

Nkabela mucinzuma cazinkwa zitakwe bumena icakali kubusyu bwa-Jehova wakagwisya cinkwa comwe citakwe bumena, acinkwa comwe cili amafuta, acibunge comwe, wazibika atala lyamafuta amweendo wacikungu walulyo.
Ezi zyoonse wakazibika mumaanza aa-Aroni amumaanza aabana bakwe, wazivukuzya mbuli cipaizyo cakuvukuzya kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Mpawo Musa wakazitambula kuzwa kumaanza aabo, wazitenta acipaililo antoomwe acipaizyo citentwa, zyaba cipaizyo cakusalazya, icakali abweema bubotu, icakatentelwa Jehova.
Alimwi Musa wakabweza katiti, wakavukuzya mbuli cipaizyo cakuvukuzya kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Kalo kakaba caabilo ca-Musa camugutu wakusalazya, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.

Lino Musa wakaambila Aroni abana bakwe kuti, Amujike nyama kumulyango watente lyambunganino, mukailye nkukonya oko, antoomwe azinkwa zili mucinzuma cazipaizyo zyakusalazya, mbubonya mbuli mbondalailila cakwaamba kuti, Aroni abana bakwe bailye.
Lino na kwasyaala nyama nanka zinkwa, muleelede kuzitenta mumulilo.
Alimwi mutazwi kumulyango watente lyambunganino mazuba aali musanu aabili, mane mazuba aakusalazigwa kwanu azuzikizigwe, nkaambo mazuba aakumusalazya ali musanu aabili.
Cintu cacitwa sunu ncencico Jehova ncaakalailila kukumanya milandu yanu.
Muleelede kukala kumulyango watente lyambunganino mazuba aali musanu aabili, isikati amasiku, akubamba imbeta zya-Jehova, kuti mutafwi. Nkaambo mbuboobo mbundakalaililwa.
Nkabela Aroni abana bakwe bakacita zintu zyoonse Jehova nzyaakalailila kujanza lya-Musa.
Nkabela wakaambila Aroni kuti, Kolibwezela kapoho, kabe cipaizyo cazibi, amugutu wacipaizyo cakutenta, zyoonse zyobile zitakwe tumpenda, ukazipaizye kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Alimwi ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Amubweze sijembwe, abe cipaizyo cazibi, akapoho akabelele, toonse tuli amwaka omwe, tutakwe kampenda, tube cipaizyo cakutenta,
amusune amugutu, babe zipaizyo zyakutontozya, mukazipaizye kubusyu bwa-Jehova, acipaizyo cabusu buvwelene amafuta, nkaambo buzuba obuno Jehova ulalibonya kulindinywe.
Mpawo bakaleta zintu ezyo Musa nzyaakalailila kunembo lyatente lyambunganino, nkabela imbungano yoonse yabantu yakaswena afwiifwi akwiima kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Elyo Musa wakati, Mbuboobu Jehova mbwaakalailila kuti mucite, lino bulemu bwa-Jehova bulalibonya kulindinywe.

Lino Musa wakaambila Aroni kuti, Swena afwaafwi kucipaililo, utuule cipaizyo cako cazibi acipaizyo cako cakutenta, ukamanye milandu yako amilandu yabantu. Alimwi tuula cipaizyo cabantu akumanya milandu yabo, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila.
Mpoonya awo Aroni wakaswena kucipaililo, wajaya kapoho kacipaizyo cazibi zyakwe mwini.
Nkabela bana ba-Aroni bakamuletela bulowa, elyo wakatompa munwe wakwe mubulowa, wabulamba ameja aacipaililo, abulowa ibwakasyeede wakabutila boonse kutako lyacipaililo.
Pele mafuta ansa alulyaŋanga lwamuni, wakazigwisya mucipaizyo cazibi akuzitenta acipaililo, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Anyama atobo, wakazitenta mumulilo anze lyamalabba.
Lino wakajaya cipaizyo cakutenta, nkabela bana ba-Aroni bakamuletela bulowa kuti asansaile acipaililo koonse koonse cakuzyunguluka.
Alimwi bakamuletela cipaizyo cakutenta, cituli cimwi acimwi amutwe, elyo wakacitenta acipaililo.
Lino wakasanzya twamukati amyeendo, akuzitenta acipaililo antoomwe acipaizyo citentwa.
Alimwi wakaleta cipaizyo cakutenta, wacituula mboceelede.
Elyo wakaleta cipaizyo cabusu; wakabweza inkankamanza, waitenta acipaililo antoomwe acipaizyo citentwa cifumo.
Alimwi mumusune amulisijembwe wakagwisya mafuta, amucila, alufuko, ansa, alulyaŋanga lwamuni,
