nkabela bakabika mafuta atala lyakatiti, elyo wakatenta mafuta acipaililo;
pele tutiti amweendo wacikungu wakululyo, Aroni wakazivukuzya kubusyu bwa-Jehova, cipaizyo cakuvukuzya, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila.
Elyo Musa a-Aroni bakanjila mutente lyambunganino. Bazwe buyo, bakalongezya bantu, nkabela bulemu bwaJehova bwakaboneka kumeso aabantu boonse.
Mpawo kwakazwa mulilo kuli-Jehova, watenta cipaizyo citentwa amafuta oonse acipaililo. Nkabela bantu boonse buyo, nebakabona, bakacita cikwala akuvundama ansi.
Mpawo kwakazwa mulilo kubusyu bwa-Jehova akubatenta, nkabela bakafwa nkukonya oko kubusyu bwaJehova.
Elyo Musa wakaambila Aroni kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, Njoosalazigwa kuliboonse baswena kulindime akulemekwa kumeso aabantu boonse. Lino Aroni wakaumuna buyo.
Nkabela bakaswena afwaafwi akubabweza azibaki zyabo, babatola anze lyamalabba, mbubonya mbuli Musa mbwaakalailila.

Mpawo Musa wakaambila Aroni abana bakwe Eleazara a-Itamara kuti, Mutatebezyi masusu aanu nekuba kudeluula zyakusama zyanu, kuti mutafwi, kuti bukali butasikili imbungano yoonse yabantu, Pele bana bakwanu, luzubo loonse lwa-Israyeli, balile nkaambo kakutenta Jehova nkwacita.
Alimwi mutazwi kumulyango watente lyambunganino, kuti mutafwi, nkaambo mafuta aakunanika aa-Jehova mpaali alindinywe. Nkabela bakacita mbubonya mbuli Musa mbwaakalailila,
Lino Jehova wakaambila Aroni kuti,
Utanywi waini neciba cikola cimwi, yebo abana bako, ciindi cakunjila mutente lyambunganino, kuti mutafwi, Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu oonse.
Muleelede kupambukanya zintu zisalalisya azintu zyabuyo, zintu zisofweede azintu zisalala.
Alimwi muleelede kwiisya bana ba-Israyeli milao yoonse Jehova njaakabaambila kumulomo wa-Musa,
Muleelede kucilida mubusena busalalisya, nkaambo ncecaabilo cako acaabilo cabana bako akati kazipaizyo zitentelwa Jehova, Nkaambo mbuboobo mbundakalaililwa.

Akalo katiti kakuvukuzya, amweendo wacikungu uutuulwa, muleelede kuzilya mubusena busalalisya, yebo abana bako balombe abasimbi boonse, nkaambo nzenzizyo nzimwapegwa, zibe caabilo cako acaabilo cabana bako, akati kazipaizyo zyakutontozya zya bana ba-Israyeli,

Mweendo wacikungu uutuulwa akatiti kakuvukuzya, bazilete antoomwe azipaizyo zyamafuta zyakutenta, akuzivukauzya kunembo lyaJehova, zibe cipaizyo cakuvukauzya, Cilaba caabilo cako acaabilo cabana bako: ngumulao walyoonse, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila.
Ino nkaambonzi tamulyi cipaizyo cazibi mubu sena busalalisya? Nkaambo ncecintu cisalala loko, Mwacipegwa kuti mutole zibi zyambungano akumanya milandu yabo kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Amubone! Bulowa bwaco teebwakaletwa mubu sena busalalisya bwamukati, Ncobeni mwaleelede kucilya mubusena busalala, mbubonya mbundakalailila.

Nkabela Aroni wakaambila Musa kuti, Bona! Sunu batuula cipaizyo cabo cazibi acipaizyo cabo citentwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova, nekubaboobo makani aali boobo andisikila, Nebakalya cipaizyo cabo cazibi buzuba obuno, sa necakabota mumeso aa-Jehova?
Amvwe obo, Musa wakakuta.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Amwaambile bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mbaaba banyama mbemukonzya kulya akati kaba­ nyama boonse baansi.
Kufumbwa munyama uujisi insumba zyaanzeene zyaandeene, alimwi ulaselula, nguuligwa.
Nekubaboobo akati kabaabo bajisi insumba zyaanzeene zyaandeene abaabo baselula, aba tabaligwi. Inkamele ilaselula, nekubaboobo tiijisi insumba zyaanzeene, aboobo ilatondwa.
Alakwe cibi la ulaselula, nekubaboobo tajisi insumba zyaanzeene, aboobo ulatondwa.
Alakwe sulwe ulaselula, nekubaboobo tajisi insumba zyaanzeene, aboobo ulatondwa.
Ayalo ingulube, ilijisi insumba zyaanzeene zyaandeene, pele tiiseluli, aboobo ilatondwa.
Abo boonse, nyama yabo tiiligwi, amitunta yabo tiigumwi. Boonse balatondwa.
Pele zintu zyamumaanzi aalwizi azyamumilonga zitajisi tuyambyo amaamba, tuuka toonse twamumaanzi, azintu zimwi zipona mumaanzi, zilarondwa kulindinywe.
Muleelede kuzisesemwa, Nyama yazyo tiiligwi, amitunta yazyo ilatondwa.
Kufumbwa cintu camumaanzi citajisi tuyambyo amaamba cilatondwa.
bimbe, balubanze bamisyobo misyobo,
cikwangala abeenzinyina,
impowani, sikolyo, nyengenge, basikakonze bamisyobo misyobo,
tumba, sikabaandwa, siyaswimumba,
kakukubwi, sifundwe, sikwaze,
itongola, inkolekole abeenzinyina, nangayabayuni, asimudima.
Abalo bauka bauluka bali amyeendo yone, balatondwa.
Nekubaboobo akati kabauka bauluka bali amyeendo yone, cilazumizigwa kulya abo bali amyeendo yakusotosya atala lyamaulu aabo.
Cilazumizigwa kulya cisozi amusyobo waco, inswabanda amusyobo wayo, idiingo amusyobo walyo, acamusokonya amusyobo wakwe.
Pele bamwi bauka bauluka bajisi myeendo yone, boonse balatondwa.
Mbombabo bakonzya kusofwaazya, Kufumbwa muntu uuguma mitunta yabo ulasofwaala mane likabbile izuba.
Amuntu uuyumuna cituli camitunta yabo uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusofwaala mane likabbile izuba.
Alimwi kufumbwa munyama uuanzaanya insumba, nekubaboobo tazyaandeene loko, alimwi taseluli, ulatondwa; kufumbwa muntu uumuguma ulasofwaala.
Abanyama boonse bajisi myeendo yane beenda azituta zyabo balatondwa; kufumbwa uuguma mitunta yabo ulasofwaala mane izuba likabbile.
Amuntu uuyumuna mitunta yabo uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusofwaala mane izuba likabbile. Boonse balatondwa.
syazibumbu, imbulumusanza, palamabwe, sibbulu, anamuntambwe.
Abo boonse balatondwa akati kabayavula ansi; kufumbwa uubaguma kabafwide ulasofwaala mane likabbile izuba.

Azintu zyoonse ziwidwa mbabo kabafwide zilasofwaala, neciba cibelesyo cazisamu neciba cikobela neliba itobo neliba isaka na cibelesyo cimwi acimwi cibelesegwa milimo, Cileelede kubikwa mumaanzi, cisofwaale mane likubbile izuba; elyo cilasalala.
Alimwi na umwi wabo wawida mucilongo cabulongo, zyoonse zili mukati zilasofwaala, acilongo cileelede kupwayigwa.
Na mozili zilyo ziligwa, na zyatilwa maanzi, zilasofwaala; azyalo zyakunywa zili buti na buti zili mucilongo zilasofwaala.
Acintu ne ciba cimwi ciwidwa mitunta yabo cilasofwaala, neciba ciko neciba ciyokelo. Cileelede kupwayigwa. Balisofweede boonse, balatondwa.
Pele kasensa nanka cikala cili amaanzi, cilasalala. Pele kufumbwa cintu ciguma mitunta yabo cilasofwaala.
Imbuto yakubyala, na yawidwa mitunta yabo, ilasalala;
nekubaboobo na imbuto yabikilwa maanzi, lino yawidwa mitunta yabo, ilasofwaala.
Lino munyama uuligwa, na wafwa, kufumbwa muntu uuguma mutunta wakwe ulasofwaala mane likabbile izuba.
Ayooyo uulya mutunta wakwe uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusofwaala mane likabbile izuba. Amuntu uuyumuna mutunta wakwe uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusofwaala mane likabbile izuba.
Kufumbwa cinyama ciyavula ansi cilatondwa, taciligwi pe.
Kufumbwa cikumba abula, akufumbwa ceenda amyeendo yone, akufumbwa cijisi myeendo minji, azinyama zyoonse ziyavula-yavula ansi, taziligwi pe; zilatondwa.
Mutalisanduli kuba zisesemyo kuzinyama zyoonse ziyavula ansi, mutalisofwaazyi anzizyo pe, kuti mutasofwaali.
Nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wanu; amulisalazye, musalale, nkaambo ndasalala mebo, Mutalisofwaazyi acinyama neciba cimwi ciyavula ansi.
Nkaambo ndime Jehova iwakamupozya mucisi ca-Egepita, kuti mbe Leza wanu, Amusalale, nkaambo ndasalala mebo.
Mbuubede mulao wabanyama abayuni azinyama zyoonse zikala mumaanzi azinyama zyoonse ziyavula ansi,
kuti mupambukanye zisofweede azisalala, banyama baligwa abanyama bataligwi.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mwanakazi uutumbuka mwana mulombe ulasofwaala mazuba aali musanu aabili, mbubonya mbuli mazuba aakutondwa kwakwe.
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu, ulapalulwa kunyama yalulomo lwakwe.
Lino mwanakazi unoocibede mubulowa bwakulisalazya kwakwe mazuba aali makumi otatwe aatatu, Atagumi cintu cisalala nanka kunjila mucikombelo mane mazuba aakulisalazya kwakwe azulile.

Pele na wazyala mwana musimbi ulasofwaala insondo zyobile, mbubonya mbuli kuciindi cakutondwa kwakwe, alimwi unoocibede mubulowa bwakulisalazya kwakwe mazuba aali makumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu abumwi.
azipaizye kubusyu bwa-Jehova akumanya milandu yakwe, kuti asalazigwe kubulowa bwakwe, Mbuubede mulao wamwanakazi uutumbuka mwana mulombe na mwana musimbi.

Pele na wacetaala aboobo takonzyi kujana kabelele, alete inziba zyobile nanka bana bobile bankwilimba, umwi abe wacipaizyo cakutenta aumwi wacipaizyo cazibi. Lino mupaizi amanye milandu yakwe, asalale.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Na muntu wazimba kulukanda lwamubili wakwe, nanka kuba atukoto tukoto, nanka tubata, elyo kwabuka bulwazi bwacipele mulukanda lwamubili wakwe, aletwe kuli-Aroni mupaizi na kuluumwi wabana bakwe.

Lino mupaizi abone bulwazi bwamulukanda lwamubili wakwe, nkabela na boya bwamubulwazi bwatuba, alimwi bulwazi bulaboneka kuti bulibbookede kwiinda lukanda lumwi lwamubili, nkokuti mbobulwazi bwacinsenda. Mupaizi abubona, aambe kuti ulisofweede.
Pele na tubata twalukanda lwamubili wakwe twatuba nekubaboobo tatuboneki kuti tulibbookede kwiinda lukanda lumwi, aboya tabutubi, mupaizi uleelede kumujalila mazuba aali musanu aabili.
Bwaca buzuba bwamusanu aabili, mupaizi amubone alimwi, nkabela na wabona kuti bulwazi bwaleka, tabuyandilide mulukanda lwakwe, mupaizi amujalile mazuba aamwi aali musanu aabili.

Bwaca buzuba bwamusanu aabili, mupaizi amubone alimwi; na wabona kuti bulwazi tabucibonekesyi, tabuciyandilide mulukanda lwakwe, mupaizi aambe kuti ulasalala. Ntukoto-tukoto buyo. Asanzye zyakusama zyakwe, elyo ulasalala.
Pele na tukoto-tukoto twayandilila mulukanda lwakwe, naamana kubonwa kumupaizi kukusalazigwa, uleelede kubonwa alimwi kumupaizi.
Elyo mupaizi, na wabona kuti tukoto-tukoto twayandilila mulukanda lwakwe, mupaizi aambe kuti ulisofweede, mbobulwazi bwacinsenda.
Lino mupaizi, na wabona kuti kuli buzimbe butuba mulukanda, aboobo buzimbe bwatubya boya, alimwi mulimbubo muli nyama iisinkaukide,
mbobulwazi bwacinsenda citamani mulukanda lwamubili wakwe, aboobo mupaizi uleelede kwaamba kuti ulisofweede. Atajalilwi pe, nkaambo ulisofweede.
Pele na cinsenda cayandilila mulukanda mane cazulizya lukanda loonse lwamulwazi kuzwa kumutwe akusikila kuzituta, koonse koonse meso aamupaizi nkwaabona,
mupaizi na abona kuti bulwazi bwazulizya mubili wakwe woonse, aambe kuti oyo muntu wasalala. Mubili woonse watuba, aboobo ulasalala.
Pele buzuba bumwi, na kwaboneka nyama iisinkaukide, ulasofwaala.
Mupaizi abona nyama iisinkaukide, aambe kuti ulisofweede, Nyama iisinkaukide ilisofweede, mbobulwazi bwacinsenda.
Pele eyo nyama iisinkaukide, na yasanduka alimwi kutuba, aboole kumupaizi,
elyo mupaizi abona kuti bulwazi bwasanduka kutuba, mupaizi aambe kuti oyo muntu ulasalala. Ulasalala.
elyo mucibaka cacilonda mwaboneka buzimbe butuba nanka tubata tutuba akusalala, cibonwe kumupaizi.
Lino mupaizi abona, na kwaboneka kuti bulibbookede kwiinda lukanda lumwi, abwalo boya bwasanduka kutuba, mupaizi aambe kuti ulisofweede. Mbobulwazi bwacinsenda, bwabuka mucilonda.
Pele na mupaizi wabona kuti taakwe boya butuba, alimwi tabubbokede kwiinda lukanda lumwi, tabucibonekesyi, mupaizi amujalile mazuba aali musanu aabili.
Lino na buciya buyandilila mulukanda lwakwe, mupaizi aambe kuti ulisofweede, mbobulwazi.
Pele na tubata tuliimvwi mpotubede akutayandilila, nkokuti mubata wacilonda buyo; elyo mupaizi aambe kuti ulasalala.
Na mulukanda lwamubili mwaboneka kutumpa mbuli mulilo, elyo oko kutumpa kwasinkauka, kwaba ibbika lisalala-salala kutuba na lituba,

mupaizi amubone, lino na wabona kuti boya bwamubbika bwasanduka, bwatuba, alimwi lilibbookede kwiinda lukanda lumwi, ncecinsenda cabuka mubbika. Mupaizi aambe kuti ulisofweede. Mbobulwazi bwacinsenda.
Pele na mupaizi wabona kuti mubbika tamukwe boya butuba, alimwi talibbookede kwiinda lukanda, alimwi talibonekesyi, mupaizi amujalile mazuba aali musanu aabili.
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili mupaizi amulange. Na wabona kuti bulwazi buciya buyandilila mulukanda, mupaizi aambe kuti ulisofweede. Mbobulwazi bwacinsenda.
Pele na ibbika liliimvwi buyo, taliyandilili mulukanda, alimwi talicibonekesyi, nkokuzimba kwakutumpa. Mupaizi aambe kuti ulasalala, nkaambo ndubata lwakutumpa buyo.
Alimwi mwaalumi na mwanakazi na ulijisi bulwazi kumutwe nanka kucilezu,
mupaizi abone bulwazi. Na wabona kuti bulibbookede kwiinda lukanda lumwi, alimwi boya bwabo bwabalangala, bwaubauba, mupaizi aambe kuti ulisofweede, Ncecipele, Ncecinsenda cakumutwe na cakucilezu.
Pele mupaizi naabona obo bulwazi bwacipele, na wabona kuti tabubbookede kwiinda lukanda lumwi, alimwi taakwe boya busia, mupaizi ajalile muntu oyo uujisi bulwazi bwacipele mazuba aali musanu aabili.
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili mupaizi alange bulwazi. Na wabona kuti bulwazi tabuciyi buyandilila, alimwi taakwe boya bubalangala, alimwi tabubbookede kwiinda lukanda lumwi,
alinyoole, pele atalinyooli ali bulwazi. Lino mupaizi ajalile oyo mulwazi lwabili mazuba aali musanu aabili.

Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili mupaizi abone cipele. Na wabona kuti cipele taciciyi buyandilila mulukanda, alimwi tacibbookede kwiinda lukanda lumwi, mupaizi aambe kuti ulisalede, Asanzye zyakusama zyakwe, asalale.
Pele na cipele ciciya buyandilila mulukanda naamana kusalazigwa,
mupaizi amubone. Na wabona kuti cipele ciciya buyandilila mulukanda, mupaizi atalangauli boya bubalangala. Ulisofweede.
Pele na wabona kuti cipele caleka, alimwi kwamena boya busia, nkokuti cipele capona, Ulasalala. Mupaizi aambe kuti wasalala.
Na mwaalumi na mwanakazi ulijisi mabata mulukanda lwamubili, nkokuti mabata aatuba,
mupaizi amubone. Na wabona kuti mabata aamumubili wakwe taatubisyi, ncintambwe buyo cili mulukanda, Ulasalala.
Alimwi na isusu lyakwe lyakuluka kunkumu yakwe, ngusinjenya, nekubaboobo ulasalala.
Pele na mukati kampanza na munjenya mwaboneka bulwazi busalala-salala kutuba, ncecinsenda cabuka mumpanza na munjenya.
Mupaizi amubone. Na wabona kuti obo bulwazi bwamumpanza na bwamunjenya bwasalala-salala kutuba mbubonya mbuli cinsenda camulukanda lwamubili,
ngusicinsenda, ulisofweede. Mupaizi aambe kuti ulisofweede. Bulwazi bwakwe buli kumutwe wakwe.
Mazuba oonse bulwazi nebucili mulinguwe, ulisofweede. Wasofwaala, Uleelede kukala alike anze lyazilao.
neciba citungidwe neciba cilukidwe, neciba caboya neciba cabutonge, neciba cibaki cazikanda neciba cintu cimwi cazikanda,

na kwabonwa kuti bulwazi bulasiasia nanka bulasalala-salala, mulicakusama eco na muzikanda ezyo, nemuba mucintu citungidwe nemuba mucintu cilukidwe, nemuba mucintu cimwi cazikanda, mbobulwazi bwacinsenda. Cileelede kutondezegwa kumupaizi.
Lino mupaizi amana kubona bulwazi, ajalile cintu eco cili abulwazi mazuba aali musanu aabili.

Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili abone bulwazi. Na wabona kuti bulwazi bwayandilila mulicakusama eco, nemuba mucintu citungidwe nemuba mucintu cilukidwe, na muzikanda ezyo, kufumbwa milimo iibelesegwa zikanda, bulwazi ncecinsenda cibi, Cilisofweede.

Uleelede kutenta cakusama eco cili abulwazi, neciba cintu citungidwe neciba cintu cilukidwe, nebuba boya nebuba butonge, neciba cintu cimwi cili buti cazikanda. Ncecinsenda cibi. Cileelede kutentwa mumulilo.
Pele na mupaizi wabona kuti bulwazi tabuciyi buyandilila mulicakusama eco, neciba cintu citungidwe neciba cintu cilukidwe, neciba cibelesyo cimwi cazikanda,
mupaizi alailile bantu kuti basanzye cintu eco cili abulwazi. Bamana kusanzya, mupaizi acijalile lwabili mazuba aali musanu aabili.

Lino mupaizi uleelede kubona cintu cili abulwazi, camana kusanzigwa, nkabela na wabona kuti bulwazi tabusanduki, nekuba kuti tabuciyi buyandilila, cilisofweede. Amucitente mumulilo. Na bulwazi buli atala nanka mukati, ncintu comwe.
Pele na mupaizi wabona kuti bulwazi tabucibonekesyi, cintu camana buyo kusamba, acikwamune mucakusama na mu cikanda na mucintu citungidwe na mucintu cilukidwe.
Na ciciboneka mulicakusama eco na mucintu eco citungidwe na mucintu eco cilukidwe na mucintu cili buti cacikanda, nkokuti ciya buyandilila, Lino cintu eco cili abulwazi citentwe mumulilo.
Pele na bulwazi bwamana mulicakusama eco na mucintu eco citungidwe na mucintu eco cilukidwe na mucintu cimwi cazikanda, camana buyo kusamba, cileelede kusanzigwa lwabili, cisalale.

Oyo ngumulao wabulwazi bwacinsenda bwamulizyakusama, ne ziba zyaboya neziba zyabutonge, neziba zintu zitungidwe neziba zintu zilukidwe, neciba cintu cili buti cacikanda, muzibe na cilasalala na cilisofweede.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ngooyu mulao wasicinsenda mubuzuba bwakusalazigwa kwakwe. Aletwe kumupaizi.
Lino mupaizi ainke anze lyamunzi, amubone. Na mupaizi wabona kuti bulwazi bwacinsenda bwamana mumuntu oyo,
mupaizi alailile kuti aletelwe tuyuni tusalala tobile azisamu zyakedari aboya busalala pyu amusamu wahisopo.
Lino mupaizi alailile kuti kamwi katuyuni kajayigwe mucibiya cabulongo atala lyamaanzi aaenda.
Bamana obo, abweze kayuni kacipona antoomwe azisamu zyakedari aboya busalala pyu amusamu wahisopo, anike zintu ezi akayuni kacipona mubulowa bwakayuni kajayidwe atala lyamaanzi aaenda,
asansaile ziindi zili musanu azibili amuntu oyo uusalazigwa cinsenda, aboobo ulamusalazya. Lino kayuni kacipona akaleke kainke musokwe bwaangulukide.
Elyo muntu uusalazigwa asanzye zyakusama zyakwe, anyoole boya bwakwe boonse, asa mbe mumaanzi, asalale. Amana kucita obo, anjile mumunzi, pele akale anze lyacilao cakwe mazuba aali musanu aabili.

Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili agele masusu oonse aamutwe wakwe; acalo cilezu cakwe azikoye zyakwe, zyoonse azigele amasusu aakwe oonse. Amana obo, asanzye zyakusama zyakwe, asambe kumubili wakwe amaanzi, asalale.
Elyo mupaizi uumusalazya abike muntu uusalazigwa azintu ezi kunembo lya-Jehova kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Lino mupaizi abweze kamwi kagutu, akatuule, kabe cituuzyo camilandu, antoomwe ansazi yamafuta, aziyumbe, zibe cipaizyo cakuyumba kubusyu bwa-Jehova.

Ajaye kagutu nkukonya oko nkobajayila cipaizyo cazibi acipaizyo citentwa, nkokuti mubusena busalalisya, nkaambo cipaizyo camilandu cili mbubonya mbuli cipaizyo cazibi, ncecamupaizi, ncecintu cisalalisya loko.
Lino mupaizi akombole bulowa bwacipaizyo camilandu, abike kumpela yakutwi kwalulyo kwayooyo uuli mukusalazigwa akucaala cajanza lyakwe lyalulyo akucaala cakukuulu kwakwe kwalulyo.
Alimwi mupaizi aungule mafuta aamunsazi, atile mujanza lyakwe lyalumwesi.
Lino mupaizi atompe amunwe wakwe walulyo mu mafuta aali mujanza lyakwe lyalumwesi, asansaile mafuta amunwe wakwe ziindi zili musanu azibili kubusyu bwa-Jehova,

Elyo mafuta aasyaala mujanza lyakwe akombole amwi akwaalamba ampela yakutwi kwalulyo kwayooyo uusalazigwa, akucaala cajanza lyakwe lyalulyo, akucaala cakukuulu kwakwe kwalulyo, atala lyabulowa bwacipaizyo camilandu.
Amafuta aacisyeede mujanza lyamupaizi aananike amutwe wayooyo uusalazigwa. Aboobo mupaizi ulamanya milandu yakwe kubusyu bwaJehova.
Amana obo, mupaizi atuule cipaizyo cazibi kuti amanye milandu yayooyo uusalazigwa busofwi bwakwe, Musule ajaye cipaizyo cakutenta.
Lino mupaizi atuule cipaizyo cakutenta acipaizyo cabusu acipaililo. Aboobo mupaizi ulamumanina milandu yakwe, kuti asalale.
Alimwi abweze inziba zyobile nanka bana bobile bankwilimba, kufumbwa ncakonzya kujana, imwi ibe cipaizyo cazibi aimwi ibe cipaizyo cakutenta.
Azilete mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu, kuti asalazigwe. Azilete kumupaizi kumulyango watente lyambunganino kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Lino mupaizi abweze kabelele kacipaizyo camilandu, ansazi yamafuta, aziyumbe, zibe cipaizyo cakuyumba, kubusyu bwa-Jehova.

Amana obo, ajaye kabelele kacipaizyo camilandu. Lino mupaizi akombole bulowa bwacipaizyo camilandu, alambe kumpela yakutwi kwalulyo kwayooyo uusalazigwa, akucaala cajanza lyakwe lyalulyo, akucaala cakukuulu kwakwe kwalulyo.
Amafuta, mupaizi aungule mujanza lyakwe lyalumwesi.
Lino mupaizi atompe amunwe wakwe walulyo mumafuta aamujanza lyakwe lyalumwesi, asansaile ziindi zili musanu azibili kubusyu bwa-Jehova.

Alimwi mupaizi akombole mafuta aamujanza lyakwe, alambe kumpela yakutwi kwalulyo kwayooyo uusalazigwa, akucaala cajanza lyakwe lyalulyo, akucaala cakukuulu kwakwe kwalulyo, atala lyabulowa bwacipaizyo camilandu.
Amafuta aasyeede mujanza lyamupaizi, aatile amutwe wayooyo uusalazigwa, kuti amanye milandu yakwe kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Lino atuule imwi yanziba, na umwi wabana bankwilimba, kufumbwa ncakonzya kujana.
Kufumbwa ncakonzya kujana, atuule imwi ibe cipaizyo cazibi aimwi ibe cipaizyo cakutenta, antoomwe acipaizyo cabusu, aboobo mupaizi ulamanya milandu yayooyo uusalazigwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Ngooyo mulao wayooyo uujisi bulwazi bwacinsenda, kufumbwa mucete uutakonzya kujana zintu zyeelede zyakusalazigwa kwakwe.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Mwaakusika kucisi ca-Kanana, cisi ncensi mupe kuti mucivube, na ndabika bulwazi bwacinsenda muŋanda yamucisi canu,
mwiniŋanda aboole kuzooambila mupaizi kuti, Ndayeeya kuti kwaboneka bulwazi muŋanda yangu.
Lino mupaizi alailile kuti sansi bagwisye zyoonse muŋanda, mupaizi natanasika kuzoobona bulwazi, kuti zintu zyoonse zyamuŋanda zitasofwaazigwi. Bamana obo, mupaizi asike kuzoobona iŋanda,
abone bulwazi mbobubede. Na wabona kuti bulwazi mobuli mumalambo aaŋanda, alimwi bulijisi mifolo iisia-sia na iisalala, alimwi buboneka kubbookela kwiinda bulambo bumwi,
mupaizi azwe muŋanda, kumulyango waŋanda, ajale iŋanda mazuba aali musanu aabili.
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili mupaizi aboole lwabili kukubona. Na wabona kuti bulwazi buciya buyandilila mumalambo aaŋanda,
mupaizi alailile kuti bagwisye mabwe ayo aajisi bulwazi, baasowele anze lyamunzi mubusena busofweede.
Lino alailile kuti iŋanda ipalwe mukati kumabazu oonse, nkabela zipalo nzebapala bazisowele kubusena busofweede anze lyamunzi.
Lino babweze mabwe ambi, baabike mucimanga camabwe ayo; alimwi abweze bulongo bumbi bwakuziluluzya iŋanda.
Lino na bulwazi bwaboneka alimwi muŋanda, musule lyakugwisya mabwe amusule lyakupala alyakuzilulula,
mupaizi ainke kuyoobona. Na wabona kuti bulwazi bucibuka muŋanda, ncecinsenda cibi camuŋanda. Ilisofweede.
Lino amwaye iŋanda amabwe aayo azisamu zyayo abulongo bwayo boonse, azitole anze lyamunzi kubusena busofweede.
Nkabela kufumbwa muntu uunjila muŋanda niijalidwe ulasofwaala mane kusikila kumagoko.
Amuntu uuona muŋanda asanzye zyakusama zyakwe; amuntu uulida muŋanda alakwe asanzye zyakusama zyakwe.
Lino kukusalazya iŋanda abweze tuyuni tobile, azisamu zyakedari, aboya busalala pyu, amusamu wahisopo.
Ajaye kamwi kayuni mucibiya cabulongo atala lyamaanzi aaenda.
Lino abweze zisamu zyakedari amusamu wahisopo aboya busalala pyu akayuni kacipona, azinike mubulowa bwukayuni kajayidwe, amumaanzi aaenda muŋanda ziindi zili musanu azibili.
Aboobo ulasalazya iŋanda abulowa bwakayuni amaanzi aaenda akayuni kacipena azisamu zyakedari amusamu wahisopo aboya busalala pyu.
Elyo kayuni kacipona akaleke, kazwe mumunzi, kaye musokwe. Mbuboobo mbweelede kumanya milandu yaŋandayisalale.
abwacinsenda camulizyakusama na camuŋanda,
abwakuzimba kwalukanda nanka bwatukoto-tukoto nanka bwatubata,
kuzibwe cintu na cilasalala na cilisofweede, Mbuubede mulao wacinsenda.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Amwaambile bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Na muntu wasensa mumubili wakwe, lusenso lwakwe lulasofwaala.
Lino ngooyu mulao wakusofwaala kwakusensa. Na mubili wakwe ulasensa, na mubili wakwe waangwa kuti utacisensi, ulisofweede.
Kufumbwa bulo mpaona oyu sikusensa bulasofwaala. Kufumbwa cintu ncakala cilasofwaala.
Kufumbwa muntu uuguma bula uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Ayooyo uukala acintu eco sikusensa ncaakakede uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Alimwi kufumbwa muntu uuguma mubili wasikusensa uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Alimwi na oyo sikusensa waswida muntu uusalala mate, uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubiliakusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba,
Alimwi cikalilo ncakala oyo sikusensa cilasofwaala.

Amuntu uuguma cintu neciba cimwi ncaakakede ulasofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba. Ayooyo uuyumuna zintu zili boobu uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Alimwi na sikusensa waguma muntu, na tana kusamba kumaanza aakwe, uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Cibiya cabulongo sikusensa ncaguma cileelede kupwayigwa, azyoonse zibiya zyazisamu zileelede kukumbwa mumaanzi.
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu abweze inziba zyobile nanka bana bobile bankwilimba, aboole kubusyu bwa-Jehova kumulyango watente lyambunganino, ape mupaizi.
Lino mupaizi azituule; imwi ibe cipaizyo cazibi, aimwi ibe cipaizyo cakutenta. Aboobo mupaizi ulamumanina milandu kubusyu bwa-Jehova nkaambo kasenselwa lyakwe.
Azyakusama zyoonse amatobo oonse, zyoonse zilokeledwe bwaalumi zifeelede kusanzigwa mumaanzi akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Alimwi na muntu woona amwanakazi, alimwi wasuba bwaalumi bwakwe, basambe boonse bobile mumaanzi akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Aoonse mpalala mukusofwaala kwakwe alasofwaala, aoonse mpakala alasofwaala.
Kufumbwa muntu uuguma bulo bwakwe asanzye zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo.
Ayooyo uuguma cintu neciba comwe ncakede asanzye zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo.
Nebuba bula neciba cintu cili buti reakala, aciguma ulaso-fwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo.
Alimwi na mwaalumi woona awe, abusofwi bwakwe bwaba alinguwe, ulasofwaala mazuba aali musanu aabili, nkabela bulo bwakwe, kufumbwa nkwaona, bulasofwaala.
Kufumbwa abulo mpaona, mazuba oonse aasenselwa lyakwe, alaba mbubonya mbuli bula bwakutondwa kwakwe, azintu zyoonse nzyakala zilasofwaala mbubonya mbuli kusofwaala kwakutondwa kwakwe.
Kufumbwa muntu uuguma zintu ezyo ulasofwaala; uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Pele na wapona kusenselwa lyakwe, alibalile mazuba aali musanu aabili kuzwa kukusalazigwa kwakwe, elyo ulasalala.
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu abweze inziba zyobile na bana bobile bankwilimba, azilete kumupaizi kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Mupaizi atuule imwi, ibe cipaizyo cazibi, aimwi ibe cipaizyo cakutenta, aboobo mupaizi ulamumanina milandu kubusyu bwa-Jehova nkaambo kabusofwi bwasenselwa lyakwe.
Mbuubede mulao wayooyo uusensa, awayooyo uusuba bwaalum bwakwe akulisofwaazya mbubo,
awamwanakazi uuciswa kuciindi cakwe, nkokuti wamuntu woonse, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, uusensa, awamwaalumi uuona amwanakazi uusofweede.

Jehova wakaa­ mbila Musa kuti, Ambila munyoko Aroni kuti atanoonjili ziindi zyoonse mubusena busalalisya loko mukati kacisitilizyo, kunembo lyacuuno caluzyalo atala lyabbokesi lya-Leza, kuti atafwi, nkaambo noolibonya mujoba atala lyacuuno caluzyalo.
Pele mbuboobu Aroni mbweelede kunjila mubusena busalala. Aletelele kacende kabe cipaizyo cazibi, amugutu abe cipaizyo cakutenta.
Asame cibaki cisalalisya cituba, akabbudula katuba mucikungu, alukumba lwasani lituba, acitambala casani lituba amutwe. Nzeezyo zyakusama zisalalisya. Asambe amubili, azisame,
Alimwi kumbungano yabana ba-Israyeli atambule basijembwe bobile, babe cipaizyo cazibi, amugutu omwe abe cipaizyo cakutenta.
Amana obo, alete basijembwe bobile akubaimika kubusyu bwa-Jehova kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Nkabela Aroni uleelede kuwaalila basijembwe zisolo, cimwi cibe ca-Jehova acimwi cibe ca-Azazeli.
Lino Aroni alete oyo sijembwe iwakawidwa cisolo ca-Jehova, amutuule, abe cipaizyo cazibi,
pele sijembwe iwakawidwa cisolo ca-Azazeli aletwe ucili mumbulu kuli-Jehova, kuti kwaambawidwe milandu alinguwe, atandilwe musokwe kuli-Azazeli.
Lino Aroni alete kacende kacipaizyo cazibi cakwe alike, amanye milandu yakwe amilandu yabasiŋanda bakwe, Ajaye ako kacende, kabe cipaizyo cazibi zyakwe mwini.
Lino abweze lukaye luzwide makala aamulilo kuzwa kucipaililo cili kubusyu bwa-Jehova, abweze amaanza aakwe aazwide tununkilizyo tubotu tuziidwe kabotu, azinjizye mukati kacisitilizyo.
Lino abike tununkilizyo amulilo kubusyu bwa-Jehova, kuti busi bwatununkilizyo buvumbe cuuno caluzyalo cili abbokesi lyacizuminano, kuti atafwi.
Alimwi akombole bulowa bwakacende, asansaile amunwe wakwe kunembo lyacuuno caluzyalo kujwe, akwalo kunembo lyacuuno caluzyalo asansaile amunwe wakwe ziindi zili musanu azibili.

Aboobo ulamanya milandu yacikombelo, nkaambo kabusofwi bwabana ba-Israyeli amilandu yabo azibi zyabo zyoonse. Alyalo itente lyambunganino ulalicitila mbubonya, nkaambo lilikede abo mukati kabusofwi bwabo.
Nkabela takweelede kuba muntu naba omwe mutente lyambunganine naniila kukumanya milandu mubusena busalala, mane azwe, amana kumanya milandu yakwe ayabasiŋanda bakwe ayambungano yoonse yabaIsrayeli.
Amana obo ainke kucipaililo cili kunembo lya-Jehova, amanye milandu yaco, Akombole bulowa bwakacende abulowa bwasijembwe, abulambe ameja aacipaililo.
Asansaile bulowa amunwe wakwe ziindi zili musanu azibili alincico, kuti acisalazye akucisupuzya kubusofwi bwabana ba-Israyeli.

Elyo Aroni abike maanza aakwe oonse obile amutwe wasijembwe muumi, alyaambe alinguwe milandu yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli ansotoko zyabo zyoonse azibi zyabo zyoonse, azibike amutwe wasijembwe, amutandile musokwe kujanza lyamuntu uulibambide.
Aboobo sijembwe ulatolelela milandu yabo yoonse kuntantaanwa. Lino amuleke sijembwe ainke musokwe.
Asambe amubili omo mubusena busalala akusama zyakusama zyakwe. Amana obo azwe kukutuula cipaizyo cakwe cakutenta acipaizyo cabantu, kuti amanye milandu yakwe amilandu yabantu.
Amafuta aacipaizyo cazibi aatente acipaililo.
Amuntu oyo uutola sijembwe kuli-Azazeli, alakwe asanzye zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili, elyo anjile mumunzi.

Alimwi kacende kacipaizyo cazibi asijembwe wacipaizyo cazibi, bali abulowa ibwakaletwa kukumanya milandu yabusena busalala, batolwe anze lyamunzi, Zikanda zyabo anyama yabo azifusi zyabo zyoonse zitentwe mumulilo.
Ayooyo uuzitenta uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili, elyo anjile mumunzi.
Nkaambo buzuba obo mbobuzuba bwakumanya milandu yanu abwakumusalazya kuzibi zyanu, kuti musalale mumeso aa-Jehova.
Mbobuzuba bwa-Sabata, buzuba busalalisya bwakulyokezya abwakubombya myoyo yanu; ngumulao walyoonse.
Mupaizi uunanikwa, uusalazigwa kuti abe mupaizi mucibaka cawisi, ngonguwe uuelede kumanya milandu, Nguuelede kusuma zyakusama zyamasani aatuba, zyakusama zisalalisya,
kuti amanye milandu yabusena busalala, amilandu yatente lyambunganino ayacipaililo, amilandu yabapaizi ayabantu boonse bambungano.
Oyu mulao ulaba mulao walyoonse kulindinywe, kuti milandu yabana ba-Israyeli imanisigwe komwe mumwaka nkaambo kazibi zyabo. Nkabela Musa wakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamulailila.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila Aroni abana bakwe abana boonse ba-Israyeli, kuti, Mbuboobu Jehova mbwaakalailila.
Kufumbwa muntu waluzubo lwa-Israyeli uujaya ŋombe nanka kabelele nanka impongo mumalabba naaba anze lyamalabba,

na taleti kumulyango watente lyambunganino, kuti acipaizye mbuli cipaizyo ca-Jehova kunembo lyatente lyambunganino, oyo muntu ulapegwa mulandu wabulowa. Watila bulowa, Oyo muntu ulatandwa muciinga cakwe.
Oyu mulao ngwakuti bana ba-Israyeli balete zipaizyo zyabo nzibapaizya musokwe, bazilete kuliJehova kumulyango watente lyambunganino, kumupaizi, bazituule mbuli zituuzyo zyakutontozya kuli-Jehova.
Mupaizi asansaile bulowa acipaililo ca-Jehova kumulyango watente lyambunganino, akutenta mafuta, kube bweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Aboobo mukupaizya kwabo tabakooyoopaila limbi zyeelo, nzibali kuyandaula cabwaamu. Oyu ulaba mulao walyoonse akati kabo mumazyalani aabo oonse.
Alimwi kobaambila kuti, Kufumbwa muntu waluzubo lwa-Israyeli, naba mweenzu uukala-kala akati kanu, uutuula cituuzyo na cipaizyo,
na tacileti kumulyango watente lyambunganino kuti acituulile Jehova, oyo muntu ulatandwa muciinga cakwe.
Nkaambo mubulowa mobubede buumi bwanyama, alimwi mbombubo mbondimupede acipaililo kuti bumanye milandu yanu, nkaambo bulowa mbobumanya milandu nkaambo kabuumi.
Nciceeco ncindaambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Kutabi muntu naba omwe akati kanu uulya bulowa, naba mweenzu uukala-kala akati kanu, atalyi bulowa pe.
Kufumbwa muntu wabana ba-Israyeli, nanka mweenzu uukala-kala akati kabo, uuvwima akujaya munyama na muyuni uuligwa, uleelede kutila bulowa ansi akubuvumbaabulengo.

Alimwi kufumbwa muntu uulya cilifwida nanka cilumwa kubanyama, naba muzyalwemucisi naba mweenzu, asanzye zyakusama zyakwe, akusamba amubili akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba, elyo ulasalala.
Pele na tazisanzyi nanka kusamba, ulijisi mulandu.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Mutaciti mbuli ziyanza zyanyika ya­ Egepita, nkumwakakede; alimwimutaciti mbuli ziyanza zyanyika ya-Kanana, nkondimutola. Mutatobeli milao yabo pe.
Amucite milao yangu akubamba imbeta zyangu, mweende mulinzizyo. Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Amubambe imbeta zyangu amilao yangu, nkaambo nzenzizyo ziletela muntu buumi kufumbwa uuzicita, Ndime Jehova.
Kutabi muntu akati kanu uuswena kulisiluzubonyina kuti amuvumbwide cinswe. Ndime Jehova.
Toelede kuvumbula cinswe causo, nkokuti cinswe cabanyoko; mbubali banyoko, utabavumbwidi cinswe.
Toelede kuvumbula cinswe camukauso, nkaambo ncecinswe causo.
Acalo cinswe camucizi wako, mwana wauso na mwana wabanyoko, naba muzyalwemuŋanda naba muzyalwekule utabavumbwidi cinswe pe.
Acalo cinswe camwana wamwanaako mwaalumi na wamwanaako musimbi, utabavumbwidi cinswe pe, nkaambo ncecinswe cako omwini.
Acalo cinswe camwana wamukauso, ngwaakazyala uso, ngumucizi wako, utamuvumbwidi cinswe.
Toelede kuvumbula cinswe camucizi wauso, nkaambo ndoluzubo lwauso.
Toelede kuvumbula cinswe camucizi wabanyoko, nkaambo ndoluzubo lwabanyoko,
Acalo cinswe camunyina uso tnwaalumi, utamuvumbwidi cinswe pe; utayi kubanakwe, nkaambo mbanyoko.
Toelede kuvumbula cinswe camukamwanaako; mbwali mukamwana wako, utamuvumbwidi cinswe pe.
Toelede kuvumbula cinswe camukamunyoko, nkaambo ncecinswe camunyoko.
Utavumbuli cinswe camwanakazi acinswe camwanaakwe; alimwi utatoli mwana wamwanaakwe, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, kuti umuvumbwide cinswe, nkaambo ndoluzubo lwabo. Ngamalweza.
Alimwi utatoli mwanakazi kuti abe mukwatwanyina kumucizi wakwe kukumupenzya; utamuvumbwidi cinswe, mucizi wakwe naaci muumi.
Utalaliki mukamweenzinyoko kukulisofwaazya anguwe.
Utapi bana bako kukutentela Moleki, kuti utasofwaazyi izina lya-Leza wako. Ndime Jehova.
Utaoni amwaaluminyoko mbubonya mbuli koona amwanakazi; malweza.
Utaoni amunyama akulisofwaazya awe; alakwe mwanakazi ataoni amunyama; ndupilingano.
Nyika yakasofwaazigwa, aboobo ndakaiboozezya bulumbu bweelede zibi zyayo, nkabela nyika yakaluka bantu bakede mulinjiyo.
Lino nywebo, amubambe milao yangu ambeta zyangu. Mutaciti zisesemyo zili boobu, pe, naba muzyalwemucisi naba mweenzu uukalakala akati kanu,
(nkaambo bantu ibakamutaangunina kukala mucisi bakacita zisesemyo ezi zyoonse, aboobo nyika yakasofwaazigwa);
kuti nyika itamuluki, nemwaisofwaazya, mbubonya mbuli mbuyakaluka bantu ibakamutaangunina.
Nkaambo kufumbwa bantu bacita zisesemyo zili boobu, abo bantu balatandwa muciinga cabo.
Nkaambo kako amubambe imbeta zyangu, mutaciti neciba cimwi caziyanza ezi zisesemya izyakacitwa kunembo lyanu. Mutalisofwaazyi anzizyo pe. Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila imbungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli kuti, Amusalale, nkaamboridasalala mebo nde­ Jehova Leza wanu.
Amulemeke umwi aumwi wisi abanyina; alimwi amubambe masabata aangu. Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Mutatobeli zikozyano zyamizimu, nekuba kulifulila baleza bambi. Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Na mwatuulila Jehova cituuzyo cakutontozya, amucituule kuti citambulike.
Cileelede kuligwa buzuba obo mbubonya bwakupaizya nanka mubuzuba butobela; na kwasyaala cintu mubuzuba bwatatu, citentwe amulilo.
Na kwaligwa cintu neciba comwe mubuzuba bwatatu, ncisesemyo, tacitambuliki pe.
Kufumbwa muntu uucilya ulaba amulandu, nkaambo wasofwaazya cintu cisalala ca-Jehova. Oyo muntu ulatandwa muciinga cakwe.
Awalo muunda wako wamasaansa, utacelesyi micelo yoonse nekuba kubweza iilokela ansi. Uisiile bacete abeenzu, Ndime Jehova Leza wanu,
Alimwi mutakonki cakubeja muzina lyangu kukusofwaazya izina lya-Leza wanu. Ndime Jehova.
Utasampauli musinkematwi nanka kubika itanda kunembo lyamoofu. Uyoowe Leza wako. Ndime Jehova.
Uteendeendi mukulengelela twaambo akati kabantu bako; alimwi utalwisyi buumi bwamweenzinyoko. Ndime Jehova.
Utaliyi inkoto nekuba kuba simfundilizi kubana babantu bako; yanda mweenzinyoko mbubonya mboliyanda omwini. Ndime Jehova.
Na mwaalumi walalika mwanakazi muzike uukalidwe kumuntu, pele tana kunununwa nanka kwaangunuka, baleelede kuumwa; batajayigwi pe, nkaambo takwakaangulukide.
Aliletele cipaizyo camilandu kuli-Jehova kumulyango watente lyambunganino. Alete sijembwe, abe cipaizyo cakwe camilandu.
Elyo mupaizi amumanine milandu asijembwe oyo wacipaizyo oko kunembo lya-Jehova, nkaambo kacibi ncaakabisya. Lino ulalekelelwa kucibi ncaakabisya.
Mwasika kunyika akubyala misamu yoonse iiligwa, micelo yayo ilayeeyegwa kuti tiipalwidwe. Myaka yotatwe inooba mbuli iitapalwidwe. Italigwi.
Lino mumwaka wane micelo yayo yoonse iyoosalala, ibe cipaizyo cakulumbya Jehova.
Amumwaka wasanu muyoolya micelo yayo, kuti imuzyalile, ivule. Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Mutalikululi kuzyooko zyamitwe yanu; alimwi utabisyi zyooko zyacilezu cako.
Mutalinengi amibili yanu nkaambo kabafu, nanka kulilembaula insimbo. Ndime Jehova.
Amubambe masabata aangu akulemeka cikombelo cangu. Ndime Jehova.
Mweenzu uukala akati kanu abe mbubonya mbuli muzyalwemucisi; uleelede kumuyanda mboliyanda omwini; nkaambo anywebo mwakali beenzu mucisi ca-Egepita. Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Muleelede kuba azipimyo ziluleme amabwe aaluleme kukupimya bulemu, acisuwo ciluleme cakweelesya ankomeki iiluleme. Ndime Jehova Leza wanu iwakamugwisya munyika yaEgepita.
Amubambe milao yangu ambeta zyangu, muzicite zyoonse. Ndime Jehova.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,

Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Kufumbwa muntu wabana ba-Israyeli, na wabeenzu bakalakala akati kaba-Israyeli, uupa bana bakwe kukupaizya Moleki, ncobeni oyo muntu uleelede kufwa, Bantu bacisi bamufuse mabwe,
Ambebo njooba sinkondonyina oyo muntu akumutanda muciinga cakwe, nkaambo wapa Moleki lunyungu lwakwe, aboobo wasofwaazya cikombelo cangu akusampaula izina lyangu lisalala.
Nkabela bantu bamunyika, na basisa meso aabo kumuntu oyo naapa Moleki lunyungu lwakwe, akutamujaya,
mebo njoolwisya oyo muntu aluzubo lwakwe, njoobatanda muciinga cabo, nkokuti muntu oyo aboonse bamutobela kukucita bumambe a-Moleki.
Aboobo amulisalazye, musalale, nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Amubambe milao yangu, mwiicite. Ndime Jehova uumusalazya.
Kufumbwa muntu uutukila wisi na banyina, ajayigwe. Mbwatukila wisi abanyina, bulowa bwakwe ngu mulandu wakwe,
Alakwe muntu uulalika mukawisi, wavumbula cinswe cawisi; balajayigwa boonse bobile, Bulowa bwabo ngumulandu wabo.
Amuntu uulalika mukamwanaakwe, ncobeni balajayigwa boonse bobile. Bacita malweza. Bulowa bwabo ngumulandu wabo.
Alimwi na mwaalumi woona amwaaluminyina mbubonya mbuli koona amwanakazi, boonse buyo bacita cisesemyo. Ncobeni baleelede kufwa, Bulowa bwabo ngumulandu wabo.
Amuntu uukwata mwanakazi, alimwi amwanaakwe mwanakazi oyo, ngemalweza. Batentwe mumulilo, mwaalumi abanakazi boonse, kuti kutabi malweza akati kanu.
Na muntu woona amunyama, ncobeni uleelede kufwa, alakwe munyama ajayigwe.
Alakwe mwanakazi, na waswanana amunyama kuti aone awe, muleelede kujaya oyo mwanakazi amunyama woonse. Ncobeni baleelede kufwa. Bulowa bwabo ngumulandu wabo.

Alimwi na muntu woona amwanakazi uuciswa akuvumbula cinswe cakwe, nkokuti wavumbula kasensa kakwe, alakwe mwanakazi wamuvumbwida kasensa kabulowa bwakwe, boonse bobile baleelede kutandwa muciinga cabo.
Utavumbuli cinswe camucizi wauso na camucizi wabanyoko, nkaambo nkokuvumbula cinswe casiluzubonyoko, Bacita obo balapegwa mulandu.
Alakwe muntu uuona amukasimizyaakwe, wavumbula cinswe casimizyaakwe; balapegwa mulandu; balafwa kabatajisi bana.
Alimwi na muntu wakwata mukamunyina, ncecintu cisofweede; wavumbula cinswe camunyina; balafwa kabatajisi bana,
Muteendi muziyanza zyabamasi mbentanda kubusyu bwanu, nkaambo balacita zintu ezi zyoonse, aboobo ndabasesemwa.
Lino nywebo, ndamwaambila kuti muyoovuba nyika yabo; ndamupa njiyo kuti mwiivube, nyika iikunka malili abuci, Ndime Jehova Leza wanu iwakamupambula kulibamasi.

Amwaandaanye banyama basalala abasofweede, bayuni basofweede abayuni basalala; mutaliciti zisesemyo kubanyama akubayuni akuzilenge zyoonse ziyavula munyika; zyoonse nzendapambula kuti zisofwaale mumeso aanu.
Amusalale mumeso aangu, nkaambo mebo nde-Jehova ndasalala, alimwi ndamupambula kulibamasi, kuti mube bangu.
cita sikamukowanyina loko, mbuli banyina, na wisi, na mwanaakwe mulombe, na mwanaakwe musimbi, na munyina,
na mucizi wakwe uutakwetwe, (Uli afwiifwi kulinguwe, nkaambo katanakwatwa, aboobo ulakonzya kulisofwaazya nkaambo kakwe.)
Teelede kulisofwaazya mbuli mulumi akati kabantu bakwe, kuti atasampauliki.
Batalinyooli kumutwe nanka kunyoola zyooko zyacilezu nanka kulinengaula amubili
Basalale kubusyu bwa-Leza wabo, kuti batasofwaazyi izina lyaLeza wabo, nkaambo mbembabo batuula zipaizyo zitentelwa Jehova, zilyo zya-Leza wabo, aboobo baleelede kusalala.
Batakwati mwanakazi simamambe nanka iwakasofwaazigwa; batakwati mwanakazi iwakalekana amulumaakwe; nkaambo mupaizi ulasalala kumeso aa-Leza wakwe.
Muleelede kumusalazya, nkaambo ngonguwe uutuula zilyo zya-Leza wako; uleelede kusalala kumeso aako, nkaambo ndasalala mebo nde-Jehova uumusalazya.
Kufumbwa mwana musimbi wamupaizi uulisofwaazya kukucita bwaamu, wasofwaazya wisi; atentwe mumulilo.
Teelede kunjila muli mutunta nekuba kulisofwaazya kulila wisi na banyina.
Alimwi teelede kuzwa mucikombelo nekuba kusofwaazya cikombelo ca-Leza wakwe, nkaambo munsini wakunanika kwa-Leza wakwe uli alinguwe. Ndime Jehova.
Akwate mwanakazi nakalindu.
Teelede kukwata mukamufu nanka muleke nanka iwakabisigwa nanka sibuvuule. Akwate nakalindu akati kabantu bakwe,
kuti atasofwaazyi lunyungu lwakwe akati kabantu bakwe, nkaambo ndime Jehova uumusalazya.
Alimwi Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila Aroni kuti, Kufumbwa muntu akati kalunyungu lwako mumazyalani aabo uujisi kampenda teelede kuswena afwaafwi kuzootuula zilyo zya-Leza wakwe.
Kufumbwa muntu uujisi kampenda atatuuli: naba moofu naba mulema naba mubambasumpemo naba uulampya cizo cimwi,
naba muntu mulema cituta na ijanza,
naba mulemamusana nekaba kandondoyo naba sicimbolyo naba sicibulu naba sibwele naba muzibe;
kutabi muntu naba omwe akati kabana ba-Aroni uujisi kampenda uuswena kufwaafwi kuzootuula zipaizyo zitentelwa Jehova. Mbwajisi kampenda atasweni kuzootuula zilyo zya-Leza wakwe pe.
Zilyo zya-Leza wakwe, neziba zintu zisalala neziba zintu zisalalisya loko, azilye zyoonse,
pele teelede kunjila mukati kacisitilizyo nanka kuswena kufwaafwi kucipaililo, nkaambo ulijisi kampenda; kuti atasofwaazyi cikombelo cangu, nkaambo ndime Jehova uubasalazya.
Aboobo Musa wakaambila Aroni abana bakwe abana boonse ba-Israyeli.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila Aroni abana bakwe kuti balipambule azintu zisalala zyabana ba-Israyeli nzibandisalazizya, kuti batasofwaazyi izina lyangu lisalalisya, Ndime Jehova.

Kobaambila kuti, Kufumbwa muntu walunyungu lwanu mumazyalani aanu oonse uuswena kufwaafwi kuzintu zisalala zyabana ba-Israyeli nzibasalazizya Jehova, nacisofweede, oyo muntu ulatandwa kubusyu bwangu. Ndime Jehova.

Kufumbwa muntu akati kabana ba-Aroni uuli acinsenda na lusenso teelede kulya zintu zisalalisya mane akasalale. Alimwi kufumbwa uuampa cintu cisofweede nkaambo kamufu nanka mwaalumi uusofweede bwaalumi bwakwe,
na muntu uuampa ciyavula ansi cikonzya kusofwaazya nanka muntu uukonzya kumusofwaazya abusofwi buli buti abuti—
muntu uuampa cintu cili boobo ulasofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba, alimwi teelede kulya zintu zisalalisya cita sansi asambe amubili.
Lino izuba lyabbila buyo ulasalala; musule lyaboobo ulakonzya kulya zintu zisalalisya, nkaambo nzezilyo zyakwe.
Munyama uulifwida nanka uulumwa, teelede kulya nyama yakwe pe, kuti atalisofwaazyi. Ndime Jehova.
Babambe lubeta lwangu, kuti batajani kaambo, batafwi ciindi cakulisofwaazya. Ndime Jehova uubasalazya.
Pele na mupaizi waula muntu amali aakwe, oyo muntu alye. Abaabo ibazyalwa muŋanda yakwe, abo balalya cilyo cakwe.
Na mwana musimbi wamupaizi wakwatwa kumuzwakule, teelede kulya zilyo zyacipaizyo cazintu zisalalisya.

Pele na oyo mwana musimbi wamupaizi wafwidwa mulumi na kulekwa, nkabela taakwe bana, alimwi waboola kuŋanda yawisi mbubonya mbuli mumazuba aabwanike bwakwe, alye zilyo, zyawisi. Pele kutabi muzwakule uuzilya pe.
Na muntu walya cintu cisalalisya mukutaziba, uleelede kuyungizya cipanzi casanu akuboozezya mupaizi eco cintu cisalalisya.
Batasofwaazyi zintu zisalalisya zyabana ba-Israyeli nzebaletela Jehova,
kuti batajani mulandu ciindi cakulya zintu zisalalisya, nkaambo ndime Jehova uubasalazya.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,

Ambila Aroni abana bakwe abana boonse ba-Israyeli kuti, Kufumbwa muntu waluzubo lwa-Israyeli, na wabeenzu bakalakala mucisi ca-Israyeli, uuleta cipaizyo cakwe, neciba cipaizyo cakukonkezya neciba cakupa buyo, zyoonse nzebaletela Jehova kukumutentela,
na muyanda kutambulika, cibe mucende uutakwe kampenda akati kaŋombe nanka imbelele nanka impongo.
Cintu cijisi kampenda, mutacipaizyi pe, nkaambo tacitambuliki.
Amuntu uutuulila Jehova cipaizyo cakutontozya, neciba cakukonkezya neciba cakupa buyo, munyama ngwaleta, niiba iŋombe niiba imbelele, uleelede kululama kuti atambulike; atabi akampenda nekaba komwe.
Moofu na uutyokede na mulema na uuli azilonda na sicibulu na sibwele, abo boonse toelede kubapaizizya Jehova nekuba kubatentela Jehova acipaililo.
Musune na kabelele uulampya cizo cimwi na uucesya cizo cimwi ulakonzya kuba cipaizyo cakupa buyo, pele tatambuliki mbuli cipaizyo cacikonsyo.
Munyama uuli amacende aapwayikide na aapasukide na aalebukide nanka uuzibidwe tamweelede kumutuulila Jehova na kumupaizya mucisi canu.
Abanyama bali boobo baulidwe kumweenzu, abalo tamweelede kubaleta mbuli zilyo zyaLeza wanu, Babija, balijisi kampenda, aboobo tabatambuliki.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Iŋombe na imbelele na impongo niizyalwa, ileelede kukala kulibanyina mazuba aali musanu aabili; lino kuzwa kubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu ilatambulika mbuli cipaizyo cakutentela Jehova.
Iŋombe na imbelele impwizi, mutaijayi abana bayo boonse mubuzuba bomwe.
Alimwi na mwapaizizya Jehova cipaizyo cakulumba, amupaizye kabotu kuti mutambulike.
Ciligwe mubuzuba bomwe; citasyaali mane kubucedo pe, Ndime Jehova.
Mutasofwaazyi izina lyangu lisalalisya. Ndemekwe akati kabana ba-Israyeli, Ndime Jehova uumusalazya,
iwakamupozya munyika ya-Egepita, kuti mbe Leza wanu, Ndime Jehova.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Ngaaya mapobwe aangu aabikidwe, mapobwe aa-Jehova ngemweelede kusalazya mbuli imbungano zisalala.

Mazuba aali musanu abumwi amucite milimo, pele buzuba bwamusanu aabili mbobuzuba bwa-Sabata bwakulyokezya, imbungano iisalalisya. Mutaciti mulimo nuuba umwi mulimbubo. Mbobuzuba bwa-Sabata bwa-Jehova mumaanda aanu oonse.
Mumwezi mutaanzi, mubuzuba bwakumi aane bwamumwezi, kuciindi cagoko, ndipobwe lya-Pasika lya-Jehova.
Alimwi mubuzuba bwakumi amusanu bwamwezi oyo nguwenya ndipobwe lya-Jehova lyakulya zinkwa zitakwe bumena. Mazuba aali musanu aabili muleelede kulya zinkwa zitakwe bumena.
Mubuzuba butaanzi kunooba imbungano iisalala. Mutaciti milimo yamitukuta pe.
Lino amutentele Jehova cipaizyo mazuba aali musanu aabili. Amubuzuba bwamusanu aabili kunooba imbungano iisalala; mutaciti milimo yamitukuta.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mwasika buyo kunyika njendamupa, ciindi cakutebula zilyo zyayo, muleelede kuleta musunge wakabalwebalwe kakutebula kwanu kumupaizi,
elyo ayumbe oyo musunge kubusyu bwa-Jehova, kuti mutambulike. Mubuzuba butobela Sabata mupaizi auyumbe.
Lino mubuzuba obo bwakuyumba musunge muleelede kutentela Jehova cipaizyo cakagutu kamwaka omwe katakwe kampenda.

Acipaizyo cabusu antoomwe cilaba zipanzi zyobile zyakumi zyalusuwo lwabusu bunante buvwelene amafuta; citentelwe Jehova, cipaizyo cili abweema bubotezya, Acalo cipaizyo cakunywa cibe waini, cipanzi cane cansazi.
Mutalyi zinkwa naaba maila mayoke naaba makunka matete mane san si mulete cipaizyo ca-Leza wanu, Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu oonse mumakalilo aanu oonse.
Nkokuti mazuba aali makumi osanwe kusikila kubuzuba butobela buzuba bwa-Sabata bwamusanu aabili, Elyo mulatuulila Jehova cipaizyo cabusu bupya,
Amugwisye mumaanda aanu zinkwa zyobile zyakuyumba, zili azipanzi zyobile zyakumi zyalusuwo lwabusu bunante bujikidwe abumena, zibe zyakusoma zya-Jehova.

Alimwi antoomwe azinkwa ezyo amulete tubelele tuli musanu atubili tutakwe kampenda tujisi mwaka omwe, amunamani omwe, abagutu bobile, babe cipaizyo cakutentela Jehova, antoomwe azipaizyo zyabo zyabusu azipaizyo zyakunywa, cituuzyo cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Alimwi amutuuzye sijembwe omwe, abe cipaizyo cazibi, atubelele tobile tuli amwaka omwe, tube cipaizyo caku tonto zya.
Mupaizi aziyumbe antoomwe azilyo zyakusoma, zibe cipaizyo cakuyumba kubusyu bwa-Jehova, antoomwe atubelele tobile. Zilasalalila Jehova, zilaba zyamupaizi.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo mbubonya amulwiide bantu, kube imbungano iisalalisya. Mutaciti mulimo nuuba omwe wamitukuta. Ngumulao walyoonse mumakalilo aanu oonse mumazyalani aanu oonse.
Alimwi Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mumwezi wamusanu aibili, mubuzuba butaanzi bwamumwezi, amubambe buzuba bwakulyokezya, buzuba bwakulizya myeembo yakwiibalusya, imbungano iisalalisya.
Mutaciti mulimo nuuba omwe wamitukuta; amutentele Jehova cipaizyo.
Mubuzuba bwakumi bwamwezi oyo wamusanu aibili, mbobuzuba bwakumanya milandu, Kulaba imbungano iisalala, nkabela muleelede kubombya myoyo yanu akutentela Jehova cipaizyo.
Mubuzuba obo mbubonya mutaciti mulimo nuuba omwe, nkaambo mbobuzuba bwakumanya milandu, kuti mumanye milandu yanu kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu.
Kufumbwa muntu uutabombya moyo wakwe mubuzuba obo ulatandwa muciinga cakwe.
Alakwe muntu uucita milimo mubuzuba obo mbubonya, njoomunyonyoona akati kabantu bakwe.
Mutaciti mulimo nuuba omwe, Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani­ aanu oonse mumakalilo aanu oonse.
Mbobuzuba busalalisya bwakulyokezya, nkabela muleelede kubombya myoyo yanu. Mubuzuba bwamusanu aane bwamumwezi, kutalika ciindi camangolezya, amubambe Sabata, kuzwa kumabbililo kusikila kumabbililo.
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mubuzuba bwakumi amusanu bwamumwezi oyo wamusanu aibili, amazuba aali musanu aabili aatobela ndipobwe lyazilao lya-Jehova.
Mubuzuba butaanzi kulaba imbungano iisalala, Mutaciti milimo yamitukuta.

Mazuba aali musanu aabili amutentele Jehova zipaizyo. Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu kulaba imbungano iisalala, nkabela mulatentela Jehova cipaizyo; njembungano iisalalisya; mutaciti mulimo nuuba omwe wamitukuta.

Ngaayo mapobwe aabikidwe aa-Jehova ngemweelede kubamba, abe ziindi zyakubungana kusalalisya, azyakuletela Jehova zipaizyo zyakutenta, zituuzyo azipaizyo zyabusu, zipaizyo azituuzyo zyakunywa, cimwi acimwi muhuzuba bwaco bweelede;
kunze lyamasabata aa-Jehova, kunze lyazipo zyanu azikonkyo zyanu azilumbyo zyanu nzemuletela Jehova.
Lino mubuzuba butaanzi amubweze micelo yamisamu mibotu, amangwalala aatukunka, amitabi yamisamu iivovwede, amizimbwa yakutulonga, musekelele kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu mazuba aali musanu aabili.
Libe ipobwe lya-Jehova mazuba aali musanu aabili aamumwaka. Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu oonse. Eli ipobwe lilaba mumwezi wamusanu aibili.
Amukale muzilao mazuba aali musanu aabili; boonse bazyalwe bamucisi ca-Israyeli bakale muzilao,
kuti bana banu bamazyalani oonse bazibe kuti ndakakazika bana ba-Israyeli muzilao ciindi eciya nendakabapozya munyika ya-Egepita. Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Elyo Musa wakalwiida bana ba-Israyeli mapobwe aabikidwe aa-Jehova.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Lailila bana ba-Israyeli kuti bamu letele mafuta aasalala aamaolifa aaengedwe aakumunisya ilampi, kuti ilampi kaliyaka lyoonse.
Anze lyacisitilizyo camulao mutente lyakubunganina, Aroni mpaelede kulibamba lyoonse, kumazuba acifumofumo, kubusyu bwa-Jehova, Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu oonse.
Abambe malampi lyoonse aciimikilo cisalala kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Nkabela uleelede kuzibamba mumilongo yobile, nkokuti musanu acimwi mumulongo umwi aumwi, antafule iisalala kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Alimwi bika tununkilizyo tusalala twalibano amulongo umwi aumwi, kuti tube antoomwe azinkwa, tube cipaizyo cakwiibalusya cakutentela Jehova.
Mubuzuba bumwi abumwi bwaSabata Aroni azibambe kubusyu bwa-Jehova; acitile bana ba-Israyeli, kuti kube cizuminano citeeli.
Zilaba zya-Aroni azyabana bakwe, bazilye mubusena busalala; ncecaabilo cakwe cisalalisya akati kazipaizyo zitentelwa Jehova; ngumulao walyoonse.
Lino kakweenda akati kabana ba-Israyeli umwi muntu, mwana wamwanakazi mu-Israyeli; wisi kali mu-Egepita, Oyo mwana wamwanakazi mu-Israyeli wakakazyanya mumalabba amwaalumi mu-Israyeli.
Nkabela mwana wamwanakazi mu-Israyeli wakasampaula izina lya-Leza akutukila, Mpawo bakamuleta kuli-Musa. Izina lyabanyina bakali Selomiti mwana wa-Dibri wamusyobo wa-Dani.
Nkabela bakamubika muntolongo mane bakayubunwidwe kuyanda kwa-Jehova.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Oyo muntu iwakatukila, amumulete anze lyamalabba. Lino boonse ibakamumvwa babike maanza aabo amutwe wakwe, abasimbungano boonse bamufuse mabwe.
Alimwi ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Kufumbwa muntu uutukila Leza wakwe ulapegwa mulandu.
Uusampaula izina lya-Jehova ncobeni ulajayigwa, basimbungano boonse bamufuse mabwe. Kufumbwa muntu, naba muzyalwemucisi naba mweenzu, uusampaula izina lya-Leza uleelede kufwa.
Ayooyo uujaya muntunyina ncobeni uleelede kufwa.
Amuntu uujaya munyama, uleelede kuliya mbubonya, buumi mucibaka cabuumi.
Alimwi muntu uupa mweenzinyina kampenda uleelede kucitilwa mbubonya mbwaakacita,
luumo kuluumo, liso kuliso, lino kulino. Mbuli mbwaakabisizya mweenzinyina, ulacitilwa mbubonya obo.
Uujaya munyama aliye; uujaya muntu ajayigwe.
Kube mulao omwe buyo kubantu boonse, naba mweenzu naba muzyalwe mucisi, nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mwasika buyo kunyika njenti mupe, nyika ileelede kuba a-Sabata lya-Jehova.
Myaka iili musanu aumwi ubyale munuunda wako; myaka iili musanu aumwi uzibe muunda wako wamisaansa akutebula micelo yako.
Pele munwaka wamusanu aibili inyika ipegwe Sabata lyakulyokezya, Sabata lya-Jehova, Utabyali mumuunda wako nekuba kuziba misaansa yako.
Utatebuli cintu cilimenena mumuunda wako nekuba kucela micelo iilimenena kumisaansa yako. Nyika ipegwe mwaka wa-Sabata wakulyokezya.
Oyo mwaka wa-Sabata lyanyika ulakuletela zilyo, yebo amulanda wako mwaalumi amulanda wako musimbi asimilimo wako abeenzu mbokede abo;
azyalo iŋombe zyako abanyama bali munyika yako, zintu zilimenena zilaba zilyo zyabo.
Lino ubale insondo zili musanu azibili zyamyaka, nkokuti myaka iili musanu aibili ziindululwe ziindi zili musanu azibili, ciindi cansondo ezyo zyamyaka cilasika kumyaka iili makumi one amusanu aine.
Lino mubuzuba bwakumi bwamumwezi wamusanu aibili kulizigwe mweembo canguzu; mubuzuba bwakumanya milandu mweembo ulile koonse koonse munyika.
Nkabela mwaka wamakumi osanwe, muleelede kuusalazya akuswiilizya bantu boonse bakede munyika makani aakwaangunuka, Myeembo ilile, kuti mubweede umwi aumwi kulukono lwakwe akuluzubo lwakwe.
Oyo mwaka wamakumi osanwe umubede mwaka wakulizya myeembo; mulinguwo tamweelede kubyala nekuba kutebula zilimenena nekuba kucela micelo yakumisaansa yako iitazibidwe.
Nkaambo ngumwaka wakulizya myeembo; ulamusalalila; mulalya neuumupa mumyuunda.
Na waulisya nanka kuula kumweenzinyoko, mutabbidani.
Mbuli mweelwe wamyaka kuzwa kumwaka wakulizya myeembo mbubonya obo mboelede kuula kumweenzinyoko; ambuli mweelwe wamyaka yakulima zilyo, mbubonya obo mbweelede kukuulisizya.
Na myaka yavula, amukomezye muulo; na myaka yaceya, amucesye muulo; nkaambo ngumweelwe wazyakulya ngwakuulisizya.
Mutabbidani pe; amuyoowe Leza wanu; nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Lino nyika ilamupa zyakulya, kuti mulye cakukuta akukala caluumuno.
Pele na mwaamba kuti, Ino tuyoolyanzi mumwaka wamusanu aibili, na tatukonzyi kubyala nikuba kutebula zyakulya?
Amubone! Njoomupa coolwe cangu mumwaka wamusanu aumwi, kuti umuletele ceyo camyaka yotatwe.
Mumwaka wamusanu aitatu mulabyala, pele munoocilya zilyo zyakale; munoocilya zilyo zyakale mane kusikila mwaka wamusanu aine, mane mukatebule.
Nyika tiielede kuulilwa limwi pe, nkaambo nyika njiyangu; nkaambo muli beenzu buyo kulindime, muli basikutuntulika.
Lino nyika yoonse njimuvubide muleelede kuzumina kuti nyika inununwe.
Pele na muntu wabula sikumununwida, elyo kaba kaindi wavuba akujana cakununuzya,
abale myaka kuzwa kuciindi eco naakaulisya, ape muntu iwakaula mali aaindilila, elyo aboole mulukono lwakwe.
Pele na wakacilwa kujana cakununuzya, ncaakaulisya cinookede mumaanza aasikucuula mane kusikila kumwaka wakulizya myeembo; elyo mumwaka wakulizya myeembo ciyooangunuka, kuti aboole mulukono lwakwe.
Na muntu waulisya iŋanda yakukala mumunzi uuli alubaya, ulakonzya kwiinununa kufumbwa ciindi mumwaka uutobela buzuba bwakuulisya; mwaka woonse ulijisi inguzu zyakwiinununa.
Pele iŋanda yamumunzi uuli alubaya, na yabula kunununwa mukati kamwaka, ilaba yakwe, nkabela iwakaiula abana bakwe bayooikona mumazyalani aabo oonse; taikooyoopiluka mumwaka wakulizya myeembo pe.
Pele maanda aamuminzi iitajisi imbaya ala am bwa antoomwe amyuunda yanyika eyo; alakonzya kunununwa, alimwi alapiluka mumwaka wakulizya myeembo.
Nekubaboobo minzi yaba-Levi, maanda aamuminzi njebavubide, ba-Levi balazumininwa kwaanununa ciindi coonse.
Na mu-Levi wabula kunununa iŋanda iyakaulisigwa mumunzi walukono lwabo iyooangunuka mumwaka wakulizya myeembo; nkaambo maanda aamuminzi yaba-Levi ndolukono lwabo akati kabana ba-Israyeli.
Pele myuunda iiengelede minzi yabo tiiulisigwi pe, nkaambo ndolukono lwabo lwalyoonse.
Utatambuli impindu kumaanza aakwe yakumukolotya. Yoowa Leza wako, kuti munyoko akale kulinduwe.
Utamukolotyi mali aako kukujana impindu nekuba kumwaabila zilyo kuti uyungizizigwe.
Ndime Jehova Leza wanu iwakamupozya mucisi ca-Egepita kuti mupe nyika ya-Kanana akuba Leza wanu.
Abeleke kulinduwe mbuli mulanda uuvola mali nanka sikukalakala, Akubelekele milimo mane kusikila kumwaka wakulizya myeembo.
Lino akusie, walo abana bakwe, kuti apiluke k uciinga cakwe akulukono lwabamawisi.
Nkaambo mbalanda bangu mbendakapozya munyika ya-Egepita, Tabeelede kuulisigwa mbuli bazike pe.
Utamweendelezyi calunya. Yoowa Leza wako.
Bazike bako baalumi abanakazi, ulakonzya kuula bazike baalumi abanakazi akati kabamasi bakweengelede.
Abalo beenzu bakalakala akati kanu, mulakonzya kuula kulimbabo abana babo mbomuli abo, ibakazyalwa munyika yanu, kuti mubavube.
Alimwi bayooba lukono lwabana banu balya mazina aanu, babavube lyoonse, Balaba bazike banu. Pele bana bakwanu, bana ba-Israyeli, tamweelede kweendelezya umwi aumwi mweenzinyina calunya pe.
Lino na mweenzu na simutuntuli ngokede awe wavuba, amunyoko ngwakede awe wacetaala akulyuulisya kumweenzu oyo na kulisimutuntuli oyo ngokede awe, na kulisikamukowanyina mweenzu,
amana kulyuulisya, ulakonzya kunununwa, Umwi wababunyina ulakonzya kumunununa.
Naba simizyaabo naba mwana wasimizyaabo amununune; na sikamukowanyina umwi amununune; nanka wavuba, alinunune mwini.

Abale, antoomwe asikumuula, mweelwe wamyaka kuzwa kukuulwa kwakwe kusikila kumwaka wakulizya myeembo; lino mali aamuulo wakwe abe mbubonya mbuli mweelwe wamyaka; mazuba ngaakakede asimalelo wakwe abe mbuli mazuba aasimilimo uuvola mali.
Na myaka icili minji, mali aakununuzya agwisigwe mumuulo wakwe mbubonya.
Na kwasyaala myaka mice buyo kusikila kumwaka wakulizya myeembo, abale myaka eyo akuliya mali aakulinunuzya mbubonya obo.
Abe mbubonya mbuli similimo uuvola mali mwaka umwi aumwi; teelede kumweendelezya calunya mumeso aako.
Nkabela na tanununwi mbuli muziyanza ezi, aangunuke mumwaka wakulizya myeembo, walo abana bakwe boonse.
Nkaambo bana ba-Israyeli mbalanda bangu, balanda mbendakapozya munyika ya-Egepita, Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Amubambe masabata aangu akulemeka cikombelo cangu. Ndime Jehova.
njoomuwisizya imvula kuzi indi zyeelede, aboobo nyika iyoozyala zilyo, amisamu iyoozyala micelo yayo.
Kupola maila aanu takukooyoomana mane kusikila ciindi cakucela masaansa, akucela kwanu kuyoosika kuciindi cakubyala, Muyoolya zilyo zyanu cakukuta, akukala munyika yanu caluumuno.
Njoomupa luumuno munyika yanu, nkabela muyoolala cakutayoowa cintu, Njoolesya banyama babi munyika yanu, alyalo ipanga lyankondo talikooyooboneka akati kanu.
Muyootanda basinkondonyokwe, mane bakawe kupanga kunembo lyanu.
Bantu bosanwe banu bayootanda mwanda, abantu bali mwanda bayootanda zyuulu zili ikumi. Basinkondonyokwe bayoowa kupanga kunembo lyanu.
Njoomweembela, njoocita kuti muzyalisye akuvula, alimwi njooyumya cizuminano ncetutangene anywebo,
Muyoolya zilyo zyamatala makulukulu, akugwisya zilyo zyaciindi nkaambo kakuvula kwazilyo zipya.
Njoobika cikalilo cangu akati kanu, Moyo wangu tuukooyoomusesemwa pe.
Njooendeenda akati kanu, njooba Leza wanu, anywebo muyooba bantu bangu.
Ndime Jehova Leza wanu iwakamupozya munyika ya-Egepita, kuti mutacibi bazike babo, Ndakatyolaula zikeyi zyamajoko aanu akumucita kuti mweende cakululama.
na mwakaka milumbe yangu, na myoyo yanu ilasesemwa imbeta zyangu, aboobo mwabula kucita malailile aangu oonse, mwatyola cizuminano cangu,
ncobeni mbuboobu mbunjoomucitila. Njoomubusizya ciyoosyo, lungwangwa antuntumaanzi, malwazi aamana meso akupenzya moyo, Muyoobyala imbuto zyanu cabuyo, nkaambo basinkondonyokwe mbebayoozilya.
Njoomulanga cankayikayi, nkabela muyoozundwa kulibasinkondonyokwe. Basikumusula mbebayoomweendelezya, nkabela muyoocija nekuba kuti taakwe uumutanda.
Lino kusule lyazintu ezi zyoonse, na mucikaka kuswiilila, njoomuuma alimwi ziindi zili musanu azibili nkaambo kazibi zyanu.
Njoomwaya inguzu zyanu nzemulikankaizizya. Nkabela njoocita kuti kujulu kumubede mbuli butale, ayalo nyika imubede mbuli mukuba.
Inguzu zyanu muyoozibelesya buyo, nkaambo nyika yanu tiikooyoozyala zilyo, amisamu yamunyika tiikooyoozyala micelo.
Lino na muceenda cakutamvwa, na mucikaka kuswiilila, njoomuletela aamwi mapenzi aainda ziindi zili musanu azibili, mbubonya mbuli zibi zyanu.
Njoomutumina banyama bamusokwe, nkabela bayoomubbida bana banu akumunyonyweeda iŋombe zyanu, mane mukaceye, anzila zyanu zilasofwaala,
ambebo njooenda cakutamumvwa, njoomuuma ziindi zili musanu azibili nkaambo kazibi zyanu.
Nkabela njoomuletela ipanga lyakuliila cizuminano inkoto. Na mwabungana mukati kaminzi yanu, njoomutumina malwazi, nkabela muyooabwa mumaanza aabasinkondonyoko.
Lino kuciindi eco nenjoomanisya malilu oonse aabuumi bwanu, banakazi bali ikumi bayoomujikila insima mucijikilo comwe, nkabela bayoomupimina zyakulya zyanu, Muyoolya, kukuta pe,
Lino kusule lyazintu azeezi zyoonse, na mucikaka kuswiilila, na muceenda cakutamvwa,
njooenda ambebo cakutamumvwa acabukali, nkabela njoomuuma ziindi zili musanu azibili nkaambo kazibi zyanu.
Muyoolya nyama yabana banu balombe akulya nyama yabana banu basimbi.
Nkabela njoonyonyoona zikombelo zyanu zyakuzilundu akugonka zikozyano zyanu zyazuba. Njoosowa mitunta yanu atala lyamitunta yazikozyano zyanu, amoyo wangu uyoomusesemwa.
Njoosaala minzi yanu, njoocita zikombelo zyanu kuti zibe matongo, abweema bwatununkilizyo twanu nsikooyoobumvwa.
Njoosaala nyika yanu mane lumwi basinkondonyokwe bakede mulinjiyo bagambe,
Anywebo nobeni, njoomumwaisya akati kabamasi, nkabela njoomusomweda ipanga, Lino nyika yanu iyooba matongo, aminzi yanu iyoomwaika.
Mazuba oonse aakutakalwa kwayo iyoolyokezya, nkaambo yakabulide kulyokezya mumasabata aanu nemwakakede mulinjiyo.

Abaabo banu basyeede, njootuma luwizuko mumyoyo yabo munyika yabasinkondonyina mobabede, nkabela kupoota kwetu lipepuluka amuuwo kuyoobayoosya, mane bayoocija mbubonya mbuli kucijwa ipanga, akuwa bayoowa nekuba kuti taakwe uubatanda.
Bayoodadalika akulimbana mbubonya mbuli kucijwa ipanga, nekuba kuti taakwe uubatanda. Tamukooyooba anguzu zyakulitabilila kulibasinkondonyokwe pe.
Muyoonyonyooka akati kabamasi, anyika yabasinkondonyokwe iyoomulida limwi.
Abaabo banu basyeede banooya bukotelakotela mumilandu yabo oko kunyika yabasinkondonyokwe, akaambo kamilandu yabamawisi banooya bukotelakotela.
nkonkuko kwakandicita kuti ambebo ndakeenda cakutabamvwa akubatola kunyika yabasinkondonyina, —na myoyo yabo iitapalwidwe yalibombya, alimwi batambula ceempyo camilandu yabo,
lino njooibaluka cizuminano cangu ncendakatangana a-Jakobo, acizuminano cangu kuli-Izaka, acizuminano cangu kuliAbrahamu, ayalo nyika njooiyeeya.
Nyika bayooisia, nkabela iyoobotelwa masabata aayo ciindi cakusiigwa, Lino baleelede kutambula ceempyo camilandu yabo, nkaambo kakuti bakasampaula imbeta zyangu, amyoyo yabo yakakaka milumbe yangu.
Nekubaboobo nebanooyooli munyika yabasinkondonyina, nsikooyoobasowa nikuba kubasesemwa kukubanyonyweeda limwi akukujaya cizuminano cangu ncindakatangana abo, nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wabo.
Njoobaibulukila cizuminano ncendakatangana abamawisi, abo mbendakapozya munyika ya-Egepita kumeso aabamasi, kuti mbe Leza wabo. Ndime Jehova.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Na muntu wacitila Jehova cikonkyo cabantu ceelede kubikilwa muulo,
mbuboobu mboelede kubika muulo. Mwaalumi uuli amyaka iili makumi obile kusikila kumakumi aali musanu alimwi, muulo wakwe ube masyekeli aansiliva aali makumi osanwe, nkokuti masyekeli aacikombelo.
Na mwanakazi, muulo wakwe ube masyekeli aali makumi otatwe.
Na mwana uuli amyaka yosanwe kusikila myaka iili makumi obile, muulo wakwe ube masyekeli aali makumi obile kumwaalumi nanka masyekeli aali ikumi kumwanakazi.
Na mwana uuli amwezi omwe wakuzyalwa kusikila myaka yosanwe, muulo wakwe ube masyekeli aansiliva osanwe kumwaalumi, amasyekeli aansiliva otatwe kumwanakazi.
Na muntu uusotoka myaka iili makumi aali musanu alimwi, muulo wakwe ube masyekeli aali ikumi amusanu kumwaalumi amasyekeli aali ikumi kumwanakazi.
Pele na muntu mucete takonzyi kujana mali aamuulo uubikidwe, umulete kunembo lyamupaizi, kuti mupaizi amubikile muulo, Mupaizi abike muulo mbuli sikukonka mbwakonzya kujana.
Na ngumunyama ngwaleta, nkokuti munyama uupaizigwa kuli-Jehova, munyama woonse muntu ngwaletela Jehova ulasalala.
Teelede kumucinca nanka kubika umbi, naba mubotu mucibaka camubi naba mubi mucibaka camubotu. Na wabika munyama umbi, ncobeni oyo ngwabika ayooyo ngowacincanya awe boonse bayoosalala.
Pele na ngumunyama uusofweede uutapaizigwa kuli-Jehova, alete munyama kumupaizi,
elyo mupaizi amubikile muulo, naba mubotu naba mubi; kufumbwa muulo ngobika, yebo O mupaizi, ulaba ngonguwo.
Pele na ulayanda kumunununa ayungizye cipanzi casanu kumuulo uubikidwe.
Pele oyo uusalazya iŋanda yakwe, na ulayanda kwiinununa, ayungizye cipanzi casanu kumali aamuulo wayo, elyo ilaba yakwe.

Alimwi na muntu ulasalazizya Jehova cipanzi camuunda walukono lwakwe, muleelede kucibikila muulo mbubonya mbuli imbuto yakucibyala. Muunda uubyalwa ceelesyo cahomeri cabbaale ulabikilwa muulo wamasyekeli aansiliva aali makumi osanwe.
Na ulasalazya muunda wakwe mumwaka wakulizya myeembo, muulo ngobikide ulaba mbubonya obo.
Pele na ulasalazya muunda wakwe kwamana mwaka wamyeembo, mupaizi uleelede kuubikila muulo mbuli myaka iicisyeede kusikila kumwaka wamyeembo, aboobo muulo ulacesegwa.
Lino oyo uusalazya muunda, na ulayanda kuunununa, ayungizye cipanzi casanu kumali aamuulo wawo, nkabela uyoosyaala mumaanza aakwe.
Pele na tayandi kunununa muunda, alimwi na waulisya muunda kumuntu umbi, tuukooyoonununwa limbi.
Oyo muunda, kuciindi calwaangunuko lwamumwaka wakulizya myeembo, ulasalalila Jehova mbuli muunda uupedwa limwi; mupaizi nguuyoouvuba.
Alimwi na muntu ulasalazizya Jehova muunda ngwaakaula, uutali walukono lwakwe,
mupaizi aubikile muulo wakusikila mwaka wakulizya myeembo, nkabela muntu uleelede kupa mali aamuulo wawo mubuzuba obo mbubonya, abe cintu cisalalisya kuli-Jehova.
Lino mumwaka wakulizya myeembo oyo muunda uyoopiluka kuliyooyo iwakauulisizye, kuli ulaalukono.
Myuulo yoonse ileelede kubalwa amasyekeli aacikombelo; isyekeli lili magera aali makumi obile.
Na ngumunyama uutondwa, uleelede kumunununa mbuli muulo ngobika, akuyungizya cipanzi casanu, Na tayandi kumunununa, aulwe mbuli muulo wakwe,
Kufumbwa uupedwa limwi uleelede kunyonyooka kuzwa kubantu; taakwe naba omwe uukonzya kunununwa pe; ncobeni uleelede kujayigwa.
Na muntu ulayanda kunununa cintu neciba comwe akati kazipanzi zyakwe zyakumi, uleelede kuyungizya cipanzi casanu kucintu eco.
Alimwi zipanzi zyakumi zyoonse zyaŋombe azyambelele, kufumbwa ciinda kunsi amusako wamweembeli, munyama wakumi umwi aumwi ulasalalila Jehova.
Muntu teelede kusalaula babotu ababi nekuba kucinca, pe, Na wacinca, ncobeni oyongwabika ayooyo uucincigwa, boonse balasalala; tabanununwi pe.
Njeeyo milumbe Jehova njaakalailila Musa kucilundu ca-Sinai kuti ibe yabana ba-Israyeli.
Amubale mweelwe wambungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli, mumikowa yabo amuziinga zyabo, kulembwe mazina aabantu boonse, nkokuti baalumi boonse umwi aumwi.
Boonse bajisi myaka iili makumi obile na kusotoka, ba-Israyeli boonse bakonzya kuya kunkondo, amubabale, webo a-Aroni, munkamu zyabo.
Nkabela antoomwe anywebo kuyooba muntu omwe omwe wamusyobo umwi aumwi. Muntu umwi aumwi abe simutwe waluzubo lwakwe.
Ngaaya mazina aabantu mbemuyooba abo: kumusyobo wa-Rubeni, Elizuri mwana wa-Sedeuri;
kumusyobo wa-Simeoni, Selumiyeli mwana wa-Zurisadai;
kumusyobo wa-Juda, Nasoni mwana wa-Aminadabu;
kumusyobo wa-Isakara, Netaneeli mwana wa-Zuwara;
kumusyobo wa-Zebuloni, Eliabu mwana wa-Heloni;
kubana ba-Josefa, kumusyobo wa-Efraimu, Elisama mwana wa-Amihudi; akumusyobo wa-Manase, Gamaliyeli mwana wa-Pedazuri;
kumusyobo wa-Benjamini, Abidana mwana wa-Gideoni;
kumusyobo wa-Dani, Ahiezeri mwana wa-Amisadai;
kumusyobo wa-Aseri, Pagiyeli mwana wa-Okirani;
kumusyobo wa-Gadi, Eliyasafe mwana wa-Deyueli;
kumusyobo wa-Nafitali, Ahira mwana wa-Enani.
Abo mbebakasalwa kuzwa kumbungano, basimutwe banzubo zyabo, basimutwe bamikowa ya-Israyeli.
Lino ba-Musa a-Aroni bakabweza abo bantu balembedwe,

nkabela bakayobolola imbungano yoonse mubuzuba butaanzi bwamumwezi wabili, balemba mazyalani aabo, munzubo zyabo amuziinga zyabo, kuti babalwe boonse, umwi aumwi iwakajisi myaka iili makumi obile na iindilila,
mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa. Wakababala boonse oko kunkanda ya-Sinai.

Lino bana ba-Rubeni, mwana mutaanzi wa-Israyeli, mumazyalani aabo, munzubo zyabo amuziinga zyabo, boonse ibakabalwa, nkokuti mwaalumi umwi aumwi iwakajisi myaka iili makumi obile na iindilila, boonse ibakakonzya kuya kunkondo,
mweelwe waba-Rubeni wakali zyuulu zili makumi one amusanu alimwi amyanda yosanwe.
mweelwe wamusyobo wa-Simeoni wakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe amusanu azine amyanda yotatwe.
mweelwe wamusyobo wa-Gadi wakali zyuulu zili makumi one amusanu amyanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi osanwe.
mweelwe wamusyobo wa-Juda wakali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili azine amyanda iili musanu aumwi.
Bana ba-Isakara, mumazyalani aabo, munzubo zyabo amuziinga zyabo, boonse ibakabalwa, nkokuti mwaalumi umwi aumwi iwakajisi myaka iili makumi obile na iindilila, boonse ibakakonzya kuya kunkondo,
mweelwe wamusyobo wa-Isakara wakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe azine am yanda yone.
Bana ba-Zebuloni, mumazyalani aabo, munzubo zyabo amu zii nga zyabo, boonse ibakabalwa, nkokuti mwaalumi umwi aumwi iwakajisi myaka iili makumi obile na iindilila, boonse ibakakonzya kuya kunkondo,
mweeIwe wamusyobo wa-Zebuloni wakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe amusanu azibili amyanda yone.
mwee Iwe wamusyobo wa-Efraimu wakali zyuulu zili makumi one amyanda yosanwe.
Abana ba-Manase, mumazyalani aabo, munzubo zyabo amuziinga zyabo, boonse ibakabalwa, nkokuti mwaalumi umwi aumwi iwakajisi myaka iili makumi obile na iindilila, boonse ibakakonzya kuya kunkondo,
mweeIwe wamusyobo wa-Manase wakali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe azibili amyanda yobile.
mweeIwe wamusyobo wa-Benjamini wakali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe amusanu amyanda yene.
mweelwe wamusyobo wa-Dani wakali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu alimwi azibili amyanda iili musanu aibili.
Bana ba-Aseri, mumazyalani aabo, munzubo zyabo amuziinga zyabo, boonse ibakabalwa, nkokuti mwaalumi umwi aumwi iwakajisi myaka iili makumi obile na iindilila, boonse ibakakonzya kuya kunkondo,
mweelwe wamusyobo wa-Aseri wakali zyuulu zili makumi one acimwi amyanda yosanwe.
Bana ba-Nafitali, mumazyalani aabo, munzubo zyabo amuziinga zyabo, boonse ibakabalwa, nkokuti mwaalumi umwi aumwi iwakajisi myaka iili makumi obile na iindilila, boonse ibakakonzya kuya kunkondo,
mweelwe wamusyobo wa-Nafitali wakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe azitatu amyanda yone.
Aboobo bana ba-Israyeli boonse bamunzubo zyabo ibakabalwa, nkokuti mwaalumi umwi aumwi iwakajisi myaka iili makumi obile na iindilila, boonse ibakakonzya kuya kunkondo—
mweelwe wabo woonse wakali zyuulu zili myanda iili musanu aumwi azyuulu zyotatwe amyanda yosanwe amakumi osanwe.
Nkaambo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Musyobo wa-Levi ulike, toelede kubabala, amweelwe wabo utalembwi akati kabana ba-Israyeli.

Bika ba-Levi kuti babe amilimo yatente lyambunganino amilimo yazibelesyo zyalyo ayazintu zyoonse zili mulindilyo. Mbembabo beelede kuyumuna itente azibelesyo zyalyo zyoonse, nkabela baleelede kulibamba akuyaka zilao zyabo cakulizyunguluka,
Itente nelilonzegwa, ba-Levi mbobeelede kulimwaya alimwi nelisimpikwa, ba-Levi mbobeelede kulisimpa. Kufumbwa muntu umbi uuswena afwiifwi ulajayigwa.
Bana ba-Israyeli baleelede kuyaka zilao zyabo munkamu zyabo, umwi aumwi alabba lyakwe mwini, umwi aumwi andembela yakwe mwini;
pele ba-Levi baleelede kuyaka zilao zyabo cakuzyunguluka itente lyambunganino, kuti imbungano yabana ba-Israyeli itasikilwi bukali, Ba-Levi mbobeelede kubamba itente lyambunganino.
Mbuboobo bana ba-Israyeli mbubakacita. Muzintu zyoonse bakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Lino Jehova wakaambila ba-Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Bana ba-Israyeli bayake zilao zyabo, umwi aumwi kumbali lyandembela yakwe mwini, nkonkuko kucitondezyo caluzubo lwabamawisi. Bayake cakulangana atente lyambunganino kumabazu oonse.
Abo bayaka kujwe kubuzwezuba babe bandembela yalabba lya-Juda munkamu zyabo, Silutwe wabana ba-Juda abe Nasoni mwana wa-Aminadabu.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili azine amyanda iili musanu aumwi.
Abaabo babambana awe babe musyobo wa-Isakara. Silutwe wabana ba-Isakara abe Netaneeli mwana wa-Zuwara.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe azine amyanda yone.
Awalo musyobo wa-Zebuloni. Silutwe wabana ba-Zebuloni abe Eliabu mwana wa-Heloni.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe amusanu azibili amyanda yone.
Mweelwe wabantu boonse ibakabalwa mumalabba aa-Juda, munkamu zyabo, wakali zyuulu zili mwanda amakumi aali musanu aatatu azyuulu zili musanu acimwi am yanda yene. Mbembabo beelede kuzulula kunembo.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi one amusanu acimwi amyanda yosanwe.
Abaabo babambana awe babe musyobo wa-Simeoni. Silutwe wabana ba-Simeoni abe Selumiyeli mwana wa-Zurisadai.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe amusanu azine amyanda yotatwe.
Awalo musyobo wa-Gadi. Silutwe wabana ba-Gadi abe Eliyasafe mwana wa-Reueli.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi one amusanu amyanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi osanwe.
Mweelwe wabana boonse ibakabalwa mumalabba aa-Rubeni, munkamu zyabo, wakali zyuulu zili mwanda amakumi osanwe acimwi amyanda yone amakumi osanwe. Mbembabo beelede kuba inkamu yabili yakweenda.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi one amyanda yosanwe.
Abaabo babambana awe babe musyobo wa-Manase. Silutwe wabana ba-Manase abe Gamaliyeli mwana wa-Pedazuri.
Bana bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe azibili amyanda yobile.
Awalo musyobo wa-Benjamini: silutwe wabana ba-Benjamini abe Abidana mwana wa-Gideoni.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe amusanu amyanda yone.
Mweelwe wabantu boonse ibakabalwa mumalabba aa-Efraimu, munkamu zyabo, wakali zyuulu zili mwanda amusanu azitatu amwanda. Mbembabo beelede kuba inkamu yatatu yakweenda.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu alimwi azibili amyanda iili musanu aibili.
Abaabo babambana awe babe musyobo wa-Aseri, Silutwe wabana ba-Aseri abe Pagiyeli mwana waOkirani.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi one acimwi amyanda yosanwe.
Awalo musyobo wa-Nafitali: silutwe wabana ba-Nafitali abe Ahira mwana wa-Enani.
Bantu bankamu yakwe ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe azitatu amyanda yone.
Mweelwe wabantu boonse ibakabalwa mumalabba aa-Dani wakali zyuulu zili mwanda amakumi osanwe amusanu azibili amyanda iili musanu aumwi. Mbembabo beelede kusyaalila kweenda andembela zyabo,
Pele ba-Levi teebakabalwa akati kabana ba-Israyeli, pe, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.

Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila­ Musa. Bakayaka zilao zyabo kumbali lyandembela zyabo, alimwi bakeenda, umwi aumwi muciinga cakwe amuluzubo lwakwe, mbubonya mbubakalaililwa.
Ngaaya mazyalani aaba-Musa a-Aroni mubuzuba obo Jehova naakaambila Musa mucilundu ca-Sinai.
Ngaaya mazina aabana ba-Aroni: mutaanzi ngu-Nadabu, kwatobela Abihu, Eleazara a-Itamara.
Mbaakabede mazina aabana ba-Aroni, bapaizi bananike ibakapedwe milimo yabupaizi.

Pele Nadabu a-Abihu bakafwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova ciindi eco nibakapaizya mulilo umbi kubusyu bwa-Jehova munkanda ya-Sinai, nkabela teebakajisi bana pe, Lino Eleazara a-Itamara bakali kucita milimo yabupaizi kubusyu bwa-Aroni wisaabo,
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Leta musyobo wa-Levi, ubaimikizye kubusyu bwa-Aroni mupaizi, kuti bamubelekele milimo.
Bamumanine milimo, walo ambungano yoonse, kunembo lyatente lyambunganino, babe balanda bacikombelo.
Mbembabo beelede kubamba zibelesyo zyoonse zyatente lyambunganino amilimo yabana ba-Israyeli amilimo miyumu yamucikombelo.
Pa ba-Levi mumaanza aa-Aroni amumaanza aabana bakwe. Balapedwa limwi mumaanza aakwe kunze lyabana baIsrayeli.
Alimwi bika Aroni abana bakwe kuti bacite milimo yabupaizi; na kwasika muntu umbi uleelede kujayigwa.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Bona! Ndagwisya ba-Levi akati kabana ba-Israyeli, babe mucibaka cabana bataanzi bajalula mulyango wazyalilo akati kabana ba-Israyeli. Ba-Levi balaba bangu.

Nkaambo bana bataanzi boonse mbebangu. Mubuzuba obo nindakauma bana bataanzi boonse banyika ya-Egepita ndakalisalazizya bana bataanzi boonse bamuIsrayeli; nibaba bantu nibaba banyama. Mbebangu. Ndime Jehova.
Bala bana ba-Levi, muziinga zyabo amunzubo zyabo; bana baalumi boonse bali amwezi omwe wakuzyalwa abaindilila abaalumi bapati, boonse babalwe.
Elyo Musa wakababala, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba, mbubonya mbwaakalaililwa.
Ngaaya mazina aabana ba-Levi: Gerisoni a-Kohati a-Merari.
Amazina aabana ba-Gerisoni muziinga zyabo ngaaya: Libni a-Simei.
Abana ba-Kohati muziinga zyabo mbaaba: Amramu, a-Izara, Hebroni a-Uzieli,
Abana ba-Merari muziinga zyabo mbaaba: Mali a-Musi. Nzeezyo ziinga zyaba-Levi anzubo zyabo.
Gerisoni nguwakazyala ciinga caba-Libni aciinga caba-Simei. Nzenzizyo ziinga zyaba-Gerisoni.
Nkabela mweelwe wabo, nkokuti bana baalumi ibakali amwezi wakuzyalwa abapati boonse baindilila, wakali zyuulu zili musanu azibili amyanda yosanwe.
Ziinga zyaba-Gerisoni ziyake zilao zyabo kusule lyacikombelo kumbo.
Asilutwe waluzubo lwabaGerisoni abe Eliyasafe mwana wa-Layeli.
Amilimo yabana ba-Gerisoni mutente lyambunganino njeeyi: cikombelo, atente azivumbilizyo zyalyo, acisitilizyo camulyango watente lyambunganino,
amasani aalengelela aalubuwa acisitilizyo camulyango walubuwa luzyunguluka cikombelo acipaililo, antambo zyalo—milimo yoonse yazeezyo njiyabo.
Nkabela mweelwe wabo, nkokuti bana baalumi boonse bali amwezi wakuzyalwa abapati baindilila, wakali zyuulu zili musanu azitatu amyanda iili musanu aumwi; boonse bakali kucita milimo yacikombelo.
Ziinga zyabana ba-Kohati bayake zilao zyabo kumbali lyacikombelo kulubazu lwakumusanza.
Silutwe waluzubo lwaziinga zyaba-Kohati abe Elizafana mwana wa-Uzieli.
