Amilimo yabo njeeyi: ibbokesi lya-Leza, antafule, aciimikilo camalampi, azipaililo, azibelesyo zyacikombelo zibelesegwa mumilimo yabupaizi, acisitilizyo-milimo yoonse yazeezyo njiyabo.
Nkabela Eleazara mwana wa-Aroni mupaizi abe mupati wabasilutwe baba-Levi, alange abo bacita milimo yacikombelo.
Nkabela mweelwe wabo, nkokuti bana baalumi bali amwezi wakuzyalwa abapati baindilila, wakali zyuulu zili musanu acimwi amyanda yobile.
Silutwe waluzubo lwaziinga zyaba-Merari abe Zuriyeli mwana wa-Abihaili. Bayake zilao zyabo kumbali lyacikombelo kulubazu lwakunyika.
Nkabela milimo yabana ba-Merari njeeyi: minsende yacikombelo, aminkulu yaco, amisumpululu yaco, azikazikilo zyaco, azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, amilimo yaco yoonse,
azyalo zyaanzikilo zizyunguluka lubuwa, azikazikilo zyazyo amanembe aazyo antambo zyazyo,

Lino ba-Levi boonse ibakabalwa, mbebakabala ba-Musa a-Aroni kukulailila kwa-Jehova, muziinga zyabo, bana baalumi boonse ibakali amwezi wakuzyalwa abapati baindilila, bakali zyuulu zili makumi obile azibili.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Bala boonse bana baalumi bataanzi akati kabana ba-Israyeli, bana boonse bali amwezi wakuzyalwa abaindilila, akulemba mweelwe wamazina aabo.
Lino uleelede kundibwezela ba-­Levi ndime Jehova mucibaka cabana bataanzi boonse babana ba-Israyeli aŋombe zyaba-Levi mucibaka cabana bataanzi baŋombe zyabana ba-Israyeli.
Mpawo Musa wakabala bana bataanzi boonse akati kabana ba-Israyeli mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamulailila.
Nkabela mweelwe wabana baalumi bataanzi, boonse ibakabalwa, nkokuti bana bali amwezi wakuzyalwa abaindilila, wakali zyuulu zili makumi obile azibili amyanda yobile amakumi aali musanu aabili abatatu.
Elyo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Bweza ba-Levi mucibaka cabana bataanzi akati kaba-Israyeli, aŋombe zyaba-Levi mucibaka caŋombe zyabo, Lino ba-Levi babe bangu.
Akukunununa abo bantu bali myanda yobile amakumi aali musanu aabili abatatu, nkokuti mweelwe wabana bataanzi baba-Israyeli uuindilila mweelwe waba-Levi,
uleelede kutambula cipanzi casanu casyekeli kumuntu umwi aumwi, (nkokuti isyekeli lyacikombelo, isyekeli lili amagera aali makumi obile),
nkabela ayo mali aakununuzya bantu baindilila apegwe Aroni abana bakwe.
Lino Musa wakatambula mali aalununuko lwabaabo ibakaindilila abo ibakanununwa aba-Levi;
wakatambula mali kumaanza aabana bataanzi baba-Israyeli, masyekeli aali cuulu amyanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu, mbubonya mbuli masyekeli aacikombelo.
Nkabela Musa wakapa ayo mali aalununuko kuli-Aroni abana bakwe, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova, Jehova ndyaakalailila Musa.
Lino Jehova wakaambila ba-Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Amubale bana ba-Kohati akati kaba-Levi, muziinga zyabo amunzubo zyabo,
nkokuti boonse bali amyaka iili makumi otatwe kusikila makumi osanwe, boonse bakonzya kucita milimo, bakonzya kubeleka mutente lyambunganino.
Lino njeeyi milimo yabana ba-Kohati mutente lyambunganino: zintu zisalalisya.
Ciindi cakulonzya zilao, Aroni abana bakwe mbobeelede kunjila kuyooangula cisitilizyo cakuvumbya, bavumbe ibbokesi lyacizuminano ancico.
Lino baleelede kulivumba azikanda zyabagutu, alimwi atala lyazeezyo bayale isani lyanyanzabili, akunjizya miziyo.
Aalo antafule yazinkwa zyamabonwabonwa bayale isani lyanyanzabili, babike alinjiyo mitiba, amyuungo, azilongo amfulu zyakupaizya; azyalo zinkwa zyamabonwabonwa zibe alindilyo.
Alimwi bayale mpoonya awo isani lisalala-pyu, akulivumba acivumbyo cazikanda zyabagutu, akunjizya miziyo.
Alimwi babweze isani lyanyanzabili, bavumbe ciimikilo camalampi, amalampi aaco, amano zyaco, ankayi zyaco, azibelesyo zyoonse zyamafuta aaco.
Lino ciimikilo azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, bacibikile civumbyo cazikanda zyabagutu, bacigwabike amiziyo.
Aalo acipaililo cangolida bayale isani lyanyanzabili, akucivumba azikanda zyabagutu, akucibika amiziyo.
Azyalo zibelesyo zyoonse zyamilimo yamucikombelo, bazibweze, bazivumbe asani lyanyanzabili, akuzivumbya civumbyo cazikanda zyabagutu, akuzibika amiziyo.
Alimwi bagwisye itwe kucipaililo, bayale alincico isani lyakamwemvwe;

lino babike mpoonya awo zibelesyo zyaco zyoonse zibelesegwa mumilimo yabupaizi, anzilo zyaco, aziyasyo zyaco, amaliko aaco, amitiba yaco, nkokuti zibelesyo zyoonse zyacipaililo, elyo bacivumbe acivumbyo cazikanda zyabagutu, akunjizya miziyo yakuyumuzya.

Lino ba-Aroni abana bakwe bamana buyo kuvumba cikombelo azibelesyo zyoonse zyacikombelo, kuciindi cakunyampuka baboole bana ba-Kohati kuzooyumuna. Pele tabeelede kuguma zintu zisalalisya, pe, kuti batafwi, Nzeezyo zintu zyatente lyambunganino nzebeelede kuyumuna bana ba-Kohati.
Lino Jehova wakaambila ba-Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Mutanyonyooni luzubo lwaziinga zyaba-Kohati akati kaba-Levi pe.
Mbuboobu mbumweelede kubacitila, kuti bapone akutafwa ciindi cakuswena afwaafwi kuzintu zisalalisya, Aroni abana bakwe banjile, babape umwi aumwi milimo yakwe amukuli wakwe.
Pele tabeelede kunjila kukweebela zintu zisalalisya abuniini, pe, kuti batafwi.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Amubale bana ba-Gerisoni abalo, muziinga zyabo amunzubo zyabo,
nkokuti boonse bali amyaka iili makumi otatwe kusikila makumi osanwe, boonse bakonzya kucita milimo, bakonzya kubeleka mutente lyambunganino.
Njeeyi milimo yaziinga zyaba-Gerisoni yakubeleka ayakuyumuna:
bayumune zisitilizyo zyacikombelo, atente lyambunganino azivumbilizyo zyalyo, acivumbyo cazikanda zyabagutu cili atala ancico, acisitilizyo camulyango watente lyambunganino,

amasani aalengelela aamulubuwa, acisitilizyo cakumanjililo aamulyango walubuwa luzyunguluka cikombelo acipaililo, antambo zyazyo, azibelesyo zyoonse zyamilimo yazyo; kufumbwa cintu cicitwa anzizyo, balacicita.
Milimo yoonse yabana ba-Gerisoni ilacitwa mukulailila kwa-Aroni akwa-bana bakwe, kufumbwa ncibayumuna akufumbwa ncibacita; mulaaba mumaanza aabo kufumbwa cintu ncibeelede kuyumuna.
Njeeyo milimo yaziinga zya bana ba-Gerisoni mutente lyambunganino. Milimo yabo ibe mumaanza aa-Itamara mwana wa-Aroni mupaizi,
Abalo bana ba-Merari uleelede kubabala muziinga zyabo amunzubo zyabo,
Ubale boonse bali amyaka iili makumi otatwe kusikila kumakumi osanwe, boonse bakonzya kucita milimo, bakonzya kubeleka milimo yatente lyambunganino.
Lino njeeyi milimo yabo, mikuli njibeelede kuyumuna, mumilimo yatente lyambunganino: minsende yacikombelo, aminkulu yaco, amisumpululu yaco, azikazikilo zyaco,
amisumpululu yalubuwa cakuzyunguluka, azikazikilo zyalo, anembe zyalo, antambo zyalo, azibelesyo zyazyo zyakucitya milimo yazyo yoonse, Umwi aumwi apegwe milimo yakwe amukuli wakwe wakuyumuna.
Njeeyo milimo yaziinga zyabana baMerari, milimo yabo yoonse yamutente lyambunganino. Ili mumaanza aa-Itamara mwana wa-Aroni mupaizi.
boonse ibakali amyaka iili makumi otatwe kusikila kumakumi osanwe, boonse ibakali mumilimo, ibakali kubeleka mutente lyambunganino.
Nkabela mweelwe wabo, muziinga zyabo, wakali zyuulu zyobile amyanda iili musanu aibili amakumi osanwe.
Mbembabo ibakabalwa muziinga zyaba-Kohati, boonse ibakali kubeleka mutente lyambunganino, mbebakabala ba-Musa a-Aroni, mbwaakalailila Jehova kumulomo wa-Musa,
Nkabela bana ba-Gerisoni ibakabalwa muziinga zyabo amunzubo zyabo,
boonse ibakali amyaka iili makumi otatwe kusikila makumi osanwe, boonse ibakali kubeleka milimo mutente lyambunganino,
ibakabalwa muziinga zyabo amunzubo zyabo, bakali zyuulu zyobile amyanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi otatwe.
Ngonguwo mweelwe wabana ba-Gerisoni, muziinga zyabo, mbebakabala ba-Musa a-Aroni, mbubonya mbwaakalailila Jehova.
Abana ba-Merari ibakabalwa, muziinga zyabo amunzubo zyabo,
boonse ibakali amyaka iili makumi otatwe abaindilila kusikila kumakumi osanwe, boonse ibakali kubeleka milimo mutente lyambunganino,
boonse ibakabalwa muziinga zyabo bakali zyuulu zyotatwe amyanda yobile.
Mbembabo ibakabalwa muziinga zyabana ba-Merari, abo mbebakabala ba-Musa a-Aroni, mbwaakalailila Jehova kumulomo wa-Musa.
Lino ba-Levi boonse ibakabalwa, mbebakabala ba-Musa a-Aroni abasilutwe ba-Israyeli, muziinga zyabo amunzubo zyabo,
boonse ibakali amyaka iili makumi otatwe abaindilila kusikila makumi osanwe, boonse ibakanjila mumilimo, ibakali kubeleka akuyumuna mikuli mutente lyambunganino,
boonse ibakabalwa bakali zyuulu zili musanu azitatu amyanda yosanwe amakumi aali musanu aatatu,
Umwi aumwi wakapegwa milimo yakwe yakubeleka na mukuli wakwe wakuyumuna, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila kumulomo wa-Musa. Bakabalwa boonse mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Lailila bana ba-Israyeli kuti bagwisye mumalabba boonse basicinsenda aboonse basisenselwa aboonse basofweede kukuguma mitunta.
Amubagwisye boonse buyo, nebaba baalumi nebaba banakazi, bazwe anze lyamalabba, kuti batasofwaazyi malabba mponkede akati kabo.
Mpoonya awo bana ba-Israyeli bakacita obo, Bakabagwisya, babatandila anze lyamalabba; mbuli Jehova mbwaakaambila Musa, bana ba-Israyeli bakacita mbubonya obo.
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mwaalumi na mwanakazi uucita cibi, kufumbwa cibi cicitwa kubantu, uusotoka milumbe ya-Jehova, aboobo oyo uli amulandu,
alyaambe zibi zyakwe nzyaakacita, alimwi apilusye ncaakabba akuciyungizizya cipanzi casanu, ape oyo ngwaakabisizya.
Pele na muntu wabula sikamukowa uukonzya kupilusizigwa cintu, cipilusizigwe Jehova, cibe camupaizi atala lyamugutu wacipaizyo camulandu ngwamanya milandu yakwe.
Azipo zyoonse, zintu zisalala zyabana ba-Israyeli nzibaletela mupaizi, zilaba zyakwe.
Zintu nzyasalazya muntu zilaba zyakwe. Kufumbwa cintu muntu ncapa mupaizi cilaba cakwe.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Na mukamuntu ulabisya akumucitila cakutasyomeka,
na mwaalumi umbi woona awe, alimwi makani alisisidwe kumeso aamulumi wakwe, na makani alisisidwe nekuba kuti walisofwaazya, na taakwe kamboni nkaambo kakutaianikizigwa,
na wasikilwa muuya wabbivwe, alimwi mukaakwe walisofwaazya, nanka wasikilwa muuya wabbivwe nekuba kuti mukaakwe tana kulisofwaazya,

oyo muntu alete mwanakazi wakwe kumupaizi. Alimwi alete cituuzyo cakwe, cipanzi cakumi calusuwo lwabusu bwabbaale. Atatili mafuta alincico, nekuba kubika musamu walibano, nkaambo ncecituuzyo cabbivwe, cipaizyo cakwiibalusya, nkokuti cakwiibalusya mulandu.
Elyo mupaizi abweze maanzi aasalalisya mucibiya cabulongo, alimwi abweze lusuko lwacibuye cacikombelo akulubika mumaanzi.

Elyo mupaizi aimike mwanakazi kubusyu bwa-Jehova, atebezye masusu aamwanakazi, abike mumaanza aakwe cipaizyo cabusu cakwiibalusya cipaizyo cabbivwe, Amumaanza aakwe mwini mupaizi abe amaanzi aalula aaleta lutuko.
Lino mupaizi amukonkye, aambile mwanakazi kuti, Na taakwe mwaalumi ngowakeenda awe, na tona kulisofwaazya, kunze lyamulumaako, utabisigwi kumaanzi aya aalula aaleta lutuko.
Pele na ncobeni walisofwaazya, na wabisizya mulumaako kukweenda amwaalumi umbi uutali mulumaako,
(mupaizi akonkye mwanakazi cikonke eco, amwaambile kuti) Jehova akubike kuti ube ijwi lyakukonkya alyakutukizya akati kabantu bako, Jehova naazoomwaisya cibelo cako akuzimbya ida lyako.
Aya maanzi aaleta lutuko anjile mumala aako, azimbye ida lyako akumwaisya cibelo cako. Lino mwanakazi aambe kuti, Mbukabede! Mbukabede!
Nkabela mupaizi uleelede kulemba aya matusi mubbuku akwaasanzya mumaanzi aalula.
Lino uleelede kunywisya mwanakazi ayo maanzi aalula aaleta lutuko, aboobo maanzi aaleta lutuko alanjila mwida lyakwe akumululila.
Lino mupaizi atambule kumaanza aamwanakazi cipaizyo cabusu cabbivwe, ayumbe cipaizyo kubusyu bwa-Jehova akucileta kucipaililo;
nkabela mupaizi uleelede kubweza inkankamanza yabusu bwacipaizyo, ibe ciibalusyo, acitente acipaililo. Amana kucita obo ulanywisya mwanakazi maanzi.

Amana kumunywisya maanzi, na walisofwaazya akucitila mulumaakwe cakutasyomeka, ayo maanzi aaleta lutuko alanjila mwida lyakwe, alamululila, nkabela ida lyakwe lilazimba acibelo cakwe cilamwaika, aboobo oyo mwanakazi ulaba ijwi lyakutukizya akati kabantu bakwe.
Pele na oyo mwanakazi talisofwaazizye, na ulasalala, ulaangulukide, ulakonzya kuminta.
Mbuubede mulao wabbivwe, kufumbwa ciindi mwanakazi uuli mumaanza­ aamulumaakwe nabisya akulisofwaazya,
nanka ciindi mulumi nanji-lwa muuya wabbivwe aboobo wafwida mukaakwe ibbivwe, Aimike mwanakazi kubusyu bwa-Jehova, elyo mupaizi amucitile mbubonya mbuuamba oyu mulao.
Lino mwaalumi ulaanguluka mumulandu pele mwanakazi ulapegwa mulandu.
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Kufumbwa muntu, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, uucita cikonke cakasimpe, cikonke cabu-Naziri, nkokuti cakulisalazizya Jehova,

uleelede kuliimya waini azyakunywa zyoonse zikola, Teelede kunywa cilula cawaini na cazyakunywa zimwi zikola, teelede kunywa musinza wamasaansa abuniini, alimwi teelede kulya masaansa naaba matete naaba aayanikidwe.
Mazuba oonse aabu-Naziri bwakwe teelede kulya cintu niciba comwe cizwa kumusaansa, niziba ŋoogo niciba cikanda.
Na wafwidwa wisi na banyina, munyina na mucizi wakwe, teelede kulisofwaazya cakulila mbabo, pe, nkaambo cikonke cakulisalazizya Leza wakwe mpocili alinguwe.
Mazuba oonse aabu-Naziri bwakwe ulasalalila Jehova.
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu alete inziba zyobile na bana bobile bankwilimba, alete kumupaizi kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Lino mupaizi apaizye yomwe, ibe cipaizyo cazibi, aimwi ibe cipaizyo cakutenta, aboobo ulamumanina mulandu wakwe ngwaakabisya mumakani aamutunta. Lino asalazye mutwe wakwe mubuzuba obo mbubonya,

alisalazizye Jehova mazuba aabu-Naziri bwakwe. Nkabela uleelede kuleta kabelele kajisi mwaka omwe wakuzyalwa kabe cipaizyo camilandu. Pele mazuba aainda alalekwa, nkaambo kakuti bu-Naziri bwakwe bwakasofwaazigwa.

nkabela uleelede kupaizizya Jehova cipaizyo cakwe, kabelele komwe kali amwaka omwe katakwe kampenda, kabe cipaizyo cakutenta, kabelele komwe kapwizi kali amwaka omwe katakwe kampenda, kabe cipaizyo cazibi, amugutu omwe uutakwe kampenda, abe cipaizyo cakutontozya,
acinzuma cazinkwa zitakwe bumena, zibunge zyabusu bunante zikandidwe amafuta, atubunge tutakwe bumena tunanikidwe mafuta, azipaizyo zyazyo zyabusu, azipaizyo zyazyo zyakunywa.
Lino mupaizi azilete kubusyu bwa-Jehova, atuule cipaizyo cakwe cazibi acipaizyo cakwe cakutenta.
Alimwi atuule mugutu, abe cipaizyo cakutontozya Jehova, antoomwe acinzuma cazinkwa zitakwe bumena. Acalo cipaizyo cakwe cabusu, acipaizyo cakwe cakunywa, mupaizi azituule zyoonse.
Lino mu-Naziri anyoole mutwe wabuNaziri bwakwe kumulyango watente lyambunganino, amasusu aamutwe wabu-Naziri bwakwe, aabweze akwaatenta mumulilo uuli kunsi lyacipaizyo cakwe cakutontozya.

Lino mupaizi abweze kuulu kwakaango kwamugutu, kwamana kujikwa, acibunge comwe citakwe bumena kuzwa mucinzuma, akabunge komwe katakwe bumena, azibike mumaanza aamu-Naziri, uumanide kunyoola mutwe wakulisalazya kwakwe.

Nkabela mupaizi uleelede kuziyumba, zibe cipaizyo cakuyumba, kubusyu bwa-Jehova, Ezi zilaba caabilo cisalalisya camupaizi, antoomwe akatiti kakuyumba acibelo cakupaizya. Bamana kucita obo, mu-Naziri ulakonzya kunywa waini,

Mbuubede mulao wamu-Naziri uucita cikonke, Aletele Jehova cipaizyo ceelede cabu-Naziri bwakwe, kutaamba cintu cimwi ncakonzya kujana, Mbuli mbwaakacita cikonke, uleelede kucita mbubonya mbuli mulao wabu-Naziri bwakwe,
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila Aroni abana bakwe kuti, Mbuboobu mbumweelede kulongezya bana ba-Israyeli. Amubaambile kuti.
basilutwe baIsrayeli, bapati banzubo, basilutwe bamisyobo yabantu, ibakali kweendelezya abo ibakabalwa, bakaleta zipo zyabo.

Bakaleta zipo zyabo kubusyu bwaJehova, iŋola zivumbidwe zili musanu aimwi, abasune bali ikumi ababili, nkokuti iŋola yomwe kulibasilutwe bobile bobile amusune omwe kulisilutwe umwi aumwi. Lino bakazileta kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Uzitambule, zibe zyamilimo, zicite milimo yatente lyambunganino. Upe ba-Levi, umwi aumwi mbuli milimo yakwe.
Mpawo Musa wakatambula iŋola abasune, wapa ba-Levi.
Iŋola zyobile abasune bone wakazipa bana ba-Gerisoni, mbubonya bweelede milimo yabo.
Aŋola zyone abasune bali musanu abatatu wakazipa bana na-Merari, mbubonya bweelede milimo yabo, nkokuti mumaanza aa-Itamara mwana wa-Aroni mupaizi.
Pele bana ba-Kohati, takwakabapa pe, nkaambo milimo yabo kiili milimo yacikombelo; bakali kuyumuna amakuko aabo.
Nkabela basilutwe bakaleta zipo zyakusalazya cipaililo mubuzuba obo necakananikwa. Basilutwe bakatuula zipo zyabo kunembo lyacipaililo.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Balete zipo zyabo zyakusalazya cipaililo, silutwe umwi aumwi mubuzuba bumwi abumwi.
Lino mubuzuba butaanzi Nasoni mwana wa-Aminadabu, wamusyobo wa-Juda, nguwakaleta cipo cakwe.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile zyakalizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozya-basune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, atubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe, Ncecipo ca-Nasoni mwana wa-Aminadabu,
Lino mubuzuba bwabili Netaneeli mwana wa-Zuwara, silutwe wamusyobo wa-Isakara, nguwakaleta cipo cakwe.

Cipo ncaakaleta nceeci: cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile zyakalizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozya-basune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, atubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe, Ncecipo ca-Netaneeli mwana wa-Zuwara.
Lino mubuzuba bwatatu Eliabu mwana wa-Heloni, silutwe wabana ba-Zebuloni, wakaleta cipo cakwe.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile zyakalizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozya-basune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, atubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe, Ncecipo ca-Eliabu mwana wa-Heloni.
Lino mubuzuba bwane Elizuri mwana wa-Sedeuri, silutwe wabana ba-Rubeni, wakaleta cipo cakwe.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile zyakalizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, akabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozya-basune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, atubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe, Ncecipo ca-Elizuri mwana wa-Sedeuri.
Lino mubuzuba bwasanu Selumiyeli mwana wa-Zurisadai, silutwe wabana ba-Simeoni, wakaleta cipo cakwe.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile kazizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi,
azipaizyo zyakutontozyabasune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, tubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe, Ncecipo ca-Selumiyeli mwana wa-Zurisadai.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile zyakalizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozyabasune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, atubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe, Ncecipo ca-Eliyasafe mwana wa-Deyueli,

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile zyakalizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozyabasune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, atubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe. Ncecipo ca-Elisama mwana wa-Amihudi.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile zyakalizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozyabasune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, tubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe. Ncecipo ca-Gamaliyeli mwana wa-Pedazuri,
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aane, Abidana mwana wa-Gideoni, silutwe wabana ba-Benjamini, wakaleta cipo cakwe.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile zyakalizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozyabasune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, tubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe. Ncecipo ca-Abidana mwana wa-Gideoni.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba wansiliya iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile kazizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozya-basune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, tubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe. Ncecipo ca-Ahiezeri mwana wa-Amisadai.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile kazizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozya-basune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, tubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe, Ncecipo ca-Pagiyeli mwana wa-Okirani.

Cipo cakwe cakali cilongo comwe cansiliva icakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, amutiba omwe wansiliva iwakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), zyoonse zyobile kazizwide busu bunante buvwelene amafuta bwakupaizya;
muungo omwe wangolida wamasyekeli aali ikumi uuzwide tununkilizyo;
kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, kabelele komwe kamwaka omwe, zyacipaizyo cakutenta;
sijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi;
azipaizyo zyakutontozya-basune bobile, bagutu bosanwe, basijembwe bosanwe, tubelele tosanwe twamwaka omwe, Ncecipo ca-Ahira mwana wa-Enani.

Lino mbuboobu mbucakabede cituuzyo cakusalazya cipaililo, mubuzuba bwakunanikwa kwaco, ncibakalaleta basilutwe baba-Israyeli; zilongo zyansiliva zili ikumi azibili, mitiba yansiliva iili ikumi aibili, myuungo yangolida iili ikumi aibili;

bulemu bwacilongo cimwi acimwi bwakali masyekeli aansiliva aali mwanda amakumi otatwe, abulemu bwamutiba umwi aumwi bwakali masyekeli aali makumi aali musanu aabili, nkokuti bulemu bwansiliva yoonse bwakasika kumasyekeli aali zyuulu zyobile amyanda yone (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo),

amyuungo yangolida iili ikumi aibili iizwide tununkilizyo, umwi aumwi wakali abulemu bwamasyekeli aali ikumi (cakupimya asyekeli lyacikombelo), nkokuti bulemu bwangolida yoonse bwakasika kumasyekeli aali mwanda amakumi obile;

abanyama boonse bazipaizyo zyakutenta bakali bapoho bali ikumi ababili, bagutu bali ikumi ababili, tubelele twamwaka omwe tuli ikumi atubili, antoomwe azipaizyo zyazyo zyabusu; abasijembwe bali ikumi ababili bazipaizyo zyazibi;

abanyama boonse bazipaizyo zyakutontozya bakali bapoho bali makumi obile abane, bagutu bali makumi aali musanu alimwi, basijembwe bali makumi aali musanu alimwi, tubelele twamwaka omwe tuli makumi aali musanu alimwi, Ncecipo cakusalazya cipaililo necakamana kunanikwa.
Ambila Aroni kuti, Nobamba malampi, malampi aali musanu aabili aleelede kumunika kunembo lya­ ciimikilo camalampi.
Nkabela Aroni wakacita obo. Wakaimika malampi kuti amunike kunembo lyaciimikilo camalampi, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa,

Lino mbuboobu ciimikilo camalampi mbucakacitwa: cakali cifulamubisi; kuzwa kutako lyaco kusikila kumalubaluba aaco, coonse cakali cifula mubisi; mbuli cinkozya Jehoya ncaakatondezya Musa, wakacita ciimikilo camalampi mbubonya obo.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Gwisya ba-Levi akati kabana ba-Israyeli, ubasalazye.
Mbuboobu mboelede kubacitila kukubasalazya, Kobasansaila maanzi aakumanya milandu; lino balinyoole kumubili woonse, basanzye zyakusama zyabo, balisalazye.
Bamane obo babweze kapoho acipaizyo cako cabusu bunante buvwelene amafuta. Akamwi kapoho kabili ukabweze kabe cipaizyo cazibi.
Lino ba-Levi, uleelede kubaswenya afwaafwi kunembo lyatente lyambunganino akubunganya imbungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli.
Lino waswenya ba-Levi afwaafwi kubusyu bwaJehova, bana ba-Israyeli babike maanza aabo amitwe yaba-Levi.
Nkabela Aroni uleelede kuyumba ba-Levi mbuli cipaizyo cabana ba-Israyeli cakuyumba kubusyu bwa-Jehova, kuti bacite milimo ya-Jehova.
Lino ba-Levi babike maanza aabo amitwe yatupoho, nkabela kamwi kapaizigwe mbuli cipaizyo cazibi, akamwi kabe cipaizyo cakutentela Jehova, kuti umanye milandu yaba-Levi.
Mbuboobo mboelede kwiimika ba-Levi kunembo lya-Aroni akunembo lyabana bakwe, akubayumba mbuli cipaizyo cakuyumba kubusyu bwa-Jehova,
Wamana kubasalazya akubayumba mbuli cipaizyo cakuyumba, ba-Levi banjile kukucita milimo yatente lyambunganino.
Nkaambo bapegwa limwi kulindime, akati kabana ba-Israyeli, mucibaka cabaabo bajalula izyalilo acabana bataanzi babana ba-Israyeli. Ndabatola, babe bangu.
Nkaambo boonse bana bataanzi babana ba-Israyeli mbebangu, nibaba bantu nibaba banyama; nkaambo mubuzuba obo nindakauma boonse bana bataanzi bamunyika ya-Egepita, ndakabasalazya kuti babe bangu.
Lino ndatola ba-Levi mucibaka cabana bataanzi babana ba-Israyeli.

Ndapa ba-Levi, babe ba-Aroni ababana bakwe, akati kabana ba-Israyeli, kuti bacitile bana ba-Israyeli milimo yatente lyambunganino, bamanye milandu yabana ba-Israyeli, kuti kutabi malwazi akati kabana ba-Israyeli ciindi cakuswena kufwaafwi kuzintu zisalalisya,
Lino ba-Musa a-Aroni ambungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli bakacitila ba-Levi obo. Zintu zyoonse Jehova nzyaakalailila Musa kuba-Levi, bana ba-Israyeli bakabacitila nzizyonya.
Lino ba-Levi bakalisalazya kuzibi akusanzya zyakusama zyabo, nkabela Aroni wakabayumba mbuli cipaizyo cakuyumba kubusyu bwa-Jehova, alimwi Aroni wakamanya milandu yabo kuti basalale.
Kusule lyayaaya ba-Levi bakanjila kukucita milimo mutente lyambunganino kubusyu bwa-Aroni akubusyu bwabana bakwe; mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa aaba-Levi, bakabacitila mbubonya,
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Mbuboobu ba-Levi mbubeelede kucita. Kuzwa kumyaka iili makumi obile amusanu akwiindilila banjile mumilimo yakubeleka mutente lyambunganino.
Pele kuzwa kumyaka iili makumi osanwe baleke milimo akutacibeleka limbi.
Balakonzya kugwasya beenzinyina mutente lyambunganino akubamba imbeta, pele kubeleka tabakoonoocibeleka pe. Mbuboobo mbumweelede kubambila ba-Levi milimo.
Bana ba-Israyeli balye ipobwe lya-Pasika kuciindi calyo ceelede.
Mubuzuba bwakumi aane bwamwezi uno, kuciindi cagoko, amulye ipobwe kuciindi calyo ceelede, mbubonya mbuli milao yalyo yoonse ambeta zyalyo zyoonse.
Mpoonya awo Musa wakaambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti balye Pasika.
Nkabela bakalya Pasika mumwezi mutaanzi, mubuzuba bwakumi aane bwamumwezi, ciindi cagoko, oko kunkanda ya-Sinai; mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa mbubonya obo ba-Israyeli mbubakacita.
bati, Tulisofweede nkaambo kakuguma mutunta; sa ncibotu kuti tukasigwe kuletela Jehova cituuzyo akati kabana ba-Israyeli kuciindi ceelede?
Nkabela Musa wakavuwa kuti, Amulindile, kuti mvwe na Jehova ulalailila buti aandinywe.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Kufumbwa muntu akati kanu na akati kabana banu uusofweede nkaambo kamutunta, nanka uuli mulweendo, alye ipobwe lya-Pasika lya-Jehova.
Alye ipobwe mumwezi wabili, mubuzuba bwakumi aane bwamumwezi, kuciindi cagoko. Balilye azinkwa zitakwe bumena azisyu zilula.
Batasyaazyi imbutikwa mane kusikila cifumo pe, alimwi mutatyoli cifuwa neciba comwe. Babambe Pasika mbubonya mbuli milao yalyo yoonse.
Muntu uutasofweede uutali mulweendo, na wacelwa kulya ipobwe lya-Pasika, oyo muntu ulatandwa muciinga cakwe. Mbuli mbwaakacelwa kuleta cituuzyo ca-Jehova kuciindi ceelede, oyo muntu ulapegwa mulandu.

Nkabela na kuli mweenzu uukalakala akati kanu uuyanda kulya ipobwe lya-Pasika lyaJehova, alye mbubonya mbuli milao yalyo ambeta zyalyo, Kulaba mulao omwe buyo kubantu boor se, nebaba bazyalwa micusi nebaba bazwakule.
Mbucakabede lyoonse. Ijoba lyakali kucivumbilila isikati, acintu cibaanga mulilo masiku.
Nkabela kufumbwa ciindi ijoba nelyakaumbuluka kuzwa atala lyatente, bana ba-Israyeli bakalonga, alimwi ijoba mpolyakaboolela kukala, mpoonya awo ba-Israyeli mpobakayaka zilao zyabo.
Kumulomo wa-Jehova bana ba-Israyeli bakali kweenda, akumulomo wa-Jehova bakali kulyokezya. Mazuba oonse ijoba nelyakacikede acikombelo, bakacilikede abalo.
Na ijoba lyakasyaala atala lyacikombelo mazuba manji, bana ba-Israyeli bakabamba imbeta zya-Jehova, kabateendi nee.
Alimwi cimwi ciindi ijoba lyakalikede atala lyacikombelo mazuba mace buyo; lino kumulomo waJehova bakalikede mumalabba, alimwi kumulomo wa-Jehova bakeenda.

Cimwi ciindi ijoba lyakakala kuzwa kumabbililo kusikila kubucedo, lino ijoba nelyakaumbuluka cifumofumo bakeenda, Alimwi na lyakasyaala buzuba boonse, isikati amasiku, kufumbwa ciindi nelyakaumbuluka bakatalika kweenda.

Kufumbwa ciindi, naaba mazuba obile nuuba mwezi naaba mazuba manji loko, ijoba nelyakakede atala lyacikombelo, bana ba-Israyeli bakalikede mumalabba aabo, kabateendi pe, Nelyakaumbuluka buyo bakeenda.
Kumulomo wa-Jehova bakayaka zilao zyabo, akumulomo wa-Jehova bakeenda. Bakabamba imbeta zya-Jehova, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila kumulomo wa-Musa.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Kolicitila myeembo yobile yansiliva yacifulamubisi, ibe yakwiitya bantu ciindi cakweenda aciindi cakulyokezya.
Na yalila yoonse yobile, imbungano yoonse yabantu ileelede kuyoboloka kulinduwe kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Pele na walila omwe buyo, kulayoboloka basilutwe balike, basimutwe banzubo zya-Israyeli.
Na walilisya mweembo, inkamu zyabantu ziyakide zilao kulubazu lwakujwe zilanyamuka.
Lino kuciindi cakulilisya lwabili, inkamu zyabantu ziyakide zilao kulubazu lwakumusanza zilanyamuka. Kulilisya kwamweembo ncecitondezyo cakweenda.
Pele kuciindi cakubunganya bantu, amulizye mweembo, pele kulilisya utalilisyi pe.
Bapaizi, bana ba-Aroni, mbobeelede kulizya myeembo. Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu conse.

Alimwi ciindi cakuya kunkondo kuyoolwisya basinkondonyoko bamupenzya munyika yanu, myeembo ileelede kulilisya, lino munooyeeyegwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu, aboobo munoofutulwa kumaanza aabasinkondonyoko.

Alimwi kuziindi zyanu zyakusekelela, amumapobwe aabikidwe, amuziindi zyamwezi mupya, amulizye myeembo kuzipaizyo zyanu zyakutenta akuzipaizyo zyanu zyakutontozya, ibe ciibalusyo kubusyu bwa-Leza wanu. Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Lino bana ba-Israyeli bakatalika kulonga kuzwa kunkanda ya-Sinai, nkabela ijoba lyakaakwiima kunkanda ya-Parana.
Bakatola lweendo lwabo mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila kumulomo wa-Musa.
Bantu bandembela yalabba lyabana ba-Juda mbobakataanguna kweenda, munkamu zyabo, nkabela silutwe wankamu yabo wakali Nasoni mwana wa-Aminadabu.
Asilutwe wamusyobo wabana ba-Isakara kali Netaneeli mwana wa-Zuwara.
Asilutwe wamusyobo wabana ba-Zebuloni wakali Eliabu mwana wa-Heloni.
Musule lyabo bakanyamuka bantu bandembela yalabba lya-Rubeni, munkamu zyabo, nkabela silutwe wankamu yabo wakali Elizuri mwana wa-Sedeuri.
Asilutwe wamusyobo wabana ba-Simeoni wakali Selumiyeli mwana wa-Zurisadai.
Asilutwe wamusyobo wabana ba-Gadi kali Eliyasafe mwana wa-Deyueli.
Lino bakanyamuka ba-Kohati, basikuyumuna zintu zisalala; nkabela beenzinyina bakayaka itente kabatanasika bamwi.
Lino musule lyabaabo bantu bandembela yalabba lyabana ba-Efraimu bakanyamuka, munkamu zyabo, nkabela silutwe wankamu yabo kali Elisama mwana wa-Amihudi.
Asilutwe wamusyobo wabana ba-Manase kali Gamaliyeli mwana waPedazuri.
Asilutwe wamusyobo wabana ba-Benjamini kali Abidana mwana wa-Gideoni.
Asilutwe wamusyobo wabana ba-Aseri kali Pagiyeli mwana wa-Okirani.
Asilutwe wamusyobo wabana ba-Nafitali kali Ahira mwana wa-Enani.
Mbuboobo inkamu zyabana ba-Israyeli mbuzyakali kweenda muciindi cakulonga.
Pele wakuvuwa kuti, Nsikooinka pe, ndaya kunyika yangu akulibasikamukowama.
Wakati, Utatupambuki, nkaambo ulizi kuti tuyooyaka zilao zyesu munkanda, uyootubeda meso esu.
Na wainka aswebo, kufumbwa cintu cibotu Jehova ncatucitila, tulakucitila mbubonya ayebo.
Alyalo ijoba lya-Jehova lyakali amutwe wabo ciindi casikati mukweendeenda kwabo koonse.
Akuciindi cakulyokezya kwalyo, wakati, Boola, O Jehova, kumakumi aazyuulu zyazyuulu zyaba-Israyeli.
Lino bantu bakalilila Musa, nkabela Musa naakabakombela, mulilo wakaleka.
Nciceeco kuntu oko ncikwakaulikwa izina lya-Tabera, nkaambo mulilo wa-Jehova wakali kuyaka akati kabo,
Twaibaluka inswi nzitwakali kulya buyo mu-Egepita, amakowa, abanamunywa, azisyu, amaonione, amagalaki.
Lino sunu inguzu zyesu zyamaninina, nkaambo taakwe ncitujisi cita eyi insima ya-Mana luzutu.

Bantu bakali kuya kuyoobweza, elyo bakaciziya mumaziyo nanka kucitwa muncili. Bamane kutwa, bakali kujika muzilongo akucita zibunge. Nkabela mucanka waco wakali mbuli mucanka wazinkwa zijikidwe amafuta.
Mume niwakasika masiku, acalo cilyo ca-Mana cakaloka mpoonya awo.
Lino Musa wakamvwa kulila kwa bantu muziinga zyabo, umwi aumwi kumulyango wacilao cakwe, Nkabela bukali bwa-Jehova bwakakomenesya loko, alimwi makani akabija mumeso aa-Musa.
Nkabela Musa wakaambila Jehova kuti, Ino nkaambonzi wandibisizya ndemulanda wako? Nkaambonzi nsifwidwi luzyalo mumeso aako? Nkaambonzi wandilemezya mukuli wabantu aba boonse?
Sa ndime ndaminta aba bantu boonse? Sa ndime ndabazyala? Nkaambonzi wandaambila kuti, Kobabukata akaango kako mbuli sikulela mbwabukata muvwanda, ubatole kunyika eyo njindakakonkezya kulibamawisi.
Njane kuli nyama yakwaabila aba bantu boonse? Nkaambo bandililila cakwaamba kuti, Utupe nyama, tulye.
Cilandikacila kuyumuna mukuli wabantu aba boonse, mebo endike, nkaambo mukuli wandilemena.
Na ulayanda kundicitila obo, undijaye ndilyonya lino, na ndafwidwa luzyalo mumeso aako, kuti ntaboni kupenga kwangu.
Lino ndaseluka kuzooambaula ayebo nkukonya oko, alimwi ndagwisya muuya uuli mulinduwe, ndaubika mulimbabo, kuti bakugwasye kunyamula mukuli wabantu aba, kuti utanyamuli olike.

Alimwi ambila bantu kuti, Amulisalazizye bwejunza, nkabela munoolya nyama, nkaambo mwalila mumatwi aa-Jehova cakwaamba kuti, Nguni uunootupa nyama yakulya? Necatubotela netwacili mu­-Egepita, Lino Jehova ulamupa nyama yakulya.
Tamukoonoolya buzuba bomwe buyo, na mazuba obile, na mazuba osanwe, na mazuba aali ikumi, naaba mazuba aali makumi obile.
Pe, munoolya mwezi woonse, mane cikamuzwe cili mumoyo, anyama ikamusesemye, nkaambo mwasampaula Jehova uuli akati kanu, mwalila kubusyu bwakwe, mwati, Twakazwidanzi mu-Egepita.
Pele Musa wakati, Ma! Bantu mbendi abo bali zyuulu zili myanda iili musanu aumwi basimyeendo. Lino waamba kuti, Njoobapa nyama, balye mwezi woonse.
Sa balajayilwa imbelele aŋombe zyoonse kuti inkosya yabo imane? Nanka inswi zyoonse zyamulwizi zizubwe kuti inkosya yabo imane?
Pele Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Sa ijanza lya-Jehova lyafwinsigwa? Ulalibonena na majwi aangu ngakasimpe na pe,
Elyo Musa wakazwa anze, waakulwiida bantu majwi aa-Jehova. Alimwi wakabunganya bantu bali makumi aali musanu aabili babapati babantu, wabaimika cakuzyunguluka itente.

Mpoonya awo Jehova wakaseluka mujoba, waambaula awe, Nkabela wakabweza muuya iwakali mulinguwe, wabika-bika mubantu abo bapati bali makumi aali musanu aabili. Lino nibakanjilwa buyo muuya, bakasinsima. Pele teebakacita obo limbi,
Mpawo umwi mulombe wakazuzaana kuyoolwiida Musa, wati, Elidadi a-Medadi bali mukusinsima mukati kalabba.
Amvwe obo, Joshua mwana wa-Nuni, similimo wa-Musa, umwi wabantu mbaakasalide, wakati, O simalelaangu Musa, ubakasye.
Musa wakamuvwiila kuti, Sa wabafwida ibbivwe nkaambo kangu? Necakabota, bantu boonse ba-Jehova nebali basinsimi, Jehova naabika muuya wakwe mulimbabo.
Elyo ba-Musa abapati ba-Israyeli bakapiluka kumalabba.
Lino bantu bakabuka buzuba obo boonse, amasiku, abuzuba bwabili, kuyoobweza banduu. Naba muntu iwakabweza buniini buyo wakazuzya zisuwo zili ikumi. Lino bakabayanika kumabazu oonse aamalabba.
Lino nyama niyakacili mumeno aabo, kabatana mana kunyeela, bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila bantu, nkabela Jehova wakabaumya luumo lupati loko.
Nciceeco oko kuntu ncikwakaulikilwa izina lya-Kibiroti Hatava, nkaambo nkonkuko nkubakazika bantu basindya.
Lino kuzwa ku-Kibiroti Hatava bantu bakalongela ku-Hazeroti, bakaakukala-kala ku-Hazeroti.
Nkabela bakati, Sa Jehova ulaamba kumulomo wa-Musa alike? Sa taambi kumilomo yesu aswebo? Nkabela Jehova wakamvwa.
(Oyu muntu Musa kali mubombemoye kwiinda bantu boonse baansi.)
Mpawaawo Jehova wakaambila ba-Musa a-Aroni a-Miriamu kuti, Amuboole, nywebo notatwe, munjile mutente lyambunganino. Lino boonse botatwe bakainka.
Elyo Jehova wakaseluka mumusumpululu wajoba, waima amulyango watente, waita Aroni a-Miriamu. Bakainka boonse bobile.
Wakati, Amuswiilile majwi aangu, Na kuli musinsimi akati kanu, mebo nde-Jehova ndalibonya kulinguwe mucilengano, ndaambaula awe muciloto.
Pele embo obo mbabede mulanda wangu Musa uusyomeka muzintu zyoonse zyamuŋanda yangu.
Ndaambaula awe mulomo kumulomo, nsiambi mutulabi pe, acalo ciwa cangu ulacibona. Ino nkaambonzi teemwakayoowa kusampaula mulanda wangu Musa?
Nkabela bukali bwa-Jehova bwakababukila, Elyo wakainka.
Lino ijoba nilyakaumbuluka kuzwa kutente, kwakabonwa kuti Miriamu waba sicinsenda uutuba buu. Aroni naakacebuka, wakabona kuti Miriamu waba sicinsenda.
Mpawo Aroni wakaambila Musa kuti, O simalelaangu, utatupi mulandu nkaambo kabufubafuba bwesu akubisya kwesu,
Atabi mbuli mufu, mbuli mwana uubelwidwe uufwidwe kale cisela canyama yakwe ciindi cakuzwa mwida lyabanyina.
Mpawo Musa wakakwiilila Jehova, wati, O Leza, aponesegwe.
Pele Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Wisi naakamuswida mate kumeso aakwe, sa naatakafwa insoni mazuba aali musanu aabili? Ajalilwe mazuba aali musanu aabili anze lyamalabba, Amana ulaboozegwa mukati.
Aboobo Miriamu wakajalilwa anze lyamalabba, nkabela bantu teebakeenda mane Miriamu wakaboozegwa.
Kusule lyayaaya bantu bakalonga kuzwa ku-Hazeroti, baakuyaka zilao zyabo munkanda ya-Parana.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Tuma bantu kuyootwela nyika ya-Kanana njindapa bana ba-Israyeli. Tuma muntu omwe omwe kumusyobo umwi aumwi. Boonse babe bazuluzi.
Mpoonya awo Musa wakabatuma kuzwa kunkanda ya-Parana, mbubonya mbwaakalailila Jehova, Bantu boonse bakali bazuluzi akati kabana ba-Israyeli.
Ngaaya mazina aabo: kumusyobo wa-Rubeni, Samua mwana wa-Zakuri;
kumusyobo wa-Simeoni, Safati mwana wa-Hori;
kumusyobo wa-Juda, Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune,
kumusyobo wa-Isakara, Igali mwana wa-Josefa;
kumusyobo wa-Efraimu, Hosea mwana wa-Nuni;
kumusyobo waBenjamini, Paliti mwana wa-Rafu;
kumusyobo wa-Zebuloni, Gadiyeli mwana wa-Sodi;
kumusyobo wa-Josefa, nkokuti musyobo wa-Manase, Gadi mwana wa-Susi;
kumusyobo wa-Dani, Amiyeli mwana wa-Gemali;
kumusyobo wa-Aseri, Seturi mwana wa-Mikayeli;
kumusyobo wa-Nafitali, Nabi mwana wa-Vopisi;
kumusyobo wa-Gadi, Geyueli mwana wa-Maki.
Ngengao mazina aabantu mbaakatuma Musa kuyootwela nyika. Nkabela Hosea mwana wa-Nuni, Musa wakamuulika izina lya-Joshua.
mukabone nyika mbwiibede, abantu bakede mulinjiyo, na mbayumu na mbabombe, na mbace na mbanji;
mubone nyika njibakede pa nimbotu na nimbi, aminzi njibakede na malabba buyo na ili amabaya,
anyika mbiibede, na njambolezi na njankanda, alimwi na muli misamu mulinjiyo na pe. Amu-yume, mukalete imwi micelo yamunyika, Lino ciindi eco cakali ciindi camasaansa naatalika kubizwa.
Mpawo bakainka kuyootwela nyika yoonse kuzwa kunkanda ya-Zini kusikila ku-Rehobi uubambene amanjililo aa-Hamati.
Bakaya kuNegebi akusika ku-Hebroni. Nkabela Ahimani a Sesai a-Talimai, bana ba-Anaki, mpobakakede. (Hebroni wakayakwa myaka iili musanu aibili kuutana kuyakwa Zoani waku-Egepita.)
Basike buyo kukalonga kaEsikoli, bakatyola nkukonya oko mutabi iwakali acikungo camasaansa, bacitemba bobile, alimwi bakacela-cela mapomegranite ankuyu.
Lino kuntu oko kwakaulikwa izina lya-Esikoli, nkokuti cikungo, nkaambo kacikungo ncibakatyola bana ba-Israyeli oko.
Amane mazuba aali makumi one, bakaboola kuzwa kukutwela nyika.
Lino bakasika kuli-Musa a-Aroni ambungano yoonse yaba-Israyeli kuKedesi mu nkanda ya-Parana, nkabela bakabaletela impuwo, balo ambungano yoonse yabantu, akuba tondezya micelo yanyika.
Nkabela bakabalwiida, bati, Twakaakusika kunyika nkumwakatutuma. Ncobeni ilakunka malili abuci; njeeyi micelo yayo.
Pele bantu bakede munyika mbayumu, aminzi iili ama baya, alimwi mipati, Nkabela twakabona bana ba-Anaki nkuko.
Ba-Amaleki mbebakakede munyika ya-Negebi; ba-Hiti abaJebusi aba-Amori mbebakede kuzilundulundu; aba-Kanana balikede kumbali alwizi akunkomwe zya-Jordano.
Pele bantu mbaakeenda abo bakati, Tatukonzyi kuyoolwisya bantu abo, pe, nkaambo mbayumu kwiinda ndiswe.
Aboobo bakaletela bana baIsrayeli impuwo imbi yanyika eyo njibakaakutwela, Bakati, Nyika eyo njitwakaakutwela ninyika iikonzya kulya bantu bayo, abantu boonse mbetwakabona nkuko majompojompo.
Alimwi nkukonya oko twakabona babbabbani, nkabela swebo mumeso esu amumeso aabo twakalitenga.
Lino bantu boonse bambungano bakatalika kuyoba, nkabela bakali kulila masiku ayo.
Bantu boonse ba-Israyeli bakali kutongaukila Musa a-Aroni. Imbungano yoonse yakabaambila kuti, Nicakabota nitwakafwa munyika ya-Egepita nanka kufwa munkanda.
Ino nkaambonzi Jehova watusisya kunyika eyi kuti atujazye ipanga? Banakazi besu abana besu boonse balasaalwa. Sa tacikonzyi kuba cibotu kupiluka ku-Egepita?
Mpoonya awo ba-Musa a-Aroni bakavundama kunembo lyambungano yabana ba-Israyeli.
Alakwe Joshua mwana wa-Nuni a-Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune, bamwi basikutwela nyika, bakadelaula zyakusama zyabo,
baambila bantu boonse bambungano yaba-Israyeli, bati, Nyika eyo njitwakaakutwela ninyika imbotu loko.
Na Jehova twamubotela, ulatunjizya munyika eyo akwiipa ndiswe, nyika iikunka malili abuci.
Pele mutapapili Jehova, alimwi mutayoowi bantu banyika eyo, nkaambo nzilyo zyesu, Citabilizyo cabo cazwa; Jehova uli aswebo; mutabayoowi.
Pele bantu boonse buyo bakati baumye mabwe. Lino bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakaboneka mutente lyambunganino kumeso aabana boonse ba-Israyeli,
Ndabaumya malwazi, nsikoobapa lukono, pele njoocita kuti yebo ube musyobo mupati uuli anguzu kwiinda mbabo,

Lino bayooambila bantu bakede munyika eyi. Balimvwide kuti mpoli akati kabantu aba, O Jehova, nkaambo webo O Jehova ulaboneka busyu kubusyu, alimwi ijoba lyako liliimvwi atala lyabo, nkabela ulabazulwida mumusumpululu wajoba isikati amumusumpululu wamulilo ciindi camasiku.
Na wanyonyoona bantu aba mbuli muntu omwe, bamasi bamvwide impuwo yako bayooamba kuti,
Jehova wakakacilwa kunjizya bantu abo munyika eyo njaakabasyomezya, aboobo wabajaya munkanda.
Lino inguzu zya-Mwami zikomene, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lyako lyakuti,
Jehova tafwambi kukalala, ulizwide luzyalo, ulalekelela milandu ansotoko, nekubaboobo talulamiki bataluleme, ulauma bana abazukulu nkaambo kazibi zyabamawisi, mane kusikila kuzyalani lyatatu alyane.
Ndakumbila kuti muluzyalo lwako lupati ulekelele bantu aba milandu yabo, mbubonya mbowabalekelela lyoonse kuzwa ku-Egepita akusikila lino.
Nekubaboobo, ncobeni mbundi muumi, anyika yoonse mbiiyoozula bulemu bwa-Jehova,
aba bantu boonse babwene bulemu bwangu azitondezyo zyangu nzindakacita munyika ya-Egepita amunkanda, nekubaboobo bandisunka ziindi ezi zili ikumi akutaswiilila ijwi lyangu,
tabakooyoobona nyika eyo njindakasyomezya bamawisi. Akati kabaabo basampaula takukooyooba naba omwe uuyooibona.
Pele mulanda wangu Kalebe, mbuli mbwajisi moyo wakwe alike, alimwi wanditobela camoyo woonse, njoomusisya kunyika eyo nkwaakabona, nkabela lunyungu lwakwe luyooivuba.
Lino ba-Amaleki aba-Kanana balikede mukuti. Junza amupiluke, mulongele kunkanda, kunzila yaku-Lwizi Lusalala.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Ino inkamu eyi imbi ilaleka lili kunditongaukila? Ndimvwide matongauko aabana ba-Israyeli ngebanditongauka.
Kobaambila kuti, Mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Jehova, ndamucitila cintu eco nciconya ncimwaamba mumatwi aangu.
Mitunta yanu iyoosyaala okuno kunkanda, amweelwe woonse wabaabo ibakabalwa akati kanu, nkokuti bajisi myaka iili makumi obile abaindilila, boonse banditongauka.
Ncobeni tamukooyoonjila munyika eyo njendakakonkezya kuti mukale mulinjiyo, cita Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune a-Joshua mwana wa-Nuni abalike.
Pele twana twanu, oto ntomwakaamba kuti tulasaalwa, njootunjizya munyika njemwasampaula.
Pele nywebo, mitunta yanu iyoosyaala okuno kunkanda.
Bana banu bayooembela munkanda myaka iili makumi one, aboobo bayoopenga nkaambo kakutasyomeka kwanu, mane mitunta yanu ikamane munkanda.
Mbubonya mbuli mweelwe wamazuba aakutwela nyika, nkokuti mazuba aali makumi one, mbuboobu mbumuyoopegwa mulandu, buzuba nkokuti mwaka omwe, myaka ibe makumi one, muzibe kubijilwa kwangu.
Mebo nde-Jehova ndaamba. Ncobeni mbuboobo mbunjoocitila eti izyalani ibbi lyoonse lindibusizya inkondo. Bayoomaninina kufwa omuno munkanda.
abo bantu ibakaleta impuwo imbi yanyika bakafwa malwazi kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Joshua mwana wa-Nuni a-Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune mbebakafutuka abalike akati kabantu abo basikutwela nyika.
Buce buyo, bakafumina kucilundu, bati, Bona! Mpotuli. Tulaya kucisi eco Jehova ncaakaamba, nkaambo twabisya.
Pele Musa wakati, Ino nkaambonzi mulasampaula malailile aa-Jehova? Kucita obo takukonzyi kuleta coolwe pe.
Mutainki pe, kuti mutakazundwi kulibasinkondonyoko, nkaambo Jehova tawo akati kanu.
BaAmaleki aba-Kanana nkubali oko kunembo lyanu. Muyoojazigwa ipanga, nkaambo mwaleka kutobela Jehova, aboobo Jehova takooyooba anywebo.
Nekubaboobo bakakakatila kuya kumutwe wacilundu, nekuba kuti ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova teelyakeenda kuzwa kumalabba, naba Musa.
Mpawo ba-Amaleki aba-Kanana ibakede mucilundu eco bakaseluka, babazunda akuba tanda mane kusikila ku-Horima.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa, wati,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mwayoosika kunyika njenti mupe kuti mukale mulinjiyo,

na mwatentela Jehova cituuzyo na cipaizyo, niciba cipaizyo cakuzuzikizya cikonke niciba cakupa buyo niciba cipaizyo cakumapobwe aabikidwe, cipaizyo cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova, niiba iŋombe niiba imbelele,
kufumbwa muntu uutuula cipaizyo uleelede kupaizizya Jehova cipaizyo cabusu, cipanzi cakumi cacisuwo cabusu bunante bukandidwe acipanzi cane cansazi yamafuta;
acalo cakunywa, muleelede kubambila cituuzyo na cipaizyo cipanzi cane cansazi yawaini kukabelele kamwi akamwi.
Nanka mugutu, uleelede kumubambila cipaizyo cabusu, zipanzi zyobile zyakumi zyacisuwo cabusu bunante bukandidwe acipanzi catatu cansazi yamafuta;
acakunywa, amupaizye cipanzi catatu cansazi yawaini, kube bweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jebova.
Alimwi na wabamba kapoho kacituuzyo citentwa na kacipaizyo, niciba cipaizyo cakuzuzikizya cikonke niciba cipaizyo cakutontozya Jehova,
cipaizyo cabusu ncotuula antoomwe akapoho cibe zipanzi zyotatwe zyakumi zyacisuwo cabusu bunante bukandidwe acisela cansazi yamafuta;
acakunywa, uleelede kupaizya cisela cansazi yawaini, kutentwe cipaizyo cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Mbuboobo mbumweelede kucitila musune na mugutu umwi aumwi, nanka mwana wambelele na wampongo.
Amucitile umwi aumwi mbubonya obo, kufumbwa mweelwe ngomubamba.
Boonse bazyalwa mucisi baleelede kucita obo ciindicakutenta cipaizyo, kube bweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Alakwe mweenzu uukala akati kanu, nanka muntu uutuntulika uuli akati kanu ciindi coonse, na ulayanda kutenta cipaizyo cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova, acite mbubonya obo mbomucita nywebo.
Kulaba mulao omwe buyo kubantu boonse, nemuba ndinywe naba mweenzu uukala akati kanu, Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu oonse: mbumubede nywebo, mbwabede mweenzu alakwe kubusyu bwaJehova.
Kulaba mulao omwe buyo alubeta lomwe buyo, kulindinywe akumweenzu uukala akati kanu.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa, wati,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mwaakusika kunyika eyo nkondimutola,
ciindi cakulya zilyo zyanyika, amulete cipo kuli-Jehova.
Amulete kabalwebalwe kadibule lyanu, mupaizye cinkwa; cipaizigwe, cibe cipaizyo cizwa kucipolelo.
Kupa Jehova kabalwebalwe kadibule lyanu, ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu.
nkokuti zintu zyoonse Jehova nzyaakamulailila kujanza lya-Musa, kuzwa kubuzuba obo Jehova naakataanguna kulailila amuya mumazuba oonse aamazyalani aanu,

na cintu cacitwa cakutaziba, alimwi cilisisidwe kumeso aabantu bambungano, imbungano yoonse ilete kapoho komwe kakutentela Jehova, kabe cipaizyo cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova, antoomwe acipaizyo caco cabusu acipaizyo ca co cakunywa, mbubonya mbukweelede, asijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi.

Lino mupaizi uleelede kumanya milandu yambungano yabana ba-Israyeli, nkabela banoolekelelwa, nkaambo kabatezi, alimwi balete cipaizyo cabo cakutentela Jehova, acipaizyo cazibi zyabo bacilete kubusyu bwa-Jehova nkaambo kakutaziba kwabo.
Bantu boonse bambungano yabana ba-Israyeli bayoolekelelwa, abalo beenzu bali akati kabo, nkaambo bantu boonse buyo kabatezi.
Lino mupaizi amanye milandu yamuntu oyo iwabisya cakutaziba kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Amanye milandu yakwe, nkabela ulalekelelwa.
Bazyalwa mucisi ca-Israyeli abeenzu bakalakala akati kabo, boonse buyo balaba amulao omwe mumakani aamuntu uubisya cakutaziba.
Pele muntu uubisya caali, naba muzyalwemucisi naba mweenzu, wasampaula Jehova, nkabela muntu oyo ulatandwa mu ciinga cakwe.
Nkaambo wasampaula ijwi lya-Jehova akutyola malailile aakwe, Oyo muntu ncobeni uleelede kutandwa; ngumulandu wakwe mwini.
Elyo abo ibakamujana ulatebba inkuni bakamuleta kuliba-Musa a-Aroni akumbungano yoonse.
Nkabela bakamubika muntolongo, nkaambo kabatana kuzibisigwa ncaelede kucitilwa.
Mpoonya awo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Oyo muntu ncobeni uleelede kujayigwa. Bantu boonse bamufuse mabwe anze lyamalabba.
Elyo bantu boonse bakamugwisya anze lyamalabba, bamufusa mabwe, aboobo wakafwa, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa, wati,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti mumazyalani aabo oonse balicitile mayaayila muzyooko zyazikobela zyabo akwaanzya mayaayila intambo yakamwemvwe.
Lino kufumbwa ciindi nemwabona mayaayila, mulaibaluka malailile oonse aa-Jehova, kuti mwaacite, mutatobeli miyeeyo yamyoyo yanu azisusi zyameso aanu zikonzya kumubuzya lusyomo.
Mucite obo, kuti mwiibaluke akucita milao yangu yoonse, musalalile Leza wanu.
Ndime Jehova Leza wanu iwakamugwisya munyika ya-Egepita, kuti mbe Leza wanu, Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
baima kubusyu bwa-Musa antoomwe abamwi ba-Israyeli bali myanda yobile amakumi osanwe, basilutwe babantu, basinkuta, bantu ibakali ampuwo.

Nkabela bakayoboloka kukukazyana aba-Musa a-Aroni, babaambila kuti, Mwalisumpula, nkaambo bantu boonse buyo balasalala, alimwi Jehova mpali akati kabo, Nkaambonzi mwalipa bwami kwiinda imbungano yoonse yabantu ba-Jehova?
Amvwe obo, Musa wakavundama,

waambila Kora abeenzinyina boonse kuti, Cifumo Jehova ulamutondezya na ngwasalide nguni, a-uusalala nguni, ayooyo uukonzya kuswena afwiifwi kulinguwe, Kufumbwa muntu ngwasalide ulamuswenya kufwaafwi kulinguwe.
Lino amucite obo, Amubweze zitentelo, yebo Kora abeenzinyoko boonse,
mukabike mulilo mulinzizyo akubika tununkilizyo kubusyu bwa-Jehova Junza. Lino kufumbwa muntu ngwasala Jehova, ngonguwe uuyoosalala. Mwalisumpula nobana ba-Levi.
Alimwi Musa wakaambila Kora kuti, Amuswiilile nobana ba-Levi.

Sa ncintu ciniini buyo Leza wa-Israyeli ncaakacita kukumwaandaanya abantu boonse ba-Israyeli akukumuswenya kufwaafwi kulinguwe, kuti mubeleke milimo yacikombelo ca-Jehova akwiima kubusyu bwambungano akubabelekela milimo?
Wakuswenya kufwaafwi kulinguwe, yebo abanyoko bana ba-Levi. Sa mulayandaula abwalo bupaizi?
Ncobeni ngu-Jehova ngomwabunganina kuzookazyanya awe. Ino Aroni uli amakaninzi ngomutongaukila?
Alimwi Musa wakatuma kuyooita Datani a-Abiramu bana ba-Eliabu, pele bakati, Tatukoosika pe.
Sa ncintu ciniini buyo ncowacita mukutugwisya munyika iikunka malili abuci akutujaya munkanda? Sa uciyanda kulipa busilutwe alimwi kulindiswe?
Tokwe nowatunjizya munyika iikunka malili abuci, nekuba kutukonya myuunda amyuunda yamisaansa. Sa ulayanda kuvumba meso aabantu aba? Tatukoosika pe.
Elyo Musa wakaambila Kora kuti, Amuboneke kubusyu bwa-Jehova ankamu yako yoonse junza, yebo abalo a-Aroni.

Lino muleelede kubweza umwi aumwi citentelo cakwe, mubike tununkilizyo mulinzizyo; nyoonse mulete umwi aumwi citentelo cakwe kubusyu bwa-Jehova, zitentelo zili myanda yobile amakumi osanwe; ayebo a-Aroni mulete umwi aumwi citentelo cakwe.
Lino bakabweza umwi aumwi citentelo cakwe, babika mulilo atununkilizyo, baimikila kumulyango watente lyambunganino antoomwe a-Musa a-Aroni.
Elyo Kora wakayobolola imbungano yoonse kumulyango watente lyambunganino, nkabela bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakaboneka kumeso aabantu boonse.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni kuti,
Amulyaanzaanye kumbungano eyi, kuti mbasyukutye lino lino.
Mpawo bakavundama, bati, O Leza, Leza wamyuuya yabantu boonse, na muntu omwe wabisya, sa ulakalalila bantu boonse buyo?
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa, wati,
Ambila imbungano eyi kuti, Amutantamuke kuzwa kucikalilo ca-Kora aca-Datani aca-Abiramu.
Mpawo Musa wakanyamuka, waya kuli-Datani a-Abiramu; abalo bapati ba-Israyeli bakamutobela.
Lino wakaambila imbungano kuti, Amuzwe kuzilao zya bantu aba babi, alimwi mutagumi cintu niciba comwe cabo, kuti mutanyonyooki muzibi zyabo zyoonse.
Bamvwe obo, bakatantamuka kuzwa kuzilao zya-Kora azya-Datani a-Abiramu. Nkabela Datani a-Abiramu bakazwa muzilao zyabo, baimikila kumilyango, abanakazi babo abana babo atwana twabo.
Lino Musa wakaamba kuti, Mbuboobu mbumuyooziba kuti Jehova nguwakandituma kuti ncite milimo eyi yoonse; teensi kuyanda kwamoyo wangu ndemwini kwandicitya pe.
Na bantu aba bafwa mbubonya mbubafwa bantu boonse, alimwi na basikilwa makani ayo ngaonya aasikila bantu boonse, teensi Jehova wandituma.
Pele na Jehova wacita cintu cipya, na nyika yaasama akubamena ambono zyabo zyoonse, na baselukila kwacimvumwe kabalanga, lino muyooziba kuti aba bantu basampaula Jehova.
Nyika yakaasama, yabamena, amaanda aabo, abantu boonse ibakali a-Kora, ambono zyabo zyoonse.
Bantu abo bakaselukila kwacimvumwe kabalanga ambono zyabo zyoonse, nkabela nyika yakabajalila, aboobo bakanyonyooka akati kambungano.
Mpawo ba-Israyeli boonse ibakali afwiifwi lyabo, bamvwe buyo kulila kwabo, bakacija, nkaambo bakati, Ambweni nyika ilatumena aswebo.
Nkabela kwakazwa mulilo kuli-Jehova, wasyukutya abo bantu bali myanda yobile amakumi osanwe ibakali kutenta tununkilizyo,
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa, wati,
Ambila Eleazara mwana wa-Aroni mupaizi kuti agwisye zitentelo mukati kamulilo, asoowe mulilo wazyo kule, nkaambo zilasalala.

Lino zitentelo zyabantu aba ibakabisya akulyuulila lufu, zifulwe cifulamubisi, zipapalate, zibe zyakuvumbya cipaililo; nkaambo bakazituula kubusyu bwa-Jehova, aboobo zilasalala, Zilaba citondezyo kumeso aabana ba-Israyeli.
Mpoonya awo Eleazara mupaizi wakabweza zitentelo zyamukuba nzebakapaizya abo basikutuula, nkabela bazifula cifulamubisi akuzivumbya cipaililo,

aboobo zyakaba ciibalusyo kubana ba-Israyeli, kuti kutasweni muntu umbi naba omwe uutali walunyungu lwa-Aroni kuzootenta tununkilizyo kubusyu bwa-Jehova, kuti atabi mbuli Kora abeenzinyina. Eleazara wakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamwaambila kumulomo wa-Musa.
Lino bantu nebakacibungene kukukazyanya a-Musa a-Aroni, bakacebuka kutente lyambunganino, babona kuti ijoba lyalivumbilila, nkabela bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakaboneka.
Elyo ba-Musa a-Aroni bakasika kunembo lyatente lyambunganino,
nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
amuzwe mukati kabantu aba, kuti mbasyukutye lino, Bamvwe obo, bakavundama.

Nkabela Musa wakaambila Aroni kuti, Bweza citentelo cako, ubike mulilo mulincico kuzwa kucipaililo, ubike tununkilizyo, ufwambaane kuya kumbungano yabantu, umanye milandu yabo, nkaambo kwabuka bukali kuli-Jehova, alunyonyooko lwatalika.
Elyo Aroni wakacibweza, mbubonya mbuli Musa mbwaakamwaambila, wazuza mukati kabantu. Wakajana kuti lunyonyooko lwatalika kale akati kabantu, elyo wakabika tununkilizyo akumanya milandu yabantu.
Nkabela wakaima akatikati kabafu abaumi, aboobo lunyonyooko lwakalesegwa.
Nkabela bantu ibakafwa mulunyonyooko olo bakali zyuulu zili ikumi azine amyanda iili musanu aibili, kutabala abo ibakafwa mumakani aa-Kora.
Lino lunyonyooko lulesegwe buyo, Aroni wakapiluka kuliMusa kumulyango watente lyambunganino.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa, wati,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti bakupe misako; musyobo umwi aumwi ukupe musako; basilutwe boonse bamisyobo balete misako, ibe ikumi aibili. Lino ulembe izina lyamuntu umwi aumwi amusako wakwe,
akulemba izina lya-Aroni amusako wa-Levi. Nkaambo kulaba musako omwe kulisilutwe wamusyobo umwi aumwi.
Lino uleelede kwiituula mutente lyambunganino kunembo lyabbokesi lyamulao, nkukonya oko nkutuswaninana.
Nkabela oyo muntu ngonsala, musako wakwe ulasyuuka, aboobo njoolesya kutongauka kwabana ba-Israyeli nkobanditongauka.

Mpoonya Musa wakaambila bana baIsrayeli, nkabela basilutwe boonse bakamupa misako, musako omwe kulisilutwe wamusyobo umwi aumwi, nkokuti misako iili ikumi aibili; awalo musako wa-Aroni wakali akati kamisako yabo.
Nkabela Aroni wakatuula misako kubusyu bwa-Jehova mutente lyambunganino.
Mpawo Musa wakagwisya misako yoonse, waileta kubantu ba-Israyeli, nkabela bakalanga akulibwezela umwi aumwi musako wakwe.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Pilusya musako wa-Aroni kunembo lyabbokesi lyamulao, ube citondezyo kumeso aabasikupapila­, ubalesye kunditongauka, kuti batafwi.
Nkabela Musa wakacita obo, Wakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamulailila.
Elyo bana ba-Israyeli bakaambila Musa kuti, Ncobeni tulafwa, tulanyonyooka, tulanyonyooka toonse.
Kufumbwa muntu uuswena kufwaafwi kucikombelo ca-Jehova ulafwa, Sa ncibotu kuti tunyonyooke toonse?
Abalo bana bakwanu, musyobo wa-Levi, musyobo wauso, ubaletele, kuti baswanizigwe ayebo, bakugwasye milimo, webo abana bako nimuli kunembo lyatente lyacizuminano.
Babambe milimo yako amilimo yoonse yatente, pele tabeelede kuswena kufwaafwi kuzibelesyo zisalala nanka kucipaililo, kuti batafwi, balo anywebo nyoonse.
Baswanizigwe ayebo, babambe milimo yatente lyambunganino, milimo yoonse yatente; pele kutabi muntu umbi uumuswenenena.
Amubambe milimo yacikombelo amilimo yacipaililo, kuti bana ba-Israyeli batabukilwi limbi bukali.
Amubone! Ndagwisya bana bakwanu ba-Levi akati kabana ba-Israyeli, babe cipo canu; mwabapegwa kuli-Jehova kuti bacite milimo yatente lyambunganino.

Lino yebo abana bako mulacita milimo yabupaizi mumakani oonse aacipaililo amakani aazintu zyoonse zili mukati kacisitilizyo. Bupaizi bwanu ncencico ncimwapegwa kulindime; kufumbwa muntu umbi uuswena kufwaafwi uleelede kufwa.

Nceeci ncimwapegwa akati kazintu zisalalisya zisyaala kukutentwa: zipaizyo zyabo zyoonse, zipaizyo zyabo zyabusu, zipaizyo zyabo zyazibi, azipaizyo zyabo zyamilandu, zyoonse buyo nzibandiletela zilasalalisya kulinduwe akubana bake.
Munoozilya mubusena busalalisya; baalumi boonse bayoocilya; ciyoosalala kulindinywe.
Aceeci acalo ncicako: zipo nzebaleta, zipaizyo zyakuyumba zyabana ba-Israyeli. Ndazipa nduwe abana bako balombe abasimbi. Ngumulao walyoonse. Kufumbwa uusalala muŋanda yako unoolya.
Zintu zyoonse zinono zyamafuta azilwela zyamasaansa azyamaila, kabalwebalwe nkebaletela Jehova, zyoonse ndazipa kulinduwe.
Micelo yoonse, iitaanguna kubizwa munyika yabo nzebaletela Jehova zilaba zyako; kufumbwa uusalala muŋanda yako unoolya.
Zintu zyoonse zyaba-Israyeli zipegwa limwi kuli-Jehova zilaba zyako.
Bana boonse bataanzi mbebatuulila Jehova, nebaba bantu nebaba banyama, balaba bako; pele bana bataanzi babantu baleelede kunununwa, abana bataanzi babanyama batondwa baleelede kunununwa.
Muulo wabo wakunununwa, nkokuti ciindi camwezi omwe wakuzyalwa, uleelede kuba masyekeli osanwe aansiliva, nkokuti masyekeli aacikombelo (isyekeli ngemagera aali makumi obile).

Pele mwana mutaanzi waŋombe na wambelele na wampongo, aba tabanununwi pe; balasalala, Bulowa bwabo uleelede kubusansaila acipaililo, amafuta aabo aleelede kutemwa, abe cipaizyo cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova,
pele nyama iisyaala ilaba yako, mbubonya mbuli katiti kakuyumba amweendo wacikungu walulyo.

Zipaizyo zyoonse zisalala bana ba-Israyeli nzebaletela Jehova, ndazipa nduwe abana bako balombe abasimbi, Ngumulao walyoonse, cizuminano citapwayiki calyoonse alyoonse kunembo lya-Jehova, kulinduwe akulunyungu lwako.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Aroni kuti, Yebo tokooyooba alukono munyika yabo, tokooyoopegwa caabilo akati kabo pe. Mebo ndime caabilo cako alukono lwako akati kabana ba-Israyeli.
Bana ba-Israyeli tabakooyooswena limbi kufwaafwi kutente lyambunganino, kuti batajani mulandu, batafwi.

Ba-Levi mbebanoobeleka milimo yatente lyambunganino, alimwi mbembabo banooyumuna­ mukuli wamilandu yabo. Ngumulao walyoonse mumazyalani aanu oonse. Aboobo tabakooyooba alukono akati kabana ba-Israyeli.
Nkaambo zipanzi zyakumi zyabana ba-Israyeli nzebatuulila Jehova, nzenzizyo nzendapa ba-Levi kuti zibe lukono lwabo. Ncencico ncendabaambila kuti, Tamukooyooba alukono akati kabana ba-Israyeli,
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,

Ambila ba-Levi kuti, Ciindi nemutambula zipanzi zyakumi zyabana ba-Israyeli nzendamupa kuti zibe lukono lwanu, muleelede kugwisya mulinzizyo cituulo cakutuulila Jehova, cipanzi cakumi cazipanzi zyakumi.
Eco cituulo canu ciyooambwa mbubonya mbuli maila aakucipolelo ambuli kuzula kwacisinino cawaini.
Aboobo anywebo muyootuulila Jehova cituuzyo cizwa muzipanzi zyanu zyakumi nzimutambula kumaanza aabana ba-Israyeli. Muleelede kugwisya cituulo mulinzizyo, mupe Aroni mupaizi.
Muzipego zyanu zyoonse amugwisye cituuzyo cakutuulila Jehova, nkokuti zintu zinono zyamulinzizyo, cipanzi cisalalisya.
Kobaambila kuti, Mwaatula zintu zinono zyamulinzizyo, eco ciyooyeeyegwa kuba-Levi mbuli maila aakucipolelo ambuli cizwa mucisinino camasaansa.
Munoozilya kumasena oonse, nywebo abasiŋanda banu, nkaambo ncecilumbyo canu nkaambo kamilimo yanu njimubelekela itente lyambunganino.
Tamukooyoojana milandu nkaambo kanzizyo, mwamana kupa zinono zyazyo. Mutasofwaazyi zintu zisalala zyabana ba-Israyeli, kuti mutafwi.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni, wati,
Ngooyu mulao ngwabikide Jehova, ngwalailide. Wati, Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti bakuletele impwizi iisalala imbotu iitakwe kampenda, iitana kubopwa ijokwe.
Eyi impwizi amwiipe Eleazara mupaizi, itolwe anze lyamalabba, ijayigwe kubusyu bwakwe.
Lino Eleazara mupaizi akombole bulowa amunwe wakwe, asansaile bulowa kulubazu lwakunembo lyatente lyambunganino ziindi zili musanu azibili.
Lino impwizi itentwe kumeso aakwe; cikanda cayo anyama yayo abulowa bwayo acifusi cayo, zyoonse zitentwe.
Alimwi mupaizi abweze tusamu twakedari amusamu wahisopo atusani tusalala pyu, aziwaale mukati kamulilo nkwiipya impwizi.
Amane kucita obo, mupaizi asanzye zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili. Amana kusamba, anjile mumalabba, lino mupaizi ulasofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Alakwe sikwiitenta uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusamba amubili, elyo ulasofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Lino umwi muntu uusalala akukule musizi wampwizi, ausowele mubusena busalala anze lyamalabba. Lino ulabambilwa imbungano yabana baIsrayeli, ube wamaanzi aabusofwi aakusalazya zibi.

Nkabela oyo muntu uukukula musizi wampwizi, alakwe uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe akusofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba. Ngumulao walyoonse kubana ba-Israyeli akumweenzu uukalakala akati kabo,
Uleelede kulisalazya mubuzuba bwatatu amubuzuba bwamusanu aabili, kuti asupuke, Na wabula kulisalazya mubuzuba bwatatu amubuzuba bwamusanu aabili, tasupuki pe.

Kufumbwa muntu uuguma mutunta wamuntu naba omwe uufwide, pele talisalazyi, oyo muntu wasofwaazya cikombelo ca-Jehova, lino oyo muntu ulatandwa kuzwa kuba-Israyeli. Takakasansailwa maanzi aakusalazya busofwi, aboobo ulisofweede; busofwi bwakwe mobucili mulinguwe.
Ngooyu mulao wamuntu uufwa mucilao, Kufumbwa muntu uunjila mucilao eco, azintu zyoonse zili mulincico, zyoonse zilasofwaala mazuba aali musanu aabili,
Acibelesyo cimwi acimwi cijalukide, citakwe civunisyo, cilasofwaala.
Kufumbwa muntu uuli musokwe uuguma muntu uujayidwe apanga, nanka mutunta, nanka cifuwa camuntu, nanka kabanda, oyo muntu ulasofwaala mazuba aali musanu aabili.
Lino kumuntu uusofweede babweze itwe lyacipaizyo cazibi, batile maanzi aaenda mpoonya awo munongo;

lino umwi muntu uusalala abweze musamu wahisopo akuunika mumaanzi, asansaile cilao, azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, abantu boonse ibakali mulincico, akuliyooyo iwakaguma cifuwa na uujayidwe na mutunta na kabanda.

Muntu uusalala asansaile muntu uusofweede mubuzuba bwatatu amubuzuba bwamusanu aabili. Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili alisalazye, asanzye zyakusama zyakwe, asambe amubili, nkabela kumabbililo aazuba ulasalala.

Kuyooba mulao walyoonse kulimbabo. Kufumbwa muntu uusansaila maanzi aakusalazya busofwi uleelede kusanzya zyakusama zyakwe; ayooyo uuguma maanzi aakusalazya busofwi ulasofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Alimwi kufumbwa cintu ncaguma oyo muntu uusofweede, cilasofwaala acalo; amuntu uuciguma ulasofwaala mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
bakazyanya a-Musa, bati, Necakabota netwakafwa ciindi eco bakwesu nebakafwa kunembo lya-Jehova.
Ino nkaambonzi wasisya imbungano ya-Jehova okuno kunkanda, kuti tufwe, swebo aŋombe zyesu zyoonse?
Nkaambonzi watupozya kuzwa ku-Egepita akutusisya okuno kuntu kubi? Takuli kuntu kwakulima maila na inkuyu na masaansa na mapomegranite, alimwi taakwe maanzi aakunywa.
Mpawo Musa a-Aroni bakazwa oko kubantu nkubakabungene, baya kumulyango watente lyambunganino, bavundama. Nkabela bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakababonekela.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Bweza musako, ukayobolole bantu, yebo a-Aroni munyoko, uambile indomba kumeso aabo, nkabela lilapa maanzi aalyo, Aboobo ulabagwisizya maanzi mundomba, banywe bantu boonse aŋombe zyabo,
Mpoonya awo Musa wakabweza musako kuzwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova, mbubonya mbwaakamulailila.
Elyo Musa wakasumpula ijanza lyakwe, wauma indomba ziindi zyobile amusako wakwe, nkabela mwakatuntumuka maanzi manji loko. Lino bantu boonse bakanywa; aŋombe zyabo.
Pele Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni kuti, Mwabula lusyomo lwakundilemeka mumeso aabana ba-Israyeli; nkaambo kako tamukooyoonjizya bantu aba munyika njindabapa.
Ngemaanzi aa-Meriba, nkaambo nkonkuko bana ba-Israyeli nkobakakazyanya a-Jehova, alimwi wakalemekwa akati kabo.
Bamatateesu bakainka ku-Egepita, lino katukede mu-Egepita ciindi cilamfu, nkabela ba-Egepita bakatubisizya, swebo abamatateesu,
Lino netwakakwiilila Jehova, wakamvwa ijwi lyesu, watuma angelo, watupozya kuzwa ku-Egepita, mpaawa sunu tuli okuno ku-Kadesi, munzi uuli kumagolelo aacisi cako.

Twakumbila kuti twiinde akati kacisi cako. Tatukooinda mumyuunda yako na mumyuunda yamisaansa, nekuba kunywa maanzi mumikalo. Tulainda kumugwagwa wamwami. Tatukooleya nekuba kululyo nekuba kulumwesi mane twiindilile cisi cako.
Pele Edomu wakavuwa kuti, Tokonzyi kwiinda pe. Na wainda, ambweni ndazwa apanga lyangu kuzookulwisya.
Ba-Israyeli bakati, Tulainda kumugwagwa buyo. Na twanywa maanzi aako, swebo aŋombe zyesu, tulabbadela. Atwiinde buyo amaulu. Taakwe cimwi ncituyanda.
Pele wakati, Tokooinda pe. Nkabela ba-Edomu bakazwa kuzoobalwisya abantu banji ampi injumu.
Mbuboobo ba-Edomu mbubakakaka kuzumizya ba-Israyeli kwiinda akati kacisi cabo, Elyo ba-Israyeli bakabasia, bai nda kumbi.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa a-Aroni oko kucilundu ca-Hori kumugaano wacisi ca-Edomu, wati,
Aroni ulatebwidwa kubantu bakwe, nkaambo takoonjila munyika eyo njindapa bana ba-Israyeli, nkaambo mwakanyontauka kumalailile aangu kumaanzi aa-Meriba.
Tola Aroni amwanaakwe Eleazara, utante abo atala lyacilundu ca-Hori.
Lino samununa Aroni zyakusama zyakwe, uzisamike Eleazara mwanaakwe, nkabela Aroni ulatebulwa mpoonya awo.
Lino Musa wakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamulailila, nkabela bakatanta acilundu ca-Hori mumeso aabantu boonse.
Mpawo Musa wakasamununa Aroni zyakusama zyakwe, wazisamika Eleazara mwanaakwe, nkabela Aroni wakafwa mpoonya awo atala lyacilundu. Lino Musa a-Eleazara bakaseluka kuzwa kucilundu.
Nkabela bantu boonse nebakabona kuti Aroni wafwa, luzubo loonse lwa-Israyeli lwakali kulila Aroni mazuba aali makumi otatwe.
Mpawo ba-Israyeli bakakonka cikonke kuli-Jehova, bati, Na ncobeni ulaaba bantu aba mumaanza esu, tulanyonyweda limwi minzi yabo.
Nkabela Jehova wakaswiilila ijwi lyabaIsrayeli, waaba ba-Kanana mumaanza aabo. Lino bakanyonyoona boonse aminzi yabo. Aboobo kuntu oko kwakaulikwa izina lya-Horima.
Lino bantu bakakazyanya a-Leza a-Musa, bati, Nkaambonzi mwakatupozya kuzwa ku-Egepita kuti tufwe munkanda? Taakwe zilyo. Taakwe maanzi. Atupepelefwa otu myoyo yesu yatucimwa.
Mpawo Jehova wakatuma inzoka zikali akati kabantu, nkabela zyakaluma bantu, elyo bantu banji ba-Israyeli bakafwa.
Lino bantu bakeza kuli-Musa, bati, Twabisya, nkaambo twanyontauka Jehova ayebo. Utukombele kuliJehova atugwisizye inzoka, Mpawo Musa wakakombela bantu.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Kolicitila inzoka akwiianzika akasamu mbuli ndembela; lino kufumbwa muntu uulumidwe aibona buyo ulapona.
Elyo Musa wakapanga inzoka yamukuba, waianzika akasamu mbuli ndembela, nkabela kufumbwa muntu iwakalumwa inzoka, alanga buyo kunzoka yamukuba, wakapona.
Lino bana ba-Israyeli bakanyamuka, baakuyaka zilao zyabo ku-Oboti.
Kuzwa ku-Oboti bakaakuyaka ku-Iyebarimu munkanda iilangene acisi ca-Moabu kulubazu lwakubuzwezuba.
Kuzwa oko bakaakuyaka mukuti lya-Zeredi.
Kuzwa oko bakalongela mutala lya-Arinoni uuli munkanda uubambene aba-Amori, nkaambo Arinoni ngumugaano waba-Moabu, nkokuti mugaano akatikati kaba-Moabu aba-Amori.
Nkaambo kako kulaambwa mubbuku lyankondo zya-Jehova kuti,
Vahebi mu-Sufa,
Amakuti aa-Arinoni,
Ankunamwa zyamakuti
Zilangene adinga lyaku-Ari,
Ziyeeme amugaano wa-Moabu,
Mpawo ba-israyeli bakaimba olu lwiimbo lwakuti,
Tuntumuka, Ocikala. Amuciimbile,
Neebakafumba bapati babantu,
Ankoli zyamampelampela amisako yabo,
Lino kuzwa kunkanda bakaya ku-Matana,
akuzwa ku-Matana bakaya ku-Nahaliyeli, akuzwa ku-Nahaliyeli bakaya ku-Bamoti,
akuzwa kuBamoti bakaya kukuti lyakucisi ca-Moabu, libambene amutwe wa-Pisiga, uulangene agundu.
Atwiinde akati kanyika yako; tatukooleya kunjila mumyuunda na mumyuunda yamasaansa, tatukoonywa maanzi aamuzikala, tuliinda buyo kumugwagwa wamwami, mane tuzwe munyika yako.
Pele Sihoni takwakazumizya ba-Israyeli kwiinda akati kacisi cakwe pe. Sihoni wakabunganya bantu bakwe boonse, weza kuzoocinga ba-Israyeli munkanda. Asike ku-Jahazi, wakalwana aba-Israyeli.
Nkabela ba-Israyeli bakamuzunda amulomo wapanga, aboobo bakatola nyika yakwe kuzwa ku-Arinoni kusikila ku-Jaboki kumugaano wabana ba-Amoni, nkaambo Jazeri ngomugaano wabana ba-Amoni.
Lino ba-Israyeli bakatola minzi eyi yoonse, nkabela ba-Israyeli bakakala muminzi yoonse yaba-Amori, mu-Hesiboni amutunzuunzi twawo toonse.
Nkaambo Hesiboni kauli munzi wa-Sihoni mwami waba-Amori; nkaambo kalwanide amwami mutaanzi waba-Moabu akumunyanzya nyika yakwe yoonse kusikila ku-Arinoni.
Nciceeco basitusimpi neebaambila kuti,
Amuboole ku-Hesiboni, uyakwe.
Munzi wa-Sihoni ubuke.
Mumunzi wa-Sihoni mwazwa mabangabanga.
Watenta Ari waku-Moabu
Abasilutwe bakuzilundu zya-Arinoni.
Mwanyonyooka nywebo nobantu ba-Kemosi!
Waaba bana bakwe balombe kuti bacije
Abana bakwe basimbi kuti batolwe mubizike,
Kumwami mu-Amori, Sihoni.
Twabasaala mane mulilo wakasika ku-Medeba.
Aboobo ba-Israyeli bakakala munyika yaba-Amori.
Lino Musa wakatuma bantu kuyootwela Jazeri. Nkabela bakatola tunzuunzi twawo akutanda ba-Amori ibakali mulintuto.
Mpawo bakapiluka, batola inzila yaku-Basana, nkabela Ogi mwami wa-Basana wakeza kuzoobalwanya abantu bakwe boonse ku-Edrei.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Utamuyoowi pe, nkaambo ndamwaaba mumaanza aako abantu bakwe boonse, anyika yakwe. Uyoomucitila mbubonya mbowakacitila Sihoni mwami wabaAmori iwakakede ku-Hesiboni.
Lino bakamujayilila abana bakwe abantu bakwe boonse mane teebakamusiila naba omwe, Elyo bakavuba nyika yakwe.
Nkabela Balaki mwana wa-Zipori kabwene zintu zyoonse ba-Israyeli nzebakacitila ba-Amori.
Lino ba-Moabu kabayoowede loko bantu, nkaambo bakali banji, Ba-Moabu bakali kukankama nkaambo kabana ba-Israyeli.

Elyo ba-Moabu bakaambila bapati ba-Midyani kuti, Aya makamu aabantu alamaninina zyoonse zitweengelede mbubonya mbuli iŋombe mbwiimaninina bwizu bwamusokwe, Mwami wa-Moabu kuciindi eco kali Balaki mwana wa-Zipori,

Lino wakatuma batumwa kuli-Balamu mwana wa-Beori waku-Petori kunkomwe yamulonga munyika yabana ba-Amori, kuti bakamwiite, cakuti, Bona! Kwakazwa bantu munyika ya-Egepita, Mbanji mbuli bwizu, alimwi balikede bulangene ambebo,

Uboole, uzoonditukilile bantu aba, nkaambo mbayumu kwiinda ndime, Wacita obo, ambweni ndakonzya kubazunda akubatanda munyika, nkaambo ndizi kuti kufumbwa muntu ngolongezya ulilongezezyegwe, ayooyo ngotukila ulitukidwe.
Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Amuone okuno, nkamuvwiile mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwati ndaambile. Elyo bapati ba-Moabu bakaona kuli-Balamu.
Lino Leza wakasika kuli-Balamu, wati, Mbani aba bantu bali kulinduwe?
Balamu wakavwiila Leza kuti, Balaki mwana wa-Zipori mwami wa-Moabu wanditumina mulazyo wakuti,
Bona! Kwazwa bantu mu-Egepita, bali mbuli bwizu, Boola uzoonditukilile bantu aba, Wacila obo ambweni ndakonzya kubalwisya akubatanda munyika.
Pele Leza wakaambila Balamu kuti, Toelede kuya abo, Utatukili bantu aba pe, nkaambo balilongezezegwe.
Lino nebwakaca, Balamu wakabuka, waambila bapati ba-Balaki kuti, Kamuya kucisi canu, nkaambo Jehova wandikasya kwiinka anywebo,
Mpawo bapati ba-Moabu bakanyamuka. Basike buyo kuli-Balaki, bakati, Balamu wakaka kuza aswebo.
Lino Balaki wakatuma basilutwe abamwi, banji, balemu kwiinda bataanzi.
Basike kuli-Balamu bakamwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Balaki mwana wa-Zipori. Kutabi cintu cikukasya kuboola kulindime,
nkaambo ncobeni ndakupa bulemu bupati, alimwi kufumbwa cintu ncondaambila, ndacicita. Boola uzoonditukilile bantu aba.

Pele Balamu wakavwiila balanda ba-Balaki kuti, Nekuba kuti Balamu wandipa iŋanda yakwe iizwide insiliva angolida, nsikonzyi kusotoka malailile aa-Jehova Leza wangu kukucita cintu neciba ciniini neciba cipati.
Amuone anywebo okuno masiku ano, mane nzibe eco Jehova ncayanda kundaambila alimwi.
Lino Leza wakasika kuli-Balamu ciindi camasiku, wati, Na bantu beza kuzookutamba, mbubo, buka, koya abo, pele cintu ncendakwaambila ncencico ncoelede kucita luzutu.
Lino bukali bwa-Leza bwakabuka nkaambo kakwiinka kwakwe, nkabela angelo wa-Jehova wakaima mu nzila kuti amusinkile, Nkabela katantide ambongolo, kali abalombe bobile.

Lino imbongolo yakabona angelo wa-Jehova uliimvwi munzila, apanga lisomwedwe mujanza lyakwe, nkabela imbongolo yakaleya kuzwa munzila, yaya musokwe. Mpawo Balamu wakauma imbongolo kuti aipilusye munzila.
Lino angelo wa-Jehova wakaima akati kamyuunda yamasaansa mukazila kasyanikide kajisi malambo koonse.
Lino imbongolo ibone buyo angelo wa-Jehova, yakalisyanikizya kubulambo akusyanikizya kuulu kwaBalamu kubulambo, Lino wakaiuma alimwi.
Elyo angelo wa-Jehova wakaya kunembo, waima abusena busyanikide butajisi inzila yakwiinda nekuba kululyo nekuba kulumwesi.
Nkabela imbongolo neyakabona angelo wa-Jehova, yakalala kunsi lya-Balamu. Mpawo bukali bwa-Balamu bwakabuka, nkabela wakauma imbongolo amusako wakwe.
Lino Jehova wakaambya mulomo wambongolo, nkabela yakaambila Balamu kuti, Ino ndakucitanzi? Wanduuminanzi inkwi zyotatwe?
Lino Balamu wakaambila imbongolo kuti, Nkaambo wandisampula. Nendajisi ipanga mujanza lyangu nendakugonka!
Nkabela imbongolo yakaambila Balamu kuti, Ma! Sa nsili imbongolo yako njotanta buumi bwako boonse kusikila sunu na? Sa lyoonse ndakali kukucitila obu? Wakati, Pe, pe.
Lino angelo wa-Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi wauma imbongolo yako inkwi zyotatwe? Bona! Ndasika kuzookusinkinizya, nkaambo lweendo lwako walubindaanya.
Imbongolo yakandibona, yaleya inkwi ezi zyotatwe. Neyataleya, ncobeni nendakujaya, yalo neyatafwa.
Mpoonya awo Balamu wakaambila angelo wa-Jehova kuti, Ndabisya, nkaambo teendezi kuti uliimvwi munzila kundisinkinizya, Na makani akubijila, ndapiluka.
Lino angelo wa-Jehova wakaambila Balamu kuti, Koya buyo abantu aba, pele utaambi ijwi neliba lyomwe cita ngendakwaambila, Amvwe obo Balamu wakainka abasilutwe ba-Balaki.
Elyo Balaki wakaambila Balamu kuti, Sa teendakatuma basikukwiita? Nkaambonzi tokwe nowakasika mpawo? Sa nsikonzyi kukupa bulemu?
Balamu wakavwiila Balaki kuti, Bona! Ndasika. Pele sa ndijisi inguzu zyakwaamba cintu neciba comwe? Majwi Jehova ngaabika mumulomo wangu ngengao ngensi ambe.
Mpawo Balamu wakaya a-Balaki mane bakasika ku-Kiriyati-Huzoti.
Nkabela Balaki wakapaizya iŋombe ambelele, waabila Balamu abasilutwe mbaakali abo.
Lino Balamu wakaambila Balaki kuti, Amundiyakile zipaililo zili musanu azibili mpoonya ano, akundibambila basune bali musanu ababili abagutu bali musanu ababili.
Mpawo Balaki wakacita mbubonya mbuli Balamu mbwaakaamba, nkabela Balaki a-Balamu bapaizya musune amugutu acipaililo cimwi acimwi.

Lino Balamu wakaambila Balaki kuti, Imikila kumbali lyacituuzyo cako. Mebo ndaya. Ambweni Jehova uleza kuzoondiswana, Lino kufumbwa cintu ncandaambila, ndakulwiida ncico. Amane kwaamba obo, wakainka kulilubulansuki.
Lino wakaswana Balamu. Nkabela Balamu wakamwaambila kuti, Ndabamba zipaililo zili musanu azibili, alimwi ndatuula musune amugutu acipaililo cimwi acimwi,
Mpawo Jehova wakabika majwi mukanwa lya-Balamu, wati, Piluka kuliBalaki, ukaambe obu.
Elyo wakapiluka, wamujana uliimvwi kumbali lyacipaizyo cakwe abasilutwe boonse ba-Moabu.
Mpawo wakatalika kulungulula. Wakati,
Balaki wandiita kuzwa ku-Aramu,
Mwami wa-Moabu wanditamba kuzwa kuzilundu zyakujwe.
Wati, Boola, unditukilile Jakobo,
Boola, umusampaule Israyeli,
Mutukile buti Leza ngwatanatukide?
Nsampaule buti Jehova ngwatana kusampaula?
Kuzwa atala lyamandomba ndamubona,
Kuzwa kuzilundu ndamweebela.
Ndabona musyobo uukala aulike,
Uutavwelene abamasi.
Tacikonzeki kupima neciba cipanzi cane caba-Israyeli.
Mfwe mbuli mbwafwa uululeme,
Amamanino aangu abe mbubonya mbuli aakwe.
Wakavuwa kuti, Kufumbwa cintu Jehova ncabika mumulomo wangu, sa teensi ncico ncenjeelede kwaamba?
