Lino Balaki wakamwaambila kuti, Katuya ayebo kubusena bumbi, nkokonzya kubabona. Ula bona magolelo buyo aabantu, tokoobona boonse pe. Lino nditukilile bantu nkukonya oko.
Elyo wakamusisya kumuunda wa-Zofimu amutwe wa-Pisiga, wayaka zipaililo zili musanu azibili, wapaizya musune amugutu acipaililo cimwi acimwi.
Lino Balamu wakaambila Balaki kuti, Imikila ano, kumbali acipaizyo cako. Mebo njiinke kuyooswana a-Jehova oko.
Mpawo Jehova wakaswana a-Balamu, wabika majwi mumulomo wakwe, wati, Piluka kuli-Balaki, ukaambe obo.
Naakasika kulinguwe, wamujana uliimvwi kumbali lyacipaililo cakwe, abasilutwe ba-Moabu bali awe. Lino Balaki wakamubuzya kuti, Ino Jehova waambanzi?
Mpawo wakatalika kulungulula, wati,
Buka, O Balaki, umvwe;
Undiswiilile, O mwana wa-Zipori.
Tali muntu uufwa, tatamauki,
Na waamba makani, sa takoocita mbubonya?
Sa ncaamba takoocizuzikizya na?
Walo walongezya, mebo nsikonzyi kucisandula,
Takubonwi mapenzi akati kaba-Israyeli,
Jehova Leza wabo uli akati kabo,
Cikwala cakusekelela mwami cilamvwigwa kulimbabo.
Balijisi inguzu mbuli inguzu zyabanyati.
Nekuba kubasonda ba-Israyeli.
Lino ba-Jakobo aba-Israyeli balaambilwa kuti,
Ma! Ncinzi ncacita Leza?
Bona bantu mbubabuka mbuli mulavu!
Balalisumpula mbuli syanza!
Tokoolala mane alye cilyo cakwe,
Akunywa bulowa bwabajayidwe.
Elyo Balaki wakaambila Balamu kuti, Utabatukili limbi nekuba kubalongezya pe; leka buyo.
Pele Balamu wakaambila Balaki kuti, Sa teendakakwaambila kuti, Kufumbwa Jehova ncaamba njeelede kucicita?
Mpawo Balaki wakaambila Balamu kuti, Boola, tuye ayebo kubusena bumbi, Ambweni Leza ulazumina kuti ubatukile nkuko.
Lino Balaki wakatola Balamu kumutwe wa-Peori, uulangene agundu.
Nkabela Balamu wakaambila Balaki kuti, Undiyakile zipaililo zili musanu azibili mpoonya ano, alimwi undibambile basune bali musanu ababili abagutu bali musanu ababili.
Lino Balaki wakacita mbubonya mbuli Balamu mbwaakaamba, akupaizya musune amugutu acipaililo cimwi acimwi.
Elyo Balamu naakatambya meso aakwe, wakabona ba-Israyeli mbubakede, musyobo umwi aumwi. Mpawo Muuya wa-Leza wakamusikila,
nkabela wakatalika kulungulula, wati,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Balamu mwana wa-Beori.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba muntu iwakali ameso aaofweede,
Uubwene cilengano ca-Singuzuzyoonse,
lwakawida ansi akuvumbulwidwa meso aakwe,
Ma! Zyabota zilao zyako, O Jakobo!
Azikalilo zyako, O Israyeli!
Mbuli myuunda kumbali lyamulonga;
Mbuli maalo ngaakabyala Jehova,
Mbuli misamu yakedari kumbali amaanzi.
Alunyungu lwakwe luyooba akati kamisyobo minji.
Mwami wakwe uyooba mupati kwiinda Agagi,
Abwami bwakwe buyoosumpuka.
Leza nguwakamupozya mu-Egepita,
Ulijisi inguzu mbuli zyamunyati.
Unoosyukutya bamasi basinkondonyina,
Unoopwayaula zifuwa zyabo,
Akubayasya mivwi yakwe.
Uli mbuli syanza.
Ngwani uusi mubusye,
Alongezegwe kufumbwa uukulongezya!
Atukwe kufumbwa uukutukila!

Mpawo bukali bwa-Balaki bwakabuka, wakalalila Balamu, wakamba amaanza aakwe. Balaki wakaambila Balamu kuti, Maawe! Ndakakwiita kuti uzoonditukilile basinkondoma, anukuti wabalongezya buyo ziindi ezi zyotatwe!
Lino cija, upiluke kulindinywe. Ndakali kuyeeya kukupa bulemu bupati, pele Jehova wakukasya kupegwa bulemu.
Elyo Balamu wakaambila Balaki kuti, Abo batumwa bako mbowakatuma kulindime, sa teendakabaambila kuti,

Nekuba kuti Balaki wandipa iŋanda yakwe iizwide insiliva angolida, nsikonzyi kusotoka malailile aa-Jehova kukucita cintu, neciba cibotu neciba cibi, cizwa mumoyo wangu ndemwini? Ncaamba Jehova, ncencico ncenjeelede kwaamba.
Lino ndainka, ndaya kulindiswe. Swiilila, nkulwiide bantu aba mbobayoocitila bantu bako mumazuba aaciza.
Mpawo wakatalika kulungulula, wati,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Balamu mwana wa-Beori,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba muntu iwakali ameso aaofweede.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba oyo uumvwide majwi aa-Leza,
Uujene luzibo ku-Mupatikampatila,
Uubwene cilengano ca-Singuzuzyoonse,
lwakawida ansi akuvumbulwidwa meso aakwe.
Ndamweebela, pele teensi cilengano cazintu zili afwaafwi.
Kwadunuka inyenyeezi muli-Jakobo,
Kwabuka inkoli yabwami mucisi ca-Israyeli.
Iyoopwaya impanza zya-Moabu,
Akutyolaula bana boonse ba-Seti,
Basinkondonyina baku-Seiri bayoosaalwa,
Aba-Israyeli banooya buzunda.
Muli-Jakobo mulazwa umwi uuendelezya,
Ulanyonyoona boonse basyeede mumunzi.
Amane kwaamba obo, wakalanga ba-Amaleki, watalika kulungulula, wati,
Ba-Amaleki bakali musyobo mutaanzi,
Pele kumamanino lunyonyooko lulababweza.
Alimwi wakalanga ba-Keni, elyo wakatalika kulungulula, wati,
Cikalilo cako ncalyoonse,
Aciteente cako ciliyakidwe andomba.
Nekubaboobo Kaini uyoosaalwa,
Mane ba-Asuri bakutole mubuzike.
Alimwi wakatalika kulungulula, wati,
Maawe! Ngwani unoopona Leza aakucita obo?
Nkabela ayoopenzya ba-Asuri aba-Eberi,
Lino bayoonyonyooka abalo.
Mpawo Balamu wakanyamuka, watola lweendo lwakwe, wapiluka kulinguwe. Alakwe Balaki wakainka.
Nkabela abo bakatamba bantu kuzipai­ zyo zyabaleza babo, elyo bantu bakali kulya akukotamina baleza babo.
Aboobo ba-Israyeli bakaliswanaanya a-Baala-Peori, mane bukali bwaJehova bwakabukila ba-Israyeli.
Mpawo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Jata basilutwe boonse babantu akubasina antangalala kumeso aa-Jehova, kuti Jehova aleke bukali bwakwe buyoosya mbwakalalila ba-Israyeli.
Nkabela Musa wakaambila babetesi ba-Israyeli kuti, Amujaye umwi aumwi bantu bakwe, nkokuti boonse baliswanaanya a-Baala-Peori.
Nkabela Pinehasi mwana wa-Eleazara mwana wa-Aroni mupaizi, abone obo, wakanyampuka, wazwa mumbungano, wabweza isumo lyakwe mujanza lyakwe,
watobela oyo mu-Israyeli mane wanjila mucinkutikwa, nkabela wakabayasa intungabulumba, boonse, bobile, mwaalumi mu-Israyeli amwanakazi, Aboobo lunyonyooko lwakalesegwa akati kabana ba-Israyeli.
Pele abo ibakafwa mulunyonyooko olo bakali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Mpawo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,

Pinehasi mwana wa-Eleazara mwana wa-Aroni mupaizi walesya bukali bwangu kubana ba-Israyeli, nkaambo wafwa ibbivwe mbubonya mbuli ibbivwe lyangu, aboobo ndaleka kusyukutya bana ba-Israyeli mubbivwe lyangu.
Nkaambo kako ukamwaambile kuti, Ndatangana awe cizuminano cangu caluumuno,
cibe kulinguwe akulunyungu lwakwe, cizuminano cabupaizi butamani, nkaambo kakuti wakafwa ibbivwe nkaambo ka-Leza wakwe akumanya milandu yabana ba-Israyeli.
Izina lyamuntu eyo mu-Israyeli iwakajayigwa amwanakazi mu-Midyani kali Zimri mwana wa-Salu, silutwe waciinga cimwi caba-Simeoni,
azina lyamwanakazi mu-Midyani iwakajayigwa kali Kozibi mwana wa-Zuri, silutwe waciinga cimwi caba-Midyani.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Kolwisya ba-Midyani akubauma,

nkaambo bakali kumukataazya inywe kuzyoongelezyo zyabo nzibakali kumoongelezya nzizyo, mumakani aa-Peori, amumakani aa-Kozibi mwana musimbi wasilutwe wa-Midyani, mucizi wabo, iwakajayigwa mubuzuba bwalunyonyooko mumakani aa-Peori.
Amubale mweelwe wambungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli, boonse bajisi myaka iili makumi obile na iisotoka, muziinga zyabo, boonse bakonzya kuya kunkondo mukati kaba-Israyeli.
Elyo Musa a-Eleazara mupaizi bakabaambila mumagezi aa-Moabu, kunkomwe ya-Jordano yaku-Jeriko, bati,
Amubale mweelwe wabantu, boonse bali amyaka iili makumi obile na iisotoka, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa. Lino bana ba-Israyeli ibakazwa mucisi ca-Egepita mbaaba:
Hezironi wisi ciinga caba-Hezironi, Karimi wisi ciinga caba-Karimi.
Nzeezyo ziinga zyabaRubeni, nkabela mweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi one azitatu amyanda iili musanu aibili amakumi otatwe,
Abana ba-Palu: Eliabu.
Abana ba-Eliabu: Nemueli, a-Datani a-Abiramu. Mbombabo Datani a-Abiramu ibakasalwa akati kambungano yabaabo ibakakazyanya a-Musa a-Aroni antoomwe ambungano ya-Kora nibakakazyanya a-Jehova.
Elyo nyika niyakaasama, yabamena, antoomwe a-Kora, imbungano yakwe niyakafwa, mulilo niwakasyuukutya bantu bali myanda yobile amakumi osanwe, aboobo bakaba cicenjezyo.
Pele bana ba-Kora teebakafwa pe.
Zera wisi ciinga caba-Zera, Saulo wisi ciinga caba-Saulo.
Nzeezyo ziinga zyaba-Simeoni, bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azibili amyanda yobile.
Abana ba-Gadi muziinga zyabo mbaaba: Zefoni wisi ciinga cabaZefoni, Hagi wisi ciinga caba-Hagi, Suni wisi ciinga caba-Suni,
Ozini wisi ciinga caba-Ozini, Eri wisi ciinga caba-Eri,
Arodi wisi ciinga caba-Arodi, Areli wisi ciinga caba-Areli,
Nzeezyo ziinga zyabana ba-Gadi, amweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi one amyanda yosanwe.
Lino bana ba-Juda muziinga zyabo mbaaba: Sela wisi ciinga caba-Sela, Perezi wisi ciinga caba-Perezi, Zera wisi ciinga caba-Zera,
Abana ba-Perezi mbaaba: Hezironi wisi ciinga caba-Hezironi, a-Hamuli wisi ciinga caba-Hamuli,
Nzeezyo ziinga zyaba-Juda, amweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili amusanu acimwi amyanda yosanwe.
Jasubu wisi ciinga caba-Jasubu, Simiron wisi ciinga caba-Simironi.
Nzeezyo ziinga zyaba-Isakara, amweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu alimwi azine amyanda yotatwe.
Nzeezyo ziinga zyaba-Zebuloni, amweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu alimwi amyanda yosanwe.
Abana ba-Manase: Makiri wisi ciinga caba-Makiri; Makiri ngowakazyala Gileadi; Gileadi kali wisi ciinga caba-Gileadi.
Abana ba-Gileadi mbaaba; Jeezeri wisi ciinga caba-Jeezeri, Heleki wisi ciinga caba-Heleki,
Asrieli wisi ciinga caba-Asrieli, Sekemu wisi ciinga caba-Sekemu,
Semida wisi ciinga caba-Semida, a-Heferi wisi ciinga caba-Heferi,
Lino Zelofehadi mwana wa-Heferi katajisi bana balombe, kazyede basimbi luzutu. Mazina aabana basimbi ba-Zelofehadi mbaaba: Mala, Nowa, Hogila, Milika a-Tiriza.
Nzeezyo ziinga zyaba-Manase, amweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe azibili amyanda iili musanu aibili,
Abana ba-Sutela mbaaba: Erani wisi ciinga caba-Erani.
Nzeezyo ziinga zyaba-Efraimu, amweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe azibili amyanda yosanwe. Mbubakabede bana ba-Josefa muziinga zyabo.
Sufamu wisi ciinga caba-Sufamu, Hufamu wisi ciinga caba-Hufamu.
Abana ba-Bela: Aridi a-Naamani, Aridi wisi ciinga caba-Aridi a-Naamani wisi ciinga caba-Naamani.
Mbaabo bana ba-Benjamini muziinga zyabo, nkabela mweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi one amusanu amyanda iili musanu aumwi.
Amweelwe wabantu baziinga zyoonse zyaba-Suhamu wakali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu alimwi azine amyanda yone.
Abana ba-Beriya: Heberi wisi ciinga caba-Heberi, Malikieli wisi ciinga cabaMalikieli.
Azina lyamwana musimbi wa-Aseri kali Sara.
Nzeezyo ziinga zyabana ba-Aseri, nkabela mweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi osanwe azitatu amyanda yone.
jezeri wisi ciinga caba-Jezeri, Silemu wisi ciinga caba-Silemu.
Mbuzibede ziinga zyaba-Nafitali, nkabela mweelwe wabo wakali zyuulu zili makumi one amusanu amyanda yone,
Aba bantu baleelede kwaabilwa nyika, baivube; baabilwe mbubonya mbuli myeelwe yamisyobo yabo.
Musyobo uuli abantu banji upegwe caabilo cipati, musyobo uuli abantu bace upegwe caabilo ciniini; musyobo umwi aumwi uabilwe mbubonya mbuli mweelwe wabantu bawo.
Pele nyika ileelede kwaabwa kucisolo; bantu baivube mbubonya mbuli mumazina aabamawisaabo.
Mbubonya mbuli cisolo balaabilwa lukono lwabo, nebaba banji nebaba bace.
Aziinga zyaba-Levi nzeezi: ciinga caba-Libni, ciinga cabaHebroni, ciinga caba-Mali, ciinga caba-Musi, aciinga caba-Kora, Nkabela Kohati nguwakazyala Amramu,
alimwi izina lyamuka-Amramu kali Jokebedi, mwana musimbi wa-Levi ngwaakazyalila mu-Egepita. Nkabela Jokebedi wakazyala kuli-Amramu Aroni a-Musa a-Miriamu mucizi wabo,
Alakwe Aroni wakazyala Nadabu a-Abihu, Eleazara a-Itamara.
Pele Nadabu a-Abihu bakafwa ciindi eco nebakatenta tununkilizyo tumbi kunembo lya-Jehova.

Nkabela mweelwe waba-Levi ibakabalwa wakali zyuulu zili makumi obile azitatu, nkokuti baalumi boonse ibakajisi mwezi omwe wakuzyalwa akuya kunembo. Nkaambo teebakabalilwa mumwi abana ba-Israyeli, nkaambo taakwe lukono ndobakapedwe akati kabaIsrayeli,
Ngomweelwe wabaabo mbebakabala ba-Musa a-Eleazara mupaizi. Bakabala ba-Israyeli mumagezi aa-Moabu kunkomwe ya-Jordano ku-Jeriko,
Pele akati kabaaba katakwe muntu naba omwe wabaabo ibakabalwa kuliMusa a-Aroni mupaizi nebakabala bana ba-Israyeli kunkanda ya-Sinai,
Nkaambo Jehova wakaamba kuti, Ncobeni bayoofwa boonse munkanda. Teekwakasyaala muntu naba omwe wabo cita Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune a-Joshua mwana wa-Nuni.
Nkabela bakaima kubusyu bwa-Musa a-Eleazara mupaizi abasilutwe boonse abantu boonse kumulyango watente Jyambunganino, bati,
Tateesu wakafwa munkanda. Takwakali umwi wabaabo ibakapapila Jehova munkamu ya-Kora pe, pele wakafwa nkaambo kazibi zyakwe mwini. Nkabela katajisi bana baalumi.
Sa ncibotu kuti izina lyatateesu lifwidilile muciinga cakwe nkaambo kakubula bana baalumi? Utupe lukono aswebo akati kababunyina batateesu.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Bana basimbi ba-Zelofehadi baamba kabotu. Ncobeni uleelede kubaabila lukono akati kababunyina bawisi. Lukono lwawisaabo lulaba mumaanza aabo,
Alimwi ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Na muntu wafwa uutazyede mwana mulombe, lukono lwakwe lulaba lwamwana wakwe musimbi.
Na tazyede basimbi, mulapa bazyalwanyina lukono lwakwe.
Na tajisi muzyalwanyina, amupe lukono lwakwe kubazyalwanyina wisi.
Na wisi tajisi muzyalwanyina, amupe lukono lwakwe kufumbwa silufulunyina, aluvube. Oyu ulaba mulao ambeta kubana ba-Israyeli, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Wamana kwiibona, uyootebwidwa kubantu bako ayebo, mbubonya mbuli Aroni munyoko mbwaakatebulwa,
nkaambo mwakapapila malailile aangu munkanda ya-Zini, bantu nibakali kukazyanya. Teemwakandilemeka kumeso aabo oko kumaanzi. (Ngengao maanzi aa-Meriba aaku-Kadesi munkanda ya-Zini).
Lino Musa wakaambila Jehova kuti,
Jehova Leza wamyuuya yabantu boonse abike muntu wakweendelezya imbungano,
uukonzya kubazulwida ciindi cakuzwa aciindi cakuboola, abeenzye akubaboozya, kuti bantu ba-Jehova batabi mbuli imbelele zibula sikweembela.
Mpawo Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti, Bweza Joshua mwana wa-Nuni, muntu uukalidwe Muuya, ubike maanza alinguwe,
umwiimike kubusyu bwa-Eleazara mupaizi akubusyu bwabantu boonse, akumulailila mu meso aabo.
Lino umupe bumwi bwabwami bwako, kuti bantu boonse ba-Israyeli bamuswiilile.
Aime kubusyu bwa-Eleazara mupaizi, amubuzizye makani kukubeteka kwa-Urimu kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Kujwi lyakwe balainka, akujwi lyakwe balaboola, walo abana ba-Israyeli boonse, imbungano yoonse.
Lino Musa wakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamulailila, Wakabweza jeshua, wamwiimika kubusyu bwa-Eleazara mupaizi akubusyu bwabantu boonse,
wabika maanza aakwe alinguwe, wamulailila, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila kumulomo wa-Musa.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Lailila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Cituuzyo cangu, cilyo cangu cazipaizyo zitentwa, bweema bwakundi­ botezya, amucenjele kuti muzicite zyoonse kuziindi zibikidwe.
Alimwi ubaambile kuti, Nceeci cipaizyo ncimweelede kutentela Jehova: tubelele tobile tuli amwaka omwe tutakwe kampenda buzuba abuzuba ciindi coonse.
Kabelele kamwi amukatuule cifumofumo, akabelele kabili amukatuule igoko,
antoomwe acipaizyo cabusu, cipanzi calusuwo lwabusu bunante bukandidwe acipanzi cane cansazi yamafuta aatwidwe.
Mbucibede cipaizyo calyoonse icakalaililwa kucilundu ca-Sinai, cili abweema bubotu, cakutentela Jehova.
Acipaizyo caco cakunywa cilaba cipanzi cane cansazi kukabelele kamwi akamwi, Mubusena busalalisya amutile cipaizyo cawaini uusaside kuli-Jehova.
Akabelele kabili amukatuule ciindi cagoko, antoomwe acipaizyo cabusu acipaizyo cakunywa mbubonya mbuli cifumofumo; kube cipaizyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova,
Amubuzuba bwa-Sabata amutuule tubelele tobile tuli amwaka omwe tutakwe kampenda, acipaizyo cabusu, zipanzi zyobile zyakumi zyacisuwo cabusu bunante bukandidwe amafuta, acipaizyo caco cakunywa.
Mbucibede cituuzyo cabuzuba bwa-Sabata imwi aimwi, atala lyazituuzyo zya lyoonse, acipaizyo caco cakunywa.
antoomwe acipaizyo cabusu, zipanzi zyotatwe zyakumi zyabusu bunante bukandidwe amafuta kukapoho kamwi akamwi, azipanzi zyobile zyakumi zyabusu bunante bukandidwe amafuta kumugutu umwi aumwi,
acipanzi comwe cakumi cabusu bunante bukandidwe amafuta kukabelele kamwi akamwi, Ezi zyoonse zibe cipaizyo cili abweema bubotu citentelwa Jehova.

Azipaizyo zyakunywa zilaba cisela cansazi yawaini kukapoho kamwi akamwi, acipaizyo catatu cansazi kumugutu umwi aumwi, acipaizyo cane cansazi kukabelele kamwi akamwi. Mbuubede mulao wacipaizyo camwezi mupya mumyezi yoonse yamumwaka.
Alimwi kupaizigwe sijembwe omwe, abe cipaizyo cazibi kuli-Jehova, atala lyazeezyo zipaizyo zituulwa lyoonse, acipaizyo cakwe cakunywa.
Amubuzuba bwakumi amusanu bwamwezi oyo nguwonya kulaba ipobwe. Mazuba aali musanu aabili kulaligwa zinkwa zitakwe bumena.
Mubuzuba butaanzi kuyooba muswangaano uusalala; kutacitwi mulimo nuuba omwe wamitukuta.
Lino amutuulile Jehova cipaizyo citentwa; tupoho tobile, mugutu omwe, atubelele tuli musanu atubili tuli amwaka omwe, zyoonse zitakwe kampenda;
azipaizyo zyazyo zyabusu, zipanzi zyotatwe zyakumi zyacisuwo cabusu bunante bukandidwe amafuta kukapoho kamwi akamwi, azipanzi zyobile zyakumi kumugutu umwi aumwi,
acipanzi comwe cakumi kukabelele kamwi akamwi katubelele tuli musanu atubili.
Alimwi amutuule sijembwe omwe, abe cipaizyo cazibi cakumanya milandu yanu.
Ezi nzyakupaizya atala lyacipaizyo cacifumo ncimutenta ciindi coonse.

Mbubonya obo, mazuba aali musanu aabili muleelede kutuula, buzuba bumwi abumwi, cilyo cacipaizyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova. Eci cilatuulwa atala lyacipaizyo calyoonse acipaizyo caco cakunywa.
Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili kuyooba muswangaano uusalalisya; mutaciti mulimo nuuba omwe wamitukuta.
Lino amutuulile Jehova cipaizyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu: tupoho tobile, mugutu omwe, tubelele tuli musanu atubili tuli amwaka omwe,
azipaizyo zyazyo zyabusu, busu bunante bukandidwe amafuta, zipanzi zyotatwe zyakumi zyacisuwo kukapoho kamwi akamwi, zipanzi zyobile zyakumi kumugutu umwi aumwi,
acipanzi comwe cakumi kukabelele kamwi akamwi katubelele tuli musanu atubili.
Alimwi amutuule sijembwe omwe kukumanya milandu yanu,
Ezi zyoonse amuzituule atala lyacipaizyo ncemutenta lyoonse acipaizyo caco cabusu. Zyoonse zibe zitakwe kampenda. Azyalo zipaizyo zyazyo zyakunywa amuzitile.
nkabela mulatu uli la Jehova cipaizyo cakutenta cili abweema bubotu: kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, atubelele tuli musanu atubili tuli amwaka omwe tutajisi kampenda,
acipaizyo cazyo cabusu, nkokuti busu bunante bukandidwe amafuta, zipanzi zyotatwe zyakumi zyacisuwo kukapoho, zipanzi zyobile zyakumi kumugutu,
acipanzi comwe cakumi kukabelele kamwi akamwi katoonse tuli musanu atubili;
asijembwe omwe, abe cipaizyo cazibi cakumanya milandu yanu.

Ezi zilatuulwa atala lyacipaizyo camwezi mupya acipaizyo caco cabusu, acipaizyo citentwa mazuba oonse acipaizyo caco cabusu, azipaizyo zyakunywa. Zituulwe mbubonya mbuli mulao wazyo, zibe cituuzyo citentwa cili abweema bubotu bwakubotezya Jehova.
Lino amutentele Jehova cipaizyo cili abweema bubotu: kapoho komwe, amugutu omwe, atubelele tuli musanu atubili tuli amwaka omwe; zyoonse zibe zitakwe kampenda;
azipaizyo zyazyo zyabusu, nkokuti busu bunante bukandidwe amafuta, zipanzi zyotatwe zyakumi zyacisuwo kukapoho, zipanzi zyobile zyakumi kumugutu,
acipanzi comwe cakumi kukabelele kamwi akamwi katoonse tuli musanu atubili;
asijembwe omwe, abe cipaizyo cazibi. Ezi zilaba atala lyacipaizyo cazibi cakumanya milandu azipaizyo zitentwa lyoonse, acipaizyo caco cabusu azipaizyo zyazyo zyakunywa.
Lino amutentele Jehova cipaizyo cili abweema bubotu: tupoho tuli ikumi atutatu, bagutu bobile, atubelele twamwaka omwe tuli ikumi atune; zyoonse zibe zitakwe kampenda;

azipaizyo zyazyo zyabusu, busu bunante bukandidwe amafuta, zipanzi zyotatwe zyakumi zyacisuwo kukapoho kamwi akamwi katupoho tuli ikumi atutatu, zipanzi zyobile zyakumi kumugutu umwi aumwi wabagutu bobile,
acipanzi comwe cakumi kukabelele kamwi akamwi katoonse tuli ikumi atune;
asijembwe omwe abe cipaizyo cazibi. Ezi zyoonse zituulwe atala lyacipaizyo citentwa lyoonse acipaizyo caco cabusu acipaizyo caco cakunywa.
Amubuzuba bwabili amutuule tupoho tuli ikumi atubili, bagutu bobile, atubelele twamwaka omwe tuli ikumi atune tutakwe kampenda,
azipaizyo zyabusu azipaizyo zyakunywa zyatupoho azyabagutu azyatubelele mbubonya bweelede mulao wazyo,
asijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi, atala lyacipaizyo citentwa lyoonse acipaizyo caco cakunywa.
Amubuzuba bwatatu amutuule tupoho tuli ikumi akamwi, bagutu bobile, atubelele twamwaka omwe tuli ikumi atune tutakwe kampenda,
azipaizyo zyabusu azipaizyo zyakunywa zyatupoho azyabagutu azyatubelele mbubonya bweelede mulao wazyo,
asijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi, atala lyacipaizyo citentwa lyoonse acipaizyo caco cabusu acipaizyo caco cakunywa,
Amubuzuba bwane amutuule tupoho tuli ikumi, bagutu bobile, atubelele twamwaka omwe tuli ikumi atune tutakwe kampenda,
azipaizyo zyabusu azipaizyo zyakunywa zyatupoho azyabagutu azyatubelele mbubonya bweelede mulao wazyo,
asijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi, atala lyacipaizyo citentwa lyoonse acipaizyo caco cabusu acipaizyo caco cakunywa.
Amubuzuba bwasanu amutuule tupoho tuli musanu atune, bagutu bobile, tubelele twamwaka omwe tuli ikumi atune tutakwe kampenda,
azipaizyo zyabusu azipaizyo zyakunywa zyatupoho azyabagutu azyatubelele mbubonya bweelede mulao wazyo,
asijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi, atala lyacipaizyo citentwa lyoonse acipaizyo caco cabusu acipaizyo caco cakunywa.
Amubuzuba bwamusanu abumwi amutuule tupoho tuli musanu atutatu, bagutu bobile, tubelele twamwaka omwe tuli ikumi atune tutakwe kampenda,
azipaizyo zyabusu azipaizyo zyakunywa zyatupoho azyabagutu azyatubelele mbubonya bweelede mulao wazyo,
asijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi, atala lyacipaizyo citentwa lyoonse acipaizyo caco cabusu acipaizyo caco cakunywa.
Amubuzuba bwamusanu aabili amutuule tupoho tuli musanu atubili, bagutu bobile, tubelele twamwaka omwe tuli ikumi atune tutakwe kampenda,
azipaizyo zyabusu azipaizyo zyakunywa zyatupoho azyabagutu azyatubelele mbubonya bweelede mulao wazyo,
asijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi, atala lyacipaizyo citentwa lyoonse acipaizyo caco cabusu acipaizyo caco cakunywa.
amutentele Jehova cipaizyo cili abweema bubotu: kapoho komwe, mugutu omwe, tubelele twamwaka omwe tuli musanu atubili tutakwe kampenda,
azipaizyo zyabusu azipaizyo zyakunywa zyakapoho azyamugutu azyatubelele mbubonya bweelede mulao wazyo,
asijembwe omwe wacipaizyo cazibi, atala lyacipaizyo citentwa lyoonse acipaizyo caco cabusu acipaizyo caco cakunywa,
Na muntu wasyomezya cisyo­ mezyo kuli-Jehova nanka kukonka cikonkezyo cakucita cintu, teelede kutamauka pe, uleelede kucita zyoonse nzyaakaamba.
Nanka mwanakazi, na wasyomezya cisyomezyo kuli-Jehova cakucita cintu, naacili muniini muŋanda yawisi,
alimwi wisi wamvwa cisyomezyo cakwe acintu ncalisyomezya, nkabela wisi waumuna buyo, lino cisyomezyo cakwe cinookede, azintu zyoonse nzyaalisyomezya zinookede.
Pele na wisi wamukasya ciindi cakumvwa, cisyomezyo cakwe acintu ncalisyomezya kucita tacikooba pe; Jehova ulamulekelela nkaambo wisi wamukasya.
Alimwi na wakwatwa mwaalumi ciindi eco naacili acisyomezyo na cintu ncafwanzya kukonka,
alimwi mulumaakwe wamvwa pele waumuna buyo, lino cisyomezyo cakwe acintu ncalisyomezya kucita cinookede.
Pele mulumaakwe amvwa makani, na wamukasya, lino ulalobya cisyomezyo cakwe acikonke cakwe ncaakafwanzya acintu ncalisyomezya kucita, nkabela Jehova ulamulekelela.
Pele mukamufu na mwanakazi muleke, kufumbwa cisyomezyo ncasyomezya nanka cintu ncalisyomezya kucita cinookede.
Amwanakazi uuli muŋanda yamulumaakwe, na wasyomezya cisyomezyo nanka kukonka kucita cintu,
alimwi mulumaakwe wamvwa, pele waumuna buyo, taambi cintu cakumukasya, lino cisyomezyo cakwe coonse azintu nzyaalisyomezya kucita zyoonse zinookede.
Pele na mulumaakwe wazilobya mubuzuba obo nazimvwa, lino zyoonse zizwa kumilomo yakwe azyoonse nzyaalisyomezya kucita tazikooyooba pe; mulumaakwe wazilobya, aboobo Jehova ulamulekelela.
Kufumbwa cisyomezyo akufumbwa cikonke ncaakakonka kukulipenzya, mulumaakwe ulakonzya kuciimika na kucilobya.
Pele na mulumaakwe waumuna buyo akutaamba cintu mazuba oonse, ulaimika zisyomezyo zyakwe zyoonse azintu zyoonse nzyaakalisyomezya kucita, Waziimika, nkaambo taakwe ncaakaamba mubuzuba mbwaakazimvwa.
Pele na musule lyakuumuna kwakwe ulazilobya, ulalibwezela mulandu wakwe.
Njeeyo milumbe Jehova njaakalailila Musa, mumakani aamwaalumi amukakwe, amumakani aawisi amwana wakwe musimbi nacili muniini muŋanda yawisi.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Liyila bana ba-Israyeli inkoto kuba-Midyani. Wamana kucita obo, ulatebwidwa kubantu bako.
Mpoonya awo Musa wakaambila bantu kuti, Amusale bantu akati kanu, balibambile inkondo, bakalwisye ba-Midyani, baliyile Jehova inkoto kubaMidyani.
Amusale cuulu kumusyobo umwi aumwi waba-Israyeli kuti baye kunkondo.
Elyo kwakasalwa, akati kazyuulu zyaba-Israyeli, cuulu kumusyobo umwi aumwi, nkokuti bantu bali zyuulu zili kumi azibili balibambilide lumamba.
Nkabela Musa wakabatuma kunkondo, nkokuti bantu bali cuulu bamusyobo umwi aumwi, balo a-Pinehasi mwana waEleazara mupaizi, uuli azibelesyo zyacikombelo amyeembo yakulizya mujanza lyakwe.
Lino bakalwisya ba-Midyani, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila­ Musa, bajaya baalumi boonse.
Abalo bami ba-Midyani bakabajaya antoomwe abantu bamwi ibakajayigwa, nkokuti, Evi, a-Rekemu, a-Zuri, a-Huri, a-Reba, bami bosanwe baba-Midyani. Alakwe Balamu mwana wa-Beori bakamujazya ipanga.
Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakajata banakazi baku-Midyani atwana twabo, akusaala iŋombe zyabo ambelele zyabo ambono zyabo zyoonse.
Aminzi yabo yoonse nkubakakede, amalabba aabo, zyoonse buyo bakazitenta amulilo,
akutola zisaalo zyoonse ambono zyoonse, bantu abanyama boonse.
Lino bakaleta baange ambono azisaalo zyoonse-kuli-Musa akuli-Eleazara mupaizi akumbungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli kuzilao nkubakabede, kumageze aa-Moabu kunkomwe ya-Jordano kumbali lya-Jeriko.
Lino Musa a-Eleazara mupaizi abasilutwe boonse babantu bakainka kuyoobatambula anze lyamalabba.
Nkabela Musa wakakalalila basilutwe bampi, bapati bazyuulu abapati bamyanda, ibakazwa munkondo.
Musa wakabaambila kuti, Sa mwabafutusya banakazi boonse?
Mbembabo bakacita kuti bana ba-Israyeli bapapile Jehova mumakani aa-Peori; makani akazwa kululayo lwa-Balamu, aboobo kwakabuka lunyonyooko akati kabantu ba-Jehova.
Lino amujaye balombe boonse akati kabana, abanakazi boonse bezi kale baalumi.
Pele basimbi boonse batana kuziba mwaalumi, mubasic, bapone, babe banu.
Lino amukale anze lyamalabba mazuba aali musanu aabili. Kufumbwa uujayide muntu, ayooyo iwakaguma muntu uujayidwe, amulisalazye mubuzuba bwatatu amubuzuba bwamusanu aabili, abalo baange banu.
Alimwi zyakusama zyoonse, azibelesyo zyoonse zyazikanda, azibelesyo zyoonse zyaboya bwampongo, azibelesyo zyoonse zyazisamu, amu-zisalazye zyoonse.
Lino Eleazara mupaizi wakaambila basilumamba ibakaya kunkondo kuti, Ngooyu mulao Jehova ngwaakalailila Musa.
Ingolida, ansiliva, amukuba, abutale, amundalila, amutofwe,

nkokuti zintu zyoonse zikonzya kwiinda mumulilo, amuzyuuluzye mumulilo, lino zilasalala. Nekubaboobo zileelede kusalazigwa amaanzi aabusofwi aakusalazya zibi. Azintu zyoonse zitakonzya kuuluzigwa mumulilo zileelede kwiinda mumaanzi.
Lino amusanzye zyakusama zyanu mubuzuba bwamusanu aahili, elyo mulasalala. Kusule lyaboobo mulanjila mumalabba.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Bala zisaalo zyoonse izyakajatwa munkondo, nkokuti bantu abanyama boonse. Amubale, yebo a-Eleazara mupaizi abasilutwe banzubo zyabantu.
Nkabela muleelede kwaabanya zisaalo muzipanzi zyobile, cimwi cibe cabasilumamba ibakaya kunkondo, acimwi cibe cabantu boonse,
Lino amugwisye mutelo wa-Jehova kulibasilumamba ibakaya kunkondo: omwe akati kamyanda yosanwe, bantu, aŋombe, ambongolo, ambelele zyoonse.
Oyu mutelo ugwisigwe mucipanzi cabo, upegwe Eleazara mupaizi, ube cituuzyo ca-Jehova.
Akucipanzi cabantu ba-Israyeli gwisya umwi akati kamakumi osanwe, bantu, aŋombe, ambongolo, ambelele, abanyama boonse, uzipe ba-Levi babeleka milimo yacikombelo ca-Jehova.
Nkabela Musa a-Eleazara mupaizi bakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Lino zisaalo izyakasyeede zyazintu nzibakajata basilumamba munkondo nzeezi: imbelele zili zyuulu zili myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi aali musanu aabili azisanu,
iŋombe zili zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili azibili,
imbongolo zili zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu alimwi acimwi,
abantu, nkokuti banakazi ibatakezi mwaalumi, zyuulu zili makumi otatwe azibili.
Cisela cazeezyo, nkokuti cisela cabasilumamba ibakaya kunkondo, nceeci. Imbelele zyakali zyuulu zili myanda yosanwe amakumi otatwe amusanu azibili amyanela yosanwe,
amutelo wa-Jehova wakali imbelele zili myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi aali musanu aabili azisanu;
iŋombe zyakali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe amusanu acimwi, amutelo wa-Jehova wakali makumi aali musanu aabili azibili.
Imbongolo zyakali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe amyanda yosanwe, amutelo wa-Jehova wakali makumi aali musanu alimwi ambongolo yomwe.
Abantu bakali zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu acimwi, amutelo wa-Jehova wakali makumi otatwe ababili.
Nkabela mutelo wacituuzyo ca-Jehova Musa wakaupa Eleazara mupaizi, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Akwalo kucisela cabana ba-Israyeli, Musa ncakaandaanya aceeco cabasilumamba ibakaya kunkondo, mutelo wakagwisigwa.
Cisela cabantu nceeci: imbelele zili zyuulu zili myanda yotatwe amakumi otatwe amusanu azibili amyanda yosanwe,
iŋombe zili zyuulu zili makumi otatwe amusanu acimwi,
imbongolo zili zyuulu zili makumi otatwe amyanda yosanwe,
abantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu acimwi.
Kucisela eco cabana ba-Israyeli Musa wakagwisya omwe akati kamakumi osanwe, bantu abanyama boonse, wapa ba-Levi ibakabeleka milimo yacikombelo ca-Jehova, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Lino basilutwe bazyuulu bampi, basilutwe bazyuulu abasilutwe bamyanda, bakasika kuli-Musa,
bati, Swebo tobalanda bako twabala mweelwe wabasilumamba ibakali kumaanza esu, nkabela taakwe naba omwe uutawo.

Lino twaletela Jehova cipo, kufumbwa cintu muntu ncaakasala, neciba cibelesyo cangolida niiba inkaya niiba incoko niiba inwenwe nebuba bucoeo nebuba bulungu, kuti tumanye milandu yesu kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Elyo Musa a-Eleazara mupaizi bakatambula ingolida azibelesyo zyoonse nzebakaleta.
Ingolida yoonse yacipo ncebakaletela Jehova basilutwe bazyuulu abasilutwe bamyanda yakali masyekeli aali zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu acimwi amyanda iili musanu aibili amakumi osanwe.
(Nkaambo basilumamba bakalisaalila umwi aumwi ncaakajana.)
Nkabela Musa a-Eleazara mupaizi bakatambula ingolida nzebakaleta basilutwe bazyuulu abasilutwe bamyanda, bainjizya mutente lyambunganino, ibe ciibalusyo cabana ba-Israyeli kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Elyo bana ba-Gadi abana ba-Rubeni bakeza kuzooambila Musa a-Eleazara mupaizi abasilutwe babantu, bati,
Tulibwene Atarotu, a-Diboni, a Jazerl, a-Nimra, a-Hesiboni, a-Eleale, a-Sebamu, a-Nebo, a-Beoni,
nyika Jehova njaakazunda kubusyu bwabantu baIsrayeli, ninyika imbotu kukweembelela iŋombe, nkabela swebo tobalanda bako tulijisi iŋombe.
Bakati, Na tulakonzya kujana coolwe kumeso aako, tupegwe nyika ino, swebo tobalanda bako, twiivube; utatuzubusyi jordano.
Pele Musa wakaambila bana ba-Gadi abana ba-Rubeni kuti, Ma! Sa ncibotu kuti bananyokwe baye kunkondo, nywebo kamukede buyo okuno?
Nkaambonzi nomuyanda kutyola myoyo yabana ba-Israyeli kuti batainki kunyika Jehova njabapede?
Mbubonya obo bamausowanu mbobakacita ciindi ceiya nindakabatuma kuzwa ku-Kadesi-Barinea kuyootwela nyika.
Bakainka kukuti lya-Esikolo, pele nibakamana kubona nyika, bakatyola myoyo yabana ba-Israyeli akubakasya kunjila munyika Jehova njaakabapa.
Elyo mubuzuba obo bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabuka, nkabela wakakonkezya kuti,
Ncobeni aba bantu ibakazwa ku-Egepita, boonse bali amyaka iili makumi obile aiindilila, tabakooyoobona nyika njindakasyomezya Abrahamua-Izaka a-Jakobo, nkaambo teebanditobela amoyo woonse,
cita Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune mu-Kenizi a-Joshua mwana wa-Nuni abalike, nkaambo mbembabo bakatobela Jehova camoyo woonse.
Bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila ba-Israyeli, nkabela wakabatuntulisya munkanda myaka iili makumi one, mane lumwi lyakamaninina izyalani lyoonse lyabaabo ibakabisya mumeso aa-Jehova.
Lino sunu mwabuka nywebo mucibaka cabamausowanu, nosau lyabantu basizibi, kuti muyungizizye alimwi bukali bwa-Jehova mbwakalalila ba-Israyeli.
Nkaambo na mwaleka kumutobela, ulabaleka alimwi kabakede munkanda, aboobo mulabanyonyoozya bantu aba boonse.
Bamvwe obo bakamuswenenena, bati, Tulayakila matanga esu zimpati akuyakila bana besu minzi okuno,
pele swebo tulalibambila inkondo, tulazulwida bana ba-Israyeli mane tukabasisye kubusena bwabo. Bana besu balakala muminzi iili ama baya nkaambo kabantu bakede munyika.
Tatukooyooboola kumaanda esu mane bana ba-Israyeli bakamaninine kujana inkono zyabo.
Nkaambo tatukooyooba alukono ambabo kutala lyajordano, nkaambo lukono lwesu twalupegwa kale okuno kutala lya-Jordano kujwe.
Lino Musa wakabaambila kuti, Mbubo, na mwazumina kucita obo, na mwazumina kuya kunkondo azilwisyo zyanu kubusyu bwa-Jehova,
na baalumi boonse akati kanu balazubuka Jordano azilwisyo zyabo kubusyu bwa-Jehova mane bakatande basinkondonyina boonse kubusyu bwakwe,
anyika yoonse ikazundwe kubusyu bwakwe, musule lyaboobo muyoopiluka kamutajisi mulandu kuli-Jehova akuba-Israyeli, nkabela nyika ino iyooba lukono lwanu kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Pele na mwakaka kucita obo, mwabisizya Jehova, lino amuzibe kuti ncobeni zibi zyanu ziyoomupilukila,
Mbubo, amuyakile bana banu minzi azimpati zyambelele zyanu, Amucite mbubonya mbuli kwaamba kwanu.
Nkabela bana ba-Gadi abana baRubeni bakaambila Musa kuti, Swebo tobalanda bako tulacita mbubonya mbwaalailila mwami wesu.
Bana besu, banakazi besu, imbono zyesu aŋombe zyesu zyoonse zilasyaala okuno kuminzi ya-Gileadi,
pele swebo tobalanda bako tulazubuka, umwi aumwi uulibambilide kuya kunkondo, kuyoolwisya kunembo lya-Jehova mbubonya mbuli mwami wesu mbwalailila,

Musa wakabaambila kuti, Na bana ba-Gadi abana ba-Rubeni bazubuka Jordano anywebo, boonse balibambilide azilwisyo, kuti baye kunkondo kunembo lya-Jehova, nyika nimuyooizunda yoonse, muyoobapa nyika ya-Gileadi, baivube.
Pele na bakaka kuzubuka anywebo, kabalibambilide kunkondo, bayooabilwa lukono akati kandinywe munyika ya-Kanana.
Nkabela bana ba-Gadi abana ba-Rubeni bakavuwa kuti, Zintu zyoonse Jehova nzyaatwaa-mbila swebo tobalanda bako tulazicita.
Tulazubuka katulibambilide kunkondo kunembo lya-Jehova kuya kunyika ya-Kanana, nkabela nyika yalukono lwesu ilaba okuno kutala lya-Jordano.
Lino bana ba-Gadi bakayaka Diboni, a-Atarotu, a-Aroeri,
a-Atarotu-Sofani, a-Jazeri, a-Jogebeha,
a-Beti Nimira, a-Beti Harani, minzi iili amabaya azimpati zyambelele,
Abalo bana ba-Rubeni bakayaka Hesiboni, a-Eleale, a-Kiriyataimu,
a-Nebo, a-Baalameoni, (pele mazina akasandulwa), a-Sibima. Bakasandula mazina aaminzi njibakayaka.
Nkabela bana ba-Makiri mwana wa-Manase bakaya kucisi ca-Gileadi, bacizunda, batanda ba-Amori ibakakede mumo.
Lino Musa wakapa Makiri mwana wa-Manase cisi ca-Gileadi, nkabela wakakala nkuko,
Alakwe Jairi mwana wa-Manase wakaakuzunda tunzuunzi twabo, watupa izina lyaHavoti Jairi.
Alakwe Noba wakaakuzunda Kenati atunzi tweengelede, wapa cisi izina lya-Noba mbubonya mbuli izina lyakwe.
Ngaaya makani aakweendeenda kwabana ba-Israyeli mbubakeendeenda munyendo zyabo kuzwa kuciindi eco nibakazwa munyika ya­ Egepita munkamu zyabo kujanza lya-Musa alya-Aroni,
Musa wakalemba matalikilo aanyendo zyabo mukulailila kwa-Jehova. Matalikilo aanyendo zyabo ngaaya.
Bakanyamuka kuzwa ku-Ramese mumwezi mutaanzi, mubuzuba bwakumi amusanu bwamumwezi mutaanzi, bamane kulya Pasika, nebwakaca ba-Israyeli bakazwa ajanza ijumu mumeso aaba-Egepita boonse.
Ba-Egepita bakali mukuzika bana babo bataanzi Jehova mbaakauma akati kabo, Abalo baleza babo Jehova wakababeteka.
Kuzwa ku-Sukoti bakaakukala ku-Etemu kumbali ankanda,
Lino bakanyamuka kuzwa ku-Etamu, bakaakukala ku-Pihahiroti kujwe lya-Baala-Zefoni, nkabela bakakala kunembo lya-Migidoli.
Lino bakanyamuka kuzwa ku-Pihahiroti, bainda akati kalwizi, banjila munkanda, beenda lweendo lwamazuba otatwe munkanda ya-Etamu, baakukala kuMara.
Kuzwa ku-Mara bakasika ku-Elimu, nkabela ku-Elimu kakuli tusensa twamaanzi tuli ikumi atubili, lino bakayaka zilao nkuko.
Lino kuzwa ku-Elimu bakaakukala kunkomwe ya-Lwizi Lusalala.
Kuzwa ku-Lwizi Lusalala bakaakukala kunkanda ya-Sini.
Kuzwa kunkanda ya-Sini bakaakukala ku-Dofeka,
Kuzwa ku-Dofeka bakaakukala kuAlusi.
Kuzwa ku-Alusi bakaakukala ku-Refidimu. Nkonkuko bantu nkobakabula maanzi aakunywa.
Lino kuzwa ku-Refidimu bakaakukala kunkanda ya-Sinai.
Kuzwa kunkanda ya-Sinai bakaakukala ku-KibirotiHatava.
Kuzwa ku-Kibiroti-Hatava bakaakukala ku-Hazeroti.
Kuzwa ku-Hazeroti bakaakukala ku-Ritima.
Kuzwa ku-Ritima bakaakukala ku-Rimoni-Perezi.
Kuzwa ku-Rimoni-perezi bakaakukala ku-Libina.
Kuzwa ku-Libina bakaakukala ku-Risa.
Kuzwa ku-Risa bakaakukala ku-Kehelata.
Kuzwa ku-Kehelata bakaakukala kucilundu ca-Seferi.
Kuzwa kucilundu ca-Seferi bakaakukala ku-Harada.
Kuzwa kuHarada bakaakukala ku-Makeloti.
Kuzwa ku-Makeloti bakaakukala ku-Tahati.
Kuzwa ku-Tahati bakaakukala ku-Tera.
Kuzwa ku-Tera bakaakukala ku-Mitika.
Kuzwa ku-Mitika bakaakukala ku-Hasimona.
Kuzwa ku-Hasimona bakaakukala ku-Moseroti.
Kuzwa ku-Moseroti bakaakukala ku-Bene-Jakani.
Kuzwa ku-Bene-Jakani bakaakukala kuHori Hagidigadi.
Kuzwa ku-Hori Hagidigadi bakaakukala ku-Jotibata.
Kuzwa ku-Jotibata bakaakukala ku-Ebirona.
Kuzwa ku-Ebirona bakaakukala ku-Ezioni Geberi.
Kuzwa ku-Ezioni Geberi bakaakukala kunkanda ya-Zini (nkokuti Kadesi).
Kuzwa ku-Kadesi bakaakukala kucilundu ca-Hori kumagolelo aanyika ya-Edomu.
Nkabela Aroni kajisi myaka iili mwanda amakumi obile aitatu ciindi eco naakafwa kucilundu ca-Hori.
Lino kuzwa kucilundu ca-Hori bakaakukala ku-Zalimona.
Kuzwa ku-Zalimona bakaakukala ku-Punoni.
Kuzwa ku-Punoni bakaakukala ku-Oboti.
Kuzwa ku-Oboti bakaakukala ku-Iyebarimu kumagolelo aacisi ca-Moabu.
Kuzwa ku-Iyimu bakaakukala ku-Diboni Gadi.
Kuzwa ku-Diboni Gadi bakaakukala ku-Alimoni Dibilataimu.
Kuzwa ku-Alimoni Dibilataimu bakaakukala kuzilundu zya-Abarimu kunembo lya-Nebo.
Lino kuzwa kuzilundu zya-Abarimu bakaakukala kumageze aa-Moabu kunkomwe ya-Jordano kulangene a-Jeriko.
Nkabela bakayaka zilao zyabo kunkomwe ya-Jordano kuzwa ku-Beti-Jesimoti kusikila ku-Abelisitimu mumageze aa-Moabu.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kumageze aa-Moabu, kunkomwe ya-Jordano kulangene a-Jeriko, wati,
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mwazubuka Jordano akunjila munyika ya-Kanana,
muleelede kutanda bantu boonse bakede munyika, kunyonyoona mabwe aazikozyano aabo oonse akunyonyoona zikozyano zyabo zifulidwe zyoonse, akumwaya zyoonse zipaililo zyabo zyakuzilundu.
Muleelede kuvuba nyika akukala mulinjiyo, nkaambo nyika ndaipa kulindinywe kuti mwiivube,

Nkabela mukaikone nyika kucisolo munzubo zyanu; musyobo munji upegwe caabilo cipati, musyobo muce upegwe caabilo ciniini. Bantu bapegwe zyaabilo kufumbwa mbobawidwa cisolo; amukone mbubonya mbuli misyobo yabamausowanu.
Pele na mwabula kutanda bantu bakede munyika, abo basyaala bayoomubeda mbuli cintu ciyasa mumeso ambuli mamvwa mumabazu aanu, nkabela bayoomupenzya omo munyika momukede.
Lino ncinjeeya kubacitila, njoocicitila ndinywe.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Lailila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Mwanjila buyo munyika ya-Kanana, niceyi nyika njimuyoowidwa cisolo kuti mwiivube, nyika ya-Kanana mumigaano yayo.
Mugaano wakulubazu lwakumusanza: kuzwa kunkanda ya-Zini uyoolulama kulubazu lwa-Edomu; mugaano wakumusanza uyoogolela kujwe ku-Lwizi lwamunyo.
Lino mugaano wanu uyooinda kumusanza wamatantilo aatubanze, uyooinda ku-Zini, amagolelo ayooba kumusanza waku-Kadesi-Barinea; kuzwa oko uyooinda ku-Hazara-adari, akuzwa oko ku-Azimoni.
Kuzwa ku-Azimoni mugaano uyooinda kukalonga ka-Egepita, amagolelo aawo ayooba kulwizi.
Amugaano wakumbo uyooba Lwizi Lupati ankomwe yalo. Mbuuyooba mugaano wanu wakumbo,
Amugaano wanu wakulubazu lwakunyika ngooyu: kuzwa ku-Lwizi Lupati amubike mpa kusikila kucilundu ca-Hori;
kuzwa kucilundu caHori amubike mpa kusikila kumanjililo aa-Hamati; amagolelo aamugaano ayooba ku-Zedadi;
lino mugaano uyooinda ku-Zifroni, amagolelo aawo ayooba ku-Hazari-enani. Mbuuyooba mugaano wanu wakunyika.
Lino mugaano wakujwe ngooyu: amubike mpa kuzwa ku-Hazarienani kusikila ku-Sefamu;
kuzwa ku-Sefamu mugaano uyooseluka kuya ku-Ribila kulubazu lwakujwe lwa-Ayini; lino mugaano uyooseluka akusikila kuzilundulundu zyakujwe lyaziba lya-Kinereti.
Kuzwa oko mugaano uyooseluka ku-Jordano, amagolelo ayooba ku-Lwizi lwamunyo. Mbiiyooba migaano yanyika yanu yoonse,
Nkaambo inzubo zyamusyobo wa-Rubeni anzubo zyamusyobo wa-Gadi acisela camusyobo wa-Manase zyatambula kale lukono lwazyo.
Misyobo yobile acisela yatambula kale lukono lwayo kutala lya-Jordano kujwe, kulangene a-Jeriko, kubuzwezuba.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Musa kuti,
Ngaaya mazina aabantu ibeelede kumwaabila nyika: Eleazara mupaizi a-Joshua mwana wa-Nuni.
Alimwi amusale muntu omwe kumusyobo umwi aumwi, kuti bamwaabile nyika.
Mazina aabantu mbaaba: kumusyobo wa-Juda, Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune;
kumusyobo wabana ba-Simeoni, Samuele mwana wa-Amihudi;
kumusyobo wa-Benjamini, Elidadi mwana wa-Kisiloni;
kumusyobo wabana ba-Dani silutwe, Buki mwana wa-Jogili;
kubana ba-Josefa, kumusyobo wa-Manase silutwe, Hanieli mwana wa-Efodi;
kumusyobo wabana ba-Efraimu silutwe, Kemueli mwana wa-Sifitani;
kumusyobo wabana ba-Zebuloni silutwe, Elisafana mwana wa-Parinaki;
akumusyobo wabana ba-Isakara silutwe, Palitieli mwana wa-Azani;
akumusyobo wabana ba-Aseri silutwe, Ahihudi mwana wa-Selomi;
akumusyobo wabana ba-Nafitali silutwe, Pedayeli mwana wa-Amihudi.
Mbaabo bantu Jehova mbaakalailila kuti baabile bana ba-Israyeli lukono munyika ya-Kanana.
Lailila bana ba-Israyeli kuti bape ba-Levi minzi yakukalila akati kalukono lwabo ndobatambula, alimwi amupe ba-Levi macezezyo munyika iiengelede minzi.
Minzi ibe yabo, bakale mulinjiyo, amacezezyo abe aaŋombe zyabo amatanga aabo abanyama bamwi.
Nkabela macezezyo aaminzi njemupa ba-Levi ayooba tukokola tuli cuulu koonse koonse kuzwa kubulambo bwamunzi.

Muleelede kweeleka tukokola tuli zyuulu zyobile anze lyamunzi kulubazu lwakujwe, atukokola tuli zyuulu zyobile kulubazu lwakumusanza, atukokola tuli zyuulu zyobile kulubazu lwakumbo, atukokola tuli zyuulu zyobile kulubazu lwakunyika, amunzi ube akatikati. Mbwaayooba macezezyo aaminzi yabo.
Minzi njimuyoopa ba-Levi njeeyi: minzi yamayubilo iili musanu aumwi, sikujaya muntu nkwakonzya kucijila, aminzi imwi iili makumi one aibili.
Nkokuti minzi yoonse njemuyoopaba-Levi iyooba makumi one amusanu aitatu, antoomwe amacezezyo aayo.
Nkabela minzi eyi njemugwisya mulukono lwabana ba-Israyeli, kumusyobo munji amugwisye minji, akumusyobo muce amugwisye mice, musyobo umwi aumwi upe ba-Levi minzi mbubonya mbuli lukono lwawo.
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti Mwazubuka mulonga wa-Jordano kunjila munyika ya-Kanana,
amulisalile imwi minzi ibe minzi yamayubilo, kuti muntu uujaya mweenzinyina cakutaziba acijile nkuko.
Minzi eyi iyoomubeda macijililo aabasikuliyankoto­, kuti sikujaya atafwi katana kubetekwa kunkuta,
Minzi yamayubilo aanu njemubika ibe musanu aumwi.
Amubike minzi yotatwe mutala lya-Jordano, aminzi yotatwe munyika ya-Kanana, ibe mayubilo aanu,
Eyi minzi iili musanu aumwi iyooba minzi yamayubilo yabana ba-Israyeli ayabeenzu ayabasimutuntuli bakalakala akati kanu; kufumbwa muntu uujaya mweenzinyina cakutaziba acijile nkuko.
Alimwi na wamuumya ibbwe lyamujanza lyakwe, ibbwe likonzya kujaya muntu, aboobo wafwa, mujayi; mujayi ncobeni uleelede kujayigwa.
Alimwi na wamuumya cibelesyo cazisamu, kufumbwa cibelesyo cikonzya kujaya muntu, aboobo wafwa, mujayi; mujayi ncobeni uleelede kujayigwa,
Sikuliya inkoto yabulowa amujaye oyo mujayi; kufumbwa namuswana amujaye.
Na wakamuyasa calusulo nanka kumuyubilila akumufusa aboobo wafwa,
nanka kuumya ijanza lyakwe cabusinkondonyina, aboobo wafwa, lino oyo iwakamuuma uleelede kujayigwa. Sikuliya inkoto yabulowa ajaye mujayi kufumbwa naamuswana.
Pele na wamoongomokela kumuuma, nekuba kuti tali sinkondonyina, nanka kumufusa acibelesyo cili buti cakutamuyubilila,
nanka kubweza ibbwe, kufumbwa ibbwe likonzya kujaya muntu, akumufusa ndilyo cakutamubona, aboobo wafwa, nekuba kuti katali sinkondonyina na sikuyanda kumubisizya,
bantu babeteke makani aayooyo sikujava asikuliya inkoto yabulowa, Babeteke mbuli milao eyi,

Bantu bavune sikujaya mumaanza aasikuliya inkoto yabulowa, bamupilusye kumunzi waciyubilo cakwe nkwaakacijilide, akale nkukonya oko mane kusikila kulufu lwamupaizi simutwe iwakananikwa mafuta aasalala.
Pele na mujayi uya bweendeenda anze lyamugaano wamunzi waciyubilo cakwe nkwaakacijila,
nkabela sikuliya inkoto yabulowa wamujana anze lyamugaano wamunzi waciyubilo cakwe, aboobo sikuliya inkoto yabulowa wamujaya nkukonya oko, tajisi mulandu wabulowa pe.
Nkaambo muntu uleelede kukala mumunzi waciyubilo cakwe mane kusikila kulufu lwamupaizi simutwe. Musule lyalufu lwamupaizi simutwe sikujaya alobonoke akupiluka kunyika yalukono lwakwe.
Na muntu wajaya mweenzinyina, sikujaya ulajayigwa kumilomo yabakamboni. Pele muntu omwe buyo alike teelede kuba kamboni wakujazya muntu.
Alimwi tamweelede kutambula lununuko lwabuumi lwamujayi iwakajaya mweenzinyina; ncobeni uleelede kujayigwa.
Ayooyo iwakaloboka kumunzi waciyubilo, tamweelede kutambula lununuko lwakumupilusya kunyika yakwe, mane mupaizi afwe.
Mutasofwaazyi nyika njemukede pe, nkaambo bulowa mbobusofwaazya nyika, nkabela tacikonzeki kumanya milandu yanyika bulowa nkobutikide cita kubulowa bwayooyo iwakabutila.
Mutasofwaazyi nyika momukede, monkede ambebo, nkaambo mebo nde-Jehova ndikede akati kabana baIsrayeli.
bati, Jehova wakalailila simalelo wesu kwaabila bana baIsrayeli nyika kucisolo, alimwi simalelo wesu wakalaililwa kuli-Jehova kuti lukono lwamukwesu Zelofehadi lupegwe bana bakwe basimbi.
Pele na bakwatwa kumusyobo umbi wabana ba-Israyeli, lino lukono lwabo luyootolwa kuzwa kumusyobo wabamatata, luyooba lwamusyobo umbi; luyootolwa kumusyobo nkubakwatwa, aboobo lulaloba.
Waakusika mwaka wakulizya myeembo akati kabana ba-Israyeli, lukono lwabo luyooyungizizigwa kulukono lwamusyobo oyo nkubayookwatwa, luyoolobelela kumusyobo wabamatata.
Lino mbuboobu Jehova mbwaalailila aabana basimbi ba-Zelofehadi. Bakwatwe kufumbwa muntu ngubayanda, pele bakwatwe mumonya mumusyobo wabamawisi.
Lukono lwabana ba-Israyeli talweelede kutolwa kumusyobo umbi; bana ba-Israyeli bakakatile umwi aumwi kulukono lwamusyobo wawisi.
Kufumbwa mwanakazi uukona lukono mumusyobo nuuba umwi wabana ba-Israyeli, akwatwe kumwaalumi wamusyobo wabamawisi, kuti bana ba-Israyeli bakone umwi aumwi lukono lwabamawisi.
Kutabi lukono lutolwa kumusyobo umbi pe. Misyobo yabana ba-Israyeli ikakatile umwi aumwi kulukono lwawo.
Nkabela bana basimbi ba-Zelofehadi bakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa.
Mala, Tiriza, Hogila, Milika, a-Nowa, boonse bakakwatwa kubana bababunyina wisi.
Bakakwatwa munzubo zya bana ba-Manase mwana wa-Josefa, aboobo lukono lwabo lwakalikede mumonya mumusyobo wawisi.
Ndweendo lwamazuba aali ikumi abumwi kuzwa ku-Horebu kwiinda kucilundu ca-Seiri kusikila ku-Kadesi-Barinea.
Mumwaka wamakumi one, mumwezi wakumi aumwi, mubuzuba butaanzi bwamumwezi, Musa wakaambila bana ba-Israyeli makani oonse Jehova ngaakamulailila aakutola kulimbabo,
naakamana kunyonyoona Silioni mwami waba-Amori, iwakakede ku-Hesiboni, a-Ogi mwami wa-Basana iwakakede ku-Asitaroti aku-Edrei.
Mutala lya-Jordano, munyika ya-Moabu, Musa mwaakatalikila kupandulula eyi milao, Wati,
Jehova Leza wesu wakatwaambila ku-Horebu, wakati, Mwakala ciindi cilamfu kucilundu eci;

amunyamuke, mulongele kuzilundu zyabaAmori amisyobo iibambene abo mu-Araba, kuzilundu akucisi catulundulundu aku-Negebi akunkomwe yalwizi, nyika yaba-Kanana, a-Lebanoni, kusikila kumulonga mupati, mulonga wa-Firate.
Amubone! Ndabika nyika kumeso aanu, Amunjile, mwiivube nyika eyo Jehova njaakakonkezya kulibamausowanu, ba-Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo, kuti abape njiyo, balo alunyungu lwabo.
Jehova Leza wanu wamuvuzya, aboobo sunu muli banji loko mbuli inyenyeezi zyakujulu.
Jehova Leza wabamauso wanu amuyungizizye alimwi ziindi zili cuulu, muvule kwiinda sunu, akumupa coolwe mbubonya mbwaakasyomezya.
Njumune buti makataazyo aanu amukuli wankondo zyanu, mebo endike?
Amusale bantu basongo, bacenjede, bali amaanu, mumisyobo yanu, mbabike kuti babe basilutwe banu.
Mpawo mwakandivwiila kuti, Cintu ncoamba cililuleme kuti tucite.

Aboobo ndakatambula basilutwe bamisyobo yanu, bantu basongo bacenjede, ndakababika kuti babe basilutwe banu, bapati bazyuulu, abapati bamyanda, abapati bankamu zyamakumi osanwe, bapati bamakumi, abasolozi, mumisyobo yenu yoonse.
Lino kuciindi eco nciconya ndakalailila babetesi banu kuti, Amubeteke milandu yababunyina, akukosola kabotu makani aamuntu umwi aumwi amweenzinyina naba mweenzu uukala awe.

Tamweelede kusalaula mukubeteka kwanu; muleelede kuswiilila makani aabantu boonse buyo, nebaba bapati nebaba baniini; alimwi mutayoowi bantu, nkaambo imilimo yakubeteka njiya-Leza. Amakani aamukacila, amwaalete kulindime, nkaswiilile.
Alimwi ndakamulailila kuciindi eco nciconya zintu zyoonse nzemweelede kucita.
Lino ndakamwaambila kuti, Mwasika kuzilundu zyaba-Amori, nyika njatupa Jehova Leza wesu.
Amubone! Jehova Leza wanu wabika nyika kumeso aanu. Kamuya, mukaivube, mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wabamauso mbwaakamwaambila. Mutayoowi nekuba kukankama.
Mpawo mwakasika nyoonse akwaamba kuti, Atutaangune kutuma bantu, kuti batutwelele nyika akutuletela makani aanzila njitutola amakani aaminzi njetuyoojana.
Lino ayo makani-akandibotela, nkabela ndakasala bantu bali ikumi ababili akati kanu, nkokuti muntu omwe kumusyobo umwi aumwi,
nkabela bakanyamuka, baya kuzilundu, basika kukalonga kaEsikolo batwela nkuko.
Elyo bakabweza imwi micelo yanyika mumaanza aabo akwiileta kulindiswe. Nkabela bakatuletela majwi aakuti, Nimbotu nyika njatupa Jehova Leza wesu.
Mwakali kunyontauka muzilao zyanu cakwaamba kuti, Jehova watusula: nciceeco ncaakatugwisizya munyika ya-Egepita, kuti atwaabe mumaanza aaba-Amori akutunyonyoona.
Ino tulaya kuli? Bakwesu bakompaamya myoyo yesu cakwaamba kuti, Bantu mbapati, alimwi mbalamfu kwiinda ndiswe. Minzi mipati, alimwi ilijisi mabaya aasika kujulu. Abalo bana ba-Anaki twababona nkuko.
Mpawo ndakamwaa-mbila kuti, Mutakankami, nekuba kubayoowa.
Jehova Leza wesu ulamuzulwida, ulamulwida, mbubonya mbwaakamucitila ku-Egepita kumeso aanu,
ambwaakacita munkanda, nkaambo mulibwene Jehova mbwaakamubbede mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwabbala mwana wakwe, munzila yoonse njimwakaleta mane mwakasika okuno.
Pele nekuba kuti ndakaamba majwi aya, mwakakaka kusyoma Jehova Leza wanu,
iwakali kumuzulwida munzila yoonse kuyoomuyandawida busena bwakuyaka zilao zyanu, iwakali kweenda mumulilo ciindi camasiku, kuti amutondezye inzila njimweelede kutola, amumayoba ciindi casikati.
Ncobeni takukooyooba muntu naba omwe akati kabantu bazyalani eli ibbi, uuyoobona nyika imbotu njindakakonkezya kupa bamawisi,
cita Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune luzutu; walo uyooibona, nkabela njoomupa nyika eyo njaakalyataula, abana bakwe, nkaambo watobela Jehova camoyo woonse.
Ambebo, Jehova wakandikalalila nkaambo kanu. Wakati, Ayebo tokooyoonjila mulinjiyo,
pele Joshua mwana wa-Nuni uukubelekela nguuyoonjila; komuyumya, nkaambo ngonguwe uuyookonya ba-Israyeli nyika.
Abana banu mbomwakaamba kuti balaba cisaalo, batanaziba kwaandaanya bubotu abubi, mbembabo bayoonjila, nkabela njoobapanyika kuti baivube.
Pele ciindi ecino amupiluke, muye kunkanda kunzila yaku-Lwizi Lusalala.
Mpawo mwakandivwiila kuti: Twabisizya Jehova; tulaya kuyoolwa mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wesu mbwaakatulailila. Nkabela mwakasama umwi aumwi zilwisyo zyakwe akusoleka kwiinka kunyika yazilundulundu.
Pele Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Kobaambila kuti, Mutainki kuyoolwa pe, nkaambo nsili akati kanu, kuti mutazundwi kulibasinkondonyoko.
Elyo ndakamwaambila obo, nekubaboobo mwakakaka kuswiilila. Mwakasampaula majwi aa-Jehova, mwalisumpula, mwainka kuzihmdulundu.
Mpawo ba-Amori ibakakede omo muzilundulundu bakeza kuzoomulwisya, nkabela bakamutanda mbubonya mbuzicita inzuki, akumukoma mu-Seiri mane kusikila ku-Horima.
Elyo mwakapiluka akulila kubusyu bwa-Jehova, pele Jehova takwakaswiilila kulila kwanu nikuba kucenjeka matwi aakwe.
Aboobo mwakalikede ku-Kadesi mazuba manji, mbubonya mbwaakabede mazuba aanu aakukala nkuko.
Lino Jehova wakandaambila kuti,
Mweendeenda ciindi cilamfu mucilundu eci, Amutozye kulubazu lwakunyika,
Lino lailila bantu cakwaamba kuti, Mulainda akati kacisi cabananyoko, bana ba-Esau bakede mu-Seiri. Balamuyoowa. Lino amucenjele loko,
Mutabusizyanyi inkondo pe, nkaambo nsikoomupa nyika yabo nibuba buniini, niiba iili mbuli lino lyacituta, nkaambo Esau ndakamupa cilundu ca-Seiri, cibe lukono lwakwe.
Zilyo zyakulya mulazyuula kulimbabo amali, amaanzi aakunywa mulaaula kulimbabo amali.

Nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu wamulongezya mumilimo yoonse yamaanza aanu. Ulizi mbumwali kweendeenda munkanda eyi impati. Myaka eyi iili makumi one Jehova Leza wanu waba anywebo, Taakwe cintu ncimwakabula.
Elyo twakatola lweendo lwesu lwakuya kunembo, twaindilila bakwesu bakede mu-Seiri, twainda kunzila ya-Araba, kuzwa ku-Elati aku-Ezioni Geberi.
Elyo twakatozya kuya kuakanda ya-Moabu.
Nkabela Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Mutakataazyi ba-Moabu nikuba kubabusizya inkondo, nkaambo nsikoomuvubya nyika yabo abuniini, pe, nkaambo bana ba-Loti ndakabapa Ari, bavube.
(Ba-Emi mbobakataanguna kukala mulinjiyo, bantu bapati bayumu, balamfu mbuli ba-Anaki.
Abo bantu abalo balaambwa kuti mba-Refai, mbubonya mbuli ba-Anaki, pele ba-Moabu balaba amba kuti mba-Emi.
Abalo ba-Hori mbobakataanguna kukala mu-Seiri, pele bana ba-Esau bakabatanda, babanyonyoona, bakala mucibaka cabo, mbubonya mbuli ba-Israyeli mhubakacitila nyika yalukono lwabo njaakabapa Jehova.)
Lino amunyampuke, muzubuke kalonga ka-Zeredi, Mpawo twakazubuka kalonga ka-Zeredi.

Nkabela ciindi coonse cakweendeenda kwesu, kuzwa ku-Kadesi-Barinea kusikila kuciindi cakuzubuka kalonga ka-Zeredi, cakasika kumyaka iili makumi otatwe amusanu aitatu, mane lumwi izyalani lyoonse lyabasilumamba lyakamaninina kufwa muzilao zyesu, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakakonkezya.
Nkaambo ncobeni ijanza lya-Jehova lyakali kubalwisya, kuti libanyonyoone mumalabba, mane lumwi bakamaninina.
Lino basilumamba abo boonse nebakamana kufwa akati kabantu,
Jehova wakandaambila kuti,
Buzuba obuno mulazubuka munyinza waba-Moabu, ku-Ari,
Mwasika kumunyinza waba-Amoni, mutabakataazyi nekuba kubalwisya, nkaambo nsikoomuvubya nyika yabana ba-Amoni pe, nkaambo nyika eyo ndakai pa bana ba-Loti kuti baivube.
(Nyika eyo ayalo ilaambwa kuti ninyika yaba-Refai. Ba-Refai mbebakataanguna kukala nkuko, pele ba-Amoni babaamba kuti mba-Zamzumi.
Bakali bantu bapati bayumu balamfu mbuli ba-Anaki, pele Jehova wakabanyonyoona kubusyu bwabo, nkabela bakabatanda akukala mucibaka cabo.
Wakabacitila mbubonya mbwaakacitila bana ba-Es au bakede mu-Seiri, nkaambo wakanyonyoona ba-Hori kunembo lyabo, nkabela bakabatanda akukala mucibaka cabo nkukonya oko nkubacikede asunu.
Abalo ba-Avi, ibakakede muminzi imwi akusikila ku-Gaza, ba-Kafitori ibakazwa ku-Kafitori bakabanyonyoona akukala mucibaka cabo.)
Lino amunyampuke, mweende, muzubuke kalonga ka-Arinoni. Bona! Ndaaba mumaanza aako Sihoni mu-Amori mwami wa-Hesiboni, anyika yakwe; talika kwiivuba, Amulibambe kumulwisya!
Buzuba obuno ndatalika kubika buyoofu mumyoyo yabantu boonse buyo baansi, bakankame kubusyu bwanu, Bamvwa buyo impuwo yanu, balazyangama akufwaba loko nkaambo kanu.
Atwiinde akati kanyika yako. Tulainda munzila buyo. Tatukooleya kululyo na kulumwesi.
Zilyo nzenjanda kulya, ulanduuzizya amali, maanzi aakunywa ulaanduuzizya amali. Njiinde buyo,
mbubonya mbubakandicitila bana ba-Esau bakede ku-Seiri aba-Moabu bakede ku-Ari, mane nkazubuke mulonga wa-Jordano akunjila munyika njatupa Jehova Leza wesu.
Pele Sihoni mwami wa-Hesiboni takwakazumina kutuleka kuti twiinde, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu wakayumya moyo wakwe, waba sicinguni, kuti amwaabe mumaanza aanu, mbubonya mbomubwene asunu.
Mpawo Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Bona! Ndatalika kale kumupa Sihoni anyika yakwe mumaanza aanu, Amutalike kuvuba, muvube nyika yakwe.
Nkabela Sihoni abantu bakwe boonse bakeza kuzootulwisya ku-Jahaza.
Lino Jehova Leza wesu wakamwaaba mumaanza esu, aboobo twakamuzunda abana bakwe abantu bakwe boonse.
Nkabela twakajata minzi yakwe yoonse kuciindi eco nciconya. Twakanyonyoona minzi yoonse yabantu, baalumi abanakazi abana boonse buyo, Teetwakasia muntu naba omwe pe.
Pele iŋombe twakazitola kuti zibe zyesu, antoomwe azisaalo zimwi zyamuminzi njitwakazunda.
Kuzwa ku-Aroeri kunkomwe yakalonga ka-Arinoni, akuzwa kumunzi uuli kukalonga, mane kusikila ku-Gileadi, koonse koonse katakwe munzi iwakatukacila. Yoonse buyo, Jehova Leza wesu wakaiaba mumaanza esu.
Pele nyika yabana ba-Amoni, teemwakaiguma pe, nkokuti koonse kunkomwe zyamulonga wa-Jakobi, aminzi yakuzilundulundu, akooko koonse Jehova Leza wesu nkwaakatukasya.
Lino kuzwa oko twakatozya munzila yaku-Basana. Nkabela Ogi mwami wa-Basana wakeza kuzootulwisya, walo abantu bakwe boonse, ku-Edrei.
Pele Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Utamuyoowi pe, nkaambo ndamwaaba mumaanza aako, walo abantu bakwe anyika yakwe. Ulamucitila mbubonya mbowakacitila Sihoni mwami waba-Amori iwakakede ku-Hesiboni.
Lino Jehova Leza wesu wakaaba mumaanza esu alakwe Ogi mwami wa-Basa na abantu bakwe boonse, nkabela twakamuzunda mane lumwi teetwakamusiila muntu naba omwe.
Nkabela twakatola minzi yakwe yoonse kuciindi eco nciconya katakwe munzi nuuba omwe ngutwatakatola-minzi iili makumi aali musanu alimwi, cisi coonse ca-Arigobi, bwami bwa-Ogi bwaku-Basana.
Eyi minzi yoonse yakali amabaya amilyango milamfu aminkulu, kutaamba minzi imwi iyatakajisi mabaya minji loko.
Nkabela twakabanyonyoona mbubonya mbutwakacitila Sihoni mwami wa-Hesiboni. Minzi yoonse buyo, baalumi abanakazi abana, twakabanyonyoona boonse.
Pele iŋombe, ambono zyoonse zyamuminzi, twakazisaala kuti zibe zyesu.
Mbuboobo mbutwakanyanzya nyika kuciindi eco kuzwa kumaanza aabami bobile babaAmori ibakali mutala lya-Jordano, kuzwa kukalonga ka-Arinoni kusikila kucilundu ca-Herimoni,
(Ba-Sidoni balaamba kuti Herimoni nguSirioni, aba-Amori balaamba kuti ngu-Seniri),
minzi yoonse yaatala, acisi coonse ca-Gileadi aca-Basana, kusikila ku-Saleka aku-Edrei, minzi yabwami bwa-Ogi bwaku-Basana.

(Nkaambo Ogi mwami wa-Basana nguwakasyaala alike akati kaba-Refai. Bulo bwakwe bwakali bulo bwabutale, Sa tabuboneki ku-Raba kucisi cabana ba-Amoni? Bulamfu bwabo bwakali tukokola tuli musanu atune, abwaamba bwabo bwakali tukokola tone, nkokuti cakupima akakokola kamuntu).
Acimwi cisela ca-Gileadi, acisi coonse ca-Ogi caku-Basana, nkokuti cisi coonse ca-Arigobi, ndakacipa cisela camusyobo wa-Manase. (Cisi eco ca-Basana cilaambwa kuti ncecisi cabaRefai.
Jairi mwana wa-Manase nguwakatola cisi coonse ca-Arigobi, nkokuti Basana, kusikila kumugaano waba-Gesuri awaba-Maakari, aboobo cisi cakaulikwa izina lya-Havoti-Jairi, mbocicaambwa asunu.)
Ndakapa Makiri cisi ca-Gileadi.
Aba-Rubeni aba-Gadi, ndakabapa nyika kuzwa ku-Gileadi kusikila kukalonga ka-Arinoni, (Mugaano wakali akatikati kakalonga), akusikila kukalonga ka-Jaboki, mugaano wabana ba-Amoni,
ayalo nyika ya-Araba, kusikila kumugaano waku-Jordano, kuzwa ku-Kineroti kusikila kulwizi lwaku-Araba, lwizi lwamunyo, kunsi lyaminkuni ya-Pisiga kujwe.
Pele banakazi banu abana banu aŋombe zyanu, (Ndizi kuti mulijisi iŋombe zinji), balasyaala muminzi yanu njindamupa,

mane Jehova akabape zilyokezezyo bana bakwanu, mbubonya mbwamupa kale, mane abalo bakavube nyika njabapa Jehova Leza wanu mutala lya-Jordano. Kwaba boobo, muyoopiluka umwi aumwi kulukono lwakwe ndondakamupa.
Alakwe Joshua ndakamulailila kuciindi eco, ndati, Meso aako abona zintu zyoonse Jehova Leza wako nzyaakacitila bami aba bobile. Jehova ulacita mbubonya obo kuzisi zyoonse zyamutala nkosi ye.
Mutabayoowi, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu nguumulwida.
O Mwami Jehova, watalika kunditendezya mebo ndemulanda wako bupati bwako abuyumu bwamaanza aako. Sa kuli Leza umbi, nekuba kujulu naaba ansi, uukonzya kucita milimo iigambya mbuli nduwe?
Sa inga ndazubuka kuyoobona nyika imbotu iili mutala lya-Jordano, eco cisi cibotu cazilundulundu, a-Lebano?
Pele Jehova wakandikalalila nkaambo kandinywe, aboobo takwakandiswiilila. Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Uleke kwaamba, Utandaambili limbi aya makani.
Tanta amutwe wacilundu ca-Pisiga, ukatambye meso aako kumbo akunyika akumusanza akujwe, ukaibone ameso aako, nkaambo tokooyoozubuka oyu mulonga wa-Jordano pe.
Pele lailila Joshua, umuyumyeyumye, abe singuzu nkaambo ngonguwe uuyoozubuka kunembo lyabantu aba, abavubye nyika njoyoobona.
Elyo katucikede kukuti kulangene a-Beti-peori.
Mutayungizizyi cintu nekuba kugwisya cintu, kumakani ngendamulailila, kuti mubambe malailile aa-Jehova Leza wanu ngemulailila.
Meso aanu alibwene ncaakacita Jehova ku-Baala-Peori, nkaambo bantu boonse akati kanu ibakatobela Baala waku-Peori, Jehova Leza wanu wakabanyonyoona;
pele nywebo nemwakakakatila kuli-Jehova Leza wanu mucili baumi asunu.
Amubone! Ndamwiiyisya milazyo ambeta, mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wangu mbwaakandilailila, kuti muzicite mukati kanyika njemuyoovuba.
Amuzibambe akuzicita, nkaambo kucita obo nkokuyooba busongo bwanu amaanu aanu akati kabamasi; nebayoomvwa milazyo eyi yoonse bayooamba kuti, Ncobeni oyu musyobo mupati mbantu basongo bacenjede.
Sa kuli musyobo umbi mupati uuli a-Leza uuli kufwaafwi mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wesu mbwali kufwaafwi kulindiswe kufumbwa ciindi netumwiita?
Alimwi sa kuli musyobo umbi mupati uuli amilazyo ambeta ziluleme mbuli milao eyi yoonse njendamubikila buzuba obuno?

Amubazibye makani aabuzuba obo nemwakaimvwi kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu ku-Horebu, Jehova naakandaambila kuti, Bunganya bantu kulindime kuti nkabamvwisye majwi aangu, baiye kundiyoowa mazuba oonse aakukala kwabo ansi ano, akwiiyisya bana babo.
Lino mwakaswena afwaafwi, mwaimikila munsi ecilundu, nkabela cilundu cakali kuyaka amulilo mane kusikila kujulu, alimwi cakalivumbidwe amudima amayoba aasia mbi.
Mpawo Jehova wakamwaambila kuzwa akati kamulilo. Mwakamvwa majwi aakwe, pele mutumba tamukuubwene pe, cita ijwi luzutu.
Wakamulwiida cizuminano cakwe ncaakamulailila kuti mucicite, nkokuti milao iili ikumi, nkabela wakailemba amabwe obile.
Ambebo Jehova wakandilailila kuciindi eco nciconya kuti mwiiyisye milazyo ambeta, muzicite munyika eyo yamutala njemuyoovuba.
Nkaambo kako mutabisyi kukulicitila cikozyano cibezedwe neciba comwe, cikozyano cili mbuli mwaalumi na mwanakazi,
cikozyano camunyama waansi, na cikozyano camuyuni uuli amababa aakuuluka kujulu,
na cikozyano cacintu ciyavula ansi, na cikozyano canswi iikala mumaanzi kutako lyalwizi.

Alimwi amucenjele kuti mutatambyi meso aanu kujulu kubona izuba amwezi anyenyeezi, nkokuti makamu oonse aakujulu, akukweelelwa nkuko kuti uzikotamine akuzimanina milimo, zintu Jehova Leza wanu nzyaabide kubantu bamisyobo yoonse yaansi.
Pele inywe, Jehova wamubweza, wamugwisya muceengelo cabutale, nkokuti mu-Egepita, kuti mumubede bantu bakukona, mbomubede asunu.
Alimwi Jehova wakandikalalila mebo nkaambo kanu, nkabela wakakonkezya kuti nsikazubuki Jordano, alimwi nsikanjili munyika imbotu Jehova Leza wanu njamupa kuti mwiikone.
Nkaambo mebo ndafwa munyika ino, nsikooyoozubuka Jordano pe. Inywe muyoozubuka, mukavube nyika eyo imbotu.
Amucenjele kuti mutalubi cizuminano ca-Jehova Leza wanu ncaakatangana anywebo, nekuba kulicitila cikozyano cibezedwe cacintu neciba comwe Jehova Leza wako ncaakakasya.
Nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu ngomulilo uusyukutya, Leza sibuzuba.

ndaita ijulu anyika buzuba obuno kuti zibe bakamboni bakuluula kuti ncobeni muyoofwambaana kunyonyooka munyika eyo yamutala lya-Jordano njemuyoovuba. Tamukooyoopona ciindi cilamfu mulinjiyo pe, muyoonyonyooka ncobeni.
Jehova uyoomumwaya akati kabamasi, mane mukabe kampolongondo muzisi ezyo Jehova nkwayoomutandila.
Oko muyookomba ba-Leza babumbidwe kumaanza aabantu, bazisamu abamabwe, batakonzya kubona nekuba kumvwa nekuba kulya nekuba kununkuzya.
Lino nkukonya oko muyooyandaula Jehova Leza wanu, nkabela muyoomujana na mwamuyandaula camoyo woonse acamuuya woonse.
Nemunooli mumapenzi, amakani aya oonse naayoomusikila, kumamanino aaciindi muyooboola kuli-Jehova Leza wanu akuswiilila ijwi lyakwe.
Nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu nguLeza siluzyalo, Takooyoomulekelezya nekuba kumunyonyoona nekuba kuluba cizuminano cakwe ncaakaakonkezya bamauso.
Sa nkobali bantu ibakamvwa ijwi lya-Leza ulaambaula abo mukati kamulilo, mbubonya mbumwakamvwa nywebo, akupona bacipona?

Na sa kuli Leza umbi iwakasoleka kuligwisizya musyobo wabantu akati kamusyobo umbi, azisunko azitondezyo amaleele ankondo, mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wanu mbwaakamucitila nywebo ku-Egepita kumeso aanu?
Aya makani mwakaatondezegwa kuti muzibe kuti Jehova ngu-Leza, taakwe umbi.
Wakamumvwisya ijwi lyakwe kujulu, kuti amwiiyisye, alimwi ansi wakamubonya mulilo wakwe uuyoosya, nkabela mwakamvwa majwi aakwe mukati kamulilo.
Wakayandisya bamauso; wakasala lunyungu lwabo; wakamupozya kuzwa mu-Egepita, kali anywebo anguzu impati,
kuti amutandile misyobo mi pati miyumu kwiinda ndinywe, kuti amunjizye munyika yabo, mwiivube, mbubonya mbukubede asunu.
Nkaambo kako muzibe buzuba obuno, akubika makani mumyoyo yanu, muzibe kuti Jehova ngu-Leza wakoonse koonse, kujulu aansi. Taakwe umbi pe.
Amubambe imbeta zyakwe amilazyo yakwe njendi mukumulailila buzuba obuno, kuti mukale kabotu, nywebo abana banu baciza, kuti muongole mumonya munyika Jehova Leza wanu njamupa kukabe kutamani.
kuti sikujaya muntu acijile nkuko, nkokuti muntu uujaya mweenzinyina cakutaziba katamusulide, kuti acijile muluumwi waminzi eyo, alifutule.
Wakasala Bezeri munkanda munyika yaatala yaba-Rubeni, a-Ramoti waku-Gileadi waba-Gadi, a-Goladni wamu-Basana waba-Manase.
Njeeyo milao Musa njaakabikila bana ba-Israyeli.
Ngemalailile amilazyo ambeta Musa nzyaakaambila bana ba-Israyeli kuciindi cakuzwa ku-Egepita,
mutala lya-Jordano, mukuti lilangene a-Beti-peori, munyika ya-Sihoni mwami waba-Amori iwakakede ku-Hesiboni, ngubakazunda ba-Musa abana ba-Israyeli kuciindi nibakazwa ku-Egepita.
Bakavuba nyika yakwe, ayalo nyika ya-Ogi mwami wa-Basana, bami bobile babaAmon ibakakede mutala lya-Jordano kubuzwezuba,
nyika yoonse kuzwa ku-Aroeri kunkomwe yakalonga ka-Arinoni kusikila kucilundu ca-Sirioni, nkokuti Herimoni,
antoomwe acisi coonse ca-Araba mutala lya-Jordano kubuzwezuba, mane kusikila kulwizi lwa-Araba, kunsi lyaminkuni ya-Pisiga.
Lino Musa wakaita ba-Israyeli boonse, wakabaambila kuti, Amuswiilile nuba-Israyeli eyi milao ambeta nzendi mukwaamba mumatwi aanu sunu, mukaziiye akuzibamba akuzicita.
Jehova Leza wesu wakatutanganya cizuminano mu-Horebu.
Teensi bamawiseesu Jehova mbaakatangana abo eci cizuminano, pe, wakatangana andiswe tubeni toonse notuli waano notucipona buzuba obuno.
Jehova wakaambaula anywe kumeso ameso kuzwa kucilundu mukati kamulilo.
(Nkabela mebo ndakaliimvwi akati ka-Jehova andinywe kuciindi eco nciconya, kuti mulwiide majwi aa-Jehova nkaambo mwakali kuyoowa mulilo, ncimwatakainkila kucilundu). Wakati,
Ndime Jehova Leza wako iwakakugwisya kucisi ca-Egepita kuzwa kuŋanda yabuzike.

Toelede kuzikotamina nekuba kuzimanina milimo, nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wako, ndi Leza sibuzuba. Ndabweedezya milandu yabamawisi kumitwe yabana mane kusikila kumuzukulu watatu awane wabaabo bandisulide,
pele ndabafwida luzyalo bantu bali zyuulu akati kabaabo bandiyanda akulondola milazyo yangu.
Mazuba aali musanu abumwi uleelede kubeleka akumana milimo yako yoonse.

Pele buzuba bwamusanu aabili mbuzuba bwa-Sabata bwa-Jehova Leza wako, Toelede kubeleka milimo abuniini, noba nduwe omwini naba mwana wako mulombe naba mwana wako musimbi naba muzike wako naba mulanda wako musimbi naha musune wako niiba imbongolo yako neziba iŋombe zyako zyoonse naba mweenzu uukala kulinduwe, kuti muzike wako amulanda wako musimbi balyokezye mbubonya mbuli nduwe.

Nkabela uleelede kwiingasila kuti yebo omwini koli muzike mucisi ca-Egepita, nkabela Jehova Leza wako wakakugwisya nkukonya oko ajanza lili anguzu akuboko kutandabede, nciceeco Jehova Leza wako ncaakakulailila kulemya buzuba bwa-Sabata.
Lino nemwakamvwa ijwi lizwa mumudima, cilundu kaciyaka, mwakaswena kulindime, nkokuti basilutwe boonse bamisyobo yanu abapati banu,

mwakati, Bona! Jehova Leza wesu watutondezya bulemu bwakwe abupati bwakwe, alimwi tulimvwide ijwi lyakwe lizwa mukati kamulilo. Sunu twabona kuti Leza ulakonzya kwaambaula amuntu, nekubaboobo ucipona.
Lino sa ncibotu kuti tufwe? Nkaambo oyu mulilo mupati ulatusyukutya. Na twamvwa ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wesu alimwi, tulafwa.
Sa kuli muntu naba omwe iwakamvwa ijwi lya-Leza muumi ulaamba kuzwa mukati kamulilo, mbutwamvwa swebo, nekubaboobo ucipona?
Swena kufwaafwi yebo, umvwe makani oonse Jehova Leza wesu ngasi ambe. Zintu zyoonse Jehova Leza wesu nzyasi kwaambile, utulwiide zyoonse, nkabela tulaziswiilila akuzicita.
Lino Jehova wakamvwa majwi aanu ngemwakandaambila, nkabela Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Ndamvwa majwi aabantu abo ngebaamba kulinduwe, Baamba kabotu.
Necili cibotu nebalijisi moyo uuli boobu lyoonse, moyo wakundiyoowa awakubamba milazyo yangu yoonse, kuti kube kabotu kulimbabo akubana babo lyoonse.
Koya, ukabaambile kuti, Amupiluke kuzilao zyanu.
Pele yebo, ima ano kulindime, nkwaambile milazyo yoonse amalailile oonse ambeta zyoonse nzyoelede kubaiyisya, kuti bazicite munyika eyo njendabavubya.
Lino amucenjele kuti mucite zintu zyoonse Jehova Leza wanu nzyamulailila. Mutaleyi, nekuba kululyo nekuba kulumwesi.
Amweende munzila zyoonse Jehova Leza wanu nzyaakamulailila, kuti mukale kabotu, moongole munyika yalukono lwanu.
Njeeyi milazyo amalailile ambeta Jehova Leza wanu njaakandilailila kumwiiyisya, kuti mwiicite munyika eyo yamutala njemuyoovuba,
kuti muyoowe Jehova Leza wanu, mubambe imbeta zyakwe zyoonse amilazyo yakwe yoonse njendamulailila, nywebo abana banu abana babana banu, mazuba oonse aabuumi bwanu, kuti muongole.
Amuswiilile makani, noba-Israyeli, mucenjele kuzicita, kuti mukale kabotu akuzyalisya, mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wabamauso mbwaakasyomezya, munyika eyo iikunka malili abuci.
Uleelede kuyandisya Jehova Leza wako amoyowako woonse, amuuya wako woonse, anguzu zyako zyoonse.
Nkabela aya majwi ngendamulailila buzuba obuno abe amyoyo yanu.
Muleelede kwaaiyisya bana banu, akwaambaula ngawo lyoonse, ciindi cakukala muŋanda aciindi cakweenda munzila, ciindi cakoona aciindi cakubuka.
Amwaange mbuli citondezyo kumaanza aanu ambuli ciibalusyo akati kameso aanu.
Amwaalembe azikunguzyo zyamaanda aanu akuzitendele zyanu.
kumaanda aazwide zintu zibotu ngemwatakazuzya, kuzikala zisidwe nzemwatakasya, kumyuunda yamasaansa ayamaolifa njemwatakabyala, lino nemuyoolya akukuta,
amucenjele kuti mutalubi Jehova iwakamugwisya munyika ya-Egepita amuŋanda yabuzike.
Amuyoowe Jehova Leza wanu, amumumanine milimo, amukonke muzina lyakwe.
Mutatobeli baleza bambi, baleza babamasi bamuzyungulukide,
nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu uukede akati kanu ngu-Leza sibuzuba; kuti bukali bwa-Jehova butamubukili, atamunyonyooni ansi.
Mutasunki Jehova Leza wanu, mbuli mbumwakamusunka ku-Masa.
Amucenjele loko kuti mubambe milazyo ya-Jehova Leza wanu, amilao yakwe, ambeta zyakwe nzyaakalailila.
Amucite ziluleme azibotu kumeso aa-Jehova, kuti mukale kabotu, munjile akuvuba nyika imbotu Jehova njaakasyomezya bamauso,
mutande basinkondonyoko boonse kubusyu bwanu, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba.
Lino mumazuba aaboola, bana banu nibayoomubuzya kuti, Nkutyeni milao amilazyo ambeta Jehova Leza wesu nzyaakatulailila?
muleelede kuvwiila bana banu kuti, Twakali bazike ba-Farao mucisi ca-Egepita, elyo Jehova wakatugwisya mu-Egepita ajanza ijumu.
Jehova wakacita zitondezyo amaleele, makani mapati aayoosya, mucisi ca-Egepita, kuli-Farao akuluzubo lwakwe loonse, mumeso esu.
Elyo wakatupozya nkukonya oko, kuti atunjizye akutupa nyika njaakasyomezya bamatateesu.
Nkaambo kako Jehova wakatulailila kubamba imbeta eti zyoonse, tuyoowe Jehova Leza wesu, kuti tukale kabotu mazuba conse, atuponye mbubonya mbuli sunu.
Bulaba bululami bwesu na twacenjela kucita eyi milao yoonse kunembo lya-Jehova Leza wesu, mbubonya mbwaakatulailila.
alimwi Jehova Leza wanu naayoobaaba mumaanza aanu kuti mubazunde, muleelede kubanyonyweda limwi. Mutatangani abo cizuminano nekuba kubafwida insoni.
Mutakwatani abo; mutapi bana babo balombe bana banu basimbi, nekuba kubweza bana babo basimbi kuti bakwatwe kubana banu balombe,
Nkaambo balalesya bana banu kunditobela, kuti bakombe mizimu imbi aboobo bukali bwaJehova bulamubukila nkabela ulafwambaana kumunyonyoona.
Pele mbuboobu mbumweelede kubacitila. Muleelede kumwaya zipaililo zyabo, kupwayaula malende aabo, kugonka minsemu yabo, akutenta zikozyano zyabo zibezedwe mumulilo.
Teensi kwaamba kuti Jehova wakamuyanda akumusala nkaambo kakuvula kwanu, pe, nkaambo kamutali banji, kamuli bace kwiinda misyobo yoonse.
Pele Jehova ulamuyandisya, alimwi ulazuzikizya cikonke ncaakakonkezya kuli bamauso; nciceeco Jehova ncaakamugwisya ajanza ijumu, ncaakamununwida muŋanda yabuzike, mumaanza aa-Farao mwami wa-Egepita.
Amuzibe kuti Jehova Leza wanu ngu-Leza uusyomeka, uubamba cizuminano cakwe aluzyalo lwakwe kulibaabo bamuyanda akubamba imbeta zyakwe, mane kusikila kumazyalani aali cuulu,
pele abo bamusulide, ulabapilusizya milandu yabo antangalala akubanyonyoona, Takonzyi kumuka kuliya inkoto kuliyooyo uumusula, ulamupilusizya milandu yakwe antangalala.
Nkaambo kako amucenjele kubamba milazyo amalailile ambeta nzendamulailila buzuba obuno.

Uyoomuyandisya, uyoomulongezya, uyoomuvuzya. Uyoolongezya mazyalilo aanu amicelo yamunyika yanu, maila aanu amisaansa yanu amafuta aanu, bana baŋombe zyanu abana bambelele zyanu, mpoonya awo anyika njaakakonkezya kulibamauso kumupa.
Muyoojana coolwe kwiinda bantu boonse. Takukooyooba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi uutazyali akati kanu naaba akati kaŋombe zyanu.
Alimwi Jehova uyootantamuna malwazi oonse kulindinywe; takooyoomubikila malwazi mabi oonse aaku-Egepita ngemubwene pe, uyooawaala kulibaabo bamusulide.
Lino muleelede kunyonyoona bamasi boonse Jehova Leza wanu mbaaba mumaanza aanu. Meso aanu atabafwidi insoni pe, alimwi mutakombi baleza babo, nkaambo kucita obo kuyoomubeda ŋunzuunzu.
Mutabayoowi pe. Ncobeni muleelede kwiingasila Jehova Leza wanu ncaakacitila Farao aba-Egepita boonse,

masunko mapati ngemwakabona ameso aanu, zitondezyo amaleele, ijanza ijumu akuboko kutandabede, zyoonse Jehova Leza wanu nzyaakabelesya kukumupozya, Jehova Leza wanu ulacita mbubonya obo kulibamasi boonse mbemuyoowa.
Jehova Leza wanu uyootuma manko akati kabo, mane lumwi boonse basyeede aboonse bayubide bamaninine.
Mutabayoowi pe, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu uli akati kanu, Leza mupati uuyoosya.
Jehova Leza wanu uyookukulula bamasi abo kunembo lyanu buniini buniini. Tamukonzyi kufwambaana kubamanisya pe, kuti banyama bamusokwe batamuvulili.
Jehova Leza wanu ulabaaba kunembo lyanu, ulabapyopyonganya alupyopyongano lupati mane abanyonyoone.
Abalo bami babo ulabaaba mumaanza aanu, nkabela muyoonyonyoona izina lyabo ansi ano. Takukooyooba muntu naba omwe uukonzya kulitabilila kulindinywe mane ukabanyonyoone.
Zikozyano zibezedwe zyabaleza babo muyoozitenta mumulilo. Muteemuzyi insiliva niiba ingolida iili alinzizyo, mutaitoli pe, kuti itamuleteli iŋunzuunzu, nkaambo ncisesemyo kuli-Jehova Leza wanu.
Mutaniizyi cisesemyo mumaanda aanu, kuti mutabi cintu cisampukide mbuli ncico. Ncobeni muleelede kucisesemwa akuvundaukwa kulincico, nkaambo cilisampukide.
Malailile oonse ngendamulailila buzuba obuno, amucenjele kuti mwaabambe, kuti mupone akuzyalisya akuyoovuba nyika Jehova njaakakonke­ zya kulibamauso.

Mutalubi inzila yoonse Jehova Leza wanu njaakamweenzya, myaka eyi iili makumi one, munkanda, kuti amubombye, amusunke, azibe makani aali mumyoyo yanu, na inga mulakonzya kubamba malailile aakwe na pe.
Wakamubombya, wamujazya inzala, wamusanizya mana, cilyo ncimwatakezi nywebo nibaba bamauso, kuti amuzibye kuti teensi insimi ilike iiponya muntu; muntu ulapona kumajwi oonse aazwa mumulomo wa-Jehova.
Zyakusama zyanu teezyakazakaala, amaulu aanu taakwakazimba, myaka eyi yoonse iili makumi one.
Lino amuzibe mumyoyo yanu kuti, mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwatambisya mwanaakwe, Jehova Leza wanu ulamutambisya anywebo.
Amubambe milazyo ya-Jehova Leza wanu, amweende munzila zyakwe akumuyoowa.
Nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu ulamusisya kunyika imbotu, nyika yatulonga twamaanzi, nyika yatusensa amatoolo, maanzi mwaazwa akati kamakuti aazilundu,
nyika yabulotwe abbaale, yamasaansa amakuyu amapomegranite, nyika yamaolifa aali amafuta, abuci,
nyika nkomukonzya kulya cakukuta, nkomutakonzyi kubula cintu, nyika iili amabwe aabutale, azilundu nkomukonzya kusya mukuba.
Lino muyoolya akukuta, akulongezya Jehova Leza wanu nkaambo kanyika imbotu njamupa.
Ambweni mwalya cakukuta akuyaka maanda mabotu akukala mulingao,
aŋombe zyanu ambelele zyanu zyavula, ayalo insiliva angolida zyamuvulila, ambono zyanu zyoonse zyavula,
elyo myoyo yanu iyoolisumpula, aboobo muyooluba Jehova Leza wanu iwakamugwisya munyika ya-Egepita amuŋanda yabuzike,
iwakamweenzya munkanda impati iiyoosya, mwakali inzoka inkali atubanze anyika yacimpayuma iitaakwe maanzi, iwakamugwisizya maanzi mundomba ijumu,
iwakamusanizya mana omo munkanda, cilyo bamauso neebatakezi, kuti amubombye, amusunke, akumucitila kabotu kumamanino.
Amucenjele kuti mutaambi mumyoyo yanu kuti, Inguzu zyangu abuyumu bwajanza lyangu nzezyakandileletela buvubi obu.
Amwiingasile Jehova Leza wanu, nkaambo ngonguwe uumupa inguzu zyakuletya buvubi, kuti azuzikizye cizuminano cakwe ncaakakonkezya kuli bamauso, mbukubede asunu.
Ncobeni na mwaluba Jehova Leza wanu, na mwatobela baleza bambi akubamanina milimo akubakotamina, ndamucenjezya loko buzuba obuno kuti kasimpe muyoonyonyooka.
Muyoonyonyooka anywebo mbubonya mbuli bamasi Jehova mbanyonyoona kunembo lyanu, nkaambo kakutaswiilila ijwi lya­-Jehova Leza wanu.
bantu bapati balamfu, bana ba-Anaki, Mulibabwene. Mulimvwide kasimpi kaamba kuti, Ino ngwani uukonzya kulwisya bana ba-Anaki.

Lino amuzibe buzuba obuno kuti oyo uumuzulwida kuya mutala ngu-Jehova Leza wanu, mulilo uusyukutya. Ulabanyonyoona akubabombya kunembo lyanu, aboobo muyoofwambaana kubatanda akubanyonyoona, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamwaambila.

Teensi kaambo kabululami bwanu nanka kubota kwamyoyo yanu neemwazida kuzoovuba nyika yabo pe; nkaambo kabubi bwabantu aba Jehova ncaabatandila kubusyu bwanu, akukuzuzikizya majwi aakwe Jehova ngaakakonkezya bamauso, Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo.
Amuzibe kuti teensi kaambo kabululami bwanu Jehova Leza wanu ncamupeda nyika eyi imbotu kuti mwiivube, pe, nkaambo muli bantu bayumumyoyo.
Amuyeeye! Mutalubi mbumwakakalazya Jehova Leza wanu munkanda. Kuzwa kubuzuba obo nemwakazwa munyika ya-Egepita mane mwakasika kubusena obuno, mwali kupapila Jehova.
Aku-Horebu mwakakalazya Jehova, nkabela Jehova wakamunyemena, kayanda kumunyonyoona.

Ciindi eciya nendakatanta mucilundu kuyootambula mabwe aamilao, mabwe aacizuminano Jehova ncaakatangana anywe, ndakakala mpoonya awo acilundu mazuba aali makumi ono, isikati amasiku, Teendakalya insima na kunywa maanzi, pe.
Elyo Jehova Leza wakandipa mabwe obile, aakalembedwe amunwe wakwe. Alingao akalilembedwe majwi oonse Jehova ngaakamwaambila kucilundu kuzwa mukati kamulilo kubuzuba bwambungano.
Naakamana mazuba aali makumi one, isikati amasiku, Jehova wakandipa mabwe ayo obile, mabwe aacizuminano.
Elyo Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Nyampuka, ufwambaane kuseluka, nkaambo bantu bako mbowakagwisya munyika ya-Egepita babisya. Bafwambaana kuleya munzila njendabalailila, balicitila cikozyano cifulidwe.
Undileke, mbanyonyoone akuziminganya izina lyabo ansi, lino njoocita kuti yebo ube musyobo mupati uuli anguzu kwiinda mbabo.
Mpawo ndakapiluka, ndaseluka kuzwa kucilundu, cilundu kaciyaka mulilo, aalo mabwe obile aacizuminano akali mumaanzanza aangu.
Elyo ndakalanga, ndabona kuti ncobeni mwabisizya Jehova Leza wanu, mwalicitila moombe uufulidwe, mwafwaambana kuleya munzila Jehova njaakamulailila.
Mpawo ndakabweza ayo mabwe obile, ndaasowa kuzwa mumaanza aangu, ndaapwayaula mumeso aanu.

Nkabela ndakavundama kubusyu bwa-Jehova, mbubonya mbuli kumatalikilo, mazuba aali makumi one, isikati amasiku; teendakali kulya insima nekuba kunywa maanzi, nkaambo kazibi zyanu zyoonse nzemwakacita kumeso aa-Jehova kukumukalazya.
Ndakali kuyoowa bukali buyoosya Jehova mbwaakamukalalila­, bukali bwakati munyonyoone. Pele Jehova wakandiswiilila ciindi eco acalo.
Alakwe Aroni, Jehova wakamukalalila loko, wakati munyonyoone, pele ndakakombela Aroni alakwe kuciindi eco nciconya.
