Lino cibi canu, nkokuti moombe ngomwakabumbide, ndakacibweza, ndakacitenta mumulilo. Ndakacipwayaula akuciziya mane cakaba mbuli lusuko, alusuko lwaco ndakalusowa mukalonga keenda kuzwa kucilundu.
Alimwi Jehova naakamutuma kuzwa ku-Kadesi Barinea, naakaamba kuti, Kamuya mukaivube nyika njendamupa, mwakapapila mulazyo wa-Jehova Leza wanu, mwakakaka kumusyoma akuswiilila ijwi lyakwe.
Lyoonse mwakali kupapila, kuzwa kubuzuba obo nendakataanguna kumuziba.
Ndakavundama kubusyu bwa-Jehova mazuba aali makumi one, isikati amasiku, Ndakavundama nkaambo kajwi lya-Jehova lyakumunyonyoona.
Ndakakomba kuli-Jehova ndati, O Mwami Jehova, utanyonyooni bantu bako alukono lwako, bantu mbonunwide mubulemu bwako, mbowakagwisya mucisi ca-Egepita ajanza ijumu.
Ibaluka balanda bako, Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo, Utabiki moyo wako kubuyumu bwabantu aba, kukubisya kwabo akububi bwabo,
kuti bantu bacisi eco nkutwakazwa bataambi kuti, Jehova wakakacilwa kunjizya bantu abo munyika njaakaamba, alimwi wakabasula, aboobo wakabagwisya kuti abajaye munkanda.
Sa tabeensi bantu bako alukono lwako, bantu mbowakagwisya anguzu zyako zigambya akuboko kwako kutandabede.
Nkabela njoolemba amabwe ayo majwi aakalembedwe amabwe mataanzi ngowakapwaya, lino uleelede kwa abika mukati kabbokesi.
Mpawo ndakabeza ibbokesi lyamuunga, alimwi ndakabeza mabwe obile mbubonya mbuli mataanzi, nkabela ndakatanta acilundu nkejisi mabwe ayo obile mujanza lyangu.
Lino wakalemba amabwe ayo mbubonya mbuli malembo mataanzi, nkokuti milao iili ikumi Jehova njaakamwaambila kucilundu kuzwa mukati kamulilo mubuzuba bwambungano. Jehova wakandipa njiyo.
Elyo ndakafutatuka, ndaseluka kuzwa kucilundu, ndabika mabwe mubbokesi ndendakapangide, mwaacibede, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakandaambila.
Kuzwa oko bakalongela ku-Gudigoda, akuzwa ku-Gudigoda bakalongela ku-Jotibata, kunyika yatulongalonga twamaanzi.
Kuciindi eco Jehova wakapambula musyobo wa-Levi kuti bayumune ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova, baimikane kubusyu bwa-Jehova kumumanina milimo akulongezya muzina lyakwe, mane kusikila sunu.
Nkaambo kako ba-Levi teebakapegwa caabilo na lukono akati kababunyina. Jehova ndolukono lwabo, mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wanu mbwaakabaambila).
Lino Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Nyampuka, uzulwide bantu, kuti banjile akuvuba nyika njendakakonkezya bamawisi kubapa.
akubamba milazyo ya-Jehova ambeta zyakwe nzendamulailila buzuba obuno cakumugwasya?
Amubone! Zintu zyoonse nzizya-Jehova Leza wanu: ijulu ajulu loko, nyika azintu zyoonse zili mulinjiyo.
Pele Jehova wakakondwa bamauso, wabayandisya, wasala lunyungu lwabo, nkokuti nywebo, kwiinda misyobo yoonse, mbuli sunu.
Lino amupalule lulomo lwamyoyo yanu, mutayumyi myoyo yanu limbi.
Nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu ngu-Leza wabaleza, mwami wabami, Leza mupati singuzu uuyoosya, uutalangi ziimo zyabantu, uutatambuli makulo.
Ulabeteka kabotu makani aabamucaala abamukabafu, Ulayandisya beenzu akubaabila zilyo azyakusama.
Amuyandisye beenzu, nkaambo anywebo mwakali beenzu mucisi ca-Egepita.
Amuyoowe Jehova Leza wanu, amumumanine milimo, amukakatile kulinguwe, amukonke muzina lyakwe.
Ngonguwe intembauzyo yanu, ngu-Leza wanu, nguwakamucitila zintu ezi zipati ziyoosya nzyaabwene meso aanu.
Bamauso nibakainka ku-Bgepita bakali bantu bali makumi aali musanu aabili, pele sunu Jehova Leza wanu wamuvuzya mbuli inyenyeezi zyakujulu.
Amuzibe buzuba obuno kuti teensi bana banu mbendaambila, batanaziba nanka kubona lutambisyo lwa-Jehova Leza wanu, bupati bwakwe ajanza lyakwe ijumu akuboko kwakwe kutandabikidwe,
azitondezyo zyakwe amilimo yakwe njaakacita akati kaba-Egepita kuli-Farao akunyika yakwe yoonse,
ancaakacitila impi yaba-Egepita, imbizi zyabo ankalaki zyabo, mbwaakabatozya maanzi aa-Lwizi Lusalala ciindi eco nibakali kumutobela, a-Jehova mbwaakabanyonyoona kusikila asunu,
ancaakamucitila munkanda mane lumwi mwazoosika ano,
ancaakacitila Datani a-Abiramu bana ba-Eliabu mwana wa-Rubeni, nyika mbuyakaasama akubamena, antoomwe amaanda aabo azilao zyabo abaumi boonse mbebakajisi, akati kabana ba-Israyeli.
Nywebo meso aanu alibwene milimo yoonse mipati ya-Jehova njaakacita.
kuti muongole mpoonya awo anyika Jehova njaakakonkezya kupa bamauso alunyungu lwabo, nyika iikunka malili abuci.
Nkaambo nyika eyo njemuyoovuba tiili mbuli nyika ya-Egepira nkumwakazwa, nkumwakali kubyala imbuto zyanu akuzitilaizya amaulu aanu mbuli muunda wazisyu.
Nyika yamutala niimuyoovuba ni nyika yazilundu amakuti, iiwidwa imvula yakujulu,
nyika Jehova Leza wanu njabamba kabotu; meso aa-Jehova Leza wanu ali alinjiyo lvoonse kuzwa kumatalikilo aamwaka kusikila kumamanino aamwaka.
uyoowisya imvula kunyika yanu kuciindi ceelede, imvula yakutanga amvula yamiyoba, kuti mutebule maila aanu amasaansa aanu amafuta aanu.
Alimwi uyoomupa mani aakucezya iŋombe zyanu mumyuunda yanu, nkabela muyoolya akukuta.
Amucenjele kuti myoyo yanu itaongelezegwi, mutaleyi, mutamanini baleza bambi milimo nikuba kubakotamina,
kuti bukali bwa-Jehova butamubukili, atajali ijulu akukasya imvula kuwa, aboobo nyika ilaleka kuzyala micelo, mulafwambaana kunyonyooka anyika imbotu Jehova njamupa.
Alimwi amwaaiyisye bana banu, amwaambaule ciindi cakukala muŋanda aciindi cakweenda munzila, ciindi cakulala aciindi cakubuka.
Amwaalembe azikunguzyo zyamaanda aanu akuzitendele zyanu
kuti muongole, abalo bana banu baongole, munyika eyo Jehova Leza wanu njaakakonkezya kuba pa, ciindi coonse ijulu nilicibede atala lyanyika.
Nkaambo na mwabika myoyo yanu kumilao eyi njendamulailila kuti mwiicite, na mwayandisya Jehova Leza wanu, na mweenda munzi la zyakwe zyoense akukakarila kulinguwe,
Jehova ulatanda misyobo eyi yoonse kunembo lyanu, nkabeia muyoovuba nyika yamisyobo mipati iili anguzu kwiinda ndinywe.
Kufumbwa antu mpaalyata maulu aanu ayooba nyika yanu, kuzwa kunkanda kusikila ku-Lebano, akuzwa kumulonga wa-Firate kusikila kulwizi lwakumbo, koonse koonse ciyooba cisi canu.
Takukooyooba muntu naba omwe uukonzya kumulwisya, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu uyoocita kuti bantu banyika yoonse nkumuyooinda bayoowe akukankama kubusyu bwanu, mbubonya mbwaakamwaambila.
nkokuti lulongezyo na mwaswiilila milazyo ya-Jehova Leza wanu njendamulailila buzuba obuno,
alutuko na mwakaka kuswiilila milazyo ya-Jehova Leza wanu, na mwaleya kuzwa munzi la njendamulailila buzuba obuno akuya butobela baleza bambi mbemutana kuziba.
Lino Jehova Leza wanu naayoomunjizya munyika njemuyoovuba, amubike lulongezyo kucilundu ca-Gerizimu alutuko kucilundu ca-Ebala.
Sa tazili mutala lya-Jordano, kumbo lyanzila, kumabbililo aazuba, munyika yaba-Kanana bakede muAraba, kubambene a-Giligala, kumbali lyamubanga wa-More?
Nkaambo mulazubuka Jordano kuyoovuba nyika njamupa Jehova Leza wanu. Lino nemuyooivuba akukala mulinjiyo,
amucenjele kuti mubambe milazyo yoonse ambeta zyoonse nzendamubikila buzuba obuno.
Ncobeni muleelede kunyonyoona masena oonse bamasi mbomutanda nkubakali kukomba mizimu yabo, atala amalundu malamfu akuzilundulundu amuzyeenzule zyamisamu yoonse mitete.

Muleelede kumwaya zipaililo zyabo akutyolaula minsemu yabo; zikozyano zyabo zya-Asera muleelede kuzitenta mumulilo, azikozvano zibezedwe zyabaleza babo muleelede kuzirema, mane mumanisye kujaya izina lyabo omo mucisi.
Teensi obo mbumweelede kucitila Jehova Leza wanu pe.
Kubusena Jehova Leza wanu mbwasala akati kamisyobo yanu yoonse kuti abike izina lyakwe nkuko akwiimika cilao cakwe nkuko, amumuyandawide nkuko.
Nkomweelede kuleta zipaizyo zyanu azituuzyo zyanu, zipanzi zyanu zyakumi azituuzyo nzemuleta, zikonkezyo zyanu azilumbyo zyanu, abana bataanzi baŋombe zyanu ambelele zyanu.
Nkonkuko nkumunooyoolida kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu, akusekelela, inywe abasiŋanda banu boonse, mumilimo yoonse yamaanza aanu Jehova Leza wanu njamupa coolwe mulinjiyo.
Tamukooyoocita mbutucita okuno ciindi ecino, muntu umwi aumwi nkwacita kufumbwa cintu ciluleme mumeso aakwe,
nkaambo tamuna kusika kucilyokezezyo akulukono Jehova Leza wanu ndwamupa.
Pele mwazubuka Jordano, akukala munyika Jehova Leza wanu njayoomukonya, aumuzya basinkondonyoko boonse beengelede kuti mukale cakulyokezya acakuliiba,

lino kuciindi eco, kufumbwa antu Jehova Leza wanu mpasala kuti akalike izina lyakwe mpawo, nkonkuko nkomweelede kuleta zintu zyoonse nzendamulailila: zipaizyo zyanu zyakutenta azituuzyo zyanu, zipanzi zyanu zyakumi azipo zyanu, azipaizyo zyazikonkezyo zyanu nzemukonka kuli-Jehova.
Nkabela muyoosekelela kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu, nywebo abana banu balombe abasimbi, balanda banu baalumi abanakazi, aba-Levi bakede akati kanu, nkaambo tabajisi caabilo neluba lukono akati kanu.
Cenjela kuti utapaizyi zipaizyo zyako kufumbwa antu mpobona.
Luzutu antu mpasala Leza akati kamisyobo yanu, nkonkuko nkomweelede kutuula zipaizyo zyanu akucita zintu zyoonse nzendamulailila.
Pele bulowa, mutabulyi pe, amubutile ansi mbuli maanzi.

Alimwi tamweelede kulya kuminzi yanu cipanzi cakumi camaila aanu na cawaini na camafuta, nanka bana bataanzi baŋombe zyanu na bambelele zyanu, nanka zipo zyanu zyazikonkyo nzimukonka na zipo zyanu zyamoyo na zituuzyo nzemuleta.

Ezi zyoonse zileelede kuligwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu mubusena obo mbwasala Jehova Leza wanu, Amuzilye, nywebo abana banu balombe abasimbi, abalanda banu baalumi abanakazi, aba-Levi bakede akati kanu, kuti musekelele kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu mumilimo yoonse yamaanza aanu.
Amucenjele kuti mutalubi ba-Levi mazuba oonse aakupona kwanu munyika yanu.

Na kwalampa kubusena obo Jehova Leza wanu mbwasala kubika izina lyakwe nku ko, mbubo, amujaye iŋombe zyanu na imbelele zyanu, nzyaakamupa Jehova mbubonya mbundamulailila, mulye muminzi yanu kufumbwa nyama njemuyanda.
Amwiilye mbubonya mbomulya nyama yabakonze na yansya. Basofweede abasalala, boonse buyo bailye.
Pele amucenjele loko kuti mutalyi bulowa, nkaambo bulowa mbobuumi, nkabela tamweelede kulya buumi antoomwe anyama.
Mutabulyi pe, amubutile ansi mbuli maanzi.
Mutabulyi, kuti mukale kabotu, nywebo abana banu mbemuyoozyala, na mwacita ciluleme mumeso aa-Jehova.
Pele zintu zyako zisalalisya nzojisi azipo zyazikonke zyako, muleelede kuzitolelela kubusena obo Jehova mbwayoosala,
mukatuule zipaizyo zyanu zyakutenta, nyama abulowa boonse, acipaililo ca-Jehova Leza wanu. Bulowa bwazipaizyo zyanu zitilwe acipaililo ca-Jehova Leza wanu, pele nyama mwiilye.
Amucenjele, muswiilile majwi aya oonse ngendamulailila, kuti mukale kabotu, nywebo abana banu mbemuyoozyala, ciindi coonse, na mwacita zintu ziluleme azintu zibotu mumeso aa-Jehova Leza wanu.

amucenjele kuti mutaongelezegwi kutobela ziyanza zyabo, nebayoomana kunyonyoonwa kunembo lyanu. Amucenjele kuti mutabuzyi-buzyi makani aabaleza babo cakwaamba kuti, Ino abo bamasi bakali kukomba buti baleza babo, atucite aswebo mbubonya obo.
Mutacitili Jehova Leza wanu obo, nkaambo bacitila baleza babo milimo yoonse iisesemya niasulide Jehova. Abana babo balombe abasimbi, balabatentela baleza babo.
nekuba kuti citondezyo na maleele ngaamba aba ncobeni, naamba kuti, Katuya tuka to bele baleza bambi (baleza mbotezi) akubamanina milimo,
mutaswiilili majwi aamusinsimi oyo na siziloto oyo pe, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu ulamusunka, kuti azibe na mulayandisya Jehova Leza wanu camoyo woonse acamuuya woonse.
Jehova Leza wanu ngomweelede kutobela, ngomweelede kuyoowa; milazyo yakwe muleelede kwiibamba, ijwi lyakwe muleelede kulilemeka; muleelede kumumanina milimo akukakatila kulinguwe.

Pele oyo musinsimi na siziloto uleelede kujayigwa, nkaambo waamba majwi aakumuleesya kuli-Jehova Leza wanu iwakamupozya munyika ya-Egepita akumuvuna muŋanda yabuzike; wasoleka kumugwisya munzila Jehova Leza wanu njaakamulailila kuti mweende mulinjiyo. Aboobo mulamanisya bubi akati kanu.
baleza babamasi babambene anywebo, nebaba bali kufwaafwi nebaba bali kule, kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika kusikila kumagolelo amwi,
utazumini nanka kuswiilila pe. Utamufwidi insoni nekuba kumufwida luzyalo nekuba kumusisa.
Ncobeni uleelede kujayigwa. Ijanza lyako omwini litaangune kumuuma, amaanza aabantu bamwi boonse batobele.
Afuswe mabwe, afwe, nkaambo wakali kusoleka kumuleesya kuli-Jehova Leza wanu iwakamupozya munyika ya-Egepita amuŋanda yabuzike.
Ba-Israyeli boonse bamvwe, bayoowe, bataciti limbi bubi buli boobo akati kanu.
bamwi bantu bana ba-Saatani nkobali akati kanu, boongelezya bantu bamunzi wabo cakwaamba kuti, Katuya tukakombe baleza bambi, baleza mbemutezi,
muleelede kulingula makani akubuzya-buzya kabotu kabotu. Lino na kwabonwa kuti ncakasimpe, nkokuti na cintu cisesemya cili boobu cacitwa ncobeni akati kanu,
muleelede kujaya bantu bamunzi oyo apanga. Munzi woonse aboonse bali mulinguwo aŋombe zyawo, amuzinyonyoone zyoonse apanga.

Nkabela imbono zyawo, amuzibungike mukati kamugwagwa, mutente munzi woonse ambono zyawo, zibe cituuzyo citentelwa Jehova Leza wanu. Lino oyo munzi uyooba citantaala camafwisila lyoonse, tuukooyooyakululwa limbi pe.

Kutabi cintu niciba comwe akati kazintu ezyo zirondwa cisyeede mumaanza aanu, pe, kuti Jehova aleke bukali bwakwe buyoosya, amuusile insoni akumufwida luzyalo, amuvuzye mbubonya mbwaakakonkezya kulibamauso,
nimuyooswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu, kukubamba malailile aakwe oonse ngendamulailila buzuba obuno, akukucita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova Leza wanu.
Nkaambo muli bantu basalalisya kuli-Jehova Leza wanu. Jehova wamusala kuzwa kumisyobo yoonse iili ansi ano kuti mube musyobo wakwe uuyandika.
Banyama baligwa mbaaba: iŋombe, imbelele, impongo,
insya, konze, lubondwe, nanja, injelele, lweengu, amunyumbwe.
Kufumbwa munyama uujisi insumba zyaanzeene zyaandeene, alimwi ulaselula, nguuligwa.

Nekubaboobo akati kabaabo bajisi insumba zyaanzeene zyaandeene abaabo baselula nkubali bamwi bataligwa. Inkamele, asulwe acibila-aba balaselula pele tabajisi insumba zyaanzeene zyaandeene, aboobo balatondwa.
Ayalo ingulube, ilijisi insumba zyaanzeene zyaandeene, pele tiiseluli, aboobo ilatondwa, Nyama yabaabo tiiligwi, amitunta yabo tamweelede kwiiguma.
Alimwi nzeezi ziligwa akati kazintu zikala mumaanzi: kufumbwa cintu cijisi tuyambyo amaamba cilaligwa.
Pele kufumbwa cintu citajisi tuyambyo amaamba taciligwi pe, cilatondwa.
Bayuni boonse basalala balaligwa.
Pele bayuni batondwa bataligwa mbaaba: cuungwe, ikubi, syaatongo,
lubanze, ababimbe bamisyobo misyobo,
cikwangala abeenzinyina,
impowani, sikolyo, nyengenge, basikakonze bamisyobo misyobo,
tumba, siyaswimuumba, kakukubwi,
sifundwe, sikwaze, sikabaandwa,
itongola, inkolekole abeenzinyina, iŋangayabayuni, asimudima.
Abalo bauka bauluka batondwa kulindinywe, tabaligwi pe.
Pele boonse basalala bauluka amubalye.
Mutajiki mwana wampongo mumukupa wabanyina.

Lino kubusena obo mbwayoosala Jehova Leza wanu kuti akazike izina lyakwe nkuko, nkukonya oko nkomweelede kulida kubusyu bwakwe, nkokuti kulya cipanzi cakumi camaila aanu acamisaansa yanu acamafuta aanu, abana bataanzi baŋombe zyanu abambelele zyanu, kuti mwiiye kulemeka Jehova Leza wanu mazuba oonse.
Pele na musinzo walampa, ikuti nkule kubusena mbwasala Jehova Leza wanu kuti abike izina lyakwe nkuko, aboobo tamukonzyi kubweza cipanzi cakumi, Jehova Leza wanu naamupa coolwe,
amucuuzye mali, mubweze mali muzikwama zyanu, muye ao kubusena mbwasala Jehova Leza wanu.

Mwasika amuule amali kufumbwa cintu myoyo yanu nciiyanda, neziba iŋombe neziba imbelele naba waini neziba zyakunywa neciba cintu cili buti ndiyanda myoyo yanu, mukalye nkukonya oko kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu, musekelele, nywebo abasiŋanda banu.
Abalo ba-Levi bali akati kanu, mutabalubi pe, nkaambo tabajisi caabilo neluba lukono akati kanu.

elyo kulaboola ba-Levi batajisi caabilo neluba lukono akati kanu, abeenzu abamucaala abamukabafu bali muminzi yanu, balye akukuta, kuti Jehova Leza wanu amupe coolwe mumilimo yoonse yamaanza aanu njemucita.
Ndoolu lwaangunuko. Kufumbwa muntu sikukolotelwa alekelele mweenzinyina ncaakamukolotya, Atasesi mweenzinyina na sikamukowanyina, pe, nkaambo lwaangunuko lwa-Jehova lwasika.
Kumuzwakule ulakonzya kusesa, pele kufumbwa cintu cako cili mumaanza aamunyoko, ucileke buyo.
Pele takukooyooba batengwana akati kanu, (nkaambo Jehova ulamupa coolwe munyika eyo Jehova Leza wanu njamupa kuti mwiikone),
na mwaswiililisya ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu kukucenjela kubamba malailile aya oonse ngendamulailila buzuba obuno,
Nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu uyoomupa coolwe, mbubonya mbwaakamusyomezya, aboobo muyookolotya bamasi banji, pele nywebo tamukooyookolota; muyooendelezya zisi zinji, pele tabakooyoomweendelezya pe.
Ncobeni muleelede kwaangununa maanza aanu kubacete akubakolotya coonse ncebayanda, kufumbwa ceelede.

Amucenjele kuti mutabi miyeeyo ya-Sataani mumyoyo yanu, Mutaambi kuti, Mwaka wamusanu aibili, mwaka walwaangunuko, uli afwaafwi, Mutafwi mulibu, mutakaki kupa beenzinyoko bacete cintu. Na mwacita obo, ambweni balakwiilila Jehova nkaambo kanu, aboobo uyooba amulandu.
Ncobeni muleelede kubapa, alimwi myoyo yanu tiielede kupa bufutete pe, nkaambo kakuti makani aya ngengao Jehova Leza wanu ngayoomupeda coolwe mumilimo yanu yoonse amuzintu zyoonse nzemucita.
Nkaambo bacete tabakooyoomana munyika, aboobo ndamulailila kuti ncobeni muleelede kwaangununa maanza aanu kubana bakwanu bacete abapengede munyika yanu.
Nkabela kuciindi cakwaangunuka kwakwe toelede kumuleka acinkwamaanza, pe,
uleelede kumufonkweda imbelele zyako amaila aako amasaansa aako, Mbuli Jehova Leza wako mbwakupa coolwe, umupe ayebo mbubonya.
Mutalubi kuti anywebo mwakali bazike munyika ya-Egepita, nkabela Jehova Leza wanu wakamunununa. Nciceeco ncindamulailila obo sunu.
Pele na oyo muntu waamba kuti, Nsikooyookusia, nkaambo ulayandisya basiŋanda bako, alimwi ulikede kabotu kulinduwe,
bweza insunda, udonkole kutwi kwakwe cakusyanikizya acitendele, elyo ulaba muzike wako lyoonse. Amulanda wako musimbi alakwe acitilwe mbubonya obo.

Citabi cintu ciyumu mumeso aako kumwaangununa, pe, nkaambo wakubelekela milimo myaka iili musanu aumwi, alimwi milimo yakwe waibbadela cisela buyo camali aamilimo yamulanda uuvola mali. Aboobo Jehova Leza wanu ulamupa coolwe mumilimo yoonse njemucita.
Amubalye, nywebo abasiŋanda banu, mwaka umwi aumwi, kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu, kubusena Jehova mbwayoosala.
Pele na munyama uli akampenda, na mulema na moofu na ulijisi kampenda kamwi kali boobo, mutamupaizyi kuli-Jehova Leza wanu.
Amubalye kumaanda aanu. Basofweede abasalala boonse buyo balye, mbubonya mbwiiligwa nyama yakonze ayansya.
Pele bulowa mutabulyi; amubutile buyo ansi mbuli maanzi.
Amutuulile Jehova Leza wanu cipaizyo ca-Pasika, niiba imbelele niiba iŋombe, kubusena obo Jehova mbwayoosala kuti akazike izina lyakwe nkuko.

Mutalyi cinkwa cili abumena antoomwe ancico; mazuba aali musanu aabili muleelede kulya zinkwa zitakwe bumena, zinkwa zyamapenzi, (nkaambo mwakazwa mucisi ca-Egepita kamugubide), kuti mutalubi buzuba bwanu bwakuzwa munyika ya-Egepita mazuba oonse aabuumi bwanu.
Mazuba aali musanu aabili kutabonwi bumena akati kanu mucisi canu coonse. Alimwi nyama njemupaizya magolezya mubuzuba butaanzi, itaoni mane kusikila cifumo.
Alimwi cipaizyo ca-Pasika tacikonzyi kuligwa muminzi yoonse Jehova Leza wanu njamupa, pe;
muleelede kutuula cipaizyo ca-Pasika kubusena obo Jehova Leza wanu mbwasala kuti abike izina lyakwe nkuko, ciindi camagolezya, ciindi camabbililo aazuba, nkokuti ciindi nemwakazwa mucisi ca-Egepita.
Muleelede kucijika aku cilya kubusena obo Jehova Leza wanu mbwasala, elyo bwaca buyo amupiluke kumaanda aanu.
Mazuba aali musanu abumwi zilaligwa zinkwa zitakwe bumena; lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili kulaba imbungano iisalalisya ya-Jehova Leza wanu; mubuzuba obo mutaciti mulimo nuba umwi.
Zyamana, amulye ipobwe lya-Pentekoste lya-Jehova Leza wanu. Amuletelele cipo camoyo mumaanza aanu, mupe mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wanu mbwamupa coolwe,

Lino amusekelele kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu, nywebo, abana banu balombe abasimbi, abalanda banu baalumi abanakazi, aba-Levi bakede mumaanda aanu, abeenzu abamucaala abamukabafu bakede akati kanu, kubusena obo Jehova Leza wanu mbwasala kuti abike izina lyakwe nkuko.
Mutalubi kuti anywebo mwakali bazike mucisi ca-Egepita, aboobo muleelede kucenjela kubamba ezi imbeta.
Amusekelele mupobwe lyanu, nywebo, abana banu balombe abasimbi, abalanda banu baalumi abanakazi, abalo ba-Levi abamucaala abamukabafu bakede akati kanu.

Mazuba aali musanu aabili amulye ipobwe kuliJehova Leza wanu, oko kubusena Jehova Leza wanu mbwayoosala, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu uyoomupa coolwe mumicelo yoonse njemulima amumilimo yoonse yamaanza aanu, aboobo muyoosekelela buyo.

Ziindi zyotatwe zyamumwaka baalumi banu boonse baleelede kuboneka kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu kubusena obo mbwayoosala, nkokuti kuciindi capobwe lyazinkwa zitakwe bumena, akupobwe lya-Pentekoste, akupobwe lyazilao. Alimwi kuciindi cakuboneka kubusyu bwa-Jehova batabooli acinkwamanza.
Umwi aumwi aletelele cipo ncakonzya kupa, mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wanu mbwamupa coolwe.
Amubike babetesi abasilutwe muminzi yanu yoonse njayoomupa Jehova Leza wanu, mumisyobo yanu, kuti babeteke bantu cakululama.
Mutapilinganyi imbeta. Mutalangi ciwa camuntu. Mutalyi makulo, nkaambo makulo alaofwaazya meso aabasongo akupilinganya makani aabaluleme.
Bululami luzutu mbubuyandwa, kuti mupone kabotu akuvuba nyika Jehova Leza wanu njamupa.
Alimwi mutaimiki munsemu nuuba omwe ngwasulide Jehova Leza wanu.
Tamweelede kutuulila Jehova Leza wanu munyama naba musune nekaba kabelele, uujisi kampenda na cintu cimwi cibi, nkaambo kucita obo ncisesemyo kuli-Jehova Leza wanu.
Na kwajanwa akati kanu, mumunzi nuuba umwi waminzi Jehova Leza wanu njamupa, mwaalumi nanka mwanakazi uucita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova Leza wanu, uunyonyoona cizuminano cakwe,
iwakali kumanina baleza bambi milimo akubakomba, neliba izuba nuuba mwezi naaba makamu oonse aakujulu, makani ngentana kulailila,
na mwalwiidwa makani, alimwi mwaamvwa muleelede kubuzisya loko, nkabela na cabonwa kuti makani ngakasimpe, na ncobeni cisesemyo cili boobo cacitika mucisi ca-Israyeli,
muleelede kugwisya oyo muntu, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, iwakacita cintu eci cibi, mumulete kumulyango wamunzi. Lino oyo muntu, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, afuswe mabwe, afwe.
Kumilomo yabakamboni bobile na botatwe muntu ulakonzya kujayigwa; pele muntu omwe alike takonzyi kuba kamboni wakujazya muntu.
Maanza aabakamboni alataanguna kumufusa, lino musule bantu boonse bamufuse, Mbuboobo mbumweelede kunyonyoona bubi akati kanu.
muye kubapaizi ba-Levi akumubetesi uubeteka kuciindi eco, mubabuzye, kuti bamupandulwide makani mbwaelede kubetekwa.
Lino muleelede kucita mbubonya mbubamwaambila kubusena obo mbwasala Jehova. Amucenjele kuti mucite zintu zyoonse nzebamwiiyisya.
Amucite mbubonya mbuli kulailila kwabo ambuli kukosola kwabo, Mutaleyi munzila njebamulailila, nikuba kululyo nikuba kulumwensi.
Kufumbwa muntu uulisumpula kukukaka kuswiilila mupaizi uucita milimo kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu nanka mubetesi, oyo muntu uleelede kufwa, Mbuboobo mbumweelede kunyonyoona bubi akati kaba-Israyeli.
Lino bantu boonse bamvwa buyo, balayoowa akutalisumpula limbi.
mulabika. Pele amubike mwami ngwasala Jehova Leza wanu. Mwami ngumubika asalwe akati kababunyina; mutabiki muzwakule uutali wamusyobo wanu.
Pele teelede kulivuzizya imbizi, alimwi teelede kupilusya bantu ku-Egepita kuti bavuzye imbizi, nkaambo Jehova wamwaambila kuti, Tamukooyoopiluka limbi nkuko.
Alimwi teelede kulivuzizya banakazi, kuti moyo wakwe utaleyi munzila. Ayalo insiliva angolida, teelede kulivuzizya nzizyo.
Lileelede kubambwa kulinguwe, abale majwi aalyo mazuba oonse aabuumi bwakwe, kuti aiye kulemeka Jehova Leza wakwe kukubamba majwi oonse aayooyu mulao, ambeta ezi, azicite;
kuti moyo wakwe utalisumpuli kwiinda babunyina, ataleyi kuzwa kumalailile nikuba kulumwensi nikuba kuluyo, kuti aongole mubwami bwakwe, walo abana bakwe, akati kabana ba-Israyeli.
Tabakooyooba alukono akati kababunyina pe; Jehova ndolukono lwabo mbubonya mbwaakabaambila.
Lino nceeci caabilo ceelede bapaizi, cizwa kubantu, nkokuti bantu boonse batuula cipaizyo, naba musune niiba imbelele, Bapaizi bapegwe mweendo wacamba, amaseya obile, afu.
Akalo kabalwebalwe kamaila aanu akamasaansa aanu akamafuta aanu, akabalwebalwe kaboya bwakugelwa kwambelele zyanu, zyoonse nzizyabo.
Nkaambo mbembabo Jehova Leza wanu mbaakasala akati kamisyobo yanu yoonse, kuti bacite milimo yabupaizi muzina lya-Jehova, balo abana babo mazuba oonse.
acite milimo yabupaizi muzina lya-Jehova Leza wakwe mbubonya mbuli ba-Levinyina boonse bacita milimo yabupaizi kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Babe azyaabilo zyeelene zyakulya, kutaamba ezyo nzyaakaulisya.
Kutajanwi akati kanu muntu uutenta mwanaakwe mulombe na musimbi mumulilo, nanka muntu uusonda, naba munanga, naba mulozi, naba mucape,
naba simabibo, naba sibusangu, naba sibamooba, naba muntu uubuzya makani kubafu.
Nkaambo kufumbwa muntu uucita ezi ncisesemyo kuli-Jehova, Nkaambo kazisesemyo ezi Jehova ncabatandila kubusyu bwanu.
Amululame kumeso aa-Jehova Leza wanu.
Nkaambo misyobo eyi njemuti tande balabika myoyo yabo kubananga akubasondi, pele nywebo, Jehova Leza wanu tamuzumizyi kucita obo.
Mbubonya mbumwakakumbila kuli-Jehova Leza wanu ku-Horebu kubuzuba bwambungano, cakuti, Tutamvwi limbi ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wesu, nekuba kubona limbi oyu mulilo mupati, kuti tutafwi.
Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Baamba kabotu.
Njoobabusizya musinsimi, akati kababunyina uuli mbuli nduwe, Elyo njoobika majwi aangu mumulomo wakwe, nkabela uyoobaambila makani oonse ngendamulailila.
Lino kufumbwa muntu uutaswiilili majwi aangu ngaamba muzina lyangu, mebo njoomupa mulandu.
Pele musinsimi uulisumpula kukwaamba makani muzina lyangu ngentana kumulailila, ayooyo uuamba muzina lya-Leza umbi, oyo musinsimi ulafwa.
Na mwaamba mumyoyo yanu kuti, Tuzibe byeni makani Jehova ngaatakaamba?
Amubone! Na musinsimi waamba muzina lya-Jehova, pele makani taazuzikizigwi, taaboneki, nkokuti teensi makani ngaakaamba Jehova. Oyu musinsimi waamba cakulisumpula buyo; mutamuyoowi pe.
muleelede kulibikila minzi yotatwe mukati kanyika njamuvubya Jehova Leza wanu.
Amubambe inzila, mupambule nyika njamuvubya Jehova Leza wanu muzipanzi zyotatwe, kuti sikujaya muntu abe amayubilo.
Lino ngaaya makani aasikujaya muntu uukonzya kucijila nkuko kuti apone. Kufumbwa muntu uujaya mweenzinyina cakutaziba, pele kabatasulene,

mbuli muntu uusindikila mweenzinyina mucisaka kuyootebba inkuni, lino kuciindi cakuvuumuka akaleba kukutema cisamu, kaleba kakuka mumwini katema mweenzinyina, aboobo wafwa-oyo muntu ulakonzya kucijila kuluumwi waminzi eyi, kuti kacipona,
kuti sikuliya inkoto yabulowa atamutobeli sikujaya muntu, moyo wakwe nuucifundilide, atamweenzyi nkaambo kamusinzo mulamfu akumujaya, nekuba kuti teelede kufwa, nkaambo taakwe naakamusulide.
Ncencico ncendamulailila kuti musale minzi yotatwe.
Nkabela na Jehova Leza wanu wakomezya cisi canu, mbubonya mbwaakakonkezya bamauso, na wamupa nyika yoonse njaakasyomezya kulibamauso,
(nkokuti na mwacenjela kubamba malailile aya oonse ngendamulailila sunu, kukuyandisya Jehova Leza wanu akukweenda munzila zyakwe mazuba oonse), amuyungizye minzi aimwi yotatwe,
kuti kutatiki bulowa bwabaluleme mukati kanyika Jehova Leza wanu njamuponya, mutabi amulandu wabulowa.
bapati bamunzi wakwe batume, bamugwisye nkuko, bamwaabe mumaanza aasikuliya inkoto yabulowa, kuti afwe.
Meso aanu atamufwidi luzyalo pe; amumanisye milandu yabulowa bwabaluleme mucisi ca-Israyeli, kuti mukale kabotu.
Na kwabuka sikulengelela kaambo uuyanda kupa mweenzinyina mulandu,
abo bantu boonse bobile basikukazyanya baboneke kubusyu bwa-Jehova, kubusyu bwabapaizi abwababetesi bayooba mumazuba ayo.
Lino babetesi babuzisye loko, nkabela na kwabonwa kuti kamboni ngusikulengelela buyo uuamba cakubeja,
muleelede kumucitila mbubonya mbwaakayanda kucitila mweenzinyina. Aboobo mulamanisya bubi akati kanu.
Lino bantu bamwi bamvwa buyo, balayoowa, akutacita limbi cintu cibi cili boobo akati kanu,
Mutamufwidi luzyalo pe. Mulao ube buumi kubuumi, liso kuliso, lino kulino, ijanza kujanza, cituta kucituta.
Nkabela kuciindi cakuyanda kutalika kulwa, mupaizi aboole kuzooambila bantu,
abaambile kuti, Amuswiilile noba-Israyeli, Sunu mwaamba kulwisya basinkondonyoko; myoyo yanu itatuntaani; mutayoowi nekuba kukankama kubusyu bwabo,
nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu nguumuzulwida kuti amulwide kulibasinkondonyokwe akumuzundya.
Abalo basilutwe baambile bantu kuti, Kufumbwa muntu uuyakide iŋanda impya, pele tanaisalazya, apiluke kuŋanda yakwe; atene ulafwa munkondo, lino muntu umbi ulaisalazya.
Kufumbwa muntu uulimide muunda wamasaansa, pele tana kulya micelo yawo, alakwe apiluke kuŋanda; atene ulafwa munkondo, lino muntu umbi ulalya.
Kufumbwa muntu uukalide mwanakazi, pele tana kumutola kuŋanda, alakwe apiluke kumunzi; atene ulafwa munkondo, lino muntu umbi ulamukwata.
Alimwi basilutwe baambile bantu kuti, Kufumbwa muntu uuli amoyo uutunteene akuyoowa apiluke kumunzi, kuti myoyo yabeenzinyina itatyompezegwi mbuli moyo wakwe.
Lino basilutwe bamana buyo kwaambila bantu, babike basilutwe bakuzulwida bantu.
Lino na bavwiila caluumuno akumujalwida milyango, bantu boonse bamumunzi oyo balaba basicibbalo, bamumanine milimo.
Pele na bakaka kutambula luumuno, na babusya inkondo, amubasinkinizye.
Lino Jehova Leza wanu na waaba oyo munzi mumaanza aanu, amujaye baalumi boonse apanga;
pele banakazi, abana, aŋombe, ambono zimwi zyoonse zyamumunzi, amuzisaale, zibe zyanu; amuzilye zisaalo zyabasinkondonyokwe Jehova Leza wanu nzyamupa.
Mbuboobu mbumweelede kucitila minzi yoonse iili kule loko, nkokuti minzi iitali yabamasi bali okuno.
Pele muminzi yabantu abana Jehova Leza wanu njamupa kuti mwiivube, mutasii naba omwe uucipona;
amubanyonyoone boonse buyo, ba-Hiti aba-Amori, ba-Kanana aba-Perizi, ba-Hivi aba-Jebusi, mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wanu mbwaakalailila;
kuti batamwiiyisyi kucita zisesemyo zyabo nzibacitila baleza babo, mutabisizyi Jehova Leza wanu.

Na mwasinkinizya munzi ciindi cilamfu, akuulwisya kuti muuzunde, mutanyonyooni misamu yawo akwiitema atuleba. Kulya amulye micelo yayo, pele kutema mutatemi pe. Sa misamu mbantu? Sa ileelede kusinkinizigwa?
Misamu njozi kuti teensi misamu iiligwa, eyo ilike ilakonzya kutemwa akunyonyoonwa, kuti muyake zyakusinkinizya munzi ngomuli mukulwisya mane lumwi ukazundwe.
bapati banu ababetesi banu baye, bakapime musinzo mbuubede kuzwa kuminzi iizyungulukide mutunta.
Lino bapati bamunzi oyo uuli kufwaafwi babweze citole citana kubopwa na kubelesegwa milimo.
Lino bapati bamunzi batole eco citole kukalonga katayuminini, nyika nkwiitana kulimwa nanka kubyalwa, bakosole mutwe waco nkukonya oko kukalonga.

Bamana kucita obo, baswene bapaizi, bana ba-Levi, nkaambo mbembabo Jehova Leza wanu mbaakasala kuti bacite milimo yabupaizi akulongezya bantu muzina lya-Jehova, alimwi kumulotno wabo makani oonse ankazyano zyoonse nkoziyookoswedwa.
Nkabela bapati boonse bamunzi oyo uuli kufwaafwi kumuntu uujayidwe baleelede kusanzya maanza aabo atala lyacitole cikoswedwe mutwe oko kukalonga,
bakonkezye kuti, Teensi maanza esu aakatila obu bulowa, ameso esu taakwe naakabona sikujaya.
Kolekelela bantu bako ba-Israyeli mbowakanununa, O Jehova; utabapi bantu bako ba-Israyeli mulandu wabulowa bwabatakwe kaambo.
Mbuboobo mbomweelede kumanya mulandu wabulowa butakwe kaambo akati kanu, nemucita ciluleme mumeso aa-Jehova.
na akati kabaange wabona mwanakazi uuebeka, alimwi moyo wako ulayandisya kumukwata, abe mukaako,
umutole kuŋanda yako, alinyoole kumutwe akugonka maala.
Lino asamunune zyakusama zyakwe zyabwaange, akale muŋanda yako, alile wisi abanyina mwezi uuzulide. Amane kucita obo, ulakonzya kuswanaana awe akumukwata, abe mukaako.
Na wabula kukubotezya, ulakonzya kumuleka kuti aye kufumbwa nkwayanda, pele kuulisya toelede kumuulisya pe; toelede kumucitila mbuli muzike, nkaambo wamusofwaazya kale.
lino mubuzuba bwakukonya bana bakwe imbono zyakwe, teelede kucitila mwana wayooyo uuyandwa mbwaelede kucitila mwana wauusulidwe iwakataanguna kuzyalwa.

Ncobeni uleelede kupa oyo mwana wauusulidwe bulemu bweelede mwana mutaanzi, nkokuti kumupa zyaabilo zyobile zyambono zyoonse nzyajisi, nkaambo ngematalikilo aabupati bwakwe, aboobo bulemu bwamwana mutaanzi mbubwakwe.
bamujate wisi abanyina, bamutole kubapati bamunzi wakwe, kumulyango wamunzi,
baambile bapati bamunzi kuti, Oyu mwaneesu ngusicinguni, ulapenzya, taswiilili majwi esu, mutaka mukolwi.
Mpawo bantu boonse bakumunzi wakwe bamufuse mabwe, afwe. Mbuboobo mbumweelede kunyonyoona bubi akati kanu, kuti ba-Israyeli boonse bamvwe, bayoowe.

mutunta wakwe tuuelede kusiigwa acisamu masiku oonse, pe; muleelede kumuzika buzuba obo mbubonya, nkaambo muntu uusinidwe uli alutuko kumeso aa-Leza, Mutasofwaazyi nyika yanu Jehova Leza wanu njamukonya.
Na tali kufwaafwi, nanka kutazibwa, uleelede kwiitola kuŋanda yako, ikale kulinduwe mane mweenzinyoko aiyandaule; aibona umupe.
Mbubonya obo mboelede kucitila imbongolo yakwe, Mbubonya obo mboelede kucitila zyakusama zyakwe. Mbubonya obo mboelede kucitila kufumbwa cintu ncaswekelwa ncobweza, Toelede kuumuna buyo pe.
Alimwi na wabona imbongolo yamweenzinyoko, nanka musune wakwe, iliwide munzila, toelede kuumuna buyo, Ncobeni uleelede kwiibusya,
uleke kanyina, kainke, twana ututole, kuti ukale kabotu akoongola.
Na wayaka iŋanda impya, boola lululi citabililo, kuti utaleteli iŋanda yako mulandu wabulowa na muntu waloka.
Utalimyi musune ambongolo antoomwe,
Utasami cikobela camasani aavwelene, boya abutonge antoomwe.
wamupa kaambo, wasampaula izina laykwe, cakwaamba kuti, Oyu mwanakazi ndakamukwata, pele nendakaswanaana awe teendakajana bunakalindu mulinguwe.
Lino wisi musimbi oyo abanyina babweze zitondezyo zyabunakalindu bwakwe, bazilete kubapati kumulyango wamunzi.
Mpawo wisi musimbi aambile bapati kuti, Oyu mwaalumi ndakamupa mwanaangu musimbi, kuti amukwate, pele wamusula,
aboobo wamubikila kaambo, wati, Nsendajana bunakalindu mumwanaako. Bona! Nzeezi zitondezyo zyabunakalindu bwamwanaangu. Amana kwaamba obo, ayanike cisani kumeso aabapati bamunzi.
Mpoonya awo bapati bamunzi babweze oyo mwaalumi, bamuume.
Nkabela baleelede kumubbadelesya mali aansiliva aali mwanda, bape wisi musimbi, nkaambo wasampaula izina lyanakalindu mu-Israyeli. Nkabela unooli banakwe, takonzyi kumuleka pe buumi bwakwe boonse.
Pele na makani ngakasimpe, na zitondezyo zyabunakalindu taziboneki mumusimbi,

baleelede kutola oyo musimbi kumulyango waŋanda yawisi, kuti bantu bamumunzi bamufuse mabwe, afwe, nkaambo wacita citondwa mucisi ca-Israyeli kukucita bwaamu naakacili muŋanda yawisi. Mbuboobo mbomweelede kunyonyoona bubi akati kanu.

muleelede kubaleta boonse bobile kumulyango wamunzi oyo akubafusa mabwe, bafwe. Musimbi ulafwa nkaambo kakuti taakwe naakalila nekuba kuti kali mumunzi, amwaalumi ulafwa nkaambo kakuti wasofwaazya mukamweenzinyina. Mbuboobo mbomweelede kunyonyoona bubi akati kanu.
Pele na mwaalumi wajana musimbi uutangidwe musokwe, lino wamwaandila, oyo muntu iwakamwaandila ulafwa alike.
Mutacitili musimbi cintu pe. Musimbi tacitide kaambo keelede lufu. Aya makani aleelene amakani aamuntu uujaya mweenzinyina.
Nkaambo wakamujana musokwe, elyo musimbi uutangidwe wakalila pele katakwe sikumuvuna.
oyo mwaalumi iwamulalika uleelede kubbadela wisi musimbi mali aansiliva aali makumi osanwe, lino ulaba mwanakazi wakwe, nkaambo wamusofwaazya kale; takonzyi kumuleka buumi bwakwe boonse.
Muntu uupwayikide nanka uunyungukide bwaalumi teelede kunjila mumbungano ya-Jehova.
Mwana wamumanembe teelede kunjila mumbungano ya-Jehova; bana bakwe akusikila kuzyalani lyakumi tabeelede kunjila mumbungano ya-Jehova.
nkaambo teebakamutambula azilyo amaanzi munzila ciindi eciya nemwakazwa mucisi ca-Egepita, pele bakatamba Balamu mwana wa-Beori waku-Petori ku-Mesopotamiya, kuti amutuke.
Nekubaboobo Jehova Leza wanu taakwe naakaswiilila Balamu. Jehova Leza wanu wakasandula lutuko kuti lumubede cilongezyo, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu wakamuyandisya.
Tamweelede kuyandaula abuniini kubaletela luumuno acoolwe mazuba oonse aabuumi bwanu.
Bana babo bamusela watatu balakonzya kunjila mumbungano ya-Jehova.
Ciindi cakuya kuyoolwisya basinkondonyoko, muzilao zyanu amucenjele kuti mulikasye kuzintu zyoonse zibi.
lino kumabbililo asambe amubili; izuba iyabbila buyo, anjile muzilao.
Muleelede kuba abusena anze lyazilao nkomukonzya kwiinka.
Alimwi uleelede kuba afosyolo akati kazibelesyo zyako, lino ciindi cakuligwasya anze lyazilao, uleelede kusya andilyo, ukaliile zibi zyako.

Nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu uleendeenda akati kazilao, kuti amuvune akwaaba basinkondonyoko mumaanza aanu; nkaambo kako zilao zyanu zileelede kusala la, ataboni cintu neciba comwe cuusya insoni, atamufutatili.
akale anywebo akati kanu, kufumbwa nkwalisalila muminzi yanu, kufumbwa kumubotela. Mutamupenzyi pe.
Mutaleti zyakuyola zyamwanakazi mwaamu nanka zyakuvola zyamubwa muŋanda yaJehova Leza wanu kukuzuzikizya cikonke, nkaambo ezi zyoonse zyobile nzezisesemyo kuli-Jehova Leza wanu.
Toelede kukolotya sikamukowanyoko cakujana impindu, nkokuti impindu yamali niiba impindu yacakulya niiba impindu yacintu cili coonse cikolotesegwa.
Muzwakule ulakonzya kumukolotya cakujana impindu, pele sikamukowanyoko toelede kumukolotya cakujana impindu pe, kuti Jehova Leza wanu amupe coolwe mumilimo yanu yoonse munyika eyo njemuyoovuba.
Pele na tokonkezyi, tokwe cibi.
Cenjela kuti ucite zyoonse zyazwa mumulomo wako, nkaambo ncowaamba amulomo wako wacikonkezya Jehova Leza wako amoyo wako.
Na wasika kumaila aamweenzinyoko aaciimvwi, ulakonzya kupulaula akupuka, pele toelede kugonka maila aamweenzinyoko acigonsyo.
waakukwatwa kumwaalumi umbi,
nkabela oyo mwaalumi wabili wamusula, wamulembela lugwalo lwakulekana, walubika mumaanza aakwe, wamutanda kuzwa kuŋanda yakwe, alimwi na wafwa mwaalumi wabili iwakamukwata,

mulumaakwe mutaanzi iwakamukwete, iwakamutanda, takonzyi kumubweedela alimwi kuti amukwate, naamana kusofwaazigwa. Kucita obo ncisesemyo kumeso aa-Jehova, cilaleta mulandu kunyika Jehova Leza wanu njamuvubya.
Mutalubi Jehova Leza wanu ncaakacitila Miriamu munzila ciindi cakuzwa ku-Egepita.
Ima buyo anze, kuti oyo muntu ngokolotya akuletele cisyomezyo cakwe anze.
Nkabela na muntu mucete, toelede koona acisyomezyo cakwe.
Lyabbila buyo izuba, ncobeni uleelede kumubweedezezya cisyomezyo cakwe, kuti aone mulicakulivumba cakwe, akulumbe. Aya makani ayookubeda bululami kumeso aa-Jehova Leza wako.
Uleelede kumupa zyakuvola zyakwe izuba kalitana kubbila, nkaambo mucete, abuumi bwakwe buli alinzizyo. Cenjela kuti atakwiilile Jehova nkaambo kanduwe; cenjela kuti utapegwi mulandu.
Mutalubi kuti anywebo mwakali bazike munyika ya-Egepita. Jehova wanu wakamunununa nkuko; ncencico ncendamulailila kucita obo.
Alimwi ciindi cakukoonza maolifa aako, utaindululi; micelo iisyeede ibe yamweenzu ayamucaala ayamukamufu.
Alimwi ciindi cakucela masaansa aako, utavululi; micelo iisyeede ibe yamweenzu ayamucaala ayamukamufu,
Mutalubi kuti mwakali bazike munyika ya-Egepita; nciceeco ncindamulailila kucita obo.
Na bantu balijisi makani, na baaleta kunkuta, alimwi babetesi bababeteka, cakululamika baluleme acakupa basikubisya mulandu,
na sikubisya uleelede kuumwa, mubetesi amulazike kuti aumwe kumeso aakwe azyuumo zyeelede kubisya kwakwe.
Ulakonzya kuumwa azyuumo zili makumi one, pele teelede kwiindilizya; na waindilizya kumuuma, nkokuti munyoko ulasampukilwa buntu bwakwe.
Lino mwana mutaanzi ngwazyala uyoolya izina lyamukwabo mufu, kuti izina lyakwe litafwidilili mucisi ca-Israyeli.

Na oyo muntu tayandi kukwata mukamuzyalwanyina, mwanakazi aye kubapati kumulyango wamunzi, abaambile kuti, Muzyalwanyina mulumaangu wakaka kubusizya mwanaakwabo izina mucisi ca-Israyeli, tayandi kundicitila bweelede.
Lino bapati bamunzi wakwe baleelede kumwiita, baambaule awe. Lino na wakakilila cakwaamba kuti, Nsiyandi kumukwata,

mukamuzyalwanyina uleelede kumuswenenena kumeso aabapati, amugwisizye insangu kucituta cakwe akumuswida mate kubusyu, avuwe kuti, Mbuboobo mbweelede kucitilwa muntu uukaka kuyakila mwanaakwabo luzubo.
Lino izina lyaluzubo lwakwe lilaambwa akati kaba-Israyeli kuti nduzubo lwayooyo iwakagwisigwa insangu.
Bantu bobile na balwana amweenzinyina, na mwanakazi waumwi waboola kuzoovuna mulumaakwe mumaanza aayooyo ngobalwana awe, alimwi watambika ijanza lyakwe akumujata kubuntu bwakwe,
muleelede kumukosola ijanza, mutamufwidi insoni pe.
Amuŋanda yako utabi azyeelesyo zipambukene, cipati aciniini.
Uleelede kuba abbwe lyabulemu lizwide liluleme, aceelesyo cizwide ciluleme, kuti uongole anyika eyo Jehova Leza wako njakupa.
Nkaambo boonse bacita obo, nkokuti boonse basilweeno, ncisesemyo kuli-Jehova Leza wako,
Wakamufumpa munzila, wamunyonyweeda boonse ibakali musule, nimwakawizukide akukataala. Takwe naakayoowa Leza pe.

Nkaambo kako, Jehova Leza wanu naayoomupa cilyokezezyo kuti mukale cakuliiba akutapenzegwa kulibasinkondonyoko boonse beengelede omo munyika Jehova Leza wanu njamuvubya, amunyonyoone ciibalusyo coonse cabaAmaleki ansi ano. Mutalubi pe.
Lino nimuyoonjila munyika eyo Jehova Leza wanu njamukonya, nimuyooivuba akukala mulinjiyo,
muleelede kubweza kabalwebalwe kazilyo zyoonse zyanyika nzimulima munyika Jehova Leza wanu njamupa, mubweze muntumba, muye azyo kubusena obo Jehova Leza wanu mbwasala kuti akazike izina lyakwe nkuko.
Muleelede kuya kumupaizi uubeleka kuciindi eco, mumwaambile kuti, Ndaamba buzuba obuno kubusyu bwaJehova Leza wako kuti ndasika ncobeni kunyika Jehova njaakakonkezya bamatateesu kutupa.
Wamana kwaamba obo, mupaizi atambule intumba kumaanza aako, aitule kunembo lyacipaililo ca-Jehova Leza wako.
Lino ba-Egepita bakatubisizya akutupenzya akutubelesya calunya.
Mpawo twakakwiilila Jehova Leza wabamatateesu, nkabela Jehova wakaswiilila majwi esu, wabona mapenzi esu akulemenwa kwesu abuzike bwesu.
Jehova wakatupozya mu-Egepita ajanza liyumu akuboko kutandabede aluyoosyo lupati azitondezyo amalweza aayoosya.
Wakatusisya kubusena obuno, watupa nyika ino, nyika iikunka malili abuci.
Lino sunu bona! Ndaleta kabalwebalwe kazilyo zyanyika njowandipa, O Jehova. Lino uleelede kuzitula kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wako akukotama kubusyu bwaJehova Leza wako.
Uleelede kusekelela nkaambo kabubotu boonse Jehova Leza wako mbwamupa, webo abasiŋanda bako, nywebo aba-Levi abeenzu bakala-kala akati kanu.

muleelede kwaamba kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu kuti, Ndagwisya cipanzi cisalalisya muŋanda yangu, ndacipa ba-Levi abeenzu abamucaala abamukabafu, mbubonya mbuli malailile aako ngowakandilailila. Nsikwe kutyola nuuba umwi wamilumbe yako, Nsikwe kuluba pe.

Nsikwe nendakalya cipa nzi cakumi kuciindi cakulila, nsikwe nendakacinyonyoona kuciindi cakusofwaazigwa, nsikwe nendakacipa bafu. Ndaswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wangu, Ndacita muzintu zyoonse mbubonya mbowakandilailila.
Sondela kuzwa kujulu, kucikalilo cako cisalalisya, ulongezye bantu bako ba-Israyeli anyika njowatupa, mbubonya mbowakakonkezya kulibamatateesu, nyika iikunka malili abuci.
Buzuba obuno Jehova Leza wanu wamulailila kucita milumbe eyi ambeta ezi. Amucenjele kuti muzicite camoyo woonse acamuuya woonse.
Mwazumina buzuba obuno kuti Jehova ngu-Leza wanu, mwazumina kweenda munzila zyakwe, kubamba milumbe yakwe amalailile aakwe ambeta zyakwe, akuswiilila ijwi lyakwe.
Alakwe Jehova wazumina buzuba obuno kuti muli musyobo wakwe uuyandika, mbubonya mbwaakasyomezya, aboobo muleelede kubamba imbeta zyakwe zyoonse.
Wasyomezya kumusumpula loko kwiinda misyobo yoonse njaakalenga, mubulemu amumpuwo amukutembaulwa, kuti mube bantu basalalisya ba-Jehova Leza wanu, mbubonya mbwaakaamba.
Lino Musa abapati ba-Israyeli bakalailila bantu kuti, Amubambe malailile oonse ngensi mulailile buzuba obuno.
Lino mubuzuba obo nimuyoozubuka Jordano kuya kunyika Jehova Leza wanu njamupa, muleelede kuliyakila mabwe mapati akwaalamba amulambo,

mukalembe alingao majwi oonse aamilao eyi. Amucite obo kuciindi cakuzubuka kuyoonjila munyika njamupa Jehova Leza wanu, nyika iikunka malili abuci, mbubonya mbuli Jehova Leza wabamauso mbwaakamwaambila.
Mwazubuka buyo Jordano, amuyake mabwe aya ngendamulailila sunu acilundu caEbala, mukaalambe amulambo mpoonya awo.
Alimwi amuyakile Jehova Leza wanu cipaililo nkukonya oko, nkokuti cipaililo camabwe; mutabelesyi cibezyo cabutale alincico.
Amuyakile Jehova Leza wanu cipaililo camabwe aatabezedwe, mukatuulile Jehova Leza wanu zituuzyo alincico.
Amutuule zipaizyo zyakutontozya nkukonya oko, mukalye akusekelela kubusyu bwaJehova Leza wanu.
Alimwi amulembe mpoonya awo amabwe majwi oonse aamilao eyi. Amwaalembe kabotu kabotu.
Mpawo Musa abapaizi ba-Levi bakaambila ba-Israyeli boonse kuti, Amuumune, muswiilile noba-Israyeli. Buzuba obuno mwaba bantu baJehova Leza wanu.
Amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu, mubambe milazyo yakwe ambeta zyakwe nzendamulailila buzuba obuno.
Lino mubuzuba obo Musa wakalailila bantu kuti,
Mwazubuka Jordano, mbaaba beelede kwiima kuti balongezye bantu acilundu caGerizimu: Simeoni, Levi, Juda, Isakara, Josefa, a-Benjamini.
Abaaba mbobeelede kwiima acilundu ca-Ebala kuti batuke: Rubeni, Gadi, Aseri, Zebuloni, Dani a-Nafitali.
Nkabela ba-Levi baleelede kwaambila bantu boonse ba-Israyeli ajwi ipati, cakuti.
ZyooIwe ezi zyoonse zilamusikila, zilaba zyanu, na mwaswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu.
Mulaba acoolwe mumunzi, mulaba acoolwe musokwe.
Lulaba acoolwe lunyungu lwamibili yanu, alunyungu lwamicelo yanyika yanu, alunyungu lwaŋombe zyanu, banamani bamatanga aanu abana bambelele zyanu.
Zilaba acoolwe intumba zyanu azikandilo zyanu.
Mulaba acoolwe kuciindi cakunjila akuciindi cakuzwa.
Jehova ulalailila kuti mube acoolwe mumatala aanu amumilimo yoonse yamaanza aanu. Ulamupa coolwe munyika eyo Jehova Leza wanu njamupa.
Jehova ulamusimpa kuti mube bantu bakwe basalalisya, mbubonya mbwaakamukonkezya, na mwaswiilila milazyo yaJehova Leza wanu akweenda munzila zyakwe.
Lino bantu boonse baansi balabona kuti izina lya-Jehova lili alindinywe, aboobo balamuyoowa.
Jehova ulamwaandya muzyoolwe, mulunyungu lwamibili yanu alunyungu lwaŋombe zyanu alunyungu lwamicelo yanyika yanu, mpoonya awo anyika Jehova njaakakonkezya bamausowanu kumupa.

Jehova ulamujalwida ciyobwedo cakwe cibotu cakujulu, kuti awisizye nyika yanu imvula kuciindi ceelede, akumupa coolwe mumilimo yoonse yamaanza aanu, Mulakolotya misyobo minji, pele kukolota tamukooyookolota nywebo pe.

Jehova ulamubika kuti mube mutwe, tamukooyooba mucila pe. Munooya butanta lyoonse, tamukooyooselela pe, na mwaswiilila milazyo ya-Jehova Leza wanu njendi mukumulailila buzuba obuno, na mwacenjela kwiicita
akutaleya kuzwa kumajwi oonse ngendamulailila buzuba obuno, nikuba kululyo nikuba kulumwensi, kuya butobela baleza bambi akubamanina milimo.
Mulaba alutuko mumunzi, mulaba alutuko musokwe.
Zilaba alutuko intumba zyanu azikandilo zyanu.
Lulaba alutuko lunyungu lwamibili yanu alunyungu lwamicelo yanyika yanu, banamani baŋombe zyanu abana bambelele zyanu.
Mulaba alutuko mukunjila kwanu amukuzwa kwanu.
Jehova ulamukakatizya malwazi, mane lumwi amumanisye munyika eyo njemoyoovuba.
Jehova uyoomujazya lungwangwa, antuntumaanzi, amalwazi aatenta mibili, acimpayuma, andyomba akwiibuka. Zintu ezi zilamutobela mane lumwi mukanyoonyooke.
Kujulu kulamubeda mbuli mukuba, ayalo nyika iili kunsi lyamaulu aanu ilamubeda mbuli butale,
Jehova uyoosandula imvula yakunyika yanu ibe lusuko amusee. Iyoomuwida kuzwa kujulu mane mukanyonyooke.
Mitunta yanu iyooba zilyo zyabayuni boonse bakujulu azyabanyama boonse baansi; takukooyooba muntu naba omwe uubayoosya.
Alimwi Jehova ulamuumya zyuute zyaku-Egepita, azilonda, acibulu, acipele citakonzyi kusilikwa.
Jehova ulamuumya busondosi aboofu akupilinganya myoyo yanu,
mane mukabe basikwaampaampa ciindi casikati mbubonya mbuli moofu mbwaampaampa mumudima. Tamukooyoojana coolwe munzila zyanu; muyoopenzegwa akusaalwa buyo, nkabela takukooyooba sikumuvuna.
Ulakwata mwanakazi, pele mwaalumi umbi ulamulalika; ulayaka iŋanda, pele tokooyookala mulinjiyo; ulabyala muunda wamasaansa, pele tokooyoolya micelo yawo.

Iŋombe yako iyoojayigwa kumeso aako, pele tokooyoolya nyama yayo; imbongolo yako iyoobbigwa kumeso aako, tiikooyooboola limbi; imbelele zyako ziyooabwa mumaanza aabasinkondonyoko, pele taakwe uuyookugwasya.
Bana bako balombe abasimbi bayooabwa mumaanza aabantu bambi; meso aako ayoobona; uyoobasukama buzuba boonse, pele taakwe cintu ncokonzya kucita.
Micelo yoonse yanyika yako njowakabeleka iyooligwa kubantu mbotezi. Muyoopenzegwa aku umwa buyo mazuba conse,
mane mukasondoke nkaambo kazintu zyoonse nzyaabona meso aanu.
Jehova ulamuumya zyuute zibi zitasilikiki amazwi aanu amaulu aanu; ulaciswa mubili woonse kuzwa kuzituta kusikila alubwebwe lwamutwe.
Muyooba ciyoosyo akasimpi ajwi lyakuweezya akati kamisyobo yoonse Jehova nkwayoomutandila,
Muyoobyala imbuto zinji kumyuunda, pele kutebula muyootebula zice buyo, nkaambo cisozi ciyoozilya.
Muyoobyala myuunda yamasaansa akwiibamba, pele tamukoonywa waini kulinjiyo nekuba kulya micelo yayo, nkaambo basyanyungwa bayooilya.
Muyooba amisamu yamaolifa munyika yanu yoonse, pele tamukooyoonana mafuta aayo, nkaambo micelo iyookunkumuka,
Muyoozyala balombe abasimbi, pele tabakooyooba banu, nkaambo bayootolwa mubuzike.
Misamu yanu amicelo yanyika yanu, mapaso ayooimanisya.
Beenzu bakala akati kanu banooya busumpuka kwiinda ndinywe, pele nywebo munooya bubbililila.
Mbembabo bayoomukolotya, tamukooyookolotya mbabo pe. Bayooba mutwe, pele nywebo muyooba mucila.
Ezi intuko zyoonse ziyoomusikila, ziyoomutobela akumujana, mane mukanyonyooke, nkaambo kakuti tamuswiilili ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu akubamba malailile aakwe ambeta zyakwe nzyaakamulailila.
Ziyoomubeda citondezyo amalweza, nywebo alunyungu lwanu, mane kukabe kutamani.

Nkaambo kako muyoomanina basinkondonyoko milimo, Jehova mbaazootuma kukumulwisya; muyoobamanina milimo cakufwa inzala acakufwa nyotwa acacinswe acakubula zintu zyoonse. Uyoomubikila ijoko lyabutale ansingo zyanu mane akamunyonyoone.
Jehova uyoomubusizya musyobo wabantu bazwa kule, kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika. Balafuuma mbuli sikube, Musyobo ngomutamvwidi mwaambo.
Mbantu bayoosya, batakonzyi kulemeka bapati nekuba kufwida banike luzyalo.

Bayoolya lunyungu lwaŋombe zyanu alunyungu lwamicelo yanyika yanu, mane bakamunyonyoone. Tabakooyoomusiila maila naba waini naaba mafuta, manamani aŋombe zyanu nebaba bana bambelele zyanu, mane lumwi bakamumaninizye.

Bayoomusinkinizya muminzi yanu yoonse mane malambo malamfu mayumu ngomwakali kusyoma ayookolomoka moonse munyika yanu, Bayoomusinkinizya muminzi yanu yoonse amunyika yoonse Jehova Leza wanu njaakamupa.
Lino muyoolya lunyungu lwamibili yanu, nyama yabana banu balombe abasimbi mbaakakupa Jehova Leza wanu. Mbuboobo mbumuyoocita mukusinkinizigwa kuli basinkondonyoko bamusinkinizya.
Muntu mubombu moomfosi akati kanu uyooba syacivulamwangu uutayandi kwaabila muzyalwanyina zilyo naba mwanakazi wamuntaamo yakwe nebaba bana bakwe bacisyeede mbaakasyaalilwa.
Uyookaka kwaabila naba omwe akati kabo nyama yabana bakwe mbalya nkaambo kakubula cintu mukusinkinizigwa kulibasinkondonyoko bamusinkinizya muminzi yanu yoonse.

Alakwe mwanakazi mubombu moomfosi akati kanu, iwakali kuyoowa kulyata maulu aakwe ansi nkaambo kakubomba akoomfoka, uyooba syacivulamwangu kumulumi wamuntaamo yakwe akumwana wakwe mulombe aku mwana wakwe musimbi.
Ulakaka kubapa cabacembele cizwa mwida lyakwe abana mbazyede; ulayanda kuzilya zyoonse mwini cakusisikizya mumapenzi aakusinkinizigwa kulibasinkondonyoko bakusinkinizya muminzi yanu.
Jehova uyoomuletela, nywebo alunyungu lwanu, zyuumo ziyoosya, zyuumo zipati zitamani amalwazi mabi aatamani.
Uyoomuboozezya alimwi malwazi oonse aaku-Egepita ngwemwakayoowede, nkabela ayoomukakatila.
Aalo malwazi oonse amapenzi oonse aatalembedwe mubbuku eli lya-Mulao, Jehova ulamuletela ngao, mane lumwi mukanyonyooke.
Nekuba kuti mwakali banji mbuli nyenyeezi zyakujulu, muyoosyaala bace buyo, nkaambo kakutaswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu.
Mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwakondedwe kumupa coolwe akumuvuzya, uyookondwa mbubonya akunyonyoona akumumwaya, mane lumwi mukamaninine munyika eyo njimuyoovuba.
Jehova uyoomumwayila akati kamisyobo yoonse yabantu kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika kusikila kumagolelonyina, nkabela oko muyookomba baleza bambi, baleza bazisamu abamabwe, mbemutezi nywebo nibaba bamauso.
Nkabela akati kabamasi abo tamukooyoojana luumuno, niciba cilyokezezyo cazituta zyanu. Jehova uyoomupa myoyo iikankama, amalwazi aamana meso, abuusu bwamutwaango twanu.
Buumi bwanu buyooangalikilwa. Munooyoowa lyoonse isikati amasiku, Tamukooyooba alusyomo pe.
Cifumo muyooamba kuti, Kubota kaali masiku; masiku muyooamba kuti, Kubota kacili cifumo; nkaambo kakuyoowa kwamyoyo yanu akubona kwameso aanu.

Jehova uyoomubweedezya ku-Egepita mumaato musinzo ngundakaamba kuti tamukooyoouinda limbi. Oko muyoolyaaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyoko, kuti muuzigwe, mube bazike baalumi abanakazi, pele takukooyooba sikumuula.
Ngaaya majwi aacizuminano Jehova ngaakalailila Musa, nkokuti cizuminano ncaakatangana aba-Israyeli munyika ya-Moabu kunze lyacizuminano ncaakatangene abo ku-Horebu.
Musa wakaita ba-Israyeli boonse, wabaambila kuti, Mwakabona zintu zyoonse Jehova nzyaakacita kumeso aanu munyika ya-Egepita, nzyaakacitila Farao abalanda bakwe boonse anyika yakwe yoonse,
masunko mapati ngemwakabona ameso aanu, azitondezyo ezyo zigambya.
Nekubaboobo asunu Jehova tana kumupa myoyo yakuziba ameso aakubona amatwi aakuswiilizya.
Ndamweenzya myaka iili makumi one munkanda. Zyakusama zyanu tazina kuzakaala amibili yanu, ansangu zyanu tazina kuzakaala ama ulu aanu.
Insima yabuntu tamuna kwiilya, awaini azyakunywa zikola tamuna kuzinywa, kuti muzibe kuti ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Lino nemwakasika kubusena obuno, kwakasika Sihoni mwami wa-Hesiboni a-Ogi mwami wa-Basana kuzootulwisya, pele twakabazunda.
Twakatola nyika yabo, twapa ba-Rubeni aba-Gadi acisela camusyobo wa-Manase kuti baivube.
Lino amucenjele kubika myoyo yanu kumajwi aacizuminano eci, mwaacite, kuti mujane coolwe mumilimo yoonse njemucita.
Sunu nyoonse muliimvwi kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu, basilutwe bamisyobo yanu abapati banu ababetesi banu, bantu boonse ba-Israyeli,
bana banu, banakazi banu, abeenzu bakala kala akati kanu, basikumutebbela inkuni abasikumutekela maanzi,
kuti mutangane a-Jehova Leza wanu cizuminano acikonke. Jehova Leza wanu ulatangana cizuminano anywebo buzuba obuno,
kuti amusimpye buzuba obuno, mube bantu bakwe, alakwe abe Leza wanu, mbubonya mbwaakamwaambila, mbwaakakonkezya kuli-Abrahamu akuli-Izaka akuli-Jakobo.
Alimwi teensi ndinywe luzutu mbendatangana abo cizuminano eci acikonke eci buzuba obuno;
ncicabaabo mbetwiimvwi abo sunu ano kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wesu abaabo boonse batawo buzuba obuno.
Nywebo mulizi mbutwakakede munyika ya-Egepita, ambutwakainda akati kamisyobo imbi.
Mulibwene zisesemyo zyabo, zimpangaliko zyabo zyazisamu azyamabwe, zyansiliva azyangolida, nzebajisi.

Amucenjele kuti kutabi akati kanu mwaalumi naba mwanakazi neluba luzubo nuuba mukowa bajisi myoyo iiyanda kuleka Jehova Leza wesu akuyookomba baleza bamisyobo eyo. Amucenjele kuti kutabi akati kanu muyanda uuzyala micelo iilulisya,
muntu uumvwide majwi aacikonke eci nekubaboobo ulalikondezya mumoyo wakwe cakwaamba kuti, Ndi kabotu, nekuba kuti ndeenda mucinguni camoyo wangu, Eci ciyoonyonyoona zitete aziyumu zyoonse buyo.

Jehova takooyoozumina kumulekelela pe. Bukali bwaJehova abbivwe lyakwe ziyoountumukila muntu oyo, nkabela kufumbwa lutuko lulembedwe mubbuku eli luyoowida alinguwe, mane lumwi Jehova akaziminganye izina lyakwe ansi ano.
Jehova uyoomusala akati kamisyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli kuti awidwe intuko zyoonse zyacizuminano zilembedwe mubbuku eli lya-Mulao.
Lino musela uuboola, bana banu babuka muzibaka zyanu, abalo beenzu bazwa kuzisi zyakule, bayooamba, nebayoobona mapenzi aacisi eco amalwazi Jehova ngaasisya kulincico.

(Nyika yoonse iyooba sulufa amunyo, nyika iipide, iitakonzya kubyalwa nekuba kumeneka, iitajisi bulongo bwakumeneka bwizu, iinyonyweedwe mbubonya mbuli Sodoma a-Gomora, Adima a­-Zeboimu, minzi Jehova njaakanyonyoona mubukali bwakwe buyoosya).
Bamasi boonse bayooamba kuti, Ino nkaambonzi Jehova wacitila nyika eyo obo? Nkutyeni obu bukali buyoosya?
Nkabela bayooamba kuti, Nkaambo kakuti bakalobya cizuminano ca-Jehova Leza wabamawisi ncaakatangana abo kuciindi eco cakubapozya mucisi ca-Egepita,
bakaakukomba baleza bambi akubakotamina, baleza mbebatakezi, mbaatakabapa.
NciNciceeco bukali bwa-Jehova ncebwakabukila nyika eyo kukubaletela intuko zyoonse zilembedwe mubbuku eli.
Jehova wakabazyula munyika yabo mubukali bupati amulunyemo luyoosya, akubawaala munyika imbi, mbubonya ambuli sunu.
na mwaboola kuliJehova Leza wanu akuswiilila ijwi lyakwe, mbubonya mbundamulailila buzuba obuno, nywebo abana banu, camoyo woonse acamuuya woonse,
lino Jehova Leza wanu uyoolobya buzike bwanu, uyoomufwida luzyalo akumuyobolola alimwi kuzwa kumasi oonse Jehova Leza wanu nkwaakamutandilide.
Nekuba kuti batandidwe banu bali kumagolelo aanyika, Jehova Leza wanu uyoomugwisya kuzwa oko akumuboozya.
Jehova Leza wanu uyoomuboozya munyika njebakavuba bamauso, kuti mwiivube, nkabela uyoomupa coolwe akumuvuzya kwiinda bamausowanu.
Jehova Leza wanu uyoopalula myoyo yanu amyoyo yalunyungu lwanu, kuti muyandisye Jehova Leza wanu camoyo woonse acamuuya woonse, kuti mube abuumi.
Lino Jebova Leza wanu uyookazika lutuko olu loonse kulibasinkondonyoko akulibaabo bamusulide ibakali kumupenzya.
Anywebo muyooboola alimwi kuswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova akubamba milazyo yakwe yoonse njendamulailila buzuba obuno.

Nkabela Jehova Leza wanu uyoomuvuzizya coolwe mumilimo yoonse yamaanza aanu, munyungu zyamibili yanu amunyungu zyaŋombe zyanu amunyungu zyamicelo yanyika yanu, nkaambo Jehova uyookondwa alimwi kumupa coolwe, mbubonya mbwaakakondwa kulibamausowanu,
nkokuti na mwaswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu akubamba milazyo yakwe ambeta zyakwe zilembedwe mubbuku eli lya-Mulao, na mwaboola kuli-Jehova Leza wanu camoyo woonse acamuuya woonse.
Tuuli kujulu; tamukonzyi kwaamba kuti, Ngwani uukonzya kuya kujulu kuyoouleta, kuti tuuswiilile akuucita?
Tuuli mutala alwizi; tamukonzyi kwaamba kuti, Ngwani uukonzya kuzubuka lwizi kuyoouleta, kuti tuuswiilile akuucita?
Pe! Ijwi lili kufwaafwi loko, lili mukanwa lyanu amumyoyo yanu.

Na mwaswiilila milumbe ya-Jehova Leza wanu njendamulailila buzuba obuno, na mwayandisya, Jehova Leza wanu, na mweenda munzila zyakwe akubamba malailile aakwe amilazyo yakwe ambeta zyakwe, muyoopona akwaanda, nkabela Jehova Leza wanu uyoomulongezya omo munyika njemuyoovuba.
Pele na myoyo yanu yaleya, na mwabula kuswiilila, na mwaongelezegwa kukotamina baleza bambi milimo,
ndamuzibya buzuba obuno kuti ncobeni muyoonyonyooka; tamukooyoongola munyika eyo njemuyoovuba omo mutala lya-Jordano.
Ndatamba ijulu anyika buzuba obuno, kuti zyoonse zibe bakamboni bangu, kuzibwe kuti buumi alufu, lulongezyo alutuko, zyoonse ndazibika kuti mulisalile. Amusale buumi, kuti mupone, nywebo abana banu.

Amuyandisye Jehova Leza wanu, amuswiilile ijwi lyakwe, amumukakatile, nkaambo kucita obo kulamuletela buumi akoongola, kuti mukale munyika eyo Jehova njaakakonkezya kupa bamausowanu, Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo.
Lino Musa naakamana kwaambila ba-Israyeli boonse majwi aya;
wakabaambila kuti, Sunu ndijisi myaka iili mwanda amakumi obile. Nsicikonzyi kuya bweendeenda, Alimwi Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Tokoozubuka oyu Jordano.
Jehova Leza wanu uyoomuzulwida mwini; nguuyoomunyonyweda aba bamasi kuti mubatande, Alakwe Joshua uyoomuzulwida mbubonya mbwaakaamba Jehova.
Jehova uyoobacitila mbubonya mbwaakacitila Sihoni a-Ogi, bami baba-Amori, anyika yabo, mbaakanyonyoona.
Jehova uyoobaaba mumaanza aanu, nkabela muyoobacitila muzintu zyoonse mbubonya mbundamulailila.
Amuyume, mube bakozu. Mutabayoowi nikuba kukankama kubusyu bwabo, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu nguumuli awe. Taakwe nayoomusia nanka kumulekelezya.
Jehova nguumuzulwida, uyooba anywebo, taakwe nayoomusia nanka kumulekelezya, Mutayoowi na kukankama.
Nkabela Musa wakabalailila kuti, Lyoonse kwamana myaka iili musanu aibili, kuciindi cibikidwe camwaka walwaangunuko, kupobwe lyazilao,
ba-Israyeli boonse nibabungana kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wanu mubusena obo mbwasala, muleelede kubala oyu Mulao mumatwi aaba-Israyeli boonse.
Amubunganye bantu boonse, baalumi abanakazi abana abeenzu bakede muminzi yanu, kuti baswiilile, baiye, balemeke Jehova Leza wanu akucenjela kubamba majwi oonse aa-Mulao oyu;
abalo bana babo batana kuziba makani baswiilile, baiye kulemeka Jehova Leza wanu, mazuba oonse ngemucipona munyika njimuyoovuba mutala lya-Jordano.
Nkabela Jehova wakalibonya mutente mumusumpululu wajoba, nkabela musumpululu wajoba wakaima kumulyango watente.

Lino, mubuzuba obo bukali bwangu buyoobabukila; njoobasia akubasisila busyu bwangu, nkabela bayoosyukuta, Bayoosikilwa bubi bunji amapenzi manji mane lumwi bakaambe kuti, Sa aya mapenzi taatusikili nkaambo kakuti Leza wesu tali akati kesu?
Ncobeni njoosisa busyu bwangu mubuzuba obo nkaambo kabubi boonse mbobacita, nkaambo batobela baleza bambi.
Lino lemba olu lwiimbo akwiiyisya bana ba-Israyeli, Kolubika mumilomo yabo, kuti olu lwiimbo lube kamboni wangu kubana ba-Israyeli.

Nkaambo nenjoobaletede­ kunyika njendakakonkezya kulibamawisi, nyika iikunka malili abuci, nebanooyoolide cakukuta akuneneya, bayootobela baleza bambi akubakomba, pele mebo bayoondisampaula akujaya cizuminano cangu.

Pele nebayoosikilwa mapenzi mabi manji, olu lwiimbo luyooba kamboni wakubapa mulandu, nkaambo talukoolubwa mumilomo yanyungu zyabo; nkaambo ndizi miyeeyo yabo njebayeeya kale, nekuba kuti nsina kubasisya kunyika njendakakonkezya.
Elyo Musa wakalemba olu lwiimbo mubuzuba obo akwiiyisya bana ba-Israyeli.
Lino Musa naakamaninizya kulemba majwi aa-Mulao oyu mubbuku,
Musa wakalailila ba-Levi basikuyumuna ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova kuti,
Amubweze eli ibbuku lya-Mulao, mulibike kulubazu lwabbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova Leza wanu, likale nkukonya oko, libe kamboni kulindinywe.
Nkaambo ndizi cinguni canu abuyumu bwamyoyo yanu, Asunu nencili muumi akati kanu, muli basicinguni kuli-Jehova. Sa tamukooyooindila ndaakufwa?
Amuyobolole kulindime bapati boonse bamisyobo yanu abasilutwe banu, ngambe majwi aya mumatwi aabo, ntambe ijulu anyika kuti zyoonse zibe bakamboni kulimbabo.

Nkaambo ndizi kuti, ndamana kufwa, ncobeni muyoobisya akuleya kuzwa kunzila njindamulailila, nkabela mumazuba aaboola mapenzi ayoomusikila nkaambo mwacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova akumukalazya kumilimo yamaanza aanu.
Mpawo Musa wakaamba majwi aalwiimbo olu mumatwi aambungano yoonse ya-Israyeli. Wakalumaninizya loonse buyo.
Ayalo nyika iteelele majwi aamulomo wangu,
Majwi aangu aseluke mbuli mume,
Mbuli lusuunsu amweemvwe,
Ambuli luzwamina abwizu,
Nkaambo ndaamba izina lya-Jehova.
Amupe Leza wesu bulemu!
Nkaambo inzila zyakwe zyoonse zililuzi.
Ngu-Leza uusyomeka uutakwe cibi;
Uliluleme, uliluzi.
Bamubisizya,
Tabacili bana bakwe nkaambo katumpenda twabo.
Musela uupilingene uutaluzi,
Inywe nobantu bafubafuba batakwe busongo?
Sa teensi usowanu iwakamulenga?
Ngonguwe iwakamubumba akumubika.
Amwiibaluke mazuba aaciindi,
Amuyeeye myaka yamazyalani aakamana.
Amubuzye bamauso, bamulwiide.
Bapati banu bamupandulwide makani.
Naakaandaanya bana ba-Adamu,
Wakabika migaano yamisyobo,
Mbubonya mbuli mweelwe wabaangelo ba-Leza,
Musyobo wa-Jakobo ncaabilo cakwe,
Munkanda iipilingene iiyoosya.
Wakabafukatila akubalela,
Wakababamba mbuli imboni yaliso.
Mbuli musika mbwabusya citente cakwe,
Mbwababama-babama atala abana bakwe,
Mbwatandabika mababa aakwe akubatambula,
Mbwabayumuna amapepe aakwe,
Mbubonya obo Jehova alike wakali kubazulwida
Katakwe baleza beenzu akati kabo.
Nkabela bakaiya zilyo zyakumyuunda,
Wakabanyonsya buci mundomba,
Amafuta mumwaala muyumu nta,
Amafuta aatubelele abagutu,
Matanga aa-Basana abasijembwe,
Abusu bunante bwabulotwe,
Amusinza wamasaansa uufufuma-fufuma,
Mwakanenea akuba amafuta loko.
Mpawo bakaluba Leza Mulengi wabo,
Akusampaula indomba yalufutuko lwabo.
Bakamufwisya ibbivwe abaleza babo beenzu,
Akumukalazya azintu zyabo zisesemya.
Baleza mbebatezi,
Baleza bapya bazwa kule,
Bamawisaabo mbebatakayoowa.
Mwakaleka kuyeeya Indomba iyakamuzyala;
Leza iwakamubumba mwakamuluba.
Lino Jehova naakabona, wakabasampaula;
Nkaambo kakukalazya kwabana bakwe balombe abanakazi.
Nkabone mamanino aabo na ayooba buti.
Nkaambo musela uuleyauka,
Bana batasyomeki.
Bandikalazya kulizyabuyo zyabo,
Lino ambebo njoobafwisya ibbivwe abaabo batali bantu, Njoobakalazya kumusyobo uusampukide.
Uutenta akusikila kwacimvumwe,
Uutenta nyika amicelo yayo,
Akuumpa intalisyo zyamalundu.
Njoolundika mapenzi alimbabo,
Njoobanyonyoona amivwi yangu,
Bayoonyonyooka kunzala akumulasa aapya,
Alunyonyooko luyoosya.
Njoobatumina banyama bakubaluma,
Abauka bakubakozya.
Amwalo muŋanda muyooba luyoosyo.
Bayoojayigwa bakubusi abasimbi boonse,
Bana bacinyonka abadala basimvwi.
Ndakati bamwaisye,
Kabataciyeeyegwi limbi akati kabantu,
Ndakayoowa kuti basikubasula balaambila mumbi,
Cakwaamba kuti, Maanza esu ngaazunda,
Teensi Jehova wakacita obo.
Nkaambo mbantu babula maanu,
Taakwe busongo mulimbabo.
Nebabona ciyoobazida kumamanino.
Bantu bobile bapozye buti zyuulu zili ikumi?
Cita Indomba yabo yabaaba,
Alimwi Jehova wabalekelezya.
Basinkondoma besu bazumina obo.
Nkaambo musaansa wabo ndunyungu lwa-Sodoma,
Luzwa kumyuunda ya-Gomora;
Masaansa aabo ngemasaansa aakola,
Zikungo zyabo zilalula;
Musinza wao mbuyoka bwanzoka,
Buyoka buyoosya bwankombola.
Sa taanamatikidwe muzilondwedo zyangu,
Maulu aabo naayoolebwa;
Nkaambo buzuba bwamapenzi aabo buli afwaafwi,
Mulandu wabo ulabasikila lino lino,
Uyoofwida balanda bakwe luzyalo,
Naayoobona kuti inguzu iyabo zyamana,
Alimwi taakwe uusyaala, naba mwaange naba mulubusi.
Ili kuli indomba nkubakacijila?
Bali kuli basikulya mafuta aazipaizyo zyabo,
Abasikunywa waini ngubakatila?
Abanyamuke, bamugwasye,
Babe basikumutabilila.
Taakwe Leza umbi kunze kwangu.
Ndime uujaya akuponya,
Ndime uuyasa akusilika;
Taakwe uukonzya kuvuna kumaanza aangu,
Ndakonkezya cakwaamba kuti,
Mbundi muumi lyoonse,
Na ndasyobola ipanga lyangu libeka,
Na ijanza lyangu lyajata lubeteko,
Ncobeni ndaliya inkoto kulibasinkondoma,
Abandisulide ndababweedezya bulumbu bweelede,
Apanga lyangu liyoolya nyama,
Nkokuti bulowa bwabajayidwe abwabasimubuzike,
Buzwa kumitwe yabasinkondonyina balamfu masusu.
Nkaambo ulaliya inkoto yabalanda bakwe.
Ulaliya inkoto kuli basinkondonyina,
Akumanya milandu yanyika yabantu bakwe.
Lino Musa wakazooamba majwi oonse aalwiimbo olu mumatwi aabantu, walo a-Joshua mwana wa-Nuni.
Nkabela Musa naakamana kwaambila ba-Israyeli boonse majwi aya oonse,
wakabaambila kuti, Amubike myoyo yanu kumajwi oonse ngendamucenjezya buzuba obuno, kuti mukalailile bana banu mbubonya, kuti bacenjele kubamba majwi oonse aayooyu Mulao.
Nkaambo tacili cintu ciniini buyo pe, mbobuumi bwanu. Mumakani aya momukonzya koongweda munyika eyo njemuyoovuba mutala lya-Jordano.
Tanta eci cilundu ca-Abarimu, cilundu ca-Nebo munyika ya-Moabu, cilangene a-Jeriko, uebele nyika ya-Kanana njendapa bana ba-Israyeli kuti baivube.
Nkabela ulafwa oko kucilundu nkosi tante, utolwe kulibamauso, mbubonya mbuli Aroni munyoko mbwaakafwa kucilundu ca-Hori akutolwa kulibasikale bakwe,
nkaambo mwakandipapila akati kabana ba-Israyeli kumaanzi aa-Meriba-Kadesi munkanda ya-Zini, nkaambo mwakabula kundilemeka akati kabana ba-Israyeli.
Kubona ulabona nyika ameso aako kule, pele kusika tokooyoosika oko kunyika njendapa bana ba-Israyeli.
Wakati,
Jehova wakazwa ku-Sinai,
Wakatusikila kuzwa ku-Seiri mbuli bucedo,
Wakatumunikila kuzwa kucilundu ca-Parana;
Wakazwa kuzyuulu zyazyuulu zyabasalala,
Akululyo lwakwe kakuli mulilo uuyaka,
Abasalali bakwe boonse bakali mujanza lyako.
Bakatobela kusule lyako,
Akutambula majwi aako.
Kuti ube lukono lwaciinga ca-Jakobo.
Basilutwe babantu nebakabungene,
Antoomwe amisyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli.
Rubeni apone, atafwi pe,
Nekuba kuti bantu bakwe balaceya,
Swiilila, O Jehova, ijwi lya-Juda,
Akumunjizya mukati kabantu bakwe,
Maanza aakwe abe anguzu zyakulivunya;
Umugwasye kuli basinkondonyina.
Upe Levi cisonzyo cako ca-Tumimu,
Amululami wako umupe cisonzyo ca-Urimu.
Ngonguwe ngowakasunka ku-Masa,
Akukazyanya awe kumaanzi aa-Meriba;
lwakakaka banabakwabo akuluba bana bakwe,
Nkaambo bakabamba majwi aako akukakatila kucizuminano cako.
Aba-Israyeli milao yako.
Bayookubikila tununkilizyo,
Akutenta zipaizyo acipaililo cako.
Amilimo yamaanza aabo itambulike kulinduwe,
Abo bababusizya inkondo, kobauma mucikungu,
Akujaya boonse babasulide, batabuki limbi,
Ngaaya makani ngaakaamba aa-Benjamini:
Muyandwi wa-Jehova ulakala cakuliiba mulinguwe,
Ulamutabilila buzuba boonse,
Ulikede akati kazilundu zyakwe,
Jehova alongezye nyika yakwe.
Amupe zintu ziyandisi zyakujulu,
Azyamaanzi malamfu kunsi anyika,
Zintu ziyandika nzelimeneka izuba,
Zintu ziyandika ziboneka mumwezi umwi aumwi,
Azintu ziyandika zyakuzilundu zyaciindi,
Acoolwe ca-Yooyo iwakakede muciteo.
Ezi zyoonse ziseluke ali-Josefa,
Amutwe wayooyo iwakapambukene ababunyina,
Ameja aakwe ngemeja aanyati;
Uyootandya bamasi angao,
Abatande boonse kumagolelo aanyika,
Mbubabede makamu makamu aabantu ba-Efraimu,
Azyuulu zinji zyabana ba-Manase.
Ngaaya makani ngaakaamba aa-Zebuloni:
Amusekelele, noba-Zebuloni, mukweendeenda kwanu,
Anywebo, noba-Isakara, muzilao zyanu.
Akooko bayoopaizya zipaizyo zyabululami
Nkaambo bayoonyonka buvubi bwakulwizi
Azintu ziyandika zisisidwe zyamumusee.
Alumbwe Oyo uukomezya Gadi,
Gadi ulabwantama mbuli mulavu,
Ulakwamauna kuboko akaama kamutwe koonse,
Nkaambo oko kakuli caabilo casilutwe;
Nekubaboobo wakeza abapati babantu,
Kuzoocita milimo iiluleme ya-Jebova
Ambeta zyakwe antoomwe aba-Israyeli,
Dani ngumwana wamulavu, Uusotauka kuzwa ku-Basana,
Nywebo noba-Nafitali, mulikutide luzyalo,
Mulizwide coolwe ca-Jehova.
Amuvube Iziba anyika yakumusanza,
Aseri alongezegwe kwiinda bana boonse,
Abe acoolwe akati kababunyina,
Myeendo yakwe ilyataule mulimafuta.
Minkulu yako ilaba butale amukuba,
Anguzu zyako zinooba mbuli myaka yako,
Uuza butantide kuzwa kujulu kuzookugwasya,
Akweenda mujulu mubulemu bwakwe,
Amaboko aakwe aatamani alakutabilila,
Ngonguwe wakatanda basinkondonyoko kunembo lyako,
Cakwaamba kuti, Banyonyooke.
Kasensa ka-Israyeli kalikede kalike,
Munyika yamaila ayawaini;
Ncobeni ijulu lyakwe lilawisya mume.
Taakwe bantu bali mbuli ndinywe,
bavunwa kuli-Jehova!
Nintobo iimugwasya,
Ndipanga lyakuzundya!
Basinkondonyoko banooza bulibombya kulindinywe,
Pele nywebo munooya bulyataula atala lyazilundu.
acisi coonse ca-Nafitali, anyika ya-Efraimu aya-Manase, acisi coonse ca-Juda mane kusikila kulwizi lwakumbo,
acisi cakumusanza, amwezi wa-Jeriko munzi watukunka, mane kusikila ku-Zoari.
Lino Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Njeeyi nyika njendakakonkezya Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo cakwaamba kuti, Njooipa lunyungu lwanu. Ndakubonya njiyo ameso aako, pele tokoonjila rmiliniiyo pe.
Elyo Musa mulanda wa-Jehova wakafwa nkukonya oko kucisi ca-Moabu, mbubonya mbwaakaamba Jehova.
Nkabela wakamuzika mukuti lyakucisi ca-Moabu lilangene a-Beti-Peori. Taakwe muntu naba omwe uubwene kabanda kakwe nkukabede, akusikila sunu.
Musa kajisi myaka iili mwanda amakumi obile naakafwa. Meso aakwe kaatakwe gubi, anguzu zyakwe kazitana kumana.
Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakalila Musa mazuba aali makumi otatwe oko kumageze aa-Moabu. Mpawo mazuba aakulila Musa akamana.
Takunabwenekede musinsimi aumbi akati kaba-Israyeli uuli mbuli Musa, ngubakazibana a-Jehova busyu kubusyu.
Takunabwenekede umwi uuleene awe muzitondezyo zyoonse amumilimo yoonse iigambya Jehova njaakamutumide kuti aicite munyika ya-Egepita, kuli-Farao akubantu bakwe boonse akunyika yakwe yoonse,
amunguzu zyakwe zigambya amumilimo mipati iiyoosya Musa njaakacita mumeso aaba-Israyeli boonse.
Musa mulanda wangu wafwa. Lino buka, uzubuke oyu mulonga wa-Jordano, uwe abantu aba boonse, kuti muye kunyika ilya njinti bape bana ba-Israydi,
Kufumbwa antu aayoolyatwa andyato zyamaulu aanu njoomupa mpawo, mbubonya mbundakaambila Musa,
Kuzwa kunkanda akuzwa kucilundu eci ca-Lebano mane kusikila kumulonga, mulonga mupati wa-Firate, nyika yoonse yaba-Hiti, akusikila kulwizi lupati luli kububbila, yoonse buyo iyooba CISI canu.
Takukooyooba muntu naba omwe uukonzya kwiima nji kunembo lyako mazuba oonse ngoyoopona, Mbuli Musa mbundakali awe, njooba ayebo mbubonya. Nsikwe nenti kamulekelezye nikuba kuyoomuleka buyo pe.
Koyuma akuba mukozu, nkaambo nduwe uuyookonya bantu aba nyika njindakakonkezya bamawisi kuti njoobapa njiyo,

Pele koyuma akuba mukozu loko kuti mubambe kabotu mulao woonse Musa mulanda wangu ngwaakamulailila. Utaleyi kuzwa kulinguwo, pe, nikuba kululyo nikuba kulumwensi, kuti ujane coolwe koonse koonse nkoya.

EH ibbuku lyamulao talyeelede kutantamuka kumulomo wako, pe, uleelede kubika miyeeyo yako kulindilyo lyoonse buyo, isikati amasiku, kuti ubambe kabotu makani oonse aalembedwe mumo, nkaambo kucita obo nkokukonzya kubotya inzila yako akukuletela coolwe.
Sa teensi ndime ndakulailila na? Koyuma akuba mukozu. Utakankami nikuba kuyoowa, pe, nkaambo Jehova Leza wako uli ayebo koonse koonse nkoya,
Mpawo Joshua wakalailila basilutwe babantu kuti,
Amwiinde koonse koonse akati kazilao, mwaambile bantu kuti, Amulibambile zyakulya, nkaambo amana buyo mazuba otatwe, muyoozubuka oyu mulonga waJordano kuyoovuba nyika eyo Jehova Leza wanu njamukonya,
Mutalubi ijwi Musa mulanda wa-Jehova ndyaakamulailila, Wakati, Jehova Leza wanu wamupa kulyokezya, wamupa nyika ino.

Lino banakazi banu atwana twanu aŋombe zyanu, boonse balasyaala mumonya munyika Musa njaakamupa mutala omuno lya-Jordano, pele inywe nubeni muleelede kuzubuka azilwisyo zyanu kunembo lyabasiluzubo banu. Bazubuke boonse baalumi basintaze, kuti mubagwasye,

mane Jehova amane kupa basiluzubo banu kulyokezya mbubonya mbumwapegwa anywe, bavube abalo nyika Jehova Leza wanu njabapa, elyo kusule muzooboola kunyika yalukono lwanu, mwiivube eyi nyika Musa mulanda wa-Jehova njaakamupa omuno mutala lya-Jordano kubuzwezuba.
Nkabela bakavwiila Joshua kuti, Makani oonse ngotulailila tulaacita, alimwi koonse nkoyootutuma tuyooinka nkuko.
Mbubonya mbutwakaswiilila Musa, tulakuswiilila ayebo, pele Jehova Leza wako abe ayebo mbubonya mbwaakali a-Musa.
Kufumbwa muntu uusampaula majwi aako akutaswiilila makani oonse ngomulailila, uleelede kujayigwa. Koyuma buyo akuba mukozu.
Elyo mwami wa-Jeriko wakaambilwa kuti, Bona! K wasika bantu bazwa kubana baIsrayeli, beza kuzoolanga nyika mbwiibede.
Mpawo mwami wa-Jeriko wakatumina Rahabu, wakati, Leta abo bantu ibakasika kulinduwe, nkaambo kulanga-langa nyika yoonse nciceeco ncibazida.
Lino mwanakazi wakabweza abo bantu bobile, wakabasisa, elyo wakati, Ncobeni ndakasikilwa bantu, pele teendakezi na bazwa kuli,
nkabela nikwakadimaana, ciindi mulyango wamunzi nuujalwa, abo bantu bakainka. Nsizi na bantu baya kuli, pe. Amufwambaane kubatobela, mulabeenzya.
Pele kabatansikide atala alululi lwaŋanda, akubasisa kunsi lyazisiko zyabutonje nzyaakayanikide alululi,
Elyo bantu bakali kuya bubatobela munzila iiya ku-Jordano kusikila kucito. Nkabela basikutobela bamane buyo kuya anze, ndilyonya bakajala mulyango wamunzi.
Lino kabatana kulala, mwanakazi wakatanta alimbabo alululi mpobakabede,
wakaambila abo baalumi kuti, Ndizi kuti Jehova wamupa nyika, alimwi iswe twasikilwa buyoofu nkaambo kandinywe, abantu boonse banyika balaya bumwaika kubusyu bwanu.

Nkaambo twakamvwa Jehova mbwaakamuyuminizizya maanzi aa-Lwizi Lusalala ciindi eciya nimwakazwa kuEgepita, ambumwakacitila bami bobile ba-Amori ibakali kutala lya-Jordano, Sihoni a-Ogi mbemwakanyonyoona.
Mbutwakamvwa buyo, myoyo yesu yakayaaya, katacikwe limbi bukozu mumuntu naba omwe nkaambo kanu, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu ngu-Leza wakujulu awaansi ano.
Lino amundisyomezye cakukonka muzina lya-Jehova kuti, mbubonya mbundamucitila caluzyalo, anywebo mukacitile luzubo lwataata luzyalo, alimwi amundipe citondezyo calusyomo lwanu.
Amundisyomezye kuti mukabafwide insoni taata abama, bakulana bangu abacizi bangu, azyoonse nzibajisi, akuvuna buumi bwesu, kuti tutakafwi.
Elyo wakabaselusya antambo kuzwida acipulo, nkaambo iŋanda yakwe yakaliyakidwe abulambo bwamunzi, wakali kukala abulambo.
Wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya kuzilundu, kuti basikutobela batamweenzyi, alimwi mukakale nkuko mazuba otatwe mane basikutobela baboole, elyo mukainke kulindinywe.

cita kuciindi eco ncituti kaboole omuno mucisi ukaange acipulo intambo iisalalisya tyu eyi njiyonya njowatuselusya ayo. Alimwi bauso abanyoko abanabakwanu abasiluzubo boonse bauso, uleelede kubayobolola boonse omu muŋanda,
Kufumbwa muntu uuzwa muŋanda akuya bweendeenda anze, makani aakwe mwini, iswe tatukooyooba amulandu anguwe pe. Pele boonse ibayooba ayebo muŋanda, mulandu wesu na kukacitike cintu kulimbabo,
Alimwi kuti waambila muntu aya makani esu, elyo tatukooyooba amulandu kucikonke eci ncowatukonzya­.
Mpawo mwanakazi wakati, Mbukubede mbubonya mbumwaamba,
Elyo naakamana kubaselusya, bakainka. Nkabela intambo iisalalisya tyu wakiianga acipulo.
Lino bakaya kuzilundu, bakalindila nkuko mazuba otatwe, mane bakaboole basikutobela. Basikutobela bakali kuyandaula munzila zyoonse, nekubaboobo teebakabajana pe.
Elyo abo baalumi bobile bakazwa kuzilundu, bakazubuka, bakapiluka kuli-Joshua mwana wa-Nuni, akumwaambila zyoonse nzibakabona.
Bakaambila Joshua kuti, Ncobeni cisi coonse Jehova wacaaba mumaanza esu, Boonse bantu bamucisi balaya bumwaika kubusyu bwesu.
Lino nikwakamana mazuba otatwe, basilutwe bakainda koonse koonse akati kazilao,
bakalailila bantu kuti, Mwabona buyo ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova Leza wanu, abapaizi ba-Levi bacibwezede, elyo anywebo amutalike kweenda, mulitobele.
Pele amweende kulekule kulindilyo, kusyaale intaamu zili cuulu, mutasweni kufwaafwi kulindilyo pe, kuti muzibe inzila njimuti tole, nkaambo tamuna kwiinda munzila eyi pe.
Alimwi Joshua wakaambila bapaizi kuti, Amubweze ibbokesi lyacizuminano, muzubuke kunembo lyabantu. Elyo bakabweza ibbokesi lyacizuminano akuya kunembo lyabantu.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Joshua kuti, Buzuba obuno ndatalika kukulemya mumeso aaba-Israyeli boonse, bazibe kuti mbuli mbundakali a-Musa njooba ayebo mbubonya,
Lino uleelede kulailila bapaizi bayumuna ibbokesi lyacizuminano kuti, Mwasika buyo kumaanzi aamu-Jordano, amwiime mumonya mu-Jordano.
Elyo Joshua wakaambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Amuswene okuno, muswiilile majwi aa-Jehova Leza wanu,
Joshua wakati, Mbuboobo mbumuti zibe kuti Leza muumi mpali akati kanu, alimwi kuti ncobeni uyoomutandila ba-Kanana aba-Hiti aba-Hivi, ba-Perizi aba-Girigasi, ba-Amori aba-Jebusi,
Amubone! Ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Mwami wanyika yoonse lilazubuka Jordano kunembo lyanu.
Lino amulisalile bantu bali ikumi ababili kuzwa kumikowa ya-Israyeli, muntu omwe omwe kumikowa yoonse,

Nkabela indyato zyamaulu aabapaizi, basikuyumuna ibbokesi lya-Jehova Mwami wanyika yoonse, zyatompa buyo mumaanzi aa-Jordano, ndilyonya maanzi aa-Jordano ayootimbuka. Maanzi aazwida ajulu ayooimikila akulilundika cilwi,

Nkabela basikuyumuna ibbokesi nibakasika ku-Jordano, indyato zyamaulu aabapaizi babwezede ibbokesi mbuzyakatompa buyo mumaanzi, (nkaambo mulonga wa-Jordano ulapaya moonse munkomwe zyawo ciindi coonse cakutebula),

ndilyonya maanzi aazwa kujulu akaimikila akulilundika cilwi kule loko ku-Adamu, munzi uuli kumbali ku-Zaretani, amaanzi aakali kuya kulwizi lwa-Araba, nkukuti lwizi lwamunyo, akatimbuka, akamana, aboobo bantu bakazubukila mpoonya awo aalangene a-Jeriko,
Nkabela bapaizi basikuyumuna ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova bakaimikila anyika injumu mukati kamulonga, aba-Israyeli boonse bakainda anyika injumu mane bantu boonse bamaninina kuzubuka Jordano.
Amulisalile baalumi bali ikumi ababili kuzwa kubantu, omwe omwe kumikowa yoonse,
mubalailile kuti, Amubweze mabwe aali ikumi aabili aazwa akati ka-Jordano, mpoonya awo mpaakaimvwi maulu aabapaizi, mwaatolelezye akuyooabika nkukonya nkumuyoolala sunu.
Mpawo Joshua wakaita baalumi bali ikumi ababili mbaakabambide kuzwa kubana ba-Israyeli, omwe omwe kumikowa yoonse,
Wakabaambila kuti, Amwiinde kunembo lyabbekesi lya-Jehova Leza wanu kusika akati ka-Jordano, mubweze umwi aumwi ibbwe aciwezo cakwe, abe mbubonya mbuli mweelwe wamikowa yabana ba-Israyeli,
kuti cikabe citondezyo akati kanu, Lino bana banu nibayoomubuzya kuti, Ino aya mabwe alaambanzi?

muyoobapandulwida kuti, Mpoonya awa maanzi aa-Jordano mpaakatimbuka kubusyu bwabbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova, ciindi eciya nilyakazubuka jordano amaanzi aa-Jordano naakatimbuka. Aya mabwe ayooba ciibalusyo kubana ba-Israyeli mazuba oonse.
