Lino bana ba-Israyeli bakacita mbubonya mbwaakabalailila Joshua. Bakabweza mabwe aali ikumi aabili aazwa akati ka-Jordano, mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Joshua, mbuli mweelwe wamikowa yabana ba-Israyeli, bakazubuka awo akwaatolelezya nkubakaakulala, bakaabamba nkukonya.
Alimwi Joshua wakaimika mabwe aali ikumi aabili akati ka-Jordano mpoonya awo mpozyakaimvwi zituta zyabapaizi basikuyumuna ibbokesi lyacizuminano, nkabela mpaacili akusikila sunu,

Elyo bapaizi basikuyumuna ibbokesi bakaliimvwi akati ka-Jordano mane zintu zyoonse nizyakamana Jehova nzyaakalailila Joshua kuti aambile bantu, mbubonya Musa mbwaakalailila Joshua. Nkabela bantu bakafwambaana kuzubuka.
Lino bantu boonse nibakamana kuzubuka, alyalo ibbokesi lya-Jehova lyakazubuka abapaizi kumeso aabantu.
Kwakazubuka basilumamba bali mbuli zyuulu zili makumi one kubusyu bwa-Jehova, boonse kabalibambide kulwa, bakaya kumabanda aa-Jeriko.
Mubuzuba obo Jehova wakalemya Joshua mumeso aaba-Israyeli boonse, nkabela bakamuyoowa mbubonya mbubakali kuyoowa Musa mazuba oonse aabuumi bwakwe.
Mpawo Jehova wakaambila Joshua kuti,
Lailila bapaizi basikuyumuna ibbokesi lyabukamboni kuti bazwe mu-Jordano.
Lino Joshua wakalailila bapaizi kuti, Amuzwe mu-Jordano.

Mpawo bapaizi basikuyumuna ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova, mbubakamana buyo kuzwa mukati ka-Jordano, andyato zyamaulu aabapaizi mbuzyakaampa buyo nyika injumu, maanzi aa-Jordano akaboola mpaakabede, akapaya munkomwe zyawo moonse mbubonya mbaakali kupaya kukutaanguna,
Amabwe ayo aali ikumi aabili ngebakagwisya mu-Jordano, Joshua wakaaimikizya nkukonya ku-Giligala.
Wakaambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Bana banu nibayoomubuzya junza kuti, Ino mabwe aya alaambanzi?
elyo muleelede kuzibya bana banu kuti, Mpoonya awa ba-Israyeli mpobakazubukila Jordano maanzi naakayuminina.

Nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu wakayuminizya maanzi aa-Jordano kumeso aanu mane mwakazubuka, Mbubonya obo Jehova Leza wanu mbwaakacitila Lwizi Lusalala, nkaambo alwalo wakaluyuminizya mane mwakamana kuzubuka,
Aya akacitwa kuti misyobo yoonse yaansi izibe kuti ijanza lya-Jehova lili anguzu, kuti bantu bayoowe Jehova Leza wanu mazuba oonse.
Mpawo Joshua wakalibambila mabwe aabosya, wakapalula bana ba-Israyeli boonse kucilundu candomo.
Lino ncencico Joshua ncaakabapalwida. Bantu boonse ibakazwa ku-Egepita, nkukuti baalumi basilumamba, bakafwa munkanda nibakacili munzila kuzwa ku-Egepita,
Bantu boonse ibakazwa ku-Egepita bakalipalwidwe, pele bantu ibakazyalilwa munkanda nibakacili munzila teebakaina kupalulwa pe.

Nkaambo myaka iili makumi one bana baIsrayeli kabeendeenda munkanda, mane bakamana boonse basilumamba bacisi ibakazwide mu-Egepita, ibakakaka kuswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova. Aba bantu Jehova wakabakonkezya kuti tabakooyoobona nyika eyo Jehova njaakasyomezya bamawisaabo kutupa, nyika iizwide malili abuci,
Lino bana babo mbaakabusya mucimanga cabo, mbembabo Joshua mbaakapalula, nkaambo kabali basilulomo, ikuti kabatana kubapalula munzila.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Joshua kuti, Buzuba obuno ndamukunkulisizya lusampaulo lwa-Egepita, Nciceeco obo busena ncibwakaambilwa kuti Giligala (nkukuti cikunkulisyo), mbubucaambwa asunu.
Nkabela ipobwe lya-Pasika nilyakamana, nibwakaca bakatalika kulya micelo yanyika. Bakalya zinkwa zitakwe bumena amaila mayoke mubuzuba obo mbubonya,
Elyo bamane buyo kulya micelo yanyika, nibwakaca alimwi, zilyo zya-Mana zyakaleka kuwa. Bana ba-Israyeli teebakalya limbi Mana, pe, bakaiya micelo yanyika ya-Kanana mwaka oyo.
Wakati, Pe, ndeza lino mbuli silutwe wamakamu aa-Jehova. Elyo Joshua wakavundama ansi, wakakomba, wakamubuzya kuti, Ino mwami wangu ujisinzi cakwaambila ndime ndemulanda wako?
Silutwe wamakamu aa-Jehova wakaambila Joshua kuti, Samununa insangu zyako kumaulu aako, nkaambo awa mpoimvwi alasalalisya. Mpawo Joshua wakacita obo.
Lino Jeriko kaujalidwe loko nkaambo kabana ba-Israyeli. Katakwe muntu uwakazwa anze, katakwe uwakanjila mukati.
Elyo Jehova wakaambila Joshua kuti, Bona! Jeriko amwami wawo abaalumi basintaze bawo, boonse ndabaaba mumaanza aako,
Lino muleelede kuya buzyunguluka munzi, nubaalumi basilumamba nyoonse, kuzyunguluka munzi lomwe abuzuba, Kamucita obo mazuba aali musanu abumwi.

Nkabela bapaizi bali musanu ababili kabaya bulizya myeembo iili musanu aibili cakusekelela kunembo lyabbokesi lya-Leza, Lino mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili kamuzyunguluka munzi ziindi zili musanu azibili, elyo bapaizi baleelede kusibisya myeembo yabo.

Lino ciindi ncibati sibe myeembo ciindi cilamfu, mwa-mvwa buyo ijwi lyamweembo, bantu boonse baleelede koompolola loompololo lupati, nkabela mpawo bulambo bwamunzi buzoowida ansi mbumu, kuti bantu banjile buyo manjilanjila.
Elyo Joshua mwana wa-Nu ni wakaita bapaizi, wakabaambila kuti, Amubweze ibbokesi lyacizuminano, alimwi bapaizi bali musanu ababili beende amyeembo iili musanu aibili kunembo lyabbokesi lya-Jehova.
Lino wakaambila bantu kuti, Kamuya kunembo, mukazyunguluke munzi, abalo basilumamba bai nde kunembo lyabbokesi lya-Jehova.

Mpawo Joshua amane buyo kwaambila bantu, abo bapaizi bali musanu ababili ibakabwezede myeembo iili musanu aibili kubusyu bwa-Jehova bakainda kunembo, bakali zya myeembo, nkabela ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova lyakatobela munsi,
Abalo basilumamba bakasololela bapaizi basikulizya myeembo, abamwi bakatobela musule lyabbokesi. Bakali kuya bulizya myeembo.
Nkabela Joshua wakalailila bantu kuti, Mutaakuyobayoba nanka kwaamba pe. Kutabi ijwi niliba lyomwe lizwa mumilomo yanu, mane obo buzuba mbunti kamwaambile kuti, Amoompolole. Ndilyonya muloompolola.
Aboobo ibbokesi lya-Jehova wakalizyungulusya munzi. Lyakauzyunguluka komwe, elyo bakaboola muzilao, bakoona mumonya muzilao.

Bapaizi bali musanu ababili ibakali amyeembo iili musanu aibili kunembo lyabbokesi lya-Jehova bakali kuya bulizya myeembo. Basilumamba bakabasololela, abamwi bakeza kusule lyabbokesi lya-Jehova, Bakaya bulizya myeembo.
Elyo nibwakaca buzuba bwabili, bakazyunguluka munzi lomwe, akupiluka kuzilao nkubakakede, Mbuboobo mbubakacita mazuba aali musanu abumwi.
Lino nibwakaca buzuba bwamusanu aabili, bakafuma loko junza-Junza, bakazyunguluka munzi mbubonya ziindi zili musanu azibili. Buzuba obo luzutu bakazyunguluka munzi ziindi zili musanu azibili.
Elyo ciindi camusanu azibili, bapaizi nibakalizya myeembo, Joshua wakaambila bantu kuti, Amoongolole, nkaambo Jehova wamwaabila munzi,
Munzi azintu zili mumo, zyoonse buyo zilaba zya-Jehova. Rahabu simamambe alike nguukonzya kupona, walo abantu mbali abo muŋanda, nkaambo wakasisa batumwa mbutwakatuma.
Lino inywe amucenjele kuzisaalo zitondwa, kuti myoyo yanu itazisukami akuzibweza, nkaambo kucita obo kulapenzya mukowa wa-Israyeli akuuletela mapenzi.
Ingolida ansiliva yoonse, amitiba yamukuba ayabutale, zyoonse buyo nzya-Jehova, zileelede kubikwa muciyobwedo ca-Jehova,
Lino boonse ibakali mumunzi, baalumi abanakazi, banike abacembele, basune ambelele ambongolo, bakabanyonyoona boonse apanga.
Pele abo bantu bobile ibakalanga nyika, Joshua wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya kuŋanda yayooyo simamambe, mukagwisye mumo mwanakazi aboonse mbali abo, mbubonya mbumwakamusyomezezya.

Mpawo abo bakubusi basikulanga nyika bakainka, bakagwisya Rahabu abawisi abanyina abakwabo aboonse mbaakali abo, Basiluzubo lwakwe boonse bakabagwisya, bakabakazika kunze kuzilao nkubakakede ba-Israyeli.
Lino bakatenta munzi amulilo, azintu ayoonse izyakali mumo, pele insiliva angolida amitiba yamukuba ayabutale bakazibika muciyobwedo caŋanda ya-Jehova.
Pele Rahabu simamambe, aluzubo lwawisi, aboonse mbaakali abo, Joshua wakabavuna, aboobo ucipona akati kaba-Israyeli asunu, nkaambo wakasisa batumwa Joshua mbaakatuma kuyoolanga jeriko,
Lino kuzwa ku-Jeriko Joshua wakatuma bantu ku-Ai, kumbali lya-Betiaveni kujwe lya-Beteli, wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya kuyoolanga-langa nyika, Mpawo bantu abo bakaya kuyoolanga Ai.

Nkabela nibakaboola kuli-Joshua, bakamwaambila kuti, Batainki bantu boonse pe, Kuye bantu bali zyuulu zyobile na zyuulu zyotatwe buyo kuyoolwisya Ai. Utakataazyi bantu boonse kuya nkuko, nkaambo bana-Ai mbace.
Elyo kwakasalwa bantu bali mbuli zyuulu zyotatwe, bakainka nkuko, pele bakacija kuzwa kubana-Ai.

Nkabela bana-Ai bakajaya bamwi babo, kabali mbuli makumi otatwe amusanu aumwi. Bakali kuya bubatanda kuzwa kumulyango mane kusikila ku-Sebarimu, elyo bakabajaya kumaselukilo, Lino myoyo yabantu yakayaaya, yakaba mbuli maanzi.

Nkabela Joshua wakati, Maawe, Mwami Jehova! Ino nkaambonzi nowazubula bantu aba ku-Jordano? Sa nkokuti ulayanda kutwaabila mumaanza aaba-Amori, kuti batunyonyoone? Nitwakalamwa kukala kutala lyaJordano!
O Mwami wangu, ngambe buti? Ba-Israyeli bafutatila basinkondonyina.
Lino ba-Kanana abantu boonse bamunyika nibayoomvwa, bayootuzyunguluka akutunyonyweda izina lyesu ansi ano, Ayebo uyoocitila buti izina lyako ipati?
Elyo Jehova wakaambila Joshua kuti, Buka, Nkaambonzi novundeme obo ansi?
Ba-Israyeli babisya, basotoka cizuminano cangu ncindakabalailila, nkaambo balibwezela cisaalo citondwa, alimwi babba, baupaupa ameso, akucibika akati kambono zyabo beni,

Nciceeco bana ba-Israyeli ncibabulila inguzu zyabukozu kumeso aabasinkondonyina. Nciceeco ncibafutatilila basinkondonyina. Bali acintu citondwa. Lino nsikooyooba anywe limbi, cita mukanyonyoone eco cintu citonda cili akati kanu,

Buka, ukasalazye bantu. Kobaambila kuti, Amulisalazye akulibambila junza, nkaambo Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli wati, Cintu citondwa mpocili akati kanu nuba-Israyeli, Tamukonzyi kuba anguzu zyabukozu kumeso aabasinkondonyo mane mugwisye eco cintu citondwa cili akati kanu.

Lino cifumo mulaswena afwiifwi mumisyobo yanu, alimwi oyo musyobo uuti jatwe acisolo ulaswena afwiifwi mumikowa yawo, alimwi mukowa Jehova ngwati jate acisolo ulaswena afwiifwi muziinga zyawo, nkabela ciinga Jehova ncati jate acisolo cilaswena afwiifwi muntu umwi umwi,
Elyo oyo muntu uuti jatwe uuli acintu citondwa uyootentwa mumulilo, walo azyoonse nzyajisi, nkaambo wasotoka cizuminano ca-Jehova, alimwi wacita bufubafuba muIsrayeli.
Lino nibwakaca, Joshua wakafuma, wakaswenya ba-Israyeli mumisyobo yabo, nkabela musyobo wa-Juda nguwakajatwa,
Lino naakaswenya mikowa ya-Juda, wakajata mukowa wa-Azari, alimwi naakaswenya mukowa waAzari ciinga comwe comwe, Zabidi nguwakajatwa,
elyo wakaswenya ciinga cakwe muntu umwi umwi, nkabela Akani mwana wa-Karimi mwana wa-Zabidi mwana wa-Zera, muntu wamusyobo wa-Juda nguwakajatwa.
Mpawo Joshua wakaambila Akani kuti, Mwanaangu, lemeka Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, akulyaamba kulinguwe. Kondaambila ncowakacita. Utandisisili cintu niciba comwe.
Elyo Akani wakavwiila Joshua, wakati, Ncobeni ndabisizya Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Mbuboobu mbundakacita.

Akati kazisaalo ndakabona cikobela cibotu camabala mabala, amasyekeli ZI aansiliva aali myaanda yobile, acikoto cangolida cili abulemu bwamasyekeli aali makumi osanwe. Elyo ndakali kuzyeemuzya, ndakazibweza. Mpozili. Zilisisidwe muvu mukati kacilao cangu, ayalo insiliva mpiili kunsi,
Lino Joshua wakatuma batumwa, nkabela bakafwambaana kuya kucilao cakwe, bakajana kuti cilisisidwe mumonya mucilao, ayalo insiliva mpiili kunsi.
Mpawo bakazigwisya mucilao, bakazitola kuli-Joshua akubana ba-Israyeli boonse, bakazitula kumeso aa-Jehova.

Lino Joshua abana ba-Israyeli boonse bakatola oyo Akani mwana wa-Zera, ansiliva acikobela acikoto cangolida, abana bakwe balombe abana bakwe basimbi, aŋombe zyakwe ambongolo zyakwe ambelele zyakwe acilao cakwe azyoonse nzyaakajisi, bakamutola kumumpata wa-Akori.
Mpawo Joshua wakati, Ino watupenzezyanzi? Jehova uti kupenzye ayebo buzuba obuno. Lino baIsrayeli boonse bakamufusa mabwe, Bakabatenta mumulilo akubafusa mabwe.

Nkabela atala lyakwe bakalundika cilwi cipati camabwe. Mpocicili asunu, Elyo Jehova wakaleka bukali bwakwe bupati, Nciceeco obo busena ncibwaambwa kuti Mumpata wa-Akori (nkukuti wamapenzi), mbubucaambwa asunu.
Uyoocitila munzi wa-Ai amwami wawo mbubonya mbuwakacitila munzi wa-Jeriko amwami wawo; pele zisaalo zyawo aŋombe zyawo mulalibwezela nubeni, Amubike basikuyuba kusule lyamunzi.
Mpawo Joshua wakabuka, abasilumamba boonse, kuti banyamuke kuya ku-Ai, Nkabela Joshua wakasala bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe, baalumi basintaze, wakabatuma masiku,
wakabalailila kuti, Amubone! Inywe muleelede kuyuba kusule lyamunzi. Mutayi kule loko kuzwa kumunzi pe, Amulibambe nyoonse,
Lino mebo abantu boonse mbendi abo tulaswena kufwaafwi kumunzi, pele nibayoozwa kutuswana mbuli mbubakasaanguna kucita, tuyoocija kumeso aabo,
Bayooza bututobela mane tubatole kule kuzwa kumunzi, nkaambo bayooamba kuti, Batucija mbubonya mbuli kukusaanguna. Tuyoocija kuzwa kulimbabo,
elyo inywe muleelede kubuka oko nkumuyubide, mujate munzi, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu uyoouaba mumaanza aanu.
Lino mwamana buyo kujata munzi, amuutente amulilo. Kamucita mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova. Amuswiilile mbundamulailila,
Mpawo Joshua naakabatuma, bakaya kuyooyuba, bakalala akati ka-Beteli a-Ai, kumbo lya-Ai. Pele Joshua wakoona ayo masiku akati kabantu,
Nkabela basilumamba boonse mbaakali abo bakanyamuka, bakaswena kufwaafwi kumunzi, bakayaka zilao zyabo kubbazu lyanyika ya-Ai. Kakuli mumpata akatikati kazilao zyabo akamunzi.
Mpawo wakabweza bantu bali mbuli zyuulu zyosanwe, wakababika mbuli basikuyuba akati ba-Beteli a-Ai, kumbo lyamunzi.
Mbuboobo mbubakabamba bantu, basizilao kabali kunyika yamunzi, basikuyuba kabali kumbo lyamunzi. Lino Joshua wakoona ayo masiku akati kamumpata.
Mpawo Joshua abaIsrayeli boonse bakazundwa kumeso aabo, bakacija munkanda,
Nkabela bantu boonse bamumunzi bakaitwa kuti babatobele, Bakali kuya butobela Joshua, aboobo bakabatanya kule kuzwa kumunzi,
Teekwakasyaala muntu naba omwe mu-Ai nanka mu-Beteli. Boonse buyo bakainka kuyootobela ba-Israyeli. Munzi bakausiya ulijulidwe, bakali kutobela ba-Israyeli,
Nkabela mpawo basikuyuba bakafwambaana kubuka oko nkubakabede, bakazuzaana ndilyonya naakatandabika ijanza lyakwe, bakanjila mumunzi, bakausaala, bakafwambaana kutenta munzi mumulilo.

Aboobo bantu ba-Ai nibakacebuka, bakabona kuti busi bwamunzi bulauntumuka kujulu. Elyo bakabula inguzu zyakucija kumabazu oonse. Nkabela abo bantu ibakacijide musokwe bakapiluka kuzooswanana abasikubatobela.
Joshua aba-Israyeli boonse, nibakabona kuti basikuyuba balisaalide munzi, alimwi busi bwamunzi bulauntumuka kujulu, bakapiluka kuzoozunda bantu ba-Ai.

Abeenzinyina ibakali mumunzi abalo bakazwa kuzoobalwanya, aboobo bana-Ai bakali akatikati kaba-Israyeli, bamwi bakali kumwi kubbazu, abamwi bakali kumwi kubbazu. Bakabazundisya, mane teebakabasiila muntu naba omwe iwakasyaala nanka kuloboka.
Alakwe mwami wa-Ai bakamujata ucili muumi, akumuleta kuli-Joshua.

Lino ba-Israyeli nibakamana kujaya bana-Ai boonse musokwe, mumonya munkanda mubakabatobelede, bamane buyo kuwisigwa apanga akutasyaala muntu naba omwe, ba-Israyeli boonse bakaboola ku-Ai akuunyonyoona apanga,
Nkabela boonse ibakajayigwa obo buzuba, baalumi abanakazi, bakali zyuulu zili ikumi azibili, nkukuti bantu boonse ba-Ai.
Joshua teewakaboozya ijanza lyakwe ndyaakatandabisya isumo mane wakamaninina kunyonyoona bantu boonse ba-Ai,
Pele iŋombe azisaalo zyamumunzi, ba-Israyeli bakazibweza beni, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Joshua.
Nkabela Joshua wakatenta Ai, kwakasyaala inkalaya, matongo buyo mazuba oonse, mbuucibede asunu.

Alimwi mwami wa-Ai, wakamwaanzika amusamu mane kusikila kumangolezya, elyo izuba nilyakabbila, Joshua wakalailila kuti bagwisye mutunta wakwe kumusamu, nkabela bakausowa kumulyango wamunzi, akulundika atala lyawo cilwi cipati camabwe. Mpocicili asunu.

Wakaciyaka mbubonya mbuli Musa mulanda wa-Jehova mbwaakalailila bana ba-Israyeli, mbuli mbukulembedwe mubbuku lyamulao wa-Musa, nkukuti cipaililo camabwe aatabezedwe, muntu ngaatana kubamba-bamba acibulo cakwe. Alincico mpobakali kupailila Jehova zipaizyo azituuzyo zyakutontozya.
Alimwi mponya awo amabwe wakalemba ciindululo camulao wa-Musa, ngwaakalemba kumeso aaba-Israyeli.

Lino ba-Israyeli boonse, abapati abasilutwe ababetesi babo, bakaliimvwi kubbazu akubbazu lyabbokesi kunembo lyabapaizi ba-Levi basikuyumuna ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova. Banacisi abeenzu boonse bakacita obo, Cisela cimwi kaciimvwi kunembo lyacilundu ca-Gerizimu, acisela cimwi kaciimvwi kunembo lyacilundu ca-Ebala, mbubonya Musa mulanda wa-Jehova mbwaakalailila, kuti bataangune kulongezya bantu ba-Israyeli,
Elyo wakabala majwi oonse aamulao, majwi aakulonjezya amajwi aakutuka, oonse aalembedwe mubbuku lyamulao.
Katakwe ijwi niliba lyomwe akati kamakani Musa ngaakalailila ndyatakabala Joshua kumeso aambungano yaba-Israyeli abanakazi abana abeenzu mbebakeenda abo.
bakabungana camoyo omwe kuzoolwana a-Joshua aba-Israyeli.
abalo bakacita cakweena-ena, bakalicita mbuli bangambela. Bakabweza zisani zyamasaka zikulukulu ambongolo zyabo, ankomo zyawaini zikulukulu izyakali abudeluule busumidwe,
alimwi bakasama insangu zikulukulu zizakede kumaulu aabo, akusama zikobela zikulukulu, azyalo zinkwa zyabulilu bwabo zyakayuma akuba ankubi.
Lino bakasika kuliJoshua kuzilao nkwaakakede ku-Giligala, bakaambila nguwe abana baIsrayeli kuti, Twazwa kucisi cakule, Lino atutangane anywebo cizuminano.
Pele bantu ba-Israyeli bakaambila ba-Hivi kuti, Ambweni mulikede mpoonya ano akati kesu, Tutangane buti cizuminano anywebo?
Bakaambila Joshua kuti, Tuli balanda bako, Joshua wakababuzya kuti, Ndinywe bani? Mwazwa kuli?
Bakati, Iswe tubalanda bako twazwa kucisi cili kule loko, nkaambo kazina lya-Jehova Leza wanu, nkaambo kakuti tulimvwide impuwo yakwe, ambwaakacita mu-Egepita,
azintu zyoonse nzyaakacitila bami bobile baba-Amori ibakakede mutala lya-Jordano, nkukuti Sihoni mwami waku-Hesiboni a-Ogi mwami wa-Basana iwakali ku-Asitorotu,
Lino bapati besu abantu boonse bamucisi cesu bakatwaambila kuti, Amubweze bulilu bwalweendo lwanu, mukainke kuyooswanana abo, mukabaambile kuti, Tuli balanda banu, atutangane anywebo cizuminano.
Amubone! Ezi zinkwa zyesu twakazibweza kazicikasaala kuzwa kumaanda esu mubuzuba obo nitwakanyamuka kuzoomuswaya, pele sunu zyayuma akuba ankubi.
Azyalo inkomo ezi zyawaini, nitwakazizuzya, zyakacili impya, pele lino zyazakaala. Azyakusama zyesu ansangu zyesu zyoonse zyacembaala nkaambo kamusinzo mulamfu loko.
Nkabela Joshua wakabacitila luumuno, wakatangana abo cizuminano cakutabajaya, alimwi basilutwe bambungano bakakonkezya mbubonya,
Pele nikwakamana mazuba otatwe aakutanga cizuminano eci, bakamvwa kuti balibambene abo, balikede mpoonya akati kabo,
nkaambo bana ba-Israyeli nibakalonga, bakasika kuminzi yabo mubuzuba bwatatu. Mazina aaminzi yabo ngaaya: Gibeoni a-Kefira a-Beeroti a-Kiriyatijearimu.
Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakakaka kubanyonyoona, ikuti basilutwe bambungano bakalibakonkezezye muzina lya-Jehova Leza waIsrayeli, Pele bantu boonse bakatongaukila basilutwe,
Elyo basilutwe bakaambila bantu kuti, Twabakonkezya muzina lya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, aboobo takukonzyi kubacitila cintu,
Tulabacitila obo. Tulabavuna, kuti tutasikilwi bukali nkaambo kacikonkezyo cesu ncitwakabakonkezya.
Bapone, pele babe basikutebba inkuni abasikuteka maanzi, babelekele imbungano­ yoonse milimo, mbubonya basilutwe mbubakalailila.
Mpawo jeshua wakabaita, wakabaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nomwakatweena? Mwakati, Twazwa kule loko, anukuti mulikede mpoonya ano akati kesu,
Lino mulitukidwe. Takukooyooba muntu naba omwe akati kanu uutakooyooba muzike, Muyooba basikutebba inkuni abasikuteka maanzi, mubeleke milimo yaŋanda ya-Leza wangu,
Lino sunu tuli mumaanza aako. Kotucitila coonse ncoyanda, kufumbwa cintu cilulama mumeso aako.
Mbuboobo mbwaakabacitila akubavuna kumaanza aabana-Israyeli, aboobo teebakabajaya.
Mubuzuba obo Joshua wakababika kuti babe basikutebba inkuni abasikuteka maanzi, babeleke milimo yambungano ayacipaililo ca-Jehova mubusena obo mbwaakati sale. Asunu mbubacibede.
Nkabela bakayoowa loko, nkaambo kakuti Gibeoni koli munzi mupati, koli mbuli umwi waminzi yabami,
Elyo Adoni-Zedeki mwami wa-Jerusalemu wakatumina Hohamu mwami wa-Hebroni, a-Piramu mwami wa-Jarimuti, a-Jafiya mwami wa-Lakisi, a-Dibri mwami wa-Egiloni, wakati,
Amuboole kuzoondigwasya, tulwisye Gibeoni, nkaambo balitangene buzolwani a-Joshua abana ba-Israyeli,

Aboobo bami bosanwe baba-Amori, mwami wa-Jerusalemu, amwami wa-Hebroni, amwami waJarimuti, amwami wa-Lakisi, amwami wa-Egiloni, bakayoboloka, balo abasilumamba babo boonse, bakainka kuyoocita inkondo yakulwisya Gibeoni.
Elyo Joshua wakanyamuka kuzwa ku-Giligala, walo abasilumamba boonse abaalumi basintaze boonse,
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Joshua kuti, Utabayoowi pe, nkaambo ndabaaba mumaanza aako, Takukooyooba muntu naba omwe akati kabo uukonzya kwiima nji kukulwisya,
Lino Joshua wakababbatikizya, nkaambo wakeenda masiku oonse kuzwa ku-Giligala.
Nkabela Jehova wakabapilinganya kubusyu bwaba-Israyeli, aboobo bakabakoma alukomo lupati mu-Gibeoni, alimwi kabaya bubatanda munzila iiya ku-Betoroni, akubakoma mane kusikila ku-Azeka aku-Makeda,

Nkabela nibakali mukucija bana ba-Israyeli, nibakacili mukuseluka kuzwa ku-Betoroni, Jehova wakabalosezya mabwe mapati aazwa kujulu mane kusikila ku-Azeka, aboobo bakafwa, Abo ibakajayigwa kucivulamabwe eco kabali banji loko kwiinda abo bana ba-Israyeli mbubakajazya ipanga,
o zuba, imikila a-Gibeoni,
Ayebo O mwezi, imikila mumumpata wa-Ajalo.
Kakutakwe buzuba buli boobu kuciindi cakamana, alimwi kakutakwe abumwi musule, Jehova naakaswiilila ijwi lyamuntu, nkaambo Jehova wakalwida ba-Israyeli.
Mpawo Joshua wakabweda aba-Israyeli boonse kuzilao nkubakakede ku-Giligala,
Elyo aba bami bosanwe bakaloboka, baakuyuba mumpangala kuMakeda.
Nkabela Joshua wakaambilwa kuti, bami bosanwe bajanwa, baliyubide mumpangala ku-Makeda.
Mpawo Joshua wakati, Amukunkulisye mabwe mapati kumulomo wampanga la, alimwi amusale bantu basikubalindila,
Pele inywe mutaimi pe, Kamuya butobela basinko-ndonyoko, mukabaume kusule, Mutabazumizyi kunjila muminzi yabo pe. Jehova Leza wanu wabaaba mumaanza aanu.
Lino Joshua abana ba-Israyeli nibakamana kubauma luumo lupati loko mane babamaninizya, abamwi ibakasyaala nibakanjila muminzi iizyungulukidwe imbaya,
bantu boonse bakapiluka kuli Joshua kuzilao zyakuMakeda caluumuno. Katakwe muntu naba omwe iwakaputya lulimi lwakwe kubana ba-Israyeli.
Elyo Joshua wakati, Amujule mulyango wampangala, mundiletele abo bami bosanwe bali mumo.
Mpawo bakacita mbwaakaamba. Bakamuletela abo bami bosanwe ibakali mumpangala, mwami wa-Jerusalemu, mwami wa-Hebroni, mwami wa-Jarimuti, mwami wa-Lakisi, amwami wa-Egiloni.

Nkabela nibakabaleta abo bami kuliJoshua, Joshua wakaita bantu boonse ba-Israyeli, wakaambila basilutwe babasilumamba mbaakaya abo, wakati, Amuswene afwaafwi, muzoolyate munsingo zyabami aba, Mpawo bakaswena afwaafwi akulyata munsingo zyabo.
Nkabela Joshua wakabaambila kuti, Mutakankami nikuba kuyoowa, Amuyume akuba bakozu, nkaambo mbubonya obo Jehova mbwayoocitila basinkondonyokwe boonse mbumuyoolwana abo.
Elyo musule lyayaaya, Joshua wakabauma akubajaya, nkabela wakabaanzika mumisamu yosanwe, Bakalyaanzikidwe mumonya mumisamu mane kusikila mangolezya.

nkabela Jehova wakauaba mumaanza aaba-Israyeli, amwami wawo. Wakasaazya munzi apanga, abantu boonse ibakali mumo, taakwe naba omwe ngwaakasia, alimwi wakacitila mwami wawo mbubonya mbwaakacitila mwami wa-Jeriko,
Elyo Jehova wakaaba Lakisi mumaanza aaba-Israyeli, nkabela wakauzunda mubuzuba bwabili, akuusaazya ipanga, abantu boonse ibakali mumo, mbubonya mbwaakacita ku-Libina,
Elyo Joshua aba-Israyeli boonse bakainda kuzwa ku-Lakisi kuya ku-Egiloni, bakayaka zilao zyabo nkukonya oko kuti baulwisye.
Nkabela bakauzunda mubuzuba obo, akuunyonyoozya ipanga, abantu boonse ibakali mumo wakabamaninizya mubuzuba obo, mbubonya mbwaakacita ku-Lakisi,

Nkabela bakauzunda akuusaazya ipanga, amwami wawo aminzi yawo abantu boonse ibakali mulinguwo. Teewakasia muntu naba omwe, pe, wakaucitila mbubonya mbwaakacitila Egiloni. Wakaunyonyoona abantu boonse ibakali mulinguwo.

Nkabela wakauzunda, amwami wawo aminzi yawo, wakabajazya ipanga, nkabela bantu boonse ibakali mumo wakabanyonyoona mane teekwakasyaala muntu naba omwe, Wakacitila Dibiri amwami wawo mbubonya mbwaakacitila Hebroni, ambubonya mbwaakacitila Libina amwami wawo.
Nyika yoonse Joshua wakaisaala kuzwa ku-Kadesi-Barinea kusikila ku-Gaza, acisi coonse ca-Goseni mane kusikila ku-Gibeoni.
Bami aba boonse anyika yabo Joshua wakabazunda lweendo lomwe, nkaambo Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli wakali kulwida ba-Israyeli,
Mpawo Joshua wakapiluka abana ba-Israyeli boonse kuzilao nkubakakede ku-Giligala.
abami ibakali kukala muzilundu zyakunyika, abaabo ibakali munkanda yakubbazu lyamusanza lya-Kineroti, amutulundulundu, amunyika indamfu yaku-Doro kumbo,
ba-Kanana bakujwe abakumbo, ba-Amori, ba-Hiti, ba-Perizi, aba-Jebusi bakuzilundu, aba-Hivi bamunsi lyacilundu ca-Herimoni mucisi ca-Mizipa,
Nkabela bakazwa boonse abami babo, bantu banji loko mbuli musee wamunkomwe yalwizi, ambizi ankalaki zinji loko.
Aba bami boonse bakabungana, bakeza kuzookala-kala kudambwa lya-Meromu kuti balwisye ba-Israyeli.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Joshua kuti, Utabayoowi pe, nkaambo junza mbuli eno njoobaaba boonse bajayidwe kale kubusyu bwaba-Israyeli. Imbizi zyabo mulazilemanya, ankalaki zyabo mulazitenta mumulilo.
Mpawo Joshua abasilumamba boonse mbakali abo bakabasikila cakutazibwa kudambwa lya-Meromu, bakaliwaala alimbabo.

Elyo Jehova wakabaaba mumaanza aaba-Israyeli, nkabela bakabazunda akubatanda mane kusikila ku-Zidoni mupati, aku-Miseripotu-Maimu akumumpata wa-Mizepe uuli kujwe, akuya bubajaya mane teekwakasyaala muntu naba omwe.
Nkabela Joshua wakabacitila mbubonya Jehova mbwaakamulailila. Imbizi zyabo wakazilemanya, ankalaki zyabo wakazitenta mumulilo.
Lino kuciindi eco, Joshua naakaboola, wakazunda Hazori, amwami wawo wakamujazya ipanga, nkaambo kumatalikilo cisi caku-Hazori kacili cipati akati kazisi ezi zyoonse.
Abantu boonse ibakali mumo bakabajazya ipanga, akubanyonyoona. Teebakasia muumi naba omwe, pe, alimwi munzi wa-Hazori bakautenta mumulilo,
Nkabela minzi yoonse yabami aba Joshua wakaisaala, abami bayo boonse. Wakabajazya ipanga akubanyonyoona, mbubonya mbuli Musa mulanda wa-Jehova mbwaakalailila.
Pele minzi iyakayakidwe atala atulundu ba-Israyeli teebakaitenta pe, cita Hazori ulike Joshua ngwaakatenta.
Lino zisaalo zyaminzi eyi, aŋombe, bana ba-Israyeli bakalibwezela zyoonse, pele boonse bantu bakabajazya ipanga akubanyonyoona mane teekwakasyaala naba omwe muumi.
Mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa mulanda wakwe, alakwe Musa mbwaakalailila Joshua, mbubonya obo Joshua mbwaakacita. Teewakaleka ijwi niliba lyomwe akati kamakani oonse Jehova ngaakalailila Musa,
kuzwa kucilundu ca-Halaki munzila iiya ku-Seiri mane kusikila ku-Baala-gadi mumumpata wa-Lebano munsi lyacilundu ca-Herimoni. Abami babo boonse wakabajata, wakabauma akubajaya.
Ciindi cilamfu Joshua wakali kucita inkondo abami aba boonse,
Katakwe munzi nuuba omwe iwakatangana mulongo abana ba-Israyeli, cita ba-Hivi balike ibakakede ku-Gibeoni, Yoonse buyo bakaizunda munkondo.
Nkaambo makani akazwa kuli-Jehova. Ngonguwe wakayumya myoyo yabo kuzoolwisya bana ba-Israyeli, kuti abafwidilizye, batafwidwi insoni, cita kunyonyoonwa, mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa,

Lino kuciindi eco nciconya Joshua wakaboola kuzoosaala ba-Anaki, kuzilundu aku-Hebroni aku-Dibiri aku-Anabi akumalundu oonse aa-Juda akumalundu oonse aa-Israyeli, Joshua wakabafwidilizya boonse aminzi yabo.
Teekwakasyaala ba-Anaki mucisi cabana ba-Israyeli, cita mu-Gaza amu-Gati amu-Asidodo.
Mbuboobo Joshua mbwaakazunda nyika yoonse, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaambila Musa. Joshua wakaiabila bana ba-Israyeli, kuti baivube. Mikowa yabo yoonse yakaabilwa. Elyo nyika yakalyokezya kulwana.

Sihoni mwami waba-Amori iwakakede ku-Hesiboni, iwakali kweendelezya cisi kuzwa ku­-Aroeri kunkomwe yamulonga wa-Arinoni amunzi uuli akati kamwaakwe, acisela canyika ya-Gileadi, mane kusikila kumulonga wa-Jaboki uubambene acisi cabana ba-Amoni;
ankanda yoonse yakujwe mane kusikila kulwizi lwaKineroti akusikila kulwizi lwa-Araba, lwizi lwamunyo, munzila iiya ku-BetiJesimoti, akumusanza, kuminkuni ya-Pisiga;
acisi ca-Ogi mwami waBasana, umwi waba-Refai ibakacisyeede, iabakakede ku-Asitarotu aku-Edrei,
iwakali abwami bwakucilundu ca-Herimoni abwaku-Saleka abwacisi coonse ca-Basana, akusikila kumugaano waba-Gesuri aba-Maakati, acisela cacisi ca-Gileadi cibambene acisi ca-Sihoni mwami wa-Hesiboni.
Musa mulanda wa-Jehova abana ba-Israyeli bakabazunda, nkabela nyika, Musa mulanda wa-Jehova wakaipa ba-Rubeni aba-Gadi acisela camukowa waManase.
Muzilundu amutulundulundu amucisi ca-Araba amuminkuni amunkanda amucimpayuma cakumusanza, nyika yaba-Hiti aba-Amori aba-Kanana aba-Perizi aba-Hivi aba-Jebusi.
Umwi kali mwami wa-Jeriko, umwi kali mwami wa-Ai munzi uubambene a-Beteli,
umwi kali mwami wa-Jerusalemu, umwi kali mwami waHebroni,
umwi kali mwami Jarimuri, umwi kali mwami wa-Lakisi,
umwi kali mwami wa-Egiloni, umwi kali mwami wa-Gezere,
umwi kali mwami wa-Dibiri, umwi kali mwami wa-Gederi,
umwi kali mwami wa-Horima, umwi kali mwami wa-Aradi,
umwi kali mwami wa-Libina, umwi kali mwami wa-Adulamu,
umwi kali mwami wa-Makeda, umwi kali mwami wa-Beteli,
umwi kali mwami wa-Tapuwa, umwi kali mwami wa-Heferi,
umwi kali mwami wa-Afeki, umwi kali mwami wa-Lasaroni,
umwi kali mwami wa-Madoni, umwi kali mwami wa-Hazori,
umwi kali mwami wa-Simironi-meroni, umwi kali mwami wa-Akasafu,
umwi kali mwami wa-Taanaki, umwi kali mwami wa-Megido,
umwi kali mwami wa-Kadesi, umwi kali mwami wa-Jokineamu ku-Karimeli,
umwi kali mwami wa-Doro munyika indamfu yaku-Doro, umwi kali mwami wabamasi baku-Giligala,
aumwi kali mwami wa-Tiriza. Bami boonse kabali makumi otatwe aumwi.
Manyika aacisyeede ngaaya: zisi zyoonse zyaba-Filisti aba-Gesuri,

kuzwa kumulonga uuli kunembo lya-Egepita mane kusikila kumugaano wa-Ekroni wakunyika, nkukuti cisi caambwa kuti ncecaba-Kanana, abami bosanwe baba-Filisti, ba-Gaza, baAsidodi, ba-Asekelo, ba-Giti aba-Ekroni, alimwi ba-Ahivi,
akumusanza, cisi coonse caba-Kanana, a-Meara uuvubidwe kuba-Sidoni, kusikila ku-Afeki uuli amugaano waba-Amori,
acisi caba-Gebili acisi coonse ca-Lebano cakujwe, kuzwa ku-Baala-gadi munsi lyacilundu ca-Herimoni, mane kusikila ku-Hamati;

abantu boonse bakede muzilundu kuzwa ku-Lebano kusikila ku-Miserepotu-maimu, nkukuti ba-Sidoni boonse; aba njoobatanda kubusyu bwaba-Israyeli, pele koabila ba-Israyeli nyika, kuti baivube, mbubonya mbundakulailila.
Lino nyika eyi, uleelede kwiiabila misyobo iili musanu aine, acisela camusyobo wa-Manase.
Nkaambo bamwi bana ba-Manase, antoomwe aba-Rubeni aba-Gadi, batambula kale caabilo cabo ncaakabapa Musa, mutala lya-Jordano kujwe, mbuli Musa mulanda wa-Jehova mbwaakabaabila,
kuzwa ku-Aroeri uuli ankomwe yamulonga wa-Arinoni, amunzi uuli akatikati kamumpata, abanda lyoonse lya-Medeba mane kusikila ku-Diboni,
aminzi yoonse ya-Sihoni mwami waba-Amori iwakali kweendelezya mu-Hesiboni, mane kusikila kumugaano wabana ba-Amori,
a-Gileadi, anyika yaba-Gesuri, aba-Maakati, acilundu coonse ca-Herimoni, anyika yoonse ya-Basana kusikila ku-Saleka;
mumonya munyika ya-Basana, muli cisi ca-Ogi iwakali kweendelezya mu-Asitarotu amu-Edrei; oyu kali umwi wabaabo ibakacisyeede baba-Refaimu, nkaambo Musa wakabazunda akubatanda.
Pele bana ba-Israyeli teebakatanda ba-Gesuri nibaba ba-Maakati. Ba-Gesuri aba-Maakati kabacikede akati kaba-Israyeli mane kusikila sunu,
Amusyobo waba-Levi ulike ngwaakatapa caabilo, nkaambo zipaizyo zyaJehova Leza wa-Israyeli ncecaabilo cabo, mbubonya mbwaakamwaambila.
Lino Musa nguwakaabila mukowa wabana ba-Rubeni mbuli muziinga zyabo.
Nyika yabo kiizwa ku-Aroeri uuli kumbali amulonga wa-Arinoni, amunzi uuli akatikati kamweezi, abanda lyoonse mane kusikila ku-Medeba;
a-Hesiboni aminzi yawo yamubanda, a-Diboni a-Bamoto-baala a-Betibaala-meoni,
a-Jahaza a-Kedemotu a-Mefati;
a-Kiriyataimu aSibima a-Zereti-sahara mucilundu camumumpata;
a-Beti-peori, aminkuni ya-Pisiga, a-Beti-Jesimoti;

aminzi yoonse yamubanda, acisi coonse ca-Sihoni mwami waba-Amori iwakali kweendelezya mu-Hesiboni, ngwaakazunda Musa antoomwe abami ba-Midyani, Evi, a-Rekemu, a-Zuri, a-Huri, a-Reba, basilutwe ba-Sihoni ibakakede munyika eyo.
Alakwe Balamu mwana wa-Beori, musondi, kali umwi wabajayidwe bana ba-Israyeli mbebakajazya ipanga.
Nkabela mugaano wabana ba-Rubeni kuuli Jordano anyika iibambene. Mbuboobo caabilo cabana ba-Rubeni mbucakabede, mbuli ziinga zyabo, minzi atunzuunzi twayo.
Awalo mukowa wa-Gadi, Musa wakaabila bana ba-Gadi nyika, mbuli muziinga zyabo.
Caabilo cabo nceeci: Jazeri, aminzi yoonse ya-Gileadi, acisela canyika cabana ba-Amoni, mane kusikila ku-Aroeri uuli kunembo lya-Raba;
akuzwa ku-Hesiboni mane kusikila ku-Ramati-mizipe akuBetonimu; akuzwa ku-Mahanaimu mane kusikila kumugaano wa-Dibiri;

amumumpata Betiharamu, a-Betinimra, a-Sukoti, a-Zafoni, ncecipanzi icakasyeede cacisi ca-Sihoni mwami waku-Hesiboni; amugaano waco uyooba Jordano mane kusikila kumagolelo aaziba lya-Kineroti, mutala lya-Jordano kujwe.
Eci ncecaabilo cabana ba-Gadi mbuli muziinga zyabo; minzi atunzuunzi twayo.
Alimwi Musa wakaabila cisela camukowa wa-Manase nyika, ibe yacisela camukowa wabana ba-Manase, mbuli muziinga zyabo.
Caabilo cabo nceeci: kuzwa ku-Mahanaimu, nyika yoonse ya-Basana, cisi coonse ca-Ogi mwami wa-Basana, aminzi yoonse ya-Jairi yamu-Basana, minzi iili makumi aali musanu alimwi;
acisela ca-Gileadi, a-Asitarotu a-Edrei, minzi yabwami bwa-Ogi yamu-Basana. Njeeyi nyika yabana ba-Makiri mwana wa-Manase, njacisela cabana ba-Makiri mbuli muziinga zyabo.
Ezi nzezyaabilo Musa nzyaakaabila mumabanda aa-Moabu aali mutala lya-Jordano, ku-Jeriko, kujwe.
Pele mukowa waba-Levi, Musa teewakabapa caabilo niciba comwe, pe; Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli ncicaabilo cabo, mbubonya mbwaakabaambila.
Bakaabizya cisolo, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa, Bakaabila misyobo iili musanu aine acisela,
nkaambo Musa wakaabide kale misyobo yobile acisela mutala lya-Jordano, alimwi ba-Levi taakwe caabilo ncaakabapa abuniini akati kabo.

Nkaambo bana ba-Josefa kabali misyobo yobile, nkukuti Manase a-Efraimu, aboobo teewakaabila bana ba-Levi caabilo niciba comwe, cita minzi yakukala, anyika iibambene ayo yakucezezya iŋombe zyabo ambono zyabo.
Mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila Musa, bana ba-Israyeli bakacita mbubonya, aboobo bakaabila nyika,
Ndakali amyaka iili makumi one, ciindi ceiya Musa mulanda wa-Jehova naakandituma kuzwa ku-Kadesi-Barinea kuyoolanga-langa nyika, nkabela ndakamuboozezya makani aakali mumoyo wangu,
Bakwesu mbotwakeenda abo bakakankamya myoyo yabantu, pele mebo ndakabika moyo wangu woonse kuli-Jehova Leza wangu.

Lino Musa wakandikonkezya mubuzuba obo kuti, Ncobeni nyika eyo iilyatidwe amaulu aako iyooba caabilo cako acabana bako ciindi coonse kukabe kutamani, nkaambo moyo wako woonse waubika kuli-Jehova Leza wako,

Lino sunu bona! Jehova wandiponya mbubonya mbwaakaamba, eyi myaka iili makumi one amusanu, kuzwa kuciindi eciya Jehova naakaambila Musa majwi aya, bana ba-Israyeli nibakali kukala-kala munkanda, kusikila sunu, Buzuba obuno ndili amyaka iili makumi aali musanu aatatu iili amusanu.
Ncili muyumu mbubonya kuciindi eco Musa naakandituma. Inguzu zyangu mbuzyakabede, asunu mbuzicibede, nikuba kulwana nikuba kweendeenda,

Lino kondipa eci cilundu, Jehova ncaakaamba mubuzuba obo, nkaambo wakaswiilila kuciindi eco nciconya ba-Anaki mbubakede mulincico, bali aminzi mi pati iizyungulukidwe bulambo. Ambweni Jehova uyooba ambe, aboobo njoobatanda, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba.
Mbuboobo munzi wa-Hebroni mbuwakaba caabilo ca-Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune mu-Kenezi, nguucivubide asunu, nkaambo wakatobela Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli camoyo woonse.
Izina itaanzi lya-Hebroni kalili Munzi wa-Ariba. Oyo Ariba kali muntu mupati akati kaba-Anaki. Elyo nyika yakalyokezya kulwana.
Nkabela mugaano wabo wakumusanza wakali kuzwa kumamanino aalwizi lwamunyo, kuzwa kumusundila uulanga kumusanza.

Wakali kwiinda kubbazu lyakumusanza lyamatantilo aatubanze, elyo kuzwa oko wakainda ku-Zini, alimwi kumusanza wa-Kadesi-Barinea kusikila ku-Hezironi, elyo wakainda ku-Adara akuzyunguluka kuya ku-Karika,
nkabela kuzwa oko wakainda ku-Azimoni akuya kumulonga wa-Egepita. Magolelo aamugaano akali kulwizi, Ngooyu mugaano wanu wakumusanza.
Lino mugaano wakujwe ndwizi lwa-Munyo mane do kumatililo aa-Jordano. Amugaano wakunyika wakatalikila kumusundila wakulwizi uuli kumatililo aa-Jordano.
Lino mugaano wakainda ku-Beti-hogila, wakainda kubbazu lyakunyika lya-Beti-Araba, elyo kuzwa oko wakainda kubbwe lya-Bohani mwana wa-Rubeni.

Alimwi mugaano wakainda ku-Dibiri kuzwa kumumpata wa-Akori, elyo wakainda kunyika akulanga ku-Giligala uulangene amatantilo aa-Adumi mutala lyamusanza lyakalonga. Elyo mugaano wakainda kumaanzi aa-Enisemesi, nkabela magolelo aawo akali ku-Eni-rogeli.

Lino mugaano wakainda kumumpata wamwana wa-Hinomu kuya kubbazu lyakumusanza lyatulundulundu twaba-Jebusi, nkukuti Jerusalemu. Kuzwa oko wakainda amutwe wacilundu cilangene amumpata wa-Hinomo kumbo, ncencico cili kumamanino aakunyika aamumpata wa-Refaimu.
Elyo kuzwa awo atala acilundu mugaano wakaseluka kukasensa kamaanzi kakuNefiwa akuya kuminzi yakucilundu ca-Efroni, alimwi wakainda ku-Baala, ngonguwo Kiriyati-Jearimu.

Elyo kuzwa ku-Baala mugaano wakazyunguluka kumbo kuya kucilundu ca-Seiri, akwiinda kubbazu lyakunyika lyacilundu ca-Jearimu, ncencico Kesaloni, elyo wakaseluka kuya ku-Betisemesi akwiindilila ku-Timina.
Lino mugaano wakainda kukalundu kaEkroni kali kunyika, alimwi kuzwa oko wakazyunguluka kuya ku-Sideroni, wakainda kucilundu ca-Baala, akusika ku-Jabineli, amamanino aawo akali kulwizi.
Nkabela mugaano wakumbo kuuli kulwizi lupati. Nciceeco caabilo coonse cabana ba-Juda muziinga zyabo,
Nkabela Kalebe wakatanda bana botatwe ba-Anaki ibakali mumo, Sesai a-Ahimani a-Talimai bana ba-Anaki,
Alimwi kuzwa oko wakainka kuyoolwana abana ba-Dibiri, Izina itaanzi ya-Dibiri kalili Kiriyati-Seferi.
Lino Kalebe wakati, Kufumbwa muntu uuti zunde Kiriyati-Seferi akuusaala, njoomupa Akisa mwanaangu musimbi, amukwate,
Mpawo Otiniyeli mwana wa-Kenazi munyina Kalebe wakauzunda, aboobo wakamupa mwanaakwe musimbi Akisa kuti amukwate.
Nkabela musimbi, naakeza kuŋanda yakwe, wakamusungilizya kuti akumbile muunda kuliwisi. Wakaseluka kuzwa ambongolo yakwe, elyo Kalebe wakamubuzya kuti, Waba anzi?
Wakati, Kondipa cipo, Wandipa nyika yankanda yakumusanza, lino kondipa tusensa twamaanzi. Elyo wakamupa tusensa twaatala atusensa twaansi.
a-Kina a-Dimona a-Adada,
a-Kedesi a-Hazori a-Itinani,
a-Zifi a-Telemu a-Bealoti,
a-Hazori-hadata, a-Kerioti-hezironi, ngonguwo Hazori,
a-Amamu a-Sema a-Moloda,
a-Hazara-gada a-Hesimoni a-Beti-peleti,
a-Hazara-suala a-Beereseba a-Bizioti,
a-Baala a-Iyimu a-Ezemu,
a-Elitoladi a-Kesili a-Horima,
a-Zikilaga a-Madimana a-Sanasana,
a-Lebaoti a-Siliimu a-Ayini a-Rimoni. Minzi eyi yoonse ili makumi obile aali amusanu aine, atunzuunzi twayo.
aZanoa a-Eni-ganimu a-Tapua a-Enamu,
a-Jarimuri a-Adulamu a-Soko a-Azeka,
a-Saaraimu a-Aditaimu a-Gedera a-Gederotaimu, minzi iili ikumi aine atunzuunzi twayo.
Zenani a-Hadasa a-Migidala-gadi,
a-Dilamu a-Mizipe a-Jokiteeli,
a-Lakisi a-Bozikatu a-Egiloni,
a-Kaboni a-Lamami a-Kitilisi,
a-Gederoti a-Beti-dazoni a-Naama a-Makeda, minzi iili ikumi amusanu aumwi atunzuunzi twayo.
Libina a-Eteri a-Asana,
a-Ifita a-Asina a-Nezibi,
a-Kcila a-Akizibi a-Maresa, minzi iili musanu aine atunzuunzi twayo.
Ekroni aminzi yawo atunzuunzi twawo,
kuzwa ku-Ekroni mane kusikila kulwizi, yoonse iibambene a-Asidodo atunzuunzi twayo.
Akuzilundu Samiri a-Jatiri a-Soko,
a-Dana a-Kiriyati-sana, ngo-nguwo Dibiri,
a-Anabi a-Estimoa a-Animu,
a-Goseni a-Holoni a-Gilo, minzi iili ikumi aumwi atunzuunzi twayo.
Arabu a-Duna a-Esana,
a-Jarimu a-Beti-tapua a-Afeka,
a-Humita a-Kiriyati-ariba, ngonguwo Hebroni, a-Ziori, minzi iili musanu aine.
Maoni-Karimeli a-Zifu a-Juta,
a-Jezreeli a-Jokideamu a-Zanoa,
a-Kaini a-Gibea a-Timina, minzi iili ikumi atunzuunzi twayo.
Haluli a-Beti-zuri a-Gedoro,
a-Maaratu a-Beti-anotu a-Elitekoni, minzi iili musanu aumwi atunzuunzi twayo.
Munkanda kakuli Beti-araba a-Midini a-Sekaka,
a-Nibisani aMunzi-wamunyo a-En-gedi, minzi iili musanu aumwi atunzuunzi twayo.
alimwi kuzwa ku-Beteli wakainda ku-Luzi akusika kumugaano waba-Ariki baku-Atarotu.
Kuzwa oko wakainda kumbo kusikila kumugaano waba-Jafeleti akumugaano wa-Beti-horoni wamukuti aku-Gezeri, nkabela mamanino aawo akali kulwizi lupati.
Mbuboobo mbubakaabilwa bana ba-Josefa, nkukuti ba-Efraimu aba-Manase.
Akumbo mugaano wakainda ku-Mika-metatu kunyika, akuzwa oko wakazyunguluka kujwe mane kusikila ku-Taanatu-silo, akubbazu lyakujwe lyaJanoa,
alimwi kuzwa ku-Janoa wakainda ku-Atarotu aku-Naara, akusikila ku-Jeriko akugola ku-Jordano.
Elyo kuzwa ku-Tapua mugaano wakainda kumbo kusikila kukalonga ka-Kana, amagolelo aawo akali kulwizi lupati. Nciceeco caabilo camukowa wabana ba-Efraimu muziinga zyabo,
antoomwe aminzi bana ba-Efraimu njibakaabilwa akati kacisi cabana ba-Manase, minzi yoonse atunzuunzi twayo.
Pele teebakatanda ba-Kanana ibakakede mu-Gezeri. Ba-Kanana bakalikede akati kabana ba-Efraimu, mbubacikede asunu, akuba basicibbalo babo.

Lino bamwi bana ba-Manase muziinga zyabo mbaaba:— bana ba-Abiezezi abana baHeleki abana ba-Asrieli abana ba-Sekemu abana ba-Heferi abana ba-Semida. Mbaaba bana baalumi ba-Manase mwana wa-Josefa muziinga zyabo.

Pele Zelofehadi mwana wa-Heferi mwana wa-Gileadi mwana wa-Makiri mwana wa-Manase katazyedebana baalumi pe, kazyede banakazi luzutu, Mazina aabana bakwe basimbi ngaaya:— Mala, a-Nowa, Hogila, Milika a-Tiriza.

Nkabela bakeza kuli-Eleazara mupaizi akuli-Joshua mwana wa-Nuni akubapati, bakati, Jehova wakalailila Musa kuti tupegwe lukono akati kabakwesu baalumi. Mpawo wakacita mbubonya mbwaakalailila Jehova, wakabapa caabilo akati kabakulana bamawisi.
Aboobo bana ba-Manase bakapegwa zyaabilo zili ikumi, kutaamba nyika ya-Gileadi aBasana yamutala lya-Jordano.
Nkaambo bana basimbi ba-Manase bakaabilwa lukono akati kabana bakwe baalumi, alimwi bana bamwi ba-Manase kabajisi nyika ya-Gileadi.
Lino mugaano wabana ba-Manase wakazwa ku-Aseri kusikila ku-Mika-metatu uuli kunembo lya-Sekemu; alimwi kululyo mugaano wakainda kubantu ibakakede ku-Enitapua,
Cisi ca-Tapua cakali ca-Manase, pele munzi wa-Tapua walo kuuli kumagolelo aacisi ca-Manase, wakali wabana ba-Efraimu.

Elyo mugaano wakaseluka mane kusikila kukalonga ka-Kana, akusotoka kalonga kuya kumusanza. Eyi minzi yakali yaba-Efraimu akati kaminzi yaba-Manase. Nkabela mugaano wa-Manase wakainda kubbazu lyakunyika lyakalonga, amagolelo aawo akali kulwizi lupati.
Nyika yakumusanza yakali ya-Efraimu, nyika yakunyika yakali ya-Manase, amagolelo aanyika yakwe akali kulwizi, alimwi bakalibambene aba-Aseri kubbazu lyakunyika, aba-Isakara kubbazu lyakujwe.

Nkabela akati kacisi ca-Isakara acisi ca-Aseri ba-Manase kabajisi minzi eyi: Betiseani atunzuunzi twawo, Ibleamu atunzuunzi twawo, a-Doro atunzuunzi twawo, abantu ba-Eni-doro atunzuunzi twawo, abantu ba-Taanaki atunzuunzi twawo, abantu ba-Megido atunzuunzi twawo, nkukuti zilundu zyotatwe,
Nekubaboobo bana ba-Manase bakakacilwa kutanda bantu ibakakede muminzi eyi. Ba-Kanana bakakolela kukala omo munyika.
Lino bana ba-Israyeli nibakaba anguzu, bakanjizya ba-Kanana mucibalo, pele kutanda teebakabatandilila pe.
Elyo Joshua wakabaambila kuti, Na muli bantu banji, kamuya kutusakasaka, akulianzila busena nkuko mucisi caba-Perizi aba-Refai na mwaata mucilundu ca-Efraimu.

Mpawo bana ba-Josefa bakati, Cilundu tacituzulizyi pe, alimwi boonse ba-Kanana bakede mucisi camumumpata balijisi inkalaki zyabutale, nkukuti abo bakede mu-Beteseani amutunzuuunzi twawo abaabo bakede mumumpata wa-Jezreeli boonse.
Nkabela Joshua wakaambila mukowa wa-Josefa, bana baEfraimu abana ba-Manase, kuti, Muli bantu banji, alimwi muli anguzu zinji. Tamweelede kuba acaabilo comwe buyo pe.
Cilundu cilaba cako. Ntusakasaka ncobeni, nekubaboobo muyootutema, amanjililo aato ayooba aanu. Aba-Kanana muyoobatanda, nekuba kuti balijisi inkalaki zyabutale akuba anguzu.
Lino kwakasyaala misyobo iili musanu aibili akati kabana ba-Israyeli iyakatalina kwaabilwa zyaabilo zyayo.
Nkabela Jeshua wakaambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Ino mulasowa ciindi cili buti kukunelela kwanu? Mulaya lili kukuvuba nyika Jehova Leza wamausowanu njaamupa?
Amulisalile bantu botatwe botatwe kumisyobo yanu, nkabatume kuya bweendeenda munyika yoonse, bailembe nyika yakuvuba mbwiibede, akuboola alimwi kulindime.
Bayooiaba muzyaabilo zili musanu azibili. Bana ba-Juda basyaale kucisi cabo nkubabede kumusanza, amukowa wa-Josefa usyaale mucisi cawo cakunyika,
Amulembe nyika mbwiibede muzyaabilo zili musanu azibili, akuleta cilembelo okuno kulindime, elyo njoomuwaalila cisolo okuno kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wesu.

Ba-Levi tabakonzyi kupegwa caabilo akati kanu, nkaambo bupaizi bwa-Jehova ncecaabilo cabo, alimwi ba-Gadi aba-Rubeni acisela camukowa wa-Manase batambula kale caabilo cabo mutala lya-Jordano lyakujwe, ncencico Musa mulanda waJehova ncaakabapa.

Lino abo bantu bakanyamuka akwiinka, nkabela nibakainka Joshua wakabalailila kuti balembe nyika yoonse. Wakati, Kamuya bweendeenda munyika, mwiilembe, akuboola alimwi kulindime, nkamuwaalile cisolo kumeso aa-Jehova okuno ku-Silo,
Mpawo bantu bakainka, bakainda moonse munyika, bakailemba aminzi yayo mubbuku, muzyaabilo zili musanu azibili, elyo bakaboola kuli-Joshua kuzilao nkwaakabede ku-Silo.
Nkabela Joshua wakabawaalila cisolo kumeso aa-Jehova ku-Sile. Nkonkuko Joshua nkwaakaabilila bana ba-Israyeli nyika muzipanzi zyabo.
Lino caabilo camukowa wabana ba-Benjamini muziinga zyabo nceeci. Nyika yabo njibakawaalilwa cisolo yakali akati kabana ba-Juda abana baJosefa.
Mugaano wabo wakunyika wakazwa ku-Jordano, wakainda kubbazu lya-Jeriko kunyika, alimwi wakainda kuzilundulundu zyakumbo, amagolelo aawo akali kunkanda ya-Beti-aveni,
Elyo kuzwa oko mugaano wakainda ku-Luzi, wakatana kubbazu lyakumusanza lya-Luzi (ngonguwo Beteli), akuzwa oko wakainda ku-Atarotu-adara kucilundu cakumusanza wa-Beti-horoni waansi.

Lino kuzwa kucilundu cili kubbazu lyakumusanza lya-Beti-horoni, mugaano wakumbo wakanyona kumusanza akugola ku-Kiriyati-baala, ngonguwo Kiriyati-Jearimu, munzi wabana ba-Juda. Mbuubede mugaano wakumbo.
Amugaano wakumusanza wakazwa kumamanino aa-Kiriyati-Jearimu, akuzwa kumbo wakainda kukasensa kamaanzi ka-Nefiwa.

Alimwi mugaano wakasika kumamanino aacilundu cili kunembo lyamumpata wamwana wa-Hinomu, nkokuti munyika mumumpata waba-Refai, akwiinda moonse mumumpata kusikila kumusanza kukalundu kaba-Jebusi, akusikila ku-Eni-rogeli.
Oko wakanyona kuya kunyika akwiinda ku-Eni-semesi, alimwi wakainda ku-Gelilotu, uulangene amantantilo aa-Adumi, akusika kundomba lya-Bohani mwana wa-Rubeni.
Kuzwa oko wakainda kukalundu kalangene a-Araba kunyika, akusika ku-Araba,

Alimwi mugaano wakainda kubbazu lyakunyika lyakalundu ka-Beti-hogila, amagolelo aawo akali kumusundila wakunyika wa-Lwizi lwamunyo, nkokuti kumamanino aakumusanza wa-Jordano, Mbuboobo mbuubede mugaano wakumusanza.
Nkabela mulonga wa-Jordano nguwakali mugaano wakujwe.
Nciceeco caabilo cabana ba-Benjamini amigaano yabo muziinga zyabo.
Nkabela minzi yamukowa wabana ba-Benjamini muziinga zyabo njeeyi: Jeriko a-Beti-hogila a-Emekikozizi,
a-Betiaraba a-Zemaraimu a-Beteli,
a-Avimu a-Para a-Ofira,
a-Kefara-amoni a-Ofini a-Geba, minzi iili ikumi aibili atunzuunzi twayo.
A-Gibeoni a-Rama a-Beeroti,
aMizipe a-Kefira a-Moza,
a-Rekemu a-Iripeeli a-Tarala,
a-Zela a-Elefi, a-Jebusi (ngonguwo Jerusalemu), a-Gibeati a-Kiriyati, minzi iili ikumi aine atunzuunzi twayo. Nciceeco caabilo cabana ba-Benjamini muziinga zyabo.
Mucaabilo cabo kabajisi Beeri-seba, ngonguwo Seba, a-Molada,
a-Hazarasuala a-Bala a-Ezemu,
a-Elitolada a-Betuli a-Horimu,
aZikilaga a-Beti-malikabotu a-Hazari-susa,
a-Betilebaotu a-Saruheni, minzi iili ikumi aitatu atunzuunzi twayo;
Aini a-Rimoni a-Eteri a-Asana, minzi yone atunzuunzi twayo;
atunzuunzi toonse tuzyungulukide minzi eyi, mane kusikila ku-Baalata-beeri, ngonguwo Rama wakumusanza, Eci ncencico caabilo camukowa wabana ba-Simeoni muziinga zyabo,
Caabilo cabana ba-Simeoni bakacipegwa akati kacaabilo cabana ba-Juda, nkaambo caabilo cabana ba-Juda cakabavulila, nciceeco bana ba-Simeoni ncibakaabilwa akati kaco.
Lino caabilo catatu cakaba cabana ba-Zebuloni muziinga zyabo, nkabela mugaano wacaabilo cabo wakasika mane ku-Saridi.
Mugaano wabo wakainda kumbo mane kusikila ku-Marala, alimwi wakainda ku-Dabeseti, akusika kukalonga kali kunembo lya-Jokineamu.
Elyo kuzwa ku-Saridi wakanyona kujwe kubuzwezuba akusika ku-Kisilotu-tabori, alimwi wakainda ku-Daberati akusika ku-Jafiya.
Kuzwa oko wakainda kujwe kusikila ku-Gati-heferi, aku-Hetikazini, alimwi wakainda ku-Remoni akulangana a-Nea.
Lino mugaano wakunyika wakanyona kuya ku-Hanatoni, amagolelo aawo akali kumumpata wa-Ifita-eli.
Kabajisi Kata a-Nahalala a-Simironi a-Idala a-Betelehemu, minzi iili ikumi aibili atunzuunzi twayo.
Eci ncecaabilo cabana ba-Zebuloni muziinga zyabo, minzi eyi atunzuunzi twayo.
Lino caabilo cane cakaba ca-Isakara, cabana ba-Isakara muziinga zyabo,
Mugaano wabo wakainda ku-Jezireeli a-Kesulotu a-Sunemu,
a-Hafaraimu a-Sioni a-Anaharati,
a-Rabiti a-Kisioni a-Ebezi,
a-Remeti a-Eni-ganimu a-Eni-hada a-Beti-Pezezi,
Alimwi mugaano wakatana ku-Tabori aku-Sahazuma aku-Betesemesi, amagolelo aawo akali ku-Jordano. Minzi kiili ikumi amusanu aumwi atunzuunzi twayo,
Eci ncecaabilo camukowa wabana ba-Isakara muziinga zyabo, minzi atunzuunzi twayo,
Lino caabilo casanu cakaba camukowa wabana ba-Aseri muziinga zyabo,
Mugaano wabo wakainda ku-Helikati a-Hali a-Beteli a-Akasafu,
aAlameleki a-Amadi a-Misali, alimwi wakasika ku-Karimeli kumbo akuSihorilibinati,
elyo wakanyonena kubuzwezuba ku-Beti-dagoni akusika ku-Zebuloni akumumpata wa-Ifita-eli kunyika ku-Beti-emeki aku-Nehieli, elyo kulumwensi wakasika ku-Kabulu,
aku-Ebroni a Rehobo a-Hamoni a-Kana, mane kusikila ku-Sidoni mupati.
Kuzwa oko mugaano wakanyonena kuya ku-Rama akumunzi uuzyungulukidwe lubaya wa-Turo, alimwi wakanyonena ku-Hosa, amagolelo aawo akali kulwizi lupati kuzwa ku-Hebeli kusikila ku-Akizibi,
a-Uma a-Afeki a-Rehobo, minzi iili makumi obile aibili atunzuunzi twayo,
Eci ncecaabilo camukowa wabana ba-Aseri muziinga zyabo, minzi eyi atunzuunzi twayo.
Lino caabilo camusanu acimwi cakaba cabana ba-Nafitali muziinga zyabo.
Mugaano wabo wakazwa ku-Helefi, kumubanga waku-Zaanani, a-Adami-nekebi a-Jabineeli, mane kusikila ku-Lakumu, amagolelo aawo akali ku-Jordano,
Lino kuzwa oko mugaano wakanyonena kumbo ku-Azirotutabori, akuzwa oko wakainda ku-Hukoku. Wakalibambene a-Zebuloni kumusanza, alimwila-Aseri kumbo, a-Juda ku-Jordano kulanga kubuzwezuba,
Aminzi iyakazyungulukidwe imbaya njeeyi: Zidimu a-Zeri a-Hamati a-Rakati a-Kinereti,
a-Adama a-Rama a-Hazori,
a-Kedesi a-Edrei a-Eni-hazori,
a-Ironi a-Migidala-eli a-Horemu a-Beti-anati a-Betisemesi, minzi iili ikumi amusanu aitatu atunzuunzi twayo.
Eci ncecaabilo camukowa wabana ba-Nafitali muziinga zyabo, minzi atunzuunzi twayo.
Lino caabilo camusanu azibili cakaba camukowa wabana ba-Dani muziinga zyabo.
Caabilo cabo kacijisi Zora a-Esitaoli a-Irisemesi,
Saalabini a-Aijaloni a-Itila,
a-Eloni a-Timna a-Ekroni,
a-Eliteke a-Gibetoni a-Baalati,
a-Jehudi a-Beneberaki a-Gati-rimoni,
a-Mejarikoni a-Rakoni. Amugaano kolangene a-Jopa.

Pele caabilo cabana ba-Dani cakabaceyela, aboobo bana ba-Dani bakainka kuyoolwana a-Lesemu, nkabela bakauzunda, bakausaazya ipanga, bakavuba akukala nkuko. Elyo munzi wa-Lesemu bakauulika izina lya-Dani mbuli izina lya-Dani wisaabo.
Eci ncecaabilo camukowa wabana ba-Dani muziinga zyabo, minzi eyi atunzuunzi twayo.
Elyo nibakamana kwaabila nyika akubamba migaano yayo, bana baIsrayeli bakapa Joshua mwana wa-Nuni caabilo akati kabo,
mbubonya Jehova mbwaakalailila. Bakamupa munzi ngwaakakumbila, nkokuti Timinati-sera muzilundu zya-Efraimu, nkabela wakayaka munzi akukala mulinguwo.
Ambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Amubike minzi yakucijila njindakamwaambila kumulomo wa­ Musa.
Ibe yakulobokela kuliyooyo uujaya muntu anunzuunzu acakutaziba. Iyoomubeda cicijilo kulisikutema mulandu wabulowa.

Oyo sikujaya muntu akacijile kuluumwi waminzi eyi, akaimikile kumulyango wamunzi, aambe makani aakwe mumatwi aabapati bamunzi. Elyo bayoomutambula mulimbabo mumunzi akumupa busena kuti akale akati kabo.
Lino sikutema mulandu wabulowa, amutobela, tabakooyooaba sikujaya mumaanza aakwe, nkaambo wakajaya mweenzinyina cakutaziba buyo, takamusulide kale pe.

Nkabela uyookala mumonya mumunzi mane akaime kubusyu bwambungano kuti abetekwe, mane kusikila kulufu lwamupaizi mupati wakuciindi eco, elyo sikujaya nayoobweeda kumunzi wakwe akuŋanda yakwe, kumunzi oyo nkwaakazwa naakacija.
Alimwi mutala lya-Jordano kujwe lya-Jeriko bakasala Bezeri munkanda yakumabanda, munzi wamukowa wa-Rubeni, aRamoti-Gileadi wamukowa wa-Gadi, a-Golani wamu-Basana wamukowa wa-Manase.

Njeeyi minzi njibakasalila bana boonse ba-Israyeli abeenzu ibakala-kala akati kabo, kuti kufumbwa muntu uujaya mweenzinyina anunzuunzu acijile nkuko, atajayigwi kumaanza aasikutema mulandu wabulowa mane akataangune kubetekwa kubusyu bwambungano.
akubaambila makani ku-Silo munyika ya-Kanana. Bakati, Jehova wakalailila kumulomo wa-Musa kuti tupegwe minzi yakukala anyika iizyungulukide yakucezezya iŋombe zyesu.
Elyo bana ba-Israyeli bakapa ba-Levi minzi, mbuli mbwaakalailila Jehova, mukati kacaabilo cabo, Bakabapa minzi eyi atunzuunzi twayo.
Abana ba-Kohati bamwi bakaabilwa, mucisi caziinga zyabana ba-Efraimu acaba-Dani acacisela cabana ba-Manase, minzi iili ikumi.
Abalo bana ba-Gerisoni bakaabilwa, mucisi caziinga caba-Isakara acamukowa wa-Aseri acamukowa wa-Nafitali acacisela cabana ba-Manase icakakede mu-Basana, minzi iili ikumi aitatu.
Abalo bana ba-Merari bakaabilwa, mucisi caba-Rubeni acaba-Gadi aca-Zebuloni, minzi iili ikumi aibili.
Mumukowa wabana ba-Juda amukowa wabana ba-Simeoni baka bapa minzi eyi iilembedwe awa.
Yakaba yabana ba-Aroni, ciinga cimwi caba-Kohati, ibakali ba-Levi, nkaambo kakuti mbembabo bakawidwa cisolo citaanzi.
Bakabapa Kiriyati-Ariba, munzi wa-Ariba wisi Anoki, ngonguwo Hebroni, muzilundulundu zya-Juda, anyika yameembelelo iizyungulukide nguwo.
Pele myuunda yamunzi atunzuunzi twayo, bakazipa Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune, kuti ibe yakwe.
a-Jatiri ameembelelo­ aawo, a-Esitimoa ameembelelo aawo,
a-Holoni ameembelelo aawo, a-Debiri ameembelelo aawo,
a-Ayini ameembelelo aawo, a-Juta ameembelelo aawo, a-Betisemesi ameembelelo aawo, minzi iili musanu aine mucisi camisyobo eyo yobile,
Amumukowa wa-Benjamini bakapegwa Gibeoni ameembelelo aawo, a-Geba ameembelelo aawo,
a-Anatotu ameembelelo aawo, a-Alimoni ameembelelo aawo, minzi yone.
Minzi yoonse yabana ba-Aroni bapaizi kiili ikumi aitatu ameembelelo aayo.
Bakapegwa Sekemu, munzi walulobokelo lwasikujaya, ameembelelo aawo, muzilundu-lundu zya-Efraimu, a-Gezeri ameembelelo aawo,
a-Kibizaimu ameembelelo aawo, a-Betihoroni ameembelelo aawo, minzi yone,
Amucisi camukowa wa-Dani bakapegwa Eliteke ameembelelo aawo, aGibetoni ameembelelo aawo,
a-Aijaloni ameembelelo aawo, a-Gatirimoni ameembelelo aawo, minzi yone.
Amucisi cacisela cabana ba-Manase bakapegwa Taanaki ameembelelo aawo, a-Gati-rimoni ameembelelo aawo, minzi yobile.
Minzi yoonse yabana ba-Kohati ibakasyeede yakali ikumi, ameembelelo aayo.
Amucisi camukowa wa-Isakara bakapegwa Kisioni ameembelelo aawo, a-Dabereti ameembelelo aawo,
ajarimutu ameembelelo aawo, a-Eriganimu ameembelelo awo, minzi yone,
Amucisi camukowa wa-Aseri bakapegwa Misali ameembelelo aawo, a-Abidoni ameembelelo aawo,
a-Helikati ameembelelo aawo, a-Rehobo ameembelelo aawo, minzi yone.
Amucisi camukowa wa-Nafitali bakapegwa Kedesi wamu-Galilaya, munzi walulobokelo lwasikujaya ameembelelo aawo, a-Hamotidori ameembelelo aawo, a-Karitani ameembelelo aawo, minzi yotatwe.
Minzi yoonse yaba-Gerisoni, muziinga zyabo, yakali ikumi aitatu ameembelelo aayo,
a-Dimna ameembelelo aawo, a-Nahalala ameembelelo aawo, minzi yone.
Amucisi ca-Rubeni bakapegwa Bezeri ameembelelo aawo, a-Jahaza ameembelelo aawo,
a-Kedimoti ameembelelo aawo, a-Mefati ameembelelo aawo, minzi yone.
Amucisi ca-Gadi bakapegwa Ramoti mucisi ca-Gileadi, munzi walulobokelo wasikujaya muntu, ameembelelo aawo, a-Mahanaimu ameembelelo aawo,
a-Hesiboni ameembelelo aawo, a-Jazeri ameembelelo aawo; minzi eyo yoonse yakali yone.
Njeeyo minzi yoonse yabana ba-Merari muziinga zyabo, nzeziinga zyakasyeede zyaba-Levi. Caabilo cabo cakali minzi iili ikumi aibili,
Minzi eyi yoonse kiili umwi umwi ameembelelo aawo aazyungulukide. Minzi yoonse buyo mbuyakabede.

Nkabela Jehova wakabapa luumuno kumabazu oonse, mbubonya mbwaakakonkezya bamawisi babo, Katakwe muntu naba omwe akati kabasinkondonyina uwakakonzya kubalwisya. Basinkondonyina boonse buyo, Jehova wakabaaba mumaanza aabo.
Taakwe cintu niciba comwe catakacitika akati kazintu zibotu zyoonse Jehova nzyaakaambila mukowa wa-Israyeli. Zyoonse buyo zyakacitika.
Elyo Joshua wakaita ba-Rubeni aba-Gadi acisela camukowa waManase,
wakabaambila kuti, Mwabamba zintu zyoonse Musa mulanda wa-Jehova nzyaakamulailila, ambebo mwandiswiilila mumajwi oonse ngendamulailila,
Teemwasia bakwanu pe, mazuba aya oonse manji mane kusikila kubuzuba obuno. Mwabamba kabotu mulazyo wa-Jehova Leza wanu.

Lino sunu Jehova Leza wanu wabakazika kabotu bakwanu, mbubonya mbwaakabasyomezya. Nkaambo kako amubweede, muye kumaanda aanu mucisi calukono lwanu ncimwakapegwa a-Musa mulanda wa-Jehova mutala lya-Jordano.

Pele amubike myoyo yanu kukubamba imbeta akucita mulao Musa mulanda wa-Jehova nzyaakamulailila. Amuyandisye Jehova Leza wanu, amweende munzila zyakwe, amubambe imbeta zyakwe, amukakatile kulinguwe, akumumanina milimo camoyo woonse acamiyeeyo yoonse.
Mpawo Joshua wakabalongezya akubatuma kuti bainke kumaanda aabo.
Wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya kumaanda aanu alubono lunji aŋombe zinji ansiliva angolida amundalila abutale azyakusama zinji. Amwaabane abakwanu zisaalo zyabasinkondonyoko.
Nkabela nibakasika kunyika yamucisi caKanana iibambene a-Jordano, bana ba-Rubeni abana ba-Gadi acisela camukowa wa-Manase bakayaka cipaililo nkukonya ku-Jordano, Kacili cipaililo cipati kukulanga.
Elyo bana ba-Israyeli bakamvwa kuti bana ba-Rubeni abana ba-Gadi abacisela camukowa wa-Manase bayaka cipaililo kunembo lya nyika ya-Kanana, mucisi cibambene a-Jordano kubbazu lyabo bana ba-Israyeli.
Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli nibakamvwa obo, imbungano yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli yakayoboloka ku-Silo kuyoobalwisya.
abasilutwe bali ikumi, silutwe umwi umwi kuzwa kumikowa yoonse ya-Israyeli. Umwi aumwi kali silutwe waciinga cawisi akati kaziinga zyoonse zya-Israyeli.
Nkabela nibakasika kubana baRubeni akubana ba-Gadi akucisela camukowa waba-Manase, mucisi caGileadi, bakabaambila kuti,
Mbuboobu mbwiiamba imbungano yoonse ya-Jehova, Ino ncinzi eci ncimwabisizya Leza wa-Israyeli? Mwalekelanzi buzuba obuno kutobela inzila ya-Jehova, nimwaliyakila cipaililo cakusampaula Jehova?
Sa watuceela mulandu waku-Peori, ngututana kusalazigwa kulinguwo asunu, nekuba kuti imbungano ya-Jehova yakaumwa mafwabi.
Inywe sunu mwaleya kuzwa kunzila ya-Jehova. Lino mbumwasampaula Jehova buzuba obuno, junza uyoonyemena imbungano yoonse buyo ya-Israyeli.

Pele kuti nyika niimupedwe ilisofweede, amuzubuke munyika njavubide Jehova, molikede itente lya-Jehova, kuti mwaabilwe nyika akati kandiswe. Mutasampauli Jehova, alimwi mutatusampauli iswe, cakuliyakila cipaililo cimbi citali cipaililo ca-Jehova Leza wesu.
Sa Akani mwana wa-Zera teewakabisya kumakani aazintu zitondwa na? Sa teewakaletela imbungano yoonse ya-Israyeli bukali na? Kali muntu omwe buyo, pele teewakanyonyooka alike mukubisya kwakwe pe.
Mwami Leza Jehova, Mwami Leza Jehova, ulizi, abalo ba-Israyeli bayooziba mbubonya, kuti teensi kusampaula na kubisizya Jehova (na mbuboobo, mutatufwidi insoni pe)
nkutuyakila cipaililo. Teensi kuleka kutobela Jehova nanka kutuula alincico zituuzyo azipaizyo azipo zyakutontozya nkutuyakila pe. Na mbuboobo, Jehova mwini atupe mulandu.
Ncobeni twacicita nkaambo kakuti muyeeyo oyu watukataazya. Twakati, Mumazuba aali kunembo bana banu bayooambila bana besu kuti, Mujisi makaninzi nywebo a-Jehova Leza waIsrayeli?
Jehova wakabika Jordano, ube mugaano akati kesu, iswe anywebo, nubana ba-Rubeni abana ba-Gadi. Tamujisi caabilo muli-Jehova pe. Aboobo bana banu bayoolesya bana besu kulemeka Jehova.
Nciceeco ncitwakaambila kuti, Atucite obo, tuyake cipaililo, teensi kwaamba kuti cipaililo cakupaizya na cakutuuzya pe,

pele cikabe citondezyo kulindiswe akulindinywe akubana besu toonse baciza musule lyesu, cakutondezya kuti tuyoomanina Jehova milimo akumuletela zipaizyo azituuzyo azipo zyakutontozya. Aboobo mumazuba aaciza bana banu tabakooyookonzya kwaambila bana besu kuti, Inywe tamujisi caabilo muli-Jehova,

Nkaambo kako twakati, Nibayootwaambila obo, iswe abana besu baciza, tuyooamba kuti, Amubone cipaililo eci ca-Jehova mbuciyakidwe. Ncencico bamatateesu ncibakayaka. Teecayakilwa zipaizyo naa zituuzyo pe, cakayakilwa bukamboni kulindiswe akulindinywe.

Ncitutondedwe kusampaula Jehova, na kuleka sunu kutobela inzila ya-Jehova, na kuyaka cipaililo acimbi cazituuzyo acazipo acazipaizyo citali eco cipaililo ca-Jehova Leza wesu cili kunembo lyatente lyakwe.
Mpawo Pinehasi mupaizi abapati bambungano abasilutwe baziinga zyaba-Israyeli mbaakali abo, nibakamvwa majwi ngibakaamba bana baRubeni abana ba-Gadi abana ba-Manase, makani akababotela.

Nkabela Pinehasi mwana wa-Elezara wakaambila bana ba-Rubeni abana ba-Gadi abana ba-Manase kuti, Buzuba obuno twaziba kuti Jehova mpali akati kesu, mbumutana kubisizya Jehova obo. Lino mwavuna bana ba-Israyeli kubukali bwa-Jehova.
Elyo Pinehasi mwana wa-Eleazara mupaizi abapati mbaakali abo bakapiluka kuzwa kubana ba-Rubeni abana ba-Gadi, kuzwa kucisi ca-Gileadi, kuya kucisi ca-Kanana kubana ba-Israyeli, akubaboozezya makani.
Lino makani akababotela bana ba-Israyeli, nkabela bana baIsrayeli bakalumbaizya Leza, bakaleka kwaamba kuyoobalwisya akunyonyoona nyika eyo bana ba-Rubeni abana ba-Gadi mobakakede.
Nkabela bana ba-Rubeni abana ba-Gadi bakaulika cipaililo kuti mbukamboni, nkaambo bakati, Mbukamboni kulindiswe akulindinywe kuti Jehova nguLeza.
Joshua wakaita bana ba-Israyeli boonse, bapati abasilutwe ababetesi abeendelezi, akubaambila makani. Wakati, Ime ndacembaala, ndaba amyaka mmu,
Lino inywe mwabona zintu zyoonse Jehova Leza wanu nzyaakacitila misyobo eyi yoonse kubusyu bwanu, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu nguwakamulwida.
Amubone! Ndamwaabila ezi zisi zisyeede, kuti zivubwe kumikowa yanu, kuzwa ku-Jordano, amisyobo yoonse njindanyonyoona, mane kusikila kulwizi lupati lwakububbila.
Jehova Leza wanu nguuti kabatande kubusyu bwanu akubasaala kumeso aanu, kuti muvube nyika yabo, mbubonya Jehova Leza wanu mbwaakamwaambila.
Nkaambo kako amuliyumye loko kuti mujatisye akucita zyoonse zilembedwe mubbuku lyamulao wa-Musa, Mutaleyi kuzwa kulinzizyo, nikuba kululyo nikuba kulumwensi.
Amisyobo eyi iisyeede, mutavwelaani ayo pe. Mutaambi mazina aamizimu yabo, nikuba kukonkya njiyo, nikuba kwiivundamina nikuba kwiimanina milimo.
Pele amukakatile kuli-Jehova Leza wanu; mbubonya mbumwakacita mazuba aakamana akusikila sunu.
Jehova wamutandila misyobo mipati iili anguzu, anukuti anywe nubeni taakwe muntu naba omwe iwakaimikila cakumulwisya akusikila sunu.
Umwi wanu ulatanda bantu bali cuulu, nkaambo kakuti Jehova Leza wanu nguumulwida, mbubonya mbwaakamwaambila.
Lino amucenjele loko, muyandisye Jehova Leza wanu.
Nkaambo kakuti, naa mwabweeda musule akukakatila kumisyobo eyi iisyeede njimukede ayo, akukwatana ayo akuswanaana abo,

elyo ncobeni muyooziba kuti Jehova Leza wanu takooyoobatanda limbi bantu bamisyobo eyi kumeso aanu, pele bayoomubeda kooze acigece, ciyasyo camumabazu aanu amamvwa aamumeso aanu, mane mukamaninine munyika eyi imbotu Jehova Leza wanu njaakamupa.

Lino mebo ndatola inzila njibatola bantu boonse. Mulizi camyoyo yanu yoonse acamiyeeyo yanu yoonse kuti taakwe cintu niciba comwe icakawida ansi akati kazintu zibotu zyoonse Jehova Leza wanu nzyakaamba aandinywe. Zyoonse buyo zyakacitika, taakwe niciba comwe icakawida ansi.

Lino mbubonya mbumwasikilwa zintu zyoonse zibotu Jehova Leza wanu nzyaakamwaambila, aboobo Jehova uyoomuletela zintu zyoonse zibi, mane akamunyonyoone kuzwa munyika eyi imbotu Jehova Leza wanu njaamupede.

Na mwasotoka cizuminano ca-Jehova Leza wanu ncaakamulailila, akuya bumanina mizimu myeenzu milimo akwiikotamina, elyo bukali bwa-Jehova buyoomubukila, muyoofwambaana kunyonyooka kuzwa munyika imbotu njaakamupa.

Elyo Joshua wakaambila bantu boonse kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Kalekale bamauso kabakede mutala lyamulonga, nkukuti Tera wisi Abrahamu­ awisi Nahori, nkabela kabakomba mizimu imbi.
Elyo ndakagwisya uso Abrahamu kuzwa mutala lyamulonga, ndakamweenzeenzya munyika yoonse ya-Kanana, alimwi ndakavuzya inyungu zyakwe akumupa Izaka,
Alakwe Izaka ndakamupa Jakobo a-Esau, Nkabela Esau ndakamupa cilundu caSeiri, kuti acivube, pele Jakobo abana bakwe bakainka ku-Egepita,
Lino ndakatuma Musa a-Aroni, ndakapenzya-penzya cisi ca-Egepita kuzintu ezyo zyoonse nzindakacita mulincico, elyo kusule ndakamugwisya mumonya,
Ndakagwisya bamauso kuzwa ku-Egepita, nkabela bamauso nibakasika kulwizi ba-Egepita bakabatobela ankalaki abasimbizi kusikila ku-Lwizi Lusalala,
Elyo nibakakwiilila Jehova, wakabika mudima akati kanu abaEgepita, alimwi wakabaletela maanzi akubabbizya. Meso aanu akabona ncindakacita mu-Egepita, Alimwi mwakalikede ciindi cilamfu munkanda,
elyo nicakaba ciindi ndakamusisya munyika yaba-Amori ibakakede mutala lya-Jordano, lino bakamulwisya, nkabela ndakabaaba mumaanza aanu, mwakavuba nyika yabo, alimwi ndakabanyonyoona kumeso aanu.
Pele ndakakaka kuswiilila Balamu, aboobo wakamulongezya buyo, nkabela ndakamuvuna kumaanza aakwe.
Alimwi ndakatuma manko kunembo lyanu, ngongawo akabatanda bami bobile babaAmori kumeso aanu. Teensi ipanga lyanu nibuba buta bwanu nzindakabatanzya pe,
Nkabela ndakamupa nyika njimwakatabelekela, am inzi niimwatakayaka anukuti mulikede mulinjiyo, amyuunda yamisaansa ayamaolifa njimwatakabyala anukuti mulalya micelo yayo.
Lino amumuyoowe Jehova akumumanina milimo cakululama acakusinizya. Amusowe mizimu imbi bamauso njibakamanina milimo mutala lyamulonga amucisi ca-Bgepita, mumanine Jehova milimo,

Pele na mumeso aanu kwabija kumanina Jehova milimo, lino amulisalile buzuba obuno ngumuyanda kubelekela, nanka mizimu bamauso njibakabelekela mutala lyamulonga, nanka mizimu yaba-Amori mbemukede abo munyika yabo, Pele mebo abasiŋanda bangu tulabelekela Jehova.
Mpawo bantu bakavuwa kuti, Ncitutondedwe kuleka Jehova akumanina mizimu imbi milimo!

Nkaambo Jehova Leza wesu nguwakatugwisya, iswe amatateesu, munyika ya-Egepita amuŋanda yabuzike, alimwi nguwe wakacita kumeso esu malele aya mapati, akutubamba kabotu munzila yoonse njitweendela aakati kamisyobo yoonse njitwakainda,
Alimwi Jehova nguwakatutandila misyobo yoonse, aba-Amori ibakakede munyika, Nkaambo kako aswebo tuyoobelekela Jehova milimo, nkaambo ngonguwe Leza wesu.
Na mwamuleka Jehova akumanina mizimu myeenzu milimo, elyo ulasanduka akumucitila bubi, akumumanisya, azwa kumucitila bubotu.
Pele bantu bakaambila Joshua kuti, Nee! Ncobeni tulamanina Jehova milimo.
Lino Joshua wakaambila bantu kuti, Muli bakamboni banu nubeni bakuti mwalisalila Jehova, mumumanine milimo, Bakati, Tuli bakamboni.
Wakati, Mbubo, Lino amusowe mizimu myeenzu iili akati kanu, mubike myoyo yanu kuli-Jehova Leza waIsrayeli,
Bantu bakavwiila Joshua kuti, Jehova Leza wesu ngututi manine milimo, ajwi lyakwe ndituti swiilile.
Nkabela Joshua wakalemba majwi aya mubbuku lyamulao wa-Leza, alimwi wakabweza ibbwe ipati akuliimika munsi lyamukotokoto uuli kucikombelo ca-Jehova.
Nkabela Joshua wakaambila bantu boonse kuti, Amubone! Ibbwe eli liyootubeda kamboni, nkaambo lilimvwide majwi oonse aa-Jehova ngaakatwaambila. Liyoomubeda kamboni, kuti mutalubi Leza wanu.
Elyo Joshua wakatuma bantu boonse kumaanda aabo.
Lino makani aya naakamana, Joshua mwana wa-Nuni, mulanda waJehova, wakafwa, Kali amyaka iili mwaanda akumi.
Nkabela bakamuzika mucaabilo canyika yakwe ncaakapegwa mu-Timinatisera muzilundulundu zya-Efraimu kubbazu lyanyika lyacilundu ca-Gaasi.
Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakamanina Jehova milimo amazuba oonse aa-Joshua, amazuba oonse aabapati ibakacisyeede Joshua naakafwa, ibakabwene milimo ya-Jehova njaakacitila ba-Israyeli.
Azifuwa zya-Josefa, bana ba-Israyeli nzibakabwezede kuzwa ku-Egepita, bakazizika mu-Sekemu mumuunda oyo Jakobo ngwaakaula kubana ba-Hamori wisi Sekemu amali aali mwaanda, ngubakavuba bana ba-Josefa,
Alakwe Eleazara mwana wa-Aroni wakafwa, nkabela bakamuzika mukalundu ka-Pinehasi mwanaakwe nkaakapegwa muzilundulundu zya-Efraimu.
Nkabela Jehova wakati, Juda nguelede kumusololela, Ncobeni nyika ndaiaba mumaanza aakwe.
Elyo Juda wukaambila Simeoni mukulana wakwe kuti, Atweende ayebo kucaabilo cangu, tukalwisye ba-Kanana, lino ambebo nzooinka ayebo kucaabilo cako, Nkabela Simeoni wakaya awe.
Lino Juda naakainka, Jehova wakaaba ba-Kanana aba-Perizi mumaanza aabo, Bakajaya akati kabo bantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi mu-Bezeki.
Nkabela mumonya mu-Bezeki bakajana Adoni-bezeki, bakalwana awe, akuzunda ba-Kanana aba-Perizi.
Lino Adoni-bezeki wakacija, pele bakamutobela akuyoomujata, nkabela bakamukosola zyaala zyamaulu,

Elyo Adoni-bezeki wakati, Bami bali makumi aali musanu aabili bakoswedwe zyaala azyaala zyamaulu bakali kubwezelela bufwefwelenga munsi atafule lyangu, Mbuli mbundakacita, Leza wandicitila mbubonya, Lino bakamuleta ku-Jerusalemu, nkuko nkwakafwida.
Lino cibe ciindi bana ba-Juda bakaya kuyoolwisya ba-Kanana ibakakede muzilundu amucimpayuma cakumusanza amutulundulundu,
Alimwi ba-Juda bakalwana aba-Kanana ibakakede mu-Hebroni, (izina lya-Hebroni lyakutanguna kalili Kiriyati-ariba), nkabela bakazunda Sesai a-Ahimani a-Talimai.
Kuzwa oko bakaya kuyoolwana abakakede mu-Dibiri, (izina lya-Dibiri lyakutaa-nguna kalili Kiriyati-Seferi),
Nkabela Kalebe wakati, Kufumbwa muntu uulwisya Kiriati-Seferi akuuzunda, njoomupa mwanaangu Akisa, amukwate.
Lino Otiniyeli mwana wa-Kenazi, mwanike wa-Kalebe, wakauzunda, elyo bakamupa Akisa mwanaakwe kuti amukwate,
Nkabela naakeza kuli-nguwe, wakamukombelezya kuti akumbile muunda kuliwisi. Lino naakaseluka ambongolo, Kalebe wakamubuzya kuti, Uyandanzi?
Wakati, Kondipa caabilo. Wandipa cimpayuma cakumusanza, kondipa atusensa twamaanzi. Elyo Kalebe wakamupa tusensa twakunselelo.
Lino Juda wakaya a-Simeoni mukulana wakwe kuyoozunda ba-Kanana bakakede mu-Zefati, nkabela bakasaala munzi, azina lyawo bakauulika Horima.
Alimwi Juda wakazunda Gaza acisi cawo, a-Asikeloni acisi cawo, a-Ekroni acisi cawo.
Jehova kali a-Juda, aboobo wakasaala nyika yazilundu, pele wakakacilwa kusaala bantu bamumpata, nkaambo kabajisi inkalaki yabutale,
Nkabela Kalebe bakamupa Hebroni, mbubonya Musa mbwaakalailila, elyo wakatanda kuzwa nkuko bana botatwe ba-Anaki.
Abana ba-Benjamini teebakatanda ba-Jebusi ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu. Ba-Jebusi bacikede antoomwe abana ba-Benjamini mu-Jerusalemu mane kusikila sunu,
Alimwi bana ba-Josefa bakainka kuyoolwisya Beteli, nkabela Jehova kali abo,
Lino bana ba-Josefa nibakatuma kuyoolanga-langa Beteli (ngonguwe munzi iwakataanguna kutegwa Luzi),
balangizi bakabona muntu uuli mukuzwa mumunzi, elyo bakamwaambila kuti, Ututondezye manjililo aamunzi, lino tulakufwida luzyalo.
Nkabela wakabatondezya manjililo aamunzi, elyo bakasaala munzi amulomo wapanga, pele oyo muntu abasiŋanda bakwe bakabalobosya.
Lino oyo muntu wakalongela kunyika yaba-Hiti, waakuyaka munzi nkuko, wakauulika izina lya-Luzi, ndendilyo izina lyawo asunu.
Nekubaboobo ba-Israyeli nibakajana inguzu, bakatelesya ba-Kanana, Kutanda teebakabatandilila pe.
pele ba-Aseri bakalikede akati kaba-Kanana bamunyika eyo. Teebakabatandilila pe.
Nkabela ba-Amori bakatonta bana ba-Dani muzilundulundu. Tcebakabazumizya kuseluka mumumpata pe.
Ba-Amori bakakakatila kukala mucilundu ca-Heresi amu-Aijaloni amu-Saalibimu. Nekubaboobo maanza aaluzubo lwa-Josefa akabalemena mane bakatelesegwa.
Lino mugaano waba-Amori kuuli kuzwa kumatantilo aa-Akrabimu, kuzwa ku-Sela akuya kujulu.
Pele inywe tamweelede kutangana cizuminano abantu bamomuno mucisi, Zipaililo zyabo muleelede kuzimwaya. Nekubaboobo tamuna kuswiilila ijwi lyangu. Mwacitila nzi obo?
Lino mebo ndaamba kuti, Nsikooyoobatanda limbi kubusyu bwanu. Bayoomubeda mbuli mamvwa mumabambo aanu, amizimu yabo iyoomubeda cilebyo.
Lino angelo wa-Jehova naakaambila boonse bana ba-Israyeli majwi aya, bantu bakakwiizya majwi aabo akulila,
Aboobo oko kuntu kwakaulikwa izina lya-Bokimu (nkukuti Kulila), Mpawo bakapaila Jehova nkukonya,
Lino Joshua naakamana kumwaisya bantu, bana ba-Israyeli boonse bakainka umwi aumwi kucaabilo cakwe kuyoovuba nyika.

Nkabela bantu bakamanina Jehova milimo mazuba oonse ngaakapona Joshua, amazuba oonse aabapatinyina ibakacili kupona Joshua naakamana kufwa, ibakabwene incito zigambya zya-Jehova ngaakacitila ba-Israyeli.
Lino Joshua mwana waNuni mulanda wa-Jehova wakafwa, kali amyaka iili mwaanda akumi.
Elyo bakamuzika munyika yacaabilo cakwe, mu-Timinatiheresi muzilundulundu zya-Efraimu kunyika lyacilundu ca-Gaasi.
Abazyalani elyo lyoonse bakainka kuyoona abamawisi, nkabela kwakabuka izyalani alimwi iipya musule lyabo, ilyatakezi Jehova niziba incito zyakwe nzyaakacitila ba-Israyeli,
Lino bana ba-Israyeli bakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, bakamanina Baala milimo,
Bakaleka Jehova Leza wabamawisi iwakabapozya munyika ya-Egepita, akutobela mizimu myeenzu, mizimu yamisyobo iibeengelede. Bakaikomba, aboobo bakakalazya Jehova.
Bakaleka Jehova akumanina Baala a-Asitaroti milimo.

Elyo bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila baIsrayeli, nkabela wakabaaba mumaanza aabasaali ibakabasaala, alimwi wakabanzya mumaanza aabasinkondonyina beengelede. Teebakacili kukonzya kwiima nji mukulwisya basinkondonyina.
Koonse nkubakali kuya ijanza lya-Jehova lyakabaletela mapenzi, mbubonya Jehova mbwaakaamba, ambubonya Jehova mbwaakabakonkezya, aboobo bakapenga loko.
Elyo Jehova wakabusya babetesi, mbembabo ibakabavuna kumaanza aabasaali.
Pele teebakaswiilila babetesi babo pe, bakacili kuya butobela mizimu myeenzu akwiikotamina. Bakafwambaana kuleka inzila bamawisi njibakeenda cakuswiilila milazyo ya-Jehova. Teebakali kucita obo pe.

Lino Jehova naakababusizya babetesi, Jehova kali amubetesi, akubavuna kumaanza aabasinkondonyina mazuba oonse ngaakapona oyo mubetesi, nkaambo Jehova wakeempwa naakamvwa mbubakali kutongela nkaambo kabaabo ibakali kubapenzya akubafwabya.
Pele mubetesi naakafwa, bakabweeda akubisya akwiinda bamawisi, cakutobela mizimu myeenzu akwiimanina milimo akwiikotamina. Teebakaleka incito zyabo anzila yabusicinguni pe.
Elyo bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila ba-Israyeli. Wakati, Bantu aba mbubatyola cizuminano cangu ncindakalailila bamawisi akukaka kuswiilila ijwi lyangu,
nsikooyoobatandila limbi musyobo nuuba omwe akati kamisyobo Joshua njaakasia naakafwa.
Eyi misyobo iyooba yakusukusya ba-Israyeli, nkazibe naa balazumina kubamba imbeta zya-Jehova, mbubakali kuzibamba bamawisi, naa pe.
Nciceeco Jehova ncaakalekela misyobo eyo akutafwambaana kwiitanda. Teewakaiaba mumaanza aa-Joshua pe.
Yakali yakuzibya mazyalani aabana ba-Israyeli, akubaiisya inkondo abo ibatakaina kuziba mbwiilwigwa.
Misyobo njeeyi: bami bosanwe baba-Filisti, aba-Kanana boonse, aba-Sidoni, aba-Hivi ibakakede mucilundu ca-Lebano, kuzwa kucilundu ca-Baalaherimoni mane kusikila kumanjililo aa-Hamati.
Yakaba yakusukusya ba-Israyeli, kuti azibe naa balaswiilila milazyo ya-Jehova njaakalailila bamawisi kumulomo wa-Musa,
Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakalikede akati kaba-Kanana aba-Hiti abaAmori aba-Perizi aba-Hivi aba-Jebusi.
Bana babo basimbi bakali kubakwata, abasimbi babo beni bakali kubakwatanya abalombe babo, alimwi bakali kukomba mizimu yabo.

Nkabela bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila ba-Israyeli, aboobo wakabauzya mumaanza aa-Ku saniRisatayimu, mwami wa-Mesopotamiya. Lino bana ba-Israyeli bakabelekela Kusani-Risatayimu myaka iili musanu aitatu.
Elyo bana ba-Israyeli nibakakwiilila Jehova, Jehova wakabusizya bana ba-Israyeli mufutuli iwakabafutula, nkukuti Otiniyeli mwana wa-Kenazi mwanike wa-Kale be.

Muuya wa-Jehova wakamuselukila, elyo wakabeteka ba-Israyeli, alimwi wakaya kuyoolwana, nkabela Jehova wakaaba Kusani-Risatayimu mwami wa-Mesopotamiya mumaanza aakwe, Ijanza lyakwe lyakalemena Kusani-Risatayimu,
lino nyika yakatontola myaka iili makumi one, lumwi Otiniyeli mwana wa-Kenazi wakafwa.
Mpawo wakaliyobolweda bana ba-Amoni aba-Amaleki, wakaya kuyoosaala baIsrayeli, elyo bakavuba munzi watukunka.
Lino bana ba-Israyeli bakabelekela Egiloni mwami wa-Moabu myaka iili ikumi amusanu aitatu.

Pele bana ba-Israyeli nibakakwiilila Jehova, Jehova wakababusizya mufutuli, Ehudi mwana wa-Gera, muna-Benjamini, muntu sicimwensi. Bana ba-Israyeli bakatumina Egiloni mwami wa-Moabu cilumbyo kujanza lyakwe.
Nkabela Ehudi wakalifulila ipanga lili amilomo yobile, bulamfu bwalyo bwakali kakokola, lino wakalisama kunsi lyazyakusama zyakwe kucibelo cakwe calulyo.
Elyo wakaleta cilumbyo kuli-Egiloni mwami wa-Moabu. Nkabela Egiloni kali muntu uuneneede loko,
Lino naakamana kuleta cilumbyo, wakabweedezya basikuyumuna acilumbyo,
pele walo mwini wakapiluka kuzwa kumigodi yaku-Giligala, wakati, Ndijisi ijwi lyakwaamba kumbali, O mwami, Lino wakaamba kuti, Amutuleke, Mpawo bantu boonse mbaakali abo bakazwa anze,
Nkabela Ehudi naakaswena nkwakabede, wakalikede muŋanda yakulitontozya yamujulu njakajisi. Mpawo Ehudi wakati, Ndijisi ijwi lya-Leza lyakwaambila nduwe, O mwami, Elyo naakanyampuka acuuno cakwe,
Ehudi wakatandabula ijanza lyakwe lyalumwensi, wakasomona ipanga lyakali kulubbazu lwakwe lwalulyo, akumuyasa mwida.
Aluti alwalo lwakanjila musule lyamemba, amafuta akasinka kumemba, nkaambo takakalisomona ipanga mubula bwakwe pe, elyo kwakazwa cifusi,
Mpawo Ehudi wakazwa akuya mulukonkono, wakajala milyango yaŋanda musule lyakwe, akwiikwiida.
Lino naakamana kwiinka, balanda bakwe bakasika, bakabona kuti milyango yaŋanda ilikwiididwe, elyo bakaamba kuti, Ncobeni ulavumba maulu aakwe muŋanda yakulitontozya.
Nkabela bakalindila mane bakafwa insoni, pele teewakajalula milyango yaŋanda pe, lino bakabweza inkwiidizyo, bajula mulyango, bakajana mwami wabo uliwide ansi, ulifwide.
Pele Ehudi wakalilobokede nibakacili kulindila, wakainda mutala lyamigodi, wakasika ku-Scira.
Elyo naakasika, wakalizya mweembo mucilundu ca-Efraimu, nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakazwa kuzilundulundu, walo kabasololela.

Lino wakabaambila kuti, Amutobele ndime, nkaambo Jehova waaba basinkondonyoko ba-Moabu mumaanza aanu. Mpawo bakamutobela, bakaakujata zito zyaku-Jordano zilangene anyika ya-Moabu, alimwi teebakazumizya muntu naba omwe kuzu-buka.
Nkabela bakajaya akati kaba-Moabu kuciindi eco bantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi, boonse kabali basintaze, Teekwakaloboka muntu naba omwe akati kabo,
Aboobo ba-Moabu bakazundwa mubuzuba obo akweendelezegwa kubana ba-Israyeli, Elyo nyika yakalitontwede myaka iili makumi aali musanu aatatu.
nkabela Jehova wakabaaba mumaanza aa-Jabini mwami wa-Kanana iwakali kweendelezya mu-Hazori, Asilutwe wampi yakwe kali Sisera iwakakede mu-Haroseti wabamasi.
Mpawo bana baIsrayeli bakakwiilila Jehova, nkaambo kali ankalaki zyabutale zili myaanda iili musanu aine, alimwi wakapenzya bana ba-Israyeli myaka iili makumi obile.
Kakede munsi lyakakunka ka-Debora kali akatikati ka-Rama a-Beteli mutulundulundu twa-Efraimu, abana ba-Israyeli bakali kuya kulinguwe kuyoobetekwa.

Elyo wakatuma kuyooita Baraki mwana wa-Abinoamu waku-Kedesi-Nafatali, wakamwaambila kuti, Sa Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli takwalailila kuti, Koya ukayobolole mucilundu caTabori bantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi, bana ba-Nafitali abana ba-Zebuloni.
Lino njookuletela, kumulonga wa-Kisoni, Sisera silutwe wampi ya-Jabini ankalaki zyakwe amakamu makamu aakwe, nkabela njoomwaaba mumaanza aako.
Mpawo Baraki wakamwaambila kuti, Naa ulazumina kundisindikila, ndaya, pele naa ulakaka, nsiinki pe,

Wakavuwa kuti, Kwiinka ncobeni tulainka ayebo, nekubaboobo olu lweendo ndotola talukooyookuletela bulemu pe, nkaambo Jehova ulaaba Sisera mumaanza aamwanakazi. Mpawo Debora wakabuka, wakasindikila Baraki kuya ku-Kedesi.
Nkabela Baraki wakayobolola bana ba-Zebuloni abana ba-Nafitali ku-Kadesi, elyo kwakainka awe baalumi bali zyuulu zili ikumi, alakwe Debora wakainka awe.
(Lino Heberi mu-Keni kalipambwide kuzwa kubana ba-Hobabu wisizyala Musa, kayakide cilao cakwe kumubanga waku-Zaananimu kubambene aku-Kedesi.)
Elyo bakaambila Sisera kuti Baraki mwana wa-Abinoamu wasika kucilundu caku-Tabori.
