Mpawo Baraki wakabunganya inkalaki zyakwe zyoonse, inkalaki zyabutale zili myaanda iili musanu aine, abantu boonse mbaakali abo, kuzwa ku-Haroseti wabamasi akusikila kukalonga ka-Kisoni.

Lino Debora wakaambila Baraki kuti, Buka, nkaambo obuno mbobuzuba Jehova mbwati abe Sisera mumaanza aako, Sa Jehova takwakuzulwida kale na? Mpawo Baraki wakaseluka kuzwa kucilundu ca-Tabori, abantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi musule lyakwe.
Nkabela Jehova wakapyopyonganya Sisera ankalaki zyakwe zyoonse abasimpi bakwe boonse kumulomo wapanga kubusyu bwa-Baraki, elyo Sisera wakazwa munkalaki yakwe, wakacija amaulu.
Pele Baraki wakacili kuya butobela inkalaki abasimpi mane kusikila ku-Haroseti wabamasi, nkabela basimpi boonse ba-Sisera bakajazigwa ipanga, teekwakasyaala muntu naba omwe.
Nkabela jaeli wakazwa kuvootambula Sisera, wakamwaambila kuti Njila, mwami, njila mulindime, utayoowi pe, Mpawo wakanjila mulinguwe mucilao, nkabela wakamuvumbya isalu.
Elyo wakamukumbila kuti, Undinywisye twaanzi, nkaambo ndafwa nyota, Mpawo wakasinkula insuwa yamalili, wakamunywisya akumuvumba.
Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Ima kumulyango wacilao, elyo na kusike muntu uubuzya kuti, Sa muli muntu? ulamwaambila kuti, Taakwe pe.

Mpawo Jaeli muka-Heberi mu-Keni wakabweza inembe yacilao, alimwi wakabweza insando mujanza lyakwe, wakeza nkwakabede cakubelelela, wakamuumya inembe mumpobe zyakwe, akumukankamina ansi. Wakali muŋonzi impati, nkaambo wakakataala, aboobo wakafwa.

Lino Baraki naakacili kuya butobela Sisera, jaeli wakazwa kuyoomucinga, wakati, Koza, ndakutondezya oyo muntu ngoyandaula. Elyo wakanjila mulinguwe, wakajana Sisera ulilede ansi, ulifwide, anembe mumpobe zyakwe.
Mbuboobo Leza mbwaakabombya Jabini mwami wa-Kanana buzuba obo kubusyu bwabana ba-Israyeli.
Ijanza lyabana ba-Israyeli lyakali kuya bulemena Jabini mwami wa-Kanana, mane bakanyonyoona oyo Jabini mwami wa-Kanana.
Lino mubuzuba obo Debora a-Baraki mwana wa-Abinoamu bakaimba lwiimbo lwakuti,
Basololi mbubakasololela mu-Israyeli,
Abantu mbubakalyaaba camoyo woonse,
Amulumbe Jehova,
Amuteelele nobami,
Amuswiilile nobasilutwe,
Mebo ndaimbila Jehova,
Ndatembaula Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Anowakeendeenda kuzwa kunkanda ya-Edomu,
Nyika yakakankama, amajulu akalosya,
Mayoba akalosya maanzi.
Eci cilundu ca-Sinai kumeso aa-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli,
Amumazuba aa-Jaeli,
Migwagwa kiiteendeli bantu.
Basilweendo kabeenda mutuzila tupilingene.
Ncobeni yakabula bantu,
Mane ime nde-Debora ndakabuka,
Ndakabuka mbuli nyina waba-Israyeli.
Elyo kwakabuka inkondo mumanjililo.
Ncobeni teekwakabonwa intobo niliba isumo,
Akati kabantu bali zyuulu zili makumi one bamu-Israyeli,
Moyo wangu uli kubeendelezi ba-Israyeli,
Ibakalyaaba camoyo woonse akati kabantu.
Amulumbe Jehova.
Anywebo nomukala aminseme miyandisi,
Anywebo nomweenda munzila,
Amwaambe makani.
Kule kuzwa kumivwi nkwiifuswa,
Nkubateka maanzi,
Nkukonya oko nkubayookananina milimo iiluleme ya-Jehova,
Abululami mbwacitila minzi yaba-Israyeli.
Bantu ba-Jehova bakaseluka kuya kumilyango.
Buka, buka, Debora.
Buka, buka, imba lwiimbo.
Buka, Baraki.
Saala basikusaala, O mwana wa-Abinoamu.
Lino kwakeza basilutwe babantu ibakasyeede,
Jehova wakandizida kuyoolwisya basinguzu.
Bakakutobela, O Benjamini, akati kabantu bako.
Kuzwa ku-Makiri kwakeza basinkuta,
Akuzwa ku-Zebuloni basikujata musako wabusibbuku.
Bapati ba-Isakara bakali a-Debora,
Ba-Isakara bakali amoyo omwe a-Baraki,
Bakamufumukila cakumutobela mumumpata.
Kutulonga twa-Rubeni
Kwakakosolwa makani mapati mumyoyo.
Sa wakali kuyanda kumvwa tuntimbwa twabeembezi?
Kutulonga twa-Rubeni
Kwakakosolwa makani mapati mumyoyo.
Aba-Dani bakasyaalilanzi amaato aabo?
Ba-Aseri bakalikede ankomwe aalwizi,
Bakalisyeede kumisundila yalo.
Aba-Nafitali mbubonya bakali kweendeenda musokwe.
Bami ba-Kanana bakali kulwana
Mu-Taanaki kutulonga twa-Megido.
Teebakajana impindu yamali pe.
Inyenyeezi munzila zyazyo zyakali kulwanisya Sisera.
Oyo mulonga waciindi, mulonga wa-Kisoni.
(Koya bweenda anguzu, O moyo wangu.)
Elyo insumba zyambizi zyakali kusabila,
Basilumamba nibakali kuya bweendesya.
Kutukila amutukile bantu bankuko,
Nkaambo teebakasika kuyoogwasya milimo ya-Jehova,
Milimo ya-Jehova yakulwanisya basinguzu.
Muka-Heberi mu-Keni,
Abe acoolwe kwiinda banakazi boonse mumaanda.
Oyo mwaalumi naakakumbila maanzi, wakamupa malili,
Wakamuletela mabisi mumutiba wabwami.
Wakabweza inembe yacilao mujanza lyakwe,
Amujanza lyalulyo wakajata insando yasimilimo,
Elyo insando wakaiumya Sisera amutwe,
Wakaumisya, wakatulula inkumu yakwe,
Mpawo wakawida kumaulu aakwe, wakakotama, wakalala.
Ncobeni wakawida kumaulu aakwe, wakakotama,
Oko nkwaakakotamina, wakawida nkuko ulifwide.
Bakasondela mucipulo, bakalila.
Banyina Sisera bakalila kucimanga kuti,
Ino nkaambonzi inkolowi yakwe yamuka?
Mavwili aankolowi yakwe asyaalilanzi?
Elyo basimbi bakwe bakavuwa cakusongwaala-songwaala,
Alakwe mwini wakalivwiila mbubonya, kuti,
Umwi aumwi uli amusimbi na basimbi bobile.
Sisera ulijene zyakusama zyamabala mabala,
Azisani zisumidwe zyamabala,
Zisumidwe koonse, nkazizwate ansingo.
Pele abo bakuyanda babe mbuli izuba nilipasula canguzu.
Elyo nyika yakaumuna myaka iili makumi one.
Nka­ bela ijanza lya-Midyani lyakalemena ba-Israyeli, elyo nkaambo kaba-Midyani bana ba-Israyeli bakalicitila malyango aamuzilundu, amalindi azinkolyo.
Lino ba-Israyeli nibakamana kubyala, kwakasika ba-Midyani aba-Amaleki abana bakujwe kuzoosaala,
Bakali kuza kuzoobalwisya akunyonyoona micelo yanyika koonse koonse mane kusikila ku-Gaza. Teebakasiila ba-Israyeli malilu naa buniini, niiba imbelele niiba iŋombe niiba imbongolo.
Bakeza aŋombe zyabo amatente aabo, bakeza banji loko mbuli cisozi. Katakwe iwakakonzya kubabala, ankamele zyabo zyoonse. Bakeza kuzoosaala nyika,
aboobo ba-Israyeli bakalipengede loko nkaambo ka-Midyani, Mpawo bana ba-Israyeli bakakwiilila Jehova.
Elyo bana ba-Israyeli nibakakwiilila Jehova nkaambo kaba-Midyani,
Jehova wakatumina bana ba-Israyeli muntu musinsimi, wakabaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Ndime ndakamupozya munyika ya-Egepita. Ndime ndakamugwisya muŋanda yabuzike.
Ndakamuvuna mumaanza aaba-Egepita amumaanza aaboonse ibakali kumupenzya. Ndakabatanda kubusyu bwanu, alimwi ndakamwaabila nyika yabo.
Elyo ndakamwaambila kuti, Ndime Jehova Leza wanu. Mutalemeki mizimu yaba-Amori mbomukede munyika yabo. Nekubaboobo tamuna kuswiilila ijwi lyangu,
Nkabela angelo wa-Jehova wakamubonekela, wakamwaambila kuti, Jehova uli ayebo, O mwaalumi singuzu.

Gideoni wakati, We! mwami! Na Jehova uli aswe, ino nkaambonzi notujene mapenzi aya oonse? Alimwi ali kuli malele oonse bamatatesu ngubakatwaambila nibakaamba kuti, Jehova nguwakatupozya munyika ya-Egepita. Anukuti sunu Jehova watusia, watwaaba mumaanza aaba-Midyani.
Mpawo Jehova wakamucebuka, wakati, Koya anguzu ezi nzopedwe, ukavune ba-Israyeli kumaanza aaba-Midyani. Sa teensi ndime ndakutuma na?
Wakamuvwiila kuti, Akaka mwami! Mebo nkavune buti ba-Israyeli? Luzubo lwangu nduniini akati kanzubo zya-Manase, ambebo ndimuniini muluzubo lwataata,
Elyo Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Ncobeni njooba ayebo, nkabela ba-Midyani uyoobauma mbuli mbwaumwa muntu omwe buyo.
Utainki kuzwa ano mane ntaangune kuzooleta cipaizyo cangu, nkacituule kubusyu bwako, Wakati, Ndalindila mane ukaboole.
Elyo Gideoni wakaakubamba kapongo, azinkwa zyalusuwo lwabusu. Nyama wakaibika mucinzuma, amusinza wakaubika mucilongo, elyo wakazileta nkwakakede kunsi lyamusamu, wakamutambika.
Nkabela angelo waLeza wakamwaambila kuti, Bweza nyama azinkwa, uzibike awa andomba, amusinza uutile, Lino wakacita obo.

Mpawo angelo wa-Jehova wakatandabika mpela yamufunko ngwaakajisi mujanza lyakwe, wakaampa nyama azinkwa, nkabela mwakazwa mulilo mundomba, wakatenta nyama azinkwa zyoonse, Lino angelo wa-Jehova wakamuzeluka.
Lino Gideoni naakabona kuti nguangelo wa-Jehova, wakati, Maawe, Mwami Jehova! Ndibwene angelo wa-Jehova cakulangana kumeso.
Pele Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Moyo wako ube aluumuno. Utayoowi, nkaambo tokoofwa pe.
Mpawo Gideoni wakayakila Jehova cipaililo nkukonya oko, wakacibanda Jehova-siluumuno. Asunu mpocicili nkukonya ku-Ofiri wa-Abiezeri.
Elyo ukayakile Jehova Leza wako cipaililo atala amandomba aya. Ukayake kabotu, amucende wabili uleelede kumubweza akutuula cituuzyo amisamu njowakatema.

Lino Gideoni wakabweza bantu bali ikumi babalanda bakwe, wakacita mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamulailila. Nkabela mbwaakali kuyoowa basiluzubonyina abantu bamumunzi, teewakacicita isikati, wakacicita masiku.
Elyo bantu bamumunzi nibakabuka cifumofumo bakabona kuti cipaililo ca-Baala cilimwayidwe, amisamu ilitemedwe iyakali nkuko, amucende wabili ulituulidwe acipaililo icakayakwa.
Mpawo bakabuzyanya kuti, Ino nguni wakacita obo? Nkabela nibakayandaula akubuzisisya, kwakaambwa kuti, Gideoni mwana wa-Joasi nguwakacita obo.
Lino bantu bamumunzi bakaambila Joasi kuti, Leta mwanaako, kuti afwe, nkaambo wakamwaya cipaililo ca-Baala, alimwi wakatema misamu iili kulincico.

Pele Joasi wakaambila boonse mbakaimvwi abo kuti, Sa mulacitila Baala inkondo? Sa mulayanda kumuvuna? Uuti mucitile inkondo ajayigwe Junza cifumo, Naa ngu-Leza, alicitile inkondo yakwe mwini nkaambo kakuti cipaililo cakwe camwayigwa.
Nkaambo kako mubuzuba obo Gideoni wakabandwa Jerubaala, nkukuti Baala alicitile inkondo, nkaambo wakamwaya cipaililo cakwe.
Lino Muuya wa-Jehova wakaselukila Gideoni, nkabela wakalizya mweembo, abana ba-Abiezeri bakamubunganina.
Alimwi wakatuma batumwa munyika yoonse yaManase, elyo bakamubunganina abalo, Amunyika ya-Aseri aya-Zebuloni aya-Nafitali moonse wakatuma batumwa, nkabela bakeza kuzoobalwisya.
Lino Gideoni wakaambila Leza kuti, Naa ncobeni ulafutula ba-Israyeli kujanza lyangu, mbubonya mboamba,

Bona! Ndabika boya bwambelele iigeledwe mucipolelo. Naa kulabonwa kuti mumee nkuuli aboya luzutu, pele ansi oonse alayuma, elyo njooziba kuti ncobeni ulafutula ba-Israyeli kujanza lyangu, mbubonya mboamba.
Nkabela cakaba obo, nkaambo nibwakaca, wakafuma, wakasina boya, elyo mulimbubo mwakazwa maanzi manji aamumee aakuzuzya mutiba.
Elyo Leza wakacita mbwaakaamba mumasiku ayo, Akayuma aboya luzutu, pele ansi oonse kwakali mumee.

Lino kolungulula mumatwi aabantu kuti, Kufumbwa muntu uuyoowede akukankama, apiluke akwiinka kuzwa kucilundu ca-Gileadi. Mpawo kwakainka bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azibili, kwakasyaala bantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi.

Elyo wakasisya bantu kumaanzi. Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Gideoni kuti, Boonse bantwakila alulimi mbuli mubwa mbwantwakila, ubabike kubbazu limwi balike. Aboonse bafugama kukunywa, ubabike kubbazu lyabo mbubonya.
Nkabela bantu ibakali kuntwakila, cakusisya ijanza kumulomo, bakali myaanda yotatwe. Pele bantu bamwi boonse bakafugama kukunywa maanzi.
Elyo Jehova wakaambila Gideoni kuti, Bantu bali myaanda yotatwe ibakantwakila, mbombabo mbonti mufutuzye. Njooaba ba-Midyani mumaanza aako. Bamwi boonse bapiluke kulimbabo.

Lino bantu bakabweza bulilu mumaanza aabo, amyeembo yabo. Nkabela bantu bamwi boonse ba-Israyeli wakabatuma kulimbabo, akusyaazya bantu bali myaanda yotatwe luzutu. Azilao zyabaMidyani zyakaliyakidwe munsi lyakwe mukuti.
Pele naa uliyoowede kwiinka, koya webo a-Pura mulanda wako kuzilao,
Elyo nomvwide mbubaamba, kusule maanza aako alajata inguzu, kuti uinke kuzilao. Lino wakainka a-Pura mulanda wakwe kumagolelo aabasilumamba ibakali kuzilao.
Nkabela Ba-Midyani aba-Amaleki aboonse bana bakujwe bakalilede mukuti, bakavulisya mbuli cisozi, ankamele zyabo kazitabaliki, zyakali mbuli musenga uuli ankomwe yalwizi.

Mpawo Gideoni naakasika, kakuli umwi muntu ulakananina mweenzinyina ciloto. Wakati, Swiilila! Ndalota ciloto. Ndakabona cinkwa cabbaale cakeza bukunkulika akati kazilao zyaMidyani, cakasika kutente, cakalyuuma, cakaliwisya, nkabela itente lyakalilede, lyakalivundeme.
Lino mweenzinyina wakavuwa, wakati, Eci cilaamba nzi? Taakwe ncicaamba cita ipanga lya-Gideoni mwana wa-Joasi mu-Israyeli, nkaambo ba-Midyani abasimpi babo bouse Leza wabaaba mumaanza aakwe.
Elyo Gideoni, naakamvwide ciloto akupandululwa kwaco, wakakomba, elyo wakabweeda kuzilao zyaba-Israyeli, wakati, Amubuke, nkaambo Jehova waaba mumaanza aanu basimpi baba-Midyani.
Nkabela bantu bali myaanda yotatwe wakabaandaanya munkamu zyotatwe, alimwi wakabika mumaanza aabo boonse myeembo, ankomeki zitakwe cintu, amalampi mukati kankomeki.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Amulange ndime, mukacite mbuncita, Ndasika buyo kumagolelo aazilao, kufumbwa cintu ncencita mebo, amucite mbubonya anywebo.
Nendizya mweembo, mebo aboonse mbondi abo, lino amulizye myeembo anywebo nyoonse nomuzyungulukide zilao, alimwi amwaambe kuti, Nca-Jehova aca-Gideoni.

Bantu bankamu zyotatwe boonse bakalizya myeembo akutyolaula inkomeki, alimwi bakajata malampi mumaanza aabo aalumwensi amyeembo yakulizya mumaanza aabo aalulyo, nkabela bakakwiilila kuti, Ipanga lya-Jehova alya-Gideoni.
Lino boonse bakaima mumasena aabo cakuzyunguluka zilao, nkabela boonse basizilao bakazuzaana, bakali kuya buyoba-yoba akucija.

Lino abo bantu bali myaanda yotatwe, nibakalizya myeembo, Jehova wakabusya ipanga lyamuntu umwi aumwi kuti lyuume mweenzinyina, oonse akati kazilao. Elyo basimpi bakacija kusikila kuBetesita ku-Zerera, akusikila kumugaano wa-Abelimehola kufwaafwi kuTabati.
Nkabela bantu bakayoboloka kuzwa kunyika ya-Nafitali ayaAseri aya-Manase yoonse, kabaya butanda ba-Midyani.

Alimwi Gideoni wakatuma batumwa mutulundulundu toonse twa-Efraimu cakwaamba kuti, Amuseluke kuzoolwisya ba-Midyani akubanyanzya maanzi kusikila ku-Betibara aku-Jordano, Elyo bantu boonse ba-Efraimu bakayoboloka akunyanzya maanzi kusikila ku-Beti-bara aku-Jordano.

Nkabela bakajata bami bobile ba-Midyani, Orebi a-Zeebi, Orebi bakamujaya kundomba ya-Orebi, a-Zeebi bakamujaya kucisinino ca-Zeebi. Lino kabaya butanda ba-Midyani, alimwi mitwe ya-Orebi a-Zeebi bakaileta kuli-Gideoni kutala lya-Jordano.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Ino mebo ndacitanzi cili mbuli ncimwacita inywe? Sa zyakuvululwida zya-Efraimu taziboti akwiinda zyakutebula zya-Abiezeri na?
Leza waaba mumaanza aanu bami ba-Midyani, Orebi a-Zeebi, Ncinzi ncindakakonzya kucita mebo cili mbuli ncimwakacita nywebo? Lino naakamana kwaamba obo, bukali bwabo bwakamana.
Elyo Gideoni wakasika ku-Jordano, wakazubuka, walo abantu bali myaanda yotatwe mbaakali abo. Bakati wizuke, nekubaboobo bakacili kuya butanda.
Mpawo wakaambila bantu baku-Sukoti kuti, Amutwaabile zinkwa, balye bantu mbondi abo, nkaambo bati wizuke, alimwi ndili mukutanda Zeba a-Zalimuna bami ba-Midyani.
Lino bantu baku-Sukoti bakati, Sa Zeba a-Zalimuna bali kale mumaanza aako na? Ino twaabile buti basimpi bako zilyo?
Mpawo Gideoni wakati, Mbubo! Jehova naamana kwaaba Zeba u-Zalimuna mumaanza aangu, elyo nenti deluule nyama yanu amamvwa aamusokwe aziyasabavwimi.
Lino wakazwa oko, wakaya ku-Penueli, abantu bakooko wakabakumbila mbubonya, pele bantu baku­ Penueli bakamuvwiila mbubonya mbubakavwiide bantu baku-Sukoti,
Nkabela bantu baku-Penueli abalo wakabaambila kuti, Ndaboola buyo caluumuno, nzoomwaya cisanza eci.
Elyo Gideoni wakatola inzila yabasikutuntulika kubbazu lyakujwe lyaku-Noba alyaku-Jogibea, nkabela wakauma basimpi kabatalibambide kulwana.
Mpawo Zeba a-Zalimuna bakaloboka, pele wakabatobela akubajata abo bami bobile ba-Midyani, alimwi wakapyopyonganya impi yoonse.
Lino Gideoni mwana wa-Joasi wakaboola kuzwa kunkondo izuba nilyatakalina kupasula.
Nkabela wakajata umwi mulombe wabantu bakuSukoti, wakamubuzya-buzya, elyo oyo mulombe wakamulungulwida bami ba-Sukoti abapati bankuko, bantu bali makumi aali musanu aabili amusanu mubabili.

Mpawo naakasika kubantu baku-Sukoti, wakabaambila kuti, Bona! Mbaaba Zeba a-Zalimuna, Mbombabo mbomwakandisampaula cakwaamba kuti, Sa Zeba a-Zalimuna bali kale mumaanza aako? Tubape-denzi bamu bako bakatede zilyo?
Lino wakabweza bapati bamunzi, alimwi wakabweza mamvwa aamusokwe aziyasabavwimi, nkabela ezi wakaziisya bantu baku-Sukoti.
Acalo cisanza ca-Penueli wakacimwaya, abantu bamumunzi wakabajaya.
Lino wakati, Bakali bakulana bangu, bana babama bandizyala. Ncobeni Jehova mbwali muumi, nimwakabaleka kabapona nindatamujaya.
Mpawo wakaambila Jeteri mwanaakwe mutaanzi kuti, Buka, ubajaye. Pele mulombe takwakasomona ipanga lyakwe pe, nkaambo wakali kuyoowa, nkaambo wakacili mwanike.

Elyo Zeba a-Zalimuna bakati, Buka uwe omwini, utujaye, nkaambo mwaalumi mbwaabede, inguzu zyakwe mbuzibede. Mpawo Gideoni wakabuka, wakajaya Zeba a-Zalimuna, alimwi wakabweza zyakulisakila izyakali ansingo zyankamele zyabo.
Mpawo bantu ba-Israyeli bakaambila Gideoni kuti, Kotweendelezya, uwe amwanaako amuzukulu wako, nkaambo nduwe watuvuna kumaanza aaba-Midyani.
Pele Gideoni wakabavwiila kuti, Nsikoomweendelezya pe, alakwe mwanaangu takooyoomweendelezya. Jehova nguelede kumweendelezya.

Alimwi Gideoni wakabaambila kuti, Nkucili cintu comwe ncintakumbile kulindinywe. Amundipe umwi aumwi bucaca mbwajene muzisaalo zyakwe. (Nkaambo kabajisi bucaca bwangolida, nkaambo bakali ba-Israyeli).
Bakati, Ncobeni tulakupa. Nkabela bakayala cisani ansi, bakawaala alincico umwi aumwi bucaca bwazisaalo zyakwe.

Nkabela bulemu bwabucaca mbwaakakumbila bwakali masyekeli aangolida aali cuulu amyaanda iili musanu aibili, kutabala zyakulizakila amakobekobe azyakusama zisalala nzibakasamide bami ba-Midyani, anketani zyakali ansingo zyankamele,
Mpawo Gideoni wakazicitya cikozyano, wakaciimika mumunzi waku-Ofira, nkabela ba-Israyeli boonse bakali amyoyo yakubisya-bisya kulincico, aboobo cakaba cilebyo kuli-Gideoni akuluzubo lwakwe.
Mbuboobo ba-Midyani mbubakabombesegwa kubana ba-Israyeli, nkabela teebakasumpula limbi mitwe yabo. Lino nyika yakakala aluumuno myaka iili makumi one naakacili kupona Gideoni.
Lino Jerubaala mwana wa-Joasi wakaakukala kulinguwe.
Nkabela Gideoni kajisi bana bali makumi aali musanu aabili mbaakazyede, nkaambo kali abanakazi banji,
Asimamambe wakwe iwakakede ku-Sekemu alakwe wakamuzyalila mwana, bakamuulika izina lya-Abimeleki.
Elyo Gideoni mwana wa-Joasi wakafwa aciimo cibotu, wakazikwa mucivwikilo cawisi mu-Ofira mucisi caba-Abiezeri.
Bana baIsrayeli teebakayeeya Jehova Leza wabo iwakabavuna kumaanza aabasinkondonyina boonse beengelede,
Alimwi teebakafwida luzyalo luzubo lwa-Jerubaala (ngonguwe Gideoni), mbuli bubotu bwakwe mbwaakacitila ba-Israyeli.

Kamwaamba mumatwi aabapati boonse ba-Sekemu kuti, Cintu cibotu ncecili? Sa ncibotu kuti bantu bali makumi aali musanu aabili, nku kuti bana boonse ba-Jerubaala, bamweendelezye? Na sa ncibotu kuti muntu omwe amweendelezye? Alimwi mutalubi kuti mebo tuli nyama yomwe azifuwa zyomwe anywebo.
Elyo basimizyabo bakaamba aanguwe mumatwi aabami boonse ba-Sekemu majwi aya oonse. Mpawo myoyo yabo yakalibikidwe kuli-Abimeleki, nkaambo bakati, Ngumukwesu.
Nkabela bakamupa mali aansiliva aali makumi aali musanu aabili ngubakagwisya muŋanda ya-Baalaberiti. Aya mali Abimeleki wakaabelesya kukuliletela bantu babuyo bataka kuti bamutobele.

Lino wakasika kuŋanda yawisi ku-Ofira, akooko wakajaya beenzinyina boonse, bana ba-Jerubaala bali makumi aali musanu aabili, abbwe lyomwe. Pele kwakasyaala Jotamu mwana muniini wa-Jerubaala, nkaambo wakaliyubide,
Lino bapati boonse baku-Sekemu, aluzubo loonse lwa-Milo, baka bungana, bakaakubika Abimeleki mubwami kumusamu mupati uuimvwi kuSekemu.
Nkabela Jotamu naakaambilwa, wakaakwiima atala acilundu ca-Gerizimu, wakapozya ijwi lyakwe akubaambila kuti, Amundiswiilile nubami ba-Sekemu, kuti Leza alakwe aswiilile ndinywe.
Cimwi ciindi misamu yoonse yakaya kuyoolinanikila mwami. Lino yakaambila olifa kuti, Ube mwami wesu.
Pele olifa wakavuwa kuti, Ma! Sa ndeke mafuta aali mulindime, ngebalemesya Leza abantu boonse, nje kuyooendelezya misamu?
Mpawo misamu yakaambila mukuyu kuti, Koza uwe ube mwami wesu.
Pele mukuyu wakavuwa kuti, Ma! Sa ndeke bunono bwangu amicelo yangu mibotu, nje kuyooendelezya misamu?
Mpawo misamu yakaambila musaansa kuti, Koza uwe ube mwami wesu.
Pele musaansa wakavuwa kuti, Ma! Sa ndeke waini wangu uubotezya Leza abantu boonse, nje kuyooendelezya misamu?
Lumwi misamu yoonse yakaambila kakoka kuti, Koza uwe ube mwami wesu.

Lino kakoka kakaambila misamu kuti, Na ncobeni mulandinanika kuti mbe mwami wanu, lino amuboole kuzoosyoma muceenzule cangu, Pele na tacili boobo, muzwe mulilo mukakoka, utente misamu yakedari iili ku-Lebano.
(Nkaambo taata wakamulwida cakutayoowa lufu akumuvuna kumaanza aabaMidyani,

anukuti nywebo sunu mwabusizya luzubo lwataata inkondo akujaya bana bakwe bali makumi aali musanu aabili boonse abbwe lyomwe, alimwi mwamupa Abimeleki mwana wamuzike wakwe bwami kubami boonse ba-Sekemu nkaambo ngumukwaabo),
lino na cintu eci ncalusyomo acabululami ncimwacitila Jerubaala aluzubo lwakwe buzuba obuno, lino amujane coolwe muli-Abimeleki, alakwe Abimeleki ajane coolwe mulindinywe.
Pele na tacili boobo, muzwe mulilo muli-Abimeleki akutenta bami ba-Sekemu aluzubo lwa-Milo, alimwi muzwe mulilo mubami ba-Sekemu amuluzubo lwa-Milo akutenta Abimeleki.
Mpawo jotamu wakaloboka­, wacija, wainka ku-Beeri, waakukala nkuko nkaambo ka-Abimeleki mukwaabo.
Nkabela Abimeleki kali mwami wa-Israyeli myaka yotatwe.
Elyo Leza wakatuma muuya wakukazyanya akati ka-Abimeleki abami ba-Sekemu, nkabela bami ba-Sekemu bakacitila Abimeleki cakweena,
kuti mulandu wabujayi bwabana bali makumi aali musanu aabili ba-Jerubaala amulandu wabulowa bwabo uboole kuli-Abimeleki mukwabo iwakabajaya akubami ba-Sekemu ibakamugwasya kujaya beenzinyina.
Bami ba-Sekemu bakamubikila basikulindila ibakayubide atala azilundu. Aba bakali kubbida boonse ibakabaindila munzila, nkabela makani akamvwigwa kuli-Abimeleki,
Mpawo kwakeza Gaala mwana wa-Ebedi abeenzinyina, bakalongela ku-Sekemu, nkabela bantu ba-Sekemu bakali kumusyoma.
Bakaya mumyuunda kuyoocela masaansa aabo, alimwi bakalyataula masaansa akucita waini wakulikondezya, elyo bakanjila muŋanda ya-Leza wabo, bakali kulya akunywa akusampaula Abimeleki.

Nkabela Gaala mwana wa-Ebedi wakati, Ino nguni Abimeleki? A-Sekemu nguni? Tumumaninenzi milimo? Sa tali mwana wa-Jerubaala na? Sa Zebuli tali ngambela wakwe na? Sa ciindi cimwi teebakali kumanina Hamori wisi Sekemu milimo? Lino iswe tumumaninenzi milimo?
Bantu aba nibakaba mumaanza aangu! Nindakagwisya Abimeleki!
Lino wakaambila Abimeleki kuti, Yungizya impi yako, uzwe.
Nkabela Zebuli mwami wamunzi, naakamvwa majwi aa-Gaala mwana wa-Ebedi, wakanyema loko,
wakatuma batumwa kuli-Abimeleki kumbali, wati, Bona! Gaala mwana wa-Ebedi ababunyina bakwe basika ku-Sekemu, balabusya bamu bamumunzi kuti bakulwisye.
Lino buka masiku, uwe abantu mboli abo, mukayube musokwe,
elyo cifumo, izuba lyapasula buyo, amufume kuyoosaala munzi. Mpawo walo abantu mbali abo bazwe buyo kuzoolwisya, uyoomucitila ijanza lyako mbulikonzya.
Elyo Abimeleki abantu boonse mbaakali abo bakabuka masiku, bakayuba cakulangila Sekemu munkamu zyone.
Nkabela Gaala mwana wa-Ebedi naakazwa akwiima kumulyango wamunzi, Abimeleki abantu mbaakali abo bakabuka kuzwa oko nkubakayubide.
Lino Gaala naakabona bantu wakaambila Zebuli kuti, Bona! Kuli bantu bazwa kumitwe yazilundu. Zebuli wakati, Ncobona ncenzule cazilundu cilibonya mbuli bantu.
Pele Gaala wakaamba lwabili kuti, Bona! Kuli bantu baseluka kuzwa kuIkombolyanyika. Ankamu imwi ilazwa munzila yamusamu mupati wabasondi.
Mpawo Zebuli wakamwaambila kuti, Kuli kuli lino kulisumpula kwako kwakuti, Ino nguni Abimeleki? Tumumaninenzi milimo? Sa aba bantu teensi mbabo mbowasampaula? Lino, buka, ukainke kuyoobalwisya.
Elyo Gaala wakasololela bapati ba-Sekemu, wakaakulwisya Abimeleki,
Lino Abimeleki naakamutanda, wakacija, nkabela kwakajayigwa bantu banjibanji kumulyango wamunzi.
Lino Abimeleki wakaakukala kuAruma, alimwi Zebuli wakatanda Gaala ababunyina akubakasya kukala ku-Sekemu.
Nibwakaca, bantu bakalibonya. Nkabela Abimeleki, naakaambilwa,
wakabweza bantu akubaandaanya munkamu zyotatwe akuyuba musokwe. Lino naakabona bantu balazwa mumunzi, wakabuka kuyoobalwisya, wakabauma,
Nkabela Abimeleki ankamu zya bantu mbaakali abo bakazuzaanisya, bakaakwiima kumulyango wamunzi, ankamu zyobile zyakazuzaanisya kukulwisya bantu ibakali musokwe, akubauma.
Elyo Abimeleki wakali kulwisya munzi buzuba obo boonse, akuzunda munzi, Bantu ibakali mumo wakabajaya, amunzi wini wakaunyonyoona akuuminzila munyo.
Elyo Abimeleki wakaambilwa kuti bantu boonse bacisanza ca-Sekemu balibungene,

nkabela Abimeleki wakatanta kucilundu ca-Zalimoni, walo abantu boonse mbaakali abo. Lino Abimeleki wakabweza kaleba mujanza lyakwe, wakateba muleye, watusamu, wakaubweza, wakaubika akuko lyakwe. Wakaambila bantu mbaakali abo kuti, Mulibwene ncindacita mebo; amufwambaane kucita mbubonya obo anywebo.

Mpawo bantu boonse bakateba umwi aumwi muleye wakwe, nkabela bakatobela Abimeleki, bakazibika kumbali lyaŋanda injumu, bakatenta iŋanda mpobakabede, aboobo bantu boonse bacisanza ca-Sekemu bakafwa, bantu bakali mbuli cuulu, baalumi abanakazi.
Pele kamuli cisanza ciyumu omo mumunzi, nkabela bantu boonse bakacijila kulincico, baalumi abanakazi boonse, bakaakulijalila mukati. Elyo bakatanta alululi lwacisanza.
Nkabela Abimeleki wakasika kucisanza kuzoocilwisya, alimwi wakaswena kufwaafwi kumulyango wacisanza, kuti acitente amulilo.
Pele umwi mwanakazi wakalosya ibbwe lyeziyo kujulu amutwe wa-Abimeleki, wakapwaya kaama kakwe.

Mpawo wakafwambaana kwiita mulombe iwakali kuyumuna zilwisyo zyakwe, wakamwaambila kuti, Somona ipanga lyako, undijaye, kuti bantu bataambi kuti, Mwanakazi nguwakamujaya. Elyo mulombe wakamuyasa, aboobo wakafwa.
Nkabela bantu ba-Israyeli nibakabona kuti Abimeleki ulifwide, bakainka boonse, umwi aumwi kuŋanda yakwe.
Mbuboobo Leza mbwaakabweedezezya Abimeleki mulandu wakwe, nkaambo wakabisizya wisi mukujaya babunyina bali makumi aali musanu aabili.
Leza wakabweedezezya bantu ba-Sekemu zibi zyabo zyoonse, mbubonya mbuli majwi aa-Jotamu mwana wa-Jerubaala ngaakabatusya.
Wakabeteka ba-Israyeli myaka iili makumi obile aitatu, elyo wakafwa, wakazikwa ku-Samiri.
Kusule lyayooyo kwakabuka Jairi mu-Gileadi, wakabeteka ba-Israyeli myaka iili makumi obile aibili.

Kazyede bana bali makumi otatwe, ibakali kuya bweenda balitantide ambongolo zili makumi otatwe, alimwi kabajisi minzi iili makumi otatwe iyakaambwa kuti Havoti-Jairi, mbubonya mbiicaambwa asunu. Ili mucisi ca-Gileadi.
Elyo Jairi naakafwa wakazikwa mu-Kamoni.
Mpawo bukali bwaJehova bwakabukila ba-Israyeli, nkabela wakabaaba mumaanza aaba-Filisti amumaanza aaba-Amoni,

elyo bakapwaya bana ba-Israyeli akubapenzya mwaka oyo. Myaka iili ikumi amusanu aitatu bakali kupenzya bantu boonse ba-Israyeli ibakakede mutala lya-Jordano munyika yaba-Amori, nkukuti mucisi ca-Gileadi,
Nkabela ba-Amoni bakazubuka Jordano kuzoolwisya bana ba-Juda abana ba-Benjamini amukowa wa-Efraimu, aboobo ba-Israyeli bakafwaba loko.
Mpawo Jehova wakaambila bantu ba-Israyeli kuti, Sa teensi ndime ndakamuvuna kumaanza aaba-Egepita, aba-Amori, aba-Amoni, aba-Filisti na?
Abalo ba-Sidoni aba-Amaleki aba-Maoni bakamupenzya, elyo nimwakandikwiilila, ndakamuvuna kumaanza aabo.
Nekubaboobo mwandileka, mwakomba mizimu imbi. Nkaambo kako nsikoomuvuna limbi pe.
Kamuya, mukakwiilile mizimu yanu njimusalide. Yalo imuvune kuciindi ecino camapenzi aanu,
Mpawo bana ba-Israyeli bakaambila Jehova kuti, Twabisya. Kotucitila kufumbwa cibota mumeso aako, pele kotuvuna buzuba obuno.
Nkabela bakagwisya mizimu myeenzu iyakali akati kabo, bakamanina Jehova milimo, elyo moyo wakwe wakaciswa nkaambo kamapenzi aa-Israyeli.
Lino bana ba-Amoni bakayoboloka, bakayaka zilao mu-Gileadi, abalo bana ba-Israyeli bakabungana, bakaliyakila zilao ku-Mizipa.
Nkabela bantu, bami ba-Gileadi, bakaamba umwi aumwi amweenzinyina, bakati, Ino muntu nguuli uukonzya kutaanguna kulwisya bana ba-Amoni? Uyooba mwami wabantu boonse bakede mu-Gileadi.

Nkabela muka-Gileadi wakamuzyalila bana, elyo bana bamukakwe nibakakomena bakatanda Jefita, bakamwaambila kuti, Uwe tokooyooba acaabilo calukono muluzubo lwatateesu, nkaambo uli mwana wamwanakazi mweenzu.
Lino Jefita wakacija kuzwa kulibabunyina, wakaakukala mucisi ca-Tobu, Nkabela bantu babuyo bakali kuyoboloka kuli-Jefita, wakali kuya abo kuyoosaala.
Lino nicakaba ciindi, bana ba-Amoni bakabusya inkondo aba-Israyeli.
Nkabela bana ba-Amoni nibakatalika kulwisya ba-Israyeli, bapati ba-Gileadi bakainka kuyoogwisya Jefita mucisi ca-Tobu.
Bakaambila Jefita kuti, Koza, ube musololi wesu, kuti tulwisye bana ba-Amoni.
Pele Jefita wakaambila bapati ba-Gileadi kuti, Sa teemwakandisula na? Sa teemwakanditanda kuzwa kuŋanda yataata? Ino nkaambonzi mwaboola kulindime ciindi ecino nomupengede?
Elyo bapati ba-Gileadi bakaambila Jefita kuti, Twaboola kulinduwe ciindi ecino kuti twiinke ayebo kuyoolwisya bana ba-Amoni, elyo uyooba mwami wesu, uendelezye bantu boonse ba-Gileadi.
Mpawo Jefita wakaambila bapati ba-Gileadi kuti, Na mwandiboozya kuti tulwisye bana ba-Amoni, alimwi na Jehova ulabaaba mumaanza aangu, elyo njooba ncobeni mwami wanu.
Bapati ba-Gileadi bakavwiila Jefita kuti, Jehova abe kamboni wesu. Ncobeni tuyoocita mbubonya mboamba,
Elyo Jefita wakainka abapati ba-Gileadi, nkabela bantu bakamubika kuti abe mwami wabo amubetesi wabo. Nkabela Jefita wakaamba majwi aakwe oonse kubusyu bwa-Jehova ku-Mizipa.
Lino Jefita wakatuma batumwa kumwami wabana ba-Amoni, wakati, Waba anzi kulindime? Ino nkaambonzi weza kuzoolwisya cisi cangu?

Nkabela mwami wabana ba-Amoni wakaambila batumwa ba-Jefita kuti, Nkaambo kakuti ba-Israyeli bakandinyanzya nyika yangu ciindi eciya nibakazwa ku-Egepita, Bakanyanzya nyika yoonse kuzwa ku-Arinoni kusikila ku-Jaboki aku-Jordano. Lino amwiiboozye caluumuno.
Mpawo Jefita wakaboola lwabili kutuma batumwa kumwami wabana ba-Amoni,
wakati, Swiilila mbwaamba Jefita, Ba-Israyeli teebakanyanzya nyika yaba-Moabu anyika yabana ba-Amoni pe.
Nkaambo nibakazwa ku-Egepita, ba-Israyeli bakainda akati kankanda kusikila ku-Lwizi Lusalala, alimwi bakasika kuKadesi.

Lino ba-Israyeli bakatuma batumwa kumwami wa-Edomu, bakati, Njiinde akati kacisi cako. Pele mwami wa-Edomu takwakamvwa pe, Alimwi bakatumina mwami wa-Moabu, pele alakwe takwakazumina, Nkaambo bako ba-Israyeli bakasyaala nkukonya oko ku-Kadesi.

Elyo bakainda kunkanda akuzyunguluka nyika ya-Edomu anyika ya-Moabu, aboobo bakasika kubbazu lyakujwe lyanyika ya-Moabu, bakayaka zilao zyabo mutala lya-Arinoni. Teebakanjila mucisi ca-Moabu pe, nkaambo Arinoni ngomunyinza wa-Moabu.
Alimwi ba-Israyeli bakatuma batumwa kuliSihoni mwami waba-Amori, mwami wa-Hesiboni, Ba-Israyeli bakamwaambila kuti, Atwiinde akati kacisi cako, tuye kulindiswe.
Pele Sihoni takwakazumizya ba-Israyeli kwiinda mucisi cakwe pe. Sihoni wakabunganya bantu bakwe boonse, elyo bakaliyakila zilao mu-Jahazi, bakaakulwisya ba-Israyeli.
Nkabela Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli wakaaba Sihoni abantu bakwe boonse mumaanza aaba-Israyeli, aboobo bakabazunda, elyo baIsrayeli bakavuba nyika yoonse yaba-Amori ibakakede omo mucisi.
Bakavuba cisi coonse caba-Amori kuzwa ku-Arinoni kusikila ku-Jaboki, akuzwa kunkanda kusikila ku-Jordano.
Ncobeni Jehova Leza waIsrayeli nguwakavubya bantu ba-Israyeli nyika yaba-Amori. Lino inywe sa mulaivuba na?
Sa tamukooyoovuba kufumbwa Kemosi Leza wanu ncaamuvubya? Mbubonya obo iswe tuyoovuba coonse Jehova Leza wesu ncaatuvubya.
Lino inywe mwabota buti kwiinda Balaki mwana waZipori mwami wa-Moabu Walo sa wakabusya inkondo aba-Israyeli? Sa wakabalwisya?
Ba-Israyeli nibakakede mucisi ca-Hesiboni amuminzi yaco, amucisi ca-Aroeri amuminzi yaco, amuminzi yoonse iibambene aArinoni, myaka iili myanda yotatwe, nkaambonzi teemwakaivuna kuciindi eco?
Mebo nsikwe ncindabisya pe. Nduwe obisya kulindime kukundilwisya. Jehova abe mubetesi, abeteke buzuba obuno makani aabana baIsrayeli abana ba-Amoni.
Nekubaboobo mwami wabana ba-Amoni takwakamvwa majwi aa-Jefita ngaakamutumina.
Lino Jefita wakakonka cikonkyo kubusyu bwa-Jehova, wakati, Na ncobeni ulaaba ba-Amoni mumaanza aangu,
elyo kufumbwa uuzwa kumulyango waŋanda yangu kuzoondicinga ciindi ncenti boole aluumuno kuzwa kubana ba-Amoni uyooba wa-Jehova, nkabela njoomutuula mbuli cituuzyo.
Mpawo Jefita wakainda kubana ba-Amoni kuyoobalwisya, nkabela Jehova wakabaaba mumaanza aakwe.
Wakabazunda kuzwa ku-Aroeri kusikila ku-Miniti, minzi iili makumi obile, akusikila ku-Abeli-kerami, Kakuli bujayi bupati loko, aboobo bana ba-Amoni bakakomwa kubana ba-Israyeli.

Mpawo naakamubona, wakadeluula zyakusama zyakwe, wakati, Maawe, mwanaangul Ncobeni wandikataazya sunu. Wandiletela mapenzi, nkaambo ndakaasama amulomo wangu kubusyu bwa-Jehova, lino nsikonzyi kuleka pe.
Mpawo wakamwaambila kuti, Ta! Mbuli mboaseme­ amulomo wako kubusyu bwa-Jehova, kocita coonse ncoambide, Nkaambo Jehova wakakuzundya basinkondonyoko bana ba-Amoni,
Alimwi wakaambila wisi kuti, Mbuboobo mboelede kundicitila. Undileke myezi yobile, kuti nkenja bweendeenda azilundu akulilila kutakwatwa kwangu, mebo abeenzuma.
Wakamwaambila kuti, Koya, Aboobo wakamutuma myezi yobile, nkabela wakainka abeenzinyina, bakaakulilila kutakwatwa kwakwe atala azilundu.
Lino myezi yobile niyakamana, wakaboola kuliwisi, elyo wakamucitila mbubonya mbwaakakonkezya. Takwakaswanana amwaalumi pe. Lino eci cakaba ciyanza mucisi caIsrayeli.
Myaka yoonse bana basimbi ba-Israyeli bakali kuya kulilila mwana musimbi wa-Jefita mu-Gileadi mazuba one aamwaka.
Jefita wakabaambila kuti, Twakali ankondo loko abana baAmoni, mebo abantu bangu. Nkabela ndakamwiita, pele teemwakandivuna kumaanza aabo pe.
Lino nindakabona kuti tamukoondivuna, ndakaya abuumi bwangu mujanza lyangu, ndakainda kuyoolwisya bana ba-Amoni, nkabela Jehova wakabaaba mumaanza aangu. Lino mwazidanzi kuzoondilwisya sunu?

Mpawo Jefita wakabunganya bantu boonse ba-Gileadi, wakaakulwisya ba-Efraimu, aboobo bantu ba-Gileadi bakazunda ba-Efraimu, nkaambo bakati, Inywe nuba-Gileadi muli ba-Efraimu bacijide mukati kacisi ca-Efraimu aca-Manase.
Elyo ba-Gileadi bakanyanzya ba-Efraimu zito zya-Jordano, nkabela kufumbwa mu-Efraimu uulobokede iwakaamba kuti, Nzubuke, bantu ba-Gileadi bakamubuzya kuti, Sa uli mu-Efraimu? Lino naakavuwa kuti, Pe,

bakamwaambila kuti, Amba, Syibboleti. Mpawo walo wakaamba kuti, Sibboleti, nkaambo takwakakonzya kwaamba cakululama, Elyo bakamujata, bakamujaya nkukonya oko kucito ca-Jordano, Aboobo kwakajayigwa kuciindi eco bantu ba-Efraimu bali zyuulu zili makumi one azibili.
Lino Jefita wakabeteka ba-Israyeli myaka iili musanu aumwi. Nkabela Jefita mu-Gileadi naakafwa, wakazikwa mumunzi wakwe waku-Gileadi.
Lino jefita naakamana kufwa, Ibizani waku-Betelehemu nguwakali kubeteka ba-Israyeli,

Kazyede bana balombe bali makumi otatwe abana basimbi bali makumi otatwe. Basimbi wakabakwatya kumbi, alimwi wakaleta basimbi bali makumi otatwe bazwa kumbi kuzookwatwa kubana bakwe balombe. Wakabeteka ba-Israyeli myaka iili musanu aibili
Lino Ibizani naakafwa, wakazikwa ku-Betelehemu.
Musule lyayooyo, Eloni mu-Zebuloni nguwakali kubeteka ba-Israyeli. Wakabeteka ba-Israyeli myaka iili ikumi.
Lino Eloni mu-Zebuloni naakafwa, wakazikwa ku-Aijaloni mucisi ca-Zebuloni.
Musule lyayooyo, Abidoni mwana wa-Hilelu mu-Piratoni nguwakali kubeteka ba-Israyeli,
Kajisi bana bali makumi one abazukulu bali makumi otatwe, ibakali kweenda balitantide ambongolo zili makumi aali musanu aabili. Wakabeteka ba-Israyeli myaka iili musanu aitatu.
Lino Abidoni mwana wa-Hilelu mu-Piratoni naakafwa wakazikwa ku-Piratoni mucisi ca-Efraimu mutulundulundu twaba-Amaleki.
Nkabela angelo wa-Jehova wakaboneka kumwanakazi oyo, wakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Uli musundi, tona kuzyala pe. Pele uyoominta akuzyala mwana mulombe.
Lino cenjela. Utanywi waini na cintu cimwi cikola, alimwi utalyi cintu niciba cimwi cisofweede,

nkaambo uyoominta akuzyala mwana mulombe, elyo oyo mulombe takooyoonyoolwa abuniini pe, nkaambo uyooba mu-Naziri wa-Leza mazuba oonse kuzwa kubuzyale bwakwe. Ngonguwe uuti vune ba-Israyeli kumaanza aaba-Filisti,

Mpawo mwanakazi wakasika kumulumaakwe nkwaakabede, wakamwaambila kuti, Kwandizida muntu wa-Leza. Busyu bwakwe bwakali mbuli busyu bwaangelo waLeza, bwakayoosya loko. Pele teendakamubuzya nkwaakazwa pe, alimwi takwakandaambila izina lyakwe.

Nkabela wakandaambila kuti, Bona! Uyoominta akuzyala mwana mulombe. Lino utanywi waini niciba cintu cimwi cikola, alimwi utalyi cintu niciba cimwi cisofweede, nkaambo mulombe uyooba mu-Naziri wa-Leza kuzwa kubuzyale bwakwe kusikila kubuzuba bwalufu lwakwe.
Mpawo Manowa wakakumbila kuli-Jehova kuti, O mwami, ndakumbila kuti muntu wa-Leza nguwakatuma aboole kulindiswe alwabili, kuti atwiisye mbutweelede kucitila mwana uuti zyalwe.
Nkabela Leza wakaswiilila ijwi lya-Manowa, elyo angelo wa-Leza wakaboola alimwi kumwanakazi naakakede mumyuunda, pele Manowa mulumaakwe takakali wo.
Mpawo mwanakazi wakafwambaana, wakazuzaana kuyooambila mulumaakwe, wakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Kwaboneka oyo muntu iwakandizida buzuba obo.
Lino Manowa wakabuka, wakatobela mukaakwe, nkabela naakasika nkwaakabede oyo muntu, wakamubuzya kuti, Sa nduwe muntu iwakaamba amwanakazi oyu? Wakavuwa kuti, Ndime.
Elyo Manowa wakati, Lino makani ngoambide naayooba ncobeni, mulombe uyooba buti? Amilimo yakwe iyooba buti?
Angelo wa-Jehova wakavwiila Manowa kuti, Mwanakazi abike moyo wakwe kumakani oonse ngendakaamba.
Teelede kulya cintu niciba cimwi cizwa kumusaansa. Teelede kunywa waini niciba cintu cimwi cikola. Alimwi teelede kulya cintu niciba cimwi cisofweede. Coonse ncindalailila acicite.

Angelo wa-Jehova wakavwiila Manowa kuti, Na wandilindizya, nsikooyoolya zyakulya zyako pe. Na ulayanda kutuula cituuzyo, Jehova nguuelede kutuulilwa, (Nkaambo Manowa takwakaziba kuti nguangelo wa-Jehova),
Alimwi Manowa wakabuzya angelo wa-Jehova kuti, Nduweni izma lyako? Majwi aako naayooba ncobeni, tulayanda kukulemeka,
Angelo wa-Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi wandibuzya izina lyangu? Lilayoosya.
Lino Manowa wakabweza kapongo acipaizyo cacinkwa mpoonya awo andomba, wakapailila Jehova uucita milimo iigambya.
Nkabela mulilo wacipaililo niwakali kuya kujulu, angelo wa-Jehova wakaya kujulu mukati kamulilo wacipaililo. Lino Manowa amukaakwe nibakabona bakawida ansi cakuvundama.
Mpawo Manowa wakaambila mukaakwe kuti, Ncobeni tulafwa, nkaambo tulibwene Leza.
Pele mukaakwe wakamwaambila kuti, Jehova naakayanda kutujaya naakakaka kutambula cipaizyo acituuzyo kumaanza esu, naa kutubonya aya makani naa kutwaambila cintu cili boobu.
Elyo mwanakazi wakazyala mwana mulombe, wakamuulika izina lyakwe Samsoni. Nkabela mulombe wakakula, alimwi Jehova wakamupa coolwe.
Lino Muuya wa-Jehova wakatalika kumubusya ku-Mahane-Dani, akati ka-Zora a-Esitaoli.
Elyo naakapiluka kulimba­ bo, wakaambila wisi abanyina kuti, Ndibwene mwanakazi ku-Timinati, umwi wabana baba-Filisti. Lino amundigwasye kuti nkamukwate,

Mpawo wisi abanyina bakamubuzya kuti, Sa taakwe mwanakazi akati kabana bamukowa wesu na akati kabantu besu boonse? Nkaambonzi noyanda kukwata mwanakazi waba-Filisti batapalwidwe? Pele Samsoni wakaambila wisi kuti, Amundikwatye oyo musimbi, nkaambo wandibotela loko.
Lino Samsoni wakainka awisi abanyina kuya ku-Timinati, nkabela naakasika kumyuunda yamasaansa yaku-Timinati, kwakeza mwana wamulavu uleza buvuluma kuzoomucinga.

Mpoonya awo Muuya wa-Jehova wakamuselukila canguzu, aboobo wakadeluula mulavu mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwadeluula kapongo buyo. Katajisi cintu niciba cimwi mujanza lyakwe. Pele takwakaambila wisi na banyina ncaakacita pe.
Elyo wakainka kuyooambaula amwanakazi, nkabela wakabotezya Samsoni loko.
Lino nicakaba ciindi wakaboola kuti amulete muŋanda, elyo wakaya musokwe kuyoobona mutumba wamulavu, nkabela omo mumutumba wamulavu kamuli inzuki abuci.
Mpawo wakagwisya amaanza aakwe, wakali kuya bulya, alimwi naakasika kuliwisi akulibanyina, wakabaabila, elyo bakalya abalo, pele takwakabaambila kuti obo buci wakabugwisya mumutumba wamulavu.
Lino wisi naakasika kumwanakazi, Samsoni wakacita ipobwe nkukonya oko, nkaambo mbuboobu bakubusi mbubakali kucita.
Mpawo bantu nibakamubona, bakamuletela beenzinyina bali makumi otatwe kuti abe abo.

Lino Samsoni wakabaambila kuti, Ndabike kalabi. Na mwakonzya kulabulula, mazuba aali musanu aabili aapobwe naatana kumana, akundaambila mbukaamba, elyo njoomwaabila masani aali makumi otatwe azyakusama zimwi zili makumi otatwe.
Pele na mwakacilwa kundipandulwida, elyo inywe muleelede kundipa masani aali makumi otatwe azyakusama zimwi zili makumi otatwe. Bakavuwa kuti, Kalabi kako kakeza, tuswiilile.
Lino wakabaambila kuti,
Mulisikulya mwakazwa zyakulya,
Mulisinguzu mwakazwa bunono.
Nkabela bakakacilwa kulabulula mazuba otatwe.

Elyo muka-Samsoni wakalila kulinguwe, wakati, Wandisula buyo, tondiyandi pe. Walabikila bana babantu bangu kalabi, pele tona kundaambila mebo pe. Wakamuvwiila kuti, Ataata abama nsina kubaambila pe. Nkwaambile buti webo?

Lino wakali kulila kumeso aakwe mazuba aali musanu aabili ipobwe nilyakali kuligwa, Nkabela mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili wakamwaambila makani, nkaambo wakali kumukataazya. Mpawo wakapandulwida basimukowanyina kalabi.
Elyo mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili, izuba nilyakatalina kubbila, bantu bamunzi bakamwaambila kuti,
Ncinzi cinona kwiinda buci?
Ncinzi ciyuma kwiinda mubvu?
Wakabaambila kuti, Nimwakatalimya impwizi yangu, nimwakatalabulula kalabi kangu.
Elyo muka-Samsoni wakakwatwa kumweenzinyina iwakali mweenzinyina sibwiinga.
Wisi wakati, Ndakali kuyeeya kuti ncobeni wamusula, Nciceeco ncindamupeda mweenzinyoko. Sa mucizi wakwe muniini taboti kwiinda nguwe na? Kwata nguwe mucibaka cakwe,
Lino Samsoni wakabaambila kuti, Ciindi ecino ndiye inkoto kuba-Filisti, nkaambo njoobabisizya.
Mpawo Samsoni wakainka, wakajata bamwaaba bali myanda yotatwe, nkabela wakabweza misunge, wakabaanga kumicila yabo akubikila bobile bobile musunge akati kamicila yabo,
Elyo naakamana kutomeka misunge, wakabatuma akati kamaila aabaFilisti, aboobo wakatenta misunta yamaila amaila aacili mukumena amyuunda yamicelo yoonse,

Mpawo ba-Filisti bakabuzya kuti, Ino nguni wakacita obo? Nkabela bakati, Ngu-Samsoni iwakakwata mwana musimbi wamu­-Timinati, nkaambo bakamunyanzya mukaakwe, bakamupa mweenzinyina. Mpawo ba-Filisti bakainka, baakutenta musimbi awisi mumulilo.
Lino Samsoni wakabaambila kuti, Na mwacita obo, ncobeni njooliya inkoto alimwi, lino ndaleka.
Elyo wakabauma canguzu loko abujayi bupati. Lino wakaseluka, waakukala mulwaanzi lwandomba Etamu.
Lino ba-Filisti bakainka, bakaakuliyakila zilao mucisi ca-Juda, alimwi bakaakusaala Lehi.
Nkabela bantu ba-Juda bakabuzya kuti, Ino mwazidanzi okuno kulindiswe? Bakavuwa kuti, Tweza kuzooanga Samsoni, tumucitile mbubonya mbwaakacitila ndiswe.

Mpawo kwakainka bantu bali zyuulu zyotatwe ba-Juda, bakaya kulwaanzi lwandomba Etamu, bakaambila Samsoni kuti, Sa tozi kuti ba-Filisti mbobami besu na? Ino ncinzi eci ncowatucitila? Wakabaambila kuti, Mbubonya mbubakandicitila, ambebo ndabacitila mbubonya.
Lino bakamwaambila kuti, Tweza kuti tukwaange, tukwaabe mumaanza aaba-Filisti, Mpawo Samsoni wakabaambila kuti, Amundikonkezye kuti mutanoonduumi nubeni.
Bakamuvwiila kuti, Pe, tulakwaanga buyo akukwaaba mumaanza aabo. Tatukooyookujaya pe, Elyo bakamwaanzya intambo impiya zyobile akumugwisya nkukonya kundomba.

Nkabela naakasika ku-Lehi, ba-Filisti bakeza buongolola kuzoomucinga. Mpawo Muuya wa-Jehova wakamuselukila canguzu, elyo intambo nzyakajisi amaboko aakwe akaba mbuli tutambo buyo tutentedwe mumulilo, azyaanzyo zyakwe zyakeenzunuka amaanza aakwe.
Lino wakajana mweebo mupiya wambongolo, nkabela wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe, wakaubweza, wakaujazya bantu bali cuulu.
Mpawo Samsoni wakati,
Mweebo wambongolo, ndaulundisya bantu.
Mweebo wambongolo, ndaujazya bantu bali cuulu,
Lino naakamana kwaamba, wakasowa mweebo, Elyo mweenya oyo wakaambwa kuti ngu-Ramati-lehi.

Mpawo Leza wakaandula lwaanzi luli ku-Lehi, nkabela mwakazwa mulindulo maanzi. Mpawo wakanywa, nkabela moyo wakwe wakabuka, waka pona. Nkaambo kako kuntu oko kwakategwa Mukalo wasikukwiila. Mpokucili ku-Lehi asunu.
Nkabela wakabeteka ba-Israyeli mumazuba aaba-Filisti myaka iili makumi obile.
Lino Samsoni wakainka ku-Gaza, Nkabela nkukonya oko wakabona mwanakazi simamambe, wakaakuswanana awe.

Lino bantu ba­ Gaza bakaambilwa kuti, Samsoni wasika okuno, Mpawo bakazyunguluka, bakamulindila masiku oonse kumulyango wamunzi. Bakaumuna masiku oonse, bakati, Atulindile mane buce, elyo tuyoomujaya,

Nkabela Samsoni wakalala mane kusikila akati kabusiku, elyo wakabuka akati kabusiku, wakajata zitendele zyamunzi aminsende yobile, wakazibweza amunkulu woonse aziwezo zyakwe, wakaakutanta azyo atala acilundu cilangana a-Hebroni.
Lino kusule lyayaaya, wakayanda mwanakazi mumumpata wa-Soreki, izina lyakwe kali Delila.

Nkabela bami baba-Filisti bakaza kulinguwe, bakati, Komoongelezya, ukabone na inguzu zyakwe zigambya zyazwa kuli, alimwi tubone na tulakonzya kumuzunda buti, kuti tumwaange akumupenzya, Lino tuyookupa umwi aumwi mali aansiliva aali cuulu amwaanda.
Elyo Delila wakabuzya Samsoni kuti, Kondaambila na inguzu zyako zigambya zyazwai, Alimwi sa kuli cintu niciba cimwi cikonzya kukwaanga kuti upenzegwe?
Lino Samsoni wakamwaambila kuti, Na ndaangwa antambo zipiya zili musanu azibili zitana kuyuma, elyo njookompama, njooba mbubonya mbuli bantu bamwi.
Mpawo bami baba-Filisti bakamuletela intambo zili musanu azibili izyakatalina kuyuma, nkabela wakamwaanzya nzizyo.

Nkabela basikulindila bakali awe mumonya muŋanda. Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Ba-Filisti bakuzida, Samsoni. Mpawo wakadunsula intambo mbubonya mbuli butonge mbubudunsuka, bwaampa mulilo, Aboobo inguzu zyakwe teezyakazibwa pe.
Lino Delila wakaambila Samsoni kuti, Bona! Wandeena, Wandaambila zyakubeja. Kondaambila mbokonzya kwaangwa.
Wakamuvwiila kuti, Na bandaanzya intambo impiya, zitana kubelesegwa, elyo ­njookompama akuba mbubonya mbuli bantu boonse.

Mpawo Delila wakabweza intambo impiya, wamwaanzya nzizyo, wamwaambila kuti, Ba-Filisti bakuzida, Samsoni. Nkabela basikulindila bakali muŋanda yamukati. Pele wakanunsaula intambo izyakali amaboko aakwe mbuli katonge buyo.

Lino Delila wakaambila Samsoni kuti, Asunu wandeena, akundaambila zyakubeja. Kondaambila mbokonzya kwaangwa, Nkabela wakamuvwiila kuti, Na mwaluka zyoosyo zili musanu azibili zyasusu lyangu alusabwe, akuuma-uma akasamu, elyo njookompama, akuba mbubonya mbuli bantu boonse. Elyo naakacili koona, Delila wakabweza zyoosyo zili musanu azibili zyasusu lyakwe, akuziluka alusabwe.
Alimwi wakazyaanga akasamu, elyo wakamwaambila kuti, Ba-Filisti bakuzida, Samsoni. Pele naakasinsimuka muŋonzi, wakanonkola buyo kasamu acilusyo alusabwe loonse.
Lino naakatalika kumukataazya amajwi aakwe mazuba oonse, akumusungilizya, moyo wakwe wakapenga loko cakufwa.

Elyo wakamwaambila makani oonse aamumoyo wakwe, wakati, Taakwe nindakagelwa abuniini, nkaambo ciindi coonse ndakali mu-Naziri wa-Leza, kuzwa mwida lyabama. Na ndagelwa, inguzu zyangu zilamana, njookompama akuba mbubonya mbuli bantu boonse.

Lino Delila naakabona kuti wamwaambila makani oonse aamumoyo wakwe, wakatumina bami baba-Filisti, wakabaambila kuti, Kamuza sunu buyo, nkaambo wandaambila camoyo woonse. Mpawo bami baba-Filisti bakeza kulinguwe akuleta mali mumaanza aabo.
Nkabela wakamooneka amazwi aakwe, alimwi wakaita muntu kuzoomugela zyoosyo zili musanu azibili zyasusu lyakwe. Elyo wakatalika kumusabwida, nkabela inguzu zyakwe zyakamana.
Mpawo wakamwaambila kuti, Ba-Filisti bakuzida, Samsoni, Lino wakasinsimuka, wakati, Nje anze mbuli lyoonse, nkalyoolole. Pele katezi kuti Jehova ulimusiide.
Elyo ba-Filisti bakamujata, akudonkola meso aakwe, alimwi bakamusisya ku-Gaza akumwaanzya zyaanzyo zyamundalila, nkabela wakali kugaya mucigayilo camuntolongo,
Nekubaboobo isusu lyamutwe wakwe lyakatalika kukula alimwi naakamana kugelwa.
Lino bami baba-Filisti bakabungana kuti bapailile Dagoni Leza wabo cipaizyo cipati, akusekelela, nkaambo bakaamba kuti, Leza wesu waaba Samsoni sinkondoma mumaanza esu.
Nkabela bantu nibakamubona, bakatembaula Leza wabo, nkaambo bakati, Leza wesu waaba mumaanza esu sinkondoma, iwakali kusaala cisi cesu akujaya bantu besu banji.
Lino myoyo yabo niyakatalika kukondwa, bakati, Amumwiite Samsoni, atusobanine. Mpawo bakaita Samsoni muntolongo mwaakabede, nkabela wakabasobanina. Elyo bakamwiimikizya akati kamisemu yobile,
nkabela Samsoni wakaambila mulombe iwakali kumweenzya ajanza kuti, Njaampe misemu iitabilide iŋanda, akuyaama alinjiyo.
Nkabela iŋanda yakalizwide bantu banji, baalumi abanakazi, abami boonse baba-Filisti bakali mumo, alimwi alululi akali baalumi abanakazi mbuli zyuulu zyotatwe ibakali kweebela cisobano ca-Samsoni.
Mpawo Samsoni wakajatisya misemu yobile yaakati iyakatabilide iŋanda, wakalimbilila, ijanza lyakwe lyalulyo aluumwi, ajanza lyakwe lyalumwensi aluumwi.

Nkabela Samsoni wakati, Mfwe antoomwe abaFilisti. Lino wakakotama anguzu zyakwe zyoonse, nkabela iŋanda yakawa akubalimba bami abantu boonse ibakali mumo, Aboobo bantu mbaakajaya mulufu lwakwe bakali banji kwiinda bantu mbaakajaya naakacili muumi,
Elyo babunyina bakwe abasimukowanyina bakeza kuzoomubweza, akuyoomuzika akati ka-Zora a-Esitaoli mucuumbwe ca-Manowa wisi. Wakabeteka ba-Israyeli myaka iili makumi obile.
Kakuli umwi muntu iwakede mucisi catulundulundu twa-Efraimu, izina lyakwe kali Mika.

Oyu muntu wakaambila banyina kuti, Amubone! Mali aansiliva aali myanda iili ikumi aumwi ngemwakabbidwa, angemwakatukilila angemwakaamba mumatwi aangu, mpaali kulindime. Ndakaabweza. Lino banyina bakati, Jehova akupe coolwe, mwanaangu.

Mpawo wakabweedezezya banyina mali aansiliva aali myanda iili ikumi aumwi, alimwi banyina bakati, Aya mali aansiliva aali mujanza lyangu ndaabila Jehova nkaambo kamwanaangu, kuti tucite cikozyano cibezedwe acikozyano cifulidwe. Lino ndaabweedezya mumaanza aako.
Aboobo naakabweedezezya banyina mali, banyina bakabweza mali aansiliva aali myanda yobile, bakapa mufuzi, nkabela wakapanga cikozyano cibezedwe acikozyano cifulidwe. Zyakabikwa muŋanda ya-Mika.
Lino oyo muntu Mika kajisi kakombelo, alimwi wakapanga cibaki casani lituba azikozyano zyamizimu, elyo wakabika umwi wabana bakwe kuti abe mupaizi.
Kumazuba ayo katakwe mwami mucisi ca-Israyeli. Bantu boonse bakali kucita kufumbwa zyakababotela.
Oyu muntu wakalonga kuzwa ku-Betelehemu mucisi ca-Juda, wali kuya buyandaula busena bwakukala. Elyo mukweendeenda kwakwe wakasika kucisi catulundulundu twa-Efraimu, kuŋanda ya-Mika.
Mpawo Mika wakamubuzya kuti, Ino wazwidai? Wakati, Ndi mu-Levi waku-Betelehemu mucisi ca-Juda, Nja buyandaula busena bwakukala,
Lino Mika wakamwaambila kuti, Kala kulindime, undibede taata amupaizi wangu, nkabela njookupa mali aansiliva aali ikumi amwaka, azyakusama, amalilu aako,
Elyo mu-Levi wakazumina kukala anguwe, nkabela oyo mukubusi wakaba mbubonya mbuli umwi wabana bakwe.
Mbuboobo Mika mbwaakabika mu-Levi, Mukubusi wakaba mupaizi wakwe, alimwi wakali kukala munanda ya-Mika.
Nkabela Mika wakati, Lino ncobeni ndizi kuti Jehova ulandipa coolwe, nkaambo ndijisi mu-Levi mupaizi wangu.

Aboobo ba-Dani bakatuma bantu bosanwe bacenjede bamukowa wabo, kuzwa ku-Zora akuzwa ku-Esitaoli, kuti baye bulangaula nyika akubona mbwiibede. Bakabaambila kuti, Kamuya mukalingule nyika. Nkabela bakasika kucisi catulundulundu twa-Efraimu, kuŋanda ya-Mika, akoona nkuko.
Lino nibakali kufwaafwi kuŋanda ya-Mika, bakaziba ijwi lyamukubusi oyo mu-Levi, nkabela bakaya kumbali, bakamubuzya kuti, Ino nguni wakakuleta okuno? Ucita nzi okuno? Uli amulimonzi okuno?
Elyo wakabaambila ku-i, Mbuboobu Mika mbwaakandicitila, Wakandinjizya mumilimo. Ndaba mupaizi wakwe.
Lino bakamwaambila kuti, Twakumbila kuti utubuzizye kuli-Leza, kuti tuzibe na lweendo lwesu ndutweenda luli acoolwe.
Mpawo mupaizi wakabavwiila kuti, Kamuya aluumuno. Lweendo ndumutola Jehova ulalubotya.

Mpawo bantu abo bosanwe bakainka, bakasika ku-Laisi, akubona bantu bankuko mbubakede cakuliiba mbubonya mbuli ba-Sidoni. Bakali kukala caluumuno acakutayoowa, teebakabula cintu niciba comwe caansi ano, bakalijisi buvubi, alimwi bakali kule kuzwa kuba-Sidoni, kabatakwe makani amuntu naba umwi.
Lino nibakasika kubakwabo baku-Zora abaku-Esitaoli, bakwabo bakababuzya kuti, Mujisi makaninzi aakutwaambila?
Bakavuwa kuti, Amunyamuke, tukabalwisye, nkaambo tuliibwene nyika, nimbotu loko. Nkaambonzi mwasowa ciindi? Mutaneeleli kuyoonjila akuvuba nyika.
Mwasika buyo, muyoojana bantu baliibide. Nyika nimpati. Ncobeni Leza waiaba mumaanza aanu, nyika iitabuli cintu niciba cimwi caansi ano.
Mpuwo bantu bali myanda iili musanu aumwi bamusyobo wa-Dani ibakalibambide azilwisyo bakanyamuka kuzwa ku-Zora aku-Esitaoli,
bakaakuliyakila zilao ku-Kiriyati-Jearimu mucisi ca-Juda, Nciceeco oko kuntu ncikucaambwa kuti Mahane-Dani (Zilao zya-Dani) asunu. Kuli kumbo kuzwa ku-Kiriyati-Jearimu.
Elyo kuzwa oko bakaya kunembo, baakusika kucisi catulundulundu twa-Efraimu, akuza kuŋanda ya-Mika.
Elyo bakaleya, akusika kuŋanda yamu-Levi mukubusi, kumaanda aa-Mika, nkabela bakamujuzya.
Lino abo bantu bali myanda iili musanu aumwi baba-Dani ibakalibambide azilwisyo bakaima kumulyango wamunzi,

abantu bosanwe ibakataangwine kuya bulingula nyika bakaakunjila, akuyoogwisya cikozyano cibezedwe, acikobela cabupaizi, azikozyano zyamizimu, acikozyano cifulidwe, mupaizi naakaciimvwi kumulyango wamunzi antoomwe abantu bali myanda iili musanu aumwi ibakajisi zilwisyo zyankondo.
Nkabela bantu nibakanjila muŋanda ya-Mika akugwisya cikozyano cibezedwe, acikobela cabupaizi, azikozyano zyamizimu, acikozyano cifulidwe, mupaizi wakababuzya kuti, Ino mucitanzi?
Elyo bakavuwa kuti, Umuna, vumba mulomo wako, twiinke ayebo, utubede tateesu amupaizi wesu. Cintu cibotu ncicili, kuba mupaizi wamuntu omwe buyo, nanka kuba mupaizi wamusyobo aluzubo lwaba-Israyeli?
Mpawo mupaizi wakakondwa mumoyo wakwe, nkabela wakainka acikobela cabupaizi azikozyano zyamizimu acikozyano cibezedwe, akuya bweenda akati kabantu abo.
Elyo bakanyamuka, bakainka, nkabela twana aŋombe amikuli bakazyeenzya zyoonse kunembo,
Lino nibakeenda kasinzo kuzwa kuŋanda yaMika, bantu ibakali mumaanda aabambene a-Mika bakaitwa kuti batobele ba-Dani,
Nkabela bakoongolola ba-Dani, aba-Dani bakaceba, bakabuzya Mika kuti, Mwaba anzi? Mwazidanzi abantu banji bali boobu?
Wakati, Mwabweza mizimu yangu njindakalicitila, amupaizi wangu, mwainka awe, lino mebo ndasyaalilwanzi? We! Undibuzizyanzi, Waba anzi?
Mpawo ba-Dani bakamwaambila kuti, Ijwi lyako litamvwigwi kulindiswe, lumwi bantu bakali bakulwisye, elyo uyooswekelwa buumi bwako abuumi bwabasiŋanda bako.
Mpawo ba-Dani bakainka, nkabela Mika naakabona kuti bamuyumina, wakapiluka, wabweeda kumunzi wakwe.
Katakwe sikubavuna pe, nkaambo kakuli kule ku-Sidoni, alimwi teebakajisi makani amuntu naba omwe pe. Kakuli mumumpata wa-Betirehobu. Elyo bakayakulula munzi akukala mulinguwo.
Nkabela bakaulika munzi izina lya-Dani, mbubonya mbuli izina lyawisaabo kwakazyalilwa Israyeli, pele izina lyamunzi kumatalikilo kuuli Laisi,
Mpawo ba-Dani bakaliimikila cikozyano cibezedwe, a-Johatani mwana wa-Gerisomu mwana waMusa abana bakwe bakali bapaizi kumusyobo wa-Dani mane kusikila kubuzuba bwakusaalwa kwacisi.
Aboobo bakaimika cikozyano cibezedwe ca-Mika ncaakacita mazuba oonse iŋanda ya-Leza niyakali ku-Sile.
Nkabela simamambe wakwe wakamukalalila, aboobo wakamusiya, wakaya kuliwisi ku-Betelehemu mucisi ca-Juda, wakaakukala nkuko myezi yone,

Mpawo mulumi wakwe wakanyamuka, wamutobela, kuti amwaambile majwi aaluzyalo akumuboozya. Lino keenda amulanda ambongolo zyobile, Nkabela naakasika kuŋanda yawisi, wisi musimbi wakamubona, elyo wakeza kuzoomucinga cakukondwa.
Lino syanyinazyala, wisi musimbi, wakamukazika, aboobo kakede awe mazuba otatwe, Bakaiya, akunywa, akoona nkuko.
Elyo buzuba bwane nibwakaca, bakafuma kubuka akulibambila lweendo lwabo, pele wisi musimbi wakakasya mukwe wakwe, wati, Taanguna kulya kasima, kuti ujane inguzu, elyo kusule uleenda kabotu,
Mpawo baalumi boonse bobile bakakala, balya, banywa antoomwe, Alimwi wisi musimbi wakaambila mulumi kuti, Ndakumbila kuti uone asunu, moyo wako ukondwe.
Lino mulumi wakabuka kuti aende, nekubaboobo syanyinazyala wakamukasya lumwi wakoona nkuko alimwi.
Lino buzuba bwasanu nibwakaca, wakafuma kubuka kuti aende, elyo wisi musimbi wakamwaambila kuti, Kazika moyo wako akulindila mane kumazuba. Mpawo bakalya boonse bobile.

Nkabela mulumi naakanyamuka asimamambe wakwe amulanda wakwe kuti bainke, syanyinazyala wisi musimbi wakati, Bona! Izuba lyaamba kubbila! Ona okuno. Ncobeni buzuba bwamana, lino ona okuno, kuti moyo wako ukondwe, lino junza muyoofuma kubuka akulibambila lweendo lwanu, mwiinke kulindinywe.
Lino nibakasika afwiifwi a-Jebusi, izuba lyakaamba kubbila, nkabela mulanda wakaambila mwami wakwe kuti, Boola, tunjile mumunzi oyu waba-Jebusi, tuone mumonya.
Pele mwami wakavuwa kuti, Tatweelede kunjila mumunzi wabazwamasi batali ba-Israyeli. Atwiinde kunembo, tukasike ku-Gibeya.
Wakaambila mulanda wakwe kuti, Boola, tukasike kuluumwi wamyeenya eyi yobile, tukoone ku-Gibeya nanka ku-Rama.
Aboobo bakaya kunembo mulweendo lwabo, nkabela izuba lyakababbilila kufwaafwi ku-Gibeya mucisi ca-Benjamini.
Mpawo bakanyona nkuko, kuti bakaone ku-Gibeya. Nkabela wakanjila mumunzi, waakukala akati kamundando wamunzi, nkaambo katakwe muntu iwakabanjizya muŋanda yakoona.
Mpawo naakatambya meso aakwe, wakabona silweendo akati kamundando wamunzi. Elyo munene wakamubuzya kuti, Uya kuli? Wazwida kuli?

Wakavuwa kuti, Twazwa ku-Betelehemu mucisi ca-Juda, tulaya kule kucisi catulundulundu twa-Efraimu, nkokulindiswe. Ndakaya ku-Betelehemu mucisi ca-Juda. Lino ndaya kuŋanda ya-Jehova. Pele taakwe uundinjizya muŋanda.
Tulijisi makuba abulilu bwambongolo zyesu, azinkwa awaini nzitukonzya kulya, mebo ayooyu musimbi mulanda wako ayooyu mukubusi ngutweenda awe tobalanda bako, Taakwe cintu ncitubulide pe.
Elyo munene wakati, Amube aluumuno, Mebo njoomulela. Mutaoni akati kamundando wamunzi pe.
Mpawo wakabanjizya muŋanda yakwe, wapa imbongolo bulilu bwazyo, alimwi nibakamana kusamba kumaulu, bakalya akunywa.
Mpawo mwiniŋanda wakazwa anze, wakabaambila kuti, Pe, bakwesu, mutabisyi obo, Muntu oyu mweenzu wangu, Mutaciti cintu cibi cili boobo,

Amubone! Mwanaangu musimbi nakalindu nkwali, alimwi simamambe wakwe nkwali. Amuleke, mbalete anze, Amubalalike akubacitila kufumbwa ncimuyanda, pele oyu mwaalumi mutamucitili cintu cibi cili boobu pe,

Nekubaboobo bantu bakakaka kumvwa, Elyo mwiniŋanda wakajata simamambe wakwe, wamutonta anze kulimbabo, nkabela bakamulalika ukumubisizya masiku oonse mane bwakaca. Lino nibwakatalika kuca, bakamuleka.
Nkabela nibwakaca, mwanakazi wakasika kumulyango waŋanda mwakaakubede mulumaakwe, wakawida mpawo, mane izuba lyakamana kupasula.
Mpawo mwami wakwe wakafuma kubuka, nkabela naakajalula milyango yaŋanda akuzwa anze kuti atole lweendo lwakwe, wakajana simamambe wakwe ulilede kumulyango waŋanda, amaanza aakwe akali acikunguzyo.
Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Buka! Atweende. Pele walo takwakavuwa pe. Elyo wakamwaanzika ambongolo yakwe, wanyamuka, waakusika kulinguwe.
Nkabela naakanjila muŋanda yakwe, wakabweza cifulo, wakajata simamambe wakwe, wakamutendaula amaboko amaulu oonse muzipanzi zili ikumi azibili, wakazituma muzisi zyoonse zya-Israyeli.

Lino boonse bantu ibakabona bakati, Ma! Makani aali boobo taana kuba abuniini kuzwa kubuzuba obo bantu ba-Israyeli nibakazwa munyika yaEgepita akusikila sunu. Lino amubike myoyo yanu kulingawo, tubuzyanye, twaambilwe na tulacita buti.
Bami babantu bamisyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli bakalibonya mumbungano yabantu ba-Leza, bantu bali zyuulu zili myanda yone basinyenda ibakasamide mapanga,
(Abalo ba-Benjamini bakamvwa kuti bantu ba-Israyeli balibungene ku-Mizipa.) Elyo bantu ba-Israyeli bakati, Tuswiilile. Kubisya kuli boobu kwakaba buti?
Mpawo mu-Levi, mulumi wamwanakazi iwakajayidwe, wakavuwakuti, Ndakasika ku-Gibeya mucisi ca-Benjamini, twakali asimamambe wangu, kuzoona nkuko,
Lino bantu ba-Gibeya bakandibusizya inkondo, bakazyunguluka iŋanda masiku, bakayanda kundijaya, alimwi simamambe wangu bakamulalika, lino wafwa.
Elyo ndakabweza simamambe wangu, ndamutendaula zipanzi zipanzi akuzituma muzisi zyoonse zyanyika ya-Israyeli, nkaambo bacita cintu cibi loko cisesemya mucisi ca-Israyeli.
Amuswiilile, nubantu ba-Israyeli nyoonse, mukosole makani na tuleelede kucita buti.
Mpawo bantu boonse bakabuka camoyo womwe, bakati, Tatukoobweeda kulindiswe abuniini pe, Takukooba muntu naba omwe akati kesu uupiluka kuŋanda yakwe.
Mbuboobu mbututi citile Gibeya. Tulawaala cisolo, tubone na mbobani beelede kuyoolwisya munzi.

Tulasala bantu bali ikumi kuzwa kubantu bali mwaanda, mumisyobo yoonse yaba-Israyeli, abantu bali mwaanda kuzwa kubantu bali cuulu, abantu bali cuulu kuzwa kubantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi, kuti baletele bantu bulilu, kuti bazoobweedezezye bantu ba-Gibeya mucisi ca-Benjamini zibi zyabo zyoonse nzibabisya munyika ya-Israyeli.
Aboobo bantu boonse bakayoboloka kuyoolwisya munzi camoyo omwe.
Lino amwaabe mumaanza esu bantu abo babi baku-Gibeya, kuti tubajaye akugwisya bubi munyika ya-Israyeli. Pele ba-Benjamini bakakaka kumvwa majwi aabakwabo ba-Israyeli.
Ba-Benjamini bakabungana kuzwa kuminzi ya-Gibeya kuyoolwisya bantu ba-Israyeli.

Nkabela bantu boonse ba-Benjamini mbubakayobolola mubuzuba obo kuzwa kuminzi yabo bakali zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu acimwi, nkukuti baalumi bali amapanga, kutabala bantu ba-Gibeya ibakaleta baalumi basalidwe bali myanda iili musanu aibili.
Akati kabaaba boonse kakuli bantu basalidwe bali myanda iili musanu aibili basicimwensi. Boonse bakalibwene kufusa ibbwe cakulanza.
Nkabela ba-Israyeli bamwi, nkutaamba ba-Benjamini, bakayobolola baalumi basimapanga bali zyuulu zili myanda yone. Boonse aba bakali basilumamba.
Elyo bantu ba-Israyeli bakabuka cifumo, bakainka kuyoolwisya Gibeya.
Bantu ba-Israyeli bakaya kuyoolwana aba-Benjamini, alimwi bakalibamba mumindando ku-Gibeya,
Mpawo ba-Benjamini nibakazwa ku-Gibeya, bakambwezya mubuzuba obo bantu ba-Israyeli bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azibili.
Nekubaboobo bantu ba-Israyeli bakajata bukozu, akulibamba mumindando lwabili mpoonya awo mpobakataangwine kulibamba buzuba butaanzi.

Nkabela bantu ba-Israyeli bakaya kuyookwiilila Jehova mane kubbizya izuba, alimwi bakabuzya kuli-Jehova kuti, Sa tuleelede kuyoolwisya alimwi bakwesu ba-Benjamini? Jehova wakavuwa kuti, Kamuya, mukabalwisye.
Aboobo bantu ba-Israyeli bakaswena afwiifwi kuba-Benjamini buzuba abumwi bwabili.
Abalo ba-Benjamini bakazwa ku-Gibeya kuzoobalwisya buzuba obo bwabili, akumbwezya bantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu azitatu baba-Israyeli, boonse bakali basimapanga.

Mpawo bantu boonse ba-Israyeli, basilumamba boonse, bakainka ku-Beteli, baakulila. Nkabela bakakala nkuko kubusyu bwa-Jehova, akuliimya kulya, mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba, alimwi bakatuula zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Alimwi bantu ba-Israyeli bakabuzya kuli-Jehova, (nkaambo ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Leza kalili nkuko mumazuba ayo,

a-Pinehasi mwana wa-Eleazara mwana wa-Aroni nguwakali kulilanga kuciindi eco) bakati, Sa twiinke alimwi kuyoolwisya bakwesu ba-Benjamini, naa tuleke? Mpawo Jehova wakati, Amwiinke, nkaambo junza njoobaaba mumaanza aanu,
Nkabela ba-Israyeli bakainka kuyoolwisya ba-Benjamini buzuba abumwi bwa ta tu, akulibamba mumindando yabo ku-Gibeya mbubonya mbuli kuziindi zimwi.

Mpawo ba-Benjamini nibakanyamuka kuyoolwisya bantu, bakasiya munzi akuya kule, alimwi bakatalika kuuma akujaya bantu bamwi, mbubonya mbuli kuziindi zyakutaanguna, mumigwagwa. Umwi mugwagwa ulaya ku-Beteli, aumwi ulaya ku-Gibeya. Amusokwe bakacita mbubonya. Bakajaya bantu bali makumi otatwe baba-Israyeli,
Elyo ba-Benjamini bakati, Twabatanda mbubonya mbuli kukutaanguna. Pele bantu ba-Israyeli bakati, Atucije, tubagwisye kumunzi, tubasansaanye mumigwagwa.
Lino bantu boonse ba-Israyeli bakabuka mpobakakede akulibamba mumindando yabo ku-Baalitamara, abalo ba-Israyeli ibakayubide bakafwambaana kuzwa nkubakabede kumbo lya-Geba.
Kwakainka kuyoolwisya Gibeya bantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi ibakasalidwe kumisyobo yoonse yaba-Israyeli, elyo lumamba lwakayuma loko, pele ba-Benjamini teebakaziba kuti mapenzi ali kufwaafwi kulimbabo.
Jehova wakazunda ba-Benjamini kumaanza aaba-Israyeli, nkabela ba-Israyeli bakajaya mubuzuba obo bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu amwaanda akati kabaBenjamini, boonse bakali basimapanga.
Lino ba-Benjamini bakabona kuti twazundwa.
Bantu ba-Israyeli bakatantamuka ba-Benjamini, nkaambo bakali kusyoma abo bayubide mbubakabika ku-Gibeya,
Mpawo bantu bayubide bakafwambaana kufumuka kuya ku-Gibeya. Basikuyuba bakazwa akusaazya ipanga munzi woonse.
Lino citondezyo ncibakalibambilide bantu baIsrayeli abasikuyuba cakali boobu, Bakazumina kuti na babona ikumbi ipati lyabusi kuzwa kumunzi,

elyo bantu ba-Israyeli baleelede kupiluka kulumamba, Lino ba-Benjamini bakatalika kuuma akujaya bantu bakati be makumi otatwe baba-Israyeli, nkaambo bakati, Ncobeni twabazunda mbubonya mbutwakazunda munkondo intaanzi.
Pele citondezyo nicakatalika kuzwa kumunzi, nkukuti ikumbi lyabusi nilyakaboneka, ba-Benjamini bakaceba musule, bakabona kuti munzi woonse uli mukati kabusi buya kujulu.
Mpawo bantu ba-Israyeli bakapiluka musule, aba-Benjamini bakatalika kuyoowa, nkaambo bakabona kuti mapenzi abasikila.
Elyo bakafutatila ba-Israyeli kuya kunkanda, pele basinkondonyina bakabeenzya, abantu ibakazwa muminzi bakabanyonyoona akati kanzila,
Bakaya butimbaula ba-Benjamini, akubatobela akubalyataula kuzwa ku-Noha mane kusikila kulangene a-Gibeya kujwe.
Nkabela kwakajayigwa bantu ba-Benjamini bali zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu azitatu, boonse bakali basintaze.

Elyo bakanyona akucijila kunkanda kuya kundomba ya-Rimoni. Bantu bali zyuulu zyosanwe akati kabo bakajayigwa akati kamigwagwa, alimwi bakatandililwa kusikila ku-Gidomu, abantu bali zyuulu zyobile bakajayigwa.
Aboobo ba-Benjamini boonse ibakajayigwa mubuzuba obo bakali zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu, boonse bakali basimapanga basintaze.
Pele bantu bali myaanda iili musanu aumwi bakacijila kunkanda kundomba ya-Rimoni, akukala nkukonya kundomba ya-Rimoni myezi yone.
Nkabela bantu ba-Israyeli bakapiluka kuya bulwisya ba-Benjamini, akubajazya ipanga, bantu abanyama boonse kufumbwa mbubajana, Aminzi yoonse njibakajana bakaitentya mulilo.
Nkabela bantu bakasika ku-Beteli, bakakala nkuko kubusyu bwa-Leza mane kumabbililo aazuba, alimwi bakoomoka amajwi aabo cakulila loko.
Bakati, O Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, nkaambonzi makani aali boobu acitwa ku-Israyeli Nkaambonzi sunu kwabula musyobo omwe waba-Israyeli?
Elyo nibwakaca, bantu bakafuma kubuka, bakayaka cipaililo, akutuula zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya.

Nkabela bantu ba-Israyeli bakabuzya kuti, Nguuli musyobo waba-Israyeli iwakabula kusika kumbungano ya-Jehova? Nkaambo bakacitide cikonkezyo cipati kuliyooyo uuyoobula kusika kuli-Jehova ku-Mizipa. Bakati, Oyo uleelede kujayigwa.
Lino bantu ba-Israyeli bakafwida Benjamini mukwabo luzyalo. Bakati, Sunu musyobo omwe wapambulwa kumisyobonyina ya-Israyeli.
Lino tucite buti kuti tujanine baalumi basyeede banakazi? Nkaambo twakonkezya kale kubusyu bwa-Jehova kuti iswe tatukooyookwatya bana besu basimbi kulimbabo.
Bantu nibakabalwa katakwe muntu naba omwe wabantu ba-Jabezi-Gileadi iwakajanika.
Mpawo imbungano yakatuma nkuko zyuulu zili ikumi azibili zya bantu babo bakozu. Bakabalailila kuti Kamuya mukajazye ipanga bantu boonse bakede ku-Jabezi-Gileadi, abanakazi boonse abana.
Mbuboobu mbumweelede kucita. Baalumi boonse abanakazi boonse ibaswanene abaalumi, boonse amubanyonyoone.
Nkabela bakajana akati kabantu ba-JabeziGileadi basimbi banakalindu bali myanda yone ibakatalina kuswaana abaalumi, elyo abo basimbi bakabasisya kuzilao ku-Silo munyika ya-Kanana.
Aboobo ba-Benjamini bakaboola kuciindi eco, nkabela bakabaabila banakazi abo mbubakafutula akati kabanakazi ba-Jabezi-Gileadi, nekubaboobo teebakazulila pe,
Lino bantu bakafwida Benjamini luzyalo nkaambo Jehova wakabulizya umwi wamisyobo ya-Israyeli.
Elyo bapati bambungano bakati, Ino tucite buti, kuti tujanine baalumi basyeede banakazi? nkaambo banakazi banyonyooka mucisi ca-Benjamini.
Alimwi bakati, Bantu ba-Benjamini basyeede baleelede kuba alukono, kuti kutafwidilili umwi wamisyobo yaba-Israyeli.
Nekubaboobo tatukonzyi kubakwatya bana besu pe. Nkaambo bantu ba-Israyeli bakakonkezya kuti, Uli alutuko umwi aumwi uukwatya mwana wakwe mumusyobo wa-Benjamini­.
Lino bakaamba kuti, Mwaka umwi aumwi kuli ipobwe lya-Jehova ku-Sile, kunyika ya-Beteli, kujwe lyamugwagwa uuzwa ku-Beteli akuya ku-Sekemu, akumusanza wa-Lebona.
Nkabela bakalailila ba-Benjamini kuti, Kamuya, mukayube mumyuunda yamisaansa,
akulindila, elyo na basimbi baku-Sile bazwa kukuzyana mumisobano, amuyubunuke mumyuunda akulijatila umwi aumwi mukaakwe akati kabasimbi ba-Sile, mwiinke abo kunyika ya-Benjamini.

Lino na bazyali babona bakulana babo basika kuzootutongaukila, tulabaambila kuti, Amubafwide luzyalo akubaleka bakwate, nkaambo twakabula kubayobweda umwi aumwi mwanakazi wakwe ciindi cankondo, alimwi teemwakabapa buyo pe, nkaambo nimwakacita obo nimwakaba amulandu.
Mpawo ba-Benjamini bakacita obo, akulijatila banakazi babo, boonse buyo mbuli mweelwe wabo, akati kabasikuzyana mbubakatola. Elyo bakabweeda kucisi cabo, baakuyakulula minzi yabo akukala mulinjiyo.
Abantu ba-Israyeli bakapambuka kuzwa oko kuciindi eco, bakaya umwi aumwi kumusyobo wakwe akuciinga cakwe. Bakaya boonse umwi aumwi kubusena bwakwe.

Izina lyamuntu oyo kali Elimeleki, amwanakazi wakwe kali Naomi, abana bakwe bobile bakali Maloni a-Kilioni. Bakali ba-Efrata bakuBetelehemu mucisi ca-Juda. Lino bakasika kunyika ya-Moabu akukalakala nkuko.
Nbabela Elimeleki mulumi wa-Naomi wakafwa, aboobo wakasyaala alike abana bakwe balombe bobile.
Lino bakakwata banakazi bakucisi ca-Moabu. Izina lyaumwi kali Olipa, awabili kali Rute. Nkabela bakalikede nkukonya oko myaka iili mbuli ikumi.
Elyo Maloni a-Kilioni bakafwa boonse bobile. Mwanakazi wakafwidwa mulumaakwe abana bakwe boonse bobile.
Aboobo wakazwa omo mwakabede, wakanyamuka abamukabana bakwe bobile, nkabela bakali kuya bweenda munzila kuti apiluke kucisi ca-Juda.
Pele Naomi wakaambila bamukabana bakwe bobile kuti, Kamuya, mukapiluke umwi aumwi kuŋanda yabanyina, Jehova amufwide luzyalo, mbubonya mbumwakacitila bafwide ambumwandicitila ambebo.
Jehova amupe coolwe kuti mujane cilyokezezyo umwi aumwi muŋanda yamulumaakwe, Mpawo wakabamyonta, nkabela bakatalika kulila.
Bakamwaambila kuti, Nee! Katuya toonse kubantu bako.
Lino Naomi wakati, Pe, bana bangu, amupiluke, Nkaambonzi nomuyanda kwiinka ambe? Sa ncijisi bana balombe mwida lyangu bakonzya kuyoomukwata?
Amupiluke, nobana bangu, kulindinywe, nkaambo mebo ndacembaala, nsikonzyi kukwatwa pe. Na ndaamba kuti cicikonzeka kukwatwa, na ndajana mulumi masiku ano ngaonya akuzyala bana balombe,

sa mulakonzya kulindila mane bakakomene? Sa mulakonzya kulikasya kukwatwa kumbi nkaambo kambabo? Nee, nobana bangu! Moyo wangu ulausa loko nkaambo kanu, nkaambo kakuti ijanza lya-Jehova lyandiletela mapenzi.
Bamvwe obo bakalilisya alimwi. Lino Olipa wakamyonta banyinazyala, wapiluka, pele Rute nguwakakakatila mbabo.

Pele Rute wakavuwa kuti, Utandisungilizyi kukusia nanka kuleka kukutobela, nkaambo kufumbwa nkoya yebo ndaya ambebo, nkoyookala yebo njookala ambebo. Bantu bako bayooba bantu bangu, a-Leza wako uyooba Leza wangu.
Kufumbwa nkoyoofwida njoofwida ambebo nkuko akuzikwa nkukonya. Leza andicitile mbubonya akwiinda na ndazumizya cintu neciba cimwi cita lufu luzutu kundaanzanya ayebo.
Lino Naomi naakabona kuti moyo wakwe ulisungukide loko kuya awe, wakaleka kukazyanya awe.
Pele wakabavwiila kuti, Mutandaambi limbi kuti Naomi pe, amundaambe kuti Mara, nkaambo Syakeemba wandicitila makani aalula luu!
Nendakainka ndakalizwide, pele Jehova wandiboozya acinkwamaanza. Nkaambonzi mulandaamba kuti Naomi? Jehova wandipenzya, Syakeemba wandibisizya!
Nkabela Rute mu­-Moabu wakaambila Naomi kuti, Nje kumyuunda, nkavulule akati kamakunka aamaila, nkatobele kufumbwa muntu uundifwida luzyalo. Mpawo wakamuvwiila kuti, Mbubo, koya mwanaangu.
Aboobo wakaya, wasika kumyuunda, wavulula uya butobela basikutebula. Nkabela mucoolwe cakwe wakasika kucipanzi camuunda icakali ca-Boazi siluzubonyina Elimeleki.
Lino Boazi wakasika kuzwa ku-Betelehemu, wajuzya basikutebula kuti, Jehova abe anywe. Abalo bakavuwa kuti, Jehova akupe coolwe.
Elyo Boazi wakabuzya mulanda wakwe iwakali kubelesya basikutebula kuti, Ino ngwani oyu musimbi?
Mpawo mulanda iwakali kubelesya basikutebula wakamuvwiila kuti, Ngonguwe musimbi mu-Moabu Naomi ngwaakeza awe kuzwa kunyika ya-Moabu.
Wakakumbila kuti, Mvulule akubweza akati kamakunka cakutobela basikutebula. Aboobo weza cifumofumo, wabeleka ciindi coonse mane kusikila lino. Taakwe naalyokezya pe abuniini.
Mpawo Boazi wakaambila Rute kuti, Sa tomvwide mwanaangu? Utainki kuyoovulula mumuunda wamuntu umbi. Utayi kumbi pe. Kokala abasimbi bangu.
Meso aako abone muunda ngo batebula, lino koya bubatobela, Sa nsina kulailila balombe kuti batakupenzyi? Alimwi na wafwa nyota, koya kuzinywido, ukanywe maanzi ngebateka balombe.
Amvwe obo wakavundama ansi akumukotamina, wamwaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi ndajana buuya kulinduwe? Nkaambonzi nowandigwasya, nekuba kuti ndi mweenzu buyo?

Lino Boazi wakamuvwiila kuti, Ncobeni ndakalwiidwa makani oonse ngowakacitila banyokozyala kuzwa kuciindi calufu lwamulumaako. Ndamvwa mbowakasia uso abanyoko anyika yakuzyalwa kwako, ambowakeza okuno kumusyobo ngowatakezi.
Jehova akupe coolwe nkaambo kamilimo yako, ukatambule bulumbu buzulide kuzwa kumaanza aa-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, ngonguwe ngowajana mayubilo kunsi amababa aakwe.
Lino wakati, Ncobeni ndajana coolwe kulinduwe, mwami, nkaambo wanduumbulizya akuumuzya moyo wangu ndemulanda wako, nekuba kuti nsili umwi wabasimbi bako.

Lino kuciindi cakulya, Boazi wakamwaambila kuti, Swena okuno, ulye insima, akusunsa munsuma wako mumusinza. Aboobo wakakala kumbali lyabasikutebula, elyo wakamutambika musozya, nkabela wakalya, wakuta, waleka.
Lino naakanyampuka kuya kukuvulula, Boazi wakalailila balombe bakwe kuti, Avulule koonse koonse, naaba akati kamisunta yamaila. Mutamukasyi pe.
Alimwi amunonkole inkankamaanza ankankamaanza, mumusiile nzizyo, azibweze. Mutamukalalili pe.
Aboobo wakacili kuvulula omo mumuunda mane kusikila kumabbililo. Nkabela naakavwimbaula maila ngaakavulwide, wakajana kuti cakati be cisuwo cabbaale.
Elyo wakacibweza, wainka aco kumunzi, watondezya banyinazyala ncaakavulwide. Azyalo zilyo nzyaakasiide naakamana kukuta, wakazileta, wabapa nzizyo.

Lino banyinazyala bakamubuzya kuti, Wali kuyoovulula kuli sunu? Wali kubeleka kuli? Alumbwe muntu oyo iwakakugwasya. Mpawo wakalwiida banyinazyala nkwaakali kubeleka. Wakati, Muntu nkundali kubeleka kulinguwe sunu, izina lyakwe ngu-Boazi,
Lino Naomi wakaambila mukamwana wakwe kuti, Jehova amupe coolwe, oyo uutaleki luzyalo lwakwe nekuba kubaumi nekuba kubafu. Alimwi Naomi wakamwaambila kuti, Oyo muntu ngumukwesu, ngusiluzuboma.
Nkabela Rute mu-Moabu wakati, Alimwi wakandaambila kuti, Uleelede kukakatila kubalanda bangu, mane lumwi bakamanisye kutebula kwangu koonse.
Lino Naomi wakaambila Rute mukamwana wakwe kuti, Ee, mwanaangu, ncobeni ncibotu kuti koinka abana basimbi bakwe, nkaambo mumuunda umbi ambweni uyoopenzegwa.
Aboobo wakakakatila kubasimbi baBoazi, akuya buvulula mane kusikila kumamanino aakutebula kwabbaale akutebula kwabulotwe. Nkabela wakali kukala abanyinazyala.
Swiilila! Ulya Boazi, nguwakali kweendeenda abasimbi bakwe, sa tali siluzuboma na? Bona! Sunu masiku ulapupulula bbaale kulubuwa lwakwe.
Samba, ulinanike, ulisamike kabotu, akwiinka nkukonya oko kulubuwa, pele utalizibyi kumuntu oyo mane akamanisye kulya akunywa.
Lino kuciindi cakulala kwakwe, bona mpayoolala, elyo uleelede kuya akuvumbula maulu aakwe, nkabela uyookulwiida mboelede kucita.
Wakamuvwiila kuti, Coonse ncondilailila njoocita mbubonya.
Elyo wakainka kulubuwa, wacita mbubonya banyinazyala mbubakamuJailila.
Boazi naakamana kulya akunywa, alimwi moyo wakwe nowakakondedwe, wakaakulala kumamanino aacilwi camaila, nkabela mpoonya awo Rute wakasika cabuumuzi, wavumbula maulu aakwe, walala.
Lino akati kamasiku mwaalumi wakatilimuka, wasanduka, wabona kuti kuli mwanakazi uulede kumaulu aakwe.
Wakamubuzya kuti, Nduweni? Nkabela wakamuvwiila kuti, Ndime Rute mulanda wako. Kondivumbya malogwe aako ndemulanda wako, nkaambo nduwe siluzuboma.
Mpawo wakati, Jehova akupe coolwe, mwanaangu, nkaambo obu buuya bwako busyaalizi bulainda bwakutaanguna, nkaambo tona kutobela balombelombe, nibaba bacete nibaba bavubi.
Lino utayoowi mwanaangu. Coonse cili buti ncoamba, nzoocicita, nkaambo basimunzima boonse balizi kuti uli mwanakazi uuzyalikene.
Lino ndime siluzubonyoko ncobeni, pele nkwali siluzubonyoko aumwi waafwiifwi kwiinda ndime.

Ona masiku ano, lino bwaca buyo, na oyo muntu ulazumina kukucitila ceelelo cabusiluzubonyoko, ncibotu, pele na moyo wakwe tuuyandi kukucitila ceelelo cabusiluzubonyoko, lino Jehova mbali muumi, nzoocita mebo. Lala, mane bukace.
Alimwi wakati, Leta kaputi ngosamide, ujate. Elyo naakamujisi, wakamweelekela zisuwo zyabbaale zili musanu acimwi, wamupa, aboobo wakapiluka kumunzi.
Lino naakasika kulibanyinazyala, bakamubuzya kuti, Ino weenda buti, mwanaangu? Mpawo wakabaambila zyoonse mwaalumi nzyaakamucitila.
Alimwi wakati, Wandipa ezi zisuwo zyabbaale zili musanu acimwi, nkaambo wakati, Toelede kupiluka maya kulibanyokozyala pe.
Lino bakati, Kala, mwanaangu, mane ukazibe na makani alaba buti. Nkaambo oyo mwaalumi takoolyokezya pe, uyoomanisya makani buzuba obuno.
Nkabela wakasala baalumi bali ikumi akati kabapati bamunzi, wabaambila kuti, Anywebo amukale okuno. Lino bakakala.
Mpawo wakaambila siluzubonyina kuti, Naomi waboola kuzwa kunyika ya-Moabu, lino waulisya caabilo canyika icakali ca-Elimeleki mukwesu.

Nkaambo kako ndakayeeya kuti ndeelede kukuyubunwida makani, kuti uule okuno kubusyu bwabaaba bakede akubusyu bwabapati babantu bangu, Na ulayanda kucinununa, nununa. Pele na toyandi kucinununa, undaambile, kuti ndizibe, nkaambo taakwe muntu umbi uuelede kucinununa cita nduwe, ambebo ndi wabili. Mpawo wakati, Ndacinununa.
Lino Boazi wakati, Mubuzuba obo mbubonya nozooula muunda kuzwa kumaanza aa-Naomi, uleelede kuula alakwe Rute mu-Moabu mukamufu, kuti ukabusye izina lyamufu mucaabilo cakwe.
Elyo siluzubonyina wakati, Nsikonzyi kulinunwida, inga njoobisya caabilo cangu ndemwini. Tambula ceelelo cakunununa yebo, nkaambo mebo nsikonzyi kucinununa pe.
Aboobo oyo siluzubonyina naakaambila Boazi kuti, Kolyuulila omwini, wakagwisya insangu yakwe.
Nkabela Boazi wakaambila bapati abantu boonse kuti, Ndinywe bakamboni. Mwabona kuti buzuba obuno ndaula imbono zyoonse zya-Elimeleki azyoonse zya-Kilioni azya-Maloni kuzwa kumaanza aa-Naomi.

Alakwe Rute muMoabu muka-Maloni ndamuula, kuti abe mukaangu, abusye izina lyamufu mucaabilo cakwe, kuti izina lyamufu litalobi akati kababunyina nimuba mumulyango wamunzi wakwe. Ndinywe bakamboni buzuba obuno.

Abantu boonse ibakakede mumulyango wamunzi abapati bakaamba kuti, Tuli bakamboni. Jehova acite kuti oyu mwanakazi uuti njile muŋanda yako abe mbuli Rakele ambuli Leya, nkaambo aba bobile mbebakayaka luzubo lwa-Israyeli. Kojana coolwe mu-Efrata akuba simpuwo mu-Betelehemu.
Iŋanda yako ibe mbuli iŋanda ya-Perezi, Tamare ngwaakazyalila Juda, nkaambo kalunyungu Jehova ndwazookupa kulinakalindu oyu.
Mpoonya awo banakazi bakaambila Naomi kuti, Alumbwe Jehova, nkaambo sunu tanakusiide kuti ubule mukowa. Izina lyakwe libe ampuwo mucisi ca-Israyeli.
Uyookubeda sikupilusyabuumi asikukulela mubucembele bwako, nkaambo mukamwana wako uukuyandisya, uukubotela kwiinda bana balombe bali musanu ababili, nguwamuzyala.
Lino Naomi wakabweza mwana, wamulazika akaango kakwe, waba sikumulela,
Nkabela banakazi mbobakakede abo bakamuulika izina, bati, Naomi wazyalilwa mwana mulombe. Bakamuulika izina lya-Obedi. Ngonguwe wisi Jese wisi Davida.
alakwe Hezironi wakazyala Ramu, alakwe Ramu wakazyala Aminadabu,
alakwe Aminadabu wakazyala Nasoni, alakwe Nasoni wakazyala Salmoni,
alakwe Salmoni wakazyala Boazi, alakwe Boazi wakazyala Obedi,
alakwe Obedi wakazyala jese, alakwe Jese wakazyala Davida.
Oyo muntu kakwete banakazi bobile, izina lyaumwi kali Hana, umwi kali Penina. Lino Penina kazyede bana, pele Hana takakazyede bana pe.
Nkabela oyo muntu wakali kutanta kuzwa kumunzi wakwe mazuba oonse kuya kukukomba akupaila Jehova wamakamu makamu ku-Silo, nkukonya nkubakakede bana bobile ba-Eli, Hofeni a-Pinehasi bapaizi ba-Jehova.
Lino kufumbwa buzuba mbwaakali kuyanda kupaila Elikana wakali kwaabila Penina mukakwe abana bakwe boonse balombe abasimbi zyaabilo.
Pele Hana wakali kumupa caabilo comwe buyo, nkaambo kamuyandisya Hana, nekubaboobo Jehova kasinkide izyalilo lyakwe.
