Nkabela mubwatwanyina wakali kumupenzya loko kukumugalamukila, nkaambo kakut. Jehova kalisinkide izyalilo lyakwe.
Mbuboobo mbwaakali kucita mazuba oonse kuciindi ncaakali kutanta kuya kuŋanda ya-Jehova, wakali kumupenzya, nkabela walo Hana wakali kulila akutalya.
Lino Elikana mulumaakwe wakamwaambila wati, Ino Hana, nkaambonzi ulalila? Nkaambonzi tolyi? Nkaambonzi moyo wako ulaciswa? Teensi ndime nenkubotela kwiinda bana bali ikumi na?
Lino Hana mbwaakaciswa moyo wakali mukukomba Jehova cakulilisya.

Nkabela wakalumbila cilumbizyo cakwaamba kuti, O Jehova wamakamu makamu, kuti kobona cakubona mafwabi aamwanakazi mulanda wako kukundiibulukwa akutaluba mulanda wako akundipa ndemulanda wako mwana mulombe ambebo noomupa Jehova mazuba oonse aabuumi bwakwe, nkabela mutwe wakwe tuukoozoogelwa lunyoolo lyoonse pe.
Nkabela mbuli mbwaakakomezya ciindi cakukomba kwakwe, Eti wakali kulangisya mulomo wakwe.
Nkaambo Hana wakali kwaamba mumoyo wakwe, milomo yakwe luzutu njiyakali kuputaputa, pele ijwi lyakwe teelyakali kumvwigwa pe, nkikaako Eli wakayeeya kuti wakolwa.
Lino EH wakamwaambila kuti, Ino kusikila kuciindinzi ncoti kolwe? Uleke waini lyako.
Nkabela Hana wakavuwa wati, Pe mwami, ime ndi mwanakazi uuciswa mumoyo. Nsinywide waini niciba cintu cikola pe, ndatila buyo moyo wangu kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Utandipi mulandu, ndemulanda wako, wakuba muna-Saatani, pe, nkaambo moyo wangu waciswa loko, mapenzi aangu avulisya, nkikaako nkindazwa kwaamba.
Nkabela Eli wakavuwa wati, Koya caluumuno, Leza wa-Israyeli akupe cikumbilo cako ncokumbila kulinguwe.
Lino wakaamba wati, Nkafwidwe luzyalo, ndemulanda wako, kumeso aako, Mpawo mwanakazi wakainka, wakalya, takakacili kuusa pe.
Lino kumamanino aamwaka Hana wakamita, wakazyala mwana mulombe, wakamuulika izina lya-Samuele, nkaambo wakati, Ndakamukumbila kwa-Jehova.
Alimwi oyo muntu Elikana wakatanta antoomwe abamuŋanda yakwe boonse kuya kuyoopaila Jehova cipaizyo camyaaka yoonse akulondola kupinga kwakwe.
Pele Hana takaakatanta pe, nkaambo wakaambila mulumi akwe kuti, Ndilindile mane mwana aleke kunyonka, elyo ninzoomutola kuti akabonwe kubusyu bwa-Jehova akukala nkuko lyoonse.

Nkabela Elikana mulumi akwe wakamwaambila wati, Ncibotu, cita mbuli mbuwabotelwa, syaala mane ukamulesye, elyo Jehova nayoolondola ijwi lyakwe. Mbuboobo mwanakazi mbwaakasyaala akunyonsya mwanaakwe kusikila kukumulesya kwakwe.
Amane kumulesya wakamutola kuŋanda ya-Jehova ku-Silo antoomwe abasune botatwe alusuwo lwabusu ankomo yawaini, nkabela mwana kacili munnm.
Lino bakajaya musune nkabela bakaswenya mwana kuli-Eli.
Elyo wakaamba wati, Ncobeni mwami wangu, mbuli muuya wako mbuucili muumi, mwami, ndime oyo mwanakazi uwakiimvwi okuno kulinduwe kukukomba Jehova.
Ngomwana oyu ngundakali kukombela, lino Jehova wandipa cikumbilo ncindakamukumbila.
Nkaambo kako ambebo ndamukolotya Jehova. Mazuba oonse ngaacipona ulaba cikoloto ca-Jehova. Lino mpawo wakakomba Jehova.
Moyo wangu wakondelwa muli-Jehova,
Mutwe wangu wasongomekwa muli-Jehova.
Mulomo wangu waba silubweko kulibasinkondoma,
Nkaambo ndasekelela lufutuko lwako.
Nkaambo taakwe umbi, ndiwe olike.
Taakwe mwaala uuli mbuli Leza wesu.
Cimpangwe citazwi kumilomo yanu pe.
Nkaambo Jehova ngu-Leza waluzibo,
Nguwe uueleka milimo.
Mata aabasimizunda alatyoka,
Pele bazeelesi balisamika inguzu mbuli lutambo.
Pele basinzala balipumunide.
Alakwe musundi wazyala bana bali musanu ababili,
Anukuti uuzyede bana banjibanji woongelwa.
Nguwe uunjizya mukabanda akugwisya mumo.
Nguwe uuselusya akusumpula.
Ulagwisya mucete kuzwa kuzitantaala,
Kuti amukalike antoomwe abami
Akumukonya cuuno cabulemu.
Nkaambo misemu yansi njiya-Jehova,
Nguwe wakasitikizya insi alinjiyo,
Pele babi balaumunisizigwa mumudima,
Nkaambo taakwe muntu uukonzya kuzunda kunguzu zyakwe mwini.
Ulabagalamukila kuzwa kujulu.
Nguwe uubeteka kusikila kumamanino aanyika.
Ulapa mwami wakwe inguzu
Akusongomeka mutwe wamunanike wakwe.
Nkabela bana baalumi ba-Eli kabali bana-Saatani, kabatezi Jehova.
Lino ciyanza cabapaizi kubantu cakali boobu. Muntu umwi aumwi naakali kupaila cipaizyo, wakasika mulanda wamupaizi, nyama niyakacili mukubila, wakalijisi ciyasyo cili ameno otatwe mujanza lyakwe.

Lino wakali kuyasa mucibiya nimuba mudongo nimuba mumupika nimuba mumpoto, elyo yoonse njicakali kujata ciyasyo nciconya ncaakabweza mupaizi mwini. Mbuboobu mbubakali kucita aba-Israyeli boonse abakali kusika oko ku-Silo.
Alimwi mafuta kaatana kutentwa wakali kusika mwana wamupaizi, kwaambila muntu uupaila kuti, Undipe nyama, njokele mupaizi, nkaambo tayandi nyama iijikidwe pele imbisi.
Lino oyo muntu inga wakali kumwaambila kuti, Pele abasaangune kutenta mafuta, noti tole mbuuyanda moyo wako. Lino wakaamba kuti, Pe, uleelede kundipa lino.
Kuti ukake ndiibweza anguzu. Mbuboobo zibi zyabana abo mbuzyakavulide loko kumeso aa-Jehova, nkaambo bakali kusampaula cipaizyo ca-Jehova,
Alimwi banyina bakali kumucitila kabaki kaniini, kabatola kulinguwe mwaaka umwi aumwi nibakali kuya amulumaakwe kuyoopaila cipaizyo camyaaka yoonse.
Nkabela Eli wakali kulongezya Elikana amukakwe, waamba wati, Jehova akupe bana kumwanakazi oyu nkaambo ka cikoloto eci ncaakolotesya Jehova. Lino bakali kubweeda kulimbabo.
Nkabela Jehova wakaswaya Hana, lino wakamita, wakazyala bana balombe botatwe abasimbi bobile. Nkabela mwana Samuele wakakula kumeso aa-Jehova.
Nkabela Eli wakacembaala loko, alimwi wakali kuswiilila zyoonse nzibakali kucita bana bakwe kuba-Israyeli boonse ambubakali kulalika banakazi abakali kumana milimo kumulyango watente lyakuyobolekela.
Lino wakabaambila wati, Nkaambonzi nomucita obo? Ikuti ndiswiilide milimo yanu mibi kuzwa kubantu boonse.
Pe, bana bangu, nkaambo teensi imbotu impuwo njinswiilila. Mulapambusya bantu ba-Jehova.
Kuti muntu wabisizya mweenzinyina, Leza ulamubeteka. Pele muntu abisizya Jehova, ino nguni uukonzya kumukombelezezya? Nekubaboobo teebakali kuswiilila ijwi lyawisaabo, ikuti Jehova kayanda kubajaya.
Nkabela mwana Sumuele wakali kuya bukula akubota kumeso aa-Jehova akumeso aabantu.

Teendakamusala kuzwa kumikowa yoonse ya-Israyeli kuti andibede mupaizi wakupaila acipaililo cangu akutenta tununkilizyo akusama cikobela cituba kubusyu bwangu? Teendakapa luzubo lwauso zipaizyo zyamulilo zyoonse zyabana ba-Israyeli?

Ino nkaambonzi nomulyata cipaizyo cangu acituulo cangu ncindakalaizya muŋanda yangu? Ino nkaambonzi noolemeka bana bako kwiinda ndime nukulinencesya kwanu kuzipaizyo zyoonse ziinda kubota zyabantu bangu ba-Israyeli,
Swiilila! mazuba azoosika ninzookosokezya bana bako abana baluzubo lwauso, kuti kutabi naba omwe uucembeede muluzubo lwako.
Nkabela uzoobona mapenzi aaŋanda yangu, nkaambo kuyoobota ku-Israyeli, pele muluzubo lwako takukooyoojanwa uuongola mazuba conse.
Muntu omwe nsikoozoomukosokezya kulinduwe kuzwa kucipaililo cangu, ndakuleka kuti anyonyozye meso aako akupenzya moyo wako, nkabela bana bazwa kuluzubo lwako balafwa boonse kabacili bayumu.
Lino eci ncecitondezyo cizooba kulinduwe akubana bako bobile Hofeni a-Pinehasi, mubuzuba bomwe bayoofwa boonse bobile.
Nkabela nzoobika mupaizi uusyomeka uuyoocita mbuli mbuuyanda moyo wangu amiyeeyo yangu. Oyo njoomuyakila iŋanda iijatide kuti aende kubusyu bwamunanike wangu mazuba oonse.

Nkabela umwi aumwi uusyaala kuluzubo lwako uzoosika kuzoomukotamina kuti avole tuli twansiliva nikaba kankwa kansima, Ulaamba kuti, Ikaka kondipa milimo niiba iili buti yabupaizi, nkalye munsuma wansima.
Lino buzuba bumwi Eli wakalilede kulinguwe nkabela meso aakwe akaamba kuofwaala, katakonzyi kubonesya.
Nkabela ilampi lya-Leza kalitana kuzima, Samuele kalede muntempele lya-Jehova nkulyakabede ibbokesi lya-Leza.
Lino Jehova wakaita Samuele, nkabela wakavuwa wati, Mpendi.
Lino wakazuzaanina kuli-Eli, wakaamba wati, Mpendi, nkaambo wandiita, Wakaamba wati, Nsiitide pe! Bweeda, ukalale. Lino wakaya, wakalala.
Nkabela Jehova wakaboola kabili kuongolola, wati, Samuele! Lino Samuele wakanyampuka, wakaya kuli-Eli, waamba wati, Mpendi, nkaambo wandiita! Waamba wati, Nsiitide mwanaangu. Bweeda, ukalale.
Lino Samuele katana kumuziba Jehova, alyalo ijwi lya-Jehova kalitana kumubonekela.
Mpawo Jehova wakaboola kuongolola Samuele alwatatu, nkabela wakanyampuka, wakaya kuli-Eli, wakaamba wati, Mpendi, nkaambo wandiita! Lino Eli wakabona kuti Jehova nguuita mwana.
Mpawo EH wakaambila Samuele wati, Koya, ukalale, lino akwiita uvuwe kuti, Koamba, Jehova, nkaambo mulanda wako ulaswiilila. Nkabela Samuele wakaya wakalala kulinguwe.
Lino Jehova wakaboola, wakiima, woongolola mbuli ziindi zyoonse, wati, Samuele, Samuele. Mpawo Samuele wakavuwa, wati, Koamba, ikuti mulanda wako ulaswiilila.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Samuele wati, Bona! Ndacita cintu muIsrayeli, elyo kufumbwa muntu uuyoociswiilila, matwi aakwe oonse obile alapakamana.
Mubuzuba obo njoozuzya kuli-Eli makani oonse nginda-kaambide kuluzubo lwakwe kuzwa kumasaangunino kusikila kumamanino.
Nkaambo ndakamwaambila kuti ndabeteka luzubo lwakwe lyoonse nkaambo kamulandu ngwazi, ikuti bana bakwe basampaula Leza, nkabela walo tabakasyi pe.
Nkaambo kako ndakonkezya kuluzubo lwa-Eli kuti milandu valuzubo lwa-Eli tiikonzyi kumanizigwa kucipaizyo nikuba kucituuzyo mane kukabe kutamani,
Lino Samuele wakalala kusikila kukuca, wakajula milyango yaŋanda ya-Jehova, Nkabela Samuele wakali kuyoowa kwaambila Eli cilengano.
Limo Eli wakaita Samuele, wakaamba wati, Mwanaangu Samuele. Nkabela wakaamba wati, Mpendi!
Lino wakabuzya wati, Makaninzi ngowaambilwa? Utasisi kulindime pe. Leza akucitile mbubonya obo akwiinda kuti wandisisa cintu niciba comwe akati kamakani oonse ngaakwaambila.
Mpawo Samuele wakamwaambila makani oonse, teewakasisa cintu niciba comwe. Lino wakaamba wati, Ngu-Jehova! acite kufumbwa cintu cimubotela kumeso aakwe.
Nkabela ba-Israyeli boonse kuzwa kuDani kusikila ku-Beereseba bakaziba kuti Samuele kabikidwe mbuli musinsimi wa-Jehova.
Nkabela Jehova wakaboola kulibonya mu-Sile, nkaambo Jehova wakalibonya kwa-Samuele mu-Sile kujwi lya-Jehova.
Lino ba-Israyeli bakainka kuyoolwana aba-Filisti, nkabela bakabamba zilao zyabo kufwaafwi ku-Ebenezeri, abalo ba-Filisti bakabamba zilao zyabo ku-Afeki.
Mpawo ba-Filisti bakalibamba kuyooswaana aba-Israyeli. Lino inkondo yakakomena, elyo ba-Israyeli bakakomwa kuba-Filisti, nkabela akati kabasilumamba bamusokwe kwakajayigwa bali mbuli zyuulu zyone,

Mpawo bantu nibakasika kuzilao, banene ba-Israyeli bakaamba bati, Ino nkaambonzi Jehova watukoma sunu kubusyu bwaba-Filisti? Atuliyandwiide kuzwa ku-Sile ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova, lisike akati kesu, lituvune kumaanza aabasinkondoma besu.

Mpawo bantu bakatuma ku-Sile, bakagwisya nkukonya ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova wamakamu makamu uukala akati kaba-Kerubi, nkabela bana bobile ba-Eli, Hofeni a-Pinehasi, kabaliko antoomwe abbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Leza.
Lino ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova nilyakasika kuzilao, ba-Israyeli boonse bakoongolola aloongololo lupati, anyika ayalo yakavwiilila.
Nkabela ba-Filisti nibakamvwa ijwi lyaloongololo olo bakaamba bati, Ino ncinzi eli ijwi lyaloongololo lupati lizwa kuzilao zyaba-Hebrayo? Lino bakamvwa kuti ibbokesi lya-Jehova lyasika kuzilao.
Mpawo ba-Filisti bakayoowa, nkaambo bakaamba kuti, Wasika Leza kuzilao. Alimwi bakaamba bati, Mawe! twapenga! nkaambo makani aali boobu taanabwenwe noliba jilo nokuba kuciindi cakamana.
Mawe! twapenga! ngwani uukonzya kutuvuna kumaanza aamizimo eyi miyumu? Njiyonya eyi mizimo iyakauma ba-Egepita ingumo zyoonse munkanda.
Amuliyumye, mube baalumi, noba-Filisti, kuti mutabi bazike kuba-Hebrayo mbuli mbubakaba bazike kulindinywe. Amube baalumi, mulwane!

Lino ba-Filisti bakalwana, nkabela ba-Israyeli bakakomwa, bakacija umwi umwi kucilao cakwe, nkabela kwakaba luumo lupati loko, kwakajayigwa akati kaba-Israyeli basimyeendo bali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe,
Nkabela ibbokesi lya-Leza lyakanyanzigwa, abana bobile ba-Eli, Hofeni a-Pinehasi, bakajayigwa.

Mpawo naakasika, wakabona Eli ulikede acuuno cakwe kubbazu lyanzila, wakali kulangila, nkaambo moyo wakwe wakali kubila nkaambo kabbokesi lya-Leza. Lino muntu naakasika kumunzi akwaamba makani, munzi woonse wakalila.
Nkabela Eli naakaswiilila cikwala cakulila wakabuzya wati, Ino ndupyopyonganonzi olu lucita cikwala? Lino oyo muntu wakafwambaana kusika akwaambila Eli makani.
Nkabela Eli kajisi myaaka iili makumi aali musanu mwaane aali amusanu mwaatatu yakukomena, ameso aakwe akaofwaala, takakali kukonzya kubona.
Mpawo oyo muntu wakaambila Eli wati, Ndime ndakazwa kunkondo, ndacija sunu kuzwa kunkondo. Lino wakabuzya wati, Makaninzi mwanaangu?

Nkabela sikuleta makani wakavuwa wati, Ba-Israyeli bacija kumeso aaba-Filisti, nkaambo kwakaba luumo lupati akati kabantu, nkabela bana bako bobile bafwa, Hofeni a-Pinehasi, abbokesi lya-Leza alyalo lyanyanzigwa.

Mpawo aambe buyo makani aabbokesi lya-Leza, Eli wakawa kusule acuuno cakwe kubbazu lyamulyango, nkabela insingo yakwe yakatyoka, wafwa, nkaambo kali mucembele, kali mulemu. Nkabela wakabeteka ba-Israyeli myaaka iili makumi one.

Nkabela mukamwana wakwe Pinehasi kamitide ida, kali kufwaafwi kuzyala, nkabela naakamvwa impuwo yakuti ibbokesi lya-Leza lyanyanzigwa ayakuti bausozyala amulumaako bafwa wakalikotamina akuzyala, nkaambo kakuti lusungo lwakasika kulinguwe.
Lino naakaamba kufwa, banakazi abakaimvwi oko nkwaakabede bakaamba bati, Utayoowi pe, nkaambo wazyala mwana mulombe, nekubaboobo teewakamvwa nikuba kubika moyo.
Nkabela mwana wakamuulika izina lya-Ikabodi, nkaambo wakaamba kuti, Bulemu bwalonga kuzwa ku-Israyeli, nkaambo kakuti ibbokesi lya-Leza lyakanyanzigwa akaambo kawisizyala amulumaakwe,
Wakaamba wati, Bulemu bwalonga kuzwa ku-Israyeli, nkaambo ibbokesi lya-Leza lyanyanzigwa.
Lino ba-Filisti nibakanyanzya ibbokesi lya-Leza bakalileta kuzwa kuEbenezeri kusikila ku-Asidodi.
Nkabela ba-Filisti bakatola ibbokesi lya-Leza, bakalinjizya muŋanda ya-Dagoni akuliimika kubbazu lya-Dagoni.

Lwabili nibwakaca ba-Asidodi bakafuma cifumofumo nkabela bakajana kuti uliwide ansi, abusyu bwakwe bwakalivundeme, kunembo lyabbokesi lyaLeza, alimwi mutwe wa-Dagoni amaanza aakwe obile zyoonse zyakalikosokede acikunguzyo, kwakasyaala citimbitimbi ca-Dagoni luzutu.
Nciceeco bapaizi ba-Dagoni aboonse banjila muŋanda ya-Dagoni ncibatalyati acikunguzyo ca-Dagoni mu-Asidodi kusikila sunu.
Lino bantu ba-Asidodi nibakabona boobu bakaamba bati, Ibbokesi lya-Leza waIsrayeli talyeelede kusyaala kulindiswe, pe, nkaambo ijanza lyakwe lyatulemena iswe a-Leza wesu Dagoni.

Mpawo bakatuma kuyoobunganya bami boonse baba-Filisti kulimbabo, bakaamba bati, Tulicite buti ibbokesi lyaLeza wa-Israyeli? Nkabela bakaamba bati, Ibbokesi lya-Leza wa-Israyeli lilongele ku-Gati. Mpawo bakalonzya ibbokesi lya-Leza wa-Israyeli.
Lino nibakamana kulilonzya, ijanza lya-Jehova lyakali kumunzi oyo, lyakaleta lupyopyongano lupati loko, nkabela wakauma boonse bantu bamumunzi, nibaba baniini nibaba bapati, nkabela bakakalwa zyuute,
Mpawo bakatuma ibbokesi lya-Leza ku-Ekroni. Lino ibbokesi lyaLeza nilyakasika ku-Ekroni, ba-Ekroni bakatalika kulila, bati, Batulonzezya ibbokesi lya-Leza wa-Israyeli kuti batujaye abantu besu.

Lino bakatuma kuyoobunganya bami boonse baba-Filisti, bakaamba bati, Amutume ibbokesi lya-Leza waba-Israyeli kuti libweede kulimbabo, kuti litatujayi iswe abantu besu, nkaambo kakuli lupyopyongano lwakujaya kumunzi woonse, ijanza lya-Leza lyakaulemena loko.
Nkabela bantu batakafwa bakaumizigwa zyuute nkabela koongolola kwamunzi kwakasika kujulu.
Nkabela ibbokesi lya-Leza lyakali mucisi caba-Filisti myeezi iili musanu aibili.
Lino ba-Filisti bakaita bapaizi abasondi, bati, Tulicite buti ibbokesi lya-Jehova? Amutwaambile tulitume buti kubusena bwalyo?

Mpawo bakaamba bati, Mwatuma ibbokesi lya-Leza wa-Israyeli, mutalitumi buyo, muleelede kulibweedezya antoomwe aluliyo, lino mulaponezegwa, alimwi tulaziba nkaambonzi ijanza lyakwe talizwi kulindinywe.

Lino bakaamba bati, Ino nduliyonzi ndutweelede kubweedezya antoomwe andilyo? Nkabela bakaamba bati, Zyuute zyosanwe zyangolida ambeba zyosanwe zyangolida, mbuli mweelwe wabami baba-Filisti, nkaambo kakuti bulwazi bomwe bwakamusikila nyoonse abami banu.
Muleelede kucita zikozyano zyazyuute zyanu azikozyano zyambeba zimubisizya nyika, muleelede kumupa bulemu Leza wa-Israyeli, inga ulalesya ijanza lyakwe, lizwe alindinywe akumizimo yanu akunyika yanu.
Ino nkaambonzi mulalemya myoyo yanu mbuli ba-Egepita a-Farao mbubakalemya myoyo yabo? Naakamana kubasabula, teebakabatuma kuti bainke na?
Lino amubweze akubamba iŋola impya ampwizi zyobile zinyonsya zitana kwaangwa ijoko, Alimwi amubope impwizi kunola pele bana bazyo mubaboozye kucimpati.
Lino muleelede kubweza ibbokesi lya-Jehova akulibika aŋola, azyalo zintu zyangolida nzimubweedezya mbuli luliyo antoomwe andilyo amuzilongele mucibikilo kubbazu lyalyo, lino amulitumye, liinke.

Lino mwabona kuti lilaya kunzila iiya kulindilyo ku-Betisemesi, mulaziba kuti nguwe watuletela mapenzi aya mapati, anukuti mwabona kuti taliyi boobu tulaziba kuti teensi ijanza lyakwe lyatuuma pele asika eni.
Mpawo baalumi bakacita obo, bakabweza impwizi zyobile zinyonsya, bakazibopa kunola, nkabela bana bazyo bakabajalila muŋanda.
Lino bakalongela ibbokesi lya-Jehova aŋola antoomwe acibikilo ambeba zyangolida azikozyano zyazyuute.

Nkabela impwizi zyakalulama munzila yakuya ku-Betisemesi, zyakeenda munzila ziya bulila, teezyakalea pe nikuba kululyo nikuba kulumwensi, nkabela bami baba-Filisti bakali kuya bweenda musule lyazyo kusikila kumunyinza wa-Betisemesi,
Nkabela bantu ba-Betisemesi bakali mukutebula bulotwe mumumpata, lino bakapuwama, bakabona ibbokesi, bakakondwa kulibona.
Lino iŋola yakanjila mumuunda wa-Joshua muna-Betisemesi, yakiima nkukonya. Nkabela oko kwakali ibbwe ipati. Mpawo bakakosaula zisamu zyanola, ampwizi bakazituuzya mbuli cituuzyo ca-Jehova.

Lino ba-Levi bakalongonona ibbokesi lya-Jehova acibikilo cakali antoomwe andilyo, eco mumwakali zintu zyangolida bakali tula abbwe ipati, nkabela bantu baBerisemesi bakatuulila Jehova zituuzyo akumupaizizya zipaizyo obo buzuba.
Lino bami bosanwe baba-Filisti nibakabona bakabweeda ku-Ekroni mubuzuba obo mbubonya.

Lino zyuute zyangolida nzibakabweedezya ba-Filisti mbuli luliyo lwaJehova zyakali boobu, cimwi cakali ca-Asidodi, cimwi cakali ca-Gaza, cimwi cakali ca-Asikeloni, cimwi cakali ca-Gati, cimwi cakali ca-Ekroni.

Azyalo imbeba zyangolida zyakali mbuli mweelwe wamyunzi yoonse yaba-Filisri yabami bosanwe, niiba myunzi iizyungulusizidwe imbaya niiba myunzi iitakwe imbaya kusikila kubbwe ipati mpobakatula ibbokesi lya-Jehova alindilyo, Ibbwe elyo liciliko asunu mumuunda wa-Joshua muna-Betisemesi.
Nkabela bantu ba-Betisemesi bakaamba bati, Ino nguni uukonzya kuliimika kubusyu bwa-Jehova oyu Leza uusalala? Aye kuli kuzwa kulindiswe?
Nkabela bakatuma basimilazyo kubantu ba-Kiriyati-Jearimu, bati, Ba-Filisti baboozya ibbokesi lya-Jehova. Amuseluke, mulitansike kulindinywe.
Lino kuzwa kubuzuba obo mbulyakakala ibbokesi mu-Kiriyati-Jearimu ciindi cakalampa, cakasika kumyaaka iili makumi obile. Nkabela luzubo loonse lwa-Israyeli lwakali kuya bulilila Jehova.
Mpawo bana ba-Israyeli bakagwisya ba-Baala abaAstoreti, akumanina Jehova luzutu milimo,

Nkabela bakabungana ku-Mizipa, bakateka maanzi akwaatila kubusyu bwa-Jehova, Nkabela bakaliimya zilyo mubuzuba obo, bakaamba oko bati, Twabisizya Jehova. Lino Samuele wakabeteka ba-Israyeli mu-Mizipa.
Mpawo ba-Filisti nibakamvwa kuti ba-Israyeli bakalibungene ku-Mizipa, bami baba-Filisti bakaya kuyoolwana aba-Israyeli, Lino bana ba-Israyeli nibakamvwa bakayoowa nkaambo kabaEilisti.
Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakaambila Samuele bati, Utaleki pe kutukumbilila kuli-Jehova Leza wesu, kuti atuvune kuzwa kumaanza aabaFilisti.
Lino Samuele wakabweza kabelele komwe kanyonka, wakakatuula koonse mbuli cituuzyo kuli-Jehova. Nkabela Samuele wakakumbilila Israyeli kuli-Jehova, alakwe Jehova wakamuvwiila,
Nkabela bantu ba-Israyeli bakazwa ku-Mizipa akuya butanda ba-Filisti akubauma kusikila kunsi ku-Betikara.
Lino Samuele wakabweza ibbwe, wakalibika akati kaku-Mizipa aku-Seni, wakalyuulika izina lya-Ebenezeri, nkaambo wakaamba wati, Kusikila sunu Jehova watugwasya.
Nkabela ba-Filisti bakazundwa, teebakacili kuboola alimwi kusika kucisi caba-Israyeli, nkabela ijanza lya-Jehova lyakali kukoma baFilisti mazuba oonse aa-Samuele.

Lino myunzi yoonse njibakanyanzizye ba-Filisti kuzwa kuba-Israyeli yakaboola kuba-Israyeli kuzwa ku-Ekroni kusikila ku-Gati, alimwi cisi ceengelede njiyo acalo ba-Israyeli bakacivuna kuzwa kumaanza aaba-Filisti. Nkabela kwakaba luumuno akati kabaIsrayeli aba-Amori.
Nkabela Samuele wakali kubeteka ba-Israyeli mazuba oonse aabuumi bwakwe.
Myaaka yoonse wakali kuya buzyunguluka ku-Beteli aku-Giligala aku-Mizipa, akubeteka ba-Israyeli mumasena aya oonse.
Lino wakali kuboola ku-Rama nkuyakabede iŋanda yakwe, nkabela wakabeteka Israyeli nkukonya oko, alimwi wakayaka oko cipaililo ca-Jehova.
Nkabela izina lyamwana wakwe mutaanzi kali joeli, wabili kali Abiya, nkabela bakali kubeteka ku-Beereseba.
Pele bana bakwe teebakali kweenda munzila zyakwe, pe, bakali kuyandaula impindu akutambula makulo akubisizya lubeta
Lino bapati boonse baba-Israyeli bakabungana, bakasika kwa-Samuele ku-Rama,
bakamwaambila bati, Bona! uwe wacembaala, nkabela bana bako tabeendi munzila zvako. Lino utubikile mwami wakutubeteka mbuli misyobo yoonse.
Pele makani akabija mumeso aa-Samuele nibakaamba kuti, Utupe mwami wakutubeteka, nkabela Samuele wakakomba kuli-Jehova,
Mbuli milimo yabo yoonse njibacita, kuzwa kubuzuba obo mbundakabalonzya kuzwa kuEgepita kusikila sunu, kukundileka akumanina mizimo imwi milimo, mbubonya obo mbubali mukukucitila ayebo.
Lino swiilila majwi aabo, pele uleelede kubalaya akubaambila mbuzibede ziimbo zyamwami uuzoobeendelezya.
Lino Samuele wakabaambila majwi oonse aa-Jehova bantu abo ibakamubuzya makani aamwami.
Wakaamba wati, Mbuboobu mbuzibede ziimbo zyamwami uuzoomweendelezya. Bana banu baalumi ulababweza kuti bamubede basiŋola abasimbizi akucijaana kunembo aŋola yakwe.

Alimwi ulababika kuba basilutwe babantu bali cuulu abasilutwe babantu bali makumi osanwe, abamwi ulababika kuti balime kulima kwakwe akutebula kutebulakwakwe aku cita zintu zyakwe zyakulwisya azintu zyakwe zyanola.
Abana banu basimbi ulababweza kuti babe basimuunde abasikujikanyama abasikujikansima.
Amyuunda yanu amyuunda yanu yamasaansa amyuunda yama-olifa, ulabweza mibotu akati kayo kuti ape bana bakwe.
Alimwi ulabweza cipanzi eekumi cambuto zyanu acamasaansa aanu kuti ape bazike bakwe abalanda bakwe.
Abazike banu abasimbi abalombe banu babotu ambongolo zyanu ulababweza kuti bamumanine milimo.
Azyalo imbelele zyanu ulabweza cipanzi cekumi cazyo, nkabela inywe mulamubeda bazike.
Lino mubuzuba obo mulakwiila nkaambo kamwami wanu ngumwalisalila, pele Jehova takoozoomuvwiila mubuzuba obo.
kuti aswebo tube mbuli misyobo yoonse, kuti mwami wesu atubeteke akutusololela akutulwida inkondo zyesu.
Nkabela Samuele wakaswiilila majwi oonse aabantu, elyo wakaaindulula kumatwi aa-Jehova.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Samuele wati, Swiilila majwi aabo, ubabikile mwami. Mpawo Samuele wakaambila bantu ba-Israyeli wati, Mbubo, kamuya umwi umwi kumunzi wakwe.
Nkabela oyo muntu kajisi mwana, izina lyakwe kali Saulo, kali mulombe mubotu, kakutakwe naba omwe akati kaba-Israyeli mubotu mbuli nguwe. Kuzwa kuziwezo zyakwe kali mulamfu kwiinda bantu boonse.
Lino Kisi wisi Saulo wakasweekelwa imbongolo zyakwe, nkabela Kisi wakaambila mwana wakwe Saulo wati, Ubweze umwi mulombe, munyampuke, muye kuyooyandaula imbongolo. Lino wakainda kucilundu
­Efraimu akucisi ca-Syalisya, pele teewakaziiana. Mpawo bakainda kucisi ca-Salimu pele kazitako, alimwi bakainda kucisi ca-Yemeni akwalo teebakazijana.
Lino nibakasika kucisi ca-Zufi, Saulo wakaambila mulanda wakwe ngubakali awe, wati, Koza, atupiluke, ikuti bata inga balazileka imbongolo, balakatazigwa nkaambo kesu.
Mpawo mulanda wakaamba wati, Swiilila! mumunzi oyu muli muntu wa-Leza, muntu mulemu. Makani oonse ngaamba alaba ncobeni. Lino atuye kulinguwe, ambweni ulatwaambila makani aalweendo lwesu ndutujisi.
Lino Saulo wakaambila mulanda wakwe wati, Pele twaya, tutolenzi kumuntu oyo, nkaambo kakuti zinkwa zyamana munkomo zyesu, nkabela taakwe cipo ncitukonzya kumutolela muntu wa-Leza. Ino tujisinzi?
Mpawo mulanda wakavwiila Saulo wati, Langa! mujanza lyangu ndijisi cipanzi cane casekeli cansiliva. Njoomupa muntu wa-Leza kuti atwaambile lweendo lwesu.
(Lino kalekale mu-Israyeli muntu naakali kuya kubuzya kwa-Leza wakaamba boobu, wati, Amuboole, atweende kumusondi, nkaambo kakuti muntu uutegwa musinsimi sunu kalekale wakali kutegwa musondi).
Mpawo Saulo wakaambila mulanda wakwe wati, Waamba kabotu. Koza, tweende. Lino bakaya kumunzi nkwaakabede oyo muntu wa-Leza.
Nkabela nibakali kuya butanta kuya kumunzi, bakajana basimbi ibakali kuyooteka maanzi, nkabela bakababuzya bati, Sa musondi nkwali?
Lino bakabavwiila bati, Ee, nkwali. Uli kunembo. Amufwambaane lino, nkaambo wasika sunu kumunzi, nkaambo sunu bantu balijisi cipaizyo kucilundu.

Mwasika biyo kumunzi mpawo mulamujana taana kuya kucilundu kuyoolya, nkaambo kakuti bantu tabakonzyi kulya mane asike, nkaambo nguwe uulongezya cipaizyo, elyo musule batambwi balalya. Lino kamuya, mulamujana ndilyonya.
Mpawo bakatanta kuya kumunzi, nkabela nibakali mukunjila mumunzi, Samuele wakazwa kuzooswaanana abo kuyootanta kucilundu.

Junza kuciindi ecino ndakutumina muntu uuzwa kucisi ca-Benjamini, nguwenya oyo ngoelede kunanika mafuta kuti abe musolozi wabantu bangu ba-Israyeli, nkabela ulafutula bantu bangu kuzwa kumaanza aaba-Filisti, nkaambo ndibabwene bantu bangu, kukwiila kwabo kwasika kulindime.
Lino Samuele naakabona Saulo, Jehova wakamwaambila wati, Ngooyu muntu ngundakwaambila, nguwe uuzooendelezya bantu bangu.
Mpawo Saulo wakaswena afwiifwi kuli-Samuele mumulyango, wakaamba wati, Undaambile iŋanda yamusondi na ili kuli?
Lino Samuele wakavwiila Saulo wati, Ndime musondi. Amundisolwede kuyootanta kucilundu, tuyoolya anywebo sunu, nkabela junza ndamutuma kulindinywe, alimwi coonse cili mumoyo wako ndakwaambila.

Lino imbongolo nzowakasweekelwa mazuba otatwe aakainda, utabiki moyo kulinzizyo, pe, nkaambo kakuti zyajanwa kale. Lino zintu zyoonse ziyandisi zya-Israyeli nzizyani? Tee nzizyako azyamukowa woonse wabauso na?

Mpawo Saulo wakavuwa wati, Sa ime nsili mu-Benjamini, musyobo muniini kwiinda misyobo yoonse yaba-Israyeli? Amukowa wabatata teensi muniini kwiinda mikowa yoonse yaba-Benjamini? Ino nkaambonzi wandaambila ijwi lili boobu.
Lino Samuele wakatola Saulo amulanda wakwe, wabanjizya muŋanda yabeenzu, wababika mubusena butaanzi akati kabatambwi, bakali mbuli makumi otatwe.
Nkabela Samuele wakaambila mujiki wati, Leta caabilo eco ncindakakupa, ncindakakwaambila kuti ucibambe kulinduwe.

Mpawo mujiki wakanyampula mweendo azintu zyawo, wakazibika kunembo lya-Saulo. Nkabela wakaamba wati, Langa, nceeci ciyobolwa. Ucibike kunembo lyako, ulye, nkaambo kakuti cakayobwedwa nduwe kuciindi ceelede kuti nkatambe bantu. Lino Saulo bakalya a-Samuele mubuzuba obo.
Lino nibwakaca bakafuma, nkabela Samuele wakaita Saulo kulululi, wati, Buka, nkakutume kulinduwe. Mpawo Saulo wakabuka nkabela bakazwa boonse bobile a-Samuele anze.
Nkabela nibakaseluka kumamanino aamunzi Samuele wakaambila Saulo wati, Ulailile mulanda kuti atusolwede, nkabela wakasolola, Lino wati, Pele uwe uimikile, nkulwiide ijwi lya-Leza.

Sunu wainka buyo kuzwa kulindime, ulajana baalumi bobile kukabanda ka-Rakele kumunyinza wacisi ca-Benjamini kuZeliza, nkabela balakwaambila kuti, Imbongolo zyajanwa kale nzowakaya kulangaula, nkabela lino bauso baleka makani aambongolo, bakatazigwa nkaambo kanu, bati, Ncite buti nkaambo kamwanaangu?

Lino kuzwa oko ulaya kunembo kusikila kumusamu mupati wa-Tabori, nkabela oko kulakujana bantu botatwe baya butanta kuŋanda ya-Leza ku-Beteli, umwi ulinyampwide tupongo totatwe, umwi ulinyampwide zinkwa zyotatwe, aumwi ulinyampwide inkomo yawaini.
Nkabela balakujuzya, bai akupa zinkwa zyobile, nzoelede kutambula kumaanza aabo.

Caba ciindi ulasika kucilundu ca-Leza, oko nkubabede basinkondo baba-Filisti, nkabela wasika oko kumunzi mulaswaanana ankamu yabasinsimi bali mukuseluka kuzwa kucilundu nkabela kunembo lyabo bali akantimbwa akagoma anyeele anamalwa, lino balasinsima.
Mpawo Muuya wa-Jehova ulakuselukila canguzu nkabela ayebo ulasinsima abo, ulasanduka akuba muntu umbi.
Lino zyakusikila buyo ezi zitondezyo, ucite mbuli mbokonzya, nkaambo Leza uli ayebo.

Nkabela uleelede kundisolweda kuya ku-Giligala, ambebo nzooseluka kulinduwe kuzootuula cituuzyo akupaila zipaizyo zyakutontozya, Uleelede kulindila mazuba aali musanu aabili mane nkasike kulinduwe akukutondezya mboelede kucita.
Lino naakacebuka kwiinka kuzwa kuliSamuele, Leza wakamusandula akumupa moyo umbi, nkabela zitondezyo ezi zyoonse zyakaba mubuzuba obo mbubonya.
Lino boonse ibakamuzi kale nibakabona kuti ulasinsima antoomwe abasinsimi bakaamba umwi aumwi bati, Ino ncinzi eci casika kumwana waKisi? Sa Saulo alakwe musinsimi?
Lino naakamana kusinsima wakasika kucilundu.
Lino basimizvaabo Saulo bakaamba bati, Undaambile ncinzi ncaakamwaambila Samuele:
Lino Saulo wakaambila basimizyaabo wati, Kwambila wakatwaambila kuti imbongolo zyajanwa kale. Pele makani aabwami ngaakaamba Samuele teewakamwaambila ngao pe.

Lino wakaambila bana ba-Israyeli wati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wabaIsrayeli, wati, Ndime ndakagwisya ba-Israyeli kuzwa ku-Egepita akumuvuna kumaanza aaba-Egepita amumaanza aabamasi boonse ibamufwabya.

Pele inywe sunu mwakaka Leza wanu, nguwe wamufutula kuzwa kumapenzi aanu oonse akuzwa kumafwabi aanu oonse, mwaamba mwati, Ne! Pele utubikile mwami. Lino amwiimikile kubusyu bwa-Jehova mbuli misyobo yanu azyuulu zyanu.
Mpawo Samuele wakaswenya afwiifwi misyobo yoonse yaba-Israyeli, nkabela musyobo wa-Benjamini wakasalwa.
Lino wakaswenya afwiifwi musyobo wa-Benjamini mbuli mikowa mikowa, nkabela mukowa waba-Matri wakasalwa, alimwi a-Saulo mwanaakwe Kisi wakasalwa. Pele nibakamulangaula takakajanwa pe.
Lino bakabuzya alimwi kuliJehova, bati, Sa oyo muntu weza okuno? Nkabela Jehova wakaamba wati, Amubone! Wayuba akati kazintu.
Mpawo bakacijaana, bakamugwisya kuzwa oko akumwiimika akati kabantu. Nkabela wakali mulamfu kwiinda bantu boonse kuzwa kuziwezo zyakwe.
Lino Samuele wakaambila bantu boonse wati, Sa mwamubona oyu ngwaasala Jehova? Taakwe umbi uuli boobu akati kabantu boonse, Mpawo bantu boonse bakoongolola bati, Mwami apone!
Alakwe Saulo wakaya kuŋanda yakwe ku-Gibeya, nkabela kwakamusindikila basilumamba mbaakaampa Leza kumyoyo yabo.
Pele bamwi bana ba-Saatani bakaamba bati, Oyu ulatufutula buti? Nkabela bakamusampaula, teebakamuletela cipo, nekubaboobo wakaumuna.
Nkabela Nahasi mu-Amoni wakabaambila wati, Mwacita obo ndamuzuminina. Umwi aumwi akati kanu nkamugwisye liso lyalulyo, elyo cintu eci ndacibika mbuli cisampauzyo kubaIsrayeli boonse.
Lino bapati ba-Jabezi bakamwaambila bati, Tulekelele mazuba aali musanu mwaabili, kuti tutume batumwa kuzisi zyoonse zyabaIsrayeli. Lino kuti twabula muntu wakutufutula, tuleza kulinduwe.
Mpawo Saulo wakazwa musokwe, wakali kuza bubinga iŋombe, nkabela Saulo wakabuzya wati, Ino ncinzi ncibalilila bantu? Mpawo bakamulwiida makani aabantu ba-Jabezi.
Lino Muuya wa-Leza wakaselukila Saulo canguzu naakaswiilila makani aya, nkabela bukali bwakwe bwakayaka loko.

Mpawo wakabweza iŋombe zyobile, wakazikosaula, wakazituma kuzisi zyoonse zyaba-Israyeli mumaanza aabatumwa, wakaamba wati, Kufumbwa muntu uutakooza kutobela Saulo a-Samuele ulacitilwa obo iŋombe zyakwe. Mpawo kuyoosya kwa-Jehova kwakaselukila bantu nkabela bakazwa camoyo omwe.
Lino wakababala mu-Bezeki nkabela bana ba-Israyeli kabali zyuulu zili myaanda yotatwe abana ba-Juda kabali zyuulu zili makumi otawe.

Nkabela bakaambila batumwa abo ibakasika kuti, Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila bantu ba-Jabezi-Gileadi, kuti, Junza lyazoobala izuba muzooba alufutuko. Lino batumwa bakaboola, bakaambila bantu ba-Jabezi aya makani, elyo bakakondwa.
Lino bantu ba-Jabezi bakaamba bati, Junza tuleza nkumubede, kuti muzootucitile zyoonse nzimuyanda mumyoyo yanu.
Lino bantu bakaambila Samuele bati, Mbani bakaamba bati, Sa Saulo ulatweendelezya? Balete bantu abo, tubajaye.
Pele Saulo wakaamba wati, Pe, kutajayigwi muntu naba omwe mubuzuba obuno, nkaambo kakuti sunu Jehova waletela Israyeli lufutuko.

Nkabela bantu boonse bakaya ku-Giligala, bakapa Saulo bwami kubusyu bwa-Jehova nkukonya oko ku-Giligala. Mpawo bakapaila zipaizyo zyakutontozya kubusyu bwa-Jehova, nkabela Saulo wakasekelela cakwiinda abantu boonse ba-Israyeli.
Lino sunu mwami uleenda kumeso aanu, nkabela mebo ndacembaala, ndaba amvwi, abana bangu abalo muli abo, nkabela mebo ndeenda kumeso aanu mazuba oonse kuzwa kubwanike bwangu kusikila sunu.

Lino amundivwiile kubusyu bwa-Jehova akubusyu bwamunanike wakwe. Nguni ngundakanyanzya iŋombe? Na nguni ngundakanyanzya imbongolo? Nguni ngundakeena? Na nguni ngundakauma? Nguni ngundatambwida masinkamulomo kumaanza aakwe akufwinya meso aangu? Ndamuboozezya.
Lino bakaamba kuti, Tokookatweena pe, Tokookatuuma pe. Tokookatambula niciba cintu kujanza lyamuntu pe.
Mpawo wakabaambila wati, Jehova ngukamboni wanu, alakwe munanike wakwe ngukamboni mubuzuba obuno, kuti teemwajana niciba cintu mujanza lyangu. Nkabela bakaamba bati, Ee, ngukamboni!
Nkabela lino amwiimikile, tukabuzyanye andinywe kubusyu bwa-Jehova milimo iiluleme yoonse ya-Jehova njaamucitila inywe abamausowanu.
Jakobo naakamana kunjila mu-Egepita, bamausowanu bakoongolweda Jehova, nkabela Jehova wakatuma Musa a-Aroni, wakagwisya bamausowanu kuzwa ku-Egepita akubakalika mucisi ecino.
Pele bakaluba Jehova Leza wabo, nkaambo kako wakabauzva mumaanza aa-Sisera musololi wabasinkondo ba-Hazori amumaanza aaba-Filisti amumaanza aamwami wa-Moabu nkabela bakalwana abo.
Lino bakoongolola kuli-Jehova bati, Twabisya! nkaambo kakuti twaleka Jehova, twakombela ba-Baala a-Asitoroti, Pele lino utuvune kumaanza aabasinkondoma, elyo tulakumanina milimo.
Nkabela Jehova wakatuma Jerubaalu a-Bedani a-Jefita a-Samuele akumuvuna kuzwa kumaanza aabasinkondonyokwe beengelede, elyo mwakakala kabotu.
Kuti mwayoowa Jehova akumumanina milimo akuswiilila mbwaamba akutakaka majwi aa-Jehova, nkabela kuti mwatobela Jehova Leza wanu, inywe amwami uumweendelezya, ncibotu.
Pele kuti mwataswiilila mbwaamba Jehova akukaka majwi aa-Jehova, lino ijanza lyaJehova lilamulemena mbuli mbulyakalemena bamausowanu.
Nkabela lino amwiimikile, mubone cintu eci cigambya ncaamba kucita Jehova kumeso aanu.
Sa tee ciindi cakutebula bulotwe sunu? Ndakoongolola kuli-Jehova kuti atume kundindima amvula. Lino mulabona akuziba kuti wakomena mulandu wanu ngumwabisya kumeso aa-Jehova kukulikumbilila mwami.
Mpawo Samuele wakoongolola kuli-Jehova, nkabela Jehova wakatuma kundindima amvula mubuzuba obo, elyo bantu boonse bakayoowa loko Jehova a-Samuele.
Lino Samuele wakaambila bantu wati, Mutayoowi! Mwacita bubi obu boonse, ncobeni, nekubaboobo mutalei kutobela Jehova, pele amumanine Jehova milimo camoyo woonse.
Mutalei kuyootobela zintu zitakwe milimo zitakonzya kugwasya nikuba kuvuna nkaambo kakuti tazikwe milimo.
Nkaambo Jehova takonzyi kuleka bantu bakwe, nkaambo kazina lyakwe ipati, nkaambo kakuti Jehova ulayanda kuti mumubede bantu bakwe.
Nkabela mebo ncintondedwe kuti mbisizye Jehova kukuleka kumukombela, anukuti ndamwiisya makani aanzila imbotu iiluleme.
Pele amuyoowe Jehova akumumanina milimo cakusinizya acamoyo woonse. Amuyeeye milimo iigambya njaamucitila.
Pele kuti kubisya mulabisya, mulanyonyooka anywebo amwami wanu.
Saulo wakali amyaaka iili makumi otatwe yakuzyalwa naakasaanguna kupegwa bwami, nkabela wakeendelezya ba-Israyeli myaka yobile.

Lino Saulo wakalisalila bantu bali zyuulu zyotatwe ba-Israyeli, nkabela zyuulu zyobile zyakali a-Saulo mu-Mikimasi amucilundu ca-Beteli, abamwi bali cuulu kabali a-Johatani mu-Gibeya mucisi ca-Benjamini, elyo bantu bamwi boonse wakababweedezya kumaanda aabo.
Lino Johatani wakauma basinkondo baba-Filisti ibakali mu-Geba nkabela ba-Filisti bakamvwa impuwo. Mpawo Saulo wakasiba mweembo mucisi coonse, wakaamba wati, Baswiilile ba-Hebrayo.
Nkabela ba-Israyeli boonse bakaswiilila kuti, Saulo wauma basinkondo baba-Filisti, alimwi ba-Israyeli baba cisesemyo kuba-Filisti. Lino bantu bakayoboloka kuyootobela Saulo kuGiligala.

Nkabela ba-Filisti bakabungana kuyoolwana aba-Israyeli, bakali aŋola zili zyuulu zili makumi otatwe abasimbizi bali zyuulu zili musanu acimwi abantu banjibanji mbuli musenga uuli ankomwe yalwizi, elyo bakatanta kuyoobamba malabba aabo ku-Mikimasi kujwe kuzwa ku-Betaveni.
Mpawo bantu ba-Israyeli bakabona kuti bali amafwabi nkaambo kakuti bantu kababindeene, nkabela bantu bakayuba mumapangala amuzyoonde amumandomba amumalyango amuzilindi.
Lino bamwi ba-Hebrayo bakainkide kuyoolanduka Jordano kuya kucisi ca-Gadi a-Gileadi, pele Saulo kacili ku-Giligala nkabela bantu boonse bakali kumutobela cakukankama.
Mpawo Saulo wakaamba wati, Amundiletele zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya, elyo wakatuula cituuzyo.
Lino naakamana kutuula cituuzyo kwakasika Samuele, nkabela Saulo wakazwa kuyoomucinga akumujuzya.

Mpawo Samuele wakaamba wati, Ino ncinzi ncowacita? Nkabela Saulo wakaamba wati, Nkaambo ndakabona kuti bantu bandimwaika, ayebo teewasika kuciindi ceelede, nkabela ba-Filisti bakalibungene ku-Mikimasi,
lino ndakaamba kuti ba-Filisti inga baleza kulindime kuGiligala, nkabela mebo teendatontozya busyu bwa-Jehova, nkikaako nkindakalisinikizya kutuula cituuzyo.
Lino Samuele wakaambila Saulo wati, Wacita cabufubafuba. Teewatobela mulao wa-Jehova Leza wako ngwaakakulailila. Nkaambo Jehova naakiimya bwami bwako bwaku-Israyeli lyoonse.

Pele sunu bwami bwako tabukonzyi kwiimikwa pe. Jehova walisalila kale muntu mbuli moyo wakwe, nkabela Jehova wamwaamba kuti abe mweendelezi wabantu bakwe, nkaambo kakuti uwe teewacita mbuli mbwaakalailila Jehova.
Nkabela Saulo a-Jonatani mwanaakwe abantu mbibakali abo kabakede ku-Geba wa-Benjamini, aba-Filisti kababambide malabba aabo ku-Mikimasi.
Lino basaali bakazwa kumalabba aaba-Filisti, kabali inkamu zyotatwe, nkabela inkamu imwi yakatola inzila iiya ku-Ofra mucisi ca-Syuali,
imwi yakatola inzila yakuya ku-Betihoroni, aimwi yakatola inzila yamunyinza iisondelelwa kukuti lya-Zeboimu kufwaafwi kunkanda.
Pele ba-Israyeli boonse bakali kuseluka kuya kuba-Filisti umwi umwi kuyookwengya mulomo wapulau lyakwe ajamba lyakwe akaa-nkuni kakwe apanga lyakwe.
Nkabela milomo yamapulau yakalifumpide, amaamba amafoloko atwaankuni amapanga.
Lino mubuzuba bwankondo teekwakajanwa ipanga niliba lyomwe nanka isumo mumaanza aabantu boonse mbaakali abo Saulo a-Jonatani, cita Saulo a-Jonatani mwanaakwe balike mbibakajisi.
Nkabela basinkondo baba-Filisti bakazwa akuya kucito ca-Mikimasi.
Lino buzuba bumwi Jonatani mwana wa-Saulo wakaambila mukubusi sikuyumuna zintu zyakwe kuti, Koza, atweende kumalabba aabasinkondo baba-Filisti bali mutala. Pele teewakababuzya bawisi.
Nkabela Saulo wakali kukala kumamanino aacisi ca-Gibeya munsi amusamu wapomegranite oyo uuli mu-Migroni, nkabela bantu mbaakali abo kabali mbuli myaanda iili musanu aumwi.
Alakwe Ahiya mwana wa-Ahitubi munyina Ikabodi mwanaakwe Pinehasi mwanaakwe Eli kaliko, wakali mupaizi waJehova mu-Silo, wakali kusama efodi. Nkabela bantu teebakaziba kuti Jonatani wainka.
Umwi wakali kunyika kubbazu lya-Mikimasi, aumwi wakali kumusanza kubbazu lya-Geba.

Lino Jonatani wakaambila mukubusi sikuyumuna zintu zyakwe, wati, Koza, atweende tuye kumalabba aabasinkondo babaaba batapalwidwe, Ambweni Jehova ulatugwasya, nkaambo taakwe cintu cikonzya kukasya Jehova kuvuna, nikuba kubanji nikuba kubace.
Nkabela sikuyumuna zintu zyakwe wakamwaambila wati, Cita zyoonse zili mumoyo wako, tweende, ambebo ndi ayebo mbuli moyo wako.
Lino jonatani wakaamba wati, Bona! Tuleenda kubaalumi, tuyubunuke mumeso aabo.
Na batwaambila kuti, Amulinde mane tusike oko nkumubede, lino tuyooimikila mpoonya awo mpotubede, tatukoozooya kulimbabo.
Pele na baamba kuti, Kamuza okuno nkutubede, lino tuyooinka, nkaambo Jehova wabaaba kale mumaanza esu. Nciceeci nceciyootubeda citondezyo,
Mpawo boonse bobile bakayubunuka mumeso aabasinkondo babaFilisti, nkabela ba-Filisti bakaamba kuti, Amubone! Ba-Hebrayo bali mukuzwa kumalyango nkubakayubide.

Lino baalumi basinkondo bakaambila Jonatani asikuyumuna zintu zyakwe bati, Kamuza okuno nkutubede, tulamuzibya cintu. Lino jonatani wakaambila sikuyumuna zintu zyakwe kuti, Koza bunditobela, nkaambo Jehova wabaaba mumaanza aaba-Israyeli.

Mpawo jonatani wakatanta amaboko amaulu aakwe, asikuyumuna zintu zyakwe alakwe wakamutobela, Nkabela kabali mukuwida ansi kunembo lya-Jonatani, asikuyumuna zintu zyakwe alakwe wakamutobela kuya bujaya.
Nkabela bantu ibakajayigwa mukujaya oku kutaanzi nkwaakacita Jonatani asikuyumuna zintu zyakwe kabali mbuli makumi obile mumuunda wacisela canyekele.
Lino balindizi ba-Saulo bamuGibeya mucisi ca-Benjamini bakabona kuti makamu aabantu akali kuya buzangauka koonse koonse.
Lino Saulo wakaambila bantu mbaakali abo kuti, Amubungane, tubone na nguni wazwa kulindiswe. Nkabela nibakabungana, Jonatani asikuyumuna zintu zyakwe kabatawo.
Mpawo Saulo wakaambila Ahiya kuti, Swenya okuno ibbokesi lya-Leza. (Nkaambo kakuti ibbokesi lya-Leza kaliliko kubana ba-Israyeli kuciindi eco.)
Nkabela Saulo naakali kwaambaula amupaizi, lupyopyongano lwamumalabba aaba-Filisti lwakali kuya bukomena, elyo Saulo wakaambila mupaizi kuti, Gwisya ijanza lyako.
Lino Saulo abantu boonse mbaakali abo bakabungana, bakasika kunkondo, nkabela bakabona kuti ipanga lyaumwi aumwi lyakali kuuma mweenzinyina, kakuli lupyopyongano lupati loko,
Nkabela ba-Hebrayo ibakali abaFilisti kuciindi cakamana akubasindikila kuya kunkondo, abalo bakapiluka kuba aba-Israyeli mbibakali abo Saulo a-Jonatani.
Abantu boonse baIsrayeli ibakayubide mucilundu ca-Efraimu nibakamvwa kuti ba-Filisti bali mukucija abalo bakabatobelesya munkondo.
Mbuboobu Jehova mbwaakavuna Israyeli mubuzuba obo, nkabela inkondo yakali kuya bwiinda kusikila ku-Betaveni.
Lino bantu boonse bakanjila mulusaka, nkabela kakuli buci ansi.
Nkabela bantu nibakanjila mulusaka, buci bwakali kuya buloka, nekubaboobu katakwe muntu naba omwe iwakabweza mujanza lyakwe akubika mumulomo, nkaambo kakuti bantu bakali kuyoowa cipingyo.

Pele Jonatani teewakamvwide bawisi nibakapinga bantu, nkabela wakatandabika mamanino aamusako wamujanza lyakwe akuutompa mucimbulwe cabuci, elyo wakaboozya ijanza kumulomo wakwe, nkabela meso aakwe akamunika.
Lino umwi muntu akati kankamu wakavuwa, wakaamba wati, Malaa bauso bakapinga bantu bati, Atukilwe muntu umwi aumwi uunoolya zilyo sunu, Nkabela bantu bakali kuwizuka.
Lino Jonatani wakaamba wati, Bata bakataazya bantu, Amubone meso aangu mbaamunika nkaambo kakuti ndalabila otu tuci!
Ncobeni bantu nibalya sunu cakulya zintu zyabasinkondonyina nzibajana nicabota! Anukuti lino kujaya teekwavula akati kaba-Filisti pe.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo bakali kuya buuma ba-Filisti kuzwa ku-Mikimasi kusikila ku-Ajaloni, nkabela bantu bakakataala loko.
Lino bantu bakavuumukila kuzintu, bakabweza imbelele aŋombe aboombe akuzijaya ansi, nkabela bantu bakali kuzilya antoomwe abulowa.
Lino bakaambila Saulo bati, Bona! Bantu balabisya kuli-Jehova kukulya antoomwe abulowa. Nkabela wakaamba wati, Mwabisya! Amundikunkulusizye lino ibbwe ipati.

Lino Saulo wakaamba wati, Amumwaike akati kabantu, mukabaambile kuti, Amundiletele umwi aumwi musune wakwe akabelele kakwe, muzijaye okuno, mulye. Mutabisyi kuli-Jehova kukulya antoomwe abulowa. Lino bantu boonse bakeza umwi aumwi amusune wakwe kuciindi camasiku nkabela bakazijaya nkukonya.
Nkabela Saulo wakayakila Jehova cipaililo, nciconya cipaililo citaanzi ncaakayakila Jehova.
Nkabela Saulo wakabuzya kuli-Leza kuti, Sa nkaseluke kuya butobela ba-Filisti? Sa ulabapa mumaanza aaba-Israyeli? Pele takakamuvwiila mubuzuba obo pe.
Lino Saulo wakaamba wati, Amuswene okuno inywe nyoonse numisemu yabantu, mubone akuziba ncibinzi eci casunu.
Ncobeni kubuumi bwa-Jehova sikuvuna Israyeli, nikuba kuti cibe kuli-Jonatani mwanaangu ulafwa. Nkabela katakwe muntu naba omwe akati kabantu wakamuvwiila.
Lino wakaambila ba-Israyeli boonse kuti, Inywe mulaba kubbazu limwi, aswebo tulaba kubbazu limwi antoomwe a-Jonatani mwanaangu, Nkabela bantu bakaambila Saulo bati, Cita mbuli mozibonena.
Mpawo Saulo wakaambila Jehova Leza waba-Israyeli wati, Upe cisondyo ciluleme. Lino Saulo a-Jonatani bakajatwa kucisondyo pele bantu bakalekwa.
Mpawo Saulo wakaamba wati, Amuume cisolo akati kesu tobile swebo a-Jonatani mwanaangu. Nkabela Jonatani wakajatwa.
Lino Saulo wakaambila Jonatani wati, Undaambile ncinzi ncowakacita? Nkabela jonatani wakamwaambila wati, Kulabila ndakalabila tuci kumamanino aamusako wamujanza lyangu, lino ndeelede kufwa.
Mpawo Saulo wakaamba wati, Leza andicitile boobu na cakwiinda kuti kufwa tofwi Jonatani.

Pele bantu bakaambila Saulo bati, Sa Jonatani ulafwa, oyo iwakaletela Israyeli lufutuko olu lupati? Ne! Kubulimi bwa-Jehova taakwe nikaba kasuso kamutwe wakwe kayoowida ansi, nkaambo kakuti wamanina Leza milimo sunu! Mbuboobu bantu mbubakavuna Jonatani kuti atafwi.
Lino Saulo wakaboola kuzwa kukutobela ba-Filisti, abalo ba-Filisti bakaya kulimbabo.
Nkabela wakacita cabukozu, wakauma ba-Amaleki akuvuna ba-Israyeli kuzwa kumaanza aabaabo ibakali kubasaala.
Alimwi izina lyamuka-Saulo kali Ahinoamu mwanaakwe Ahimazi, azina lyamusololi wabasilumamba bakwe kali Abineri, mwana wa-Neri mwanike wawisi Saulo.
Alimwi wisi Saulo kali Kisi, alakwe Neri wisi Abineri kali mwanaakwe Abiyeli.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu makamu, wati, Ndakoma ba-Amaleki nkaambo kaceeco ncibakacitila ba-Israyeli kukubakasya munzila kuciindi cakupola kwabo kuzwa ku-Egepita.

Lino koya ukaume ba-Amaleki akusaala zyoonse nzibajisi. Utabafwidi insoni pe, ubajaye boonse nibaba baalumi nibaba banakazi, nibaba bana nibaba bapamba, nibaba basune niziba imbelele, niziba inkamele niziba imbongolo.
Lino Saulo wakasika kumunzi wa-Amaleki, wakalindila cakuyuba mukalonga.

Nkabela Saulo wakaambila ba-Keni wati, Kamuya, mulonge kuzwa mukati kaba-Amaleki, kuti entamujayilizyi antoomwe ambabo, nkaambo mwakafwida luzyalo bana boonse ba-Israyeli nibakapola kuzwa ku-Egepita, Mpawo ba-Keni bakalonga kuzwa mukati kaba-Amaleki.
Lino Saulo wakauma ba-Amaleki kuzwa ku-Havila kusikila ku-Suri munzila iiya ku-Egepita.
Alakwe Agagi mwami waba-Amaleki wakamujata ucipona, nkabela bantu boonse wakabanyonyoona kupanga.

Pele Saulo abantu bakwe bakaleka Agagi ambelele imbotu aŋombe imbotu ambelele zineneede atwana azintu zyoonse zibotu, teebakayanda kuzinyo-nyoona, anukuti zintu zyoonse zisampukide zitakwe milimo ezyo bakazinyonyoona.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Samuele liti,
Ndeempwa kuti ndabika Saulo mubwami, nkaambo kakuti sunu wapiluka kunsi kuzwa kukunditobela, amajwi aangu takaacita pe, Mpawo Samuele wakabijilwa, wakaakulilila Jehova masiku oonse.
Lino nibwakaca Samuele wakafuma kuyoocinga Saulo, elyo Samuele wakaambilwa kuti, Saulo wakasika kuKarimeli, wakalibikila citondezyo, wapiluka kuya buseluka ku-Giligala.
Lino Samuele wakaamba wati, Pele ncinzi oku kulila kwambelele nkundamvwa kumatwi aangu akulila kwaŋombe nkundamvwa?
Lino Saulo wakaamba wati, Bazileta kuzwa ku-Amaleki, nkaambo kakuti bantu bakaleka imbelele imbotu aŋombe imbotu zyakupaizya kuli-Jehova Leza wako, pele zimwi zyoonse bakazinyonyoona.
Mpawo Samuele wakaambila Saulo wati, Lindila! Nkakwaambile eco ncaandaambila Jehova sunu masiku. Nkabela wati, Mbubo! Amba.
Lino Samuele wakaamba wati, Inga uli muniini mumeso aako omwini, nekubaboobo tee nduwe mwami wamikowa ya-Israyeli Jehova wakakunanika mafuta aabwami bwa-Israyeli.
Lino Jehova wakakutuma mulweendo, wakwaambila wati, Koya, ukanyonyoone basizibi ba-Amaleki, ukalwane abo mane ubamaninizye.
Ino nkaambonzi teewakaswiilila majwi aa-Jehova anukuti wakavuumukila zintu zyakusaala akucita zibi mumeso aa-Jehova.
Mpawo Saulo wakaambila Samuele wati, Pe! Ndaswiilila majwi aa-Jehova, ndakatola inzila njaakandituma Jehova, lino ndamuleta Agagi mwami wa-Amaleki, abalo ba-Amaleki ndabanyonyoona.
Pele bantu bakabweza cisaalo cambelele acaŋombe, zitaanzi akati kazintu zyakunyonyoona, kuti bapaizye kuli-Jehova Leza wako mu-Giligala.
Lino Samuele wakaamba wati, Sa Jehova ulabotelwa zipaizyo azituuzyo mbuli kuswiilila majwi aa-Jehova? Bona! Kuswiilila nkubotu kwiinda kupaila, kuzumina nkubotu kwiinda mafuta aabagutu bambelele.

Nkaambo kakuti kupapa ncintu comwe akulowa, akasampusampu ncintu comwe akukomba zikozyano azintu zitakwe milimo. Webo wasampaula majwi aa-Jehova, nkaambo kako alakwe Jehova wasampaula nduwe kuti utabi abwami.
Pele lino ulekelele kubisya kwangu, tubweede ayebo, nkakombe Jehova.
Nkabela Samuele naakavuuluka kuti ainke, wakajata moombe wacikobela cakwe, elyo cakayauka.
Mpawo Samuele wakamwaambila kuti, Jehova wakuyawida bwami bwa-Israyeli mubuzuba obuno, wabupa mweenzinyoko mubotu kwiinda nduwe.
Alimwi Sibulemu wa-Israyeli takonzyi kubeja nikuba kupiluka, nkaambo kakuti tali muntu uulya maila wakukonzya kupiluka pe.
Lino wakaamba kuti, Ndabisya. Nekubaboobo kondilemeka kumeso aabapati babantu bangu akumeso aaba-Israyeli. Tubweede ayebo, nkamukombe Jehova Leza wako.
Lino Samuele wakabweeda kusindikila Saulo, nkabela Saulo wakakomba Jehova.
Lino Samuele wakaamba kuti, Amundiswenezezye kufwaafwi Agagi mwami waba-Amaleki, Nkabela Agagi wakasika calumwemwe, wakaamba kuti, Ncobeni kulula kwalufu kwainda.

Mpawo Samuele wakaamba kuti, Mbubonya mbuli ipanga lyako mbulyakali kujayila banakazi bana babo, abalo banyoko balafwidwa sunu akati kabanakazinyina. Nkabela Samuele wakamugonkoola Agagi kubusyu bwa-Jehova mu-Giligala.
Nkabela Samuele takakamubona limbi Saulo mane kusikila kubuzuba bwakufwa kwakwe, nkaambo Samuele wakali kulilila Saulo, alakwe Jehova wakeempwa kuti wabika bwami bwa-Israyeli mumaanza aa-Saulo.
Mpawo Samuele wakati, Ino njiinke buti? Na Saulo wamvwa, ulandijaya. Nkabela Jehova wakaamba kuti, Bweza moombe mupwizi mujanza lyako, elyo ukaambe kuti, Ndeza kuzoopailila Jehova.
Lino uleelede kwiita Jese kukupaila, elyo nzookuzibya mboelede kucita, nkabela uzoondinanikila oyo ngunzookwaambila.
Mpawo Samuele wakacita mbubonya mbwaakaamba Jehova, wakaakusika ku-Betelehemu. Nkabela basinkuta bamunzi bakali kukankama kukusika kwakwe, bakati, Sa weza caluumuno?
Wakati, Ncaluumuno. Ndeza kuzoopailila Jehova. Amulisalazye, twiinke anywe kuyoopaila. Lino wakasalazya Jese abana bakwe akubaita kukupaila.
Nkabela nibakasika, wakabona Eliabu, elyo wakati, Ncobeni nguuno munanike waJehova waboneka lino kubusyu bwakwe.

Pele Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Utalangi ciwa cakwe nibuba bulamfu bwacimo cakwe, nkaambo ndamukaka. Nkaambo Jehova talangi mbuli mbwalanga muntu pe. Muntu ulabona busyu buyo, pele Jehova ulabona moyo.
Mpawo Jese wakaita Abinadabu akumwiinzya kumeso aa-Samuele. Pele wakati, Alakwe oyu teensi nguwe ngwaasala Jehova.
Mpawo Jese wakainzya Sama, pele wakati, Alakwe oyu teensi nguwe ngwaasala Jehova.
Alimwi jese wakainzya bana bakwe bali musanu ababili kumeso aa-Samuele, pele Samuele wakaambila Jese kuti, Taakwe naba omwe ngwaasala Jehova akati kabaaba.

Lino Samuele wakaambila jese wati, Sa bana bako mpobali boonse awa? Nkabela wakati, Kwasyaala omwe muniini, uleembela imbelele. Mpawo Samuele wakaambila Jese kuti, Tuma, kuti bamulete, nkaambo tatukonzyi kukala cita asike okuno.
Elyo wakatuma kuyoomuleta, nkabela wakali kubalangala akweebeka akubota kwakubotezya meso. Mpoonya awo Jehova wakaamba kuti, Buka, umunanike, nkaambo ngonguwe oyu.
Mpawo Samuele wakabweza luja lwamafuta, wakamunanika akati kabakwabo. Lino Muuya wa-Jehova wakaselukila Davida canguzu kuzwa kubuzuba obo. Nkabela Samuele wakanyamuka kuya ku-Rama.
Elyo bazike ba-Saulo bakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Muuya mubi uuzwa kwa-Leza uli mukukukataazya.

Mwami wesu atwaambile swebo tobazike bakwe notuli waano, kuti tuyandaule umwi muntu uuzi kusobana kantimbwa, elyo kufumbwa ciindi ncoli amuuya oyo mubi uuzwa kwa-Leza ulakusobanina ajanza lyakwe, ulaba kabotu.
Mpawo Saulo wakaambila bazike bakwe kuti, Mbubo, amundilangwide muntu uuzi kabotu kusobana, mumulete kulindime.

Lino umwi wabalanda bakwe wakavuwa wati, Bona! Ndibwene umwi mwana wa-Jese waku-Betelehemu uuzi kusobana, alimwi ngumwaalumi sintaze, muyumu wankondo, ulijisi busongo bwakumvwisya makani, alimwi mweebesi, nkabela Jehova uli awe.
Mpawo Saulo wakatuma batumwa kuli-Jese, wakati, Unditumine mwanaako Davida, oyo uuembela imbelele.
Lino Jese wakabweza imbongolo yakuyumuna zinkwa ankomo yawaini akana kampongo komwe, wakazituma mujanza lya-Davida mwanaakwe kuliSaulo.
Nkabela Davida wakasika kuli-Saulo, wakaima kumeso aakwe, nkabela wakamuyandisya loko, elyo wakaba sikuyumuna zilwisyo zyakwe.
Lino Saulo wakatuma kuli-Jese, wakati, Davida akale okuno kulindime, nkaambo wandibotela loko.
Nkabela kufumbwa ciindi Saulo ncaasikilwa oyo muuya uuzwa kuli-Leza, elyo Davida wabweza kantimbwa kakwe, walizya, mpawo Saulo watontozegwa mumoyo, waba kabotu, muuya mubi wamusia.
Alakwe Saulo abantu ba-Israyeli bakabungana akuyaka malabba aabo mukuti lya-Ela, elyo bakalibambila inkondo kuyoolwana aba-Filisti.
Nkabela ba-Filisti bakaliimvwi atala acilundu kumwi kubbazu, abalo ba-Israyeli bakaliimvwi atala acilundu kumwi kubbazu, akati kakuli mweezi.
Lino kwakazwa muntu sikwiimaakati kuzwa kumalabba aaba-Filisti, izina lyakwe kali Goliati waku-Gati, Bulamfu bwakwe bwakali zikokola zili musanu acimwi acisela.
Kali angowani yamundalila amutwe wakwe, alimwi kasamide cibaki cakulwisya cili amapapa, bulemu bwaco bwakali masekeli aamundalila aali zyuulu zyosanwe.
Kumaulu aakwe kasamide matapisi aamundalila, alimwi wakalikulikide amuumba wamundalila.
Nkabela luti lwasumo lyakwe lwakali mbuli cisamu casikuluka, ayalo nyinza yalyo yakali abulemu bwamasekeli aabutale aali myaanda iili musanu aumwi, Nkabela sikuyumuna intobo wakali kumuzulwida.

Elyo wakaima, wakoongolola kulibasinkondo baba-Israyeli, wakabaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nimwazwa kuzoobamba mindando yakulwana? Sa mebo nsili mu-Filisti, anywebo tamuli balanda ba-Saulo na? Amulisalile muntu, aze okuno kulindime.
Na ulakonzya kundilwisya akundijaya, elyo tulaba bazike banu, pele na muzunde ndime akumujaya, inywe mulaba bazike besu akutubelekela milimo.
Mbuboobu mbwaakaamba oyo mu-Filisti, Wakati, Ndabasampaula basinkondo baba-Israyeli, Amundipe muntu, tulwane awe.
Nkabela Saulo aba-Israyeli boonse nibakamvwa aya majwi aamu-Filisti bakakankama akuyoowa loko,
Nkabela bana ba-Jese bapati botatwe bakainka a-Saulo kunkondo. Mazina aabaaba botatwe ibakainka kunkondo ngaaya: mutaanzi kali Eliabu; wabili kali Abinadabu, awatatu kali Sama.
Davida nguwakali muni ini, nkabela aba botatwe bapati bakainka a-Saulo.
Lino Davida wakali kuya kwa-Saulo akuboola kuzooembela imbelele zyawisi mu-Betelehemu.
Nkabela oyo mu-Filisti lyoonse wakali kuswena kuzooima afwiifwi cifumofumo amangolezya mazuba aali makumi one.
Elyo Jese wakaambila Davida mwanaakwe wati; Batolele bakulana bako eci cisuwo camaila mayoke, azeezi zinkwa zili ikumi, ufwambaane kuya kumalabba kubakulana bako.
Alimwi ezi zinkuli zyabwanda zili ikumi uzitolele silutwe wankamu yabo. Nkabela uleelede kuswaya bakulana bako akundiboozezya cirondezyo cakupona kwabo.
Lino Saulo wakali abo bantu boonse ba-Israyeli mukuti lya-Ela, bakali kulwana aba-Filisti.

Elyo Davida wakafuma loko, wakasia imbelele mumaanza aasikweembela, wakanyamuka, wakainka mbubonya mbuli mbwaakamulailila Jese. Nkabela wakasika nkuzyakabede iŋola ciindi basinkondo ncibakalibambilide inkondo, bakali kuyobeka kuya kunkondo.
Linoba-Israyeli bakaimikila kumwi kubbazu, abalo ba-Filisti bakaimikila kumwi kubbazu.
Mpawo Davida wakasia zintu mumaanza aamulangi, wakazuzaana kunkondo, wakeza kuzoojuzya bakulana bakwe.
Elyo naakacili kwaambaula abo, kwakazwa oyo sikwiimaakati mu-Filisti waku-Gati, izina lyakwe ngu-Goliati. Wakazwa kumilongo yaba-Filisti, wakaamba majwi ayo ngaonya, alakwe Davida wakaaswiilila.
Nkabela bantu boonse ba-Israyeli nibakamubona oyo muntu, bakacija, bakayoowa loko.

Lino bantu ba-Israyeli bakati, Sa mwamubona oyu muntu uulibonya? Ncobeni walibonya kukusampaula Israyeli, Lino na kuli muntu uukonzya kumujaya, mwami ulamupa lubono lunji, alimwi ulamupa mwana wakwe kuti akwate, nkabela ciinga cawisi cilalikalila mu-Israyeli.

Mpawo Davida wakaambila abo bantu mbaakaimvwi abo kuti, Ulacitilwa buti muntu uujaya oyu mu-Filisti akugwisya lusampauko ku-Israyeli? Nkaambo nguni oyu mu-Filisti uutapalwidwe? Sa ulakonzya kusampaula basinkondo ba-Leza muumi na?
Lino bantu bakamwaambila mbubonya obo. Bakati, Mbuboobo mbazoocitilwa muntu uuzoomujaya.

Nkabela Eliabu mupati wakwe wakaswiilila naakali kwaambila bantu, elyo bukali bwa-Eliabu bwakabukila Davida, wakati, Ino nkaambonzi noweza okuno? Nguni ngoosiila oto tubelele munkanda? Ndizi cisapi cako abubi bwamoyo wako, nkaambo nkubona inkondo ncowasikila.
Lino Davida wakati, Ino ndacitanzi? Taakwe makani ngindaamba.
Elyo wakacindulukila kulyuumbi, wakaamba ayo makani ngaonya, nkabela bantu bakavwiila mbubonya mbuli ijwi litaanzi.
Nkabela majwi ngaakaamba akamvwigwa, alimwi bakaatola kuli-Saulo, elyo wakamutumina,
Mpawo Saulo wakaambila Davida kuti, Tokonzyi kuyoolwisya oyu mu-Filisti, pe, nkaambo yebo ucili mwanike, walo ngusinkondo kuzwa kubwanike bwakwe.
Lino Davida wakaambila Saulo kuti, Ime ndemulanda wako nindakali kweembela imbelele zyataata, kwakasika mulavu asuntwe, wakaluma imwi imbelele mubutanga.
Mpawo ndakainka kuyoomutobela, ndakamuuma akwiivuna kumulomo wakwe, nkabela naakandibukila, ndakamujata kucilezu, ndakamuuma akumujaya.
Mulavu asuntwe ndakabajaya boonse, ndemulanda wako, nkabela oyu mu-Filisti uutapalwidwe uzooba mbubonya mbuli umwi wabo, nkaambo wasampaula basinkondo ba-Leza muumi.
Alimwi Davida wakati, Jehova wakandivuna kumaanza aamulavu asuntwe, nkabela nguwe uuzoondivuna kumaanza aamu-Filisti oyu. Mpawo Saulo wakaambila Davida kuti, Koya, Jehova abe ayebo.
Nkabela Saulo wakasamika Davida zyakusama zyakwe, wakabika ingoani yamundalila amutwe wakwe akumusamika zyakulwisya.

Elyo Davida wakaseka ipanga lyakwe atala azyakusama zyakwe, pele wakakacilwa kweenda, nkaambo katazizibide. Lino Davida wakaambila Saulo kuti, Nsikonzyi kweenda azeezi, nkaambo nsizizibide, Nkabela Davida wakazisamununa.

Mpawo wakabweza inkoli mujanza lyakwe, wakaakusala mabwe osanwe aabulungene mukalonga, wakaabika mucibikilo cabweembezi ncaakajisi, munkomo, alyalo inkwilipo lyakali mujanza lyakwe, elyo wakaswena kufwiifwi kumu-Filisti,
Alakwe mu-Filisti wakali kuza buswena kufwiifwi kuli-Davida, nkabela sikuyumuna zintu zyakwe wakamusolweda.
Elyo mu-Filisti naakalanga, wakabona Davida, nkabela wakamusampaula, nkaambo wakacili mwanike, kacibalangala akweebeka kukulanga.
Mpawo mu-Filisti wakaambila Davida kuti, Sa ndi mubwa na, noza kulindime ankoli? Nkabela mu-Filisti kumizimu yakwe wakatukila Davida.
Pele Davida wakaambila mu-Filisti kuti, Webo ulaboola kulindime apanga asumo amuumba, pele mebo ndeza kulinduwe muzina lya-Jehova wamakamu makamu, Leza wabasinkondo ba-Israyeli ngosampaula.

Mubuzuba obuno Jehova ulakwaaba mumaanza aangu, elyo nzookujaya akukukosweda mutwe, ayalo mitunta yamakamu aabasinkondo baba-Filisti sunu ndiipa bayuni bakujulu abanyama baansi, kuti bantu boonse baansi bazoozibe kuti Israyeli uli a-Leza
Abalo aba bantu boonse babungene ano bazoozibe kuti ipanga asumo tazyeensi nzyavunya Jehova pe, nkaambo inkondo njiya-Jehova nkabela ulamwaaba mumaanza esu.
Elyo mu-Filisti naakanyamuka akuza buswena afwiifwi kuzooswaana a-Davida, alakwe Davida wakafwambaana kuzuzaana kunkondo kuyooswaana amu-Filisti.
Lino Davida wakanjizya ijanza munkomo yakwe, wakagwisya ibbwe, wakaliwaala akwizo, wakauma mu-Filisti ankumu. Nkabela elyo ibbwe lyakabbila munkumu, mpawo wakawida ansi watibama.
Mbuboobo Davida mbwaakazunda mu-Filisti abbwe lyakwizo. Wakaunla mu-Filisti akumujaya, pele katakwe ipanga mujanza lya-Davida,

Elyo Davida wakazuzaana, waakumwiiminina muFilisti, wakabweza ipanga lyakwe, wakalisomona mucikanda calyo, wakamujaya, wakamukosola mutwe. Mpawo ba-Filisti nibakabona kuti wafwa sikwiimaakati wabo, bakacija.
Elyo bana ba-Israyeli bakapiluka kuzwa kukutanda ba-Filisti, bakaakusaala zintu zyakumalabba aabo.
Nkabela Davida wakabweza mutwe wamu-Filisti, wakauleta ku-Jerusalemu, azyalo zintu zyakwe wakazibika mutente lyakwe.
Nkabela mwami wakati, Buzya na mwana wani oyu mulombe.
Elyo Davida naakapiluka kuzwa kukujaya mu-Filisti, Abineri wakamubweza, wakamutola kuli-Saulo, amutwe wamu-Filisti mujanza lyakwe.
Lino Saulo wakamwaambila kuti, Nguni uso, mulombe? Nkabela Davida wakati, Ndi mwana wamulanda wako Jese waku-Betelehemu.
Nkabela Saulo wakamutola mubuzuba obo mbubonya, takakamuzumizya kuti apiluke limbi kuliwisi.
Elyo Jonatani a-Davida bakatangana buzolwani, nkaambo wakali kumuyandisya mbuli mbwaliyanda mwini.
Alimwi Jonatani wakasamununa cibaki ncaakasamide, wakapa Davida, azyakusama zyakwe zyoonse, apanga lyakwe abuta bwakwe alutambo lwakwe.
Lino Davida wakaya koonse nkwaakamutuma Saulo, wakacita kabotu, nkabela Saulo wakamupa bwami bwakweendelezya basilumamba, Nkabela wakabota mumeso aabantu boonse amumeso aabalanda ba-Saulo.
Nkabela banakazi ibakali kusekelela bakali kuvwiilana kuti,
Saulo walaya bantu bali zyuulu,
Davida wajaya makumi aazyuulu.
Nkabela Saulo wakali kucenyena Davida kuzwa kubuzuba obo mbubonya.

Lino nibwakaca, oyo muuya mubi uuzwa kwa-Leza wakamuselukila Saulo canguzu, nkabela wakali kulabalika mukati kaŋanda. Elyo Davida wakatalika kulizya kantimbwa mbuli mbwaakali kucita mazuba oonse. Nkabela mujanza lya-Saulo mwakali isumo.
Mpawo Saulo wakaliwaala elyo isumo, wakati, Mujayile kubulambo Davida. Pele Davida wakamusotokela kumbi ziindi zyobile.
Elyo Saulo wakamugwisya kulinguwe, wakamubika kuba silutwe wankamu yacuulu. Nkabela Davida wakali kuya akuboola kumeso aabantu,
alimwi wakali kucita kabotu munzila zyakwe zyoonse, alakwe Jehova wakali awe.
Lino Saulo wakabona mbwaakali kucita kabotu loko, aboobo wakali kukankama kubusyu bwakwe.
Pele boonse ba-Israyeli aba-Juda bakali kuyandisya Davida, nkaambo wakali kuya akuboola kumeso aabo.
Mpawo Davida wakaambila Saulo kuti, Ino mebo ndimeni? Buumi bwangu buli buti? Awalo mukowa wataata uli buti? Sa ndakonzya kuba mukwe wamwami na?
Pele kuciindi eco Merabi mwana wa-Saulo ncakeelede kupegwa Davida wakakwatizigwa kuli-Adrieli muHolati.
Nkabela Mikala mwana musimbi wa-Saulo wakali kuyandisya Davida, elyo bakaambila Saulo, nkabela eyi inkani yakamubotela.
Lino Saulo wakati, Ndamupa, kuti amubede mbuli coongelezyo, kuti ajayigwe kumaanza aaba-Filisti. Mpoonya awo Saulo wakaambila Davida kuti, Sunu ulaba mukwe wangu lwabili.
Elyo Saulo wakalailila balanda bakwe, wakati, Amwaambile Davida kumbali, muteeti, Bona! Mwami wakubotelwa, abalo balanda bakwe boonse balakuyanda. Lino ube mukwe wamwami.
Nkabela balanda ba-Saulo bakaamba aya makani mumatwi aa-Davida, Mpawo Davida wakati, Sa muyeeya kuti ncintu ciniini buyo kuba mukwe wamwami na? Mebo ndi mutengwana, ndi muntu Musampausi buyo.
Lino Saulo bakamwaambila balanda bakwe kuti, Ngaaya makani ngaamba Davida.
Mpawo balanda bakwe bakaambila Davida makani aya, nkabela makani akamubotezya Davida kuba mukwe wamwami. Elyo mazuba kaatana kumana,

Davida wakanyamuka, wakainka, walo abantu bakwe, akujaya ba-Filisti bali myaanda yobile. Mpawo Davida wakaleta indomo zyabo, wakazipa mwami zyoonse, kuti abe mukwe wamwami. Elyo Saulo wakamukwatya Mikala mwana wakwe.
Nkabela Saulo wakabona akuziba kuti Jehova uli a-Davida, alimwi Mikala mwana wa-Saulo wakali kumuyanda.
Lino Saulo wakaindila kumuyoowa Davida, wakali sinkondonyina Davida mazuba oonse.
Elyo Jonatani wakalwiida Davida kuti, Saulo taata uli mukukuyandaula kuti akujaye. Lino ucenjele cifumo, ukakale kusitilide, ukayube.
Nkabela mebo ndaboola kuzooima kumbali ataata oko kusokwe nkobede, nzooambaula ataata aanduwe, elyo na nkabone cintu nzookulwiida.

Wakabika buumi bwakwe mujanza lyakwe, wakazunda ba-Filisti, aboobo Jehova wakacitila Israyeli luvuno lupati, ayebo wakalibonena cakukondwa, Lino nkaambonzi noti bisizye muntu uutajisi mulandu? Nkaambonzi noti mujaye buyo Davida?
Mpawo Saulo naakamvwa ijwi eli lya-Jonatani, wakakonkezya kuti, Ncobeni mbuli Jehova mbali-wo, takoofwa pe.
Elyo Jonatani wakaita Davida, wakamulwiida aya makani oonse, mpawo Jonatani wakaleta Davida kuli-Saulo, nkabela wakakala kulinguwe mbubonya mbwaakakede ciindi.
Lino alimwi kwakaba inkondo, elyo Davida wakaya kuyoolwana abaFilisti, nkabela wakabakoma alukomo lupati, bakamucija.
Pele Saulo wakasikilwa oyo muuya mubi uuzwa kuli-Jehova, nkabela naakakede muŋanda wakalijisi isumo mujanza lyakwe, Elyo Davida wakalizya kantimbwa,

nkabela Saulo wakasoleka kuyasa Davida as umo kuti amusyanikizye kubulambo. Pele wakacija kuzwa kuli-Saulo, isumo lyakwe lyakayasa kubulambo buyo. Mpawo ayo masiku ngaonya Davida wakaloboka akulivuna.
Lino Mikala wakaselusya Davida ampulunguzyo, aboobo wakainka, wakaloboka akulivuna.
Mpawo Mikala wakabweza cikozyano, wacilazika abulo, wabika amusego waboya bwampongo kumutwe waco, akucivumba ingubo.
Elyo Saulo naakatuma batumwa kuyooleta Davida, wakati, Waciswa.
Lino alimwi Saulo wakatuma batumwa kuyoomubona Davida. Wakati, Mukamutembe abulo, mumulete okuno kulindime, nzoomujaye.
Lino abo batumwa nibakasika bakabona kuti abulo ali cikozyano, amusego waboya bwampongo kumutwe waco.

Mpawo Saulo wakaambila Mikala wati, Nkaambonzi nowandeena obo? Nkaambonzi nowamucijisya sinkondoma akumuvuna? Lino Mikala wakavwiila Saulo kuti, Nguwakandaambila kuti, Ndicijisya kumbi. Watandicijisya ndakujaya.
Nkabela Saulo wakaambilwa kuti, Bona! Davida uli ku-Nayoti ku-Rama.

Mpawo Saulo wakatuma batumwa kuyoomuleta Davida, pele nibakabona inkamu yabasinsimi balasinsima a-Samuele uliimvwi mbuli silutwe wabo, elyo Muuya wa-Leza wakabasikila abo batumwa ba-Saulo, mpawo bakasinsima abalo.
Lino nibakalwiida Saulo, wakatuma abambi batumwa, pele abalo aba bakasinsima. Alimwi Saulo wakatuma batumwa bambi lwatatu, abaaba abalo bakasinsima mbubonya.
Mpawo wakainka alakwe mwini ku-Rama, wasika kucikala cipati cakuSeku, wabuzya kuti, Ino bali kuli Samuele a-Davida? Nkabela bakati, Bali ku-Nayoti ku-Rama.
Mpawo naakazwa oko wakaya ku-Nayoti kuRama, nkabela Muuya wa-Leza wakamusikila alakwe mwini, wakali kuya businsima mane wakasika ku-Nayoti ku-Rama.
Mpawo wakasamununa zikobela zyakwe, wasinsima alakwe kubusyu bwa-Samuele. Nkabela wakawida ansi acintanda obo buzuba boonse isikati amasiku. Nciceeco ncibaambila kuti, Sa Saulo alakwe musinsimi?
Lino Davida wakacija kuzwa ku-Nayoti ku-Rama, wakaakwaambila Jonatani kuti, Ino ndacitanzi? Ndi amulandunzi? Ndabisyanzi kulibauso? Nkaambo ulayandaula kundijaya.
Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Ne! Tokoofwa pe. Ncobeni taata taciti cintu niciba comwe, niciba cipati niciba ciniini, cita asaangune kundaambila. Lino andisise buti kumakani aya? Takuli boobo pe.

Pele Davida wakakonka lwabili, wati, Ncobeni uso ulizi kuti ndi muyandwi wako, nciceeco ncaambila kuti, Jonatani atamvwi makani aya, atausi. Nekubaboobo mbuli Jehova mbwali muumi, ambuli nduwe mboli muumi, kwasyaala intaamu yomwe luzutu kuti mfwe.
Mpawo Jonatani wakaambila Davida kuti, Kufumbwa cintu ncuuyanda moyo wako ndakucitila ncico.
Nkabela Davida wakaambila Jonatani kuti, Bona! Junza ulakala mweezi, Nindakala amwami kulya, pele uleelede kundicijisya nkayube musokwe mane kusikila izona magolezya.
Na uso wandizula, elyo umwaambile kuti, Ncobeni Davida wakandilaya kuti, Njiinke ku-Betelehemu kumunzi wangu, nkaambo kuli ipobwe lyakupaila lyamukowa wangu woonse nditupaila myaaka yoonse.
Na waamba kuti, Ncibotu, elyo nzooba kabotu ndemulanda wako. Pele na wakalalisya, elyo uzibe kuti ulindikanzilide bubi.
Lino uleelede kundifwida luzyalo ndemulanda wako, nkaambo ulitangene ambe ndemulanda wako buzolwani bwa-Jehova, Pele na ndijisi mulandu, undijaye yebo omwini, Nkaambonzi nondileta kulibauso?
Mpawo jonatani wakaamba kuti, Ne, cilatondwa! Nkaambo na ndazibisya kuti bata balikukanzilide bubi, elyo ncobeni nzooza kuzookulwiida.
Lino Davida wakaambila Jonatani kuti, Ino nguni uuti ndaambile na bauso bakuvwiila cabukali?
Nkabela Jonatani wakaambila Davida kuti, Koza, tweende musokwe. Mpawo bakaya boonse bobile musokwe.

Jehova acitile Jonatani mbubonya, nanka kwiindila kuti bata balayanda kukucitila bubi pele mebo ndakaka kusinkula matwi aako akukucijisya kuti uinke caluumuno. Jehova abe ayebo mbubonya mbwaakali abata.
Nkabela uleelede kundifwida luzyalo lwaJehova ambebo kuti entafwi. Alimwi teensi kwaamba kuti ciindi ncencipona cilike,
pele uleelede kwiifwida luzyalo mizukulu yangu mazuba oonse ciindi Jehova ncamana kubanyonyoona boonse basinkondonyina Davida kuzwa ansi ano.
Mbuboobo Jonatani mbubakatangana cizuminano amukowa wa-Davida. Wakati, Jehova akoyeke basinkondonyina Davida.
Nkabela Jonatani wakaboola lwabili kukonkya Davida kuluyando ndwaakamuyandisya, nkaambo wakali kumuyandisya mbubonya mbuli mbwaakaliyanda mwini.
Lino Jonatani wakamwaambila kuti, Junza ulakala mweezi, lino yebo uzoozulwa, nkaambo cuuno cako cizookala buyo.
Elyo amana mazuba otatwe ngotawo uleelede kuboola nkukonya oko nkookayubide ciindi ncitwakali­ kwaamba makani, uzookale kumbali abbwe eli.
Nkabela mebo nzoofusa mivwi yotatwe kuzooba ange mfusa cintu.
Elyo nzootuma mulombe kuti, Koya ukalete mivwi. Lino na ndati, Mivwi ili okuno kubbazu, uboole awe, nkaambo nkokuti uli kabotu, taakwe makani mbuli Jehova mbali muumi.
Pele na ndaambila mulombe kuti, Langa! Mivwi icili kunembo lyako, elyo uye, nkaambo Jehova wakucijisya.
Lino kumakani aya ngitwaamba, Jehova uli akati kesu tobile mane kusikila kutamani.
Nkabela mwami wakakala mpawo mpaakali kukala lyoonse, kucuuno cakubulambo, Jonatani bakalangana awe, Abineri wakakede kubbazu lya-Saulo, pele acuuno ca-Davida katakwe wakakede.
Nkabela obo buzuba Saulo taakwe ncaakaamba pe, nkaambo wakali kuyeeya kuti, Ambweni kuli camucelezya, Ambweni takaina kusamba, takaina kulilondola.
Pele nibwakaca buzuba bwabili bwamweezi, cuuno ca-Davida kacitakwe iwakakede. Mpawo Saulo wakaambila jonatani mwanaakwe kuti, Ino nkaambonzi mwana wa-Jese natasika kukulya mazuba obile ijilo asunu?
Lino Jonatani wakavwiila Saulo kuti, Ncobeni Davida wakandilaya kuti, Nje ku-Betelehemu.

Wakati, Njiinke, nkaambo bamukowa wangu balijisi ipobwe kumunzi, nkabela mupati wangu wandilazya kuti, Uboole. Lino na ulandiyanda, ndizumizya kuti njiinke, nkabone bakwesu. Nciceeco ncaatasikila kuzoolya amwami.
Mpawo Saulo wakanyemena Jonatani, wakati, Uwe nomwana wamwanakazi simeso-meso sigama, sa tozi kuti obu buzolwani mbotangene amwana wa-Jese bulausya bweeme, bulausya cintanda cabanyoko?
Nkaambo ciindi coonse ncacipona mwana wa-Jese, tokonzyi kusimpikizigwa bwami yebo, Lino tuma ukamuboozye okuno kulindime, nkaambo uleelede kufwa.
Elyo Jonatani wakavwiila Saulo wisi kuti, Ino afwidenzi? Wakacitanzi?
Mpawo Saulo wakamufusa isumo, kuti amuyase. Mbuboobu Jonatani mbwaakaziba kuti wisi ulikanzide kujaya Davida.

Lino Jonatani wakanyampuka kuzwa kutafule cakufundilila abukali, takakalya insima kubuzuba obo bwabili bwamweezi, pe, nkaambo wakali abuusu mumoyo wakwe nkaambo ka-Davida, ikuti wisi wakamuusya bweeme.
Lino nibwakaca jonatani wakaya musokwe mbubonya mbwaakabambide a-Davida, wakaya akalombe kani ini.
Elyo wakaambila kalombe kuti, Zuzaana, ukalete mivwi njinti fuse. Nkabela kalombe nikakacili kuzuzaana, wakafusa muvwi kunembo lyakwe.
Lino kalombe nikakasika oko nkuwakabede muvwi ngwaakafusa Jonatani, Jonatani wakaongolweda kalombe, wati, Sa muvwi tuucili kunembo na?
Alimwi Jonatani wakoongolweda kalombe kuti, Fwambaana, endesya, utaimi-imi. Nkabela kalombe kaJonatani kakabweza mivwi, kakaboola ayo kumwami wakwe.
Pele kalombe kaatakwe ncakazi pe, jonatani a-Davida luzutu mbibakezi aya makani.
Mpawo Jonatani wakapa kalombe kakwe zintu zyakwe, wakuti, Koya, utole kumunzi.
Elyo kalombe mbukakainka buyo, Davida wakayubunuka kuzwa kumbali abbwe, nkabela wakavundama ansi akukotama kotatwe, alimwi bakamyontana akulililana mane Davida wakaindisya kulila.

Lino jonatani wakaambila Davida kuti, Koya aluumuno, mbubonya mbuli mbutwakakonkezyanya toonse tobile muzina lya-Jehova kuti, Jehova abe akati kesu tobile, aakati kabana bangu abana bako mane kukabe kutamani, Mpawo Davida wakanyamuka, wakainka, alakwe Jonatani wakapiluka kumunzi.

Mpawo Davida wakaambila Ahimeleki mupaizi kuti, Mwami wakandilailila makani, alimwi wakandaambila kuti, Kutabi muntu uuziba abuniini makani aya ngindakutumina, ngindakulailila. Aboobo ndibikilide balombe kuli banyomfwi.
Lino ujisinzi okuno? Undipe zinkwa zyosanwe nanka kufumbwa cintu ncojisi.
Mpawo mupaizi wakavwiila Davida kuti, Nsijisi zinkwa ziligwa bantu buyo pe, pele zinkwa zisalazidwe nkuzili. Na balombe balitimizizye kuya kubanakazi, mbubo.

Nkabela Davida wakavwiila mupaizi kuti, Ncobeni twakacelezegwa kuya kubanakazi mazuba otatwe, alimwi ciindi eco ncindakanyampuka, inkomo zyabalombe zyakasalala, nikuba kuti lweendo lwesu ndwabantu buyo, lino sunu ncobeni inkomo zyabo zilainda kusalala.
Elyo mupaizi wakamupa zinkwa zisalazidwe, nkaambo kakutakwe zinkwa zimbi pele zinkwa zituulidwe zilike izyakagwisigwa kuzwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova kuti kubikwe zimwi zicipya mubuzuba obo mbubonya.
Mpawo Davida wakaambila Ahimeleki kuti, Sa taakwe isumo nunka ipanga okuno kulinduwe? Nkaambo nsiletede ipanga lyangu azintu zyangu, nkaambo makani aamwami akandibinzya.

Nkabela mupaizi wakati, Mpolili ipanga lya-Goliati muFilisti, nguwe ngowakajaya mumumpata wa-Ela. Lilizambaidwe mucisani okuno kusule lyacikobela cabupaizi. Na ulayanda kulitola, litole, nkaambo taakwe limbi okuno. Mpawo Davida wakati, Taakwe limbi lili mbuli leeli, amundipe.
Mbuboobo Davida mbwaakanyamuka mubuzuba obo akucija kuzwa kuli-Saulo, Nkabela wakasika kuli-Akisi mwami wa-Gati.
Mpawo balanda ba-Akisi bakamwaambila kuti, Sa oyu teensi Davida mwami wacisi? Sa teensi nguwe ngubakali kwaamba nibakali kuzyana akuvwiilana kuti,
Saulo wajaya bantu bali zyuulu,
Davida wajaya makumi aazyuulu?
Mpawo wakasandula ziyanza zyakwe kumeso aabo, wakalisondosya-sondosya, wakagwala-gwala kuzitendele zyamilyango, akumbwembwelesya mate kucilezu cakwe.
Lino Akisi wakaambila balanda bakwe kuti, Sa tamubwene kuti oyu muntu wasondoka? Mwamuletelanzi kulindime?
Sa njanda basondosi? Sa nciceeco ncimwamuletela okuno, kuti alisondosesye kulindime? Sa oyu muntu uleelede kunjila muŋanda yangu?
Mpawo kwakayoboloka kulinguwe boonse bantu ibakapengede aboonse ibakajisi zikoloto aboonse ibakabijilidwe mumyoyo, wakaba mwami wabo, nkabela abo ibakaba awe kabali mbuli myaanda yone.
Elyo wakabatola kumwami waMoabu, nkabela bakakala awe mazuba oonse Davida ngaakakede mumpangala.
Lino musinsimi Gadi wakaambila Davida kuti, Toelede kukala mumpangala. Kozwa, uye kucisi ca-Juda. Mpawo Davida wakainka, wakatozya kulusaka lwa-Hereti.

Lino Saulo wakamvwa kuti Davida ulijenwe, abantu mbaakali abo. Nkabela Saulo wakakede mu-Gibeya munsi lyamusika wamu-Rama, isumo lyakwe lyakali mujanza lyakwe, abalanda bakwe boonse bakaliimvwi kulinguwe.

Mpawo Saulo wakaambila balanda bakwe mbakaimvwi abo kuti, Amuswiilile nubana ba-Benjamini. Sa mwana wa-Jese ulampua nyoonse nyika yakulima amyuunda yamasaansa na? Sa ulamucita basilutwe bankamu zyacuulu azyamwaanda na?

Ino nkaambonzi nyoonse mwandivwiya kuti kutabi naba omwe uundaambila makani aya aakuti mwanaangu ulitangene buzolwani amwana wa-Jese? Taakwe akati kanu uundifwida insoni akundaambila mwanaangu mbwaabusya sinkondoma kuti andiyubilile mbuli mbwacita sunu.
Nkabela mpawo wakamvwa Doegi mu-Edomi, ngonguwe iwakajisi bwami bwabalanda ba-Saulo, wakati, Ndakamubona mwana wa-Jese wakasika ku-Nobi kuli-Ahimeleki mwana wa-Ahitubu.
Nkabela wakamubuzizya kuli-Jehova akumupa bulilu, alimwi wakamupa ipanga lya-Goliati mu-Filisti.
Mpawo mwami wakatuma kuyoomwiita Ahimeleki mwana wa-Ahirubu mupaizi, abalo boonse bamukowa wawisi bapaizi baku-Nobi, Elyo boonse bakasika kumwami.
Lino Saulo wakati, Swiilila, mwana wa-Ahitubu. Wakavuwa kuti, Mpendi, mwami.
Nkabela Saulo wakamwaambila kuti, Nkaambonzi nomwandivwiya amwana wa-Jese? Nkaambonzi wamupa zilyo apanga, akumubuzizya kuli-Jehova, kuti andibukile akundiyubilila mbwacita sunu?
Lino Ahimeleki wakavuwa kuti, Ma! Nguni akati kabalanda bako boonse uusyomeka mbuli Davida? Sa teensi mukwe wamwami na? Sa teensi silutwe wabasikukulanga na? Sa tali mulemu muŋanda yako na?

Lino ntalike buti sunu kumubuzizya kuli-Leza? Ndicitondedwe. Mwami atandibiki kaambo, mebo nanka basimukowa boonse babata, nkaambo mebo ndemulanda wako taakwe cintu ncenzi, niciba cipati niciba ciniini, kumakani aya ngoamba.
Elyo mwami wakati, Ncobeni uleelede kufwa, Ahimeleki, webo abasimukowa boonse babauso.

Mpawo mwami wakaambila batumwa mbaakaimvwi abo wati, Amuboole, mubajaye bapaizi ba-Jehova, nkaambo abalo balagwasya Davida, nkaambo bakalizi kuti waloboka, pele teebakandilwiida makani pe, Pele balanda bamwami teebakali kuyanda kuti maanza aabo abaume bapaizi ba-Jehova.

Lino mwami wakaambila Doegi kuti, Boola webo, ukabaume bapaizi. Elyo Doegi mu-Edomi wakaboola kuzoobauma bapaizi, nkabela mubuzuba obo wakajaya bantu bali makumi aali musanu aatatu abasanu ibakasamide cikobela cituba cabupaizi.
Awalo Nobi munzi wabapaizi wakausaala apanga, Baalumi abanakazi, bana balesi abacinyonka, iŋombe ambongolo ambelele, zyoonse buyo wakaziiaya apanga.
Pele kwakaloboka umwi mwana wa-Ahimeleki mwana wa-Ahirubi, izina lyakwe kali Abiyatare. Oyu Abiyatare wakacijila kuli-Davida,
wakamwaambila kuti, Saulo uliiayide bapaizi ba-Jehova.
Nkabela Davida wakaambila Abiyatare kuti, Mubuzuba obo mbwaakaliwo Doegi mu-Edomu, ndakaziba kuti ncobeni ulaambila Saulo. Ndime ndakaletelezya lufu lwabasimukowa babauso boonse.
Atukale ayebo. Utayoowi pe, nkaambo oyo uuyandaula kundinyanzya buumi bwangu ngonguwe uuyandaula kukunyanzya buumi ayebo. Ndakubamba kabotu.
Mpawo Davida wakabuzya kuli-Jehova kuti, Sa njiinke kuyoobauma aba ba-Filisti? Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Davida kuti, Koya, ukabaume ba-Filisti akuvuna Kcila.
Pele bantu ba-Davida bakamwaambila kuti, Tuli mukuyoowa omuno mucisi ca-Juda. Ncobeni tulainda kuyoowa na twaya oko ku-Kcila nkubabede basinkondo baba-Filisti.
Lino Davida wakabuzya lwabili kuli-Jehova, nkabela Jehova wakavuwa kuti, Nyamuka, uinke ku-Kcila, nkaambo ndabaleta ba-Filisti mumaanza aako.
Elyo Davida wakainka abantu bakwe ku-Kcila kuyoolwana aba-Filisti, nkabela wakasaala iŋombe zyabo akubauma aluumo lupati. Mbuboobo Davida mbwaakavuna bantu ba-Kcila.
Lino Saulo wakaambilwa kuti, Davida wasika ku-Kcila. Mpawo Saulo wakati, Leza wamwaaba mumaanza aangu, nkaambo uliialilidwe mbwaaniilila mumunzi uuli amakoma ambaya.
Lino Saulo wakabunganya bantu boonse kuya kunkondo ku-Kcila kuyoomusinkilizya Davida abantu bakwe.
Nkabela Davida naakaziba kuti Saulo uli mukumukanza bubi, wakaambila Abiyatare mupaizi kuti, Leta okuno cikobela cabupaizi.
Mpawo Davida wakati, O Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, swiililisya ndime ndemulanda wako, nkaambo Saulo ulayanda kuza ku-Kcila kuzoomwaya munzi nkaambo kandime.
Sa bantu ba-Kcila balandaaba mumaanza aakwe? Sa Saulo uleza mbubonya mbuli mbemvwide ndemulanda wako? O Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, kondilwiida ndemulanda wako. Nkabela Jehova wakati, Uleza.
Lino Davida wakabuzya kuti, Sa bantu ba-Kcila balandaaba, mebo abantu bangu, mumaanza aa-Saulo? Nkabela Jehova wakati, Balamwaaba.

Mpawo Davida wakanyamuka abantu bakwe bali mbuli myaanda iili musanu aumwi, wakazwa ku-Kcila, wakali kuya bweendeenda kufumbwa nkwaaya, Nkabela Saulo naakaambilwa kuti, Davida waloboka ku-Kcila, wakasaya.
Lino Davida wakabona kuti Saulo uza bumuyandaula kuti amujaye, nkabela Davida wakali munkanda ya-Zifu mucisaka.
Mpawo Jonatani mwana wa-Saulo wakanyamuka, wainka kuli-Davida oko kucisaka akumuyumyayumya muliLeza.
Wakamwaambila kuti, Utayoowi, nkaambo tokoonjizigwa mumaanza aa-Saulo taata, pe. Uyooba mwami wa-Israyeli, nkabela mebo nzooba wabili kulinduwe. Alakwe Saulo taata ulizi obo.
Elyo abo bobile bakatangana cizuminano kubusyu bwa-Jehova, nkabela Davida wakasyaala mucisaka, Jonatani wakabweeda kulinguwe.
Lino, O mwami, boola mbuli moyo wako mbuusukeme kuboola, nkabela iswe tuyoomwaaba mumaanza aamwami.
Mpawo Saulo wakati, Jehova amulongezye, mbuli mbumwandifwida insoni.
Kamuya lino, kamuciya businizya, mukazibe mweenya wakwe nkuubede nkwayubide. Nguni uumubwene? Ndaambilwa kuti ngusimaanu loko.
