Mukalange, mukazibe ziyubilo zyakwe zyoonse nzyayubila, elyo mwaakuzizibisya mukaboole kulindime, nkabela nzooinke anywe. Na nkwali, nzoomujana ndazoomuyandaula akati kazyuulu zyoonse zya-Juda.
Mpawo bakanyamuka, bamuzulwida Saulo kuya ku-Zifi, Nkabela Davida abantu bakwe bakali munkanda ya-Maoni mucimpayuma cili kululyo lyagundu.
Lino Saulo abantu bakwe bakaya kuyoomuyandaula, nkabela Davida naakaambilwa obo wakaya kumwaala, wakaakukala munkanda ya-Maoni. Nkabela Saulo naakamvwa wakamutobela Davida munkanda ya-Maoni.

Lino Saulo wakainda kumwi kubbazu lyacilundu, alakwe Davida abantu bakwe bakainda kumwi kubbazu lyacilundu, aboobo Davida wakalibindeene kucija Saulo. Nkabela Saulo abantu bakwe bakazinga Davida abantu bakwe kuti babajate.
Elyo kwakasika mutumwa kuli-Saulo, wakati, Fwambaana kuboola, nkaambo baFilisti beza kuzoosaala nyika.
Mpawo Saulo wakapiluka kuzwa kukutobela Davida, wakaya kuyoolwana aba-Filisti. Nciceeco oyo mweenya nciwakaulikwa kuti, Mwaalawacilobokelo.
Lino Davida wakainka kuyookala mumampangala aaku-Engedi.
Mpawo Saulo waka­ bweza bantu bali zyuulu zyotatwe basalidwe kuzwa kuba-Israyeli boonse, wakaya abo kuyooyandaula Davida abantu bakwe atala amyaala nkuzikala insense.
Nkabela wakasika kuzibondo zyambelele, alimwi kakuli impangala­ oko nkukonya. Elyo Saulo wakanjila kuyoolala, nkabela Davida abantu bakwe bakalikede mukati muzyooko zyampangala.

Lino bantu ba-Davida bakamwaambila kuti, Langa! Bwasika buzuba mbwaakakwaambila Jehova kuti, Bona, njooaba sinkondonyoko mumaanza aako, kuti umucitile mbubonya mbuli mboyanda mumoyo wako, Mpawo Davida wakanyamuka, wakasisikizya kutendulula moombe wacikobela ncaakasamide Saulo.
Pele naakamana obo, moyo wakwe wakanyotwa nkaambo kakutendulula moombe wacikobela ca-Saulo.
Elyo wakaambila bantu bakwe kuti, Jehova anditondye kucita obo kumwami munanike wa-Jehova, Ijanza lyangu limuume buti, mbwali munanike wa-Jehova?
Mbuboobo Davida mbwaakakasya bantu bakwe, kuti batabukile Saulo. Elyo Saulo wakanyamuka kuzwa kumpangala, wakatalika kweenda munzila.
Mpawo musule Davida alakwe wakanyamuka, wakazwa mumpangala, wakoongolola Saulo, wakati, Simalelaangu O Mwami! Lino Saulo wakaceba, nkabela Davida wakavundama ansi akumukotamina.
Mpawo Davida wakaambila Saulo kuti, Ino nkaambonzi noswiilila majwi aabantu aakuti, Davida ulayanda kukunyonganya?

Bona! Sunu walibonena omwini ameso aako Jehova mbwaakakwaaba mumaanza aangu mumpangala, nkabela ndakaambilidwe kukujaya, pele ndakufwida luzyalo. Ndati, Nsikonzyi kuvungununa ijanza lyangu kulisimalelo angu, nkaambo ngumunanike waJehova.

Alimwi bona, ta, nguuno moombe wacikobela cako mujanza lyangu. Bona mbundatendulula moombe wacikobela cako akutakujaya, uzibe kuti taakwe bubi nanka mulandu mumaanza aakwe. Nsina kukubisizya pe, nekubaboobo webo ulayubilila buumi bwangu kuti undinyanzye.
Jehova atubeteke yebo ambebo, Jehova nguuyoondikoyekela nduwe, pele ijanza lyangu ndemwini taliyandi pe.
Mbuli mbukaamba kasimpi kabasikale kati, Bubi bulazwa kubabi. Tokooyoobisizigwa kujanza lyangu pe.
Lino nguni ngwaza butobela mwami wa-Israyeli? Nguni ngoza butanda? Ulatobela mubwa uufwide. Ulatobela injina buyo.
Lino Jehova nguuti be mubetesi wesu, nguuti tubeteke yebo ambebo. Ulalanga ulavuninina makani aangu akundifutula kumaanza aako,
Nkabela wakaambila Davida kuti, Webo uliluleme kwiinda ndime, nkaambo wandibweedezezya bubotu, pele mebo ndakakucitila bubi.
Wandilwiida sunu bubotu mbuwandicitila, nkaambo Jehova walindaabide mumaanza aako, pele tokokandijaya pe.
Na muntu wajana sinkondonyina, sa ulamuleka kuti ainke caluumuno? Jehova ulakubweedezezya bubotu nkaambo kaceeci ncondicitila sunu.
Lino ndizi kuti ncobeni nduwe ooyooba mwami. Bwami bwa-Israyeli buyooima nji mumaanza aako.
Lino kondikonkezezya kuli-Jehova kuti, ndaakufwa utakandimaninizizyi inyungu zyangu nikuba kundinyonyoonina izina lyangu mumukowa wataata.
Nkabela Davida wakamukonkezezya obo, Mpawo Saulo waka ya kulimbabo, alakwe Davida abantu bakwe bakabweeda kumampangala.

Izina lyakwe kali Nabala, azina lyamukakwe kali Abigayeli, nkabela mwanakazi kali musongo, alimwi kali mweebesi, pele mulumi kali sicizindwe, ayalo milimo yakwe yakali mibi, nkabela wakali wamukowa wa-Kalebe.
Lino Davida naakali munkanda wakamvwa kuti Nabala uli mukugela imbelele zyakwe ku-Karameli.
Elyo Davida wakatuma balombe bali ikumi, wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya ku-Karameli kuli-Nabala, mukamujuzye muzina lyangu,
mukaambe kuti, Mwabonwa! Mupone kabotu, webo abamukowa wako aboonse bantu mbokede abo.
Ndamvwa kuti bageli nkubali kulinduwe. Lino beembezi bako twakali abo, nkabela teetwakabakataazya pe, alimwi katakwe cintu ncibakabbidwa ciindi coonse ncibakakede kuKarameli.
Buzya balombe bako, balakwaambila. Lino aba balombe bangu bafwidwe luzyalo kumeso aako, nkaambo twasika mubuzuba bubotu. Kopa kufumbwa cintu ncojisi kulindiswe tubalanda bako akuli-Davida mwanaako.
Elyo balombe ba-Davida nibakasika kuli-Nabala, bakamwaambila mbuli aya majwi oonse muzina lya-Davida, lino bakaumuna.
Mpawo Nabala wakavwiila balanda ba-Davida kuti, Ino nguni Davida? Amwana wa-Jese nguni? Sunu bavula balanda baloboka kulibasimalelo babo.
Sa mbweze insima yangu amaanzi aangu anyama yangu njindajayila bageli bangu akupa bantu mbentezi nkubazwa?
Mpawo balombe ba-Davida bakapiluka munzila yabo, bakaboola kuzoomwaambila mbuli aya majwi oonse.

Lino Davida wakaambila bantu bakwe kuti, Amulyaangile umwi aumwi ipanga lyakwe. Nkabela boonse bakalyaangila mapanga, alakwe Davida mwini wakalyaangila ipanga lyakwe, Mpawo kwakaya bantu bali myaanda yone kutobela Davida, alimwi bali myaanda yobile bakasyaalila zintu zyabo.
Pele umwi wabalombe wakaambila Abigayeli muka-Nabala kuti, Swiilila! Davida wakatuma batumwa kuzwa kunkanda kuzoojuzya mwami wesu, pele wakabakalalila loko.
Pele aba bantu bakali babotu loko kulindiswe. Teetwakakataazigwa nanka kubbidwa cintu mazuba oonse ngitwakeenda abo musokwe.
Bakatubeda mbuli lubaya isikati amasiku mazuba oonse ngitwakali abo mukweembela imbelele.
Lino bona! Koyeeya mboelede kucita, nkaambo mwami wesu abaŋanda bakwe boonse balikanzilidwe bubi. Ncobeni mwana wa-Saatani uutakonzyi kwaambilwa ijwi niliba lyomwe.
Nkabela wakaambila balombe kuti, Kamuya kunembo, mebo ndeza musule. Pele mulumaakwe Nabala takakamwaambila cintu pe.
Lino naakacili kweenda ambongolo akuya buseluka kuzwa kubusena busisidwe bwakucilundu, Davida abantu bakwe bakali kuza kuzoomucinga, aboobo bakaswaanana.
Leza acitile Davida mbubonya obu na kwiinda, na ndamusiila mwana mwaalumi naba omwe kusikila kukuca.
Elyo wakawida kumaulu aakwe, akumwaambila kuti, O mwami, mulandu ube wangu. Ndemulanda wako ngambe kumatwi aako, Swiilila majwi aangu ndemulanda wako.

Mwami wangu atabiki moyo wakwe kuliyooyu munaSaatani, kuli-Nabala, nkaambo uli mbubonya mbuli izina lyakwe. Izina lyakwe ngu-Nabala (nkukuti Mufubafuba), nkabela ncobeni uli abufubafuba. Pele mebo ndemulanda wako teendakabona balombe bamwami mbokatuma.

Lino mwami, kubuumi bwa-Jehova akubuumi bwako, ncobeni Jehova nguwakukasya kuza kuzootila bulowa akulikoyeka ajanza lyako omwini. Lino basinkondonyoko aboonse bantu bakanza bubi kumwami wangu babe mbubonya mbuli Nabala.
Lino eci cipo ncindaleta ndemulanda wako, acipegwe kubalombe batobela mwami wangu.
Kolekelela mulandu wamu landa wako, nkaambo Jehova ulayakila mwami wangu iŋanda iimvwi nji, nkaambo mwami ulalwana inkondo zya-Jehova, nkabela taakwe bubi abuniini bujanwa mulinduwe mazuba oonse.

Nkwali muntu uukutanda akuyandaula buumi bwako, nekubaboobo buumi bwamwami wangu bulaangidwe mucifunte cabuumi cili kuli-Jehova Leza wako, pele buumi bwabasinkondonyoko ulabufusa mbuli cintu cifusigwa akwizo.
Lino Jehova nazoocitila mwami wangu bubotu boonse mbwaambide akukupa bwami bwa-Israyeli,
elyo tokoozooba abuusu nanka kupenga mumoyo nkaambo kakutila bulowa butakwe mulandu akulikoyeka ajanza lyako omwini. Nkabela Jehova nazookucitila bubotu, kozooyeeya ndime ndemulanda wako.
Bulumbwe busongo bwako, ayebo omwini ulumbwe, nkaambo nduwe wandikasya sunu kutila bulowa akulikoyeka ajanza lyangu ndemwini.
Nkaambo ncobeni mbwali muumi Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, nguwe iwakandikasya kukucitila bubi, notafwambaana kuza kuzoondicinga, nikwataakusyaala kuli-Nabala junza cifumo mwana mwaalumi naba omwe,
Mpawo Davida wakatambula kuzwa kumaanza aakwe ezyo nzyaakamuletela. Elyo wakamwaambila kuti, Koya aluumuno kulinduwe. Bona! Ndaswiilila majwi aako. Ndazumina ncoamba.
Pele cifumo naakakolololwa, mukakwe wakamwaambila aya makani, elyo wakafwida mumoyo, wakaba mbuli ibbwe.
Nkabela nikwakainda mazuba aali mbuli ikumi, Jehova wakauma Nabala, wakafwa.

Mpawo Davida naakamvwa kuti Nabala wakafwa, wakati, Alumbwe Jehova iwakabeteka makani aalusampauko lwangu ndundakasampaulwa kuli-Nabala! Wakandikasya ndemulanda wakwe kucita bubi, alimwi bubi bwa-Nabala Jehova wakabubweedezya amutwe wakwe mwini.
Elyo Davida wakatumina Abigayeli kuti amukwate.
Lino balanda baDavida nibakasika kuli-Abigayeli ku-Karameli, bakamwaambila kuti, Davida watutuma kulinduwe kuzookutola, kuti ube mukakwe.
Mpawo wakabuka, wakakotamika busyu bwakwe ansi, wakati, Ndemulanda wako nkoombe muzike wakusanzya maulu aabalanda bamwami wangu.
Elyo Abigayeli wakafwambaana kunyamuka, wakatanta imbongolo, alimwi bamwi basimbi bakwe bosanwe bakamusindikila ansi. Nkabela wakatobela batumwa baDavida, wakaba mukakwe.
Pele Mikala mwana wa-Saulo, muka-Davida, Saulo wakamupa Paliti mwana wa-Layisi uuzwa ku-Galimu.
Mpawo Saulo wakanyamuka, wakainka kunkanda ya-Zifi, abantu ba-Israyeli basalidwe bali zyuulu zyotatwe, Bakaya kuyooyandaula Davida munkanda ya-Zifi.
Nkabela Saulo wakayaka malabba aakwe mumalundu aa-Hakila aali kunembo lyagundu kumbali aanzila, Lino Davida naakakede munkanda, wakabona kuti Saulo wasika nkukonya kunkanda kuzoomuyandaula.
Elyo Davida wakatuma basikutwela, nkabela naakazibisya kuti Saulo wasika ncobeni,

ndilyonya Davida wakanyamuka, wakaya oko Saulo nkwaakayakide malabba aakwe. Nkabela Davida wakabona Saulo nkwaakalede, a-Abineri mwana wa-Neri silutwe wabasinkondo bakwe. Saulo wakalilede akati kanola, abantu boonse bakalilede balimuzingulukide.
Mpawo Davida wakaambila Ahimeleki mu-Hiti a-Abisai mwana waZeruya munyina Joabu kuti, Nguni uuti ndisindikile kuli-Saulo kumalabba? Lino Abisai wakati, Mebo ndakusindikila.

Elyo Davida a-Abisai bakasika masiku nkubakabede bantu, nkabela Saulo wakalilede, wakali kuona, akati kanola, asumo lyakwe lyakalisekedwe ansi kumutwe wakwe. Alakwe Abineri abantu boonse bakalilede, bakalimuzingulukide.
Mpawo Abisai wakaambila Davida kuti, Sunu Leza wamwaaba sinkondonyoko mumaanza aako. Lino nkoomuyase asumo, likajatikizye anyika lweendo lomwe, entamuyase lwabili pe.
Pele Davida wakaambila Abisai kuti, Pe, utamunyonyooni, nkaambo taakwe muntu uukonzya kutambika ijanza lyakwe kukumulwisya munanike wa-Jehova akutaba amulandu.
Davida wakati, Ncobeni Jehova mbwali muumi, Jehova nguuyoomujaya, nanka buzuba bwakwe bwakufwa buyoosika bwini, nanka ulanjila munkondo kuti imujaye.
Jehova anditondye kutambika ijanza lyangu kukulwisya munanike wa-Jehova. Pele lino kobweza buyo isumo eli lili kumutwe wakwe ankomo yamaanzi, atweende.

Mpawo Davida naakamana kubweza isumo ankomo yamaanzi zyakali kumutwe wa-Saulo, bakainka, nkabela taakwe iwakababona, taakwe iwakezi makani, taakwe iwakasinsimuka, pe, boonse bakali mukuona, nkaambo iŋonzi zizwa kuli-Jehova zyakalibajayide.
Lino Davida wakaya mutala, wakaima kulekule atala acilundu, nkabela kakuli busena bupati akati kabo.
Mpawo Davida wakoongolola kubantu akuli-Abineri mwana wa-Neri, wakati, Sa tovuwi webo Abineri? Elyo Abineri wakavuwa kuti, Nduweni noita mwami?

Lino Davida wakaambila Abineri kuti, Sa uwe toli mwaalumi na? Nguni uuli mbuli nduwe mu-Israyeli Nkaambonzi notalindilile mwami simalelaako? Nkaambo kwakasika umwi muntu kuzoonyonyoona mwami simalelaako.

Eco ncowacita tacili cibotu pe. Ncobeni Jehova mbwali muumi, mwaleelede kufwa, nkaambo kakutalindilila simalelaanu munanike wa-Jehova. Lino bona! Lili kuli isumo lyamwami, ankomo yamaanzi, izyakali kumutwe wakwe?
Mpawo Saulo wakaziba ijwi lya-Davida, wakati, Sa eli ijwi talyeensi lyako, Davida mwanaangu? Davida wakati, Ndijwi lyangu, mwami simalelaangu.
Alimwi wakati, Nkaambonzi simalelaangu uza bunditobela ndemulanda wako? Ndakacitanzi? Ncibinzi ncinjisi?

Lino mwami simalelaangu aswiilile majwi aamulanda wakwe, Na Jehova nguwakakubusya kuzoondilwisya, atambule cipaizyo. Pele na mbantu balya maila, abatilikizigwe bubi, nkaambo banditanda sunu akundinyanzya caabilo cangu calukono luzwa kuli-Jehova. Baamba kuti, Koya, ukabelekele baleza bambi milimo.
Lino bulowa bwangu butatililwi ansi okuno nkwatako Jehova, nkaambo mwami wa-Israyeli weza kuzooyandaula kanjina buyo, uli mbuli muntu uuvwima kwale mumalundu.
Mpawo Saulo wakati, Ndabisya, Piluka, mwanaangu Davida, nkaambo nsikooyookubisizya limbi pe, mbuli buumi bwangu mbubwayandika mumeso aako sunu. Ncobeni ndalifubeede akuleya loko malaa.
Elyo Davida wakavuwa kuti, Langa! Ndeeli isumo lyamwami. Tuma umwi mulombe azoolitole.
Jehova ulabweedezezya muntu umwi aumwi bululami bwakwe abwini bwakwe, Nkaambo Jehova walikwaabide mumaanzanza aangu, pele mebo teendazumina kutambika ijanza lyangu kukulwisya munanike wa-Jehova.
Lino buumi bwako mbuli mbubulemekedwe sunu mumeso aangu, buumi bwangu abwalo bulemekwe mbubonya mumeso aaJehova, kuti andivune kumapenzi oonse.
Mpawo Saulo wakaambila Davida kuti, Koba acoolwe, mwanaangu Davida. Kucita ulacita akuzunda ulazunda. Elyo Davida wakainka, alakwe Saulo wakabweeda kulimbabo.

Lino Davida wakaamba mumoyo wakwe kuti, Inga njoofwa buzuba bumwi mumaanza aa-Saulo. Taakwe cintu cibotu ncinkonzya kucita, cita kuloboka kucisi caba-Filisti, elyo Saulo ulalendaaninwa kundiyandaula limbi mucisi coonse ca-Israyeli, aboobo njoovunwa kumaanza aakwe.
Mpawo Davida wakanyamuka, wainka abantu bali myaanda iili musanu aumwi mbaakeenda abo, wasika kuli-Akisi mwana wa-Maoki mwami waGati.
Nkabela Davida wakakala a-Akisi mu-Gati, walo abantu bakwe, umwi aumwi aciinga cakwe, alakwe Davida wakali abanakazi bakwe bobile, Ahinoamu waku-Jezreeli a-Abigayeli muka-Nabala mu-Karameli.
Lino Saulo wakaambilwa kuti, Davida wacija ku-Gati, elyo takakaboola kumuyandaula limbi.
Nkabela Davida wakaambila Akisi kuti, Na ndi muyandwi kumeso aako, bandipe kumwi kwakukala mumunzi umwi wacisi cako. Sa ncibotu kuti ndemulanda wako nkale okuno kulinduwe kumunzi wabwami?
Mpawo mubuzuba obo mbubonya Akisi wakamupa Zikilaga. Nciceeco Zikilaga ncuuli mumaanza aabami ba-Juda asunu.
Lino mweelwe wamazuba Davida ngwaakakede mucisi caba-Filisti kuuli mwaaka omwe amyezi yone.
Nkabela Davida abantu bakwe bakaya kuyoosaala aba-Gesuri aba-Girezi aba-Amaleki, nkaambo eyi misyobo njiyakali kukala koonse kucisi kuzwa ku-Telami kusikila ku-Suri munzila iiya ku-Egepita.
Nkabela Davida wakanyonyoona cisi coonse. Taakwe wakasyaala muumi, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi. Alimwi wakatola imbelele aŋombe ambongolo ankamele azyakusama, elyo wakapiluka akusika kuli-Akisi.
Mpawo Akisi wakaamba kuti, Ino mwali kuyoosaala kuli sunu? Nkabela Davida wakati, Twali kuyoosaala kubbazu lyakumusanza wa-Juda awaba-Jeramiyeli awaba-Keni.

Pele Davida takakasia muntu naba omwe, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, uucipona wakuleta makani ku-Gati, nkaambo wakati, Ambweni inga balatutola impuwo yakuti mbuboobo mbwaakacita Davida, mbuboobo mbwaakasaala, mazuba oonse naakakede mucisi caba-Filisti.
Lino Akisi wakazuminina Davida, wakati, Ncobeni kubisya walibisya kubantu bakwe Israyeli, aboobo ulaba muzike wangu lyoonse.
Mpawo Davida wakaambila Akisi kuti, Mbubo, ayebo uyoobona mbenjoocita ndemulanda wako. Alimwi Akisi wakaambila Davida kuti, Ncibotu, uyoeba intobo yangu mazuba oonse.
Lino ba-Filisti bakabungana, bakeza kuzooyaka malabba aabo mu-Sunemu. Alakwe Saulo wakabunganya boonse ba-Israveli kumalabba ku-Giliboa.
Nkabela Saulo naakabona malabba aaba-Filisti, moyo wakwe wakayoowa akukankama loko.
Elyo Saulo wakabuzya kuli-Jehova, pele Jehova takakamutyaba pe, nikuba kuziloto nikuba muzilengano nikuba kubasinsimi.
Mpawo Saulo wakaambila balanda bakwe kuti, Amundiyandwide mwanakazi musondi, kuti nje kulinguwe, nkabuzye. Lino balanda bakwe bakamwaambila kuti, Mwanakazi musondi nkwali ku-Endori.
Mpawo Saulo wakalisandula akusama zyakusama zimbi, wakainka abantu bobile, bakasika kuliyooyo mwanakazi masiku. Wakati, Kondisonda kumuzimu, undibonye oyo ngwenti ambe.
Elyo mwanakazi wakamwaambila kuti, Ulizi Saulo ncacitide, mbwagwiside boonse basangu abasondi munyika. Ino nkaambonzi nomuyandaula buumi bwangu kuti mfwe?
Nkabela Saulo wakakonkezya muzina lya-Jehova, wakati, Ncobeni Jehova mbwali muumi, tokwe noyoojana mulandu nkaambo kamakani aya.
Mpawo mwanakazi wakabuzya kuti, Ino nguni ngwenjelede kukubonya? Wakati, Ndibonya Samuele.
Lino mwanakazi naakabona Samuele, wakoongolola ajwi ipati, alimwi mwanakazi wakaambila Saulo kuti, Nkaambonzi nowandeena? Nduwe Saulo.
Pele mwami wakamwaambila kuti, Utayoowi pe, Ncinzi ncowabona? Mpawo mwanakazi wakaambila Saulo kuti, Ndabona muzimu uuzwa munyika.
Alimwi wakabuzya kuti, Uli buti? Wakati, Mwaalumi munene nguwazwa, alimwi ulisamide cikobela. Mpawo Saulo wakaziba kuti ngu-Samuele, nkabela wakakotamika busyu bwakwe ansi akulemeka.
Lino Samuele wakati, Pele nkaambonzi nobuzya kulindime, na Jehova ulikusiide akuba sinkondonyoko?
Jehova wacita mbubonya mbwaakaamba kumulomo wangu. Jehova wakusukula bwami, wabupa mweenzinyoko Davida.
Mbuli mbotakaswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova akutacitila baAmaleki bukali bwakwe bupati, nciceeco Jehova ncakucitila obo sunu.
Jehova ulakwaaba, webo aba-Israyeli, mumaanza aaba-Filisti. Junza webo abana bako muzooba okuno kulindime, abalo basinkondo ba-Israyeli ulabaaba mumaanza aaba-Filisti.
Mpawo Saulo wakafwambaana kuvundama amubili wakwe woonse ansi, wakayoowa loko nkaambo kamajwi aa-Samuele, takakacili anguzu pe, nkaambo taakwe ncaakalide buzuba obo boonse isikati amasiku.

Lino mwanakazi naakasika kuli-Saulo, wakabona kuti ulipenzedwe loko, elyo wakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Ndemulanda wako ndaswiilila ijwi lyako, buumi bwangu ndabubika mujanza lyangu, ndaswiilila majwi aako ngondaambila.
Lino uleelede kundiswiilila ambebo ndemulanda wako. Nkakuletele tusima, uzoolye, elyo uzooba anguzu wazootalika lweendo lwako.
Pele wakakaka, wakati, Pe, nsikoolya. Nekubaboobo balanda bakwe amwanakazi bakamukakatizya, elyo wakaswiilila majwi aabo, wakabuka ansi, wakakala abulo.
Nkabela mwanakazi wakali amoombe uuneneede muŋanda. Mpawo wakafwambaana kumujaya, alimwi wakabweza busu, wakabukanda akujika zinkwa.
Elyo wakazileta kuli-Saulo akubalanda bakwe, nkabela nibakamana kulya, bakanyamuka, bakainka masiku ayo ngaonya.
Nkabela bami ba-Filisti bakali kuya bweenda mumyaanda yabo amuzyuulu zyabo, alakwe Davida abantu bakwe bakali kuza musule antoomwe a-Akisi,

Mpawo bami baba-Filisti bakati, Ino aba ba-Hebrayo bacitanzi? Lino Akisi wakaambila bami baba-Filisti kuti, Teensi oyu Davida mulanda waSaulo mwami wa-Israyeli? Sa takwe naakakede kulindime ciindi cilamfulamfu? Alimwi taakwe nindakamujanina mulandu kuzwa kubuzuba obo mbwaakeza kulindime nikuba kusikila sunu.

Pele bami baba-Filisti bakamusulwidilwa. Bami baba-Filisti bakamwaambila kuti, Mupilusye oyu muntu, kuti abweede kubusena bwakwe mbookamupa. Atainki aswebo kunkondo, pe, kuti atatubedi sinkondoma munkondo. Oyu muntu abotezye buti mwami wakwe? Sa teensi kukukosola mitwe yabantu aba?
Sa teensi oyu Davida, ngubakali kwiimba mukuzyana kwabo kuti,
Saulo wajaya bantu bali zyuulu,
Davida wajaya makumi aazyuulu?
Lino piluka, uye aluumuno, kuti utabisizyi bami baba-Filisti.

Elyo Davida wakaambila Akisi kuti, Ino ndakacitanzi? Mulandunzi ngowandijanina ndemulanda wako kuzwa kubuzuba obo mbundakakusikila kusikila sunu? Nkaambonzi nsikonzyi kuya kuyoolwana abasinkondonyina mwami simalelaangu?
Mpawo Akisi wakavwiila Davida kuti, Ndizi kuti uli mubotu kumeso aangu mbuli angelo wa-Leza, Nekubaboobo bami baba-Filisti mbibati, Oyu muntu tatweelede kuya awe kunkondo pe.

Lino mufume cifumofumo, abalo balanda bamwami wako mbowakeza abo, mukabweede kubusena bwanu mbundakamupa, Utakataazigwi mumoyo nkaambo kajwi eli ibi, pe, nkaambo uli mubotu kumeso aangu, Pele mufume mbobuti ee buyo, mwiinke,
Lino nibwakaca Davida wakafuma, abantu bakwe, kuti bapiluke kunyika yaba-Filisti. Abalo ba-Filisti bakaya ku-Jezreeli.
Nkabela banakazi abantu boonse ibakali mumunzi mumo, nibaba baniini nibaba bapati, bakabatola mubuzike, Katakwe iwakajayigwa, pe, bakabatola buyo akwiinka abo.
Mpawo Davida abantu bakwe nibakasika kumunzi, bakajana kuti munzi ulitentedwe amulilo, abalo banakazi babo abana babo balombe abasimbi boonse balitoledwe kubuzike.
Elyo Davida abantu mbaakali abo bakoomoka kulila, bakali kulila mane babula inguzu zyakucinoolila.
Abalo banakazi bobile ba-Davida bakalitoledwe kubuzike, Ahinoamu waku-Jezreeli a-Abigayeli muka-Nabala mu-Karameli.
Nkabela Davida wakalifwabide loko, nkaambo bantu bakati mufuse mabwe, nkaambo boonse bakalilutide mumoyo nkaambo kabana babo balombe abasimbi. Pele Davida wakaliyumya munguzu zya-Jehova Leza wakwe.
Elyo Davida wakabuzya kuli-Jehova kuti, Sa ntobele eyi impi? Sa ndakonzya kubeenzya? Wakati, Ee, batobele, nkaambo kubeenzya ulabeenzya, alimwi ncobeni ulabavuna.
Lino Davida wakainka, walo abantu bali myaanda iili musanu aumwi mbaakali abo, nkabela naakasika kukalonga ka-Besori, bamwi bakasyaala nkukonya oko.
Pele Davida kaciya butobela, abantu bali myaanda yone, pele myaanda yobile yakasyaala, nkaambo aba bakafwide kukataala, teebakacili anguzu zyakuzubuka kalonga ka-Besori.
alimwi bakamupa cikoto cankuyu amitunge yamisaansa yobile, elyo naakamana kulya, moyo wakwe wakaboola, nkaambo katalide insima naba maanzi mazuba otatwe isikati amasiku.

Lino Davida wakamubuzya kuti, Ino uli muntu wani? Wazwa kuli? Nkabela wakati, Ndi mulombe mu-Egepita, ndi muzike wamuntu mu-Amaleki. Simalelaangu wakandisia mazuba otatwe amana, nkaambo ndakali kuciswa.
Twakali kuyoosaala cisi cakumusanza caba-Kereti acaba-Juda acisi cakumusanza caba-Kalebe, alimwi munzi wa-Zikilaga twakautenta umulilo.

Mpawo Davida wakamwaambila kuti, Sa ulakonzya kutusisya nkwiibede eyi impi? Wakati, Amundikonkezezye kuliLeza kuti mutazoondiiayi, nikuba kundaaba mumaanza aabasimalelaangu, elyo ndamusisya nkwiibede impi.

Elyo Davida wakatalika kuya bubajaya kuzwa kumabbililo aazuba kusikila magolezya buzuba bwabili, Nkabela katakwe muntu naba omwe iwakaloboka, cita balombe bali myaanda yone ibakatantide ankamele akucija.
Lino Davida wakavuna zintu zyoonse ba-Amaleki nzibakatolede, abalo banakazi bakwe bobile Davida wakabavuna.
Katakwe cintu niciba comwe icatakali-wo, niciba ciniini niciba cipati, nibaba bana balombe nibaba basimbi, niziba imbono, akati kazintu nzibakatolede. Zyoonse buyo Davida wakaziboozya.
Alimwi Davida wakatola imbelele aŋombe zyoonse, nkabela bakazibinga kunembo lyaŋombe zimwi, bakati, Nzeezi zisaalo zya-Davida.
Lino boonse bana-Saatani akati kabaabo Davida mbakeenda abo bakati, Aba teebakatusindikila, Nkaambo kako tatukoobaabila imbono nzitwapilusya, Umwi aumwi atole mukakwe abana bakwe luzutu, bainke abo.
Pele Davida wakati, Pe, mutaciti obo, bakwesu, nkaambo Jehova nguwatupa zintu ezi, alimwi ngonguwe watubamba kabotu akwaaba mumaanza esu eyo impi iyakazide kuzootulwisya.
Nguni uukonzya kumuswiilila mumakani aali boobo? Caabilo cayooyo uuya kunkondo cileelede kuba mbubonya mbuli caabilo cayooyo uulindila zintu. Balaabilana cakweelana.
Nkabela kuzwa kubuzuba obo akusikila sunu wakacibika mbuli mulao aciyanza mu-Israyeli,
Mpawo Davida naakasika ku-Zikilaga wakatuma imbono zimwi kubapati ba-Juda beenzinyina, wakati, Nceeci cipo cizwa kumbono zyabasinkondonyina Jehova.
Wakatuma kulibaabo bamu-Beteli, abaabo bamuRama wakumusanza, abaabo bamu-Jatiri,
abaabo bamu-Aroeri, abaabo bamu-Sifimoti, abaabo bamu-Estimoa,
abaabo bamu-Rakala, abaabo muminzi yaba-Jerameli amuminzi yaba-Keni,
abaabo bamu-Horima, abaabo bamu-Korasini, abaabo bamu-Ataki,
abaabo bamu-Hebroni, akumasena oonse ngibakali kweenda Davida abantu bakwe.
Elyo ba­ Filisti bakali kuya bubatobela Saulo abana bakwe, nkabela ba-Filisti bakajaya Jonatani a-Abinadabu a-Malikisua bana ba-Saulo.
Lino inkondo yakamulemenena Saulo, nkabela basimata bakamweenzya, wakalifwabide loko nkaambo kabasimata.

Mpawo Saulo wakaambila sikuyumuna zii wisyo zyakwe kuti, Somona ipanga lyako, undiyase kuti aba batapalwidwe batasiki kuzoondiyasa akundicapa. Pele sikuyumuna zilwisyo zyakwe takakazumina, pe, nkaambo wakayoowa loko, Elyo Saulo wakabweza ipanga, wawida alindilyo.
Lino sikuyumuna zilwisyo zyakwe naakabona kuti Saulo wafwa, alakwe wakawida asumo lyakwe, wakafwa awe.
Aboobo Saulo abana bakwe botatwe asikuyumuna zilwisyo zyakwe abantu bakwe boonse bakafwa mubuzuba obo mbubonya.

Mpawo bantu ba-Israyeli bakutala lyamumpata, abaabo bakutala lya-Jordano, nibakabona kuti bantu ba-Israyeli baliciside, alimwi Saulo abana bakwe balifwide, bakasia minzi, bacija, elyo ba-Filisti bakeza kuzookala mulinjiyo.
Lino nibwakaca ba-Filisti bakasika kuzoosaala zintu zyabaabo bajayidwe. Nkabela bakajana Saulo abana bakwe botatwe balifwide mucilundu caGiliboa.
Mpawo bakamukosola mutwe akugwisya zilwisyo zyakwe, bakazituma kucisi caba-Filisti kuyootola makani kumituni yabo akubantu.
Nkabela zilwisyo zyakwe bakazibika muŋanda ya-Asitarote, amutunta wakwe bakaukankamina kubulambo mu-Betisani.
Pele bantu baku­ Jabezi Gileadi, nibakamvwa zyoonse ba-Filisti nzibakacitila Saulo,
boonse baalumi basintaze bakanyamuka, bakeenda masiku oonse, bakabweza mutunta wa-Saulo amitunta yabana bakwe kuzwa kubulambo bwa-Betisani, bakeza ayo ku-Jabezi kuzooitenta.
Nkabela zifuwa zyabo bakazizika munsi amusiika mu-Jabezi, elyo bakaliimya zilyo mazuba aali musanu mwaabili.

elyo mulibwatatu kwakasika umwi muntu kuzwa kumalabba kuli-Saulo. Oyu muntu zyakusama zyakwe zyakalidelukidwe, alimwi wakali avu amutwi! wakwe, nkabela naakasika kuli-Davida, wakaliwaala ansi akumukotamina.
Mpawo Davida wakamubuzya kuti, Ino uzwidai? Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Ndaloboka kuzwa kumalabba aaba-Israyeli.
Elyo Davida wakamwaambila kuti, Kwaambwanzi? Kondilwiida makani. Wakati, Bantu bacija kuzwa kunkondo, alimwi bantu banji balifwide, abalo Saulo a-Jonatani mwanaakwe balifwide.
Lino Davida wakamwaambila oyo mulombe iwakamulwiida kuti, Uzi buti kuti Saulo wafwa, a-Jonatani mwanaakwe?
Nkabela mulombe iwakamulwiida wakati, Nkendiwo ambebo acilundu ca-Giliboa, elyo Saulo wakalilimbilila asumo lyakwe, abalo basiŋola abasimbizi bakali kuya bumutobelela.
Mpawo naakaceba, wakandibona, wakandiita, lino ndakati Mpendi.
Elyo wakandibuzya kuti, Nduweni? Ndakati, Ndi mu-Amaleki.
Mpawo wakandaambila kuti, Zoondiimikile akundijaya, nkaambo ndaba acizyungubweebwe, pele buumi bwangu mpobucili.

Elyo ndakamwiimikila akumujaya, nkaambo ndakalizi kuti takoobuka alimwi mbawide. Nkabela ndakabweza munsini iwakali amutwe wakwe, ankaya iyakali kukuboko kwakwe, ndazileta okuno kulinduwe, O mwami wangu.
Nkabela bakoomoka akulila akuliimya zilyo mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba, nkaambo ka-Saulo a-Jonatani mwanaakwe abantu boonse ba-Jehova aluzubo lwa-Israyeli nkaambo bakajayigwa kupanga.
Lino Davida wakabuzya oyo mulombe iwakamulwiida kuti, Ino uzwa kuli? Wakati, Ndi mwana wamuzwakule, mu-Amaleki.
Elyo Davida wakamwaambila kuti, Nkaambonzi notakali kuyoowa kutambika ijanza lyako kukujaya munanike wa-Jehova?
Lino Davida wakaita umwi wabalombe, wakati, Koya afwiifwi, umujaye, Mpawo wakamuuma, wakafwa.
Nkabela Davida wakati, Bulowa bwako bukutikile omwini, nkaambo mulomo wako omwini nguwakupesya wakuti, Ndajaya munanike wa-Jehova.
Elyo Davida wakaimba olu lwiimbo lwakulizya Saulo a-Jonatani mwanaakwe.
Nguwe wakalailila kwiiya bana ba-Juda lwiimbo lwabuta. Lulilembedwe mubbuku lya-Jasari.
Bulemu bwa-Israyeli bulijayidwe azilundu.
Maawe! Basintaze balifwide!
Mutamwaisyi makani mumigwagwa ya-Asikeloni,
Kuti bana basimbi baba-Filisti batakondwi,
Kuti bana babatapalwidwe batasekeleli.
Mutasikilwi lume nikuba kuwidwa imvula,
Nikuba kuba amyuunda iizyalisya micelo.
Nkaambo nkukonya oko intobo yabasintaze nkuyakafwisigwa bweeme.
Intobo ya-Saulo tiikwe niiyoonanikwa mafuta.
Akuzwa kumafuta aabasintaze,
Buta bwa-Jonatani teebwakajoka,
Alyalo ipanga lya-Saulo teelyakaboola buyo.
Bakali babotu mubuumi bwabo,
Amulufu lwabo teebakaanzaana pe.
Bakali aluno kwiinda insika,
Bakali anguzu kwiinda balavu.
Nubasimbi ba-Israyeli, amulile Saulo.
Ngonguwe iwakamusamika zisani zyamwenda zyeebesi,
Ngonguwe iwakamubikila zyeebesi zyangolida azyakusama zyanu,
Maawe I Basintaze balifwide!
Jonatani ulijayidwe atala azilundu!
Nkaambo kanduwe, jonatani mukwesu.
Wakali kubotezya loko moyo wangu,
Aluyando lwako ndookandiyanda lwakali kugambya.
Lwakali kwiinda luyando lwabanakazi.
Maawe! Basintaze balifwide,
Azilwisyo zyankondo zyanyonyooka.
Mpawo Davida wakaya nkukonya, abalo banakazi bakwe bobile, Ahinoamu mu-Jezreeli a-Abigayeli muka-Nabala mu-Karameli.
Abalo bantu bakwe mbaakali abo Davida wakabaleta boonse, umwi aumwi aciinga cakwe, elyo bakakala muminzi ya-Hebroni.
Mpawo bantu ba-Juda bakasika, bakananika Davida nkukonya oko, kuti abe mwami wamusyobo wa-Juda.
Nkabela bakaambila Davida kuti, Bantu ba-Jabezi Gileadi mbibakazika Saulo.
Mpawo Davida wakatuma batumwa kubantu ba-Jabezi Gileadi, wakabaambila kuti, Jehova amupe coolwe, mbuli mbumwakacitila Saulo mwami wanu obu buuya bwakumuzika.
Jehova amucitile cabuuya acalusinizyo, ambebo ndamulumbula nkaambo kaceeci ncimwakacita.
Lino amuyumye maanza aanu, mube basikainya, nkaambo Saulo mwami wanu wafwa, alimwi mukowa wa-Juda wandinanika kuti mbe mwami wabo,
Isibosete mbwaakapegwa bwami bica-Israyeli
wamu bika kuti abe mwami wa-Gileadi awa-Asuri awa-Jezreeli awa-Efraimu awa-Benjamini awaba-Israyeli boonse.
Oyu Isibosete wakali amyaaka iili makumi one naakataanguna kuba abwami bwa-Israyeli, nkabela wakeendelezya myaaka yobile. Pele mukowa wa-Juda wakatobela Davida.
Nkabela mweelwe waciindi Davida ncaakali mwami wamukowa wa-Juda mu-Hebroni kuuli myaaka iili musanu aibili amyeezi iili musanu aumwi.
Abalo Joabu mwana waZeruya abalanda ba-Davida bakazwa kuyoobacinga kuziba lya-Gibeoni, nkabela bakakala nkukonya, bamwi kubbazu limwi lyaziba, abamwi kubbazu limwi lyaziba.
Mpawo Abineri wakaambila joabu kuti, Balombe banyamuke, batusobanine. Joabu wakati, Mbubo, banyamuke.
Elyo bakanyamuka, nkabela kwakasalwa akati kaba-Benjamini bantu bali ikumi ababili kuti babe ba-Isibosete mwana wa-Saulo, abalanda ba-Davida bali ikumi ababili.

Mpawo bakajatana boonse umwi aumwi kumutwe wamweenzinyina, akuyasana umwi mukateku kamweenzinyina, akuwa boonse antoomwe. Nciceeco obo busena ncibwakaulikwa izina lya-Helkati-Hatsurimu (nkukuti Muunda wamapanga.) Buli mucisi ca-Gibeoni.
Alimwi bana botatwe ba-Zeruya bakaliko, Mazina aabo ngaaya:— Joabu, Abisai a-Asaheli. Nkabela Asaheli wakali aluno loko mbuli insya yamusokwe.
Lino Asaheli wakali kuya butobela Abineri, nkabela taakwe naakaleya, nikuba kululyo nikuba kulumwensi, pe, wakali kutobelela buyo Abineri.
Elyo Abineri wakaceba, wakati, Sa nduwe Asaheli? Wakati, Ndime.
Mpawo Abineri wakamwaambila kuti, Leya kululyo nanka kulumwensi, ukajate umwi mulombe, ukabweze zilwisyo zyakwe. Pele Asaheli wakakaka kuleya akuleka kumutobela.
Lino Abineri wakaboola lwabili kwaambila Abineri, wakati, Leka kunditobela. Sa ncibotu kuti nkuumine ansi? Tukalangane buti abakwanu Joabu?

Nekubaboobo wakacili kukaka kuleka, elyo Abineri wakamuyasa asumo acibunduusule abumbu, lyapola kumusana. Lino wakawida ansi, wakafwa mpoonya awo mpaakabede. Nkabela boonse bantu ibakasika oko nkwaakafwida Asaheli bakaimikila.
Mpawo bana ba-Benjamini bakayoboloka kuli-Abineri, bakaba impi yomwe, bakaimikila atala acilundu cimwi.
Nkabela Abineri wakamusompezya Joabu, wakati, Sa ipanga liciya bulya bantu lyoonse? Sa tozi kuti kumamanino kuyoomululila? Ulaambila bantu lili kuti baleke kutanda bakwabo?
Lino Joabu wakati, Jehova mbali muumi, niwatakaamba, elyo cifumofumo bantu nibaleka kutanda bakwabo.
Mpawo Joabu wakalizya mweembo, nkabela bantu boonse bakaima, teebakacili kubatanda limbi ba-Israyeli, taakwe nibakacili kulwana limbi pe.
Nkabela Abineri abantu bakwe bakeenda masiku ayo oonse munyika ya-Araba, bakazubuka mulonga wa-Jordano, bakainda moonse mu-Bitroni mane bakasika ku-Mahanaimu.
Alakwe Joabu wakapiluka kuzwa kukutobela Abineri, nkabela naakabunganya bantu boonse, kwakajanwa kuti kakutawo balanda ba-Davida bali ikumi amusanu abane a-Asaheli.
Pele balanda ba-Davida bakalijayide akati kaba-Benjamini abantu ba-Abineri bantu bali myaanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu alimwi,
Lino bakabweza Asaheli, bakaakumuzika mumavwiko aabawisi mu-Betelehemu. Nkabela joabu abantu bakwe bakeenda masiku oonse, elyo nibwakaca cifumofumo bakasika ku-Hebroni.
Bana ba-Davida mbaakazyala ku-Hebroni
wabili kali Kileabu iwakazyalwa Abigayeli muka-Nabala mu-Karameli, watatu kali Abisalomu, iwakazyalwa Maaka mwana wa-Talimai mwami wa-Gesuri,
wane kali Adonija iwakazyalwa Hagiti, wasanu Sefatiya iwakazyalwa Abitali,
awamusanu aumwi kali Itreamu iwakazyalwa Egila muka-Davida. Aba Davida mbaakazyala ku-Hebroni.
Nkabela Saulo wakalijisi mumambe wakwe, izina lyakwe kali Rizipa mwana wa-Aya. Lino Isibosete wakaambila Abineri kuti, Nkaambonzi nowalalika mumambe waba taata?

Mpawo Abineri wakanyema loko nkaambo kamajwi aya ngaakaamba Isibosete. Wakati, Sa ndi mubwa waba-Juda? Ecino ciindi ndi mukucita buuya kumukowa wa-Saulo uso akubakwabo akubeenzinyina, alimwi teendakwaaba mumaanza aa-Davida, nekubaboobo sunu wandipa mulandu kumwanakazi oyu.
Leza acitile Abineri mbubonya obo nanka kwiinda, na entacitili Davida mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakamukonkezya.
Njoonyanzya bwami kumukowa wa-Saulo akwiimika cuuno cabwami bwa-Davida kucisi coonse caba-Israyeli acaba-Juda kuzwa ku-Dani akusikila ku-Beereseba.
Mpawo taakwe naakacili kukonzya kwaambila Abineri, nkaambo wakali kumuyoowa.

Lino Abineri wakatuma batumwa kuli-Davida ku-Hebroni nkwaakabede, wakati, Njiyani eyi nyika? Alimwi wakati, Atutangane ayebo cizuminano, elyo ijanza lyangu lizookugwasya, kuti bwami boonse bwa-Israyeli buboole kulinduwe.
Wakati, Ncibotu, tulatangana ayebo cizuminano, pele nkucili cintu comwe ncinjanda kukubuzya. Ciindi ncozoondiswaya, tatukoozoobonana kumeso cita ukaletelezye Mikala mwana wa-Saulo.
Mpawo Davida wakatuma batumwa kuli-Isibosete mwana wa-Saulo, wakati, Ndipa mukangu Mikala, ngonguwe ngundakasela lubono lwandomo zili mwaanda zyaba-Filisti batapalwidwe.
Elyo Isibosete wakatuma kuzoomuleta kuzwa kwa-Palitieli mwana wa-Laisi.
Nkabela mulumaakwe wakamusindikila uya bulila mane kusikila ku-Bahurimu. Elyo Abineri wakamwaambila kuti, Koya, ukapiluke. Nkabela wakapiluka.
Lino Abineri wakaambila bapati ba-Israyeli kuti, Kuciindi cakamana mwakali kuyandaula Davida kuti abe mwami wanu.
Lino kamucita mbubonya, nkaambo Jehova waamba aa-Davida kuti, Davida mulanda wangu ngunsikavunye bantu bangu ba-Israyeli kumaanza aaba-Filisti akumaanza aabasinkondonyina boonse.
Alimwi Abineri wakaamba mbubonya obo mumatwi aaba-Benjamini, elyo wakaya kuyooamba mumatwi aa-Davida ku-Hebroni akumulwiida makani ngebakali kuyanda ba-Israyeli amukowa woonse wa-Benjamini.
Aboobo Abineri wakasika kuli-Davida ku-Hebroni, wakeza abantu bali makumi obile, nkabela Davida wakacitila Abineri abantu mbaakali abo ipobwe.

Mpawo Abineri wakaambila Davida kuti, Nyamuke, njiinke kuyoobunganya boonse ba-Israyeli kulinduwe omwami wangu, kuti utangane abo cizuminano, ube mwami mbubonya mbuli moyo wako mbuuyanda. Lino Davida naakamuzumizya, wakainka caluumuno.
Elyo Joabu abalanda ba-Davida bakazwa kukusaala, nkabela bakaletelela zisaalo zinji, pele Abineri katako, nkaambo Davida wakalimuzumizizye kale kwiinka caluumuno.
Lino Joabu abasinkondo boonse mbaakali abo nibakasika, Joabu wakaambilwa kuti, Abineri mwana wa-Neri wakasika kumwami, nkabela mwami wakamuzumizya kwiinka caluumuno.
Mpawo Joabu wakeza nkwaakabede mwami, wakati, Ino ncinzi nciwacita? Abineri wakasika kulinduwe. Nkaambonzi nowakamuzumizya kuti ainke buyo?
Sa tozi kuti Abineri mwana wa-Neri wakeza kuzookweena buyo? Wakeza kuzoobona mboendeenda amboboola amilimo yoonse njocita.
Lino Joabu naakazwa kuli-Davida, wakatuma batumwa bakuyootobela Abineri, nkabela bakamuboozya kuzwa kucikala caku-Sira, pele Davida katacizi pe.
Mpawo Abineri naakaboola ku-Hebroni, joabu wakamutola kumbali amulyango, kuti amwambwiide cakutontola, elyo wakamuyasa abumbu, nkabela wakafwa, nkaambo kabulowa bwa-Asaheli mukulana wakwe.
Lino Davida naakamvwa makani aya, wakati, Mebo nsijisi mulandu, acalo cisi cangu tacijisi mulandu kumeso aa-Jehova, Mulandu wabulowa bwa-Abineri mwana wa-Neri tokooyooba wesu, pe, akutamani.
Uboole amutwe wa-Joabu amitwe yabasiluzubo bakwe boonse. Mazuba oonse luzubo lwakwe lube amuntu uuciswa kanswende nanka sicinsenda nanka uuenda amusako nanka uujayigwa munkondo nanka uubula cakulya.
Lino bakazika Abineri mu-Hebroni, nkabela mwami wakanyampula ijwi lyakwe, wakalila kukabanda ka-Abineri, abalo bantu boonse bakalila.
Mpawo Davida wakaimba lwiimbo lwakulila Abineri. Lwiimbo ndoolu.
Sa cakabota kuti Abineri afwe mbwafwa mufubafuba?
Maanza aako taakaangidwe pe,
Azyalo zituta zyako teezyakasungidwe munkeetani.
Mbuli muntu mbwajayigwa kumaanza aabataluleme,
Mbubonya obo mbowakajayigwa webo.
Elyo bantu boonse bakacili kumulila.
Lino bantu boonse bakaswiilila, nkabela cakabota mumeso aabo mbuli mbucakali kubabotela kufumbwa cintu ncaakacita mwami.
Aboobo bantu boonse aba-Israyeli boonse bakaziba mubuzuba obo kuti kateensi kumwami nkwaakazwa makani aakujaya Abineri mwana wa-Neri.
Nkabela mwami wakaambila balanda bakwe kuti, Sa tamuzi kuti buzuba obuno kwafwa muntu mulemu mupati mucisi ca-Israyeli?
Ambebo ndabula inguzu, nekuba kuti ndi mwami munanike, nkaambo aba bantu, bana baZeruya, mbayumu kulindime. Jehova abweedezye muntu uucita zibi mbubonya mbuli mbwabisya.
Lino Isiboseti mwana wa-Saulo naakamvwa kuti Abineri wafwa muHebroni, maanza aakwe akali kukompama, abalo ba-Israyeli boonse bakazingwa.

Nkabela Isiboseti mwana wa-Saulo wakali abantu bobile basilutwe, izina lya umwi kali Baana, amweenzinyina kali Rekabu. Bakali bana ba-Rimoni waku-Bceroti, bana ba-Benjamini, (nkaambo Beeroti ulaambwa mbuli munzi wamucisi ca-Benjamini.
Nkabela bana ba-Beeroti bakalongela ku-Gitaimu, nkukonya oko nkubacibede asunu mbuli bazwakule).
Lino bana ba-Rimoni waku-Beroti, Rekabu a-Baana, bakaya izuba nilyakali amutwe, bakasika kuŋanda yaIsibosete ciindi ncaakalede abulo naakali mukulyokezya kulyokezya kwasikati.
Lino mulindizi waŋanda wakali kubeeta bulotwe, elyo wakalala, wakoona, nkabela mpawo Rekabu a-Baana munyina bakanjila cakuumuna.
Elyo nibakanjila muŋanda, wakalilede abulo muŋanda yakoona, nkabela bakamuyasa, bakamujaya akumukosola mutwe. Mpawo bakabweza mutwe wakwe, bakeenda munzila ya-Araba masiku oonse,

bakaleta mutwe waIsibosete kuli-Davida ku-Hebroni. Lino bakaambila mwami kuti, Langa! Ngooyu mutwe wa-Isibosete mwana wa-Saulo sinkondonyoko, nguwenya iwakali kuyandaula buumi bwako. Jehova sunu wabeteka mwami simalelo wesu makani aakwe kuli-Saulo akubana bakwe.
Mpawo Davida wakavwiila Rekabu a-Baana munyina, bana ba-Rimoni waku-Beeroti, wakati, Mbubonya mbwali muumi Jehova, ngonguwe iwakavuna buumi bwangu kumapenzi oonse,

ciindi eco ncindakaambilwa kuti, Saulo wafwa, elyo oyo iwakandilwiida wakali kuyeeya kuti wandetela makani mabotu, pele mebo ndakamujata, ndakamujaya nkukonya oko ku-Zikilaga. Mbuboobo mbundakamulumbwida makani aakwe.
Sa taciindi kubija cintu eci cakuti bantu basizibi balijayide muntu uululeme kuŋanda yakwe abulo bwakwe mwini? Sa nsyeelede kumupa mulandu wabulowa bwakwe akumugwisya anyika?
Mpawo Davida wakalailila balombe bakwe kuti babajaye, nkabela bakabakosola maanza azituta, bakabaanzika kumbali aziba lyamuHebroni. Elyo mutwe wa-Isibosete bakauzika kumavwiko aa-Abineri mu-Hebroni.

Alimwi kuciindi eco Saulo ncakacili mwami, nduwe owakali kusololela ba-Israyeli akubaboozya, nkabela Jehova wakakwaambila kuti, Uleelede kweembela bantu bangu ba-Israyeli, uleelede kuba simalelaabo ba-Israyeli.

Lino boonse bapati baba-Israyeli bakasika kumwami ku-Hebroni, nkabela mwami Davida wakatangana abo cizuminano nkukonya oko ku-Hebroni kubusyu bwa-Jehova, aboobo bakananika Davida kuti abe mwami wa-Israyeli.

Mumunzi wa-Hebroni wakali abwami bwamusyobo wa-Juda myaaka iili musanu aibili amyezi iili musanu aumwi, alimwi mu-Jerusalemu wakali abwami bwaba-Juda abwaba-Israyeli boonse myaaka iili makumi otatwe amyaaka yotatwe.
Nekubaboobo Davida wakazunda mampangala aa-Ziyoni, ngaonya ngumunzi wa-Davida.

Nkabela obo buzuba Davida wakati, Kufumbwa muntu uuma ba-Jebusi, asowele mumulinga abo balema aboofu mbasula Davida mumoyo wakwe. Nkaambo bakaamba bati, Boofu abalema mpobali. Davida takonzyi kunjila muŋanda.
Elyo Davida wakaakukala mumonya mumampangala, nkabela wakaamba kuti ngumunzi wa-Davida. Lino Davida wakayaka koonse koonse kuzwa ku-Milo kusikila mukati.
Nkabela Davida wakali kuya bukomena lyoonse, alimwi Jehova Leza wamakamu makamu wakali awe.
Lino Davida wakazibisya kuti Jehova ulimwiimikide nji mbuli mwami waba-Israyeli, alimwi kuti wasumpula bwami bwakwe nkaambo kabantu bakwe ba-Israyeli.
Ngaaya mazina aabana mbaakazyala mu-Jerusalemu: Samua, a-Sobabu, a-Natana, a-Solomoni,
a-Ibara, a-Elisua, a-Nefegi, a-Jafiya,
a-Elisama, a-Eliada, a-Elifeleti.
Lino baFilisti bakasika kuzoolimwaisya mumumpata wa-Refaimu.
Mpawo Davida wakabuzya kuli-Jehova kuti, Sa nje kuyoolwana aba-Filisti? Sa uyoobaaba mumaanza aangu? Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Davida kuti, Ee, koya, nkaambo ncobeni ndaaba ba-Filisti mumaanza aako.

Elyo Davida wakasika ku-Baalaperazimu, wakabakoma nkukonya oko, nkabela wakati, Jehova wasotokela basinkondoma kumeso aangu mbubonya mbwasotoka maanzi. Nciceeco oko kuntu ncikwakaulikwa izina lya-Baalaperazimu.
Nkabela zikozyano zyabo bakazisia nkukonya oko, elyo Davida abantu bakwe bakeza kuzoozitola.
Lino ba-Filisti bakaboola lwabili kuzoolimwaisya mumumpata waRefaimu.
Mpawo Davida naakabuzya kuli-Jehova, wakaambilwa kuti, Utainki kuyoolwana pe, Kosaanguna kuzyunguluka musule lyabo akusika nkubabede kufwaafwi kumakunka.
Lino wamvwa buyo musoso wakweenda kumpela amakunka, ndilyonya noelede kunyamuka, nkaambo kuciindi eco Jehova waya kunembo lyako kuyookoma basinkondo baba-Filisti.
Elyo Davida wakacita mbubonya obo mbwaakamulailila Jehova, nkabela wakabazunda ba-Filisti kuzwa ku-Geba akusikila ku-Gezeri.
Lino Davida wakayobolola boonse basintaze baba-Israyeli, kabali zyuulu zyotatwe.
Mpawo Davida wakanyamuka abantu boonse mbaakali abo kuya ku-Baale-Juda kuyooleta kuzwa oko ibbokesi lya-Leza, ndilyonya liambwa mbuli izina lya-Jehova wamakamu makamu uukala akati kabakerabimu.
Nkabela bakabika ibbokesi lya-Leza aŋola impya akuligwisya muŋanda ya-Abinadabu yakucilundu, abalo Uza a-Ahio bana ba-Abinadabu bakali kweenzya iŋola impya.
Mbuboobo mbubakaligwisya muŋanda ya-Abinadabu yakucilundu, abbokesi lya-Leza, nkabela Ahio wakali kusololela ibbokesi.
Lino Davida abasiluzubo boonse ba-Israyeli bakali kusekelela kubusyu bwa-Jehova azilizyo zyazisamu zyamulombe, abanamalwa atuntimbwa atugoma ansaka azigweele.
Lino nibakasika kucipolelo caNakoni, Uza wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe akujata ibbokesi lya-Leza nkaambo basune bakati lilosye.
Mpoonya awo bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila Uza, nkabela Leza wakamuuma nkaambo kakuluba kwakwe, wakafwa nkukonya oko kubbokesi lya-Leza.
Lino Davida wakabijilwa nkaambo kakusotoka kwa-Jehova nkwaakasotokela Uza, aboobo oku kuntu wakakuulika izina lya-Luumo-lwa-Uza, mbukucaambwa asunu.
Nkabela Davida wakayoowa Jehova kubuzuba obo, wakati, Ibbokesi lya-Jehova lisike buti kulindime?
Aboobo Davida teewakayanda kulonzya ibbokesi lya-Jehova kulinguwe kumunzi wa-Davida, pele wakalitola kuŋanda ya-Obedi-Edomu mu-Giti.
Lino ibbokesi lya-Jehova lyakakala kuŋanda ya-Obedi-Edomu mu-Giti myezi yotatwe, nkabela Jehova wakamupa coolwe Obedi-Edomu abasiluzubo bakwe boonse.

Elyo mwami Davida wakaambilwa kuti, Jehova wabapa coolwe basinanda ba-Obedi-Edomu aboonse mbajisi nkaambo kabbokesi lya-Leza, Mpawo Davida wakaya kuyoogwisya ibbokesi lya-Leza kuŋanda ya-ObediEdomu akulileta kumunzi wa-Davida cakusekelela.
Lino basikuyumuna ibbokesi lya-Jehova nibakamana kweenda intaamu zili musanu aimwi, elyo wakapaila cipaizyo camusune amunyama uuneneede.
Nkabela Davida wakazyana canguzu zyoonse kubusyu bwa-Jehova, alimwi kasamide cikobela camulembo uutuba.
Mbuboobo Davida aluzubo loonse lwa-Israyeli mbubakalonzya ibbokesi lya-Jehova cakuyowela acakulizya mweembo.

Mpuwo ibbokesi lya-Jehova nilyakasika buyo kumunzi wa-Davida, Mikala mwana musimbi wa-Saulo wakasondela acipulo, nkabela naakabona mwami Davida ulasotoka akuzyana kubusyu bwa-Jehova, wakamusampaula mumoyo wakwe.
Lino bakaleta ibbokesi lya-Jehova, bakalitula amweenya walyo mukati kacilao ncaakalibambila Davida. Mpawo Davida wakatuula zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Nkabela Davida naakamana kutuula zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya, wakakondezya bantu muzina lya-Jehova wamakamu makamu.

Alimwi wakaabila bantu boonse, nkukuti imbungano yoonse yaba-Israyeli, nibaba baalumi nibaba banakazi, umwi umwi caabilo cacinkwa acituli can yama acibunge camicelo iiyanikidwe, Elyo bantu boonse bakapambukana umwi aumwi kuŋanda yakwe,

Mpawo Davida wakaboola kuzoolongezya basiŋanda bakwe. Nkabela Mikala mwana musimbi wa-Saulo wakeza kuzoocinga Davida, wakati, Ma! Weebeka sunu mwami wa-Israyeli naakalivumbula kumeso aabasimbi babalanda bakwe mbubonya mbubalivumbula basikambotwembotwe!

Lino Davida wakaambila Mikala kuti, Ndakali kubusyu bwaJehova, nguwe iwakandisala kwiinda uso abasiluzubonyina boonse, kuti andibike mbuli mweendelezi wabantu ba-Jehova, Nzoosekelela kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Nzoosowa bulemu alimwi akwiinda mbundacita sunu, nzooba mubombe amumeso aangu ndemwini, elyo abo basimbi mboamba nzoolemekwa loko kulimbabo.
Lino Mikala mwana wa-Saulo takazyala mwana pe mane kusikila kubuzuba mbwaakafwa.
elyo mwami wakaambila Natani musinsimi kuti, Bona! Mebo ndikede muŋanda yaziyako zyakedari, pele ibbokesi lya-Leza lilikede muŋanda yamasani buyo.
Mpawo Natani wakaambila mwami kuti, Mbubo, kocita coonse cili mumoyo wako, nkaambo Jehova uli ayebo.
Pele ayo masiku ngaonya ijwi lya-Leza lyakasika kuli-Natani, liti,
Koya ukaambile mulanda wangu Davida kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ulayanda kundiyakila iŋanda yakukala na?
Ncobeni nsina kuba aŋanda yakukala ciindi coonse kuzwa kubuzuba obo mbundakapozya bana ba-Israyeli kuzwa kucisi ca-Egepita akusikila kuciindi ecino. Ndali kweendeenda muŋanda yamasani na mucilao.

Lino koonse nkundakali kweendeenda abana ba-Israyeli boonse, sa ndakaambila naba umwi wababetesi ba-Israyeli mbundakeembezya bantu bangu ba-Israyeli ijwi lili boobo? Sa ndakati, Nkaambonzi nomutandiyakila iŋanda yazisamu zyakedari?

Lino majwi ngoelede kwaambila mulanda wangu Davida ngaaya, Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu makamu, Ndakakugwisya kucimpati nkowakali kweembela imbelele kuti ube mweendelezi wabantu bangu ba-Israyeli.
Alimwi ndakali ayebo koonse nkuwakali kuya, ndakanyonyoona basinkondonyoko boonse kubusyu bwako, nkabela ndakakucitila impuwo impati mbuli impuwo yabantu bapati baansi.

Lino bantu bangu ba-Israyeli ndabapa busena bwakukala, njoobazitikizya mpoonya awo, kuti bakalilile kulimbabo akutatuntulika limbi, Nkabela bana ba-Saatani tabakooyoobakataazya limbi mbuli mbubakabakataazya kukusaanguna,
kuzwa kuciindi eciya nindakabika babetesi kuti babe basilutwe babantu bangu. Nkabela njookuumuzizya basinkondonyoko boonse. Jehova wakwaambila kuti, Mebo nde-Jehova njookwiimikizizya iŋanda.
Alimwi mazuba aako aakukala ansi naazoomana nosi kaone abauso baciindi, elyo njoobusya mwana wako iwakazyalwa kumaala aako, kuti alye izina lyako, nkabela njooimikizya bwami bwakwe.
Ngonguwe uusi yakile izina lyangu iŋanda, nkabela cuuno cabwami bwakwe njoociimikizya akutamani.
Njoomubeda mbuli wisi, alakwe uzooba mwanaangu. Na wabisya, njoomuuma amusako wabantu azyuumo zyabana ba-Adamu,
pele buuya bwangu nsikooyoomunyanzya mbubo pe. Nsikonzyi kumunyanzya mbuli mbundakanyanzya Saulo iwakasaanguna kugwisigwa nowakataina kupegwa bwami.
Nkabela iŋanda yako abwami bwako zilaima nji kukabe kutamani, acalo cuuno cako cilaimikwa kabotu mazuba oonse.
Lino Natani wakaakwaambila Davida majwi aya oonse aacilengano coonse.
Alimwi aya makani akali mbuli makani maniini buyo kumeso aako, O Mwami Jehova, nkaambo waamba aabasiŋanda bangu abakuciindi ciciza cicili kule. Sa mbuboobu mbuubede mulao wabantu, O Mwami Jehova?
Lino sa kacisyeede ijwi Davida ndyakonzya kukwaambila? Nkaambo ulindizi mwembede ndemulanda wako, O Mwami Jehova,
Nkaambo kajwi lyako akuyanda kwamoyo wako ncowacitila aya malweza oonse kuti mulanda wako aazibe.
Nkaambo nduwe mupati, o Leza Jehova. Taakwe umbi uuli mbuli nduwe, taakwe Leza umbi, pe, mbuli mbutwaswillila amatwi esu.

Nguli musyobo umwi waansi ano uuli mbuli bantu bako ba-Israyeli, Leza mbaakaakunununa kuti babe bantu bakwe, kuti alijanine izina lili ampuwo? Wakamucitila makani mapati, akutondezezya cisi cako malweza kumeso aabantu bako mbowakavuna kuzwa ku-Egepita akumasi akumizimu yao,
Ncobeni wakalisalila bantu bako ba-Israyeli kuti babe musyobo wako lyoonse, nkabela webo, O Jehova, wakaba Leza wabo.
Lino, O Leza Jehova, eli ijwi ndyoamba aamulanda wako abasiŋanda bangu kolimikizya lyoonse, kuti ucite mbubonya mbuwaamba.
Izina lyako libe abulemu lyoonse akutamani, kukaambwe kuti, Jehova wamakamu makamu ngu-Leza uuendelezya ba-Israyeli, ayalo iŋanda yamulanda wako Davida iime nji kubusyu bwako.
Nkaambo nduwe Jehova wamakamu makamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Wandiyubunwida ndemulanda wako kuti, Njookuyakila iŋanda. Nciceeco moyo wangu ndemulanda wako ncuuyandila kukukombela eci cikombyo.
Lino O Mwami Jehova, nduwe Leza, amajwi aako ngalusinizyo. Wandisyomezya ndemulanda wako eci cintu cibotu,

Lino kotalika kulongezya ciinga cangu ndemulanda wako, kuti cikalilile kubusyu bwako lyoonse, nkaambo mbuboobo mbuwaamba, o Mwami Jehova. Ciinga cangu ndemulanda wako cilongezegwe alulongezyo lwako mazuba oonse akutamani.
Alimwi wakasaala ba-Moabu, nkabela wakabeeleka antambo, wakabalazika ansi, Wakeeleka milongo yobile kuti ijayigwe amulongo omwe kuti kaupona. Aboobo ba-Moabu bakaba bazike ba-Davida akuleta mutelo.
Alimwi Davida wakazunda Hadadezeri mwana wa-Rehobu, mwami wa-Zoba, naakali kuya kuyooboozya nyika yakwe yakulwizi.

Nkabela Davida wakajata kulinguwe basimbizi bali cuulu amyaanda iili musanu aibili, abasikweenda amaulu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile, elyo Davida wakatyola mazwi aambizi, pele wakaleka imbizi zyanola zili mwaanda.
Mpawo ba-Aramu baku-Damasko bakeza kuzoogwasya Hadadezeri mwami wa-Zoba, pele Davida wakajaya akati kaba-Aramu bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azibili.
Nkabela Davida wakabika basilumamba mucisi ca-Aramu cakuDamasko, aboobo ba-Aramu bakaba bazike ba-Davida akumuliya mutelo. Nkabela Jehova wakazundya Davida koonse nkwaakaya.
Lino Davida wakabweza intobo zyangolida nzibakajisi balanda ba-Hadadezeri, wakazileta ku-Jerusalemu.
Akwalo ku-Beta aku-Berotai, minzi ya-Hadadezeri, Davida wakabweza mukuba munji loko.
Lino Toi mwami wa-Hamati, naakamvwa Davida mbwaakakoma impi yoonse ya-Hadadezeri,

wakatuma mwanaakwe Joramu kumwami Davida, kuti akamujuzye akumusangalazya nkaambo kamakani aya aakulwana a-Hadadezeri akumuzunda, nkaambo kakuti Toi kajisi inkondo zinji nzyaakalwana a-Hadadezeri. Nkabela Joramu wakaletelezya zintu zyangolida azyansiliva azyamukuba,
elyo zintu ezi azyalo mwami Davida wakazisalazizya Jehova, antoomwe angolida ansiliva nzyaakasalazya kuzisi zyoonse nzyaakakoma,
ku-Aramu, aku-Moabu, akubana ba-Amoni, akubaFilisti akuba-Amaleki, azisaalo nzibakasaala kuli-Hadadezeri mwana, waRehobu mwami wa-Zoba.
Nkabela Davida wakalijanina impuwo naakaboola kuzwa kukukoma ba-Aramu mumumpata wa-Munyo naakajaya bantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu azitatu.
Alimwi wakabika impi mucisi ca-Edomu. Mucisi coonse buyo ca-Edomu wakabika impi, aboobo baEdomu boonse bakaba bazike ba-Davida. Nkabela Jehova wakazundya Davida koonse koonse nkwaakaya.
Mbuboobo Davida mbwaakaba abwami bwaba-Israyeli boonse, nkabela Davida wakali kubeteka bantu bakwe boonse cakululama.
Nkabela Joabu mwana wa-Zeruya kali musololi wampi, a-Josafati mwana wa-Ahiludi nguwakali kulemba makani,
a-Zadoki mwana wa-Ahitubi a-Ahimeleki mwana wa-Abiyatara kabali bapaizi, a-Seraya kali mulembi,
a-Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada kali silutwe waba-Kereti aba-Peleti, abana ba-Davida kabali bapaizi.
Nkabela kakuli umwi mulanda waluzubo lwa-Saulo, izina lyakwe kali Ziba, elyo oyu muntu bakamwiita kuli-Davida. Mpawo mwami wakamwaambila kuti, Sa nduwe Ziba? Wakati, Ndime, mwami.
Elyo mwami wakaamba kuti, Sa takuciceede muntu naba omwe waluzubo lwa-Saulo ngunkonzya kucitila buuya bwa-Leza? Nkabela Ziba wakaambila mwami kuti, Kwasyaala umwi mwana wa-Jonatani uulemene maulu.
Mpawo mwami wakabuzya kuti, Uli kuli? Lino Ziba wakavwiila mwami kuti, Nkwali kuŋanda ya-Makiri mwana wa-Amiyeli mumunzi wa-Lodebara.
Ndilyonya mwami Davida wakatuma kuyoomuleta kuzwa kuŋanda ya-Makiri mwana wa-Amiyeli mumunzi wa-Lodebara.
Aboobo Mefibosete mwana wa-Jonatani mwana wa-Saulo wakasika kuli-Davida, nkabela wakavundama ansi akukambilila.
Lino Davida wakati, Mefibosete. Wakavuwa kuti, Ndime ndemulanda wako.
Nkabela Davida wakamwaambila kuti, Utayoowi pe, nkaambo njanda kukucitila cabuuya nkaambo ka-Jonatani uso. Njookuboozezya myuunda yoonse ya-Saulo uso, alimwi uyoolya insima kulindime mazuba oonse.
Mpawo wakakotama, wakati, Akaka! Ndi buti mebo ndemulanela wako? Sa ulakonzya kulanga mubwa uufwide mbuli ndime?
Elyo mwami wakaita Ziba mulanda wa-Saulo, wakamwaambila kuti, Zintu zyoonse Saulo nzyaakajisi, azintu zyoonse izyakali zyabasiluzubo bakwe, ndazipa oyu mwana wasimalelaako.
Lino uleelede kulima nyika, webo abana bako abalanda bako, akutebula micelo, kuti mwami wako abe acilyo cakulya, Pele Mefibosete mwana wamwami wako uyoolya insima lyoonse kulindime.
Nkabela Ziba kajisi bana bali ikumi amusanu abalanda bali makumi obile.
Mpawo Ziba wakaambila mwami kuti, Mebo ndemulanda wako nzoocita zintu zyoonse buyo nzyandilailila mwami simalelaangu Pele Mefibosete wakali kulya kutafule lya-Davida mbuli umwi wabana bamwami.
Nkabela Mefibosete kali amwana muniini, izina lyakwe kali Mika. Nkabela boonse basiŋanda ba-Ziba bakaba balanda ba-Mefibosete.
Aboobo Mefibosete wakakede mu-Jerusalemu, nkaambo wakali kulya insima lyoonse kutafule lyamwami, Kali cilema maulu oonse obile.

Mpawo Davida wakati, Hanuni mwana wa-Nahasi njoomucitila cabuuya, mbubonya mbuli wisi mbwaakandicitila cabuuya ambebo, Aboobo Davida wakatuma balanda bakwe kuyooumuzya moyo wakwe nkaambo kawisi. Lino balanda baDavida bakasika kucisi caba-Amoni.

Pele bapati baba-Amoni bakaambila Hanuni mwami wabo kuti, Sa ulayeeya kuti nkaambo kakulemeka bauso Davida ncaakutumina basikukuumuzya? Sa Davida tabatumide aba balanda bakwe kuti bazoolange-lange munzi akubona mbuubede, kuti bausaale?
Mpawo Hanuni wakabweza balanda ba-Davida akubanyoola cisela comwe cacilezu, alimwi wakabakosweda zikobela zyabo muzibunu, elyo wakabatanda,
Lino Davida naakaambilwa aya makani, wakatuma kuyoobacinga, nkaambo bantu bakafwa bweeme loko. Elyo mwami wakati, Kamulindila ku-Jeriko mane zilezu zyanu zikamene, elyo mulaboola,
Elyo Davida naakamvwa obo, wakatuma Joabu ampi yoonse yabasinguzu.
Lino Ba-Amoni bakazwa mumunzi akubamba mindando yakulwana kumulyango wakunjilila, nkabela ba-Aramu baku-Zeba aku-Rehobu, abantu ba-Tobu aba-Maaka, boonse bakakede muzipanzi zipanzi.
Mpawo Joabu naakabona kuti inkondo ilalwigwa kunembo akusule, wakasala boonse baalumi basinguzu ba-Israyeli akubalanganya ba-Aramu,
pele boonse ibakasyaala wakababika mujanza lya-Abisai munyina akubalanganya abaAmoni.
Elyo wakati, Na ba-Aramu bali anguzu kwiinda ndime, uwe uyoondivuna, pele na ba-Amoni bali anguzu kwiinda nduwe, ambe ndeza kuzookuvuna.
Koliyumya, kuti tube abukozu bwakugwasya bantu besu aminzi ya-Leza wesu, Jehova acite kufumbwa cintu ncayanda.
Mpawo Joabu abantu mbaakali abo bakaswena afwiifwi kuyoolwana aba-Aramu, nkabela ba-Aramu bakamucija.
Lino ba-Amoni nibakabona kuti baAramu bacija, bakacija abalo kumunyina Abisai, bakanjila mumunzi. Elyo Joabu wakabweeda kuzwa kukulwana aba-Amoni, waakusika ku-Jerusalemu,
Nkabela ba-Aramu nibakabona kuti tulizundide kumaanza aaba-Israyeli, bakayoboloka.
Elyo Hadadezeri wakatuma kuyootamba ba-Aramu bamutala alwizi, nkabela bakasika ku-Helamu, alimwi Sobaki mwami wabasilumamba ba-Hadadezeri nguwakali kubasololela.
Lino Davida naakaambilwa obo, wakabunganya ba-Israyeli boonse akuzubuka mulonga wajordano akusika ku-Helamu. Mpawo ba-Aramu bakalibamba mumindando yabo kuzoolwana awe,

Nkabela ba-Aramu bakacija kuzwa kuba-Israyeli, nkabela Davida wakajaya akati kaba-Aramu basiŋola bali myaanda iili musanu aibili abasimbizi bali zyuulu zili makumi one, alakwe Sobaki mwami wabasilumamba babo wakamuuma akumujaya nkukonya.
Elyo bami boonse ibakali balanda ba-Hadadezeri, nibakabona kuti tulizundidwe kuba-Israyeli, bakatangana mulongo aba-Israyeli akuba balanda babo. Aboobo ba-Aramu bakayoowa kuzoovuna ba-Amoni limbi.
Mpawo Davida wakatuma kuyoobuzya makani aamwanakazi oyo, nkabela wakaambilwa kuti, Sa teenguwe Bateseba mukaUriya mu-Hiti?
Elyo Davida wakatuma batumwa kuyoomwiita, nkabela wakasika kulinguwe, wakalala awe, ciindi ncaakali kulisalazya kubusofwaazi bwakwe, elyo kusule wakabweeda kulinguwe.
Mpawo Davida wakatumina Joabu, wakati, Nditumine Uriya mu-Hiti. Lino Joabu wakatuma Uriya kuli-Davida.
Nkabela Uriya naakasika, Davida wakamubuzya kuti, Sa Joabu ulapona? Sa bantu boonse balapona? Sa inkondo ileenda kabotu?
Elyo Davida wakaambila Uriya kuti, Koya kuŋanda yako, ukasambe kumaulu, Mpawo Uriya wakazwa muŋanda yamwami, nkabela kwakamutobela nyama yacilumbyo iizwa kumwami.
Pele Uriya wakoona kumulyango waŋanda yamwami antoomwe abalanda boonse basimalelaakwe, teewakainka kuŋanda yakwe pe.
Lino Davida naakaambilwa kuti Uriya tana kwiinka kuŋanda yakwe, Davida wakaambila Uriya kuti, Sa tona kuzwa mulweendo na? Nkaambonzi nowatainka kuŋanda yako?

Mpawo Uriya wakavwiila Davida kuti, Ibbokesi lya-Leza aba-Israyeli aba-Juda boonse balikede muzilao, alakwe Joabu abalanda basimalelaangu boonse baloona musokwe, Lino mebo sa ndakonzya kuya kuŋanda yangu kuyoolya akunywa akulala amukangu? Mboli muumi, am buli moyo wako mbuuli muumi, ncobeni nsikonzyi kucita obo pe.
Mpawo Davida wakaambila Uriya kuti, Kala okuno asunu, elyo junza njookutuma. Aboobo Uriya wakakala mu-Jerusalemu buzuba obo abuzuba ibwakeza.
Nkabela Davida wakamwiita kuzoolya kulinguwe akunywa akumukozya, elyo ciindi camasiku Uriya wakaakoona abulo nkubakalede balanda basimalelaakwe, pele teewakainka kuŋanda yakwe pe.
Nkabela mulugwalo olo wakalemba kuti, Amubike Uriya mumundando mutaanzi wamunkondo inkali, elyo amumusie nkukonya, kuti ayaswe akufwa.
Lino Joabu naakali kulanga munzi, wakabika Uriya nkukonya oko nkwaakezi kuti nkukuli baalumi basinguzu.
Mpawo bantu bamumunzi bakazwa kuzoolwana a-Joabu, nkabela bamwi balanda baDavida bakajayigwa, alakwe Uriya mu-Hiti wakafwa,
Lino Joabu wakatuma kuyooambila Davida makani oonse aankondo.
Nkabela wakalailila mutumwa kuti, Wamana buyo kwaambila mwami makani oonse aankondo,
ambweni bukali bwamwami bulabuka, Ambweni uyookubuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nomwakaswena afwiifwi amunzi ciindi cakulwa? Sa teemwazi kuti bayoofusa mivwi kuzwa kubulambo?

Ngwani wakajaya Abimeleki mwana wa-Jerubeseti? Sa tamuzi kuti umwi mwanakazi nguwakamujaya ku-Tabezi naakamuwaala mwanankango kuzwa kubulambo? Nkaambonzi nomwakaswena afwiifwi abulambo? Elyo uleelede kwaamba kuti, Mulanda wako Uriya mu-Hiti alakwe wafwa.
Lino oyo mutumwa wakainka, wakaakwaambila Davida aya makani oonse ngaakamutuminwa kuli-Joabu.
Mutumwa wakaambila Davida kuti, Bantu bakali anguzu kwiinda ndiswe, aboobo bakasika nkukonya nkutwakabede kusokwe, nkabela twakabatanda mane kusikila kumanjililo aamulyango.
Mpawo basibuta bakatufusa mivwi iswe tubalanda bako kuzwa kubulambo, aboobo bamwi babalanda bamwami bafwa, alakwe mulanda wako Uriya mu-Hiti wafwa.

Nkabela Davida wakaambila mutumwa kuti, Mbuboobu mboelede kwaambila Joabu. Amba kuti, Aya makani atakubijili, pe, nkaambo taakwe muntu naba omwe uutajayiki kupanga. Amulwane alimwi canguzu kumunzi, kuti muunyonyoone. Koyumya moyo wakwe obo.
Mpawo mukaUriya naakamvwa kuti Uriya mulumaakwe wafwa, wakalila mulumaakwe.
Pele nicakamana ciindi cakwe cakulila, Davida wakamutumina akumuleta kuŋanda yakwe, nkabela wakaba mukakwe, elyo wakamuzyalila mwana, Pele eci cintu ncaakacita Davida cakabija loko mumeso aa-Jehova.
Muvubi kajisi imbelele aŋombe zinji loko,

pele mucete katakwe ncaakajisi cita kabelele komwe kapwizi nkaakavubide, Aka kabelele wakakalela kuŋanda yakwe antoomwe abana bakwe. Kakali kulya munsuma wakwe mwini, akunywida munkomeki yakwe, akulala akaango kakwe, aboobo kakaba mbuli mwana musimbi wakwe.

Lino muvubi wakaswayigwa silweendo, pele teewakayanda kujayila oyo mweenzu niiba imwi yambelele zyakwe na yaŋombe zyakwe, pe, wakabweza kabelele kamweenzinyina mucete, nkako nkaakajayila mweenzu iwakeza kuzoomuswaya.
Mpawo Davida wakakalalila loko oyo muntu, wakati, Ncobeni oyo muntu iwakacita obo uleelede kufwa.
Ako kabelele uleelede kukabweedezezya kone, nkaambo kakucita obo akutafwa insoni.

Nkabela ndakakupa iŋanda yasimalelaako, abalo banakazi basimalelaako ndakabakumbatanya ayebo. Ndakakupa luzubo lwa-Israyeli alwa-Juda, alimwi eci coonse nicakakuceela, nindakakupa azimwi zintu zili boobo.
Lino nkaambonzi nowasampaula ijwi lya-Jehova akucita bubi kumeso aangu? Uriya mu-Hiti wamujazya ipanga, amukakwe wamutola kulinduwe. Wamujazya ipanga lyabana-Amoni.
Nkaambo kako ipanga talikonzyi kuleka kukataazya mukowa wako mazuba oonse, nkaambo wandisampaula akutola muka-Uriya mu-Hiti abe mukako.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Langa! Ndakubusizya bubi buzwa muŋanda yako omwini. Njookunyanzya banakazi bako kumeso aako akubaabila mweenzinyoko, elyo uyoolalika banakazi bako izuba kalibala.
Cintu nciwakacita webo cakalisisidwe, pele eci cintu ncinti cite mebo ciyoocitwa kumeso aaba-Israyeli boonse azuba kalibala.
Mpawo Davida wakaambila Natani kuti, Ndabisya kuli-Jehova. Elyo Natani wakaambila Davida kuti, Alakwe Jehova wagwisya zibi zyako. Tokooyoofwa pe.
Nekubaboobo nkaambo kacibaka cakusampaula ncibapegwa basinkondonyina Jehova kuncito eyi njiwacita, ncobeni oyo mwana uuti kuzyalilwe ulafwa.
Mpawo Natani wakaya kuŋanda yakwe.
Nkabela Jehova wakauma mwana ngwaakazyala muka-Uriya kuli-Davida, aboobo wakaciswa loko.
Elyo Davida wakakombela mwana kuli-Leza, wakaliimya kulya akuyoolala ansi masiku oonse.
Lino bapati baŋanda yakwe bakabuka kuzoomubusya ansi mpaakalede, pele wakakaka, teewakalya abo insima pe.

Nkabela mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili mwana wakafwa, elyo balanda ba-Davida bakayoowa kumuzibya makani aalufu lwamwana, nkaambo bakaamba kuti, Mwana naakali muumi, wakakaka kuswiilila majwi esu ciindi ncitwakamwaambila, lino na twamwaambila kuti mwana wafwa, ulaindila kubijilwa.
Mpawo Davida wakabona kuti balanda bakwe balapetekezya, aboobo wakamvwa kuti mwana wafwa. Lino Davida wakabuzya balanda bakwe kuti, Wafwa na mwana? Bakati, Ii, wafwa.
Lino balanda bakwe bakabuzya kuti, Ino ninzi eci nciwacita? Mwana naakacili muumi, wakali kuliimya kulya akulila, pele ecino ciindi mwana naafwa, wabuka akulya insima.
Wakati, Mwana, naakacili muumi, ndakaliimya kulya akulila, nkaambo ndakati, Ambweni Jehova ulatufwida luzyalo, kuti mwana apone.
Pele ecino ciindi naafwa, sa ndakonzya kuliimya kulya na? Sa ndakonzya kumuboozya? Ime njooinka nkwabede, pele walo takooyooboola kulindime pe.
wakatuma kujanza lya-Natani musinsimi, akumuulika izina lya-Muyandwi-wa-Jehova, nkaambo ka-Jehova.
Mpawo joabu wakatuma batumwa kuli-Davida, wakati, Ndalwana a-Raba, alimwi ndausaala munzi wamaanzi.
Lino webo kobunganya boonse bantu basyeede, uze kuzoozyunguluka munzi akuuzunda, kuti utazundwi kumaanza aangu akubandwa izina lyangu.
Mpawo Davida wakabunganya bantu boonse, wakainka ku-Raba, wakalwana amunzi akuuzunda.

Nkabela wakagwisya munsini wamwami kumutwe wakwe. Bulemu bwamunsini oyo kabuli mbuli italenta lyangolida, alimwi wakali amabwe mayandisi, elyo wakabikwa amutwe wa-Davida. Nkabela oko kumunzi bakanyanzya cisaalo cipati loko.

Abalo bantu ibakali mulinguwo, wakabagwisya akubabika kumasaha akuzisagwido zyabutale akutuleba twabutale, akubabelesya milimo yakubumba zitina. Mbubonya obo mbwaakacitila minzi yoonse yabana-Amoni, Elyo Davida wakaboola abantu boonse ku-Jerusalemu.
Elyo Amnoni kapengede loko mumoyo wakwe, wakaciswa, nkaambo kamwananyina musimbi Tamara, nkaambo katakwetwe, pele wakayeeya kuti ndakacilwa kumucitila cintu.
Lino Amnoni kajisi muzolwani, izina lyakwe kali jonadabu mwana wa-Simeya mukulana wa-Davida. Oyu Jonadabu kali simaanu loko.

Elyo wakamwaambila kuti, Ino webo nomwana wamwami, nkaambonzi nowaciswaciswa mazuba oonse? Sa toyandi kundaambila? Mpawo Amnoni wakamuvwiila kuti, Moyo wangu ulayandisya mucizi wa-Abisalomu mukulana wangu.

Nkabela Jonadabu wakamwaambila kuti, Kolala abula bwako, ulyeenyenye kuciswa, elyo uso as ika kuzookubona, uleelede kumwaambila kuti, Aboole mucizi wangu Tamara kuzoondijikila insima, alimwi ajike eci cilyo mumeso aangu, kuti mbone akulisigwa kumaanza aakwe.

Mpawo Amnoni wakalala, wakalyeenyenya kuciswa. Nkabela mwami naakasika kuzoomubona, Amnoni wakaambila mwami kuti, Aboole mucizi wangu Tamara kuzoondijikila zinkwa zyobile mumeso aangu, kuti nkalye mujanza lyakwe.
Lino Davida wakatumina Tamara kuŋanda, wakati, Boola kuŋanda ya-Amnoni munyandumi wako, umukutaukile cilyo.
Lino Tamara wakainka kuŋanda ya-Amnoni munyandumi wakwe naakalede, elyo wakabweza busu, wabukanda, wajika mumeso aakwe akukutauka zinkwa.
Nkabela naakabweza cijikilo akupampula zilyo, wakakaka kulya, Elyo Amnoni wakati, Bantu boonse bazwe anze kulindime, Mpawo boonse bantu bakaya anze.
Lino Amnoni wakaambila Tamara kuti, Leta insima omuno muŋanda yakoona, ndye mujanza lyako. Nkabela Tamara wakabweza zilyo nzyaakajika, akuzileta kuli-Amnoni munyandumi wakwe munanda yakoona.
Lino naakaziswenya afwiifwi kuti alye, wakamujata akumwaambila kuti, Boola, tulale ayebo, O mucizi wangu.
Wakati, Pe, munyandumi wangu, utandibisizyi, nkaambo cintu cili boobo cilatondwa mu-Israyeli, Utaciti cabufubafuba obu pe.
Ime njootola kuli bweeme bwangu? Ayebo omwini uyooba mbuli umwi wabafubafuba bamuIsrayeli. Lino ambila mwami makani aya, nkaambo takooyookukasya kukwatana ambebo pe.
Pele wakakaka kuswiilila mbwaakaamba, wakamujata akumubisizya akulala awe.
Elyo Amnoni wakamusula alusulo lupati loko, nkabela olo lusulo ndwaakamusuzya lwakainda luyando ndwaakasaanguna kumuyandisya, Mpawo Amnoni wakamwaambila kuti, Buka, koya.
Wakati, Pe, nkaambo oku kubisya kwako kwakunditanda kulabiia akwiinda kubisya kutaanzi nkuwandibisizya. Pele wakakaka kumuswiilila.
Lino wakaita mulombe wakwe iwakali kumukutaukila, wakati, Mutande oyu mwanakazi anze akukwida kumulyango.
Tamara wakabika bulongo amutwe wakwe, akudeluula cikobela camabala mabala ncaakasamide, elyo wakalijata kumakose akuya bweenda bulila.

Lino Abisalomu munyandumi wakwe wakamubuzya kuti, Sa Amnoni munyandumi wako wali ayebo? Lino mucizi wangu, umuzya moyo wako, nkaambo munyandumi wako, Utakataazyi moyo kumakani aya, Elyo Tamara wakakala alike muŋanda ya-Abisalomu mukulana wakwe.
Nkabela mwami Davida naakamvwa makani aya wakakalala loko.
Pele Abisalomu taakwe ncaakaambila Amnoni, niciba cibi niciba cibotu, nkaambo Abisalomu wakasula Amnoni nkaambo kakubisya nkwaakabisizya Tamara mucizi wakwe.
Mpawo Abisalomu wakasika kumwami, wakati, Langa! Ime ndemulanda wako ndijisi basikuyunda imbelele. Lino twiinke ayebo, O mwami, abalanda bako boonse.
Pele mwami wakavwiila Abisalomu kuti, Pe, pe, mwanaangu, tutayi toonse, kuti tutakukataazyi, Elyo wakamusungilizya, nekubaboobo teewakazumina pe, wakamulumba buyo.
Lino Abisalomu wakati, Sa tatukonzyi kwiinka a-Amnoni mwanama? Nkabela mwami wakamwaambila kuti, Nkaambonzi noyanda kwiinka awe?
Pele Abisalomu wakamusungilizya, aboobo wakatuma awe Amnoni abana boonse bamwami.
Nkabela balombe ba-Abisalomu bakacitila Amnoni mbubonya mbuli Abisalomu mbwaakabalailila. Mpawo boonse bana bamwami bakanyamuka, bakatanta umwi aumwi ambongolo yakwe, akucija.
Nkabela nibakacili kuza, Davida wakasikilwa impuwo yakuti, Abisalomu wajaya bana boonse bamwami, taakwe naba omwe wasyaala.
Mpawo mwami wakabuka, wakadeluula zyakusama zyakwe, wakakala ansi, abalo balanda bakwe boonse bakaliimvwi azyakusama zideluukide.

Pele Jonadabu mwana wa-Simeya mukulana wa-Davida wakavuwa kuti, Mwami wangu atayeeyi kuti boonse balombe bana bamwami bafwa, pe, nkaambo Amnoni alike nguwafwa, nkaambo aya makani akalikosokede kale mumoyo wa-Abisalomu kuzwa kubuzuba obo Amnoni naakabisizya mucizi wakwe Tamara.
Lino mwami simalelaangu atalikataazyi mumoyo kumakani aya cakuyeeya kuti bana bamwami boonse bafwa, nkaambo Amnoni alike nguwafwa.
Pele Abisalomu wakacija. Nkabela mulombe sikulanga naakasumpula meso aakwe wakabona bantu banji balaya bumutobela munzila yakubbazu lyacilundu.
Mpawo jonadabu wakaambila mwami kuti, Bona! Baleza bana bamwami. Mbubonya mbundakaamba ndemulanda wako mbukabede.
Elyo naakamana buyo kwaamba, bakasika bana bamwami, nkabela bakanyampula majwi aabo akulila, alakwe mwami abalanda bakwe boonse bakalila kulila kupati loko.
Lino Abisalomu wakacija, wakaya kuliTalimai mwana wa-Amihuri mwami waku-Gesuri, Nkabela Davida wakali kulila mwanaakwe mazuba oonse.
Elyo moyo wamwami Davida wakalisukeme kuya kuli-Abisalomu, nkaambo wakaumizigwa kale kumakani aa-Amnoni naakabona kuti wafwa.
Lino Joabu mwana wa-Zeruya, naakabona kuti moyo wamwami ulisukeme Abisalomu,

wakatuma ku-Tekowa kuyootamba mwana­ kazi uucenjede. Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Ulyeenyenye kuti uli sikulila, usame zyakusama zya dilwe akutalinanika mafuta, kuti uboneke mbuli mwanakazi iwamana mazuba manji kukulila mufu.
Elyo uleelede kusika kumwami akumwaambila obo, Nkabela joabu wakabika majwi mukanwa lyakwe.
Mpawo oyo s mwanakazi waku-Tekowa wakasika kumwami, nkabela wakavundama ansi akukotamina, wakati, Kondigwasya, O mwami.
Lino ime ndemulanda wako ndakajisi bana balombe bobile, Aba bobile bakalwana musokwe, nkabela taakwe muntu wakubalesyanya, aboobo umwi wakauma mweenzinyina akumujaya.

Mpawo mukowa woonse wakandibukila ndemulanda wako, bakati, Utwaabile oyo mwana iwakajaya mweenzinyina, kuti tumujaye alakwe nkaambo kabuumi bwamweenzinyina ngwaakajaya. Lino kukucita obo balanyonyoona sikulyazina, aboobo balazimya mulilo wangu uucisyeede akutasiila mulumi wangu niliba izina niluba luungu ansi ano.
Nkabela mwami wakaambila mwanakazi kuti, Koya kuŋanda yako, ndalailila aanduwe.
Lino mwami wakati, Kufumbwa muntu uukwaambila cintu, komuleta kulindime, elyo takooyookukataazya limbi pe.
Wakati, Mwami atalubi Jehova Leza wakwe, kuti sikutema mulandu wabulowa atanyonyooni limbi, atajayi mwanaangu. Wakati, Ncobeni Jehova mbali muumi, mwanaako takooyoowidwa ansi kasusu nikaba komwe.
Lino mwanakazi wakati, Ime ndi mulanda wako. Ngambile mwami simalelaangu ijwi. Wakaamba kuti, Amba.

Mpawo mwanakazi wakati, Ino nkaambonzi nokanza makani aali boobo cakubisizya bantu ba-Leza? Nkaambo mwami mbwaamba obo uli mbuli muntu uujisi mulandu, nkaambo mwami taboozyi kulinguwe mwanaakwe uutandidwe.

Nkaambo ncobeni tuleelede kufwa, abwalo buumi bwesu bulaba mbuli maanzi aatika ansi aatakonzyi kuboozegwa mwakabede, Nkabela Leza mwini tanyanzyi buumi, pele ulakanza buyo makanzo kuti mwanaakwe uutandidwe atatandililwi.
Lino ndasika kuzooambila mwami simalelaangu aya makani nkaambo kakuti bantu bandiyoosya. Ndemulanda wako ndakati, Nkaambile mwami. Ambweni mwami ulacita mbwaamba mulanda wakwe musimbi.
Nkaambo mwami uyoondiswiilila akundivuna ndemulanda wakwe kuzwa kumaanza aayooyo uuyanda kutunyonyoona toonse amwana wangu kunyika ya-Jehova.

Aboobo ndemulanda wako ndakati, Ijwi lyamwami simalelaangu libe lyakutontozya nkaambo mwami simalelaangu uli mbubonya mbuli angelo wa-Leza, ulizi kumvwisya makani mbwaabede na mabotu na mabi, alimwi Jehova Leza wako abe ayebo.
Mpawo mwami wakaambila mwanakazi kuti, Utandisisi makani ngenti kakubuzye. Mwanakazi wakati, Aambe simalelaangu.

Lino mwami wakabuzya kuti, Sa ijanza lya-Joabu talili ayebo mumakani aya na? Nkabela mwanakazi wakavuwa kuti, Ncobeni mbubonya mboli muumi, O mwami simalelaangu, taakwe muntu uukonzya kuleesya majwi ngaamba mwami simalelaangu, nikuba kululyo nikuba kucimweensi, nkaambo mulanda wako Joabu nguwakandilailila ndemulanda wako akubika aya majwi oonse mukanwa lyangu.
Kusandula makani mulanda wako Joabu nkwaakacitila obo. Lino mwami wangu uli amaanu mbuli maanu aangelo wa-Leza, ulibwene toonse twaansi.
Elyo mwami wakaambila Joabu kuti, Bona! Ndacita eci cintu. Koya, ukaboozye mulombe Abisalomu.

Mpawo Joabu wakavundama ansi, wakakotamina, akulumba mwami. Nkabela Joabu wakati, Sunu ndemulanda wako ndizi kuti ndijene luzyalo mumeso aako nkaambo mwami wazumina kucita mbubonya mbundaamba ndemulanda wakwe.
Lino Joabu wakanyamuka, wakaya ku-Gesuri akuboozya Abisalomu ku-Jerusalemu,
Mpawo mwami wakati, Aye kuŋanda yakwe, tatukonzyi kubonana ameso pe. Aboobo Abisalomu wakaya kuŋanda yakwe, pele kubonana ameso katana kubona mwami pe.

Nkabela ciindi coonse ncaakagelwa, (wakali kugelwa lyoonse kumamanino aamwaaka, nkaambo isusu lyakwe lyakamulemena, nciceeco ncaakali kugelelwa), wakeeleka bulemu bwasusu lyakwe, wakajana kuti mbwamasyekeli aali myaanda yobile mbwaaelekwa kuceelesyo camwami.
Nkabela Abisalomu wakazyala bana balombe botatwe amusimbi omwe, izina lyakwe kali Tamara, kali mwanakazi waciwa ceebesi.
Lino Abisalomu naakamana myaaka yobile yakukala mu-Jerusalemu, katana kubonana amwami kumeso.
Elyo Abisalomu wakatumina Joabu kuti amutume kumwami, pele wakakaka kuza, alimwi naakatuma alwabili wakacili kukaka.

Mpawo wakaambila balanda bakwe kuti, Amubone! Muunda wa-Joabu ulibambene awangu, alimwi ulilimide bbaale mulinguwo. Kamuya, mukautente amulilo, Mpawo balanda ba-Abisalomu bakaakutenta muunda wa-Joabu.
Elyo Joabu wakanyamuka, wakasika kuŋanda yaAbisalomu, wakamubuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi balanda bako nobatenta muunda wangu?

Nkabela Abisalomu wakavuwa kuti, Swiilila! Ndaka-kutumina, ndakati, Boola okuno, nkakutume kumwami akumubuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi ndeza okuno kuzwa ku-Gesuri? Nicandibotela kwiinda nindacili nkukonya. Lino njanda kubonana amwami kumeso, elyo na ndijisi mulandu, andijaye.
Mpawo Joabu wakasika kumwami akumwaambila aya makani. Elyo wakatumina Abisalomu, nkabela wakasika nkwaakabede mwami akumukotamina cakuvundama ansi. Lino mwami wakamyonta Abisalomu.

Nkabela Abisalomu wakali kufuma kubuka, akwiima kumbali anzila iiya kumulyango, elyo kufumbwa muntu iwakajisi makani aakuleta kunkuta kumwami, Abisalomu wakamwiita akumubuzya kuti, Ino uzwa kumunzinzi uwe? Lino oyo muntu wakavuwa kuti, Ime ndemulanda wako ndazwa kumukowa oyo wa-Israyeli.
Nkabela Abisalomu wakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Makani aako mabotu, aliluleme, pele taakwe muntu ngwaabika mwami uukonzya kukuswiilila.
Mpawo Abisalomu wakati, No cakali cibotu bwami nobwakali mumaanza aangu, elyo muntu woonse uuli amakani aakubeteka naakasika kulindime nondakakonzya kumubetekela cakululama.
Lino muntu naakaswena afwiifwi kuzoomukotamina, wakali kutandabika ijanza lyakwe akumujata akumumyonta.
Mbubonya obo Abisalomu mbwaakali kucitila boonse bantu ibakasika kumwami kuzoobetekwa, aboobo Abisalomu wakabba myoyo yabantu ba-Israyeli.
Nkaambo ndemulanda wako ndakakonkezya cikonkezyo ciindi eco ncindakakede ku-Gesuri mucisi ca-Aramu, Ndakati, Na Jehova ulandiboozya ku-Jerusalemu, elyo njoomanina Jehova milimo.
Nkabela mwami wakamwaambila kuti, Koya caluumuno. Mpawo wakanyamuka, wakaya ku-Hebroni,
Lino Abisalomu wakatuma batumwa mumikowa yoonse ya-Israyeli, wakati, Kufumbwa ciindi ncimuyoomvwa mweembo kulila, amwaambe kuti, Abisalomu waba mwami mu-Hebroni.
Nkabela Abisalomu wakeenda abantu bali myaanda yobile kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu. Aba bantu bakalitambidwe, bakaya camoyo uululeme, teebakazi makani pe.

Elyo Davida wakatuma kuyooita Ahitofeli mu-Giloni, sinkuta wa-Davida, kumunzi wakwe ku-Gilo, naakali kupaila zipaizyo, Nkabela oku kuzangila kwakakomena, nkaambo bantu Abisalomu mbaakali abo bakali kuya buvula.

Mpawo Davida wakaambila balanda bakwe boonse mbaakali abo mu-Jerusalemu kuti, Amubuke, tucije, nkaambo twatacija tatukooyookonzya kuloboka kumaanza aa-Abisalomu. Amufwambaane kunyamuka, kuti atafwambaani kutweenzya akutuletela bubi akusaala munzi apanga.
Elyo balanda bamwami bakamwaambila kuti, Kufumbwa zintu mwami simalelo esu nzyati sale, tulazicita nzizyonya.
Mpawo mwami wakainka abasiŋanda bakwe boonse baleenda amaulu. Nkabela mwami wakasia banakazi basimamambe bali ikumi kuti balindile iŋanda.
Lino mwami wakainka, abantu boonse bakamutobela, nkabela bakaima kuŋanda iili kule.
Elyo balanda bakwe boonse bakali kwiinda kubbazu limwi, aba-Kereti aba-Peleti aboonse ba-Giti, bantu bali myaanda iili musanu aumwi ibakamutobela kuzwa ku-Gati, bakali kwiinda kubusyu bwamwami.
Wakasika jilo buyo, Sa sunu ndakonzya kukucita kuti twiinke ayebo ciindi ecino ncindi mukweendeenda kufumbwa nkunja? Kobweeda akubweedezya abalo bananyokwe, Luzyalo alusinizyo lube ayebo.

Pele Itai wakavwiila mwami kuti, Ncobeni Jehova mbwali muumi, amwami simalelaangu mbali muumi, kufumbwa nkwaabede mwami simalelaangu, nimuba mulufu nimuba mubuumi, nkukonya oko nkunjooba ndemulanda wako ambebo.
Elyo Davida wakaambila Itai kuti, Mbubo, koya kunembo. Lino Itai mu-Giti wakainda kunembo abantu bakwe boonse abanikenike mbaakali abo.
Nkabela cisi coonse cakali kulila, abantu boonse bakali kwiinda kunembo, elyo mwami alakwe wakazubuka kalonga ka-Kedroni, abantu boonse bakainda munzila iiya kunkanda.

Lino Zadoki wakeza alakwe aboonse ba-Levi, balayumuna ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Leza, elyo bakatula ibbokesi lya-Leza, nkabela Abiyatara wakatanta kujulu, mane bantu boonse bamana kwiindilila kuzwa kumunzi.
Pele na waamba kuti, Nsikuyandi, elyo ulakonzya kundicitila kufumbwa cintu ncayanda.
Alimwi mwami wakaambila Zadoki mupaizi kuti, Sa toli musondi na? Bweeda kumunzi caluumuno antoomwe abana banu bobile, Ahimaazi mwana wako a-Jonatani mwana wa-Abiyatara.
Bona! Njoolindila azito zyamusokwe mane nkasikilwe makani aazwa kulinduwe.
Mpawo Zadoki a-Abiyatara bakabweedezya ibbokesi lya-Leza ku-Jerusalemu akukala nkuko.
Elyo Davida wakaambilwa kuti, Ahitofeli alakwe ulagwasyanya a-Abisalomu mukuzangila kwakwe, Mpawo Davida wakati, O Jehova, kosandula lulungunwido lwaAhitofeli kuti lube lwabufubafuba.
Lino Davida naakasika kumutwe wacilundu, nkukonya oko nkubakali kukomba Leza, wakabona Husai muAriki uleza kuzoomucinga, zyakusama zyakwe zyakalideluukide, alimwi kali avu amutwe.
Mpawo Davida wakamwaambila kuti, Na wandisindikila nkunja, ulandikataazya buyo,

pele kuti kopiluka kumunzi akwaambila Abisalomu kuti, Mbe mulanda wako, O Mwami, nkakumanine milimo mbubonya mbundakali kumanina bauso milimo ciindi cakamana, elyo uyookonzya kundizundila lulungunwido lwa-Ahitofeli.
Sa toli a-Zadoki a-Abiyatara bapaizi na? Lino kufumbwa makani ngoswiilila kuŋanda yamwami uleelede kwaambila Zadoki a-Abiyatara bapaizi.
Nkaambo bana babo bobile mpobali, Ahimaazi mwana wa-Zadoki a-Jonatani mwana wa-Abiyatara, mbembabo mboelede kutuma kuzoondaambila makani oonse ngoswiilila.
Elyo Husai mweenzinyina Davida wakapiluka kumunzi, nkabela Abisalomu alakwe wakasika ku-Jerusalemu.

Mpawo mwami wakabuzya Ziba kuti, Ino ezi zintu zili amulimonzi? Nkabela Ziba wakavuwa kuti, Imbongolo nzyakutanta basiŋanda bamwami, azinkwa amicelo nzyakulya balombe, awaini ngwakunywa abo bakateede munkanda.
Elyo mwami wakabuzya kuti, Ino uli kuli mwana wasimalelaako? Nkabela Ziba wakaambila mwami kuti, Ncobeni ulikede mu-Jerusalemu, nkaambo wati, Sunu luzubo lwa-Israyeli lulandiboozezya bwami bwataata.
Mpawo mwami wakaambila Ziba kuti, Bona! Zintu zyoonse zya-Mefibosete zyaba zyako, Nkabela Ziba wakati, Twakabomba! Nkajane luzyalo kumeso aamwami simalelaangu.
Nkabela wakafusa Davida mabwe, abalanda bakwe boonse abantu boonse abasilumamba mbaakali abo kululyo akulumwensi.
Mbuboobo mbwaakaamba Simeyi mukutuka kwakwe, Wakati, Zwa! Zwa! Uwe ootila bulowa! Uwe omwana wa-Saatani.
