Jehova wakubweedezezya mulandu wabulowa boonse bwaluzubo lwa-Saulo nguwakanyanzya bwami bwakwe. Jehova waaba bwami mumaanza aamwanaako Abisalomu. Sunu wasikilwa mapenzi, nkaambo uli sibulowa.
Mpawo Abisai mwana wa-Zeruya wakaambila mwami kuti, Sa oyu mubwa uufwide ulakonzya kuzumizigwa kutuka mwami simalelaangu? Njiinke kuyoomugonka mutwe.

Pele mwami wakati, Ino ndijisi makaninzi anywebo nubana ba-Zeruya? Na watuka, alimwi na Jehova nguwakamwaambila kuti, Kotuka Davida, sa kuli muntu naba omwe uukonzya kumwaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nocita obo?

Alimwi Davida wakaambila Abisai abalanda bakwe kuti, Amubone! Mwanaangu iwakazwa mubula bwangu ndemwini uli mukuyandaula buumi bwangu. Lino oyu mwana wa-Benjamini­ sa takooinda kucita obo na? Amumuleke, atuke, nkaambo Jehova nguwakamulailila.
Ambweni Jehova ulabona mafwabi aangu akundiboozezya coolwe mubusena bwamatusi aakwe ngaandituka sunu.
Elyo Davida abantu bakwe kabaceenda munzila, nkabela Simeyi keenda mbubonya kumunkuni wacilundu, kaya butuka akufusa mabwe akuliyila lusuko.
Lino mwami abantu boonse mbaakali abo bakasika cakukataala ku­-Jordano, bakalyokezya nkuko.
Lino Abisalomu abantu boonse ba-Israyeli bakasika ku-Jerusalemu, alakwe Ahitofeli kaliko.
Nkabela Husai mu-Ariki mweenzinyina Davida, naakasika kuli-Abisalomu, wakamwaambila kuti, Apone mwami! Apone mwami!
Elyo Abisalomu wakaambila Husai kuti, Sa mbuboobu mbofwida mweenzinyoko luzyalo? Nkaambonzi tona kwiinka amweenzinyoko?
Lino Husai wakavwiila Abisalomu kuti, Pe, nkaambo oyo ngwasala Jehova angubasala aba bantu abantu boonse ba-Israyeli, ambebo ndeelede kuba wakwe akukala awe.
Alimwi, nguni ngunjeelede kumanina milimo? Sa tacili cibotu kuti nkamanine mwanaakwe milimo? Mbuli mbundakabeleka kulibauso, nkacite mbubonya kulinduwe.

Nkabela Ahitofeli wakaambila Abisalomu kuti, Koswanaana abasimamambe bauso mbaakasia kuti balindile iŋanda, elyo ba-Israyeli boonse balamvwa kuti bauso bakusesemwa, aboobo maanza aabo boonse mboli abo alayumizigwa.
Mpawo bakabambila Abisalomu itente atala alululi, nkabela wakaswanaana abasimamambe bawisi mumeso aaba-Israyeli boonse.
Lino lulungunwido lwa-Ahitofeli ndwaakalungununa mumazuba alya akayeeyegwa mbuli majwi aa-Leza. Mbuboobu mbulwakabede lulungunwido lwakwe loonse, nikuba kuli-Davida nikuba kuli-Abisalomu.
Lino Ahitofeli wakaambila Abisalomu kuti, Nsale bantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi azibili, nyamuke kuyootobela Davida masiku,
elyo ndakonzya kusika nkwaabede ciindi ncakataala akulyokezya, njoomuyoosya, aboobo bantu boonse mbaali abo bayoocija. Nkabela mwami alike ngunti kaume,
elyo bantu boonse njoobaboozya kulinduwe mbubonya mbuli sikubwinga mbwaboola kumulumaakwe. Kojaya buyo muntu omwe, elyo bantu boonse bayookala caluumuno.
Nkabela aya majwi akabota mumeso aa-Abisalomu amumeso aabapati boonse ba-Israyeli.
Mpawo Abisalomu wakati, Amwiite Husai mu-Ariki, kuti tumuswiilile alakwe mbwaamba.
Elyo Husai naakasika kuli-Abisalomu, Abisalomu wakamwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Ahitofeli. Sa tucite mbwaamba? Na uwe wayeeya buti?
Nkabela Husai wakaambila Abisalomu kuti, Lulungunwido ndwaalungununa Ahitofeli taluli lubotu kuciindi ecino pe.

Husai wakati, Ulizi uso mbwabede abantu bakwe mbubabede, nkaambo mbaalumi basintaze, alimwi myoyo yabo ililulide mbuli moyo wasuntwe naanyanzigwa bana musokwe. Alimwi uso muntu wankondo, takooyoona akati kabantu pe.
Ciindi ecino uliyubide mumwi mudindi nanka mubusena bumwi, lino basaanguna buyo kuwa bamwi bantu, kufumbwa muntu uuswiilila ulaamba kuti, Kuli kujayigwa akati kabantu batobela Abisalomu.

Mpawo oyo uuswiilila, nekuba kuti ngumwaalumi sintaze uuli amoyo mbuli moyo wamulavu, moyo wakwe ulayaaya, nkaambo ba-Israyeli boonse balizi kuti uso ngumulwani, abalo bantu mbaali abo mbaalumi basintaze.

Nkaambo kako ndakulungunwida kuti uleelede kuyobolola ba-Israyeli boonse kuzwa ku-Dani kusikila ku-Beereseba, bantu banji loko mbuli muse wakunkomwe yalwizi, alimwi uleelede kuya kunkondo omwini akati kabo.
Aboobo tuyoomujana kufumbwa nkwabede, tuyoomuzida mbuli mume mbuuwida ansi, elyo takukooyoosyaala muntu naba omwe akati kabantu boonse mbaali abo.
Nkabela na wanjila mumwi mumunzi, elyo ba-Israyeli boonse baleelede kuleta intambo kumunzi oyo, kuti tuukwele kumulonga, kutasyaali mulinguwo kabwe nikaba komwe.
Lino Husai wakaambila Zadoki a-Abiyatara bapaizi kuti, Ahitofeli wakalungunwida Abisalomu abapati ba-Israyeli obo, pele mebo ndakabalungunwida obo.
Lino amufwambaane kutuma kuyooambila Davida kuti, Utaoni sunu kucito cakunkanda, pe, kozubuka buyo, kuti batamenwi mwami abantu boonse mbaali abo.

Pele umwi mulombe wakababona, wakaakulwiida Abisalomu. Lino bakeenda lubilo boonse bobile, bakasika kuŋanda yamuntu umwi waku-Bahurimu. Oyo muntu kali acikala mulubuwa lwakwe, elyo bakaseluka omo mucikala.
Nkabela mwanakazi wakabweza cisani akucivumbya amulomo wacikala akuyanika maila mpoonya awo, pele katakwe cintu cakazibwa.

Mpawo balanda ba-Abisalomu nibakasika kumwanakazi kuŋanda, bakabuzya kuti, Bali kuli ba-Ahimaazi a-Jonatani? Mwanakazi wakati, Bazubuka kale mutala amulonga. Elyo bakaya bubalangaula, pele teebakabajana pe, aboobo bakapiluka ku-Jerusalemu.

Lino bainke buyo, bakazwa mucikala mubakabede, baakulwiida mwami Davida. Bakaambila Davida kuti, Amunyamuke, mufwambaane kuzubuka mutala amulonga, nkaambo mbuboobu Ahitofeli mbwaakalungununa aandinywe.
Mpawo Davida wakanyamuka abantu boonse mbaakali abo, bakazubuka Jordano, nkabela nibwakaca katakwe muntu naba omwe iwatakalina kuzubuka Jordano.

Nkabela Ahitofeli naakabona kuti lulungunwido­ lwakwe taluswiilidwe, wakabamba imbongolo yakwe, wakanyamuka, wakaya kuŋanda yakwe kumunzi, nkabela naakamana kubamba makani aakwe, wakalisina. Mbuboobo mbwaakafwa, nkabela wakazikwa kumavwiko aawisi.

Nkabela Abisalomu wakabika Amasa mucibaka ca-Joabu mbuli silutwe wampi. Oyu Amasa kali-mwana wamuntu umwi mu-Israyeli, izina lyakwe kali Itra, kaswanene a-Abigayeli mwana musimbi wa-Nahasi mucizi wa-Zeruya banyina Joabu.
Elyo ba-Israyeli aba-Abisalomu boonse bakayaka zilao mucisi ca-Gileadi,
Aba bantu bakaleta malo, ambede, azibiya zyabulongo, abulotwe, abbaale, abusu, amisozya, anyangu, anyemu, abuntele,
abuci, amaumba, ambelele, amafuta aaŋombe, akuzileta zyoonse kuli-Davida zyakusanina bantu mbaakali abo, nkaambo bakati, Bantu bafwa inzala akukataala akufwa nyotwa musokwe mubabede.
Lino Davida wakabunganya bantu mbaakali abo akubabikila basilutwe bazyuulu abasilutwe bamyaanda.

Nkabela Davida naakatuma bantu, wakabika cipanzi catatu mumaanza aa-Joabu, acipanzi catatu mumaanzanza aa-Abisai mwana wa-Zeruya munyina Joabu, acipanzi catatu mumaanza aa-Itai mu-Giti, Lino mwami wakaambila bantu kuti, Ncobeni ambe ndainka anywe.

Pele bantu bakavuwa kuti, Toelede kwiinka pe, nkaambo na twacija, tabakooyoobika myoyo yabo kulindiswe pe. Nanka cisela cesu twafwa, tabakooyoobika myoyo yabo. Pele uwe uleelene azyuulu zili ikumi akati kesu. Lino cintu cibotu nceeci. Kolibamba kutugwasya kumunzi.
Mpawo mwami wakabaambila kuti, Kufumbwa cintu cibota kumeso aanu njoocicita. Nkabela mwami wakaima kubbazu lyamulyango, abantu boonse bakali kwiinda myaanda myaanda azyuulu zyuulu.
Lino mwami wakalailila Joabu a-Abisai a-Itai kuti, Amucitile mulombe Abisalomu cabuuya. Nkabela bantu boonse bakamvwa aya makani mwami ngaakalailila basilutwe boonse aa-Abisalomu.
Elyo bantu bakainka musokwe kuyooswanana aba-Israyeli, nkabela inkondo yakalwigwa mulusaka lwaEfraimu.
Lino bantu ba-Israyeli bakazundwa kumaanza aabalanda baDavida, nkabela obo buzuba kakuli bujayi bupati bwabantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile.
Lino inkondo yakali kuya bumwaika anyika yoonse, alimwi lusaka ndulwakali kulya bantu banji kwiinda bantu ibakajayigwa apanga obo buzuba.

Mpawo Abisalomu wakaswanana abalanda baDavida, Kalitantide ambongolo, elyo imbongolo yakainda kunsi lyamitabi iivovwede yamusamu mupati, nkabela isusu lyakwe lyakajatwa omo mumusamu, aboobo wakasyaala kazumuka akatikati kajulu anyika, ambongolo njaakatantide yakaindilila.
Elyo umwi muntu wakamubona, waakulwiida Joabu makani. Wakati, Ncobeni ndabona Abisalomu ulazumuka mumusamu.
Mpawo Joabu wakaambila oyo muntu iwakamulwiida makani kuti, Ma! Na wamubona, ino nkaambonzi nowatamuuma akumuwisya ansi mpoonya awo? Nowacita obo nongakupa mali aatuba aali ikumi alutambo.

Lino oyo muntu wakaambila Joabu kuti, Nowabika mumaanza aangu mali aali cuulu, nsikonzyi kutandabika ijanza lyangu cakujaya mwana wamwami, nkaambo mwami wakamulailila, uwe a-Abisai a-Itai, mumatwi esu, wakati, Kutabi muntu uubi sizya mulombe pe.
Nondamucitila cakweena akumujaya, ncobeni taakwe cintu cisisidwe kumeso aamwami, nkabela uwe omwini nowanduumunina buyo.
Mpawo Joabu wakati, Nsikonzyi kusowa ciindi kukwaambaula and uwe pe, Elyo wakabweza mivwi yotatwe akwiinjizya mumoyo wa-Abisalomu naakacili muumi mukati kamusamu.
Nkabela balombe bali ikumi basikuyumuna zilwisyo zya-Joabu bakamuzyungulusya Abisalomu akumuuma akumujaya.
Mpawo Joabu wakalizya mweembo, nkabela bantu boonse bakaleka kutobela ba-Israyeli, nkaambo Joabu wakabakasya.
Lino wakabweza Abisalomu akumusowa mucilindi cipati camulusaka, wakamulundikila mulwi mupati loko wamabwe, elyo bantu boonse bakacija kumaanda aabo.
Pele joabu wakamwaambila kuti, Pe, toelede kutola makani sunu, ulatola buzuba bumbi, Tokonzyi kutola makani buzuba obuno, nkaambo kakuti mwana wamwami wafwa.
Mpawo Joabu wakaambila mu-Kusi kuti, Koya uwe ukaambile mwami nciwabona, Elyo oyo mu-Kisi wakakotamina Joabu, wakainka bucijaana.

Lino Ahimaazi mwana wa-Zadoki wakabuzya Joabu alwabili kuti, Taakwe makani. Nzuzaane ambebo kutobela mu-Kusi, joabu wakavuwa kuti, Ino nkaambonzi noyanda kuya, mwanaangu? Tojisi makani aakonzya kukujanina bulumbu.
Wakati, Taakwe makani, njanda kuya, Wakati, Mbubo, koya. Mpawo Ahimaazi wakatola inzila yakunkanda, wakamweenzya mu-Kusi.
Mpawo sikulanga wakoonzomoka akulwiida mwami, Mwami wakati, Na uli alike oku nkukwaamba kuti ulaleta makani. Elyo wakeza buswena afwiifwi.
Mpawo sikulanga wakabona muntu wabili ulazuzaana, wakoonzomokela simulyango kuti, Ndabona muntu ulazuzaana alike. Mwami wakati, Alakwe ulaleta makani,
Lino sikulanga wakati, Ndabona kuzuzaana kwamuntu mutaanzi mbukubede. Kuli mbuli kuzuzaana kwa-Ahimaazi mwana wa-Zadoki, Mpawo mwami wakati, Muntu mubotu oyo. Ulaleta makani mabotu,

Mpoonya awo Ahimaazi wakoonzomokela mwami, akumujuzya. Lino wakakotamina ansi kubusyu bwamwami, wakati, Alumbwe Jehova Leza wako, nkaambo abo bantu ibatambika maanza aabo kumwami simalelaangu wabaaba.
Elyo mwami wakabuzya kuti, Mulombe Abisalomu uli kabotu na? Ahimaazi wakavuwa kuti, Ciindi eco Joabu naakandituma ndemulanda wako, ndakabona lupyopyongano lupati, pele nsizi na cakaba anzi.
Mwami wakati, Mbubo, ima awo, Elyo wakaima mpoonya.

Elyo mwami wakabuzya mu-Kusi kuti, Mulombe Abisalomu uli kabotu na? Mu-Kusi wakati, Boonse basinkondonyina mwami simalelaangu abantu boonse balisumpula kukukubisizya, babe mbubonya mbwaabede oyo mulombe.

Mpawo mwami wakakankama, wakatanta kuŋanda yakujulu kumulyango, wakaya bulila, nkabela mbuboobo mbwaakaamba naakali kuya, wakati, Maawe mwanaangu Abisalomu! Mwanaangu! Abisalomu! Nindakafwa ndemwini mucibaka cako! Abisalomu mwanaangu! Mwanaangu!
Lino Joabu wakaambilwa kuti, Bona! Mwami ulalila akubiizika nkaambo ka-Abisalomu.
Nkabela buzuba obo lufutuko lwakasa­ nduka akuba kulila buyo kubantu boonse, nkaambo bantu bakamvwa kuti, Mwami wafwaba nkaambo kamwanaakwe.
Lino bantu nibakanjila mumunzi buzuba obo, bakali kuya busobelela buyo mbubonya bantu mbu-basobelela cakufwa bweeme ciindi cakucija kunkondo.
Nkabela mwami wakalivumba kubusyu, wakalila ajwi ipati, wakati, Maawe! Abisalomu mwanaangu! Abisalomu mwanaangu! Mwanaangu!

Lino Joabu wakeza kumwami muŋanda, wakati, Sunu wabausya bweeme hoonse balanda bako, mbembabo bavuna buumi bwako buzuba obuno, abuumi bwabana bako balombe abana bako basimbi abanakazi bako abasimamambe bako.

Nkaambo ulabayanda bakusulide akusula bakuyandide. Waamba kuti basilutwe abalanda bako boonse tabakwe makani kulinduwe. Ncobeni ndabona kuti Abisalomu niwakacili muumi sunu, aswebo toonse nitwakafwa, cintu eci nicakalulama mumeso aako.

Lino buka, koya anze, ukaumuzye myoyo yabantu, nkaambo ndakonkezya kuzina lya-Jehova kuti na tozwi obo, kutakooba muntu naba omwe uuti syaale kulinduwe masiku aya. Lino eci cintu cilakubijila kwiinda mapenzi oonse nguwasikilwa mazuba oonse kuzwa kubwanike bwako akusikila sunu.
Mpawo mwami wakabuka, wakaakukala kumulyango, nkabela bantu boonse bakaambilwa kuti, Mwami ulikede kumulyango. Elyo bantu boonse bakasika nkwaakabede mwami.
Lino ba-Israyeli boonse bakamwaika akuya kumaanda aabo.

Nkabela bantu bakali kukazyanya mumikowa yoonse ya-Israyeli. Bakati, Mwami nguwakatuvuna kumaanza aabasinkondoma besu, nguwakatuvuna kumaanza aaba-Filisti, pele sunu wacija kuzwa kucisi nkaambo ka-Abisalomu.
­Alimwi oyo Abisalomu ngutwakananika kuti abe mwami wesu, wafwa munkondo. Lino nkaambonzi tamufwambaani kuboozya mwami?

Elyo mwami wakatumina Zadoki a-Abiyatare bapaizi, wakati, Amubuzye bapati ba-Juda kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nomwamuka kuboozya mwami kuŋanda yakwe? Ba-Israyeli boonse balaamba makani aakuboozya mwami kuŋanda yakwe.
Lino ndinywe basimukowama, zifuwa zyesu nzimwi anyama yesu njimwi. Nkaambonzi nomwamuka kuboozya mwami?
Alimwi amutolele Amasa aya majwi aakuti, Sa tatuli zifuwa zimwi anyama imwi ayebo na? Leza andicitile mbubonya na kwiinda na tobi silutwe wampi mazuba oonse mucibaka ca-Joabu.
Nkabela wakakombelezya myoyo yabantu boonse ba-Juda mbuli moyo wamuntu omwe, aboobo bakatumina mwami, bakati, Boola, webo abalanda bako boonse.
Mpawo mwami wakaboola, wakasika ku-Jordano. Nkabela ba-Juda bakasika ku-Giligala kuyoocinga mwami akumuzubusya Jordano.
wakeza abantu ba-Benjamini bali cuulu, a-Ziba mulanda waluzubo lwa-Saulo abana bakwe bali ikumi amusanu abazike bakwe bali makumi obile. Nkabela bakafwambaana kulimba mulonga kumeso aamwami.
Elyo kwakainka bwaato kuyoozubusya basiŋanda bamwami akucita kufumbwa cintu ncaakayanda. Nkabela Simeyi mwana wa-Gera wakakotama ansi kumeso aamwami naakazubuka Jordano.
Wakaambila mwami kuti, Simalelaangu atandipi mulandu, akutayeeya busicinguni bwangu mbundakabisya ndemulanda wako obo buzuba mwami mbwaakazwa ku-Jerusalemu. Mwami atabiki moyo wakwe kulimbubo pe.
Nkaambo ndemulanda wako ndizi kuti ndakabisya, nciceeco ncindasikila sunu cakusaangunina mukowa woonse wa-Josefa kuzoocinga mwami simalelaangu.
Mpawo Abisai mwana wa-Zeruya wakavuwa kuti, Sa Simeyi teelede kujayigwa nkaambo kamakani aya na? Ikuti wakatuka munanike wa-Jehova.
Pele Davida wakati, Tujisi makaninzi anywebo nobana ba-Zeruya? Nkaambonzi nomwandikataazya sunu? Sa kulajayigwa muntu mu-Israyeli sunu? Ndizi kuti buzuba obuno ndijisi bwami bwa-Israyeli.
Elyo mwami wakaambila Simeyi kuti, Tokoofwa pe, Nkabela mwami wakakonkezya mbubonya,
Elyo naakasika ku-Jerusalemu kuzoocinga mwami, mwami wakamubuzya kuti, Mefibosete, nkaambonzi notwatakainka ayebo?
Wakati, O mwami simalelaangu, mulanda wangu wakandeena. Nkaambo ndemulanda wako ndakati, Ndibambile imbongolo, nkatante alinjiyo, nkaye kumwami, nkaambo ndemulanda wako ndi cilema.
Lino wandilengelezya ndemulanda wako kumwami simalelaangu. Pele mwami simalelaangu uli mbuli angelo wa-Leza. Kocita kufumbwa cintu cabota kumeso aako.

Nkaambo basiluzubo boonse babata kabali mbuli bafu kumeso aamwami simalelaangu, pele ime ndemulanda wako wandibika akati kabaabo balya insima kutafule lyako. Lino sa ncibotu kuti nkencililila cintu kumwami?
Mpawo mwami wakamwaambila kuti, Nkaambonzi nocaamba makani aako? ndaamba kuti uwe a-Ziba muleelede kwaabana nyika.
Nkabela Mefibosete wakaambila mwami kuti, Atole yoonse buyo nkaambo mwami simalelaangu waboola caluumuno kuŋanda yakwe.
Oyo Barizilai wakacembaala loko, kali amyaaka iili makumi aali musanu aatatu, Ngonguwe wakalela mwami ciindi naakakede ku-Mahanaimu, nkaambo kali muntu mulemu loko.
Elyo mwami wakaambila Barizilai kuti, Atwiinke ayebo, nkakulele kulindime ku-Jerusalemu.
Pele Barizilai wakaambila mwami kuti, Myaka yabuumi bwangu ili yongae? Njiinke buti amwami ku-Jerusalemu?

Sunu ndijisi myaaka iili makumi aali musanu aatatu, Sa ndizi cintu mbucibede, na cibi na cibotu? Sa ncikonzya kulabila cintu ncindya na cintu ncinywa? Sa ncikonzya kumvwa majwi aabalumi abanakazi basikwiimba? Lino ime ndemulanda wako nkamulemene buti mwami simalelaangu?
Ndemulanda wako njanda kusindikizya mwami buniini buyo mutala lya-Jordano. Nkaambonzi mwami nayanda kundilumbula bulumbu buli boobo?

Ndemulanda wako nkabweede kuyoofwa mumunzi wangu, mumonya mukabede kabanda kabata abama. Pele bona, ngooyu mulanda wako Cimamu. Mwami simalelaangu ainke ayooyu, umucitile kufumbwa cintu cibotu mumeso aako.
Elyo mwami wakati, Mbubo, tulainka a-Cimamu, Njoomucitila kufumbwa cintu cibotu mumeso aako, ayebo omwini njookucitila zintu zyoonse nzoyanda,
Elyo bantu boonse bakazubuka Jordano, alakwe mwami wakazubuka. Nkabela mwami wakamyonta Barizilai akumulazya kabotu, elyo wakapiluka kulinguwe.
Aboobo mwami wakazubuka kuyoosika ku-Giligala, alakwe Cimamu wakazubuka awe. Bantu boonse ba-Juda acisela cabantu ba-Israyeli mbubakazubusya mwami.

Elyo bantu boonse ba-Israyeli bakali kuza kumwami, bakaambila mwami kuti, Ino nkaambonzi bakwesu ba-Juda nobakubba? Mbembabo bazubusya mwami Jordano, abasiŋanda bakwe, abantu boonse ba-Davida mbali abo.
Mpawo bantu boonse ba-Juda bakavwiila bantu ba-Israyeli kuti, Nkaambo mwami ngusimukowama, Nkaambonzi nomubijilwa kumakani aya? Sa tulilide cintu kumwami na? Sa kuli cintu ncaakatupa na?

Nkabela bantu ba-Israyeli bakavwiila bantu ba-Juda kuti, Zipanzi zili ikumi zyamwami nzizyesu, alimwi iswe tuleelede kuba amwami kwiinda ndinywe. Nkaambonzi nomwakatusampaula akutukasya kusaanguna kwaamba makani aakuboozya mwami? Nkabela majwi aabantu ba-Juda akali abukali kwiinda majwi aabantu baIsrayeli.
Mpawo bantu boonse ba-Israyeli bakaleka kutobela Davida, bakaakutobela Seba mwana wa-Bikri, pele bantu ba-Juda bakakakatila kumwami wabo kuzwa ku-Jordano akusikila i ku-Jerusalemu.

Elyo Davida wakasika kuŋanda yakwe mu-Jerusalemu. Nkabela mwami wakabweza abo banakazi abasimamambe bali ikumi mbaakasiide kulinda iŋanda, wakababika muntolongo, nkabela wakali kubalela, pele teewakala kuswanana abo pe, aboobo kabajalidwe mazuba oonse mane kusikila kukufwa kwabo, bakali kupona mbubonya mbuli bamukamufu.
Mpawo mwami wakaambila Amasa kuti, Kondiitila bantu ba-Juda, lino amana buyo mazuba otatwe, ube okuno.
Mpawo Amasa wakaya kuyooita ba-Juda, pele wakamuka akusotoka ciindi ncaakamubikila.

Elyo Davida wakaambila Abisai kuti. Lino ncobeni Seba mwana wa-Bikri ulatubisizya kwiinda Abisalomu. Koya uwe, ukatole balanda basimalelaako akumutobela, kuti atalijanini minzi iili alubaya akutuloboka.
Mpawo bantu ba-Joabu bakainka kuyoomutobela, aba-Kereti aba-Peleti aboonse baalumi basintaze. Bakainka kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu kuyootobela Seba mwana wa-Bikri.

Lino nibakasika kubbwe ipati lyaku-Gibeeni, Amasa wakeza kuzoobacinga. Nkabela Joabu kasamide zikobela zyakwe zyakulwisya nzyaakasama, alimwi kajisi ipanga mucibunu cakwe lyaangidwe munkomo yalyo, nkabela naakanyampuka, yakawida ansi.
Elyo Joabu wakabuzya Amasa kuti, Sa ula pona kabotu, mukwesu? Nkabela Joabu wakajata Amasa kucilezu ajanza lyakwe lyalulyo, kuti amumyonte.

Pele Amasa teewakabika moyo wakwe kupanga ilyakali mujanza lya-Joabu, aboobo wakamuyasya andilyo abumbu, wakatila mala aakwe ansi, nkabela takakamuyasa lwabili pe, nkaambo wakafwa mpoonya awo. Lino joabu a-Abisai mukulana wakwe bakaya butobela Seba mwana wa-Bikri.
Nkabela kwakaima umwi mulombe wa-Joabu nkukonya nkwaakabede Amasa, wakati, Kufumbwa muntu uuli abuzolwani kwa-Joabu akuyanda Davida, ainke buyo kutobela Joabu.

Pele Amasa wakali kulikanda mubulowa akati kanzila. Lino oyo muntu naakabona kuti bantu boonse baliimvwi, wakagwisya Amasa munzila, wakamutola musokwe akumuvumbya isani, nkaambo wakabona kuti kufumbwa bantu basika balaima buyo mpoonya.
Lino naakamana kumugwisya munzila, bantu boonse bakainda kunembo kutobela Joabu kuya butanda Seba mwana wa-Bikri,

Lino bakeza kuzoosinkilizya ku-Abeli waku-Betimaaka, nkabela bakalundika citantilo cavu anze amunzi mane cakeelana abulamfu bwabulambo, alimwi bantu boonse joabu mbaakali abo bakatalika kuuma-uma bwaanda kuti babumwaye.
Elyo umwi mwanakazi musongo wamumunzi wakapozomoka wakati, Amuswiilile! Amuswiilile! Amwaambile Joabu kuti, Boola okuno. Njanda kwaamba ayebo.
Lino naakasika afwaafwi, mwanakazi wakamubuzya kuti, Sa nduwe joabu P Wakati, Ndime. Elyo wakati, Swiilila majwi aangu ndemulanda wako. Wakati, Mbubo, ndaswiilila.
Mpawo wakaamba kuti, Kalekale kakwaambwa kuti, Ku-Abeli nkokubuzigwa makani, aboobo makani akamana.
Ime ndi umwi wabasiluumuno awabasyomesi bamu-Israyeli. Uwe ulayandakunyonyoona munzi abanyina bana bakookuno ku-Israyeli. Nkaambonzi noyanda kumenenena lukono lwa-Jehova?
Mpawo Joabu wakavuwa kuti, Pe; pe, cilatonda kulindime kumenenena nanka kunyonyoona.

Takuli boobo pe. Makani ngaaya. Kuli umwi muntu wakucilundu ca-Efraimu, izina lyakwe ngu-Seba mwana wa-Bikri, watambika ijanza lyakwe kukubisizya mwami Davida. Amutupe oyo muntu alike, elyo ndaleka munzi. Mpawo mwanakazi wakaambila Joabu kuti, Bona! Mutwe wakwe uyoowaalwa nkobede anze alubaya.

Elyo mwanakazi wakainda kubantu boonse cabusongo, nkabela bakakosola mutwe waSeba mwana wa-Bikri akuuwaala nkwaakabede Joabu, Lino wakalizya mweembo, nkabela bantu boonse bakamwaika kuzwa kumunzi akuya kumaanda aabo. Alakwe Joabu wakapiluka ku-Jerusalemu kumwami.
a-Adoramu nguwakali kubelesya basicibalo, a-Josafati mwana wa-Ahiludi nguwakali kulemba makani,
alimwi Seva kali mulembi, a-Zadoki a-Abiyatara kabali bapaizi,
a-Ira mu-Jairi kali silutwe wa-Davida.

Mpawo mwami wakaita ba-Gibeoni akubaambila makani, (Aba ba-Gibeoni teebakali babana ba-Israyeli pe, kabali baba-Amori ibakasyaala, ba-Israyeli mbubakatangana abo cizuminano. Nkabela Saulo wakali kuyanda kubajaya mukusungwaala kwakwe nkwaakasungwaalila bana ba-Israyeli aba-Juda).
Davida wakababuzya ba-Gibeoni kuti, Nkamucitilenzi? Nkamulungilenzi, kuti muletele lukono lwa-Jehova coolwe?

Lino ba-Gibeoni bakamwaambila kuti, Aya makani ngotujisi a-Saulo aluzubo lwakwe teensi makani aansiliva nanka ingolida, pe, alimwi taciboti kuti ujaye muntu naba omwe wamu-Israyeli nkaambo kandiswe. Lino wakati, Kufumbwa cintu ncimwaamba, njoomucitila ncico.
Elyo bakaambila mwami kuti, Oyo muntu iwakatupenzya akutuvwiya kuti tunyonyoonwe akutasyaala kumwi kucisi ca-Irayeli,
tupegwe bantu bali musanu ababili babana bakwe, kuti tubasine kumeso aa-Jehova muGibeya munzi wa-Saulo musale wa-Jehova. Mpawo mwami wakati, Mbubo, ndamupa.
Pele mwami wakafwida insoni Mefibosete mwana wajonatani mwana wa-Saulo, nkaambo kacikonkezyo ca-Jehova ncibakakonkezyanya aba bobile, Davida a-Jonatani mwana wa-Saulo.

Mwami wakabweza bana bobile ba-Rizipa, mwana musimbi wa-Aya, mbaakazyalila Saulo, Arimoni a-Mefibosete, alimwi wakabweza bana bosanwe ba-Mikala, mwana musimbi wa-Saulo, mbaakazyalila Adriyeli mwana wa-Barizilai mu-Meholati,

wakabaaba mumaanza aaba-Gibeoni, nkabela bakabasina kucilundu kumeso aa-Jehova, aboobo bakawa antoomwe boonse bali musanu ababili. Bakajayigwa kumatalikilo aaciindi cakutebula, nkukuti bantu nibakasaanguna kutebula bbaale,
Elyo Davida naakaambilwa ncaakacita Rizipa mwana wa-Aya simamambe wa-Saulo,

Davida wakaakuleta zifuwa zya-Saulo azifuwa zya-Jonatani mwanaakwe kuzwa kubantu baku-Jabezi-Gileadi, nkaambo mbabo bakazibba kumugwagwa waku-Betisani, nkubakabaanzika ba-Filisti obo buzuba ba-Filisti mbubakajaya Saulo ku-Giliboa.
Wakagwisya nkukonya zifuwa zya-Saulo azifuwa zya-Jonatani mwanaakwe, alimwi bakaleta zifuwa zyabaanzikidwe,

nkabela bakazika zifuwa zya-Saulo azya-Jonatani mwanaakwe mucisi ca-Benjamini, mumunzi wa-Zela, mukabanda ka-Kisi, wisi. Bakacita zintu zyoonse nzyaakalailila mwami. Elyo kusule lyayaaya Leza wakafwida cisi buuya.
Lino ba-Filisti aba-Israyeli bakacita inkondo alimwi, nkabela Davida wakainka abalanda bakwe kuyoolwana aba-Filisti, Elyo Davida wakaamba kuwizuka.
Lino Isibenobi, umwi wabana ba-Rafa, kaliko. Bulemu bwasumo lyakwe kabuli masyekeli aali myaanda yotatwe aamukuba, Kasamide zilwisyo zipya, nkabela wakali kuyeeya kujaya Davida,
pele Abisai mwana wa-Zeruya wakamugwasya, wakayasa mu-Filisti akumujaya. Lino bantu ba-Davida bakamukonkezya kuti, Toelede kutusindikila limbi kunkondo, kuti utazimyi mumuni wa-Israyeli,
Aimwi inkondo yakalwigwa aba-Filisti ku-Gobu, nkabela Elhanani mwana waJareoregimu waku-Betelehemu wakajaya munyina Goliati mu-Giti, nguwakajisi isumo lili aluti mbuli cisamu casikuluka.

Alimwi kwakalwigwa inkondo aba-Filisti ku-Gati. Oko kakuli umwi muntu mupati loko, wakali aminwe iili musanu aumwi kumaanza aakwe oonse obile, atukumo tuli musanu akamwi kuzituta zyakwe, nkokuti zyoonse zyakali makumi obile azine. Oyu alakwe wakazyalwa a-Rafa,
nkabela naakasampaula baIsrayeli, wakamujaya jonatani mwana wa-Simeyi munyina Davida.
Aba bone mbaakazyala Rafa ku-Gati, nkabela boonse bakajayigwa kumaanza aa-Davida abalanda bakwe.
Wakati,
Jehova ngumwaala wangu, ngumampangala aangu, ngusikundivuna.
Nintobo yangu, nduja lwalufutuko lwangu, ngumwaako wangu wakujulu, mbulobokelo bwangu.
Ngumufutuli wangu uundifutula kulupyopyongano.
Njooimbila Jehova uutembaulika,
Elyo njoofutulwa kulibasinkondoma.
Nkaambo mayuwe aalufu akandizyunguluka,
Akwalo kupaya kwabana-Saatani kwakandiyoosya.
Tukole twabusangusi twakandizambaila,
Atooze twalufu twakandijata.
Ndakali koongolola Leza wangu,
Elyo wakaswiilila ijwi lyangu muntempele yakwe,
Akoonzomoka kwangu kwakanjila mumatwi aakwe.
Misemu yakujulu yakazangaama,
Yakatenkana nkaambo kabukali bwakwe.
Amukanwa lyakwe mwakalya mulilo.
Malasa akakunkwa kulinguwo,
Akunsi lyazituta zyakwe kakusiya mbi.
Wakabonwa amababa aaluuwo.
Wakalizyungulusya cilao camudima,
Ampumba yamaanzi amayoba malemu.
Kukumwekamweka kwakubusyu bwakwe
Kwakakunkwa malasa aamulilo.
Sikujulu wakalizya ijwi lyakwe,
Wakatuma lulabo akubapyopyonganya,
Elyo kutako lyalwizi kwakaboneka,
Antalisyo zyanyika zyakayubununwa,
Nkaambo kakutapatila kwa-Jehova,
Akuyooya kwamuuwo wamumpemu zyakwe.
Wakatambika kujulu, wandijata,
Wandigwisya mumaanzi manji.
Wakandivuna kusinkondoma singuzu,
Akulibaabo ibakandisula, nkaambo bakandiinda kunguzu,
Bakandikataazya mubuzuba bwamapenzi aangu,
Pele Jehova nguwakandigwasya,
Wakandivuna nkaambo kakundibotelwa.
Jehova wandilumbwida bululami bwangu,
Akundiboozezya mbwaasalala maanza aangu.
Nkaambo ndajatisya inzila zya-Jehova,
Nsina kubisizya Leza wangu.
Nsina kusowa milazyo yakwe.
Ndalikasya kuzibi zyangu.
Nkaambo kako Jehova wandilumbwida mbuli bululami bwangu,
Mbuli kusalala kwangu kumeso aakwe.
Kumuntu uululeme ulalibonya mbuli mululami,
Pele kumuntu uupilingene ulacita cakusendama.
Pele basikulisumpula ulabalanga kuti ubafwiinsye.
Nkaambo nduwe mumuni wangu, O Jehova.
Jehova ulamunika mumudima wangu.
Nkaambo kalugwasyolwako ndakonzya kulwisya impi.
Kulugwasyo lwa-Leza wangu ndakonzya kusotoka bwaanda.
Ijwi lya-Jehova lilasalala.
Nintobo kuliboonse bamusyoma.
Taakwe mwaala mbuli Leza wesu.
Ngonguwe uuenzya mululami munzila yakwe.
Ulandiimika amasena aakujulu.
Ulaiisya maanza aangu kulwa,
Aboobo buta bwamundalila bulaobesegwa kumaboko aangu.
Wandipa intobo yalufutuko lwako.
Kulibombya kwako kwandisumpula.
Wandikomenenya myeendelo njinjeenda,
Amaulu aangu taatezemuki.
Ndaakutanda basinkondoma akubanyonyoona,
Nsina kupiluka mane bakamana boonse,
Ndabamana akubayasililacakutabuka limbi,
Bawa kunsi lyamaulu aangu.
Wandisamika inguzu zyakulwisya,
Wandifwiinsizya abo ibakandibukila.
Basinkondoma wabatanda, kuti bandifutatile,
Nkabanyonyoone abo bandisula.
Bakali kukwiila kuli-Jehovaapele teewakabavwiila,
Mpawo ndakabaumisya mbuli lusuko lwaansi,
Ndakabalyataula mbuli intimba yamunzila akubamwaisya.
Wandibika kuti mbe simutwe wazisi,
Musyobo nguntezi ulandimanina milimo.
Bazwakule balalibombya kulindime,
Bamvwe buyo impuwo yangu, balandiswiilila.
Baleza buzangama kuzwa mumampangala aabo.
Asumpulwe Leza wandomba yalufutuko lwangu.
Nguubombya bantu mumaanza aangu.
Nguundivuna kumaanza aabasinkondoma,
Nduwe oondisumpula kulibaabo bandibukila,
Akundifutula kubantu bakali,
O Jehova, akati kamasi,
Njootembaula-izina lyako.
Ulaleta lufutuko lupati kumwami ngwaakabika,
Ulamufwida luzyalo munanike wakwe,
Davida alunungu lwakwe lyoonse amuyamyaka.
Ngaaya majwi masyaalizi ngaakaamba Davida.
Mbuboobu mbaamba Davida mwana wa-Jese,
Mbuboobu mbaamba muntu iwakasumpulwa,
Munanike wa-Leza wa-Jakobo,
Sikwiimba intembauzyo imbotu wa-Israyeli.
Majwi aakwe akali alulimi lwangu,
Mwaala wa-Israyeli wakandaambila,
Oyo uuendelezya bantu cabululami,
Uuendelezya cakuyoowa Leza,
Mucifumo citajisi mayoba,
Ciindi ncaaboneka mweemvwe ansi,
Izuba nilimunikisya, yaleka imvula,
Sa teensi obo mbulubede luzubo lwangu kumeso aa-Leza?
Nkaambo wandibikila cizuminano citeeli,
Cibambidwe kabotu muzintu zyoonse, ciima nji.
Nkaambo lufutuko lwangu loonse,
Azyoonse nzyuuyanda moyo wangu,
Sa teensi nguwe uuzimeneka?
Pele bana ba-Saatani boonse bayooba mbuli mamvwa aatapulwa
munzila,
Nkaambo taakonzyi kubwezwa mujanza.
Muntu uuyanda kwaampa,
Uleelede kuba abutale acisamu casumo.
Boonse bayootentwa mumulilo nkubabede.
Ngaaya mazina aabaalumi basintaze mbaakajisi Davida: Josebubasebete mu-Tekemoni, silutwe wabapati botatwe, ngonguwe Adino mu-Ezni, nguwakajaya bantu bali myaanda iili musanu aitatu ciindi comwe.

Musule lyayooyu kali Eleazeri mwana wa-Dodai mwana wamu-Ahohi, umwi wabaa-lumi botatwe Davida mbaakali abo ciindi ncibakasampaula ba-Filisti nibakabungene kunkondo. Lino bantu ba-Israyeli nibakainka kuyoolwana,
oyu muntu wakabuka, kaya bujaya ba-Filisti mane ijanza lyakwe lyakakataala akukakatila kupanga. Jehova wakaleta lufutuko lupati obo buzuba, nkabela bantu bakali kumutobela kuya busaala buyo.
Musule lyayooyu kali Sama mwana wa-Age mu-Harari, Lino ba-Filisti nibakabungana ku-Lehi, kakuliko muunda uuzwide nyangu. Nkabela bantu bakali kucija kubusyu bwaba-Filisti,
pele oyu muntu wakaima akati kamuunda oyo, wakauvuna, wakajaya ba-Filisti, aboobo Jehova wakaleta lufutuko lupati.
Ciindi eco Davida kali mumampangala, alimwi kakuli inkamu yabasinkondo baba-Filisti mu-Betelehemu.
Nkabela Davida wakali kusukama, wakati, Nguni uuyanda kundinywisya maanzi aamumukalo waku-Betelehemu kumulyango?

Mpawo baalumi basintaze botatwe bakapola akati kabasinkondo baba-Filisti, baakuteka maanzi kumukalo waku-Betelehemu kumulyango, bakaabweza akwaaleta kuli-Davida. Pele wakakaka kunywa, wakaatila ansi buyo kuli-Jehova,
wakati, Cinditonde, O Jehova, kucita obo. Sa ndakonzya kunywa bulowa bwabantu aba ibakeenda cakutayoowa kufwa? Lino wakakaka kunywa, Mbuboobo mbubakacita abo baalumi botatwe.
Kali mulemu kwiinda boonse bali makumi otatwe, nekubaboobo teewakeelanisigwa abaabo botatwe bataanzi.
Alimwi wakajaya mu-Egepita, muntu mweebesi, Oyu mu-Egepita kajisi isumo mujanza lyakwe, pele wakainka nkwaakabede ankoli luzutu, wakanyanzya isumo mujanza lyamu-Egepita akumujazya ndilyonya.
Ngaaya malweza ngaakacita Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada, aboobo kali simpuwo mbuli abo baalumi botatwe.
Kali mulemu kwiinda bantu bali makumi otatwe, nekubaboobo teewakeelanisigwa abaabo botatwe bataanzi. Nkabela Davida wakamubika kuti abe silutwe wabalindizi bakwe.
Sama mu-Harodi, Helika mu-Harodi,
Helezi mu-Paliti, Ira mwana wa-Ikesi mu-Tekoi,
Abiyezeri mu-Anetoti, Mebunai mu-Husati,
Zalimoni mu-Ahohi, Maharia mu-Nefati,
Helebi mwana wa-Baana mu-Netofati, Itai mwana wa-Ribai waku-Gibeya wabana ba-Benjamini,
Benaya mu-Piratoni, Hidai wakutulonga twa-Gaasi,
Abialiboni mu-Aribati, Azmaveti mu-Barruimi,
Eliabu mu-Syaaliboni, wabana ba-Jaseni, Jonatani,
Sama mu-Harari, Ahiamu mwana wa-Sarari mu-Harari,
Elifaleti mwana wa-Ahasibai mwana wamu-Maaka, Eliamu mwana wa-Ahitofeli mu-Giloni,
Hezra waku-Karimeli, Paarai mu-Aribi,
Igali mwana wa-Natani waku-Zeba, Bani mu-Gadi,
Zeleki mu-Amoni, Naharai mu-Beeroti, sikuyumuna zilwisyo zya-Joabu mwana wa-Zeruya,
Ira mu-Itri, Garebi mu-Itri,
Uriya mu-Hiti, Aba boonse bali makumi otatwe amusanu ababili.
Elyo mwami wakaambila Joabu silutwe wampi ngwaa-kali awe kuti, Koya bwiinda akati kamikowa yoonse ya-Israyeli, kuzwa kuDani akusikila ku-Beereseba, mukabale bantu, nkazibe mweelwe wabantu.

Mpawo Joabu wakaambila mwami kuti, Jehova Leza wako avuzye bantu kut, kufumbwa mweelwe wabo mbuubede sunu, bainde nguwo ziindi zili mwaanda. Meso aamwami simalelaangu abone cintu eci naacipona. Pele nkaambonzi mwami simalelaangu ulayanda kucita mbwaamba?
Nekubaboobo ijwi lyamwami ndilyakazunda Joabu abasilutwe bampi, aboobo Joabu abasilutwe bampi bakazwa kubusyu bwamwami kuyoobala bantu ba-Israyeli.
Nkabela bakazubuka Jordano, baakukala-kala ku-Aroeri, kubbazu lyalulyo lyamunzi uuli mumumpata wa-Gadi, aku-Jazeri,
alimwi bakasika kuGileadi, akunyika ya-Tatimuhodesi, alimwi bakasika ku-Dani-Jaana, akuzwa oko bakazyunguluka kuya ku-Zidoni,
elyo bakasika kumampangala aaTuro akuminzi yoonse yaba-Hivi ayaba-Kanani, aboobo bakasika kubupunu bwacisi ca-Juda, ku-Beereseba.
Lino nibakamana kwiinda kunyika yoonse, bakaboola ku-Jerusalemu nikwakamana myezi iili musanu aine amazuba aali makumi obile.
Nkabela Joabu wakalwiida mwami mweelwe wabantu babalidwe. Baalumi basintaze basimapanga bamu-Israyeli kabali zyuulu zili myaanda iili musanu aitatu, abantu ba-Juda kabali zyuulu zili yosanwe.
Nkabela Davida naakabuka cifumo, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Gadi musinsimi, musondi wa-Davida, lyakati,
Koya ukaambile Davida kuti, Mbuboobo mbwaamba Jehova, Nzeezi zintu zyotatwe. Kolisalila comwe canzizyo, kuti nkakucitile ncico.

Mpawo Gadi wakeza kuzooambila Davida. Wakamwaambila kuti, Sa ulayanda kusikilwa myaaka iili musanu aibili yanzala okuno kucisi cako? Na sa ulayanda kuba amyezi yotatwe yakucija kuzwa kubasinkondonyoko baku tanda? Na sa ulayanda kuti kube mazuba otatwe aabulwazi kucisi cako? Koyeeya, ukazibe na cintu cibotu ncicili, nkabweedezye makani kuliyooyo iwakandituma.
Lino Davida wakaambila Gadi kuti, Moyo wangu wama akati kamapenzi mapati. Lino atwaabwe mumaanza aa-Jehova, nkaambo luzyalo lwakwe ndupati, pele intaabwi mumaanza aabantu pe.

Aboobo Jehova wakatuma bulwazi mu-Israyeli kuzwa kucifumo mane kusikila kuciindi cibikidwe, nkabela kwakafwa akati kabantu boonse, kuzwa ku-Dani akusikila ku-Beereseba, bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili.

Pele angelo naakatambika ijanza lyakwe kuti anyonyoone Jerusalemu, Jehova wakausa insoni, wakaambila oyo angelo iwakali kujaya bantu kuti, Mbubo, kolesya ijanza lyako. Nkabela angelo kali kufwaafwi kucipolelo ca-Amuna mu-Jebusi.
Mpawo Davida wakaya mbubonya mbwaakaamba Gadi, mbwaakamulailila Jehova.
Nkabela Arauna naakatambya meso aakwe, wakabona mwami abalanda bakwe baleza nkwaabede, elyo Arauna wakainka kuyookotamina mwami wakuvundama ansi.
Lino Amuna wakabuzya kuti, Ino mwami simalelaangu wazidanzi kulindime ndemulanda wakwe? Mpawo Davida wakati, Ndeza kuula cipolelo cako, njakile Jehova cipaililo, kuti bulwazi buleke kukataazya bantu.
Nkabela Arauna wakaambila Davida kuti, Mwami simalelaangu acibweze, apaizizye Jehova kufumbwa ncayanda. Bona, mbaaba basune bakupaizya azyakupola azintu zyabasune zyakutentya.
Ezi zintu zyoonse, O Mwami, Arauna wapa mwami. Alimwi Arauna wakaambila mwami kuti, Jehova Leza wako abotelwe ncocita,

Pele mwami wakaambila Arauna kuti, Pe, ncobeni njoocuula amali aaelede. Nsiyandi kupaizizya Jehova Leza wangu zipaizyo nzinsina kubbadela cintu. Aboobo Davida wakaula cipolelo abasune masyekeli aansiliva aali makumi osanwe.
Mpawo Davida wakayakila Jehova cipaililo nkukoaya oko, wakatuula zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya, elyo Jehova wakakombelezegwa kulekelela nyika, aboobo bulwazi bwakalesegwa kubantu ba-Israyeli.
Lino mwami Davida wakacembaala akuba amyaka minji. Bakamusamika zyakusama zinji, nekubaboobo takwakakasaalilwa pe.
Nkabela balanda bakwe bakamwaambila kuti, Kuyandawidwe mwami simalelo wesu musimbi nakalindu, kuti aime kubusyu bwamwami akumulela, alimwi alale kucamba cako, kuti mwami simalelo wesu akasaalilwe.
Mpawo bakatalika kuyandaula mucisi coonse ca-Israyeli nakalindu mweebesi, nkabela bakajana Abisagi waku-Sunamu akumusisya kumwami.
Oyo musimbi kali mweebesi loko, elyo wakaba muleli wamwami akumukutaukila, pele mwami taakali kuswanana awe pe.
Wisi taakwe naakamukataazya abuniini kukumubuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nocita obo? Alimwi kali muntu mweebesi loko. Ngonguwe wakatobela Abisalomu kukuzyalwa.
Nkabela bakabuzyanya makani a-Joabu mwana wa-Zeruya a-Abiyatare mupaizi, elyo aba bobile bakatobela Adonija akumugwasya.
Pele Zadoki mupaizi a-Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada a-Natani musinsimi a-Simeyi aReyi aboonse basilumamba Davida mbaakajisi teebakazuminana a-Adonija pe.
Mpawo Adonija wakatuula imbelele aŋombe abanyama baneneede kuIbbwelyanzoka kumbali lya-Enirogeli. Nkabela wakatamba boonse bakwabo bana bamwami abantu boonse ba-Juda balanda bamwami.
Pele Natani musinsimi a-Benaya abasilumamba a-Solomoni munyina takwakabatamba pe.
Lino boola, nkakulaye mboelede kucita, kuti uvune buumi bwako omwini abuumi bwamwanaako Solomoni.

Koya lino kumwami Davida, ukamwaambile kuti, O Mwami simalelo wangu, sa teewakandikonkezya mebo ndemulanda wako kuti, Solomoni mwanaako nguuelede kulya bwami bwangu akukala acuuno cangu? Ino nkaambonzi Adonija waba mwami?
Lino nocili mukwaambaula amwami, ambebo ndakutobela musule kuzooyumya majwi aako.
Elyo Batiseba wakainka, wanjila muŋanda mwami mwakali koona. Lino mwami wakalicembeede loko, a-Abisagi waku-Sunamu wakali kukutaukila mwami.
Mpawo Batiseba wakakotama akuvundamina mwami, nkabela mwami wakamubuzya kuti, Ujisinzi?
Wakamuvwiila kuti, O mwami, wakakonkezya kuzina lya-Jehova Leza wako kulindime ndemulanda wako, wati, Ncobeni Solomoni mwanaako nguuelede kulya bwami bwangu akukala acuuno cangu.
Lino bona! Adonija wajata bwami! Pele mwami simalelo wangu tezi.
Wajaya iŋombe abanyama baneneede ambelele zinji loko, alimwi watamba bana bamwami boonse, a-Abiyatare mupaizi, a-Joabu silutwe wampi, pele mulanda wako Solomoni tamutambide pe.
Lino O mwami simalelo wangu, meso aaba-Israyeli boonse alilangide alinduwe, kuti ubaambile na nguni uuelede kukala acuuno cako cabwami musule lyako.
Lumwi mwami simalelo wangu nayoolala abamawisi, mebo amwanaangu Solomoni tuzooba basimulandu.
Lino naakacili kwaambaula amwami, alakwe Natani musinsimi wakasika.
Mpawo mwami wakaambilwa kuti, Ngooyu Natani musinsimi wasika. Nkabela wakanjila kubusyu bwamwami akumukotamina ansi.
Lino Natani wakati, O mwami simalelo wangu, sa wakaamba kuti, Adonija andilide bwami akukala acuuno cangu?

Nkaambo sunu wainka kuyoojaya ŋombe abanyama baneneede ambelele zinji loko, alimwi watamba bana bamwami boonse, abapati bampi, a-Abiyatare mupaizi. Balalya akunywa kulinguwe, alimwi balaamba kuti, Apone mwami Adonija.
Pele mebo ndemulanda wako, a-Zadoki mupaizi, a-Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada, a-Solomoni mulanda wako, teetwatambwa pe.
Sa makani aya azwa kumwami simalelo wangu? Sa tona kutuzibya, iswe tubalanda bako, oyo uuelede kukala acuuno cabwami musule lyako, O mwami wangu?
Mpawo mwami Davida wakavuwa kuti, Amundiitile Batiseba. Nkabela wakeza kubusyu bwamwami, akwiimikila kunembo lyakwe.
Elyo mwami wakakonkezya kuti, Mbubonya Jehova mbwali muumi, ngonguwe iwakandivuna mumapenzi aangu oonse,
ncobeni ndacita buzuba obuno mbubonya mbundakakonkezya kulinduwe muzina lya-Jehova Leza waIsrayeli, Nkaambo ndakati, Solomoni mwanaako nguuti lye bwami bwangu akukala acuuno cangu.
Lino Batiseba wakakotamina ansi akuvundama kubusyu bwamwami. Wakati, Mwami Davida simalelo wangu apone lyoonse akutamani,
Mpawo mwami Davida wakati, Amundiitile Zadoki mupaizi a-Natani musinsimi a-Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada, Nkabela boonse bakeza kumwami.
Lino mwami wakabaambila kuti, Amwiinke abalanda basimalelo wanu, mutantike Solomoni mwanaangu abbiza lyangu ndemwini, akumusisya ku-Gihoni.
Mwasika oko, Zadoki mupaizi a-Natani musinsimi bamunanike, abe mwami waba-Israyeli. Balizye mweembo, baambe kuti, Apone mwami Solomoni.
Lino muzooboola awe okuno, nkabela uyookala acuuno cangu cabwami, kuti aendelezye mucibaka cangu, nkaambo ngonguwe ngundabika kuti abe mwami wacisi coonse ca-Israyeli aca-Juda.
Mpawo Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada wakavwiila mwami kuti, Akube boobo! Jehova Leza wamwami simalelo wangu alakwe aambe obo,
Mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakali amwami simalelo wangu, abe a-Solomoni mbubonya, akusumpula cuuno cakwe akwiinda cuuno ca-Davida mwami simalelo wangu.
Nkabela Zadoki mupaizi wakabweza luja lwamafuta kuzwa mutente, akunanika Solomoni, Elyo bakalizya mweembo, abantu boonse bakaamba kuti, Apone mwami Solomoni!
Nkabela bantu boonse bakamutobela, akuya bulizya namalwa akusekelela lusekelelo lupati, lumwi nyika yakaanduka nkaambo kamuzumo wabo.
Lino Adonija abantu boonse mbaakatambide bakamvwa mbubakamanina­ buyo kulya, Nkabela Joabu naakamvwa kulila kwamweembo, wakabuzya kuti, Ino lupyopyongano olo luli mumunzi lwaamba nzi?
Kacaambaula buyo, wakasika Jonatani mwana wa-Abyatare mupaizi. Elyo Adonija wakamwaambila kuti, Njila! nkaambo uli muntu mwini-mwini, Ncobeni ulaleta makani mabotu.
Mpawo Jonatani wakavwiila Adonija, wakati, Pe! Simalelo wesu mwami Davida wapa Solomoni bwami.
Alimwi mwami wakamutuma a-Zadoki mupaizi a-Natani musinsimi a-Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada aba-Kereti aba-Peleti, nkabela bakamutantika abbiza lyamwami.
Lino Zadoki mupaizi a-Natani musinsimi bakamunanika mafuta aabwami ku-Gihoni, alimwi bamugwisya nkuko, beza busekelela, aboobo munzi woonse ulipyopyongene, Ngonguwo muzumo ngumumvwide.
Lino Solomoni ulikede acuuno cabwami.

Abalo balanda bamwami beza kuzoolumbaizya mwami Davida simalelo wesu, Bati, Leza wako alemeke izina lya-Solomoni, libe ampuwo kwiinda izina lyako, acalo cuuno cakwe cisumpulwe kwiinda cako, Mpawo mwami wakakotama abulo.
Alimwi mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami. Alumbwe Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, nkaambo sunu watupa muntu wakukala acuuno cabwami bwangu, ameso aangu ndemwini alicibwene.
Mpawo bantu boonse ba-Adoniia mbaakatambide bakakankama, banyamuka, bacija umwi aumwi kumunzi wakwe.
Alakwe Adonija wakayoowa nkaambo ka-Solomoni, nkabela wakanyamuka, waakujata meja aacipaililo.

Lino Solomoni wakalwiidwa kuti, Bona! Adonija wayoowa mwami Solomoni, lino ulijisi meja aacipaililo, uli mukwaamba kuti, Mwami Solomoni andikonkezye sunu kuti ncobeni mulanda wakwe takooyoomujazya ipanga.
Elyo Solomoni wakati, Na waba muntu uululeme, takukooyoowida ansi nikaba kasusu kamutwe wakwe, pele na bubi bujanwe mulinguwe uyoofwa.
Mpawo mwami Solomoni wakatuma kuti bamugwisye kucipaililo nkwakacijilide, elyo wakeza kuzookotamina mwami Solomoni. Lino Solomoni wakamwaambila kuti, Koya kuŋanda yako.
Mebo ndaamba kutola lweendo ndubatola bantu baansi boonse. Lino uwe koyuma akuba mwaalumi mwini-mwini.

Bamba imbeta zya-Jehova Leza wako, uende munzila zyakwe akutobela milao yakwe amilazyo yakwe ambeta zyakwe azitondezyo zyakwe mbubonya mbukulembedwe mubbuku lyamulao wa-Musa, kuti ube acoolwe muzintu zyoonse nzyocita akoonse koonse nkoya.

Cita Jehova acite ncobeni mbubonya mbwaakandaambila kuti, Na bana bako bacenjele munzila zyabo akweenda kubusyu bwangu cabwini acamoyo woonse acamuuya woonse, takukooyookubulila muntu sikukala acuuno cabwami bwa-Israyeli.
Kocita cabusongo, utazumizyi imvwi zyakwe kuwida akabanda caluumuno.
Pele bana ba-Barizilai wakuGileadi, kobacitila cabuuya, balelwe kuntafule yako, nkaambo mbobakandigwasya ciindi eco nindakacijide kuzwa kumaanza aa-Abisalomu munyoko.

Alakwe Simeyi mwana wa-Gera mu-Benjamini waku-Bahurimu mpacili, ngonguwe iwakanditukila atusi liyoosya loko mubuzuba obo nindakaya kuMahanaimu. Wakeza ku-Jordano kuzoondicinga, elyo ndakamukonkezya muzina lya-Jehova kuti, Nsikooyookujazya ipanga pe.
Lino utamuleke-leli mulandu, nkaambo ulicenjede, ulizi mboelede kumucitila. Imvwi zyakwe ziwide mukabanda abulowa.

Ciindi Davida ncaakeendelezya ba-Israyeli cakasika kumyaka iili makumi one, Wakataanguna kweendelezya ku-Hebroni myaka iili musanu aibili, elyo ku-Jerusalemu wakeendelezya myaka iili makumi otatwe amyaka yotatwe.
Mpawo Solomoni wakakala acuuno cawisi Davida, nkabela bwami bwakwe bwakaima nji.
Wakati, Ndijisi ijwi lyomwe lyakukwaambila. Bakati, Amba.

Mpawo wakaamba kuti, Mulizi kuti bwami bwakali bwangu, aba-Israyeli boonse bakalibikide myoyo yabo alindime, kuti nkabeendelezye. Nekubaboobo bwami bwakandisia, bwaya kumukwesu, nkaambo Jehova nguwakamupa.
Lino ndijisi cintu comwe buyo ncinjanda kukumbila kulinduwe. Utandikasyi. Bakamwaambila kuti, Koamba.
Nkabela wakati, Ndakukumbila kuti undaambilile Solomoni mwami, nkaambo takookukasya pe. Andipe Abisagi waku-Sunamu, nkamukwate.
Elyo Batiseba wakati, Ncibotu, njookwaambilila mwami.
Mpawo bakati, Ndijisi kantu komwe buyo kakukumbila kulinduwe. Utandikasyi. Nkabela mwami wakavuwa kuti, Amwaambe, bama, nkaambo nsikoomukasya pe.
Lino bakati, Abisagi waku-Sunamu apegwe kuli-Adoniia munyoko, amukwate.

Pele mwami Solomoni wakavwiila banyina kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nywebo nomundikumbila kuti Abisagi waku-Sunamu apegwe Adonija? Amumukumbilile abwalo bwami, nkaambo ngumupati wangu, alimwi Abiyatare mupaizi a-Joabu mwana wa-Zeruya bali kubbazu lyakwe.
Nkabela mwami Solomoni wakakonkezya muzina lya-Jehova, wakati, Leza andicitile mbubonya akwiinda cita ijwi eli Adonija ndyaamba limusowele buumi.
Lino Jehova mbwali muumi, alimwi mbwaakandiimikizya akundibika acuuno cabwami ca-Davida taata akundiyakila iŋanda mbubonya mbwaakasyomezya, ncobeni buzuba obuno Adonija ulajayigwa.
Mpawo mwami Solomoni wakatuma Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada kuti amuume, aboobo wakafwa.
Aboobo Solomoni wakatanda Abiyatare, kuti atabi limbi mupaizi wa-Jehova. Mbuboobo mbwaakazuzikizigwa majwi aa-Jehova ngaakaamba aaluzubo lwa-Eli ku-Sile.
Nkabela mwami Solomoni wakaambilwa kuti, Joabu wacijila kutente lya-Jehova, ulikede kumbali lyacipaililo. Mpawo Solomoni wakatuma Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada, wati, Koya ukamujaye.

Lino Benaya naakasika kutente lya-Jehova, wakamwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami. Kozwa. Pele wakati, Nsiyandi; ndafwa mpoonya ano. Nkabela Benaya wakaleta makani kumwami, wakati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Joabu. Mbuboobu mbwaandivwiila.
Elyo mwami wakati, Kocita mbubonya mbwaamba, ukamujaye akumuzika, aboobo mebo aluzubo lwataata tuyoolobezegwa mulandu wabulowa bwabatakwezibi mbwaakatila Joabu.

Jehova uyoomubweedezezya mulandu wabulowa mbwaakatila, nkaambo wakalwisya bantu bobile baluleme babotu kwiinda nguwe akubajazya ipanga, nekuba kuti taata Davida katezi, Wakajaya ba-Abineri mwana wa-Neri, silutwe wampi yaba-Israyeli, a-Amasa mwana wa-Jeteri silutwe wampi yaba-Juda.
Mulandu wabulowa bwabo uleza amutwe wakwe Joabu aamitwe yabana bakwe kukabe kutamani, pele Davida abana bakwe aluzubo lwakwe acuuno cabwami bwakwe bayooba aluumuno kuli-Jehova lyoonse akutamani.
Mpawo Benaya mwana waJehoyada wakaakumuyasa akumujaya. Nkabela bakamuzika muŋanda yakwe kunkanda.
Elyo mwami wakabika Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada mucibaka cakwe cabusilutwe bwampi, alakwe Zadoki mupaizi mwami wakamubika mucibaka ca-Abiyatare.
Nkaambo kufumbwa buzuba mboyoozwa mumunzi akuzubuka kalonga ka-Kedroni, uzibe kuti ncobeni ulafwa. Mulandu wabulowa bwako uyooboola amutwe wako omwini.
Lino Simeyi wakaambila mwami kuti, Ncibotu. Mbubonya mwami simalelo wangu mbwaamba, mebo ndemulanda wako njoocita mbubonya. Aboobo Simeyi wakakala mu-Jerusalemu mazuba manji loko.
Amvwe obo, Simeyi wakanyamuka, wabamba imbongolo yakwe, wainka ku-Gati kuli-Akisi kuyooyandaula balanda bakwe. Simeyi wakaboozya balanda bakwe kuzwa ku-Gati.
Pele Solomoni naakalwiidwa kuti Simeyi kazwide ku-Jerusalemu kuya ku-Gati, alimwi waboola,

mwami wakatuma kuyooita Simeyi, wamwaambila kuti, Sa teendakakukonkezya muzina lya-Jehova akukulailila kuti, Kufumbwa buzuba mboyoozwa akuya bweendeenda kumbi, ziba kuti ncobeni ulafwa? Ayebo wakazumina, wakati, Ncibotu, ndacita mbundaambilwa.
Lino nkaambonzi nowatalemeka cikonkezyo ca-Jehova, amulazyo ngundakakulailila?
Mpawo mwami wakaambila Simeyi kuti, Ulizi bubi boonse buli mumoyo wako, mbuwakacitila Davida taata. Lino Jehova uyooboozya bubi bwako amutwe wako omwini,
pele mwami Solomoni uyoojana coolwe, acalo cuuno cabwami bwa-Davida ciyooima nji kubusyu bwa-Jehova lyoonse kukabe kutamani.
Mpawo mwami wakalailila Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada kuti, Koya, ukamuyase, afwe,
Aboobo bwami bwakaimikizigwa mumaanza aa-Solomoni.
Pele bantu bakali kutuula zipaizyo kuzilundu, nkaambo kuciindi eco iŋanda teeyakalina kuyakilwa izina lya-Jehova.
Elyo mwami wakainka ku-Gibeoni kuyootuula, nkaambo nkuko nkucakabede cilundu cipati cakupailila, Solomoni wakali kutuula zipaizyo zili cuulu acipaililo eco.
Lino oko ku-Gibeoni Jehova wakalibonya kuliSolomoni muciloto ciindi camasiku, Nkabela Leza wakati, Kumbila ncenti kupe.

Mpawo Solomoni wakaamba kuti, Wafwida taata Davida mulanda wako luzyalo lugambya, mbubonya mbwaakeenda kubusyu bwako calusinizyo acakululama acamoyo uululeme. Lino sunu wamuyungizizya luzyalo olu lupati lwakumupa mwana wakumukalila acuuno cabwami bwakwe.
O Jehova Leza wangu, nduwe wandipa bwami, mebo ndemulanda wako, mucibaka ca-Davida taata, nekuba kuti mebo ncili mwanike buyo, nsizi kuya akuboola.
Mebo ndemulanda wako mpondi akati kabantu bako mbosalide, musyobo mupati wabantu batakonzyi kweelekwa nikuba kubalwa nkaambo kakuvula.
Lino undipe ndemulanda wako moyo wakumvwa, kuti mbeteke kabotu bantu bako akwaandaanya bubotu abubi, nkaambo nguni uukonzya kubeteka bantu bako banji bali boobu?
Mpawo cakabota mumeso aa-Mwami kuti Solomoni wakakumbila obo.

Nkabela Leza wakamwaambila kuti, Mbubonya mbokumbide obo, akutalikumbilila mazuba manji aakoongola kwako nibuba buvubi nibuba buumi bwabasinkondonyoko, pele mbokumbide maanu aakumvwisya kubeteka kabotu,
ndacita mbubonya mboamba. Bona! Ndakupa moyo wabusongo­ uucenjede. Katakwe uuelene ayebo mumazuba aakamana, alimwi takukooyooba umbi uuelene ayebo mumazuba aaciza.
Acalo ncowatakumbila, ndakupa ncico, nkukuti buvubi abulemu. Takukooyooba mwami umbi uuelene ayebo mazuba oonse aabuumi bwako.
Lino na uende munzila zyangu akubamba imbeta zyangu amilazyo yangu, mbubonya mbuli uso Davida mbwaakeenda, njookupa mazuba manji aakoongola.
Nkabela umwi mwanakazi wakati, Akaka mwami! Mebo amwanakazi oyu tulikede muŋanda yomwe, Lino nindakali awe muŋanda ndakatumbuka.
Nkabela mubuzuba bwatatu bwakutumbuka kwangu, oyu mwanakazi alakwe wakatumbuka. Twakali atulike muŋanda tobile, katakwe mweenzu ngutwakali awe pe.
Elyo mwanakazi oyu wakafwidwa mwana wakwe masiku, nkaambo wakamulimba.
Nkabela wakabuka masiku, mebo ndemulanda wako nindakali muŋonzi, wakabba mwanaangu ambali lyangu akumooneka acamba cakwe, alimwi mwanaakwe uufwide wakamooneka alindime.
Lino nindakabuka cifumo, ndakati nyonsye mwanaangu, ndajana kuti ulifwide. Pele nibwakaca ndakamulangisya, ndajana kuti engwe mwanaangu ngundakazyala pe.
Pele mwanakazinyina wakakazya, wakati, Ne! Mwana wangu muumi, wako nguufwide. Amwanakazi mutaanzi wakati, Ne! mwana wako nguufwide, mwanaangu nguupona, Mbuboobo mbubakaamba kubusyu bwamwami.
Mpawo mwami wakati, Umwi ulati, Mwana wangu muumi, wako nguufwide. Amweenzinyina ulati, Ne! mwanaako nguufwide, wangu nguupona.
Elyo mwami wakati, Amundiletele ipanga, Nkabela ipanga nilyakaletwa kumwami,
mwami wakati, Amumwaandule mwana muumi akati, mwaabile umwi cipanzi aumwi cipanzi.

Mpawo banyina mwana muumi bakaambila mwami, nkaambo moyo wabo wakafwida mwana wabo insoni, wakati, Akaka mwami! Mweenzuma apegwe mwana muumi. Utamujayi pe, Pele mweenzinyina wakati, Takooyooba wangu naba wako, Abamwaandule.
Lino mwami wakavuwa kuti, Mwana muumi amumupe mwanakazi mutaanzi, mutamujayi pe, nkaambo ncobeni mbebanyina.
Nkabela ba-Israyeli boonse nibakamvwa mwami mbwaakakosola aya makani, bakayoowa mwami, nkaambo bakabona kuti busongo bwa-Leza bulikede mumoyo wakwe, aboobo ulabeteka kabotu.
Lino mwami Solomoni kali mwami wacisi coonse ca-Israyeli.
Ngaaya mazina aabasilutwe mbaakajisi: Azariya mwana wa-Zadoki kali mupaizi,
Elihorepa a-Ahiya bana ba-Sisa kabali balembi, Josafati mwana waAhiludi kali sikulemba makani,
Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada kali silutwe wampi, Zadoki a-Abiyatare kabali bapaizi,
Azariya mwana wa-Natani kali mupati wabanduna, Zaba di mwana wa-Natani mupaizi kali mweenzinyina mwami,
Ahisara wakali similimo waŋanda yamwami, a-Adoniramu mwana wa-Abida kali mulangi wacibalo.
Alimwi Solomoni kajisi bami bali ikumi ababili bazisi zyaba-Israyeli, mbombabo ibakali kubambila mwami abasiŋanda bakwe zilyo. Umwi aumwi kabamba zilyo zyamwezi umwi wamwaka.
Ngaaya mazina aabo: Benhuri mucisi catulundulundu twa-Efraimu,
Bendekeri ku-Makazi akuSaalibimu aku-Betisemesi aku-Elonibetanani,
Benhesedi ku-Aruboti aku-Soko anyika yoonse ya-Heferi,
Benabinadabu kucisi coonse caNafati-dori (ngonguwe iwakakwata Tafati mwana wa-Solomoni),
Baana mwana wa-Ahiludi ku-Tanaki aku-Megido aku-Betseani koonse kubambene aku-Zaretani kumunkuni wa-Jezreeli kuzwa ku-Betseani kusikila ku-Abelimehola mane kwiinda ku-Jokimeamu,

Beni-geberi ku-Ramoti-Gileadi (nguwe iwakajisi minzi ya-Jairi mwana wa-Manase iili mu-Gileadi, alimwi kajisi cisi ca-Arigobi cili mu-Basani, minzi mipati iili makumi aali musanu alimwi iyakayakilidwe malambo aminkulu yalubulo),
Ahinadabu mwana wa-Ido ku-Mahanaimu,
Ahimaazi ku-Nafitali (ngonguwe iwakakwata Basemati mwana wa-Solomoni),
Baana mwana wa-Husai ku-Aseri akuAloti,
jehosafati mwana wa-Paruwa ku-Isakara,
Simeyi mwana waEla ku-Benjamini,
Geberi mwana wa-Uri mucisi ca-Gileadi, nyika ya-Sihoni mwami waba-Amori a-Ogi mwami wa-Basana. Nkabela kakuli umwi silutwe mucisi ca-Juda,

Nkabela Solomoni wakali kweendelezya zisi zyoonse kuzwa kumulonga wa-Firate kusikila kunyika yaba-Filisti akumugaano wa-Egepita. Boonse kabaleta mitelo akumanina Solomoni milimo mazuba oonse aabuumi bwakwe.
Lino mbuboobu mbubwakabede bulilu bwa-Solomoni bwabuzuba bomwe: masaka aabusu bunante aali makumi otatwe, amasaka aabusu aali makumi aali musanu alimwi,
iŋombe zineneede zili ikumi, aŋombe zicela zili makumi obile, ambelele zili mwaanda, kutaamba bakonze ansya abalubondwe abayuni baneneede.
Nkaambo kali abwami munyika yoonse kumbo lyamulonga wa-Firate, kuzwa ku-Tipsa kusikila ku-Gaza. Kali mupati wabami boonse bakumbo lya-Firate, alimwi kakede aluumuno kumabazu oonse.
Ba-Juda aba-Israyeli bakali kukala cakuliiba, umwi aumwi ulikede munsi lyamusaansa wakwe alyamukuyu wakwe, kuzwa kuDani akusikila ku-Beeriseba, mazuba oonse ngaakapona Solomoni.
Nkabela Solomoni kajisi maanda aali zyuulu zili makumi one aamabbiza aankalaki zyakwe, abasimbizi bali zyuulu zili ikumi azibili.
Lino abo basilutwe bakali kuletela mwami Solomoni aboonse ibakali kusaninwa kuntafule yakwe malilu, umwi aumwi mumwezi wakwe. Katakwe ncibakabulide pe.
Aalo malilu aabbaale abwizu bwambizi abwamabbiza, zyoonse bakazileta nkukonya nkuzyakayandika, umwi aumwi mbwaakalaililwa.
Lino Leza wakapa Solomoni busongo abucenjezu loko loko, amoyo uuzwide twaambo tunji mbuli musee wakunkomwe yalwizi.
Busongo bwa-Solomoni bwakali kwiinda busongo bwabantu boonse bakujwe abusongo boonse bwaba-Egepita.
Wakasongwaala kwiinda bantu boonse, kwiinda Etani waku-Ezra, a-Hemani, a-Kalikoli, a-Darida bana ba-Maholi, nkabela impuwo yakwe yakamwaika kuzisi zyoonse zyeengelede.
Wakaamba tusimpi tuli zyuulu zyotatwe, azyalo nyimbo zyakwe zyakali cuulu amusanu.

Alimwi wakaamba makani aamisamu, nkukuti misamu yoonse kuzwa kukedari uumena mucilundu ca-Lebano akusikila kumusampwiza uumena abulambo. Amakani aabanyama abayuni atuuka answi, oonse buyo wakalaabwene.
Nkabela kwakeza bantu bamisyobo yoonse kuzooswiilila busongo bwa-Solomoni, abami boonse baluwa ibakamvwide impuwo yabusongo bwakwe.
Nkabela Solomoni wakatumina Hiramu mulazyo wakuti,
Ulizi kuti taata Davida wakakacilwa kuyakila izina lya-Jehova Leza wakwe iŋanda, nkaambo kankondo bantu nzibakamubusizya, mane Jehova wakababika kunsi azituta zyamaulu aakwe.
Pele lino Jehova Leza wangu wandipa lulyokezyo kumabazu oonse, Nsikwe basinkondoma naaba mafwabi pe.

Nkaambo kako ndi mukuyeeya kuyakila izina lya-Jehova Leza wangu iŋanda, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaambila Davida taata kuti, Mwana wako ngunjoobika mucibaka cako acuuno cako ngonguwe uuti yakile izina lyangu iŋanda.

Lino lailila bantu kuti banditemene misamu yakedari mucilundu ca-Lebano, Balanda bangu bayoogwasya balanda bako, azyakuvola zyabalanda bako njookupa kufumbwa mboamba, nkaambo ulizi kuti taakwe muntu akati kesu uuzi kutema misamu mbuli ba-Sidoni,
Elyo Hiramu naakamvwa majwi aa-Solomoni, wakakondwa loko, wakati, Alumbwe Jehova buzuba obuno, nkaambo wapa Davida mwana uucenjede wakweendelezya aba bantu banji.
Nkabela Hiramu wakatumina Solomoni, wakati, Ndakamvwa ncowakanditumina. Njoocita coonse ncoyanda kumakani aamisamu yakedari amisamu yamu lombe.

Balanda bangu bayooiselusya kulwizi kuzwa ku-Lebano, elyo njooiubya kuti ikeendele mumaanzi kusika kufumbwa nkoti ndaambile. Yasika nkuko, njooitimbaula, kuti uitambule kabotu, Lino uleelede kucita mbunjanda kukupa basiŋanda bangu zilyo.
Aboobo Hiramu wakapa Solomoni misamu yakedari amisamu yamu lombe yoonse njaakayanda.

Alakwe Solomoni wakapa Hiramu masaka aabulotwe aali zyuulu zili makumi obile aakusanina basiŋanda bakwe, amingomo iili zyuulu zili makumi obile yamafuta aakutwa, Mbuboobo Solomoni mbwaakali kupa Hiramu myaka yoonse.
Nkabela Jehova wakapa Solomoni busongo mbubonya mbwaakamusyomezya, alimwi Solomoni a-Hiramu bakakala caluumuno akutangana cizuminano.
Lino mwami Solomoni wakanjizya bantu mucibalo kumikowa yoonse ya-Israyeli, Eci cibbalo cakatola bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe.
Nkabela wakabatuma ku-Lebano, mwezi umwi aumwi bantu bali zyuulu zili ikumi, camalizi. Mwezi omwe bantu kabakala ku-Lebano, amyezi yobile kabakala kumunzi, Adoniramu nguwakali kubelesya basicibalo.
Alimwi Solomoni kajisi bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili bakuyumuna mikuli, abantu bali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aatatu bakutema misamu kucilundu;
kutaamba basilutwe Solomoni mbaakabika kuti balange basimilimo, Aba ibakali kubelesya bantu bakali zyuulu zyatatwe amyanda yotatwe.
Elyo mwami mbwaakabalailila, bakasya mabwe mapati mayandisi, kuti intalisyo yaŋanda ibikwe amabwe aabezedwe kabotu.
Aboobo bayaki ba-Solomoni abayaki ba-Hiramu abantu ba-Gebala bakasya mabwe akubamba ziyako amabwe kuyasya iŋanda.

Lino mumwaka wamyanda yone amakumi aali musanu aatatu, bana ba-Israyeli nibakamana kulonga kuzwa ku-Egepita, mumwaka wane wabwami bwa-Solomoni bwaku-Israyeli, mumwezi wa-Zivi (nkukuti mwezi wabili), wakatalika kuyaka iŋanda ya-Jehova.

Nkabela iŋanda mwami Solomoni njaakayakila Jehova, bulamfu bwayo kabuli tukokola tuli makumi aali musanu alimwi, abwaamba bwayo kabuli tukokola tuli makumi obile, abwiime bwayo kabuli tukokola tuli makumi otatwe.
Alukonkono lwakunembo lyantempele impati, bulamfu bwalo kabuli tukokola tuli makumi obile mbubonya mbuli bwaamba bwaŋanda, abwaamba bwalo kabuli tukokola tuli ikumi kunembo lyaŋanda.
Alimwi wakacitila iŋanda zipulo zili azikunguzyo zijisi.
Nkabela wakayaka lubaya kumbali lyamalambo aaŋanda, lwakuzyungulusya malambo aaŋanda, intempele acikombelo camukati coonse, alimwi wakayaka twaanda kumabazu oonse.

Twaanda twaansi twakalijisi bwaamba bwatukokola tosanwe, twaanda twaakati twakalijisi bwaamba bwatukokola tuli musanu akamwi, atwaanda twaanze twakalijisi bwaamba bwatukokola tuli musanu atubili, nkaambo anze lyabulambo wakayaka minsende kuti maseketi atagumi mubulambo.
Lion iŋanda niyakali mukuyakwa, yakayasigwa mabwe aakabambidwe kale nkukonya nkwaasigwa, aboobo katakwe insando nikaba kaleba niciba cibelesyo cimwi calubulo icakamvwigwa muŋanda mukuyakwa kwayo.
Nkabela mulyango watwaanda twaansi wakali kubbazu lyalulyo lwananda, alimwi kakuli matantilo aaya kutwaanda twaakati, akuzwa oko kuya kutwaanda twakujulu.
Aboobo wakayaka iŋanda akwiimanisya, alululi lwayo wakaluyasya maseketi amapulanga aakedari.
Alwalo lubaya lwakuzyunguluka iŋanda yoonse wakaluyaka, lwakalijisi bulamfu bwatukokola tosanwe, alimwi lwakaswaanizigwa aŋanda aziyako zyakedari.
Mpawo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila Solomoni, lyakati,

Swiilila makani aaŋanda eyi njoli mukuyaka. Na uende munzila zyangu akubamba imbeta zyangu akulemeka milazyo yangu akweenda mulinjiyo, lino njookuzuzikizya cisyomezyo cangu ncindakasyomezya Davida uso.
Njookala akati kabana ba-Israyeli, nsikooyoobatakata bantu bangu ba-Israyeli pe.
Aboobo Solomoni wakayaka iŋanda lumwi waimana.
Nkabela malambo aaŋanda aamukati wakaayasya zisamu zyakedari. Kuzwa ansi akusikila kumaseketi aalululi, moonse mukati wakamuvumbya zisamu, alimwi ansi wakaavumbya zisamu zyamulombe.
Akwalo kusule lyaŋanda wakayaka tukokola tuli makumi obile azisamu zyakedari, kuzwa ansi kusikila kumaseketi, kube cikombelo camukati, busena busalalisya loko.
Nkabela iŋanda ini, nkukuti intempele iyakali kunembo lyacikombelo cisalalisya camukati, kejisi bulamfu bwatukokola tuli makumi one.
Azyalo zisamu zyakedari zyamukati zyakalibezedwe mbuli myuungu ambuli malubaluba aasyuuka, Zyoonse zyakali zyakedari, katakwe mabwe aaboneka pe.
Acikombelo cisalalisya wakacibamba mukati kaŋanda, kuti abike mulincico ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova.

Nkabela cikombelo camukati cakalijisi bulamfu bwatukokola tuli makumi obile abwaamba bwatukokela tuli makumi obile abwiime bwatukokola tuli makumi obile, alimwi wakaciziluluzya ingolida loko, akucita cipaililo cazisamu zyakedari.
Amoonse mukati kaŋanda Solomoni wakamuziluluzya ingolida loko, alimwi wakabika inkeetani zyangolida kunembo lyacikombelo cisalalisya, acikombelo eco acalo wakaciziluluzya ingolida.
Iŋanda yoonse wakaiziluluzya ingolida lumwi wakamana iŋanda yoonse, acalo cipaililo camucikombelo camukati wakaciziluluzya ingolida.

Ibbaba limwi lyakeribu lyakali tukokola tosanwe mubulamfu, abbaba limwi lyakali tukokola tosanwe mubulamfu, nkukuti bulamfu boonse kuzwa kumagolelo aabbaba limwi kusikila kumagolelo aabbaba alimwi bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi.
Aangelo wabili alakwe kajisi bulamfu bwatukokola tuli ikumi. Bakerebimu boonse bobile bakeelene mubulamfu bwabo amuziimo zyabo.
Bwiime bwakerebimu umwi bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi, abwiime bwakerebimunyina abwalo bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi.

Nkabela wakabika baangelo abakerebimu mucikombelo camukati. Lino nibakatandabika mababa aabo, ibbaba lyakerebimu umwi lyakaguma kubulambo, abbaba lyakerebimunyina alyalo lyakaguma kubulambo bwabili, alimwi akati kaŋanda mababa aabo akali kugumana.
Abalo bakerebimu wakabaziluluzya ingolida.
Lino amalambo oonse aaŋanda aazyungulukide wakabeza zikozyano zyabakerebimu azyamikunka azyamalubaluba aasyuuka, mukati aanze oonse.
Aalo ansi aaŋanda wakaaziluluzya ingolida, mukati aanze oonse.
Amakoma ayo obile aazisamu zyaolifa, oonse wakaabezela zikozyano zyabakerebimu azyamikunka azyamalubaluba aasyuuka, alimwi wakaaziluluzya ingolida. Aalo abakerebimu aamikunka wakaaziluluzya ingolida.
Amulyango wantempele yaanze, awalo wakaucitila mbubonya makoma aazisamu zyaolifa, aakali amabazu one,
amakoma obile aazisamu zyamulombe. Zipanzi zyobile zyakoma limwi zyakali kuswanaana, azipanzi zyobile zyakoma limwi zyakali kuswanaana.
Zyoonse wakazibezela zikozyano zyabakerebimu azyamikunka azyamalubaluba aasyuuka, alimwi wakaziziluluzya ingolida iyakayalidwe cakweelana oonse abubeze.
Alubaya lwamukati wakaluyasya mindando yotatwe yamabwe aabezedwe amundando omwe wazisamu zyakedari.
Intalisyo yaŋanda ya-Jehova yakabikwa mumwaka wane, mumwezi wa-Zivi,
elyo mumwaka wakumi aumwi, mumwezi wa-Buli (nkukuti mwezi wamusanu aitatu) iŋanda yakamana kuyakwa kumabazu oonse mbubonya mbuyakayeeyegwa. Aboobo kuyakwa kwayo kwakatola myaka iili musanu aibili.

Ayalo iŋanda yakulusaka lwa-Lebano wakaiyaka. Bulamfu bwayo bwakali tukokola tuli mwaanda, abwaamba bwayo bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, abwiime bwayo bwakali tukokola tuli makumi otatwe. Yakaliyakidwe amindando yotatwe yamisamu yakedari, aminkulu yakedari amindando eyo.
Alimwi yakalivumbidwe amisamu yakedari atala lyatwaanda twakali ajulu lyamindando, twakali makumi one amusanu, mumindando mindando ikumi amusanu.
Zipulo zyakali-mumindando yotatwe. Zipulo zyakalilangene mumatantilo otatwe.
Milyango yoonse azipulo zyoonse kazijisi zikunguzyo zyamabazu one, azipulo zyakalilangene mumindando yotatwe.

Ayalo inkuta wakaiyasya zisamu. Bulamfu bwayo bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, abwaamba bwayo bwakali tukokola tuli makumi otatwe, Nkabela kakuli kaanda kunembo lyayo ikakayakidwe azisamu, acikwabilizyo kunembo lyako.
Aya oonse akayasigwa mabwe mayandisi aakabezwa cakweelekwa akugonkolwa amasaha, kunembo akusule, kuzwa kuntalisyo akusikila kunsonge, akuzwa kulubua lwaŋanda ya-Jehova akusikila kulubua lupati.
Intalisyo yakatalikwa amabwe mayandisi, mabwe mapati, mabwe aali abulamfu bwatukokola tuli ikumi na tukokola tuli musanu atutatu.
Aalo ajulu kaali mabwe mayandisi aakabezedwe cakweelekwa, azisamu zyakedari.

Nkabela lubua lupati lwakalijisi mindando yotatwe yamabwe mabeze aazyungulukide, amundando omwe waminsende yakedari. Alwalo lubua lwamukati lwaŋanda ya-Jehova lwakali mbubonya, akaanda kakunembo lyaŋanda.

Kali mwana wanabutema wamukowa wa-Nafitali, awisi kali mwaalumi waku-Turo, mufuzi wamukuba. Kazwide busongo akuswiililisya aluzibo, kabwene loko kubeleka milimo iili buti na buti yamukuba. Lino wakeza kumwami Solomoni kuzoocita milimo.

Alimwi wakapanga ziimikililo zyobile akuzibika atala lyaminsende. Wakazifuzya mukuba. Ciimikililo cimwi cakali abulamfu bwatukokola tosanwe, aciimikililo cabili acalo cakali abulamfu bwatukokola tosanwe.
Nkabela wakapanga tusabwe tobile tupesedwe antambo tuli ankeetani twakubika aziimikililo izyakali aminsende. Ciimikililo cimwi cakalijisi kasabwe, aciimikililo cimwi cakalijisi kasabwe.
Mbubonya obo wakapanga mindando yobile yamicelo yapomegranite koonse koonse akasabwe komwe cakuvumba ciimikililo icakali ajulu lyamunsende. Aciimikililo cabili acalo wakacicitila mbubonya.
Lino ziimikililo izyakali ajulu lyaminsende mukaanda kakunembo zyakacitwa azikozyano zyampana, tukokola tone.

Ziimikililo zyakali ajulu lyaminsende yobile akujulu lyamusumpuululu uutuntumene iwakali kubbazu lyatusabwe. Kakuli mapomegranite aali myanda yobile mumindando yobile iizyungulukide. Aciimikililo cabili acalo mbucakacitidwe.
Nkabela wakayaka minsende kumanjililo aantempele. Munsende wakululyo naakauyaka, wakauulika izina lya-Jakini, amunsende wakulumwensi naakauyaka, wakauulika izina lya-Boazi.
­Alimwi ajulu lyaminsende kwakabezwa zikozyano zyampana, Aboobo milimo yaminsende yakamana.
Kunsi kutako lyalyo lyakazyuungulukidwe zikozyano zyazinkuli. Tukokola tuli makumi otatwe zinkuli zyakali kuguma iziba. Zyakali mumindando yobile, zyakafulwa antoomwe andilyo.

Nkabela lyakaliimvwi ajulu lyaŋombe zili ikumi azibili. Iŋombe zyotatwe kazilangide kunyika, zyotatwe kazilangide kumbo, zyotatwe kazilangide kumusanza, zyotatwe kazilangide kujwe. Iziba lyakalikede alinzizyo, amatako aazyo akalifutatilene.
Indiya yalyo yakali mbuli ijanza, ankomwe yalyo yakalipangidwe mbubonya mbuli mulomo wankomeki, yakali amalubaluba aampana. Kalikonzya kujata nongo zili zyuulu zyobile.
Alimwi wakapanga zikazikilo zili ikumi zyamukuba, Cikazikilo cimwi acimwi kacijisi bulamfu bwatukokola tone, abwaamba bwatukokolat tone, abwiime bwatukokola totatwe.
Lino mbuboobu zikazikilo mbuzyakapangidwe: zyakalijisi misinsi, amisinsi yakabikilwa minkulu,
alimwi awo amisinsi iyakabikilwa minkulu akabezwa balavu aŋombe abaangelo bakerebimu, Alimwi aminkulu, koonse kujulu amunsi lyabalavu aŋombe, akafokolwa zikozyano.
Nkabela cikazikilo cimwi acimwi cakalijisi mibalo yone yamukuba azibulo zyamukuba, Alimwi azyooko zyone akali zitaoilizyo zyacisambilo. Ezi zitabilizyo zyakalifulidwe, ankeetani mumbali lyazyo.

Amulomo waco wakali mukati kamusini iwakaconcomene ajulu kakokola komwe. Mulomo waco wakalizyuungulukide mbubonya mbuli ciimikililo mbucicitwa, kuuli abulamfu bwakakokola acisela. Aalo amulomo waco akabezwa zikozyano, amisinsi yazyo yakali amabazu one, teeyakazyungulukide pe.
Mibalo yone yakali kunsi lyamisinsi, azibulo zyamibalo zyakalijisi mucikazikilo, Bwiime bwamubalo bwakali kakokola acisela.
Mibalo yakalipangidwe mbubonya mbuli mibalo yankalaki. Zibulo zyayo amyoombe yayo atwiimino twayo azijatilizyo zyayo zyoonse zyakalifulidwe.
Alimwi cikazikilo cimwi acimwi cakalijisi zitabilizyo zyone kuzyooko zyaco, Ezi zitabilizyo zyakalijisi mucikazikilo cini.
Nkabela ajulu lyacikazikilo akali cintu cizyungulukide icakali abwiime bwacisela cakakokola. Alimwi mpoonya awo ajulu lyacikazikilo zitabilizyo zyaco aminsini yace zyoonse zyakalijisi mulincico.
Lino atala lyazitabilizyo zyaco alyamisinsi yaco wakafokola zikozyano zyabakerebimu azyabalavu azyatukunka, kufumbwa busena nkubwakajenwe, ankeetani kazili kumabazu.
Mbuboobo mbwaakapanga zikazikilo zili ikumi, Zyoonse zyakalifulidwe mbubonya. Zyakaleelene mubweelekwe bwazyo amuciwa cazyo.
Elyo zikazikilo wakazibika, zyosanwe kululyo lwaŋanda azyosanwe kulumwensi lwaŋanda. Alyalo iziba wakalibika kubbazu lyacooko caŋanda cakumusanza wakujwe.
Mpawo Hiramu wakacita zilongo amaliko amitiba. Aboobo Hiramu wakamanisya milimo yoonse njaakacitila mwami Solomoni kuŋanda yaJehova:
minsende yobile, ziimikililo zizyungulukide zyobile izyakali ajulu lyaminsende, insabwe zyobile zyakuvunisya ziimikililo zizyungulukide zyobile izyakali ajulu lyaminsende,
amapomegranite aali myanda yone aansabwe zyobile, mindando yobile yamapomegranite kulusabwe lumwi alumwi, yakuvunisya ziimikililo zizyungulukide izyakali ajulu lyaminsende,
azikazikilo zili ikumi, azisambilo zili ikumi izyakakede mpoonya azikazikilo,
aziba lyomwe, aŋombe zili ikumi azibili kunsi lyaziba.
Mumumpata wa-Jordano mwami nkwaakazifulila, munyika yabulongo iili akatikati ka-Sukoti a-Zaretani.
Nkabela Solomoni wakabula kweeleka bulemu bwazibelesyo zyoonse, nkaambo zyakavula loko. Bulemu bwamukuba teebwakabalwa pe.
zibikilo zyamalampi zyangolida loko, zyosanwe kululyo azyosanwe kulumwensi lwacikombelo camukati, malubaluba amalampi alumano lwangolida;
inkomeki atugele amitiba amigano yatununkilizyo ankayi zyamulilo, zyoonse zyangolida loko; azijatyo zyangolida zyamakoma aabusena busalalisya bwamukati kaŋanda azyamakoma aantempele yaanze.

Mbuboobo mwami Solomoni mbwaakamanisya milimo yoonse njaakacitila iŋanda ya-Jehova. Mpawo Solomoni wakaleta zintu nzyaakasalazizye wisi Davida, insiliva angolida azibelesyo zyoonse, akuzibika muciyobwedo camuŋanda ya-Jehova.
Nkabela bantu boonse ba-Israyeli bakayoboloka kuli-Solomoni mwami kupobwe lyamumwezi wa-Etanimu, nkukuti mwezi wamusanu aibili.
Bapati boonse ba-Israyeli bakasika, elyo bapaizi bakabweza Ibbokesi.
Nkabela bakaleta ibbokesi lya-Jehova atente lyakubunganina azibulo zyoonse zisalala zyamutente, Bapaizi aba-Levi mbebakazileta.
Lino mwami Solomoni, ambungano yoonse yaba-Israyeli ibakayoboloka kulinguwe, bakali awe kunembo lyabbokesi, balapaizya imbelele abasune banji loko. Mweelwe wabanyama kuutabaliki nikuba kweelekwa.
Mpawo bapaizi bakaleta ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova kubusena bwalyo mucikombelo camukati caŋanda, mubu sena busalalisya, munsi lyamababa aabakerebimu.
Nkaambo bakerebimu bakalitandabikide mababa aabo abusena aabbokesi, Bakerebimu bakali kuvumba ibbokesi azisamu zyalyo zyoonse.
Zisamu zyakalampisya, aboobo impela zyazyo zyakali kulibonya kubusena busalalisya kunembo lyacikombelo camukati, pele teezyakali kuboneka anze. Asunu mpozicili mpoonya awo.
Nkabela mubbokesi taakwe icakali mo cita mabwe obile Musa ngaakabika mumo ku-Horebu, nkonkuko Jehova nkwaakatangana cizuminano abana ba-Israyeli nibakazwa kucisi ca-Egepita.
Lino bapaizi nibakazwa mubusena busalalisya, ijoba lyakazuzya iŋanda ya-Jehova,
mane bapaizi bakakacilwa kwiimikila kubeleka nkaambo kajoba, nkaambo bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakazuzya iŋanda ya-Jehova.
Kuyaka ndakuyakila iŋanda indamfu, busena bwakukalila lyoonse.
Wakati, Alumbwe Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, nkaambo maanza aakwe azuzikizya ncaakasyomezya amilomo yakwe kuli-Davida taata.

Wakati, Kuzwa kubuzuba obo nindakagwisya bantu bangu mucisi ca-Egepita, nsina kusala munzi nuuba umwi akati kamisyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli kuti njakilwe iŋanda, izina lyangu libe nkuko. Pele ndakasala Davida aendelezye bantu bangu ba-Israyeli.
Lino mumoyo wakwe Davida taata wakali kuyeeya kuyaka iŋanda, ibe yazina lya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Pele Jehova wakaambila Davida taata kuti, Mbuli mboyeeyede mumoyo wako kuyakila izina lyangu iŋanda, wakacita kabotu kuyeeya obo mumoyo wako.
Nekubaboobo webo omwini tokooyooyaka iŋanda pe. Mwanaako uuzwa mwida lyako nguuyooyakila izina lyangu iŋanda.

Lino Jehova wazuzikizya majwi aakwe ngaakaamba, nkaambo mebo ndanjila mucibaka ca-Davida taata, ndikede acuuno cakwe cabwami bwa-Israyeli, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakasyomezya, nkabela ndayakila izina lya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli iŋanda.
Alimwi mumonya muŋanda ndabamba busena bube bwabbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova ncaakatangana abamatata besu naakabagwisya munyika ya-Egepita.
Lino wakati, O Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, taakwe Leza umbi uuelene ayebo, nikuba kujulu naaba ansi ano, uubamba cizuminano akucita caluzyalo kubalanda bako beenda kubusyu bwako camoyo woonse.
Wazuzikizizya Davida taata mulanda wako majwi nguwakamwaambila. Wakaambya mulomo wako, lino sunu ijanza lyako walicitya ncobeni.

Lino, O Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, kocitila Davida taata mulanda wako mbubonya mbowakamusyomezya, Wakati, Takukooyookubulila muntu kubusyu bwangu wakukala acuuno cabwami bwa-Israyeli, Pele bana bako baleelede kucenjela munzila zyabo, kuti beende kubusyu bwangu mbubonya ayebo mbowakeenda.
Lino, O Leza wa-Israyeli, majwi aako ngowakaambila Davida taata mulanda wako aimikizigwe nji.
Nekubaboobo koswiilila cikombyo cangu ndemulanda wako acikumbizyo cangu, O Jehova Leza wangu. Koswiilila cilizyo acikombyo mulanda wako ncakombya kubusyu bwako mubuzuba obuno,
kuti meso aako alange aŋanda eyi lyoonse, masiku asikati, abusena mboambide kuti, Izina lyangu likakale nkukonya, Koswiilila cikombyo mulanda wako ncakombya kubusena obuno.
Koswiilila cikumbizyo camulanda wako abantu bako ba-Israyeli ncibakombya kubusena obuno. Ee, koswiilila kucikalilo cako cakujulu, alimwi noswiilila, kobalekelela.
Na muntu wabisizya mweenzinyina, aboobo wasungilizigwa kukonka, alimwi weza kuzookonka cikonke cakwe kunembo lyacipaililo cako omuno muŋanda,

elyo koswiilila kujulu nkobede, akubeteka kabotu mulincico kufumbwa ncocitila balanda bako. Sizibi umupe mulandu, kuti zibi zyakwe ziboole amutwe wakwe mwini, pele mululami komululamika akumupa bulumbu bweelede bululami bwakwe.
koswiilila kujulu nkobede, ulekelele zibi zyabantu bako ba-Israyeli akubaboozya kunyika yabo njiyonya njowakabapa bamawisi.
Na ijulu lilijalidwe cakutalosya imvula nkaambo kakuti bakubisizya, nkabela bakomba mpoonya ano, akulemeka izina lyako, akuleka zibi zyabo noli mukubapenzya,

lino koswiilila kujulu nkobede, akulekelela zibi zyabalanda bako, bantu bako ba-Israyeli, nowabaiisya inzila imbotu njibeelede kweendela, akulosya imvula anyika yabo njowakabapa bantu bako kuti ibe caabilo cabo.
na bakomba akukumbila, nkukuti bantu boonse nanka bantu bako ba-Israyeli, umwi aumwi mbuli mbwazi mapenzi aamumoyo wakwe, akutandabika maanza aakwe kuŋanda eyi,

lino swiilila kujulu kumakalilo aako nkokede, ulekelele, ucite kabotu, akuboozezya umwi aumwi bulumbu bwanzila zyakwe, mbubonya mbobwene moyo wakwe, (Nkaambo nduwe olike uubwene myoyo yabantu boonse baansi),
kuti bakulemeke mazuba oonse aabuumi bwabo nibacipona munyika njowakabapa bamatata besu.
Alakwe mweenzu uutali umwi wabantu bako ba-Israyeli, uuzwa kucisi cakule nkaambo kazina lyako,
(nkaambo bantu bayooswiilila impuwo yazina lyako ipati ayajanza lyako lyanguzu ayakuboko kwako kutandabede) asika kukukomba kuŋanda okuno,

koswiilila kumakalilo aako aakujulu, ukacite coonse mweenzu ncakukwiilila, kuti bantu boonse baansi bazibe izina lyako, akukulemeka mbubonya bantu bako ba-Israyeli mbubakulemeka, aku ziba kuti iŋanda eyi njindakuyakila yaambwa muzina lyako.
Na bantu bako baya kukulwana abasinkondonyina, kufumbwa nkobatuma, alimwi bakomba kuli-Jehova cakulanga kumunzi ngosalide akuŋanda njinjakilide izina lyako,
koswiilila kujulu nkobede cikombyo cabo acikumbizyo cabo akubakosweda makani.
nekubaboobo na bajola myoyo yabo oko kunyika nkubatoledwe mubuzike, akweempwa, akukumbila kulinduwe oko kunyika yabasikubasaala, cakwaamba kuti, Twakabisya, akuleya, akutyola mulao,
na ncobeni beempwa camoyo woonse acamiyeeyo yoonse omo mucisi cabasinkondonyina nkubatoledwe, akukukomba cakulanga kunyika njowakapa bamawisi akumunzi ngosalide akuŋanda njinjakilide izina lyako,
lino koswiilila kujulu nkobede cikombyo cabo acikumbizyo cabo, ukabakoswede makani aabo.
Kolekelela bantu bako bakubisizya, akubajatila milandu yabo yoonse, akubapesya luzyalo kubusyu bwabasikubasaala, kuti babafwide luzyalo.
Nkaambo mbantu bako acaabilo cako, mbowakagwisya mu-Egepita, mumulilo wabutale.
Meso aako alange acikumbizyo camu landa wako acikumbizyo cabantu bako ba-Israyeli, Kobaswiilila muzintu zyooonse nzibakukwiilila.
Nkaambo nduwe wakabaandaanya kuzwa kumisyobo yoonse yaansi, kuti babe caabilo cako, mbubonya mbowakaamba kumulomo wa-Musa mulanda wako ciindi eciya nowakagwisya bamatata ku-Egepita, O Mwami Jehova.
Lino Solomoni naakamana kukomba Jehova cikombyo eci acikumbizyo eci coonse, wakanyamuka kuzwa kucipaililo ca-Jehova, nkwaakafugeme amazwi aakwe akutambika maanza aakwe kujulu,
wakaima akulongezya imbungano yoonse ya-Israyeli ajwi ipati. Wakati,
Alumbwe Jehova iwakapa bantu bakwe ba-Israyeli kulyokezya, mbubonya mbwaakasyomezya. Taakwe ijwi niliba lyomwe lyawa ansi akati kamajwi mabotu oonse ngaakaamba kumulomo wa-Musa mulanda wakwe.
Jehova Leza abe aswe mbubonya mbwaakali abamatata, Atatusiyi nikuba kututakata,
Alulamike myoyo yesu kulinguwe, kuti tweende munzila zyakwe zyoonse akubamba milazyo yakwe ambeta zyakwe amilumbe yakwe njaakalailila bamatata.

Aya majwi aangu ngendakumbila kubusyu bwa-Jehova abe afwaafwi kuli-Jehova Leza wesu lyoonse, isikati amasiku, kuti akosole kabotu makani aamulanda wakwe amakani aabantu bakwe ba-Israyeli, buzuba bumwi abumwi mbubweelede,
kuti bantu bamisyobo yoonse yaansi bazibe kuti Jehova ngu-Leza, taakwe umbi.
Pele muleelede kuba amoyo womwe luzutu kuli-Jehova Leza wesu, cakutobela inzila zyakwe acakubamba milazyo yakwe, mbubonya mbuli mubuzuba obuno.
Lino mwami aba-Israyeli boonse mbaakali abo bakali kutuula zipaizyo kubusyu bwa-Jehova,

Nkabela Solomoni wakatuula zipaizyo zyakutontozya kuli-Jehova, basune bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azibili, ambelele zili zyuulu zili mwaanda amakumi obile. Mbuboobo mwami abana baIsrayeli boonse mbubakasalazya iŋanda ya-Jehova.

Amubuzuba obo mbubonya mwami wakasalazya lubuwa lwaakati lulangene aŋanda yaJehova, nkaambo nkukonya oko nkwaakatuula cituuzyo acipaizyo cabusu amafuta aazituuzyo zyakutontozya, nkaambo cipaililo camukuba cakubusyu bwa-Jehova cakaata kutambula cipaizyo cabusu amafuta aazituuzyo zyakutontozya,

Lino nibwakaca buzuba bwamusanu aatatu wakamwaisya bantu. Nkabela bakalumba mwami akuya kumaanda aabo cakukondwa acakusekelela mumyoyo yabo nkaambo kabubotu boonse Jehova mbwaakacitila Davida mulanda wakwe aba-Israyeli bantu bakwe.
Jehova wakalibonya lwabili kuli-Solomoni, mbubonya mbwaakalibonya naakakede ku-Gibeoni.

Nkabela Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Ndamvwa cikombyo cako acikumbizyo cako ncokumbizya kulindime. Ndasalazya iŋanda eyi njoyakide, azina lyangu ndalibika mulinjiyo kukabe kutamani. Meso aangu amoyo wangu zyoonse ziyooba alinjiyo mazuba oonse.
Lino webo, na weenda kumeso aangu mbubonya mbuli Davida usa mbwaakeenda, nkukuti camoyo mubotu acakululama, cakucita coonse ncinkulailila, akubamba imbeta zyangu amilazyo yangu,
elyo njooimikizya cuuno cabwami bwako akati kaba-Israyeli kukabe kutamani, mbubonya mbuli ijwi ndindakaambila Davida uso, lyakuti, Takukooyookubulikila muntu wakukala acuuno cabwami bwa-Israyeli.
Pele na mwaleka kunditobela, noba nduwe nibaba bana bako, akutabamba milazyo yangu ambeta zyangu nzindimupede, akuya bukomba mizimu myeenzu akwiikotamina,

elyo njoonyonyoona ba-Israyeli mpoonya anyika njindakabapa, ayalo iŋanda njindasalazizya izina lyangu njooimwaya kubusyu bwangu, nkabela izina lya-Israyeli liyooba mbuli kasimpi ajwi lyakusampauzya akati kamisyobo yoonse yaansi.
Iŋanda eyi iyooba itongo buyo. Kufumbwa muntu uuinda alinjiyo uyoogamba akunyontooka, cakubuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi Jehova wakacita obo kunyika eyi akuŋanda eyi?
