Mpawo uyoovwiilwa kuti, Nkaambo kakuti bakatakata Jehova Leza wabo iwakagwisya bamawisi kuzwa kucisi caEgepita, bakaakujata mizimu imbi akwiikomba akwiimanina milimo. Nciceeco Jehova ncaabaletela bubi obu boonse.
Lino kumane buyo myaka iili makumi obile, Solomoni naakali kuyaka maanda obile, nkukuti iŋanda ya-Jehova aŋanda yamwami,
alakwe Hiramu mwami waku-Turo naakali kwaabila Solomoni zisamu zyakedari azisamu zyamulombe angolida acoonse ncaakali kuyanda, mwami Solomoni wakapa Hiramu minzi iili makumi obile mucisi ca-Galilaya.
Pele Hiramu naakazwa ku-Turo kuzoobona minzi njaakamupa Solomoni, teeyakamubotela pe.
Lino wakati, Ma! Minzi eyi njowandipa ili buti, mukwesu? Nkabela wakaiulika izina lyacisi ca-Kabuli, mbiicaambwa asunu.
Mpawo Hiramu wakatumina mwami matalenta aangolida aali mwaanda amakumi obile.

(Farao mwami wa-Egepita wakaliinkide kuyoolwisya Gezeri, nkabela wakautentya mulilo akunyonyoona ba-Kanana boonse ibakakede mumunzi, akuupa mwanaakwe musimbi muka-Solomoni ube caabilo cakwe cabwiinga.
Aboobo Solomoni wakayakulula Gezeri), a-Betihoroni wamunsi,
a-Baalati a-Tadimori munkanda mucisi ca-Juda,

aminzi yoonse yazilondwedo Solomoni njaakajisi, aminzi yankalaki, aminzi yabasimbizi, akufumbwa cintu Solomoni ncaakayanda kuyaka nimuba mu-Jerusalemu nimuba mu-Lebano nimuba munyika yoonse yabwami bwakwe.
Nkabela bantu boonse ibakasyeede baba-Amori aba-Hiti abaPerizi aba-Hivi aba-Jebusi, ibatakali bana ba-Israyeli,
bana babo ibakacisyeede munyika, bana ba-Israyeli mbibakakacilwa kunyonyoona, aba bantu Solomoni wakabanjizya mucibalo, babe bazike, mbubonya mbubacibede asunu,
Pele akati kabantu ba-Israyeli, katakwe Solomoni mbaakanjizya mucibalo pe, nkaambo bakali basilumamba, basilutwe bakwe abasimpi bakwe abami bakwe abasinkalaki bakwe abasimbizi bakwe.
Lino mbaaba basilutwe ibakabikidwe kuti balange milimo ya-Solomoni: myanda yosanwe amakumi osanwe. Bakali kubelesya bantu ibakali kucita milimo.
Lino ziindi zyotatwe zyamumwaka Solomoni wakali kutuula zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya acipaililo ncaakayakila Jehova, akutenta tununkilizyo kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Aboobo wakamanisya iŋanda.
Elyo Hiramu wakatuma amaato ayo balanda bakwe, basibwaato ibakabwene loko makani aalwizi, kuti babe antoomwe abalanda ba-Solomoni.
Nkabela bakainka ku-Ofiri, bakagwisya oko ingolida iyakali abulemu bwamatalenta aali, myanda yone amakumi obile, akwiisisya kumwami Solomoni.
Waka­ sika ku-Jerusalemu ampumba impati loko, ankamele ziyumwide zilisyo angolida zinji loko amabwe mayandisi, elyo naakasika kuli-Solomoni, wakamwaambila makani oonse aakali mumoyo wakwe.
Nkabela Solomoni wakamupandulwida mibuzyo yakwe yoonse. Katakwe cintu niciba comwe icakasisidwe kumwami ancakakacilwa kumupandulwida.
Lino oyo mwami mwanakazi waku-Seba, naakamana kubona busongo boonse bwa-Solomoni, aŋanda njaakayakide,
azilyo zyakuntafule yakwe, akukala kwabalanda bakwe, akukutauka kwabazike bakwe, azyakusama zyabo, abajiki bakwe, azituuzyo nzyaakali kutuula muŋanda ya-Jehova, moyo wakwe wakaata loko.
Elyo wakaambila mwami kuti, Impuwo yamakani aako ayabusongo bwako, njindakamvwa mucisi cangu, yakali yakusinizya.
Pele teendakazuminina majwi ngendakamvwa, mane ndasika akubona ameso aangu ndemwini. Lino ncobeni teendakaambilwa cisela, nkaambo busongo bwako abubotu bwako mbupati akwiinda impuwo njindakamvwide.
Bali acoolwe bantu bako! Bali acoolwe aba balanda bako baimvwi lyoonse kubusyu bwako, baswiilila busongo bwako.
Atembaulwe Jehova Leza wako, iwakabotelwa nduwe akukukazika acuuno cabwami bwa-Israyeli. Jehova mbwayandisya Israyeli lyoonse, nciceeco ncaakakubikila kuti ube mwami, ubeteke makani cakululama.

Mpawo wakapa mwami matalenta aangolida aali mwaanda amakumi obile, atulisyo tunji loko, amabwe mayandisi, Teekwakaboneka limbi tulisyo tunji tuli boobo mbuli oto mwami mwanakazi waku-Seba ntwaakapa mwami Solomoni.
Nkabela zisamu ezyo zyaalmugi, mwami Solomoni wakazibezya zitabilizyo zyaŋanda ya-Jehova azyaŋanda yamwami, atuntimbwa anyeele zyabasikwiimba. Teekwakaboneka limbi zisamu zili boobo akusikila sunu.

Lino mwami Solomoni wakapa mwami mwanakazi waku-Seba kufumbwa moyo wakwe nciwakayanda, ncaakakumbila, kutaamba zintu ezyo nzyaakapegwa buyo kumaanza aamwami Solomoni. Elyo wakapiluka, wakaya kunyika yakwe, walo abalanda bakwe.
Lino bulemu bwangolida iyakatambulwa mumaanza aa-Solomoni mumwaka omwe bwakali matalenta aangolida aali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu alimwi,
kutaamba eyo iyakazwa kubasambazi akubasikuulisya beendeenda, akubami ba-Arabiya akubeendelezi banyika.
Nkabela mwami Solomoni wakapanga intobo zyangolida iifulidwe zili myanda yobile. Intobo imwi aimwi yakali amasyekeli aangolida aali myanda iili musanu aumwi.
Alimwi wakapanga zikwabilizyo zili myanda yotatwe zyangolida iifulidwe, Cikwabilizyo cimwi acimwi cakali ampondo zyotatwe zyangolida. Nkabela mwami wakazibika muŋanda yamucisaka ca-Lebano,
Alimwi mwami wakapanga cuuno cipati cameja aanzovu akucivumbya ingolida iisalala.

Eco cuuno cakalijisi matantilo aali musanu alimwi, akusule lyaco kakuli mutwe wamunamani, akubbazu limwi alimwi lyacikalilo kacijisi zilyokezezyo zyamaboko, abalavu bobile baimvwi kumbali lyazilyokezezyo.
Alimwi kakuli balavu bali ikumi ababili baimvwi amatantilo aali musanu alimwi kulubazu lumwi alumwi. Teekwakacitwa cimwi ceelene ancico abuniini muzisi zyoonse.

Nkabela zinywido zyoonse zyamwami Solomoni zyakali zyangolida, azinywido zyoonse zyamuŋanda yamucisaka caku-Lebano zyakali zyangolida iisalala, Katakwe zyansiliva pe, Eci teecakagambya abuniini pe mumazuba aa-Solomoni.
Nkaambo mwami kajisi maato aa-Tarisi aakali kulwizi antoomwe amaato aa-Hiramu. Lomwe mumyaka yotatwe maato aa-Tarisi akali kuza kuleta ingolida, ansiliva, ameja aanzovu, abasokwe ankangantole.
Lino mwami Solomoni kali mupati kwiinda bami boonse baansi mubuvubi amubusongo.
Nkabela bami boonse baansi bakali kuyandaula kubona busyu bwa-Solomoni, kuti baswiilile busongo bwakwe Leza mbwaakabikide mumoyo wakwe.
Aboonse bakali kuleta umwi aumwi cipo cakwe, zibelesyo zyansiliva, azibelesyo zyangolida, azyakusama, atununkilizyo twamura, azilisyo, amabbiza ambongolo. Bakali kucita obo myaka yoonse,
Nkabela insiliva mwami wakaivuzya mu-Jerusalemu mbuli mabwe, ayalo misamu yakedari wakaivuzya mbubonya mbuli mikuyu iili mutulundulundu.
Amabbiza aa-Solomoni akazwa ku-Egepita aku-Kuwe. Basambazi bamwami bakaaula ku-Kuwe.

Inkalaki yakaulwa ku-Egepita mali aansiliva aali myanda iili musanu aumwi, abbiza lyakaulwa mali aali mwanda amakumi osanwe. Aboobo zyakatolwa kumaanza aabasambazi bamwami kubami boonse baba-Hiti ababa-Aramu.

bamisyobo eyo Jehova njaakalailila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Tamweelede kukwatana abo, abalo tabeelede kukwatana anywebo, nkaambo ncobeni balapambula myoyo yanu kumizimu yabo, Aba banakazi Solomoni wakali kukakatila kulimbabo mukuyandana.
Nkabela kakwete banakazi, bana babami, bali myanda iili musanu aibili, abasimamambe bali myanda yotatwe. Elyo banakazi bakwe bakapambula moyo wakwe.
Nkaambo Solomoni naakacembaala, banakazi bakwe bakapambula moyo wakwe kumizimu myeenzu, aboobo moyo wakwe teewakalulama kumeso aa-Jehova Leza wakwe mbuli moyo wa-Davida wisi.
Nkaambo Solomoni wakatobela Asitaroti Leza waba-Sidoni a-Milikomu cisesemyo caba-Amoni.
Aboobo Solomoni wakacita cibi mumeso aa-Jehova, Takwakatobela Jehova camoyo woonse mbwaakacita Davida wisi pe.
Elyo Solomoni wakayaka cipaililo kuti cibe ca-Kemosi cisesemyo ca-Moabu mucilundu cilangene a-Jerusalemu, acimwi ca-Moleki cisesemyo cabana ba-Amoni:
Alimwi mbubonya obo mbwaakacitila banakazi bakwe beenzu boonse. Wakali kutenta tununkilizyo akutuula zipaizyo kumizimu yabo.
iwakamulailila aamakani aya ngaonya, kuti teelede kutobela mizimu myeenzu, nekubaboobo takatobede majwi ngaakamucenjezya Jehova.
Nkabela Jehova wakaambila Solomoni kuti, Mbuli mbocitide obo akutabamba cizuminano cangu ambeta zyangu nzindakakulailila, lino ncobeni njjookunyanzya bwami akubwaaba mumaanza aabalanda bako.
Nekubaboobo nsikooyoocita obo nocili muumi pe, nkaambo ka-Davida uso, pele njoonyanzya kumaanza aamwanaako.
Alimwi nsikooyoomunyanzya bwami boonse pe. Njoopa mwanaako musyobo omwe nkaambo ka-Davida mulanda wangu akaambo ka-Jerusalemu ngonsalide.
Nkaambo Davida naakali ku-Edomu, Joabu silutwe wampi naakainka kuyoozika bajayidwe, wakajaya baalumi boonse ku-Edomu,
(nkaambo Joabu aba-Israyeli boonse bakalikede ku-Edomu myezi iili musanu aumwi, mane bakamana kunyonyoona baalumi boonse baku-Edomu),
pele Hadada wakaloboka, walo abamwi ba-Edomu balanda bawisi, akuya ku-Egepita. Kuciindi eco Hadada wakacili mwana muniini.

Bakanyamuka kuzwa ku-Midyani, bakasika ku-Parana, elyo kuzwa oko ku-Parana bakatolelela bantu, bakasika ku-Egepita kuli-Farao mwami wa-Egepita, nkabela Farao wakamupa iŋanda azilyo, alimwi wakamwaabila nyika.
Nkabela Hadada wakabota loko mumeso aa-Farao, aboobo wakamupa mwanakazi, mwanike wamukaakwe mwini, mwanike wa-Takipenesi muka-mwami, kuti akwate.

Elyo oyo mwanike wa-Takipenesi wakamuzyalila mwana iwakategwa Genubati. Nkabela Takipenesi wakamulesya kunyonka nebakali muŋanda ya-Farao, nkabela Genubati kakede muŋanda ya-Farao akati kabana ba-Farao mwini.
Lino Hadada naakamvwa, oko ku-Egepita nkwaakabede, kuti Davida uloona abamawisi, alimwi Joabu silutwe wampi ulifwide, Hadada wakaambila Farao kuti, Kondileka kuti njiinke kucisi cangu.
Pele Farao wakamwaambila kuti, Ncinzi ncobulide okuno kulindime? Nkaambonzi noyanda kwiinka kucisi cako? Wakati, Pe, nekubaboobo kondileka kuti njiinke.
Oyu wakaliyobolweda bantu, wakaba musolozi wankamu yabasikusaala, musule lyakujaya kwa-Davida, Elyo bakaya ku-Damasko akukala nkuko, nkabela bakamupa bwami nkukonya oko ku-Damasko.
Lino wakaba sinkondonyina waba-Israyeli mazuba oonse ngaakapona Solomoni, wakacita bubi mbubonya mbwaakacita Hadada. Wakasampaula ba-Israyeli akweendelezya ba-Aramu.
Makani ngaakalwanya mwami Solomoni ngaaya, Solomoni wakayaka Milo akuyakulula bulambo bwamunzi wa-Davida wisi nkubwakamwaikide.
Nkabela oyu muntu Jeroboamu kali muntu uucenjede loko, elyo Solomoni naakabona kuti mulombe ulabeleka milimo mibotu, wakamwaambila kuti abe mulangi wazibalo zyoonse zyamukowa wa-Josefa.
Lino kuciindi eco, Jeroboamu naakazwa mu-Jerusalemu, Ahija musinsimi waku-Silo wakamujana munzila, Ahija kasamide cikobela cipya, alimwi bakali bobile abalike omo musokwe.
Mpawo Ahija wakajata cikobela eco cipya ncaakasamide, wakacizapaula tupanzi tuli ikumi atubili.
Elyo wakaambila Jeroboamu kuti, Bweza tupanzi tuli ikumi, nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza waIsrayeli. Njoonyanzya bwami mumaanza aa-Solomoni, lino njookupa misyobo iili ikumi.
Pele ulasyaalilwa musyobo omwe nkaambo ka-Davida mulanda wangu, akaambo ka-Jerusalemu munzi ngonsalide akati kamisyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli.

Nkaambo bandileka, balakomba Asitoreti muzimu waba-Sidoni, a-Kemosi muzimu waba-Moabu, a-Milikomu muzimu wabaAmoni. Tabeendi munzila zyangu cakucita bululami mumeso aangu akubamba imbeta zyangu amilazyo yangu mbwaakacita Davida wisi.
Nekubaboobo nsikooyoomunyanzya bwami boonse pe, Uyooba mweendelezi mazuba oonse ngaacipona, nkaambo ka-Davida mulanda wangu ngundakasala, iwakabamba imbeta zyangu amilao yangu.
Pele njoonyanzya bwami mumaanza aamwanaakwe, elyo misyobo iili ikumi njooipa mumaanza aako.
Mwanaakwe njoomupa musyobo omwe, kuti Davida mulanda wangu abe amumuni kubusyu bwangu mazuba oonse mu-Jerusalemu munzi ngonsalide kuti mbike izina lyangu mumonya mulinguwo.
Lino uwe, njookubweza, kuti uendelezye mbubonya mbuli moyo wako mbuuyandisya. Uyooba mwami waba-Israyeli.

Nkabela na wabika moyo wako kuzintu zyoonse nzindakulailila, akweenda munzila zyangu akucita ciluleme mumeso aangu akubamba imbeta zyangu amilazyo yangu mbwaakacita Davida mulanda wangu, elyo njooba ayebo, njookuyakila iŋanda injumu mbubonya mbundakayakila Davida, nkabela njookupa cisi ca-Israyeli.
Ndaamba kupenzya inyungu zya-Davida nkaambo kamakani aya, nekubaboobo nsikooyoobapenzya lyoonse pe,
Lino Solomoni wakali kuyanda kujaya Jeroboamu, pele Jeroboamu wakanyamuka akucija ku-Egepita kuli-Sisaki mwami wa-Egepita, nkabela wakakala nkukonya ku-Egepita mane kusikila kulufu lwa-Solomoni.
Nkabela ciindi Solomoni ncakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu kuba-Israyeli boonse cakaba myaka iili makumi one.
Elyo Solomoni naakalede mukabanda abamawisi mumunzi wa-Davida wisi, Roboamu mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Mpawo Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati naakamvwa, oko ku-Egepita nkwaakacibede, nkwaakacijide kuzwa kumwami Solomoni, Jeroboamu wakapiluka kuzwa ku-Egepita.
Nkabela bakatuma kuyoomwiita, elyo Jeroboamu ambungano yoonse yabaIsrayeli bakeza kuzooambila Roboamu, bakati,
Uso wakatulemezya mukuli, Lino webo, kotuubulwida cibbalo ciyumu causo amukuli wakwe mulemu ngwaakatulemezya, elyo tuyookubelekela milimo.
Mpawo wakabaambila kuti, Amwaanzane mazuba otatwe, mukaboole alimwi. Lino bantu bakaanzana.
Bakavuwa kuti, Na ulazumina kuba muzike wabantu aba, akubamanina milimo, akubaambila majwi mabotu, elyo bayooba bazike bako mazuba oonse.
Nekubaboobo wakakaka lulayo lwabapati ndubakamulaya, wakabuzyanya abamuselanyina mbaakakula abo, ibakaimvwi kubusyu bwakwe.
Wakababuzya kuti, Anywebo mulalaya buti? Tuvwiile buti bantu aba ibandikumbila kuti, Ubya ijoko uso ndyakatulemezya.

Mpawo bamuselanyina mbaakakula abo bakamwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mboelede kwaambila bantu aba ibaamba kuti, Uso watulemezya ijoko, lino uwe ubulula ijoko lyesu, Kobaambila kuti, Kantengeza kangu kalakomena kwiinda cikungu cataata.
Taata wakamulemezya ijoko idemu, lino mebo njoobika bulemu abumwi kujoko, Taata wakamuumya mitatula, pele mebo njoomuumya tubanze.
Lino Jeroboamu abantu boonse bakaboola kuli-Roboamu mubuzuba bwatatu, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lyamwami lyakuti, Amuboole kulindime mubuzuba bwatatu.
Nkabela mwami wakaambila bantu cabukali, Wakaleka lulayo lwabapati ndubakamulayide,
akubaambila mbubonya mbubakamulaya bamuselanyina. Wakati, Taata wakamulemezya ijoko, lino mebo njooyungizizya ijoko lyanu bulemu, Taata wakamuumya mitatula, mebo njoomuumya tubanze.
Mwami wakakaka kuswiilila bantu, nkaambo makani akazwa kuli-Jehova, kuti azuzikizye majwi aakwe Jehova ngaakaamba kumulomo wa-Ahija waku-Silo, ngaakaambila Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati,
Elyo mwami Roboamu wakatuma Adoramu mupati wacibbalo, nkabela ba-Israyeli boonse bakamutulaula mabwe mane wafwa, Mpawo mwami Roboamu wakafwambaana kutanta munkalaki yakwe akucijila ku-Jerusalemu.
Mbuboobo ba-Israyeli mbubakabisizya luzubo lwa-Davida akusikila sunu.

Nkabela ba-Israyeli boonse nibakamvwa kuti Jeroboamu waboola, bakatuma kuti aboole kumbungano, elyo bakamubika kuti abe mwami wacisi coonse ca-Israyeli, Katacikwe ibakatobela luzubo lwa-Davida pele mukowa wa-Juda luzutu.
Pele ijwi lya-Leza lyakasika kuli-Semaya muntu wa-Leza, lyakuti,
Ambila Roboamu mwana wa-Solomoni mwami wa-Juda amisyobo yoonse ya-Juda a-Benjamini abantu bamwi kuti,

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mutanoolwisya banabakwanu ba-Israyeli pe. Amuboole umwi aumwi kuŋanda yakwe, nkaambo aya makani akazwa kulindime. Mpawo bakaswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova akupiluka mbubonya Jehova mbwaakabaambila,
Nkabela Jeroboamu wakaamba mumoyo wakwe kuti, Ambweni bwami buyoopiluka kuluzubo lwa-Davida.

Na bantu aba baya kukutuula zipaizyo muŋanda ya-Jehova yamu-Jerusalemu, myoyo yabantu iyoosandulukila kumwami wabo, kuli-Roboamu mwami wa-Juda, aboobo bayoondijaya akupiluka kuli-Roboamu mwami wa-Juda.

Lino mwami naakamana kubuzyanya makani, wakapanga boombe bobile bangolida, wakaambila bantu kuti, Camukataazya kuya ku-Jerusalemu. Amubone, noba-Israyeli, Mbaaba ba-Leza banu ibakamugwisya munyika ya-Egepita.
Mpawo wakabika umwi ku-Beteli, aumwi wakamubika ku-Dani.
Nkabela aya makani akaba zibi, nkaambo bantu bakali kuya kuliyooyo waku-Beteli, akusikila kuluumwi waku-Dani.
Alimwi wakayaka maanda atala azilundu, akubika bapaizi basalidwe akati kabantu boonse buyo ibatakali ba-Levi.

Nkabela Jeroboamu wakasala buzuba bwekumi amusanu bwamumwezi wamusanu aitatu kuti bube buzuba bwapobwe, mbubonya mbuli ipobwe liligwa mucisi ca-Juda, elyo wakatuula zituuzyo acipaililo. Wakacita obo ku-Beteli, akupailila boombe mbaakacitide. Amoomo mumonya mu-Beteli mwaakabika bapaizi bazilundu mbaakabikide.

Elyo wakainka kuya kucipaililo ncaakacita ku-Beteli mubuzuba bwakumi amusanu bwamumwezi wamusanu aitatu, mwezi moyo wakwe mwini nguwakayeeya-yeeya. Wakacitila bana baIsrayeli ipobwe, alimwi wakainka kucipaililo kuyootenta tununkilizyo.

Oyu muntu wakoompolola kucipaililo amajwi aa-Jehova, Wakati, Cipaililo! Cipaililo! Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, Kuyoozyalwa mwana muluzubo lwa-Davida uuyootegwa Josiya. Uyootuula alinduwe bapaizi bazilundu batenta tununkilizyo, azifuwa zyabantu ziyootentwa alinduwe.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo mbubonya wakabapa citondezyo. Wakati, Nceeci citondezyo Jehova ncaamba. Amubone! Cipaililo ciyooanduka, atwe lili mpawo liyootika.
Lino cipaililo cakaanduka, alyalo itwe ilyakali acipaililo lyakatika, mbubonya mbuli citondezyo muntu wa-Leza ncaakaamba mujwi lya-Jehova.

Mpoonya awo mwami wakavwiila muntu wa-Leza kuti, Kotontozya bukali bwa-Jehova Leza wako. Kondikombela, kuti nkaboozezegwe ijanza lyangu. Elyo muntu wa-Leza wakatontozya bukali bwa-Jehova, nkabela ijanza lyamwami lyakaponesegwa, akuba mbubonya mbulyakabede kukutaanguna.
Lino mwami wakaambila muntu wa-Leza kuti, Boola kulindime, ukalye, ujane inguzu, alimwi njookupa bulumbu.
Pele muntu wa-Leza wakaambila mwami kuti, Nekuba kuti wandipa cisela cambono zyamuŋanda yako, nsikooinka ayebo pe. Nsikoolya insima nikuba kunywa maanzi okuno pe.
Nkaambo mbuboobo mbundakalaililwa mujwi lya-Jehova. Ndakaambilwa kuti, Utalyi insima nikuba kunywa maanzi, nikuba kuboola munzila eyo njiyonya njowakatola.
Aboobo wakatola inzila imbi. Takwakapiluka munzila eyo njiyonya njaakaletede naakeza ku-Beteli.

Lino kakuli umwi musinsimi mucembele iwakakede ku-Beteli, nkabela bana bakwe bakeza kulinguwe akumulwiida incito zyoonse zyamuntu waLeza nzyaakacitide buzuba obo mu-Beteli, amajwi ngaakaambila mwami oonse bakaambila wisaabo.
Mpawo wisaabo wakababuzya kuti, Njili inzila njatola? Nkabela bana bakwe bakalibwene inzila njaakatola oyo muntu wa-Leza iwakazwa kucisi ca-Juda.
Elyo wakaambila bana bakwe kuti, Amundibopele imbongolo, Lino bakamubopela imbongolo, nkabela wakatanta alinjiyo,
akuya butobela muntu wa-Leza, lumwi wakamujana ulikede munsi lyamubanga, Wakamubuzya kuti, Sa nduwe muntu waLeza iwakazwa mucisi ca-Juda? Wakati, Ndime.
Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Atwiinke ayebo kuŋanda yangu, ukalye insima.
Wakavuwa kuti, Nsikonzyi kwiinka ayebo pe, nsikonzyi kunjila muŋanda, alimwi nsikoolya insima nikuba kunywa maanzi okuno.
Nkaambo mumajwi aa-Jehova ndakaambilwa ijwi lyakuti, Utalyi insima nikuba kunywa maanzi nkuko, alimwi utaleti inzila eyo njiyonya njowakatola.

Pele wakamwaambila kuti, Ambebo ndi musinsimi mbubonya mbuli uwe. Lino angelo wakandaambila majwi aa-Jehova, wakati, Koya ukamuboozye kuŋanda yako, kuti azoolye insima akunywa maanzi. Anukuti wakabeia.
Mpawo wakapiluka awe kuyoolya insima akunywa maanzi muŋanda yakwe.
Nkabela wakakwiilila muntu wa-Leza iwakazwa mucisi ca-Juda kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mbuli mbuwasotoka ncowakalaililwa kwa-Jehova, akutabamba mulazyo wakwe Jehova Leza wako ngwakakulailila,
ncobeni mbuli mbuwaboola kuzoolya insima akunywa maanzi nkukonya oko nkuwakaambilwa kuti cilatondwa kulya insima akunywa maanzi, lino mutunta wako tuukooyoozikwa mukabanda kabamauso,
Lino naakamana kulya insima akunywa wamubopela imbongolo musinsimi oyo iwakamuboozya.
Nkabela naakanyamuka, mulavu wakamujana munzila, wamuluma, aboobo mutunta wakwe wakasyaala munzila, ambongolo yakaimvwi kulubbazu, alakwe mulavu wakaliimvwi kulubbazu lumwi lwamu-tunta.
Lino bantu nibakainda bakabona mutunta uulede munzila amulavu uuimvwi kumbali lyamutunta, elyo bakaakulwiida bantu makani mumunzi oyo musinsimi mucembele mwakabede.

Nkabela musinsimi iwakamupilula kuzwa munzila yakwe, naakamvwa makani, wakati, Ngonguwe muntu wa-Leza iwakasotoka mulazyo waJehova. Lino Jehova wamwaaba mumeno aamulavu, kuti amukwamaune akumujaya, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakamwaambila.
Mpawo wakaambila bana bakwe kuti, Amundibopele imbongolo. Nkabela bakamubopela.
Lino wakanyamuka, wakaakujana mutunta wakwe ulilede munzila, ambongolo amulavu zyoonse ziliimvwi kumbali lyamutunta. Mulavu taakwe naakaulya mutunta nikuba kukwamauna imbongolo.
Elyo musinsimi wakabweza mutunta wamuntu wa-Leza, waulalika ambongolo, wauboozya kumunzi, walila akumuzika.
Wakazika mutunta mukabanda kakwe mwini, nkabela bakamulila cakuti, Maawe mukwesu!
Lino naakamana kumuzika, wakaambila bana bakwe kuti, Ndazoofwa, amundizike mumonya mukabanda muntu wa-Leza mwaazikidwe. Amulazike zifuwa zyangu kubbazu lyazifuwa zyakwe.
Nkaambo makani ngaakaamba mujwi lya-Jehova, aacipaililo caku-Beteli amaanda aazituuzyo zyamuminzi ya-Samariya, oonse ayooba ncobeni.
Aya makani akaletela luzubo lwa-Jeroboamu mulandu, kuti lunyonyooke akugwisigwa munyika.
Kuciindi eco Abija mwana wa-Jeroboamu wakaciswa.

Elyo ­Jeroboamu wakaambila mukaakwe kuti, Buka, ukalyeenyeenye, kuti bantu batazibi kuti nduwe muka-Jeroboamu. Lino koya ku-Sile, nkwabede Ahija musinsimi, ngonguwe iwakandaambila kuti mbe mwami wabantu aba.
Uleelede kutolelela zinkwa zili ikumi, azibunge, acinkuli cabuci, ukasike nkwabede, nkaambo walo uyookulwiida na mwana ulaba buti.
Pele Jehova kaambilide Ahija kuti, Bona! Ngooyu muka-Jeroboamu, uleza kuzookubuzya makani aamwanaakwe, nkaambo waciswa. Mbuboobu mboelede kumwaambila.
Elyo naakasika, wakalicita bweenzeenzu.
Pele Ahija amvwe buyo mizyozyooko yamaulu aakwe, naakanjila mumulyango, wakati, Njila, mukaJeroboamu. Nkaambonzi nolyeenyeenya? Makani ngundalaililwa kukuletela alayoosya.
Koya ukalwiide Jeroboamu kuti, Mbuboobo mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Ndakakusumpula akati kabantu kuti ukabe mweendelezi wabantu bangu ba-Israyeli.

Ndakanyanga bwami mumaanza aaluzubo lwa-Davida, akubwaaba mumaanza aako. Nekubaboobo tona kuba mbuli mulanda wangu Davida, iwakabamba imbeta zyangu akunditobela camoyo woonse aku cita ziluleme luzutu mumeso aangu.
Webo wacita bubi kwiinda boonse ibakakutaangunina, Walicitila mizimu myeenzu azikozyano zibezedwe zyakundikalazya, nkabela mebo wandisowela kusule lyako.

Nkaambo kako njooletela luzubo lwa-Jeroboamu bubi, akunyonyweda Jeroboamu bana boonse basankwa, nibaba bazike nibaba balubusi bamu-Israyeli. Njooumpa luzubo lwa-Jeroboamu mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwaumpa bufumba lumwi bwalota.
Kufumbwa mwana wa-Jeroboamu uufwa mumunzi, babwa balamulya, ayooyo uufwa musokwe, bayuni bakujulu balamulya. Nkaambo mbuboobo mbwaamba Jehova.
Lino buka, ukapiluke kuŋanda yako, Maulu aako anjila buyo mumunzi, mpoonya mwana ulafwa.

Nkabela ba-Israyeli boonse bayoomulila akumuzika, nkaambo ngonguwe alike akati kabasimukowa ba-Jeroboamu uuti zikwe mucuumbwe, nkaambo kakuti mulinguwe muluzubo lwa-Jeroboamu mwajanwa cakubotezya Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Nkabela Jehova uyoolibusizya mwami wa-Israyeli uuti nyonyoone luzubo loonse lwa-Jeroboamu mubuzuba bomwe. Pele lino nkutyeni?

Jehova uyoouma ba-Israyeli mbubonya mbuli itete mbulipekema akati kamaanzi, nkabela uyoononkola ba-Israyeli kuzwa munyika eyi imbotu njaakapa bamawisi, akubamwaisya mutala lyamulonga wa-Firate, nkaambo kakuti bali citila zifwanikisyo zyamituni zyakukalazya Jehova.
Uyooaba ba-Israyeli mubuzike nkaambo kazibi zya-Jeroboamu nzyaakabisya anzyaakabisizya ba-Israyeli.
Nkabela ba-Israyeli boonse bakamuzika akumulila, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaamba kumulomo wamulanda wakwe Ahija musinsimi.
Myaka ya-Jeroboamu njaakeendelezya yakali makumi obile aibili, Elyo naakalede mukabanda abamawisi, Nadabu mwana wakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe,
Nkabela ba-Juda bakabisya mumeso aa-Jehova. Muzibi zyabo nzibakabisya bakamukalazya kwiinda incito zyoonse bamawisi nzibakacita.
Nkaambo abalo bakaliyakila zipaililo zilamfu amasamu aamizimu azifwanikisyo zyamituni atala azilundu zilamfu zyoonse aansi lyamisamu yoonse mitete.
Alimwi kakuli baalumi basibwaamu mucisi, ibakali kucita malweza mbubonya mbuli zisesemyo zyamisyobo Jehova njaakatandide kubusyu bwaba-Israyeli,
nkabela wakatola zintu ziyandisi zyamuŋanda ya-Jehova, azyamuŋanda yamwami zyoonse wakazitola. Azyalo intobo zyangolida Solomoni nzyaakacitide, wakazitola.
Lino mwami Roboamu wakacita intobo zyamukuba mucibaka cazyo, akuzyaaba mumaanza aabasilutwe ibakali amilimo yakumulyango waŋanda yamwami.
Kufumbwa ciindi mwami naakaya kuŋanda ya-Jehova, basilutwe bakainka azyo, elyo kusule basilutwe bakaziboozya kuŋanda yabalindizi.
Lino makani amwi aa-Roboamu ancito zyakwe zyoonse, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda
Nkabela kakuli inkondo akati ka-Roboamu a-Jeroboamu mazuba oonse.
Lino Roboamu naaka-fwa, wakazikwa abamawisi mumunzi wa-Davida. Izina lyabanyina kali Naama mu-Amoni. Elyo Abija mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Mumwaka wakumi amusanu aitatu wabwami bwa-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati, Abija wakaba mwami wacisi ca-Juda.
Wakeendelezya myaka yotatwe mu-Jerusalemu. Izina lyabanyina kali Maaka mwana waAbisalomu.
Nkabela wakeenda muzibi zyoonse zyawisi iwakamutaangunina. Moyo wakwe teewakalulama kumeso aa-Jehova Leza wakwe mbuli moyo wa-Davida wisi.
Nekubaboobo, nkaambo ka-Davida, Jehova Leza wakwe taakwe naakazimya mumuni wakwe mu-Jerusalemu, Wakaimika mwana wakwe mucibaka cakwe akubusya Jerusalemu,
nkaambo Davida wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova; taakwe naakaleya mucintu niciba comwe ncaakamulailila mazuba oonse ngaakapona, cita mumakani aa-Uriya mu-Hiti luzutu.
Nkabela kakuli inkondo akati ka-Roboamu a-Jeroboamu mazuba oonse ngaakapona.
Lino makani amwi aa-Abija, ancito zyakwe zyoonse, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda na? Kakuli inkondo akati ka-Abija a-Jeroboamu.
Lino Abija naakafwa, wakazikwa abamawisi mumunzi wa-Davida, elyo Asa mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Mumwaka wamakumi obile wabwami bwa-Jeroboamu mwami waIsrayeli, Asa wakaba mwami wacisi ca-Juda
Nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili makumi one aumwi. Izina lyabanyina kali Maaka mwana wa-Abisalomu.
Nkabela Asa wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbuli Davida wisi.
Wakagwisya baalumi basibwaamu munyika, akujaya zikozyano zyamituni zyoonse bamawisi nzibakacitide.
Abalo banyina Maaka wakabanyanzya bulemu bweelede banyina mwami nkaambo kakuti kacitide cikozyano cisesemya acifwanikisyo cakupaila, Asa wakajaya cikozyano cakwe akucitenta kukalonga ka-Kedroni.
Pele zipaililo zyakuzilundu teezyakamwayigwa pe. Nekubaboobo moyo wa-Asa kuululeme kumeso aa-Jehova mazuba oonse.
Nkabela wakaleta kuŋanda ya-Jehova zipo nzyaakasalazya wisi azintu nzyaakasalazya mwini, insiliva angolida azibelesyo.
Lino kakuli inkondo akati ka-Asa a-Basa mwami wa-Israyeli mazuba aabo oonse.
Nkabela Basa mwami wa-Israyeli naakaya kuyoolwisya cisi ca-Juda, wakayaka Rama, kuti atazumizyi muntu naba omwe kuzwa nikuba kunjila mubwami bwa-Asa mwami wa-Juda.

Elyo Asa wakabweza insiliva angolida zyoonse izyakasyeede muzilondwedo zyaŋanda ya-Jehova amuzilondwedo zyaŋanda yamwami, wazyaaba mumaanza aabalanda bakwe, nkabela Asa wakazituma kuli-Benihadadi mwana wa-Tabrimoni mwana wa-Hezioni mwami wa-Aramu iwakakede mu-Damasko. Wakati,
Tulitangene bulongo, mebo ayebo, taata auso. Bona! Ndakutumina cipo cansiliva acangolida. Koya, ukajaye cizuminano cako ncotangene a-Basa mwami wa-Israyeli, kuti andileke.

Mpawo Benihadadi wakaswiilila majwi aamwami Asa, watuma basilutwe bampi zyakwe kuyoolwisya minzi ya-Israyeli, akusaala Iyoni, a-Dani, a-Abeli-Beti-Maaka, acisi coonse caKineroti mane kusikila kunyika yoonse ya-Nafitali.
Mpawo Basa naakamvwa, wakaleka kuyaka Rama, wakaakukala ku-Tiriza.

Elyo mwami Asa wakatumina ba-Israyeli boonse mulazyo. Katakwe naba omwe iwakalekelelwa. Nkabela bakagwisya mabwe aa-Rama, aziyako zyoonse Basa nzyaakali kuyasya, nkabela mwami Asa wakaziyasya Geba mucisi caBenjamini a-Mizipa.
Elyo Asa wakalala mukabanda abamawisi, Wakazikwa antoomwe abamawisi mumunzi wa-Davida wisi, nkabela mwanaakwe Josafati nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Lino Nadabu mwana wa-Jeroboamu wakaba mwami wa-Israyeli mumwaka wabili wabwami bwa-Asa mwami wa-Juda, nkabela wakeendelezya ba-Israyeli myaka yobile.
Pele wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, akweenda munzi la yawisi amuzibi zyakwe nzyaakabisya ba-Israyeli.
Basa wakamujaya mumwaka watatu wabwami bwa-Asa mwami wa-Juda, aboobo wakalya bwami bwakwe.

Elyo abe mwami buyo, wakajaya luzubo loonse lwa-Jeroboamu. Taakwe naakasiila Jeroboamu muntu naba omwe uuciyooya, lumwi wakabanyonyoona boonse, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaamba kumulomo wamulanda wakwe Ahija waku-Sile.
Aya akaba nkaambo kazibi zya-Jeroboamu nzyaakacita anzyaakacitya ba-Israyeli, akaambo kabukali mbwaakakalazya Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Lino makani amwi aa-Nadabu, ancito zyakwe zyoonse isa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli?
Lino-kakuli inkondo akati ka-Asa a-Basa mwami wa-Israyeli mazuba aabo oonse.
Mumwaka watatu wabwami-bwa-Asa mwami wa-Juda, Basa mwana wa-Ahija wakaba mwami wacisi coonse ca-Israyeli mu-Tiriza. Nkabela wakeendelezya myaka iili makumi obile aine.
Pele wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, akweenda munzila ya-Jeroboamu amuzibi zyakwe nzyaakabisya ba-Israeli.
Mbuli mbundakakusumpula kuzwa kumatombe aku­ kubika kuti ube musolozi wabantu bangu ba-Israyeli, nekubaboobo weenda munzila ya-Jeroboamu akubisya bantu bangu ba-Israyeli cakundikalazya kuzibi zyabo,
nkaambo kako njoolobya Basa aluzubo lwakwe, akucita luzubo lwako kuti lube mbubonya mbuli luzubo lwa-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati,
Kufumbwa mwana wa-Basa uufwa mumunzi, babwa balamulya, ayooyo uufwa musokwe, bayuni bakujulu balamulya.
Lino Basa naakafwa akulala mukabanda abamawisi, wakazikwa mu-Tiriza, elyo Ela mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.

Ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kumulomo wa-Jehu mwana wa-Hanani, lyaamba aa-Basa aluzubo lwakwe, nkaambo kabubi mbwaakacita mumeso aa-Jehova cakumukalazya kumilimo yamaanza aakwe, nkaambo kakuti kali mbubonya mbuli luzubo lwa-Jeroboamu, alimwi ngonguwe wakalunyonyoona.
Mumwaka wamakumi obile amusanu aumwi wabwami bwa-Asa mwami wa-Juda, Ela mwana wa-Basa wakaba mwami wa-Israyeli mu-Tiriza, nkabela wakeendelezya myaka yobile.
Lino mulanda wakwe Zimri, silutwe wacisela cankalaki zyakwe, wakamuvwiya. Wakali kunywa cakukolwa muTiriza, muŋanda ya-Ariza mupati waŋanda yabwami yaku-Tiriza,
elyo Zimri wakeza, wamuuma, wamujaya, mumwaka wamakumi obile amusanu aibili wabwami bwa-Asa mwami wa-Juda, aboobo wakalya bwami bwakwe.
Zimri wakalobya luzubo loonse lwa-Basa, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaambide aa-Basa kumulomo wa-Jehu musinsimi.
Eci cakaba nkaambo kazibi zya-Basa azibi zya-Ela mwanaakwe, nzibakacita anzibakacitya ba-Israyeli, cakukalazya Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli kuzintu zyabo zyabuyo.
Lino makani amwi aa-Ela ancito zyakwe zyoonse, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli?
Lino basilumamba nibakamvwa kuti Zimri wakavwiya, wajaya mwami, ciyo ba-Israyeli boonse bakasala Omri silutwe wampi akumupa bwami bwa-Israyeli buzuba obo mbubonya kuzilao nkubakabede.
Mpawo Omri wakainka aba-Israyeli boonse kuzwa ku-Gibetoni kuyoosinkinizya Tiriza.
Nkabela Zimri abone buyo kuti munzi watolwa, wakanjila muŋanda yamukati yabwami, watenta iŋanda yabwami alakwe kali mukati, wafwa.
Aya akaba nkaambo kazibi nzyaakacita, nkaambo wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mukweenda munzila ya-Jeroboamu amuzibi ezyo nzizyonya nzyaakacita anzyaakacitya baIsrayeli.
Lino makani amwi aa-Zimri, abuvwiyi bwakwe mbwaakavwiya, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli?
Pele bantu ibakali kutobela Omri bakazunda bantu ibakatobela Tibini mwana wa-Ginati, aboobo Tibini wakafwa, Omri nguwakaba mwami.

Mumwaka wamakumi otatwe aumwi wabwami bwa-Asa mwami wa-Juda Omri wakatalika kweendelezya cisi ca-Israyeli, nkabela wakeendelezya myaka iili ikumi aibili, Myaka iili musanu aumwi wakeendelezya muTiriza,

elyo wakaula cilundu ca-Samariya, Wakacuula kuli-Semeri amatalenta obile aansiliva, nkabela wakayaka nkukonya kucilundu, amunzi nguwakayaka wakauulika izina lya-Samariya, mbubonya mbuli izina lya-Semeri mwini-cilundu.
Wakeenda munzila zyoonse zya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati amuzibi ezyo nzizyonya nzyaakacitya ba-Israyeli, cakukalazya Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli kuzintu zyabo zyabuyo.
Lino makani amwi aa-Omri, ancito zyakwe, anguzu sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli?
Elyo Omri naakalede mukabanda abamawisi, wakazikwa mu-Samariya, nkabela Ahabu mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.

Ahabu mwana wa-Omri wakataanguna kulya bwami bwa-Israyeli mumwaka wamakumi otatwe amusanu aitatu wabwami bwa-Asa mwami wa-Juda, nkabela oyo Ahabu mwana wa-Omri wakeendelezya ba-Israyeli mu-Samariya myaka iili makumi obile aibili.
Lino Ahabu mwana waOmri wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova kwiinda boonse ibakamutaangunina,
nkaambo takwakeenda muzibi zya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati luzutu, pele atala lyayaaya wakakwata Jezebeli mwana wa-Etibaala mwami wabaSidoni, aboobo wakaakumanina Baala milimo akumukomba.
Nkabela wakayakila Baala cipaililo muŋanda ya-Baala njaakayaka mu-Samariya.
Alimwi Ahabu wakacita cifwanikisyo camuzimu, nkabela Ahabu wakacita ncito zyakukalazya Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli kwiinda bami boonse baIsrayeli ibakamutaangunina.
Elyo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakamwaambila kuti,
Uzwe okuno, utozye kujwe, ukayube kukalonga ka-Keriti kali kujwe lya-Jordano.
Lino uyoonywa maanzi mukalonga, alimwi ndalailila bacikwangala kuti bakusanine.
Elyo wakainka, wacita mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova, waakukala kukalonga ka-Keriti kali kujwe lya-Jordano.
Nkabela bacikwangala mbobakali kumuletela insima anyama cifumo, alimwi insima anyama mangolezya, akunywa wakali kunywa maanzi mukalonga.
Pele nicakaba ciindi, kalonga kakayuminina, nkaambo nyika yoonse teeyakawidwa imvula.
Elyo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakamusikila lyakuti,
Buka, uinke ku-Zarefati mucisi ca-Sidoni, ukakale nkuko, Bona! Ndalailila umwi mukamufu wakooko kuti akulele.
Mpawo wakanyamuka, waya ku-Zarefati, nkabela naakasika kumulyango wamunzi, wakajana mukamufu mpawo, uli mukutebba inkuni. Lino wakamwiita, wati, Kondiletela tumaanzi mukanywido, nywe.
Elyo naakali kuya kukuleta, wakoompolola kuti, Ulete amunsuma wansima mujanza lyako.

Wakavuwa kuti, Ma! Jehova Leza wako mbali muumi, nsijisi zyakujika cita inkankamaanza yomwe buyo yabusu iili mucinkuli, atumafuta tuniini munsazi. Lino ndili mukutebba tukuni tobile twakujisya, kuti tulye, mebo amwanaangu, elyo tulafwa.
Pele Eliya wakamwaambila kuti, Utayoowi, Koya ukajike mbubonya mboamba. Pele taanguna kundijikila mebo kasima kasyoonto, ukandiletele okuno, Lino kusule uyoolijikila, webo amwanaako.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Cinkuli cabusu tacikooyoomana, ayalo insazi yamafuta taikooyooyuminina, mane kusikila kubuzuba obo Jehova mbwati wisye imvula anyika.
Mpawo wakaakucita mbubonya mbuli Eliya mbwaakalailila, nkabela bakaiya boonse, Eliya amwanakazi amwanaakwe musankwa, mazuba manji.
Cinkuli cabusu tacikwe nicakamana, ayalo insazi yamafuta tiikwe niyakayuminina, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaamba kumulomo wa-Eliya.
Lino musule lyamakani aya, mwana wayooyo mwanakazi mwiniŋanda wakaciswa, nkabela bulwazi bwakwe bwakakataazya loko, lumwi taakwe naakacili kuyooya abuniini.
Elyo wakaambila Eliya kuti, Ndijisi makaninzi ayebo, O muntu wa-Leza? Sa kwiibalusya zibi zyangu cakujaya mwanaangu ncowakazida kulindime?
Eliya wakamwaambila kuti, Undipe mwanaako. Lino wakamugwisya mumaanza aakwe, wamutola kuŋanda yakujulu nkwaakakede, wamulazika abulo bwakwe.
Nkabela wakakwiilila Jehova, wati, Akaka Jehova Leza wangu! Sa wabisizya oyu mukamufu ngundikede awe kukujaya mwana wakwe?
Lino wakalyeeleka amutunta wamulombe ziindi zyotatwe, wakwiilila Jehova kuti, O Jehova Leza wangu, muuya wamwana oyu uboole mumubili wakwe.
Nkabela Jehova wakaswiilila ijwi lya-Eliya, aboobo muuya wamwana wakaboola mumubili wakwe, wapona.
Mpawo Eliya wakabweza mwana, wamuselusya muŋanda yakujulu, wamunjizya muŋanda, wamupa mumaanza aabanyina, wati, Bona! Mwanaako wapona!
Elyo mwanakazi wakaambila Eliya kuti, Lino eci candizibya loko kuti uli muntu wa-Leza, ajwi lya-Jehova lyamumulomo wako ndyalusinizyo.
Aboobo Eliya wakanyamuka kuyoolibonya kumeso aa-Ahabu, nkabela inzala yakali impati mu-Samariya.
nkabela kuciindi eco Jezebeli naakanyonyoona basinsimi ba-Jehova. Obadiya wakabweza basinsimi bali mwaanda, wabasisa mumpangala, mumwi makumi osanwe amumwi makumi osanwe, wabasanizya insima amaanzi.
Elyo Ahabu wakaambila Obadiya kuti, Koya bweenda moonse munyika kutusensa toonse twamaanzi akutulonga toonse. Ambweni tuyoojana mani aakusanizya mabbiza ambongolo, kuti tutaswekelwi banyama boonse.
Mpawo bakaabana nyika, kuti baimanisye kweendeenda. Ahabu wakatozya kwakwe alike, alakwe Obadiya wakatozya kwakwe alike.
Nkabela Obadiya naakacili munzila wakaswanaana a-Eliya, elyo naakamuziba, wakavundama ansi, wabuzya kuti, Sa nduwe mwami wangu Eliya?
Wakavuwa kuti, Ndime. Koya, ukaambile mwami wako kuti Eliya mpali.
Pele wakati, Ndabisyanzi? Nkaambonzi nowandaaba ndemulanda wako mumaanza aa-Ahabu kuti andijaye?

Ncobeni Jehova Leza wako mbali muumi, taakwe cisi niciba comwe nibuba bwami bomwe mwami wangu nkwaatana kutuma kuyandaula nduwe. Nkabela naakaambilwa kuti, Tawo, wakatukila cisi eco na bwami obo nkaambo kakukubula.
Lino sunu waamba kuti, Koya ukaambile mwami wako kuti Eliya mpali.
Pele ndakusia buyo, Muuya wa-Jehova ayookutola nkuntezi. Elyo na ndaambila Ahabu, nekubaboobo atakujane, uyoondijaya. Anukuti mebo ndemulanda wako ndayoowa Jehova lyoonse akuzwa kubwanike bwangu.

Sa tona kulwiidwa, mwami wangu, mbundakacita kuciindi eco Jezebeli naakajaya basinsimi baJehova? Ndakasisa basinsimi ba-Jehova bali mwaanda, mumwi makumi osanwe amumwi makumi osanwe mumpangala, akubasanizya insima amaanzi.
Lino uwe waamba kuti, Koya ukaambile mwami wako kuti Eliya mpali. Ma! Uyoondijaya!
Pele Eliya wakati, Ncobeni mbali muumi Jehova wamakamu, ngunjiminide kubusyu bwakwe, njoolibonya kumeso aakwe buzuba obuno.
Mpawo Obadiya wakainka kuyooswanaana a-Ahabu, wamulwiida makani. Elyo Ahabu wakaya kuyooswanaana a-Eliya.
Wakati, Nsina kupenzya ba-Israyeli pe. Nduwe aluzubo lwauso, nkaambo mwasotoka milao ya-Jehova akutobela ba-Baala,
Lino tuma, ukandiyobolwede ba-Israyeli boonse kucilundu ca-Karameli, abalo basinsimi ba-Baala bali myanda yone amakumi osanwe, abasinsimi bazifwanikisyo bali myanda yone balya kuntafule ya-Jezebeli.

Elyo Eliya wakaswena kubantu boonse, wakati, Ino mulaleka lili kuya busunkuta amiyeeyo yobile? Na Jehova ngu-Leza, amumutobele. Na Baala ngu-Leza, amutobele nguwe. Nkabela bantu teebakavuwa ijwi niliba lyomwe.
Lino Eliya wakaambila bantu kuti, Mebo ndasyaala endike musinsimi wa-Jehova, pele basinsimi ba-Baala bali myanda yone amakumi osanwe.
Batupe iŋombe zyobile, elyo balisalile iŋombe imwi, oaigonkole akwiibamba azisamu, pele batadukuli mulilo, Ambebo mbambe iŋombe imwi akwiibika azisamu, pele nsikoodukula mulilo pe.

Lino muleelede kukwiilila izina lyamizimu yanu, ambebo njookwiilila izina lya-Jehova, nkabela kufumbwa Leza uusi pe mulilo, ngo-nguwe Leza mwini-mwini. Mpawo bantu boonse bakavuwa kuti, Mbubo, abota makani!
Elyo Eliya wakaambila basinsimi ba-Baala kuti, Amulisalile iŋombe imwi, mutaangune kwiibamba, nkaambo muli banji. Lino amukwiilile izina lya-Leza wanu, pele mutadukuli mulilo pe.

Nkabela bakatambula iŋombe njibakapegwa, baibamba, bakwiilila izina lya-Baala kuzwa kucifumofumo mane kusikila akalangabwaseme. Bakati, O Baala, utuswiilile, Pele katakwe ijwi niliba lyomwe ilyakavuugwa pe. Nkabela bakali kusotoka acipaililo ncibakayakide.

Lino nikwakaba akalangabwaseme, Eliya wakabaseka, wati, Amukwiilisye, nkaambo ngu-Leza. Ambweni uli mukuyeeya, ambweni waya kumbi, ambweni uli mulweendo, ambweni uli mutulo aboobo uleelede kusinsimunwa.
Mpawo bakakwiilisya loko, akulitenzya mapanga amasumo mbubonya mbubakazibila, mane bulowa bwabo bwakatikaikila ansi.
Lino ciindi cakalangabwaseme nicakamana, bakacili kulabalika mane kusikila kuciindi cakukomba camangolezya, pele katakwe ijwi niliba lyomwe naba sikuvuwa naba sikuswiilila.
Mpawo Eliya wakaambila bantu boonse kuti, Amuswene kulindime. Lino bantu boonse nibakaswena, wakayakulula cipaililo ca-Jehova icakamwaikide.
Eliya wakabweza mabwe aali ikumi aabili, mbubonya mbuli mweelwe wamisyobo yabana ba-Jakobo (ngonguwe iwakasikilwa ijwi lyaJehova lyakuti, Israyeli uyooba izina lyako).
Nkabela ayo mabwe wakaayasya cipaililo muzina lya-Jehova, akuzyungulusya cipaililo lulindi ilwakeelede zisuwo zyobile zyambuto.
Mpawo wakabamba zisamu, watendaula iŋombe, akwiibika mpoonya azisamu. Alimwi wakati, Amuzuzye zitekelo zyone zyamaanzi, mwaatile acituuzyo cili azisamu.
Wakati, Amucite alwabili. Nkabela bakacita alwabili. Alimwi wakati, Amucite alwatatu. Nkabela bakacita alwatatu.
Aboobo maanzi akeenda koonse koonse acipaililo, alwalo lulindi lwakazula maanzi.
Kondivwiila, O Jehova, kondivwiila, kuti bantu aba bazibe kuti nduwe Leza, O Jehova, alimwi wapilusya myoyo yabo.
Mpoonya awo mulilo wa-Jehova wakaloka, walya cituuzyo azisamu zyoonse, amabwe, abulongo, akumyankuta maanzi aakali mululindi.
Nkabela bantu boonse nibakabona bakavundama ansi, bati, Jehova ngu-Leza! Jehova ngu-Leza!
Lino Eliya wakabaambila kuti, Amujate basinsimi ba-Baala; kutaloboki naba omwe akati kabo. Elyo bakabajata, nkabela Eliya wakabaselusya kukalonga ka-Kisoni, wabajaya nkuko.
Lino Eliya wakaambila Ahabu kuti, Koya, ukalye akunywa, nkaambo kulamvwigwa mandomondomo aamuyoba.
Nkabela Ahabu naakainkide kuyoolya akunywa, Eliya wakatanta amutwe wa-Karameli, wakotamina ansi, amutwe wakwe wakasika akati kamazwi aakwe.
Lino wakaambila mulanda wakwe kuti, Koya ukalange kulubbazu lwalwizi. Wakaya, walanga, wati, Taakwe pe. Pele ziindi zili musanu azibili wakaindulula kumutuma.

Lino ciindi camusanu azibili nicakasika, wakati, Kwaboneka kayoba kaniini kali mbuli ijanza lyamuntu, kazwa kulwizi. Mpawo wakamulailila kuti, Koya, ukaambile Ahabu kuti, Kolibambila inkalaki yako, kuti imvula itakukasyi.
Lino nikakaba kaindi, ijulu lyoonse lyakasia nkaambo kamayoba amuuwo, nkabela imvula yakawa loko. Elyo Ahabu wakatanta munkalaki kuya ku-Jezreeli.
Nkabela ijanza lya-Jehova lyakalijisi Eliya, aboobo wakalyaanga-anga mucikungu, wazuzaana kunembo lya-Ahabu mane wakasika kumanjililo aa-Jezreeli.
jezebeli wakatuma mutumwa kuli-Eliya, wati, Leza andicitile mbubonya akwiinda, na ndabula kucita kuti buumi bwako ayebo bube mbuli buumi bwaumwi wabaaba, mbuli eno junza.
Elyo naakamvwa, wakabuka, wacija lufu, lumwi wakasika ku-Beeriseba mucisi ca-Juda, elyo wakasia mulanda wakwe nkuko,

pele walo mwini wakeenda lweendo lwabuzuba bomwe musokwe, wakasika, waakukala munsi lyakasamu, wakakumbila kuti afwe, Wakati, Cazulila, Kondinyanzya buumi bwangu, O Jehova, nkaambo nsili mubotu kwiinda bamatata.
Lino wakalala, woona mpawo ansi lyakasamu. Nkabela kwakasika angelo, wakamwaampa, wamwaambila kuti, Buka, ulye.
Elyo naakalanga, wakabona kuti kufwaafwi kumutwe wakwe kakuli cibunge acinkuli camaanzi, Mpawo wakalya, wanywa, walala, woona.
Nkabela angelo wa-Jehova wakaboola alwabili, wamwaampa, wati, Buka, ulye, nkaambo lweendo lwakukacila.
Elyo wakabuka, walya, wanywa, lino mukukuta kwazilyo ezyo nzizyonya wakeenda mazuba aali makumi one, isikati amasiku, mane kusikila ku-Horebu cilundu ca-Leza.

Wakati, Ndasungwaalila Jehova Leza wamakamu abusungu bupati, nkaambo bana ba-Israyeli basowa cizuminano cako, bamwaya zipaililo zyako, bajaya basinsimi bako apanga, lino mebo ndasyaala endike, abwalo buumi bwangu balayandaula kubunyonyoona.

Wakati, Koya, ukaime acilundu kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Elyo Jehova wakainda, nkabela muuwo uungisya wakapwaya zilundu akuvwinyauna mandomba kubusyu bwa-Jehova, pele Jehova takakali mumuuwo pe. Kusule lyamuuwo kwakasika muzuzumo wanyika, pele amwalo mumuzuzumo Jehova katamo.
Kusule lyamuzuzumo kwakasika mulilo, pele Jehova katamo mumulilo. Lino kusule lyamulilo kwakamvwigwa ijwi lyaluumuno wi.
Elyo Eliya naakamvwa, wakalivumba kubusyu acibaki cakwe, waya anze, waima kumulyango wampangala, Mpawo wakamvwa ijwi, lyakati, Ucitanzi okuno, Eliya?

Wakati, Ndasungwaalila Jehova Leza wamakamu abusungu bupati, nkaambo bana ba-Israyeli basowa cizuminano cako, bamwaya zipaililo zyako, bajaya basinsimi bako apanga, lino mebo ndasyaala endike, abwalo buumi bwangu balayandaula kubunyonyoona.
Lino Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Koya, upiluke munzila iiya kunkanda ya-Damasko, Was ika buyo, nanika Hazaeli, abe mwami wa-Aramu,
aJehu mwana wa-Nimsi komunanika abe mwami wa-Israyeli, alakwe Elisha mwana wa-Safati waku-Abelimehola komunanika kuti abe musinsimi mucimanga cako.
Lino kufumbwa muntu uucija ipanga lya-Hazaeli, Jehu ulamujaya, ayooyo uucija ipanga lya-Jehu, Elisha ulamujaya.
Pele ndasyaazya mucisi ca-Israyeli bantu bali zyuulu zili musanu azibili, nkukuti mazwi oonse aatana kufugamina Baala, amilomo yoonse iitana kumumyonta.

Lino wakazwa oko, wakaakujana Elisha mwana wa-Safati, uli mukulimya basune maamba aali ikumi aabili, ajamba lyakumi aabili walo mwini nguwakali kulilimya. Nkabela Eliya wakainda nkwaakabede, wamuvumbya cibaki cakwe.
Mpawo wakasia basune, weza buzuzaana kuli-Eliya, wati, Ntaangune kulaya taata abama, elyo ndakutobela. Wakavuwa kuti, Koya, upiluke. Ndakucitilanzi?
Lino wakapiluka, wabweza basune bobile mbaakali kulimya, wabajaya, wajika nyama azibelesyo zyaŋombe, waabila bantu kuti balye, Mpawo wakanyamuka, watobela Eliya, akumukutaukila.
Wakatuma batumwa kuli-Ahabu mwami wa-Israyeli, mumunzi mwaakakede.
Wakati, Swiilila mbwaamba Benihadadi. Insiliva yako angolida yako, zyoonse nzizyangu. Banakazi bako abana bako babotu, boonse mbibangu.
Elyo mwami wa-Israyeli wakavuwa kuti, Mbukubede, O mwami simalelaangu. Mebo ndemwini azyoonse nzenjisi nzizyako.
Pele batumwa bakaboola alwabili, bakati, Swiilila mbwaamba Benihadadi. Ndakakutumina mulazyo wakuti, Insiliva yako angolida yako abanakazi bako abana bako, zyoonse undipe.
Pele junza mbuli eno njootuma balanda bangu kulinduwe kuti balangaule moonse muŋanda yako amumaanda aabalanda bako, nkabela kufumbwa cintu ciyandika mumeso aako, bayoocitola,
Lino baalu boonse abantu boonse bakamwaambila kuti, Utamuswiilili, utamuzuminini pe.

Mpawo wakaambila batumwa baBenihadadi kuti, Ambila mwami simalelo wanu kuti, Zyoonse nzyowakayandaula kulindime ndemulanda wako aakutaanguna, ndazicita. Pele eci nsicikonzyi pe. Elyo batumwa bakainka, batolela mwami ijwi ndyaakavuwa.
Nkabela Benihadadi wakatuma mulazyo wakuti, Baleza bandicitile mbubonya akwiinda, na kuyoosyaala mu-Samariya itombe lizulila inkankamaanza kubantu boonse mbondi abo.
Mwami wa-Israyeli wakavuwa kuti, Amumwaambile kuti, Uulyanga-anga buyo zyakulwisya zyakwe atalisumpuli mbubonya mbuli uusamununa kale.

Lino Benihadadi wakatambula aya majwi naakali kunywa, walo abami bakwe, muzilao nzibakayakide, nkabela wakaambila balanda bakwe kuti, Amulibambe mumilongo yanu. Elyo bakalibamba mumilongo kuti balwisye munzi.
Nkabela Ahabu wakabuzya kuti, Kumaanza aani? Wakavuwa kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Kumaanza aabalanda babami bazisi. Alimwi wakabuzya kuti, Ino nguni uuelede kwiitalika inkondo? Wakati, Nduwe.
Elyo wakayobolola balanda babami bazisi. Kwakajanwa myanda yobile amakumi otatwe ababili. Lino kusule lyaceeci wakayobolola bantu boonse babana ba-Israyeli, bali zyuulu zili musanu azibili.
Mpawo balanda babami bazisi bakataanguna kunyamuka, nkabela Benihadadi naakatuma wakalwiidwa kuti, Bantu mpobali bazwa ku-Samariya.
Wakati, Na beza muluumuno, amubajate kabacili baumi. Na beza cakulwana, amubajate kabacili baumi.
Mbuboobo aba bantu mbubakazwa mumunzi, balanda babami bazisi abasilumamba ibakali kubatobela.
Nkabela bakajaya umwi aumwi muntu sikulwana awe, elyo ba-Aramu bakacija, aba-Israyeli bakabatobela. Pele Benihadadi wakaloboka, ulitantide abbiza, abasimabbiza bakwe.
Lino mwami wa-Israyeli wakainka, waakujata mabbiza ankalaki, akunyonyoona ba-Aramu alunyonyooko lugambya.
Lino mbuboobu mboelede kucita, Kogwisya bami boonse akubika basilutwe muzimanga zyabo.

Lino koliyobolweda impi aimwi iielene ayeeyo njowakaswekelwa. Mabbiza abe mbubonya mbuli mabbiza aakutaanguna, azyalo inkalaki zi be mbubonya mbuli inkalaki zyakutaanguna. Lino atubalwisye mubanda, nkabela ncobeni tuyoobazunda. Elyo wakaswiilila majwi aabo akucita mbubonya mbubakaamba,

Mpawo bana ba-Israyeli nibakabungene akupegwa bulilu bakainka kuyooswanana awe. Nkabela bana ba-Israyeli nibakayaka zilao zyabo zilangene abo, bakali mbuli tutanga tobile twampongo, anukuti ba-Aramu bakali kuzuzya nyika.

Elyo kwakasika muntu wa-Leza, wakaambila mwami wa-Israyeli kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ba-Aramu mbubakaamba kuti, Jehova ngu-Leza wazilundu­, tali Leza wamabanda, nkaambo kako njooaba makamu aya aagambya mumaanza aako, mukazibe kuti ndime Jehova.

Nkabela bakalikede muzilao zyabo zilangene mazuba aali musanu aabili, elyo mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili basilumamba bakatalika kulwana, nkabela bana ba-Israyeli bakanyonyoona akati kaba-Aramu basilumamba basimyeendo bali zyuulu zili mwaanda mubuzuba bomwe.
Abalo ibakasyeede bakacijila kumunzi uutegwa Afeki. Basike oko, bulambo bwakalimba bantu basyeede bali zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu azibili.
Alakwe Benihadadi wakacija, wasika kumunzi, wanjila muŋanda yamukati.

Elyo balanda bakwe bakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Tulimvwide kuti bami baluzubo lwa-Israyeli mbasiluzyalo. Atusame zisani zyamasaka muzikungu, angozi kumitwe yesu, tuye kumwami wa-Israyeli. Ambweni inga ulakusiila buumi bwako.

Lino bakasama zisani zyamasaka muzikungu, angozi kumitwe yabo, akuya kumwami wa-Israyeli. Bakati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Benihadadi mulanda wako, wati, Ndakumbila kuti nkencipona. Wakabuzya kuti, Sa mukwesu nkwacili?

Mpawo bantu bakafwambaana kujata ijwi eli lyamukwesu, lyaba citondezyo. Bakati, Ii, mukwanu Benihadadi mpali. Wakati, Kamuya, mukamulete. Lino Benihadadi naakasika kulinguwe, wakamutantika munkalaki mwakabede.

Nkabela Benihadadi wakamwaambila kuti, Minzi taata njaakanyanzya uso, ndaipilusya, alimwi uyoolicitila zisambalilo mu-Damasko mbubonya mbuli taata mbwaakalicitila mu-Samariya. Ahabu wakati, Na wazumina obo, ndakuleka. Aboobo wakatangana awe cizuminano, wamuleka.
Mpawo wakamwaambila kuti, Mbuli mbotaswiilili kulailila kwa-Jehova, bona! Wandisia buyo, mulavu ulakuluma. Nkabela nibakaanzaana, mpawo mulavu wakamujana, wamuluma.
Elyo wakajana muntu umbi, wamwaambila kuti, Inga wanduuma, Elyo muntu oyo wakamuuma cakumudinkaula.
Mpawo musinsimi wakanyamuka, waakulindila mwami munzila, alimwi wakalyeenenya kukulyaanzya cisani ameso.

Lino mwami naakainda, wakakwiilila mwami kuti, Mebo ndemulanda wako ndakainka kunkondo, nkabela muntu umwi wakandizida, wandiletela muntu, wati, Umubambe muntu oyu, Na aloboke, buumi bwako buyooba mucimanga cakwe, cita ukabbadele italenta lyansiliva.
Pele mebo ndemulanda wako ndakalipakesye kumwi akumwi, mane lumwi waloboka. Elyo mwami wa-Israyeli wakamwaambila kuti, Makani aako walikosweda omwini.
Mpawo wakafwambaana kugwisya cisani cakumeso aakwe, nkabela mwami waIsrayeli wakamuziba, wabona kuti nguumwi wabasinsimi.
Lino wakati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mbuli mbowakaleka muntu iwakeelede kunyonyoonwa, buumi bwako buyooba mucimanga cakwe, abantu bako bayooba mucimanga cabantu bakwe.
Mpawo mwami wa-Israyeli wakaya kulinguwe cakubijilwa abuusu, aboobo wakasika ku-Samariya.

Nkabela Ahabu wakaambila Naboti kuti, Kondipa muunda wako, nkacite muunda wazisyu, nkaambo uli kufwaafwi kuŋanda yangu, Njookupa muunda mubotu cakwiinda mucimanga cawo, na kuti koyanda, njookupa mali aamuulo wawo.
Pele Naboti wakavwiila Ahabu kuti, Ne! Cilatonda kumeso aa-Jehova kukupa lukono lwabamatata.

Mpawo Ahabu wakaya kuŋanda yakwe cakubijilwa abuusu nkaambo kajwi lya-Nabo ti mu-Jezreeli ndyaakamwaambila, lyakuti, Nsikookupa lukono lwabamatata. Wakalala abulo bwakwe bufutete, wakaka kulya insima.
Lino kwakamusikila jezebeli mukaakwe, wamubuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi moyo wako ulibijilidwe? Nkaambonzi nokaka kulya insima?

Wakamuvwiila kuti, Ndakali kwaambaula a-Naboti mu-Jezreeli, Ndakati, Kondipa muunda wako wamisaansa: nkupe mali, na kuti koyanda ndakupa muunda umbi mucimanga cawo. Pele wakati, Nsikookupa muunda wangu pe.
Mpawo Jezebeli mukaakwe wakamwaambila kuti, Sa teensi nduwe ojisi bwami bwa-Israyeli sunu? Buka, ulye insima, moyo wako ukondwe, Mebo ndakupa muunda wa-Naboti mu-Jezreeli.
Elyo wakalemba magwalo muzina lya-Ahabu, waanamatika acinamatiko cakwe. Ayo magwalo wakaatuma kubaalu akubapati ibakakede kumunzi oyo nguwenya nkwaakakede Naboti.
Mbuboobo mbwaakalemba mumagwalo­. Wakati, Amwiite bantu kukuliimya kulya, alimwi amukazike Naboti mucuuno cabulemu akati kabantu.
Lino amubike bantu bobile, bana baSaatani, kuti bakale bulangene awe, bamubike kaambo kakuti, Webo watukila Leza amwami. Elyo baleelede kumutola anze, bamufuse mabwe, mane afwe,
Nkabela bantu bamunzi wakwe, baalu abapati ibakakede nkuko, bakacita mbubonya mbuli Jezebeli mbwaakabalailila, mbwaakalembede mumagwalo ngaakabatumina.
Bakaita bantu kukuliimya kulya, bakazika Naboti mucuuno cabulemu akati kabantu,

elyo bantu bobile bana baSaatani nibakasika, bakakala awe bulangene, Nkabela abo bana ba-Saatani bakabika Naboti kaambo mumatwi aabantu boonse, bati, Naboti wakatukila Leza amwami. Elyo bakamutola anze amunzi, bamufusa mabwe mane wafwa.
Lino bakatumina Jezebeli mulazyo wakuti, Naboti wafuswa mabwe, ulifwide.

Mpawo Jezebeli amvwe buyo mulazyo oyu wakuti, Naboti wafuswa mabwe, ulifwide, ndilyonya jezebeli wakaambila Ahabu kuti, Buka, utole muunda wa-Naboti mu-Jezreeli ngwakakukasya kuula amali, nkaambo Naboti taciponi pe, ulifwide.
Lino Ahabu amvwe buyo kuti Naboti ulifwide, Ahabu wakanyamuka kuyootola muunda wa-Naboti mu-Jezreeli.
Nyamuka, uye kuyoocinga Ahabu mwami wa-Israyeli uuli mu-Samariya. Bona! Nkwali kumuunda wa-Naboti, nkaambo waya nkuko kuutola.

Uleelede kumwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Wajaya na? Wavuba na? Lino uleelede kumwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Nkukonya oko babwa nkubantwakizya bulowa bwa-Naboti, babwa bayoontwakizya bulowa bwako ayebo.
Bona! Ndakuletela mapenzi aakukulobya, Njoonyonyoona muluzubo lwa-Ahabu basankwa boonse, nibaba bazike nibaba balubusi bamu-Israyeli.
Njoocita kuti luzubo lwako lube mbubonya mbuli luzubo lwa-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati, ambuli luzubo lwa-Basa mwana waAhija, nkaambo kakuti wandikalazya, alimwi wacitya ba-Israyeli zibi.
Alakwe Jezebeli Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Babwa bayoolya Jezebdi mumuunda waku-Jezreeli.
Kufumbwa mwana wa-Ahabu uufwa mumunzi, babwa balamulya, ayooyo uufwa musokwe, bayuni bakujulu balamulya.
Wakacita milimo iisesemya loko kukutobela mituni, mbubonya mbubakacita baAmori, Jehova mbaakatanda kubusyu bwaba-Israyeli.
Elyo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila Eliya waku-Tisibe liti,
Sa tobwene Ahabu mbwaalibombya kubusyu bwangu? Nkaambo kakulibombya kwakwe kubusyu bwangu, nsikooyoosisya mapenzi mumazuba aakwe mwini. Njoosisya mapenzi kuluzubo lwakwe mumazuba aamwanaakwe.
Lino myaka yotatwe ba-Aramu aba-Israyeli bakalikede kabatalwani.
Pele mumwaka watatu Josafati mwami wa-Juda wakeza kukubona mwami wa-Israyeli.
Mpawo mwami wa-Israyeli wakaambila balanda bakwe kuti, Sa tamuzi kuti Ramoti-Gileadi nguwesu? Nekubaboobo tulikede buyo, tatumunyanzyi mwami wa-Aramu.

Lino wakabuzya Josafati kuti, Sa ndakonzya kwiinka ayebo kuyoolwisya Ramoti-Gileadi? Nkabela Josafati wakavwiila mwami wa-Israyeli kuti, Tuleelene mebo ayebo, bantu bangu abantu bako, mabbiza aangu amabbiza aako.
Pele Josafati wakaambila mwami wa-Israyeli kuti, Taanguna kubuzya makani kuli-Jehova,
Lino mwami wa-Israyeli wakabunganya basinsimi, bakati be myanda yone, wababuzya kuti, Sa njiinke kuyoolwisya RamotiGileadi, na ndeke? Bakati, Koya, nkaambo Mwami uyooaba munzi mumaanza aako.
Mpawo Josafati wakabuzya kuti, Sa takusyeede aumwi musinsimi wa-Jehova, kuti tubuzye kumulomo wakwe?

Mwami waIsrayeli wakavwiila Josafati kuti, Kwasyaala muntu omwe ngutukonzya kubuzya ijwi lya-Jehova kumulomo wakwe, pele ndimusulide, nkaambo tasinsimi aandime makani mabotu pe, ulasinsima makani mabi luzutu. Ngu-Mikaya mwana wa-Yimla. Pele Josafati wakaamba kuti, Mwami ataambi obo pe,
Mpawo mwami wa-Israyeli wakaita silutwe, wamulailila kuti, Fwambaana kuleta okuno Mikaya mwana wa-Yimla.

Lino mwami wa-Israyeli a-Josafati mwami wa-Juda bakalikede umwi aumwi acuuno cakwe cabwami, kabasamine zikobela zyabo, kucipolelo cakumulyango waSamariya, alimwi basinsimi boonse bakali kusinsima kumeso aabo.
Nkabela Zedekiya mwana wa-Kenana kalicitilide meja aabutale, elyo wakati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Aya ngaakutonsya ba-Aramu mane bakanyonyooke.
Abalo basinsimi boonse bakasinsima mbubonya. Bakati, Koya ukalwane ku-Ramoti-Gileadi, ukacite kabotu, nkaambo Jehova wauaba mumaanza aamwami.
Lino mutumwa wakaya kuyooita Mikaya wakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Majwi aabasinsimi boonse alazuminana kukwaamba makani mabotu aamwami. Ijwi lyako libe mbubonya mbuli majwi aabo. Amba kabotu.
Pele Mikaya wakavuwa kuti, Ncobeni Jehova mbali muumi, kufumbwa cintu Jehova ncandaambila, ncencico ncenti ambe.
Lino naakasika kumwami, mwami wakamwaambila kuti, Mikaya, sa twiinke ku-Ramoti-Gileadi kuyoolwisya, na tuleke? Wakati, Koya, ukacite kabotu, nkaambo Jehova wauaba mumaanza aamwami.
Pele mwami wakamwaambila kuti, Ziindi zili zyongae nzendeelede kukulailila kuti undaambile lusinizyo luzutu muzina lya-Jehova
Elyo wakati, Ndakabona ba-Israyeli boonse balimwaikide azilundu mbubonya mbuli imbelele zitakwe mweembeli, lino Jehova wakati, Aba tabajisi mweembeli, bapiluke kulimbabo caluumuno.
Mpawo mwami wa-Israyeli wakaambila Josafati kuti, Sa teendakakulwiida kuti takonzyi kusinsima aandime makani mabotu, pele makani mabi luzutu?
Lumwi Mikaya wakati, Mbubo! Koswiilila ijwi Iya-Jehova. Ndakabona Jehova ulikede acuuno cakwe cabwami amakamu oonse aakujulu aliimvwi kunembo lyakwe, kululyo akulumwensi.
Lino Jehova wakabuzya kuti, Ino nguni uukonzya koongelezya Ahabu, kuti ainke kuyoonyonyooka kuRamoti-Gileadi? Nkabela boonse bakapambukana mukwaamba kwabo,
mane lumwi kwakeza muuya akwiimikana kubusyu bwa-Jehova, wakati, Mebo ndakonzya kumoongelezya. Jehova wakamubuzya kuti, Uyoomoongelezya buti?
Wakavuwa kuti, Njooinka akuba muuya wabubeji mumilomo yabasinsimi bakwe boonse. Wakati, Ncobeni uyoomoongelezya, uyookonzya. Koya, ukacite obo.
Lino bona! Jehova wabika muuya wabubeji mumilomo yabasinsimi bako boonse, pele makani Jehova ngaamba aanduwe mabi.
Mikaya wakavuwa kuti, Uyoobona mubuzuba obo mboyoonjila muŋanda yamukati kukuyuba.
Lino mwami wa-Israyeli wakati, Amujate Mikaya, mumutole kuli-Amoni mweendelezi wamunzi akuli-Joasi mwana wamwami,
ubaambile kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami, Amubike muntu oyu muntolongo, mumusanizye insima yaku buya amaanzi luzutu mane nkaboole caluumuno.
Pele Mikaya wakati, Na ncobeni ulaboola caluumuno, teensi Jehova iwakaamba kumulomo wangu. Alimwi wakati, Amuswiilile nubantu nyoonse.
Lino mwami wa-Israyeli a-Josafati mwami wa-Juda bakainka kuRamoti-Gileadi.
Nkabela mwami wa-Israyeli wakaambila Josafati kuti, Mebo ndalyeenenya akunjila munkondo, pele webo kosama zikobela zyako. Aboobo mwami wa-Israyeli wakanjila munkondo cakulyeenenya.
Lino mwami wa-Aramu wakalailila basilutwe bankalaki zyakwe bali makumi otatwe ababili kuti, Mutalwisyi muntu naba omwe naba muniini naba mupati, cita mwami wa-Israyeli alike.
Mpawo basilutwe bankalaki nibakabona Josafati, bakayeeya kuti ngonguwe mwami wa-Israyeli, aboobo bakaleya kumulwisya, mane josafati wakalila.
Elyo basilutwe bankalaki nibakabona kuti engwe mwami wa-Israyeli bakaleka kumutobela.

Pele umwi muntu wakafusya buta bwakwe cakutaziba, wayasa mwami wa-Israyeli akati kazikwabilizyo zyacikungu azyacamba. Elyo, wakaambila sinkalaki wakwe kuti, Piluka, undigwisye munkondo, nkaambo ndiyasidwe.

Nkabela inkondo yakavuta buzuba obo, amwami wakalitabilidwe munka-laki yakwe kalangide aba-Aramu, mane wakafwa ciindi camabbililo aazuba, abulowa bwakali kuzwa mpaakayasidwe akukunkila atako lyankalaki.
Lino izuba nilyakaamba kubbila kwakamvwigwa mubila muzilao wakuti, Boonse bapiluke, umwi aumwi kumunzi wakwe akucisi cakwe.
Mbuboobo mwami mbwaakafwa, nkabela naakasika ku-Samariya, bakazika mwami nkukonya ku-Samariya.
Elyo bakasanzya-sanzya inkalaki kuziba lyaku-Samariya, nkabela ba bwa bakantwakizya bulowa bwakwe, oko basibwaamu nkubakali kusamba, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova mbulyakaambide.
Lino makani amwi aa-Ahabu, ancito zyakwe zyoonse, aŋanda yamanyanga njaakayaka, aminzi yoonse njaakayaka, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli.
Elyo Ahabu naakalede mukabanda abasikale bakwe, Ahaziya mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Josafati kajisi myaka iili makumi otatwe amusanu naakalya bwami, nkabela wakeendelezya myaka iili makumi obile amusanu mu-Jerusalemu. Izina lyabanyina bakali Azuba mwana wa-Sili.

Nkabela wakeenda munzila zyoonse zya-Asa wisi, taakwe naakaleya pe, mukucita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova. Pele zipaililo zyakuzilundu teezyakagwisigwa pe. Bantu bakacili kupaila akutenta tununkilizyo omo muzilundu.
Elyo Josafati wakatangana mulongo amwami wa-Israyeli.
Lino makani amwi aa-Josafati, anguzu zyakwe nzyaakacita, ankondo nzyaakalwisya, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda?
Alimwi baalumi basibwaamu ibakacisyeede mumazuba aa-Asa wisi, wakabamaninina boonse munyika,
Lino katakwe mwami mucisi ca-Edomu. Ngambela nguwakali kweendelezya.
Nkabela Josafati wakapanga maato aa-Tarsisi kuti baye ku-Ofira kuyooleta ingolida, pele teebakainka pe, nkaambo maato akafwa ku-Ezioni-Geberi.
Mpawo Ahaziya mwana wa-Ahabu wakaambila josafati kuti, Balanda bangu bainke abalanda bako mumaato. Pele Josafati takazumide pe.
Elyo Josafati naakafwa akulala mucuumbwe abamawisi, wakazikwa abamawisi mumunzi wa-Davida wisi, nkabela Joramu mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Lino Ahaziya mwana wa-Ahabu mwami wa-Israyeli wakatalika kweendelezya ku-Samariya mumwaka wakumi amusanu aibili wabwami bwa-Josafati mwami wa-Juda, nkabela wakeendelezya ba-Israyeli myaka yobile.
Pele wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, weenda munzila yawisi amunzila yabanyina amunzila ya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati iwakacitya ba-Israyeli zibi.
Wakali kumanina Baala milimo akumukomba, aboobo wakakalazya Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli mbubonya mbwaakacita wisi.

Alimwi Ahaziya wakawida ansi kuzwa kumpalangwizyo yaŋanda yakwe yakujulu yaku-Samariya, aboobo wakaciswa. Elyo wakatuma batumwa, wabaambila kuti, Kamuya, mukabuzye kuli-Baala-Zebubi Leza wa-Ekroni, nkazibe na ndapona mubulwazi obu.

Pele angelo wa-Jehova wakaambila Eliya waku-Tisibe kuti, Nyamuka, ukacinge batumwa bamwami wa-Samariya, ukababuzye kuti, Sa nkaambo kakuti taakwe Leza mucisi ca-Israyeli ncimwiinkila kuyoosonda kuli-Baala-Zebubi Leza wa-Ekroni na?
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Tokooyooseluka abulo obo mpotantide pe. Ncobeni uyoofwa, Elyo Eliya wakainka.
Mpawo batumwa bakapiluka kumwami, Nkabela wakababuzya kuti, Ino mwaboolelanzi?

Bakavuwa kuti, Kwakeza muntu kuzootuswana, watwaambila kuti, Kamuya, mupiluke kumwami iwamutuma, mumwaambile kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Sa nkaambo kakuti tamukwe Leza mucisi ca-Israyeli ncimutumina kukusonda kuli-Baala-Zebubi Leza wa-Ekroni na? Nkaambo kako tokooyooseluka abulo obo mpotantide pe. Ncobeni uyoofwa.
Lino wakababuzya kuti, Ino uli buti muntu ngumwa-swanana awe iwamwaambila aya makani?
Bakati, Kasamide masani aaboya, alutambo lwacikanda mucibuno cakwe. Wakati, Nguwe Eliya waku-Tisibe.

Pele Eliya wakavwiila oyo silutwe wamakumi osanwe kuti, Na ndi muntu wa-Leza, mulilo useluke kuzwa kujulu, ukutente webo ankamu yako. Mpawo mulilo wakaseluka kuzwa kujulu, wamutenta walo ankamu yakwe.

Pele Eliya wakabavwiila kuti, Na ndi muntu wa-Leza, mulilo useluke kuzwa kujulu, ukutente webo ankamu yako. Mpawo mulilo wa-Leza wakaseluka kuzwa kujulu, wamutenta walo abantu bakwe bali makumi osanwe.
Tulibwene mulilo mbuwakaseluka kuzwa kujulu akutenta basilutwe bataanzi bobile abantu babo, Pele lino buumi bwangu buyandike mumeso aako.
Mpawo angelo wa-Jehova wakaambila Eliya kuti, Seluka awe. Utayoowi pe. Mpawo wakanyamuka, waseluka awe kuya kumwami.

Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Nkaambonzi nowakatuma batumwa kuyoosonda kuliBaala-Zebubi Leza wa-Ekroni? Sa taakwe Leza mucisi ca-Israyeli ngokonzya kubuzya makani kulinguwe na? Nkaambo kako tokooyooseluka abulo obo mpotantide pe. Ncobeni ulafwa.
Aboobo wakafwa mbubonya mbuli ijwi Eliya ndyaakaamba, nkabela Joramu munyina wakalya izina lyakwe mumwaka wabili wa-Joramu mwana wa-Josafati mwami wa-Juda, nkaambo katajisi mwana.
Lino makani amwi aa-Ahaziya, ambwaakacita, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli?
Elyo Eliya wakaambila Elisha kuti, Kosyaala ano, nkaambo Jehova wandituma ku-Beteli. Pele Elisha wakati, Ne! Jehova mbali muumi, amuuya wako mbuuli muumi, nsikooanzaana ayebo. Elyo bakaya ku-Beteli.
Lino bana babusinsimi ibakali ku-Beteli bakaswenenena Elisha, bati, Sa tozi kuti buzuba obuno Jehova ulatola simalelaako kuzwa kumutwe wako? Wakati, Ambebo ndizi obo. Amuumune.

Lino Eliya wakamwaambila kuti, Elisha, kosyaala ano, nkaambo Jehova wandituma ku-Jeriko. Pele wakati, Ne! Jehova mbali muumi, amuuya wako mbuuli muumi, nsikooyooanzaana ayebo. Aboobo bakaya ku-Jeriko.
Elyo bana babusinsimi ibakali ku-Jeriko bakaswenenena Elisha, bati, Sa tozi kuti buzuba obuno Jehova ulatola simalelaako kuzwa kumutwe wako? Wakati, Ambebo ndizi obo. Amuumune.
Lino Eliya wakamwaambila kuti, Kosyaala ano, nkaambo Jehova wandituma ku-Jordano. Pele wakati, Ne! Jehova mbali muumi, amuuya wako mbuuli muumi, nsikooanzaana ayebo. Elyo bakeenda boonse bobile.
Nkabela bantu bali makumi osanwe babana babusinsimi bakaakwiimikana kulekule bulangene abo, boonse bobile nibakaimvwi ku-Jordano.
Lino Eliya wakabweza cikobela cakwe, wacivunga, wacuumya maanzi, nkabela mpawo maanzi akaandaanisigwa kumwi akumwi, aboobo bakazubuka boonse bobile mutala cakweenda ansi.
Wakavuwa kuti, Cintu ncokumbila nciyumu, nekubaboobo na undibone nensi tolwe kuzwa kulinduwe, cilaba mbubonya, pele kuti utandibone, tacikooyooba obo pe.
Lino nibakacili kuya bweenda akwaambaula, kwakaboneka inkalaki yamulilo amabbiza aamulilo, yakabaanzaanya. Mpawo Eliya wakatanta mukambizi kuya kujulu.
Nkabela Elisha naakabona, wakalila kuti, Taata! Taata! Inkalaki zya-Israyeli abasimbizi bazyo! Lino taakwe naakamubona limbi.
Nkabela wakajata zyakusama zyakwe, wazizapaula muzipanzi zyobile.
Alimwi wakanyamuna cikobela ca-Eliya icakaloka ansi, wapiluka, waima kunkomwe ya-Jordano.
Mpawo wakabweza cikobela ca-Eliya cakamuloka, wacuumya maanzi, wati, Uli kuli-Jehova Leza wa-Eliya? Nkabela naakamana kuuma maanzi, maanzi akaandaanisigwa kumwi akumwi, aboobo Elisha wakazubuka.
Lino bana babusinsimi ibakakede ku-Jeriko, nibakamubona ulilangene abo, bakati, Muuya wa-Eliya wakala ali-Elisha. Elyo bakeza kuzoomuswananya, bamukotamina ansi.

Nkabela bakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Okuno kulindiswe tubalanda bako kuli baalumi basinguzu bali makumi osanwe. Bainke kuyooyandaula simalelaako. Ambweni Muuya wa-Jehova wakamutola, wamutula amwi atala acilundu nanka mumwi mumumpata. Pele wakati, Mutatumi pe.
Nekubaboobo nibakacili kumusungilizya, wakafwa insoni, wati, Mbubo, amutume. Mpawo bakatuma bantu bali makumi osanwe, nkabela bakali kuyandaula mazuba otatwe, pele tabakamujene pe.
Lino bakaboola kulinguwe ku-Jeriko nkwaakakede, Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Sa teendakamwaambila kuti mutainki na?
Wakati, Amundiletele mutiba mupya, mubike munyo mulinguwo. Bakamuletela.
Lino wakainka kubutoolo bwamaanzi, wawaala munyo mukati, wati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ndasalazya aya maanzi. Takukooyooba limbi lufu nikuba kutakuzya micelo.
Nkabela maanzi akaba kabotu, mbubonya mbaacibede asunu, mbubonya mbwaakaamba Elisha.
Elyo wakacebuka, wababona, wabatukila muzina lya-Jehova. Nkabela mwakazwa musokwe basuntwe bobile, bakakwamauna akati kabo balombe bali makumi one ababili.
Lino kuzwa oko wakaya kucilundu ca-Karameli; azwe oko wakapiluka ku-Samariya.
Wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, pele kuteelana awisi abanyina, nkaambo wakagwisya muleu wa-Baala wisi ngwaakacitide,
pele wakacili kweenda muzibi zyaJeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati iwakacitya ba-Israyeli zibi, takakazileka pe.
Pele Ahabu naakafwa, mwami wa-Moabu wakapapila mwami wa-Israyeli.
Lino mubuzuba obo mwami Joramu wakazwa mu-Samariya, wayobolola ba-Israyeli boonse.

Nkabela wakatumina Josafati mwami wa-Juda mulazyo wakuti, Mwami wa-Moabu wandipapila. Sa inga ulatusindikila kuyoolwisya ba-Moabu? Wakavuwa kuti, Mbubo, ndainka. Tuleelene mebo ayebo, bantu bangu abantu bako, mabbiza aangu amabbiza aako.
Alimwi wakabuzya kuti, Ino tutole ili inzila? Wakati, Tutole inzila yankanda ya-Edomu.
Elyo bakainka, mwami wa-Israyeli amwami wa-Juda amwami wa-Edomu, akweenda cakuzyunguluka mazuba aali musanu aabili, mane lumwi maanzi akabamanina, basilumamba abanyama mbobakali abo.
Mpawo mwami wa-Israyeli wakati, Maawe! Jehova waita bami aba botatwe kuti abaabe mumaanza aaba-Moabu.

Lino josafati wakati, Sa taakwe musinsimi wa-Jehova okuno, kuti atubuzizye makani kuli-Jehova? Mpawo umwi wabalanda bamwami wa-Israyeli wakavuwa kuti, Mpali Elisha mwana waSafati, ngonguwe iwakali kutila maanzi amaanza aa-Eliya.
Lino Josafati wakati, Ijwi lya-Jehova lili mulinguwe. Aboobo bakainka kwakwe, mwami wa-Israyeli a-Josafati amwami wa-Edomu,
Lino Elisha wakati, Ncobeni Jehova wamakamu mbali muumi, ngunjiminide kubusyu bwakwe, nindatakali kulemeka Josafati mwami wa-Juda, nindatakulanga nikuba kukubona.
Amundiletele sikantimbwa. Elyo sikantimbwa naakali kuuma kantimbwa, inguzu zya-Jehova zyakamuselukila.
Nkabela wakati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Nzoocita kuti aka kalonga kazule tulambwalambwa.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Tamukooyoobona muuwo, nikuba kubona imvula, nekubaboobo ako kalonga kayoozula maanzi, aboobo munooyoonywa, nywebo aŋombe zyanu abanyama bamwi.
Alimwi eci ncintu euuba mumeso aa-Jehova. Uyooaba ba-Moabu mumaanza aanu.
Minzi yoonse iijisi malambo aminzi yoonse mibotu muyooizunda, ayalo misamu mibotu yoonse muyooitema, atusensa twamaanzi toonse muyootusinka, amyuunda yoonse mibotu muyooizuzya mabwe.
Lino nibwakaca, cipaizyo cacifumo nicakali kutuulwa, kwakasika maanzi munzila iizwa ku-Edomu, mane nyika yoonse yakazula maanzi.
Lino ba-Moabu boonse, nibakamvwa kuti bami basika kuzoobalwisya, bakabungana boonse ibakakonzya kusama zilwisyo, nibaba banike nibaba bapati, bakaakwiimikila kumugaano.
Nkabela nibwakaca, izuba nilyakali kunyengema amaanzi, ba-Moabu bakafuma, babona maanzi aasalala pyu mbuli bulowa.
Elyo bakati, Obu mbulowa. Ncobeni bami bakalwana, bajaya umwi aumwi mweenzinyina. Atweende, tukasaale, nuba-Moabuma.
Lino nibakasika kuzilao zyaba-Israyeli, ba-Israyeli bakabuka, bauma baMoabu, mane bacija. Nkabela bakali kuya bubatanda akubajaya.

­Alimwi minzi yoonse bakainyonyoona, ayalo myuunda mibotu yoonse bakawaala mabwe akwiizuzya, atusensa twamaanzi bakatusinka, amisamu yoonse mibotu bakaitema, mane kwakasyaala mabwe luzutu ku-Kirihareseti, elyo basinkwilipo bakauzyunguluka akuunyonyoona.
Mpawo mwami waMoabu naakabona kuti inkondo yamuyumina, wakalibwezela bantu basimapanga bali myanda iili musanu aibili kuti aindilile akusika kumwami waEdomu, nekubaboobo wakakacilwa.
Elyo wakabweza mwanaakwe mupati iwakeelede kulya izina lyakwe, wamucita cipaizyo mpoonya awo abulambo. Lino bukali bupati bwakasikila ba-Israyeli, aboobo bamuleka, bapiluka kulimbabo.
Elisha wakamubuzya kuti, Nkucitilenzi? Undaambile ncojisi muŋanda. Wakavuwa kuti, Mebo ndemulanda wako nsikwe ncenjisi muŋanda pe, cita insazi yamafuta.
Elyo wakati, Koya ukakumbile zibikilo kumbi kubeenzinyoko boonse. Kumbila zibikilo zitakwe zintu. Zitaceyi pe.
Wamana buyo, njila muŋanda abana bako, mujale mulyango, utile muzibikilo zyoonse. Cimwi acimwi cazula buyo, mucibike kumbali.
Lino wakamusia, walijalila mulyango walo abana bakwe, nkabela wakatila muzibikilo zyoonse nzibamuletela.
Elyo naakamana kuzuzya zibikilo zyoonse, wakaambila mwana wakwe kuti, Leta cibikilo acimwi. Wakati, Taakwe cimbi pe, Mpawo mafuta akamana.
Lino wakaya kukulwiida muntu wa-Leza. Nkabela wakati, Ulisya mafuta, ukaliye sizikoloto, lino aasi syaale ayooba aakuligwasya, webo abana bako.
Lino mwanakazi wakaambila mulumi wakwe kuti, Bona! Ndizi kuti ngumuntu uusalala wa-Leza uuinda kulindiswe lyoonse.
Atuyake kaanda anda aciluli, tubike mulinkako bulo antafule acuuno alampi, aboobo kufumbwa ciindi ncatuswaya uloona mumo.
Lino bumwi buzuba naakaswaya nkuko, wakanjila mukaanda, woona mumonya.
Nkabela wakaambila Gehazi mulanda wakwe kuti, Ita oyu mwanakazi waku-Sunemu. Mpawo wakamwiita. Nkabela naakaimvwi kubusyu bwakwe,
wakamwaambila kuti, Umwaambile kuti, Bona! Wapengela ndiswe loko. Tukucitilenzi? Sa tatukonzyi kukwaambilila kumwami nanka kulisilutwe wampi? Wakavuwa kuti, Ne! Ndikede akati kabantu bangu.
Elyo wakati, Ino tumucitile nzi? Nkabela Gehazi wakati, Pele tajisi mwana, alimwi mulumi wakwe wacembaala.
Lino wakati, Komwiita. Wakamwiita. Wakasika, waima kumulyango.
Elyo wakaamba kuti, Bona! Mwakali mbuli sunu uyoozyala mwana, Pele wakati, Pe, mwami, O muntu wa-Leza, utandeeni ndemulanda wako.
Nekubaboobo mwanakazi wakaminta, wazyala mwana mulombe kuciindi eco nciconya Elisha ncaakamwaambila.
Lino mwana wakakula, elyo buzuba bumwi wakaya kuliwisi nkubakali kutebula.
Lino wakaambila wisi kuti, Maawe! Ndafwa mutwe! Ndafwa mutwe! Nkabela wisi wakaambila mulombe kuti amutole kulibanyina.
Elyo naakamutola akumusisya kulibanyina, wakakala azibelo zyabo mane kusikila akalangabwaseme, lumwi wakafwa.
Mpawo wakamutola muŋanda yamujulu, wamulazika abulo bwamuntu wa-Leza, wamuialila, wazwa.
Nkabela wakaita mulumi wakwe, wamwaambila kuti, Nditumina umwi wabalanda ambongolo yomwe, kuti mfwambaane kuyoobona muntu wa-Leza, akupiluka.
Wakamubuzya kuti, Nkaambonzi uyanda kuyoomubona sunu? Tabuli buzuba bwamwezi mupya nibuba bwa-Sabata. Pele wakati, Cili kabotu.
Elyo naakamana kubopa imbongolo, wakaambila mulanda wakwe kuti, Atweendesye. Utaleki kweenzya cakufwambaana, cita nkwaambile.
Aboobo wakanyamuka, wasika kumuntu wa-Leza kucilundu ca-Karameli.
Lino muntu wa-Leza naakamubona uleza, wakaambila Gehazi mulanda wakwe kuti, Bona! Nguulya mwanakazi waku-Sunemu!
Zuzaana, amuswane, umubuzye kuti, Wapona na? Wapona mulumi wako? Amwana ulapona na? Nkabela wakavuwa kuti, Tuli kabotu.

Elyo naakasika kucilundu kumuntu wa-Leza, wakamujata kumaulu. Nkabela Gehazi wakasi mutonte, pele muntu wa-Leza wakati, Ne! Muleke! Nkaambo moyo wakwe ulifwabide loko, pele Jehova wandisisa makani, taakwe nandaambila pe.
Lino mwanakazi wakati, Sa ndime ndakakumbila mwana? Sa teendakaamba kuti, Utandeeni?

Mpawo Elisha wakaambila Gehazi kuti, Kolyaanga-anga kucikungu, utole mufunko wangu mujanza lyako, uinke. Na waswanaana amuntu munzila, utamujuzyi. Nabi muntu wakujuzya, utamuvwiili. Lino gumya mufunko wangu kubusyu bwamwana.
Elyo banyina mwana bakati, Ncobeni Jehova mbali muumi, amuuya wako mbuuli muumi, nsikookusia pe. Aboobo wakanyampuka, wamutobela.
Nkabela Gehazi wakabazulwida, waakugumya mufunko busyu bwamwana, pele katakwe ijwi nikuba kuswiilila, Elyo wakapiluka kukubaswana, wamwaambila kuti, Mwana taakwe nasinsimuka pe.
Lino Elisha naakasika kuŋanda, wakajana kuti mwana ulifwide, ulilede abulo.
Elyo wakanjila, walijalila amwana, wakomba Jehova.
Lino wakaakulala amubili wamwana, wabika mulomo amulomo wakwe, ameso ameso aakwe, amaanza amaanza aakwe, alimwi wakalyolola alinguwe, nkabela nyama yamwana yakakasaala.
Amane obo, wakabuka, weenda muŋanda kuya akupiluka, elyo wakaakulyolola alinguwe lwabili, nkabela mwana wakeesemuka ziindi zili musanu azibili, elyo wakanamuna meso aakwe.
Mpawo wakaita Gehazi, wakati, Ita oyu mwanakazi wakuSunemu, Wakamwiita, nkabela naakasika, wakamwaambila kuti, Ngooyu mwanaako.
Mpawo wakeza, wawa kumaulu aakwe, wakotamina ansi, elyo wakabweza mwana wakwe, waya anze.
Lino umwi wakaya musokwe kuyoocela zisyu, nkabela wakajana isaansa lyamusokwe, wacela kulindilyo misaansa yamusokwe iizuzya inkomo yakwe, waileta, waibika mucilongo camusinza, cakutaziba mbwiibede.
Elyo bakapampula kuti bantu balye, pele nibakali kulya musinza, bakakwiila kuti, O muntu wa-Leza, lufu mululi mucilongo. Teebakakonzya kulya pe.
Lino wakati, Leta busu. Nkabela wakabutila mucilongo, wati, Pampula, bantu balye. Mpawo bakaiya, Kamutacikwe bubi mucilongo pe.
Pele sikukutauka wakati, Ma! Ngabile buti bantu bali mwaanda tulyo tuniini tuli boobu? Wakati, Abila bantu, balye, nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Balalya akuzisia.
Mpawo wakabaabila, nkabela bakalya akuzisia mbubonya mbuli ijwi ndyaakaamba Jehova.
Lino ba-Aramu nibakali kusaala kucisi ca-Israyeli, bakaleta mubuzike kamwi kasimbi. Aka kasimbi kakali kubelekela muka-Naamani.
Elyo wakaambila bamalelo aakwe kuti, Nicakabota mwami wangu naakali kumusinsimi uuli ku-Samariya, nkaambo naakamuponya cinsenda cakwe.
Lino Naamani wakaakwaambila mwami wakwe kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaakaamba musimbi uuzwa mucisi ca-Israyeli.
Mpawo mwami wa-Aramu wakati, Mbubo, koya. Ndatuma lugwalo kumwami wa-Israyeli.
Aboobo wakaya, watolelela matalenta aansiliva aali ikumi, amasyekeli aangolida aali zyuulu zili musanu acimwi, azyakusama zili ikumi.
Lino wakaleta lugwalo kumwami wa-Israyeli. Lwakati, Olu lugwalo lwasika buyo kulinduwe, ulabona kuti ndakutumina Naamani mulanda wangu, kuti umuponye cinsenda cakwe.

Mpawo mwami wa-Israyeli naakabala lugwalo, wakazapaula zyakusama zyakwe, wati, Sa ndime Leza uukonzya kujaya akuponya? Nkaambonzi oyu muntu wanditumina mulazyo wakuti mponye sicinsenda? Amubone, muzibe kuti ulayandaula inkondo,
Mpawo Naamani wakeza amabbiza aakwe ankalaki zyakwe, waima amulyango waŋanda ya-Elisha.
Nkabela Elisha wakamutumina mutumwa, wakati, Koya ukasambe ziindi zili musanu azibili mu-Jordano, elyo nyama yako iyoosanduka, uyoosalala.
Pele Naamani wakanyema, wainka, wati, Ncobeni ndali kuyeeya kuti ulazwida anze kundibona, ulaimikila, ulakwiilila izina lya-Leza wakwe, ulavukuzya ijanza lyakwe atala azilonda akuponya cinsenda.
Sa Abana a-Faripara, milonga yaku-Damasko, tiili kabotu kwiinda meenda oonse aa-Israyeli na? Sa nsikonzyi kusamba mulinjiyo akusalala? Elyo wakapiluka, wainka cabukali.
Lino balanda bakwe bakamuswenenena, bakati, Taata! Musinsimi naakakwaambila kuti ucite imwi milimo mipati, sa nowatakacita? Lino sa tokonzyi kucita eci ncaamba cakuti, Samba, usalale?
Mpawo wakaya, walinika mumaanzi aa-Jordano ziindi zili musanu azibili, mbubonya mbwaakaamba muntu wa-Leza, Nkabela nyama yakwe yakasanduka, yaba mbuli nyama yamwana muniini, aboobo wakasalazigwa.
Pele wakati, Ne! Ncobeni Jehova mbali muumi ngumbelekela milimo, nsikootambula cintu, Nkabela wakasoleka loko kumusungilizya, nekubaboobo wakakaka.

Lino Naamani wakati, Mbowakaka, lino mebo ndemulanda wako mpegwe mukuli wambongolo zyobile wevu, nkaambo ndemulanda wako nsikooyoocita limbi zipaizyo niziba zituuzyo kumizimu imbi cita kuli-Jehova luzutu.

Pele mucintu eci cilike Jehova andilekelele ndemulanda wako. Kufumbwa ciindi simalelo wangu naanjila muŋanda ya-Rimoni kuyookomba, alimwi ulayaamina alindime, aboobo ndakotama muŋanda ya-Rimoni, Jehova andilekelele aya makani aakukotama muŋanda ya-Rimoni.
Elyo wakamwaambila kuti, Koya aluumuno.
Pele aende buyo kasinzosinzo,

Gehazi mulanda wa-Elisha muntu waLeza wakati, Bona! Simalelo wangu wamufwida insoni, oyu mu-Aramu Naamani, kukukaka cipo ncaakaleta. Ncobeni Jehova mbali muumi, ndafwambaana kumutobela, nkatambule cintu kulinguwe.
Aboobo Gehazi wakazuzaana akutobela Naamani, nkabela Naamani naakamubona uleza buzuzaana, wakaseluka kuzwa munkalaki akumuswana, wati, Sa kuli kabotu?
Wakavuwa kuti, Kuli kabotu, Simalelo wangu wandituma, wati, Kwandisikila lino lino balombe bobile, bana babasinsimi, bazwa kucilundu ca-Efraimu, Ubape italenta lyansiliva, azyakusama zyobile.

Mpawo Naamani wakati, Sa tokonzyi kuzumina kutambula matalenta obile? Nkabela wakamusungilizya, waanga matalenta obile aansiliva munkomo zyobile azyakusama zyobile, waaba mumaanza aabalombe bakwe bobile, nkabela bakamusololela baliziyumwide.
Lino naakasika kukalundu, wakazitambula kuzwa kumaanza aabo, wazibamba muŋanda. Mpawo wakabapilusya bantu, baya.
Walo mwini wakanjila akwiima kunembo lyasimalelo wakwe, Lino Elisha wakamubuzya kuti, Wali kuli, Gehazi? Wakavuwa kuti, Ndemulanda wako taakwe nkundainkide pe.
