Pele wakati, Sa moyo wangu tuukwaali ayebo, muntu naakaseluka kuzwa munkalaki yakwe akukuswanaanya? Sa nceciindi ceelede cakutambula insiliva azyakusama, myuunda yamaolifa ayamisaansa, imbelele aŋombe, bazike baalumi abanakazi?
Lino cinsenda ca-Naamani cilakakatila nduwe anyungu zyako lyoonse mane kukabe akutamani, Mpawo naakazwa kulinguwe, kali sicinsenda uutuba buu.
Atweende ku-Jordano, tuteme nkuko umwi aumwi ciyako, tuliyakile bukalo nkukonya, Wakati, Mbubo, kamuya.
Mpawo umwi wabo wakamwaambila kuti, Uzumine kuti tuye ayebo, tubalanda bako, Wakavuwa kuti, Ndainka.
Aboobo wakainka ambabo, mane basika kuJordano, elyo bakatema misamu.
Nkabela umwi naakali kutema musamu, lubulo lwakaleba kakwe lwakainkila mumaanzi, Elyo wakalila kuti, Maawe! simalelo wangu! Twakakalombede buyo kubantu!
Lino muntu wa-Leza wakabuzya kuti, Kalokela kuli? Elyo nibakamutondezya mpokakalokelede, wakatema kasamu, wakawaala mpoonya awo, wakaibuka lubulo.
Mpawo wakati, Ukagwisye. Nkabela wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe akulugwisya.
Lino mwami wa-Aramu wakali kulwisya ba-Israyeli, nkabela wakabuzyanya abalanda bakwe kuti, Kunyomfwi nkotuyooyakila zilao zyesu.
Pele muntu wa-Leza wakatumina mwami wa-Israyeli mulazyo wakuti, Cenjela! Utaindi kunyomfwi, nkaambo nkukonya oko nkubayakide zilao ba-Aramu.
Elyo mwami wa-Israyeli wakatumina oko kubusena muntu wa-Leza mbwaakamwaambila, mbwaakamucenjezya, aboobo wakalivuna ziindi zitali zice buyo.
Nkabela moyo wamwami wa-Aramu wakazingwa nkaambo kamakani aya, Lino wakaita balanda bakwe, wababuzya kuti, Sa tamuyandi kundilwiida na nguni akati kesu uugwasya mwami wa-Israyeli?
Mpawo umwi wabalanda bakwe wakavuwa kuti, Pe, mwami simalelo wangu, taakwe, Pele Elisha musinsimi uukede mucisi ca-Israyeli ulalwiida mwami wa-Israyeli majwi ngoamba nimuba muŋanda yako yakoona.
Wakati, Kamuya, mukabone nkwaabede, kuti ntume akumujata, Nkabela wakaambilwa kuti, Ku-Dotani nkwabede.
Mpawo wakatuma nkuko mabbiza ankalaki ampi impati, nkabela bakeza masiku akuzyunguluka munzi.
Wakavuwa kuti, Utayoowi pe, nkaambo abo mbetuli abo mbanji kwiinda mbabo.

Mpawo Elisha wakakomba kuti, O Jehova, kovumbulula meso aakwe, kuti abone. Nkabela Jehova wakavumbulula meso aamulanda, elyo wakabona kuti cilundu cakalizwiide mabbiza ankalaki zyamulilo zizyungulukide Elisha,
Mpawo Elisha wakabaambila kuti, Enjo eyi inzila, engo oyu munzi pe. Amutobele ndime, nkamutole kumuntu ngumuyandaula. Aboobo wakabasisya ku-Samariya.
Basike buyo ku-Samariya, Elisha wakati, O Jehova, vumbulula meso aabantu aba, kuti babone. Lino Jehova wakavumbulula meso aabo, aboobo nibakabona bakajana kuti tuli mukati ka-Samariya.
Mpawo mwami wa-Israyeli naakabona, wakabuzya Elisha kuti, Sa mbajaye, taata?
Wakati, Utabajayi pe. Sa ulayanda kujaya bantu mbowaniizya mubuzike kunguzu zyapanga lyako azyabuta bwako? Kobabambila insima amaanzi, kuti balye akunywa akwiinka kumwami wabo.
Mpawo wakababambila ipobwe ipati, nkabela nibakamana kulya akunywa, wakabapilusya kumwami wabo. Lino impi zyaba-Aramu teezyakaboola limbi kuzoosaala mucisi ca-Israyeli,
Pele nicakaba ciindi, Beni-hadadi mwami wa-Aramu wakayobolola basilumamba bakwe boonse, waakusinkinizya Samariya.

Aboobo kwakaba inzala impati mu-Samariya nkaambo kakusinkinizigwa, mane mutwe wambongolo wakaulwa mali aansiliva aali makumi aali musanu aatatu, acipanzi cane caceelelo cabufumba bwanziba caka ulwa mali aansiliva osanwe.
Lino mwami wa-Israyeli naakali kwiinda kumbali abulambo, umwi mwanakazi wakamulilila, wati, Undigwasye, O mwami simalelo wangu.
Wakavuwa kuti, Na Jehova takugwasyi, mebo ndakugwasya buti? Nkakugwasye kucipolelo nanka kucisinino cawaini?
Nkabela mwami wakamubuzya kuti, Waba anzi? Wakavuwa kuti, Oyu mwanakazi wakandaambila kuti, Leta mwanaako, tumulye sunu, lino mwanaangu tuyoomulya junza.
Aboobo twakajika mwanaangu, twamulya. Lino nibwakaca, ndakamwaambila kuti, Leta mwanaako ayebo, tumulye. Pele wakasisa mwana wakwe.
Mpawo mwami, naakamvwa majwi aamwanakazi, wakazapaula zyakusama zyakwe. (Wakali kwiinda kumbali abulambo, nkabela bantu bakabona kuti anyama yakwe ulisamide zisani zyamasaka.)
Lino wakati, Leza andicitile mbubonya na cakwiinda, na mutwe wa-Elisha mwana wa-Safati usyaale amakuko aakwe mane kusikila kumabbililo aazuba.
Elyo naakacili kwaambaula abo, mutumwa wakamusikila, wati, Aya mapenzi azwa kuli-Jehova, Sa ndakonzya kunoocilindila Jehova?

Mpawo silutwe, mwami ngwaakali kuyaamina ajanza lyakwe, wakavwiila muntu wa-Leza kuti, Jehova naakacita zimpalangwizyo mujulu, cintu eci sa nicaba? Wakati, Meso aako ayoobona, pele kulya tokooyoolya pe.
Na twaamba kuti, Atunjile mumunzi, lino inzala nkwiili, tulafwa. Alimwi na katukede mpoonya ano, tulafwa. Katuya kuzilao zyaba-Aramu, Na batubamba, tuyoopona. Na batujaya, tuyoofwa buyo.
Mpawo bakanyamuka ciindi calundindiwana, basika kumatalikilo aazilao zyaba-Aramu, pele bajana kuti taakwe muntu.

Nkaambo Mwami wakacita kuti basilumamba ba-Aramu baswiilile kuyoba kwankalaki akwamabbiza akuyoba kwampi impati, aboobo bakaamba umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina kuti, Bona! Mwami wa-Israyeli watamba bami baba-Hiti abami baEgepita kuti bazoomugwasye kutulwisya.
Mpawo bakanyampuka, bacija kuciindi eco calundindiwana, basia zilao zyabo amabbiza aabo ambongolo zyabo zyoonse mbuli mbuzibede, akucijisya maumi aabo kulufu.

Lino abo basicinsenda nibakasika kumatalikilo aazilao, bakanjila mucilao cimwi, balya, banywa, bagwisya insiliva angolida azyakusama, baakuzisisa, elyo bakaboola alimwi kucilao cimbi, bagwisya zintu mumonya, baakuzisisa.

Lino bakaya, baita basikulindila mulyango wamunzi, babalwiida kuti, Twasika kuzilao zyaba-Aramu, pele katakwe muntu nkuko niliba ijwi limvwigwa. Twajana mabbiza aangidwe ambongolo ziangidwe azilao zisiidwe mbuzibede.
Mpawo basikulindila mulyango bakaita, balwiida basiŋanda bamwami mukati.

Nkabela mwami wakabuka masiku, waambila balanda bakwe kuti, Amuswiilile! Ndamwaambila ba-Aramu mbubatucitila. Balizi kuti twafwa inzala, aboobo bazwa muzilao kuyooyuba musokwe, nkaambo balayeeya kuti, Bazwa buyo mumunzi tuyoobajata bacili baumi akuzunda munzi.

Lino umwi wabalanda bakwe wakavuwa kuti, Atubweze mabbiza osanwe akati kayaayo aacisyeede. (Nkaambo ayo asyaala ayooba mbubonya mbuli makamu aabantu ba-Israyeli bafwide kale), Atutume, tukabone makani mbwaabede.
Mpawo bakabweza basimabbiza bobile, nkabela mwami wakabatuma kuyootobela basilumamba baba-Aramu, wati, Kamuya, mukabone.
Lino bakabatobela mane kusikila ku-Jordano, nkabela bakajana kuti moonse munzila mulizwiide zyakusama azibelesyo ba-Aramu nzibakasowa mukucija kwabo, Elyo batumwa bakapiluka, baambila mwami,

Pele oyo silutwe mwami ngwa akali kuyaamina ajanza lyakwe, mwami wakamubika kuti kalanga mulyango, nkabela bantu bakamulyataula omo mumulyango mane wafwa, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lyamuntu wa-Leza ndyaakaamba ciindi eco mwami naakeza kumubona.

Cakaba mbubonya mbuli ijwi lyamuntu wa-Leza ndyaakaambila mwami, lyakuti, Zisuwo zyobile zyabbaale ziyooulwa isyekeli lyomwe, acisuwo cabusu butuba ciyooulwa isyekeli, mumulyango wa-Samariya junza mbuli eno.
Anukuti silutwe oyo wakavwiila muntu wa-Leza kuti, Jehova naakacita impalangwizyo mujulu, cintu eci sa nicaba? Nkabela wakati, Meso aako ayoobona, pele kulya tokooyoolya pe,
Cakamubeda mbubonya, nkaambo bantu bakamulyataula mumulyango mane wakafwa.
Mpawo mwanakazi wakanyamuka, wacita mbubonya mbuli muntu wa-Leza mbwaakamwaambila. Wakainka, walo abasikamukowa bakwe, kuyookala munyika yaba-Filisti myaka iili musanu aibili.
Elyo myaka iili musanu aibili niyakamana, mwanakazi wakaboola kuzwa kunyika yaba-Filisti, wasika kumwami kuzoobuzya Iŋanda yakwe amyuunda yakwe.
Nkabela mwami wakali kwaambaula a-Gehazi mulanda wamuntu wa-Leza. Wakati, Kondaambila milimo yoonse mipati Elisha njacita.

Aboobo wakali kwaambila mwami mbwaakabusya muntu mufu, nkabela mpoonya awo oyo mwanakazi ngwaakabusizya mwana wakwe mufu wakasika kuyoolilila mwami aaŋanda yakwe amyuunda yakwe. Lino Gehazi wakati, O mwami simalelo wangu, ngooyu mwanakazi, alimwi ngooyu mwana wakwe Elisha ngwaakabusya.

Elyo mwami naakamubuzya, mwanakazi wakamwaambila makani. Nkabela mwami wakamupa similimo umwi, wamulailila kuti, Kopilusizya mwanakazi imbono zyakwe zyoonse, amicelo yoonse yamyuunda yakwe kuzwa kubuzuba obo naakainka akusikila sunu.
Lino Elisha wakasika ku-Damasko, nkabela Beni-hadadi mwami waAramu wakaciswa. Elyo naakaambilwa kuti, Kwasika muntu wa-Leza okuno,
mwami wakaambila Hazaeli kuti, Tolelela acipo, ukacinge muntu wa-Leza, ukabuzye ijwi lya-Jehova kumulomo wakwe, tuzibe kuti na ndilapona kubulwazi obu.

Mpawo Hazaeli wakanyamuka kuyoomucinga, watolelela inkamele zili makumi one ziyumwide cipo cazintu zibotu zyoonse zyamu-Damasko. Nkabela naakasika nkwaakabede, wakaima kunembo lyakwe, wati, Mwanaako Beni-hadadi mwami wa-Aramu wandituma kulinduwe, wabuzya kuti, Sa ndilapona kubulwazi obu?
Elisha wakamwaambila kuti, Koya, ukamwaambile kuti, Kupona ulapona. Anukuti Jehova wandaambila kuti ncobeni ulafwa.
Lino wakamulangisya mane lumwi wakafwa insoni, alimwi muntu wa-Leza wakalila.

Mpawo Hazaeli wakabuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nolila, mwami? Wakavuwa kuti, Nkaambo kakuti ndizi bubi mboyoocitila bana ba-Israyeli. Minzi yabo miyumu uyooisaala, bakubusi babo babotu uyoobajazya ipanga, twana twabo uyootupwayaula, abanakazi babo baminsi uyoobapandula.
Lino Hazaeli wakati, Ma! Sa ndi mubwa ndemulanda wako? Nkacite buti malweza aali boobo? Elisha wakati, Jehova wandi tondezya kuti nduwe uyooba mwami wa-Aramu.
Mpawo naakazwa kuli-Elisha, wakasika kulisimalelo aakwe. Wakabuzya kuti, Ino Elisha wakwaambilanzi? Wakavuwa kuti, Wandaambila kuti kupona uyoopona.
Lino nibwakaca, wakabweza ingubo, wainika mumaanzi, waiyanika ameso aakwe mane wafwa. Aboobo Hazaeli wakalya bwami bwakwe.
Kajisi myaka iili makumi otatwe aibili naakatalika kweendelezya, nkabela wakeendelezya myaka iili musanu aitatu mu-Jerusalemu.
Wakeenda munzila zyabami ba-Israyeli, mbubonya mbubakacita basiluzubo ba-Ahabu, nkaambo kakwete mwana musimbi wa-Ahabu, Wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova.
Nekubaboobo Jehova teewakayanda kunyonyoona cisi caJuda nkaambo ka-Davida mulanda wakwe, nkaambo wakasyomezya kumupa mumuni, abalo bana bakwe, mazuba oonse.
Elyo Joramu wakainda ku-Zairi, ankalaki zyakwe zyoonse, nkabela wakabuka masiku, wanyonyoona ba-Edomu ibakamuzyungulukide abasilutwe bankalaki, pele bantu bakacijila kumaanda aabo,
Mbuboobo ba-Edomu mbubakapapila bwami bwa-Juda, asunu mbubacibede. Lino ba-Libina abalo bakapapila kuciindi eco nciconya.
Lino makani amwi aa-Joramu, ancito zyakwe zyoonse nzyaakacita, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda?
Nkabela Joramu naakafwa, wakazikwa mumunzi wa-Davida nkubakazikidwe bamawisi, elyo Ahaziya mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Mumwaka wakumi aibili wabwami bwa-Joramu mwana wa-Ahabu mwami wa-Israyeli, Ahaziya mwana wa-Joramu wakaba mwami wacisi ca-Juda.
Ahaziya kajisi myaka iili makumi obile aibili naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mwaka omwe mu-Jerusalemu. Izina lyabanyina bakali Ataliya mwana wa-Omri mwami wa-Israyeli.
Nkabela wakeenda munzila yaluzubo lwa-Ahabu, wacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbubakacita basiluzubo lwa-Ahabu, nkaambo kali mukwaansa wa-Ahabu,
Wakaya a-Joramu mwana wa-Ahabu kuyoolwisya Hazaeli mwami waAramu ku-Ramoti-Gileadi, pele ba-Aramu bakayasa Joramu.

Elyo mwami Joramu wakaboola ku-Jezreeli kuti asilikwe nkaambo kanjase nzyaakayaswa kumaanza aaba-Aramu ku-Rama naakali kulwisya Hazaeli mwami wa-Aramu. Lino Ahaziya mwana wa-Joramu mwami wa-Juda wakainka kuyoobona Joramu mwana wa-Ahabu ku-Jezreeli, nkaambo kakuti wakaciswa.
Wasika buyo, langaula Jehu mwana wa-Josafati mwana wa-Nimsi, lino umunyampusye akati kabeenzinyina akumunjizya muŋanda yamukati.

Mpawo uleelede kubweza insazi yamafuta, akumutila amutwe, alimwi komwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ndakunanika kuti ube mwami wa-Israyeli. Wamana buyo kwaamba obo, jalula mulyango, ucije. Utalindili pe.
Mpawo oyo mulombe musinsimi wakainka ku-Ramoti-Gileadi.
Asike buyo, wajana kuti basilutwe bampi balikede. Lino wakati, Ndijisi cakukwaambila, O silutwe. Nkabela Jehu wakabuzya kuti, Nguli ngoyanda akati kandiswe toonse? Wakavuwa kuti, Nduwe O silutwe.
Mpawo wakanyampuka, wanjila muŋanda, elyo wakamutila mafuta amutwe, wati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Ndakunanika kuti ube mwami wabantu ba-Leza, ba-Israyeli.
Lino uleelede kunyonyoona luzubo lwa-Ahabu simalelo wako, kuti nkaliye inkoto kuli-Jezebeli yabulowa bwabalanda bangu basinsimi ayabulowa bwabalanda boonse ba-Jehova.
Luzubo loonse lwa-Ahabu luyoonyonyooka. Njoomanisizya Ahabu bana boonse basankwa, nibaba bazike nibaba balubusi bamu-Israyeli.
Nkabela njoocita kuti luzubo lwa-Ahabu lube mbubonya mbuli luzubo lwa-­Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati ambuli luzubo lwa-Basa mwana wa-Ahija.
Alakwe Jezebeli babwa bayoomulya mumuunda wa-Jezreeli; takukooyooba muntu uumuzika.
Amane buyo kwaamba obo, wakajalula mulyango, wacija.
Elyo Jehu naakazwa kubalanda bamwami wakwe, bakamubuzya kuti, Sa kuli kabotu? Oyu sizilengano wakazidanzi kulinduwe? Wakati, Mulimuzi oyo muntu ambwaamba.
Bakati, Ne! Wabeja. Kotulwiida makani, Elyo wakaamba kuti, Ngaaya makani ngaakandaambila. Wati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ndakunanika kuti ube mwami wa-Israyeli.
Mpawo bakafwambaana kubweza umwi aumwi cikobela cakwe, bazibika kunsi lyakwe awo amatantilo mpaakakede, alimwi bakalizya mweembo akwaamba kuti, Jehu ngumwami.
Mbuboobo Jehu mwana wa-Josafati mwana wa-Nimsi mbwaakavwiya Joramu. (Joramu wakali kulindila ku-Ramoti-Gileadi, aba-Israyeli boonse, nkaambo ka-Hazaeli mwami wa-Aramu.

Pele mwami Joramu wakaboola ku-Jezreeli kuti asilikwe nkaambo kanjase nzyaakayaswa kumaanza aabaAramu naakali kulwisya Hazaeli mwami wa-Aramu.) Lino Jehu wakati, Na ncobeni myoyo yanu ilayanda obo, kutabi naba omwe uuloboka mumunzi kuyooamba makani ku-Jezreeli.
Mpawo Jehu wakatanta munkalaki, waya ku-Jezreeli, nkwaakalede Joramu. Alakwe Ahaziya mwami wa-Juda kazide kuswaya Joramu.

Lino mulindizi wakaliimvwi angazi yaku-Jezreeli, nkabela naakabona impumba ya-Jehu ileza wakati, Ndabona impumba yabantu. Mpawo Joramu wakati, Amubweze sibbiza, mumutume kuyoobacinga, ababuzye kuti, Sa mweza aluumuno?

Elyo sibbiza wakainka kuyoobacinga, wabuzya kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami. Sa mweza aluumuno? Lino Jehu wakaamba kuti, Ulacitanzi aluumuno webo? Piluka, ututobele, Mpawo mulindizi wakaamba kuti, Mutumwa wasika kulimbabo, pele kuboola tabooli ne.
Lino bakatuma sibbiza wabili. Alakwe naakasika kulimbabo wakati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami. Sa mweza aluumuno? Pele Jehu wakati, Ulacitanzi aluumuno webo? Piluka, ututobele.
Mpawo mulindizi wakaamba kuti, Kusika wasika kulimbabo pele tabooli ne. Alimwi kweenzya ndikubwene mbukubede, kuli mbuli kweenzya kwa-Jehu mwana wa-Nimsi, nkaambo uleenzya cakulitakata.
Lino Joramu naakabona Jehu, wakabuzya kuti, Sa weza aluumuno, Jehu? Wakati, Kulaba buti luumuno, mavuule aabanyoko Jezebeli amalozi aakwe naacili manji?
Mpawo Joramu wakapiluka, wacija, waambila Ahaziya kuti, Ma! Nduuni olu, O Ahaziya!
Nkabela Jehu wakafusa buta bwakwe canguzu, wayasa Joramu andelo, aboobo muvwi wakatulula moyo wakwe, wawida munkalaki.

Elyo Jehu wakaambila Bidakara silutwe wakwe kuti, Umugwisye, umuwaale mucaabilo canyika ca-Naboti mu-Jezreeli, nkaambo sa toyeeyi ciindi eco nitwakatantide, webo ambebo, kutobela wisi Ahabu, ndijwi eli ndilyonya Jehova ndyaakaamba aanguwe?

Wakati, Jilo ndakabona bulowa bwa-Naboti abulowa bwabana bakwe, mbwaamba Jehova; lino njoomuliya inkoto mpoonya awa amuunda oyu, mbwaamba Jehova. Lino amumugwisye, mumuwaale mumuunda, mbubonya mbwaakaamba Jehova.
Lino balanda bakwe bakamubweza munkalaki yakwe kumutola ku-Jerusalemu, bamuzika mukabanda kakwe antoomwe abamawisi mumunzi wa-Davida.
Mumwaka wakumi aumwi wabwami bwa-Joramu mwana wa-Ahabu, Ahaziya naakatalika kweendelezya cisi ca-Juda.
Mpawo Jehu naakanjila mumulyango, wakamubuzya kuti, Sa weza aluumuno, o Zimri, O sikujaya simalelo wako?
Wakaululala kumpalangwizyo, wabuzya kuti, Mbobani bayanda ndime? Mbani? Nkabela kwakamuzuminina basimilimo bobile nanka botatwe.
Wakabaambila kuti, Amumuwaale ansi. Lino bakamuwaala ansi, nkabela bulowa bwakwe bwakasapaika abulambo amabbiza, alimwi akamulyataula.
Lino wakanjila, walya, wanywa. Mpawo wakati, Amumubweze oyu mwanakazi uutukidwe, mumuzike, nkaambo ngumwana wamwami.
Pele nibakasi muzike, katakwe ncibakajana cita kapapa kaboongo azituta zyamaulu azyamaboko.
Elyo nibakapiluka kuzoomwaambila makani, wakuti, Ndendilyo ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaamba kumulomo wamulanda wakwe Eliya waku-Tisibe, lyakuti, Babwa bayoolya nyama ya-Jezebeli mumuunda wa-Jezreeli.
Mutunta wa-Jezebeli uyooba mbuli bufumba buyo bulede anyika yamuunda wakuJezreeli, aboobo takukooyooba muntu uukonzya kuziba kuti oyu nguJezebeli.
Mwatambula buyo olu lugwalo, bana basimalelo wanu mbumuli abo, alimwi mbuli mbumujisi inkalaki amabbiza, amunzi muyumu azilwisyo,
amusale muntu mubotu uululeme akati kabana basimalelo wanu, mumukazike acuuno cabwami cawisi, mulwide luzubo lwasimalelo wanu.
Pele bakayoowa loko, bati, Bami bobile bakakacilwa kwiimikila kunembo lyakwe, lino iswe tulaima buti?

Mpawo mulindizi waŋanda amulindizi wamunzi abapati basikulela bana bakatuma kuli-Jehu, bati, Tuli balanda bako. Kufumbwa ncotulailila tulacicita. Tatukoobika mwami pe. Kocita kufumbwa cibota mumeso aako.

Elyo wakabalembela lugwalo lwabili, wati, Na ncobeni muli kulubbazu lwangu, alimwi na mwazumina kucita ncindailila, lino amukosole mitwe yabana basimalelo wanu, muze ayo kulindime ku-Jezreeli junza mbuli eno.
Lino bana bamwami kabali makumi aali musanu aabili, kabali abapati bamunzi ibakali kubalela.
Mpawo nibakatambula lugwalo, bakabweza bana bamwami, babajaya boonse bali makumi aali musanu aabili, babika mitwe yabo mumitanga, akwiituma kulinguwe ku-Jezreeli.
Lino mutumwa naakamulwiida kuti, Baleta mitwe yabana bamwami, wakati, Amwiilundike zilwi zyobile kumulyango wamunzi mane buce.
Lino nibwakaca, wakaya anze, waima, waambila bantu boonse kuti, Inywe tamujisi mulandu, Ndime ndakavwiya simalelo wangu akumujaya. Pele nguni wakanyonyoona aba boonse?
Amuzibe kuti takukooyooloba ijwi niliba lyomwe akati kamajwi aa-Jehova ngaakaamba aaluzubo lwa-Ahabu. Jehova wacita ncobeni mbubonya mbwaakaamba kumulomo wamulanda wakwe Eliya.
Mbuboobo Jehu mbwaakanyonyoona basiluzubo boonse ba-Ahabu ibakasyeede mu-Jezreeli, bapati bakwe abazolwani bakwe abapaizi bakwe boonse, mane lumwi teekwakasyaala naba omwe uucipona.
Mpawo wakanyamuka kuya ku-Samariya, nkabela naakacili munzila, ku-Beti-Ekedi nkubabede beembezi,
Jehu wakaswanaana abasimukowa ba-Ahaziya mwami wa-Juda. Lino wakababuzya kuti, Ndinywe bani? Bakavuwa kuti, Tuli basimukowa ba-Ahaziya. Tweza kukuswaya bana bamwami abana babanyina besu.
Elyo wakati, Amubajate buume. Bakabajata buume. Nkabela wakabajaya kumukalo waku-Beti-Ekedi, bantu bali makumi one ababili. Takakasia naba omwe.
Wakati, Twiinke ayebo, ubone busungu bwangu muli-Jehova. Lino wakamutolelela munkalaki yakwe,
lumwi wakasika ku-Samariya. Nkabela ku-Samariya wakanyonyoona boonse ibakasyeede baluzubo lwa-Ahabu. Taakwe naakasia naba omwe, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaambila Eliya.

Lino amundiitile basinsimi boonse ba-Baala abalanda bakwe boonse abapaizi bakwe boonse, Kutabi naba omwe uubulika, nkaambo ndijisi cipaizyo cipati cakutuulila Baala. Kufumbwa muntu uubulika takoopona pe, Pele Jehu wakacita calweeno kuti anyonyoone boonse basikukomba Baala.
Elyo Jehu wakati, Amubambile Baala imbungano iisalala, Bakacita obo.

Lino Jehu wakatuma muzisi zyoonse zya-Israyeli, aboobo basikukomba Baala bakasika boonse, katakwe naba omwe iwakabula kusika, Lino bakanjila muŋanda ya-Baala, mane iŋanda ya-Baala yakazula mwa kuzwa kumagolelo akusikila kumagolelo.
Mpawo wakaambila sikulanga zyakusama kuti, Ugwisye zikobela, bazisame boonse basikukomba Baala, Elyo wakazigwisya.
Lino jehu wakanjila muŋanda ya-Baala, kali a-Jonadabu mwana waRekabu. Wakaambila basikukomba Baala kuti, Amulangaule, kuti kutabi anywe basikukomba Jehova, pele basikukomba Baala luzutu.
Mpawo wakanjila kuyootuula zituuzyo azipaizyo.
Lino anze Jehu kabikide bantu bali makumi aa musanu aatatu, Wakabaambila kuti, Kufumbwa muntu uulobosya muntu naba omwe akati kabaabo mbenti abe mumaanza aanu, uyooswekelwa buumi bwakwe.

Lino amane buyo kutuula cipaizyo, Jehu wakaambila basikulindila abasilutwe kuti, Amunjile, mubajaye. Kutabi muntu naba omwe uuloboka, Nkabela bakabajazya ipanga, alimwi basikulindila abasilutwe bakabawaala anze, elyo bakanjila muŋanda ya-Baala yamukati,
bagwisya cilende caBaala, bacitenta,
Bakamwaya cilende ca-Baala, alimwi bakamwaya iŋanda ya-Baala, akwiicita cimbuzi, mbwiicibede asunu.
Mbuboobo jehu mbwaakanyonyoona inkombelo ya-Baala mucisi caIsrayeli.
Pele zibi zya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati nzyaakacitya baIsrayeli, Jehu taakwe naakazileka pe, nkukuti boombe bangolida ibakali ku-Beteli aku-Dani.
Pele Jehu teewakabika moyo woonse kukweenda mumulao wa-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli pe, nkaambo taakwe naakaleka zibi zyaJeroboamu nzyaakacitya ba-Israyeli.
kuzwa ku-Jordano kujwe, nyika yoonse ya-Gileadi, ba-Gadi aba-Rubeni aba-Manase, kuzwa ku-Aroeri uuli kumbali lya-Arinoni, cisi coonse ca-Gileadi aca-Basana.
Lino makani amwi aa-Jehu, ancito zyakwe nzyaakacita, anguzu zyakwe, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli?
Lino Jehu naakafwa, bakamuzika mu-Samariya, nkabela Jehoazi mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Ciindi cabwami bwa-Jehu mucisi ca-Israyeli, ncaakeendelezya mu-Samariya cakaba myaka iili makumi obile amusanu aitatu.

Pele Jeho­ seba mwana musimbi wamwami Joramu, mucizi wa-Ahaziya, wakabweza Joasi mwana wa-Ahaziya, wamulobosya akati kabana bamwami ibakati jayigwe, wamubika amuleli wakwe muŋanda yakoona, wamusisa kumeso aa-Ataliya, aboobo takwakajayigwa.
Nkabela wakali awe muŋanda yaJehova, uliyubide, myaka iili musanu aumwi, Ataliya naakali kweendelezya cisi.
Elyo wakabalailila kuti, Mbuboobu mbumweelede kucita. Akati kankamu zyanu zyotatwe, inkamu yabaabo banjila buzuba bwa-Sabata kukulanga iŋanda yamwami,
(inkamu imwi niicili kumulyango wa-Suri, aimwi yatatu niicili kusule lyamulyango wabalindizi), baleelede kulanga iŋanda yabwami,
ankamu zimwi zyobile zyabaabo basika buzuba bwa-Sabata kukulanga iŋanda ya-Jehova balange mwami.
Baleelede kumuzyunguluka mwami, umwi aumwi uli azilwisyo zyakwe mujanza lyakwe, nkabela kufumbwa muntu uuswenenena kumilongo uleelede kujayigwa, Amube amwami ciindi cakuzwa aciindi cakunjila.
Elyo mupaizi wakaaba mumaanza aabasilutwe masumo azilwisyo izyakali zyamwami Davida, izyakali muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Nkabela balindizi bakaliimvwi, umwi aumwi azilwisyo zyakwe mujanza lyakwe, kuzwa kulubbazu lwalulyo lwaŋanda mane kusikila kulubbazu lwalumwensi lwaŋanda, cakuzyunguluka cipaililo aŋanda.
Mpawo wakagwisya mwana wamwami, wamubikila munsini, wamupa ibbuku lyamulongo wa-Leza, aboobo bakamupa bwami, bamunanika, bakamba, akwaamba kuti, Aongole mwami.

Nkabela naakalanga, wakabona mwami uliimvwi kumbali lyacilende, mbubonya mbuli ciyanza mbucibede, abasilutwe abasimyeembo baliimvwi kumbali lyamwami, abantu boonse bacisi balatangala akulizya myeembo. Mpawo Ataliya wakazapaula zyakusama zyakwe, wakwiila kuti, Ndaabwa! Ndaabwa!
Elyo Jehoyada mupaizi wakalailila basilutwe bampi kuti, Amumutande anze lyamindando, lino kufumbwa muntu uumutobela amujazye ipanga, Nkaambo mupaizi wakati, Atajayigwi muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Aboobo bakabika maanza alinguwe, nkabela wakainda munzila yabasimabbiza kuya kuŋanda yamwami, oko nkwaakajayilwa.

Mpawo bantu boonse banyika bakainka kuŋanda ya-Baala akwiimwaya. Zipaililo zyakwe azikozyano zyoonse bakazivwinyauna, alakwe Matani mupaizi wa-Baala bakamujaya mpoonya awo anembo lyacipaililo, Alimwi mupaizi wakabika bantu kuti balindile iŋanda ya-Jehova.

Lino wakatolelela basilutwe aba-Kari abalindizi abantu boonse banyika, nkabela bakagwisya mwami kuŋanda ya-Jehova, bainda kunzila yamulyango wabalindizi, akumusisya kuŋanda yabwami, aboobo wakakala acuuno cabwami.
Elyo bantu boonse banyika bakakondwa, awalo munzi kotontwede, Ataliya naakamana kujayigwa apanga kuŋanda yamwami.
Joasi kali amyaka iili musanu aibili naakaba mwami.
Lino Joasi wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova mazuba oonse ngaakali kupona, nkaambo Jehoyada mupaizi wakali kumulaya.
Nekubaboobo zipaililo zyakuzilundu taakwe naakazigwisya pe; bantu bakacili kupaila akutenta tununkilizyo kulinzizyo.
bapaizi baatambule, umwi aumwi kumaanza aabazolwani bakwe, bamamike iŋanda kufumbwa nkwiielede kumamikwa.
Elyo mwami Joasi wakaita Jehoyada mupaizi abapaizinyina, wababuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi tamuna kumamika iŋanda? Lino amuleke kutambula mali kubazolwani banu, mwaalete kukumamika iŋanda.
Mpawo bapaizi bakazumina kuleka kutambula mali kubantu, alimwi kutamamika iŋanda.
Lino nibakabona kuti mali aamubbokesi avula, mulembi wamwami amupaizi mupati bali kusika kuzoobala akwaanga mali aakajanwa muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Mali amane kubalwa, bakaaba mumaanza aabasimilimo ibakali kulanga iŋanda ya-Jehova, abalo bakabbadela basikubeza zisamu abayaki ibakali kubeleka muŋanda ya-Jehova,
abasikubumba zitina abasikubeza mabwe, akuula zisamu, amabwe aabezedwe aakumamika iŋanda ya-Jehova, azintu zimwi izyakayandika kuŋanda.
Pele ayo mali aakaletwa muŋanda ya-Jehova taakwe naakabelesegwa kucitya mitiba yansiliva, nituba tugele, niiba migaano, niiba myeembo, niziba zibelesyo zimwi zyangolida na zyansiliva.
Akapegwa basimilimo, kuti baabelesye kukumamika iŋanda ya-Jehova.
Nkabela abo bantu mbubakaabila mali aakubbadela basimilimo, teebakabuzya makani aamali mbwaabelesegwa pe, nkaambo bantu bakalisyomekede.
Pele mali aazipaizyo zyamilandu azipaizyo zyazibi taakwe naakaletwa muŋanda ya-Jehova pe, akali aabapaizi.

Mpawo Joasi mwami wa-Juda wakabweza zintu zyoonse zisalala nzibakasalazizye Josafati a-Joramu aAhaziya bamawisi, bami ba-Juda, azintu nzyaakasalazizye mwini, angolida yoonse iyakajanwa muziyobwedo zyaŋanda ya-Jehova azyaŋanda yamwami, wazituma kuli-Hazaeli mwami wa-Aramu, aboobo Hazaeli wakaleka kuya kuyoolwisya Jerusalemu.
Lino makani amwi aa-Joasi, ancito zyakwe zyoonse, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda na?
Elyo balanda bakwe bakabusya inkondo, bavwiya, bamujaya Joasi muŋanda ya-Milo iili munzila iiya ku-Silo.
Jozakara mwana wa-Simeati a-Jozabadi mwana wa-Someri balanda bakwe mbobakamujaya. Lino naakafwa, bakamuzika abamawisi mumunzi wa-Davida, nkabela mwanaakwe Amaziya nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Mumwaka wamakumi obile aitatu wabwami bwa-Joasi mwana waAhaziya mwami wa-Juda, Jehoazi mwana wa-Jehu wakaba mwami wa-Israyeli mu-Samariya, nkabela wakeendelezya myaka iili ikumi amusanu aibili.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, watobela zibi zyaJeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati nzyaakacitya ba-Israyeli. Taakwe naakazileka pe.
Lino bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila ba-Israyeli, aboobo wakabaaba mumaanza aa-Hazaeli mwami wa-Aramu amumaanza aa-Benihadadi mwana wa-Hazaeli mazuba oonse.
Mpawo Jehoazi wakalibombya kubusyu bwa-Jehova, nkabela Jehova wakamuswiilila, nkaambo wakabona kuti ba-Israyeli balipengede, nkaambo mwami wa-Aramu wakali kubapenzya.
Elyo Jehova wakabusizya Israyeli muyuni wakubavuna mumaanza aabaAramu, aboobo ba-Israyeli bakakala mumaanda aabo mbubonya mbuli lyoonse.
Nekubaboobo teebakaleka zibi zyaluzubo lwa-Jeroboamu nzyaakacitya ba-Israyeli, bakacili kweenda mulinzizyo, azyalo zifwanikisyo zyamituni zyakacili wo mu-Samariya.

Nkaambo Jehoazi taakwe naakasyaalilwa bantu, cita basimabbiza bali makumi osanwe ankalaki zili ikumi abasimyeendo bali zyuulu zili ikumi, nkaambo mwami wa-Aramu wakabanyonyoona akubacita mbuli lusuko lwacipolelo.
Lino makani amwi aa-Jehoazi, ancito zyakwe zyoonse, anguzu zyakwe, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli?
Elyo Jehoazi naakafwa, wakazikwa mu-Samariya, nkabela mwanaakwe Joasi nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Mumwaka wamakumi otatwe amusanu aibili wabwami bwa-Joasi mwami wa-Juda, Joasi mwana wa-Jehoazi wakaba mwami wa-Israyeli muSamariya, nkabela wakeendelezya myaka iili ikumi amusanu aumwi.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, Taakwe naakaleka abuniini zibi zya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati nzyaakacitya ba-Israyeli, Wakeenda mulinzizyo.
Lino makani amwi aa-Joasi, azyoonse nzyaakacita, anguzu zyakwe nzyaakalwisya Amaziya mwami wa-Juda, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli?
Elyo Joasi naakafwa, Jeroboamu nguwakalya bwami. Nkabela Joasi wakazikwa mu-Samariya antoomwe abami ba-Israyeli,
Elyo Elisha wakamwaambila kuti, Bweza buta amivwi. Wakabweza buta amivwi.
Lino wakaambila mwami wa-Israyeli kuti, Bika ijanza lyako abuta. Elyo wakabika ijanza lyakwe alimbubo, alakwe Elisha wakabika maanza aakwe atala amaanza aamwami.

Alimwi wakati, Amujalule impalangwizyo­ yakujwe. Bamane buyo kujalula, Elisha wakati, Fusa. Mpawo wakafusa, nkabela Elisha wakati, Ngooyu muvwi waluzundo lwa-Jehova, muvwi wakuzunda ba-Aramu, Uyookoma ba-Aramu mu-Afeki mane lumwi ukabamaninizye.
Alimwi wakati, Bweza mivwi. Wakaibweza, Lino wakaambila mwami wa-Israyeli kuti, Iumye ansi. Wakaiumya ziindi zyotatwe, waleka.

Mpawo muntu wa-Leza wakamukalalila, wati, Weelede kuuma ziindi zyosanwe nanka ziindi zili musanu acimwi. Nowacita obo nowazunda ba-Aramu mane kubamaninizya, anukuti lino uyoobazunda ziindi zyotatwe buyo.
Lino bumwi buzuba nibakali kuzika muntu, kwakaboneka basikusaala, mpawo bakawaala mutunta mukabanda ka-Elisha, Elyo mutunta ugume buyo zifuwa zya-­Elisha, muntu wakaputuzya, waima amaulu aakwe.

Pele Jehova wakabafwida luzyalo, wabeetelela, akupiluka kulimbabo, nkaambo kacizuminano cakwe ncaakatangana a-Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo, Takwakayanda kubafwidilizya pe, nikuba kubatandilila, mbucicibede asunu.
Mpawo Hazaeli mwami wa-Aramu naakafwa, Beni-hadadi mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.

Elyo Joasi mwana wa-Jehoazi wakanyanzya alimwi mujanza lya-Beni-hadadi mwana wa-Hazaeli minzi eyo njaakanyanzizye munkondo kumaanza aawisi Jehoazi. Ziindi zyotatwe Joasi wakamuzunda, aboobo wakaliboozezya minzi ya-Israyeli.
Kali amyaka iili makumi obile amusanu naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili makumi obile amusanu aine. Izina lyabanyina bakali Joadana waku-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova, pele kuteelana awisi Davida. Wakacita mbubonya mbwaakacita Joasi wisi.
Pele zipaililo zyakuzilundu teezyakagwisigwa pe. Bantu bakacili kupaila akutenta tununkilizyo kulinzizyo.
Lino bwami nibwakasimpisya mumaanza aakwe, wakajaya abo balanda bakwe ibakajayide wisi mwami.

Pele bana babasikujaya takabajayide pe, mbubonya mbukulembedwe mubbuku lyamulao wa-Musa, Jehova mbwaakalailila kuti, Bawisi tabeelede kujayigwa nkaambo kabana babo, abalo bana tabeelede kujayigwa nkaambo kabamawisi, pele umwi aumwi uleelede kufwida zibi zyakwe mwini.

Pele Joasi mwami wa-Israyeli wakatumina Amaziya mwami wa-Juda mulazyo wakuti, Kakoka ikakali ku-Lebano kakatumina musamu wakedari waku-Lebano, kati, Utupe mwana wako musimbi, kuti mwanaangu mulombe amukwate. Mpawo kwakainda cinyama camusokwe caku-Lebano, calyataula kakoka.
Uwe wazunda ba-Edomu, aboobo moyo wako walisumpula. Obu bulemu bukuzulile. Kala kumaanda. Nkaambonzi noyanda kubusya inkondo? Uyoowa omwini acisi ca-Juda coonse.
Nkabela ba-Juda bakakomwa kubusyu bwaba-Israyeli akucija umwi aumwi kumunzi wakwe.

Mpawo Joasi mwami wa-Israyeli wakajata Amaziya mwana wa-Joasi mwana wa-Ahaziya mwami wa-Juda nkukonya ku-Betisemesi, alimwi wakasika ku-Jerusalemu, akumwaya bulambo bwa-Jerusalemu kuzwa ku-Mulyango wa-Efraimu akusikila ku-Mulyango wakucooko, tukokola tuli myanda yone.
Nkabela wakatola ingolida yoonse, ansiliva, azibelesyo zyoonse izyakajanwa muŋanda ya-Jehova amuziyobwedo zyaŋanda yamwami, abasimubwaange, wainka abo ku-Samariya.
Lino Joasi naakafwa, wakazikwa muSamariya antoomwe abami ba-Israyeli, elyo Jeroboamu mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Lino makani amwi aa-Amaziya sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda?
Elyo bakamuvwiya mu-Jerusalemu, aboobo wakacijila ku-Lakisi, pele akwalo ku-Lakisi bakatuma basikumutobela, akumujaya nkuko.
Lino bakaleta mutunta wakwe amabbiza, aboobo wakazikwa mu-Jerusalemu, mumunzi wa-Davida mubakazikwa bamawisi.
Mpawo bantu boonse ba-Juda bakabweza Azariya, iwakajisi myaka iili ikumi amusanu aumwi, bamupa bwami mucimanga cawisi Amaziya.
Ngonguwe iwakayakulula Elati akuuboozya mumaanza aaba-Juda kusule lyalufu lwamwami.
Mumwaka wakumi amusanu wabwami bwa-Amaziya mwana wa-Joasi mwami wa-Juda, Jeroboamu mwana wa-Joasi wakaba mwami wa-Israyeli mu-Samariya. Wakeendelezya myaka iili makumi one aumwi.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova. Taakwe naakaleka zibi zyoonse zyamuselaakwe mwana wa-Nebati nzyaakacitya ba-Israyeli.

Alimwi wakaboozya mugaano wacisi ca-Israyeli nkukonya nkuwakabede ciindi. Nyika yakazwa kumanjililo aa-Hamati akusikila kulwizi lwa-Araba, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli ndyaakaamba kumulomo wamulanda wakwe musinsimi Jona mwana wa-Amitai waku-Gati-heferi.
Nkaambo Jehova wakabona kuti mapenzi aa-Israyeli alalula luu, alimwi taakwe iwakasyeede, naba mulubusi naba muzike, alimwi taakwe sikugwasya ba-Israyeli.
Pele Jehova takakaamba kuti njoosansamuna izina lya-Israyeli ansi ano pe, nkaambo kako wakabavuna kujanza lya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Joasi.
Elyo Jeroboamu naakazikwa mukabanda abamawisi bami ba-Israyeli, Zekariya mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Kajisi myaka iili ikumi amusanu aumwi naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili makumi osanwe aibili, Izina lyabanyina kabali Jekoliya waku-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova, mbubonya mbwaakacita wisi Amaziya.
Pele zipaililo zyakuzilundu teezyakagwisigwa pe. Bantu bakacili kupaila akutenta tununkilizyo alinzizyo.

Nkabela Jehova wakaumya mwami bulwazi bwacinsenda mane kusikila kulufu lwakwe aboobo kakede muŋanda yakwe alike, amakani aaŋanda yabwami akali mumaanza aa-Jotamu mwana wamwami, nguwakali kubeteka bantu banyika.
Lino makani amwi aa-Azariya, azyoonse nzyaakacita, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda?
Elyo Azariya naakafwa, bakamuzika abamawisi mumunzi wa­-Davida, nkabela Jotamu mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Mumwaka wamakumi otatwe amusanu aitatu wabwami bwa-Azariya mwami wa-Juda, Zekariya mwana wa-Jeroboamu wakaba mwami waIsrayeli, Wakeendelezya mu-Samariya myezi iili musanu aumwi.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, mbubonya mbubakacita bamawisi. Taakwe naakaleka zibi zya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati nzyaakacitya baIsrayeli.
Elyo Salumu mwana wa-Jabesi wakamuvwiya, wamuuma ku­-Jibleamu, wamujaya, akutola bwami bwakwe.
Lino makani amwi aa-Zekariya alilembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli.
Ndendilyo ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaambila jehu, lyakuti, Bana bako bamusela wane bayookala acuuno cabwami bwa-Israyeli. Ncobeni cakaba obo.
Elyo Menahemu mwana wa-Gadi wakazwa ku-Tiriza, wasika ku-Samariya, wajaya Salumu mwana wa-Jabesi nkukonya ku-Samariya, akulya bwami bwakwe.
Makani amwi aa-Salumu, akuvwiya kwakwe nkwaakavwiya, alilembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli.
Mumwaka wamakumi otatwe amusanu aine wabwami bwa-Azariya mwami wa-Juda, Menahemu mwana wa-Gadi wakaba mwami wa-Israyeli, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Samariya myaka iili ikumi.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova. Mazuba oonse ngaakapona taakwe naakaleka zibi zya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati nzyaakacitya ba-Israyeli.
Elyo Puli mwami wa-Asuri wakasika kuzoolwisya nyika, nkabela Menahemu wakapa Puli matalenta aansiliva aali cuulu, kuti amugwasye kukuyumya bwami bwakwe.

Ayo mali wakaajana kuba-Israyeli, nkukuti kubantu boonse bavubi. Umwi aumwi wakaleta masyekeli aansiliva aali makumi osanwe aakupa mwami wa-Asuri. Mpawo mwami wa-Asuri wakapiluka, taakwe naakakala munyika.
Lino makani amwi aa-Menahemu, azyoonse nzyaakacita, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli P
Elyo Menahemu naakafwa, Pekahiya mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aaJehova, taakwe naakaleka zibi zya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati nzyaakacilya ba-Israyeli.
Elyo silutwe wakwe Peka mwana wa-Remaliya wakamuvwiya, antoomwe abantu bali makumi osanwe ba-Gileadi, wamujaya mu-Samariya muŋanda yabwami. Amane kumujaya, wakalya bwami bwakwe.
Lino makani amwi aa-Pekahiya, azyoonse nzyaakacita, alilembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli,
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, taakwe naakaleka zibi zya-Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati nzyaakacitya ba-Israyeli.
Mpawo Hosea mwana wa-Ela wakavwiya Peka mwana wa-Remaliya, wamuuma, wamujaya, akulya bwami bwakwe mumwaka wamakumi obile wabwami bwa-Jotamu mwana wa-Uziya.
Lino makani amwi aa-Peka, azyoonse nzyaakacita, alilembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Israyeli,
Kajisi myaka iili makumi obile amusanu naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili ikumi amusanu aumwi. Izina lyabanyina bakali Jerusa mwana wa-Zadoki.
Nkabela wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova, mbubonya mbwaakacita Uziya wisi.
Pele zipaililo zyakuzilundu teezyakagwisigwa, Bantu bakacili kupaila akutenta tununkilizyo kulinzizyo, Ngonguwe wakayaka mulyango waajulu waŋanda ya-Jehova,
Lino makani amwi aa-Jotamu, azyoonse nzyaakacita, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda?
Kuciindi eco Jehova wakatalika kubusya Rezini mwami wa-Aramu a-Peka mwana wa-Remaliya kuti balwisye cisi ca-Juda.
Elyo Jotamu naakafwa, wakazikwa abamawisi mumunzi wa-Davida wisi, nkabela mwanaakwe Ahazi wakalya izina lyakwe.

Ahazi kajisi myaka iili makumi obile naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya muJerusalemu myaka iili ikumi amusanu aumwi. Pele taakwe naakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova Leza wakwe mbuli mbwaakacita Davida wisi.
Wakeenda munzila zyabami ba-Israyeli. Alimwi wakatuuzya mwana wakwe mumulilo mbubonya mbuli ziyanza zisesemya zyabamasi Jehova mbaakatanda kubusyu bwabana ba-Israyeli,
Wakali kupaila akutenta tununkilizyo azipaililo zyakuzilundu amunsi amisamu yoonse mitete.
Kuciindi eco nciconya mwami wa-Edomu wakaboozezya Edomu Elati, watanda ba-Juda kuzwa ku-Elati, elyo baEdomu bakaakukala ku-Elati, nkubacibede asunu.
Nkabela Ahazi wakabweza insiliva angolida yoonse izyakajanwa muŋanda ya-Jehova amuziyobwedo zyaŋanda yamwami, watuma cipo kumwami wa-Asuri.
Mpawo mwami wa-Asuri wakamuzuminina, wakeza ku-Damasko, wauzunda akutola bantu bawo mubuzike ku-Kiri. Alakwe Rezini wakamujaya.

Elyo mwami Ahazi naakaya ku-Damasko kuyooswanaana a-TigilatiPilesere mwami wa-Asuri, wakabona cipaililo caku-Damasko, nkabela mwami Ahazi wakatumina mupaizi Urija cikozyano cacipaililo, mbucakayakidwe akucitwa.
Mpawo mupaizi Urija wakayaka cipaililo. Mbubonya mbuli mwami Ahazi mbwaakamutumina kuzwa ku-Damasko, mupaizi Urija wakacicita mbubonya, mwami katana sika kuzwa ku-Damasko.
Elyo mwami naakaboola kuzwa ku-Damasko, wakabona cipaililo, nkabela mwami wakaswenenena kucipaililo, watanta alincico,
watenta cipaizyo cakwe acituuzyo cakwe, watila cipaizyo cakwe cakunywa, akusansaila bulowa bwazipaizyo zyakwe zyakutontozya mpoonya acipaililo.
Acipaililo camukuba icakali kubusyu bwa-Jehova, wakacigwisya kunembo lyaŋanda mpocakabede akati kacipaililo cakwe aŋanda ya-Jehova, wacibika kubbazu lyakunyika lyacipaililo cakwe.

Nkabela mwami Ahazi wakalailila mupaizi Urija kuti, Acipaililo cipati mpomweelede kutenta cipaizyo cacifumo acituuzyo camangolezya, acipaizyo camwami acituuzyo cakwe, azipaizyo zyabantu boonse banyika, azituuzyo zyabo azipaizyo zyabo zyakunywa, alimwi amusansaile alincico bulowa boonse bwacipaizyo abulowa boonse bwacituuzyo, Pele cipaililo camukuba ncencico ncinjanda kusondya.
Lino Urija mupaizi wakacita mbubonya mbuli mwami Ahazi mbwaakamulailila.
Ayalo inzila iivumbidwe ya-Sabata njibakayakide muŋanda, amanjililo aamwami aakali anze, wakaigwisya muŋanda ya-Jehova, nkaambo kamwami wa-Asuri.
Lino makani amwi aa-Ahazi ambwaakacita, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda na?
Elyo Ahazi naakafwa, wakazikwa antoomwe abasikale bakwe mumunzi wa-Davida, nkabela Hezekiya mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Nkabela waka cita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova, pele kuteelana abami ba-Israyeli ibakamutaangunina.
Lino Salimaneseri mwami wa-Asuri wakeza kuzoomulwisya, nkabela Hosea wakaba muzike wakwe akumuletela mutelo.

Pele nicakaba ciindi mwami wa-Asuri wakajana luvwiyo muli-Hosea, nkaambo wakatuma batumwa kuliSo mwami wa-Egepita, alimwi wakaleka kuletela mwami wa-Asuri mutelo mbuli mbaakali kucita myaka yakamana. Nkaambo kako mwami wa-Asuri wakamujata, wamwaanga muntolongo.
Mpawo mwami wa-Asuri wakainda moonse munyika, wasika ku-Samariya, akuusinkinizya myaka yotatwe.
Lino mumwaka wamusanu aine wabwami bwa-Hosea, mwami wa-Asuri wakazunda Samariya, watola ba-Israyeli mubuzike ku-Asuri, akubakazika ku-Hala, aku-Habori mulonga waku-Gozani, amuminzi yaba-Medi.
Cakaba obo nkaambo kakuti ba-Israyeli bakabisizya Jehova Leza wabo iwakabagwisya munyika ya-Egepita akubavuna mumaanza aa-Farao mwami wa-Egepita. Bakali kulemeka mizimu imbi,
akweenda muziyanza zyabamasi Jehova mbaakatanda kubusyu bwabana ba-Israyeli, amuziyanza bami ba-Israyeli nzibakalenga.
Bana ba-Israyeli bakali kucita kumbali milimo iitaluleme kumeso aa-Jehova Leza wabo, Bakaliyakila zipaililo muminzi yabo yoonse, nituba tunzi twamilaka niiba minzi mipati iizyungulukidwe imbaya.
Nkabela bakaliimikila zisamu azikozyano zyamituni atala lyamalundu oonse malamfu amunsi lyamisamu yoonse mitete,
akutenta tununkilizyo muzipaililo zyoonse zyakuzilundu mbubonya mbubakacita bamasi Jehova mbaakataanguna kutanda kubusyu bwabo, Alimwi bakacita milimo mibi yakukalazya Jehova.
Bakakomba mizimu Jehova njaakabaambila kuti, Mutaciti obo pe.

Pele Jehova wakacenjezya ba-Israyeli aba-Juda kumilomo yabasinsimi boonse ayabasizilengaano boonse, wati, Amuleke inzila zyanu zibi, mubambe imbeta zyangu amilazyo yangu, mucite mulao woonse ngundakalailila bamauso banu angundakamutumina kumiloma yabalanda bangu basinsimi.
Nekubaboobo teebakamvwa pe, bakayumya myoyo yabo mbubonya mbuli bamawisi mbubakacita, ibakakaka kusyoma Jehova Leza wabo.

Bakasampaula imbeta zyakwe acizuminano cakwe ncaakatangene abamawisi amacenjezyo aakwe ngaakabacenjezya. Bakatobela zintu zyabuyo akuba mbubonya, akucita mbuli bamasi ibakabazyungulukide, Jehova mbaakabalailila kuti, Mutaciti mbuli baaba.
Bakaleka milazyo yoonse ya-Jehova Leza wabo, balicitila zikozyano zifulidwe zyaboombe bobile, alimwi bakalicitila cikozyano camutuni, akukomba makamu makamu aakujulu, akumanina Baala milimo.
Nkabela bana babo balombe abana babo basimbi boonse bakabatuuzya mumulilo wacipaililo, alimwi bakali kusonda akucita bulozi, aboobo bakalyaaba kukucita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova akumukalazya.
Nkaambo kako Jehova wakanyemena ba-Israyeli abukali bupati, wabatanda kuzwa kumeso aakwe mane lumwi kwakasyaala mukowa wa-Juda luzutu,
Aboobo Jehova wakakaka inyungu zyoonse zya-Israyeli, wabapenzya, wabaaba mumaanza aabasikusaala, mane lumwi wabatandilila kuzwa kubusyu bwakwe.
Elyo bantu ba-Israyeli kabeenda muzibi zyoonse nzyaakacita Jeroboamu, taakwe nibakazileka pe,

mane Jehova wakatanda ba-Israyeli kuzwa kubusyu bwakwe, mbubonya mbwaakaamba kumilomo yabalanda bakwe basinsimi boonse, Mbuboobo ba-Israyeli mbubakalonzegwa kuzwa kunyika yabo akutolwa ku-Asuri, nkubacibede asunu.
Nkabela nibakatalika kukala nkuko, teebakali kulemeka Jehova, aboobo Jehova wakatuma balavu akati kabo, ibakali kubajaya.

Lino mwami wa-Asuri wakaambilwa kuti, Bamasi mbotolede mubuzike akubakazika muminzi ya-Samariya tabezi Leza wanyika mbwabede, aboobo watuma balavu akati kabo, bali mukubajaya, nkaambo kakutaziba Leza wanyika mbwabede.
Mpawo mwami wa-Asuri wakalailila kuti, Kutumwe umwi wabapaizi mbomugwisizye nkuko, ainke kuyookala nkuko akubaiisya Leza wanyika mbwabede.
Elyo umwi wabapaizi mbubakagwisizye ku-Samariya wakaya, akuyookala ku-Beteli, akubaiisya mbobeelede kulemeka Jehova.
Pele bakacili kucita ba-Leza babo beni, musyobo umwi aumwi ba-Leza bawo, akubabika mutukombelo twakuzilundu ba-Samariya ntubakacitide. Mbuyakacita misyobo yoonse muminzi mobakakede.
Bantu bakuBabuloni bakacita Sukoti-Benoti, bantu baku-Kuta bakacita Nerigali, bantu baku-Hamati bakacita Asima,
ba-Ayi bakacita Nibazi a-Tarataka, abaSefarayaimu bakali kutenta bana babo mumulilo cakupaizya Adrameleki a-Anameleki ba-Leza ba-Sefaravaimu.
Bakali kukomba Jehova, alimwi bakabika bapaizi basalidwe akati kabantu buyo, kufumbwa mbubakayanda, kuti babe bapaizi bazikombelo akubapailila muzikombelo zyakuzilundu.
Bakali kulemeka Jehova, pele ba-Leza babo beni abalo bakali kubakomba mbubonya mbuli ziyanza zyazisi mobakazwida.
Asunu bacicita mbubonya mbuli ziyanza zyabo zyaciindi.
Tabalemeki Jehova, tababambi imbeta aziyanza amulao amilazyo Jehova njaakalailila bana ba-Jakobo ngwaakaulika izina lya-Israyeli.
Nkaambo Jehova wakatangana abo cizuminano, alimwi wakabalailila kuti, Mutanoolemeki ba-Leza bambi nikuba kubakotamina nikuba kubamanina milimo nikuba kubapailila.
Jehova iwakamugwisya munyika ya-Egepita anguzu zigambya akuboko kutandabikidwe, ngonguwe ngumweelede kukomba akukotamina akupailila.
Milazyo yakwe ambeta zyakwe amulao wakwe amalailile aakwe ngaakamulembela, muleelede kubika myoyo yanu kukuzicita mazuba oonse. Mutalemeki ba-Leza bambi pe.
Acalo cizuminano cangu ncitutangene anywe, mutacilubi pe. Mutalemeki ba-Leza bambi,
amulemeke Jehova Leza wanu, nkabela uyoomuvuna mumaanza aabasinkondonyokwe boonse.
Nekubaboobo teebakamvwa pe, bakali kucita mbubonya mbuli ziyanza zyabo zyaciindi.
Ka­ jisi myaka iili makumi obile amusanu naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili makumi obile amusanu aine. Izina lyabanyina bakali Abi mwana musimbi wa-Zekariya.
Nkabela wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbwaakacita Davida wisi.

Ngonguwe wakamwaya zipaililo zyakuzilundu akupwayaula ziimikilo akugonka zikozyano zya-Asera. Alimwi wakajaya inzoka yamukuba njaakacitide Musa, nkaambo bana ba-Israyeli bakalizibide kwiitentela tununkilizyo. Yakali kutegwa Nehusitani.
Wakali kusyoma Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, Katakwe naba omwe iwakeelene awe akati kabami boonse ba-Juda ibakamutaangunina naa ibakamutobela.
Wakakakatila kuli-Jehova, taakwe naakaleka kumutobela, alimwi wakabamba imbeta zyoonse Jehova nzyaakalailila Musa.
Nkabela Jehova wakali awe, aboobo kufumbwa nkwaakaya wakali kugwasigwa. Alimwi wakapapila mwami wa-Asuri, waleka kumumanina milimo.
Nkabela wakazunda ba-Filisti koonse akusikila ku-Gaza atunzuunzi twawo, nituba tunzi twamilaka niiba minzi mipati iizyungulukidwe imbaya.
Imane myaka yotatwe wakauzunda. Mumwaka wamusanu aumwi wabwami bwa-Hezekiya, nkukuti mwaka wamusanu aine wa-Hosea mwami wa-Israyeli, Samariya nowakazundwa.
Nkabela mwami wa-Asuri wakatola ba-Israyeli mubuzike ku-Asuri, wabakazika ku-Hara, aku-Habori, akumulonga wa-Gozani, amuminzi yaba-Medi,
nkaambo kakuti teebakaswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wabo, alimwi bakamwaya cizuminano cakwe azyoonse Musa mulanda wa-Jehova nzyaakalailila. Teebakamvwa nikuba kucita.

Mpawo Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda wakatumina mwami waAsuri ku-Lakisi nkwaakabede, wati, Ndabisya. Undileke, Kufumbwa nconditondezya ndaleta. Elyo mwami wa-Asuri wakatezya Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda matalenta aansiliva aali myanda yotatwe amatalenta aangolida aali makumi otatwe.
Nkabela Hezekiya wakamupa insiliva yoonse iyakajanwa muŋanda ya-Jehova amuziyobwedo zyaŋanda yamwami.
Kuciindi eco nciconya Hezekiya wakagwisya ingolida kumakoma aantempele yaJehova akuminsende Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda njaakavumbizizye, wapa mwami wa-Asuri.
Lino bakaita mwami, nkabela kwakeza kulimbabo Eliyakimu mwana wa-Hilikiya mupati wabasiŋanda, a-Sebina mulembi, a-Joa mwana wa-Asafu sikulemba makani.
Ulayeeya kuti majwi aamilomo buyo alyeelene abusongo anguzu zyakugwasya munkondo. Lino nguni ngonga ulasyoma kuti wandipapila?
Ncobeni ulasyoma Egepira. Pele oyu musako wako nditete liti fukide buyo liyooyasa ijanza lyakwe kufumbwa uulifunkizya. Mbwabede Faro mwami wa-Egepita kuliboonse bamusyoma.

Pele na mwandaambila kuti, Tulasyoma Jehova Leza wesu, sa teensi nguwe Hezekiya ngwaakagwisizya tukombelo twakuzilundu azipaililo, akwaambila bantu ba-Juda aJerusalemu kuti, Muleelede kukomba kucipaililo eci camu-Jerusalemu?
Lino kopana asimalelo wangu mwami wa-Asuri, Njookupa mabbiza aali zyuulu zyobile, na uwe ulakonzya kujana basikwaatanta.
Ulakonzya buti kusampaula silutwe naba umwi naba muniini akati kabalanda basimalelo wangu, mbuli mbosyoma ba-Egepita kuti bakugwasye inkalaki abasimabbiza?
Alimwi sa ndeza kuzoonyonyoona busena obuno cakutazumizigwa Jehova? Jehova nguwakandaambila kuti, Koya ukalwisye cisi eci akucinyonyoona.
Mpawo Eliyakimu mwana wa-Hilikiya a-Sebina a-Joa bakaambila Rabisake kuti, Utwaambile tubalanda bako muci-Aramu, nkaambo tulamvwa. Utatwaambili muci-Juda mumatwi aabantu bali abulambo.

Pele Rabisake wakabaambila kuti, Sa mwami wangu wandituma kuzooambila ndinywe amwami wanu majwi aya? Sa teendatumwa kuzooambila bantu bakede abulambo abalo, kuti balye mazyu aabo akunywa minsyu yabo beni?
Mpawo Rabisake wakaima, wakoongolola ajwi ipati muci-Juda, wati, Amuswiilile majwi aamwami mupati, mwami wa-Asuri.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami. Hezekiya atakamweeni, nkaambo takooyookonzya kumuvuna kumaanza aangu.
Hezekiya atamusyomyi Jehova, cakwaamba kuti, Jehova ncobeni uyootuvuna, aboobo munzi uno tuukooyooabwa mumaanza aamwami wa-Asuri.

Mutaswiilili Hezekiya pe, nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami wa-Asuri. Amutangane ambebo luumuno akuzwa mumunzi kuza okuno kulindime, elyo muyoolya umwi aumwi micelo yamusaansa wakwe mwini amicelo yamukuyu wakwe mwini akunywa umwi aumwi maanzi aamukalo wakwe mwini,

mane nkaze kuzoomutola kunyika iikozyene anyika yanu, nyika yamaila ayawaini, nyika yazinkwa ayamyuunda yamisaansa, nyika yamafuta aamaolifa ayabuci, elyo muyoopona, tamukooyoofwa pe. Mutaswiilili Hezekiya na wamweena cakwaamba kuti, Jehova uyootuvuna.
Sa nkwali naba omwe akati kaba-Leza babamasi iwakavuna nyika yakwe mumaanza aamwami wa-Asuri?
Bali kuli ba-Leza ba-Hamati aba-Aripadi? Bali kuli ba-Leza ba-Safaravaimu abaHena aba-Iva? Sa bakavuna Samariya mumaanza aangu?
Nguuli Leza akati kaba-Leza bamasi oonse iwakavuna nyika yakwe mumaanza aangu? Lino Jehova ulavuna buti Jerusalemu mumaanza aangu?
Pele bantu bakaumuna buyo, teebakamuvwiila ijwi niliba lyomwe, nkaambo mwami wakalilailide kuti, Mutakamuvwiili pe.
Mpawo Eliyakimu mwana wa-Hilikiya mupati wabasiŋanda a-Sebina mulembi a-Joa mwana wa-Asafu sikulemba makani bakaboola kuli-Hezekiya, azyakusama zyabo zilizapaukide, bamulwiida majwi aa-Rabisake.
Alimwi wakatuma Eliyakimu mupati wabasiŋanda a-Sebina mulembi abapaizi bapati, balisamide zisani zyamasaka, kuli-Isaya musinsimi mwana wa-Amozi.
Bakamwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Hezekiya. Sunu mbuzuba bwamapenzi abwakutapatilwa abwabweeme, nkaambo bana bali mwida pele taakwe inguzu zyakubazyazya.

Ambweni Jehova Leza wako wamvwa majwi oonse aa-Rabisake, mwami wa-Asuri simalelo wakwe ngwaakatuma kuti asampaule Leza muumi. Ambweni Jehova Leza wako uyootapatila majwi ngaamvwide. Lino cikombyo cako ciye kujulu cakukombela bantu basyeede.
Lino balanda bamwami Hezekiya nibakasika kuli-Isaya,
Isaya wakabaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila simalelo wanu, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, Mutayoowi nkaambo kamajwi ngomvwide, balanda bamwami wa-Asuri ngebasampauzya ndime.
Amubone! Ndamubikila muuya, nkabela uyoomvwa impuwo akupiluka kucisi cakwe. Omo mucisi cakwe mwini njoomujazya ipanga.
Wakamvwa impuwo ya-Tirihaka mwami wa-Etiopiya, yakuti, Bona! Weza kuzookulwisya. Mpawo wakatuma batumwa alwabili kuli-Hezekiya, wabaambila kuti,
Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda. Leza wako ngosyoma atakweeni cakwaamba kuti, Jerusalemu tokooyooabwa mumaanza aamwami wa-Asuri.
Mulimvwide bami ba-Asuri ncibacitila zisi zyoonse, mbubazinyonyoona, Lino inywe muyoovunwa buti?
Ezyo zisi bamatata nzibakanyonyoona, sa ba-Leza bazyo bakazivuna? Nkukuti zisi mbuli Gozani a-Harani a-Resefi abana ba-Edeni ibakakede mu-Telasara.
Uli kuli mwami wa-Hamati, amwami wa-Aripadi, amwami wa-Sefaravaimu, awa-Hena, awa-Iva?
Elyo Hezekiya wakakomba nkukonya oko kubusyu bwa-Jehova, wati, O Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli nokede akati kabakerebimu, nduwe Leza olike wamasi oonse aanyika, Nduwe wakalenga ijulu anyika.
Koteya matwi aako, O Jehova, uswiilile, Kobika meso aako, O Jehova, ubone. Koswiilila majwi aa-Sanakeribu ngaatuma kukusampaula Leza muumi.
Ncobeni, O Jehova, bami ba-Asuri basaala misyobo yabantu anyika yabo.
Ba-Leza babo, bakabawaala mumulilo, nkaambo tabali ba-Leza pe, nzilengwa zyamaanza aabantu, zisamu amabwe, nciceeco ncibakabanyonyweeda.
O Jehova Leza wesu, utuvune kumaanza aakwe, kuti zisi zyoonse zyaansi zizibe kuti nduwe Jehova Leza olike.
Lino ngaaya majwi Jehova ngaamba aanguwe.
Mwana musimbi nakalindu wa-Zioni wakusampaula, wakudika,
Mwana musimbi wa-Jerusalemu waguna-guna mutwe kusule lyako.
Nguni ngolisumpwida mumajwi aako akumututulwida meso?
Ngu-Musalali wa-Israyeli.
Wakati, Inkalaki zyangu zinji ndatanta azyo amutwe wazilundu,
Ndasika kumagolelo aakataazya aa-Lebano.
Misamu yaco milamfu yakedari ndaitema,
Amisamu yaco mibotu yakupresi.
Ndasika kumagolelo aaco mulusaka Iusinkide,
Ndasya mikalo akunywa maanzi meenzu,
Milonga yoonse ya-Egepita ndaiyuminizya mukweendeenda kwangu,
Ndakabamba ciindi ncincita sunu,
Ndakakubika kuti ukanyonyoone minzi iizyungulukidwe lubaya,
Ibe matongo buyo.
Balatuntuma akufwa insoni.
Baba mbuli zisyu zyamusokwe ambuli mweemvwe,
Mbuli bwizu bumena atala aciluli,
Bunyonyooka nibutana kukomena,
Ndizi mboendeenda akuboola,
Ambondikalalila.
Alimwi kulisumpula kwako mbukumvwigwa mumatwi aangu,
Njoobika kalobyo kangu mumpemu yako,
Alubulo lwangu mukanwa lyako,
Njookupilusya munzila eyo njiyonya njowakaleta.
Nkabela cipanzi caluzubo lwa-Juda cicisyeede elyooboola kusimpa miyanda ansi akuzyala micelo ajulu,
nkaambo muJerusalemu mulazwa basyeede, amucilundu ca-Ziyoni mulazwa inkamu yabalobosi. Busungu bwa-Jehova mbobuyoocita obo.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova aamwami wa-Asuri, Takooyoonjila mumunzi uno, nikuba kufu sa muvwi mulinguwo, nikuba kulibonya kunembo lyawo antobo, nikuba kuyaka citantilo cavu kulinguwo.
Inzila eyo njiyonya njaakaleta ulapiluka mulinjiyo. Takoozoonjila mumunzi uno pe, mbwaamba Jehova,
nkaambo nzootabilila munzi uno akuuvuna nkaambo kangu ndemwini akaambo kamulanda wangu Davida.
Mpawo Sanakeribu mwami wa-Asuri wakanyampuka, wapiluka kuyookala ku-Nineve.
Nkabela naakali kukomba muŋanda yaNisiroki Leza wakwe, Adrameleki a-Sarezere bana bakwe bakamujaya apanga. Lino bakalobokela kucisi ca-Ararati, nkabela mwanaakwe Esarihadoni wakalya izina lyakwe.
Amvwe obo, Hezekiya wakafutata busyu bwakwe, walanga kubulambo, wakomba kuli-Jehova, wati,
Jehova, koibaluka lino mbundakeenda kubusyu bwako mubuswini acamoyo uululeme, akucita zibotu mumeso aako. Nkabela Hezekiya wakalila akulila kupati.
Elyo Isaya naatakalina kuzwa kulubanza lwaakati, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakamusikila, liti,

Pilu ka alimwi, ukaambile Hezekiya musolozi wabantu bangu kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wauso Davida. Ndamvwa mupailo wako, ndabona misozi yako, lino njookuponya, nkabela mubuzuba bwatatu uyoonjila muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Njooyungizizya buumi bwako myaka iili ikumi amusanu, alimwi njookuvuna, webo amunzi uno, kumaanza aamwami waAsuri, Njootabilila munzi uno nkaambo kangu ndemwini akaambo kamulanda wangu Davida.
Mpawo Isaya wakaamba kuti, Amulete cikoto cankuyu, bacibweze akucibika acuute, kuti apone.
Lino Hezekiya wakabuzya Isaya kuti, Ncinzi citondezyo cakuti Jehova uyoondiponya acakuti njoonjila muŋanda ya-Jehova mubuzuba bwatatu?

Isaya wakavuwa kuti, Nceeci citondezyo cizwa kuli-Jehova cakukuzibya kuti Jehova uyoocita ncobeni ncaakasyomezya. Cenzule cicite buti? Ciye kunembo intaamu zili ikumi nanka kupiluka intaamu zili ikumi?
Hezekiya wakavuwa kuti, Ncintu citete kucenzule kuya kunembo intaamu zili ikumi. Pe. Cenzule cipiluke intaamu zili ikumi.
Mpawo Isaya musinsimi wakakwiilila Jehova, nkabela wakapilusya cenzule intaamu zili ikumi nzicakaindide kale mucipimyo ca-Abazi.

Nkabela Hezekiya wakutambula batumwa cakukondwa, wabatondezya iŋanda yoonse yazilondwedo zyakwe, ansiliva angolida azisyu amafuta mabotu aŋanda yazilwisyo zyakwe azintu zyoonse izyakajanwa muzilondwedo zyakwe. Katakwe cintu niciba cimwi muŋanda yakwe nimuba mubwami bwakwe Hezekiya ncaatakabatondezya.
Mpawo Isaya musinsimi wakasika kumwami Hezekiya, wamubuzya kuti, Aba bantu bakaambanzi? Bazwa kuli? Lino Hezekiya wakavuwa kuti, Bazwa kucisi cili kule, ku-Babuloni.
Wakabuzya kuti, Ino ncinzi ncibabona muŋanda yako? Hezekiya wakavuwa kuti, Zintu zyoonse zili muŋanda yangu bazibona. Taakwe cintu niciba cimwi muzilondwedo zyangu ncindatabatondezya.
Mpawo Isaya wakaambila Hezekiya kuti, Swiilila ijwi lya-Jehova.

Uzibe kuti mazuba aleza, zintu zyoonse zili muŋanda yako azintu zyoonse bamauso nzibakalondola mane kusikila kubuzuba obuno niziyootolwa kuBabuloni. Takukooyoosyaala cintu niciba cimwi, mbwaamba Jehova.
Abalo bana bako bazyalwa kulinduwe, bamwi bayootolwa kuti bakabe bazibe muŋanda yabwami yamwami wa-Babuloni.
Lino Hezekiya wakaambila Isaya kuti, Ndibotu ijwi lya-Jehova ndoamba. Nkaambo wakati, Kuzooba luumuno alusinizyo nencipona mebo.
Lino Hezekiya naakafwa akuzikwa abamawisi, mwanaakwe Manase nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Manase kajisi myaka iili ikumi aibili naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya­ mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili makumi osanwe amusanu. Izina lyabanyina bakali Hefiziba,
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova cakutobela zisesemyo zyabamasi Jehova mbaakatanda kubusyu bwabana baIsrayeli.

Wakayakulula zipaililo zyakuzilundu Hezekiya wisi nzyaakamwayide, alimwi wakayakila Baala zipaililo, akucita zifwanikisyo zyamituni mbubonya mbwaakacita Ahabu mwami wa-Israyeli, akukomba makamu oonse aakujulu akwaamanina milimo.
Nkabela wakayaka zipaililo munanda ya-Jehova, njenjiyo Jehova njaakaamba kuti, Mu-Jerusalemu monjoobika izina lyangu.
Wakayakila makamu oonse aakujulu zipaililo mumbanza zyobile zyaŋanda ya-Jehova.
Wakatuuzya mwana wakwe mumulilo, wakali kuwaazya akusonda, wakali kubelesya basibusangu abalozi, akucita milimo mibi minji mumeso aa-Jehova yakumukalazya.

Acikozyano caAsera ncaakafulidwe wakacibika muŋanda eyo njiyonya Jehova njaakaambila Davida a-Solomoni mwanaakwe kuti, Muŋanda eyi amu-Jerusalemu, ngundakasala kuzwa kumisyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli, monjoobika izina lyangu mane kukabe akutamani.

Nkabela nsikooyootuntulisya limbi maulu aabana ba-Israyeli kuzwa munyika eyi njindakapa bamawisi, na baanzika myoyo yabo kukucita zintu zyoonse nzindibalailide amulao woonse Musa mulanda wangu ngwaakabalailila.
Pele tabakwe nibakaswiilila, alakwe Manase wakabapambusya akubacitya bubi kwiinda bamasi Jehova mbaakanyonywede kubusyu bwabana ba-Israyeli,
Lino Jehova wakaamba kumilomo yabalanda bakwe basinsimi kuti,
Manase mwami wa-Juda mbwacita zisesemyo zili boobu akubisya kwiinda ba-Amori ibakamutaangunina, ambwacitya ba-Juda zibi kumituni yakwe,
lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, Ncobeni njooletela Jerusalemu a-Juda mapenzi aagambya. Kufumbwa muntu uuswiilila, matwi aakwe oonse obile alapakamana.
Njoololweda Jerusalemu ceelesyo ca-Samariya acipimyo caluzubo lwa-Ahabu, nkabela njoopukuta Jerusalemu mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwapukuta mutiba, ulapukuta akusandamuna.
Njoosowa bantu bacaabilo cangu bacisyeede akubaaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyina, nkabela bayoosaalwa akunyonyoonwa kulibasinkondonyina boonse.
Nkaambo bacita bubi mumeso aangu, bandikalazya ciindi coonse kuzwa kubuzuba obuya nindakagwisya bamawisi munyika ya-Egepita akusikila sunu.
Elyo Manase naakafwa, wakazikwa mumuunda waŋanda yakwe, mumuunda wa-Uza, nkabela Amoni mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbwaakacita wisi Manase.
Wakeenda munzila eyo njiyonya njaakeenda wisi, kukukomba mituni njaakali kukomba wisi akwiikotamina.
Wakasiya Jehova Leza wabamawisi. Taakwe naakeenda munzila ya-Jehova pe.
Mpawo bantu bacisi bakajaya bantu abo ibakavwiyide mwami Amoni. Nkabela bantu bacisi bakabika bwami bwakwe mumaanza aamwanaakwe Josiya.
Lino makani amwi aa-Amoni ancito zyakwe, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda?
Nkabela bakamuzika mumavwikilo aakwe mumuunda wa-Uza, elyo Josiya mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Nkabela wakacita bululami mumeso aa-Jehova akweenda munzila yoonse ya-Davida wisi, Taakwe naakaleya pe nikuba kululyo nikuba kulumwensi.
Koya kuli-Hilikiya mupaizi mupati, kuti abale mali aaletwa muŋanda ya-Jehova, basikulindila mulyango ngebatambula kumaanza aabantu.
Apegwe mumaanza aabasimilimo balanga Iŋanda ya-Jehova, kuti bape basimilimo bali kuŋanda ya-Jehova, bamamike iŋanzi zyaŋanda.
Bape babezi abayaki abasikuzilulula, akuula zisamu amabwe aabezedwe kukumamika iŋanda.
Pele mali aanjila mumaanza aabo taelede kubalilizigwa pe, nkaambo balacita cabusyomesi.
Lino Safani mulembi naakaboola kumwami, wakaletela mwami makani. Wakati, Balanda bako bagwisya mali aakajanwa muŋanda, baaba mumaanza aabasimilimo balanga iŋanda ya-Jehova.
Alimwi Safani mulembi wakaambila mwami kuti, Hilikiya mupaizi wandipa ibbuku, elyo Safani wakalibala mumatwi aamwami.
Nkabela mwami wakalailila Hilikiya mupaizi aAhikamu mwana wa-Safani a-Akiboro mwana wa-Mikaya a-Safani mulembi a-Asaya mulanda wamwami, kuti,

Kamuya, kuti mutubuzizye kuliJehova, mebo abantu aba-Juda boonse, nkaambo kamajwi aabbuku eli ilyakajanika, nkaambo bwakomena bukali bwa-Jehova butubonekela, nkaambo bamatata teebakalemeka majwi aabbuku eli nikuba kucita zilembedwe aandiswe.

Mpawo Hilikiya mupaizi a-Ahikamu a-Akiboro aSafani a-Asaya bakainka kuli-Hulida musinsimi mwanakazi, muka-Salumu mwana wa-Tikiva mwana wa-Harasi iwakali kulanga zyakusama zyamwami. (Oyo Hulida wakalikede mu-Jerusalemu mumunzi wabili.) Nkabela bakaa-mbaula awe.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Amwaambile muntu iwakamutuma kulindime kuti.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni njooletela busena obuno abantu babo mapenzi, majwi oonse aabbuku mwami wa-Juda ngaakabala,
nkaambo kakuti bandisiya mebo akutentela mizimu imbi tununkilizyo cakundikalazya kuncito zyoonse zyamaanza aabo. Bukali bwangu buyoobukila busena obuno, tabukooyootontozegwa pe.
Nekubaboobo mwami waJuda iwakamutuma kukubuzya kuli-Jehova, amumwaambile kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli aamajwi ngowaswiilila.

Moyo wako wakabomba, alimwi wakalifwiinsya kubusyu bwa-Jehova nowakamvwa makani ngendakaamba aabusena obuno abantu bakede mulimbubo aakuti buyooba matongo aatukidwe, alimwi wakazapaula zyakusama zyako akulila kubusyu bwangu. Nkaambo kako ambebo ndaswiilila, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo kako njookusisya kukabanda bamauso nkubalede caluumuno, Tokooyoobona mapenzi ngenti letele busena obuno. Elyo bakatolela mwami aya majwi.

Alakwe mwami wakasika kuŋanda ya-Jehova, abantu boonse ba-Juda aboonse ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu bakeza awe, abapaizi abasinsimi, abantu boonse nibaba baniini nibaba bapati. Elyo kwakabalwa mumatwi aabo majwi oonse aabbuku lyacizuminano ilyakajanwa muŋanda ya-Jehova.

Nkabela mwami wakaima kucilende, watanga cizuminano kubusyu bwa-Jehova cakutobela Jehova acakubamba milumbe yakwe amilao yakwe ambeta zyakwe camoyo woonse acamiyeeyo yoonse, akuzuzya majwi aacizuminano eci cilembedwe mubbuku eli. Abalo bantu boonse bakazumina cizuminano.

Abalo bapaizi bamituni wakabagwisya, bami ba-Juda mbibakabikide kuti batente tununkilizyo kuzipaililo zyakuzilundu muminzi ya-Juda amumasena aaengelede aa-Jerusalemu, abaabo ibakali kutenta tununkilizyo twakukomba Baala azuba amwezi anyenyeezi amakamu oonse aakujulu.

Acikozyano ca-Asera cakali muŋanda ya-Jehova wakacitola anze lya-Jerusalemu kukalonga ka-Kidroni, wacitenta nkukonya oko kukalonga ka-Kidroni, wacipwayaula mane kwasyaala lusuko buyo, elyo lusuko lwaco wakalusowa kutubanda twabantu.
Alimwi wakamwaya maanda aabaalumi basibwaamu aakali muŋanda ya-Jehova, banakazi mobakali kupesela Asera masani.

Nkabela wakagwisya bapaizi boonse muminzi ya-Juda, akusofwaazya zipaililo zyakuzilundu bapaizi nkubakali kutenta tununkilizyo, kuzwa ku-Geba akusikila ku-Bceriseba. Alimwi wakamwaya zipaililo zyakumilyango izyakali kumanjililo aa-Joshua mulangi wamunzi kujanza lyalumwensi kumulyango wamunzi.
Nekubaboobo bapaizi bazipaililo zyakuzilundu teebakeza kucipaililo ca-Jehova mu-Jerusalemu; bakali kulya zinkwa zitakwe bumena akati kababunyina.
Alimwi wakasofwaazya Tofeti mumumpata wamwana wa-Hinomo, kuti kutabi muntu uutenta mwanaakwe mumulilo kukupaizya Moleki.
Aalo mabbiza bami ba-Juda ngebakapede izuba kumanjililo aaŋanda ya-Jehova wakaagwisya, kumbali lyakaanda ka-Natanimeleki muzibe kali mukati. Azyalo inkalaki zyazuba wakazitenta mumulilo.

Azipaililo zyaatala lyaŋanda yakujulu ya-Ahazi, bami ba-Juda nzibakayakide, azipaililo Manase nzyaakayakide mumbanza zyobile zyaŋanda yaJehova, zyoonse buyo mwami wakazityolaula akusowa lusuko lwazyo mukalonga ka-Kidroni.

Azipaililo zyazilundu izyakali kujwe lya-Jerusalemu kululyo lyacilundu calunyonyooko, Solomoni mwami waIsrayeli nzyaakayakila Asitoreti cisesemyo caba-Sidoni a-Kemosi cisesemyo ca-Moabu a-Milikomu cisesemyo cabana ba-Amoni, zyoonse mwami wakazisofwaazya.
Nkabela wakapwaya zilende akutema zisamu zya-Asera, amoonse mubusena bwazyo wakazuzya zifuwa zyabantu.

Lino Josiya naakacebuka, wakabona tubanda itwakali oko kucilundu, nkabela wakatuma kuti bagwisye zifuwa omo mutubanda, wazitenta acipaililo, aboobo wakacisofwaazya, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaamba oyo muntu wa-Leza iwakasinsima aya makani.

Elyo wakabuzya kuti, Ino ncinzi eciya ciimikidwe neembona? Bantu bamunzi bakamuvwiila kuti, Nkekabanda kamuntu wa-Leza iwakazwa mucisi ca-Juda akusinsima makani aya ngocitide okuno kucipaililo ca-Beteli.
Wakati, Bamuleke. Kutabi uuputanya zifuwa zyakwe, Aboobo bakaleka zifuwa zyakwe azifuwa zyamusinsimi oyo iwakazwa mu-Samariya.
Atukombelo toonse twakuzilundu twamuminzi yaSamariya, bami ba-Israyeli ntubakayakide cakukalazya Jehova, toonse Josiya wakatugwisya, akutucitila mbubonya mbwaakacita ku-Beteli.
Nkabela wakajaya bapaizi boonse bazipaililo zyakuzilundu ibakajanwa nkukonya kuzipaililo, akutenta zifuwa zyabantu alinzizyo. Amane kucita obo, wakapiluka ku-Jerusalemu.
Nkaambo ipobwe lya-Pasika talikwe nilyakabambwa obo kuzwa kumazuba alya babetesi nibakali kubeteka ba-Israyeli, nimuba mumazuba oonse aabami ba-Israyeli abami ba-Juda,
pele ipobwe eli lya-Pasika lyakaligwa mumwaka wakumi amusanu aitatu lyamwami Josiya cakulumba Jehova mu-Jerusalemu.

Katakwe mwami naba omwe iwakamutaangunina iwakeelene awe kukupiluka kuli-Jehova camoyo woonse acamiyeeyo yakwe yoonse acanguzu zyakwe zyoonse, kukuzuzikizya mulao woonse wa-Musa, alimwi katakwe naba omwe iwakamutobela cakweelana awe,

Jehova wakati, Ba-Juda abalo njoobatanda kuzwa kubusyu bwangu mbubonya mbundakatanda ba-Israyeli, nkabela njoosowa munzi oyu Jerusalemu, ngundakasalide, aŋanda eyi njindakaamba kuti, Mulinjiyo moliyookala izina lyangu.
Lino makani amwi aa-Josiya, ancito zyakwe zyoonse, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda?
Kuciindi cakwe Faraoneko mwami wa-Egepita wakaya kuyoolwisya mwami wa-Asuri kulwizi lwa-Firate, Nkabela mwami Josiya wakainka kuyoomulwisya, pele Faraoneko amubone buyo, wakamujaya oko ku-Megido.

Lino balanda bakwe bakaleta mutunta wakwe munkalaki kuzwa ku-Megido, bamusisya kuJerusalemu, bamuzika mumavwiko aakwe. Mpawo bantu bacisi bakabweza Jehoazi mwana wa-Josiya, bamunanika mafuta aabwami kuti alye izina lyawisi.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbuli bamawisi mbubakacita.
Lino Farao-neko wakamwaanga ku-Ribila munyika ya-Hamati, kuti atabi mwami mu-Jerusalemu, alimwi wakatezya cisi mutelo, matalenta aansiliva aali mwanda atalenta lyangolida,

Mpawo Farao-neko wakabika bwami mumaanza aa-Eliyakimu mwana wa-Josiya, kuti alye izina lyawisi josiya, alimwi wakasandula izina lyakwe akumuulika izina lya-Joyakimu. Pele Jehoazi wakamutolelela ku-Egepita, nkukonya oko nkwaakafwida.

Lino insiliva angolida yoonse Joyakimu wakazipa Farao, Wakatezya bantu bacisi kuti ajane mali aakupa mbwaakalailila Farao. Umwi aumwi wakabikila mutelo wakwe, kuti zijanwe insiliva angolida zyakupa Farao-neko.
Joyakimu kajisi myaka iili makumi obile amusanu naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili ikumi alimwi. Izina lyabanyina bakali Zebida mwana musimbi wa-Pedaya waku-Ruma.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbuli bamawisi mbubakacita.

Lino Jehova wakatuma bantu kuti bamulwisye. Wakabusya impi zyaba-Kasidi, ampi zyaba-Aramu, ampi zyaba-Moabu, ampi zyabana ba-Amoni, akuzituma kuzoonyonyoona cisi ca-Juda, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaamba kumilomo yabalanda bakwe basinsimi.
Mulazyo wa-Jehova ngowakasisya aya makani kuba-Juda, kuti abatande kwa kumeso aakwe, nkaambo kazibi zya-Manase azyoonse nzyaakacita,
akaambo kabulowa bwabantu batakwe mulandu mbwaakatila, nkaambo wakazuzya Jerusalemu bulowa bwabantu batakwe mulandu, nkabela Jehova wakukaka kulekelela.
Lino makani amwi aa-Joyakimu, azyoonse nzyaakacita, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabami ba-Juda.
Elyo Joyakimu naakafwa, mwanaakwe Joyakini nguwakalya izina lyakwe.

Nkabela mwami wa-Egepita taakwe naakaboola limbi kuzwa kucisi cakwe, nkaambo mwami wa-Babuloni wakazunda nyika yoonse mwami wa-Egepita njaakavubide kuzwa kukalonga ka-Egepita mane kusikila kumulonga Firate.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbuli bamawisi mbubakacita.
Kuciindi eco balanda ba-Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni bakasika ku-Jerusalemu, nkabela munzi wakasinkinizigwa.
Lino Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni wakasika kumunzi, balanda bakwe nibakali kuusinkinizya.

Mpawo Joyakini mwami wa-Juda wakalyaaba mumaanza aamwami wa-Babuloni, walo abanyina abalanda bakwe abaalu bakwe abasilutwe bakwe, nkabela mwami wa-Babuloni wakamutola mubuzike, Aya akaba mumwaka wamusanu aitatu wabwami bwa-Nebukadinezara.

Alimwi wakagwisya zintu zyoonse ziyandisi zyamuŋanda yaJehova azyamuŋanda yamwami, akupwayaula zibelesyo zyoonse zyangolida zyamuŋanda ya-Jehova nzyaakacitide Solomoni mwami wa-Israyeli, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba.
Nkabela wakatola mubuzike banaJerusalemu boonse abapati boonse abaalumi basintaze boonse, bazike bali zyuulu zili ikumi, abasimilimo boonse abafuzi boonse. Katakwe ibakasyaala cita bacete banyika.
A-Joyakini wakamutola mubuzike ku-Babuloni. Abalo banyina mwami, abanakazi bamwami, abasilutwe bakwe, abapati bacisi, boonse wakabagwisya ku-Jerusalemu akubatola mubuzike kuBabuloni.

Abaalumi basintaze boonse, bantu bali zyuulu zili musanu azibili, abafuzi abasimilimo, bantu bali cuulu, abasilumamba boonse ibakeelede milimo yankondo, boonse buyo mwami wa-Babuloni wakabatola mubuzike ku-Babuloni.
Elyo mwami wa-Babuloni wakabika Mataniya munyina wisi Joyakini kuti alye bwami bwakwe. Izina lyakwe wakalisandula, waba Zedekiya.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbwaakacita Joyakimu.
Nkaambo bukali bwa-Jehova bwakali kuya bukomena muJerusalemu amucisi ca-Juda mane lumwi wakabatanda kuzwa kubusyu bwakwe. Elyo Zedekiya wakapapila mwami wa-Babuloni.
Aboobo munzi wakalisinkinizidwe mane kusikila kumwaka wakumi aumwi wabwami bwa-Zedekiya.
Elyo mubuzuba bwamusanu aane bwamumwezi wane, inzala yakakomena loko mumunzi, abantu bacisi teebakajisi zilyo abuniini.

Mpawo munzi wakaanduka, nkabela mwami abasilumamba bakwe boonse bakacija masiku akwiinda kumulyango uuli akati kamalambo obile, kufwaafwi kumuunda wamwami, ba-Kasidi nibakacili kuzyunguluka munzi, Lino bakatola inzila iiya ku-Araba.
Pele basilumamba ba-Kasidi bakatobela mwami akumweenzya mugezi lya-Jeriko, nkabela basilumamba bakwe boonse bakamwaika.
Lino bakajata mwami, akumuleta kumwami waBabuloni ku-Ribila, bamubeteka nkuko.
Bana ba-Zedekiya, bakabajaya kumeso aakwe, alimwi Zedekiya mwini bakamuofwaazya, bamwaanzya inketaani, akumusisya ku-Babuloni.
Nkabela wakatenta iŋanda ya-Jehova aŋanda yamwami amaanda oonse aamu-Jerusalemu, Maanda oonse mapati wakaatentya mulilo.
Abwalo bwaanda bwaJerusalemu buzyungulukide munzi, bakabumwaya basilumamba ba-Kasidi, mupati wabasikutabilila mbaakeza abo.
Abantu bamwi ibakasyeede mumunzi, abaabo ibakalyaabide mumaanza aamwami wa-Babuloni, abanamaleya, boonse buyo Nebuzaradana mupati wabasikutabilila wakabatola mubuzike.
Pele mupati wabasikutabilila wakaleka bamwi bacete kuti babe basimyuunda yamasaansa abasikulima.
Azyalo zilongo, amaliko, atugele, amigano yatununkilizyo, azibelesyo zyoonse zyamukuba nzibakali kupaizya, zyoonse buyo bakazitola.
Azyalo inkayi zyamulilo, amitiba, zyoonse bakazitola. Mupati wabasikutabilila wakatola zibulo zyangolida, zibe ingolida, azibulo zyansiliva, zibe insiliva.
Nkabela minsende yobile, acikozyano comwe caziba lyamaanzi, aziimikilo Solomoni nzyaakacitila iŋanda ya-Jehova, bulemu bwamukuba wazibelesyo ezi zinji teebwakali kweelekeka pe.

Bulamfu bwamunsende umwi aumwi bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi amusanu atutatu. Alimwi alinguwo akali ciimikilo camukuba. Bulamfu bwaciimikilo bwakali tukokola totatwe. Alimwi ciimikilo cakalizyungulukidwe tusabwe tupesedwe amapomegranite; zyoonse zyakalifulidwe amukuba. Acalo ciimikilo cabili cakali mbubonya, cakali atusabwe.

alimwi mumunzi wakabweza umwi silutwe iwakali kulanga basilumamba, abantu bosanwe ibakali kulayana amwami ibakajanwa mumunzi, amulembi wasilutwe wampi iwakali kubunganya bantu bacisi, abantu banyika bali makumi aali musanu alimwi mbaakajana mumunzi.
Aba boonse Nebuzaradana mupati wabasikutabilila wakababweza akubasisya kumwami waBabuloni ku-Ribila.
Lino mwami wa-Babuloni wakabauma akubajaya nkukonya oko ku-Ribila munyika ya-Hamati. Mbuboobo ba-Juda mbubakatolwa mubuzike akugwisigwa munyika yabo.

Elyo basilutwe boonse babasilumamba abantu babo ibakakede musokwe, nibakamvwa kuti mwami wa-Babuloni wabika Gedaliya kuti abe mweendelezi, bakasika abantu babo kuli-Gedaliya ku-Mizipa, nkukuti Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya a-Johanana mwana waKareya a-Seraya mwana wa-Tanumeti waku-Netofa a-Jazaniya mwana wa-Maakari.
Mpawo Gedaliya wakabakonkezya abantu babo, wati, Mutayoowi balanda baba-Kasidi. Amukale omuno munyika akulemeka mwami wa-Babuloni, aboobo muyookala kabotu.
Mpawo bakanyamuka bantu boonse, bapati abaniini, abasilutwe bampi, akuya ku-Egepita, nkaambo bakali kuyoowa ba-Kasidi.
Nkabela wakamwaambila caluse, wasumpula cuuno cakwe kwiinda zyuuno zyabaminyina mbaakali abo muBabuloni,
wasamununa zyakusama zyakwe zyabuzike, nkabela Joyakini wakali kulya insima kuntafule yamwami mazuba oonse ngaakacili kupona.
Caabilo cakwe cazilyo wakacipegwa lyoonse, cakazwa mumaanza aamwami, mazuba oonse ngaakapona.
Kainane, Maleleli, Jarede,
Enoki, Metusela, Lameki,
Nowa, Semu, Hamu, a-Jafeti.
Bana ha-Gomeri mbaaba: Asikenazi, aDifati, a-Togarima.
Abana ba-Javani mbaaba: Elisa, a-Tarisisa, Kitimu a-Rodanimu.
Abana ba-Kusi mbaaba: Seba, a-Havila, a-Sabita, a-Rama, a-Sabteka. Abana baRama mbaaba: Seba a-Dedani.
Nkabela Kusi wakazyala Nimrodi. Walo wakatalika kuba mwaalumi sintaze ansi.
Alimwi Mizraimu nguwakazyala ba-Ludi, aba-Anami, aba-Lehabi, aba-Naftuki,
aba-Patrusi, aba-Kasluki (kulimbabo ba-Filisti nkubakazwida), aba-Kafitori.
Alakwe Kanana wakazyala Sidoni mwanaakwe mutaanzi, a-Heti,
aba-Jebusi, aba-Amori, aba-Girigasi,
aba-Hivi, aba-Ariki, aba-Sini,
aba-Arivadi, aba-Zemari, aba-Hamati.
Lino Aripakisadi wakazyala Sela, alakwe Sela wakazyala Eberi.
Nkabela Eberi wakazyalilwa bana bobile. Izina lyaumwi kali Pelegi (Lwaandaano), nkaambo mumazuba aakwe nyika yakaandaanisigwa, azina lyamunyina kali Jokitani.
Lino Jokitani wakazyala Almodadi, a-Selefi, a-Hazaramaveti, a-Jera,
a-Hadoramu, a-Uzali, a-Dikila,
a-Ebala, a-Abimaele, a-Seba,
a-Ofiri, aHavila, a-Jobabi. Aba boonse kabali bana ba-Jokitani.
Eberi, Pelegi, Reu,
Serugi, Nahori, Tera,
Abramu (ngonguwe Abrahamu).
Abana ba-Abrahamu bakali Izaka a-Ismayeli.
Ndeeli ibbuku lyamazyalani aabo.
Mwana mutaanzi wa-Ismayeli kali Nebayoti; elyo Kedara, a-Adibeli, a-Mibisamu,
Misma, a-Duma, Masa, Hadada, a-Tema,
a-Jeturi, a-Nafisi, a-Kedema. Mbaabo bana ba-Ismayeli,
Abana ba-Midyani mbaaba: Efa, a-Eferi, a-Hanoki, a-Abida, a-Elidaa, Aba boonse bakali bana ba-Ketura.
Abana ba-Elifazi mbaaba: Temani, a-Omara, Zefi, a-Gatamu, Kenazi, a-Timna, a-Amaleki.
Bana ba-Reueli mbaaba: Nahati, Zera, Sama, a-Miza.
Bana ba-Seiri mbaaba: Lotani, a-Sobala, a-Zibeoni, a-Ana, a-Disoni, a-Ezeri, a-Disani.
Bana ba-Lotani mbaaba: Hori, a-Homamu, alimwi Timna kali mucizi wa-Lotani.
Bana ba-Sobala mbaaba: Abyani, a-Manahati, a-Ebala, Sefi, a-Onamu. Abana ba-Zibeoni mbaaba: Aya a-Ana,
Mwana wa-Ana kali Disoni. Abana ba-Disoni mbaaba: Hamirani, a-Esibani, a-Itrani, a-Kerani.
Bana ba-Ezeri mbaaba: Bilani, aZavani, a-Jakani. Bana ba-Disani mbaaba: Uzi a-Arani.
Nkabela Bela naakafwa, Jobabi mwana wa-Zera waku-Bozira nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Alimwi Jobabi naakafwa, Husamu wakunyika yaba-Temani nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Alimwi Husamu naakafwa, Hadada mwana wa-Bedadi nguwakalya izina lyakwe, ngonguwe wakazunda ba-Midyani kunkanda ya-Moabu. Izina lyamunzi wakwe kuuli Aviti.
Alimwi Hadada naakafwa, Samla wakuMasereka nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Alimwi Samla naakafwa, Saulo waku-Rehoboti kumbali lyamulonga nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Alimwi Saulo naakafwa, Baalahanani mwana wa-Akiboro nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Alimwi Baalahanani naakafwa, Hadada nguwakalya izina lyakwe. Izina lyamunzi wakwe kuuli Pai, alimwi izina lyamukaakwe kali Mehetabele mwana wa-Matradi mwana wa-Mezahabu.
silutwe Oholibama, silutwe Ela, silutwe Pinoni,
silutwe Kenazi, silutwe Temani, silutwe Mizibara,
silutwe Magadieli, silutwe Iramu. Mbaabo basilutwe baEdomu.
Dani, Josefa, a-Benjamini, Nafitali, Gadi a-Aseri.
Bana ba-Juda mbaaba: Eri, a-Onani, a-Sela, Batisua mu-Kanana nguwakamuzyalila aba botatwe. Pele Eri, mwana mutaanzi wa-Juda, wakabisya kumeso aa-Jehova, aboobo wakamujaya.
Alimwi Tamari mukamwana wakwe wakamuzyalila Perezi a-Zera, aboobo bana boonse ba-Juda bakali bosanwe.
Lino bana ba-Perezi mbaaba: Hezironi aHamuli.
Abana ba-Zera mbaaba: Zimri, a-Etani, a-Hemani, a-Kalikoli, a-Dara; boonse bakali bosanwe.
Amwana wa-Karmi: Akari, ngonguwe iwakapenzya Israyeli naakabisya kukubweza cintu citonda.
Amwana waEtani: Azariya.
Lino Ramu wakazyala Aminadabu, alakwe Aminadabu wakazyala Nasoni silutwe wabana ba-Juda.
Nkabela Nasoni wakazyala Salima, alakwe Sa lima wakazyala Boazi,
alakwe Boazi wakazyala Obedi, alakwe Obedi waka zya la Jese.
awane Netaneli, awasanu Radai,
awamusanu aumwi Ozemu, awamusanu ababili Davida,
Abacizi babo bakali Zeruya aAbigayeli. Abana ba-Zeruya mbaaba: Abisai a-Joabu a-Asaheli, bali botatwe.
Alakwe Abigayeli wakazyala Amasa, Wisi Amasa kali jeteri muIsmayeli.
Nkabela Kalebe mwana wa-Hezironi, mukaakwe Azuba wakamuzyalila bana, alakwe Jerioti wakamuzyalila. Mazina aabana bakwe mbaaba: Jeseri, a-Sobabu, a-Aridoni.
Alimwi Azuba naakafwa, Kalebe wakakwata Efrata, ngonguwe wakamuzyalila Huri.
Lino Huri wakazyala Uri, alakwe Uri wakazyala Bezaleli.
Segubu kali wisi Jairi, ngonguwe iwakavubide minzi iili makumi obile aitatu munyika ya-Gileadi.
Pele Gesuri a-Aramu bakabanyanzya minzi ya-Jairi, Kenati atunzuunzi twawo, minzi iili makumi aali musanu alimwi, Aba boonse bakali bana ba-Makiri wisi Gileadi.
Lino Hezironi naakafwa, Kalebe wakoona a-Efrata, muka-Hezironi wisi, nkabela wakamuzyalila Asuri wisi Tekowa.
Bana ba-Jerameli mwana mutaanzi wa-Hezironi mbaaba: mutaanzi Ramu, a-Buna, a-Oreni, a-Ozemu, a-Ahija.
Nkabela Jerameli kakwete mwanakazi aumwi, izina lyakwe kali Atara. Mbombabo banyina Onamu.
Lino bana ba-Ramu mwana mutaanzi wa-Jerameli mbaaba: Maazi, a-­Jamini, a-Ekeri.
Abana ba-Onamu bakali Samai a-Jada. Abana ba-­Samai bakali Nadabu a-Abisuri,
Izina lyamuka-Abisuri kali Abihaili, Ngonguwe wakazyala Abani a-Molidi.
Abana ba-Nadabu mbaaba: Seledi a-Apaimu, pele Seledi wakafwa katazyede bana,
Amwana waApaimu kali Isi, Amwana wa-Isi kali Sesani, Amwana wa-Sesani kali Alai.
Bana ba-Jada munyina Samai mbaaba: jeteri a-Jonatani. Pe le Jeteri wakafwa katazyede bana,
Abana ba-Jonatani bakali Peleti a-Zaza. Mbaabo boonse ba-Jerameli.
Lino Sesani takwakazyala baalumi, kazyede banakazi luzutu, Pele Sesani kajisi muzike mu-Egepita, izina lyakwe kali Jara,
Nkabela Sesani wakakwatya oyo muzike wakwe jara mwanaakwe musimbi, elyo wakamuzya-lila Atai.
Lino Atai wakazyala Natani, alakwe Natani wakazyala Zabadi,
alakwe Zabadi wakazyala Efilali, alakwe Efilali wakazyala Obedi,
alakwe Obedi wakazyala jehu, alakwe Jehu wakazyala Azariya,
