alakwe Azariya wakazyala Helezi, alakwe Helezi wakazyala Eleasa,
alakwe Eleasa wakazyala Sismai, alakwe Sismai wakazyala Salumu,
alakwe Salumu wakazyala Jekemiya, alakwe Jekemiya wakazyala Elisama.
Bana ba-Kalebe munyina Jerameli mbaaba. Mutaanzi kali Maresa, ngonguwe wisi Zifi, Alimwi mwana wa-Maresa kali Hebroni.
Abana ba-Hebroni bakali Kora, a-Tapuwa, a-Rekemu, a-Sema.
Nkabela Sema wakazyala Rahamu wisi jorikeamu. Alakwe Rekemu wakazyala Samai.
Amwana wa-Samai kali Maoni. Alakwe Maoni wakazyala Betizuri.
Alimwi Efa, simamambe wa-Kalebe, wakazyala Harani, a-Moza, a-Gazezi, Harani nguwakazyala Gazezi,
Abana ba-Jadai bakali Regemu, a-Jotamu, a-Gesani, a-Peleti, a-Efa, a-Safa.
Alimwi Maaka, simamambe wa-Kalebe wakazyala Seberi a-Tirana.
Alimwi wakazyala Safa wisi Madimana, Seva wisi Makibena, awisi Gibeya, Nkabela mwana musimbi wa-Kalebe kali Akisa,
Abo boonse bakali bana ba-Kalebe.
Abana ba-Huri, mwana mutaanzi wa-Efrata, mbaaba: Sobala wisi Kiriati­ Jearimu,
Salma wisi Betelehemu, a-Harafi wisi Betigaderi.
Alimwi Sobala wisi Kiriati-Jearimu kazyede bana abamwi, nkukuti Haroe, acisela caba-Hamenukoti.
Anzubo zyaba-Kiriati-Jearimu nzeezi: ba-Itiri, abaPuti, aba-Sumati, aba-Misriai. Mulimbabo mobakazwa ba-Zorati abaEsitaoli.
Abana ba-Salma mbaaba: Betelehemu, aba-Netofati, aba-Atrotibeti-Joabu, acisela caba-Manahati, aba-Zori.
Alimwi inzubo zyabalembi ibakakede ku-Jabezi nzeezi: ba-Tirati, aba-Simeati, aba-Sukati, Mbombabo ba-Keni ibakazwa ku-Hamati wisi luzubo lwaba-Rekabu.
awatatu kali Abisalomu mwana wa-Maaka mwana musimbi wa-Talimai mwami wa-Gesuri; awane kali Adonija mwana wa-Hagiti;
awamusanu kali Sefatiya mwana wa-Abitali; awamusanu aumwi kali Itreamu ngwaakazyala mukaakwe Egila.
Abo bali musanu aumwi bakazyalwa ku-Hebroni, nkwaakeendelezya myaka iili musanu aibili amyezi iili musanu aumwi, Nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili makumi otatwe amyaka yotatwe,
Lino mbaaba mbaakazyalilwa mu-Jerusalemu: Simeya, a-Sobabu, a-Natani, a-Solomoni, bana bone mbaakazyala Batisua mwana musimbi wa-Amiyeli,
a-Ibara, a-Elisama, a-Elifeleti,
a-Noga, a-Nefegi, a-Jafiya,
a-Elisama, a-Eliada, a-Elifeleti, bana bali musanu abane.
Mbaabo boonse bana ba-Davida, kutaamba bana babasimamambe, a-Tamara mucizi wabo.
iwakazyala joramu, iwakazyala Ahaziya, iwakazyala Joasi,
iwakazyala Amaziya, iwakazyala Azariya, iwakazyala jotamu,
iwakazyala Ahazi, iwakazyala Hezekiya, iwakazyala Manase,
iwakazyala Amoni, iwakazyala Josiya.
Nkabela bana ba-Josiya mbaaba: mutaanzi johanana, awabili Jehoyakimu, awatatu Zedekiya, awane Salumu,
Alimwi jehoyakimu wakazyala Jekoniya, ngonguwe iwakazyala Zedekiya.
a-Malikiramu, a-Pedayu, a-Senazara, a-Jekamiya, a-Hosama, a-Nedabiya.
Abana ba-Pedaya mbaaba: Zerubabeli a-Simei. Abana ba-Zerubabeli mbaaba: Mesulamu, a-Hananiya, a-Selomiti mucizi wabo,
a-Hasuba, a-Oheli, a-Berekiya, a-Hasadiya, a-Jusabihesedi, bana bosanwe.
Abana ba-Hananiya mbaaba: Pelatiya, a-Jesaya, bana ba-Refaya, bana ba-Arinani, bana ba-Obadiya, bana ba-Sekaniya.
Amwana wa-Sekaniya kali Semaya. Abana ba-Semaya mbaaba: Hatusi, a-Igali, a-Bariya, a-Neariya, a-Safati, bana bali musanu aumwi.
Abana ba-Neariya mbaaba: Eliunai, a-Hizikiya, a-Azrikamu, botatwe.
Abana ba-Eliunai mbaaba: Hodavia, a-Eliyasibu, a-Pelaya, a-Akubu, a-Johanana, a-Delaya, a-Anani, bana bali musanu ababili.
Nkabela Resaya mwana wa-Sobala nguwakazyala Jahati. Alakwe jahati wakazyala Ahumai a-Lahadi, Nzenzizyo inzubo zyabaZorati,
Abana ba-Etamu mbaaba: jezreeli, a-Isma, a-Idibasi. Alimwi izina lyamucizi wabo kali Hazeleleponi.
Nkabela Penueli kali wisi Gedoro, alakwe Ezeri kali wisi Husa, Mbaabo bana ba-Huri, mwana mutaanzi wa-Efrata wisi Betelehemu.
Lino Asuri WISI Tekowa kakwete banakazi bobile, Hela a-Naara.
Naara nguwakamuzyalila Ahuzamu, a-Heferi, a-Temeni, a-Hahastari. Mbaabo bana ba-Naara.
Abana ba-Hela bakali Zereti, Izara, a-Etinani.
Nkabela Kozi nguwakazyala Anubu, a-Zobeba, anzubo zya-Ahareli mwana wa-Harumu.

Pele Jabezi wakakwiilila Leza wa-Israyeli, wakati, Ndakumbila kuti undilongezye ncobeni, akukomezya caabilo cangu canyika. Ijanza lyako libe ambebo, undivune kububi, kuti butandibisizyi. Nkabela Leza wakamucitila mbubonya mbwaakakumbila.
Lino Kelubu munyina Sua nguwakazyala Mehiri, iwakazyala Esitoni.
Nkabela Esitoni wakazyala Betirafa, a-Paseya, a-Tehini wisi Irinahasi. Mbaabo bantu ba-Reka.
Abana ba-Kenazi mbaaba: Otiniyeli, a-Seraya. Abana ba-Otiniyeli mbaaba: Hatati a-Meonotai.
Meonotai nguwakazyala Ofira, alakwe Seraya nguwakazyala Joabu wisi Geharasimu. Bakategwa obo nkaambo kakuti bakali basikubeza,
Alimwi bana ba-Kalebe mwana waJefune mbaaba: Iru, Ela, a-Naama. Amwana wa-Ela: Kenazi.
Abana ba-Jehaleleli bakali Zifi, a-Zifa, Tiriya, a-Asareli,
Abana ba-Ezara bakali Jeteri, a-Meredi, a-Eferi, a-Jaloni. Mbaaba bana ba-Bitiya, mwana musimbi wa-Farao, Meredi ngwaakakwata, Wakaminta, wakazyala Miriamu, a-Samai, a-Isba wisi Esitemowa.
Amukaakwe mu-Juda wakazyala jeredi wisi Gedoro, a-Heberi wisi Soko, a-Jekutiyeli wisi Zanowa.
Abana bamuka-Hodiya, mucizi wa-Nahamu, bakali bawisi Kula mu-Garimi aEsitemowa mu-Maaka.
Abana ba-Simoni bakali Amnoni, a-Rina, Benehanana, a-Tiloni. Abana ba-Isi bakali Zoheti a-Benzoheti.
a-Jokimu, abantu ba-Kozeba, a-Joasi, a-Sarafa iwakeendelezya kuMoabu, a-Jasubilehemu. Makani aya ngaciindi.
Aba bantu bakali babumbi, ibakakede ku-Netaimu aku-Gedara, Bakaakukala nkuko amwami mumilimo yakwe.
Bana ba-Simeoni bakali Nemueli, a-Jamini, Jaribu, Zera, Saulo,
ngonguwe wakazyala Salumu, iwakazyala Mibsamu, iwakazyala Misma,
Abana ba-Misma mbaaba. Wakazyala Hamueli, iwakazyala Zakuri, iwakazyala Simei.
Lino Simei wakazyala bana balombe bali ikumi amusanu aumwi abana basimbi bali musanu aumwi, pele babunyina teebakazyede bana banji pe, anzubo zyabo zyoonse teezyakavula mbuli bana baJuda.
Nkabela bakali kukala ku-Bceriseba, aku-Molada, aku-Hazarasuala,
aku-Bila, aku-Ezemu, aku-Toladi,
aku-Betueli, aku-Horima, aku-Zikilaga,
aku-Betimarikaboti, aku-Hazarasusimu, aku-Betibiri, akuSaraimu, Njeeyo minzi yabo, njibakali kukala mulinjiyo mane kusikila kubwami bwa-Davida,
Aminzi iibambene ayo njeeyi: Etamu, a-Ayini, a-Rimoni, a-Tokeni, a-Asana, minzi yosanwe,
atunzuunzi twayo toonse tweengelede mane kusikila ku-Baala. Ngaaya mazina aamakalilo aabo aalembedwe mumabuku aabo.
Mesobabu, a-Jamleki, a-Josa mwana wa-Amaziya,
a-Joeli, a-Jehu mwana wa-Josibiya, mwana wa-Seraya, mwana wa-Asieli,
a-Eliunai, a-Jaakoba, a-Jesohaya, a-Asaya, a-Adieli, a-Jesimieli, a-Benaya,
a-Ziza mwana wa-Sifi, mwana wa-Aloni, mwana wa-Jedaya, mwana wa-Simri, mwana wa-Semaya,
aba boonse balembedwe mazina aabo bakali bami munzubo zyabo, nkabela luzubo lwabamawisi lwakavula loko.
Lino bakaya kumanjililo aa-Gedoro, kubbazu lyakujwe lyakuti, kuya buyandaula macelelo aambelele zyabo,
Oko bakajana macezezyo manono mabotu, alimwi nyika yakalikwazeme, yakalyuumwide akutontola, nkaambo bantu ibakataanguna kukala nkuko bakali bana ba-Hamu.

Lino aba balembedwe mazina aabo bakeza mumazuba aa-Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda, banyonyoona zilao zyabo, aba-Meuni ibakakede nkuko, babafwidilizya mane kusikila sunu, akukala mumweenya wabo, nkaambo bakajana macelelo aambelele zyabo nkuko.
Abamwi babo, bana ba-Simeoni bali myanda yosanwe, bakaya kucilundu ca-Seiri. Basololi babo bakali Pelatiya, a-Neariya, a-Refaya, a-Uzieli, bana ba-Isi.
Nkabela bakanyonyoona ba-Amaleki ibakacisyeede, akukala nkukonya oko, nkubacibede asunu.
Juda nguwakajata inguzu kwiinda babunyina, alimwi munyungu zyakwe momwakazyalwa musolozi, nekubaboobo Josefa nguwakapegwa bulemu bwamwana mutaanzi).
Bana ba-Rubeni mwana mutaanzi wa-Israyeli mbaaba: Hanoki, a-Palu, Hezroni, a-Karmi.
Abana ba-Joeli: wakazyala Semaya, iwakazyala Gogo, iwakazyala Simeyi,
iwakazyala Mika, iwakazyala Reaya, iwakazyala Baala,
iwakazyala Beera, ngonguwe Tigilati Pilneseri mwami wa-Asuri ngwaakatola mubuzike, kali silutwe waba-Rubeni.
Ababunyina anzubo zyabo, mbubalembedwe mubbuku lyabansiku, mbaaba: mutaanzi kali jeyeli, aZekariya,
a-Bela mwana wa-Azazi mwana wa-Sema, mwana wa-Joeli, ngonguwe iwakakede ku-Aroeri akusikila ku-Nebo aku-Baalameoni.
Alimwi wakakala kujwe mane kusikila kumagolelo aankanda okuno kutala lyamulonga Firate, nkaambo iŋombe zyabo zyakavula kucisi ca-Gileadi,
Nkabela mumazuba aa-Saulo bakalwisya ba-Hagiri, babazunda akukala muzilao zyabo moonse mucisi cili kujwe lya-Gileadi,
Joeli kali mutaanzi, a-Safamu wabili, a-Janai, aSafati, munyika ya-Basana,
Ababunyina baluzubo lwawisi mbaaba: Mikayeli, a-Mesulamu, a-Seba, a-Jorai, a-Jakani, a-Ziya, a-Eberi, bantu bali musanu ababili.
Mbaabo bana ba-Abihaili mwana wa-Huri mwana wa-Jarowa mwana wa-Gileadi mwana wa-Mikayeli mwana wa-Jesisai mwana wa-Jado mwana wa-Buzi.
Ahi mwana wa-Abidieli mwana waGuni kali silutwe waluzubo lwabo,
nkabela bakakala mu-Gileadi, amuBasana amutunzuunzi twawo amumacezezyo oonse aa-Sarani mane kusikila kumagolelo aawo,
Boonse bakalilembedwe mumazuba aa-Jotamu mwami wa-Juda amumazuba aa-Jeroboamu mwami wa-Israyeli.

Lino bana ba-Rubeni aba-Gadi acisela camukowa wa-Manase kabajisi baalumi basintaze ibakali kusama intobo amapanga akulapula mata, bacenjede loko munakani aankondo, bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi one azine amyanda iili musanu aibili amakumi aali musanu alimwi, boonse basilumamba.
Nkabela bakalwisya ba-Hagari, a-Jeturi a-Nafisi a-Nodabu,
elyo bakagwasigwa, aboobo ba-Hagari aboonse mbobakali abo bakaabwa mumaanza aabo, nkaambo mukati kankondo bakakwiilila Leza, nkabela wakabaswiilila ambuli mbubakali kumusyoma.
Lino bakasaala imbono zyabo, inkamele zili zyuulu zili makumi osanwe, azyuulu zili myanda yobile amakumi osanwe zyambelele, ambongolo zili zyuulu zyobile, abantu bali zyuulu zili mwaanda.
Nkaambo banjibanji bakajayigwa, nkaambo inkondo yakali ya-Leza, Elyo bakakala mumwenya wabo mane kusikila kuciindi cabuzike.
Lino bana bacisela camukowa wa-Manase bakali banji loko, bakali kukala moonse munyika kuzwa ku-Basana akusikila ku-Baala Herimoni aku-Seniri akucilundu ca-Herimoni,
Mbaaba bapati banzubo zyabo: Eferi, a-Isi, a-Elieli, a-Azrieli, a-Jeremiya, a-Hodaviya, a-Jadieli, Boonse bakali baalumi basintaze, basimpuwo, bapati banzubo zyabamawisi.

Elyo Leza wa-Israyeli wakabusya moyo wa-Puli mwami wa-Asuri amoyo wa-TigilatiPilineseri mwami wa-Asuri, nkabela ba-Rubeni aba-Gadi acisela camukowa wa-Manase bakabatola boonse mubuzike, babasisya ku-Hala aku-Habori aku-Hara akumulonga Gozani, nkubacibede asunu.
Abana baKohati mbaaba: Amramu, Izara, Hebroni, a-Uzieli.
Abana ba­ Amramu: Aroni, a-Musa, a-Miriamu. Abana ba-Aroni: Nadabu a-Abihu a-Eleazara a-Itamara.
Lino Eleazara wakazyala Pinehasi, alakwe Pinehasi wakazyala Abisuwa,
alakwe Abisuwa wakazyala Buki, alakwe Buki wakazyala Uzi,
alakwe Uzi wakazyala Zerahiya, alakwe Zerahiya wakazyala Merayoti,
alakwe Merayoti wakazyala Amariya, alakwe Amariya wakazyala Ahitubi,
alakwe Ahitubi wakazyala Zadoki, alakwe Zadoki wakazyala Ahimaazi,
alakwe Ahimaazi wakazyala Azariya, alakwe Azariya wakazyala johanani,
alakwe Johanani wakazyala Azariya (ngonguwe wakali mupaizi muŋanda yaSolomoni njaakayaka mu-Jerusalemu),
alakwe Azariya wakazyala Amariya, alakwe Amariya wakazyala Ahitubi,
alakwe Ahitubi wakazyala Zadoki, alakwe Zadoki wakazyala Salumu,
alakwe Salumu wakazyala Hilikiya, alakwe Hilikiya wakazyala Azariya,
alakwe Azariya wakazyala Seraya, alakwe Seraya wakazyala Jehozadaki.
Oyo Jehozadaki wakatolwa mubuzike ciindi eco Jehova naakatozya ba-Juda aba-Jerusalemu mubuzike kumaanza aa-Nebukadinezara.
Amazina aabana ba-Gerisomu mbaaba: Libni a-Simei.
Abana ba-Kohati: Amramu, a-Izara, a-Hebroni, a-Uzieli.
Abana ba-Merari: Mali a-Musi. Nzeezi inzubo zyaba-Levi abansiku bazyo,
Gerisomu wakazyala Libni, iwakazyala jahati, iwakazyala Zina,
iwakazyala jowa, iwakazyala Ido, iwakazyala Zera, iwakazyala jeatemi.
Abana ba-Kohati: wakazyala Aminadabu, iwakazyala Kora, iwakazyala Asiri,
iwakazyala Elikana, iwakazyala Ebiasafu, iwakazyala Asiri,
iwakazyala Tahati, iwakazyala Urieli, iwakazyala Uziya, iwakazyala Saulo.
Abana ba-Elikana: wakazyala Amasai a-Ahimoti,
iwakazyala Elikana, iwakazyala Zofai, iwakazyala Nahati,
iwakazyala Eliabu, iwakazyala Jerohamu, iwakazyala Elikana.
Abana ba-Samuele: mutaanzi Joeli, awabili Aibya.
Bana ba-Merari: Mali, iwakazyala Libni, iwakazyala Simei, iwakazyala Uza,
iwakazyala Simeya, iwakazyala Hagiya, iwakazyala Asaya.
Bakali kubeleka milimo yakwiimba kunembo lyatente lyakubunganina bantu nkubakali kukomba mane lumwi Solomoni wakayaka iŋanda ya-­Jehova mu-Jerusalemu, Elyo bakabeleka milimo yabo muciyanza ceelede.
Mbaaba ibakali kubeleka abana babo, Bana ba-Kohati: Hemani sikwiimba mwana wa-Joeli, mwana wa-Samuele,
mwana wa-Elikana, mwana wa-Jerohamu, mwana wa-Elieli mwana wa-Towa,
mwana wa-Zufi, mwana wa-Elikana, mwana wa-Mahati, mwana wa-Amasai,
mwana wa-Elikana, mwana wa-Joeli, mwana wa-Azariya, mwana wa-Zefaniya,
mwana wa-Tahati, mwana wa-Asiri, mwana wa-Abiasafu, mwana waKora,
mwana wa-Izara, mwana wa-Kohati, mwana wa-Levi, mwana wa-Israyeli,
Amweenzinyina iwakaimvwi kululyo lwakwe kali Asafu, Oyo Asafu kali mwana wa-Berekiya, mwana wa-Simeya,
mwana waMikayeli, mwana wa-Baaseya, mwana wa-Malikiya,
mwana wa-Etini, mwana wa-Zera, mwana wa-Adaya,
mwana wa-Etani, mwana wa-Zima, mwana wa-Simeyi,
mwana wa-Jahati, mwana wa-Gerisomu, mwana waLevi.
Alimwi acimwensi cabo mpobakaimvwi beenzinyina bana baMerari: Etani mwana wa-Kisi, mwana wa-Abidi, mwana wa-Maluki,
mwana wa-Hasabiya, mwana wa-Amaziya, mwana wa-Hilikiya,
mwana wa-Amzi, mwana wa-Bani, mwana wa-Semeri,
mwana wa-Mali, mwana wa-Musi, mwana wa-Merari, mwana wa-Levi,
Nkabela bakwabo ba-Levi mbobakabikwa kuti babeleke milimo yoonse yaŋanda ya-Leza.
Lino bana ba-Aroni mbaaba: wakazyala Eleazara, iwakazyala Pinehasi, iwakazyala Abisuwa,
iwakazyala Buki, iwakazyala Uzi, iwakazyala Zerahiya,
iwakazyala Merayoti, iwakazyala Amariya, iwakazyala Ahitubi,
iwakazyala Zadoki, iwakazyala Ahimaazi.
elyo bakabapa Hebroni munyika ya-Juda, amacezezyo aawo aaengelede,
pele myuunda yamunzi atunzuunzi twawo bakazipa Kalebe mwana wa-Jefune.
Alimwi bana ba-Aroni bakapegwa minzi yamayubilo, Hebroni, a-Libini amacezezyo aawo, a-Jatiri, a-Estimoa amacezezyo aawo,
a-Hileni amacezezyo aawo, a-Debiri amacezezyo aawo,
a-Asana amacezezyo aawo, a-Betesemesi amacezezyo aawo;
amunyika yamukowa wa-Benjamini bakapegwa Geba amacezezyo aawo, a-Alemeti amacezezyo aawo, a-Anatotu amacezezyo aawo, Minzi yoonse yanzubo zyabo yakali ikumi aitatu.
Abalo baGerisomu, inzubo zyabo zyakapegwa minzi iili ikumi aitatu munyika yamukowa wa-Isakara amunyika yamukowa wa-Aseri amunyika yamukowa waNafitali amunyika yamukowa wa-Manase yaku-Basana.
Abalo bana ba-Merari, inzubo zyabo zyakaabilwa minzi iili ikumi aibili munyika yamukowa wa-Rubeni amunyika yamukowa wa-Gadi amunyika yamukowa wa-Zebuloni.
Mbuboobo bana ba-Israyeli mbubakaabila ba-Levi minzi amacezezyo aayo.
Bakabapa minzi eyo iiambwa mazina munyika yamukowa wa-Juda ayamukowa wa-Simeoni ayamukowa wa-Benjamini.
Bakabapa minzi yamayubilo, Sekemu amacezezyo aawo mutulundulundu twa-Efraimu, a-Gezeri amacezezyo aawo,
a-Jokimeamu amacezezyo aawo, a-Betihoroni amacezezyo aawo,
a-Ajaloni amacezezyo aawo, a-Gatirimoni amacezezyo aawo,
amunyika yacisela camukowa wa-Manase bakapegwa Aneri amacezezyo aawo, a-Bileamu amacezezyo aawo, ibe yanzubo zyabana ba-Kohati izyakasyeede.
amunyika yamukowa wa-Isakara, Kedesi amacezezyo aawo, a-Dabarati amacezezyo aawo,
a-Ramoti amacezezyo aawo, a-Anemu amacezezyo aawo;
amunyika yamukowa wa-Aseri, Masala amacezezyo aawo, a-Abidoni amacezezyo aawo;
a-Hukoki amacezezyo aawo, a­-Rehobu amacezezyo aawo;
amunyika yamukowa wa-Nafitali, Kedesi waku-Galilaya amacezezyo aawo, a-Hamoni amacezezyo aawo, a-Kiriyataimu amacezezyo aawo.
Abalo bana ba-Merari ibakasyaala bakaabilwa minzi munyika yamukowa wa-Zebuloni: Rimoni amacezezyo aawo, a-Tabori amacezezyo aawo;
amutala lya-Jordano lyakujwe ku-Jeriko, munyika yamukowa wa-Rubeni, bakapegwa Bezeri munkanda amacezezyo aawo, a-Jaza amacezezyo aawo,
a-Kedemoti amacezezyo aawo, a-Mefati amacezezyo aawo;
amunyika yamukowa wa-Gadi bakapegwa Ramoti waku-­Gileadi amacezezyo aawo, a-Mahanaimu amacezezyo aawo,
a-Hezboni amacezezyo aawo, a-Jazeri amacezezyo aawo.

Abana ba-Tola: Uzi, a-Refaya, a-Jerieli, a-Jamai, a-Ibsamu, a-Samuele. Abo bakali basilutwe banzubo zyabamawisi mumukowa wa-Tola, baalumi basintaze muzyalani lyabo. Mweelwe wabo mumazuba aa-Davida wakasika kuzyuulu zili makumi obile azibili amyanda iili musanu aumwi.
Amwana wa-Uzi: Izrahiya. Abana ba-Izrahiya: Mikayeli, a-Obadiya, a-Joeli, aIsiya, Abo bosanwe boonse bakali basilutwe.
Antoomwe abaaba, basilumamba balembedwe mubbuku lyabansiku babo bakali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe amusanu acimwi, nkaambo bakalijisi banakazi banji abana banji.
Bakwabo boonse banzubo zyoonse zya-Isakara ibakali basilumamba bakali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aatatu amusanu azibili.
Abana ba-Bela: Ezboni, a-Uzi, a-Uzieli, a-Jerimoti, a-Iri, bosanwe, basilutwe banzubo, baalumi basintaze. Abantu babo ibakalembwa bakasika kuzyuulu zili makumi obile azibili amakumi otatwe abane.
Abana ba-Bekeri: Zemira, a-Joasi, a-Eliezeri, a-Eliunai, a-Omri, a-Jeremoti, aAbiya, a-Anatoti, a-Alemeti.
Aba boonse kabali bana ba-Bekeri, Abantu babo ibakalembwa mumazyalani aabo, bapati banzubo zyabamawisi, baalumi basintaze, bakali zyuulu zili makumi obile amyanda yobile.
Amwana wa-Jedyaeli: Bilani. Abana ba-Bilani: jeusi, a-Benjamini, a-Ehudi, aKenana, a-Zetani, a-Tarasisi, a-Ahisahara,
Aba boonse bakali bana ba-Jedyaeli, bapati banzubo zyabamawisi, baalumi basintaze, basilumamba bali zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu azibili amyanda yobile ibakali kuya kunkondo.
Abana ba-Iri mbaaba: Supimu a-Hupimu. Amwana wa-Aheri kali Husimu.
Nkabela Makiri wakakwata mwanakazi waluzubo lwa-Hupimu a-Supimu, izina lyakwe kali Maaka. Amwana wabili wa-Manase kali Zelofahadi. Oyo Zelofahadi wakazyala basimbi.
Lino Maaka muka-Makiri wakazyala mulombe, wamuulika izina lya-Peresi, azina lyamucizi wakwe kali Seresi. Bana bakwe mbaaba: Ulamu a-Rekemu.
Amwana wa-Ulamu kali Bedani, Mbaabo bana ba-Gileadi mwana wa-Makiri mwana wa-Manase.
Alakwe mucizi wakwe Hamoleketi nguwakazyala Isodi, a-Abiezeri, aMala.
Abana ba-Semida mbaaba: Ahiani, a-Sekemu, a-Liki, a-Aniamu.
iwakazyala Zabadi, iwakazyala Sutela, a-Ezeri a-Eleadi. Mbombabo bana ba-Gati ibakazyalwa munyika mbobakajaya nkaambo kakuti bakeza kuzoosaala iŋombe zyabo.
Nkabela Efraimu wisaabo wakabalila mazuba manji, elyo babunyina bakeza kuzoomuumbulizya.
Mpawo wakoona amukaakwe, nkabela wakaminta, wazyala mulombe. Oyo mulombe wakamuulika izina lya-Beriya, nkaambo kakuti luzubo lwakwe lwakasikilwa bubi.
­Alimwi mwanaakwe musimbi kali Seera, ngonguwe wakayaka Beti-horoni wamunsi a-Betihoroni waatala a-Uzeni-Seera.
Alimwi Efraimu wakazyala Reja a-Resefe. Resefe nguwakazyala Tela, iwakazyala Tahani,
iwakazyala Ladana, iwakazyala Amihudi, iwakazyala Elisama,
iwakazyala Nuni, iwakazyala Joshua.
Lino njeeyi nyika njibakaabilwa kuti bakale mulinjiyo: Beteli atunzuunzi twawo; akujwe Narani; akumbo Gezeri atunzuunzi twawo, a-Sekemu atunzuunzi twawo, a-Aza atunzuunzi twawo;

akubambene amugaano wacisi caba-Manase, Betiseani atunzuunzi twawo, a-Taanaki atunzuunzi twawo, a-Megido atunzuunzi twawo, a-Dora atunzuunzi twawo, Njeeyo minzi mobakakede bana ba-Josefa mwana waIsrayeli.
Abana ba-Beriya: Heberi, a-Malikieli, ngonguwe wisi Birizaiti.
Nkabela Heberi wakazyala Jafleti, a-Someri, a-Hotamu, a-Suwa mucizi wabo.
Abana ba-Jafleti: Pasaki, a-Bimali, a-Asvati. Mbaabo bana bajafleti.
Abana ba-Semeri: Ahi, a-Roga, Jehuba, a-Aramu,
Abana ba-Helemu munyina mbaaba: Zofa, a-Imna, a-Selesi, a-Amali.
Abana ba-Zofa: Suwa, a-Harineferi, a-Syvali, a-Beri, a-Imra,
Bezeri, a-Hodi, a-Sama, a-Silisa, a-Itirani, a-Beera.
Abana ba-Jeteri: Jefune, a-Pisipa, a-Ara,
Abana ba-Ula: Ara, a-Hanieli, a-Riziya,

Abo boonse bakali bana ba-Aseri, bapati banzubo zyabamawisi, baalumi basintaze basalidwe, bami bacisi. Mweelwe wabantu ibakalembelwa milimo yankondo wakasika kuzyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu acimwi.
awane Noha, awasanu Rafa,
Abana mbaakazyala Bela mbaaba: Adara, a-Gera, a-Abihudi,
a-Abisuwa, a-Namani, a-Ahowa,
a-Gera, a-Sefufani, a-Huramu.
Abana ba-Ehudi (ibakali basilutwe banzubo zyabamawisi akati kabantu ibakakede ku-Geba, alimwi bakatolwa mubuzike ku-Manahati) mbaaba:
Namani, a-Ahiya, a-Gera (ngonguwe Hegilamu) iwakazyala Uza a-Ahihudi,
Nkabela Saharaimu wakazyala bana mucisi ca-Moabu, naakamana kulekana abanakazi bakwe Husimu a-Baara.
Mukaakwe Hodesi nguwakamuzyalila bana: Jobabu, a-Zibiya, a-Mesa, a-Malikamu,
a-Jeuzi, a-Sakiya, a-Mirima. Mbaabo bana bakwe, basilutwe banzubo.
Alakwe Husimu wakamuzyalila Abitubu a-Elipaala.
Abana ba-Elipaala mbaaba: Eberi, a-Misamu, a-Semedi (ngonguwe wakayaka Ono a-Lodi atunzuunzi twawo),
a-Beriya, a-Sema, (abo bakali basilutwe banzubo zyabantu ibakakede ku-Ajaloni, ibakatanda bantu baku-Gati).
Lino Ahio, Sasaki, a-Jeremoti,
a-Zebadiya, aAradi, a-Ederi,
a-Mikayeli, a-Isipa, a-Joha, bakali bana ba-Benya.
Alimwi Zebadiya, a-Mesulamu, a-Hiziki, a-Heberi,
a-Ismerai, aIzliya, a-Jobabu, bakali bana ba-Elipaala.
A-Jakimu, a-Zikiri, a-Zabadi,
a-Elianai, a-Ziletai, a-Elieli,
a-Adaya, a-Beraya, a-Simirati bakali bana ba-Simei.
A-Isipani, a-Eberi, a-Elieli,
a-Abidoni, a-Zikiri, a-Hanani,
a-Hananiya, a-Elamu, a-Anotiya,
a-Ifideya, a-Penueli, bakali bana ba-Sasaki.
A-Samserai, a-Sehariya, a-Ataliya,
a-Jaaresiya, a-Eliya, a-Zikiri bakali bana ba-Jerohamu,
Mbaabo bapati banzubo zyabamawisi balembedwe mubbuku lyabansiku. Abo bapati kabakede mu-Jerusalemu.
Mwanaakwe mutaanzi kali Abidoni, lino Zuri, a-Kisi, aBaala, a-Nadabu,
a-Gedoro, a-Ahio, a-Zekeri,
a-Mikiloti iwakazyala Simeya. Abo boonse kabakede balibambene ababunyina mu-Jerusalemu.
Amwana wa-Jonatani kali Meribaala, alakwe Meribaala wakazyala Mika.
Abana ba-Mika mbaaba: Pitoni, a-Meleki, a-Tareya, a-Ahazi,
Nkabela Ahazi wakazyala Jehoada, alakwe Jehoada wakazyala Alemeti, a-Azmaveti, aZimri. Alakwe Zimri wakazyala Moza,
alakwe Moza wakazyala Bineya, iwakazyala Rafa, iwakazyala Eleasa, iwakazyala Azeli.
Lino Azeli kajisi bana bali musanu aumwi. Mazina aabo mbaaba: Azrikamu, Bokeru, Ismayeli, Seariya, a-Obadiya, a-Hanani. Mbaabo boonse bana ba-Azeli,
Abana ba-Ezeki munyina mbaaba: Ulamu mutaanzi, awabili Jeusi, awatatu Elifeleti.
Nkabela bana ba-Ulamu bakali baalumi basintaze ibakabwene loko kulapula mata, Alimwi bakalijisi bana banji abazukulu banji, bakali mwanda amakumi osanwe. Abo boonse bakali ba-Benjamini.
Lino abo ibakataanguna kuboola kumakalilo aabo muminzi yabo mbaaba. Mba-Israyeli, abapaizi, aba-Levi, abasimilimo bantempele.
Mu-Jerusalemu mwakakala bamwi bana baJuda abamwi bana ba-Benjamini abamwi ba-Efraimu abamwi ba-Manase.
Umwi kali Utai mwana wa-Amihudi mwana wa-Omri mwana wa-Imri mwana wa-Bani, umwi wabana ba-Perezi mwana wa-Juda.
Abaluzubo lwaba-Siloni: Asaya mutaanzi abana bakwe.
Abana ba-Zera: jeuli ababunyina bali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi aali musanu aane.
Abana ba-Benjamini: Salu mwana wa-Mesulamu mwana wa-Hodaviya mwana wa-Hasenuwa,
a-Ibineya mwana wa-Jerohamu, a-Ela mwana wa-Uzi mwana wa-Mikiri, a-Mesulamu mwana wa-Sefatiya mwana waReueli mwana wa-Ibniya,
ababunyina balembedwe mumazyalani aabo bali myanda iili musanu aine amakumi osanwe amusanu aumwi. Abo bantu boonse bakali basimutwe banzubo zyabamawisi.
a-Azariya mwana wa-Hilikiya mwana wa-Mesulamu mwana wa-Zadoki mwana wa-Merayoti mwana wa-Ahirubi, mupati wamilimo yaŋanda ya-Leza,
a-Adaya mwana wa-Jerohamu mwana wa-Pasuri mwana wa-Malikiya, a-Maasai mwana wa-Adieli mwana wa-Jazera mwana wa-Mesulamu mwana waMesilemiti mwana wa-Imeri,
ababunyina, bapati banzubo zyabamawisi, bamu bali cuulu amyanda iili musanu aibili amakumi aali musanu alimwi, bamu bacenjede loko kukubeleka milimo yaŋanda ya-Leza.
a-Bakabakara, Heresi, a-Galali, a-Mataniya mwana wa-Mika mwana wa-Zikiri mwana wa-Asafu,
a-Obadiya mwana wa-Semaya mwana wa-Galali mwana wa-Jedutuni, a-Berekiya mwana wa-Asa mwana wa-Elikana, iwakakede muminzi yabaNetofati.
Bakalikede mutala omuno lyamulyango wamwami, kujwe. Mbobakali kulangila mulyango wamalabba aabana ba-Levi.

A-Salumu mwana wa-Kore mwana waEbiasafu mwana wa-Kora, walo ababunyina baluzubo lwawisi, nkukuti ba-Kora, mbe bakali kubeleka milimo yakulanga manjililo aatente lyambunganino, mbubonya mbuli bamawisi mbubakali kubeleka milimo yakulanga manjililo aamalabba aa-Jehova.
Pinehasi mwana wa-Eleazara nguwakali musolozi wabo ciindi. Jehova kali awe.
A-Zekariya mwana waMeselemiya nguwakali kulanga mulyango watente lyambunganino.

Aba boonse ibakasalilwa milimo yakulanga manjililo aamulyango bakali myanda yobile akumi ababili. Bakalembwa mumazyalani aabo muminzi yabo. Davida a-Samuele mulunguluzi mbebakababika mumilimo eyo njibakasyomenwa.
Balo abana babo mbebakali kulanga manjililo aaŋanda yaJehova, nkukuti iŋanda yatente lyambunganino.
Basikulanga milyango bakali kumabazu one, kujwe akumbo akunyika akumusanza.
Nkabela bakwabo ibakakede muminzi bakeelede kuza insunda zyoonse kuti babe abo.
Nkaambo bapati bone ibakali kulanga milyango, ibakali ba-Levi, bakapegwa milimo yatwaanda ayaziyobwedo muŋanda ya-Leza.
Nkabela bakali koona cakuzyunguluka iŋanda ya-Leza, nkaambo mbombabo ibakacita milimo yakulanga iŋanda, alimwi mbombabo ibakali kujalula milyango zifumo zyoonse.
Abamwi babo bakali kulanga zibelesyo zyamilimo, nkaambo bakeelede kuzibala ciindi cakugwisya aciindi cakuboozya.
Abamwi bakali kulanga zibulo, azibelesyo zyoonse zisalala, abusu, awaini, amafuta, atununkilizyo amisamu.
Abamwi bana babapaizi bakali kubamba milimo yakuvwela misamu.
Alakwe Matitiya, umwi waba-Levi, mwana mutaanzi waSalumu mu-Kori, nguwakapegwa milimo yazinkwa.
Abakwabo bamwi ba-Kohati bakapegwa milimo yakubamba mikamu yamabonwabonwa iituulidwe lyoonse buzuba bwa-Sabata.
Aba bakali basimutwe banzubo zyabaLevi, ibakalembedwe mumazyalani aabo, bapati ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu.
Mwanaakwe mutaanzi kali Abidoni, lino Zuri, a-Kisi, a-Baala, a-Neri, a-Nadabu,
a-Gedoro, a-Ahio, a-Zekariya, aMikiloti.
Mikiloti nguwakazyala Simeamu. Abo boonse kabakede balibambene ababunyina mu-Jerusalemu.
Lino Neri wakazyala Kisi, alakwe Kisi wakazyala Saulo, alakwe Saulo wakazyala Jonatani, a-Melikisuwa, a-Abinadabu, a-Esibaala.
Amwana wa-Jonatani kali Meribaala, alakwe Meribaala wakazyala Mika.
Abana ba-Mika mbaaba: Pitoni, a-Meleki, a-Tareya, a-Ahazi.
Nkabela Ahazi wakazyala jara, alakwe Jara wakazyala Alemeti a-Azmaveti a-Zimri, alakwe Zimri wakazyala Moza,
alakwe Moza wakazyala Bineya, iwakazyala Refaya, iwakazyala Eleasa, iwakazyala Azeli.
Lino Azeli kajisi bana bali musanu aumwi. Mazina aabo mbaaba: Azrikamu, a-Bokeru, a-Ismayeli, a-Seariya, a-Obadiya, a-Hanani. Mbaabo boonse bana ba-Azeli.
Elyo ba-Filisti bakeenzya Saulo abana bakwe, nkabela ba-Filisti bakajaya Jonatani a-Abinadabu a-Malikisuwa bana ba-Saulo,
Inkondo yakamuyumina Saulo, nkaambo basimata bakamujana, nkabela bakamuyasa.

Mpawo Saulo wakaambila sikuyumuna zilwisyo zyakwe kuti, Somona ipanga lyako, undiyasye ndilyo, kuti aba batapalwidwe batasiki ­kuzoondiweela. Pele sikuyumuna zilwisyo zyakwe wakakaka, nkaambo wakali kuyoowa loko, Lino Saulo wakabweza ipanga akuwa alindilyo.
Elyo sikuyumuna zilwisyo zyakwe, naakabona kuti Saulo wafwa, wakawa alakwe apanga lyakwe, wafwa.
Mbuboobo Saulo mbwaakafwa. Abalo bana bakwe botatwe aluzubo lwakwe loonse bakafwa boonse antoomwe.
Nkabela bantu boonse ibakakede mukuti, nibakabona kuti basilumamba bacija, alimwi Saulo abana bakwe balifwide, bakasiya minzi yabo, bacija. Elyo ba-Filisti bakeza kuzookala mulinjiyo.
Lino nibwakaca, ba-Filisti bakasika kuzoosaala bajayidwe, nkabela bakajana Saulo abana bakwe balifwide nkukonya oko kucilundu citegwa Giliboa.
Elyo bakamusaala, batola mutwe wakwe azilwisyo zyakwe, batuma batumwa munyika yoonse iiengelede yaba-Filisti kuti balwiide ba-Leza babo abantu babo aya makani mabotu.
Azilwisyo zyakwe bakazibika muŋanda yabaLeza babo, akalo kapapa kamutwe wakwe bakakakankamina muŋanda yaDagoni.
Pele bantu boonse baku-Jabesi-Gileadi, nibakamvwa zintu ezi zyoonse ba-Filisti nzibakacitila Saulo,

baalumi babo basinguzu bakanyamuka boonse, baakuleta mutunta wa-Saulo amitunta yabana bakwe, baisisya ku-Jabesi, akuzika zifuwa zyabo munsi lyamubanga mu-Jabesi, Elvo bakalila mazuba aali musanu aabili.
takwakabuzya makani kuli-Jehova, Nciceeco Jehova ncaakamujayila akwaaba mwami mumaanza aa-Davida mwana wa-Jese.

Alimwi kuziindi zyakamana, Saulo naakacili mwami, nduwe wakali kuzulwida ba-Israyeli mukuzwa kwabo amukuboola kwabo. Nkabela Jehova Leza wako wakakwaambila kuti, Nduwe oyooembela bantu bangu baIsrayeli, nduwe oyooba mwami wabantu bangu ba-Israyeli,

Aboobo bapati boonse ba-Israyeli bakasika kumwami ku-Hebroni, elyo Davida wakatanga cizuminano ambabo kubusyu bwa-Jehova nkukonya oko kuHebroni, nkabela bakananika Davida mafuta aabwami, kuti abe mwami wa-Israyeli, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaamba kumulomo wa-Samuele.
Nkabela bantu ba-Jebusi bakaambila Davida kuti, Tokooyoonjila omuno pe. Nekubaboobo Davida wakazunda mampangala aa-Zioni, ngonguwo munzi wa-Davida.
Lino Davida wakati, Kufumbwa muntu uutaanguna kuzunda ba-Jebusi uzooba simutwe amusolozi. Nkabela Joabu mwana wa-Zeruya wakataanguna kubalwisya, aboobo ngonguwe iwakaba simutwe.
Elyo Davida wakaakukala mpoonya awo amampangala. Nciceeco ncaakapedwa izina lya-Munzi wa-Davida.
Lino wakayaka munzi cakuzyunguluka kuzwa ku-Milo akuboola mpoonya awo. Alakwe Joabu wakamamika cipanzi camunzi icakasyeede.
Elyo Davida wakali kuya bukomena mazuba conse, nkabela Jehova wamakamu kali awe.

Baalumi basintaze Davida mbaakajisi mbaaba: Jasobeamu mwana wa-Hakimoni nguwakaba mupati kwiinda boonse bali makumi otatwe. Ngonguwe iwakanyamuna isumo lyakwe akujaya bantu bali myanda yotatwe kuciindi comwe.
Awabili wabaalumi abo bapati botatwe kali Eleazara mwana wa-Dodo mu-Ahohi.
Walo wakali a-Davida ku-Pasidamimu, ba-Filisti nibakabungene nkuko kukulwisya. Kakuli muunda iwakalimidwe bbaale, elyo bantu bakali kucija ba-Filisti,
pele walo wakaima akati kamuunda oyo, wauvuna, wajaya ba-Filisti, aboobo Jehova wakabafutula alufutuko lupati.
Kuciindi eco Davida wakalikede mumampangala, ampi yaba-Filisti yakali ku-Betelehemu.
Elyo Davida wakali kusukama, wati, Nicakabota muntu naakandinywisya maanzi aamucikala caku-Betelehemu cili kumbali lyamulyango.

Mpawo abo bapati botatwe bakaandulula malabba aaba-Filisti, baakuteka maanzi mucikala caku-Betelehemu cili kumbali lyamulyango, baaleta akwaasisya kuliDavida. Pele Davida wakakaka kunywa, wakaapaizizya Jehova,

wati, Ne! Cilatondwa kucita obo! Sa ndakonzya kunywa bulowa bwabantu aba? Nkaambo cintu eci ncibacita kukundiletela aya maanzi inga nicakabaletela lufu. Aboobo wakakaka kunywa. Njeeyi milimo njibakacita bapati abo botatwe,
Kali mulemu kwiinda boonse bali makumi otatwe, waba silutwe wabo, nekubaboobo takwaakeelene abaabo botatwe bataanzi.

Alimwi wakajaya muEgepita iwakali aciimo cipati, kajisi bulamfu bwatukokola tosanwe, Mujanza lyamu-Egepita kamuli isumo likozyene acisamu casikuluka, pele Benaya wakainka nkwaakabede ankoli buyo, wanyanzya isumo mujanza lyamu-Egepita, akumujazya isumo lyakwe mwini.
Ngaaya makani ngaakacita Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada, aboobo wakaba simpuwo mbubonya mbuli abo botatwe.
Kali mulemu akati kabantu bali makumi otatwe, pele kateelene abaabo botatwe bataanzi. Nkabela Davida wakamubika kuti abe silutwe wabalindizi bakwe,
Samoti mu-Harori, Helezi muPeloni,
Ira mwana wa-Ikesi waku-Tekowa, Abiezeri waku-Anatoti,
Sibekai mu-Husati, Ilai mu-Ahohi,
Maharai mu-Netofati, Heledi mwana wa-Baana mu-Netofati,
Itai mwana wa-Ribai waku-Gibeya wabana ba-Benjamini, Benaya mu-Piratoni,
Hurai wakutulonga twaGaasi, Abiyeli mu-Aribati,
Azmaveti mu-Baharumi, Eliabu mu-Saliboni,
Hasemu mu-Gizoni, Jonatani mwana wa-Sage mu-Harari,
Ahiamu mwana wa-Sakari mu-Harari, Elifali mwana wa-Uri,
Heferi muMekerati, Ahija mu-Peloni,
Hezro waku-Karimeli, Naarai mwana waEzbai,
Joeli munyina Natani, Mibari mwana wa-Hagiri,
Zeleki muAmoni, Naharai mu-Beroti sikuyumuna zilwisyo zya-Joabu mwana waZeruya,
Ira mu-Itiri, Garebi mu-Itiri,
Uriya mu-Hiti, Zabadi mwana wa-Alai,
Adina mwana wa-Siza mu-Rubeni silutwe wabaRubeni abantu bali makumi otatwe mbaakali abo,
Hanani mwana waMaaka, josafati mu-Mitini,
Uziya mu-Asterati, Sama a-Icieli bana ba-Hotamu waku-Aroeri,
Jedyaeli mwana wa-Simri, a-Joha munyina mu-Tizl,
Elieli mu-Mahavi, a-Jeribai a-Josaviya bana ba-Elinaamu, a-Itima mu-Moabu,
Elieli, a-Obedi, a-Jasiyeli mu-Mezobai.
alimwi bakali basimata ibakabwene kufu sa mabwe nanka mivwi kumaanza oonse obile niliba lyalulyo niliba lyacimwensi. Bakali ba-Benjamini, basimukowanyina Saulo,
Silutwe wabo kali Ahiezeri, aumwi kali Joasi; (aba bobile boonse bakali bana ba-Semaya waku-Gibeya); a-Jezieli a-Peleti bana ba-Azmaveti, a-Beraka, a-Jehu waku-Anatoti,
aIsmaya waku-Gibeoni umwi wabaalumi basintaze bali makumi otatwe, umwi wabasolozi babo, a-Jeremiya, a-Jahazieli, a-Johanani, a-Jozabadi waku-Gedera,
a-Eluzai, a-Jerimoti, a-Bealiya, a-Semariya, a-Sefatiya waku-Harupi;
Elikana, a-Isiya, a-Azareli, a-Joezeri, a-Jasobeamu, baKora;
a-Joela a-Zebadiya bana ba-Jerohamu waku-Gedoro.
Mutaanzi wabo kali Ezeri, awabili Obadiya, awatatu Eliabu,
awane Misimana, awasanu Jeremiya,
awamusanu aumwi Atai, awamusanu ababili Elieli,
awamusanu abatatu Johanani, awamusanu abane Elzabadi,
awakumi Jeremiya, awakumi aumwi Makibanai,
Abo ba-Gadi bakali basolozi bampi; baniini kabajisi bantu bali mwaanda, abapati kabajisi bantu bali cuulu.
Mbombabo ibakazubuka Jordano mumwezi mutaanzi, mulonga niwakali kupaya kunkomwe koonse, akutanda bantu boonse ibakakede mumimpata, nikuba kujwe nikuba kumbo,
Abamwi bana ba-Benjamini abana ba-Juda bakeza kuli-Davida kuma-mpangala nkwaakabede.

Lino Davida wakazwa kuyoobacinga, wabaambila kuti, Na mweza kulindime caluumuno kuzoondigwasya, moyo wangu uyookala anywebo, pele na mweza kuzoondaaba mumaanza aabasinkondoma, nekuba kuti nsikwe ncindabisya, Leza wabamatatesu abone akumutapatila.

Mpawo Muuya wakanjila muli-Amasai silutwe wamakumi otatwe, wakati, Tuli bako, O Davida; tuli kulubazu lwako, O mwana wa-Jese; kube luumuno, kube luumuno kulinduwe akulibasikukugwasya, nkaambo Leza wako ngguukugwasya, Mpawo Davida wakabatambula, wababika kuti babe basilutwe bampi zyakwe.

Elyo naakanyamuka kuya ku-Zikilaga, ndendilyo abo ba-Manase nibakaya kulubazu lwakwe. Mazina aabo mbaaba: Adina, a-Jozabadi, a-Jedyaeli, a-Mikayeli, a-Jozabadi, a-Elihu, a-Zilerai, basilutwe bazyuulu ba-Manase.
Bakagwasya Davida kulwisya inkamu yabasaali, nkaambo boonse bakali baalumi basintaze, nkabela bakaba basolozi bampi.
Nkaambo mazuba oonse bantu bakali kuza kuli-Davida kukumugwasya, mane lumwi kwakaba makamu mapati mbuli makamu aaka-Leza.
Bana ba-Juda basilumamba ibakasamine intobo amyuumba, bakali zyuulu zili musanu acimwi amyanda iili musanu aitatu.
Abana ba-Simeoni, basilumamba basinguzu kukulwa, bakali zyuulu zili musanu azibili amwanda omwe.
Abana ba-Levi, bantu bali zyuulu zyone amyanda iili musanu aumwi.
A-Jehoyada silutwe waluzubo lwa-Aroni, abantu mbaakali abo, zyuulu zyotatwe amyanda iili musanu aibili.
A-Zadoki, mukubusi singuzu kukulwa, abasilutwe bali makumi obile ababili baluzubo lwawisi.
Aba-Benjamini, basimukowanyina Saulo, zyuulu zyotatwe; bunji bwabo kabajisi lusyomo kuluzubo lwa-Saulo mane kuciindi eco.
Abana ba-Efraimu, baalumi basintaze, basilumamba basimpuwo munzubo zyabamawisi, zyuulu zili makumi obile amyanda iili musanu aitatu.
Amucisela camusyobo wa-Manase, bantu ibakasalwa kuti baboole kuzoopa Davida bwami bakali zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu azitatu.
Abana ba-Isakara, bantu bacenjede ibakamvwisya ziindi akuziba ba-Israyeli mbubeelede kucita, basilutwe bali myanda yobile abakwabo boonse ibakali kubatobela.
Aba-Zebuloni, basilumamba ibakazibide loko kulwana azilwisyo zyoonse, zyuulu zili makumi osanwe, bakali kugwasya Davida amoyo woonse.
Aba-Nafitali, basilutwe bali cuulu ibakali abantu bali zyuulu zili makumi otatwe amusanu azibili basamine intobo amyuumba.
Aba-Dani, bantu balibambilide inkondo bali zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu azitatu amyanda iili musanu aumwi.
Abana ba-Aseri, basilumamba bazibide inkondo bali zyuulu zili makumi one.
Abantu bamutala lya-Jordano, ba-Rubeni aba-Gadi acisela camusyobo wa-Manase, basilumamba bezi kubelesya zilwisyo zyoonse bali zyuulu zili mwanda amakumi obile.

Abo boonse mbotwaamba, basilumamba bakalibambilide kulwa, bakeza camoyo woonse ku-Hebroni kuti bape Davida bwami bwacisi coonse caIsrayeli, Abalo bantu bamwi ba-Israyeli kabajisi moyo womwe buyo kukupa Davida bwami.
Nkabela bakasyaala nkuko kuli-Davida mazuba otatwe, balalya akunywa, nkaambo bakwabo bakababambila malilu.

Abalo beenzinyina bazisi zyeengelede, akusikila ku-Isakara a-Zebuloni a-Nafitali, bakali kuleta zilyo ambongolo ankamele amabbiza abasune, Bakaleta zilyo zinji-busu, azikoto zyankuyu, azikungo zyamisaansa, awami, amafuta, abasune, ambelele-nkaambo kakuli lusekelelo lupati mucisi ca-Israyeli.

Nkabela Davida wakaambila imbungano yoonse yaba-Israyeli kuti, Na cabota mumeso aanu, alimwi na Jehova Leza wesu ulayanda, atutumine bakwesu bamwi bali munyika yoonse ya-Israyeli, abapaizi aba-Levi bakede muminzi iili amweemvwe, kuti bayoboloke kulindiswe.
Elyo atuliboozezye ibbokesi lya-Leza wesu, nkaambo twakalileka buyo mumazuba aa-Saulo.
Mpawo imbungano yoonse yakazumina, nkaambo makani akabota mumeso aabantu.
Nkabela Davida aba-Israyeli boonse bakainka ku-Baala, ngonguwo Kiriyati-Jearimu mucisi ca-Juda kuti bagwisye nkuko ibbokesi lya-Leza uutegwa Jehova uukede akati kabakerebimu.
Lino bakabika ibbokesi lya-Leza aŋola impiya, baligwisya muŋanda ya-Aminadabu. Uza a-Ahio mbobakali kweenzya iŋola.
Nkabela Davida aba-Israyeli boonse bakali kusekelela kubusyu bwa-Jehova canguzu zyoonse, anyimbo abanamalwa atuntimbwa atugoma ansaka amyeembo.
Mpawo bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila Uza, aboobo wakamuuma nkaambo kakutandabika ijanza lyakwe kubbokesi. Wakafwa mpoonya awo kubusyu bwaJehova.
Lino Davida wakabijilwa nkaambo kakuti Jehova wakasotokela Uza, aboobo oko kuntu wakakuulika izina lya-Luumo-lwa-Uza, mbukucaambwa asunu.
Nkabela Davida wakayoowa Leza mubuzuba obo, wati, Ndete buti ibbokesi lya-Leza kulindime?
Nkaambo kako Davida taakwe naakasisya ibbokesi kulinguwe kumunzi wa-Davida, wakalitola kumbi kuŋanda ya-Obedi-Edomu mu-Giti.
Lino ibbokesi lya-Leza lyakalikede kuli-Obedi-Edomu mu-Giti muŋanda yakwe myezi yotatwe, Nkabela Jehova wakalongezya iŋanda ya-Obedi-Edomu ambono zyakwe zyoonse.
Lino Davida wakazibisya kuti Jehova ulimwiimikide nji mbuli mwami wabaIsrayeli, alimwi kuti wasumpula bwami bwakwe nkaambo kabantu bakwe ba-Israyeli.
Ngaaya mazina aabana mbaakazyala mu-Jerusalemu: Samua, a-Sobabu, a-Natani, aSolomoni,
a-Ibara, a-Elisua, a-Elipeleti,
a-Noga, a-Nefegi, a-Jafiya,
a-Elisama, a-Beliyada, a-Elifeleti.
Nkabela ba-Filisti kabazide kukusaala mukuti lya-Refaimu.
Elyo Davida wakabuzya kuli-Leza kuti, Sa njiinke kuyoolwisya ba-Filisti? Sa uyoobaaba mumaanza aangu? Nkabela Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Ee, koya, njoobaaba mumaanza aako.

Mpawo wakainka ku-Baalaperezimu, nkabela Davida wakabazunda nkukooko, Elyo Davida wakati, Leza wasorokela basinkondoma kuma an za aangu mbubonya mbwaakasotoka maanzi. Nciceeco oko kuntu ncikwakaulikilwa izma lya-Baalaperazimu,
Lino bakasiya zikozyano zyamizimu yabo nkukonya oko, nkabela Davida wakalailila kuti itentwe mumulilo.
Nkabela Davida naakabuzya kuli-Leza, Leza wakamwaambila kuti, Utainki kuyoobalwisya pe. Koya buzyunguluka kuti ubajane kulangene amikunka.
Lino umvwe buyo musoso wakweenda kumpela yamikunka, nyamuka ndilyonya kuyoobalwisya, nkaambo Leza wakuzulwida kuya kukukoma impi yaba-Filisti.
Elyo Davida wakacita mbubonya mbuli Leza mbwaakamulailila­, aboobo wakazunda impi yaba-Filisti kuzwa ku-Gibeoni kusikila ku-Gezeri,
Lino impuwo ya-Davida yakamwaika muzisi zyoonse, nkabela Jehova wakacita kuti misyobo yoonse imuyoowe.
Elyo Davida wakati, Taakwe beelede kuyumuna ibbokesi lya-Leza cita ba-Levi luzutu, nkaambo mbombabo Jehova mbaakasala kuti bayumune ibbokesi lya-Leza akumumanina milimo lyoonse.
Nkabela Davida wakayobolola ba-Israyeli boonse ku-Jerusalemu kuti balonzye ibbokesi lya-Jehova kuya kubusena bwalyo mbwaakalibambilide.
Lino Davida wakabunganya bana ba-Aroni aba-Levi:
bana ba-Kohati, Urieli silutwe abeenzinyina bali mwaanda amakumi obile;
bana ba-Merari, Asaya silutwe abeenzinyina bali myaanda yobile amakumi obile;
bana ba-Gerisomu, Joeli silutwe abeenzinyina bali mwaanda amakumi otatwe;
bana ba-Elizafana, Semaya silutwe abeenzinyina bali myaanda yobile;
bana ba-Hebroni, Elieli silutwe abeenzinyina bali makumi aali musanu aatatu;
bana ba-Uzieli, Aminadabu silutwe abeenzinyina bali mwaanda akumi ababili.
Nkabela Davida wakaita Zadoki a-Abyatare bapaizi, aba-Levi Urieli, a-Asaya, a-Joeli, Semayaya-Elieli a-Aminadabu,
wakabaambila kuti, Ndinywe basilutwe banzubo zyaba-Levi. Amulisalazye akusalazya bakwanu, kuti mulonzye ibbokesi lya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli kuya oko nkundalibambila.
Kukutaanguna teensi ndinywe mwakaliyumuna, aboobo Jehova Leza wesu wakatusotokela, nkaambo teetwakalibamba muciyanza ceelede.
Mpoonya awo bapaizi aba-Levi bakalisalazya kuti balonzye ibbokesi lya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Nkabela bana ba-Levi bakayumuzya zisamu ibbokesi lyaLeza amakuko aabo, mbubonya mbuli Musa mbwaakalailila kujwi lyaJehova.
abakwabo batobela lwabili, Zekariya, Beni, a-Jaazieli, aSemiramoti, a-Jeieli, a-Uni, Eliabu, a-Benaya, a-Maaseya, a-Matitiya, a-Elifelehu, a-Mikineya, abasimilyango Obedi-Edomu a-Icieli.
Abasikwiimba: Hemani a-Asafu a-Etani mbobakali kulizya zigweele zyamukuba;
a-Zekariya a-Azieli a-Semiramoti a-Jehieli a-Uni a-Eliabu a-Maaseya a-Benaya mbobakali kulizya nyeele zyansenseeku;
a-Matitiya a-Elifelehu a-Mikineya a-Obedi-Edomu a-Jeieli a-Azaziya mbobakali kulizya tuntimbwa twasyamupa.
A-Kenaniya mwiimbi simutwe waba-Levi nguwakeelede kwiimbya, nkaambo kezi loko.
A-Berekiya a-Elikana mbobakali basimulyango babbokesi lya-Leza.
Abapaizi Sebaniya a-Josafati a-Netaneli a-Amasai a-Zekariya a-Benaya a-Eliezeri mbobakali kulizya myeembo kunembo lyabbokesi lya-Leza. Abalo Obedi-Edomu a-Jehiya bakali basimulyango babbokesi.
Lino Leza mbwaakali kugwasya ba-Levi ibakayumwide ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova, bakatuula bacende bali musanu ababili abagutu bambelele bali musanu ababili.
Nkabela Davida kasamine cikobela casani lituba, abalo ba-Levi ibakayumwide ibbokesi, abasikwiimba, a-Kenaniya musolozi wabasikwiimba. Alimwi Davida kasamine cibaki cabupaizi casani lituba.
Aboobo ba-Israyeli boonse bakaleta ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova, bali kuyobayoba, akulizya mweembo ampeta azigweele, akulizya nyeele atuntimbwa.
Elyo Davida naakamana kutuula zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya, wakalongezya bantu muzina lya-Jehova.
Nkabela wakaabila bantu boonse ba-Israyeli, baalumi abanakazi, umwi aumwi cimbulunge cacinkwa acituli canyama acibunge camicelo iiyanikidwe.
Alimwi wakasala bamwi ba-Levi kuti bamane milimo kunembo lyabbokesi lya-Jehova, balemeke akulumba akutembaula Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.

Silutwe wabo kali Asafu, abamutobela mbaaba: Zekariya, Jeieli, Semiramoti, Jehieli, Matitiya, Eliabu, Benaya, a-Obedi-Edomu, a-Jeieli, ibakali kulizya nyeele atuntimbwa. Asafu nguwakali kulizya zigweele,
a-Benaya a-Jahazieli bapaizi mbobakali kulizya myeembo ciindi coonse kunembo lyabbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Leza.
Amuzibye bantu milimo yakwe mipati.
Amusekelele milimo yakwe yoonse iigambya.
Ikondwe myoyo yabasikuyandaula Jehova.
Amuyandaule busyu bwakwe lyoonse.
Maleele ngaakacita ambeta zyamilimo yakwe,
Nu inyungu zya-Abrahamu mulanda wakwe,
Nubana ba-Jakobo basali bakwe.
Ngonguwe Jehova Leza wesu.
Imbeta zyakwe zili moonse munyika.
Amwiingasile lyoonse cizuminano cakwe,
Ijwi ndyaakalailila, likalilile mumazyalani aali cuulu,
Cikonke ncaakakonkezya Izaka,
Ncaakaimika kuti cibe mulao wa-Jakobo,
Cibe cizuminano citamani ca-Israyeli,
Wakati, Ndakupa nyika ya-Kanana,
Ibe caabilo canu cakukona.
Nibatakajisi makani nkaambo bakali beenzu mulinjiyo,
ibakacili kuya butuntulika muzisi zisi
Akweendeenda kuzwa kunyika imwi kuya kumusyobo umbi
Wakatapatila bami nkaambo kabo,
Mutabisizyi basinsimi bangu.
Amusekelele lufutuko lwakwe mazuba oonse.
Akwaambila misyobo yoonse maleele aakwe.
Wayooweka kwiinda mizimu yoonse.
Anukuti Jehova nguwakalenga ijulu.
Inguzu alukondo, zyoonse zilajanwa nkwabede.
Amulemeke Jehova, numisyobo yabantu,
Amupe Jehova bulemu anguzu.
Amupe Jehova bulemu bweelede izina lyakwe.
Amulete cipaizyo, muboole kubusyu bwakwe,
Amukotamine Jehova mubweebesi busalalisya.
Amukankame kunembo lyakwe nonyika yoonse,
Luwa luliimvwi nji, talukonzyi kusosoloka.
Baambe akati kabamasi kuti Jehova ngu-Mwami.
Isokwe liborelwe loko azyoonse zili mumo.
Lino misamu yamulusaka iyooimba cakukondwa
Kubusyu bwa-Jehova, nkaambo weza kuzoobeteka nyika.
Luse lwakwe talweeli,
Kotufutula, O Leza walufutuko lwesu.
Koruyobolola akutuvuna kulibamasi,
Kuti tulemeke izina lyako lisalala,
Akusekelela mukukutembaula.
Maindi oonse akutamani.
Mpawo bantu boonse bakaamba kuti, Amen, akutembaula Jehova.
Lino Davida wakasia Asafu ababunyina nkukonya oko kunembo lyabbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova, kuti babeleke milimo kunembo lyabbokesi mazuba oonse, mbukweelede kubuzuba bumwi abumwi;
alakwe ObediEdomu, ababunyina bali makumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu abatatu, Obedi-Edomu mwana wa-Jedutuni a-Hosa mbobakali kulindila milyango.
Alakwe Zadoki mupaizi abapaizinyina wakabasia kunembo lyatente lyambunganino lya-Jehova, kucilundu cakukombela caku-Gibeoni,
kuti bapaizizye Jehova zipaizyo acipaililo cakutuula, mazuba oonse cifumo amangolezya, akucita zyoonse zilembedwe mumulao wa-Jehova nzyaakalailila ba-Israyeli,
Bakali a-Hemani a-Jedutani abamwi ibakasalwa akulembwa mazina kuti batembaule Jehova, nkaambo luse lwakwe talweeli.
Hemani a-Jedutuni bakali amyeembo azigweele zyakulizya azyakwiimbya nyimbo zya-Leza. Abalo bana ba-Jedutuni mbobakabikwa kuti balange mulyango.
Mpawo Natani wakaambila Davida kuti, Mbubo, kocita zyoonse zili mumoyo wako, nkaambo Leza uli ayebo,
Pele masiku ayo ngaonya ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila Natani, liti,
Koya, ukaambile Davida mulanda wangu kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Tokooyoondiyakila iŋanda yakukala pe.
Nkaambo nsina kukala muŋanda kuzwa kubuzuba obo nindakalonzya bana ba-Israyeli akusikila kubuzuba obuno. Ndakali kulonga-longa buyo muzilao zilao amuzikalilo zikalilo.

Koonse koonse nkundakali kweendeenda aba-Israyeli boonse, sa ndakaamba ijwi niliba lyomwe mumatwi aaumwi wababetesi mbondakalailila kweembela bantu bangu ba-Israyeli lyakuti, Nkaambonzi tamuna kundiyakila iŋanda yazisamu zyakedari?
Lino mbuboobu mboelede kwaambila mulanda wangu Davida, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Ndakakugwisya kumacezezyo nkuwakali kweembela imbelele, kuti ube musolozi wabantu bangu ba-Israyeli.
Ndakali ayebo koonse koonse nkuwakaya, abasinkondonyoko boonse ndabanyonyoona kubusyu bwako, Lino ndakupa izina idemu mbubonya mbuli izina lyabapati baansi.
Alimwi nzoobikila bantu bangu ba-Israyeli busena, akubasimpika kuti bakale kabotu mpobabede akutazungaana limbi. Bantu babi tabakooyoobapenzya limbi, mbubakali kutaanguna kubapenzya,
kuzwa kumazuba alya nindakaboola bantu bangu ba-Israyeli babetesi. Nkabela njoobombya basinkondonyoko boonse. Alimwi ndakulwiida kuti Jehova uyookuyakila iŋanda.
Lino mazuba aako naazoozulila aakuya nkubabede bamauso bafwide, njookubusizya inyungu zyako, umwi wabana bako uuelede kulya izina lyako, nkabela njoosimpika kabotu bwami bwakwe.
Ngonguwe uuti ndiyakile iŋanda, nkabela njoosimpika cuuno cabwami bwakwe kuti citazungaani mazuba oonse.
Njooba wisi, alakwe uyooba mwanaangu. Nsikooyoomunyanzya luzyalo lwangu mbundakanyanzya oyo iwakakutaangunina mubwami.
Njoocita kuti aime nji muŋanda yangu amubwami bwangu mazuba oonse aakutamani. Cuuno cabwami bwakwe ciyoosimpikwa mane kukabe kutamani.
Nkabela Natani wakaambila Davida majwi aya oonse acilengano coonse ncaakabwene.
Alimwi eci kacili cintu ciniini buyo mumeso aako, O Leza, nkaambo waamba makani aaluzubo lwangu ndemulanda wako aaciindi cilamfu ciciza. Wanditondezya mazyalani aaciza, O Leza Jehova,
Lino Davida acaambe buti kulinduwe, mbolemeka mulanda wako? Nkaambo ulizi mulanda wako.
O Jehova, nkekaambo kamulanda wako akaambo kamoyo wako nkuwacita aya makani aagambya akuzibya bantu makani mapati aali boobo.
O Jehova, taakwe umbi uuli mbuli nduwe, Taakwe Leza umbi cita nduwe, mbubonya mbutumvwide mumatwi esu.

Sa kuli musyobo nuuba umwi waansi ano uuli mbuli bantu bako baIsrayeli? Leza wakaya kuyoobanununa kuti babe bantu bakwe, Walicitila impuo impati iigambya mukutanda misyobo imwi kubusyu bwabantu bako ba-Israyeli mbowakanununa kuzwa ku-Egepita.
Bantu bako ba-Israyeli wakababika kuti babe musyobo wako lyoonse akutamani. Ayebo, O Jehova, wakaba Leza wabo.
Lino, O Jehova, majwi ngoamba aamulanda wako aluzubo lwakwe azuzikizigwe ncobeni akutamani. Kocita mbubonya mboamba.
Aboobo izina lyako liyooyumisigwa akulemekwa lyoonse. Kuyooambwa kuti, Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli ngonguwe Leza waba-Israyeli. Alwalo luzubo lwa-Davida mulanda wako luyooima nji kubusyu bwako.
Nkaambo wandiyubunwida ndemulanda wako, O Leza wangu, kuti uyoondiyakila iŋanda. Nciceeco ndemulanda wako ncindalijanina bukozu bwakukukombela cikombyo eci.
Lino Jehova, nduwe Leza. Wandisyomezezya ndemulanda wako aya makani mabotu.
Lino cikubotele kulongezya luzubo lwangu ndemulanda wako, kuti lukalilile kubusyu bwako lyoonse. Nkaambo kufumbwa ncolongezya webo, O Jehova, ciyoolongezegwa lyoonse.

Nkabela Davida wakamunyanzya inkalaki zili cuulu, abasimbizi bali zyuulu zili musanu azibili, abasilumamba basimaulu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile. Elyo Davida wakatyola mazwi aambizi. Wasyaazya imbizi zyankalaki zili mwaanda buyo.
Lino ba-Aramu baku-Damasko nibakeza kuzoogwasya Hadadezeri mwami wa-Zoba, Davida wakajaya ba-Aramu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azibili.
Lino Davida wakabika impi akati kabaAramu baku-Damasko, nkabela ba-Aramu bakaba bazike ba-Davida akumuletela mutelo. Aboobo Jehova wakazundya Davida koonse nkwaakaya.
Nkabela Davida wakanyanzya intobo zyangolida nzibakayumwide balanda ba-Hadadezeri, akuzileta ku-Jerusalemu.
Akwalo ku-Tibati aku-Kuni, minzi ya-Hadadezeri, Davida wakasaala mukuba munji loko. Ngonguwo Solomoni ngwaakafuzya iziba lyamukuba aziimikilo azibelesyo zimwi zyamukuba.

wakatuma mwanaakwe Hadoramu kumwami Davida kuti amujuzye akumusekelezya, nkaambo kakulwisya Hadadezeri akumuzunda, nkaambo Tou a-Hadadezeri kanji-kanji bakali kulwana. Nkabela wakaletelezya zibelesyo zyamisyobo misyobo zyangolida azyansiliva azyamukuba.
Ezi azyalo mwami Davida wakazisalazizya Jehova, antoomwe ansiliva angolida nzyaakasaala kuzisi zyoonse, kuba-Edomu aba-Moabu aba-Amoni aba-Filisti aba-Amaleki.
Nkabela wakabika basimpi mucisi ca-Edomu, aboobo ba-Edomu boonse bakaba bazike ba-Davida. Jehova wakazundya Davida koonse nkwaakaya.
Mbuboobo Davida mbwaakali kweendelezya ba-Israyeli. Wakali kubeteka bantu boonse cabululami,
Joabu mwana wa-Zeruya nguwakali silutwe wampi, a-Josafati mwana wa-Ahiludi nguwakali kulemba makani,
a-Zadoki mwana wa-Ahitubi a-Ahimeleki mwana wa-Abyatare kabali bapaizi, a-Savisa kali mulembi,
a-Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada kali silutwe waba-Kereti aba-Peleti, abana ba-Davida kabali bapati mumilimo yamwami.

Mpawo Davida wakati, Nkamufwide luzyalo Hanuni mwana wa-Nahasi, nkaambo wisi wakandifwida luzyalo mebo. Aboobo Davida wakatuma batumwa kuti bamuumbulizye kumakani aawisi. Pele balanda ba-Davida nibakasika kucisi cabana baAmoni kuli-Hanuni kuti bamuumbulizye,
bapati babana ba-Amoni bakaambila Hanuni kuti, Uyeeyanzi? Sa ncobeni nkaambo kakulemeka uso Davida ncatumina basikukuumbulizva? Sa balanda bakwe tabazide kuzoolangaula akupilinganya akuvwiya nyika?
Mpoonya awo Hanuni wakabweza balanda ba-Davida, wabanyoola, wakafwinsizya zikobela kumatako, akubatanda.

Elyo bakainka. Nkabela Davida naakalwiidwa makani aabantu abo, wakatuma basikubacinga, nkaambo bantu bakafwa bweeme loko, Lino mwami wakabaambila kuti, Amulindile ku-Jeriko, mane indezu zyanu zitaangune kumena, elyo nimutaboole,

Bakalibelesezya zyuulu zili makumi otatwe azibili zyankalaki, amwami wa-Maaka abantu bakwe. Aba bakeza akuliyakila zilao kunembo lyaMedeba, Abalo bana ba-Amoni bakayoboloka kuzwa kuminzi yabo, beza kukulwisya.
Nkabela Davida naakamvwa, wakatuma joabu ampi yoonse yabaalumi basintaze.
Elyo bana ba-Amoni bakazwa akulibamba mumindando yakulwa kumulyango wamunzi. Abamwi beenzu bakalibamba abalike musokwe.
Elyo Joabu naakabona kuti balilangene abasilumamba koonse koonse, kunembo akusule, wakasala bantu basinguzu baba-Israyeli akubabamba kuti balwisye ba-Aramu,
abantu bamwi basyeede wakababika mumaanza aa-Abisai munyina, nkabela bakalibamba kuti balwisye ba-Amoni.
Wakati, Na ba-Aramu bandikacila, uleelede kundigwasya, pele na ba-Amoni bakukacila, mebo ndakugwasya.
Amube abukozu akulwa canguzu nkaambo kabantu besu aminzi ya-Leza wesu. Lino Jehova acite kufumbwa cimubotela.
Elyo Joabu abantu mbaakali abo bakaswenenena ba-Aramu kuti babalwisye, nkabela bakacija.
Lino ba-Amoni nibakabona kuti baAramu bacija, bakacija abalo kubusyu bwa-Abisai munyina, banjila mumunzi, Elyo Joabu wakapiluka ku-Jerusalemu.

Nkabela Davida naakaambilwa makani, wakabunganya ba-Israyeli boonse, wazubuka Jordano, wasika nkubakabede, wabamba mindando yakubalwisya. Elyo Davida naakamana kubamba mindando yakulwisya, ba-Aramu bakamulwisya.

Lino ba-Aramu bakacija kubusyu bwaba-Israyeli, nkabela Davida wakajaya akati kaba-Aramu inkalaki zili zyuulu zili musanu azibili abasimaulu bali zyuulu zili makumi one. Alakwe Sofaki silutwe wampi wakajayigwa,
Elyo balanda ba-Hadadezeri nibakabona kuti bazundwa aba-Israyeli, bakacita luumuno a-Davida akuba bazike bakwe. Aboobo ba-Aramu teebakakonzya kuzumina kugwasya ba-Amoni limbi.

Lino Davida wakagwisya munsini wamwami wabo kumutwe wakwe, wajana kuti bulemu bwawo nditalenta lyangolida, alimwi kuujisi mabwe mayandisi. Elyo wakabikwa amutwe wa-Davida, Nkabela wakagwisya zisaalo zinji loko omo mununzi.
Abalo bantu ibakali mumo, wakabagwisya akubabika kumasaha, akuzisagwidyo zyabutale, atuleba. Mbuboobo Davida mbwaakacitila minzi yoonse yaba-Amoni. Lino Davida wakapiluka abantu boonse ku-Jerusalemu.
Lino musule lyayaaya kwakabuka inkondo aba-Filisti ku-Gezeri. Elyo Sibekai mu-Husati wakajaya Sipai umwi wabana ba-Refaya, aboobo ba-Filisti bakakomwa,
Lino kwakabuka inkondo aimwi aba-Filisti, nkabela Elihanani mwana wa-Jairi wakajaya Lami munyina Goliati mu-Giti, Luti lwasumo lyakwe lwakali mbuli cisamu casikuluka.

Ankondo imwi yakabuka ku-Gati, Oko kakuli muntu uuli aciimo cipati. Kajisi minwe iili musanu aumwi kujanza limwi alimwi, atunwe tuli musanu akamwi kukuulu kumwi akumwi, nkukuti yoonse kiili makumi obile aine. Alakwe kali umwi wabana ba-Refaya.
Lino oyo naakasampaula ba-Israyeli, jonatani mwana wa-Simeya munyina Davida wakamujaya.
Aba boonse kabali bana baRefaya baku-Gati, Bakajayigwa kumaanza aa-Davida akumaanza aabalanda bakwe.
Davida wakaambila Joabu abasilutwe bampi kuti, Kamuya, mukabale ba-Israyeli boonse kuzwa ku-Beereseba mane kusikila ku-Dani, muze kuzoondaambila, nzoozibe mweelwe wabo.

Mpawo Joabu wakaamba kuti, Jehova avuzye bantu bakwe kuti baindisye mwaanda mbuli mbubabede lino. Sa boonse tabali balanda bako, O simalelo wangu? Lino nkaambonzi noyanda kucita obo, O mwami wangu? Nkaambonzi noyanda kuletela Israyeli mulandu?
Nekubaboobo ijwi lyamwami lyakayumisya kwiinda Joabu, aboobo Joabu wakainka kuya bweendeenda, wamanisya cisi coonse ca-Israyeli, wapiluka ku-Jerusalemu.

Elyo Joabu wakalwiida Davida mweelwe wabantu. Ba-Israyeli boonse bakasika kuzyuulu zili cuulu azyuulu zili mwaanda, nkukuti baalumi ibakezi kulwisya ipanga, abantu ba-Juda bakasika kuzyuulu zili myaanda yone azyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili, baalumi ibakezi kulwisya ipanga.
Pele wina naakabala misyobo yobile ya-Levi a-Benjamini, nkaambo ijwi lyamwami lyakasesemya Joabu,
Pele aya makani akabija mumeso aa-Leza, aboobo wakauma ba-Israyeli,
Mpawo Davida wakaambila Leza kuti, Ndabisya loko mukucita makani aya, Lino kogwisya mulandu wangu ndemuzike wako, nkaambo ndacita cakufubaala loko.
Elyo Jehova wakaambila Gadi mulunguluzi wa-Davida kuti,
Koya ukaambile Davida kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Nzeezi zintu zyotatwe; sala cimwi, kuti nkakucitile ncico.
Lino Gadi wakeza kuli-Davida, wati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Sala ncoyanda,

na myaka yotatwe yanzala, na myezi yotatwe yakukomwa abasikaambonyoko, ipanga lyabasinkondonyoko nilili kukutanda, na mazuba otatwe aapanga lya-Jehova, bulwazi nibuli mukusaalila munyika, alakwe angelo wa-Jehova naali mukunyonyoona mucisi coonse ca-Israyeli, Kosola makani, kuti mbweedezye ijwi kuliyooyo iwakandituma.
Mpawo Davida wakaambila Gadi kuti, Ndapenga loko, Ngwide mumaanza aa-Jehova, nkaambo luzyalo lwakwe ndupati loko. Ntawidi mumaanza aabantu pe.
Aboobo Jehova wakatumina cisi ca-Israyeli bulwazi, nkabela kwakafwa bantu ba-Israyeli bali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili.

Alimwi Leza wakatuma angelo ku-Jerusalemu kuti aunyonyoone, pele naakasi nyonyoone, Jehova wakabona, wausa insoni kumakani ayo aakubisizya, waambila angelo sikunyonyoona kuti, Cazulila, leka lino, Nkabela angelo wa-Jehova wakaliimvwi kucipolelo ca-Orinani mu-Jebusi,

Mpawo Davida naakapungula kujulu, wakabona angelo wa-Jehova uliimvwi akati kanyika ajulu, apanga lyakwe lilisomwedwe mujanza lyakwe, lilitandabikidwe kuJerusalemu, elyo Davida abapati mbaakali abo bakavundamina ansi, kabasamide zisani zyamasaka.

Nkabela Davida wakaambila Leza kuti, Sa teensi ndime ndakalailila kuti bantu babalwe. Ndime ndakabisya akucita bubi loko, pele imbelele ezi zyabisyanzi? O Jehova Leza wangu, ijanza lyako lilemene ndime aluzubo lwataata, pele bantu bako batakataazigwi pe.
Mpawo angelo wa-Jehova wakaambila Gadi kuti atolele Davida mulazyo wakuti, Davida uleelede kuyakila Jehova cipaililo kucipolelo caOrinani mu-Jebusi.
Lino Davida wakainka, mbubonya mbuli Gadi mbwaakamulailila muzina lya-Jehova,
Nkabela Orinani wakali kupola bulotwe, abalo bana bakwe bone bakali awe. Elyo naakacebuka akubona angelo, bakayuba.
Lino Davida naakasika kuli-Orinani, Orinani wakalanga aku bona Davida, elyo wakazwa mucipolelo akukotamina Davida cakuvundama.
Nkabela Davida wakaambila Orinani kuti, Kondipa busena bwacipolelo, kuti njakile Jehova cipaililo mulimbubo. Nkakuliye muulo uuelede, kuti bulwazi bulesegwe kukataazya bantu.

Mpawo Orinani wakaambila Davida kuti, Tola buyo. Mwami simalelo wangu acite kufumbwa cibota mumeso aakwe, Bona! Ndakupa basune kuti ubapaizye, azileyi kuti zibe inkuni, abulotwe kuti ubupaizye. Zyoonse ndakupa buyo.
Pele mwami Davida wakaambila Orinani kuti, Pe, ndaula mali aaelede muulo. Nsikonzyi kutola lubono lwako lwakupaizizya Jehova, nikuba kutuula zituuzyo zyabuyo.
Aboobo Davida wakapa Orinani masyekeli aangolida aali myaanda iili musanu aumwi, ibe muulo wakuntu oko.
Mpawo Davida wakayakila Jehova cipaililo nkukonya oko, watuula zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya, wakwiilila Jehova, nkabela wakamuvwiizya mulilo uuzwa kujulu, walokela acipaililo cakutuuzya.
Elyo Jehova wakalailila angelo kuti apilusye ipanga lyakwe munkomo yalyo.
Kuciindi eco Davida naakabona kuti Jehova wamuvwiila kucipolelo ca-Orinani mu-Jebusi, wakatuuzya zipaizyo zyakwe mpoonya awo.
Nkaambo kuciindi eco itente lyambunganino lya-Jehova, Musa ndyaakacita munkanda, acipaililo cakutuuzya, zyakali kucilundu caku-Gibeoni,
pele Davida wakakacilwa kwiinka nkuko kuyoobuzya makani kuli-Jehova, nkaambo kakuti wakali kuyoowa ipanga lyaangelo wa-Jehova.
Abwalo butale Davida wakabuvuzya, kuti bapange inembe zyamilyango yamanjililo azijatilizyo, amukuba munji loko uuteelekeki,
azisamu zyakedari zitabaliki, nkaambo ba-Sidoni abaTuro bakali kuletela Davida zisamu zinji zyakedari.

Nkaambo Davida wakati, Mwanaangu Solomoni ucili mwana, tana kucenjela, alimwi iŋanda iiti yakilwe Jehova ilyeelede kukomena loko, ibe ampuwo abulemu muzisi zyoonse. Nkaambo kako ndyeelede kulibambila njiyo. Aboobo Davida wakabamba zibelesyo zinji katana kufwa.
Elyo wakaita Solomoni mwanaakwe, wamulailila kuti ayakile Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli iŋanda.
Davida wakaambila Solomoni kuti, Mwanaangu, cintu icakali mumoyo wangu nceeci, Ndakati, ndyeelede kuyaka iŋanda yazina lya-Jehova Leza wangu.
Pele ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila liti, Watila bulowa bunji, akucita inkondo zinji. Toelede kuyakila izina lyangu iŋanda, nkaambo watila bulowa bunji ansi kumeso aangu.

Swiilila! Uyoozyalilwa mwana, nkabela oyo mwana uyooba siluumuno. Njoomupa luumuno, kuti atabi ankondo abasinkondonyina beengelede, nkaambo izina lyakwe liyooba Solomoni. Njoopa ba-Israyeli luumuno alutontolo mumazuba aakwe.
Ngonguwe uuti yakile izina lyangu iŋanda. Uyooba mwanaangu, ambebo njooba wisi, nkabela cuuno cabwami bwakwe bwaIsrayeli njoocisimpika mane kukabe kutamani.
Lino mwanaangu, Jehova abe ayebo, kuti ujane inguzu zyakuyaka iŋanda ya-Jehova Leza wako, mbubonya mbwaakaamba aanduwe,
Pele Jehova akupe maanu abusongo, kuti kuciindi eco noti pegwe bwami bwa-Israyeli, ukabambe mulao wa-Jehova Leza wako.
Lino uyookala kabotu na wabika moyo wako kuku bamba imbeta amilazyo Jehova njaakalailila Musa kuti ape baIsrayeli. Koyuma akuba mukozu. Utayoowi nikuba kukankama.

Bona! Ndalikataazya loko. Ndabambila iŋanda ya-Jehova matalenta aangolida aali zyuulu zili mwanda, amatalenta aansiliva aali zyuulu zili cuulu, amukuba abutale bunji loko buteelekeki, azisamu amabwe zyoonse ndazibamba. Ayebo uyooyungizizya.
Alimwi ulijisi basimilimo banji loko, basikubeza abasikusya mabwe abasikubeza zisamu, abantu bezi milimo yoonse,
yangolida ayansiliva ayamukuba ayabutale, Tababaliki pe. Buka, ukabeleke milimo, Alakwe Jehova abe ayebo,
Nkabela Davida wakalailila bapati boonse ba-Israyeli kuti bagwasye mwanaakwe Solomoni.
Wakati, Sa Jehova Leza wanu tali anywebo? Sa tana kumupa luumuno kumabazu oonse? Nkaambo bantu banyika wabaaba boonse mumaanza aangu, lino nyika ilizundide kubusyu bwaJehova abwabantu bakwe.

Lino amupangike myoyo yanu amiyeeyo yanu kukuyandaula Jehova Leza wanu, Amunyamuke, muyake cikombelo cisalala ca-Jehova Leza wanu, kuti ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova azibelesyo zisalala zya-Leza zinjizigwe muŋanda iiyakilidwe izina lya-Jehova.
Nkabela Davida wakabunganya bapati boonse ba-Israyeli abapaizi abaLevi,
Ba-Levi boonse ibakajisi myaka iili makumi otatwe nanka kuya kunembo bakabalwa, nkabela mweelwe wabaalumi wakasika kuzyuulu zili makumi otatwe amusanu azitatu,
Lino Davida wakati, Akati kabaaba, bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine baleelede kubeleka milimo yaŋanda ya-Jehova, bantu bali zyuulu zili musanu acimwi baleelede kuba basilutwe ababetesi,
bantu bali zyuulu zyone baleelede kuba basimilyango, abantu bali zyuulu zyone baleelede kutembaula Jehova azilizyo nzindakapanga kukutembaula.
Nkabela Davida wakabaandaanya inkamu inkamu mbubonya mbuli bana ba-Levi, Gerisomu a-Kohati a-Merari.
Bana ba-Gerisomu mbaaba: Ladani a-Simeyi,
Abana ba-Ladani mbaaba: Jehieli mupati, a-Zetamu a-Joeli, bali botatwe.
Abana baSimeyi mbaaba: Selomoti a-Hazieli a-Hanani, bali botatwe. Mbombabo basilutwe banzubo zya-Ladani.
Abana ba-Simeyi mbaaba: jahati aZina a-Jeusi a-Beriya. Aba bone boonse bakali bana ba-Simeyi.
Jahati kali mutaanzi, a-Zina kali wabili, pele Jeusi a-Beriya teebakazyede bana banji, aboobo bana babo bakabalwa mbuli luzubo lomwe buyo.

Abana ba-Amiramu: Aroni a-Musa, Nkabela Aroni wakabikwa kuti asalazye zintu zisalalisya, kuti walo abana bakwe batente tununkilizyo lyoonse kubusyu bwa-Jehova, akumana milimo akulongezya bantu muzina lyakwe lyoonse.
Pele bana ba-Musa muntu wa-Leza balaambwa mumusyobo wa-Levi.
Bana ba-Musa mbaaba: Gerisomu a-Eliezeri.
Abana ba-Gerisomu: Sebuyeli mutaanzi.
Abana ba-Eliezeri: Rehabiya mutaanzi. Eliezeri katakwe bana bambi, pele bana ba-Rehabiya bakali banji loko.
Abana ba-Izara mbaaba: Selomiti mutaanzi.
Abana ba-Hebroni mbaaba: Jeriya mutaanzi, a-Amariya wabili, Jehazieli watatu, a-Jekameamu wane.
Abana ba-Uzieli mbaaba: Mika mutaanzi, a-Isiya wabili,
Bana ba-Merari mbaaba: Mali a-Musi. Bana ba-Mali: Eleazara a-Kisi.
Nkabela Eleazara naakafwa katazyede bana balombe, kazyede basimbi luzutu, Lino bakwabo bana ba-Kisi mbobakabakwata.
Abana ba-Musi: Mali, a-Ederi, a-Jeremoti, bali botatwe.
Nkaambo Davida wakaamba kuti, Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli wapa bantu bakwe luumuno, alimwi ulikede mu-Jerusalemu lyoonse.
Lino ba-Levi tabaceelede kuyumuna itente lyambungano azibelesyo zyamilimo yalyo,
(nkaambo mbaabo ba-Levi ibakabalwa kumulazyo musyaalizi wa-Davida, boonse ibakajisi myaka iili makumi obile nanka kusotoka),
pele ceelelo cabo ncakugwasya bana ba-Aroni mumilimo yaŋanda ya-Jehova. Bapegwa milimo yambanza ayamaanda aamukati, amilimo yakusalazya zintu zyoonse zisalala, amilimo imwi iiyandwa muŋanda ya-Leza,
akugwasya kumilimo yazinkwa zituulidwe, ayabusu bwakupaizya, atubunge twazinkwa zitajisi buswezyo, azipaizyo ziyokedwe, azipaizyo zivwelene amafuta, azibelesyo zyakweeleka azyakupima.
Nkabela zifumo zyoonse baleelede kwiima kukulumba akutembaula Jehova, akuciindi camangolezya mbubonya,
akuziindi zyakupailila Jehova buzuba bwa-Sabata abuzuba bwamwezi mupiya amapobwe, mbubonya mbuli mweelwe aziyanza ziyandwa, bacite mbubonya kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Baleelede kulanga itente lyambunganino acikombelo cisalalisya, akugwasya bakwabo bana ba-Aroni mumilimo yaŋanda ya-Jehova.
Pele Nadabu a-Abihu bakataangu­ nina wisaabo kufwa, nkabela teebakazyede bana, aboobo Eleazara a-Itamara mbobakacita milimo yabupaizi.
Lino Davida a-Zadoki umwi wabana ba-Eleazara a-Ahimeleki umwi wabana ba-Itamara bakabaabila milimo yabo.

Nkabela akati kabana ba-Eleazara kwakajanwa bantu bacenjede banji kwiinda bana ba-Itamara, aboobo bakaandaanya bana ba-Eleazara munkamu zili ikumi amusanu aimwi mbubonya mbuli inzubo zyabamawisaabo, abana ba-Itamara bakabaandaanya munkamu zili musanu azitatu,
Bakabaandaanya kukuwaala cisolo; boonse kabeelene. Kakuli baalu bacikombelo abaalu ba-Leza akati kabana ba-Eleazara abana ba-Itamara boonse.

Semaya mwana wa-Netaneli mulembi, umwi waba-Levi, nguwakabalemba kubusyu bwamwami abwabapati abwa-Zadoki mupaizi abwa-Ahimeleki mwana wa-Abyatare abasilutwe banzubo zyabapaizi azyaba-Levi. Umwi silutwe wakasalwa akati kanzubo zya-Eleazara, aumwi wakasalwa akati kanzubo zya-Itamara.
catatu cakawida Harimu, cane cakawida Seorimu,
casanu cakawida Malikiya, camusanu acimwi cakawida Mijamini,
camusanu azibili cakawida Hakozi, camusanu azitatu cakawida Abija,
camusanu azine cakawida Jeshua, cakumi cakawida Sekaniya,
cakumi acimwi cakawida Eliyasibu, acakumi azibili cakawida Jakimu,
cakumi azitatu cakawida Hupa, cakumi azine cakawida Jesebeabu,
cakumi amusanu cakawida Biliga,-cakumi amusanu acimwi cakawida Imeri,
cakumi amusanu azibili cakawida Heziri, cakumi amusanu azitatu cakawida Hapizezi,
cakumi amusanu azine cakawida Petahiya, camakumi obile cakawida Jehezikeli,
camakumi obile acimwi cakawida jakini, camakumi obile azibili cakawida Gamuli,
camakumi obile azitatu cakawida Delaya, acamakumi obile azine cakawida Miziya.
Aba bakapegwa milimo yakunjila muŋanda ya-Jehova muciyanza ncibakataanguna kubikilwa kujanza lya-Aroni wisaabo, mbubonya mbwaakamulailila Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
akati kabana ba-Rehabiya mutaanzi kali Isiya;
akati kaba-Izara, Selomoti; akati kabana ba-Selomoti, Jahati.
Abana ba-Hebroni mbaaba: Jeriya mutaanzi, Amariya wabili, Jahazieli watatu, Jekameamu wane.
Abana ba-Uziyeli: Mika, Abana ba-Mika: Samiri.
Amunyina Mika: Isiya. Abana ba-Isiya: Zekariya.
Abana ba-Merari: Mali a-Musi. Abana ba-Jaziya: Beno.
Bana ba-Merari: jaziya, Beno, a-Sohamu, a-Zakuri, a-Ibri.
Abana ba-Mali: Eleazara, iwakabula kuzyala bana.
Abana ba-Kisi: jerameh.
Abana ba-Musi: Mali a-Ederi a-Jerimoti. Mbaabo ba-Levi mbubakalembwa munzubo zyabamawisi.
Abalo bakawaala cisolo, umwi aumwi amwanike wakwe, mbubonya mbuli babunyina bana ba-Aroni, kubusyu bwamwami Davida abwa-Zadoki a-Ahimeleki abapati banzubo zyabapaizi azyaba-Levi.
Bana ba-Asafu: Zakuri a-Josefe a-Netaniya a-Asarela, Mbaabo bana ba-Asafu ibakali mumaanza aa-Asafu, iwakaimba mbuli mbwaakalailila mwami.

Alakwe jedutuni, bana ba-Jedutuni mbaaba: Gedaliya, a-Zeri, a-Jesaya, Simei, Hasabiya, a-Matitiya, bali musanu aumwi, Aba bakali mumaanza aa-Jedutuni wisaabo, iwakali kwiimbya kantimbwa kukulumba akutembaula Jehova.
Alakwe Hemani, bana ba-Hemani mbaaba: Bukiya, Mataniya, Uziyeli, Sebuyeli, Jerimoti, Hananiya, Hanani, Eliyata, Gidaliti, Romamti, Ezeri, Josibekasa, Maloti, Hotiri, a-Mahazioti.
Aba boonse bakali bana ba-Hemani mulunguluzi wamwami. Leza wakamusumpula mbubonya mbwaakamusyomezezya. Leza wakapa Hemani bana balombe bali ikumi abane abana basimbi botatwe,
Boonse bakali mumaanza aawisaabo mumilimo yakwiimba muŋanda ya-Jehova, Bakali kwiimbya zigweje anyeele atuntimbwa mumilimo yaŋanda ya-Leza. Asafu a-Hemani a-Jedutuni bakali mumaanza aamwami,
Mweelwe wabo, antoomwe ababunyina ibakaiyide nyimbo zya-Jehova, boonse bacenjede, kaili myanda yobile amakumi aali musanu aatatu amusanu abatatu.
Nkabela bakawaala cisolo cakubaabanya milimo, baniini abapati, baiyi abasikwiiya, boonse kabeelene.
Lino cisolo citaanzi cakawida Asafu, nkukuti Josefa; cabili cakawida Gedaliya, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
catatu cakawida Zakuri, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cane cakawida Izri, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
casanu cakawida Netaniya, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
camusanu acimwi cakawida Bukiya, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
camusanu azibili cakawida Yesarela, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
camusanu azitatu cakawida Jesaya, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
camusanu azine cakawida Mataniya, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi cakawida Simeyi, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi acimwi cakawida Azareli, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi azibili cakawida Hasabiya, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi azitatu cakawida Subaeli, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi azine cakawida Matitiya, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi amusanu cakawida Jeremoti, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi amusanu acimwi cakawida Hananiya, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi amusanu azibili cakawida Josibekasa, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi amusanu azitatu cakawida Hanani, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
cakumi amusanu azine cakawida Maloti, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
camakumi obile cakawida Eliyata, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
camakumi obile acimwi cakawida Hotiri, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
camakumi obile azibili cakawida Gidaliti, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
camakumi obile azitatu cakawida Mahazioti, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili;
camakumi obile azine cakawida Romamti Ezeri, walo ababunyina abana bakwe kabali ikumi ababili.
Nkabela Mesele­ miya kazyede bana: Zekariya mutaanzi, awabili jedyaeli, awatatu Zebadiya, awane Jatiniyeli,
awasanu Elamu, awamusanu aumwi Jehohanana, awamusanu ababili Eliunai.
Alakwe Obedi-Edomu kazyede bana: Semaya mutaanzi, awabili Jozabadi, awatatu Jowa, awane Sakari, awasanu Netaneli,
awamusanu aumwi Amiyeli, awamusanu ababili Isakara, awamusanu abatatu Peuletai, nkaambo Leza wakamupa coolwe.
Alakwe Semaya mwanaakwe wakazyala bana ibakaba beendelezi muluzubo lwawisaabo, nkaambo bakali baalumi bacenjede loko,
Bana ba-Semaya mbaaba: Otini, a-Refaeli, a-Obedi, a-Elzabadi (babunyina bakali bantu bacenjede), a-Elihu, a-Semakiya.
Mbaabo boonse bana ba-Obedi-Edomu, balo abana babo ababunyina, bantu bacenjede ibakajisi inguzu zyakubeleka milimo. Bana ba-Obedi-Edomu bakali makumi aali musanu alimwi ababili.
Alakwe Meselemiya kajisi bana ababunyina, bantu bacenjede bali ikumi amusanu abatatu.
Alakwe Hosa umwi wabana ba-Merari kazyede bana: Simri mupati (nkaambo wisi wakamupa bupati nekuba kuti teensi nguwe mutaanzi kuzyalwa),
wabili Hilikiya, watatu Tebaliya, awane Zekariya. Bana boonse ba-Hosa ababunyina bakali ikumi abatatu.
Ezi inkamu zyabasimilyango zilembedwe mbuli mazina aabapati bazyo zyakapegwa milimo mbubonya mbuli babunyina. Bakali kubeleka muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Nkabela bakawaala cisolo, baniini abapati boonse, munzubo zya bamawisi, kuti baabilwe milyango yabo.
Cisolo cakujwe cakawida Selemiya. Alakwe Zekariya mwanaakwe, sinkuta uucenjede, wakawaalilwa cisolo, nkabela cisolo cakunyika ncecakamuwida.
ObediEdomu wakawidwa cisolo cakumusanza, abalo bana bakwe bakapegwa milimo yaciyobwedo.
Sopimu a-Hosa bakawidwa cisolo cakumbo, nkukuti mulyango wa-Saleketi mumugwagwa uuya mujulu. Bulangizi bwakalangana abulangizinyina.
Kujwe kakuli musanu aumwi buzuba bumwi abumwi, kunyika kakuli bone buzuba bumwi abumwi, kumusanza kakuli bone buzuba bumwi abumwi, akwalo kuciyobwedo bobile bobile,
alimwi kumanjililo aakumbo, kakuli bone kumugwagwa abobile kumanjililo.
Nzizeezyo inkamu zyabasimilyango izyakasalidwe mubana ba-Kora abana ba-Merari.
Bana ba-Ladani, bana babaGerisoni baluzubo lwa-Ladani, bapati banzubo zya-Ladani mu-Gerisoni: Jehieli.
Bana ba-Jehieli, Zetamu a-Joeli munyina, mbobakali kulanga ziyobwedo zyaŋanda ya-Jehova.
Alimwi akati kaba-Amrami aba-Izari abaHebroni aba-Uziyeli,
Sebueli mwana wa-Gerisomu mwana wa-Musa kali silutwe waziyobwedo.
Ababunyina: Eliezeri wakazyala Rehabiya, iwakazyala jesaya, iwakazyala Joramu, iwakazyala Zikiri, iwakazyala Selomoti.
Oyu Selomoti ababunyina mbobakali kulanga ziyobwedo zyazipo zisalala nzibakasalazya mwami Davida abapati banzubo abasilutwe bamyanda abasilutwe bampi.
Bakali kusalazya zimwi zyazisaalo nzibakasaala munkondo zyabo kuti zigwasye milimo yaŋanda ya-Jehova.
Azyalo zintu nzibakasalazya Samuele sicilengano a-Saulo mwana wa-Kisi a-Abineri mwana wa-Neri a-Joabu mwana wa-Zeruya, zipo ezi zisalala zyoonse zyakali mumaanza aa-Selomoti ababunyina.

Alimwi akati kaba-Hebroni, Hasabiya ababunyina, bantu bacenjede bali cuulu amyaanda iili musanu aibili, mbobakali kubeleka milimo yacisi ca-Israyeli kumbo lya-Jordano, milimo yoonse ya-Jehova amilimo yamwami.

Akati kaba-Hebroni Jeriya kali mupati waba-Hebroni mumabuku oonse aamazyalani. (Mumwaka wamakumi one wabwami bwa-Davida bakalangaula bantu, nkabela baalumi bacenjede akati kabo bakajanwa ku-Jazeri mucisi ca-Gileadi.)

Elyo mwami Davida wakamubika, walo ababunyina, bantu bacenjede bali zyuulu zyobile amyanda iili musanu aibili, bapati banzubo, kuti balange ba-Rubeni aba-Gadi acisela camukowa wa-Manase mumakani oonse aa-Leza amakani oonse aamwami.

Mbaaba bana ba-Israyeli, mbubakabalwa, bapati banzubo, abasilutwe bazyuulu abamyaanda, abasilutwe ibakali kubeleka milimo yamwami mumakani oonse aankamu zyabantu izyakali kubeleka milimo yamwezi umwi aumwi mumyezi yoonse yamwaka, Inkamu imwi aimwi yakali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Kali waluzubo lwa-Perezi, nkabela kali mupati wabasilutwe boonse bampi mumwezi mutaanzi.
Dodai mu-Ahohi kali silutwe wankamu yamwezi wabili. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Alimwi silutwe wampi mumwezi watatu kali Benaya mwana wa-Jehoyada mupaizi mupati. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine,
Oyu Benaya ngonguwe iwakali mwaalumi sintaze akati kabantu bali makumi otatwe, Kali mupati wabaabo bali makumi otatwe. Alakwe Amizabadi mwanaakwe kali silutwe wankamu,
Alimwi silutwe wane wamumwezi wane kali Asaheli munyina joabu. Alakwe Zebadiya mwanaakwe kali musule lyakwe. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine,
Asilutwe wasanu wamumwezi wasanu kali Samuti mu-Izra, Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Asilutwe wamusanu aumwi wamumwezi wamusanu aumwi kali Ira mwana wa-Ikesi waku-Tekowa. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine,
Asilutwe wamusanu ababili wamumwezi wamusanu aibili kali Helezi mu-Peloni waluzubo lwa-Efraimu. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Asilutwe wamusanu abatatu wamumwezi wamusanu aitatu kali Sibekai mu-Husati, umwi waba-Zerati. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Asilutwe wamusanu abane wamumwezi wamusanu aine kali Abiezeri mu-Anatoti waluzubo lwa-Benjamini. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Asilutwe wakumi wamumezi wakumi kali Maharai muNetofati, umwi waba-Zerati. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Asilutwe wakumi aumwi wamumwezi wakumi aumwi kali Benaya mu-Piratoni waluzubo lwa-Efraimu. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Asilutwe wakumi ababili wamumwezi wakumi aibili kali Heledai mu-Netofati waluzubo lwaOtiniyeli. Munkamu yakwe kamuli bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azine.
Lino bami bamisyobo ba-Israyeli mbaaba. Mwami waba-Rubeni kali Eliezeri mwana wa-Zikiri; mwami waba-Simeoni kali Sefatiya mwana wa-Maaka;
mwami waba-Levi kali Hasabiya mwana wa-Kemueli; mwami waba-Aroni kali Zadoki;
mwami waba-Juda kali Elihu umwi wababunyina ba-Davida; mwami wa-Isakara kali Omri mwana wa-Mikayeli;
mwami wa-Zebuloni kali Isimaya mwana wa-Obadiya; mwami wabaNafitali kali Jeremoti mwana wa-Azrieli;
mwami wabana ba-Efraimu kali Hosea mwana wa-Azaziya; mwami wacisela camusyobo wa-Manase kali Joeli mwana wa-Pedaya;
mwami wacisela camusyobo wa-Manase cakuGileadi kali Ido mwana wa-Zekariya; mwami waba-Benjamini kali Jasiyeli mwana wa-Abineri;
mwami waba-Dani kali Azareli mwana wa-Jerohamu. Mbaabo bami bamisyobo yaba-Israyeli,
Pele Davida taakwe naakabala bantu ibakajisi myaka iili makumi obile na bacili kunsi, nkaambo Jehova wakasyomezya kuvuzya ba-Israyeli mbubonya mbuli inyenyeezi zyakujulu.
Joabu mwana wa-Zeruya wakatalika kubala, pele taakwe naakabamana. Ba-Israyeli bakabukilwa bukali nkaambo kamakani aya, aboobo mweelwe teewakalembwa mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi lyamwami Davida.
Silutwe waziyobwedo zyamwami kali Azmaveti mwana wa-Adieli, asilutwe waziyobwedo zyakumatungu azyakuminzi azyakutunzuunzi kali Jonatani mwana wa-Uziya.
Asilutwe wabasimilimo bakumyuunda ibakali kulima nyika kali Ezri mwana wa-Kelubu.
Asilutwe wamyuunda yamasaanza kali Simeyi mu-Ramati; asilutwe wamicelo yamyuunda yamasaansa yakucita waini kali Zabidi mu-Sifimi.
Asilutwe wamaolifa amakuyu aakutulundulundu kali Baala Hanani mu-Gederi; asilutwe waziyobwedo­ zyamafuta kali Joasi.
Asilutwe waŋombe izyakali kucela ku-Saroni kali Sitirai mu-Saroni; asilutwe waŋombe zyakumakuti kali Safati mwana wa-Adilai.
Asilutwe wankamele kali Obili mu-Ismayeli; asilutwe wambongolo kali Jedeya mu-Meronoti,
Asilutwe wambelele kali Jazizi mu-Hagiri, Mbaabo boonse babambi bambono zyamwami Davida.
Ahitofeli kali sinkuta wamwami, alakwe Husai muAriki kali muzwalani wakwe mwami.
Ahitofeli naakazwa, wakamutobela Jehoyada mwana wa-Benaya, a-Abyatare. Asilutwe wampi yamwami kali Joabu

Nkabela mwami Davida naakanyampuka, wakabaambila kuti, Amundiswiilile nubakwesu abantu bangu, Mumoyo wangu ndakali kuyanda kuyaka iŋanda yakulyokezezya yabbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova acuuno camaulu aa-Leza wesu, aboobo ndakatalika kulibamba kuyaka,
Pele Leza wakandaambila kuti, Toelede kuyakila izina lyangu iŋanda pe, nkaambo uli muntu wankondo, watila bulowa,

Nekubaboobo Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli nguwakandisala mebo akati kabasiŋanda boonse bataata kuti mbe mwami wa-Israyeli lyoonse, nkaambo wakasala musyobo wa-Juda kuti ube musolozi, alimwi mumusyobo wa-Juda wakasala luzubo lwataata, alimwi akati kabana bataata wakasala ndime kuti mbe mwami wacisi coonse ca-Israyeli.
Nkabela akati kabana bangu (nkaambo Jehova wandipa bana banji) wasala Solomoni kuti akale acuuno cabwami bwa-Jehova mucisi ca-Israyeli.
Wakandaambila kuti, Mwanaako Solomoni nguuelede kuyaka iŋanda yangu alubanza lwayo, nkaambo ngonguwe ngundasala kuti abe mwanaangu, ambebo njooba wisi,
Nkabela bwami bwakwe njoobwiimika nji na wakakatila kukubamba milao yangu ambeta zyangu mbubonya mbwacita sunu,

Nkaambo kako ndamucenjezya, kumeso aaba-Israyeli boonse, imbungano ya-Jehova amumatwi aa-Leza wesu, kuti mubike myoyo yanu kukubamba milazyo yoonse yaJehova Leza wesu, kuti muvube nyika eyi imbotu, akwiisia mumaanza aabana banu baciza, ibe lukono lwabo mazuba oonse mane kukabe kutamani.
