Lino swiilila! Jehova wakusala kuti uyake iŋanda, ibe busena busalala. Koliyumya, ukacite obo.
acifwanikisyo cazyoonse nzyaakayeeyede mumoyo wakwe, acalubanza lwaŋanda ya-Jehova, acamaanda aakuzyunguluka, acaziyobwedo zyaŋanda ya-Leza, acaziyobwedo zyazintu zisalala,
amakani aazyaandaanino zyabapaizi azyaba-Levi, amilimo yoonse yakubamba iŋanda yaJehova, azibelesyo zyoonse zyamilimo yaŋanda ya-Jehova,
abulemu bwangolida yazibelesyo zyoonse zyangolida izyakacitilwa mulimo umwi aumwi, abulemu bwansiliva yazibelesyo zyoonse zyansiliva izyakacitilwa mulimo umwi aumwi,

abulemu bwaziimikilo zyamalampi zyangolida abwamalampi aazyo, bulemu bwangolida bwaciimikilo cimwi acimwi abwalampi lyaco, abulemu bwansiliva bwaciimikilo cimwi acimwi abwalampi lyaco, mbubonya mbuli ziimikilo mbuzyakabede,
abulemu bwangolida bwantafule imwi aimwi zyazinkwa zituulidwe, abwansiliva yantafule zyansiliva,
angolida iisalalisya yaziyasyo ayamitiba ayankomeki, abulemu bwansambilo zyangolida imwi aimwi, abulemu bwazisambilo zyansiliva cimwi acimwi,
amakani aacipaililo catununkilizyo cangolida iisalazidwe abulemu bwaco, acifwanikisyo cankalaki yabaangelo bakerebimu bangolida ibakali kuvumbya mababa aabo ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova.
Aya makani oonse wakaapandulula mumagwalo aakazwa kumaanza aa-Jehova. Wakapandulula milimo yoonse mbuyakeelede kucitwa,

Bona! Inkamu zyoonse zyabapaizi azyaba-Levi bakubeleka milimo yaŋanda ya-Leza nkuzili, Abalo bantu boonse babika myoyo yabo kulinjiyo, kufumbwa muntu uubwene kucita milimo iili buti na buti, abasilutwe abantu boonse, balakugwasya mumilimo yoonse.

Nkaambo kako ndibambilide iŋanda ya-Leza wangu zyoonse nzindakakonzya, ingolida iiyandilwa zintu zyangolida, ansiliva yazintu zyansiliva, amukuba wazintu zyamukuba, abutale bwazintu zyabutale, azisamu zyazintu zyazisamu amabwe manji aa-berulo amabwe aakusomaika amusila amabwe aamabala mabala amabwe mayandisi oonse amabweluuma,

Alimwi atala lyazeezi zyoonse nzindibambilide iŋanda iisalala, ndijisi lubono luyandisi ndemwini lwangolida alwansiliva, alwalo ndalupa iŋanda ya-Leza wangu, nkaambo moyo wangu ulayandisya iŋanda ya-Leza wangu.
Nkwaali matalenta aangolida aali zyuulu zyotatwe, ingolida yacisi ca-Ofiri, amatalenta aansiliva iisalazidwe aali zyuulu zili musanu azibili. Njakuziluluzya malambo aaŋanda,
akucitya kufumbwa milimo yakufula iiyandwa; ingolida ilaba yazintu zyangolida, ayalo insiliva ilaba yazintu zyansiliva. Lino nguni uuyanda kusalazizya milimo ya-Jehova imbono zyakwe buzuba obuno?

Nkabela bakaletela milimo yaŋanda ya-Leza ingolida, matalenta aali zyuulu zyosanwe ampondo zili zyuulu zili ikumi, amatalenta aansiliva aali zyuulu zili ikumi, amatalenta aamukuba aali zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu azitatu, amatalenta aabutale aali zyuulu zili mwanda.
Alimwi kufumbwa muntu iwakajisi mabwe mayandisi wakaapa ciyobwedo caŋanda ya-Jehova icakali mumaanza aa-Jehieli mu-Gerisoni.
Lino bantu bakasekelela nkaambo kazipo izyakaletwa, nkaambo bakali kupa Jehova camoyo woonse. Alakwe mwami Davida wakasekelela alukondo lupati.
Bupati anguzu abulemu aluzundo abwami, zyoonse nzizyako, O Jehova, nkaambo zintu zyoonse zyakujulu azyaansi nzizyako. Bwami mbobwako, O Jehova, alimwi nduwe nosumpwidwe mbuli simutwe waboonse.
Buvubi abulemu, zyoonse zilazwa kulinduwe. Nduwe ooendelezya zyoonse. Mumaanza aako mozijanwa inguzu abupati. Maanza aako ngaakonzya kusumpula akuyumya bantu boonse.
Lino sunu, O Leza wesu, iswe tulakulumba akutembaula izina lyako lilemu.
Pele mebo ndimeni? Abalo bantu bangu mbobani? Ncinzi citugwasya kuleta zipo zili boobu? Nkaambo zintu zyoonse zilazwa kulinduwe, azipo nzitwakupa nzezyakazwa kumaanza aako omwini.
Nkaambo tuli beenzu kumeso aako, tuli basikutuntulika buyo, mbubonya mbubakabede bamatateesu boonse. Mazuba esu aansi ano ali mbuli cinzimwemwe buyo; taakwe ncitulangila.
O Jehova Leza wesu, zintu ezi zinji loko nzitwabambila milimo yakuyakila izina lyako lisalala iŋanda, zyoonse zyazwa mumaanza aako, zyoonse nzizyako.

Ndizi, O Leza wangu, kuti nduwe olingula myoyo, alimwi ulayandisya bululami. Lino mubululami bwamoyo wangu ndibambide zintu ezi zyoonse, alimwi sunu ndibwene bantu bako bali ano abalo balakuletela zipo nzibayanda mumyoyo yabo cakukondwa.
O Jehova, Leza wa-Abrahamu awa-Izaka awa-Israyeli batateesu, kocita kuti miyeeyo iili boobu amakanze aali boobu akalilile mumyoyo yabantu bako, myoyo yabo ipangikwe kulinduwe.
Alakwe Solomoni mwanaangu, komupa moyo uululeme, kuti abambe imbeta zyako amilazyo yako amilao yako, azicite zyoonse akuyaka iŋanda njindabambila makani,
Mpawo Davida wakaambila imbungano yoonse yabantu kuti, Amulumbe Jehova Leza wanu. Nkabela bantu boonse bakalumba Jehova Leza wabamawisaabo, bakotama, balemeka Jehova amwami.

Elyo bakapailila Jehova zipaizyo, alimwi nibwakaca bakatuulila Jehova alimwi zituuzyo, basune bali cuulu, abagutu bali cuulu, atubelele tuli cuulu, azipaizyo zyakunywa, azipaizyo zinji zyabantu boonse ba-Israyeli.

Nkabela bakalya akunywa kubusyu bwa-Jehova mubuzuba obo alukondo lupati loko, alimwi Solomoni mwana wa-Davida bakamunanika lwabili mafuta aabwami, kuti abe mwami kumeso aa-Jehova, Alakwe Zadoki bakamubika kuti abe mupaizi.
Mbuboobo Solomoni mbwaakatalika kukala acuuno cabwami bwaJehova mucibaka ca-Davida wisi. Nkabela wakajana coolwe, aba-Israyeli boonse bakamuswiilila.
Bapati boonse abasinguzu boonse abana boonse bamwami Davida bakazumina kuti Solomoni abe mwami.
Nkabela Jehova wakasumpula Solomoni mumeso aaba-Israyeli boonse akumupa bulemu bugambya kwiinda bami boonse ba-Israyeli ibakamutaangunina.
Davida mwana wa-Jese kali mwami wacisi coonse ca-Israyeli.
Nkabela ciindi naakali mwami wa-Israyeli cakasika kumyaka iili makumi one, Kali mwami myaka iili musanu aibili mu-Hebroni, alimwi mu-Jerusalemu kali mwami myaka iili makumi otatwe aitatu,
Wakoongola kabotu mane lumwi wakafwa, kali amyaka minji abuvubi bunji abulemu bunji, nkabela Solomoni mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Lino makani oonse aamwami Davida, mataanzi amasyaalizi, alilembedwe mubbuku lya-Samuele mulunguluzi amubbuku lya-Natani musinsimi amubbuku lya-Gadi mulunguluzi.
Makani oonse alilembedwe amakani aabwami bwakwe, anguzu zyakwe, azintu izyakasika kulinguwe akucisi ca-Israyeli akuzisi zyoonse zyanyika.
Nkabela Solomoni ambungano yoonse yabantu bakainka kucipaililo cakuGibeoni, nkaambo nkonkuko nkulyakabede itente lyakubunganina lya-Leza ndyaakacita Musa mulanda wa-Jehova naakali munkanda.
(Pele ibbokesi lya-Leza, Davida kaliletede kuzwa ku-Kiriati-Jearimu akulisisya kubusena Davida mbwaakalibambila, nkaambo wakalibambila cilao mu-Jerusalemu).
Cipaililo camukuba, ncaakacita Bezaleli mwana wa-Uri mwana wa-Huri, cakali nkukonya oko kunembo lyatente lyakubunganina lya-Jehova. Elyo Solomoni ambungano yoonse yabantu bakaakuyandaula Jehova.
Nkabela Solomoni wakatanta kuya kucipaililo camukuba icakali kubusyu bwa-Jehova mutente lyakubunganina, wapaizya alincico zipaizyo zili cuulu.
Mpawo Solomoni wakaambila Leza kuti, Wafwida Davida taata luzyalo lugambya, aboobo wandilisya bwami bwakwe.
Lino, O Jehova Leza, ijwi lyako ndowakaambila Davida taata liime nji, nkaambo wandipa bwami bwakweendelezya bantu banji mbuli lusuko lwaansi.
Kondipa busongo amaanu, kuti nsololele kabotu aba bantu mukuzwa amukuboola, nkaambo nguni uubwene kubeteka bantu bako banji bali boobu?

Elyo Leza wakaambila Solomoni kuti, Makani aya mbwaakali mumoyo wako, alimwi tona kukumbila buvubi na imbono na bulemu na kuzunda basinkondonyoko, alimwi tona kukumbila koongola, pele wakumbila busongo amaanu aakubeteka bantu mbondakupa bwami bwakubecndelezya,
lino ndakupa ncobeni busongo amaanu, Alimwi ndakupa buvubi ambono abulemu kwiinda bami boonse ibakakutaangunina akwiinda boonse ibati kutobele.
Lino Solomoni nakazwa kucipaililo caku-Gibeoni kunembo lyatente lyakubunganina wakaboola ku-Jerusalemu akweendelezya ba-Israyeli.
Alimwi insiliva angolida, mwami wakacita kuti zivule mu-Jerusalemu mbuli mabwe, azyalo zisamu zyakedari wakazivuzya mbuli inkuyu zili mutulundulundu,
Amabbiza aa-Solomoni akaletwa kuzwa ku-Egepita aku-Kue. Basambazi bamwami bakaaula ku-Kue amali.

Bakaakuula inkalaki ku-Egepita amasyekeli aansiliva aali myanda iili musanu aumwi, abbiza bakali kulyuula masyekeli aali mwanda amakumi osanwe, alimwi kumaanza aabo zyakaletwa kubami boonse baba-Hiti ababa-Aramu.

Nkaambo kako Solomoni wakasala bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili bakuyumuna, abantu bali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aatatu bakusya mabwe mumalundu, abantu bali zyuulu zyotatwe amyanda iili musanu aumwi bakubabelesya.
Alimwi Solomoni wakatumina Huramu mwami wa-Turo, wati, Mbubonya mbowakacitila Davida taata, mbowakamutumina zisamu zyakuliyakila Iŋanda yakukala, kondicitila ambebo mbubonya.

Bona! Ndaamba kuyaka iŋanda yazina lya-Jehova Leza wangu, kuti nkamusalazizye njiyo, ibe yakutenta tununkilizyo kubusyu bwakwe, tununkilizyo twa misamu mibotu, azinkwa zituulidwe lyoonse, azipaizyo zyacifumo azyamangolezya, mumazuba aa-Sabata amumazuba aamwezi mupiya amumapobwe aabambidwe aaJehova Leza wesu, mbukulaililwa lyoonse mucisi ca-Israyeli.
Iŋanda njenti yake iyookomena, nkaambo Leza wesu mupati kwiinda mizimu yoonse.
Nguni uukonzya kumuyakila iŋanda P Kujulu akujulu loko kwamwaatila. Mebo nsikonzyi kumuyakila iŋanda, cita iŋanda yakutenta tununkilizyo kubusyu bwakwe.

Lino konditumina muntu uucenjede uubwene milimo yangolida ayansiliva ayamukuba ayabutale, amilimo yamasani mabotu aasalala na aasalala pyu na aasia-sia, uuzi kulemba zilembyo zyeebesi, kuti abe abasimilimo bacenjede mbenjisi mucisi ca-Juda amuJerusalemu, mbaakabika Davida taata.
Alimwi konditumina zisamu zyakedari azyamulombe azyaalgumi kuzwa ku-Lebano, nkaambo ndizi kuti balanda bako balibwene kutema zisamu ku-Lebano. Abalo balanda bangu bayoogwasya balanda bako,
kukundibambila zisamu zinji, nkaambo iŋanda njenti yake yakomena cakugambya.

Nkabela basimilimo bako bagonka zisamu, njoobapa zisuwo zyabulotwe zili zyuulu zili makumi obile, azisuwo zyabbaale zili zyuulu zili makumi obile, anongo zyawaini zili zyuulu zili makumi obile, anongo zyamafuta zili zyuulu zili makumi obile.
Alimwi Huramu wakati, Alumbwe Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, iwakalenga ijulu anyika, nkaambo wapa mwami Davida mwana uucenjede uuli amaanu abusongo, uuti yakile Jehova iŋanda akuliyakila iŋanda yabwami.
Lino bona! Ndakutumina muntu uucenjede uuli amaanu, Huramu-abi,

ngumwana wamwanakazi wa-Dani, pele wisi kali muntu waku-Turo. Ulibwene kucita milimo yangolida ayansiliva ayamukuba ayabutale, amilimo yamabwe ayazisamu, amilimo yamasani aamabala mabala, aasalala nanka aasia, amasani aatuba. Alimwi ulibwene kufula malembo azifwanikisyo, kufumbwa ncoyanda, Agwasyanye abasimilimo bako abasimilimo bamwami Dwida uso.
Lino bulotwe abbaale awaini amafuta, simalelo wangu nzyaamba, azitume kulindime ndemulanda wakwe,
Elyo tuzoogonka ztsamu zyoonse nzoyanda ku-Lebano, tuzoozileta mumaato alwizi kusikila ku-Jopa, aboobo uyoozigwisya nkuko akuzitola ku-Jerusalemu.

Lino zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aabili wakababika kuti bayumune mikuli, azyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aatatu, wakabatuma kukusya mabwe mumalundu, abantu bali zyuulu zyotatwe amyanda iili musanu aumwi, wakababika kuti babelesye bantu.
Wakatalika kuyaka mumwezi wabili mumwaka wane wabwami bwakwe.
Mbuboobu Solomoni mbwaakayaka iŋanda ya-Leza: bulamfu bwayo nibwakapimwa muziyanza zyaciindi bwakali tukokola tuli makumi aali musanu alimwi, abwaamba bwayo tukokola tuli makumi obile.

Alukonkono lwakunembo lyantempele, bulamfu bwalo bwakeelene abwaamba bwaŋanda ini, nkukuti tukokola tuli makumi obile, abwiime bwalo bwakali tukokola tuli mwaanda. Nkabela mukati wakaluziluluzya ingolida, ingolida loko.
Alimwi iŋanda impati wakaivumbya zisamu zyamulombe akwiiziluluzya ingolida loko, nkabela alinjiyo wakacita mikunka ankeetani.
Alimwi wakasakatizya iŋanda mabwe mayandisi, Ingolida kiili ingolida yaku-Parivaimu.
Wakaziluluzya iŋanda yoonse ingolida, maseketi aayo azikunguzyo zyayo abwaanda bwayo amakoma aayo, alimwi abwaanda wakabeza bakerebimu.

Lino iŋanda iisalalisya yamukati wakaicita boobu. Bulamfu bwayo bwakeelene abwaamba bwaŋanda ini, nkukuti tukokola tuli makumi obile, abwaamba bwayo bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile, Wakaiziluluzya ingolida loko matalenta aali myanda iili musanu aumwi.
Bulemu bwamanembe bwakali isyekeli lyomwe akati kamasyekeli aangolida aali makumi osanwe. Atwalo twaanda twakujulu wakatuziluluzya ingolida,

Mababa aabakerebimu, bulamfu bwao bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile, Ibbaba limwi lyakerebimu litaanzi lyakali abulamfu bwatukokola tosanwe, lyakali kwaampa bulambo bwaŋanda, alyalo ibbaba limwi lyakali abulamfu bwatukokola tosanwe, lyakali kuswanana abbaba lyakerebimunyina.

Mbubonya obo, ibaaba lyakerebimu wabili lyakali abulamfu bwatukokola tosanwe, lyakali kwaampa bulambo bwaŋanda, abbaba limwi lyakali abulamfu bwatukokola tosanwe, lyakali kuswanana abbaba lyakerebimunyina.
Mababa oonse aabakerebimu aba akasika kubulamfu bwatukokola tuli makumi obile naakatandabede. Bakaliimvwi amaulu aabo, alimwi masyu aabo akalilangene aŋanda yamukati.
Alimwi cisitilizyo wakacicitya masani aamabala mabala aasalala akusia amasani aatuba. Alincico acalo wakeengaenga bakerebimu.
Nkabela wakapanga inkeetani mucikombelo camukati, wazibika atala lyaminsende, alimwi wakafula zikozyano zyamapomegranite zili mwanda akuzibika ankeetani.
Lino wakaimika minsende kunembo lyantempele, umwi kululyo aumwi kucimwensi. Munsende wakululyo wakaupa izina lyaJakini, ayooyo wakucimwensi wakaupa izina lya-Boazi.
Kunsi lyaco kakuli zikozyano zyaŋombe kumabazu oonse; zyakali mumindando yobile, zyakafulwa ciindi eco nciconya nilyakafulwa iziba lini.

Cakalitabilidwe aŋombe zili ikumi azibili. Zyotatwe zyakali kulanga kunyika, zyotatwe zyakali kulanga kumbo, zyotatwe zyakali kulanga kumusanza, azyotatwe zyakali kulanga kujwe, Iziba lyakalikede alinzizyo, amatako aazyo akalifutatilene.
Indiya yalyo yakali mbuli ijanza, ankomwe yalyo yakalipangidwe mbubonya mbuli mulomo wankomeki, yakali amalubaluba aampana, nkabela lyakakonzya kujata nongo zili zyuulu zyotatwe.
Alimwi wakapanga zisambilo zili ikumi zyakusambila. Wakabika zyosanwe kululyo azyosanwe kulumwensi. Mulinzizyo mobakali kusanzyasanzya zipaizyo, pele iziba lyakali lyabapaizi kuti basambe mulindilyo.
Alimwi wakapanga matafule aali ikumi, wazibika muntempele, zyosanwe kulubazu lwalulyo azyosanwe kulubazu lwalumwensi. Nkabela wakapanga mitiba yangolida iili mwaanda.
Alimwi wakacita lubanza lwabapaizi, alubanza lupati, azitendele zyalubanza. Zitendele zyalo wakaziziluluzya mukuba.
Lino iziba wakalibika kucooko cakululyo kujwe,
minsende yobile, amitiba, aziimikilo zyobile atala lyaminsende, atusabwe tobile twakuvumbya mitiba yobile yaziimikilo izyakali atala lyaminsende,
amapomegranite aali myaanda yone aatusabwe tobile, mindando yobile yamapomegranite kukasabwe kamwi akamwi kukuvumba mitiba yobile yaziimikilo izyakali atala lyaminsende.
Alimwi wakapanga zikazikilo azisambilo atala lyazikazikilo,
acikozyano caziba lyamaanzi, aŋombe zili ikumi azibili kunsi lyaco.
Alimwi zilongo amaliko aziyasyo azibelesyo zyazyo zyoonse, Huramu-abi wakazifulila mwami Solomoni, zibe zyaŋanda ya-Jehova, Wakazifuzya mukuba uubeka-beka.
Mubanda lya-Jordano mwami mwaakazifulila, munyika yabulongo iili akati ka-Sukoti a-Zereda.
Nkabela ezi zintu zyoonse Solomoni nzyaakapanga zyakavula loko, Bulemu bwamukuba teebwakapimika pe.
ziimikilo zyamalampi amalampi aazyo aangolida iisalalisya aakutenta mbuceelede kunembo lyacikombelo cisalalisya camukati;
amalubaluba, amalampi, alumano lwangolida iisalalisya,
atugele, amitiba, amigano yatununkilizyo, ankayi zyamulilo, zyangolida iisalalisya; azijatyo zyamakoma aabusena busalalisya bwamukati azyamakoma aantempele yaanze, zyoonse zyakali zyangolida.
Nkabela bantu boonse ba-Israyeli bakayoboloka kumwami kupobwe lyamumwezi wamusanu aibili.
Lino bapati boonse ba-Israyeli bakeza, nkabela ba-Levi bakabweza ibbokesi.
Bakabweza ibbokesi atente lyakubunganina azibelesyo zisalala zyoonse zyamutente. Bapaizi aba-Levi mbobakazileta.
Nkabela mwami Solomoni ambungano yoonse yaba-Israyeli ibakayoboloka kulinguwe kunembo lyabbokesi bakali kupaizya imbelele aŋombe zinji loko, Mweelwe wazyo teewakakonzya kubalwa pe.
Aboobo bapaizi bakaleta ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova kubusena bwalyo kucikombelo cisalalisya camukati, kunsi lyamababa aabakerebimu.
Bakerebimu bakalitandabikide mababa aabo akuvumba busena bwabbokesi. Bakerebimu bakali kuvumba ibbokesi azisamu zyalyo kujulu.
Zisamu zyakalampa. Impela zyazisamu zyakaboneka kuzwa kubbokesi kunembo lyacikombelo camukati, pele teezyakaboneka anze. Mpozicili mbubonya asunu.
Katakwe cintu mubbokesi cita mabwe obile Musa ngaakabika mumo ku-Horebu, Jehova nkwaakatangana cizuminano abana ba-Israyeli nibakazwa ku-Egepita.
Lino bapaizi nibakazwa mucikombelo, (nkaambo bapaizi boonse ibakajanika bakalisalazya akutalikataazya kumakani aazyaabilo zyabo,

abalo basikwiimba ba-Levi boonse, Asafu a-Hemani a-Jedutuni abana babo abakwabo, bakalisamine masani aatuba, bakali azizyano atuntimbwa anamalwa, bakaliimvwi kubbazu lyakujwe lyacipaililo, bakali abapaizi bali mwanda amakumi obile basikulizya myeembo;

basimyeembo abasikwiimba kabeelede kuteleezya majwi aabo mbuli ijwi lyomwe kukutembaula akulumba Jehova), alimwi ijwi lyamyeembo alyazizyano alyazibelesyo zimwi zyakwiimbya nilyakamvwigwa kukutembaula Jehova.
Nkaambo mubotu,
Luse lwakwe talweeli,
lino iŋanda, nkukuti iŋanda ya-Jehova, yakazula ikumbi,
nkabela bapaizi bakakacilwa kwiima kukubeleka nkaambo kakumbi, nkaambo bulemu bwaJehova bwakazuzya iŋanda ya-Leza.
Izuba Jehova wakalibika kujulu,
Pele walo mwini ulayanda kukala mumudima.
Mebo ndakuyakila iŋanda indamfu,
Cikalilo cakukala mumo lyoonse.
Mpawo mwami wakacebukila kubantu akulongezya imbungano yoonse ya-Israyeli. Nkabela bantu boonse bambungano ya-Israyeli bakanyamuka.
Wakati, Alumbwe Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli iwakaambila taata Davida kumilimo yakwe, lino sunu ijanza lyakwe lyacita mbubonya mbwaakaamba. Wakati,

Kuzwa kubuzuba obuya nindakagwisya bantu bangu munyika ya-Egepita, nsina kusala munzi nuuba umwi akati kamisyobo ya-Israyeli kukuyaka iŋanda kuti izina lyangu libe nkuko. Alimwi teendakasala muntu naba umwi kuti abe musolozi wabantu bangu ba-Israyeli.
Pele lino ndasala Jerusalemu, kuti izina lyangu libe nkuko, alimwi ndasala Davida kuti abe mwami wabantu bangu ba-Israyeli.
Nkabela mumoyo waDavida taata mwakali muyeeyo wakuyakila izina lya-Jehova Leza waIsrayeli iŋanda.
Pele Jehova wakaambila Davida taata kuti, Mbubonya mboyeeyede mumoyo wako kuyakila izina lyangu iŋanda, wakacita kabotu kukuyeeya obo mumoyo wako.
Nekubaboobo uwe omwini tokooyooyaka iŋanda pe. Mwanaako uuzwa mumala aako nguuelede kuyakila izina lyangu iŋanda.

Lino Jehova wazuzikizya majwi aakwe ngaakaamba, nkaambo mebo ndabuka mucibaka ca-Davida taata, ndikede acuuno cabwami bwa-Israyeli mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakasyomezya, alimwi ndiyakilide izina lya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli iŋanda.
Amomo muŋanda ndibikide ibbokesi lijisi cizuminano ca-Jehova ncaakatanga abana ba-Israyeli.

Nkaambo Solomoni kapangide ciimikilo camukuba akucibika akati kalubanza. Bulamfu bwaco bwakali tukokola tosanwe, abwaamba bwaco tukokola tosanwe, abwiime bwaco tukokola totatwe. Nkabela kaimvwi mpoonya awo, Elyo wakafugama amazwi aakwe kumeso aambungano yoonse yabaIsrayeli akutandabika maanza aakwe kujulu,
wakati, O Jehova, Leza wa-Israyeli, taakwe Leza umbi uuli mbuli nduwe, nikuba kujulu naaba ansi, ojatisya cizuminano akucita luse kubalanda bako beenda kubusyu bwako camoyo woonse.
Wazuzikizya majwi ayo ngaonya ngowakaambila mulanda wako Davida taata, Milomo yako yakaamba, lino sunu ijanza lyako lyazuzikizya ncobeni.

Nkaambo kako O Jehova, Leza wa-Israyeli, kocitila Davida taata ayo majwi ngaonya ngowakamwaambila aakuti, Tokooyoobula muntu wakukala acuuno cabwami bwa-Israyeli kumeso aangu, na bana bako babamba kabotu inzila zyabo akweenda mumulao wangu mbubonya mboenda webo kumeso aangu.
Lino O Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, ijwi lyako lizuzikizigwe ndowakaambila mulanda wako Davida.
Nekubaboobo koswiilila cikombyo cangu, ndemulanda wako, acikumbizyo cangu, O Jehova Leza wangu. Koswiilila cilizyo acikombyo mulanda wako ncakombya kubusyu bwako,
kuti meso aako alange aŋanda eyi lyoonse isikati amasiku, abusena mboambide kuti, Izina lyangu likakale nkukonya, Koswiilila cikombyo mulanda wako ncakombya kubusena obuno.
Koswiilila cikumbizyo camulanda wako acabantu bako ba-Israyeli ncibakombya kulangila busena obuno. Ee, koswiilila kucikalilo cako cakujulu nkobede, alimwi noswiilila, kobalekelela.
Na muntu wabisizya mweenzinyina, aboobo wasungilizigwa kukonka, alimwi weza kuzookonka cikonke cakwe kunembo lyacipaililo cako omuno muŋanda,

lino koswiilila kujulu nkobede, ukacite, akubeteka balanda bako. Sizibi umupe mulandu, kuti zibi zyakwe ziboole amutwe wakwe mwini, pele mululami komululamika akumupa bulumbu bweelede bululami bwakwe,
lino koswiilila kujulu nkobede, ulekelele zibi zyabantu bako ba-Israyeli akubaboozya kunyika yabo njowakabapa, njowakapa bamawisi.

lino koswiilila kujulu nkobede, akulekelela zibi zyabalanda bako, bantu bako ba-Israyeli, nowabaiisya inzila imbotu njibeelede kweendela, akulosya imvula anyika yako njowakabapa bantu bako kuti ibe caabilo cabo.
na bakomba akukumbila, nkukuti bantu boonse nanka bantu bako ba-Israyeli, umwi aumwi mbuli mbwazi mapenzi aamumoyo wakwe, akutandabika maanza aakwe kuŋanda eyi,
lino swiilila kujulu kumakalilo aako nkokede, ulekelele, akuboozezya umwi aumwi bulumbu bwanzila zyakwe, mbubonya mbobwene moyo wakwe (nkaambo nduwe olike uubwene myoyo yabantu boonse baansi),
kuti bakuyoowe akweenda munzi la zyako mazuba oonse nibacipona munyika njowakabapa bamatata besu.

koswiilila kumakalilo aako aakujulu, ukacite coonse mweenzu ncakukwiilila, kuti bantu boonse baansi bazibe izina lyako, bakulemeke mbubonya mbuli bantu bako baIsrayeli mbubakulemeka, akuziba kuti iŋanda eyi njindayaka yaambwa muzina lyako.
Na bantu bako baya kukulwana abasinkondonyina, kufumbwa nkobatuma, alimwi bakomba nduwe cakulanga kumunzi uno ngosalide akuŋanda njinjakilide izina lyako,
koswiilila kujulu nkobede cikombyo cabo acikumbizyo cabo akubakosweda makani.
nekubaboobo na bajola myoyo yabo oko kunyika nkubatoledwe mubuzike, akweempwa, akukumbila kulinduwe oko kunyika yabuzike bwabo, cakwaamba kuti, Twakabisya, akuleya, akutyola mulao,
na beempwa camoyo woonse acamiyeeyo yoonse omo mucisi cabasinkondonyina nkubatoledwe, akukomba cakulanga kunyika yabo njowakapa bamawisi akumunzi ngosalide akuŋanda njinjakilide izina lyako,
lino koswiilila kumakalilo aako aakujulu cikombyo cabo acikumbizyo cabo, ukabakoswede makani aabo akulekelela bantu bako bakubisizya,
Lino O Leza wangu, meso aako alange, amatwi aako aswiilile cikombyo cikombwa mpoonya ano.
Kobuka, O Leza Jehova, akunjila mucilyokezezyo cako, uwe abbokesi lyanguzu zyako. Bapaizi bako basame lufutuko.
O Leza Jehova, abasalazi bako basekelele bubotu bwako. Jehova, utafutatili busyu bwamunanike wako. Koingasila luzyalo lwako ndowafwida Davida mulanda wako.
Bapaizi bakakacilwa kunjila muŋanda ya-Jehova, nkaambo bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakazuzya iŋanda ya-Jehova.
Lino bana ba-Israyeli boonse, nibakabona mulilo mbuwakazwa kujulu abulemu bwa-Jehova mbubwakaboneka aŋanda, bakavundama ansi abbuwa, bakomba, balumba Jehova, bati,
Nkaambo mubotu,
Nkaambo luse lwakwe talweeli.
Mwami Solomoni wakapaizya basune bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azibili, ambelele zili zyuulu zili mwanda azyuulu zili makumi obile. Mbuboobo mwami abantu boonse mbubakasalazya iŋanda ya-Leza.

Bapaizi bakaliimvwi kumasena aabo, abalo ba-Levi mbubonya azibelesyo zyakwiimbila Jehova nzyaakapanga mwami Davida kuti bazilumbye Jehova, nkaambo luse lwakwe talweeli. Davida naakali kubalumbya, bapaizi bakali kulizya myeembo cakulangana abo, nkabela ba-Israyeli boonse kabaimikide.
Nkabela mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu bakacita imbungano iisalalisya, nkaambo bakamana mazuba aali musanu aabili kukusalazya cipaililo akukulya ipobwe.

Lino mubuzuba bwamakumi obile aatatu mumwezi wamusanu aibili wakamwaisya bantu kuti baye kumaanda aabo. Bakaya abusekelezi alukondo mumyoyo yabo nkaambo kabubotu Jehova mbwaakacitila Davida a-Solomoni aba-Israyeli bantu bakwe.
Elyo Jehova wakabonekela Solomoni ciindi camasiku, wakamwaambila kuti, Cikombyo cako ndaciswiilila. Ndasala busena obuno kuti bundibede iŋanda yakupaizya.
Bona! Na ndasinka ijulu akukasya imvula, na ndalailila cisozi kuti cilye nyika, na ndatuma idwazi akati kabantu bangu,

elyo bantu bangu baambwa muzina lyangu, na balibombya akupaila akuyandaula busyu bwangu akuleka inzila zyabo zyakubisya, mebo njooswiilila kujulu nkumbede, njoobalekelela milandu yabo, akuponya nyika yabo.
Meso aangu alalanga, aalo matwi aangu alaswiilila, cikombyo cikombwa kubusena obuno.
Iŋanda eyi, ndaisala, ndaisalazya, kuti izina lyangu libe nkuko lyoonse. Meso aangu alailanga, awalo moyo wangu ulaba kulinjiyo, mazuba oonse.
Lino webo, na weenda kumeso aangu mbubonya mbwaakeenda Davida uso, akucita zyoonse nzindalailila, akubamba imbeta zyangu amilazyo yangu,
elyo njooimikizya cuuno cabwami bwako, mbubonya mbundakasyomezya Davida uso nindakaamba kuti, Tokooyoobula muntu wakweendelezya cisi ca-Israyeli.
lino njoomunonkola munyika njindamupa, nkabela iŋanda eyi njindasalazizya izina lyangu njooisowa, itabonwi kumeso aangu, akucita kuti ibe kasimpi ajwi lyakusampaula akati kamasi oonse.
Lino iŋanda eyi iisumpulwa, kufumbwa muntu uuinda kulinjiyo uyoogambwa, uyooamba kuti, Ino nkaambonzi wakacita obo kunyika eyi akuŋanda eyi?
Mpawo kuyooambwa kuti, Nkaambo kakuti bakaleka Jehova, Leza wabamawisi, iwakabagwisya mucisi ca-Egepita, bakajata mizimu imbi akwiikomba akwiimanina milimo. Nciceeco ncaakabaletela aya mapenzi oonse.
Solomoni wakayaku­ lula minzi Huramu njaakamupa akukazika bana ba-Israyeli mulinjiyo.
Nkabela wakayaka Tadimori munkanda, aminzi yoonse yaziyobwedo njaakayaka kuHamati.
Alimwi wakayaka Betihoroni wakujulu a-Betihoroni wakunsi, minzi miyumu iyakali amalambo amilyango aminkulu,

a-Baalati, aminzi yoonse yaziyobwedo Solomoni nzyaakajisi, aminzi yoonse yankalaki zyakwe, aminzi yamabbiza, akufumbwa cintu moyo wa-Solomoni ncowakayanda kuyaka mu-Jerusalemu amu-Lebano amunyika yoonse yabwami bwakwe.
Bantu boonse ibakasyeede baba-Hiti aba-Amori aba-Perizi aba-Hivi abaJebusi, ibatali ba-Israyeli,
bana babo ibakasyeede munyika, bana baIsrayeli mbubakabula kunyonyoona, aba Solomoni wakabapa cibbalo. Mbubacibede asunu.
Pele akati kabantu ba-Israyeli katakwe Solomoni ngwakanjizya mubuzike kukubeleka milimo yakwe. Bakaba basilumamba bakwe abasilutwe bakwe abapati bankalaki zyakwe abasimabbiza bakwe.
Nkabela basilutwe bamwami Solomoni bakali myanda yobile amakumi osanwe. Mbombabo ibakeendelezya bantu.
Elyo Solomoni wakapaizizya Jehova zipaizyo acipaililo ca-Jehova ncaakayakide kunembo lyalukonkono.

Buzuba bumwi abumwi kwakapaizigwa mbubonya mbukweelede, mbuli mbwaakalailila Musa kumakani aamasabata, amapobwe aamwezi mupya, amapobwe otatwe aamumwaka, nkukuti ipobwe lyazinkwa zitakwe bumena apobwe lyansondo apobwe lyazilao.

Mbubonya mbwaakalailila Davida wisi wakabamba inkamu zyabapaizi mumilimo yabo, aba-Levi abalo kuti bacite milimo yabo yakutembaula akukutauka kubusyu bwabapaizi, mbubonya mbukweelede buzuba bumwi abumwi, abasikulindila milyango bakabikilwa mulyango umwi aumwi, nkaambo kakuti mbuboobo mbwaakalailila Davida muntu wa-Leza.
Teebakaluba mulao wamwami ngwaakalailila bapaizi aba-Levi kumakani oonse akumakani aaziyobwedo,
Aboobo milimo yoonse ya-Solomoni yakamana, kuzwa kubuzuba bwakubika matalikilo aaŋanda ya-Jehova mane lumwi yakamana kuyakwa. Iŋanda ya-Jehova yakamaninina kuyakwa.

Nkabela Huramu wakamutumina maato abasimilimo ibakabwene milimo yalwizi kumaanza aabalanda bakwe, Lino bakaya boonse antoomwe abalanda ba-Solomoni, basika ku-Ofiri, bagwisya nkuko matalenta aangolida aali myanda yone amakumi osanwe, akwaaleta kumwami Solomoni.
Nkabela Solomoni wakamwaambila makani aakwe oonse. Katakwe cintu niciba comwe icakamukacila Solomoni, ncaakakacilwa kumupandulwida.
Nkabela mwami mwanakazi waku-Seba, naakabona busongo bwa-Solomoni, aŋanda njaakayakide,

azilyo zyakuntafule yakwe, abalanda bakwe mbubakakede, abasimilimo bakwe mbubakabeleka, azyakusama zyabo, abasikukutauka bakwe, azyakusama zyabo, azipaizyo zyakwe nzyaakatuula kuŋanda ya-Jehova, moyo wakwe wakaata loko.
Wakaambila mwami kuti, Impuwo njindakaswiilila kucisi cangu yakali yalusinizyo, nkukuti makani aako amakani aabusongo bwako.
Nekubaboobo teendakazuminina majwi aabo mane ndakasika akubona ameso aangu ndemwini. Ncobeni teendakalwiidwa niciba cisela cabusongo bwako bupati. Ulainda impuwo njindakaswiilila.
Bali acoolwe bantu bako! Bali acoolwe balanda bako baimvwi kubusyu bwako lyoonse akuswiilila busongo bwako.

Alumbwe Jehova Leza wako, nkaambo wakabotelwa nduwe, aboobo wakakubika acuuno cabwami bwakwe, kuti ube mwami kuliJehova Leza wako, Leza wako kayandisya ba-Israyeli, Nciceeco ncaakababambila kabotu akukubika kuti ubeendelezye, ube mwami, ucite lubeta abululami.

Nkabela wakapa mwami matalenta aangolida aali mwanda amakumi obile, amisamu mibotu amabwe mayandisi manji loko, Katakwe misamu iyakaboneka iyakeelene ayeeyo mwami mwanakazi waku-Seba njaakapa mwami Solomoni.
Nkabela zisamu zyaalgumi mwami wakazibezya matantilo aamuŋanda ya-Jehova amuŋanda yamwami, atuntimbwa anyeele zyabasikwiimba. Teekwakaboneka limbi zili boobo mucisi ca-Juda.

Lino mwami Solomoni wakapa mwami mwanakazi waku-Seba kufumbwa moyo wakwe ncowakayanda, ncaakakumbila, atala azintu zyeelene azeezyo nzyaakaletela mwami. Elyo wakapiluka kulimbabo, walo abalanda bakwe.
Lino bulemu bwangolida iyakasika kuli-Solomoni mumwaka omwe bwakali matalenta aangolida aali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu alimwi,
kutaamba eyo iyakazwa kubasambazi akulibasikuulisya beendeenda, Abalo bami boonse ba-Arabu abeendelezi banyika bakaletela Solomoni ingolida ansiliva.
Nkabela mwami Solomoni wakapanga intobo zyangolida zifulidwe zili myanda yobile. Intobo imwi aimwi yakali amasyekeli aangolida iifulidwe aali myanda iili musanu aumwi.

Alimwi wakapanga zikwabilizyo zili myanda yotatwe zyangolida iifulidwe, Cikwabilizyo cimwi acimwi cakali masyekeli aangolida aali myanda yotatwe, Nkabela mwami wakazibika muŋanda yamucisaka ca-Lebano.
Alimwi mwami wakapanga cuuno cipati cameja aanzovu akuciziluluzya ingolida iisalala.

Eco cuuno cakalijisi matantilo aali musanu alimwi, acilyokezezyo camaulu cangolida, izyakajatana acuuno, alimwi kubbazu limwi alimwi lyacikalilo kacijisi zilyokezezyo zyamaboko, abalavu bobile baimvwi kumbali lyazilyokezezyo.
Alimwi kakuli balavu bali ikumi ababili baimvwi amatantilo aali musanu alimwi kulubazu lumwi alumwi, Teekwakacitwa cimwi ceelene ancico abuniini muzisi zyoonse.

Nkabela zinywido zyoonse zyamwami Solomoni zyakali zyangolida, azibelesyo zyoonse zyamuŋanda yamucisaka caku-Lebano zyakali zyangolida iisalala. Insiliva teeyakayeeyegwa mbuli cintu mumazuba aa-Solomoni.
Nkaambo maato aamwami akali kuya ku-Tarisi antoomwe abalanda ba-Huramu, lino lomwe mumyaka yotatwe maato aa-Tarisi akali kuza akuleta ingolida, ansiliva, ameja aanzovu, abasokwe, ankangantole.
Nkabela bami boonse baansi bakali kuyandaula kubona busyu bwa-Solomoni, kuti baswiilile busongo bwakwe Leza mbwaakabikide mumoyo wakwe.
Aboonse bakali kuleta umwi aumwi cipo cakwe, zibelesyo zyansiliva, azibelesyo zyangolida, azyakusama, atununkilizyo twamura, azilisyo, amabbiza, ambongolo. Bakali kucita obo myaka yoonse.
Nkabela Solomoni kajisi maanda aali zyuulu zyone aakubika mabbiza ankalaki, abasimbizi bali zyuulu zili ikumi azibili mbaakabika muminzi yankalaki amu-Jerusalemu mwaakabede mwami.
Wakali kweendelezya bami boonse kuzwa kulwizi lwa-Firate kusikila kunyika yaba-Filisti akumugaano wa-Egepita,
Nkabela insiliva mwami wakaivuzya mu-Jerusalemu mbuli mabwe, ayalo misamu yakedari wakaivuzya mbubonya mbuli mikuyu iili mutulundulundu.
Amabbiza, Solomoni wakaaletelwa kuzwa kuEgepita akumasi oonse.
Nkabela ciindi Solomoni ncaakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu kuba-Israyeli boonse cakaba myaka iili makumi one.
Lino Solomoni naakalala mukabanda abamawisi, wakazikwa mumunzi wa-Davida wisi, elyo Roboamu mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Mpawo Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati naakamvwa, oko ku-Egepita nkwaakabede, nkwaakacijide kuzwa kumwami Solomoni, Jeroboamu wakapiluka kuzwa ku-Egepita.
Nkabela bakatuma kuyoomwiita, elyo Jeroboamu ambungano yoonse yabaIsrayeli bakeza kuzooambila Roboamu kuti,
Uso wakatulemezya mukuli. Lino webo, kotuubulwida cibbalo ciyumu causo amukuli wakwe mulemu ngwaakatulemezya, elyo tuyookubelekela milimo.
Mpawo wakabaambila kuti, Amwaanzaane mazuba otatwe, mukaboole alimwi, Lino bantu bakaanzaana.
Bakavuwa kuti, Na wafwida bantu aba luse, akubabotezya, akubaambila majwi mabotu, elyo bayooba bazike bako mazuba oonse.
Pele wakakaka lulayo lwabapati ndubakamulaya, wakabuzyanya abamuselanyina mbaakakula abo, ibakaimvwi kubusyu bwakwe.
Wakababuzya kuti, Anywebo mulalaya buti? Tuvwiile buti bantu aba ibandikumbila kuti, Ubya ijoko uso ndyaakatulemezya?

Mpawo bamuselanyina mbaakakula abo bakamwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mboelede kwaambila bantu aba ibaamba kuti, Uso watulemezya ijoko, lino uwe ubulula ijoko lyesu. Mbuboobu mboelede kubaambila, Amba kuti, Kantengeza kangu kalakomena kwiinda cikungu cataata.
Taata wakamulemezya ijoko idemu, lino mebo njoobika bulemu abumwi kujoko, Taata wakamuumya mitatula, pele mebo njoomuumya tubanze.
Lino Jeroboamu abantu boonse bakaboola kuli-Roboamu mubuzuba bwatatu, mbubonya mbuli ijwi lyamwami lyakuti, Amuboole kulindime mubuzuba bwatatu.
Nkabela mwami wakabaambila cabukali. Mwami Roboamu wakaleka lulayo lwabapati,
akubaambila mbubonya mbubakamulaya banikenyina. Wakati, Taata wakamulemezya ijoko, lino mebo njooyungizizya ijoko lyanu bulemu. Taata wakamuumya mitatula, mebo njoomuumya tubanze.
Mwami wakakaka kuswiilila bantu, nkaambo makani akazwa kuli-Leza, kuti Jehova azuzikizye majwi aakwe ngaakaamba kumulomo wa-Ahija waku-Sile, ngaakaambila Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati.

Lino ba-Israyeli boonse nibakabona kuti mwami taswiilili, bantu bakavwiila mwami kuti, Iswe tujisi caabilonzi muli-Davida? Tatukwe lukono mumwana wa-Jese pe, Kamuya nyoonse kumaanda aanu nubaIsrayeli, Kobamba iŋanda yako omwini, O Davida, Mpawo ba-Israyeli boonse bakamwaika kuya kumaanda aabo.
Pele bana ba-Israyeli ibakakede muminzi ya-Juda, Roboamu kali mwami wabo.
Elyo mwami Roboamu wakatuma Adoramu mupati wacibbalo, nkabela bantu ba-Israyeli bakamutulaula mabwe mane wafwa, Mpawo mwami Roboamu wakafwambaana kutanta munkalaki yakwe akucijila ku-Jerusalemu.
Mbuboobo ba-Israyeli mbubakabisizya luzubo lwa-Davida akusikila sunu.
Pele ijwi lyaJehova lyakasika kuli-Semaya muntu wa-Leza, lyakati,
Ambila Roboamu mwana wa-Solomoni mwami wa-Juda aba-Israyeli boonse bamuzisi zyaJuda a-Benjamini kuti,

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mutayi kuyoolwisya bana bakwanu ba-Israyeli pe, Amuboole umwi aumwi kuŋanda yakwe, nkaambo aya makani akazwa kulindime. Mpawo bakaswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova akuleka kuya kuyoolwisya Jeroboamu.
Lino Roboamu kakala mu-Jerusalemu, Nkabela wakayaka minzi yakuvuna mucisi ca-Juda.
Wakayaka Betelehemu, a-Etamu, a-Tekowa,
aBetizuri, a-Soko, a-Adulamu,
a-Gati, a-Maresa, a-Zifi,
a-Adoraimu, a-Lakisi, a-Azeka,
a-Zora, a-Ajaloni, a-Hebroni. Eyi yoonse minzi yakuvuna mucisi ca-Juda amucisi ca-Benjamini.
Wakayumya zivunisyo, alimwi wakabika basilutwe mulinjiyo, aziyobwedo zyazilyo azyamafuta azyawairu.
Alimwi muminzi yoonse wakabika intobo amasumo akwiiyumya loko, Aboobo wakavuba Juda a-Benjamini.
Lino bapaizi aba-Levi ibakali mucisi coonse ca-Israyeli bakainka kulinguwe kuzwa kumasena oonse.
Nkaambo ba-Levi bakasia tunzuunzi twabo azyaabilo zyabo, bakaakukala kucisi ca-Juda aku-Jerusalemu, nkaambo Jeroboamu abana bakwe bakabatanda kuti batabelekeli Jehova limbi milimo yabupaizi.
Wakalibikila bapaizi bakuzilundu ababasikazwa ababoombe mbaakacita.
Abalo boonse ibakabika myoyo yabo kukuyandaula Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli bakabatobela kuzwa kumisyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli, bakeza ku-Jerusalemu kuti bapaile Jehova Leza wabamawisi.
Aba bakaletela bwami bwa-Juda inguzu, aboobo bakayumya Roboamu mwana wa-Solomoni myaka yotatwe, nkaambo myaka yotatwe bakeenda munzila ya-Davida ayaSolomoni.
Lino Roboamu wakakwata Mahalati mwana musimbi wa-Jerimoti mwana wa-Davida awa-Abihaili mwana musimbi wa-Eliabu mwana wa-Jese;
nkabela wakamuzyalila bana, Jeusi, a-Semariya, a-Zahamu.
Alimwi kusule wakakwata Maaka mwana musimbi wa-Abisalomu, Ngonguwe wakamuzyalila Abija, a-Atai, a-Ziza, a-Selomiti.

Nkabela Roboamu wakayandisya Maaka mwana wa-Abisalomu kwiinda banakazi bakwe boonse abasimamambe bakwe boonse, nkaambo wakakwata banakazi bali ikumi amusanu abatatu abasimamambe bali musanu aumwi, alimwi wakazyala bana balombe bali makumi obile amusanu abatatu abana basimbi bali makumi aali musanu alimwi.
Nkabela Roboamu wakabika Abija mwana wa-Maaka kuti abe silutwe mupati akati kabanyina, nkaambo wakali kuyeeya kumupa bwami.
Alimwi wakacita cabusongo kukumwaisya bana bakwe kuminzi miyumu yoonse yaku-Juda ayaku-Benjamini. Wakabapa malelo manji akubayandawida banakazi.
Lino mumwaka wasanu wabwami bwa-Roboamu, wakasika Sisaki mwami waEgepita kuzoolwisya Jerusalemu.
Wakeza ankalaki zili cuulu amyanda yobile abasimbizi bali zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu alimwi. Abantu mbaakeza abo kuzwa ku-Egepita teebakabalika pe, ba-Lubi aba-Suki aba-Kusi.
Nkabela wakazunda minzi miyumu yamucisi ca-Juda, aboobo wakasika ku-Jerusalemu.

Lino Semaya musinsimi wakeza kuli-Roboamu akubami ba-Juda ibakabungene ku-Jerusalemu nkaambo ka-Sisaki, wabaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Inywe mwandileka, aboobo ambebo ndamuleka akumwaaba mumaanza aa-Sisaki.
Mpoonya awo mwami abapati ba-Israyeli bakalibombya, bati, Jehova mululami.

Nkabela Jehova naakabona kuti balibombya, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Semaya, liti, Balibombya. Nsikooyoobanyonyoona. Ndabapa lufutuko luniini. Bukali bwangu tabukooyootilwa ku-Jerusalemu kujanza lya-Sisaki.
Nekubaboobo bayooba bazike bakwe, kuti bazibe buzike bwangu mbububede abuzike bwabami babamasi mbububede.
nkabela mwami Roboamu wakapanga zikwabilizyo zyamukuba mucibaka cazyo akuzibika mumaanza aabasilutwe babasilumamba ibakali kulanga mulyango waŋanda yamwami.
Lino kufumbwa ciindi mwami naakaya kuŋanda ya-Jehova, basilumamba bakainka azyo, elyo kusule basilumamba bakaziboozya kuŋanda yabalindizi.

Aboobo mwami Roboamu wakaliyumya mu-Jerusalemu akweendelezya. Roboamu­ kali amyaka iili makumi one aumwi naakalya bwami, nkabela kali mwami myaka iili ikumi amusanu aibili mu-Jerusalemu, munzi Jehova ngwaakasala akati kamisyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli kuti abike izina lyakwe nkuko. Izina lyabanyina kali Naama mu-Amoni.
Nkabela wakacita bubi, nkaambo takwakapangika moyo wakwe kukuyandaula Jehova.
Lino Roboamu naakafwa, wakazikwa abamawisi mumunzi waDavida. Elyo Abija mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Wakeendelezya myaka yotatwe mu-Jerusalemu, Izina lyabanyina kali Mikaya mwana musimbi wa-Urieli waku-Gibeya.
Lino Abija a-Jeroboamu bakali kulwana.

Nkabela Abija wakaya kunkondo, kali abasilumamba basinguzu basalidwe bali zyuulu zili myanda yone. Alakwe Jeroboamu wakabamba mindando yakumulwisya, kali abasilumamba basinguzu basalidwe bali zyuulu zili myanda iili musanu aitatu,
Mpawo Abija wakanyampuka acilundu ca-Zemaraimu, cili mutulundulundu twa-Efraimu, wakati, Amundiswiilile, O Jeroboamu anyoonse nuba-Israyeli.
Sa tamuzi kuti Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli wakapa bwami bwa-Israyeli mumaanza aa-Davida kuti bube bwakwe, walo abana bakwe, Wakacita obo acizuminano citapwayiki.
Pele Jeroboamu mwana wa-Nebati, muzike wa-Solomoni mwana wa-Davida, wabuka, wapapila mwami wakwe.
­Alimwi bamwi bantu babuyo, bana ba-Saatani, bamuyobolokela, bapapila Roboamu mwana wa-Solomoni, Roboamu naakacili mwanike, naakacili mutete mumoyo akubula inguzu zyakubakasya.
Lino sa mulayeeya kukaka bwami bwa-Jehova mbwaakabika mumaanza aabana ba-Davida nkaambo kakuti muli banji, alimwi mweza aboombe bangolida mbaakamucitila Jeroboamu kuti babe baleza banu?

Sa tamutandide bapaizi ba-Jehova, nkukuti bana ba-Aroni aba-Levi? Sa tamuna kulibikila bapaizi nubeni mbuli bamasi? Kufumbwa muntu uusika amucende na bagutu bali musanu ababili kuzoolisalazya, waba mupaizi wabaabo batali bale za?
Pele iswe, Jehova ngu-Leza wesu, Tatuna kumuleka. Abalo bapaizi besu bamanina Jehova milimo mbobana ba-Aroni, aba-Levi mbobabagwasya mumilimo.

Balatuulila Jehova zipaizyo mazuba oonse cifumo amangolezya, atununkilizyo, alimwi balabika zinkwa zyakubonwa-bonwa antafule iisalalisya, akubamba ilampi lyangolida kuti mimuni yalyo iboneke mazuba oonse ciindi camangolezya, nkaambo iswe tulabamba milazyo ya-Jehova Leza wesu, anukuti inywe mwamuleka buyo.

Amubone! Leza uli aswe, ulatusololela, abapaizi bakwe bali amyeembo yabo yakulizya kukwiita bantu kuti bazoomulwisye. Nubana ba-Israyeli, mutalwisyi Jehova Leza wabamauso, nkaambo tamukonzyi kuzunda pe.
Lino Jeroboamu wakabika basikuyuba, kuti bababukile kuzwa kunsi, aboobo basilumamba bakwe bakali kunembo lyaba-Juda, abasikuyuba bakali kusule lyabo.
Nkabela ba-Juda nibakalanga bakabona kuti inkondo nkwiili kunembo akusule koonse, Mpawo bakakwiilila Jehova, abapaizi bakali kulizya myeembo.
Elyo bantu ba-Juda bakoonzomoka, nkabela ba-Juda nibakoonzomoka, Leza wakauma Jeroboamu aba-Israyeli boonse kubusyu bwa-Abija aba-Juda.
Lino bana ba-Israyeli bakacija kumeso aaba-Juda, nkabela Leza wakabaaba mumaanza aabo.
Abija abantu bakwe bakabauma aluumo lupati, nkabela kwakajayigwa akati kaba-Israyeli bantu basalidwe bali zyuulu zili myanda yosanwe.
Mbuboobo bana ba-Israyeli mbubakabombesegwa kuciindi eco, Bana ba-Juda bakazunda nkaambo bakasyoma Jehova Leza wabamauso.
Lino Abija wakatanda Jeroboamu akumunyanzya minzi: Beteli atunzuunzi twawo, a-Jesana atunzuunzi twawo, a-Efroni atunzuunzi twawo.
Nkabela Jeroboamu takwakaliboozezya limbi inguzu zyakwe mazuba oonse ngaakapona Abija, Elyo Jehova wakamuuma, aboobo wakafwa.
Pele Abija wakajana inguzu, nkabela wakakwata banakazi bali ikumi abane, akuzyala bana balombe bali makumi obile ababili abana basimbi bali ikumi amusanu aumwi.
Lino makani amwi aa-Abija, anzila zyakwe, atwaambo twakwe, alilembedwe mubbuku lyamusinsimi Ido.
Nkabela Asa wakacita zibotu aziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova Leza wakwe.
Wakagwisya zipaililo zyeenzu azipaililo zyakuzilundu, alimwi wakamwaya zilende akugonka zifwanikisyo zyamituni.
Wakaambila ba-Juda kuti bayandaule Jehova Leza wabamawisi akubamba mulao amilazyo.
Muminzi yoonse ya-Juda wakagwisya zipaililo zyakuzilundu azipaililo zyazuba, Nkabela cisi cakalikede aluumuno kubusyu bwakwe.
Alimwi wakayaka minzi iili alubaya mucisi ca-Juda, nkaambo nyika yakalikede aluumuno. Katajisi inkondo mumyaka eyo, nkaambo Jehova wakamupa luumuno.

Lino wakaambila ba-Juda kuti, Atuyake minzi eyi akwiizyungulusya malambo amaanda malamfu, zitendele aminkulu. Nyika icili yesu, nkaambo twayandaula Jehova Leza wesu, Twamuyandaula, lino watupa luumuno kumabazu oonse. Elyo bakayaka akujana coolwe.

Nkabela Asa kajisi impi yabasilumamba ibakali kusama intobo amasumo, bantu ba-Juda bali zyuulu zili myanda yotatwe, aba-Benjamini ibakajisi intobo akufusa mata bali zyuulu zili myanda yobile azyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aatatu, Aba boonse bakali baalumi basintaze.
Lino Zera muKusi wakeza kuzoobalwisya, kali abasilumamba bali zyuulu zili cuulu ankalaki zili myanda yotatwe. Nkabela wakasika ku-Maresa.
Elyo Asa wakainka kuyoobalwisya, wabamba basilumamba mumindando mukuti lya­-Zefata ku-Maresa.

Mpawo Asa wakakwiilila Jehova Leza wakwe, wati, O Jehova, taakwe umbi uuli mbuli nduwe uukonzya kuvuna bakompeme kumaanza aabasinguzu. Kotugwasya, O Jehova Leza wesu, nkaambo tulasyoma nduwe, alimwi muzina lyako tweza kuzoolwisya bantu aba banji loko. O Jehova, nduwe Leza wesu. Bantu baansi ano batakusampauli.
Mpoonya awo Jehova wakauma ba-Kusi kunembo lya-Asa alyaba-Juda, nkabela ba-Kusi bakacija.

Lino Asa abantu mbaakali abo bakali kuya bubatanda mane kusikila ku-Gerari, nkabela ba-Kusi bakajayigwa mane kakutakwe naba omwe iwakasyaala muumi, nkaambo bakazundwa kubusyu bwaJehova abwabasilumamba bakwe, Alimwi ba-Juda bakasaala imbono zinji.
Nkabela bakazunda minzi yoonse iyakeengelede Gerari, nkaambo buyoofu bwa-Jehova bwakabayoosya, aboobo bakasaala minzi yoonse, nkaambo kakuli imbono zinji mulinjiyo.
Alimwi bakasaala zilao zyabaabo ibakajisi iŋombe akusaala imbelele zinji ankamele zinji, Elyo bakapiluka kuJerusalemu.

nkabela wakaya kuyoocinga Asa, wamwaambila kuti, Amundiswiilile, Asa anyoonse nuba-Juda aba-Benjumini. Jehova uli anywe na muli awe. Na mwamuyandaula, ulajanwa kulindinywe, pele na mwamulekelezya, alakwe ulamulekelezya inywe.
Ciindi cilamfu ba-Israyeli bakabula Leza mwinimwini, amupaizi wakubaiyisya, amulao.
Pele ciindi camapenzi, nibakaboola kuli-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli akumuyandaula, wakajanwa kulimbabo.
Kuciindi eco katakwe luumuno nikuba kuliyooyo iwakainka nikuba kuliyooyo iwakaboola, nkaambo kakuli lupyopyongano lupati akati kabantu boonse ibakakede mumasi.
Bakapwayika, Cisi cakajaya cisinyina, munzi wakajaya munzinyina, nkaambo Leza wakabapyopyonganya mapenzi aamisyobo yoonse.
Lino amuliyumye. Maanza aanu ataleki kubeleka, nkaambo milimo yanu iyoolumbulwa.

Elyo wakabunganya ba-Juda aba-Benjamini boonse, abeenzu baku-Efraimu abaku-Manase abaku-Simeoni ibakakede akati kabo, nkaambo bantu banji ba-Israyeli bakeza kulinguwe nibakabona kuti Jehova Leza wakwe uli awe.
Bakabungana ku-Jerusalemu mumwezi watatu mumwaka wakumi amusanu wabwami bwa-Asa.
Elyo mubuzuba obo bakapaizizya Jehova iŋombe zili myanda iili musanu aibili ambelele zili zyuulu zili musanu azibili, zyakazwa mumbono nzibakasaalide.
Bakatanga cizuminano kuyandaula Jehova Leza wabamawisi camoyo woonse acamiyeeyo yoonse.
Bakazumina kuti kufumbwa uutayandaula Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli uleelede kufwa, naba mwanike naba mupati, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi.
Nkabela bakakonka cikonkyo kubusyu bwaJehova ajwi ipati aloongololo atuntimbwa amyeembo.
Ba-Juda boonse bakasekelela nkaambo kacikonkyo, nkaambo bakakonka camoyo woonse akumuyandaula caluyando loonse, alimwi wakajanwa kulimbabo, nkabela Jehova wakabapa luumuno koonse koonse.
Pele zipaililo zyakuzilundu teezyakamwayigwa mucisi ca-Israyeli. Nekubaboobo moyo wa-Asa kuululeme mazuba oonse.
Nkabela wakaleta kuŋanda ya-Leza zipo nzyaakasalazya wisi azintu nzyaakasalazya mwini, insiliva angolida azibelesyo,
Lino katakwe inkondo limbi mane kusikila kumwaka wamakumi otatwe amusanu wabwami bwa-Asa.
Mpawo Asa wakagwisya insiliva angolida muziyobwedo zyaŋanda ya-Jehova amuŋanda yamwami, watuma kuliBenihadadi mwami wa-Aramu iwakakede ku-Damasko, wati,
Kuli cizuminano akati kesu, mebo ayebo, ataata auso, Bona! Ndakutumina insiliva angolida. Koya, ukamwaye cizuminano cako ncotangene a-Basa mwami wa-Israyeli, kuti andileke.

Elyo Benihadadi wakaswiilila majwi aamwami Asa, watuma basilutwe bampi nzyaakajisi kuyoolwisya minzi yaba-Israyeli, nkabela bakazunda Iyoni, a-Dani, a-Abelimaimu, aminzi yoonse yaziyobwedo mucisi ca-Nafitali.
Lino Basa amvwe buyo, wakaleka kuyaka Rama, akulesya milimo yawo.
Elyo mwami Asa wakeza aba-Juda boonse, nkabela bakagwisya mabwe aa-Rama, azisamu zyawo, Basa nzyaakali kuyasya, baziyasya Geba a-Mizipa.
Sa ba-Kusi aba-Lubi teebakali impi impati? Sa teebakajisi inkalaki zinji abasimbizi banji loko? Pele mbuwakasyoma Jehova, wakabaaba mumaanza aako.
Nkaambo Jehova, meso aakwe alalanga-langa moonse munyika, kuti aliyumye kukugwasya abo balulama mumoyo kumeso aakwe. Lino wacita bufubafuba mumakani aya, nkaambo kuzwa sunu ulajana inkondo.
Mpawo Asa wakanyemena oyo sicilengano, wamubika muŋanda yaziliba muntolongo, nkaambo wakamukalalila nkaambo kamakani aya. Nkabela Asa wakapenzya abamwi bantu kuciindi eco nciconya,
Lino makani oonse aa-Asa, mataanzi amasyaalizi, alilembedwe mubbuku lyabami ba-Juda aba-Israyeli.
Elyo mumwaka wamakumi otatwe amusanu aine wabwami bwakwe Asa wakaciswa kumaulu. Wakaciswa loko, nekubaboobo mukuciswa kwakwe takwakabika moyo wakwe kuli-Jehova, pe, wakaubika kubananga.
Elyo Asa wakabikwa mukabanda antoomwe abamawisi. Wakafwa mumwaka wamakumi one aumwi wabwami bwakwe.
Bakamuzika mucizikilo ncaakalisida mumunzi wa-Davida, nkabela bakamuoneka abulo ibwakazwide misamu atununkilizyo ntubakabamba basimisamu, alimwi bakamutentela tununkilizyo tunji loko.
Elyo Josafati mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe, Nkabela wakaliyumya kukulwisya ba-Israyeli.
Wakabika impi muminzi yoonse ya-Juda iyakali amabaya, akubika basilumamba munyika ya-Juda amuminzi ya-Efraimu njaakazunda Asa wisi.
Nkabela Jehova wakali a-Josafati, nkaambo wakeenda munzila intaanzi zya-Davida wisi. Takwakabika moyo wakwe kumituni pe,
wakabika moyo wakwe kuli-Leza wabamawisi akucita imbeta zyakwe. Takwakacita mbuli mbubakali kucita ba-Israyeli.
Nkaambo kako Jehova wakakazika bwami bwakwe mumaanza aakwe, Nkabela ba-Juda boonse bakaletela Josafati zipo, aboobo kajisi buvubi bunji abulemu bunji.
Wakayumya moyo wakwe munzila zya-Jehova, alimwi wakagwisya zipaililo zyakuzilundu azikozyano zyamizimu mucisi ca-Juda.
Bakali aba-Levi, Semaya, a-Netaniya, a-Zebadiya, a-Asaheli, a-Semiramoti, a-jonatani, a-Adonija, a-Tobiya a-Tobadoniya. Abaaba baLevi bakali abapaizi Elisama a-Joramu.
Bakaiisya mucisi ca-Juda, bakali abbuku lyamulao wa-Jehova, Kabaya bweendeenda muminzi yoonse ya-Juda akwiisya bantu.

Abamwi baFilisti bakaletela Josafati zipo, ansiliva zyamutelo. Abalo ba-Arabu bakamuletela imbelele zili zyuulu zili musanu azibili amyanda iili musanu aibili, abagutu bali zyuulu zili musanu azibili amyanda iili musanu aibili.
Josafati wakali kuya kunembo lyoonse mubupati, nkabela wakayaka maanda aakulivuna am inzi yaziyobwedo mucisi ca-Juda.
Kajisi imbono zinji muminzi ya-Juda, abasilumamba abaalumi basintaze mu-Jerusalemu.
Ngooyu mweelwe wabo munzubo zyabo, Mumusyobo wa-Juda: Adina kali mupati wabasilutwe bazyuulu. Kajisi basilumamba bali zyuulu zili myanda yotatwe.
Awabili kali silutwe Jehohanana, kajisi zyuulu zili myanda yobile amakumi aali musanu aatatu.
Awatatu kali Amasiya mwana wa-Zikiri. Oyu wakalyaabila milimo ya-Jehova camoyo woonse. Kajisi basilumamba basinguzu bali zyuulu zili myanda yobile.
Mumusyobo wa-Benjamini mupati kali Eliyada, mwaalumi sintaze; kajisi bantu bali zyuulu zili myanda yobile ibakasamine mata antobo.
Awabili kali Jozabadi; kajisi basilumamba babambilidwe inkondo bali zyuulu zili mwanda azyuulu zili makumi aali musanu aatatu.
Aba boonse bakali kubelekela mwami, kutaamba abo mwami mbaakabikide muminzi iili amabaya mucisi coonse ca-Juda.
Lino myaka imwi niyakamana, wakaya kukuswaya Ahabu ku-Samariya. Nkabela Ahabu wakamujayila imbelele aŋombe zinji, walo abantu mbaakeza abo, alimwi wakamukombelezya kuya kukulwisya Ramoti-Gileadi.

Ahabu mwami wa-Israyeli wakaambila Josafati mwami wa-Juda kuti, Sa tatukonzyi kuya ayebo ku-RamotiGileadi? Elyo wakamuvwiila kuti, Ndili mbubonya mbuli nduwe, abalo bantu bangu bali mbubonya mbuli bantu bako. Tulaya toonse kunkondo.

Mpawo mwami wa-Israyeli wakabunganya basinsimi, bantu bali myanda yone, wababuzya kuti, Sa ncibotu kuti tuye kukulwisya Ramoti-Gileadi, na sa ncibotu kuleka? Nkabela bakavuwa kuti, Koya kukulwisya. Leza ulaaba munzi mumaanza aamwami.
Pele josafati wakabuzya kuti, Sa takusyeede aumwi musinsimi wa-Jehova, kuti tubuzye kumulomo wakwe?

Mwami wa-Israyeli wakavwiila Josafati kuti, Kwasyaala muntu omwe ngutukonzya kubuzya ijwi lya-Jehova kumulomo wakwe, pele ndimusulide, nkaambo tasinsimi aandime makani mabotu pe; mazuba oonse ulasinsima makani mabi. Ngu-Mikaya mwana wa-Yimla. Pele josafati wakaamba kuti, Mwami ataambi obo pe.
Mpawo mwami waIsrayeli wakaita silutwe, wamulailila kuti, Fwambaana kuleta okuno Mikaya mwana wa-Yimla.

Lino mwami wa-Israyeli a-Josafati mwami wa-Juda bakalikede umwi aumwi acuuno cakwe cabwami, kabasamine zikobela zyabo, kucipolelo cakumulyango wa-Samariya, alimwi basinsimi boonse bakali kusinsima kumeso aabo.
Nkabela Zedekiya mwana wa-Kenana kalicitilide meja aabutale, elyo wakati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Aya ngaakutonsya ba-Aramu mane bakanyonyooke.
Abalo basinsimi boonse bakasinsima mbubonya, Bakati, Koya kukulwisya Ramoti-Gileadi, ukazunde. Jehova ulauaba mumaanza aamwami.
Lino mutumwa iwakaya kuyooita Mikaya wakamwaambila kuti, Bona! Majwi aabasinsimi boonse alazuminana kukwaamba makani mabotu aamwami. Ijwi lyako libe mbubonya mbuli majwi aabo. Amba kabotu.
Pele Mikaya wakavuwa kuti, Ncobeni Jehova mbali muumi, kufumbwa cintu Leza wangu ncaamba, ncencico ncenti ambe.
Elyo naakasika kumwami, mwami wakamubuzya kuti, Mikaya, sa twiinke ku-RamotiGileadi kuyoolwisya, na tuleke? Wakati, Koya, ukazunde. Bayooabwa mumaanza aanu.
Pele mwami wakamwaambila kuti, Ziindi zili zyongae nzendeelede kukulailila kuti undaambile lusinizyo luzutu muzina lyaJehova?
Elyo wakati, Ndakabona ba-Israyeli boonse balimwaikide azilundu mbuli imbelele zitakwe mweembeli. Lino Jehova wakati, Aba tabajisi mwami; bapiluke kulimbabo caluumuno.
Mpoonya awo mwami wa-Israyeli wakaambila Josafati kuti, Sa teendakakulwiida kuti takonzyi kusinsima aandime makani mabotu, pele makani mabi luzutu?
Mikaya wakati, Mbubo! Amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova. Ndakabona Jehova ulikede acuuno cakwe cabwami, amakamu oonse aakujulu aliimvwi kunembo lyakwe, kululyo akulumwensi.
Lino Jehova wakabuzya kuti, Ino nguni uukonzya koongelezya Ahabu mwami wa-Israyeli, kuti ainke kuyoonyonyooka ku-Ramoti-Gileadi? Nkabela boonse bakapambukana mukwaamba kwabo,
mane lumwi kwakeza muuya akwiimikana kubusyu bwa-Jehova, wakati, Mebo ndakonzya kumoongelezya, Jehova wakamubuzya kuti, Uyoomoongelezya buti?
Wakati, Njooinka akuba muuya wabubeji mumilomo yabasinsimi bakwe boonse, Wakati, Ncobeni uyoomoongelezya, uyookonzya. Koya, ukacite obo.
Lino bona! Jehova wabika muuya wabubeji mumilomo yabaaba basinsimi bako, pele makani Jehova ngaamba aanduwe mabi.
Mikaya wakavuwa kuti, Uyoobona mubuzuba obo mboyoonjila muŋanda yamukati kukuyuba.
Lino mwami wa-Israyeli wakati, Amujate Mikaya, mumutole kuli-Amoni mweendelezi wamunzi akuli-Joasi mwana wamwami,
mubaambile kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami. Amubike muntu oyu muntolongo, mumusanizye insima yakubuya amaanzi luzutu mane nkaboole caluumuno.
Pele Mikaya wakati, Na ncobeni ulaboola caluumuno, teensi Jehova wakaamba kumulomo wangu. Alimwi wakati, Amuswiilile nubantu nyoonse.
Lino mwami wa-Israyeli a-Josafati mwami wa-Juda bakainka kuRamoti-Gileadi.
Nkabela mwami wa-Israyeli wakaambila Josafati kuti, Mebo ndalyeenenya akunjila munkondo, pele webo sama zikobela zyako. Aboobo mwami wa-Israyeli wakalyeenenya, elyo bakanjila munkondo.
Lino mwami wa-Aramu wakalailila basilutwe bankalaki zyakwe kuti, Mutalwisyi muntu naba omwe, naba muniini naba mupati, cita mwami waIsrayeli alike.
Mpawo basilutwe bankalaki nibakabona Josafati, bakayeeya kuti ngonguwe mwami wa-Israyeli, aboobo bakaleya kumulwisya. Elyo josafati wakalila, nkabela Jehova wakamugwasya. Leza wakabagwisya kulinguwe.
Basilutwe bankalaki nibakabona kuti engwe mwami waIsrayeli, bakaleka kumutobela.
Pele umwi muntu wakafusya buta bwakwe cakutaziba, wayasa mwami wa-Israyeli akati kazikwabilizyo zyacikungu azyacamba. Elyo wakaambila sinkalaki kuti, Piluka, undigwisye munkondo, nkaambo ndiyasidwe.
Nkabela inkondo yakavuta buzuba obo, amwami wa-Israyeli wakalitabilidwe munkalaki kalangide aba-Aramu mane kusikila mangolezya, elyo kuciindi camabbililo aazuba wakafwa.
Lino josafati mwami wa-Juda wakapiluka kuŋanda yakwe kuJerusalemu caluumuno.

Pele kwakeza kumucinga Jehu mwana wa-Hanani sicilengano. Oyu wakaambila mwami josafati kuti, Sa ncibotu kugwasya basizibi? Sa ncibotu kuyandisya abo basula Jehova? Nkaambo kamakani ayo, bukali bwakusikila kuzwa kuli-Jehova.
Nekubaboobo zintu zimwi zibotu muzili mulinduwe, nkaambo wanyonyoona zikozyano zyamituni mucisi, alimwi wapangika moyo wako kukuyandaula Leza.
Lino Josafati wakaakukala mu-Jerusalemu. Nkabela wakali kuya bweendeenda lwabili akati kabantu kuzwa ku-Beereseba akusikila kutulundulundu twa-Efraimu akubaboozya kuli-Jehova Leza wabamawisi.
­Alimwi wakabika babetesi mucisi, muminzi yoonse ya-Juda iili amabaya, mumunzi umwi aumwi,
nkabela wakaambila babetesi kuti, Amucenjele mbumucita, nkaambo teensi muntu buyo ngumubetekela, ngu-Jehova, Walo uli anywe mumakani aakubeteka.
Lino amuyoowe Jehova. Amucenjele mbumucita, nkaambo kuli-Jehova Leza wanu taakwe bubetesi butaluleme nikuba kusalaula bantu nikuba kulya makulo.
Nkabela wakabalailila kuti, Mbuboobu mbumweelede kucita, Amubeteke cakuyoowa Jehova acakusyomeka acamoyo uululeme.

Kufumbwa makani aamusikila, aazwa kubakwanu bakede muminzi yabo, makani aakutila bulowa na makani aamulao na malailile na milazyo na imbeta, muleelede kubaiisya, kuti batabi amulandu kumeso aa-Jehova, kutabi bukali kulindinywe akubakwanu. Amucite obo, lino tamukooyoojana mulandu.

Amubone! Amariya mupaizi mupati ngusilutwe wanu mumakani oonse aa-Jehova, alakwe Zebadiya mwana wa-Ismayeli mweendelezi waluzubo lwa-Juda ngusilutwe wanu mumakani aamwami, Abalo ba-Levi balamugwasya-gwasya, Amubeleke canguzu, Jehova abe abaabo bacita kabotu.
Lino kusule lyayaaya ba-Moabu aba-Amoni bakasika, bakeza abamwi ba-Meuni kuzoolwisya Josafati.
Elyo kwakasika bantu kuli-Josafati, bamulwiida kuti, Kwasika inkamu impati yabantu bazwa kulwizi, ku-Aramu, beza kukulwisya. Bona! Bali ku-Hazazoni Tamara, ngonguwo Engedi,
Mpawo Josafati wakayoowa, wapangika moyo wakwe kukuyandaula Jehova, waita ba-Juda boonse kuti baliimye kulya,
Nkabela ba-Juda bakayoboloka kuti bakumbile kugwasigwa kuli-Jehova. Bakazwa kuminzi yoonse ya-Juda kuzooyandaula Jehova.
Lino Josafati wakanyampuka mumbungano ya-Juda aya-Jerusalemu muŋanda ya-Jehova, kunembo lyalubanza lupya,
wati, O Jehova Leza wabamatatesu, sa toli Leza kujulu? Sa teensi nduwe oendelezya mami oonse aabamasi? Mujanza lyako muli inguzu abwami. Taakwe muntu uukonzya kukulwisya.
Sa teensi nduwe Leza wesu uwakatanda bantu ibakakede munyika eyi kubusyu bwabantu bako ba-Israyeli? Sa teensi nduwe wakaipa bana ba-Abrahamu muzwalani wako, ibe yabo lyoonse?
Balikede mulinjiyo, alimwi baliyakilide izina lyako busena busalalisya mumonya, bati,

Na twasikilwa bubi, ipanga na kubetekwa na bulwazi na inzala, tuyooima kunembo lyaŋanda eyi akubusyu bwako, nkaambo izina lyako molili omu muŋanda, tuyookukwiilila mumapenzi esu, elyo uyoomvwa akutuvuna.
Lino bona! Bana ba-Amoni aba-Moabu abantu bacilundu ca-Seiri, mbombabo mbowakakasya bana ba-Israyeli kusaala nyika yabo kuciindi eco nibakazwa munyika ya-Egepita, aboobo bakabaleka akutabanyonyoona.
Sunu mbuboobu mbubatulumbula. Beza kutu tanda munyika yesu njowakatukonya.
O Leza wesu, sa tokooyoobabeteka? Nkaambo iswe twabula inguzu zyakuzunda aba bantu banji loko beza kukutulwisya, Tatuzi na tulacita buti, pele meso esu ali kulinduwe.
Lino ba-Juda boonse bakaliimvwi kubusyu bwa-Jehova, atwana twabo abanakazi babo abana babo.
Mpawo Muuya wa-Jehova wakasikila Jahazieli mwana wa-Zekariya mwana wa-Benaya mwana wa-Jelli mwana wa-Mataniya, umwi mu-Levi wabana ba-Asafu, akati kambungano,

nkabela wakaamba kuti, Amuswiilile nuba-Juda nyoonse, anywe nimukede mu-Jerusalemu, ayebo mwami josafatl. Mbuboobu mbwaamwaambila Jehova, Mutayoowi nikuba kukankama nkaambo kamakamu aya mapati, nkaambo inkondo teensi yanu, njiya-Jehova.
Junza, kamuya kuyoobalwisya. Amubone! Baleza kumatantilo aa-Zizi, Muyoobajana kumagolelo aakuti, kujwe lyankanda ya-Jerueli.

Tamukooyoolwana munkondo eyi pe, Amwiimike buyo mumindando yanu, mukabone lufutuko lwa-Jehova ndwati mucitile nuba-Juda aba-Jerusalemu, Mutayoowi nikuba kukankama. Junza kamuya nkubabede. Jehova uyooba anywebo.
Nkabela kwakanyampuka ba-Levi, bamwi bana ba-Kohati abana ba-Kora, kuti batembaule Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli ajwi ipati loko.
Elyo naakamana kubuzyanya makani abantu, wakabika bantu bakwiimbila Jehova akumutembaula mubweebesi busalalisya, basololole basilumamba akwaamba kuti,
Amulumbe Jehova,
Nkaambo luzyalo lwakwe talweeli.
Nkaambo bana ba-Amoni abaMoabu bakabuka kukulwisya basikukala kucilundu ca-Seiri, babanyonyoona akubamaninina, alimwi nibakamana kunyonyoona bantu ba-Seiri, bakagwasya umwi aumwi kujaya mweenzinyina.

Nkabela Josafati abantu bakwe nibakasika kukusaala imbono, bakajana iŋombe zinji loko, azibelesyo, azyakusama, azintu ziyandisi, elyo bakalibwezela mane bakalemenwa akukacilwa kuyumuna zimbi. Mazuba otatwe bakali kusaala imbono, nkaambo zyakavula loko.
Lino mubuzuba bwane bakabungana kumunkuni wa-Beraka, nkaambo nkukonya oko nkubakalumba Jehova. Nciceeco busena obo ncibucaambilwa asunu munkuni wa-Beraka.
Elyo bakapiluka, bantu boonse ba-Juda abakuJerusalemu, a-Josafati nguwakali kubasololweda. Bakeza ku-Jerusalemu cakukondwa, nkaambo Jehova wakabapa lukonde kumakani aabasinkondonyina­.
Bakeza ku-Jerusalemu atuntimbwa abanamalwa amyeembo lumwi bakasika kuŋanda ya-Jehova.
Nkabela buyoofu bwa-Leza bwakawida bamasi bakunyika zyoonse nibakamvwa Jehova mbwaakalwisya basinkondonyina Israyeli.
Aboobo bwami bwa-Josafati bwakali aluumuno. Leza wakwe wakamupa kulyokezya koonse koonse.
Nkabela wakeenda munzila ya-Asa wisi, taakwe naakaleya pe, mukucita bululami mumeso aa-Jehova.
Pele zipaililo zyakuzilundu teezyakagwisigwa pe. Bantu kabatana kupangika myoyo yabo kuli-Leza wabamawisi.
Lino makani amwi aa-Josafati, mataanzi amasyaalizi oonse, alilembedwe mumakani aa-Jehu mwana wa-Hanani, aali mukati kabbuku lyabami ba-Israyeli,
Lino kusule lyayaaya, Josafati mwami waba-Juda wakatanga buzwalani a-Ahaziya mwami wa-Israyeli, ngonguwe wakacita zibi.
Bakagwasyanya mukubeza maato aakuya ku-Tarisi. Maato bakaabeza ku-Ezioni-Geberi.
Mpawo Eliezeri mwana wa-Dodavahu waku-Maresa wakasinsimina Josafati kuti, Mbuli mbotangene buzwalani a-Ahaziya, Jehova ulanyonyoona milimo yako. Nkabela maato akaanduka, akakacilwa kuya ku-Tarisi.
Lino Josafati naakafwa, wakazikwa abamawisi mumunzi wa-Davida, nkabela Joramu mwanaakwe wakalya izina lyakwe.
Kajisi babu­ nyina, bana ba-Josafati: Azariya a-Jehieli a-Zekariya a-Azariya a-Mikayeli a-Sefatiya, Aba boonse bakali bana ba-Josafati mwami wa-Juda.
Wisaabo wakabapa zyaabilo zinji, insiliva angolida azintu ziyandisi, antoomwe aminzi iili amabaya mucisi ca-Juda, pele bwami wakabupa joramu, nkaambo ngonguwe iwakataanguna: kuzyalwa.
Lino Joramu naakamana kulya bwami bwawisi, alimwi naakaliyumya, wakajazya babunyina boonse ipanga, abamwi basilutwe ba-Israyeli.
Joramu kajisi myaka iili makumi otatwe aibili naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili musanu aitatu.
Wakeenda munzila yabami ba-Israyeli, mbubonya mbubakeenda basiluzubo ba-Ahabu, nkaambo mwana musimbi wa-Ahabu nguwakaba mukaakwe. Wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova.
Nekubaboobo Jehova takwakanyonyoona luzubo lwa-Davida, nkaambo kacizuminano ncaakatangene a-Davida, mbuli mbwaakasyomezya kumupa mumuni, walo abana bakwe, mazuba oonse.
Elyo Joramu wakainka abasilutwe bakwe ankalaki zyakwe zyoonse, nkabela wakabuka masiku, wauma ba-Edomu ibakamuzyungulukide, walo abami bankalaki zyakwe.
Mbuboobo ba-Edomu mbubakapapila bwami bwa-Juda akusikila sunu. Lino kuciindi eco nciconya bakamupapila ba-Libina abalo, nkaambo kakuti wakaleka Jehova Leza wabamawisi.
Lino kwakamusikila lugwalo luzwa kuli-Eliya musinsimi. Lwakati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Davida uso. Mbuli mbotana kweenda munzila zya-Josafati uso amunzila zya-Asa mwami wa-Juda,

pele weenda munzila zyabami ba-Israyeli, alimwi waleesya ba-Juda abantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu, mbubonya mbuli basiluzubo ba-Ahabu mbubakaleesya bantu, alimwi wajaya banyoko baluzubo lwauso, bantu babotu kwiinda nduwe,
bona! Jehova ulaumya bantu bako luumo lupati, abana bako, abanakazi bako, ambono zyako.
Ayebo uyoociswa loko bulwazi bwamumala mane lumwi mala aako azwe nkaambo kabulwazi butamani.
Nkabela bakeza mucisi ca-Juda akucisaala. Bakatola imbono zyoonse nzibakajana kuŋanda yamwami, abana bakwe abanakazi bakwe, Teekwakamusyaalila mwana naba omwe cita Jehoazi mwanaakwe muniini.
Lino kusule lyayaaya Jehova wakamuumya mumala bulwazi butasilikiki.
Lino nicakaba ciindi, kumamanino aamyaka yobile, mala aakwe akazwa nkaambo kabulwazi, aboobo wakafwa cakuzunta loko. Nkabela bantu bakwe teebakamucitila cililo cakulizya mbuli cilizyo cabamawisi.

Kajisi myaka iili makumi otatwe aibili naakaba mwami, elyo wakeendelezya muJerusalemu myaka iili musanu aitatu, pele naakafwa katakwe buusu mumyoyo yabantu, Bakamuzika mumunzi wa-Davida, pele takwakazikwa mutubanda twabami.
Ahaziya kajisi myaka iili makumi one aibili naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu mwaka omwe, Izina lyabanyina bakali Ataliya mwana wa-Omri.
Nkabela wakeenda alakwe munzila zyaluzubo lwa-Ahabu, nkaambo banyina mbobakamukombelezya kucita bubi.
Wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbubakacita basiluzubo ba-Ahabu, nkaambo mbombabo ibakali kumulaya kusule lyalufu lwawisi, mbombabo bakamubisizya.
Lino mbwaakatobela lulayo lwabo, wakaya a-Joramu mwana wa-Ahabu mwami wa-Israyeli kuyoolwisya Hazaeli mwami wa-Aramu ku-Ramoti-Gileadi. Nkabela baAramu bakayasa joramu,

elyo wakapiluka ku-Jezreeli kuti asilikwe kuzyuumo nzyaakaumigwa ku-Rama naakali kulwisya Hazaeli mwami waAramu. Nkabela Ahaziya mwana wa-Joramu mwami wa-Juda wakeza kuswaya Joramu mwana wa-Ahabu mu-Jezreeli, nkaambo wakaciswa.
Lino jehu naakali kubeteka luzubo lwaAhabu, wakajana basilutwe ba-Juda abana babakwabo Ahaziya ibakali kukutaukila Ahaziya, elyo wakabajaya.

Mpawo wakayandaula Ahaziya, nkabela wakajatwa ku-Samariya, nkwaakayubide, wakaletwa kuli-Jehu akujayigwa. Bakamuzika nkaambo bakati, Ngumwana wa-Josafati, iwakayandaula Jehova camoyo woonse. Lino teekwakasyaala muntu naba omwe waluzubo lwa-Ahaziya iwakajisi inguzu zyakweendelezya cisi.
Lino Ataliya, banyina Ahaziya, naakabona kuti mwanaakwe wafwa, wakabuka akujaya bana boonse bamwami wamusyobo wa-Juda.

Pele Jehosabati mwana musimbi wamwami wakabweza Joasi mwana wa-Ahaziya, wamugwisya kumbali akati kabana bamwami ibakati jayigwe, wamubika amuleli wakwe muŋanda yakoona yamukati. Jehosabati mwana musimbi wamwami Joramu, muka-Jehoyada mupaizi, mbwaakali mucizi wa-Ahaziya, wakamuvuna kumaanza aa-Ataliya, aboobo takwakamujaya pe.
Nkabela wakakala abo uliyubide muŋanda ya-Leza myaka iili musanu aumwi, Ataliya naakali kweendelezya nyika.
Elyo bakatuma koonse koonse mucisi ca-Juda, babunganya ba-Levi kuzwa kuminzi yoonse ya-Juda, abapati banzubo zya-Israyeli, nkabela bakeza ku-Jerusalemu.
Lino imbungano yoonse yakatanga cizuminano amwami muŋanda ya-Leza, Jehoyada wakabaambila kuti, Ngooyu mwana wamwami. Aendelezye cisi, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba aabana ba-Davida.
Lino mbuboobu mbumweelede kucita, Akati kandinywe nubapaizi aba-Levi banjila buzuba bwa-Sabata, kube inkamu zyotatwe: inkamu imwi babe basikulindila milyango,
inkamu imwi ibe muŋanda yamwami, ankamu imwi ibe kuMulyango wamatalikilo. Abantu boonse babe mulubanza lwaŋanda ya-­Jehova.
Kutabi muntu uunjila muŋanda ya-Jehova cita bapaizi babeleka milimo aba-Levi, Aba baleelede kunjila nkaambo balasalala, pele bantu bamwi boonse baleelede kucita mbwaakalailila Jehova.

Ba-Levi baleelede kumuzyunguluka mwami, umwi aumwi uli azilwisyo zyakwe mujanza lyakwe, nkabela kufumbwa muntu uunjila mukati kaŋanda uleelede kujayigwa. Amube amwami ciindi cakunjila aciindi cakuzwa.
Elyo Jehoyada mupaizi wakaaba mumaanza aabasilutwe masumo azikwabilizyo antobo izyakali zyamwami Davida izyakali muŋanda ya-Leza.

Nkabela wakabika bantu boonse, umwi aumwi uli acilwisyo cakwe mujanza lyakwe, kuzwa kulubazu lwalulyo lwaŋanda mane kusikila kulubazu lwalumwensi lwaŋanda, cakuzyungul uka cipaililo aŋanda, kuti balangile mwami.
Mpawo wakagwisya mwana wamwami, wamubikila munsini, wamupa mabuku aamulongo, aboobo bakamupa bwami. Nkabela Jehoyada abana bakwe bakamunanika, baamba kuti, Aongole mwami.
Lino Ataliya naakamvwa bantu balazuzaana akutembaula mwami, wakeza kuŋanda ya-Jehova, bantu nkubakabede.

Nkabela alange buyo, wakabona mwami uliimvwi acilende cakwe kumanjililo, abasilutwe abasimyeembo bali kumbali lyamwami, abantu boonse bacisi balasekelela akulizya myeembo, abasikwiimba bali aziimbyo zyabo akwiisya bantu kutembaula, elyo Ataliya wakadeluula zyakusama zyakwe, walila kuti, Ndaabwa! Ndaabwa!

Mpawo Jehoyada wakaita basilutwe bamyanda ibakali kubamba impi, wabaambila kuti, Amumutandile anze lyamindando yabantu; kufumbwa muntu uumutobela ajayigwe apanga, Nkaambo mupaizi wakati, Mutamujayili muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Lino bakabika maanza alinguwe, nkabela wakainda munzila yabasimabbiza kuya kuŋanda yamwami, oko nkubakamujayila.
Mpawo bantu boonse bakainka kuŋanda ya-Baala, bakaimwaya, Zipaililo zyakwe azikozyano zyakwe zyoonse bakazivwinyauna, alakwe Matani mupaizi wa-Baala bakamujaya mpoonya awo anembo lyazipaililo.

Alimwi Jehoyada wakabika bantu kuti balindile iŋanda ya-Jehova. Bakali mumaanza aabapaizi ba-Levi, Davida mbaakabikide kukubeleka milimo yaŋanda ya-Jehova, kuti batuulile Jehova zipaizyo mbubonya mbukulembedwe mubbuku lya-Musa, akusekelela akwiimba mbubonya mbwaakalailila Davida.
Wakabika balindizi kumilyango yaŋanda ya-Jehova, kuti kutanjili muntu naba omwe uusofwede mumakani aali buti na buti.

Elyo wakatolelela basilutwe abapati abasikweendelezya bantu abantu boonse banyika, nkabela bakagwisya mwami muŋanda yaJehova, bainda kumulyango wakujulu kuya kuŋanda yamwami, babika mwami acuuno cabwami.
Elyo bantu boonse banyika bakakondwa, awalo munzi kuutontwede, Ataliya naakamana kujayigwa apanga.
Lino Joasi wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova mazuba oonse ngaakapona Jeheyada mupaizi.
Jehoyada wakamujanina banakazi bobile, elyo wakazyala bana balombe abasimbi.
Lino kusule lyayaaya Joasi wakayeeya mumoyo wakwe kumamika iŋanda ya-Jehova.

Elyo wakabunganya bapaizi aba-Levi, wabaambila kuti, Kamuya muminzi ya-Juda, mukayandaule kuba-Israyeli boonse mali aakuyumya iŋanda ya-Leza wanu mwaka umwi aumwi, alimwi amufwambaanye makani. Nekubaboobo ba-Levi teebakafwambaanya pe.

Mpoonya awo mwami wakaita Jehoyada mupaizi mupati, wamubuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi tona kulailila ba-Levi kuti batezye bantu ba-Juda abaJerusalemu mutelo wa-Musa mulanda wa-Jehova ngwaakatezya imbungano yoonse yaba-Israyeli wakugwasya itente lyakubunganina
Nkaambo Ataliya, oyo mwanakazi mubi, bana bakwe bakamwaya iŋanda ya-Leza, azintu zisalalisya zyoonse zyaŋanda ya-Jehova bakazitolela ba-Baala.
Lino bakazibya bantu boonse ba-Juda aba-Jerusalemu, bati, Amuletele Jehova mutelo wa-Musa mulanda wa-Leza, ngwaakali kutezya ba-Israyeli nibakacili munkanda.
Nkabela bapati boonse abantu boonse bakakondwa, baleta mali aabo, baawaala mubbokesi mane lyakazula.

Lino kufumbwa ciindi ibbokesi nilyakaletwa kulibasilutwe bamwami kumaanza aaba-Levi, na bakabona kuti mali avula, kwakeza mulembi wamwami asilutwe wamupaizi, elyo bakalongolola ibbokesi akulibweedezya kubusena bwalyo. Mbuboobo mbubakali kucita mazuba oonse, aboobo bakabunganya mali manji loko.

Nkabela mwami aJehoyada bakaapa mumaanza aabaabo ibakabeleka milimo yaŋanda yaJehova, aboobo bakabelesya bayaki ababezi kuti bamamike iŋanda ya-Jehova, abasikufuzya butale amukuba kuti bayumye iŋanda ya-Jehova.
Lino basimilimo bakabeleka, nkabela milimo yakubambulula yakaya kunembo mumaanza aabo mane bakaboozya iŋanda ya-Leza mububotu bwayo bwaciindi akwiiyumya:

Lino nibakamana, bakaleta mali aasyeede kumwami akuli-Jehoyada, bakaabelesya kukupanga zibelesyo zyaŋanda ya-Jehova, zibelesyo zyankombelo azyazipaizyo amitiba azibelesyo zyangolida azyansiliva, Lino bakali kutuula zipaizyo muŋanda ya-Jehova lyoonse, mazuba oonse ngaakapona Jehoyada.
Nkabela bakamuzika mumunzi wa-Davida akati kabami, nkaambo wakacita bubotu mucisi ca-Israyeli akuti-Leza akuluzubo lwakwe.
Lino bakaleka izjanda ya-Jehova Leza wabamawisi, bakaakukomba mituni azikozyano zyamizimu, mane bukali bwakabukila bantu ba-Juda aba-Jerusalemu nkaambo kamulandu wabo oyo.
Wakabatumina basinsimi kuti bababoozye kuli-Jehova, Aba bakabakambaukila, nekubaboobo bakakaka kuswiilila.
Pele bakamuvwiya, elyo bakamufusa mabwe, mbwaakalailila mwami, mulubanza lwaŋanda ya-Jehova.
Mwami Joasi takwakaingasila luzyalo ndwaakamufwida Jehoyada wisi, pele wakajaya mwanaakwe. Lino naakali mukufwa wakati, Jehova abone! Aliye inkoto!
Impi eyo yaba-Aramu yakeza abantu bace buyo, nekubaboobo Jehova wakaaba mumaanza aabo basilumamba banji loko, nkaambo bakalilekede Jehova Leza wabamawisi. Mbuboobo mbubakabeteka Joasi,
Abo ibakavwiya mbaaba: Zabadi, mwana wa-Simeati mwanakazi mu-Amoni, a-Jozabadi, mwana wa-Simiriti mu-Moabu.
Lino makani aabana bakwe, amakani mapati ngaakalemenwa, amilimo yakuyakulula iŋanda ya-Leza, oonse alilembedwe mubbuku lyakupandulula ibbuku lyabami. Elyo Amaziya mwanaakwe nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova, nekubaboobo takwakalulama camoyo woonse.
Elyo bwami nibwakajisi kabotu mumaanza aakwe, wakajaya abo balanda bakwe ibakajayide mwami wisi.

Pele bana babo, takwakabajaya pe, nkaambo mbuboobu mbukulembedwe mumulao wamubbuku lya-Musa; Jehova wakalailila kuti, Bantu tabeelede kufwa nkaambo kamilandu yabana babo, abalo bana tabeelede kufwa nkaambo kamilandu yabamawisi. Umwi aumwi afwe nkaambo kamulandu wakwe mwini.
Alimwi wakabelesya bantu ba-Israyeli, baalumi basintaze bali zyuulu zili mwanda, wabapa matalenta aansiliva aali mwanda.
Pele kwakamusikila umwi muntu wa-Leza, wati, O mwami, utainki abasilumamba ba-Israyeli, nkaambo Jehova tali aba-Israyeli, nkukuti aba ba-Efraimu boonse.
Pele na wayeeya kuti, Ndakonzya kuzunda oboLeza ulakubombya kubusyu bwabasinkondonyoko, nkaambo Leza nguujisi inguzu zyakugwasya anguzu zyakubombya.

Mpawo Amaziya wakaambila muntu wa-Leza kuti, Pele tucite buti kumakani aamatalenta aali mwanda ngundapa impi ya-Israyeli? Muntu wa-Leza wakavuwa kuti, Jehova ulakonzya kukupa mali manji loko kwiinda ayo.
Mpawo Amaziya wakamwaisya basilumamba ibakamusikila kuzwa kucisi ca-Efraimu, kuti bapiluke kulimbabo. Lino bukali bwabo bwakabukila ba-Juda loko, bakapiluka kumaanda aabo abukali bunji.
Pele Amaziya wakaliyumya, wasololela bantu bakwe, waya kukuti lya-Munyo, wajaya bantu ba-Seiri bali zyuulu zili ikumi.
Abamwi bali zyuulu zili ikumi, bana ba-Juda bakabajata bacili baumi, babasisya kumutwe wandomba, babawaala ansi kuzwa oko kumutwe wandomba, aboobo boonse bakapwayika.

Pele basilumamba bampi eyo Amaziya njaakamwaisya, njaakakaka kuya ayo kunkondo, bakasaala minzi ya-Juda kuzwa ku-Samariya kusikila ku-Beti-horoni, bajaya bantu bali zyuulu zyotatwe bamulinjiyo akusaala imbono zinji.
Elyo bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila Amaziya, watuma musinsimi kulinguwe, wamwaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi wabika moyo wako kumizimu yabantu iyakakacilwa kuvuna bantu babo ini mumaanza aako?

Nkabela naakacili mukumwaambila, wakati, We! Sa twakubika uwe kuti ube sikulaya mwami? Leka! Nkaambonzi ulayanda kuumwa? Mpawo musinsimi wakaleka, pele wakati, Ndizi kuti Leza waamba kukunyonyoona, nkaambo wacita obo, alimwi wakaka kuswiilila cicenjezyo cangu.

Pele Joasi mwami wa-Israyeli wakatumina Amaziya mwami wa-Juda mulazyo wakuti, Kakoka ikakali ku-Lebano kakatumina musamu wakedari waku-Lebano, kati, Utupe inwana wako musimbi, kuti mwanaangu mulombe amukwate. Mpawo kwakainda cinyama camusokwe caku-Lebano, calyataula kakoka.
Uwe ulaamba kuti, Bona! Ndazunda ba-Edomu, Aboobo moyo wako walisumpula. Lino kala kumaanda, Nkaambonzi noyanda kubusya inkondo? Uyoowa omwini acisi ca-Juda coonse.
Aboobo Joasi mwami waIsrayeli wakeza kuzoobonana bwaalumi a-Amaziya mwami wa-Juda kuBeti-semesi mucisi ca-Juda.
Nkabela ba-Juda bakazundwa kubusyu bwaba-Israyeli akucija umwi aumwi kumunzi wakwe.

Mpawo Joasi mwami wa-Israyeli wakajata Amaziya mwana wa-Joasi mwana wa-Ahaziya mwami wa-Juda nkukonya ku-Beti-semesi, wamusisya ku-Jerusalemu, wamwaya bulambo bwa-Jerusalemu kuzwa ku-Mulyango wa-Efraimu akusikila kumulyango wacooko, tukokola tuli myanda yone.
Nkabela wakatola ingolida yoonse, ansiliva, azibelesyo zyoonse izyakajanwa muŋanda ya-Leza kuli-Obedi-Edomu, aziyobwedo zyaŋanda yamwami, abasimubuzike, elyo wakapiluka ku-Samariya.
Amakani amwi aa-Amaziya, mataanzi amasyaalizi oonse, sa taalembedwe mubbuku lyabami ba-Juda aba-Israyeli?
Lino kuzwa kuciindi eco Amaziya naakaleya kuzwa kuli-Jehova, bakatalika kumuvwiya mu-Jerusalemu, aboobo wakacijila ku-Lakisi, pele akwalo ku-Lakisi bakatuma basikumutobela, bamujaya nkukonya.
Elyo bakamuleta amabbiza akumuzika mumunzi wa-Davida mubakazikwa bamawisi.
Ngonguwe iwakayakulula Elati akuuboozya mumaanza aaba-Juda kusule lyalufu lwamwami.
Uziya kajisi myaka iili ikumi amusanu aumwi naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili makumi osanwe aibili. Izina lyabanyina kabali Jekoliya waku-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova, mbubonya mbwaakacita wisi Amaziya.
Wakabika moyo wakwe kukuyandaula Leza mumazuba aa-Zekariya iwakali kumwiisya mubuyoofu bwa-Leza, Nkabela mazuba oonse naakali kubika moyo wakwe kuli-Jehova, Leza wakamupa coolwe.
Leza wakamugwasya kuzunda ba-Filisti, aba-Arabu ibakakede ku-Guribaala, aba-Meuni.
Abalo ba-Amoni bakaletela Uziya mu telo nkabela impuwo yakwe yakasika mane kumanjililo aa-Egepita, nkaambo wakaba muyumu loko.
Nkabela Uziya wakayaka zisanza mu-Jerusalemu ku-Mulyango wacooko aku-Mulyango wakuti aku-Cooko, waziyumya,

Alimwi wakayaka zisanza kunkanda akusya mikalo minji, nkaambo kajisi iŋombe zinji, kutulundulundu akumabanda, alimwi kajisi basikulima abasikubamba masaansa mumalundu amunyika yamicelo, nkaambo wakali kuyanda nyika.
Nkabela Uziya kajisi impi iyakali kucita inkondo. Basilumamba nibakali kwiinka kukulwa bakali muzipanzi zyabo mbubakabikwa kumaanza aa-Jeueli mulembi a-Maaseya silutwe a-Hananiya, bapati bamwami.
Mweelwe woonse wabapati banzubo babasilumamba wakasika kuzyuulu zyobile amyanda iili musanu aumwi.
Mumaanza aabo kabajisi makamu makamu aabasilumamba, zyuulu zili myanda yotatwe amusanu azibili amyanda yosanwe. Aba bakakonzya kulwisya canguzu kukugwasya mwami kuzunda basinkondonyina.
Lino basilumamba boonse Uziya wakababambila zikwabilizyo amasumo ankowani azibaki zyakulwisya amata amabwe aakuwaala ankwilipo.

Amu-Jerusalemu wakapanga zintu nzibakayeeyede bantu bacenjede, nzyaakabika azisanza azyooko, zyakakonzya kufusa mivwi amabwe mapati. Nkabela impuwo yakwe yakaya koonse koonse, nkaambo wakagwasigwa cakugambya mane lumwi wakayuma.
Elyo Azariya mupaizi wakamutobela, abapaizi bamwi ba-Jehova bali makumi aali musanu aatatu basinguzu,

nkabela bakamukasya mwami Uziya, bati, Teensi milimo yako, Uziya, kutentela Jehova tununkilizyo, njemilimo yabapaizi, bana ba-Aroni, ibasalazidwe kukutenta tununkilizyo. Kozwa mucikombelo, nkaambo wabisya. Aya makani taakonzyi kukuletela bulemu kuzwa kuli-Jehova Leza.

Mpawo Uziya wakakalala. Mujanza lyakwe kajisi cibikilo catununkilizyo kuti atente, pele naakakalalila bapaizi cinsenda cakaboneka ankumu yakwe kumeso aabapaizi muŋanda ya-Jehova kunembo lyacipaililo catununkilizyo.
Elyo Azariya mupaizi mupati abapaizi boonse, nibakamulanga, bakabona kuti ulijisi cinsenda ankumu yakwe. Mpawo bakabindana kumutanda, alakwe mwini wakafwambaana kuya anze, nkaambo Jehova wakamuuma.

Lino mwami Uziya kali sicinsenda mazuba oonse mane kusikila kubuzuba bwalufu lwakwe, nkabela mbwaakali sicinsenda wakali kukala muŋanda alike, nkaambo cakamutondela kunjila muŋanda ya-Jehova. Lino mwanaakwe Jotamu nguwakali kubamba makani aaŋanda yamwami akubeteka bantu bacisi.
Elyo Uziya naakafwa, bakamuzika abamawisi mukabanda kamusokwe, nkaambo bakaamba kuti, Ngusicinsenda. Lino mwanaakwe Jotamu nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Nkabela wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova, mbubonya mbwaakacita Uziya wisi, pele takwakanjila muntempele ya-Jehova, Nekubaboobo bantu bakacili kubisya-bisya.
Ngonguwe wakayaka mulyango waajulu waŋanda yaJehova, abulambo bwa-Ofeli wakacita milimo minji kulimbubo.
Wakayaka minzi mucisi catulundulundu ca-Juda, amumisanza wakayaka maanda mayumu azisanza.

Nkabela wakalwisya mwami wabana ba-Amoni akumuzunda, elyo mumwaka oyo ba-Amoni bakamupa matalenta aansiliva aali mwaanda, azisuwo zyabulotwe zili zyuulu zili ikumi, azyuulu zili ikumi zyabbaale. Amumwaka wabili amumwaka watatu ba-Amoni bakamupa alimwi mbubonya.
Jotamu wakaba singuzu nkaambo kakuti wakabamba kabotu inzila zyakwe kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wakwe,
