Lino makani amwi aa-Jotamu, ankondo zyakwe zyoonse, anzila zyakwe, makani oonse alilembedwe mubbuku lyabami ba-Israyeli aba-Juda.
Kajisi myaka iili makumi obile amusanu naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka iili ikumi amusanu aumwi.
Lino Jotamu naakafwa, bakamuzika mumunzi wa-Davida, nkabela mwanaakwe Ahazi wakalya izina lyakwe.
Wakeenda munzila zyabami ba-Israyeli, alimwi wakacitila babaala zikozyano.
Wakali kutenta mukuti lyamwana wa-Hinomu akutuuzya bana bakwe mumulilo mbubonya mbuli ziyanza zisesemya zyabamasi Jehova mbaakatanda kubusyu bwabana ba-Israyeli.
Wakali kupaila akutenta tununkilizyo azipaililo zyakuzilundu akumalundu amunsi amisamu yoonse mitete.

Peka mwana wa-Remaliya wakajaya bantu bali zyuulu zili mwanda azyuulu zili makumi obile mucisi ca-Juda mubuzuba bomwe, boonse bakali basilumamba basinguzu, Cakaba obo nkaambo kakuti bakalilekede Jehova Leza wabamawisi.
Nkabela Zikiri, umwi wabasilumamba bacisi ca-Efraimu, wakajaya Maaseya mwana wamwami a-Azrikamu silutwe waŋanda a-Elikana ngambela wamwami.

Pele kakuli umwi musinsimi wa-Jehova, izina lyakwe kali Odedi. Oyo wakalibonya kumeso aabasilumamba ibakeza ku-Samariya, wakabaambila kuti, Amuteelelel Jehova Leza wabamauso wakakalalila ba-Juda, aboobo wakabaaba mumaanza aanu, pele inywe mwabajaya cabukali bupati busika akujulu.

Mumyoyo yanu mulayeeya kuti, Tuleelede kubombya bantu ba-Juda aba-Jerusalemu, baalumi abanakazi boonse, babe bazike besu abasimamambe besu. Sa inywe nubeni tamujisi zibi nzimubisizya Jehova Leza wanu?
Lino amundiswiilile. Amubweedezye bazike mbomusaalide akati kabakwanu, nkaambo bukali buyumu bwa-Jehova bwamubukila.

Mpawo kwakanyampuka bantu bamwi basilutwe babana ba-Efraimu, Azariya mwana waJohanana, Berekiya mwana wa-Mesilemoti, Jehizikiya mwana wa-Salumu, a-Amasa mwana wa-Hadilai, bakakasya bantu abo ibakazwa kunkondo,

bati, Tamukooniizya bazike omuno pe, nkaambo mulayanda kutupa milandu kumeso aa-Jehova atala lyazibi zyesu amilandu yesu nzitujisi kale, nkaambo milandu yesu mipati, abukali buyumu bwabukila ba-Israyeli.
Elyo basilumamba bakasia bazike ambono nzibakasaalide mumaanza aabapati abantu boonse ibakabungene.

Nkabela abo bantu ibaambwa kale kumazina aabo bakabuka, babweza bazike, babelesya imbono kukusamika baabo ibakabula zyakusama. Bakabasamika, bababikila insangu, babasanina, babanywisya, babananika. Elyo baabo ibakabula inguzu bakabatola ambongolo, babasisya ku-Jeriko, munzi watukunka, uubambene acisi cabo. Kuzwa oko bakapiluka ku-Samariya.
nkaambo ba-Edomu bakasika alimwi kuzoozunda cisi ca-Juda akutola bantu mubuzike.

Abalo ba-Filisti bakasaala minzi yatulundulundu aya-Negebi mucisi ca-Juda, bazunda Betisemesi, a-Ajaloni, a-Gederoti, a-Soko atunzuunzi twawo, a-Timna atunzuunzi twawo, a-Gimzo atunzuunzi twawo, bakala nkuko.
Nkaambo Jehova wakabombya ba-Juda nkaambo ka-Ahazi mwami wa-Israyeli, nkaambo wakalipilinganya mubu-Juda akupapila Jehova.
Mpawo Tiligati Pilineseri mwami wa-Asuri wakeza kulinguwe, wamupenzya buyo, tamugwasizye pe.
Nkaambo Ahazi wakaaba imbono zyaŋanda ya-Jehova azyaŋanda yamwami azyabasilutwe, wapa mwami wa-Asuri, nekubaboobo teecakamugwasya pe.
Wakapaila mizimu ya-Damasko iyakamuzunda, Wakati, Baleza babami ba-Aramu babagwasya. Nkabatuulile zipaizyo, bandigwasye ambebo. Pele bakamubisizya, walo aba-Israyeli boonse.
Nkabela Ahazi wakabunganya zibelesyo zyaŋanda ya-Leza, wakosaula zibelesyo zyaŋanda ya-Leza, wajala milyango yaŋanda ya-Jehova, akulicitila zipaililo moonse moonse mu-Jerusalemu.
Amuminzi yoonse yaba-Juda wakayaka zipaililo zyakutentela mizimu myeenzu tununkilizyo, aboobo wakakalazya Jehova Leza wabamawisi.
Elyo Ahazi naakafwa, wakazikwa mumunzi, nkukuti mu-Jerusalemu, nkaambo teebakamuleta kutubanda twabami ba-Israyeli. Nkabela mwanaakwe Hezekiya nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Nkabela wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbwaakacita Davida wisi.
Elyo wakaleta bapaizi abaLevi, wababunganya mumugwagwa wakujwe,
wabaambila kuti, Amundiswiilile nuba-Levi, Amulisalazye, akusalazya iŋanda ya-Jehova Leza wabauso banu. Amugwisye zintu zisofweede mubusena busalala.
Nkaambo batateesu bakapapa, bacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova Leza wesu, bamuleka, bafutatila cikalilo ca-Jehova, balanga kumbi.
Bakajala milyango yacikombelo, bazimya malampi, baleka kutentela Leza wa-Israyeli tununkilizyo akumutuulila zipaizyo mubusena busalalisya.
Nciceceo bukali bwaJehova ncibwakabukila ba-Juda a-Jerusalemu. Wababika kuti babe cisesemyo acintu cigambya acintu cisampaulwa, mbubonya mbumubona ameso aanu nubeni.
Amubone! Bamatateesu bajayigwa apanga, abalo bana besu balombe abana besu basimbi abanakazi besu batolwa mubuzike nkaambo kamakani aya.
Lino moyo wangu ulayanda kutanga cizuminano a-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, kuti bukali bwakwe buyumu butuleke.
Nubana bangu, mutaubyi makani, nkaambo Jehova wakasala ndinywe kuti mwiime kubusyu bwakwe kukumumanina milimo, mube basimilimo bakwe akumutentela tununkilizyo.

Mpawo ba-Levi bakanyampuka: Makati mwana wa-Amasai a-Joeli mwana wa-Azariya akati kabana ba-Kohati, a-Kisi mwana wa-Abidi aAzariya mwana wa-Jehaleleli bana ba-Merari, a-Jowa mwana wa-Zima a-Edeni mwana wa-Jowa akati kaba-Gerisoni;
abamwi bana ba-Elizafana, Simri a-Jeueli; abana ba-Asafu, Zekariya a-Mataniya,
abana ba-Hemani, Jehieli a-Simei; abana ba-Jedutuni, Semaya a-Uziyeli.
Bakabunganya babunyina, balisalazya, banjila mbubonya mwami mbwaakalailila mumajwi aa-Jehova kuti basalazye iŋanda ya-Jehova.

Bapaizi bakanjila muŋanda yamukati yantempele ya-Jehova, kuti baisalazye. Bakagwisya zintu zisofweede zyoonse nzibakajana muntempele ya-Jehova amulubanza lwaŋanda ya-Jehova, elyo ba-Levi bakazitambula akuzitola anze kukalonga ka-Kedroni.

Bakatalika milimo yakusalazya mubuzuba butaanzi bwamwezi mutaanzi, elyo mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu bakasika kucikombelo ca-Jehova, nkabela bakali mukusalazya iŋanda ya-Jehova mazuba aali musanu aatatu, lumwi mubuzuba bwakumi amusanu abumwi bwamwezi mutaanzi bakamana.

Lino bakanjila muŋanda mwaakabede mwami Hezekiya, bakati, Twamana kusalazya iŋanda yoonse ya-Jehova, acipaililo cazituuzyo azibelesyo zyaco zyoonse, antafule yamikamu yamabonwabonwa azibelesyo zyayo zyoonse.
Azyalo zibelesyo zyoonse mwami Ahazi nzyaakasampaula mubwami bwakwe mukupapila kwakwe, twazibamba, twazisalazya, lino nkuzili kunembo lyacipaililo ca-Jehova.
Elyo mwami Hezekiya wakafuma, wabunganya bapati boonse bamunzi, waya kuŋanda ya-Jehova.

Nkabela bakaleta basune bali musanu ababili abagutu bali musanu ababili atwana twambelele tuli musanu atubili ampongo zili musanu azibili kuti zibe cituuzyo cakutontozya cabwami acacikombelo acacisi ca-Juda. Wakalailila bapaizi bana ba-Aroni kuti bazituule acipaililo ca-Jehova.

Elyo bakajaya basune nkabela bapaizi bakatambula bulowa bwabo, babusansaila acipaililo, alimwi bakajaya bagutu akusansaila bulowa bwabo acipaililo, lumwi bakajaya twana twambelele akusansaila bulowa bwato acipaililo.
Mpawo bakasisya impongo zyacituuzyo cakutontozya kumeso aamwami akumeso aabantu babungene, babika maanza aabo alimbabo.

Bapaizi bakabajaya, basalazizya cipaililo bulowa bwabo, kuti bamanye milandu yacisi coonse caba-Israyeli, nkaambo mwami wakaamba kuti cipaizyo acituuzyo cakutontozya cileelede kuba caba-Israyeli boonse.
Ba-Levi bakaima azibelesyo zya-Davida, abalo bapaizi bakalijisi myeembo.

Elyo Hezekiya wakalailila kuti batuule cipaizyo acipaililo, nkabela kuciindi eco nciconya nibakatalika kutuula, bakatalika kwiimbila Jehova amyeembo azibelesyo izyakazwa kumaanza aa-Davida mwami wa-Israyeli.
Nkabela imbungano yoonse yabantu, boonse bakakotama, abasikwiimba bakaimba, abasimyeembo bakalizya myeembo, mane lumwi milimo yakupaizya yakamana.
Lino nibakamana kupaizya, mwami abantu boonse mbaakali abo bakakotama akukomba,
Nkabela mwami Hezekiya abapati bakaambila ba-Levi kuti batembaule Jehova cakubelesya majwi aa-Davida amajwi aa-Asafu sicilengano. Nkabela bakatembaula cakukondwa, elyo bakakotama akukomba.
Ngooyu mweelwe wazipaizyo bantu nzibakaleta: basune bali makumi aali musanu aabili abagutu bali mwanda atubelele tuli myanda yobile. Ezi zyoonse zyakali zipaizyo zya-Jehova.
Azintu zisalazidwe zyakali myanda iili musanu aumwi ambelele zili zyuulu zyotatwe.

Pele bapaizi bakali bace buyo, bakakacilwa kujaya zipaizyo zyoonse; nkaambo kako bakwabo ba-Levi bakabagwasya mane bakamana milimo yoonse, mane bapaizi bakalisalazya, nkaambo ba-Levi bakaliluleme mumyoyo yabo kukulisalazya kwiinda bapaizi.
Azyalo zipaizyo zyakavula, amafuta aazipaizyo zyakutontozya, azipaizyo zyakunywa, aboobo milimo yaŋanda ya-Jehova yakabambwa kabotu.
Nkabela Hezekiya abantu boonse bakasekelela nkaambo kakuti Leza wakabamba bantu, nkaambo makani akafwambaana kucitwa.
Lino Hezekiya wakatumina ba-Israyeli aba-Juda boonse, alimwi wakalemba magwalo kuba-Efraimu aba-Manase, kuti basike kuŋanda ya-Jehova mu-Jerusalemu kukulya Pasika, ipobwe lya-Jehova Leza waIsrayeli.
Mwami wakabuzyanya makani abapati bakwe ambungano yoonse yabantu mu-Jerusalemu, kuti balye ipobwe mumwezi wabili,
nkaambo bakakacilwa kulya kuciindi eco, nkaambo bapaizi teebakamanide kulisalazya, alimwi bantu kabatana kubungana ku-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela makani akalulama mumeso aamwami amumeso aambungano yoonse yabantu,

aboobo bakakosola makani akumwaisya ijwi mucisi coonse ca-Israyeli kuzwa ku-Beeriseba akusikila ku-Dani, kuti basike kukulya Pasika waJehova Leza wa-Israyeli mu-Jerusalemu, nkaambo ciindi cilamfu kabatacitide mbukulembedwe.

Elyo basimposo nibakatambula magwalo kuzwa kumaanza aamwami abapati bakwe, bakaatola mucisi coonse ca-Israyeli aca-Juda mbubonya mbuli mwami mbwaakalailila. Wakati, Nubana baIsrayeli, amuboole kuli-Jehova Leza wa-Abrahamu awa-Izaka awa-Israyeli, lino ulaboola alakwe kulibaabo basyaala baloboka kuzwa kumaanza aabami ba-Asuri.
Mutabi mbuli bamauso abakwabo ibakapapila Jehova Leza wabamauso. Nciceeco ncaakababikila kuti babe cigambyo mbubonya mbumubona.
Mutayumyi myoyo yanu mbubakacita bamauso. Amulyaabe mumaanza aa-Jehova, musike kucikombelo cakwe ncaakasalazya kuti cibe cakwe lyoonse, Amumanine Jehova Leza wanu milimo, kuti bukali bwakwe bumuleke.

Nkaambo na mwaboola kuli-Jehova, bakwanu abana banu balafwidwa luzyalo kulibaabo babatola mubuzike, kuti baboole alimwi mucisi ecino, nkaambo Jehova Leza wanu ngusiluse, ngusibuuya, takonzyi kumufutatila abusyu bwakwe na mwaboola kulinguwe.
Nekubaboobo banjibanji ba-Aseri aba-Manase aba-Zebuloni bakalibombya akuboola ku-Jerusalemu.
Amwalo mucisi ca-Juda, ijanza lyaLeza lyakabapa moyo womwe kuti bacite mbubonya mbuli mwami abapati bakwe mbubakabalailila mumajwi aa-Jehova,
Kwakabungana bantu banji ku-Jerusalemu kukulya ipobwe lyazinkwa zitakwe bumena mumwezi wabili. Kakuli imbungano impati loko.
Mpawo bakanyamuka, bakaakugwisya zipaililo izyakali mu-Jerusalemu. Azyalo zipaililo zyakutentela tununkilizyo zyoonse bakazigwisya, bakazisowa kukalonga ka-Kedroni.
Nkabela bakajaya banyama ba-Pasika mubuzuba bwakumi aane bwamwezi wabili. Elyo bapaizi aba-Levi bakafwa insoni, balisalazya, banjizya zipaizyo muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Nkabela bakaima amasena aabo muciyanza ceelede mbubonya mbukulaililwa mumulao waMusa muntu wa-Leza, Bapaizi bakasansaila bulowa mbubakatambula kumaanza aaba-Levi.
Nkaambo kakuli bantu banji akati kambungano ibatakalina kulisalazya. Ba-Levi mbobakali kujaya banyama ba-Pasika kuti boonse ibatakalina kusalala balisalazizye Jehova.

Nkaambo bantu banji, bantu banji ba-Efraimu aba-Manase aba-Isakara aba-Zebuloni, kabatana kusalazigwa, aboobo teebakalya Pasika muciyanza ceelede mbucilembedwe, pele Hezekiya wakabakombela, wati, Jehova mubotu abalekelele boonse,
nkukuti umwi aumwi uubika moyo wakwe kukuyandaula Leza, Jehova Leza wabamauso, nekuba kuti tana kulisalazya muciyanza ceelede cacikombelo.
Nkabela Jehova wakaswiilila Hezekiya akuponya bantu.

Elyo Hezekiya wakakombelezya boonse ba-Levi ibakali kwiisya makani mabotu aa-Jehova, nkabela bakali kulla ipobwe mazuba aali musanu aabili akutuula zipaizyo zyakutontozya akulyaamba zibi zyabo kubusyu bwa-Jehova Leza wabamawisi.
Lino bantu boonse bambungano bakabuzyanya makani, bakosola kucita mazuba aamwi aali musanu aabili. Nkabela bakalya mazuba aali musanu aabili aamwi cakukondwa.

Nkaambo Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda wakapa imbungano basune bali cuulu ambelele zili zyuulu zili musanu azibili, abalo bapati bakapa imbungano basune bali cuulu ambelele zili zyuulu zili ikumi. Nkabela bapaizi banji loko bakalisalazya.
Lino imbungano yoonse yaJuda yakasekelela, abapaizi, aba-Levi, abantu boonse ibakazwa mucisi ca-Israyeli, abeenzu ibakazwa mucisi ca-Israyeli, abaabo ibakakede mubuJuda.
Kwakaba kukondwa kupati mu-Jerusalemu. Kuzwa kumazuba aa-Solomoni mwana wa-Davida mwami wa-Israyeli kakutakwe kukondwa kuliboobo mu-Jerusalemu.

Alimwi wakabamba caabilo cambono zyamwami ncaakabikila zipaizyo, nkukuti zipaizyo zyacifumo azyamangolezya, azipaizyo zyabuzuba bwa-Sabata azyamwezi mupya azyamapobwe, mbubonya mbukulembedwe mumulao wa-Jehova.
Nkabela wakaambila bantu ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu kuti bape bapaizi aba-Levi caabilo, kuti baliyumye mumulao wa-Jehova.
Lino ijwi eli nilyakamvwigwa bana ba-Israyeli bakaleta zintu zinji, kabalwebalwe kamaila awaini amafuta abuci amicelo yoonse yamyuunda. Bakaleta cipanzi cakumi cazintu zyoonse mane zyakavula.

Abana ba-Israyeli aba-Juda ibakakede muminzi ya-Juda, abalo bakaleta cipanzi cakumi caŋombe acambelele, acipanzi cakumi cazintu zisalala izyakasalazigwa kuli-Jehova Leza wabo. Bakazileta akuzitula milwi milwi.
Bakatalika kucita milwi mumwezi watatu, elyo bakamana mumwezi wamusanu aibili.
Lino Hezekiya abapati bacisi nibakasika akubona milwi, bakatembaula Jehova abantu bakwe baIsrayeli.
Mpoonya awo Hezekiya wakabuzya bapaizi aba-Levi makani aamilwi.

Nkabela Azariya mupaizi silutwe waluzubo lwa-Zadoki wakamuvwiila kuti, Kuzwa kuciindi eco bantu nibakatalika kuleta zipo kuŋanda ya-Jehova twakuta kulya mane twaleka, nkaambo Jehova wapa bantu bakwe coolwe, lino zintu ezi zinji nzenzizyo zisyeede,
Elyo Hezekiya wakalailila kuti babambe ziyobwedo muŋanda yaJehova, Nkabela bakazibamba,
banjizya mulinzizyo zituuzyo acipanzi cakumi cazintu zisalala, Bakacita cakusyomeka. Silutwe wabo kali Kononiya mu-Levi, awabili kali Simei munyina.

Abalo Jeili a-Azaziya a-­Nahati a-Asahaeli a-Jerimoti a-Jozabadi a-Elieli a-Ismakiya a-Mahati a-Benaya, boonse bakali basilutwe mumaanza aa-Kononiya a-Simei munyina, mbubakalailila mwami Hezekiya a-Azariya silutwe waganda ya-Leza.
Nkabela Kore mwana wa-Yimna mu-Levi, sikulindila mulyango wakujwe, nguwakali kulanga zipo zya-Leza. Wakali kwaaba zipaizyo zya-Jehova azintu zisalalisya.
Akunsi lyakwe kali Edeni, a-Minjamini, a-Jeshua, a-Semaya, a-Amariya, a-Sekaniya, muminzi yabapaizi. Mbombabo ibakapegwa milimo yakupa bakwabo zyaabilo. Boonse buyo bakapegwa, bapati abaniini,
kutaamba mweelwe wabaalumi, boonse ibakajisi myaka yotatwe nanka kwiinda, nkukuti boonse ibakali kunjila muŋanda ya-Jehova buzuba bumwi abumwi kukumana milimo kunkamu zyabo mbubakaabilwa;
mweelwe wabapaizi munzubo zyabo, aba-Levi ibakajisi myaka iili makumi obile nanka kwiinda mbubakaabilwa milimo munkamu zyabo;
amweelwe wabana babo boonse abanakazi babo, abana babo balombe, abana babo basimbi, mumbungano yoonse, nkaambo bakalisalazya calusinizyo;
abana ba-Aroni bapaizi, mumyuunda yatunzuunzi twaminzi yabo, mumunzi umwi aumwi. Abo bantu balembedwe kujulu mbobakapa baalumi boonse bapaizi zyaabilo, amweelwe woonse waba-Levi.
Kufumbwa milimo njaakatalika kukugwasya iŋanda yaLeza, mumulao amumilazye, kukuyandaula Leza wakwe, wakaicita camoyo woonse, aboobo wakajana coolwe.
Lino Hezekiya naakabona kuti Sanakeribu wasika, alimwi moyo wakwe ulakanza kulwisya Jerusalemu,
wakabuzyanya makani abapati bakwe abasilumamba bakwe kuti basinke maanzi aakasensa ikakali anze lyamunzi, nkabela bakamugwasya.
Kwakayoboloka bantu banji, elyo bakasinka tusensa toonse akalonga ikakali kukunka akati kacisi. Bakati, Sa ncibotu kuti bami ba-Asuri basika bajane maanzi manji?
­Alimwi wakaliyumya, wayakulula bulambo boonse ibwakamwaika, wabusisya kumaanda malamfu, wayaka bulambo abumwi anze, wamamika Milo munzi wa-Davida, akupanga masumo antobo zinji loko.
Nkabela wakabikila bantu basilutwe bankondo, elyo wakababunganya nkwakabede kumugwagwa wamulyango wamunzi akubaambila majwi mabotu aakuti,
Amuliyumye akuba basinguzu. Mutayoowi nikuba kukankama kubusyu bwamwami waAsuri abantu banji mbali abo, nkaambo mbotuli abo mbanji kwiinda mbajisi walo.
Walo ulijisi kuboko kwanyama buyo, anukuti iswe, Jehova Leza wesu nguutugwasya akulwa munkondo zyesu. Nkabela bantu bakasyoma majwi aa-Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Sanakeribu mwami wa-Asuri. Ncinzi ncimusyoma? Mucikalilanzi mu-Jerusalemu nimwasinkinizigwa?
Sa Hezekiya tana kumukombelezya kulyaaba kufwa inzala akufwa nyota, mbwaamba kuti, Jehova Leza wesu uyootuvuna mumaanza aamwami waAsuri?

Sa Jehova teensi nguwe Hezekiya iwakagwisya zikombelo zyakwe zyakuzilundu azipaililo zyakwe? Sa tana kwaambila Juda a-Jerusalemu kuti, Muleelede kukotama kucipaililo comwe luzutu akutenta tununkilizyo alincico?
Sa tamuzi ncindacita, mebo abatata, kubantu boonse bamasi? Sa mizimu yabantu bamasi yakakonzya kuvuna zisi zyayo na buniini mumaanza aangu?
Nguli akati kamizimu yazisi ezi zyoonse bamatata nzibakanyonyoona iwakakonzya kuvuna bantu bakwe mumaanza aangu? Lino Leza wanu uyoomuvuna buti mumaanza aangu?

Hezekiya atamweeni nikuba kumukombelezya muciyanza eci. Mutamusyomi pe, nkaambo taakwe Leza naba omwe akati kamisyobo yoonse azisi zyoonse iwakakonzya kuvuna bantu bakwe kumaanza aangu akumaanza aabamatata. Alakwe Leza wanu takooyoovuna ndinywe mumaanza aangu.
Amajwi amwi aali boobo bazike bakwe bakaamba cakusampaula Jehova Leza a-Hezekiya mulanda wakwe.

Alimwi wakalemba magwalo aakusampaula Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli akumuseka. Wakati, Mbubonya mizimu yabamasi mbuyakakacilwa kuvuna bantu bayo mumaanza aangu, alakwe Leza wa-Hezekiya takooyoovuna bantu bakwe mumaanza aangu.
Nkabela bakakwiila ajwi ipati mumwaambo waba-Juda akwaambila bantu baJerusalemu ibakakede abulambo, kuti babayoosye akubapilinganya, kuti bazunde munzi.
Bakaamba aa-Leza wa-Jerusalemu mbubonya mbubakaamba aabaleza babamasi ibakacitwa kumaanza aabantu.
Nkaambo kako mwami Hezekiya amusinsimi Isaya mwana wa-Amozi bakakomba akukwiilila Leza wakujulu.

Mpawo Jehova wakatuma angelo, wajaya boonse basilumamba abasilutwe abapati mumalabba aamwami wa-Asuri, aboobo wakapiluka ansoni kucisi cakwe, Nkabela naakanjila muŋanda yamuzimu wakwe, bana bakwe bazwa mumala aakwe mwini bakamujazya ipanga nkukonya oko.
Mbuboobo Jehova mbwaakavuna Hezekiya abantu boonse ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu kumaanza aa-Sanakeribu mwami wa-Asuri akumaanza aabasinkondonyina boonse, Wakabeenzya koonse koonse.
Nkabela bantu banji bakaleta zipo kuli-Jehova kujerusalemu azintu ziyandisi kuli-Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda. Elyo kuzwa kuciindi eco wakasumpulwa mumeso aabamasi boonse.
Pele Hezekiya wakabisya, nkaambo takwakalumbisya milimo iigambya njaakacitilwa, nkaambo moyo wakwe wakasumpulwa, Nkaambo kako bukali bwakasika kulinguwe akucisi ca-Juda aku-Jerusalemu,
Nekubaboobo Hezekiya wakalibombya kukulisumpula kwakwe, walo abantu ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu, aboobo bukali bwa-Jehova teebwakabasikila Hezekiya naakacili kupona.
Nkabela Hezekiya kajisi buvubi abulemu bunji loko, Lino wakalicitila ziyobwedo zyansiliva azyangolida azyamabwe mayandisi azyamisamu azyantobo azyazibelesyo zyakubotezya zyoonse,
amatala aakubika micelo amaila awaini amafuta, amaanda aaŋombe zyoonse, azimpati zyambelele.
Alimwi wakaliyakila minzi akuvuba imbelele aŋombe zinji loko, nkaambo Leza wakamupa imbono zinji loko.
Oyu Hezekiya nguwenya nguwakasinka mapolelo aamaanzi aakujulu aaku-Gihoni akwaalulamya kubbazu lyakumbo lyamunzi wa-Davida, Hezekiya wakajana coolwe muncito zyakwe zyoonse.
Pele mumakani aabatumwa babapati ba-Babuloni ibakamutumina kuti babuzye makani aacintu cigambya icakacitwa munyika yakwe, mumakani aya Leza wakamuleka, kuti amusunke, azibe miyeeyo yamumoyo wakwe,
Lino Hezekiya naakafwa, bakamuzika mutubanda tubotu twabana ba-Davida, Ba-Juda boonse abantu baku-Jerusalemu bakamulemeka kulufu lwakwe, Elyo mwanaakwe Manase nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Waka­ cita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbuli zisesemyo zyabamasi Jehova mbaakatanda kubusyu bwabana ba-Israyeli.
Ngonguwe wakayakulula zikombelo zyakuzilundu Hezekiya wisi nzyaakamwayide, alimwi wakabusya zipaililo zyababaala akucita zisamu zya-Aseroti, akukomba makamu makamu aakujulu akwaamanina milimo.
Wakayaka zipaililo muŋanda ya-Jehova njaakaamba Jehova kuti, Mu-Jerusalemu moliyooba izina lyangu lyoonse.
Wakayakila makamu oonse aakujulu zipaililo mumabanza obile aaŋanda ya-Jehova.
Wakainzya bana bakwe mumulilo mukuti lyamwana waHinomu. Wakali kusonda akulowa, alimwi wakali kubelesya balozi abasondi. Wakacita bubi bunji mumeso aa-Jehova akumukalazya.

Nkabela wakabika cikozyano cibezedwe ncaakapanga muŋanda ya-Leza, njenjiyo iŋanda Leza njaakaambila Davida a-Solomoni mwana wakwe kuti, Muŋanda eyi amuJerusalemu ngundisalide akati kamisyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli njoobika izina lyangu lyoonse.

Nsikooyoogwisya limbi maulu aaba-Israyeli munyika njindakabambila bamauso, na bapangika myoyo yabo kukucita zyoonse nzindabalailila, mbuli mulao woonse amilazyo yoonse ambeta zyoonse nzindakabapa kumulomo wa-Musa.
Pele Manase wakaleesya ba-Juda abantu baku-Jerusalemu, mane lumwi bakacita bubi kwiinda bamasi Jehova mbaakatandide kubusyu bwaba-Israyeli,
Nkaambo kako Jehova wakababusizya bapati basilumamba bamwami wa-Asuri, nkabela bakajata Manase amamvwa, bamwaanzya insimbi, bamutola ku-Babuloni.
Lino naakali mumapenzi, wakabika moyo wakwe kuli-Jehova Leza wakwe, walibombya loko kubusyu bwa-Leza wabamawisi.
Elyo naakakomba, Leza wakakombelezegwa nguwe, waswiilila cikombyo cakwe, wamupilusya ku-Jerusalemu kubwami bwakwe. Mpawo Manase wakaziba kuti Jehova ngu-Leza.
Nkabela wakagwisya baleza beenzu azikozyano zyamituni muŋanda ya-Jehova, azipaililo zyoonse nzyaakayakide mucilundu caŋanda ya-Jehova amu-Jerusalemu, wazisowa anze lyamunzi.
Elyo wakayaka cipaililo ca-Jehova, watuula alincico zituuzyo zyakutontozya azilumbyo, nkabela wakaambila ba-Juda kuti beelede kukomba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Lino bantu bakacili kupaila kuzipaililo zyakuzilundu, pele kabakomba Jehova Leza wabo luzutu.
Lino makani amwi aa-Manase, acikombyo ncaakakombela Leza wakwe, amajwi aabalunguluzi ibakamwaambila muzina lya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, alilembedwe mubbuku lyabami ba-Israyeli.

Acalo cikombyo cakwe, amakani aa-Leza mbwaakakombelezegwa nguwe, azibi zyakwe, amilandu yakwe, amasena nkwaakayaka zipaililo zyakuzilundu, ankwaakaimika zisamu zya-Asera azikozyano zyamituni naatakalina kulibombya, zyoonse zililembedwe mumajwi aabalunguluzi.
Elyo Manase naakafwa, bakamuzika muŋanda yakwe, nkabela mwanaakwe Amoni nguwakalya izina lyakwe.
Amoni kajisi myaka iili makumi obile aibili naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myaka yobile.
Wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbwaakacita wisi Manase. Zikozyano zyoonse nzyaakacita Manase wisi, Amoni wakazikomba akuzimanina milimo.
Takwakalibombya kubusyu bwa-Jehova mbwaakalibombya Manase wisi. Amoni nguwakabisya cakwiinda.
Elyo bazike bakwe bakamuvwiya, bamujaya muŋanda yakwe.
Nkabela bantu bacisi bakajaya boonse ibakavwiya mwami Amoni, bakaaba bwami bwakwe mumaanza aa-Josiya mwanaakwe.
Wakacita ziluleme mumeso aa-Jehova. Wakeenda munzila zya-Davida wisi, takwakaleya pe, nikuba kululyo nikuba kulumwensi.

Mumwaka wamusanu aitatu wabwami bwakwe, naakacili mwanike, wakatalika kuyandaula Leza wa-Davida wisi, nkabela mumwaka wakumi aibili wakatalika kusalazya Juda a-Jerusalemu akumwaya zipaililo zyakuzilundu azisamu zyaAsera azikozyano zibezedwe azikozyano zifulidwe.

Bakamwaya zipaililo zyababaala kubusyu bwakwe, azikozyano zyazuba izyakali alinzizyo wakazigonka, azisamu zya-Asera azikozyano aziimikilo zyoonse wakazipwayisya, wazisansaila atubanda twabaabo ibakazipailila.
Azyalo zifuwa zyabapaizi wakazitenta azipaililo zyabo, aboobo wakasalazya cisi ca-Juda a-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela wakacita mbubonya obo muminzi ya-Manase aya-Efraimu ayaSimeoni akusikila ku-Nafatali atunzuunzi twayo tweengelede.
Elyo naakamana kumwaya zipaililo azisamu zya-Asera akupwayisya zikozyano akugonka zikozyano zyazuba munyika yoonse ya-Israyeli, wakapiluka ku-Jerusalemu.

Nkabela nibakasika kuli-Hilikiya mupaizi mupati, bakamupa mali aakaletwa muŋanda ya-Leza, ba-Levi basikulindila mulyango ngebakabunganya kuzwa kumaanza aaba-Manase aba-Efraimu abantu boonse basyeede ba-Israyeli akumaanza aaboonse ba-Juda aba-Benjamini, elyo bakapiluka ku-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela bakapa basimilimo ibakali kulanga iŋanda ya-Jehova. Bakapa basimilimo ibakali kubeleka muŋanda ya-Jehova, kuti bamamike akuyumya iŋanda.
Bakapa bafuzi abayaki, kuti baule mabwe aabezedwe azisamu zyakuswanaanya, bamate maanda bami ba-Juda ngebakanyonyoona.

Nkabela bantu bakabeleka cakusyomeka. Basilutwe babo ibakababelesya mbaaba: Jahati a-Obadiya ba-Levi babana ba-Merari, a-Zekariya a-Mesulamu babana ba-Kohati ibakalanga makani, aba-Levi boonse ibakabwene zibelesyo zyakwiimbya.
Bakali kulanga basikuyumuna mikuli abaabo ibakabeleka milimo yamisyobo misyobo. Alimwi akati kaba-Levi kakuli balembi abasilutwe abasimilyango.
Mpawo Hilikiya wakavuwa, waambila Safani mulembi kuti, Ndajana ibbuku lyamulao muŋanda ya-Jehova. Nkabela Hilikiya wakapa ibbuku mumaanza aa-Safani.
Elyo Safani wakaleta ibbuku kumwami, alimwi wakaboozezya mwami ijwi lyakuti, Milimo yoonse iyakabikwa mumaanza aabalanda bako balaicita,
Alimwi bagwisya mali aakajanwa muŋanda yaJehova, baapa mumaanza aabasilutwe amumaanza aabasimilimo.
Mpawo Safani mulembi wakalwiida mwami kuti, Hilikiya mupaizi wandipa ibbuku, Nkabela Safani wakalibala mumatwi aamwami.
Nkabela mwami wakalailila Hilikiya a-Ahikamu mwana waSafani a-Abidoni mwana wa-Mika a-Safani mulembi a-Asaya muzike wamwami kuti,

Kamuya, mukabuzye makani kuli-Jehova, makani aangu amakani aabantu basyeede ba-Israyeli aba-Juda, nkaambo kamajwi aabbuku ilyakajanwa, nkaambo bwakomena bukali bwa-Jehova bulembedwe aandiswe, nkaambo bamatata tabana kubamba ijwi lya-Jehova, tabana kucita zyoonse zilembedwe mubbuku eli.
Elyo wakabavwiila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Amwaambile oyo muntu iwakamutuma kulindime kuti,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Amubone! Ndaleta mapenzi kubusena obuno akubantu bakede mulimbubo, nkukuti matusi oonse aalembedwe mubbuku ndibabalide mumatwi aamwami waJuda.
Mbuli mbubandileka akutentela mizimu myeenzu tununkilizyo kukundikalazya kumilimo yoonse yamaanza aabo, bukali bwangu buyootilwa mpoonya ano, tabukooyoolesegwa pe.
Lino oyo mwami wa-Juda iwakamutuma kukubuzya makani aa-Jehova, mbuboobu mbumweelede kumwaambila. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli aamajwi ayo ngomvwide.

Mbuli moyo wako mbuwakali mutete, alimwi wakalibombya kubusyu bwa-Leza niwakateelela majwi aakwe ngaamba aabusena obuno abantu bakede mulimbubo, mbuli mbolibombya akudeluula zyakusama zyako akulila kubusyu bwangu, lino ambebo ndamvwa, mbwaamba Jehova.
Bona! Ndakusisya kucikalilo cabauso, Uyoosika kukabanda kako caluumuno. Meso aako taakooyoobona mapenzi oonse ngenti lete kubusena obuno akubantu bakede mulimbubo. Elyo bakatola aya makani kumwami.

Nkabela mwami wakainka kuŋanda ya-Jehova, abantu boonse ba-Juda, abantu ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu, abapaizi aba-Levi, abantu boonse buyo nibababa bapati nibaba baniini. Elyo wakabala mumatwi­ aabo majwi oonse aabbuku lyacizuminano ilyakajanwa muŋanda yaJehova.

Nkabela mwami wakaima mpoonya awo, watanga cizuminano kubusyu bwa-Jehova, wasyomezya kweenda munzila zya-Jehova, akubamba milazyo yakwe amilao yakwe ambeta zyakwe, camoyo woonse acamuuya woonse, akucita makani aacizuminano aalembedwe omo mubbuku.
Wakazuminya boonse ibakajanwa mu-Jerusalemu amucisi ca-Benjamini, nkabela bantu ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu bakacita mbubonya mbukulembedwe mucizuminano ca-Leza, Leza wabamawisi.

Lino Josiya wakagwisya zisesemyo zyoonse muzisi zyoonse zyabana ba-Israyeli, abantu boonse ibakajanwa mu-Israyeli wakababelesya milimo ya-Jehova Leza wabo. Mazuba oonse ngaakapona teebakaleka kutobela Jehova Leza wabamawisi.
Nkabela wakabamba bapaizi munkamu zyabo, alimwi wakabayumya mumilimo yaŋanda ya-Jehova.

Wakaambila ba-Levi ibakali kwiisya ba-Israyeli boonse, ibakasalala kuli-Jehova, kuti, Amubike ibbokesi lisalalisya muŋanda njaakayaka Solomoni mwana wa-Davida mwami waIsrayeli. Talyeelede kuba mukuli aziwezo zyanu. Amucite milimo yaJehova Leza wanu ayabantu bakwe ba-Israyeli.
Alimwi amulibambe munzubo zyabamauso, munkamu zyanu, mbubonya mbwaakalemba Davida mwami wa-Israyeli, ambwaakalemba Solomoni mwanaakwe.
Lino amwiime mubusena busalala munkamu zyanzubo zyabamauso azyabantu bakwanu, inzubo zyaba-Levi mbuzyaandaanisigwa.
Lino amujaye banyama ba-Pasika, mulisalazye akubamba bakwanu, kuti bacite mbubonya Jehova mbwaakaamba kumulomo wa-Musa,

Abalo basilutwe bakwe bakapa bantu abapaizi aba-Levi cakukondwa. Hilikiya a-Zekariya a-Jehieli, basilutwe baŋanda ya-Leza, bakapa bapaizi banyama ba-Pasika bali zyuulu zyobile amyanda iili musanu aumwi, abasune bali myanda yotatwe.
Alakwe Kananaya, a Semayahu a-Netaneli banyina, a-Hasabiya a-Jcili a-Jozabada, bapati baba-Levi, bakapa ba-Levi zipaizyo zya-Pasika zili zyuulu zyosanwe abasune bali myanda yosenwe.
Mpawo bakajaya banyama ba-Pasika, nkabela bapaizi bakasansaila bulowa amaanza aabo, abalo ba-Levi bakabafunda.
Bakagwisya zipaizyo kuti bazipe mbubonya mbuli zyaabilo zyanzubo zyabantu, baletele Jehova zituuzyo mbubonya mbukulembedwe mubbuku lya-Musa. Abalo basune bakabacitila mbubonya.
Lino nyama ya-Pasika bakaiyoka mumulilo mbubonya mbuli ciyanza ceelede, pele zipaizyo zimwi zisalala bakazijika muzibiya amumabbodo amuzilongo, bafwambaana kuzyaabila bantu boonse.

Kusule lyayaaya bakalibambila beni akubambila bapaizi, nkaambo bapaizi bana ba-Aroni bakapakasya kumakani aazipaizyo amakani aamafuta mane kusikila masiku, nciceeco ba-Levi ncibakalibambila beni abapaizi bana ba-Aroni boonse.

Abalo basikwiimba bana ba-Asafu bakali mumasena aabo mbubonya mbwaakalailila Davida a-Asafu a-Hemani a-Jedutuni sicilengano wamwami. Abalo basimilyango bakali kulindila kumulyango umwi aumwi, teebakaleka abuniini milimo yabo, nkaambo bakwabo ba-Levi bakababambila.
Aboobo milimo yoonse ya-Jehova yakabambwa mubuzuba obo kuti balye Pasika akutuula zipaizyo acipaililo ca-Jehova, mbubonya mbwaakalailila mwami Josiya.
Bana ba-Israyeli boonse ibakajanwa bakaiya ipobwe lya-Pasika kuciindi eco, apobwe lyazinkwa zitakwe bumena mazuba aali musanu aabili.

Katakwe ipobwe lya-Pasika lielene alyo ilyakacitwa mucisi ca-Israyeli kuzwa kumazuba aa-Samuele musinsimi. Abalo bami boonse ba-Israyeli, katakwe naba omwe akati kabo iwakacita ipobwe lya-Pasika mbuli mbwaakacita Josiya, abapaizi aba-Levi, aboonse bantu ba-Juda aba-Israyeli ibakajanwa, abantu ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu.
EH ipobwe lyakaligwa mumwaka wakumi amusanu aitatu wabwami bwaJosiya.

Elyo wakamutumina batumwa, wati, Tulijisi makaninzi ayebo, O mwami wa-Juda? Teensi nduwe ngunjanda kulwisya sunu, ndeza kukulwisya luzubo lwabasinkondoma. Leza wandilailila kufwambaana. Leka kupilinganya makani aa-Leza ngundi awe, kuti atakunyonyooni.
Nekubaboobo josiya wakakaka kupiluka, wakalyeneenya kuti akamulwisye, takwakamvwa majwi aa-Neko aakazwa kumulomo wa-Leza, pele wakasika kukumulwisya mukuti lya-Megido.
Elyo basimata bakafusa mwami Josiya, nkabela mwami wakaambila balanda bakwe kuti, Amundigwisye, nkaambo ndayaswa loko.

Mpawo balanda bakwe bakamugwisya mumindando yankondo, bamutantika ankalaki yabili njaakajisi, bamusisya ku-Jerusalemu, nkabela wakafwa. Lino bakamuzika mutubanda twabamawisi. Nkabela ba-Juda boonse abantu baku-Jerusalemu bakali kulila Josiya.
Lino makani amwi aa-Josiya, aluzyalo lwakwe, aakali mbuli bulembedwe mubbuku lyamulao wa-Jehova,
amajwi aakwe, mataanzi amasyaalizi, oonse alilembedwe mubbuku lyabami ba-Israyeli aba-Juda.
Jehoahazi kajisi myaka iili makumi obile aitatu naakaba mwami, nkabela wakeendelezya mu-Jerusalemu myezi yotatwe.
Pele mwami wa-Egepita wakamugwisya mu-Jerusalemu akutezya cisi mutelo wamatalenta aansiliva aali mwanda atalenta lyangolida.

Nkabela mwami wa-Egepita wakabika munyina Eliyakimu kuti abe mwami wa-Juda awa-Jerusalemu, wasandula izina lyakwe, wamuulika izina lyaJehoyakimu. Lino Jehoahazi mupati wakwe, Neko wakamutola, wamusisya ku-Egepita.
Lino kwakeza kuzoomulwisya Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni, wamwaanzya inkeetani akumutola ku-Babuloni.
Azyalo zimwi zibelesyo zyaŋanda ya-Jehova, Nebukadinezara wakazileta ku-Babuloni, wazibika muntempele yakwe mu-Babuloni.
Lino makani amwi aa-Jehoyakimu, azisesemyo nzyaakacita amilandu iyakajanwa mulinguwe, alilembedwe mubbuku lyabami ba-Israyeli aba-Juda, Elyo Jehoyakini mwanaakwe wakulya izina lyakwe.
Lino mumwaka mupya Nebukadinezara wakatuma, wamuleta ku-Babuloni, antoomwe azibelesyo ziyandisi zyaŋanda ya-Jehova. Nkabela Zedekiya mupati wakwe wakamulisya bwami bwa-Juda abwa-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova Leza wakwe. Takwakalibombya kubusyu bwa-Jeremiya musinsimi naakaamba majwi aazwa kumulomo wa-Jehova.
Alimwi wakapapila mwami Nebukadinezara iwakamukonkezya muzina lya-Leza. Wakayumya insingo yakwe akusumpula moyo wakwe kukukaka kupiluka kuli-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Abalo bapati boonse babapaizi abantu bakabisya loko akucita milimo iisesemya yabamasi. Bakasofwaazya iŋanda ya-Jehova njaakasalazya mu-Jerusalemu.
Jehova Leza wabamawisi wakabatumina kumulomo wabatumwa, wafumisya kubatuma, nkaambo wakafwida bantu bakwe acikalilo cakwe luzyalo.
Pele bakali kuseka batumwa ba-Leza, akusampaula majwi aakwe, akubisizya basinsimi bakwe, mane lumwi bukali bwa-Jehova bwakabukila bantu bakwe, elyo katakwe iwakakonzya kubaponya.

Nkabela wakasisya kulimbabo mwami wabaKasidi, wajazya bakubusi babo ipanga muŋanda yacikombelo cabo. Takwakafwida muntu luzyalo, naba mukubusi naba musimbi, naba mudala naba mucembele. Boonse buyo wakabaaba mumaanza aakwe.
Azyalo zibelesyo zyoonse zyaŋanda ya-Leza, niziba zipati niziba ziniini, azintu ziyandisi zyaŋanda zya-Jehova, azintu ziyandisi zyamwami abapati bakwe, wakazigwisya zyoonse, wazitola ku-Babuloni.
Lino bakatenta iŋanda ya-Leza akumwaya bulambo bwa-Jerusalemu. Amaanda oonse aabwami bakaatentya mulilo, akunyonyoona zibelesyo ziyandisi zyao zyoonse.
Abaabo ipanga mbolyakaleka, wakabatola boonse mubuzike ku-Babuloni. Bakaba bazike bakwe, walo abana bakwe, mane lumwi bwakabuka bwami bwa-Persia.

Mbuboobu mbulyakazuzigwa ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaamba kumulomo wa-Jeremiya. Akaba obo mane nyika yakapumuna masabata aayo. Mazuba oonse aakusaalwa, nyika yakalyokezya, mane kusikila myaka iili makumi aali musanu aabili.

Lino mumwaka mutaanzi wabwami bwa-Koresi mwami wa-Persia, kuti lizuzigwe ijwi lya-Jehova ndyaakaamba kumulomo wa-Jeremiya, Jehova wakabusya moyo wa-Koresi mwami wa-Persia, nkabela wakatuma majwi mubwami bwakwe boonse, alimwi wakaalemba, aakuti,

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Koresi mwami wa-Persia. Zisi zyoonse zyaansi, Jehova Leza wakujulu wazyaaba mumaanza aangu. Alimwi wandilailila kumuyakila iŋanda mu-Jerusalemu mucisi ca-Juda, Lino nguni akati kanu wabantu bakwe? Jehova Leza wakwe abe awe. Anyamuke, ainke kulimbabo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Koresi mwami wa-Persia. Zisi zyoonse zyaansi, Jehova Leza wakujulu wazyaaba mumaanza aangu. Alimwi wandilailila kumuyakila iŋanda mu-Jerusalemu mucisi ca-Juda.
Lino nguni akati kanu uuli wabantu bakwe? Leza wakwe abe awe. Anyamuke kuya ku-Jerusalemu mucisi ca-Juda, ayake iŋanda ya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Ngonguwt Leza uukede mu-Jerusalemu.
Kufumbwa uusyaala mumasena oonse nkwaakali kukala-kala, bantu babusena bwakwe bamugwasye insiliva angolida ambono aŋombe azipo zyamoyo zyakugwasya iŋanda ya-Leza yaku-Jerusalemu.
Aboonse ibakeengelede bakayumya maanza aabo, babapa zibelesyo zyansiliva azyangolida, ambono aŋombe azintu ziyandisi, kutaamba zipo zyamoyo izyakaletwa.
Koresi mwami wa-Persia wakazigwisya kujanza lyaMiteridati siziyobwedo, wazibala, wapa Sezibazara silutwe waba-Juda.
Ngooyu mweelwe wazyo: mitiba yangolida iili makumi otatwe, mitiba yansiliva iili cuulu, intibba zili makumi obile amusanu azine,
inkomeki zyangolida zili makumi otatwe, inkomeki zyansiliva zyamusyobo umbi zili myanda yone akumi, azibelesyo zimwi zili cuulu.
Zibelesyo zyoonse, zyangolida azyansiliva, zyakali zyuulu zyosanwe amyanda yone. Ezi zyoonse Sezibazara wakeza azyo naakeza abazike baangulwidwe ibakazwa ku-Babuloni kuya ku-Jerusalemu.
Bakeza a-Zeruba-beli. Mbaaba: Jeshua, Nehemiya, Seraya, Reelaya, Moodekai, Bilisani, Mizipara, Bigvai, Rehumu, a-Baana, Alimwi ngooyu mweelwe wabana ba-Israyeli,
Bana ba-Parosi bakali zyuulu zyobile amwanda amakumi aali musanu aabili ababili.
Bana ba-Sefatiya bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu aabili ababili.
Bana ba-Ara bakali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi aali musanu aabili abasanu.
Bana ba-Pahati-Moabu, nkukuti bana ba-Jeshua aba-Joabu, bakali zyuulu zyobile amyanda iili musanu aitatu akumi ababili.
Bana baku-Elamu bakali cuulu amyanda yobile amakumi osanwe abane,
Bana ba-Zatu bakali myanda iili musanu aine amakumi one abasanu.
Bana ba-Zakai bakali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi aali musanu alimwi.
Bana ba-Bani bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi one ababili.
Bana ba-Bebai bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi obile abatatu.
Bana ba-Azigadi bakali cuulu amyanda yobile amakumi obile ababili.
Bana ba-Adonikamu bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu aumwi.
Bana ba-Bigvai bakali zyuulu zyobile amakumi osanwe amusanu aumwi.
Bana ba-Adini bakali myanda yone amakumi osanwe abane,
Bana ba-Ateri, ba-Hezekiya, bakali makumi aali musanu aane amusanu abane.
Bana ba-Bezai bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi obile abatatu.
Bana ba-Jora bakali mwanda akumi ababili.
Bana ba-Hasumu bakali myanda yobile amakumi obile abatatu,
Bana baku-Gibara bakali makumi aali musanu aane abasanu.
Bana baku-Betelehemu bakali mwanda amakumi obile abatatu,
Bantu baku-Netofa bakali makumi osanwe amusanu aumwi.
Bantu ba-ku-Anatotu bakali mwanda amakumi obile amusanu aba ta tu.
Bana ba-Azmaveti bakali makumi one ababili.
Bana baku-Kiriati-arimu a-Kefira a-Beeroti bakali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi one abatatu.
Bana ba-Rama a-Geba bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi obile aumwi.
Bantu baku-Mikimasi bakali mwanda amakumi obile ababili.
Bantu baku-Beteli aba-Ai bakali myanda yobile amakumi obile abatatu.
Bana baku-Nebo bakali makumi osanwe ababili.
Bana ba-Magabisi bakali mwanda amakumi osanwe amusanu aumwi.
Bana baku-Elamu umbi bakali cuulu amyanda yobile amakumi osanwe abane,
Bana baHarimu bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi obile.
Bana baku-Lodi a-Hadidi a-Ono bakali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi obile amusanu.
Bana baku-Jeriko bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi one amusanu.
Bana ba-Senaa bakali zyuulu zyotatwe amyanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi otatwe,
Bana ba-Imeri bakali cuulu amakumi osanwe ababili.
Bana ba-Pasuri bakali cuulu amyanda yobile amakumi one amusanu ababili.
Bana ba-Harimu bakali cuulu akumi amusanu ababili,
Abasikwiimba, bana ba-Asafu, bakali mwanda amakumi obile amusanu abatatu,
Abana babasimilyango mbaaba: bana ba-Salumu, bana ba-Ateri, bana ba-Talimoni, bana ba-Akubu, bana ba-Hatita, bana ba-Sobai, boonse bakali mwanda amakumi otatwe amusanu abane.
bana ba-Kerosi, bana ba-Siaha, bana ba-Padoni,
bana ba-Lebana, bana ba-Hagaba, bana ba-Akubu,
bana ba Hagaba, bana baSalimai, bana ba-Hanani,
bana ba-Gideli, bana ba-Gahari, bana baReaya,
bana ba-Rezini, bana ba-Nekoda, bana ba-Gazamu,
bana ba-Uza, bana ba-Paseya, bana ba-Besai,
bana ba-Asina, bana ba-Meunimu, bana ba-Nefusimu,
bana ba-Bakibuki, bana ba-Ha kufa, bana ba-Harihuri,
bana ba-Baziluti, bana ba-Mehida, bana ba-Harisa,
bana ba-Barikosi, bana ba-Sisera, bana ba-Tamaki,
bana ba-Neziya, bana ba-Hatifa.
bana ba-Jaala, bana ba-Darikoni, bana ba-Gideli,
bana ba-Sefatiya, bana ba-Hatili, bana ba-Pokereti waku-Zebaimu, bana ba-Ami,
Ba-Netinimu abana babazike ba-Solomoni boonse bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu aane ababili.
Alimwi mbaaba ibakainka kuzwa ku-Telemela aku-Teleharisa aku-Kerubi aku-Adana aku-Imeri, pele teebakakonzya kutondezya luzubo lwabo amukowa wabo, kuti kuzibwe na mbana ba-Israyeli:
bana ba-Delaya, bana ba-Tobiya, bana ba-Nekoda; bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi osanwe ababili.
Aba bakayandaula ibbuku lyaluzubo lwabo, pele teebakajanwa, aboobo bakagwisigwa mubupaizi mbuli basofweede.
Silutwe wakabaambila kuti tabeelede kulya zintu zisalalisya mane kubuke mupaizi uujisi Urimu a-Tumimu.

nkutaamba bazike babo abazike basimbi babo, ibakali zyuulu zili musanu azibili amyanda yotatwe amakumi otatwe amusanu ababili. Alimwi akati kabo kakuli basikwiimba, baalumi abanakazi, bali myanda yobile.
Imbizi zyabo zyakali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi otatwe amusanu aimwi. Imbongolo zyabo impati zyakali myanda yobile amakumi one amusanu,
Inkamele zyabo zyakali myanda yone amakumi otatwe amusanu. Imbongolo zyabo zyakali zyuulu zili musanu acimwi amyanda iili musanu aibili amakumi obile.

Bakapa mbubakakonzya, nkabela muciyobwedo camilimo mwakabikwa tupondo twangolida tuli zyuulu zili makumi aali musanu alimwi acimwi, ampondo zyansiliva zili zyuulu zyosanwe, azikobela zyabupaizi zili mwanda.
Elyo bapaizi aba-Levi abamwi bantu abasikwiimba abasimilyango aba-Netinimu bakaakukala muminzi yabo, Ba-Israyeli boonse bakakala muminzi yabo.
Lino mwezi wamusanu aibili niwakasika, bana ba-Israyeli nibakali muminzi, bantu boonse bakabungana camoyo omwe ku-Jerusalemu.

Mpawo wakanyampuka Jeshua mwana wa-Jozadaki, abakwabo bapaizi, a-Zerubabeli mwana wa-Sealitiyeli, abakwabo, nkabela bakayaka cipa ili lo ca-Leza wa-Israyeli, kuti batuule zipaizyo alincico mbubonya mbukulembedwe mumulao wa-Musa muntu wa-Leza.
Bakaimika cipaililo aziimikilo zyaco, nkaambo bakali kuyoowa bantu bamasi, elyo bakatuulila Jehova zipaizyo alincico, zipaizyo zyacifumo azyamangolezya.
Alimwi bakacita ipobwe lyazilao mbukulembedwe, akutuula mweelwe uuleede wazipaizyo mazuba oonse, mbubonya mbuli ciyanza cabuzuba bumwi abumwi mbucilaililwa,
Elyo kusule lyayaaya bakali kutuula zipaizyo lyoonse, zipaizyo zyamwezi mupya azyamapobwe aasalazidwe aa-Jehova, azipaizyo zyamoyo bantu boonse nizibakaletela Jehova.
Mubuzuba butaanzi bwamwezi wamusanu aibili bakatalika kutuulila Jehova zipaizyo, pele intalisyo yantempele ya-Jehova teeyakayakwa.

Nkabela bakabapa mali bayaki ababezi, abantu ba-Sidoni aba-Turo, baka bapa zilyo azyakunywa amafuta kuti balete misamu yakedari kuzwa ku-Lebano kulwizi kusikila ku-Jopa, mbubonya mbubakagwasigwa kuli-Koresi mwami wa-Persia.
Elyo kwakanyampuka Jeshua abana bakwe abakwabo a-Kadimiyeli abana bakwe bana ba-Juda, bakaima antoomwe, kuti babelesye basimilimo muŋanda ya-Leza: bana ba-Henadadi abana babo abakwabo ba-Levi.

Lino bayaki nibakatalika kuyaka intempele yaJehova, bakabika bapaizi, balisamine zikobela zyabo, balijisi myeembo, aba-Levi bana ba-Asafu, balijisi tuntimbwa, kuti batembaule Jehova, mbubonya mbwaakalailila Davida mwami wa-Israyeli.

Nkabela baka-vwillana mukwiimba, mukutembaula akulumba Jehova, nkaambo mubotu, luzyalo lwakwe ndwafwida ba-Israyeli talumani. Elyo bantu boonse bakoonzomoka loonzomoko lupati lwakutembaula Jehova, nkaambo kakuti intalisyo yaŋanda ya-Jehova yakabikwa.
Pele bantu banji akati kabapaizi aba-Levi abapati banzubo, baalu ibakabwene iŋanda intaanzi, iŋanda eyi niyakatalikwa mumeso aabo, bakalila kulila kupati. Lino banji bakoompolola cakukondwa,
aboobo bantu teebakakonzya kupambukanya ijwi lyakoompolola kwakukondwa ajwi lyakulila kwabantu, nkaambo bantu bakoompolola aloompololo lupati, mane ijwi lyakamvwigwa kule loko.
Lino basinkondonyina ba-Juda aba-Benjamini, nibakamvwa kuti bana babuzike bali mukuyakila Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli intempele,

bakeza kuli-Zerubabeli abapati banzubo, babaambila kuti, Atuyake anywe, nkaambo aswebo tulayandaula Leza wanu mbubonya mbuli ndinywe, pele tatuna kumutuulila zipaizyo kuzwa kumazuba aa-Esarihadoni mwami wa-Asuri iwakatusisya okuno.

Mpawo Zerubabeli a-Jeshua abamwi bapati banzubo zya-Israyeli bakabaambila kuti, Tatujisi makani anywebo mukuyakila Leza wesu iŋanda. Tulayakila Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli tubeni, mbubonya mwami Koresi mwami wa-Persia mbwaakatulailila.
Elyo bantu bacisi bakatalika kulesya maanza aabantu ba-Juda milimo, akubakataazya mukuyaka.
Nkabela bakalyuulila basikubagwasya kukujaya makanze aabo. Bakali kucita obo mazuba oonse Koresi mwami wa-Persia naakapona, mane lumwi Dariyo wakaba mwami wa-Persia,
Elyo mubwami bwa-Ahasuera, kumatalikilo aabwami bwakwe, bakalemba lugwalo lwakubikila bantu ba-Juda abakuJerusalemu kaambo.
Mumazuba aa-Aritasasta, Bisilamu, a-Miteridati a-Tabeeli abamwi beenzinyina bakalembela Aritasasta mwami wa-Persia lugwalo. Olo lugwalo lwakalembwa muci-Aramu akupandululwa muci-Aramu.
Rehumu simutelo a-Simisai mulembi mbobakalembela mwami Aritasasta lugwalo lwakubikila Jerusalemu kaambo. Mbuboobu mbubakalemba.
Bakalemba Rehumu simutelo a-Simisai mulembi abamwi beenzinyina, ba-Dinai aba-Afarisatikai aba-Tarapeli aba-Afarisai aba-Arekavai aba-Babuloni aba-Susanekai aba-Dehavi aba-Elami,
abamwi bamasi mwami mupati mulemu Asinapara mbaakatola mubuzike akubabika muminzi yaSamariya, abamwi ibakali okuno kutala lyamulonga, kuciindi caambwa.
Mbuboobu mbulwakaamba lugwalo ndubakamutumina, nkukuti ndubakatumina mwami Aritasasta.
Ndiswe bazike bako bakede okuno kutala lyamulonga kuciindi caambwa.
Kuzibwe kumwami kuti ba-Juda ibakazwa kulinduwe kuza okuno kulindiswe basika ku-Jerusalemu, lino balayaka munzi mubi uupapila, Baliyakide malambo, azyalo intalisyo baliziside.
Lino kuzibwe kumwami kuti, na oyu munzi wayakwa, amalambo aawo na aimikwa, tabakooyoopa mutelo na musonko, aboobo uyoobisizya ziyobwedo zyamwami.
Lino mbutujisi malelo aazwa kuŋanda yamwami, alimwi takweelede kuti tubone kusampaulwa kwamwami, nciceeco ncitwatumina kukulwiida mwami,

kuti makani alingulwe mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi aabamauso. Omo mubbuku uyoojana makani, uyooziba kuti oyu munzi ngumunzi uupapila, uubisizya bami azisi. Kalekale bakabusya inkondo mumunzi oyu. Nciceeco munzi nciwakamwayilwa.
Iswe tulazibya mwami kuti, na oyu munzi wayakwa, alimwi na malambo aawo aimikwa, nkukwaamba kuti tokooyooba acaabilo niciba comwe muzisi zyakookuno kutala lyamulonga.
Mpoonya awo mwami wakatumina Rehumu simutelo a-Simisai mulembi abamwi beenzinyina ibakakede mu-Samariya abamwi ibakali kutala lyamulonga, wati, Ndamujuzya kuciindi ecino.
Lugwalo ndumwakatutumina lwakabalwa akupandululwa kubusyu bwangu.
Lino ndakalailila, nkabela makani akalingulwa. Kwajanwa kuti kuciindi cakalekale oyu munzi wakabusizya bami inkondo. Mulinguwo mwakacitwa kupapila alupyopyongano.
Alimwi mu-Jerusalemu mwakali bami basinguzu, ibakeendelezya zisi zyoonse zyakutala lyamulonga. Bakapegwa mutelo amusonko.
Lino amulailile bantu aba kuti baleke. Oyu munzi tuuelede kuyakwa mane kuzwe ijwi kulindime.
Amucenjele, mutalubi kucita obo. Sa ncibotu kuti bubi buvule kukubisizya bami?
Mbuboobo milimo yaŋanda ya-Leza yaku-Jerusalemu mbuyakaleka. Yakaleka mane kusikila kumwaka wabili wabwami bwa-Dariyo mwami wa-Persia.
Mpawo Zerubabeli mwana wa-Sealitiyeli a-Jeshua mwana wa-Jozadaki bakanyampuka, batalika kuyaka iŋanda ya-Leza mu-Jerusalemu, abalo basinsimi ba-Leza bakali abo akubagwasya.
Nkabela bakabavwiila kuti, Ino mbobani mazina aabo, bantu bayaka iŋanda eyi?
Pele liso lya-Leza wabo lyakali kulanga bapati ba-Juda, aboobo teebakakonzya kubalesya, mane lumwi makani akasika kuli-Dariyo. Elyo bakatuma lugwalo lwakwaamba makani aya.
Bakamutumina lugwalo lwakwaamba kuti, Kuli-Dariyo mwami. Twakujuzya.
Mwami azibe kuti twakasika kucisi ca-Juda, kuŋanda ya-Leza mupati iili mukuyasigwa mabwe mapati, alimwi zisamu zili mukubikwa mumalambo. Eyi milimo ilafwambaana kucitwa, ilaya kunembo mumaanza aabo.
Mpawo twakabuzya abo bapati. Twakabaambila kuti, Ino nguni wakamulailila kuyaka iŋanda eyi akwiimika malambo aya?
Alimwi twakabuzya mazina aabo kuti tukuzibye, tulembe mazina aabasilutwe babo.
Lino mbuboobu mbubakatuvwiila, Bakati, Tuli bazike ba-Leza wakujulu awaansi. Tulayaka iŋanda iyakataanguna kuyakwa kalekale, myaka minji yakamana, mwami mupati wa-Israyeli njaakayaka akubamba.
Pele bamataata besu nibakakalazya Leza wakujulu, wakabaaba mumaanza aa-Nebukadinezara muKasidi mwami wa-Babuloni, Ngonguwe iwakamwaya iŋanda eyi akutola bantu mubuzike ku-Babuloni,
Pele mumwaka mutaanzi wabwami bwa-Koresi mwami wa-Babuloni, oyo mwami Koresi wakalailila kuti iŋanda eyi ya-Leza iyakwe.

Azyalo zibelesyo zyangolida azyansiliva zyaŋanda yaLeza, Nebukadinezara nzyaakagwisya muntempele yaku-Jerusalemu akuzisisya kuntempele yaku-Babuloni, Koresi wakazigwisya muntempele yakuBabuloni, wakazyaaba mumaanza aamuntu uutegwa Sezibazara, ngonguwe wakapegwa bweendelezi.
Wakamwaambila kuti, Tambula zibelesyo ezi, uye azyo, ukazibike muntempele yaku-Jerusalemu, alimwi iŋanda ya-Leza iyakwe nkukonya oko.
Elyo oyo Sezibazara wakeza, wabika intalisyo zyakuyaka iŋanda ya-Leza yaku-Jerusalemu. Kuzwa kuciindi eco kusikila sunu milimo yakwiiyaka ileenda, nekubaboobo tiina kumana.

Lino na cabota mumeso aamwami, makani alingulwe muŋanda yaziyobwedo yamwami waku-Babuloni, kuzibwe na ncobeni mwami Koresi wakalailila kuti iŋanda ya-Leza yaku-Jerusalemu iyakwe. Mwami alingule aya makani akututumina ijwi lyakutulwiida mbwayanda.
Elyo ku-Akimeta, muŋanda yabwami yakucisi caba-Medi, kwakajanwa lugwalo lulembedwe obu.

Lwakati, Mumwaka mutaanzi wabwami bwa-Koresi, oyo mwami Koresi wakalailila aaŋanda ya-Leza yaku-Jerusalemu, wati, Iŋanda iyakwe, abwalo busena nkubakali kutuula zipaizyo. Intalisyo zyayo zibikwe kabotu. Bulamfu bwayo bube tukokola tuli makumi aali musanu akamwi, abwalo bwaamba bwayo bube tukokola tuli makumi aali musanu alimwi.
Alimwi ibe amindando yotatwe yamabwe mapati amundando wazisamu zipya. Amali aakuula zintu apegwe kuzwa kuŋanda yamwami.

Azyalo zibelesyo zyangolida azyansiliva zyaŋanda ya-Leza, Nebukadinezara nzyaakagwisya muntempele yaku-Jerusalemu, nzyaakasisya ku-Babuloni, zibweedezegwe, zipiluke alimwi kuntempele yaku-Jerusalemu, cimwi acimwi kubusena bwaco, zibikwe muŋanda ya-Leza.
Lino uwe Tatinai, mweendelezi wakutala lyamulonga, a-Setara-bozenai, abeenzinyoko ba-Afarisikai bakutala lyamulonga, amuzwe oko kule.
Amuleke kukasya milimo yayeeyi iŋanda ya-Leza. Mweendelezi waba-Juda abapati baba-Juda bayake iŋanda eyi ya-Leza mubusena bwayo.

Alimwi ndamulailila mbumweelede kucitila bapati baba-Juda aba kukubagwasya kuyaka iŋanda ya-Leza. Muleelede kugwisya mali kumbono zyamwami, nkukuti mutelo wakutala lyamulonga, aakuliya bantu aba, kuti batakataazigwi mumilimo.
Azintu nzibayanda, nkukuti boombe abagutu atubelele kukupaizizya Leza wakujulu, bulotwe, munyo, waini, amafuta, mbubaamba bapaizi baku-Jerusalemu, bapegwe buzuba bumwi abumwi cakutaleka,
kuti bapaizizye Leza wakujulu zipaizyo zinunkilila kabotu, akukombela buumi bwamwami abwabana bakwe,
Alimwi ndapa mulazyo wakuti, kufumbwa muntu uusandula ijwi eli, zisamu zigwisigwe muŋanda yakwe akwiimikwa kuti aanzikwe alinzizyo, alimwi iŋanda yakwe ibe mbolezi nkaambo kamakani aya.

Alakwe Leza uubikide izina lyakwe nkuko anyonyoone bami boonse abantu boonse basoleka kusandula aya makani nanka kumwaya eyi iŋanda ya-Leza iili ku-Jerusalemu. Ndime Dariyo. Ndapa mulazyo. Kucitwe obo cakufwambaana.

Bapati baba-Juda bakayaka, nkabela bakacita kabotu nkaambo kakusinsima kwamusinsimi Hagai akwa-Zekariya mwana wa-Ido. Bakayaka mane lumwi bakamana mbubonya mbwaakalailila Leza waIsrayeli, ambubakalaililwa a-Koresi, a-Dariyo, a-Aritasasta mwami wa-Persia.
Lino iŋanda yakamana kuyakwa mubuzuba bwatatu bwamwezi Ada, mumwaka wamusanu aumwi wabwami bwamwami Dariyo.

Kupobwe lyakusalazya iŋanda ya-Leza bakatuula zipaizyo, basune bali mwanda, bagutu bali myanda yobile, tubelele tuli myanda yone; ampongo zyacipaizyo cakutontozya cakupaizizya zibi zyaba-Israyeli boonse zyakali ikumi azibili mbubonya mbuli mweelwe wamisyobo yabana ba-Israyeli.
Alimwi bakabika bapaizi munkamu zyabo, aba-Levi muzyaandaano zyabo, kukucita milimo yakukomba Leza mu-Jerusalemu mbubonya mbukulembedwe mubbuku lya-Musa.
Nkaambo bapaizi aba-Levi bakasalazigwa antoomwe; boonse buyo bakasalala, aboobo bakajaya banyama ba-Pasika; bakajayila bana babuzike boonse abakwabo bapaizi abalo beni.
Lino bana ba-Israyeli ibakazwa mubuzike, aboonse ibakalipambukanya azintu zisofweede zyabamasi kukuyandaula Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, bakaiya ipobwe.

Alimwi bakacita ipobwe lyazinkwa zitakwe bumena. Bakalya cakukondwa mazuba aali musanu aabili. Nkaambo Jehova wakabapa lukondo kukubasandwida moyo wamwami wa-Asuri kuti ayumye maanza aabo mumilimo yaŋanda ya-Leza, Leza wa-Israyeli.
mwana wa-Salumu, mwana wa-Zadoki, mwana wa-Ahitubu,
mwana wa-Amariya, mwana wa-Azariya, mwana wa-Merayoti,
mwana wa-Zerahiya, mwana wa-Uzi, mwana wa-Buki,
mwana wa-Abisuwa, mwana wa-Pinehasi, mwana wa-Eleazara, mwana wa-Aroni mupaizi mupati—

oyu Ezara wakainka kuzwa ku-Babuloni, Kali mulembi uucenjede wa-Mulao wa-Musa, Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli ngwaakapede. Nkabela mwami wakamupa zyoonse nzyaakakumbila kujanza lya-Jehova Leza wakwe ilyakali alinguwe.
Alimwi kwakainka bamwi bana ba-Israyeli abapaizi aba-Levi abasikwiimba abasimilyango aba-Netinimu, baya ku-Jerusalemu mumwaka wamusanu aibili wabwami bwa-Aritasasta.
Elyo wakasika ku-Jerusalemu mumwezi wasanu wamumwaka wamusanu aibili wamwami.
Nkaambo wakanyamuka kuzwa ku-Babuloni mubuzuba butaanzi bwamwezi mutaanzi, elyo mubuzuba butaanzi bwamwezi wasanu wakasika ku-Jerusalemu, mbwaakagwasigwa kujanza ibotu lya-Leza wakwe.
Nkaambo Ezara wakapangika moyo wakwe kukuyandaula mulao wa-Jehova, akuucita, akukwiisya ba-Israyeli milazyo ambeta.
Lino ngaaya majwi aalugwalo mwami Aritasasta ndwaakapa Ezara mupaizi mulembi, sikulemba majwi aamilazyo ya-Jehova ambeta zyakwe nzyaakabikila ba-Israyeli.
Ndalailila kuti boonse bantu ba-Israyeli, abapaizi bakwe, aba-Levi bakwe, bajanwa mubwami bwangu, bayanda mumyoyo yabo kuya ku-Jerusalemu, bakusindikile.
Nkaambo watumwa kuzwa kumwami akuzwa kulibasinkuta bakwe bali musanu ababili kukulingula makani aa-Juda a-Jerusalemu, mbubonya mbuli mulao wa-Leza wako uuli mujanza lyako,
akutola insiliva angolida, mwami abansinkuta bakwe nzibapa Leza wa-Israyeli uukala mu-Jerusalemu,
ansiliva angolida zyoonse nzyoti jane mucisi coonse ca-Babuloni, antoomwe azipo zyabantu azyabapaizi, myoyo yabo nziiyanda kupa iŋanda ya-Leza wabo yaku-Jerusalemu,
kuti ufwambaane kubelesya aya mali kukuula basune, abagutu, atubelele, azipaizyo zyazyo zyakulya azyakunywa, mukazituule acipaililo caŋanda ya-Leza wanu iili mu-Jerusalemu­.
Alimwi insiliva angolida iisyaala, kufumbwa cintu cibota mumeso aako amumeso aabakwanu, kamucita obo, mbubonya mbwayanda Leza wanu.
Azyalo zibelesyo nzopedwa milimo yaŋanda ya-Leza wako, uleelede kuzyaaba kubusyu bwa-Leza waku-Jerusalemu.
Azintu zimwi, kufumbwa ziyandilwa iŋanda ya-Leza wako, kozigwisya muŋanda yaziyobwedo zyamwami,
Ndime mwami Aritasasta, Ndalailila boonse basiziyobwedo bali kutala lyamulonga kuti, kufumbwa ncakumbila Ezara mupaizi, mulembi wamulao wa-Leza wakujulu, amufwambaane kucicita,
kusikila kumatalenta aansiliva aali mwanda, ansuwo zyabulotwe zili mwanda, amabbodela aawaini aali mwanda, amabbodela aamafuta aali mwanda, amunyo uutalembwa mweelwe.
Kufumbwa cintu Leza wakujulu ncalailila, cicitwe camoyo woonse kukugwasya iŋanda ya-Leza wakujulu, kuti kutabukili bwami bwamwami abana bakwe bukali.
Alimwi twamuzibya kuti bapaizi, aba-Levi, abasikwiimba, abasimilyango, aba-Netinimu, abasimilimo boonse baŋanda eyi ya-Leza, cilatonda kubatezya mutelo na musonko.

Ayebo O Ezara, mbuli mbojisi busongo bwa-Leza mumaanza aako, bika babetesi abasinkuta kuti babeteke bantu boonse bali kutala lyamulonga, boonse babwene milao ya-Leza wako. Abaabo batabwene, kobaiisya.
Nkabela kufumbwa muntu uukaka kucita luyando lwa-Leza wako amulazyo wamwami, afwambaane kubetekwa akupegwa mulandu, nikuba kujayigwa nikuba kutandwa nikuba kunyangwa imbono nikuba kubikwa muntolongo.

Ambebo wandipa luzyalo kumeso aamwami akumeso aabasinkuta bakwe akumeso aabapati basinguzu boonse bamwami. Lino ndakajata inguzu, ijanza lya-Jehova Leza wangu mbulyakali alindime, nkabela ndakabunganya bamwi bapati baba-Israyeli kuti njiinke abo.
Mbaaba bapati banzubo, amazyalani aabo, mbundakainka abo mubwami bwa-Aritasasta mwami wa-Babuloni:
kuzwa kubana ba-Pinehasi, Gerisomu; kuzwa kubana ba-Itamara, Daniele; kuzwa kubana ba-Davida, Hatusi;
kuzwa kubana ba-Sekaniya, kuzwa kubana ba-Parosi, Zekariya, abamwi baalumi mbaakalembwa abo, mwanda amakumi osanwe;
kuzwa kubana ba-Pahati-Moabu, Eliunai mwana wa-Zerahiya, abaalumi bali myanda yobile mbaakali abo;
kuzwa kubana ba-Zatu, Sekaniya mwana waJahazieli abaalumi bali myanda yotatwe mbaakali abo;
kuzwa kubana ba-Adini, Ebedi mwana wa-Jonatani abaalumi bali makumi osanwe mbaakali abo;
kuzwa kubana ba-Elamu, Jesaya mwana wa-Ataliya abaalumi bali makumi aali musanu aabili mbaakali abo;
kuzwa kubana ba-Sefatiya, Zebadiya mwana wa-Mikayeli abaalumi bali makumi aali musanu aatatu mbaakali abo;
kuzwa kubana ba-Joabu, Obadiya mwana wa-Jehieli; abaalumi bali myanda yobile akumi amusanu abatatu mbaakali abo;
kuzwa kubana ba-Bani, Selomiti mwana wa-Josifiya, abaalumi bali mwanda amakumi aali musanu alimwi mbaakali abo;
kuzwa kubana ba-Bebai, Zekariya mwana wa-Bebai, abaalumi bali makumi obile amusanu abatatu mbaakali abo;
kuzwa kubana ba-Azigadi, johanana mwana wa-Hakatani abaalumi bali mwanda akumi mbaakali abo;
akuzwa kubana basyaalizi ba-Adonikamu, mazina aabo mbaaba: Elifeleti, Jodi a-Semaya, abaalumi bali makumi aali musanu alimwi mbobakali abo;
akuzwa kubana baBigvai, Utai a-Zabudi abaalumi bali makumi aali musanu aabili mbobakali abo.
Mpawo ndakatuma kuyooita Eliezeri, a-Arieli, a-Semaya, a-Elinatani, a-Jaribu, a-Elinatani, a-Natani, a-Zekariya, a-Mesulamu, bapati, a-Joyaribu a-Elinatani, bantu bacenjede,
ndabalailila kuya kuli-Ido silutwe kubusena butegwa Kasifiya, ndabapa majwi aakwaambila Ido abanyina ba-Netinimu kubusena butegwa Kasifiya, kuti batuletele basimilimo baŋanda ya-Leza wesu.

Elyo kunguzu zyajanza ibotu lya-Leza wesu, ilyakali alindiswe, bakatuletela muntu uucenjede, umwi wabana ba-Mali mwana wa-Levi mwana waIsrayeli, a-Serebiya abana bakwe abanyina, bantu bali ikumi amusanu abatatu,
a-Hasabiya, antoomwe a-Jesaya, umwi wabana ba-Merari, abanyina abana babo, bantu bali makumi obile,
abamwi ba-Netinimu, Davida abapati mbobakabika kukubelekela ba-Levi, ba-Netinimu bali myanda yobile amakumi obile balembedwe mazina aabo.

Nkaambo ndakafwa insoni kukumbila kumwami kupegwa basilumamba na basimbizi bakutuvuna kulibasinkondoma besu munzila, nkaambo ndakaambila mwami kuti, Ijanza lya-Leza wesu lilagwasya boonse babika myoyo yabo kulinguwe, pele inguzu zyakwe abukali bwakwe zilalwisya boonse bamuleka.
Lino twakaliimya kulya akukumbila kuli-Leza wesu nkaambo kamakani aya, nkabela wakatumvwa.
Elyo ndakagwisya bantu bali ikumi ababili babasilutwe babapaizi, Serebiya a-Hasabiya abeenzinyina bamwi bali ikumi,
nkabela ndakabapimina bulemu bwansiliva abwangolida abwazibelesyo, cipaizyo caŋanda ya-Leza wesu ncibakapa mwami abasinkuta bakwe abapati bakwe aba-Israyeli boonse ibakajanwa nkuko.
Ndakaaba mumaanza aabo matalenta aansiliva aali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi osanwe, azibelesyo zyansiliva izyakali abulemu bwamatalenta aali mwanda, amatalenta aangolida aali mwanda,
amitiba yangolida iili makumi obile iyakali abulemu bwampondo zili cuulu, azibelesyo zyobile zyamukuba uufulidwe izyakayandika mbuli ingolida.
Lino ndakabaambila kuti, Inywe mulasalala kuli-Jehova, azyalo zibelesyo zilasalala. Ansiliva angolida, ezi nzituuzyo kuli-Jehova Leza wabamauso.
Amucenjele, muzibambe kabotu, mane mukazipimine bulemu kubusyu bwabapaizi bapati aba-Levi abapati banzubo zya-Israyeli ku-Jerusalemu mumaanda aantempele ya-Jehova.
Mpawo bapaizi abaLevi bakatambula bulemu bwansiliva abwangolida abwazibelesyo, kuti baziletelele ku-Jerusalemu kuŋanda ya-Leza wesu.
Aboobo twakasika ku-Jerusalemu­ akukala nkuko mazuba otatwe.

Lino mubuzuba bwane insiliva angolida azibelesyo zyoonse zyakapimwa muŋanda ya-Leza wesu kumaanza aa-Meremoti mwana wa-Uriya mupaizi a-Eleazara mwana wa-Pinehasi, bakali antoomwe a-Jozabadi mwana waJeshua a-Noadiya mwana wa-Binui, ba-Levi,
Mweelwe wazyo abulemu bwazyo, zyoonse zyakapimwa, nkabela bulemu boonse bwakalembwa kuciindi eco nciconya.

Abalo bana babaabo ibakatolwa mubuzike, ibakazwa mubuzike, bakaletela Leza wa-Israyeli zipaizyo; basune bali ikumi ababili bakaletelwa ba-Israyeli boonse, abagutu bali makumi aali musanu aane amusanu aumwi, tubelele tuli makumi aali musanu aabili amusanu atubili, impongo zili ikumi zyazipaizyo zyakutontozya. Ezi zyoonse zyakaba cituuzyo kuli-Jehova.
nkaambo balikwete bana babo basimbi, balo beni abana babo, aboobo basiluzubo lusalala balivwelene abantu bamasi; nkabela bapati abasilutwe mbobainda kubisya mumakani aya.
Lino nindakamvwa aya makani, ndakadeluula zyakusama zyangu acikobela cangu, ndanonkola masusu aangu acilezu cangu, ndakala cakugamba.

Elyo kwakabungana kulindime boonse ibakali kuyoowa majwi aa-Leza wa-Israyeli, nkaambo kakubisya kwabaabo ibakazwide mubuzike, nkabela ndakakala cakugamba mane kusikila kuciindi cacipaizyo camangolezya.
Ndakati, O Leza wangu, ndausa insoni; ndafwa bweeme kupungula meso aangu kulinduwe, Leza wangu, nkaambo milandu yesu yavula kumitwe yesu, amilandu yesu yakomena mane kusikila kujulu.

Kuzwa kumazuba aabamatateesu tuli mumulandu mupati, asunu tucili mbubonya, Nkaambo kamilandu yesu ncitwaabilwa, iswe abami besu abapaizi besu, mumaanza aabami bamasi akujazigwa ipanga abuzike akusaalwa akufwa insoni mbubonya mbutubede sunu.

Lino kaindi kaniini twafwidwa luzyalo kuli-Jehova Leza wesu, kuti tusyaalilwe bamwi baloboka akupegwa izina mubusena bwakwe busalalisya, kuti Leza wesu amunike meso esu akutuponya buniini mubuzike bwesu.

Nkaambo tuli bazike, pele Leza wesu tana kutusoowa mubuzike bwesu. Wacita kuti tufwidwe luzyalo mumeso aabami ba-Persia, kuti atuponononye, tubusye iŋanda ya-Leza wesu akuyakulula matongo aayo, kuti tukale kabotu mucisi ca-Juda amuJerusalemu.
Lino twaambe buti, O Leza wesu, kusule lyayaaya? Nkaambo twasoowa milazyo yako,

njowakalailila kumilomo yabalanda bako basinsimi. Wakati, Nyika njemuyoovuba ninyika iisofweede; yasofwaazigwa busofwi bwabantu bamasi azisesemyo zyabo, nkaambo baizuzya busofwi bwabo kuzwa kumagolelo kusikila kumagolelo aayo.

Lino bana banu basimbi, mutabapi kukukwatwa kubana babo balombe, abalo bana banu balombe mutabakwatyi bana babo basimbi. Mutayandauli abuniini kubaletela luumuno acoolwe, kuti mujate inguzu, mulye micelo mibotu yanyika akuvubya njiyo bana banu mazuba oonse.

Lino kusule lyamakani aya oonse aatusikila nkaambo kamilimo yesu mibi amilandu yesu mipati, mbuli uwe O Leza wesu mbowatubweedezya milandu yesu buniini buyo kwiinda mbukweelede, alimwi mbotupa lufutuko luli boobu,

sa ncibotu kuti tuboole alimwi kukusotoka milazyo yako akutuvwelanya mulukwatano abantu aba bacita zisesemyo? Na twacita obo, sa tokooyootukalalila mane lumwi watujayilila akutatusiila naba omwe uuloboka?

O Jehova Leza waIsrayeli, nduwe uululeme, nkaambo twasyaala tulivunidwe mbutubede sunu. Kotulangila mbutubede amilandu yesu okuno kubusyu bwako, nkaambo tatukonzyi kwiima nji kumeso aako nkaambo kamakani aya.

Elyo Sekaniya mwana wa-Jehieli, umwi wabana ba-Elamu, wakavwiila Ezara kuti, Twabisizya Leza wesu, nkaambo tulikwete banakazi beenzu babantu banyika. Nekubaboobo tatweelede kusyomononwa mumakani aya aa-Israyeli.
Atutangane cizuminano a-Leza wesu, tutande boonse banakazi abana mbobazyede, mbubonya mbwayanda mwami wangu, ambubayanda boonse bayoowa milazyo ya-Leza wesu. Kucitwe mbubonya mulao mbuulailila.
Buka, nkaambo makani ali mumaanza aako. Aswebo tuyookugwasya. Koliyumya, ukacite makani.
Mpawo Ezara wakabuka, wakasungilizya bapati babapaizi aba-Levi aba-Israyeli boonse kukonka kucita mbubonya mbuli majwi ayo. Nkabela bakakonka.
Lino bakatumina bana babuzike boonse bamucisi ca-Juda abamu-Jerusalemu ijwi lyakuti baleelede kuyoboloka ku-Jerusalemu.
Alimwi kwakaambwa kuti kufumbwa muntu uukaka kuza, mazuba otatwe naatana kumana, mbuli majwi aabami abapati, imbono zyakwe zyoonse ziyoonyanzigwa, alakwe mwini uyoogwisigwa mumbungano yababuzike.
Mpawo Ezara mupaizi wakanyampuka, wabaambila kuti, Mwabisya inywe, nkaambo mulikwete banakazi beenzu, aboobo mwayungizizya zibi zya-Israyeli.
Lino amulyaambe zibi zyanu kubusyu bwaJehova Leza wabamauso banu, akucita luyando lwakwe, mulipambukanye kubantu bamasi akubanakazi beenzu.
Elyo bantu boonse ibakabungene bakavuwa ajwi ipati, bati, Tulacita mbubonya mboamba.
Pele bantu mbanji, alimwi nciindi camvula. Tatukonzyi kwiima anze. Ayalo milimo tiili milimo yabuzuba bomwe buyo na mazuba obile, nkaambo tuli banji nitwabisya mumakani aya,

Banyampuke basilutwe besu bambungano yoonse, elyo boonse bamuminzi yesu bakwete banakazi beenzu basike kuziindi zibikidwe, babe abapati bamunzi umwi aumwi ababetesi bawo, mane buleke bukali buyumu bwa-Leza wesu mbwatukalalila nkaambo kamakani aya.
Lino Jonatani mwana wa-Asaheli a-Jahaziya mwana wa-Tikiva mbobakali kubamba aya makani, abalo Mesulamu a-Sabetai mu-Levi bakabagwasya.

Nkabela bana babuzike bakacita obo. Ezara mupaizi, abamwi bantu bapati banzubo, boonse balembedwe mazina aabo, bakaandaanisigwa. Bakakala munkuta mubuzuba butaanzi bwamwezi wakumi kuti batalike kulingula makani.
Elyo bakamana baalumi boonse ibakakwete banakazi beenzu mubuzuba butaanzi bwamwezi mutaanzi.
Aba bakazumina kulekana abanakazi babo, alimwi mbubakajisi mulandu, bakaleta imbelele, ibe cipaizyo cakumanya milandu yabo.
Akati kabana ba-Imeri: Hanani a-Zebadiya,
Akati kabana ba-Harimu: Maaseya a-Elija a-Semaya a-Jehieli a-Uziya.
Akati kabana ba-Pasuri: Eliunai a-Maaseya a-Ismayeli a-Netaneli ajozabadi a-Eleasa,
Aba-Levi: Jozabadi a-Simei a-Kelaya (ngonguwe Kelita) a-Petahiya a-Jehuda a-Eliezeri.
Akati kabasikwiimba: Eliyasibu. Akati kabasimilyango: Salumu a-Telemu a-Uri.
Abamwi ba-Israyeli mbaaba. Akati kabana ba-Parosi: Remaya a-Jeziya a-Malikiya a-Miyamini a-Eleazara a-Malikiya a-Benaya.
Akati kabana ba-Elamu: Mataniya a-Zekariya a-Jehieli a-Abidi a-Jeremoti a-Elija.
Akati kabana ba-Zatu: Eliunai a-Eliyasibu a-Mataniya a-Jeremoti a-Zabadi a-Aziza.
Akati kabana ba-Bebai: Jehohanana a-Hananiya a-Zabai a-Atilai,
Akati kabana ba-Bani: Mesulamu a-Maluki a-Adaya a-Jasubu a-Syeali a-Ramoti.
Akati kabana ba-Pahati-Moabu: Adina a-Kelali a-Benaya a-Maaseya a-Mataniya a-Bezaleli a-Binui a-Manase.
Akati kabana ba-Harimu: Eliezeri a-Isiya a-Malikiya a-Semaya a-Simeoni,
a-Benjamini a-Maluki a-Semariya.
Akati kabana ba-Hasumu: Matenai a-Matata a-Zabadi a-Elifeleti a-Jeremai a-Manase a-Simei.
Akati kabana ba-Bani: Maadai a-Amramu u-Ueli,
a-Benaya a-Bedeya a-Keluhi,
a-Vaniya aMeremoti a-Eliyasibu,
a-Mataniya a-Matenai a-Jaasau,
a-Bani a-Binui a-Simei,
a-Selemiya a-Natani a-Adaya,
a-Makinadebai a-Sasai a-Sarai,
a-Azareli a-Selemiya a-Semariya,
a-Salumu aAmariya a-Josefa.
Akati kabana ba-Nebo: Jeieli a-Matitiya a-Zabadi a-Zebina a-Jadai a-Joeli a-Benaya.
Aba boonse kabakwete banakazi beenzu, abamwi babo kabakwete banakazi ibakazyede kale.
kwakasika Hanani, umwi wabakwesu, abamwi bantu ibakazwide mucisi ca-Juda. Nkabela ndakababuzya makani aaba-Juda ibakasyaala, ibakazwide mubuzike, amakani aa-Jerusalemu.
Lino bakandivwiila kuti, Abo basyaala ibakazwa mubuzike, oko kucisi nkubabede bali mumapenzi mapati, balasampaulwa. Abwalo bulambo bwa-Jerusalemu bulimwayidwe, amilyango yamunzi ilipiide mulilo.
Elyo nindakamvwa aya makani, ndakakala, ndalila, ndoomoka mazuba manji, nkabela ndakali kuliimya kulya akukomba kubusyu bwa-Leza wakujulu.
Ndakati, Maawe! O Jehova, Leza wakujulu, Leza mupati uyooweka, uutajaya mulongo, uubafwida luzyalo boonse bamuyandisya akubamba milazyo yakwe,

matwi aako aswiilile, meso aako alange, ukamvwe cikombyo cangu ndemulanda wako ncinkomba kubusyu bwako buzuba obuno, isikati amasiku, nkaambo kabalanda bako bana ba-Israyeli. Ndalyaamba zibi zyabana ba-Israyeli nzitwakubisizya, Ambebo aluzubo lwataata twabisya.
Milimo yesu njitwacita kumeso aako njabuyo. Tatuna kubamba milazvo amilao ambeta nzowakalailila mulanda wako Musa.
Koibaluka ijwi ndyokalailila mulanda wako Musa lyakuti, Na mwasotoka mulao, njoomumwaisya akati kabamasi,

pele na mwaboola kulindime akubamba milazyo yangu, njoocita kuti, nekuba kuti bamwi banu balitandidwe kumagolelo aanyika, njoobabunganya kuzwa nkuko akubasisya kubusena obo mbunsalide kuti izina lyangu likale mulimbubo.
Mbaaba balanda bako abantu bako mbovunide munguzu zyako zigambya akujanza lyako liyumu.
Lino mwami wakandibuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi busyu bwako buli abuusu? Tociswi. Aya makani azwa mubuusu bwamoyo buyo. Mpawo ndakayoowa loko,
ndaambila mwami kuti, Mwami apone lyoonse. Sa busyu bwangu tabweelede kuba abuusu? Munzi bamataata nkubazikidwe ulisaalidwe, amilyango yawo ilipiide mulilo.
Mpawo mwami wakandaambila kuti, Ncinzi ncoyandaula? Elyo ndakakombela Leza wakujulu.

Nkabela ndakaambila mwami kuti, Na cabota mumeso aamwami, alimwi na mebo ndemulanda wako ndijene buuya kunembo lyako, ndakumbila kuti unditume kucisi ca-Juda, kumunzi wamavwika aabamatata, nkauyakulule.
Lino mwami wakandivwiila. (Alakwe mukakwe kakede kubbazu lyakwe). Wakati, Lweendo lwako lulatola mazuba ongaye? Uyooboola lili? Aboobo cakabota mumeso aamwami kundituma, nkabela ndakamubikila ciindi.
Alimwi ndakaambila mwami kuti, Na cabota mumeso aamwami, mpegwe magwalo aakutolela beendelezi bakutala lyamulonga, kuti bandigwasye mulweendo lwangu mane lumwi nkasike kucisi ca-Juda,

alugwalo lwakutolela Asafu sikubamba misanza yamwami, kuti andipe zisamu zyakubezela milyango yaŋanda yabwami azyabulambo bwamunzi azyaŋanda njenti nkale mulinjiyo. Elyo mwami wakandipa, ijanza ibotu lya-Leza wangu mbulyakandigwasya.
Lino ndakasika kubeendelezi bakutala lyamulonga, ndabapa magwalo aazwa kumwami. Nkabela mwami wakalitumide basilutwe bampi abasimabbiza, kuti njeende abo.
Elyo Sanibalati mu-Horoni a-Tobiya muzike mu-Amoni nibakamvwa, bakabijilwa loko kuswiilila kuti kwasika muntu uuyanda kugwasya bana ba-Israyeli.
Nkabela nindakasika ku-Jerusalemu­, ndakakala nkuko mazuba otatwe.

Lino ndakanyampuka masiku, mebo abantu bace mbundakali abo. Teendakalwiida muntu naba omwe makani Leza wangu ngaakabikide mumoyo wangu, milimo njendakayanda kubeleka ku-Jerusalemu. Alimwi teendakajisi munyama naba omwe cita munyama ngundakatantide alinguwe.
Nkabela ndakazwa masiku kumulyango wakuti kunembo lyamukalo wabasikazwa, ndasika kumulyango wabufumba. Ndakalingula malambo aa-Jerusalemu aamwayidwe, amilyango yawo iipiide mulilo.
Alimwi ndakaya kunembo kusikila kumulyango wakasensa akukaziba kamwami, pele katakwe busena munyama ngundakatantide nkwaakakonzya kwiinda.
Elyo ndakainda kukalonga ciindi camasiku, ndaakulingula bulambo, mane lumwi ndakapiluka, ndanjila kumulyango wakuti, ndaboola.
Pele beendelezi teebakaziba nkundakaya na ncindakacita. Abalo ba-Juda abapaizi abasilutwe abeendelezi abamwi ibakali kucita milimo, taakwe naba omwe ngundakalwiida makani kuciindi eco.
Elyo ndakabalwiida makani aajanza lya-Leza wangu mbulyakandigwasya, amajwi aamwami ngaakandaambila. Nkabela bakati, Atubuke, tuyake. Aboobo bakayumya maanza aabo kukucita kabotu.
Pele Sanibalati mu-Horoni a-Tobiya muzike mu-Amoni a-Gesemu mu-Arabu nibakamvwa, bakatuseka akutusampaula. Bakati, Ino ncinzi cintu eci ncimucita? Sa mulayanda kupapila mwami?
Mpawo ndakabavwiila kuti, Leza wakujulu uyootupa coolwe. Iswe tubalanda bakwe tulabuka, tukayake. Pele inywe tamujisi caabilo niiba imbono niciba ciibalusyo mu-Jerusalemu.
Kubbazu lyakwe bantu ba-Jeriko bakayaka. Kubbazu lyabo Zakuri mwana wa-lmiri wakayaka.
Pele mulyango wanswi, bana ba-Hasenaya mbobakauyaka. Bakabika zisamu zyawo akwiimika zitendele zyawo azijaluzyo zyawo aminkulu yawo.
Kubbazu lyabo Meremoti mwana wa-Uriya mwana wa-Kozi wakamamika. Kubbazu lyabo Mesulamu mwana wa-Berekiya mwana wa-Mesezabele wakamamika, Kubbazu lyabo Zadoki mwana wa-Banna wakamamika.
Kubbazu lyabo ba-Tekowa bakamamika. Pele bapati babo teebakabika moyo woonse kumilimo ya-Mwami wabo.
Pele mulyango mukulukulu Jehoyada mwana wa-Paseya a-Mesulamu mwana wa-Besodeya mbobakaumamika. Bakabika zisamu zyawo akwiimika zitendele zyawo azijaluzyo zyawo aminkulu yawo.
Kubbazu lyabo Melatiya mu-Gibeoni wakamamika, a-Jadoni mu-Meronoti, abantu ba-Gibeoni aba-Mizipa, mane kusikila kucuuno cabwami bwamweendelezi wakookuno kutala lyamulonga.
Kubbazu lyakwe Uzieli mwana wa-Harehaya, umwi wabafuzi bangolida wakamamika, Kubbazu lyakwe Hananiya mwana waumwi wabaŋanga wakamamika, Bakayakulula Jerusalemu mane kusikila kumulyango uukwazeme.
Kubbazu lyabo Refaya mwana wa-Huri, mweendelezi wacipanzi cimwi ca-Jerusalemu, wakamamika.
Kubbazu lyabo Jedaya mwana wa-Harumafi wakamamika kufwaafwi kuŋanda yakwe. Kubbazu lyakwe Hatusi mwana wa-Hasabineya wakamamika,
Acaabilo cabili, Malikiya mwana wa-Harimu a-Hasubu mwana wa-Pahati-Moabu mbobakacimamika, aŋanda indamfu yaziko.
Kubbazu lyakwe Salumu mwana wa-Halohesi, mweendelezi wacipanzi cimwi ca-Jerusalemu, wakamamika, walo abana bakwe basimbi.

Mulyango wakuti, Hanuni abantu baku-Zanoa bakaumamika, Bakauyaka, baimika zitendele zyawo azijaluzyo zyawo aminkulu yawo, alimwi bakayaka bulambo tukokola tuli cuulu mane kusikila kumulyango wabufumba,
Pele mulyango wabufumba, Malikiya mwana wa-Rekabu nguwakaumamika, mweendelezi wacipanzi ca-Betihakeremu. Wakauyaka, waimika zitendele zyawo azijaluzyo zyawo aminkulu yawo.

Amulyango wakasensa, Salumu mwana wa-Koli-hoze, mweendelezi wacipanzi ca-Mizipa, nguwakaumamika, Wakauyaka, wauvumba, waimika zitendele zyawo azijaluzyo zyawo aminkulu yawo, alimwi wakayaka bulambo bwaziba lya-Siloamu libambene amuunda wamwami, mane kusikila kumatantilo aaseluka kuya kumunzi wa-Davida,
Kusule lyayooyo, Nehemiya mwana wa-Azibuki, mweendelezi wacipanzi ca-Beti-zuri, wakamamika mane kusikila antu aalangene amavwika aa-Davida, akusikila kuziba ilyakacitwa, kuŋanda yabasilumamba.
Kusule lyayooyo ba-Levi bakamamika: Rehumu mwana wa-Bani; kubbazu lyakwe Hasabiya, mweendelezi wacipanzi ca-Keila, wakamamika mucipanzi cakwe.
Kusule lyayooyo bakwabo bakamamika, Bavai mwana wa-Henadadi, mweendelezi wacipanzi cimwi ca-Kcila.
Kubbazu lyakwe Ezeri mwana wa-Jeshua silutwe wa-Mizipa wakamamika caabilo cabili kuzwa kuntu kulangene amatantilo aakuya kuciyobwedo cazilwisyo kuciswi cabulambo.
Kusule lyakwe Baruki mwana wa-Zabai wakasungwaala kumamika caabilo cabili kuzwa kuciswi kusikila kumulyango waŋanda ya-Eliyasibu mupaizi mupati.
Kusule lyakwe Meremoti mwana wa-Uriya mwana wa-Hakozi wakamamika caabilo cabili kuzwa kumulyango waŋanda ya-Eliyasibu kusikila kumamanino aaŋanda ya-Eliyasibu.
Kusule lyakwe bakamamika bapaizi, bantu bakubanda.
Kusule lyabo Benjamini a-Hasubu bakamamika caabilo cilangene aŋanda yabo. Kusule lyakwe Azariya mwana wa-Maaseya mwana wa-Ananiya wakamamika kuntu kulangene aŋanda yakwe.
Kusule lyabo Binui mwana wa-Henadadi wakamamika caabilo cabili kuzwa kuŋanda ya-Azariya kusikila kuciswi, nkukuti kucooko,
Alakwe Palali mwana wa-Uzai wakamamika kuntu kulangene aciswi acisanza cibambene aŋanda indamfu iili kulubanza lwantolongo. Kusule lyakwe wakamamika Pedaya mwana wa-Parosi.
Abalo ba-Netinimu bakalikede mu-Ofeli, bakamamika kusikila kuntu kulangene amulyango wamaanzi kujwe akucisanza cibambene awo.
Kusule lyakwe ba-Tekowa bakamamika caabilo cabili, kuzwa kuntu kulangene acisanza cipati kusikila kubulambo bwa-Ofeli,
Kunembo lyamulyango wambizi bapaizi bakamamika, umwi aumwi kuntu kulangene aŋanda yakwe.
Kusule lyabo Zadoki mwana wa-Imeri wakamamika kuntu kulangene aŋanda yakwe. Kusule lyakwe Semaya mwana wa-Sekaniya, sikulanga mulyango wakujwe, wakamamika.
Kusule lyakwe Hananiya mwana wa-Selemiya a-Hanuni mwana wamusanu aumwi waZalafi bakamamika caabilo cabili. Kusule lyabo Mesulamu mwana waBerekiya wakamamika kuntu kulangene aŋanda yakwe.
Kusule lyakwe Malikiya mwana wamufuzi wakamamika mane kusikila kuŋanda yabaNetinimu abasambazi, kuntu kulangene amulyango Mipikadi akusikila kumatantilo aakuciswi.
Alimwi akati kamatantilo aakuciswi amulyango wambelele, bafuzi abasambazi bakamamika.

Nkabela wakaamba mumatwi aabakwabo abasilumamba ba-Samariya kuti, Ino aba ba-Juda bakompeme balacitanzi? Sa balaliyumya? Sa balapaizya? Sa balamana milimo mubuzuba bomwe? Sa balabusya mabwe kuzwa kumilwi yalusuko nkwaapiide?
Alakwe Tobiya mu-Amoni kali awe. Walo wakati, Eco ncibayaka, naba mwaba uucijaana kulincico ulamwaya bulambo bwabo bwamabwe,
Koswiilila, O Leza wesu, mbutwasampaulwa, Bweedezya kusampaula kwabo amitwi yabo beni. Kobaaba kukusampaulwa munyika yabuzike.
Utavumbi milandu yabo, azyalo zibi zyabo zitazizyanisigwi kumeso aako. Nkaambo bakukalazya kumeso aabasikuyaka,
Elyo twakayaka bulambo. Nkabela bulambo boonse bwakamana mane kusikila akatikati, nkaambo bantu bakapangika myoyo yabo kumilimo.
Pele Sanibalati a-Tobiya aba-Arabu aba-Amoni aba-Asidodi, nibakamvwa kuti malambo aa-Jerusalemu ali mukuyakwa, alimwi atalika kumamikwa nkwaakamwayidwe, bakanyema loko.
Nkabela bakavwiya boonse antoomwe kuza kuzoolwisya Jerusalemu akulesya milimo.
Elyo twakakomba Leza wesu, alimwi twakabika balindizi kuti babalangile isikati amasiku.
Lino ba-Juda bakaamba kuti, Inguzu zyabasikuyumuna zyamana, alimwi lusuko lwavula loko. Tatukonzyi kuyaka bulambo.
Abasinkondoma besu bakati, Tabakooyooziba nikuba kubona mane lumwi twasika mpoonya awo akati kabo, tubajaye akulesya milimo.
Nkabela ba-Juda ibakakede kufwaafwi kulimbabo, nibakasika, bakatwaambila ziindi zili ikumi kuti, Baleza kuzootulwisya kuzwa kumasena conse.
Lino ndakabika bantu kumasena aansi kusule lyabulambo, akumasena aakujulu. Ndakababamba munzubo zyabo, bakali amapanga aabo amasumo aabo amata aabo.

Elyo nindakabona, ndakanyampuka, ndaambila basilutwe abapati abantu bamwi kuti, Mutabayoowi. Amwiingasile Mwami mupati uuyoosya. Amulwide bakwanu abana banu balombe abana banu basimbi abanakazi banu amaanda aanu.
Nkabela kuzwa kubuzuba obo, cisela cabalanda bangu bakali kubeleka milimo, acisela cimwi bakalijisi masumo antobo amata azilwisyo, abalo bapati bakali kugwasya luzubo lwa-Juda,
Basikuyaka bulambo, abasikuyumuna mikuli, abasikuleta, umwi aumwi wakali kubelesya ijanza lyomwe, ajanzanyina wakalijatya cilwisyo.
Basikuyaka, umwi aumwi kajisi ipanga lyakwe kubbazu lyakwe naakayaka, Alakwe sikulizya mweembo ndakali awe.
Lino ndakaambila basilutwe abapati abantu bamwi kuti, Milimo yakomena, mipati, pele iswe tulipambukene abulambo. Umwi aumwi uli kule kuzwa kumweenzinyina,
Kufumbwa kuntu nkumuswiilila ijwi lyamweembo, amuyoboloke kulindiswe nkuko. Leza wesu uyootulwida,
Mbuboobo mbutwakabeleka milimo. Cisela cabo bakalijisi masumo kuzwa cifumofumo mane lumwi inyenyeezi zyakaboneka.
Alimwi kuciindi eco nciconya ndakaambila bantu kuti, Muntu umwi aumwi aone muJerusalemu amulanda wakwe, kuti batulindile ciindi camasiku akubeleka milimo ciindi casikati.
Ambebo ndemwini abakwesu abalanda bangu abantu balindizi ibakanditobela, katakwe akati kesu iwakasamununa zyakusama zyakwe, cita kuciindi cakusanzya.
Bamwi bakati, Iswe, bana besu balombe abana besu basimbi mbanji. Tulababwezela maila, kuti tulye akupona,
Abamwi bakati, Myuunda yesu amyuunda yesu yamisaansa amaanda esu, zyoonse twazyaaba kuti tujane maila nkaambo kanzala,
Abamwi bakati, Twapa myuunda yesu amyuunda yesu yamasaansa, ibe zikoloto zyakuliya mutelo wamwami.
Nkabela moyo wangu niwakamana kuyeeya makani, ndakakazyanya abapati abasilutwe, ndabaambila kuti, Kubbadezya mulabbadezya umwi aumwi mweenzinyina. Nkabela ndakababusizya imbungano impati.

Elyo ndakabaambila kuti, Iswe twakanununa bakwesu ba-Juda ibakauzigwa mumaanzanza aabamasi, mbutwakakonzya. Lino inywe sa mulayanda kuuzya bakwanu? Sa balaulwa kulindiswe? Nkabela bakaumuna buyo, teebakavuwa ijwi niliba lyomwe.
Mpawo ndaka ti, Cintu eci ncimucita taciboti pe. Sa tamweelede kweenda mukuyoowa Leza wesu, nkaambo kakusampaulwa kulibamasi basinkondoma besu?
Ambebo ndemwini abakwesu abana bangu, nitwakayanda, nitwakakonzya kubabbadezya mali amaila. Atuleke kubbadezya obo.
Amubabwedezye buzuba obuno myuunda yabo amyuunda yabo yamasaansa ayamaolifa amaanda aabo, acipanzi camwanda camali acamaila acawaini acamafuta, zyoonse nzimwakababbadezya.
