Bakati, Tulabweedezya, Tatukooyooyandaula cintu limbi kulimbabo. Tuyoocita mbubonya mboamba. Mpawo ndakaita bapaizi, ndabakonkya kuti bacite mbubonya obo.

Nkabela ndakakunkumuna zyakusama zyangu, ndati, Kufumbwa muntu uutazuzikizya ijwi eli Leza amukunkumune obo, agwisigwe muŋanda yakwe amumilimo yakwe. Akunkumunwe ­akusowegwa mbubonya obo, Lino bantu boonse bambungano bakati, Ameni, alimwi bakatembaula Jehova. Nkabela bantu bakacita mbubonya obo.

Beendelezi bataanzi ibakanditaangunina bakalemena bantu, batambula kulimbabo insima awaini amasyekeli aansiliva aali makumi one. Abalo bana babo, bakaba abwami bwakweendelezya bantu, Pele mebo teendakacita obo pe, nkaambo kakuyoowa Leza.
Ayalo milimo eyo yakuyaka bulambo, ndakakakatila kulinjiyo, Tcetwakavuba myuunda pe. Bana bangu boonse bakayoboloka nkuko kukubeleka milimo,
Nkabela ba-Juda abeendelezi bali mwanda amakumi osanwe bakali kulya insima kulindime, abaabo ibakeza kulindiswe kuzwa kulibamasi beengelede.

Zilyo nzindakabambilwa buzuba bumwi abumwi nzeezi: omwe musune, ambelele imbotu zili musanu aimwi, abayuni mbundakacitilwa, Alimwi komwe mumazuba aali ikumi ndakabambilwa wanu munji wamisyobo misyobo, Nekubaboobo teendakatambula zilyo zyabweendelezi, nkaambo bantu bakalemenwa.
Utandilubi, O Leza wangu! Kondicitila bubotu, nkaambo kabubotu boonse mbundakacitila bantu aba.
Sanibalati a-Gesemu bakandiita, bati, Koza, tukaswanaane mumunzi umwi wamukuti lya-Ono. Pele bakali kuyeeya kundibisizya.
Mpawo ndakabatumina batumwa, ndati, Ndili mukubeleka milimo mipati; nsikonzyi kusika. Sa ncibotu kuti milimo ikale buyo? Sa ndakonzya kwiileka kuti nze nkumubede?
Pele ziindi zyone bakandiita mbubonya, lino lyoonse ndakababweedezya ijwi elyo ndilyonya,
Elyo Sanibalati wakandiita mbubonya ciindi acimwi casanu. Wakatuma mulanda wakwe, ulijisi lugwalo lutasinkidwe mujanza lyakwe.

Omo mulugwalo mwakalembwa kuti, Kwamvwigwa akati kabamasi, alakwe Gesemu ulaamba mbubonya, kuti webo aba-Juda nyoko mulayeeya kupapila. Nciceeco ncoyakila bulambo, kuti ube mwami wabo mbubonya mbuli majwi aya.
Alimwi ulibikide basinsimi kuti bakambauke aanduwe mu-Jerusalemu, baambe kuti, Nkwali mwami mucisi ca-Juda, Makani aya ayooambwa mumatwi aamwami. Lino koza, tukabuzyanye makani antoomwe.
Mpoonya awo ndakamutumina kuti, Taakwe makani aali boobo mboamba, pe. Ulaamba miyeeyo yamoyo wako buyo.
Nkaambo boonse bakayanda kutuyoosya, Bakali kuyeeya kuti, Maanza aabo alaleka milimo, itacitwi. Koyumya maanza aangu, O Leza.
Pele ndakati, Sa muntu uuli mbuli ime ulakonzya kucija. Sa muntu uuli mbuli ime ulakonzya kunjila muntempele akupona? Nsibooli pe.
Lino ndakabona kuti teensi Leza iwakamutuma pe, wakandaambila majwi aabusinsimi obu nkaambo kakuti Tobiya a-Sanibalati bakamuliya.
Wakapegwa mali kuti andiyoosye, kuti ncite obo akubisya, izina lyangu libije, bandisampaule.
O Leza wangu, utalubi Tobiya a-Sanibalati ayeeyi milimo yakwe, amusinsimi mwanakazi Noadiya abasinsimi bamwi ibakali kuyanda kundiyoosya.
Aboobo bulambo bwakamana kuyakwa mubuzuba bwamakumi obile amusanu bwamwezi Eluli. Bwakatola mazuba aali makumi osanwe aabili.
Lino basinkondoma besu boonse nibakamvwa, bamasi boonse beengelede bakayoowa; bakafwiinsigwa loko mumeso aabo beni, nkaambo bakaziba kuti makani aamilimo eyi akazwa kuli-Leza wesu,
Nkabela mumazuba ayo bapati baba-Juda bakalembela Tobiya magwalo manji, amagwalo manji aazwa kuli-Tobiya akasika kulimbabo.

Nkaambo bantu banji ba-Juda kabatangene awe cizuminano, nkaambo kakuti kakwete mwana musimbi wa-Sekaniya mwana wa-Ara, alimwi mwanaakwe Jehohanana nguwakakwata mwana musimbi wa-Mesulamu mwana wa-Berekiya.
Nkabela milimo yakwe mibotu bakali kwiitembaula mumatwi aangu, amajwi aangu bakaatola kulinguwe. Lino Tobiya wakatuma amagwalo aakundiyoosya.
ndakalailila Hanani mukwesu a-Hananiya silutwe waŋanda yabwami kuti beendelezye Jerusalemu, nkaambo kali muntu musyomesi, wakali kuyoowa Leza kwiinda bantu banji.

Nkabela ndakabaambila kuti, Milyango yaJerusalemu itajalulwi mane izuba likasaale; alimwi nibaciimvwi, bajale milyango akwiilindila; alimwi amubike balindizi akati kabantu bakede mu­-Jerusalemu, umwi aumwi abe abulangizi bwakwe, umwi aumwi alindile kuntu kulangene aŋanda yakwe.
Lino munzi wakalikwazeme, kuuli mupati, pele bantu bamulinguwo bakaceya, aalo maanda kaatana kuyakwa.

Elyo Leza wangu wakabika mumoyo wangu muyeeyo wakubunganya bapati abasilutwe abantu boonse kuti balembwe. Nkabela ndakajana ibbuku lyamazyalani aabaabo ibakataanguna kuboola. Ngaaya makani ngendakajana aalembedwe mulindilyo.
Bakeza a-Zerubabeli. Mbaaba: Jeshua, Nehemiya, Azariya, Raamiya, Nahamani, Moodekai, Bilisani, Misiperete, Bigvai, Nehumu, Baana. Alimwi ngooyu mweelwe wabana baIsrayeli.
Bana ba-Parosi bakali zyuulu zyobile amwanda amakumi aali musanu aabili ababili.
Bana ba-Sefatiya bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu aabili ababili.
Bana ba-Ara bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi osanwe ababili.
Bana ba-Pahati-Moabu, nkukuti bana baJeshua aba-Joabu, bakali zyuulu zyobile amyanda iili musanu aitatu akumi amusanu abatatu.
Bana ba-Elamu bakali cuulu amyanda yobile amakumi osanwe abane.
Bana ba-Zatu bakali myanda iili musanu aitatu amakumi one abasanu.
Bana ba-Zakai bakali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi aali musanu alimwi.
Bana ba-Binui bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi one amusanu abatatu,
Bana ba-Bebai bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi obile amusanu abatatu.
Bana ba-Azigadi bakali zyuulu zyobile amyanda yotatwe amakumi obile ababili.
Bana ba-Adonikamu bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu ababili.
Bana ba-Bigvai bakali zyuulu zyobile amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu ababili.
Bana ba-Adini bakali myanda iili musanu alimwi, amakumi osanwe amusanu.
Bana ba-Ateri, ba-Hezekiya, bakali makumi aali musanu aane amusanu abatatu.
Bana ba-Hasumu bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi obile amusanu abatatu,
Bana ba-Bezai bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi obile abane.
Bana ba-Harifi bakali mwanda akumi ababili.
Bana ba-Gibeoni bakali makumi aali musanu aane abasanu.
Bantu ba-Betelehemu a-Netofa bakali mwanda amakumi aali musanu aatatu amusanu abatatu.
Bantu ba-Anatotu bakali mwanda amakumi obile amusanu abatatu,
Bantu ba-Beti-Azimaveti bakali makumi one ababili.
Bantu ba-Kiriati-Jearimu a-Kefira a-Beeroti bakali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi one abatatu,
Bantu ba-Rama aba-Geba bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi obile aumwi.
Bantu ba-Mikimasi bakali mwanda amakumi obile ababili.
Bantu ba-Beteli aba-Ai bakali mwanda amakumi obile abatatu,
Bantu ba-Nebo umbi bakali makumi osanwe ababili.
Bana ba-Elamu umbi bakali cuulu amyanda yobile amakumi osanwe abane,
Bana ba-Harimu bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi obile.
Bana ba-Jeriko bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi one abasanu.
Bana ba-Lodi a-Hadidi a-Ono bakali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi obile aumwi.
Bana ba-Senaa bakali zyuulu zyotatwe amyanda iili musanu aine amakumi otatwe.
Bana ba-Imeri bakali cuulu amakumi osanwe ababili,
Bana ba-Pasuri bakali cuulu amyanda yobile amakumi one amusanu ababili.
Bana ba-Harimu bakali cuulu akumi amusanu ababili,
Aba-Levi mbaaba. Bana ba-Jeshua aba-Kadimiyeli, nkukuti bana ba-Hodaviya, bakali makumi aali musanu aabili abane.
Abasikwiimba, bana ba-Asafu, bakali mwanda amakumi one amusanu abatatu.
Abasimilyango mbaaba: bana ba-Salumu, bana ba-Ateri, bana ba-Talimoni, bana ba-Akubu, bana ba-Hatita, bana ba-Sobai, boonse bakali mwanda amakumi otatwe amusanu abatatu.
Aba-Netinimu mbaaba: bana ba-Ziha, bana ba-Hasufa, bana ba-Tabaoti,
bana ba-Kerosi, bana ba-Siaha, bana ba-Padoni,
bana ba-Lebana, bana ba-Hagaba, bana ba-Salimai,
bana ba-Hanani, bana ba-Gideli, bana ba-Gahari,
bana ba-Rcaya, bana ba-Rezini, bana ba-Nekoda,
bana ba-Gazamu, bana ba-Uza, bana ba-Paseya,
bana ba-Besai, bana ba-Meunimu, bana ba-Nefusimu,
bana ba-Bakibuki, bana ba-Hakufa, bana ba-Harihuri,
bana ba-Baziluti, bana ba-Mehida, bana ba-Harisa,
bana ba-Barikosi, bana ba-Sisera, bana ba-Tamaki,
bana ba-Neziya, bana ba-Hatifa.
bana ba-Jaala, bana ba-Darikoni, bana ba-Gideli,
bana ba-Sefatiya, bana ba-Hatili, bana ba-Pokereti waku-Zabaimu, bana ba-Amoni.
Ba-Netinimu boonse abana babazike ba-Solomoni bakali myanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu aane ababili.
Alimwi mbaaba ibakainka kuzwa ku-Telemela aku-Teleharisa aku-Kerubi akuAdoni aku-Imeri, pele teebakakonzya kutondezya luzubo lwabo amukowa wabo, kuzibwe kuti mbana ba-Israyeli:
bana ba-Delaya, bana ba-Tobiya, bana ba-Nekoda; bakali myanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi one ababili.
Aba bakayandaula ibbuku lyaluzubo lwabo, pele teebakajanwa, aboobo bakagwisigwa mubupaizi mbuli basofweede.
Silutwe wakabaambila kuti tabeelede kulya zintu zisalalisya mane kubuke mupaizi uujisi Urimu a-Tumimu,
Lino mweelwe woonse wabantu wakali zyuulu zili makumi one azibili amyanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu alimwi,

nkutaamba bazike babo abazike basimbi babo, ibakali zyuulu zili musanu azibili amyanda yotatwe amakumi otatwe amusanu ababili. Alimwi akati kabo kakuli basikwiimba baalumi abanakazi, bali myanda yobile amakumi one amusanu.
Imbizi zyabo zyakali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi otatwe amusanu aimwi. Imbongolo zyabo zyakali myanda yobile amakumi one amusanu.
Inkamele zyabo zyakali myanda yone amakumi otatwe amusanu. Imbongolo zyabo zyakali zyuulu zili musanu acimwi amyanda iili musanu aibili amakumi obile.
Abamwi bapati bakabika muciyobwedo camilimo tupondo twangolida tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile ampondo zyansiliva zili zyuulu zyobile amyanda yobile.
Azipo nzibakaleta bantu bamwi nzeezi: tupondo twangolida tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile, ampondo zyansiliva zili zyuulu zyobile azikobela zyabupaizi zili makumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu azibili.
Elyo bapaizi aba-Levi abasimilyango abasikwiimba abamwi bantu aba-Netinimu aba-Israyeli boonse bakakala muminzi yabo. Nkabela mwezi wamusanu aibili niwakasika, bana ba-Israyeli bakali muminzi yabo.
Elyo Ezara mupaizi wakaleta mulao kumeso aabantu boonse babungene, baalumi abanakazi aboonse ibakakonzya kuswiililisya, mubuzuba butaanzi bwamwezi wamusanu aibili.

Lino wakabala majwi aawo kunembo lyamugwagwa uuli kunembo lyamulyango wamaanzi kuzwa kucifumofumo kusikila isikati, kubusyu bwabantu boonse, baalumi abanakazi aboonse ibakakonzya kumvwa, nkabela matwi aabantu boonse akayandisya kumvwa majwi aabbuku lyamulao.

Ezara mulembi wakaliimvwi aciimikilo cazisamu ncibakacitila makani aya ngaonya, alimwi kubbazu lyakwe kwakaima Matitiya a-Sema a-Anaya a-Uriya a-Hilikiya a-Maaseya, kujanza lyakwe lyalulyo, akujanza lyakwe lyalumwensi Pedaya a-Misayeli a-Malikiya a-Hasumu a-Hasibadana a-Zekariya a-Mesulamu.
Lino Ezara wakavununa ibbuku mumeso aabantu boonse, (nkaambo kali ajulu lyabantu boonse), nkabela naakalivununa, bantu boonse bakanyampuka.
Mpawo Ezara wakalumba Jehova Leza mupati, nkabela bantu boonse bakavuwa kuti, Ameni, Ameni, cakunyamuna maanza aabo. Lino bakakotamina Jehova akumukomba cakuvundama ansi.
Abalo ba-Jeshua a-Bani a-Serebiya a-Jamini a-Akubu a-Sabetai a-Hodiya a-Maaseya a-Kelita a-Azariya a-Jozabadi a-Hanani a-Pelaya aba-Levi mbobakapandulwida bantu mulao, nkabela bantu bakaima amwi.
Bakabala ibbuku lyamulao wa-Leza kabotu akupandulula majwi mbwaamba, aboobo bantu bakamvwisya majwi aakabalwa.

Elyo wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya, mukalye zilyo zili amafuta akunywa bunono akutuma zipo kumuntu kufumbwa uutana kubambilwa, nkaambo buzuba obuno mbuzuba busalalisya bwa-Mwami wesu. Mutausi pe, nkaambo lukondo lwa-Jehova ndolumupa inguzu.
Mbuboobo ba-Levi mbubakaumuzya bantu boonse. Bakati, Amuumune, nkaambo buzuba obuno mbuzuba busalalisya. Mutausi pe,
Mpawo bantu boonse bakainka kukulya akukunywa akukupana zipo akukusekelela loko, nkaambo bakalimvwide majwi aamulao ngebakalwiidwa.
Lino nibwakaca buzuba bwabili, bapati banzubo zyabantu boonse abapaizi aba-Levi bakayoboloka kuli-Ezara mupaizi, kuti bamvwisye majwi aamulao,
Nkabela bakajana kuti mumulao mulilembedwe makani aaJehova mbwaakalailila kumulomo wa-Musa kuti bana ba-Israyeli baleelede kukala muzilao mupobwe lyamumwezi wamusanu aibili,

alimwi kuti muminzi yabo yoonse amu-Jerusalemu baleelede kuteelezya ijwi lyakuti, Kamuya kucilundu, mukalete mitabi, mitabi yamaolifa amitabi yazisamu zyamafuta amitabi yamisiwe amitabi yatukunka amitabi yamisamu imwi, iijisi matu manji, mukayake zilao mbubonya mbukulembedwe.
Elyo bantu bakainka, baileta, balicitila zilao, umwi aumwi atala lyalululi lwaŋanda yakwe amumabanza aabo amumabanza aaŋanda ya-Leza amumugwagwa wamulyango wamaanzi amumugwagwa wamulyango wa-Efraimu.

Imbungano­ yoonse yabaabo ibakazwide mubuzike, boonse bakayaka zilao akukala mumonya muzilao. Bana ba-Israyeli kabatana kucita obo kuzwa kumazuba aa-Jeshua mwana wa-Nuni kusikila kubuzuba obo. Aboobo kwakaba kusekelela kupati loko.

Alimwi buzuba bumwi abumwi, kuzwa kubuzuba butaanzi kusikila kubuzuba busyaalizi, wakabala mubbuku lyamulao wa-Leza. Nkabela bakaiya ipobwe mazuba aali musanu aabili, elyo mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu kwakaba imbungano mbubonya mbukulaililwa.
Elyo bana ba-Israyeli bakaandaanya abana babeenzu boonse, nkabela bakaima akulyaamba zibi zyabo amilandu yabamawisi.
Lino bakabuka mpoonya awo mpobakabede, bakabala ibbuku lyamulao wa-Jehova Leza wabo cipanzi cane cabuzuba, elyo cipanzi acimwi cane bakali kulyaamba akukomba Jehova Leza wabo.
Mpawo kwakanyampuka amatantilo aaba-Levi Jeshua a-Bani a-Kadimiyeli a-Sebaniya a-Buni aSerebiya a-Bani a-Kenani, nkabela bakakwiilila Jehova Leza wabo ajwi ipati.

Lino ba-Levi, Jeshua a-Kadimiyeli a-Bani a-Hasabineya a-Serebiya a-Hodiya a-Sebaniya a-Petahiya, bakati, Amubuke, mulumbe Jehova Leza wanu lyoonse alyoonse mane kukabe kutamani. Lilumbwe izina lyako lilemu, liinda kulumbwa koonse akutembaulwa koonse.

Nduwe Jehova olike. Nduwe wakalenga ijulu ajulu lyakujulu amakamu oonse aamulindilyo. Nduwe wakalenga nyika azintu zyoonse zili alinjiyo. Nduwe wakalenga lwizi azyoonse zili mulindulo. Nduwe oabila zyoonse buumi. Makamu aakujulu alakukomba.
Nduwe Jehova Leza iwakasala Abramu, Nduwe iwakamugwisya mu-Uri wamucisi caba-Kasidi akumupa izina lya-Abrahamu.

Wakajana kuti moyo wakwe wasyomeka kubusyu bwako, aboobo wakatangana awe cizuminano cakumupa nyika yaba-Kanana ayaba-Hiti ayabaAmori ayaba-Perizi ayaba-Jebusi ayaba-Girigasi. Wakasyomezya kupa bana bakwe njiyo, nkabela ijwi lyako wakalizuzikizya, nkaambo uwe uliluleme.
Alimwi wakubona mapenzi aabamatata nibakali mu-Egepita, akulila kwabo kwaku-Lwizi Lusalala wakakuswiilila.
Nduwe wakacita zitondezyo ziyoosya kuli-Farao akubalanda bakwe akubantu banyika yakwe, nkaambo kozi mbubakabasampaula. Aboobo wakalijanina izina lyampuwo mbubonya mbojisi sunu.
Alimwi wakaandula lwizi kubusyu bwabo, wabazubula lwizi anga baya bweenda ansi iitakwe maanzi, abaabo ibakali kubatobela wabawaala mubulondo mbubonya mbuli ibbwe mbuliinkila mumaanzi malamfu.
Nkabela ciindi casikati wakabeenzya kumusemu wakumbi, masiku wakabeenzya kumusemu wamulilo wakubamunikila inzila njibeelede kutola.
Alimwi acilundu ca-Sinai wakaseluka, wabaambila kuzwa kujulu, wabapa imbeta ziluleme amulao wabwini, milazyo amilao mibotu.
Wakabazibya buzuba bwako busalalisya bwa-Sabata, wabalailila milazyo ambeta amilao kujanza lya-Musa mulanda wako.
Wakabaabila cilyo cizwa kujulu cakulesya inzala yabo, wabagwisizya maanzi mundomba kukulesya nyota yabo, wabalailila kuti banjile kukuvuba nyika eyo njowakasyomezya kubapa.
Nekubaboobo balo bamawiseesu bakalisumpula, bayumya myoyo yabo, bakaka kuswiilila milazyo yako.

Eya, bakakaka kuswiilila, Bakaluba milimo yako iigambya njowakacita akati kabo. Bakayumya myoyo yabo, alimwi mucinguni cabo bakalisalila silutwe kuti babweede kubuzike bwabo. Pele uwe uli Leza uuyandisya kulekelela, uli siluzyalo, uli sibuuya, tofwambi kukalala, Muluzyalo lwako lugambya tokwakabasoowa pe.
Nikuba kuciindi eco nibakalicitila moombe uufulidwe, nibakaamba kuti, Ngooyu Leza wako iwakakugwisya mu-Egepita, nibakacita milimo yakukalazya loko,

uwe muluzyalo lwako lupati tokwakabaleka munkanda, Musemu wakumbi wakubeenzya isikati munzila, tokwakaugwisya, amusemu wamulilo wakubamunikila masiku kuti babone inzila njibeelede kutola, tokwakaugwisya.
Wakapa Muuya wako mubotu kuti abaiisye. Tokwakakakila milomo yabo cilyo cako ca-Mana, alimwi wakabaabila maanzi kuti nyota yabo imane.
Myaka ili akumi one wakabalela munkanda, Taakwe ncibakabula. Zyakusama zyabo teezyakazakala, amaulu aabo tecakazimba.
Wakabapa mami azisi akuzyaabila mumaanza aabo, aboobo bakavuba nyika ya-Sihoni anyika yamwami wa-Hesiboni anyika ya-Ogi mwami waBasani.
Abalo bana babo wakabavuzya mbuli inyenyeezi zyakujulu, alimwi wakabasisya kunyika eyo njowakasyomezya bamawisi kuti bayoonjila kuzooivuba.

Bana babo bakeza kuzoovuba nyika, nkabela wakabombya kubusyu bwabo bantu ibakakede munyika, nkukuti ba-Kanana, akubaaba mumaanza aabo, abami babo abantu banyika, kuti babacitile kufumbwa ncibakayanda.

Bakazunda minzi iizyungulukidwe mabaya, anyika iili amafuta, aboobo bakavuba maanda aazulide zintu zibotu amikalo iisidwe amyuunda yamasaansa ayamaolifa azisamu zinji zili acilyo. Elyo bakaiya, bakakuta, bakaneneya, nkabela bakasekelela bubotu bwako bugambya.
Nekubaboobo bakakataazya, bakakupapila, bakasowa mulao wako kusule lyabo. Bakajaya basinsimi bako ibakali kubaambila makani akusoleka kubaboozya kulinduwe. Bakacita milimo minji yakukukalazya.

Nkaambo kako wakabaaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyina kuti babapenzye. Lino kuciindi cakupenga kwabo, nibakakukwiilila, wakaswiilila kujulu nkobede, nkabela muluzyalo lwako lupati wakabapa bafutuli bakubafutula mumaanza aabasinkondonyina babo.

Pele bamane buyo kulyokezya, bakaboola alimwi kucita bubi mumeso aako. Nkaambo kako wakabasia mumaanza aabasinkondonyina, kuti babafwiinsye. Nekubaboobo nibakaboola kukuswiilila, wakaswiilila alimwi kujulu nkobede. Ziindi zinji muluzyalo lwako wakabavuna.

Wakabaambila makani kuti ubaboozye kumulao wako, nekubaboobo bakalisumpula, bakaka kuswiilila milazyo yako, basotoka imbeta zyako (nzenzizyo ziponya kufumbwa muntu uuzicita). Bakafutatila azifunzi zyabo, bayumya myoyo yabo, bakaka kuswiilila.
Myaka minji wakakazika moyo wako kulimbabo, wabaambila makani kunguzu zya-Muuya wako kumilomo yabasinsimi bako, nekubaboobo teebakaswiilila. Elyo wakabaaba mumaanza aabamasi,
nekubaboobo muluzyalo lwako lugambya teewakabamaninina nikuba kubasowelela, nkaambo nduwe Leza sibuuya, siluzyalo.
Uliluleme mumakani­ aya oonse aatusikila, nkaambo nduwe ocita bwini, anukuti iswe twabisya.
Abalo bami besu abapati besu abapaizi besu abamatateesu tabana kucita mulao wako, tabana kuswiilila milazyo yako abukamboni bwako mbowakabalwiida.
Mucisi cabo, akati kabubotu bwako bupati mbowabapa, munyika impati iinona njowabaabila, tabana kukubelekela milimo nikuba kuleka incito zyabo zibi,
Bona! Iswe sunu tuli bazike, ayalo nyika njowakapa bamatateesu, kuti balye micelo yayo abubotu bwayo, tuli bazike mumonya mulinjiyo.
Ilaleta impindu impati kubami mbobikide kuti batweendelezye, nkaambo kazibi zyesu. Balijisi bwami bwakweendelezya mibili yesu aŋombe zyesu mbubayanda. Tuli mumapenzi mapati.
Nekubaboobo tulatangana mulongo walusinizyo, tulaulemba. Abapati besu aba-Levi abapaizi besu balanamatizya.
Seraya, Azariya, jeremiya,
Pasuri, Amariya, Malikiya,
Hatusi, Sebaniya, Maluki,
Harimu, Meremoti, Obadiya,
Daniele, Ginetoni, Baruki,
Mesulamu, Abija, Mijamini,
Maaziya, Biligai, Semaya. Mbaabo bapaizi.
Aba-Levi mbaaba: Jeshua mwana wa-Azaniya, Binui umwi wabana ba-Henadadi, Kadimiyeli,
bakwabo Sebaniya, Hodiya, Kelita, Pelaya, Hanani,
Mika, Rehobu, Hasabiya,
Zakuri, Serebiya, Sebaniya,
Hodiya, Bani, Beninu,
Abapati babantu mbaaba: Parosi, Pahati-Moabu, Elamu, Zatu, Bani,
Buni, Azigadi, Bebai,
Adonija, Bigvai, Adini,
Ateri, Hezekiya, Azuri,
Hodiya, Hasumu, Bezai,
Harifi, Anatoti, Nobai,
Magipiasi, Mesulamu, Heziri,
Mesezabele, Zadoki, Jadua,
Pelatiya, Hanani, Anaya,
Hosea, Hananiya, Hasubu,
Halohesi, Piliha, Sobeki,
Rehumu, Hasabina, Maaseya,
a-Ahija, Hanani, Anani,
Maluki, Harimu, Baana.

Abantu bamwi basyeede, bapaizi, aba-Levi, abasimilyango, abasikwiimba, aba-Netinimu, aboonse ibakalyaandaanya abamasi kukubamba milao ya-Leza, abanakazi babo abana babo balombe abana babo basimbi, boonse ibakajisi luzibo akuswiilila,

bakakakatila kubakwabo bapati babo. Bakacita cisyomezyo acikonke, kuti beende mumulao wa-Leza iwakapegwa kumulomo wa-Musa mulanda wa-Leza, akubamba milazyo yoonse ya-Jehova Mwami wesu ambeta zyakwe amilao yakwe.
Alimwi twakazumina kukaka kupa bana basimbi besu kukukwatwa kulibamasi, abana babo basimbi tatukooyoobabweza kuti bakwatwe kubana besu.

Alimwi twakazumina kuti, bantu bamasi nibakaleta makwebo na zilyo zyakuuzya buzuba bwa-Sabata, nitwakakaka kuula buzuba bwaSabata amumazuba aasalala. Alimwi twakazumina kulekelela basizikoloto boonse mumwaka wamusanu aibili,
Lino twakalicitila mulao wakupa cipanzi catatu casyekeli mwaka umwi aumwi, cibe camilimo yaŋanda ya-Leza wesu,

acazinkwa zyamabonwabonwa, acacipaizyo cituulwa lyoonse, acazipaizyo zituulwa lyoonse buzuba bwa-Sabata amumwezi mupya akumapobwe aabikidwe, acazintu zisalala, acazipaizyo zyakutuulila zibi zyabaIsrayeli, acamilimo yoonse yaŋanda ya-Leza wesu.

Alimwi twakawaala zisolo, bapaizi aba-Levi abantu, zyazipo zyankuni zyeelede kuletwa kuŋanda ya-Leza wesu, munzubo zyesu, kuziindi zyeelede mwaka umwi aumwi, kukutenta acipaililo ca-Jehova Leza wesu, mbubonya mbukulembedwe numulao.
Alimwi twakazumina kuleta kabalwebalwe kamyuunda yesu, akabalwebalwe kamicelo yoonse yamisamu yoonse, mwaka umwi aumwi, kuŋanda ya-Jehova;

abataanzi akati kabana besu aŋombe zyesu, mbubonya mbukulembedwe mumulao, abataanzi bazyedwe akati kaŋombe zyesu ambelele zyesu, boonse buyo twakazumina kubaleta kuŋanda ya-Leza wesu, kubapaizi babeleka milimo muŋanda ya-Leza wesu.

Akalo kabalwebalwe kabusu bwesu azituuzyo zyesu, amicelo yamisamu yoonse, awaini, amafuta, zyoonse twakazumina kuzileta kubapaizi mutwaanda twaŋanda ya-Leza wesu; acipanzi cakumi canyika yesu twakazumina kuzileta kuba-Levi, nkaambo mbombabo ba-Levi beelede kupegwa cipanzi cakumi muminzi yoonse yakulima kwesu.

Alakwe mupaizi, mwana wa-Aroni, uleelede kuba aba-Levi ciindi ba-Levi nibakapegwa zipanzi zyakumi, Alimwi ba-Levi baleelede kuleta cipanzi cakumi cizipanzi zyakumi kuŋanda ya-Leza wesu, kutwaanda twaŋanda yaziyobwedo.

Nkaambo bana ba-Israyeli abana ba-Levi baleelede kuleta zituuzyo zyamaila azyawaini azyamafuta kutwaanda, nkukonya nkuzibede zibelesyo zyaŋanda iisalalisya, nkubabede bapaizi babeleka milimo abasimilyango abasikwiimba. Tatukooyooleka iŋanda ya-Leza wesu.
Nkabela bantu bakalumba boonse ibakazumina amyoyo yabo beni kukala mu-Jerusalemu.
Lino mbaaba basilutwe bacisi ibakakala mu-Jerusalemu. Pele muminzi ya-Juda umwi aumwi wakalikede mucaabilo cakwe muminzi yabo, ba-Israyeli, bapaizi, ba-Levi, ba-Netinimu, abana babazike ba-Solomoni.

Amu-Jerusalemu mwakakala bamwi babana ba-Juda abana ba-Benjamini, Bana ba-Juda mbaaba: Ataya mwana waUziya mwana wa-Zekariya mwana wa-Amariya mwana wa-Sefatiya mwana wa-Mahalaleli, umwi wabana ba-Perezi,
a-Maaseya mwana wa-Baruki mwana wa-Koli-hoze mwana wa-Hazaya mwana wa-Adaya mwana waJoyaribu mwana wa-Zekariya mwana wamuntu waku-Siloni.
Boonse bana ba-Perezi ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu bakali myanda yone amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu abatatu, basilumamba.
Abana ba-Benjamini mbaaba. Salu mwana wa-Mesulamu mwana wa-Joedi mwana wa-Pedaya mwana wa-Kolaya mwana wa-Maaseya mwana wa-Itiyeli mwana wa-Jesaya,
abakwabo Gabai a-Salai, Boonse bana ba-Benjamini bakali myanda iili musanu aine amakumi obile amusanu abatatu,
Joeli mwana wa-Zikiri kali silutwe wabo, a-Juda mwana wa-Hasenuwa kali silutwe wabili wamunzi,
Abapaizi mbaaba: Jedaya mwana wa-Joyaribu, Jakini,
Seraya mwana wa-Hilikiya mwana wa-Mesulamu mwana wa-Zadoki mwana wa-Merayoti mwana wa-Ahitubu silutwe waŋanda ya-Leza,

abanyina ibakabeleka milimo yaŋanda, bantu bali myanda iili musanu aitatu amakumi obile ababili; a-Adaya mwana wa-Jerohamu mwana wa-Pelaliya mwana wa-Amzi mwana wa-Zekariya mwana wa-Pasuri mwana wa-Malikiya,
abanyina, basilutwe banzubo, bantu bali myanda yobile amakumi one ababili; a-Amasisai mwana wa-Azareli mwana wa-Ahizai mwana wa-Mesilemoti mwana wa-Imeri,
abakwabo, basilumamba basinguzu, bantu bali mwanda amakumi obile amusanu abatatu. Silutwe wabo kali Zabidiyeli mwana wa-Hagedolimu.
Aba-Levi mbaaba: Semaya mwana wa-Hasubu mwana wa-Azirikamu mwana wa-Hasabiya mwana wa-Buni,
a-Sabetai, a-Jozabadi, umwi wabasilutwe baba-Levi iwakali kubamba milimo yaanze yaŋanda ya-Leza,

a-Mataniya mwana wa-Mika mwana wa-Zabidi mwana wa-Asafu, silutwe iwakali kutalika milimo yakulumba kuciindi cakukomba, a-Bakibukiya iwakali wabili akati kabanyina, a-Abida mwana wa-Samua mwana wa-Galali mwana wa-Jedutuni.
Boonse ba-Levi bamumunzi uusalala bakali myanda yobile amakumi aali musanu aatatu abane.
Abasimilyango, Akubu a-Talimoni abakwabo ibakali kulanga milyango, bakali mwanda amakumi aali musanu aabili ababili.
Aba-Israyeli bamwi, bapaizi, aba-Levi, bakalikede muminzi yoonse ya-Juda, umwi aumwi mucaabilo cakwe,
Pele ba-Netinimu bakalikede mu-Ofeli. Ziha a-Gisipa mbobakali basilutwe baba-Netinimu.
Asilutwe waba-Levi baku-Jerusalemu kali Uzi mwana wa-Bani mwana wa-Hasabiya mwana wa-Mataniya mwana wa-Mika, umwi wabana ba-Asafu, basikwiimba ibakali kubamba milimo yaŋanda ya-Leza,
Nkaambo mwami wakalailila aambabo, alimwi basikwiimba bakabikilwa caabilo buzuba bumwi abumwi.
Nkabela Petahiya mwana wa-Mesezabele, umwi wabana ba-Zera mwana wa-Juda, kali kujanza lyamwami kumakani oonse aabantu.
Lino ngaaya makani aatunzuunzi amyuunda yato. Bana ba-Juda, bamwi bakakala mu-Kiriyatiariba atunzuunzi twawo, amu-Diboni atunzuunzi twawo, amu-Jekabizeeli atunzuunzi twawo,
amu-Jeshua, amu-Molada, amu-Ben-peleti,
amuHazara-suala, amu-Beeri-seba atunzuunzi twawo,
amu-Zikilagi, amuMekona atunzuunzi twawo,
amu-Eni-rimoni, amu-Zora, amu-Jarimuti,
mu-Zanoa a-Adulamu atunzuunzi twayo, mu-Lakisi amyuunda yawo, mu-Azeka atunzuunzi twawo. Nkabela bakayaka zilao kuzwa ku-Beeri-seba mane kusikila kukuti lya-Hinomu.
Abana ba-Benjamini bakalikede koonse kuzwa ku-Mikimasi, ku-Aija, ku-Beteli atunzuunzi twawo,
kuAnarotu, ku-Nobi, ku-Ananiya,
ku-Hazori, ku-Rama, ku-Gitaimu,
ku-Hadidi, ku-Zeboimu, ku-Nebalati,
ku-Lodi, ku-Ono, kukuti lyabasimilimo.
Alimwi akati kaba-Levi inkamu zimwi zyaba-Juda zyakaba zya-Benjamini.
Amariya, Maluki, Hatusi,
Sekaniya, Rehumu, Meremoti,
Ido, Ginetoni, Abija,
Miyamini, Maadiya, Biliga,
Semaya, Joyaribu, Jedaya,
Salu, Amoki, Hilikiya, Jedaya. Mbaabo basilutwe babapaizi abakwabo mumazuba aa-Jeshua,
Aba-Levi mbaaba: Jeshua, Binui, Kadimiyeli, Serebiya, Juda, Mataniya (ngonguwe iwakali kubamba milimo yakutembaula, walo abanyina).
Abalo Bakibukiya a-Uno, bakwabo, bakalibambene abo munkamu zyabo.
Nkabela Jeshua wakazyala Joyakimu, alakwe Joyakimu wakazyala Eliyasibu, alakwe Eliyasibu wakazyala Joyada,
alakwe joyada wakazyala Jonatani, alakwe Jonatani wakazyala Jadua.
Lino mumazuba aa-Joyakimu, bapaizi basilutwe banzubo mbaaba: Luzubo lwa-Seraya, Meraya; luzubo lwa­-Jeremiya, Hananiya;
luzubo lwa-Ezara, Mesulamu; luzubo lwaAramiya, Jehohanana;
luzubo lwa-Maluki, Jonatani; luzubo lwaSebaniya, Josefa;
luzubo lwa-Harimu, Adina; luzubo lwa-Merayoti, Helikai;
luzubo lwa-Ido, Zekariya; luzubo lwa-Ginetoni, Mesulamu;
luzubo lwa-Abiia, Zikiri; luzubo lwa-Miniamini, nkukuti Moadiya, Pilitai;
luzubo lwa-Biliga, Samua; luzubo lwa-Semaya, Jonatani;
luzubo lwa-Joyaribu, Matenai; luzubo lwa-Jedaya, Uzi;
luzubo lwaSalai, Kalai; luzubo lwa-Amoki, Eberi;
luzubo lwa-Hilikiya, Hasabiya; luzubo lwa-Jedaya, Netaneli;
Mumazuba aa-Eliyasibu, Joyada, Johanani a-Jadua, bapati banzubo baba-Levi bakalembwa, abalo bapaizi mumazuba aabwami bwa-Dariyo mu-Persia.
Bana ba-Levi, basilutwe banzubo bakalembwa mubbuku lyamakani aaciindi, mane kusikila kumazuba aa-Johanani mwana wa-Eliyasibu.

Abasilutwe baba-Levi mbaaba: Hasabiya, Serebiya, a-Jeshua mwana wa-Kadimiyeli, abakwabo mbubakabambene abo, ibakali kulumba akutembaula mbubonya mbwaakalailila Davida muntu wa-Leza, inkamu ililangene ankamunyina.
Mataniya, a-Bakibukiya, Obadiya, Mesulamu, Talimoni, Akubu, bakali kulanga milyango yabulangizi, kuziyobwedo zyamilyango.
Abo bakali mumazuba aa-Joyakimu mwana wa-Jeshua mwana wa-Jozadaki, amumazuba aa-Nehemiya mweendelezi a-Ezara mupaizi mulembi.
Nkabela bana babasikwiimba bakayoboloka, kuzwa kubanda lyeengelede Jerusalemu akuzwa kuminzi yaba-Netofi,
akuzwa ku-Beti-Giligala, akuzwa kumyuunda ya-Geba a-Azamaveti, nkaambo basikwiimba kabayakide minzi cakuzyunguluka Jerusalemu.
Elyo bapaizi aba-Levi bakalisalazya, alimwi bakasalazya bantu amilyango abulambo.
Lino ndakasisya basilutwe ba-Juda atala abulambo. Nkabela ndakabika inkamu impati zyobile zyakweenda kuya butembaula. Inkamu intaanzi yakaya kululyo abulambo kuya kumulyango wabufumba,
Kusule lyabo kwakeenda Hosaya acisela cabasilutwe ba-Juda,
a-Azariya, Ezara, Mesulamu,
Juda, Benjamini, a-Semaya, a-Jeremiya,
abamwi bana babapaizi basimyeembo, Zekariya mwana wa-Jonatani mwana wa-Semaya mwana wa-Mataniya mwana wa-Mikaya mwana wa-Zakuri mwana wa-Asafu,
abanyina Semaya a-Azareli, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Netaneli, a-Jehuda, Hanani, bali azibelesyo zyakwiimbya zya-Davida muntu wa-Leza. Alakwe Ezara mupaizi nguwakabasololela.
Lino kumulyango wacikala bakalulama kutanta kumatantilo aamunzi wa-Davida, kumatantilo aabulambo, kujulu lyaŋanda ya-Davida, mane kusikila kumulyango wamaanzi wakujwe.
Ankamu yabili yabasikutembaula bakaya kuyooswanaana abo, ambebo ndakali kubatobela, acisela cabantu ibakali abulambo, kuzwa kuŋanda indamfu yaziko mane kusikila kubulambo bukwazeme,

akuzwa kumulyango wa-Efraimu, kufwaafwi kumulyango wakalekale, amulyango wanswi, aŋanda indamfu ya-Hananeeli, aŋanda indamfu ya-Mea, mane kusikila kumulyango wambelele. Elyo bakaima mumulyango wabalindizi.
Mbuboobo inkamu zyobile zyabasikutembaula mbuzyakaima muŋanda ya-Leza. Ambebo ndakali nkuko, acisela cabasilutwe,
abapaizi Eliyakimu, Maaseya, Minjamini, Mikaya, Eliunai, Zekariya, Hananiya, bakali amyeembo;
a-Maaseya, a-Semaya, a-Eleazara, a-Uzi, a-Jehohanana, a-Malikiya, a-Elamu a-Ezeri. Nkabela basikwiimba bakaimbisya. Jezerahiya kali silutwe wabo.

Lino bakatuula zipaizyo zipati mubuzuba obo, alimwi bakasekelela, nkaambo Leza wakabasekelezya alukondo lupati. Abalo banakazi abana boonse bakasekelela, aboobo kusekelela kwa-Jerusalemu kwakamvwigwa kule.
Aboobo bakalanga bulangizi bwa-Leza wabo abulangizi bwakusalazya, Abalo basimilyango abasikwiimba bakacita mbubonya, mbubonya mbwaakalailila Davida amwanaakwe Solomoni.
Nkaambo kalekale mumazuba aa-Davida a-Asafu kakuli silutwe wabasikwiimba anyimbo zyakutembaula azyakulumba Leza.

Nkabela mumazuba aa-Zerubabeli amumazuba aa-Nehemiya ba-Israyeli boonse bakali kwaabila basikwiimba abasimilyango zyaabilo, buzuba bumwi abumwi mbukweelede. Bakasalazizya ba-Levi, abalo ba-Levi bakasalazizya bana ba-Aroni.
nkaambo kakuti teebakagwasya bana ba-Israyeli insima amaanzi, alimwi bakatamba Balamu kuti abatukile, nekubaboobo Leza wesu wakasandula lutukilo lube coolwe.
Elyo nibakamvwa mulao, bakapambukanya kuba-Israyeli boonse bantu bavwelene.
Lino Eliyasibu, mupaizi iwakapegwa milimo yatwaanda twamuŋanda ya-Leza wesu kali musazinyina Tobiya,

nkabela kamubambilide kaanda kapati, nkubakataanguna kubika zituuzyo, atununkilizyo, azibelesyo, azipanzi zyakumi zyamaila azyawaini azyamafuta nzibakalaililwa kupa ba-Levi, abasikwiimba, abasimilyango, azituuzyo zyabapaizi.
Pele ciindi eco coonse mebo teendakali ku-Jerusalemu, nkaambo mumwaka wamakumi otatwe aibili wa-Aritasasta mwami wa-Babuloni, ndakapiluka kumwami. Elyo kabe kaindi, ndakakumbila kumwami,
ndeza ku-Jerusalemu. Nkabela nindakamvwa bubi Eliyasibu mbwaakacitila Tobiya, mbwaakamubambila kaanda mulubanza lwaŋanda ya-Leza,
ndakausa loko. Lino ndakasowa zibelesyo zyoonse zya-Tobiya anze lyakaanda.
Nkabela ndakabalailila kusalazya twaanda, elyo ndakanjizya omo zibelesyo zyaŋanda ya-Leza acituuzyo atununkilizyo.
Lino ndakakazyanya abasilutwe, ndabaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi iŋanda ya-Leza ililekedwe? Nkabela ndakababunganya, ndababika mumasena aabo.
Lino ba-Juda boonse bakaleta cipanzi cakumi camaila acawaini acamafuta kuziyobwedo,

Alimwi ndakabika basiziyobwedo: Selemiya mupaizi, a-Zadoki mulembi, a-Pedaya umwi waba-Levi; akusule lyabo, Hanani mwana wa-Zakuri mwana wa-Mataniya; nkaambo bakayeeyegwa kuti mbasyomesi, aboobo bakapegwa milimo yakwaabila bakwabo.
Utandilubi, O Leza wangu, nkaambo kamakani aya. Utaziminganyi milimo yangu mibotu njindacitila iŋanda ya-Leza wangu aziyanza zyayo.
Alimwi kwakakala nkuko bamwi bantu ba-Turo ibakali kuleta inswi azintu zyoonse zyakusambala, bakali kuuzya kubana ba-Juda mu-Jerusalemu buzuba bwa-Sabata.
Lino ndakakazyanya abapati ba-Juda, ndabaambila kuti, Ino ncinzi cintu eci cibi ncimucita kukubisizya buzuba bwa-Sabata,
Sa bamauso banu teebakacita obo? Nciceeco Leza wesu ncaakaletela aya mapenzi oonse kulindiswe akumunzi wesu, Mulaletela cisi ca-Israyeli bukali mbumubisizya Sabata,

Nkabela nikwakatalika kusia kumilyango ya-Jerusalemu kumatalikilo aa-Sabata, ndakalailila kuti bajale zitendele, batajaluli limbi mane buzuba bwa-Sabata bumane. Nkabela ndakabika bamwi balanda bangu kumilyango, kuti kutaletwi mukuli nuuba umwi mubuzuba bwa-Sabata.
Elyo basambazi abasikuuzya zintu komwe na kobile bakakala-kala anze lya-Jerusalemu.
Pele ndakabatapatila, ndati, Ino nkaambonzi mulakala-kala kubulambo. Na mwacita obo limbi, nzoomujata. Lino kuzwa kuciindi eco teebakabeola limbi buzuba bwa-Sabata,
Nkabela ndakalailila ba-Levi kuti balisalazye, baze kuzoolindila milyango kukusalazya buzuba bwa-Sabata. Kondiyeeya, O Leza wangu, nkaambo kamakani aya. Kondifwida luse muluzyalo lwako lupati.
Alimwi mumazuba ayo ngaonya ndakabona bamwi ba-Juda ibakakwete banakazi baku-Asidodi, ba-Amoni, aba-Moabu,
nkabela bana babo bakali kwaamba majwi amwi aaci-Asidodi; teebakaambisya ci-Juda pe, bakali kuvwelanya myaambo yoonse yobile,

Mpawo ndakakazyanya abo. Ndakabatukila, abamwi babo ndakabauma akunonkola masusu aabo. Nkabela ndakabakonkya kuli-Leza cikonke. Ndakaamba kuti, Tamweelede kupa bana babo balombe bana banu basimbi abana babo basimbi bana banu tabeelede kubakwata, anywebo tamweelede kubakwata.

Sa Solomoni mwami wa-Israyeli takwakabisya mumakani aya? Katakwe mwami uuelene awe akati kazisi zinji, nkaambo wakayandwa kuli-Leza wakwe, alimwi Leza wakamubika kuti abe mwami waba-Israyeli boonse, nekubaboobo banakazi beenzu bakamuwisya muzibi.
Lino sa tulakonzya kumuswiilila kukucita bubi bupati buli obo? Sa tulakonzya kubisizya Leza wesu kukukwata banakazi beenzu?
Utabalubi, O Leza wangu, nkaambo bakasofwaazya bupaizi acizuminano cabupaizi acaba-Levi.
Mbuboobo mbundakagwisya beenzu akati kabo. Alimwi ndakabikila inkamu zyabapaizi azyaba-Levi imwi aimwi milimo yazyo.
Amilimo yazipo zyankuni kuziindi zyeelede ayakabalwebalwe, yoonse ndakaibamba, Kondiyeeya O Leza wangu. Kondicitila bubotu.
kuti ciindi eco mwami Ahasuera kakede acuuno cabwami bwakwe cakali mu-Susa munzi wamwami,
mumwaka watatu wabulelo bwakwe, wakabacitila pobwe beendelezi abakamboni bakwe; alimwi basimutwe bankondo zya-Persia a-Media, abaleli abapati bazisi bakaliko.
Wakabayubunwida lubono lwabwami bwakwe lukankamanisya azyakusama zya bwami zigambya, mazuba manji, mazuba aali mwaanda amakumi aali musanu mwaatatu,
Akamana mazuba aya mwami wakabacitila pobwe boonse bakali mu-Susa munzi wamwami, bapati abaniini, mazuba aali musanu mwaabili, mulukwakwa lwaŋanda yamwami;

akali masani aanzikidwe aatuba aasiyasiya aangidwe amakole aazisani zituba azisalala kutusale twansiliva akumisemo yabbwe bbotu; zikalilo zyangolida azyansiliva zyakalikede acibuye camabwe aasalala, aatuba, aasiya.
Bakabanywisya muzinywido zyangolida (kazyaandeene) alimwi akaambo kabwaabi bwamwami waini wakaba ceyo;
pele, amulao, taakwe wakasungilizigwa kuti anywe, nkaambo mwami wakalaambide kubazike boonse baŋanda yakwe kuti acite mbuli mbwayanda mweenzu woonse.
Awalo Vasiti namalelo wakabacitila pobwe bakaintu baŋanda yamwami Ahasuera.

Lino kubuzuba bwamusanu mwaabili moyo wamwami kaukondwa akaambo kawaini, wakalailila Mehumani, Bizita, Habona, Bigita, Abagata, Zeta a-Kaaka basiŋanda bali musanu mubabili bakalindilila mwami Ahasuera,
kuti balete Vasiti namalelo kumbele lyakwe kasamide munsini wabwami kuti bantu abasimutwe babone kweebeka kwakwe. Nkaambo wakali kweebeka kukulanga.
Pele Vasiti wakakaka kuboola basiŋanda nebakaleta ijwi lyamwami. Lino mwami wakakalala kapati, wakapya lunyemo,
elyo wakabuzya kubasongo bakezi zilengwa (nkaambo kukosola koonse kwamwami kwakali koombololwa abasimulao abasilubeta).

Bali afwaafwi anguwe bakali Kaasena, Seta, Adamata, Taasisi, Meresi, Maasena, a-Memukani beendelezi musanu ababili ba-Persia a-Media, bakazumininwa kuti banjile kumwami akukala munsi lyacuuno cabwami.
Wakabuzya akaambo ka-Vasiti namalelo kuti ncinzi ncaakeelede kucitilwa akaambo kakutaswiilila kwakwe ijwi lyamwami kulibasiŋanda bakwe.
Memukani wakavuwa kunembo lyamwami abeendelezi wati, Vasiti takwabisizya mwami alike pele beendelezi boonse abantu bamuzisi zyamwami Ahasuera.
Nkaambo eci ncacita namalelo ciyakumvwigwa abakaintu boonse, elyo bayakunyansya baalumi babona kuti kwaambwa kuti mwami Ahasuera wakalailila Vasiti namalelo kuti aletwe kumbele lyakwe pele wakaka.
Buzuba buno, bakaintu babeendelezi ba-Persia a-Media bamvwa amilimo yanamalelo, balaamba cakunyansya atubuko kulibasimutwe boonse bamwami.

Kuti kazumina mwami, kacituminwa maleya cilaililo cakwe, alimwi kacilembwa mumilao yaba-Persia aba-Media, citakasandulwi, kuti Vasiti atakabooli limbi kunembo lyamwami Ahasuera; mwami kapa cilao cakwe cabwami kuluumbi uumwiinda kubota.
Elyo, mulao wamwami kuti kawiimikidwe akutuminwa maleya mubwami bwakwe boonse (nkaambo mbupati), boonse bakaintu bayoolemeka baalumi babo, bapati abaniini.
Twaambo otu twabotezya mwami abeendelezi, elyo mwami waka cita mbuli mbwakaamba Memukani;
wakatuma maŋwalo kuzisi zyakwe zyoonse, kucisi cimwi acimwi mbuli kulemba kwaco akumukowa woonse mululimi lwawo, kalailila kuti mwaalumi woonse alele muŋanda yakwe akupa milazyo mbuli mbwayanda.
balindilizi bakwe bakaamba kuti, Kabayandawida mwami basimbi beebeka;

mwami kabika batumwa muzisi zyoonse zyabwami bwakwe kuti bakabunganye boonse basimbi beebeka mu-Susa munzi wamwami, muŋanda yabakaintu, kababikwa mumaanza aa-Hege siŋanda wamwami, mulangi wabakaintu; kabapegwa mwiimpula azinunkilizyo nzebayanda,
elyo musimbi uukondesya mwami abe namalelo mubusena bwa-Vasiti. Muyeeyo oyu wakabotezya mwami, elyo wakacita obo.
Lino, mu-Susa munzi wamwami kamuli mu-Juda uutegwa Moodekai, mwana a-Jai, mwana a-Simei mwana a-Kisi, sikamukowa wa-Benjamini;
wakatoledwe kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu abasungidwe bakatolwa amwami Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni.
Wakalelede Hadasa (ngu-Esita) mwana asimizyaabo, nkaambo katakwe wisi nebaba banyina; musimbi wakali kweebeka akuza kumoyo, elyo akaambo kakufwa kwawisi abanyina, Moodekai wakamutola abe mwanaakwe.
Aboobo, nelyakamvwigwa ijwi lyakulailila kwamwami, abasimbi nebakali kuletwa kumunzi wa-Susa kuli-Hege, Esita awalo wakatolwa kuŋanda kuli-Hege mulangi wabakaintu.

Lino, musimbi wakamukonda; wakaba nakufunwa, elyo wakamupa kufumbwa zinunkilizyo azinono antoomwe abasimbi balindilizi musanu ababili bamweelede kuzwa kuŋanda yamwami, alimwi wakamubika abalindilizi bakwe muŋanda iyakainda kubota yabakaintu.
Esita takwakaamba mukowa neluba luzubo lwakwe nkaambo Moodekai wakamulayide kuti atazyaambi.
Mazuba oonse Moodekai wakeendeenda kunsi kwalubuwa lwamaanda aabakaintu kuti abuzye Esita mbwaakapona ambwaakacitilwa.

Lino, bulizi bwamusimbi umwi aumwi bwasika kuti anjile kumwami Ahasuera, musule lyakucitilwa mbuli mbokulaililwa kubakaintu, mwaka woonse (mboobu mbobakalibambila: myezi musanu aumwi amafuta amuro, amyezi musanu aumwi azinunkilizyo amwiimpula),
mbombuboobu wakaboola musimbi kumwami; ulapegwa cipanzi ncayanda kuzwa muŋanda yabakaintu kuti kanjila muŋanda yamwami.
Wakaya mangolezya akujokela mafumofumo kuŋanda yabili yabakaintu kuli-Syasyagazi siŋanda wamwami, mulangi wabasimamambe. Takwakaya alimwi kumwami, cita mwami wakamuyanda akumwiita izina lyakwe.
Elyo naakaletwa kumwami Ahasuera muŋanda yabwami, mumwezi wakumi uutegwa Tebeta, mumwaka wasanu aibili wabulelo bwakwe,
mwami wakayanda Esita kwiinda bakaintu bakwe boonse, alimwi walo wakajana luse azipo zyakwe kwiinda basimbi boonse; wakabika munsini wabwami amutwe wakwe akumucita namalelo mucilao ca-Vasiti.
Nkabela mwami wakabacitila pobwe pati basimutwe abakamboni bakwe boonse; lyakali pobwe lyakuyeeya Esita, Wakatipa zisi ciindi cakulisenya akupa zipego zyaamba bwaabi bwamwami.
(nkaambo Esita takwe naakaamba mukowa nebaba bantu bakwe mbuli mbwaakamulailila Moodekai; wakacili kumuswiilila mbuli mbwaakacita kacili mwanaakwe),
kuciindi eco, kakede a-Dyango lyamwami, Bigita a-Teresi, basiŋanda bobile bamwami basikulindilila milyango, bakakalalila mwami Ahasuera akusola kumujaya;
pele makani akamvwigwa a-Moodekai, awalo wakamwaambila Esita namalelo. Esita wakamwaambila mwami muzina lya-Moodekai,
elyo makani naakeenwa akusinizigwa, baalumi bobile bakajayigwa acaanzikilo. Akalembwa mubbuku lyalusimo lyakabambwa muŋanda yamwami.
Lino boonse bazike bamwami bakakede mukati ka-Mulyango wamwami bakamukotamina akumuvundamina Hamani, nkaambo mboboobu mwami mbwaakalailila anguwe, Pele Moodekai wakakaka kumukotamina akumuvundamina.
Aboobo bazike mukati ka-Mulyango wamwami bakati kuli-Moodekai, Uzangilanzi kucilaililo camwami?
Buzuba abuzuba bakaamba obo kulinguwe pele takwakabaswiilila, Elyo bakamwaambila Hamani kuti babone na uyoozumizya kucita kwa-Moodekai na pe; mbokuli Moodekai wakabaambilide kuti wakali mu-Juda.
Pele Hamani nekuba kuti wakakalala na wabona kuti Moodekai takwakamukotamina na kumuvundamina,
wakacitabuluzya kumujaya walo alike. Bakamwaambila mukowa wakwe, elyo wakalibambila kufwidilizya boonse ba-Juda bakali mubulelo boonse bwa-Ahasuera, mukowa woonse wa-Moodekai.

Elyo Hamani wakati kumwami Ahasuera, Nkuuli mukowa uumwayikidwe akwaandaanisigwa akati kamikowa yamuzisi zyoonse zyabulelo bwako; milao yabo ilyaandeene ayeeyo yamikowa yoonse imwi; tabateeleli milao yamwami; aboobo takweelede kuti mwami alikataazye ambabo.
Kuti kazumina mwami, cilaililo kacilembwa caamba kufwidilizigwa kwabo, elyo ime ndilapa mpondo zyansiliva zili zyuulu zyone zyazyuulu kulibasimali bamwami bazibike muciyobwedo camali cabwami.
Elyo mwami wagwisya nsale kumunwe wakwe akumupa Hamani mwana a-Hamedata, sikulwanya ba-Juda,
Wakati mwami kuliHamani, Mali aako nsiayandi; kocita mboyanda kumukowa oyo, bali mujanza lyako.

Zilaililo zyakatumwa abasimposo kuzisi zyoonse, kuti banyonyoonwe, akujayigwa, akufwidilizigwa ba-Juda boonse, basankwa abanene, bana abakaintu, mubuzuba bomwe buyo, buzuba bwakumi mwatatu bwamwezi wakumi aibili, mwezi uutegwa Ada, lukono lwabo kalusaalwa.
Majwi aamucilaililo aeelede kuya kuzisi zyoonse, akutuminwa maleya mumikowa yoonse: bantu bakeelede kulibambila kubuzuba obo.
Basimposo bakazwa kufwambaana, mbuli mbwaakaamba mwami, acalo cilaililo cakaambwa mubuleya mu-Susa munzi wamwami; elyo mwami a-Hamani bakakala kukulya, pele munzi wa-Susa wakaintizigwa.
wakaya kunembo mu-Mulyango wamwami (nkaambo teecakazumizigwa kuti muntu uusamide masaka ainde mukati ka-Mulyango wamwami).
Ncobeni, nekuba kuti ijwi acilaililo camwami cakamvwigwa nokuba lili, kwakali kulila kupati akati kaba-Juda, alimwi akuliimya akoomoka, bunji bwabo kabalede mumasaka atwe.
Lino balindilizi abasiŋanda ba-Esita bakeza akumwaambila makani, elyo waka usa loko; wakatuma zikobela kuti Moodekai asame akugwisigwa masaka aakwe, Pele takazitambwide.
Aboobo Esita wakaita Hataki, umwi wabasiŋanda bamwami ngwaakabika mwami kuti amulindile, wakamulailila kuti aye kuli-Moodekai akumubuzya kuti makaninzi, aambanzi.
Hataki naakazwa kuya kuli-Moodekai kulubuwa lwamunzi kunembo a-Mulyango wamwami,
Moodekai wakamwaambila zyoonse zyakacitidwe, alimwi aamali Hamani ngaakasyomezya kubika muciyobwedo camwami, kabbadalila lufwidilizyo lwaba-Juda;

alimwi wakamupa pepa lyakalembedwe cilaililo cakabambwa akutuminwa maleya mu-Susa caamba lunyonyoono lwabo, ndyaelede kumutondezya akumupandulwida Esita; alimwi wakamulaya kuti ainke kumwami, akumbile akombelele akaambo kabantu bakwe.
Elyo Hataki wakaya akumwaambila Esita ncaakaamba Moodekai,
alimwi Esita wakapa Hataki majwi aya kuti aatole kuli-Moodekai.

Boonse bali muŋanda yamwami alimwi abantu bamuzisi zyakwe balizi kabotu kuti mulao ngonguwo kumuntu, mwaalumi na mukaintu, uunjila kumwami muŋanda yamukati katanaitwa; ndufu, cita kumuntu mwami ngwatambikizya kafunko kangolida nkokwaamba kuti mbuumi, Ime nsinaitwa mazuba aali makumi otatwe amana.
Majwi aa-Esita naakaambwa kuli-Moodekai,
Moodekai wakatuma lwiingulo olu kuli-Esita. Utayeeyi kuti uyakufutuka yebo mukati muŋanda yamwami, kwiinda bamwi ba-Juda,

Kuti kozumanana kotaambi cintu muciindi eci cilemu lugwasyo aluvuno luyakubweda ba-Juda kuzwa kucilao cimwi, pele uyoofwa, yebo aluzubo lwako. Alimwi, ngwani uuzi kuti kuyakucitikanzi kuti koya kumwami kuciindi cino?
Elyo Esita wakamwiingula Moodekai boobu,

Koya ukabungike boonse ba-Juda bali mu-Susa, muliimye akaambo kangu, muleke kulya akunywa mazuba otatwe; ime abalo bandilindilila tuyakuliimya mbuli ndinywe; elyo ndaya kumwami nekuba kuti ndatyola mulao. Kuti ndafwa, ndafwa.
Elyo Moodekai wakaya, wakacita mbwaakalaililwa a-Esita.
elyo naakabona Esita namalelo kaimvwi mukabuwa, wakamuzumizya; wakamutambikizya Esita kafunko kangolida kakalimujanza lyakwe, elyo Esita wakaswena akudomba insonje yakafunko,
Mwami wakati, Uyandanzi, mwinaangu Esita, ukumbilanzi? Uyakupegwa nekuba kuti ncisela cacisi cangu,
Esita wakati, kuti kacibotezya mwami, ababoole mwami a-Hamani kupobwe ndendi mubambilide mwami,
Mwami wakati, Hamani aboole kufwambaana kuti lukumbilo lwa-Esita luzuzigwe. Aboobo mwami a-Hamani bakaboola kupobwe ndyaakabamba Esita,
Esita wakavuwa kuti, Lukumbilo lwangu? lulombo lwangu?

Ino kuti ndajana luse kumwami, mwami kuti kabotelwa kuti kukumbila kwangu kupegwe, akulomba kwangu kuzumizigwe, ababoole mwami a-Hamani kupobwe ndinjakubabambila, elyo cifumo njakupasula mbuli mbwaamba mwami.
nekubaboobo wakalijata akuya kumunzi, Wakatuma kuti baboole bazwalani bakwe amukaakwe Zeresi,
elyo wakabakananina akaambo kabuvubi bupati bwakwe alimwi amweelwe wabana bakwe, akusumpuka nkwaakajana kumwami, alimwi mwami mbwaakamusumpula ajulu lyabasimutwe bamwami abakamboni.
Ii, wakaamba Hamani, awalo Esita namalelo takwaakatamba muntu cita ndime antoomwe amwami kupobwe ndyaakabambide. Alimwi wakanditamba kuti tuboole amwami junza.
Pele zyoonse ezi tazindigwasyi nencibona Moodekai mu-Juda kakede a-Mulyango wamwami!
Mulimbubo akajanwa makani aa-Moodekai mbwaakamaŋala Bigita a-Teresi, abasiŋanda bobile bamwami basikulindilila Milyango bakasi yande kujaya mwami Ahasuera.
Mwami wakabuzya, Mbulemunzi, mbuIumbunzi mbwaakacitilwa Moodekai akaambo kaceeci? Balindilizi bamwami bakati, Taakwe ncaakacitilwa.
Elyo mwami wakati, Ngwani uulindila mulubuwa? Lino Hamani wakalinjilide mulubuwa lwaanze kuti akanane amwami akaambo kakujaya Moodekai acaanzikilo ncaakabamba.
Aboobo balindilizi bamwami bakati kulinguwe, Ngooyu Hamani uliimvwi mulubuwa. Mwami wakati, Anjile.
Elyo Hamani wakanjila. Mwami wakamubuzya wati, Ncinzi cinga cilacitwa kumuntu mwami ngwayanda kulemya? Hamani wakayeeya, Ngwani mwami ngwayanda kulemya kwiinda ndime?
Elyo Hamani wakati kumwami, Kumuntu ngwayanda kulemya mwami,
kabaleta cakusama cabwami ncaakasamide mwami, alimwi abbiza ndyaakatantide mwami amunsini wabwami kumutwe walye;

cakusama abbiza kazibikwa mujanza lyasilutwe mupati wamwami kuti asinizye kuti muntu ngwayanda mwami kulemya asamikwe akutanta kasololelwa mumugwagwa wamunzi, kaompolwedwa kuti, Obo mbwacitilwa muntu mwami ngwayanda kulemya.
Elyo mwami wakati kuli-Hamani, Fwambaana, jana cikobela abbiza mbubonya mboambide, umucitile zyoonse ezi Moodekai mu-Juda uukala a-Mulyango wamwami; utaleki cintu comwe cazeezyo nzoambide.
Aboobo Hamani wakabweza cakusama akusamika Moodekai, alimwi akutantika mumugwagwa wamunzi, kaompolola kunembo lyakwe, Obo mbwacitwa muntu mwami ngwayanda kulemya.

Elyo Hamani naakabaambila Zeresi mukaakwe abazwalani bakwe boonse, balayi bakwe a-Zeresi mukaakwe bakati kulinguwe, Moodekai, kunembo lyakwe ngotalikide kuwa, kuti kali simukowa wa-Juda tokazwidilili kulinguwe; uyakuzundwa akuwa kunembo lyakwe.
Kabacikanana anguwe, basiŋanda bamwami bakaboola kufwambaana kuti bamulete Hamani kupobwe Esita ndyaakalibambide.
Mwami a-Hamani nebakali kupobola antoomwe a-Esita namalelo,

mubuzuba bwabili bwacipobwe, mwami wakabuzya alimwi kuli-Esita nebakali kupegwa waini, wakati, Ukumbilanzi, Esita mwinaangu? Uyoopegwa, Ulombanzi? Kufumbwa nociba cisela cacisi cangu, uyoopegwa ncico.
Elyo Esita namalelo wakavuwa, Kuti kokondwa mulindime omwami, alimwi kuti kazumina mwami, kondipa buumi bwangu nceeci ncinkumbila­! Undipe bantu bangu-nkooku nkundomba!
Akaambo ime abantu twakauzigwa kuti tukanyonyoonwe, tukajayigwe, tukafwidilizigwe. Nitwakali kuuzigwa mubuzike buyo nengumwide, naba sinkondoma naa takakonzya kulunga kwakubisigwa kumwami.
Elyo mwami Ahasuera wakati kuli-Esita namalelo, Ngwani? Uli kuli muntu uulisungwide kucita boobo.
Esita wakati, Ngusikaamboma, ngusinkondoma, ngonguwe mubi Hamani oyu! Hamani wakakankama kunembo lyamwami abanaakwe,
elyo mwami naakanyamuka kuwaini wakwe mubukali akuya mumuunda waŋanda, Hamani wakacaala kuti akombelezye buumi bwakwe kuli-Esita namalelo, nkaambo wakabona kuti mwami wakalisungwide kumunyonyoona.

Umwi wabasiŋanda bamwami, uutegwa Habona, wakati, Kuŋanda ya-Hamani, nkocili caanzikilo, bulamfu bwaco madumpwa aali kumi, ncaakabambila Moodekai wakagwasya mwami. Mwami wakati, Amumwaanzikile alincico,
Aboobo bakamwaanzika Hamani acaanzikilo ncaakabambila Moodekai. Elyo lukalala lwamwami lwakatontola.
mwami wakagwisya nwenwe njaakabwezede kuli-Hamani, akumupa Moodekai; alimwi Esita wakabika Moodekai ajulu lyalubono lwa-Hamani.
Elyo Esita wakaamba cabili kumwami, kaliwaala kumaulu aakwe amisozi akumukombelezya kuti azime bubi mbwaakacita Hamani mu-Agagi aciyungo ncaakayungila ba-Juda.
Mwami wakatambika kafunko kangolida kuliEsita, elyo wakafugamuka akwiima kunembo lyamwami, ulati,

Kuti kacibotela mwami, kuti wakondwa mulindime, kuti kaciba ciluzi mumeso aamwami, kuti kandimukonda, kaliba jwi lyakusandamuna zilaililo zyakabambwa a-Hamani mu-Agagi zyaamba lunyonyoono lwaba-Juda muzisi zyoonse zyamwami.
Nkaambo ime inga ndilaumuna buti nkembona lunyonyooko luwida mukowa wangu?
Mwami Ahasuera wakati kuliEsita namalelo akuli-Moodekai mu-Juda, Amulange ndilipede Esita lubono lwa-Hamani, bakamwaanzikide acaanzikilo akaambo wakabika maanza kuba-­Juda.

Lino amulembele ba-Juda andinywe mbomuyanda zilaililo nzomuyanda; amulembe muzina lyamwami akucisimba acisimbyo camwami, nkaambo taakwe muntu uukonzya kuzima mulao uulembwa muzina lyamwami akusimbwa alusimbo lwamwami.
Moodekai wakalemba muzina lyamwami akusimba lugwalo acisimbyo camwami. Wakatuma magwalo abasimposo kabatantide mabbiza aakalijisi luno, mabbiza aakazyedwe mucimpati camwami,

mwakazumizigwa amwami mulingawo kuti ba-Juda bali muminzi yoonse babungane akulivuna, kunyonyoona, kujaya akufwidilizya boonse basilumamba bamukowa acisi coonse cababasoka, kujaya bana abakaintu babo, akusaala lubono lwabo,
mubuzuba bwaambwa muzisi zyoonse zyamwami Ahasuera, nkokwaamba kuti buzuba bwakumi mwaatatu bwamwezi wakumi mwiibili, uutegwa Ada.
Majwi aamucilaililo aeelede kuya kuzisi zyoonse akutuminwa maleya kumikowa yoonse; ba-Juda bakeelede kulibambila kuti bajokezezye basinkondonyina.
Aboobo basimposo bakazwa, kabatantide mabbiza aamwami aakalijisi luno, kabafwambaanizigwa akulailila kwamwami, cilaililo calo kacaambwa kubuleya mu-Susa munzi wamwami.
Moodekai wakazwida kumwami kasamide zikobela zya bwami zisiyasiya azituba, amunsini wangolida acibaakani camalembo aaluleme alimwi aasalala; munzi wa-Susa wakasekelela.
Ba-Juda bakalijisi lumunikilo, alutangalo, alukondo alulemeko;

nkwaakasika majwi aacilaililo camwami, muzisi aminzi yoonse, ba-Juda bakalijisi kukondwa akubotelwa, akupobola akulisenya, Ncobeni, banji babamasi bakaba ba-Juda, nkaambo kakuti kuyoowa ba-Juda kwakalinjilide mbabo.
Ba-Juda bakabungana muminzi yabo muzisi zyoonse zyamwami Ahasuera, kuti bajaye babo bakaliyungide kunyonyoona kwabo; taakwe muntu wakakonzya kubaimina, nkaambo kubayoowa kwakalinjilide mikowa yoonse,
Ncobeni, boonse basilutwe bazisi abeendelezi abaleli abaabo bakalijisi mulimo wamwami bakabagwasya ba-Juda; kumuyoowa Moodekai kwakalinjilide mbabo,
nkaambo Moodekai wakali mupati muŋanda yamwami, alimwi impuwo yakwe yakamvwigwa muzisi zyoonse, Moodekai wakali kuya bujana nguzu.
Aboobo ba-Juda bakauma basinkondonyina apanga kabajaya akubajaya akunyonyoona mbuli mbobakayanda bakabasulaika.
Mu-Susa munzi wamwami ba-Juda bakajaya baalumi bakali myanda yosanwe;
bakajaya Pasandata, a-Dalaponi a-Asapata,
a-Porata a-Adalia, a-Aridata
aPamasata, a-Arisai a-Aridai a-Vaizata,
bana basankwa ba-Hamani mwana a-Hamedata, asinkondonyina waba-Juda; pele teebakabika munwe kulubono lwabo.
Buzuba obo, mweelwe wabaabo bakajayidwe mumunzi wa-Susa wakabikwa kunembo lyamwami.

Elyo mwami wakati kuli-Esita banaakwe, Mumuunzi wa-Susa ba-Juda balijayide akunyonyoona bantu bali myaanda yosanwe alimwi abana baalumi bali kumi ba-Hamani, Ino kabi, balicitidenzi muzisi zimwi zyamwami? Lino uyandanzi? Uyakupegwa. Ukumbilanzi? Uyoocitilwa ncico,
Esita wakati, kuti kazumina mwami, kabazumizigwa kuti bacite junza mbuli mbokulaililwa sunu. Alimwi bana ba-Hamani bali kumi kabaanzikwa acaanzikilo.
Mwami wakalailila kuti kukacitwe boobo; cilaililo cakatuminwa buleya, bana bali kumi ba-Hamani bakaanzikwa,
alimwi ba-Juda bakali mu-Susa bakabungana mubuzuba bwakumi mwaane bwamwezi uutegwa Ada akujaya bantu bakali myaanda yotatwe mu-Susa; pele teebakabika munwe kulubono lwabo.

Ba-Juda bamwi bakali muzisi zyamwami abalo bakabungene kuti balivune buumi bwabo bapilukilide basinkondonyina akujaya zyuulu zyakali makumi osanwe mwaabili amusanu wabo; pele teebakabika munwe kulubono,
Eci cakali mubuzuba bwakumi mwaatatu bwamwezi uutegwa Ada, amubuzuba bwakumi mwaane bakalyokezya kabacita buzuba obo kuba bwakupobola akukondwa.
Ba-Juda bakali mu-Susa bakabungana mulibwakumi mwaatatu amulibwakumi aane, akulyokezya mulibwakumi mwaasanu kabacita obo buzuba bwakupobola akukondwa.
Nkenkakaako ba-Juda bamutunzi, bakala muminzi iitazingulukide abwaanda, bacita buzuba bwakumi aane bwamwezi uutegwa Ada, kuti bube buzuba bwakukondwa akupobola akulisenya akutuminana zinono.
Moodekai wakabalembela boobo boonse ba-Juda bakali muzisi zyoonse zyamwami Ahasuera, kulibaafwafwi akulibakule;
lugwalo lwakwe lwakabalaya kuti babambe bwakumi mwaane abwakumi aasanu bwamwezi uutegwa Ada myaka yoonse;

kbuli mazuba ba-Juda mobakafutuka kulibasinkondonyina mulingawo, mazuba aamumwezi aakalisandidwe kulimbabo kuzwa kumause kukukondwa, kuzwa kukulila kumazuba aakulyokezya; aya mazuba akeelede kucitwa mazuba aakupobola akukondwa, kabatuminana zinono alimwi akupa bacete zipo.
Aboobo ba-Juda bakazumina kuti cikabe cilengwa camwaka woonse mbuli Moodekai mbwaakalembede.
Nkaambo Hamani mwana a-Hamedata mu-Agagi, sinkondonyina waba-Juda, wakayungide kubanyonyoona akuwaala nkakata iitegwa “puri”, kuti abazunde, abanyonyoone;
pele, mwami naakateelela makani, wakalailila amagwalo kuti ciyungo cakwe cibi cakayungilwa ba-Juda cikajokele nguwe mwini, walo abana bakwe kuti bakaanzikwe acaanzikilo.
Aboobo balaaulika mazuba ayo kuti ngama-Puri akaambo kankakata iitegwa “puri”. Elyo akaambo kayaayo oonse akalembwa mulugwalo olu, alimwi akaambo kaceeco cakacitika kulimbabo,

ba-Juda bakazuminina kuti balo lwabo abana babo, alimwi abaabo boonse bakaswanaana ambabo, bakacite cilengwa citakasandulwi cakubamba mazuba aya obile mbuli mbwaakalembede Moodekai, kuciindi cakaambwa myaka yoonse,

kuti aya akayeeyegwe akubambwa azyalani lyoonse, amunzi woonse, acisi coonse, amunzi mupati woonse, kuti mazuba aya aama-Puri atakazimwi akati kaba-Juda, alimwi kuti luyeeyo lwangawo lutakamani kubana babo.
magwalo akatumwa anguwe kuliboonse ba-Juda bamuzisi zili mwaanda amakumi obile azisanu muzibili zyaAhasuera kaajisi majwi aaluumuno alusyomeko,
aaimika ma-Puri aciindi ncaakeelede kubambwa, mbuli mbwaakaambide Moodekai, ambuli ba-Juda mbobakalisungwide kulimbabo beni alimwi abana babo mumakani aakuliimya akulila.
Cilaililo ca-Esita cakaimika kukosola oku kwama-Puri alimwi kwakalembwa mubbuku.
Pele ncito zyakwe zyoonse zyanguzu azyabwami, alimwi alwaambo loonse lwa bwami mobuli mwami mwaakamubika Moodekai, tazilembedwe na mumalembo aabwami aa-Media a-Persia

Nkaambo Moodekai muJuda wakali wabili kubwami Ahasuera; wakali muntu mupati akati kaba-Juda alimwi akuyandwa abasimukowanyina, nkaambo wakayandaula bubotu bwabantu bakwe akulondola kukupuka kwamukowa wakwe woonse.
Wakalijisi bana balombe bali musanu ababili abana basimbi botatwe;

alimwi wakali ambelele zyakali zyuulu zili musanu azibili, ankamele zyakali zyuulu zyotatwe, acuulu cabasune, anzyazi mbongolo zyakali myaanda yosanwe antoomwe ababeleki abazike banji; nkaambo oyo muntu wakali mupati kwiinda boonse bakali mumanyika aakujwe.
Bana basankwa bakwe bakali kupobola antoomwe umwi aumwi kababamba bamwi mumalizi; alimwi bakali kutamba bacizi babo botatwe kuti bakalye akunywa ambabo.

Elyo nocakamana ciindi cakupobola cimwi acimwi, Jobu waka: tuma kuti baboole akusalazigwa, kafuma, kabacitila umwi aumwi cipaizyo cuumpe; nkaambo Jobu wakati, Atene bana bangu balibijide akusowelezya Leza mumyoyo yabo. Lyoonse Jobu wakali kucita boobo.
Jehova wakaamba kuli-Saatani kuti, Wali kuli? Saatani wakavuwa wati, Ndali kuzungazunga koonse koonse, nkenjendeenda munyika.
Elyo Jehova wakati kuli-Saatani, Sena wakabona kuti taakwe muntu munyika uuli mbuli muntu wangu Jobu, muntu uutakwe mulandu, uululeme, uulemeka Leza akuyoowa cibi?
Saatani wakavuwa Jehova wati, Taakwe kaambo sena Jobu nkalemekela Leza?
Teewakamuyakilide kabotu, walo abaŋanda bakwe azyoonse nzyajisi? Wakamukupusya mumulimo wakwe, alimwi matanga aakwe avula munyika.
Pele, kuti kotambika janza lyako akuguma ncajisi uzookusinga kubusyu bwako!
Elyo Jehova wakamwaambila Saatani wati, Mbubo ndabika zyoonse nzyajisi munguzu zyako; pele utabiki janza kulinguwe mwini. Aboobo Saatani wakazwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
sikutumwa wakaboola akumwaambila Jobu kuti, Basune bakali kulima, ambongolo zyakali kucela afwiifwi,
Ba-Seba nibakavuumukila akuzitola; bakajaya basimilimo, ndime endike ndayokoka kuti nkwaambile.
Wakacili kwaamba naakasika umwi wati, Lulabo lwakawa kujulu akuumpilila limwi mbelele abeembeli; ndime endike ndafutuka kuti nkwaambile.
Kacaamba, umwi wakaboola wakati, Ba-Kasidi bakalicita nkamu zyotatwe kuti bafumpe nkamele; bakazitola, akujaya babeleki; ndime endike ndasyaala nkwaambile.
Wakacili kucaamba naakeza aumwi wati, Bana balombe abasimbi bako bakali kukulya akunywa waini muŋanda yamupati wabo,
nokakaboola kambizi kakazwa munkanda kakauma zyooko zyone zyaŋanda nkabela yakabawida bana; balifwide, ndime endilike ndafutuka kuti ndikwaambile.
Elyo Jobu wakanyamuka, wazapaula cikobela cakwe, wakalinyoola akuwida ansi kakomba cakulibombya, wakati,
Ndakazwa mwida lyabaama ndili acinswe, ndilajokela mumo nkendi ecinswe. Jehova wakapa, Jehova wanyanga-kalumbwa Jehova!
Mulizyoonse ezi Jobu takwaakabija, takwaakakolomena Leza.
Alimwi, buzuba bumwi, baangelo bakaboola kunembo lya-Leza kulitondezya, alakwe Saatani wakeza.
Jehova wakati kuli-Saatani, Wazwa kuli? Saatani wakavuwa wati, Ndakali kweendeenda munyika nkenzelengana koonse koonse.

Elyo Jehova wakaamba kuli-Saatani wati, Sena wakabona muntu wangu Jobu kuti taakwe muntu uuli mbuli nguwe munyika, muntu uutakwe mulandu, uululeme; uulemekezya Leza akucija bubi? Ucisyomekede nekuba kuti wakandilengawida kuti ndimunyonyoone.
Pele Saatani wakaingula wati, Wakalivuna lukanda lwakwe mwini! Muntu uyakupa zyoonse kuti akabe abuumi bwakwe mwini.
Pele kuti kotambika janza lyako akuguma nyama azifuwa zyakwe uzookusinga kubusyu bwako!
Aboobo Jehova wakati kuli-Saatani, Mbubo uli munguzu zyako; pele buumi bwakwe kabulekwa.
Elyo Saatani wakazwa kunembo lya-Leza, wakacita Jobu kuti azwe zilonda kuzwa kumaulu kusikila kukatwikilo,
mane wakabweza lukaye kuti alikwaambe. Kacikede acibbunta,
banakwe bakati kulinguwe, Ucisyoma na? Mutukile Leza kuti ufwe!
Pele wakamwaambila kuti, Ulaamba mbuli mufubafuba. Sena tatweelede kutambula bubotu kujanza lya-Leza abubi? Kuli zeezi zyoonse Jobu takwaakabija amilomo yakwe.
Pele nebakamubona kulaale akutamuziba, bakalila kapati; boonse bakazapaula zikobela zyabo akulilundumwida kasuko mitwe.
Mazuba amasiku aakali musanu mwaabili bakakala ansi anguwe; katakwe wakaamba jwi kulinguwe, nkaambo bakabona kuti wakali kuciswa kapati mumoyo.
Wakatalika wati,
Abusiku mbundakategwa, Mulombe,
Kabusia mbi,
Kumweka kakutabumunikili,
Leza abuleke butabalwi.
Mayoba kaakala kulimbubo;
Cizima zuba kacibuyoosya.
Mudima uusia mbi kaubujata buzuba obo,
Butabalwi amwi amazuba aamwaka,
Kabutajani cilao mumyezi.
Ii, buzuba obo kabuba citawo,
Kabunyangwa ijwi lyakukondwa.
Basondi abo bakonzya kubusya Zoka,
Inyenyeezi zyakubucedo bwabo kazisia;
Kabuyandaula mumuni akutaujana.
Kabutaboni zikoye zyacifumofumo.
Nkaambo teebwakandijalila ida,
Na kundisisila meso aangu bupenzi.
Nkaambonzi nsendakafwa kukuzwa mwida,
Teendakafwidanzi kukuzyalwa?
Akabedanzi mazwi aakunditambula;
Akaambonzi zyakaliwo nkolo zyakunyonka?
Nindacilede siko,
Nindakali koona wi,
Abami abasimutwe banyika
Bakaliyakilide nsaka mpati;
Abaleli bavubide ngolida,
Bakazuzizye maanda ansiliva.
Ndatekazikwa mbuli cisowe nkaambonzi,
Mbuli zifuntu zitaboni zuba?
Oko ba sizibi bamana kupenzya,
Bakataazigwa bali aluumuno.
Awo baange balalala antoomwe,
Tabamvwi jwi lyasikweenzya;
Baniini abapati mpobali,
Alimwi muzike ulaangululwa kulisimalelaakwe.
Abuumi kubalekede kulangila,
Balalusida kwiinda lubono lusisidwe;
Baanga bakondwa kuzikwa
Akukomana kuti kabakonzya kujana kabanda?
Muntu uuzingulukidwe nguwe?
Kutweta kwangu ninsima yangu;
Zikulumo zilazwa mulindime mbuli maanzi;
Eco ncinjoowa cilandiwida,
Cindiyoosya cilandiswenena
Nsikalwi moyo, nsijani luumuno;
Nsipenguluki pele kupenzegwa buyo.
Elyo Elifazi mu-Temani wakaingula wati,
Sena uyootukalalila kuti katusola kwaamba?
Pele ngwani uunga ulaliiata kuti kataambi?
Yebo omwini ulilailide banji,
Akuyumya bateteete;
Majwi aako akajata bantu kuti batawi,
Batuntuma wakabapa inguzu.
Cakuguma yebo ulawa.
Buumi bwako bululeme kabukwiimika.
Koyeeya, muntunzi uutakwe mulandu wakaiwidilila?
Baluleme mbani bakakukululwa?
Alimwi amapenzi ngebasyanga;
Balafwa muluyoyo lwa-Leza,
Kuunga kwakukalala kwakwe kulabasukutya,
Ijwi lyamulavu uuyoosya lilatyola meno abana babalavu;
Bana bamulavu muzyazi balamwaisigwa,
Lino kwakeza kumbali kulindime ijwi,
Kuvwiyavwiya kwalyo kwakasikila kukutwi kwangu.
Ndakalijisi ziloto;
Kuyoowa akukankama kwakandijata
Kuti zizo zyangu zyakalebuluka;
Mane ndakafwa maswiswili.
Ngooyo kauimvwi! Pele teendakaumvwisisya kuti ninzi;
Ciimo eco cakali kunembo lyameso aangu,
Elyo mulubatamo ndakacimvwa kacaamba kuti,
Kunembo lya-Jehova muntu uufwika inga ulalulama sena?
Sa muntu ulasalala na kubusyu bwa-Mulengi wakwe?
Abaangelo bakwe ulabajanina milandu;
Elyo uyeeyanzi kulibaabo babumbwa abulongo,
Bajisi intalisyo zyabulongo,
Bapwaika mbuli pempe,
Banga balakuntwa mubuzuba bomwe buyo,
Balafwidilila akutayeeyegwa limbi,
Intali yabuumi bwabo kuti yadunsulwa
Balafwa kabatanajana luzibo.
Koita lino, Sa nkwaali uukonzya kukuvwiila?
Uyookumbila kumwaangelo uuli?
Lunyemo luli boobo ndwabuyo, lulajaya;
Ndufu kumufubafuba uupya moyo.
Ndakabona mufubafuba uusimpa miyanda,
Pele kufwambaana ndakatukila bukalilo bwakwe,
Bana bakwe bali mulunyonyooko, balanyangwa;
Balajailwa milyango, taakwe uubavuna;
Bantu batebula inzala balalya kulya kwabo
Balakubweza mumamvwa;
Bafwa nyota bamena lubono lwabo,
Mapenzi taazwi mukasuko, Makataazyo taazwi muvu;
Pele nkasimpe kuti muntu ulazyalilwa mapenzi
Mbuli nsasi mbozipasauka kujulu.
Kunembo lya-Leza nendakapandulula kaambo kangu,
Walo ulacita zintu zipati nzetutamvwi,
Zintu ziyoosya zitabaliki,
Ulatilila myuunda mvula
Akuzuzya maanzi atala anyika;
Ulabika ajulu babombede
Akusumpula balyeetezya;
Ulasinkila ziyungo zyabacenjede
Kuti maanza aabo azundike mumilimo yabo;
Akunyonyauzya maanu aabasilweeno.
Balajana mudima ciindi casikati,
Akwaampaampa muzuba mbuli masiku,
Ulavuna bateteete kuzwa kupanga lyakumulomo wabo,
Ababula kuzwa kujanza lyabasinguzu.
Aboobo bacete balijisi ncobalangila,
Alimwi babi balayabilizigwa,
Utanyansyi kulomezegwa kwa-Singuzuzyoonse.
Ulayasa pele maanza aakwe alasilika,
Akuli aali musanu aabili ayookweeleba.
Muciindi canzala uyakukuvuna kuzwa kulufu,
Amuciindi cankondo kuzwa kunguzu zyapanga.
Akutayoowa lunyonyooko.
Inga ulaseka lunyonyoono anzala
Akutayoowa banyama baluma,
Banyama baluma bazooba bazwalani bako.
Uyookonzya kusinizya kuti iŋanda yako ili aluumuno;
Akutabula imwi buyo kuti kobala butanga bwako.
Uyakubona kuti baŋanda bako bavula;
Bana bako bayakuvula mbuli bwizu,
Uyoosika kukabanda kocembeede,
Mbuli musunta wamaila mbuuyumunwa naatebulwa.
Aka nkasimpe nketujanide, nketusinizizye;
Kokaswiili kuti kakuzyalile bubotu.
Elyo Jobu wakavwiila wati,
Maawe! Kulyeetezya kwangu apenzi lyangu pati,
Kuti kazyeelekwa antoomwe,
Nzilemu kwiinda musenga wamulwizi;
Nceeci ncincita ndaambe cakutayeeya,
Buyoka bwayo bulaluma muuya wangu;
Ziyoosya zya-Leza zilandilwanya.
Imbongolo yamusokwe ilalila na kuti kiijisi bwizu,
Musune ulalila sa kuti kalya?
Sa muntu inga ulakonzya kulya zitalungidwe, zitalweli?
Mulolo uutuba waji ulaamunse sa?
Muuya wangu ulazikaka;
Kulindime zilasesemya.
Ndayanda buyo ncenkumbila;
Ndayanda buyo kuti Leza andipe ncinjandaula.
Leza necamubotela naandipwaya buyo,
Janza lyakwe kuti lityole buumi bwangu,
Necanduumuzya;
Ii, nendakondwa mukuzunta kwaco;
Nkaambo nsinanyansya majwi aa-Uusalala.
Ndijisi nguzunzi kuti nzumanane?
Kunembo ninzi kuti nkazike moyo?
Nguzu zyangu zileelene azyamabwe sena?
Sa nyama yangu mukuba?
Pe pe, kunyina kugwasya pe.
Zyoonse zyali kundigwasya zyandisia.
Bazwalani bakwe baleelede kumufwida luse muntu uutyompekeledwe,
Kuti atene ulaleka kusyoma amuli-Singuzuzyoonse.
Pele bazwalani bangu balandityompya mbuli kalonga,
Mbuli tunkolola tumwaya maanzi,
Kazifutide akusia
Akaambo kacaanda amaanzi aandwa aaenzemukide,
Pele zilausa kuti kalibala,
Zilayuminina izuba lyapya.
Bantu beenda tanga balazilangila,
Elyo balaleya kabaya munkanda akufwa;
Mpumba zizwa ku-Tema ziyandawida maanzi mulinzizyo;
Basambazi bazwa ku-Seba balijisi lusyomo,
Pele kulangila kwabo kulatyompwa;
Balasika akwiintizigwa,
Nywebo nemwandibona akuyoowa.
Sa ndayanda kuti mubbadele masinkamulomo aakaambo kangu?
Na kundivuna kulibasinkondoma?
Antela kundinununa kuzigebenga?
Mundaambile mpombisizye.
Kwaamba kwakasimpe nkubotu,
Pele kukanana kwanu kulaambanzi?
Sa mulayanda kusinsa majwi buyo
Aakulabalika kwamuntu uupengesya?
Mulabweza mucaala akuwaala cisolo;
Mulaulisya muzwalani wanu.
Amundilange kubusyu,
Nkasimpe nsikamubejeli.
Kamuleka kundipa mulandu;
Amundileke, taakwe ncindakabisya.
Sa ndabula manjezeezya aanditondezya bubi?
Sa buumi bwakwe tabuli bwasimilimo?
Mbuli muzike mbwalilauka ceenzule,
Asimilimo mbwayeeya zyakuvola,
Ndaabanisigwa masiku aakulyeetezya.
Ndalala kandiyeeya kuti, Buzuba buzooboola lili?
Elyo mane bwaca ndilalifusa mubulo.
Lukanda lwangu lulayuma elyo lulaanduka.
Mazuba aangu alafwambaana kwiinda muvwi wamuluki
Pele alaya kumamanino aabuyo.
Nsikakupuki limbi.
Njoozimina mukulanga kwako.
Mbombuboobo tabuki limbi oyo uuya kwacimvumwe.
Takezi lwabili kumunzi wakwe,
Busena bwakwe tabukamuzibi limbi.
Ndilaambaula mukuciswa kwamoyo wangu,
Akubwenta akaambo kakulula kwanguwo.
Ndilwizi sena? Ndi-Nzoka sa,
Kuti wandicingilila koonse koonse?
Na ndayeeya kuti bulo bwangu buzoocesya luciso,
Atene eooneno ciyoonditontozya,
Elyo ulandiyoosya aziloto,
Wanditilimusya azilengaano
Mane ndayeeya kuti cabota kusinwa, ndifwe,
Kwiinda kukala nkenciswa boobu.
Kondileka nkaambo mazuba aangu ngabuyo.
Kuti wamuyeeyesya boobo,
Kuti wamupenzya mafumofumo oonse,
Akumusunka ciindi aciindi?
Tokonzyi sa kundifutatila
Nekuba kundileka buniini?
O-mubambi wabantu?
Wandibikilanzi kubambaakani yako,
Ulipenzezyanzi andime?
Ulekelanzi kundijatila mulandu wangu,
Akundilekelela cibi cangu?
Kufwambaana ndiloona mukasuko,
Elyo kondilangaula pele nsikabiwo.
Elyo Bilidadi waku-Suwa wakavwiila wati,
Uzookanana boobo mane lili,
Kolabalika akwaamba majwi aabuyo?
Singuzuzyoonse uleelebesya lulomo sa?
Nekuba kuti bana bako balibijide,
Alimwi wakabaleka kuti balunge kubi kwabo,
Komuyandaula Leza yebo omwini;
Kokombelela kuli-Singuzuzyoonse.
Elyo kuti kosalala akululama,
Uyookuvwiila kukomba kwako ncobeni,
Akukupusya munzi wako uulomene.
Alimwi matalikilo aako naba kuti maniini,
Uyookuvubya kumamanino.
Swiilila ncobakajana bamatateesu;
Mazuba esu ali mbuli ceenzule buyo.)
Sa tabakwe kukwaambila ncebezi,
Akukwiisya mubusongo bwabo:
Sa lubu lulakomena kaatakwe matipa?
Itete lilakula sa kuti taakwe maanii?
Lulapusama bwizu bumwi kabutana kupusama.
Mbolufwidilila lusyomo lwamuntu uutayoowi Leza.
Lusyomo lwakwe luli mbuli kantali kasikaubi,
Ncalangila tacili ciyumu kwiinda luubilili
Ulaijatilila pele taiimi.
Uli citeo cisia cikomena muzuba,
Kacisyuuka koonse koonse mumuunda,
Kacijisi miyanda iifwinyene kukasensa;
Cilaponena mucilao cisitikidwe;
Busena bwaco bulacikakilila limwi.
Bamwi balabuka mubusena bwakwe,
Alimwi takaiminini babi.
U cileta kuseka kumilomo yako,
Akusekelela alulimi lwako.
Basinkondonyoko bazoofwa nsoni;
Maanda aababi takabiwo.
Elyo Jobu wakavuwa, wati,
Pele muntu ulajana buti zimweelede kuli-Leza?
Kuti nayanda kwaambana anguwe,
Takonzyi kwiingula umwi buyo mucuulu camibuzyo yakwe.
Ngu-Sibusongo, ngu-Singuzu;
Nguni wakamuzumananina akuzwidilila?
Ulazulula kuya musokwe katayeeyi?
Waatingamuna mukukalala kwakwe;
Mane intalisyo zyayo zizungaane;
Ulakasya zuba kuti litabali,
Akujalila nyenyeezi;
Kali alike ulayala julu,
Akutabalika ajulu lyamaiwe aalwizi;
Amilwi yanyenyeezi yakumusanza;
Ulacita zintu zipati zitateeleleki,
Aziyoosya zitabaliki.
Ulaindilila pele nsimuboni;
Ngwani uuzooamba kulinguwe kuti, Ucitanzi?
Leza talijati kulunyemo lwakwe;
Bagwasya Nzoka wakabatutumya.
Elyo ime ndilamuvwiila buti?
Inga ndasala majwinzi aakwaambana anguwe?
Pele kukombelezya buyo sinkondoma kuti andifwide insoni.
Nendamwiita akuvwiilwa,
Nsisyomi kuti uyoondiswiilila;
Akunduuma nketakwe mulandu;
Tazumini kuti njoye,
Pele ulandizuzya amause aalula.
Cilaamba nguzu sa? Ngooyu!
Mulandu sa? Nguni uunga ulamusesa?
Nendatajisi mulandu naakundipa;
Nendaliluleme naakunditamikizya.
Nekuboobo ndililuzi, Pele taakwe makani,
Nsiyeeyi na buumi; bwaambanzi?
Kuti kakwabbaulwa alwaanzuko
Ulaseka bupenzi bwabatakwe mulandu.
Ulacita babetesi kuti boofwaale bataboni kuloma.
Kuti engwe walo, nguni?
Mazuba aangu alafwambaana kwiinda simposo;
Alauluka kantaboni cakundikonda;
Alacululika mbuli maato aaluno,
Mbuli nsika mbozifuumukila tunyama.
Ndayeeya kuluba mapenzi aangu,
Akuleka mause, akulikatulusya,
Ndilizi kuti tokandipengululi pe,
Nsikayokokeli mulandu,
Elyo ndilikatazizyanzi?
Nendali kusamba acaanda
Akucita maanza kuti atube bu,
Nooyoondidumpukizya mumalindi
Lumwi ndibasesemye bandiyanda.
Kuti twaambane cabuluzi;
Kuti toonse tusangalilwe.
Kagusya musako wakwe kulindime,
Aleke kundiyoosya aluyoosyo lwakwe.
Elyo njooamba akutayoowa
Nkaambo mumoyo wangu munyina cindiyoosya.
Muuya wangu wasesemwa buumi;
Ndilaambisya lutongauko lwangu.
Nzooamba mukulula kwamoyo wangu,
Njakuti kuli-Leza, Utandipi mulandu,
Pele ntondezye kalike nka nzi?
Sa cileelede kuti ubisye bantu,
Kuti utandilizye ncocitide
Akulombozya milimo yababi?
Sa ulabona buyo mbuli muntu?
Mazuba aako aleelene sa aamuntu,
Amyaka yako ilafwimpa mbuli yamuntu sa?
Kuti kobuzyabuzya boobo milandu yangu
Akuyandaulisya mpondabija?
Anu ulizi kuti nsijisi mulandu,
Alimwi kuti taluko luunino mulindime.
Elyo ulasanduka akundinyonyoona;
Sa uayanda kuti mpayululwe?
Akundaanzya mbuli cipwaza,
Akundisamika alukanda anyama,
Akundisuminina azifuwa abuzingo?
Wakandipa buumi aluyando,
Muuya wangu wakali mubulondo bwako;
Anu lyoonse wakalijisi akaliko aka,
Mbondizi lino, koyunga andime aceeci:
Kuti nkembija ulandilangisya,
Tondilekeleli cibi cangu.
Na ndinyina mulandu nsikonzyi kukotamuka
Akaambo kansoni, akuba abubi kumapenzi aangu.
Kojisi nguzu zipya,
Koyandisisya kuti undijanine mulandu
Mukunyema kwako kukomena. Ndasikilwa mapenzi aatobelana!
Wakandigwisizyanzi mwida?
Nendakafwa omo akutabonwa muntu;
Nendaba mbondakalibede nkentanakuzyalwa;
Nendakayumunwa kuzwa mwida kukabanda,
Kuti buumi bukandikomanisye kasyoonto,
Nkentanakunjila mumudima uutamani,
Munyika musia mbi,
Mupilingene, mutakwe mumuni,
Pele zyeenzule buyo zyalufu.
Elyo Zofari muna-Naama wakaingula wati,
Mweelwe oyu wamajwi taumvwigwi sa?
Namulakata ulalekwa biyo sa?
Zyabuyo zyako zilamucita muntu kuti aumune sa?
Taakwe sena uukupa bweeme akaambo kansampaulo zyako?
Ndatuba kumeso aako.
Pele kuti kayanda Leza kwaamba,
Kakujulila milomo yakwe,
Aziyoosya zyanzila zyabo,
Inga waiya kuti Leza takupi mboyeelede milandu yako.
Inga ulasikila kumasimpilo aabusongo bwa-Singuzuzyoonse sena?
Bulainda julu, ulatyani yebo?
Bubbide kwiinda lufu, waambanzi yebo?
Mbulamfu kwiinda nyika;
Bulikwazeme kwiinda lwizi.
Kuti kajata, akubikila mulandu,
Ngwani uukonzya kumukasya?
Ulaiisya muntu wabuyo kuti asongwaale,
Muntu muyumu mbuli kambongolo ulamubombya.
Akutambika maanza kulinguwe,
Kuti kotanda cibi kuzwa kubuumi bwako,
Alimwi abubi kuŋanda yako,
Inga wayuma akutayoowa:
Uyooluba mapenzi aako;
Uyoowayeeya buyo mbuli kuyabantika kwalwizi kwakainda,
Buumi bwako buyoosalala kwiinda isikati;
Zyeenzule zyako ziyooba mbuli bucedo.
Uyooliiba akuba alulangilo,
Uyakweempauka akoona kololokede.
Uyoona katakwe uukuyoosya;
Banjibanji bayooyandaula nzila zyakukubotezya,
Pele bantu babi bayoofwika meso aabo cabuyo;
Tabakajani macijilo;
Kulangila kwabo akulike nkufwa biyo.
Eno Jobu wakavuwa wati,
Kakutakwe doneeko, ndinywe bantu bezi!
Busongo buyakufwa-andinywe!
Pele lino, ndijisi boongo ambebo;
Nsibulide mbomujisi;
Kwamuyeeya, taakwe uutazi ncomwaamba.
Ulasekwa lino abazwalani bakwe!
Muntu uululeme, uutajisi mulandu ulasekwa magwegwelele!
Muntu nalebwa, ulaumwa biyo.
Kuli basaala buyo, bakupuka;
Abo basoka Leza balabambwa,
Bacita nguzu zyabo beni kuti zibe leza wabo.
Buzya kubanyama balo, bayookwiisya;
Kobuzya kubayuni, bayookwaambila;
Bauka bayavula bayookulaya;
Inswi zyamulwizi ziyookukananina:
Nkaambo nguni akati kazyo uutezi
Kuti eyi ninzila ya-Jehova?
Alimwi abuumi boonse bwamuntu.
Sena muyeeyo wamuntu tausoli majwi
Mbuli cilakwila mbocilabilila kulya?
Mulaamba kuti busongo buli kubacembele,
Abuumi bulamfu bulaamba maanu.
Pe, busongo abwami mbwa-Leza;
Inguzu aluzibo ndulwakwe mwini.
Ulajala, taakwe uujalula.
Ulaizumizya elyo inyika ilapwayigwa.
Inguzu alulaililo ndulwakwe;
Ulazumizya beenwa alimwi abacenga;
Ulanyanga basikulaya maanu aabo,
Akucita basilubeta kuti babe bafubafuba.
Ulasamunuzya bami
Akubasamika zyaanzyo;
Ulalobya bapaizi
Akunyonyauna nguzu zyabo;
Ulatulumanya basiŋambilo
Bapati ulabacita kuti balube bucenjezi bwabo.
Ulabausya insoni basilutwe,
Akuteteesya basinguzu,
Ziyoosya zyazimvule ulaziyubunuzya,
Ulavuzya mikowa elyo ulaimwaya;
Ulacita mikowa kuti ivule, alimwi ulailobya.
Ulainganya bami bayo,
Akubabika mulukula lutajisi nzila,
Mpobaampaampa mumudima mutakwe mumuni,
Mpobadadalika mbuli muntu uukoledwe.
Ndakalibonena eci coonse,
Ndakacimwa ndemwini akuciteelelesya;
Ncemuzi nywebo, ncendizi ambebo;
Nsifubeede kwiinda ndinywe.
Pele, ndayanda kuleta makani kuli-Singuzuzyoonse;
Ngonguwe Leza ngonjanda kwaambaula kaambo anguwe.
Inywe mulavumba zyoonse zyakubeja,
Muli bananga babuyo, nyoonse.
Nemwalibonya kuti muli basongo!
Amuteelele kaambo kangu mbokabede,
Muswiilile ncenamba ime.
Akumwiiminina cakubeja?
Mulamulwanina sena?
Sa kuyooba kubotu kuti aakumulingula inywe?
Atene muntu mbuli mbwauninwa muyoomweena walo sa?
Ncobeni uyakumululamika
Kuti kamuba alusalululo mumoyo wanu.
Bulemu bwakwe tabweelede sa kumuyoosya?
Sa tamujisi ntulu kubupati bwakwe?
Tusimpi twanu tulaba twe,
Inkanano zyanu zilakolomoka mbuli bulongo.
Amuumune, mundileke ŋambe mebo,
Na cicitika ninzi!
Njoobweza buumi bwangu mujanza.
Pele, njoosinizya kutaba amulandu kunembo lyakwe,
Nkaambo uutayoowi Leza tabooli kunembo lyakwe,
Amuswiililisye kwaamba kwangu,
Mundipe matwi aanu.
Ndilabona makani aangu mbwaabede,
Ndilizi kuti njoozwidilila.
Kuti nkwali ndeelede nduumune, ndifwe,
Pele, Leza, utandicitili zintu zyobile,
Elyo nsikayubi kulinduwe.
Gwisya janza lyako kulindime,
Alimwi utandiyoosyi azikataazyo zyako.
Elyo njovuwa kwiita kwako,
Atene yebo kwiingula ncenamba ime.
Undaambile mweelwe wabubi bwangu;
Unditondezye mpondakabija.
Akundicita mbuli sinkondonyoko?
Ulavwima bwizu bupuseme na?
Undicita kuti nkone indubyo zyakubwanike bwangu.
Ulalangisisya koonse nkonjenda;
Ulabika mugaano kuntaamo zyangu;
Nekuba kuti mubili wavunda akubola
Mbuli cakusama ciligwa pempya.
Ulaputa mazuba mace kazwide bupenzi;
Mbuli ceenzule ulazimina.
Akumuleta kukubetekwa.
Cazwa kucisofweede, pele kunyina.)
Mbuli mbowakaimika mazuba aamuntu,
Akukosola myezi yakwe,
Alimwi akumuyakila kuti atayi,
Kusikila buzuba bwamulimo wakwe bumane.
Nkaambo musamu uugonkwa inga ulasyuuka alimwi,
Busonje bwawo inga tabumani;
Nekuba kuti miyanda yawo yabola muvu,
Acisiko cawo cafwa munsi,
Ajana maanzi ulasyuuka
Akukomezya mitabi mbuli katembwani
Pele muntu ulafwa akuzimina;
Ii, ulafwa elyo uli kuli?
Mbuli meenda aaziba lyakaindi,
Mbuli mulonga uuyuminide,
Julu nelyamana, tasinsimuki muŋonzi yakwe.
Necakali cibotu kuti wandisisa munyika yabafwide,
Kondibamba kumbali mane kunyema kwako kumane,
Elyo akundiyeeya casika ciindi.
Nendakala buyo mane ndalemununwa.
Kuti koyandisisya buumi mbowakalengede;
Akutalangaula milandu yangu;
Kulubizya kwangu nekuyoojalilwa kumbali,
Noyoolekelela cibi cangu.
Pele aalo malundu alakolomoka,
Mandomba alagwisigwa,
Mabwe alasunzululwa amaanzi,
Ivu lilakukululwa amvula;
Mbombuboobo ulanyonyoona kulangila kwamuntu.
Ulamuzunda elyo walo ulainda;
Ulasandula busyu bwakwe mulufu akumuyisya.
Balausigwa insoni pele walo tababoni.
Awalo muuya wakwe nguulila.
Lino Elifazi mu-Temani wakavuwa wati,
Sena muntu musongo ulasakatila boobo
Akulizuzya amuuwo?
Sa ulazumanana kaamba zyabuyo,
Amajwi aatamucitili cintu?
Ulaubya buyo luzumino,
Ulacesya lulemeko kunembo lya-Leza.
Mbubi bwako bwiisya milomo yako,
Akucita kuti usale majwi aabucenjezi.
Ikkanwa lyako omwini lilakujanya mulandu, teensi ndime;
Milomo yako omwini iikubejelezya,
Sa wakalengwa kaatana kulengwa malundu?
Uli sibusongo boonse sa?
Wateelelanzi ncotwatateelela?
Bajisi myaka minji kwiinda uso.
Sa kulinduwe ingumuzyo zya-Leza tazikwe makani,
Majwi aakukululamika caluse?
Ulekelanzi moyo wako kuti ukulele?
Aambanzi meso aako,
Kuti unyemene Leza Akwaamba nzangilo?
Uuzyalwa kumwanakazi uyoolulama buti?
Alyalo ijulu talisalali kumeso aakwe:
Muntu uunywa bubi mbuli maanzi!
Swiilila, ndakwaambila;
Ncindakabona ndakukananina.
Ncibakasiilwa abamawisi aabo,
Kabatananjililwa beenzu).
Mumyaka yoonse iibikilwa sikwiinga bamwi.
Musaali inga ulamuvubuluzya,
Tayeeyi kupononoka,
Pele kufwa buyo aceba
Ulizi kuti buzuba bwamudima buli afwaafwi.
Kupenga akulebuluka zilamuyoosya;
Zilamulwanya mbuli mwami uulibambilide kulwana.
Akulisumpula kuli-Singuzuzyoonse,
Kamuvuumukila cakulidundaizya
Munsi lyantobo yakwe njumu:
Akunenesya mukuvuba kwakwe,
Waliyakulwida minzi
Akukala mumaanda aateelede kuti muntu akale mulingao,
Pele kuba matongo.
Nekubaboobo, ncajana taciyoboli,
Alimwi ncabelekela tacitebuli.
Mitabi yakwe ilapusama mukupya,
Abusonje bwakwe bulavupulwa aluuwo.
Nkaambo uyoovola zyabuyo.
Zisyuuko zyayo kazitana kusiasia.
Ulalosya micelo yakwe iitabizwa mbuli musaansa, A
kukulumbusya maluba aakwe mbuli maolifa,
Alimwi mulilo ulanyonyoona maanda aabasimasinka-milomo.
Ida lyabo lilababambila kutyompwa buyo.
Lino Jobu wakavuwa wati,
Ndakateelela kale kanjikanji zintu zili boobo; Nyoonse muli baumbulizi bakatezi biyo.
Taako masimpilo sa kumajwi aabuyo?
Ncinzi cimucita kuti mwiingule?
Nimwali mondibede;
Nendamusanganya majwi,
Akumupukila mutwe.
Pele, nendamuyumya amulomo wangu,
Akumutontozya myoyo amilomo yangu.
