Pele, nekuba ndaamba, buusu bwangu tabucesegwi;
Akwalo kuumuna kulandipenguluzya buti?
Nkaambo Leza undikataazizye, undisaalide;
Bupenzi bwangu bwandigogonyika.
Bulaamba kubisya kwangu, bulandibejelezya;
Akwalo kukotela kwangu kulaamba kubusyu bwangu!
Wandiyaula mulunyemo lwakwe akundipenzya kapati;
Wandilumina ntwino;
Basinkondoma balandidunamina ameso aabo.
Leza wandipa kubataluleme,
Akundiwaala mumaanza aababi.
Ndakaliiba, pele wakandipwaya;
Wandijata kumukosi akundikwapula;
Ndi mbaakani yakwe,
Abafusi bakwe bandizinguluka;
Ulanjasa moyo
Akutila mululwe wangu ansi.
Ulandaatusya akundaatusya;
Ulandapukila mbuli sinkondo.
Akulibombya mukasuko.
Busyu bwangu buliuside amisozi,
Ameso aangu aloofweede.
Anu nsinabijide amaanza,
Amajwi aangu alisalalide.
Kulila kwabo kakuya koonse koonse,
Ngonguwe uuli kujulu uyoondisimpya.
Bazwalani bangu balandiubausya;
Pele misozi yangu ilalanga kuli-Leza mukukomba,
Akumuvuna kubeenzinyina,
Njooenda anzila iitaletululwi.
Ciindi cangu ciliindide,
Cincaalide buyo ncuumbwe.
Ndalanga buyo bunongi bwabuumi.
Nguni umwi uunga ulasyomezya boobo?
Nkaambo wakabacita kuti batamvwi,
Elyo tokabazumizyi kuti bandizunde,
Mbuli oyo uutamba beenzinyina kukulya
Akusiya bana bakwe kabafwide nzala,
Ndi cisesemyo kulimbabo,
Aalo meso aangu aloofwaala akaambo kabuusu;
Azizo zyangu zyakotelesya.
Bantu baluleme balakankamana akaambo kaceeci,
Abatakwe mulandu balasokwa abataluzi;
Uusalalide ulaya bujana nguzu.
Nsikajani musongo akati kanu,
Aziyando zyamoyo zyamana;
Masiku ndisikati kulindime,
Amumuni, mudima.
Ncindeelede kulangila buyo nkukala mubafu,
Akoona mumudima,
Kuulika kabanda kuti, Baama,
Akwiita mvunyu kuti, Mudzi!
Luli kuli lusangalilo lwangu?
Njoojana kuli lulangilo?
Tulanjila antoomwe mukabanda.
Elyo Bilidadi waku-Suwa wakaamba wati,
Uyooleka lili kuvuzya majwi?
Umuna, elyo tuyakwaamba.
Sa tuli banyama batamvwi?
Sena inyika yeelede kuba igundu
Amandomba aayo kutingamunwa akaambo kako?
Mulilo wakwe tuukooyooyaka;
Kumweka muŋanda yakwe kuyooba mudima;
Ilampi lili ajulu lyakwe liyakuzima:
Intaamo zyakwe ziyoopatilwa,
Uyoolebegwa amiyeeyo yakwe mwini.
Maulu aakwe mwini alamunjizya mulunsabwe,
Ulajatwa mutulyango twalo;
Tusindi twakwe tulajatwa mukakole,
Acalo citeyo cilamujatisya;
Bufwizyo bulasisilwa nguwe ansi;
Kuli mulindi munzila yakwe,
Zilamulyata kutusindi twakwe.
Mapenzi alalindila buyo kulebegwa kwakwe.
Kalwalo kalapulukuta lukanda lwakwe;
Cilwazi cilalya zizo zyakwe.
Akweenzegwa kunembo lyamwami waziyoosyo;
Musulufa uyakukala alinguwo.
Miyanda yakwe iyooyuma kunsi akwe,
Amitabi iyakupusama ajulu lyakwe.
Takooyooba azina mucisi.
Uyoogwisigwa kuzwa mumumuni kuya mumudima,
Akutandwa kuzwa munyika.
Naba omwe buyo mucilao ncaakakede.
Bakede kujwe bayookankamana kubona mbwabede,
Abazwa kumbo bayakuyoowesya.
Mbuboobo mbwaya uutayeeyi Leza.
Elyo Jobu wakavuwa wati,
Akundipwayapwaya amajwi aanu?
Mulandivulumina ziindi zili kumi,
Mwandijata bubi cakubula insoni
Cibi cangu makani aangu.
Akundivulumina akweetezya kwangu,
Kanditeya munsabwe zyakwe.
Ndoompolola kuti, Ndafwa! pele taakwe uundivwiila;
Ndakwiilila lugwasyo pesi taakwe uukosola mulandu.
Akwiisizya kuti ntaindi.
Wandipilusizya bulemu bwangu
Akundinyanga bwami.
Wandikolomosya koonse koonse;
Wazyula kulangila kwangu mbuli musamu;
Akundiyeeya mbuli sinkondonyina.
Balakazyanya kuti bandisaale.
Bazwalani bangu baliyamukide kulindime.
Basazima tabayandi kundiziba,
Bazibide kundiswaya balindilubide.
Bazike bangu basimbi balandaamba kuti mweenzu;
Kulimbabo ndi muzwamasi.
Ndaita muzike wangu pele tandivwiili;
Ndeelede kumukombelezya buyo.
Muuya wangu ulasesemya banangu;
Akubana bakwesu ndanunka.
Abana bani ini bandinonga;
Kuti na ndanyamuka balandisampaula.
Bazwalani bangu boonse balacimwa nkaambo kangu,
Abaabo mbindakali kuyanda balandilwanya.
Lukanda lwangu lulanamatila kuzifuwa zyangu;
Ndilobokede biyo anyama yamumeno aangu.
Mubaaluse, mundifwide luzyalo nywe nobazwalani bangu,
Nkaambo ndaumwa ajanza lya-Leza.
Mundipenzezyanzi mbuli mbwacita Leza?
Sa tamusangalilwi anyama yangu?
Majwi aangu naalembwa!
Naalembwa mulugwalo!
Naaengwa apeni lyalubulo alotwe!
Naaengwa abbwe kuti akale kutamani!
Nekubaboobo ndilizi kuti Muvuni wangu ulapona,
Alimwi kuti uyoondiiminina anyika.
Nekuba kuti mubili oyu wamana,
Buumi bwangu buyoobona Leza,
Moyo wangu ulalilauka kumubona kali kulubazu lwangu;
Kumubona katayanzanukide andime.
Inywe nomwaamba kuti, Tuyakumupenzya buti,
Nkaambo mulandu uli kulinguwe?
Amucenjele!
Nkaambo inzeko zili boobo zilatundululwa apanga,
Kuti mwiiye kuti kuli Mubetesi.
Lino Zofari mu-Naama wakaamba alimwi wati,
Eci cilaputausya miyeeyo yangu;
Intulu zili mulindime zyabusigwa,
Sena ndeelede kuswiilila lululamiko lunduusya nsoni
Nondiingula yebo muluwo buyo lutamvwiki?
Sena tonateelede kuti
Kuzwa kukubikilwa kwamuntu munyika,
Kuti kukondwa kwabatamvwi Leza nkuniini?
Nekuba watanta kujulu
Amutwe wakwe waba mumayoba,
Uyoomaninina limwi mbuli mazyu aakwe,
Abaabo bakamuzi bayoobuzya kuti, Uli kuli?
Uyoozimingana mbuli ciloto akutajanwa limbi;
Uyooyuba mbuli cimpangaliko camasiku.
Liso lyakali kumubona talikamuboni alimwi;
Abusena bwakwe tabukamulangi tubili,
Bana bakwe bayookumbila kubacete,
Amaanza aabo ayoopilusya buvubi bwakwe.
Zifuwa zyakwe kazicijisi nguzu zyabwana
Zilaya kukabanda.
Nekuba kuti cibi cilalwela mukanwa kakwe,
Nekuba wacaalabanya munsi alulimi,
Katayandi kucimena,
Kacibamba kucilakwila cakwe,
Mucifu cakwe.
Ngu-Leza uumulusya mbubo,
Ulalumwa andimi zyabacisasa
Akunyonka buyoka bwankombola.
Atulonga twabuci amaumba.
Takooyootangala mubuvubi mbwajanide;
Impindu zyakusambala kwakwe tazikamuleteli lukondo.
Nkaambo wakainga akuleka bacete,
Akufumpa maanda ngatakayaka.
Takooyoofusya cimwi buyo canzyayanda.
Taakwe cisyeede mukunyonokela kwakwe,
Aboobo lukupuko lwakwe talukookala.
Nekuba kuti ulivubide uyoocetaala;
Uyakupenzegwa abaabo boonse bapengede.
Aboobo Leza ulamuwisizya nsima yalukalalo lwakwe.
Pele ualayaswa amuvwi wamukuba,
Injoosyo zyalufu zilamuzinguluka.
Mulilo uutadukulwi amuntu uyoomulya,
Kautenta zyoonse zili muŋanda yakwe,
Inyika ilabuka kuti imwaambanye.
Iŋanda yakwe iizwide iyookukulwa akunyonyooka
Mubuzuba bwalunyemo lwa-Leza.
Nciceeci cipegwa a-Leza kuli uutaluleme.
Elyo Jobu wakavuwa wati,
Amuswiililisye kwaamba kwangu;
Muzooumuzigwa kuti kamuteelela.
Amundizumizye kuti ndaambe,
Elyo ndamana, kamucinonga buyo.
Elyo nkaambonzi ndeelede kukazika moyo?
Amulange! Amukankamane aceeci,
Mutulumane.
Nendayeeya mebo ndaba acindebwe,
Ndilaba abunyele.
Akucembaala, akujana nguzu?
Izyalani lyabo lilaimikwa mumeso aabo,
Balabona bana babo.
Minzi yabo yavunwa kuzwa kukuyoowa;
Kalusu ka-Leza takabaumi.
Bapoho babo balatanta cakutaimpa,
Ampwizi zyabo zilazyala akutasowa.
Bana babo balaya mbuli butanga mumacelelo;
Balazyana kabakondwa;
Balaimba kukalumbu akundandala;
Balasekelela kulwiimbo lwamusengele,
Balakala mukuliiba
Akufwa muluumuno,
Anu balaamba kuli-Leza kuti, Kozwa kulindiswe,
Tatukuyandi anzila zyako.
Nimpindunzi kuti katunyonena Singuzuzyoonse?
Tujananzi notukomba kulinguwe?
Sa taluli mumaanza aabo lukupuko lwabo?
(Pele babi mbobayeeya ncintu cili kulamfu andime).
Ulabazimya tongaye bantu babi?
Balawidwa tongaye lunyonyooko?
Ulabacisya tongaye mulunyemo lwakwe?
Balaba lili mbuli bwizu muluuwo,
Abuungu mukambizi?
Mulaamba kuti,
Leza ulabatundulula bana akaambo kaako.
Naabacita bantu beni, balimvwe lupubulo!
Muntu mubi kabona mwini kusaalwa kwakwe;
Kanywa mwini lukalalo lwa-Singuzuzyoonse.
Nkubotelwa kuli buti aciinga cakwe
Nibwamana buumi bwakwe?
Sena nkwali uunga ulaiisya Leza luzibo?
Ayeeye kuti ulababeteka bali mujulu!
Amulange, umwi ulafwa kacijisi nguzu,
Kaliibide akusangalilwa;
Nkamelo zyakwe zilizwide,
Ulikupukide, ula pona kabotu.
Umwi ulafwa katyokede moyo,
Katanalabide bubotu bwamubuumi.
Akuvumbwa amvunyu.
Ndilizi neemuyeeya,
Amiyungo njemundiyeeyela.
Nkaambo mulaamba kuti, Ili kuli ŋanda yamwami,
Atente mobakali kukala babi?
Amubuzye kai kulibasilweendo,
Muteelele ncebaamba:
Kuti ulafutuka mubuzuba bwabukali bwa-Leza.
Ngwani uumwaamba kubusyu bwakwe?
Ngwani uumusubula akaambo kamilimo yakwe?
Pe, ulayumunwa kucuumbwe,
Abantu balalanga kabanda kakwe;
Mbuli baabo banji bakamusolweda Abaabo bayakumutobela.
Mwanditambikilanzi njumuzyo zyanu zyabuyo,
Anu kulaya koonse kwanu nkubeja buyo?
Wakaamba lino Elifazi mu-Temani wakati,
Sena muntu musongo taligwasyi mwini?
Singuzuzyoonse ujana mpindu sa kubululami bwako?
Buluzi bwanzila zyako bumuletelanzi?
Ulakupubwidanzi akaambo kaluzumino lwako,
Akukubeteka?
Bubi bwako tabuli bupati sena?
Azilubizyo zyako nzinji.
Nkaambo wakapa kubeenzinyoko,
Akubweza zisyomyo zyazyakusama zyabo
Kuti beende acinswe.
Waima bafwide nzala zyakulya,
Kuti bantu balaanguzu bavube nyika,
Abali ampuwo bakale mulinjiyo.
Pele wakatanda bamukabafu aminwe buyo,
Akupenzya bamucaala.
Nkekaambo aka ulizingulukidwe tukole,
Akuyoosegwa cakulubuluka,
Awalo mumuni wako waba mudima;
Ayebo wavumbwa amaanzi manji.
Akulanga nyenyeezi zili mulindilyo sena?
Nekubaboobo ulaamba kuti,
Leza uliziinzi?
Inga ulalela sena kuzwa mumudima uusia mbi?
Tatuboni nkaambo kamayoba.
Mbobakayeeya bantu babi beensiku?
Bakafwambaana kufwa
Nebakakukululwa akupaya kwamaanzi;
Abo bakaamba kuli-Leza kuti, Kozwa kulindiswe;
Alimwi kuti, Singuzuzyoonse inga ulakonzya kutucitilanzi?
Pele, (mbe amba webo) babi mbobayeeya ncintu cili kulaale kulindime!
Abatajisi mulandu bakabasaalizya
Kaboompolola kuti, Batulwanya bazimanisigwa,
Alimwi neebasia ciyooumpwa amulilo.
Elyo kuyakuba bubotu kulinduwe.
Majwi aakwe kaakala mumoyo wako,
Kuti kosanduka cakulibombya kuli-Singuzuzyoonse,
Akutanda bubi kulaale amunzi wako;
Kuti kosowa ngolida yako,
Akuwaala mumulonga ngolida yako ya-Ofiri,
Lino Singuzuzyoonse uyooba ngolida yako,
Ansiliva yako abuvubi bwako.
Elyo Singuzuzyoonse uyooba lukondo lwako,
Ayebo inga ulalungama kuli-Leza;
Nokomba uyookuvwiila,
Elyo inga ulazuzya zisyomezyo zyako kulinguwe.
Izuba liyookumunikila nzila zyako,
Nkaambo ulabombya balisumpula,
Pele ulagwasya babombede.
Ulavuna batajisi mulandu,
Ulabafutula nkaambo kalusalalo lwamaanza aabo.
Nkabela Jobu wakaingula, wati,
Asunu kutongooka kwangu nkwakuzanga;
Munsi lyajanza lyakwe lilemu ndavuluma buyo.
Nendilizi nkondinga ndamujana,
Kuti ndisike kubbetekelo lyakwe,
Nendabika kaambo kangu kunembo lyakwe,
Akulizumananina.
Ndayanda kuziba mbwanga ulandiingula,
Nditeelele ncaelede kwaamba kulindime.
Pe, naakundiswiilila.
Oko nendakanana anguwe mbuli uutakwe mulandu,
Akululamikilwa kuya kutamani amubetesi wangu.
Ndaya munsi pele nsimuboni;
Ndamulangaula cabuyo kulumwesi:
Ndasandukila kululyo pele talibonyi.
Kuti kandisunka njoopoleela mbuli ngolida.
Nsinaleya kunzila yakwe.
Nsinapilukide kuzwa kumilazyo yakwe,
Amalailile aakwe alakalilila mumoyo wangu.
Ulacita coonse ncayanda.
Alimwi nkozili zinji zili boobo mumuyeeyo wakwe.
Nendamuyeeya ndayoowa.
Nkaambo Leza wandinetusya moyo,
Singuzuzyoonse wandityompya.
Ndaintizigwa mukusia mbi.
Nkaambo bamucilila nkobataboni kukosola kwakwe?
Akusaala matanga antoomwe abeembeli bao,
Balabweza mpwizi yamukamufu nkaambo kacikwelete;
Abacete baleelede kuyuba;
Abaaba balazunga munkanda mbuli mbongolo zyamusokwe,
Kabayandaula cakulya,
Nkaambo ndisokwe lisanina bana babo.
Balajana maila mumyuunda masiku,
Akubba masaansa aabavubi.
Kabatajisi zyakulivumba kumpeyo;
Akulimanikizya kumandomba kuti balisitikilizye,
Bafwidwa mawisi balakwempwa kuzwa kulukolo;
Bavwanda beni balatolwa kukuliya cikwelete,
Bamwi baleenda azinswe kabatajisi zyakusama;
Balafwa nzala nebatebwida bamwi,
Nebatyanka mafuta akati kamaolifa,
Akusina waini kuzwa kumisaansa, balafwa nyota.
Akulila kwabayaswa,
Pele Leza talipenzyi amilandu.
Bamwi balayuba kuzwa kumumuni
Kabatayandi inzila zyanguwo;
Balakaka kweenda mulinzizyo.
Sikujaya bantu ulabuka kabutanaca,
Kuti ajaye bacete abateteete.
Liso lyasimamambi lilalindila lubundubundu,
Ulavumba busyu bwakwe kaamba kuti,
Taakwe uuzoondibona!
Katulula maanda mumudima.
Babbi balayuba isikati
Nkaambo tabayandi mumuni.
Akati kamasiku nciindi cabo;
Balizibide ziyoosya zyamumudima.
Balakukulwa akufuta kwamaanzi,
Lubono lwabo lwamunyika lwasingwa,
Taakwe uulyata mumasaansa aabo.
Lunyonyoolwa adanga akupya,
Akukukulwa acaanda ceenzemukide.
Izina lyabo taliyeegwi;
Bazyulwa mbuli musamu uubolede,
Abo bapenzya mukamufu
Akuteengelela bana bakwe.
Nekubaboobo Leza ulabaleka kabapona, kabajisi nguzu;
Babuka nekuba kuti bakalilekede kulangila buumi.
Ulabazumizya kuti basyome, akulikwaya;
Ulabalondola.
Kabaongomezegwa akuceswa mbuli makunka aamaila.
Ngwani uunga ulacikazya?
Ngwani uukonzya kusinizya kuti ndabeja,
Akutondezya kuti majwi aangu ngabuyo?
Elyo Bilidadi waku-Suwa wakati,
Ulaabulelo abwami bugambya
Oyo uulela muluumuno mujulu lyakujulu.
Ngwani uusisidwe kuzwa kulinguwe?
Inga ulasalala buti muntu uuzyedwe kumwanakazi?
Langa, mumeso aakwe tamukwe mumuni wamwezi,
Azyalo nyenyeezi zilasisigwa.
Muntunsi oyo muyanda waansi, ulaindilila buti!
Lino jobu wakavuwa wati,
Ncobeni wavuna janza libula zyakuligwasya!
Kuzwa kukuvula kwako kwaluzibo
Ngwani wakupa busongo obu bwakwaamba?
Muuya wakukanzya ngwani?
Kunembo lyakwe mizimo yansiku ilazyangama
Mucikalilo cabo cili ansi lyalwizi.
Cilao cabafwide tacisitilidwi kuzwa kulinguwe,
Akwaanzika nyika kutakwe ciliko.
Alimwi taadeluki angao.
Ulisitilide kunembo mpakala,
Kayalide mayoba aakwe akati.
Kaandaanya mudima kuzwa kumumuni.
Minsemu yakujulu yakazungana,
Kiiyoosegwa kukukalala kwakwe,
Alimwi abusongo bwakwe wakazunda Nzoka
Akuvolopezya nzoka yakujulu ajanza lyakwe.
Zyoonse ezi ngumoombe biyo wanguzu zyakwe,
Nkuvwiiyavwiiya kuniini buyo nkotumvwa anguwe,
Aboobo ngwani uunga ula ziba kuzuma kuzulide kwanguzu zyakwe?
Jobu wakacili kwaamba wati,
Mbuli mbwa pona Singuzuzyoonse uundilwisizye,
(Ime ndicipona,
Ndiciyoyela luuwo lwa-Leza)
Ndilasinizya kuti ndaamba cakuloma,
Nsibeji alulimi;
Alimwi kuti ime nsijisi mulandu,
Manjezeezya aangu taandisinsi nekuba kuciindi comwe buyo,
Ngotusulene kafwa mbuli babi;
Sikaamboma abe mbuli bataluleme;
Leza nasesa muuya wakwe?
Kuti wawidwa mapenzi?
Naita Leza lyoonse?
Ndilamutondezya janza lya-Leza mbolibede,
Ndilamuyubunwida muyeeyo wa-Singuzuzyoonse.
Andinywe mulibwene kale koonse oku,
Elyo mwaambilanzi cabuyo?
Nkooku Leza nkwapa muntu mubi,
Abakotela bateteete ncobatambula kuli-Singuzuzyoonse.
Na kuwizuka anzala;
Abamukabafu babo tabakonzyi kubalilila.
Nekuba wayobola nsiliva mbuli lusuko,
Akuvuzya zisamo mbuli bulongo;
Bantu babotu bayooabilana nsiliva.
Ninteteete mbuli citungu,
Ulasinsimuka kujana kuti kwamana.
Ziyoosyo zilamweenzya isikati;
Iguwo lilamukwempa masiku,
Luuwo luzwa kujwe lulamutolela limwi;
Lulamukukula kuzwa kucilao cakwe,
Nkaambo Leza ulamufusa katakwe luse,
Kuloboka, takonzyi;
Bantu balamutabuluzya,
Akumusyolela musyozi.
Ncobeni nkuuli mugodi wansiliva,
Nkobuli busena ingolida nkoisalazigwa;
Lubulo lulagwisigwa munyika,
Mukuba uleenzemunwa kuzwa kumabwe,
Balayandaula mabwe musia mbi.
Balasya mpisi kule amumuni,
Omo mobazumbaana kabalyaanzikide kulukole.
Lutebulo lulazwa munyika
Nibaipwayauzya amulilo kunsi,
Mabwe ayandika ali mumabwe aayo,
Alimwi balabweza ngolida,
Inzila yakulizeezi tiizibwi asikube,
Aliso lyalubanze talinaibona.
Banyama tabiilyati,
Mulavu tanainda alinjiyo.
Simugodi ulapandaula magala,
Akugolomona milundu amiyanda yayo;
Uladonkola maindilo mumajeleele,
Akuleesya tulonga;
Ulalangaula ziyandika,
Akuyubununa zyakasisidwe.
Aluzibo nkukuli nkolukala?
Munyika yabaumi taakwe uubujana.
Lwizi lulati, Tabuko kulindime,
Muulo wabo tuupimwi munsiliva;
Niiba ngolida yaku-Ofiri tiisambalwi ambubo;
Atubwe tuyandika tatubuuli;
Ingolida aciboniboni tazyeelene ambubo;
Tumwekamweka twangolida iisalala inga tatusintanwi ambubo;
Imbaanyina amabwe aabalangala taambwi;
Busongo buli amuulo uuinda awamabwe aasalala pyu.
Tubwe tuyandika twaku-Etiopia tatweelani abo;
Taakwe lupimo lwangolida iisalazidwe iinga yabuula.
Ino busongo inga bulajanwa kuli?
Cili kuli cilao caluzibo?
Nkaambo bulisisidwe kuzwa kumeso aazilenge zyoonse;
Ameso aabayuni taabuboni.
Lufu acikalilo cabafu cilaamoa kuti,
Twamvwa buyo ambubo,
Ngu-Leza biyo uuzi nkobukala;
Ulabona zyoonse zili ansi lyajulu.
Akweeleka maanzi manji,
Akubamba nzila zyandabo;
Kuciindi eco nkwaakabubona akubwaamba busongo,
Nkwaakabwiimika akubulingula.
Kulemeka Leza mboobu busongo;
Kweenguluka bubi nduzibo.
Elyo Jobu wakaamba alimwi, wati,
Necali cibotu nokwali mbuli myezi yamana,
Naakaliwo mazuba Leza naakali kundivuna;
Nendakeenda mumudima amumuni wakwe;
Leza naakali kusitikila ŋanda yangu;
Singuzuzyoonse naakacili ambebo,
Abana bangu nebacili ambe;
Mafuta naakali kupoomoka kuzwa mucityankilo cangu!
Nendakali kuya kunkuta,
Akukala mulubuwa,
Balombe bakandisosolokela,
Abacembeede bakaima;
Banene bakaleka kwaamba,
Bakaumuna;
Ijwi lyabo lyakabakacila kwaamba.
Bantu bakandilongezya nebakandibona;
Abo bakandibona bakazumina bubotu bwangu;
Abalo bamucaala ababula mugwasyi mbubonya.
Bayanda kufwa bakali kundipa luleleko lwabo;
Ndakali kucita moyo wamukamufu kuti ukakondwe.
Kululama kwangu kwakali zyakusama angoani yangu.
Ndakali maulu kulibacilema;
Nekuba kuti teendakali kubaziba ndakali kweena twaambo twabo.
Ndakali kutyola myeebo yabataluzi,
Akucita meno aabo kuti alosye ncobakali kulya.
Ndiyoofwa akati kabana bangu,
Mazuba aangu ayooba mbuli musec;
Mume uloona amitabi yangu masiku conse,
Anguzu zyangu zilakomena.
Baalumi bakali kundiswiililisya;
Muluumuno bakali kulindila kulaya kwangu;
Majwi aangu akali kubawida mbuli mvula,
Teebakali kwaamba limbi.
Mbuli mbobakalangila mpumpaluya ayalo imvula ya-Muyoba, Bakalangila ndime.
Ndakabamwemwetela nebakali kubula busicamba
Alimwi taakwe wakasandula lukaliko lwabusyu bwangu.
Ndakalikede mbuli mwami,
Akwaamba nzila njebakeelede kutola;
Ndakali kulailila mbuli mweendelezi walumamba.
Pele lino baniini kulindime balanditabuluzya;
Bantu bamawisi mbindakateelede kupa mulimo wamubwa wabutanga bwangu!
Mbantu batakonzyi amaanza aabo kundiletela mpindu
Nkaambo nguzu zyabo zyamana.
Balikotede akaambo kanzala akubula;
Balapulukuta zisyu zyamusokwe akuzungazunga munkanda,
Kabacela matu munsi lyaziteo,
Akulya miyanda yazipama.
Batandwa buyo kuzwa nkobakala bantu
Baboompolola kuti mbabbi.
Nkobakala nkumimpata,
Amumpako amumpangala.
Balaitana akati kaziteo,
Akuswanaana munsi lyamutungambabala;
Mbabana babafubafuba,
Mbabantu basingwa akuzimaanisigwa kuzwa kunyika.
Ndi kalabiko kabo.
Balasesemwa ndime akundizandukila;
Ii, bandibona balandiswida mate.
Akutalemeka kwabo kwakutaliiata.
Bandikakanyana kuti banyonyoone;
Balisungwide kuleta lusaalo lwangu
Kabatajisi uubalesya,
Kabandivuumukila mubwaanda busaalwa,
Aboobo ziyoosyo zyandiboolela;
Lukondo lwangu lwapepuka,
Akuliiba kwangu kwamana mbuli joba.
Kulyeetezya kulandijata.
Kucisa kulandipapamuna takuleki.
Lulitantamukide kuzizo zyangu.
Leza undidumpukizizye mukabanda,
Ndaba buyo kasuko atwe.
Ndilaima pele tondilangi.
Waba mukali kulindime,
Anguzu zyajanza lyako ulandikwapaula.
Ulandisansasansa muluuwo,
Ndaengaulwa muguwo lyalo.
Ndilizi kuti uyoondileta kulufu,
Kuŋanda yalo iimikilidwe boonse bapona.
Nekubaboobo muntu uubbila ulavunguluka janza lyakwe,
Kaompolweda lugwasyo mumapenzi aakwe.
Kuti muuya wangu wakali kuusila babula?
Ndalindila mumuni pele kweza mudima,
Moyo wangu wapya, taubatami;
Mazuba aamapenzi andeenzya,
Ndaima akati kabantu, kandili kuti ngwasigwe;
Amuzwalani ku-Mpowani,
Lukanda lwangu lulasia akumozoka,
Zizo zyangu zilapya antuntumaanzi.
Kalumbu kangu kalalizya buyo ziimbo zyamalilwe;
Anyeele zyangu zili mumajwi aabalila.
Elyo awalo musimbi teendakamulanga.
Nimpindunzi iijanwa kuli-Leza?
Singuzuzyoonse inga ulapanzi kuliceeco?
Teensi lunyonyooko kubabi sena?
Sa taluli lusaalo kulibamucita zibi?
Akubala ntaamo zyangu?
Kuti na ndeenda cakutasinizya,
Kuti maulu aangu naafwambaana kukweena;
(Leza kandipima mucipimino cabululami
Kuti abone bulome bwangu:)
Kuti na moyo wangu watobela meso aangu,
Kuti maanza aangu naabisigwa akabala;
Elyo bamwi kabalya ncindabyala,
Azisyango zyangu kazizyulwa,
Kuti moyo wangu nawakongwa amwanakazi,
Kuti nandalindila kumulyango wamweenzuma;
Elyo banangu ndemwini kaba muzike wabamwi,
Abe mumambe waumwi,
Nkaambo bwaamu mulandu mubi loko,
Ngumulandu uuelede kubetekwa mululeta;
Ngomulilo uutenta buumi kuti bumaninine do,
Akuumpa zyoonse nzejisi,
Kuti nandaleka kaambo kamuzike wangu,
Na mwaalumi, na mwanakazi;
Inga ndayeeya kucitanzi Leza nabuka;
Kuti wanditapatila inga ndaamhanzi?
Teewakatucita katweelene mucizyalilo?
Teendakali kwiima mucete ncaakayanda,
Teendakaleka mukamufu kuti abule zyeelede;
Teendakalya nsima yangu
Akutayaabila bamucaala;
Nkaambo, mbuli taata, Leza wakandilela,
Kandilondola kuzwa kukuzyalwa.
Kuti nendakabona uupenga nkaambo kakubula zyakusama,
Keenda acinswe,
Kuti nandakaleka kumukasaazya amapayi aangu,
Mane wakandeleka akaambo kakumuvumba;
Kuti nandakasesa kulibatajisi mulandu,
Nkaambo ndakalizi kuti kukosola nkukwangu;
Elyo ikuko lyangu kaliwa kuciwezo calyo,
Kuboko kakutyoka kuzwa kumubalo.
Nkaambo kuyoowesya kwangu Leza kwakandikasya;
Teendakakonzya kucita boobo akaambo kabusumpuke bwakwe.
Nindakasyoma mungolida,
Na kuyaka zyoonse atala angolida iisalala;
Nendakasekelela nkaambo buvubi bwangu bwakakomena,
Nkaambo maanza aangu akalibungikide lubono;
Na mwezi ulaya mubulemu,
Akuleka moyo wangu kuti ukombe kulinguwo,
Kanduumyankutila janza;
Nkaambo inga nindatama Leza uuli mujulu.
Nendakakondwa akunyonyooka kwauundwanya,
Na kusekelela kuti wawidwa bubi;
Akukumbila lufu lwakwe mukumusinga;
Bantu baŋanda yangu kuti kabatanaamba kuti,
Nguni ootabotelwi azyakulya zyakwe?
Ndakali kumujalwida silweendo mulyango wangu.)
Kuti nandakasisa zibi zyangu kuzwa kubantu,
Akuvumba mulandu wangu,
Nkaambo kakuyoowa ncoinga yaamba nkamu yabantu,
Ancobanga bayeeya banamaleya—
Ino! Ndaambanzi? Nendaswiililwa!
Nendajana luvuwo luzwa kuli-Singuzuzyoonse!
Nendalijisi luzekelo uundwanya ndwandilembede!
Nendaluyumuna aciwezo cangu,
Nendalusama mbuli munsini,
Nendanjilila kulinguwe mbuli mwami,
Akumwaambila zyoonse zyamubuumi bwangu.
Nendakabikwa mulandu anyika yangu,
Mifolo neyatongooka amisozi,
Kuti na ndakatebula kanditanabbadela balimi,
Atene kuti ndakajaya balaanyika;
Mamvwa kaakomena mucilao camaila;
Mubusena bwabbaale kaluba lusyanga.
Majwi aa-Jobu amana elyo abo bantu botatwe bakamuleka nkaambo wakaliyeeya kuti muntu uululeme.
Lino Elihu mwana a-Barakeli waku-Buzi wamukowa wa-Ramu, wakamukalalila Jobu nkaambo wakalicita mubotu kwiinda Leza.
Alimwi wakapya moyo kubazwalani bakwe botatwe nkaambo teebakamuvuwa kabotu nekuba kumubeteka Jobu mbuli uutaluleme.
Mbobakali bapati kulinguwe, Elihu wakali kulindila majwi aabo;
pele Elihu naakabona kuti bantu abo botatwe bakabula kuvuwa, wakapya moyo.
Elyo Elihu mwana wa-Barakeli waku-Buzi wakaamba wati,
Ime ndimuniini, anukuti inywe muli bapati,
Elyo ndakalikasya kuti ndimwaambile ncenjeeya.
Abulaililo mbwamyaka minji,
Uumucita kuti amvwisisisye;
Nebaba bacembeede mbazibisisya,
Aboobo ndaamba, Kamundiswiilila;
Njoowamba miyeeyo yangu.
Ndakalindila kwaamba kwanu,
Ndakateelela kuti njane busongo bwanu;
Pele taakwe akati kanu wakazunda Jobu,
Na kwiingula kumajwi aakwe.
Ngu-Leza, teensi muntu, uuelede kumuzunda.
Tanakwaambaula ambebo;
Mebo nsizoomuvuwi amajwi aanu.
Abo bazyingwa, baleka kwaamba;
Nkaambo babula majwi.
Pele, sa kuleelede kuti ndicuumune,
Nkaambo baliimvwi kabaumwine?
Pe, andime ndilapa lubazu lwangu,
Ndilaamba ncindiyeeya.
Nkaambo ndizwide zintu zyakwaamba,
Muuya wangu ulandigutaika kuti ŋambe.
Muyeeyo uuli mbuli waini uubila mubbodela,
Ambuli bbodela liyanda kubbotoka akaambo kawaini uuli mulindilyo.
Ndaambe kuti njoye,
Njalule milomo akwiingula.
Nsisalululi muntu nabani,
Akuupaika nsikuciti;
Mulengi inga ulandimaninizya kufwambaana.
Uteelele zyoonse nzeŋamba.
Mpendili amulomo kaubbanunide,
Ngooyu mulaka kawaamba.
Majwi aangu alisinikizizye.
Singuzuzyoonse ulandiyoyela buumi.
Kuti kokonzya, undivuwe;
Konyamuka undikazye.
Toonse twakabumbwa abulongo.
Mbuli mbowakaamba mukumvwa kwangu,
Nkaambo ndakakuteelela ulaamba kuti,
Nsijisi kampenda, nsijisi mulandu,
Akundijata mbuli sinkondonyina,
Ulalangisisya koonse nkunjenda,
Leza mupati kwiinda muntu.
Tainguli kulila kwangu?
Nkaambo Leza ulaanzila yomwe buyo yakwaamba?
Ii, aimwi kuti kotaboni,
Bantu nebalyoonena ŋonzi amalo,
Ulabayubunwida zintu,
Akubayoosya azilayo,
Kuti bafutatikwe kuzwa kububi
Alimwi kuti baleke kulisumpula;
Kuti myuuya yabo ifutulwe kulufu,
Alimwi kuti buumi bwabo butayi buyo kulunyonyooko,
Kulwana kuli muzifuwa zyakwe takumani.
Mane muuya wakwe ukake zyakulya,
Azinono zimusesemye;
Azifuwa zyakwe zilibonye,
Buumi bwakwe kabuyanda kufwa,
Kabuli afwaafwi abaangelo balufu.
Umwi wacuulu cabaangelo,
Akumutondezya ncaelede;
Kuti avunwe kulufu,
Nkaambo wamujanina cinunuzyo.
Lino inyama yakwe ilaba impya kwiinda yamwana;
Inguzu zyabulombe bwakwe bulajoka;
Ulakomba cakukondwa kubusyu bwakwe;
Ulaambila bantu Leza mbwaamufutula.
Ulabaimbila bamwi kuti,
Ndakabisya, ndakalubizya,
Pele taakanditundululi;
Wakanununa muuya wangu kulufu,
Wazumizya buumi bwangu kuti bubone mumuni alimwi,
Ino Leza ulacitulula eci,
Tobile, totatwe kubantu,
Eno, Jobu, koteelelesya! Umuna, ndaambe!
Nkaambo ndayanda kuti ukazuminizigwe.
Koumuna, ndikwiisye busongo.
Elihu wakacaamba wati,
Amumvwe majwi aangu nobasongo;
Amundiswiilile inywe nomujisi luzibo;
Nkaambo kutwi kula sola majwi
Mbuli cilakwila mbocilabila cakulya.
Elyo atulisalile eco ciluzi;
Atulyaambile eco cibotu,
Pele ngu-Leza wakamubisizya;
Ulandiyasa calufu kantajisi mulandu, mbwaamba.
Sa kwakaliwo muntu uuli mbuli Jobu
Uuguumwina masampu mbuli maanzi,
Uuyanzana ababi
Akweenda abantu basampukide?
Kuti muntu ayanzane a-Leza,
Kacili kule a-Leza kuti acite bubi,
Akuli-Singuzuzyoonse kuti alubizye.
Akumucita kuti ajane mbubonya mbuli mbwacita.
Pe, Leza takooyoocita cibi,
Singuzuzyoonse takaciti cakutaloma.
Nguni wakamupa nguzu kunyika?
Ulelelani nyika yoonse?
Akunyanga nyika luyooyo lwakwe,
Mikowa yoonse niiyoofwidilila antoomwe;
Muntu nayoojokela kubulongo.
Alimwi, kuti kokonzya kumvwisya,
Koteelela majwi aangu:
Inga ulamwaamba Leza uuli anguzu, uulomene,
Uumwaambila mwami kuti mucengi,
Abanene kuti mbabeji,
Na bavubi kwiinda bacete?
Boonse nzilenge zyamaanza aakwe,
Mukaindi kaniini, atene akati kamasiku, bafwa;
Bavubide baanzuka,
Abalaanguzu bazimina.
Nkaambo meso aa-Leza ali kumuntu;
Ulalanga ntaamo zyakwe zyoonse.
Taakwe mudima, na eenzule calufu,
Babi nkobakonzya kuyuba.
Kuti amubeteke muntu;
Ulapwaya bantu balemu kaatakwe lubeteko,
Akubika bambi mumasena aabo;
Ulabatingamuna masiku
Nkaambo ulizi ncobacita;
Ulabapobola babi mukukalala kwakwe,
Ampela lyabantu boonse,
Nkaambo baleya kuzwa kukumutobela,
Akunyansya milao yakwe,
Kwamvwigwa nkwabede.
Kuti watacita cintu, nguni uunga ulamwaamba?
Kuti wabaleka buyo, nguni uunga ulamubikila mulandu?
Kuti kutaleli oyo uuyanda kucenga bantu.
Koamba kuli-Leza kuti, Nkaambo kakutundululwa,
Nsikooyoobisya limbi;
Kondiisya ncintaboni;
Alimwi kuti ndabija, nsikooyoocita boobo limbi.
Leka Leza kuti akucitile mbwayanda;
Kusala ncaelede kucita nkukwakwe, teensi kwako.
Uambe ncoyanda,
Pele bantu bayeeya bayoozumina mbweŋamba,
Awalo woonse muntu musongo uundimvwa,
Majwi aakwe taakwe busongo.
Jobu uleelede kupenga cakumaninina
Akaambo kakuvuwa kwakwe kusampukide!
Nkaambo ulayungizya luzango kuzibi zyakwe
Akucita ntabuluzyo, akuzyaamba a-Leza.
Elyo Elihu wakali kwaamba kuti,
Ncibotu sena kwaamba kuti,
Nkooku nkundeelede kwaamba kuli-Leza?
Kubuzya kuti, Njanenzi,
Ndaba ampindunzi kuti nkentabisyi?
Njookuvuwa,
Yebo abazwalani bako,
Kolanga kujulu,
Ubone intalabalanga yakujulu.
Zilubizyo zyako zinji zyaambanzi kuli-Leza?
Inga ulamujanyanzi?
Bubi bwako bulacisa bantu bali mbuli nduwe omwini,
Kululama kwako ndugwasyo kumuntu buyo.
Alimwi baitila lugwasyo kulooyo uujisi nguzu.
Uupa bantu nyimbo zyalukondo masiku,
Abusongo bwiinda bwabayuni?
Nkaambo kakulisumpula kwabo.
Leza tamvwi kulila kutali kwancoonzyo,
Singuzuzyoonse takuswiilili;
Lino uyooswiililwa buti ooamba kuti, Nsimuboni,
Makani alaampela lyakwe, ndamulindila buyo,
Lunyemo lwakwe taluumi
Elyo talipenzyi akaambo kacibi?
Ulavuzya majwi kakunyina luzibo.
Elihu wakatalika alimwi wati,
Kolindila buniini, njookutondezya
Mbokuli ndeelede kwaambilila Leza,
Ndilalumba Mulengi wangu,
Akuleta kasimpe kangu kuzwa kumabazu oonse.
Ncoonzyo, majwi aangu taali aakubeja;
Nguuno uujisi luzibo lumaninide!
Kolanga, Leza uujisi nguzu zyamubusongo,
Tanyansyi naba omwe buyo,
Tavuni babi,
Pele ulaiminina babisizigwa;
Akubakalika antoomwe abami acuuno cabwami,
Kabasumpukide.
Akusungwa amapenzi,
Ulabatondezya ncobacitide
Mukulisumpula amukuzanga.
Ulabacita kuti balayigwe,
Akubaambila kuti basanduke kuzwa kucibi
Mazuba aabo alaba ciindi cakuliiba;
Balajana myaka iisangalizya.
Pele, kakutali boobo, balafwa apanga,
Balazimina mubufubafuba bwabo,
Nkaambo kabatayeeyede Leza mumyoyo yabo, balamunyemena,
Akutalilila lugwasyo na kuti wabajalila,
Balafwambaana kufwa
Mbuli bantu babisigwa abupilingani.
Leza ulacita mapenzi kuti avune uupengede;
Akwiinga kuti kumuswiilizye.
Pele, bulubusi bwako bulikucengede,
Akaambo kakulisenya kutapatidwe,
Akulya kubotu kwakali antafule yako.
Elyo wajana lutundululo lwababi;
Lukosolo lwa-Leza lwakujatilide,
Pele lunyemo lwakwe kalutakuciti kuti umukalalile;
Muulo walululamiko kalutakuleesyi.
Sa buvubi bwako bunga bulakuvuna kakunyina mapenzi?
Neziba nguzu zyoonse nzojisi?
Utalisumpuli mukuyandaula mapenzi anga alakucita
Kuti mikowa yoonse izimine.
Nkaambo ulaiyanda eyi kwiinda kululamikwa.
Nguni muleli uuli mbuli nguwe?
Nguni uunga ulaamba kuti, Wacita citaluleme?
Bwakacita bantu kuti baimbe,
Nekuba kuti tababumvwisisisyi.
Alimwi kubala myaka yakwe takukonzeki.
Ulakwela maanzi kuzwa kulwizi,
Akwaaceleka mbuli mvula mulisikunkwe wakwe;
Elyo imvula iizwa kumakumbi
Ilawida bantu cakuvula.
Ngwani uuzi mayoba mbwaayalika,
Alimwi Leza mbwazuma kuzwa kulingao?
Ulalizingulusya amayoba
Akuvumba imitwe yamalundu angao.
Angao ulasanina mikowa,
Akucita kulya kuti kube ceyo.
Ulawaala lulabo ajanza litabonyi,
Kalulaya kuti luume mbaakani;
Kuzuma kulamwaamba,
Kulatondezya kunyema kwakwe kubi.
Ndilakankama,
Moyo wangu uladuntauka.
Amuteelele kundindima kwajwi lyakwe,
Mumvwe kukalauka kumilomo yakwe.
Ulaguluma mujulu lyoonse;
Lulabo lwakwe lulaya kumasimpilo aanyika.
Munsi lyakulaba kwaba kuzuma;
Ngu-Leza ulandindima mubwami bwakwe; Alimwi tamusyi mvula nilyazuma ijwi lyakwe.
Leza ulatutondezya zigambya zyakwe;
Ulacita zintu zikankamanisya nzotutakonzyi kumvwa.
Nkaambo ulalailila caanda kuti ciwide nyika;
Ayalo imvula mpati mbubonya;
Kuti bantu boonse bakabone nguzu zyakwe,
Elyo banyama banjila mumaseenengo aabo,
Akukala mumpako zyabo.
Myuuwo ilazwa kumusanza,
Ayalo mpeyo kuzwa kunyika.
Mankaakamba alacitika kukuyoya kwakwe;
Maanzi aakwazeme alazwiimya.
Ulalemena joba pati acivulamabwe,
Akumwaya ndabo zyakwe kuzwa kumayoba,
Kaziya kooku akooko bunyonauka mbuli mbwazitozya;
Kazicita ncalailila neciba cili buti
Koonse koonse munyika yakwe,
Lino kazyuuma alusingo,
Alino kazitumwa muluse.
Koswiilila, O Jobu. Koima cakuumuna
Akuyeeyesya milimo iigambya ya-Leza,
Nacita cintu ulizi sena mbwacicita
Mbuli mbwacita lulabo lumunike mumayoba?
Ayo atila mvula nyingi nokuyuma?
Sa ulizi nkaambonzi zyakusama zyako zyakasaazya,
Nabatamika nyika neluyanda kusika luuwo lwakumusanza?
Kuyala talabalanga lyakujulu kalili liyumu
Mbuli cimboniboni calubulo?
Undaambile, inga tulatinzi kulinguwe?
Tuyooamba buti amiyeeyo yesu yoomfokede?
Nsikonzyi kuti ndindulule kujwi lyakwe,
Cita ndazibaanisigwa.
Bantu tabakonzyi akulangisya mujulu zuba litowa,
Mayoba naamwaikide aluuwo.
Mumuni uutowa nouzwa kujulu lyakunyika,
Bulemu bwa-Leza bulayoosya.
Ulimaninide munguzu, uliluleme mukubeteka,
Tanjilili mulizyeelede muntu,
Pele talangi abo baliyeeya kuti mbasongo.
Ngwani oyu uuomfokezya kukanza kwangu
Amajwi aatayeeyegwi?
Uvuwe mibuzyo yangu.
Undivuwe kuti kozi.
Ngwani wakeeleka migaano yayo, ulizi sa?
Ngwani wakoololola lukole kulinjiyo?
Zisiko zyanyika zikala alinzi?
Ngwani wakabika bbwe lyacooko,
Abaangelo nebakoompolola mukusekelela kwabo?
Nolwakatuluka kuzwa kuda lyamatalikilo,
Nendakaluvumba asikunku
Akuluvunga mumayoba aasia mbi,
Nendakalwiimikila migaano,
Akulupingila,
Kanamba kuti, Mpaawa mpoyoosika akutainda;
Mayuwe aako aalisumpula ayooima awa?
Sena mbowakazyalwa wakabusya buzuba,
Na kulaya bucedo
Kuti bujate nyika azyooko,
Akusansamuna babi kuzwa kulinjiyo?
Elyo inyika ilalibonya mbuli bulongo busimbwa;
Ilijisi mibala-mibala mbuli cisani.
Anu bantu babi balanyangwa ziindi zyabo zyamudima,
Maboko aabo aasumpukide alatyolwa,
Sena wakajana tusensa twalwizi?
Sa wakalyata mububbile bwalwizi?
Wakatondezegwa sa milyango yalufu?
Balindizi bayo bakayoowa kunembo lyako na?
Wamvwisisisya bwanza bwanyika mbobubede sena?
Buli biyeni? Kondaambila kuti kokonzya.
Ninzilanzi iiya nkuukala mumuni,
Amudima ukala kuli,
Kuti ukakonzye kwiitola kumulimowayo
Akwiileta alimwi nkwiikala?
Ulizi yebo nkaambo nduwe wakalizyedwe kale!
Ndonduwe uujisi myaka iitabaliki!
Wakanjila muziyobwedo zyacaanda?
Wakabona sena zilongelelo zyacivulamabwe,
Kuti ncibelesye kuumya akulwanya?
Amyuuwo nkwiikala nkuli?
Muuwo wakujwe umwayigwa buti anyika?
Nguni wakabamba ziwido zyamvula yamusinku,
Akucita nzila yalulabo,
Kuti iwe munyika iitakalwi muntu,
Amunkanda mutakwe bantu,
Ikasamike nyika njumu amwemvwe?
Wisi wamume nguni?
Nguni wakazyala caanda
Maanzi naandwa mbuli bbwe,
Amankaakamba naasisa bubbile buli kunsi?
Atene kusungulula zyaanzyo zya-Bana-mweenda-mulongo sa?
Sa ulakonzya kusolweda Ntanda muciindi cayo,
Na kweenzya nyenyeezi zya-Mulalabungu?
Ulakonzya sa kwiimika inguzu zyayo munyika?
Ulakonzya kulailila mayoba
Kuti akutumine maanzi manji sa?
Sa ulakonzya kutuma lulabo kumulimo walo?
Sena lulakuvuwa kuti, Mpendi?
Nguni wakapa luzibo kululabo?
Nguni uujisi nguzu zyakubungika mayoba,
Na kutingamika nongo zyakujulu,
Mavu naayumide,
Amavwinga naajatene?
Inga ulavwimina syuumbwa muzyazi,
Akusanina bana bakwe bafwa nzala,
Nobalede mumena aabo,
Nobalindide muziyubilo zyabo?
Bana bakwe nobalila kuli-Leza cakulya?
Sena ulizi ziindi zyampongo zyamumalundu?
Sa wabona mbobazyala bazyazi bazyo?
Sena ulizi myezi njobajisi mada,
Amwezi ngobeelede kuzyala?
Balakotama, cizyalilo cilajaluka,
Balalosya bana babo;
Mbabana bapona, bakomena musokwe,
Batija kufwambaana akutajoka kubutanga.
Nguni wakacita mbongolo yamusyokwe kuti yaanguluke?
Wakasungulula mbongolo iilaaluno yeempenkane nguni?
Ilanyansya kuyobeka kwamugunzi,
Alimwi tiimvwi koompolola kwamweenzyi.
Macelelo aayo milundu
Mwiiyandaula coonse cimwemvwe,
Musune wamusyokwe ulazumina kukubelekela sa?
Ulakala muluba lwako na?
Sena ulakonzya kumusunga antambo kujamba lyako?
Ulakuhalila myeezi na?
Ulamusyoma sena nkaambo inguzu zyakwe nzipati,
Kuti akubelekele mumyuunda?
Sa uyoomusyoma kuti aze kumunzi
Kaleta maila kulubuwa lwako?
Impye ilavwapauka mukulisumpula,
Pele alaaluse mapepe aayo sena?
Nkaambo ilasia mai aayo mumavu,
Kuti akasaale akukonkolwa mulusuko,
Kiilubide kuti kuulu inga kulaapwaya,
Atene munyama inga ulaalyata.
Tiilipenzyi nekuba kuti mulimo waya ngwabuyo.
Wakaiima busongo.
Pele na kuti yalivundumusya,
Ulanyansya bbiza amutanti walyo,
Sa ulapa bbiza lyalumamba nguzu nzolijisi,
Na kusamya nsingo yalyo amwaala?
Sa ulalisotosya mbuli cisozi,
Kalivwitima cabukali?
Kalilangene amasumo.
Lilanonga kuyoowa, talityompwi;
Taliciji ipanga;
Intimbwa ilacokola kubbazu lyalyo,
Asumo linaima, apanga,
Pele, lilaya buvuumuka cabukali,
Kalitaimi akulila kwanyeele.
Yalila buyo nyeele, lilati, Ha!
Lilanunkuzya lumamba kulaale
Nkobazuma akoompolola bami.
Sa sikakonze ulaya mujulu
Akubaamina kumusanza mababa aakwe akaambo kabusongo bwako?
Kuti iyake cikumbilo cayo mumulundu?
Iŋanda yayo ili mumajeleele malamfu,
Amutwe wamulundu mpakala.
Ulasompa cakulya cakwe kuzwa kujulu
Ameso aacibona kulaale;
Nkokujanwa zijayigwa nkukonya nkwiibede.
Alimwi Jehova wakavwiila Jobu, wati,
Kukazyanya a-Leza,
Ueelede kuvuwa mibuzyo eyi yoonse.
Lino Jobu wakamwiingula Leza wati,
Ndabika minwe kumulomo wangu.
Ndilaambide kamwi, pele nsyaambi limwi;
Ndaamba tobile pele nsikaambi limbi;
Uyoondibikila mulandu kuti ulilomye na?
Kuti kokonzya kundindima ajwi lili mbuli lyakwe,
Ulisamike mululomo abwami;
Tila bukali bwaluayemo lwako,
Usampusye balilumbaizya.
Nyonyoona babi mponyawa.
Ubazike mulusuko antoomwe;
Vumba busyu bwabo amudima.
Elyo ndiyakukulumbaizya
Nkaambo janza lyako lyalulyo-ndyakujanina luvuno.
Kolanga imvuuvu njendakalenga antoomwe ayebo
Kacela bwizu mbuli musune!
Langa nguzu zyazibelo zyakwe,
Amilambi yada lyeyo;
Mucila weyo muyumu mbuli musamu wakedari,
Alimwi buzingo bwazibelo bulyaatide;
Zifuwa zyeyo zili mbuli mapompi aamukuba;
Mampango aayo ali mbuli mingwala,
Ngumwami wazilenge zya-Leza;
Wakalengwa kuti abe muleli wazilengenyina,
Ilamupa cakulya,
Ulilede muceenzule camusamu,
Amuzisitililo zyamumabu abutoolo;
Uloona mulumvwa-lumvwa,
Kazingulukidwe amisamu yamumaanzi.
Talipenzyi nekuba maanzi aa-Jordano amuyalaukila,
Ngwani uumujata kalanga?
Ngwani uumutunga mumpemo acibulo?
Na kwaanga lulimi lwakwe alukole,
Na kumuyasa mumpemo alobyo?
Sa uyakuleta nkombyo zinji kulinduwe,
Nekuba kwaamba kulinduwe majwi mabombe?
Sena uyoozuminana anduwe
Kuti akabe lyoonse muzike wako?
Sa uyoosobana anguwe mbuli kayuni kabombe,
Akumubika muzangala kuti abotezye basimbi bako?
Inkamu zyabasikuzuba inga balamukankata
Akusambala anguwe sena?
Ulakonzya sena kumuyasa azyoowe,
Na kumubbwankula mutwe amyuumba?
Komujata buyo ajanza!
Tokooyŋoluba lyoonse kulwanya.
Kusyoma koonse kwakumujata nkwabuyo;
Kumulanga buyo kulatyompya.
Ngwani uunga ulamulwanya?
Pe, taakwe ansi lyajulu.
Zizo zyakwe, anguzu zyakwe,
Aciwa cakwe zyoonse zilandyaambya.
Ngwani uunga ulafunda cikutu cakwe?
Ngwani uukonzya kutenda maamba aakwe?
Uukonzya kumwaasamuna nguni?
Meno aakwe nciyoosyo,
Musana wakwe milonge yatutobo
Tusumetene nga,
Kamwi kaliswenene akamwi
Kuti luuwo loonse talukonzyi kunjila,
Tulijatene kamwi akamwi,
Tulilamatide nkokwaamba kuti tatwaandaanisigwi.
Naesyemuka, maanzi atapauka alaŋaima;
Meso aakwe alamwekamweka mbuli mitungazuba yacifumo.
Mabalamabala alazwa kumulomo wakwe,
Ansasi zilapasauka;
Busi bulazwa kumpemo mbuli mbobuzwa
Kucilongo cibila amatete aapya.
Luyoyo lwakwe lubaanga lulakunka masizi
Amulilo uuzwa mukanwa lyakwe.
Inguzu zili munsingo yakwe;
Zyoonse zilenge zilamututumina,
Tupapa twacikanda
Tulisweene antoomwe, ntuyumu.
Moyo wakwe muyumu mbuli bbwe,
Mbuli iziyo.
Navumbuka, bantu bajisi nguzu balayoowa,
Balitulumene,
Mapanga taagwasyi mukumulwanya,
Neliba sumo, nuuba muumba, nekaba kalembe.
Muumba nkezu kulinguwe,
Isumo lyamukuba ndukuni lubolede buyo.
Muvwi tumutikizyi,
Amabwe aazwa kunkwilipo ngamakuba buyo.
Inkoli ngamatete biyo;
Ulaseka kunonta kwakasumo.
Kunsi kwamubili wakwe ninkaye zibosya
Zisimba malindi,
Ulacita maanzi kuti abile akuzwisya kovu,
Ulasuka lwizi kuti lukozye mafuta,
Ulasia mufwililili uumweka,
Kubaanga kuti lwizi lwaba acaanda.
Munyika kunyina uuli mbuli nguwe
Uulengwa katalimvwi kuyoowa.
Banyama boonse balamuyoowa;
Kuzilenge zyoonse zilisumpula ngumwami.
Elyo Jobu wakamuvuwa Jehova, wati,
Kuti oko nkokanza takukwaalili,
Ndakaamba cakutasongwaala zintu zigambya ziindilila luzibo lwangu.
Njookubuzya, ukandivuwe.
Pele lino meso aangu abona.
Aboobo ndalinyansya,
Ndapubuka mukasuko amutwe.

Elyo Jehova naakamana kwaamba boobo kuli-Jobu, Jehova wakamwaambila Elifazi waku-Tema kuti, Lunyemo lwangu lulapya kulinduwe akubazwalani bako bobile, nkaambo teemwakaamba ciluzi andime mbuli mbwaakaamba Jobu muzike wangu.

Lino, kamuya kuli-Jobu mulanda wangu, mutolelele abasune bali musanu ababili abagutu bali musanu ababili; amulipaizizye anzizyo cipaizyo euumpwe, elyo Jobu mulanda wangu uyocmupailila; akaambo kanguwe nsikamunyonyooni mbuli mbokweelede kutaloma kwanu; nkaambo teemwakaamba ciluzi andime mbuli mbwaakaamba Jobu mulanda wangu.
Aboobo Elifazi waku-Tema, a-Bilidadi waku-Suwa, a-Zofari waku-Naama bakeenda akucita mbubonya mbwaakabaambila Jehova. Jehova wakatambula mupailo wa-Jobu.
Alimwi Jobu naakapailila bazwalani bakwe, Jehova wakasandula zyoolwe zyakwe; Jehova wakapa tobile kuli-Jobu kwiinda nzyaakajisi kusaanguna.

Elyo bakeza kulinguwe banabakwabo, abacizi bakwe abazwalani bakwe bakaindi; bakaiya antoomwe alakwe muŋanda yakwe, bakamulwazya akumuumuzya akaambo kamapenzi Jehova ngaakamuletela; boonse umwi aumwi bakamupa idi anwenwe yangolida.

Mbubonya Leza mbwaakalongezya mamanino aabuumi bwa-Jobu kwiinda matalikilo; wakalijisi zyuulu zili kumi azyuulu zyone zyambelele, azyuulu zyosanwe acimwi zyankamele, azyuulu zyobile zyabasune, acuulu cambongolo-nzyazi.
Wakalijisi bana balombe bali musanu ababili abana basimbi botatwe.
Wakaulika mupati izina kuti, ngu-Jemima, awabili Keziya, awatatu Kerenihapuki.
Munyika yoonse teekwakajanwa basimbi beebeka mbuli bana ba-Jobu; wisi wakabapa kuti bakone lukono lwakwe mbuli banabakwabo.
Munsi lyakooku, Jobu waka pona myaka iili mwaanda amyaka iili makumi one; wakabona bana bakwe abana babo kusikila kumazyalani one.
Elyo Jobu wakafwa, kacembeede, kaponede buumi bulamfu.
Uutiimikani munzila yabasizibi,
Uutakali mubukalo bwabasampauzi,
Pele ulakondelelwa Mulao wa-Jehova,
Amulao wakwe ulauyeeya lyoonse masiku asikati,
twamaanzi,
Uuzyala micelo yawo kuciindi ceelede,
Uujisi matu aatayumi;
Zyoonse nzyacita ziyooba acoolwe.
Pele basizibi tabali obo pe.
Bali mbuli buungu bupupuluka amuuwo,
Nkaambo kako basizibi tabakooyooima ciindi calubeta,
Abasimucitazibi tabakooyooima mumbungano yabaluleme,
Pele inzila yabasizibi iyooloba.
Bantu bayeeyelanzi zyabuyo?
Abalo beendelezi balalayana,
Kukulwisya Jehova amunanike wakwe.
Tusowe inkole zyabo kuzwa kulindiswe.
Mwami ulabawela,
Lino ulabaambila cabukali,
Ulabapenzya mulunyemo lwakwe.
Waamba kuti, Ndime ndakazika mwami wangu
Acilundu cisalala ca-Zioni.
Jehova wandaambila kuti, Nduwe mwanaangu,
Ndime ndakuzyala mubuzuba obuno.
Amagolelo aanyika ukaavube.
Uyoobapwaya mbuli zibumbwa zyamubumbi.
Lino amucenjele, nubami.
Amuswiilile, nubabetesi baansi.
Amukombe Jehova cakuyoowa,
Akusekelela cakukankama.
Kuti mutanyonyooki munzila,
Nkaambo bukali bwakwe bulafwamba kubuka.
Bali acoolwe boonse bamusyoma.
Mbanji-banji bandibusizya inkondo!
Takonzyi kujana lufutuko muli-Leza.
Sela.
Nduwe bulemu bwangu asikusumpula mutwe wangu.
Ndakakwiilila Jehova ajwi lyangu,
Elyo wakandivuwa kuzwa kucilundu cakwe cisalala.
Ndakabuka, nkaambo Jehova nguundilela.
Nsikonzyi kuyoowa zyuulu zyuulu zyabantu
Balibambide kukundilwisya kumabazu oonse.
Buka, O Jehova; kondifutula, O Leza wangu;
Nkaambo nduwe uuma basinkondoma boonse mumaseya,
Alimwi watyola meno aabasizibi.
Coolwe cako nkucili kubantu bako.
Kondivwiila nendila, O Leza wabululami bwangu,
Nduwe wandaatulula nendali mumapenzi.
Kondifwida luzyalo akuswiilila cikombyo cangu.
Nywebo nubantu, bulemu bwangu bulaleka lili kusampaulwa?
Mulaleka lili kuyandisya zyabuyo akulangaula bubeji?
Sela.
Jehova ulaswiilila nemukwiilila.
Amwaambile myoyo yanu amala aanu, akuumuna.
Sela.
Musyome muli-Jehova.
Kotulanzya busyu bwako, O Jehova, utumunikile.
Wanditangazya mumoyo wangu
Kwiinda bamwi bavuzizigwa maila awaini,
Nkaambo nduwe olike, O Jehova, ondikazika kabotu.
Koteya kutwi kumajwi aangu, O Jehova.
Swiilila intongelo zyangu.
Teelela ijwi lyakulila kwangu, O mwami wangu, Leza wangu,
Nkaambo ndakomba nduwe.
Cifumo ndakubambila cipaizyo, ndakulindila,
Zibi tazikonzyi kukala kulinduwe.
Ulasula boonse basikucita zibi.
Ulanyonyoona basibubeji;
Basibulowa abasilweeno Jehova ulabasesemwa,
Ndakotamina intempele yako iisalala cakuyoowa.
Kondeenzya mubululami bwako, O Jehova, nkaambo kabasinkondoma;
Ndilulamikila inzila yako kubusyu bwangu.
Mukati kabo muli lunyonyooko;
Meneno lyabo nkabanda kakwazeme;
Balaupaika andimi zyabo.
Kobapa mulandu, O Leza,
Bawe kumakanze aabo beni.
Kobatanda nkaambo kakuvula kwazibi zyabo,
Nkaambo bapapila nduwe.
Baimbe cakukondwa mazuba oonse.
Kobavuna, kuti boonse bayandisya izina lyako bakutembaule.
Nkaambo nduwe olongezya balulami, O Jehova.
Ulabatabilila aluse lwako mbuli intobo.
Utanduumi cakunyema.
Kondiponya, O Jehova, nkaambo zifuwa zyangu zyakankama.
Ino webo, O Jehova, ulandigwasya lili?
Boola, O Jehova, kuzoovuna buumi bwangu,
Kondifutula nkaambo kaluzyalo lwako.
Mubusangu nguni uukonzya kukulumba?
Ndakataala kukutongela kwangu,
Masiku oonse ndalopya bulo bwangu misozi,
Cilyolwedo ndacitesya akulila kwangu,
Meso aangu aubila kumapenzi,
Acembaala nkaambo kabasinkondoma banji,
Nkaambo Jehova waswiilila ijwi lyakulila kwangu.
Jehova ulatambula cikombyo cangu.
Basinkondoma boonse bayoofwa bweeme akupenga loko.
Bayoofwambaana kupilukila musule akufwa bweeme.
O Jehova Leza wangu, mulinduwe monjubide.
Kondifutula kuli boonse banditobela, undivune,
Akundidelaula butendutendu, lino taakwe sikundivuna.
Na muli bubi mumaanza aangu,
Nanka kusaala sinkondoma atakwe kaambo,
Sinkondoma anditobele akundeenzya,
Alyataule buumi bwangu ansi,
Akuwaala bulemu bwangu mulusuko.
Sela.
Kotamukila lutuzi lwabaabo bandipenzya.
Buka, undigwasye, nkaambo ulibikide lubeta.
Bunganya bamasi kubusyu bwako,
Akukala acuuno cako cisumpukide.
Jehova ulabeteka bamasi.
Kondibeteka, O Jehova, mbubonya mbuli bululami bwangu
Akululama kujanika mulindime.
Pele baluleme kobaimikizya nji,
Webo oolingula miyeeyo yamyoyo,
Webo O Leza uululeme.
Intobo yangu ngu-Leza,
Ngonguwe uufutula baluleme mumyoyo.
Leza ngumubetesi uululeme,
Ngu-Leza uukalala mazuba oonse.
Na muntu wakaka kupiluka,
Leza ulanona ipanga lyakwe,
Wabamba buta bwakwe akubululamika.
Walibambila zibelesyo zyakujazya,
Amivwi yakwe ili mbuli mulilo.
Ncobeni sizibi ulaminta bubi,
Ulatumbuka zibi,
Ulazyala zyakubeja.
Elyo ulawida mumonya mudindi ndyaakalicitila,
Kupilingana kwakwe kulawida akatwikilo kakwe,
Ndalumba Jehova mbukweelede kululama kwakwe,
Akutembaula izina lya-Leza Mupati kampatila.
O Jehova Mwami wesu,
Izina lyako lilatembaulika munyika yoonse!
Uwe uli abulemu buyandeele kujulu.
Nkaambo kabasinkondonyoko,
Kuti ulesye sinkondonyoko asikuliyankoto.
Mwezi anyenyeezi nzowakalenga!
Amwana amuntu ncinzi, nomuswaya?
Nekubaboobo wamupa bupati bwasi elane abwa-Leza,
Wamusamika munsini wabulemu awabwami.
Azintu zyoonse wazibika kunsi lyamaulu aakwe:
Imbelele aŋombe zyoonse,
Abanyama bamusokwe;
Bayuni bakujulu, answi zyamulwizi,
Azyoonse zyeendeenda mukati kalwizi,
O Jehova Mwami wesu,
Izina lyako lilatembaulika munyika yoonse!
Njoolumba Jehova amoyo wangu woonse,
Njooluula malele aako oonse.
Njookondwa akusekelela mulinduwe,
Njootembaula izina lyako, O Mupati kampatila.
Basinkondoma nibakapiluka musule,
Bakalebwa, banyonyooka, kubusyu bwako.
Nkaambo wandikosweda makani aangu mbuli bweelede,
Wakala acuuno cako, wabeteka cakululama.
Waziminganya izina lyabo lyoonse alyoonse.
Basinkondoma bamaninina, banyonyooka cakutabonwa;
Minzi yabo waizyula;
Ciibalusyo cayo calobelela,
Wakazika cuuno cakwe kuti abeteke:
Ulabeteka luwa cakululama,
Ulakosweda bantu makani calusinizyo.
Jehova ngemayubilo aabapenzegwa,
Mayubilo kuziindi zyamapenzi.
Nkaambo webo, O Jehova, tobalekelezyi abo bakuyandaula,
Amutembaule Jehova uukala mu-Ziyoni,
Amuluule milimo yakwe akati kabamasi.
Nkaambo oyo uubeteka basikutila bulowa ulabayeeya.
Talubi kulila kwabapengede.
Kondifwida luzyalo, O Jehova;
Bona mbundapenga kulibaabo bandisulide,
Webo nondisumpula kuzwa kumilyango yalufu;
Akukondwa mulufutuko lwako
Mumilyango yamunzi wa-Zioni.
Bamasi bawida mucilindi ncibakasya,
Amukakole nkebakateya maulu aabo beni ajatwa.
Wateya sizibi mumilimo yamaanza aakwe mwini. Higaioni.
Sela.
Abamasi oonse baluba Leza,
Bulangizi bwabapengede tabukooyoofwidilila pe.
Buka, O Jehova, bantu batazundi,
Bamasi babetekwe kubusyu bwako.
Buyoofu abubajate, O Jehova;
Bamasi bazibe kuti mbantu buyo.
Ulaiminanzi kule, O Jehova?
Ulayubilanzi kuziindi zyamapenzi?
Bajatwe mumakanze aabo beni.
Nkaambo sizibi ulalikankaizya zisusi zyamoyo wakwe,
Sikulikumbuzya wasowa Jehova, wamusampaula.
Miyeeyo yakwe yoonse njakuti, Taakwe Leza.
Inzila zyakwe zili acoolwe ciindi coonse;
Imbeta zyako zili kule kujulu kumeso aakwe;
Basinkondonyina boonse ulabawela buyo.
Ulaamba mumoyo wakwe kuti, Nsikooyoosunzululwa,
Nsikooyoowida mumapenzi mumazyalani oonse.
Kunsi kululimi lwakwe kuli lutuzi abubi.
Ulakala cakulisisa muminzi,
Mumayubilo ulajaya batakwe milandu.
Meso aakwe alalanga bacete kumbali.
Ulalisisa mumayubilo mbuli mulavu musokwe,
Ulalisisa kuti ajate bacete.
Ulabajata bacete, ulabakwela.
Sisimbalwe ulakwamaunwa, ulawida ansi,
Ulawisigwa kulibasinguzu,
Ulaamba mumoyo wakwe kuti, Leza waluba,
Wasisa busyu bwakwe, takooyoobona limbi.
Buka, O Jehova; sumpula ijanza lyako, O Leza;
Utalubi bapengede.
Mubi ulasampaulilanzi Leza?
Aambilenzi mumoyo wakwe kuti, Tolinguli makani?
Pele uwe ulabona, ulalanga bubi akupenzya,
Kuti ubweze makani mumaanza aako.
Sisimbalwe ulalileta kulinduwe,
Webo oogwasya bamucaala.
Tyola maboko aababi abasizibi.
Yandaula bubi bwakwe kuti butabonwi limbi.
Jehova ngumwami walyoonse alyoonse,
Bamasi bayoonyonyooka mucisi cakwe,
Wamvwa kuyanda kwababombemyoyo, O Jehova.
Ulakazika moyo wabo, ulacenjeka kutwi kwako.
Kuti ubeteke mucaala ayooyo uuondongwa,
Kuti muntu waansi atajazyi limbi bukandu.
Muli-Jehova monjubide.
Ino mulandaambilanzi kuti,
Cijila kuzilundu mbuli muyuni?
Nkaambo amubone! Basizibi baloongomeka buta,
Bapatika mivwi yabo mutukole,
Kuti bafusile balulememyoyo mumudima.
Misemo yacisi yanyonyoonwa,
Muntu uululeme acitenzi?
Cuuno ca-Jehova cili kujulu,
Meso aakwe alabonesya,
Zikoye zyakwe zilalingula bana babantu.
Moyo wakwe ulisulide basikufumpa,
Ulawisizya ba sizibi makala aamulilo asulufa;
Muuwo uupisya ncecaabilo cabo.
Nkaambo Jehova uliluleme, ulayandisya milimo iiluleme;
Balulami mbebayoobona busyu bwakwe.
Busyomesi tabuciboneki akati kabantu.
Balaamba cakubeja umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina,
Balaamba amilomo myuubauba amyoyo yobile.
Jehova akosole milomo myuubauba,
Alulimi lwamba majwi aakulisumpula.
Akosole abo baamba kuti, Kundimi zyesu tulazunda;
Milomo yesu njiyesu; ngwani mwami kulindiswe?
Ndabuka lino, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ndabakazikizya mulufutuko ndobasukeme.
Mbuli insiliva iisaama munsaka, lisalazigwa ziindi zili musanu azibili.
Kotutabilila, webo, O Jehova,
Kotuvuna lyoonse kubantu aba basunu.
Basizibi baleendeenda koonse koonse,
Bubi nibulemekwa akati kabantu.
Ulaleka lili kundisisila busyu bwako?
Ndaleka lili kumvwa macise mumoyo wangu,
Akuba abuusu mukaango kangu buzuba boonse?
Sinkondoma ulaleka lili kulisumpwida ndime?
Bonya meso aangu, kuti ntaoni mulufu.
Sinkondoma ataambi kuti, Ndamuzunda.
Basikundipenzya batakondwi kumafwabi aangu.
Moyo wangu uyookondwa mulufutuko lwako.
Ndaimbila Jehova,
Nkaambo wandibamba kabotu loko.
Taakwe Leza.
Balibolede; milimo yabo ilasesemya.
Taakwe uucita kabotu pe,
Kujulu Jehova walanga bantu baansi,
Abone na nkwali uucita cabusongo,
Uuyandaula Leza.
Boonse buyo bapambuka, babija;
Taakwe uucita kabotu pe, naba omwe.
Sa boonse basizibi babula luzibo?
Balalya bantu bangu mbuli insima,
Pele Leza tabamukombeleli pe,
Kuciindi eco bayooyoowa kuyoowa kupati,
Nkaambo Leza uli muzyalani lyabaluleme.
G
Mulapilinganya makanze aabapengede,
Pele Jehova ngemacijilo aabo.
Nicakabota lufutuko lwa-Israyeli nilwakazwa mu-Zioni!
Jehova naazooboozezya bantu bakwe coolwe,
Jakobo uzookondwa, a-Israyeli uzootangala.
Ngwani uukonzya kukala mucilundu cako cisalala?
Uuamba lusinizyo mumoyo wakwe,
Uutalengeleli alulimi lwakwe,
Uutabisizyi mweenzinyina
Nikuba kubusya lusampaulo kulisikamukowanyina.
Pele ulalemeka abo bayoowa Jehova.
Tatamauki, nekuba kuti wakonkezya cakulibisizya.
Alimwi talyi makulo aabatakwe milandu.
Uucita obo takooyooleka kukala kabotu.
Ndaambila Jehova kuti, Nduwe Mwami wangu,
Nsikwe coolwe cita mulinduwe olike.
Basalazi banyika, bantu bako balemu,
Mbembabo mbenkondelwa.
Balivuzizya mapenzi basala Leza umbi.
Zipaizyo zyabo zyabulowa nsikooyoozipaizya pe,
Amazina aabo taakooyooambwa kumilomo yangu.
Jehova ncecaabilo cangu calukono ankomeki yangu;
Nduwe oobamba zyabuumi bwangu zyoonse.
Zyeelesyo zyandeelekela kabotu;
Lukono lwangu lwakonda loko.
Ndalumba Jehova uundilaya;
Akati kamasiku moyo wangu ulandiiyisya,
Uli kululyo lwangu kuti entazunganizigwa.
Aboobo moyo wangu wasekelela, muuya wangu wakondwa;
Awalo mubili wangu unookede alulangililo.
Tokooyooaba Uusalala wako kuti abone kubola.
Kubusyu bwako kulizwide bukondwi;
Kujanza lyako lyalulyo kulabotezya lyoonse.
O Jehova, teelela bululami, swiilila kulila kwangu.
Umvwe cikombyo cangu citazwi mumilomo yalweeno.
Makani aangu abetekwe kulinduwe;
Meso aako abone bululami.
Na wandisunka, tojene cintu pe.
Mulomo wangu taubisyi.
Ndalikasya kunzila yabantu bapilingene.
Intaamo zyangu zyatobela loko mikondo yako,
Maulu aangu taana kuleya.
Ndakwiilila nduwe, nkaambo ulandityaba, O Leza.
Koteya kutwi kwako, umvwe majwi aangu.
Vuzya luzyalo lwako, nofutula bakusyoma,
Akubavuna kuli basinkondonyina kujanza lyako lyalulyo.
Kondisisa mucenzule camababa aako,
Kondivuna kulibasizibi bandimwaya,
Basinkondoma bandizyunguluka.
Bayumya myoyo yabo cakutafwa luzyalo,
Baamba cakulisumpula amilomo yabo.
Balitudunamide kuti batuwisye ansi.
Bali mbuli mulavu uuyandisya kukwamauna,
Ambuli kana kabutambo kakala musinkide.
Buka, O Jehova,
Umwanze akumuzunda,
Ipanga lyako lindivune kulibasizibi.
Ijanza lyako lindivune kubantu, O Jehova,
Kubantu baansi bali acaabilo cabuumi obuno,
Mbozuzya mada aabo kuziyandisi zyako,
Balivuzizya bana,
Akusiila lunyungu lwabo imbono.
Njookuta nembuka acikozyano cako.
Ndakuyandisya, O Jehova, inguzu zyangu,
Ngu-Leza wangu, indomba yangu, ngunsyoma.
Nintobo yangu, nduja lwalufutuko lwangu, ngumwaako wangu wakujulu.
Elyo njoofutulwa kulibasinkondoma.
Akwalo kupaya kwalunyonyooko kwakandiyoosya,
Tukole twabusangu twakandizambaila,
Atukole twalufu twakandijata.
Lino mukupenga kwangu ndakali koongolola Jehova,
Ndakali kukwiilila Leza wangu,
Elyo wakaswiilila ijwi lyangu muntempele yakwe,
Akoonzomoka kwangu kwakanjila mumatwi aakwe,
Intalisyo zyazilundu zyakakankama,
Zyakatenkana nkaambo kabukali bwakwe,
Mumpemu zyakwe mwakasuka busi,
Amukanwa lyakwe mwakalya mulilo.
Makala akadukulwa kulinguwo.
Akunsi lyazituta zyakwe kwakasia mbi.
Wakafuuma amababa aaluuwo.
Ampumba yamaanzi amayoba malemu.
Kukumwekamweka kwabusyu bwakwe
Kwakazwa mayoba acivulamabwe amakala aamulilo.
Sikujulu wakalizya ijwi lyakwe,
Acivulamabwe amakala aamulilo.
Wakatuma lulabo akubapyopyonganya,
Elyo kutako lyalwizi kwakaboneka,
Antalisyo zyanyika zyakayubununwa,
Nkaambo kakutapatila kwako, O Jehova,
Akuyooya kwampemu zyako.
Wandigwisya mumaanzi manji.
Wakandivuna kulisinkondon-a singuzu,
Akulibaabo bandisulide, nkaambo bandiinda inguzu.
Bakandikataazya mubuzuba bwamapenzi aangu,
Pele Jehova nguwakandigwasya.
Wakandivuna nkaambo kakundiyandisya.
Akundiboozezya mbwaasalala maanza aangu,
Nkaambo ndajatisya inzila zya-Jehova,
Nsina kubisizya Leza wangu,
Imbeta zyakwe zyoonse kazili kubusyu bwangu,
Nsina kusowa milazyo yakwe,
Ndakaliluleme kumeso aakwe,
Ndalikasya kuzibi zyangu.
Mbuli kusalala kwamaanza aangu kumeso aakwe.
Kumuntu uululeme ulalibonya mbuli mululami.
Pele kumuntu uupilingene ulacita cakusendama.
Pele basikulisumpula ulabafwiinsya.
Jehova Leza wangu nguumunika mudima wangu,
Kulugwasyo lwako udakonzya kulwisya impi.
Kulugwasyo lwa-Leza wangu ndakonzya kusotoka bulambo,
Ijwi lya-Jehova lilasalala. Nintobo kuliboonse bamusyoma.
Ncobeni taakwe mwaala mbuli Leza wesu,
Ngu-Leza uundaangaanga inguzu,
Nguulondola inzila yangu,
Ulandiimika amasena aakujulu,

Uli acoolwe kufumbwa muntu uuyubila mulinguwe.
