Bana babalavu balabula zilyo, balafwa inzala,
Pele abo bayandaula Jehova tababuli cintu cibotu neciba comwe,
Amuboole, nobana, mundiswiilile,
Mwiiye kulemeka Jehova mbukubede.
Uuyanda koongola, kuti abone bubotu?
Amilomo yako kulweeno.
Leka bubi, ucite bubotu.
Yandaula luumuno akulutobela.
Amatwi aakwe alaswiilila kukwiila kwabo.
Kuti amanisye impuwo yabo ansi,
Balakwiila, lino Jehova ulamvwa,
Ulabavuna kumapenzi aabo oonse.
Jehova uli afwaafwi kubawizukide mumoyo,
Ulafutula batete myuuya.
Mapenzi aamululami manji loko,
Pele Jehova ulamuvuna kuli oonse buyo.
Taakwe neciba comwe cityoka.
Abaabo basulide baluleme bayoopegwa mulandu.
Boonse bayuba mulinguwe tabakooyoopegwa mulandu.
O Jehova, kokazyanya abaabo bandikazyanya,
Kolwisya abo bandilwisya.
Jata intobo acikwabilizyo,
Akubuka kuzoondigwasya.
Somona isumo, ubasinkile banditanda.
Ambila moyo wangu kuti,
Ndime lufutuko lwako.
Bausigwe insoni abweeme bayandaula buumi bwangu.
Bafutatike akuzundwa bayeeya kundibisizya.
Babe mbuli buungu bupepululwa amuuwo.
Angelo wa-Jehova abamwaisye.
Inzila yabo ibe yamudima abutezi,
Angelo wa-Jehova abatande.
Nkaambo banditeya akakole atakwe kaambo,
Bandisida cilindi atakwe kaambo.
Kakole nkebakanditeya kabajate,
Acilindi ncibakasya, bawide mumo beni.
Akusekelela lufutuko lwakwe,
o Jehova, ngwani uuli mbuli nduwe,
Novuna uupengede kuliyooyo uumwiinda inguzu,
Amucete uupengede kuliyooyo uumusula.
Kwabuka bakamboni basikubeja,
Bandibuzya makani ngentezi.
Bandipa bubi mucibaka cabubotu,
Nkabela moyo wangu wazundwa.
Pele, mebo, kuciindi cakuciswa kwabo,
Ndakalisamide zisani zyamasaka,
Ndakaliimya kulya,
Akubakombela cakukotamika mutwe akaango.
Ndakali mbuli muntu uulila mweenzinyina na munyina,
Ndakalikoteme mbuli uulila banyina.
Pele balo, mubuwe bwangu, bakasekelela,
Bakabungana kukundilwisya.
Basampukide mbentezi
Bakali kundilengelela kaambo cakutaleka.
Kusampaula bakali kundisampaula,
Bakali kundilumina ntwino,
Mwami, ukaleke lili kulanga buyo?
Vuna buumi bwangu kulunyonyooko lwabo,
Vuna buntu bwangu kubalavu.
Lino njookulumba mumbungano impati,
Njookutembaula akati kabantu banji.
Bandisulide atakwe kaambo batandifwinyini liso.
Nkaambo tabaambi caluumuno pe,
Balakanza makani aalweeno aakubisizya batontozi banyika.
Bakaasama amulomo akundisampaula,
Bati, Ehe! Ehe! Tulibwene mapenzi aakwe.
o Mwami wangu, utanditantamuki.
Nyampuka, ulibusye kukundibetekela!
Kosola makani aangu, Leza wangu, Mwami wangu.
Kuti batandisekeleli.
Bataambi mumyoyo yabo kuti, Ehe! Mbutuyanda!
Bataambi kuti, Twamumanisya!
Bausigwe insoni abweeme balibotezya mumapenzi aangu!
Basamikwe insoni amasampu balisumpwida ndime.
Bakondwe akusekelela babotelwa kubululami bwangu.
Baambe lyoonse kuti, Jehova atembaulwe,
Uuyandisya coolwe camulanda wakwe!
Lino lulimi lwangu lunooamba bululami bwako,
Lunookutembaula buzuba boonse.
Kuyoowa Leza takuboneki kumeso aakwe.
Nkaambo ulayeeya cakuupayika
Kuti milandu yakwe iisulika tiikonzyi kuyubununwa.
Waleka kumvwisya kucita kabotu.
Ulalyeenzya munzila iitali imbotu,
Tasesemwi bubi.
Alusyomo lwako kumayoba.
Imbeta zyako zili mbuli ibbonze lyalwizi.
Bantu abanyama, ulabavuna boonse buyo.
Bana ba-Adamu balayuba muceenzule camababa aako.
Uyoobanywisya kumulonga wazibotezyo zyako.
Mukumweka kwako motubona mumuni,
Abululami bwako kubalulememyoyo.
Mweendo wasikamikami utandilyati,
Amaanza aabasizibi atandituntulisyi,
Mbaabo basizibi baliwide,
Mbatonte, tabakonzyi kubuka.
Utalipenzyi nkaambo kabasizibi,
Utafwi ibbivwe nkaambo kabasimilimo mibi,
Nkaambo balafwambaana kupusama mbuli bwizu,
Balanyana mbuli mweemvwe wamusokwe.
Syoma Jehova akucita kabotu,
Aboobo ulakala munyika akweembelwa kabotu.
Nkabela uyookupa moyo wako nzyuuyanda.
Komusyoma, nkabela uyoocita.
Akoololoka kwako mbuli isikati.
Ulitontozye kuli-Jehova, Komulindila.
Utalipenzyi nkaambo kayooyo uujene coolwe,
Uucita milimo mibi njaakanza.
Utalipenzyi, nkaambo kulaleta bubi buyo.
Nkaambo ba sizibi balanyonyooka,
Pele balangila Jehova mbombabo bayookona nyika.
Kaba kaindi kaniini sizibi takooyooba wo;
Unooyeeya nkwaakabede, pele takooyooba nkuko.
Bayookondwa muluumuno lunji.
Sizibi ulayeeya kubisizya mululami,
Ulamulumina ntwino.
Nkaambo ulabona kuti buzuba bwakwe bulasika,
Basizibi basomona ipanga, babamba buta,
Kuti bawisye bacete abapengede,
Akujaya beenda cakululama.
Pele ipanga lyabo liyoonjila mumyoyo yabo beni,
Amata aabo ayootyoka.
Kwiinda buvubi bwabasizibi banji,
Nkaambo maboko aabasizibi ayootyolaulwa,
Pele Jehova ulatabilila baluleme.
Lukono lwabo luyooba lwalyoonse.
Akuciindi canzala bayookuta,
Pele ba sizibi bayoonyonyooka,
Abasinkondonyina Jehova bayooba mbuli bubotu bwamweemvwe,
Bayoomaninina, bayoosyukuta kuba busi.
Sizibi ulakweleta pele tapilusyi,
Anukuti uululeme ngusiluzyalo, ulapa.
Pele abo mbasinganya bayoonyonyooka.
Ulatabilila oyo uuenda munzila iimubotezya.
Nkaambo Jehova ulamujatilila kujanza lyakwe.
Ndakali mulombe, sunu ndakomena,
Pele nsina bona uululeme uusiidwe,
Nanka lunyungu lwakwe lukumbila insima.
Lyoonse ngusiluzyalo, ulaaba,
Alunyungu lwakwe luli acoolwe.
Leka bubi, ucite kabotu,
Kuti ukalilile lyoonse.
Tasii basalali bakwe.
Baluleme bayoobambwa lyoonse,
Pele bana babasizibi bayoonyonyooka.
Balulami bayookona nyika,
Bayookala alinjiyo lyoonse.
Milomo yamululami ilaamba busongo,
Lulimi lwakwe lulaamba cakululama.
Mulao wa-Leza wakwe uli mumoyo wakwe;
Muntaamu zyakwe tamukwe butezi.
Sizibi uleebela mululami,
Ulayandaula kumujaya.
Takooyoomupesya mulandu kuciindi cakubetekwa.
Lindila kuli-Jehova akubamba inzila yakwe,
Lino ulakusumpula kuti ukone nyika,
Nkabela uyoobona lunyonyooko lwabasizibi.
Ndakabona sizibi uuyoosya,
Ulalisumpula mbuli musamu wakedari waku-Lebano.
Pele nindakainda lwabili, katawo;
Ndakamuyandaula, pele teendakamujana.
Nkaambo muntu siluumuno nguuyoojana coolwe kumamanino.
Pele basizibi bayoonyonyoonwa antoomwe;
Mamanino aababi ndunyonyooko.
Ngonguwe macijilo aabo kuciindi camapenzi.
Ulabavuna kuli ba sizibi, ulabafutula,
Nkaambo balasyoma nguwe.
O Jehova, utanditapatili cabukali,
Utanduumi mulunyemo lwako.
Nkaambo mivwi yako yangangamina mulindime,
Ajanza lyako lyandilemenena.
Tamukwe boololosi mumubili wangu,
Nkaambo kabukali bwako;
Muzifuwa zyangu tamukwe luumuno,
Nkaambo kazibi zyangu,
Nkaambo zibi zyangu zyandibbizya,
Zyandilemena kwiinda mukuli mulemu.
Zilonda zyangu zyanunka, zyabola,
Nkaambo kabufubafuba bwangu,
Ndoongomene, ndalemenwa loko,
Buzuba boonse nja bulila.
Tamukwe boololosi mumubili wangu.
Ndafwa cinywe, ndatyolaulwa;
Ndatongela nkaambo kakupilingana kwamumoyo wangu,
O Mwami, kuyanda kwangu koonse kuli kumeso aako;
Intongelo zyangu tazisiswi kulinduwe,
Moyo wangu uladuntaana, inguzu zyandimanina,
Awalo mumuni wameso aangu wandisia.
Basiluzuboma baliimvwi kule.
Abo bayanda kundijaya banditeya,
Bayanda kundibisizya balaamba aalunyonyooko,
Buzuba boonse balayeeya zyakweena.
Pele mebo ndaba musinkematwi, nsiswiilili;
Ndaba cimuumu uutaasamuni mulomo wakwe.
Ndaba mbuli muntu uutaswiilili,
Amumulomo wakwe tamukwe inkazyanyo.
Nduwe oosi bavwiile, O Mwami Leza wangu.
Nkaambo ndakaamba kuti, Batandisekeleli,
Batalisumpuli alindime na kuulu kwangu kwatezemuka.
Nkaambo ndi afwiifwi kuwizuka,
Mapenzi aangu alindijisi lyoonse,
Ndausa nkaambo kazibi zyangu.
Pele basinkondoma nentakwe kaambo mbasinguzu,
Bandisulide cabuyo mbanji.
Mbobandilwisya, nkaambo ndatobela bubotu.
o Leza wangu, utasweni kule.
o Mwami, lufutuko lwangu.
Kuti ntabisyi amilomo yangu;
Nsinke mulomo wangu acisinsyo,
Basizibi nibacili kubusyu bwangu.
Lino ndakaba cimuumu,
Koonse akububotu ndakaumuna buyo;
Pele aya akabusya buusu bwangu.
Nindakacili kuyeeya, mulilo wakayaka.
Lino ndakaamba alulimi lwangu, ndati,
O Jehova, undizibye mamanino aabuumi bwangu,
Amweelwe wamazuba aangu mbuubede,
Nzibe na ndapona mazuba ongaye,
Myaka yangu njabuyo mumeso aako,
Ncobeni muntu woonse uuimvwi ngwabuyo.
Sela.
Ncobeni bantu boonse baleendeenda mbuli bana bantuulu.
Ncobeni kupakasya kwabo nkwabuyo.
Balalundika imbono, pele tabezi na ngwani uuyoozitola.
Lino Mwami, ncinzi ncencilangila?
Kusyoma kwangu kuli kulinduwe.
Undivune kunsotoko zyangu zyoonse;
Utandibiki kuti mbe uusampaulwa kubafubafuba.
Ndaba cimuumu, nsiasami amulomo wangu,
Nkaambo nduwe wakacicita.
Undigwisizye iŋondo yako,
Nkaambo kuzyuumo zyajanza lyaka ndamaninina.
Notapatila muntu akumuuma nkaambo kazibi zyakwe,
Ulamanya kubota kwakwe mbuli mapempya.
Ncobeni muntu woonse ngwabuyo.
Cenjeka kutwi kukukwiila kwangu;
Utaumuni buyo nowabona misozi yangu:
Nkaambo ndi mweenzu wako buyo,
Ndi simutuntuli, mbubonya mbubakabede bamatata boonse.
Nentana kwiinkila limwi.
Kulindila ndakalindila Jehova,
Lino kacenjekede kutwi, waswiilila kukwiila kwangu.
Wakandigwisya mudindi lyalunyonyooko,
Mumatope aabutinti,
Waimika maulu aangu agala,
Wandisimya kukweenda kwangu.
Wabika lwiimbo lupya mumulomo wangu
Lwakutembauzya Leza wesu.
Lino banji balabona, balayoowa, Balasyoma Jehova.
Uutacebukili kulibasikamikami,
Baya butobela baleza bakubeja.
Nkokuti malele aako amakanze aako kulindiswe;
Taakwe uukonzya kukozyanizigwa ayebo.
Na njanda kuzikanana nanka kuzyaamba,
Nzinji loko, tazibaliki.
Pele wandisinkwida matwi.
Zipaizyo azituuzyo, toziyandi,
Mubbuku livungidwe mulilembedwe ndime, kuti,
Mulao wako uli mumoyo wangu,
Teendakakasya milomo yangu kwaamba,
Mbuli mbozi, O Jehova.
Ndakaluula kusyomeka kwako alufutuko lwako,
Nsina kusisa luzyalo lwako alusinizyo lwako mumbungano impati.
Buuya bwako alusinizyo lwako azindibambe lyoonse.
Milandu yangu yandeenzya, lino ndakacilwa kubona,
Minji loko kwiinda masusu aakumutwe wangu;
Moyo wangu wawizuka.
Zumina kundivuna, O Jehova;
Fwambaana kundigwasya, O Jehova.
Bausigwe bweeme akuzingwa
Bayanda kundinyanzya buumi.
Bafutatulwe akufwisigwa bweeme
Basekelela kupenga kwangu.
Bayoosegwe, cibe impindu yabweeme bwabo
Bandiwelela bati, Ehe! Ehe!
Pele boonse bakuyandaula bakondwe akusekelela mulinduwe,
Boonse bayanda lufutuko lwako baambe lyoonse kuti,
Jehova alemekwe!
Pele Mwami ulandiyeeya.
Nduwe mugwasyi wangu, muvuni wangu,
Utamuki, O Leza wangu.
Jehova ulamuvuna mubuzuba bwamapenzi.
Jehova ulamubamba akumuponya,
Ulalongezegwa ansi.
Tomwaabi mumaanza aabasinkondonyina.
Jehova ulamutabilila naaciswa abulo;
Mukuciswa kwakwe ulaponya malwazi aakwe oonse.
Undiponye, nkaambo ndakakubisizya.
Basinkondoma balandaamba cabubi, bati,
Ino ulafwa lili, izina lyakwe lifwidilile?
Moyo wakwe ulalibwezela luciso;
Azwida anze unooya bukankama.
Boonse bandisulide balavwiya-vwiya,
Balandiyeeyela bubi,
Bati, Cintu cibi camukakatila;
Awa mpalede takooyoobuka limbi.
lwakali kulya insima yangu,
Wandibbompa akasindi kakwe.
Pele webo, O Jehova, undifwide luzyalo;
Undibusye kuti mbaliile inkoto.
Mbuboobu mbundaziba kuti ulandiyanda:
Sinkondoma mbwatandizunda.
Ulindiimikide kumeso aako lyoonse.
Kuzwa kumatalikilo akusikila kutamani,
Akube boobo! Akube boobo!
Mbuli insya mbwiifwekembela tulonga twamaanzi,
Moyo wangu ulafwekembela nduwe, O Leza,
Mboole lili kuzooboneka kubusyu bwa-Leza?
Zilyo zyangu misozi isikati amasiku,
Nibaya bundaambila kuti, Ino Leza wako uli kuli?
Mbundakali kuya amakamu akubazulwida kuŋanda ya-Leza,
Kuya bukondwa akutembaula, makamu aabantu bapobwede.
Utongelanzi mukati kangu?
Syoma Leza, nkaambo ndicinoomutembaula,
Nkaambo kalufutuko lwabusyu bwakwe, Leza wangu.
Moyo wangu walemenwa mukati kangu,
Aboobo ndakwiibaluka munyika eyi ya-Jordano,
Aya-Herimoni ayacilundu ca-Mizara,
Mayuwe aako amankwisila aako oonse andibbizya,
Alwiimbo lwakwe nkoluli kulindime masiku,
Ndakomba Leza wabuumi bwangu,
Ndaambila Leza indomba lyangu kuti,
Ino wandilubilanzi?
Nkaambonzi nenja bulila nkaambo kakupenzya kwabasinkondoma?
Zifuwa zyangu zyapwayaulwa kukusampaula kwabasinkondoma
Nibandaambila kuti, Ino Leza wako uli kuli?
Walemenanzi, O moyo wangu?
Utongelanzi mukati kangu?
Syoma Leza, nkaambo ndicinoomutembaula,
Nkaambo kalufutuko lwabusyu bwakwe, Leza wangu,
Undivune kulibasizibi basilweeno.
Nkaambonzi nenja bulila nkaambo kakupenzya kwabasinkondoma?
Zindeenzye akundisisya kucilundu cako cisalala akucikalilo cako,
Kuti njile kucipaililo ca-Leza,
Kuli-Leza ngumbotelwa akukondwa;
Lino njookutembaula akantimbwa, O Leza, Leza wangu.
Utongelanzi mukati kangu?
Syoma Leza, nkaambo ndicinoomutembaula,
Nkaambo kalufutuko lwabusyu bwakwe, Leza wangu.
O Leza, twakamvwa amatwi esu,
Bamatateesu bakatulwiida,
Mulimo ngowakacita mumazuba aabo,
Kuciindi cakalekale.
Wakapenzya bamasi, wabamwaya.
Teensi kuboko kwabo kwakabafutula;
Ndijanza lyako lyalulyo, akuboko kwako, amumuni wabusyu bwako, Nkaambo wakakondwa mulimbabo,
Lailila kuti Jakobo azunde.
Muzina lyako tunoolyataula batubusizya inkondo.
Apanga lyangu teensi ndilyo linoondifutula.
Nduwe watufutula kulibasinkondoma,
Wafwisya bweeme batusulide.
Tulalumba izina lyako lyoonse,
Sela.
Pele lino watusowa, watuusya insoni,
Tocisindikili impi zyesu.
Abaabo batusulide balalisaalila.
Watumwaisya akati kabamasi,
Tovubi kumuulo wabo.
Ulacita kuti tusampaulwe kubeenzuma,
Tuwelwe akusekwa kulibaabo mbotubambene abo,
Watuumya cisibo akati kabamasi;
Bantu balatuzunzizya mitwe kuzisi zyoonse,
Buzuba boonse ndalangana ansoni zyangu,
Abweeme bulivumbide busyu bwangu,
Nkaambo kasinkondoma asikuliya inkoto.
Nekubaboobo tatuna kukuluba,
Nanka kubisizya cizuminano cako.
Myoyo yesu tiikufutatide,
Tatupambukide munzila zyako.
Nkaambonzi watuvunisya mudima uusia mbi?
Na kuti nitwakaluba izina lya-Leza wesu,
Nanka kutambika maanza esu kuli-leza umbi,
Nkaambo ulizi makani aasisidwe aamumoyo.
Tulaambwa mbuli imbelele zyakujaya.
Sinsimuka! Woonenanzi, O Mwami?
Buka! Utatusowi lyoonse,
Usisilanzi busyu bwako?
Ulubilanzi kupenzegwa kwesu amafwabi esu?
Moyo wesu wawida mulusuko,
Mibili yesu ilikungubede ansi.
Buka, utugwasye!
Utununune nkaambo kaluzyalo lwako.
Moyo wangu waata makani mabotu.
Ndaambila mwami malembo aangu,
Lulimi lwangu ncilembyo camulembi uufwambaana,
Uleebeka kwiinda bana boonse ba-Adamu;
Bwanga buli kumilomo yako:
Nkaambo kako Leza wakulongezya lyoonse.
Anga ipanga lyako akasolo, O sintaze;
Lisakile bulemu abupati bwako.
Mubulemu bwako koya butantide akuzunda,
Kukugwasya lusinizyo abaluleme bapengede,
Ijanza lyalulyo likwiiyisye milimo iiyoosya.
Mivwi yako yabosya;
Ilayasa mumyoyo yabasinkondonyina mwami.
Bamasi balawidn ansi kunembo iyako;
Kasako kabwami bwako nkasako kabululami.
Nkaambo kako Leza, Leza wako,
Wakunanika mafuta aakukondwa kwiinda beenzinyoko.
Zyakusama zyako zyoonse zilanunka misamu yamuro amaalo akasia;
Kulila kwatuntimbwa kulakubotezya mumaanda aanyanga.
Akati kabanakazi bako balemu nkubali bana babami:
Kujanza lyako lyalulyo kuliimvwi namalelo, ulisamine ingolida yaku-Ofeli,
Luba cisi cako aluzubo lwauso.
Umubombele, nkaambo ngumwami wako.
Lino bantu baku-Turo bayookuletela zipo;
Bavubi banyika bayoolibombya kubusyu bwako.
Zyakusama zyakwe zyasakatizigwa ingolida.
Uyootolwa kumwami ulisamide zyamalengwa.
Abalo banakalindu beenzinyina bayooletwa kulinduwe,
Bayooletwa alutangalo akukondwa;
Bayoonjila muŋanda yamwami.
Uyoobacita kuba bami munyika yoonse,
Nkabela bamasi bayookulumba lyoonse mane kukabe kutamani.
Leza macijilo esu anguzu zyesu, Mugwasyi loko mumapenzi,
Aboobo tatukooyooyoowa, nekuba kuti nyika yasanduka,
Azilundu zyawaalwa mumaanziaalwizi,
Maanzi aalo naavuuma akufufuma ikovu,
Zilundu nezitenkana mukulisumpula kwale.
Sela.
Busena busalalisya bwacikalilo ca-Mupatikampatila,
Leza uyoougwasya kubucedo bwabusiku,
Bamasi bakazwangana, zisi zyakazungana;
Wakaamba ajwi lyakwe, lino nyika yakabomboloka,
Jehova wamakamu tuli awe;
Leza wa-Jakobo mayubilo esu.
Amuze, mubone milimo ya-Jehova mbwiibede,
Malweza ngaacitide ansi.
Ulalesya inkondo mane kusikila kumamanino aanyika,
Uladunsaula mata akutyolaula masumo;
Ulatenta inkalaki mumulilo.
Amuleke, muzibe kuti ndime Leza,
Njoosumpulwa mumasi, njoosumpulwa ansi,
Jehova wamakamu tuli awe;
Leza wa-Jakobo mayubilo esu.
Amukambilile amaanza, nubantu boonse!
Amuyobekele Leza ajwi lyakusekelela.
Ngu-Mwami mupati wanyika yoonse!
Misyobo yoonse kunsi lyamaulu esu,
Nyika iiyandwa ya-Jakobo ngwayandisya.
Sela.
Jehova waya akulila kwamweembo,
Amutembaule Leza, amutembaule!
Amutembaule Mwami wesu, amutembaule!
Amumutembaule alwiimbo lwakulumbaizya.
Leza ngu-Mwami wamasi,
Leza ulikede acuuno cakwe cabwami.
Bami bazisi balabungana antoomwe,
Abantu ba-Leza wa-Abrahamu,
Nkaambo intobo zyoonse zyanyika nzizya-Leza;
Ngumulemu loko loko.
Mumunzi wa-Leza wesu, mucilundu cakwe cisalala.
Mbucibede cilundu ca-Zioni kulubazu lwakunyika,
Munzi wamwami mupati.
Leza walilubulula mumaanda aawo aabwami kuti ngumayubilo.
Bakaita antoomwe,
Pele babone buyo bakayoowa,
Bakagamba, bafwambaana kucija.
Kukankama kwakabajata,
Akuciswa mbuli mutumbu.
Wakatyolaula maato aaku-Tarisi.
Mumunzi wa-Jehova wamakamu,
Mumunzi wa-Leza wesu;
Leza uluukalika cakutamana.
Twaibaluka luzyalo lwako, O Leza,
Mukati kantempele yako.
Mbombubonya kutembaulwa kwako mbukubede,
Kulasika kumagolelo aanyika.
Ijanza lyako lilizwide bululami.
Cilundu ca-Zioni cisekelele;
Bana basimbi ba-Juda bakondwe,
Nkaambo kambeta zyako.
Amweendeende ku-Zioni, amuuzyuunguluke;
Amubale maanda aawo malamfu.
Amubike myoyo yanu kumaanda aawo aalumamba,
Amweendeende mumaanda aawo aabwami,
Kuti mukalwiide izyalani liboola.
Nguuyootweenzya mane kusikila kulufu.
Amuswiilile aya, nyoonse nobamasi;
Amucenjeke matwi aanu, nyoonse nomukede ansi,
Nobaniini anobapati,
Nobavubi anobatengwana nyoonse.
Mulomo wangu ulaamba busongo,
Amiyeeyo yamoyo wangu iyooba abuswini.
Njoopandulula kasimpi kangu mukantimbwa.
Ino njoowenzi mumazuba aabubi,
Luciso lwabasinkondoma nilundizyungulukide,
Abo basyoma buvubi bwabo,
Akulikankaizizya kuvula kwambono zyabo?
Nanka kupa Leza cilubuzyo cabuumi bwakwe,
Aboobo ulacileka lyoonse),
Ataboni kabanda.
Ncobeni ulibwene kuti basongo balafwa,
Bafubafuba abasizizindwe abalo balafwa mbubonya,
Balasiila bambi imbono zyabo,
Tubanda twabo ngemaanda aabo cakutamana,
Makalilo aabo kutola kumazyalani amazyalani,
Nekuba kuti bakaulika mazina aabo kumyuunda yabo.
Muntu naba mulemu takalilili,
Uli mbuli banyama bafwidilila.
Njeeyi inzila yabasikamikami,
Amamanino aabaabo balamwa kucaabilo cabo.
Sela.
Lufu lulabeembela.
Balulami bayooba abwami kulimbabo mubuzuba obo,
Inguzu zyabo ziyoomaninina kubusangu, zitabi limbi acikalilo.
Sela
Utayoowi na muntu uli ambono zinji,
Na bulemu bwaŋanda yakwe buya bukomena,
Nkaambo naazoofwa takoozootola cintu;
Bulemu bwakwe tabukooyoomutobela.
Nekuba kuti walikankaizya mubuumi bwakwe,
Nekuba kuti muntu watembaulwa naajene coolwe,
Uuyooselukila kubusena bwabamawisi,
Bataboni mumuni lyoonse.
Uli mbuli banyama bafwidilila.
Leza, Leza Jehova, waamba.
Waita nyika, kuzwa kubuzwezuba kusikila kumabbililo.
Ku-Zioni, busena butaindwi mububotu,
Leza wamweka.
Leza wesu weza, taumuni,
Mulilo ulasyukutya kunembo lyakwe,
Mumbali lyakwe mulavuuma loko,
Ayalo nyika, kuti abeteke bantu bakwe,
Abo mbetutangene abo cizuminano kukupaizya.
Majulu alaluula bululami bwakwe,
Nkaambo Leza mwini nguubeteka,
Sela.
Amuswiilile nobantu bangu, ŋambe;
Teelela O Israyeli, nkubike kaambo;
Ndime Leza, Leza wako.
Teensi nkaambo kazipaizyo zyako ncendakutapatilila pe.
Zituuzyo zyako zitentwa zili kubusyu bwangu lyoonse.
Naba sijembwe kuzimpati zyako.
Nkaambo banyama boonse bamusokwe mbibangu,
Aŋombe zili kuzilundu zili cuulu.
Ndibezi boonse bayuni bakumalundu,
Azintu zyoonse zyeendeenda musokwe nzizyangu.
Nendakafwa inzala nentakwaambila,
Nkaambo nyika njiyangu azyoonse zili mulinjiyo.
Sa ndalya nyama yabacende?
Sa ndanywa bulowa bwabasijembwe?
Uliye nzowapinga ku-Mupatikampatila,
Nkabela njookuvuna.
Pele sizibi Leza ulamwaambila kuti,
Uli abulemunzi kuya buluula milumbe yangu,
Nanka kwaamba cizuminano cangu amulomo wako?
Ulasowa majwi aangu kusule lyako.
Abasibwamu ulavwelana abo.
Ulalekelela mulomo wako kububi,
Alulimi lwako luleena.
Ulakala akuvwiya munyoko,
Ulalengelela mwana wabanyoko kaambo.
Lino wakali kuyeeya kuti ndili mbuli nduwe,
Pele lino ndakukona,
Ndabamba makani mbwaabede kumeso aako.
Amuyeeye aya makani, nyoonse nomuluba Leza,
Kuti ntamukwamauni nekwabula sikuvuna.
Uupaizya kulumba nguundilemeka,
Ayooyo uubamba inzila yakwe
Njoomubonya lufutuko lwa-Leza.
Muluse lwako lupati ziminganya milandu yangu,
Akundisalazya kuzibi zyangu.
Azibi zyangu zili kumeso aangu lyoonse.
Nduwe olike ngundabisizya,
Ndacita zibi kumeso aako,
Aboobo uliluleme mumajwi ngoamba,
Amuzibi bama mobakandiminta.
Ulayanda busyomeki bwamukati;
Kondizibya busongo mumoyo wangu uusisidwe.
Undisalazye amusamu wahisopo, kuti nsalale;
Undisanzye, nkatube buu kwiinda nyengenge.
Undizuzye lukondo alusekelelo,
Kuti zifuwa nzowapwaya zikondwe.
Sisa busyu bwako kuzibi zyangu;
Ziminganya milandu yangu yoonse,
Ulengulule muuya uululeme mukati kangu.
Utandinyanzyi Muuya wako Uusalala.
Akundipa moyo wabusungu wakundiyumya.
Lino njooiiyisya basinsotoko inzila zyako,
Abasizibi bayoopiluka kulinduwe.
Undivune kumulandu wabujayi, O Leza, Leza walufutuko lwangu,
Lino lulimi lwangu luyooimba cakusekelela bululami bwako,
O Mwami, asamuna mulomo wangu,
Nkabela milomo yangu iyoobusya kutembaulwa kwako.
Nkaambo toyandi cipaizyo; nekwali boobo nendakupa;
Tobotelwi kuzituuzyo zitentwa.
Cipaizyo ncayanda Leza muuya uutyokede;
Moyo uupengede akweempwa tokuusampauli, O Leza,
Citila Zioni bubotu mukukondwa kwako;
Yakulula malambo aa-Jerusalemu.
Zituuzyo azipaizyo zitentwa,
Nkabela bayootuula basune acipaililo cako.
Luzyalo lwa-Leza ndwalyoonse.
Luli mbuli lunyoolo lubosya, lucita lweeno.
Akubeja kwiinda kwaamba cakululama.
Sela.
Ulayanda majwi oonse aakumenenena bantu,
o lulimi lwalweeno.
Ulakujata, ulakukwempa kucilao cako,
Ulakuzyula kunyika yabaumi. Sola,
Bayoomuseka, cakwaamba kuti,
Pele wakasyoma bunji bwabuvubi bwakwe,
Akulipa inguzu mububi bwakwe,
Ndasyoma luzyalo lwa-Leza lyoonse alyoonse.
Njoosyoma izina lyako, nkaambo ndibotu, mumeso aabasalali bako.
Taakwe Leza, Balibolede; bacita bubi busesemya;
Taakwe uucita kabotu pe.
Abone na nkwali uucita cabusongo,
Uuyandaula Leza,
Taakwe uucita kabotu pe, naba omwe.
Balalya bantu bangu mbuli insima,
Pele Leza tabamukombeleli pe,
Bona! Bayoowa abuyoofu butakwe nebwakaliwo!
Nkaambo Leza wamwaya zifuwa zyabaabo ibakalibamba kukulwisya;
Webo wabausya insoni, nkaambo Leza wabasampaula.
Nicakabota lufutuko lwa-Israyeli nilwakazwa ku-Zioni!
Leza naazooboozezya bantu bakwe coolwe,
Jakobo uzookondwa, a-Israyeli uzootangala.
O Leza, undifutule muzina lyako, Akundibeteka munguzu zyako.
O Leza, swiilila cikombyo cangu,
Akucenjeka kutwi kumajwi aamulomo wangu.
Nkaambo bazwakule bandibusizya inkondo,
Bantu bakali balavwima buumi bwangu.
Tababiki Leza kubusyu bwabo.
Sela.
Mwami nguutabilila buumi bwangu,
Kobanyonyoona mukusyomeka kwako.
Njookutuulila cipaizyo camoyo woonse;
Njoolumba izina lyako, O Jehova, nkaambo ndibotu.
Nkaambo wandaangununa kumapenzi oonse;
Meso aangu abona mbunjanda kulibasinkondoma.
Cenjeka kutwi kwako kucikombyo cangu, O Leza;
Utayubi kukukumbila kwangu,
Undiswiilile akundivwiila;
Ndazingwa mumapenzi aangu, ndatongela buyo;
Nkaambo kajwi lyabasinkondoma,
Nkaambo kakupenzegwa kulibasizibi,
Nkaambo balandiyumbila zyabubi,
Amubukali bwabo balandisula.
Buyoofu bwalufu bwandisikila.
Kuyoowa akukankama zilindijisi,
Ndafwa mutempwe.
Ndakati, Necabota nendajisi mababa mbuli inziba,
Nguluke kuya kuyoolyokezya.
Ncobeni nendaya kule,
Nendaya kuyookala munkanda. Sela.
Nendalijanina mayubilo,
Nendacija muuwo uungisya amayoba.
Ubalye, O Mwami; ubapambukanye kundimi zyabo;
Nkaambo ndibwene lutuzi ankondo mumunzi.
Isikati amasiku balazyunguluka amalambo aawo;
Bubi alunyonyongano zili mukati kawo.
Lunyonyooko luli akati kawo;
Luuni alweeno tazimani mumasambalilo aawo.
Nkaambo tali sinkondoma uundisampaula;
Kwaakuli boobo natakwe kaambo,
Teensi oyo uundisulide uulisumpula kundilwisya;
Nekwali boobo, nendamuyuba.
Mweenzuma ngotuzibilene awe.
Katwaambaula kabotu antoomwe,
Katweenda ankamu muŋanda ya-Leza,
Baye mbaumi kubusangu,
Nkaambo zibi muzili mumaanda aabo amukati kabo.
Pele mebo njookwiilila Leza,
Lino Jehova uyoondivuna.
Lino uyooswiilila ijwi lyangu
Kunkondo njendilwisya,
Nkaambo banji bandibusizya inkondo,
Oyo uuliwo lyoonse,
Sela.
Nkaambo tabasanduki, Tabayoowi Leza.
Watambika maanza aakwe kuliyooyo iwakakede aluumuno, Wasampaula cizuminano.
Mulomo wakwe wakalisyuukide mbuli maumba,
Pele mumoyo wakwe kamuli inkondo.
Majwi aakwe akalibombede mbuli mafuta,
Nekubaboobo akali mapanga aasomwedwe.
Pele yebo, O Leza, uyoobawisizya mucilindi calunyonyooko, Basibulowa abasilweeno tabakooyoomana acisela camazuba aabo. Pele mebo njoosyoma nduwe.
Ciindi coonse balandipenzya kukundilwisya.
Nkaambo mbanji bandilwisya cakulisumpula.
Ndasyoma nduwe,
Leza ngunsyoma cakutayoowa.
Ino bantususu bandicitenzi?
Buzuba boonse balavwelenganya majwi aangu,
Miyeeyo yabo yoonse njakundibisizya.
Batobela intaamu zyangu,
Mbubavwima buumi bwangu.
Kobabweedezezya Junyonyooko lwabo;
Tontaika bamasi cabukali, O Leza.
Bika misozi yangu munsazi yako,
Sa tiilembedwe mubbuku lyako?
Mubuzuba bwakukwiilila nduwe.
Ndizi obo, nkaambo Leza uli kulindime.
Leza, ndatembaula ijwi lyakwe;
Jehova, ndatembaula ijwi lyakwe;
Leza ngunsyoma cakutayoowa.
Ino bantususu bandicitenzi?
Ndatuula zyakulumbya.
Amaulu aangu kukudadalika,
Kuti njende kubusyu bwa-Leza Mumumuni wa-Leza.
Nkaambo ndayubila mulinduwe.
Ndayubila muceenzule camababa aako,
Mane lunyonyooko lwiindilile.
Leza uundicitila makanze aakwe.
Abo bandivwima ulabausya bweeme.
Sela.
Leza ulatuma luzyalo lwakwe akusyomeka kwakwe.
Balidilila bana babantu.
Meno aabo masumo amivwi,
Indimi zyabo mapanga aabosya.
Bulemu bwako busumpulwe kwiinda nyika yoonse.
Moyo wangu walenda. Bandisida cilindi,
Pele bawida mukati kaco beni.
Sela.
Moyo wangu ulaanzikidwe.
Njooimba akutembaula.
Amubuke, O kantimbwa anamalwa.
Mebo ndemwini ndafumisya kubuka,
Njookuulumba, O Mwami, akati kabantu;
Njookutembaula akati kabamasi.
Busyomeki bwako bulasika akumayoba.
Lisumpule, O Leza, kwiinda ijulu;
Bulemu bwako busumpulwe kwiinda nyika yoonse.
Sa ncobeni mulaamba bululami, nobasilutwe?
Sa mulabeteka makani kabotu, nobana babantu?
Mulaabila nyika lunyonyongano lwamaanza aanu.
Bazyalwa buyo balabisya, baya bwaamba zyakubeja.
Bali mbuli cipile cimpamya musinkematwi,
Uutaswiilila ijwi lyamunanga,
Uuindauka muziinda zyakwe.
Nonkola ba cibanda babalavu, O Jehova.
Bamaninine mbuli maanzi aafwamba kuyuminina,
Balyataulwa akupusama mbuli bwizu.
Babe mbuli inkumba iienzunuka ninyeenda,
Ambuli kana kasowegwa kataboni izuba.
Nituba tutete nituba tuyaka, ulabatola mbuli kambizi.
Ulasanzya maulu aakwe mubulowa bwabasizibi.
Ncobeni nkwali Leza uubeteka nyika.
Undivune kulibasinkondoma, O Leza wangu,
Unditabilile kulibaabo bandibusizya inkondo.
Undivune kulibasizibi,
Undifutule kulibasimalowa.
Basinguzu babungana kuti bandilwisye.
Tuuli mulandu wangu, naa cibi cangu, O Jehova.
Balazuzaana kundibambila mebo nentakwe kaambo.
Buka, undigwasye, ubone.
Buka, upe bamasi mulandu;
Abaabo bakanza bubi, utabafwidi insoni, naba omwe.
Balaboola kumabbililo aazuba,
Balawuula mbuli babwa,
Balazyunguluka munzi.
Bona! Balatutumuka amulomo wabo;
Mapanga ali mumilomo yabo.
Balati, Ino ngwani uumvwa?
Ulasampaula bamasi boonse.
O Inguzu zyangu, njookutembaula,
Nkaambo Leza niŋanda yangu indamfu.
Leza wangu ulanditabilila aluse lwakwe,
Leza ulandibonya mbunjanda kulibasinkondoma.
Ubamwaye kunguzu zyako, ubafwinsye,
O Mwami intobo yesu.
Nkaambo kazibi zyakumilomo yabo amajwi ngebaamba,
Bacegwe mukulisumpula kwabo.
Nkaambo kamatusi azyakubeja nzebaamba,
Ubanyonyoone cabukali,
Ubanyonyoone kuti batabi limbi,
Kuzibwe kuti Leza nguuendelezya Jakobo,
Kusikila kumamanino aanyika.
Sela.
Balaboola kumabbililo aazuba,
Balawuula mbuli babwa,
Balazyunguluka munzi.
Balazumba kukuyandaula zilyo;
Na babula kukuta, balavuluma.
Pele mebo njooimba aanguzu zyako,
Njootembaula luse lwako kulwiimbo lwacifumo;
Nkaambo wakandibeda iŋanda indamfu,
Amayubilo kubuzuba bwamapenzi aangu.
O Inguzu zyangu, njookutembaula,
Nkaambo nduwe iŋanda yangu indamfu,
O Leza, Leza uundifwida luzyalo.
O Leza, watusowa, watumwaya;
Watukalalila; utuboozye alimwi.
Wakankamya nyika, waiandaula;
Sinka nanz! zya yo, nkaambo ilateketa,
Wabonya bantu bako makataazyo,
Watunywisya zyakunywa zitudadalisya.
Kuti bacije kulinjiyo kuzwa kulibasimata.
Sela.
Utufutule ajanza lyako lyalulyo akutuvwiila,
Ncobeni njookondwa akwaabanya Sekemu,
Njooabila ikuti lya-Sukoti,
Efraimu ningowani yamutwe wangu,
Juda ngumusako wangu wabwami.
Moabu ncisambilo cangu;
Ndawaalila Edomu insangu zyangu;
Ku-Filistiya ndoonzomoka cakuzunda,
Ngwani uuyootuleta kumunzi muyumu?
Ngwani uuyootunjizya mu-Edomu?
Tosindikili impi zyesu, O Leza.
Utugwasye kulibasinkondoma,
Nkaambo lugwasyo lwabantu ndwabuyo.
Nkaambo nguwe uuyoolyataula basinkondoma.
Swiilila kukwiila kwangu, O Leza;
Umvwe cikombyo cangu.
Moyo wangu nuulenda.
Undeenzve, undisisye kundomba idamfu kwiinda ndime.
Iŋanda yangu indamfu yakundivuna kulibasinkondoma.
Ncijile kumayubilo aamababa aako.
Sela
Wandipa lukono lwabaabo balemeka izina lyako.
Ongozya mwami mazuba manji,
Myaka yakwe itole kumazyalani amazyalani.
Umupe luzyalo alusinizyo, zimubambe.
Akucita nzendakakonkezya mazuba oonse.
Moyo wangu ulalitontozya kuli-Leza alike:
Lufutuko lwangu lulazwa kulinguwe,
Walo alike nindomba yangu alufutuko lwangu,
Niŋanda yangu indamfu, nsikonzyi kusunzululwa.
Kuti mumujaye,
Mbuli bulambo buyanda kuwa, mbuli lubaya lutajisi.
Balabotelwa bubeji,
Balalongezya kumulomo,
Anukuti mukati balatukila.
Sela.
Nkaambo mulinguwe muli bulangizi bwangu.
Walo alike nindomba yangu alufutuko lwangu,
Niŋanda yangu indamfu, nsikonzyi kusunzululwa,
Leza nindomba yangu iili anguzu, ngemayubilo aangu.
Amutule myoyo yanu kulinguwe;
Leza ngemayubilo esu,
Sela.
Ncobeni bantu mbabuyo,
Abantu balemu mbabubeji;
Na bapimwa kubulemu, mbaubauba,
Kwiinda moya uuyooyegwa.
Mutalisumpuli muli zyakubba,
Na imbono zyavula, mutabiki myoyo yanu alinzizyo.
Leza wakaamba komwe,
Ndakamuswiilila obo ziindi zyobile;
Kuti inguzu nzizya-Leza.
Nkaambo ulapa muntu bulumbu bweelede milimo yakwe.
Moyo wangu ulakufwida nyota,
Mubili wangu ulikusukeme,
Mbuli nyika yacimpayuma, iikataazya, iibula maanzi.
Kuti mbone inguzu zyako abulemu bwako,
Aboobo milomo yangu ilakutembaula,
Njookutembaula nencili muumi,
Njootambika maanza aangu muzina lyako.
Nkabela milomo yangu ilakutembaula cakukondwa,
Akukuyeeya muziindi zyamasiku.
Amucenzule camababa aako njoosekelela.
Ijanza lyako lyalulyo lilindijisi.
Pele abo bavwima buumi bwangu bayoonyonyooka,
Bayoosika kumagolelo aansi.
Bayooabwa kupanga,
Bayooba cilyo cabamwaaba,
Aboonse bakonkezya kulinguwe bayoolemekwa,
Nkaambo milomo yababeji iyoesinkwa.
Swiilila ijwi lyangu, O Leza, mukukulilila kwangu;
Bamba buumi bwangu kuti ntayoowi basinkondoma.
Akulupyopyongano lwabaabo bacita bubi,
Bafusa majwi aalula mbuli mivwi,
Kuti bafuse baluleme mumayubilo aabo;
Mpawo balafusa cakutayoowa.
Balakakatila kumakanze mabi;
Balaambaula aakuteya kakole;
Balati, Ino ngwani uukonzya kukabona?
Balavwima zibisizya, bati,
Twalondola makani, twavwima loko.
Nkaambo miyeeyo yamoyo wamuntu milamfu.
Pele Leza uyoobafusa mivwi yakwe,
Nkabela uyooboongomokela kubayasa,
Nkabela boonse baba bona bayoocija.
Lino bantu boonse bayooyoowa,
Bayooluula milimo ya-Leza,
Akumvwisya nzyaakacita.
Baololokede myoyo balikankaizye.
Kutembaulwa kuleelede nduwe, O Leza, mu-Zioni;
Azyalo zikonkezegwa ziyoozuzikizigwa kulinduwe.
Bantu boonse bayoosika kulinduwe.
Webo ulaziminganya milandu yesu.
Kuti akale muŋanda yako.
Tulamwe kububotu bwaŋanda yako,
Intempele yako iisalalisya.
Kumilimo iiyoosya ulatuvwiila cabululami,
o Leza walufutuko lwesu.
Nduwe bulangizi bwamagolelo oonse aanyika,
Abaabo bali kule kulwizi.
Nduwe oositikizya malundu kunguzu zyako,
Ulisamide buyumu.
Kuvuuma kwamayuwe aale,
Alupyopyongano lwabamasi,
Balayoowa nkaambo kazitondezyo zyako.
Kubuzwezuba akumabbililo ulabakondezya.
Ulaswaya nyika, uliipa maanzi,
Uliibotya loko.
Mulonga wa-Leza ulizwide maanzi;
Ulabapa zilyo noibamba obo.
Ulatesya minkolola yayo,
Ulabambasika mutuntuulu yayo,
Ulaibombya kuluzwaamina,
Ulaipa coolwe cakusyuusya.
Mikondo yako ilaswenka mafuta.
Mafulo aamusokwe alaswenka,
Azilundu zilalisakatizya inkaba zyalukondo,
Meembelelo alisamide matanga,
Amimpata ilapeka maila.
Zilayobeka akwiimba cakukondezya.
Amuyobekele Leza cakukondwa, nonyika yoonse;
Amutembaule bulemu bwazina lyakwe;
Amumulemeke antembauzyo.
Nkaambo kanguzu zyako zipati basinkondonyoko balalibombya kubusyu bwako.
Balakutembaula,
Balatembaula izina lyako.
Sela.
Ulayoosya bantu kukucita kwakwe.
Bakazubuka mulenga ama ulu.
Nkukonya oko twakakondelelwa nguwe.
Meso aakwe alalangilila bamasi.
Basikupapila batalisumpuli.
Amulumbe Leza wesu, nobantu;
Alimvwigwe ijwi lyakumutembaula.
Ngonguwe uutubamba mubuumi,
Uutazumizyi maulu esu kusunzululwa.
Watusalazya mbubonya mbuli insiliva mbwiisalazigwa.
Watuteya akakole,
Watulemezya loko mucikungu.
Wakeenzya basimbizi amitwe yesu,
Twakainda mumulilo amumaanzi,
Pele watusisya mombuzyeenzi.
Njoozuzikizya nzendakakonkezya,
Izyakazwa kumilomo yangu,
Nzindakaamba kuciindi camapenzi aangu.
Njookutentela zipaizyo zinono,
Antoomwe abweema bwabagutu;
Njoopaizya basune abasijembwe, Sela.
Amuboole, muswiilile, nyoonse nemuyoowa Leza,
Nkamulwiide nzyaakandicitila.
Ndakamukwiilila amulomo wangu;
Lulimi lwangu lwakamutembaula.
Mwami naatamvwa.
Pele ncobeni Leza wakaswiilila,
Wamvwa majwi aacikombyo cangu.
Alumbwe Leza,
lwatakaka cikombyo cangu,
Na kutandikasya luzyalo lwakwe.
Atumunikile abusyu bwakwe.
Sela.
Alufutuko lwako akati kamisyobo yoonse.
Bantu boonse bakulumbe.
Nkaambo ulabeteka bantu cakululama,
Uleenzya bamasi ansi.
Sela.
Bantu bakulumbe, O Leza,
Bantu boonse bakulumbe.
Leza, Leza wesu, watulongezya,
Magolelo oonse aanyika amulemeke.
Abuke Leza; basinkondonyina bamwayisigwe,
Abaabo bamusulide bacije kubusyu bwakwe.
Busi mbubutandwa kumuuwo, ubatande mbubonya:
Bunzuka mbubweenzunuka kumulilo,
Basizibi bamaninine mbubonya kubusyu bwa-Leza.
Pele baluleme basekelele,
Bakondwe kubusyu bwa-Leza,
Babotelwe loko.
Amwiimbile Leza akutembaula izina lyakwe;
Amubambe mugwagwa wayooyo uuinda katantide munkanda;
Izina lyakwe ngu-Jehova; amusekelele kubusyu bwakwe.
Wisaabo bamucaala, uubeteka bamukabafu,
Mbwabede Leza mucikalilo cakwe cisalala.
Ulaangununa baange, kuti babe acoolwe;
Pele bapapila balakala munkanda.
Nowakaandulula munkanda,
Amajulu akalosya imvula kubusyu bwa-Leza,
Oyo Sinai wakakankama kubusyu bwa-Leza, Leza wa-Israyeli.
Wakalobonozya imvula, O Leza,
Wakabukulusya nyika yako niyakakulumpene.
Mububotu bwako wakabambila bapengede, O Leza.
Mwami watuma inkombe;
Banakazi baikanana ninkamu impati.
Basilutwe bampi bacija, bacija!
Banakazi bakumaanda balaabana zisaalo,
Bali mbuli inziba iili amababa aavumbilidwe insiliva,
Amapepe aayo aali angolida iibalangala.
Singuzuzyoonse naakamwaisya bami nkuko,
Kwakawa caandwa cituba buu ku-Zalimoni,
Cilundu ca-Basana ncilundu ca-Leza;
Cilundu ca-Basana ncilundu cilamfu.
Ino mwalangilanzi abbivwe, nozilundu zilamfu,
Kucilundu Leza ncaakasala kuti akale mulincico?
Ncobeni Jehova ulikede nkuko lyoonse.
Zili zyuulu azyuulu.
Mwami wakazwa azyo ku-Sinai, wanjila mubusena busalalisya.
Watambula zipo kubantu,
Akulibasikupapila, kuti Leza Jehova akale abo,
Alumbwe Mwami uutuyumwide mazuba oonse,
Leza walufutuko lwesu. Sela.
Mwami Jehova nguutuyokola kulufu.
Ncobeni Leza ulatambya mutwe wabasinkondonyina,
Inkama yamasusu yayooyo uuceenda bubisya,
Mwami wakati, Ndabapilusya kuzwa ku-Basana,
Ndabapilusya kuzwa mumaanzi malamfu aamulwizi,
Kuti musanzye zituta zyanu mubulowa,
Kuti indimi zyababwa bako zijane caabilo kulibasinkondonyoko.
Balikubwene, O Leza, mbonjila mucikombelo;
Balibwene mboenda, O Leza wangu, Mwami wangu.
Basikwiimba balazulwida, basituntimbwa bali musule,
Alimwi akatikati mpobabede basimbi basinsaka.
Amulumbe Leza mumbungano;
Amulumbe Mwami, noluzubo lwa-Israyeli.
Nguulya Benjamini muniini uuzulwida;
Mbaabo basilutwe ba-Juda ankamu yabo;
Mbaabo basilutwe ba-Zebuloni abasilutwe ba-Nafitali.
Tondezya inguzu zyako, O Leza.
Ulipe inguzu, O Leza, yebo nowakatucitila,
Bami balakuletela zipo,
Tapatila zinyama zikede kumatete,
Ankamu yaba poho aboombe babantu.
Kolyataula bayandisya mali;
Mwaya bantu bayanda inkondo,
Nyika ya-Kusi iyootambika maanza kuli-Leza.
Amwiimbile Leza, nozisi zya ansi,
Amwiimbile Mwami intembauzyo.
Ngonguwe uuenda butantide mumayoba aaciindi,
Ulaamba ajwi lyakwe, ijwi lyanguzu,
Amupe Leza inguzu;
Bulemu bwakwe bulaboneka ku-Israyeli,
Anguzu zyakwe zili kujulu.
Leza wa-Israyeli ulapa bantu bakwe inguzu abukozu.
Alumbwe Leza!
Undifutule, O Leza,
Nkaambo buumi bwangu bwazulilwa maanzi.
Njabubbila mubutipa bulamfu, butakwe maimino;
Ndanjila mubbonze lyamaanzi, maanzi nkwaandibbizya,
Ndawizuka mukukwiila kwangu; kameneno kangu kayuminina;
Meso aangu akataala kukulangila Leza wangu,
Bayanda kundinyonyoona, basinkondoma buyo, mbasinguzu,
Ndapilusizya bantu ncindatakabanyanzya.
Yebo, O Leza, ulizi bufubafuba bwangu;
Zibi zyangu taziyubi kulinduwe.
Abo bakulangila batausigwi insoni nkaambo kangu,
O Mwami Jehova wamakamu;
Abo bakuyandaula batafwisigwi bweeme nkaambo kandime, O Leza wa-Israyeli.
Ikuti nkenkakako nkensampaulilwa;
Buusu buli kubusyu bwangu.
Muzwamasi akati kabana babama.
Kusampaula kwabaabo ibakakusampaula kwawida ndime.
Nindakapenzya moyo wangu kukuliimya zilyo,
Aya akaba aakundisampauzya.
Ndakaba cisabuzyo akati kabo,
Ndaba lwiimbo lwabakolwi.
Kuciindi ncoyanda, O Leza, kukuvula kwaluzyalo lwako,
Undivwiile mukusyomeka kwalufutuko lwako.
Undivune kubutope, ntabbili;
Mvunwe kulibaabo bandisulide akumaanzi malamfu,
Lwizi lutandibbizyi,
Ibbonze litandimeneneni,
Idindi litandimumini mulomo,
Undivwiile, O Jehova, nkaambo buuya bwako mbubotu;
Undifutatukile muluzyalo lwako lunji,
Utasisi busyu bwako kumulanda wako;
Nkaambo ndi mumapenzi; fwambaana kundivuna.
Swena kulindime kuzoofutula buumi bwangu;
Undinunune, nkaambo kabasinkondoma.
Ansoni zyangu abweeme bwangu;
Abaabo bandipenzya ulibabwene boonse.
Kukusampaulwa moyo wangu walenda;
Ndawizauka loko.
Ndakalangila basikundifwida buuya, pele katakwe;
Abasikunduumbulizya, pele tabajaniki.
Amunyota yangu bakandinywisya zipapa.
Azipaizyo zyabo zyakutontozya zibabede idiba.
Meso aabo asie, kuti bataboni;
Zikungu zyabo zikankame lyoonse,
Ubatilile bukali bwako;
Lunyemo lwako luyoosya lubeenzye.
Kutabi uukala mumalabba aabo.
Ayooyo ngowakayasa balamuyungizizya macise.
Batalulamikwi abuniini kulinduwe.
Batalembwi antoomwe abalulami.
Pele mebo ndipengede, ndaciswa loko;
Lufutuko lwako lundisumpule, O Leza.
Lino njootembaula izina lya-Leza alwiimbo,
Njoomulemeka cakulumba.
Eci cilabotezya Jehova kwiinda musune,
Na mupoho uujisi meja ansumba.
Bapengede babone, basekelele;
Nywebo nomuyandaula Leza, myoyo yanu ibukuluke.
Nkaambo Jehova ulaswiilila bacete;
Tasampauli baange bakwe.
Ijulu anyika zyoonse zimutembaule,
Lwizi azyoonse zili mumo.
Nkaambo Leza ulafutula Zioni,
Ulayakulula minzi ya-Juda,
Lino bayookala mulinjiyo akwiivuba.
Lunyungu lwabalanda bakwe luyooikona;
Abaabo bayandisya izina lyakwe bayookala nkukonya.
O Leza, zumina kundivuna;
Fwambaana kundigwasya O Jehova.
Bayanda kundinyanzya buumi;
Bafutatulwe akufwisigwa bweeme
Basekelela kupenga kwangu,
Bapilusigwe, cibe impindu yabweeme bwabo,
Bandiwela bati, Ehe! Ehe!
Boonse bayanda lufutuko lwako baambe lyoonse kuti, Jehova alemekwe!
Fwambaana kundigwasya, O Leza.
Nduwe mugwasyi wangu, muvuni wangu,
Utamuki, O Jehova!
Mulinduwe, O Jehova, monjubila:
Ntabi nenjoousigwa insoni.
Undivune mubululami bwako, undaangunune;
Cenjeka kutwi kwako, undifutule,
Walailila kundifutula,
Nkaambo nduwe indomba yangu amampangala aangu,
O Leza wangu, undivune kumaanza aabasizibi,
Kumaanza aabantu bataluleme bakali.
Nduwe ngunsyoma, O Jehova, kuzwa kubwanike bwangu,
Nduwe wakandigwisya mwida lyabama;
Nduwe nguntembaula lyoonse,
Pele nduwe mayubilo aangu aajisi inguzu.
Mulomo wangu wazula lutembaulo lwako;
Wakulemeka buzuba boonse,
Utandisowi kuciindi cakucembaala;
Utandilekelezyi na inguzu zyangu zyamana.
Abaabo bavwima buumi bwangu balandivwiya,
Bati, Leza wamulekelezya;
Amumutobele, mumujate, nkaambo taakwe sikumuvuna,
o Leza wangu, fwambaana kundigwasya.
Bafwe masampu abweeme bayanda kundibisizya,
Pele mebo nooya busyoma,
Njookutembaula akukutembaula.
Alufutuko lwako buzuba boonse,
Nkaambo nsizi mweelwe wazyo,
Njooamba bululami bwako, bwako luzutu.
O Leza, nduwe wandiiyisya kuzwa kubwanike bwangu,
Lino asunu nciluula malele aako,
Utandisii, O Leza, nekuba kuti ndacembaala akuba amvwi,
Kuti ndwiide izyalani liciza makani aakuboko kwako,
Anguzu zyako kuliboonse baciboola,
Nduwe oocita milimo mipati.
O Leza, ngwani ngoelene awe?
Uyoondiponya alimwi,
Uyoondiboozya kuzwa kunsi anyika.
Yungizizya bupati bwangu.
Boola kunduumbulizya.
Nkaambo kakusyomeka kwako, O Leza wangu;
Njookutembaula akankobela,
Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Awalo muuya wangu ngowakanununa,
Lulimi lwangu lulaamba bululami bwako buzuba boonse,
Nkaambo bausigwa insoni akuzingwa ibakali kuyanda kundibisizya.
Upe mwami imbeta zyako, O Leza;
Mwana wamwami, umupe bululami bwako,
Akukosweda bacete kabotu,
Zilundu ziletele bantu luumuno,
Atwalo tulundulundu nkaambo kabululami.
Abeteke bacete babantu,
Afutule bana babapengede,
Apwayaule basikupenzya,
Aongole mbuli izuba,
Akalilile mbuli mwezi mumazyalani oonse.
Ambuli miyoba iibombya nyika,
Aluumuno luvule ciindi coonse mwezi nuuciliwo,
Akuzwa kumulonga kusikila kumagolelo aanyika,
Abo bamubusizya inkondo bamukotamine,
Abasinkondonyina bamyankute lusuko,
Bami ba-Syeba aba-Seba balete zipo.
Bami boonse bamukotamine,
Misyobo yoonse imumanine milimo,
Nkaambo ulavuna bacete nibakwiila,
Abalo bapengede abaabo babula mugwasyi.
Bacete abatengwana ulabafwida luzyalo;
Buumi bwabacete ulabufutula.
Ulanununa buumi bwabo kulupenzyo:
Bulowa bwabo bulayandika mumeso aakwe.
Akombelwe lyoonse;
Alumbwe buzuba boonse,
Ayoome mbuli lusaka lwaku-Lebano.
Abantu bamuminzi bavule mbuli bwizu bwamusokwe.
Izina lyakwe linooliwo kufumbwa izuba lyanooliwo.
Bantu balongezegwe nkaambo kakwe;
Misyobo yoonse imulongezye.
Alumbwe Jehova Leza, Leza wa-Israyeli;
Ngonguwe alike uucita malele.
Izina lyakwe lyabulemu lilumbwe lyoonse,
Anyika yoonse izule bulemu bwakwe.
Akube boobo! Akube boobo!
Zyamana zikombyo zya-Davida mwana wa-Jese.
Ncobeni Leza mubotu kuba-Israyeli,
Kulibaabo basalala mumyoyo.
Pele mebo, maulu aangu akaamba kulebwa,
Intaamu zyangu zyakali kufwaafwi kutezeleka.
Nkaambo ndakafwa ibbivwe kulibasikulisumpula,
Nindakabona coolwe cabasizibi.
Nkaambo tabakwe zicisa;
Mibili yabo ili kabotu, ilineneede.
Tabali mumapenzi mbuli bantu bamwi.
Tabaumwi mbuli bantu bamwi.
Meso aabo azimba amafuta;
Myoyo yabo ilifwasukide mumiyeeyo mibi.
Balaamba cakulisumpula aalunyonyongano.
Andimi zyabo zileendeenda munyika.
Aboobo bantu balasanduluka kubatobela,
Tababoni kubija kwabo.
Sa kuli luzibo ku-Mupatikampatila?
Ncobeni mbubabede basizibi;
Balilisantide lyoonse, balavuba lubono lunji.
Ndasanzizyanzi maanza aangu atakwe kaambo?
Nkaambo buzuba boonse ndakali kupenzegwa,
Ndakali kutapatilwa lyoonse cifumo.
Nendakaamba kuti, Njeelede kukanana obo,
Nendakabisizya izyalani lyabana bako.
Akandikataazya loko,
Akuyeeya makani aamamanino aabo.
Ncobeni ulababika mumasena aatezemuka,
Ulabawisizya mulunyonyooko.
Mpoonya awo balafwambaana kusaalwa;
Ziyoosyo zilabamaninina.
Mbuli ciloto, muntu naasinsimuka,
Yebo nobuka, O Mwami, ulasampaula ciwa cabo.
Moyo wangu nowakalula,
Nindakayaswa mukati kangu,
Ndakali mbuli munyama uutezi,
Ndakali mbuli iŋombe kubusyu bwako,
Nekubaboobo tuli ayebo lyoonse,
Ulindijisi kujanza lyangu lyalulyo,
Lino kumamanino uyoonditambula mubulemu.
Aalo ansi taakwe umbi ngunjanda.
Leza ninguzu zyamoyo wangu acaabilo cangu calyoonse.
Nkaambo boonse batantamuka kuzwa kulinduwe balafwidilila;
Ulanyonyoona boonse basukeme kumbi.
Ndakasala Mwami Jehova, abe mayubilo aangu, Kuti nduule milimo yako yoonse.
Bukali bwako bulasukilanzi imbelele zyameembelelo aako?
Ibaluka imbungano yako njowakavuba kalekale,
Njowakanununa kuti ibe musyobo walukono lwako,
Acalo cilundu ca-Zioni mowakakede.
Vungulula maulu aako kuya kumatongo aakale;
Basinkondoma babisya loko kucikombelo cako.
Babika zitondezyo zyako nkukonya oko.
Bakali mbuli basikunyampula tuleba
Kukugonka cisaka camisamu.
Lino zibeze zyaco zyoonse Bakazityolaula atuleba ansando,
Bakatenta cikombelo cako,
Babisya cikalilo cazina lyako, baciwisizya ansi.
Atuzipwayaule zyoonse.
Batenta zibunganino zya-Leza zyoonse zyamunyika.
Tacikwe limbi musinsimi;
Taakwe muntu akati kesu uuzi naayoomana.
O Leza, batulwisya balaleka lili kusampaula?
Sa basinkondoma balatuka izina lyako lyoonse?
Wakasizyanzi ijanza lyako lyalulyo?
Ligwisye akaango kako, ubanyonyoone.
Uucita zifutula mukati kanyika,
Ulapwayaula mitwe yazyuuka zyamumaanzi.
Wamwaaba kuti abe zilyo zyabaabo ibakede munkanda.
Wakadonkaula tusena atulonga;
Wakayuminizya milonga mipati.
Masiku asikati, zyoonse nzizyako;
Nduwe wakabika izuba anyenyeezi.
Mainza amapeyo, nduwe wakazilenga zyoonse.
Bantu bafubafuba batukila izina lyako.
Utalubi lyoonse buumi bwabapengede bako.
Nkaambo mayubilo aamunyika alizwide lunyonyongano,
Batengwana abapengede batembaule izina lyako.
Ingasila bafubafuba mbubasampaula izina lyako lyoonse.
Utalubi majwi aabasinkondonyoko,
Cikwala cabaabo bakulwisya cikubukila lyoonse.
Tulakulumba, O Leza, tulakulumba;
Tulakwiilila izina lyako, tulaluula milimo yako iigambya.
(Leza wakati)
Kuciindi cibikidwe,
Ndabeteka cakululama.
Ndime ndabamba ziimikilo zyayo.
Sela.
Ndaambila basikulisumpula kuti, Mutalisumpuli;
Abasizibi ndabaambila kuti, Mutabusyi meja aanu;
Mutabusyi meja aanu kujulu,
Mutaambi cakuliyumya insingo.
Nkaambo teensi kujwe nekuba kumbo,
Alimwi teensi kunkanda, nkokuzwa kusumpulwa.
Umwi ulamufwinsya, aumwi ulamusumpula.
Ilizwide imbote iivwelene iifufumuka,
Ulaungwida umwi aumwi,
Nkabela basizibi boonse banyika bayooinywidilila.
Pele mebo njookanana lyoonse,
Njooimbila Leza wa-Jakobo intembauzyo.
Meja oonse aabasizibi njooatyolaula,
Pele meja aabaluleme ayoosumpulwa.
Leza ulizibidwe mucisi ca-Juda,
Izina lyakwe ndipati mu-Israyeli.
Cilao cakwe cili mu-Salemu,
Cikalilo cakwe cili mu-Zioni.
Antobo, ama panga, azilwisyo.
Sela.
Uli abulemu kwiinda zilundu ziteeli.
Boonse basinguzu balengauka kumaanza aabo.
Inkalaki ambizi zyoonse zyoonenena.
Ngwani uukonzya kwiima kubusyu bwako na wakalala?
Kuzwa kujulu wakaswiilizya kubeteka kwako;
Nyika yakayoowa, yakaumuna,
Leza naakabuka kukubeteka,
Kuti afutule boonse bapengede baansi,
Sela.
Bukali busyeede bulakusekelela.
Boonse bamuzyungulukide balete inkambilizyo kuliyooyo uuyoosya.
Ulayoosya bami baansi.
Ndakwiilila Leza ajwi lyangu,
Ndakwiilila Leza, kuti andiswiilile.
Ciindi camasiku ndatambika maanza aangu cakutaleka;
Moyo wangu wakakaka kuumbulizigwa.
Na ndaibaluka Leza, ndatongela;
Na ndamuyeeya, ndalengauka.
Sela.
Ulapa meso aangu cilabila;
Mukupenga kwangu ndakacilwa kwaamba,
Myaka yakamana.
Ndaamba mumoyo wangu masiku,
Ndayeeya, ndalingula muuya wangu.
Sa Mwami ulasowa lyoonse?
Sa takonzyi kubotelwa limbi?
Sa zisyomezyo zyakwe zyaleka kukabe kutamani?
Sa wasinkilizya luse lwakwe nkaambo kakukalala?
Sela.
Ijanza lyalulyo lya-Mupatikampatila lyasanduka.
Njeeye malele aakwe aaciindi.
Mbike moyo wangu kuncito zyako zyoonse,
Akuyeeya-yeeya milimo yako yakalekale.
Nguni muzimu mupati mbuli Leza?
Nduwe Leza oocita malele.
Wa tondezya inguzu zyako akati kamasi.
Nduwe wakanununa bantu bako akuboko kwako,
Bana ba-Jakobo aba-Josefa.
Sela.
Maanzi akakubona, akayoowa;
Ibbonze lyalwizi lyakakankama.
Mayoba akapoomona maanzi,
Mujulu mwakamvwigwa mizumo,
Mivwi yako yakali kweendeenda.
Ijwi lyamizumo yako lyakali mukambizi,
Malabo akamunika nyika,
Luwa lwakakankama akuteketa.
Kweenda kwako kwakali mumaanzi malamfu,
Pele mikondo yako teeyakaboneka.
Kujanza lya-Musa alya-Aroni.
Amucenjeke matwi aanu kumajwi aamulomo wangu.
Ndaamba tulabi twakalekale,
Ngebakatwaambila bamatata.
Tulaambila izyalani liboola intembauzyo zya-Jehova,
Inguzu zyakwe amalele aakwe ngaakacita.
Nkaambo wakabusya bukamboni muli-Jakobo,
Wakabika mulao mu-Israyeli,
Ngwaakalailila bamatata,
Kuti bazibye bana babo,
Nkokuti bana basi zyalwe,
Babuke akukananina bana babo,
Kuti babike myoyo yabo kuli-Leza,
Batalubi milimo ya-Leza
Babambe milazyo yakwe,
Batabi mbuli bamawisi,
Izyalani lipapila likataazya,
Izyalani ilyatakakalika moyo,
Akutasyomeka kuli-Leza.
Bana ba-Efraimu, ibakasakatide mata,
Bakapa isule mubuzuba bwankondo.
Kabatabambide cizuminano ca-Leza;
Bakakaka kweenda mumilazyo yakwe.
Amalele aakwe ngaakabatondezya,
Munyika ya-Egepita, mumyuunda ya-Zoani,
Wakalundika maanzi mbuli cilwi.
Masiku kabeenzya lyoonse amumuni wamulilo.
Wabanywisya loko mbuli kumaanzi malamfu.
Wakagwisya tulonga mugala,
Mane maanzi akakunka mbuli milonga,
Bakapapila Mupatikampatila munkanda.
Kukukumbila zilyo nzibakasukeme.
Sa Leza ulakonzya kutubambila zyakulya munkanda?
Milonga yakapaya,
Sa ulakonzya kutupa cilyo acalo?
Sa ulabambila bantu bakwe nyama?
Mpawo Jehova naakamvwa, wakakalala,
Mulilo wakayakila Jakobo,
Bukali bwakabukila Israyeli.
Kabatasyomi lufutuko lwakwe.
Wajula milyango yakujulu,
Wabapa maila aakujulu,
Bantu bakaiya zilyo zyabaangelo;
Wakabatumina zilyo zyakubakutya.
Kujulu wakaungya muuwo wakujwe;
Wakeenzya muuwo wakumusanza kunguzu zyakwe.
Wakabawisizya nyama mbuli lusuko,
Bayuni banji mbuli musee wakulwizi.
Wakabalosya mukati kamalabba aabo,
Kumbali lyazilao zyabo.
Lino bakaiya, bakuta loko.
Wakabapa ncibakasukeme.
Pele kusukama kwabo nekwatakalina kumana,
Zilyo nezyakali mukanwa lyabo,
Bukali bwa-Leza bwakababukila,
Nkabela wakajaya baneneede akati kabo,
Wanyonyoona balombe babotu ba-Israyeli,
Nekubaboobo kabaciya bubisya,
Kabatazuminini malele aakwe.
Nkaambo kako wakamanizya mazuba aabo mbuli muuya wakufulida;
Myaka yabo yakali kumana mubuyoofu.
Bakaboola kupangika myoyo yabo kulinguwe;
Bakaibaluka kuti Leza nindomba yabo,
Leza Mupatikampatila ngu-Munununi wabo.
Bakamweena kundimi zyabo.
Teebakakakatila kucizuminano cakwe.
Taakwe naakabanyonyoona.
Kanji-kanji wakapilusya lunyemo lwakwe,
Katabusyi bukali bwakwe boonse.
Muuwo uuindilila, uutabooli.
Kanji-kanji bakamupapila munkanda,
Akumukataazya musokwe.
Bakali kusunka Leza,
Akukalazya Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Teebakayeeya ijanza lyakwe,
Na buzuba obo naakabanununa kuli basinkondonyina;
Mbwaakacita zitondezyo zyakwe mucisi ca-Egepita,
Amalele aakwe mumyuunda ya-Zoani.
Kabatakonzyi kunywa maanzi aayo.
Abasyacande bakabanyonyoona.
Cisozi cakalya inguzu zyabo.
Amikuyu yabo yakaandwa impeyo.
Wakaaba iŋombe zyabo kucivulamabwe;
Imbelele zyabo lulabo lwakazyaanda.
Lunyemo akukalala amapenzi,
Inkamu yabaangelo babi.
Wakabambila bukali bwakwe inzila.
Takabakasizye lufu.
Wakaaba buumi bwabo kubulwazi.
Babulombe bwabo boonse muzilao zya-Hamu.
Wakabazulwida munkanda mbuli mweembeli wamatanga.
Pele lwizi lwakababbizya basinkondonyina.
Kucilundu neelyakavubide ijanza lyakwe lyalulyo,
Wakabaabila lukono cakweeleka;
Wakakazika misyobo ya-Israyeli muzilao zyabo,
Mupati kampatila, Kabatabambi malailile aakwe.
Bakapambalika mbuli buta bweena:
Bakamujazya munyono kuzikozyano zyabo zibezedwe.
Wakabasesemwa loko ba-Israyeli.
Cilao ncaakayakide akati kabantu.
Abulemu bwakwe wakabwaaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyina,
Wakaaba bantu bakwe kupanga;
Wakakalalila lukono lwakwe.
Mulilo wakasyukutya bakubusi babo,
Abanakalindu babo baka bula lwiimbo lwabwinga.
Nkabela bamukabafu babo teebakalila.
Mbuli singuzu uuonzomoka nkaambo kawaini,
Wakauma basinkondonyina, wabatanda,
Wacita kuti babe masampu aalyoonse.
Lino wakakaka cilao ca-Josefa;
Takasalide musyobo wa-Efraimu;
Pele wakasala musyobo wabana ba-Juda,
Acilundu ca-Zioni ncaakayandisya.
Mbuli nyika njaakasitikizya cakutamana,
Wamugwisya muzimpati zyambelele,
Kuti alele bantu bakwe ba-Jakobo, a-Israyeli lukono lwakwe,
Kabeenzya mubuuza bwamaanza aakwe.
Basofwaazya intempele yako iisalala;
Jerusalemu baucita zitantaala.
Anyama yabasalali bako kumilomo yabanyama baansi.
Nkabela taakwe uubazika.
Twaba masampu kubeenzuma,
Twawelwa akusampaulwa kulibaabo batweengelede.
Sa ibbivwe lyako lilatenta mbuli mulilo?
Akuzisi zitakwiilili izina lyako,
Nkaambo mbombabo balya Jakobo,
Basaala cikalilo cakwe.
Luzyalo lwako lufwambaane kutweenzya,
Nkaambo twawizuka loko.
Utuvune, utusonzaule zibi zyesu, nkaambo kazina lyako,
Bamasi baambilenzi kuti,
Uli kuli Leza wabo?
Koliya inkoto yabulowa bwabalanda bako butika.
Makani azibwe akati kabamasi mumeso esu.
Munguzu zyako zipati ubavune balindila lufu,
Vuzizya beenzuma ziindi zili musanu azibili
Milandu yamasampu ngebakusampauzya, O Mwami.
Tunookulumba lyoonse,
Tunookanana kutembaulwa kwako kumazyalani oonse.
O Mweembeli wa-Israyeli,
Uwe noenzya Josefa mbuli imbelele;
Uwe nokede akati kabakerebimu, mweka!
Kunembo lya-Efraimu a-Benjamini a-Manase.
Busya inguzu zyako, Uboole kuzootuvuna.
Mwesya busyu bwako, tufutulwe,
O Jehova, Leza wamakamu,
Ulaleka lili kukalalila zikombyo zyabantu bako?
Wabasanizya insima yamisozi,
Wabanywisya misozi mucinywido cipati.
Wacita kuti tube masampu kubeenzuma;
Basinkondoma boonse balatuseka.
Utubusye, O Leza wamakamu;
Mwesya busyu bwako, tufutulwe.
Wakatanda bamasi, walisimpika.
Wakalibambila busena,
Elyo lyakasyuuka, lyazuzya nyika.
Zilundu zyakavumbwa kucenzule calyo,
Mitabi yalyo yakali mbuli makedari aa-Leza.
Adelema lyalyo lyakasika kumulonga.
Lino boonse bainda munzila bala cela kulindilyo?
Bankuntula bamuzisaka balalilumauna,
Banyama boonse bamusokwe balalilya.
Sondela kuzwa kujulu, ubone,
Uswaye kusaansa eli,
Mutabi ngowakapa inguzu omwini.
Lyatentwa amulilo, lyagonkwa.
Bamaninina nkaambo kabukali bwako.
Amwana amuntu nguwakapa inguzu omwini.
Aboobo tatukooyookufutatila;
Utuponye, lino tuyoolemeka izina lyako.
Mwesya busyu bwako, tufutulwe.
Amwiimbisye kuli-Leza inguzu zyesu,
Amuyobeke cakukondwa kuli-Leza wa-Jakobo,
Amutunge lwiimbo, muzyanye insaka;
Amuume kantimbwa anyeele.
Akumwezi uuzyuka, kubuzuba bwapobwe lyesu.
Mulumbe wa-Leza wa-Jakobo.
Wakaubikila Josefa, ube citondezyo,
Ciindi eciya naakainka kuyoolwisya nyika ya-Egepita.
Ndakamvwa ijwi ndendatakezi, liti,
Ndakalemununa makuko aako,
Maanza aako akaangununwa kucisuwo,
Ndakakuvuwa kumayubilo aamizumo;
Ndakakusunka kumaanzi aaku-Meriba,
Sela.
Amuswiilile, nobantu bangu, mulaye!
o Israyeli, kuti nemwakamvwa!
Mutakotamini baleza beenzu.
Iwakakugwisya munyika ya-Egepita.
Asamika mulomo wako, lino ndauzuzya.
Pele bantu bangu teebakaswiilila ijwi lyangu,
Israyeli wakandikaka,
Beende mumakanze aabo beni.
Ba-Israyeli nebeenda munzila zyangu!
Nendafwambaana kuzunda basinkondonyina!
Nendabika ijanza lyangu kukulwisya babapenzya!
Abo basulide Jehova nebalibombya kulinguwe.
Ciindi cabo necaba calyoonse.
Nendabalela kumaila mabotu loko.
Nendabakusya buci buzwa mundomba.
Ulabeteka akati kabaleza.
Akuvundikizya basizibi.
Sela.
Amubeteke kabotu milandu yabacete ayabamucaala,
Amucitile batengwana abapengede bululami,
Amwaangunune bafulukide abacete;
Amubavune mumaanza aabasizibi.
Tabezi, tabaswiilili;
Baleendeenda mumudima;
Intalisyo zyoonse zyanyika zilatenkana.
Nyoonse muli bana ba-Mupatikampatila,
Nekubaboobo mulafwa mbuli bantu buyo,
Mulawisigwa mbuli umwi wabasilutwe.
Nkaambo nduwe ooyookona zisi zyoonse.
O Leza, utaumuni buyo; Utatontoli tontolo, O Leza.
Abaabo bakusulide basongomeka mitwe.
Balalayana kubisizya bayandika bako,
Balalayana camoyo omwe,
Batangana cizuminano kuti bakulwisye:
Basizilao zya-Edomu aba-Ismayeli,
Ba-Moabu aba-Hagara,
Ba-Gebali aba-Amoni aba-Amaleki,
Ba-Filisti abamu-Turo;
Abalo ba-Asuri basangana abo,
Baba inguzu zyabana ba-Loti.
Sela.
Ambowakacitila Sisera a-Jabini kumulonga wa-Kisoni,
Ibakanyonyooka ku-Endori,
Bakaba mbuli bufumba bubikwa kumyuunda.
Abami babo boonse mbuli Zeba a-Zalimuna,
Ibakaamba kuti, Atubavube,
Zikalilo zya-Leza zibe zyesu.
O Leza wangu, ubacite mbuli lusuko lwakambizi,
Mbuli buungu bupupuluka kumuuwo.
Mbuli mulilo uusyukutya cisaka,
Mbuli mabangabanga aatenta zilundu,
Ubatande mbubonya obo aguwo lyako,
Akubayoosya akambizi kako.
Lemya masyu aabo kunsoni,
Kuti bayandaule izina lyako, O Jehova.
Bausigwe insoni akuzingwa lyoonse,
Bausigwe bweeme akunyonyooka.
Bazibe kuti nduwe olike oojisi izina lya-Jehova,
Nduwe Mupatikampatila atala anyika yoonse.
o Jehova wamakamu!
Moyo wangu ulisukeme, ulayandisya kunjila mucikalilo ca-Jehova;
Moyo wangu amubili wangu, zyoonse zilasekelela Leza muumi.
Kayuni kalijanina iŋanda,
Sikamembya wajana citeente cakuzyalila bana bakwe,
Nkokuti kuzipaililo zyako,
o Mwami wangu, O Leza wangu.
Bali acoolwe bakala muŋanda yako,
Bakutembaula lyoonse. Sela.
Bali acoolwe bajana inguzu mulinduwe,
Bajisi migwagwa ya-Zioni mumyoyo yabo.
Nebainda mukuti lya-Misozi,
Balisandula kuba busena bwatusensa;
Imvula intaanzi ilalisakatizya maziba.
Boonse balabulika kubusyu bwa-Leza mu-Zioni.
O Jehova Leza wamakamu, swiilila cikombyo cangu;
Cenjeka kutwi kwako, O Leza wa-Jakobo.
Sela.
Langa busyu bwamunanike wako.
Nkaambo buzuba bomwe buyo bwamucikalilo cako
Mbubotu kwiinda mazuba aali cuulu aakumbi.
Cilandibotela kuba mulindizi wamulyango muŋanda ya-Leza wangu,
Kwiinda kukala muzilao zyabasizibi.
Nkaambo Jehova Leza ndizuba, nintobo;
Jehova nguupa luzyalo abulemu; Takabakasyi cintu cibotu
Beenda cakululama.
O Jehova wamakamu,
Uli acoolwe muntu uusyoma nduwe.
Wakaboozezya Jakobo coolwe.
Wakalekelela bantu bako milandu yabo,
Wakavumbila zibi zyabo zyoonse.
Wakatontozya bukali bwako boonse,
Wakaleka bukali bwako bubi.
Utubusye alimwi, O Leza walufutuko lwesu;
Uleke kutukalalila.
Sa unootukalalila lyoonse?
Sa unoocijisi bukali bwako mumazyalani oonse?
Kuti bantu bako bakusekelele?
Tubonye luzyalo lwako, O Jehova,
Utupe lufutuko lwako,
Nkaambo ulaambila bantu bakwe cakutontozya,
Basalali bakwe babika myoyo yabo kulinguwe.
Ncobeni lufutuko lwakwe luli kufwaafwi kulibaabo bamuyoowa,
Kuti bulemu bukale mucisi cesu.
Bululami aluumuno zyamyontana,
Bululami bulasondela kuzwa kujulu,
Nkabela nyika yesu ilapa micelo yayo.
Bululami buya bweendeenda kubusyu bwakwe.
Bubambile maulu aakwe inzila.
Cenjeka kutwi kwako, O Jehova, undivuwe,
Nkaambo ndi mutengwana uupengede.
Bamba buumi bwangu, nkaambo ndiluleme;
Futula mulanda wako uukusyoma, O Leza.
Undifwide luzyalo, O Mwami,
Nkaambo ndikwiilila nduwe buzuba boonse,
Kondezya moyo wamulanda wako,
Nkaambo ndabika moyo wangu kulinduwe.
Ulatila luzyalo lwako kuli boonse bakukwiilila.
Swiilila cikombyo cangu, O Jehova.
Teelela ijwi lyakukumbila kwangu.
Mubuzuba bwakupenga kwangu ndakukwiilila,
Nkaambo ulandivuwa.
O Mwami; Taakwe milimo iielene amilimo yako.
Zilaboola kuzookukotamina, O Mwami;
Zilalemeka izina lyako.
Nduwe Leza olike.
Njiiyisya inzila yako, O Jehova, kuti njeende mulusinizyo lwako;
Mbe simoyo omwe kukulemeka izina lyako,
Ndakulumba amoyo wangu woonse, O Mwami Leza wangu,
Njoolemeka izina lyako lyoonse,
Wandivuna kudindi lyabafwide.
O Leza, basikamikami bandibukila;
Imbungano yabasizibi bayoosya balayandaula buumi bwangu;
Tabakubiki kubusyu bwabo.
Uutafwambi kukalala, uuvuzya luse alusyomo.
Undilange, undifwide luzyalo.
Kopa mulanda wako inguzu;
Futula mwana wamulanda wako musimbi.
Kondipa citondezyo cabubotu,
Kuti bandisulide babone, bause insoni,
Nkaambo yebo, O Jehova, wandi gwasya, wanduumbulizya.
Munzi wantalisyo zyakwe uli kuzilundu zisalala.
Jehova ulayandisya milyango ya-Zioni
Kwiinda makalilo oonse aa-Jakobo.
o munzi wa-Leza.
Sela.
Akati kabaabo bandizi ndaamba Rahabu a-Babuloni,
A-Filistiya a-Turo a-Kusi—
Kulaambwa kuti, Nkwaakazyalilwa oyu ayooyo.
Nkwaakazyalilwa oyu ayooyo.
Nkabela Mupatikampatila nguuyoouimika nji.
Nkwaakazyalilwa oyu ayooyo.
Sela.
Basikwiimba abasikuzyana boonse balaamba kuti,
Mulinduwe motubede tusensa twangu toonse.
O Jehova, Leza walufutuko lwangu,
Isikati amasiku ndakwiila kubusyu bwako.
Cikombyo cangu cisike kulinduwe;
Cenjeka kutwi kwako kukukwiila kwangu.
Nkaambo moyo wangu ulizwide mapenzi;
Buumi bwangu buli afwaafwi kukabanda.
Ndabalwa antoomwe abaabo baselukila mudindi;
Ndaba mbuli muntu uubula inguzu,
Mbuli muntu uusowedwe akati kabafu,
Mbuli bajayidwe balede mukabanda,
Mbotaciyeeyi limbi,
Bakoswedwe kuzwa kujanza lyako.
Wandibika mudindi lyabafwide,
Mumasena aansi aasia mbi.
Bukali bwako bwandilemena;
Wandipenzya amayuwe aako, Sela.
Beenzuma wabatola kulaale;
Wandicita cisesemyo kulimbabo;
Ndajalilwa, ndakacilwa kuzwa,
Liso lyangu lyayuminina nkaambo kamapenzi;
Mazuba oonse ndakwiilila nduwe, O Jehova.
Ndatandabika maanza aangu kulinduwe,
Sa ulacita maleele akati kabafu?
Sa basangu balabuka kuti bakutembaule?
Sela.
Sa luzyalo lwako lulaambwa mukabanda?
Alusyomo lwako sa lulaambwa mukati kalunyonyooko?
Abululami bwako munyika yakuluba?
Pele mebo ndakwiilila nduwe, O Jehova;
Cifumo cikombyo cangu cilasika nkobede.
Ino wandisowelanzi, O Jehova?
Ulasisilanzi busyu bwako kulindime?
Kukulemenwa ziyoosyo zyako ndawizuka.
Bukali bwako bwandibbizya,
Ziyoosyo zyako zyandijaya.
Buzuba boonse zindizyunguluka mbuli lwizi,
Zyandisinkila koonse koonse.
Beenzuma bali mumudima.
Njooimbila luzyalo lwa-Jehova lyoonse;
Milomo yangu iyooluula lusyomo lwako kumazyalani oonse.
Nkaambo ndakati, Luzyalo lwako luyooima nji,
Alusyomo lwako ulalusitikizya kujulu.
Ndakakonkezya kuli-Davida mulanda wangu.
Njookazika cuuno cabwami bwako kumazyalani oonse.
Sela.
Ijulu lilatembaula maleele aako, O Jehova,
Alusyomo lwako mumbungano yabasalala.
Nkaambo ngwani uuli kujulu uukonzya kweelana a-Jehova?
Ngwani akati kabaangelo uuli mbuli Jehova?
Ngu-Leza uuyoosya loko mumbungano yabasalali,
Uuyoowegwa kwiinda boonse bamweengelede.
O Jehova Leza wamakamu,
Ngwani singuzu uuli mbuli nduwe, O Jehova?
Alwalo lusyomo lwako lulikuzyungulukide.
Mayuwe aale naafufumuka, ulaatontozya,
Akumwaya basinkondonyoko kujanza lyako ijumu.
Ijulu ndilyako, ayalo nyika njiyako.
Luwa azyoonse zili mulindulo, nduwe wakazilenga.
Tabori a-Herimoni zilasekelela muzina lyako.
Kuboko kwako kuli anguzu,
Ijanza lyako ndijumu, ijanza lyako lyalulyo lilisumpukide.
Bululami alusinizyo nintalisyo yacuuno cako,
Luzyalo alusyomo zili kubusyu bwako,
Beenda mumumuni wabusyu bwake, O Jehova.
Balatangala muzina lyako buzuba boonse,
Balasumpulwa mubululami bwako,
Nkaambo nduwe bulemu bwanguzu zyabo,
Amuluse lwako luja lwesu molusumpulwa.
Mwami wesu ngwa-Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Mpoonya awo wakaambila musalali wako mucilengano,
Wakati, Ndibikide lugwasyo kulisinguzu,
Ndasumpula umwi uusalidwe akati kabantu,
Ndamunanika amafuta aangu aasalalisya.
Ijanza lyangu linoomugwasya lyoonse,
Kuboko kwangu kunoomuyumya.
Sinkondonyina takooyoomuzunda,
Amuntu sizibi takooyoomupenzya.
Njoopwaya basikumulwisya kubusyu bwakwe,
Abaabo bamusulide njoobauma.
Aluja lwakwe lulasumpulwa muzina lyangu.
Njoobika ijanza lyakwe alwizi,
Ajanza lyakwe lyalulyo kumilonga.
Nduwe Leza wangu andomba yalufutuko lwangu.
Mupati kubami baansi.
Njoomubamba caluzyalo lyoonse,
Acizuminano cangu ciyookalilila kulinguwe,
Acuuno cabwami bwakwe mbuli mazuba aakujulu.
Akuteenda mumbeta zyangu,
Na basampaula malailile aangu,
Akutajatisya milazyo yangu,
Njooswaya zibi zyabo ankoli,
Ansotoko zyabo acimboko,
Nekubaboobo nsikooyoolobya luzyalo lwangu kulinguwe,
Nikuba kuupaupa mulusyomo lwangu.
Nsikooyoojaya cizuminano cangu,
Nsikooyootyola makani aazwa mumilomo yangu,
Nsibeji kuli-Davida.
Cuuno cakwe ciyookalilila mbuli izuba kubusyu bwangu,
Mbuli ijulu litayangali.
Sela.
Pele webo wasowa buyo, wakaka,
Wakalalila munanike wako.
Amusini wakwe wabwami wauwaala ansi.
Wamwaya mabaya aakwe oonse,
Wanyonyoona zitabilizyo zyakwe.
Boonse bainda munzila balamusaala,
Waba cisabulo akati kabeenzinyina.
Wasumpula ijanza lyalulyo lyabaabo bamulwisya,
Wabotezya boonse basinkondonyina.
Wapilusya musule ipanga lyakwe,
Tomugwasizye munkondo pe.
Walesya kumwesya kwakwe;
Cuuno cakwe waciwisizya ansi.
Mazuba aabwanike bwakwe waafwinsya;
Wamusamika insoni.
Sela.
O Jehova, ulaleka lili? Sa unooyubide lyoonse!
Sa bukali bwako bunoopya mbuli mulilo?
Abantu boonse mbowakababumba kuba cabuyo!
Sa kuli muntu uukonzya kulivuna kunguzu zyakabanda?
Sela.
Ndowakakonkezya kuli-Davida mukusyomeka kwako?
O Mwami ingasila kusampaulwa kwabalanda bako, Ambundalemenwa mumoyo wangu intuko zyabamasi,
Nzibakasampauzya basinkondonyoko, O Jehova,
Nzibakasampauzya intaamu zyamunanike wako.
Alumbwe Jehova lyoonse!
Akube boobo! Akube boobo!
o Mwami, nduwe cikalilo cesu,
Mumazyalani oonse.
Kotana kubumba nyika aluwa,
Kuzwa kuciindi eco akusikila kuziindi zyoonse nduwe Leza,
Ulaamba kuti, Amupiluke nobana ba-Adamu.
Ili mbuli buzuba bwaiilo bwakainda,
Ambuli kaindi kamasiku kakulindila,
Cifumo bali mbuli bwizu bumena.
Igoko bulamwigwa, bulapusama.
Nkaambo twasyukuta kubukali bwako,
Amulunyemo lwako twapenzegwa.
Azibi zyesu zisisidwe mumumuni wabusyu bwako.
Nkaambo mazuba esu oonse amaninina mubukali bwako,
Tulamanizya myaka yesu mbuli kusintimuka,
Myaka yabuumi bwesu ili makumi aali musanu aabili,
Na tuli basinguzu ambweni ilasika kumakumi aali musanu aatatu;
Pele bunji bwayo makatazyo buyo amapenzi,
Nkaambo ilafwamba kumana, nkabela tulauluka.
Ngwani uuzi inguzu zyabukali bwako,
Abulemu bwako mboelede kuyoowegwa?
Kuti tujane moyo wabusongo.
Kofwida balanda bako buuya.
Ci fumo utukusye luzyalo lwako,
Kuti twiimbe cakukondwa mazuba esu oonse.
Utubotezye mbubonya mbuli mazuba ngowatupenzya,
Amyaka njetwakali kweenda mumafwabi.
Abulemu bwako kubana babo.
Milimo yamaanza esu ilondolwe kulinduwe,
Ii, londola milimo yamaanza esu.
Oyo uukede muciyubilo ca-Mupatikampatila
Ulakala mucenzule ca-Singuzuzyoonse.
Ndaamba aa-Jehova kuti, Macijilo aangu, ndilinga lyangu,
Ngu-Leza wangu ngonsyoma.
Nkaambo ulakuvuna mukakole kasikuteya,
Akubulwazi bunyonyoona.
Kunsi amababa aakwe nkoyooyubila;
Kusyomeka kwakwe kulakubeda intobo acikwabilizyo.
Niiba mivwi iiuluka isikati,
Nebuba bulwazi bweenda mumudima,
Neluba lunyonyooko lusaala ciindi cakalangabwaseme.
Bantu bali cuulu balawa kumbali lyako,
Azyuulu zili ikumi kujanza lyako lyalulyo,
Pele yebo, tacikooyookuswenenena pe.
Akubona impindu yabasizibi.
Mbowakaamba kuti, Jehova macijilo aangu,
Mbowakabika Mupati-kampatila abe cikalilo cako,
Abulwazi tabukooyooswena kucilao cako,
Kuti bakubambe munzila zyako zyoonse,
Kuti utalifumpuli kucituta cako kubbwe.
Syacanza anzoka uyoozilyataula ansi.
Mbwabikide moyo wakwe kulindime, njoomuvuna.
Njoomusumpula, nkaambo ulizi izina lyangu.
Njooba awe mumapenzi,
Njoomuvuna akumulemeka.
Njoomukutya boongozi,
Akumubonya lufutuko lwangu.
Ncibotu kulumba Jehova,
Akutembaula izina lyako, O Mupati-kampatila,
Kuluula luzyalo lwako cifumo,
Alusyomo lwako masiku,
Cakulizya kantimbwa akankobela,
Acakwiimbya malimba.
Nkaambo yebo, O Jehova, wandibotezya kukucita kwako,
Ndaimba cakukondwa kumilimo yamaanza aako,
Miyeeyo yako ilayoosya!
Mufubafuba tamvwisyi aya:
Aboonse bacita bubi balasyuuka,
Bayoonyonyoonwa kukabe kutamani,
