Mvwe luzyalo lwako cifumo,
Nkaambo ndisyoma nduwe.
Undizibye inzila njinjeelede kweenda,
Nkaambo kulinduwe nkombikide moyo wangu.
Undivune kulibasinkondoma, O Jehova,
Nkaambo mulinduwe monjubila.
Nkaambo nduwe Leza wangu.
Muuya wako mubotu undeenzye munzila iiluleme.
Undibusye, O Jehova, nkaambo kazina lyako;
Mubululami bwako gwisya buumi bwangu mumapenzi.
Muluzyalo lwako lobya basinkondoma;
Nyonyoona boonse bandipenzya,
Nkaambo ndi mulanda wako.
Ngonguwe uuiyisya maanza aangu inkondo
Aminwe yangu lumamba.
Ndoluzyalo lwangu, mampangala aangu,
Macijilo aangu, muvuni wangu;
Nintobo yangu, ngonsyoma,
Uubombya bantu bangu mumaanza aangu,
Amwana amuntu nomubamba?
Muntu uli mbuli muuya uuyooyegwa,
Mazuba aakwe ali mbuli cinzinzimwa ciindilila.
Ampa zilundu, zisuke busi.
Mwesya malabo, ubamwaisye;
Fusa mivwi yako, ubapilinganye.
Undifutule, undivune kumaanzi manji,
Kumaanza aabazwakule;
Bali amilomo iiwamba cabuyo;
Ijanza lyabo lyalulyo ndijanza lyabubeji.
Njookutembaula akankobela kali aminjeya iili ikumi,
Oopa bami lufutuko,
Oovuna Davida mulanda wako kupanga lyabubi.
Undifutule, undivune kumaanza aabazwakule,
Bali amilomo iiwamba cabuyo,
Ajanza lyabo lyalulyo ndijanza lyabubeji,
Bana besu balombe babe mbuli misamu iikula kubucece,
Abana besu basimbi mbuli mabwe mabeze aamuzyooko zyaŋanda yabwami.
Matala esu azule zilyo zyamisyobo misyobo,
Imbelele zyesu zizyale zyuulu amakumi aazyuulu mumeembelelo esu.
Kutabi uunjila canguzu mulinga, kutabi uuinka kulumamba;
Kutabi kweema mumigwagwa yesu.
Bali acoolwe bantu bajisi Jehova kuba Leza wabo!
Njookutembaula, O Leza Mwami wangu;
Njoolumba izina lyako lyoonse alyoonse.
Mazuba oonse njookulumba;
Njootembaula izina lyako lyoonse alyoonse.
Jehova mupati, uleelede kutembaulwa loko;
Bupati bwakwe tabumvwigwi.
Izyalani limwi liyooluula milimo yako kulilimwi,
Akukanana maleele aako aagambya.
Bulemu bupati bwa bwami bwako,
Amilimo yako iigambya, zyoonse nooziyeeya.
Bantu bayookanana inguzu zyancito zyako ziyoosya;
Ambebo njooluula bupati bwako.
Bayookankaizya impuwo yabubotu bwako bupati;
Bayooimbila bululami bwako cakukondwa.
Ulamuka kukalala, ulizwide luse.
Luzyalo lwakwe lulimwaikide kuzilenge zyakwe zyoonse.
Basalali bako bayookulongezya.
Bayooluula bulemu bwabwami bwako;
Bayookanana inguzu zyako;
Kuti bazibye bana ba-Adamu maleele aakwe,
Abulemu bwabupati bwabwami bwakwe.
Bwami bwako mbwami buteeli;
Bweendelezi bwako mbwamazyalani amazyalani,
Jehova ulasyomeka mumilimo yakwe yoonse,
Ngusiluzyalo mukucita kwakwe koonse,
Jehova ulatabilila boonse bawa,
Ulabusya boonse bawizuka,
Meso aaboonse alalangilila nduwe;
Ulabapa zilyo zyabo kuciindi ceelede.
Ulafumbatula ijanza lyako,
Ulakutya kusukama kwabaumi boonse.
Jehova uliluleme munzila zyakwe zyoonse,
Ulasalala mumilimo yakwe yoonse.
Boonse bamwiita calusinizyo.
Ulaswiilila cililo cabo akubafutula.
Pele basizibi boonse ulabanyonyoona,
Mulomo wangu ulaamba intembauzyo zya-Jehova;
Bantu boonse balumbe izina lyakwe lisalala lyoonse alyoonse.
Amutembaule Jehova!
Tembaula Jehova, O moyo wangu.
Njootembaula Jehova mubuumi bwangu boonse;
Njooimbila Leza wangu intembauzyo nencipona.
Na muntu waansi uutagwasyi,
Mubuzuba obo mbubonya makanze aakwe oonse alamana.
Uusyoma Jehova Leza wakwe,
Lwizi azyoonse zili mulindulo,
Uujisi lusyomo lyoonse,
Uubetekela bapenzegwa,
Uuabila basinzala zilyo.
Jehova ulaangununa baangidwe.
Jehova ulabonya boofu;
Jehova ulabusya bawizuka;
Jehova ulayandisya baluleme.
Jehova ulabamba beenzu,
Ulatabilila bamucaala abamukabafu,
Pele inzila yabasizibi ulainyonyoona.
Jehova nguuendelezya lyoonse;
Ngu-Leza wako, O Zioni, kumazyalani amazyalani.
Amutembaule Jehova!
Amutembaule Jehova!
Nkaambo ncibotu kwiimbila Leza wesu,
Nkaambo ngusiluzyalo, ulatembaulika.
Ulayobolola batandidwe ba-Israyeli.
Ulaanga zilonda zyabo,
Ulaziita zyoonse kumazina aazyo.
Busongo bwakwe tabubaliki.
Pele basizibi ulabalyataula ansi,
Amutembaule Leza wesu akantimbwa.
Nguubambila nyika imvula,
Nguumeneka bwizu azilundu.
Abana babacikwangala nebalila.
Tayandi maulu aamuntu.
Jehova ulabotelwa kulibaabo bamulemeka,
Kulibaabo basyoma luzyalo lwakwe.
Tembaula Jehova, O Jerusalemu;
Tembaula Leza wako, O Zioni.
Nkaambo wayumya minkulu yazitendele zyako;
Walongezya bana bako mukati kako.
Ulapa luumuno mucisi cako;
Ulakukutya bulotwe bubotu.
Ijwi lyakwe lilacijaana aluno.
Ulapa caandwa cituba mbuli lukobo,
Ulamwaya caandwa mbuli itwe,
Ulasisya civulamabwe cakwe mbuli minsuma.
Ngwani uukonzya kwiima kumpeyo yakwe?
Ula tuma ijwi lyakwe, ulazyeenzununa.
Ulaungya muuwo wakwe, lino maanzi alakunka.
Aba-Israyeli imbeta zyakwe amilazyo yakwe.
Tabezi imbeta zyakwe,
Amutembaule Jehova.
Amutembaule Jehova!
Amutembaule Jehova kujulu!
Amumutembaule aatuntukide!
Amumutembaule nyoonse nomakamu aakwe!
Amumutembaule, nozuba amwezi!
Amumutembaule, nyoonse nonyenyeezi zimweka!
Anywebo nomaanzi nomukede amajulu!
Nkaambo wakalailila, lino zyakalengwa,
Wakazibikila mugaano nguzitakonzyi kusotoka.
Nobauka bapati aboonse bali mumabbonze,
Mulilo acivulamabwe, caandwa asikunku,
Amuuwo uungisya uucita luyando lwakwe,
Nomisamu yamicelo, amakedari oonse,
Nobanyama aŋombe zyoonse,
Anywebo nomuyavula, abayuni bauluka;
Basilutwe ababetesi banyika;
Bakubusi abakamwale, Bacembele abanikenike!
Nkaambo izina lyakwe lilike ndipati,
Abulemu bwakwe bulainda nyika ajulu.
Kuti kube kutembaula kubasalali bakwe,
Nkokuti bana ba-Israyeli, musyobo ngwabikide munkombe.
Amutembaule Jehova!
Amwiimbile Jehova lwiimbo lupya,
Akumutembaula mumbungano yabasalali bakwe.
Bana ba-Zioni basekelele mwami wabo.
Batembaule izina lyakwe mukuzyana;
Bamwiimbile intembauzyo akalumbu andandala.
Babombumyoyo ulabasamika lufutuko,
Basalali basekelele mubulemu;
Baimbe cakukondwa amala aabo.
Kuti baliye bamasi inkoto,
Akutapatila misyobo,
Baange bami babo ankeetani,
Abasilutwe babo ansimbi,
Obu mbulemu bwabasalali bakwe boonse.
Amutembaule Jehova,
Amutembaule Jehova!
Amutembaule Leza mucikombelo cakwe.
Amumutembaule munguzu zyamajulu aakwe.
Amumutembaule nkaambo kamilimo yakwe mipati,
Amumutembaule nkaambo kabupati bwakwe buyoosya.
Amumutembaule cakulizya myeembo;
Amumutembaule akalumbu akankobela,
Amumutembaule azinamoondonga anyeele.
Amumutembaule ansaka zicokola,
Amumutembaule amayuwa.
Amutembaule Jehova!
Kuti bantu bazibe busongo alulayo,
Baswiilile majwi aakumvwisya,
Bululami, ambeta, aboololoki;
Kuti babombumyoyo bapegwe maanu,
Abalombe bajane luzibo alumvwisyo;
Kuti musongo aswiilile akuliyungizizya lwiiyo,
Asimaanu alijanine lulayo;
Bantu bamvwisye tusimpi azikozyano,
Majwi aabasongo atulabi twabo.
Pele bafubafuba balasampaula busongo alulayo.
Swiilila, mwanaangu, lulayo lwauso,
Alimwi utataalazyi mulao wabanyoko,
Nkaambo zila ba ingala kumutwe wako,
Aluwenje munsingo yako.
Utazumini,
Tujane bantu batakwe mulandu,
Tubamenenene mbuli abo baselukila mukabanda;
Lino tuyoojana zintu ziyandika,
Akuzuzya maanda esu imbono;
Waala ciselo cako munkamu yesu,
Toonse tube acikwama comwe buyo—
Kasya maulu aako kunzila zyabo;
Balafwambaanina kutila bulowa.
Ncobeni taakwe milimo kuteya kakole
Mumeso aamuyuni,
Pele bantu aba balalindila bulowa bwabo beni,
Basi jate buumi bwabo beni.
Ilanyanzya buumi bwabasikwiivuba,
Buloongolola mumasambalilo.
Atala amalambo bulaita,
Akumanjililo aamilyango yamunzi bulaamba kuti,
Inywe nomutezi, mulaleka lili kuyandisya kutaziba?
Anywebo nobasikasampusampu, kusampaula kulaleka lili kumubotezya?
Nobafubafuba mulaleka lili kusula luzibo?
Njoomutilila muuya wangu,
Njoomuzibya majwi aangu.
Ndakatandabika maanza aangu, pele teemwakaswiilila;
Akutabika myoyo yanu kukucenjezya kwangu.
Nkaambo kako ambebo njooseka kumapenzi aanu,
Njoomusampaula kuciindi cakuyoowa kwanu,
Buyoofu nibuyoomusikila mbuli iguwo,
Amapenzi aanu mbuli kambizi,
Nimuyoopenga akuciswa mumyoyo yanu.
Bayoondiyandaula, pele tabakooyoondijana.
Teebakasala kuyoowa Jehova;
Bakakaka kuswiilila lulayo lwangu,
Bakasampaula kucenjezya kwangu;
Bayookuta makanze aabo.
Nkaambo batezi kuleyauka kwabo kulabajaya,
Akuliiba kwabafubafuba kulabanyonyoona,
Pele abo baswiilila ndime bayookala kabotu,
Bayooba aluumuno cakutayoowa bubi.
Mwanaangu, na watambula majwi aangu,
Akubamba kabotu malailile aangu,
Na wacenjeka kutwi kwako kubusongo,
Akubika moyo wako kukumvwisya makani,
Na walilila kumvwa,
Akoongolola kuti ube amaanu,
Akubulangaula mbuli zintu ziyandika zisisidwe,
Ncobeni uyoomvwa kuyoowa Jehova,
Akujana luzibo lwa-Leza.
Mumulomo wakwe mulazwa luzibo abusongo.
Nintobo yabaabo beenda cakoololoka.
Akululamika migwagwa yabasalali bakwe.
Lino uyoomvwa bululami, alubeta,
Aboololoki, nkokuti ziyanda zibotu zyoonse.
Nkaambo busongo bulanjila mumoyo wako,
Aluzibo lulakubotezya;
Bupampu bulakutabilila;
Kuti zikuvune kunzila yabubi,
Akubantu baamba zipilingene,
Beenda mumigwagwa yamudima,
Babotelwa kucita zibi,
Bayandisya kupilingana kwabubi,
Bantu banzila zinyonyongene,
Beenda cakupilingana.
Zilakuvuna kumwanakazi sizibi,
Kumwanakazi uupilingene uuamba majwi aakoongelezya,
Uulubide cizuminano ca-Leza wakwe.
Nkaambo iŋanda yakwe itola kulufu,
Anzila zyakwe zitola kubusangu.
Tabapiluki munzila zyabuumi.
Akutobela migwagwa yabaluleme.
Nkaambo baluleme bayookala munyika; B
aololokede mbebayoosyaala mulinjiyo;
Pele basizibi bayoonyonyoonwa munyika,
Abasilweeno bayoogwisigwa.
Moyo wako ujatisye malailile aangu;
Nkaambo koongola, amyaka yabuumi,
Aluumuno, zilakuletela ezi zyoonse.
Uzyaangilile munsingo yako,
Akuzilemba acilembelo camunoyo wako.
Mumeso aa-Leza amuneso aabantu,
Utalifunkizyi kumaanu aako omwini.
Nkabela uyooenzya myeendelo yako.
Syoma Jehova akuleka bubi.
Kucita obo kulaponya mubili wako,
Kulakatalusya zifuwa zyako.
Akabalwebalwe wamicelo yako,
Azisinino zyako ziyoofwasuka waini.
Nekuba kulikataazya kukutapatila kwakwe,
ulamweempya, Alimwi ulanunsaula mwana umwi aumwi ngwatambula.
Uli acoolwe kufumbwa muntu uujana busongo,
Ayooyo uuvuba bupampu,
Ampindu yabo ilainda impindu yangolida.
Azintu zyoonse nzoyandisya tazyeelene abo,
Amujanza lyabo lyalumwensi muli buvubi abulemu,
Amigwagwa yabo yoonse njaluumuno.
Bali acoolwe boonse babujatisya,
Abupampu bwakwe mbobwakaimika ijulu.
Alimwi mayoba alalosya mume.
Mwanaangu, zitazwi kumeso aako;
Jatisya maanu abusongo.
Ziyookubeda buumi,
Amunkonde kunsingo yako.
Lino unooenda cakutayoowa,
Amaulu aako taakooyootezeleka.
Ciindi cakoona iŋonzi zyako zilanona.
Utayoowi mafwabi aakoongomokela,
Naaba mapenzi aabasizibi naasika.
Nkaambo Jehova uyooba lusyomo lwako,
Aboobo uyookasya maulu aako kucegwa.
Na ulakonzya kucita.
Koya, uboole junza, nkakupe; Anukuti ulicijisi kale.
Utayeeyi kucitila mweenzinyoko bubi,
Uukala calusyomo kumbali lyako.
Uutana kukucitila bubi.
Utabi amunyono kumuntu silunya,
Alimwi utatobeli inzila zyakwe,
Nkaambo muntu uupilingene ulasesemya Jehova,
Pele bantu baluleme mbobajisi lulayo lwakwe.
Pele cikalilo cabaluleme ulacilongezya,
Pele babombumyoyo ulabafwida luzyalo.
Pele bafubafuba balausigwa insoni.
Amubike myoyo yanu kuti muzibe makani;
Nkaambo ndamupa milumbe mibotu;
Mutaleki mulao wangu.
Ndakali mwanike uuyandika mumeso aabama,
Moyo wako ujatisye majwi aangu;
Bamba milao yangu, kuti upone;
Kolijanina busongo, kolijanina maanu;
Utalubi, utaleki majwi aamulomo wangu,
Kobuyandisya, lino buyookutabilila.
Kufumbwa ncolijanina, kolijanina luzibo.
Ubukakatile, kuti bukulemeke.
Buyoobika ingala iiebeka amutwe wako,
Buyookupa munsini wabulemu.
Swiilila, mwanaangu, akutambula majwi aangu,
Kuti myaka yabuumi bwako ivule.
Ndakwiiyisya inzila yabusongo;
Ndakweenzya mumigwagwa yabululami.
Alimwi na wazuzaana, tokooyootezemuka.
Jatisya lulayo, utaluleki;
Kakatila kulindulo, nkaambo mbobuumi bwako.
Utanjili munzila yabasizibi,
Nikuba kuya bweenda mumugwagwa wabantu babi.
Koileka; uteendi mulinjiyo;
Tozya kumbi, akwiindilila,
Nkaambo tabaoni cita bataanguna kucita bubi,
Iŋonzi zyabo zilacija, cita balebya bantu bamwi,
Nkaambo balalya cilyo cabubi,
Balanywa waini wabukali,
Uuya bungwengwemuka mane bwaca buzuba,
Tabezi, kuli butezi.
Mwanaangu, swiilila majwi aangu.
Cenjeka kutwi kwako kumakani ngendaamba.
Atazwi kumeso aako;
Koajatisya mukati kamoyo wako,
Nkaambo alaba buumi kuliboonse baajana,
Alaponya mibili yabo yoonse,
Bamba moyo wako cakucenjela loko,
Nkaambo mulinguwo mobuzwa buumi,
Sowa majwi aapilingene,
Kwaamba kutaluleme kube kule kulinduwe.
Meso aako alulame kulanga kunembo,
Azikoye zyako zilange kunembo lyako.
Kuti inzila zyako zyoonse zibe kabotu,
Leesya maulu aako kububi.
Mwanaangu, swiilila busongo bwangu;
Cenjeka kutwi kwako kululayolwangu;
Amilomo yako ijatisye luzibo.
Nkaambo milomo yamwanakazi wabuyo ilalosya buci,
Akwaamba kwakwe nkutete kwiinda mafuta,
Ulabosya mbuli ipanga litenda koonse koonse,
Intaamo zyakwe zilasisya kubusangu,
Tabiki moyo wakwe kunzila yabuumi;
Kweenda kwakwe nkwakupampalika, pele tezi.
Lino, nobana bangu, amundiswiilile;
Mutapambuki kumajwi aamulomo wangu,
Tantamuna inzila yako kulinguwe;
Utasweni kumulyango waŋanda yakwe;
Kuti utapi bambi bulemu bwako,
Utaabili batakwe buuya myaka yako;
Kuti bazwakule batakuti kumbono zyako,
Amilimo yako itasowegwi muŋanda yamuzwamasi,
Utatongeli kumamanino aabuumi bwako,
Kuciindi cakumana kwanguzu zyamubili wako,
Utaambi kuti, Maawe! Ndakasula lulayo,
Amoyo wangu wakasampaula lucenjezyo.
Teendakaswiilila majwi aabaiyi bangu,
Nekuba kucenjeka kutwi kwangu kulibaabo ibakandilaya.
Ndakasi nyonyooke loko
Akati kambungano yabantu.
Konywa maanzi kumukalo wako omwini,
Ameenda aakunka kucikala cako.
Sa ncibotu kuti maanzi aako amwaike?
Sa abe tulonga mumigwagwa?
Abe aako olike;
Atanywigwi kubeenzu mboli abo,
Sekelela amwanakazi wabulombe bwako.
Inkolo zyakwe zikukutye ciindi coonse;
Luyando lwakwe lulamye moyo wako lyoonse,
Sa ncibotu kulamwa kumwanakazi mweenzu, O mwanaangu?
Sa ncibotu kukumbatana amuzwakule?
Ngonguwe uulingula migwagwa yakwe yoonse,
Ulajatwa mutukole twazibi zyakwe mwini:
Ulanyonyooka mubufubafuba bwakwe bunji.
Na wasunsana mujanza amuzwakule,
Na wacegwa kumajwi aako omwini,
Akwaangwa kuzisyomezyo zyamilomo yako,
Lino cita obo, mwanaangu, kuti ulivune,
Nkaambo wawida mumaanza aamweenzinyoko.
Koya, ukalibombye, ukalikombelezye kumweenzinyoko.
Ankoye zyako zitavululati.
Kolivuna mbuli insya kumuvwimi,
Mbuli kayuni kumaanza aasikuteya,
Bona inzila zyalo, uliiye busongo,
Talujisi mwami,
Talujisi silutwe nanka mweendelezi,
Nekubaboobo lulabamba zilyo zyalo ciindi cacilimo,
Akucela bulilu bwalo kuciindi cakutebula.
Ulaleka lili koona, O mutolo?
Ulasinsimuka lili muŋonzi zyako?
Ndikumbate buniini, ndyokezye!
Ma! Bucete bulakusikila mbuli sikubba!
Kubula kulakujata mbuli silumamba!
Mwana wa-Saatani, muntu wabuyo,
Uleendeenda amyaambo iipilingene,
Ulatondeka amunwe.
Ulayeeya bubi ciindi coonse, Ulabusya inkondo,
Ulafwambaana kutyoka akubula musiliki.
Nkuzili zintu zili musanu acimwi Jehova nzyasulide,
Azintu zili musanu azibili zimusesemya:
Amaanza aatila bulowa bwabaabo batakwe mulandu,
Maulu aazuzaanina kububi,
Amuntu uubusya inkondo akati kababunyina.
Alimwi utaleki mulao wabanyoko.
Kozyaanga kumoyo wako lyoonse;
Kozisama munsingo yako.
Ciindi cakweendeenda zilakweenzya,
Ciindi cakoona zilakulindila,
Ciindi cakubuka zilakwaambauzya,
Kutapatila kwalulayo ninzila yabuumi.
Zilakuvuna kumwanakazi sizibi,
Mwanakazi muzwakule uuongelezya alulimi lwakwe.
Alimwi inkoye zyakwe zitakutoleleli.
Pele mwanakazi uukwetwe ulavwima buumi bwamuntu,
Sa muntu ulakonzya kubweza mulilo akaango kakwe
Akutapidwa zyakusama zyakwe?
Sa muntu ulakonzya kweenda atala amakala aamulilo,
Akutapya zituta zyakwe?
Mbwabede muntu uuya kumukamweenzinyina.
Taakwe uumwaampa uutajisi mulandu,
Bantu tabasampauli mubbi ciindi cakubba,
Na ulayanda kukutya moyo wakwe nkaambo kanzala,
Ulaliya imbono zyoonse zyamuŋanda yakwe,
Uucita obo ulalinyonyoona.
Ulajana macise abweeme,
Nkabela lusampuko lwakwe talukonzyi kuziminganizigwa,
Nkaambo ibbivwe lilabusya bukali bwamuntu,
Takonzyi kufwa buuya kuciindi cakuliya inkoto,
Takonzyi kulamwa inkombelezyo pe;
Takonzyi kuzumina, nekuba kuti waleta makulo manji.
Mwanaangu, jatisya majwi aangu;
Malailile aangu ayandike mumoyo wako,
Mulao wangu ube mbuli imboni yaliso lyako.
Kozilemba acilembelo camumoyo wako,
Ambila busongo kuti, Nduwe mucizi wangu;
Amaanu aambwe kuti muzwalani wako.
Aboobo ulavunwa kumwanakazi sizibi,
Kumwanakazi uupilingene uuamba majwi aakoongelezya,
Ndakali kumpulungwizyo yaŋanda yangu;
Ndakasondela kucimanga cangu;
Nkabela akati kabalombe
Kwakaboneka mukubusi iwakabula boongo.
Wakali kwiinda mumugwagwa kucooko cakwe,
Wakatola inzila yakuya kuŋanda yakwe,
Mumudima wamasiku.
Uusamide mbuli sikuvuula uuongelezya,
Maulu aakwe taakali kuŋanda.
Kumugwagwa, kucisambalilo,
Kumpanda zyoonse—koonse ulalindila.
Wamujata, wamumyonta,
Wamwaambila calunyansyo, wati,
Ndakalijisi zipaizyo zyakutontozya,

ingolida iisalala; Ncendenga ncibotu kwiinda insiliva loko,

Tapatila musongo; ulakuyanda.

Zyakuvola zyamululami zilatola kubuumi,

Uumuka kukalala mubotu kwiinda mulemu,
Ayooyo uuendelezya moyo wakwe mubotu kwiinda uuzunda munzi.
Makakata alawaalwa azibelo,
Pele Jehova nguukosola makani oonse.
Munsuma muyumu antoomwe aluumuno
Mubotu kwiinda iŋanda iizwide mapobwe ankondo.
Muzike musongo uleendelezya mwana uusya insoni,
Ulaabilwa lukono akati kababunyina,
Pele Jehova ulasunka myoyo.
Sikubisya ulaswiilila milomo yabuyo,
Amubeji ulabika moyo kululimi lupilingene.
Ayooyo uusekelela mumapenzi ulapegwa mulandu,
Bazukulu munsini wabacemele,
Abulemu bwabana mbamawisi.
Majwi aakulisumpula taelede mufubafuba,
Amilomo yakubeja tiielede mwami.
Kufumbwa nkwajokela ulajana coolwe,
Uulekelela mulandu ulayandaula luyando,
Pele oyo uuindulula makani ulapambukanya bayanduna.
Kutapatila kulabombya muntu musongo
Kwiinda zyuumo zili mwanda mubufubafuba,
Muntu mubi ulayandaula lupapilo luzutu,
Mutumwa uutakwe luzyalo ulatumwa kuyoomulwisya.
Ncibotu kuswanaana asuntwe uunyanzigwa bana bakwe
Kwiinda kuswanaana amufubafuba mububi bwakwe,
Bubi tabukooyoozwa muŋanda yakwe.
Kozwa buyo, inkondo niitana kubuka,
Boonse buyo ncisesemyo kuli-Jehova,
Na mufubafuba ulijisi muulo mujanza lyakwe wakuuzya busongo,
Cilagwasya buti na tajisi boongo?
Muzwalani ulayandisya kuziindi zyoonse,
Alimwi munyina wazyalilwa mapenzi.
Muntu uubula boongo ulapa citondezyo cakuliya,
Aboobo ulaba simulandu kubusyu bwamweenzinyina,
Uuyanda kubisya ulayanda inkondo,
Ayooyo uuamba cakulisumpula ulayandaula lunyonyooko,
Uupilingene mumoyo tajani bubotu,
Ayooyo uuli alulimi lusendekede ulawida mububi.
Mwana mufubafuba ulausya wisi,
Ayooyo uuzyala ciyanga tajisi kukondwa.
Moyo uukondwa musamu mubotu,
Pele muuya uutyokede ulayuminizya mubili.
Kuti apilinganye lubeta,
Pele meso aamufubafuba ali kumamanino aanyika,
Mwana mufubafuba ulausya wisi,
Ulaluzya moyo wabamuzyala,
Tacili cibotu kubikila baluleme mukuli;
Kuuma bantu balemu taciluleme.
Uutontozya moyo wakwe musongo,
Naba mufubafuba uumuna ulayeeyegwa kuti musongo;
Na wasinka milomo yakwe, ulicenjede.
Uulipambukanya ulayandaula zisusi zyakwe mwini,
Ulasowa kubeteka koonse kubotu.
Mufubafuba tabotelwi kumvwisya,
Ulayanda kuyubununa miyeeyo yamoyo wakwe buyo,
Na kwasika bubi, kasampusampu akalo kalasika;
Inzila zyuusya insoni zilaleta kusampaula.
Kasensa kabusongo nkalonga katuntumuna meenda.
Nanka kukakila muntu uululeme kubetekwa kabotu,
Milomo yamufubafuba ilaleta inkondo;
Mulomo wakwe ulaita mibunda.
Mulomo wamufubafuba ndunyonyooko lwakwe;
Milomo yakwe mwini ilamuca.
Majwi aasikuvwiya ali mbuli cilyo cinono,
Alanjila mukati loko.
Muntu mutolo mumilimo yakwe
Ngumweenzinyina sikunyonyoona.
Mululami ulacijila kulinjiyo, aboobo ulafutuka,
Imbono zyamuntu muvubi ngumunzi wakwe muyumu;
Zili mbuli bulambo bulamfu bwakumuvuna,
Lunyonyooko ka luta na kusika, moyo wamuntu ulalisumpula;
Pele kulibombya kulazulwida bulemu.
Na muntu wavuwa katana kumvwa,
Mbufubafuba bwakwe ansoni.
Moyo wamuntu ulayumuna bulwazi,
Pele moyo uutyokede, ngwani uukonzya kuuyumuna?
Akutwi kwamusongo kulayandaula luzibo,
Cilamusisya kubusyu bwabantu balemu,
Uutaanguna kwaamba uliluleme,
Mane mweenzinyina asike akumulingula.
Makakata alalesya kukazyanya,
Alaandaanya basinguzu,
Uugwasigwa munyina uli mbuli munzi muyumu,
Pele kukazyanya kuli mbuli impanda zyangazi,
Kumicelo yamulomo wakwe muntu ulakuta;
Iizwa kumilomo yakwe ilamukutya.
Kufumbwa baluyanda balalya micelo yalo,
Kufumbwa uujana mwanakazi wajana cintu cibotu,
Ulajana coolwe kuli-Jehova.
Pele bavubi balavuwa cabukali,
Pele kuli muzwalani umwi walusinizyo kwiinda munyoko.
Mubotu kwiinda muntu uupilingene kukwaamba mufubafuba.
Muntu uufwambaana kweenda ulapambuka munzila zyakwe,
Elyo moyo wakwe ulakalalila Jehova,
Buvubi bulaletela muntu bazwalani banji,
Pele mutengwana ulasyaala alike buyo,
Uuyooya zyakubeja takooyoolivuna.
Bantu banji balakombelezya muntu syacaaba,
Alimwi bantu boonse balayandisya muntu sikupa.
Mucete beenzinyina boonse balamusula;
K waambisya bazwalani bakwe balamusia kule;
Ulabatobela amajwi, pele tabeenzyi pe,
Uuvuba busongo ulaliyanda;
Uubika moyo wakwe kukumvwisya ulajana coolwe,
Uuyooya zyakubeja uyoonyonyooka.
Kwaambisya muzike teelede kweendelezya balemu.
Ulayandisya kulekelela milandu.
Bukali bwamwami buli mbuli kuvuta kwamulavu,
Pele kukondwa kwakwe kuli mbuli mume abwizu.
Mwana mufubafuba ulanyonyoona wisi;
Kukazyanya kwamwanakazi kuli mbuli mandomondomo aamvula,
Pele mwanakazi uucenjede ulazwa kuli-Jehova.
Butolo bulatola muŋonzi impati;
Mutolo ulafwa inzala,
Uusampaula inzila zyakwe ulajayigwa.
Ulamupa bulumbu bweelede milimo yakwe,
Koma mwana wako necicikonzeka kumweempya;
Utabiki moyo wako kulunyonyooko lwakwe.
Muntu mukali ulapegwa mulandu;
Na wamuvuna, ulaindulula alimwi.
Swiilila lulayo akutambula lwiiyo,
Kuti ujane busongo kumamanino.
Pele makanze aa-Jehova ngaayooima nji,
Luzyalo nceciyandwa mumuntu;
Muntu mutengwana mubotu kwiinda sikubeja.
Uukujisi ulakuta,
Takooyooswayigwa bubi.
Muntu mutolo ulasuna insima mumutiba,
Lino takonzyi kulilisika ajanza kumulomo wakwe,
Uma sikasampusampu, lino uutaiyide ulajana busongo;
Tapatila muntu uucenjede, lino ulajana luzibo.
Uubisizya wisi akutanda banyina
Ngumwana uusya insoni.
Kuti utaleyi kumajwi aaluzibo.
Kamboni wabuyo ulasampaula lubeta;
Mulomo wabasizibi ulalya bubi.
Basikasampusampu babambilwa milandu,
Amisana yabafubafuba yabambilwa mibunda.
Kufumbwa uuenwa kulinzizyo tali musongo.
Bukali bwamwami buli mbuli kuvuluma kwamulavu;
Uumukalazya ulalibisizya mwini.
Pele bafubafuba boonse balayandisya kukazyanya.
Mutolo talimi ciindi campeyo;
Kuciindi cakutebula ulakumbila akutajana.
Makanze aamumoyo wamuntu ali mbuli maanzi malamfu,
Pele muntu uucenjede ulaayubununa.
Pele muntu uusyomeka ulajanwa kuli?
Muntu uululeme uuenda cakoololoka,
Bali acoolwe bana bakwe baboola musule lyakwe.
Mwami uukede acuuno cakubetekela
Ulamwaisya bubi boonse ameso aakwe.
Ndasalazya moyo wangu,
Ndasalala kuzwa kuzibi zyangu.
Zipimyo zyaandeene azyeelesyo zyaandeene,
Zyoonse zilasesemya kuli-Jehova.
Na ncacita cililuleme akusalala.
Jehova wakazilenga zyoonse buyo.
Bbanuna meso aako, kuti ukute zilyo.
“Ncibi, ncibi” mbwaamba sikuula,
Pele ainka, ulalikankaizya.
Ingolida amabwe aarubi aabalangala, nkuzili zinji,
Pele mulomo waluzibo nguuyandika loko.
Tola cikobela camuntu na wasyomezya mweenzu;
Umujatisye na wasyomezya kuliyila bazwakule.
Cilyo cijanwa mulweeno cili amucanka uulweela,
Pele kumamanino mulomo ulazula lubwebwele.
Lulayo lulayandwa kuti makanze azuzikizigwe;
Busongo bwakulibamba bulayandwa mukucita inkondo.
Uuendeenda cakuvwiya ulayubununa makani aasisidwe;
Utaliswanaanyi amuntu uuamba cabufubafuba.
Ilampi lyakwe liyoozimina mumudima uusia mbi.
Tazikwe coolwe kumamanino.
Lindila Jehova, kuti akugwasye.
Zipimyo zyaandeene zilasesemya kuli-Jehova;
Zyeelesyo zyakweenya tazili zibotu.
Muntu amvwisye buti inzila yakwe?
Tacili cibotu kufwambaana kusalazya cintu,
Na musule uciyeeya zikonke zyako.
Mwami musongo ulapupulula basizibi,
Akubaziya amavili aakwe,
Muuya wamuntu ndilampi lya-Jehova,
Lilalingula moonse mukati kamoyo.
Luzyalo alusinizyo nzezibamba mwami;
Cuuno cakwe cilikazikidwe aluzyalo.
Bulemu bwabakubusi ninguzu zyabo,
Pele kweebeka kwabapati nimvwi zyabo.
Zyuumo zicisa zilagwisya bubi;
Mibunda ilasalazya mukati kamoyo.
Moyo wamwami nkalonga kamaanzi mujanza lya-Jehova,
Ulakatola kufumbwa nkwayanda.
Pele Jehova nguulingula myoyo.
Cilayandika kuli-Jehova kwiinda zipaizyo.
Meso aalikankaizya amoyo uulisumpula,
Ilampi lyabasizibi, zyoonse nzibi.
Makanze aabasungu alaleta zilyo zinji,
Pele uufwanzya makani ulajana bucete buyo.
Kujana imbono kululimi lwakubeja
Ngusikunkwe uumwaika akakole kalufu,
Lunyonyongano lwabasizibi lulabatolelela,
Nkaambo bakaka kucita bululami.
Inzila yabasikasampusampu ilipilingene,
Pele milimo yabasalali ililuleme.
Kukala acooko cakulululi lwaŋanda nkubotu
Kwiinda kukala amwanakazi silwaambwe muŋanda impati,
Mweenzinyina tafwidwi buuya kulinguwe.
Na sikasampusampu wakomwa, uutaiyide ulaiya;
Na musongo waiyigwa, ulajata luzibo.
Basizibi balawisigwa mulunyonyooko.
Alakwe uyoolila akutamvwigwa.
Cipo cakusisikizya cilalesya bukali;
Makulo aamunkomo alamanya lunyemo lupati.
Makani naabetekwa kabotu, cilabotezya baluleme,
Pele cilayoosya ucita zibi.
Muntu uuleya munzi la yabusongo
Uyoolyokezya akati kabafu.
Uuyandisya misobano uyooba mucete;
Uuyandisya waini amafuta takooyooba muvubi pe,
Abasilweeno balatola milandu yabaololokede.
Ncibotu kukala munyika yacimpayuma
Kwiinda kuba amwanakazi silubweko.
Pele muntu mufubafuba ulazimwayaula.
Ulajana buumi abulemu.
Musongo ulalwisya munzi wabasintaze,
Ulawisya buyumu bwaŋanda njebakali kusyoma.
Uubamba kabotu mulomo wakwe alulimi lwakwe
Ulalivuna kumapenzi.
Sikulisumpula uulikankaizya, izina lyakwe ngusikasampusampu;
Ulacita cabukali acakulisumpula.
Cisusi camutolo cilamujaya,
Nkaambo maanza aakwe alakaka kubeleka,
Ciindi coonse sizibi uleemuzya,
Pele mululami ula pa, takasyi pe.
Cipaizyo casizibi cilasesemya,
Kwaambisya na wacileta amoyo wabubi.
Kamboni sikubeja ulanyonyooka,
Pele majwi aamuntu uuswiilila alakalilila,
Muntu sizibi ulayumya busyu bwakwe,
Pele uululeme ulayeeya kabotu inzila zyakwe.
Taakwe busongo, taakwe luzibo,
Taakwe lulayo lukonzya kubisizya Jehova.
Ibbiza lilabambilwa buzuba bwa nkondo,
Pele Jehova nguupa lufutuko.
Izina bbotu lilayandika kwiinda buvubi bunji,
Aluzyalo ndubotu kwiinda insiliva angolida.
Jehova ngumulengi wabo boonse.
Pele bataiyide balaindilila aboobo balapenga.
Kulibombya akuyoowa Jehova
Kulaleta buvubi abulemu abuumi.
Pele uulibamba kabotu uli kule kulinzizyo.
Iyisya mwana aende munzila iielede,
Lino akomena takooyooleya mulinjiyo.
Muvubi uleendelezya mutengwana;
Sizikoloto ngumuzike wasikukolotya.
Musako wabukali bwakwe ulamaninina.
Syacaaba ulajana coolwe,
Nkaambo ulaabana zilyo zyakwe abatengwana.
Tanda sikasampusampu, lino inkondo ilamana;
Kukazyanya akulwana zyoonse zilaleka.
Uuyandisya kusalala kwamoyo, alimwi uli amwaambo waluzyalo,
Mwami ulaba muzwalani wakwe,
Meso aa-Jehova alalanga luzibo,
Pele ulanyonyoona majwi aabasilweeno,
Mutolo ulaamba kuti, Kuli mulavu anze!
Njoojayilwa mumigwagwa.
Uukalalilwa Jehova ulawida mulincico.
Bufubafuba bulaangidwe mumoyo wamwana,
Pele musako wakukomya ulabutanda,
Ayooyo uupa bavubi, ulasikilwa kubula buyo.
Cenjeka kutwi kwako, ukaswiilile majwi aabasongo;
Bika moyo wako kuluzibo lwangu;
Nkaambo cilabota na wabamba makani mukati kako,
Alimwi oonse alibambidwe kumilomo yako.
Kuti usyome Jehova,
Ncencico ncindakuzibisya makani aya ayebo sunu.
Sa nsina kukulembela makani aali makumi otatwe,
Makani aalulayo aluzibo,
Uvuwe majwi aalusinizyo kulibaabo bakutuma.
Nekuba kuuma bapengede mumulyango,
Akunyanzya basikubanyanzya buumi.
Utatangi buzwalani amuntu mukati,
Nekuba kweenda amuntu silunyemo,
Kuti utaiyi inzila zyakwe,
Akulyaanga mukakole.
Utabi umwi wabaabo bapa zitondezyo,
Basyomezya kuliyila basizikoloto.
Na wabula cakuliya,
Sa ncibotu kunyanzigwa bulo bwako?
Utasunzululi munyinza wakale
Ngobakabika bamauso,
Oyo muntu ulaima kunembo lyabami,
Takooyooima kunembo lyabantu buyo pe.
Na wakala kukulya amweendelezi,
Yeeya kabotu cilyo ncowabikilwa;
Lino utaingani,
Na uli sindya;
Utasukami zilyo zyakwe zilweela,
Nkaambo nzilyo zyalweeno.
Leka mubusongo bwako,
Imbono zyabonwa buyo, zilamana ndilyonya,
Zilalicitila mababa,
Zilauluka mbuli sikwaze uuya kujulu,
Utasukami zilyo zyakwe zilweela;
Nkaambo ulayeeya-yeeya mumoyo wakwe,
Ulaamba kuti, Kolya akunywa,
Nekubaboobo moyo wakwe tuuli ayebo.
Minsuma njowalya ulailuka,
Alimwi ulasowa buyo majwi aako mabotu,
Nkaambo ulasampaula busongo bwamajwi aako,
Utasunzululi munyinza wakale,
Nekuba kunjila mumyuunda yabamucaala,
Ulabeteka makani aabo kulinduwe,
Bika moyo wako kululayo,
Akucenjeka kutwi kwako kumajwi aaluzibo,
Utakaki kukoma mwana;
Na wamuuma amusako, takoofwa pe;
Ulavuna buumi bwakwe kulufu.
Mwanaangu, na moyo wako uli abusongo,
Moyo wangu ambebo ulakondwa.
Njookondwa mukati kansa zyangu,
Na milomo yako ilaamba ziluleme.
Moyo wako utafwidi basizibi ibbivwe,
Pele kaka tila kukuyoowa Jehova buzuba boonse,
Nkabela bulangizi bwako tabukooyooloba,
Swiilila, mwanaangu, ujate busongo;
Enzya moyo wako munzila,
Nanka akati kamadyanyama,
Nkaambo mukolwi asindya bayoosikilwa bucete,
Alimwi butolo bulasamika muntu madeludelu.
Alimwi utasampauli banyoko na bacembaala.
Koula lusinizyo, utaluulisyi pe;
Koula busongo alulayo abupampu.
Wisi mululami ulasekelela loko;
Uuzyala musongo ulajana kukondwa mulinguwe,
Uso abanyoko basekelele;
lwakakuzyala akondwe.
Mwanaangu, undipe moyo wako;
Meso aako alange inzila zyangu,
Nkaambo mwanakazi muvuule ncilindi cilamfu;
Mwanakazi uuzwakule mugodi uusyanikide,
Ulalindila mbuli sikubba,
Ulavuzya batasyomeki akati kabantu.
Ngwani uuli ankondo? Ngwani uuli akutongauka?
Ngwani uuli amibunda katakwe kaambo?
Ngwani uuli ameso aasalala pyu?
Mbembabo bakala ciindi cilamfu kukunywa,
Baya kukuyandaula waini uuvwelene,
Utalangi waini ciindi naasalala,
Naanjoloma munkomeki,
Naatelemuka kabotu.
Kumamanino ulaluma mbuli inzoka,
Ulazapula mbuli cipile.
Meso aako alabona zintu ziyoosya,
Amoyo wako ulaamba makani aapilingene.
Ulaba mbuli muntu uulala mukati kalwizi,
Na mbuli muntu uulala akasamu kandembela.
Bakandiyasa pele teendakamvwa,
Nsinsimuke lili?
Nkayandaule cakunywa alimwi.
Utafwidi bantu babi ibbivwe;
Utasukami kuba abo;
Nkaambo myoyo yabo ilayeeya lunyonyongano,
Amilomo yabo ilaamba zitaluleme.
Iŋanda ilayasigwa busongo,
Ilaimikwa amaanu;
Kuluzibo twaanda twayo tulazuzigwa
Imbono zyoonse ziyandika zibotezya.
Muntu musongo mubotu kwiinda sintaze;
Luzibo ndubotu kwiinda inguzu;
Nkaambo busongo mbobugwasya kucita inkondo.
Alimwi muli basinkuta banji molwanwa lufutuko.
Busongo tabweenzeki kumufubafuba;
Tajuli mulomo wakwe kumulyango.
Uukanza kucita bubi
Ulaambwa kuti ngusilupyopyongano.
Sikasampusampu ulasesemya bantu,
Na wawizuka mubuzuba bwamapenzi,
Inguzu zyako zyaceya,
Futula abo baya budadalika kukujayigwa.
Sa oyo uulingula myoyo tayeeyi?
Uubamba buumi bwako, sa tezi?
Sa tabweedezezyi muntu bulumbu bweelede milimo yakwe?
Mwanaangu, kolya buci, nkaambo mbubotu.
Mulolo wacimbulwe ulalweela kululimi lwako.
Mbobubede busongo kumoyo wako;
Wabujana, uyooba acoolwe kumamanino;
Bulangizi bwako tabukooyooloba.
Utabi sizibi uulindila kukubisizya iŋanda yamululami.
Utanyonyongani cikalilo cakwe.
Pele basizibi balawisigwa mukati kamapenzi.
Utasekeleli na sinkondonyoko wawa;
Moyo wako utakondwi na walebwa;
Ambweni Jehova abona cilabija mumeso aakwe,
Aboobo ulakupilusizya bukali bwakwe,
Utalipenzyi nkaambo kabasikucita bubi;
Utafwidi ba sizibi ibbivwe;
Ilampi lyabasizibi liyoozima.
Utabakalazyi boonse,
Nkaambo mapenzi aloongomoka kubuka kulimbabo,
Lino ngwani uuzi lunyonyooko ndubakonzya kuleta?
Tacili cibotu kusalaula mukubeteka makani.
Ulatukilwa kubantu akusesemya kuzisi zyoonse;
Pele basikutapatila basizibi balabotelwa,
Balajana coolwe cibotu,
Uuvuwa majwi aaluleme
Ngusikumyonta milomo.
Bamba milimo yako anze;
Bamba zintu zyoonse mumyuunda;
Wamana obo, yaka iŋanda yako.
Uteeni kumilomo yako;
Ndakainda kumuunda wamutolo,
Akumasaansa aamuntu uutakwe boongo;
Nyika yoonse yavumbwa lweemya,
Abwalo bulambo bwamabwe bwakamwaika.
Lino ne ndakabona, ndakabika moyo wangu kumakani;
Ndakalanga, ndatambula lwiiyo,
Ndikumbate buniini, ndyokezye!
Ma! Bucete bulakusikila mbuli sikubba!
Kubula kulakujata mbuli silumamba!
Ntootu tusimpi atumwi twa-Solomoni ntubakalembulula bantu baHezekiya mwami wa-Juda.
Pele kuyubununa makani nkokulemeka bantu,
Kujulu nkulamfu, ayalo nyika yalampa ansi;
Mbubonya obo myoyo yabami tiiyubunuki.
Na wagwisya mankwisila munsiliva,
Mulazwa cibelesyo camufuzi;
Na wagwisya basizibi kumeso aamwami,
Cuuno cakwe cilaimikwa nji mubululami,
Nekuba kwiima mubusena bwabalemu,
Nkaambo ncibotu kwaambilwa kuti, Swena okuno,
Kwiinda kufwinsigwa kumeso aamweendelezi.
Ncaabwene meso aako,
Nkaambo ulacitanzi kumamanino,
Na mweenzinyoko wakuusya bweeme?
Utayubununi makani aasisidwe aamuntu umbi;
Ambweni uukuswiilila ulakuusya insoni,
Nkabela bweeme bwako tabukooyoomana.
Mbuli micelo yangolida mucisuwo cansiliva,
Mbwaabede majwi aambwa kuciindi ceelede.
Mbuli bunono bwangolida nanka cilisakatizyo cangolida loko,
Mbwabede sikutapatila musongo kukutwi kuswiilila,
Mbuli caanda citontola kuciindi cakutebula,
Mbwabede mutumwa uusyomeka kulibaabo bamutuma;
Ulabusya myoyo yabami bakwe.
Mbwabede muntu uulisumpwida cipo cakweena.
Kukazika moyo nkoongelezya mweendelezi;
Lulimi Iutete lulabombya zifuwa.
Na wajana buci, kolya mbokweelede;
Atene ulakutisya, ulaluka.
Maulu aako ateendi lyoonse kuŋanda yamweezinyoko,
Kuti atakucimwi akukusula,
Mbwabede muntu uulengelela mweenzinyina kaambo cakubeja.
Kuli mbuli lino ibbi nanka mweendo uutezemuka.
Na mbuli ndulwe acilonda,
Mbwabede uuimbila moyo uusa.
Afwa nyota, umunywisye;
Nkabela Jehova uyookulumbula.
Muuwo wakunyika ulaleta imvula;
Lulimi luvwiya lulaleta busyu bukali.
Kukala acooko calululi lwaŋanda nkubotu
Kwiinda kukala amwanakazi silwaambwe muŋanda impati,
Mbuli maanzi aatontola kumuntu uukateede,
Mbwaabede makani mabotu aazwa kucisi cakule.
Mbwabede muntu uululeme uuzumizya basizibi.
Utalemezyi bantu loko.
Mbuli munzi uumwayidwe uubula bulambo,
Mbwabede muntu uuteendelezyi moyo wakwe.
Bulemu tabweelede mufubafuba.
Mbuli kayuni kapembelela, na mbuli sikamembya mukuuluka kwakwe,
Mbulubede lutuko lwabuyo; talusiki pe,
Ciswepu cileelede ibbiza, lubulo luleelede mukanwa lyambongolo,
Amusako uleelede musana wamufubafuba.
Kuti uteelani awe ayebo.
Vuwa mufubafuba mbuli bufubafuba bwakwe,
Kuti atasongwaali mumeso aakwe mwini.
Uutuma makani kumulomo wamufubafuba
Ulakosola zituta zyakwe, alimwi ulanywa lunyonyongano.
Maulu aacilema alalengelela buyo;
Mbukabede kasimpi mumilomo yabafubafuba.
Mbuli muntu uuanga ibbwe munkwilipo,
Mbwabede uupa mufubafuba bulemu,
Mbuli bumvwa buyasa ijanza lyamukolwi,
Mbukabede kasimpi mumilomo yabafubafuba,
Mbuli simata uuyasa boonse buyo,
Mbwabede muntu uubelesya mufubafuba ayooyo uubelesya mweendanzila.
Mbwabede mufubafuba uuindulula bufubafuba bwakwe,
Sa ulibwene muntu musongo mumeso aakwe mwini?
Mufubafuba ulasyomeka kwiinda nguwe.
Mutolo ulaamba kuti, Kuli mulavu munzila,
Kuli butambo mumigwagwa!
Mbuli ikoma mbolizumuka,
Mbwabede mutolo abulo bwakwe,
Mutolo ulanjizya ijanza lyakwe mumbede,
Pele cilamukataazya kuliboozya kumulomo wakwe,
Mutolo musongo mumeso aakwe mwini
Kwiinda bantu bali musanu ababili bezi kuvuwa kabotu,
Uukazyanya munkondo iitali yakwe
Uli mbuli uujata mubwa kumatwi uuinda.
Mbuli sicinsondo uuwaala-waala zisisi amivwi alufu,
Akwaamba kuti, Ndasekana buyo.
Na taakwe inkuni, mulilo ulazima;
Na taakwe sikuvwiya, inkondo ilamana.
Mbwabede sikukazyanya kukubusya inkondo.
Alanjila mukati kabula.
Mbwiibede milomo myuuba antoomwe amoyo mubi.
Uusula akuupaupa amilomo
Akusisa lweeno mumoyo wakwe,
Nekuba kuti ulaamba cabuuya, utamusyomi,
Nkaambo muli zisesemyo zili musanu azibili mumoyo wakwe;
Nekuba kuti lusulo lwakwe lulisisidwe alweeno,
Bubi bwakwe bulayubununwa mumbungano yabantu,
Uukunkulisya ibbwe, lilamupilukila.
Amulomo muuba ulaleta lunyonyooko.
Nkaambo tozi na buzuba bulaleta nzi.
Muntu umbi akutembaule, mulomo wako omwini pe;
Mweenzu, kutali kumilomo yako,
Pele bukali bwamufubafuba mbulemu kwiinda zyoonse.
Pele ibbivwe, ngwani uukonzya kwiima kulindilyo?
Nkubotu kwiinda luyando lusisidwe.
Kuyasa kwamuzwalani kulasyomeka,
Pele imyonto zyasinkondonyoko zilavula.
Muntu uukutide ulasesemwa buci,
Pele kulisinzala zintu zilula zyoonse nzinono,
Mbwabede muntu uuswekede kuzwa kulinguwe,
Mafuta atununkilizyo zilabotezya moyo;
Mbulubede lulayo lwamweenzinyoko uuyandika.
Mweenzinyoko, amweenzinyina uso, utabalekelezyi;
Alimwi utayi kuŋanda yamunyoko mubuzuba bwamapenzi.
Mweenzinyoko uuli kufwaafwi mubotu
Kwiinda munyoko uuli kule.
Kuti mbe aluvwiilo kuliyooyo uundisampaula.
Pele bataiyide balaindilila aboobo balapenga,
Nyanzya muntu cikobela cakwe na wasyomezya kuliyila mweenzu; Umujate na walisyomezya mumwanakazi muzwakule.
Cilaambwa kuti ulatuka buyo,
Mbuli mandomondomo mubuzuba bwamvula,
Mbwabede mwanakazi sikukazyanya;
Uumukasya ulakasya muuwo,
Uli mbuli mafuta mumaanza aakwe.
Lubulo lulanona lubulonyina,
Mbubonya obo muntu ulanona busyu bwamweenzinyina,
Ayooyo uubamba simalelaakwe ulalemekwa,
Mbuli busyu mbububoneka mumaanzi,
Mbubonya obo moyo wamuntu mbuuboneka kumuntunyina.
Kwacimvumwe alufu tazikuti;
Aalo meso aamuntu taakuti,
Cuumpilo ncansiliva, ceengelo ncangolida,
Pele muntu ulasunkwa kumpuwo yakwe,
Nekuba kuti watwa mufubafuba muncili amunsi antoomwe amaila, Bufubafuba bwakwe tabumani pe,
Ncobeni uleelede kuziba imbelele zyako mbozibede,
Akubika moyo wako kumatanga aako;
Nkaambo imbono tazikalilili lyoonse,
Amunsini tuuli kumazyalani oonse.
Bwizu bwamana kuligwa, mweemvwe ulamena,
Azisyu zyakuzilundu zyacelwa,
Tubelele tulakupa zyakusama,
Ampongo zilaleta muulo wamuunda;
Malili aampongo alakuvulila,
Alaba zilyo zyabasiŋanda bako
Akulela bana bako basimbi,
Basizibi balacija nekuba kuti taakwe uubatanda,
Pele baluleme balaima mbuli mulavu.
Na cisi cabisya, cilijisi beendelezi banji,
Pele mumaanza aabantu basongo abasiluzibo cilakalilila,
Uli mbuli imvula yamucobocobo litapi zilyo.
Pele basikubamba mulao balakazyanya abo.
Pele basikuyandaula Jehova balamvwisya.
Muntu mutengwana uuenda cakululama
Mubotu kwiinda muntu muvubi uupilingene.
Uubamba mulao mwana musongo,
Pele uuenda abasindya ulausya wisi insoni.
Uuvuzya imbono zyakwe kukujana impindu zyazikwelete
Ulaziyobweda sikufwida bacete luzyalo.
Acikombyo cakwe cilaba cisesemyo.
Ulawida mumonya mucilindi ncaakasya,
Pele baluleme balajana lukono lubotu,
Muntu muvubi musongo mumeso aakwe mwini,
Pele mutengwana uucenjede ulamvwisya mbwabede.
Na baluleme bazunda, bulemu bulavula,
Pele na basizibi babuka, bantu balayuba,
Uusisa milandu yakwe takooyooba acoolwe pe,
Pele oyo uulyaambawida akuleka ulafwidwa luzyalo.
Uli acoolwe muntu uuyoowa lyoonse,
Pele oyo uuyumya moyo wakwe ulawida mumapenzi.
Mbwabede muntu mubi uuendelezya bacete.
Silutwe uubula busongo ulapenzya loko,
Pele oyo uusula impindu iitaluleme uloongola.
Muntu uuli amulandu wabulowa bwamweenzinyina,
Acije akusikila kulufu;
Kutabi muntu uumugwasya,
Uuenda cakululama ulafutulwa,
Pele uupilingene munzila zyakwe ulawida mucilindi.
Uulima nyika yakwe ulakuta cilyo,
Pele uutobela zintu zyabuyo ulakuta bucete.
Muntu uusyomeka ulaba azyoolwe zinji,
Pele uufwaamba kuvuba ulajana mulandu.
Muntu ulabisya kuti ajane kalyo,
Syacivulamwangu ulafwamba kujana imbono,
Pele tezi kuti kubula kulamusikila,
Uutapatila muntu, kumamanino ulayandwa,
Kwiinda oyo uubombeka-bombeka alulimi lwakwe,
Kufumbwa uubbida wisi abanyina,
Akwaamba kuti, Taakwe mulandu,
Oyo ngumweenzinyina sikunyonyoona,
Pele uusyoma Jehova ulaneneesegwa,
Uusyoma moyo wakwe mwini mufubafuba,
Pele oyo uuenda mubusongo ulavunwa,
Uuabila batengwana takooyoobula,
Pele uusisa meso aakwe ulajana intuko zinji,
Na basizibi babuka, bantu balayuba,
Pele na banyonyooka, baluleme balavula.
Muntu uucenjezegwa, nekubaboobo uciyumya moyo wakwe,
Ulafwamba kunyonyooka cakutabuka alimwi,
Na baluleme basumpulwa, bantu balasekelela,
Pele na basizibi mbobeendelezya, bantu balatongela.
Pele uuenda abasikuvuula ulasowaila imbono.
Kukubeteka kabotu mwami ulabusya nyika, Pele sikulya makulo ulainyonyoona.
Muntu uuongelezya mweenzinyina
Ulateya buzamba kumaulu aakwe,
Muntu sizibi ulacegwa mumilandu yakwe,
Pele muntu uululeme ulaimba cakukondwa,
Pele sizibi tamvwisyi aya makani.
Basikasampusampu balabusya inkondo mumunzi,
Pele basongo balalesya bukali.
Na musongo ulakazyanya amufubafuba,
Mufubafuba ulabwanta akuseka buyo, taakwe luumuno.
Basikujaya bantu balasula uululeme,
Pele baololokede balayanda kumuvuna.
Mufubafuba ulaamba bukali bwakwe boonse,
Pele musongo ulabukasya akubutontozya.
Na mweendelezi waswiilila makani aalweeno,
Basilutwe bakwe boonse balaba babi.
Jehova nguumunikila meso aaboonse buyo.
Cuuno cabwami bwakwe ciyooima nji,
Musako akutapatila, zilaleta busongo,
Pele mwana uulekelelwa buyo ulausya banyina insoni.
Pele baluleme bayoobona buwe bwabo.
Uyooletela moyo wako kubotelwa.
Pele uli acoolwe kufumbwa uubamba mulao.
Majwi luzutu taakonzyi kwiiyisya mulanda;
Kumvwa ulamvwa, pele tabiki moyo kumakani,
Sa ulibwene muntu uufwanzya kwaamba?
Mufubafuba ulasyomeka kwiinda nguwe.
Uulela kabotu mulanda wakwe kuzwa kubwanike,
Kumamanino uyooba sikulyazina lyakwe.
Muntu mukali ulabusya inkondo,
Amuntu sinkazi ulavuzya milandu.
Pele mubombumoyo ulajana bulemu,
Lutuko ulilumvwide, pele tayubununi makani.
Pele uusyoma Jehova ulakala kabotu.
Bantu banji balayandaula kubotezya mweendelezi,
Pele kuli-Jehova muntu nkwajana lubeta lubotu.
Muntu uupilingene ulasesemya baluleme;
Uuololokede munzila yakwe ulasesemya basizibi.
Ngaaya majwi aa-Aguri mwana wa-Jake, cilengano.
Mbuboobu muntu mbwaambila Itiyeli,
Itiyeli a-Ukali.
Nsijisi maanu aabuntu.
Nsina kwiiya busongo,
Nsijisi luzibo lwa-Uusalala.
Ngwani wakajata muuwo mumaanza aakwe?
Ngwani wakaanga maanzi mucikobela?
Ngwani wakaimika masimpilo oonse aanyika?
Ngwani izina lyakwe azina lyamwanaakwe?
Sa tozi?
Nintobo kuliboonse bacijila kulinguwe,
Kuti utatapatilwi akuba mbuli mubeji,
Nkuzili zintu zyobile nzenkumbila kulinduwe;
Utandiimi nzizyo nentana kufwa:
Utandipi bucete nanka buvubi;
Undisanine zilyo zyeelede,
Cakwaamba kuti, Ma! Ngwani Jehova?
Alimwi ntapengi mubucete akubba
Akusampaula izina lya-Leza wangu,
Utalengeleli muzike kaambo kulisimalelaakwe,
Ambweni ulakutuka, elyo ulajana mulandu.
Bantu bamwi nkobali batukila bamawisi,
Abamanyina tababalongezyi pe.
Anukuti tabana kusalazigwa kubusofwi bwabo,
Bantu bamwi nkobali-ma! Meso aabo alalisumpula,
Ankoye zyabo zilalisumpula loko!
Abacibanda babo nzifulo;
Balalya bacete ansi,
Balamanisya batengwana akati kabantu.
Munsyundu ulijisi bana basimbi bobile;
Balati, Kopa! Kopa!
Nkozili zintu zyotatwe zitakuti,
Azine zitaambi kuti, Twalamwa:
Nyika yacimpayuma,
Amulilo uutakuti.
Litalemeki banyina,
Liyoononkolwa kulibacikwangala bakukalonga,
Akuligwa kumakubi.
Nkozili zintu zyotatwe zindiyoosya,
Azine zindikacila kuziba:
Inzila yasikube kujulu,
Inzila yanzoka andomba,
Inzila yabwaato mukati kalwizi,
Anzila yamwaalumi anakalindu,
Mbuboobu mbwiibede inzila yamwanakazi simamambe:
Ulalya, ulalisansamuna kumulomo,
Ulati, Nsikwe kubisya.
Nkozili zintu zyotatwe zikankamya nyika,
Azine nziikacilwa:
Mufubafuba na wakuta zilyo,
Mwanakazi uusampukide na wakwatwa,
Amulanda musimbi uulya izina lyanamalelo wakwe.
Nkozili zintu zyone ansi, nziniini,
Pele zilicenjede loko:
Pele lulabamba zilyo zyalo ciindi camainza;
Pele balayaka maanda aabo akati kamandomba.
Cisozi tacijisi mwami,
Pele coonse cileenda mumindando;
Tombela ulajatika kumaanza,
Pele ulakala mumaanda aabami.
Nkozili zintu zyotatwe zigambya mukweenda kwazyo,
Azine ziendeenda cakuyoosya:
Mulavu, mupatikampatila kubanyama,
Uutatandwi kumunyamanyina naba omwe,
Muzingili uulikankaizya, sijembwe,
Amwami uuzulwida bantu bakwe,
Alimwi na wayeeya bubi,
Vumba mulomo wako ajanza,
Nkaambo kusuka malili kulaleta maumba,
Akuminuna impemo kulaleta bulowa,
Akubusya bukali kulaleta inkondo.
Ngaaya, majwi aamwami Lemueli, cilengano ncebakamwiiyisya banyina,
Webo mwanaangu!
Webo mwana ngundakazyala!
Webo mwana wazikonke zyangu!
Neziba inzila zyako kulibaabo banyonyoona bami,
Tacili cibotu kubami kunywa waini;
Azyakunywa zikola tazyeelede beendelezi;
Akutabeteka kabotu makani aabantu bapengede.
Ayooyo uupengede mumoyo apegwe waini,
Kuti anywe akuluba mapenzi aakwe,
Atayeeyi limbi mafwabi aakwe.
Asamina basyataambi amulomo wako,
Beteka kabotu makani aabaabo basi nyonyooke.
Beteka makani aabacete abapengede.
Ngwani uukonzya kujana mwanakazi mubotu?
Ulayandika loko kwiinda mabwe aarubi.
Moyo wamulumaakwe ulamusyoma;
Takooyoobula impindu pe,
Ulamucitila kabotu, tamubisizyi pe,
Mazuba oonse aabuumi bwakwe,
Ulayandaula boya bwambelele abutonge,
Ulazibelesya amaanza masungu.
Uli mbuli maato aabasambazi
Ulagwisya zilyo zyakwe kule.
Ulaabila basiŋanda bakwe zilyo,
Akupa basimbi bakwe milimo,
Ulayeeya muunda, akuula;
Ulabyala muunda wamasaansa amicelo yamaanza aakwe.
Ulaanga cikungu cakwe anguzu,
Ulayumya maboko aakwe,
Ulabona kuti zyakusambala zyakwe nzibotu,
Alampi lyakwe talizimi masiku.
Ulabika ijanza lyakwe kumusako wakoosya,
Maanza aakwe alajata cipesyo,
Ulafumbatwida bacete,
Ulatandabika maanza aakwe kukugwasya bapengede.
Tayooweii basiŋanda bakwe ciindi campeyo,
Nkaambo basiŋanda bakwe boonse balisamine zisani zisalala pyu.
Ulalicitila zyakulivumbya;
Zyakusama zyakwe nzyamasani mabotu amasani aakamwemvwe,
Naakala akati kabapati banyika,
Ulatunga zikobela zyabutonge akuzyuuzya,
Ulaabila basambazi inkumba.
Ulaseka buyo mazuba aali kunembo,
Ulaasama amulomo wakwe cabusongo;
Mulao waluzyalo uli kululimi lwakwe.
alyi cilyo cabutolo.
Alakwe mulumaakwe ulamutembaula;
Ulati, Banakazi banji bacita kabotu,
Pele yebo wabainda boonse.
Pele mwanakazi uuyoowa Jehova uli acoolwe.
Apegwe micelo yamaanza aakwe,
Amilimo yakwe imutembaule mumilyango.
Ngaaya majwi aa-Mukambausi, mwana wa-Davida, mwami waku-Jerusalemu.
Muntu ulajana impindunzi kumilimo yakwe yoonse njaabeleka ansi?
Musela umwi ulamana, kulasika umbi, pele nyika inookede lyoonse.
Izuba lilazwa, izuba lilabbila, lilafwambaana kupiluka oko nkulyazwida.
Muuwo ulaunga kumusanza, alimwi ulapiluka akuunga kunyika; muuwo ulazyunguluka mukweendeenda kwawo, ulapiluka nkowakatalikila.
Milonga yoonse ilatola kulwizi lupati, nekubaboobo lwizi taluzuli: milonga ilapiluka nkukonya oko nkuyakatalikila.
Zintu zyoonse zyakataala, citaambiki. Liso talikonzyi kulamwa kukubona kwalyo, akwalo kutwi takukonzyi kukuta kukuswiilila.
Icakaba kale nceciyooba, icakacitika kale nceciyoocitwa. Taakwe cintu niciba comwe cipya ansi ano.
Sa nkucili cintu caambwa kuti, Bona, eci ncipya? Ncobeni cakaba kale muziindi zyakamana.
Bantu baciindi tabaciyeeyegwi, abaabo baciboola tabakooyooyeeyegwa kulibaabo beza kusule lyabo.
Mebo nde-Mukambausi ndakali mwami wa-Israyeli mu-Jerusalemu.
Lino ndakabika moyo wangu kukuyandaula busongo bwakupandulula zintu zyoonse zicitika ansi ano. Ilakataazya milimo Leza njapa bana baAdamu kuti baibeleke.
Ndabona zintu zyoonse zicitwa ansi ano. Ncobeni zyoonse nzyabuyo, tazikutyi moyo.
Cintu cipilingene tacikonzyi koololoka, acintu cibulika tacikonzyi kubalwa.
Ndakabika moyo wangu kuti mbe aluzibo abusongo, akuziba bufubafuba mbububede, pele ndajana kuti eci acalo tacikutyi moyo.
Nkaambo mubusongo bunji muli buusu bunji, ayooyo uuliyungizizya luzibo nguuliyungizizya mapenzi.
Kusekaseka, ndakaamba kuti, Nkusondoka buyo; akukondwa, ndakaamba kuti, Kulagwasya nzi?

Lino mumoyo wangu ndakali kuyandaula kubotezya-botezya mubili wangu awaini, nekuba kuti ndakali kulyeendelezya cabusongo, akujata bufubafuba, mane nkabone na ncinzi cintu cibotela bantu, ncibeelede kucita ansi ano, mumazuba mace aabuumi bwabo.
Ndakacita milimo mipati. Ndakaliyakila maanda akulibyalila myuunda yamasaansa.
Ndakalicitila myuunda amakwa, akubyala mumonya omo misyobo yoonse yamisamu yamicelo.
Ndakalicitila maziba aamaanzi aakutilaila misamu njendakabyala.
Ndakavuba bazike baalumi abanakazi, alimwi ndakalijisi bazike ibakazyalwa muŋanda yangu. Alimwi ridakavuba iŋombe ambelele zinji loko kwiinda boonse ibakanditaangunina mu-Jerusalemu.
Alimwi ndakalijanina insiliva angolida azintu ziyandika zyabami azyazisi zimbi. Ndakavuba basikwiimba, baalumi abanakazi, azintu zibotezya bantu, nkokuti ziimbyo zinji zyamisyobo misyobo.
Aboobo ndakali kuya bukomena kwiinda boonse ibakanditaangunina mu-Jerusalemu, abwalo busongo bwangu bwakaciliwo.

Kufumbwa cintu meso aangu ncaakali kuyanda, teendakali kwaakasya pe. Teendakakasya moyo wangu kucita neciba comwe cibotezya, nkaambo moyo wangu wakali kukondwa kumilimo yangu yoonse, Mbubulumbu mbundakajana kumilimo yangu yoonse.
Pele nindakayeeya milimo yoonse yamaanza aangu, amakataalo oonse aakwiicita, ndakabona kuti zintu zyoonse nzyabuyo. Tazigwasyi pe, taakwe impindu zijanika ansi ano.
Lino ndakabona kuti busongo bulainda bufubafuba, mbubonya mbuli mumuni mbuuinda mudima.
Musongo uli ameso mumutwe wakwe, anukuti mufubafuba uleenda mumudima, nekubaboobo ndizi kuti cintu comwe cilabasikila boonse,
Lino ndakaamba mumoyo wangu kuti, Cintu eco nciconya cisikila mufubafuba cilandisikila ambebo. Ino cilandigwasya buti kuba abusongo bunji? Ndakaamba mumoyo wangu kuti, Eci acalo ncabuyo.
Nkaambo musongo tayeeyegwi lyoonse, mbubonya mbuli mufubafuba. Mumazuba aaboola boonse buyo banooyoolubidwe, Ma! Musongo ulafwa mbubonya mbuli mufubafuba.
Aboobo ndakasula buumi, nkaambo milimo yoonse iicitwa ansi yakandikataazya. Zyoonse nzyabuyo, tazikutyi moyo pe.
Takuzibwi na oyo muntu ulaba musongo na mufubafuba, nekubaboobo uyookona zintu zyoonse nzindakajana kumilimo yangu akubusongo bwangu ansi ano. Eci acalo ncabuyo.
Mpawo ndakasi fwidwe lusyomo mumakani aamilimo yangu yoonse njindakabeleka ansi ano.
Nkaambo muntu uubeleka cabusongo acaluzibo acamaanu ulasia impindu yakwe yoonse mumaanza aamuntu iwatakaibelekela. Eci acalo ncabuyo, ncibi loko,
Muntu ulajana impindunzi kumilimo yakwe yoonse akukulipenzya kwakwe koonse ansi ano?
Nkaambo mazuba aakwe oonse alizwide mapenzi, amilimo yakwe ilakataazya. Akuciindi camasiku moyo wakwe tuukede cakuliiba. Eci acalo ncabuyo.
nkaambo taakwe uukonzya kulya akulibotezya kunze lya-Leza,
Nkaambo muntu uumubotezya, Leza ulamupa busongo aluzibo akukondwa, pele sizibi, ulamupa milimo yakulundika imbono kuti azisiile muntu mubotu mumeso aa-Leza. Eci acalo ncabuyo, tacikutyi moyo.
ciindi cakuzyalwa aciindi cakufwa, ciindi cakuzikila aciindi cakunonkola cizikidwe,
ciindi cakujaya aciindi cakusilika, ciindi cakumwaya aciindi cakuyaka,
ciindi cakulila aciindi cakuseka, ciindi cakoomoka aciindi cakuzyana,
ciindi cakusowa mabwe aciindi cakubungika mabwe, ciindi cakukumbata aciindi cakulikasya kukumbata,
ciindi cakuyandaula aciindi cakuswekelwa, ciindi cakubamba aciindi cakusowa,
ciindi cakuzapaula aciindi cakusuma, ciindi cakuumuna aciindi cakwaamba,
ciindi caku yanda aciindi caku sula, ciindi cankondo aciindi caluumuno.
Ino muntu ulajana impindunzi kumilimo yakwe njabeleka?

Wacita kuti zintu zyoonse zibote kuziindi zyazyo zyeelede. Wabika bulangizi bwabuumi buteeli mumyoyo yabo, nekubaboobo muntu takonzyi kumvwisya milimo yoonse Leza njaakacita kuzwa kumatalikilo kusikila kumamanino.
Ndizi kuti taakwe cintu cibotela bantu kwiinda eci: kukondwa akulibotezya mubuumi bwabo.
Alimwi cipo ca-Leza nceeci: kuti muntu alye akunywa akukondwa mumilimo yakwe yoonse,
Ndizi kuti zintu zyoonse nzyacita Leza tazimani; taakwe muntu uukonzya kuziyungizizya nanka kugwisya cintu kulinzizyo; Leza wakacita obo kuti bantu bamuyoowe.
Zintu ziliwo zyakaba kale, azeezyo ziyooba azyalo zyaba kale, azintu zitandidwe kale Leza ulaziyandaula.
Lino ndakaamba mumoyo wangu kuti, Leza uyoobeteka baluleme abasizibi boonse, nkaambo zintu zyoonse zili aciindi cazyo, makani oonse alibikilidwe ciindi.
Nkabela mumoyo wangu ndakaamba aabana ba-Adamu kuti Leza ulabatondezya mbubabede, bazibe kuti bali mbuli banyama buyo.
Nkaambo cintu cisikila bantu, abanyama cilabasikila. Balo balafwa, abalo balafwa mbubonya, Boonse balijisi muuya omwe, nkabela muntu tali mubotu kwiinda banyama, nkaambo boonse mbabuyo.
Boonse balaya kubusena bomwe. Bakazwa kubulongo, alimwi balapiluka kubulongo.
Taakwe muntu uuzi na muuya wamuntu ulaya kujulu, amuuya wabanyama na ulaya ansi kubulongo.
Aboobo ndibwene kuti taakwe cintu cibotela muntu kwiinda eci: muntu alibotezye mumilimo yakwe, nkaambo ncaabilo cakwe. Taakwe muntu uukonzya kumutondezya makani aaboola.
Alimwi ndakabona bantu mbubapenzegwa ansi ano. Ndakabona misozi yabapengede ambubabula sikubaumbulizya. Mumaanza aabasikubapenzya­ muli inguzu, nkabela tabajisi sikubaumbulizya.
Lino ndakayeeya kuti bafu bafwa kale mbabotu kwiinda baumi bacipona,
Pele uuli acoolwe kwiinda boonse ngooyo uutana kuzyalwa, uutabwene milimo mibi iicitika ansi ano.
Alimwi ndakabona milimo yoonse amaanu oonse aakubelesya, zyoonse buyo zilazwa kubbivwe muntu ndyafwida mweenzinyina. Eci acalo ncabyo, tacikutyi moyo.
Mufubafuba ulalikumbata, aboobo ulalekelela buumi bwakwe kuti bunyonyooke.
Inkankamanza yomwe iili aluumuno nimbotu kwiinda maanza obile aazwide milimo iikataazya iitakutyi moyo.
Acimwi cintu cabuyo ncindabona ansi ano nceeci:

muntu uli alike, uutajisi munyina naba mwanaakwe, taleki kulikataazya kucita milimo, ameso aakwe taakonzyi kukuta buvubi. Talibuzyi kuti, Ino ngwani ngundalikataazizya kumilimo akuliimya bubotu? Eci acalo ncabuyo, ncintu cibi loko.
Bantu bobile mbabotu kwiinda omwe, nkaambo balajana impindu imbotu kumilimo yabo.
Na umwi wawa, mweenzinyina ulamubusya. Pele maawe kuliyooyo uuwa alike, uubula sikumubusya,
Alimwi bantu bobile na balala antoomwe, balakasaalilwa, pele muntu omwe takonzyi kulikasaazya.
Alimwi bantu bobile balakonzya kuzunda mundike, pele omwe ulakonzya kuzundwa kulinguwe. Kokole kaindulwidwe takafwambaani kudunsuka.
Mulombe uubombede musongo mubotu kwiinda mwami mucembele mufubafuba uutacikonzyi kulayigwa,
nekuba kuti wakazwa muntolongo kuba mwami, na kuzyalwa mucete mucisi cakwe mwini.
Ndakabona baumi boonse beendeenda ansi ano, antoomwe amulombe wabili iwakatola cibaka cakwe:
Bantu kabatabaliki, nkabela wakali kubeendelezya boonse, nekubaboobo kumamanino bantu kabatacikondwi mulinguwe pe. Eci acalo ncabuyo, tacikutyi moyo.
Utafwanzyi milomo yako, amoyo wako utagubili kukwaamba makani kubusyu bwa-Leza, nkaambo Leza uli kujulu, anukuti yebo uli ansi; nkaambo kako majwi aako aceye.
Nkaambo mbubonya mbuli makataazyo manji mbwaaletela ziloto, ijwi lyamufubafuba lilaamba majwi manji.
Na wakonkezya Leza cikonke, utamuki kucizuzikizya, nkaambo tabotelwi bafubafuba; zuzikizya ncowakakonkezya,
Ncibo tu kutakonka kwiinda kutazuzikizya cikonke cako.
Utazumizyi milomo yako kukunjizya muzibi, alimwi utaambi kubusyu bwa-angelo kuti, Ndakalubya. Sa ncibotu kuti Leza akukalalile akunyonyoona milimo yamnanza aako?
Na zyavula ziloto, majwi aabuyo alavula, pele yebo koyoowa Leza.
Nekubaboobo mwami ulagwasya nyika iili abulimi.
Muntu uuyandisya mali takonzyi kukuta mali, ayooyo uuyandisya imbono takonzyi kukuta impindu. Eci acalo ncabuyo.
Imbono na zyavula, basikuzilya abalo balavula; lino mukamwini ulajana impindunzi, cita kubona ameso aakwe?
Iŋonzi zyasimilimo zilalweela nekuba kuti ulalya cinji na ciniini, pele kukutisya kwamuvubi takumuzumizyi koona.
Obo buvubi bwasweka mukubula coolwe, aboobo ulabula cintu cakusiila mwanaakwe,
Mbubonya mbwaakali acinswe kuciindi cakuzwa muzyalilo lyabanyina, ulapiluka mbuboobo. Taakwe cintu ncakonzya kutolelela camilimo yakwe yoonse njaakabeleka.
Eci acalo ncintu cibi, Mbuli mbwaakasika, ulapiluka mbubonya obo. Wajana impindunzi kukubelekela muuwo,
akukusowa ciindi cakwe mumudima, mubuusu bunji abulwazi akubijilwa?
Cintu cibotu ceelela muntu, ndibwene kuti nceeci: kulya akunywa akulibotezya mumilimo yakwe yoonse njaabeleka ansi ano mumazuba mace Leza ngaamwaabila, nkaambo ncecaabilo cakwe,
Kufumbwa muntu Leza ngwapa buvubi ambono anguzu zyakulibotezya, kuti atambule caabilo cakwe akusekelela mumilimo yakwe, ncobeni eci ncaabilo ca-Leza,
Oyo muntu takonzyi kulikataazya loko nkaambo kakuceya kwamazuba aakwe, nkaambo Leza ulamupa kukondwa kwamoyo wakwe.
Kuli bubi mbombwene ansi ano, alimwi bulakataazya bantu.

Ambweni Leza wapa muntu buvubi ambono abulemu, nkabela taakwe cintu ncabula akati kazintu zyoonse nzyuuyanda moyo wakwe, nekubaboobo Leza tamuzumizyi kulya, pele muntu umbi nguuzilya. Eci ncabuyo, ndipenzi ibbi.
Na muntu wazyala bana bali mwanda, alimwi woongola myaka minji loko, nekubaboobo moyo wakwe tuukuti zintu zibotu, alimwi tazikwi kabotu, ncobeni mwana wakusowa ulijisi coolwe kwiinda nguwe,
nkaambo walo ulasika kuzintu zyabuyo, alimwi ulapiluka mumudima, azina lyakwe lilavumbwa mumudima;
tana kubona izuba nikuba kuziba cintu, nekubaboobo wajana cilyokezezyo kwiinda nguwe.
Na wapona myaka iili cuulu na kwiinda kobile, nekubaboobo takuti bubotu-ma! Sa tabayi boonse kubusena bomwe buyo?
Musongo ulijisi coolwe cili buti kwiinda mufubafuba? Alakwe mucete uucenjede uupona kabotu ulijisi coolwe cili buti?
Kulya imbono meso nzyaabwene kale ncibotu kwiinda kuyandaula zintu zitaboneki, Eci acalo ncabuyo, tacikutyi moyo.
Majwi manji alavuzya zintu zyabuyo? Alagwasya buti muntu?
Ngwani uuzi cintu cibotela muntu mumazuba mace nga pona ansi, mazuba aabuyo aafwambaana kumana mbuli cinzinzimwa? Ngwani uubwene makani aaboola musule lyakwe ansi ano?
Kuya kuŋanda yadilwe nkubotu kwiinda kuya kuŋanda yakusekelela, nkaambo kufwa ngemamanino aabantu boonse, nkabela baumi baleelede kubika moyo kuliceeci.
Buusu mbubotu kwiinda kuseka, nkaambo kuusa nkokubotya moyo.
Myoyo yabasongo ili kuŋanda yakulila, pele myoyo yabafubafuba ili kuŋanda yakusekelela
Na muntu wamvwa kutapatila kwamusongo, ncibotu kwiinda kumvwa lwiimbo lwabafubafuba.
Nkaambo mbuli insasi zyamulilo kunsi acilongo, mbukubede kuseka kwabafubafuba. Eci acalo ncabuyo.
Ncobeni kunyanzya kulasondosya musongo, acipo cilabisizya moyo,
Mamanino aamakani mabotu kwiinda matalikilo, akukazika moyo nkubotu kwiinda kulisumpula.
Utafwambi kukalala ciindi cakubijilwa, nkaambo mumyoyo yabafubafuba mobukede bukali.
Utaambi kuti, Mazuba aakamana akali mabotu kwiinda aasunu, nkaambo kwaamba obo takuli kwabusongo.
Busongo mbubotu mbuli lukono, bulagwasya bantu baansi.
Busongo bulatabilila mbubonya mbuli mali mbwaatabilila, aluzibo lulagwasya nkaambo busongo bulavuna buumi bwabaabo babujisi.
Bona milimo ya-Leza mbwiibede! Ngwani uukonzya koolola ncaakapilingenye?
Mubuzuba bwacoolwe sekelela, amubuzuba bwamapenzi yeeya. Leza nguucita oonse obile, kuti muntu atazibi makani aaboola.
Utaindilili kukululama, alimwi utaindilili kusongwaala. Sa ncibotu kulikataazya?
Utaindilili kubija nekuba kufubaala. Sa ncibotu kufwa kacitana kusika ciindi cako?
Kakatila kumulazyo oyo, pele oyu wabili awalo utaulubi. Uuyoowa Leza ulaangulukide kuli yoonse yobile.
Busongo bulatabilila musongo kwiinda basilutwe bali ikumi bamumunzi,
Ncobeni taakwe muntu omwe ansi ano uucita ziluleme lyoonse akutabisya.
Utabiki moyo wako kumajwi oonse ngebaamba bantu. Na wacita obo, inga wamvwa muzike wako ulakutukila.
Nkaambo moyo wako ulizi kuti ziindi zinji wakatukila bamwi ayebo.
Aya makani oonse ndaalingula mubusongo, Ndakaamba kuti, Nkonsongwaale. Pele busongo bwakandicija.
Makani aaba ali kule, ali kunsi loko, Taajaniki pe.
Ndakabika moyo wangu kukuziba akulingula akuyandaula busongo akuziba zintu mbuzibede, kuti nzibe bubi bwabufubafuba abufubafuba busondosya.
Acimwi cintu ndicibwene cilula kwiinda lufu, nkokuti mwanakazi uuteya bantu. Moyo wakwe mbuzamba, amaanza aakwe ninketani. Uubotezya Leza ulamuloboka, pele sizibi ulacegwa kulinguwe.
Bona! Ngaaya makani ngendajana, mbwaamba Mukambausi. Ndayeeya miyeeyo minjiminji, ndaibika antoomwe, nzibe zintu mbuzibede.
Cintu comwe ndaciyandaula loko, pele nsina kucijana. Ndajana mwaalumi omwe wakasimpe akati kabantu bali cuulu, pele banakazi taakwe naba omwe akati kabaabo boonse.
Nzeezi nzendakajana. Leza wakalenga muntu uliluleme, pele bantu baliyeeyede miyeeyo minji yalweeno.
Ngwani uli mbuli musongo? Ngwani uuzi kupandulula makani? Busongo bwamuntu bulabalangazya busyu bwakwe, abuyumu bwabusyu bwakwe bulasanduka.
Utafwambaani kuzwa kubusyu bwakwe; utakakatili kumakani mabi, nkaambo kufumbwa ncayanda ulacicita.
Ijwi lyamwami lili anguzu; taakwe uukonzya kumubuzya kuti, Ino ucitanzi?
Uubamba mulazyo wakwe takooyoojana bubi. Moyo wamusongo ulizi kuti ciindi calubeta cilasika.
Nkaambo makani oonse alijisi ciindi cakubetekwa, nkaambo bubi bwabantu bwabalemena.
Tabezi makani aaboola; taakwe uukonzya kubazibya.
Taakwe muntu uujisi inguzu zyakutabilila muuya; taakwe uujisi inguzu mubuzuba bwalufu. Taakwe lulekelelo ciindi cankondo; abubi tabukonzyi kuvuna babujisi.
Aya makani oonse ndaabona, nkaambo ndakabika moyo wangu kumakani conse aacitwa ansi ano, muntu naendelezya muntunyina kukumubisizya.
Lino ndakabona basizibi mbobakazikwa; bakasika kukabanda, pele basikucita bululami bakazwa kubusena busalalisya, bakalubwa mumunzi, Eci acalo ncabuyo.
Milimo mibi tiifwambaani kubetekwa, aboobo myoyo yabantu ilakakatila kucita zibi.
Nekuba kuti sizibi ulabisya ziindi zili mwa nda akoongola, ndizi kuti bayoowa Leza bayooba kabotu, nkaambo balamulemeka.
Pele sizibi takooyooba kabotu, takooyoongola pe; mazuba aakwe ayooba mbuli eenzule, nkaambo tayoowi Leza.

Nkaambo kako ndatembaula kukondwa. Taakwe cintu cibotu ansi ano kwiinda eci: muntu alye akunywa akusekelela, nkaambo eci cilakalilila kulinguwe mumilimo yakwe mazuba oonse aabuumi bwakwe ngaamupede Leza ansi ano.
Lino nendakabika moyo wangu kukuziba busongo, akubonesya makani aacitika ansi ano mbwaabede, (nkaambo bamwi nkobali bataoni neliba isikati naaba masiku),

ndakabona milimo yoonse ya-Leza, nkabela ndakabona kuti muntu takonzyi kumvwisya milimo yoonse iicitwa ansi ano. Nekuba kuti muntu wabeleka loko mukulingula kwakwe, takonzyi kumvwisya; nekuba kuti musongo waamba kuti, Ndizi, takonzyi kumvwisya pe.

Nkaambo cintu comwe buyo cilabasikila boonse, nibaba baluleme nibaba basizibi, nibaba babotu nibaba babi, nibaba basalala nibaba basofweede, nibaba bapaila nibaba batapaili, Mbuli muntu mubotu mbwabede, alakwe sizibi mbwabede. Mbuli uukonka mbwabede, alakwe uuyoowa kukonka mbwabede

Cintu cibi nkucili mumakani oonse aacitika ansi ano, nkokuti, cintu comwe buyo cilasikila bantu boonse. Alimwi myoyo yabantu ilizwide bubi, nkabela busondosi mobuli mumyoyo yabo ciindi cakupona, lino musule balainka kubafu.
Nkaambo uucipona akati kabaumi ucijisi bulangizi, nkaambo mubwa uucipona mubotu kwiinda mulavu uufwide.
Nkaambo baumi balizi kuti balafwa, pele bafwide tabezi cintu niciba comwe; tabacijisi impindu, tabaciyeeyegwi limbi.
Luyando lwabo alusulo lwabo abbivwe lyabo, zyoonse zyafwidilila. Tabacijisi caabilo abuniini muzintu zyoonse zicitika ansi.
Zyakusama zyako kazituba ciindi coonse, amutwe wako utabuli mafuta.
Kobotelwa amwanakazi ngoyandisya mazuba oonse aabuumi bwako bwabuyo mbwakupede ansi ano, mazuba aako oonse aabuyo, nkaambo ncencico caabilo cako mubuumi amumilimo yako njobeleka ansi ano.
Kufumbwa milimo njaajana maanza aako, kocita canguzu, nkaambo taakwe milimo niiba miyeeyo neluba luzibo nebuba busongo mukabanda moyoonjila.
Nkaambo muntu tezi ciindi cakwe na cilaba lili, Mbuli inswi mbozijatwa mubuzamba bubi, ambuli tuyuni mbotucegwa mukakole, abalo bantu balacegwa mbubonya, ciindi camapenzi naaboongomokela.
Amakani amwi aabusongo ngembwene ansi ano ngaaya. Akayoosya mumeso aangu,
Kakuli umwi munzi muniini iwakali abantu bace. Lino kwakasika mwami mupati kuzooulwisya, nkabela wakayaka mayake mapati aakuusinkinizya.
Pele omo mumunzi mwakajanwa umwi mucete musongo, nkabela mubusongo bwakwe wakavuna munzi. Nekubaboobo katakwe muntu iwakaingasila oyo mucete.
Pele ndakaamba kuti busongo mbubotu kwiinda inguzu, nekuba kuti busongo bwamucete bwasampaulwa, amajwi aakwe taaswiililwi.
Busongo mbubotu kwiinda zyakulwisya, pele sizibi omwe ulanyonyoona bubotu bunji.
Inzi zifwide zilanunsya mafuta aasimuunde; mbubonya obo bufubafuba buniini bulabisya busongo abulemu.
Moyo wamusongo ula­ mutola kululyo, pele moyo wamufubafuba ulamutola kulumwensi.
Mufubafuba, nekuba kuciindi cakweendeenda munzila, ulabula maanu, nkabela ulazibya bantu boonse kuti mufubafuba.
Nekuba kuti bukali bwasilutwe bwakubukila, utasii busena bwako, nkaambo kukazika moyo kulamanya milandu mipati,
Nkucili cintu cibi ncimbwene ansi ano, bubi buzwa kumweendelezi:
bufubafuba bulaimikwa mumasena manji malemu, anukuti bavubi balikede mumasena aasampukide.
Ndibwene bazike batantide ambizi, abasilutwe beenda ansi mbuli bazike.
Uusya mabwe, mabwe alamucisa, ayooyo uupandula inkuni ulayaswa nzizyo.
Na kaleba kafumpya, alimwi muntu takanoni, uleelede kubika inguzu azimwi, pele busongo mbobugwasya muntu kuzunda,
Na inzoka yaluma kale niitana koondolwa, sikoondola ulagwasya buti?
Majwi aamulomo wamusongo ulamuletela buuya, pele milomo yamufubafuba ilamumenenena.
Matalikilo aamajwi aamulomo wakwe mbufubafuba, amamanino aao mbubi bwabusondosi.
Mufubafuba ngusibwantila, nekuba kuti bantu tabezi ziyooba, nkabela taakwe muntu uukonzya kuziba makani aaciboola.
Milimo yabafubafuba ilabakataazya, nkabela tabezi niiba inzila yakuya kumunzi.
Uli acoolwe, O nyika, mwami wako na ngumwana wacisi, abasilutwe bako nibalya kuciindi ceelede, nkokuti cakukuta, citali cakukolwa.
Nkaambo kabutole, maseketi alabola, akaambo kabutete bwamaanza iŋanda inooloka.
Cilyo cilacitwa kukusekelela, awaini ulabotya buumi, nkabeia mali ngaacita zyoonse,
Utatukili mwami, nimuba mumiyeeyo yako; utatukili bavubi, nimuba muŋanda yako yakoona; nkaambo muyuni wakujulu ulatola majwi aako, asimababa ulaamba makani.
Abila bantu bali musanu ababili nanka musanu abatatu, nkaambo tozi mapenzi aaciboola ansi ano.
Na mayoba alizwide imvula, alatesya nyika, Na musamu wawida kumusanza na kunyika, nkuuwida musamu nkukonya oko nkuubede.
Uuyeeya muuwo takonzyi kubyala, ayooyo uulanga mayoba takonzyi kutebula.
Mbuli mbotezi muuwo mbuuinda, nanka zifuwa mbuzikula mwida lyauuminsi, mbubonya obo tozi mbwiibede milimo ya-Leza uucita zyoonse,
Cifumofumo byala imbuto zyako, aciindi cagoko utalesyi maanza aako, nkaambo tozi na nzizili zisi kule akati kazyo, na zyoonse zyobile zilaba kabotu,
Mumuni ulalwelela buumi, alimwi ncibotu kuti meso abone izuba,
Na muntu woongola, asekelele mumyaka yakwe yoonse, nekubaboobo atalubi kuti myaka yamudima iyooba minji. Zyoonse ziboola nzyabuyo.
Gwisya buusu mumoyo wako, akutanda makataazyo kumubili wako, nkaambo bwanike abucedo bwabuumi zyoonse nzyabuyo.
Koyeeya Mulengi wako mumazuba aabulombe bwako, mazuba aamapenzi naatana kusika, amyaka niitana kuboneka noyooamba kuti, Nsicibotelwi zintu ezi;
izuba amumuni amwezi anyenyeezi nezitana kusia, amayoba naatana kuboola alimwi yamana imvula;
mubuzuba basikubamba iŋanda nebazoobila abaluumi basintaze nebazoongomana, abasikuziya nebazooleka nkaambo kakuceya abaabo basondela kuzipulo nebazoosiilwa;
milyango yakumugwagwa ninoozoojalidwe, ajwi lyakuziya nelizooceya; muntu naazoobuka kuciindi cakwiimba kwa tuyuni, abanakazi basikwiimba nebazoofwinsigwa;

muntu naazooyoowa cilundu cilamfu, akweenda kulamuyoosya; musamu waalmondi nuuzoosyuuka; idingo nilizookokoba, amusamu wakubusya tuucibeleki; nkaambo muntu ulaya kucikalilo cakwe citamani, abasikulila baleendeenda mumigwagwa;
intambo yansiliva niitana kudunsuka, amutiba wangolida nuutana kupwayika, citesyo nicitana kufwa kukasensa, avili nilitana kupwayika kucikala;
bulongo nibuyoopiluka kunyika mbubwakabede, amuuya nuuyoopiluka kuli-Leza nkowakazwa,
Nzyabuyobuyo! mbwaamba Mukambausi, Zyoonse nzyabuyo.
Lino Mukambausi, mbwaakali musongo, wakacili kwiiyisya bantu luzibo. Wakayeeya akulingula akubamba tusimpi tunji.
Mukambausi wakali kuyandaula majwi aabotezya, alimwi wakaliluleme kukulemba majwi aalusinizyo.
Majwi aabasongo ali mbuli zibinzyo, atusimpi tuyobolwedwe twamwiyi omwe tuli mbuli manembe aakankamidwe.
Mwanaangu, cenjela kuzintu azimwi kutali ezi. Kulemba mabuku manji takumani, akwiiya kunji kulakataazya mubili.
Ngaaya mamanino aamakani, Oonse amvwigwa. Lemeka Leza akubamba milazyo yakwe, nkaambo kucita obo nceelelo coonse camuntu,
Nkaambo Leza uyoobeteka milimo yoonse, amakani oonse aasisidwe, naaba mabotu naaba mabi.
Undimyonte amyonto zyamulomo wako,
Nkaambo inkumbato zyako nzibotu kwiinda waini,
Izina lyako lili mbuli mafuta aatilwa;
Aboobo banakalindu balakuyandisya,
Mwami wandinjizya muŋanda yakwe,
Tulasekelela akukondwa mulinduwe,
Tulatembaula inkumbato zyako kwiinda waini,
Kukuyanda, balacita kabotu,
Ndasia, nekubaboobo ndeebeka,
Nubana basimbi ba-Jerusalemu,
Mbuli zilao zyaba-Kedari,
Mbuli zisitilizyo zya-Solomoni.
Mutandisampauli nkaambo kakusia kwangu,
Nkaambo izuba lyakanditenta,
Bana balombe babama bakandikalalila,
Bandipa milimo yakubamba myuunda yamasaansa,
Pele muunda wangu ndemwini nsina kuubamba pe.
Uyembela kuli?
Uzibutya kuli ciindi casikari?
Sa ncibotu kuti nkenja butuntulika,
Akati kamatanga aabeenzinyoko?
Na tozi, O mwanakazi uuebeka,
Koya butobela mikondo yamatanga,
Ukeembele tupongo twako
Kumbali lyazilao zyabasikweembela.
Njenjiyo njindakukozyanya ayo, O muyandwi wangu.
Ansingo yako nkaambo kabulungu.
Tulakucitila zyakulisakatizya zyangolida
Zinyembedwe ansiliva,
Mwami wangu naakede abulo bwakwe,
Muunde wangu ulanunkilila,
Muyandwi wangu wandibeda cileye camuro
Cilede akati kankolo zyangu,
Muyandwi wangu wandibeda cikungo camaluba
Cizwa kumyuunda yamasaansa yaku-Engedi,
Weebeka! Uli ameso aali mbuli inziba,
Ncobeni weebeka, uuyandika wangu!
Wabota loko!
Cilyokezezyo cesu ngukamwemvwe,
Maseketi aaŋanda yesu ngakedari,
Ambalo zyesu nzyazisamu zyakupresi.
Ndime iduba lya-Saroni,
Impana yakukuti.
Mbuli impana akati kamitubetube,
Mbwabede muyandwi wangu akati kabasimbinyina,
Mbwabede uuyandika wangu akati kabalombenyina.
Ndakakondwa kukala muceenzule cakwe,
Amicelo yakwe yakanona mumulomo wangu,
Wakandinjizya muŋanda yapobwe,
Andembela yakwe yakundisitilizya nduyando.
Amundisanine zibunge zyamasaansa aayanikidwe,
Amundikatalusye amicelo yamaapeli,
Nkaambo luyando lwandijaya,
Ajanza lyakwe lyalulyo lindikumbate.
Ndamulailila, nobana basimbi ba-Jerusalemu,
Ndamukonkezya munjelele amunsya zyamusokwe,
Kuti mutabusyi basikuyandana nikuba kubapilinganya,
Mane bakagondwe,
Ngooyo wasika!
Uza busotauka atala amalundu,
Akutaaluka atulundulundu,
Muyandwi wangu uli mbuli insya,
Na mbuli mwana wanjelele.
Ngooyo uuliimvwi
Kusule abulambo bwesu!
Ulasondela ampulunguzyo,
Ulalanga mucipulo.
Muyandwi wangu wandaambila kuti,
Buka, O muyandwi wangu uuebeka, uboole.
Bona! Mapeyo amana!
Imvula yaleka kuwa!
Malubaluba aboneka ansi,
Ciindi cakwiimba casika,
Alyalo ijwi lyanziba lyamvwigwa munyika yesu,
Inkuyu zyatalika kubizwa,
Amisaansa yafulula maluba,
Alanunkilila kabotu,
Buka, O muyandwi wangu uuebeka, uboole.
Mumayubilo aamampangala,
Unditondezye ciwa cako,
Akundimvwisya ijwi lyako,
Nkaambo ijwi lyako lilabotezya,
Aciwa cako cileebeka,
Bamwaaba baniini babisizya misaansa,
Misaansa yesu niifulula maluba,
Uleembela mumpana.
Boola kulindime, O muyandwi wangu,
Ube mbuli insya na mwana wanjelele.
Ndakali kuyandaula muyandwi wamoyo wangu,
Ndakamuyandaula pele teendakamujana.
Ndakati, Mbuke, nkenja bweendeenda mumunzi,
Mumigwagwa amumasambalilo,
Nkayandaule muyandwi wamoyo wangu.
Ndakamuyandaula, pele teendakamujana.
Beendeenda mumunzi.
Ndakababuzya kuti, Sa mulibwene muyandwi wamoyo wangu?
Ndakajana muyandwi wamoyo wangu,
Ndakamujatisya, ndakaka kumuleka,
Mane ndakamusisya muŋanda yabama,
Amukaanda kayooyo iwakandizyala.
Ndamukonkezya munjelele amunsya zyamusokwe,
Kuti mutabusyi basikuyandana nikuba kubapilinganya,
Mane bakagondwe.
Uuli mbuli musumpululu wabusi,
Uuli atununkilizyo twamuro atwalibano, Amisamu yoonse yabasambazi?
Ncobeni macile aa-Solomoni!
Alizyungulukidwe bantu bali makumi aali musanu alimwi,
Baalumi basintaze baba-Israyeli.
Boonse balisamine mapanga,
Balibwene milimo yankondo,
Umwi aumwi ulijisi ipanga akasolo kakwe,
Nkaambo kakuyoowa mapenzi aamasiku,
Mwami Solomoni wakalipangila macile.
Wakaacita azisamu zyaku-Lebano.
Isule lyao lyakali lyangolida,
Cikalilo cao cakali camasani aasalala pyu;
Mukati akatungwa caluyando
Kumaanza aabana basimbi ba-Jerusalemu.
Mukabone mwami Solomoni,
Ulisamine munsini ngubakamusamika banyina
Mubuzuba bwabwinga bwakwe,
Buzuba bwakukondwa kwamoyo wakwe.
Ncobeni weebeka!
Meso aako ali mbuli inziba
Kusule lyantambala yako.
Masusu aako ali mbuli butanga bwampongo
Ziya buseluka minkuni ya-Gileadi,
Zizwa mukusanzigwa,
Zienda bubambene;
Taakwe iibula mweenzinyina.
Milomo yako ili mbuli kakole kasalala pyu,
Mulomo wako weebeka!
Maseya aako ali mbuli zipanzi zyamapomegranite
Kusule lyantambala yako.
Iiyakidwe kuti ibe ciyobwedo cazilwisyo,
Mpozianzikidwe intobo zili cuulu,
Zyoonse nintobo zyabasilumamba,
Mbuli twana twamayanga twanjelele.
Mane bukace, acenzule cikamwaike,
Njiinke kucilundu camuunde wamuro,
Akutulundulundu twatununkilizyo.
Tojisi kampenda nikaba komwe,
Katuya ayebo kuzwa ku-Lebano,
Kuzwa kucilundu ca-Amana,
Kuzwa kucilundu ca-Seniri aca-Herimoni,
Kumakalilo aabalavu,
Kuzilundu zyabasiluwe.
Wayasa moyo wangu kukulanga komwe kwameso aako,
Amutenta omwe wakunsingo yako,
Zyabota inkumbato zyako, mucizi wangu, nabwinga wangu!
Zyabota inkumbato zyako kwiinda waini!
Mafuta aako ali abweema bubotu kwiinda misamu yoonse.
Buci amalili, zyoonse mozili mululimi lwako.
Bweema bwazyakusama zyako buli mbuli bweema bwaku-Lebano,
Muunda uusinkidwe, kasensa kajalidwe kabotu.
Mitabi yako muunda wamapomegranite,
Uuli amicelo mibotu loko,
Muunde anardo,
Narde asaferone, misale akinamono,
Amisamu yoonse yalibano,
Muro amaalo,
Atununkilizyo toonse tubotu.
Tulonga tukunka kuzwa ku-Lebano,
Boola, O muuwo wakumusanza!
Amuunge amuunda wangu,
Kuti bweema bwawo bumwaike,
Muyandwi wangu aboole kumuunda wakwe,
Alye micelo mibotu iili mulinguwo.
Ndacela muro amyuunde yangu imwi.
Ndalya buci bwacimbulwe cangu,
Ndanywa waini amalili aangu,
Amulye, nobeenzuma, akunywa,
Amunywisye, nomuyandana.
Swiilila! Ndijwi lyamuyandwi wangu! Ulakonkomona.
Wati, Ndijulila, O mucizi wangu, O muyandwi wangu,
O inziba yangu, Ootakwe kampenda,
Nkaambo mutwe wangu ulizwide mume,
Masusu aangu awidwa maanzi aamasiku,
Ma! Ndasamununa kale ilogwe lyangu!
Sa nsame alimwi?
Ndasanzya kale zituta zyangu!
Sa nzibisye alimwi?
Mpawo muyandwi wangu wakabika ijanza lyakwe amulyango,
Amoyo wangu wakakankama mukaango kangu.
Ndakabuka kujalwida muyandwi wangu,
Nkabela maanza aangu akalosya muro,
Minwe yangu yakawisya mafuta aamuro
Azijatilizyo zyamulyango.
Pele muyandwi wangu kainkide kumbi.
Lino moyo wangu wakawizuka naakaamba;
Ndakamuyandaula, pele teendakamujana;
Ndakamwiita, pele takwakandivuwa.
Nibakali kweendeenda mumunzi.
Bakanduuma akundiyasa,
Bakandinyanzya cikobela cangu.
Mbubakacita balindizi bamalambo.
Ndamulailila, nobana basimbi ba-Jerusalemu,
Na mwajana muyandwi wangu,
Amumwaambile kuti
Luyando lwandijaya.
Muyandwi wako ulainda buti bayandwi bamwi,
o mwanakazi uuebeka?
Muyandwi wako ulainda buti bayandwi bamwi?
Nkaambonzi notukonkezya obo?
Muyandwi wangu ulabalangala akukwizima.
Mubotu kwiinda zyuulu zili ikumi,
Mutwe wakwe uli mbuli ingolida loko,
Masusu aakwe alizingene,
Alasia mbi mbuli cikwangala,
Kumbali lyatulonga twamaanzi.
Alasamba mumalili,
Alikede kutulonga tuzwide.
Maseya aakwe ali mbuli tuundu twamalubaluba aanunkilila.
Milomo yakwe nimpana zilosya mafuta aamuro.
Maanza aakwe ali mbuli incoko zyangolida
Zibikilidwe mabwe aa-berulo.
Mubili wakwe uli mbuli inkaya,
Zili amanyengwe aamasafiro.
Maulu aakwe misumpululu yamabweluuma
Iiyakidwe azikazikilo zyangolida.
Ciwa cakwe cili mbuli Lebano,
Ncibotu mbuli makedari.
Ncobeni ulayandika loko.
Mbwabede muyandwi wangu, mweenzuma,
Nobana basimbi ba-Jerusalemu.
O mwanakazi uuebeka?
Muyandwi wako watozya kuli?
Sa tukugwasye kumuyandaula?
Kuli malubaluba aanunkilila.
Waya kukweembela kumyuunda,
Akuyoocela impana.
Uleembela akati kampana.
Uli mubotu mbuli Jerusalemu.
Ulayoosya mbuli impi ujisi indembela.
Nkaambo meso aako alandiyoosya.
Masusu aako ali mbuli butanga bwampongo
Ziya buseluka minkuni ya-Gileadi,
Meno aako ali mbuli butanga bwambelele,
Zizwa mukusanzigwa,
Zienda bubambene;
Taakwe iibula mweenzinyina.
Maseya aako ali mbuli zipanzi zyamapomegranite
Kusule lyantambala yako.
Kwaboneka banamalelo bali makumi aali musanu alimwi, Abasimamambe bali makumi aali musanu aatatu,
Abasimbi banji batabaliki.
Pele inziba yangu iitakwe kampenda njimwi buyo,
Wakazyalwa alike kulibanyina,
Ulayandika kuliyooyo iwakamuzyala.
Basimbi nibakamubona bakamulemeka,
Abalo banamalelo abasimamambe bakamutembaula.
Ngwani oyu uusondela uuli mbuli kubucedo,
Uuebeka mbuli mwezi, uusalala mbuli izuba,
Uuyoosya mbuli impi iijisi indembela?
Kuyooobona malubaluba aakukalonga,
Nkabone na misaansa yafulula,
Amisamu yamapomegranite na ili amaluba.
Nendatakezi, moyo wangu wakandibika munkalaki antoomwe asilutwe wangu.
Boola, boola, O musimbi mu-Sulamiwe!
Boola, boola, kuti tukweebele.
Nkaambonzi nomuyanda kweebela musimbi mu-Sulamiwe,
Mbuli mbukweebelwa kuzyana kwaku-Mahanaimu?
Manteeka aazibelo zyako ali mbuli cilisakatizyo
Cibezedwe kumaanza aasimilimo uucenjede.
Ikombo lyako lili mbuli mutiba uubulungene,
Uutabuli waini uuvwelene.
Bula bwako ncilwi cabulotwe
Cizyungulukidwe impana.
Mbuli twana twamayanga twanjelele.
Insingo yako ili mbuli iŋanda indamfu yankaya.
Meso aako maziba aamu-Hesiboni kumulyango wa-Batirabimu
Impemo yako ili mbuli iŋanda indamfu ya-Lebano iilangide Damasko,
Mutwe wako uli mbuli Karimeli,
Masusu aako ali mbuli zisani zisalalisya;
Mwami ulaangidwe mulingao,
Ncobeni weebeka, wabota loko,
O musimbi muyandwi uubotezya,
Ciimo cako cili mbuli kakunka,
Ankolo zyako zili mbuli zikungo zyankako.
Njanda kutanta ako kakunka,
Akujata mangwalala aako,
Inkolo zyako zibe mbuli zikungo zyamasaansa,
Abweema bwamuuya wako bube mbuli kunona kwamaapeli,
Imyonto zyako zili mbuli waini mubotu,
Uutelemuka mumilomo amumeno.
Ulindisukeme loko,
Boola, O muyandwi wangu,
Twiinke kumyuunda,
Tukaone kumatungu,
Tukabone na misaansa yafulula,
Na malubaluba aayo awayuka,
Aalo mapomegranite naali amaluba.
Oko njookupa inkumbato.
Amicelo yoonse mibetu nkwiili kumilyango yesu,
Micelo mipya ayaciindi,
Yoonse buyo ndakaibambila muyandwi wangu,
Nicali cibotu nowali mwanakwesu,
lwakanyonka inkolo zyabama.
Nindakakujana anze nindakakumyonta,
Nikwatakaba sikundisampaula.
Amukaanda kayooyo iwakandizyala,
Nindakunywisya waini uununkilila,
Musinza wamapomegranite aangu,
Ajanza lyakwe lyalulyo nilyandikumbata.
Ndamulailila, nobana basimbi ba-Jerusalemu,
Kuti mutabusyi basikuyandana nikuba kubapilinganya,
Mane bakagondwe.
Uulifunkizya amuyandwi wakwe?
Kunsi lyamusamu wamaapeli nkondakakubusya,
Nkonkuko banyoko nkubakali kusundila,
Nkonkuko nkwaakali kusundila oyo iwakakuzyala.
Acitondezyo akuboko kwako.
Nkaambo luyando nduyumu mbuli lufu,
Abbivwe ndibi mbuli kabanda,
Kumweka kwazyo kuli mbuli kumweka kwamulilo,
Mbuli mabangabanga aa-Jehova,
Azambangulwe talikonzyi kulujaya.
Nekuba kuti muntu wapa imbono zyoonse zyamuŋanda yakwe kukuula luyando,
Ncobeni cilasampaulwa buyo,
Uutakwe inkolo.
Tucite buti kumucizi wesu
Mubuzuba bwakuselwa?
Tuyooyaka alinguwe lubaya lwansiliva.
Pele na ncitendele,
Tulamusinkila azisamu zyakedari.
Ankolo zyangu zyakali mbuli maanda malamfu.
Aboobo mumeso aakwe.
Ndakali mbuli sikuleta luumuno.
Oyo muunda wakauaba mumaanza aabasikubamba,
Umwi aumwi keelede kuleta muulo wamicelo,
Mali aansiliva aali cuulu,
Muunda wangu wamasaansa nguwangu ndemwini.
Kotola cuulu cako camali, O Solomoni;
Abalo basikubamba micelo batole myanda yobile.
Beenzinyoko balaswiilila ijwi lyako.
Ambebo nswiilile.
Ube mbuli insya na mwana wanjelele
Atala azilundu zyatununkilizyo.
Koswiilila uwe O julu, ayebo O nyika teelela, nkaambo Jehova waamba, Wati, Ndakalela bana akubakuzya, pele sunu bandipapila.
Musune ulizi simalelo wakwe, ayalo imbongolo ilizi cilido nciipegwa kumwami wayo, Pele ba-Israyeli tabezi, bantu bangu tabayeeyi.
Maawe! Cisi cabasizibi! Bantu balemenwa milandu! Lunungu lwabacita bubi! Bana babisizya! Baleka Jehova, Basampaula Uusalala wa-Israyeli, Bapiluka kunsi.
Ino nkaambonzi nomuciyanda kuumwa? Muciya bupapila mane mwainda! Mutwe woonse ulaciswa, awalo moyo woonse ulalengauka.
Kuzwa kumalyatilo aazituta mane kusikila kucanza camutwe taakwe buponi mulimbabo, cita mibukusu amibunda azilonda ziasama, Tabana kwaangwa nikuba kusilikwa nikuba kubombekwa amafuta.
Cisi canu cilisaalidwe. Minzi yanu ilipiide mulilo. Inyika yanu, bazwakule balailya kumeso aanu, Ilisaalidwe, ilibisizidwe bazwakule.
