Mwana musimbi wa-Ziyoni wasyaala mbubonya mbuli kaanda mumuunda wamasaansa, mbuli cilao mumuunda wamakowa, mbuli munzi uusinkilidwe basilumamba.
Jehova wamakamu niwakatusiila bace loko basyeede, nitwakakozyana a-Sodoma akuba mbubonya mbuli Gomora.
Zipaizyo zyanu zinji zili amilimonzi kulindime? mbwaamba Jehova. Ndizwide zituuzyo zyabagutu amafuta aabanyama baneneede. Nsiyandi bulowa bwabacende na bwatubelele na bwampongo.
Ciindi nimusika kuboneka kubusyu bwangu, ino nguni wamulailila kuti mulyataule obo lubanza lwangu?
Mutaleti limbi zipaizyo zyabuyo. Tununkilizyo tulandisesemya. Mapobwe aamwezi mupya amasabata ambungano nzimubunganya! We! Nsikonzyi kubotelwa bubi ambungano zisalala-salala.
Mapobwe aanu aamwezi mupya amapobwe amwi aabikidwe, moyo wangu ulaasula. Alandikataazya, ndacimwa kulemenwa ngao.
Na mwatandabika maanza aanu, njoofwinya meso aangu cakutamubona. Nekuba kuti mwakomba zikombyo zinji, nsikooyooswiilila. Maanza aanu alizwide bulowa.
Amusambe, mulisalazye. Amugwisye bubi bwamilimo yanu kumeso aangu. Amuleke kucita bubi,
amwiiye kucita kabotu. Amuyandaule imbeta ziluleme, amugwasye bapengede, amubeteke makani aabamusyaala, amukazizyanye bamukabafu.
Na mwazumina kuswiilila, muyoolya bubotu bwanyika,
pele na mwakaka akupapila, muyooligwa ipanga, nkaambo mbuboobo mbwiiamba milomo ya-Jehova.
Maawe! Munzi musyomesi wasanduka buti kuba simamambe! Kuuzwide imbeta, abululami bwakalikede mulinguwo, anu sunu mobali bajayi buyo,
Insiliva yako yasanduka, yabija. Waini wako ulivwelene amaanzi.
Basilutwe bako mbasicinguni, mbeenzinyina ababbi. Boonse balayandisya makulo, balabika myoyo yabo kumalumbu, Tababeteki makani aabamusyaala, aalo makani aamukamufu taamvwigwi kulimbabo.
Alimwi njooboozya ijanza lyangu kulinduwe, kuti nsalazye mankwisilili aako akugwisya mundalila wako.
Elyo njooboozya babetesi bako babe mbuli bataanzi, abalo basinkuta bako mbubonya mbuli kumatalikilo. Nkabela kusule lyayaaya uyooambwa munzi wabululami, munzi musyomesi.
Ziyoni uyoonununwa alubeta, abasanduki babo abululami.
Pele basimilandu abasizibi bayoonyonyoonwa antoomwe, abaabo baleka Jehova bayoomanisigwa.
Nkaambo bayoofwa insoni kumibanga njimwakayandisya. Muyoousa insoni kumyuunda njimwakasala.
Nkaambo muyooba mbuli mubanga uufwidwa matu aawo, ambuli muunda uubula maanzi.
Muntu muyumu uyooba mbuli butonge, amilimo yabo iyooba mbuli insasi yamulilo. Boonse bayoopya antoomwe, nkabela takukooyooba muntu wakubazimya.
Ngaaya majwi aa-Isaya mwana wa-Amozi, makani ngaakabona aa-Juda a-Jerusalemu.

Misyobo minji inooya bwaamba kuti, Atwiinke, tukaye kucilundu ca-Jehova, kuŋanda ya-Leza wa-Jakobo, elyo uyootwiisya inzila zyakwe, nkabela tuyooenda muziyanza zyakwe. Nkaambo mu-Ziyoni muyuozwa mulao, alyalo ijwi lya-Jehova liyoozwa mu-Jerusalemu.

Nkabela uyoobeteka akati kamasi akukosola makani aamisyobo minji, Lino bayoofula mapanga aabo abe maamba aakulimya, amasumo aabo abe zizibyo zyamisamu. Cisi tacikooyoobweza ipanga lyakulwisya cisinyina. Tabakooyooiya inkondo limbi pe.
Nkaambo wabaleka bantu bako baluzubo lwa-Jakobo, nkaambo kakuti bazula ziyanza zyakujwe, alimwi mbasondi mbuli ba-Filisti, alimwi balatanga mulongo abana babeenzu.
Nyika yabo ilizwide insiliva angolida; zintu zyabo ziyandisi tazibaliki. Nyika yabo ilizwide mabbiza, azyalo inkalaki zyabo tazibaliki.
Nyika yabo ilizwide zikozyano zyamituni; balakomba milimo yamaanza aabo beni azintu minwe yabo beni nziyakapanga.
Muntu mutengwana ulakotama, alakwe mupati ulalibombya. Nkaambo kako utabalubi.
Njila mukati kamandomba, koyuba mulusuko, kuzwa kukuyoowegwa kwa-Jehova abulemu bwabupati bwakwe.
Kulisumpula kwamuntu kuyoobombesegwa, akulilemeka kwabantu kuyoosisigwa ansi. Jehova alike nguuyoolemekwa mubuzuba obo.
Nkaambo boonse basicisapi abalikankaizya aboonse balisumpula bayoosikilwa buzuba bwa-Jehova, elyo bayoobombesegwa.
Ayalo misamu yoonse yakedari yaku-Lebano iisumpulwa, amibanga yaku-Basani,
azilundu zyoonse zilamfu, atulundu toonse tusumpulwa,
amaanda oonse malamfu, amalambo oonse aabikilwa zilwisyo,
amaato oonse aakuTarisi, azikozyano zyoonse zyeebesi, zyoonse buyo ziyoosikilwa buzuba.
Kulisumpula kwa bantu kuyoobombesegwa, akulilemeka kwabantu balya maila kuyoosisigwa ansi, Jehova alike nguuyoolemekwa mubuzuba obo.
Lino zikozyano zyamituni ziyoomaninina.
Nkabela bantu bayoonjila mumampangala aamumandomba amumalyango aamunyika nkaambo kakuyoowa Jehova abulemu bwabupati bwakwe naazoobuka kukutikimuna nyika.
Mubuzuba obo muntu uyoosowa zikozyano zyakwe zyansiliva azikozyano zyakwe zyangolida nzibakalipangila kuti azikotamine. Ulazisowela basimalukwe abasimudima,
kuti anjile mumalindi aamumandomba amumalyango aamumabwe, nkaambo kakuyoowa Jehova abulemu bwabupati bwakwe naazoobuka kukutikimuna nyika,
Amuleke kusyoma muntu uuyooya mumansyono aakwe, Ulagwasya nzi?
Ulagwisya mupati asilumamba, mubetesi amu sinsimi amusondi amudala,
silutwe wankamu yabantu bali makumi osanwe amuntu mulemu, mubuli ayooyo uucenjede kukufula ayooyo uubwene kulowa, boonse buyo.
Nzoobika banike, babe bami babo. Twana tuyoobeendelezya.
Elyo bantu bayoopenzegwa, umwi aumwi kumuntunyina, umwi aumwi kumaanza aabeenzinyina. Mwanike uyoolisumpula kumupati, alakwe musampusi uyoolisumpula kumulemu.
Muntu naazoojata mweenzinyina wamuluzubo lwawisi cakwa amba kuti, Uwe nojisi zyakusama, koba mweendelezi wesu, cisi eci cipilingene cibe mumaanza aako,
elyo mubuzuba obo uyooamba kuti, Nsikooyooba musiliki pe, nkaambo muŋanda yangu tamukwe ncinjisi, niciba cilyo niziba zyakusama. Tamukonzyi kundibika mebo kuti mbe mweendelezi wabantu aba.
Nkaambo Jerusalemu ulisaalidwe, acalo cisi ca-Juda cawa, nkaambo majwi aabo ancito zyabo zyoonse zilabisizya Jehova, zilakalazya meso aakwe aabulemu.
Kusalaula kwabo nkokubapa mulandu, Azibi zyabo balazikanana mbuli Sodoma, tabazisisi pe, Maawe kulimbabo! Baliboozezya bulumbu bwabubi.
Amwaambile baluleme kuti balalijanina bubotu, nkaambo bayoolya mi ee lo yamilimo yabo.
Maawe kulisizibi! Ulalijanina bubi, nkaambo bulumbu bweelede bwamaa-nza aakwe buyoomucitilwa.
Bantu bangu, mwanike ngumwami wabo, abanakazi mbobaendelezya, Nubantu bangu, basikweenzya bako balakuleesya, balabisizya inzila yakweenda kwako.
Jehova uliimvwi kuti akazyanye. Wanyampuka kuti abeteke bantu bakwe.
Jehova uleza kukubeteka bapati babantu bakwe abasilutwe babo, Wati, Ndinywe mwakabisizya muunda wamasaansa. Imbono zisaalidwe zyabatengwana zili mumaanda aanu.
Mwaba anzi? Nkaambonzi mulapwaya bantu bangu akuziya masyu aabatengwana? Mbwaamba Jehova Mwami wamakamu,
Alimwi Jehova wakati, Nkaambo kakuti bana basimbi ba-Ziyoni balisumpula, alimwi baleenda ansingo ziimvwi ameso aalanga-langa, kuya busyansyaila akucokola-cokola kumaulu aabo,
Mwami ulaumya bana basimbi ba-Ziyoni zilonda kulubwebwe akuvumbulula cinswe cabo,
Mubuzuba obo Mwami uyoogwisya bweebesi bwatuntu twabo, incoko atukozyano twazuba atukozyano twamwezi,
tucaca ankaya amasambambi,
misini ancoko antambo at ukwa ti twamalonze ansengo,
anwenwe atusita,
azikobela azizwaato aruputi azikwama,
azibonimbeni azisani zituba azitambala azivumbyo.

Elyo mucibaka camisamu iinunka kabotu muyooba bubozi, mucibaka calutambo muyooba loozi, mucibaka camasusu aabambidwe kabotu muyooba lubala, mucibaka cazyakusama zyeebesi muyooba kuzwaata masaka, mucibaka cabweebesi muyooba caando.
Baalumi bako bayoowisigwa ipanga, abasilumamba bako bayoojayigwa munkondo.
Milyango yakwe iyoolila akoomoka, nkabela uyoosaalwa akukala ansi.
Elyo oyo uusyeede mu-Ziyoni ayooyo uucikede mu-Jerusalemu uyooambwa kuti ulasalala, nkukuti boonse balembedwe mbuli baumi mu-Jerusalemu,
Jehova naazoomana kusanzya itombe lyabana basimbi ba-Ziyoni akusalazya bulowa bwa-Jerusalemu mukati kawo kumuuya wakubeteka awakutenta.

Elyo Jehova uyoolenga ajulu lyazikalilo zyoonse zyacilundu ca-Ziyoni ambungano zyakwe zyoonse ijoba ciindi casikati abusi amabangabanga aamulilo uubeka-beka ciindi camasiku, nkaambo bulemu boonse buyooba atente lyakuvumbya.
Kuyooba itente lyakuvuna kunkasaalo ciindi casikati alyakuvuna alyakuyubila ciindi caguwo acamvula.

Elyo wakalima-lima, wagwisya mabwe, wazikila musaansa mubotu loko, alimwi wakayaka ingazi, akusya idindi lyakusinina masaansa. Lino wakali kulangila kuti uzyale micelo, pele wakazyala micelo yamusokwe buyo.
Nubantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu abantu boonse ba-Juda, amubeteke makani aangu amakani aamuunda wangu wamasaansa.
Sa kwakasyaala cintu niciba cimwi ncindakabula kucitila muunda wangu? Ino nkaambonzi, ciindi eco nindakali kusyoma kuti ulazyala masaansa, wakazyala masaansa aamusokwe buyo?
Amuswiilile, nkamulwiide ncinti citile muunda wangu, Njoogwisya lubaya lwawo, elyo uyooligwa; njoomwaya bulambo bwawo, elyo uyoolyataulwa.
Njoousaala. Taukooyoosonzolwa nikuba kusagwidwa. Kuyooboneka myuunga amitubetube buyo mulinguwo. Alimwi njoolailila mayoba kuti aleke kuwisya imvula alinguwo.

Nkaambo muunda wamasaansa wa-Jehova wamakamu nduzubo lwa-Israyeli, abalo bantu ba-Juda musamu wakwe mubotu, Wakali kulangila lubeta, pele wakajana kupenzya buyo; wakali kulangila bululami, pele wakajana kulila buyo.
Nkaambo kako Jehova wamakamu wakakonka mumatwi aangu, wati, Ncobeni maanda manji ayoosaalwa. Maanda mapati mabotu ayoobula bantu bakede mumo.
Nkaambo muunda uulimwa basune bali ikumi uyoozyala cisuwo comwe buyo. Zyeelesyo zili ikumi zyambuto zilazyala ceelesyo comwe buyo.
Kagoma anyeele anamalwa akantimbwa awaini, zyoonse zilajanwa mumapobwe aabo, pele tababiki myoyo yabo kumilimo ya-Jehova, ancito zyamaanza aakwe tabaziboni.
Nciceeco bantu bangu ncibatolelwa mubuzike nkaambo kakubula luzibo, Balemu babo bafwa inzala, ababuleya bawizuka nkaambo kanyotwa.
Nkaambo kako cikalilo cabafwa calikomezya, caasamuna mulomo waco cakuteelekeka, nkabela bulemu bwabo alupyopyongano lwabo abuvubi bwabo ayooyo uusekelela, zyoonse zilaselukila mulincico.
Muntu mutengwana ulakotama, alakwe mupati ulalibombya, aalo meso aabasikulisumpula alafwiinsigwa,
pele Jehova wamakamu ulalemekwa mukubeteka, Leza uusalala ulasalazigwa mubululami.
Lino tubelele tuyoocela mumani aabo, aalo masena aasaalidwe aabaneneede tupongo tuyooalya.
Maawe kulibaabo bakwela milandu antambo zyabuyo, azibi balazikwezya intambo zyanola.
Balaamba kuti, Abindane akufwambya milimo yakwe, kuti twiibone. Makanze aa-Musalazi wa-Israyeli aswene kufwaafwi, aze, kuti tuzibe mbwaabede!
Maawe kulibaabo baamba kuti bubotu mbubi, bubi mbubotu; babika mumuni mucibaka camudima amudima mucibaka camumuni; babika kulula mucibaka cabunono abunono mucibaka cakulula.
Maawe kulibaabo balipa busongo mumeso aabo beni, alimwi balayeeya kuti tuli bacenjede.
Maawe kulibaabo bali anguzu zyakunywa waini, abasinguzu bavwelanya zya kunywa zikola.
Mbombabo balulamika sizibi kuti balye makulo, abululami bwamululami balamunyanzya mbubo.

Nkaambo kako, mbubonya mbuli mabangabanga mbwaalya zisikosiko, abuungu mbubuwa mukati kamulilo, mbubonya obo muyanda wabo uyooba mbuli bubozi, amalubaluba aabo ayoomwaika mbuli lusuko. Nkaambo basampaula mulao wa-Jehova wamakamu, alyalo ijwi lya-Musalazi wa-Israyeli balikwiilila.

Nkaambo kako bukali bwa-Jehova bwabukila bantu bakwe. Watandabika ijanza lyakwe, wabauma, nkabela zilundu zyakankama, ayalo mitunta yabo yaba mbuli bufumba mukati kamigwagwa. Nekubaboobo bukali bwakwe tabuna kumana, ijanza lyakwe licitandabikidwe.
Nkabela uyoosumpwida bamasi bazwa kule citondezyo akubasibila kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika, elyo bayoofwambaana kuza aluno.

Takukooyooba muntu naba omwe akati kabo uukataala naba uulifumpuzya, Takukooyooba naba omwe uuona naba uuli muŋonzi. Takukooyooba naba omwe uuangulukidwe lutambo lwakucibunu cakwe naba uukonokelwa intambo zyansangu zyakwe.
Mivwi yabo yoonse ilinonedwe, amata aabo oonse alibambidwe. Insumba zyambizi zyabo zyayuma nta mbuli mabwe, amavwili aabo alayeeyegwa kuti ali aluno mbuli kambizi.
Kuvuluma kwabo kuli mbuli kuvuluma kwamulavu. Balavuluma mbuli basyuumbwa, Balalila, balajata nyama, balainka ayo, nkabela taakwe uukonzya kwiivuna.
Balavuluma kulimbabo mubuzuba obo mbuli kuvuluma kwalwizi. Elyo uulanga nyika uyoobona mudima buyo amapenzi. Mumuni ulasiizigwa mumayoba aabo.
Ajulu lyakwe kwakaliimvwi baangelo baserafimu. Umwi aumwi kajisi mababa aali musanu alimwi, obile aakulivumba kubusyu, obile aakulivumba kuma ulu, obile kaali aakuulusya.
Nkabela umwi aumwi wakoongolola akwaambila mweenzinyina kuti, Ulasalala! Ulasalala! Ulasalala Jehova wamakamu! Nyika yoonse ilizwide bulemu bwakwe.
Lino intalisyo zyazikunguzyo zyakazungaana kujwi lyayooyo iwakoongolola, ayalo iŋanda yakazula busi.
Mpawo ndakaamba kuti, Maawe mebo! Ndanyonyooka! Nkaambo ndi muntu uusofweede kumilomo, alimwi ndikede akati kabantu basofweede kumilomo, lino meso aangu alibwene Mwami Jehova wamakamu.
Elyo kwakanduulukila umwi wabaserafimu, mujanza lyakwe kajisi ikala lyamulilo ndyaakabwezede alumano kuzwa kucipaililo.
Wakalyaampya mulomo wangu, wandaambila kuti, Bona! Eci caampa milomo yako, lino milandu yako yamana, azyalo zibi zyako zyasalazigwa.
Elyo ndakamvwa ijwi lya-Mwami lilabuzya kuti, Ino nguni ngunti tume? Nguni uukonzya kutwiinkila? Mpawo ndakaamba kuti, Mpendi! Unditume mebo!
Wakati, Koya ukaambile bantu aba kuti, Kumvwa amumvwe pele mutaswiililisyi. Kubona amubone pele mutabonesyi.
Neneesya moyo wabantu aba, lemezya matwi aabo akulamba kumeso aabo, kuti bataboni kumeso aabo nikuba kumvwisya kumatwi aabo nikuba kuswiililisya mumyoyo yabo, batasanduki akuponesegwa.
Elyo ndakaamba kuti, Mane kusikila ciindi nzi, O Mwami? Wakavuwa kuti, Mane lumwi minzi iyoosaalwa akubula bakede mumo, aalo maanda ayoobula bantu, ayalo nyika iyoosaalwa cakugambya.
Jehova uyoosakanya bantu kule, aalo masena aasaalidwe ayoovula mukati kanyika.
Nekuba kuti cipanzi cakumi mucicili mulinjiyo, ciyootentwa alimwi, mbubonya mbuli mubanga na muzwamalowa mbuusyaalilwa cisindi kuciindi cakugonkwa, Lunungu lusalala ncecisiko caco.
Elyo luzubo lwa-Davida lwakaambilwa kuti, Ba-Aramu balitangene mulongo aba-Efraimu, Nkabela moyo wakwe amyoyo yabantu bakwe yakakankama mbubonya mbuli misamu yamusokwe mbiizungaana nuunga muuwo.
Lino uleelede kumwaambila kuti, Cenjela! Umuna! Utayoowi! Moyo wako utawizuki nkaambo kazeezi zifumpu zyobile zyazisisi zisunta, Utayoowi bukali bwa-Rezini abwabaAramu abwamwana wa-Remaliya.
Ba-Aramu bavwiya makani mabi aakukubisizya, abalo ba-Efraimu amwana wa-Remaliya. Bati,
Katuya, tukalwisye cisi ca-Juda, tukacisaale akucipwaya, elyo tuyoobika mwami umbi mukati kaco, nkukuti mwana wa-Tabeeli.
Pele mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Makani taakooyoocitwa obo pe. Taakooyooba.
Nkaambo mutwe wa-Aramu ngu-Damasko, amutwe wa-Damasko ngu-Rezini. Myaka iili makumi aali musanu alimwi aisanu niitana kumana, ba-Efraimu balapwayigwa, tabakooyooba limbi cisi.
Mutwe wa-Efraimu nguSamariya, amutwe wa-Samariya ngumwana wa-Remaliya. Na mwakaka kuzumina, ncobeni tamukooyooimisigwa.
Lino Jehova wakaambila Ahazi lwabili kuti,
Kokumbila citondezyo kuli-Jehova Leza wako, Kokumbila citondezyo camubulondo bwamaanzi niciba cakujulu kujulu.
Pele Ahazi wakavuwa kuti, Nsikookumbili pe. Nsikoesunkisya Jehova.
Elyo wakati, Amuswiilile nuluzubo lwa-Davida, Sa kukataazya bantu takumulami? Sa mulayanda kukataazya Leza wangu alakwe?
Lino Mwami mwini ulamupa citondezyo. Amubone! Musimbi uyoomita, uyoozyala mwana mulombe, uyoomuulika izina lya-Imanueli.
Uyoolya buci amabisi naazookula akuziba kukaka bubi akusala bubotu.
Nkaambo naacitana kuziba kukaka bubi akusala bubotu, nyika njoyoowa bami bayo bobile iyoosaalwa.
Jehova uyoosisya kulinduwe akubantu bako akuluzubo lwauso mazuba aatana kusika kuzwa kuciindi eciya cisi ca-Efraimu nicakaandaanisigwa acisi ca-Juda. Uyoosisya mwami wa-Asuri.
Lino mubuzuba obo Jehova uyoosibila luuka luli kumagolelo aamilonga ya-Egepita anzuki zili mucisi ca-Asuri.
Nkabela zyoonse ziyoosika, ziyookala muminkuni iitakwe bantu amumpako zyamandomba amumaunga amumani oonse.
Mubuzuba obo muntu uyooembela impwizi yaŋombe ambelele zyobile,
Nkabela nkaambo kamukupa munji nguzikamwa uyoolya mabisi. Nkaambo boonse bantu bacisyeede munyika bayoolya mabisi abuci.
Mubuzuba obo masena oonse aakajisi misaansa iili cuulu iiulwa mali aansiliva aali cuulu ayooba amaunga amitubetube buyo.
Muntu asika nkuko uyooletelela mivwi abuta, nkaambo nyika yoonse iyoozula maunga amitubetube.
Azilundu zyoonse izyakalimidwe maamba, tokooyoosika limbi kulinzizyo nkaambo kakuyoowa maunga amitubetube. Ziyooba zyakweembelela iŋombe akulyataulwa imbelele.
Lino Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Ulibwezele ibbwe ipati lyakulembela, ukalembye alindilyo cilembyo camuntu. Lemba kuti, Eci ncica-Sikubi­ nzyalusaalo Sikufwanzyalunyanzyo.
Nkabela njoolibwezela bakamboni basyomesi, Uriya mupaizi a-Zekariya mwana wa-Jeberekiya.
Elyo nindakaswanaana amukamusinsimi, wakaminta, wazyala mwana mulombe. Nkabela Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Umuulike izina lya-Sikubinzyalusaalo Sikufwanzyalunyanzyo.
Nkaambo mwana natana kuba aluzibo lwakwaamba kuti “Ta” a “Ma”, imbono zya-Damasko abuvubi bwa-Samariya zyoonse ziyootolwa kumwami wa-Asuri.
Lino Jehova wakandaambila lwabili kuti,
Bantu aba mbubakaka maanzi aa-Siloamu aaenda caluumuno, alimwi babika myoyo yabo ku-Rezini akumwana wa-Remaliya,
lino amubone! Mwami ulabapazizya maanzi aamulonga, amaanzi manji aali anguzu, nkukuti mwami wa-Asuri abulemu bwakwe boonse. Ulapayila mafolo aawo oonse akusotoka myuuma yawo yoonse,
ulaya bufuta mane kusikila kucisi ca-Juda, Ulapaya akufutisya, ulatana kunsingo. Kutandabala kwamababa aakwe kuyoozuzya nyika yako yoonse, O Imanueli.
Amupyopyongane, nubantu—pele mulapwayigwa. Amuswiilile, nyoonse numuzwa kule. Amulyaange kucibuno—pele mulapwayigwa. Amulyaange kucibuno—pele mulapwayigwa.
Amubuzyanye makani. Pele makanze aanu ayooloba. Amwaambe majwi. Pele majwi aanu taakooyooba pe, nkaambo Leza uli aswe.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Jehova mbwaakandaambila, ijanza lyakwe nilyakandijata. Wakandicenjezya kuteenda munzila yabantu aba. Wakati,
Mutaambi kuti, Twaabwa, ciindi coonse bantu aba nibaamba kuti, Twaabwa. Mutayoowi ncibayoowa balo, nikuba kukankama nkaambo kaco.
Jehova wamakamu ngumweelede kusalazya, Nguwe ngumweelede kuyoowa akukankama kubusyu bwakwe.
Nkabela uyooba macijilo aasalala. Alimwi uyoobeda inzubo zyoonse zyobile zya-Israyeli ibbwe lilebya amwala uufumpuzya. Uyoobeda bantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu kooze acigece.
Bantu banji bayooleba alinguwe, bayoowa akupwayigwa, bayooteegwa akujatwa.
Elyo njoolindila Jehova uusisila luzubo lwa-Jakobo busyu bwakwe. Njoomulangila.
Amubone! Mebo abana Jehova mbaakandipa twaba zitondezyo amalele mucisi ca-Israyeli. Aya makani azwa kuli-Jehova wamakamu uukede mucilundu ca-Ziyoni.
Amubike myoyo yanu kumulao akubukamboni! Na tabaambi mbuli ijwi eli, nkukuti tamukwe mumuni mulimbabo.
Balainda akati kanyika balipengede akufwa inzala, Elyo kuyooba kuti, ciindi eco nibayoofwa inzala, bayoocimwa, bayootukila mwami wabo a-Leza wabo, akupungula ajulu.
Lino nibalanga ansi, bayoobona mapenzi amudima. Kulasia mbi nkaambo kamafwabi. Nkabela bayootandwa oko kumudima.
Bantu ibakeenda mumudima babona mumuni mupati, Abo ibakakede munyika yalufu iisia mbi bapasukilwa mumuni.
Wavuzya bantu bacisi, wabayungizizya busekelezi. Balasekelela kuhusyu bwako mbubonya mbubasekelela basikutebula, mbuli mbubakondwa bantu baabana lusaalo.
Nkaambo ijoko lyamukuli wakwe amusako wakucifunzi cakwe ankoli yayooyo iwakamupenzya, zyoonse wazipwaya mbuli mubuzuba bwakuzundwa kwa-Midyani.
Nkaambo insangu zyoonse zyabasilumamba ziya bundindima munkondo, azyakusama zyoonse zikandidwe mubulowa, zyoonse buyo ziyooba zyakutenta, ziyooba inkuni zyamulilo.
Nkaambo iswe twazyalilwa mwana, twapegwa mwana mulombe. Bwsendelezi buyookala azifunzi zyakwe, Nkabela izina lyakwe liyooambwa kuti, Sinkuta uugambya, Leza Singuzu, Tateesu Uuteeli, Mwami waluumuno.

Bwami bwakwe buyookomenesya, alwalo luumuno talukooyoomana, acuuno cabwami ca-Davida abweendelezi bwakwe. Uyoobubusya akubwiimya nji alubeta abululami kuzwa kuciindi ecino mazuba oonse mane kukabe kutamani. Busungu bwa-Jehova wamakamu mbobuti cite aya makani oonse.
Mwami wakatuma mulazyo kuli-Jakobo, wakamvwigwa mucisi ca-­Israyeli.
Lino bantu boonse bayoouziba, ba-Efraimu abaabo bakede mu-Samariya. Mukulikankaizya kwabo amukulisumpula kwamyoyo yabo balaamba kuti,
Zitina zyawa, pele tuyooyasya mabwe aabezedwe; mikuyu yagonkwa pele tuyoobika misamu yakedari mucibaka cayo.
Nkaambo kako Jehova ulababusizya basinkondonyina babo, akubinzya basikubalwisya.
Ba-Aramu bakunembo aba-Filisti bakusule, boonse bayooluma ba-Israyeli cakuvundika, Aya makani oonse aba, nekubaboobo bukali bwakwe tabuna kumana, ijanza lyakwe licitandabikidwe.
Nkaambo kako Jehova uyoogonkela cisi ca-Israyeli mutwe amucila woonse, tukunka amatete oonse, mubuzuba bomwe.
Munene amulemu, ngonguwe mutwe; amusinsimi uuiisya zyakubeja, ngonguwe mucila.
Basikweenzya bantu aba balabaleesya munzila imbi; abaabo baenzegwa banyonyooka.

Nkaambo kako Mwami takooyookondelwa bakubusi babo, abalo bamusyaala babo abamukabafu babo takooyoobafwida luse, nkaambo boonse buyo mbasicinguni, balacita zibi, ayalo milomo yoonse ilaamba bufubafuba, Aya makani oonse aba, nekubaboobo bukali bwakwe tabuna kumana, ijanza lyakwe licitandabikidwe.
Nkaambo bubi bulapya mbuli mulilo uutenta myuunga amitubetube; ulayaka munsaka zyamusokwe, elyo busi bwazyo bulaya busuka kujulu,
Nkaambo kabukali bwa-Jehova wamakamu nyika ilasizigwa. Bantu baba mbuli inkuni zyakukunkya mulilo. Taakwe naba omwe uufwida mweenzinyina luzyalo.
Muntu uyoonyanzya zilyo kululyo, pele uciyoofwa inzala; uyooiya kulumwensi, pele takooyookuta. Bayoolya umwi aumwi nyama yamweenzinyina.
Manase ulapenzya Efraimu, Efraimu ulapenzya Manase, aboonse bobile balapenzya Juda. Aya makani oonse aba, nekubaboobo bukali bwakwe tabuna kumana, ijanza lyakwe licitandabikidwe.
Maawe kulibaabo bakosola makani aataluleme, abalembi balemba zyakupenzya,
kuti bakasye batengwana kubetekelwa kabotu akunyanzya bacete babantu bangu imbeta zyabo zyeelede, kuti basaale bamukabafu akunyanzya imbono zyabamusyaala.
Ino muyoocitanzi mubuzuba bwakuswayigwa, mapenzi naazoosika kuzwa kule? Muyoocijila kulini kuti mugwasigwe? Ambono zyanu muyoozisia kuli?
Muyookotama buyo kunsi lyabaabo bajatwa, muyoowa kunsi lyabaabo bajayidwe. Aya makani oonse aba, nekubaboobo bukali bwakwe tabuna kumana, ijanza lyakwe licitandabikidwe.
Njoomutuma kukulwisya cisi citalemeka. Njoomulailila mbwaelede kucitila bantu mbundikalalila, kuti asaale lusaalo akunyanzya lunyanzyo akubalyataula mbuli intimba yamumigwagwa.
Pele walo tayeeyi obo pe. Moyo wakwe tuukanzi obo. Nkaambo mumoyo wakwe ulayeeya kunyonyoona bantu akumana zisi zinji loko.
Ulaamba kuti, Basilutwe bangu sa tabali bami?
Sa Kalino tuuli mbuli Karikemesi? Sa Hamati tuuli mbuli Aripadi? Sa Samariya tuuli mbuli Damasko?
Ijanza lyangu lyatana akuzisi zyamituni izyakajisi zikozyano kwiinda Jerusalemu a-Samariya.
Lino sa nsikooyoocitila Jerusalemu azikozyano zyawo mbubonya mbuli mbundakacitila Samariya azikozyano zyawo?
Lino Mwami naazoomaninina milimo yakwe yoonse mucilundu caZiyoni amu-Jerusalemu, uyoobweedezya moyo uusumpwidwe wamwami wa-Asuri bulumbu bweelede akubonzya bulemu bwakulikankaizya kwameso aakwe.

Nkaambo wakati, Ncendacita ndacicita kunguzu zyajanza lyangu akubusongo bwangu, nkaambo ndicenjede, Ndasandula minyinza yamisyobo yabantu, azyalo imbono zyabo ndazisaala. Mbundi singuzu ndafwiinsya abo ibakakede azyuuno zyabwami.

Ijanza lyangu lyakajana buvubi bwabantu mbuli citeente camuyuni mbucijanwa. Mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwabunganya mai aasiidwe, mbuboobo mbundakabunganya nyika yoonse. Katakwe naba omwe iwakaputya ibbaba nanka kwaasama amulomo nanka kulila nsiyonsiyo.
Ma! Sa kaleba kalakonzya kulikankaizya kuliyooyo uukatebbya? Sa isaha lilalisumpula kuliyooyo uulibelesya? Sa inkoli ilalyuumya oyo uuibwezede? Na musako sa ulabweza muumi uutali cisamu buyo?
Nkaambo kako Mwami Jehova wamakamu uyootuma bulwazi bwakukotezya baneneede bakwe, alimwi kunsi lyabulemu bwakwe kuyooyaka kuyaka mbuli kuyaka kwamulilo.
Mumuni wa-Israyeli uyooba mulilo, alakwe Musalazi wakwe uyooba mabangabanga. Uyooyaka akutenta mamvwa aakwe amitubetube yakwe mubuzuba bomwe.
Uyoomaninina bulemu bwalusaka lwakwe abwamuunda wakwe wambolezi. Mubili amuuya woonse, zyoonse ziyootentwa. Kuyooba mbuli sikuyumuna citondezyo naawizuka.
Nkabela misamu iisyeede mulusaka lwakwe iyooba mice buyo; mwana uyookonzya kumana kwiilemba yoonse.
Elyo mubuzuba obo, ba-Israyeli basyeede abaabo baluzubo lwa-Jakobo balobokede tabakooyoosyoma limbi oyo iwakabauma. Bayoosyoma ncobeni Jehova Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Kulapiluka bamwi basyeede, bana baJakobo basyeede, kuli-Leza Singuzu.
Nkaambo bantu bako, O Israyeli, nekuba kuti bavulisya mbuli musenga wakunkomwe yalwizi, kuyoopiluka bamwi buyo basyeede. Bulwazi bwakumaninizya bwakosoka, Makani alapazya bululami.
Nkaambo kuyooba mamanino aakosokede. Mwami Jehova wamakamu uyooacita akati kanyika.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova wamakamu. Nobantu bangu mukede mu-Ziyoni, mutayoowi mu-Asuri, nekuba kuti wakuumya inkoli akukunyampwida musako mbubonya mbuli ziyanza zyaba-Egepita.
Nkaambo kwasyaala kaindi kaniini loko, elyo bukali bwangu buyoomana, lunyemo lwangu luyooleka.

Jehova wamakamu uyoomubusizya mitatula, mbubonya mbwaakacita ciindi eciya ba-Midyani nibakazundwa kundomba ya-Orebi. Musako wakwe uyooba ajulu lyalwizi, uyoousumpula mbubonya mbwaakacitila ba-Egepita.
Elyo mubuzuba obo mukuli wakwe uyoogwisigwa amakuko aako, alyalo ijoko lyakwe liyoozwa kunsingo yako, Ijoko liyoonyonyooka nkaambo kakunanikwa.
Bazubuka acito, baloona ku-Geba. Rama ulakankama, Gibeya wa-Saulo wacija.
Ongolozya ijwi lyako, O Mwana musimbi wa-Galimu! Koswiilila, O Laisi! Komuvwiila, O Anatotu.
Madimena waloboka. Bantu bakede mu-Gebimu balibamba kucija.
Buzuba obuno ulaima ku-Nobi. Ulazungaanya ijanza lyakwe kumwana musimbi waZiyoni, cilundu caku-Jerusalemu,
Amubone! Mwami Jehova wamakamu ulagonka mitabi cakuyoosya. Balamfu ciimo balagonkwa; basumpwidwe balafwiinsigwa.
Ulagonka butale zisaka zyamusokwe, nkabela Lebanoni ulawa mbuli mbwawa singuzu.
Uyookalwa Muuya wa-Jehova, Muuya wabusongo awakuswiililisya, Muuya walulayo awanguzu, Muuya waluzibo awakulemeka Jehova.
Uyookondwa kulemeka Jehova, Takooyoobeteka kukuyeeya zintu ziboneka kumeso buyo, nikuba kukosola makani cakuzuminina majwi ngaamvwa kumatwi buyo.
Uyoobeteka bacete cakululama, akukosweda batengwana banyika makani aaelede. Nkabela inkoli yamilomo yakwe uyooiumya basikupenzya, aluyooyo lwamukanwa lyakwe uyoolujazya basizibi,
Bululami buyooba lutambo lwakucibunu cakwe, alusyomo luyooba lutambo ndwalyaanzya kucikungu.
Lino umpe uyookala antoomwe akabelele; siluwe uyoolala antoomwe atupongo; moombe akalavu bayoolya mucilido comwe; boonse bayoolala antoomwe, nkabela mwana muniini uyoobeembela.
Impwizi asuntwe bayootangana mulongo; bana babo bayoolala antoomwe. Alakwe mulavu uyoocela bwizu mbubonya mbuli iŋombe.
Mwana uucinyonka uyoosobana abulyango bwanzoka, amwana uulesedwe uyoobika ijanza lyakwe abwina bwacipile.
Tabakooyooluma nikuba kunyonyoona moonse mucilundu cangu cisalala, nkaambo nyika iyoozula luzibo lwa-Jehova mbubonya mbuli maanzi mbwaazuzya lwizi.
Uyoobusizya bamasi citondezyo, uyoobunganya ba-Israyeli bamwaikide akuyobolola ba-Juda batandidwe kuzwa kumabazu oonse one aanyika.
Elyo ibbivwe lya-Efraimu liyooleka, abasinkondonyina Juda bayoonyonyoonwa. Ba-Efraimu tabakooyoofwida ba-Juda ibbivwe, abalo ba-Juda tabakooyoopenzya ba-Efraimu.
Nkabela bayoosaala minkuni yaba-Filisti kumbo, abalo bana bakujwe bayoobanyanzya antoomwe. Bayootandabika maanza aabo kukulwisya ba-Edomu aba-Moabu, abalo bana ba-Amoni bayoocita milazyo yabo.

Lino Jehova uyoonyonyoona lulimi lwalwizi lwa-Egepita, alimwi uyoobusya ipuumina lyakwe akuzungaanya ijanza lyakwe kumulonga, uyoovuma ube tulonga tuli musanu atubili, elyo kuyoozubukwa ansangu kumaulu.
Nkabela kuyooba mugwagwa wabantu bakwe basyeede, abo balobokede kuzwa ku-Asuri, mbubonya mbuli mugwagwa ba-Israyeli ngubakajana mubuzuba obo nibakapola kuzwa kucisi ca-Egepita.
Ncobeni Leza ndufutuko lwangu. Njoosyoma akutayoowa, nkaambo Mwami Jehova ninguzu zyangu, ndolwiimbo lwangu, lino waba lufutuko lwangu.
Nkaambo kako muyooteka maanzi cakukondwa mumikalo yalufutuko.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo muyooamba kuti, Amulumbe Jehova, amulemeke izina lyakwe. Amuzibye bantu milimo yakwe, amubazibalusye kuti izina lyakwe ndilemu.
Amwiimbile Jehova, nkaambo wacita milimo iibotezya, Eci cili ampuo munyika yoonse.
Ongolola cakukondwa, uwe nokede mu-Ziyoni, nkaambo mulemu Uusalala waIsrayeli uuli akati kako.
Ndalailila basalazi bangu, ndaita basinguzu bangu, balemu bangu basekelela, kuti bazuzikizye bukali bwangu.

Amuswiilile! Lyamvwigwa ijwi lyalupyopyongano akati kazilundu mbuli ijwi lyabantu banji. Amuswiilile! Ndijwi lyamakamu makamu aabantu bamami aabamasi, balibungene. Jehova wamakamu ulabunganya impi yabasilumamba bakulwisya.
Balazwa kucisi cili kule loko, kumagolelo aakujulu, nkukuti Jehova azibelesyo zyabukali bwakwe. Baleza kukunyonyoona nyika yoonse.
Amulile, nkaambo buzuba bwa-Jehova buli afwaafwi. Buyoosika mbuli lunyonyooko luzwa kuli-Syaatwakwe.
Nkaambo kako maanza conse ayookompama, amyoyo yoonse yabantu iyoowizuka.
Bayookankama, Kuciswa akuzunta kuyoobajata mbubonya mbuli inzunto zyamwanakazi uumisr. Bayoogamba kukulangana umwi aumwi mweenzinyina. Masyu aabo ayooba mbuli mulilo.
Amubone! Buzuba bwa-Jehova buleza. Mbuzuba buyumu, bulijisi lunyemo abukali bunji. Bulasaala nyika cakugambya akunyonyoona basizibi bali mulinjiyo.
Nkaambo inyenyeezi zyakujulu abandakutema zilaleka kumunika. Izuba liyoosizigwa ciindi cakupasula; awalo mwezi uyookasya mumuni wawo.
Elyo njoobweedezya nyika bulumbu bwabubi bwayo, abasizibi bayoopegwa mulandu ngubeelede. Njoolesya kulisumpula kwabasicinguni akufwiinsya basikupenzya balikankaizya.
Njoocita kuti muntu abe muyandisi mbuli ingolida iisalala. Muntu uulya maila uyooyandika mbuli ingolida yaku-Ofiri.
Nkaambo kako njoozungaanya ijulu, ayalo nyika iyootenkana mpiibede, mubukali bwa-Jehova wamakamu amubuzuba bwalunyemo lwakwe lupati.
Lino kuyooba kuti, mbubonya mbuli insya iitandidwe ambuli imbelele iitakwe mweembeli, bayoopiluka umwi aumwi kubantu bakwe mwini, bayoocija umwi aumwi kunyika yakwe nkwaakazyalilwa.
Umwi aumwi uujanwa uyooyaswa; umwi aumwi uujatwa uyoojazigwa ipanga.
Atwalo twana twabo tuyoopwayaulwa kumeso aabo. Maanda aabo ayoosaalwa, abanakazi babo bayootizigwa.
Amubone! Ndabusya ba-Medi kuti babalwisye. Aba tabayeeyi insiliva, tabayandi ingolida.
Mata aabo ayoopwayaula bakubusi. Tabakooyoofwida bana bamwida luzyalo, Meso aabo taakooyoofwida bana luse.
Nkabela Babuloni, uujisi bulemu kwiinda zisi zyoonse, bweebesi ba-Kasidi mbubalikankaizizya, uyooba mbuli Sodoma a-Gomora ciindi eciya Leza naakaimwaya.
Taukooyookalwa limbi mane kukabe kutamani. Taakwe uuyookala mulinguwo mumazyalani oonse. Mu-Arabu takooyooliyakila cilao nkuko, abalo beembeli tabakooyoocezya matanga aabo mulinguwo.
Pele banoole bayoolala nkuko. Maanda aabo ayoozula bamwaaba. Impowani ziyookala oko, azyalo zyeelo ziyoozyana nkuko.
Baumpe bayoolila mumaanda aabo aabwami, abasuntwe mumaanzanda aabo meebesi. Ciindi cakwe cili afwaafwi. Mazuba aakwe taakooyooyungizizigwa.

Bantu bayoobabweza akubasisya kubusena bwabo, nkabela bantu baluzubo lwa-Israyeli bayoobavuba munyika ya-Jehova, babe bazike babo abazike basimbi babo, Bayootola mubuzike abo ibakataanguna kubanjizya mubuzike, alimwi bayooendelezya basikubapenzya.
Lino mubuzuba obo Jehova naazookulemunwida buusu bwako amapenzi aako amilimo yako miyumu njiwakabelesegwa,
uyoobelesya cikozyano eci cakusampaula mwami wa-Babuloni. Uyooamba kuti, Waleka buti sikupenzya? Waleka buti munzi mulemu?
Jehova watyola musako wasizibi, inkoli yabeendelezi,
ibakali kuumya bantu zyuumo lyoonse, ibakali kukomya bantu cabukali lukomo lutakasigwi.
Nyika yoonse yaumuna, yatontola. Lino boonzomoka kwiimba.
Ayalo misamu yakupresi ilakusekelela, amisamu yakedari yaku-Lebano. Ilati, Kuzwa kuciindi eco niwakafwiinsigwa, takucikwe muntu uuza kutugonka.
Cikalilo cabafu cakunsi cakukankamya mbucikutambula, Cilakubusizya basangu, basolozi boonse banyika. Cabusya bami boonse babamasi kuzyuuno zyabo.
Boonse balatyabana, balakwaambila kuti, Ma! Sa sunu wakompaama mbuli ndiswe? Sa waba mbubonya mbuli iswe?
Kulisumpula kwako kwaselusigwa kucikalilo cabafu, acikwala catuntimbwa twako, Imvunyu zilaya bufumba kunsi lyako, azyalo ziyokansi zilakuvumba,
Ma! Waloka buti kuzwa kujulu, O intanda, mwana wabucedo! Wagonkwa buti ansi yebo owakafwii-nsya bamasi!
Wakaamba mumoyo wako kuti, Nkatante kujulu. Nkaimike cuuno cangu cabwami kujulu lyanyenyeezi zya-Leza. Nkakale atala lyacilundu cambunganino kumabazu aakumusanza.
Nkatante kujulu loko kwiinda mayoba. Nkakozyane a-Leza Mupati.
Nekubaboobo uzooselusigwa kucikalilo cabafu, kumagolelo aacilindi.
Boonse bakubona bayookweebela, bayookuyeeya kuti, Sa ngooyu muntu iwakazungaanya nyika? Sa ngooyu iwakateketya masi?
Sa ngooyu iwakasaala nyika yoonse kuti ibe mbuli inkanda? Sa nguwenya iwakavwinyuna minzi yayo? Sa nguwenya iwakakasya baange bakwe kuzwa muntolongo?
Bami babamasi boonse buyo baloona cabulemu, umwi aumwi muŋanda yakwe mwini.
Pele uwe wasoowegwa kuzwa kukabanda kako mbuli mutabi uusesemya, ulisamide bajayidwe bayasidwe apanga, baseluka kumabwe aamucilindi, mbuli mutunta uulyatwiidwe.
Tookooyooswananizigwa abo mukuzikwa, nkaambo nyika yako waibisizya, abalo bantu bako wabajaya. Bana basikucitazibi tabakooyooambwa lyoonse.
Amubambile bana bakwe bujayi nkaambo kamilandu yawisaabo, kuti batabuki kukuvuba nyika akuzuzya nyika yoonse minzi.
Njoobuka kukubalwisya, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu; njoonyonyweda Babuloni izina abantu basyaala, abana alunungu, mbwaamba Jehova.
Njooubika kuti ube cikalilo canungu, ube maziba aamaanzi. Njooukukuzya cikukuzyo calunyonyoono, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Njoopwaya muAsuri mucisi cangu akumulyataula azilundu zyangu. Elyo ijoko lyakwe liyoozwa kulimbabo, amukuli wakwe uyoogwisigwa kumakuko aabo.
Ngaaya makani aakanzwa aanyika yoonse. Ndeeli ijanza litandabikidwe kukulwisya bamasi boonse.
Nkaambo Jehova wamakamu nguwakosola makani. Nguni uukonzya kwaalobya? Ijanza lyakwe lilitandabikidwe. Nguni uukonzya kulibweedezya?
Utasekeleli, O cisi coonse ca-Filistiya, nkaambo kakuti inkoli iyakakuuma yatyoka, nkaambo kuzwa kumiyanda yanzoka kulazwa cipile, nkabela micelo yakwe iyooba inzoka inkali iiuluka.
Elyo bana bataanzi babatengwana bayoosaninwa, abalo bacete bayoolala cakutayoowa. Nkabela njoojazya miyanda yako inzala, abantu bako basyeede bayoojayigwa.
Kolila, O mulyango. Koomoka, O munzi. Weenzunuka, O cisi coonse ca-Filistiya. Nkaambo kulazwa busi kunyika, nkabela taakwe uutasika kuciindi ncabikilwa.
Lino batumwa babamasi bayoovwiilwa nzi? Bayoovwiilwa kuti Jehova nguwakatalisya Ziyoni, nkabela mumonya mu-Ziyoni bacete babantu mobayoojana macijilo.
Waya kukulila kuzipaililo zyakuzilundu ku-Bayiti aku-Diboni, Ba-Moabu balalilila Nebo a-Medeba. Amitwe yoonse aboneka cinkulu, azyalo zilezu zyoonse zilinyooledwe.
Mumigwagwa yabo balisamide zisani zyamasaka, Atala anduli zyabo amumasambalilo aabo boonse balalila amisozi ilambulumuka.
Awalo Hesiboni ulalila, a-Eleale. Ijwi lyayo lilamvwigwa kule akusikila ku-Jahaza. Nkaambo kako basilumamba baMoabu balalilisya, Myoyo yabo ilakankama muzyamba zyabo.
Moyo wangu ulalila Moabu. Basilutwe bakwe bacijila ku-Zoari, ku-Egilati watatu, Balaya butanta kuya ku-Luhiti, balaya bulila, nkaambo munzila ya-Horonaimu balalizya cililo calunyonyooko.
Nkaambo maanzi aaNimirimi ayooyuminina. Mani apusama, mweemvwe wanyana, taakwe mafulo aasia-sia.
Nkaambo kako buvubi mbubajisi ambono nzibabikide, zyoonse ziyootolwa kukalonga kamizimbwa.
Nkaambo cililo casika koonse koonse kumigaano yoonse ya-Moabu. Kuuula kwabo kwamvwigwa akuEglaimu, kuuula kwabo kwamvwigwa ku-Beerelimu,
Nkaambo meenda aa-Dimoni alizwide bulowa, nkaambo njooletela Dimoni aamwi mapenzi. Ba-Moabu balobokede abaabo basyeede munyika, njoobausizya balavu.
Nkabela mbuli bayuni batuntulika, ambuli tuyuni tumwaikide kuzwa kuciteente, mbubonya obo mbubayooba bana basimbi ba-Moabu kuzito zya-Arinoni.
Bati, Mutulaye, mutukoswede makani. Cenzule cako cibe mbuli masiku izuba nilibala ciindi casikati. Sisa batandidwe, Utayubununi basimutuntuli.
Batandidwe bangu bakale-kale kulinduwe. BaMoabu, kobabeda ciyubilo cakubavuna kubasikusaala. Nkaambo kunyanzya kwamana, kusaala kwalesegwa, abalo basikupenzya banyonyoonwa mucisi.
Lino cuuno cabwami ciyooimikwa aluzyalo, nkabela kuyooba uukala alincico calusyomo mucilao ca-Davida. Ulabeteka akubamba imbeta akufwanzya bululami.
Lino ba-Moabu bayoolilila ba-Moabunyina. Boonse buyo bayoolila. Muyoosukama zibunge zyamicelo zya-Kirihareseti. Muyoopenga loko.
Nkaambo myuunda ya-Hesiboni yapusama, ayalo misaansa yaku-Sibima. Bami babamasi bamwaya misamu yabo mibotu. Bakasika aku-Jazeri, baya bweendeenda munkanda. Mitabi yabo yakamwaika, yazubuka lwizi.
Nkaambo kako njoolilila misaansa yaku-Sibima kulila kwa-Jazeri. Njookutuntulwida amisozi yangu, O Hesiboni a-Eleale, nkaambo micelo yako iibizidwe akutebula kwako zyoonse zyasikilwa cikwala cankondo.
Lwafwa lukondo abusekelezi boonse mumyuunda yambolezi, amwalo mumyuunda yamasaansa taakwe kwiimba akusekelela. Taakwe uulyataula waini muzisinino. Koonzomoka kwakutebuzya masaansa ndakulesya.
Nkaambo kako mala aangu alalilila Moabu mbuli kantimbwa, amoyo wangu ulalilila Kiriheresi.
Lino Moabu naazooboneka akulikataazya kucilundu, naazoosika kubusena bwakwe busalala kukukomba, takoozookonzya.
Ngaayo makani Jehova ngaakaamba aa-Moabu kalekale.

Lino sunu Jehova waamba kuti, Kwamana myaka yotatwe, mbuli myaka yasimilimo, bulemu bwa-Moabu buyoosampaulwa, amakamu makamu aakwe oonse, Abaabo bayoosyaala bayooba bace buyo, tabakooyooba amakani pe.
Minzi ya­ Aroeri ilisiidwe, yaba yakoona matanga, nkabela taakwe uuakonga.
Ayalo iŋanda yakulwisya iyoolekwa mucisi ca-Efraimu, a-Damasko acisi coonse ca-Aramu uyoofwidwa bwami. Bayooba mbubonya mbuli bulemu bwabana ba-Israyeli, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Kuyooba mbubonya mbuli ciindi mutebuzi naatebula maila aaimvwi, kuboko kwakwe nikubweza makunka. Kuyooba mbuli kucela kwamakunka mukuti lya-Refaimu.

Nekubaboobo kuyoosyaala zyakuvulula mbuli musamu waolifa nuutikinisigwa. Kulasyaala micelo yobile na yotatwe amutwe wamusamu, na micelo yone na yosanwe mumitabi yaanze yamusamu, mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Mubuzuba obo muntu uyoolangila Mubambi wakwe, ameso aakwe ayootongomwena Musalazi wa-Israyeli.
Takooyoolangila zipaililo nzyaakapanga maanza aakwe, nikuba kutongomwena zintu nziyakacita minwe yakwe, zikozyano zyamisamu azikozyano zyazuba,
Mubuzuba obo minzi yanu yamalinga iyooba mbuli matongo aaba-Amori aba-Hivi, ngebakasia nibakalwisigwa bana ba-Israyeli. Tiikooyookalwa limbi.
Waluba Leza walufutuko lwako, andomba yanguzu zyako tona kwiiyeeya pe. Nkaambo kako, nekuba kuti uyoozikila miziki mibotu akubyala imbuto zyazizikilo zyeenzu,
nekuba kuti mubuzuba bwakuzikila kwako uyoozyungulusya muunda lubaya, alimwi uyookuzya imbuto zyako cifumo, kutebula kuyoofwililila mubuzuba bwamapenzi abwabuusu bugambya.
Maawe! Mandondomo aabantu banji loko! Balandondoma mbuli mandondomo aalwizi. Kubbobboma kwabamasi! Balabbobboma mbuli kubbobboma kwamaanzi manji!
Bamasi balabbobboma mbuli maanzi manji, Pele uyoobatapatila, elyo bayoocijila kule, bayootandwa mbuli buungu buulusigwa amuuwo kuzilundu ambuli lusuko lulundumuka nilyuungisya iguwo.
Ciindi camangolezya kulaboneka makani aayoosya, lino kabutana kuca, tabakoonoociliwo, Nceeci caabilo cabaabo batusaala amakani ngebayoosikilwa abo batunyanzya imbono.

Ilatuma batumwa alwizi mumaato aamatete aaenda atala lyamaanzi. Ilati, Kamuya, nubatumwa basiluno, kumusyobo wabantu balamfu banjelema, bantu ibakali kuyoosya lyoonse kuzwa kumatalikilo, musyobo singuzu uuya bulyataula zisi, bantu bali anyika iiandawidwe tulonga-longa.
Nubantu boonse banyika, nyoonse nomukede ansi, citondezyo niciyoosumpulwa atala lyazilundu, amubone; mweembo nuuyoolizigwa, amuswiilile.
Kkaambo mbuboobu Jehova mbwaakandaambila. Nkaumune, nkalange mucikalilo cangu, mbuli mumuni wazuba uubekabeka, mbuli ijoba lyamume mukati kankasaalo yakutebula.
Nkaambo nibatana kutebula, malubaluba naamana, micelo yamusaansa niitalika kubizwa, uyoogonka tumintenga azizibyo, ayalo mitabi iiyandabede uyooitenda akwiisowa,
Elyo iyoosiilwa bayuni bapati bamuzilundu abanyama bamusokwe. Bayuni bapati bayoosaninwa njiyo ciindi cacilimo, abalo banyama bamusokwe bayoosaninwa njiyo ciindi campeyo.

Kuciindi eco Jehova wamakamu uyooletelelwa mutelo kuzwa kumusyobo wabantu balamfu banjelema, bantu ibakali kuyoosya lyoonse kuzwa kumatalikilo, musyobo singuzu uuya bulyataula zisi, bantu bali anyika iiandawidwe tulonga-longa, Uyooletwa kubusena bwazina lya-Jehova wamakamu, kucilundu ca-Ziyoni.
Nkabela njoobusya ba-Egepita kuti balwisye ba-Egepitanyina. Bayoolwana, umwi aumwi amuzyalwenyina, umwi aumwi amweenzinyina. Munzi uyoolwisya munzinyina, acisi ciyoolwisya cisinyina.
Moyo wa-Egepita uyooata mucamba cakwe, amakanze aakwe oonse njooapilinganya. Elyo bayoobika myoyo yabo kumituni akubasondi akubasibusangu akubalozi.
Lino njooaba ba-Egepita mumaanza aamwami muyumu. Mwami mukali uyoobaendelezya, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova wamakamu.
Elyo maanzi aakulwizi ayoomana, amulonga uyooleka kweenda, uyooyuminina.
Milonga iyoonunka. Tulongalonga twa-Egepita tuyoomaninwa maanzi mane tukayuminine. Matete amalelebu oonse ayoobola.
Mafulo aakulwizi, kunkomwe yalwizi, azyoonse zibyalidwe kulwizi, zyoonse ziyooyuminina, ziyootandwa mane tazikooyooba limbi.
Abalo basikuzuba bayoolila, aboonse bawaala tulobyo mulwizi bayoopenga, abaabo bateya tunyandi mumaanzi bayoofwaba.
Abo babeleka milimo yabutonje abaabo bapesa masani aatuba, boonse bayoousa insoni.
Minsemu yakwe iyoopwayaulwa, aboonse babelekela mali bayoousa mumyoyo yabo.
Basilutwe ba-Zoani mbafubafuba buyo. Basinkuta bacenjede ba-Farao, lulayo lwabo lwasampuka. Uyooambila buti Farao kuti, Ndi mwana wabasongo, mwami wabami baciindi.
No bali kuli basongo bako? Bakulwiide, bazibe makani Jehova wamakamu ngaakanzide aa-Egepita.
Basilutwe ba-Zoani bafubaala, basilutwe ba-Nefi baenwa. Bami bamikowa yakwe mbobamuleesya Egepita munzila.
Jehova wavwelenganya miyeeyo yamyoyo yabo alweeno, aboobo balaleesya Egepita mumilimo yakwe yoonse mbubonya mbuli mukolwi mbwapampalika mukuluka kwakwe.
Takukoosyaalilwa Egepita milimo niiba imwi iikonzya kucitwa kumuntu, nuuba mutwe nuuba mucila, nituba tukunka naaba matete.
Nkabela nyika ya-Juda iyoobeda ba-Egepita ciyoosya. Kufumbwa muntu uuambilwa izina lyayo uyooyoowa, nkaambo kamakanze aa-Jehova wamakamu ngaakanzide kulinjiyo.
Mubuzuba obo kuyooba minzi yosanwe munyika ya-Egepita ilaamba mwaambo wa-Kanana akukonka muzina lya-Jehova wamakamu, Umwi uyooambwa kuti Munzi wazuba,
Ciyoobeda Jehova wamakamu citondezyo abukamboni mucisi ca-Egepita, nkaambo bayookwiilila Jehova nkaambo kabasikupenzya, elyo uyoobatumina mufutuli, muvuni, uyoobafutula.
Jehova uyoozibwa kuba-Egepita, abalo baEgepita bayooziba Jehova mubuzuba obo. Bayookomba akuleta cipaizyo acituuzyo, Bayoolumbila Jehova cilumbizyo, alimwi balacicita mbubonya.
Nkabela Jehova uyoouma Egepita, uyoouma akuponya. Bayoopiluka kuli-Jehova, elyo uyookombelezegwa kulimbabo akubaponya.
Mubuzuba obo musyobo wa-Israyeli uyooba watatu a-Egepita a-Asuri. Bayooba coolwe mukati kanyika,
nkaambo kakuti Jehova wamakamu wabapa coolwe, wati, Babe acoolwe bantu bangu ba-Egepita, aba-Asuri milimo yamaanza aangu, aba-Israyeli lukono lwangu.

Kuciindi eco nciconya Jehova wakaamba kumulomo wa-Isaya mwana wa-Amozi, wati, Koya ukasamunune zisani zyamasaka zyamucibuno cako, akugwisya insangu zyakumaulu aako. Lino wakacita obo, akuya bweenda acinswe azimpata.
Elyo Jehova wakati, Mbubonya mbuli mulanda wangu Isaya mbwaakeenda acinswe azimpata myaka yotatwe kuti abe citondezyo cigambya kumakani aa-Egepita a-Etiopiya,
mbuboobo mwami wa-Asuri mbwazootola-mubuzike ba-Egepita abaangidwe ba-Etiopiya, Bayooenda boonse, banike abapati, azinswe azimpata, amatako aabo aavumbwidwe, kuti ba-Egepita bause insoni.
Lino abo ibakali kusyoma Etiopiya akulemeka Egepita, boonse bayooyoowa akuusa insoni.
Lino mubuzuba obo bantu bakede oku kunkomwe yalwizi bayooamba kuti, Amubone mbubacitilwa abo mbutwakali kusyoma kuti balatuvuna kumaanza aamwami wa-Asuri! Lino iswe tubeni tufutulwe buti?
Ndayubunwidwa makani mayumu. Sikweena uleena, alakwe sikusaala ulasaala. Koya ukabalwisye, O Elamu; kobasinkinizya, O Media. Kulila kwabo koonse ndakulesya.
Nkaambo kamakani aya mala aangu alizwide kuseta, ndajatwa inzunto mbuli inzunto zyamwanakazi uuminsi. Kuciswa kwangu kwandikasya kuswiilila; kukankama kwandikasya kubona.
Moyo wangu ulipilingene; kuyoowa kwandiiaya, Ciindi calubundubundu ncindakali kusukama candibeda cintu ciyoosya.
Balabamba intafule, balabika balindizi, balalya akunywa. Amubuke nubasilutwe, mukananike intobo.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Mwami mbwaandaambila. Wati, Koya ukabike mulindizi, lino kufumbwa ncabona acaambe.
Abona inkamu yabantu batantide, beenda bobile bobile amabbiza, na batantide ambongolo, na batantide ankamele, uleelede kuswiililisya amatwi oonse obile.
Lino wakaita mbuli mulavu, wati, O Mwami, ndiliimvwi acilangilo cangu lyoonse ciindi casikati, amasiku oonse ndalindila angazi yangu.
Lino bona! Njeeyi inkamu yabantu, baleenda bo bile bobile amabbiza. Mpawo wakavuwa kuti, Wawa! Wawa Babuloni! Zikozyano zyoonse zyamizimu yawo zyapwayigwa ansi.
Maawe! Kupola kwangu! Maila aakucipolelo cangu! Eco ncindakamvwa kuli-Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli ndamulwiida ncico,
Lino mulindizi wati, Cifumo cilasika, aalo masiku, Na mwayanda kubuzya, amubuzye. Amuboole, mupiluke.
Oyo iwakafwa nyota bakamutekela maanzi. Bantu ibakakede munyika ya-Tema bakafwambaana kuletela bacijide insima.
Nkaambo bakacija mapanga, ipanga lisomwedwe, abuta butalamikidwe, amapenzi aankondo.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Mwami mbwaakandaambila. Kwasyaala mwaka, mbuli myaka yasimilimo, lino bulemu boonse bwa-Kedari buyoomana.
Abasimata bacisyeede, basilumamba babana ba-Kedari, bayooceya, nkaambo mbubonya obo Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli mbwaambide.
Ngaaya makani aasinsimwa aakuti lyacilengano. Waba anzi lino? Nkaambonzi mulitantide nyoonse atala anduli zyamaanda?
Uwe o Munzi uuzwide kuyobayoba, munzi walupyopyongano, munzi uusekelela: bajayidwe bako teebakajazigwa ipanga, teebakafwa munkondo pe.
Basinkuta bako boonse bakacija antoomwe, bakaangwa kumaanza aabasimata. Boonse ibakajanwa mulinduwe bakaangwa antoomwe, bakacija kule.
Nkaambo kako ndaka ti, Amundifutatile, mulange kumbi, Nkalile loko. Mutasoleki kunduumuzya pe, nkaambo kalunyonyooko lwamwana musimbi wabantu bangu.
Nkaambo buzuba bwamapenzi abwakulyataulwa abwalupyopyongano bwazwa ku-Mwami Jehova wamakamu mukuti lyacilengano. Malambo alamwayigwa, akuzilundu balalila.
Ba-Elamu bakabweza inkomo yamivwi, bakali ankamu zyabantu batantide amabbiza, abalo ba-Kiri bakayubununa intobo.
Lino makuti aako mabotu oonse akalizwide mwa inkalaki, abalo basimabbiza bakalibamba mumindando kumulyango.
Elyo wakayubunwida cisi ca-Juda zyakulivumba zyaco, nkabela mubuzuba ubo mwakali kulangila iŋanda yazilwisyo zyamulusaka.
Nkabela mwakabona munzi wa-Davida mbuwakamwayidwe kumasena manji, elyo mwakabunganya maanzi aaziba lyakunsi.
Alimwi mwakabala mweelwe wamaanda aamu-Jerusalemu, nkabela mwakamwaya maanda kuti mumamike bulambo bwamunzi.
Alimwi mwakacita ikala akati kamalambo obile lyakujata maanzi aaziba lyakalekale, pele teemwakabika myoyo yanu kuliyocyo iwakalenga zintu ezi nikuba kulemeka oyo iwakazibumba kalekale.
Mubuzuba obo Mwami Jehova wamakamu wakaita bantu kuti balile akoomoka akulinyoola akulisamika zisani zyamasaka,
pele bona! Kwaboneka buyo kusekelela akukondwa, kujaya basune akujaya imbelele, kulya nyama akunywa bukoko, cakwaamba kuti, Atulye akunywa, nkaambo junza tulafwa.
Mpawo Jehova wamakamu wakandiyubunwida makani mumatwi aangu. Ncobeni mulandu wanu wazibi zili boobu tuukonzyi kumana cita mufwe, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova wamakamu.
ukamwaambile kuti, Ucitanzi okuno? Nguni simukowanyoko okuno? Nkaambonzi nolibezela kabanda okuno? Ulalibezela kabanda kujulu! Ulalisida cikalilo mundomba!
Swiilila! Jehova uyookusowa anze cakuwaala anguzu! Ncobeni uyookuvunga cakuvungisya.
Uyookulambaila mbuli impila, uyookuwaala munyika impati, elyo uyoofwa nkukonya oko, azyalo inkalaki zyabulemu bwako ziyooba nkuko, uwe nousya luzubo lwamwami wako insoni.
Njookutonta kuzwa kumilimo yako, akukugwisya mubusena bwako.
Lino mubuzuba obo njooita mulanda wangu Eliyakimu mwana wa-Hilikiya,
nkabela njoomusamika cikobela cako akumuyumya alutambo lwako, abwalo bwami bwako njoobwaaba mumaanza aako. Elyo uyooba wisaabo bantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu aluzubo lwa-Juda.
Nkabela njoobika aziwezo zyakwe cijaluzyo caŋanda ya-Davida. Uyoojala, elyo taakwe uyoojula mo; uyoojula, elyo taakwe uuyoojala mo.
Njoomukankamina mbuli inembe mubusena mbwiingangamina, nkabela uyoobeda luzubo lwawisi cuuno cabulemu.
Alinguwe mpobayooanzika bulemu boonse bwaluzubo lwawisi, abana mbazyede alunyungu lwakwe, azibelesyo zyoonse ziniini kuzwa kumitiba yakusambila kusikila kunongo zyawaini.

Mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, inembe iyakakankaminidwe mubusena mbwiingangamene iyoozunguna, iyoogonkwa akuwa, awalo mukuli iwakaanzikidwe alinjiyo uyootemwa, nkaambo mbuboobo Jehova mbwaamba.
Amulile munaato aa-Tarisi, nkaambo ulisaalidwe. Taakwe maanda aasyaala, taakwe manjililo pe. Bayubunwidwa makani aazwa kucisi ca-Kitimu.
Amuumune nubantu bakede kunkomwe yalwizi, inywe numuvubisigwa kubasambazi ba-Sidoni bainda-inda kulwizi.
Mumaanzi manji imbuto zya-Sihori, kutebulwa kwamulonga wa-Nile, nzezyakamuvubya, Kali cisambalilo cabamasi.
Kofwa insoni, O Zidoni, nkaambo lwizi lwaamba. Inguzu zyalwizi zyaamba, Lwaamba kuti, Mebo nsina kumvwa inzunto zyakutumbuka, nsina kuzyala, nsina kukuzya basankwa nikuba kulela basimbi.
Impuo yasika buyo ku-Egepita, bayoopenga loko kukumvwa makani aa-Turo.
Amuzubuke kuya ku-Tarisi. Amulile nubantu bakede kunkomwe yalwizi.
Sa ngooyu munzi wanu wabusekelezi? Sa ngooyu munzi uuli ampuo yakoongola loko? Sa ngooyu iwakali amaulu aakweendeenda kule?
Ino nguni wakakanza aya makani aa-Turo, munzi wamusini, uuli abasambazi bali mbuli bami, abalo basikuulisya bawo mbalemu banyika?
Ngu-Jehova wamakamu iwakakanza makani, kuti afwiinsye kulisumpula kwaboonse beebesi akusampauzya balemu boonse banyika,
Koindilila moonse munyika yako mbuli mbuupaya mulonga wa-Nile, mwana musimbi wa-Tarisi. Tocizyungulukidwe limbi civunyo.
Ijanza lyakwe walitandabika ajulu lyalwizi. Wazungaanya zisi. Jehova walailila aa-Kanana kuti macijilo aakwe anyonyoonwe.
Wati, Tokooyoosekelela limbi, O mwana musimbi uusyanikide wa-Zidoni. Buka, ukazubuke kuya ku-Kitimu, pele akwalo tokooyoojana cilyokezezyo pe.
Amubone nyika yaba-Kasidi! Musyobo oyu tuuboneki limbi. Ba-Asuri baibika kuti ikalwe banyama bamusokwe. Bakayaka maanda aabo malamfu, bakamwaya maanda aayo meebesi, elyo wakainyonyoona.
Amulile numaato aa-Tarisi, nkaambo macijilo aanu alisaalidwe.
Lino mubuzuba obo, Turo uyoolubwa myaka iili makumi aali musanu aabili, mazuba ngaapona mwami omwe, Lino myaka iili makumi aali musanu aabili imane buyo, Turo uyooba mbuli lwiimbo lwasibaalumi.
Kolibwezela kantimbwa, koya bweendeenda mumunzi, O sibaalumi uulubidwe. Uma kantimbwa kabotu, imba nyimbo zinji, kuti uibalukwe.
Elyo kumamanino aamyaka iili makumi aali musanu aabili Jehova uyooswaya Turo, nkabela uyoopiluka kumbono zyakwe, uyooya buvuula azisi zyoonse zyamunyika yoonse.

Lino imbono zyakwe azyakusambala zyakwe ziyoosalazizigwa Jehova. Tazikooyooyobolwa nikuba kubikwa pe, Imbono zyakwe ziyooba zyabaabo bakede kubusyu bwaJehova, kuti bakute akulivumbya zyakusama zitazakali.
Amubone! Jehova ulagwisizya nyika zintu zyoonse zili mumo, ulaisaala, ulaisandamuna akumwaisya bantu bakede mulinjiyo.

Lino muntu uyooba mbubonya mbuli mupaizi, muzike uyooba mbubonya mbuli simalelo wakwe, mulanda musimbi uyooba mbubonya mbuli namalelo wakwe, sikuula uyooba mbubonya mbuli sikuulisya, sizikoloto uyooba mbubonya mbuli sikumukolotesya, ayooyo uupegwa impindu uyooba mbubonya mbuli sikumupa impindu.
Kumaninwa nyika ncobeni yamaninwa zintu, kusaalwa ncobeni ilisaalidwe, nkaambo ndendilyo ijwi Jehova ndyaambide.
Nyika ilalila, ilapusama. Luwa lulanyana, lulapusama. Bantu balisumpula banyika balanyana.
Nyika yasofwaazigwa bantu bakede mumo, nkaambo basotoka mulao, basandula-sandula imbeta akujaya cizuminano citeeli.
Nciceeco lutuko ncilwalida nyika, abantu bakede mulinjiyo balijene mulandu. Nciceeco bantu bakede munyika ncibapiidwa, abantu basyaala mba ee.
Imbote iilwela ilalila, musaansa wapusama, boonse bakondedwe mumoyo balatongela-tongela.
Kuyobeka kwanyeele kwamana, kuyobayoba kwabaabo basekelela kwaleka, kuyobeka kwakantimbwa kwamana.
Tabakooyoonywa waini cakwiimba pe. Zikola ziyoolula kulibaabo bazinywa.
Munzi walupyopyongano lwamwayigwa; maanda oonse alijalidwe, taakwe manjililo.
Mumigwagwa bantu balalilila waini. Lukonde loonse lwabbililwa izuba. Busekelezi bwanyika bwatolwa mubuzike.
Mumunzi mwasyaala lusaalo buyo, acalo citendele capwayigwa pwa.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbukuyooba mukati kanyika akati kabantu. Kuyooba mbuli kutikinisigwa kwamusamu waolifa, ambuli kuvululwakwamasaansa bantu nibamana kale kutebula.
Lino abo basyaala bayoolizya majwi aabo akoonzomoka. Bayooyobeka kuzwa kulwizi nkaambo kabulemu bwa-Jehova.
Nkaambo kako amulemeke Jehova inywe nomukede kujwe, anywebo nomuli kunkomwe yalwizi kumbo amulemeke izina lya-Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli.
Kuyoowa amulindi akakole, zyoonse zilimujisi inywe nomukede ansi.
Lino kufumbwa uucija ijwi lyakuyoowa uyoowida mumulindi, ayooyo uuzwa mumulindi kayoomujata kakole, nkaambo impulunguzyo zyakujulu zyajaluka, nkabela intalisyo zyanyika zyazungaana.
Nyika yamwayigwa loko! Nyika yapwayigwa pwa! Nyika yasunzuluka kasimpe!
Nyika iyoopampalika mbuli muntu uukoledwe. Iyoozungaana mbuli cilao, Milandu yayo iyooilemena, nkabela iyoowa, tiikooyoobuka limbi.
Nkabela bayooyobololwa mbuli baangidwe mbubayobolwedwe muntolongo. Bayoojayilwa muntolongo, elyo amane mazuba manji, bayooswayigwa.
Lino mwezi uyoopilinganizigwa, alyalo izuba liyoofwa insoni, nkaambo Jehova wamakamu uyooendelezya mucilundu ca-Ziyoni amu-Jerusalemu akumeso aabapati bakwe cabulemu.
Nkaambo wakamwaya munzi kuti ube citantaala, amunzi uuli alubaya kuti ube matongo, Iŋanda yabwami bwabazwakule wainyonyoona, aboobo tuucili munzi, tuukooyooyakululwa limbi.
Nkaambo kamakani aya bantu bayumu bayookulemeka, awalo munzi wamisyobo iiyoosya uyookuyoowa.

Nkaambo waba macijilo aabacete, macijilo aamutengwana mumapenzi aakwe, Kulinduwe nkokuyubwa ciindi camvula, kulinduwe nkokuyusilwa izuba nilibala. Nkaambo muuya wabantu bakwe bayoosya uli mbuli iguwo liungisya kubulambo.
Mbuli inkasaalo mubusena buyumu, ulabombya lupyopyongano lwabazwakule. Mbuli izuba mbulibombesegwa kucenzule cajoba, ulabombya mbubonya ciyabilo cabantu bayoosya.
Lino Jehova wamakamu uyoocitila bantu boonse mucilundu ecino ipobwe lyazintu zyamafuta, ipobwe lyawaini uulwela, zintu zyamafuta zibotu, waini uulwela uusefedwe kabotu.
Alimwi mucilundu ecino uyoomenenena civunisyo civunikidwe kumisyobo yoonse acivumbyo civumbide zisi zyoonse.
Lufu walumenenena mane kukabe kutamani. Mwami Jehova uyoosindula misozi kumasyu oonse, akwalo kusampaulwa kwabantu bakwe uyookumanisya, nkaambo mbubeobo Jehova mbwaamba.
Lino mubuzuba obo kuyooambwa kuti, Amubone! Ngooyu Leza wesu, Twali kumulindila kuti atufutule, Ngooyu Jehova. Twali kumulindila. Atukondwe akusekelela mulufutuko lwakwe.
Nkaambo ijanza lya-Jehova liyoolazikwa acilundu ecino, elyo cisi ca-Moabu ciyoolyataulwa mbubonya mbuli bwizu mbubulyataulwa mukati kamaanzi aacitantala.
Elyo uyootandabika maanza aakwe mukati kaco mbubonya mbuli sikuyamba mbwatandabika maanza aakwe mukuyamba, nkabela uyoofwiinsya kulikankaizya kwakwe alweeno lwamaanza aakwe.
Ncobeni malambo aako malamfu aalompolokede uyooafwiinsya, uyooabombya, uyooaboozya ansi akati kalusuko.
Mubuzuba obo kuyooimbwa lwiimbo olu munyika ya-Juda. Tulijisi munzi muyumu, Uyoobika lufutuko lube bulambo bwesu alubaya lwesu.
Amujalule milyango kuti musyobo uululeme uusyomeka unjile.
Oyo uupangika moyo wakwe kulinduwe, uyoomukazika muluumuno lwakasimpe, nkaambo kakuti ulakusyoma.
Amusyome Jehova lyoonse, nkaambo mu-Mwami Jehova momujenwe indomba iitamani.
Nkaambo wafwiinsya abo bakede kujulu, nkukuti munzi uusumpwidwe, Wauselusya, wauselusizya ansi, wausisya akubulongo.
Uyoolyataulwa zituta. Uyoolyataulwa zituta zyabacete azilyatililo zyabatengwana,
Inzila yabaluleme njabulu-Jami. Uwe noluleme uleenzya baluleme munzila zyabo.
Ee, ncobeni twali kukulindila, O Jehova, munzila yambeta zyako. Izina lyako aciibalusyo caka, nzenzizyo nziiyandisya myoyo yesu.
Moyo wangu wali kuku yandisya ciindi camasiku, Ncobeni moyo wangu uuli mukati kangu uyoofuma kukuyandaula, Nkaambo imbeta zyako niziboneka ansi, bantu baluwa balaiya bululami.
Muntu sizibi afwidwa buuya, taiyi bululami pe. Munyika yabulome uyoopilinganya milimo yakwe. Takoobona bulemu bwa-Jehova pe.
O Jehova, kotubambila luumuno, nkaambo milimo yesu yoonse nduwe waicita mukati kesu.
O Jehova Leza wesu, bami bambi batali nduwe batweendelezya, pele nduwe olike ngutuyanda; tulate-mba ula izina lyako olike.
Bafwa, tabakooyoopona limbi. Mbasangu, tabakooyoobuka pe. Nkaambo kako wabaswaya, wabanyonyoona, wajaya ciibalusyo cabo coonse.
Wavuzya bantu bacisi, O Jehova, wavuzya bantu bacisi. Nduwe walemekwa. Wakomezya migaano yoonse yanyika.
Mbuli mwanakazi uuminsi uuli kufwaafwi kutumbuka mbwaamvwa inzunto, alimwi ulalila mukuciswa kwakwe, mbubonya obo mbutwakabede kumeso aako, O Jehova.
Twakaminta, twakamvwa inzunto, pele ncitwatumbuka muuwo buyo. Tatuna kucita buvuni ansi, abantu bakede munyika tabana kuwa.
Bafu bako bayoopona, mitunta yangu iyoobuka. Amubuke, mwiimbe, inywe nobakede mubulongo, nkaambo mume wako uli mbubonya mbuli mume wamumuni. Nyika iyoobusya basangu bayo.
Nkaambo amubone! Jehova ulazwa kubusena bwakwe kuti abweedezye bantu bakede munyika mulandu wabubi bwabo. Ayalo nyika iyooyubununa bulowa bwayo, tiikooyoovumba limbi bajayidwe bayo.
Mubuzuba obo muunda mubotu wamasaansa muyoouimbila.
Mebo nde-Jehova ndaulanga, ndautuntulwida lyoonse. Ndaulanga masiku asikati kuti kutabi uubisizya.
Nsikwe bukali. Nicakabota myuunga amitubetube niyakabikwa kuti indilwisye. Nindakailyataula, akwiiumpa yoonse antoomwe,
Cita ajate inguzu zyangu kuti tuyanzane awe. Ncobeni atuyanzane awe.
Muziindi ziciza luzubo lwa-Jakobo luyoosimpa miyanda, abaIsrayeli bayoosyuuka akucita malubaluba, elyo bayoozuzya luwa loonse micelo.
Sa wabauma mbubonya mbwaakauma basikubauma? Sa balijayidwe mbubonya mbuli basikubajaya mbubakajayigwa?
Kutanda wakamutanda, wakakazyanya awe, Wamutandya kuunga kwakwe mubuzuba bwamuuwo wakujwe.

Lino ncinzi cikonzya kumanya milandu ya-Jakobo? Ncinzi cikonzya kugwisya zibi zyakwe? Cita ataangune kusowa mabwe oonse aacipaililo mbuli mulambo uupwayawidwe kuti zikozyano zya-Aseri azikozyano zyazuba zitabuki limbi.
Nkaambo munzi uuzyungulukidwe lubaya ulisaalidwe, waba matongo, walekwa, wabula bantu mbubonya mbuli inkanda. Nkukooko nkubacela boombe, nkukooko nkubalalalala akulya matu aawo.

Mitabi yawo yanyana buyo, iyoogonkwa, elyo kuyoosika banakazi kuti baitente. Bantu aba tabamvwisyi makani pe. Nkaambo kako sikubalenga takooyoobafwida zyalo, ayooyo iwakababumba takooyoobafwida buuya.
Lino mubuzuba obo Jehova uyoovwimbula maila aakwe kuzwa kulwizi kusikila kukalonga ka-Egepita, nkabela muyoobunganisigwa omwe omwe nubana ba-Israyeli.
Mubuzuba obo kuyoolizigwa mweembo mupati, elyo abo ibakali kunyonyooka mucisi ca-Asuri, abaabo ibakatandidwe munyika ya-Egepita bayoosika boonse, bayookomba Jehova mucilundu cisalala caku-Jerusalemu.
Maawe kumusini wakulisumpula wabasikukolwa ba-Efraimu! Maawe kudubaluba lipusama lyabulemu bwabo bweebesi likede amutwe wakuti lyamafuta lyabaabo bakoledwe bukoko.
Amubone! Mwami ulijisi sintaze singuzu. Ulawaala bantu ansi kujanza lyakwe mbubonya mbuli iguwo lyacivulamabwe, mbuli iguwo liungisya, mbuli maanzi manji apayisya.
Musini wakulisumpula wabasikukolwa ba-Efraimu uyoolyataulwa,

adubaluba lipusama lyabulemu bwabo bweebesi likede amutwe wakuti lyamafuta liyooba mbuli inkuyu itaanguna kubizwa mainza naatana kusika, nkaambo muntu aibone buyo, niicili mujanza lyakwe ulailya ndilyonya.
Mubuzuba obo Jehova wamakamu uyoobeda bantu bakwe bacisyeede musini wabulemu angala yabweebesi.
Uyoobeda mubetesi muuya walubeta naakede mukubeteka, anguzu zyabaabo bapilusya basinkondonyina munkondo nibasika kale kumulyango wamunzi.
Nkaambo intafule zyoonse zilizwide malusi amatombe, Taakwe antu aasalala pe.
Nkaambo mulao ulabikilwa mulao, mulao ulabikilwa mulao, kabala kalabikilwa kabala, kabala kalabikilwa kabala, kulaiyigwa buniini, kulaiyigwa buniini.
Ii, ncobeni uyooambila bantu aba amilomo iimamauka amumwaambo umbi.
Nkaambo mbombabo mbaakaambila kuti, Nceeci cilyokezezyo, cilyokezezyo cabakateede; nceeci cikatalusyo. Pele bakakaka kuswiilila.

Nkaambo kako makani aa-Jehova ababeda mulao uubikilwa mulao, mulao uubikilwa mulao, kabala kabikilwa kabala, kabala kabikilwa kabala, kwiiyigwa buniini, kwiiyigwa buniini. Aboobo balaya kukulebwa kusule. Bayoopwayigwa akucegwa akujatwa.
Lino amuswiilile majwi aa-Jehova nubantu basampaula, inywe numweendelezya bantu aba bakede mu-Jerusalemu.

Mwaamba kuti, Tulitangene cizuminano alufu, acikalilo cabafu twaswiilizyanya aco; mitatula yakukoma yainda, tiikooyoosika kulindiswe pe, nkaambo twabika zyakubeja zibe macijilo esu, amulweeno motuyubide.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Amubone! Ndasitikizya mu-Zioni ibbwe lyakuciswi, lisale, liyandisi, lilisimpikidwe nji, ayooyo uumusyoma takooyoofwambaana kucija.
Nkabela njoobika lubeta lube ceelesyo, abululami bube cipimyo. Lino civulamabwe ciyookukula macijilo aazyakubeja, amaanzi ayootonta ciyubilo canu.
Elyo cizuminano ncimutangene alufu ciyooloba, akuswiilizyanya kwanu alufu takukooyoojata pe. Mitatula yakukoma yainda buyo, muyoolyataulwa kulinjiyo.
Kufumbwa ciindi niinda iyoomutola, nkaambo iyooinda cifumo cimwi acimwi, iyooinda isikati amasiku. Nkabela kumvwisya makani kuyooyoosya buyo.
Nkaambo bulo bwafwimpa bwakulyolola, acilivumbyo caata cakulivumba.
Nkaambo Jehova uyoobuka mbwaakacita kucilundu ca-Perazimu, uyookalala mbwaakakalala mukuti lya-Gibeoni, kuti abeleke milimo yakwe, milimo iiyoosya, akumanisya incito zyakwe, incito iigambya.
Lino mutasampauli pe, cita zyaanzyo zyanu zijatisye, nkaambo ku-Mwami Jehova wamakamu ndimvwide impuo yamamanino aakosokede aati sike kunyika yoonse.
Amuswiilile, mumvwe ijwi lyangu. Amubike myoyo yanu, mumvwe majwi aangu.
Sa mulimi ulalima buzuba boonse kuti abyale? Sa ciindi coonse uli mukusya akupwayaula makankala aakwe?
Amana kubambasika, sa taminzi imbuto zyakezahi akumwaya imbuto zyakumini? Sa tabyali bulotwe mumifolo yabo abbaale mumitundulu amaila kumagolelo aamuunda?
Ulibwene mbukweelede kucitwa, nkaambo Leza wakwe ngumwiiyisya.
Nkaambo cisyu cakezali tacipolwi acipozyo, acisyu cakumini tacipwandwi ivwili lyaŋola pe. Kezahi cilaumisigwa cisamu, akumini cilaumisigwa musako.
Sa bulotwe bulapwayigwa? Muntu tabulyatauli cakutaleka pe. Amana kwiinzya mavwili aaŋola yakwe amabbiza aakwe, tapwayauli limbi pe.
Aya makani aalo azwa kuli-Jehova wamakamu. Ulagambya mululayo lwakwe, abusongo bwakwe mbubotu.
Maawe ku-Arieli! Maawe ku-Arielil munzi Davida nkwaakakala-kala. Mwaka ubikilwe mwaka, ziindi zyamapobwe ziboole,
elyo kabe kaindi njoopenzya Arieli, nkabela kuyooba kulila akoomoka. Uyooba mumeso aangu mbuli Arieli.
Njooyaka zilao zyangu zyakukulwisya. Njookusinkinizya angazi, akubusya maanda malamfu aakukusinkila.
Elyo uyoofwinsigwa mane uambe kuzwa ansi, majwi aako ayoomvwigwa kuzwa kubulongo, Ijwi lyako liyoozwa ansi mbuli ijwi lyamusangu, amajwi aako ayoovwiya-vwiya kuzwa kubulongo.
Makamu makamu aabasinkondonyoko ayooba mbuli lusuko lupepuluka. Makamu makamu aabasintaze bayoosya bayooba mbuli buungu. Lino ndilyonya cakufwambaana,
muyooswayigwa Jehova wamakamu. Uzooboola akundindima amuzunzumo wanyika ajwi ipati. Uzooboola akambizi aguwo amabangabanga aamulilo uuyakisya.
Lino makamu makamu aabantu balwisya Arieli, boonse bamulwisya amacijilo aakwe akumupenzya, bayooba mbuli ciloto ambuli cilengano camasiku.

Kuyooba mbuli muntu uufwa inzala naalota kuti ndalya, elyo asinsimuka ulajana kuti mwida lyakwe tamukwe cintu; na mbuli muntu uufwa nyota naalota kuti ndanywa, elyo asinsimuka ulajana kuti ucilikateede amoyo wakwe ucisukama. Mbuboobu mbwiiyooba misyobo yoonse yabantu iilwisya cilundu ca-Zioni.
Amulindilile, mukagambe. Amulyoofwaazye, mukoofwale. Balikeled we, pele teensi bukoko bwabakola. Baladadalika, pele teensi zyakunywa zyabadadalisya.
Nkaambo Jehova wamutilila muuya waŋonzi, Wamufwinya kumeso nubasinsimi, anywebo nubasicilengano wamuvumba kumitwe.
Lino cilengano coonse camubeda mbuli majwi aabbuku linamatikidwe. Bapa muntu uuiyide, bati, Kobala, pele ulavuwa kuti, Nsikonzyi kubala pe nkaambo lilinamatikidwe.
Alimwi bapa muntu uutaiyide ibbuku, bati, Kobala, pele ulavuwa kuti, Nsicibwene kubala.
Nkaambo kako amubone mbunti cite. Njoobeleka milimo iigambya akati kabantu aba. Njoocita milimo iigambya iiyoosya. Busongo bwabasongo babo buyooloba, abucenjezu bwabacenjede babo buyoosiswa.

Ma! Mulipilingene! Sa mubumbi ulyeelene abulongo bwakwe? Sa cintu cipangidwe cilakonzya kwaamba ayooyo iwakacipanga kuti, Teewakandipanga? Sa cintu cibumbidwe cilakonzya kwaamba aayooyo iwakacibumba kuti, Teewakandibumba?
Kabe kaindi, sa Lebano takooyooba muunda wambolezi, amuunda wambolezi sa tokooyooyeeyegwa kuba lusaka?
Lino mubuzuba obo basinkematwi bayoomvwa majwi aabbuku, ameso aaboofu ayoobona kuzwa kumudima uusia mubabede.
Abalo babombede mumyoyo bayooyungizya lukondo lwabo lwamuli-Jehova, abantu bacete bayoosekelela muli-Uusalala waIsrayeli.
Nkaambo sintaze uuyoosya wafwiinsigwa, amusampauzi taciwo, aboonse bayandaula bubi banyonyooka,
abo ibawisya muntu muzibi kumajwi aabo, akusoleka kuca oyo uutapatila bataluleme mumulyango wamunzi, akuleesya baluleme kucintu cabuyo.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu Jehova iwakanununa Abrahamu mbwaamba aaluzubo lwa-Jakobo. Jakobo takooyoofwa limbi insoni, abusyu bwakwe tabukooyoousana limbi.
Pele abona bana bakwe, balenge bamaanza aangu, mukati kacisi cakwe, bayoosalazya izina lyangu. Ii, bayoosala zya Uusalala wa-Jakobo akulemeka Leza wa-Israyeli,
Lino abo bajisi myoyo yakuleya bayoofunda busongo, abaabo batongauka bayootambula makani.
Banyamuka kuya ku-Egepita, pele tabana kubuzya makani kumulomo wangu, Balayanda kuliyumya munguzu zya-Farao akusyoma cenzule ca-Egepita.
Lino inguzu­ zya-Farao nzeziyoomuusya bweeme, akusyoma eenzule ca-Egepita nkokuyoomulwisya insoni.
Nekuba kuti basilutwe bakwe bali ku-Zoani, abatumwa bakwe basika aku-Hanesi,
boonse balausa insoni nkaambo kabantu aba batakonzya kubagwasya. Tabagwasyi, tabakwe milimo, balausya bweeme buyo akuleta lusampauko.
Lugwasyo lwa-Egepita ndwabuyo, talukwe milimo pe, Nciceeco ncindamuulikila izina lya-Rahabu uukede buyo.
Lino koya ukalembe acilembelo, ukagwale makani mubbuku, kuti kube ciibalusyo mumazuba aaciza mane kukabe kutamani.
Nkaambo mbantu bapapila, bana babeja, bana bata yandi kuswiilila mulao wa-Jehova.
Balaambila balunguluzi kuti, Mutalungululi Abasinsimi balabaambila kuti, Mutatusinsimini zyakutapatila, amutwaambile majwi matete akubona zilengano zyakweena-ena;
amuleye kuzwa munzila, mutole mugwagwa umbi; mutatwaambili limbi makani aa-Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Uusalala wa-Israyeli, Mbuli mbumusampaula aya majwi, akubika myoyo yanu kulunyansyo akulupapilo akusyoma nzizyo,
lino oyu mulandu wanu uyooba mbuli lwaanzi luyanda kuwa; lulaboneka kujulu kubulambo, elyo kaba kaindi bulafwamba kuwa akumwaika ndilyonya.

Lumwayo lwabo luli mbuli lumwayo lwanongo yamubumbi; ilapwayigwa pwa akutafwidwa luzyalo, aboobo akati katupanzipanzi takujenwe niluba lukaye lwakubweza mulilo kuciko niluba lwakutesya maanzi kumukalo,
Mwakati, Pe, tulacija amabbiza, Nkaambo kako muyoocijisya. Mwakati, Tunooya butantide abanyama basiluno. Nkaambo kako abo bamutanda bayooba aluno.
Bantu bali cuulu bayoocija cakuyoowa muntu omwe, muyoocija cakuyoowa bantu bosanwe buyo, mane mwasyaala mbuli kasamu kandembela amutwe wacilundu na mbuli citondezyo atala lyakalundu.
Jehova ulalindila kuti amufwide luzyalo. Ulalisumpula kuti amufwide buuya. Nkaambo Jehova ngu-Leza wabululami. Bali acoolwe boonse bamulindilila.
Ncobeni nubantu ba-Zioni bakede mu-Jerusalemu, tamukooyoolila limbi. Uyoomufwida luzyalo aswiilila ijwi lyakukwiila kwanu. Alimvwe buyo, uyoovuwa ndilyonya.
Nekuba kuti Mwami wamwaabila insima yamapenzi amaanzi aakufwaba, Mwiyi wanu takooyooyuba limbi pe; meso aanu ayoobona Mwiyi wanu.
Nkabela matwi aako ayoomvwa ijwi kusule lyako liti, Njeeyi inzila, amweende mulinjiyo, kufumbwa ciindi nimuleya nikuba kululyo nikuba kulumwensi.
Lino muyoosofwaazya civumbyo cazikozyano zyako zifulidwe zyansiliva acizululuzyo cazikozyano zyako zyangolida. Muyoozisowa mbuli zintu zisofweede akuzyaambila kuti, Kamuzwa!
Abalo basune ambongolo zilima nyika ziyoolya malilu aalungidwe, aapupulwidwe acikombozyo acipupuluzyo.
Nkabela atala azilundu zyoonse zilamfu atulundu toonse tusumpwidwe ayooba tulonga amifolo yamaanzi mubuzuba obo bwabujayi bupati, maanda malamfu naazoowa.

Alimwi mumuni wamwezi uzooba mbubonya mbuli mumuni wazuba, amumuni wazuba uyoovuzigwa ziindi zili musanu azibili, ube mbuli mumuni wamazuba aali musanu aabili, mubuzuba obo Jehova naazooanga zyuumo zyabantu bakwe akusilika mabunda ngubayasidwe.
Amubone! Izina lya-Jehova lilazwa kule, lilapya bukali bwakwe, lili abusi buuntumuka, Milomo yakwe ilizwile bukali, alwalo lulimi lwakwe luli mbuli mulilo uutentesya.
Luyooyo lwakwe luyooba mbuli kalonga kapaya katanwa munsingo. Uyooseba bamasi mulusebo lwabuyo. Amumyeebo yabantu muyooba lumingwa lubaleesya.
Muyooba alwiimbo, mbubonya mbuli ciindi camasiku ipobwe nililigwa, akukondwa kwamumoyo mbubonya mbuli ciindi cakuya busiba nyeele kuya kucilundu ca-Jehova Mandomba aa-Israyeli.
Lino Jehova uyoocita kuti ijwi lyakwe lilemu limvwigwe akutondezya kuvukula kwakuboko kwakwe, abukali bwalunyemo lwakwe: amabangabanga aamulilo uutentesya, aguwo amvula impati acivulamabwe.
Nkaambo ijwi lya-Jehova ndeliti pwaye mu-Asuri iwakali kuumya bantu musako.
Nkabela zyuumo zyoonse zyamusako uubikidwe Jehova nguuti muumye, ziyooba anyeele atuntimbwa, Uyoobalwida munkondo azipaizyo zivukuzidwe.

Nkaambo Tofeti wakabambwa kalekale. Wakabambilwa mwami, Wacilampya kunsi, abwaamba bwaco wabukomezya. Calundikilwa mulilo ankuni zinji loko, Luyooyo lwa-Jehova luli mbuli kalonga kasulufa, ndondulo lucikunka.
Pele ngumusongo alakwe. Uyooleta mapenzi, amajwi aakwe takonzyi kwaaboozya pe, Uyoobuka kukulwisya basizibi abaabo bagwasya basikucitabubi.

Ba-Egepita mbantu buyo, tabali Leza pe, Imbizi zyabo njanyama buyo, tazili zyamuuya pe, Lino Jehova naazootandabika ijanza lyakwe, oyo uugwasya uyoolebwa, ayooyo uugwasigwa uyoowa. Bayooloba boonse antoomwe.

Nkaambo mbuboobu Jehova mbwaandaambila. Mulavu naavuluma, asyuumbwa naandondoma mukulya kwakwe, nekuba kuti beembeli banji loko baitwa kukumulwisya, takonzyi kuyoowa ijwi lyabo nikuba kulibombya nkaambo kakuyobayoba kwabo. Mbubonya obo Jehova wamakamu uyooseluka kuzoolwisya atala lyacilundu ca-Zioni atulundu twaco.
Mbuli tuyuni tuuluka-uluka, Jehova wamakamu uyoovuna Jerusalemu. Uyooutabilila akuuvuna, uyooufwida luse akuufutula.
Nkaambo mubuzuba obo muyoosowa umwi aumwi zikozyano zyakwe zyansiliva azikozyano zyakwe zyangolida nzimulicitilide amaanza aanu aabubi.
Lino mu-Asuri uyoowa, pele ipanga liti muwisye talili lyamuntu. Ipanga litali lyamuntunsi ndeliti mujaye. Uyoocija ipanga, nkabela basankwa bakwe bayootolwa kucibbalo.
Indomba yakwe iyooinda cakuyoowa, abasilutwe bakwe bayoocija akusia kandembela. Mbuboobo mbwaamba Jehova, angonguwe uujisi mulilo wakwe mu-Zioni aciko cakwe mu-Jerusalemu.

Umwi aumwi uyooba mbuli macijilo aakulivuna kumuuwo aciyubilo cakucijila ciindi cakuwidwa imvula yamuyoba. Uyooba mbuli tulongalonga twamaanzi munkanda injumu, mbuli cenzule campangala impati munyika iikataazya.
Lino meso aabaabo babona taakooyoofwinyisigwa, amatwi aabaabo bamvwa ayooswiililisya.
Moyo wamuntu uubinzya makani uyooswiilila luzibo, alulimi lwasicibebe luyoofwamba kwaamba cakuswiililika.
Mufubafuba takooyooambwa limbi kuti watembaulika, alakwe sikweena takooyooambwa kuti ngumulemu.
Nkaambo mufubafuba ulaamba bufubafuba, amoyo wakwe ulacita bubi, kuti acite masampu, aambe aa-Jehova zyakubeja, aimikwe uufwa inzala cilyo akukasya oyo uufwa nyota kunywa.
Sikweena zibelesyo zyakwe nzibi. Ulayeeya makanze mabi kuti anyonyoone babombumyoyo amajwi aakubeja, nekuba kuti mubombumoyo ulaamba makani aaluleme.
Pele mulemu nguuyeeya makanze aalemekeka, nkabela mpoonya awo amakanze aalemekeka mpayooima nji.
Wamana mwaka akaindi buyo, muyookankama inywe nubanakazi batalipenzyi, nkaambo misaansa tiikooyootebulwa, tamukooyoojana micelo yabutebuzi pe.
Amuyoowesye nubanakazi baliibide! Amukankame inywe nubatapengede! Amusamunune, mube acinswe. Amusame zisani zyamasaka muzikungu zyanu.
Amulyuume azyamba zyanu cakulila myuunda mibotu amasaansa aazyala micelo.
Anyika yabantu bangu ayoomena mamvwa amitubetube buyo. Ayoomena atala lyamaanda oonse aakukondwa mumunzi wabusekelezi.

Nkaambo iŋanda yabwami iyoolekwa. Munzi uuli abantu banji uyooba itongo, Cilundu ca-Ofeli aŋanda yakulangilila, zyoonse ziyooba malyango aabanyama mazuba oonse mane kukabe kutamani. Ziyooba butelo bwambongolo zyamusokwe amacelelo aamatanga.
Lino lubeta lubotu luyookala munkanda, abululami buyookalilila mumuunda wambolezi.
Nkabela milimo yabululami iyooba luumuno, acilenge cabululami ciyooba luumuno alusyomo lutamani.
Bantu bangu bayookala mucikalilo caluumuno amumaanda aalusyemo amumasena aacilyokezezyo aakuliiba.
Pele lusaka niluyootemwa kuyooloka civulamabwe, elyo kufwinsigwa munzi uyoofwinsigwa ncobeni.
Muli acoolwe inywe numubyala kumbali lyamaanzi oonse akutuma nkuko myeendo yabasune ayambongolo.
O Jehova, kotufwida luzyalo, nkaambo twali kululangila. Koba kuboko kwesu zifumo zyoonse alufutuko lwesu kuciindi camapenzi.
Lupyopyongano mbulwamvwigwa bamasi bacija. Mbowalibusya bantu bamwaika.
Elyo imbono zilasaalwa mbubasaala bacamusokonya; bantu balasotoka alinzizyo mbuzisotoka zisozi.
Jehova ulisumpwidwe, nkaambo ulakala kujulu. Ulazuzya Zioni lubeta abululami.
Uyooba kusyomeka kwaziindi zyako. Lufutuko abusongo aluzibo, zyoonse ziyoovula. Kulemeka Jehova nee cintu cakwe ciyandisi.
Migwagwa yabula bantu, basilweendo tababoneki limbi. Wajaya cizuminano, wasampaula minzi, talemeki bantu.
Nyika ilalila, ilanyana. Lebano wafwa insoni, wapusama. Saroni waba inkanda buyo. Ku-Basana aku-Karimeli misamu yoonse yatikinizigwa.
Lino Jehova wati, Ndabuka, nkasumpulwe, nkalemekwe.
Muyoominta buungu, muyoozyala zisikosiko buyo. Luyooyo lwanu luyooba mulilo wakumutenta,
Bantu bayooba mbuli kutentwa kwamulambo, mbuli mamvwa aagonkedwe aatentwa mumulilo.
Inywe nemuli kule, amuswiilile ncindacita. Anywebo nemuli kufwaafwi, amuzibe inguzu zyangu mbuzibede.
Basizibi bamu-Zioni balayoowa, basimasampu bajatwa kukankama. Nguni akati kesu uuti kale amulilo uutentesya? Nguni akati kesu uuti kale akutentwa kutamani?

Oyo uuenda mubululami, uuamba zintu ziluleme, uusampaula impindu iizwa kukupenzya bantu, uukaka kutambula masinkamulomo, uusinka matwi aakwe kuti atamvwi makani aabulowa, akufwinya meso aakwe kuti atalangi bubi,
ngonguwe uuti kale kujulu. Macijilo aakwe ayooba mampangala aasyomeka aamumandomba, Cilyo cakwe uyoocipegwa, amaanzi aakwe akunywa taakooyoobulika.
Meso aako ayoobona mwami mubweebesi bwakwe, ayoobona cisi cakwe citandabede kule.
Moyo wako nuuyeeya bantu ibakayoosya, uyoolibuzya kuti, Ino uli kuli mabbalani? Uli kuli oyo iwakali kupimya mali aamutelo? Uli kuli oyo iwakali kubala maanda malamfu?
Tokooyoobona limbi bantu bakali, bantu abo baamba mwaambo muyumu ngotamvwi, mulaka mweenzu ngotakonzyi kuswiililisya.
Pe! Langa Zioni munzi wamapobwe esu. Meso aako ayoobona Jerusalemu, cikalilo cakuliiba, itente litatuntuliki litanonkwedwa abuniini manembe aalyo, azyalo intambo zyalyo tazinunsuki.
Nkaambo oko Jehova Mulemu uyootubeda mucibaka camilonga iikwazeme atulongalonga. Oko takukooyooinda bwaato bukwasulwa ankasi niciba cikwepe cilemu.
Nkaambo Jehova ngumubetesi wesu, Jehova ngusimilao wesu, Jehova ngu-Mwami wesu, ngonguwe uuti katufutule.
Intambo zyatebununwa; teebakakonzya kuyumya munsemu wabwaato, teebakakonzya kuyanika zisani zyakweenzya. Elyo imbono zinji loko zyakaabwa, abalo balema bakasaala imbono.
Lino takukooyooba naba omwe akati kabantu banyika uuamba kuti, Ndaciswa. Bantu boonse bakede mulinjiyo bayoolekelelwa milandu yabo.
Amuswene kufwaafwi nubamasi, mumvwe. Amuswiilile numisyobo yabantu. Nyika imvwe azyoonse zili mumo. Luwa luswiilile azyoonse zizwa mulindulo.
Nkaambo Jehova wakalalila masi oonse, wanyemena makamu makamu aabo oonse. Wabanyonyoona, wabaabila bujayi.
Bajayidwe babo bayoosoowegwa, nkabela mitunta yabo iyoonunka nu. Zilundu ziyooenzunuka kubulowa bwabo.
Makamu oonse aakujulu ayooenzunuka; majulu oonse ayoovungailwa mbuli ibbuku, amakamu aao oonse ayoopusama mbubonya mbuli matu aamisaansa mbwaapusama, ambuli mikuyu mbwiipusama.
Nkaambo ipanga lyangu lyanywa bulowa cakukolwa kujulu. Lino liyooseluka abantu ba-Edomu abantu bamatusi aangu kuti babetekwe.
Ipanga lya-Jehova lilizwide bulowa, lyaneneesegwa mafuta, bulowa bwambelele abwampongo, amafuta aansa zyabagutu, nkaambo Jehova ulijisi cipaizyo mu-Bozira abujayi bupati munyika ya-Edomu.
Nkabela basefu bayoowisigwa abo, basune abacende boonse. Nyika yabo iyookolwa bulowa, abulongo bwabo buyooneneesegwa mafuta.
Nkaambo Jehova ulijisi buzuba bwakuliya nkoto, mwaka wakubweedezya milandu yazibi izyakacitilwa Zioni.
Tulonga twacisi ca-Edomu tuyoosanduka kuba bunzuka, abulongo bwaco buyooba sulufa, anyika yaco yoonse iyooba bunzuka butentesya.

Tacikooyoozima abuniini isikati na masiku. Busi bwaco buyoosuntumuka lyoonse mane kukabe kutamani, Kuzwa kuzyalani limwi kusikila kuzyalani limwi ciyooba matongo, Takukooyooba bantu bainda nkuko mazuba oonse mane kukabe kutamani.
Sifundwe anungu mbebayoocivuba, tumba acikwangala mbebayookala nkuko. Uyoovungulula alincico ceelesyo calupilingano azipimyo zyalupilingano.
Basilutwe baco, taakwe uucili nkuko bwami nibwaambwa, abapati baco boonse tabacibonwi limbi.
Mamvwa ayoomena atala lyamaanda aaco aabwami. Lweemya amikoka ziyoomena mumaanda aaco aakulwisya. Ciyooba cikalilo cabamwaba alubuwa lwampoo.
Banyama bamusokwe bayooswanana abaumpe, abalo bagutu bayoolila umwi aumwi kukwiita mweenzinyina. Muzimu wamasiku uyookala-kalamulincico akulijanina cilyokezezyo.
Mulala uyooyaka citeente cakwe nkuko, uyoozyala mai, uyookonkola akubunganya bana bakwe muceenzule cakwe. Abalo babimbe bayoobungana nkukonya, umwi aumwi uli amweenzinyina.

Amuyandaule makani mubbuku lya-Jehova, mwaabale. Akati kabaabo takukooyooba umwi uubulika. Takukooyooba mwanakazi uubula mweenze wakwe, Nkaambo mulomo wangu nguwakalailila obo, amuuya wangu nguwakababunganya.
Ngonguwe uwakabawaalila cisolo, ajanza lyakwe ndelyakaceelesya akubaabila. Bayoocivuba lyoonse, bayookala mumonya mazuba oonse amuya mazyalani amazyalani.
Inkanda amatongo zyoonse ziyoosekelela, alyalo igundu liyookondwa akusyuuka malubaluba aaebeka.
Kusyuuka liyoosyuuka loko, akusekelela liyoosekelela akwiimba, Liyoopegwa bulemu bwa-Lebano abweebesi bwa-Karimeli abwa-Saroni. Bayoobona bulemu bwa-Jehova, bweebesi bwa-Leza wesu.
Ambila abo bakankama mumyoyo yabo kuti, Amuyume, mutayoowi, Amubone! Leza wanu uleza ankoto, uleza abulumbu bwa-Leza, uleza kuti amufutule.
Lino meso aaboofu ayoobononona, amatwi aabasinke ayoosinkuka.
Cilema unooya busotauka mbuli insya, alulimi lwasyataambi luyooimbisya. Nkaambo maanzi ayooboneka munkanda atulongalonga tuyookunka mugundu.
Musenga uupisya uyoosanduka kuba iziba, ayalo nyika injumu iyooba tusensa twamaanzi. Muŋanda yabamwaba mubakalede muyooba mani amatete amalelebo.
Nkabela nkukonya oko kuyooba mugwagwa anzila. Iyootegwa Inzila yabusalazi. Mulinjiyo tamukooyooinda basofweede, pele iyooba yabantu bakwe. Sinyenda abafubafuba tabakooyooleya mulinjiyo.
Takukooyooba mulavu oko, takakooyooinda banyama bamwi baluma. Abo boonse tabakooyoojanwa, pele bantu banunwidwe mbobati ende mulinjiyo.
