Nkabela banunwidwe ba-Jehova bayooboola akuza bwiimba kusikila ku-Zioni, Bayooba alukondo lutamani amitwe yabo, Bayoojana lukondo abusekelezi, elyo buusu akutongela zyoonse ziyoocijilila.
Lino mwami wa-Asuri wakatuma Rabisake ampi impati kuzwa ku-Lakisi kuya kumwami Hezekiya ku-Jerusalemu, Nkabela wakaima kumufolo waziba lyakutala mumugwagwa wamuunda wabasikusanzya.
Elyo kwakainka kulinguwe Eliyakimu mwana wa-Hilikiya mupati wabasiŋanda, a-Sebina mulembi, a-Joa mwana wa-Asafu sikulemba makani.
Nkabela Rabisake wakabaambila kuti, Amwaambile Hezekiya kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami mupati, mwami wa-Asuri, Ncinzi olu lusyomo lwako ndosyomya?
Ulayeeya kuti majwi aamilomo buyo alyeelene abusongo anguzu zyakugwasya munkondo. Lino nguni ngonga ulasyoma kuti wandipapila?
Ncobeni ulasyoma oyu musako uuli mbuli itete liti fukide, ulasyoma Egepita, itete liyasa ijanza lyakwe kufumbwa uulifunkizya. Mbwabede Farao mwami wa-Egepita kuliboonse bamusyoma.

Pele na wandaambila kuti, Tulasyoma Jehova Leza wesu, sa teensi nguwe Hezekiya ngwaakagwisizya tukombelo twakuzilundu azipaililo, akwaambila bantu ba-Juda abaku-Jerusalemu kuti, Muleelede kukomba kucipaililo eci.
Lino kopana asimalelo wangu mwami wa-Asuri. Njookupa mabbiza aali zyuulu zyobile na uwe ulakonzya kujana basikwaatanta.
Ulakonzya buti kusampaula silutwe naba umwi naba muniini akati kabalanda basimalelo wangu. Ulasyoma buti ba-Egepita kuti bakugwasye inkalaki abasimabbiza.
Alimwi, sa ndeza kuzoonyonyoona nyika eyi cakutazumizigwa Jehova? Jehova nguwakandaambila kuti, Koya ukalwisye cisi eci akucinyonyoona.
Mpuwo Eliyakimu a-Sebina a-Joa bakaambila Rabisake kuti, Utwaambile tubalanda bako muci-Aramu, nkaambo tulamvwa. Utatwaambili muci-Juda mumatwi aabantu bali kubulambo.

Pele Rabisake wakabaambila kuti, Sa mwami wangu wandituma kuzooambila mwami wako and uwe majwi aya? Sa teendakatumwa kuzooambila bantu bakede abulambo abalo, kuti balye mazyu aabo akunywa minsyu yabo beni?
Mpawo Rabisake wakaima, wakoongolola ajwi ipati muci-Juda, Amuswiilile majwi aamwami mupati, mwami wa-Asuri.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami. Hezekiya atamweeni, nkaambo takooyookonzya kumuvuna.
Hezekiya atamusyomyi Jehova cakwaamba kuti, Jehova ncobeni uyootuvuna, aboobo munzi uno tuukooyooabwa mumaanza aamwami wa-Asuri.

Mutaswiilili Hezekiya pe, nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba mwami waAsuri, Amutangane ambebo luumuno akuzwa kumunzi kuza okuno kulindime, elyo muyoolya umwi aumwi micelo yamusaansa wakwe mwini amicelo yamukuyu wakwe mwini akunywa umwi aumwi maanzi aamukalo wakwe mwini,
mane nkaze kuzoomutola kunyika iikozyene anyika yanu, nyika yamaila ayawaini, nyika yazinkwa ayamyuunda yamisaansa,
Amucenjele kuti Hezekiya atamweeni cakwaamba kuti, Jehova uyootuvuna, Sa nkwali naba omwe akati kaba-Leza babamasi iwakavuna nyika yakwe mumaanza aamwami wa-Asuri?
Bali kuli ba-Leza ba-Hamati abaAripadi? Bali kuli ba-Leza ba-Safaravaimu? Sa bakavuna Samariya mumaanzanza aangu?
Nguuli Leza akati kaba-Leza bamasi aya oonse iwakavuna nyika yakwe mumaanza aangu? Lino Jehova ulavuna buti Jerusalemu mumaanza aangu?
Elyo Eliyakimu mwana wa-Hilikiya mupati wabasiŋanda a-Sebina mulembi a-Joa mwana wa-Asafu sikulemba makani bakaboola kuli-Hezekiya azyakusama zyabo zilizapaukide, bamulwiida majwi aa-Rabisake.
Alimwi wakatuma Eliyakimu mupati wabasiŋanda a-Sebina mulembi abapaizi bapati, balisamide zisani zyamasaka, kuli-Isaya musinsimi mwana wa-Amozi.
Bakamwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Hezekiya. Sunu mbuzuba bwamapenzi abwakutapatilwa abwabweeme, nkaambo bana bali mwida pele taakwe inguzu zyakubazyazya.

Ambweni Jehova Leza wako wamvwa majwi aa-Rabisake, mwami wa-Asuri simalelo wakwe ngwaakatuma kuti asampaule Leza muumi. Ambweni Jehova Leza wako uyootapatila majwi ngaamvwide. Lino cikombyo cako ciye kujulu cakukombela bantu basyeede.
Lino balanda bamwami Hezekiya nibakasika kuli-Isaya,
Isaya wakabaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila simalelo wanu. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Utayoowi nkaambo kamajwi ngomvwide, balanda bamwami wa-Asuri ngebasampauzya ndime.
Amubone! Ndamubikila muuya, nkabela uyoomvwa impuwo akupiluka kucisi cakwe. Omo mucisi cakwe mwini njoomujazya ipanga.
Wakamvwa impuwo ya-Tirihaka mwami wa-Etiopiya yakuti, Bona! Weza kuzookulwisya. Elyo naakamvwa wakatuma batumwa kuli-Hezekiya, wabaambila kuti,
Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda. Leza wako ngosyoma atakweeni cakwaamba kuti, Jerusalemu tokooyooabwa mumaanza aamwami wa-Asuri.
Ulimvwide bami ba-Asuri ncibacitila zisi zyoonse, mbubazinyonyoona. Lino uwe uyoovunwa buti?
Elyo zisi bamatata nzibakanyonyoona, sa ba-Leza bazyo bakazivuna? Nkukuti zisi mbuli Gozani a-Harani a-Resefi abana ba-Edeni ibakakede mu-Telesara.
Uli kuli mwami wa-Hamati, amwami wa-Aripadi, amwami wamunzi wa-Safaravaimu, awa-Hena, awa-Iva?
Lino Hezekiya naakatambula lugwalo kumaanza aabatumwa, wakalubala, nkabela ndilyonya Hezekiya wakainka kuŋanda ya-Jehova akuluvungulula kumeso aa-Jehova,
Elyo Hezekiya wakakomba Jehova nkukonya oko, wati,
O Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli nokede akati kabakerebimu, nduwe Leza olike wamasi oonse aanyika. Nduwe wakalenga ijulu anyika.
Koteya matwi aako, O Jehova, uswiilile. Kobika meso aako, O Jehova, ubone. Koswiilila majwi oonse aa-Sanakeribu ngaatuma kukusampaula Leza muumi.
Ncobeni, O Jehova, bami ba-Asuri basaala misyobo yabantu anyika yabo.
Ba-Leza babo bakabawaala mumulilo, nkaambo tabali ba-Leza pe, nzilengwa zyamaanza aabantu, zisamu amabwe, nciceeco ncibakabanyonyweeda.
O Jehova Leza wesu, utuvune kumaanza aakwe, kuti zisi zyoonse zyaansi zizibe kuti nduwe Jehova olike.
Mpawo Isaya mwana wa-Amozi wakatumina Hezekiya ijwi lyakuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Mbuli mbondipailila aamakani aa-Sanakeribu mwami wa-Asuri,
ngaaya majwi Jehova ngaamba aanguwe.
Mwana musimbi nakalindu wa-Zioni wakusampaula, wakudika.
Mwana musimbi wa-Jerusalemu waguna-guna mutwe kusule lyako.
Nguni ngosampaula akumuubya?
Nguni ngolisumpwida mumajwi aako akumututulwida meso? Ngu-Musalali wa-Israyeli.
Kumulomo wabatumwa bako wasampaula Mwami.
Wakati, Inkalaki zyangu zinji ndatanta azyo amutwe wazilundu.
Ndasika kumagolelo aakataazya aa-Lebano,
Misamu yaco milamfu yakedari mdaitema,
Amisamu yaco mibotu yakupresi.
Ndasika kumagolelo aaco mulusaka Iusinkide,
Ndasya mikalo akunywa maanzi.
Milonga yoonse ya-Egepita ndaiyuminizya mukweendeenda kwangu.
Ma! Sa tomvwide mbundakakanza kalekale?
Ndakabamba ciindi ncincita sunu.
Ndakakubika kuti ukanyonyoone minzi iizyungulukidwe lubaya,
Ibe matongo buyo.
Bantu bayo bamaninwa inguzu,
Balatuntuma akufwa insoni.
Baba mbuli zisyu zyamusokwe ambuli mweemvwe,
Mbuli bwizu bumena atala aciluli,
Bunyonyooka nibutana kukomena.
Ndizi mbokala,
Ndizi mboendeenda akuboola, Ambondikalalila.
Alimwi kulisumpula kwako mbukumvwigwa mumatwi aangu,
Njoobika kalobyo kangu mumpemu yako,
Alubulo lwangu mukanwa lyako,
Njookupilusya munzila eyo njiyonya njowakaleta.

Lino eci ciyookubeda citondezyo. Mwaka uno muyoolya izyakalimeneka zilike, amumwaka wabili muyoolya zizwa mulinzizyo, elyo munwaka watatu muyoobyala akutebula, muyoobyala myuunda yamisaansa akulya micelo kulinjiyo.
Nkabela cipanzi caluzubo lwa-Juda cicisyeede ciyooboola kusimpa miyanda ansi akuzyala micelo ajulu,
nkaambo mu-Jerusalemu mulazwa basyeede, amucilundu ca-Ziyoni mulazwa inkamu yabalobosi. Busungu bwa-Jehova wamakamu mbobuyoocita obo.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova aamwami wa-Asuri. Takooyoonjila mununzi uno, nikuba kufusa muvwi mulinguwo, nikuba kulibonya kunembo lyawo antobo, nikuba kuyaka citantilo cavu kulinguwo.
Inzila eyo njiyonya njaakaleta ulapiluka mulinjiyo. Takoozoonjila mumunzi uno pe, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nzootabilila munzi uno akuuvuna nkaambo kangu ndemwini akaambo kamulanda wangu Davida.
Mpawo Sanakeribu mwami wa-Asuri wakanyampuka, wapiluka kuyookala ku-Nineve.
Nkabela naakali kukomba muŋanda ya-Nisiroki Leza wakwe, Adrameleki a-Sarezere bana bakwe bakamujaya apanga. Lino bakalobokela kucisi ca-Ararati, nkabela mwanaakwe Esari-hadoni wakalya izina lyakwe.
Lino Hezekiya wakafutata busyu bwakwe, walanga kubulambo, wakomba kuli-Jehova.
Wakati, O Jehova, koibaluka lino mbundakeenda kubusyu bwako mubuswini acamoyo uululeme, akucita zibotu kumeso aako. Nkabela Hezekiya wakalila akulila kupati.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila Isaya, liti,
Piluka alimwi, ukaambile Hezekiya kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wauso Davida. Ndamvwa mupailo wako, ndabona misozi yako, lino njooyungizizya buumi bwako myaka iili ikumi amusanu.
Alimwi njookuvuna, webo amunzi uno, kumaanza aamwami wa-Asuri.
Nkabela eci ciyookubeda citondezyo cizwa kuli-Jehova cakukuzibya kuti Jehova uyoocita ncobeni ncaakasyomezya,
Bona! Ndapilusya cenzule intaamu ezyo nzicatola kunembo mucipimyo ca-Ahazi, Izuba lilapiluka intaamu zili ikumi, Nkabela izuba lyakapiluka ncobeni intaamu zili ikumi, nzenzizyo nzyaakatolede kunembo.
Ngaaya majwi ngaakalemba Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda aakuciswa kwakwe nikwakamana.
Ndabbidwa myaka yangu iicisyeede.
Nsikooyoobona limbi bantu oko akati kabasangu,
Ndavunga buumi bwangu mbuli sikoosa; ulandikosola kuzwa kucoosyo.
Mubuzuba bomwe buyo ulandimaninizya.
Ndakalila masiku oonse mane bwaca,
Cili mbuli mulavu, cilapwayaula zifuwa zyangu zyoonse.
Mubuzuba bomwe buyo ulandimaninizya.
Ndakavuluvuta mbuli inziba.
Meso aangu akataala kuululala.
O Jehova, ndapenga. Koba cisyomyo cangu.
Ŋonzi yangu yoonse yaciia nkaambo kakupenga kwamoyo wangu.
O Mwami, zintu ezi nzeziponya bantu.
Mulinzizyo mobubede buumi bwamuuya wangu.
Kondisilika akundiponya.
Kupenga kwangu ndakakupegwa kuti kundigwasye.
Pele wakasya muuya wangu kuwida mucilindi calunyonyooko,
Nkaambo zibi zyangu zyoonse wazisowela kusule lyako.
Abo baseluka mucikalilo cabafu tabakonzyi kusekelela lusyomo lwako.
Mbuli mbuncita mebo buzuba obuno,
Banene balalwiida bana babo bwini bwako.
Lino tulaimbya tuntimbwa inyimbo zyangu
Muŋanda ya-Jehova mazuba oonse aabuumi bwangu.
Alakwe Hezekiya wakabuzya kuti, Ncinzi citondezyo cakuti njoonjila muŋanda ya-Jehova?

Nkabela Hezekiya wakatambula batumwa cakukondwa, wabatondezya iŋanda yazilondwedo zyakwe ansiliva angolida azisyu amafuta mabotu aŋanda yazilwisyo zyakwe azintu zyoonse izyakajanwa muzilondwedo zyakwe. Katakwe cintu niciba cimwi muŋanda yakwe nimuba mubwami bwakwe boonse Hezekiya ncaatakabatondezya.
Mpawo Isaya musinsimi wakasika kumwami Hezekiya, wamubuzya kuti, Aba bantu bakaambanzi? Bazwa kuli? Lino Hezekiya wakavuwa kuti, Bazwa kucisi cili kule, ku-Babuloni.
Lino wakabuzya kuti, Ino ncinzi ncibabona muŋanda yako? Hezekiya wakavuwa kuti, Zintu zyoonse zili muŋanda yangu bazibona. Taakwe cintu niciba cimwi muzilondwedo zyangu ncindatabatondezya.
Mpawo Isaya wakaambila Hezekiya kuti, Swiilila ijwi lya-Jehova wamakamu.

Uzibe kuti mazuba aleza, zintu zyoonse zili muŋanda yako azintu zyoonse bamauso nzibakalondola mane kusikila kubuzuba obuno niziyootolwa ku-Babuloni, Takukooyoosyaala cintu niciba cimwi, mbwaamba Jehova.
Abalo bana bako bazyalwa kulinduwe, bayootolwa kuti bakabe bazike muŋanda yabwami yamwami wa-­Babuloni.
Lino Hezekiya wakaambila Isaya kuti, Ndibotu ijwi lya-Jehova ndoamba. Nkaambo wakati, Kuyooba luumuno alusinizyo nencipona mebo.
Amuumuzye, amuumuzye bantu bangu, mbwaamba Leza wanu.
Amuumuzye moyo wa-Jerusalemu, mumukwiilile kuti inkondo yakwe yamana, milandu yakwe yalekelelwa, nkaambo kakuti bulumbu bwazibi zyakwe kuzwa kumaanza aa-Jehova wabutambula kobile.
Makuti oonse ayoosumpulwa, zilundu zyoonse atulundulundu ziyoofwinsigwa. Masena aapilingene ayoocincimikwa, amasena mabi ayoobungusanizigwa.
Lino bulemu bwa-Jehova buyooyubununwa, nkabela bantu boonse bayoobubona antoomwe, nkaambo mulomo wa-Jehova nguwakacaamba.
Kwakamvwigwa ijwi lyakuti, Kwiila. Elyo ndakabuzya kuti, Nkwiile makaninzi? Lyakati, Nyama yoonse mbwizu buyo, abweebesi bwayo boonse buli mbuli malubaluba aamusokwe.
Bwizu bulanyana, malubaluba alapusama, luyooyo lwa-Jehova lwaziyooyela. Ncobeni bantu mbwizu buyo.
Bwizu bulanyana, malubaluba alapusama, pele majwi aa-Leza wesu ayoobedelela.
Kotanta acilundu cilamfu uwe noletela Zioni makani mabotu. Ongolola canguzu uwe noletela Jerusalemu makani ma bo tu. Ongolola, akutayoowa pe, Ambila minzi ya-Juda kuti, Amubone, ngooyu Leza wanu.
Amubone! Mwami Jehova uleza anguzu, Kuboko kwakwe nkokumweendelezezya. Uleza abulumbu bwakwe, acilumbyo cakwe cili kubusyu bwakwe.
Ulalela butanga bwakwe mbuli mweembeli. Ulabunganya twana akuboko kwakwe, ulatukumbatila akaango kakwe, azyalo zinyonsya ulazyeenzya kabotu.
Nguni iwakeeleka maanzi aakede mujanza lyakwe, na kupima ijulu aceelesyo, na kujata bulongo bwaansi mumutiba, na kupima bulemu bwazilundu muzipimyo na bwatulundulundu mubweelano?
Nguni iwakalaya Muuya wa-Jehova? Nguni Mwiyi wakwe iwakamuzibya makani?
Nguni ngwaakabuzyanya awe makani? Nguni iwakamupa busongo akumwiiyisya munzila yalubeta? Nguni iwakamwiiyisya luzibo akumutondezya inzila yabucenjezu?
Ncobeni bamasi bali mbuli idosi lyamaanzi mukati kantesyo. Balayeeyegwa mbuli kasuko kacipimyo. Ncobeni ulabweza tusuwa mbuli kantu kaniininiini.
Lebano tacizulili citentyo, banyama baco tabazulili cipaizyo.
Zisi zyoonse tazili cintu mumeso aakwe. Kulinguwe zilayeeyegwa mbuli kantu kaniini buyo katakwe makani.
Lino Leza mulamukozyanya ani? Mulamweelanya acikozyanonzi?
Amubone cikozyano cifulidwe mbucibede. Mufuzi wacifula, singolida waciziluluzya ingolida akucifulila inkeetani zyansiliva,
Na mutengwana uubula cituuzyo ulalisalila musamu uutaboli, elyo ulaliyandawida similimo uucenjede kuti abambe cikozyano cibezedwe citakonzyi kusunzululwa.
Sa tamuna kuziba? Sa tamuna kumvwa? Sa tamuna kulwiidwa kuzwa kumatalikilo? Sa tamuna kumvwisya kuzwa kumalengelo aanyika?
Ngonguwe uukede atala lyamubalo wanyika, nkabela bantu bayo bali mbuli cisozi. Ngonguwe uuyala ijulu mbuli cisitilizyo akuliyanika mbuli itente lyakukala mumo.
Ulabika bami mbuli cintu cabuyo, ababetesi banyika tabakwe makani mumeso aakwe.
Basimpikwa buyo, babyalwa buyo, bameneka buyo miyanda muvu, ndilyonya ulabafulida nkabela balafwamba kuyuminina, amuuwo ulabamwaisya mbuli buungu.
Lino nguni ngumukonzya kundikozyanya awe? Nguni ngutukonzya kweelana awe? mbwaamba Uusalala.

Amuululale mubone kujulu, Ezi zyoonse nguni wakazilenga? Ulapozya makamu aazyo cakubala mweelwe wazyo. Zyoonse buyo ulaziita mazina. Mubupati bwakwe bugambya, mbwali singuzu, taakwe niiba yomwe iibulika.
Ino nkaambonzi ulaamba, O Jakobo? Nkaambonzi ulaamba makani, O Israyeli? Ulati, Inzila yangu tiiboneki kumeso aa-Jehova, alubeta lwangu lwaindilila kuzwa kuli-Leza wangu.
Sa tona kuziba? Sa tona kumvwa? Leza uuteeli, Jehova, iwakalenga magolelo oonse aanyika, tawizuki, takataali pe. Busongo bwakwe tabumvwiki abuniini pe.
Ulakatalusya bakateede, abaabo batakwe inguzu ulabayumya,
Basankwa-sankwa balakataala akuwizuka, abalo bakubusi ncobeni balalebwa,
pele abo babikide myoyo yabo kuli-Jehova balabukulusya inguzu zyabo, balaya butanta amababa mbuli basikwaze, balazuzaana akutakataala, balaya bweenda cakutawizuka.
Amuumune kubusyu bwangu inywe nuzisi zyakunkomwe yalwizi. Misyobo yabantu ibukulusye inguzu zyabo. Baswene kufwaafwi, elyo kunsi bayooamba. Atuswanaane kukubeteka makani.

Nguni uubusya muntu uuzwa kujwe uuya buzunda koonse nkwalyataula? Ulaaba bamasi mumaanza aakwe, ulamubika kuti abe mweendelezi wabami. Ulabaabila ipanga lyakwe mbuli lusuko, batandwe mbuli buungu kunembo lya buta bwakwe.
Ulaya bubatobela, ulainda kabotu, nekuba kuti inzila njatola maulu aakwe taanaindide mumo.
Nguni iwakabeleka akucita obo? Nguni wakaita mazyalani oonse kuzwa kumatalikilo? Ndime Jehova, ndime mutaanzi, akumamanino njooba mbubonya obo.
Nyika zyakunkomwe yalwizi zyakabona akuyoowa. Magolelo aanyika akakankaama, Bakaswena afwaafwi akusika.
Bakagwasyanya, umwi aumwi mweenzinyina, umwi aumwi wakaambila siluzubonyina kuti, Koyuma.
Aboobo mubezi wakayumya mufuzi, ayooyo uubulunganya ansando wakagwasya sikuuma cifulilo. Wakaamba aakufula kuti, Ncibotu. Wakacikankamina amanembe kuti citasunzululwi.
uwe ngundakajata kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika, ngundakaita kuzwa kuzyooko zyayo, akukwaambila kuti, Nduwe mulanda wangu, ndakusala, nsikutandide pe,
Utayoowi, nkaambo ndili ayebo. Utakankami, nkaambo ndime Leza wako. Njookuyumya, njookugwasya, ncobeni njookutabilila ajanza lyalulyo lyabululami bwangu.
Bona! Boonse bakukalalila bayoofwa insoni, bayoousigwa bweeme. Abo bakubusizya inkondo bayooba cintu buyo, bayoonyonyooka.
Abo basikwaambana ayebo, uyoobayandaula akutabajana. Boonse basinkondonyoko bayooloba, bayooba cintu buyo.
Nkaambo mebo nde-Jehova njookujata kujanza lyalulyo, njookwaambila kuti, Utayoowi, ndime sikugwasya wako.
Utayoowi O ciyokansi Jakobo, anywebo nubantu ba-Israyeli. Nookugwasya, mbwaamba Jehova a-Munununi wako Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Bona! Ndakubika kuti ube cipozyo cibosya cipya cijisi meno, lino uyoopola zilundu akuzipwayaula, atwalo tulundulundu uyootuvwimbaula mbuli buungu.
Uyoozimwaya, elyo muuwo uyoozitola, akale kambizi kayoozimwaisya. Lino uyoosekelela muli-Jehova akutembaula Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Batengwana abacete balayandaula maanzi pele taakwe, aboobo indimi zyabo zyayuminina nkaambo kanyota. Mebo nde-Jehova njoobavwiila, mebo nde-Leza wa-Israyeli nsikooyoobalekelezya.
Njootuntumusya milonga atala lyazilundu zikukwidwe muuwo, amwalo mumakuti njoobusya matoolo. Njoosandula inkanda kuba iziba lyamaanzi, ayalo nyika injumu iyooba tusensa twamaanzi.
Mumonya munkanda njoomeneka misamu yakedari ayamuunga ayamisiwe ayamafuta, amugundu muyoomena misamu yakupresi amisigili amizimbwa yoonse antoomwe,
kuti babone akuziba akubika myoyo yabo kumakani, bamvwisye boonse kuti ijanza lya-Jehova ndelyakacita obo, Uusalala wa-Israyeli nguwakazilenga.
Amubambe makani aanu, mbwaamba Jehova. Amulete bukamboni bwanu, mbwaamba mwami wa-Jakobo.
Balete makani, batulwiide zintu ziyooboneka. Amutulwiide makani aakainda, tuzibe mbwaabede, kuti tubike myoyo yesu kulingao, tuzibe makani aaciza. Na makani aaciza, amutulungulwide ngao.
Amutulwiide makani aacili kunembo, kuti tuzibe kuti muli ba-Leza. Amucite makani naaba mabotu naaba mabi, kuti twaabone akugamba.
Ma! Muli zintu buyo, amilimo yanu tiikwe makani. Kufumbwa muntu uumusala ulasesemya.
Nguni wakalungulula makani kuzwa kumatalikilo kuti tuzibe? Nguni wakatulwiida kalekale, twaambe kuti uliluleme? Ncobeni taakwe uulungulula, taakwe uumulwiida makani, taakwe uuswiilila majwi aanu.
Amubone! Ndime ndakataanguna kwaambila Zioni kuti, Ngaaya makani, ngaaya makani, amwaateelele, Ndime ndakatumina Jerusalemu sikuleta makani mabotu.
Na ndalanga, taakwe muntu pe. Taakwe sikulaya akati kabo uukonzya kundivwiila na ndabuzya makani.
Ncobeni boonse mbabuyo, amilimo yabo tiikwe makani. Zikozyano zyabo zifulidwe nzyamuuwo buyo, zilipilingene.
Takooyoongolola nikuba kulizya ijwi lyakwe. Ijwi lyakwe talikooyoomvwigwa mumugwagwa pe.
Itete lifuyukide takooyoolityola, akamuni kasuka takooyookazimya. Uyooleta lubeta cakusyomeka.
Takooyooceelwa mumuni nikuba kutyolwa, mane akabike lubeta mukati kanyika, Azyalo nyika zyakunkomwe yalwizi ziyoolindila mulao wakwe.
Mebo nde-Jehova ndakwiita mubululami. Njookujata kujanza, njookubamba, njookubika kuti ube cizuminano cabantu amumuni wabamasi,
ubononosye meso aaboofu, uvune baange muntolongo, ugwisye abo bakede mumudima muŋanda yabuzike.
Ndime Jehova. Ndezina lyangu. Bulemu bwangu nsikooyoobupa umbi, akulemekwa kwangu nsikooyookupa zikozyano zifulidwe.
Amubone! Makani aaciindi amana kale. Ndamulwiida makani mapya. Naatana kuboneka, ndamwaambila ngao.
Igundu aminzi yalyo iongolole, minzi iikalwa ba-Kedari. Bantu bakede ku-Sela baimbe cakukondwa, baongolole kuzwa kumitwe yazilundu.
Bape Jehova bulemu, bamutembaule munyika yakunkomwe yalwizi.
Jehova uyooinka mbuli mwaalumi sintaze, uyoobusya busungu mbuli silumamba. Uyookwiila akuvuluma, uyoolwisya basinkondonyina canguzu.
Ndakalyuumwide ciindi cilamfu. Ndakalitontwede akulyaanga. Pele sunu ndalila mbuli mwanakazi uumyongwa. Ndafooma akufwekemba loko.
Njooyuminizya zilundu atulundulundu, njoopusamya misamu yazyo yoonse. Njoocita kuti milonga ibe nyika injumu, amaziba oonse njooayuminizya.

Nkabela njooenzya boofu munzila njibatezi, njoobatola mumigwagwa njebatabwene, Njoosandula mudima kunembo lyabo ube mumuni, amasena aapilingene njooalulamika. Ngaaya makani ngenti cite, nkabela nsikooyoobalekelezya pe.
Bayoopilusigwa kusule, bayoousa insoni boonse basyoma mituni, baambila zikozyano zifulidwe kuti, Ndinywe ba-Leza besu.
Amuswiilile nubasinkematwi. Amulange nuboofu kuti mubone.
Nguni moofu cita mulanda wangu? Nguni musinkematwi mbuli mutumwa wangu ngundatuma? Nguni moofu mbuli similimo wangu? Nguni moofu mbuli mulanda wa-Jehova?
Ulabona zintu zinji pele tobiki moyo wako kulinzizyo. Matwi aakwe alisinkukide pele taswiilili.
Jehova wakakondwa nkaambo kabululami bwakwe, aboobo uyoolemeka mulao, utembaulike

Pele oyu musyobo wabantu, balisaalidwe, balipenzedwe. Boonse balicedwe mumalindi, baliyubide muntolongo. Basaalwa, elyo taakwe uubavuna. Balanyanzigwa imbono, nkabela taakwe uuamba kuti, Amuzipilusye.
Nguni akati kanu uuzumina kuswiilila aya makani? Nguni uuzumina kumvwisya, ateelele makani aaciindi ciza?

Nguni wakaaba Jakobo kuti asaalwe? Nguni wakaaba ba-Israyeli mumaanza aabasikubba? Sa teensi Jehova? Sa teensi oyo nguwenya ngutwabisizya, ngutwakakakila inzila zyakwe, ngutwakakaka kuswiilila mulao wakwe?
Nciceeco ncaakamutilila bukali bwakwe bupya ankondo yakwe injumu. Cakamutenta koonse koonse, nekubaboobo takwakaziba. Cakamuumpa, nekubaboobo takwakabika moyo wakwe kumakani.
Ciindi noinda akati kamaanzi, njooba ayebo, Noinda akati kamilonga, tiikooyookutola. Noenda mukati kamulilo, tokooyoopya pe, amabangabanga taakooyookutenta.
Nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wako, Uusalala wa-Israyeli, Mufutuli wako, Ndapa Egepita cibe cinunuzyo cako; Etiopiya a-Seba zyoonse ndazyaaba mucibaka cako.
Mbuli mbuwakayandika mumeso aangu, alimwi wakali abulemu, ndakuyandisya, aboobo ndaaba bantu mucibaka cako, ndapa misyobo yabantu kukunununa buumi bwako.
Utayoowi, nkaambo ndi ayebo. Njooleta lunyungu lwako kuzwa kujwe akuyobolola bana bako kuzwa kumbo.
Njooambila kunyika kuti, Leka, Akwalo kumusanza njookwaambila kuti, Utakasyi, Leta bana bangu kuzwa kule abana bangu basimbi kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika.
Leta boonse, kufumbwa uuambwa muzina lyangu, ngundakalengela bulemu bwangu. Ndime ndakamubumba, ndime ndakamwaanza.
Pozya boofu bali ameso abasinkematwi bajisi matwi.

Bamasi boonse babungane, inzubo zyoonse ziyoboloke, Nguni akati kabo uukonzya kutulwiida aya makani akutukananina makani aaciindi. Balete bakamboni babo kuti babalulamike. Baswiilile akuzumina kuti, Ndusinizyo.

Ndinywe bakamboni bangu, mbwaamba Jehova, alakwe mulanda wangu ngundisalide ngukamboni, kuti muzibe, mundizuminine, mumvwisye kuti ndime oyo uuliwo. Taakwe Leza iwakanditaangunina kubumbwa, alimwi taakwe uuyoondisyaala munsi lyangu.
Ndime, ndime Jehova, Taakwe Mufutuli umbi.
Ndime ndakamulwiida makani, ndime ndakafutula, ndime ndakamukananina, ciindi eco nikwatakuli Leza mweenzu akati kanu. Ndinywe bakamboni bangu, mbwaamba Jehova. Ndime Leza.
Ncobeni kuzwa kubuzuba obuno ndime oyo. Taakwe uukonzya kuvuna kumaanza aangu. Milimo niindibeleka, nguni uukonzya kwiikasya?
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, Munununi wanu, Uusalala wa-Israyeli, Nkaambo kandinywe ncindatumina Babuloni. Njoobaselusya boonse kuti bacije. Ba-Kasidi bayoocija boonse mumaato aabo aakulibotezya.
Ndime Jehova, Uusalala wanu, Mulengi wa-Israyeli, Mwami wanu.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova uucita inzila akati kalwizi akubamba mugwagwa mumaanzi mayumu;
uupozya inkalaki amabbiza, impi abasilumamba, Baloona boonse antoomwe, tabakooyoobuka limbi. Bamaninina, bazima mbuli intambo yalampi.
Mutaingasili makani aakamana, mutayeeyi makani aakale.
Amubone! Ndacita inkani impya. Iti boneke, Sa tamukooiziba? Njoocita inzila akati kankanda amilonga mumabuwa.
Banyama bamusokwe bayoondilemeka. Bamwaaba ampoo, boonse bayookoodwa nkaambo kakuti ndabapa maanzi munkanda amilonga mumabuwa­, kuti nywisye bantu bangu basalidwe,
bantu mbendakalibumbila kuti banditembaule.
Nekubaboobo tona kundiita, O Jakobo; wandicimwa, O Israyeli.
Tona kundiletela imbelele zyakupaizya nikuba kundilemekezya azituuzyo zyako. Nsina kukukataazya zipo zyabusu nikuba kukucima tununkilizyo.
Tona kunduulila misale amali aako nikuba kundikutya mafuta aazipaizyo zyako. Wandilemezya zibi zyako, wandikataazya milandu yako.
Ndime, ndime oyo uusansamuna milandu yako nkaambo kangu ndemwini, azyalo zibi zyako nsikooyooziyeeya limbi.
Undiibalusye, tubetekane antoomwe. Ubambe makani aako kuti ululamikwe.
Uso mutaanzi wakabisya, abalo basikwiimaakati bako bakandibisizya.
Nciceeco ncindakabisizya bami basalala; nciceeco ncindakabikila Jakobo kuti anyonyooke aba-Israyeli kuti basampaulwe.
Mbuboobu mbwa amba Jehova iwakakulenga, iwakakubumba mwida, uukugwasya. Utayoowi, Jakobo mulanda wangu, O Jesuruni ngundisalide.
Nkaambo njootila maanzi aliyooyo uufwa nyota atulonga anyika injumu. Njootila Muuya wangu alunyungu lwako, acoolwe cangu njoocitilila bana bako.
Nkabela bayoosonsa akati kabwizu mbuli mizimbwa kumbali atulongalonga twamaanzi.
Umwi uyooamba kuti, Mebo ndiwa-Jehova; umwi uyoolibanda izina lya-Jakobo; aumwi uyoolemba ajanza lyakwe kuti, Wa-Jehova, akulipa izina lya-Israyeli.

Nguni uuelene ambebo? Aambe, amulwiide, aba mbe makani aakwe kunembo lyangu, Kuzwa kuciindi eco cakalekale nindakabika bantu, nguni wakalungulula makani aaciza? Makani aacili kunembo, batulwiide ngao.
Mutayoowi nikuba kukanduka. Sa teendakamulwiida makani kalekale? Sa teendakamutondezya? Ndinywe bakamboni bangu, Sa kuli Leza umbi uutali ndime? Ncobeni taakwe Mwala umbi. Taakwe ngumbwene.
Nguni uubumba leza nanka kufula cikozyano citagwasyi?
Ncobeni beenzinyina boonse bayoousa insoni. Basimilimo mbantu buyo, Babungane, banyampuke. Bayooyoowa akuusigwa insoni boonse antoomwe.
Mubezi ulavungulula intambo yakweelesya, ulaceenga-enga acisila, ulacibumbya cipazyo, ulaceenga-enga mumubalo, ulacibumba mucinkonzya camuntu, ceebeke mbuli muntu, cikale muŋanda.
Ulagonka misamu yakedari nanka kulibwezela musamu wakupresi na mubanga, umene akuba muyumu akati kamisamu yamulusaka. Ulazikila musamu wakedari, kuti imvula iulele.
Lino ulabeda muntu inkuni. Ulabweza zimwi zyakuyota, azimwi ulazitenta kuti ajisye insima, lino zimwi ulazicitya Leza akuukomba, ulabeza, cikozyano akucikotamina.
Cipanzi cimwi ulacitenta mumulilo, cipanzi cimwi ulacijisya nyama. Ulayoka nyama, ulakuta, Ulayota, ulaamba kuti, Ehe! Ndakasaalilwa, ndabona mulilo.
Lino cipanzi cisyeede ulacicitya Leza, nkukuti cikozyano cakwe cibezedwe. Ulavundama, ulacikotamina, ulacikomba, ulati, Kondivuna, nkaambo nduwe Leza wangu.

Taakwe uubika moyo kumakani. Taakwe uujisi luzibo na busongo bwakwaamba kuti, Cipanzi cimwi ndakacitenta mumulilo, alimwi ndajika insima amalasa aaco, alimwi ndayoka nyama akwiilya; lino eco cisyeede sa ndakonzya kucicitya cisesemyo? Sa ndakonzya kukotamina cisamu buyo?
Ulasaninwa itwe buyo. Moyo uufubeede wamupambusya. Takonzyi kulivuna nikuba kulibuzya kuti, Sa teensi lweeno ndunjisi mujanza lyangu lyalulyo?
Ingasila makani aya, O Jakobo. Ingasila, O Israyeli, nkaambo nduwe mulanda wangu. Ndime ndakakubumba, uli mulanda wangu. O Israyeli, utandilubi.
Ndasansamuna milandu yako mbuli ijoba, azibi zyako mbuli ikumbi. Boola kulindime, nkaambo ndakunununa.
Amuyabile nomajulu, nkaambo Jehova wacicita, Amwiimbe nonyika zyaansi. Amutalike kwiimba muzilundu, ayebo O lusaka amisamu yoonse iili mumo, nkaambo Jehova wanununa Jakobo, uyoolemekwa muli-Israyeli.
Ndime uupilinganya zitondezyo zyababeji akusondosya basondi. Ndime uupilusya basongo musule akufubaazya luzibo lwabo.

Ndime uusimpya lusinizyo lwamajwi aamulanda wakwe akuzuzikizya lulayo lwabatumwa bakwe, uuambila Jerusalemu kuti, Uyoekalwa, akwaamba aaminzi yacisi ca-Juda kuti, Iyooyakululwa, amatongo aayo njooabukulusya;
Uuambila lwizi kuti, Yuminina, atulongalonga twako njootuyuminizya;
Uuamba aa-Koresi kuti, Ngumweembeli wangu uuti cite coonse ncinjanda, uuti ambile Jerusalemu kuti, Uyooyakululwa, akwaambila intempele kuti, Intalisyo zyako ziyoosimpwa.
Njookuzulwida kuti nkacincimike masena aapilingene. Njoopwayaula makoma aamukuba akutendaula zitendele zyabutale.
Lino njookupa zilondwedo zyamudima azintu ziyandisi ziyubikidwe, kuti uzibe kuti ndime Jehova iwakakwiita muzina lyako, nkukuti Leza wa-Israyeli.
Nkaambo kamulanda wangu Jakobo a-Israyeli ngunsalide, nciceeco ncindakwiitila muzina lyako. Ndakuulika izina nekuba kuti tona kundiziba.
Ndime Jehova, taakwe umbi. Taakwe Leza umbi kunze kwangu, Njookuyumya nekuba kuti tona kundiziba,
kuti bazibe bantu boonse, kuzwa kubuzwezuba akuzwa kububbila, kuti taakwe umbi kunze kwangu. Ndime Jehova, taakwe umbi.
Ndime uubumba mumuni akulenga mudima. Ndime uucita luumuno akulenga mapenzi. Ndime Jehova uucita zintu ezi zyoonse.
Maawe kuliyooyo uuambila wisi kuti, Ncinzi ncozyede? nanka kwaambila mwanakazi kuti, Watumbukanzi?
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, Uusalala wa-Israyeli, a-Mubumbi wakwe. Amundibuzye makani aaciza, Amundilailile aabana bangu azilenge zyamaanza aangu.
Ndime ndakaanza nyika akulenga muntu alinjiyo. Maanza aangu ngaakatandabika ijulu, alimwi ndime ndakalailila makamu makamu aalyo.

Ndime ndakamubusya mubululami, nkabela njoolulamika inzila zyakwe zyoonse. Ngonguwe uuti yake munzi wangu akwaangununa baange bangu. Teensi muulo nibuba bulumbu ncacitila obo, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Ncobeni uli Leza uuyuba, O Leza wa-Israyeli, Mufutuli.
Boonse bafwa insoni, bafwisigwa bweeme. Basikupanga zikozyano boonse bayoousa bweeme antoomwe.
Pele ba-Israyeli bafutulwa muli-Jehova alufutuko luteeli, Tamukooyoofwa insoni nikuba kufwisigwa bweeme abuniini mane kukabe kutamani.

Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova iwakalenga ijulu. (Ngonguwe Leza. Ngonguwe iwakabumba nyika akwiipanga akwiimika. Teewakailenga kuti ibe yalupilingano pe, wakaibumba kuti ikalwe banru.) Ndime Jehova. Taakwe umbi.
Teendakaamba kumbali munyika yamudima. Teendakaambila lunyungu lwa-Jakebo kuti, Amundiyandaule munyika yalupilingano, Mebo nde-Jehova ndaamba bululami, ndamulwiida makani aalomene.
Amuyoboloke, muboole. Amuswene afwaafwi nyoonse nubamasi basyeede, Tabajisi luzibo abo bayumwide zisamu zyazikozyano zibezedwe, bakomba Leza uutafutula.

Amulungulule, mulete makani. Babuzyanye makani antoomwe. Nguni wakaamba aya makani kalekale? Nguni wakaaluula kukutaanguna P Sa teensi ndime nde-Jehova? Taakwe Leza umbi uutali ndime, Leza uululeme, Mufutuli. Taakwe umbi kunze kwangu.
Amusandulukile kulindime, mukafutuke, numagolelo oonse aanyika, nkaambo ndime Leza, taakwe umbi.
Ndakonka kuzina lyangu ndemwini. Ijwi lyazwa mukanwa lyangu mubululami, nkabela talikooyooboola pe. Ncobeni mazwi oonse ayoofugamina ndime, andimi zyoonse ziyookonkela ndime.
Kuyooambwa kuti, Muli-Jehova alike momujenwe bululami anguzu. Boonse ibakamubusizya inkondo bayooboola nkwabede, bayoofwa insoni.
Lunyungu loonse lwa-Israyeli luyoolulamikwa muliJehova akusekelela.
Bafuuntila, bakorama boonse antoomwe. Bakakacilwa kuvuna mukuli. Balo beni baya mubuzike.
Akusikila kubucembele bwanu ndime oyo nguwenya. Akusikila kuciindi camvwi noocimuyumwide. Ndime ndakamucita, ndime uumubbede. Ndime uumuyumwide, ndime uuzoomuvuna.
Mulandikozyanya ani, kuti tweelane? Mulandeelekana ani, kuti tukozyane?
Bamwi balavuzya ingolida kuzwa munkomo akupima insiliva mubweelene, elyo balabelesya mufuzi, nkabela ulazicitya kanga-Leza, Balakotama, balakomba.
Lino balamubweza aziwezo, balamuyumuna, balamubika mucikalilo cakwe, nkabela ulaima mpoonya awo. Tasunzuluki limbi pe. Nekuba kuti wamulilila, tavuwi, tavuni muntu mumapenzi aakwe.
Amwiingasile makani aya, mweempwe. Amubike myoyo yanu kulingawo nubasikusotoka mulao.
Amwiingasile makani mataanzi aakalekale, nkaambo ndime Leza, taakwe umbi. Ndime Leza, taakwe ngutweelene awe.
Ndime uulungulula makani aamamanino nikuba kuzwa kumatalikilo, uumulwiida makani naatana kuba. Ndati, Lulayo lwangu luyoozuzikizigwa, njoocita zyoonse nzinjanda.
Njooita muyuni mukali kuzwa kujwe, sinkuta wangu kuzwa kucisi cili kule. Ndaamba kale makani, lino njooazuzikizya. Ndikanzide, lino njoocita obo.
Amundiswiilile nubayumu myoyo bali kule kuzwa kubululami.
Ndaswenya bululami bwangu, alufutuko lwangu talukooyoomuka kusika. Mu-Zioni njoobika lufutuko, aba-Israyeli njoobapa bulemu bwangu.
Bweza maziyo, ukaziye busu. Gwisya cisitilizyo cako, samununa malogwe aako, vumbulula maulu aako, ukainde akati kamaanzi.
Cinswe cako ciyoovumbululwa, insoni yako iyooboneka. Njooliya inkoto, nsikooyoofwida muntu luzyalo.
Munununi wesu, Jehova wamakamu ndizina lyakwe, Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Kokala cakuumuna, unjile mumudima, O mwana musimbi waba-Kasidi, nkaambo tokooyoobandwa limbi Namalelo wazisi.
Ndakakalalila bantu bangu, aboobo ndakasofwaazya lukono lwangu akubaaba mumaanza aako. Pele teewakabafwida luzyalo pe, Bacembele wabalemezya loko ijokwe lyako.
Alimwi wakaamba kuti, Njooba namalelo lyoonse. Aboobo tokwe wakabika moyo wako kumakani aya, tokwe nowakayeeya mamanino aao.
Zintu ezi zyoonse zyobile ziyookusikila antoomwe mubuzuba bomwe, nkukuti kufwidwa bana bako abukamufu. Ncobeni ziyookusikila loko, nekuba kuti zisondyo zyako nzinji, azyalo insengo zyako zyavulisya.
Wakali kusyoma bubi bwako, wakali kwaamba kuti, Taakwe uundibona. Busongo bwako aluzibo lwako, zyakuleesya munzila, aboobo wakaamba mumoyo wako kuti, Mpondi mebo, taakwe umbi.
Nkaambo kako uyoosikilwa mapenzi, nkabela tokooyooziba misamu yakwaatanda. Uyoosikilwa mafwabi ngotakonzyi kuliya. Lunyonyooko luyoofwamba kukujana notezi.
Mbubo! Kocikakatila kunsengo zyako azisondyo zyako zinji, nziwakalemezegwa lyoonse kuzwa kubwanike bwako. Ambweni ulakonzya kugwasigwa nzizyo, ambweni ulayoosya basinkondonyoko.
Walemenwa indayo zyako zinji. Babuke basikulingula ijulu abasikweebela inyenyeezi abaabo babwene myezi mbiibede, bakuvune kuzwa kumapenzi aati kakusikile.
Ncobeni baba mbuli buungu. Mulilo uyoobatenta. Tabakooyoolivuna kunguzu zyamabangabanga. Oyo mulilo tuuli malasa aakujisya insima nanka mulilo wakuyotayota buyo pe.
Mbuboobo mbuziyookubeda zintu ezyo nziwakalemezegwa, Abo mbowakali kuulana abo kuzwa kubwanike bwako bayooinka, umwi aumwi munzila yakwe njayanda. Takukooyooba umwi uukufutula.
Nkaambo balalyuulika izina lyamunzi uusalala, alimwi balasyoma Leza wa-Israyeli, Jehova wamakamu ndizina lyakwe.
Makani mataanzi ndakaalungulula kalekale, akazwa mumulomo wangu akumvwigwa, lumwi ndakafwambaana kwaacita, akaba ncobeni.
Ndakaziba kuti uli muyumu; insingo yako iili amilambi yabutale, ankumu yako niamukuba,

Nciceeco ncindakalungulwida makani kalekale. Ndakamu-lwiida, makani naatakalina kuba, kuti utaambi kuti, Cikozyano cangu ncecaka-cita obo, cikozyano cangu cibezedwe acikozyano cifulidwe nzezyakalailila makani.
Wamvwa makani. Lino bona aya oonse! Sa tamukooyooamba? Kuzwa lino ndamulwiida makani mapya, makani aasisidwe ngemwatakezi.
Alengwa lino lino, taali aaciindi pe. Tona kwaamvwa cita sunu, aboobo tokonzyi kwaamba kuti, Ndakezi kale.

Tokwe nowakamvwa, tokwe nowakaziba, akutwi kwako takukwe nekwakajuka ciindi. Nkaambo ndakaziba kuti kweena kasimpe uleena, alimwi kuzwa kuciindi niwakazwa muzyalilo lyoonse wakaambwa kuti ulakataazya.
Nkaambo kazina lyangu ncindalekela bukali bwangu. Ndatembaulika mbundakukazikila moyo wangu akutakunyonyoona,
Bona! Ndikusalazizye, pele teensi mbuli insiliva mbwiisalazigwa. Ndikusalide mubbila lyamulilo wamapenzi.
Nkaambo kangu ndemwini, nkaambo kangu ndemwini ncindacitila obo, nkaambo izina lyangu talyeelede kusampaulwa. Bulemu bwangu nsibupi umbi pe,
Maanza aangu ngaakabika intalisyo yanyika, alyalo ijanza lyangu lyalulyo ndelyakakwazamika ijulu. Zyoonse buyo, na ndaziita, zilalibonya antoomwe.
Amubungane nyoonse, muswiilile. Nguni akati kabo iwakaluula makani aya? Jehova ulamuyandi-sya, Ulacitila Babuloni makani ngaakanzide, akuboko kwakwe kuyoolwisya ba-Kasidi.
Ndime, ndime ndakaamba, ndakamwiita, Ndime ndamusisya, nkabela uyoojana coolwe munzila yakwe.
Amuswene kulindime, muswiilile makani aya. Kuzwa kumatalikilo nsina kwaamba kumbali. Kuzwa kuciindi eco makani naakaba ndakali nkuko. Lino sunu Mwami Jehova wandituma, alakwe Muuya wakwe wandituma.
Nicakabota niwakaswiilila milzayo yangu! Lino luumuno lwako nilwakaba mbuli mulenga, abululami bwako nibwakaba mbuli mayuwe aalwizi.
Lunyungu lwako nilwakaba mbuli musee, abana bazwa mumala aako nibakavula mbuli tusengasenga. Izina lyabo nilyakatagonkwa nikuba kunyonyooka kubusyu bwangu.
Teebakafwa nyota ciindi eco naakabeenzya akati kankanda. Wakabagwisizya maanzi mukati kandomba. Wakaandula indomba, elyo maanzi akazwa bupoomoka mpoo!
Taakwe luumuno, mbwaamba Jehova, kulibasizibi.
Wakacita mulomo wangu mbuli ipanga libosya. Mucenzule cajanza lyakwemowakandisisa, Wakandibika kuti mbe muvwi uubeka-beka, akundiyubika munkomo yakwe.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, Nduwe mulanda wangu, Israyeli ngunjoolemezegwa.
Ndakaamba kuti, Milimo njindabeleka njabuyo. Ndupilingano azintu zitagwasya nzindasowela inguzu zyangu. Pele ncobeni Jehova nguuti ndibeteke, abulumbu bwangu nkubuli kuli-Leza wangu.

Lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova iwakandibumba mwida kuti mbe mulanda wakwe, kuti nkamuboozezye Jakobo, aba-Israyeli bayobololwe kulinguwe. (Ndalemekwa mumeso aa-Jehova, a-Leza wangu nguwaba inguzu zyangu.)

Wati, Ncintu ciniini buyo kulinduwe kuba mulanda: wangu wakubusya misyobo ya-Jakobo awakupilusya ba-Israyeli bafutukide. Njookubika kuti ube mumuni wabamasi abalo, ube lufutuko lwangu koonse akusikila kumagolelo aanyika.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, Munununi wa-Israyeli, Musalazi wakwe, Ulaambila umwi uusampaulwa, uusesemya bamasi, muzike wabeendelezi. Bami bayoobona, bayoobuka, abasilutwe bayookotama, nkaambo ka-Jehova uusyomeka, nkaambo ka-Musalazi wa-Israyeli uukusalide.
ukaambile baange kuti, Amuzwe, abaabo bali mumudima ukabaambile kuti, Amuboneke. Bayoocela munzila zyoonse; macelelo aabo ayooba atala lyazilundu zyoonse zikukwidwe muuwo.
Tabakooyoofwa inzala nikuba kufwa nyota, Inkasaalo tiikooyoobauma, niliba izuba. Nkaambo oyo uubafwida luzyalo uyoobazulwida, ulabeenzya kumbali lyatusensa twamaanzi.
Njoosandula zilundu zyangu kuti ziindike, amigwagwa yoonse iyoosumpulwa.
Amubone! Bamwi bayoozwa kule, bamwi bayoozwa kunyika akumbo, abamwi bayoozwa kucisi ca-Sinimu.
Amwiimbe nomajulu, sekelela O nyika. Amutalike kwiimba numalundu. Nkaambo Jehova waumbulizya bantu bakwe, abapengede bakwe wabafwida luzyalo.
Pele Zioni waamba kuti, Jehova wandilekelezya, Mwami wangu wandiluba.
Ma! Sa mwanakazi ulaluba mwanaakwe uucinyonka? Sa ulaleka kufwida mwana ngwazyede hizyalo? Aba ambweni balaluba, pele mebo nsikonzya kukuluba uwe pe.
Bona! Ndeengede cifwanikisyo cako mumaanza aangu, Malambo aako aboneka kumeso aangu lyoonse.
Bantu balafwambaana kukuyaka. Abo ibakali kukusaala akukunyonyoona bayookuleka.
Lanzya meso aako koonse koonse, ubone. Boonse balibungene, beza kulinduwe. Ncobeni mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Jehova, uyoobasama boonse mbuli zyakulizakila, uyoobaanga mbuli mbwaanga nabwiinga.
Nkaambo matongo aako amasena aako aabulide bantu anyika yako iisaalidwe ncobeni zyoonse zilaata bantu bakukalide, abaabo ibakakumenede bayooba kule.
Bana ibakazyalwa kuciindi cakufwidwa kwako bayooamba mumatwi aako kuti, Kuntu okuno kwandaatila; kondiswena, kuti nkale kabotu.
Lino uyooamba mumoyo wako kuti, Ino nguni wandizyalila aba? Ndakafwidwa, ndakali musundi, ndakali mubuzike, ndakalitandidwe, lino aba nguni wabalela? Ndakasyaala endike, lino aba bazwa kuli?
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Amubone! Njoosumpwida bamasi ijanza lyangu akubusizya bantu citondezyo, elyo bayooleta bana bako balombe muzyamba zyabo, bana bako basimbi bayooyumunwa aziwezo zyabo.

Nkabela bami bayooba basimalelo bako, abanamalelo babo bayooba basikunyonsya bako. Bayoomukotamina cakuvundama ansi akumyankuta itombe lyakumaulu aako, Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova. Boonse balangila ndime tabakooyoofwa insoni.
Ncobeni mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, Bazike mbaatolede singuzu bayoolubululwa, alunyanzyo lwamukali luyoovunwa. Njoolwisya abo bakulwisya, nkabela njoofutula bana bako.

Abaabo bakupenzya njoobalisya nyama yabo beni, nkabela bayookolwa bulowa bwabo mbuli muntu mbwakoledwe imbote, Lino bantu boonse bayooziba kuti mebo nde-Jehova ndime mufutuli wako amunununi wako, Singuzu wa-Jakobo.

Ino nkaambonz, nindakasika katakwe muntu? Nindakaita, nkaambonzi katakwe iwakavuwa? Sa ijanza lyangu lyafwinsigwa akukacilwa kufutula? Sa ndabula inguzu zyakuvuna? Amubone! Kutapatila kwangu nkokuyuminizya lwizi. Ndasandula milonga kuti ibe inkanda, azyalo inswi zyayo zilanunka nkaambo kakubula maanzi, anyota ilazijaya.
Ndasamika ijulu cikobela cisia mbi akulivumbya zisani zyamasaka.
Mwami Jehova wandijulila matwi, nkabela mebo teendakakaka nikuba kupiluka musule.
Ndakaabila basikuuma musana wangu, amaseya aangu ndakaabila basikunonkola malezu. Nsikwe kusisa busyu bwangu kubweeme akukuswidwa maate.
Mwami Jehova nguundigwasya. Nkaambo kako nsina kufwisigwa bweeme. Busyu bwangu ndabuyumya nta mbuli ibbwe. Ndizi kuti nsikooyoofwa insoni.
Uli kufwaafwi uundilulamika. Nguni uukonzya kundikazyanya? Atunyampuke toonse antoomwe, Nguni sinkondoma? Aswene afwaafwi nkumbede.
Mwami Jehova nguundigwasya. Nguni uukonzya kundipa mulandu? Ncobeni boonse bayoocekula mbuli cikobela ciligwa mapempya.
Inywe nyoonse numukutula mulilo akuyasya zisisi, amweende mumumuni wamulilo wanu awazisisi nzimwayasya. Makani ngemuyoojana kuzwa kumaanza aangu ngaaya: muyoolala mukati kamafwabi.
Amulange Abrahamu usowanu a-Sara iwakamuzyala, nkaambo naakacili muntu omwe buyo, ndakamwiita, ndakamupa coolwe, aboobo wakaba bantu banjibanji.

Nkaambo Jehova uyooumbulizya Zioni. Uyooumbulizya matongo aakwe oonse; inkanda yakwe uyooisandula kuti ibe mbuli Edeni, amabbuwa aakwe ayooba mbuli muunda wa-Jehova. Mumonya omo muyoojanwa kukondwa akusekelela, kulumba amajwi aakutembaula.
Amundiswiilile, nubantu bangu; amumvwe majwi aangu, O musyobo wangu; nkaambo kulindime kuyoozwa mulao, akubeteka kwangu njookuka-zika kuti kubede misyobo yabantu mumuni.
Bululami bwangu buli kufwaafwi, lufutuko lwangu lwaboneka kale, akuboko kwangu kulabeteka misyobo yabantu, Nyika zyakunkomwe yalwizi ziyoondilangila, ziyoosyoma kuboko kwangu.

Amulanzye meso aanu kujulu, ayalo nyika yaansi amwiibonesye, nkaambo ijulu liyoomwaika mbuli busi, nyika iyoocekula mbuli cikobela, abaabo bakede mulinjiyo bayoofwa mbuli busususuli, pele lufutuko lwangu ndwalyoonse, abululami bwangu tabukooyoomana pe.
Nkaambo mapempya ayoobalya mbubonya mbuli cikobela mbuciligwa, atumvunyu tuyoobalya mbuli boya bwambelele. Pele bululami bwangu buyooba bwalyoonse, alufutuko lwangu luyoobedelela mumazyalani oonse.
Sa teensi nduwe iwakayuminizya lwizi, maanzi aamuziba ipati? Sa teensi nduwe iwakabika inzila akati kabulolo bwalwizi kuti banunwidwe bainde?
Bantu Jehova mbaavunide bayooboola, banooza bwiimba akusikila ku-Zioni. Lukondo lutamani luyookala amitwe yabo. Bayoojana busekelezi alukondo, elyo buusu akusintimuka zyoonse ziyoocijilila.

anu wamuluba Jehova iwakakulenga, iwakatandabika ijulu akubika intalisyo yanyika? Nkaambonzi nooyoowa lyoonse bukali bwasikupenzya uukanza mumoyo wakwe kunyonyoona? Ma! Bukali bwasikupenzya bulabelekanzi?
Uulemedwe uyoofwamba kwaangununwa. Takooyoofwa, takooyooseluka mucilindi pe, alimwi takooyoobula cakulya.
Nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wako uubusya lwizi kuti mayuwe aalo avuume. Ndime Jehova wamakamu, ndizina lyangu.
Ndabika majwi aangu mumulomo wako, ndakusisa muceenzule cajanza lyangu, Ndime uutandabika ijulu, ndime uubika intalisyo zyanyika. Ndaambila ba-Zioni kuti, Ndinywe bantu bangu,
Taakwe uumweenzya akati kabana boonse mbaazyede. Taakwe uumujata kujanza akati kabana boonse mbaakalela.
Aya makani obile akusikila, lino nguni uuti kuumbulizye? Wasikilwa lupwayo alunyonyooko, inzala apanga, lino nguni uuti kuumuzye?
Bana bako bawizuka, balilede kumagolelo aamigwagwa yoonse mbuli lweengu uucedwe. Balizwide bukali bwa-Jehova alutapatilo lwa-Leza wako.
Nkaambo kako amuswiilile inywe numupengede, inywe numukoledwe bukolwi butali bwabukoko.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami wako Jehova, Leza wako uubeteka makani aabantu bakwe, Bona! Ndagwisya mujanza lyako inkomeki iidadalisya, amutiba wabukali bwakwe tokooyoounywida limbi.
Njooubika mumaanzanza aabasikukupenzya, mbombabo bakakwaambila kuti, Kotama ansi kuti twiinde alinduwe. Musana wako wakaubika mbuli nyika, mbuli mugwagwa, kulibaabo bainda.
Kolitikumwida itombe lyaansi, ukabuke, Jerusalemu nowakali mubuzike, Angununa zyaanzyo zili kunsingo yako, mwana musimbi wa-Zioni nowakali mubuzike.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Bantu bangu bakataanguna kuya ku-Egepita kuyookalakala nkuko, abalo ba-Asuri bakabapenzya ciindi cimwi katakwe kaambo.
Lino ndaba anzi okuno? mbwaamba Jehova. Nkaambo bantu bangu batolwa buyo. Beendelezi babo balalila, mbwaamba Jehova, nkabela izina lyangu lilasampaulwa lyoonse mazuba oonse.
Nkaambo kako bantu bangu bayooziba izina lyangu. Mubuzuba obo bayooziba kuti ndime uuamba makani aya, Mpendi.
Swiilila ijwi lyabalindizi bako! Swiilila mbuboonzomoka akwiimba boonse antoomwe! Nkaambo bayoobonana kumeso, Jehova naayooboola ku-Zioni.
Amutalike kwiimba nyoonse numatongo aa-Jerusalemu, nkaambo Jehova waumuzya bantu bakwe, wanununa Jerusalemu.
Jehova wavumbulula kuboko kwakwe kusalala mumeso aamikowa yoonse, nkabela magolelo oonse aanyika ayoobona lufutuko lwa-Leza wesu.
Amunyamuke, amunyamuke, muzwe okuno. Mutaampi cintu niciba cimwi cisofweede. Amuzwe mulinguwo, musalale, inywe numubweza zibelesyo zya-Jehova.
Pele mutazwi cakubindaana, muteendi cakucija pe, nkaambo Jehova nguuyoomuzulwida, a-Leza wa-Israyeli nguuyoomusindikila.
Mbubonya mbuli bantu banji mbubakagambwa aanduwe, (ciwa cakwe cakabisigwa akuzwa mubuntu, abwiime bwakwe bwakabija kwiinda bantu boonse baansi),
mbubonya obo uyooyoosya mikowa minji, Bami bayooumuna nkaambo kanguwe, nkaambo bayoobona makani ngebatakaina kulwiidwa, amakani ngebatakaina kumvwa bayooaswiilila.
Wakakula kumeso aakwe mbuli intengantenga ambuli muyanda uuzwa munyika injumu. Katajisi ciwa cibotu nibuba bwiime bweebesi kuti tumweebele. Katajisi bweebesi bucita kuti tumuyande.
Wakasampaulwa akukakigwa kubantu, muntu wamapenzi uubwene maciswe­. Kali mbuli muntu uusesemya meso; wakasampaulwa; teetwakamulemeka pe.
Pele wakayaswa nkaambo kamilandu yesu, wakaumwa nkaambo kazibi zyesu. Kutugwasya iswe nciceeco ncaakakwabbawidwa, amibunda yakwe niiituponya.
Toonse twapambuka mbuli imbelele ziswekede, twatola umwi aumwi inzila njayanda mwini, lino Jehova walemezya nguwe milandu yesu toonse.
Wakakasigwa kubetekwa kabotu, aboobo wakatolwa. Nguni akati kabasanyina wakabika moyo wakwe kumakani aya aakuti, naakagwisigwa munyika yabaumi njimilandu yabantu bangu njaakauminwa.
Wakabikwa mukabanda antoomwe abasizibi, wakazikwa amuvubi, nekuba kuti taakwe bubi mbwaakacitide, alimwi taakwe naakaamba calweeno abuniini.
Uyoobona micelo moyo wakwe njiwakapengela, uyookuta. Kuluzibo lwakwe mulanda wangu uululeme uyoolulamika bantu banji. Uyootola milandu yabo.

Nkaambo kako njoomupa caabilo antoomwe abapati, uyooabilwa imbono antoomwe abasintaze, nkaambo wakazumina akutala buumi bwakwe, wakabalwa antoomwe abasikusotoka mulao, wakatola zibi zya bantu banji, akukombela basimilandu.
Komezya kuntu nkuukede, amasani aatente lyacikalilo cako andandamikwe. Utayoowi kulampya intambo zyako akuyumya inkankamino zyako.
Nkaambo unooya bulimwaisya koonse koonse kululyo akulumwensi, nkabela lunyungu lwako luyoovuba nyika yabamasi akukala muminzi iibulide bantu.
Utayoowi pe, nkaambo tokooyoofwa insoni. Utakankami, nkaambo tokooyoofwisigwa bweeme. Uyooluba insoni yabwanike bwako, akusampaulwa kwabumukamufu bwako tokooyookuyeeya limbi.
Nkaambo mubumbi wako ngumulumi wako; izina lyakwe ngu-Jehova wamakamu. Uusalala wa-Israyeli ngumunununi wako; ngonguwe uuambwa kuti Leza wanyika yoonse.
Nkaambo Jehova wakwiita mbuli mwanakazi uulekedwe uuside mumoyo wakwe, Sa mwanakazi wabulombe ulakonzya kukakililwa? mbwaamba Leza wako.
Ndakakuleka kaindi kaniini buyo, njookuboozya kulindime caluzyalo lupati.
Bukali bwangu nibwakabuka, ndakasisa busyu bwangu kaindi, pele njookufwida luzyalo abuuya butamani, mbwaamba Jehova Munununi wako.

Aya makani andibeda mbuli makani aamaanzi aa-Nowa. Mbubonya mbundakonkezya kuti maanzi aa-Nowa taakooyooboola limbi kuzoovumba nyika, mbubonya obo ndakonkezya kuti nsikooyookukalalila nikuba kukutapatila.

Zilundu zilakonzya kutantamuka, atulundulundu tulakonzya kusosoloka, pele luzyalo lwangu talukooyootantamuka kuzwa kulinduwe, acizuminano cangu caluumuno tacikooyoososoloka abuniini, mbwaamba Jehova uukufwida luzyalo.
Insonge zyako nzooziyasya mabwe aasalala pyu, makoma aako nzooayasya mabwe aabekema, aalo malambo aako oonse azooyasigwa mabwe mayandisi.
Bana bako boonse bayooiyisigwa Jehova. Ncobeni bana bako bayooba acoolwe cipati.
Mubululami momuti ime nji. Mapenzi ayootantamuka kule kuzwa kulinduwe, nkaambo tokooyooyoowa. Zintu ziyoosya tazikooyooswena nkobede pe.
Na muntu uukubusizya inkondo, makani taazwi kulindime pe, Kufumbwa uumubusizya inkondo uyoonyonyooka nkaambo kanu.
Amubone! Ndime ndakalenga mufuzi uuvukuta malasa mumulilo akupanga cilwisyo cakubelesya, Alimwi ndime ndakalenga sikunyonyoona kuti ajaye.

Pele taakwe cilwisyo niciba comwe cibumbwa kukulwisya nduwe cikonzya kujana coolwe, andimi zyoonse zibuka kukubeteka uyoozipa mulandu, Nciceeco caabilo cabalanda ba-Jehova akululamikwa kwabo kuzwa kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ino musoowelanzi mali kukuula zintu zitali cilyo? Mubelekelanzi kukujana zintu zitakutyi? Amuswiililisye majwi aangu, mulye cilyo cibotu, myoyo yanu ikondwe kukusaninwa zintu zilweela.
Amupempeke matwi aanu, muboole kulindime. Amuswiilile, lino myuuya yanu iyoopona. Nkabela njootanga anywe cizuminano citamani, nkukuti luzyalo lusyomeka ndundafwida Davida.
Ngonguwe ngundabika kuti abe kamboni kumisyobo yabantu, musolozi asilutwe kubantu.
Ncobeni uyooita bamu mbotezi, abantu batakuzi bayoozuzaana nkobede, nkaambo ka-Jehova Leza wako, akaambo ka-Uusalala wa-Israyeli, nkaambo kakuti wakulemeka.
Sizibi aleke inzila yakwe, asimilandu aleke miyeeyo yakwe, Aboole kuliJehova, kuti amufwide luzyalo, akuli-Leza wesu, nkaambo nguuinda kulekelela.
Nkaambo miyeeyo yangu tiili miyeeyo yanu, anzila zyanu tazyeensi inzila zyangu, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo mbubonya mbuli ijulu mbulisumpwidwe kwiinda nyika, mbubonya obo inzila zyangu zilisumpwidwe kwiinda inzila zyanu amiyeeyo yangu kwiinda miyeeyo yanu.
Mbubonya mbuli imvula acivulamabwe mbuziloka kuzwa kujulu, alimwi tazipiluki nkuko, pele zilatilaila nyika akwiizyazya akwiisyusya, kuti ipe imbuto zyakubyala ansima yakulya,
mbubonya obo mbuliyooba ijwi lyangu lizwa kumulomo wangu, Talikooyooboola kulindime cabuyo pe, liyoozuzikizya makanze aangu akucita kabotu makani ngendalitumina.
Nkaambo muyoozwa alukondo akweenzegwa aluumuno. Zilundu atulundulundu zyoonse ziyoetalika kwiimba kubusyu bwanu, amisamu yoonse yamuzisaka iyookambilila.
Mucibaka camamvwa muyoomena musamu wakupresi, amucibaka camutubetube muyoomena muzimbwa, nkabela aya makani ayooletela Jehova impuwo, ayooba citondezyo citamani citakonzya kuloba.
Uli acoolwe muntu uucita obo ayooyo uubika moyo wakwe kumakani, uulikasya kusofwaazya buzuba bwa-Sabata akukasya maanza aakwe kucita bubi.
Alakwe muzwakule uuliswangaanya a-Jehova ataambi kuti, Ncobeni Jehova ulandaandaanya abantu bakwe, Alakwe muzibe ataambi kuti, Mebo ndi musamu uuyumide buyo.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Jehova mbwaambila bazibe balemeka masabata aangu akusala zintu zindibotezya akujatisya cizuminano cangu.
Muŋanda yangu amukati kamalambo aangu njoobapa ciibalusyo azina ibotu kwiinda bana balombe abasimbi. Njoobapa izina litamani litakonzya kuloba.

Nkabela bazwakule baliswangaanya a-Jehova kuti bamumanine milimo, kuti baya ndisye izina lya-Jehova akuba balanda bakwe, nkukuti boonse balikasya kusofwaazya buzuba bwa-Sabata akujatisya cizuminano cangu,

nzoobaleta kucilundu cangu cisalala akubasekelezya muŋanda yangu yakukomba. Zituuzyo zyabo azipaizyo zyabo zyoonse ziyootambulika acipaililo cangu, nkaambo iŋanda yangu iyootegwa niŋanda yakukombela yamisyobo yoonse.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova uubunganya batandidwe bacisi ca-Israyeli. Nzoobunganya kulinguwe abamwi kutaamba abo babungikidwe kale.
Nubanyama boonse bamusokwe amuboole kuzoolya. Nubanyama boonse bamuzisaka amuboole.
Basikulindila bakwe mboofu, boonse babula luzibo, boonse mba bwa bataambi batezi kukuwa. Balalota buyo, baloona, balayandisya ŋonzi.
Aba babwa mbasyacivulamwangu, tabakonzyi kukuta. Abalo beembeli tabaswiilili, batola umwi aumwi inzila yakwe mwini, boonse buyo balayeeya kulijanina impindu buyo.
Bati, Amuboole, tulete bukoko, tunywe cakukolwa. Alyalo junza liyooba mbubonya mbuli buzuba obuno, buzuba bupati loko.
Bantu baluleme balanyonyooka, pele taakwe muntu uubika moyo wakwe. Bantu basiluzyalo balatolwa, pele taakwe muntu uumvwisya. Nkaambo muntu uululeme ulatolwa kuzwa kububi,
elyo ulanjila muluumuno. Balalyookezya mumalo aabo, abo beenda mubululami.
Nguni ngumusabwida? Nguni ngumulepwida milomo akugwisizya lulimi? Sa tamuli bana bakusotoka mulao, lunyungu lwalweeno,
inywe numukasaala muzisusi zyanu akati kamibanga, kunsi lyamisamu yoonse mitete, akujaya bana banu mumakuti kunsi lyaŋanzi zyandomba.

Akati katusindabwe twakukalonga mpocibede caabilo canu. Ntontuto, ntontuto ntuwawaalilwa cisolo. Ntontuto ntuwatilila cipaizyo cakunywa akutuulila cituuzyo cabusu, Sa ndakonzya kutontozegwa kumakani aya?
Atala lyacilundu cilamfu loko, mpowakabika bulo bwako. Mpoonya awo mpowakainka kuyootuula zipaizyo.

Wakabika citondezyo cako kusule lyacitendele alyacikunguzyo, nkaambo wandisia mebo, wainka nkuko, wayala bulo bwako, watanga buzolwani abaabo mboyanda; bulo bwabo wabuyandisya, acinswe cabo ulicibwene.
Wakainka kuli-Moleki amafuta, wavuzya myuunde yako, alimwi batumwa bako wakabatuma kule, akuseluka, mane kusikila kucikalilo cabafu.
Wakakataazigwa musinzo wako mulamfu, pele tokwe nowalengaana. Inguzu zyako zyakabukulisigwa, aboobo tokwe nowakawizuka.
Nguni nguwakali kuyoowa akulemeka? Nkaambo wabeja, tokwe nondiyeeya nikuba kubika moyo wako kulindime. Sa ime teendakaumwide ciindi cilamfu, aboobo tondiyoowi?
Lino njoopandulula bululami bwako mbububede. Milimo yako tiikooyookugwasya pe.
Kakamu kako kazikozyano kakuvune nokwiila. We! Muuwo uyoozitola zyoonse! Kufula buyo kuyoozimana. Pele oyo uusyoma ndime uyoovuba nyika, uyookona cilundu cangu cisalala.
Kuyooambwa kuti, Amutuntumike, amutuntumike mutundulu, mubambe inzila. Amugwisye zilebyo munzila yabantu bangu.

Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mulemu Uusumpwidwe uukede mubwami butamani, izina lyakwe ngu-Uusalala. Ndikede mubusena busalalisya busumpwidwe, pele mubombumoyo uupengede alakwe ndikede awe. Ndime uubusya muuya wamuntu uubombede akukatalusya moyo wayooyo uupengede.
Nkaambo nsikooyookazyanya lyoonse, nisikooyookalala akutamani pe, nkaambo buumi bwazwa kulindime, alimwi ndime iwakalenga kuyooya kwabuumi.
Ndakakalala nkaambo kamulandu wakulikumbuzya kwakwe, elyo ndakamuuma, ndasisa busyu bwangu, ndakalala. Nkabela wakacili kweenda cakukataazya munzila njiwakayanda moyo wakwe.
Ndibwene inzila zyakwe, pele njoomuponya. Njoomweenzya akumuboozezya luumuno, abalo basikulila bakwe,
njoobalengela micelo yakulumba. Boonse bayoojana luumuno, nibaba bali kule nibaba bali kufwaafwi, mbwaamba Jehova. Njoomuponya.
Pele bantu basizibi bali mbuli maanzi aalwizi aayuwana, nkaambo taakonzyi kuumuna pe, pele lyoonse alaya bulivundaanya matope amatombe.
Basizibi tabakwe luumuno abuniini, mbwaamba Leza wangu.
Ongolola canguzu cakutayoowa. Lila ajwi lyako mbuli mweembo. Kolwiida bantu bangu milandu yabo, akuzibya luzubo lwa-Jakobo zibi zyabo.

Ncobeni balandiyandaula mazuba oonse, balayandisya kuziba inzila zyangu, mbuli musyobo uucita bululami akutaluba imbeta zya-Leza wawo. Balakumbila kwangu imbeta zyabululami, balayandisya kuswena kufwaafwi kuli-Leza.
Bati, Ino nkaambonzi notuliimya kulya pele toboni? Nkaambonzi notulibombya pele tolubikili moyo? Ma! Mubuzuba bwanu bwakuliimya mulalibotezya nubeni akupenzya basimilimo banu boonse.
Ma! Kuliimya kwanu kulabusya inkondo akukazyanya buyo, mane lumwi mulauma antuku zyanu zyabubi. Kuliimya obo mbumucita sunu takukonzyi kusisya majwi aanu kujulu pe.

Sa kuliimya nkunjanda kuliboobo? Sa mbobuzuba muntu naapenzya moyo wakwe? Sa nceciindi cakukotamya mutwe wakwe mbuli itete akuliyalila zisani zyamasaka atwe? Sa nceeci ncimuyeeya kuti nkokuliimya kulya abuzuba butambulika mumeso aa-Jehova?
Sa kuliimya nkunjanda mebo takweensi kwaangununa zyaanzyo zyabubi, kusungulula intambo zyajokwe, kulubula bapengede kuti beende, akutyolaula majokwe oonse?
Sa takweensi kwaabila basinzala cilyo cako, kunjizya bapengede batandidwe muŋanda yako, kusamika simudukwa nomubona, akutayuba kumeso aabantunyokwe?
Lino mumuni wako unoemunika mbuli bucedo, nkabela uyoofwambaana kuponezegwa. Bululami bwako buyookusololela, abulemu bwa-Jehova buyookusindikila.
Uyooita, nkabela Jehova uyoovuwa; wakwiila buyo, uyooamba kuti, Mpendi. Na wagwisya majokwe aali akati kanu, na waleka kutondesya munwe akwaamba bubi,
na waabila basinzala zilyo zyako akukutya myoyo yabapengede, lino uyoocedwa mumuni mukati kamudima, aciindi cisia mbi ciyoosanduka kuba mbuli isikati.
Lino Jehova uyookweenzya lyoonse, akukatalusya moyo wako mumasena mayumu. Uyooabila zifuwa zyako inguzu, nkabela uyooba mbuli muunda uutuntulilwa, ambuli butoolo bwamaanzi buli amaanzi aatayuminini.
Lino bana bako bayooyakulula matongo aaciindi; uyoobukulusya intalisyo zyamazyalani aakamana; nkabela uyootegwa kuti sikumama myaatuko, sikubukulusya meendelo aamakalilo.

Na wakasya maulu aako kusofwaazya Sabata, na waleka kucita ncoyanda omwini buyo mubuzuba bwangu busalala, na buzuba bwa-Sabata mbuyandisi mumeso aako, alimwi buzuba busalala bwa-Jehova mbulemu, na wabulemeka kukutatola inzila zyako omwini nikuba kulibotezya buyo nikuba kwaamba majwi aabuyo,
lino unoolijanina busekelezi muli-Jehova, nkabela njookutansika amasena aasumpwidwe aanyika akukulisya caabilo causo Jakobo, nkaambo mbuboobo mbuuamba mulomo wa-Jehova.
Pele milandu yanu njeyamwaandaanya a-Leza wanu, azibi zyanu nzezyamusisila busyu bwakwe, aboobo taswiilili.
Nkaambo maanza aanu asofwaazigwa bulowa, ayalo minwe yanu ilijisi milandu. Milomo yanu ilaamba zyakubeja, andimi zyanu zilanununa bubi.
Taakwe uuleta makani mubululami, taakwe uunjila mukubetekana calusinizyo. Balasyoma makani aapilingene akwaamba zintu zyabuyo, balaminta miyeeyo mibi akuzyala zibi.
Balakumba mai aacipile, balaluka luubilili lwangubi. Kufumbwa uulya mai aabo ulafwa, amulilelyo lipwayidwe mulazwa inzoka.
Ingubilili zyabo tazikonzyi kuba zyakusama, tabakonzyi kulivumbya milimo yabo. Milimo yabo njemilimo yabu bi, amumaanza aabo momuli bucigebenga.
Maulu aabo aali aluno lwakucita bubi. Balazuzaanina kutila bulowa bwabatakwe mulandu. Miyeeyo yabo njemiyeeyo yabumumvwazyakwe. Kusaala akunyonyoona nzezili munzila zyabo.
Inzila yaluumuno tabaizi. Tamukwe bululami mukweenda kwabo. Balicitila inzila zipilingene; kufumbwa muntu uuenda mulinzizyo takonzyi kuziba luumuno.
Tulaampaampa bulambo mbuli boofu, tulaampaampa mbuli batakwe meso, tulalifumpula ciindi casikati mbubonya mbukulifumpulwa kumabbililo aazuba, tuli mbuli bafu akati kabaabo bacili bayumu.
Toonse tulavuluma mbuli banengo, tulapululuzya mbuli inziba. Tulalindila lubeta pele taluwo; tulalangila lufutuko pele luli kule.
Nkaambo insotoko zyesu zyavula kumeso aako, azibi zyesu zilatupa kaambo, Nkaambo insotoko zyesu tuli azyo, amilandu yesu tuliibwene:
kusotoka mulao akweena-ena Jehova, kupiluka kunsi kuzwa kutobela Leza wesu, kwaamba makani aakupenzya akupapila, kuyeeya majwi aalweeno mumyoyo yesu akwaamba ngao.
Lubeta lwapiluka kunsi, abululami buliimvwi kule, nkaambo lusinizyo lwafumpulwa mumigwagwa yamuminzi, abululami tabukonzyi kunjila,
Kwabula lusyomo abuniini, akufumbwa uulipambula abubi ulalyaaba mumaanza aabasikusaala.
Lino Jehova naakabona, makani akabija mumeso aakwe kuti taakwe lubeta.
Wakabona kuti taakwe muntu, wakagamba nkaambo kakuti taakwe uulibusya kubamba makani, elyo kuboko kwakwe mwini kwakamufutula, abululami bwakwe bwakamutabilila.
Wakasama bululami mbuli cikwabilizyo kucamba, angoani yalufutuko amutwe wakwe. Wakasama zyakusama zyakuliya inkoto, akulivungaila cikobela cabusungu.
Ulabweedezya boonse bulumbu bweelede bwamilimo yabo, Abo bakazyanya awe ulababweedezya bukali, abasinkondonyina ulabalumbwida. Azyalo nyika zyakunkomwe yalwizi ulazibweedezya bulumbu bwazyo.
Aboobo bantu bazwa kububbila bayoolemeka izina lya-Jehova, abaabo bali kubuzwezuba bayooyoowa bulemu bwakwe, nkaambo uyoosika mbuli mulonga uupoomoka nguubinzya muuwo wa-Jehova.
Munununi uyoosika ku-Zioni akulibaabo baleka zibi zyabo muluzubo lwa-Jakobo, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo mudima ulavumba nyika, akumisyobo yoonse kulasia mbi, pele kulinduwe Jehova wapasula, abulemu bwakwe bulaboneka nkobede.
Nkabela bamasi balasika kuzoobona mumuni wako, abami kuzoobona kubekema kwakupasula kwako.
Lanzya meso aako koonse koonse, ubone. Boonse bayoboloka, beza kulinduwe. Bana bako balombe baleza kuzwa kule, abana bako basimbi balayumunwa bubuketwe.
Lino wabona buyo, meso aako ayoomunika, amoyo wako uyookankama cakukondwa, nkaambo imbono yalwizi ziyooba zyako, abuvubi bwamasi bayooboola kulinduwe.
Impumba yankamele iyoo za buvumba nyika yako; inkamele zya-Midyani azya-Efa azya-Seba zyoonse ziyoosika, ziliyumwide ingolida atununkilizyo; aboobo makani mabotu aa-Jehova ayootembaulwa.
Imbelele zyoonse zya-Kedara ziyooyoboloka kulinduwe, bagutu ba-Nebayoti bayookumanina milimo, bayootuulwa acipaililo cangu akutambulika, aboobo njoolemeka iŋanda yabweebesi bwangu.
Ino mbobani aba baya buuluka mbuli ijoba, mbuli inziba ziya kuzipulo zyazyo?

Nkaambo nyika zyakunkomwe yalwizi ziyoondilindila, aalo maato aa-Tarisi ayootaanguna, kuti balete bana bako kuzwa kule, baletelele ingolida yabo ansiliva yabo, zyoonse zibede izina lya-Jehova Leza wako a-Uusalala wa-Israyeli, nkaambo ngonguwe iwakakulemeka.
Nkabela bana babazwakule bayooyaka malambo aako, abami babo bayookumanina milimo, nkaambo mubukali bwangu ndakakuuma, pele mukukondwa kwangu ndakufwida luzyalo.
Milyango yako inoojulidwe lyoonse, tiikooyoojalwa abuniini isikati na masiku, kuti bakuletele imbono zyabamasi abami babo balabazulwida,
Nkaambo kufumbwa musyobo na bwami bukaka kukumanina milimo buyoonyonyooka. Ee, ncobeni misyobo iili boobo iyoolobesegwa,
Uyooletelwa bulemu bwa-Lebano, misamu yakupresi amisikili amizinibwa, kuti busena bwangu busalala bweebesegwe, aalo antu mpaakede maulu aangu njooalemeka,
Bana babaabo ibakali kukupenzya bazoosika cakukukotamina, aboonse ibakali kukusampaula bazoovundama ansi kuma ulu aako. Nkabela bayookubanda kuti Munzi wa-Jehova, Zioni wa-Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Wakalisiidwe akusulwa, katakwe muntu iwakainda mulinduwe, pele sunu ndakubika kuti ube cibetezyo citamani, usekelelwe mumazyalani oonse,
Uyoonyonka malili aabamasi, ncobeni inkolo zyabami uyoozinyonka, nkabela uyooziba kuti mebo nde-Jehova ndime Mufutuli wako a-Munununi wako Singuzu wa-Jakobo.

Mucibaka camukuba njooleta ingolida, amucibaka cabutale njooleta insiliva; mucibaka cazisamu muzooba mukuba, amucibaka camabwe muzooba butale. Njoobika Luumuno lube simutwe wako, a-Bululami bube sikukubelesya,
Bucigebenga tabukooyoomvwigwa limbi munyika yako, amucisi cako coonse tamukooyooba lusaalo niluba lunyonyooko, pele uyooulika malambo aako kuti ndufutuko, amilyango yako iyootegwa kutembaula,
Izuba talikooyooba limbi mumuni wako ciindi casikati, amwezi tuukooyookumunikila masiku, pele Jehova nguuyookubeda mumuni uutamani, a-Leza wako uyooba bweebesi bwako.
Izuba lyako talikooyoobbila limbi, amwezi wako tuukooyoogwisigwa, nkaambo Jehova uyookubeda mumuni uutamani, amazuba aakulila kwako ayoomaninina,
Bantu bako boonse bayooba balulami, nkabela bayoovuba nyika lyoonse mane kukabe kutamani. Mbombabo mutabi Jehova nguwakasimpa, zibumbwa zyamaanza aakwe, kuti alemekwe.
Kakamu kaniini kayooba cuulu, abantu bace bayooba mukowa mupati. Mebo nde-Jehova njoofwambya makani aya kuciindi cao ceelede.
kukambauka makani aamwaka uutambulika wa-Jehova abuzuba bwakuliya inkoto bwa-Leza wesu, kuumbulizya boonse balila,

kugwasya baabo balila mu-Zioni, bapegwe ingala mucibaka catwe, amafuta aabusekelezi mucibaka cakulila, cikobela cakutembaula mucibaka camoyo uulemedwe, kuti bategwe mibanga yabululami njaakasimpika Jehova, kuti alemekwe,
Lino bayooyakulula matongo aakalekale akubukulusya masena aakataanguna kusaalwa; bayoomamika minzi iimwayikide iibulide bantu ciindi cilamfu loko.
pele inywe muyooambwa kuti bapaizi ba-Jehova, muyooambwa kuti basimilimo ba-Leza wesu. Muyoolya imbono zyabamasi akulikankaizya mubulemu bwabo.
Mucibaka cansoni yanu muyooba acaabilo acimwi cabili. Mucibaka cakufwa bweeme bayoosekelela lukono lwabo, Munyika yabo beni bayoovuba caabilo acimwi cabili, nkabela bayooba alukondo lutamani.
Nkaambo mebo nde-Jehova ndayandisya lubeta lubotu, ndasula kubba abubi. Njoobapa bulumbu bwabo cakusyomeka akutangana abo cizuminano citamani.
Lunyungu lwabo luyoozibwa akati kabamasi, abana babo akati kamisyobo yabantu. Boonse bababona bayoozumina kuti ncobeni ndunyungu Jehova ndwaakalongezya.
Nkaambo mbubonya mbuli nyika mbwiisyuusya insyuuko zyayo, ambuli muunda mbuumeneka zibyedwe mulinguwo, mbubonya obo Mwami Jehova uyoomeneka bululami alutembaulo kumeso aamasi oonse.
Nkaambo ka-Zioni nsikooyooumuna, nkaambo ka-Jerusalemu nsikooyoolyokezya, mane lumwi bululami bwakwe buboneke mbuli mumuni uubekabeka, alufutuko lwakwe mbuli ilampi liyakisya.
Bamasi bayoobona bululami bwako, abami boonse bayoobona bulemu bwako, nkabela uyooulikwa izina lipya lizwa kumulomo wa-Jehova,
Lino uyooba musini wabweebesi mujanza lya-Jehova, ingala yabwami mujanza lya-Leza wako.

Tokooyooambwa limbi Uulekedwe, anyika yako tiikooyooambwa limbi Matongo, pe. Uyooambwa izina lya-Muyandwi wangu, anyika yako iyoopegwa izina lya-Uukwetwe, nkaambo Jehova ulakuyandisya, anyika yako iyookwatwa.
Mbubonya mbuli musankwa mbwakwata nakalindu, sikuyaka wako uyookukwata mbubonya. Mbubonya mbuli sibwiinga mbwakondelwa nabwiinga wakwe, a-Leza wako uyookondelwa nduwe.
mutamuleki muluumuno, mane akasimpikizye Jerusalemu, utembaulwe moonse munyika.

Jehova wakonkezya kujanza lyakwe lyalulyo akukuboko kwakwe kuyumu kuti, Ncobeni nsikooyooaba limbi maila aako abe zilyo zyabasinkondonyoko, abazwakule tabakooyoonywa limbi musinza wamisaansa yako njiwakabelekela,
pele basikwaatebula bayoolya ngao cakutembaula Jehova, abasikucela misaansa mbobayooinywa mumbanza zyacikombelo cangu.
Amwiinde, amwiinde mumilyango, mubambile bantu bangu inzila. Amutuntumike, amutuntumike mitundulu, amugwisye mabwe mumugwagwa, amusumpwide bamasi indembela.
Ncobeni ngaaya makani Jehova ngaalwiida magolelo oonse aanyika. Amwaambile mwana musimbi wa-Zioni kuti, Bona! Lufutuko lwako lwasika. Uleza abulumbu bwakwe, ankambilizyo yakwe mpiili kubusyu bwakwe,
Nkabela bayooambwa kuti mbantu basalala, banunwidwe ba-Jehova, Ayebo uyooambwa kuti ulisalidwe, munzi uutasiidwe.
Ino nkaambonzi zyakusama zyako zilasalala pyu? Nkaambonzi zikobela zyako zili mbuli zikobela zyayooyo uulyataula mucisinino camisaansa?

Ndakalyataula mucisinino endike. Katakwe muntu naba omwe akati kabamasi ngundakali awe, Lino ndakabalyataula mubukali bwangu akubakandaula mulunyemo lwangu. Bulowa bwabo bwakasansailwa azikobela zyangu, ndakabisya zyakusama zyangu zyoonse.
Nkaambo buzuba bwakuliya inkoto buli mumoyo wangu, amwaka walununuko wasika.
Ndakalanga pele katakwe sikugwasya, ndakagamba pele katakwe sikunditabilila, elyo kuboko kwangu ndemwini kwakandifutula, abukali bwangu mbobwakandiiabilila.
Ndakalyataula bantu mulunyemo lwangu, ndakabakozya mubukali bwangu, abulowa bwabo ndakabutila ansi.
Nkakanane milimo yaluzyalo njaakacita Jehova, nkatembaule Jehova nkaambo kacoolwe coonse ncatupede abubotu bwakwe bugambya kuluzubo lwa-Israyeli, buuya bwakwe mbwatufwida aluzyalo lwakwe lugambya.
Wakaamba kuti, Ncobeni mbantu bangu, bana bangu batakonzya kundeena, aboobo wakaba mufutuli wabo.
Mumapenzi aabo oonse wakapenga alakwe, aangelo wakwe nguwakabafutula, Muluyando lwakwe amukweetela kwakwe wakabanununa. Wakababweza akubabbala mazuba oonse aakale.
Pele bakapapila akupenzya Muuya wakwe uusalala, Nkaambo kako wakasanduka, waba sinkondonyina wabo, wabalwisya mwini.
Lumwi wakaibalukwa mazuba aakale, makani aa-Musa abantu bakwe. Uli kuli oyo iwakabapozya mulwizi antoomwe amweembeli wambelele zyakwe? Uli kuli oyo iwakabika Muuya wakwe uusalala mukati kabo?
Uli kuli oyo iwakeenda akuboko kwakwe kwabulemu kujanza lyalulyo lya-Musa, oyo iwakakosola maanzi kubusyu bwabo, kutu alijanine impuwo iitamani,
akubeenzya akati kamaanzi malamfu aalwizi? Bakeenda kabotu mbuli ibbiza munkanda, teebakalifumpula pe.
Mbubonya mbuli iŋombe ziya mukuti, Muuya wa-Jehova wakabakatalusya, Mbuboobo mbowakeenzya bantu bako, kuti ulijanine izina lyabulemu.
Sondela kuzwa kujulu, langa kuzwa kucikalilo cako cisalala cabulemu. Buli kuli busungu bwako anguzu zyako? Luyando lwamoyo wako aluzyalo lwako, zyoonse ndazinyanzigwa.
Nkaambo nduwe tateesu, nekuba kuti Abrahamu tatuzi, alakwe Israyeli tatuzuminini. Nduwe tateesu, O Jehova. Munununi wesu wakale ndizina lyako.
Nkaambonzi notuleesya kuzwa kunzila zyako, O Jehova? Nkaambonzi noyumya myoyo yesu kuti tutakuyoowi? Boola kuzoogwasya balanda bako, misyobo yabantu mbovubide.
Bantu bako basalala bakavuba cikombelo cako kaindi kaniini buyo, lino basinkondoma besu bacilyataula.
Twaba mbubonya mbuli abo batana kweendelezegwa nduwe abuniini, bataambwa kuzina lyako.
Nicakabota niwakaandula ijulu akuseluka ansi. Zilundu nizyakakankama kubusyu bwako!
Nikwakaba mbubonya mbuli tukuni nitutentwa mumulilo, na mbuli maanzi naaselauka aciko, kuti izina lyako lizibwe kulibasinkondonyoko, kuti bamasi bakankame kubusyu bwako!
Nowakacita zintu ziyoosya nzitwatakali kulangila, wakaseluka, nkabela zilundu zyakakankama kunembo lyako.
Kuzwa kalekale bantu tabanamvwide nikuba kuswiilila, aalo meso aabantu taana kubona, Leza umbi uucita mbocita yebo, uubelekela abo bamulindila.
Ulaswanaana ayooyo uubotelwa kucita bululami abaabo bakuyeeya munzila zyabo, Ncobeni wakakalala nitwakabisya. Muzibi zyesu motwakalilila ciindi cilamfu, lino tufutulwe buti?
Toonse twaba mbuli uusofweede. Incito zyesu ziluleme zyoonse zyaba mbuli cisani cisofweede cinunka nsu. Toonse tulapusama mbuli matu, amilandu yesu ilatutola mbuli muuwo.
Taakwe uukwiilila izina lyako, uulibusya kuti akujate, pe. Nkaambo watusisila busyu bwako, watwaaba mumaanza aamilandu yesu.
Pele nduwe tateesu, O Jehova, Ndiswe bulongo, nduwe mubumbi wesu. Toonse tuli zilenge zyamaanza aako.
Utakalali loko, O Jehova; utayeeyi milandu yesu lyoonse akutamani. Langa, utuyeeye, nkaambo tuli bantu bako toonse.
Minzi yako iisalala yaba inkanda buyo; Zioni waba inkanda, a-Jerusalemu waba matongo.
Iŋanda yesu iisalala injebesi, batateesu mubakali kukutembwiida, yapya mumulilo, amasena esu aayandika oonse aba matongo.
Sa ulakonzya kulikasya kucita cintu nobona makani aali obo, O Jehova? Sa ulakonzya kuumuna buyo akutupenzya loko?
Buzuba boonse buyo ndakatambika maanza aangu kucisi cacinguni, bantu beenda munzila iitali imbotu cakutobela miyeeyo yabo beni,
bantu bandikalazya lyoonse kumeso aangu, batuula zipaizyo mumyuunda akutenta tununkilizyo atala azitina,
bakala mutubanda akoona mumasena aasisidwe, balya nyama yangulube, amusinza wanyama iisesemya muuli muzilido zyabo,
baamba kuti, Tantamuka okuno, utasweni afwiifwi kulindime, nkaambo tulaandeene ayebo. Bantu bali obo bandikataazya mbuli busi mumpemu, mbuli mulilo uuyaka buzuba boonse.
Amubone! Makani alilembedwe kubusyu bwangu, Nsikooyooumuna pe, njoobabweedezya inkoto yabubi. Ncobeni njoobabweedezya muzyamba zyabo inkoto yabubi,

inkoto yamilandu yabo beni ayamilandu yabamawisi yoonse, mbwaamba Jehova. Nkaambo kakuti bakatenta tununkilizyo atala lyazilundu akundisampaula atulundulundu, njooeleka muzyamba zyabo inkoto yabubi bwancito zyabo zyakale.
Njoobusya lunyungu muliJakobo, amumukowa wa-Juda njoobusya basikuvuba zilundu zyangu. Bantu mbonsalide mbobati zivube, abalanda bangu bayookala mpoonya awo.
Saroni uyooba macelelo aambelele, akuti lya-Akori liyooba mabutelo aaŋombe. Zyoonse ziyooba zyabantu bangu bandiyandaula.
Pele inywe numuleka Jehova akuluba cilundu cangu cisalala, inywe numubamba intafule yanjuka akutilila muzimu wacoolwe bukoko,

coolwe ncinti mubambile ndipanga; muyookotama nyoonse kukujayigwa, nkaambo nindakaita mwakabula kuvuwa, nindakaamba mwakakaka kuswiilila. Mwakacita zintu zibi mumeso aangu akusala zintu zitandibotezyi.

Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Balanda bangu bayoolya, pele inywe muyoofwa inzala. Balanda bangu bayoonywa, pele inywe muyoofwa nyota, Balanda bangu bayoosekelela, pele inywe muyoousa insoni.
Balanda bangu bayooimba cakukondwa mumoyo, pele inywe muyoolila mumause aamyoyo yanu, muyoomoka mukupenga kwamyuuya yanu.
Izina lyanu muyoolisiila basalidwe bangu libe citukizyo. Mwami Jehova uyoomujaya, abalanda bakwe uyoobaulika izina limbi.

Lino kufumbwa uulilongezya munyika uyoolilongezya muzina lya-Leza walusinizyo, ayooyo uukonka munyika uyookonka muzina lya-Leza walusinizyo, nkaambo mapenzi mataanzi alilubidwe, alisisidwe kumeso aangu.
Pele amukondwe akusekelela lyoonse nkaambo kaceeci ncinsi lenge, nkaambo ndalenga Jerusalemu, ube cikondelezyo, abantu bawo, babe cibotezyo.
Njoosekelela Jerusalemu akukondelwa bantu bangu, Tamukooyoomvwigwa limbi mulinguwo ijwi lyakulila niliba ijwi lyakupenga.

Tamukooyooba limbi mulinguwo mucece uufwa natana kukula, nanka mucembele uufwamba kufwa niitana kuzulila myaka yakwe. Mwana uyoofwa naamana myaka iili mwanda. Pele sizibi uuli amyaka iili mwanda uyooba mutusi.
Maanda ngebayaka taakooyookalwa umbi, amicelo njibabyala tiikooyooligwa umbi pe, nkaambo mazuba aabantu bangu ayooba mbuli mazuba aamusamu, abantu mbensalide bayoongozya milimo yamaanza aabo.
Tabakooyoobeleka cabuyo nikuba kubelekela mapenzi, nkaambo bayooba bana bacoolwe ca-Jehova, alunyungu lwabo mbubonya.
Lino nibatana kwiita njoobavwiila, nibacili mukwaamba njooswiilila.

Umpe akabelele, zyoonse ziyoolya mucilido comwe; mulavu uyoocela bwizu mbubonya mbuli iŋombe; anzoka, bulongo buyooba cilyo cayo. Tabakooyooluma nikuba kunyonyoona moonse mucilundu cangu cisalala, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo zintu ezi zyoonse, ijanza lyangu ndelyakazilenga, zyoonse nzezyangu, mbwaamba Jehova, Pele muntu ngunzoolemeka ngooyu: kufumbwa uulipenzya akulibombya mumoyo, uukankama kumajwi aangu.

Kufumbwa uujaya musune uli mbuli oyo uujaya muntu, kufumbwa uutuuzya kabelele uli mbuli oyo uutyolela mubwa insingo, cipaizyo cabusu ncintu comwe abulowa bwangulube, ayooyo uutenta tununkilizyo ulyeelene ayooyo uukomba cikozyano camizimu. Bantu aba balilisalilide inzila zyabo, amyoyo yabo ilabotelwa zisesemyo zyabo.

Lino ambebo njoobasalila mapenzi, acintu eco nciconya ncibayoowa njoocileta kulimbabo, nkaambo kakuti nindakaita teebakavuwa, nindakaamba teebakaswiilila, pele bakacita bubi mumeso aangu akusala citandiboteli.
Kwamvwigwa ijwi lyalupyopyongano lizwa mumunzi, ijwi lizwa muntempele! Ndijwi lya-Jehova uubweedezya basinkondonyina inkoto yabubi.
Zioni naatakaina kuciswa, wakatumbuka, Naatakaina kumvwa macise, wakazyala mwana mulombe.

Nguni uumvwide cintu cili obo? Nguni uubwene makani aali obuya? Sa cisi cilazyalwa mubuzuba bomwe? Sa musyobo woonse ulazyalwa ciindi comwe? Nkaambo Zioni, naakamvwa macise aakwe, wakazyala bana bakwe ndilyonya.
Na ndamuminsya sa ndakonzya kutamuzyazya? mbwaamba Jehova. Mebo nenzyazya sa ndakonzya kusinka izyalilo? mbwaamba Leza wanu.
Amukondwe a-Jerusalemu, amumusekelele, nyoonse nemumuyanda.
Amutangale awe mukukondwa, inywe nemumulila,
kuti munyonke akukuta kunkolo zyakwe zyakuumuzya, munywe cakubotelwa kubulemu bwakwe bugambya.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Njoomuvuzizya luumuno mbuli mulonga, abuvubi bwabamasi buyoomubeda mbuli kalonga kapaya, elyo muyoonyonka, muyoobbalwa asolo akusumpaulwa amazwi.
Mbubonya mbuli muntu banyina ngubaumbulizya, ambebo njoomuumbulizya, nkabela muyooumbulizigwa mu-Jerusalemu.
Lino muyoobona, nkabela myoyo yanu iyookondwa, azyalo zifuwa zyanu ziyoojata inguzu mbuli mweemvwe. Kuyoozibwa kuti ijanza lya-Jehova ndeligwasya balanda bakwe, pele basinkondonyina ulabakalalila.
Nkaambo amubone! Jehova uyoosika amulilo, ankalaki zyakwe ziyooba mbuli kambizi, kuti bukali bwakwe bubuke canguzu, atapatile bantu amabangabanga aamulilo.
Nkaambo Jehova uyoobeteka amulilo; ipanga lyakwe liyoouma bantu boonse, abajayidwe ba-Jehova bayoovula,
Abaabo balisalazya akulibamba kunjila mumyuunda, batobela umwi uuli akati kabo, balya nyama yangulube azisesemyo ambeba, boonse bayoomaninina antoomwe, mbwaamba Jehova.

Nkabela njoobika citondezyo akati kabo, Abamwi basyeede njoobatuma kulibamasi, ku-Tarisi aku-Puli akuli ba-Ludi basimata aku-Tubali aku-Javani akunyika zyakunkomwe yalwizi zili kule, kubantu batanamvwide impuwo yangu nikuba kubona bulemu bwangu, nkabela bayoolwiida bamasi makani aabulemu bwangu.

Lino bayooleta bana bakwanu boonse kuzwa kuzisi zyoonse, zibede Jehova cituuzyo. Bayoobaleta balitantide amabbiza, amunkalaki, amunola, aambongolo, aankamele, mane lumwi basike kucilundu cangu cisalala caku-Jerusalemu, mbwaamba Jehova, mbubonya mbuli bana ba-Israyeli mbubaleta zipo zyabusu kuŋanda ya-Jehova mucilido cisalala.
Abamwi babo njoobabweza kuti babe bapaizi aba-Levi, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo mbubonya mbuli ijulu ipya anyika impya nzinsi lenge mbuziyookalilila kubusyu bwangu, mbwaamba Jehova, lunyungu lwanu azina lyanu ziyookalilila mbubonya.
Nkabela kuzwa kumwezi mupya akusikila kuluumwi mupya, akuzwa kubuzuba bwa-Sabata akusikila kulibumwi bwa-Sabata, bantu boonse bayoosika kuzookomba kubusyu bwangu, mbwaamba Jehova.
Lino bayooinka kuyoobona mitunta yabantu, ibakandipapila, nkaambo imvunyu zyabo tazikwe nizifwa, amulilo wabo tuukwe nuuzima, pele bayoobeda bantu boonse cisesemyo.
Ngonguwe iwakasikilwa ijwi lya-Jehova mumazuba aa-Josiya mwana wa-Amoni mwami wa-Juda, mumwaka wakumi aitatu wabwami bwakwe,
amumazuba aa-Jehoyakimu mwana wa-Josiya mwami wa-Juda, mane kusikila kumwaka wakumi aumwi wabwami bwa­-Zedekiya mwana wa-Josiya mwami wa-Juda, bantu ba-Jerusalemu nibakatolwa kubuzike mumwezi wasanu.
Ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, lyakati,
Nkentana kukubumba mwida ndakalikuzi, nowatakaina kuzwa muzyalilo ndakakusalazya akukubika kuti ube musinsimi wakukambaukila bamasi.
Lino ndakaamba kuti, Akaka Mwami Jehova! Mebo nsikonzyi kukambauka, nkaambo ncili mwanikenike.
Pele Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Utaambi kuti, Ncili mwanikenike, nkaambo uleelede kwiinka kubantu boonse, kufumbwa nkundakutuma, amakani oonse ngendakulailila uleelede kwaamba ngao.
Utayoowi masyu aabo pe, nkaambo ndi ayebo, nzookuvuna, mbwaamba Jehova.
Mpawo Jehova wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe, waampa mulomo wangu, wandaambila kuti, Bona! Ndabika majwi aangu mumulomo wako.
Langa! Buzuba obuno ndakupa bwami bwabamasi abwazisi, bwami bwakunonkola abwakumwaya, bwakunyonyoona abwakujayilila, bwakuyaka abwakusimpika.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, lyakati, Ncinzi ncobona, Jeremiya? Ndakavuwa kuti, Ndabona musako waalmondi.
Lino Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Wabona kabotu, nkaambo mebo ndalangilila majwi aangu kuti nkaazuzikizve.
Elyo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila lwabili liti, Ncinzi ncobona? Ndakavuwa kuti, Ndabona ibiya lyakujikila, lilisuleme kulanga kunyika.
Lino Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Kunyika nkokuyoozwa mapenzi, ayoosikila bantu boonse bacisi.

Ncobeni ndaita inzubo zyoonse zyazisi zyakunyika, mbwaamba Jehova, nkabela bayoosika, bayookazika umwi aumwi cuuno cakwe cabwami kumanjililo aamilyango ya-Jerusalemu, akuzyungulusya malambo aawo oonse, akuminzi yoonse yacisi ca-Juda.
Lino njoombolozya abo nkaambo kabubi boonse mbubacita, nkaambo balinditakatide, balatentela mizimu myeenzu tununkilizyo akukotamina zilenge zyamaanza aabo beni.
Lino webo, kolyaanga mucibuno, buka, ukabaambile majwi oonse ngendakulailila. Utayoowi kulangana abo, kuti ntakuyoosyi kumeso aabo.
Bona! Buzuba obuno ndakubika kuti ube munzi uuli alubaya, munsende wabutale, malambo aamundalila, kunyika yoonse, kubami bacisi ca-Juda abasilutwe baco abapaizi baco abantu boonse banyika.
Bayookulwisya, pele tabakooyookuzunda pe, nkaambo ndi ayebo, nzookuvuna, mbwaamba Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, lyakati,
