Koya ukakambauke mumatwi aabana ba-Jerusalemu kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ndaingasila luzyalo lwako lwakubwanike bwako ambuwakali kundiyanda nowakali nabwiinga. Ndaingasila mbowakanditobela munkanda, munyika injumu iitajisi zilyo.
Israyeli kali musalazi wa-Jehova, kabalwebalwe wakutebula kwakwe. Kufumbwa bakamulya bakajana mulandu, bakasikilwa mapenzi, mbwaamba Jehova.
Amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova, nuluzubo lwa-Jakobo amikowa yoonse yaluzubo lwa-Israyeli.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ino mbubinzi bamausowanu mbubakajana mulindime? Nkaambonzi balitantamukide kule kuzwa kulindime? Nkaambonzi batobela zintu zyabuyo akuba bantu babuyo?

Tabakwe nibaamba kuti, Uli kuli-Jehova iwakatugwisya munyika ya-Egepita, iwakatweenzya munkanda, munyika yamabua ayazilindi, munyika yacimpayuma ayamudima uusia mbi, munyika iitaindwi bantu nikuba kukalwa muntu naba omwe.
Ndime ndakamusisya kunyika yambolezi, kuti mukalye micelo yayo abubotu bwayo. Pele mbomwakanjila buyo, mwakasofwaazya nyika yangu, alukono lwangu mwakalusandula kuba cisesemyo.
Bapaizi tabakwe nibakaamba kuti, Uli kuli-Jehova? Abalo basimilao tabakwe nibakandiziba. Beendelezi bakandibisizya, abasinsimi bakasinsima muzina lya-Baala, akutobela zintu zitagwasyi.
Ma! Amwiinde kunkomwe zyacisi caba-Kitimu, mukabone; amutume ku-Kedara, mukalingule kabotu makani; amubuzye na nkwaali makani aali boobu.
Sa kuli cisi niciba cimwi icakasowa baleza baco akubika bambi, nekuba kuti tabeensi baleza loko? Pele bantu bangu balisoowede bulemu bwabo, amucibaka cabo balibikide cintu citakwe milimo.
Amugambe numajulu kumakani aya, amukankame akuyoowesya, mbwaamba Jehova,
nkaambo bantu bangu balijisi zibi zyobile nzibacitide. Mebo ndekasensa kamaanzi aabuumi bandileka, lino balibezela mikalo, mikalo iiandaukide iitakonzyi kujata maanzi.
Sa Israyeli muzike? Sa wakazyalwa muŋanda yabulanda? Ino nkaambonzi waba cisaalo?
Balavu balamuvulumina, balangwalamuna majwi aabo. Balisaalide nyika yakwe, aminzi yakwe yaba matongo aabula bantu.
Abalo bantu baku-Noti abaku-Tahapanesi balipwayide canza cako.
Sa teensi nduwe omwini owakaliletela mapenzi aali boobo? Nkaambo wakatakata Jehova Leza wako kuciindi eco naakali kukweenzya munzila?
Lino waba anzi noya ku-Egepita kuyoonywa maanzi aa-Sihori? Waba anzi noya ku-Asuri kuyoonywa maanzi aalwizi?

Bubi bwako omwini mbobuti ku ume, akupambuka kwako kuyookupenzya. Lino koziba akubona kuti ncintu cibi cilula ncowacita mukuleka Jehova Leza wako akutandiyoowa mumoyo wako, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova wamakamu.

Nkaambo kalekale wakatyola ijokwe lyako akudunsula zyaanzyo zyako, alimwi wakaamba kuti, Nsikoobeleka pe. Ncobeni atala lyazilundu zyoonse zilamfu amucenzule camisamu yoonse iisia wakali kuya buvuula.
Nekubaboobo nindakakubyala wakali musaansa mubotu; imbuto zyako zyakali imbuto loko. Ino wasanduka buti kuba musaansa umbi uusampukide?
Ncobeni nowakasamba amusamu akubelesya mulola munji, cibata cazibi zyako neciciboneka kumeso aangu, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Ulaamba buti kuti, Nsisofweede, nsina kutobela ba-Baala? Bona inzila yako yamukuti mbwiibede! Ziba mbowacita! Uli inkamele iili aluno iiya buzumbana,

Uli imbongolo yamusokwe iizibide munkanda, iiya bununkuzya mucisusi cayo. Nguni uukonzya kukasya zisusi zyayo? Bacende bai yanda tabakonzyi kulikataazya kwiiyandaula pe, balaijana ncobeni kumwezi waya uuelede.
Ma! Utayi azituta zitasamine indyasyo! Utalikozyi nyota! Pele uwe wakaamba kuti, Ne! Nsikonzyi kuleka. Ndayandisya beenzu, lino njeelede kuya bubatobela,
Mbuli mubbi mbwafwa bweeme naajanwa, luzubo lwa-Israyeli luyoofwa bweeme mbubonya, Bayoofwa bweeme balo, abami babo, abasilutwe babo, abapaizi babo, abasinsimi babo boonse,
baambila cisamu kuti, Nduwe taata, alyalo ibbwe balalyaambila kuti, Nduwe wakandizyala. Bandipa sule, tabandipi busyu pe, Nekubaboobo muciindi camapenzi aabo balandaambila kuti, Buka, utuvune.
Ma! Bali kuli baleza bako mbowakalicitila? Babuke balo, bakuvune muciindi cako camapenzi! Nkaambo mweelwe wabaleza bako ulyeelene amweelwe watninzi yako, O Juda.
Nkaambonzi nokazyanya ambebo? Nyoonse mwandipapila, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ndakauma bana banu, pele kuuma kwakali kwabuyo, nkaambo bakakaka kwiiya. Ipanga lyanu nubeni lyakamanisya basinsimi banu mbuli mulavu uunyonyoona.
Nubasyasunu, amubone ijwi lyaJehova mbulibede. Sa ndabeda ba-Israyeli inkanda nanka nyika yamudima uusia mbi? Ino nkaambonzi bantu bangu balaamba kuti, Twadunsuka, tatukooyooboola limbi kulinduwe.
Sa nakalindu ulaluba zyakusakatila zyakwe? Sa nabwiinga ulaluba lukumba lwakwe? Pele bantu bangu bandiluba mebo mazuba manji aatabaliki,
Ma! Ulasalaula kabotu inzila yako mukuyandaula basikukuyanda. Nibaba banakazi babi wabaiisya inzila zyako.
Amumyoombe yazikobela zyako mulajanwa bulowa bwabantu bapengede batakwe milandu; tokwe nowakabajana balatulula pe. Nekuba kuti wacita zintu ezi zyoonse,
waamba kuti, Nsikwe mulandu; ncobeni bukali bwakwe bwandileka. Ncobeni tuyoobetekana nkaambo kajwi lyako lyakuti, Nsina kubisya.
We! Ulatamauka mukweendeenda kwako. Uyoousigwa insoni kumakani aa-­Egepita mbubonya mbowakausigwa insoni kumakani aa-Asuri,
Uyoozwa nkuko akwalo amaanza aako ali amutwe, nkaambo Jehova wakaka bantu abo mbosyoma, aboobo tokooyoogwasigwa kulimbabo.

Lanzya meso aako kulibalubulansuki, ukabone. Sa kuli busena nibuba bumwi nkotana kulalikwa? Wakali kukala akubalindila kumbali lyanzila mbubonya mbuli mu-Arabiya munkanda, Wasofwaazya nyika mubwaamu bwabubi bwako.
Nciceeco lusuunsu ncilwakakakilwa, amvula yamainza tiina kuloka. Ulijisi inkumu yasibwaamu, wakaka kuusa bweeme.
Sa tona kundiita lino lino cakwaamba kuti, Taata, nduwe muzolwani wakubwanike bwangu?
Sa ulajatisya lyoonse bukali bwakwe? Sa ulakalala akutamani? Ncobeni waamba obo, nekubaboobo wacita bubi boonse mbokonzya.
Ndakali kuyeeya kuti, amane kucita milimo eyi yoonse inga uzooboola kulindime. Pele takwe naakaboola pe, Lino mucizi wakwe silweeno Juda wakabona.

Wakabona kuti Israyeli uutasyomeki, mbwaakacitide mamambe manji, ndakamutanda akumupa lugwalo lwakulekana. Nekubaboobo mucizi wakwe silweeno Juda naakabona obo, takwakayoowa pe, wakaya kuya buvuula alakwe.
Kuvuula kakutakwe makani mumeso aakwe pe, aboobo wakasofwaazya nyika akucita bumambe mukukomba mabwe azisamu.
Amucizi wakwe silweeno Juda, nekuba kuti wakabona aya makani oonse, taakwe naakapiluka kulindime camoyo wakwe woonse, wakapiluka cakuupaupa ameso buyo, mbwaamba Jehova,
Lino Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Israyeli uutasyomeki walilulamika kwiinda Juda silweeno.
Koya ukakambauke majwi aya kunyika. Koamba kuti, Boola, O Israyeli uutasyomeki, mbwaamba Jehova, lino nsikooyookulanga cabukali, nkaambo ndisiluzyalo, mbwaamba Jehova; nsikooyookukalalila lyoonse pe.
Kolyaamba buyo mulandu wako wakuti wakapapila Jehova Leza wako, waabila beenzu luyando lwako mucenzule camisamu yoonse mitete, alimwi tamuna kuswiilila ijwi lyangu, mbwaamba Jehova.
Amuboole nubana batasyomeki, mbwaamba Jehova, nkaambo ndime simalelo wanu. Njoomubweza, njoosalaula omwe omwe mumunzi umwi aumwi, bobile bobile muluzubo lumwi alumwi, nkamulete ku-Zioni.
Lino njoomupa beembeli mbubonya mbuuyanda moyo wangu, nkabela bayoomusanina luzibo abusongo.

Lino mumazuba ayo aaza, mwamana buyo kuzyalisya akuvula, mbwaamba Jehova, tabakooyooamba limbi ibbokesi lyacizuminano ca-Jehova. Talikooyooyeeyegwa limbi, tabakooyooliibaluka nikuba kulisukama, alimwi talikooyoocitwa limbi.

Kuciindi eco Jerusalemu uyooambwa kuti ncecuuno cabwami ca-Jehova, Bantu bamisyobo yoonse bayooyobololwa nkukonya ku-Jerusalemu kukulemeka izina lya-Jehova, nkabela tabakooyooenda limbi muzinguni zyamyoyo yabo mibi.
Mumazuba ayo luzubo lwa-Juda luyooswanaana aluzubo lwa-Israyeli, nkabela boonse bayooboola antoomwe kuzwa kucisi cakunyika kusikila kunyika njindakapa bamausowanu kuti baivube.
Ncobeni mbuli mwanakazi uubula lusyomo mbwazwa kumulumaakwe, mbubonya obo mbumwazwa kulindime, O luzubo lwa-Israyeli, mbwaamba Jehova.
Amuboole nubana babula lusyomo, nkaponye kutasyomeka kwanu! Ncobeni tulaboola kulinduwe, nkaambo nduwe Jehova Leza wesu.
Kasimpe lugwasyo bantu ndubalindila kuzwa kumalundu akulupyopyongano lwakutulundu ndwabuyo. Kasimpe muli-Jehova Leza wesu molusi janwe lufutuko lwa-Israyeli.

Pele kuzwa kuciindi cabwanike bwesu cintu eco cuusya insoni ncecamanisya zyoonse bamatata besu nzibakabelekela, niziba imbelele zyabo niziba iŋombe zyabo, nibaba bana babo balombe nibaba bana babo basimbi.
Atulale mubweeme bwesu, ansoni yesu ituvumbe, nkaambo twabisizya Jehova Leza wesu, iswe abamatateesu, kuzwa kubwanike bwesu mane kusikila kubuzuba obuno. Tatuna kuswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wesu.
na kukonka kwako kwakuti “Jehova mbwali muumi” nkwalusinizyo akwalubeta akwabululami, elyo bamasi bayoojana coolwe mulinguwe akumutembaula.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Jehova mbwaambila bantu ba-­Juda abaku-Jerusalemu. Amulipandile cipande canu, mutabyali akati kamamvwa.

Amulipalule kuli-Jehova akugwisya lulomo lwamyoyo yanu, nubantu ba-Juda anywebo nomukede mu-Jerusalemu, nkaambo, mwatacita obo, bukali bwangu buyoobuka mbuli mulilo uutenta uutakwe muntu wakuuzimya, nkaambo kabubi bwamilimo yanu.
Amusumpwide Zioni citondezyo. Amucije, mutaimi pe, nkaambo kuzwa kulubazu lwakunyika njooleta mapenzi alunyonyooko lupati.
Kwanyamuka mulavu kuzwa kulusaka lwakwe, kwainka sikunyonyoona zisi kuzwa kubusena bwakwe. Uyoosaala nyika yako, aminzi yako iyooba matongo aabula bantu bakede mumo.
Nkaambo kako amusame zisani zyamasaka, mulile akoomoka, nkaambo bukali buyoosya bwa-Jehova tabuna kutuleka.
Mpoonya awo ndakati, Akaka Mwami Jehova! Ncobeni bantu aba a-Jerusalemu wabeena kumajwi aakuti, Muyoojana luumuno, anukuti ipanga lilabakataazya akusika akumyoyo yabo.
Muuwo uundisikila muyumu kwiinda muuwo wamilimo iili boobo. Ndime ndasika kuzoobetekana abo.
Amubone! Uleza mbuli mayoba, ankalaki zyakwe zili mbuli kambizi. Imbizi zyakwe zili aluno kwiinda basikwaze. Maawe! Twapenga! Twanyonyoonwa!
Salazya bubi bwamoyo wako, O Jerusalemu, kuti ufutulwe, Miyeeyo mibi ilaleka lili kukala mulinduwe?
Nkaambo ijwi nkulili lilungulula makani kuzwa ku-Dani, lisinsima mapenzi kuzwa kucilundu ca-Efraimu.
Amucenjezye bamasi kuti uleza. Amulwiide Jerusalemu makani. Kwasika basikusinkinizya kuzwa kunyika iili kule! Balangwalamunina minzi yacisi ca-Juda!
Balamuzinguluka koonse koonse mbubonya mbuli bantu balindila myuunda, nkaambo kakuti wapapila ndime, mbwaamba Jehova.
Inzila zyako amilimo yako nzezyakuletela mapenzi aya. Ngengao mapenzi ngewabikilwa! Alalula luu! Alasika akumoyo wako!
Luumo lulasika atala lyaluumonyina, nkaambo nyika yoonse ilisaalidwe. Boongomoka kundijayila itente lyangu, azisitilizyo zyangu zyafwamba kudeluulwa.
Nkaleke lili kubona indembela akumvwa ijwi lyamweembo?
Nkaambo bantu bangu bafubaala, tabazi ndime, Mbana bamazinzili, tabajisi busongo, Kucita bubi balicenjede loko, pele kucita bubotu tabakubwene pe.
Ndakabona zilundu nkabela zyakali kukankama, atulundulundu toonse twakali kuzungaana-zungaana.
Ndakabona kuti taakwe muntu, abalo bayuni bakujulu boonse bauluka.
Ndakabona kuti nyika yambolezi yaba inkanda, aminzi yayo yoonse yamwaika kubusyu bwaJehova nkaambo kabukali bwakwe buyoosya.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, Nyika yoonse iyoosaalwa, nekubaboobo nsikooyooimaninizya.
Nkaambo kako nyika iyoolila, akoonse kujulu kuyoosia mbi. Mbuboobo mbundakaamba, mbundakakanza, nkabela nsina kweempwa, nsikooyooleka makani pe.

Lino uwe oosiidwe, ulacitanzi? Cilagwasya buti kusama zikobela zisalala pyu, akulisakatizya zisakatilo zyangolida, akulamba meso aako acisila? Kulibotya kwako nkwabuyo, nkaambo basimamambe bako bakusampaula, balayanda kukujaya.

Nkaambo ndimvwide ijwi mbuli ijwi lyamwanakazi uutumbuka, mbuli kupenga kwayooyo uuzyala mwanaakwe mutaanzi, Ndijwi lyamwana musimbi wa-Zioni ulafweketa akutandabika maanza aakwe. Maawe kulindime! Ndawizuka kunembo lyabasikujaya.
Balaamba kuti, Jehova mbwali muumi, nekubaboobo kukonka kwabo ncobeni nkwalweeno.
O Jehova, sa meso aako taalindili lusinizyo? Wakabauma, pele tabakwe nibakausa insoni. Wakabamanisya, pele bakakaka kutambula lulayo. Bakayumya masyu aabo nta kwiinda ibbwe, bakaka kupiluka.
Lino ndakaamba kuti, Ncobeni aba mbantu batengwana buyo, balifubeede, nkaambo tabazi inzila ya-Jehova niziba imbeta zya-Leza wabo.
Njiinke kubapati, nkabaambile, nkaambo mbombabo bezi inzila ya-Jehova ambeta zya-Leza wabo. Pele boonse buyo balyeelene, boonse balityolede ijokwe akudunsaula zyaanzyo zyabo.
Nkaambo kako mulavu wamulusaka uyoobauma, aumpe wamunkanda uyoobajaya. Siluwe ulalindila minzi yabo; kufumbwa uuzwa mulinjiyo uyoozapaulwa; nkaambo milandu yabo yavula, andeyo zyabo nzinji.
Nkamulekelele buti? Bana bako balinditakatide, balakonka muzina lyabaabo batali baleza, Nindakabakutya, bakacita bumambe, bakayoboloka boonse kumaanda aabwaamu.
Bakalikozyene ambizi iineneede incende; umwi aumwi wakali kulila mukamweenzinyina.
Sa nsikooyoobauma nkaambo kamakani aya? mbwaamba Jehova. Sa nsikooyooliya inkoto kumusyobo uuli boobo?
Koya bweenda akati kamindando yamisaansa yakwe, ukanyonyoone pele utamaninizyi. Kosola mitabi yakwe, nkaambo tayeensi ya-Jehova.
Nkaambo luzubo lwa-Juda aluzubo lwa-Israyeli loonse, tabana kusyomeka kulindime abuniini, mbwaamba Jehova.
Baamba cakubeja aa-Jehova, bati, Taakwe makani; tatukooyoosikilwa mapenzi, tatukooyoobona ipanga niiba inzala pe.
Basinsimi balizwide muuwo buyo, ijwi talili mukati kabo. Mbuboobu mbubayoocitilwa!
Lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wamakamu. Nkaambo kamajwi aya ngebaamba, bona! Majwi aangu aali mumulomo wako njooasandula kuba mulilo, abantu aba bayooba inkuni, nkabela uyoobasukutya.
Amubone, nuluzubo lwa-Israyeli, mbwaamba Jehova. Njoomuletela musyobo uuzwa kule, musyobo moongozi, musyobo wakalekale, musyobo uuli amwaambo ngomutezi, alimwi tamumvwisyi mbubaamba.
Inkomo yamivwi yabo ili mbuli kabanda kajulukide. Boonse buyo mbaalumi basintaze.

Bayoolya maila aako acilyo cako coonse. Bayoolya bana bako balombe abana bako basimbi. Bayoolya imbelele zyako aŋombe zyako. Bayoolya misaansa yako ankuyu zyako. Aminzi yako iili amabaya njosyoma balaimwazya ipanga.
Nekubaboobo amumazuba ayo nsikooyoomumaninizya, mbwaamba Jehova.

Pele babuzya buyo kuti, Ino nkaambonzi Jehova Leza wesu watuletela mapenzi aya oonse? lino uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbubonya mbumwakanditakata akumanina baleza bambi milimo munyika yanu, anywebo muyoobelekela bambi mbubonya munyika iitali yanu.
Kolungulwida luzubo lwa-Jakobo aya makani, akwaakambauka mucisi ca-Juda. Amba kuti,
Amuswiilile nubantu bafubafuba babula bongo, inywe nomujisi meso aataboni amatwi aataswiilili.

Sa tamuyoowi ndime? mbwaamba Jehova. Sa tamukankami kubusyu bwangu? Ndime ndakabika musenga kuti ube mugaano walwizi, ngumulao uutamani nguluta-konzyi kusotoka. Mayuwe aalo alatengauka, pele taakonzyi kuzunda; alavuuma, pele taakonzyi kusotoka.
Pele bantu aba balijisi moyo muyumu uukataazya; baleya, bainka kumbi.
Tabana kwaamba mumyoyo yabo kuti, Atuyoowe Jehova Leza wesu uutuwisizya imvula, imvula yakutanga amvula yamiyoba yoonse kuciindi cayo, akutubambila insondo zyeelede zyakutebula.
Milandu yanu njeyakasya zintu ezi, azibi zyanu zyamusinkinizizya zintu zibotu.
Nkaambo kwajanwa basizibi akati kabantu bangu. Balalindila mbuli bavwimi mbubalindila, balateya inkole, balaca bantu.
Mbuli cizangala mbucizwide bayuni, maanda aabo alizwide lweeno mbubonya, Nciceeco ncibabeda bapati abavubi.
Balineneede akubungusana, Balainda kucita milimo mibi. Kubeteka tababeteki kabotu makani aabamucaala kuti bajane coolwe, aalo makani aabatengwana tabaakosoli kabotu.
Sa nsikooyoobauma nkaambo kamakani aya? mbwaamba Jehova. Sa nsikooyooliya inkoto kumusyobo uuli boobo?
Ma! Cintu ciyoosya cuusya insoni caba munyika.
Basinsimi balasinsima cakubeja, abapaizi baleendelezya mbubabalailila, abalo bantu bangu balayandisya makani aali boobo. Pele muyoocitanzi kumamanino aawo?
Mwana musimbi wa-Zioni, simacece uuebeka, njoomunyonyoona.
Beembeli bayoosika kulinguwe amatanga aabo, bayooyaka zilao zyabo cakumuzyunguluka, akucezya matanga aabo umwi aumwi mubusena bwakwe.
Amulibambe kumulwisya! Amunyamuke twiinke ciindi casikati! Maawe! Izuba lilatubbilila, azyenzule zyakumazuba zilaya bulampa!
Amunyamuke, twiinke masiku, tunyonyoone maanda aakwe aabwami.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Amugonke misamu, muyake citantaala cavu cakulwisya Jerusalemu. Nguwo munzi uuelede kukomwa; moonse mukati kawo mulizwide lunyansyo.
Mbuli kasensa mbukatuntumusya maanzi aako cakutayuminina, ulatuntumusya bubi bwawo mbubonya, Mukati kawo mulamvwigwa lunyansyo alunyonyooko, Malwazi amabunda mpaali lyoonse kumeso aangu.
Kolayigwa, O Jerusalemu, kuti moyo wangu utaleki kukuyanda, ntakubiki mbuli matongo, nyika iibula bantu.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Vulula ba-Israyeli basyeede mbubonya mbuli musaansa mbuuvulululwa. Ijanza lyako liboole alimwi kwiinda kumitabi mbubonya mbwacita sikucela.
Mbobani mbonkonzya kwaambila akubacenjezya kuti baswiilile? Ncobeni matwi aabo taapalwidwe, tabakonzyi kuswiilila. Ncobeni ijwi lya-Jehova lyababeda cintu cisampaulwa, tababotelwi ndilyo pe.
Nkaambo kako ndizwide bukali bwa-Jehova, ndakataala kulikasya. Tulula moyo wako kubana bamumigwagwa akubasankwa nkubabungene. Bayoojatwa baalumi abanakazi boonse, bapati abacembele.
Maanda aabo ayoosandulwa kuba mumaanza aabambi, myuunda yabo abanakazi babo boonse, nkaambo njootandabika ijanza lyangu kukuuma bantu bakede munyika, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo boonse buyo balayandisya kunyanzya-nyanzya, nibaba bapati nibaba baniini, abasinsimi abapaizi boonse balacita cakubeja.
Balasilika-silika mibunda yabantu bangu amajwi aabo aakuti, Muli aluumuno, muli aluumuno! anukuti taakwe luumuno pe.
Sa bakausa insoni nibakacita zisesemyo? Ne! Teebakafwa insoni. Kufwa bweeme tabakuzi pe. Nkaambo kako bayooba akati kabaabo bawide mulufu. Kuciindi eco ninzoobakoma bayoonyonyooka, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ndakamubikila balindizi. Ndakaamba kuti, Amuswiilile ijwi lyamweembo, Pele bati, Tatukooyooswiilila pe.
Nkaambo kako, amuswiilile nubamasi. Amuzibe, nubantu babungene, citi sike kulimbabo.
Swiilila, O nyika, Ncobeni mebo ndaletela bantu aba bubi, nkukuti micelo yamiyeeyo yabo, nkaambo tabana kuswiilila majwi aangu, amulao wangu baukaka.
Tulijisi milimonzi kulindime tununkilizyo tuzwa ku-Se ba, amisale mibotu iizwa kunyika yakule? Zituuzyo zyanu tazitambuliki, azipaizyo zyanu tazindibotezyi pe.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Bona! Ndabikila bantu aba zifumpuzyo, nkabela bayoolifumpula kulinzizyo bamawisi abana babo boonse, amuntu amweenzinyina boonse bayoonyonyooka antoomwe.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Kulazwa bantu mucisi cakulubazu lwakunyika. Kulabuka musyobo mupati kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika.

Balabweza mata amasumo. Mbayumumyoyo, tabajisi luzyalo pe, Ijwi lyabo lilavuuma mbuli lwizi. Balitantide amabbiza, balilibambide mumindando yabo mbuli basilumamba kuti bakulwisye, O mwana musimbi waZioni.
Twamvwa impuwo, Maanza esu alebuka. Atujata mapenzi amacise mbuli macise aamwanakazi mutumbu.
Utainki musokwe, utanooendi munzila, nkaambo basinkondonyoko balijisi mapanga, azintu ziyoosya nkuzili koonse koonse.
O mwana musimbi wabantu bangu, sama zisani zyamasaka, alabana mukati katwe, lila mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwalila mwanaakwe simuzyalwaalike, omoka cakupengesya, nkaambo sikusaala woongomoka kutulwisya,
Ndakubika kuti ube sikulingula akati kabantu bangu, ukalingule inzila zyabo akuziba mbuzibede.
Boonse buyo mbasicinguni loko, Balaya bulengelela beenzinyina twaambo. Mbayumu mbuli mundalila na butale. Boonse buyo balabisya.
Mavuba alafulida canguzu, lubulo lweenzunuka mumulilo, pele kusalazya nkwabuyo, basizibi tabazwi pe.
Balaambwa kuti ninsiliva iikakidwe, nkaambo Jehova wabakaka.
Ngaaya makani aakasika kuli-Jeremiya kuzwa kuli-Jehova. Wakaambilwa kuti,
Ima mumulyango waŋanda ya-Jehova, ukambauke nkuko majwi aya aakuti, Amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova nyoonse nuba-Juda nomunjila mumilyango eyi kuzookomba Jehova.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli, Amubotye inzila zyanu ancito zyanu, elyo njoomukazika mpoonya ano.
Mutasyomi majwi aakubeja buyo aakuti, Njeeyi intempele ya-Jehova, njeeyi intempele ya-Jehova, njeeyi intempele ya-Jehova!
Nkaambo na mwabotya loko inzila zya nu ancito zyanu, na ncobeni mwabetekana kabotu umwi aumwi amweenzinyina,
na mwaleka kupenzya beenzu abamucaala abamukabafu nanka kutila mpoonya ano bulowa bwabaabo batakwe milandu, alimwi na mwaleka kutobela baleza bambi bamubisizya,
elyo njoomukazika mpoonya ano, munyika eyo njiyonya njindakapa bamausowanu kuti baivube lyoonse kukabe kutamani.
Ncobeni mulasyoma majwi aakubeja aatagwasyi.
Na mulabba akujaya akucita bumambe akukonka cakubeja akutentela Baala tununkilizyo akuya butobela baleza bambi mbemutezi,
sa ncibotu kuza akwiimikila kubusyu bwangu omuno muŋanda iiambwa muzina lyangu akwaamba kuti, Twafutulwa, lino tulakonzya kunoocicita zisesemyo ezi zyoonse?
Sa iŋanda eyi iiambwa muzina lyangu lyasanduka kuba ikoba lyababbi mumeso aanu? Ncobeni mebo ndibwene, ndicibwene! mbwaamba Jehova.
Kamuya kubusena bwangu bwaku-Sile, nkundakataanguna kukazika izina lyangu, mukabone ncindakabucitila nkaambo kazibi zyabantu bangu baIsrayeli.
Lino mbuli mbumucitide zintu ezi zyoonse, mbwaamba Jehova, alimwi nindakafuma kumwaambila mwakakaka kuswiilila, alimwi nindakamwiita teemwakavuwa,
ncobeni njoocitila iŋanda iiambwa muzina lyangu, njimusyoma, abusena mbundakapa bamausowanu, mbubonya mbundakacitila Silo.
Nkabela njoomusoowa kuzwa kumeso aangu, mbubonya mbundakasoowa banabakwanu boonse, nkokuti lunyungu loonse lwa-Efraimu.
Sa tobwene mbubacita muminzi ya-Juda amumigwagwa yaku-Jerusalemu?
Bana balatebba inkuni, bamawisi baladukula mulilo, abanakazi balakanda busu, kuti bajikile namalelo wakujulu zibunge, akutilila mizimu myeenzu zipaizyo zyakunywa, kuti bandikalazye.
Ma! Sa ncobeni balandikalazya? mbwaamba Jehova. Sa tabalikataazyi beni akulyuusya insoni?
Lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobenibukali bwangu buyoosya buyootilwa mpoonya ano, buyootililwa bantu abanyama, misamu yamusokwe amicelo yanyika yoonse. Buyoopya akutazimika,
Nkaambo mubuzuba obo nindakagwisya bamausowanu munyika ya-Egepita, teendakabaambila nikuba kubalailila ijwi niliba lyomwe lyazituuzyo na lyazipaizyo.
Pe, makani ngendakabalailila ngaaya, Ndakati, Amuswiilile ijwi lyangu, lino njooba Leza wanu, anywebo muyooba bantu bangu. Amweende munzila zyoonse nzindamulailila, kuti mujane coolwe.
Pele tabakwe nibakaswiilila nikuba kucenjeka matwi aabo pe, bakacili kuya bweenda mumiyeeyo yabo beni amuzinguni zyamyoyo yabo mibi. Bakapiluka munsi, teebakaya kunembo pe.
Kuzwa kubuzuba obo bamausowanu nibakazwa munyika ya-Egepita mane kusikila kubuzuba obuno, ndabatumina balanda bangu boonse basinsimi. Mazuba oonse ndakali kufuma kubatuma.
Nekubaboobo teebakandiswiilila nikuba kucenjeka matwi aabo pe, bakali kuyumya insingo zyabo akucita bubi akwiinda bamawisi.
Lino uyoobaambila kuti, Ngooyu musyobo iwakakaka kumvwa ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wawo akutazumina kulayigwa. Lusinizyo lwanyonyooka, lwakosoka kuzwa kumilomo yabo.
Nkaambo bana ba-Juda bacita bubi mumeso aangu, mbwaamba Jehova. Babika zisesemyo zyabo muŋanda iiambwa muzina lyangu kuti baisofwaazye.
Alimwi baliyakide zipaililo zya-Tofeti mukuti lyamwana wa-Hinomu, kuti batente bana babo balombe abasimbi mumulilo, cintu ncindatakabalailila nikuba kuciyeeya.
Nkaambo kako mumazuba aaboola, mbwaamba Jehova, takukooyooambwa kuti, ngu-Tofeti nanka ikuti lyamwana waHinomu. Liyooambwa kuti ndikuti lyabujayi, nkabela omo mu-Tofeti banooyoozika mane mukaate.
Mitunta yabantu aba iyooba zilyo zyabayuni bakujulu azyabanyama baansi. Taakwe uunooyoobayamina.
Lino muminzi ya-Juda amumigwagwa yamu-Jerusalemu njoolesya ijwi lyabuse-kelezi ajwi lyakukondwa, ijwi lyasibwiinga ajwi lyanabwiinga, nkaambo nyika iyooba inkanda buyo.

Kuciindi eco, mbwaamba Jehova, bayoogwisya zifuwa zyabami ba-Juda, azifuwa zyabasilutwe babo, azifuwa zyabapaizi, azifuwa zyabasinsimi, azifuwa zyabantu ba-Jerusalemu; bayoozigwisya zyoonse mutubanda twazyo.

Bayooziyanika mumumuni wazuba awamwezi awamakamu oonse aakujulu, nzenzizyo nzibakali kuyandisya akukomba, nzenzizyo nzibakali kuya butobela akuziyandaula akuzipailila. Tazikooyoobungikwa nikuba kuzikwa, pele ziyooba imbolezi buyo atala lyavu.
Nkabela lufu luyoosalwa kwiinda buumi kubantu boonse bacisyeede baluzubo olu lwabubi kumasena oonse nkundabatanda, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Lino uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Na muntu wawa, sa tabuki alimwi? Na muntu waleya, sa tabooli munzila iielede?
Pele bantu aba baku-Jerusalemu, nkaambonzi indeyo zyabo tabazileki abuniini? Balakakatila kulweeno lwabo, balakaka kuboola.

Ndakacenjeka matwi kuti nswiilile, pele tabakwe nibakaamba kabotu. Taakwe naba omwe uuempwa kububi bwakwe, uuamba kuti, Ma! Ndacitanzi? Boonse buyo balaya butobela makanze aabo beni mbubonya mbuli imbizi mbiizuza mukati kankondo.
Ma! Itongola lyakujulu lilizi ziindi zyalyo zyeelede. Sicinkwela asikamembya asikolyo boonse balibwene ziindi zyabo zyakuboola. Pele bantu bangu tabezi mulazyo wa-Jehova.
Basongo bafwa insoni, bayoowa, bacegwa. Ncobeni ijwi lya-Jehova balilikakide, lino mbusongonzi mbubajisi?

Nkaambo kako njoopa bambi banakazi babo, amyuunda yabo iyoovubwa beenzinyina, nkaambo boonse buyo, nibaba baniini nibaba bapati, balayandisya kunyanzya-nyanzya, abasinsimi abapaizi boonse balacita cakubeja.
Balasilikasilika mibunda yamwana musimbi wabantu bangu amajwi aabo aakuti. Muli aluumuno! Muli aluumuno! anukuti taakwe luumuno pe.
Sa bakausa insoni nibakacita zisesemyo? Ne! Teebakafwa insoni. Kufwa bweeme tabakuzi pe. Nkaambo kako bayooba akati kabaabo bawide mulufu. Kuciindi cakukomwa kwabo bayoonyonyooka, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ndakayanda kubacela, mbwaamba Jehova, pele taakwe masaansa kumusamu, taakwe inkuyu kumukuyu, aalo matu aabo alapusaama, aceeco ncindakabapa caindilila.
Twakali kulangila luumuno, pele katakwe coolwe ncitwakajana pe. Twakali kulangila ciindi cakuponesegwa, pele kwasika makani aayoosya buyo.
Kumbululuzya kwambizi zyakwe kwamvwigwa aku-Dani, Nyika yoonse ilakankama nkaambo kajwi lyakulila kwamabbiza aakwe. Balaza kuzoolidilila nyika azyoonse zili mumonya, munzi abantu bakede mulinguwo.
Ncobeni ndatuma akati kanu inzoka, bacipele batakonzyi kuzyondolwa, nkabela bayoomuluma, mbwaamba Jehova.
Buusu bwangu tabusilikiki, Moyo wangu ulacisa mucamba cangu.

Swiilila! Lyamvwigwa ijwi lyakulila kwamwana musimbi wabantu bangu, balalila moonse moonse munyika. Sa Jehova tali mu-Zioni? Sa mwami wakwe tali mukati kakwe? Ino nkaambonzi bandikalazya azikozyano zyabo zifulidwe azintu zyeenzu zyabuyo?
Kutebula kwamana, micelo yamainza yacelwa kale, pele iswe tatuna kufutulwa pe.
Mubunda wamwana musimbi wabantu bangu ngonguwo ngundauminwa mibunda ambebo. Ndaya bulila, akuyoowa kwandijata.
Sa taakwe mabbona ku-Gileadi? Sa taakwe musiliki nkuko? Ino nkaambonzi zilonda zyamwana musimbi wabantu bangu tazina kuponesegwa?
Nicakabota mutwe wangu niwakali maanzi, ameso aangu naakali kasensa kamisozi, elyo nindakalila isikati amasiku nkaambo kabajayidwe ba­ mwana musimbi wabantu bangu.
Nicakabota nindakajisi cilao casilweendo munkanda, elyo nindakaanzaana abantu bangu akuzwa kulimbabo, nkaambo boonse buyo mbasimamambe, inkamu yabantu batakwe lusyomo.

Indimi zyabo zilyoongomene mbuli mata, balaziwaazya majwi aakulengelela, Baba anguzu akati kanyika, pele teensi lusyomo ndubabelesezya inguzu zyabo pe, nkaambo balavuzya bubi atala lyabubinyina, pele mebo tabandizi, mbwaamba Jehova.
Muntu acenjele mweenzinyina, atasyomi simukowanyina pe, nkaambo basimukowanyina boonse mbasilweeno, abeenzinyina boonse balaya bumulengelela.
Boonse balabeja akweena umwi aumwi mweenzinyina, taakwe naba omwe uuamba lusinizyo pe. Indimi zyabo baziiyiisya kwaamba cakubeja. Balalikataazya buyo kuti bacite bubi.
Cikalilo cako cili akati kalweeno, Mulweeno lwabo balakaka kundiziba, mbwaamba Jehova.
Lulimi lwabo ngumuvwi uubosya, Lulaamba cakubeja. Umwi aumwi ulaambila mweenzinyina caluumuno kumilomo, pele mumoyo wakwe ulalindila kumuca.
Sa nsikooyoobauma nkaambo kamakani aya? mbwaamba Jehova. Sa nsikooyooliya inkoto kumusyobo uuli boobo?

Kolila akoomoka nkaambo kazilundu, aalo macelelo aamunkanda koacitila cililo, nkaambo zyoonse zyapya, taakwe muntu uuinda mulinzizyo, alimwi ijwi lyaŋombe talimvwigwi limbi, Bayuni bakujulu abanyama boonse bacija, bainka.
Njoosandula Jerusalemu ube zitantaala, bulyango bwabamwaaba, ayalo minzi yoonse ya-Juda njooisandula ibe matongo aabula bantu bakala mumo.

Nguni muntu musongo uukonzya kumvwisya aya makani? Nguni muntu mulomo wa-Jehova nguwakalwiida kuti akanane? Ino nkaambonzi nyika yanyonyooka? Nkaambonzi ilipide mbuli inkanda, alimwi taakwe muntu uuinda mulinjiyo?
Jehova wati, Mbuli mbubasoowede mulao wangu ngundakababikila, alimwi tabana kuswiilila ijwi lyangu nikuba kweenda mbulyakabalailila,
pele beenda muzinguni zyamyoyo yabo akutobela mizimu yamawisaabo mbubakabaiyiisya,
lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Amubone! Njoosanizya bantu aba kabindaula akubanywisya maanzi aamululwe.
Njoobamwaisya akati kabamasi mbobatana kuziba, nibaba beni nibaba bamawisaabo, nkabela njoobatandya ipanga mane lumwi nkabamanisye.
bafwambaane kutoomokela, kuti meso esu akunke misozi, azikoye zyesu zivuzye maanzi.
Nkaambo mu-Zioni mulamvwigwa ijwi lyakoomoka lyakuti, Maawe! Twafwa! Insoni yatujaya loko, nkaambo nyika twasiya, nkaambo batumwayila makalilo esu.
Pele amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova nubanakazi, Matwi aanu atambule majwi aamulomo wakwe. Amwiisye bana banu basimbi kulila; umwi aumwi aiisye mweenzinyina lwiimbo lwadilwe.
Nkaambo lufu lwatanta mumpulungwizyo zyesu, lwanjila mumaanda esu; lwatumanina bana mumigwagwa abakubusi besu mumasa-mbalilo.
Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mitunta yabantu iyooloka mbuli bufumba avu lyamyuunda, ambuli zifunte zyamaila mutebuzi nzyasia, zibula sikuzibungika.

Pele oyo uulikankaizya alikankaizizye cintu eci cakuti ulamvwisya akuziba ndime, nkaambo ulizi kuti ndime Jehova sibuuya uubeteka kabotu aku cita cakululama moonse munyika, nkaambo nzenzizyo zintu zindibotela, mbwaamba Jehova.

nkukuti ba-Egepita, ba-Juda, ba-Edomu, bana ba-Amoni, aba-Moabu, amisyobo yoonse yamunkanda balinyoola mumpanza, nkaambo misyobo eyo yoonse tabapalwidwe, aluzubo loonse lwa-Israyeli abalo tabapalwidwe mumyoyo yabo.
Amuswiilile ijwi Jehova ndyaamba aandinywe, noluzubo lwa-Israyeli.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mutaiyi ziyanza zyabamasi. Mutayoowi zitondezyo zyakujulu mbubaziyoowa bamasi,
nkaambo inkombelo zyabamasi nzyabuyo. Balatema musamu mulusaka, asimilimo ulaubezyabezya kaleba.
Lino cikozyano ncabezede balacisamika ingolida ansiliva. Balacikankamizya insando anembe, kuti citasunzuluki.
Zili mbuli ciyamizyo mumuunda wamakowa. Tazyaambi pe. Zilayumunwa buyo, nkaambo tazikonzyi kweenda. Utaziyoowi pe, nkaambo taakwe bubi mbuzicita, abwalo bubotu tazibwene kubucita.
Taakwe uuli mbuli nduwe, O Jehova. Nduwe mupati, azina lyako lili anguzu.
Nguni uukonzya kukaka kukuyoowa, O mwami wamasi oonse, nkaambo kuyoowegwa nciceelelo cako? Akati kabasongo babamasi amumami aabo oonse taakwe uuli mbuli nduwe.
Boonse buyo mbafubafuba, mazinzili, Ma! Zikozyano nzisamu buyo. Lulayo lwazyo ndwabuyo.

Insiliva iifulidwe ilaletwa kuzwa ku-Tarisi, ayalo ingolida ilazwa ku-Ufazi. Nzezilenge zyasimilimo, zilacitwa amaanza aamufuzi. Zilisamine masani aamabala mabala, kusia akusalala; zyoonse nzezilenge zyabasimilimo bacenjede.
Pele Jehova ngu-Leza wakasimpe, Leza muumi, Mwami uuteeli. Nyika ilakankama kubukali bwakwe, amisyobo yabantu tiikonzyi kwiima nji naakalala.
(Mbuboobu mbumweelede kubaambila. Baleza abo ibatakalenga ijulu anyika bayoomaninina munyika, tabakooyoobonwa limbi ansi ano.)
Ijwi lyakwe nilimvwigwa, maanzi alapyopyongana kujulu, asikunku ulamuuntumusya kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika, Ulacitila imvula indabo, amuzilondwedo zyakwe mwaagwisya muuwo.
Bantu boonse mbafubafuba, babula luzibo. Bafuzi boonse zikozyano zyabo nzibafula zilabausya insoni, nkaambo zikozyano zyabo nzyabuyo, taziyooyi pe.
Tazijisi milimo, pe, nzilenge zyalweeno, aboobo mubuzuba bwakuswayigwa kwazyo ziyooloba.
Caabilo ca-Jakobo tacili mbuli ezi pe; nkaambo ngonguwe iwakabumba zintu zyoonse, abaIsrayeli ngomusyobo ngwakonede. Jehova wamakamu ndizina lyakwe.
Nyampula mukuli wako, uwe nokede mumunzi uusinkinizizidwe.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ciindi ecino ndatapula bantu banyika. Njoobaletela mapenzi ngebayoomvwa.
Maawe! Ndapenga! Mibunda ilacisa. Pele ndakaamba kuti, Obu bulwazi bwangu nsikonzyi kubucija.
Itente lyangu lyafwa, intambo zyangu zyoonse zyadunsuka, bana bangu bandisia, tabawo, taakwe limbi uukonzya kukankamina itente lyangu nikuba kubamba zisitilizyo zyangu.
Nkaambo beembeli bafubaala, tababuzyi makani kuli-Jehova. Nciceeco ncibatajanina coolwe, amatanga aabo oonse amwaika.
Yamvwigwa impuwo! Alasika makani! Lupyopyongano lupati lulazwa mucisi cakunyika, lulasaala minzi ya-Juda, ibe cikalilo cabamwaaba.
O Jehova, ndizi kuti muntu waansi tezi kubamba kabotu inzila yakwe. Muntu ulaya bweenda, pele tabwene kweenzya intaamu zyakwe.
O Jehova, kondilaya, pele kulaya kwako kube alubeta lubotu, Utandilayi cabukali bunji, inga ndaloba.
Bukali bwako kobutilila bamasi batakuzi amisyobo iitalemeka izina lyako, nkaambo bakalidilila Jakobo, bamumanisya, acikalilo cakwe bacinyonyoona.
Ngaaya makani aakasika kuli-Jeremiya kuzwa kuli-Jehova.
Amuswiilile majwi aacizuminano eci. Ambila bantu ba-Juda abaabo bakede mu-Jerusalemu.
Kobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwa amba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, Uli alutuko muntu umwi aumwi uutaswiilili majwi aacizuminano eci,

ngendakalailila bamausowanu mubuzuba obo nindakabagwisya munyika ya-Egepita kuzwa kucifulilo cabutale. Ndakati, Amuswiilile ijwi lyangu akucita makani oonse ngendamulailila, elyo muyooba bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wanu,
kuti nkazuzikizye cikonke ncindakakonkezya bamausowanu, nkaambo ndakasyomezya kubapa nyika iikunka malili abuci, mbubonya mbucibede asunu. Mpawo ndakavuwa kuti, Mbukabede, O Jehova.
Nkaambo kucenjezya ndakacenjezya bamausowanu mubuzuba obo nindakabagwisya munyika ya-Egepita, Ndakali kubacenjezya loko mazuba oonse akusikila kubuzuba obuno, ndati, Amuswiilile ijwi lyangu.

Nekubaboobo tabakwe nibakaswiilila pe, nikuba kucenjeka matwi aabo, pele bakacili kuya bweenda umwi aumwi mucinguni camoyo wakwe mubi. Nciceeco ncindakabaletela majwi oonse aacizuminano eci, ngaonya ngendakabalailila kuti baacite pele tabakwe nibakaacita pe.

Bapilukila mumilandu yabamawisaabo bataanzi ibakakaka kuswiilila majwi aangu, batobela mizimu imbi kuti baikombe, aluzubo lwa-Israyeli aluzubo lwa-Juda loonse balijayide cizuminano cangu ncitwakatangana abamawisaabo.
Lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni njoobaletela mapenzi ngebayookacilwa kucija, nkabela bayoondililila pele nsikooyoobaswiilila.
Lino minzi ya-Juda abantu boonse bamu-Jerusalemu banooya bukwiilila baleza mbobatentela tununkilizyo, pele balo tabakooyoobavuna kuciindi camapenzi aabo.

Nkaambo mweelwe wabaleza bako ulyeelene amweelwe waminzi yako, O Juda, amweelwe wamigwagwa yamu-Jerusalemu uli mbubonya mbuli mweelwe wazipaililo zyako nzowabikila cintu eco cuusya insoni, nkukuti zipaililo zyakutentela ba-Baala tununkilizyo.
Lino webo, utakombeli bantu aba; utabacitili lukwiilo na cikombyo, nkaambo nsikooyooswiilila kuciindi cakukomba kwabo nibayoondikwiilila mumapenzi aabo.
Kalekale Jehova wakakuulika izina lyamusamu waolifa mweebesi, mutete, uuli amicelo mibotu. Pele lino uleza akundindima alulabo, ulautenta, amitabi yawo iyootyokauka,
Jehova wamakamu, nguwenya iwakakusimpika, sunu waamba aanduwe makani mabi, nkaambo kamilimo mibi njibacita bantu baluzubo lwa-Israyeli alwa-Juda, nkaambo bandikalazya mukutentela mizimu tununkilizyo.
Jehova wakandizibya makani, aboobo ndakaziba, Wakandibonya milimo yabo mibi.

Pele mebo ndakali mbuli kabelele kabombede katolwa kukujayigwa, Teendakaziba kuti balayeeya miyeeyo yakundijaya akwaamba kuti, Atunyonyoone musamu nuucili mutete, atumugonke kuzwa kunyika yabaumi, kuti izina lyakwe litayeeyegwi limbi.
Ma! O Jehova wamakamu, nduwe oobeteka cakululama, oolingula insa amoyo woonse. Nkabone mboliya inkoto yabubi bwabo, nkaambo mumaanza aako mondibikide makani aangu,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Ncobeni njoobabweedezya bulumbu bwa bubi bwabo, Bakubusi bayoojazigwa ipanga, abana babo balombe abasimbi ipamba liyoobajaya.
Takukooyoosyaala naba omwe akati kabo, nkaambo njooletela bantu ba-Anatotu mapenzi, njoobaletela mwaka wakubweedezegwa bubi bwabo.
Wabasimpika, lino miyanda yabo ilajata anguzu. Balakula akuzyala micelo. Mumilomo yabo uli kufwaafwi, pele mumyoyo yabo uli kule.
Pele yebo, O Jehova, ulindizi, wandilingula, ulibwene moyo wangu mbuubede, Kobagwisya mbuli imbelele zyakujaya, kobabika ambali kuti bajayigwe mubuzuba bweelede,
Nyika ilaleka lili kulila? Ziziki zyoonse zyamumyuunda zilaleka lili kupusama? Banyama abayuni boonse batolwa nkaambo kazibi zyabantu bakede mulinjiyo, nkaambo balaamba kuti, Taboni mbutucita.
Bana bakwanu abasiluzubo lwauso boonse balakuvwiya. Boonse balalila kukukubusizya inkondo. Utabasyomi pe, nekuba kuti balakwaambila majwi mabotu.
Ndaleka luzubo lwangu, ndatakata lukono lwangu, ayooyo ngunjandisya ndamwaaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyina.
Lukono lwangu lwandibeda mbuli mulavu wamusokwe. Wandikalamukila, aboobo ndimusulide.
Sa lukono lwangu lwandibeda muyuni mukali uuli amabala mabala? Sa bayuni bakali balamulwisya kumabazu oonse? Kamuya mukabunganye banyama boonse bamusokwe, mubalete, bazoolye.
Beembeli banji balijayide muunda wangu wamasaansa, balyataula caabilo cangu, ncobeni caabilo cangu cibotu bacisaala, caba inkanda iitakwe bantu.
Balicisaalide, akusaalwa kwaco kwanduusya buusu. Nyika yoonse yaba matongo, nkabela taakwe muntu uubika moyo wakwe kumakani.

Atala lyabalubulansuki boonse bamunkanda kwasika basikunyonyoona, nkaambo ipanga lya-Jehova lilamanisya bantu kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika kusikila kumagolelo amwi. Taakwe muntu naba omwe uukede muluumuno.
Balibyalide bulotwe, pele bayootebula maamvwa. Balikataazya, pele taakwe impindu njibajana. Kutebula kwabo kulabausya insoni, nkaambo ka bukali buyoosya bwaJehova.
elyo ndaakumana kubanonkola, njoobafwida alimwi luzyalo akubaboozya, umwi aumwi kucaabilo cakwe, umwi aumwi kunyika yakwe.

Nkabela na bazumina kwiiya inzila zyabantu bangu, akukonka muzina lyangu cakwaamba kuti, Jehova mbwali muumi, mbubonya mbubakaiisya bantu bangu kukonka muzina lya-Baala, lino bayooyakwa akati kabantu bangu.
Pele kufumbwa musyobo uukaka kuswiilila njoounonkola, ncobeni njoounonkola akuunyonyoona, mbwaamba Jehova.
Mbuboobu Jehova mbwaakandaambila. Wakati, Koya, ukalyuulile mulembo uutuba, usame mucikungu cako, pele utauniki mumaanzi pe.
Mpoonya awo ndakaula mulembo, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakalailila, akuusama mucikungu cangu.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila lwabili, liti,
Bweza mulembo nguwakaula, ngosamine mucikungu cako, lino nyamuka, uye ku-Firate, ukausise nkuko mumpangala yakumandomba.
Elyo ndakainka ku-Firate kuyoousisa, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakandilailila.
Nkabela naakamana mazuba manji, Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Nyamuka, uye ku-Firate, ukagwisye mulembo ngundakakulailila kusisa nkuko.
Mpawo ndakainka ku-Firate, ndasya, ndagwisya mulembo omo mundakausiside, nkabela mulembo wakabija, kautacijisi milimo abuniini.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mbubonya obo mbunjoobisizya kulisumpula kwabantu ba-Juda akulisumpula kupati kwa-Jerusalemu.

Aba bantu babi, bakaka kuswiilila majwi aangu, beenda aruzinguni zyamyoyo yabo, baya butobela baleza bambi kuti babamanine milimo akubakomba, bayooba mbubonya mbuli mulembo oyu uutacikwe milimo abuniini.

Nkaambo mbubonya mbuli mulembo mbuujata kucikungu camuntu, ambebo ndakajatya luzubo lwaIsrayeli aluzubo lwa-Juda loonse kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova, kuti bandibede bantu bali ampuwo, batembaulika, bali abulemu. Nekubaboobo teebakaswiilila pe.
Lino uleelede kubaambila majwi aya. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Inongo zyoonse zilazuzigwa waini. Lino bayoovuwa kuti, We! Sa tatuzi kuti nongo zyoonse zilazuzigwa waini?

Nkabela uyoobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Amubone! Bantu boonse banyika ino, bami bakede acuuno cabwami ca-Davida, abapaizi, abasinsimi, aboonse bakede mu-Jerusalemu, boonse buyo njoobazuzya bukolwi.
Nkabela njoobaumputanya, umwi aumwi amweenzinyina, bamawisi abana babo boonse antoomwe, mbwaamba Jehova, Nsikooyoobafwida buuya niluba luzyalo niluba luse. Njoobanyonyoona buyo.
Amulemeke Jehova Leza wanu naatana kumuletela mudima, maulu aanu naatana kulebwa atala lyazilundu zyalundindiwana. Nimuli mukulangila mumuni, inga uyoousandula kuba eenzule calufu amudima uusia mbi.
Pele na mwakaka kuswiilila, moyo wangu uyoolila kumbali nkaambo kakulisumpula kwanu, ameso aangu ayoolizya misozi minji loko nkaambo kamatanga aa-Jehova aatolwa mubuzike.
Minzi yaku-Negebi ilijalidwe, taakwe uuijalula. Cisi coonse ca-Juda cilitoledwe mubuzike, coonse buyo cilitoledwe mubuzike.
Lino uyooambanzi noyoojana kuti abo mbowakaiisya omwini kuba bayandwi bako wababika kuti babe basilutwe baka?
Sa ulabuzya kuti, Nkaambonzi aya makani andisikila? Nkekaambo kazibi zyako zinji, malogwe aako ncaayubunwidwa, amaulu aako ncaasofwaazisigwa.
Sa mu-Etiopiya uusia ulakonzya kusandula cikanda cakwe? Sa siluwe ulakonzya kusandula mabala aakwe? Na kwaba obo, lino anywebo mulakonzya kucita kabotu nomuzibide kucita bubi.
Njoomumwaisya mbuli buungu muuwo wamunkanda mbuubbubbula.
Nceeci cisolo canu, caabilo ncindamubikila, mbwaamba Jehova, nkaambo kakuti waluba ndime, wasyoma zyakubeja.
Ambebo njoosamununa malogwe aako kubusyu bwako, kuti cinswe cako cibonwe.
Ndibwene zisesemyo zyako, mamambe aako, ndibwene mbolila muzisusi zyako, abwaamu bwako mbocita antangalala atala lyazilundu. Maawe kulinduwe, O Jerusalemu! Ino uyoosalazigwa lili?
Ngaaya majwi aa-Jehova aakasika kuli-Jeremiya aacimpayuma.
Cisi ca-Juda cilalila, Mumilyango yaco bantu balatuntuma, balikede ansi, balisamine zisia, Kulila kwa-Jerusalemu kwamvwigwa.
Basilutwe balatuma baniini babo kuti bateke maanzi, pele basika buyo kumikalo, tabajani maanzi pe, aboobo balapiluka antesyo zitakwe cintu. Balausa insoni, balausa bweeme, balalivumba kumutwe.
Basikulima nyika bapengesya nkaambo kakutalokelwa imvula, basimapulazi bafwa insoni, balalivumba kumutwe.
Insya yamusokwe ayalo ilatakata mwana nguyazyala nkaambo kakuti taakwe mweemvwe.
Imbongolo zyamusokwe ziliimvwi atala lyabalubulansuki, zilafweketa mbuli bamwaaba; meso aazyo akataala kukuyandaula zyakucela.
Nduwe olike Israyeli ngwalangila, nduwe mufutuli wakwe muciindi dunafwabi. Sa ncibotu kuti ube mbuli mweenzu mucisi, ambuli silweendo uuona busiku bomwe buyo?
Sa ncibotu kuti ube mbuli muntu uuzingidwe, mbuli silumamba uutakonzyi kufutula? Ncobeni uli akati kesu, O Jehova, Tulaambwa muzina lyako. Utatuleki.
Nekuba kuti baliimya kulya, nsikooyooswiilila lukwiilo lwabo pe. Nekuba kuti batuula zipaizyo azituuzyo zyabusu, nsikooyoozitambula pe, Njoobamanya ipanga apamba amalwazi.
Mpawo ndakati, Akaka, Mwami Jehova! Bona basinsimi mbubali mukubaambila kuti, Tamukooyoobona inkondo pe, alyalo ipamba talikooyoobonwa akati kanu, pele njoomupa luumuno lwakasimpe mubusena obuno.

Lino Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Basinsimi balasinsima zyakubeja muzina lyangu, Teensi ndime ndakabatuma, teensi ndime ndakabalailila nikuba kubaambila pe. Balamusinsimina zilengano zyakubeja akusonda kwabuyo anjeeno zyamyoyo yabo beni.

Lino mbuboobu Jehova mbwaamba aabasinsimi basinsima muzina lyangu nekuba kuti nsina kubatuma, baamba kuti takukooyooba inkondo niliba ipamba omuno munyika, Abo basinsimi bayoojazigwa zintu ezi nzizyonya, inkondo apamba.

Abalo bantu mbebasinsimina bayoosoowegwa mumigwagwa yamu-Jerusalemu nkaambo kapamba, ankondo, nkabela takukooyooba muntu wakubazika, balo abanakazi babo abana babo balombe abana babo basimbi, nkaambo njoobabweedezya bubi bwabo.
Na ndiya bweenda musokwe, baboneka bajayidwe kupanga, alimwi na ndanjila mumunzi, baboneka baciswa inzala, nkaambo basinsimi abapaizi boonse balaya busunza munyika njibatezi.
Tulizi bubi bwesu, O Jehova, amilandu yabamatateesu, nkaambo twakubisizya.
Utatusampauli, nkaambo kazina lyako. Utaubyi cuuno cabulemu bwako. Kotuyeeya, utamwayi cizuminano ncotangene aswe.

Sa nkwali naba omwe akati kabaleza babuyo babamasi uukonzya kulosya imvula? Na ijulu lini sa lilapa muyoba? Sa teensi nduwe O Jehova Leza wesu? Myoyo yesu ili kulinduwe, nkaambo nduwe oocita zintu ezi zyoonse.

Nkabela na bakubuzya kuti, Ino tuye kuli? uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Kufumbwa uubikilwa lufu, aye kulufu. Kufumbwa uubikilwa ipanga aye kupanga. Kufumbwa uubikilwa inzala aye inzala nkwiibede. Ayooyo uubikilwa buzike aye kubuzike.
Njoobabambila basikunyonyoona bamisyobo yone, mbwaamba Jehova, nkukuti ipanga lyakujazya, babwa ­bakukwamauna, bayuni bakujulu abanyama baansi bakulya akunyonyoona.
Nkabela njoobabika kuti babe cintu cigambya kuzisi zyoonse zyaansi, nkaambo ka-Manase mwana wa-Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda, nkaambo kamilimo yakwe njaakacita mu-Jerusalemu.
Wanditakata mebo, mbwaamba Jehova, wapiluka musule. Nciceeco ncindakutandabikila ijanza lyangu kukunyonyoona. Ndacimwa kukulekelela.
Ndabapupuluzya acipupuluzyo mumilyango yanyika. Ndabajayila bana babo, ndabanyonyoona, aba bantu bangu batapiluki kuzwa munzila zyabo mobaleede.
Ndavuzya mweelwe wabamukabafu babo kwiinda musenga wakunkomwe yalwizi. Ndasisya kumanyina bakubusi babo sikunyonyoona ciindi casikati. Kupenga akukankama kwaongomoka kubajata,

Oyo uuzyede bana bali musanu ababili woongelwa, wawizuka. Izuba lyamubbilila kalicili isikati. Wausigwa insoni abweeme. Abamwi babo basyeede njoobaaba kuti bajazigwe ipanga lyabasinkondonyina, mbwaamba Jehova.
Akube mbuli matusi aabo, O Jehova, na nsina kubakombela kunembo lyako kukubagwasya, na nsina kukombela basinkondoma muciindi camapenzi aabo amuciindi camafwabi aabo!
Sa butale bulapwayika, butale buzwa kunyika, amukuba?
Nkabela njoocita kuti ubelekele basinkondonyoko milimo munyika njotezi, nkaambo mubukali bwangu kwadukulwa mulilo uuyoomutenta.
Majwi aako naakajanwa, ndakaalya, nkabela majwi aako akandibeda lukondo abusekelezi bwamoyo, nkaambo ndaambwa muzina lyako, O Jehova Leza wamakamu.
Teendakali kukala akati kabasikusobana, teendakali kusekelela pe, ndakali kukala endike nkaambo kajanza lyako ilyakandikede, nkaambo wakandizuzya bukali.
Lino nkaambonzi kuciswa kwangu takumani? Nkaambonzi zilonda zyangu zicindijisi, zya kaka kupona? Sa ncobeni wandibeda mbubonya mbuli kalonga kakataazya kabula maanzi aasyomeka?
Njookubika kuti ubede bantu aba bulambo bwamundalila buli anguzu. Bayookulwisya, pele tabakooyookuzunda pe, nkaambo ndi ayebo, nzookuvuna, mbwaamba Jehova.
Njookuvuna mumaanza aabasizibi akukunununa kuzwa kubantu bayoosya bakufumbete.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
Utakwati mwanakazi, nikuba kuzyala bana balombe abasimbi, mubusena obuno.
Nkaa­ mbo mbuboobu Jehova mbwaamba aabana balombe abasimbi bazyalwa mubusena obuno abamanyina babazyala abamawisi babazyazya omuno munyika.

Bayoofwa amalwazi mabi. Tabakooyoolilwa nikuba kuzikwa, pele bayooba imbolezi buyo atala lyavu. Ipanga anzala nzeziyoobamanisya, nkabela mitunta yabo iyooba zilyo zyabayuni bakujulu azyabanyama baansi,
Bantu boonse bamunyika eyi bayoofwa, nibaba bapati nibaba baniini. Tabakooyoozikwa pe; takukooyooba muntu naba omwe uubalila nanka kulitenda nanka kuligela.
Takukooyooba muntu uukomweda sikulila zinkwa zyakumuumuzya nkaambo kayooyo ngwafwidwa, ayooyo uufwidwa wisi na banyina takukooyooba muntu uumunywisya inkomeki yakumuumuzya.
Utanjili muŋanda ya po bwe, utakali abo kukulya akunywa.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli, Ncobeni mpoonya ano, kumeso aanu amumazuba nimucipona, njoolesya ijwi lyabusekelezi ajwi lyakukondwa, ijwi lyasibwiinga ajwi lyanabwiinga.
Lino uleelede kubaambila kuti, Nkaambo kakuti bamausowanu bakanditakata, mbwaamba Jehova, Bakatobela baleza bambi, babakomba akubakotamina, pele mebo bakanditakata, amulao wangu tabakwe nibakaubamba.
Anywebo mwabisya akwiinda bamausowanu. Muleenda umwi aumwi mucinguni camoyo wakwe mubi, Mulakaka kundiswiilila.
Nkaambo kako njoomusoowa kuzwa kunyika eyi kunyika imbi niimutana kuziba, inywe nibaba bamnusowanu, nkabela muyookomba baleza bambi nkukonya oko, isikati amasiku, nkaambo nsikooyoomufwida luzyalo.
Nkaambo kako mumazuba aaboola, mbwaamba Jehova, takukooyooambwa limbi kuti, Jehova mbwali muumi, iwakagwisya bana ba-Israyeli munyika ya-Egepita.
Kuyooambwa kuti, Jehova mbwali muumi, iwakagwisya bana ba-Israyeli mucisi cakunyika amuzisi zyoonse nkwaakabatandide, Nkaambo njoobaboozya kunyika eyo njiyonya njindakapa bamawisaabo.
Nkaambo meso aangu alibwene inzila zyabo zyoonse. Tabasisidwe kulindime pe, ayalo milandu yabo tiivumbilidwe kumeso aangu.
Njoobabweedezezya kobile bulumbu bwamilandu yabo abwazibi zyabo, nkaambo basofwaazya nyika yangu, bazuzya lukono lwangu mitunta yazintu zyabo zisesemya azivundusya,
Sa muntu ulakonzya kulicitila baleza mwini? Tabali baleza pe.
Amubone! Ndabazibya ciindi ecino, ndabazibya ijanza lyangu mbulibede anguzu zyangu mbuzibede, nkabela bayooziba kuti izina lyangu ndime Jehova.
bana babo nibaciyeeya zipaililo zyabo azikozyano zyabo zya-Asera kumbali lyazisamu zyoonse zitete aatala lyazilundu zyoonse zilamfu,
amutulundulundu twamusokwe, Imbono zyako azintu zyako ziyandisi, zyoonse ndazipa kuti zibe zisaalo, azyalo zipaililo zyako zyakumalundu, nkaambo kazibi nzocitide moonse munyika yako,
Lino uyooleka lukono lwako ndundakakupa, nkabela njoocita kuti ubelekele basinkondonyoko milimo munyika njotezi, nkaambo mubukali bwangu mwadukuwa mulilo uuyoopya lyoonse cakutazima.
Uli mbuli kasamu kamunkanda, takooyoobona cintu niciba cimwi cibotu cimusikila. Ulakala mumasena aayuminide aamunkanda, munyika yamunyo iitakalwi bantu.
Uli acoolwe muntu uusyoma Jehova, uujisi Jehova mbuli mutabilizi wakwe.

Uyooba mbuli musamu uubyalidwe kumbali lyamaanzi, uutunga miyanda yawo kukalonga, uutayoowa inkasaaloniisika, Maatu aawo alasia lyoonse, amumwaka wacimpayuma taakwe cuukataazya, tuuleki kuzyala micelo.
Mebo nde-Jehova ndilalingula moyo, ndilasunka-sunka insa, kuti mbweedezye muntu bulumbu bweelede inzila zyakwe, bweelede micelo yamilimo yakwe.
Busena bwacikombelo cesu ncuuno cabulemu icakasumpulwa kuzwa kumatalikilo.
O Jehova, bulangizi bwamusyobo wa-Israyeli, boonse bakutakata bayoofwa bweeme, Boonse baleya kuzwa kulinduwe bayoolembwa munyika, nkaambo Jehova ngubalekede nkekasensa kamaanzi aabuumi.
Kondiponya, O Jehova, mpone. Kondifutula, mfutulwe, nkaambo nduwe nguntembaula.
Bona! Balandaambila kuti, Lili kuli ijwi lya­-Jehova? Atuliswiilile.
Pele mebo nsina kukufwanzya kubatumina mapenzi, nsina kuyandisya kubona buzuba bwamafwabi aabo. Ulizi obo. Kufumbwa cakazwa mumilomo yangu cakalulama kumeso aako.
Utandibedi ciyoosyo. Nduwe macijilo aangu mubuzuba bwamapenzi.
Basikundipenzya bausigwe insoni, pele mebo ntausigwi insoni pe! Bayoosegwe balo, pele mebo ne! Kobaletela buzuba bwamapenzi akubanyonyoona lunyonyooko kobile.
Mbuboobu Jehova mbwaakandaambila. Koya ukaime mumulyango wabantu bako, bami ba-Juda nkubanjilila ankubazwida, amumilyango yoonse ya-Jerusalemu,
ukabaambile kuti, Amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova nubami ba-Juda, anywebo nuba-Juda aboonse bakede mu-Jerusalemu, banjila mumilyango eyi.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Amucenjele kuti mutayumuni mukuli nuuba umwi mubuzuba bwa-Sabata, mutaunjizyi mumilyango ya-Jerusalemu.
Alimwi mutayumuni mukuli nuuba umwi kuzwa kumaanda aanu mubuzuba bwa-Sabata, nikuba kucita milimo niiba imwi. Amulemeke buzuba bwa-Sabata mbubonya mbundakabalailila bamausowanu.
Pele balo tabakwe nibakaswiilila nikuba kucenjeka matwi aabo. Bakayumya insingo zyabo kuti bataswiilili nikuba kutambula lulayo.
Pele na mwandiswiilila camoyo woonse, mbwaamba Jehova, na mwakaka kunjizya mikuli mumilyango yamunzi oyu mubuzuba bwa-Sabata, na mwalemeka buzuba bwa-Sabata akutabeleka milimo niiba imwi mulimbubo,

lino kulanjila mumilyango yamunzi oyu bami abasilutwe bakala acuuno cabwami bwa-Davida, batantide ankalaki ambizi, balo abanene babo, bantu ba-Juda abantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu, nkabela oyu munzi uyookalwa bantu lyoonse akutamani.

Bantu bayoozwa kuminzi ya-Juda, akucisi ceengelede Jerusalemu, akunyika ya-Benjamini, akunyika yatulundulundu, akuzilundu, aku-Negebi, balaletelela zipaizyo azituuzyo abusu atununkilizyo, balaleta zilumbyo kuŋanda ya-Jehova.

Pele na mwakaka kundiswiilila, na mwakaka kulemeka buzuba bwa-Sabata akulikasya kunjizya mikuli mumilyango ya-Jerusalemu mubuzuba bwa-Sabata, lino njooyasya mulilo mumilyango yawo, uyoolidilila maanda aabwami aamu-Jerusalemu, nkabela takukooyooba sikuuzimya.
Ngaaya makani aakasika kuli-Jeremiya kuzwa kuli-Jehova. Wakati,
Buka, ukaseluke kuŋanda yamubumbi, lino njookuswiilizya majwi aangu nkukonya oko.
Mpawo ndakaseluka kuŋanda yamubumbi, nkabela ndakabona kuti ulabeleka milimo kumuncini wakwe.
Lino cilongo ncaakali kubumbya bulongo cakabija mujanza lyamubumbi, aboobo wakacibumbulula akucita cimbi icakalulama mumeso aamubumbi.
Elyo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila liti,

Sa nsikonzyi kumucitila anywebo mbubonya mbuli oyu mubumbi mbwacita, O luzubo lwa-Israyeli? mbwaamba Jehova. Amubone! Mbubonya mbuli bulongo mbubuli mumaanza aamubumbi, anywebo muli mumaanza aangu, O luzubo lwa-Israyeli.
Kufumbwa ciindi nindaamba aamusyobo na aacisi cakukanza kucinonkola akucimwaya akucinyonyoona,
pele cisi eco ncindaamba cilaleka bubi bwaco, lino ambebo ndakonzya kuleka mapenzi ngendakali kukanza kucicitila.
Alimwi kufumbwa ciindi nindaamba aamusyobo na aacisi kuti njoociyaka akucisimpika,
pele cilatalika kubisya mumeso aangu akuleka kuswiilila ijwi lyangu, lino njooleka bubotu boonse mbundakali kukanza kucicitila.

Lino ambila bantu ba-Juda abaabo bakede mu-Jerusalemu kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni ndili mukukanza kumubisizya, ndili mukuyeeya miyeeyo yakumupenzya. Amupiluke, muleke umwi aumwi bubi bwanzila yakwe. Amubotye inzila zyanu amilimo yanu.
Pele balaamba kuti, Nee! Tunoocitobela miyeeyo yesu, tunoocicita umwi aumwi makanze aazinguni zyamoyo wakwe mubi.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Amubuzye akati kabamasi, Nguni uumvwide makani aali boobu? Mwana musimbi wa-Israyeli wacita cintu ciyoosya loko.
Sa caanda caku-Lebano cilamana kumandomba aakuSirioni? Sa maanzi aatontola aatulonga tukunkisya muzilundu alayuminina?
Nkaambo bantu bangu bandiluba, azintu zyabuyo balazitentela tununkilizyo, Nzenzizyo zyabaleesya mukweenda kwabo. Migwagwa yakalekale baisia, baleenda mutusosonzila, munzila zitatuntumikidwe.
Mbuboobo nyika yabo mbuyaba ciyoosya acisabulo mazuba oonse, Kufumbwa muntu uuinda kulinjiyo ulagamba, ulazunzya mutwe wakwe.
Njoobabeda mbuli luuwo lwakujwe, njoobamwaisya kubusyu bwabasinkondonyina. Mubuzuba bwamapenzi aabo njoobapa sule, nsikooyoobapa busyu pe.
O Jehova, bika moyo kulindime; swiilila majwi aabaabo bakazyanya ambe.
Sa bubi mbobulumbu bweelede oyo uucita kabotu? Nkaambonzi baliside mulindi wakunditeya? Ibaluka mbundakali kwiima kubusyu bwako kukubakumbilila zintu zibotu akubalesezya bukali bwako.
Ma! Bana babo ubaabile cimpayuma, akubapa munguzu zyapanga. Banakazi babo bafwidwe bana babo abalumi babo. Malwazi ajaye baalumi babo, abasankwa babo bajazigwe ipanga munkondo.
Kumvwigwe ijwi lyakulila mumaanda aabo noongomoka kubaletela impi yakubasaala! Nkaambo baliside mulindi wakundijata, balisiside tukole twakundica kumaulu.

Pele webo, O Jehova, ulizi mbubandivwiya kuti bandijaye. Utabalekeleli milandu yabo, azyalo zibi zyabo zitasansamunwi kumeso aako. Balebesegwe kubusyu bwako, kobacitila mbubeelede kuciindi cabukali bwako.
ukainke abo kukuti lyamwana wa-Hinomu kumanjililo aamulyango wankaye, ukakambauke nkukonya oko majwi ngendakulailila.

Uleelede kwaamba kuti, Amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova nubami ba-Juda anyoonse nomukede mu-Jerusalemu. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Ncobeni njooleta mapenzi aayoosya kubusena obuno, elyo kufumbwa muntu uuteelela makani, matwi aakwe ayoopakamana.

Nkaambo bantu banditakata, basofwaazya busena obuno kukutentela baleza bambi tununkilizyo, baleza mbebatakezi nibaba mbabo nibaba bamawisaabo nibaba bami ba-Juda, alimwi balizuzizye busena obuno bulowa bwabantu batakwe milandu,
alimwi baliyakide zipaililo zya-Baala kuzilundu, kuti batente bana babo mumulilo, babe zipaizyo zya-Baala, cintu ncindatakabalailila nikuba kucaamba nikuba kuciyeeya.
Nkaambo kako mumazuba aaboola, mbwaamba Jehova, busena obuno tabukooyooambwa limbi Tofeti nanka ikuti lyamwana wa-Hinomu, buyooambwa kuti ndikuti lyabujayi.

Nkabela mubusena obuno mbubonya njoolobya makanze ngebakanzide bantu ba-Juda aba-Jerusalemu, Njoobawisya kupanga kumaanza aabasinkondonyina babo akumaanza aabaabo bayanda kubajaya, amitunta yabo njooisanizya bayuni bakujulu abanyama baansi.
Nkabela munzi uno njooucita kuti ube ciyoosyo acisabulo. Kufumbwa muntu uuinda kulinguwo uyoogamba, uyoosabula nkaambo kamapenzi aawo.

Nkabela njoobalisya nyama yabana babo balombe abana babo basimbi. Bayoolyana umwi aumwi mweenzinyina mukusinkinizigwa amumapenzi aabo, basinkondonyina babo aboonse bayandaula buumi bwabo nibayoobapenzya.

nkabela uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Njoopwaya bantu aba amunzi uno mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwapwaya nongo yamubumbi iitakonzyi kuswanizigwa limbi. Lino banooyoozika bantu mu-Tofeti mane mukaate.
Mbuboobo mbunjoocitila busena obuno abantu bakede mpoonya, mbwaamba Jehova, kuti munzi uno ube mbubonya mbuli Tofeti.
Lino maanda aamu-Jerusalemu amaanda aabami ba-Juda, nkukuti maanda oonse makamu oonse aakujulu nkwaakatentelwa tununkilizyo atala lyanduli zyao, ayoosofwaazigwa mbuli busena bwa-Tofeti.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Amubone! Njooletela munzi uno atunzuunzi twawo toonse mapenzi oonse ngendaamba aanguwo, nkaambo bayumya insingo zyabo akukaka kuswiilila majwi aangu.
wakauma Jeremiya musinsimi akumwaanga muziliba mumulyango wakujulu wa-Benjamini muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Lino nibwakaca, Pasuri naakaangununa Jeremiya kuzwa kuziliba, Jeremiya wakamwaambila kuti, Izina Jehova ndyakupa tocili Pasuri pe, wakupa izina lya-Ciyoosyakoonsekoonse.

Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Njookubika kuti ube ciyoosyo kulinduwe omwini akubeenzinyoko boonse, Mumeso aako bayoojazigwa ipanga lyabasinkondonyina, nkabela cisi coonse ca-Juda njoocaaba mumaanzanza aamwami wa-Babuloni, elyo uyoobatola mubuzike bwaku-Babuloni akubajazya ipanga.

Abwalo buvubi boonse bwamunzi uno, ambono zyawo zyoonse, azintu zyawo ziyandisi, azilondwedo zyoonse zyabami ba-Juda, zyoonse buyo njoozyaaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyina, nkabela bazoozisaala akuzitola akuya azyo ku-Babuloni.
Ayebo, Pasuri, aboonse bakede muŋanda yako, muyootolwa mubuzike. Uyoosika ku-Babuloni, nkukonya oko nkoyoofwida akuzikwa, webo abeenzinyoko boonse mbowakasinsimina zyakubeja.
Kufumbwa ciindi nindaamba, ndoonzomoka cakwaamba kuti, Maawe! Ndasaalwa! Ndafwa! Nkaambo ijwi lya-Jehova lyandibeda cisampauzyo acisekesyo buzuba boonse.

Na ndaamba kuti, Nsikooyeeya limbi makani aakwe, nsikooyooamba limbi muzina lyakwe, ndajana kuti mumoyo wangu muli anga mulilo uuyakisya uujalilidwe mukati kazifuwa zyangu, mane lumwi candikataazya kundikasya, amoyo wangu waata.

Nkaambo ndateelela bantu banji balavwiya. Ciyoosyo nkucili koonse koonse, Kwaaba atumwaabe! mbubaamba beenzuma boonse bandiziba. Balalindila buwe bwangu. Bati, Ambweni ulakonzya kucegwa, kuti tumuzunde akuliya inkoto,
O Jehova wamakamu oobeteka baluleme, oolingula myoyo amiyeeyo yabantu, nkaliye inkoto yabubi bwabo, nkaambo mumaanza aako mondaabide makani aangu.
Amwiimbile Jehova! Amutembaule Jehova! Nkaambo wavuna buumi bwayooyo uupengede kuzwa kumaanza aabasizibi.
Abe alutuko muntu oyo iwakaletela bata makani aakuti, Wazyalilwa mwana mulombe, akumubotezya loko.
Muntu oyo abe mbubonya mbuli minzi Jehova njaakanyonyoona, iyatakafwidwa luzyalo, Cifumofumo ateelele kulila, akuciindi casikati amvwe cikwala,
nkaambo wakabula kundijaya nindakacili mwida, kuti bula bwabama bube kabanda kangu, azyalilo lyabo lindijate lyoonse.
Ino nkaambonzi ndakazwa muzyalilo kukujana mapenzi amakataazyo akusowa mazuba aangu mubuusu?
Utubuzizye makani kuli-Jehova, nkaambo Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni ulatulwisya. Ambweni Jehova ulatufwida luzyalo akutucitila milimo iigambya mbwacita lyoonse akutulesezya oyu muntu.
Jeremiya wakabaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila Zedekiya.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Ncobeni njoolobya zilwisyo zili mumaanza aanu, nzimulwisya mwami wa-Babuloni aba-Kasidi bamusinkinizya anze lyabulambo, nkabela njoobabunganya omuno mukati kamunzi.
Ambebo ndemwini njoomulwisya ajanza litandabikidwe akuboko kuyumu, Njoomulwisya alunyemo lwa bukali bupati loko.
Njoouma boonse bakede mumunzi uno, bantu abanyama boonse, nkabela bayoojazigwa bulwazi buyoosya.

Lino kusule lyayaaya, mbwaamba Jehova, njooaba Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda abalanda bakwe abantu bacisyeede mumunzi uno batana kumanisigwa bulwazi niiba inkondo niliba ipamba, njoobaaba mumaanza aa-Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni amumaanza aabasinkondonyina amumaanza aabaabo bayanda kubajaya, elyo uyoobajazya mulomo wapanga. Takooyoobaleka nikuba kubafwida buuya nikuba kubafwida luzyalo.
Oyo uusyaala mumunzi uno uyoojazigwa ipanga anzala abulwazi, pele oyo uuya anze kuyoolyaaba mumaanza aaba-Kasidi bamusinkinizya uyoovuba buumi bwakwe.
Nkaambo meso aangu alilangene amunzi uno kukuuletela mapenzi, teensi kuuletela coolwe pe, mbwaamba Jehova, nkabela uyooabwa mumaanza aamwami wa-Babuloni kuti autente mumulilo.
Abalo basiluzubo lwamwami wa-Juda, uleelede kubaambila kuti, Amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova.

O luzubo lwa-Davida, mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Amubeteke kabotu cifumofumo. Amuvune oyo uubbididwe mumaanza aasikubba, inga bukali bwangu bunoobuka mbuli mulilo akuyakisya cakubula uuzimya, nkaambo kabubi bwamilimo yanu,
Njoomubweedezezya bulumbu bweelede micelo yamilimo yanu, mbwaamba Jehova. Njoodukula mulilo mulusaka lwakwe, nkabela uyootenta zintu zyoonse zizyungulukide nguwe.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Seluka kuya kuŋanda yamwami waJuda, ukaambe nkuko majwi aya.
Amba kuti, Swiilila ijwi lya­ Jehova, O mwami wa-Juda nokede acuuno ca-Davida, webo abalanda bako abantu bako boonse banjila mumilyango eyi.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Amubeteke cakululama, amuvune uubbididwe mumaanza aasikubba; mutapenzyi nikuba kubisizya mweenzu amucaala amukamufu, alimwi mutatili bulowa bwabaabo batakwe milandu mubusena obuno.
Nkaambo na mwacita obo ncobeni, lino mumilyango yaŋanda eyi muyoonjila bami bakala acuuno cabwami bwa-Davida, balitantide ankalaki ambizi, balo abalanda babo abami babo.
Pele na mwakaka kuswiilila majwi aya, lino ndakonka muzina lyangu ndemwini, mbwaamba Jehova, kuti iŋanda eyi iyooba matongo.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Jehova mbwaamba aaŋanda yamwami wa-Juda. Mumeso aangu uli mbubonya mbuli Gileadi na mutwe wa-Lebano, nekubaboobo ncobeni njookulobya, ube inkanda buyo, munzi uutakalwi bantu.
Njookubambila basikunyonyoona, umwi aumwi azilwisyo zyakwe, nkabela bayoogonka misamu yakedari yako mibotu akwiiwaala mumulilo.
Lino bamasi banji bayooinda kumunzi uno, nkabela bayoobuzya umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina kuti, Nkaambonzi Jehova waucitila obo, munzi oyu mupati?
Elyo kuyoovuwigwa kuti, Nkaambo kakuti bakamwaya cizuminano ca-Jehova Leza wabo, bakakotamina baleza bambi akubamanina milimo.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Jehova mbwaamba aa-Salumu mwana wa-Josiya mwami waJuda, oyo iwakalya izina lyawisi Josiya pele sunu watolwa kuzwa ano. Takooyooboola limbi pe.
Nkukonya oko nkubamutola mubuzike nkwayoofwida. Nyika ino takooyooibona limbi.
uuamba kuti, Njooliyakila iŋanda impati iili amaanda aakujulu aataatwi, uulibezela zipulo, alimwi ulaivumbya zisamu zyakedari akwiinanika musila!
Ma! Sa misamu minji yakedari njiikupa bwami? Sa tobwene uso mbwaakacita? Wakali kulya akunywa, pele wakali kubeteka cakululama, aboobo wakakala kabotu.
Wakakosola kabotu makani aabacete abapengede, aboobo wakakala kabotu, Kucita obo sa teekwakali kuziba ndime? mbwaamba Jehova.
Pele uwe tojisi meso nuuba moyo cita kukunyanzya imbono akukutila bulowa bwabaabo batakwe milandu akukusaala akupenzya bantu,
Uyoozikwa mbubonya mbuli imbongolo mbiizikwa. Uyookwelwa akusoowegwa anze lyamilyango ya-Jerusalemu.
Tanta mucilundu ca-Lebano, ukoongolole, Ijwi lyakulila kwako limvwigwe mu-Basani. Kolila kuzwa ku-Abarimu, nkaambo basikukuyanda boonse banyonyooka.
Ndakakwaambila kuciindi cacoolwe cako, pele wakaamba kuti, Nsikooteelela pe. Mbubonya obo mbowakali kucita lyoonse kuzwa kubwanikenike bwako. Tokwe nowakaswiilila ijwi lyangu abuniini pe.
Muuwo nguuyooembela beembeli bako, abazolwani bako bayootolwa mubuzike. Lino uyoofwisigwa insoni akuusa bweeme nkaambo kabubi bwako boonse.
Webo ookede ku-Lebano, ooyakide citeente cako akati kamisamu yakedari, uyootongela loko nozoomvwa kucisa, macise mbuli macise aamwanakazi uutumbuka.
akukwaaba mumaanza aabaabo­ bayandaula buumi bwako, mumaanza aabaabo mboyoowa, mumaanza aa-Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni amumaanza aaba-Kasidi.
Njoo-kuwaala, webo abanyoko ibakakuzyala, kunyika imbi njimwatakazyalilwa, nkabela muyoofwa nkukonya oko.
Pele nyika myoyo yabo njiisukeme, tabakooyooboola limbi kulinjiyo pe.
O nyika! Nyika! Nyika! Swiilila ijwi lya-Jehova!

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Amulembe muntu oyo mbuli muntu musundi, muntu uutakonzyi kujana coolwe mazuba oonse, nkaambo taakwe naba omwe akati kabana bakwe uuyoojana coolwe cakukala acuuno cabwami bwa-Davida nikuba kweendelezya limbi mucisi ca-Juda.

Mbuboobu Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli mbwaamba aabeembeli beembela bantu bangu. Mwamwaisya imbelele zyangu, mwazitanda, tamuzibambide pe. Lino njoomubweedezya bulumbu bweelede milimo yanu mibi, mbwaamba Jehova.
Njooyobolola imbelele zyangu zicisyeede kuzwa kuzisi zyoonse nkundakazitandilide, njooziboozya kucimpati cazyo, lino ziyoozyalisya akuvula.
Nkabela njoozibikila beembeli bakuzyeembela, aboobo tazikoonooyoowa limbi nikuba kukankama nikuba kubulila, mbwaamba Jehova.
Mumazuba aakwe Juda uyoofutulwa a-Israyeli uyookala cakuliiba, Azina lyakwe ndyayooulikwa ndeeli: Jehova mbululami bwesu.
Nkaambo kako mumazuba aaboola, mbwaamba Jehova, takukooyooambwa limbi kuti, Mbwali muumi Jehova iwakagwisya bana ba-Israyeli kuzwa kunyika ya-Egepita,
pele kuyooambwa kuti, Mbwali muumi Jehova iwakagwisya bana baluzubo lwa-Israyeli kuzwa kucisi cakunyika akuzisi zyoonse nkwaakabatandide, Lino bayookala munyika yabo beni.
Nkaambo nyika ilizwide basimamambe, akaambo kalutuko nyika ilalila amacelelo aabuwa aliyumide. Inzila njibatola nimbi, anguzu zyabo taziluleme.
Nkaambo bapaizi abasinsimi boonse mbasizibi, amuŋanda yangu ndemwini ndijene bubi bwabo, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo kako inzila yabo iyoobabeda mbuli inzila zyabutezi ciindi camudima. Bayootandilwa mulinjiyo mane lumwi bawe, nkaambo njoobaletela mapenzi mumwaka wakuswayigwa kwabo, mbwaamba Jehova.

Pele mubasinsimi baku-Jerusalemu ndibwene cintu ciinda kusesemya. Balacita bumambe, baleenda mukubeja, balagwasya maanza aabasizibi akubakasya kuleka umwi aumwi bubi bwakwe. Boonse bandibeda mbubonya mbuli Sodoma, abantu bakede mulinguwo bali mbuli bantu ba-Gomora.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu Jehova wamakamu mbwaamba aabasinsimi. Ncobeni njoobasanizya kabindaula akubanywisya maanzi aamululwe, nkaambo kubasinsimi baku-Jerusalemu nkokwazwa kasampusampu munyika yoonse.
Lyoonse balaambila basikusampaula ijwi lya-Jehova kuti, Muyooba aluumuno. Abaabo beenda muzinguni zyamyoyo yabo balabaambila kuti, Tamukooyoojana mapenzi pe.
Ma! Nguni akati kabo wakaima munkuta ya-Jehova kuti abone akuswiilila majwi aakwe? Nguni wakamvwa ijwi lyakwe akuliteelela?
Amubone! Kwazwa iguwo kuli-Jehova! Bukali bwakwe bwa buka! Ndiguwo lilundumuna! Lilawida amutwe wabasizibi.
Bukali bwa-Jehova tabukooyoomana mane lumwi akacite makanze aakwe amiyeeyo yamoyo wakwe, Lino kumamanino aaciindi muyoomvwisya makani oonse.
Teensi ndime ndakatuma abo basinsimi, nekubaboobo bakazuzaana. Nsikwe nindakabaambila, nekubaboobo bakasinsima.
Pele nibakaima mulubeta lwangu, nibakaswiilizya bantu majwi aangu, lino nibakaleka inzila yabo imbi abubi bwamilimo yabo.
Sa muntu ulakonzya kuyuba muciyubilo nkuntakonzyi kumubona? mbwaamba Jehova. Sa nsizuzyi nyika ajulu zyoonse? mbwaamba Jehova.
Ndimvwide majwi aabasinsimi basinsima cakubeja muzina lyangu, bati, Ndalota! Ndalota!
Zyakubeja ziyooleka lili mumyoyo yabasinsimi basinsima cakubeja akwaamba lweeno lwamyoyo yabo?
Balayeeya kulubya bantu bangu izina lyangu kuziloto zyabo nzibakanana umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina, mbubonya mbuli bamawisaabo mbubakaluba izina lyangu nkaambo ka-Baala.
Musinsimi uulota ciloto akanane ciloto cakwe, pele oyo uujisi ijwi lyangu aambe ijwi lyangu cakusyomeka. Sa ncibotu kuvwelanya buungu amaila? mbwaamba Jehova.
Sa ijwi lyangu talili mbuli mulilo? mbwaamba Jehova. Sa talili mbuli insando iipwayaula mabwe?
Nkaambo kako, ncobeni nsibayandi aba basinsimi babba majwi aangu, umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ncobeni nsibayandi, mbwaamba Jehova, aba basinsimi babelesya indimi zyabo cakwaamba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba! Mbuboobu mbwaamba!

Ncobeni nsibayandi abo basinsima ziloto zyabuyo, mbwaamba Jehova, bazikanana, baleesya bantu ba ngu mumbejo zyabo amukamikami kabo, anukuti mebo nsikwe nindakabatuma nikuba kubalailila, Tabagwasyi bantu aba abuniini, mbwaamba Jehova.
Kufumbwa musinsimi naba mupaizi naba muntu buyo uubelesya ijwi eli lyakuti makani aa-Jehova ngemuyumwide, njoomupa mulandu, oyo muntu aluzubo lwakwe loonse.
Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaamba, umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina, umwi aumwi kusimukowanyina, Amwaambe kuti, Ncinzi Jehova ncaavuwa? nanka, Ncinzi Jehova ncaakaamba?
Pele ijwi eli lyamakani aa-Jehova ngemuyumwide talikooyooambwa limbi, nkaambo makani muntu ngayumwide ndijwi lyakwe mwini; mulasandula-sandula majwi aa-Leza muumi, Jehova wamakamu, Leza wesu.
Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila musinsimi. Amwaambe kuti, Ncinzi Jehova ncaavuwa? nanka, Ncinzi Jehova ncaakaamba?

Pele na mwaamba kuti, Makani aa-Jehova ngemuyumwide, mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mbuli mbumwabelesya ijwi eli lyakuti makani aa-Jehova ngemuyumwide, nekuba kuti ndakamutumina mulazyo wakuti, Mutaambi kuti makani aa-Jehova ngemuyumwide,
lino ncobeni njoomunyampula akumusoowa kuzwa kubusyu bwangu, inywe amunzi woonse ngundakapa bamausowanu.
Njoomuletela lusampaulo lutamani abweeme butakonzyi kulubwa mazuba oonse mane kukabe kutamani.
Intwida imwi kiijisi inkuyu imbotu loko, mbubonya mbuli inkuyu iitaanguna kubizwa, pele intwida yabili kiijisi inkuyu imbi loko, zitakonzyi kuligwa nkaambo kabubi bwazyo.
Lino Jehova wakandibuzya kuti, Ncinzi ncobona, Jeremiya? Ndakati, Ndabona inkuyu; inkuyu zimwi nzibotu loko, ankuyu zimwi nzibi loko zitakonzyi kuligwa nkaambo kabubi bwazyo.
Mpoonya awo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila liti,

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, Mbubonya mbuli inkuyu ezi imbotu, mbubonya obo mbubabede mumeso aangu bantu ba-Juda batolwa mubuzike, mbendakagwisya kuzwa okuno akubatuma kunyika yaba-Kasidi kuti bajane coolwe.
Njoobadongomwena meso aangu kukubapa coolwe. Njoobaboozya kunyika ino. Njoobayaka, nsikooyoobamwaya. Njoobazikila, nsikooyoobanonkola pe.
Nkabela njoobapa moyo wakuziba kuti ndime Jehova, lino bayooba bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wabo, nkaambo bayooboola kulindime camoyo woonse.
Njoobabika kuti babe ciyoosyo kuzisi zyoonse zyanyika, izina lyabo libe lusampauko akasimpi, ijwi lyakuweezya alyakutukizya, akati kabamasi boonse nkubatandidwe.
Njoobatumina ipanga anzala amalwazi mane lumwi bakanyonyooke mpoonya awo anyika eyo njindakabapa balo abamawisaabo.
makani Jeremiya musinsimi ngaakaambila bantu boonse ba-Juda aboonse ibakakede mu-Jerusalemu. Wakati,

Kuzwa kumwaka wakumi aitatu wabwami bwa-Josiya mwana wa-Amoni mwami wa-Juda akusikila kubuzuba obuno, myaka iili makumi obile aitatu, ndasikilwa ijwi lya-Jehova, nkabela nsina kuleka abuniini kumukambaukila, pele tamuteeleli.
Jehova wakamutumina balanda bakwe boonse basinsimi cakutaleka, pele tamukwe nimwakateelela nikuba kucenjeka matwi aanu kukuswiilila.
Wakati, Amupiluke, muleke umwi aumwi inzila zyakwe imbi abubi bwamilimo yakwe, kuti mukale mpoonya ano anyika Jehova njaakamupa, nywebo abamausowanu, kuti ibe yanu mumazyalani oonse akutamani.
Mutanooyi butobela baleza bambi. Mutabamanini milimo nikuba kubakotamina. Mutandikalazyi azilenge zyamaanza aanu, Lino nsikooyoomubisizya.
Pele mwakakaka kundiswiilila, mbwaamba Jehova. Mwakandikalazya azilenge zyamaanza aanu, aboobo mwalibisizya nubeni.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Mbuli mbumwakaka kuswiilila majwi aangu,

amubone! Ndatuma kuyooita misyobo yoonse yakunyika, mbwaamba Jehova, amulanda wangu Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni, kuti balwisye nyika ino abantu bakede mulinjiyo amisyobo yoonse iiengelede, nkabela njoobanyonyoona, njoobabika kuti babe ciyoosyo, acisabulo acisampaulo.
Njoolesya akati kabo ijwi lyabusekelezi ajwi lyakukondwa, ijwi lyasibwiinga ajwi lyanabwiinga, ijwi lyakuziya amumuni walampi woonse.
Nyika eyi yoonse iyooba matongo aayoosya, nkabela misyobo eyi iyoobelekela mwami wa-Babuloni milimo myaka iili makumi aali musanu aabili.
Njoozuzikizya kunyika eyo majwi aangu oonse ngendaamba aanjiyo, oonse aalembedwe mubbuku eli, Jeremiya ngaakasinsima aabamasi boonse.
Nkaambo misyobo minji abami bapati bayoobanjizya mubuzike, nkabela njoobabweedezya bulumbu bweelede incito zyabo amilimo yamaanza aabo.
Bayoonywa, bayookolwa, bayoodadalika nkaambo kankondo njinjoobusya akati kabo.
Mpawo ndakatambula inkomeki kuzwa kujanza lya-Jehova, ndakanywisya bamasi boonse, kufumbwa Jehova nkwaakandituma:
nkukuti Jerusalemu aminzi yacisi ca-Juda abami baco abasilutwe baco, kuti babe matongo aciyoosyo acisabulo acitukilo mbubacibede asunu;
a-Farao mwami wa-Egepita, abalanda bakwe, abasilutwe bakwe, abantu bakwe boonse,
abeenzu bakede akati kabo; abami boonse bacisi ca-Uzi; abami boonse banyika yaba-Filisti, a-Asikeloni a-Gaza a-Ekroni aba-Asidodi basyeede;
a-Edomu, a-Moabu, abana ba-Amoni;
abami boonse baTuro, abami boonse ba-Sidoni, abami boonse bakunkomwe yamutala alwizi;
a-Dedani, a-Temani, a-Buzi, amisyobo yoonse yabantu balinyoola mumpanza;
abami boonse ba-Arabiya, abami boonse babeenzu bakede munkanda;
abami boonse ba-Zimri, abami boonse ba-El amu, abami boonse baba-Medi;
abami boonse bazisi zyakunyika, nibaba bali afwaafwi nibaba bali kule, umwi aumwi muciindi cakwe azisi zyoonse zyaluwa lwaansi. Lino mwami wa-Sesaki nguuyoosyaalila kunywa.
Pele na bakaka kutambula inkomeki iizwa kujanza lyako, akutanywa, lino uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Ncobeni muleelede kunywa,

nkaambo amubone! Amunzi uuambwa muzina lyangu ndemwini ndatalika kuuletela mapenzi, lino inywe sa mulakonzya kutapenzegwa? Ncobeni tamukooyoolekelelwa obo pe, nkaambo ndaita ipanga lyakuumya bantu boonse buyo baansi, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Lupyopyongano luyoomvwigwa akumamanino aanyika, nkaambo Jehova ulijisi makani aakukazyanya abamasi, ulabeteka bantu boonse balya maila, abasizibi ulabaaba kuti bajazigwe ipanga, mbwaamba Jehova.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Amubone! Mapenzi alabuka mucisi cimwi acimwi, aguwo ipati lilabusigwa kumagolelo aanyika.

Nkabela mubuzuba obo bajayidwe ba-Jehova bayoojanwa moonse munyika kuzwa kumagolelo amwi akusikila kumagolelo amwi. Tabakooyoolilwa nikuba kubambwa nikuba kuzikwa, pele bayooba bufumba buyo atala avu.
Amuwuule nubeembeli, amulile! Amwaalabane mutwe nubasilutwe babutanga, nkaambo mazuba aanu aakujayigwa asika, lino muyoomwaisigwa, muyoowida ansi mbuli bagutu babotu.
Beembeli bayoomaninwa lucijo, abalo basilutwe babutanga tabakooyooloboka.
Swiilila beembeli mbubalila! Swiilila basilutwe babutanga mbubawuula! Nkaambo Jehova wabisizya macelelo aabo,
azimpati zyaluumuno zilisaalidwe nkaambo kabukali buyumu bwa-Jehova.
Uli mbuli mulavu uusiide bulyango bwakwe, nkaambo nyika yabo yaba matongo, nkaambo kapanga lya-Jehova akaambo kabukali bwakwe buyumu.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ima kulubanza lwaŋanda ya-Jehova, ukaambile bantu baminzi yoonse yacisi ca-Juda basika kuzookomba muŋanda ya-Jehova. Kobaambila majwi aya oonse ngendakulailila. Utasotoki ijwi niliba lyomwe.
Ambweni bayooswiilila, ambweni bayooleka umwi aumwi bubi bwanzila yakwe, elyo njookonzya kuleka mapenzi ngendili mukuyeeya kubaletela nkaambo kabubi bwamilimo yabo.
Uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Na mwakaka kundiswiilila, akweenda mumulao wangu ngundibikide kumeso aanu,
akuswiilila majwi aabalanda bangu basinsimi mbendamutumina, mbendamutumina ciindi coonse nekuba kuti mwakaka kumvwa,
lino njoocita kuti iŋanda eyi ibe mbubonya mbuli Silo, awalo munzi uno uyooba lutuko kuzisi zyoonse zyaansi.
Lino bapaizi abasinsimi abantu boonse bakamvwa Jeremiya ulaamba majwi aya muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Nkabela Jeremiya naakamana kwaamba makani oonse Jehova ngaakamulailila kwaambila bantu boonse, ndilyonya bapaizi abasinsimi abantu boonse bakamujata, bati, Ncobeni ulafwa!

Nkaambonzi wasinsima muzina lya-Jehova aya majwi aakuti iŋanda eyi iyooba mbuli Silo, amunzi Oyu uyooba itongo buyo litakwe bantu? Nkabela bantu boonse bakayoboloka Jeremiya nkwaakabede muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Elyo bapaizi abasinsimi bakaambila basilutwe abantu boonse kuti, Oyu muntu uleelede kufwa, nkaambo wasinsima majwi aakusampauzya munzi uno, mbubonya mbumumvwide amatwi aanu nubeni.
Mpoonya awo Jeremiya wakaambila basilutwe boonse abantu boonse kuti, Jehova nguwakandituma kukusinsima aaŋanda eyi amunzi uno majwi oonse ngemumvwide.
Lino amubotye inzila zyanu amilimo yanu, akuswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu, lino Jehova inga unooleka mapenzi ngaamba kumuletela.
Pele mebo ndi mumaanza aanu. Amundicitile kufumbwa cintu cibota akululama mumeso aanu.

Nekubaboobo amuzibe calusinizyo kuti, na mwandijaya, muyooliletela, inywe nubeni amunzi uno abantu bakede mulinguwo, mulandu wakutila bulowa bwamuntu uutakwe kaambo, nkaambo ncobeni Jehova nguwakandituma kulindinywe kuti nkakambauke majwi aya oonse mumatwi aanu.
Mpoonya awo basilutwe abantu boonse bakaambila bapaizi abasinsimi kuti, Muntu oyu teelede kufwa pe, nkaambo watwaambila muzina lyaJehova Leza wesu.
Nkabela bamwi bapati banyika bakanyampuka, bakaambila bantu boonse babungene kuti,

Mika waku-Morese wakali kusinsima mumazuba aa-Hezekiya mwami wa-Juda, nkabela wakaambila bantu boonse ba-Juda kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu: Ziyoni uyoolimwa mbuli muunda, a-Jerusalemu uyooba malwi malwi, acilundu cantempele ciyooba mbuli kalundulundu kamusokwe buyo.

Sa mwami Hezekiya abantu boonse ba-Juda bakamujaya na? Sa takakayoowa Jehova akutontozya busyu bwa-Jehova? Lino Jehova sa takakaleka mapenzi ngaakaamba kubaletela? Pele swebo twaamba kuliletela mapenzi mapati tubeni.
Alimwi kakuli muntu aumwi iwakasinsima muzina lya-Jehova, Uriya mwana wa-Semaya waku-Kiriati-Jearimu. Wakasinsima aamunzi uno anyika ino majwi aakali mbubonya mbuli majwi aa-Jeremiya.
Lino mwami Jehoyakimu abasinkuta bakwe abasilutwe bakwe boonse, nibakaswiilila majwi aakwe, mwami wakayanda kumujaya, lino Uriya naakamvwa wakayoowa, wakacijila ku-Egepita.
Elyo mwami Jehoyakimu wakatuma bantu ku-Egepita, Elinatani mwana wa-Akiboro abantu bamwi ibakamusindikila ku-Egepita,
nkabela bakagwisya Uriya kuzwa ku-Egepita akumusisya kumwami Jehoyakimu, elyo bakamujazya ipanga akusoowa mutunta wakwe mumavwikilo aabantu buyo.
Mbu­ boobu Jehova mbwaandaambila. Kolicitila zyaanzyo azikeyi zyajoko, ukalyaanzye nzizyo ansingo yako.
Lino tuma mulazyo kumwami waEdomu, kumwami wa-Moabu, kumwami wabana ba-Amoni, kumwami wa-Turo akumwami wa-Sidoni, kumilomo yaba tumwa basika ku-Jerusalemu kuli-Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda.
Uleelede kubalailila kutolela bami babo majwi aya aakuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza waIsrayeli. Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila basimalelo banu.
Ndime ndakalenga nyika abantu abanyama boonse bakede alinjiyo. Ndakailenga kunguzu zyangu zigambya akukuboko kwangu kutandabikidwe, alimwi ndaipa kufumbwa muntu ngunjanda.
Lino ciindi ecino ndaaba nyika ezi zyoonse mumaanza aa-Nebukadinezara mulanda wangu mwami wa-Babuloni. Abalo banyama bamusokwe, boonse buyo ndabaaba mumaanza aakwe kuti bamumanine milimo.
Nkabela misyobo yoonse yabantu ilamumanina milimo, walo amwana wakwe amuzukulu wakwe, mane ciindi canyika yakwe mwini cikasike, elyo misyobo minji abami bapati bayoomuzunda, abe muzike wabo.
