Pele kufumbwa cisi na musyobo uukaka kumubelekela milimo, oyu Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni, akubika insingo yawo kunsi lyajoko lyamwami wa-Babuloni, oyo musyobo njooupenzya apanga apamba amalwazi, mbwaamba Jehova, mane lumwi nkaumanisye kujanza lyakwe.
Lino nywebo, mutaswiilili majwi aabasinsimi banu abasondi banu abasizilo to banu abasimizimu banu abasibadaimona banu, bamwaambila kuti, Tamukooyoobelekela mwami wa-Babuloni.
Nkaambo balamusinsimina cakubeja, aboobo muyootolwa kule kuzwa kunyika yanu. Njoomutanda mane mukalobe.
Pele kufumbwa musyobo uubika insingo yawo kunsi lyajoko lyamwami wa-Babuloni akumubelekela milimo, njoousia mpoonya awo anyika yawo, mbwaamba Jehova, kuti ulime nyika akukala alinjiyo.
Sa mulayanda kujazigwa ipanga acimpayuma amalwazi, webo abantu bako, mbuli Jehova mbwaamba aamusyobo oyo uukaka kumanina mwami wa­-Babuloni milimo?
Mutaswiilili majwi aabasinsimi bamwaambila kuti, Tamukooyoobelekela mwami wa-Babuloni milimo, nkaambo bali mukumusinsimina zyakubeja.
Teensi ndime ndakabatuma, mbwaamba Jehova. Balasinsima zyakubeja buyo muzina lyangu, kuti nkamutande, aboobo muyooloba, inywe abasinsimi boonse bamusinsimina.
Mutabaswiilili pe, Amubelekele mwami wa-Babuloni milimo kuti mukapone. Sa ncibotu kuti munzi uno ube matongo?
Na ncobeni mbasinsimi, alyalo ijwi lya-Jehova na nkulili kulimbabo, bakumbile kuliJehova wamakamu kuti zibelesyo zicisyeede muŋanda ya-Jehova amuŋanda ya-Juda amu-Jerusalemu zitatolwi ku-Babuloni.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Jehova wamakamu mbwaamba aaminsende acikozyano caziba aziimikilo azibelesyo zimwi zyoonse zicisyeede omuno mumunzi,

Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni nzyaatakatola ciindi eco naakatola mubuzike Jekoniya mwana wa-Jehoyakimu mwami wa-Juda, naakamugwisya kuzwa kuJerusalemu akumutola ku-Babuloni antoomwe abapati boonse ba-Juda aba-Jerusalemu.
Mbuboobu Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli mbwaamba aazibelesyo zicisyeede muŋanda ya-Jehova amuŋanda yamwami waJuda amu-Jerusalemu.
Ziyootolwa ku-Babuloni nkabela ziyoosyaala nkukonya oko mane kusikila kubuzuba obo mbwenti zibambe, mbwaamba Jehova, elyo njoozigwisya akuziboozya okuno.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Ndatyola ijoko lyamwami waBabuloni.
Myaka yobile niitana kuzula, njooboozezya okuno zibelesyo zyoonse zyaŋanda ya-Jehova, Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni nzyaakagwisya kubusena obuno akuzitola ku-Babuloni.
Alakwe Jekoniya mwana wa-Jehoyakimu mwami wa-Juda aboonse ba-Juda ibakatolwa mubuzike ku-Babuloni, njoobapilusya okuno, mbwaamba Jehova, nkaambo njootyola ijoko lyamwami wa-Babuloni.
Mpoonya awo Jeremiya musinsimi wakaambila musinsimi Hananiva mumatwi aabapaizi amumatwi aabantu boonse ibakaimvwi muŋanda yaJehova.

Jeremiya musinsimi wakati, Ameni! Jehova acite mbubonya obo! Jehova azuzikizye majwi aako ngowasinsima. Apilusye zibelesyo zyaŋanda ya-Jehova, abantu boonse ibakatolwa mubuzike ku-Babuloni, kuti baboole kubusena obuno.
Pele koswiilila ijwi eti ndindaamba mumatwi aako amumatwi aabantu boonse.
Kalekale basinsimi ibakatutaangunina, mebo ayebo, bakasinsima makani aazisi zinji amami mapati, makani aankondo amapenzi amalwazi.
Lino musinsimi uusinsima makani aacoolwe, ijwi lyamusinsimi oyo litaangune kuzuzikizigwa, elyo kuyoozibwa kuti ncobeni Jehova nguwakamutuma oyo musinsimi.

Nkabela Hananiya wakaamba mumatwi aabantu boonse kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mbubonya obo mbunti tyole ijoko lya-Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni lili kunsingo yamisyobo yoonse, myaka yobile niitana kumana. Lino Jeremiya musinsimi wakaya kulinguwe.
Elyo musinsimi Hananiya naakamana kutyola zikeyi zyajoko kuzwa kunsingo ya-Jeremiya musinsimi, kabe kaindi ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila jeremiya, liti,
Koya ukaambile Hananiya kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Zikeyi zyazisamu wazityola, pele mucibaka cazeezyo njocita zikeyi zyalubulo.

Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Ansingo zyabantu bamisyobo eyi yoonse buyo ndabika ijoko lyalubulo, kuti bamanine Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni milimo. Ncobeni bayoomumanina milimo, abalo banyama bamusokwe boonse buyo ndabaaba mumaanza aakwe,
Lino Jeremiya musinsimi wakaambila Hananiya musinsimi kuti, Swiilila, O Hananiya! Teensi Jehova iwakakutuma pe. Wacita kuti bantu aba basyome zyakubeja buyo.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni njookutanda kuzwa kubusyu bwanyika. Mwaka uno nguwonya ulafwa, nkaambo waamba majwi aakupapita Jehova.
Lino mumwaka oyo nguwonya, mumwezi wamusanu aibili, musinsimi Hananiya wakafwa.
nkukuti nibakamana kulonzegwa kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu mwami Jekoniya abanyina mwami abasiŋanda abapati bacisi ca-Juda aba-Jerusalemu abafuzi abasimilimo.
Lugwalo lwakatumwa kumaanza aa-Eleasa mwana wa-Safani a-Gemariya mwana wa-Hilikiya, mbombabo Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda mbaakatuma ku-Babuloni kuli-Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni. Lwakati,
Mbuboobu Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli mbwaambila boonse batandidwe mbendakalonzya kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu kuya mubuzike ku-Babuloni.
Amuyake maanda, mukale mulingao. Amulime myuunda, mulye micelo yayo.

Amukwate banakazi, muzyale bana balombe abasimbi, Amukwatye bana banu balombe banakazi, abalo bana banu basimbi ubape kuti bakwatwe baalumi, bazyale bana balombe abasimbi, kuti mukavule nkuko akutaceya.
Amubike myoyo yanu kukuleta coolwe kumunzi oyo nkundamulonzezya. Amukombele nguwo kuli-Jehova, nkaambo coolwe cawo ncecoolwe canu.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Batamweeni basinsimi banu abasondi banu bakede akati kanu. Mutaswiilili ziloto zyabo nzibalota,
nkaambo makani ngebamusinsimina muzina lyangu ngaakubeja buyo. Teensi ndime ndakabatuma pe, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo ndizi miyeeyo yangu njinjeeya aandinywe, mbwaamba Jehova. Njemiyeeyo yakuleta coolwe, teensi miyeeyo yamapenzi pe. Njanda kumupa bubotu mbumukonzya kulangila kumamanino.
Lino muyoondiita, muyoosika kundikomba, nkabela njoomuswiilila.
Muyoondiyandaula nkabela muyoondijana, nkokuti na mwandiyandaula camoyo woonse.

Njoojanwa ndinywe, mbwaamba Jebova, nkabela njoolobya buzike bwanu akumuyobolola kuzwa kuzisi zyoonse akumasena oonse nkundakamutandilide, mbwaamba Jehova. Njoomuboozya kubusena obo mbubonya nkundakamugwisya nindakamutandila mubuzike.
Mulaamba kuti, Jehova watubusizya basinsimi ku-Babuloni.
Pele mbuboobu Jehova mbwaamba aamwami uukede acuuno cabwami bwa-­Davida, abantu boonse bakede mumunzi uno, nkokuti banabakwanu ibatakainka anywebo kuya mubuzike.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Ncobeni njoobatumina ipanga anzala amalwazi, nkabela njoocita kuti babe mbuli inkuyu imbi zitakonzyi kuligwa nkaambo kabubi bwazyo.
Njoobatandya ipanga anzala amalwazi, nkabela njoocita kuti babe ciyoosyo kuzisi zyoonse zyaansi, lutuko alugambyo acisabulo acisampaulo akati kamisyobo yoonse nkundakabatandilide,
nkaambo kakuti tabana kuswiilila majwi aangu, mbwaamba Jehova, ngendabatumina kumilome yabalanda bangu basinsimi. Ndakasungwaala kubatuma, nekubaboobo teemwakaswiilila, mbwaamba Jehova.
Lino amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova, nyoonse mbendakatanda kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu kuya mubuzike ku-Babuloni.

Mbuboobu Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli mbwaamba aa-Ahabu mwana wa-Kolaya a-Zedekiya mwana wa-Maaseya, bamusinsimina zyakubeja muzina lyangu. Ncobeni njoobaaba mumaanza aa-Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni, nkabela uyoobajaya mumeso aanu.
Lino ba-Juda boonse bali mubuzike bwaku-Babuloni bayoobelesya mazina aabo mukutukila, balaamba kuti, Jehova acite kuti ube mbubonya mbuli Zedekiya a-Ahabu, mwami wa-Babuloni mbaakayoka mumulilo.

Nkaambo bacita bufubafuba mucisi ca-Israyeli, bacita bumambe abanakazi babeenzinyina, alimwi baamba muzina lyangu majwi aakubeja ngendatakabalailila. Ndime uuzi makani, ndime kamboni, mbwaamba Jehova.
Alakwe Semaya waku-Nehelami, uleelede kumwaambila kuti,

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Ndimvwide majwi aamagwalo ngewakatuma muzina lyako kubantu boonse bali mu-Jerusalemu akuli-Zefaniya mwana wa-Maaseya mupaizi akubapaizi boonse aakuti,
Jehova wakubika kuti ube mupaizi mucibaka ca-Jehoyada mupaizi, ube silutwe waŋanda ya-Jehova, ukajate kufumbwa musondosi uusinsimasinsima, umubike mukaliba akumwaanzya insimbi.
Lino nkaambonzi tona kutapatila Jeremiya waku-Anatotu uumusinsimina?
Nkaambo watutumina lugwalo okuno ku-Babuloni lwakuti, Buzike bwanu tabukooyoofwambaana kumana. Amuyake maanda, mukale mulingao. Amulime myuunda, mulye micelo yayo.
Zefaniya mupaizi wakabala lugwalo olu mumatwi aa-Jeremiya musinsimi.
Mpawo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Jeremiya, liti,
Tumina boonse bali mubuzike ijwi lyakuti, Mbuboobu Jehova mbwaamba aaSemaya waku-Nehelami. Semaya wamusinsimina, anukuti teensi ndime ndakamutuma. Wamusyomya zyakubeja.

Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Njoouma Semaya waku-Nehelami alunyungu lwakwe. Takukooyoomusyaalila muntu naba omwe uukala akati kabantu aba uuyoobona coolwe ncenjooletela bantu bangu, mbwaamba Jehova, nkaambo waamba majwi aakupapila Jehova.
Ngaaya makani aakasika kuli-Jeremiya kuzwa kuli-Jehova.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Lemba mubbuku majwi oonse ngendakamwaambila.
Nkaambo mumazuba aaboola, mbwaamba Jehova, njooboozezya bantu bangu ba-Israyeli aba-Juda coolwe, mbwaamba Jehova, nkabela njoobapilusya kunyika eyo njindakapa bamawisaabo, kuti baivube.
Ngaaya makani Jehova ngaamba aa-Israyeli a-Juda.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Tulimvwide ijwi lyalulubuluko alyakuyoowa. Tatumvwi luumuno pe.

Amubuzye, mubone na mwaalumi ulakonzya kutumbuka. Nkaambonzi ndabona baalumi boonse baliimvwi umwi aumwi amaanza aakwe acikungu mbuli mwanakazi uuyanda kutumbuka? Nkaambonzi masyu oonse aabantu ausana?
Maawe! Obo buzuba mbupati. Taakwe bweelene abo. Nceciindi Jakobo naalemenwa mapenzi, nekubaboobo uyoofutulwa kuzwa kulimbubo.
Lino mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, njootyola ijoko lyakwe lili ansingo yako akudunsula zyaanzyo zyako. Bazwakule tabakooyoobanjizya limbi mubuzike,
pele bayoobelekela Jehova Leza wabo milimo, a-Davida mwami wabo ngunjoobabusizya.

Nkaambo mebo ndi anywe, mbwaamba Jehova, njookuvuna, Misyobo yoonse njindakamumwaya akati kayo, njooimaninizya, pele nywebo nsikooyoomumaninizya pe. Njookuuma muciyanza ceelede buyo, nsikooyookuleka buyo.
Taakwe uubeteka kabotu makani aako. Taakwe musamu wakusilisya zilonda zyako. Taakwe uukuponya.
Boonse basikukuyanda bakuluba, tabakuyandauli limbi. Nkaambo ndakuumya luumo lwasinkondonyoko, ndakukoma alukomo lwayooyo uubula buuya, nkaambo kamilandu yako minji azibi zyako ziyoosya.
Ino nkaambonzi nolila nkaambo kamubunda wako? Sa kuciswa kwako takusilikiki? Milandu yako yavula, zibi zyako zilayoosya, aboobo ndakucitila zintu ezi.
Pele lino boonse bakumaninizya bayoomaninizigwa, abasinkondonyoko boonse buyo banooya mubuzike. Abo bakusaala bayoosaalwa, abaabo bakunyanzya bayoonyanzigwa.
Nkaambo njoocita kuti upone alimwi, amibunda yako njooisilika, mbwaamba Jehova, nkaambo bakakwaamba kuti nduwe mutande, Zioni uutayandwa kumuntu naba omwe.
Kuzwa nkukonya kuyoomvwigwa intembauzyo, amajwi aabaabo basekelela. Njoobavuzya; tabakooyooceya pe. Njoobalemya; tabakooyoosampaulwa pe.
Bana babo bayooba mbubonya mbubakabede kalekale. Imbungano yabo iyoobambwa kabotu kumeso aangu, aboonse babakataazya njoobapa mulandu.
Mwami wabo uyooba umwi wabasimukowanyina, ayooyo uubeendelezya uyoozwa kulimbabo beni. Njoomuswenya kufwaafwi kulindime, nkaambo taakwe uukonzya kuswena kufwaafwi kulindime mwini, mbwaamba Jehova.
Muyooba bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wanu.
Bukali buyoosya bwa-Jehova tabukooyooleka mane akacite mbwayanda akuzuzikizya miyeeyo yamoyo wakwe. Kumamanino aaciindi muyoomvwisya aya makani.
Kuciindi eco, mbwaamba Jehova, njooba Leza wamikowa yoonse ya-Israyeli, abalo bayooba bantu bangu.
Jehova wakalibonya kuzwa kule, wati, Ndakuyandisya aluyando lutamani, aboobo nsina kuleka kukufwida luzyalo.
Njookuyakulula alimwi, ncobeni uyooyakwa, O mwana musimbi wa-Israyeli. Uyoolisakatizya alimwi atunyeele akuya buzyana abaabo basekelela.
Uyoozikila alimwi myuunda yamasaansa atala azilundu zyaku-Samariya. Basikuzikila bayoozikila akulya micelo yayo.
Nkaambo kuyooba buzuba abumwi balindizi nibayookwiila mutulundulundu twa-Efraimu kuti, Amubuke, tuye ku-Zioni kuli-Jehova Leza wesu,
Amubone! Ndabaleta kuzwa kucisi cakunyika. Ndababunganya kuzwa kumagolelo aaluwa. Bayooletelela boofu abalema, baminsi abatumbu boonse antoomwe. Kuyooboola okuno inkamu impati.
Bakainka bulila, pele njoobaboozya aluumuno. Njoobeenzya kumbali atulonga twamaanzi, munzila iiluleme mobatakonzyi kulebwa, nkaambo ndime wisi Israyeli, a-Efraimu ngumwanaangu mutaanzi.
Nkaambo Jehova ulinunwide Jakobo akumuvuna mumaanza aayooyo uumwiinda munguzu.

Nkabela bayooboola bwiimba kucilundu ca-Zioni, bayoosekelela bubotu bwa-Jehova, nkaambo kamaila awaini amafuta, abana bambelele abaŋombe. Buumi bwabo buyooba mbuli muunda wamusyu; tabakooyoousa limbi.
Lino basimbi bayookondwa akuzyana, abasankwasankwa abapati boonse bayoosekelela, Njoosandula kulila kwabo kuba lukondo, njoobaumbulizya akubapa lusekelelo mucibaka camapenzi.
Njookutya myoyo yabapaizi zinono, abantu bangu bayoolamwa mububotu bwangu, mhwaamba Jehova.
Ulijisi coolwe ncokonzya kulangila kumamanino, mbwaamba Jehova. Bana bako bayooboola kulimbabo.
Ncobeni ndamvwa Efraimu mbwalila-lila. Wati, Wandikoma, ee, ndakakomwa mbuli moombe uutana kutambisigwa. Kondipilusya, nkapiluke, nkaambo nduwe Jehova Leza wangu.
Nkaambo nindakamana kuleya, ndakeempwa. Nindakamana kulayigwa, ndakalyuuma acamba. Ndakafwa insoni, ndakafwa bweeme, nkaambo ndakalemenwa lusampauko lwabwanike bwangu.
Ma! Sa Efraimu ngumwanaangu uuyandika? Sa ngumwana uubotezya? Kufumbwa ciindi niŋamba anguwe, ncobeni ncimuyeeya loko. Moyo wangu ulasukama loko, Ncobeni njoomufwida luzyalo, mbwaamba Jehova.
Uyooleka lili kuleyauka, O mwana musimbi uutasyomeki, Bona! Jehova walenga cintu cipya ansi! M wanakazi buyo wajata inguzu mbuli mwaalumi!
Ba-Juda aminzi yabo yoonse bayookala nkuko boonse antoomwe, abalo balimi abasikweendeenda baya bweembela matanga aabo.
Nkaambo njookatalusya moyo uukatede, ayooyo uusa njoomulamya.
Mpawo ndakasinsimuka, ndakabona, nkabela ŋozi zyangu zyakandibotela.
Nkabela mbubonya mbundakali kubalangilila kukumwaya akukunonkola akukujayilila akukunyonyoona akukupenzya, njoobalangilila kukuyaka akukusimpika, mbwaamba Jehova.
Mumazuba ayo tabakooyooamba limbi kasimpi kakuti, Bamawisi bakaiya masaansa aapapa, lino meno aabana akaba abuye.
Pe, umwi aumwi uyoofwa nkaambo kamilandu yakwe mwini. Kufumbwa muntu uulya masaansa aapapa, meno aakwe mwini ngaayooba abuye.

Tacikoozooba mbuli cizuminano ncindakatangene abamawisaabo mubuzuba obuya mbundakabajata ajanza kukubapozya kucisi ca-Egepita, nkaambo cizuminano eco bakacimwaya, nekuba kuti ndakababeda mbuli mulumi, mbwaamba Jehova.

Pele cizuminano ncinzootanga abana ba-Israyeli mumazuba aaboola nceeci, mbwaamba Jehova. Nzoobika Mulao wangu mukati kabo, nzooulemba amyoyo yabo, nkabela nzoobabeda Leza wabo, abalo bazoondibeda bantu bangu.

Nkabela tabakooyooiisya umwi aumwi mweenzinyina, aumwi aumwi mwanaakwabo, kuti, Koziba Jehova, nkaambo bazoondiziba boonse buyo, nibaba baniini nibaba bapati, mbwaamba Jehova. Nkaambo nzoobalekelela milandu yabo, azyalo zibi zyabo nsikoozooziibalukwa limbi,
Na milao yazintu ezi ilakonzya kufwa kumeso aangu, mbwaamba Jehova, lino lunyungu lwa-Israyeli alwalo lulakonzya kuloba akutaciba limbi musyobo kumeso aangu.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Na cakonzeka kweeleka bulamfu bwakujulu nanka kulingula-lingula matalisyo aanyika yaansi, lino ambebo njoosowelela inyungu zyoonse zya-Israyeli nkaambo kazibi zyoonse nzibakacita, mbwaamba Jehova.
Alimwi intambo yakweelesya inoociya kunembo mane kusikila kucilundu ca-Garebi, elyo kuzwa oko iyoopiluka ku-Goa.

Nkabela ikuti lyoonse lyamitunta, atwe, amyuunda yoonse mane kusikila kukalonga ka-Kedroni akusikila kucooko ca-Mulyango wambizi wakujwe, zyoonse buyo ziyoosalala kuli-Jehova, Tazikooyoononkolwa nikuba kunyonyoonwa limbi mane kukabe kutamani.
Kuciindi eco basilumamba bamwami wa-Babuloni bakali kusinkinizya Jerusalemu, nkabela Jeremiya kaangidwe mulubanza lwabalindizi luli muŋanda yamwami wa-Juda.
Nkaambo Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda nguwakamwaangide, nkaambo wakati, Ino nkaambonzi wasinsima makani aya? Wati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova: Ndaaba munzi uno mumaanza aamwami wa-Babuloni kuti auzunde,
alakwe Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda takooyooloboka kuzwa kumaanza aabaKasidi, pele ncobeni uyooabwa mumaanza aamwami wa-Babuloni, uyooambaula awe mulomo kumulomo akubonana awe meso kumeso.
Elyo uyootola Zedekiya ku-Babuloni, nkabela uyoosyaala nkukonya oko mane lumwi nkamuswaye, mbwaamba Jehova. Nekuba kuti mwalwisya baKasidi, tamukooyoozunda pe.
Lino Jeremiya wakati, Ijwi lya-Jehova lyandisikila liti,
Bona! Hanameli mwana wa-Salumu simizyaako uleza kulinduwe, ulati, Ula muunda wangu uuli ku-Anatotu, nkaambo ceelelo cakuunununa acakuuvuba ncicako.

Lino Hanameli mwana wasimizyeesu wakeza kulindime, mbubonya mbuli Jehova mbwaakaamba, mulubanza lwabalindizi mondakabede, wakandaambila kuti, Koula muunda wangu uuli mu-Anatotu mucisi caBenjamini, nkaambo nduwe uujisi ceelelo cakuuvuba, nduwe uuelede kuunununa. Kolyuulila. Mpawo ndakaziba kuti aya makani azwa kuli­-Jehova.
Nkabela ndakaula muunda oyo waku-Anatotu kuli-Hanameli mwana wasimizyeesu. Ndakamupimina mali, masyekeli aansiliva aali ikumi amusanu aabili.
Ndakalemba makani mubbuku, ndanamatizya, ndaita bakamboni, akupima bulemu bwansiliva azyeelekelo.
Elyo ndakabweza lugwalo lwacizibisyo camuulo, lwakalembedwe makani ngetwakazuminana, lugwalo lunamatikid we alugwalo lutanamatikidwe loonse,

nkabela olo lugwalo lwamuulo ndakalupa Baruki mwana wa-Neriya mwana wa-Maseya mumeso aa-Hanameli mwana wasimizyeesu amumeso aabakamboni­ ibakalembede mazina aabo mulugwalo lwamuulo amumeso aabaJuda boonse ibakakede mulubanza lwabalindizi.
Ndakalailila Baruki mumatwi aabo, ndati,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Tambula aya magwalo, lugwalo lwamuulo lunamatikidwe aloolo lutanamatikidwe loonse, ukaabike mucipali cabulongo, kuti akale mazuba manji.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Maanda amyuunda ambeu zyamasaansa, zyoonse buyo ziyooulwa alimwi munyika ino.
Akaka Mwami Jehova! Nduwe iwakalenga ijulu anyika yoonse kunguzu zyako ziyoosya akukuboko kwako kutandabede. Taakwe cintu niciba comwe cikukacila.
Nduwe uufwida bantu bali zyuulu zyuulu luzyalo, amilandu yabubi bwabamawisi ulaiboozya amitwe yabana babo bamusule lyabo. Nduwe Leza mupati singuzu, Jehova wamakamu ndizina lyako.
Indayo zyako zilagambya, amilimo yako mipati loko, Meso aako alabonesya inzila zyoonse zyabana ba-Adamu, aboonse buyo ulabalumbula umwi aumwi bulumbu bweelede inzila zyakwe amicelo yamilimo yakwe.
Nduwe wakabika zitondezyo ziyoosya munyika ya-Egepita, mbubonya mbocicita asunu akati kaba-Israyeli aakati kabantu buyo.
Lino wakapozya bantu bako ba-Israyeli kuzwa kunyika yaEgepita azitondezyo amalele, ajanza ijumu akuboko kutandabede, aziyoosyo zipati.
Wakabapa nyika ino, nyika njiyonya njowakakonkezya kulibamawisi kubapa, nyika iikunka malili abuci.
Bakanjila, bakaivuba, pele taakwe nibakaswiilila ijwi lyako nikuba kweenda mumilao yako, taakwe nibakacita zyoonse nzowakabalailila. Nciceeco ncowabaletela mapenzi aya oonse.
Bona! Zitantaala zyakusinkinizya zya sika kumunzi kuti uzundwe. Munzi waabwa mumaanza aaba-Kasidi batulwisya, nkaambo kapanga apamba amalwazi, Caba mbubonya mbuli mbowakaamba. Ncobeni wabona obo.
Lino, O Mwami Jehova, wandaambila kuti, Ula muunda akwiita bakamboni. Anukuti munzi waabwa kale mumaanza aaba-Kasidi.
Mpawo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila Jeremiya, liti,
Bona! Ndime Jehova Leza wabantu boonse! Sa kuli cintu niciba comwe cindikacila.

Ba-Kasidi bali mukulwisya oyu munzi bayoosika, bayootenta munzi mumulilo, nkabela uyoopya, antoomwe amaanda oonse Baala ngaakatentelwa tununkilizyo atala anduli zyao, abaleza bambi nkubakatililwa zipaizyo zyakunywa kuti bandikalazye.
Nkaambo bana baIsrayeli abana ba-Juda bacita bubi luzutu mumeso aangu mazuba oonse kuzwa kubwanike bwabo. Bana ba-Israyeli bandikalazya buyo amilimo yamaanza aabo, mbwaamba Jehova,
Oyu munzi wandikalazya, wandinyemya, mazuba oonse kuzwa kubuzuba bwakuyakwa bwawo mane kusikila kubuzuba obuno, aboobo njanda kuumwaya kumeso aangu,
nkaambo kabubi boonse mbubacitide bana ba-Israyeli abana ba-Juda kukundikalazya, balo abami babo abasilutwe babo abapaizi babo abasinsimi babo, bantu ba-Juda abaabo bakede mu-Jerusalemu,
Bandipa isule, tabana kundipa busyu pe. Nekuba kuti ndakasungwaala kubaiisya, bakakaka kuswiilila nanka kutambula lulayo.
Bakabika zisesemyo zyabo muŋanda iiambwa muzina lyangu aboobo bakaisofwaazya,

Nkabela bakayaka zipaililo zya­-Baala mukuti lyamwana wa-Hinomu, kuti bapaizizye Moleki bana babo balombe abasimbi, anukuti mebo nsikwe nindakabalailila obo nikuba kuyeeya kubacitya cisesemyo cili boobo cakubisizya cisi ca-Juda.
Lino mbuboobu Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli mbwaamba aamunzi oyo ngumwaamba kuti waabwa mumaanza aamwami wa-Babuloni kupanga akupamba akumalwazi.
Ncobeni njoobayobolola kuzwa kuzisi zyoonse nkundakabamwaisizye mubukali bwangu amulunyemo lwangu amukubijilwa kwangu kuyoosya, njoobaboozya mpoonya awo akubakalika cakuliiba.
Lino bayooba bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wabo,
Nkabela njoobapa moyo omwe aciyanza comwe, kuti bandilemeke mazuba oonse, kubote kulimbabo akubana babo baciza musule lyabo,
Njootangana abo cizuminano citeeli cakutaleka kubacitila kabotu abuniini. Nkabela njoobika buyoofu bwangu mumyoyo yabo kuti bataleki kunditobela,
Kubacitila kabotu nceciyoondikonda. Njoobazikila munyika eyi njiyonya cakusyomeka camoyo wangu woonse acamiyeeyo yangu yoonse.
Lino kuyooulwa myuunda munyika ino njiyonya njimwaamba kuti, Matongo buyo, tiijisi bantu nibaba banyama, yaabwa mumaanza aaba-Kasidi.

Myuunda iyooulwa amali, aalo magwalo aamuulo ayoolembwa akunamatikwa kumeso aabakamboni baitidwe, munyika ya-Benjamini amumasena aabambene a-Jerusalemu amuminzi ya-Juda amuminzi yanyika yazilundu ayatulundulundu amuminzi ya-Negebi, nkaambo njoolobya buzike bwabo, mbwaamba Jehova.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova iwaka­ lenga nyika, iwakaibumba akwiimika, Jehova ndizina lyakwe.
Kondikwiilila, lino nookuvwiila, nookulwiida makani mapati aasisidwe ngotana kuziba.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli mbwaamba aamaanda aamumunzi uno amaanda aabami ba-Juda, aakamwayigwa kukulivuna kuzitantaala zyakusinkinizya akupanga.
Ba-Kasidi baleza kuzoolwisya akwaazuzya mitunta yabantu mbendakajaya mubukali bwangu amulunyemo lwangu, nkaambo ndasisa busyu bwangu kuzwa kumunzi uno nkaambo kabubi bwabo boonse.
Amubone! Njoouletela buumi abuponi. Njoobaponya akubayubunwida ziyobwedo zyaluumuno azyalusinizyo.
Njoolobya buzike bwa-Juda abuzike bwa-Israyeli. Njoobayakulula mbubonya mbubakabede kukutaanguna.
Njoobasalazizya milandu yazibi zyabo nzibandibisizya. Ee, njoobalekelela milandu yoonse yazibi nzibandibisizya anzibandipapila.

Nkabela oyu munzi uyoondibeda ijwi lyakukondwa alyakutembaulwa alyabulemu kumeso aabamasi boonse baansi bayoomvwa makani oonse aacoolwe ncinzoobaletela. Bayooyoowa akukankama nkaambo kabubotu boonse acoolwe coonse ncinzooleta kulinguwo,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mubusena obuno mbumwaamba kuti matongo buyo aatakwe bantu nibaba banyama, muminzi ya-Juda amumigwagwa ya-Jerusalemu iitakwe bantu nibaba banyama, muyoomvwigwa alimwi
ijwi lyakukondwa ajwi lyakusekelela, ijwi lyasibwinga ajwi lyanabwinga, ijwi lyabaabo beza bwiimba kuti,
Amulumbe Jehova wamakamu,
Nkaambo Jehova mubotu,
Nkaambo luzyalo lwakwe talweeli,
baletelela zipo zyakulumbya kuŋanda ya-Jehova. Nkaambo njooboozezya nyika coolwe mbubonya mbuli kukutaanguna, mbwaamba Jehova.

Muminzi yakumalundu, muminzi yatulundulundu, muminzi ya-Negebi, nyika ya-Benjamini, mumasena aaengelede Jerusalemu, amuminzi ya-Juda, koonse koonse kuyooinda alimwi imbelele mumaanza aabasikubala, mbwaamba Jehova.
Mumazuba­ ayo akuciindi eco njoosyuusizya Davida mutabi uululeme, uuyoobeteka kabotu akucita bululami munyika.
Lino mumazuba ayo Juda uyoofutulwa, a-Jerusalemu uyookala cakuliiba, Azina lyakwe ndyayooulikwa ndeeli: Jehova mbululami bwesu.
abalo bapaizi ba-Levi tabakooyoobula muntu uuima kubusyu bwangu wakutuuzya zipaizyo awakutenta zituuzyo zyabusu awakupaila mazuba oonse mane kukabe kutamani.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Jeremiya, liti,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Na mulakonzya kulobya cizuminano cangu casikati acamasiku, kuti ziindi zyeelede zyasikati azyamasiku zileke,

lino cizuminano cangu ncinditangene amulanda wangu Davida acalo cilakonzya kulobesegwa, kuti kumubulile mwana wakukala acuuno cabwami bwakwe, acalo cizuminano ncinditangene abapaizi ba-Levi basimilimo bangu.
Mbuli inyenyeezi zyakujulu mbuzitabaliki, awalo musenga wakunkomwe yakulwizi mbuutaelekeki, njoovuzya mbubonya inyungu zya-Davida mulanda wangu aba-Levi basimilimo bangu,
Alimwi ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Jeremiya, liti,
Sa tomvwide bantu aba mbubaamba? Bati, Inzubo zyobile Jehova nzyaakasala, sunu wazikaka. Balasampaula bantu bangu, aboobo tabacili musyobo mumeso aabo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Sa teensi ndime ndakatanga cizuminano casikati acamasiku? Sa teensi ndime ndakabika milao yakujulu ayaansi?

Na endime, lino ndakonzya kukaka inyungu zya-Jakobo azya-Davida mulanda wangu akukaka kusala umwi wabana bakwe kuti aendelezye inyungu zya-Abrahamu azya-Izaka azya-Jakobo. Nkaambo njoolobya buzike bwabo akubafwida luzyalo.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Koya ukaambaule a-Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda, ukamwaambile kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni ndaaba munzi uno mumaanza aamwami wa-Babuloni, nkabela uyooutenta mumulilo.
Ayebo tokooyooloboka kuzwa kumaanza aakwe. Ncobeni uyoojatwa akwaabwa mumaanza aakwe, elyo uyoobonana amwami waBabuloni meso kumeso, uyooambaula awe mulomo kumulomo, nkabela uyoosika ku-Babuloni.
Nekubaboobo swiilila ijwi lya-Jehova, O Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda. Mbuboobu Jehova mbwaamba aanduwe, Tokooyoojazigwa ipanga pe.

Uyoofwa aluumuno, nkabela bayookutentela tununkilizyo mbubonya mbubakatentela bamauso, bami baciindi ibakakutaangunina, akukulila cakwaamba kuti, Maawe mwami! Ngaaya makani ngendaamba, mbwaamba Jehova.

ciindi eciya basilumamba bamwami waBabuloni nibakali kulwisya Jerusalemu aminzi imwi yoonse yacisi ca-Juda iyakacisyeede, nkokuti Lakisi a-Azeka, nkaambo njenjiyo ilike minzi iili ambaya iyakacisyeede akati kaminzi yaba-Juda,
kuti baleke umwi aumwi muzike wakwe, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, kufumbwa ba-Juda, kuti boonse baangunuke, kutabi mu-Juda naba omwe iwakanjizya mu-Judanyina mubuzike.

Lino bakazumina, nkokuti basilutwe boonse abantu boonse ibakanjila mucizuminano eci cakuleka umwi aumwi muzike wakwe, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, kuti baangunuke, kutabi limbi bazike akati kabo. Bakazumina, babaangununa,
pele kabe kaindi bakatamauka, bapilusya bazike boonse, nibaba baalumi nibaba banakazi, mbebakaangunwide, bababoozya alimwi mubuzike.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Jeremiya kuzwa kuli-Jehova, liti,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Ndakatangana cizuminano abamausowanu mubuzuba obuya nindakabapozya kuzwa kunyika ya-Egepita muŋanda yabuzike, Ndakati,

Kumamanino aamyaka iili musanu aibili muleelede kwaangununa umwi aumwi muJudanyina iwakaulisigwa kulinduwe iwakakubelekela milimo myaka iili musanu aumwi, Muleelede kumwaangununa aleke milimo yako. Pele bamausowanu teebakandiswiilila nikuba kucenjeka matwi aabo pe.
Lino inywe nubasunu mwakeempwa, mwacita ziluleme mumeso aangu, mwaangununa umwi aumwi mweenzinyina, mwatanga cizuminano kubusyu bwangu muŋanda iiambwa muzina lyangu;

pele mwamana buyo kucita obo, mwatamauka, mwasampaula izina lyangu, mwapilusya umwi aumwi muzike wakwe, naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi, ngumwakaangunwide mbubonya mbubakali kuyanda, Mwababoozya alimwi mumapenzi, kuti babe bazike banu baalumi abanakazi.

Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Inywe tamuna kundiswiilila, tamuna kwaangununa umwi aumwi mwanaakwabo, umwi aumwi mweenzinyina. Lino amubone! Ndamwaangununa nywebo, mbwaamba Jehova, ndamwaangunwida ipanga amalwazi apamba. Njoomubika kuti mube ciyoosyo kuzisi zyoonse zyaansi.
Abaabo bantu ibakasotoka cizuminano cangu, ibakabula kuzuzikizya majwi aacizuminano ncibakabamba kubusyu bwangu, njoobabika mbuli impwizi bantu njibakaandula akati akweenda akati kazipanzi zyayo.
Basilutwe ba-Juda abasilutwe ba-Jerusalemu abazibe abapaizi abantu boonse banyika ibakainda akati kazipanzi zyampwizi,
njoobaaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyina amumaanza aabaabo bayandaula buumi bwabo, nkabela mitunta yabo iyooba zilyo zyabayuni bakujulu azyabanyama baansi.
Alakwe Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda, abasilutwe bakwe, njoobaaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyina amumaanza aabaabo bayandaula buumi bwabo, mumaanza aabasilumamba bamwami wa-Babuloni bamulekede.
Ncobeni njoobalailila, mbwaamba Jehova, njoobabeozya okuno kumunzi nkabela bayooulwisya akuuzunda akuutenta mumulilo. Aminzi yacisi ca-Juda njoocita kuti ibe matongo aatakalwi bantu.
Koya kuŋanda yaba-Rekabu, ukaambaule abo, alimwi kobaleta muŋanda yaJehova mukaanda kamwi akubanywisya waini.
Mpawo ndakatolelela Jazaniya mwana wa-Jeremiya mwana wa-Habazinya abana bakwabo abana bakwe boonse aluzubo loonse lwaba-Rekabu,
ndabanjizya muŋanda yaJehova, mukaanda kabana ba-Hanani mwana wa-Gedaliya muntu wa-Leza, kalibambene akaanda kabasilutwe, kali ajulu lyakaanda ka-Maaseya mwana wa-Salumu sikulindila mulyango.
Nkabela ndakabikila bana baluzubo lwaba-Rekabu nongo zizwide waini ankomeki zyakunywida, lino ndaka baambila kuti, Amunywe waini.
Pele bakati, Tatukonzyi kunywa waini pe, nkaambo Jonadabu mwana wa-Rekabu tateesu wakatulailila kuti, Tamweelede kunywa waini pe, nimuba ndinywe nibaba bana banu lyoonse mane kukabe kutamani.
Tamweelede kuyaka maanda nikuba kubyala imbuto nikuba kuzikila misaansa nikuba kuvuba zintu ezi, Muleelede kukala mumatente mazuba oonse, kuti mukakale mazuba manji mpoonya awo anyika mpomuli beenzu.

Lino twalemeka ijwi lya-Jonadabu mwana waRekabu tateesu azyoonse nzyaakatulailila. Tatunywi waini abuniini mazuba oonse, nituba ndiswe nibaba banakazi besu nibaba bana besu balombe nibaba bana besu basimbi.
Alimwi tatuyaki maanda aakukala mo, alimwi tatujisi masaansa niiba myuunda niziba imbuto.
Tulakala mumatente, tulalemeka akucita zintu zyoonse Jonadabu tateesu nzyaakatulailila.
Lino Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni naakasika kuzoolwisya nyika, twakati, Katuya ku-Jerusalemu nkaambo kabasilumamba baba-Kasidi abasilumamba baba-Aramu. Nciceeco ncitwakalila mu-Jerusalemu.
Mpawo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila Jeremiya, liti,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Koya ukaambile bantu ba-Juda abaabo bakede mu-Jerusalemu kuti, Sa tamukonzyi kulayigwa kuswiilila majwi aangu? mbwaamba Jehova.

Azuzikizigwa majwi aaJonadabu mwana wa-Rekabu ngaakalailila bana bakwe kuti batanywi waini. Tabanywi pe abuniini asunu, nkaambo balalemeka mulazyo wawisaabo. Pele mebo, nekuba kuti ndakasungwaala kumwaambila makani ciindi coonse, tamundiswiilili pe.

Ndakamutumina boonse balanda bangu basinsimi, ndasungwaala kubatuma, ndati, Amuleke umwi aumwi inzila yakwe yabubi, amubotye milimo yanu, mutatobeli baleza bambi akubamanina milimo, lino munookalilila mpoonya awo anyika njindakamupa, nywebo abamausowanu. Nekubaboobo tamuna kucenjeka matwi aanu, tamuna kundiswiilila pe.
Bana ba-Jonadabu mwana wa-Rekabu bazuzikizya mulazyo wawisaabo ngwaakabalailila, pele bantu aba tabaswiilili ndime pe.

Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Ncobeni njooletela ba-Juda abantu boonse bakede mu-Jerusalemu bubi boonse mbundakaamba kubacitila, nkaambo ndakabaambila pele tabakwe nibakandiswiilila, ndakabaita pele tabakwe nibakavuwa.
lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli, Jonadabu mwana wa-Rekabu takooyoobula muntu wakwiima kubusyu bwangu abuniini mazuba oonse mane kukabe kutamani.
Lino mumwaka wane wabwami bwa-Jehoyakimu mwana wa-Josiya mwami wa-Juda, ijwi eli lyakasika kuli-Jeremiya kuzwa kuli-Jehova. Wakaambilwa kuti,
Bweza ibbuku, ukalembe mulindilyo majwi oonse ngendakakwaambila, makani aa-Israyeli a-Juda abamasi boonse, kuzwa kubuzuba obo nindakatalika kukwaambila mumazuba aa-Josiya akusikila kubuzuba obuno.
Ambweni luzubo lwa-Juda lulaswiilila makani aamapenzi oonse ngenjeeya kubacitila, kuti baleke umwi aumwi inzila yakwe yabubi, aboobo njookonzya kubalekelela milandu yabo azibi zyabo.
Elyo Jeremiya wakalailila Baruki kuti, Mebo ndilaangidwe muntolongo, nsikonzyi kuya kuŋanda yaJehova.

Koya webo, ukabale ibbuku ndowalemba kuzwa kumulomo wangu, Bala majwi aa-Jehova mumatwi aabantu omo muŋanda yaJehova mubuzuba bwakuliimya kulya. Alimwi bala mumatwi aaba-Juda boonse basika kuzwa kuminzi yabo.
Ambweni banookomba kuli-Jehova, akuleka umwi aumwi inzila yakwe yabubi, nkaambo bwakomena bukali amakani aayoosya Jehova ngaamba aabantu aba.
Mpawo Baruki mwana wa-Neriya wakacita mbubenya Jeremiya musinsimi mbwaakamulailila. Majwi aa-Jehova aamubbuku wakaabala muŋanda ya-Jehova.

Lino Baruki wakabala mubbuku majwi aa-Jeremiya muŋanda ya-Jehova mukaanda ka-Gemariya mulembi mwana wa-Safani, Wakabala mumatwi aabantu boonse mulubuwa lwakujulu kumanjililo aamulyango mupya waŋanda ya-Jehova.
Elyo Mikaya mwana wa-Gemariya mwana wa-Safani naakamvwa majwi oonse aa-Jehova aakalembedwe mubbuku,

wakainka kuŋanda yamwami, wanjila mukaanda kamulembi, wajana basilutwe boonse balikede nkuko, Elisama mulembi a-Delaya mwana wa-Semaya a-Elinatani mwana waAkiboro a-Gemaliya mwana wa-Safani a-Zedekiya mwana wa-Hananiya abasilutwe boonse.
Nkabela Mikaya wakabalwiida majwi oonse ngaakamvwide Baruki naakabala ibbuku mumatwi aabantu.

Mpawo basilutwe boonse bakatumina Baruki. Bakamutumina Jehudi mwana wa-Netaniya mwana wa-Salamiya mwana wa-Kusi, bati, Bweza ibbuku ndowakabala mumatwi aabantu, uze alyo mujanza lyako. Lino Baruki mwana wa-Neriya wakabweza ibbuku mujanza lyakwe, wainka alyo oko nkubakabede.
Nkabela bakamwaambila kuti, Kala, ubale mumatwi esu, Elyo Baruki wakabala mumatwi aabo.
Bamvwe buyo majwi oonse, bakalangana cakuyoowa, umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina, baambila Baruki kuti, Ncobeni tulaambila mwami majwi aya oonse.
Alimwi bakabuzya Baruki kuti, Utwaambile, Wakali kulemba buti aya majwi oonse aazwa kumulomo wakwe.
Baruki wakabavwiila kuti, Wakali kundaambila majwi aya oonse amulomo wakwe, elyo mebo ndakali kwaalembya inki omo mubbuku.
Lino basilutwe bakaambila Baruki kuti, Koya kukuyuba, webo a-Jeremiya. Kutabi muntu uubwene nkumubede.
Elyo bakanjila mulubuwa mwami mwaakabede, pele ibbuku bakataanguna kulitula mukaanda ka-Elisama mulembi, Nkabela bakaamba makani oonse mumatwi aamwami.
Mpawo mwami wakatuma Jehudi kuti alete ibbuku, aboobo wakaligwisya mukaanda ka-Elisama mulembi, nkabela Jehudi wakalibala mumatwi aamwami amumatwi aabasilutwe boonse ibakaimvwi kubbazu lyamwami.
Lino mwami wakalikede muzjanda yamapeyo mumwezi wamusanu aine, amulilo wakali kuyaka munzilo kunembo lyakwe.
Nkabela kufumbwa ciindi Jehudi naakamana kubala mapepa otatwe na one, mwami wakali kutenda ibbuku akafulo, waasowa mumulilo wamunzilo.
Teebakayoowa nanka kudeluula zyakusama zyabo pe, naba mwami nibaba balanda bakwe ibakamvwa majwi aya oonse.
Elinatani a-Delaya a-Gemariya bakakumbila kumwami kuti atatenti ibbuku, pele wakakaka kumvwa.
Mpawo mwami wakalailila Jerameeli mwana wamwami a-Seraya mwana wa-Azrieli a-Selemiya mwana wa-Abidieli kuti bajate Baruki mulembi a-Jeremiya musinsimi. Nekubaboobo Jehova wakabasisa.
Bweza ibbuku alimbi, ulembe mulindilyo majwi oonse mataanzi aakali mubbuku itaanzi Jehoyakimu mwami wa-Juda ndyaakatenta.

Nkabela ngaaya makani ngoelede kwaamba aa-Jehoyakimu mwami wa-Juda, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Watenta ibbuku eli, waamba kuti, Ino nkaambonzi walemba mulindilyo kuti mwami wa-Babuloni ncobeni uleza kuzoonyonyoona nyika ino akwiimanisizya bantu abanyama boonse?

Nkaambo kako mbuboobu Jehova mbwaamba aa-Jehoyakimu mwami wa-Juda, Takukooyoomusyaalila naba omwe uukede acuuno cabwami bwa-Davida, Mutunta wakwe uyoosoowegwa antangalala azuba ciindi casikati aampeyo ciindi camasiku.

Nkabela njoomuboozezya, walo alunyungu lwakwe abalanda bakwe, milandu yazibi zyabo, Njooleta kulimbabo akubantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu akubantu ba-Juda mapenzi oonse ngendakaamba aambabo nkaambo teebakamvwa.

Mpawo Jeremiya wakabweza ibbuku alimbi, wapa Baruki mwana wa-Neriya mulembi, nkabela wakalemba mulindilyo majwi aazwa kumulomo wa-Jeremiya. Wakalemba majwi oonse aakali mubbuku Jehoyakimu mwami wa-Juda ndyaakatenta mumulilo, alimwi kwakayungizizigwa kulingao majwi amwi manji aakozyene.
Pele takwe naakabika moyo kumajwi aa-Jehova ngaakaamba kumulomo wa-Jeremiya musinsimi, naba nguwe nibaba balanda bakwe nibaba bantu banyika.
Jeremiya wakacili kuya bweendeenda akati kabantu. Kabatana kumubika muntolongo.
Ayalo impi ya-Farao yakazwa ku-Egepita, nkabela ba-Kasidi ibakali mukusinkinizya Jerusalemu nibakamvwa impuwo yayo, bakaleka kusinkinizya Jerusalemu.
Mpawo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Jeremiya musinsimi, liti,

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli. Mbuboobu mbumweelede kwaambila mwami wa-Juda iwakamutuma kulindime kuyoobuzya makani. Ncobeni impi ya-Farao iiza kukumugwasya ilapiluka kunyika yabo beni, ku-Egepita.
Nkabela ba-Kasidi bazooboola alimwi kuzoolwisya munzi uno, bazoouzunda akuutenta mumulilo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mutalyeeni. Mutayeeyi kuti ba-Kasidi bayoomuleka, nkaambo tabakooyoomuleka pe.
Ncobeni nekuba kuti mwazunda impi yoonse yaba-Kasidi bamulwisya, alimwi kuyoosyaala akati kabo bantu bayasidwe luzutu, umwi aumwi mucilao cakwe, bayoobuka akutenta munzi uno amulilo.
Lino impi yaba-Kasidi niyakaleka kusinkinizya Jerusalemu nkaambo kampi ya-Farao,
Jeremiya wakazwa mu-Jerusalemu kuti aye kucisi caBenjamini kuyoovola caabilo cakwe akati kabantu.
Lino naakali kumulyango wa-Benjamini, kakuli mulindizi, izina lyakwe kali Irija mwana waSelemiya mwana wa-Hananiya, Oyu muntu wakajata Jeremiya musinsimi, wati, Wacijila kuli ba-Kasidi!
Lino Jeremiya wakavuwa kuti, Wabeja. Nsicijili kuliba-Kasidi pe. Pele Irija wakakaka kumvwa, wajata Jeremiya, wamusisya kulibasilutwe.
Nkabela basilutwe bakakalalila Jeremiya, bamuuma, bamwaanga akumubika muŋanda ya-Jonatani mulembi, nkaambo njenjiyo njibakasandula kuba intolongo.
Aboobo Jeremiya wakanjila muŋanda yamumulindi, mutwaanda twakunsi, nkabela wakalikede nkuko mazuba manji.

Lino cibe ciindi, mwami Zedekiya wakatuma, wamugwisya, Nkabela mwami wakamubuzya kumbali kuti, Sa kuli ijwi lizwa kuli-Jehova? Jeremiya wakavuwa kuti, Nkulili. Wakati, Uyooabwa mumaanza aamwami waBabuloni.
Alimwi Jeremiya wakaambila mwami Zedekiya kuti, Ino ndakabisyanzi kulinduwe akubalanda bako akubantu aba? Nkaambonzi nowandibika muntolongo?
Bali kuli basinsimi bako ibakamusinsimina kuti, Mwami wa-Babuloni takooyoosika kulindiswe, takooyoonjila munyika eyi?
Lino kondiswiilila, O mwami simalelo wangu, Swiilila cikumbilo cangu. Utandibweedezyi kuŋanda ya-Jonatani mulembi, kuti ntafwi nkuko.

Mpawo mwami Zedekiya wakalailila kuti babike Jeremiya mulubuwa lwabalindizi, nkabela wakapegwa cinkwa comwe abuzuba kuzwa kumugwagwa wabasikujika mazuba oonse zilyo zyamumunzi nizyatakalina kumaninina. Mbuboobo Jeremiya mbwaakakala mulubuwa lwabalindizi.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, Kufumbwa muntu uusyaala mumonya mumunzi uyoojazigwa ipanga apamba abulwazi, pele oyo uuinka kuliba-Kasidi uyoopona, uyoovuba buumi bwakwe akupona.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni munzi uno uyooabwa mumaanza aampi yamwami waBabuloni, auzunde.

Lino basilutwe bakaambila mwami kuti, Oyu muntu ajayigwe, nkaambo mukwaamba majwi aali obo ulatyompya maanza aabasilumamba bacisyeede omuno mumunzi amaanza aabantu boonse. Oyu muntu tayandi kuletela bantu aba coolwe pe, ulayanda kubaletela mapenzi buyo.
Mpawo mwami Zedekiya wakati, Mbubo, uli mumaanza aanu, nkaambo mwami tajisi cintu ncakonzya kucita kumukasya.

Lino bakajata Jeremiya, bamuwaala mumulindi wa-Malikiya mwana wamwami uuli mulubuwa lwabalindizi. Bamuselusya Jeremiya antambo, nkabela omo mumulindi kamutakwe maanzi, kamuli intimba buyo, aboobo Jeremiya wakabbila mukati kantimba.
Ebedi-meleki wakanyamuka kuzwa kuŋanda yamwami kuyooambila mwami, wati,
O mwami simalelo wangu, Aba bantu babisya mumakani aya ngebacitila Jeremiya musinsimi. Bamuwaala mumulindi, lino oko inzala ilamujaya, nkaambo taakwe zilyo zicisyeede mumunzi.
Mpawo mwami wakalailila Ebedi-meleki mu-Kusi kuti, Tolelela bantu botatwe kuzwa ano, mukagwisye Jeremiya musinsimi omo mumulindi naatana kufwa.

Lino Ebedi-meleki wakatolelela bantu, waya kuŋanda yamwami, kucilondwedo kunsi lyaciyobwedo, wagwisya mumonya zisani zideluukide azyakusama zikulukulu, waziselusya intambo kuliJeremiya mumulindi mwakabede.
Nkabela Ebedi-meleki mu-Kusi wakaambila Jeremiya kuti, Kobika ezi zisani zideluukide azyakusama zikulukulu kunsi lyankwa zyako kunsi lyantambo. Lino Jeremiya wakacita obo,
nkabela bakakwela Jeremiya antambo, bamugwisya mumulindi. Lino Jeremiya wakakala mulubuwa lwabalindizi.
Elyo mwami Zedekiya wakatuma, wamwiita Jeremiya musinsimi kumanjililo aatatu aamuŋanda ya-Jehova. Nkabela mwami wakaambila Jeremiya kuti, Ndijisi cakubuzya, Utandisisili makani.
Jeremiya wakaambila Zedekiya kuti, Na ndakulwiida, sa tokooyoondijaya? Alimwi na ndakulaya, tokooyoondiswiilila.

Mpawo mwami Zedekiya wakakonkezya kuli-Jeremiya cakusisikizya kuti, Jehova mbwali muumi, ngonguwe iwakalenga myuuya yesu, ncobeni nsikooyookujaya, alimwi nsikooyookwaaba mumaanza aabantu aba bayanda kukujaya.
Pele na wakaka kwiinka kuyoolyaaba mumaanza aabasilutwe bamwami wa-Babuloni, munzi uno uyooabwa mumaanza aaba-Kasidi, nkabela bayooutenta mumulilo, ayebo tokooyooloboka kuzwa kumaanza aabo.
Lino mwami Zedekiya wakaambila Jeremiya kuti, Ndayoowa ba-Juda abo balyaabide kale mumaanza aaba-Kasidi. Ambweni bayoondipa mumaanza aabo kuti bandiwele.
Pele Jeremiya wakati, Tokooyooabwa mumaanza aabo pe, Koswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova, makani ngendakwaambila, kuti ube kabotu, ukapone,
Pele na wakaka kwiinka kuyoolyaaba, swiilila cilengano Jehova ncaanditondezya.

Ndakabena banakazi boonse bacisyeede muŋanda yamwami wa-Juda, bakali mukutolwa kulibasilutwe bamwami wa-Babuloni, nkabela bakali kwaamba kuti, Ma! Bazolwani bako bakweena, bakukoma! Maulu aako mbwaabbila mukati kantimba, bakulekelezya!
Banakazi bako abana bako boonse balabaleta kuliba-Kasidi, Tokooyooloboka kuzwa kumaanza aabo, nkaambo uyoojatwa kumaanza aamwami wa-Babuloni, nkabela munzi uno uyootentwa amulilo.
Mpawo Zedekiya wakaambila Jeremiya kuti, Kutabi muntu naba omwe uuzi majwi aya, lino tokooyoofwa pe.

Ambweni basilutwe bayooswiilila kuti twaambaula ayebo, alimwi bayoosika kulinduwe akwaamba kuti, Utulwiide makani ngowakaambaula amwami; utasisi makani kulindiswe, lino tatukooyookujaya; aalo makani mwami ngaakaamba kulinduwe, utulwiide ngao.
Lino uleelede kubaambila kuti, Ndakali kukumbila kumwami kuti atandipilusyi kuŋanda ya-Jonatani, kuti ntafwidi nkuko.
Lino ncobeni basilutwe boonse bakeza kuli-Jeremiya, bamubuzya makani. Nkabela wakabavwiila mbubonya mbuli mwami mbwaakamulailila. Lino bakaumuna, bamuleka buyo, nkaambo makani taakwe naakamvwigwa.
Elyo Jeremiya wakalikede mulubuwa lwabalindizi mane kusikila kubuzuba obo Jerusalemu nuwakazundwa.
Nkabela mumwaka wakumi aumwi wabwami bwa-Zedekiya, mumwezi wane, mubuzuba bwamusanu aane bwamumwezi, munzi wakapwayaulwa),

basilutwe boonse bamwami wa-Babuloni bakasika, bakali mumulyango waakati, Kwakasika Nerigalisarezara, Samgari Nebo, Sarisekimu mupati wabazibe, Nerigalisarezara mupati wabasilutwe, abapati bamwi boonse bamwami wa-Babuloni.
Nkabela Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda abasilumamba bakwe boonse nibakababona, bakacija, bazwa mumunzi masiku, batola inzila iinda kumuunda wamwami akati kamalambo obile, batola inzila yakuya ku-Araba.
Pele impi yaba-Kasidi yakabatobela, nkabela bakeenzya Zedekiya mumabanda aa-Jeriko, bamujata, bamuleta kuli-Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni ku-Ribila mucisi ca-Hamati, elyo wakabeteka makani aakwe.
Lino mwami wa-Babuloni wakajaya bana ba-Zedekiya kumeso aakwe oko ku-Ribila mucisi ca-Hamati, abalo basilutwe ba-Juda mwami wa-Babuloni wakabajaya.
Nkabela wakaofwaazya meso aa-Zedekiya, wamwaanzya inkeetani, wamutola ku-Babuloni.
Lino iŋanda yamwami amaanda aabantu, ba-Kasidi bakaatenta oonse amulilo, abwalo bulambo bwa-Jerusalemu bakabumwaya.
Nkabela bantu boonse ibakasyeede mumunzi, nibaba abo ibakalyaabide mumaanza aakwe nibaba abo ibakasyaala, Nebuzaradana silutwe wampi wakabatola mubuzike kuBabuloni.
Pele bamwi bantu batengwana ibatakajisi cintu, Nebuzaradana wakabasia mucisi ca-Juda, wabapa myuunda yamasaansa amyuunda imwi mubuzuba obo.
Lino Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni wakalailila aa-Jeremiya kujanza lya-Nebuzaradana silutwe wampi, wati,
Umubweze, umulange kabotu. Utamubisizyi pe, pele kufumbwa ncakwaambila, uleelede kumucitila mbubonya mbwaamba.
Lino Nebuzaradana silutwe wampi aNebusazibani mupati wabazibe a-Nerigalisarezara mupati wabasilutwe abapati boonse bamwami wa-Babuloni bakatuma,
bagwisya Jeremiya kuzwa kulubuwa lwabalindizi, bamwaaba mumaanza aa-Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu mwana wa-Safani, kuti amutole kulinguwe, aboobo wakakala akati kabantu.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Jeremiya kuciindi eco naakacijalidwe mulubuwa lwabalindizi, liti,

Koya ukaambile Ebedi-meleki muKusi kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Ncobeni njoozuzikizya majwi aangu aamunzi uno. Ngemajwi aamapenzi, taali majwi aacoolwe pe. Mubuzuba obo makani ayooboneka kumeso aako.
Pele webo, njookuvuna mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova. Tokooyooabwa mumaanza aabantu abomboyoowa.
Nkaambo ncobeni njookufutula, aboobo tokooyoojazigwa ipanga, pele buumi bwako buyooba bulumbu bwako nkaambo kakuti ulasyoma ndime, mbwaamba Jehova.
Silutwe wampi wakabweza Jeremiya, wamwaambila kuti, Jehova Leza wako nguwakaamba mapenzi aya aabusena obuno.
Jehova wakaleta makani, waazuzikizya, mbubonya mbwaakaamba, nkaambo kakuti mwakabisizya Jehova, mwakakaka kuswiilila ijwi lyakwe, aboobo mwasikilwa aya makani.

Lino bona! Buzuba obuno ndakwaangunwida inkeetani zili amaanza aako. Lino na ncibotu mumeso aako kuti twiinke ayebo ku-Babuloni, inga twaya, njookubamba kabotu, Pele na ncibi mumeso aako kuti twiinke ayebo ku-Babuloni, mbubo, ulasyaala, Bona! Nyika yoonse ili kumeso aako. Kufumbwa antu aabota akululama mumeso aako, koya mpoonya awo.

Na ulayanda kusyaala, mbubo, piluka kuli-Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu mwana waSafani, ngonguwe mwami wa-Babuloni ngwaakabika kuti aendelezye minzi ya-Juda. Koya ukakale awe akati kabantu. Kufumbwa kuntu kubota mumeso aako, koya nkuko. Lino wakamupa bulilu acipo, wamuleka kuti ainke.
Mpawo Jeremiya wakainka kuli-Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu ku-Mizipa, waakukala awe akati kabantu ibakasyeede munyika.

bakasika kuli-Gedaliya ku-Mizipa: Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya, a-Johanani a-Jonatani bana ba-Kareya, a-Seraya mwana wa-Tanumeti, abana ba-Efai waku-Netofa, a-Jezaniya mwana wamuntu waku-Maaka, balo abantu babo.
Lino Gedaliya mwana waAhikamu mwana wa-Safani wakabakonkezya, balo abantu babo, wati, Mutayoowi kumanina ba-Kasidi milimo. Amukale munyika akumanina mwami wa-Babuloni milimo, lino munookala kabotu.

Mebo ndakala ku-Mizipa kuti mbe mutabilizi kuliba-Kasidi bazoosika kulindiswe, pele nywebo amutebule waini amicelo yamainza amafuta, muzibike muzilondwedo zyanu, akukala muminzi yanu njimuyoolibwezela.

Abalo ba-Juda boonse ibakali mucisi ca-Moabu amucisi cabana ba-Amoni amucisi caEdomu amuzisi zyoonse, nibakamvwa kuti mwami wa-Babuloni wasia bantu bamwi kuti kabacisyeede mucisi ca-Juda, alimwi wababikila Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu mwana wa-Safani kuti abe mweendelezi wabo,
ba-Juda boonse bakaboola kuzwa kumasena oonse nkubakacijilide, basika kucisi caJuda kuli-Gedaliya ku-Mizipa, bakaakucela waini amicelo yamainza minji loko.
Lino Jonatani mwana wa-Kareya abasilutwe boonse babasilumamba ibakali musokwe bakasika kuli-Gedaliya ku-Mizipa,
bamwaambila kuti, Sa tozi kuti Baalisi mwami wabana ba-Amoni watuma Ismayeli mwana waNetaniya kuti anyonyoone buumi bwako? Pele Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu takakasyoma majwi aabo pe.

Mpawo Jonatani mwana wa-Kareya wakaambila Gedaliya cakusisikizya mu-Mizipa kuti, Kondizumizya kuti njiinke kuyoojaya Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya. Taakwe muntu uuti zibe pe, Sa ncibotu kuti anyonyoone buumi bwako akumwaisya ba-Juda boonse bayoboloka kulinduwe akucita kuti ba-Juda bacisyeede banyonyooke?
Pele Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu wakaambila Jonatani mwana waKareya kuti, Utaciti obo pe. Majwi ngoamba aa-Ismayeli ngaakubeja.

Mpawo Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya abantu abo bali ikumi mbaakali abo bakanyamuka, bayasa Gedaliya mwana waAhikamu mwana wa-Safani apanga, bamujaya, oyo mwami wa-Babuloni ngwaakabikide kuti aendelezye nyika.
Abalo ba-Juda boonse Gedaliya mbaakali abo ku-Mizipa, aba-Kasidi ibakajanwa mpawo, nkokuti basilumamba, boonse buyo Ismayeli wakabajaya.
Lino nibwakaca buzuba bwabili, naakamana kujaya Gedaliya, katakwe muntu iwakaziba.

Mpawo kwakasika bamwi bantu kuzwa ku-Sekemu aku-Sile aku-Samariya, bantu bali makumi aali musanu aatatu, Aba bantu bakalilinyoolede kuzilezu, azyakusama zyabo zyakalizapaukide, alimwi bakalilinengede, Bakeza azituuzyo zyabusu atununkilizyo mumaanza aabo, kuti bazilete kuŋanda ya-Jehova.
Lino Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya wakazwa ku-Mizipa kuyoobaswanaanya, weza bulila, nkabela abaswane buyo, wakabaambila kuti, Amuboole kuli-Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu.
Elyo banjile buyo mukati kamunzi, Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya abantu mbakali abo bakabajaya akubawaala mumugodi.

Pele akati kabo kwakajanwa bantu bali ikumi ibakaambila Ismayeli kuti, Utatujayi pe, nkaambo tulijisi ziyobwedo zyabulotwe abbaale amafuta abuci, zilisisidwe musokwe. Mpawo wakabaleka, taakwe naakabajaya akati kababunyina.

Lino Ismayeli wakanjizya mubuzike bantu boonse ibakasyeede ibakali ku-Mizipa, bana basimbi bamwami abantu boonse ibakasyeede ku-Mizipa, Nebuzaradana silutwe wampi mbaakapa mumaanza aa-Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu. Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya wakabanjizya mubuzike, elyo wakainka kuyoozubuka kuya kubana ba-Amoni.
bakainka abantu babo boonse kuyoolwisya Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya, Nkabela bakamujana ku-Gibeoni maanzi manji mpaabede.
Lino bantu boonse ibakali a-Ismayeli, nibakabona Johanani mwana waKareya abasilutwe boonse babasilumamba mbaakali abo, bakakondwa.
Aboobo bantu boonse Ismayeli mbaakatolede mubuzike kuzwa ku-Mizipa bakapiluka akuya kuli-Johanani mwana wa-Kareya.
Pele Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya wakaloboka abantu bali musanu abatatu kuzwa kumaanza aaJohanani akwiinka kucisi cabana ba-Amoni.

Lino Johanani mwana waKareya abasilutwe boonse babasilumamba mbaakali abo bakatolelela bantu bamwi boonse ibakasyeede, Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya mbaakatolede mubuzike kuzwa ku-Mizipa kusule lyakujaya Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu. Bakatolelela baalumi basilumamba abanakazi abana abazibe, nkokuti boonse buyo johanani mbaakapilusya kuzwa ku-Gibeoni.
Nkabela bakaakukala ku-Geruti-Kimamu uubambene a-Betelehemu. Bakali kuyeeya kuya kuEgepita,
nkaambo kaba-Kasidi, nkaambo bakali kubayoowa nkaambo kakuti Ismayeli mwana wa-Netaniya kajayide Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu, mwami wa-Babuloni ngwaakabikide kuti, aendelezye cisi.

bamwaambila kuti, Kotambula cikumbizyo cesu, ukatukombele kuli-Jehova Leza wako. Kokombela aba boonse basyeede, (nkaambo iswe netusyeede tuli bace buyo nekuba kuti twakali banji, mbubonya mbobwene ayebo),
kuti Jehova Leza wako atutondezye inzila njitweelede kutola ambutweelede kucita.

Mpawo Jeremiya musinsimi wakabaambila kuti, Ndamvwa. Ncobeni ndakomba kuli-Jehova Leza wanu, mbubonya mbumwaamba, lino kufumbwa cintu Jehova ncasi muvuwe ndamulwiida ncico, nsikoosisa cintu niciba comwe pe.
Abalo bakaambila Jeremiya kuti, Jehova abe kamboni musyomesi mulusinizyo, atupe mulandu na twakaka kucita zintu zyoonse Jehova Leza wako nzyasi twaambile. Ncobeni tunoocita mbubonya mbwaamba.
Mumakani oonse, naaba mabotu naaba mabi, tunooswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wesu ngutwakutuma kulinguwe, kuti tukajane coolwe mukuswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wesu.
Amane buyo mazuba aali ikumi, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Jeremiya.
Mpawo wakaita Johanani mwana wa-Kareya, abasilutwe boonse babasilumamba mbaakali abo, abantu boonse nibaba baniini nibaba bapati,
wabaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, ngumwakandituma kulinguwe kumutolela cikumbilo canu.
Na mwazumina kuboola kuzookala munyika ino, njoomuyaka akutamumwaya, njoomusimpika nji akutamunonkola, nkaambo ndausa insoni nkaambo kamapenzi ngendakamuletela.
Mutayoowi mwami wa-Babuloni ngumuyoowede. Mutamuyoowi, mbwaamba Jehova, nkaambo ndili anywebo kukumuvuna kuzwa kumaanza aakwe.
Njoomufwida luzyalo, kuti amufwide luzyalo akumupilusya kunyika yanu.
Pele na mwaamba kuti, Tatuyandi kukala munyika ino, aboobo mwakaka kuswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu,
na mwaamba kuti, Pe, tulaya kunyika ya-Egepita, nkututakonzya kubona inkondo nikuba kumvwa kulila kwamweembo nikuba kubula cakulya, tukakale nkuko,
lino amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova nuba-Juda basyeede, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Na mwayumya myoyo yanu akukakatila kumuyeeyo wakuya ku-Egepita kuyookala nkuko,
lino ipanga ndilyonya ndimuyoowa liyoomujana oko kunyika ya-Egepita, alyalo ipamba ndimuyoowa liyoomutobelela nkukonya ku-Egepita mane lumwi mukafwe nkuko.
Mbuboobo mbukuyooba kubantu boonse bapangika myoyo yabo kuya ku-Egepita kuyookala nkuko. Bayoojazigwa ipanga apamba amalwazi. Tabakooyoosyaalilwa naba omwe uuloboka kuzwa kumapenzi ngenjoobaletela.
Ngaayo makani Jehova ngaamwaambila nuba-Juda basyeede. Mutainki ku-Egepita pe. Ncobeni muzibe kuti ndamucenjezya buzuba obuno.
Mwalyeena nubeni, nkaambo mwakandituma kuli-Jehova Leza wanu, mwati, Utukombele kuli-Jehova Leza wako, nkabela kufumbwa cintu ncaamba Jehova Leza wesu, utulwiide ncico, lino tuyoocita mbubonya.
Lino buzuba obuno ndamulwiida makani, pele nywebo tamuswiilili ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wanu mumakani oonse ngaandituma kumwaambila.
Nkaambo kako amuzibe ncobeni kuti muyoojazigwa ipanga apamba amalwazi kubusena obo mbubonya nkumuya kwiinka kuyookala-kala.

Azariya mwana wa-Hosaya a-Johanani mwana wa-Kareya abantu boonse basizisapi bakaambila Jeremiya kuti, Ulaamba zyakubeja, Teensi Jehova Leza wesu iwakakutuma kulindiswe kukwaamba kuti, Mutainki ku-Egepita kuyookala nkuko,
Baruki mwana wa-Neriya nguwakubusya kuti utukataazye akutwaaba mumaanza aaba-Kasidi, tujayigwe na kutolwa mubuzike ku-Babuloni.
Aboobo Johanani mwana wa-Kareya abasilutwe boonse babasilumamba abantu boonse bakakaka kuswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova lyakuti, Kamukede munyika ya-Juda,
Johanani mwana wa-Kareya abasilutwe boonse babasilumamba bakatolelela ba-Juda boonse ibakacisyeede ibakaboola kuzwa kuzisi zyoonse nkubakatandilidwe kuzookala mucisi caJuda.

Bakatolelela baalumi, abanakazi, abanikenike, abana basimbi bamwami, abantu boonse Nebuzaradana silutwe wampi mbaakaabide mumaanzanza aa-Gedaliya mwana wa-Ahikamu mwana wa-Safani, alakwe Jeremiya musinsimi a-Baruki mwana wa-Neriya.
Bakainka kunyika ya-Egepita, nkaambo bakakaka kuswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova, nkabela bakasika ku-Tahapanesi.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Jeremiya oko ku-Tahapanesi, liti.
Bweza mabwe mapati mumaanza aako, ukaasise mubulongo bwakumatya muzitina zyakumanjililo aaŋanda ya-Farao mu-Tahapanesi, mumeso aabantu ba-Juda.

Lino uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Amuswiilile! Ncobeni njootuma akubweza mulanda wangu Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni, nkabela uyoobika cuuno cakwe cabwami atala lyamabwe aya ngendasisa akuyala itente lyakwe atala alingawo.
Uyoosika akuuma nyika ya-Egepita, Kufumbwa uubikilidwe lufu uyootolwa kulufu, ayooyo uubikilidwe buzike uyootolwa mubuzike, ayooyo uubikilidwe ipanga uyootolwa ipanga.

Njoodukula mulilo mumaanda aabaleza ba-Egepita, nkabela uyoobatenta akubatola mubuzike. Uyoolisamika nyika ya-Egepita mbubonya mbuli mweembeli mbwalisamika cibaki cakwe, elyo uyoozwa mulinjiyo aluumuno.
Alimwi uyoomwaya ziimikilo zyamunzi wazuba uuli munyika ya-Egepita, aalo maanda aabaleza ba-Egepita uyooatenta mumulilo.
Mbuboobu mbwa amba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Mulibwene mapenzi oonse ngendaleta kuJerusalemu akuminzi ya-Juda, Mwabona kuti sunu yaba matongo buyo. Taakwe muntu naba omwe uukala mulinjiyo.
Akaba obo nkaambo kabubi bwabo, nkaambo bakandikalazya kukuya kuyootentela mizimu imbi tununkilizyo akwiimanina milimo, mizimu njibatezi, nibaba balo nimuba inywe nibaba bamausowanu.
Nkabela ndakasungwaala kumutumina balanda bangu boonse basinsimi, ndati, Mutaciti cintu eci cisesemya ncinsulide.
Nekubaboobo teebakaswiilila nikuba kucenjeka matwi aabo nikuba kuleka bubi bwabo kukutatentela mizimu imbi tununkilizyo.
Elyo bukali bwangu buyoosya bwakatika, bwakapya muminzi ya-Juda amumigwagwa ya-Jerusalemu, aboobo yakaba matongo aatakwe bantu mbubonya mbwii-bede sunu.

Lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Ino nkaambonzi mulalicitila nubeni bubi bupati buli boobu, buti nyonyoone mucisi ca-Juda baalumi abanakazi, bana abaabo bacinyonka boonse, akutamusiila naba omwe uusyeede.

Nkaambonzi nimwandikalazya kumilimo yamaanza aanu, kukutentela baleza bambi tununkilizyo okuno kunyika ya-Egepita nkumwasika kukala. Sa ncibotu kuti munyonyooke akuba ijwi lyakutusya alyakusampauzya akati kabamasi boonse baansi?
Sa mwaluba bubi bwabamausowanu abubi bwabami ba-Juda abubi bwabanakazi babo abubi bwanu abubi bwabanakazi banu mbubakacita mucisi ca-Juda amumigwagwa ya-Jerusalemu?
Tabana kulibombya abuniini mane kusikila asunu. Tabana kuyoowa nikuba kweenda mumulao wangu amumilazyo yangu njindakamubikila, inywe abamausowanu.

Njoobweza ba-Juda bacisyeede, babikide myoyo yabo kukulongela kunyika ya-Egepita, nkabela bayoomaninina boonse mumonya munyika ya-Egepita. Bayoojazigwa ipanga, acimpayuma ciyoobamanisya. Boonse buyo, nibaba baniini nibaba bapati, bayoojazigwa ipanga acimpayuma, nkabela bayooba lukwanzo aciyoosyo, bayootukilwa akusampaulwa.
Abo bakede munyika ya-Egepita, njoobauma mbubonya mbundakauma Jerusalemu. Njoobaumya ipanga apamba abulwazi.

Takukooyooba naba omwe akati kaba-Juda bacisyeede basika kuzookala munyika ya-Egepita uuti kaloboke nanka kulivuna nanka kubweeda kunyika ya-Juda nkubayandisya kuya kuti bakale nkuko. Taakwe uuyoopiluka pe, cita bamwi bacija,

Lino baalumi boonse ibakezi kuti banakazi babo balatentela baleza bambi tununkilizyo, abanakazi boonse ibakaimvwi nkuko, imbungano impati, abantu boonse ibakakede mu-Patirosi munyika ya-Egepita, bakavwiila Jeremiya kuti,
Aya makani ngewatwaambila muzina lya-Jehova tatukooaswiilila pe.

Ncobeni tulacita oonse makani ngetwasyomezya. Tulatentela mwami mwanakazi wakujulu tununkilizyo akumutilila zipaizyo zyakunywa, mbubonya mbutwakali kucita, iswe abamatata, bami besu abasilutwe besu, muminzi ya-Juda amumigwagwa ya-Jerusalemu. Nkaambo kuciindi eco twakali kukuta insima akujana coolwe akutabona mapenzi,
pele kuzwa kuciindi eco nitwakaleka kutentela mwami mwanakazi wakujulu tununkilizyo akumutilila zipaizyo twakabula zintu zyoonse, alimwi ipanga apamba zilatumanisya.

Abalo banakazi bakati, Kuciindi eco nitwakali kutentela mwami mwanakazi wakujulu tununkilizyo akumutilila zipaizyo zyakunywa, sa teensi balumi besu ibakatuzumizya kumucitila zibunge zyakupaizya akumutilila zipaizyo zyakunywa?
Mpawo Jeremiya wakaambila bantu boonse, nibaba baalumi nibaba banakazi, bantu boonse ibakamuvwiila obo, wati,

Ma! Oto tununkilizyo ntumwakali kutenta muminzi ya-Juda amumigwagwa ya-Jerusalemu, inywe abamausowanu, bami banu abasilutwe banu abantu boonse banyika, sa Jehova taakwe naakatumvwa? Sa makani aato taakwe naakanjila mumoyo wakwe?
Jehova wakacimwa kulemenwa bubi bwancito zyanu azisesemyo nzimwakali kucita. Nciceeco nyika yanu nciyabeda matongo aayoosya acitukizyo aabula bantu bakede mulinjiyo, mbwiibede sunu.

Nkekaambo kakutenta tununkilizyo, akaambo kakubisizya Jehova, akaambo kakutalemeka ijwi lya-Jehova akuteenda mumulao wakwe amumilazyo yakwe amumbeta zyakwe, ncaamusikila mapenzi aya oonse aaboneka sunu,

Mbuboobu mbwa amba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Inywe abanakazi banu mwaamba kumilomo yanu, alimwi mwazuzikizya kumaanza aanu ijwi lyakuti, Ncobeni tulacita mbubonya mbutwakakonkezya. Tunootentela mwami mwanakazi wakujulu tununkilizyo akumutilila zipaizyo zyakunywa. Mbubo, kamucita mbuli mbumwakasyomezya; amuzuzikizye makani ayo ngaonya ngemwakakonkezya.

Pele amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova, nyoonse nuba-Juda nemukede munyika ya-Egepita. Ncobeni ndakonkezya muzina lyangu idemu, mbwaamba Jehova, kuti izina lyangu talikooyooambwa limbi mumulomo wamuntu naba omwe wamusyobo wa-Juda munyika yoonse ya-Egepita. Takukooyooambwa limbi kuti Mwami Jehova mbwali muumi.
Ncobeni ndabalangilila cakubaletela mapenzi, nsikoobalangilila kukubaletela coolwe pe. Bantu boonse ba-Juda bali munyika ya-Egepita bayoojazigwa ipanga apamba mane lumwi bakamaninine.

Abo baloboka kuzwa kupanga akupiluka kucisi ca-Juda kuzwa kunyika ya-Egepita bayooba bace buyo, aboobo ba-Juda boonse bacisyeede, nkokuti boonse ibeza kuzookalakala munyika ya-Egepita, bayooziba na ijwi liti zuzikizigwe ndelili, niliba lyangu niliba lyabo.
Nkabela nceeci citondezyo ncenti mupe, mbwaamba Jehova, citondezyo cakumuzibya kuti ncobeni njoomuuma mpoonya ano, kuti muzibe kasimpe kuti majwi aangu ngaazoozuzikizigwa kukumuletela mapenzi.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni njooaba Farao Hofra mwami wa-Egepita mumaanza aabasinkondonyina amumaanza aabaabo bayanda kunyonyoona buumi bwakwe, mbubonya mbundakaaba Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda mumaanza aasinkondonyina iwakali kuyanda kumunyonyoona, nkokuti mumaanza aa-Nebukadinezara mwami waBabuloni.
Mbuboobu Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli mbwaamba aanduwe, O Baruki.
Waamba kuti, Maawe! Ndapenga! Nkaambo Jehova wayungizizya buusu amapenzi aangu. Ndakataala kutongela. Nsijani kulyokezya pe.
Mbuboobu mboelede kumwaambila. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni ncindakayaka ndacimwaya, ancindakabyala­ ndacinonkola, nkukuti nyika yoonse,

Lino webo, sa ulaliyandawida zintu zipati? Utaziyandauli pe. Nkaambo ncobeni njooletela bantu boonse buyo mapenzi, mbwaamba Jehova, pele buumi bwako, njookupa mbubo bube bulumbu bwako koonse koonse kufumbwa nkoya.

Ngaaya makani aa-Egepita, makani aabasilumamba ba-Farao-Neko mwami wa-Egepita, ibakali kumbali lyamulonga wa-Firate ku-Karikemisi, Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni mbaakazunda mumwaka wane wabwami bwa-Jehoyakimu mwana wa-Josiya mwami wa-Juda.
Amwaange imbizi, mutante nubasimbizi. Amulibambe angoani zyanu, Amusyobole masumo aanu. Amusame zibaki zyankondo.
Ma! Ndabona nzi? Nkaambonzi bayoowa akupiluka kunsi? Baalumi babo basintaze bazundwa, bafwambaana kucija! Tabacebuki musule pe! Zintu ziyoosya nkuzili koonse koonse! mbwaamba Jehova.
Siluno ataciji, alakwe silumamba sintaze ataloboki. Kulubazu lwakunyika, kunkomwe yamulonga wa-Firate, nkokuko nkubalebwa, nkubawida.
Egepita nguufutumuka mbuli mulonga wa­-Nile, Nguujisi maanzi aayuwana mbuli milonga. Waamba kuti, Nkafutumuke akuvumba nyika yoonse, nkanyonyoone minzi abantu bakede mulinjiyo,
Amweendesye nobasimbizi, amulitakate nobasinkalaki. Basilumamba bainke kuyoolwisya, bantu ba-Kusi aba-Puti bajisi intobo, aba­-Ludi babwene kubelesya mata,

Obo buzuba mbobuzuba bwa-Mwami Jehova wamakamu, buzuba bwakuliya inkoto, kuti aliye inkoto kulibasinkondonyina. Ipanga liyoolya akukuta, liyookolwa bulowa. Nkaambo Mwami Jehova wamakamu ulijisi ipobwe lyakupaizya kucisi cakunyika, kumbali lyamulonga wa-Firate.
Koya ku-Gileadi, ukabweze mabbona, O mwana musimbi wa-Egepita. Misamu minji njobelesya njabuyo, tokwe nosi ponezegwe pe.
Bamasi balimvwide impuwo yabweeme bwako, anyika ilizwide kulila kwako, nkaambo silumamba walebwa kuli silumambanyina, aboobo boonse bobile bawa antoomwe.
Amulungulule makani mu-Egepita, amvwigwe mu-Migidoli. Makani amvwigwe mu-Nofi amu-Tahapanesi. Amwaambe kuti, Amwiimikile akulibamba, nkaambo ipanga lilaya bunyonyoona koonse koonse.
Ino Apisi wacijilanzi? Nkaambonzi sintaze wako wakakacilwa kwiima nji? Nkaambo kakuti Jehova nguwakamutanda.
Makamu makamu aabantu bako, boonse bakalebwa, bawa, baamba umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina kuti, Amunyamuke, tupiluke kubantu besu akunyika yabuzyalwe bwesu, nkaambo kapanga lyasikupenzya.
Farao mwami wa-Egepita, amumuulike izina lya-Sicikwala uusowa ciindi buyo.
Mbubonya mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami, izina lyakwe ngu-Jehova wamakamu, kuyoosika umwi mupati uuli mbuli Tabori akati kazilundu ambuli Karameli kumbali lyalwizi.
Amulibambile impasya zyakutolelela mubuzike, O mwana musimbi nokede mu-Egepita, nkaambo Nofi uyooba matongo, uyoopya mane ukabule bantu bakala mumo.
Egepita nimpwizi iiebeka loko, pele muzimbwa uuzwa kunyika ulimukede.
Basilumamba bakwe baulidwe bali mukati kacisi bali mbuli boombe baneneede. Boonse buyo bapiluka, bacija, teebaima pe, nkaambo ciindi camapenzi aabo casika, ciindi cabo cakuumwa.
Ulaya bupoota mbuli inzoka, nkaambo basinkondonyina baleenda anguzu, bamusikila atuleba, mbuli basikugonka misamu.
Bayoogonka lusaka lwakwe, mbwa amba Jehova, nekuba kuti lulisinkide, nkaambo mbanji loko kwiinda cisozi, mweelwe wabo tuubaliki pe.
Mwana musimbi wa­-Egepita uyoousigwa bweeme, uyooabwa mumaanza aabantu bazwa kunyika,

Njoobaaba mumaanza aabaabo bayanda kunyonyoona buumi bwabo, nkukuti mumaanza aa-Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni amumaanza aabalanda bakwe. Lino kusule lyayaaya cisi ca-Egepita ciyookalwa mbubonya mbuli mumazuba aakalekale, mbwaamba Jehova,

Utayoowi, o Jakobo mulanda wangu, mbwaamba Jehova, nkaambo mebo ndi anywe. Misyobo yoonse njindakamumwayila akati kayo, njooimaninizya, pele nywebo nsikooyoomumaninizya pe. Njoomuuma muciyanza ceelede buyo, nsikooyoomuleka buyo.
Imvwigwe buyo misindo yansumba zyambizi zyakwe, akukonkonzya kwankalaki zyakwe, akutendeleka kwamavili aakwe, bantu tabacebuki nikuba kugwasya bana babo, nkaambo maanza aabo matete,

nkaambo kabuzuba buti sike kuzoonyonyoona ba-Filisti boonse akumaninizya basikugwasya boonse bacisyeede ku-Turo aku-Sidoni. Nkaambo Jehova ulanyonyoona ba-Filisti aboonse bacisyeede muzisi zyakunkomwe zyaba-Kafitori.
Gaza waba alubala, Asikeloni wanyonyooka. Inywe nuba-Anakimu bacisyeede, muyooleka lili kulinengaula?
Akaka, O panga lya-Jehova, uyooleka lili kukaka kuumuna? Piluka mumukutu wako, ukapumune akutontola.
Ma! Lilakonzya kuumuna buti? Jehova nguwalipa mulazyo wakulwisya Asikeloni ankomwe yalwizi. Ngonguwe wakali tuma.
Moabu tatembaulwi limbi. Mu-Hesiboni bakakanza kumubisizya, bati, Amuboole, tumugonke, atabi limbi musyobo. Ayebo O Madimeni uyooumuzigwa, apanga liyookutobela.
Swiilila! Ijwi lyakulila lyamvwigwa kuzwa ku-Horonaimu; kuli lunyonyooko akusaalwa kuyoosya.
Moabu wanyonyooka! Kulila kulamvwigwa aku-Zoari.
Balaya butanta kuya ku-Luhiti, balaya bulila, nkaambo munzila iiseluka ku-Horonaimu bamvwa cililo calunyonyooko.
Amucije! Amulivune! Amube mbuli imbongolo zyamusokwe.
Mwakali kusyoma milimo yamaanza aanu aziyobwedo zyanu, aboobo muyoozundwa. Kemosi uyoonjila mubuzike, walo abapaizi bakwe abasilutwe bakwe boonse,
Sikunyonyoona ulasika kuzoolwisya minzi yoonse, Takukooyooba munzi nuuba omwe uuloboka. Ikuti liyoonyonyoonwa abanda lyoonse liyoomaninina, mbubonya mbwaakaamba Jehova,
Amupe Moabu mababa, kuti auluke akuloboka. Minzi yakwe iyooba matongo, iyoobula bantu bakukala mulinjiyo.
Atukilwe oyo uucita milimo ya-Jehova camyoyo yobile, alakwe uukasya ipanga lyakwe kukutila bulowa.
Nkaambo kako mumazuba aaboola, mbwaamba Jehova, njoomutuma kulibasikutuntumuna, kuti bamutuntumune nkabela bayootila nongo zyakwe, ankomo zyakwe zyoonse bayoozikwamauna.
Lino Moabu uyoofwa bweeme nkaambo ka-Kemosi, mbubonya mbuli luzubo lwa-Israyeli mbulwakafwa bweeme nkaambo ka-Beteli ngubakali kusyoma.
Kwasika sikunyonyoona Moabu aminzi yakwe, lino bakubusi bakwe boonse babotu baya kucijayilo, mbwaamba Mwami, izina lyakwe ngu-Jehova wamakamu.
Mapenzi aa-Moabu ali afwaafwi, mafwabi aakwe alafwambaana kusika,
Amumulile, nyoonse nomubambene awe, anyoonse nemuzi izina lyakwe. Amwaambe kuti, Maawe! Watyoka buti musako muyumu, mufunko uuebeka?
Ima kumbali lyamugwagwa, ulangilizye, uwe nokede ku-Aroeri, Buzya mwaalumi uucija amwanakazi uuloboka kuti, Mwaba anzi?
Moabu wafwisigwa bweeme, nkaambo wasaalwa! Amuwuule akulila! Amuluule makani ku-Arinoni, makani aakumwayigwa kwaMoabu.
Lubeta lwasika kunyika yamumweezi, ku-Holoni, aku-Jahaza, akuMefati,
aku-Diboni, aku-Nebo, aku-Beti-Dibilataimu,
aku-Kiriyataimu, aku-Beti-Gamuli, aku-Beti-Meoni,
aku-Kerioti, aku-Bozira, akuminzi yoonse yacisi ca-Moabu, niiba iili kule niiba iili kufwaafwi.
Meja aa-Moabu akompoka, akwalo kuboko kwakwe kwatyoka, mbwaamba Jehova.
Sa Israyeli takakali cisesyo mumeso aako? Sa wakajanwa akati kababbi? Ino nkaambonzi wakali kumuguninagunina amutwe wako?
Twamvwa makani aakulisumpula kwa-Moabu. Walisumpula loko. Twamvwa makani aakulisumpula kwakwe akantukantu kakwe akusampaula kwakwe akulikankaizya kwamoyo wakwe.
Mebo ndibwene kusampaula kwakwe, mbwaamba Jehova. Cisapi cakwe ncabuyo, tacikwe milimo pe.
Nkaambo kako ndalilila Moabu, ndalila ba-Moabu boonse, abantu ba-Kiriheresi ndabakwiilila.
Ndamulilila numisaansa ya-Sibima, kwiinda kulila kwaJazeri. Mitabi yanu yakaindilila kulwizi, yaakutana akulwizi lwa-Jazeri. Micelo yako yamainza amasaansa aako, sikusaala wazitola zyoonse buyo.

Lwafwa lukondo abusekelezi boonse mumyuunda yambolezi amoonse munyika ya-Moabu. Ndalesya waini muzisinino. Taakwe uuzilyataula cakukondwa, Kwamvwigwa koongolola, pele teensi koongolola kwakukondwa pe.
Nkabela njoomanizya mucisi ca-Moabu, mbwaamba Jehova, oyo uutuula acipaililo cakucilundu ayooyo uutentela Leza wakwe tununkilizyo,
Nkaambo kako moyo wangu ulalilila Moabu mbuli kantimbwa, moyo wangu ulalilila bantu ba-Kiriheresi mbuli kantimbwa, nkaambo buvubi boonse mbubavubide bwamaninina.
Atala lyanduli zyamaanda aa-Moabu, amumigwagwa yabo yoonse, mulizwide kulila luzutu, nkaambo ndipwayide cisi ca-Moabu mbubonya mbwiipwayidwe nongo iitayandwa kumuntu, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ma! Wapwayika! Balalila! Moabu wapa sule cakufwa bweeme! Lino Moabu uyooba cisesyo aciyoosyo kuliboonse bamweengelede.
Minzi yajatwa, abaabo bali mumampangala bazundwa! Lino mubuzuba obo myoyo yabasilumamba basintaze ba-Moabu iyooba mbuli moyo wamwanakazi uuyanda kutumbuka.
Moabu uyoonyonyoonwa, uyoomaninwa bantu, nkaambo kakuti balilisumpwide kuli-Jehova.
Kuyoowa amulindi akakole, zyoonse zilimujisi, inywe nomukede mucisi ca-Moabu, mbwaamba Jehova.
Lino kufumbwa uucija ijwi lyakuyoowa uyoowida mumulindi, ayooyo uuzwa mumulindi kayoomujata kakole, nkaambo ba-Moabu njoobaletela mwaka wakukomwa kwabo, mbwaamba Jehova.
Maawe kulinduwe, O Moabu! Bantu ba-Kemosi banyonyooka, nkaambo bana bako balombe batolwa mubuzike, abalo bana bako basimbi baba bazike.
Nekubaboobo kumamanino aaciindi njoolobya buzike bwa-Moabu, mbwaamba Jehova. Mpoonya awa mpaaela makani aalubeteko lwa-Moabu.

Ncobeni mumazuba aaboola, mbwaamba Jehova, njoocita kuti cililo cankondo cimvwigwe mu-Raba wabana ba-Amoni, nkabela uyooba cilwi camafwisila citakalwi bantu, atunzuunzi twawo tuyootentwa mumulilo. Lino ba-Israyeli bayookona imbono zyabaabo ibakabavubide, mbwaamba Jehova.

Kolila, O Hesiboni, nkaambo Ai wasaalwa. Amukwiile, nubana basimbi ba-Raba, amulisamike zisani zyamasaka, amoomoke akuzembaana akati kambaya, nkaambo Milikomi uyootolwa mubuzike, abapaizi bakwe abasilutwe bakwe boonse antoomwe.
Nkaambonzi nolikankaizizya ikuti lyako, ikuti lyako liwalama maanzi, O mwana musimbi uutakwe lusyomo? Nkaambonzi nosyoma ziyobwedo zyako cakwaamba kuti, Taakwe uukonzya kusika kulindime?
Ncobeni njookuletela ciyoosya, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova wamakamu. Cilazwa kuliboonse beengelede, lino muyootandwa, umwi aumwi unooya cakululama, nkabela takukooyooba naba omwe wakubunganya bamwaikide.
Lino kusule lyayaaya njooboozya bana ba-Amoni batoledwe mubuzike, mbwaamba Jehova.
Amucije, mupiluke, mukakale kule mulusaka, nubantu ba-Dedani, nkaambo njooletela Esau mapenzi ninjoomuuma.
Ma! Nikwakali kuti wakasikilwa basikucela misaansa, sa teebakali kunoosia micelo imwi na? Nikwakali kuti babbi bakeza kulinduwe, nanka bafumpi beza masiku, sa teebakali kunoobba cakukuta buyo na?
Pele mebo, Esau ndamusamunwida limwi, ndavumbulula mayubilo aakwe, takonzyi kulisisa. Lunyungu lwakwe lwanyonyooka, abalo babunyina bakwe abeenzinyina. Tako limbi pe.
Amuleke bamucaala banu, njoobaponya; abalo bamukabafu banu basyome ndime.
Nkaambo ndakonkezya muzina lyangu ndemwini, mbwaamba Jehova, kuti Bozira uyooba lusampauko akasimpi, ijwi lyakuweezya alyakutukizya, atunzuunzi twawo toonse tuyooba matongo kukabe kutamani,
Nkaambo ndacita kuti ube muniini buyo akati kabamasi, uusampukide akati kabantu.

Kuyoosya kwako kwakweena, akulisumpula kwamoyo wako, uwe nokede munanzi zyamumandomba, noli acikalilo cakujulu. Nekuba kuti uyake citeente cako kujulu loko mbuli insika, akooko njookuselusya, mbwaamba Jehova.
Kuyooba mbubonya mbuli ciindi eciya Leza naakamwaya Sodoma aGomora aminzi imwi iibambene anjiyo, mbwaamba Jehova. Takukooyooba muntu uukala nkuko, takukooyooba sikukalakala naba omwe pe.

Ncobeni mbuli mulavu uuzwa mulusaka lwa-Jordano kuzoolwanisya cimpati ciyumu, njooboongomokela mbubonya akubamwaisya, nkabela kufumbwa uusalidwe njoomubika kuti abe mweendelezi. Nkaambo nguni uuli mbuli ndime? Nguni uukonzya kundibikila ciindi cakulwana? Nguni mweembeli uukonzya kwiima nji kubusyu bwangu?
Lino amuswiilile lulayo lwaJehova ndwaalailila aa-Edomu, amakanze aakwe ngaakanza aabantu ba-Temani, Ncobeni baniini babutanga bayookwelwa, acimpati cabo ciyoogamba kumakani,
Nyika ilazungaana kujwi lyabuwe bwabo, akulila kwabo kulamvwigwa aku-Lwizi Lusalala.
Amubone! Ulafuuma mbuli sikwaze, ulatandabika mababa aakwe atala lya-Bozira, lino mubuzuba obo myoyo yabaalumi basintaze ba-Edomu iyooba mbuli moyo wamwanakazi uuyanda kutumbuka.
Damasko walebuluka, wapiluka kuti acije. Kukankama kwamujata. Mapenzi amacise alimujisi mbubonya mbuli mwanakazi uuyanda kutumbuka,
Ma! Wasiigwa buti munzi uuli ampuwo, munzi wakukondwa?
Bakubusi bawo balawa mumigwagwa yawo. Basilumamba bawo boonse bayoonyonyooka mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Njoodukula mulilo mubulambo bwa-Damasko, nkabela uyootenta maanda aabwami aa-Beni-Hadadi.
Zilao zyabo ambelele zyabo ziyootolwa, azyalo zisitilizyo zyabo ambono zyabo zyoonse. Inkamela zyabo bayoozinyanzigwa, nkabela bayooambwa kuti, Ziyoosya nkuzili koonse koonse.
Amucije, mupiluke, mukakale kule loko mulusaka, nubantu ba-Hazori, mbwaamba Jehova, nkaambo Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni ulikanzide ndinywe, ulijisi miyeeyo njayeeya aandinywe.
Amunyamuke, mukalwisye musyobo wabantu uuliibide, uukede cakutontola buyo, mbwaamba Jehova; uutajisi zitendele naaba mankolo, uukede aulike.
Inkamela zyabo ziyoosaalwa, amatanga aabo aaŋombe ayootolwa, Njoobamwaisya kumabazu oonse, abo bantu boonse balinyoola mumpanza. Njoobaletela mapenzi aazwa koonse koonse, mbwaamba Jehova.
Lino Hazori uyooba luumbo lwabamwaaba, uyooba matongo buyo kukabe kutamani. Takukooyooba bantu bakala nkuko, abana baAdamu tabakooyookalakala mulingao.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Amubone! Ndatyola buta bwa-Elamu, cintu cipati munguzu zyabo.
Nkabela njooletela Elamu myuuwo yoonse yone kuzwa kuzyooko zyone zyakujulu, lino njoobamwaisya kuzyooko ezyo zyoonse, aboobo takukooyooba cisi niciba cimwi ba-Elamu batandidwe nkubatakooyoosika.

Njooyoosya ba-Elamu kubusyu bwabasinkondonyina akubusyu bwabaabo bayanda kunyonyoona buumi bwabo. Njoobaletela mapenzi, bukali bwangu buyoosya, mbwaamba Jehova. Njootuma ipanga kuti kaiiya bubatobela, mane lumwi nkabamaninizye.
Alimwi njoobika cuuno cangu cabwami mucisi ca-Elamu akujaya nkukonya oko mwami abasilutwe boonse, mbwaamba Jehova.
Pele kumamanino aaciindi njoolobya alimwi buzike bwa-Elamu, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo kulubazu lwakunyika kwazwa musyobo wabantu kuzoomulwisya. Oyu musyobo uyoonyonyoona nyika yakwe, ibe matongo, itakalwi abuniini. Bantu abanyama boonse baicija, baya.
Bayoobuzya inzila iiya ku-Zioni akulanzya masyu aabo nkukonya oko. Bayooamba kuti, Amuboole, tuliswangaanye kuliJehova, tutangane awe cizuminano citamani citakonzya kulubwa.
Bantu bangu bakali imbelele ziswekede. Basikuzyeembela mbobakazileesya akuzituntulisya atala lyazilundu. Zilaya bweendeenda kuzwa kucilundu kusikila kutulundulundu, acibutilo cazyo zilicilubide.
Boonse ibakazijana bakali kuziluma, abasinkondonyina bakaamba kuti, Taakwe ncitwabisya pe, nkaambo bakabisizya Jehova, cikalilo cabululami, Jehova bamawisaabo ngubakali kusyoma.

Nkaambo amubone! Ndabusya makamu makamu aabamasi kuzwa kucisi cakunyika, ndabaleta kuzoolwisya Babuloni, nkabela bayoolibamba mumindando mane akazundwe, Mivwi yabo ili mbubonya mbuli silumamba uucenjede uutakonzyi kuboola buyo.
Ba-Kasidi bayoosaalwa, aboonse basikubasaala bayoolamwa, mbwaamba Jehova.
banyoko bayoofwa bweeme, ayooyo iwakamuzyala uyoousigwa insoni. Ncobeni uyooba musyaalizi akati kamisyobo yabantu, uyooba matongo buyo aamunkanda iibula maanzi,
Nkaambo kabukali bwa-Jehova takooyookalwa, uyooba matongo aagambya. Boonse bainda ku-Babuloni bayoogamba, bayoosabula nkaambo kazyuumo zyakwe zyoonse.
Amulibambe kulwisya Babuloni, mumuzyunguluke, nyoonse nubasimata. Amumufuse, mutaleki mivwi yanu, nkaambo wabisizya Jehova.
Amumuyowelele koonse koonse! Langa! Walikombela kale! Malinga aakwe awa, amalambo aakwe amwayigwa!
Amunyonweede Babuloni sikubyala ayooyo uubelesya cigonsyo kuciindi cakutebula, Nkaambo kapanga lyasikupenzya bayoocija, umwi aumwi kubantu bakwe, umwi aumwi kunyika yakwa bo.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Ncobeni njoouma mwami wa-Babuloni anyika yakwe, mbubonya mbundakauma mwami wa-Asuri,
Njooboozya Israyeli kumacelelo aakwe, lino uyoocela ku-Karimeli aku-Basani, uyookuta kuzilundu zya-Efraimu azya-Gileadi.
Lino mumazuba ayo akuciindi eco, mbwaamba Jehova, milandu ya-Israyeli iyooyandaulwa pele tiikooyooba wo, azyalo zibi zya-Juda pele tazikooyoojanwa pe, nkaambo abo mbundasyaazya njoobalekelela.
Ijwi lyankondo lyamvwigwa munyika alunyonyooko lupati.
Ma! Insando iiuma nyika yoonse yakosoka, yapwayika buti? Babuloni waba buti cigambyo akati kabamasi!
Ndakateya ikole, O Babuloni, aboobo wakacegwa kotezi. Wakajanwa, wajatwa, nkaambo wakakazyanya a-Jehova.
Jehova wajalula ciyobwedo cakwe, wagwisya zilwisyo zyabukali bwakwe, nkaambo Mwami Jehova wamakamu ulijisi milimo munyika yaba-Kasidi.
Amuboole kuzoomulwisya kuzwa kumabazu oonse. Amujalule matala aakwe. Amumulundike mbuli zilwi, mumunyonyoone, kutasyaali kapanzi kakwe nikaba kaniini.
Amujaye bapoho bakwe boonse, bainke kucijayilo. Maawe kulimbabo, nkaambo buzuba bwabo bwasika, aciindi camapenzi aabo.

Amwiite basimata ku-Babuloni, boonse babwene kufusa. Amuyake zilao zyakumusinkinizya koonse koonse. Kutabi naba omwe uuloboka. Amumubweedezye bulumbu bweelede bwamilimo yakwe. Amumucitile muzintu zyoonse mbubonya mbwaakacita, nkaambo wakalilisumpwide kumeso aa-Jehova, Uusalala wa-Israyeli.
Nkaambo kako bakubusi bakwe bayoowa mumigwagwa, abasilumamba bakwe boonse bayoomanisigwa mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova.
Bona! Ndaba sinkondonyoko, webo oolisumpula, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova wamakamu, nkaambo buzuba bwako bwasika, ciindi ncinjanda kukuuma,
Sikantukantu uyoolebwa, uyoowa, uyoobula wakumubukulusya, nkabela njoodukula mulilo muminzi yakwe uuyoolya zyoonse zimweengelede.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Bana ba-Israyeli abana ba-Juda, boonse buyo bapenzegwa. Boonse ibakabatola mubuzike balabajatisya, bakaka kubaangununa.
Munununi wabo muyumu, Jehova wamakamu ndizina lyakwe. Ncobeni uyookosola kabotu lubeta lwabo, kuti atontozye nyika, abantu ba-Babuloni uyoobanyonyonganya.
Ipanga lyasikila basikantu-kantu, kuti bafubaazigwe. Ipanga lyasikila basilumamba kuti bapwayigwe.
Ipanga lyasikila imbizi zyabo ankalaki zyabo abantu bavwelene bali mukati kawo, nkabela bayooba zyanakazi buyo. Ipanga lyasikila zintu zyawo ziyandisi, kuti zisaalwe.
Cimpayuma casikila maanzi aawo, kuti ayuminme. Nkaambo ninyika yazikozyano, mbasondosi nkaambo kazimpangaliko zyabo.
Mbubonya mbuli ciindi eciya Leza naakamwaya Sodoma a-Gomora aminzi imwi iibambene, mbwaamba Jehova, takukooyooba muntu uukala nkuko, takukooyooba mwana wa-Adamu naba omwe uukala mulinguwo.

Balijisi mata amasumo. Mbayumu mumyoyo, tabafwi luzyalo pe. Ijwi lyabo lili mbuli kuvuuma kwalwizi. Balitantide amabbiza mbuli muntu uulilibambilide inkondo, beza kuzoolwisya nduwe, O mwana musimbi wa-Babuloni,
