Mwami wa-Babuloni naakamvwa impuwo yabo, maanza aakwe akalebuluka, akupenga kwakamujata mbuli macise aamwanakazi uuyanda kutumbuka.
Lino amuswiilile lulayo lwa-Jehova ndwaalailila aa-Bubuloni, amakanze aakwe ngaakanza aanyika yaba-Kasidi. Ncobeni baniini babutanga bwabo bayookwelwa. Ncobeni cimpati cabo ciyoogamba kumakani aabo.
Nyika ilazungaana kujwi lyakuzundwa kwa-Babuloni, akulila kwawo kuyoomvwigwa akati kabamasi.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni ndabusya moyo wasikunyonyoona, alwisye Babuloni abantu bakede munyika yaba-Kasidi.
Njootumina Babuloni basikupupulula, nkabela bayoomupupulula akugwisya zintu zyoonse zili munyika yawo, nkaambo bayoosika kukuulwisya kuzwa kumabazu oonse mubuzuba bwamapenzi aawo.
Simata abambe bata bwakwe, anyampuke, azilwisyo zyakwe. Mutabafwidi luzyalo bakubusi bawo, amunyonyoone impi yawo yoonse.
Bayoowa ansi balijayidwe munyika yaba-Kasidi, baliyasidwe intungabulumba mumigwagwa yawo.
Nkaambo ba-Israyeli aba-Juda tabana kulekwa kuli-Leza wabo Jehova wamakamu. Nyika yabo ilizwide milandu njibabisizya Uusalala waIsrayeli.
Babuloni wakali inkomeki yangolida mujanza lya-Jehova. Yakali kukozya nyika yoonse. Bamasi bakali kunywa waini wayo, aboobo bamasi bakasondoka.
Lino Babuloni wafwambaana kuwa, ulipwayidwe! Amuulilile! Amubweze mabbona aakunanika zyuumo zyawo, ambweni inga ulapona.
Twali kuyanda kuponya Babuloni, pele taponi ne! Amuuleke, twiinke umwi aumwi kucisi cakwe, nkaambo lubeta lwawo lwasika akujulu, lulisumpukide akusika kujulu loko.
Jehova watuletela kululamikwa kwesu! Amuboole, tulungulule mu-Zioni milimo ya-Jehova Leza wesu!
Amusumpule indembela yakulwisya malambo aa-Babuloni. Amuyumye balindizi. Amubike balindizi akubamba basikuyubilila, nkaambo Jehova wayeeya, alimwi wacita, makani ngaakaamba aabantu bakuBabuloni.
Inywe nomukede kumbali lyamaanzi manji, nomuvubide zintu zinji ziyandisi, mamanino aanu asika, mpokweela kunyanzya kwanu.
Jehova wamakamu wakonka muzina lyakwe mwini, wati, Ncobeni njookuzuzya bantu banji mbuli cisozi, nkabela bayooyobela cakusekelela kuzundwa kwako.
Ijwi lyakwe nilimvwigwa, maanzi alapyopyongana kujulu, asikunku ulamuuntumusya kuzwa kumagolelo aanyika. Ulacitila imvula indabo, amuzilondwedo zyakwe mwaagwisya muuwo.
Bantu boonse mbafubafuba, babula luzibo. Bafuzi boonse zikozyano zyabo nzibafula zilabausya insoni, nkaambo zikozyano zyabo nzyabuyo, taziyooyi pe.
Tazijisi milimo, pe, nzilenge zyalweeno, aboobo mubuzuba bwakuswayigwa kwazyo ziyooloba.
Caabilo ca-Jakobo tacili mbuli ezi pe, nkaambo ngonguwe iwakabumba zintu zyoonse, aba-Israyeli ngomusyobo ngwakonede. Jehova wamakamu ndizina lyakwe.
Nduwe ngumpwazya imbizi asikutanta wayo, nduwe ngumpwazya inkalaki ayooyo uutantide mulinjiyo,
nduwe ngumpwazya baalumi abanakazi boonse, nduwe ngumpwazya bacembele abanikenike, nduwe ngumpwazya bakubusi abanakalindu,
nduwe ngumpwazya mweembeli abutanga bwakwe, nduwe ngumpwazya mulimi abasune bakwe, nduwe ngumpwazya beendelezi abangambela.
Lino mumeso aanu njoobweedezya Babuloni aba-Kasidi boonse bulumbu bweelede bubi bwabo boonse mbubakacita mu-Zioni, mbwaamba Jehova.
Lino tabakooyoodadula kulinduwe ibbwe niliba lyomwe lyamucooko niliba ibbwe lyantalisyo, pele uyooba matongo buyo mane kukabe kutamani, mbwaamba Jehova,

Amusumpule indembela munyika, amulizye mweembo akati kabamasi, amubambe bamasi kuti bamulwisye, amwiite zisi zya-Ararati a-Mini aAsikenazi kuti zizoomulwisye, amubike silutwe wampi yakumulwisya, amulete imbizi zinji mbuli cisozi catwijatwija.
Amubambe bamasi kuti bamulwisye, bami ba-Medi abangambela babo abasilutwe babo azisi zyoonse nzibeendelezya.
Nyika ilakankama, ilaciswa, nkaambo makanze aa-Jehova ngaakanza aa-Babuloni alaima nji. Ulacita kuti nyika ya-Babuloni ibe matongo aatakalwa bantu.
Basilumamba ba-Babuloni baleka kulwa, balikede mumampangala. Busintaze bwabo bwamana, baba mbuli banakazi. Maanda aawo apya, mankolo aawo atyoka.
Mutumwa umwi ulazuzaana kukuswanaana amutumwanyina, simposo ulaswanaana asimposonyina; boonse balalwiida mwami wa-Babuloni kuti munzi wakwe wazundwa­ kumabazu oonse.
Zizubukilo zyajatwa, maanda mayumu atentwa amulilo, abasilumamba boonse balakankama.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli. Mwana musimbi waBabuloni waba mbuli cipolelo kuciindi cakupolwa. Kamana kaindi kaniini buyo, ciindi cakwe cakutebulwa ciyoosika,
Oyo uukede mu-Zioni aambe kuti, Mulandu wabubi mbundacitilwa, mebo abasimukowama, ube amutwe wa-Babuloni. Jerusalemu aambe kuti, Mulandu wabulowa bwangu ube amitwe yaba-Kasidi,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ncobeni njookosola makani aanu. Njoomuliyila inkoto, Njooyuminizya lwizi lwakwe, njooyumya kasensa kakwe.
Babuloni uyooba citantaala buyo, cikalilo cabamwaaba, ciyoosyo acisabuzyo citakalwi muntu naba omwe.
Bayoovuluma boonse mbuli balavu, bayoondoloma mbuli bana basyuumbwa,
Myoyo yabo niicipya, njoobabambila ipobwe, lino njoobakozya kuti bawizuke, baone iŋonzi ziteeli, batasinsimuki limbi, mbwaamba Jehova.
Njoobaleta mbuli tubelele tuya kukujayigwa, mbuli bagutu abasijembwe.
Lwizi lwasika kukulwisya Babuloni. Wavumbizigwa mayuwe aalo aavuuma.
Minzi yakwe yaba ciyoosyo, yaba nyika yacimpayuma ankanda, nyika iitakalwi bantu, bana ba-Adamu nkubataindi,
Njoouma Beli ku-Babuloni, njoogwisya mumuloma wakwe ncaamenede, Bamasi tabakooyooyeboloka limbi kulinguwe­ Bulambo bwa-Babuloni buyoowida ansi.

Myoyo yanu itayoowi nikuba kukankama nkaambo kampuwo iimvwigwa munyika. Nkaambo kulamvwigwa impuwo mumwaka mutaanzi, amumwaka wabili impuwo iyoomvwigwa mbubonya. Muyooba inkondo munyika, amweendelezi uyoolwisya mweendelezinyina.
Amubone! Mazuba alaboola ninjoouma zikozyano zibezedwe zya-Babuloni. Nyika yawo yoonse iyoofwa bweeme abantu bawo boonse bayoowa mukati kawo.
Lino ijulu anyika azyoonse zili mulinzizyo ziyooimba cakusekelela buwe bwa-Babuloni, nkaambo basikunyonyoona bayoosika kuzwa kucisi cakunyika kuzoomulwisya, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ncobeni Babuloni uyoowa nkaambo kabajayidwe ba-Israyeli, mbubonya mbuli bantu bamunyika yoonse mbubajayidwe nkaambo kaBabuloni.
Twafwa insoni, nkaambo twamvwa majwi aamasampu. Masyu esu alivumbidwe abweeme, nkaambo bazwakule banjila mumasena aasalala aamuŋanda ya-Jehova,
Pele amubone! Mazuba alaboola, mbwaamba Jehova, ninjoouma zikozyano zyakwe zibezedwe, anyika yakwe yoonse iyoozula matongelo aabayasidwe.
Nekuba kuti Babuloni ulalisumpula akusika kujulu, nekuba kuti ulayumya macijilo aakwe mayumu aakujulu, basikusaala bayoomusikila kuzwa kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo Jehova uli mukunyonyoona Babuloni, ajwi lyawo ipati liyooloba kuzwa mulinguwo. Mayuwe aabo alavuuma mbuli maanzi manji, ajwi lyabo lyacikwala lilamvwigwa.
Nkaambo wasikilwa sikunyonyoona! Babuloni wasikilwa sikunyonyoona. Basintaze bawo bazundwa, amata aabo atyolaulwa, nkaambo Jehova ngu-Leza uubweedezya bulumbu, ncobeni uyooliya inkoto yabubi.
Njookozya basilutwe bawo abasongo bawo abeendelezi bawo abangambela bawo abasilumamba bawo, lino bayoona iŋonzi ziteeli, tabakooyoosinsimuka limbi, mbwaamba Mwami, Jehova wamakamu ndizina lyakwe.

Lino ngaaya makani Jeremiya musinsimi ngaakalailila Seraya mwana wa-Neriya mwana wa-Maaseya, naakainka a-Zedekiya mwami wa-Juda kuya ku-Babuloni munwaka wane wabwami bwakwe. Oyo Seraya kali silutwe wankambe.
Jeremiya wakalemba mubbuku lyomwe makani oonse aamapenzi aakaamba kusikila Babuloni, nkokuti aya majwi oonse aalembedwe­ aa-Babuloni.
Lino Jeremiya wakaambila Seraya kuti, Bona! Wasika buyo ku-Babuloni, uleelede kubala aya majwi oonse,
alimwi uleelede kwaamba kuti, O Jehova, waamba aakuntu okuno kuti uyookunyonyoona, kuti kutabi naba omwe uukala nkuko, naba muntu naba munyama, pele kuyooba matongo kukabe kutamani.
Lino wamana buyo kubala eli ibbuku, uleelede kulyaanga abbwe akuliwaala mubbonze lya-Firate,
akwaamba kuti, Mbuboobu munzi wa-Babuloni mbuuyooinkila nkaambo kamapenzi oonse ngenti uletele. Nkabela bayookataazigwa.
Majwi aa-Jeremiya mpaela awa.
Nkabela wakacita bubi mumeso aa-Jehova mbubonya mbwaakacita Jehoyakimu.
Nkaambo bukali bwa-Jehova bwakali kuya bukomena mu-Jerusalemu amucisi ca-Juda mane lumwi wakabatanda kuzwa kubusyu bwakwe. Elyo Zedekiya wakapapila mwami wa-Babuloni.

Nkabela munwaka wamusanu aine wabwami bwakwe, munwezi wakumi, mubuzuba bwakumi bwamwezi, kwakasika Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni, walo abasilumamba bakwe boonse, ku-Jerusalemu kuzoolwisya, nkabela bakausinkinizya akuyaka lubaya lwakuuzyungulusya.
Aboobo munzi wakalisinkinizidwe mane kusikila kumwaka wakumi aumwi wabwami bwa-Zedekiya.
Elyo mubuzuba bwamusanu aane bwamwezi wane, inzala yakakomena loko mumunzi, abantu bacisi teebakajisi zilyo abuniini.

Mpawo munzi wakaanduka, nkabela basilumamba boonse bakacija masiku, bazwa mununzi akwiinda kumulyango uuli akati kamalambo obile, kufwaafwi kumuunda wamwami, ba-Kasidi nibakacili kuzyunguluka munzi. Lino bakatola inzila iiya ku-Araba.
Pele basilumamba baba-Kasidi bakatobela mwami, bamweenzya Zedekiya mugezi lya-Jeriko, nkabela basilumamba bakwe boonse bakamwaika, bamusia.
Lino bakajata mwami, bamuleta kumwami wa-Babuloni ku-Ribila munyika ya-Hamati, bamubeteka nkuko.
Nkabela bana ba-Zedekiya, mwami wa-Babuloni wakabajaya kumeso aakwe, abalo basilutwe boonse ba-Juda, wakabajaya ku-Ribila.
Alimwi wakaofwaazya meso aa-Zedekiya, wamwaanzya inkeetani, nkabela mwami wa-Babuloni wakamusisya ku-Babuloni, wamubika muntolongo mane kusikila kubuzuba bwalufu lwakwe.
Nkabela wakatenta iŋanda yaJehova aŋanda yamwami amaanda oonse aamu-Jerusalemu. Maanda oonse mapati wakaatenta amulilo.
Aalo malambo oonse aa-Jerusalemu aazyungulukide munzi, bakaamwaya basilumamba baba-Kasidi, mupati wabasikutabilila mbaakeza abo.
Abantu bamwi batengwana, abantu bamwi ibakasyeede mumunzi, abaabo ibakalyaabide kale mumaanza aamwami waBabuloni, abana baleya, boonse Nebuzaradana mupati wabasikutabilila wakabatola mubuzike.
Pele Nebuzaradana mupati wabasikutabilila wakaleka bamwi bacete bacisi kuti babe basimyuunda yamasaansa abasikulima,
Azyalo zilongo, amaliko, atugele, amigano, azinkomba, azibelesyo zyoonse zyamukuba nzibakali kupaizya, zyoonse buyo bakazitola.

Ayalo mitiba, ankayi zyamulilo, amigano, azilongo, azibikilo zyamalampi, azinkomba zyatununkilizyo amitiba yazipaizyo zyakunywa, zibulo zyoonse zyangolida mupati wabasikutabilila wakatola ingolida yazyo, azibulo zyoonse zyansiliva wakatola insiliva yazyo.

Nkabela minsende yobile, acikozyano comwe caziba lyamaanzi, abasune bali ikumi ababili bamukuba ibakaimvwi kunsi lyaziba, azikazikilo, mwami Solomoni nzyaakacitila iŋanda ya-Jehova, bulemu bwamukuba wa zintu ezi zyoonse teebwakali kweelekeka.
Aminsende, bulamfu bwaumwi aumwi bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi amusanu arutatu, amubalo wawo wakali tukokola tuli ikumi atubili, antuli yawo yakali indiya yaminwe yone, nkaambo wakalifokwedwe.
Atala lyawo kakuli ciimikilo camukuba. Bulamfu bwaciimikilo cimwi acimwi cakali tukokola tosanwe, alimwi ciimikilo cakalizyungulukidwe tusabwe tupesedwe amapomegranite; zyoonse zyakalifulidwe mukuba.
Mapomegranite aakumabazu akali makumi aali musanu aane amusanu alimwi, amapomegranite oonse aakali zyungulukide kasabwe akali mwaanda.

alimwi mumunzi wakabweza umwi, silutwe iwakali kulanga basilumamba, abasinkuta bamwami bali musanu ababili ibakajanwa mumunzi, amulembi wasilutwe wampi iwakali kubunganya bantu bacisi, abantu banyika bali makumi aali musanu alimwi ibakajanwa mukati kamunzi.
Aba boonse Nebuzaradana mupati wabasikutabilila wakababweza akubasisya kumwami wa-Babuloni ku-Ribila.
Lino mwami wa-Babuloni wakabauma akubajaya nkukonya oko ku-Ribila munyika ya-Hamati. Mbuboobo ba-Juda mbubakatolwa mubuzike akugwisigwa munyika yabo.
Amumwaka wakumi amusanu aitatu wabwami bwa-Nebukadinezara, wakatola mubuzike kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu bantu bali myanda iili musanu aitatu amakumi otatwe ababili.

Alimwi mumwaka wamakumi obile aitatu wabwami bwa-Nebukadinezara, Nebuzaradana mupati wabasikutabilila wakatola mubuzike ba-Juda bali myanda iili musanu aibili amakumi one aali amusanu. Aboobo bantu boonse bakasika kuzyuulu zyone amyanda iili musanu aumwi.
Nkabela wakamwaambila caluse, wasumpula cuuno cakwe cabwami kwiinda zyuuno zyabaminyina mbaakali abo mu-Babuloni;
aboobo Joyakini wakasamununa zyakusama zyakwe zyabuzike, nkabela wakali kulya insima kuntafule yamwami lyoonse, mazuba oonse ngaakacili kupona,
Caabilo cakwe cazilyo, wakacipegwa lyoonse, cakazwa mumaanza aamwami wa-Babuloni, caabilo ceelede cabuzuba bumwi abumwi, mazuba oonse ngaakapona mane lumwi wakafwa.
Waba mukamufu, oyo iwakali mupati akati kabamasi!
Oyo iwakali namalelo akati kazisi waba muzike!
Akati kabayandwi bakwe taakwe naba omwe uumuumbulizya.
Beenziayina boonse bamweena, baba basinkondonyina.
Ulikede akati kabamasi, tajani cilyokezezyo;
Basikumupenzya boonse bamweenzya akati kamafwabi.
Inzila zya-Zioni zilalila nkaambo taakwe bantu beza kuma po bwe aabikidwe;
Milyango yakwe yabula bantu, bapaizi bakwe balatongela;
Basimbi bakwe balipengede, ulijene makani aalula.
Nkaambo Jehova wamupa mulandu nkaambo kazibi zyakwe zinji,
Atwana twakwe toonse twatolwa mubuzike kunembo lyasikutanda.
Mwana musimbi wa-Zioni waswekelwa bulemu bwakwe boonse,
Basilutwe bakwe baba mbuli insya zibula mani aakucela.
Baleenda kabatajisi inguzu kunembo lyasikubatanda,
Jerusalemu ulayeeya zintu zibotezya nzyakajisi kalekale.
Bantu bakwe nibakaabwa mumaanza aabasinkondonyina, katakwe sikumugwasya.
Basinkondonyina nibakamubona, bakaseka lunyonyooko lwakwe.
Boonse ibakali kumulemeka balamusampaula nkaambo balibwene cinswe cakwe.
Ulatongela, ulapiluka kunsi.
Nkaambo kako wafwiinsigwa cakuyoosya; taakwe uumuumbulizya. Langa
kupenga kwangu, O Jehova; nkaambo sinkondoma walisumpula.
Nkaambo wabona kuti bamasi banjila mucikombelo cakwe,
Mbowakalailila kuti tabeelede kunjila mumbungano yako.
Zintu zyabo zyoonse zibotezya bazyuuzya zilyo zyakubusya buumi;
Langa, O Jehova, ubone mbundasampaulwa!
Sa mulibwene buusu mbuli buusu bwangu mbundacitilwa?
Jehova wandipenzya mubuzuba bwabukali bwakwe buyoosya!
Wabikila maulu aangu kakole, wandipilusya kunsi.
Wandijazya bukata akuciswa buzuba boonse.
Zililukidwe ansingo yangu, anguzu zyangu wazimanya;
Mwami wandaaba mumaanza aabaabo mbendakacilwa kuzunda.
Wabunganya imbungano yakundijayila bakubusi bangu;
Nakalindu wa-Juda Mwami wamulyataula mbuli masaansa aamucisinino.
Nkaambo kamakani aya ndalila, ameso aangu alalosya misozi,
Nkaambo sikuumbulizya uukonzya kubusya moyo wangu uli kule,
Bana bangu bafwidwa nkaambo sinkondoma wazunda.
Zioni watandabika maanza aakwe, pele taakwe uumuumbulizya.
Jehova walailila aa-Jakobo kuti boonse bamweengelede babe basinkondonyina.
Jerusalemu waba mbuli cintu cisofweede mumeso aabo.
Amuswiilile, nyoonse nubamasi, akubona buusu bwangu.
Banakalindu bangu abakubusi bangu boonse banjila mubuzike.
Ndakaita bayandwi bangu pele bakandeena.
Bapaizi bangu abapati ba ngu bakafwidilila mumunzi,
Nibakacili kuyandaula zilyo zyakubukulusya buumi bwabo.
Moyo wangu wasanduka mukati kangu, nkaambo ndapapila loko.
Ipanga lilajaya anze, alufu nkoluli kumunzi.
Basinkondoma boonse bamvwa makani aamapenzi aangu, akusekelela eco ncowacita.
Pele uyoosisya buzuba mbowaamba, elyo bayooba mbuli ndime.
Zibi zyabo zyoonse ziboneke kumeso aako.
Kobacitila mbubonya mbowandicitila mebo nkaambo kamilandu yangu yoonse;
Nkaambo intongelo zyangu nzinji, amoyo wangu wawizuka.
Bulemu bwa-Israyeli wabuwaala ansi kuzwa kujulu!
Cuuno camaulu aakwe taciyeeyi mubuzuba bwabukali bwakwe!
Mulunyemo lwakwe wa mwaya maanda mayumu aamwana musimbi wa-Zioni, waalosya ansi.
Wanyonyoona bwami abasilutwe babo,
Waboozya ijanza lyakwe lyalulyo kubusyu bwabasinkondonyina.
Watenta Jakobo mbuli mabangabanga aamulilo uuyakisya koonse koonse.
Wanyonyoona zintu zyoonse zibotezya mutente lyamwana musimbi wa-Zioni;
Watila bukali bwakwe mbuli mulilo.
Wamena maanda aakwe aabwami, wanyonyoona macijilo aakwe; Wavuzya kulila akukwiila mumwana musimbi wa-Juda.
Jehova walubya bantu bamu-Zioni buzuba bwa-Sabata amapobwe aabikidwe;
Mubukali bwakwe buyoosya wasampaula mwami amupaizi.
Malambo aamaanda aakwe aabwami waaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyina;
Bayobayoba muŋanda ya-Jehova mbuli buzuba bwambungano.
Watandabika intambo, takasyi ijanza lyakwe kumena;
Matalikilo abulambo, zyoonse zilalila, zilanyana zyoonse.
Mwami wakwe abasilutwe bakwe bali akati kabamasi, mulao nkuutako,
Abalo basinsimi bakwe tabajani cilengano kuli-Jehova,
Babika bulongo amitwe yabo, balisamine zisani zyamasaka;
Banakalindu ba-Jerusalemu bakotamika mitwe yabo ansi.
Moyo wangu watika ansi nkaambo kalunyonyooko lwamwana musimbi wabantu bangu;
Nkaambo twana abavwanda balawizuka mumigwagwa yamunzi.
Balabuzya kulibanyina babo kuti, Ino maila awaini ali kuli?
Nibawizuka mbuli bayasidwe mumigwagwa yamunzi,
Amyoyu yabo niitulwa nibacili kunkolo zyabanyina.
Nkweelanye ani kuti nkuumbulizye, O mwana nakalindu wa-Zioni?
Nkaambo lunyonyooko lwako ndupati mbuli lwizi. Taakwe uukonzya kukuponya.
Tabana kuyubununa milandu yako kuti bakasye buzike bwako.
Bakubonena zilengano zyabuyo azintu zyakukutanda.
Balaweela akugunaguna mitwe yabo kumwana musimbi wa-Jerusalemu.
Bati, Sa ngooyu munzi iwakaulikwa Bweebesi butaindwi, Lukondo lwanyika yoonse?
Balawela, balaluma ntwino, bati, Twamumenenena;
Ncobeni mboobuno buzuba mbutwakali kulangila, twabujana, twabubona.
Wazuzikizya majwi aakwe aakalekale,
Wamwaya cakutafwa luzyalo,
Wacita kuti basinkondonyoko bakusekelele,
Wasumpula luja lwabasikupenzya.
O bulambo bwamwana musimbi wa-Zioni, misozi yako ikunke mbuli mulenga isikati amasiku,
Utalyokezyi; imboni yaliso lyako italeki.
Tila moyo wako ube mbuli maanzi aatika kubusyu bwa-Jehova;
Tandabika maanza aako kulinguwe cakupailila buumi bwabana bako baniini,
Bawizuka nkaambo kanzala kumagolelo aamigwagwa yoonse.
Sa ncibotu kuti banakazi balye lunyungu lwabo, bana mbobakali kusumpula?
Sa ncibotu kuti bapaizi abasinsimi boonse bajayigwe mucikombelo ca-Mwami?
Bakamwale bangu abalombe bangu balijayidwe apanga;
Wabajaya mubuzuba bwabukali bwako, wabanyonyoona cakutafwa insoni.
Katakwe iwakaloboka, iwakasyaala mubuzuba bwabukali bwa-Jehova,
Bana mbondakali kusumpaula akulela, sikondoma wabamanisya boonse.
Ndime mwaalumi uubwene mapenzi nkaambo kamusako wabukali bwakwe.
Wandeenzya munzila yamudima iitakwe mumuni.
Ncobeni wanduuma ajanza lyakwe buzuba boonse.
Wamanisya nyama yangu acikanda cangu, azifuwa zyangu zyoonse wazityolaula.
Wayaka cakundilwisya, wandizyuungulusya malule amapenzi.
kalekale.
Wandisinkila alubaya kuti ntazwi, wandilemezya inkeetani.
Wasinka inzila zyangu amabwe aazyuulidwe, aboobo wandileesya
mumigwagwa iitaluleme.
aasiseme.
Zifuso zyamunkomo zyakwe wazinjizya munsa zyangu,
Wanyanzya moyo wangu luumuno; coolwe ndaciluba,
Ibaluka mapenzi aangu abusimutuntuli bwangu, malule aalula luu,
Moyo wangu ulaayeeya, ulafwinsigwa mukaangu kangu,
Ncindayeeya nceeci. Cilandikasya kusyomonona.
Nekuba kuti watuusya buusu, ulatufwida luzyalo mubuuya bwakwe
bupati.
Kulyataula ansi boonse baange banyika,
Kunyanzya muntu nzyeelede kubusyu bwa-Mupati kampatila,
Walivumbya bukali, watutobela; watujaya cakutausa luzyalo.
Walivumbya ijoba kuti cikombyo cesu citasiki nkobede.
Basinkondoma boonse batwaasamina amulomo.
Buyoofu adindi zyatusikila, lunyonyooko akupwayikwa.
Milonga yamisozi ilazwa mumeso aangu nkaambo kalunyonyooko lwamwana musimbi wabantu bangu.
Meso aangu alalila, taaumuni, taaleki abuniini pe,
Meso aangu alakataazya moyo wangu nkaambo kabana basimbi bamunzi wangu.
Utasinki kutwi kwako kukuyooya kwangu akukulila kwangu.
Ulibwene makani aangu, O Jehova; kondibeteka kabotu.
Ulimvwide kusampaula kwabo, O Jehova, amakanze aabo oonse aakundibisizya.
Ulimvwide majwi aabaabo bandibusizya inkondo, ambubandiyeeyela bubi buzuba boonse.
Uyoobatobela cabukali akubanyonyoona, batabonwi limbi kunsi lyajulu lya-Jehova.
Maawe! Ingolida yabija buti? Ingolida iisalala yasanduka!
Mabwe aacikombelo asowegwa kumagolelo aamigwagwa yoonse!
Balayeeyegwa buti kuba mbuli zibelesyo zyabulongo zibumbidwe kumaanza aamubumbi?
Pele mwana musimbi wabantu bangu waba muyumu mbuli impo zyamusokwe.
Twana tulakumbila zilyo pele taakwe uutwaabila.
Abaabo ibakalelwa muli zyakusama zisalala pyu balakumbata citantala camafwisila.
lwakafwambaana kunyonyoonwa nekuba kuti katakwe maanza aakamwaampa.
Basilutwe bakwe bakatuba buu mbuli lukobo, bakatuba kwiinda malili;
Mibili yabo yakasalala kwiinda mabwe aarubi, yakali kubalangala mbuli masafiri.
Cikanda cabo cilakakatila kuzifuwa zyabo, cayuminina mbuli cisamu.
Abo bajayidwe apanga mbabotu kwiinda abo bajayidwe anzala,
Nkaambo aba balaya bukotelakotela, baliyasidwe, nkaambo kakubula micelo yamyuunda,
Bababeda malelo kuciindi calunyonyooko lwamwana musimbi wabantu bangu.
Wakunka mulilo mu-Zioni, watenta matalikilo aawo.
Kuti basinkondonyina abasikusaala bakonzya kunjila mumilyango yaJerusalemu.
Ibakatila bulowa bwabaluleme mukati kawo.
Nkabela bantu tabakonzyi kwaampa zyakusama zyabo.
Amuleke! Balisofweede! (Mbubaambilwa.) Amubaleke! Amubaleke! Mutabagumi,
Bakacija, baba basimutuntuli, elyo kwakaambwa akati kabamasi kuti, Tabakooyookala limbi okuno.
Bantu teebakatambula bapaizi nikuba kulemeka bapati.
Kulangila twakali kulangila cisi citakonzyi kufutula.
Mamanino ali kufwaafwi, mazuba esu amana, nkaambo mamanino esu asika.
Basikututobela mbasiluno kwiinda bacuungwe bakujulu;
Bakatutanda azilundu, bakatulindila musokwe.
Ngonguwe ngutwakaamba kuti, Tulakala mucenzule cakwe akati kaba-
masi,
Sekelela, O mwana musimbi wa-Edomu ookede munyika ya-Uzi,
Inkomeki iyooinda kulinduwe ayebo; uyookolwa akuba acinswe.
Milandu yako yamana, O mwana musimbi wa-Zioni;
Takooyookutola limbi mubuzike.
Pele webo, O mwana musimbi wa-Edomu, ulakupa mulandu,
Ulayubununa zibi zyako.
Ibaluka, O Jehova, makani aatusikila; Langa, ubone mbutusampaulwa.
Lukono lwesu lwaba lwabeenzu,
Maanda esu ali munaanza aabazwakule.
Twaba bamucaala babula wisaabo,
Bamamama bali mbuli bamukabafu.
Maanzi esu aakunywa tulaaula amali,
Inkuni zyesu nzyakuula buyo.
Basikututanda batulemezya ijoko ansingo;
Twakataala, twabula kulyokezya.
Abalo ba-Asuri, kuti tukute insima.
Swebo twalemenwa milandu yabo.
Bazike balatweendelezya,
Taakwe uutuvuna mumaanza aabo.
Zilyo zyesu zilaulwa abuumi bwesu,
Nkaambo kapanga lyamunkanda.
Cikanda cesu caidila mbuli muciko,
Nkaambo inzala yatukola.
Abanakalindu bamuminzi ya-Juda,
Basilutwe bakaanzikwa amaanza aabo,
Abapati teebakalemekwa pe.
Abalombe balemenwa inkuni.
Abalombe baleka kwiimbya tuntimbwa.
Lukondo lwamumyoyo yesu lwamana,
Kuzyana kwesu kwasanduka, kwaba kulila.
Munsini waloka kuzwa kumutwe wesu.
Maawe kulindiswe! Nkaambo twabisya.
Meso esu afwa kulila,
Nkaambo kacilundu ca-Zioni, caba matongo;
Bamwaaba baleendeenda alincico.
Webo, O Jehova, nkoli lyoonse,
Acuuno cabwami bwako tacimani mumazyalani oonse.
Ino nkaambonzi watuluba lyoonse?
Nkaambonzi watulekelezya ciindi cilamfu?
Utupilusye kulinduwe, O Jehova, tupiluke.
Bukulusya mazuba esu mbuli kuciindi cakalekale.
Pele ncobeni watusowelela,
Watukalalila loko.
Mubuzuba bwasanu bwamumwezi, nkokuti mumwaka wasanu wabuzike bwamwami Joyakini,
ijwi lya-Jebova lyakasika kuli-Ezekieli mupaizi mwana wa-Buzi munyika yaba-Kasidi kumulonga wa-Kebara, nkabela ijanza lya-Jehova lyakali alinguwe nkukonya oko.
Alimwi mukati kawo mwakazwa mbuli banyama bone. Mbuboobu mbubakabede: bakali mbuli muntu,
pele umwi aumwi kajisi masyu one, alimwi umwi aumwi kajisi mababa one.
Maulu aabo akaliluleme, azituta zyabo zyakali mbuli zituta zyabanamani. Nkabela bakali kubekabeka mbubonya mbuli mundalila uusyobwedwe.
Kabajisi maanza aabuntu kunsi amababa aabo kumabazu aabo one. Mbuboobu mbwaakabede masyu aabo amababa aabo boonse bone:
mababa aabo akaliswaneene limwi alimwi abbabanyina. Amukweenda kwabo teebakali kuleyauka pe, boonse kabalulama buyo.

Alimwi mbuboobu masyu aabo mbwaakabede: kabajisi busyu bwamuntu, aboonse bone kabajisi umwi aumwi busyu bwamulavu kululyo lwakwe, aboonse bone kabajisi umwi aumwi busyu bwamusune kulumwensi lwakwe, aboonse bone kabajisi umwi aumwi busyu bwansika.
Mbuboobo masyu aabo mbwaakabede. Nkabela mababa aabo akalitandabikidwe kujulu; umwi aumwi kajisi mababa obile aagumene mababa aamweenzinyina, amababa obile aavumbide mubili wakwe.
Nkabela umwi aumwi kalulama mukweenda kwakwe. Kufumbwa muuya nkuwakali kuyanda kuya, bakaya nkukonya, akutaleyauka pe.
Nkabela akati kabanyama kakuli mbuli malasa aayaka, mbuli malampi aakali kweendeenda akati kabanyama. Mulilo wakali kunyengema, alimwi mukati kamulilo mwakazwa lulabo.
Nkabela banyama bakali kuzuza akupiluka mbuli kubyanta kwalulabo.
Mbuboobu mavwili mbaakabede, mbaakapangidwe. Akali mbuli mabwe aa-Berulo aabekabeka. Oonse one kaelene, kaajisi mibalo akati kamibalo.
Ciindi cakweenda, kaenda kufumbwa mabazu aao one nkwaakalangide, kaataleyi-leyi pe.
Mavwili oonse one kaajisi mibalo amasipoko, amibalo yao kiizwide meso koonse koonse.
Lino banyama nibakeenda, mavwili aalo akeenda kumbali lyabo, alimwi banyama nibakasumpulwa kuzwa ansi, aalo mavwili akasumpulwa mbubonya.
Kufumbwa muuya nkuuwakayanda kuya, bakaya nkukonya, aale mavwili akasumpulwa kumbali lyabo, nkaambo mumavili momwakali muuya wabanyama.
Nibakainka, aalo akainka; nibakaima, aalo akaima, alimwi nibakasumpulwa kuzwa ansi, aalo akasumpulwa kumbali lyabo, nkaambo mumavili momwakali muuya wabanyama.
Lino kunsi lyamwenya oyo, mababa aabo akalitandabede cakululama, limwi alimwi lyakaliswaneene abbabanyina, alimwi umwi aumwi kajisi mababa obile aakulivumbya mubili wakwe.

Nkabela nibakali kweenda, ndakamvwa cikwala camababa aabo mbuli cikwala camaanzi aavuuma, mbuli ijwi lya­-Cilenga, cikwala calupyopyongano mbuli cikwala camakamu makamu aabasilumamba. Lino baime buyo, bakavunga mababa aabo.
Mpawo kwakamvwigwa ijwi lizwa kumwenya uuli atala lyamitwe yabo, nibakaimvwi akuvunga mababa aabo.

Lino ndakabona mbuli mundalila uusalalisya ambuli mulilo uuli mukati kansaka. Kuzwa mbuli kucikungu cakwe akujulu, alimwi kuzwa mbuli cikungu cakwe kuya ansi, ndakabona mbuli mulilo. Alimwi kakuli mumuni uumuzyungulukide.

Mbubonya mbuli fulicongo uuboneka mujoba ciindi camvula, mbuwakabede mumuni wakazyungulukide. Mbuboobo mbucakabede cilengano cabulemu bwa-Jehova. Lino nindakacibona, ndakavundama ansi, nkabela ndakamvwa ijwi lyasikwaamba.
Mpoonya awo, naakandaambila, muuya wakanjila mulindime, wandiimikizya, lino ndakamvwa mbwaakali kwaambaula ambebo.
Wakandaambila kuti, O mwana a-muntu, ndakutuma kubana ba-Israyeli, kuluzubo lwabasicinguni bandipapila. Bandibisizya, balo abamawisaabo boonse, mane kusikila kubuzuba obuno.
Bana mbasicinguni, mbayumu mumyoyo. Lino ndakutuma kulimbabo, nkabela uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Ambweni bayooswiilila, ambweni bayookaka (nkaambo mbana baluzubo lukataazya), nekubaboobo bayooziba kuti kwaba musinsimi akati kabo.

Lino uwe, O mwana amuntu, utabayoowi, utayoowi majwi aabo, nekuba kuti bakukataazya mbuli mamvwa amitubetube, nekuba kuti ulakala atubanze. Utayoowi majwi aabo nikuba kukankama kumasyu aabo, nkaambo nduzubo lukataazya.
Uleelede kubaambila majwi aangu, na balamvwa na balakaka, nkaambo nduzubo lukataazya.
Mpawo nindakalanga, ndakabona ijanza lilitandabeede kulindime, amulindilyo mwakali ibbuku livungaidwe.
Lino wakalivungulula kumeso aangu, nkabela lyakalilembedwe koonse koonse, lyakalilembedwe majwi aakulila amajwi aakoomoka amajwi aabuusu.
Mpawo ndakaasamika mulomo wangu, nkabela wakandilisika elyo ibbuku,
wandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, Lisya ida lyako eli ibbuku ndindakupa, uzuzye mala aako ndilyo. Mpawo ndakalya, nkabela mukanwa lyangu lyakalwela lwee mbuli buci.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, koya kuluzubo lwa-Israyeli, ukabaambile majwi aangu.
Nkaambo teensi bantu bamusyobo umbi baamba mwaambo muyumu mbowatuminwa, pe, watumwa kuluzubo lwa­-Israyeli.
Tokwe watumwa kubantu banji bamusyobo umbi baamba mwaambo muyumu, mbotakonzya kumvwa majwi aabo pe. Ncobeni nendakakutuma kulimbabo nebakakuswiilila.
Pele luzubo lwa-Israyeli, tabakooyookuswiilila pe, nkaambo tabayandi kuswiilila ndime, nkaambo boonse baluzubo lwa-Israyeli bali ankumu injumu amyoyo miyumu nta.
Bona! Ndayumya busyu bwako mbuli masyu aabo, ankumu yako iyooyumisigwa mbuli inkumu zyabo.
Ndacita kuti inkumu yako iyume nta mbuli ibbweluuma, iyume kwiinda mandomba. Utabayoowi nikuba kukankama kumasyu aabo, nekuba kuti nduzubo lukataazya.
Alimwi wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, majwi aangu oonse ngendakwaambila, koatambula mumoyo wako akwaaswiilila amatwi aako.
Koya, ukaambile bantu bako bali mubuzike makani. Kobaambila cakwaamba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Na baswiilila, na bakaka, taakwe makani, kobaambila buyo.
Ndakamvwa ijwi lyamababa aabanyama, limwi alimwi lyakali kuguma lyeenzinyina, acikwala camavili kumbali lyabo; acikwala camuzuzumina mupati.
Muuya wakandisumpula, wanditola, aboobo ndakaya abuusu bulula mumoyo wangu, ajanza lya-Jehova lyakali alindime canguzu,
mane lumwi ndakasika kulibasibuzike baku-Telabibu, ibakakede kumu-longa wa-Kebara, nkabela ndakakala nkukonya oko nkubakakede. Ndakakala oko akati kabo cakugamba mazuba aali musanu aabili.
Lino mazuba aali musanu aabili naakamana, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, ndakubika kuti ubede luzubo lwa-Israyeli mulindizi. Uyooswiilila majwi aakumulomo wangu, lino uleelede kubacenjezya muzina lyangu.

Kufumbwa ciindi nindaambila sizibi kuti, Ncobeni ulafwa, na wabula kumucenjezya, na toambi ijwi lyakucenjezya oyo sizibi kuti aleke inzila yakwe yabubi akujana buumi, lino oyo sizibi uyoofwa mukati kamilandu yakwe, pele bulowa bwakwe ngumulandu wako.
Pele na wacenjezya oyo sizibi, nekubaboobo tapiluki nikuba kuleka inzila yakwe yabubi, lino uyoofwa mukati kamilandu yakwe, pele webo tojisi mulandu.

Alimwi muntu uululeme, na waleka bululami bwakwe akucita milimo iipilingene, aboobo ndamubikila cilebyo, lino uyoofwa. Mbuli mbotana kumucenjezya, uyoofwa muzibi zyakwe, nkabela milimo yakwe iiluleme njaakacitide tiikooyooyeeyegwa limbi, pele bulowa bwakwe ngumulandu wako.
Pele na wacenjezya oyo mululami kuti atabisyi, aboobo tabisyi, ncobeni oyo muntu uyoojana buumi, ayebo tojisi mulandu.
Mpawo ndakanyampuka, ndainka kugundu, nkabela ndakabona bulemu bwa-Jehova buimvwi nkuko, mbubonya mbuli bulemu mbundakabona kumulonga wa-Kebara, elyo ndakavundama ansi.
Pele Muuya wakanjila mulindime, wandiimikizya amaulu aangu, wandaambila, wati, Koya, ukalijalile muŋanda yako.
Uwe O mwana amuntu, ncobeni bayookubikila intambo akukwaanzya nzizyo, kuti utakeendeendi akati kabo.
Alwalo lulimi lwako, njoolunamatizya kucilakwila cako, kuti ube syataambi uutakonzya kubacenjezya, nkaambo nduluzubo lukataazya.
Pele ninjooambaula ayebo, njooangununa mulomo wako, nkabela uyoobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Oyo uuyanda kuswiilila aswiilile, ayooyo uukaka akake. Nkaambo nduzubo lukataazya.
Lino webo, O mwana amuntu, bweza bbimbili, ulibike kubusyu bwako, akutala alindilyo cifwanisyo camunzi, nkokuti Jerusalemu.
Bika zibelesyo zyakuusinkinizya, yaka bulambo bwakusinkinizya, lundika citantaala cakuulwisya, alimwi bika basilumamba bakuulwisya amincini yakupwayauzya.

Lino bweza imbali yabutale, uibike mbuli bulambo bwabutale, akatikati kako amunzi, alimwi lanzya busyu bwako kulinjiyo, kuti munzi usinkinizigwe. Mbuboobo mboelede kusinkinizya munzi, aceeci ciyooba citondezyo kuluzubo lwa-Israyeli.
Lino uleelede kulala abbambo lyako lyacimwensi, kuti ulemenwe obo milandu yaluzubo lwa-Israyeli. Mazuba oonse ngolala obo uyoolemenwa milandu yabo.
Ndakupa mweelwe wamazuba uulelene amweelwe wamyaka yamilandu yabo, nkukuti mazuba aali myanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu aane, Ayo mazuba uyoolemenwa milandu yaluzubo lwa-Israyeli.
Lino wamanisya buyo mazuba ayo, uleelede kulala alimwi alubazu lwako lwalulyo, kuti ulemenwe milandu yaluzubo lwa-Juda. Ndakupa mazuba aali makumi one, buzuba bumwi abumwi ngumwaka.
Lino uleelede kubika busyu bwako cakulanga kusinkinizigwa kwa-Jerusalemu, akuboko kwako kusamununwe, ukasinsime aanguwo.
Bona! Ndakubikila intambo, kuti utasanduluki mane ukamane mazuba aako aakusinkinizya.

Lino uwe, bweza bulotwe abbaale, nyangu anyemu, mabele amaila, uzibike mucilongo comwe, ukalijikile zilyo, ukalye nzizyo mazuba oonse ngonoolede abbambo lyako, nkokuti mazuba aali myanda yotatwe amakumi aali musanu aane.
Azilyo nzonoolya zileelede kupimwa; masyekeli aali makumi obile mbobulemu bwacaabilo cabuzuba bumwi abumwi, alimwi uleelede kulya komwe buyo mubuzuba.
Aalo maanzi ngonoonywa aleelede kupimwa; inkomeki zyobile ncecaabilo cako cabuzuba bumwi abumwi, alimwi uleelede kunywa komwe buyo mubuzuba.
Uleelede kulya zilyo zyako mbuli zinkwa zyabbaale akujika uleelede kuzijika mumeso aabo amazyu aabantu.
Lino Jehova wakaamba kuti, Mbuboobo bana baIsrayeli mbubayoolya zilyo zyabo zisofweede akati kabamasi nkumbatandilide.

Mpawo ndakati, Akaka Mwami Jehova! Ncobeni nsikwe nindakalisofwaazya abuniini; kuzwa kubwanike bwangu akusikila sunu nsikwe nindakalya intundulu nanka nyama iyakalumwa munyama, alimwi taakwe cintu cisesemya niciba cimwi icakanjila mukanwa lyangu.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, Bona! Ndakupa bufumba bwaŋombe mucibaka camazyu aamuntu, lino uleelede kujika zilyo zyako alimbubo.

Alimwi wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, ncobeni njoomanisya mu-Jerusalemu malilu oonse aabuumi. Bayoolya insima cakupimapima bulemu, acakukankama, aalo maanzi bayooanywa cakweelekaeleka acakuyoowa.
Njoocita kuti babule zilyo amaanzi, elyo bayoolangana cakugamba, banooya bukotelakotela mukati kamilandu yabo.

Cipanzi cimwi catatu uleelede kucitenta mumulilo mukati kamunzi, mazuba aakusinkinizya naazoozulila. Acipanzi cimwi catatu, uleelede kucibweza akucuumya ipanga cakuzyunguluka munzi. Acimwi catatu cisyeede uleelede kucipupulula amuuwo, nkabela njoosomona ipanga kusule lyaco.
Alimwi uleelede kubweza tususu tuce akutwaanga mumoombe wacikobela cako.
Alimwi tumwi akati kantuto, uleelede kutubweza akutusowela mumulilo, ukatutente mumulilo; kuzwa nkuko kuyoozwa mulilo kuluzubo loonse lwaIsrayeli,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Ngooyu Jerusalemu. Ndaubika akati kabamasi, azisi nkuzili zyeengelede.
Pele wapapila imbeta zyangu, wacita bubi kwiinda bamasi, amilazyo yangu wait yola kwiinda nyika zyuuengelede. Imbeta zyangu bazisampaula, amilazyo yangu tabeendi mulinjiyo pe.

Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mbuli mbumwalipilinganya kwiinda bamasi bamweengelede, alimwi tamweendi mumbeta zyangu nikuba kucita milazyo yangu, alimwi tamuciti mbuli imbeta zyabamasi bamweengelede,
nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Bona! Mebo ndakulwisya! Njoocita imbeta mukati kako kumeso aabamasi.
Njoocita akati kako cintu cigambya, ncintanacitide abuniini ancintakooyoocita limbi, nkaambo kazisesemyo zyako.
Nkaambo kayaaya, bamawisi bayoolya bana babo mukati kako, abalo bana bayoolya bamawisaabo, Njoomubeteka, abaabo basyeede mukati kako njoebamwaisya kumabazu oonse.
Mbubonya mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, mbumwasofwaazya cikombelo cangu azintu zyanu zivundusya azisesemya, ncobeni njoomukosola. Meso aangu taakooyoomufwida luse, nsikooyoomufwida luzyalo pe.

Cipanzi canu cimwi catatu ciyoojazigwa malwazi akumanisigwa apamba mukati kanu, acipanzi cimwi catatu ciyoojazigwa ipanga muzisi zimweengelede, acimwi catatu cisyeede njoocimwaisya kumabazu oonse akusomona ipanga kusule lyaco.
Njookubika kuti ube matongo acisampauzyo akati kabamasi bakweengelede, amumeso aaboonse bainda.
Uyooba cisampauzyo acitukizyo, cicenjezyo aciyoosyo, kulibamasi bakuzyungulukide, ninzookubeteka cabukali buyoosya acakukoma loko, (Ndime Jehova nendaamba),
aninzoobatumina mivwi yangu mibi yapamba, mivwi yalunyonyooko, njinzootuma kukumunyonyoona, aninzooyungizizya pamba akumanisya malilu aanu oonse.
Njoomutumina pamba abanyama babi, kuti bamujayile; aalo malwazi abulowa, zyoonse ziyooinda akati kanu, alimwi njoomuletela ipanga lyakumulwisya. Ndime Jehova nendaamba.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, tambya meso aako kuzilundu zya-Israyeli, usinsime aanzizyo.

Amba kuti, Nuzilundu zya-Israyeli, amuswiilile majwi aa-Mwami Jehova. Mbuboobu Mwami Jehova mbwaambila zilundu atulundulundu, meenga amakuti. Ncobeni njoomuletela ipanga, alimwi njoonyonyoona zipaililo zyanu.
Zipaililo zyanu ziyoonyonyoonwa, zikozyano zyanu ziyoopwayaulwa, abantu banu bayoowida ansi balijayidwe kubusyu bwamizimu yanu.
Njoolazika mitunta yabana ba-Israyeli kubusyu bwamizimu yanu, azifuwa zyanu njoozimwaya cakuzyunguluka zipaililo zyanu.

Koonse koonse nkumukede, minzi yanu iyooba matongo azipaililo zyanu zyakuzilundu ziyoobula bantu, kuti zipaililo zyanu zibe matongo akubula bantu, zikozyano zyanu zipwayauIwe akuloba, tukombelo twanu tumwayigwe, amilimo yanu iziminganisigwe.
Bantu bayoowa ansi baliyasidwe akati kanu, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Pele njoomusyaazizya bamwi baloboka kuzwa kupanga lyabamasi ciindi eco nimuyoomwaikila akati kazisi.

Lino abo balobokede bayooibalukwa ndime akati kazisi nkubatoledwe mubuzike, nkaambo njootyola myoyo yabo yabwaamu iindisiide ameso aabo aabwamu aalanga zikozyano zyabo, lino bayooba cisesemyo mumeso aabo beni nkaambo kabubi bwabo mbubacita akaambo kazisesemyo zyabo zyoonse.
Nkabela bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova, alimwi mapenzi aya oonse ngendaamba kubaletela teensi aabuyo.
Oyo uuli kule uyoofwa bulwazi, ayooyo uuli kufwaafwi uyoojazigwa ipanga, ayooyo uusyeede uuvunidwe uyoofwa inzala. Aboobo njoozuzikizya bukali bwangu kulimbabo.

Muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova, ciindi eco bajayidwe babo nibanoozoolede akati kazikozyano zyabo cakuzyunguluka zipaililo zyabo, atala azilundu zyoonse zilamfu, amitwe yoonse yamalundu, mucenzule camisamu yoonse mitete, kunsi lyamibanga yoonse iivovwene, mumasena oonse nkubakali kucitila mizimu yabo tusamu twatununkilizyo.
Njootandabika ijanza lyangu kukubalwisya, njoocita kuti nyika ibe matongo aabula bantu, mumasena oonse nkubakede kuzwa kunkanda akusikila ku-Ribila. Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
Uwe O mwana amuntu, mbuboobu Mwami Jehova mbwaambila nyika ya-Israyeli. Asika mama­ nino! Asika mamanino kumabazu aanyika oonse one.
Mamanino amusikila, lino ndaamba kumutumina bukali bwangu. Njoomubeteka mbubonya mbuli inzila zyanu akumubweedezya bulumbu bweelede milimo yanu iisesemya.
Meso aangu taakooyoomufwida luse, alimwi nsikooyoomufwida luzyalo pe, Njoomubweedezya bulumbu bwanzila zyanu, milimo yanu iisesemya niicili akati kanu. Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mapenzi alasika atala lyamapenzinyina! Ncobeni asika!
Mamanino asika! Mamanino asika! Amubukila! Ncobeni asika!
Asika malweza, uwe nokede munyika! Ciindi casika, Buzuba buli afwiifwi. Mbuzuba bwalupyopyongano, tabuli buzuba bwacikwala cakukondwa atala azilundu pe.
Kabe kaindi, ndaamba kumutilila bukali bwangu akuzuzikizya lunyemo lwangu kulindinywe, Njoomubeteka mbubonya mbuli inzila zyako akukubweedezezya bulumbu bwamilimo yako iisesemya.
Meso aangu taakooyoomufwida luse, alimwi nsikooyoomufwida luzyalo pe, Njoomubweedezya bulumbu bwanzila zyanu, milimo yanu iisesemya niicili akati kanu. Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Ncobeni buzuba bwasika, Ncobeni bwasika, Malweza amusikila, Musamu wasyuuka. Micelo yakulisumpula yafulula.
Luuni lwabuka, lwaba musako wabubi. Takukooyoosyaala naba omwe akati kabo, niziba imbono zyabo, nibuba buvubi bwabo. Takukooyooba kulisumpula akati kabo.
Ciindi casika. Buzuba buli afwaafwi, Sikuula atasekeleli, alakwe sikuulisya atalili, nkaambo bukali bwasikila boonse buyo.

Sikuulisya takooyoopiluka kumakwebo aakwe, nekuba kuti bacili baumi, nkaambo cilengano cilaamba aamakamu aabo boonse. Bukali tabukooyoopiluka pe, nkabela takukooyooba naba umwi uuliyumya mububi bwabuumi bwakwe.
Balizya mweembo, babamba zintu zyoonse, nekubaboobo taakwe uuinka kuyoolwisya, nkaambo bukali bwangu bwasikila makamu aabo oonse buyo.
Ipanga lyaboneka anze, malwazi anzala zyaboneka mukati. Oyo uuli musokwe ulajazigwa ipanga, ayooyo uuli mumunzi inzala abulwazi nzeziyoomujaya.
Na nkubali bamwi akati kabo baloboka, bayooba atala amalundu, bayooba mbuli inziba zyamukuti, balaya buvuluvuta, umwi aumwi nkaambo kamilandu yakwe.
Maanza oonse akompaama, mazwi oonse ateta buyo mbuli maanzi.
Basama zisani zyamasaka, Kuyoowa kwabavumba. Bweeme bulaboneka mumasyu aabo oonse, alubala mpoluli amitwe yabo yoonse.

Bayoosowa insiliva yabo mumigwagwa, ayalo ingolida yabo iyooba mbuli cintu cisofweede, Ingolida yabo ansiliva yabo zyoonse zilakacilwa kubavuna mubuzuba bwabukali bwa-Jehova. Tazikonzyi kubakutya nikuba kuzuzya mada aabo, pe, nkaambo nzenzizyo zyaba cilebyo cakubawisya muzibi.
Bakali kulikankaizizya bweebesi bwazyo, bakali kuzicitya zikozyano zibi zisesemya, aboobo ndacita kuti zibabede cintu cisofweede.
Njoozyaaba mumaanza aabazwakule kuti bazisaale, abalo basizibi banyika bayoozitola, nkabela bayoozisofwaazya.
Njoofutatika busyu bwangu kuzwa kulimbabo, nkabela bayoosofwaazya ciyobwedo cangu. Bafumpi bayoonjila mulincico, bayoocisofwaazya, akucimwaya.
Njooleta babi babamasi kuti bakavube maanda aabo. Njoomanisya kulisumpula kwabayumu, amasena aabo aasalalisya ayoosofwaazigwa.
Mapenzi naazoosika, balayandaula luumuno, pele tabakooyoolujana pe.
Malweza alasika atala lyamalwezanyina, makani aayoosya alamvwigwa cakutobela makaninyina. Bayooyandaula cilengano kumusinsimi, pele mulao uyooloba kubapaizi, alulayo luyooloba kubanene.

Mwami ulalila, basilutwe bacisi balasama cikobela cansoni, maanza aabantu bacisi alakankama. Njoobacitila mbubonya mbuli inzila zyabo, njoobabeteka mbubonya mbubabeteka beni, nkabela bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.

Lino mumwaka wamusanu aumwi, mumwezi wamusanu aumwi, mubuzuba bwasanu bwamumwezi, ndakalikede muŋanda yangu, abalo bapati ba-Juda kabakede kubusyu bwangu, nkabela ijanza lya-Mwami Jehova lyakandiwida mpoonya awo.
Lino ndakalanga, ndabona cili mbuli muntu. Kuzwa mbuli kucikungu cakwe kuya ansi koli mulilo, alimwi kuzwa kucikungu cakwe kuya kujulu kabekabeka mbuli mundalila wamunsaka.

Mpawo wakatandabika cili mbuli ijanza, wandijata acisusu cakumutwe wangu, nkabela muuya wakandinyampula akatikati kajulu anyika, wandisisya muzilengano zya-Leza ku-Jerusalemu kumanjililo aamulyango walubanza lwamukati uulangide kunyika. Nkukonya oko nkucakabede cuuno cacikozyano cabbivwe cibusya ibbivwe.
Nkabela bulemu bwa-Leza wa-Israyeli bwakaboneka nkuko, mbubonya mbuli cilengano ncindakabona mugundu.

Lino wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, tambya meso aako kulubazu lwakunyika. Nkabela nindakatambya meso aangu kulubazu lwakunyika, ndakabona kuti oko kulubazu lwakunyika lwamulyango wacipaililo nkucakabede eco cikozyano cabbivwe kumanjililo.

Lino wakandaambila kuti, o mwana amuntu, sa wabona mbubacita? Sa wabona milimo iigambya iisesemya luzubo lwa-Israyeli njilucita okuno, kuti banditandile kule kuzwa kucikombelo cangu? Pele ulabona zintu zisesemya akwiinda ezi,
Lino wandisisya kumulyango walubanza, nkabela nindakalanga ndakabona cipulo mubulambo.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, kwankwamuna omo mubulambo. Elyo ndakakwankwamuna mubulambo nkabela kwakaboneka mulyango.
Mpawo wakandaambila kuti, Njila, ukabone milimo mibi iisesemya njibacita okuno.
Lino ndakanjila, ndabona misyobo yoonse yabauka ayabanyama bayavula, azikozyano zyamizimu zyoonse zyaluzubo lwa-Israyeli, zilibezedwe abulambo koonse koonse.

Kunembo lyazyo kwakaimvwi bantu bali makumi aali musanu aabili, bapati baluzubo lwa-Israyeli, alakwe Jazaniya mwana wa-Safani kaimvwi akati kabo. Umwi aumwi kajisi katentelo mujanza lyakwe, nkabela kwakali kulundumuka busi bwatununkilizyo.

Lino wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, sa wabona bapati baluzubo lwa-Israyeli mbubacita mumudima, umwi aumwi muŋanda yakwe yazifwanikisyo? Balaamba kuti, Jehova tatuboni pe, Jehova walekelezya nyika.
Alimwi wakandaambila kuti, Ulabona zintu azimwi zigambya nzibacita, zintu zisesemya akwiinda ezi.
Lino wakandisisya kumanjililo aamulyango waŋanda ya-Jehova uulangide kunyika, nkabela oko kwakabonwa banakazi balikede balalila Tamuzi.
Wakandaambila kuti, Sa wabona, O mwana amuntu? Ulabona zisesemyo azimwi zibi akwiinda ezi.

Elyo wakandaambila kuti, Sa wabona, O mwana amuntu? Sa ncintu ciniini buyo kuluzubo lwa-Juda kucita zisesemyo nzibacita okuno? Nkaambo atala lyazeezi bazuzya nyika luuni akundikalazya obo. Ncobeni bazuzya impemo zyangu kununka kwabo.
Nkaambo kako njoobacitila cabukali. Meso aangu taakooyoobafwida luse, nsikooyoobafwida luzyalo pe, Nekuba kuti bakwiila cakoongolola mumatwi aangu, nsikooyoobaswiilila pe.

Mpawo kwakasika bantu bali musanu aumwi bazwa kulubazu lwamulyango wakujulu uulangide kunyika, Bakeza umwi aumwi acilwisyo cakwe cakujazya mujanza lyakwe, alimwi akati kabo kali muntu umwi iwakasamide masani aatuba iwakajisi zyakulembya mucikungu cakwe, Nkabela bakanjila, baakwiima kumbali lyacipaililo camukuba.
Lino bulemu bwa-Leza wa-Israyeli bwakalitantide kuzwa kukerebimu mpaakakede kuya kucikunguzyo caŋanda. Mpawo wakoongolola oyo muntu iwakasamide masani aatuba, iwakajisi zilembyo mucikungu cakwe,
Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Inda akati kamunzi, akati ka-Jerusalemu, ukalembe citondezyo ankumu zyabantu boonse balila akutongela nkaambo kazisesemyo zyoonse zicitwa mukati kawo.
Abamwi wakabaambila mumatwi aangu, wati, Amumutobele, mukainde mukati kamunzi, mukaume bantu. Meso aanu atabafwidi luse. Mutabafwidi luzyalo pe.

Bacembele, bakubusi abanakalindu, twana abanakazi, boonse buyo muleelede kubanyonyoona. Pele mutagumi muntu naba omwe uujisi lulembo lwangu. Amutalike kucikombelo cangu. Mpoonya awo bakatalika abantu abo ibakali kunembo lyaŋanda.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Amusofwaazye iŋanda, akuzuzya mabanza bajayidwe. Kamuya. Lino bakali kuya buuma mumunzi.
Wakandaambila kuti, Milandu yaluzubo lwa-Israyeli alwa-Juda yakomena loko malaa. Nyika ilizwide bulowa, amunzi ulizwide lupilingano, nkaambo balaamba kuti, Jehova walekelezya nyika, Jehova taboni pe.
Nkaambo kako ambebo nsikooyoobafwida luse, ameso aangu taakooyoobafwida luzyalo pe, njoobweedezya inzila zyabo amitwe yabo beni.
Mpawo oyo muntu iwakasamide masani aatuba, iwakajisi zyakulembya mucikungu cakwe, wakaleta makani, wati, Ndacita mbubonya mbowakandilailila.

Nkabela wakaambila oyo muntu iwakasamide masani aatuba kuti, Njila akati kamavili, kunsi lyabaangelo bakerebimu, ukazuzye inkankamaanza malasa aayaka kuzwa akati kabakerebimu, ukaamwaye atala lyamunzi. Lino wakanjila mumeso aangu.
Bakerebimu bakaliimvwi kululyo lwaŋanda, muntu oyo naakanjila, nkabela ijoba lyakazuzya lubanza lwamukati.
Mpawo bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakatanta kuzwa kubakerebimu, bwaakwiima atala lyacikunguzyo caŋanda, nkabela iŋanda yakazuzigwa ijoba, alwalo lubanza lwakazula mumuni wabulemu bwa-Jehova,
Lino muzumo wamababa aabaangelo bakerebimu wakamvwigwa koonse koonse akusikila kulubanza lwaanze, wakali mbuli ijwi lya-Leza Cilenga naamba.
Lino naakalailila oyo muntu iwakasamide masani aatuba kuti, Bweza mulilo kuzwa akati kamavili akati kabakerebimu, oyo muntu wakanjila, waakwiima kumbali lyavili.

Mpawo kerebimu wakatandabika ijanza lyakwe kuzwa akati kabakerebimu, walinjizya mumulilo iwakali akati kabakerebimu, wabweza mulilo, wabika mumaanza aayooyo iwakasamide masani aatuba. Autambule buyo, wakazwida anze.
Lino ndakabona kuti baangelo bakerebimu kabajisi cili mbuli ijanza lyamuntu kunsi amababa aabe.
Oonse one kaelene, kaajisi mbuli mibalo akati kamibalo.
Ciindi cakweenda, kaenda kufumbwa mabazu aao one nkwaakalangide, kaataleya-leya pe. Kufumbwa ivili lyakunembo nkulyakalangide, oonse akali kulitobela, kaataleyauka pe.
Nkabela mibili yabo yoonse amasule aabo amaanza aabo amababa aabo, aalo mavwili, zyoonse zyakalizwide meso koonse koonse. Mbwaakabede mavwili ngebakajisi boonse bone.
Lino mavwili, ndakamvwa kuti alategwa tutendeleka.
Nkabela umwi aumwi kajisi masyu one: busyu butaanzi kabuli busyu bwakerubu, busyu bwabili kabuli busyu bwamuntu, busyu bwatatu kabuli bwamulavu, abwane kabuli busyu bwansika.
Nkabela bakerebimu nibakaya, aalo mavwili akeenda kumbali lyabo, alimwi bakerebimu nibakatandabika mababa aabo kuti bauluke kujulu kuzwa ansi, aalo mavwili taakwaakaleka kweenda kumbali lyabo.
Nibakaima, aalo akaima, alimwi nibakasumpulwa, aalo akasumpulwa, nkaambo mulingao momwakali muuya wabanyama.

Nkabela bakerebimu nibakazwa, bakatandabika mababa aabo akuuluka kuzwa ansi mumeso aangu, aalo mavwili akeenda kumbali lyabo. Bakaakwiima kumulyango wakujwe waŋanda ya-Jehova, nkabela bulemu bwa-Leza wa-Israyeli bwakali kujulu lyabo.
Mbembabo banyama mbendakabona kunsi lya-Leza wa-Israyeli kumulonga wa-Kebara, nkabela ndakaziba kuti mbembabo bakerebimu.
Umwi aumwi kajisi masyu one, umwi aumwi kajisi mababa one, alimwi kunsi lyamababa aabo kakuli zili mbuli maanza aamuntu.
Aalo masyu aabo, ngengao masyu ngendakabona kumulonga wa-Kebara. Nkabela boonse kabalulama mukweenda kwabo.
Nkabela wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, mbaaba bantu bayeeya bubi akupa lulayo lubi mumunzi uno.
Balaamba kuti, Ciindi cakuyaka maanda tacina kusika. Munzi nkanabwao, aswebo tuli nyama.
Nkaambo kako uleelede kubasinsimina. Sinsima, O mwana amuntu.
Mpawo Muuya wa-Jehova wakandiselukila, wandaambila kuti, Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mbuboobo mbumuyeeya, O luzubo lwa-Israyeli, nkaambo ndizi miyeeyo iinjila mumyoyo yanu.
Mwavuzya bajayidwe banu mumunzi uno, amigwagwa yawo mwaizuzya bajayidwe.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Bajayidwe banu mbemulazikide mukati kawo, mbembabo nyama, awalo munzi ngonguwo kanabwao, pele inywe muyoogwisigwa mukati kawo.
Mwayoowa ipanga, pele ipanga ndendilyo ndinjoomuletela, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Njoomugwisya mukati kawo, njoomwaaba mumaanza aabazwakule, njoobeteka makani akati kanu.
Muyoowa kupanga. Njoomubeteka kumugaano wa-Israyeli, nkabela muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Munzi uno tuukooyooba kanabwao kanu, anywebo tamukooyooba nyama mukati kawo. Njoomubeteka kumugaano wa-Israyeli.
Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova, nkaambo tamweendi mumilao yangu nikuba kubamba imbeta zyangu. Mwacita mbubonya mbuli ziyanza zyazisi zimweengelede.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,

O mwana amuntu, basikamukowanyoko, nkukuti beenzinyoko mboli abo mubuzike, aluzubo loonse lwa-Israyeli, boonse buyo mbembabo bantu ba-Jerusalemu mbebaamba kuti, Bali kule kuzwa kuli-Jehova, lino nyika ino yapegwa mumaanza esu kuti twiivube.
Lino amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Nekuba kuti ndabatandila kule akati kabamasi akubamwaisya muzisi zipambukene, ndababeda cikombelo kaindi muzisi ezyo nzizyonya nkubabede.
Nkaambo kako amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Njoomubunganya kuzwa kulibamasi akumuyobolola kuzwa kuzisi nkumumwailidwe, nkabela nzoomupa nyika ya-Israyeli.
Lino basike buyo kulinjiyo, bayoogwisya zyoonse zisesemyo azintu zibi zivundusya.
Nkabela njoobapa moyo omwe, akubika muuya mupya mukati kabo. Njoogwisya moyo wabbwe kuzwa kunyama yabo akubapa moyo wanyama,
kuti kabeenda mumilao yangu akubamba imbeta zyangu akuzicita. Lino bayooba bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wabo.
Pele abo bali amyoyo iiya butobela zisesemyo azintu zibi zivundusya, njoobweedezya bulumbu bwanzila yabo amitwe yabo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakainka kuzwa mukati kamunzi, bwaakwiima atala lyacilundu cili kujwe amunzi.
Elyo mucilengano icakazwa ku-­Muuya wa-Leza, Muuya wakandibweza, wandisisya kunyika yaba-Kasidi, nkubakabede ba-Juda batandidwe. Lino cilengano ncindakabwene cakandisia.
Nkabela ndakalwiida batandidwe makani oonse aa-Jehova ngaakanditondezya.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, ulikede akati kaluzubo lukataazya, bantu bajisi meso aakubona nekubaboobo tababoni, bajisi matwi aakuswiilila, nekubaboobo tabaswiilili, nkaambo nduzubo lukataazya.

Lino uwe, O mwana amuntu, kolibambila impasya zyakutolelela mubuzike, uinke mubuzike ciindi casikati kantandambwene. Uleelede kwiinka mubuzike kuzwa kubusena bwako kuya kubusena bumbi kantandambwene. Ambweni bayoobika myoyo yabo kumakani, nekuba kuti nduzubo lukataazya.
Gwisya impasya zyako ciindi casikati, mbuli impasya zyakutolelela mubuzike, kantandambwene, lino uwe omwini uleelede kwiinka ciindi cakumazuba kantandambwene, mbubonya mbubacita abo batolwa mubuzike.
Donkola mubulambo kantandambwene, ukainde mpawo.
Lino yumuna akuko lyako kantandambwene mumudima uusia mbi. Kovumba meso aako kuti utaboni nyika, nkaambo ndakubika kuti ubede luzubo lwa-Israyeli citondezyo.

Mpoonya awo ndakacita mbubonya mbundakalaililwa. Ciindi casikati ndakagwisya impasya zyangu mbuli impasya zyakutolelela mubuzike, elyo ciindi camangolezya ndakadonkola bulambo amaanza aangu, ndagwisya zintu mumudima, ndaziyumuna akuko lyangu kantandambwene.
Nibwakaca, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, sa bantu baluzubo lwa-Israyeli, luzubo lukataazya, tabakubuzyi kuti, Ucitanzi?
Kobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Cisinsimo eci cilaamba makani aamwami uuli mu-Jerusalemu, aluzubo loonse lwa-Israyeli, boonse bali mukati kawo.
Amba kuti, Ndime citondezyo canu. Mbuli mbundacita mebo, mbubonya obo mbubayoocitilwa. Bayootandwa akutolwa mubuzike.
Alakwe mwami uuli akati kabo uyooyumuna impasya zyakwe akuko lyakwe mumudima akwiinka. Uyoodonkola bulambo akwiinda mpawo. Uyoovumba busyu bwakwe kuti meso aakwe ataboni nyika.
Njoomuvumbya buzamba bwangu, nkabela uyoocegwa mukakole kangu, aboobo njoomusisya ku-Babuloni munyika yaba-Kasidi. Nyika eyi takooyooibona pe, nekubaboobo nkuko nkwayoofwida.
Lino boonse mbaali abo, basikumugwasya ampi zyakwe, njoobamwaisya kumabazu oonse, alimwi njoosomona ipanga lyakubatandya.
Lino bayooziba kuti, ndime Jehova ciindi eco nenooyoobamwaisizye akati kabamasi akubapalanganya munyika zyoonse.
Pele njooleka bantu bace akati kabo kuti baloboke kupanga akunzala akumalwazi, kuti bayubulule zisesemyo zyabo oko akati kabamasi nkubasikide, lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Elyo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila alimwi, liti,
O mwana amuntu, kolya insima yako cakukankama, akunywa maanzi aako cakuyoowa acabucenjenzu,

Alimwi ambila bantu bacisi kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova aabantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu amucisi ca-Juda. Bayoolya insima yabo cabucenjezu akunywa maanzi aabo cakuyoowa, kuti nyika yabo isaalwe azintu zyoonse zili mulinjiyo, nkaambo kaluuni lwabaabo bakede mumo.
Minzi iisyeede iyooba matongo, anyika iyoosaalwa, lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Alimwi ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
mwana amuntu, nkasimpinzi aka nkemujisi kunyika ya-Israyeli, kakuti, Mazuba avula, azilengaano zyoonse buyo zyaalilwa?
Kobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Njoolobya kasimpi aka, nkabela takakooyooambwa limbi mucisi ca-Israyeli. Kobaambila kuti, Mazuba ali afwiifwi zilengano zyoonse niziyoozuzikizigwa.
Nkaambo takukooyooba limbi zilengano zyabuyo nibuba busondi bwakuupaika muluzubo lwa-Israyeli.

Pele mebo nde-Jehova njooamba kufumbwa majwi ngenjanda kwaamba, elyo ayoozuzikizigwa, taakooyoomuka limbi pe. Mumazuba aakupona kwanu, O luzubo lukataazya, njooamba majwi akwaacita, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Alimwi ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila liti,
O mwana amuntu, swiilila mbubaamba bantu baluzubo lwa-Israyeli, Balati, Cilengano ncabona ncamazuba aacili kunembo; ulasinsima aaziindi zicili kule.
Nkaambo kako kobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Taakwe ijwi lyangu niliba lyomwe liyoomuka pe. Majwi ngendaamba ayoozuzikizigwa, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila liti,
mwana amuntu, sinsima akutapatila abo basinsimi ba-Israyeli basinsima, Ambila basinsimi basinsima miyeeyo yamyoyo yabo beni kuti, Amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Maawe kubasinsimi bafubafuba batobela miyeeyo yamyoyo yabo beni anukuti taakwe ncibabwene.
Basinsimi bako baba mbuli bamwaaba akati kamatongo, O Israyeli.
Tamuna kumamika munzi mpuumwayidwe, tamuna kuyakila luzubo lwa-Israyeli bulambo kuti lwiime nji munkondo mubuzuba bwa-Jehova.
Babona zilengano zyabuyo, balasonda zyakubeja, Balaamba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova, anukuti teensi Jehova wabatuma, lino balasyoma kuti ulazuzikizya majwi aabo.
Ma! Sa teensi cilengano cabuyo ncimubwene? Sa teensi zisondo zyakubeja nzimwaamba? Nkaambo mui aamba kuti “Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova,” nekubaboobo nsina kwaamba pe.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Mwaamba zyabuyo, mwabona zilengano zyakubeja, aboobo ncobeni ndaba sinkondonyoko, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.

Ijanza lyangu liyoolwanya basinsimi babona zilengano zyabuyo, basonda zyakubeja, Tabakooyooba mumbungano yabantu bangu, tabakooyoolembwa mubbuku lyaluzubo lwa-Israyeli, alimwi tabakooyoosika kunyika ya-Israyeli, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Mwami Jehova.
Ncobeni baleesya bantu bangu munzila imbi cakwaamba kuti, Muli aluumuno, muli aluumuno, anukuti taakwe luumuno. Bantu balayaka bulambo, lino abo basinsimi balabulamba mulambo.
Lino nkaambo kamakani ayo, ncobeni uleelede kwaambila abo basikulamba mulambo kuti bulawa, Kuyooba muyoba, alimwi njoowisya civulamabwe, amuuwo uyooungisya,
elyo ncobeni bulambo buyoowa. Lino bumane buyo kuwa, sa tamukooyooambilwa kuti, Uli kuli mulambo ngumwakalamba?
Lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Njooleta iguwo mubukali bwangu, alimwi kuyooba muyoba mulunyemo lwangu, acivulamabwe cabukali cakubumaninizya.
Njoomwaya obo bulambo mbumulambide mulambo akubuwisya ansi, matalikilo aabo akayubunuke. Bwawa buyo, muyoonyonyoonwa mukati kabo, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Njootila bukali bwangu abulambo aalibaabo ibakabulamba mulambo, lino njoomwaambila kuti, Bulambo tabuciwo, abaabo ibakabulambide tabaciwo,
nkukuti basinsimi ba-Israyeli ibakali kusinsima aa-Jerusalemu akuubonena cilengano caluumuno, anukuti luumuno kalutawo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.

Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Maawe kubanakazi abo batunga impindo amaboko oonse akucita mifuko yakumitwe yabantu baziimo zyoonse kuti bateye bantu, Sa ncibotu kuti muteye maumi aabantu bangu, akuponya bamwi kuti mujane impindu?

Mwandisampaula akati kabantu bangu kuti mujane inkankamaanza zyabbaale aminsuma yansima. Mwajaya bantu bateelede kufwa akuponya bantu bateelede kupona, Mwacita obo kukubeja kwanu mumatwi aabantu bangu baswiilila zyakubeja.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ndisulide impindo zyanu nzimutezya bantu kuti bacije, njoozidelaula kuzwa kumaboko aanu, aboobo njoobaangununa bantu abo mbemuyanda kutezya kuti bacije.
Ayalo mifuko yanu yoonse njooidelaula, aboobo njoovuna bantu bangu kuzwa kumaanza aanu, Tabakooyooba zyakutezya mumaanza aanu pe, Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Mwausya moyo wamuntu uululeme insoni, mebo ngwentana kuusya insoni, alimwi mwayumya maanza aasizibi kuti ataleki inzila yakwe yabubi kuti alijanine buumi.
Nkaambo kako tamukooyoobona limbi zilengano zyabuyo, tamukooyoosonda limbi, Njoovuna bantu bangu kuzwa kumaanza aanu, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Nkabela ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, bantu aba balibikide myoyo yabo kuzikozyano zyabo, acilebyo camilandu yabo balicibikide kumeso aabo. Sa ndakonzya kuzumina kuti babuzye makani kulindime?

Lino kobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Kufumbwa muntu waluzubo lwa-Israyeli uubika moyo wakwe kuzikozyano zyakwe, alimwi ulabika cilebyo camilandu yakwe kumeso aakwe, elyo ulaboola kumusinsimi, mebo nde Jehova njoomuvwiila ndemwini, nkaambo kabunji bwazikozyano,
kuti njate kumyoyo yabantu baluzubo lwa-Israyeli, mbetwaandeene abo boonse nkaambo kazikozyano zyabo.
Nkaambo kako ambila luzubo lwa-Israyeli kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Amweempwe, muleke zikozyano zyanu akufutatika masyu aanu kuzwa kuzisesemyo zyanu.

Nkaambo kufumbwa muntu waluzubo lwa-Israyeli, na wabeenzu bakala-kala akati kaba-Israyeli, uulyaandaanya kulindime, uubika moyo wakwe kuzikozyano zyakwe akubika cilebyo camilandu yakwe kubusyu bwakwe, lino uleza kumusinsimi kuti abuzye makani kulindime, mebo nde-Jehova njoomuvwiila ndemwini.
Oyo muntu njoomulanga cankayikayi, njoomubika kuti abe citondezyo akasimpi, alimwi njoomunyonyoona akati kabantu bangu, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Boonse bayoopegwa mulandu, (mulandu wamusinsimi amulandu wayooyo uumubuzya, yoonse iyooelana),
kuti luzubo lwa-Israyeli lutaleki limbi kunditobela munzila iiluleme, batalisofwaazyi limbi mumilandu yabo yoonse, aboobo bayooba bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wabo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, Na cisi candibisizya akundicitila cakukataazya, aboobo ndatandabika ijanza lyangu kulincico akucimanisizya malilu oonse akuciletela inzala, akucinyonyweda bantu abanyama boonse,
nebakajanika aba bantu botatwe Nowa aDaniele a-Jobu mukati kaco, nebakalivuna balike kubululami bwabo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Na ndaletela nyika banyama bakali kuti bainde mulinjiyo akwiibisya-bisya, ibe matongo, kutabi bantu bainda mulinjiyo nkaambo kabanyama,
nebakajanika bantu aba botatwe mukati kayo, ncobeni mbundi muumi mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, tabakooyoovuna abana balombe na basimbi. Mbembabo balike bayoovunwa, anyika yoonse iyoosaalwa,
Alimwi na ndaletela nyika ipanga, akwaamba kuti ipanga lileelede kwiinda mukati kanyika, akwiinyonyweda bantu abanyama boonse,
nebakajanika bantu aba botatwe mulinjiyo, ncobeni mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, tabakooyoovuna bana balombe na basimbi, mbembabo balike bayoovunwa.
Alimwi na ndaletela nyika malwazi, akwiitilila bukali bwangu abulowa, akwiinyonyweda bamu abanyama boonse,
nebakajanika Nowa a-Daniele a-Jobu mulinjiyo, ncobeni mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, tabakooyoovuna abana balombe na basimbi. Bayoolivuna balike kubululami bwabo.

Na kwasyaala mulinguwo bamwi bafutuka, bagwisya bana balombe abasimbi, ncobeni nibayoosika kulindinywe, alimwi nimuyoobona inzila zyabo amilimo yabo, muyooumuzigwa mumakani aamapenzi oonse ngendaletela Jerusalemu, ii, mumakani oonse buyo ngendauletela.
Bayoomuumuzya nimuyoobona inzila zyabo amilimo yabo, nkabela muyooziba kuti makani oonse ngendacita mulinguwo nsina kwaacita katakwe kaambo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, Musamu wamusaansa ulainda buti misamu yoonse? Uli amilimonzi mutabi wamusaansa uucelwa akati kamisamu yalusaka?
Sa zisamu zyawo zilabelesegwa mumilimo? Sa kulinzizyo kula temwa inembe yakwaanzikila zintu?
Ncobeni ziladukuzigwa mulilo. Lino mulilo ulote buyo impela zyazyo, alimwi akatikati kazyo apya, sa zicijisi mulimo?
We! Nizyakacilungene kazitajisi milimo, lino mulilo umane kuzilotya, kusyaale itwe buyo, zilainda loko kusampuka.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mbubonya mbuli musamu wamusaansa akati kamisamu yamulusaka, ngundadukuzya mulilo, ndacitila bantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu mbubonya obo.
Njoobalanga cankayikayi. Nekuba kuti bacija mulilo, mulilo uyoobajata. Lino kuciindi eco ninjoobalanga cankayikayi, muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Njoocita kuti nyika ibe matongo nkaambo kakukataazya kwabo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, kozibya Jerusalemu zisesemyo zyakwe mbuzibede.
Amba kuti, Mbuboobu Mwami Jehova mbwaambila Jerusalemu, Cisiko cako acisi cabuzyalwe bwako ninyika ya-Kanana. Uso kali mu-Amori, abanyoko kabali mu-Hiti.
Abuzyalwe bwako bwakali obo. Mubuzuba obo mbowakazyalwa, lukombokombo lwako teelwakakosolwa, tokwakasanzigwa amaanzi nikuba kuŋanikwa munyo nikuba kuzambailwa masila.
Katakwe meso aakakufwida luzyalo kuti muntu akucitile zintu ezi, Katakwe muntu iwakakufwida buuya pe, Wakasowegwa buyo antangalala, nkaambo wakalisulidwe mubuzuba obo mbowakazyalwa.
Lino nindakainda ndakakubona ulaalabana mubulowa bwako, nkabela nowakacili mubulowa bwako ndakakwaambila kuti, Pona,
ukule mbuli ciziki camusokwe. Lino wakakula mane wakomena, wamena inkolo. Inkolo zyako zyakakomena, amasusu aako akalampa, nekubaboobo wakacili acinswe, kotasamide.
Lino ndakakusanzya amaanzi, ndasansamuna bulowa bwako, ndakunanika amafuta.
Alimwi ndakakusamika zisani zyeebesi, ndakusamika insangu zyacikanda, ndakuzambaizya masani aatuba akukuzwaatika zyakusama zyanamundelele.
Ndakakusamika zilisakatizyo, ndabika inkaya kumaboko aako aluwenje ansingo yako.
Ndakabika cisita mumpemu yako amakobekobe mumatwi aako amusini uuebelwa amutwe wako.

Wakalisakatide ingolida ansiliva, azyakusama zyako zyakali masani aamba amasani aanamundelele azisani zyeebesi. Wakali kulya busu bunante abuci amafuta. Wakeebeka loko, alimwi wakajana coolwe cabunamalelo.
Impuwo yako yakamwaika akati kabamasi nkaambo kakiweebesi bwako, nkaambo bwakabota loko nkaambo kabulemu mbundakakupa, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Wakabweza zimwi zyakusama zyako akulicitila tukombelo twamabala mabala akuvuula mulintuto, Makani aali obo taakwe naakaboneka, alimwi taakooyooba limbi.
Alimwi wakabweza zilisakatizyo zyako zibotu, ingolida yangu ansiliva yangu, nzindakakupa, wazibumbya zikozyano zyabaalumi akuvuula anzizyo.
Azyakusama zyako zyamanyengwe manyengwe, wakazibweza kuti uzivumbilizye nzizyo, aalo mafuta aangu atununkilizyo twangu, zyoonse wakazibika kubusyu bwazyo.
Acilyo cangu ncindakakupa, (nkaambo ndakakusanizya busu bunante amafuta abuci), wakacibika kubusyu bwabo kuti cibe abweema bubotu. Mbukubede, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Alimwi wakabweza bana bako balombe abasimbi, mbowakandizyalila, akubatuuzya kulinzizyo kuti basyukute. Ma! Sa buvuule bwako bwakali makani maniini buyo?
Sa atala ambubo wakayanda kujaya bana bangu akubatuuzya kulinzizyo mumulilo?
Nkabela mukati kazisesemyo zyako zyoonse abuvuule bwako boonse tokwe nowakayeeya mazuba aabwanike bwako, nowakacili acinswe akubula zyakusama, nowakali kwaalabana mubulowa bwako.
Lino atala lyabubi bwako boonse, (Maawe! Maawe kulinduwe! mbwaamba Mwami Jehova),
waliyakila iŋanda indamfu akulicitila citondezyo cisumpwidwe mumigwagwa yoonse.
Kumaanzaanino oonse aanzila wayaka zitondezyo zyako, aboobo wacita kuti kweebeka kwako kube cisesemyo. Waba syacipabeenda, wavuzya bwaamu bwako,
Alimwi wacita bwaamu abana ba-Egepita mbobambene abo, basibwaamu bubi loko, Wakavuzya bwaamu bwako kuti undikalazye.
Nkaambo kako ndakatandabika ijanza lyangu lyakukuuma, ndacesya malilu aako, ndakwaaba mumaanza aabaaba bakusulide, nkukuti bana basimbi baba-Filisti bafwida insoni nkaambo kazilengwa zyako zyazisapi.
Abalo ba-Asuri, wakacita bwaamu abo mukutalamwa kwako. Ncobeni wakacita bwaamu abo, nekubaboobo tokwaakalamwa.
Akunyika yabasambazi, kunyika yaba-Kasidi, akwalo wakavuzya bwaamu bwako, nekubaboobo tokwaakalamwa.
mboyaka iŋanda yako indamfu akulicitila citondezyo mumigwagwa yoonse! Nekubaboobo tecwakali mbuli sibwaamu, nkaambo kakuti wasampaula zyakuvola.
Ma! Mwanakazi simamambe uutambula beenzu mucibaka camulumaakwe!
Basibwaamu boonse balapegwa zipo, pele webo wakapa bayandwi bako zipo akubalisya makulo kuti baboole kulinduwe kuzoovuula kuzwa kumabazu oonse.
Mbuboobo mbowakaandeene abanakazi bamwi mubwaamu bwako. Teebakali kukuyandaula kuti uvuule pe; nduwe wakali kupa zipo, tokwe nowakapegwa pe. Mbuboobo mbuwakaandeene.
Nkaambo kako, swiilila ijwi lya-Jehova, O sibwaamu.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Nkaambo kakuti wakalisamununa cakutausa insoni, alimwi cinswe cako cakayubunuka mubwaamu bwako mbuwakacita abayandwi bako, akaambo kazikozyano zyako zyoonse zisesemya, abulowa bwabana bako mbuwazipa,

bona! Njoobunganya bayandwi bako boonse mbowakali kusobana abo, boonse mbowakali kuyanda aboonse mbowakali kusula, njoobabunganya kulinduwe kuzwa kamabazu oonse, elyo njoovumbulula cinswe cako kumeso aabo, kuti babone cinswe cako coonse.
Nkabela njookubeteka mbubonya mbubabetekwa banakazi basimamambe abasikutila bulowa, Njoobweedezya alinduwe bulowa bwabukali abwabbivwe.
Njookwaaba mumaanza aabo, nkabela bayoomwaya iŋanda yako indamfu akupwayaula citondezyo cako. Bayookusamununa zikobela zyako, bayootola zibelesyo zyako ziebeka, akukusia uli acinswe kotasamide,
Lino bayooleta impi yakukulwisya, bayookufusa mabwe, akukukosaula amapanga aabo.
Maanda aako bayooatenta mumulilo, alimwi bayookucitila imbeta mumeso aabanakazi banji, aboobo njookulesya kuvuula, azipo zyako tokooyoozipa limbi.
Mbuboobo mbunjookutya bukali bwangu. Bukute buyo, ibbivwe lyangu liyookuleka, nkatontole tontolo akutakalala limbi.
Nkaambo kakuti tokwe nowakayeeya mazuba aabwanike bwako, pele wandikalazya amakani aya oonse, ncobeni njoobweedezya bulumbu bweelede bwanzila zyako amutwe wako, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Sa tona kucita zisapi atala lyazisesemyo zyako zyoonse?
Ncobeni boonse basimpika bayoobelesya kasimpi aka aanduwe. Bayooti, Mbuli banyina mbubabede, alakwe mwana musimbi uli mbubonya.
Nduwe mwana musimbi wabanyoko, mbembabo bakasampaula mulumi wabo abana babo, Nduwe mucizi wabacizi bako, mbembabo ibakasampaula balumi babo abana babo. Banyoko bakali mu-Hiti, auso kali mu-Amori.
Mucizi wako mupati ngu-Samariya, ngonguwe uukede abana bakwe basimbi kucimwensi cako, amucizi wako muniini uukede abana bakwe basimbi kululyo lwako ngu-Sodoma.
Pele tona kweenda munzila zyabo akucita zisesemyo zyabo buyo pe, wafwambaana kubisya kwiinda mbabo munzila zyako zyoonse.
Ncobeni mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, mucizi wako Sodoma tana kucita, walo abana bakwe basimbi, mbocita uwe abana bako basimbi.
Ezi nzezibi mucizi wako Sodoma nzyaakacita: walo abana bakwe basimbi kabalisumpula, kabali basindya, kabakede cakuliiba, pele teebakali kugwasya bacete abatengwana.
Bakali kulikankaizya, alimwi bakali kucita milimo iisesemya mumeso aangu, lino nindakabona, ndakabatanda.

Alakwe Samariya tanacitide niciba cisela cazibi zyako, Webo wavuzya milimo mibi iisesemya kwiinda mbabo, aboobo wacita kuti bacizi bako baboneke mbuli baluleme nkaambo kazisesemyo zyako zyoonse nzocitide.

Lino ayebo kofwa insoni, nkaambo wacesya milandu yabacizi bako kuzibi zyako zisesemya nzocita kwiinda mbabo. Baliluleme kwiinda nduwe, Lino webo kofwa insoni akuusa bweeme, nkaambo wacita kuti bacizi bako baboneke kuti bali mbuli baluleme.
kuti uusigwe insoni akufwa bweeme nkaambo kazintu zyoonse nzocitide mukubaumuzya.

Lino bacizi bako, Sodoma abana bakwe basimbi bayooba alimwi mbubonya mbubakabede aakutaanguna, a-Samariya abana bakwe basimbi bayooba mbubonya mbubakabede aakutaanguna, ayebo abana bako basimbi muyooba alimwi mbumwakabede aakutaanguna.
Sa mucizi wako Sodoma takakali izina lyakusampauzya mumulomo wako mubuzuba bwakulisumpula kwako,
bubi bwako nibwatakaina kuyubununwa? Lino sunu ayebo waba cisampaulo mumeso aabana basimbi ba-Edomu aboonse babambene ambabo, abana basimbi baba-Filisti abaabo bamuzyungulukide bamusampaula.
Walemenwa milandu yazisapi zyako ayazisesemyo zyako, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Nekubaboobo mebo njooibaluka cizuminano cangu ncindakatangene ayebo mumazuba aabwanike bwako. Nkabela njootangana ayebo cizuminano citeeli.
Lino unooyeeya inzila zyako akuusa insoni ninzoobweza mucizi wako mupati amucizi wako muniini akukupa mbabo kuti babe bana bako basimbi. Pele eci tacikooyooba nkaambo kacizuminano cako pe.
Njootangana ayebo cizuminano, lino uyooziba kuti ndime Jehova,
kuti uyeeye akuusa insoni akutaasama limbi amulomo wako nkaambo kabweeme bwako ninzookulekelela zibi zyoonse nzowabisya, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, labika kalabi akwaamba cikozyano mumatwi aaluzubo lwa-Israyeli.
Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Sikube mupati uuli amababa mapati amilimba milamfu, uuli amapepe manji aamanyengwe-manyengwe, wakasika ku-Lebano, wanyungula impela yamusamu wakedari.
Wakacela impumpu yawo iigolezya amutwe, waitola kunyika yabasimakwebo, waibika mumunzi wabasambazi.
Lino wakabweza imbuto zimwi zyamunyika, wazibika mumuunda wakubyala, kumbali amaanzi manji. Wazibyala mbuli cimeno camuzimbwa,

elyo cakasyuuka, caba musaansa uuyandabede uli abwiime bufwiifwi, nkabela mitabi yawo yakatandabalila kulinguwe, amiyanda yawo yakasyaala nkukonya nkuwakabede. Aboobo cakaba musaansa, capanda mitabi akumeneka matu.

Alimwi kwakeza sikube aumwi mupati, iwakajisi mababa mapati amapepe manji loko, nkabela oyo musaansa wakatalika kusendeka miyanda yawo kulubazu lwakwe akutandabika mitabi yawo kulinguwe, kuzwa kumutundulu nkowakabyalidwe, kuti autilile.
Kuubyalidwe muvu ibotu kumbali amaanzi manji, kuti umeneke mitabi akuzyala micelo, ube musaansa mubotu loko.

Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Sa ulakula kabotu? Sa takooyoozyukula miyanda yawo akugonka micelo yawo, kuti upusame, amalelema aawo oonse apusame. Takuyandwa kuboko kuyumuna bantu banji kuti miyanda yawo inonkolwe.
Alimwi uzikilwe buyo, sa ulamena kabotu? Muuwo wakujwe uugume buyo, sa tuukooyoopusamina limwi? Sa tuukooyoopusama mpoonya awo amutundulu mpuumenede?
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
Ambila luzubo lukataazya kuti, Sa tamuzi aya makani mbwaamba? Kobaambila kuti, Amubone! Mwami wa-Babuloni wakasika ku-Jerusalemu, watola mwami wawo abasilutwe bawo, wabasisya kulinguwe ku-Babuloni.
Lino wakabweza umwi walunyungu lwabwami, watanga awe cizuminano akumukonkezya cikonke. Abalo bapati bacisi wakabagwisya,
kuti cisi cibombe, citalisumpuli, cibambe cizuminano cakwe, kuti ciime nji.
Pele wakamubukila, watuma batumwa bakwe ku-Egepita, kuti bamupe imbizi abantu banji. Sa ulakonzya kuzunda? Sa muntu uucita obo ulakonzya kuvunwa? Sa uutyola cizuminano ulakonzya kuvunwa?
Ncobeni mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, uyoofwa mubusena bwamwami iwakamupa bwami, ngonguwe iwakasampawidwa cikonke cakwe akutyolelwa cizuminano cakwe. Ncobeni uyoofwa kulinguwe mu-Babuloni.
Farao ampi yakwe impati amakamu makamu aabantu bakwe tabakooyoomugwasya munkondo, zitantaala zyakulwisya niziyoolundikwa, amalambo aakusinkinizya naayooyakwa kuti kujayigwe bantu banji.
Wakasampaula cikonke akutyola cizuminano. Bakasukana amaanza, nekubaboobo wakacita zintu ezi zyoonse. Nkaambo kako takooyoovunwa pe.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni mbundi muumi, cikonke cangu ncaakasampaula acizuminano cangu ncaakatyola, zyoonse buyo njooziboozya amutwe wakwe.
Njoomuvumbya buzamba bwangu, nkabela uyoocegwa mukakole kangu, lino njoomusisya ku-Babuloni, tukabetekane nkuko nkaambo kamulandu wakwe wakundipapila.
Basilumamba bakwe babotu, boonse bayoojazigwa ipanga, abaabo basyaala bayoomwayisigwa kumabazu oonse, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime nde-Jehova wakaamba.

Njooizikila atala lyacilundu cilamfu ca-Israyeli, elyo iyoopanda mitabi akuzyala micelo akuba musamu wakedari mubotu loko, nkabela munsi awo muyookala bayuni bamisyobo misyobo. Bayookala mucenzule camitabi yawo.

Nkabela misamu yoonse yamusokwe iyooziba kuti mebo ndeJehova ndafwiinsya musamu uusumpukide akusumpula musamu mufwiifwi, ndayuminizya musamu mutete akusyuusya musamu uuyuminide. Ndime nde-Jehova ndaamba, njoocicita.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
Mwaba anzi nimubelesya aka kasimpi aanyika ya-Israyeli? Mulati, Bamawisi bakaiya masaansa aapapa, lino meno aabana akaba abuye.
Ncobeni mbundi muumi, mbwamba Mwami Jehova, tamukooyoobelesya limbi aka kasimpi mucisi ca-Israyeli.
Buntu boonse mbubwangu. Buntu bwabamawisi abuntu bwabana, boonse buyo mbubwangu, Muntu uubisya, ngonguwe uuyoofwa.
Na, muntu uliluleme, na ulabamba milao akucita bululami,
na tana kulya zipaizyo atala amalundu nikuba kutambya meso aakwe kuzikozyano zyaluzubo lwa-Israyeli, na tasofwaazyi mwanakazi wamweenzinyina nekuba koona amwanakazi kuciindi cakwe cakutondwa,
na takataazyi bantu, na ulabweedezezya sizikoloto zisyomezyo zyakwe, na tasaali imbono zyabantu, na ulaabila basinzala zilyo zyakwe akuvumba basicinswe azikobela,
na takolotyi mali kuti ajane impindu nikuba kutambula intantiko, uukasya ijanza lyakwe kucita bubi, uubeteka kabotu makani aamuntu umwi aumwi amweenzinyina,
uuenda mumilazyo yangu akubamba imbeta zyangu cakusinizya-ngonguwe uululeme, ncobeni uyoopona, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
uutacita zyeelelo ezi, uulya zipaizyo atala azilundu, uusofwaazya mwanakazi wamweenzinyina,
uupenzya bacete abatengwana, uusaala imbono zyabantu, uutabweedezezya sizikoloto zisyomezyo zyakwe, uutambya meso aakwe kuzikozyano, uucita zisesemyo,
uukolotya mali kuti ajane impindu akutambula intantiko, sa uuyoopona? Takooyoopona pe abuniini. Mbuli mbwacita zisesemyo ezi zyoonse, ncobeni uyoofwa. Mulandu wabulowa bwakwe ngumulandu wakwe mwini.
Lino na wazyala mwana uubona zibi zyoonse wisi nzyaakacita, alimwi ulayoowa, taciti mbubonya,
uutalya zipaizyo atala azilundu nikuba kutambya meso aakwe kuzikozyano zyaluzubo lwa-Israyeli, uutasofwaazyi mwanakazi wamweenzinyina,
uutakataazyi bantu, uutanyanzyi basizikoloto cisyomezyo nikuba kusaala imbono zyabantu, uuabila basinzala zilyo zyakwe akuvumbya basicinswe zyakusama,

uukasya ijanza lyakwe kububi, uutatambuli impindu nikuba kubikilwa intantiko kuli basizikoloto, uubamba imbeta zyangu akweenda mumilazyo yangu-oyo muntu takooyoofwa nkaambo kamilandu yawisi pe, ncobeni uyoopona,
Pele wisi, mbwaakapenzya bantu akusaala imbono zyamweenzinyina akucita milimo iitali mibotu akati kabantu bakwe, ncobeni uyoofwa nkaambo kazibi zyakwe.
Muntu uubisya ngonguwe uuyoofwa. Mwana takoolemenwa milandu yawisi, awisi takoolemenwa milandu yamwana. Bululami bwauululeme mbubwakwe mwini uululeme, abubi bwasizibi mbubwakwe mwini uuzicita.
Zibi zyakwe zyoonse nzyaakacita tazikooyooyeeyegwa limbi, pe, uyoopona nkaambo kabululami bwakwe mbwacita.
Sa cilandibotela kuti sizibi afwe? mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Sa nsiyandi kuti aleke inzila yakwe akupona?

Pele muntu uululeme, na waleka bululami bwakwe akucita zibi, na watalika kucita zisesemyo zyoonse nzyacita sizibi, sa ulakonzya kupona? Ne! Bululami boonse mbwaakacita tabukooyooyeeyegwa limbi. Nkaambo kakupapila kwakwe azibi zyakwe nzyacita, uyoofwa.
Na muntu uululeme waleka bululami bwakwe akucita bubi akufwa mulimbubo, uyoofwa nkaambo kabubi bwakwe mbwaakacita.
Alimwi muntu sizibi, na waleka zibi zyakwe nzyaakabisya, akucita bululami mbukweelede, uyoovuna buumi bwakwe.
Nkaambo kakuti wayeeya akuleka zibi zyakwe zyoonse nzyaakacita, ncobeni uyoopona, takooyoofwa pe.
Nekubaboobo luzubo lwa-Israyeli lulaamba kuti, Inzila ya-Mwami tiiluleme. Ma! Sa inzila zyangu taziluleme, O luzubo lwa-Israyeli? Sa teensi inzila zyanu zitaluleme?
Amusowe zibi zyanu zyoonse nzimwandibisizya. Amusandule myoyo yanu amyuuya yanu ibe mipya! Nkaambonzi mulayanda kufwa, O luzubo lwaIsrayeli?
Mebo nsiyandi kuti muntu naba omwe afwe, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Amupiluke, mube abuumi!
Amba kuti, Ma! Banyoko bakali mulavu! Bakali kubwantamana akati kabuta­ mbonyina. Bakali kunyonsya bana babo akati kabasyuumbwanyina.
Bakalela umwi wabana babo, waba mulavu, waiya kuvwima zilyo, wali kulya bantu.
Lino bamasi nibakamvwa impuwo yakwe, wakacegwa mukakole kabo, nkabela bakamuleta atulobyo, bamusisya kunyika ya-Egepita.
Mpoonya awo, banyina nibakabona kuti bazundwa, amakani taanakuba mbubakali kulangila, bakabweza aumwi wabana babo, bacita kuti abe mulavu muvwimi.
Wakali kuya bweendeenda akati kabasyuumbwa, waba mulavu, waiya kuvwima zilyo, wali kulya bantu.
Wakali kubisizya maanda aabo aabwami akusaala minzi yabo. Nyika yoonse abaabo bamulinjiyo bakayoowa ijwi lyakuvuluma kwakwe.
Lino bamasi bakuzisi zyoonse zyeengelede bakamubukila, bamucekelezya lusabwe lwabo, nkabela wakacegwa mumulindi wabo.
Bakamukwezya indobyo zyabo, bamubika mucizangala, bamutola kumwami wa-Babuloni. Bakamunjizya mukaliba, kuti ijwi lyakwe litamvwigwi limbi atala amalundu aa-Israyeli.
Cisiko calyo ciyumu cakaba musako wasikweendelezya. Cakalampisya loko akati kamapanda mapanda. Cakaboneka abulamfu bwaco amitabi yaco minji.
Pele isaansa lyakanonkolwa cabukali, lyakawaalwa ansi. Muwo wakujwe wakaliyuminizya, amicelo yalyo yakacelwa. Cisiko calyo cakayuminina; mulilo wakacisyukutya.
Lino sunu lilizikilidwe munkanda, munyika injumu iibula maanzi.
Mucisiko calyo mwazwa mulilo, watenta mitabi yalyo amicelo yalyo yoonse. Lino tamucijanwi mulindilyo cisiko ciyumu cikonzya kuba musako wasikweendelezya, Nceeco cilizyo, ncakulizya.
Lino ijwi lyaJehova lyakandisikila, liti,

O mwana amuntu, ambila bapati ba-Israyeli. Kobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Sa kubuzya makani kulindime ncemwazida? Ncobeni mbundi muumi, ndakaka kubuzigwa makani andinywe, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Sa tokonzyi kubabeteka, O mwana amuntu, sa tokonzyi kubabeteka? Kobazibya milimo iisesemya bamawisaabo njibakacita.

Kobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mubuzuba obo nindakasala Israyeli, ndakakonkezya lunyungu lwaluzubo lwa-Jakobo akulizibya kulimbabo munyika ya-Egepita. Ndakabakonkezya kuti, Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
