Mubuzuba obo mbubonya ndakabakonkezya kubagwisya munyika ya-Egepita akubaleta kunyika njindakabasalilide, nyika iikunka malili abuci, nyika imbotu kwiinda nyika zyoonse.
Lino ndakabaambila kuti, Amusowe umwi aumwi zisesemyo zyameso aakwe, alimwi mutalisofwaazyi azikozyano zya-Egepita, Ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Pele bakandipapila, bakaka kundiswiilila. Tabakwe nibakasowa umwi aumwi zisesemyo zyameso aakwe, nikuba kuleka zikozyano zya-Egepita,
Mpawo ndakaamba kubatilila bukali bwangu akukutya lunyemo lwangu kulimbabo mukati kanyika ya-Egepita.
Nekubaboobo ncindakacita ndakacicita nkaambo kazina lyangu kuti litasampaulwi mumeso aabamasi mobakakede akati kabo. Ndakalizibya kulimbabo mumeso aabaabo bamasi mukubagwisya munyika ya-Egepita.
Ndakabagwisya munyika ya-Egepita, ndabasisya munkanda.
Ndakabapa milazyo yangu akubazibya imbeta zyangu, nzenzizyo ziletela muntu buumi kufumbwa uuzicita.
Alimwi ndakabapa masabata aangu kuti abe citondezyo akati kesu ambabo, bazibe kuti ndime nde-Jehova ndabasalazya.

Pele luzubo lwa-Israyeli lwakandipapila nkukonya oko kunkanda. Tabakwe nibakeenda mumilazyo yangu, ambeta zyangu teebakali kuzibamba, nzenzizyo ziletela muntu buumi kufumbwa uuzicita. Aalo masabata aangu bakaasofwaazya loko.
Lino ndakaamba kubatilila bukali bwangu nkukonya oko kunkanda akubamanisya.
Pele ncindakacita ndakacicita nkaambo kazina lyangu kuti litasampaulwi mumeso aabamasi, nkaambo ndakabagwisya mumeso aabo.
Ndakabakonkezya munkanda cakwaamba kuti, Nsikooyoomusisya munyika eyo njendamusyomezya, nyika iikunka malili abuci, nyika imbotu kwiinda nyika zyoonse.
Ndakacita obo nkaambo kakuti bakasampaula imbeta zyangu akukaka kweenda mumilazyo yangu akusofwaazya masabata aangu, nkaambo myoyo yabo bakaibikide kuzikozyano zyabo.
Nekubaboobo liso lyangu lyakabafwida luzyalo. Teendakabanyonyona nikuba kubamanisya oko kunkanda pe.
Lino ndakaambila bana babo mumonya munkanda kuti, Muteendi mumilao yabamauso nekuba kubamba imbeta zyabo nekuba kulisofwaazya azikozyano zyabo.
Ndime Jehova Leza wanu, Amweende mumilazyo yangu, amubambe imbeta zyangu akuzicita.
Alimwi amusalazye masabata aangu, abe citondezyo akati kesu, mebo anywebo, muzibe kuti ndime Jehova Leza wanu.
Pele bana bakandipapila. Kabateendi mumilazyo yangu, kabatabambi imbeta zyangu nekuba kuzicita, nzenzizyo ziletela muntu buumi kufumbwa uuzicita, aalo masabata aangu bakaasofwaazya.
Mpawo ndakaamba kubatilila bukali bwangu akukutya lunyemo lwangu kulimbabo oko kunkanda.
Nekubaboobo ndakakasya ijanza lyangu akucita mbukweelede kucitilwa izina lyangu, kuti litasampaulwi mumeso aabamasi, nkaambo ndakabagwisya mumeso aabo.
Alimwi ndakabakonkezya munkanda kuti njoobamwaisya akati kabamasi akubapalanganya munyika zyoonse,
nkaambo kabataciti milazyo yangu, kabasampaula imbeta zyangu akusofwaazya masabata aangu, alimwi meso aabo kaalangide zikozyano zyabamawisaabo.
Nkabela ndakabapa milazyo iyatakali mibotu ambeta zitaleti buumi.
Ndakabasofwaazya azipo zyabo kukupaizya bana babo bataanzi, nkabayoosye, kuti bazibe kuti ndime Jehova.

Nkaambo ndakabanjizya munyika eyo njindakabakonkezya kubapa, pele ndilyonya, kufumbwa ciindi ncibakabona cilundu cilamfu amusamu mutete uuvovwene, kabapaila zipaizyo zyabo nkukonya azituuzyo zyabo zyakundikalazya, kabalundumuna bweema bwatununkilizyo twabo ukutila zipaizyo zyabo zyakunywa.
(Ndakababuzya kuti, Nkutyeni cipaizyo cakucilundu nkumuya kulincico. Aboobo cakaulikwa kuti ngu-Bama, mbuicicaambwa asunu.)
Lino koambila luzubo lwa-Israyeli kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Sa mulayanda kulisofwaazya mbubakacita bamausowanu akuya butobela zisesemyo zyabo?

Ciindi cakuleta zipo zyanu akupaizya bana banu mumulilo, mulalisofwaazya azikozyano zyanu zyoonse. Mucicita obo asunu, Lino sa ndakonzya kuzumina kubuzigwa makani andinywe, O luzubo lwa-Israyeli? Ncobeni mbundi muumi, mbwamba Mwami Jehova, ndakaka kubuzigwa makani andinywe,
Nkabela njoomugwisya mukati kabamasi, akumuyobolola kuzwa kunyika zyoonse nkumwakamwaikilide, ajanza ijumu akuboko kutandabikidwe abukali butilidwe.
Lino njoomusisya kunkanda yabamasi, nkabela tuyoobetekana nkukonya oko kubusyu abusyu.
Mbuli mbutwakabetekana abamausowanu munkanda yanyika ya-Egepita, tuzoobetekana anywebo mbubonya, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Njoomuumya mufunko, elyo njoomwaanzya zyaanzyo zyacizuminano.
Nkabela njoosansamuna basicinguni akati kanu abaabo bandipapila. Njoobagwisya munyika yabusibutuntuli bwabo, pele tabakooyoosika kunyika ya-Israyeli pe, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.

Njoomutambula mbuli bweema bwatununkilizyo kuciindi eco ninzoomugwisya akati kabamasi akumuyobolola kuzwa kunyika zyoonse nkumwakamwaikilide, aboobo kusalala kwangu kuyoobonwa mulindinywe mumeso aabamasi.
Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova ninjoomusisya kunyika ya-Israyeli, kunyika eyo njiyonya njindakakonkezya kupa bamausowanu.
Oko muyooibaluka inzila zyanu amilimo yanu yoonse njimwakasofwaazigwa njiyo, nkabela muyoolisesemya nubeni nkaambo kabubi boonse mbumwakacita.

Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova, nkaambo ncinjanda kucita njoocicita nkaambo kazina lyangu; nsikooyoocita mbuli bweelede inzila zyanu zibi amilimo yanu yakubisya, O luzubo lwaIsrayeli, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, tambya meso aako kumusanza cankayikayi, tuntumwida cisi cakumusanza majwi aako, sinsima cakukalalila lusaka lwaku-Negebi.

Ambila lusaka lwaku­-Negebi kuti, Swiilila ijwi lya-Jehova. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni njookunka mulilo muli nduwe, nkabela uyootenta misamu yoonse mitete amisamu yoonse miyumu iili mulinduwe. Mabangabanga aayakisya taakooyoozima, amasyu oonse aabantu ayoopya kuzwa kumusanza akusikila kunyika.
Bantu boonse bayoobona kuti ndime nde-Jehova ndakaudukula. Tuukooyoozimika pe.
Mpawo ndakati, Akaka, Mwami Jehova! Balaamba aandime kuti, Sa taambi tulabi buyo mukwaamba kwakwe?
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, lanzya busyu bwako ku-Jerusalemu cankayikayi akutuntumwida zikombelo majwi aako. Sinsima aanyika ya-Israyeli.
Ambila nyika ya-Israyeli kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Bona! Ndime sinkondonyoko! Njoosomona ipanga lyangu mumukutu walyo, njookunyonyweeda bantu boonse, nibaba baluleme nibaba basizibi.
Lino mbuli mbunjanda kukunyonyweeda bantu boonse, nibaba baluleme nibaba basizibi, ipanga lyangu liyoozwa mumukutu walyo cakulwisya bantu boonse kuzwa kumusanza mane kusikila kunyika.
Nkabela bantu boonse bayooziba kuti ndime nde-Jehova ndagwisya ipanga lyangu mumukutu walyo. Talikooyoosomenwa alimwi pe.
Lino webo, o mwana amuntu, sintimuka, Sintimuka mumeso aabo camoyo uutyokede acakuusa loko.

Lino nibazookubuzya kuti, Waba aanzi nosintimuka? uleelede kuvuwa kuti, Nkaambo kamakani ngendamvwa. Makani asike buyo, myoyo yoonse ileenzemuka amaanza oonse alakompama, myuuya yoonse ilawizuka amazwi oonse alateta mbuli maanzi, Ncobeni aleza, alazuzikizigwa, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, sinsima akwaamba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami. Amba kuti, Ipanga! Ipanga! Lilinonedwe akusyobolwa!
Lilinonedwe kuti lijaye bantu! Lilisyobwedwe kuti libalame mbuli lulabo! Ma! Sa tulakonzya kusobanasobana? Lilasampaula musako wamwanaangu amisamu yoonse.
Lyaabwa kuti lisyobolwe, kuti libelesegwe amaanza. Ipanga lilinonedwe akusyobolwa kuti lipegwe mumaanza aasikujaya.
Lila akuwuula, O mwana amuntu, nkaambo lilalwisya bantu bangu, lilalwisya basilutwe boonse ba-Israyeli. Baabwa kupanga antoomwe abantu bangu. Kolyuuma acamba,
nkaambo ciindi cakulingulwa casika. Tucite buti na ipanga lilasampaula amusako? mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
kuti myoyo yabo ienzemuke, bantu banji balebwe kumilyango yabo. Ndibambide indomo yapanga! Aha! Lyaba mbuli lulabo, lilisyobwedwe kukujazya!
Timbaula kululyo akulumwesi, koonse koonse busyu bwako nkobulangide.
Ambebo njookamba amaanza aangu, njookutya bukali bwangu. Ndime nde-Jehova ndaamba.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,

Webo, Omwana amuntu, bika inzila zyobile ipanga lyamwami wa-Babuloni nzilikonzya kutola. Zyoonse zyobile zileelede kuzwa munyika yomwe. Lino kumapambukilo aanzila eenga citondezyo cajanza litondeka kumunzi.
Bika inzila ipanga njelikonzya kutola kuya ku-Raba wabana ba-Amoni, aimwi yakuya kucisi ca-Juda aku-Jerusalemu munzi walubaya.
Nkaambo mwami wa-Babuloni uliimvwi kumapambukilo aanzila, inzila zyobile nkuziswanaanina, kuti asonde. Ulazungaanya mivwi, ulabuzya makani kutukozyano, ulalingula muni.

Mujanza lyakwe lyalulyo mwaboneka cisolo ca-Jerusalemu, cisolo cakubika mincini yakupwayauzya, cakwaasamuna mulomo kukujaya akulizya ijwi lyacikwala, cakubika mincini yakupwayauzya zitendele, cakulundika citantaala cakusinkinizya akuyaka cilwido.
Mumeso aabo makani alaboneka mbuli kusonda kwabuyo. Balikonkezezye zikonke zipati. Pele ulaibalusya milandu yabo, kuti bazundwe.

Lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mbuli mbumwacita kuti milandu yanu iibalukwe, nkukuti insotoko zyanu zyayubunuka, azyalo zibi zyanu zyaboneka mumilimo yanu yoonse-mbuli mbumwaibalukwa, muyoozundwa mulinzizyo.
Lino webo, O simasampu sizibi, silutwe waIsrayeli, oosikilwa buzuba bwako, ciindi camamanino aako aakupegwa mulandu,
mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Samununa citambala, gwisya musini. Zintu zyoonse zyasanduka. Sumpula cifwiifwi, fwiinsya cisumpukide.
Njoocita kuti musini ube cisaalo, cisaalo, cisaalo luzutu, nkabela tuukooyooba limbi mane akasike oyo uuelede, lino njooupa nguwe.
—bantu nibakubonena zilengano zyabuyo akukusondela zyakubeja —kuti balilazike ansingo zyabasimasampu basizibi basikilwa buzuba bwabo, ciindi camamanino aabo aakupegwa mulandu.
Lipilusye mumukutu walyo. Nkukonya oko nkowakalengelwa, munyika yabuzyalwe bwako, njookubeteka nkukonya.
Njookutilila bukali bwangu, njookuvukutila amulilo walunyemo lwangu, njookwaaba mumaanza aabantu basicongo bezi kunyonyoona.
Uyooba cilyo camulilo. Bulowa bwako buyooba mukati kanyika, Tokooyooyeeyegwa limbi, nkaambo ndime nde-Jehova ndaamba.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
Webo, O mwana amuntu, sa tokonzyi kubeteka, sa tokonzyi kubeteka munzi wabulowa? Kouzibya zisesemyo zyawo zyoonse.
Uleelede kwaamba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Akaka, O munzi ootila bulowa mukati kako, kuti ciindi calubeta lwako cisike, oocita zikozyano zyakulisofwaazya.

Bulowa mbotilide mbobukupa mulandu, azikozyano nzocitide nzezikusofwaazya, Wafwanzya buzuba bwalubeta lwako; ciindi camyaka yako casika. Nkaambo kako ndakubika kuti ube cisampuko muneso aabamasi asikucapwa munyika zyoonse.
Balakucapa boonse, nibaba bali afwiifwi nibaba bali kule, uwe simpuwo imbi oozwide lupyopyongano.
Mulinduwe bantu mobasampaula bamawisi abamanyina. Mulinduwe beenzu mobabbidwa, Mulinduwe bamucaala abamukabafu mobabisizigwa.
Zintu zyangu zisalalisya mwazisampaula, aalo masabata aangu mwaasofwaazya.
Mulinduwe muli bantu balengelela beenzinyina twaambo kuti batizye bulowa, abamwi balya zipaizyo atala amalundu, abamwi bacita malweza.
Mulinduwe muli bavumbula zinswe zyabamawisi, abamwi boona abanakazi kuciindi cabo cakutondwa.
Bamwi balacita milimo iisesemya abamukabeenzinyina, bamwi balacita malweza abamukabana babo, abamwi baloona abacizi babo, bana babamawisi.
Mulinduwe balalya masinkamulomo kuti batizye bulowa. Mulakolotya mali kuti mujane impindu, mulatambula intantiko, mulanyanzya beenzinyoko imbono, anukuti mebo mwandiluba, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Sa moyo wako ulakonzya kwiimikila nji, amaanza aako sa alakonzya kuba anguzu mubuzuba obo mbwenjookubeteka? Ndime Jehova. Ndaamba, akucita njoocicita.
Njoomumwaisya akati kabamasi akumupalanganya munyika zyoonse. Abusofwaazi bwako njoobumanisya.
Uyoousigwa insoni mumeso aabamasi, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
Omwana amuntu, luzubo lwaIsrayeli lwandibeda mankwisila. Boonse baba mukuba amundalila abutale alotwe mukati kabbila lyamulilo. Baba mankwisila aansiliva.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mbuli mbumwaba mankwisila nyoonse njoomuyobolola mukati ka-Jerusalemu.

Mbubonya mbuli insiliva amukuba abutale alotwe amundalila mbuziyobololwa mukati kabbila lyamulilo kuti zifulidilwe mulilo akweenzununwa, njooyobolola ndinywe mubukali bwangu buyoosya, njoomusikka akumweenzununa.
Njoomubunganya akumufulidila mulilo wabukali bwangu mane lumwi nkamweenzunune mukati kawo.
Mbubonya mbuli insiliva mbwiienzununwa mukati kabbila lyamulilo, muyooenzununwa anywebo mukati kawo, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime nde-Jehova ndamutilila bukali bwangu.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
Mwana amuntu, koiambila kuti, Nduwe nyika iitana kusalazigwa nikuba kuwidwa imvula mubuzuba bwabukali,
Bami bayo mukati kayo bali mbuli mulavu uuvuluma uukwamauna zilyo zyakwe. Balalya bantu, balabweza imbono azintu ziyandika, bavuzya bamukabafu bayo mukati kayo.

Bapaizi bayo babisizya mulao wangu, basofwaazya zintu zyangu zisalala. Tabana kwaandaanya zintu zisalalisya azintu zyabuyo nekuba kuzibya bantu zintu zisalala azintu zisofweede mbuzibede. Aalo masabata aangu tabaalemeki pe, aboobo ndasampaulwa akati kabo.
Basilutwe bayo mukati kayo bali mbuli baumpe bakwamauna nyama yabo. Balatila bulowa akunyonyoona bantu kuti balijanine impindu yakubba.
Basinsimi bayo balabalambila mulambo, balababonena zilengano zyabuyo akubasondela zyakubeja. Balaamba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, anukuti Jehova tana kwaamba.
Bantu banyika balapenzya cakubba, balanyanzya imbono. Balapenzya bacete abatengwana, abalo beenzu balabapenzya muciyanza citeelede.
Ndakayandaula muntu akati kabo iwakakonzya kumamika bulambo, aime kubusyu bwangu akubusinka nkubukolomokede, kuti ntanyonyooni nyika, pele taakwe naba omwe iwakajanika pe.
Nkaambo kako ndakabatilila bukali bwangu akubalobya mumulilo walunyemo lwangu. Inzila yabo ndaiboozya amitwe yabo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, nu,
Swiilila, mwana amuntu. Kakuli banakazi bobile, bana bada lyomwe.
Aba banakazi bakali kuvuula mu-Egepita. Bakali kuvuula mubwanike bwabo. Nkukonya oko inkolo zyabo nkuzyakatyankilwa, atunyonkelo twabunakalindu bwabo nkutwakasyobelwa.
Ngaaya mazina aabo. Mupati kali Ohola, amwanike wakwe kali Oholiba. Lino bakaba bangu akuzyala bana. Mazina nabo ngaaya. Ohola ngu-Samariya, Oholiba ngu-Jerusalemu.
basilumamba basamine zisani zisalala pyu, beendelezi abangambela, boonse bali balombe beebeka, basimbizi batantide amabbiza.
Wakabapa bwaamu bwakwe, nkokuti ba-Asuri babotubotu boonse buyo, aboonse mbakafwida muunyamuunya wakasofwaazigwa azikozyano zyabo.
Taakwe naakaleka bwaamu bwakwe mbwaakali kucita mu-Egepita, nkaambo mubwanike bwakwe baalumi bakali koona awe akusyoba tunyonkelo twabunakalindu bwakwe akumutilila bwaamu bwabo bunji.
Nkaambo kako ndakamwaaba mumaanza aabasimamambe­ bakwe, mumaanza aabana ba-Asuri, mbaakali kufwida muunya muunya.
Mbembabo bakavumbula cinswe cakwe akutola bana bakwe balombe abasimbi akumujazya ipanga. Lino naakamana kubetekwa, izina lyakwe lyakaba cisampauzyo akati kabanakazinyina.
Lino mucizi wakwe Oholiba wakabona, pele walo wakamwiinda mukubisya mukufwa muunyamuunya amubwaamu bwakwe. Wakacita bwaamu akwiinda mucizi wakwe.
Wakali kufwida ba-Asuri muunya muunya, beendelezi abangambela, basilumamba basamine zyamalebaleba, basimbizi batantide amabbiza, boonse mbalombe beebeka.
Lino ndakabona kuti wasofwaazigwa; boonse bobile buyo balitolede inzila yomwe.
Pele atala lyabwaamu bwakwe bumwi wakabika aceeci. Wakabona baalumi beengedwe abulambo, zifwanikisyo zyaba-Kasidi ziengedwe amusila,
balisamine inkumba muzikungu azitambala zikwekweba-kwekweba amitwe yabo, boonse bali mbuli basilutwe, mbubonya mbuli bana ba-Babuloni, ba-Kasidi, mbubabede mucisi cakwabo.
Ababone buyo, wakabafwida muunyamuunya, watuma batumwa kulimbabo kucisi caba-Kasidi.
Lino bana baBabuloni bakeza kulinguwe kubulo bwakukumbatanina, nkabela bakamusofwaazya abwaamu bwabo. Amane kusofwaazigwa, moyo wakwe wakabasesemwa.
Elyo naakali kucita bwaamu akulivumbula kucinswe antangalala, moyo wangu wakamusesemwa mbubonya mbundakasesemwa mucizi wakwe.
Nekubaboobo wakavuzya bwaamu bwakwe akuyeeya mazuba aabwanike bwakwe, naakali kuvuula munyika ya-Egepita,
nkabela kufwa muunyamuunya kuli basimamambe bakwe ibakali anyama mbuli nyama yambongolo abwaalumi mbuli bwaalumi bwamabbiza.
Wakalisukeme kusobana kwabwanike bwako, ba-Egepita nibakali kusyoba tunyonkelo twako akutyanka inkolo zyabusimbi bwako.
bana ba-Babuloni aba-Kasidi boonse, Pekodi a-Sowa a-Kowa, boonse bana ba-Asuri, balombe bayandika, beendelezi abangambela boonse, basilutwe abasilumamba, boonse balitantide ambizi,

Bazookuboolela azilwisyo ankalaki aŋola amakamu makamu aabantu. Bazoolibamba kukulwisya kumabazu oonse antobo azikwabilizyo angowani. Njooaba lubeta mumaanza aabo, nkabela bayookubeteka mbuli kubeteka kwabo.

Njookubikila busungu bwabukali bwangu, nkabela bayookucitila cabukali, Bayookukosola impemo amatwi, abana bako bacisyeede bayoojazigwa ipanga. Bayootola bana bako balombe abasimbi abantu bako bacisyeede bayoosukuta mumulilo.
Bayookusamununa zyakusama zyako akukunyanzya zilisakatizyo zyako ziebeka.
Aboobo njoolesya zisapi zyako abwaamu bwako nzowakaiya munyika ya-Egepita. Tokooyootambya meso aako kuba-Egepita nikuba kubayeeya limbi.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni njookwaaba mumaanza aabaabo bakusulide amumaanza aabaabo moyo wako mbuusesemwa.
Lino bayookucitila calusulo, bayootola micelo yamilimo yako, bayookusia uli acinswe abwaamba, aboobo cinswe camubwaamu bwako ciyooyubununwa, nkukuti zisapi zyako abwaamu bwako.
Aya makani ayookucitilwa nkaambo kakubisya kwako kwakuya buvuula abamasi akulisofwaazya azikozyano zyabo.
Weenda munzila yamucizi wako, aboobo inkomeki yakwe njiyonya njooipa mumaanza aako.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Uyoonywida inkomeki yamucizi wako, inkomeki impati indamfu, aboobo uyooba cisampaulo acisesyo, nkaambo ilizwide mwa.
Uyookutisigwa bukolwi abuusu, inkomeki yaluyoowo yalusaalo, inkomeki yamucizi wako Samariya.
Uyooinywida akwiikuna, elyo uyoolinonkweda masusu akukwamauna inkolo zyako, nkaambo mbuboobo mbundaamba, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Nkaambo kakuti wandiluba akundifutatila, uyoolemezegwa milandu yazisapi zyako ayabuvuule bwako.
Nkaambo bacita bumambe, amumaanza aabo muli bulowa; bacita bumambe azikozyano zyabo, abalo bana babo mbobakandizyalila babatenta mumulilo babe zilyo zyazyo.
Acintu cimwi ncibandibisizya nceeci, Basofwaazya zintu zyangu zisalalisya akubisya masabata aangu mubuzuba obo mbubonya.
Nkaambo nibakapaizizya zikozyano zyabo bana babo, mubuzuba obo mbubonya bakanjila mubusena bwangu busalalisya kuti babusofwaazye. Mbuboobu mbubakacita mukati kaŋanda yangu.
Bakatumina baalumi bazwa kule. Bakabatumina mutumwa, nkabela bakeza ncobeni. Abo baalumi, wakabasambila akulinanika musila kumeso aako akulisakatizya.
Wakakala abulo bwabulemu, alimwi intafule yakalibambidwe kubusyu bwako: alinjiyo mpowakabika tununkilizyo twangu amafuta aangu.

Kulinguwe kwakamvwigwa ijwi lyamakamu makamu aabantu bakede cakuliiba, nkaambo kwakaletwa bantu banji abantu bakoledwe kuzwa kunkanda. Aba bakabika inkaya kumaboko aabanakazi amusini uuebeka amitwe yabo.
Mpawo ndakaamba kuti, Sa baalumi tabaciti bumambe nibacita awe bwaamu?
Nkaambo baswanaana awe mbubonya baalumi mbubaswanaana amwanakazi sikuvuula. Mbuboobo mbubakaswanaana a-Ohola a-Oholiba, banakazi basizisapi.
Pele bantu baluleme bayoobabeteka, bayoobapa mulandu wabanakazi basimamambe awabanakazi basikutila bulowa, nkaambo mbasimamambe, alimwi bulowa mobuli mumaanza aabo.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Busya inkamu yakubalwisya. Njoobabika kuti babe cigambyo acisaalo.
Inkamu iyoobafusa mabwe, bayoobayasa amapanga aabo. Bana babo balombe abasimbi, boonse buyo bayoobajaya, amaanda aabo bayooarenta mumulilo.
Mbuboobo mbunjoolesya zisapi munyika, kuti banakazi boonse bacenjezegwe, bataciti zisapi mbumwacita inywe.
Zisapi zyanu bayooziboozya kulindinywe, nkabela muyoolemezegwa milandu yazibi zyanu zyakukomba zikozyano, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Mwami Jehova.
Lino mumwaka wamusanu aine, mumwezi wakumi, mubuzuba bwakumi bwamumwezi, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, lemba buzuba, nkukuti buzuba obuno mbubonya. Nkaambo mubuzuba obuno mbubonya mwami wa-Babuloni watalika kusinkinizya jerusalemu.
Alimwi ambila luzubo lukataazya cikozyano, Kobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Simpika cilongo! Simpika! Bika maanzi mulincico!
Alimwi bika zituli mumo, zituli zibo tu zyoonse, zituli zyazibelo azyamabekete, akucizuzya zifuwa zibotu.
Sala imbelele imbotu. Sika inkuni zinji kunsi lyaco. Abile maanzi aakujisya zituli zyaco. Jika zifuwa mukati kaco.
Nkaambo bulowa mbuwakatila bwaboneka mukati kawo, Wakabubika agale buyo antangalala, taakwe naakabutila ansi nikuba kubuvwikila abulongo.
Kubusya bukali bwangu kuti nkaliye inkoto yabubi, nciceeco ncindabikila bulowa bwawo agale buyo antangalala, kuti butasisigwi.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Maawe kumunzi wabulowa! Ambebo njoovuzya inkuni.
Sika inkuni zinji, mulilo uvule, Jikisya nyama, musinza uleme, azifuwa zyoonse zibe bulekete.
Wamana obo, simpika cilongo buyo amakala, kuti cipye, mukuba waco upye, kuti bubi bwaco bweenzunuke mukati kaco asinkalwe waco amanisigwe.
Ma! Ndalikataazya buyo! Sinkalwe waco munji, tazwi mumulilo pe.
Sinkalwe waco nkukuti zisapi zyako zisofweede, Mbuli mbundakali kuyanda kukusalazya pele wakakaka kusalazigwa busofwi bwako, tokooyoosalazigwa limbi mane nkakutye bukali bwangu kulinduwe.
Ndime nde-Jehova ndaamba. Kuyooba obo. Njoocicita. Nsikooyoofwa insoni nikuba kuleka. Njookubeteka mbubonya mbukweelede inzila zyako amilimo yako, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, swiilila, Ndakongomokela kukunyanzya muyandwi wameso aako, nekubaboobo toelede kulila nikuba koomoka nikuba kumbulumusya misozi.
Sintimuka cakuumuna buyo. Utalili uufwide pe. Anga citambala cako akusama insangu zyako kumaulu. Utavumbi milomo yako nikuba kulya zilyo zyabasidilwe.
Lino cifumo ndakaambila bantu, nkabela mangolezya mukaangu wakafwa. Lino nibwakaca, ndakacita mbubonya mbundakalaililwa.
Ndakabavwiila kuti, Ijwi lyaJehova lyakandisikila, liti,

Ambila luzubo lwa-Israyeli kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ndaamba kubisizya busena bwangu busalalisya, mbumulikankaizizya canguzu, cintu ciyandwi cameso aanu, myoyo yanu nciiyandisya. Abalo bana banu balombe abasimbi mbemusiide bayoojazigwa ipanga.
Pele muleelede kucita mbubonya mbundacita mebo, Mutavumbi milomo yanu nikuba kulya zilyo zyabasidilwe.
Zitambala zyanu zibe amitwe yanu, ansangu zyanu kumaulu aanu. Mutalili nikuba koomoka. Munooya bukotela-ketela mukati kamilandu yanu akutongela umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina.
Aboobo Ezekieli uyoomubeda citondezyo. Zintu zyoonse nzyaakacita, anywebo muyoocita mbubonya. Lino aya makani naazooba, muyooziba kuti ndime Mwami Jehova
Lino uwe, O mwana amuntu, mubuzuba obo nzoobanyanzya ciyubilo cabo, lukondo lwabo abulemu bwabo, zintu zibotezya meso aabo, amyoyo yabo nziiyanda, bana babo balombe abasimbi,
mubuzuba obo sa uulobokede takooyoosika kulinduwe kuzookulwiida makani?
Mubuzuba obo mulomo wako uyooasamunwa kuti uambile oyo uulobokede. Uyooamba, tokooyooba limbi syataambi, aboobo uyoobabeda citondezyo, nkabela bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
O mwana amuntu, langa cankayikayi bana ba-Amoni akusinsima aambabo.

Ambila bana ba­ Amoni kuti, Amuswiilile ijwi lya-Mwami Jehova. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Nkaambo kajwi lyako lyakuweela busena bwangu busalalisya nibwakasofwaazigwa anyika ya-Israyeli niyakasaalwa aluzubo lwa-Israyeli nibakatolwa mubuzike,
ndakwaaba mumaanza aabana bakujwe kuti bakuvube. Bayooyaka zilao zyabo mukati kako akubika zikalilo zyabo munyika yako. Bayoolya micelo yako akunywa malili aako.
Njoocita kuti Raba ube macelelo aankamele, anyika yabana ba-Amoni ibe mabutelo aambeleleo Elyo muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami jehovu. Nkaambo kakuti wakamba amaanza aako akulyatalyata amaulu aako akusekelela camoyo wako woonse nkaambo kamapenzi aanyika ya-Israyeli,
njootandabika ijanza lyangu kukulwisya akukwaaba mumaanza aabamasi kuti bakusaale. Njookulobya akati kamisyobo yabantu akukumanisya akati kazisi. Njookunyonyoona, elyo uyooziba kuti ndime Jehova,
ncobeni njookwamauna makuko aanyika ya-Moabu koonse koonse kuzwa kuminzi yakumugaano wayo, njenjiyo bulemu bwacisi, Beti-Jesimoti a-Baalameoni a-Kiriyataimu.
Njooaba cisi antoomwe acisi caba-Amoni mumaanza aabana bakujwe, kuti bacivube, aboobo tacikooyooyeeyegwa limbi akati kabamasi.
Njoobeteka ba-Moabu, elyo bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.

mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Njootandabika ijanza lyangu kukulwisya cisi ca-Edomu, nkabela njoonyonyoona bantu abanyama boonse mukati kaco. Njoocita kuti cibe matongo buyo. Kuzwa ku-Temani akusikila ku-Dedani, koonse bayoojazigwa ipanga.

Njooliya inkoto yabubi bwa-Edomu kumaanza aabantu bangu ba-Israyeli. Bayoocita mucisi ca-Edomu mbuli zyabukali bwangu ambuli zyalunyemo lwangu, Elyo bayooziba kuti ndaliya inkoto, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Njootandabika ijanza lyangu kukulwisya ba-Filisti, abalo ba-Kereti njoobamanisya, akunyonyoona bantu bamwi boonse bakunkomwe yalwizi.
Njoobaliya inkoto imbi loko, akubaumauma cabukali. Ndaakumana buyo kuliya inkoto, bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Omwana amuntu, Turo waamba aa-Jerusalemu kuti, Ehe! Citendele cabantu camwayigwa, ndajalwidwa, lino njoovuba, nkaambo wasaalwa.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Bona! Ndi sinkondonyoko, O Turo. Njookubusizya misyobo minji yabantu mbubonya mbuli lwizi mbulubusya mayuwe aalo.
Bayoonyonyoona malambo aa-Turo akumwaya maanda aawo malamfu, Njooupalila bulongo bwawo, ube igale buyo antangalala.
Uyooba ciyanikilo camazamba akati kalwizi, nkaambo mbuboobo mbundaamba, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Uyooba cisaalo cabamasi,
abalo bana basimbi bakwe bali musokwe bayoojazigwa ipanga, Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Lino bana basimbi bako bali musokwe uyoobajazya ipanga. Uyooyaka bulambo bwakukulwisya, uyoolundika zitantaala zyakukusinkinizya, uyoobika lululi lwakulitabilila kuti akulwisye.
Kuuma kwamincini yakwe uyookuumya malambo aako, amaanda aako malamfu uyooagonkauzya tuleba.

Kuvula kwambizi zyakwe kuuyookutubulusya lusuko. Malambo aako ayoozungana nkaambo kamisindo yabasimabbiza amavili ankalaki naazoonjila mumilyango yako mbubonya mbuli bantu mbubanjila mumunzi uumwayidwe.
Insumba zyambizi zyakwe uyoozilyatauzya migwagwa yako yoonse, abantu bako uyoobajazya ipanga, aziimikilo zyako ziyumu ziyoowida ansi.
Bayoosaala imbono zyako akunyonyoona zisambalo zyako. Bayoomwaya malambo aako, amaanda aako mabotu bayooakolomona. Mabwe aako azisamu zyako abulongo bwako, zyoonse buyo bayoozisowa mumaanzi.
Njoolesya kuyobeka kwanyimbo zyako, ajwi lyatuntimbwa twako talikooyoomvwigwa limbi.
Njoocita kuti ube igale buyo antangalala. Uyooba ciyanikilo camazamba. Tokooyooyakululwa limbi pe, nkaambo ndime nde-Jehova ndaamba obo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.

Bami boonse bakulwizi bayooseluka kuzwa kuzyuuno zyabo, bayoosamununa zikobela zyabo akugwisya zyakusama zyabo zyamanyengwe manyengwe, bayoosama buyoofu, bayookala ansi, bayookankama ciindi coonse cakugamba nduwe.

Bayookucitila cilizyo, bayookwaambila kuti, Ma! Wanyonyooka buti, uwe cikalilo cabasilwizi, munzi wampuwo iwakajisi inguzu mulwizi! Webo abantu ibakakede mulinduwe mwakali kuyoosya bantu boonse banyika.
Lino sunu tusuwa tulayoowa mubuzuba bwakuwa kwako. Tusuwa tuli mukati kalwizi tulakankama nkaambo kakulobelela kwako.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ninjoocita kuti ube munzi uusaalidwe mbuli minzi iitana kukalwa, ninjookuletela izambangulwe kuti maanzi manji akuvumbe,

lino njookuselusya antoomwe abaabo baselemukila mucilindi, bantu bakalekale mobabede. Njoocita kuti ukale munyika yakwacimvumwe, mbubonya mbuli matongo aakalekale, antoomwe abaabo baselemukila mucilindi, kuti utakalwi limbi nikuba kujanwa munyika yabaumi.
Njoocita kuti ube ciyoosyo. Tokooyooba limbi. Nekuba kuti ulayandaulwa, tokooyoojanwa limbi mane kukabe kutamani, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
Uwe O mwana amuntu, imba lwiimbo lwakulizya Turo.
Ambila Turo kuti, Uwe nokala kumanjililo aalwizi, nosambazya bantu bamisyobo misyobo kunkomwe zinji, mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. O Turo, webo waamba kuti, Ndeebeka loko.
Migaano yako ili mukati kalwizi. Bayaki bako bakubotya loko,
Zisamu zyako zyoonse bakaziyasya misamu yakupresi iyakazwa ku-Seniri. Bakabweza musamu wakedari waku-Lebano kuti bakuyakile kasamu kandembela.
Inkasi zyako bakazibezya mibanga yaku-Basani, acibuye cako bakacicita azisamu zyamizimbwa zizilulwidwe minyanga iyakazwa kunkomwe zyaku-Kitimu.

Cisani cako cakweenzya cakalicitidwe amasani aamanyengwemanyengwe aazwa ku-Egepita, kuti cibe citondezyo cako; acivunisyo cako cakali masani aasalala-salala akamweemvwe aakazwa kunkomwe zyanyika ya-Elisa.
Bantu baku-Zidoni abaku-Arivadi mbobakali basikukwasula bako, abantu bacenjede ba-Zemeri bakali mukati kako, mbombabo bakali basikukweenzya.
Bapati baku-Gebali abantu bacenjede bankuko bakali mukati kako, mbombabo bakali kusinkasinka myoombe yako, Maato oonse aakulwizi akali mukati kako, abalo basimaato boonse, kuti basambazyanye makwebo.
Bana ba-Arivadi aba-Heleki bakaliimvwi amalambo aako buzyungulukide, abalo ba-Gamadi bakali amaanda aako malamfu. Bakali kwaanzika intobo zyabo amalambo aako buzyungulukide, Bakakubotya loko.
Ba-Javani aba-Tubali aba-Meseki bakali kusambazyanya ayebo. Imbono zyako bakali kuzyuuzya bantu azibelesyo zyamukuba.
Bantu baluzubo lwa-Togarima bakali kuuzya imbono zyako imbizi amabbiza aankondo ambongolo.
Bana ba-Dedani abalo bakali kusambazyanya ayebo. Nyika zyankomwe zinji zyakali mumaanza aako, zyakali kusambazyanya ameja aanzovu azisamu zyamucenje.

Ba-Aramu bakali kusambazyanya ayebo nkaambo kambono zyako zinji. Bakali kuuzya mabwe aayandika aanofeki, amasani aasalala salala, amasani amanyengwe-manyengwe, amasani aatuba, amabwe aabekema amabwe aasalala pyu.
Ba-Juda anyika ya-Israyeli bakali kusambazyanya ayebo. Bakali kuuzya imbono zyako bulotwe bwaku-Miniti azinkwa abuci amafuta amabbona.
Bantu baku-Damasko bakali kusambazyanya ayebo nkaambo kabunji bwambono zyako zyamisyobo misyobo. Imbono zyako bakali kuzyuuzya waini waku-Heliboni, aboya butuba bwambelele,
awaini waku-Uzali. Abutale bufulidwe atununkilizyo amisale, zyoonse zyakauzigwa makwebo aako.
Ba-Dedani bakali kusambazyanya ayebo amasani mabotu aakutantya awo.
Ba-Arabu abamwi boonse baku-Kedari bakali kukugwasya kukusambala tubelele abagutu ampongo nzebakali kuuzya.
Basambazi baku-Seba abaku-Raama bakali kusambazyanya ayebo. Bakali kuuzya imbono zyako misamu mibotu loko, amabwe aayandika aamisyobo misyobo, angolida.
Abalo ba-Harani aba-Kane aba-Edeni abasambazi baku-Seba aba-Asuri aba-Kilimadi, boonse buyo bakali kusambazyanya ayebo.
Bakali kusambala zyamalebaleba, azikobela zyakamwemvwe azyamanyengwe manyengwe, amasasa aamabala mabala aatungidwe kabotu. Ezi zyoonse bakali kuuzya nzizyo.
Maato aa-Tarisi ngaakali kuyumuna zyakusambala zyako,
Wakazuzigwa akulemenwa loko mukati kalwizi.
Basikukwasula bako bakusisya ampwampwa, lino muuwo wakujwe wakupwaya akati kamaanzi aalwizi.

Buvubi bwako, makwebo aako, zyakusambala zyako, basibwaato bako, basikusika bako, basikumamika bako, bantu mbosambazyanya abo, basilumamba bako boonse bali mukati kako, ankamu yoonse iili mukati kako, boonse buyo bayooinkila mubbonze lyalwizi mubuzuba bwabuwe bwako.
Limvwigwe buyo ijwi lyakulila kwabasikusika bako, tunzuunzi tweengelede tulazungaana.
Boonse basinkasi balazwa mumaato aabo, Basibwaato boonse aboonse basikusika mulwizi balaima ankomwe,
balalila amajwi aabo nkaambo kako, balalila loko, Balalivwikila bulongo amitwe vabo akwaalabana muzyaala zyatwe.
Balaligela cinkulu cakukulila akusama zisani zyamasaka. Balakulila cabuusu bwamumoyo akweema kupati.
Balakwiimbila cilizyo cakwamba kuti, Maawe! Nguni uuli mbuli Turo uunyonyooka mukati kalwizi?
Makwebo aako naakali kuzwa mulwizi, wakali kulamya bantu banji, Imbono zyako zinji azyakusambala zyako zinji zyakali kuvubya bami banyika,
Pele ciindi ecino wanyonyooka mukati kalwizi, mukati kabbonze, Makwebo aako ankamu yabantu bako, zyoonse buyo zyainkila mumaanzi.
Bantu boonse bakede munyika zyakunkomwe yalwizi baligambide aanduwe, abalo bami babo bayoowa loko, amasyu aabo ausana.
Basambazi bali akati kabamasi balakunyontoka, Ncobeni waba ciyoosyo. Tokooyooba limbi.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,

O mwana amuntu, ambila mwami wa-Turo kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Moyo wako walisumpula. Waamba kuti, Ndime Leza, ndikede acuuno ca-Leza akati kalwizi. We! Uli muntu, toli Leza pe, nekuba kuti wayeeya kuba Leza.
Ncobeni uli musongo kwiinda Daniele. Taakwe cintu cisisidwe kulinduwe.
Busongo bwako amaanu aako, nzenzizyo zyakuletela buvubi, aboobo walivuzizya ingolida ansiliva muziyobwedo zyako.
Maanu aako aakusambazya, ngengao aakuyungizizya buvubi, aboobo moyo wako walisumpula nkaambo kabuvubi bwako.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mumoyo wako wayeeya kuba mbubonya mbuli Leza.
Nkaambo kako ncobeni ndakuletela bazwakule, bantu bayoosya akati kabamasi. Bayoosomona mapanga aabo kuti balwisye busongo bwako bubotu, basofwaazye bweebesi bwako.
Bayookuselemwida mudindi, nkabela uyoofwa mbubonya mbuli bayasidwe mbubafwa mubbonze lyalwizi.
Ma! Sa unoocaamba kuti, Ndime Leza? Sa unoocaamba obo kumeso aabasikujaya? Mumaanza aabaabo bakuyasa uli muntu buyo, toli Leza pe!
Uyoofwa lufu lwabatapalwidwe mumaanza aabazwakule, nkaambo ndime ndaamba obo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, imba lwiimbo lwakulizya mwami wa-Turo, Umwaambile kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Webo wakalilondokede. Wakalizwide busongo, akweebeka loko kwiinda boonse.

Wakali mu-Edeni, muunda waLeza. Kosakatide mabwe mayandisi oonse, mabwe aasalala pyu, mabwe aatopazi, mabwe aajaspi, mabwe aa-berulo, mabwe aaonukisi, mabwe aakrusalito, mabwe aasafiro, mabwe aanofeki amabwe aasmaragido; alimwi tuntimbwa twako anyeele zyako, zyoonse zyakaleengedwe angolida. Mubuzuba bwakulengwa kwako zyakabambwa.
Ndakakubika antoomwe aangelo kerubu uunanikidwe uuvumba. Wakali mucilundu cisalala ca-Leza, wakali kweendeenda akati kamabwe aamulilo.
Wakalilondokede munzila zyako kuzwa kubuzuba bwakulengwa kwako mane kusikila kuciindi eco zibi nezyakajanwa mulinduwe.
Mukusambala kwako kunji wakazuzigwa lunya, nkabela wakabisya, Nkaambo kaako ndakakutanda kuzwa kucilundu ca-Leza, alakwe kerubu sikuvumba wakakunyonyoona kuzwa kumabwe aamulilo.
Moyo wako wakalisumpula nkaambo kakweebeka kwako, Wajaya busongo bwako nkaambo kakweebeka kwako. Ndakakuwaala ansi kumeso aabami kuti bakweebele.

Muzibi zyako zinji, mukupilingana kwakusambala kwako, wakasofwaazya masena aako aasalala, Nkaambo kaako ndakagwisya mulilo mukati kako kuti ukutente, Ndakusandula kuba itwe ansi mumeso aaboonse bakubona.
Boonse bakuziba akati kabamasi bagamba kukubona. Ncobeni waba ciyoosyo. Tokooyooba limbi,
Omwana amuntu, langa Zidoni cankayikayi, ukasinsime aanguwo.

Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni ndi sinkondonyoko, O Zidoni. Njoolemezegwa akati kako, nkabela bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova nenzoobeteka makani mukati kawo anenzoosalazigwa mulinguwo.
Njooutumina malwazi abulowa mumigwagwa yawo. Kuyoowa bayasidwe mukati kawo, ipanga neliyooulwisya kumabazu oonse, Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.

Bazookala mpoonya awo cakuliiba. Banoozooyaka maanda akulima myuunda yamasaansa akukala cakuliiba, kuciindi eco ninzoobeteka bantu boonse beengelede ibakali kubasampaula. Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova Leza wabo.
O mwana amuntu, langa Farao mwami wa-Egepita cankayikayi, ukasinsime aanguwe aba-Egepita boonse.
Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni ndi sinkondonyoko, O Farao mwami wa-Egepita, webo ontale oolede akati katulonga twako, ooamba kuti, Mulonga wangu nguwangu, ndime ndakaulenga.
Njoobika tulobyo mumalakwila aako, answi zyamumilonga yako njoozikakatizya kumaamba aako. Lino njookununa kuzwa kumilonga yako answi zyoonse zyamilonga yako zikakatide kumaamba aako,
Nkabela njookusowa kunkanda, webo answi zyoonse zyamilonga yako. Uyoowa musokwe antangalala. Tokooyoobwezwa nikuba kuzikwa. Njookwaaba mumeno aabanyama baansi abayuni bakujulu, ube zilyo zyabo.
Bakujata buyo amaanza, watyoka, wakompoka akusikila mukuko lyabo. Balifunkizya buyo, wafuyuka, wabateketya mucikungu coonse.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni njookuletela ipanga, nkabela liyookunyonyweeda bantu abanyama boonse buyo.
Nyika ya-Egepita iyooba ciyoosyo amatongo. Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Waamba kuti, Mulonga nguwangu, ndime ndakaulenga.
Nkaambo kako ndaba sinkondonyoko, webo atulonga twako. Njoocita kuti nyika ya-Egepita ibe matongo aciyoosyo koonse koonse kuzwa kuŋanda indamfu yaku-Sevene kusikila kumugaano wa-Kusi.
Takukooyooinda zituta zyabantu mulinjiyo, azyalo zituta zyabanyama tazikooyooinda mulinjiyo. Tiikooyookalwa pe, myaka iili makumi one.

Njoocita kuti nyika ya­-Egepita ibe cisi citakalwi akati kazisinyina zitakalwi, aminzi yayo ibule bantu akati kaminzinyina iitakalwi, myaka iili makumi one. Njoopalanganya ba-Egepita akati kabamasi akubamwaisya munyika zyoonse.
Njoolobya buzike bwaba-Egepita akubapilusya kunyika ya-Patro, nyika yalukombokombo lwabo, nkabela bayooba musyobo muniini buyo.
Cisi cabo ciyooba ciniini buyo kwiinda zisi zimwi, tacikooyoolisumpula limbi kulibamasi pe. Njoocita kuti babe musyobo muniini buyo, aboobo tabakooyooendelezya limbi zisi.
Tabakooyooba limbi cilifunkizyo caluzubo lwa-Israyeli cibaibalusya zibi zyabo kufumbwa ciindi nebayandaula lugwasyo. Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Mwami Jehova.
Lino mumwaka wamakumi obile amusanu aibili, mumwezi mutaanzi, mubuzuba butaanzi bwamumwezi, ijwi lwa-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,

Omwana amuntu, Nebukadinezara wakabelesya basilumamba bakwe milimo iiyoosya kukulwisya Turo. Mitwe yoonse yakali azinkulu, amakuko oonse akalicuzukide. Nekubaboobo taakwe naakavola cintu pe, walo abasilumamba bakwe, kumilimo eyo njaakacita kukuulwisya.

Nkaambo kaako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Amubone! Nebukadinezara mwami wa-Babuloni njoomupa nyika ya-Egepita. Uyootola imbono zyayo, uyooisaala akwiinyanzya kuti imbono zibe zyakuvola zyabasilumamba bakwe.
Ndamupa nyika ya-Egepita, ibe bulumbu bwakwe mbwaakabelekela, nkaambo bakandibelekela milimo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, sinsima. Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Amulile! Maawe! Bwaboneka buzuba!
Buzuba buli afwaafwi! Buzuba bwa-Jehova buli afwaafwi! Mbobuzuba bwamayoba aasia mbi, ciindi cakubetekwa kwabamasi.
Egepita uyoosikilwa ipanga, amucisi ca-Kusi muyooba mapenzi, bantu nebayoojayigwa mucisi ca-Egepita, ambono zyaco neziyootolwa, antalisyo zyaco neziyootyolaulwa.
Ba-Kusi, aba-Puti, aba-Ludi, abaArabu boonse, aba-Kubi, abantu banyika njebatangene ayo cizuminano, boonse buyo bayoojazigwa ipanga antoomwe.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Boonse bagwasya ba-Egepita bayoowa, anguzu zyabo nzibalikankaizya ziyoofwinsigwa. Kuzwa ku-Migidoli kusikila ku-Sevene koonse koonse bayoolebwa ipanga, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Nyika yabo iyooba cisi citakalwi akati kazisinyina zitakalwi, aminzi yayo ilabula bantu akati kaminzinyina iitakalwi.
Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova nenoozootentede Egepita, abagwasyi bayo nebanoozootyokede.
Mubuzuba obo kuyoozwa batumwa kulindime mumaato kuyoocenjezya ba-Kusi bakede cakuliiba, lino bayooyabangana cakupenga mubuzuba obo bwa-Egepita, nkaambo buzuba bwasika.
Uleza abantu bakwe, bantu babamasi bayoosya, nkabela bayoonjizigwa kukunyonyoona nyika. Bayoosomona mapanga aabo kukulwisya ba-Egepita, anyika yoonse bayooizuzya bajayidwe.
Njooyuminizya lwizi akwaaba nyika mumaanza aabantu babi. Nyika azintu zyoonse zili mulinjiyo njoozisaazya maanza aabazwakule. Ndime nde-Jehova ndacaamba,
Njoocita kuti Patro ube matongo. Njootenta Zoani akubeteka No.
Njootila bukali bwangu ku-Sini, munzi muyumu waku-Egepita, akunyonyoona makamu aabantu baku-No.
Njoobika mulilo mu-Egepita, elyo Sini ulalyelolaolola cakupenga. No uyoomwayigwa, a-Nofi uyoopenzegwa abasinkondonyina buzuba boonse.
Balombe ba-Aveni aba-Pibeseti bayoojazigwa ipanga, abanakazi bayootolwa mubuzike.
Ku-Tahapanesi buzuba buyoosia. Nenjootyola zikeyi zyajokwe lya-Egepita nkuko, anguzu zyakwe nzyalikankaizizya neziyoolesegwa, uyoovumbizigwa ijoba, abana bakwe basimbi bayootolwa mubuzike.
Mbuboobo mbunjoobeteka Egepita, elyo bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Lino mumwaka wakumi aumwi, mumwezi mutaanzi, mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili bwamumwezi, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, ndatyola kuboko kwa-Farao mwami wa-Egepita. Ncobeni takuna kwaangwa nikuba kubikilwa misamu, takuna kuzambailwa cisani kuti kupone akujata inguzu zyakubelesya ipanga.

Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Bona! Ndi sinkondonyina Farao mwami wa-Egepita. Njootyola maboko aakwe oonse, nkukuti kuboko kucili kuyumu akooko ikwakatyokede, nkabela ipanga njooliwisya kuzwa mujanza lyakwe.
Njoomwaisya ba-Egepita akati kabamasi akubapalanganya munyika zyoonse.
Nkabela njooyumya maboko aamwami wa-Babuloni akubika ipanga lyangu mujanza lyakwe, pele maboko aa-Farao njooatyola, nkabela uyootongela kubusyu bwakwe mbubonya mbwatongela muntu uuyasidwe.
Njooyumya maboko aamwami wa-Babuloni, pele maboko aa-Farao ayoolebuluka. Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova ninzoobika ipanga lyangu mujanza lyamwami wa-Babuloni kuti alitandabike anyika ya-Egepita.
Njoomwaisya ba-Egepita akati kabamasi akubapalanganya munyika zyoonse. Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Lino mumwaka wakumi aumwi, mumwezi watatu, mubuzuba butaanzi bwamumwezi, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, ambila Farao mwami wa-Egepita amakamu aabantu bakwe. Amba kuti, Nguni ngokozyene awe mubulemu bwako?
Ncobeni ulikozyene amusamu wakedari waku-Lebano. Kojisi mitabi mibotu, amateu manji aakupa eenzule, abwiime bulamfu, nkabela mutwe wawo wakasika akumayoba.
Maanzi akali kuulela, amuninga wakali kuukuzya, nkaambo wakali kweenzya tulonga twawo koonse koonse oko nkuwakazikidwe akukunkya magombela aawo kumisamu yoonse yamusokwe.
Nciceeco bwiime bwawo ncibwakalampila kwiinda misamu yoonse yamusokwe. Mateu aawo akavula, amitabi yawo yakalampa, nkaambo kamaanzi manji.
Bayuni boonse bakujulu bakayaka ziteente zyabo mumitabi yawo, akunsi lyamateu aawo banyama boonse baansi mpobakazyalila. Muceenzule cawo moyakakede misyobo mipati yoonse yabantu.
Wakabotesya mubwiime bwawo amubulamfu bwamitabi yawo, nkaambo miyanda yawo yakanjila mumaanzi manji.

Misamu yakedari yamumuunda wa-Leza teeyakakonzya kuuinda, ayalo misamu yakupresi teeyakeelene amitabi yawo. Misigili yakali cintu buyo kumateu aawo. Taakwe musamu nuuba omwe mumuunda wa-Leza iwakeelene awo mubweebesi bwawo.
Ndime ndakaubotya amitabi yawo minji, aboobo misamu yoonse yamu-Edeni iyakali mumuunda wa-Leza yakaufwida munyono.
njoouaba mumaanza aasinguzu wabamasi, nkabela uyoouletela bulumbu bweelede bwabubi bwawo. Ndausowa.

Bazwakule bantu bayoosya babamasi, bayoougonka akuusia. Mitabi yawo iyoowida ansi atala amalundu amumakuti oonse, amateu aawo ayootyokauka mumagombela oonse aanyika. Misyobo yoonse yabantu iyoozwa muceenzule cawo akuusia.
Bayuni boonse bakujulu bayookala amatongo aawo, abalo banyama boonse bamusokwe bayooba amateu aawo.

Kuyooba obo kuti misamu imwi iili amaanzi italampi mubwiime bwayo nikuba kusisya mitwe yawo mumayoba, amisamu iinywa maanzi iteelani ayo mubwiime, nkaambo yoonse buyo yaabwa munguzu zyalufu azyanyika yakwacimvumwe akati kabana ba-Adamu baselukila mucilindi.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mubuzuba obo nuuselukila mucikalilo cabafu, njoocita kuti muninga wamaanzi ulile. Njoolesya tulonga twawo, amaanzi manji ayoosinkwa. Njoosizya Lebano nkaambo kanguwo, amisamu yoonse yamusokwe iyoopusama.

Lyamvwigwa buyo ijwi lyabuwe bwawo, njookankamya bamasi, nenzoouwaala mucikalilo cabafu antoomwe abaabo baselukila mucilindi. Lino misamu yoonse ya-Edeni, misamu mibotu iiyandika yaku-Lebano, yoonse buyo iinywa maanzi, iyooumuzigwa nkukonya oko kunyika yakwacimvumwe.
Yoonse buyo iyooseluka antoomwe anguwo mucikalilo cabafu, nkobabede bantu ibakajazigwa ipanga. Boonse buyo ibakakede mucenzule cawo akati kabamasi bayoonyonyooka.
Lino mumwaka wakumi aibili, mumwezi wakumi aibili, mubuzuba butaanzi bwamumwezi, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,

O mwana amuntu, imba lwiimbo lwakulizya Farao mwami wa-Egepita. Umwaambile kuti, Wayeeya kuti, Ndime mulavu akati kabamasi. Anukuti uli mbuli intale yamumaanzi. Ulasotoka mumilonga yako, ulavundaanya maanzi azituta zyako akusofwaazya milonga yabo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Njookuvumbya buzamba bwangu, antoomwe amakamu makamu aabantu, nkabela bayookuzuba mukoombe kangu.
Lino njookuwaala ansi, njookusowela antangalala, njoocita kuti bayuni boonse bakujulu bakale alinduwe, abalo banyama boonse baansi bayookuta kukukulya.
Njoobika nyama yako atala lyazilundu, amakuti njooazuzya mutunta wako.
Nyika yoonse akusikila kuzilundu, njooinywisya bulowa bwako, atulonga tuyoozula nduwe.
Nenjookuzimya, njoovumba ijulu akusizya inyenyeezi zyalyo, Njoovumba izuba amayoba, awalo mwezi tuukooyoomunika.
Mimuni yoonse iimweka mujulu, njooisizya amutwe wako, akukubika mumudima munyika yako, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Njoopenzya myoyo yabantu banji nenjookutola mubuzike akati kabamasi, munyika zimbi nzotezi.

Njoocita kuti misyobo minji yabantu igambe nkaambo kako, abami babo bayookankama kukukubona nenzoovuumya ipanga lyangu kumeso aabo. Bayookankama cakutaleka, nkaambo balayoowa kuswekelwa maumi aabo, mubuzuba bwabuwe bwako.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ipanga lyamwami wa-Babuloni liyookusikila.
Makamu aabantu bako, njoobawisya boonse kuma panga aabasintaze, bantu bayoosya akati kabamasi. Bayoomanisya kulisumpula kwacisi ca-Egepita akunyonyoona makamu makamu aabantu baco.
Njoonyonyoona iŋombe zyabo zyoonse zili kumbali lyamaanzi manji. Zituta zyabantu tazikooyooavundaanya limbi, azyalo insumba zyaŋombe tazikooyooavundaanya.
Aboobo njoonjolomya maanzi aabo, amilonga yabo njoocita kuti ikunke mbuli mafuta, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino nenzoosaala nyika ya-Egepita kuti ibe matongo, nenzoosaala nyika azintu zyoonse mulinjiyo, nenzoouma bantu boonse bakede mulinjiyo, bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Lino mumwaka wakumi aibili, mumwezi mutaanzi, mubuzuba bwakumi amusanu bwamumwezi, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, kolila makamu aabantu bacisi ca-Egepita. Kociselusya, calo abana basimbi babamasi balemu, munyika yakwacimvumwe, antoomwe abaabo baselukila mucilindi:
Sa nkwali naba omwe ngoinda mububotu bwaciwa cako? Seluka, ukalale abatapalwidwe.
Bayoowa akati kabajayidwe apanga. Makamu makamu aabantu bakwe, boonse buyo bayoolala awe.
Bapati babasinguzu bayoomwaambila, walo abasikumugwasya, kuzwa mucikalilo cabafu mobabede. Baseluka, balilede, aba batapalwidwe, balijayidwe apanga.
Asuri nkwali, Uli ambungano yakwe yoonse. Tubanda twabo tulizyungulukide. Boonse buyo balijayidwe. Ipanga ndelyakabawisya.

Tubanda twabo tulibikidwe kumagolelo aacilindi. Imbungano yabantu bakwe, boonse balizyungulukide kabanda kakwe. Boonse balijayidwe. Ipanga ndelyakabawisya, aba boonse ibakali kuyoosya munyika yabaumi.

Elamu nkwali. Uli ambungano yakwe yoonse. Balizyungulukide kabanda kakwe, Boonse buyo balijayidwe, Ipanga ndelyakabawisya. Baselukila munyika yakwacimvumwe kabatapalwidwe, aba ibakali kuyoosya munyika yabaumi. Batolelela insoni zyabo antoomwe abaabo baselukila mucilindi.

Bamuyalila bulo akati kabajayidwe. Makamu makamu aabantu bakwe, tubanda twabo tulimuzyungulukide. Boonse balijayidwe apanga, kabatapalwidwe. Nkaambo mbombabo bakali kuyoosya munyika yabaumi, aboobo batolelela insoni zyabo antoomwe abaabo baselukila mucilindi. Balilazikidwe akati kabajayidwe.
Meseki a-Tubala nkubali, ankamu zyabo zyoonse. Tubanda twabotulizyungulukide. Boonse balijayidwe apanga, kabatapalwidwe, nkaambo mbombabo bakali kuyoosya munyika yabaumi.

Tabakoolala abaalumi basintaze bakalekale ibakajayidwe, ibakaselukila mucikalilo cabafu azilwisyo zyabo zyankondo, ibakabikilwa mapanga aabo kumitwe, antobo zyabo zyakabikwa atala azifuwa zyabo. Nkaambo baalumi basintaze bakali kuyoosya munyika yabaumi.
Ayebo uyootyolwa akulila akati kabatapalwidwe, abaabo bajayidwe apanga.
Edomu nkwali, abami bakwe abasilutwe bakwe boonse. Bakali basinguzu, nekuboobo abalo balilazikidwe abaabo bajayidwe apanga. Balilede antoomwe abatapalwidwe abaabo baselukila mucilindi.

Bapati bacisi cakunyika nkobali boonse, aba-Sidoni boonse. Bakali kuyoosya bantu kunguzu zyabo, nekubaboobo abalo baseluka cansoni abajayidwe. Balilede kabatapalwidwe antoomwe abaabo bajayidwe apanga, batolelela insoni zyabo abaabo baselukila mucilindi.
Farao ababone buyo, uyoolyuumuzya nkaambo kamakamu aabantu bakwe ibakajayidwe apanga, Farao ampi yakwe yoonse, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Nkaambo wakali kuyoosya bantu munyika yabaumi, aboobo uyoolazikwa akati kabatapalwidwe abaabo bajayidwe apanga, nkokuti Farao amakamu oonse aabantu bakwe, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, ambila bana babantu bako. Kobaambila kuti, Na ndaletela nyika ipanga, lino bantu banyika eyo balasala muntu omwe akati kabo akumubika kuti abe mulindizi wabo,
elyo muntu oyo abona ipanga lileza anyika ulasiba mweembo akucenjezya bantu,
kufumbwa muntu uuswiilila kulila kwamweembo, nekubaboobo tacenjeli aboobo ipanga lilasika akumutola, ngumulandu wakwe mwini.
Waswiilila kulila kwamweembo pele tacenjeli, aboobo bulowa bwakwe ngumulandu wakwe mwini. Anukuti naakacenjela naakavuna buumi bwakwe.

Pele mulindizi abona ipanga lileza, na wabula kusiba mweembo aboobo bantu tabacenjeli, alimwi ipanga lilasika akutola muntu naba omwe akati kabo, oyo muntu watolwa muzibi zyakwe, pele bulowa bwakwe ngumulandu wamulindizi.

Kufumbwa ciindi nendaambila sizibi kuti, O sizibi, ncobeni ulafwa-na wabula kwaamba ijwi lyakucenjezya oyo sizibi kuti aleke inzila zyakwe, lino oyo muntu sizibi ulafwa muzibi zyakwe, pele bulowa bwakwe ngumulandu wako.
Pele na wamucenjezya sizibi kuti aleke inzila yakwe, nekubaboobo taleki inzila yakwe, oyo muntu ulafwa muzibi zyakwe, pele webo tojisi mulandu pe.

Kobaambila kuti, Mbubonya mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, nsiyandi abuniini kuti sizibi afwe pe, ndayanda kuti aleke bubi bwanzila zyakwe akulijanina buumi. Amupiluke, amupiluke, muleke inzila zyanu zyabubi. Nkaambonzi nomuyanda kufwa, O luzubo lwa-Israyeli?
Ndaambila mululami kuti ncobeni uyoopona, nekuba-boobo na wasyoma bululami bwakwe akutalika kucita bubi, milimo iiluleme yoonse njaakacita tiikooyooyeeyegwa limbi pe; uyoofwa mububi bwakwe mbwaacita.
Alimwi ndaambila sizibi kuti ncobeni ulafwa, nekubaboobo na waleka zibi zyakwe akutalika kubamba imbeta imbotu akucita bululami,
na sizibi ulabweedezezya sizikoloto zisyomezyo zyakwe akupilusya ncaakanyanzya bantu akwenda mumilazyo yabuumi akutacita bubi, ncobeni uyoopona, takooyoofwa pe.
Zibi zyakwe zyoonse nzyaakacita tazikooyooyeeyegwa limbi pe. Mbwabamba imbeta imbotu akucita bululami, ncobeni uyoopona.
Pele bantu bako balaamba kuti, Inzila ya-Mwami tiiluleme. Mal Ninzila yabo beni iitaluleme.
Mululami naaleka bululami bwakwe akucita bubi ulafwa mulimbubo.
Alakwe sizibi naaleka bubi bwakwe akubamba imbeta imbotu akucita bululami, uyoopona mulimbubo.
Mulaamba kuti inzila ya-Mwami tiiluleme. Ma! Njoomubeteka umwi aumwi mbuli inzila zyakwe, O luzubo lwa-Israyeli.

Nkabela ciindi camangolezya, oyo mulobosi naakatalina kusika, ijanza lya-Jehova lyakali alindime, lyakajalula mulomo wangu mane oyo muntu wakasika cifumo. Mulomo wangu wakajaluka, teendakacili syataambi limbi.

O mwana amuntu, bantu bakede mumatongo aamunyika ya-Israyeli balaamba kuti, Abrahamu kali muntu omwe buyo, nekubaboobo wakavuba nyika. Swebo tuli banji, ncobeni nyika ilaabwa mumaanza esu kuti twiivube.
Nkaambo kako uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ma! Mulalya abulowa, mulatambya meso aanu kuzikozyano zyanu, mulatila bulowa! Sa mulakonzya kuvuba nyika?
Mulapona amapanga aanu, mulacita zisesemyo, mulasofwaazya umwi aumwi mukamweenzinyina. Sa mulakonzya kuvuba nyika?

Mbuboobu mboelede kubaambila. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mbubonya mbundi muumi, ncobeni abo bali mumatongo bayoowisigwa apanga, abaabo bali musokwe njoobaaba mumeno aabanyama kuti babalye, abaabo bali mumampangala amumagombela bayoojazigwa malwazi.
Njoocita kuti nyika ibe matongo aciyoosyo. Inguzu zyayo nziilikankaizizya ziyoomana, azilundu zya-Israyeli ziyoobula muntu naba omwe uuinda mulinzizyo.
Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova ninjoocita kuti nyika ibe matongo aayoosya nkaambo kazisesemyo nzibakacita,
Lino balasika kulinduwe mbubasika bantu boonse, balakala kunembo lyako, balaswiilila majwi aako, pele kucita tabaaciti pe, Milomo yabo ilizwide luyando, pele myoyo yabo ilayanda impindu buyo.
Mumeso aabo uli mbuli sikwiimba nyimbo zyaluyando, uujisi ijwi ibotu, uubwene kulizya kabotu kantimbwa. Balaswiilila majwi aako, pele kucita tabaaciti pe.
Pele makani naazoozuzikizigwa, (ncobeni azoozuzikizigwa) elyo bayooziba kuti kwakali musinsimi akati kabo.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,

O mwana amuntu, sinsima akutapatila beembeli ba-Israyeli. Sinsimina beembeli, ukabaambile kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Maawe kubeembeli baIsrayeli ibakali kulisanina beni! Sa milimo yamweembeli tiiyeensi yakusanina imbelele?
Nywebo mulalya malili, mulasama boya, mulajaya zineneede, pele imbelele tamuzisanini pe,

Zilebulukide tamuna kuziyumya, indwazi tamuna kuzisilika, zityokede tamuna kuzyaanzya tusengele, ziswekede tamuna kuziboozya, azeezyo ziyanda kufwa tamuna kuziyandaula. Mwazyeendelezya canguzu acakusinikizya.
Zyakamwaika nkaambo kakubula mweembeli, nkabela zyakaba zilyo zyabanyama boonse bamusokwe.

Imbelele zyangu zyakamwaika, zyakali kuya butuntulika azilundu zyoonse amalundu oonse malamfu. Imbelele zyangu zyakamwaisigwa munyika yoonse buyo, nkabela katakwe muntu iwakali kuziyandaula na kuzilangaula.
Nkaambo kako amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova nobeembeli.

Ncobeni mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, ndibwene kuti imbelele zyangu zyaba zisaalo, imbelele zyangu zyaba zilyo zyabanyama boonse bamusokwe, nkaambo kakubula mweembeli, nkaambo beembeli bangu tabana kuyandaula imbelele, alimwi beembeli balisanina beni, tabasanini imbelele.
Nkaambo kako amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova, nobeembeli.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni ndaba sinkondonyina beembeli, njoobapa mulandu wambelele zyangu, njoobalesya kweembela imbelele, aboobo beembeli tabakooyoolisanina limbi. Njoovuna imbelele zyangu kumilimo yabo, kuti zitabi limbi zilyo zyabo.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni njoolangaula imbelele zyangu, njooziyandaula mebo ndemwini.

Mbubonya mbuli mweembeli mbwayandaula butanga bwakwe mubuzuba bwakusweekelwa imbelele zimwi, ambebo njooyandaula imbelele zyangu akuzivuna kuzwa kumasena conse nkuzyakamwaikilide mubuzuba bwamayoba aasia mbi.
Njoozigwisya kulibamasi, njooziyobolola kuzwa kuzisi, njooziboozya kunyika yazyo, elyo njoozyeembela amalundu aa-Israyeli, kumbali lyatulonga amumakalilo oonse aamunyika.
Njoozisanina mumeembelelo mabotu, Atala lyamalundu malamfu aa-Israyeli mpoziyoocelela, Ziyoobuta mpoonya awo mumacelelo mabotu, nkabela ziyoocela mani aalweela amalundu aaIsrayeli.
Mebo njooembela imbelele zyangu akuzibutya, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Ziswekede njooziyandaula, zitandidwe njooziboozya, zityokede njoozyaanzya tusengele, zilebulukide njooziyumya, pele zineneede aziyumu njoozinyonyoona akuzisanizya lubeta,
Sa tamulamwi kucela macelelo mabotu? Nkaambonzi nomulyataula macelelo amwi aasyede azituta zyanu? Sa tamulamwi kunywa maanzi aanjoloma P Nkaambonzi nomuvundaanya maanzi aasyede azituta zyanu?
Sa imbelele zyangu zileelede kucela macelelo ngemwalyatauzya zituta zyanu akunywa maanzi ngemwavundaanya zituta zyanu?
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova Leza. Ncobeni nzoobeteka makani aambelele zineneede ambelele ziketede.
Mulaya butonta amakuko aanu amabazu aanu, mulatanda zilebulukide ameja aanu mane lumwi mwazimwaisya anze.
Nkaambo kako njoofutula imbelele zyangu, kuti zitabi limbi cisaalo, nkabela njoobeteka makani aambelele ambelelenyina.
Lino njoozibusizya mweembeli omwe, mulanda wangu Davida, Ngonguwe uyoozyeembela. Uyoozisanina akuba mweembeli wazyo.
Ambebo nde-Jehova njooba Leza wabo, amulanda wangu Davida uyooba mweendelezi akati kabo, Ndime Jehova wacaamba.
Njoocita kuti babe coolwe, balo amasena oonse aazyungulukide cilundu cangu, Alimwi njoowisya lusunsu kucindi ceelede; kuyooloka lusunsumina lwacoolwe.

Ayalo misamu yamumyuunda iyoozyala micelo yayo, anyika iyookuzya zilyo, aboobo bayookala anyika yabo cakutayoowa. Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova ninzootyola zikeyi zyajoko lyabo akubavuna kumaanza aabaabo ibakabanjizya mubuzike.
Tabakooyooba limbi lusaalo lwabamasi, abalo banyama baansi tabakooyoobalya. Bayookala caluumuno, taakwe naba omwe uuyoobayoosya.
Njoobabusizya myuunda iizyalisya, aboobo tabakooyoopenzegwa limbi inzala munyika yabo nikuba kusampaulwa limbi kulibamasi.
Lino bayooziba kuti mebo nde-Jehova Leza wabo ndi abo, abalo basiluzubo lwa-Israyeli mbantu bangu, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Ndinywe imbelele zyangu, imbelele zyamacelelo aangu, ambebo ndime Leza wanu, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
O mwana amuntu, langa cilundu ca-Seiri cankayikayi, ukasinsime aancico.
Kocaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni ndi sinkondonyoko, O cilundu ca-Seiri, Njootandabika ijanza lyangu alinduwe akukulobya kuti ube matongo buyo.
Njoosaala minzi yako mane yaba matongo, lino uyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Tokwe nowakaleka bukali bwako abuniini, pe, wakaaba bana ba-Israyeli munguzu zyapanga kuciindi camafwabi aabo, nkukuti kuciindi nibakapegwa mulandu wakumaninizya.
Nkaambo kako, mbuli mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, ncobeni njookubambila bulowa, abulowa buyookutobela, Ulijisi mulandu wabulowa, aboobo bulowa buyookutobela.
Njoosaala cilundu ca-Seiri cibe matongo buyo. Njoomaninizya kulincico boonse beendeenda.
Njoozuzya zilundu zyakwe bantu bajayidwe. Atala amalundu aako amumakuti aako amumagombela aako, koonse buyo kuyoowa bajayidwe apanga.
Njoocita kuti ube ibbubu litamani, aminzi yako tiikooyookalwa limbi. Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.

Nkaambo kako mbubonya mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, ncobeni njookucitila mbubonya mbukweelede bukali bwako abbivwe lyako izyakaboneka munsulo zyako nzowakabasuzya. Lino njoozibwa akati kabo nenoozookubetekede.
Lino uyooziba kuti mebo nde-Jehova ndimvwide insampaulo zyako zyoonse nzowasampauzya zilundu zya-Israyeli. Wakaamba kuti, Balisaalidwe, bapegwa mumaanza esu kuti tubasyukutye.
Mwakalisumpwida ndime amajwi aamilomo yanu. Mwakavuzya majwi aanu aakundisampaula. Ndimvwide.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Nyika yoonse buyo niizoosekelela, njoocita kuti webo usaalwe.
Mbubonya mbowakasekelela lukono lwaluzubo lwa-Israyeli nilwakasaalwa, njookucitila mbubonya. Uyooba matongo webo, O cilundu ca-Seiri, acisi ca-Edomu coonse buyo. Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Lino webo, O mwana amuntu, sinsimina zilundu zya-Israyeli. Amba kuti, Nuzilundu zya-Israyeli, amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova.
Mbu­ boobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Basinkondonyoko bakusampaula, bati, Aha! Zilundu zyaciindi zyaabwa mumaanza esu kuti tuzivube.
Nkaambo kako sinsima kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni bamusaala, bamumwaya koonse koonse, kuti bamasi bapilingene bamuvube, aboobo mwaba caambyo ajwi lyakusampauzya mumilomo yabantu,

Nkaambo kako, nuzilundu zya-Israyeli, amuswiilile ijwi lya-Mwami Jehova. Mbuboobu Mwami Jehova mbwaambila zilundu atulundulundu, magombela amakuti, matongo aabula bantu aminzi jisiidwe, izyaba cisaalo acisabuzyo kulibamasi bamwi beengelede.

Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, Ncobeni mukupya kwabbivwe lyangu ndaamba aabamasi bamwi acisi coonse caba-Edomu, ibakalipa nyika yangu kuti baivube. Myoyo yabo ilasekelela cakusampaula, aboobo baivuba akwiisaala.

Nkaambo kako sinsima aanyika ya-Israyeli, Ambila zilundu atulundulundu, magombela amakuti, kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Amubone! Ndaamba cabbivwe acabukali nkaambo kakuti mwalemenwa bweeme bwabamasi.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni ndakonkezya kuti bamasi bamuzyungulukide bayoolemenwa bweeme abalo.
Pele nywebo, nuzilundu zya-Israyeli, muyoosyuuka mitabi akuzyalila bantu bangu ba-Israyeli micelo, nkaambo bali kufwaafwi kuboola.
Nkaambo ndime sikumugwasya, njoomubamba, nkabela muyoolimwa akubyalwa.
Njoomuvuzizya bantu, nkukuti luzubo lwa-Israyeli loonse buyo, nkabela minzi iyookalwa bantu, amatongo ayooyakululwa.
Njoomuvuzizya bantu abanyama, nkabela bayoozyalisya akuvula. Njoocita kuti mukalwe mbubonya mbumwakabede kalekale. Njoomuletela coolwe kwiinda cakutaanguna, aboobo muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Njoocita kuti bantu kabeendeenda alindinywe, nkukuti bantu bangu ba-Israyeli. Bayookuvuba; uyooba lukono lwabo. Tokooyoobajayila limbi bana babo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Balamwaambila kuti, Mulalya bantu mulajayila musyobo wanu bana bawo.
Pele lino tokooyoolya limbi bantu nikuba kujayila musyobo wako bana bawo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Nsikooyookuswiilizyalimbi kusampaula kwabamasi; tokooyoolemezegwalimbi masampauzyo aabantu nikuba kulebya musyobo wako, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,

O mwana amuntu, bantu baluzubo lwa-Israyeli, nibakacikede munyika yabo, bakaisofwaazya kunzila zyabo akumilimo yabo, Mumeso aangu inzila yabo yakali mbubonya mbuli kusofwaala kwamwanakazi kuciindi cakutondwa kwakwe.
Lino ndakabatilila bukali bwangu nkaambo kabulowa mbubakatila munyika, akaambo kazimpangaliko nzebakaisofwaazya.
Ndakabamwaisya akati kabamasi akubapalanganya muzisi zyoonse. Ndakababeteka mbubonya mbuli bweelede inzila zyabo amilimo yabo.
Pele nibakasika kulibamasi, kufumbwa nkubakaya bakasofwaazya izina lyangu lisalala, nkaambo kwakaambwa aambabo kuti, Mbaaba bantu ba-Jehova, nekubaboobo bazwa munyika yakwe.
Mpawo ndakafwa insoni nkaambo kazina lyangu lisalala, ndilwakasofwaazya luzubo lwa-Israyeli akati kabamasi nkubakasika.

Njoosalazya izina lyangu ipati ilyakasofwaazigwa akati kabamasi, ndimwakasofwaazya inywe akati kabo. Lino bamasi bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, nenzoosalazigwa mulindinywe mumeso aabo.
Njoomugwisya kulibamasi akumuyobolola kuzwa kunyika zyoonse akumusisya kunyika yanu.
Njoomusansaizya maanzi aanjoloma kuti musalale. Busofwi bwanu boonse azimpangaliko zyanu zyoonse, njoomusalazya kulinzizyo.
Njoomupa moyo mupya akubika muuya mupya mukati kanu. Njoogwisya moyo wabbwe mumibili yanu akumupa moyo wabuntu.
Njoobika Muuya wangu mukati kanu akucita kuti mweende mumilazyo yangu akubamba imbeta zyangu.
Lino muyookala munyika eyo njiyonya njindakapa bamausowanu, nkabela muyooba bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wanu.
Njoomuvuna kuziimbo zyanu zisofweede, alimwi njooleta maila kuti avule, kutabi inzala akati kanu.
Njoovuzya micelo yamisamu azilyo zyamumyuunda, kuti mutasampaulwi limbi akati kabamasi nkaambo kanzala.
Lino muyooyeeya inzila zyanu zyabubi amilimo yanu iitaluleme, nkabela muyoolisampaula nubeni nkaambo kamilandu yanu azisesemyo zyanu.
Teensi nkaambo kandinywe ncencitila obo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Eci cizibwe kulindinywe. Amufwe insoni akuusa bweeme nkaambo kanzila zyanu, O luzubo lwaIsrayeli.
Nyika iyakabula bantu iyoolimwa, tiikooyooba limbi matongo mumeso aaboonse bainda.
Lino bayooamba kuti, Nyika eyi iyakabula bantu sunu yaba mbuli muunda wa-Edeni, aminzi iisaalidwe iisiidwe iyakali matongo sunu ilijisi mabaya akukalwa bantu.
Lino bamasi beengelede bacisyeede bayooziba kuti ndime nde-Jehova ndayakulula minzi iisaalidwe akubyalulula mabubu. Ndime Jehova. Ndaamba. Ncendaamba nzoocicita.
Mbuli imbelele zyakupaizya, mbuli imbelele zyaku-Jerusalemu kuziindi zyamapobwe, mbuboobo minzi iyakasiidwembwiiyoozuzigwa makamu makamu aabantu. Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Lino wakandizyungulusya kulinzizyo koonse koonse. Ndakabona kuti mpozili zinji loko mpoonya awo agundu, alimwi zyakali ziyumu loko.
Lino wakandibuzya kuti, O mwana amuntu, sa ezi zifuwa zilakonzya kupona? Ndakavuwa kuti, Nduwe oozi, O Mwami Jehova.
Mpawo wakandaambila kuti, Sinsimina zifuwa ezi akuzyaambila kuti, O zifuwa ziyumu, amuswiilile ijwi lya-Jehova.
Mbuboobu Mwami Jehova mbwaambila zifuwa ezi. Ncobeni ndaleta muuya wabuumi, unjile mulindinywe, mupone.
Alimwi ndamubikila milambi akumusyuusizya nyama akumusamika cikanda. Lino njoomubikila muuya, kuti mupone, nkabela muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Mpoonya awo ndakasinsima mbubonya mbondakalaililwa, nkabela nendakacili kusinsima, kwakamvwigwa ijwi akuzungaana, azifuwa zyakaswena cimwi acimwi kucifuwanyina.
Alimwi nendakali kulanga, kwakaboneka milambi anyama, acalo cikanda cakazivumbilila, pele muuya wabuumi kuutamo,

Elyo wakandaambila kuti, Sinsimina muuwo. Sinsima, O mwana amuntu, ukwaambile muuwo kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Boola kuzwa kumabazu oonse one, O muuwo, ukaungile aba bantu bajayidwe, kuti bapone.
Mpawo ndakasinsima, mbubonya mbondakalaililwa, nkabela muuwo wakabanjila, elyo bakaimikila amyeendo yabo, impi impati loko.
Nkaambo kako sinsima, ukabaambile kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni njoojalula tubanda twanu, njoomubusya kuzwa mutubanda twanu, nobantu bangu, alimwi njomusisya kunyika ya-Israyeli.
Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova nenzoojalula tubanda twanu akumubusya kuzwa mutubanda twanu, nobantu bangu.
Alimwi njoobika muuya wangu mulindinywe, aboobo muyoopona, nkabela njoomukazika anyika yanu. Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova, ancindaamba ndacicita, mbwaamba Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,

Webo, O mwana amuntu, bweza kasako kamwi akulemba alinkako kuti ngu-Juda abana ba-Israyeli mbaaswanene abo. Lino bweza kasako akamwi akulemba alinkako kuti ngu-Josefa, kabe kasako ka-Efraimu abasiluzubo boonse ba-Israyeli mbaaswanene abo.
Wamana kucita obo, kotuswanaanya antoomwe kuti toonse tobile tube kasako komwe mujanza lyako.
Lino bantu bako na bakubuzya kuti, Sa tokonzyi kutupandulwida aya makani mbwaamba?

uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Amubone! Ndabweza kasako ka-Josefa kali mujanza lya-Efraimu, amikowa yabaIsrayeli baswaneene awe, nkakaswanaanye akasako ka-Juda, kuti tusako toonse tobile tube kamwi mujanza lyangu.
Tusako ntolembede alintuto tube mujanza lyako kumeso aabo,
lino uleelede kubaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ncobeni njoogwisya bana ba-Israyeli akati kabamasi nkubabede, njoobayobolola kuzwa kumabazu oonse akubaboozya kunyika yabo.
Nkabela njoocita kuti babe musyobo omwe munyika, muzilundu zya-Israyeli. Alimwi mwami omwe buyo uyoobeendelezya boonse. Tabakooyooba limbi misyobo yobile, nekuba kwaanzanizigwa limbi muzisi zyobile.

Tabakooyoolisofwaazya limbi azimpangaliko zyabo azisesemyo zyabo azibi zyabo zyoonse. Njoobafutula kundeyo zyabo zyoonse nzibabisya, njoobasalazya, aboobo bayooba bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wabo.

Bayookala munyika eyo njiyonya mobakakede bamauso, nyika njendakapa mulanda wangu Jakobo. Bayookala mulinjiyo, balo abana babo abana babana babo, lyoonse buyo mane kukabe kutamani. Nkabela Davida mulanda wangu nguuyooba mweendelezi wabo kukabe kutamani.
Njootangana abo cizuminano caluumuno cibabede cizuminano citeeli. Njoobapa coolwe akubavuzya akubika busena bwangu busalalisya akati kabo kukabe kutamani.
Cikalilo cangu ciyooba akati kabo, elyo njooba Leza wabo, abalo bayooba bantu bangu.
Lino bamasi bayooziba kuti mebo nde-Jehova ndasalazya ba-Israyeli, cikombelo cangu cisalala neciyooba akati kabo lyoonse.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, liti,
O mwana amuntu, langa Gogo wakunyika ya-Magogo, silutwe mupati wa-Meseki a-Tubali, Komulanga cankayikayi akusinsima aanguwe.
Amba kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Bona! Ndi sinkondonyoko, O Gogo, silutwe mupati wa-Meseki a-Tubali.

Njookupilusya, njoobika tulobyo mumalakwila aako akukugwisya, webo ampi yako yoonse, imbizi abasimabbiza, boonse balisamide zilwisyo zyoonse, makamu mapati aali azikwabilizyo antobo, boonse bajisi mapanga.
Abalo ba-Persia aba-Kusi aba-Puti bali abo, boonse bali antobo angowani.
Ba-Gomeri amakamu aabo oonse, luzubo lwa-Togarima luzwa kumagolelo aakunyika amakamu aabo oonse, bantu banji bali ayebo.

Amane mazuba manji, muyooyobololwa, Kumamanino aamyaka uyoosika kukulwisya nyika iyakabukulusigwa munkondo, bantu nkobakabungene kuzwa kuzisi zinji atala azilundu zyaIsrayeli izyakali matongo lyoonse, Bantu bayo bakayobololwa kuzwa kulibamasi, lino sunu balikede caluumuno boonse.
Uyoosika mbuli iguwo, uyooza mbuli ijoba livumba nyika, yebo amakamu aako oonse abantu banji mboli abo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mubuzuba obo makani ayoobuka mumoyo wako, nkabela uyooyeeya miyeeyo mibi,
akwaamba kuti, Njiinke kunyika yaminzi iitajisi mabaya, nkalwisye bantu batontwede bakede caluumuno, batakwe malambo naaba mankolo neziba zitendele;
nkasaale imbono akunyanzya buvubi; nkalwisye matongo aayakulwidwe, bantu nkobayobolwedwe kuzwa kulibamasi, nkobajene iŋombe ambono, bakede muntinti yanyika.

Seba a-Dedani abasambazi baku-Tarisi, atunzuunzi toonse, boonse bayookubuzya kuti, Sa weza kusaala imbono? Sa wayobolola makamu makamu aako kukunyanzya buvubi, kukutola insilva angolida, kukutola iŋombe ambono, akukusaala zintu zinji?
akuboola kuzwa kucisi cako cakumagolelo aakunyika, yebo abantu banji mboli abo, boonse balitantide ambizi, makamu makamu aabantu, impi impati loko.
Uyoosika kukulwisya bantu bangu ba-Israyeli mbuli ijoba livumba nyika. Kumamanino aaciindi njookuleta kukulwisya nyika yangu, kuti bamasi bandizibe nenzoolemekwa mumeso aabo mumakani aako, O Gogo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Sa teensi nduwe ngundakaamba mumazuba aakamana kumilomo yabalanda bangu basinsimi ba-Israyeli? Mumazuba ayo bakali kusinsima lyoonse kuti njookuleta kukulwisya.
Pele mubuzuba obo, Gogo naazoosika kukulwisya nyika ya-Israyeli, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, bukali bwangu buyoobuka.
Nkaambo ndaamba mubbivwe lyangu amubukali bwangu bupisya, ndati, Ncobeni mubuzuba obo kuyooba kukankama kuyoosya munyika ya-Israyeli.

Inswi zyamulwizi, abayuni bakujulu, abanyama bamusokwe, abauka boonse bayavula ansi, abantu boonse bakede anyika, boonse buyo bayookankama kubusyu bwangu. Azyalo zilundu ziyoomwayigwa, amandomba aakumajenga ayookolomoka, amalambo oonse ayoowida ansi.
Njoomuletela ziyoosyo zyamisyobo misyobo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, nkabela ipanga lyamuntu umwi aumwi liyoolwisya mweenzinyina.
Njoomubeteka amalwazi abulowa. Njoomuwisizya imvula yamucobocobo acivulamabwe, mulilo asulufa, walo amakamu makamu aakwe abantu banji boonse mbali abo.
Mbuboobo mbonjoolemezegwa akusalazigwa akuzibwa mumeso aabamasi, nkabela bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Njookupilusya, njookweenzya njookuleta kuzwa kumagolelo aakunyika, njookusisya kuzilundu zya-Israyeli.
Lino njookuumina buta bwako mujanza lyako lyalumwensi, akuwisya mivwi mujanza lyako lyalulyo.
Atala lyazilundu zya-Israyeli mpoti wide, yebo amakamu aako oonse abantu boonse mboli abo. Njookwaaba mumilomo yabayuni bamisyobo misyobo ayabanyama bamusokwe, kuti bakumanisye.
Uyoowida musokwe antangalala buyo, nkaambo mbuboobo mbundaamba, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Alimwi njootuma mulilo kuliMagogi akulibaabo bakede cakuliiba muzisi zyakunkomwe yalwizi, elyo bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova.
Ncobeni makani aleza, alaba mbubonya obo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Mbubuzuba obo mbondakaamba,

Lino bantu bakede muminzi ya-Israyeli bayooinka kuyoolundika zilwisyo mumililo akuzitenta. Zitabilizyo antobo, mata amivwi, tuleba amyuumba, bayoozitenta zyoonse buyo. Ziyooba inkuni zyabo myaka iili musanu aibili.
Tabakooyootebba inkuni musokwe nekuba kugonka muzisaka pe, nkaambo zilwisyo nzeziyooba inkuni zyabo. Bayoosaala basikubasaala akunyanzya basikubanyanzya, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.

Mubuzuba obo njoopa Gogo busena bwamavwiko mucisi ca-Israyeli, Ikuti lya-Basilweendo kujwe lyakulwizi, nkabela buyoosinkila beenda inzila, nkaambo nkukonya oko nkubayoozika Gogo amakamu aakwe oonse. Bayoobuulika kuti ndikuti lya-Makamu aa-Gogo.
Myezi iili musanu aibili luzubo lwa-Israyeli lunoobavwika, kuti basalazye nyika.
Bantu boonse buyo banyika bayoobavwika, nkabela aya makani ayoobabeda impuwo mubuzuba bwakulemekwa kwangu, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Bayoobika bantu batajisi milimo imwi cita kuya bweendeenda moonse munyika akuvwika abo bacisyeede atala anyika, kuti baisalazye. Yamana myezi iili musanu aibili, bayoolingula nyika;
basikweenda banooya bweenda munyika, nkabela kufumbwa muntu uubona cifuwa camuntu uyoobika citondezyo kumbali lyaco mane basikuvwika bakamane kucivwika mukuti lya-Makamu aa-Gogo.
Awalo munzi wakooko uyootegwa Hamona. Mbuboobo mbubayoosalazya nyika.
Muyoolya nyama yabasintaze akunywa bulowa bwabapati banyika, bagutu atubelele abasijembwe abapoho, boonse buyo baneneede baku-Basani.
Muyoolya mafuta cakukuta akunywa bulowa bwakukolwa oko kucipaizyo ncindi mukumubambila.
Kuntafule yangu muyookuta kukulya imbizi abasikuzitanta, baalumi basintaze abasilumamba boonse, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Elyo kuzwa kubuzuba obo luzubo lwa-Israyeli luyooziba kuti ndime Jehova Leza wabo muya mazuba oonse.

Abalo bamasi bayooziba kuti nkekambo kazibi zyabo luzubo lwa-Israyeli neebatolelwa mubuzike, nkaambo bakapapila ndime, aboobo ndakasisa busyu bwangu kulimbabo akubaaba mumaanza aabasinkondonyina mane boonse bakajazigwa ipanga.
Ndakabacitila mbubonya mbuli kweelede kusofwaala kwabo azibi zyabo. Ndakasisa busyu bwangu kulimbabo.
Bayooluba bweeme bwabo, azibi zyabo zyoonse nzibandibisizya mubuzuba obo nenzoobakazika caluumuno anyika yabo, nebazoobula uubayoosya,
nenzoobaboozya kuzwa kulibamasi akubayobolola kuzwa kuzisi zyabasinkondonyina akulemekwa mulimbabo mumeso aazisi zinji.
Lino bayooziba kuti ndime Jehova Leza wabo, nkaambo ndime ndakabanjizya mubuzike muzisi zyabamasi, alimwi ndime ndakababoozya alimwi kunyika yabo. Nsikooyoosia limbi naba omwe wabo akati kabamasi,
alimwi nsikooyoosisa limbi busyu bwangu kulimbabo nenjootilila luzubo lwa-Israyeli muuya wangu, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
nkabela muzilengano zya-Leza wakandisisya kunyika ya-Israyeli, wanditula atala lyacilundu cilamfu loko. Mpoonya awo kwakaboneka mayake aali mbuli munzi oko kumusanza.
Lino naakandisisya nkuko, ndakabona muntu uuli aciwa cili mbuli mukuba, Kajisi lukole mujanza lyakwe, atete lyakweelesya, alimwi kaimvwi mumulyango.

Oyu muntu wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, meso aako abone, aalo matwi aako aswiilile, alimwi bika moyo wako kuzintu zyoonse nzensi kutondezye, nkaambo kakuti ncecico ncowaletelwa okuno kuti nkutondezye, Lino zintu zyoonse nzobona, uleelede kuzilwiida luzubo lwa-Israyeli.
Mpawo wakasika kumulyango uulangide kujwe, watanta matantilo aawo, wapima cikunguzyo camulyango, wajana kuti bwaamba bwaco nditete lyomwe, acalo dkunguzyo acimwi bwaamba bwaco nditete lyomwe.

Atwalo twaanda twakalijisi bulamfu bwatete lyomwe abwaamba bwatete lyomwe, amweenya waakatikati katwaanda wakali tukokola tosanwe. Acalo cikunguzyo camulyango kumbali lyalukonkono lwamulyango wamukati lwakalijisi bwaamba bwatete lyomwe.
Alimwi wakeeleka lukonkono lwamulyango,
wajana kuti ntukokola tuli musanu atutatu, aminsende yalo yakali tukokola tobile. Lukonkono lwamulyango lwakali mukati.
Atwalo twaanda twamulyango wakujwe twakali totatwe totatwe; toonse totatwe twakaleelene aminsende yoonse ayalo kielene.
Lino wakeeleka bwaamba bwamanjililo aamulyango, wajana kuti ntukokola tuli ikumi; abwalo bulamfu bwamulyango bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi atutatu.
Nkabela kakuli kalambo kamugaano kunembo lyatwaanda; aka kalambo kakajisi kakokola komwe koonse koonse, Atwalo twaanda katujisi tukokola tuli musanu akamwi kumabazu oonse.
Mpoonya awo wakeeleka mulyango kuzwa kulululi lwakaanda kusikila kulululi lwakaandanyina, bwaamba bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu kuzwa kukoma akusikila kukomanyina.
Alimwi wakeeleka lukonkono, tukokola tuli makumi obile; nkabela kakuli lubuwa luzyungulukide lukonkono lwamulyango.
Kuzwa kunembo lyamanjililo aamulyango kusikila kumamanino aalukonkono lwamulyango wamukati kakuli tukokola tuli makumi osanwe.
Mutwaanda amuminsende yato, moonse moonse mukati kamulyango, kamuli zipulo zisyanikide. Alwalo lukonkono kalujisi zipulo. Moonse moonse mukati kamuli zipulo. Alimwi aminsende kaali tukunka.
Ibbuwa lyakali kulubazu lwamilyango, lyakaleelene abulamfu bwamilyango, nkokuti ibbuwa lyaansi.
Lino wakeeleka bwaamba kuzwa kunembo lyamulyango waansi kusikila kunembo lyalubuwa lwamukati aanze, tukokola tuli mwanda, kujwe akunyika koonse.
Mpoonya awo wakandizulwida kuya kunyika, nkabela ndakabona mulyango uulangide kunyika uuli mulubuwa lwaanze. Wakeeleka bulamfu bwawo abwaamba bwawo.

Twaanda twawo katuli totatwe totatwe, aminsende yawo alukonkono lwawo zyoonse kazyeelene azeezyo zyamulyango mutaanzi; bulamfu bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, abwaamba bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu.

Azyalo zipulo zyawo alukonkono lwawo atukunka twawo, zyoonse kazyeelene azeezyo zyamulyango uulangide kujwe, alimwi kakuli matantilo aali musanu aabili aakutanta kulinguwo, alukonkono lwawo lwakali mukati.

Nkabela kakuli mulyango wakunjila mulubuwa lwamukati uulangene amulyango umwi, kulubazu lwakunyika akulubazu lwakujwe koonse. Lino wakeeleka kuzwa kumulyango kusikila kumulyangonyina, tukokola tuli mwanda.
Lino wakandizulwida kumusanza, nkabela oko kumusanza ndakabona mulyango, Elyo wakeeleka minsende yawo alukonkono lwawo. Zyoonse kazyeelene azyeenzinyina,
Koonse koonse kulinguwo alukonkono lwawo kakuli zipulo mbubonya mbuli zimwi zyaambwa kale. Bulamfu bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, abwaamba bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu.
Kakuli matantilo aali musanu aabili aakutantila kulinguwo, alukonkono lwawo lwakali mukati, alimwi aminsende yawo akali tukunka, kamwi oko akamwi oko.
Akwalo kulubazu lwakumusanza lwalubuwa lwamukati kakuli mulyango, nkabela wakeeleka kuzwa kumulyango akusikila kumulyangonyina oko kumusanza, tukokola tuli mwaanda.
Lino wakandisisya kulubuwa lwamukati kumuiyango wakumusanza, weeleka mulyango wakumusanza; kuuelene aimwi.

Twaanda twawo aminsende yawo alukonkono lwawo, zyoonse buyo kazyeelene azimwi, alimwi koonse koonse kakuli zipulo kulinguwo akulukonkono lwawo. Bulamfu bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, abwaamba bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu.
Alimwi kumabazu oonse kakuli inkonkono; lumwi alumwi kalujisi bulamfu bwatukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu abwaamba bwatukokola tosanwe.
Lukonkono lwawo kalulangide lubuwa lwaanze. Aminsende yalo akali tukunka, Alimwi kuujisi matantilo aali musanu aatatu.
Lino wakandisisya kulubuwa lwamukati kulubazu lwakujwe, weeleka mulyango, wajana kuti kuuelene aimwi.

Twaanda twawo, minsende yawo, alukonkono lwawo, zyoonse kazyeelene azimwi. Akooko kulinguwo akulukonkono lwawo kakuli zipulo koonse koonse. Bulamfu bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, abwaamba bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu.
Lukonkono lwawo kalulangide alubuwa lwaanze. Aminsende yawo akali tukunka, kamwi oko akamwi oko. Alimwi kuujisi matantilo aali musanu aatatu,
Lino wakandisisya kumulyango wakunyika, weeleka, wajana kuti uli mbubonya mbuli imwi.

Twaanda twawo aminsende yawo alukonkono lwawo, zyoonse zyakaleelene azimwi. Kumabazu oonse kuujisi zipulo. Bulamfu bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, abwaamba bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu.
Lukonkono lwawo kalulangide lubuwa lwaanze; aminsende yawo akali tukunka, kamwi oko akamwi oko; alimwi kuujisi matantilo aali musanu aatatu,
Alimwi mulukonkono lwamulyango kamuli intafule, zyobile zyobile kumabazu oonse obile. Alinzizyo mpobakali kujayila zituuzyo azipaizyo zyazibi azipaizyo zyamilandu.
Alimwi anze, kumatantilo aakuya kumanjililo aamulyango wakunyika, kakuli intafule zyobile, akwalo kulubazu alumwi lwalukonkono lwamulyango kakuli intafule zyobile.
Kakuli intafule zyone kulubazu lumwi antafule zyone kulubazu lumwi, kumbali lyamulyango, nkokuti intafule zili musanu azitatu nkobakali kujayila zipaizyo.

Alimwi kakuli intafule zyone zibezedwe amabwe zyazituuzyo. Bulamfu bwazyo bwakali kakokola acisela, abwaamba bwakali kakokola acisela, abwiime bwakali kakokola komwe, Alinzizyo mpobakali kubika zibelesyo zyakujazya zituuzyo azipaizyo.
