Nkabela moonse moonse mukati kamukankamidwe twaanzikilo, itwakali abulamfu bwabwaamba bwajanza. Alimwi antafule mpobakali kubika nyama yazituuzyo.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, Aka kaanda kalangide kumusanza nkabapaizi, basikulindila iŋanda.
Akaanda kalangide kunyika nkabapaizi basikulindila cipaililo, nkokuti bana ba-Zadoki, nkaambo mbembabo balike akati kabana ba-Levi bakonzya kuswena kuli-Jehova kukumupaizizya.

Mpoonya awo wakeeleka lubuwa. Bulamfu bwakali tukokola tuli mwanda, abwaamba bwakali tukokola tuli mwanda; lwakali azyooko zyone, abulamfu kabweelene abwaamba. Acalo cipaililo kaciimvwi kunembo lyaŋanda.

Lino wandisisya kulukonkono lwaŋanda, weeleka minsende yaluko-nkono, tukokola tosanwe kumabazu oonse obile. Nkabela bwaamba bwamulyango bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi atone, arulyango twakulubazu twakali tukokola totatwe, kamwi oko akamwi oko.

Alimwi bulamfu bwalukonkono bwakali tukokola tuli makumi obile, abwaamba bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi atubili, Kalujisi matantilo aali ikumi aakutanta. Alimwi minsende kiijisi zimikilo, cimwi oko acimwi oko.

Alimwi bwaamba bwamanjililo bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi, atwalo tulyango twamanjililo twakali tukokola tosanwe tosanwe kumabazu oonse ebile. Elyo wakeeleka bulamfu bwantempele, tukokola tuli makumi one, abwaamba bwayo, tukokola tuli makumi obile.

Alimwi wakanjila mukati, weeleka minsende yamanjililo, tukokola tobile; abwalo bwaamba bwamanjililo, tukokola tuli musanu akamwi; amalambo aakumbali lyamanjililo akali tukokola tuli musanu atubili oku akooku.
Lino wakeeleka bulamfu bwaŋanda, tukokola tuli makumi obile, abwalo bwaamba bwayo, tukokola tuli makumi obile, kunembo lyantempele, nkabela wakandaambila kuti, Mbuboobu busena busalalisya.
Lino wakeeleka bulambo bwaŋanda, tukokola tuli musanu akamwi; abwalo bwaamba bwatwaanda twakulubazu, tukokola tone, koonse koonse cakuzyunguluka iŋanda.

Twaanda twakulubazu twakali totatwe totatwe atala lyatweenzinyina, amakumi otatwe mumulongo umwi aumwi. Alimwi koonse koonse kubulambo bwantempele kakuli zijatilizyo zyakutabilizya twaanda twakulubazu kuti tutabililwe abulambo bwaŋanda.

Twaanda twakali kuya bukomena mujulu, mbubonya mbuli zijatilizyo mbuzyakali kuya bukomena kujulu. Alimwi kulubazu lwaŋanda kakuli citantilo, aboobo cakakonzeka kutanta kuzwa ansi kusikila akatikati akuzwa akatikati kusikila kujulu.
Lino ndakabona kuti iŋanda kiijisi lukonkono lwakujulu kumabazu oonse. Nkabela intalisyo zyatwaanda twakulubazu kazijisi bulamfu bwatete lizwide, nkokuti tukokola tupati tuli musanu akamwi.
Indiya yabulambo bwakukaanda kakulubazu anze yakali tukokola tosanwe, acalo cipanzi calukonkono icakasiidwe cakali tukokola tosanwe. Alimwi akatikati kalukonkono lwaŋanda,
atwaanda twakulubuwa kakuli bwaamba bwatukokola tuli makumi obile koonse koonse kumabazu oonse.

Nkabela milyango yatwaanda twakulubazu katulangide busena ibwakasyeede; mulyango umwi kaulangide kunyika, amulyango umwi kaulangide kumusanza; alimwi bwaamba bwabusena ibwakasyeede bwakali tukokola tosanwe kumabazu oonse.

Mayake aalangide lubuwa kulubazu lwakumbo kaajisi bwaamba bwatukokola tuli makumi aali musanu aabili, abulambo bwamayake kabujisi indiya yatukokola tosanwe koonse koonse, abulamfu bwabo bwakali tukokola tuli makumi aali musanu aane.
Lino wakeeleka iŋanda, Bulamfu bwayo bwakali tukokola tuli mwanda: alwalo lubuwa amayake aalo amalambo aalo, bulamfu bwalo bwakali tukokola tuli mwanda.
Abwalo bwaamba bwaŋanda alubuwa lwayo lwakujwe kabuli tukokola tuli mwanda.
Elyo wakeeleka bulamfu bwamayake aalangide lubuwa ilwakali kusule, anzila zyao kumabazu oonse obile, tukokola tuli mwanda. Nkabela intempele acikombelo camukati ankonkono zyalubuwa lwaanze,

zyoonse zyakalinamatikilidwe zisamu. Zyoonse zyotatwe kazijisi zipulo zisyanikide kumabazu oonse, alimwi moonse moonse mukati kamunamatikidwe azisamu, kuzwa ansi kusikila kuzipulo, (azyalo zipulo kazivumbidwe),
akusikila ajulu lyamulyango, kuŋanda yamukati aanze oonse. Alimwi amalambo, muŋanda yamukati aanze, akali zikozyano zibezedwe kumabazu conse,
nkukuti zikozyano zyabaangelo bakerebimu azyatukunka, kakunka komwe komwe akati kabakerebimu. Nkabela kerubu umwi aumwi kajisi masyu obile,
busyu bwamuntu bulangide kukakunka kamwi, abusyu bwamulavu bulangide kukakunka kakulubazu lumwi. Mbuzyakabede moonse moonse muŋanda.
Kuzwa ansi kusikila ajulu lyamulyango, koonse koonse kakubezedwe bakerebimu atukunka abulambo.
Lino intempele, minsende yayo azikunguzyo zyayo zyakali azyooko zyone zyeelene, alimwi kunembo lyabusena busalala kakuli cintu cili mbuli cipaililo cazisamu;

bwiime bwaco bwakali tukokola totatwe, abulamfu bwaco bwakali tukokola tobile, abwaamba bwaco bwakali tukokola tobile. Zyooko zyaco amatako aaco amalambo aaco, zyoonse zyakali zyazisamu. Lino wakandaambila kuti, Njeeyi intafule iili kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Nkabela intempele acikombelo cisalalisya kazijisi milyango yobile.
Mulyango umwi aumwi kaujisi makoma obile, makoma aaliyumba, makoma obile kumulyango umwi aumwi.
Amakoma aantempele akalibezedwe bakerebimu atukunka mbubonya mbuli ezyo izyakali amalambo, alimwi kunembo lyalukenkono lwaanze kakuli kaluli kazisamu.
Nkabela kumabazu conse obile aalukonkono kakuli zipulo zisyanikide atukunka. Mbutwakabede twaanda twakulubazu lwaŋanda atululi.
Bulamfu bwamayake aakulubazu lwakunyika bwakali tukokola tuli mwanda, abwaamba bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe.
Mubusena bulangene tukokola tuli makumi obile twalubuwa lwamukati, bulangene ibbuwa lyakulubuwa lwaanze, kamuli inzila mumilongo yoonse yotatwe.
Alimwi kunembo lyatwaanda kakuli mwenya wakwiinda mukati; bwaamba bwawo bwakali tukokola tuli ikumi, abulamfu bwawo bwakali tukokola tuli mwanda, amilyango kiilangide kunyika.
Nkabela twaanda twakujulu twakafwimpa-fwimpa nkaambo inzila yakatola busena kulintuto kwiinda kutwaanda twaansi atwaakati.
Nkaambo twakali mumilongo yotatwe, alimwi katujisi minsende mbuli minsende yalubuwa lwaanze; nkambo kako twaanda twakujulu twakalisyanikide kwiinda twaanda twaansi atwaakati.
Alimwi kakuli lubaya anze lulangide twaanda, kumbali lyalubuwa lwaanze, lulangide twaanda. Bulamfu bwalo bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe.
Nkaambo bulamfu bwatwaanda twakulubuwa lwaanze bwakali tukokola tuli makumi osanwe, atootu tuli kunembo lyantempele twakali tukokola tuli mwaanda.
Alimwi kunsi lyatwaanda otu kakuli manjililo kujwe, nkonkuko nkobakali kunjilila kuzwa kulubuwa lwaanze; lubaya nkolwakagolela,
Alimwi kulubazu lwakumusanza, kunembo lyalubuwa, kunembo lyamayake, akooko kakuli twaanda,
anzila kunembo lyato; twakali mbubonya mbuli twaanda twakunyika; bulamfu bwato abwaamba bwato, manjililo aato abube bwato amilyango yato, muzintu zyoonse katukozyene atumwi.
Akunsi lyatwaanda twakumusanza kakuli manjililo kulubazu lwakujwe, nkukonya oko mwenya wakwiinda nkuunjililwa, akulubazu lulangene kakuli lubaya lwakwaandaanya.

Bapaizi banjila buyo mubusena busalala, tabeelede kuzwa alimwi kukunjila mulubuwa lwaanze cita bataangune kusamununa zyakusama nzibakasamide ciindi cakucita milimo, nkaambo zilasalala. Baleelede kusama zyakusama zimbi nibatana kusika kufwaafwi kubantu.
Amane buyo kweeleka iŋanda yamukati, wakandiinzya kumulyango uulangide kujwe, weeleka cakuzyunguluka.
Wakeeleka lubazu lwakujwe atete lyakweelesya, wajana kuti ntukokola tuli myanda yosanwe kukweeleka kwatete.
Lino wakeeleka lubazu lwakunyika, wajana kuti ntukokola tuli myanda yosanwe kukweeleka kwatete.
Alimwi wakeeleka lubazu lwakumusanza, wajana kuti ntukokola tuli myanda yosanwe kukweeleka kwatete.
Kuzwa oko wakapilukila kumbo, weeleka lubazu lwakumbo, wajana kuti ntukokola tuli myanda yosanwe kukweeleka kwatete.

Kumabazu oonse one wakeeleka. Kakuli bulambo bwakuzyunguluka koonse Koonse, kabujisi bulamfu bwatukokola tuli myanda yosanwe abwaamba bwatukokola tuli myanda yosanwe. Mbombubo bupambukanya zintu zisalala azintu zyabuyo.
nkabela ndakabona bulemu bwa-Leza wa-Israyeli bulazwa kujwe. Ijwi lyakwe lyakali mbuli cikwala camaanzi aavuuma, anyika yakamwesegwa abulemu bwakwe.
Cilengano ncindakabona cakali mbuli cilengano eco, ncindakabwene naakasika kuzoonyonyoona munzi, mbuli cilengano ncindakabona kumulonga wa-Kebara. Mpawo ndakavundama ansi.
Lino bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakanjila muŋanda, bweza kumulyango uulangide kujwe.
Nkabela muuya wakandibweza, wandisisya kulubuwa lwamukati, nkabela bulemu bwa-Jehova bwakazuzya intempele.

Wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, mboobuno busena bwacuuno cangu cabwami abusena bwazituta zyamaulu aangu, nkonzookala akati kabana ba-Israyeli lyoonse. Lino bantu baluzubo lwa-Israyeli tabakooyoosofwaazya limbi izina lyangu lisalala, balo nebaba bami babo, kubumambe bwabo amitunta yabami babo;

kukubika zilyatililo zyabo kufwaafwi kuzilyatililo zyangu azikunguzyo zyabo kumbali lyazikunguzyo zyangu, abulambo bulike mbobutwaanzaanya, Basofwaazya izina lyangu lisalala kuzisesemyo zyabo nzebacita. Nciceeco ncendabanyonyweeda­ mubukali bwangu.
Basowele kule bwaamu bwabo amitunta yabami babo kuzwa kulindime, lino njookala akati kabo lyoonse mane kukabe kutamani.

Lino na bafwa bweeme nkaambo kazintu zyoonse nzebakacita, lemba iŋanda mbwiibede, mazwido aayo amanjililo aayo abube bwayo boonse, alimwi kobazibya milazyo yayo amilao yayo yoonse akwiilemba mumeso aabo, kuti babambe milao yayo aziyanza zyayo.
Ngooyu mulao waŋanda, Atala lyacilundu nyika yoonse iyeengelede iyoosalalisya. Bona! Ngooyu mulao waŋanda,

Alimwi bwiime kuzwa ansi kusikila kucaanzikilo citaanzi bwakali tukokola tobile, abwaamba bwakali kakokola komwe, alimwi kuzwa kucaanzikilo ciniini kusikila kucaanzikilo cipati bwakali tukokola tone, abwaamba kakokola komwe.
Aciko cacipaizyo ciyooba tukokola tone, alimwi kuzwa kuciko kuyooba meja one aaimvwi.
Nkabela ciko ciyooba tukokola tuli ikumi atubili mubulamfu atukokola tuli ikumi atubili mubwaamba; ciyooba azyooko zyone zyeelene.

Acaanzikilo ciyooba tukokola tuli ikumi atune mubulamfu atukokola tuli ikumi atune mubwaamba, cili azyooko zyone zyeelene; cilaba amoombe koonse koonse, uli abwaamba bwacisela cakakokola, atako lyaco lili akakokola komwe koonse koonse. Amatantilo aacipaililo ayoolanga kujwe.
uleelede kupa bapaizi baLevi, basilunyungu ba-Zadoki, baswena kulindime kukundikutaukila, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, mupoho wacipaizyo cazibi.
Lino uleelede kubweza bulowa bwakwe akulamba-lamba ameja one aacipaililo akuzyooko zyone zyacaanzikilo akumoombe koonse koonse. Mbuboobo mbomweelede kucisalazya akucitontozya.
Alimwi uleelede kutola mupoho wacipaizyo cazibi akumutenta mubusena bweelede anze lyabusena busalalisya.
Lino mubuzuba bwabili uleelede kutuula simujembwe uutakwe kampenda, abe cipaizyo cazibi, aboobo cipaililo cilasalazigwa mbubonya mbocakasalazigwa amupoho.
Umane buyo kucisalazya, uleelede kutuula mupoho waŋombe uutakwe kampenda amugutu wambelele uutakwe kampenda.
Aba uleelede­ kubatuula kubusyu bwa-Jehova, nkabela bapaizi baleelede kubalunga munyo akubatuula babe cipaizyo kuli-Jehova.
Mazuba aali musanu aabili uleelede kubamba impongo yacipaizyo cazibi buzuba bumwi abumwi, alimwi baleleede kubamba mupoho waŋombe amugutu wambelele, boonse batakwe kampenda.
Mazuba aali musanu aabili baleelede kutontozya cipaililo akucisalazya akucibamba.
Bamane mazuba aali musanu aabili, lino kutalika mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu bapaizi banootuula zipaizyo zyanu azituuzyo zyanu zyakutontozya acipaililo, nkabela njoomuswiilila, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.

Lino Jehova wanda­ ambila kuti, Oyu mulyango unoojalidwe, tuukooyoojalulwa pe, alimwi takukooyoonjila muntu naba omwe kulinguwo, nkaambo ngonguwo Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli ngwaakanjilila, aboobo unoojalidwe.
Silutwe alike nguuyookala mulinguwo kuti alye insima kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Uyoonjila kulukonkono lwamulyango akuzwa mbubonya.

Nkabela Jehova wakandaambila kuti, O mwana amuntu, bika moyo wako kumakani. Meso aako abone, aalo matwi aako aswiilile oonse ngenti kwaambile, nkokuti milazyo yoonse yaŋanda ya-Jehova amilao yayo yoonse. Bika moyo wako kumakani aabaabo bakonzya kunjila abaabo beelede kusyaala anze lyabusena busalala.
Alimwi ambila luzubo lukataazya, luzubo lwa-Israyeli, kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Amuleke zisesemyo zyanu zyoonse, O luzubo lwa-Israyeli.

Amuleke kunjizya bazwakule, batapalwidwe nemuba mumyoyo yabo nemuba munyama yabo, mucikombelo cangu, kuti batacisofwaazyi nemundiletela zilyo zyangu, mafuta abulowa. M wajaya cizuminano cangu kuzisesemyo zyanu zyoonse.
Tamubambide zintu zyangu zisalala, pe, mwabika bazwakule buyo kuti bamubambile zintu zyangu zisalala.
Pele ba-Levi ibakaya kule kuzwa kulindime, ibakaleya akuya butobela zimpangaliko ciindi eco ba-Israyeli nebakaleya, bayoolemezegwa milandu yabo.
Bayooba basimilimo mucikombelo cangu, bayoolanga milyango Yaŋanda akubeleka muŋanda; bayoojayila bantu zituuzyo azipaizyo; alimwi bayooima kumbali lyabantu kuti babagwasye milimo.

Bakali kumanina bantu milimo kunembo lyazimpangaliko zyabo, aboobo bakabeda luzubo lwa-Israyeli cifumpuzyo cakubalebya; nkaambo kako ndabasumpwida ijanza lyangu, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova, ndakonkezya kuti ncobeni bayoolemezegwa milandu yabo,
Tabakooyooswena kulindime kukucita milimo yabupaizi pe. Tabakooyooswena kuzintu zyangu zisalala, nkokuti zintu zisalalisya kwiinda zyoonse, Bayoolemezegwa bweeme bwabo azisesemyo zyabo nzebakacita,
Njoobabika kuti babe basikulanga iŋanda, bacite milimo yoonse miyumu iicitwa mulinjiyo.
Mbombabo beelede kunjila mucikombelo cangu kuti baswene afwaafwi kuntafule yangu, bandikutaukile akubamba imbeta zyangu.

Banjile buyo mumilyango yalubuwa lwamukati, baleelede kusama zikobela zituba zyabutonge; tabakooyoosama cintu neciba comwe caboya bwambelele kuciindi cakumana milimo kumilyango yalubuwa lwamukati amukati kaŋanda.
Baleelede kusama zitambala zituba zyabutonge amitwe yabo atubbudula twabutonge butuba azikungu zyabo, Tabeelede kusama cintu neciba comwe cipa citukutuku.

Lino kuciindi cakuya anze, kulubuwa lwaanze bantu nkobabede, baleelede kusamununa zikobela zyabo nzibasamide ciindi cakumana milimo, bazisie mumonya mutwaanda tusalala, basame zyakusama zimbi, kuti batasalazyi bantu kuli zyakusama zyabo.
Tabeelede kunyoola mitwe yabo nekuba kukuzya masusu aabo pe, baleelede kugonka-gonka buyo masusu aabo.
Alimwi kunywa waini cilatondwa kubapaizi boonse ciindi cakunjila mulubuwa lwamukati.
Akukwata tabeelede kukwata mukamufu nanka muleke; mupaizi uleelede kukwata nakalindu walunyungu lwa-Israyeli nanka mukamufu wamupaizinyina,
Baleelede kwiiyisya bantu bangu kupambukanya zintu zisalalisya azintu zyabuyo akubazibya zintu zisofweede mbozibede azintu zisalala mbozibede.

Na kwaba inkondo, mbombabo beelede kubeteka makani; baleelede kwaabeteka cakuzuminana ambeta zyangu. Baleelede kubamba milao yangu ambeta zyangu kuziindi zyangu zyoonse zibikidwe, aalo masabata aangu baleelede kwaasalazya,
Tabeelele kulisofwaazya kukuswena afwaafwi kumutunta, cita mutunta wawisi na wabanyina, wamwana mulombe na wamwana musimbi, wamunyinandumi na wamucizi wakwe uutakwetwe.
Amane kulisofwaazya, alibalile mazuba aali musanu aabili, elyo ulasalala.
Lino mubuzuba bwakunjila mucikombelo, mulubuwa lwamukati, kukumana milimo yamubusena busalalisya, uleelede kulituulila cipaizyo cazibi, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Cituuzyo cabusu, cipaizyo cazibi acipaizyo camilandu, banooyoozilya, azintu zyoonse zibikilidwe Leza mucisi ca-Israyeli ziyooba zyabo,
Kabalwebalwe mutaanzi wamicelo yoonse acituuzyo citaanzi cazituuzyo zyanu zyoonse, ziyooba zyabapaizi. Abwalo busu bwanu, muleelede kupa mupaizi kabalwebalwe wabo, kuti buletele iŋanda yanu coolwe,
Bapaizi tabeelede kulya nyama, naba muyuni naba munyama, iwakalifwida nanka kulumwa.

Alimwi akati kaco kuyooba busena buli azyooko zyone zyeelene; bulamfu buyooba tukokola tuli myanda yosanwe, abwaamba buyooba tukokola tuli myanda yosanwe, alimwi buyoozyuungulukwa lubuwa lwatukokola tuli makumi osanwe.
Nkabela akati kacisi eci muyooeleka bulamfu bwazyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu abwaamba bwazyuulu zili ikumi. Mumweenya oyo mociyooba cikombelo, busena busalalisya,
Uyooba caabilo canyika cisalala; uyooba wabapaizi basimilimo bamuŋanda ya-Jehova baswena kuliJehova kukumukutaukila; uyoobabeda mwenya wakuyaka maanda abusena busalala bwacikombelo.
Acaabilo cimwi, cili abulamfu bwatukokola tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu abwaamba bwatukokola tuli ikumi, ciyooba caba-Levi babeleka milimo yaŋanda, bacivube akuyaka minzi yakukala mumo.

Alimwi muleelede kubika caabilo camunzi, cili abwaamba bwatukokola tuli zyuulu zyosanwe abulamfu bwatukokola tuli makumi obile amusanu, kumbali lyacaabilo cisalala. Ciyooba caluzubo loonse lwa-Israyeli.
Nyika eyo iyooba caabilo cakwe, acivube. Basilutwe bangu tabakooyoopenzya limbi bantu bangu, pe, bayooabila luzubo lwa-Israyeli nyika mumisyobo yabo.
Cisuwo cakweelesya anongo yakweelesya zileelede kweelana; nongo ileelede kujata cipanzi cakumi cahomeri, acalo cisuwo cileelede kujata cipanzi cakumi cahomeri. Homeri nceceelesyo ceelede,

Alimwi bulemu bwasyekeli buleelede kuba magera aali makumi obile. Mabwe aamasyekeli osanwe aleelede kuba masyekeli osanwe, amabwe aamasyekeli aali ikumi aleelede kuba masyekeli aali ikumi; abulemu bwamina buleelede kuba masyekeli aali makumi osanwe,
Lino nceeci cipaizyo ncimweelede kutuula: cipanzi camusanu acimwi cacisuwo cigwisigwa muhomeri limwi alimwi lyabulotwe, acipanzi camusanu acimwi cacisuwo cigwisigwa muhomeri limwi alimwi lyabbaale.
AmweeIwe uuelede wamafuta ngooyu: cipanzi cakumi canongo cigwisigwa mukori limwi alimwi (Kori nkokuti nongo zili ikumi, nkokwaamba lileelene ahomeri).

Alimwi kuleelede kuba bakelele komwe kagwisigwa akati kambelele zili myanda yobile, mumikowa yoonse ya-Israyeli. Mbuboobo mbubeelede kupaizya cipaizyo cabusu acituuzyo acituuzyo cakutontozya, kuti bamanye milandu yabo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Bantu boonse banyika baleelede kupa cipaizyo eci, bape silutwe wacisi ca-Israyeli.

Asilutwe uleelede kupa zipaizyo azituuzyo zyabusu azipaizyo zyakunywa mumapobwe akuciindi camwezi mupya amumasabata akuziindi zyoonse zibikidwe zyaluzubo lwa-Israyeli. Nguuelede kupa zipaizyo zyazibi azipaizyo zyabusu azituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya, kuti amanye milandu yaluzubo lwaIsrayeli.
Lino mupaizi uleelede kubweza bulowa bwacipaizyo cazibi, abulambe amunsende waŋanda azyooko zyone zyacaanzikilo cacipaililo amunsende wamulyango walubuwa lwamukati,
Alimwi muleelede kucita mbubonya obo mubuzuba bwamusanu aabili nkaambo kamuntu umwi aumwi uubisya cakutaziba na cakubula maanu, aboobo muyoomanya milandu yaŋanda.
Mubuzuba obo silutwe wacisi uleelede kubamba mupoho, abe cipaizyo cazibi casilutwe mwini acabantu boonse banyika.

­Alimwi mumazuba oonse aali musanu aabili aapobwe uleelede kubamba cipaizyo ca-Jehova, bapoho bali musanu ababili abagutu bali musanu ababili batajisi kampenda, bapaizigwe umwi aumwi mubuzuba bumwi abumwi mumazuba oonse aali musanu aabili aapobwe, asijembwe wacipaizyo cazibi buzuba bumwi abumwi.
Alimwi uleelede kubamba cipaizyo cabusu, cisuwo comwe kumupoho umwi aumwi, acisuwo comwe kumugutu umwi aumwi, acipanzi camusanu acimwi canongo yamafuta kucisuwo cimwi acimwi.

Alimwi mumwezi wamusanu aibili, mubuzuba bwakumi amusanu bwamumwezi, amumazuba oonse aali musanu aabili aapobwe, uleelede kucita mbubonya obo kukubamba cipaizyo cazibi acituuzyo acipaizyo cabusu amafuta.

Lino silutwe wacisi uyoonjila mulukonkono lwamulyango kuzwa anze, uyooima kumbali amunsende wamulyango, nkabela bapaizi bayoobamba zituuzyo azipaizyo zyakutontozya, elyo uyookomba kumbali lyacikunguzyo camulyango. Amane kukomba, unooya anze, pele mulyango tuukooyoojalwa mane kusikila igoko.
Abalo bantu banyika bayookomba kumanjililo aamulyango oyo kubusyu bwa-Jehova mubuzuba bwa-Sabata amubuzuba bwamwezi mupya.
Nceeci cipaizyo silutwe nceelede kuletela Jehova mubuzuba bwa-Sabata: tubelele tuli musanu akamwi tutajisi kampenda amugutu uutajisi kampenda.
Acipaizyo cabusu cileelede kuba cisuwo comwe kumugutu umwi aumwi, acipaizyo cabusu catubelele cileelede kuba kufumbwa ncakonzya kupa, acipanzi camusanu acimwi canongo yamafuta kucisuwo cimwi acimwi.
Alimwi mubuzuba bwamwezi mupya uleelede kutuula kapoho katajisi kampenda, atubelele tuli musanu akamwi amugutu, zyoonse zitajisi kampenda.
Nkabela uleelede kubamba cipaizyo cabusu, cisuwo comwe kukapoho, acisuwo comwe kumugutu, akutubelele kufumbwa ncakonzya kupa, acipanzi camusanu acimwi canongo yamafuta kucisuwo cimwi acimwi.
Nasika silutwe wacisi, uleelede kunjila kunzila yakulukonkono lwamulyango akuzwa munzila eyo njiyonya.
Banjila, silutwe wacisi alakwe uleelede kunjila akati kabo; bazwa, uleelede kuzwa alakwe.

Alimwi mumapobwe aziindi zimwi zibikidwe cipaizyo cabusu cileelede kuba cisuwo comwe kukapoho kamwi akamwi, acisuwo kumugutu umwi aumwi, akutubelele kufumbwa ncakonzya kupa, acipanzi camusanu acimwi canongo yamafuta kucisuwo cimwi acimwi.

Alimwi silutwe wacisi nayanda kubambila Jehova cipaizyo camoyo wakwe mwini, neciba cituuzyo neciba cipaizyo cakutontozya, lino uyoojulilwa mulyango uulangide kujwe. Uyoobamba zituuzyo zyakwe na zipaizyo zyakwe zyakutontozya mbubonya mbuli mbwacita mubuzuba bwa-Sabata. Amana, ulazwa, elyo mulyango ulajalwa musule lyakwe,

Acalo cipaizyo cabusu, uleelede kucibamba cifumo acifumo, cipanzi camusanu acimwi cacisuwo, acipanzi catatu cakanongo kamafuta kukukandya busu, Mbucibede cipaizyo cabusu ca-Jehova. Ngooyo mulao waco walyoonse.
Mbuboobo mbubeelede kubamba kabelele acipaizyo cabusu amafuta cifumo acifumo, kube cipaizyo calyoonse.
Mbuboobu mbwamba Mwami Jehova. Silutwe na wapa umwi wabana bakwe cipo kuzwa kulukono lwakwe, ciyooba cabana bakwe; ndubono lwabo lwakukona.
Pele na wapa umwi wabazike bakwe cipo kuzwa kulukono lwakwe, ciyooba cakwe mane kusikila kumwaka wabulubusi, lino ciyoobweeda kulisilutwe, cibe lukono lwabana bakwe, bacikone.
Silutwe teelede kubweza lukono lwabantu nekuba kubanyanzya lubono lwabo; uleelede kukonya bana bakwe lukono lwakwe mwini, kuti bantu bangu batamwaisigwi umwi aumwi kuzwa kulubono lwakwe.
Elyo wakandiinzya kumanjililo aali kulubazu lwamulyango, wandileta kutwaanda tusalala twabapaizi tulangide kunyika, nkabela ndabona busena kumagolelo aato aakumbo.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, Ano bapaizi mpobajikila zipaizyo zyamilandu azipaizyo zyazibi, ampobajikila cipaizyo cabusu, aboobo tabazitoli kulubuwa lwaanze kukusalazya bantu.
Mpawo wakandisisya kulubuwa lwaanze, wandiinzya kuzyooko zyone zyalubuwa, nkabela ndakabona kuti mucooko cimwi acimwi calubuwa muli kabuwa.
Muzyooko zyoonse zyone zyalubuwa kamuli tubuwa; kamwi akamwi kakajisi bulamfu bwatukokola tuli makumi one abwaamba bwatukokola tuli makumi otatwe; toonse tone twakaleelene.
Alimwi mukati kato toonse tone kamuli mindando yamabwe, akusule lyamindando kakuli zijikilo koonse koonse.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, Nzeezi zijikilo, basimilimo bantempele nkubajikila zipaizyo zyabantu.
Elyo wakanditola anze, wandiinzya kumulyango wakunyika, wandizyungulusya anze kusikila kumulyango waanze uulangide kujwe, nkabela ndakabona maanzi alamiminya kulubazu lwakululyo.

Kuzwa oko wakeeleka alimwi tukokola tuli cuulu, wandiinzya akati kamaanzi, nkabela maanzi akali kutanwa mumazwi. Alimwi wakeeleka tukokola tuli cuulu, wandiinzya, nkabela maanzi akali kutanwa kucikungu,
Alimwi wakeeleka tukokola tuli cuulu, nkabela ndakajana mulongo uutaindiki, nkaambo maanzi akalifutide, aba maanzi aakuyamba, mulonga uutazubukiki,
Lino wakandibuzya kuti, Sa wabona eci, O mwana amuntu?
Kuzwa oko wakandipilusya, wandiinzya ankomwe yamulonga,
Nkabela mukupiluka kwangu ndakabona kuti ankomwe yamulonga ali misamu minji loko kumabazu oonse obile.
Elyo wakandaambila kuti, Aya maanzi alatozya kucisi cakujwe, alaya ku-Araba, alanjila mulwizi. Anjila buyo mulwizi, maanzi aalula aakooko ayootontozegwa.

Lino kufumbwa oko mulonga nkuusika, zintu zyuumi zyoonse ziyoovula ziyoopona, alimwi kuyooba inswi zinji loko, nkaambo aya maanzi asika kuti maanzi aamulwizi atontozegwe, aboobo zintu zyoonse ziyoopona kufumbwa oko mulonga nkuusika,
Nkabela basikuzuba bayooima kulinguwo; kuzwa ku-Engedi akusikila ku-Eglaimu koonse koonse kuyooyanikwa insabwe; kuyooba inswi zyamisyobo minji loko mbubonya mbuli inswi zyakulwizi lupati.
Pele myeezi amatoolo, ezi tazikooyootontozegwa pe, anooyooli epale.

Alimwi ankomwe zyamulonga kumabazu conse obile, kuyoomena misamu yoonse iiligwa, Matu aayo takooyookunkumuka, amicelo yayo tiikooyookuba pe. Inooyoozyala micelo mipya myeezi yoonse, nkaambo kamaanzi aazwa kucikombelo aasika kulinjiyo. Micelo yayo inooyooligwa, amatu aayo anooyoosilisigwa.
Muleelede kwaabana zyaabilo zyeelene, Ndakasumpula ijanza lyangu akukonkezya kupa bamausowanu, nkabela nyika eyi ncobeni iyooba lukono lwanu.
ku-Berota, ku-Sibraimu (uuli akatikati kamugaano wa-Damasko amugaano wa-Hamati), kusikila ku-Hazere Hatikoni kumugaano wa-Haurani,
Mugaano ulainda kuzwa kulwizi akusikila ku-Hazari-enoni kumugaano wa-Damasko, alimwi kulubazu lwakunyika lyakooko ngomugaano wa-Hamati.

Kulubazu lwakujwe, mugaano ulazwa ku-Hazare Enoni, akatikati ka-Haurani a-Damasko, ulainda mumulonga wa-Jordano, akatikati ka-Gileadi anyika ya-Israyeli, kusikila kulwizi lwakujwe akusikila ku-Tamara. Mbuboobo mbuubede mugaano wakujwe.
Akulubazu lwakumusanza ulazwa ku-Tamara kusikila kumaanzi aaMeriboti Kadesi, kuzwa oko ulainda mukalonga kaku-Egepita kusikila ku-Lwizi Lupati. Mbuboobo mbuubede mugaano wakumusanza.
Kulubazu lwakumbo, Lwizi Lupati luyooba mugaano kusikila kuntu kulangene amanjililo aa-Hamati, Mbuboobu mbuubede mugaano wakumbo.
Aboobo muleelede kwaabana nyika mbuli misyobo yanu noba-Israyeli,

Muleelede kuwaala zisolo zyakwiiabana, nywebo abeenzu bakede akati kanu, bazyede bana akati kanu. Bayooba mumeso aanu mbubonya mbuli bazyale banyika, bana ba-Israyeli; baleelede kwaabilwa lukono akati kamisyobo yaba-Israyeli.
Kufumbwa mweenzu nkwakala, muleelede kumupa lukono mumusyobo oyo nguwonya, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Lino kumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Dani, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, ba-Aseri bayoopegwa caabilo comwe.
Akumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Aseri, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, ba-Nafitali bayoopegwa caabilo comwe.
Akumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Nafitali, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, ba-Manase bayoopegwa caabilo comwe.
Akumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Manase, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, ba-Efraimu bayoopegwa caabilo comwe.
Akumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Efraimu, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, ba-Rubeni bayoopegwa caabilo comwe.
Akumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Rubeni, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, ba-Juda bayoopegwa caabilo comwe.
Mweenya uusalala ngumupaizya Jehova uyooba abulamfu bwatukokola tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu abwaamba bwatukokola tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile.

Alimwi mweenya uusalala uleelede kwaabwa obo, Bapaizi bayoopegwa caabilo cijisi bulamfu bwatukokola tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu kulubazu lwakunyika, abwaamba bwatukokola tuli zyuulu zili ikumi kulubazu lwakumbo, abwaamba bwatukokola tuli zyuulu zili ikumi kulubazu lwakujwe, abulamfu bwatukokola tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu kulubazu lwakumusanza, Acikombelo ca-Jehova ciyooba akati kaco.
Eci ciyooba cabapaizi basalala, bana ba-Zadoki, ibakabamba imbeta zyangu kuciindi eco bana ba-Israyeli nebakaleya, abalo ba-Levi nebakaleya.
Ciyoobabeda caabilo mukati kacaabilo cisalalisya canyika cibambene amugaano waba-Levi,

Lino kuntu kubambene amugaano wabapaizi, ba-Levi bayoopegwa caabilo; bulamfu bwaco buyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu, abwaamba bwaco buyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zili ikumi. Aboobo bulamfu boonse buyooba zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu, abwaamba buyooba zyuulu zili makumi obile.
Tabeelede kuulisya nekuba kucincana cipanzi neciba ciniini mukati kaco; tabeelede kuswekelwa nyika niiba imwi mulincico, nkaambo cilasalala mumeso aa-Jehova,

Njeeyi myeelwe yayo. Lubazu lwakunyika luyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zyone amyaanda yosanwe, lubazu lwakumusanza luyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zyone amyaanda yosanwe, lubazu lwakujwe luyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zyone amyaanda yosanwe, alubazu lwakumbo luyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zyone amyaanda yosanwe.

Alimwi munzi uyoozyungulukwa lubuwa: kulubazu lwakunyika tukokola tuli myanda yobile amakumi osanwe, kumusanza tukokola tuli myanda yobile amakumi osanwe, kujwe tukokola tuli myanda yobile amakumi osanwe, akumbo tukokola tuli myanda yobile amakumi osanwe.

Abulamfu busyeede kumbali lyamweenya uusalala buyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zili ikumi kujwe atukokola tuli zyuulu zili ikumi kumbo. Eyi nyika iyooba kumbali lyamweenya uusalala, nkabela micelo yayo iyooba zilyo zyabasimilimo bamumunzi,
Basimilimo bamumunzi bamisyobo yoonse yaba-Israyeli mbobeelede kwiilima.

Nkabela caabilo coonse ncimusalazya, nkokuti mweenya uusalala anyika yamunzi yoonse, ciyooba azyooko zyone zyeelene; bulamfu bwaco buyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu, abwaamba bwaco buyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zili makumi obile amusanu.
Nyika yamunzi iyooba akatikati kanyika yasilutwe. Nyika yasilutwe iyooba akatikati kacaabilo ca-Juda acaabilo ca-Benjamini,
Amisyobo imwi iisyeede njeeyi. Kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, baBenjamini bayoopegwa caabilo comwe,
Lino kumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Benjamini, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, ba-Simeoni bayoopegwa caabilo comwe,
Akumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Simeoni, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, ba-Isakara bayoopegwa caabilo comwe.
Mumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Isakara, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumboyba-Zebuloni bayoopegwa caabilo comwe.
Akumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Zebuloni, kuzwa kujwe kusikila kumbo, ba-Gadi bayoopegwa caabilo comwe.
Alimwi kumbali kubambene amugaano wa-Gadi, kulubazu lwakumusanza, mugaano uyoozwa ku-Tamara kusikila kumaanzi aa-Meribati Kadesi, akuzwa oko uyootobela kalonga ka-Egepita kusikila ku-Lwizi Lupati.
Mbwiibede nyika njimuyoowaalila cisolo akwaabila misyobo yaba-Israyeli. Mbuzibede zyaabilo zyabo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
amilyango yamunzi iyooambwa mbubonya mbuli mazina aamisyobo yabana ba-Israyeli. Kulubazu lwakunyika kuyooba milyango yotatwe: mulyango wa-Rubeni, mulyango wa-Juda amulyango wa-Levi,
Akwalo kulubazu lwakujwe, bulamfu buyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zyone amyanda yosanwe, amilyango iyooba itatu: mulyango wa-Josefa, mulyango wa-Benjamini, amulyango wa-Dani.
Akwalo kulubazu lwakumusanza bulamfu buyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zyone amyarida yosanwe, amilyango iyooba itatu: mulyango wa-Simeoni, mulyango wa-Isakara amulyango wa-Zebuloni,
Akwalo kulubazu lwakumbo bulamfu buyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zyone amyanda yosanwe, amilyango iyooba itatu: mulyango wa-Gadi, mulyango wa-Aseri amulyango wa-Nafitali.
Bulamfu bwakuzyunguluka munzi woonse buyooba tukokola tuli zyuulu zili ikumi amusanu azitatu. Akuzwa kubuzuba obo izina lyamunzi liyootegwa JEHOVA MPABEDE.

Nkabela Mwami wakaaba mumaanza aakwe Jehoyakimu mwami wa-Juda azibelesyo zimwi zyaŋanda ya-Leza, elyo wakazileta kunyika ya-Sinara kuŋanda ya-leza wakwe, azibelesyo wakazileta mucilondwedo caŋanda ya-leza wakwe.
Lino mwami wakalailila Asipenazi silutwe wabazibe bakwe kuti alete bamwi babana ba-Israyeli, basilunyungu lwabwami alwabapati,
balombe batakwe tumpenda, bali aziwa zibotu, bajisi maanu abusongo boonse, babwene makani aakumvwisya luzibo, beelede kubeleka milimo muŋanda yamwami, akubaiisya malembo amwaambo waba-Kasidi.

Nkabela mwami wakababambila zilyo zyabuzuba abuzuba, caabilo cazilyo zinono nzyaakali kulya mwami acawaini ngwaakali kunywa. Wakalailila kuti balelwe myaka yotatwe; yamana myaka yotatwe, baime kubusyu bwamwami.
Lino akati kabo kakuli bamwi bana ba-Juda, Daniele, Hananiya, Misayeli a-Azariya.
Nkabela silutwe wabazibe wakabaulika mazina. Daniele, wakamuulika izina lya-Belitsazara; a-Hananiya, wakamupa izina lya-Sadrake; Misayeli, wakamupa lya-Mesaki; a-Azariya wakamupa lyaAbedinego.
Lino Leza wakacita kuti Daniele afwidwe lweetelelo aluzyalo kulisilutwe wabazibe.

Nkabela silutwe wabazibe wakaambila Daniele kuti, Ndayoowa mwami simalelaangu, ngonguwe iwakabamba zilyo zyanu azyakunywa zyanu. Sa ncibotu kuti abone ziwa zyanu tazili kabotu mbuli ziwa zyabasanyokwe? Na caba obo, muyoondipesya mulandu kumwami, ambweni ulandigonka mutwe.
Mpoonya awo Daniele wakaambila mulangi, silutwe wabazibe ngwaakabikide kukulanga Daniele, Hananiya, Misayeli a-Azariya. Wakati,
Utusoleke toba landa bako mazuba aali ikumi. Batupe zisyu zyakulya amaanzi aakunywa.
Lino ziwa zyesu zilingulwe, ubone mbuzibede, azyalo ziwa zyabalombe balya zilyo zinono zyamwami, Wamana kubona, utucitile mbubonya mbobona.
Elyo wakabaswiilila mumakani aya, wabasoleka mazuba aali ikumi.
Amane mazuba aali ikumi, ziwa zyabo zyakalingulwa, nkabela kwakabonwa kuti zili kabotu, zilineneede, kwiinda balombe boonse ibakali kulya zilyo zinono zyamwami.
Aboobo mulangi wakagwisya zilyo zinono awaini wakunywa, wakali kubapa zisyu.
Lino nicakamana ciindi mwami ncaakabikide kuti baletwe kulinguwe, silutwe wabazibe wakabaleta kuli-Nebukadinezara.
Elyo mwami wakaambaula abo, nkabela akati kabo boonse teekwakajanwa naba omwe uuli mbuli Daniele, Hananiya, Misayeli, a-Azariya, Nkaambo kako bakaima kunembo lyamwami.
Nkabela mumakani oonse aaluzibo amaanu mwami ngaakabuzya kulimbabo, wakajana kuti balainda ziindi zili ikumi basondi abacape boonse bamucisi cakwe coonse.
Nkabela Daniele kacipona mane kusikila kumwaka mutaanzi wabwami bwa-Koresi.
Mpa­ wo mwami wakalailila kuti kwiitwe basondi abacape abaŋanga aba-Kasidi, bapandulwide mwami ziloto zyakwe, Mpawo bakeza, baima kunembo lyamwami.
Lino mwami wakabaambila kuti, Ndalota ciloto, amoyo wangu wapenga nkaambo nsizi mbucaamba.
Mpawo ba-Kasidi bakaambila mwami muci-Aramu, bati, O mwami, kopona lyoonse. Utulwiide ciloto, swebo tobalanda bako, lino tuyookulwiida mbucaamba,
Mwami wakavwiila ba-Kasidi, kuti, Ncobeni muleelede kundaambila ciloto ncindakalota­ akucipandulula, Mwabula kucita obo, muyookosaulwa, amaanda aanu ayooba zitantaala buyo.
Pele na mwandilwiida ciloto akucipandulula, muyootambula zipo amalumbo abulemu bunji kuzwa kulindime. Nkaambo kako amundilwiide ciloto akucipandulula.
Mpawo bakavuwa lwabili, bati, Mwami atulwiide ciloto, lino swebo tobalanda bako tuyoopandulula mbocaamba.
Mwami wakavuwa kuti, Ncobeni ndizi kuti ndinywe basikutamauka, nkaambo mwabona kuti ijwi ndendaamba ndyakasimpe.

Mulizi kuti na mwabula kundizibya ciloto mbucibede, kuli kaambo komwe buyo. Mwabamba majwi aakubeja aatakwe milimo, kuti mwaambe mumatwi­ aangu, mane mbokuli busiku ngunamacaca. Amundilwiide ciloto, aboobo ndaakonzya kuziba kuti mulakonzya kucipandulula.

Lino ba-Kasidi bakavuwa mumatwi aamwami kuti, Taakwe muntu naba omwe ansi ano uukonzya kulwiida mwami makani aya. Ncobeni taakwe mwami mupati na mweendelezi naba omwe iwakabuzizye makani aali boobu kumusondi na mucape na mu-Kasidi naba umwi.
Makani mwami ngabuzya mayumu; taakwe uukonzya kulwiida mwami makani aya cita baleza batakali akati kabantu baansi.
Aboobo kwakamvwigwa mulazyo wakuti basongo boonse baleelede kujayigwa, nkabela Daniele abeenzinyina bakayandaulwa kuti bajayigwe.
Mpawo Daniele wakavwiila Arioki, silutwe wabasilumamba wamwa miiwakainkide kukujaya basongo ba-Babuloni, majwi aabusongo abucenjezu.
Wakaambila Arioki silutwe wamwami kuti, Ino nkaambonzi mulazyo wamwami wabuka abukali buli boobo? Elyo Arioki wakalwiida Daniele makani.
Mpoonya awo Daniele wakainka kumwami kuyookumbila kuti amubikile ciindi, apandulwide mwami makani.
Lino Daniele wakaya kuŋanda yakwe, walwiida beenzinyina Hananiya, Misayeli a-Azariya makani,
kuti bakumbile luzyalo kuli Leza wakujulu, abagwasye mumakani aya aasisidwe, kuti ba-Daniele abeenzinyina batajayigwi antoomwe abasongo bamwi baku-Babuloni,
Mpoonya awo Daniele wakayubunwidwa makani aasisidwe mucilengano camasiku. Nkabela Daniele wakalumba Leza wakujulu.
Daniele wakaamba kuti, Lilumbwe izina lya-Leza lyoonse mane kukabe kutamani, Ngonguwe uujisi busongo anguzu,
Ngonguwe uupindaula ziindi amazuba. Ulagwisya bami, alimwi ulabusya bami, Ulapa basongo busongo bwabo, abaabo bali abucenjezu ngonguwe uubapa luzibo.
Ulayubununa makani aasisidwe aakataazya. Ulizi zintu zyoonse zili mumudima; kulinguwe mumuni nkuubede.
O Leza wabamatata, ndakuhimba, ndakutembaula, nkaambo wandipa busongo anguzu, wandizibya makani ngetwakabuzya kulinduwe, wandizibya makani aamwami.

Mpawo Daniele wakainka kuli-Arioki, mwami ngwaakabikide kuti anyonyoone basongo ba-Babuloni, waakakumwaambila kuti, Utanyonyooni basongo ba-Babuloni pe, Unditole kumwami, lino njoopandulwida mwami makani.
Mpawo Arioki wakafwambaana kutola Daniele kumwami. Wakamwaambila kuti, Ndajana muntu, umwi wabazike bazwa kucisi ca-Juda, uukonzya kupandulwida mwami makani.
Nkabela mwami wakabuzya Daniele (ngonguwe iwakapegwa izina lya-Belitsazara) wati, Sa ulakonzya kundizibya ciloto ncendakalota akucipandulula?
Lino Daniele wakavwiila mwami kuti, Taakwe naba omwe akati kabasongo abasondi abacape abaŋanga uukonzya kupandulwida mwami makani ayo ngaakabuzya,
pele nkwali Leza wakujulu uuyubununa makani aasisidwe, Ngonguwe wazibya mwami Nebukadinezara makani aayooba kumamanino aaciindi. Nceeci ciloto cako azilengano zyamoyo wako nzowakabona abulo bwako,
Miyeeyo yako, O mwami, iyakabuka nowakali abulo yakaamba makani aaciza. Oyo uuyubununa makani aasisidwe wakakuzibya makani aayooba,

Pele mebo, teensi kwaamba kuti ndijisi busongo kwiinda bantu boonse bapona pe, Teensi ncico ncindayubunwidwa makani aya. Ndayubunwidwa makani kuti nkapandulwide mwami, azibe miyeeyo yamumoyo wakwe mbiibede.
Webo, O mwami, wakabona cikozyano cipati. Eci cikozyano cipati cakali kubalama, alimwi kaciimvwi kumeso aako, aciwa caco kaciyoosya.
Cikozyano eco, mutwe waco wakali wangolida imbotu, camba caco amaboko aaco zyakali zyansiliva, elkungu caco azibelo zyaco zyakali zyamukuba,
myeendo yaco yakali yabutale, azituta zyaco zyakali zyabutale buvwelene abulongo.
Lino wakali kubona mane lumwi kwakakolomonwa ibbwe, kutali amaanza aamuntu, nkabela lyakauma cikozyano azituta zyaco, izyakali zyabutale buvwelene abulongo, lyakazipwayaula.

Mpawo butale, bulongo, mukuba, insiliva angolida, zyoonse buyo zyakapwayaulwa, zyakaba mbuli buungu bwakucipolelo ciindi cacilimo. Muuwo wakazipupulula, teekwakasyaala nekaceya. Pele ibbwe ilyakauma cikozyano lyakaba idundu ipati, lyakazuzya nyika yoonse,
Nceeco ciloto mbucakabede, Lino tulacipandulula kubusyu bwamwami.
Webo, O mwami, uli mwami wabami. Leza wakujulu wakupa bwami, inguzu, bupati abulemu.
Kufumbwa nkobakede bantu baansi na banyama bamusokwe na bayuni bakujulu, wabaaha mumaanza aako kuti ubeendelezye boonse. Nduwe mutwe wangolida.
Lino kusule lyako kuyoobuka bwami bumbi buteelene abwako, alimwi caba ciindi kuyoobuka bwami abumwi bwatatu, bwami bwamukuba buyooendelezya nyika yoonse,
Lino kuyooba bwami bwane buyumu nta mbuli butale, nkaambo butale bulapwayaula akujaya zintu zyoonse, nkabela obo bwami buyoopwayaula akukomauna ezi zyoonse mbubonya mbuli butale mbobupwayaula.

­Alimwi mbuli mbowabona zituta aminwe yazyo, kuti nzezyabulongo bwasikubumba buvwelene abutale, nkokuti obo bwami buyooanzaana, pele bumwi buyumu bwabutale bunooyoocisyeede mulimbubo, mbubonya mbowabona butale buvwelene abulongo bwamatope.
Alimwi minwe yazituta mbuyakali yabutale buvwelene abulongo, nkokuti obo bwami buyooba azipanzi ziyumu zivwelene azipanzi zipwayika buyo.
Mbubonya mbowabona butale buvwelene abulongo bwamatope, nkokuti buyooliswanaanya alunyungu lwabantu, pele tabakooyoojatana kabotu, mbubonya mbuli butale mbobutaswanaani abulongo.

Lino mumazuba aabaami abo, Leza wakujulu uyoobusya bwami butakooyoonyonyoonwa abuniini mane kukabe kutamani, anguzu zyabo tazikooyoosiilwa bantu bambi. Obo bwami buyoopwayaula akumanisya mami aya conse, alimwi bwalo buyooima nji kukabe kutamani,

Buyooba mbubonya mbuli ibbwe elyo ndowabona, ilyakakolomonwa kuzwa kucilundu kutali kumaanza aabantu, ilyakapwayaula zyoonse buyo—butale, mukuba, bulongo, insiliva angolida. Leza mupati watondezya mwami makani aaciza. Ciloto ncakasimpe, akupandulula kwaco nkwalusinizyo.
Mwami wakaambila Daniele kuti, Ncobeni Leza wanu ngu-Leza wabaleza, mupati wabami, sikuyubununa makani aasisidwe, nkaambo wakonzya kuyubununa makani aya.
Lino mwami wakapa Daniele bulemu azipo zipati zinji, alimwi wakamubika kuti abe mweendelezi wacisi coonse ca-Babuleni asilutwe mupati wabasongo boonse ba-Babuloni.
Elyo Daniele wakakumbila kumwami, nkabela wakabika Sadrake, Mesaki a-Abedinego kuti babeleke milimo yacisi ca-Babuloni, pele Daniele kakede kunkuta yamwami.

Lino Nebukadinezara wakatamba beendelezi bazisi abangambela abami abasinkuta abasimubambamali ababetesi abasikwiiminina abasilutwe boonse bazisi, kuti bazoobungane kukusalazya eco cikozyano mwami Nebukadinezara ncaakaimikide.

Aboobo beendelezi bazisi abangambela abami abasinkuta abasimubambamali ababetesi abasikwiiminina abasilutwe boonse bazisi bakabungana kukusalazya eco cikozyano mwami Nebukadinezara ncaakaimikide. Nkabela bakaliimvwi kunembo lyacikozyano Nebukadinezara ncaakaimikide,
Mpawo sikoongolola wakaita canguzu, wati, Mwalaililwa nubantu bamisyobo yoonse azisi zyoonse amyaambo yoonse,

kuti kufumbwa ciindi nimuswiilila ijwi lyamweembo amilozi akantimbwa anyeele acinamondonga amutetele aziimbyo­ zyoonse, muleelede kuvundama akukotamina cikozyano cangolida mwami Nebukadinezara ncaimikide,
Lino kufumbwa muntu uukaka kuvundama akucikotamina, uyootolwa ndilyonya akuwaalwa mubbila lyamulilo wamabangabanga.

Nkaambo kako bantu boonse nibakamvwa ijwi lyamweembo amilozi akantimbwa anyeele acinamondonga aziimbyo zyoonse, bantu bamisyobo yoonse abazisi zyoonse abamyaambo yoonse bakali kuvundama akukotamina cikozyano cangolida mwami Nebukadinezara ncaakaimikide.
Bakaambila mwami Nebukadinezara kuti, O mwami, kopona lyoonse,
Webo, O mwami, ulibikide mulao wakuti kufumbwa muntu uumvwa ijwi lyamweembo amilozi akantimbwa anyeele acinamondonga amutetele aziimbyo­ zyoonse, uleelede kuvundama akukotamina cikozyano cangolida,
nkabela kufumbwa muntu uukaka kuvundama akucikotamina uleelede kuwaalwa mukati kabbila lyamulilo wamabangabanga,

Pele kuli bamwi ba-Juda mbobikide mumilimo yacisi ca-Babuloni, nkokuti Sadrake, Mesaki a-Abedinego. Aba bantu tababiki myoyo yabo kumajwi aako, O mwami. Tabakombi baleza bako, acikozyano cangolida ncoimikide tabacikotamini pe.
Nkabela Nebukadinezara wakababuzya kuti, Sa aya makani ngaakusinizya, O Sadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego? Sa tamulemeki baleza bangu nekuba kukotamina cikozyano cangolida ncendakaimika?

Amuswiilile! Na mwazumina kuti, kufumbwa ciindi nemumvwa ijwi lyamweembo, milozi, kantimbwa, nyeele, cinamondonga, mutetele, aziimbyo zyoonse, kuvundama akukotamina cikozyano ncendakapanga, mbubo. Pele na mwakaka kukotama, muyoowaalwa ndilyonya mukati kabbila lyamulilo wamabangabanga. Lino nguli Leza uuyoomuvuna mumaanza aangu?
Na Leza wesu ngotukomba ulijisi inguzu zyakutuvuna kuzwa kubbila lyamulilo wamabangabanga, uyootuvuna mumaanza aako, O mwami.
Nekubaboobo na tacili boobo kuzibwe kulinduwe, O mwami, kuti twakaka kukomba baleza bako akukotamina cikozyano cangolida ncowakabika.

Amvwe obo, Nebukadinezara wakazula bukali, abusyu bwakwe bwakabija naakalanga ba-Sadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego. Wakalailila kuti ibbila lisoselwe ziindi zili musanu azibili kwiinda mbolyakali kuumpwa lyoonse.
Alimwi wakalailila bamwi bantu, baalumi basintaze bamumpi yakwe, kuti baange ba-Sadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego, babawaale mubbila lyamulilo wamabangabanga.
Aboobo aba bantu bakaangwa, kabasamine zikobela zyabo azibaki zyabo angowani zyabo azyakusama zyabo zyoonse, akuwaalwa mukati kabbila lyamulilo wamabangabanga.
Lino nkaambo kabukali bwamajwi aamwami, alimwi nkaambo kakuti ibbila lyakayakisya loko, mabangabanga aamulilo akatenta abo bantu ibakatola ba-Sadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego.
Elyo bantu aba botatwe, ba-Sadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego, bakawa kabaangidwe mukati kabbila lyamulilo wamabangabanga.

Lino mwami Nebukadinezara wakagamba, wanyampuka cakufwambaana. Wakaambila basinkuta bakwe kuti, Sa teensi bantu botatwe mbetwawaala kabaangidwe mukati kabbila lyamulilo? Bakavwiila mwami kuti, Mbukabede, O mwami.
Wakati, Ma! Ndabona bone baangunwidwe baleendeenda mukati kamulilo. Tabapiide, pe, abunini. Alimwi ciwa camuntu wane cili mbuli ciwa caumwi wabaleza.

Mpawo Nebukadinezara wakaswena afwiifwi kumulyango wabbila lyamulilo wamabangabanga, wati, Noba-Sadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego, balanda ba-Leza wakujulu, amuzwe, muboole okuno. Mpoonya awo baSadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego bakazwa mukati kamulilo.

Nkabela beendelezi bazisi abangambela abami abasinkuta bamwami ibakabungene bakabona kuti mulilo kuutaiisi inguzu zyakutenta mibili yabantu aba. Masusu aakumitwe yabo taakwe naakakokonyana, zikobela zyabo tazikwe nezyakapya, alimwi tabakwe nebakanunka mulilo pe!

Lino Nebukadinezara wakaamba kuti, Alumbwe Leza waba-Sadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego, iwakatuma angelo wakwe akuvuna balanda bakwe ibakamusyoma, ibakakaka ijwi lyamwami akwaaba mibili yabo kuti batakombi na kukotamina leza naba umwi cita Leza wabo beni.

Nkaambo kako ndabika mulao wakuti, akati kabantu bamisyobo yoonse amyaambo yoonse, kufumbwa muntu uuamba cakusampaula Leza waba-Sadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego uyoogonkelwa zizo zyakwe, aŋanda yakwe iyooba mafwisila, Nkaambo taakwe Leza umbi uukonzya kuvuna obo.
Lino mwami wakasumpula ba-Sadrake a-Mesaki a-Abedinego mucisi ca-Babuloni.
Ndali kuyeeya kuti ncibotu kumutondezya zitondezyo amalele Leza wakujulu ngaakacita kulindime,
Ma! Zitondezyo zyakwe zilayoosya, amalele aakwe alagambya! Bwami bwakwe mbwami butamani, abweendelezi bwakwe mbwakumazyalani amazyalani!
Mebo nde-Nebukadinezara ndakaliliibide muŋanda yangu akukala kabotu muŋanda yangu yabwami.
Ndakalota ciloto icakandiyoosya; miyeeyo njendakali kuyeeya abulo bwangu azilengano zyamoyo wangu zyakandipenzya.
Lino ndakalailila kuti basongo boonse ba-Babuloni baletwe kulindime, kuti bandipandulwide ciloto mbocaamba.
Elyo kwakanjila basondi abacape aba-Kasidi abaŋanga, nkabela ndakakanana ciloto mumatwi aabo. Pele kucipandulula teebakandipandulwida pe.
Lumwi kwakanjila Daniele, ngonguwe iwakaulikwa izina lya-Belitsazara mbubonya mbuli izina lya-Leza wangu. Mulinguwe muli muuya wabaleza basalala. Lino ndakamulwiida ciloto, ndati,
O Belitsazara, mupati wabasondi boonse, ndizi kuti mulinduwe muli Muuya wabaleza basalala, alimwi taakwe makani aasisidwe kulinduwe. Nceeci ciloto ncindakalota. Kondipandulwida mbocaamba.
Zilengano zyamumoyo wangu abulo bwangu nzeezi. Ndakabona musamu akati kanyika, Bwiime bwawo bwakali bulamfu.
Oyu musamu wakamena akujata inguzu, mane lumwi mutwe wawo wakasika kujulu, alimwi wakaboneka koonse koonse akusikila kumagolelo aanyika.

Matu aawo akali kabotu, amicelo yawo yakavulisya, aboobo boonse bakajana zilyo mulinguwo. Banyama bamusokwe bakali kujana cenzule kunsi lyawo, abayuni bakujulu bakali kukala mumitabi yawo, abaumi boonse bakasaninwa nguwo.
Wakoongolola loko, waamba kuti, Amugonke oyo musamu akunyungaula mitabi yawo. Amucele matu aawo akumwaya micelo yawo. Banyama bazwe kunsi lyawo, abalo bayuni bazwe mumitabi yawo.

Nekubaboobo amuleke cisiko camiyanda yaco kacicisyeede munyika, caangidwe caanzyo cansimbi amukuba, akati kamweemvwe wamusokwe. Atete kumumee wakujulu, azilyo zyakwe zibe bwizu bwaansi antoomwe abanyama.
Moyo wakwe usanduke, utabi limbi moyo wabuntu, abe amoyo wabunyama, mane myaka iili musanu aibili imumanine.

Aya makani akosoka kujwi lyabalindizi; azwa kumajwi aabasalala, kuti baumi boonse bazibe kuti Syakeemba nguuendelezya mubwami bwabasyaansi, alimwi ulabupa kufumbwa ngwayanda akubusya naba muntu uubombede abweendelezye.

Nceeci ciloto ncindakalota mebo ndemwami Nebukadinezara. Lino webo, O Belitsazara, pandulula ciloto mbucaamba, nkaambo basongo boonse bamubwami bwangu bakacilwa kundipandulwida mbucaamba, pele webo ulakonzya, nkaambo muuya wabaleza basalala mulikede mukati kako.
Musamu nguwakabona, iwakakula akujata inguzu mane bwiime bwawo bwakasika akujulu, alimwi wakaboneka koonse koonse kunyika yoonse,
iwakali amatu mabotu amicelo mmu, alimwi mulinguwo mwakali zilyo zyakusanizya boonse, musamu banyama bamusokwe ngubakajana cenzule kunsi lyawo, abayuni bakujulu bakali kukala mumitabi yawo—
nduwe, O mwami ookulide akujata inguzu. Bupati bwako bwakomena, bwasika akujulu, abwami bwako bwasika akumagolelo aanyika.

Lino mwami mbwaakabona mulangizi uusalala ulaseluka kuzwa kujulu cakwaamba kuti, Amugonke musamu oyo akuunyonyoona, pele amuleke cisiko camiyanda yawo cicisyeede munyika, caangidwe caanzyo cansimbi amukuba, akati kamweemvwe wamusokwe, alimwi atete kumumee wakujulu, akwaabana zilyo abanyama bamusokwe, mane myaka iili musanu aibili imumanine—
mbuboobu makani mbwaapandululwa, O mwami. Kwazwa mulazyo kuli-Leza wakujulu, makani aamwami simalelaangu.

Uyootandwa kuzwa kubantu, acikalilo cako ciyooba antoomwe abanyama bamusokwe. Uyoosanizigwa bwizu mbuli musune, alimwi uyooteta ­kumumee wakujulu, nkabela myaka iili musanu aibili iyookumanina, mane lumwi ukazibe kuti Leza wakujulu nguuendelezya mubwami bwabantu akubupa kuliyooyo kufumbwa ngwayanda.
Pele mbuli mbukwakalaililwa kuti cisiko camiyanda yamusamu cisyaale, bwami bwako buyookusyaalila, buyooba bwako kuzwa kuciindi nonooyoozi kuti Ijulu ndelyeendelezya.
Nkaambo kako, O mwami, lulayo lwangu lutambulike kulinduwe. Leka zibi zyako akucita bululami. Manisya milandu yako kukufwida bapengede luzyalo. Inga ciindi caluumuno lwako ciyoolampisigwa.
Aya makani oonse akaba ncobeni kuli-Nebukadinezara.
Kumane myezi iili ikumi aibili, wakali kweendeenda kuŋanda yabwami yaku-Babuloni.
Elyo mwami wakaamba kuti, Sa teensi oyu munzi mupati, Babuloni, ngunjakide kunguzu zyangu zigambya kuti ube cikalilo cabwami aŋanda yabulemu bwangu?
Naakacili kwaamba majwi aya, kwakamvwigwa ijwi lizwa kujulu, liti, Swiilila, Nebukadinezara! Eci caambilwa nduwe. Bwami bwakuleya.

Ulatandwa kuzwa kubantu. Cikalilo cako cilaba antoomwe abanyama bamusokwe. Ulasanizigwa bwizu mbuli itjombe, nkabela myaka iili musanu aibili ilakumanina, mane ukazibe kuti Leza wakujulu nguuendelezya mubwami bwabantu akubupa kufumbwa ngwayanda,

Mpoonya awo mubuzuba obo mbubonya makani akazuzikizigwa kuli-Nebukadinezara. Wakatandwa kuzwa kubantu, wali kulya bwizu mbuli musune, amubili wakwe wakateta kumumee wakujulu. Masusu aakwe akalampa mbuli milimba yasikwaze, amaala aakwe akaba mbuli maala aabayuni.

Bantu boonse bakede ansi tabayeeyegwi kuti ncintu kulinguwe. Ulacita kufumbwa ncayanda akati kamakamu makamu aakujulu abantu bakede ansi. Taakwe uukonzya kukasya ijanza lyakwe nanka kumubuzya kuti, Ncinzi ncocita?

Lino kuciindi eco nciconya busongo bwangu bwakandiboolela, abwalo bulemu bwabwami bwangu, bupati bwangu akumweka kwangu zyoonse zyakandiboolela, Basinkuta bangu abapati bangu bakandiyandaula, aboobo ndakaimikwa nji mubwami bwangu akuyungizizigwa bulemu bunji.
Lino sunu mebo nde-Nebukadinezara ndalemeka akutembaula akulumba Mwami wakujulu, nkaambo milimo yakwe yoonse njakasimpe, anzila zyakwe zililuleme, abaabo beenda cakulisumpula ulakonzya kubafwiinsya.
Elyo bakaleta zinywido zyangolida azyansiliva izyakagwisigwa muntempele yaŋanda ya-Leza yamu­-Jerusalemu, nkabela mwami abasilutwe bakwe abanakazi bakwe abasimamambe bakwe bakanywida mulinzizyo.
Bakali kunywa waini akutembaula baleza bangolida abansiliva, bamukuba ababutale, bazisamu abamabwe.
Mpawo busyu bwamwami bwakausana, miyeeyo yakwe yakamuyoosya, manungilo aatusolo twakwe akatontola, amazwi aakwe akali kugontana.

Lino mwami wakoongolola canguzu, walailila kuti kuletwe basondi, ba-Kasidi abaŋanga. Nkabela mwami wakaambila basongo baku-Babuloni kuti, Kufumbwa muntu uubala malembo aya akupandulula mbwaamba, uyoosamikwa zisani zisalala pyu akubikilwa luwenje lwangolida munsingo yakwe, alimwi uyooba mweendelezi watatu wamucisi.
Mpawo kwakanjila basongo boonse bamwami, pele bakakacilwa kubala malembo akupandulwida mwami mbwaamba.
Lino mwami Belisazara wakayoowa loko, abusyu bwakwe bwakausana, abalo basilutwe bakwe bakagamba.

Mpali muntu mucisi cako uujisi Muuya wabaleza basalala. Mumazuba aauso mumuni abucenjezu abusongo buli mbuli busongo bwabaleza zyakajanika mulinguwe, nkabela uso mwami Nebukadinezara wakamubika kuti abe mupati wabasondi abacape aba-Kasidi abaŋanga.

Muuya mubotu cakwiinda, aluzibo, abucenjezu bwakupandulula ziloto akulabununa tulabi akusalazya makani aakataazya, zyoonse zyakajanwa muliyooyo Daniele, ngonguwe mwami ngwaakaulika izina lya-Belitsazara, Lino aitwe Daniele. Uyoopandulula makani mbwaamba.
Mpoonya awo Daniele wakaletwa kubusyu bwamwami. Nkabela mwami wakaambila Daniele kuti, Sa nduwe Daniele, umwi wabana babuzike bwa-Juda, mwami taata mbaakaleta kuzwa kucisi ca-Juda?
Ndimvwide aanduwe. Ndamvwa kuti muuya wabaleza muuli mulinduwe, alimwi mumuni abucenjezu abusongo bupati zyoonse zilajanika mulinduwe,
Lino sunu basongo abasondi baliitidwe okuno kubusyu bwangu kuti babale aya malembo akundipandulwida mbwaamba, Pele bakacilwa kupandulula makani,

Lino webo, ndamvwa kuti ulakonzya kupandulula makani aasisidwe akulabununa tulabi, Na ulakonzya kubala aya malembo akundipandulwida mbwaamba, uyoosamikwa zisani zisalala pyu aluwenje lwangolida munsingo yako, uyooba mweendelezi watatu wamucisi.
Mpawo Daniele wakavwiila mwami kuti, Zipo zyako zisyaale kulinduwe, azilumbyo zyako uzipe umbi, Nekubaboobo njoobala malembo akupandulwida mwami mbwaamba.
Swiilila, O mwami. Leza wakujulu wakapa uso Nebukadinezara bwami abupati anguzu abulemu.

Lino nkaambo kabupati mbwaakamupa, bantu bazisi zyoonse abamisyobo yoonse abamyaambo yoonse bakali kuyoowa akukankama kubusyu bwakwe. Kufumbwa ngwaakayanda kujaya wakamujaya, kufumbwa ngwaakayanda kuti kapona wakamuleka kuti kapona, kufumbwa ngwaakayanda kusumpula wakamusumpula, alimwi kufumbwa ngwaakayanda kufwiinsya wakamufwiinsya.
Pele moyo wakwe nowakalisumpula, amuuya wakwe nowakayuma mukulikankaizya, wakagwisigwa acuuno cabwami, abulemu bwakwe wakabunyanzigwa,

Wakatandwa kuzwa kubantu, moyo wakwe wakaba mbuli myoyo yabanyama, acikalilo cakwe cakali ant! mwe ambongolo zyamusokwe. Wakali kulya bwizu mbuli basune, amubili wakwe wakali kuteta kumumee waku-Julu, mane lumwi wakaziba kuti Leza Muntalabala nguuendelezya mubwami bwabantu akubusya kufumbwa ngwayanda kuti abe silutwe wambubo.
Lino webo, Belisazara O mwanaakwe, tobombyi moyo wako, nekuba kuti wakaziba makani aya oonse,

Walisumpula buyo cakusampaula Mwami wakujulu, nkabela zibelesyo zyaŋanda yakwe wazileta kulinduwe, wanywa waini mulinzizyo, yebo abasilutwe bako abanakazi bako abasimamambe bako, alimwi mwatembaula baleza bangolida abansiliva, babutale abamukuba, bazisamu abamabwe, batakonzya kubona nekuba kumvwa nekuba kuziba, pele Leza uujisi buumi bwako mumaanza aakwe, anzila zyako zyoonse nzizyakwe, tomulemeki pe.
Nciceeco ijanza ncilyakatuminwa kuzwa kulinguwe kuti lilembe malembo aya,
Lino ngaaya malembo aalembedwe. MENE, MENE, TEKEL UPARSIN.
Alimwi mbuboobu makani mbwaapandululwa. MENE nkokuti Leza wabala mazuba aabwami bwako, wabusisya kumamanino.
TEKEL nkokuti wapimwa muzipimyo, wabula bulemu bweelede,
PERESI nkokuti bwami bwako bwaandaanisigwa, bwapegwa mumaanza aaba-Medi aba-Persia.
Mpawo Belisazara wakalailila, nkabela bakasamika Daniele zisani zisalala pyu akubika luwenje lwangolida munsingo yakwe, nkabela kwakoongololwa kuti uleelede kuba mweendelezi watatu wamucisi.
nkabela Dariyo mu-Medi wakatola bwami naakali amyaka iili makumi aali musanu alimwi amyaka yobile.
Alimwi abo beendelezi bakabikilwa basilutwe bapati botatwe, nkabela umwi wabaaba botatwe kali Daniele. Beendelezi kabeelede kutola makani kulibasilutwe, aboobo mwami katakonzya kujana mapenzi.
Lino oyo Daniele wakaba ampuwo imbotu kwiinda basilutwenyina abeendelezi boonse, nkaambo kakuti mulinguwe kamuli muuya mubotu loko, aboobo mwami wakali kuyeeya kumupa bweendelezi bwacisi coonse.

Lino basilutwe abeendelezi bakali kuyandaula makani kuti babikile Daniele kaambo kumakani aacisi, pele bakakacilwa kujana makani nikaba kaambo kali buti, nkaambo Daniele wakasyomeka, alimwi katakwe kampenda nekaba kaambo kali buti ikakajanwa mulinguwe.
Mpawo aba bantu bakaamba kuti, Tatukonzyi kujana kaambo nekaba kamwi kakubikila oyu Daniele, cita tumupe kaambo mumakani aankombelo ya-Leza wakwe.

Basilutwe abangambela abeendelezi boonse bazisi, abalo basinkuta abami, boonse buyo bazuminana kuti mwami uleelede kubika mulao akuyuminisya mulazyo wakuti, kufumbwa muntu uukumbila lukumbilo kuli-leza naba omwe nekuba kumuntu naba omwe, cita kulinduwe olike, mumazuba aali makumi otatwe, uleelede kuwaalwa mubulyango bwabalavu.
Lino O mwami, kobika mulao akulemba malembo, kuti utacincilulwi, ube mbubonya mbuli mulao waba-Medi aba-Persia uutakonzyi kulobesegwa.
Amvwe obo, mwami Dariyo wakalemba malembo amulao.
Mpawo aba bantu bakabungana, bajana Daniele ulakumbila kuli-Leza wakwe.

Lino bakaswena kumwami, batalika kwaambaula awe makani aamulao, bati, O mwami, sa tolembede malembo aakuti kufumbwa muntu uukumbila cintu kuli-leza naba omwe na kumuntu naba omwe, cita kulinduwe o mwami, mumazuba aali makumi otatwe, uleelede kuwaalwa musenengo lyabalavu? Mwami wakavuwa kuti, Mbukabede! Makani akacitwa obo, ali mbubonya mbuli mulao waba-Medi awaba-Persia uutakonzyi kulobesegwa.
Mpawo bakavwiilia mwami kuti, Oyo Daniele, umwi wabana babuzike ba-Juda, tabikide moyo wakwe kulinduwe, O mwami, nekuba kumulao ngowakalemba. Ucikumbila ziindi zyotatwe mubuzuba.
Pele abo bantu bakabungana kumwami, baambi la mwami kuti, Utalubi, O mwami, kuti mulao waba-Medi awabaPersia ngwakuti kufumbwa mulao nanka mulazyo mwami ngwabika tuukonzyi kulobesegwa.
Lino kwakaletwa ibbwe, lyakabikwa amanjililo aasenengo, nkabela mwami wakalinamatika acinamatizyo cakwe acinamatizyo cabasilutwe bakwe, kuti makani aa-Daniele atasandululwi.
Mpawo mwami wakaya kuŋanda yakwe, woona anzala; takwakaletelwa misobano pe, alimwi wakaba acilabila.
Buce buyo, mwami wakafuma, wafwambaana kuya kusenengo lyabalavu.

Lino naakasika afwaafwi kusenengo, mwakaweedwe Daniele, wakoongolola ajwi lyakupenga. Mwami wakaambila Daniele kuti, O Daniele, mulanda wa-Leza muumi, sa Leza wako ngomanina milimo lyoonse, ulakonzya kukuvuna kumilomo yabalavu?
Mpawo Daniele wakaambila mwami kuti, O mwami, kopona lyoonse.
Leza wangu watuma angelo wakwe, wajala milomo yabalavu, aboobo tabana kundibisizya, nkaambo kwakajanwa kuti nsikwe kaambo kumeso aakwe, alimwi akulinduwe, O mwami, nsikwe ncindakabisya­.
Mpawo mwami wakabotelwa loko, walailila kuti Daniele agwisigwe musenengo. Aboobo Daniele wakagwisigwa musenengo, nkabela taakwe naakabisigwa abuniini, nkaambo wakali kusyomeka kuli-Leza wakwe.

Lino mwami wakalailila, nkabela abo bantu ibakabikilide Daniele kaambo bakaletwa akuwaalwa musenengo lyabalavu, balo abana babo abanakazi babo. Lino balavu bakabajata akutyolaula zifuwa zyabo kabatana kusika kunsi esenengo.

Ndabika mulao wakuti, mubwami bwacisi cangu coonse bantu baleelede kuyoowa akulemeka Leza wa-Daniele, nkaambo ngonguwe Leza muumi uuliwo lyoonse, Bwami bwakwe tabukonzyi kunyonyoonwa, abweendelezi bwakwe tabweeli.
Ulafutula akuvuna, ulacita zitondezyo amalele koonse koonse, kujulu aansi. Ngonguwe iwakavuna Daniele kumilomo yabalavu,
Daniele wakati, Ndakabona cilengano cangu ciindi camasiku. Ndakabona myuuwo yone yakujulu ilakopenganya maanzi aamulwizi lupati.
Elyo mulwizi mwakazwa banyama bapati bone. Boonse bone kabali amisyobo misyobo.

Mutaanzi kali mbuli mulavu, alimwi kajisi mababa aasikwaze. Lino nendakacili kweebela, mababa aakwe akamonsoka, alimwi wakasumpulwa kuzwa ansi akwiimikwa azituta zyakwe zyobile mbuli muntu, alimwi wakapegwa moyo wabuntu,
Lino kwakaboneka munyama aumwi wabili, kali mbuli masekese, kanyampwide cituta kulubazu lomwe, alimwi kalumide mampango otatwe mukanwa lyakwe, Lino wakaambilwa kuti, Buka, ulye nyama nyingi.
Lino ndaka langa alimwi, ndabona aumwi munyama uuli mbuli siluwe, kajisi mababa one aamuyuni andelo zyakwe. Oyu munyama kajisi mitwe yone, nkabela wakapegwa bwami.

Lino kusule lyayaaya ndakacili kubona muzilengano zyamasiku, nkabela ndakabona munyama aumwi wane, munyama uuyoosya uugambya, uujisi inguzu loko. Kajisi meno mapati aalubulo, nkabela wakali kulya akutyolaula, aceeco icakasyeede wakacilyataula ansumba zyakwe, Kaandeene abanyama boonse ibakamutaangunina, alimwi kajisi meja aali ikumi.

Lino nendakacili kweebela meja, ndakabona kuti kwakamena keja akamwi akati kao. Lino kunembo lyakaako meja mataanzi otatwe akanonkolwa, Alimwi mukeja ako mwakali meso mbuli meso aamuntu amulomo uuamba makani aayoosya.

Oko nkwaakabede kwakazwa mulonga wamulilo. Basimilimo bakwe bakali cuulu cazyuulu, abaabo ibakaimvwi kubusyu bwakwe bakali zyuulu zili ikumi zyazyuulu zili ikumi. Lino basinkuta bakakala, amabuku akajalulwa.
Abanyama bamwi, bakanyanzigwa bwami bwabo, pele kupona bakazumizigwa kucipona mane kusikila kuciindi ceelede.

Nkabela wakapegwa bweendelezi abulemu abwami, kuti bantu bazisi zyoonse abamisyobo yoonse abamyaambo yoonse bamumanine milimo. Bweendelezi bwakwe mbweendelezi butamani butakonzyi kweela, abwami bwakwe tabukonzyi kunyonyoonwa.
Lino mebo nde-Daniele, moyo wangu wakapenzegwa mukaango kangu, azilengano zyamoyo wangu zyakali kundikataazya.
Mpawo ndakaswena kufwaafwi kuluumwi wabaabo ibakaimvwi nkuko, ndamubuzya makani aya oonse ncaamba, Nkabela wakandaambila akundipandulwida makani mbaamba,
Wati, Aba banyama bapati bone mbami bone bati buke ansi.
Pele basalali ba-Sijulu wamajulu bayootambula bwami, nkabela bayoovuba bwami lyoonse mane kukabe kutamani.
Mpawo ndakayandisya kuziba makani aamunyama wane, iwakaandeene abamwi boonse, uuyoosya loko, uuli ameno aalubulo amaala aamukuba, iwakali kulya akutyolaula akulyataula zisyeede ansumba zyakwe,

amakani aameja aali ikumi aakali amutwe wakwe aluja lumwi ilwakamena, ameja otatwe aakawa kunembo lyalo, luja ilwakajisi meso amulomo wakwaambya zintu ziyoosya, aciwa cibi cipati kwiinda ziwa zyabeenzinyina,
Nindakacili kulanga, olo luja lwakabusizya basalali inkondo akubazunda,
mane lumwi Sinsiku wasika, elyo basalali ba-Sijulu bakabetekwa kabotu, aboobo cakasika ciindi cabasalali cakutambula bwami.
Lino mbuboobu mbwaakaamba. Munyama wane, nkokuti kuyoobuka bwami bwane ansi ano bwaandeene amami amwi oonse. Obo bwami buyoolya nyika yoonse, buyooilyataula akwiityolaula.
Ameja aali ikumi, nkokuti kubwami obo kuyoobuka bami bali ikumi, alimwi kusule lyabaabo kuyoobuka umbi uuandeene aboonse bakutaanguna, nkabela uyoozunda bami botatwe.
Uyooamba majwi aakusampaula Sijulu, abalo basalali ba-Sijulu uyoobafwabya. Uyooyeeya kusandula ziindi amilao, Nkabela bayooabwa mumaanza aakwe mwaka amyaka yobile acisela camwaka.
Pele kuyooba inkuta yakubeteka makani, elyo bweendelezi bwakwe buyoonyanzigwa, kuti bunyonyoonwe akulobesegwa mane kusikila kumamanino.
Lino bwami abweendelezi abupati bwazisi zyoonse zyaansi, zyoonse ziyooabwa mumaanza aabantu babasalali ba-Sijulu, Bwami bwakwe mbwami buteeli, nkabela misyobo yoonse iyoomulemeka akumumanina milimo.
Mumwaka watatu wabwami bwamwami Belisazara, cilengano cakaboneka kulindime nde-Daniele, nkokuti acimwi musule lyaceeco ncendakataanguna­ kubona,
Mbuboobu mbundakabona mucilengano cangu. Ndakali mu-Susani dinga lyamucisi ca-Elamu, Alimwi mucilengano ncendakabona ndakali kunkomwe yamulonga Ulai,

Lino nendakatambya meso aangu akulanga, ndakabona mugutu uliimvwi kunkomwe yamulonga. Oyu mugutu kajisi meja malamfu, pele lumwi lwakali lulamfu kwiinda lweenzinyina, nkabela olo lulamfu ndolwakasyaalila kumena.

Lino ndakabona kuti mugutu ulaya budinkaula koonse koonse, kumbo akunyika akumusanza, nkabela katakwe munyama naba omwe iwakakonzya kwiima kunembo lyakwe, alimwi katakwe muntu iwakakonzya kuvuna munguzu zyakwe. Wakali kucita kufumbwa ncaakayanda akulisumpula.
Lino nendakacili kuyeeya makani, ndakabona sijembwe ulazwa kumbo, ulainda atala lyanyika yoonse cakutaguma ansi. Oyo sijembwe kajisi luja lugambya akati kameso aakwe.
Lino wakasika kumugutu uuli ameja obile ngondakabwene uliimvwi kunkomwe yamulonga, wamuzuzaanina cabukali acanguzu.

Ndakabona kuti waswena afwaafwi kumugutu, wamulwisya cabukali. Wakauma mugutu akumutyolela meja aakwe oonse obile. Mugutu wakabula inguzu zyakumulwisya, aboobo wakamuwaala ansi akumulyataula, nkabela katakwe naba umwi iwakakonzya kuvuna mugutu kulinguwe.
Mpawo sijembwe wakalisumpula loko, pele naakacijisi inguzu luja lwakwe lupati lwakatyoka, elyo mucimanga calo kwakamena meja one aagambya aalangene amyuuwo yoonse yone yakujulu,
Kakacili kuya bukomena mane kakasika kumakamu aakujulu, elyo zimwi inyenyeezi kakazilosezya ansi akuzilyataula,
Kakalisumpula mane kusikila kulisilutwe wamakamu, nkabela cipaizyo camazuba oonse cakalesegwa, abusena bwacikombelo cakwe bwakamwayigwa.
Kakapegwa impi, aboobo zipaizyo zyalyoonse zyakalesegwa, nkaambo kakubisya, Luzinizyo lwakawaalwa ansi. Kakali kucita ncekakayanda mukujana coolwe,

Mpawo ndakamvwa uusalala ulaamba, aumwi uusalala wakavwiila oyo iwakaamba, wati, Ayooba mazuba ongae, aya makani aamucilengano cazipaizyo zya lyoonse acakubisya kusaazya acakulyatauzigwa kwacikombelo akwampi?
Nkabela wakamuvwiila kuti, Mazuba ayooba zyuulu zyobile amyanda yotatwe, mangolezya acifumo, lino cikombelo ciyoosalazigwa.
Lino mebo nde-Daniele, nindakabona cilengano, ndakali kuyandaula kucimvwa, Elyo kwakaimvwi kubusyu bwangu cili mbuli muntu.
Nkabela ndakamvwa ijwi lyamuntu akatikati kankomwe zya-Ulai, lyakali koongolola, liti, Gabriyeli, pandulwida muntu oyu cilengano, acimvwisye.
Lino wakaswena afwaafwi mpondakaimvwi, nkabela naakaswena, ndakayoowa, ndavunduma ansi. Pele wakandaambila kuti, Swiililisya, O mwana amuntu, cilengano ncecaciindi camamanino.
Lino naakacili kundaambila, ndakafwida mutjonzi cakuvundama, pele wakandaampa akundiimika amaulu aangu.
Wakati, Bona! Ndakuzibya ciyooba kumamanino aaciindi cabukali, nkaambo ciindi ceelede cakumamanino cilibikidwe.
Mugutu ngowakabona uuli ameja obile-nkokuti bami ba-Mediya aba-Persia,
Asijembwe uuli aboya ngu mwami waba-Helene, aluja lupati luli akati kameso aakwe ngumwami mutaanzi,
Lino mbubonya mbowakabona kuti, luja nelwakatyoka, kwakamena ambi one mucibaka calo, nkokuti mami one ayoozwa mubwami obo, pele taakooyooelana abo munguzu,
Lino kumamanino aaciindi cabo cakweendelezya, basikubisya nebanooyoozwide bubi bwabo, kuyoobuka mwami muyumu moyo uumvwisya tulabi.
Inguzu zyakwe ziyoovula, nkabela uyoonyonyoona cakuyoosya akujana coolwe mumilimo yoonse njacita. Uyoonyonyoona basinguzu abantu basalala.

Mubucenjezu bwakwe uyoocita kuti lweeno luyume mujanza lyakwe, alimwi uyoolisumpula mumoyo wakwe. Uyoongomoka kunyonyoona bantu banji, alakwe Mwami wabami uyoomubusizya inkondo, pele uyootyolwa kutali kumaanza aabantu.
Cilengano camazuba, magolezya acifumo, ncowalwiidwa ncakusinizya, pele kocivumbilila, nkaambo ncecamazuba aacili kule.

mu­ mwaka mutaanzi wabwami bwakwe, mebo nde-Daniele ndakamvwa makani aamumabuku. Ndakamvwa mweelwe wamyaka, ijwi lya-Jehova ngulyakaambila musinsimi Jeremiya, myaka iyakeelede kuzuzikizigwa mane kusaalwa kwa-Jerusalemu kukamane, nkokuti myaka iili makumi aali musanu aabili.
Mpawo ndakalanzya busyu bwangu ku-Mwami Leza kukumuyandaula azikombyo azikumbizyo cakuliimya kulya acakusama zisani zyamasaka akulibubula mutwe.
Ndakakomba kuli-Jehova Leza wangu akulyaamba zibi, ndati, Akaka Mwami, Leza mupati uuyoosya, uusyomeka mucizuminano cakwe, uubafwida luzyalo boonse bamuyandisya akubamba milao yakwe!
Twabisya, twapilingana, twacita zibi, twakupapila, twasia milazyo yako ambeta zyako,
Teetwakaswiilila balanda bako basinsimi ibakaamba muzina lyako, ibakaambila bami besu abasilutwe besu abamatateesu abantu boonse banyika.

Kulinduwe, O mwami, kulajanwa bululami, anu kulindiswe kulajanwa bweeme buyo, mbubonya mbokubede sunu. Bafwa bweeme bantu ba-Juda, abaabo bakede mu-Jerusalemu, aba-Israyeli boonse nebaba bali afwiifwi nebaba bali kule, muzisi zyoonse nkowakabatandila nkaambo kalupapilo lwabo ndobakakupapila.
Twafwa bweeme, O mwami, bami besu abasilutwe besu abamatateesu boonse, nkaambo tulikubisizizye.
Mwami Leza wesu ngujisi luzyalo alulekelelo, nkaambo twamupapila,
tatuna kuswiilila ijwi lya-Jehova Leza wesu kukweenda mumilao yakwe njaakatubikila kumilomo yabalanda bakwe basinsimi.
Ba-Israyeli boonse basotoka milao yako, baleya, babula kuswiilila ijwi lyako, aboobo twatililwa cikonke catusi cilembedwe mubbuku lyamulao lya-Musa mulanda wa-Leza nkaambo twamubisizya.

Wazuzikizya majwi aakwe ngaakatupesya mulandu, swebo abeendelezi besu ibakali kutweendelezya. Watuletela mapenzi aayoosya, nkaambo kunsi lyakujulu koonse koonse takukwe nekwakacitwa makani mbuli ayo aacitikide mu-Jerusalemu.
Aya mapenzi oonse atusikila, mbubonya mbukulembedwe mubbuku lya-Musa, nekubaboobo tatuna kutontozya busyu bwa-Jehova Leza wesu mukuleka zibi zyesu amukupangika myoyo kulusinizyo lwako.
Nkaambo kako Jehova wakali kulangilila mapenzi, watuletela ngao, nkaambo Jehova Leza wesu uliluleme mumilimo yakwe yoonse njacita, pele tatuna kuswiilila ijwi lyakwe.
Lino o Jehova Leza wesu, owakagwisya bantu bako munyika ya-Egepita ajanza lyanguzu, aboobo walijanina impuwo imbotu mbucicibede asunu, twabisya, twacita bubi.

O Mwami, mubululami bwako boonse, bukali bwako alunyemo lwako zileke munzi wako Jerusalemu, cilundu cako cisalala, nkaambo zibi zyesu amilandu yabamatateesu zyaletela Jerusalemu abantu bako lusampuko akati kabantu beengelede.
Lino, O Leza wesu, swiilila cikombyo camulanda wako ankumbilo zyakwe, Munika abusyu bwako acikombelo cako cimwaikide. Cita obo nkaambo kazina lyako, O mwami,

Cenjeka matwi aako, O Leza wangu, uswiilile. Bbanuna meso aako, ubone mapenzi esu, amunzi uuli azina lyako. Tatuleti inkumbizyo zyesu kulinduwe nkaambo kabululami bwesu, pe, tulazileta nkaambo kaluzyalo lwako lupati.
O mwami, swiilila. O mwami, kotulekelela. O mwami, swiilila akucita, utamuki pe, nkaambo kazina lyako omwini, O Leza wangu, nkaambo izina lyako lililembedwe amunzi wako abantu bako.
Lino nendakacili kwaamba, akukomba, akulyaambilila zibi zyangu azibi zyabantu bangu ba-Israyeli, akuleta inkumbizyo zyangu kubusyu bwaJehova Leza wangu nkaambo kacilundu cisalala ca-Leza wangu—
nendakacili kwaamba mukukomba kwangu, oyo muntu Gabrieli ngundakabwene mucilengano citaanzi wakanduulukila caluno, wandaampa kuciindi cacipaizyo camagolezya.
Asike, wandaambila kuti, Daniele, ndeza lino kuzookutya busongo aluzibo.
Kumatalikilo aakukumbila kwako, kwakazwa ijwi, lino ciindi ecino ndeza kukulwiida, nkaambo uli muntu uuyandwa loko. Lino teelela ijwi, umvwisye cilengano,

Kwabikwa insondo zili makumi aali musanu aabili kubantu bako akumunzi uusalala, kuti insotoko zimane azibi zimanisigwe, milandu yabubi ilobelele, bululami buteeli buletwe, cilengano camusinsimi cizuzikizigwe, abusena busalalisya bunanikwe.

Lino uleelede kuziba akumvwisya kuti, kuzwa kuciindi camulazyo wakubusya awakuyakulula Jerusalemu kusikila kuciindi cakusika kwamwami uunanikidwe, kuyooba insondo zili musanu azibili. Lino insondo zili makumi aali musanu alimwi ansondo zyobile uuyooyakululwa, uyooba amigwagwa amufolo wakuutabilila, muziindi zyamapenzi.

Zimane insondo zili makumi aali musanu alimwi azibili, uunanikidwe uyoonyonyoonwa, cakubula sikulya izina, Nkabela bantu bamwami uuboola bayoonyonyoona munzi acikombelo. Izambangulwe ndeliyooumanisya, alimwi kuyooba inkondo mane kusikila kumamanino. Insaalo zilibikidwe.

Lino uyootanga cizuminano ciyumu abantu banji kunsondo yomwe, alimwi cisela cansondo yomwe uyoolesya zipaizyo azituuzyo. Nkabela sikusaala uyooboola amababa aazisesemyo, mane lumwi mamanino aabikidwe atililwe sikusaala.

Mumwaka watatu wabwami bwa-Koresi mwami wa-Persia, makani akayubunwidwa Daniele, ngonguwe iwakapegwa izina lya-Belitsazara Ayo makani akali aakusinizya, makani aankondo impati, alimwi wakaswiilila makani akumvwisya cilengano.
Mumazuba ayo mebo nde-Daniele ndakali kulila insondo zyotatwe zizwide.
Teendakali kulya zilyo zinono pe, Katakwe nyama naba waini iwakanjila mukanwa lyangu, alimwi nsikwe nendakalinanika, mane insondo zyotatwe zyakamaninina.
Lino mubuzuba bwamakumi obile aane bwamwezi mutaanzi nendakaimvwi ankomwe yamulonga mupati, nkokuti Hidekeli,
ndakatambya meso aangu, nkabela ndakabona umwi muntu uusamine masani aatuba, uuangide kucibunu lukumba lwangolida ya-Ufazi.
Mebo endike nde-Daniele ndime ndakabona cilengano, nkaambo bantu mbendakali abo teebakabona cilengano pe, bakasikilwa kukankama kupati, bakacija kuyooyuba,
aboobo ndakasyaala endike, akubona cilengano eci cipati. Mpawo katakwe inguzu zyakasyaala mulindime abuniini. Busyu bwangu bwakabalangala bwakasanduka cakuyoosya, anguzu zyangu zyakandimanina.
Mpawo ndakamvwa ijwi lyakwaamba kwakwe. Mvwe buyo ijwi lyakwaamba kwakwe, ndakafwida muŋonzi cakuvundama ansi.
Lino mpawo ijanza lyakandiguma, lyandibusya aamazwi aangu amaanza aangu,
Elyo wakandaambila kuti, O Daniele, muntu uuyandwa loko, swiilila majwi ngendi mukukwaambila, Ima kabotu, nkaambo ciindi ecino ndatumwa kulinduwe. Andaambile buyo majwi aya, ndakaima cakukankama,

Mpawo wakandaambila kuti, Utayoowi, Daniele, nkaambo kuzwa kubuzuba butaanzi, nowakabika moyo wako kukumvwisya makani, akulibombya kubusyu bwa-Leza wako, majwi aako akali kumvwigwa. Lino ndasika nkaambo kamajwi aako.
Mwami wacisi ca-Persia wakasi yande kundikasya mazuba aali makumi obile abuzuba bomwe, pele Mikayeli umwi wabasilutwe bapati wakeza kuzoondigwasya, aboobo ndakamusiya nkukonya oko abami ba-Persia.
Ndeza kukuzibya makani aayoocitwa kubantu bako kumazuba aakumamanino. Nkaambo cilengano ncamazuba aacili kule.

Lino umwi uuli mbuli muntu waansi wakandaampa kumilomo, nkabela mpawo ndakabbanuna mulomo wangu akwaamba. Ndakaambila oyo iwakaimvwi kubusyu bwangu kuti, O mwami wangu, nkaambo kacilengano ndajatwa mause, anguzu zyangu zyandimanina.
Lino mebo ndemulanda wamwami wangu nkaambaule buti ayebo mwami wangu? Nkaambo ciindi ecino ndabulilwa inguzu, akuyeeya kwandikacila,
Mpawo kwakandaampa aumwi uuli mbuli muntu waansi, wandiyumya.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, Utayoowi, O muntu uuyandwa loko, koba aluumuno, koyuma akuba mukozu. Amane kundaambila, ndakaba anguzu, ndati, Mbubo, mwami wangu aambe, nkaambo wandipa inguzu,
Elyo wakati, Sa ulizi ncendazida kulinduwe? Lino ndapiluka kuyoolwisya mwami wa-Persia. Ndazwa buyo, mwami waba-Helene uyoosika.
Pele njookulwiida cilembedwe mubbuku lyalusinizyo. Taakwe naba omwe uundigwasya kulwisya aba, cita Mikayeli mwami wanu.

Lino ndakuyubunwidwa lusinizyo lwamakani. Kunooyoocibuka bami botatwe mu-Persia, lino wane uyooba muvubi loko kwiinda boonse, nkabela nanoozoojisi inguzu nkaambo kabuvubi bwakwe, uyoobusya boonse kukubalwisya cisi ca-Helene.
Lino kuyoobuka mwami singuzu, uyooendelezya cabwami bupati aku cita kufumbwa ncayanda.

Amane kubuka, bwami bwakwe buyoomwaika akupalangana kumyuuwo yoonse yone yakujulu. Teensi lunyungu lwakwe luyooendelezya pe, talukooyoba abwami mbuli bwakwe pe, nkaambo bwami bwakwe uyoobunyanzigwa, buyoopegwa bambi batali bana bakwe.
Lino mwami wakumusanza uyoojata inguzu, pele umwi wabasilutwe bakwe uyooba anguzu kwiinda nguwe, nkabela bwami bwakwe buyooba bwami bupati,

Yamana myaka imwi, bayootangana cizuminano, nkabela mwana musimbi wamwami wakumusanza uyookwatwa kumwami wakunyika kukuyumya cizuminano, nekubaboobo takooyoocijatilila anguzu zyakuboko kwakwe; oyo mwami takooyooima nji neziba inguzu zyakwe, amwanakazi ulaabwa, walo abalanda bakwe amwana ngwazyede asikumukwata.
Kuciindi eco mulasyuuka mutabi mucisiko cakwe, ulatola cibaka cakwe. Oyo uyoosika kukulwisya impi, uyoonjila mucilwido camwami wakunyika, nkabela mukucita kwakwe uyoobazunda.
Lino baleza babo azikozyano zyabo zifulidwe azibelesyo zyabo ziyandika zyansiliva azyangolida, zyoonse buyo ulazitolelela mubuzike ku-Egepita, elyo myaka imwi uyooleka kulwisya mwami wakunyika,
Elyo uyoonjila mucisi camwami wakunyika, pele kuzwa oko uyoopiluka kulimbabo.
Mpawo mwami wakumusanza uyoobijilwa loko, uyooboola kukulwisya mwami wakunyika, nkabela uyoobunganya makamu mapati aabantu, pele boonse bayooabwa mumaanza aakwe.
Lino makamu ayo azundwe buyo, moyo wakwe uyoolisumpula, nkabela uyoojaya makumi aazyuulu zyabantu, nekubaboobo takooyoozundilila.
Nkaambo mwami wakunyika uyooyobolola makamu mapati kwiinda mataanzi, elyo yamana myaka imwi uyooboola ampi impati ambono zinji.
Mumazuba ayo bantu banji bayoobusizya mwami wakumusanza inkondo, abalo basinunzuunzu babantu bako bayoopapila kuti bazuzikizye cilengano, pele bayookacilwa.

Elyo mwami wakunyika uyooboola, uyoolundika citantaala akuzunda munzi uuyakilidwe lubaya. Nkabela basilumamba bakumusanza tabakooyooliiminina, nebaba basalidwe bakwe; tabakooyooba anguzu zyakuliiminina.
Pele oyo uumulwisya uyoocita kufumbwa ncayanda, takukooyooba naba omwe uuliiminina kubusyu bwakwe, Uyootola cisi cibotu; coonse buyo ciyooba mumaanza aakwe.

Uyoolanzya busyu bwakwe kuti aboole anguzu zyoonse zyabwami bwakwe, mange cizuminano caluumuno akucizuzikizya, Nkabela uyoomupa namalelo, kuti anyonyoone cisi, pele makani taakooyooba obo, tacikooyooba cakwe pe,
Musule lyayaaya uyoolanzya busyu bwakwe kuzisi zyakunkomwe yalwizi, azinji uyoozizunda, Pele silutwe uyoolesya kusampaula kwakwe, uyookupilusya amutwe wakwe mwini,
Mpawo uyoolanzya busyu bwakwe kupiluka kuzilwanino zyacisi cakwabo, nkabela uyoolebwa, uyoowa, takooyoojanwa limbi.
Lino mucimanga cakwe kuyoobuka umwi uutuma sikutezya koonse koonse mucisi cibotu, pele amane buyo mazuba mace uyoonyenyoonwa, kutali kubukali nekuba kunkondo.
Mucimanga cakwe kuyoobuka muntu uusampulika. Oyo katapedwe bulemu bwabwami, pele uyoosika kuciindi cakuliiba akutola bwami cakuupayika.
Basilumamba bayookukululwa kubusyu bwakwe akupwayika, alakwe mwami wacizuminano.
Lino kuzwa kuciindi cakutangana cizuminano ulacita calweeno. Uya bukula akujata inguzu abantu bace buyo.

Kuciindi caluliibo uloongomoka kunjila munyika imbotu yamucisi, ulacita bamawisi abasyanyinakulu neebatakacita, ulatakaanya zisaalo abuvubi ambono akati kabeenzinyina, ulayeeya miyeeyo yakulwisya zilwida, mane ciindi cikasike.

Uyoobusya inguzu zyakwe amoyo wakwe kukulwisya mwami wakumusanza ampi impati, elyo mwami wakumusanza uyoolwisya inkondo ampi impati injumu kampatila, pele takooyoolitabilila pe, nkaambo bayookanza makanze aakumujaya.
Bantu abo mbabonya balya zilyo zyakwe zinono bayoomunyonyoona, nkabela basimpi bakwe bayookukululwa, abanji bayooyaswa akujayigwa,
Lino aba bami boonse bobile, myoyo yabo iyoobikwa kububi. Banooyooamba­ zyakubeja kuntafule yomwe, pele tabakooyoozunda pe, nkaambo mamanino aayoosika kuciindi cibikidwe,
Lino uyoopiluka kucisi cakwe ambono zinji loko, pele moyo wakwe uyoosula cizuminano cisalalisya, nkabela uyoocita ncayanda, elyo uyoopiluka kucisi cakwe.
Lino kuciindi cibikidwe uyooboola, uyoonjila munyika yakumusanza, pele mamanino taakooyooba mbuli kumatalikilo, pe,
nkaambo maato aazwa ku-Kitimu ayoosika kukumulwisya, aboobo uyoopiluka abuusu, nkabela mubukali bwakwe uyoobisya cizuminano cisalala, Apiluke, uyoobika moyo wakwe kulibaabo basia cizuminano cisalala.
Basilumamba bazwa kulinguwe bayoolibonya, bayoosofwaazya intempele acilwido, bayoolesya cipaizyo calyoonse akwiimika cisesemyo cabusaale.
Lino abo babisya cizuminano, uyooboongelezya cakuupayika, pele bantu bezi Leza wabo bayooyuma akucita zigambya.
Abasongo baakati kabantu bayoozibya bantu banji, nekuba kuti banooyoolebwa mazuba amwi nkaambo kupanga amulilo, buzike akusaalwa,
Balebwa, bayoogwasigwa buniini, Abanji bayooliswanganya abo cakuupayika,
Abamwi basongo bayoolebwa, kuti basalazigwe, babotezegwe akutubisigwa, mane lumwi mamanino asike, nkaambo ayoosika kuciindi ceelede.
Takooyoobika moyo wakwe kuli leza wabamawisi naba oyo banakazi ngobayandisya nuuba muzimu uuli woonse, nkaambo uyoolisumpula kwiinda boonse.
Uyoolemeka Leza wazilwido mucimanga cabaabo; Leza bamawisi ngobatakezi uyoomulemeka angolida ansiliva, mabwe mayandisi azintu ziyandika.
Uyoolwisya zilwido ziyumu nta cakugwasigwa leza mweenzu, abaabo bamutambula uyoobayungizizya bulemu. Uyoobika beendelezi banji akwaabanya nyika kulibasimali.
Lino kumamanino aaciindi mwami wakumusanza uyoomulwisya, pele mwami wakunyika uyooboola mbuli kambizi kuzoomulwisya ankalaki abasimbizi amaato manji, Uzoonjila muzisi mbuli izambangulwe akukukulula.
Uyoonjila munyika imbotu, elyo makumi aazyuulu zyabantu ayoolebwa, pele mbaaba bayoovunwa mumaanza aakwe: ba-Edomu, aba-Moabu abana ba-Amoni bacisyeede.
Uyootandabika ijanza lyakwe kukulwisya zisi, nkabela nyika ya-Egepita ayalo tiikooyoosiigwa.
