Uyooendelezya ziyobwedo zyangolida azyansiliva azintu ziyandika zyoonse zya-Egepita, abalo ba-Lubi aba-Kusi bayoomutobela.
Pele kuyoomvwigwa impuwo kuzwa kujwe akuzwa kunyika, ziyoomupenzya, elyo uyooinka cabukali bupati kuyoonyonyoona akumanisya bantu banji.
Nkabela uyooyaka zilao zyakwe zyabwami akatikati kalwizi acilundu cilemu cisalala, nekubaboobo uyooba amamanino aakwe, nkabela takukooyooba naba omwe wakumugwasya.
Nkabela bantu banji baona mubulongo bwaansi bayoobuka; bamwi bayoobukila buumi buteeli, abamwi bayoobukila insoni, babe cisesemyo citeeli.
Lino basongo bayoobekema mbuli kubekema kwajulu, abaabo bapilusya bantu banji kubululami mbuli inyenyeezi mane kukabe kutamani.
Pele yebo, O Daniele, jala majwi akunamatika ibbuku mane kusikila kumamanino aaciindi. Bantu banji bayootuntulika, aboobo luzibo luyooyungizizigwa.
Mpawo mebo nde-Daniele nendakalanga, ndakabona bamwi bobile baliimvwi, umwi oko aumwi oko kunkomwe zyalwizi.
Elyo ndakabuzya oyo muntu iwakasamine masani aatuba, iwakali ajulu lyamaanzi aalwizi, kuti, Kwasyaala ciindi cili buti kuti malele aya akamane?

Mpuwo oyo muntu iwakasamine masani aatuba, iwakali ajulu amaanzi aalwizi, wakasumpula ijanza lyakwe lyalulyo ajanza lyakwe lyalumwesi, nkabela ndakamumvwa kakonka kuliyooyo uupona lyoonse kuti kuyooba ciindi aziindi zyobile acisela, lino nazoomana kumwaisya bantu basalala, aya makani oonse ayoomana.
Ndakamvwa, pele nsikwe nendakamvwisya pe. Alimwi ndakabuzya kuti, O mwami, mamanino aamakani aya ayooba buti?
Wakati, Koya buyo, Daniele, nkaambo majwi alijalidwe akunamatikwa mane ciindi cakumamanino cisike.
Bantu banji bayoolisalazya akulibotya akulitubya, pele basizibi bayoocita bubi. Taakwe naba omwe wabasizibi uuyoomvwisya pe; basongo mbebayoomvwisya.
Lino kuzwa kuciindi eco zipaizyo zyalyoonse neziyoolesegwa kukubika cisesemyo calusaalo, kuyooba mazuba aali cuulu amyanda yobile amakumi aali musanu aane.
Uli acoolwe uulindila akusikila kumazuba aali cuulu amyanda yotatwe amakumi otatwe amusanu.
Pele webo koya buyo mane mamanino asike; uuyootanguna kulyokezya, elyo uyooima kubusena mbobambilidwe kumamanino aaciindi.
Lino wakaakukwata Gomeri mwana wa-Diblaimu, nkabela wakamuzyalila mwana mulombe.
Mpawo Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Umuulike izina lya-Jezreeli, nkaambo kaba kaindi kaniini nzookoyeka bulowa bwa-Jezreeli kumukowa wa-Jehu, akulobya bwami bwa-Israyeli.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo njootyola buta bwaIsrayeli mumumpata wa-Jezreeli.

Lino wakamita lwabili, wakazyala mwana musimbi, nkabela Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Umuulike izina lya-Sikutafwidwaluzyalo, nkaambo nsikooyooboola limbi kuzoofwida mukowa wa-Israyeli luzyalo lwakubalekelela abuniini.
Pele mukowa wa-Juda njooufwida luzyalo, njoobavuna kunguzu zya-Jehova Leza wabo. Nsikooyoobavunya buta niliba ipanga niiba inkondo niziba imbizi nibaba basimbizi.
Lino naakamana kulesya Sikutafwidwaluzyalo, wakamita akuzyala mwana mulombe.
Nkabela Jehova wakati, Umuulike izina lya-Teensimukowawangu, nkaambo inywe tamweensi bamukowa wangu, ambebo nsikooba Leza wanu.
Elyo bana ba-Juda abana ba-Israyeli bayooyoboloka boonse antoomwe, bayoolibikila mwami omwe, akuzwa munyika mobabede, nkaambo buzuba bwa-Jezreeli buyooba buzuba bupati.
Amwaambile bakwanu kuti, Mukowa wangu, Abacizi banu amubambe kuti mbafwidwaluzyalo.
Inga njoomusamununa cacintanda akumubika mbubonya mbwaakabede mubuzuba obo mbwaakazyalwa. Njoomucita mbuli inkanda, akumubika mbuli ibbuwa, akumujazya nyota.
Abalo bana bakwe nsikooyoobafwida luzyalo pe, nkaambo mbana babuvuule.
Nkaambo banyina bakavuula, ayooyo iwakabazyala wakacita cakuusya bweeme. Wakati, Nkayandaule basimamambe bangu bandaabila insima amaanzi aboya bwambelele azisani zituba amafuta azintu zyakunywa.

Elyo uyooya butobela basimamambe bakwe, pele takooyoobeenzya pe. Uyoobayandaula, pele takooyoobajana. Lino uyooamba kuti, Njiinke, nkapiluke kumulumyaangu mutaanzi, nkaambo ciindi eco ncendakali awe cakandibotela kwiinda ciindi ecino.
Nkaambo teewakaziba kuti ndime ndakamwaabila maila awaini amafuta, akumuvuzizya insiliva angolida nzibakabelesezya Baala.
Nkaambo kako njoomunyanzya alimwi maila aangu kuciindi cao, awaini wangu kuciindi cakwe, akuliboozezya boya bwambelele azisani zituba nzindakamupa cakulivumba mubili.
Njoovumbununa bweeme bwakwe kumeso aabasimamambe bakwe boonse, nkabela takukooyooba muntu naba omwe wakumuvuna kumaanza aangu.
Alimwi njoolesya kusekelela kwakwe koonse ama pobwe aakwe, mapobwe aamwezi mupya amapobwe aasabata ambungano zyakwe zyoonse.
Nkabela njoosaala masaansa aakwe amikuyu yakwe, nzenzizyo nzyaamba kuti ncipego cangu ncibandipa basimamambe bangu, Njoocita kuti zibe mbuli lusaka, banyama bamusokwe bazilye.
Njoomuboozezya milandu yakwe yamazuba ayo aababaala, naakali kubatentela zinunkilizyo. Wakali kusama bukume abulungu, akuya buyandaula basimamambe bakwe, anukuti mebo wakandiluba, mbwaamba Jehova.

Nkabela oko njoomupa myuunda yakwe yamasaansa, awalo mumpata wa-Akori uyoomubeda mulyango wabulangizi. Uyooimba oko mbubonya mbwaakali kucita kuciindi cabwanike bwakwe amubuzuba obo mbwaakazwa mucisi ca-Egepita.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova, uyoondaamba Mulumaangu, tokooyoondaamba limbi Mwami wangu, pe,
Nkaambo njoolesya mazina aaba-Baala mumulomo wakwe, kuti mazina aabo ataibalukwi limbi.
Alimwi mubuzuba obo njoobatangila cizuminano; tuyootangana cizuminano abanyama bamusokwe abayuni bakujulu abauka baansi. Elyo buta apanga ankondo njoozilobya zyoonse mucisi, nkabaoneke cakutayoowa.
Njookutangila, ube wangu lyoonse. Njookutangila cakululama acabuluzi, cabuuya acaluzyalo.
Ncobeni njookutangila calusyomo, ukazibe Jehova.
Elyo mubuzuba obo njoovwiila, mbwaamba Jehova. Njoovwiila ijulu, nkabela ijulu liyoovwiila nyika.
Elyo nyika iyoovwiila maila awaini amafuta, azeezi ziyoovwiila Jezreeli.
Lino njoomubyala kulindime munyika, nkabela sikutafwidwaluzyalo njoomufwida luzyalo, abalo ibatakali basimukowa bangu njoobaambila kuti, Ndinywe mukowa wangu, nkabela bayooamba kuti, Nduwe Leza wesu.

Lino Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Koya alimwi, ukayande oyu mwanakazi sibuvuule uuyandwa kusimamambe wakwe, Mbuboobu Jehova mbwayanda bana ba-Israyeli, nekuba kuti bali mukutobela mizimu imbi akuyanda mitunge yamasaansa,
Elyo ndakamuula mali aansiliva aali ikumi amusanu acisuwo comwe cizwide acisela cabbaale.
Nkabela nda-kamwaambila kuti, Uleelede kusyaala kulindime mazuba manji. Utayi buvuula pe, utabi wamwaalumi umbi. Ambebo njoocita mbubonya kulinduwe.
Nkaambo bana ba-Israyeli bayookala mazuba manjimanji kabatakwe mwami nanka mweendelezi, kabatakwe zipaizyo nanka ciimikilo, kabatakwe zikobela zyabupaizi nanka mituni,
Pele musule lyayaaya bana ba-Israyeli bayooboola akuyandaula Leza wabo a-Davida mwami wabo. Bayooyoowa Leza abubotu bwakwe mumazuba aaciza.
Taakwe cintu ciboneka cita matusi akuupaupa ameso abujayi akubba abumambe. Bantu balatulula cakubba, aboobo balaya butila bulowa.
Nkaambo kaceeci, nyika iyoolila, aboonse bakede mumo bayoomoka. Abalo banyama bamusokwe abayuni bakujulu answi zyamulwizi zyoonse ziyoomanisigwa.
Ncobeni uyoolifumpula isikati, alakwe musinsimi ngoli awe uyoolifumpula masiku, alimwi banyoko njoobanyonyoona.
Bantu bangu bali mukufwa nkaambo kakubula luzibo. Mbuli mbosowede luzibo, ambebo njoosowa nduwe, Utandibedi limbi mupaizi. Mbuli mbolubide mulao wa-Leza wako, ambebo njooluba bana bako.
Nibakatalika kuvula, kababisya kulindime. Bulemu bwabo njoobulobya, bube bweeme.
Kubisya kwabantu bangu nkulya kwabo; balabika myoyo yabo kumilandu yabo.
Lino bapaizi mbubabede, bantu abalo bayooba mbubonya. Nkabela njoobauma nkaambo kaziyanza zyabo akubaboozezya ncito zyabo.
Bayoolya, nekubaboobo tabakooyookuta. Bayoocita bumambe, nekubaboobo tabakooyoozyala bana. Nkaambo baleka kupangika myoyo yabo kuli-Jehova.
Bumambe abukoko akukolwa nzezibuzya maanu.
Bantu bangu balasonda kucisamu, awalo musako wabo nguubatondezya makani. Nkaambo moyo wabumambe wabaleesya, aboobo baya buvuula cakutalemeka Leza wabo.

Balapaila zipaizyo mala lyamalundu, alimwi kuzilundu nkobatentela tununkilizyo kunsi lyamikamba alyamizimbwa alyamibanga, nkaambo cenzule cayo ncibotu, Nkaambo kako bana banu basimbi balavuula, abalo banabwinga banu balacita bumambe.

Nsikooyookoma bana banu basimbi ciindi cakuvuula, abanabwinga banu nsikooyoobakoma ciindi cakucita bumambe, pe, nkaambo bapati beni balabweza basimamambe kumbali, akupaizya abasibuvuule. Aba bantu batakwe maanu bayoonyonyooka.
Nkaambo Israyeli wazanga mbuli iŋombe sicinguni, Lino sa Jehova ulakonzya kubasanina mbuli kabelele mbukasaninwa mani mpaavula.
Efraimu uliswaneene amituni. Amumuleke buyo.
Bamane buyo kukolwa, balaya buvuula. Beendelezi bacisi balayandisya zintu zyabweeme.
Lino muuwo uyoocitola canguzu, nkabela zipaizyo zyabo ziyoobausya bweeme.

Amuswiilile aya makani nubapaizi. Amumvwe nomukowa wa-Israyeli. Amuteelele nobasiŋanda bamwami, nkaambo kubeteka nkokwanu. Nkaambo mwakali kakole ku-Mizipa, mwakali buzamba buyalidwe atala lya-Tabori,
Mulindi waku-Sitimu bakaulampya. Pele ndime ndabakoma boonse.
Ndimwizi Efraimu, alakwe Israyeli tasisidwe kulindime, Nkaambo ciindi ecino, O Efraimu, wavuula, alakwe Israyeli wasofwaazigwa.
Ncito zyabo tazikonzyi kubazuminina kupiluka kuli-Leza wabo, nkaambo moyo wabuvuule nkuuli mukati kabo. Jehova tabamwizi pe.
Kulisumpula kwa-Israyeli nkokumupa mulandu. Lino Efraimu a-Israyeli boonse bayoolebwa, alakwe Juda uyoolebwa antoomwe ambabo.
Bayooinka ambelele zyabo aŋombe zyabo kuyooyandaula Jehova, pele tabakooyoomujana pe, nkaambo watozya kumbi.
Bakamweena Jehova, bakazyala bana bamusokwe. Nkaambo kako mwezi uyoobamana boonse amyuunda yabo.
Efraimu uyoosaalwa mubuzuba bwakukalalilwa. Aya makani aayooba ncobeni ndaazibya misyobo yoonse ya-Israyeli.
Bapati ba-Juda bali mbuli basikwaandaanya munyinza. Njootila bukali bwangu kulimbabo mbuli incabwacabwa yamaanzi.
Efraimu wapenzegwa akumanikizigwa ambeta nkaambo ulayanda kutobela zintu zyabuyo.
Lino mebo njooba mbuli mapempya kuliEfraimu, akumukowa wa-Juda njooba mbuli cibozyo.
Efraimu naakabona bulwazi bwakwe, alakwe Juda naakabona cilonda cakwe, elyo Efraimu wakainka ku-Asuri, wakatumina mwami Jarebu. Pele takooyookonzya kumuponya, pe, takooyoosilika zilonda zyanu.
Nkaambo mebo njooba mbuli mulavu kuli-Efraimu, ambuli mwana wasyaanza kumukowa wa-Juda. Mebo njookwamauna akwiinka; njoobweza, asikuvuna takooyooba wo pe.
Ndainka, nkapiluke kulindime, mane balyaambe milandu yabo akuyandaula busyu bwangu. Ciindi ncibapengede ncobeni bayoofwambaana kundiyandaula.
Amana mazuba obile, uyootuponya, amubuzuba bwatatu uyootubusya, tupone kubusyu bwakwe.
Elyo tuyoomuziba, tunooya butobela luzibo lwa-Jehova. Kupola kwakwe nkwakusinizya mbuli nebuca, alimwi uyootusikila mbuli imvula, mbuli imvula yakutanga ayamusule yoonse ansi.
Ma! Nkakucitilenzi, Efraimu? Nkakucitilenzi, O Juda? Luzyalo lwanu luli mbuli mayoba aacifumofumo, ambuli mume uufwambaana kuumbuka,
Nkaambo kako ndabaanduzya basinsimi akubajazya majwi aamulomo wangu. Kubeteka kwangu kulalibonya mbuli mumuni.
Ncinjanda nduzyalo, tacili cipaizyo pe. Kuziba Leza kulayandwa kwiinda zituuzyo.
Pele balo bali mbuli Adamu. Cizuminano bacisotoka, Mwabona oko nkubandeena.
Gileadi ngumunzi wabasikucita zibi. Walambaana bulowa.
Mbuli bafumpi mbubalindilila bantu, inkamu yabapaizi ilajaya bantu mbubonya munzila yaku-Sekemu. Balacita zisapi.
Mumukowa wa-Israyeli ndibwene cintu ciyoosya. Buvuule mpobuli akati ka-Efraimu, Israyeli wasofwaazigwa.
Nindasi ponye Israyeli, ndilyonya milandu ya-Efraimu ilalibonya, azibi zya-Samariya. Nkaambo balacita cakweena; babbi balanjila mumaanda, abafumpi balasaala anze.
Tabayeeyi mumyoyo yabo kuti bubi bwabo boonse ndabwiibulukwa. Lino milimo yabo beni niiibacede, ilalibonya kumeso aangu.
Balakondezya mwami abubi bwabo, abalo basilutwe akubeja kwabo.
Boonse mbasimamambe. Bali mbuli cijikilo ncaatenta mujiki, ncaaleka kusosela akuleka kukanda zinkwa mane zikafufumuke.
Mubuzuba bwabuzyalwe bwamwami wesu basilutwe balalicisya-cisya cakukolwa, balayobayoba abasikucapa.
Nkaambo myoyo yabo ilapya mukati cakuvwiyavwiya. Busiku boonse bukali bwabo buloona, pele bwaca buyo bulabuka mbuli mulilo uuyaka.
Boonse balapya mbuli cijikilo, balalya babetesi babo. Bami babo boonse bawa, taakwe naba omwe uukwiilila ndime.
Inguzu zyakwe bazimanizya beenzu, pele walo tezi. Imvwi zyadabika amutwe wakwe, pele tezi.
Kulisumpula kwaba-Israyeli nkokubapesya mulandu, nekubaboobo tabana kupiluka kuli-Jehova Leza wabo, tabana kumuyandaula.
Efraimu uli mbuli inziba imfubafuba iitakwe boongo. Balatamauka-tamauka cakwiita ba-Egepita acakuya kuba-Asuri,
Lino mukutuntulika kwabo njooyala lusabwe lwangu alimbabo, njoobaselusya ansi mbubonya mbuli bayuni bakujulu. Njoobauma mbubonya imbungano yabo mbuyaswiilila kale.
Maawe kulimbabo, nkaambo bapambuka kulindime! Lunyonyooko lubasikile, nkaambo basotoka imbeta zyangu. Ndakayanda kubavuna, nekubaboobo bakandaamba cakubeja.
Kundikomba tabandikombi camoyo woonse pe. Amalo aabo balalilila maila awaini buyo. Balalitenda-tenda, balandisampaula.
Ndime ndakabaiisya akuyumya maboko aabo, nekubaboobo bandiyeeya bubi.
Kupiluka balapiluka, pele tabapiluki kuliyooyo uuli kujulu. Bali mbuli buta bupepuka. Bami babo ipanga liyoobajaya, nkaambo kakusampaula kwandimi zyabo. Eci ncebati sampauzigwe mucisi ca-Egepita.
Balalilila ndime, balati, Leza wesu, tulikuzi, iswe tuba-Israyeli.
Pele Israyeli wakaka cintu cibotu, nkaambo kako sinkondonyina ulamutanda.
Moombe wako, O Samariya, Leza wamukaka. (Bukali bwangu bwababukila. Balaiya lili kuleka kubisya?)
Mumoyo waIsrayeli mwini moombe mwakazwa. Mufuzi wakamufula, tali Leza pe. Moombe wa-Samariya ulatyokauka.
Nkaambo babyala luuwo, aboobo balatebula kambizi. Tabajisi cisiko, busonga bwabo tabuciti zilyo. Nekuba kuti bwacita, bazwamasi mbobazimana.
Ba-Israyeli bamenenenwa. Akati kabamasi sunu bali mbuli cibulo citayandwa.
Baya ku-Asuri mbuli imbongolo yamusokwe iileendeenda ilike. Efraimu walyuulila basimamambe,
Naa balalyaaba obo akati kabamasi, njoobabunganya, kuti baleke kaindi kukulisalila bami abasilutwe.
Nkaambo Efraimu wavuzya zipaililo zyakwe cakubisya. Zipaililo zyakwe zinji nzezimubisizya.
Nekuba kuti ndamulembela myaanda yamilao yangu, iliyeeyedwe mbuli cintu ceenzu.
Kupaila balapaila azipaizyo, pele balapaizya nyama akwiilya. Jehova takonzyi kubotelwa kulinzizyo. Lino ulayeeya kubisya kwabo akubabweedezezya bubi bwabo. Bayoopiluka ku-Egepita,
Ba-Israyeli baluba Mulengi wabo, baliyakide maanda aabwami, abalo ba-Juda balivuzizye minzi iizyungulukidwe imbaya. Pele njootuma mulilo kuminzi yabo, elyo maanda aabo aabwami ulaatenta.
Utasekeleli cakukondwa, O Israyeli, mbuli bamasi. Nkaambo weenda buvuula cakuleka Leza wako, amali aabuvuule waayanda muzipolelo zyoonse zyamaila.
Pele cipolelo camaila acisinino cawaini zyoonse tazi-kooyoobasanina; wami ulabamanina.
Tabakookala munyika ya-Jehova pe. Efraimu uyoopiluka ku-Egepita, amucisi ca-Asuri bayoolya zitonda,

Tabakooyootila waini wakupaizya Jehova, azipaizyo zyabo tazikooyoomubotela pe. Zilyo zyabo ziyooba mbuli zilyo zyabasidilwe, ziyoosofwaazya boonse bazilya. Zilyo zyabo ziyooba zyakulya buyo, tazikooyookonzya kunjila muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Ino muyoocita buti mubuzuba bwakusekelela, amubuzuba bwapobwe lya-Jehova?
Banooya ku-Asuri, cisi caEgepita ciyoobamena, amunzi wa-Mofi uyoobazika. Ziyandisi zyabo zyansiliva impese ilazivuba, amumaanda aabo muyooba mamvwa.

Mazuba aakulumbulwa ayoosika, mazuba aakubweedezegwa bubi ayoosika. Israyeli ulaabona. Bati, Musinsimi mufubafuba, muntu uunjidwe Moya ulisondokede. We! Mulandu wanu mupati! Businkondo bwanu bwakomena!
Musinsimi ngumulangi ngwaakabika Leza kuti alange Efraimu, nekubaboobo inzila zyakwe zyoonse ziliteedwe, amuŋanda ya-Leza ulajana businkondo.
Balabisya loko mbubonya mbuli kubisya kwamazuba aaGibeya. Leza takooyooluba kubisya kwabo, uyoobapa mulandu kuzibi zyabo.
Bulemu bwa-Efraimu bulaya buuluka mbuli muyuni. Taakwe uuzyala, taakwe uuli ada, taakwe uumita.
Nekuba kuti balela bana, njoobafwidya boonse buyo, Maawe kulimbabo ciindi ncenti pambukane abo!
Bana ba-Efraimu bayoosaalwa. Efraimu ulaabila sikujaya bana bakwe.
Kubapa, O Jehova, ulabapa nzi? Kobapa ida lyakusowa ankolo zitanyonkwi,
Bubi bwabo boonse bulalibonya ku-Giligala; nkukonya oko nkundakabasulide. Nkaambo kakubija kwamilimo yabo njoobatanda kuzwa muŋanda yangu. Nsikooyoobayanda limbi. Bapati babo boonse mbasicinguni.
Ba-Efraimu balipide, miyanda yabo iliyumide, tabaciti micelo. Nekuba kuti bazyala, njoonyonyoona bayandwi bamada aabo.
Leza wangu ulabasoowa nkaambo kakutaswiilila kwabo, nkabela bayooba basimutuntuli akati kabamasi.
Israyeli ngumusaansa uuzyalisya, ulacita micelo minji. Pele micelo yakwe mbwiivula, ulavuzya zipaililo zyakwe mbubonya; nyika yakwe mbiibota, ulabotya mbubonya mabwe aakupaizya mizimu,
Myoyo yabo njalweeno, lino bayoopegwa mulandu. Uyoomwaya zipaililo zyabo akupwaya mabwe aabo.
Balaamba kuti, Tatujisi mwami, nkaambo tatuyoowi Jehova, lino mwami ulatugwasya buti?
Balaamba majwi aabuyo, balakonka cakubeja mukucita zizuminano, lino bayoojana lubeta lulula mbuli mululwe akati kamilongo yamuunda.
Bantu baku-Samariya balayoowa nkaambo kamoombe waku-Betaveni, bantu bakwe balamulilila, abalo bapaizi ibakali kumukondelelwa balalila, ikuti bulemu bwakwe bwamusia, bwaya mubuzike,
Uyootolwa ku-Asuri, cibe cilumbyo camwami Jarebu. Aboobo baEfraimu bayoofwisigwa bweeme, ba-Israyeli bayoofwa insoni acisondyo cabo.
Mwami wa-Samariya wanyonyooka, uli mbuli kafwapu kaibauka atala amaanzi.
Zilundu zyakukombela mizimu zilavwinyaunwa, nzenzizyo zibi zya-Israyeli. Myuunga azyobamfwe zilamena azipaililo zyabo. Lino balaambila malundu kuti, Amutuvumbe, atulundulundu kuti, Amutuwide.
Mubukali bwangu njoobauma, njoobunganya bantu basikulwana abo, kuti bakapegwe mulandu nkaambo kazibi zyabo zibili.

Bfraimu nimpwizi iiyakaiisigwa, iiyanda kulyataula mucipolelo camaila. Pele mebo njoobika ijoko kunsingo yakwe iiebeka, njoobikila Efraimu sikumutanta. Juda uleelede kulima, a-Jakobo uleelede kupanda nyika.
Amulibyalile bululami, kuti mulitebwide luzyalo. Amulipandile cipande canu, nkaambo casika ciindi cakuyandaula Jehova, aboole kuzoomulosezya bululami.
Mwakalilimina zibi, aboobo mwakatebula bubi, mwakalya micelo yabubeji. Mwakasyoma inkalaki zyanu abaalumi bako banji.

Lino kuyoobuka lupyopyongano akati kabantu banu, azicijilo zyanu ziyumu zyoonse zilanyonyoonwa mbubonya mbuli Salimani mbwaakanyonyoona Betaribeli ciindi cankondo, bamanyina nibakatyolaulwa abana babo.
Mbubonya obo mbumuti citilwe anywebo ku-Betele, nkaambo kakubisya kwanu nkumwakabisya. Bwaca buyo, mwami wa-Israyeli uyoomaninina kufwa.
Pele nindakali kuya bubaita, kabaya bwiinka buyo. Kabapaila ba-Baala akutentela zikozyano zibezedwe tununkilizyo.
Nekubaboobo ndime ndakaiisya Efraimu kweenda. Ndakali kubeenzyaenzya mumaanza aangu, pele kabatezi kuti ndime ndakabaponya.
Zyaanzyo nzindakabaanzya zyakali zyabuuya, intambo zyangu zyakali zyaluyando. Ndakali mbuli basikugwisya ijoko kunsingo zyabo, ndakali kubalisya zilyo.
Takooyoopiluka mucisi ca-Egepita, pe, Asuri uyooba mwami wakwe, nkaambo kakuti bakakaka kuboola.
Ipanga liyoouma minzi yabo, liyoomanisya kulya mankolo aamilyango yayo, nkaambo kamiyeeyo yabo.
Bantu bangu balizibide kuleya kuzwa munzila iiluleme. Nekuba kuti baitwa kuliyooyo uuli kujulu, taakwe naba omwe akati kabo uumulemeka.
Maawe Efraimu! Nkakuleke buti? Maawe Israyeli! Nkakwaabe buti? Sa ndakonzya kukucitila mbundakacitila Adima? Sa ndakonzya kukubika mbuli Zeboimu? Ne! Moyo wangu wakaka! Luzyalo lwangu lwa buka,
Nsikooyoocita lunyemo lwangu lukali, nsikooyooboola limbi kunyonyoona Efraimu, pe, nkaambo ndime Leza, nsili muntu buyo, ndime Uusalala akati kanu, nsili muntu waansi.
Jehova ulalila mbuli syuumbwa, ulavuuluma mbuli mulavu. Lino alila buyo, bana bazooboola bukankama kuzwa kumbo.
Bazooboola bukankama mbuli tuyuni kuzwa ku-Egepita, bazooboola mbuli inziba kuzwa kucisi ca-Asuri, Njoobakazika mumaanda aabo beni, mbwaamba Jehova.
Efraimu wandizyungulusya lweeno, luzubo lwa-Israyeli lwandibejela. Juda ucitamauka a-Leza, ucitamauka a-Uusalala Uusyomeka.
Jehova ulijisi makani a-Juda, Ulapa Jakobo mulandu mbubonya mbuli inzila zyakwe, ulamubweedezya bubi bwamilimo yakwe.
Naakacili mwida wakalebya munyina. Naakakomena, wakalwana a-Leza,
eya, wakalwana aangelo, alimwi wakazunda. Wakalila, wakamufwida luzyalo, Ku-Beteli nkwaakamuswana, nkwaakaambaula aswe.
Jehova ngu-Leza wamakamu, Jehova ndizina lyakwe.
Lino kopiluka kuli-Jehova, kocita luzyalo abululami, alimwi kosyoma Leza wako mazuba conse.
Ngusimakwebo I Zyeelesyo zyakweena zili mumaanza aakwe. Ulayanda kunyanzya bantu.
Efraimu wati, Ndaba muvubi, ndaliianina lubono. Pele buvubi bwakwe boonse tabukooyoozulila kumanya mulandu wakwe.
Ndime Jehova Leza wako mane kuzwa ku-Egepita, Nzookukazika muzilao mbubonya mbuli kuciindi capobwe.
Ndakaamba kumilomo yabasinsimi, ndakavuzya zilengano. Ndime ndakali kwaamba zikozyano kumaanza aabasinsimi.
Mu-Gileadi balabisya, balacita zyabuyo zilike. Ncobeni mu-Giligala mubapaizya iŋombe, zipaililo zyabo ziyooba mbuli malwi aamabwe akati kamilongo yamumuunda.
Kujanza lyamusinsimi Jehova wakapozya ba-Israyeli kuzwa ku-Egepita, ajanza lyamusinsimi ndyaakababambya.
Efraimu wandikalazya loko, lino mulandu wabulowa mbwaakatila uyoomucaalila, akusampaula kwakwe mwami wakwe uyookubweedezya kulinguwe.
Lino sunu bacibisya akubisya, balalicitila zikozyano zyansiliva, zileza-leza nzibayeeya beni, bafuzi nzibacita zyoonse. Nzenzizyo nzibaamba kuti Leza. Balazipaila, balamyonta boombe babezedwe.
Nkaambo kako bayooba mbuli mayoba aacifumofumo, mbuli lume lufwambaana kumwaika, mbuli buungu bupepuka mucipolelo, ambuli busi buzwida acipulo.
Pele ndime Jehova Leza wako iwakakupozya kuzwa kucisi ca-Egepita, Taakwe muzimu mweenzu ngozi, taakwe muvuni umbi kumbali lyangu pe.
Ndakalikuzi munkanda, munyika iitakwe imvula.
Pele bakajana zilyo akukuta, elyo mukukuta kwabo myoyo yabo yakalisumpula, aboobo bakandiluba,
Lino ndakababeda mbuli mulavu, ndabalangila munzila mbuli siluwe.
Njoobaswana mbuli cinyama cabbidwa bana baco, njoodeluula lulyananga lwamoyo wabo, njoobalidilila mbuli syuumbwa, amunyama wamusokwe uyoobakwamauna.
Ciyookunyonyoona, O Israyeli, nciceeci. Wandisampaula, mebo ndi sikukugwasya.
Mwami wako uli kuli lino? Sa nkwali uuti kakuvune muminzi yako yoonse. Abalo babetesi bako bali kuli? Mbembabo mbiwakaamba kuti, Kondipa mwami abasilutwe,
Ndakupa mwami mukunyema kwangu, amubukali bwangu ndamugwisya.
Milandu ya-Efraimu ilibikilidwe, zibi zyakwe zililondwedwe.
Wasikilwa kuciswa kwakutumbuka, pele ngumwana mufubafuba, nkaambo taimikili muzyalilo kuciindi ceelede.

Nekuba kuti Efraimu acite micelo akati kabakwabo, kuyoosika muuwo wakujwe, iguwo lya-Jehova lizwa munkanda, liyoomanizya kasensa kakwe akuyuminizya cikala cakwe. Uyoosaalilwa ziyandisi zyakwe ambono zyakwe zyoonse zibotezya.
Samariya uyoopegwa mulandu, nkaambo kakuti wakasampaula Leza wakwe. Bayoojazigwa apanga, atwana twabo tuyoopwayigwa, abalo banakazi babo bamitide bayooandulwa.
Amubweze majwi, mupiluke kuli-Jehova, mu­ mwaambile kuti, Kotulekelela milandu yesu yoonse, kotutambula caluzyalo, elyo tuyookuletela micelo yamilomo yesu.
Asuri takooyootuvuna. Tatukooyootanta ambizi, alimwi tatukooyooamba limbi zibumbwa zyamaanza esu kuti mbaleza besu, nkaambo mulinduwe bamucaala mobajana luzyalo.
Njooponya kuluba kwabo, njoobayandisya buyo, nkaambo bukali bwangu bwabaleka.
Njooba mbuli mume kuli-Israyeli, Uyoosonsa mbuli impana, uyoosimpa miyanda mbuli zisamuzyaku-Lebano,
Mitabi yakwe iyooyandalala; bweebesi bwakwe buyooba mbuli bweebesi bwaolifa, abweema bwakwe mbuli bweema bwaku-Lebano.
Bayooboola kukala muceenzule cakwe, bayoobuka mbuli maila akusonsa mbuli musaansa, alimwi bweema bwabo buyooba mbuli waini waku-Lebano.
Amuswiilile, nubapati. Amuteelele nubantu boonse bamunyika. Sa kwa­ kaboneka makani aali boobu, kuciindi canu nanka kuciindi camauso?
Amwaambile bana banu makani, abalo bana banu baambile bana babo, abana babo baambile izyalani limbi.
Eco cakasyaala kudiingo cakacilya cisozi, aceeco cakasyaala kucisozi yakacilya inswabanda, aceeco cakasyaala kunswabanda camusokonya nguwakacilya.
Amubuke nubakolwi, mulile. Amuwuule nyoonse nubasikunywa waini, nkaambo kambote, ikuti yanyanzigwa kumilomo yanu.
Nkaambo kuleza bantu kuzoosaala nyika yangu, Mbayumu, alimwi tababaliki. Meno aabo ali mbuli meno aamulavu, abakampanga babo bali mbuli basyuumbwa,
Banyonyoona musaansa wesu, amikuyu yesu baibisya. Kukupulula baikupulula akwiisowa, amitabi yayo baisonzoola, yasalala ngende.
Nkaambo cituuzyo calesegwa, acipaizyo cakunywa coonse, kuŋanda ya-Jehova. Bapaizi basimilimo ba-Jehova balalila.
Myuunda ilisaalidwe, nyika ilalila, nkaambo maila alisaalidwe, awaini wayuminina, aalo mafuta alimanide.
Balimi balyuuside, abasimisaansa balalila, nkaambo kabulotwe abbaale, nkaambo zitebulwa zyamumyuunda zilimanide.
Musaansa wapusama, mukuyu wafwa, misamu yapomegranite akakunka amibula, misamu yoonse yamusokwe, iliyumide. Lukondo loonse lwabamanina bantu.
Amubambe ciindi cakuliimya kulya, amucite imbungano, mubunganye banene abantu boonse bamunyika kuŋanda ya-Jehova Leza wanu, mukwiile kuli-Jehova.
Maawe! Buzuba bulaca! Buzuba bwaJehova buli afwaafwi. Buleza mbuli lunyonyooko kuzwa kujanza lyaSinguzuzyoonse.
Sa zilyo teezyakasigwa kumeso esu? Lukondo alutangalo sa teezyamana kuŋanda ya-Leza wesu?
Inseke zyanyana kunsi lyamaganko aazyo. Zibambilo zilisaalidwe, amatala alimwaikide, nkaambo maila abola.
Banyama balatongela, matanga aaŋombe alalila, nkaambo taakwe bwizu bwaku cela. Aalo matanga aambelele apenga.
O Jehova! Ndakwilila nduwe! Nkaambo mulilo wamana kutenta mweemvwe wamumabanda, mabangabanga atenta misamu yoonse yamusokwe.
Abalo banyama bamusokwe balalilila nduwe, nkaambo tulonga twamaanzi twayuminina nta, amulilo wamana kutenta mweemvwe wamumabanda.

Mbuzuba bwamudima abwakusia, mbuzuba bwamayoba abwamakumbi aasia mbi. Buli mbuli igonta lyakumalundu, Kwaboneka bantu banji basinguzu. Taakwe nicakabonekede cili boobo kuzwa kumatangunino, alimwi tacikooyooba limbi mane kumazyalani-zyalani.

Kubusyu bwabo kulapya mulilo, amusule lyabo kulayaka mabangabanga. Nyika iili kunembo lyabo ili mbuli muunda waEdeni, pele nyika iili musule lyabo ilisaalidwe, ninkanda buyo. Taakwe naba omwe uukonzya kuloboka.
Bwiime bwabo buli mbuli bwiime bwambizi, akucijaana balacijaana mbuli basimbizi.
Nibasotoka, balamvwigwa mbuli inkalaki zili atala azilundu. Balamvwigwa mbuli mabangabanga aamulilo uutenta sokwe. Bali mbuli basilumamba bayumu babambilidwe inkondo.
Myoyo yabantu ilanyona kukubabona, masyu oonse alabalangaluka,
Balazuzaana mbuli basintaze, balatanta malambo mbuli basilumamba. Baleenda boonse cakululama, taakwe uumwaya milonge.
Taakwe uutonta mweenzinyina, pe, baleenda boonse buyo munzila iiluleme. Basike kuzilwisyo, balainda buyo alinzizyo, tabamwaiki pe.
Balasotokela mumunzi, balacijaana abulambo, balanjila mumaanda akwiinda muzipulo mbuli mubbi.
Mukusika kwabo nyika ilandindima, alyalo ijulu lilakankama. Izuba amwezi zyoonse zilasizigwa, anyenyeezi zyaleka kumweka,

Alakwe Jehova ulalizya ijwi lyakwe kunembo lyampi yakwe, nkaambo inkamu yakwe nimpati loko, ayooyo uucita milazyo yakwe uli anguzu. Nkaambo buzuba bwa-Jehova mbupati, bulayoosya loko. Nguni uunga ulabukonzya?
Amudeluule myoyo yanu, mutadeluuli zyakusama zyanu zilike. Amupiluke kuli-Jehova Leza wanu, nkaambo ngusiluse, ngusiluzyalo, tafwambi kukalala, ulizwiide buuya, akuleka bukali cakutabisizya bantu.
Ngwani uuzi na ulaboola kumulekelela akumusiila coolwe, mube azituuzyo azipaizyo zyakunywa zyakuletela Jehova Leza wanu?
Amulizye mweembo mu-Zioni, amubambe ciliimyo cakulya, amucite imbungano.
Amuyobolole bantu, amusalazye imbungano. Amubunganye bapati, akwiita abalo banike abaabo bacinyonka, Sibwiinga azwe muŋanda yakwe, anabwiinga apole mucikalilo cakwe.

Bapaizi, basimilimo ba-Jehova, balile akati kamanjililo aacikombelo acipaililo. Baambe kuti, Kobafwida luzyalo bantu bako, O Jehova. Utaabi cisi cako kuti cisampaulwe akuba kasimpi buyo akati kabamasi. Sa ncibotu kuti bamasi baambe kuti, We! Leza wabo uli kuli?
Jehova wakavwiila bantu bakwe kuti, Amubone! Ndamutumina maila awaini amafuta, nkabela muyookuta. Nsikooyoomwaaba limbi kukusampa ulwa akati kabamasi.

Ayooyo uuzwa kunyika njoomusakanya kuzwa kulindinywe, njoomutandila mucisi ciyumu citakwe maanzi. Basimpi bakwe bakunembo njoobatontela mulwizi lwakujwe, abasimpi bakwe baku-sule njoobatontela mulwizi lwakumbo. Nkabela cinunko cakwe cilabuka, abweema bwakwe bulazwa, nkaambo wacita malweza,
Mutayoowi, nubanyama bamusokwe, nkaambo mweemvwe wamumabanda wasonsa. Misamu ilajata micelo yayo, mukuyu amusaansa zyoonse zilazyala.
Nubana ba-Zioni, amusekelele akukondelelwa Jehova Leza wanu, nkaambo wamwaabila imvula cakululama, Wamuwisizya imvula, nkukuti imvulantuluka amvula yakusule, mbubonya mbuli kukutaanguna.
Lino zipolelo zilazula bulotwe, aziyobwedo ziyooata waini amafuta.
Nkabela njoomuboozezya myaka niicakalya cisozi, adiingo answabanda acamusokonya, impi yangu impati njindakatuma kuzoomulwisya.
Lino kulya muyoolya cakukuta, muyootembaula izina lya-Jehova Leza wanu uwakamucitila malele, nkabela bantu bangu taakwe nibayoousa insoni pe.
Lino muyooziba kuti mpondi akati kaba-Israyeli, alimwi ndime Jehova Leza wanu, taakwe umbi. Bantu bangu taakwe nibayoousa insoni pe.
Abalo bazike abacinkombwa njoobatilila Muuya wangu.
Nkabela njootondezya malele mujulu aansi, bulowa amulilo asikunku wabusi.
Izuba liyoosanduka kusia, amweezi uyooba bulowa, kabutanasika buzuba bwa-Jehova obo bupati buyoosya,
Pele umwi umwi uukomba muzina lya-Jehova uyoofutulwa, nkaambo mucilundu ca-Zioni amu-Jerusalemu muyooba lufutuko, mbubonya mbwaamba Jehova, aakati kabaabo bacisyeede Jehova mbaita.
Nkaambo mumazuba ayo akuciindi eco ninjooboozya basibwaange baJuda aba-Jerusalemu,
njooyobolola bamasi boonse, njoobaleta mumumpata wa-Josafati, kuti tukabetekane nkuko, nkaambo kabantu bangu acisi cangu ca-Israyeli, nkaambo babamwaisya akati kabamasi, anyika yangu baiabana.
Alimwi bantu bangu babawaalila zisolo, Mulombe balamwaabila muulo wasimamambe, amusimbi balamuuzya bukoko bwakunywa.
Nkaambo mwatola insiliva yangu angolida yangu, azyalo zintu zyangu ziyandisi mwazitola muzikombelo zyanu,
Abana ba-Juda abana ba-Jerusalemu mwabauzya mumaanza aaba-Helene, mwabatola kule kuzwa kunyika yabo.
Lino amubone! Njoobabusya kuzwa kubusena nkumwakabauzizye, aciyokelo canu njoociboozya amitwe yanu nubeni.
Nkabela bana banu balombe abasimbi njoobauzya mumaanza aabana ba-Juda, elyo bayoobauzya kubantu ba-Seba, kucisi cili kule, mbwaamba Jehova.
Amulaule aya makani akati kabamasi. Amulibambile inkondo. Amubusye baalumi basintaze, Basilumamba boonse baswene kuyoolwana.
Amufule maamba aanu abe mapanga, azizibyo zyamisamu zyanu zibe masumo, Mutetete aambe kuti, Ndi singuzu,
Amufwambaane kuboola, nuzisi zyoonse zyeengelede, akuyoboloka. Leta basilumamba bako nkuko, o Jehova.
Zisi zyoonse zibuke, ziinke kumumpata wa-Josafati, nkaambo kakuti nkukonya oko nkunti babeteke bamasi oonse beengelede.
Ma lavula makamu makamu mumumpata wakukosweda makani! Nkaambo buzuba bwa-Jehova buli afwaafwi mumumpata.
Izuba amwezi zyoonse zyasizigwa, anyenyeezi zyaleka kumweka.
Jehova ulavuluma kuzwa ku-Zioni, akulizya ijwi lyakwe ku-Jerusalemu, elyo ijulu anyika zyoonse zilateketa. Pele Jehova ngemacijilo aabantu bakwe, ngumampangala aabana ba-Israyeli.
Lino muyooziba kuti ndime Jehova Leza wanu uukala mu-Zioni cilundu cisalala. Nkabela Jerusalemu uyoosalalisya, abazwamasi tabakooyooinda limbi akati kawo.
Egepita uyooba cisaalo, acisi ca-Edomu ciyooba inkanda iitakedwe bantu, nkaambo kabukali mbubacitila bana ba-Juda, nkaambo batila bulowa bwabantu batajisi mulandu munyika yabo.
Pele Juda uyookalilila lyoonse, a-Jerusalemu uyoobako kusikila kumazyalani-zyalani.
Nkabela njootema mulandu wabulowa bwabo nguntana kutema, nkaambo Jehova nguukede mu-Zioni.
Wakati,
Jehova ulavuluma kuzwa ku-Zioni,
Akulizya ijwi lyakwe ku-Jerusalemu,
Elyo mafulo aabeembeli alalila,
Awalo mutwe wa-Karameli ulapusama.
Pele njootuma mulilo muŋanda ya-Hazaeli, ulye maanda aabwami aa-Benihadadi.

Alimwi njootyola munkulu wamulyango wa-Damasko, nkabela njoomanya mweendelezi wakumumpata wa-Aveni asikujata mumfunko waku-Bete-Edeni, nkabela bantu ba-Aramu bayootolwa mubuzike ku-Kiri, mbwaamba Jehova.
Pele njootuma mulilo abulambo bwalubaya lwa-Gaza, ulye maanda aabwami aawo.
Nkabela njoomanya mweendelezi waku-Asidodi asikujata mumfunko wakuAsikeloni, alimwi ijanza lyangu njoolyuumya Ekroni, aba-Filisti boonse basyeede bayoonyonyooka, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Pele njootuma mulilo abulambo bwalubaya lwa-Turo, ulye maanda aawo.
Pele njootuma mulilo ku-Temani, ulye maanda aabwami aa-Bozira.
Pele njookunka mulilo mubulambo bwa-Raba, ulye maanda aawo aloongololo mubuzuba bwankondo aguwo mubuzuba bwakambizi.
Alakwe mwami wabo uyootolwa mubuzike, walo abasinkuta bakwe boonse, mbwaamba Jehova.
Pele njootuma mulilo ku-Moabu, ulye maanda aabwami aaku-Kerioti, nkabela Moabu uyoofwa alupyopyongano aloongololo ajwi lyamweembo.
Alimwi ­njoomanya babetesi akati kabo, abalo basinkuta babo njoobajaya, mbwaamba Jehova.
Pele njootuma mulilo mucisi ca-Juda, ulye maanda aabwami aamu-Jerusalemu.
Balalyata mutwe wamucete kulusuko lwanyika, ayalo inzila yabaubaansidwe balaileesya, alimwi mwaalumi awisi balanjila mubuvuule amusimbi omwe, aboobo balasampaula izina lyangu lisalala.
Nkabela baloona angubo zisyomezedwe kumbali azipaililo zyoonse, amwalo muŋanda ya-Leza wabo balanywa waini wabapenzedwe.
Alimwi ndime ndakamugwisya kuzwa kucisi ca-Egepita, akumweenzya myaka iili makumi one munkanda kuyoovuba nyika yaba-Amori.
Nkabela ndakabusya bamwi akati kabana banu kuti babe basinsimi, abamwi babakubusi banu ndakababusya kuba baNaziri. Sa takuli boobo, nubana ba-Israyeli na? mbwaamba Jehova.
Pele ba-Naziri mwakabanywisya waini, abalo basinsimi mwakabalailila kuti, Mutasinsimi pe,
Ncobeni ndimanikizidwe munsi andinywe mbuli mbiimanikizidwe iŋola iizwide zifunte zyamaila.
Lino siluno ulamaninwa lucijo, alakwe singuzu takooyoosikilwa buyumu, alakwe mwaalumi sintaze takooyoolivuna.
Ayooyo uuzi kufusa buta takooyooima nji, amuuba maulu takooyoovunwa, alakwe sikutanta imbizi takooyoolivuna.
Nkabela mukozumoyo akati kabaalumi basintaze uyoocija acintanda mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova.
Amuswiilile ijwi eti ndyaamba Jehova aandinywe, nubana ba-Israyeli. Ndyamukowa woonse ngundakagwisya kuzwa kucisi ca-Egepita. Wati,
Ndinywe mbenzi luzutu akati kamikowa yoonse yanyika. Nkaambo kako njoomuboozezya milandu yanu yoonse.
Sa bantu bobile balakonzya kweenda antoomwe, na kabatazuminene?
Sa mulavu ulavuluma musokwe, na katajisi zilyo? Sa Syaanza ulalila mubulyango bwakwe, na katana kujata cintu?
Sa kayuni kalawida ansi mukakole, na katakwe sikukateya? Sa kakole kalafwisuka kuzwa ansi, na katakwe cintu ncikajisi?
Na mweembo ulalila mumunzi, sa bantu tabayoowi na? Na munzi wasikilwa bubi, sa teensi Jehova wabuleta na?
Ncobeni Mwami Jehova taciti cintu, atana kuyubunwida balanda bakwe basinsimi maseseke aakwe.
Mulavu naalila, nguni uutayoowi? Mwami Jehova naamba, nguni uukonzya kutasinsima?

Amwaambile maanda aabwami aaku-Asidodi amaanda aabwami aamucisi ca-Egepita kuti, Amuyoboloke atala azilundu zyamunzi wa-Samariya, kuti mubone lupyopyongano lupati luli mukati kawo, amapenzi aali mulinguwo,
Nkaambo tabezi kucita ziluleme, mbwaamba Jehova, aba balundika bupondo akubba mumaanda aabo.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Sinkondonyoko nkwali, ulizyungulukide nyika. Ulakumanina inguzu zyako, amaanda aako aabwami ayoosaalwa.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Mbuli mweembeli mbavuna kumulomo wamulavu myeendo yobile nanka cipanzi cakutwi, mbubonya obo mbubayoovunwa bana ba-Israyeli bakede mu-Samariya acooko camunseme amuDamasko abulo.
Amuswiilile akulungulwida mukowa wa-Jakobo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova Leza wamakamu makamu.
Nkaambo mubuzuba obo mbonti boozezye Israyeli milandu yakwe, njoouma azyalo zipaizyo zya-Beteli, azyooko zyacipaizyo ziyookosolwa akuwida ansi.
­Alimwi njoomwaya iŋanda yampeyo, aŋanda yamainza yoonse, amaanda aaminyanga ayoonyonyauka, amaanda mapati ayoomana, mbwaamba Jehova.
Amuswiilile ijwi eli, nompwizi zya-Basani nomuli mucilundu caSamariya, nomupenzya bacete akumanikizya batengwana, nomwaambila balumi banu kuti, Kamuleta cakunywa, tunywe,
Mwami Jehova wakonkezya kubusalazi bwakwe kuti, Ncobeni mazuba ayoomusikila nimuti jatwe atulobyo, abaabo benu basyeede bati zubwe azizubyo zyanswi.
Nkabela muyooinda kumazwazwa, umwi aumwi uyooya cakululama, elyo muyoosowegwa ku-Harmoni, mbwaamba Jehova.
Amuvuzye milandu yanu ku-Giligala,
Elyo amulete zipaizyo zyanu cifumo acifumo,
Azipanzi zyakumi zyanu naamana mazuba otatwe.
Ambebo ndamusalazizya meno muminzi yanu yoonse, akumubuzya cilyo mumasena aanu oonse, nekubaboobo tamuna kuboola kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova.

Alimwi ndime ndamukasizya imvula nikwacisyeede myezi yotatwe kusikila kukutebula. Ndakawisizya munzi umwi imvula, pele munzi umwi nsina kuuwisizya pe. Muunda umwi wawidwa imvula, pele muundanyina uutana kuwidwa imvula wapusama.
Elyo minzi yobile nanka yotatwe keeli kweendeenda kumunzi omwe kuya kunywa maanzi akutagondwa. Nekubaboobo tamuna kuboola kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova.
Alimwi ndakamuletela ndyomba akwiibuka. Mwakavuzya myuunda yanu amyuunda yamasaansa amakuyu aanu amaolifa aanu, pele cisozi cakazilya, Nekubaboobo tamuna kuboola kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova.

Ndakamutumina bulwazi mbuli bwaku-Egepita, ndakajazya ipanga bakubusi banu, ambizi zyanu ndakazitola, akwalo kununka kwamalabba aanu ndakakunjizya mumpemu zyanu. Nekubaboobo tamuna kuboola kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ndakamusaala mbubonya mbuli kusaala Leza nkwaakasaazya Sodoma a-Gomora, alimwi mwaba mbuli cisisi cisikwidwe kumulilo. Nekubaboobo tamuna kuboola kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbunti kucitile, O Israyeli. Lino mbuli mbunti kucitile obo, kolibamba kuswanaana a-Leza wako, O Israyeli,
Amubone oyo uubumba zilundu akulenga muuwo, uulwiida muntu miyeeyo yakwe mbwiibede, uusizya mumuni wacifumo akulyataula amasena aakujulu aanyika. Izina lyakwe ngu-Jehova Leza wamakamu.
Musimbi wa-Israyeli wawa,
Tabuki limbi.
Ulikwazeme ansi,
Taakwe uumubusya.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Munzi iwakatuma bantu bali cuulu uyaosyaalilwa mwaanda, ayooyo iwakatuma mwaanda uyoosyaalilwa ikumi mumukowa wa-Israyeli.
Nkaambo mbuboobu Jehova mbwaambila mukowa wa-Israyeli. Wati, Amuyandaule ndime, mube abuumi.
Mutayandauli Beteli nanka kusika ku-Giligala nanka kwiinda ku-Beereseba, pe, nkaambo Giligala ncobeni uyootolwa mubuzike, a-Beteli uyooba cintu cabuyo.
Amuyandaule Jehova, mube abuumi, kuti atasontomoki mbuli mulilo kumukowa wa-Josefa akuulya nikutakwe sikuuzimya ku-Beteli,
Inywe nomuluzya lubeta akuwaala ansi bululami!
Amuyandaule sikulenga cibungululu andakutema, oyo uusandula mudima kuti buce akusizya buzuba bube masiku, uuita maanzi aamulwizi akwaatila ansi. Izina lyakwe ngu-Jehova.
Ngonguwe uusisya lunyonyooko kulibasinguzu, akuletela mudinga lumwayo.

Lino mbuli mbumulyatila mucete, akumubbadezya cipo cabulotwe, muliyakide maanda aamabwe aabezedwe, pele tamukooyookala mulingawo, alimwi mulibyalide myuunda yamasaansa, pele tamukooyoonywa waini kulinjiya pe.
Nkaambo ndizi kuti milandu yanu yavula, azyalo zibi zyanu zili anguzu, inywe nomupenzya baluleme, akutambula makulo akuleesya imbeta zyabacete mumulyango.
Nciceeco muntu uucenjede ncaumwide ciindi ecino, nkaambo nciindi cabubi.
Amusule bubi akuyandisya bubotu, akubamba kabotu imbeta mumulyango, elyo Jehova Leza wamakamu ambweni uyoobafwida luzyalo basyeede bamukowa wa-Josefa.
Nkabela moonse mumyuunda yamasaansa muyooba kulila, nkaambo njenti inde akati kanu, mbwaamba Jehova.
Buli mbubonya mbuli muntu uucija mulavu, elyo ulaswanaana asuntwe, nanka naanjila muŋanda akuyaamika ijanza lyakwe kubulambo, kulamuluma inzoka.
Sa buzuba bwa-Jehova tabweensi mudima na? Tabweensi mumuni pe. Bulasia mbi, tabujisi kubekabeka pe.
Nekuba kuti mwandipailila zipaizyo azituuzyo, nsiziyandi pe, azyalo zitontozyo zyabanyama banu baneneede nsizilangili pe.
Amundisakanisizye lupyopyongano lwanyimbo zyanu, nkaambo kwiimba kwamantimbwa aanu nsikooyookuswiilila pe.
Pele imbeta kaziya bupoomoka mbuli maanzi, abululami mbuli mulonga uutayuminini.
Ncobeni mwakabweza itente lya-Moloki, akakombelo kazikozyano zyanu, anyenyeezi yamuzimu wanu ngumwakalicitila nubeni.
Nkaambo kako njoomutola mubuzike kucisi cisakene kwiinda Damasko. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Izina lyakwe ngu-Leza wamakamu.
Maawe kulibaabo bakede cakutapenga mu-Zioni, abaabo batajisi cakubayoosya mucilundu ca-Samariya, bapati bataanzi bazisi, basikilwa bana ba-Israyeli.
Amwiinde ku-Kaline, mubone; kuzwa oko kamuya kuHamati mupati; alimwi kamuseluka kuya ku-Gati waba-Filisti. Sa muli kabotu kwiinda zisi ezi? Sa nyika yanu nimpati kwiinda nyika yabo.
Nywebo nomusakanya buzuba bubi akusenya kufwaafwi cikalilo cabufumpi!
Balalala amala aamunyanga, akulyoolola amasasa aabo; balalya tubelele tuzwa mubutanga aboombe bagwisigwa kubbwalo.
Balaimba maliwo cakulizya mantimbwa, akulicitila zibulo zyakwiimbya mbuli Davida
Balanywa waini mumbede, akulinanika amafuta mabotu kwiinda oonse, pele tabayaswi mumoyo nkaambo kakusaalwa kwa-Josefa pe.
Nkaambo kako bayootolwa kubuzike akati kabataanzi batolwa, aboobo kuyobayoba kwabalyoolozi kulamana.
Mwami Jehova wakonkezya kuzina lyakwe mwini. Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wamakamu. Ime ndasampaula kami-kami ka-Jakobo, amaanda aakwe ndaasula. Lino njooaba munzi azintu zyoonse zili mumo.
Nkabela na kucisyeede bantu bali ikumi mumwi muŋanda, bayoofwa.

Lino simizyaabo muntu uuyanda kumutenta, atole buyo zifuwa zyakwe kuzwa muŋanda, uyoobusya oyo uuli mukati kaŋanda kuti, Sa ucijisi bamwi? Lino oyo uyoomuvwiila kuti, Taakwe pe. Alimwi uyooamba kuti, Amuumune, nkaambo cilatonda kwaamba izina lya-Jehova.
Nkaambo Jehova ulalailila, elyo iŋanda impati iyooumwa cakutyokauka, ayalo iŋanda iniini iyooanduka-anduka.
Sa imbizi zilacijaana atala andomba? Sa cilakonzeka kulimya iŋombe mulwizi? Nkaambo mwaluzya lubeta, ayalo micelo yabululami mwaicita mbuli mululwe.
Inywe nomusekelela Lo-debara, akwaamba kuti, Sa tatuna kulisaalila Karanaimu kunguzu zyesu tubeni?
Amubone! Ndabusya musyobo wakulwana andinywe, nomukowa wa-Israyeli, mbwaamba Jehova Leza wamakamu, nkabela bayoomupenzya koonse koonse kuzwa kumanjililo aa-Hamati kusikila kukalonga ka-Araba.
Mbuboobu Mwami Jehova mbwaakandibonya. Ndakabona kuti uli mukucita cisozi ciindi nciwakatalika kusyuuka mweemvu wabili, nkokuti mweemvu wabili nikwakamana kumwidwa kwamwami.
Nkabela nicakamana kulya zintu zyoonse zimena zyamunyika, ndakati, O Mwami Jehova, kolekelela. Jakobo ulabuka buti? Nkaambo muniini buyo.
Elyo Jehova wakeempwa kumakani aya. Taakooyooba obo, pe, mbwaamba Jehova.
Mbuboobu Mwami Jehova mbwaakandibonya. Ndakabona kuti Mwami Jehova uli mukwiita mulilo wakubetesya, nkabela wakalya bulondo bupati bwamaanzi, wakaamba kulya nyika ayalo.
Elyo ndakaamba kuti, o Mwami Jehova, koleka. Jakobo ulabuka buti? Nkaambo muniini buyo.
Lino Jehova wakeempwa kumakani aya. Aya aalo taakooyooba obo, pe, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova.
Mbuboobu mbwaakandibonya. Ndakabona kuti Mwami uliimvwi abulambo bupimidwe, acipimyo kacili mujanza lyakwe.
Lino Jehova wakandibuzya kuti, Ncinzi ncobona, Amosi? Ndakati, Ncipimyo. Elyo Mwami wakaamba kuti, Bona! Ndabika cipimyo akati kabantu bangu ba-Israyeli, nkabela nsikooyooboola limbi kubalekelela.
Pele zilundu zya-Izaka ziyoomwaikilwa bantu, aalo makuta aa-Israyeli ayoosaalwa, nkabela njoobuka apanga lyakulwisya mukowa wa-Jeroboamu,
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Amosi. Wati, Jeroboamu uyoojayigwa apanga, abalo ba-Israyeli bayootolwa mubuzike kuzwa kucisi cabo.
Alimwi Amaziya wakaambila Amosi kuti, Uwe sicilengano, koya ukacije kucisi ca-Juda, ukalye insima akusinsima nkuko.
Pele utabooli limbi kusinsima ku-Beteli, nkaambo ndikuta lyamwami, alimwi mbukalilo bwabwami,
Mpawo Amosi wakavwiila Amaziya kuti, Ime teendakali musinsimi nanka mwana wamusinsimi, pe, ndakali mweembeli asikucela inkuyu.
Lino Jehova wakandilesya kweembela imbelele, Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Koya ukasinsimine bantu bangu ba-Israyeli.
Lino swiilila ijwi lya-Jehova. Uwe ulaamba kuti, Utasinsimi cakutapatila mukowa wa-Israyeli, utaambi majwi aakubijila luzubo lwa-Izaka.

Nkaambo kako Jehova wati, Mukaako uyoovuula mumonya mumunzi, abana bako balombe abasimbi boonse bayoojayigwa apanga, anyika yako iyooabwa antambo yakweelesya, ayebo uyoofwa munyika iisofweede, abalo ba-Israyeli bayootolwa mubuzike kuzwa kucisi cabo.
Mbuboobu Mwami Jehova mbwaakandibonya. Ndakabona cisuwo camicelo yamainza.
Lino wakandibuzya kuti, Ncinzi ncobona, Amosi? Ndakati, Ncisuwo camicelo yamainza. Elyo Jehova wakandaa-mbila kuti, Mamanino asika kubantu bangu ba-Israyeli. Nsikooyoobalekelela limbi.
Nkabela nyimbo zyantempele ziyooba malilo mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Mwami Jehova. Ayalo mitunta iyoovula, koonse koonse bayooiwaala anze cakuumuna wi.
Amuswiilile majwi aya, inywe nomukataazya bacete akupenzya batengwana bamucisi.
Mulati, Ipobwe lyamwezi mupya lilamana lili, tuuzye maila, abuzuba bwa-Sabata, tusambale bulotwe? Tucesye cisuwo cakweelesya akukomezya ili lyasekeli lyakuula, akubelesya zipimyo zyakweena.
Tuule bacete ansiliva, abatengwana tubaule ansangu, alimwi atuuzye busenga bwabulotwe.
Jehova wakonkezya kubupati bwa-Jakobo kuti, Ncobeni nsikooyooluba lyoonse milimo yabo.
Sa nyika tiikooyookankama nkaambo kaceeci? Abalo boonse bakede mulinjiyo sa tabakooyoolila? Ncobeni nyika yoonse iyoofuta mbubonya mbuli lwizi, iyooselauka akuyosa alimwi mbuli mulonga waku-Egepita,

Nkabela njoosandula mapobwe aanu abe koomoka, azyalo nyimbo zyanu zyoonse ziyooba zyakulizya. Zibuno zyoonse njoozisamika zisani zyamasaka, amitwe yoonse iyoonyoolwa. Njoocita kuti kube mbuli kulila mwana uuzyedwe alike, amamanino ayooba mbuli buzuba bulula,
Elyo bayooya butuntulika kuzwa kulwizi akusikila kulwizi, akuzwa kunyika akusikila kujwe. Bayooya buzelengana cakuyandaula ijwi lya-Jehova, pele tabakooyoolijana pe.
Mubuzuba obo basimbi beebesi abakubusi boonse bayoowizuka nkaambo kanyota.
Abaabo bakonkezya kumulandu wa-Samariya, baamba kuti, Mbwali muumi Leza wako, O Dani, nanka, Mbiili ngumi inzila yaBeereseba, bayoowida ansi akutabuka limbi.

Ndakabona Mwami uliimvwi kucipaililo, wakati, Uma misemu, kuti zikunguzyo zizungaane. Kozityolaula kumitwe yabo boonse. Nkabela abo basyeede njoobajazya ipanga, elyo takukooyooba naba omwe akati kabo uucija, takukooyooba naba omwe uuvunwa.
Nekuba kuti basya munyika mane kusikila kucikalilo cabafu, njoobagwisya mumonya omo. Nekuba kuti batanta kujulu, njoobaselusya oko akwalo.
Nekuba kuti bayuba kumutwe wacilundu ca-Karameli, njoobayandaula akubagwisya nkuko. Nekuba kuti balisisa cakutabonwa atako lyalwizi, oko akwalo njoolazya inzoka kuti ibalume,
Nekuba kuti batolwa mubuzike kulibasinkondonyina, akooko njoolazya ipanga kuti libajaye. Njoobadongomwena meso aangu cakubabisizya, nsikooyoobacitila bubotu pe.
Nguuyaka maanda aakwe kujulu, azyalo intalisyo zyalululi lwakwe wazijatya ansi. Nguuita maanzi aamulwizi akwaatila ansi. Izina lyakwe ngu-Jehova.
Amubone! Meso aa-Mwami Jehova alalanga cisi cabasizibi. Njoociziminganya kuzwa kubusyu bwanyika.
Nekubaboobo nsikooyoofwidilizya mukowa wa-Jakobo cakutabuka, mbwaamba Jehova,
Nkaambo amubone mbundalaililal Njooseba mukowa wa-Israyeli akati kamasi oonse mbubonya mbuli maila mbwaasebwa mucisebyo, nkabela takuyoowida ansi inseke niiba yomwe.
Bayoojazigwa ipanga boonse basizibi akati kabantu bangu, baamba kuti, Mapenzi taakooyootusikila nanka kutujana.
kuti bavube abo basyeede akati kabaEdomu azisi zyoonse izina lyangu mpolyaambwa, mbwaamba Jehova uucita aya makani.
Njoolesya buzike bwabantu bangu ba-Israyeli, elyo bayooyaka minzi iisaalidwe akukala mulinjiyo, alimwi bayoobyala myuunda yamasaansa akunywa waini wanjiyo, bayoolima myuunda akulya micelo yayo.
Nicobakalika nji munyika yabo, batakaluluki limbi anyika yabo njindabapa, mbwaamba Jehova Leza wako.
Bona! Ndimucesezye akati kabamasi. Ulisampukide loko.
Kulisumpula kwamoyo wako kwakweena, uwe nokede mukati kaŋanzi zyamandomba, noli acikalilo cakujulu, noamba mumoyo wako kuti, Ngwani uukonzya kundiselusya ansi?
Nekuba kuti utante kujulu mbuli insika, akuyaka citeente cako akati kanyenyeezi, akooko njookuselusya, mbwaamba Jehova.

Ma! Ulisaalidwe! Nikwakali kuti babbi bakeza kulinduwe, nanka bafumpi beza masiku, sa teebakali kunoobba cakukuta buyo na? Nikwakali kuti wakasikilwa basikucela misaansa, sa teebakali kunoosiya micelocelo imwi na?
Pele Esau walangisigwa! Ziyandisi zyakwe zilondwedwe zilijanidwe.
Boonse mbotangene abo cizuminano bakutanda akumamanino aanyika. Boonse mbowakakede abo caluumuno bakweena, akukuzunda. Abo ibakalya insima kulinduwe bakuteya cigece. Walo taswiilili pe.
Mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova, sa nsikooyoonyonyweda ba-Edomu basongo, akumanina cilundu ca-Esau bupampu na?
Basintaze bako, O Temani, bayookanduka, aboobo bantu boonse bakucilundu ca-Esau bayoomana kujayigwa.
Nkaambo mubuzuba obo niwakaimikila kumbali, bazwakule nibakasaala imbono zyakwe, bamasi nibakanjila munlilyango yakwe akuwaalila Jerusalemu cisolo, ayebo wakali mbubonya mbuli baabo.
We! Utakondelelwi munyoko mubuzuba mbwaba mubuzike. Utasekeleli bana ba-Juda mubuzuba bwalunyonyooko lwabo. Utaambi cakulisumpula mubuzuba bwamapenzi aabo.
Utanjili mumulyango wabantu bangu mubuzuba bwamafwabi aabo. Utalangi ayebo cakukondwa mbubapenga mubuzuba bwamafwabi aabo, nikuba kutambika maanza kumbono zyabo mubuzuba bwamafwabi aabo.
Utaimikiti amaandaanino aanzila kuti ujaye abo bali mukuloboka, alimwi utaabi abo basyeede mubuzuba bwamapenzi.
Nkaambo buzuba bwa-Jehova buli afwiifwi. Bulasikila misyobo yoonse. Lino mbuli mbuwacita, ayebo uyoocitilwa mbubonya. Kubisya kwako kuyoobweeda amutwe wako omwini.
Nkaambo mbuli mbumunywide acilundu cangu cisalala, bamasi boonse bayoonywa mbubonya obo ciindi coonse. Bayoonywa akukolwa, elyo bayooba mbuli mbubatabede.
Pele mucilundu ca-Ziyoni muyooba inkamu lilobokede, iyoosalala, nkabela luzubo lwa-Jakobo luyoovuba imbono zyabo.

Luzubo lwaJakobo luyooba mulilo aluzubo lwa-Josefa luyooba mabangabanga, aluzubo lwa-Esau luyooba zisikosiko ziyumide. Bayoobatenta akubamaninizya, nkabela takukooyooba uusyaala muluzubo lwa-Esau, Mbwaamba Jehova.
Basaale bankamu yabana ba-Israyeli bakede akati kaba-Kanana bayoovuba nyika mane kusikila ku-Zarefati, abasaale ba-Jerusalemu bakede mu-Sefaradi bayoovuba minzi yakumusanza.
Elyo kulasika bafutuli kucilundu ca-Ziyoni kuzoobeteka zilundulundu zya-Esau, abwami buyooba bwa-Jehova.
Buka, koya ku-Nineve, kununzi ulya mupati, ukakambauke kulinguwo, nkaambo bubi bwabo bweza kunembo lyangu.

Mpawo Jona wakanyamuka, wakati, Ndobokele ku-Tarisi kuzwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova. Elyo wakaya ku-Jopa, wakajana bwaato buya ku-Tarisi, aboobo wakabbadela mali aakunjizya mulimbubo, wakanjila akwiinka ambabo ku-Tarisi kuzwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova.
Pele Jehova wakatuma iguwo ipati loko mulwizi, elyo kwakaba mayuwe mapati mumaanzi, nkabela bwaato bwakaba anga bulakwamuka.

Lino basibwaato bakayoowa, bakatalika kukomba umwi aumwi kumuzimu wakwe, nkabela zintu zyoonse izyakali mubwaato bakazisowela mumaanzi, kuti bwaato bulemununwe. Pele Jona kaselukide kubbazu lyabwaato kuyoolala, nkabela kali muŋonzi impati loko.
Nkabela bakaamba umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina kuti, Kamuza, tusonde, tuzibe na nguni watuletela mapenzi aali boobo. Mpawo bakasonda, nkabela inkakata yakawida Jona.
Elyo wakabaambila kuti, Ndi muHebrayo. Ndayoowa Jehova Leza wejulu iwakalenga lwizi anyika injumu.
Nkabela abo bantu bakayoowa akuyoowa kupati loko, bakamwaambila kuti, Ncinzi eci ncowacita? Nkaambo bantu bakalizi kuti wacija kuzwa kubusyu bwa-Jehova, nkaambo kakuti wakabaambilide obo.
Mpawo bakamubuzya kuti, Lino tukucite buti kuti maanzi atuumunine? Nkaambo maanzi akali kucita mayuwe.
Wakabaambila kuti, Amundibweze, mundisowele mumaanzi, kuti lwizi lubatame, nkaambo ndizi kuti mulandu wangu ncimwasikilwa eli iguwo ipati.

Aboobo bakakomba kuli-Jebova, bakati, Twakukomba, O Jehova, utatulekeleli kuti tunyonyooke nkaambo kabuumi bwayooyu muntu, utatupi mulandu wabulowa bwamuntu uululeme, nkaambo uwe, O Jehova, wacita mbuli mboyanda.
Mpawo bakabweza Jona akumusowela mulwizi, nkabela ndilyonya lwakatontola kuunga.
Elyo abo bantu bakayoowa loko Jehova, nkabela bakapaila cipaizyo kuli-Jehova, akukonkezya zikonke.
Elyo Jona wakakomba kuli-Jehova Leza wakwe naakali mwida lyanswi.
Wakati,
Ciindi ncendakapengede ndakakomba Jehova,
Nkabela wakandivwiila.
Nindakali mwida lyakabanda ndakoongolola,
Elyo wakaswiilila ijwi lyangu.
Milonga yakalindizyungulukide,
Mayuwe aako ampwampwa zyako zyoonse zyakandiinda kujulu.
Nekubaboobo nkatambye meso kuntempele yako iisalala.
Maanzi akandinyonoosya cakunjila mumoyo,
Bulondo bwalwizi bwakandizyunguluka.
Matete akandizambilila amutwe,
Ndakaseluka kuntalisyo zyazilundu,
Ziyako zyanyika zyakandisinkilizya.
Pele wavuna buumi bwangu kulufu, O Jebova Leza wangu.
Elyo lukombyo lwangu lwakakusikila kuntempele yako usalala.
Mbombabo baswekelwa luzyalo.
Eco ncindakasyomezya njoocita nciconya. Lufutuko lulazwa kuli-Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika lwabili kuli-Jona, liti,
Buka, koya ku-Nineve, munzi ulya mupati, ukakambauke kulinguwo makani ngu­ ndakulailila.
Elyo Jona wakabuka akwiinka ku-Nineve, mbuli mbwaakalaililwa ajwi lya-Jehova. Lino Nineve kuuli munzi mupati loko, wakali kweendwa mazuba otatwe.
Elyo Jona wakatalika kunjila mumunzi kulweendo lwabuzuba bumwi. Nkabela Jona wakakambauka, wakati, Kwainda mazuba aali makumi one, Nineve uyoonyonyoonwa.
Nkaambo ijwi lyakasika kumwami waku-Nineve, nkabela wakanyamuka kuzwa kucuuno cabwami bwakwe, wakasamununa cikobela cakwe, wakalivumba zisani zyasaka, akukala mudyota.

Lino wakaucita kuti uambwe akumwaisigwa koonse ku-Nineve kuti, Ngooyu mulazyo wamwami abapati bakwe. Kutabi muntu, naba munyama, niiba iŋombe, niiba imbelele, uulabila niciba cintu. Boonse batalyi, nikuba kunywa maanzi.
Pele bantu abanyama boonse bavumbwe azisani zyamasaka akukomba kuli-Leza canguzu, alimwi umwi aumwi aleke inzila yakwe yazibi akubisya kuli mumaanza aabo.
Ngwani uuzi na Leza uyootulekelela akutufwida insoni, akuleka bukali bwakwe buyoosya, kuti tutanyonyooki.
Mpawo Leza naakabona milimo yabo, kuti baleka inzila yabubi, Leza wakafwa insoni kumakani aamapenzi ngakasi bacitile, nkabela takaacita pe.

Aboobo wakakomba kuli-Jehova, kuti, Ndakukomba, O Jehova, sa teendakaa­ mbide obo na, nindakacili mucisi cangu? Aboobo ndakasaanguna kucijila ku-Tarisi, nkaambo ndakalizi kuti uwe uli Leza siluyando, uli sibuuya, tofwambi kukalala, aluzyalo lwako ndupati, aboobo ulafwa insoni kumakani aakubisizya bantu,
Lino, O Jehova, gwisya buumi bwangu, nkaambo kufwa kulandibotela kwiinda kuti nkimpona.
Mpawo Jehova wakati, Ino unyemenanzi? Sa ncibotu kunyema obo na?
Lino Jona wakazwa mumunzi, wakakala kujwe lyamunzi, wakalicitila cilao cakukala muceenzule caco, kuti akabone cisi kacitike mumunzi.
Nkabela Jehova Leza wakabamba ibonobono, wakalimezya amutwe waJona, kuti cikamupe cenzule akumulesya kubijilwa. Mpawo Jona wakakondwa loko nkaambo kabonobono elyo.
Pele nibwakaca, Leza wakabamba isenda lyakuluma ibonobono, aboobo lyakafwa.

Alimwi izuba nilyakapasa, Leza wakaleta muuwo wakujwe uukasaala, nkabela izuba lyakabala amutwe wa-Jona, aboobo wakawizuka, wakalikumbilila kuti afwe. Wakati, Kufwa kulandibotela kwiinda kuti nkimpona.
Mpawo Leza wakaambila Jona kuti, Sa ncibotu kunyema obo nkaambo kabonobono na? Wakati, Ncibotu kunyema cakufwa.
Elyo Jehova wakati, Wafwida insoni eli ibonobono, ndiwatakabelekela andiwatakameneka, ilyakamena busiku bomwe akunyonyooka obo busiku mbubonya.

Lino ime sa nsyeeleede kufwida insoni Oyu munzi mupati waku-Nineve? Mulinguwo muli bantu bainda zyuulu zili mwaanda amakumi obile batana kwiiya kwaandaanya ijanza lyabo lyalulyo ajanza lyabo lyalumonswe, alimwi muli iŋombe zinji.
Amuswiilile numisyobo yoonse. Teelela, O nyika azyoonse zili mumo. Mwami Jehova abe simulandunyoko. Mwami aambe makani kuzwa kuntempele yakwe iisalala.
Nkaambo amubone! Jehova ulapola kuzwa kucikalilo cakwe, ulaseluka kuzoolyataula amasena aasumpukide aanyika.
Zilundu zilayaaya munsi lyakwe, amimpata ilaanduka, Zilaba mbuli bunzuka buumpwa amulilo, ambuli maanzi aatika ampwampwa.
Ezi zyoonse nkaambo kamilandu ya-Jakobo azibi zyaluzubo lwa-Israyeli. Ncinzi milandu ya-Jakobo? Sa teensi Samariya? Azipaililo zya-Juda nzinzi? Sa tazyeensi Jerusalemu.
Lino njoocita kuti Samariya ibe mbuli bulimo bwamumuunda mwabyalwa masaansa. Mabwe aawo njooakunkulisya mumumpata, antalisyo zyawo zilaboneka.

Nkabela zikozyano zyakwe ziyootyolaulwa, zikombelo zyawo ziyootentwa mumulilo, azituni zyawo zyoonse ziyoosaalwa, nkaambo zipo zyabuvuule nzezyakazyuuzya lino zipo ezyo nzizyonya zyabuvuule zilabweeda kulinzizyo.
Nkaambo kamakani aya njoomoka akulila, njooenda acinkuna akutasama insangu, njoomuka mbuli bamwaba akulila mbuzilila impo.
Nkaambo zilonda zyakwe tazisilikiki, Catana ku-Juda, casika akumulyango wabantu bangu ku-Jerusalemu.
Mutaambi makani mu-Gati. Kulila utalili pe. Ku-Beti-Afira (Munzi walusuko) kobumbuluka mulusuko,
Uinke acinkuna abweeme nokede mu-Safira (Munzi wabweebesi). Utazwi nokede mu-Zanana (Munzi wakuzwa), Kulila kwa-Betezeli kuyoomunyanzya ciimikililo canu.
Bakede mu-Maroti balalindila bubotu, nkaambo mapenzi aazwa kuli-Jehova asika akumulyango wa-Jerusalemu.
Anga imbizi kunkalaki, uwe nokede mu-Lakisi, Nduwe wakataangunina mwana musimbi wa-Zioni kubisya, Mulinduwe mwiijenwe milandu ya-Israyeli.
Nkaambo kako ulapa Moresati Gati cipo cakulazya. Maanda aa-Akizibi (Munzi walweeno) ayooleta lweeno kubami ba-Israyeli,
Njoomuletela sikumusaala, nomukede mu-Maresa. Bulemu bwaIsrayeli bulaletwa aku-Adulamu.
Kolikulula akuligela nkaambo kabana bako bayandisi. Kokemezya cinkulu cako mbuli sikube, nkaambo bakusia, banjila mubuzike.
Baleemuzya myuunda akwiisaala, amaanda balaatola. Balapenzya mwaalumi aciinga cakwe, balakataazya muntu ambono zyakwe.

Nkaambo kako mbuboobo mbwaamba Jehova. Amubone! Ndayeeya kuletela luzubo olu mapenzi, nkabela tamukooyookonzya kugwisya insingo zyanu kulingao nikuba kweenda cakulisumpula, nkaambo ciindi ecino nceciindi cibi.
Mubuzuba obo kulaba cikozyano caambwa ndinywe, akulila cililo cakupenga. Balati, Kusaalwa ncobeni twasaalwa. Imbono zyabantu bangu zyatolwa, Maawe! Wandinyanga. Myuunda yesu yaabilwa basicinguni.
Nkaambo kako tokooyooba amuntu naba omwe uuwaala cisolo cakweelesya nyika mumbungano ya-Jehova,
Mutasinsimi, mbubaamba. Tabakoosinsima aya. Zisapi tazimani.
Uwe noamba kuti luzubo lwa-Jakobo, sa Muuya wa­-Jehova wafwiinsigwa na? Sa eyi njimilimo yakwe? Sa majwi aangu taaboteli oyu uuenda cakululama?
Pele ndinywe nomwaba basinkondonyina bantu bangu, Mulabalwisya bakede caluumuno, akusaala zikobela zyabaabo bainda cakutontola batayandi inkondo.
Banakazi babantu bangu mulabatanda kuzwa kumaanda aabo meebesi, abana babo mulabanyanga bulemu bwangu lyoonse.
Na muntu uuenda cabuyo acakubeja waamba kuti, Njoomusinsimina cakunywa waini acakukolwa, ngonguwe uukonzya kuba musinsimi wabantu aba.
Sikuvwinyauna wabazulwida, bavwinyauna mulyango akwiinda mulinguwo akuzwa anze, alakwe mwami wabo wabazulwida, a-Jehova uli kunembo lyabo.
Anukuti ndinywe numusula bubotu akuyandisya bubi. Ndinywe numufunda bantu akukwamuna nyama yakuzifuwa zyabo.
Mulalya nyama yabantu bangu, azikanda mulazibbabula kumibili yabo. Mulatyolaula zifuwa zyabo, mulazisabaula mbubonya mbuli zyakujika mucilongo, mbuli nyama iibikidwe mucinabwao.
Caba ciindi bayoolilila Jehova, pele takooyoobavwiila pe, Uyoosisa busyu bwakwe kulimbabo ciindi eco, nkaambo kakubija kwancito zyabo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova aabasinsimi babeji baleesya bantu bangu, balumya meno aabo ciindi cakulila kuti, Luumuno. Kufumbwa muntu uutabiki mumilomo yabo, balalibamba kumulwisya.
Nkaambo kako mulasikilwa masiku, mutabi acilengano, akujana mudima, kuti mutasondi. Izuba liyoobbilila basinsimi banu, abuzuba buyoobasiila mbi.
Basizilengano bayoofwa bweeme, abasondi bayoopilinganisigwa, Boonse bayoofumba milimo yabo, nkaambo takukooyooba lutyabo lwa-Leza.
Pele mebo ncobeni ndizwide inguzu nkaambo ka-Muuya wa-Jehova, Ndizwide lubeteko abukozu bwakwaambila Jakobo milandu yakwe akutapatila Israyeli aazibi zyakwe.
Amuswiilile nubapati baluzubo lwa-Jakobo abasilutwe baluzubo lwaIsrayeli, inywe numusampaula lubeta akupilinganya bululami boonse,
numuyaka Zioni abulowa, a-Jerusalemu mulauyaka abubi.

Basilutwe bawo balabeteka cakupegwa makulo, bapaizi bawo balaiisya cakuvola buyo abasinsimi balasondela mali buyo, nekubaboobo balalangila Jehova, balati, Sa Jehova tali akati kesu, Tatukooyoosikilwa bubi.
Lino nkaambo kandinywe Zioni uyoolimwa mbuli muunda. Jerusalemu uyooba malwi malwi, acilundu cantempele ciyooba mbuli kalundulundu kamusokwe buyo.

Bantu bamisyobo minji bayooinka cakuti, Amuboole, tutante kucilundu ca-Jehova, tuye kuŋanda ya-Leza wa-Jakobo, nkabela uyootwiiyisya ziyanza zyakwe, tweende munzila zyakwe. Nkaambo mu-Zioni mulazwa Mulao, ajwi lya-Jehova lilazwa mu-Jerusalemu.

Lino uyoobeteka misyobo minji akutapatila mikowa iili anguzu yakule. Nkabela bayoofula mapanga aabo abe maamba aakulimya, amasumo aabo abe zizibyo zyamisamu, Cisi tacikooyoobweza ipanga lyakulwisya cisinyina, nkaambo tabakwe nibayooiiya inkondo limbi pe.
Banooyookede umwi aumwi mucisiko camusaansa wakwe amumukuyu wakwe, nkabela takukooyooba muntu naba omwe uubayoosya, nkaambo aya makani azwa kumulomo waJehova wamakamu makamu,
Nkaambo misyobo yoonse ileenda muzina lyamizimu yayo, aswebo tuleenda muzina lya-Jehova Leza wesu lyoonse mane kukabe kutamani.
Sikwiima-ima njoomucita kuti abe inkamu iitamwaikide, ayooyo uutandidwe uyooba cisi cili anguzu, nkabela Jehova nguuyoobeendelezya mucilundu ca-Zioni kuzwa sunu akutamani.
Uwe nongazi yabutanga, cilundu camwana musimbi wa-Zioni, bulaboola kulinduwe. Bwami butaanzi bulabweeda, bwami bwamwana musimbi wa-Jerusalemu,
Lino nkaambonzi nolila cakukwiila? Sa nkaambo kakubula mwami? Sa nkaambo kakuti basinkuta bamana nkojatilwa insungo mbuli insungo zyamwanakazi uutumbuka?

Kuciswa akusunga cakuzyala, O mwana musimbi wa-Zioni, mbuli mwanakazi uutumbuka, nkaambo ulazwa mumunzi akukala musokwe. Ulasika aku-Babuloni, nkabela oko uyoovunwa, Jehova uyookunununa kumaanza aabasinkondonyoko,
Ciindi ecino misyobo minji yabantu ilakuyobolokela. Balaamba kuti, Anyonyooke! Meso esu abone ncituyanda cicitwa mu-Zioni.
Pele tabezi miyeeyo ya-Jehova, tabamvwi makanze aakwe. Nkaambo wakabunganya mbubonya mbuli misunta yamaila mbiiletwa kucipolelo.

Buka, upole, o mwana musimbi wa-Zioni, nkaambo luja lwako njoolucita mbuli butale, ansumba zyako njoozicita mbuli mundalila, elyo uyoopwaya bantu banji. Imbono zyabo uyoozisaalila Jehova, abuvubi bwabo uyoobupa Mwami wanyika yoonse.
Nkaambo kako uyoobaaba mane kusikila kuciindi cakuzyala cayooyo uuti zyale, elyo babunyina basyeede bayoopiluka kubana ba-Israyeli.
Uyooima akweembela munguzu zya-Jehova, mubulemu bwazina lya-Jehova Leza wakwe. Nkabela bayookalilila, nkaambo uyooba mupati koonse koonse akusikila kumagolelo aanyika.
Ngonguwe uyooba luumuno lwesu, baAsuri nibayoosika munyika yesu akulyataula mumaanda esu aabwami, elyo tuyoobusya beembezi bali musanu ababili abeendelezi bali musanu abatatu bakubalwisya.
Bayooendelezya cisi ca-Asuri kunguzu zyapanga, acisi caNimrodi apanga lisomwedwe. Nkabela uyootuvuna mumaanza aaba-Asuri nibayoonjila mucisi cesu anibayooendenda munyika yesu.

Inkamu iisyeede ya-Jakobo iyooba akati kabamasi, akati kamisyobo minji yabantu, mbuli mulavu akati kabanyama bamusokwe, ambuli syuumbwa akati kamatanga aambelele. Naainda cakulyata acakukwamuna taakwe uukonzya kuvuna.
Ijanza lyako lisumpulwe cakulwisya basimulandunyoko, abasinkondonyoko boonse banyonyooke.
Njoomanisya minzi yamucisi cako akumwaya zitabilizyo zyako.
Njoomanisya malozi aamumaanza aako, nkabela takooyooba abasondi.
Alimwi njoomanisya zikozyano zyako zibezedwe amatantilo aako akati kanu, kuti utakombi limbi zibumbwa zyamaanza aako omwini.
Azyaanda zyako zyoonse njoozinonkola akati kanu, aminzi yako njooinyonyoona.
Nkabela bamasi batana kuswiilila njoobatemena milandu cabukali acakunyemesya.
Lino amuswiilile ncaamba Jehova. Wati, Buka, ukakazyanye azilundu, atwalo tulundulundu tuswiilile ijwi lyako.
Amuswiilile, nuzilundu, lukazyanyo lwa-Jehova, anywebo numatalikilo aateeli aanyika, nkaambo Jehova uli amakani aakukazyanya abantu bakwe, ulazumanana aba-Israyeli.
Nubantu bangu, ndamucitilanzi? Ndamukataazya buti? Amundivwiile.
Nkaambo ndime ndakamugwisya munyika ya-Egepita. Ndime ndakamunununa muŋanda yabuzike. Ndime ndakamupa Musa a-Aroni a-Miriamu kuti bamusololele.

Nubantu bangu, mutalubi Balaki mwami wa-Moabu mbwaakakanza kumubisizya, a-Balamu mwana wa-Beori mbwaakamuvwiila. Mutalubi zyoonse izyakacitwa kuzwa ku-Sitimu mane kusikila ku-Giligala, kuti muzibisye milimo iiluleme ya-Jehova mbwiibede.
Sa Jehova ulabotelwa zyuulu zyabagutu bambelele, na zyuulu zyuulu zyamilonga yamafuta? Sa nkaabe mwanaangu mutaanzi nkaambo kamilandu yangu, micelo yamubili wangu nkaambo kazibi zyamoyo wangu?
Wakutondezya, O muntu, cintu cibotu mbucibede. Taakwe cintu cimbi Jehova ncayanda kulinduwe, pele kucita bululami akuyanda luzyalo akweenda cakulibombya a-Leza wako.
Ijwi lya-Jehova lilaongolola kumunzi. (Kulemeka izina lyako nkokuleta coolwe.) Amuswiilile nomusyobo ambungano yamunzi.
Sa bubi mubucili muŋanda yababi? Sa ceelesyo cice cakweenya nkucili?
Sa ndakonzya kumululamika uuli azipimyo zitaluleme, ayooyo uuli ankomo yamabwe aakweelesya aakweenya?
Nkaambo bavubi bamunzi balizwide buvupi; bantu bawo balaamba zyakubeja, andimi zyabo zili alweeno mukanwa lyabo.
Lino mebo ndakuuma acuumyo cijaya, ndakusaala nkaambo kazibi zyako.
Uyoolya pele tokooyookuta pe. Buusu bwako bulalibonya mukati kako. Uyoosoleka kulonzya pele tokooyoosisya kabotu pe, aceeco ncosisya njoocaabila ipanga.
Uyoobyala pele tokooyootebula. Uyooenga mafuta aamaolifa pele tokooyooanana. Amasaansa uyooalyata, pele tokooyoonywa waini pe.
Nkaambo mulatobela ziyanza zya-Omri amilimo yaluzubo lwa-Ahabu, amunjiyo zyabo momweendela. Aboobo njoomwaabila lusaalo, abantu bamumunzi bayooba basikusyolaukwa. Mulasampaulwa kulibamasi.
Muntu siluzyalo ulimaninide ansi. Taakwe uululeme akati kabantu, Boonse balalindila bulowa bwabantu. Boonse balavwima umwi aumwi mweenzinyina atukole.
Babamba maanza aabo kuti bacite bubi. Mwami sikubeteka ulakumbila cilumbyo, elyo muvubi ulamwaambila moyo wakwe neuyanda, nkabela balacicita antoomwe.
Nekuba mubotu akati kabo uli mbuli ciyasabavwimi, ayooyo uululeme kwiinda beenzinyina uli mbuli lubaya lwamamvwa. Buzuba bwabalindi bako nibati umwe bulasika, Lino balajana mafwabi.
Utasyomi mweenzinyoko, utabiki moyo wako kumuzwalani wako. Ayooyo ngokumbatana awe utamujalwidi mulomo wako.
Nkaambo mwana mulombe ulasampaula wisi, amwana musimbi ulabukila cakulwisya banyina, amukamwana ulakazyanya abanyinazyala. Basiluzubo bamuntu mwini mbibayooba basinkondonyina.
Pele mebo njoolangila Jehova, njoolindila Leza walufutuko lwangu, Leza wangu uyoondiswiilila.
Utandisekeleli nosinkondoma, nkaambo nekuba kuti nkawe, njoobuka lubo. Nekuba kuti nkale mumudima, Jehova ngumumuni wangu.
Ndalibombya kubukali bwa-Jehova, nkaambo ndamubisizya, mane akandikoswede makani akundicitila ciluleme. Uyoondinjizya mumumuni, nkabone bululami bwakwe.
Elyo sinkondoma uyoocibona, abweeme buyoomuvumba. Oyo iwakali kundibuzya kuti, Uli kuli Jehova Leza wako? meso aangu ayoomubona, nkabela lino uyoolyataulwa mbuli itombe lyamumigwagwa.
Kuyooba buzuba bwakuyaka malambo aako. Mubuzuba obo mulao uyootolwa kule.
Mubuzuba obo bayooza kulinduwe kuzwa ku-Aseri akuzwa kuminzi ya-Egepita, kuzwa ku-Egepita mane kusikila kumulonga, kuzwa kulwizi akusikila kulwizinyina, akuzwa kucilundu kusikila kucilundunyina.
Pele nyika iyooba matongo nkaambo kabantu bayo; njemicelo yancito zyabo.
Njoomutondezya zintu zigambya mbubonya mbuli mumazuba alya nowakazwa mu-Egepita,
Bamasi nibayoobona bayoofwa bweeme aanguzu zyabo. Bayoobika maanza amiloma yabo, amatwi aabo ayoosinkwa.
Bayoomyankuta ivu mbuli inzoka. Bayooza bukalaba akukankama kuzwa kumayubilo aabo mbuli tuuka twaansi. Bayooza buyoowa Jehova Leza wesu. Bayookankama nkaambo kanduwe.
Nguni Leza uuli mbuli nduwe nojatila zibi akulekelela milandu yabantu bako basyeede? Takakatili lyoonse bukali bwakwe, nkaambo luzyalo ndolumubotela.
Uyooboola kutufwida luse, uyoolyataula amilandu yesu, azibi zyesu zyoonse ulazisowa mubonze lyalwizi.
Uyoocitila Jakobo cakusinizya akufwida Abrahamu luzyalo, mbubonya mbowakasyomezya bamatata mumazuba aakalekale.
Jehova ngu-Leza sibbivwe sikutema milandu. Jehova ulatema milandu, alimwi ulizwide bukali. Jehova ulatema milandu yabaabo bamukazya, akutaleka bukali kuli basinkondonyina.
Jehova tafwambi kunyema, alimwi inguzu zyakwe nzipati. Takooyoolulamika abuniini babisya. Jehova ulijisi inzila yakwe mukambizi amuguwo, amayoba ndolusuko lwamaulu aakwe.
Ulatapatila lwizi akuluyuminizya, amilonga yoonse uliianzanya. Basani a-Karimeli alapusama, aalo malubaluba aa-Lebano alapusama.
Zilundu zilateketa kubusyu bwakwe, atulundulundu tuleenzunuka. Nyika ilapyopyongana naalibonya, aluwa abantu boonse bakede mulindulo.
Nguni uukonzya kwiima kubukali bwakwe. Nguni uukonzya kulibusya kulunyemo lwakwe luyoosya. Bukali bwakwe bulakolomoka mbuli mulilo, amandomba alapwayika nkaambo kakwe.
Pele ulamanizya basinkondonyina alupayo lwazambangulwe, ulabatandila mumudima.
Ino nkaambonzi mulayeeya bubi kuli-Jehova? Ulamanizya makani lweendo lomwe. Mapenzi taakooyoobuka lwabili.
Nekuba kuti bali mbuli mamvwa aasyankene, alimwi balikoledwe bukoko, bayootentwa mbuli zisikosiko ziyuminide.
Nkwali iwakazwa mulinduwe uuyeeya bubi kuli-Jehova, uubula zyabuyo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Nekuba kuti bali anguzu, alimwi mbanji, bayoogonkwa akumaninina. Ndakakubombya, pele nsikooyookubombya limbi pe.
Ciindi ecino ndati tyole ijoko lyakwe, azyaanzyo zyako ndasi zivwinyaune.
Jehova walailila aanduwe kuti izina lyako litayeeyegwi limbi. Njoomanisya muŋanda yamizimu yako zikozyano zibezedwe azyabutale. Njookubikila cuumbwe, nkaambo ulisampaukide.
Sikutyolaula wasika kuzookulwisya. Bamba kabotu macijilo aako. Langisya inzila. Koliyumya mucikungu, akulijatila inguzu loko.
Nkaambo Jehova waboozya bulemu bwa-Jakobo, bube mbuli bulemu bwa-Israyeli. Nkaambo basikusaala bakabasaala akunyonyoona mitabi yabo.
Intobo zyabasintaze bakwe zyasalala pyu, basilumamba bakwe balisamide zisalalisya. Inkoloyi zyakwe zilabeka-beka mbuli mulilo mubuzuba bwakwe bwakulibamba, amasumo alazunga-zunga loko.
Inkoloyi zilazungaana mumigwagwa, zilazuza-zuza mumasambalilo. Zilikozyene amalampi, zilapenauka mbuli indabo.
Ulayobolola basimpi bakwe, balaliwaala canguzu. Balafwambaanina kubulambo, akubamba lubaya lwakutabilila.
Zijazyo zyamilonga zyajaluka, aŋanda yabwami yabomboloka.
Namalelo ulisamunwidwe akutolwa, abasimbi bakwe balalila mbuli inziba cakulyuuma-uma azyamba zyabo.
Ncobeni Nineve kalekale kuuli mbuli iziba lyamaanzi, nekubaboobo balacija. Baambilwa kuti, Ima, ima! Pele taakwe uupiluka.
Amusaale insiliva! Amusaale ingolida! Imbono tazimani! Zintu ziyandisi nzilemu!
Ulisaalidwe, ulipilingene, ulinyonyoongene! Moyo weenzuka, amazwi alakankama, Zikungu zyoonse zilazungana, amasyu aabantu boonse alipuseme.
Buli kuli bulyango bwabalavu, acilido cabasyuumbwa, nkubakali kweendeenda mulavu amuzyazi wakwe atwana twabo cakutayoowa muntu?
Mulavu wakali kujaya nyama yakukusya twana twakwe, akusinina bazyazi bakwe nyama. Bakali kuzuzya malyango aabo zyakulya, amampangala aabo akazula zilyo.

Bona! Ndakulwisya, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Njootenta inkoloyi zyako mukati kabusi, abalavu bako ipanga liyoobalya. Njoomanisya zisaalo zyako ansi, nkabela ijwi lyabatumwa bako talikooyoomvwigwa limbi.
Maawe! Munzi wabulowa! Munzi woonse ulizwide lubejo alunyansyo. Tabaleki kusaala.
Lilamvwigwa ijwi lyacimboko, akundindima kwamavili. Imbizi zilazilika, ankoloyi zilakonkozya.
Basimbizi balatanta. Mapanga alamweka, amasumo alabeka-beka. Bajayidwe mbanji loko, zitunta tazibaliki. Mitumba tiimani, balalebwa kulinjiyo,
Nkekaambo kamamambe manji aasimamambe uuli aciwa cibotu, sibulozi, uuaba masi amamambe aakwe aziinga amalozi aakwe.
Njookufusa zisesemyo, njookusofwaazya, njookubika ukabe ceebelwa.
Elyo boonse bakubona bayoocija, bayooti, Ma! Nineve wasaalwa! Ino nguni uuti mulilile? Njandaule kuli basikumuumuzya?
Sa uli kabotu kwiinda No-amoni? Kakede akati kamilonga, kazyungulukidwe maanzi. Civunyo cakwe cakali lwizi, bulambo bwakwe bwakali lwaanze.
Etiopiya a-Egepita mbobakali inguzu zyakwe, nkabela teezyakali kumana pe. Puti a-Lubimu mbobakali kumugwasya.
Nekubaboobo wakazundwa, wakatolwa mubuzike. Bana bakwe bakapwayigwa kumapambukilo aanzila zyoonse. Balemu bakwe bakabawaalila cisolo, abapati bakwe boonse bakaangwa ankeetani.
Ayebo mbubonya uyookolwa akuyuba, uyooliyandawida macijilo nkaambo kabasinkondonyoko.
Zicijilo zyako ziyumu zyoonse ziyooba mbuli mikuyu iili abana bavuyukide. Na bayuunigwa, balaloka buyo mumulomo wasikulya.
Bona! Bantu bako bakede mukati kamunzi mbanakazi buyo. Milyango yanyika yako ncobeni ilijulidwe kumeso aabasinkondonyoko. Mulilo walya kale minkulu yayo.
Kolitekela maanzi aakubelesya munzi nosinkidwe. Yumya zicijilo zyako ziyumu, Konjila muntimba ukalyataule bulongo bwakubumba zitina.
Oko mulilo uti kulye, ipanga liti kunyonyoone akukulya mbuli cisozi. Kolivuzya mbuli cisozi, kolivuzya mbuli cikwikwi.
Basambazi bako wabavuzya loko kwiinda nyenyeezi zyakujulu, pele cisozi catalika kuvungununa mababa aaco, cilauluka.
Bapatipati bako bali mbuli cisozi, abamabbalani bako bali mbuli cikwikwi. Cilikede mukati kabulambo ciindi campeyo, pele izuba lyapasuka buyo, balacija, elyo taakwe uuzi na cili kuli.
Beembeli bako bali muŋonzi, O mwami wa-Asuri. Baalu bako baloonede. Bantu bako balimwaikide azilundu, taakwe uubabunganya pe.
Kuciswa kwako takusilikiki pe, bulwazi bwako mbwalufu. Boonse baswiilila impuwo bayookukambilila maanza, nkaambo taakwe naba omwe bubi bwako ngubutana kukataazya lyoonse.
Nceeci cilengano ncaakabona Habakuku musinsimi.
Ino nkaambonzi wandibonya zibi akundilanzya bupilingene? Kusaala akuvupuula, zyoonse nkuzili kumeso aangu. Kwabuka inkondo akukazyanya.
Nciceeci mulao nciwalekela­ kubambwa, akubeteka takubetekwi abuniini pe. Nkaambo basizibi balazyunguluka baluleme, aboobo makani taakosoki cakululama,
Amubone akati kabamasi! Amulange, mugambe loko! Nkaambo ndacita milimo mumazuba aanu njimutakoozumina nekuba kuti mwalwiidwa.
Nkaambo ndabusya Ba-Kasidi, oyo musyobo mukali, ulalula. Baleenda nyika yoonse kuyoovuba makalilo aatali aabo.
Balayoosya akugambya, Makanze aabo akulisumpula kwabo zyazwa mumyoyo yabo beni.
Imbizi zyabo zileendesya kwiinda basiluwe, mbakali kwiinda baumpe bamasiku. Basimbizi babo balalisumpula. Basimbizi babo bazwa kule, baleza buuluka mbuli sikube uufwambaanina kulya.
Boonse baleza kuzoosaala. Masyu aabo alalanga kunembo. Balabunganya bazike banji mbuli musenga.
Bami balabaseka, abapati balabawelela buyo. Balaseka macijilo mayumu oonse, balalundika buyo ivu akwaazunda.
Elyo balaindilila buyo mbuli muwo, balaya bubisya, Inguzu zyabo ngu-leza wabo.
Sa toli waciindi loko, O Jehova Leza wangu, Musalali wangu? Tofwi pe. O Jehova, wababika kuti babetekwe. O mwaala wangu, wababusya kuti bapegwe mulandu.
Uwe noli ameso aasalala aakutabona bubi, notakonzya kulanga zibi, nkaambonzi nolanga buyo basilweeno, akuumuna buyo sizibi naalya muntu uumwiinda kululama?
Nkaambonzi nobika bantu babe mbuli inswi zyamulwizi, ambuli tuukauka tubula mwami?
Ulabagwisya boonse andobyo yakwe. Ulabatola mulusabwe lwakwe, akubabunganya mubuzamba bwakwe. Elyo ulakondwa akusekelela,
aboobo ulapailila lusabwe lwakwe, akutentela buzamba bwakwe tununkilizyo, nkaambo nzenzizyo zineneesya caabilo cakwe akubotya zilyo zyakwe.
Lino sa ulazumizigwa kuciya bukunkumuna lusabwe lwakwe? Sa uciya bujaya bamasi cakutafwida insoni?
Elyo Jehova wakavuwa, wakati, Lemba eci cilengano, cimvwike kabotu acilembelo, kuti umwi aumwi acibale cakucijaana.
Nkaambo cilengano cilijisi ciindi caco cibikidwe. Cileza bukunkulika, nkabela kumamanino tacikooyoobeja pe. Na camuka, kocilindila, nkaambo ncobeni cilaza, tacikooyoocedelelwa pe.
Moyo wakwe wazimba, toluleme mukati kakwe. Pele mululami, lusyomo lwakwe ndoluyoomuponya.

Aba boonse sa tabakooyooamba cikozyano alinguwe? Sa tabakooyooimba lwiimbo lwakumuweelela? Bayooti, Maawe kuliyooyo uuvuzya imbono zitali zyakwe! Cilamana lili? Maawe kuliyooyo uulilemezya zikonkezyo!
Sa takooyoofwambaana kubuka sikukuluma? Sa tabakooyoobuka basikukukataazya? Uyoobabeda zisaalo,
Mbuli mbosaalide zisi zinji, bantu boonse basyeede bayookusaala ayebo, nkaambo kabulowa bwabantu alunyonyooko lucitilwa nyika, lucitilwa munzi aboonse bali mulinguwo.
Maawe kuliyooyo uunyanzizya ciinga cakwe impindu iitaluleme, kuti asumpule citeente cakwe, avunwe kumaanza aabubi.
Wajanina luzubo lwako bweeme kukukosola bantu banjibanji. Moyo wako wabisya.
Ibbwe lyamubwaanda liyookwiila, angwalala yamumusamu iyoolivwiila.
Maawe kuliyooyo uuyaka munzi abulowa, uubusya idolopo abubi.
Ncobeni teensi kuli-Jehova wamakamu nkwaazwida aya makani aakuti bantu balikataazye mumulilo akuti zisi zilipenzezye zintu zyabuyo.
Nkaambo nyika iyoozula luzibo lwabulemu bwa-Jehova, mbubonya mbuli maanzi mbwaazuzya lwizi.
Maawe kuliyooyo uunywisya mweenzinyina mucinywido cabukali bwakwe akumukozya, kuti aebele cintanda cakwe,
Vakuta bweeme, tokuti bulemu pe. Konywa ayebo, uvumbulwidwe lulomo. Inkomeki yamujanza lyalulyo lya-Jehova iyookusandukila, elyo abulemu bwako buyoovumbwa abweeme.
Nkaambo lunyonyooko lwaku-Libano luyoo-kuvumba, akunyonyoona kwabanyama kuyookuyoosya, nkaambo kabulowa bwabantu alunyonyooko lucitilwa nyika, lucitilwa munzi aboonse bali mulinguwo.
Cili amilimonzi cikozyano cibe zed we, mubezi naamana kucibeza? Cili amilimonzi cikozyano cifulidwe ciisya zibejo? Sikucibumba acisyome buti? Ulapanga zikozyano buyo zitaambi.
Maawe kuliyooyo uuambila cisamu kuti, Nyamuka, akwaambila ibbwe litaambi kuti, Buka. Sa eci cilaiisya? Cilivumbidwe ingolida ansiliva; taakwe kuyooya abuniini mukati kaco.
Pele Jehova mwaali muntempele yakwe iisalala. Umuna kubusyu bwakwe, O nyika yoonse.
Nceeci cikombyo ca-Habakuku musinsimi. Ncakwiimba a-Sigionoto.
Jehova, ndimvwide impuwo yako, ndiyoowede.
O Jehova, busya milimo yako mukati kamyaka.
Mukati kamyaka uizibisye.
Mukunyema kwako utalubi luzyalo.
Leza wazwa ku-Temani.
Uusalala wazwa kucilundu ca-Parana. (Sela)
Bulemu bwakwe bwavumba ijulu lyoonse,
Ayalo nyika yalizwide kutembaulwa kwakwe.
Kumweka kwakwe kwakali mbuli mumuni,
Kali amitungazuba iizwa kubbazu lyakwe,
Nkukonya oko inguzu zyakwe nkuzyakayubide.
Bulwazi bulamusololela,
Amulilo uutenta ulamutobela kusule.
Wakabona, wakatanda masi.
Zilundu ziteeli zyakamwaika,
Mapili aaciindi akakotama. Inzila zyakwe nzezyaciindi.
Ndakabona zilao zya-Kusani zili mumapenzi.
Zi sani zyamatente aacisi ca-Midyani zilakankama,
Sa bukali bwako bwakali kumilonga?
Sa kunyema kwako kwakali kulwizi?
Tee ncico ncowakatantila ambizi zyako,
Ankoloyi zyako zyalufutuko?
Buta bwako bwakasupuka,
Ijwi ndowakakonkezezya mikowa lyakaba lyakusinizya. (Sela)
Nyika wakaipanduzya milonga.
Malundu akakubona, akapengesya.
Izambangulwe lyamaanzi lyakainda.
Intinti yakalizya ijwi lyayo,
Akusumpula maanza aayo.
Izuba amwezi, zyoonse zyakaima nkuzikede,
Nizyakabona mumuni wamivwi yako ileenda,
Akumweka kwasumo lyako libeka-beka.
Wakalyataula zisi cakunyema.
Kuyoofutula munanike wako.
Wakapwaya mutwe muŋanda yabasizibi,
Wakavumbulula zitalisyo akusikila kunsingo. (Sela)
Watuluzya masumo mitwe yabasilumamba bakwe,
Bakeza mbuli kambizi kuzoondimwaya.
Kulya batengwana kumbali nkokwakababotela.
Mabbiza aako wakaalyatauzya lwizi,
Ibbonze lyamaanzi manji.
Nindakamvwa, mala aangu akali kukankama.
Milomo yangu yakabwibwima kujwi lyao.
Bubole bwakandinjilila muzifuwa.
Ndakakankama mpondakabede.
Ndakalindila buzuba bwamapenzi,
Buti sikile bantu babasaala.
Amumisaansa tamukwe micelo,
Micelo yamaolifa tiibonwi,
Amyuunda tiijisi zilyo,
Imbelele zyamana mubbondo,
Amucimpati tamukwe iŋombe,
Noocikondwa muli-Leza walufutuko lwangu.
Ulaubya maulu aangu mbuli insya,
Ulandeenzya amasena aakujulu,
(Olu lwiimbo ndwasikwiimba mupati, aimbye zilizyo zyatukole.)
