Nzoomaninizya zintu zyoonse zyaansi, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nzoomaninizya bantu abanyama, nzoomaninizya bayuni bakujulu answi zyamulwizi, azilebyo zyabasizibi, nkabela nzoonyonyoona bantu boonse bakede anyika, mbwaamba Jehova.
Alimwi nzootandabika maanza aangu cakupenzya Juda abantu boonse bakede mu-Jerusalemu, elyo nzoonyonyoona mubusena obuno boonse ba-Baala basyeede azina lyaba-Kemari abapaizi,
abaabo bakomba makamu makamu aakujulu atala amaanda, abaabo bakomba cakukonkezya Jehova akukonkezya mwami wabo,
abaabo baleka kutobela Jehova, abaabo batana kuyandaula Jehova nanka kumulangaula.
Amuumune kubusyu bwa-Mwami Jehova, nkaambo buzuba bwaJehova buli kufwaafwi. Jehova ulibambide cipaizyo cakwe akusalazya batambe bakwe.
Nkabela mubuzuba bwacipaizyo ca-Jehova njoouma bapati abana bamwami aboonse basamide zyakusama zyeenzu.
Alimwi mubuzuba obo njoouma boonse basotokela kumanjililo akuzuzya maanda aabasimalelo babo lunya abubeji.
Amuwuule nyoonse nomukede mu-Maketesi, nkaambo bantu boonse basambazi banyonyooka, boonse balemedwe mali balikoswedwe.
Imbono zyabo ziyoosaalwa, amaanda aabo ayoonyonyoonwa. Bayooyaka maanda pele tabakooyookala mulingao, bayoobyala myuunda yamasaansa pele tabakooyoonywa waini wayo.
Buzuba obo mbuzuba bwabukali, mbuzuba bwamapenzi abwamafwabi, mbuzuba bwalupyopyongano abwalupilingano, mbuzuba bwamudima abwakusiya, mbuzuba bwamayoba busiya mbi.
Mbuzuba bwamweembo abwakoongolola bwakulwisya minzi iizyungulukidwe lubaya amayake manzomwa malamfu.
Nkabela njoopenzya bantu, elyo bayooenda mbuli boofu, nkaambo babisizya Jehova. Bulowa bwabo buyootika mbuli lusuko anyama yabo mbuli bufumba.
Ingolida yabo ansiliva yabo zyoonse zilakacilwa kubavuna mubuzuba bwabukali bwa-Jehova. Inyika yoonse iyooligwa mumulilo wabbivwe lyakwe, nkaambo uyooyoosya akumanizya boonse bakede munyika.
mulazyo notana kuzyala, buzuba nibutana kumwaika mbuli buungu, bukali bupati bwa-Jehova nibutana kumusikila, buzuba bwakunyema kwa-Jehova nibutana kumusikila.
Amuyandaule Jehova, nyoonse nobabombede baansi nomubambide imbeta zyakwe. Amuyandaule bululami, amuyandaule lubombo, elyo ambweni muyoosiswa mubuzuba bwabukali bwaJehova.
Maawe kubantu bakede kunkomwe yalwizi, cisi caba-Kereti! Ijwi lyaJehova ndyakumulwisya, O Kanana, nyika yaba-Filisti. Njookunyonyoona, kutasyaali naba omwe uukede mulinduwe.
Inkomwe yalwizi iyooba macelelo iili azilao zyabeembezi amatanga aambelele,
Inkomwe iyooba yabaabo basyeede bamukowa wa-Juda, nkabela bayooembelela nkuko, bayoolala masiku mumaanda aa-Asikeloni, nkaambo Jehova Leza wabo uzoobaswaya akulesya buzike bwabo.

Nkaambo kako, mbundi muumi, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu Leza wa-Israyeli, ncobeni Moabu uyooba mbuli Sodoma, abana ba-Amoni bayooba mbuli Gomora, itongo limenedwe mituntulwa, iizwide malindi aamunyo, iitakedwe lyoonse. Bantu bangu basyeede bayoobasaala, cisi cangu cisyeede ciyoobavuba.
Mbuboobu mbubati bweedezegwe milandu yabo, nkaambo basampaula akulisumpula kubantu ba-Jehova wamakamu.
Jehova ulabayoosya, nkaambo wakotezya mizimu yoonse yaansi, kuti bantu bamukombe, boonse mpobabede, atusuwa toonse twabamasi.
Akwalo kunyika uyootambika ijanza lyakwe akunyonyoona Asuri, nkabela uyoocita kuti Nineve ube itongo, akuyuma mbuli inkanda.
Matanga ayoolala mulinguwo, banyama boonse babamasi. Basifundwe anungu ziyookala amisemu yawo. Insinsini ziyoolila muzipulo zyawo, abacikwangala bayookala amilyango yawo.

Ngooyu munzi iwakali kusekelela, iwakakede cakutapenga, iwakali kwaamba mumoyo wawo kuti, Mebo mpendi, taakwe umbi, Ma! Sunu waba itongo, cilalilo cabanyama. Boonse bainda balauwela akuminza amaanza aabo.
Maawe kuliyooyo uusampaula, uusofweede, munzi uukataazya.
Teewakaswiilila ijwi, teewakazuminina lucenjezyo, teewakasyoma Jehova, teewakaswenenena kuli-Leza wawo.
Bami bakwe bakede mulinguwe mbalavu bavuluma, Babetesi bakwe mbaumpe bamasiku balya akutasia cintu niciba ciniini mane bukace.
Basinsimi bakwe mbantu babuyo batasyomeki. Bapaizi bakwe bala sofwaazya zisalala akutyola mulao.
Jehova uukede mulinguwe uliluleme, taciti zibi abuniini pe. Zifumo zyoonse ulabonya bululami bwakwe, taleki pe. Pele muntu sizibi tausi insoni pe.
Ndakosola zisi, azilwanino zyazyo zyaba matongo. Ndasaala migwagwa yazyo, taakwe uuenda mulinjiyo. Minzi yazyo yanyonyooka, tamucikwe muntu uukede mumo.
Ndakaamba kuti, Ncobeni ulandiyoowa, ulaleka kubisya mbwaakomwa; takooluba makani oonse ngendamulailila. Nekubaboobo bakaindilila loko kubisya muncito zyabo.
Kuciindi eco njoosandula mwaambo wabantu akubapa mwaambo uusalala, kuti boonse bakwiilile izina lya-Jehova akumumanina milimo camoyo woonse,
Kuzwa kule kwiinda milonga ya-Etiopiya, basikundikomba, bana babantu bangu bamwaikide, bazooleta zipaizyo zyangu.
nkaambo njoosia akati kanu bantu babombe batontola, Bayooyandaula macijilo muzina lya-Jehova,
boonse basyeede mucisi ca-Israyeli, Tabakooyoobisya nikuba kwaamba cakubeja, alulimi lwakweena talukooyoojanwa mukanwa lyabo, Nkaambo bayoolala mumacelelo aamweemvwe, alimwi taakwe uuyoobayoosya.
Jehova walobya imbeta izyakamupa mulandu, watandanya basinkondonyoko. Mwami wa-Israyeli, ngu-Jehova, mpali akati kanu, tamukooyooyoowa bubi limbi pe.
Mubuzuba obo Jerusalemu ulaambilwa kuti, Utayoowi, O Zioni. Maanza aako atabombi.
Jehova Leza wanu mpali akati kanu, ngusilumamba uumuzundya. Ulamusekelela cakukondwa, ulamulengulula muluyando lwakwe, akumukondelelwa cakwiimba,
mbubonya mbukwiimbwa buzuba bwapobwe. Njoomugwisizya mapenzi, kuti mutasampaulwi nkaambo kangao.
Lino kuciindi eco njoobalesya basikumupenzya. Njoofutula balema, njooboozya batandidwe, akusandula buusu bwabo, balumbwe akutembaulwa munyika yoonse,

Kuciindi eco njoomuboozya kulindinywe akumubunganya antoomwe. Ncobeni njoocita kuti mulemekwe akulumbaizigwa akati kamisyobo yoonse yaansi ciindi eco ncinjoomuboozezya coolwe canu kumeso aanu, mbwaamba Jehova.
Wakati, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Aba bantu balaamba kuti ciindi cakuyakulula iŋanda ya-Jehova tacina kusika.
Sa casika ciindi canu cakukala mumaanda aavumbidwe kabotu, nekuba kuti iŋanda eyi icimwaikide?
Lino mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, Amuyeeye makani aamusikila.

Mwabyala cakuvuzya, pele mwatebula zice buyo. Kulya mwalya pele tamukuti pe. Kunywa mwanywa pele tamuzulili. Kusama mulasama pele taakwe uukasaalilwa, ayooyo uuvola mali ulaabika munkomo iili azimanga.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Amuyeeye makani ngemwasikilwa.
Amunyamuke muye mumalundu, mukalete ziyako zyakuyasya iŋanda, kuti njane lukondo mulinjiyo akulibonya mumonya mubulemu bwangu, mbwaamba Jehova.

Mwakali kulangila zinji, pele mwajana tuniini buyo, alimwi nimwakatuleta kumaanda ndakatufula amoya, Nkaambonzi? mbwaabuzya Jehova wamakamu. Nkaambo kaŋanda yangu iicimwaikide nomubeleka milimo yamaanda aanu nubeni.
Nciceeco makumbi aakujulu ncaamukasizya mume, ayalo nyika yakaka kweezya micelo.
Alimwi ndaleta cilanga munyika amuzilundu zyoonse, ndabuzya maila awaini amafuta amicelo yoonse iizwa muvu, ndakataazya bantu aŋombe zyoonse amilimo yabo yoonse.
Elyo Hagai mutumwa wa-Jehova wakaambila bantu majwi aa-Jehova. Wakati, Ndi anywebo, mbwaamba Jehova.

Nkabela Jehova wakabusya moyo wa-Zerubabeli mwana wa-Sealitiyeli mweendelezi wa-Juda, amoyo wa-Joshua mwana wa-Jehozadaki mupaizi mupati, amyoyo yabantu boonse basyeede, aboobo bakeza kuzoobeleka milimo yaŋanda ya-Jehova wamakamu Leza wabo,
mubuzuba bwamakumi obile aane bwamwezi mumwezi wamusanu aumwi.
Mumwaka wabili wamwami Dariyo, mumwezi wamusanu aibili, mubuzuba bwamakumi obile abumwi bwamwezi, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kumulomo wa-Hagai musinsimi.
Wakaambilwa kuti, Ambila Zerubabeli mwana wa-Sealitiyeli mweendelezi wa-Juda, a-Joshua mwana wa-Jehozadaki mupaizi mupati, abantu boonse basyeede, kuti,
Nguni uusyeede akati kanu iwakabona iŋanda eyi mubulemu bwayo bwakutaanguna? Lino sunu ilaboneka buti? Sa taiboneki mumeso aanu mbuli cintu buyo na?

Nekubaboobo koyumya moyo wako, O Zerubabeli, mbwaamba Jehova. Koyumya moyo wako, O Joshua mwana wa-Jehozadaki mupaizi mupati. Anywebo amuyumye myoyo yanu, nubantu boonse bacisi, mbwaamba Jehova, Amubeleke, nkaambo ndi anywebo, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu,
mbubonya mbuli zisyomezyo zyangu nzindakamusyomezya kuciindi eco ncimwakazwa mu-Egepita, Muuya wangu ulikede akati kanu. Mutayoowi pe,
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Kusyeede kaindi kaniini buyo, elyo njoozungaanya ijulu anyika alwizi ansi injumu.
Njoozungaanya zisi zyoonse, kuti zintu ziyandisi zyazisi zyoonse ziboole, elyo njoozuzya hjanda eyi bulemu, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Insiliva njiyangu, ayalo ingolida njiyangu, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Bulemu busyaalizi bwaŋanda eyi buyooba bupati kwiinda bwakutaanguna, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, alimwi kubusena obuno njoopa luumuno, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Mubuzuba bwamakumi obile aane mumwezi wamusanu aine mumwaka wabili wamwami Dariyo ijwi lya-Jehova lyakaboola kumulomo wa-Hagai musinsimi, lyakati,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Buzya bapaizi mubuzyo oyu wamulao.
Na muntu ulabweza nyama iisalala munkomo yacikobela cakwe, alimwi ulagumya inkomo yakwe cinkwa na musinza na waini na mafuta niciba cilyo cimwi, sa cilasalala? Bapaizi bakavuwa kuti, Tacisalali pe,
Elyo Hagai wakabuzya kuti, Pele na muntu ulisofweede nkaambo kakuguma mutunta, alimwi ulagumya cintu cili boobo, sa cilasofwaala? Bapaizi bakavuwa kuti, Ncobeni cilasofwaala,
Mpawo Hagai wakati, Mbubonya obo mbucibede akubantu aba akucisi eci cili kubusyu bwangu, mbwaamba Jehova. Mbwiibede amilimo yoonse yamaanza aabo, acoonse ncibatuula cilisofweede.
Lino amuyeeye citi kabe kuzwa kubuzuba obuno akuya kunembo. Kuciindi eco nikwakatalina kubikwa ibbwe niliba limwi alyeenzinyina muntempele ya-Jehova, mwakasikilwa nzi?
Muntu naalangila insuwo zyamaila zili makumi obile, kwakajanwa insuwo zili ikumi buyo. Muntu naakasika kudindi lyawaini kuti ateke nongo zili makumi osanwe, kwakajanwa makumi obile luzutu.
Ndakamuumya, amicelo yoonse yamilimo yanu ndakaiumya, kwiibuka andyomba acivulamabwe. Nekubaboobo teemwakaboola kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova.

Lino amuyeeye makani kuzwa kubuzuba obuno akumazuba aaciza, nkukuti kuzwa kubuzuba bwamakumi obile aane bwamwezi wamusanu aine. Amuyeeye makani mbwaakaba kuzwa kubuzuba obo intalisyo yantempele ya-Jehova niyakabikwa.
Sa imbuto muzicili mubutala P Sa musaansa amukuyu apomegranite aolifa icibula kweezya? Pele kuzwa kubuzuba obuno njoomupa coolwe,
Nkabela ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasika kuli-Hagai alwabili mubuzuba obo bwamakumi obile aane bwamwezi.
Lyakati, Ambila Zerubabeli mweendelezi wa-Juda kuti, Ndaamba kuzungaanya ijulu anyika,
akulobya bwami bwazisi. Njoonyonyoona inguzu zyamami aamisyobo yabantu, njoolobya inkalaki abasikutanta nzizyo, azyalo imbizi abasikuzitanta bayoojayigwa umwi aumwi apanga lyamweenzinyina.

Pele mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, njookubweza O Zerubabeli mwana waSealitiyeli mulanda wangu, mbwaamba Jehova, kuti ube mbubonya mbuli inweenwe yangu, nkaambo ndikusalide, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Jehova wakabakalalila loko bamauso.
Nkaambo kako kobaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Amuboole kulindime, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, lino ambebo njooboola kulindinywe, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.

Mutakozyani abamauso pe, nkaambo basinsimi baciindi bakaboongolweda kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, Amupiluke kuzwa kunzila zyanu zyabubi akuleka milimo yanu mibi. Nekubaboobo teebakamvwa, teebakandibikila myoyo yabo, mbwaamba Jehova.
Ino bamauso banu bali kuli? Abalo basinsimi sa balakalilila akutamani?

Pele majwi aangu amilazyo yangu njindakalailila balanda bangu basinsimi, sa teeyakeenzya bamauso banu na? Elyo bakeempwa akwaamba kuti, Jehova wamakamu mbuli mbwaakakanza kutucitila nkaambo kanzila zyesu ancito zyesu, watucitila mbubonya obo ncobeni.

Mubuzuba bwamakumi obile aane, mumwezi wakumi aumwi, nkukuti mwezi wa-Syebati, mumwaka wabili wa-Dariyo, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila Zekariya, mwana wa-Berekiya, mwana wa-Ido, musinsimi. Elyo Zekariya wakati,
Ndakabona masiku muntu uutantide imbizi iisalala. Wakaliimvwi akati kamisamu mumumpata, alimwi musule lyakwe kakuli imbizi zisalala ambizi zyamandondo ambizi zituba.
Lino ndakabuzya kuti, Ino ezi nzinzi, mwami? Nkabela angelo ngundakali kwaambaula awe wakati, Ndakutondezya mbuzibede.
Elyo oyo muntu iwakaimvwi akati kamisamu wakavuwa kuti, Nzeezi Jehova nzyaatuma kuya bulingula nyika.
Mpawo bakavwiila angelo wa-Jehova iwakaimvwi akati kamisamu kuti, Twamana kuya bulingula nyika, nkabela nyika yoonse ilitontwede.
Elyo angelo wa-Jehova wakati, O Jehova wamakamu, ulaleka lili kukaka kubafwida luzyalo, ba-Jerusalemu aminzi ya-Juda, mbokalalila myaka eyi yoonse iili makumi aali musanu aabili?
Mpawo Jehova wakatyaba angelo ngundakaambaula awe majwi aaluzyalo aakuumbulizya.
Lino angelo ogundakaambaula awe wakandaambila kuti, Ongolola kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Ndasungwaalila loko Jerusalemu a-Zioni,
Abantu bamasi bakede cakuliiba ndabakalalila loko, nkaambo mebo ndakanyema buniini buyo pele balo bakavuzya mapenzi.
Nkaambo kako mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Ndaboola ku-Jerusalemu caluzyalo. Iŋanda­ yangu iti yakwe mumonya, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, antambo yakweelesya iyootandabikwa ku-Jerusalemu.
Ongolola alimwi kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Minzi yangu iyooatisigwa coolwe, nkabela Jehova ulaboola alimwi kuzooumbulizya Zioni akusala alimwi Jerusalemu.
Elyo nindakatambya meso aangu, ndakabona meja one.
Lino ndakabuzya angelo ngundakali kwaambaula awe kuti, Ino ezi ninzi? Wakandivwiila kuti, Ngengawo meja aakamwaisya Juda a-Israyeli a-Jerusalemu.
Mpawo Jehova wakanditondezya bafuzi bone.

Nkabela ndakabuzya kuti, Ino aba baza kukucita nzi? Wakavuwa kuti, Aya meja ngaakamwaisya Juda akucita kuti katakwe muntu uubusya mutwe wakwe, lino aba bafuzi beza kuzooyoosya bantu. Beza kuzootambisya meja aazisi izyakasumpula meja aazyo kukulwisya nyika ya-Juda akwiimwaisya.
Ndakamubuzya kuti, Ino uya kuli? Wakati, Ndaya kukweeleka Jerusalemu, tubone bwaamba bwawo mbububede abulamfu bwawo mbububede.
Mpawo angelo ngundakali kwaambaula awe wakanyamuka, aumwi angelo wakeza kuzoomucinga,
wakamwaambila kuti, Cijaana, ukaambile mukubusi oyo kuti, Jerusalemu uyookalwa mbubonya mbuli minzi iitazyungulukidwe malambo, nkaambo kabunji bwabantu abwaŋombe mulinguwo.
Nkaambo mebo njoomubeda mbuli bulambo bwamulilo bwakumuzyunguluka mbwaamba Jehova, alimwi njooba bulemu mulinguwe.
Ehe! Amucijile ku-Zioni, inywe nomukede amwana musimbi wa-Babuloni.
Nkaambo mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu iwakandituma. Ulaambila masi aakamusaala, Nkaambo woonse uumuguma ulaguma imboni yaliso lyakwe,
Wati, Amubone! Njoozungaanya ijanza lyangu kulimbabo, nkabela bayoosaalwa kumaanza aabantu mbabonya ibakataanguna kubabelekela. Elyo muyooziba ncobeni kuti Jehova wamakamu nguwakandituma,
Imba akusekelela, O mwana musimbi wa-Zioni, nkaambo mebo ndeza kuzookala mulinduwe, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo bantu bamisyobo minji bayooliswananya a-Jehova, bayooba bantu bangu, alimwi njookala akati kanu. Mpawo muyooziba kuti Jehova wamakamu nguwakandituma kulindinywe.
Jehova ulakona Juda, cibe caabilo cakwe munyika iisalala, nkabela uyoosala lubbo Jerusalemu.
Mpawo Jehova wakaambila Saatani kuti, Jehova akutapatile, O Saatani. Jehova iwakasala Jerusalemu akutapatile. Sa oyu teensi cisisi cagwisigwa mumulilo na?
Lino Joshua naakaimvwi kubusyu bwaangelo kasamide zikobela zyamatombe.
Elyo angelo wakaambila abo mbaakaimvwi abo kuti, Amumusamunune zikobela ezi zyamatombe. Mpawo wakaambila Joshua kuti, Bona! ndakugwisizya milandu yako. Njookusamika zyakusama zibotu zyeebesi.
Lino ndakati, Bamusamike citambala cisalala cisambide amutwe wakwe, Nkabela bakamusamika citambala cisambide amutwe, akumusamika zikobela, angelo wa-Jehova naakaimvwi nku ko,
Elyo angelo wa-Jehova wakalwiida Joshua kuti,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Na uende munzi la zyangu akubamba imbeta zyangu, uyooendelezya iŋanda yangu akuba abwami munkuta zyangu, alimwi njookuzumizya kunjila akati kabaaba baimvwi ano,
Lino swiilila, o Joshua mupaizi mupati, webo abazwalani bako bakede kubusyu bwako. Inywe muli zitondezyo zyakutondezya kuti ndaamba kusisya mulanda wangu Mutabi.

Nkaambo mpoonya awo abbwe ndindabika kumeso aa-Joshua, ibbwe lyomwe lijisi mabazu aali musanu aabili, njoolemba bulembo, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, Nkabela njoogwisya milandu yanyika eyi mubuzuba bomwe buyo.
Mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, nyoonse muyootambana, umwi aumwi mweenzinyina, mucisiko camusaansa wakwe acamukuyu wakwe.

Wakandibuzya kuti, Ncinzi ncobona? Ndakavuwa kuti, Ndabona cibikilo calampi cangolida, cili amugano kujulu, alimwi cili amalampi aali musanu aabili, nkabela ilampi limwi alimwi lilijisi milomo iili musanu aibili kujulu.
Alimwi kuli misamu yaolifa yobile kumbali ancico, umwi kululyo lwamugaano, umwi kulumwensi lwamugaano.
Mpawo ndakabuzya angelo ngutwakali kwaambaula awe kuti, Ino ezi nzinzi, mwami?
Angelo ngundakali kwaambaula awe wakati, Sa tozizi ezi? Ndakati, Pe, mwami.
Elyo wakandaambila kuti, Ngaaya majwi aa-Jehova ngaambila Zerubabeli. Cintu cipati teensi inguzu, teensi bukozu, ngu-Muuya wangu, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Nduweni, O cilundu cipati? Kubusyu bwa-Zerubabeli uyooba ibanda buyo. Nkabela ibbwe lyakumpela uyoolikazika, bantu niboongolola kuti, Cabota! Cabota!
Alimwi ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, lyakati,
Maanza aaZerubabeli ngaakabika intalisyo yaŋanda eyi, Maanza aakwe ngaonya ngaati imanisye. Mbumuzooziba kuti Jehova wamakamu nguwakandituma kulindinywe,
Nkaambo boonse ibakasampaula buzuba bwamakani maniini, bayoosekelela nibayoobona cipimyo mujanza lya-Zerubabeli.
Ngaaya meso aali musanu aabili aa-Jehova aaya bulanga nyika yoonse,
Mpawo ndakamubuzya kuti, Eyi misamu yobile yaolifa njanzi, umwi kululyo aumwi kulumwensi lwacibikilo calampi?
Alimwi ndakamubuzya lwabili kuti, Njenzi eyi mitabi yobile yamaolifa iili kumbali lyamatililo obile aangolida aatila mafuta.
Wakandaambila kuti, Sa tozizi ezi? Ndakati, Nsizi, mwami.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, Aba mbana bobile batilidwe mafuta baimvwi kubusyu bwamwami wanyika yoonse.
Lino nindakaboola kutambya meso aangu, ndakabona ibbuku liya buuluka,
Nkabela wakandibuzya kuti, Ncinzi nciwabona? Ndakati, Ndabona ibbuku liya buuluka. Bulamfu bwalya buleelene atukokola tuli makumi obile, abwaamba bwalye buleelene atukokola tuli ikumi,

Lino wakandaambila kuti, Olu ndutuko lumwaikide atala anyika yoonse. Nkaambo umwi aumwi uubba kuzwa sunu uyoonyonyoonwa mbubonya mbuluamba, nkabela umwi aumwi uukonka cakubeja kuzwa sunu uyoonyonyooka mbubonya mbuluamba.
Njoolutuma mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, kuti lunjile muŋanda yamubbi, amuŋanda yayooyo uukonka cakubeja muzina lyangu, nkabela luyookala omo muŋanda akwiitenta yoonse, ziyako amabwe aayo oonse.
Elyo angelo ngu ndakali kwaambaula awe wakaza, wandaambila kuti, Tambya meso aako, ubone na eci cilibonya ncinzi.
Ndakabuzya kuti, Ncinzi? Wakati, Oyu ngumungomo uuzwa, Alimwi wakati, Mbobubi bwanyika yoonse.
Elyo civunisyo cabutale cakajaluka, nkabela mukati kamungomo mwakabonwa mwanakazi ulikede.
Mpawo wakati, Oyu nzezibi. Nkabela wakamutontela mukati kamungomo akujalisya civunisyo cabutale amulomo wawo.
Elyo nindakatambya meso aangu ndakabona banakazi bobile balaza, amuuwo mumababa aabo. Kabajisi mababa mbuli mababa aamatongola. Lino bakanyamuna mungomo kusikila akatikati kajulu anyika,
Mpawo ndakabuzya angelo ngundakali kwaambaula awe kuti, Ino bautola kuli mungomo?
Wakati, Bayoouyakila iŋanda mucisi ca-Sinara, Yamana buyo kubambwa, bayootula mungomo mpoonya awo.
Lino ndakaboola alimwi kutambya meso aangu, nkabela ndakabona inkalaki zyone zilazwa akatikati kamalundu obile, Malundu ayo kaali malundu aamukuba.
Inkalaki intaanzi kiijisi imbizi zisalala, iyabili kiijisi imbizi zisia,
iyatatu kiijisi imbizi zituba, ayane kiijisi imbizi zili amabala mabala,
Mpawo ndakabuzya angelo ngundakali kwaambaula awe kuti, Ino ezi nzinzi, mwami?
Angelo wakandivwiila kuti, Eyi myuuwo yone yakujulu iizwa kukwiimika kubusyu bwamwami wanyika yoonse.
Inkalaki iijisi imbizi zisia ilaya kucisi cakunyika, iijisi imbizi zituba ilaya kumbo, iijisi imbizi zyamabala mabala ilaya kucisi cakumusanza,
Elyo imbizi nizyakazwa zyakali kuyandisya kuya bweendeenda moonse muzisi zyanyika, nkabela wakati, Kamuya bweendeenda munyika, Mpawo bakeendeenda moonse munyika,
Nkabela wakandikwiilila akwaamba kuti, Ezyo izyaya kucisi cakunyika ncobeni zyatontozya moyo wangu omo mucisi cakunyika.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakandisikila, lyakati,
Tola aba bantu ibasika kuzwa kubuzike bwaku-Babuloni, Heldai a-Tobiya a-Jedaya, uinke abo buzuba obu mbubonya kuŋanda ya-Josiya mwana wa-Zefaniya.
Alimwi bweza insiliva angolida, ukafule musini, akuubika amutwe wa-Joshua mwana wa-Jehozadaki mupaizi mupati.
Elyo uleelede kumwaambila kuti, Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Bona! Oyu ngomuntu uutegwa lusyuuko, nkaambo ngonguwe uuti syuuke mubusena bwakwe, nkabela uyooyaka intempele ya-Jehova,

Ncobeni nguwe uuti yake intempele ya-Jehova, alimwi uyooba abulemu, uyookala akweendelezya acuuno cakwe cabwami. Nkabela kumbali lyacuuno cakwe cabwami kuyooba mupaizi. Bayoomvwana caluumuno boonse bobile.
Lino musini uyooba muntempele ya-Jehova, ube ciibalusyo kuli-Heldai a-Tobiya a-Jedaya a-Josiya mwana wa-Zefaniya.
Lino mumwaka wane wamwami Dariyo, ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila Zekariya, mubuzuba bwane bwamwezi wamusanu aine, nkukuti mwezi wa-Kisilevi.
Bantu ba-Beteli bakalitumide Syarezeri a-Regemeleki abantu bakwe kuti bakatontozye busyu bwa-Jehova,
akubuzya bapaizi bamuŋanda ya-Jehova wamakamu abasinsimi kuti, Sa tuleelede kulila akuliimya kulya mumwezi wasanu, mbubonya mbutwakali kucita myaka minji yakamana?
Mpawo ijwi lya-Jehova wamakamu lyakandisikila, lyakati,

Ambila bantu boonse banyika abapaizi kuti, Ciindi eco nimwakali kuliimya kulya akulila mumwezi wasanu amumwezi wamusanu aibili, eyi myaka yoonse iili makumi aali musanu aabili, sa ncobeni nkaambo kangu ncimwakali­ kuliimya kulya?
Alimwi nimulya akunywa, teensi ndinywe nubeni nimulilida animulinywida?

Sa aya teensi majwi Jehova ngaakaamba kumulomo wabasinsimi baciindi, Jerusalemu nuukacikedwe bantu akukala caluumuno, aminzi yawo iizyungulukide, anyika yakumusanza acisi catulundulundu zyoonse zyakalikedwe bantu?
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova lyakasikila Zekariya, lyakati,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Amubeteke imbeta zyabuswini. Amucitile umwi aumwi mweenzinyina luse aluzyalo.
Mutapenzyi banabutema abamusyaala amweenzu abatengwana. Kutabi uukanza mumoyo wakwe kucitila mweenzinyina bubi,
Pele bakakaka kuswiilila, bakamufutatila cakukataazya, akuyumya matwi aabo kuti bataswiilili.

Myoyo yabo bakaiyumya mbuli ibbwe liyuma nta, kuti bataswiilili mulao amajwi Jehova wamakamu ngaakatuma kunguzu zyamuuya wakwe kumilomo yabasinsimi baciindi. Nkaambo kako kwakabuka bukali bupati kuzwa kuli-Jehova wamakamu.
Lino mbubonya mbundakaita mebo pele teebakamvwa, bayooita abalo pele nsikooyoobamvwa, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Nkabela ndakabamwaisya akambizi akati kamisyobo yoonse yabantu njibatezi. Aboobo nyika yakaba matongo buyo, katakwe muntu iwakali kweendeenda nanka kukala mulinjiyo. Nyika imbotu bakainyonyoona buyo.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova wamakamu lyakasika, lyakati,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Ndasungwaalila Zioni busungu bupati. Ndamusungwaalila cakukalala loko.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova. Njooboola ku-Zioni akukala mukati ka-Jerusalemu, nkabela Jerusalemu uyooambwa kuti munzi wabuswini, cilundu ca-Jehova wamakamu, cilundu cisalala,
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Kuyooba limbi banene abacembele bakala mumigwagwa ya-Jerusalemu, umwi aumwi uyoojata mufunko mujanza lyakwe nkaambo kakucembaala.
Alimwi migwagwa yamunzi iyoozula balombe abasimbi basebana mulinjiyo.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Na eci cilagambya mumeso aabantu basyeede kumazuba ano, sa nkukwaamba kuti cilagambya mumeso aangu? mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Nzoofutula bantu bangu bamunyika yakujwe abamunyika yakumbo.
Lino njoobaleta kuti bakale mu-Jerusalemu, nkabela bayooba bantu bangu, ambebo njooba Leza wabo, mubuswini amubululami.

Nkaambo mumazuba aakamana katakwe cakuvola camuntu niciba cakuvola camunyama, aboonse ibakazwa muŋanda na kunjila muŋanda bakabula luumuno kulibasinkondo-nyina, nkaambo ndakalwanya umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina.
Lino nsikooyoocitila bantu aba basyeede mbuli mbundakacita mumazuba aakamana pe, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Nkaambo kuyoobyalwa imbuto yaluumuno, Musaansa uyooenzya micelo yawo, anyika iyooyungizya zilyo, amajulu ayoolosya lume, nkabela njooabila aba bantu basyeede zintu ezi zyoonse.
Lino mbuli mbumwakaba cisampauzyo akati kabamasi, luzubo lwa-Juda aluzubo lwa-Israyeli, lino njoomufutula kuti mube cilongezyo, Mutayoowi pe. Amuyumye maanza aanu.
lino mumazuba ano ndakanza kucitila Jerusalemu aluzubo lwa-Juda bubotu. Mutayoowi pe.
Nzeezi incito nzimweelede kucita, Amwaambe lusinizyo umwi aumwi kumweenzi nyina, Imbeta nzimubeteka kuminzi yanu zibe zyabuswini azyaluu-muno.
Mutayeeyi bubi umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina mumyoyo yanu, alimwi mutayandi zikonkezyo zyakubeja. Nkaambo nzezintu ezi nzensulide, mbwaamba Jehova.
Lino ijwi lya-Jehova wamakamu lyakandisikila, lyakati,

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Kuliimya kwamwezi wane, akuliimya kwamwezi wasanu, akuliimya kwamwezi wamusanu aibili, akuliimya kwamwezi wakumi, zyoonse ziyoobeda luzubo lwa-Juda ziindi zyakukondwa akusekelela amapobwe mabotu. Lino amuyandisye buswini aluumuno.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Kuyoosika misyobo misyobo abantu baminzi minji.
Bantu bamunzi umwi bayootamba beenzinyina bakumunzi umbi kuti, Katuya tukatontozye busyu bwa-Jehova, akuyandaula Jehova wamakamu. Atweende anywe toonse.
Elyo misyobo minji anzubo ziyumu ziyooboola kukuyandaula Jehova wamakamu muJerusalemu akukutontozya busyu bwa-Jehova.

Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Mumazuba ayo bantu bali ikumi bazwa kumisyobo yoonse akumyaambo yoonse bayoojata cikobela camuntu mu-Juda, bayooti, Atweende anywebo, nkaambo twamvwa kuti Leza mpali akati kanu.
Awalo munzi wa-Hamati uubambene anjiyo, a-Turo a-Sidoni, nekuba kuti iili abusongo bunji.
Turo waliyakila cicijilo ciyumu, alimwi walundika insiliva mbuli bulongo angolida mbuli matombe aamumigwagwa.
Pele Mwami uyoomunyanga akuwaala imbono zyakwe zyoonse mubbonze lyamaanzi, nkabela uyootentwa amulilo.
Asikaloni uyoobona akuyoowa, awalo Gaza uyoonyongana loko, awalo Ekroni nkaambo kakuti wasyomononwa. Mwami uyoonyonyooka ku-Gaza, a-Asikaloni uyoobula kukalwa.
Mu-Asidodi muyookala bantu bavwelene, alimwi njoomanya kami-kami ka-Filistiya.
Njoomugwisizya bulowa kumulomo wakwe, amasesemyo aali akati kameno aakwe. Uyoosyaalila Leza wesu, uyooba mbuli mukowa mu-Juda awalo Ekroni uyooba mbuli ba-Jebusi.
Lino njookala aŋanda yangu mbuli mulindizi, nkakasye bantu kwiinda nanka kuboola. Takukooyooba limbi sikupenzya uubalyata, nkaambo lino ndabona ameso aangu.

Njoolobya inkalaki ku-Efraimu ambizi ku-Jerusalemu. Buta bwalumamba buyoonyonyoonwa, nkabela uyooletela bamasi luumuno, Uyooba abwami muzisi zyoonse kuzwa kulwizi kusikila akulwizi lumbi, akuzwa kumulonga mupati akusikila kumagolelo aanyika.
Amuboole kumacijilo aanu, inywe nubaange balangila lufutuko, Sunu ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti njoomuboozezya kobile.

Nkaambo musyobo wa-Juda ndaupeta ube buta bwangu, aba-Efraimu baba mivwi yangu yakufusya buta. Njoovukauzya bana bako, O Zioni, cakulwisya bana bako, O cisi caba-Helene, Muyooba mbuli ipanga lyasilumamba.
Mpawo Jehova uyoolibonya akati kabo. Mivwi yakwe iyoozwa mbuli lulabi. Mwami Jehova uyoolizya mweembo ukuya bweenda mutumbizi twakumusanza.
Jehova wamakamu uyuoba intobo yabo. Bayoolya akulyataula basizifusyo, nkabela bulowa bwabo bayoobunywa mbuli waini. Bayoozula mbuli mutiba na mbuli zyooko zyacipaililo.
Mubuzuba obo Jehova Leza wabo uyoobavuna nkaambo nimbelele zyabantu bakwe. Bayoomweka anyika yakwe mbubonya mbuli mabwe amusini mweebesi.
Ma! Babota! Mbeebesi! Kuyooba maila aakubotya bakubusi, awaini wakubotya banakalindu.

Nkaambo zikozyano zyamizimu zilaamba zintu zyabuyo, azilengano nzibabona basondi nzyakubeja. Basikulota balaamba makani aatakwe milimo, amajwi aabo aakuumbulizya taagwasyi. Nciceeco bantu ncibaleela mbuli imbelele. Balasoweka nkaambo kakubula mweembeli,
Mulimbabo momuti zwe eooko, mulimbabo momuti zwe inembe yatente, mulimbabo momuti zwe buta bwankondo, mulimbabo momuti zwe beendelezi boonse.
Bayooba mbuli basilumamba bakozu balyataula basinkondonyina muntipa yamumigwagwa. Bayoolwisya, nkaambo Jehova uli abo, nkabela bayoozunda basikutanta imbizi.
Njooyumya luzubo lwa-Juda akufutula luzubo lwa-Josefa. Njoobaboozya, nkaambo ndabafwida luzyalo, elyo bayooba mbuli kuti teendakabasowede, nkaambo ndime Jehova Leza wabo, njoobavwiila.
Efraimu uyooba mbuli silumamba sintaze. Myoyo yabo iyookondwa mbubakondwa basikunywa waini. Bana babo bayoobona akusekelela. Myoyo yabo iyookonwa muli-Jehova,
Ndabamwaisya akati kazisi, nekubaboobo mumasena aasakene bayoondiibaluka, aboobo bayoopona abana babo akuboola.
Njoobaboozya kuzwa kucisi ca-Egepita akubayobolola kuzwa ku-Asuri. Njoobasisya kucisi ca-Gileadi aku-Lebano, mane bakaate,
Bayooinda mukati kalwizi lwaku-Egepita, pele mayuwe aalwizi ayoozundwa, amabonze aamu-Nile ayooyuminina. Kulisumpula kwaAsuri kuyoobombezegwa, ankoli yabwami yaku-Egepita iyoomana.
Njoobayumya munguzu zya-Jehova, azina lyakwe ndiliyoobeenzya, mbwaamba Jehova.
Jalula milyango yako, O Lebano, kuti mulilo ukatente misamu yako yakedari.
Kolila, O musamu wakupresi, nkaambo musamunyoko mukedari wawa. Misamu yabulemu yanyonyooka! Amulile numibanga yaku-Basani, nkaambo lusaka loonse lulitemedwe.
Amuswiilile beembeli mbubalila! Bulemu bwabo bwamana. Amuswiilile balavu mbubavuluma! Nkaambo iteu lyaku-Jordano lyanyonyooka.
Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova Leza wangu. Embela imbelele zm jayigwe.
Basikuzyuula balazijaya cakutapegwa milandu. Basikuzyuuzya balati, Jehova alumbwe, ndaba muvubil Basikuzyeembela tabazifwidi insoni pe.

Nkaambo bantu banyika ino nsikooyoobafwida limbi luzyalo, mbwaamba Tehova. Amubone! Njooaba bantu, umwi aumwi mumaanza aasikumweembelela, amumaanza aamwami wakwe. Bayoosaala nyika yoonse, nkabela nsikooyoobavuna mumaanza aabo pe.
Lino mumwezi omwe ndakalobya beembeli botatwe, Moyo wangu wakabakalalila, amyoyo yabo ayalo yakandisampaula.
Elyo ndaka ti, Nsikooba mweembeli wanu pe. Kufumbwa iifwa, ifwe, Kufumbwa iinyonyooka, inyonyooke. Azyalo zisyaala zilyane, imwi aimwi nyama yanyeenzinyina,
Mpawo ndakabweza musako wangu Buuya, ndautyola, kutondezya kuti ndatyola cizuminano cangu ncitutangene azisi zyoonse.
Cakatyoka mubuzuba obo mbubonya, nkabela basikusambala imbelele ibakali kundilangilizya bakaziba kuti ndijwi lya-Jehova.
Mpawo ndakabaambila kuti, Na ncibotu mumeso aanu, amundipe cakuvola cangu, pele na taciboti, amuleke buyo. Lino bakandeelekela zyakuvola zyangu, mali aansiliva aali makumi otatwe,

Nkabela Jehova wakandaambila kuti, Koasowela muciyobwedo camali. Mbuboobo mbundakalaililwa kubelesya oyo muulo mulemu ngubakandibikila. Aboobo ndakabweza ayo mali aansiliva aali makumi otatwe, akwaasowela muciyobwedo camali muŋanda ya-Jehova.
Elyo ndakatyola musako wangu wabili, Luswanaano, kuti ndobye bunyina bwa-Juda a-Israyeli,

Nkaambo ndaamba kubika mweembeli omu munyika uuli boobo. Taakwe makani aambelele zifwa, nikuba kuyandaula zisoweka, nikuba kusilika zityokede, nikuba kusanina zipona. Ulalya buyo nyama yazineneede akukwamauna insumba zyazyo zyoonse.
Maawe kuliyooyo mweembeli wangu mutolo uuleka imbelelel Ipanga limuume akuboko kwakwe akuliso lyakwe lyalulyo! Kuboko kwakwe kuyuminine, aliso lyakwe lyalulyo libe acimbolyo.
Bona! Ndacita kuti Jerusalemu ube inkumeki yakupapalisya misyobo yoonse yabantu beengelede. Acalo cisi coonse ca-Juda ciyooba amapenzi kuciindi eco Jerusalemu noti zyungulukwe.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo njoocita kuti Jerusalemu ube ibbwe idemu kubantu boonse. Boonse basoleka kulikulika balasyondwa loko. Nkabela zisi zyoonse zyaluwa ziyoosika kuzoolilwisya.
Lino mubuzuba obo, mbwaamba Jehova, njooumya imbizi zyoonse buyoofu, abasikuzitanta njoobaumya cinko. Pele luzubo lwa-Juda njoobabbanwida meso, ciindi eco ncinjoofwaazya imbizi zyoonse zyabamasi.
Mpawo mikowa yaba-Juda iyooambwa mumyoyo yayo kuti, Bantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu balijisi inguzu nkaambo ka-Jehova wamakamu Leza wabo.

Mubuzuba obo njoocita kuti mikowa ya-Juda ibe mbuli lukaye lwamulilo akati kankuni, ambuli musunge akati kamisunta yamaila. Iyoolidikizya bantu boonse beengelede kululyo akulumwensi koonse. Pele Jerusalemu ucinookedwe mpoonya awo mpoubede.

Mubuzuba obo Jehova uyoobikila bantu bakede mu-Jerusalemu intobo, aboobo amuntu muniini akati kabo boonse uyooba mbuli Davida, aluzubo lwa-Davida luyooba mbuli Leza, mbuli angelo waJehova, kubusyu bwabo.
Nkabela mubuzuba obo njooyandaula kunyonyoona bantu bamasi oonse beza kuzoolwisya Jerusalemu.
Kulila kwamubuzuba obo mu-Jerusalemu kuyooba kupati mbuli kulila kwa-Hadadirimoni mumumpata wa-Megidoni.
Nyika iyoolila, ciinga cimwi acimwi nsininsini, luzubo lwa-Davida alulike, abanakazi babo abalike, aciinga caluzubo lwaNatani acilike, abanakazi babo abalike,
luzubo lwa-Levi alulike, abanakazi babo abalike, luzubo lwa-Simeyi alulike, abanakazi babo abalike,
anzubo zyoonse zisyeede azilike, abanakazi bazyo abalike.

Lino na kukaboneke limbi muntu uusinsima-sinsima, wisi abanyina ibakamuzyala bayoomwaambila kuti, Tokooyoopona pe, nkaambo waamba zyakubeja muzina lyaJehova. Nkabela wisi abanyina ibakamuzyala bayoomuyasa mukusinsima kwakwe.
Mubuzuba obo basinsimi boonse bayoofwa bweeme, umwi aumwi nkaambo kacilengano cakwe mukusinsima kwakwe. Takooyoosama cikobela caboya cakweena bantu pe.
Uyooamba kuti, Mebo nsili musinsimi pe, ndi mulimi wanyika nkaambo nyika ncecaabilo cangu kuzwa kubucece bwangu.
Alimwi na wabuzigwa kuti, Ani ezi zyuuno zili mumaanza aako nzinzi? uyoovuwa kuti, Nzenzizyo zyuumo nzindakaumwa muŋanda yabeenzuma.
Lino moonse munyika, mbwaamba Jehova, akati kabatatu bobile bayooloba awatatu uyoosyaala.

Nkabela cipanzi catatu cisyeede, njoobiinzya mumulilo, kuti nkabasalazye mbubonya mbuli insiliva mbwiisalazigwa, akubalingula mbuli ingolida mbwiilingulwa. Elyo bayookwiilila izina lyangu, ambebo njoobavwiila. Njooamba kuti mbantu bangu, abalo bayooti, Jehova ngu-Leza wangu.
Amubone! Buzuba bwa-Jehova buyoosika, zisaalo zyanu niziyooabwa akati kanu,

Njoobunganya bamasi boonse kuzoolwisya jerusa­ lemu, nkabela munzi uyoozundwa, amaanda ayoomwayigwa, abanakazi bayootizigwa. Cisela camunzi ciyootolwa mubuzike, pele bamwi bantu basyaala tabakooyoogwisigwa mumunzi.
Elyo Jehova uyoonyamuka kuyoolwisya masi ayo mbubonya mbwalwana mubuzuba bwalumamba.

Nkabela mubuzuba obo zituta zyakwe ziyoolyatilila acilundu ca-Elaioni cili kujwe lya-Jerusalemu. Lino cilundu ca-Elaioni ciyooandulwa akati, kuzwa kujwe akumbo kukabe mumpata mupati loko, nkabela cisela cimwi cacilundu ciyooswena kunyika, acisela cimwi ciyooswena kumusanza.

Mumpata wazilundu zyangu uyoosinkwa, nkaambo mumpata wazilundu uyootana kumabazu aawo ku-Azeli. Nkabela muyoocija mbubonya mbumwakacija muzuzumo wanyika mumazuba aa-Uziya mwami wa-Juda. Mpawo Jehova Leza wangu uyoosika, abasalali boonse bayooba awe.
Lino mubuzuba obo takukooyooba impeyo niciba caanda.
Alimwi kuyooba isikati luzutu (Jehova ulizi obo), takukooyooba isikati amasiku pe, nkaambo ciindi cagogo kuyooba mumuni.
Nkabela kuyooba bantu bakede mumonya. Takukooyooba limbi lutuko pe. Jerusalemu uyookala cakuliiba.

Nkabela nceeci cuumo Jehova ncati umye bantu boonse beza kukulwisya Jerusalemu. Uyoobozeka nyama yabo nibaciimvwi amaulu aabo, aalo meso aabo ayoobola mumakomba aao, azyalo indimi zyabo ziyoobola mukanwa lyabo.
Mubuzuba obo bayoosikilwa lupyopyongano lupati luzwa kuliJehova, aboobo umwi aumwi uyoojata ijanza lyamweenzinyina. Boonse bayootambika maanza aabo cakuumana, umwi aumwi mweenzinyina.
Acalo cisi ca-Juda ciyoolwisya Jerusalemu. Nkabela lubono lwabamasi oonse aaengelede luyooyobololwa, ingolida ansiliva azyakusama zinji loko.
Alimwi luumo luli mbubonya luyoowida ambizi amabbiza ankamela ambongolo abanyama boonse bali muzilao.
Nkabela kufumbwa musyobo wabantu baansi uubula kusika ku-Jerusalemu kukukomba Mwami Jehova wamakamu, bantu abo bayooimwa imvula.
Alwalo luzubo lwaba-Egepita, na babula kusika kuzoolibonya, bayoopenzegwa luumo olo Jehova ndwayooumya misyobo yoonse iitasika kukulya ipobwe lyazilan.
Mbuboobo mbubayoopegwa mulandu, ba-Egepita abantu bamasi oonse batasiki kukulya ipobwe lyazilao.
Mubuzuba obo amilangu yambizi ayoolembwa majwi aakuti, Kusalalisya kwa-Jehova. Azyalo zilongo zyamuŋanda ya-Jehova ziyooba mbubonya mbuli mitiba iili kunembo lyacipaililo.

Zilongo zyoonse zili muJerusalemu amucisi ca-Juda ziyoosalalila Jehova wamakamu. Boonse basika kuzoopaila bayookonzya kuzibweza buyo akujikila nyama yazituuzyo mumonya. Mubuzuba obo takukooyooba limbi musambazi muŋanda yaJehova wamakamu.
Ngaaya majwi aa-Jehova ngaakaamba aaba-Israyeli kumulomo waMalaki.
Ndamuyandisya, mbwaamba Jehova. Pele inywe mulaamba kuti, Ino watuyandisya buti? Sa Esau takakali mukulana wa-Jakobo na? mbwaamba Jehova. Nekubaboobo Jakobo ndakamuyandisya,
anukuti Esau ndaikamusula. Zilundu zyakwe ndakazisaala, acaabilo cakwe caba cabamwaaba bamusokwe.

Ba-Edomu balaamba kuti, Twamwayigwa, nekubaboobo tuyoopiluka akuyakulula matongo. Pele mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Kuyaka bayooyaka, pele mebo njoomwaya, nkabela bayootegwa cisi cazibi abantu Jehova mbakalalila akutamani.
Meso aanu ayoobona makani aya, lino muyooamba kuti, Jehova ngusinguzu koonse akunze lyanyika ya-Israyeli.
Mwandisampaula kukutuula acipaililo cangu zilyo zisofweede. Pele mulabuzya kuti, Ino twazisofwaazya buti? Mwazisofwaazya kukuyeeya kuti intafule ya-Jehova ilisampaukide.

Na mwaleta munyama moofu wakupaizya, sa eco taceensi cibi na? Alimwi na mwaleta uulemene naba mulwazi, sa eco taceensi cibi na? Na watola cintu cili boobo kumwami wako wacisi, sa walo ulabotelwa na? Sa ulakukondelelwa na? mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Lino amutontozye busyu bwaLeza kuti atufwide luzyalo. Pele na mwasika acipo cili boobo mumaanza aanu, sa uyoomufwida insoni na? mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu,
Ma! sa taakwe muntu akati kanu uukonzya kujala milyango, kuti mutakunki mulilo wabuyo acipaililo cangu? Nsimubotelwi pe! mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Nsikoozumina kutambula cituuzyo camumaanza aanu pe.

Nkaambo kuzwa kumazwido aazuba akusikila kumabbililo aalyo izina lyangu lilalemekwa akati kabamasi, nkabela koonse koonse tununkilizyo tulatentelwa izina lyangu, acituuzyo cisalala cilatuulwa, nkaambo izina lyangu lili abulemu akati kabamasi, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Pele ipywe mulalisofwaazya mukwaamba kwanu kwakuti, Intafule ya-Jehova ilisofweede amicelo yalyo azilyo zyalyo tazikwe makani.

Alimwi mulaamba kuti, Ma! Cilakataazya. Aboobo mwandicapa, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Mwandiletela cituulo cabanyama bakubba nanka balema nanka baciswa. Sa ndakonzya kutambula cituulo cili boobo kumaanza aanu? mbwaamba Jehova.

Maawe kuliyooyo mubeji uujisi mweenze akati kabutanga bwakwe, alimwi wakonkezya kupaizya nguwe, nekubaboobo ulaletela Mwami cipaizyo citaluleme, Nkaambo ndi mwami mupati, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, azina lyangu lilalemekwa akati kabamasi.
Lino mulazyo oyu nguwanu, nubapaizi,

Na mwakaka kuswiilila akupangika myoyo yanu kumakani aakulemeka izina lyangu, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, lino njoomutumina lutuko lwakutusya zyoolwe zyanu. Ee, ncobeni ndazituka kale nkaambo kakuti tamuna kupangika myoyo yanu.
Nkabela njoomubisizya imbuto, alimwi njoozila bufumba kumeso aanu, nkukuti bufumba bwazipaizyo zyanu, elyo njoomutanda kuzwa kubusyu bwangu.
Aboobo muyooziba kuti ndamutumina Oyu mulazyo kuti cizuminano ncitutangene a-Levi cijatilile, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Cizuminano cangu ncitutangene awe cakali cabuumi acaluumuno. Ndakamupa nzizyo kuti andilemeke, nkabela wakandilemeka ncobeni akuyoowa izina lyangu.
Mulao wabwini koli mukanwa lyakwe, nkabela teemwakajanwa bubi abuniini mumilomo yakwe. Wakeenda ambe caluumuno acakululama, akusandula banji kuzwa kububi.
Nkaambo milomo yamupaizi ileelede kujatisya luzibo, akumilomo yakwe bantu nkubeelede kuyandaula mulao, nkaambo ngonguwe mutumwa wa-Jehova wamakamu,
Pele inywe mwapambuka kuzwa munzila, mwalebya bantu banji kumilao yanu, mwatyola cizuminano ca-Levi, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Nkaambo kako njoomwaaba kuti musampaulwe akubombesegwa kubantu boonse, nkaambo tamuna kubamba imbeta zyangu, alimwi mulalanga ziwa mukubeteka kwanu.
Juda wabula kusyomeka, ancito zisesemya zilacitwa mu-Israyeli amu-Jerusalemu, nkaambo Juda ulisofwaazizye cikombelo ca-Jehova ncayandisya, ulikwete mwana musimbi wamuzimu mweenzu.
Kufumbwa muntu uucita obo, Jehova amunyanzye kumakalilo aa-Jakobo kamboni nanka sikumuvwiila nanka sikuletela Jehova wamakamu cipaizyo.
Acintu cimwi cabili ncimucita nceeci. Mulavumbya cipaililo caJehova misozi akulila akoomoka, nkaambo talangi limbi cituuzyo canu nikuba kucitambula cakubotelwa kumaanza aanu.

Nkabela mulabuzya kuti, Nkaambonzi? Nkaambo kakuti Jehova kali kamboni wacizuminano ncimwakatangana, webo amukaako mutaanzi ngo citila cakutasyomeka, nekuba kuti ngumweenzinyoko amukaako ngomuzuminene,
Sa teensi Leza omwe iwakatulenga akutubusizya myuuya yesu? Lino ncinzi ncayanda­? Ulayanda bana balemeka Leza. Nkaambo kako amucenjele, kutabi umwi uucitila mukaakwe mutaanzi calweeno.
Nkaambo kulekana ndikusulide, mbwaamba Jehova Leza wa-Israyeli, Akwalo kuvumbya zyakusama zyako bubi ndikusulide, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Aboobo amucenjele, mutabuli lusyomo.

Mwakataazya Jehova amajwi aanu. Pele mulabuzya kuti, Twamukataazya buti? Mwamukataazya kukwaamba kwanu kwakuti, Kufumbwa muntu uucita cibi mubotu mumeso aa-Jehova, alimwi bamubotela. Akwalo kubuzya kwakuti, Ino Leza walubeta uli kuli?
Pele nguni uuti konzye buzuba bwakusika kwakwe? Nguni uuti ime nji naazooboneka? Nkaambo uli mbuli mulilo wamufuzi, ambuli insipa yasikusanzya,
Uyookala mbuli mufuzi uusalazya insiliva. Uyoosalazya bana ba-Levi, akubabotya mbuli mbwiibotesegwa ingolida ansiliva, kuti balerele Jehova cituuzyo camubululami,
Elyo cituuzyo ca-Juda aca-Jerusalemu ciyoobotezya Jehova, mbubonya mbuli mumazuba aakamana amumyaka yakalekale,

Nkabela nzoomuswenenena kuzoobeteka. Nzoofwambaana kuba kamboni wakutapatila balozi, abasimamambe, abasikukonka cakubeja, abasikunyanzya zyakuvola zyabasimilimo, abasikupenzya banabutema abamucaala, abasikukataazya­ beenzu, aboonse batalemeki ndime, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Nkaambo ndime Jehova, nsisanduki pe, aboobo nywebo nubana ba-Jakobo tamunyonyooki.
Sa ncibotu kuti muntu abbide Leza? Nkaambo inywe mulabba kulindime. Pele mwati, Twakubbida nzi? Mwandibbida zipanzi zyakumi azituuzyo.
Mulitukidwe lutuko, nkaambo mwandibbida, oyu mukowa woonse.

Amunjizye zipanzi zyakumi zyoonse muŋanda yaciyobwedo, mube zilyo muŋanda yangu, elyo amundisole obo, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu. Munoobona kuti njoomujalwida zipulo zyakujulu akumutilila coolwe cakufwasuka loko,
Nkabela njoomutapatilila sikulyabantu, kuti atanyonyooni micelo yanyika, Misaansa yanu taikooyoosowa limbi micelo yayo mumuunda ciindi ceelede nicitana kusika, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu,
Elyo bantu bamisyobo yoonse bayooamba kuti muli acoolwe, nkaambo muyooba cisi ciyandwa, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
Majwi aanu andiyumina, mbwaamba Jehova. Pele mwati, Ino twakubisizya buti mukwaamba kwesu?
Mwaamba kuti, Kumanina Leza milimo tacigwasyi pe. Twajana impindu nzi muku bamba imbeta zyakwe amukweenda mbuli basidilwe kubusyu bwa-Jehova wamakamu?
Kuzwa sunu basikulisumpula mbombabo mbotuyeeya kuti bali acoolwe. Basizibi mbobajana coolwe, nkabela nibasunka Leza balaloboka buyo.
Lino bayooba bangu, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, mubuzuba obo mbwenti bunge lubono luyandisi. Njoobafwida insoni mbubonya mbuli muntu mbwafwida mwanaakwe uumumanina milimo insoni.
Elyo muyooboola kwaandaanya mululami asizibi, muntu uuyoowa Leza amuntu uutamuyoowi.

Nkaambo ncobeni kuyoosika buzuba bupya mbuli ceengelo, elyo boonse balisumpula aboonse bacitazibi bayooba buungu. Buzuba obo buboola buyoobatenta, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu, akutabasiila nuuba muyanda nuuba mutabi.
Pele inywe numulemeka izina lyangu, izuba lyabululami liyoomupaswida, lileza anguzu zyakuponya mumababa aalyo. Lino muyooinka busotauka mbuli boombe bazwa mucimpati.
Nkabela muyoolyataula basizibi, nkaambo bayooba mulota kunsi lyazituta zyamaulu aanu mubuzuba obo mbwenti cite makani aya, mbwaamba Jehova wamakamu.
nkabela uyoosandula myoyo yabamawisi kubana babo, amyoyo yabana kumawisi, kuti ntasiki kuzooumya nyika lutuko.
alakwe Juda wakazyala Faresi a-Zara kuli-Tama, alakwe Faresi wakazyala Hezromi, alakwe Hezromi wakazyala Aramu,
alakwe Aramu wakazyala Aminadaba, alakwe Aminadaba wakazyala Naasoni, alakwe Naasoni wakazyala Salmoni,
alakwe Salmoni wakazyala Boazi kuli-Rahabe, alakwe Boazi wakazyala Obede kuli­-Rute, alakwe Obede wakazyala Jese,
alakwe Jese wakazyala mwami Davida.
Alakwe Davida wakazyala Solomoni kulimuka-Uriya,
alakwe Solomoni wakazyala Roboamu, alakwe Roboamu wakazyala Abiya, alakwe Abiya wakazyala Asa,
alakwe Asa wakazyala Josafata, alakwe Josafata wakazyala Joramu, alakwe Joramu wakazyala Uziya,
alakwe Uziya wakazyala Jotama, alakwe Jotama wakazyala Ahaze; alakwe Ahaze wakazyala Hezekiya,
alakwe Hezekiya wakazyala Manasi, alakwe Manasi wakazyala Amosi, alakwe Amosi wakazyala Josiya,
alakwe Josiya wakazyala Jekoniya ababunyina bakwe kuciindi cakulonzegwa ku-Babuloni.
alakwe Zerobabele wakazyala Abiyudi, alakwe Abiyudi wakazyala Eliyakimu, alakwe Eliyakimu wakazyala Azoro,
alakwe Azoro wakazyala Sadoki, alakwe Sadoki wakazyala Akimu, alakwe Akimu wakazyala Eliyudi,
alakwe Eliyudi wakazyala Eleazara, alakwe Eleazara wakazyala Matani, alakwe Matani wakazyala Jakobo,
alakwe Jakobo wakazyala Josefa, mulumaakwe Maliya, nguwe wakazyala Jesu uutegwa Kristo.

Aboobo mazyalani oonse kuzwida kuli-Abrahamu kusikila kuli-Davida akali mazyalani aali ikumi mwaane, akuzwida kuli-Davida akusikila kukulonzegwa ku-Babuloni mazyalani aya aalo ali ikumi mwaane, akuzwida kukulonzegwa ku-Babuloni akusikila kuli-Kristo mazyalani aya aalo ali ikumi mwaane.
Lino Josefa mulumaakwe mbaakali muntu uululeme, takwakayanda kumuusya insoni, wakayeeya kuti nkamuleke kumbali.

Nkabela naakali kuyeeya miyeeyo eyi kwakamubonekela angelo wa-Jehova muciloto, wakati, Josefa mwanaakwe Davida, utayoowi kulitambwida mwanakazi wako, nkaambo kakuti eco cimitidwe mulinguwe nca-Muuya Uusalala.
Nkabela uzootumbuka mwana mulombe ngozooulika izina lya-Jesu, nkaambo nguwe uuzoofutula bantu bakwe kuzwa kuzibi zyabo.
Lino aya oonse akaba kuti acitwe ngaakaamba Jehova kumusinsimi kuti:
Lino Josefa naakabuka kuŋonzi wakacita mbuli mbwaakamulailila angelo wa-Jehova, wakalitambwida mwanakazi,
nekubaboobo katamuzi mane do wakatumbuka mwana mulombe, elyo wakamuulika izina lya-Jesu.
bakaamba bati, Uli kuli uuzyedwe mwami waba-Juda? nkaambo twakabona inyenyeezi yakwe kujwe, tweza kumukomba.
Lino mwami Heroda naakamvwa boobo wakazingwa, aba-Jerusalemu boonse abalo.
Lino wakabunganya bapaizi basimutwe abalembi boonse babantu, wababuzya wati, Ino nkukuli nkwayoozyalilwa Kristo?
Bakaamba bati, Mu-Betelehemu waku-Judaya, nkaambo mbuboobo mbukulembedwe kumusinsimi kuti,
Ncobeni toli muniini mubami baku-Judaya,
Nkaambo kuzwa kulinduwe kuzooba mwami,
Nguwe uuzooembela bantu bangu ba-Israyeli.
Lino mwami Heroda wakabaita basongo kumbali, wababuzisisya ciindi nciyakaboneka inyenyeezi.
Elyo wakabatuma ku-Betelehemu, wakati, Kamuya mukayandaule kabotu mwana, nkabela mwaakumujana muzoondaambile, kuti nze ambebo kukumukomba.
Lino balo nibakamvwa mwami bakainka, nkabela inyenyeezi njibakabwene kujwe yakaya kunembo lyabo mane do yakasika, yaima ajulu mpaakabede mwana.
Nibakabona inyenyeezi bakakondwa kukondwa kupati loko.
Lino basike kuŋanda, bakabona mwana a-Mariya banyina, mpawo bakavundama akumukomba. Nkabela bakavununa zilondwedo zyabo, bamupa inkambilizyo zyangolida atununkilizyo tutegwa libano amura.
Lino bakalaizigwa kuli-Leza muciloto kuti batabweedi kuli-Heroda, nkaambo kaako bakabweeda kulimbabo anzila imbi.
Mpawo wakabuka, watola mwana abanyina masiku, wainka ku-Egepita,
wakaakukala oko mane kusikila kulufu lwa-Heroda, kuti acitwe ngaakaamba Jehova kumusinsimi kuti, Kuzwa ku-Egepita nkundakaita mwanaangu.

Lino Heroda naakabona kuti weenwa kubasongo wakakalala kapati, nkabela wakatuma kuti akajaye bana boonse baku-Betelehemu abeengelede mucisi basimyaaka yobile abali munsi, mbubonya mbuli ciindi ncaakabuzisisya basongo.
Lino akacitwa aakaambwa kuli-Jeremiya musinsimi kuti,
Kulila akweema kupati,
Ngu-Rakele uulilila bana bakwe,
Wakaka kuumuzigwa nkaambo tabaciwo.
Nkabela Heroda naakafwa, angelo wa-Jehova wakabonekela Josefa muciloto mu-Egepita,
wakati, Buka, tola mwana abanyina, uinke kucisi caba-Israyeli, nkaambo balifwide bakayandaula buumi bwamwana.
Lino wakabuka, wakatola mwana abanyina, wakainka kucisi caba-Israyeli.
Pele naakamvwa kuti ngu-Arkelao uuendelezya Judaya mucuuno cawisi Heroda, wakayoowa kwiinka oko. Lino mbuli mbwaakalaizigwa muciloto wakainka kucisi ceengelede ca-Galilaya,
nkabela wakasika kumunzi uutegwa Nazareta, wakakala nkukonya oko, kuti acitwe ngobakaamba basinsimi, kuti Uzootegwa mu-Nazareta.
wakati, Amweempwe, nkaambo kakuti Bwami bwakujulu buliswenede.
Nguwenya wakaambwa kuli-Isaya musinsimi kuti,
Ijwi lyasikoompolola munkanda, liti,
Amubambe mugwagwa wa-Jehova,
Amululamike inzila zyakwe.
Lino kwakalundumuka nkwaakabede bamu-Jerusalemu abamuJudaya boonse abamucisi ceengelede caku-Jordano boonse,
bakabapatizigwa anguwe mumulonga wa-Jordano akulyaambwida zibi zyabo.
Elyo naakabona ba-Farisi aba-Saduki banji baleza kukubapatizya kwakwe, wakabaambila kuti, Inywe nubana bacipile, nguni wakamunaanizya kuti mucije kubukali buza?
Lino amuzyale micelo yakweempwa kwinikwini,
nkabela mutayeeyi kwaamba mumyoyo yanu kuti, Tulijisi Abrahamu mbuli taateesu, pe, nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti Leza ulakonzya kusandula mabwe aya, abe bana bakwe Abrahamu,
Lino beula lilibikidwe kale kumiyanda yamisamu, nkabela misamu yoonse iitazyali micelo mibotu ilatemwa ­akusowelwa mumulilo.

Ime ndamubapatizya mumaanzi, kuti mweempwe, pele oyo uuza musule lyangu uli anguzu kwiinda ndime, nkabela mebo nsyeelede nikuba kuyumuna indyasyo zyakwe. Oyu uzoomubapatizya mu-Muuya Uusalala amumulilo.
Cipupuluzyo cakwe cili mujanza lyakwe, nkabela uzoosalazya lubuwa lwakwe, uzoobunganya maila aakwe mubutala, pele buungu uzoobutentela mumulilo uutazimiki.
Pele Johane wakasi mukasye, wakati, Ndime enjeelede kubapatizigwa kulinduwe, anukuti yebo weza kulindime?
Nkabela Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Akube boobo, nkaambo kakuti mbuboobo mbutweelede kuzulizya ziluleme zyoonse. Mpawo wakamuzuminina
Lino Jesu naakamana kubapatizigwa, mpawo wakazwa mumaanzi. Nkabela kujulu kwakajaluka, elyo wakabona Muuya wa-Leza, ulaseluka mbuli inziba, uleza kulinguwe.
Lino kwakazwa ijwi kujulu, lyakati, Ngooyu mwanaangu uuyandika ngunkondelwa.
Nkabela wakaliimya kulya mazuba aali makumi one, masiku asikati, lino wakafwa inzala,
Lino Sikusunka wakasika akumwaambila kuti, Kuti koli Mwana a-Leza, ambila mabwe aya, abe insima.
Walo wakavuwa kuti, Kulilembedwe kuti,
Teensi insima ilike njaaponena muntu,
Ulaponena amajwi oonse aazwa kumulomo wa-Leza.
wakamwaambila wati, Kuti koli Mwana a-Leza, uliwaale ansi, nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti,
Uzoolailila baangelo bakwe kulinduwe,
Bazookunyampule amaanza aabo,
Kuti utalicisi cituta cako kubbwe.
Alimwi Diabolosi wakamutola kucilundu cilamfu loko, wakamutondezya zisi zyoonse zyanyika abulemu bwazyo,
elyo wakamwaambila kuti, Ezi zyoonse ndakupa, kuti wafugama akundikomba.
Lino Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Koya, uwe Saatani, nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti,
Nguwe Jehova Leza wako ngoelede kukomba,
Nguwenya alike ngoelede kumanina milimo.
Nkabela wakalonga kuzwa ku-Nazareta, wakaakukala ku-Kapernauma kumbali lyalwizi muzisi zya-Zabuloni azya-Nafatali,
kuti akacitwe aakaambwa kuli-Isaya musinsimi kuti,
Cisi ca-Zabuloni acisi ca-Nafatali,
Inzila yalwizi, mutala lya-Jordano,
Galilaya wabamasi,
Bantu ibakede mumudima balibwene bbalabala,
Abalo ibakede munyika yalufu, amucimvule calo,
balipasukidwe mumuni.
Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Amunditobele, nkamucite basikuzuba bantu.
Mpawo bakasia insabwe zyabo, bakamutobela.
Lino kuzwa oko wakaya kunembo, wakabona bamwi babunyina bobile, Jakobo mwanaakwe Zebedayo, a-Johane mwanike wakwe, kabali mubwaato awisaabo Zebedayo, bakali mukusuma insabwe zyabo, elyo wakabaita.
Mpawo bakasia bwaato awisaabo, bakamutobela.

Nkabela impuwo yakwe yakaya mucisi coonse caku-Suriya, nkabela bakamuletela balwazi boonse abaciswa malwazi akuciswa kwamisyobo misyobo, abasibadaimona, abasizisuntu, abayuminide mibili, elyo wakabaponya.
Lino kwakamutobela makamu makamu aabantu bazwa ku-Galilaya aku-Dekapole aku-Jerusalemu aku-Judaya amutala lya-Jordano.
elyo wakabbanuna mulomo wakwe, wakabaiisya kuti,
Amukondwe akusekelela, nkaambo bulumbu bwanu bwakujulu mbupati, nkaambo mbubonya obo mbubakapenzya basinsimi ibakali kunembo lyanu.
Ndinywe mumuni wanyika. Munzi uuyakidwe atala acilundu tuukonzyi kusiswa.
Alimwi bantu nibamunika ilampi tabalibiki munsi lyalusuwo, pe, balalibika acibikilo kuti limunikile boonse bali muŋanda,
Mbubonya obo mumuni wanu umunike kunembo lyabantu, kuti babone milimo yanu mibotu, balemeke Usowanu uuli kujulu.
Nkaambo ndamwaambila cakusinizya kuti, Ijulu anyika zyoonse zilakonzya kumana, pele tacikonzeki kuti kamane kabala nikaba komwe nikaba kazila komwe kamu-Mulao mane lumwi zintu zyoonse zikacitwe.

Nkaambo kaako umwi aumwi uusotoka nikaba komwe kaniini akati kamilazyo eyi, alimwi ulaiisya bantu mbubonya obo, oyo uzootegwa muniini mu-Bwami bwakujulu, pele umwi aumwi uuilomya, alimwi ulaiisya, oyo uzootegwa mupati mu-Bwami bwakujulu.
Nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti, Bululami bwanu kuti kabutaindi bululami bwabalembi abwaba-Farisi, tamukanjili mu-Bwami bwakujulu.
Pele mebo ndamwaambila kuti, Umwi aumwi uukalalila munyina uleelede kubetekwa. Alimwi umwi aumwi uusampaula munyina uleelede lubeta lupati. Pele umwi aumwi uutukila uleelede mulilo wa-Gehena,
Nkaambo kaako kuti koli mukutuula cipo cako acipaililo, nkabela awo waibulukwa kuti munyoko ulijisi kaambo kulinduwe,
usie cipo cako nkukonya oko kunembo lyacipaililo, uye, ukasaangune kuyanzana amunyoko, elyo musule uboole kuzootuula cipo cako.
Fwambaana kuzuminana asinkondonyoko nocili awe munzila, kuti sinkondonyoko atakutoli kumubetesi, alakwe mubetesi atakutoli kumupolisa, utakabikwi muntolongo.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti tokoozoozwa omo mane ukaliye kakobili nikaba kasyaalizi.
Pele mebo ndamwaambila kuti umwi aumwi uulangilila mwanakazi cakumusukama ulimucitide kale bumambi mumoyo wakwe.
Nkabela kuti liso lyako lyalulyo lyakulebya, uligwisye, ulisowe, nkaambo kulakubotela kuti ufwidwe cipanzi comwe kwiinda kusowelwa mu-Gehena mubili wako woonse.
Alimwi kuti ijanza lyako lyalulyo lyakulebya, ulikosole, ulisowe, nkaambo kulakubotela kuti ufwidwe cipanzi comwe kwiinda kusowelwa mu-Gehena mubili wako woonse.
Alimwi kwakaambwa kuti, Umwi aumwi uuleka mukaakwe amupe lugwalo lwacilekanino.
Pele mebo ndamwaambila kuti, umwi aumwi uuleka mukaakwe, nkutaamba kuti nkaambo kakuvuula kuli umbi, wamucitya bumambi. Nkabela umwi aumwi uukwata oyo mwanakazi uulekedwe wamucitya bumambi.
Mebo ndamwaambila kuti, Utakonki pe, nikuba buniini, nikuba kujulu, nkaambo ncicuuno cabwami bwa-Leza,
nikuba kunyika, nkaambo ncicuuno camaulu aakwe, nikuba ku-Jerusalemu, nkaambo ngumunzi wamwami mupati.
Alimwi utakonki kumutwe wako, nkaambo tokonzyi kusandula kasusu nikaba komwe kuti katube na kasie.
Kwaamba kwanu akube, Ii, ii, na Pe, pe, nkaambo zyoonse ziyungizigwa zilazwa kumubi.
Mebo ndamwaambila kuti, Utamutonteeki muntu mubi, pele muntu umwi aumwi uukuuma isaya lyalulyo, umusandwide limwi alyalo.
Alimwi muntu uuli buti uuyanda kukubika kaambo akunyanzya cikobela cako, mulekele acalo cibaki cako.
Alimwi muntu uukusungilizya kuyumuna musinzo omwe, musindikile misinzo yobile.
Umwi aumwi uukumbila kwako umupe, nkabela umwi aumwi uuyanda kukolota kwako utamufutatili pe.
Mebo ndamwaambila kuti, Amuyande basinkondonyoko, amubakombele bamupenzya,
kuti mube bana bakwe Usowanu uuli kujulu, nkaambo ulapasuzya izuba lyakwe kubabi akubabotu, ulawisizya boonse imvula yakwe, baluleme abataluleme.
Kuti kamuyanda abo bamuyanda, ino mbulumbunzi mbumujisi? Sa abalo basimutelo tabaciti mbubonya obo?
Alimwi kuti kamujuzya banyokwanu balike, mwiinda buti? Sa abalo bamasi tabaciti obo?
Nkaambo kaako amulondoke mbuli Usowanu uuli kujulu mbwalondokede.

Nkaambo kaako ciindi ncoabila bantu zipo utasibi impeta kubusyu bwako mbuli mbubacita basikuupaupa ameso muzikombelo amumigwagwa, kuti batembaulwe kubantu. Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti balijene kale bulumbu bwabo.
Pele webo, ciindi ncoabila bantu zipo, ijanza lyako lyacimwensi litazibi mbulicita lyalulyo,
kuti zipo zyako zibe kumbali, lino Uso uubonena kumbali uzookulumbula.
Webo ciindi ncokomba, njila mucimpetu cako, ulijalile kumulyango, ukombe kuli-Uso uuli kumbali, lino Uso uubonena kumbali uzookulumbula.
Alimwi, mukukomba kwanu mutaindululi mbuli mbubacita bamasi, nkaambo balayeeya kuti balaswiililwa kukubwanta kwabo.
Mutakozyani abo, nkaambo Usowanu ulizi zintu nzimubula kamutana kumubuzya.
Mbuboobu mbumweelede kukomba:
Taateesu ooli kujulu,
Alilemekwe izina lyako,
Alucitwe luyando lwako,
Ansi ano mbubonya mbuli kujulu.
Utupe sunu zilyo nzitubula,
Utuvune kumubi,
Nkaambo Bwami mbubwako, anguzu abulemu, mane kukabe kutamani.
Ameni.
pele mwatalekelela bantu milandu yabo, alakwe Usowanu takooyoomulekelela milandu yanu pe.
Pele ciindi ncoliimya kulya webo, unanike mutwe wako akusamba kumeso aako,
kuti kuliimya kwako kutaboneki kubantu pele kuli-Uso uuli kumbali, lino Uso uubonena kumbali uzookulumbula.
Amuliyobwede lubono kujulu, nkwaatabisyi mapempya ankalaya, ababbi nkubatatululi kuti babbe.
Nkaambo lubono lwako nkulubede, nkukonya oko nkuubede moyo wako,
Ilampi lyamubili ndiliso. Nkaambo kaako liso lyako kuti kalili sibuuya, mubili wako woonse ulazula mumuni.
Anukuti liso lyako kuti kalili litavu, mubili wako woonse ulasia. Lino mumuni uuli mulinduwe wakuli mudima, mudima oyo ulasia mbi.
Taakwe muntu uukonzya kumanina bami bobile milimo, nkaambo ulasula umwi, ulayanda umwi, na ulakakatila umwi, ulasampaula umwi. Tamukonzyi kubelekela Leza antoomwe alubono.
Nkaambo kaako ndamwaambila kuti, Mutalibiliki kubuumi bwanu, kuti, Tukalyenzi? Tukanywenzi? nikuba kumibili yanu kuti, Tukasamenzi? Sa buumi tabwiindi zilyo, awalo mubili sa tuuindi zyakusama?
Amulange bayuni bakujulu, nkaambo tababyali, tabatebuli, tabayoboli mumatala, nekubaboobo Usowanu uuli kujulu ulabasanina. Sa inywe tamuyandiki kwiinda mbabo?
Nguni akati kanu uulibilika uukonzya kukomezya ciimo cakwe nikaba kakokola komwe?
Alimwi nkaambonzi mulalibilikila zyakusama? Amuyeeyesye impana zyamusokwe mbuzimena. Tazibeleki, taziluki,
pele ndamwaambila kuti naba Solomoni mubulemu bwakwe boonse teewakasamide mbuli imwi akati kanzizyo.
Lino Leza kuti kasamika boobo mani aamusokwe, aaliko sunu pele junza alasowelwa muciko, sa takaindi loko kumusamika anywebo nuba­ silusyomo-luniini.
Nkaambo kako mutalibiliki cakwaamba kuti, Tukalyenzi? Tukanywenzi? Tukasamenzi?
Nkaambo nzeezi zyoonse nzibayandaula bamasi, alimwi Usowanu uuli kujulu ulizi kuti zintu ezi zyoonse zilayandwa kulindinywe.
Pele amusaangune kuyandaula Bwami bwaLeza abululami bwakwe, elyo zintu ezi zyoonse mulaziyungizizigwa azyalo.
Nkaambo kaako mutalibilikili zyajunza, nkaambo bwajunza bulalibilikila bwini. Buzuba bwasunu bulizulide mapenzi aabo bwalo.
nkaambo kakuti lubeta ndumubetesya bamwi anywebo mulabetesegwa ndulonya olo, aceelesyo ncimweelesya bamwi anywebo muleelesegwa nciconya eco,
Alimwi, nkaambonzi ulalangilila kapapu kali muliso lyamunyoko, nekubaboobo toyeeyi itanda lili muliso lyako numwini?
Ino ulaambila buti munyoko kuti, Nkufule kapapu kali muliso lyako, anukuti mulili itanda muliso lyako numwini?
Nusikuupaupa ameso, usaangune kulifula itanda lili muliso lyako, lino ulabonesya kuti ufule munyoko kapapu kali muliso lyakwe.
Nkaambo umwi aumwi uukumbila ulatambula, alakwe uuyandaula ulajana, alakwe uukonkomona ulajulilwa.
Nguli muntu akati kanu uupa mwanaakwe ibbwe, akumbila insima?
Alimwi, kuti wakumbila inswi, sa ulamupa inzoka?
Lino mbuli mbumuzi kupa bana banu zintu zibotu, inywe nubabi, alakwe Usowanu uuli kujulu sa tazooindi loko kupa zintu zibotu kulibaabo bamukumbila?
Nkaambo kaako zintu zyoonse zili buti nzimuyanda kuti bantu bamucitile, anywebo amubacitile nzizyonya, nkaambo mbuboobo mbuuamba Mulao abasinsimi.
Mulyango uumanikide anzila iipatide njiitola kubuumi, nkabela abo biijana mbace.
Micelo yabo njiiti muzibye mbubabede. Sa kulacelwa misaansa kumuunga niziba inkuyu kumutubetube?
Mbubonya obo musamu umwi aumwi mubotu ulazyala micelo mibotu, alimwi musamu uusampukide ulazyala micelo mibi.
Musamu mubotu tuukonzyi kuzyala micelo mibi, alimwi musamu uusampukide tuukonzyi kuzyala micelo mibotu.
Musamu umwi aumwi uutazyali micelo mibotu ulatemwa akusowelwa mumulilo.
Aboobo micelo yabo njiiti muzibye mbubabede.
Boonse bandaambila kuti, Mwami, mwami, teensi mbabo bayoonjila mu-Bwami bwakujulu, ngooyo uucita luyando lwa-Taata uuli kujulu.

Kubuzuba obo banjibanji bayoondaambila kuti, Mwami, mwami, sa teetwakasinsima kuzina lyako? Alimwi, sa teensi kuzina lyako nkutwakatanda badaimona? Sa teensi kuzina lyako nkutwakacita milimo mipati minji?
Lino nzoobaambila kuti, Nsimuzi pe, amuzwe kulindime inywe nubamucita zibi.
Nkaambo kaako umwi aumwi, uuswiilila majwi aangu aya akwaacita uzookozyanisigwa amuntu uucenjede iwakayaka iŋanda yakwe atala amwala.
Lino yakawa imvula, milonga yakapaya, amyuuwo yakaunga, yakauma aŋanda eyo, nekubaboobo teeyakawa pe, nkaambo yakatalikidwe amwala.
Pele umwi aumwi uuswiilila majwi aangu aya akutaacita uzookozyanisigwa amuntu mufubafuba iwakayaka iŋanda yakwe amuse,
lino yakawa mvula, milonga yakapaya, myuuwo yakaunga, yakauma aŋanda eyo, elyo yakawa, nkabela buwe bwayo bwakakomena.
nkaambo wakali kubaiisya cabwami, katakozyenye abalembi babo pe.
Mpawo kwakasika sicinsenda, wakamukomba, wakati, Mwami, kuti koyanda, ulakonzya kundisalazya.
Lino wakatambika ijanza lyakwe, wakamwaampa, wakati, Ndazumina, salazigwa. Mpawo cinsenda cakwe cakasalazigwa.
Nkabela Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Swiilila! Utaambili muntu naba omwe makani, pele koya ulitondezye kumupaizi, ukatuule cipo ncaakalailila Musa, kuti cibe citondezyo kulimbabo.
wakati, Mwami, mwanaangu ulilede muŋanda, uliyuminide mubili, ulaciswa loko.
Wakamwaambila kuti. Ndeza nzoomuponye.
Nkabela silutwe wakavuwa kuti, Mwami, nsyeelede kuti unjile muŋanda yangu, amba kujwi buyo, elyo uzooponesegwa mwanaangu.
Nkaambo ambebo ndi muntu mulailile, ndijisi bwami abasinkondo, ndaambila umwi, Koya, nkabela ulaya, aumwi, Koza, nkabela uleza, amuzike wangu, Cita obo, nkabela ulacita.
Ndamwaambila kuti, Banji bazoozwa kujwe akumbo, bazookala antoomwe a-Abrahamu a-Izaka a-Jakobo muBwami bwakujulu,
pele bana ba-Bwami bazoosowelwa mumudima waanze, nkabela oko kuyooba kulila akuluma ntwino.
Lino Jesu wakaambila silutwe kuti, Koya, mbuwakasyoma akube kulinduwe mbubonya obo. Lino mwanaakwe wakaponesegwa kuciindi eco nciconya.
nkabela wakabaampa ijanza lyabo, elyo intuntumaanzi yakabaleka, nkabela bakabuka akumukutaukila.
Lino nikwakaba kumazuba bakamuletela basibadaimona banji nkabela wakatanda badaimona kujwi, abalo balwazi boonse wakabaponya,
kuti acitwe aakaambwa kuli-Isaya musinsimi, kuti,
Walo wakabweza matenda esu,
Akuyumuna malwazi esu.
Nkabela kwakasika umwi mulembi, wakamwaambila kuti, Mufundisi, nzookutobela koonse nkoya.
Lino Jesu wamwaambila kuti, Bamwaaba balijisi malyango, abalo bayuni bamujulu balijisi ziteente, pele Mwana a-Muntu taakwe nkooneka mutwe wakwe.
Aumwi akati kabasikwiiya wakamwaambila kuti, Mwami, undizumizye kuti nkasaangune kubweda, nkazike Taata.
Pele Jesu wakamwaambila wati, Tobela ndime, kobaleka bafu, bazike bafunyina.
Elyo kwakaba iguwo ipati mulwizi, nkabela bwaato bwakavumbwa amayuwe, pele walo wakali muŋonzi.
Lino bakamuswenenena akumubusya, bati, Mwami, tuvune, tulafwa.
Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi mwaba abukandu, nubasilusyomo-luniini? Mpawo wakabuka, wakalailila myuuwo amaanzi, nkabela kwakaba lubatamo lupati.
Lino abo bantu bakagamba, bakati, Ino muntu oyu uli buti? Nkaambo ayalo myuuwo amaanzi zilamuswiilila.
Lino mpawo bakoongolola, bakati, Mulandunzi ngutujisi kulinduwe uwe Mwana a-Leza? Sa weza kuti utupenzye ciindi kacitana kusika?
Nkabela kulekule kuzwa kulimbabo kakuli butanga bwangulube zinji, kazicela.
Lino badaimona bakamukumbila bati, Kuti watutanda, tutume mubutanga bwangulube.
Wakaamba wati, Kamuya. Nkabela bakazwa, bakanjila mungulube. Mpawo butanga boonse bwakakunkulukila mumunkuni mulwizi, zyakafwa mumaanzi.
Lino beembezi bakacija, bakaya kumunzi, bakaamba makani oonse, amakani aabasibadaimona.
Lino munzi woonse wakalundumuka kuyoocinga Jesu, bakamukumbila kuti azwe mucisi cabo.
Lino mpawo bakamuletela umwi uuyuminide mubili, ulilede abulo. Nkabela Jesu naakabona lusyomo lwabo wakaambila oyo uuyuminide mubili kuti, Mwanaangu, sekaseka, walekelelwa zibi zyako.
Mpawo bamwi balembi bakaamba mumyoyo yabo bati, Muntu oyu ulatukila Leza.
Nkabela Jesu wakaziba miyeeyo yabo, elyo wakati, Ino nkaambonzi mulayeeya bubi mumyoyo yanu?
Citete ncicili, kwaamba, Walekelelwa zibi zyako, na kwaamba, Buka, uende?
Pele mukazibe kuti Mwana a-Muntu uli abwami ansi ano bwakulekelela bantu zibi, lino waambila oyo uuyuminide mubili kuti, Buka, bweza bulo bwako, uye kuŋanda yako.
Mpawo wakabuka, wakaya kwakwe.
Lino makamu naakabona obo akayoowa, akalumba Leza iwakapede bantu bwami buli boobu.
Nkabela ba-Farisi nibakabona obo bakaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Ino nkaambonzi mufundisi wanu ulalya abasimutelo abasizibi.
Amvwe boobu wakati, Teensi baponi bayanda musiliki pe, pele balwazi.
Kamuya, mukaiye ncikaamba kapango aka kati, Ncinjanda nduse, teensi cipaizyo pe, nkaambo teensi baluleme mbenzidide kwiita, pele basizibi.
Nkabela Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Sa beenzinyina simusa balakonzya kulila, simusa naacili abo? Azoosika mazuba nibazoonyangwa simusa, elyo bazooliimya kulya.
Taakwe muntu uumamya cimamo cacisani cipya acikobela cikulukulu, nkaambo cisinsyo caco cilazakazya cikobela, nkabela cilakomena cimanga.
Alimwi tabatuntili waini mupya munkomo inkulukulu, nkaambo inkomo zilabbosoka, elyo waini ulanyonyauka, azyalo inkomo zilafwa. Balatuntila waini mupya munkomo impya, lino zyoonse zilalondolwa.
Lino Jesu wakanyampuka, wakamutobela, abasikwiiya bakwe.
Nkabela umwi mwanakazi iwakali kuciswa bulwazi bwakuzwa bulowa myaaka iili ikumi aibili wakeza musule lyakwe, wakaampa bwaya bwacikobela cakwe.
Nkaambo wakaamba mumoyo wakwe kuti, Ndaampa buyo cikobela cakwe, ndapona.
Lino Jesu wakacebuka, wakamubona, wakaamba kuti, Mwanaangu, sekaseka, lusyomo lwako lwakufutula. Nkabela mwanakazi wakafutuka kuzwa kuciindi eco nciconya.
Lino Jesu naakasika kuŋanda yamwami, wakabona basinyeele ankamu iiyoba,
nkabela wakaamba kuti, Amundiinzizye, nkaambo kasimbi takafwide pe, kaloona buyo. Lino bakamuwelela.
Pele inkamu niyakatandwa wakanjila, wakajatila kasimbi ijanza, wakakabusya.
Lino impuwo yakaya mucisi eco coonse.
Lino Jesu naakazwa oko, kwakamutobela boofu bobile, bakoongolola bati, Utufwide luzyalo, mwanaakwe Davida.
Mpawo naakanjila muŋanda abo boofu bakamuswenenena, nkabela Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Sa mulazumina kuti ndakonzya kucita obo? Bakamwaambila bati, Ii, mwami.
Lino wakaampa meso aabo, wati, Akube kulindinywe mbubonya mbuli lusyomo lwanu.
Nkabela meso aabo akanamuna. Lino Jesu wakabanyetukila, wakati, Amubone, kutazi muntu naba omwe.
Nekubaboobo bazwe buyo, bakatola impuwo yakwe mucisi eco coonse.
Lino bacizwa buyo abo, kwakamuletelwa sidaimona syataambi,
Nkabela daimona naakatandwa, syataambi wakaamba, Lino makamu akagamba, akati, Cintu cili boobo tacina kubonwa mu-Israyeli lyoonse.
Pele baFarisi bakaamba kuti, Mwami wabadaimona ngwabatandya badaimona.
Nkabela naakabona makamu aabantu wakabafwida luzyalo, nkaambo kakuti bakalikatede akumwaika mbuli imbelele zitakwe mweembezi.
Lino waambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Kutebula kwavula, batebuzi bacea.
Nkaambo kaako amukumbile mwami uuli amuunda kuti atume batebuzi kukutebula kwakwe.
a-Filipo a-Bartolomayo, a-Tomaso a-Matayo simutelo, a-Jakobo mwanaakwe Alifayo, a-Tadayo,
a-Simoni mu-Kanana, a-Judase Iskariote, nguwenya wakamwaaba,
Aba bali ikumi ababili Jesu wakabatuma, wakabalailila kuti:
Mutatoli inzila yakulibamasi, nikuba kunjila kumunzi nuuba omwe wabaSamariya,
pele kamuya kumbelele zisweekede zyamukowa waba-Israyeli.
Nkabela mwanooya bweenda kamunooyookambauka kuti, Bwami bwakujulu buliswenede.
Amuponye balwazi, amubusye bafu, amusalazye basicinsenda, amutande badaimona. Mwakapegwa buyo, anywe amupe buyo.
Mutavubi ingolida niiba insiliva nuuba mukuba muzikwama zyanu,
niiba inkomo yazilyo, niziba zikobela zyobile, niziba indyasyo, niiba inkoli, nkaambo similimo uleeleledwe bulilu bwakwe.
Nkabela nimunjila mumunzi umwi aumwi, nimuba mukanzi kamwi akamwi, amuyandaule muntu umwi wamumo uuelede, kuti mukale kwakwe mane lumwi mukainke.
Alimwi, ciindi ncomunjila muŋanda, amubajuzye bali mumo.
Lino bantu bali mumo kuti beelede luumuno lwanu alube alimbabo. Pele kuti tabeelede, luumuno lwanu aluboole kulindinywe.
Alimwi, umwi aumwi uukaka kumutambula nikuba kuswiilila makani aanu, elyo ciindi ncomuzwa kuŋanda eyo nikuba kumunzi oyo, amukunkumune lusuko luli kuzituta zyanu.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti mubuzuba bwalubeta oyo munzi uzoojana mulandu nikuba kwiinda cisi ca-Sodoma a-Gomora.
Mukacenjele bantu, nkaambo bayoomwaaba kumbeta impati, nkabela muzikombelo zyabo bayoomukwipaula.
Alimwi muyootolwa kubusyu bwabeendelezi ababami nkaambo kandime, cikabe citondezyo kulimbabo akubamasi.
Nkabela nibayoomwaaba mutalibiliki kuti, Nkaambe buti? Nkaambenzi? nkaambo eco ncimweelede kwaamba muyoocipegwa kuciindi nciconya,
nkaambo teensi ndinywe mwaamba pe, ngu-Muuya waUsowanu uuamba akati kanu.
Nkabela munyina uyooaba munyina kulufu, alakwe wisi uyooaba mwana, abalo bana bayoosandukila bazyali babo kuti babajaye.
Nkabela muyoosulwa kubantu boonse nkaambo kazina lyangu, nekubaboobo oyo uukakatila kusikila kumamanino uyoofutuka.
Alimwi ciindi ncibamupenzya mumunzi umwi amucijile kuluumwi, nkaambo ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, ciindi ncimutana kwiimana minzi yoonse ya-Israyeli, uyoosika Mwana a-Muntu.
Cimulame sikwiiya kuti abe mbuli mufundisi wakwe, alakwe muzike mbuli mwami wakwe. Kuti mwiniŋanda bamwaantikizya bati, Nduwe Belzebule, abalo basiŋanda bakwe bazooinda kubaantikizya mbubonya obo.
Nkaambo kaako mutabayoowi, nkaambo taakwe cintu civumbidwe citakooyoovumbululwa, niciba cisisidwe citakooyooyubululwa.
Eco ncindamwaambila mumudima amucaambe mumumuni, eco ncimuswiilila mumatwi amucuumine mompompo anduli.
­Alimwi mutabayoowi bajaya mubili pele tabakonzyi kujaya muuya, amuyoowe nguwe uukonzya kujaya mubili antoomwe amuuya mu-Gehena.
Sa tuyuni tobile tatuulwi kobili? nekubaboobo taakwe nikaba komwe akati kantuto kawida ansi atazumina Usowanu.
Anywebo aalo masusu aali amitwe yanu alibalidwe oonse.
Nkaambo kaako mutayoowi, mulayandika kwiinda tuyuni tunji.
Nceŋambila kuti umwi aumwi uundizumina kubusyu bwabantu, ambebo nzoomuzumina kubusyu bwa-Taata uuli kujulu.
Pele umwi aumwi uunditama kubusyu bwabantu, ambebo nzoomutama kubusyu bwa-Taata uuli kujulu.
Nkaambo ndeza kukazyanisya mwana awisi, alakwe mwana musimbi abanyina, alakwe mukamwana abanyinazyala.
Nkabela basiŋanda bamuntu mwini mbibazooba basinkondonyina.
Oyo uuyanda wisi nibaba banyina kwiinda ndime teelede kwangu. Oyo uuyanda mwanaakwe mulombe naba mwanaakwe musimbi kwiinda ndime teelede kwangu.
Nkabela oyo uutabwezi ciingano cakwe kuti anditobele teelede kwangu.
Oyo uujene buumi bwakwe uzoobusweekelwa, oyo uusweekelwa buumi bwakwe nkaambo kandime uzoobujana.
Oyo uutambula musinsimi muzina lyamusinsimi uzoopegwa bulumbu mbubonya mbuli musinsimi. Oyo uutambula mululami muzina lyamululami uzoopegwa bulumbu mbubonya mbuli mululami.
Nkabela umwi aumwi uunywisya naba omwe akati kabaniini aba kanywido kamaanzi aatontola muzina lyasikwiiya, ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti takoozoosweekelwa bulumbu bwakwe.
akumubuzya kuti, Sa nduwe oyo uuza antela ngumbi ngutulangila?
Nkabela Jesu mukuvuwa kwakwe wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya mukakananine Johane nzimwamvwa akubona.
Boofu balabonununa, zilema zileenda, basicinsenda balasalazigwa, basinkematwi balamvwa, bafu balabusigwa, abacete balakambaukilwa makani mabotu.
Nkabela uli acoolwe umwi aumwi uutajani cilebyo mulindime.
Lino nibakazwa akwiinka, Jesu wakatalika kwaambila makamu makani aa-Johane, wakati, Ino ncinzi ncimwakaya kuyooebela munkanda? Sa nditete lipeka amuuwo?
Pele ncinzi ncimwakaya kuyooebela? Sa muntu uusamide zikobela ziteteete? Amulange, abo basamide zikobela ziteteete bali mumaanda aabami,
Pele nkaambonzi mwakaya? Sa nkuyoobona musinsimi? Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti mupati kwiinda musinsimi.
Nguwenya uulembedwe boobo, kuti,
Amulange, ndatuma mutumwa wangu kunembo kubusyu bwako,
Kuti abambe inzila yako kunembo lyako.
Kuzwa kuciindi ca-Johane Mubapatizi kusikila sunu Bwami bwakujulu bwajatwa canguzu, abalo bakali balabujata cabukali.
Nkaambo basinsimi boonse bakasinsima antoomwe a-Mulao kusikila kwa-Johane.
Alimwi kuti kamuyanda kuzumina, ngooyo Eliya iwakeelede kuboola.
Umwi aumwi uujisi matwi aakuswiilila aswiilile.
Pele bantu basunu nkabakozyanisye buti? Balikozyene abana bakede mucisambalilo, baita beenzinyina babo,
bati, Twakamusibila nyeele, nekubaboobo teemwakazyana. Twakaimba zyakulizya, nekubaboobo teemwakalila.
Nkaambo Johane wakeza, katalyi, katanywi, nkabela baamba bati, Ulijisi daimona.
Mwana a-Muntu weza, ulalya, ulanywa, nkabela baamba bati, Amulange, sindya, mukolwi, mulongwe wabo basimutelo abasizibi. Nkabela maanu alulamikwa kumilimo yao.
Maawe Korazini! Maawe Betsaida! Nkaambo malele ayo aakacitwa mulindinywe kuti naakacitidwe mu-Turo amu-Sidoni, nibeempedwe kalekale akusama masaka atwe.
Ndamwaambila kuti mubuzuba bwalubeta mulandu wa-Turo a-Sidoni uzooba muniini kwiinda ndinywe.
Ayebo Kapernauma, sa uzoosumpulwa kujulu? Pe, uzooseluzigwa kucikalilo cabafwa. Nkaambo malele ayo aakacitwa mulinduwe kuti naakacitidwe mu-Sodoma, nuuciliwo nibuba bwasunu.
Ndakwaambila kuti mubuzuba bwalubeta mulandu wa-Sodoma uzooba muniini kwiinda nduwe.
Ee, Ta, nkaambo mbuboobo mbucakabota kumeso aako.
Zintu zyoonse ndazipegwa kwa-Taata, nkabela taakwe muntu uuzi Mwana pele Taata alike, alimwi taakwe muntu uuzi Taata pele Mwana, antoomwe amuntu oyo ngwayanda Mwana kumuyubununa.
Amulikulike ijokwe lyangu, mwiiye kwangu, nkaambo ndilibombede, ndi mutete moyo, lino mulakatulukwa mumyoyo yanu,
nkaambo ijokwe lyangu lilibulungusene, awalo mukuli wangu muuba.
Lino ba-Farisi nibakabona boobo bakamwaambila bati, Langa, basikwiiya bako balacita citondwa mubuzuba bwa-Sabata.
Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Sa tamubalide mbwaakacita Davida naakafwa inzala, walo abaabo mbaakali abo,
mbwaakanjila muŋanda ya-Leza ambwaakalya mikamu iyakatuulidwe, iyakali kutondwa kuligwa kulinguwe akulibaabo mbaakali abo, yakaligwa kubapaizi balike.
Alimwi tamubalide mu-Mulao kuti mumazuba aa-Sabata bapaizi bali muntempele balasotoka Sabata, nekubaboobo tabajisi mulandu.
Ndamwaambila kuti, Ano mpali umwi mupati kwiinda intempele.
Kuti nimwakalizi mbukaamba kapango aka kati, Ncinjanda nduse, teensi cipaizyo pe, nimwatakulengelela batakwe mulandu.
Nkaambo Mwana a-Muntu ngu-Mwami wa-Sabata.
Nkabela oko nkukonya kakuli mwaalumi uuli ajanza liyuminide. Lino bakamubuzya bati, Sa kuliluleme kuponya mu-Sabata? kuti bamubike kaambo.
Elyo wakabaambila kuti, Nguli muntu akati kanu uujisi imbelele yomwe, kuti yawida mumulindi mubuzuba bwa-Sabata, sa takooijata kuti aigwisye?
Pele muntu ulayandika loko kwiinda imbelele. Nkaambo kaako kuliluleme kucita kabotu mumazuba aa-Sabata.
Lino wakaambila muntu oyo kuti, Vungulula ijanza lyako. Mpawo wakalivungulula, nkabela lyakapona mbuli lyeenzinyina.
Lino ba-Farisi nibakazwa bakamuvwiya, kuti bamujaye.
Nkabela Jesu naakaziba wakatozya kumbi.
Lino bantu banji bakamutobela, elyo wakabaponya boonse.
Nkabela wakabalailila kuti batatoli impuwo,
kuti acitwe aakaambwa kumusinsimi Isaya, aakuti,
Muyandwi wangu, ngunkondelwa moyo wangu.
Nzoobika Muuya wangu mulinguwe,
Akaambile masi lubeta.
Takakazyanyi, takoongololi,
Taakwe muntu uuzoomvwa ijwi lyakwe mumigwagwa.
Itete lifuyukide takalityoli,
Kamuni kasuka takakazimyi,
Mane akazundye lubeta.
Nkabela bamasi bazoosyoma muzina lyakwe.
Mpawo makamu oonse akagamba, akaamba ati, Sa oyu teensi nguwenya mwana a-Davida?
Pele ba-Farisi nibakamvwa obo bakati, Oyu muntu inguzu nzyatanzya badaimona nzizya-Belzebule mwami wabadaimona.
Pele mbwaakaziba miyeeyo yabo wakabaambila kuti, Cisi cimwi ncimwi citakakatilani cinoosaalwa. Alimwi munzi umwi aumwi niiba iŋanda imwi aimwi zitakakatilani tazikoojata pe.
Nkabela Saatani kuti watanda Saatani ulalilwisya mwini, ino cisi cakwe cilajata buti?
Lino ime kuti inguzu nzintanzya badaimona nzizya-Belzebule, ino bana banu ninguzu zyani nzibabatanzya balo? Nkaambo kaako balo bazooba babetesi banu.
Pele ime, kuti inguzu nzintanzya badaimona nzizya-Muuya wa-Leza, lino Bwami bwa-Leza buliswenede afwiifwi kulindinywe.
Alimwi muntu ulakonzya kunjila buti muŋanda yasinguzu akusaala lubono lwakwe, atasaanguna kumwaanga singuzu oyo? lino ulasaala iŋanda yakwe.
Oyo nguntali awe ulandilwisya, nkabela oyo uutabunganyi ambe ulamwaya.
Nkaambo kaako ndamwaambila kuti, Bantu bazoolekelelwa zibi zyoonse alusanko loonse, pele kusanka Muuya muntu takonzyi kulekelelwa nkuko pe.
Alimwi umwi aumwi uubika kaambo ku-Mwana a-Muntu uzoolekelelwa, pele umwi aumwi uubika kaambo ku-Muuya Uusalala takoozoolekelelwa pe, nikuba kuciindi ecino nikuba kuciindi ciza.
Amwaambe kuti, Musamu mubotu, ayalo micelo yawo mibotu, nikuba kuti, Musamu mubi ayalo micelo yawo mibi, nkaambo kumicelo nkokuzibilwa musamu.
Inywe nubana bacipile mbumuli babi mulakonzya buti kwaamba makani mabotu? nkaambo mulomo ulagwisya aata mumoyo.
Muntu mubotu ulagwisya zintu zibotu kuzwa muciyobwedo cakwe cibotu, muntu mubi ulagwisya zintu zibi kuzwa muciyobwedo cakwe cibi.
Ndamwaambila kuti, ijwi isampu limwi alimwi ndibaamba bantu bazoobetekwa andilyonya mubuzuba bwalubeta.
Nkaambo nkumajwi aako nkozoolulamisigwa nkabela nkumajwi aako nkozoopegwa mulandu.
Elyo wakavuwa, wakabaambila wati, Bantu basunu basizibi abasibwaamu balayandaula citondezyo, pele tabakoopegwa pe, nkutaamba kuti citondezyo ca-Jona musinsimi.
Nkaambo Jona mbwaakali mwida lyanswi impati mazuba otatwe isikati amasiku, mbuboobo alakwe Mwana a-Muntu mbazooba mumoyo wanyika mazuba otatwe isikati amasiku.
Bantu baku-Nineve bazooima mulubeta antoomwe abantu basunu, bazoobapa mulandu, nkaambo bakeempwa kukukambauka kwaJona, pele ano mpali umwi mupati kwiinda Jona.
Mwami mwanakazi wakumusanza uzooima mulubeta antoomwe abantu basunu, uzoobapa mulandu, nkaambo wakazwa kumamanino aanyika kuzooswiilila maanu aa-Solomoni, pele ano mpali umwi mupati kwiinda Solomoni.
Muuya uusofweede nuuzwa kumuntu ulainda mumisena iitakwe maanzi akuya buyandaula cilyokezyo, nekubaboobo tuucijani pe.
Lino ulaamba kuti, Mbweede kuŋanda yangu nkundazwa, nkabela usike buyo, ulajana kuti tamukwe uukala mumo, ilikukwidwe akubambwa kabotu.
Mpawo ulaya, ulaleta myuuya iili musanu aibili mibi kwiinda nguwo, nkabela ilanjila, ilakala mumo. Lino magolelo aamuntu oyo abija kwiinda aalutaanzi, Mbuboobo mbukuzooba kubantu babi basunu.
Nkabela umwi wakamwaambila kuti, Langa, banyoko abakwanu baliimvwi anze, balayanda kwaambaula ayebo.
Nkabela aambilwe boobo, wakamuvwila wakati, Ino mbani bama? Mbani bakwesu?
Lino wakatondeka ijanza lyakwe kulibasikwiiya bakwe, wakati, Amulange, mbaaba bama abakwesu,
Nkaambo umwi aumwi uucita luyando lwa-Taata uuli kujulu ngomukwesu amucizi wangu abama.
Nkabela kwakabungana kulinguwe makamu makamu. Elyo wakanjila mubwaato, wakakala, nkabela bantu boonse bakaliimvwi ankomwe.
Mpawo wakabaambila makani manji muzikozyano, wakati, Amulange, muminzi wakaya kuyoominza.
Lino mukuminza kwakwe imbuto zimwi zyakawida anzila, nkabela bayuni bakeza, bakazilya.
Zimwi zyakawida mumabwe mutakwe ivu ijinji, nkabela zyakafwambaana kumena nkaambo kakutaba avu ijinji.
Lino izuba nilyakapasula, zyakapusama, zyakayuma, nkaambo kakuti kazitajisi miyanda.
Azimwi zyakawida mumamvwa, nkabela mamvwa naakamena akazisyanikizya.
