Azimwi zyakawida muvu ibotu, zyakazyala micelo, zimwi zyakazyala mwaanda, zimwi zyakazyala makumi aali musanu alimwi, zimwi zyakazyala makumi otatwe.
Uujisi matwi aswiilile.
Lino basikwiiya bakwe bakeza, bakamubuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi ulabaambila muzikozyano?
Nkabela wakabavwiila, wabaambila kuti, Inywe mwapegwa kuziba aasisidwe aa-Bwami bwakujulu, balo tabapegwi pe.
Nkaambo umwi aumwi uujisi uzoopegwa, uzooyungizizigwa, pele umwi aumwi uutajisi uzoonyanzigwa niciba ncajisi.
Nkaambo kaako ndabaambila muzikozyano, nkaambo mukubona kwabo tababonesyi, amukumvwa kwabo tabamvwisyi.
Nkabela mulimbabo kwacitwa ngaakaamba Isaya, kuti,
Mukumvwa kwanu mulamvwa, nekubaboobo tamukoomvwisya,
Amukubona kwanu mulabona, nekubaboobo tamukoobonesya.
Nkaambo myoyo yabantu aba yanenesya,
Nkabela matwi aabo taamvwisyi, Nkabela meso aabo baafwinya,
Kuti bataboni ameso aabo,
Akutaswiilila amatwi aabo,
Akutamvwisya mumyoyo yabo,
Kuti batasanduki,
Kuti nzoobaponye.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti basinsimi banji abaluleme banji bakali kuyandisya kubona zintu nzimubona inywe, nekubaboobo teebakazibona pe, akumvwa zintu nzimumvwa, nekubaboobo teebakamvwa.
Lino amuswiilile cikozyano camuminzi.
Muntu umwi aumwi amvwe makani aa-Bwami akutamvwisya, elyo ulasika mubi, ulamunyanzya cakaminzwa mumoyo wakwe. Nguwenya wakaminzwa kumbali kunzila.
­Alimwi oyo iwakaminzwa muvu lyamabwe, nguwenya uuswiilila makani, elyo ulafwamba kwaatambula cakukondwa.
Nekubaboobo tajisi muyanda mulinguwe, anukuti ulakolela kaindi kaniini buyo, lino naasika mapenzi antela makataazyo nkaambo kamakani, mpawo ulalebegwa.
Alimwi oyo iwakaminzilwa mumamvwa nguwenya uuswiilila makani pele mapakasyo aaciindi ecino akoongelezegwa kwabuvubi, zyoonse zilasyanikizya makani, nkabela taazyali micelo.
Alimwi oyo iwakaminzwa muvu ibotu nguwenya uuswiilila makani akumvwisya, nguwe uuzyala micelo. Umwi ulazyala mwaanda, umwi makumi aali musanu alimwi, umwi makumi otatwe.
nkabela bantu nibakali kuona, kwakasika sinkondonyina, wakaminza insaku akati kamaila, wakainka.
Lino maila naakasonsa akuzyala micelo, mpawo insaku zyakaboneka azyalo.
Nkabela bazike bamwinimuunda bakeza, bakamwaambila kuti, Mwami, sa teewakaminza imbuto imbotu mumuunda wako? ino zyazwa kuli insaku ezi?
Wakabaambila kuti, Ngusinkondoma wakacita obo. Nkabela bazike bamwaambila bati, Sa ulayanda kuti tuye, tuzinonkole?
Wakati, Pe! ambweni mwaakunonkola insaku mulazyula aalo maila.

Amuzileke, zikule zyoonse antoomwe mane lumwi kuciindi cakutebula, lino kuciindi cakutebula nzooambila batebuzi kuti, Amusaangune kulundika insaku akuzianga misunta, zitentwe, pele maila amwaayobole mubutala bwangu.
Ninseke iniini kwiinda imbuto zyoonse, nekubaboobo yamena, ilakomena kwiinda ziteo zyoonse, ilaba isamu, nkabela bayuni bakujulu baleza, balayaka ziteente zyabo mumitabi yalyo.
kuti acitwe aakaambwa kumusinsimi, kuti,
Nzoobbanuna amulomo wangu azikozyano,
Nzooamba makani aasisidwe kuzwa kumalengelo aanyika.
Nkabela wakabavwiila akubaambila kuti, Oyo uuminza imbuto imbotu ngu-Mwana a-Muntu,
muunda ninyika, imbuto imbotu mbibana ba-Bwami, insaku mbibana ba-Mubi,
sinkondo iwakaziminza ngu-Diabolosi, kutebula ngimamanino aaciindi, batebuzi mbibaangelo.
Mbuli insaku mbuzibungwa akutentwa mumulilo, mbubonya obo mbukuzooba kumamanino aaciindi.
Mwana a-Muntu uzootuma baangelo bakwe kuti bazoobunge zintu zyoonse zyamu-Bwami bwakwe zilebya, abalo bacita ziteelede,
nkabela bazoobasowela mubbila lyamulilo, oko kuzooba kulila akuluma ntwino.
Lino baluleme bazoobala mbuli izuba mu-Bwami bwawisaabo. Uujisi matwi aswiilile.
Alimwi Bwami bwakujulu bulikozyene amuntu musambazi uuyandaula ingale imbotu,
nkabela naakajana ingale yomwe injandisi loko, wakainka, wakaulisya zyoonse nzyaakajisi, wiiula.
Luzule, bakalukwelela kunkomwe, bakala, balundika inswi imbotu munsuwo, imbi bazisowa.
Mbuboobo mbukuzooba kumamanino aaciindi. Baangelo bazoosika, bazoosala babi kuzwa kubaluleme,
elyo bazoobasowela mubbila lyamulilo, oko kuzooba kulila akuluma ntwino.
Sa mwamvwisya makani aya oonse? Bamwaambila bati, Ii.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Mulembi umwi aumwi uuba sikwiiya mu-Bwami bwakujulu ulikozyene amwiniŋanda uugwisya muciyobwedo cakwe zintu zipya azintu zikulukulu.
Nkabela wakasika mucisi cabanamuzyaabo, wakabaiisya mucikombelo cabo. Lino bakakankamana, bakati, Ino muntu oyu wabujana kuli busongo obu anguzu ezi?
Sa teensi nguwenya mwana wamubezi? Sa izina lyabanyina teensi Maliya, amazina aabakwabo sa tabeensi ba-Jakobo a-Josefa a-Simoni a-Juda?
Abalo bacizi bakwe sa tabako boonse nkutubede? Muntu oyu wazijana kuli zintu ezi zyoonse?
Nkabela bakabilila kulinguwe. Lino Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Taakwe musinsimi uutajani bulemu kutaamba mucisi cabanamuzyaabo amumukowa wakwe mwini.
Nkabela oko teewakacita malele manji nkaambo kakutasyoma kwabo.
Lino wakaambila bantu bakwe kuti, Ngooyu Johane Mubapatizi, ulibukide kuzwa kubafu, nciceeco inguzu ncizibelekela mulinguwe.
Nkaambo Heroda wakajatide Johane akumwaanga akumubika muntolongo nkaambo ka-Herodiya mukamwanike wakwe Filipo.
Nkaambo Johane wakamwaambila kuti, Takweelede kuti ube awe,
Lino wakayanda kumujaya, pele wakayoowa makamu, nkaambo bakali kuyeeya kuti musinsimi.
Nkabela nibwakasika buzuba bwabuzyalwe bwa-Heroda, mwana musimbi wa-Herodiya wakazyana akati kabo, wakabotezya Heroda.
Mpawo wakamwaambila cakukonkezya kuti, Cintu niciba buti ncokumbila ndakupa.
Lino walo mbwaakasungilizigwa kulibanyina, wakati, Ndipa okuno mumutiba mutwe wa-Johane Mubapatizi.
Lino mwami wakausa, nekubaboobo nkaambo kakukonkezya kwakwe akaambo kabeenzu mbaakakede abo wakalailila kuti apegwe.
Lino wakatumina Johane kuti akosolwe mutwe muntolongo.
Nkabela mutwe wakwe wakaletwa mumutiba, wakapegwa musimbi, elyo walo wakauleta kulibanyina.
Lino basikwiiya bakwe bakaboola, bakabweza mutunta, bakaakuuzika, elyo bakainka kuti bakaambile Jesu makani aya.
Lino naakazwa mubwaato wakabona makamu mapati aabantu, wakabafwida luzyalo, wakaponya balwazi babo.
Nkabela nikwakaba kumazuba; basikwiiya bakamuswenenena, bakati, Okuno nkunkanda buyo, alimwi ciindi camana kale. Ubamwaisye bantu, baye kuminzi kuyooliulila zilyo.
Pele Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Tabeelede kwiinka pe, amubasombe zyakulya nywebo.
Bamwaambila bati, Taakwe ncitujisi okuno, pele mikamu yosanwe answi zyobile.
Mpawo wakati, Amuzilete okuno kulindime.

Lino wakalailila bantu kuti bakale amweemvwe. Mpawo wakabweza eyo mikamu yosanwe answi ezyo zyobile, walungama kujulu, walumba, waikomona mikamu, waabila basikwiiya bakwe, nkabela basikwiiya bakaabila bantu.
Lino bakalya boonse, bakuta. Alimwi bakazuzya insuwo zili ikumi azibili bufwefwelenga ibwakasyeede.
Abo ibakalya kabali zyuulu zyosanwe, kutabala banakazi abana.
Amane buyo kumwaisya makamu, wakatanta kucilundu kuyookomba. Lino naakaba masiku wakalikede nkukonya alike.
Nkabela bwaato kabuli akati kalwizi, kabuli kutengauka amayuwe, nkaambo kakuti muuwo wakabakacizya.
Nkabela nikwakaba kubusiku wakasika nkubakabede, keza bweenda atala amaanzi.
Lino basikwiiya nibakamubona uleenda atala amaanzi bakakankamana, bakati, Musangu! nkabela bakoongolola cakuyoowa.
Mpawo Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Amusekeseke! Ndime. Mutayoowi.
Lino Petro wakamuvwiila, wakati, Mwami, kuti nduwe, ndilailila kuti mboole kulinduwe atala amaanzi.
Wakati, Boola. Nkabela Petro wakazwa mubwaato, wakeenda atala amaanzi kuti aye kuli-Jesu.
Pele naakaswiilila muuwo, wakayoowa. Lino wakatalika kubbila, elyo wakoongolola wati, Mwami, ndivuna.
Mpawo Jesu wakatambika ijanza lyakwe, wamujata, wamwaambila wati, Webo nusilusyomo-luniini, ino nkaambonzi wadoneeka?
Lino nibakanjila mubwaato muuwo wakaleka.
Nkabela abo bakali mubwaato bakamukomba, baamba bati, Ncobeni nduwe Mwana a-Leza.
Lino nibakazubuka bakasika kucisi caku-Genesarete.
Nkabela bantu bakucisi eco bakamuziba, batuma mucisi coonse ceengelede akumuletela balwazi boonse.
Lino bakali kumukumbila kuti baampe bwaya buyo bwacikobela cakwe, nkabela umwi aumwi wakaampa wakapona.
Ino nkaambonzi basikwiiya bako balasotoka ziyanza zyaba­ pati? Nkaambo tabasambi kumaanza aabo nibalya insima.
Nkabela walo wakavuwa, wabaambila kuti, Anywebo nkaambonzi mulasotoka Mulao wa-Leza nkaambo kaciyanza canu
Nkaambo Leza wakalailila kuti, Lemeka uso abanyoko, alimwi, Umwi aumwi uutukila wisi na banyina afwe akufwa,
Pele inywe mulaamba kuti, Umwi aumwi uuambila wisi na banyina kuti, Ncipo cakupa Leza eco ncimukonzya kugwasigwa kulindime,
oyu teelede kulemeka wisi na banyina. Mbomulobya Mulao wa-Leza kuciyanza canu.
Nubasikuupaupa ameso, Isaya ncobeni wakasinsima mbumubede, wakati,
Nekubaboobo myoyo yabo ili kule ambe,
Kukomba kwabo nkwabuyo,
Nkaambo balafunda zifundo zyamilao yabantu.
Lino wakaita bantu boonse, wabaambila wati, Amuswiilile akumvwisya.
Cisofwaazya muntu taceensi eco cinjila mukanwa lyakwe, cisofwaazya, muntu ncicizwa mukanwa lyakwe.
Lino basikwiiya bakeza, bamwaambila bati, Sa ulizi kuti ba-Farisi nibakamvwa inkani eyi bakabilila?
Wakabavwiila kuti, Zizikilwa zyoonse nzyaatakazikila Taata uuli kujulu zizoononkolwa,
Amubaleke! mbeenzyi boofu. Kuti moofu uleenzya moofu, boonse bobile balawida mumulindi.
Lino Petro wakavuwa, wamwaambila wati, Tupandulwide cikozyano eco.
Nkabela wakaamba wati, Sa anywebo ambuli sunu tamuna kumvwisya?
Sa tamuna kuziba kuti kunjila, coonse cinjila mukanwa cilaya mwida, limwi cisowegwe kunze.
Pele kuzwa eco cizwa mukanwa cilazwa mumoyo, nciconya ncicisofwaazya muntu.
Nkaambo mumoyo wamuntu mulazwa miyeeyo mibi, bujayi, bumambi, bwaamu, kubba, bulengelezi, amatusi,
Nzeezi zisofwaazya muntu. Pele kulya amaanza aatasambide takusofwaazyi muntu pe.
Nkabela umwi mwanakazi mu-Kanana wakucisi eco wakoongolola, wamwaambila kuti, Ndifwida luzyalo, Mwami, Mwana a-Davida, mwana wangu musimbi ulijisi loko daimona.
Pele walo teewakamuvwiila niliba ijwi lyomwe. Lino basikwiiya bakwe bakeza, bakamubuzya kuti, Mutande, nkaambo uza buongolola musule lyesu.
Wakavuwa kuti, Nsitumidwe pele kumbelele zisweekede zyamukowa wa-Israyeli luzutu,
Lino wakaswena, wamukomba, wati, Mwami, ndigwasya.
Walo wakavuwa kuti, Tacili cibotu kubweza insima yabana akwiisowela tubwa.
Wakati, Mbukubede, Mwami! nkaambo tubwa tulalya tufwefwelenga tuwa kuzwa kumatafule aabasimalelo bato,
Lino Jesu wakamuvwiila wati, Webo mwanakazi, lusyomo lwako ndupati! Akucitwe kulinduwe mbuli mboyanda. Nkabela mwana wakwe musimbi wakaponezegwa kuzwa kuciindi eco nciconya.
Lino kwakamusikila makamu mapati aabantu, bakajisi zilema, boofu, basyataambi, batyokede, abamwi banji, bakafwambaana kubatula kumaulu aa-Jesu, nkabela wakabaponya.
Mpawo makamu akagamba, nkaambo bakabona kuti basyataambi baamba, azilema zyapona, abatyokede beenda, aboofu babona. Nkabela bakalemeka Leza wa-Israyeli.
Lino basikwiiya bati, Ino tukazijane kuli okuno kusokwe zilyo zinji zyakukutya bantu banji bali boobu?
Jesu wabaambila wati, Ino mulijisi zilyo zyongae? Bakati, Tulijisi mikamu iili musanu aibili atuswi tuce.
Lino wakalailila bantu boonse kuti bakale ansi.
Nkabela wakabweza eyo mikamu iili musanu aibili, answi, walumba, waikomona akwiiabila basikwiiya bakwe, abalo basikwiiya baabila makamu.
Elyo bakalya boonse cakukuta, nkabela bufwefwelenga busyaala bakabuzuzya munsuwo zili musanu azibili.
Abo ibakalya kabali zyuulu zyone, kutabala banakazi abana.
Lino wakamwaisya makamu, wakanjila mubwaato, waakusika kucisi caku-Magada.
Nkabela wakavuwa, wabaambila kuti, Nikwakaba kumazuba mulaamba kuti, Bulaca kabotu, nkaambo kujulu kulasalala.
Alimwi cifumofumo mulaamba kuti, Sunu bwaca bubi, nkaambo kujulu kulasalala cakusia. Mulizi kupandulula busyu bwakujulu, pele tamukonzyi kupandulula zitondezyo zyaziindi.
Bantu basunu basizibi abasibwaamu balayandaula citondezyo, pele tabakoopegwa citondezyo pe, kutaamba kuti citondezyo ca-Jona, Lino wakabasia, wakatozya kumbi.
Lino basikwiiya nibakasika mutala bakalubide kubweza mikamu.
Nkabela Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Amubone! amucenjele kubumena bwabaFarisi aba-Saduki.
Elyo bakabuzyanya kuti, Nkaambo teetwabweza mikamu.
Lino Jesu naakaziba wakaamba kuti, Ino nkaambonzi mwabuzyanya nubasilusyomo-luniini nkaambo kakutaba amikamu.
Ino tamuna kuziba na kwiibalukwa mikamu yosanwe njibakaabilwa bantu bali zyuulu zyosanwe? lino mwakabweza insuwo zyongae?
Na mikamu iili musanu aibili njibakaabilwa bantu bali zyuulu zyone? lino mwakabweza insuwo zyongae?
Ino nkaambonzi tamuna kuziba kuti teensi mikamu njendaamba. Amucenjele bumena bwaba-Farisi aba-Saduki.
Lino bakamvwisya kuti teensi bumena bwamikamu mbwaakabaambila kuti babucenjelele, wakabaambila kuti bacenjele kukwiisya kwaba-Farisi aba-Saduki.
Bamwaambila bati, Bamwi balaamba kuti nduwe Johane Mubapatizi, bamwi balaamba kuti nduwe Eliya, abamwi balaamba kuti nduwe Jeremiya naba umwi wabasinsimi.
Nkabela wabaambila kuti, Pele inywe mulaamba kuti ndimeni?
Lino Simoni Petro wakavuwa, wamwaambila wati, Nduwe Kristo, Mwana a-Leza muumi.
Nkabela Jesu wakavuwa, wamwaambila wati, Uli acoolwe, Simoni mwana a-Jona, nkaambo teensi bantu balya maila bakakuyubulwida boobu, ngu-Taata uuli kujulu.
Alimwi ndakwaambila kuti nduwe Petro. Atala amwala oyu mpenzooyakila imbungano yabantu bangu, nkabela milyango yabasikufwa tiikoozoomuzunda.
Alimwi nzookupa zijaluzyo zya-Bwami bwakujulu, nkabela zyoonse nzyoti kaange ansi ziyooangwa kujulu, azyalo zyoonse nzyoti kaangulule ansi ziyooangululwa kujulu.
Lino wakalailila basikwiiya kuti bataambili muntu naba umwi kuti ngu-Kristo.
Lino Petro wakamutola kumbali, wasaanguna kumukazya, wati, Leza akufwide luzyalo, mwami. Cintu eci tacizoobi kulinduwe.
Mpawo Jesu wakafutatuka, waambila Petro wati, Swena oko kusule lyangu, Saatani. Uli cilebyo kulindime, nkaambo kakuti tozi makani aa-Leza, ulizi makani aabantu alike.
Nkaambo umwi aumwi uuyanda kuliyobweda buumi bwakwe uzoobusweekelwa, pele umwi aumwi uusweekelwa buumi bwakwe nkaambo kandime uzoobujana.
Nkaambo nimpindunzi njajana muntu nikuba kuti wavuba nyika yoonse anukuti wanyanzigwa buumi bwakwe? Na ncinzi ncakonzya kupa muntu kuti anunune buumi bwakwe?
Nkaambo Mwana a-Muntu uzooboola mubulemu bwawisi abaangelo bakwe, elyo uzoobweedezya muntu umwi aumwi mbuli milimo yakwe.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti mpobali bamwi baimvwi awa batakooyoomvwa lufu mane lumwi bakabone Mwana a-Muntu uuboola mu-Bwami bwakwe.
Nkabela wakasanduka kubusyu bwabo. Busyu bwakwe bwakabala mbuli izuba, azyakusama zyakwe zyakatuba buu mbuli mumuni.
Mpawo kwakababonekela Musa a-Eliya, balabandika awe. Lino Petro wakavuwa, waambila Jesu wati, Mwami, ncibotu kulindiswe kuba ano.
Kuti koyanda, ndayaka zilao zyotatwe, cimwi cibe cako, cimwi cibe ca-Musa, acimwi cibe ca-Eliya.
Elyo naakacili kwaamba, kwakabavumba ikumbi lituba, nkabela mpawo mwakazwa ijwi mukumbi liti, Ngooyu mwanaangu uuyandwa ngwinkondelwa, amuswiilile nguwe.
Lino basikwiiya nibakamvwa bakavundama ansi, bakayoowa loko.
Nkabela Jesu wakeza, wabaampa, waamba wati, Amuvundamuke, mutayoowi.
Mpawo nibakacebuka teebakabona muntu pele Jesu alike.
Nkabela basikwiiya bakwe bakamubuzya bati, Ino nkaambonzi balembi balaamba kuti Eliya uleelede kusaanguna kuza.
Mpawo wakavuwa, waamba wati, Ncobeni Eliya uleza kuti alengulule zintu zyoonse.
Pele ndamwaambila kuti Eliya wasika kale nkabela tabana kumuziba, anukuti bakamucitila zintu zyoonse zili buti nzibayanda. Mbubonya obo alakwe Mwana a-Muntu mbazoopenzegwa kulimbabo.
Lino basikwiiya bakamvwisya kuti ulabaambila aa-Johane Mubapatizi.
Mwami, mufwide luzyalo mwanaangu, nkaambo ngusikasuntu, ulaciswa loko. Kanjikanji ulawida mumulilo na mumaanzi.
Ndalimuletede kulibasikwiiya bako, pele teebakakonzya kumuponya.
Lino Jesu wakavuwa, waamba wati, Ikaka! inywe nubasunu batasyomi, basicinguni! Ino mazuba ongae ngenti kale kulindinywe? Mazuba ongae ngenti kazike moyo wangu kulindinywe? Amumulete okuno kulindime!
Lino Jesu wakamunyemena. Mpawo daimona wakazwa, nkabela mwana wakapona kuzwa kuciindi eco nciconya.
Lino basikwiiya bakaboola kuliJesu kumbali, baamba bati, Ino nkaambonzi teetwakakonzya kumutanda iswe?

Nkabela wakabaambila wati, Nkaambo lusyomo lwanu nduniini. Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Kansyo mulijisi lusyomo mbuli inseke yamusitada, mulaambila cilundu eci kuti, Zyuka awa, uye okuya, nkabela cilazyuka ncobeni. Taakwe cintu ncimuyookacilwa.
Pele oyu musyobo taakwe bumbi mbuutandwa pele kukukomba akukuliimya kulya.
nkabela balamujaya, nekubaboobo uyoobuka kubuzuba bwatatu. Elyo bakausa loko.
Wakati, Ulatela, Nkabela naakanjila muŋanda, Jesu wakasaanguna kumwambila kuti, Uyeeyanzi, Simoni? Bami baansi nkulini nkubatambula mutelo na bulumbu? Sankubana babo nanka kubeenzu?
Petro wamwaambila wati, Nkubeenzu. Nkabela Jesu wamwaambila wati, Lino bana balaangulukide.
Nekubaboobo, kuti tutababilizyi, koya kulwizi, ukawaale kalobyo, ukabweze inswi iisaanguna kuzwa, elyo niwaasamuna mulomo wayo, Ulajana mali. Tola ayo, ubapede ndiswe tobile.
Mpawo wakaita kana, wakakaimikizya akati kabo,
wakati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Mwataakusanduka akuba mbuli twana, tamukooyoonjila pe mu-Bwami bwakujulu.
Nkaambo kaako umwi aumwi uulibombya mbuli kana aka nguwenya uuzooba mupati mu-Bwami bwakujulu.
Alimwi umwi aumwi uutambula kana nikaba komwe kali boobu muzina lyangu watambula ndime.
Pele umwi aumwi uulebya naba omwe akati kabaniini aba basyoma ndime, kulabota kulinguwe kuti aangwe iziyo ipati kunsingo yakwe akubbizigwa mumaanzi malamfu aamulwizi.
Maawe bantu baansi nkaambo kazilebyo. Zilebyo zileelede kuba ncobeni, pele maawe muntu oyo uuleta cilebyo.

Kuti ijanza lyako nanka cituta cako kacikulebya, cikosole ucisowe, nkaambo kulakubotela kuti unjile mubuumi, nikuba kuti koli cilema nanka kotyokede, kwiinda kuwaalwa mumulilo uutazimi nekubaboobo ucili amaanza obile amaulu obile.
­Alimwi liso lyako kuti kalikulebya, lidadule, ulisowe, nkaambo kulakubotela kuti unjile mubuumi nikuba kuti koli sicimbolyo kwiinda kuwaalwa mumulilo wamu-Gehena nocili ameso obile.
Amucenjele, Mutasampauli umwi akati kabaniini aba, nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti kujulu baangelo babo baleebela lyoonse busyu bwa-Taata uuli kujulu.
Nkaambo Mwana a-Muntu wakaboola kukufutula abasweekede.
Muyeeyanzi? muntu kajisi imbelele zili mwaanda, nkabela imwi akati kazyo yapambuka, sa tasii zili makumi aali musanu aane aali amusanu azine kuti aye azilundu, ayandaule eyo iipambukide.
Nkabela aijana, ndamwaambila ncobeni kuti ulakondelwa njiyo kwiinda ezyo zili makumi aali musanu aane aali amusanu azine izyatakapambuka.
Mbuboobo Usowanu uuli kujulu tayandi kuti afwidilile naba umwi akati kabaniini aba.
Kuti takuswiilili, uye ubweze muntu omwe nanka bobile, kuti makani oonse akosolwe kumilomo yabakamboni bobile na botatwe.
Lino kuti tabaswiilili abalo, ambila imbungano. Kuti taswiilili imbungano, abe kulinduwe mbuli muhedeni nanka simutelo.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti zyoonse nzimuti kaange ansi ziyooangwa kujulu, azyalo zyoonse nzimuti kaangulule ansi ziyooangululwa kujulu.
Alimwi ndamwaambila kuti bantu bobile akati kanu nimukala ansi nibazuminana antoomwe kukukumbila makani aali buti, banoopegwa kwa-Taata uuli kujulu.
Nkaambo nkubabede bantu bobile nanka botatwe babungene muzina lyangu, nkukonya oko nkumbede ambebo akati kabo.
Jesu wamwaambila wati, Nsikwaambili kusikila kuziindi zili 7 pele kusikila kuziindi zili 70 x 7.
Nkaambo kaako Bwami bwakujulu bulikozyene amwami iwakayanda kulingula makani aabazike bakwe.
Lino naakasaanguna kulingula kwakamuletelwa umwi uujisi mulandu wamatalenta aali zyuulu zili ikumi.
Nkabela mbwaatakajisi cakuliya, mwami wakwe wakalailila kuti auzigwe, amwanakazi wakwe abana bakwe azintu zyoonse nzyaakajisi, kuti mulandu umane.
Mpawo muzike wakawida ansi, wamukomba, waamba wati, Mwami undikazikile moyo, nzookuliya oonse.
Lino mwami wamuzike oyo wakafwa luzyalo, wamuleka, wamujatila mulandu.
Pele muzike oyo naakazwa, wakajana umwi muzikenyina uujisi mulandu kulinguwe wamasheleni aali mwaanda. Lino wakamujata, wamusina, waamba wati, Liya mulandu wako.
Mpawo muzikenyina wakawida ansi, wamukumbila, waamba wati, Ndikazikile moyo, nzookuliya.
Nekubaboobo wakaka, waya, wamubika muntolongo, mane lumwi akaliye mulandu.
Lino bazikenyina nibakabona obo, bakausa loko, nkabela bakaya kuyoopandulwida mwami wabo makani oonse.
Mpawo mwami wakwe wakamwiita, wamwaambila wati, Uwe muzike mubi! ndakakulekelela mulandu oyo woonse nkaambo kakuti wakandikumbila.
Sa teewakeelede ayebo kufwida luzyalo muzikenyoko, mbuli ndime mbundakafwida nduwe luzyalo?
Elyo mwami wakwe wakakalala, wamwaabila basintolongo mane do naakaliya mulandu woonse.
Mbubonya obo alakwe Taata uuli kujulu mbwazoomucitila nywebo kuti tamulekeleli nyoonse bakwanu camumyoyo yanu.
Nkabela kwakamutobela makamu makamu aabantu, lino wakabaponya nkukonya.
Nkabela wakavuwa, wakati, Sa tamubalide kuti oyo iwakabalenga kuzwa kumatalikilo wakabacita baalumi abanakazi?
Alimwi wakaamba kuti, Nkaambo kaako mwaalumi asie wisi abanyina, akakatile mukakwe, kuti aba bobile babe nyama yomwe.
Lino tabacili bobile pe, baba nyama yomwe. Nkaambo kaako, abo mbaakakakatizya Leza muntu atabapambukanyi.
Bamwaambila bati, Pele nkaambonzi Musa wakalailila kuti amupe lugwalo lwacilekanino, elyo amuleke?
Wabaambila wati, Nkaambo kabuyumu bwamyoyo yanu ncaakamuzuminina Musa kuleka banakazi banu. Nekubaboobo kuzwa kumatalikilo teekwakali boobo.
Ndamwaambila kuti umwi aumwi uuleka mukakwe akukwata umbi, nkutaamba nkaambo kakuvuula luzutu, waba sibwaamu. Nkabela oyo uukwata mwanakazi uwakalekwa waba sibwaamu.
Basikwiiya bamwaambila bati, Kuti makani aamwaalumi amukakwe ali boobo tacili cibotu kukwata.
Nkabela wakabaambila wati, Teensi bantu boonse bakonzya kutambula inkani eyi, pele abo bapedwe.

Nkaambo nkubali bazibe bamwi ibakazyedwe obo kuzwa mwida lyamanyina, alimwi nkubali bazibe bamwi ibakacitwa obo kubantu, alimwi nkubali bazibe bamwi ibakalicita obo beni nkaambo ka-Bwami bwakujulu. Oyo uukonzya kutambula atambule.
Pele Jesu wakaamba wati, Amuzumizye twana kuti tuboole kulindime. Mutatukasyi pe, nkaambo Bwami bwakujulu mbubwabo bali boobo.
Lino naakatwaampa amaanza aakwe wakatozya kumbi.
Wakamwaambila wati, Ino nkaambonzi wandibuzya acibotu? nkwali omwe mubotu. Pele kuti koyanda kunjila mubuumi, tobela milazyo.
Wamwaambila wati, Milazyonzi? Nkabela Jesu wakaamba wati, Utajayi, Utaciti bumambi, Utabbi, Utalengeleli umwi cakubeja,
Lemya uso abanyoko, nkabela, Yanda mweenzinyoko mbuli mboliyanda omwini.
Lino oyo mukubusi wamwaambila wati, Eyi yoonse ndaijatisya. Ino ncinzi ncincibula?
Jesu wakamwaambila wati, Kuti koyanda kulondoka, koya ukauzye imbono zyako, ukaabile bacete, nkabela uzoojana buvubi kujulu, lino uboole kuzootobela ndime.
Nkabela mukubusi naakamvwa obo, wakainka cakuusa, nkaambo kakuti kajisi imbono zinji.
Lino Jesu wakaambila basikwiiya bakwe wati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti kumuvubi nkuyumu kunjila mu-Bwami bwakujulu.
Alimwi ndamwaambila kuti, Nkutete kunkamele kuti iinde muliso lyansunda kwiinda kuti muvubi anjile mu-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Nkabela basikwiiya nibakaswiililila obo bakagamba loko, bakati, Ma! ino nguni uukonzya kufutuka.
Lino Jesu wakabacebuka, wabaambila wati, Kubantu tacikonzeki, nekubaboobo zintu zyoonse zilakonzeka kuli-Leza.
Mpawo Petro wakavuwa, wamwaambila wati, Langa! iswe tulisiide zintu zyoonse kuzootobela nduwe. Ino tuyoopegwanzi?

Nkabela Jesu wakabaambila wati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti inywe mwakanditobela, kumacitulwido naazookala Mwana a-Muntu acuuno cabulemu bwakwe, anywebo muzookala azyuuno zili ikumi azibili, mukabeteke misyobo iili ikumi aibili yaba-Israyeli.
Alimwi umwi aumwi uusiide maanda nanka babunyina nanka bacizi nanka wisi nanka banyina nanka bana nanka myuunda nkaambo kazina lyangu uzootambula kwiinda mwaanda nkabela uzookona buumi butamani,
Pele bataanzi banji bazooba bamusule, abalo bamusule bazooba bataanzi.
Lino wakazuminana abasimilimo kuti bavoole isheleni lyomwe abuzuba, elyo wakabatuma mumuunda wakwe.
Nkabela wakazwa acikasaalizi, wakabona bamwi baliimvwi buyo mucisambalilo.
Mpawo wakabaambila kuti, Kamunjila mumuunda anywebo, ndamuvozya mbumweelede. Lino bakaya.
Alimwi wakazwa isikati, wakacita obo, akuciindi nilyaungaunga.
Alimwi kumazuba wakazwa, wajana bamwi baliimvwi buyo, wabaambila wati, Ino nkaambonzi muliimvwi buyo ano buzuba boonse?
Bamwaambila bati, Nkaambo kakuti taakwe muntu iwakatunjizya mumilimo. Wabaambila wati, Kamunjila mumuunda anywebo.
Lino nilyakaba igoko mwinimuunda wakaambila mubanzi wakwe wati, Ita basimilimo, ubape bulumbu bwabo, utaangune kubasyaalizi, umanine kubataanzi.
Mpawo abo ibakasika kumazuba bakaboola, batambula umwi aumwi isheleni.
Nkabela bataanzi nibakaboola, bakali kuyeeya kuti, Tulatambula kwiinda. Nekubaboobo abalo bakatambula umwi aumwi isheleni.
Lino nibakalitambula bakatongaukila mwiniŋanda,
bati, Aba basyaalizi babeleka kaindi kaniini buyo, nekubaboobo wabapa mbubonya mbuwatupa aswebo, nitwalemenwa ciminya cabuzuba boonse akubalwa izuba.
Lino wakavuwa, waambila umwi akati kabo kuti, Mweenzuma, nsikubisisizye pe. Sa teetwazuminana ayebo kusheleni?
Bweza lyako, uinke! Oyu musyaalizi alakwe ndayanda kumupa mbubonya mbundapa nduwe.
Sa takululeme kuti mbelesye zintu zyangu mbuli mbunjanda? Sa wandifwida mulibu nkaambo ndi mwaabi?
Mbubonya obo nkubali bamusule bazooba bataanzi, alimwi nkubali bataanzi bazooba bamusule.
Amulange! tulaya ku-Jerusalemu, nkabela Mwana a-Muntu uyooabwa kubapaizi bapati abalembi. Lino bayoomupa mulandu kuti ajayigwe,
nkabela bayoomwaabila bamasi kuti bamunonge akumukwipaula akumubambula aciingano, lino mubuzuba bwatatu uyoobuka.
Lino wakabaambila wati, Ino ncinzi ncomuyanda? Balo bakamwaambila bati, Lailila kuti bana bangu aba bobile bakale, umwi kululyo lwako, umwi kucimwensi cako, mu-Bwami bwako.
Nkabela Jesu wakavuwa, waamba wati, Tamuzi ncimukumbila. Sa mulakonzya kunywida mukanywido munti nywide ime? Bamwaambila bati, Tulakonzya.
Wabaambila wati, Mulanywida mukanywido kangu ncobeni, pele kukala kululyo lwangu akucimwensi cangu, teensi ndime uukonzya kupa pe, nkukwabo abo bakabambilwa kwa-Taata.
Lino bali ikumi nibakamvwa, bakakalalila abo babunyina bobile.
Nkabela Jesu wakabaita, waamba wati, Mulizi kuti baami babamasi babacitila kami-kami, abalo bapati babo babeendelezya,
Pele kulindinywe takuli boobo pe. Umwi aumwi uuyanda kuba mupati akati kanu uzooba mulanda wanu,
alimwi umwi aumwi uuyanda kuba mutaanzi akati kanu uzooba muzike wanu.
Nkaambo mbubonya obo Mwana a-Muntu tazide kuti abelekelwe, wakeza kuti abeleke, alimwi akwaaba buumi bwakwe, bube cinunuzyo cabanji.
Nkabela kakuli boofu bobile ibakakede kumbali anzila. Bamvwe kuti Jesu uli mukwiinda, bakoongolola bati, Mwami, mwana a-Davida, tufwide luzyalo.
Lino makamu akabatapatila kuti baumune. Nekubaboobo bakaindizya kuongolola kuti, Mwami, mwana a-Davida, tufwide luzyalo.
Mpawo Jesu wakaima, wabaita, waamba wati, Ino ncinzi ncimuyanda kuti mucitile?
Bamwaambila bati, Mwami, tulayanda kuti meso esu abononone.
Lino Jesu wakabafwida luzyalo, waampa meso aabo. Nkabela ndilyonya bakabononona, elyo bakamutobela.
waka­ baambila wati, Kamuya kumunzi uuli kunembo, nkabela mpawo mulajana imbongolo iisungidwe amwana wayo. Amuzisungunune, muzilete kulindime.
Nkabela kuti muntu akamubuzye ijwi, mukaambe kuti, Mwami uli amulimo wazyo. Ndilyonya ulazituma.
Nkabela aya akaba boobo kuti akacitwe aakaambwa kumusinsimi wati,
Langa! ngooyu mwami wako uuboola kulinduwe.
Ulibombede! Ulitantide ambongolo,
Ulitantide amwana wambongolo.
Lino basikwiiya bakainka, bakaakucita mbuli mbwaakabalailila Jesu.
Bakaleta imbongolo amwana wayo, bakabika zyakusama zyabo alinzizyo, nkabela wakakala mpoonya awo.
Mpawo bantu banjibanji bamunkamu bakayala zyakusama zyabo munzila, alimwi bamwi bakatema matu aamisamu, bakaayala munzila.
Lino bantu boonse baya kunembo, abalo batobela, bakoongolola bakati,
Hosana kumwana a-Davida!
Uli acoolwe oyu uuboola muzina lya-Jehova.
Nkabela naakanjila mu-Jerusalemu munzi woonse wakazingwa, wati, Ino ngwani oyu?
Lino makamu akaamba ati, Nguwenya Jesu musinsimi uuzwa ku-Nazareta waku-Galilaya.
Nkabela wabaambila wati, Kulilembedwe kuti, Iŋanda yangu ilategwa niŋanda yakukombela, anukuti inywe mwaisandula, yaba ikoba lyababbi.
Mpawo mumonya muntempele kwakamuswenenena boofu abatyokede, nkabela wakabaponya.
Lino bapaizi basimutwe abalembi nibakabona malele ngaakacita, abana boongolola muntempele bati, Hosana ku-Mwana a-Davida, bakakalala,
bamwaambila bati, Sa teewamvwa aba ncibaamba? Lino Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Ii. Sa tamubalide kuti,
Kuzwa kumilomo yatwana atunyonka wakalondola lutembaulo?
Mpawo wakabasia, wazwa kumunzi, waya ku-Betaniya, nkwaakakala nkukonya masiku.
Lino cifumofumo naakali kubweeda kumunzi wakafwa inzala.

Mpawo wakabona mukuyu omwe munzila, wakeza kulinguwo, nekubaboobo teewakajana cintu niciba cimwi kulinguwo pele matu luzutu, Lino wakauambila kuti, Kutabi micelo kulinduwe kuzwa sunu akuya myaaka. Nkabela mpawo mukuyu wakayuma.
Lino basikwiiya nibakabona obo bakagamba, bakati, Ma! mukuyu wakafwambaana buti kuyuma?

Nkabela Jesu wakabavwiila, wakati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, mwaba alusyomo lwakutadoneeka, teensi eci camukuyu luzutu ncimuyookonzya, pele nikuba kuti mwaambila cilundu eci kuti, Zyuka awa akuwaalwa mulwizi, ciyoocitwa mbubonya.
Alimwi zintu zyoonse nzimukumbila mukukomba kwanu, nimwasyoma muyoozipegwa.
Nkabela Jesu wakabavwiila, wakati, Ambebo ndamubuzya mubuzyo omwe, Kuti mwandaambila, lino ambebo ndamwaambila bwami mbunzicitya ezi.
Lubapatizyo lwa-Johane lwakazwa kuli? Sa lwakazwa kujulu nanka kubantu? Mpawo bakabuzyanya lwabo, bati, Na twaambe kuti lwakazwa kujulu, ulatwaambila kuti, Pele nkaambonzi nimwatakamuzuminina?
Pele na twaambe kuti lwakazwa kubantu tulayoowa bantu, nkaambo boonse balayeeya kuti Johane kali musinsimi.
Nkabela bakavwiila Jesu, bakati, Tatuzi pe. Lino walo wakabaambila kuti, Ambebo nsikoomwaambila bwami mbunzicitya ezi.
Pele muyeeyanzi? Muntu umwi kajisi bana bobile, nkabela wakeza kumutaanzi, wakati, Mwanaangu, koya ukabeleke sunu mumuunda wangu.
Walo wakavuwa, wakati, Nsiyandi pe, nekubaboobo musule wakeempwa, wakaya.
Alimwi wakeza kuliwabili, wakaamba mbubonya. Walo wakavuwa kuti, Ndainka, taata. Nekubaboobo teewakaya pe.
Ino nguli akati kabaabo bobile wakacita luyando lwawisi? Bakati, Mutaanzi, Jesu wabaambila wati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti basimutelo abasikuvuula balamusaangunina kunjila mu-Bwami bwa-Leza,
Nkaambo Johane wakeza kulindinywe munzila yabululami, pele inywe teemwakamuzuminina anukuti basimutelo abasibwaamu bakamuzuminina, nkabela inywe nimwakabona obo, musule teemwakeempwa akumuzuminina.
Lino ciindi camicelo nicakaba afwiifwi wakatuma bazike bakwe kubalimi kuti batambule micelo yakwe,
Nkabela balimi bakabajata bazike bakwe, bamwi bakabauma, bamwi bakabajaya, abamwi bakabafusa mabwe.
Alimwi wakatuma bazike bambi banji kwiinda bataanzi, nkabela abalo bakabacitila mbubonya.
Lino musule wakabatumina mwanaakwe, wakati, Mbali mwanaangu balamulemeka.
Nekubaboobo abo balimi nibakabona mwana bakabuzyanya kuti, Ngooyu simulya izina wasika! Amuboole, tumujaye, kuti tumunyanzye lubono lwakwe.
Mpawo bakamujata, bamutanda kuzwa mumuunda, bamujaya.
Ino mwinimuunda naazoosika, uzoobacitilanzi abo balimi?
Bamwaambila kuti, Kuvwinyauna uzoovwinyauna babi abo, nkabela uzoobika muunda mumaanza aabalimi bambi, bazoomupa micelo muziindi zyayo.
Jesu wabaambila wati, Sa tamubalide mumagwalo kuti,
Ibbwe ndibakasowa bayaki lyakaba mutwe wacooko.
Inkani eyi yakazwa ku-Jehova,
Ilagambya mumeso esu.
Nkaambo kaako ndamwaambila kuti Bwami bwa-Leza buzoonyanzigwa kulindinywe, buzoopegwa musyobo umbi uuzyala micelo yabo.
Lino oyo uuwida abbwe elyo uzootyokooka, pele umwi aumwi uzoowidwa ndilyo, lizoomupwasaula.
Lino bapaizi basimutwe aba-Farisi nibakamvwa zikozyano zyakwe bakaziba kuti waamba ndiswe.
Nkabela bakayanda kumujata, nekubaboobo bakayoowa bantu, nkaambo kakuti bakayeeya kuti musinsimi.
Lino Jesu wakaboola kubaambila makani muzikozyano, wati,
Bwami bwakujulu bulikozyene amwami umwi iwakacitila mwanaakwe ipobwe lyabwiinga.
Nkabela naakatuma bazike bakwe kuyooita batambidwe kupobwe, bakakaka kuboola.
Alimwi wakatuma bazike bambi, wati, Amukabaambile batambidwe kuti, Amulange! cikoboko cangu cabizwa, basune bangu abanyama banenede bangu bajayigwa kale, azintu zyoonse zyabizwa. Kamuza kupobwe.
Nekubaboobo bakanyansya buyo, bakainka, umwi kumuunda wakwe, aumwi kukusambala kwakwe.
Alimwi abo ibakasyaala bakajata bazike bakwe, babauma, babajaya.
Lino mwami wakakalala, wakatuma basinkondo bakwe kuyoobavwinyauna abo bajayi akutenta munzi wabo.
Elyo waambila bazike bakwe, wati, Ipobwe lyabizwa, pele batambidwe tabeelede.
Nkaambo kaako kamuya kumapambukanino aanzila, nkabela boonse bali buti mbemuyoojana amubaite kupobwe.
Lino bazike abo bakazwa mumigwagwa, babunganya boonse bali buti mbibakajana, nibaba babi nibaba babotu, nkabela bwiinga bwakazula beenzu.
Lino mwami naakanjila kukubona beenzu wakabona omo muntu umwi uutasamide cikobela cabwiinga.
Nkabela wamwaambila wati, Mweenzuma, ino wakanjila buti omuno kotasamide cikobela cabwiinga? Walo wakaumuna buyo.
Lino mwami wakaambila balanda kuti, Amumwaange maboko amaulu, mumubweze, mumusowele mumudima waanze, oko kulaba kulila akuluma ntwino,
nkaambo abo baitwa mbanji, pele abo basalwa mbace,
Nkabela bakamutumina basikwiiya babo aba-Heroda, bakati, Mufundisi, tulizi kuti uli musyomesi, ulaiisya inzila ya-Leza cakusinizya, tolikataazyi bantu, nkaambo tolangilili busyu bwabantu.
Lino twaambile mboyeeya. Sa cililuleme kupa Kaisara mutelo na pe?
Pele Jesu wakaziba luuni lwabo, wabaambila wati, Ino nkaambonzi mulandisunka nubasikuupaupa ameso?
Amunditondezye mali aabutelo. Mpawo bakamuletela isheleni.
Nkabela wabaambila wati, Ino ncicani cikozyano eci, abulembo obu?
Bamwaambila bati, Nzizya-Kaisara. Lino wabaambila wati, Mbuboobo amupe Kaisara zintu zya-Kaisara, akwa-Leza zintu zya-Leza.
Lino nibakamvwa obo bakagamba, elyo bakamusia, bainka.
Mufundisi, Musa wakaamba wati, Na muntu wafwa tajisi bana, munyina uleelede kukwata mwanakazi wakwe akuzyalila munyina bana.
Lino kulindiswe kakuli babunyina bali musanu ababili. Nkabela mutaanzi wakakwata, wakafwa, katajisi bana, wakasiila munyina mwanakazi wakwe.
Alakwe wabili wakacita mbubonya, awatatu, kusikila kumusanu ababili.
Lino nibakamana kufwa boonse, mwanakazi wakafwa alakwe.
Ino kububuke bwabafu nguli akati kabo bali musanu ababili uzooba amwanakazi oyo? nkaambo bakalimukwete boonse buyo.
Lino Jesu wakabavwiila, wakati, Mwalyeena. Tamuzi magwalo niziba inguzu zya-Leza.
Nkaambo kububuke bwabafu tabakwati nikuba kukwatizigwa, bali mbuli baangelo bakujulu.
Pele aabubuke bwabafu, sa tamubalide cakaambwa kulindinywe kwa-Leza, wati,
Ndime Leza wa-Abrahamu, a-Leza wa-Izaka, a-Leza wa-Jakobo? Teensi Leza wabafu pe, ngwabaumi.
Lino bantu boonse nibakamvwa obo bakagambisya kukwiisya kwakwe.
Nkabela umwi simulao akati kabo wakamubuzya cakusunka, wakati,
Mufundisi, nguli mulazyo mupati wamu-Mulao?
Wakamwaambila kuti, Yanda Leza Jehova wako amoyo wako woonse, amoya wako woonse, amumiyeeyo yako yoonse.
Ngooyu mulazyo mutaanzi mupati.
Awabili ulikozyene awalo, ngooyu, Yanda mweenzinyoko mbuli mboliyanda omwini.
Amilazyo eyi yobile mpaanzikidwe Mulao woonse abasinsimi.
kuti, Ino muyeeyanzi aa-Kristo? mwana wani? Bamwaambila bati, nguwa-Davida,
Wabaambila wati, Lino nkaambonzi Davida mumuuya ulamwaamba Mwami? Wati,
Kala kululyo lwangu.
Mane ndazike basinkondonyoko munsi azituta zyako.
Kuti Davida ulamwaamba mwami, ino mwanaakwe buti?
Lino katakwe muntu wakakonzya kumuvwiila ijwi niliba lyomwe. Nkabela kuzwa kubuzuba obo katakwe muntu wakacili kusola kumubuzya inkani.
kuti, Balembi aba-Farisi balakala acuuno ca-Musa.
Nkaambo kaako zintu zyoonse nzibamulailila amuzicite akuzijatisya, pele mutaciti mbuli incito zyabo, nkaambo balaamba buyo anukuti tabaciti pe.
Balaanga mikuli milemu iiminya kunyampula, balaibika aziwezo zyabantu, pele balo beni tabayandi kwiisunzya noba munwe omwe.
Nkabela milimo yabo yoonse balaicita kuti beebelwe kubantu. Nkaambo balakomezya mafilakateri aabo akulampya maaya aazikobela zyabo,
alimwi balayanda zyuuno zili kunembo mumapobwe, azyuuno zili kunembo muzikombelo,
anjuzyo mumasambalilo, nkabela balayanda kwaambwa Mwami kubantu.
Pele inywe mutaambwi Mwami pe, nkaambo nguumwi mufundisi wanu, nkabela inywe nyoonse muli babunyina.
Alimwi, mutaambi muntu waansi kuti, Taata, nkaambo Usowanu ngumwi, uli kujulu.
Alimwi, mutaambwi Baiyi, nkaambo mwiyi wanu ngumwi, ngu-Kristo.
Nkabela mupati akati kanu uzooba mulanda wanu.
Umwi aumwi uulisumpula uzoobombezegwa, pele umwi aumwi uulibombya uzoosumpulwa.
Maawe inywe nubalembi aba-Farisi, nubasikuupaupa ameso! nkaambo mulajalila Bwami bwakujulu kubusyu bwabantu. Tamunjili nubeni, nkabela abo bayanda kunjila mulabakasya.
Maawe inywe nubalembi aba-Farisi nubasikuupaupa ameso! nkaambo mulalya imbono zyabamukamufu, akukomba itololongo cakuupaupa ameso. Nkaambo kako muyoojana mulandu mupati.

Maawe inywe nubalembi aba-Farisi nubasikuupaupa ameso, nkaambo muleendeenda kulwizi amumanyika kuti musandule muntu omwe, nkabela asanduke buyo, mulamucita mbuli muna-Gehena kobile kwiinda ndinywe nobeni.
Nubafubafuba aboofu, cipati ncicili, ingolida nanka intempele iisalazya ingolida?
