waamba wati, Ndabisya! ndaaba muntu uutakwe mulandu, Balo bakaamba bati, Makaninzi kulindiswe? Makani aako omwini!
Mpawo wakawaala insiliva muntempele, elyo wakainka, waakulisina.
Nkabela bapaizi basimutwe bakabweza insiliva, baamba bati, Taciluleme kwiibika muciyobolelo, nkaambo ngumuulo wamalowa.
Bamane kubuzyanya, bakauzya muunda wamubumbi kuti ube mavwiko aabeenzu.
Nciceeco muunda oyo nciwategwa muunda wamalowa kusikila sunu.
Mpawo cakacitwa eco cakaambwa a-Jeremiya musinsimi cakuti,
Lino ndakabweza mali aansiliva aali makumi otatwe,
Muulo wamuule oyo ngubakauzya bamwi bana ba-Israyeli,
Ndakaula muunda wamubumbi, mbwaakandilailila Mwami.
Nkabela naakali kutaminwa kubapaizi basimutwe abapati, takwakavuwa ijwi niliba lyomwe.
Mpawo Pilato wakamwaambila wati, Sa tomvwi mbubakubika twaambo tunji?
Pele teewakamuvwiila niliba ijwi lyomwe pe, nciceeco ncaakagamba loko.
Lino kupobwe mweendelezi wakalizibilide kwaangunwida bantu umwi mwaange ngubayanda.
Nkabela kuciindi eco kabajisi umwi mwaange wakali ampuwo, izina lyakwe kali Baraba,
Nkaambo kaako ciindi ncibakabungene Pilato wabaambila wati, Ino nguli ngumuyanda kuti mwaangunwide? Sa ngu-Baraba nanka Jesu uutegwa Kristo?
Ikuti wakalizi kuti nkaambo kabbivwe ncibakamwaabide.
Nkabela naakakede acuuno calubeteko, mwanakazi wakwe wakamutumina, wati, Kutabi makani kulinduwe akumuntu oyo mululami, nkaambo sunu ndapenzegwa loko muciloto nkaambo kanguwe.
Nokubaboobo bapaizi basimutwe abapati bakakombelezya makamu aabantu kuti bakumbile Baraba, pele Jesu bamuvwinyaune.
Lino mweendelezi wakavuwa, wabaambila wati, Ino nguli akati kabaaba bobile ngumuyanda kuti mwaangunwide? Nkabela bakaamba bati, Ngu-Baraba.
Pilato wabaambila wati, Anu nkamucitilenzi, oyu Jesu uutegwa Kristo? Boonse baamba bati, Abambulwe aciingano.
Wakati, Ma! ncibinzi ncaakacita? Pele bakaindilizya kuongolola bati, Abambulwe aciingano.

Lino Pilato naakabona kuti takonzyi kucita cintu, pele kwaba lupyopyongano buyo, wakabweza maanzi, wasamba kumaanza aakwe kumeso aabantu boonse, waamba wati, Nsikwe mulandu kubulowa bwamuntu oyu mululami, makani aanu nywebo.
Nkabela bantu boonse bakavuwa, bati, Bulowa bwakwe abube kulindiswe akubana besu.
Mpawo wakabaangunwida Baraba, pele Jesu wakamukwipaula akumwaaba kuti abambulwe aciingano.
Mpawo bakamusamununa akumusamika ijansi lisalalisya.
Alimwi bakaluka musini wamamvwa, bakamuzambaila kumutwe akubika itete mujanza lyalulyo lwakwe. Mpawo bukafugama kubusyu bwakwe, bamuwela, baamba bati, Mwabonwa, numwami waba-Juda!
Nkabela bakamuswida mate, elyo bakabweza itete akumuumya ndilyo amutwe,
Bamane buyo kumuwela, bakamusamununa ijansi, bamusamika zikobela zyakwe mwini, bamutola kuyoomubambula aciingano.
Lino nibakali kuzwa, bakajana muntu mu-Kurene, uwakategwa Simoni, oyo bakamusungilizya kuti ayumune ciingano cakwe.
Nkabela nibakasika kubusena butegwa Golgota (nkukwaamba kuti, Busena bwacanza),
bakamunywisya waini uuvwelene andulwe, elyo naakalabila wakakaka kunywa.
Lino nibakamana kumubambula aciingano, bakawaala cisolo cakwaabana zyakusama zyakwe,
Mpawo bakakala nkukonya, bakali kumulangilizya.
Nkabela kujulu amutwe wakwe bakabika lugwalo lwamulandu wakwe lulembedwe kuti, Ngooyu Jesu mwami waba-Juda.
Lino kwakabambulwa anguwe bafumpi bobile, umwi kululyo lwakwe, umwi kucimwensi cakwe.
Nkabela abo ibakali kwiinda munzila bakali kumusampaula akugunaguna mitwe yabo,
baamba bati, Uwe uukonzya kuvwinyauna intempele akwiiyakulula mumazuba otatwe, lifutule! Kuti koli Mwana a-Leza, seluka kuzwa kuciingano.
Mbubonya obo mbubakali kumuwela abalo bapaizi basimutwe antoomwe abalembi bapati, kuti,
Wakafutula bamwi, anukuti takonzyi kulifutula mwini. Ngu-Mwami waba-Israyeli, aseluke lino kuzwa kuciingano kuti tukamuzuminine.
Wakasyoma Leza. Lino amufutule, kuti kamuyanda. Nkaambo wakati, Ndime Mwana a-Leza.
Abalo bafumpi mbaakabambulwa abo bakali kumusampaula mbubonya.
Lino kuzwa kuciindi casikati kusikila nilyaungaunga, kwakaba mudima anyika yoonse.
Nkabela nilyaungaunga, Jesu wakoongolola ajwi ipati, waamba wati, Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani, nkukwaamba kuti, Leza wangu, Leza wangu, wandisiilanzi?
Nibakamvwa obo, bamwi ibakaimvwi oko bakaamba bati, Muntu oyu ulaita Eliya.
Mpawo umwi akati kabo wakazuza, wabweza insinsa, waizuzya waini uulula, waibika atete akumunywisya.
Abamwi bakaamba bati, Muleke, tubone na ulaboola Eliya kuzoomufutula.
Nkabela Jesu wakoongolola lwabili ajwi ipati, elyo wakafwa.
Lino mpawo cisitilizyo camuntempele cakadeluka kujulu akusikila ansi. Alimwi nyika yakazungaana, ayalo myala yakaanduka.
Atubanda twakavunuka, nkabela mibili minji yabasale ibakali kuona yakabuka,
yazwa mutubanda musule lyabubuke bwakwe, yanjila mumunzi mulemu, akubonekela bantu banji.
Lino silutwe ambaakali abo mukulangilizya Jesu, nibakabona muzuzumo wanyika aamwi makani, bakayoowa loko, baamba bati, Ncobeni oyu muntu kali Mwana a-Leza.
Nkabela kakuli banakazi banji, bakali kweebelezezya kulekule, mbabonya bakatobela Jesu kuzwa ku-Galilaya amukukutaukila.
Akati kabo kakuli Maliya mu-Magdala, a-Mariya banyina Jakobo a-Jose, abanyina bana ba-Zebedayo.
Oyu muntu wakaya kuli-Pilato, wakumbila mubili wa-Jesu. Mpawo Pilato wakalailila kuti apegwe.
Lino Josefa wakabweza mubili, wauvunga mumulembo uutuba uusalala,
akuulazika mukabanda kakwe kapya nkaakafokola mumwala, Nkabela wakakunkulizya ibbwe ipati kumulyango wakabanda, elyo wainka.
Nkabela nkukonya kakuli Maliya mu-Magdala a-Mariya oyo umwi, bakakede kukabanda.
Nibwakaca buzuba butobela bwakulibamba bapaizi basimutwe abaFarisi bakabungana kwa-Pilato,
baamba bati, Mwami twaibulukwa kuti oyo mubeji naakacili kupona wakaamba kuti, Aakumana mazuba otatwe njoobuka.

Nkaambo kaako lailila kuti kabanda kajatisigwe mane kusikila kubuzuba bwatatu, nkaambo basikwiiya bakwe inga balasika kuzoomubba akwaambila bantu kuti wabuka kubafu, elyo lweeno lusyaalizi lulabija kwiinda lutaanzi.
Pilato wakabaambila wati, Mulijisi balindizi, Kamuya, mujatisye mbuli mbumukonzya.
Mpawo bakainka, bajatisya kabanda kukusinkilizya ibbwe akubika balindizi.
Mpawo kwakaba muzuzumo mupati wanyika, nkaambo angelo wa-Jehova wakaseluka kuzwa kujulu, weza kuzookunkulisya ibbwe kuzwa kumulyango, wakala alindilyo.
Nkabela ciwa cakwe kacili mbuli lulabi, azyakusama zyakwe zyakatuba buu mbuli lukobo.
Lino balindizi bakakankama cakumuyoowa, baba mbuli bafu.
Nkabela angelo wakavwiila banakazi kuti, Mutayoowi inywe, nkaambo ndizi kuti mulayandaula Jesu iwakabambulwa aciingano.
Tako okuno, ulibukide mbubonya mbwaakaamba. Amuboole, mubone nkwaakalede Mwami.
Lino kamuya lubilo kuyooambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti ulibukide kubafu, alimwi ulamusaangunina kuya ku-Galilaya, nkukonya oko nkumuyoomubonena. Amulange, ndamwaambila!
Lino bakazwa mukabanda cakuyoowa acakukondwa loko, bazuzaana kuyooambila basikwiiya bakwe.
Nkabela mpawo Jesu wakabaswaana, waamba wati, Mwabonwa! Lino balo bakaswena kuzoomujata kumaulu aakwe akumukomba.
Mpawo Jesu wabaambila wati, Mutayoowi! Kamuya, mwaambile bakwesu kuti baye ku-Galilaya, bayoondibona nkukonya.
Lino nibakacili kuya, mpawo bamwi balindizi bakanjila mumunzi akwaambila bapaizi basimutwe makani oonse aakacitika.
Mpawo nibakabungana antoomwe abapati bakabuzyanya, bapa basinkondo mali manji,
bati, Amwaambe kuti, Basikwiiya bakwe bakeza masiku nitwakali koona, bamubba.
Nkabela na camvwigwa obo kumwami, tulamukombelezya kuti mutapegwi mulandu.
Lino balo nibakatambula mali ayo, bakacita mbubonya mbubakalaililwa, Nkabela ijwi eli licaambwa mbubonya akati kaba-Juda nikuba kusikila sunu.
Nkabela nibakamubona, bakamukomba, pele bamwi bakadoneeka.
Lino Jesu wakeza, wabaambila wati, Ndapegwa bwami boonse nibuba bwakujulu nibuba bwaansi.
Nkaambo kaako kamuya mukabaiisye bantu bamisyobo yoonse, akubabapatizya muzina lya-Taata alya-Mwana alya-Muuya Uusalala,
alimwi amubaiisye kuti bajatisye makani oonse ngendakamulailila. Amulange, ndaba anywe mazuba oonse nikuba kusikila kumamanino aaciindi.
Matalikilo aa-Makani Mabotu aa-Jesu Kristo Mwana a-Leza.
Mbubonya mbukulembedwe kumusinsimi Isaya kuti,
Bona, ndatuma mutumwa wangu kunembo lyako,
Nguuyookululamikila inzila yako.
Amubambe mugwagwa wa-Jehova,
Amucincimike inzila zyakwe.
Kwakapompa Johane, wakali kubapatizya munkanda, akukambauka lubapatizyo lwakweempwa ulwakuti zilekelelwe zibi.
Nkabela kwakalundumuka nkwaakabede cisi coonse ca-Judaya, abalo boonse bamu-Jerusalemu, bakali kubapatizigwa nguwe mumulonga wa-Jordano akulyaamba zibi zyabo.
Oyo Johane wakali kusama boya bwankamele, akulitinga lutambo lwacikanda mucibunu cakwe, alimwi wakali kulya cikwikwi abuci bwamusokwe.
Nkabela wakakambauka kuti, Kunsi lyangu uciza oyo uundiinda inguzu ngwenteelede kukotamina akwaangununa indyasyo zyakwe.
Mebo ndamubapatizya amaanzi, walo uzoomubapatizya a-Muuya Uusalala.
Ndilyonya naakazwa mumaanzi wakabona ijulu lyaba bukwazi, a-Muuya wamuselukila mbuli inziba.
Lino kwakasika ijwi kuzwa kujulu, lyakati, Nduwe mwanaangu uuyandwa, ndakondwa loko kulinduwe.
Nkabela wakali munkanda mazuba aali makumi one, kusunkwa kwa-Saatani, kali antoomwe abanyama, Nkabela baangelo bakali kumukutaukila.
akwaamba kuti, Casika ciindi, Bwami bwa-Leza buliswenede afwaafwi. Amweempwe, muzuminine Makani Mabotu.
Elyo Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Amuboole, mundicilile, nkamucitye basikuzuba bantu.
Ndilyonya bakasia insabwe zyabo, bamucilila.
Nkabela naakasika kunembo kaniini, wakajana Jakobo, mwanaakwe Zebedayo, a-Johane munyina, abalo bakali mubwaato, bakali mukusuma insabwe zyabo.
Mpoonya wakabaita, abalo bakasia wisi, Zebedayo, mubwaato antoomwe abasimilimo bakwe, bamucilila.
Nkabela bakakankamana kukwiisya kwakwe, ikuti wakali kubaiisya mbuli sibwami, takakali mbuli balembi pe.
Mpoonya mucikombelo mwakali muntu uunjilidwe daimona uusofweede, wakoonzomoka kuti,
Ino makaninzi ngutujisi ayebo, Jesu omuna-Nazareta P Sa weza kuzootumanizya? Ndikuzi mbobede, nduwe Musalali wa-Leza.
Lino Jesu wakamutapatila, wati, Umuna, uzwe mumuntu oyu.
Mpoonya awo daimona wakamuzulunganya, woonzomoka ajwi ipati, wazwa.
Lino bakagamba boonse, babuzyanya bati, Ino ncinzi eci? Oku kwiisya kupya, nkwabwami! Ulalailila abadaimona, abalo balamvwa.
Mpoonya wakainka impuwo moonse mucisi caGalilaya cizingulukide.
Nkabela banyinazyala Simoni bakalilede, balaciswa intuntumanzi, mpoonya bamwaambila mbabo.
Lino wakaswena, wabajata ijanza, wababusya, elyo intuntumanzi yakabaleka, bakatalika kubakutaukila.
Lino mangolezya, lube buyo luubeube, bakamuletela boonse baciswa, abalo basidaimona,
nkabela munzi woonse wakayobolokela kumulyango.
Nkabela wakaponya banji baciswa malwazi aamisyobo misyobo, alimwi wakatanda badaimona banji, pele takakali kuzumizya badaimona kwaamba, nkaambo kakuti kabamuzi.
Nkabela Simoni ambobakali abo bakamutobela,
Bamujane, bamwaambila kuti, Bantu boonse balayandaula nduwe.
Wabaambila wati, Katuya kumbi kuminzi iiswaangene, kuti nkakambauke oko akwalo, nkaambo nciceeco ncendazida.
Lino wakaya bukambauka muzikombelo zyabo mucisi coonse ca-Galilaya, akuya butanda badaimona.
Mpawo wakamufwida luzyalo, watambika ijanza lyakwe, wamwaampa, wamwaambila kuti, Ndazumina, kosalazigwa.
Nkabela ndilyonya cinsenda cakwe cakamuleka, wasalazigwa.
Lino wakamukonkomwenesya, wamutanda ndilyonya,
wati, Bona, utaambili muntu naba omwe, pele koya, ukalitondezye kumupaizi, ukatuulile kusalazigwa kwako mbubonya mbwaakalailila Musa, kuti cibe citondezyo kulimbabo.

Pele walo, naakazwa oko, waakutalika kuya bwaamba kwaamba, wakaduumya inkani eyi, ncaakakacilwa Jesu kunjila limbi mumunzi kubusyu bwabantu, pele wakali kukala anze munkanda, nkabela bantu bakali kuza nkwaakabede kuzwa mubunzi-bunzi.
Lino mbukwakayoboloka bantu banji loko, kwakabula busena naaba amulyango. Nkabela wakali kubaambila makani.
Mpoonya awo kwakasika bantu ibamuletela muntu uuyuminide mubili, uli mukutembekwa bane.
Elyo mbubakakacilwa kuswena afwiifwi nkaambo kamakamu, bakavumbulula lululi mpoonya mpaakabede. Bamane kulutulula, bakalengelezya bulo mbwaakalede oyo muntu uuyuminide mubili.
Lino Jesu naakabona lusyomo lwabo waambila oyo uuyuminide mubili kuti, Mwanaangu, walekelelwa zibi zyako.
Pele kakuli bamwi balembi bakakede nkukonya, bakali kulikopa mumyoyo yabo kuti,
Nkaambonzi oyu muntu ncaamba boobo? Ulasampaula Leza. Nguni uukonzya kulekelela zibi, pele Leza alike?
Mpoonya Jesu naakaziba kuti balalikopa boobo mumyoyo yabo, wakababuzya kuti, Ino mulikopelanzi boobo mumyoyo yanu?
Icuuba ncili, sa nkwaambila uuyuminide mubili kuti, Walekelelwa zibi zyako, nanka kuti, Buka, bweza bulo bwako, enda.
Pele nkokuti muzibe kuti Mwana a-Muntu ulijisi bwami ansi ano bwakulekelela bantu zibi zyabo, elyo waambila uuyuminide mubili wati,
Webo, ndakwaambila kuti, Buka, bweza bula bwako, uye kuŋanda yako.
Mpoonya awo wakayumuka, wabweza bulo bwakwe, wainka, balimweebelede boonse, Lino boonse bakagamba, balemeka Leza, bati, Tatuna kabwene kali bobuya.
Nkabela naakali mukwiinda wakabona Levi mwanaakwe Alifayo, ulikede kucitelelo, elyo wakamwaambila kuti, Cilila ndime. Mpawo wakanyamuka, wamucilila.
Lino naakakede muŋanda yakwe, kwakali banji basimutelo abasizibi ibakakede antoomwe a-Jesu abasikwiiya bakwe, nkaambo bakali banji bakamucilila.
Nkabela nibakamubona balembi baba-Farisi kuti ulalya antoomwe abasizibi abasimutelo, bakaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Ma! ulalya akunywa abasimutelo abasizibi.
Amvwe buyo, Jesu wabaambila kuti, Bantu baumi embo mbibayanda musilisi pe, pele balwazi. Nsizide kuzookoba baluleme pele basizibi.
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Sa inga basibwiinga balakonzya kuliimya kulya ciindi mukamwini bwiinga ncacili abo? Ciindi mukamwini bwiinga ncacili abo tabakonzyi kuliimya kulya pe.
Pele ciyoosika ciindi ncibayoonyangwa mukamwini bwiinga, nceciindi eco ncibayooliimya kulya.
Taakwe muntu uumamya cimamo cacisani cipya acikobela cikulukulu, nkaambo kuti kwacitwa boobo, eco cimamo cipya cilazakazya cikulukulu, elyo cipulo cilakomena.
Alimwi taakwe muntu uutuntila waini mupya munkomo inkulukulu, nkaambo kuti wacita boobo waini ulabbosola inkomo, elyo waini ulanyonyauka, azyalo inkomo, pele waini mupya ulatuntilwa munkomo impya.
Lino ba-Farisi bakamwaambila kuti, Langa, nkaambonzi balacita citondwa mubuzuba bwa-Sabata?
Wabaambila wati, Sa tamuna kubala, mbwaakacita Davida naakapenga akufwa inzala, walo abaabo mbaakali abo?
Wakanjila muŋanda ya-Leza kuciindi camupaizi simutwe Abiyatare, wagama kulya mikamu iyakatuulidwe, iitondwa kuligwa pele kubapaizi luzutu, alimwi wakaabila mbaakali abo.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Sabata wakaanzilwa muntu, muntu taanzilwi Sabata pe.
Nkaambo kaako Mwana a-Muntu ngomwami nikuba ku-Sabata.
Lino bakali kumutongomwena kubona kuti na inga ulamuponya mubuzuba bwa-Sabata, kuti bakamupe mulandu.
Mpawo wakaambila yooyo uuyuminide kuboko kuti, Nyampuka awo akati.
Mpoonya awo wakababuzya kuti, Ino ncili ceelede kucitwa mu-Sabata, kucita kabotu nanka kucita cibi, kufutula muntu nanka kujaya? Pele balo bakaumuna buyo.
Mpoonya wakabacebaukila cabukali, wakausa nkaambo kabuyumu bwamyoyo yabo. Lino waambila oyo muntu kuti, Vungulula kuboko kwako. Nkabela naakavungulula, kuboko kwakwe kwakapononona.
Lino ba-Farisi nibakazwa mpoonya bakatalika kuvwiya antoomwe abanaHeroda kuti bakamujaye.
akuzwa ku-Jerusalemu, akuzwa ku-Idumiya, akuzwa mutala lya-Jordano, akuzwa kucisi ceengelede ca-Turo aca-Sidoni. Makamu aabantu banji nibakamvwa nzyaakali kucita, bakeza kulinguwe.
Mpawo wakaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti kube kaato kamulindilila nkaambo kabantu, kuti batamulimbikizyi.
Nkaambo wakaponya banjibanji, nkabela boonse abakali azilwazi bakali kumutandila kuti bamwaampe.
Abalo badaimona basofweede nibakamubona bakali kumuvundamina akupozomoka kuti, Nduwe Mwana a-Leza,
Nkabela wakali kubakasya kuti batamudununi.
Mpawo wakanomona bali ikumi mubabili, kuti bakabe awe, alimwi kuti abatume kukuya bukambauka,
akuba abwami bwakutanda badaimona.
Mbaaba: Simoni, ngwaakaulika izina lya-­Petro,
a-Jakobo mwanaakwe Zebedayo, a-Johane munyina Jakobo, mbaakaulika izina lya-Boanerge, nkukuti basimuzumo,
a-Andreya, aFilipo, a-Bartolomayo, a-Matayo, a-Tomaso, a-Jakobo mwanaakwe Alifayo, a-Tadayo, a-Simoni mu-Kanana,
a-Judase Iskariote, nguwenya wakamwaaba.
Lino wakanjila muŋanda.
Mpawo makamu aabantu akamubunganina alimwi, nkabela teebakakonzya nikuba kulya insima.
Nkabela beenzinyina nibakamvwa boobo bakainka kuyoomujata, nkaambo bakati, Wasondoka.
Abalo balembi ibakazwa ku-Jerusalemu bakaamba kuti, Ulijisi Belzebule, alimwi inguzu nzyatanzya badaimona nzizyamwami wabadaimona.
Lino wakabaita, wabaambila muzikozyano kuti, Ino Saatani ulakonzya buti kutanda Saatani?
Kuti cisi tacikakatilani eco cisi tacikonzyi kujatila pe.
Ayalo iŋanda kuti tiikakatilani, eyo iŋanda tiikonzyi kujatila pe.
Alakwe Saatani kuti wagama kulilwanya mwini akutakakatilana, takonzyi kujatila pe, ulamaninina.
Pele taakwe muntu uukonzya kunjila muŋanda yasinguzu kuti asaale lubono lwakwe, cita ataangune kumwaanga oyo singuzu, mpaanga ulakonzya kusaala iŋanda yakwe.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti bantu bayoolekelelwa zibi zyabo zyoonse, ansanko zyoonse nzibasanka.
Pele oyo uusanka Muuya Uusalala taakwe anati kalekelelwe pe, uli amulandu wacibi citamani.
Nkaambo bakaamba kuti, Ulijisi daimona uusofweede.
Nkabela bantu banji bakali kumweengelede mumbali, elyo bamwaambila kuti, Langa, mbaaba banyoko abanabakwanu, baliimvwi anze, balakuyandaula.
Walo wakabavuwa kuti, Anu mbaani bama abanabakwesu?
Lino wakacebaukila baabo ibakakede cakumuzyunguluka, wati, Amubone, mbaaba bama abanabakwesu.
Nkaambo umwi aumwi uucita luyando lwa-Leza, nguwenya ngomwanaakwesu, ngomucizi wangu, mbibama.
Lino wakabaiisya makani manji muzikozyano, Mukwiisya kwakwe wakabaambila kuti,
Amuswiilile. Sikuminza imbuto wakaya kuyoominza,
Lino mukuminza kwakwe imbuto zimwi zyakawida ambali anzila, nkabela bakasika bayuni, bazilya.
Azimwi zyakawida avu lyamabwe, mpozyatajisi ivu linji, mpoonya zyakamena nkaambo kakubula ivu lyaansi.
Lino nilyakapasula izuba, zyakapusama, zyayuma, nkaambo teezyakajisi miyanda.
Azimwi zyakawida mumamvwa, elyo mamvwa naakamena akazisyanikizya, nkabela teezyakazyala micelo.
Azimwi zyakawida muvu ibotu, zyamena, zyavula, zyazyala micelo, zimwi makumi otatwe, zimwi makumi aali musanu alimwi, azimwi mwaanda.
Lino wakaamba kuti, Uujisi matwi aakumvwa, amvwe.
Lino naakali alike, abo mbaakali abo antoomwe abali ikumi ababili bakamubuzya azikozyano.
Mpawo wakabaambila kuti, Nywebo mwapegwa aasisidwe aa-Bwami bwa-Leza, pele kulibaabo abali anze zyoonse zilacitwa muzikozyano,
kuti kubona bakabone pele kutabonesya, akumvwa bakamvwe pele kutamvwisya, antela mpaanga balasanduka akulekelelwa.
Lino wabaambila kuti, Sa tamumvwide cikozyano eci? Ino mulaziziba buti zikozyano zyoonse?
Eco ncaminza sikuminza ngemakani.
Lino abo bali kumbali anzila mbaabo baminzilwa makani, pele bamvwe buyo, mpoonya awo ulasika Saatani, akunyanga makani ngibaminzilidwe.
Mbubonya abalo ibakaminzilwa evu lyamabwe, nibamvwa makani, mpoonya mpoonya baatambula cakubotelwa,
anu tabajisi miyanda mulimbabo, balajata kaindi kaniini buyo, elyo na kwasika mapenzi na mafwabi nkaambo kamakani, mpoonya mpoonya balalebwa.
Abamwi mbambaabo ibakaminzilwa akati kamamvwa, mbabaabo bamvwa makani,
pele mapakasyo aaciindi ecino, akoongelezegwa kwabuvubi azisusi zimwi zyamisyobo misyobo, zyoonse zilanjila, zilasyanikizya makani, elyo abula akuzyala.
Pele abo ibakaminzilwa muvu ibotu mbambaabo bamvwa makani, baatambula, akuzyala micelo, bamwi makumi otatwe, bamwi makumi aali musanu alimwi, abamwi mwaanda.
Nkaambo taakwe cintu cisisidwe citakooyooyubununwa, alimwi taakwe cintu civumbidwe icitakooyoovumbululwa.
Anooli kuli muntu uujisi matwi aakumvwa, amvwe.
Alimwi wakabaambila kuti, Amucenjele nzyomumvwa. Ceelesyo ncimweelesya anywebo muyooelesegwa nciconya, alimwi muyootambula kwiindilila.
Nkaambo oyo uujisi uyoopegwa, pele oyo uutajisi uyoonyanzigwa niciba ncajisi.
Lino wakati, Bwami bwa-Leza buli mbuli muntu uuminza imbuto ansi.
Walo uloona akubuka lyoonse masiku asikati nkabela imbuto zilamena akukomena, pele walo tazi naazikomena buti.
Insi ilazyala micelo ini, kutaanguna busonga, nkokuya makunka, nkokuya maila aatuba mumakunka­.
Lino maila naabizwa, mpoonya mpoonya ulatuma cigonsyo, nkaambo casika ciindi cakutebula.
Buli mbuli inseke yamusitada yasyangwa ansi niniini kwiinda inseke zyoonse zyaansi,
nekubaboobo yasyangwa buyo, ilakomena, ilaba impati kwiinda misamu yoonse, akusonsa mitabi mipati, elyo bayuni bakujulu balakonzya kukala mucenzule cayo.
Nzikozyano zinji zili boobo nzyaakali kubaambizya makani, mbuli mbubakakonzya kumvwa.
Takakali kubaambila buyo cita muzikozyano, pele kulibasikwiiya bakwe mwini wakali kubapandulwida makani oonse kumbali.
Mpawo bakasia bantu, bakamutolelela awalo, mbubonya mbuli mbwaakabede, mubwaato. Aamwi maato akaliwo.
Nkabela kwakabbubbula iguwo ipati, aalo mayuwe akali kukupila maanzi mubwaato mane bwaato bwati kazule.
Pele walo mwini wakali kunkombo yabwaato, wakali koona acilitulisyo, elyo bakamubusya, bakati, Mufundisi, sa taakwe makani kulinduwe kuti tumane kufwa.
Lino wakabuka, wakasya iguwo, waambila maanzi kuti, Tontola, uumune wi! Mpoonya awo muuwo wakaleka, kwakaba luumuno lupati.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Mwabedanzi bowa? Tamuna kuba alusyomo na?
Mpawo bakayoowa akuyoowa kupati, bakalyaambauzya kuti, Ino oyu nguni? nkaambo nuuba muuwo naaba maanzi, zyoonse zilamumvwa.
Mpoonya naakazwa mubwaato, kwakamucinga muntu uuzwa muzyuumbwe, iwakanjilidwe adaimona uusofweede.
Oyo muntu wakali kukala muzyuumbwe, nkabela katakwe muntu uukonzya kumwaanga niiba inketani.
Nkaambo kanjikanji wakaliangidwe insimbi anketani, pele lyoonse inketani zyakali kudunsulwa, azyalo insimbi zyakali kutyolaulwa. Katakwe muntu uukonzya kumutontobeka pe.
Nkabela lyoonse masiku asikati wakali muzyuumbwe amumadundu, wakali kuompolola akulinengaula amabwe.
Lino naakabona Jesu alaale, wakamuzuzaanina,
elyo wakoompolola ajwi ipati lyakuti, Ino makaninzi ngetujisi mebo ayebo, Jesu omwana a-Leza wakujulu kwinikwini? Ndalisisya kuli-Leza utandipenzyi.
Nkaambo wakamwaambila kuti, Kozwa mumuntu oyu yebo odaimona uusofweede.
Lino wakamubuzya kuti, Nduweni izina lyako? Wakavuwa kuti, Ndime Legione, nkaambo tuli banji.
Nkabela wakamukumbila loko kuti atabatandili mucisi.
Lino oko kumbali adundu kwakali itanga ipati lyangulube, zyakali kucela.
Mpawo bakamukumbila kuti, Tutume kungulube, tunjile mulinzizyo.
Wakabazumizya. Mpoonya badaimona bakazwa, banjila mungulube, elyo itanga lyakazuzaanina kunkunkulisi lyalwizi, zyakali mbuli zyuulu zyobile, zyakasinwa maanzi mulwizi.
Lino beembezi bakacija, bakaakwaamba mumunzi amumyuunda. Abalo bakaboola kuzoobona eco icakaba.
Basike buyo kuli-Jesu, bakabona oyo sidaimona iwakanjilidwe legione, ulikede, ulisamide, alimwi ulisitikide, elyo bakayoowa.
Lino abo ibakabona bakabakananina zyoonse zyakaba kulisidaimona oyo, amakani aangulube.
Mpawo bakatalika kukombelezya Jesu kuti azwe mucisi cabo.
Nkabela naakali mukunjila mubwaato, oyo sidaimona wakamukumbila kuti bainke awe.
Pele teewakamuzumizya pe. Wakamwaambila kuti, Koya kuŋanda yako kubeenzinyoko, ukabalwiide ezyo nzyaakucitila Mwami, ambwaakufwida luzyalo.
Mpoonya awo wakainka, watalika kukambauka mucisi caku-Dekapole zyoonse nzyaakamucitila Jesu, nkabela bantu boonse bakagamba.
Lino Jesu naakabweedela kuzubuka mubwaato mutala, kwakamuyobolokela makamu manji, nkabela wakalikede ankomwe yalwizi.
Lino kwakasika umwi mweendelezi wacikombelo, izina lyakwe ngu-Jairo, Oyu muntu naakabona Jesu, wavundama kumaulu aakwe,
wamukumbilisya loko kuti, Kana kangu kasimbi kaamba kufwa. Koboola, ukamwaampe maanza aako, kuti afutuke, apone,
Lino bakaya awe, nkabela makamu mapati akamutobela akumulimbikizya.
Lino kwakali umwi mwanakazi iwakali kuzwa bulowa myaaka iili ikumi aibili,
wakapenga loko kubasilisi banji, wakasowa lubono lwakwe loonse nekuboobo takaponede akaniini pele cilwazi cakaindila.
Oyu naakamvwa makani aa-Jesu, wakeza mukati kamakamu kusule lyakwe, wakaampa zyakusama zyakwe.
Nkaambo wakati, Kufumbwa ndaakwaampa zyakusama zyakwe buyo, njoopona.
Mpoonya mpoonya mwiinzo wabulowa bwakwe wakayuminina, elyo wakalimvwa kabotu mumubili wakwe kuti wapona kucilwazi eco.
Mpawo Jesu mbwaakalimvwa mukati kuti inguzu zyandizwide, wakacebuka akati kamakamu, wakati, Ino nguni waampa zyakusama zyangu?
Basikwiiya bakwe bakamwaambila kuti, Oobabwene bantu banji aba mbubakulimbikizya, uwaambilanzi kuti, Nguni wandaampa?
Nkabela walo wakali kumulangaula oyo wakacita obo.
Mpawo mwanakazi wakayoowa akuzyangama, mbwaakazi ncaakacitilwa, wakeza, wakavundama kubusyu bwakwe, wakamwaambila lusinizyo loonse.
Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Mwanaangu, lusyomo lwako lwakufutula, koya, ube aluumuno akupona kubulwazi bwako.
Naakacili kwaamba obo, kwakasika bamwi bazwa kuŋanda yamweendelezi­ wacikombelo, bakati, Mwanaako wafwa kale, ucimupenzezyanzi Mufundisi?
Pele Jesu naakamvwa majwi aambwa wakaambila mweendelezi wacikombelo kuti, Utayoowi, kosyoma buyo.
Nkabela takakazumizya muntu naba omwe kucilila awe, pele Petro a-Jakobo a-Johane munyina Jakobo.
Lino nibakasika kuŋanda yamweendelezi wacikombelo, wabona lupyopyongano, abasikulila abasimikunga banji.
Mpoonya naakanjila wabaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nomupyopyongana akulila? Mwana tafwide pe, uloona buyo.
Mpawo bakamuwelela, Pele walo wakabatandila anze boonse, elyo wakatolelela wisi musimbi abanyina abaabo mbaakali abo, wanjila mwakabede musimbi.
Lino wakajata musimbi ajanza, wamwaambila kuti, Talitha kumi, nkukwaamba kuti, Kasimbi, buka.
Mpoonya mpoonya kasimbi kakanyampuka, kakeenda, nkaambo kakali amyaaka iili ikumi aibili yakuzyalwa, Mpawo bakakankamana lukankamano lupati.
Nkabela wakabakonkomwenesya kuti kutazibi muntu naba omwe, alimwi wakalailila kuti apegwe kulya.

Elyo nibwakasika buzuba bwa-Sabata, wakatalika kwiisya mucikombelo. Lino bantu banji nibakamvwa, bakagamba bakati, Ino Oyu muntu wakajana kuli zintu ezi? alimwi, Mbusongonzi mbwaapedwe oyu muntu? alimwi, Ngamakaninzi malele aali boobo aacitwa kumaanza aakwe?
Sa oyu engwe mubezi, mwana wa-Mariya, amwanaakwabo Jakobo a-Jose a-Juda a-Simoni? Abalo bacizi bakwe sa tabako okuno akati kesu? Nkabela bakalebegwa nguwe.
Lino Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Taakwe musinsimi uutalemekwa, pele kucisi cakulibo, aakati kabasiluzubonyina, amuŋanda yakwe mwini.
Nkabela oko takakakonzya kucita cilele niciba comwe, cita kuti wakabika maanza aakwe abalwazi bace akubaponya.
Wakagamba akutazumina kwabo, Lino wakainka akuya buzyunguluka muminzi akuya bwiisya.
Alimwi wakabalailila kuti, Mutatoli cintu niciba cimwi camulweendo pele musako luzutu. Mutatoli kulya, niiba inkomo, naaba mali muzikwama zyanu,
pele amusame zyeeta, alimwi mutasami zibaki zyobile.
Alimwi wakabaambila kuti, Koonse nkumuyoonjila muŋanda, amukakale mumonya mane do mukatozye kumbi.
Nkabela kumwi akumwi nkubakaka kumutambula nikuba kumuswiilila, elyo ciindi ncimuzwa oko amukunkumune lusuko luli kunsi azituta zyanu, cikabe citondezyo kulimbabo.
Mpawo bakainka kuyookambauka kuti bantu baleelede kweempwa.
Nkabela bakatanda badaimona banji, alimwi bakananika amafuta banji balwazi, akubaponya.
Bamwi bakati, NguEliya, abamwi bati, Ngumusinsimi nanka mbuli umwi wabasinsimi.
Pele Heroda naakamvwa wakati, Ngu-Johane oyo ngundakakosola mutwe, ulibukide.
Nkaambo Heroda mwini nguwakatuma kuyoojata Johane, wakamwaanga muntolongo nkaambo ka-Herodiya mukamunyina uutegwa Filipo, nkaambo wakalimukwete.
Ikuti Johane wakamwaambila Heroda kuti, Taciluleme kuti ukwate mukamunyoko.
Lino Herodiya wakalijisi inkoto kulinguwe, wakali kuyanda kumujaya, nekubaboobo wakakacilwa.
Nkaambo Heroda wakali kuyoowa Johane, ikuti wakalimuzi kuti muntu uululeme uusalala. Nkaambo kaako wakali kumubamba, nkabela naakamvwa wakazingwa loko, wamumvwa cakukondwa.
Lino buzuba bweelede nibwakasika, nkukuti buzuba bwakuzyalwa kwakwe, mbuwakacita Heroda ipobwe lyabapati bakwe abasolozi bankondo abami ba-Galilaya,
elyo wakanjila mwanaakwe musimbi Herodiya, wakazyana, wakabotezya Heroda ambaakali abo mukulya, Mpawo mwami wakaambila musimbi kuti, Ndikumbila coonse ncoyanda, ndakupa.
Nkabela wakamukonkela kuti, Coonse ncoti ndikumbile ndakupa ncico, niciba cibeela cabwami bwangu.
Lino walo wakazwa, wakaakubuzya banyina kuti, Ino nkakumbilenzi? Bakati, Mutwe wa-Johane Mubapatizi.
Mpoonya wakeza alubilo kumwami, wakamukumbila kuti, Ndayanda kuti undipe ndilyonya lino mutwe wa-Johane Mubapatizi mumutiba.
Lino mwami wakausa loko, nekubaboobo nkaambo kankonko zyakwe, alimwi nkaambo kabaabo mbaakali abo mukulya, takakakonzya kumukasya.
Mpoonya mpoonya mwami wakatuma umwi sikulindila, wakamulailila kuti alete mutwe wakwe, elyo wakainka, wakamukosola mutwe muntolongo,
wakaleta mutwe wakwe mumutiba, wakaupa musimbi, awalo musimbi wakaupa banyina.
Lino basikwiiya bakwe nibakamvwa obo, bakeza kuzoobweza mutunta wakwe, bakauzika mucuumbwe.
Mpawo wakabaambila kuti, Amuboole nywebo nubeni kumbali kunkanda, mukalyokezye buniini. Nkaambo abo abakali kuza akuya kabali banji, nkabela bakabula ciindi niciba cakulya.
Mpoonya bakainka mubwaato kumbali kunkanda.
Pele bantu banji bakababona nibakali kuya, babaziba, elyo bakabazuzaanina ansi kuzwa kuminzi yoonse, bakababeelela kusika.
Lino naakazwa wakabona makamu manji aabantu, elyo wakabafwida luzyalo, nkaambo bakabaanga nimbelele zitakwe mweembezi, nkabela wakatalika kubaiisya makani manji.
Lino izuba nilyakaya ambo, basikwiiya bakwe bakamuzida, bakati, Okuno nkusokwe buyo, alimwi izuba lyaya ambo.
Bamwaisye kuti banjile mumyuunda amuminzi iiengelede, bakalyuulile zyakulya.
Walo wakabavwiila kuti, Amubape zyakulya nywebo. Bamwaambila kuti, Sa twiinke kuyooula mikamu yamasheleni aali myaanda yobile, tuzoobape zyakulya?
Wabaambila wati, Ili yongae mikamu njimujisi? Kamuya, mukabone, Bazibe buyo, bakati, Nzisanu, answi zyobile.
Mpawo wakabalailila kuti boonse beelede kukala zitanga zitanga amweemvwe mutete.
Mpoonya bakakala bbwaambwa munkamu zyamwaanda amunkamu zyamakumi osanwe.
Lino wakabweza eyo mikamu yosanwe answi zyobile, wakaululala kujulu, wakalumba wakakomona mikamu akupa basikwiiya kuti bakabakalikizizye, azyalo inswi zyobile wakazyaabanya akati kabo boonse.
Nkabela bakalya boonse, bakakuta.
Alimwi bakayola bufwefwelenga buzuzya zisuwo zili ikumi azibili, azyalo inswi bakaziyola mbubonya.
Nkabela baalumi bakalya eyo mikamu bakali zyuulu zyosanwe.
Lino naakabalaya, wakainka mudundu kuyookomba.
Nkabela nikwakasia, bwaato bwakali akati kalwizi, anukuti walo alike wakacili kutala.
Lino naakabona kuti balipengede kukwasula, nkaambo kaguwo ilyakabacinjila, wakaboola kulimbabo uza bweenda atala lyamaanzi nikwakaba kubusiku, wakali kuyanda kubaindilila.
Pele balo nibakamubona uleenda atala lyamaanzi, bakayeeya kuti musangu, bakakwiila,
nkaambo boonse bakamubona, bakayoowa. Mpoonya wakaamba abo, wakati, Amuyumye myoyo, ndime, mutayoowi.
Lino wakanjila mubwaato antoomwe abalo, elyo muuwo wakaumuna, nkabela bakagamba loko ulwabo.
Nkaambo tabalina kumvwisya makani aamikamu, myoyo yabo yakaliyumide.
Lino nibakazubuka basika kutala ku-Genesarete, basyoka ankomwe.
Mpoonya bacizwa buyo mubwaato, bantu bakaindilila akumuziba,
elyo bakaindingana mucisi eco coonse, bakatalika kutembeka balwazi amikuli akubatola kooko nkubakamumvwida kuti nkwabede.

Nkabela moonse mwaakali kuya bunjila, nimuba muminzi nimuba mumagunzi nimuba mumyuunda, bakabika balwazi antangalala, bakamukumbila kuti baampe nibuba bwaya bwacikobela cakwe, elyo boonse ibakamwaampa bakaponezegwa.
Nkabela bakabona kuti bamwi basikwiiya bakwe bakali kulya insima amaanza aatondwa, nkukuti aatacovwekede.
Nkaambo ba-Farisi aba-Juda boonse, kuti tabacovweki lubbe maanza aabo, tabalyi, ikuti balajatisya tunsiyansiya twabasikale.
Alimwi kufumbwa nibazwa kucisambalilo, tabalyi mane anzina balisansaile, alimwi nkuzili ziyanza zinji nzibajisi akuzibamba, mbuli kunika inkomeki azilongo azibiya zyamukuba.
Lino ba-Farisi abalembi bakamubuzya kuti, Nkaambonzi basikwiiya bako ncobatayoboli tunsiyansiya twabasikale, anukuti balalya insima amaanza aatondwa.
Wabaambila kuti, Ncobeni Isaya wakasinsima anywebo nubasikuupaupa ameso, mbubonya mbukulembedwe kuti,
Aba bantu balandilemeka amilomo yabo,
Pele myoyo yabo ili kule kulindime:
Kundikomba kwabo nkwabuyo,
Nkaambo zifundo nzibafunda njimilazyo yabantu buyo.
Mwaleka Mulao wa-Leza, mwajatisya tunsiyansiya twabantu.
Alimwi wakabaambila kuti, Ncobeni mulasusya Mulao wa-Leza kuti mukayobole tunsiyansiya twanu.
Nkaambo Musa wakati, Lemeka uso abanyoko, alimwi wakati, Uuamba cibi kuliwisi akulibanyina, afwe akufwa.
Pele nywebo mulati, Na muntu waamba kuliwisi abanyina kuti, Zyoonse zili buti nzimuyoogwasigwa kulindime ngu-Korbani, nkukuti nzezipegwa Leza,
elyo mwazumizya oyo kuti atacigwasyi wisi abanyina.
Mulalobya ijwi lya-Leza nkaambo katunsiyansiya twanu ntumusiilidwe, alimwi nkuzili zintu zinji zili boobo nzimucita,
Mpawo wakaliitila lwabili makamu aabantu, wabaambila kuti, Amundiswiilile nyoonse, mumvwisye.
Taakwe cintu icizwa anze lyamuntu cinjila mukati cikonzya kumubisya pe, pele zintu zizwa mukati lyamuntu, ezyo nzezibisya muntu.
Muntu uukwete matwi aakuswiilila aswiilile.
Lino naakasia bantu akunjila muŋanda, basikwiiya bakwe bakamubuzya acikozyano eco.
Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Sa anywebo mucili mukutamvwa? Tamubwene kuti taakwe cintu cili anze lyamuntu icinga cilamubisya camunjila mukati.
Nkaambo tacinjili mumoyo wakwe pele mwida buyo, limwi cilazwida anze. Ncaakaamba obo nkusalazya zilyo zyoonse.
Alimwi wakaamba kuti, Icizwa mumuntu nciceeco cibisya muntu.
Nkaambo mukati, nkukuti kuzwa mumoyo wamuntu, mulazwa miyeeyo mibi, bwaamu,
bubbi, bujayi, bumambi, kulikumbuzya, zibi, luuni zisusi zibi, ibbivwe, kutukila, kulikankaizya, abufuba.
Zibi ezi zyoonse zilazwa mukati, nzizyo zibisya muntu.
Pele mpoonya umwi mwanakazi, iwakali amwana musimbi uunjilidwe daimona uusofweede, naakamvwa wakaboola kuzoovundama kumaulu aakwe.
Oyo mwanakazi wakali muHelene, musyobo wakwe mu-Suro-Fonika. Elyo wakamukumbila kuti atande daimona kuzwa mumwanaakwe musimbi.
Lino wakamwaambila kuti, Kotana, bataangune kukuta bana, nkaambo tacili cibotu kunyanga bana insima akwiiwaala kutubwa.
Pele walo wakamuvwiila kuti, Mbubo, Mwami, Tee atwalo tubwa tuli kunsi lyantafule inga tulalembelela tufwefwelenga twabana.
Mpawo wakamwaambila kuti, Mbowaamba obo, koya buyo, daimona wazwa kale mumwanaako.
Mpoonya awo wakainka kubanamuzyaabo, waakujana mwana ulilede abulo, alimwi daimona wazwa kale.
Nkabela bamuletela umwi musinkematwi sikubebesya, bamukumbila kuti amubike ijanza.
Lino wakamugwisya mumakamu aabantu, wamutola kumbali, elyo wakamutunga minwe yakwe mumatwi, alimwi wakaswida mate akumulamba ngao amulaka wakwe.
Mpoonya wakaululala kujulu, wali-sinsimukila, wamwaambila kuti, Effatha, nkukuti, Sinkuka.
Mpoonya mpoonya akasinkuka matwi aakwe, aceeco cakaangide mulaka wakwe caka-pasuka, watalika kwaamba kabotu.
Lino wakabalailila kuti bataambili muntu, anu naakabalailila obo bakainda kuduumya impuwo kumakani ayo.
Nkabela bakainda kukankamana loko, bakati, Wabosya kucita zyoonse. Basinkematwi ulabasinkula, abalo basyataambi ulabaambya.
Ndafwida luzyalo aba bantu banji, nkaambo balikede kulindime mazuba otatwe, akulya pe.
Kuti ndabamwaisya mwabo mwabo kabacifwide inzala, banooya bulengauka munzila, alimwi bamwi bazwa kule.
Lino basikwiiya bakwe bakamuvwiila kuti, Ino kai omuno musokwe zizwe kuli zilyo zyaku-kusya bantu boonse aba?
Mpawo wakababuzya kuti, Ino mujisi mikamu yongae? Bakati, Ili musanu aibili.
Mpoonya wakaambila bantu kuti bakale ansi, elyo wakabweza eyo mikamu iili musanu aibili, walumba, waikomona, waitambika basikwiiya bakwe kuti baabile bantu, nkabela bakaabila makamu.
Alimwi bakalijisi tuswi tuce. Lino wakalumba, wakaamba kuti baabile ntuto atwalo.
Mpoonya bakalya cakukuta, alimwi bakayola bufwefwelenga busyaala, bazuzya mbubo insuwo zili musanu azibili.
Nkabela bantu bakali mbuli zyuulu zyone. Mpoonya awo wakabamwaisya.
Lino ndilyonya wakanjila mubwaato antoomwe abasikwiiya bakwe, bakainka kucisi ca-Dalmanuta.
Nkabela wakalisintimukila, wakati, Ino aba basyaasunu bayandilanzi citondezyo? Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Aba basyaasunu tabakoozoopegwa citondezyo pe.
Mpoonya wakabasia, wabweeda mubwaato, wainka mutala.
Nkabela bakaluba kubweza kulya. Mubwaato mobakabede kamutakwe cintu pele mukamu omwe buyo.
Elyo wakabaambila kuti, Amucenjele kubumena bwaba-Farisi akubumena bwa-Heroda.
Lino bakatalika koombolozyanya kuti, Twabula mikamu.
Nkabela Jesu amvwe buyo boobo, wabaambila kuti, Nkaambonzi muloombolozyanya kuti mwabula mikamu. Sa tamuna kubona nikuba kumvwisya? Sa myoyo yanu icili miyumu?
Mulijisi meso. Sa tamuboni? Mulijisi matwi. Sa tamumvwi? Sa tamwiibaluki?
Nindakakomauna mikamu yosanwe akusanina bantu bali zyuulu zyosanwe, kazili zyongae zisuwo zizwide bufwefwelenga nzimwakayola? Bakati, Zyakali ikumi azibili.
Alimwi eyo mikamu yosanwe aibili njibakaabilwa bantu bali zyuulu zyone, ino kazili zyongae zisuwo zizwide bufwefwelenga nzimwakayola? Bakati, Zyakali musanu azibili.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Sa tamuna kumvwisya?
Lino wakajata moofu kujanza, wamugwisya mumunzi, elyo wakamuswida mate kumeso, wamubika maanza, wamubuzya kuti, Sa wabona cintu?
Mpawo wakacebauka, wakati, Ndabona bantu, ndababona beenda mbuli masamu,
Lino wakamubika maanza lwabili, mpoonya awo moofu wakatongomwena, weenzana, wabonesya zintu zyoonse mbuzibede.
Mpoonya wakamutuma kubanamuzyaabo, wakati, Utanjili nimuba mumunzi.
Bamwaambila kuti, Baamba kuti nduwe Johane Mubapatizi. Bamwi baamba kuti, Nduwe Eliya. Abamwi bati, Nduwe umwi wabasinsimi.
Lino wakababuzya kuti, Pele nywebo mundaamba kuti ndimeni? Wakamuvwiila Petro kuti, Nduwe Kristo.
Mpoonya wakabakasya kuti bataambili muntu naba omwe obo.
Lino wakatalika kubaiisya kuti Mwana a-Muntu uleelede kuyoopenga loko akutakatwa kubapati akubapaizi basimutwe akubalembi, alimwi uleelede kujayigwa, elyo uyoobuka naamana mazuba otatwe.
Makani aya wakaamba kaanzambwene. Mpoonya Petro wakamutola kumbali, watalika kumutapatila.
Pele walo acebe buyo, mbwaakabwene basikwiiya bakwe, wakatapatila Petro wati, Koya kusule lyangu, Saatani, nkaambo toyeeyi makani aa-Leza pele makani aabantu buyo.
Nkaambo umwi aumwi uuyanda kuyobola buumi bwakwe uzoobusweekelwa, pele umwi aumwi uusweekelwa buumi bwakwe nkaambo kandime aka-Makani Mabotu uzoobuyobola.
Nkaambo nimpindunzi njajana muntu anooli wavuba nyika yoonse nekuboobo wasweekelwa buumi bwakwe?
Nanka ncinzi muntu ncati nunuzye buumi bwakwe?

Nkaambo umwi aumwi uundyuusila bweeme, mebo amajwi aangu, akati kabasyaasunu basibumambi basizibi, alakwe Mwana a-Muntu uyoomuusya bweeme oyo muntu ciindi ncati boole mubulemu bwawisi antoomwe abaangelo basalala.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti ano mpomwiimvwi mpobali bamwi batakooyoomvwa lufu mane bakasaangunekubona Bwami bwa-Leza buzide anguzu.
nkabela zyakusama zyakwe zyakanyengema zyakatuba buu, taakwe sizisani waansi ano uunga ulazitubya mbubo pe.
Mpawo kwakabapompela Eliya a-Musa, balaambaula a-Jesu.
Lino Petro wakaambila Jesu kuti, O mwami, ncintu cibotu kuti tube ano, atuyake zilao zyotatwe, cimwi cibe cako, cimwi cibe ca-Musa, cimwi cibe ca-Eliya.
Anu wakali kudubbwa buyo, nkaambo bakaliyoowede loko.
Mpoonya kwakaboola ikumbi, lyakabavunikila, alimwi omo mukumbi mwakazwa ijwi lyaamba kuti, Ngooyu Mwanaangu uuyandika, amuswiilile nguwe.
Mpoonya bacebauke buyo, bakajana kuti taakwe muntu umbi pele Jesu walo alwabo beni.
Elyo makani ayo bakaayobola, nkabela bakali kubuzyanya akati kabo beni aakubuka kuzwa kubafu kuti na nkokutinzi?
Lino bakamubuzya kuti, Ino balembi baambilanzi kuti Eliya uleelede kusaanguna kusika?
Wakabaambila kuti, Ncobeni Eliya ulasaanguna kusika, azoolungulule zintu zyoonse, Alimwi, nkutyeni eco cilembedwe aa-Mwana a-Muntu cakuti uleelede kupenga loko akutakatwa?
Anu ndamwaambila kuti Eliya ulisikide kale, pele bakamucitila mbuli mbubakayanda mumyoyo yabo, mbubonya mbukulembedwe anguwe.
Mpoonya bantu boonse nibakamubona, bakagamba loko, bakazuzaana kuyoomujuzya.
Elyo wakababuzya kuti, Ino ncinzi ncimuombolozyanya ambabo?
Lino umwi muntu wakumakamu wakamuvwiila kuti, Mufundisi, ndakaliletede kulinduwe mwanaangu uunjidwe daimona uutaambi.
Koonse nkwaamujana ulamuwaala ansi, elyo ulayovula igovu, akuluma ntwino, alimwi wakotela. Ndakalibaambilide basikwiiya bako kuti bamutande, pele bakazundwa.
Lino wakabavwiila kuti, Akaka, nywebo nobasyaasunu batasyomi! Ino nciindi congae ncenti kale kulindinywe? nciindi congae ncenti kamukazikile moyo? Amumulete kulindime.
Elyo bakamuleta nkwaakabede, mpoonya amubone buyo, daimona wakamugwigwimya, nkabela wakawida ansi, wakali kwaalabana akuyovula igovu.
Nkabela wakabuzya wisi kuti, Ino cakamutalikila lili eci? Wakati, Kubwanike.
Kanjikanji cilamuwisizya mumulilo amumaanzi kuti cimunyonyoone. Kuti kokonzya, tufwide luzyalo, utugwasye.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Wanookonzya buti? Zintu zyoonse zilakonzeka kuliyooyo uusyoma.
Mpoonya wisi mwana wakoonzomoka kuti, Ndasyoma! gwasya kutasyoma kwangu.
Lino Jesu abone buyo kuti bantu banji baza bubilaana, wakatapatila daimona uusofweede, wamwaambila wati, Yebo odaimona uutaambi uutamvwi, ndakulailila kuti, Zwa mulinguwe, utacimunjili limbi.
Mpoonya awo wakoonzomoka, wamugwigwimya loko, wazwa. Mpawo mwana wabaanga wafwa, elyo banjibanji bakaamba kuti wafwa.
Pele Jesu wakamujata mujanza, wakamubusya, elyo wakabuka.
Lino anjile buyo muŋanda basikwiiya bakwe bakamubuzya kumbali kuti, Ino kai swebo twakakacilwanzi kumutanda?
Wakabaambila kuti, Oyu musyobo taakwe bumbi mbuutandwa pele kukukomba luzutu.
Nkaambo wakali kwiisya basikwiiya bakwe akubaambila kuti, Mwana a-Muntu ulaabwa kumaanza aabantu abati kamujaye, elyo aakujayigwa uyoobuka aakumana mazuba otatwe.
Pele balo teebakamvwisya makani ayo pe, alimwi bakali kuyoowa kwaabuzya.
Pele balo bakaumuna buyo, nkaambo munzila bakali kukazyanya kuti ino nguni mupati wabo.
Lino wakakala, wabaita bali ikumi ababili, wabaambila kuti, Uuyanda kuba mupati, abe munsi lyaboonse, abe mulanda wabo boonse.
Mpawo wakabweza kana, wakaimika akati kabo, wakabukata, wabaambila kuti,
Umwi aumwi uutambula kana nikaba komwe kali boobu muzina lyangu, ulatambula ndime, Alimwi umwi aumwi uutambula ndime, teensi ndime ngwaatambula pe, ulatambula oyo iwakandituma.
Pele Jesu wakati, Mutamukasyi pe, nkaambo taakwe muntu uucita malele muzina lyangu uuyoofwamba kundibisya-bisya.
Nkaambo oyo uutali sinkondoma ngumuzwalani wesu.
Ikuti umwi aumwi uuti kamunywisye cinywido camaanzi nkaambo kakuti muli banaKristo, ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti mane do ukajane bulumbu.
Alimwi, umwi aumwi uulebya umwi wabaniini aba bandisyoma, kanaangililwa izio ipati munsingo yakwe akuwaalwa mulwizi.
Alimwi ijanza lyako na lyakulebya, likosole. Mpaanga cilabota kuti unjile mubuumi ecibumpu kwiinda kunjila ku-Gehena, mumulilo uutazimi, anu alyeenzene maanza aako,
Mwalo omo imvunyu yabo tiikwe niifwa, amulilo tuukwe kuzima.
Acalo cituta cako na cakulebya, cikosole. Mpaanga cilabota kuti unjile mubuumi, uli cilema, kwiinda kuwaalwa mu-Gehena, kojisi zituta zyobile.
Mwalo omo imvunyu yabo tiikwe niifwa, amulilo tuukwe kuzima.
Alyalo liso lyako na lyakulebya, lidokomone, Mpaanga cilabota kuti unjile mu-Bwami bwa-Leza, koli sicimbolyo, kwiinda kuwaalwa mu-Gehena, kojisi meso obile.
Mwalo omo imvunyu yabo tiikwe niifwa, amulilo tuukwe kuzima.
Nkaambo umwi aumwi uyoolungwa amulilo.
Munyo mubotu, pele kuti munyo wasampuka, ino kai ulalungwa buti? Amube amunyo mulindinywe, alimwi amube aluumuno abeenzinyoko.
Mpoonya kwakasika ba-Farisi, bamubuzya kuti, Sa kuliluleme kuti mwaalumi aleke mukaakwe? Ncobakamubuzizya boobo nkumusunka.
Lino wakabavwiila kuti, Ino Musa wakamulailila buti?
Bakati, Musa wakazumina kuti kakunga kakulembwa lugwalo lwakulekana, elyo alekwe.
Pele Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Nkaambo kabuyumu bwamyoyo yanu ncaakamulembela mulazyo oyu.
Kwalo anu kumalengelo Leza wakabaanza mwaalumi amwanakazi;
nkaambo kaako mwaalumi uleelede kusia wisi abanyina, akukakatila mukaakwe,
elyo abo bobile baba mubili omwe, Aboobo tabacili bobile pe, anukuti mubili omwe.
Nkaambo kaako abo mbaaswaanganya Leza, kutabi muntu uubaanzaanya.
Lino nibakali muŋanda, basikwiiya bakamubuzya alimwi makani ayo.
Wakabaambila kuti, Muntu umwi aumwi uuleka mukaakwe akukwata umbi, wamucitila bumambi.
Awalo mwanakazi uuala kumulumaakwe akukwatwa umbi, wacita bumambi.
Jesu abone boobo, wakabanyemena, wabaambila kuti, Amuleke twana, tuze kulindime, mutatukasyi pe, nkaambo Bwami bwa-Leza mbubwabo bali boobo.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Umwi aumwi uutatambuli Bwami bwa-Leza mbuli kana, takooyoonjila mulimbubo pe.
Elyo wakatubukata, watulongezya akutubikila maanza aakwe.
Elyo Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Ino undaambililanzi kuti omubotu? Taakwe muntu mubotu, pele Leza alike ngumubotu.
Ulizi milazyo, iiti, Utajayi, Utaciti bumambi, Utabbi, Utapi muntu kaambo cakubeja, Utalidi beenzinyoko, Kolemeka uso abanyoko.
Lino walo wakamwaambila kuti, Mufundisi, aya oonse nsikwe nendakaaluba kuzwa kubwana bwangu.

Mpawo Jesu amuzilikizye buyo, akumuyanda wamuyanda, wamwaambila kuti, Alo mpocili comwe ncotajisi, Nceeci. Koya ukauzye zyoonse nzyojisi, ukape bacete, notijane lubono kujulu, alimwi uboole, ucilile ndime.
Amvwe buyo majwi aya, wakasutana kubusyu, wakainka abuusu, nkaambo wakali alubono lunji.
Mpoonya awo Jesu wakaceba kulibasikwiiya bakwe, wakati, Ha! takuli nkokuyuma kunjila mu-Bwami bwa-Leza kulibaabo bali alubono lunji.
Nkabela basikwiiya bakagamba kumajwi aakwe. Pele Jesu wakabavwiila lwabili kuti, Nubana bangu, kulibaabo basyoma lubono nkuyumu kunjila mu-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Nkutete kunkamele kuti iinde muliso lyansunda kwiinda kuti muvubi anjile mu-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Bamvwe boobo, bakayumwa mukanwa nta, elyo bakabuzyanya kuti, Mwati inga kuyooba uyoofutuka buya?
Mpoonya Jesu wakabalanga, wakati, Kubantu tacikonzeki pe, pele kwa-Leza cilakonzeka, nkaambo zintu zyoonse zilakonzeka kwa-Leza.
Lino Petro wakatalika kumwaambila kuti, Bona, swebo twakaleka zintu zyoonse kuzoocilila nduwe.
Jesu wakati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Taakwe muntu iwakaleka iŋanda nibaba banabakwabo nibaba bacizi nibaba banyina naba wisi nibaba bana bakwe niiba myuunda nkaambo kandime aka-Makani Mabotu,
anu ulijene kale kuciindi ecino buncilincili bwamaanda abanabakwabo abacizi abamanyina abana amyuunda, antoomwe amapenzi, elyo muciindi ciboola uyoojana buumi butamani,
Pele banjibanji ibasaanguna mbabayoosyaalila, abalo ibasyaalila mbabayoosaanguna.
Wakati, Amubone, tulaya ku-Jerusalemu, elyo Mwana a-Muntu uyooabwa kumaanza aabapaizi basimutwe aabalembi, bayoomubeteka kuti afwe, akuyoomwaaba kumaanza aabamasi.
Alimwi bayoomusabwida akumuswida mate akumukwipaula akumujaya, elyo aakumana mazuba otatwe uyoobuka.
Lino wabaambila kuti, Ino ncinzi ncimuyanda kuti nkamupe?
Bakamwaambila kuti, Utupe kuti tukakale, umwi kululyo lwako, umwi kucimwensi cako, mubulemu bwako.
Pele Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Ncimukumbila tamucizi mbucibede. Sa inga mulakonzya kunywida mucinywido ncinywida mebo, nikuba kubapatizigwa lubapatizyo ndwembapatizigwa?
Bakamuvwiila kuti, Tulakonzya, Lino Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Mucinywido munywida mebo, muyoonywida mumonya, alwalo lubapatizyo ndwembapatizigwa, muyoobapatizigwa ndulonya.
Pele kukala kululyo lwangu nanka kucimwensi cangu, endime empa pe, anu nkukwabo abo ibakabambilwa nkuko.
Lino bamvwe buyo bali ikumi, batalika kunyemena Jakobo a-Johane.
Mpoonya Jesu wakabaita, wabaambila kuti, Mulizi kuti abo baambwa kuti mbaami kubamasi balabacitila kami-kami, abalo bapati babo babacita mweenzyabubi.
Pele nywebo mutabi boobo pe. Oyo uuyanda kuba mupati akati kanu, abe mulanda wanu.
Alimwi oyo uuyanda kuba musolozi wanu, abe muzike wanu nyoonse.
Nkaambo alakwe Mwana a-Muntu takazide kumaninwa milimo pe, pele kuti amanine bamwi milimo, akwaaba buumi bwakwe kuti cibe cinunuzyo cakununuzya banji.
Lino naakamvwa kuti ngu-Jesu mu-Nazareta, wakatalika koonzomoka kuti, Omwana a-Davida, Jesu ndifwida luzyalo.
Nkabela banji bakamutapatila, kuti aumune. Pele walo wakaindilila koonzomoka kuti, Omwana a-Davida, ndifwida luzyalo.
Mpawo Jesu wakaima, wakati, Amumwiite. Lino bamwiita moofu, bamwaambila kuti, Liyumye-yumye, unyamuke, ulakwiita.
Mpoonya wakasowa ingubo yakwe, wadwantuka, wainka kuli-Jesu.
Lino Jesu wakamubuzya kuti, Ncinzi ncoyanda kuti nkakucitile? Moofu wakamuvwiila kuti, Akaka, Mwami, nkabone!
Mpoonya Jesu wamwaambila kuti, Koya buyo, lusyomo lwako lwakufutula. Mpoonya mpoonya wabona akubona, wamucilila munzila.
wabaambila kuti, Kamuya kumunzi uuli kunembo, elyo mbomuti kuunjilile buyo, muyoobona kana kambongolo katanatantidwe muntu, kalisungidwe. Amukakasungulule, mukakalete okuno.
Kwaakuba uuti kamubuzye kuti, Ino mucitilanzi obo? mukavwiile kuti, Ulakayanda Mwami, elyo ulakapilusya mpoonya mpoonya.
Lino bakainka, baakujana imbongolo, njeeyi ilisungidwe kumulyango anze mumugwagwa, elyo bakaisungulula.
Nkabela bamwi ibakaliimvwi oko bakabuzya kuti, Ino kai njaanzi imbongolo eyi njomwaangulula?
Mpawo bakabaambila mbubonya mbwaakabalailila Jesu, elyo bakabazumizya.
Nkabela baisisye buyo kuli-Jesu, bakavwapaika zyakusama zyabo alinjiyo, elyo wiitanta.
Alimwi, banjibanji bakayala zikobela zyabo munzila, abamwi bakayala masanzu ngubakatema mumyuunda.
Lino abo abakali kunembo, abalo abo ibakali kumucilide munsi, boonse bakoonzomoka kuti,
Hosana!
Uli acoolwe oyu uuboola muzina lya-Jehova,
Buli acoolwe Bwami buboola, Bwami bwa-Taateesu Davida,
Hosana kujulu kwinikwini.
Buce buyo, nibakazwa ku-Betaniya, wakafwa inzala.

Lino naakalanga alaale wakabona bukuyu busia matu, elyo wakasika kulimbubo, kuti antela kuli inkuyu, alye. Pele naakasika kulimbubo, wajana kuti taakwe pe, pele matu luzutu, nkaambo ciindi cankuyu kacitana kusika.
Mpoonya wakaambila obo bukuyu kuti, Kuzwa sunu kutabi uulya micelo kulinduwe lyoonse. Abalo basikwiiya bakwe bakamvwa.
alimwi takakali kuzumizya naba muntu uyumwide cintu kuti ainde muntempele pe.
Elyo wakabaiisya kuti, Sa takulembedwe kuti, Iŋanda yangu inooambwa­ kuti niŋanda yakukombela yamasi oonse? Anu nywebo mwiicita kuti ibe ikoba lyababbi.
Lino bapaizi basimutwe abalembi nibakamvwa obo, bakatalika kuyandaula mbobati mujaye, nkaambo bakali kumuyoowa, ikuti banamunji boonse bakakankamana kukwiisya kwakwe.
Lyoonse kufumbwa naakaba mangolezya wakali kupola mumunzi.
Lino Petro naakaibulukwa, wakaambila Jesu kuti, Mwami, kolanga, bukuyu obuya mbowakasinganya bwakayuma nta!
Mpoonya awo Jesu wakabavwiila kuti, Amube alusyomo lwakuli-Leza.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Umwi aumwi uuambila idundu eli kuti, Zyuka awa, uwaalwe mulwizi, alimwi tadooneki mumoyo wakwe anukuti wasyoma kuti eco ncaamba ciyooba, uyoocipegwa ncobeni.
Boobo ncindamwaambila kuti, coonse ncimukomba akukumbila, amusyome kuti mulatambula nciconya, elyo mulacipegwa ncobeni.
Alimwi, lyoonse mwanooima akukomba, na muli akaambo amweenzinyoko, amumulekelele nkako, kuti alakwe Usowanu uuli kujulu akamulekelele milandu yanu.
Pele na mwakaka kulekelela, alakwe Usowanu uuli kujulu takooyoomulekelela milandu yanu.
Balo bakamubuzya kuti, Ino kai mbwaminzi mbomanya milimo eyi? Alimwi, nguni wakakupa bwami bwakumanya milimo eyi?
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Ambebo ndamubuzya ijwi lyomwe. Mwandivwiila, ndilamwaambila bwami mbwemanya milimo eyi.
Lubapatizyo lwa-Johane, sa lwakazwa kujulu nanka kubantu? Amundivwiile.
Lino bakabuzyanya mulicabo kuti, Anooli twaamba kuti lwakazwa kujulu, walo ulati, Lino nkaambonzi ncimwatakamuzuminina?
Pele na twaambe buyo kuti lwakazwa kubantu-bakali kuyoowa bantu, nkaambo boonse bakali kwaamba kuti Johane musinsimi mwinimwini.
Lino bakavwiila Jesu kuti, Tatuzi nkulwakazwa pe, Mpawo Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Ambebo nsikoomwaambila bwami mbwemanya milimo eyi.
Lino kuciindi ceelede wakatuma muzike kubalimi, kuti atambule kulimbabo imwi micelo yamumuunda.
Lino naakasika, bakamujata, bamuuma, bamutanda, wapiluka acinkamba minwe.
Alimwi wakabatumina umbi muzike wabili, elyo oyo bakamuuma amutwe, akumubbunta.
Lino wakabatumina umbi watatu, nkabela oyo bakamujaya. Abamwi banji bakabacitila mbubonya obo, bamwi bakabauma, abamwi bakabajaya.
Lino kwakamusyaalila omwe, mwana wakuzyala ngwaakali kuyandisya, elyo munsi wakabatumina nguwe, nkaambo wakati, Mbwali mwanaangu bayoomulemeka.
Pele abo balimi bamubone buyo, bakaamba kuti, Ngooyu uuzoolya izina, kamuza, tumujaye, kuti lubono lube lwesu,
Mpoonya bakamujata, bamujaya, elyo bakamusowela kunze lyamuunda.
Lino awo mukamwini muunda ulacita buti? Inga ulaboola kuzoojaya balimi abo, elyo muunda uyoobapa bambi.
Sa tamunakwiibalide iŋwadi eyi iiamba kuti,
Ibbwe ndibakasowede basikuyaka,
Ndilyonya ndilyakaba mutwe wacooko.
Aya makani azwa ku-Jehova,
Alayoosya mumeso esu.
Lino bakali kuyanda kumujata, pele kwakabayoosya buyo makamu aabantu, Nkaambo bakaziba kuti eco cikozyano cakali kwaamba ambabo, Elyo bakamusia, bainka.

Basike buyo, bakamwaambila kuti, Mufundisi, tulizi kuti yebo uli muntu uuluzi, tokwe kampenda amuntu pe, nkaambo toebi ciwa camuntu pe, pele ufundisya inzila ya-Leza cakusinizya. Sa ncibotu kuti katunga katutela kuli-Kaisara na ncibi?
Sa tukape nanka tukakake? Pele walo mbwaakaziba bupelenge bwabo, wakati, Ino mundisunkilanzi? Amundiletele isheleni, ndibone,
Mpawo bakalileta. Lino wakababuzya kuti, Ino ncicani eci cifwanisyo cili alindilyo, abwalo bulembo mbubwani? Bakamuvwiila kuti, Nzizya-Kaisara.
Mpoonya Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Zintu zya-Kaisara amuzipe Kaisara, azyalo zintu zya-Leza amuzipe Leza, Elyo bakagamba loko,
Mufundisi, Musa wakatulembela kuti, na muntu wafwa, wasia mukaakwe, katakwe mwana, mwanaakwabo uleelede kumukwata mukamufu, kuti azyalile mwanaakwabo bana.
Lino kakuli bamwi babunyina bali musanu ababili, nkabela mupati wabo wakakwata mwanakazi, wakafwa, amwana pe.
Elyo wakamukwata wabili, alakwe wakafwa, takasiide amwana, awatatu mbubonya.
Mane boonse bali musanu ababili, taakwe iwakasia mwana pe. Bamane buyo kufwa boonse, wakafwa mwanakazi alakwe.
Ino kubuzuba bwakuyoobuka nguli akati kabaabo boonse ngwayoobeda mukaakwe? Nkaambo boonse abo bali musanu ababili bakalimukwete.
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Sa embo mbombubo obo ncimwasweekela, nkaambo tamuzi malembe niziba inguzu zya-Leza?
Ikuti ciindi ncibayoobuka kubafu, tabakwati nikuba kukwatizigwa pe, pele bali mbuli baangelo bakujulu.
Pele kumakani aakubuka kwabafu, sa tamunabalide mubbuku lya-Musa, kunkani yaciteu, mbwaakamwaambila Leza, wakati, Ndime Leza wa-Abrahamu, a-Leza wa-Izaka, a-Leza wa-Jakobo?
Tali Leza wabafu pe, ngwabaumi. Anu ncobeni mwasweeka.
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Mulazyo mupati ngooyu, Komvwa, yebo Israyeli, Jehova ngu-Leza wesu, Jehova ngumwi.
Uleelede­ kuyandisya Jehova Leza wako amoyo wako woonse, akumuuya wako woonse, akukuyeeya kwako koonse, akunguzu zyako zyoonse.
Awabili ngooyu, Koyandisya mweenzinyoko mbubonya mboliyanda omwini, Taakwe mulazyo umbi uuinda yeeyi.
Lino oyo mulembi wakamwaambila kuti, Mufundisi, ncobeni waamba kabotu mbowati ngumwi buyo, taakwe umbi pele alike du.
Alimwi, kuyanda nguwe amoyo woonse akukuyeeya koonse akunguzu zyoonse, akuyanda mweenzinyoko mboliyanda omwini, kulainda kutenta mutunta uuenzene wacipaizyo azituuzyo zyoonse.
Lino Jesu naakabona kuti wavuwa camaanu, wakamwaambila kuti, Toli kule a-Bwami bwa-Leza, Nkabela kuzwa kuciindi eco katakwe muntu uuyumya moyo akucimubuzya-buzya makani.
Davida mwini wakaamba ku-Muuya Uusalala kuti,
Jehova wakaambila mwami wangu kuti,
Kala kululyo lwangu,
Mane nkabike basinkondonyoko kunsi amaulu aako.
Ino obo Davida mwini mbwamwaamba kuti, Mwami, ino kai alimwi ulaba buti mwanaakwe? Elyo banamaleya boonse bakamumvwa cakubotelwa.
akunonzomana azyuuno zyakunembo muzikombelo, azikalilo zitaanzi kumapobwe,
alimwi balalya imbono zyabamukabafu, akukomba itololongo cakuupaupa ameso. Mbimbaaba bayoojana mulandu mupati.
Lino kwakasika umwi mwanakazi mukamufu mucete, walo wakawaala buyo tudibilisi tobile, nkukuti ikobili lyomwe.
Mpawo wakaliitila basikwiiya bakwe, wabaambila wati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti oyu nwanakazi mucete wabainda boonse bawaala mali muciyobwedo omu,
nkaambo kakuti boonse bali kuwaala mbubonya mbuli bunji bwalubono lwabo, anu walo mubucete bwakwe wawaala zyoonse nzyajisi, mbubuumi bwakwe boonse.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Sa wabona mayake aya mapati? Alasaalwa oonse mane takukwe libwe niliba lyomwe liti kasyaale liyeeme kubbwenyina.
Lino naakakede acilundu ca-Elaioni kumbali antempele, bakamubuzya kumbali ba-Petro a-Jakobo a-Johane a-Andreya, bakati,
Tulwiide, ino kai ayooba lili, aya makani? Alimwi, ncinzi ciyooba citondezyo cakuti aya makani oonse aamba kulondolwa?
Lino Jesu wakatalika kubaambila kuti, Amucenjele kuti kutakabi muntu uumuunina.
Banjibanji bayoosika kuzina lyangu, baamba kuti, Ndime yooyo, nkabela bayoounina banji.
Lino nimuyoomvwa mamba ampuwo zyamamba, mutakayoowesyi, nkaambo ezi zileelede kuba, anu alo mamanino taakoonooyoosikide.
Nkaambo cisi cizoolwana acisinyina, abwami buzoolwana abwaminyina. Alimwi kuzooba mizuzumo yanyika mumasena aansininsini, ayalo inzala iyookola. Anu ezi matalikilo aacimyonzi.
Pele kuleelede kuti anzina Makani Mabotu akakambaukwe kumasi oonse.
Lino bantu nibayoomutola kuyoomwaaba, mutayoolitibauki kuti ino tukaambe buti, pele makani ngumuyoopegwa kuciindi eco nciconya mukaambe ngao, nkaambo endinywe mwaamba pe, ngu-Muuya Uusalala nguuamba.
Nkabela muntu uyooaba mwanaakwabo kukufwa, alakwe wisi uyooaba mwana, alimwi bana bayoobukila bazyali babo, bakabajazye.
Muyoosulwa kubantu boonse nkaambo kazina lyangu, pele walo oyo uuyookakatila mane do kumamanino nguuyoofutulwa.
ayooyo uuti kajanwe alululi atakaseluki nikuba kunjila kuti agwisye cintu niciba comwe camuŋanda,
ayooyo uuti kajanwe mumuunda, atakapilukili kuleta cikobela cakwe.
Pele maawe, kuyoopenga banakazi bamitide abaabo banyonsya kuciindi eco.
Pele kamukomba kuti ayo atakabi muciindi campeyo.
Nkaambo ayo ayooba mazuba aamapenzi. Kuzwa kumalengelo Leza naakaanza nyika mane sunu ayo mapenzi aali boobo taakwe naakabwenwe, alimwi taakwe naati kabonwe limbi pe.
Nkabela Jehova naatakafwiinsya mazuba ayo, nikwatazooba muntu naba umwi wali kunoozoofutulwa, pele nkaambo kabasale mbaakasala ncaayoofwiinsigwa.
Lino kuciindi eco kufumbwa muntu nayoomwaambila kuti, Amubone, nguuno Kristo, nikuba kuti, Nguulya, mutakazumini.
Nkaambo kuyooba bakristo babeji abasinsimi babeji, bayoocita zitondezyo amalele, kwaakukonzeka mane do bakalengawide abaabo basalidwe.
Lino amulibambe, ndamwaambila caali nezitana kuba.
azyalo inyenyeezi ziyooloka kujulu, anguzu zyamujulu ziyoozungaana.
Elyo nobati kabone Mwana a-Muntu uleza mumakumbi anguzu abulemu bupati.
Nkabela lino nati katume baangelo bakwe kuti bakakobe basale bakwe bazwa kumabazu one, akujwe akumbo akunyika akumusanza, mane do kumagolelo aansi ajulu.
Lino amwiiye cikozyano cizwa kumukuyu. Mpoonya mutabi wawo mbuwasonsela, aalo matu asyuuka, elyo mwaziba kuti mainza aba afwiifwi.
Mbubonya obo anywebo, mwaakubona kuti makani aya atalika kuba, amukazibe kuti ciindi cili afwiifwi, cili kumulyango.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti basyaasunu tabakooyooindilila mane do makani aya oonse akabe.
Lyalo ijulu liyooloba, anyika iyooloba, pele majwi aangu alo takooyooloba pe.
Pele taakwe muntu uubuzi buzuba obo, niciba ciindi, pe, nibaba baangelo bakujulu, naba Mwana, pele Taata alike nguuzi.
Amucenjele, kamulindila akukomba, nkaambo tamuzi ciindi nociyooba.
Cilikozyene amuntu wakainka kucisi cimbi, wasia iŋanda yakwe, wakapa bazike bakwe bwami akubaabila umwi aumwi milimo yabo, elyo wakalailila sikulindila kumulyango kuti alangile.
Boobo, amulangile, nkaambo tamuzi ciindi ncayoosika mukamwini iŋanda, na uyoosika kumazuba, na mpakati kamasiku, na nobuumbuluka na cifumofumo.
Amulangile, antela uyoomusinkilizya akamujane mucoona.
Nkabela mbundamwaambila nywebo, mbubonya mbundaambila boonse, Ndati, Amulangile.
Nkaambo bakaamba kuti, Citabi kuciindi capobwe, antela kuyooba lupyopyongano akati kabantu.
Pele kakuli bantu bamwi ibakabijilwa akwaambilana kuti, Ino kai anyonyauninwanzi obo aya mafuta?
Nkaambo oyu musamu niwakakonzya kuuzigwa mali aainda masheleni aali myaanda yotatwe kuti bapegwe bacete. Mpoonya bakamutongaukila.
Pele Jesu wakaamba kuti, Amumuleke. Ino mumukatazizyaanzi? Wandimanina mulimo mubotu.
Ikuti bacete muli abo lyoonse, alimwi ciindi coonse ncimuyanda kubacitila cintu cibotu mulakonzya, pele mebo tamuli ambebo lyoonse pe.
Anu wacita cintu ncakonzya. Wandinanika kale mubili wangu kukuzikwa.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti koonse nkwaayookambaukwa Makani Mabotu muzisi zyaansi zyoonse, mane do aceeci ncaacita mwanakazi oyu cikakananwe kuti kabayoomuyeeyela mpawo.
Nkabela balo nibakamvwa boobo bakakondwa, elyo bakamusyomezya kumupa mali. Mpoonya wakatalika kuyandaula ciindi cibotu cakumwaaba.
Mpoonya awo watuma bamwi basikwiiya bakwe bobile, wabaambila kuti, Kamuya mumunzi, mwaakusika muyooswaana mwaalumi uuyumwine nongo yamaanzi, elyo mukamutobele.
Kufumbwa muŋanda mwayoonjila, mukabuzye mukamwini iŋanda kuti, Mufundisi ulabuzya kuti, Mumuli muŋanda mwenti lide Pasika abasikwiiya bangu?
Lino mwini uyoomutondezya iŋanda impati yamujulu iilondwedwe, ilibambidwe kale, mumonya mumweelede kutubambila.
Elyo basikwiiya bakwe bakainka, baakunjila mumunzi, baakujana mbubonya mbwaakabalwiida, mpoonya bakabamba Pasika.
Lino nibakali kulalila, Jesu wakati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti umwi mweenzinyoko ngutulya awe ulandaaba.
Mpawo bakatalika kuusa, bakali kumubuzya omwe omwe kuti, Sa ndime na?
Walo wakabavwiila kuti, Nguumwi wabaabo bali ikumi ababili. Nguwenya ngutusunsa awe mumutiba.
Nkaambo Mwana a-Muntu ulainka mbubonya mbukulembedwe anguwe, pele mayo kuliyooyo uucitya kuti Mwana a-Muntu aabwe. Anu buyo nocili cibotu kumuntu oyo kuti naatakazyalwa.
Alimwi wakabweza cinywido, walumba, wabaabila, elyo bakanywa boonse.
Mpoonya wakabaambila kuti, Mboobu bulowa bwangu bwamulongo mupya, mbubatikilwa banji.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti kuzwa sunu nsicinywi limbi mucelo wamusaansa mane do kubuzuba obo mbwenti kanywe mupya mu-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Pele ndaakumana kubuka, njoomusolweda kuya ku-Galilaya.
Lino Petro wakamwaambila kuti, Boonse nibayoolebegwa, mebo nee.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Ncobeni ndakulwiida kuti, obuno buzuba, ngoonya masiku ano, mukombwe katana kulila kobile, ulanditama kotatwe.
Lino wakaambisya loko, wati, Nenjoofwa ayebo, nsikooyookutama pe. Mbubonya mbubakaamba abalo boonse.
Mpoonya wakatolelela ba-Petro a-Johane a-Jakobo, wakatalika kuyoowa akupengesya.
Lino wabaambila kuti, Moyo wangu wainda kuusa buusu bwalufu, Amusyaale ano, mulangile.
Mpoonya awo wakaya kunembo buniini, wavundama ansi, wakomba kuti anooli cakonzeka, ciindi eci cimwiindilile.
Wakati, Abba, Ta, zintu zyoonse zilakonzeka kulinduwe, kondiindilizya cinywido eci, nekuboobo kutabi mbuli mbwenjanda mebo, pele mboyanda webo.
Lino naakaboola, wabajana baloona, elyo waambila Petro kuti, Simoni, sa uloona na? Sa tokookakonzya kulangila ciindi niciba comwe?
Amulangile akukomba, kuti mutanjili mumatepauzyo. Moyo walo ulisungweede, anukuti mubili waboyoka.
Lino wakainka lwabili kuyookomba, waakwaamba majwi ngoonya mataanzi.
Nkabela naakaboola lwabili, alimwi wabajana muŋonzi, nkaambo meso aabo akalilemede, nkabela bakabula ambobamuvuwa.
Lino naakaboola lwatatu, wakabaambila kuti, Mbubo lino, amoone, mulyokezye. Kwamana, ciindi casika. Amubone, Mwana a-Muntu waabwa mumaanza aabasizibi.
Amubuke, katuya, Kamulanga, uundaaba waba afwiifwi.
Nkabela oyo sikumwaaba wakalibapede citondezyo cakuti, Nguwenya ngwenjoomyonta, mwati ngonguwe, Mukamujate, mukamutole atakamusii.
Lino asike buyo, mpoonya waindilila kulinguwe, wati, Mwami. Elyo wamumyontesya,
Mpawo bakamuvwampila, bamujata.
Pele umwi wabaabo bakaimvwi oko wakasomona ipanga lyakwe, wauma muzike wamupaizi mupati, wamukosola kutwi.
Lino Jesu wakabavwiila kuti, Mwazoondilwanya akundijata anga mulwanya muntu mufumpi, mujisi mapanga amakoli.
Mazuba oonse ndakali anywebo muntempele, ndakali kwiisya. Ino mwakaba anzi nomwatakandijata? Kwalo ncokwaba obo sunu, nkuti malembe alondoke.
Mpawo boonse bakamumwaika, bacija,
Nkabela kwakamutobela umwi mukubusi, wakalilivumbide mulembo uutuba luzutu. Lino bakamujata,
nkabela wakasia mulembo, wacija acinswe.
Mpoonya awo bakatola Jesu kumupaizi mupati, alimwi kwakabungana boonse bapaizi basimutwe abapati bacisi abalembi.
Nkabela Petro wakali kuya bweeleela ambali-mbali mane kubbuwa lyamupaizi mupati, elyo waakukala antoomwe abalanda, wayota mulilo.
Lino bapaizi basimutwe abasilubeta boonse bakasola kuyandaula kuti bape Jesu kaambo, bamujaye, anu teebakajana pe.
Nkaambo bantu banji bakali kumubikila twaambo, pele twaambo twabo twakaanzaana.
Lino bamwi bakanyamuka, bamutamikizya kaambo kakuti,
Swebo twakamumvwa uuamba kuti, Mebo njoomwayula eci cikombelo icakayakwa amaanza aabantu, elyo amana mazuba otatwe njooyaka cimbi, icitayakwi amaanza aabantu pe.
Anu nobaamba obo twaambo twabo twabumboni twakaanzaana.
Lino mupaizi mupati wakanyamuka akati kabo, wabuzya Jesu kuti, Sa tovuwi yebo? Ino kai mbumboninzi obo mbubakuzangauzya?
Pele walo wakaumuna buyo, akuvuwa pe, Alimwi mupaizi mupati wakamubuzya kuti, Sa nduwe Kristo, mwana ayooyo uukombwa na?

Mpoonya mupaizi mupati wakazapaula zyakusama zyakwe, wati, Anu mbwaanzi abumboni mbutuciyandaula?
Mulimvwide mbwaambya cisapi. Ino muyeeya buti? Mpawo boonse bakakosola kuti uleelede kujayigwa.
Lino bamwi bakatalika kumuswida mate, akumuvumba kubusyu, akumudinkaula, bamwaambila kuti, Lungulula. Abalo balanda bakali kumuuma imbayi.
Abone buyo Petro ulayota, wakamuzilikizya kulanga, wakati, Ayebo wakali a-Jesu mu-Nazareta.
Pele walo wakakazya kuti, Pe, nsizi nikuba kumvwa mboamba. Lino wakaya anze nkulugolela lubua, elyo wakalila mukombwe.
Lino alimwi oyo musimbi, amubone buyo, wakatalika kwaambila abo bakaimvwi oko kumbali kuti, Awalo oyu ngonguwe.

Mpawo wakatalika kutuka akukonka, kuti, Nsimuzi akumuziba oyo muntu ngomwaamba.
Mpoonya mukombwe wakalila lwabili. Lino Petro wakaibulukwa ijwi ndyaakamwaambila Jesu, lyakuti, Mukombwe katana kulolola, unooyoonditamide kotatwe. Ayeeye buyo, wagama kulila.
Lino Pilato wakamubuzya kuti, Sa nduwe mwami mupati waba-Juda na? Walo wakamuvwiila kuti, Koamba we.
Nkabela bapaizi basimutwe bakali kumutikizya twaambo tunji.
Alimwi Pilato wakamubuzya kuti, Sa yebo tovuwi na? Komvwa mbobakubikila twaambo tunji.
Pele Jesu taakwe naakavuwa limbi, eco ncicakainda kumugambya Pilato.
Lino kuciindi coonse capobwe Pilato wakalizibide kubaangunwida omwe mwaange ngobakumbila.
Nkabela kuciindi eco wakaliwo umwi uutegwa Baraba, iwakaangidwe abeenzinyina, aba bakalilipendede, elyo mukulipenda kwabo bakajaya muntu,
Lino bantu boonse bakamuswenenena, batalika kukumbila kuti acite mbubonya mbwabacitila lyoonse.
Elyo Pilato wakababuzya kuti, Sa muyanda kuti mwaangunwide mwami waba-Juda?
Nkaambo wakalizi kuti nkaambo kabbivwe ncibakamwaabila bapaizi basimutwe.
Pele bapaizi basimutwe bakoomeka bantu kuti, kabaamba kuti, Pe, amutwaangunwide Baraba.
Alimwi Pilato wakabaambila kuti, Ino nkamucite buti oyu ngomuti mwami mupati waba-Juda?
Mpawo bakoonzomoka lwabili kuti, Abambulwe aciingano.
Pilato wakabaambila kuti, Ino kai nkaambonzi? Wakabisyanzi? Pele bakaindilila koonzomoka kuti, Abambulwe aciingano.
Mpoonya awo Pilato mbwaakali kuyanda kubotezya bantu wakabaangunwida Baraba, nkabela Jesu wakamukwipaula, elyo wamwaaba kuti abambulwe aciingano.
Lino basilumamba bakatola Jesu mulubuwa lwa-Booma, elyo bakabunganya impi yoonse.
Nkabela bakamusamika cibaki cisalala-salala, alimwi bakaluka musini wamamvwa, bamusamika nguwo kumutwe.
Mpoonya bakatalika kumujuzya kuti, Wabonwa, omwami waba-Juda.
Lino bakamuumya-umya itete amutwe, akumuswida mate, elyo bakamufugamina, batalika kumukomba.
Bamane buyo kumusabwida boobo, bakamusamununa cibaki cisalala-salala, bakamusamika zyakusama zyakwe mwini, bamunyamusya kuya kukumubambula aciingano.
Nkabela bakamutola kubusena butegwa Golgota, nkukuti Busena bwacanza.
Mpoonya bakamupa waini uuvwelene amura, pele walo wakakaka.
Mpawo bakamubambula aciingano, akwaabana zyakusama zyakwe, bakasonda akubona ncati tole umwi umwi.
Nkabela cakali ciindi cacikasaalizi nobakamubambula.
Alimwi, iŋwadi yakaambo kakwe yakalembwa atala kuti, Ngooyu mwami mupati waba-Juda.
Nkabela antoomwe anguwe kwakabambulwa bafumpi bobile, umwi kululyo, aumwi kucimwensi.
Nkabela kwakazyulilwa oku ukwakalembwa kwakuti, Wakabalilwa kulibacitazibi.
Lino boonse ibakali kwiinda oko bakali kumuzindaula akuzunzya mitwe, bati, Ha! yebo owati kamwaye intempele akwiiyaka mumazuba otatwe!
Koseluka aciingano, lifutule.
Mbubonya abalo bapaizi basimutwe abalembi bakali kumusabwida kukwaambilana kuti, Bamwi wakabafutula, pele mwini takonzyi kulifutula.
Nkooko, Kristo mwami waba-Israyeli aseluke lino aciingano, tubone, tuzumine. Abalo abo mbaakabambulwa abo bakali kumusyolauka.
Elyo kube buyo kumazuba Jesu wakoongolola ajwi pati, wakati, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani, nkukuti, Leza wangu, Leza wangu, ino wandilekelezezyanzi?
Lino bamwi ibakaimvwi oko, bamvwe boobo, bakati, Bona, ulaita Eliya.
Mpoonya awo umwi wakazuza, waakunika insinsa muwaini uulula, waangilila mutete, wamunywisya, wati, Amumuleke, tubone na Eliya ulasika kuzoomuselusya.
Lino Jesu wakoonzomoka ajwi ipati, mpoonya wakosoka.
Nkabela mpawo cisitilizyo camuntempele cakadeluka akati kuzwa kujulu kusikila kunsi.
Elyo silutwe iwakaimvwi kumbali lyakwe, naakamubona mbwaakakosoka, wakati, Anu ncobeni oyu muntu wakali Mwana a-Leza.
Nkabela kwakali bamwi banakazi ibakali kweebela kulekule. Akati kabaabo kwakali Maliya mu-Magadala, a-Mariya banyina Jakobo muniini a-Jose, a-Salome.
Mbabonya bakali kumucilide akumukutaukila naakacili mu-Galilaya, abanakazi bamwi banjibanji ibakamusindikila ku-Jerusalemu.
kwakasika Josefa waku-Aramateya, silubeta mulemu, walo mwini wakali sikulindila Bwami bwa-Leza. Oyu muntu wakalitakata kuya kuli-Pilato, waakukumbila mutunta wa-Jesu.
Pele Pilato wakagamba kumvwa kuti wafwa kale, elyo wakaita silutwe kuti amubuzye na ncobeni caba ciindi kafwide.
Amvwe buyo kulisilutwe, wakazumizya Josefa kutola mutunta.
Lino walo wakaula mulembo uutuba, wamwaangula, wamuvumba nguwo, elyo wamulazika mucuumbwe icakasidwe mumwala, mpoonya wakakunkulisya ibbwe lyakujazya amulyango wacuumbwe.
Abalo ba-Mariya muMagadala a-Mariya banyina Jose bakamubona mpaakazikilwa.
Lino baka­ fuma loko kuya kucuumbwe mubuzuba bwakutaanguna ilimana Sabata, ciindi ncilyakapasula izuba.
Nkabela bakali kuya bubuzyanya kuti, Ino nguni uti katukunkulusizye ibbwe ilili amulyango wacuumbwe?
Elyo balange buyo bakabona kuti ibbwe elyo lilikunkulusidwe kale. Nkaambo lyakali ipati loko.
Lino nibakanjila mucuumbwe bajana mukubusi uusamide zituba, ulikede kululyo, elyo bakayoowesya.
Mpoonya awo wakabaambila kuti, Mutayoowi, ngu-Jesu muna-Nazareta, oyo iwakabambulwa aciingano, ngumuyandaula. Ulibukide, Tamo omuno pe, kamulanga mpaawa mpobakamubikide.
Pele kamuya, mukalwiide basikwiiya bakwe a-Petro kuti walibeelezya kuya ku-Galilaya, nkukonya nkumuyoomubonena, mbuli mbwaakamwaambilide.
Bazwe buyo mucuumbwe, bakacijana, nkaambo bakaliyoowede cakuzyangama. Nkabela teebakaambila muntu naba omwe, ikuti bakali kuyoowa.
Walo wakaakwaambila baabo bakali a-Jesu ibakali kuungumana akulila.
Pele balo, bamvwe buyo kuti muumi akuti wakabonwa kulinguwe, bakakazya.
Alimwi wakadunuka aciwa cimbi kubantu bobile bankamu yabo ibakali kuya bweendeenda kuya kuminzi.
Abalo abo bakaakulwiida banamunji, pele alimwi bakakazya buyo.
Lino wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya munyika yoonse, mukakambaukile bantu boonse Makani Mabotu.
Oyo uuti kasyome akubapatizigwa uyoofutuka, pele oyo uutazumini uyoozulwa.
Nkabela kulibaabo basyoma ayoocitwa malele aya. Bayootanda badaimona muzina lyangu, bayooamba myaambo mipya,
bayoojata inzoka, alimwi nibayoonywa cijaya cili buti, tacikooyoobakola pe, nkabela nibayoobika maanza aabo abalwazi, bayoopona.
Mpoonya awo bakaya bukambauka koonse koonse, alakwe Mwami mwini wakali kubeleka abo akukondezya makani kumalele ngobakali kucita. Ameni.
Banjibanji mbobakasoleka kulungulula makani aya aakacitwa cakasimpe akati kesu,
mbubonya mbobakatwaambila ngao, abakali kwaabona ameso kuzwa kumatalikilo, abakali basimilimo bamakani,
mbwendazibisya oonse kuzwa kumazwido, ambebo ndati, ncibotu kuti ndikulembele, Teofile omulemu,
kuti uzibe kusinizya kwamakani ayo ngookaiisigwa.
Boonse bobile bakaliluleme kumeso aa-Leza, bakali kweenda mumilazyo emilao yoonse ya-Jehova, tabakwe nobakajisi kaambo.
Pele tabakali kujisi mwana nkaambo Elizabeta takali kuzyala, alimwi boonse bobile bakalicembeede.
Elyo mbwaakali kumana mulimo wabupaizi kumbele lya-Leza, kubulizi bwakwe,
mbubonya mbuli ciyanza cabupaizi, ngonguwe uwakasalwa kunjila muntempele ya-Jehova kuumpa tununkilizyo twakupaizya.
Abantu boonse bali kukombela anze kuciindi cakuumpa tununkilizyo.
Mpoonya awo kwakalibonya kulinguwe angelo wa-Jehova uliimvwi kululyo lwacitulilo catununkilizyo.
Naakamubona wakatumpuka Zakariya, wayoowa.
Nkabela angelo wakati kulinguwe, Utayoowi, Zakariya, ukukomba kwako kwamvwigwa, mukaintu wako Elizabeta uzookuzyalila mwana mulombe, ngozooulika zina lya-Johane.
Yebo uzooba akukondwa akusekelela, alimwi banjibanji bayoobotelwa kukuzyalwa kwakwe.
Unoozooli mupati mumeso aa-Jehova, takoozoonywa waini niiba mbote, unoozoozywide Muuya Uusalala kuzwa kukuzyalwa kwakwe.
Abanjibanji kubana baIsrayeli uyoobasandwida kuli-Jehova, Leza wabo.
Uyooenda kumbele lyakwe amuuya enguzu zya-Eliya, kuti aboozye myoyo yamawisi kubana, abaabo abatamvwi kuluzibo lwabaluleme, akabambile Jehova bantu balulamikidwe.
Zakariya wati kuli-angelo, Iniinga aya ndilaaziba buti? Nendacembaala kale mebo, amukaintu wangu ujisi myaaka minjiminji.
Langa, ulaba cimuumu yebo, tokoonookonzya kwaambaula mane do kubuzuba mbwaayoocitwa makani aya, nkaambo tosyomede majwi aangu, aayooba kuciindi cao.
Abantu bakali kumulindilila Zakariya, bakagambwa kuti wamuka kuzwa muntempele.
Naakazwa mumo wakakakilwa kwaambaula abalo, nkabela bakaziba kuti wabona cilengaano muntempele, uya butondaika kulimbabo, ngu cimuumu.
Elyo nocakamana ciindi camilimo yakwe, wakainka kuŋanda yakwe.
Munsi lyamazuba ayo Elizabeta, mukaintu wakwe, wakamita, walivundika myeezi yosanwe wati,
Jehova wandicita bobuya mumazuba ngaandilanga kundigwisya masampu akati kabantu.
Kumweezi wamusanu muumwi Leza wakatuma angelo Gabriyeli kuya kumunzi waku-Galilaya, uutegwa Nazareta,
kumusimbi uwakatangidwe kumwaalumi uwali kutegwa Josefa, weŋanda ya-Davida, izina lyamusimbi wakali Maliya.
Angelo wakamunjilila wati, Wabonwa oopedwe luzyalo, Jehova uli ayebo.
Pele walo wakatumpuka kapati kumajwi aakwe wayeeya kuti, Nkwaanzyanzi oku?
Angelo wakamwaambila kuti, Utayoowi, Maliya, wajana luzyalo kuli-Leza,
Langa, ulamita, uzootumbuka mwana mulombe, ngozooulika zina lya-Jesu.
Unoozooli mupati, uzootegwa Mwana a-Sijulu lyamajulu, Jehova Leza uzoomupa cuuno cabwami cawisi Davida,
uyooendelezya ŋanda ya-Jakobo mane kukabe kutamani, ubwami bwakwe tabukooyoomana.
Maliya wakati kuli-angelo, Ino oku kuzooba buti neentazi amwaalumi pe?
Angelo wakamuvuwa kuti, Muuya Uusalala uzooza alinduwe, enguzu zya-Sijulu lyamajulu zikuvunikile, ayooyo Uusalala uti tumbukwe uzooambwa kuti Mwana a-Leza,
Alimwi langa, Elizabeta musazinyoko, ulimisi mwana mulombe mubucembele bwakwe, umweezi uno ngwasanu muumwi kulinguwe uwakali kutegwa tazyali.
Nkaambo taakwe ijwi ilizwa kuli-Leza ilibula nguzu.
Maliya wakateeti, Ndi muzike wa-Jehova mebo, akube kulindime mbubonya mbuli kwaamba kwako. Nkabela angelo wakainka.
Mumazuba ayo wakabweza Maliya, wafwambaana wainka kumalundu kumunzi waku-Juda,
wakanjila muŋanda ya-Zakariya, waanzya Elizabeta,
Mpoonya awo Elizabeta amvwe buyo kwaanzya kwa-Mariya, mwana wasamba mwida lyakwe, alimwi Elizabeta wakazula Muuya Uusalala,
woompolola ejwi ipati wati, Uli acoolwe yebo akati kabakaintu, awalo mwana uuli mwida lyako uli acoolwe.
Ino caba buti kulindime kuti banyina Mwami wangu baboole kulindime?
Nkaambo ijwi lyakwaanzya kwako licimvwigwa buyo mumatwi aangu, mwana wasamba mwida lyangu akubotelwa.
Alimwi uli acoolwe walo uwakasyoma, nkaambo kuyoocitwa ukwakaambwa Jehova kulinguwe.
Nkabela Maliya wakateeti,
Moyo wangu ulamulemya Jehova,
Amuuya wangu ulabotelwa kuli-Leza, Mufutuli wangu,
Kuzwida sunu mazyalani oonse anoondyaamba kuti nacoolwe.
Lilasalala zina lyakwe.
Kulibaabo abamuyoowa.
Wabamwaya abalisumpula mukuyeeya kwamyoyo yabo.
Wabasumpula balyeetezya,
Abavubi wabatanda buyo.
Kuti ayeeye luzyalo
(Mbubonya mbuli kwaamba kwakwe kumatateesu),
Maliya wakaakukala kulinguwe afwaafwi emyeezi yotatwe, nkokuya abweede kuŋanda yakwe.
Eno nkabela ciindi ca-Elizabeta cakutumbuka cakasika, watumbuka mwana mulombe.
Balo mbobakayakide abo abasazinyina bacimvwa kuti Jehova wakamucitila luzyalo lupati, bakasekelela anguwe.
Elyo mubuzuba bwasanu mwaatatu bakasika kumupalula mwana, bati kamuulike zina lyawisi, ilyakuti Zakariya.
Pele banyina bakakaka bati, Pe, ulategwa ngu-Johane.
Bakati kulinguwe, Taakwe musazinyoko uwakaulikidwe zina elyo.
Nkabela bakatondaika kuliwisi, na uyanda kuti aulikwe lyakutinzi.
Walo wakakumbila cakulembela, walemba kuti, Izina lyakwe ngu-Johane. Bakaankamana boonse.
Ndilyonya wakalakamuka mulomo wakwe, waanguluka mulaka wakwe, waambaula walumba Leza.
Boonse mbobakayakide abo bakayoowa, amakani aya akaya mpuwo mucisi coonse camalundu a-Judaya.
Boonse abakaamvwa bakaayobola mumyoyo yabo bati, Iniinga uyooba mwana uuli buti oyu? Nkaambo ijanza lya-Jehova lyakali kulinguwe.
Zakariya wisi wakazula Muuya Uusalala, wakasinsima, wateeti,
Nkaambo wayeeya bantu bakwe, wabanununa.
Muŋanda ya-Davida muzike wakwe,
(Mbubonya mbwaakaamba kumilomo yabasinsimi bakwe abasalala, kuzwa kumatalikilo)
Akuyeeya mulongo wakwe uusalala,
Tumukombe cakutayoowa mukusalala amubululami
Kumbele lyakwe mazuba esu oonse.
Nkaambo uyooenda kumbele lya-Mwami kululamika nzila zyakwe,
Kulindulo bwatuyeeya bucedo bwakujulu,
Bukeenzye matende esu munzila yaluumuno.
Nkabela mumazuba ayo kwakazwa mulao kuli-Kaisara Augusto kuti kulembwe cisi coonse.
Oku kwakali kulembwa kwakusaanguna, elyo Kureniyo naakali mweendelezi waku-Suriya.
Abantu boonse bakainka kuyoolembwa, umwi umwi kumunzi wakwe.
Awalo Josefa wakazwa muGalilaya mumunzi wa-Nazareta, wainka ku-Judaya kumunzi wa-Davida uutegwa Betelehemu, nkaambo wakali weŋanda yamukowa wa-Davida,
kuti akalembwe a-Mariya ngwaakasalide kuti babe banakwe, uwakali kumisi.
Nobakacili nkuko, mazuba aakutumbuka kwakwe akasika.
Wakatumbuka mwanaakwe mutaanzi, wamuzambaila masila, wamulazika mucilido caŋombe, nkaambo teekwakali busena muŋanda yabeenzu.
Kwakali basikweembela kucisi eco, bakali musokwe, beembela butanga bwabo masiku.
Elyo angelo wa-Jehova wakaima kulimbabo, bulemu bwaJehova bwakabamunikila, bakayoowa kapati.
Angelo wakati kulimbabo, Mutayoowi, amulange, ndamuletela makani mabotu aacoolwe cipati iciti be kubantu boonse,
nkaambo sunu mwazyalilwa Mufutuli mumunzi waDavida, ngu-Kristo Mwami.
Eno nceeci citondezyo kulindinywe, muyoojana muvwanda uuzambaidwe masila, ulilede mucilido caŋombe,
Ndilyonya kuli-angelo oyo kwakadunuka makamu makamu aazwa kujulu, balemya Leza bati,
Aalo ansi akube luumuno kubantu mbakondwa.
Nkabela baangelo nobakabasia kubweeda kujulu, basikweembela bakabuzyanya bati, Atugame ku-Betelehemu, tukabone nkani eyi mbwiibede, njaatuzibya angelo.
Bakafwambaana basika, bajana Maliya a-Josefa, amuvwanda ulilede mucilido caŋombe.
Babone buyo, baamba makani ngobakaambilwa aamwana.
Boonse abakaamvwa bakagambwa kulaayo aakabaambila basikweembela.
Pele Maliya wakaayobola makani aya oonse, waaezeezya mumoyo wakwe.
Nkabela basikweembela bakabweeda, bali kuya bulemya akulumbaizya Leza kulaayo oonse ngobakamvwa angobakabona, mbubonya mbobakaambilwa.
(mbuli mbokwakalembwa mumulao wa-Jehova kuti: Woonse mwana mulombe mutaanzi uzootegwa muna-Jehova),
kuti batuule zituuzyo mbuli mbokwaambwa mumulao wa-Jehova, nkokuti inziba zyobile, neziba nkwilimba zyobile izicili ziniini.
Elyo wakalimo mu-Jerusalemu mwaalumi uwali kutegwa Simeoni, wali muntu uululeme, uwali kusyoma Leza akulangila kutontozegwa kwa-Israyeli. Muuya Uusalala wakali kulinguwe.
Oyo wakayubulwidwa Muuya Uusalala kuti takooyoobona lufu mane akabone Kristo wa-Jehova.
Wakanjila muntempele, wali kusungilizigwa Muuya. Nkabela abazyali nobakamuleta mwana Jesu kuti bamucitile mbuli ciyanza camulao,
mpoonya awo Simeoni wakamutambula mumaanza aakwe, walumba Leza, wateeti.
Kuti ainke caluumuno, mbuli kwaamba kwako,
Ndookalulamika kubusyu bwabantu boonse,
Abulemu bwacisi cako ca-Israyeli.
Bakagambwa wisi abanyina kumakani aakaambwa aamwana.
