Simeoni wakabalongezya, wati kuli-Mariya banyina, Langa, Oyu mwana wabikilwa kuwa akubuka kwabanjibanji ba-Israyeli, kuti abe citondezyo icikazigwa.
Ii, iceba liyooyasa moyo wako omwini, nkokuti kuyubululwe kuyeeya kwamyoyo minjiminji.
Alimwi kwakaliko Ana, musinsimi mukaintu, mwana a-Fanuele, wamukowa wa-Aseri. Walicembeede, kuzwida kubwanike bwakwe wakakala amwaalumi myaaka iili musanu mwiibili,
nkabela wali mukamufu myaaka iili makumi aali musanu mwaatatu emyaaka yone. Taakali kuzwa muntempele, wakali kukomba isikati amasiku, kuliimya kulya akukumbila.
Wakasika nciconya eco ciindi, walumbaizya Leza, waamba aanguwe kulimbabo boonse abakali kulangila kunununwa kwaJerusalemu.
Elyo nobakamana koonse mbuli mulao wa-Jehova, bakabweeda ku-Galilaya, kumunzi wabo waku-Nazareta.
Nkabela naakali emyaaka iili kumi mwiibili, bakainka mbuli ciyanza capobwe.
Naakamana mazuba, kukuboola kwabo mwana Jesu wakasyaalila ku-Jerusalemu, abazyali bakwe tabali kuzi,
pele mbobakayeeya kuti nkwali kulimbobeenda abo, beenda musinzo wabuzuba bomwe, nkabela bamulangaula mukati kabasazinyina abeenzinyina.
Mbobatakamujana bakapiluka ku-Jerusalemu, baya bumulangaula.
Munsi lyamazuba otatwe bakamujana muntempele, ulikede akati kabaiyi, ulabaswiilila akubabuzya,
boonse abakamuswiilila bakayoowa kukuziba kwakwe akukuvuwa kwakwe.
Elyo nobakamubona bakaankamana, banyina bamubuzya kuti, Mwanaangu, nkaambonzi ino ncootucitila obuya? Bona, uso amebo twali kukulangaula akukatazigwa.
Wakati kulimbabo, Ino kai mundiyandawidanzi? Sena tamuzi kuti ndileelede kuba muŋanda yaTaata?
Anu tabakamvwide kabotu nkani njaakabaambila.
Nkabela wakeenda abo, waboola ku-Nazareta, wababombela. Pele banyina bakaayobola oonse makani aya mumoyo wabo.

Kumwaaka wekumi amusanu wabwami bwa-Tiberiyo Kaisara, Ponto Pilato naakali mweendelezi waku-Judaya, awalo Heroda naali mwami waku-Galilaya, awalo Filipo mwanaakwabo naali mwami wacisi ca-Itureya eca-Trakoniti, awalo Lusaniyo naali mwami waku-Abilene,
Ana a-Kayafa nebakali bapaizi bapati, ijwi lya-Leza lyakasika kuli-Johane, mwana aZakariya, musokwe.
Elyo wakainka mucisi coonse icakazingulukide Jordano, wakambauka lubapatizyo lwakusanduka, kukujatilwa kwazibi,
mbubonya mbokulembedwe mubbuku lya-Isaya, musinsimi, kuti,
Ijwi lyasikoompolola musokwe:
Amubambe mugwagwa wa-Jehova,
Amululamike nzila zyakwe.
Tunkolola toonse tulavwikilwa,
Amalundu oonse ezyuulu zilamwayigwa,
Izipilingene zilalulamikwa,
Enzila zyazilindi-lindi zilabambasikwa.
Amuzyale micelo iielede kweempa, mutataliki kulyaambya muzyamba zyanu kuti, Tulijisi Abrahamu, taateesu, Nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti, Leza ulakonzya kubusizya Abrahamu bana kumabwe aya.
Eno kaankuni keezegwa kale kumiyanda yamasamu, amasamu oonse aatazyali micelo mibotu alatemwa, asowelwe mumulilo.
Abantu bakamubuzya kuti, Tucite buti ino?
Wakavuwa wati, Uuli angubo zyobile amwaabile uubula, awalo uuli azilyo acite mbubonya.
Alimwi kwakasika basimutelo kuti babapatizigwe, bamubuzya bati, Mufundisi, ino swebo tucite buti?
Wakati kulimbabo, Mutaindilizyi kutezya bantu ukwiinda ncomwalaililwa.
Abalo basilumamba bakamubuzya bati, Aswebo ino tucite buti? Wakabavuwa kuti, Mutanyangi muntu caluuni, nokuba kumuvwiya, amukondwe zyakuvola zyanu.

Johane wakabavuwa boonse kuti, Mebo ncobeni ndamubapatizya amaanzi, kwalo kuleza umwi uundiinda nguzu ngwenteelede kumwaangunwida kaanzyo kendyasyo zyakwe, walo uyoomubapatizya a-Muuya Uusalala amulilo.
Icipupuluzyo cakwe cili mujanza lyakwe, kuti akukulisye lubuwa lwakwe, ayobole maila mumatala aakwe, pele buungu ulabutenta amulilo uutazimiki.
Aboobo mukukombelezya kumwi kunjikunji wakakambaukila bantu makani mabotu,
kwala Heroda, mwami, mbwaakatapatilwa nguwe nkaambo ka-Herodiya banakwe mwanaakwabo, akaambo kezibi zyoonse nzyaakacita Heroda,
wakayungizya eci kulizyoonse, wakanjizya Johane muntolongo.
Muuya Uusalala wakamuselukila eciimo cenziba, wakala atala alinguwe, kwakasika ijwi ilizwa kujulu lyati, Nduwe Mwanaangu ooyandwa, ndakondwa anduwe,
Heli mwana a-Matati, Matati mwana a-Levi, Levi mwana a-Meleki, Meleki mwana a-Janai, Janai mwana a-Josefa,
Josefa mwana a-Matatio, Matatio mwana a-Amosi, Amosi mwana a-Naumi, Naumi mwana a-Eseli, Eseli mwana a-Nagai,
Nagai mwana a-Maati, Maati mwana a-Matatio, Matatio mwana a-Semeini, Semeini mwana a-Joseke, Joseke mwana a-Joda,
Joda mwana a-Joanini, Joanini mwana a-Resa, Resa mwana a-Zorobabele, Zorobabele mwana a-Salatieli, Salatieli mwana a-Neri,
Neri mwana a-Meleki, Meleki mwana a-Adi, Adi mwana a-Kosamu, Kosamu mwana a-Elimadama, Elimadama mwana a-Ere,
Ere mwana a-Jose, Jose mwana a-Eliezere, Eliezere mwana a-Jorimu, Jorimu mwana a-Matati, Matati mwana a-Levi,
Levi mwana a-Simeoni, Simeoni mwana a-Juda, Juda mwana a-Josefa, Josefa mwana a-Jonamu, Jonamu mwana a-Eliakimu,
Eliakimu mwana a-Meleya, Meleya mwana a-Mena, Mena mwana a-Matata, Matata mwana a-Natanu, Natanu mwana a-Davida,
Davida mwana a-Jese, Jese mwana a-Obede, Obede mwana a-Boazi, Boazi mwana a-Salamoni, Salamoni mwana a-Naasoni,
Naasoni mwana a-Aminadabe, Aminadabe mwana a-Ami, Ami mwana a-Ezronu, Ezronu mwana a-Faresa, Faresa mwana a-Juda,
Juda mwana a-Jakobo, Jakobo mwana a-Izaka, Izaka mwana a-Abrahamu, Abrahamu mwana a-Tera, Tera mwana a-Nakoro,
Nakoro mwana a-Seruki, Seruki mwana a-Reu, Reu mwana a-Pelege, Pelege mwana a-Ebere, Ebere mwana a-Sala,
Sala mwana a-Kainane, Kainane mwana a-Arfaksadi, Arfaksadi mwana a-Semu, Semu mwana a-Nowa, Nowa mwana a-Lameki,
Lameki mwana aMetusela, Metusela mwana a-Enoki, Enoki mwana a-Jarede, jarede mwana a-Maleleli, Maleleli mwana a-Kainane,
Kainane mwana a-Enosi, Enosi mwana a-Seta, Seta mwana a-Adamu, Adamu mwana a-Leza.
mazuba aali makumi one, wali kusunkwa Saatani. Kumazuba ayo takalide cintu, naakamana wakafwa nzala,
Nkabela Saatani wakamwaambila kuti, Na uli Mwana a-Leza, ambila ibbwe eli libe nsima.
Jesu wakavuwa wati, Kulilembedwe kuti,
Muntu taponi kunsima yalo,
Pele kumajwi oonse aa-Leza.
Elyo wakamutola kudundu idamfu, wamutondezya zisi zyoonse zyaansi mukaindi komwe,
Saatani wakati kulinguwe, Ndakupa bwami obu boonse abulemu bwazyo, nkaambo ndabupegwa, eno kufumbwa ngwenyanda inga ndamupa mbubo.
Kuti wandikomba, boonse bulaba bwako.
Jesu wakamuvuwa kuti, Kozwa, Saatani. Kulilembedwe kuti,
Komba Jehova, Leza wako,
Umumanine milimo walo alike.
Ndilyonya wakamutola ku-Jerusalemu, wamutantika acisumpa centempele, wamwaambila kuti, Na uli mwana a-Leza, liwaale ansi,
nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti,
Uyoolailila baangelo bakwe anduwe, kuti bakukwabe,
Amaanza aabo bazookuyumuna,
Kuti utalicisi kuulu kwako kubbwe.
Utasunki Jehova Leza wako.
Wakali kwiisya muzikombelo zyabo, wali kulemekwa boonse.
Mpoonya wakatambikwa bbuku lyamusinsimi Isaya. Naakalivununa wakajana ukwakalembedwe kuti,
Nkaambo wandinanika kuti ndikambaukile bacete makani mabotu. Wandituma kuti ndiponye batyokede kumyoyo,
Ndyoompolole kwaangununwa kubaange,
Akubonununwa kuboofu,
Ndinunune abapengede,
Nkabela wakavunika bbuku, walibweedezya kulisimulimo wacikombelo, wakala. Boonse abakali mucikombelo bakamuyasa meso,
Mpoonya wakatalika kubaambila kuti, Sunu kwazuzigwa lugwalo olu mumatwi aanu.
Eno boonse bakalumba-lumba, bagambwa kumajwi aaluzyalo aazwa kumulomo wakwe bati, Oyu tali mwana a-Josefa na?
Wakati kulimbabo, Ncobeni muyoondyaambila aka kasimpe kakuti, Omusilisi, kolisilika. Zyoonse nzotwakamvwa izyakacitwa ku-Kapemauma, zicite amomuno mucisi cakwanu.
Wakati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Taakwe musinsimi uutambulwa mucisi cakwabo.
Ndamwaambila cakasimpe kuti, Kwakali bamukabafu banjibanji mucisi ca-Israyeli kumazuba aa-Eliya, neyatakali kuwa mvula myaaka yotatwe iili emyeezi yosanwe muumwi, neyakaba nzala mpati mucisi coonse,
nokubaboobo Eliya takatumidwe kuli omwe wambabo, pele ku-Sarepta waku-Sidoniya kumukaintu uwakali mukamufu.
Alimwi kwakali basicinsenda banjibanji mucisi ca-Israyeli kuciindi ca-Elisha musinsimi, kwalo taakwe uwakasalazigwa naba omwe, pele Naamani walo waku-Suriya.
Eno nobakamvwa boobo boonse abali mucikombelo bakafundilila abukali,
banyamuka, bamutandila anze amunzi, bamutola amutwe acilundu, mpaakayakidwe munzi wabo, kuti bamuwisizye ansi.
Pele walo wakaandulula akati kabo, wakainka.
bakaankamana akwiisya kwakwe, nkaambo makani aakwe akali abwami.
Omo mucikombelo mwakali muntu uwali amuuya wadaimona uusofweede, woompolola ejwi ipati,
wati, Akaka, tuleke, Tujisi makaninzi ayebo, o-Jesu wa-Nazareta? Sena waboola kutufwidilizya? Ndilikuzi yebo, nduwe Uusalala wa-Leza.
Nkabela Jesu wakamutapatila wati, Umuna, zwa kulinguwe. Mpoonya daimona naakamuwaala ansi akati kabo wakazwa kulinguwe, taakwe naakamucisa.
Elyo bakaankamana boonse, babuzyanya kuti, Ino lityani eli jwi ndyaambila myuuya mibi cabwami enguzu, mpoonya yazwa?
Nkabela wakamvwigwa mpuwo yakwe mumasena oonse aamucisi eco.
Mpoonya awo wakabakotamina, watapatila cilwazi, cabaleka, Ndilyonya bakabuka, babajatila cakulya.
Nelyakabbila izuba, boonse abakali kujisi abaciswa zilwazi zyamikumo mikumo, bakabaleta kulinguwe, wababika maanza umwi umwi, wabaponya.
Abalo badaimona bakazwa kubanjibanji, boompolola bati, Yebo uli Mwana a-Leza, Walo wakabatapatila, taakwe naakabazumizya kwaamba, nkaambo bakalimuzi kuti ngu-Kristo.
Nobwakaca wakazwa, wainka munkanda. Nkabela makamu makamu akamuyandaula, aboola kulinguwe. Bali kuyanda kumukasya kuti atabasii.
Pele wakabaambila kuti, Ndileelede kwiikambaukila minzi imwi Makani Mabotu aa-Bwami bwa-Leza, nkaambo nkonkuko nkwendakatuminwa.
Elyo wakali kuya bukambauka muzikombelo zyamu-Galilaya.
nkabela wakabona maato obile, aliimvwi mumbali lyeziba, pele basikuzuba bakalizwide mulingao, bali kusanzya nsabwe zyabo.
Wakanjila mubwaato bumwi ubwakali bwaSimoni, wamukumbila kuti buzwe kunkomwe bweende kaniini. Elyo wakakala, waiisya makamu makamu, walo wali kukede mubwaato.
Naakamana kukambauka, wakati kuli-Simoni, Katuya akati kamulungu, munike nsabwe zyanu, mukajaye nswi.
Simoni wakamuvuwa kuti, O mwami, twali kuzuba masiku oonse, tatujene cintu, nokubaboobo kujwi lyako ndiyoonika nsabwe.
Nobakacita obo, bakajaya nswi zinjizinji, mane zyati kazapuke nsabwe zyabo,
mpoonya bakoobola bazubinyina abakali mubwaato bumwi kuti bazoobagwasye. Bakaboola, bazuzya oonse maato obile, mane ati kabbile.
Eno Simoni Petro naakabona boobo, wakavundama kumatende aa-Jesu wati, Kozwa kulindime nkaambo ndi mwaalumi mucitazibi, O mwami.
Nkaambo wakaankamana walo, aboonse mbaakali abo, kunswi zinjizinji nzobakajaya,
abalo mbubonya ba-Jakobo a-Johane, bana ba-Zebedayo, balongwe bakwe Simoni. Jesu wakamwaambila Simoni kuti, Utayoowi, kuzwa sunu unoozuba bantu,
Nobakazubusya maato kunkomwe, bakasia zyoonse, bamucilila.
Wakatambika ijanza lyakwe, wamujata wati, Ndayanda, usalale, Mpoonya awo cinsenda cakamana kulinguwe.
Elyo wakamulailila kuti, Utaambili muntu, Pele koya ukalibonye kumupaizi, ukapede kukusalazigwa kwako mbuli mulao wa-Musa, cibe citondezyo kulimbabo.
Kwalo impuwo yakwe yakaindilila kukomena, makamu makamu aabantu akayoboloka kumuswiilila akuponyegwa kuzilwazi zyabo.
Anukuti wakazwa walo, wainka musokwe kuyookomba.
Nkabela baalumi, abatembekede muntu abulo, uuyuminide mubili, bakayanda kumunjizya akumubika kubusyu bwakwe.
Pele mbobatakajene mpobamunjizizya nkaambo kabantu banjibanji, bakatanta aciluli, bagwisya zidina, balengelezya bulo mbwaakalede uuyuminide mubili, bamuselusizya kumbele lya-Jesu.
Walo naakabona lusyomo lwabo wakati, Mwaalumi, wajatilwa zibi zyako.
Mpoonya awo balembi aba-Farisi bakatalika kubuzyanya kuti, Ino oyu uuamba kusampaula nguni? Nguni uukonzya kujatila muntu zibi, tali Leza alike na?
Anu Jesu wakali kuzi kweezezya kwabo, wabavuwa kuti, Muyeeyelanzi mumyoyo yanu?
Icuuba ncicili, na kwaamba kuti, Wajatilwa zibi zyako, na kuti, Buka, uende?
Pele kuti muzibe kuti Mwana a-Muntu uli enguzu ansi zyakujatila zibi, waambila uuyuminide mubili kuti, Ndakwaambila, Buka ubweze bulo bwako, uye kuŋanda yako.
Ndilyonya wabuka kumbele lyabo, wabweza ncaakali kulede, wainka kuŋanda yakwe, ulalumba Leza,
Baankamana boonse, balumba Leza, bayoowa kapati bati, Twabona malele sunu.
Mpoonya wasia zyoonse, wanyamuka wamucilila.
Balembi abaFarisi batongaukila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Ino mulidanzi akunywa antoomwe abasimutelo abacitazibi?
Jesu wakabavuwa kuti, Abapona tababuli musilisi, pele balwazi balo,
Nsizide kwiita baluleme, pele bacitazibi, kuti basanduke.
Wabavuwa kuti, Sena mulakonzya kwiimya beenzinyina sikukwata kulya nacili abo?
Kwalo alasika mazuba, awo sikukwata azwa kulimbabo, bayooliimya ayo mazuba.
Elyo wakabaambila cikozyano kuti, Taakwe muntu uubbatika cibbati cipya kungubo nkulukulu, nkaambo icipya cilazapula cikulukulu, icibbati cipya taciswaangani ecisani cikulukulu.
Alimwi taakwe muntu uutila waini mupya munkomo nkulukulu, nkaambo waini mupya ulakwamuna nkomo, walo waini ulatika, enkomo zilafwa.
Pele waini mupya watilwa munkomo impya.
Taakwe muntu uunga na wanywa waini mukulukulu mpoonya mpoonya ayande mupya, nkaambo wati, Mukulukulu ngomubotu.
Kwalo ba-Farisi bamwi bababuzya kuti, Ino mucitilanzi iciteelede kucitwa ku-Sabata?
Jesu wabavuwa kuti, Sena tamubalide, mbwaakacita Davida, naakafwa nzala, mwini ambaakali abo?
Wakanjila muŋanda ya-Leza, wabweza mikamu yamabonwabonwa, walya wabapa ambaakali abo, iiteelede kuligwa muntu, pele bapaizi balike,
Wati kulimbabo, Mwana a-Muntu ngo-Mwami wa-Sabata.
Nkabela balembi abaFarisi bakamulangisya kubona na ulamuponya ku-Sabata, kuti bajane cakumubika kaambo.
Kwalo wakali kuzi kuyeeya kwabo, elyo wati kumuntu uuli ejanza iliyuminide, Nyamuka, uime mukati. Mpoonya wanyamuka, waima,
Jesu wabaambila kuti, Ndamubuzya, Ino ncili iceelede ku-Sabata, kucita cibotu na kucita cibi, kuvuna muntu na kujaya?
Nkabela wabacebaukila boonse, wamwaambila mwaalumi kuti, Vungununa ijanza lyako. Wacita mbubonya, mpoonya ijanza lyakwe lyavungunuka, lyaba mbuli limwi.
Nkabela bafundilila abukali, babuzyanya kuti, Ino tumucite buti Jesu?
Nobwakaca wakaita basikwiiya bakwe, kulimbabo wasala abali kumi abobile, wabaulika zina lyakuti mbaapostolo.
Mbaaba: Simoni ngwaakaulika lya-Petro, a-Andreya mwanaakwabo, Jakobo a-Johane, Filipo a-Bartolomayo,
Matayo a-Tomaso, Jakobo mwana a-Alifayo, a-Simoni uutegwa Musungu,
a-Juda mwana a-Jakobo, a-Judase Iskariote, sikumwaaba.
abalo abakali kupenzegwa myuuya iisofweede, bakapona.
Eno makamu makamu aabantu boonse bakali kuyanda kumwaampa, nkaambo kwanuunga zyazwa nguzu mulinguwe, zyabaponya boonse.
Muli acoolwe nomufwa nzala sunu, nkaambo muzookuta. Muli acoolwe nomulila sunu, ukuti muzooseka,
Muli acoolwe bantu nobamusulide, nobamutanda akumutukana akusampaula zina lyanu kuti ndibbi, nkaambo ka-Mwana a-Muntu,
Amubotelwe kubuzuba obo, musekelele, ukuti bulumbu bwanu mbupati kujulu, nkaambo bamawisaabo bakacita mbubonya obo kubasinsimi.
Kwalo maawe kulindinywe nobavubi, nkaambo mwaakutambula kale kubotelwa kwanu.
Maawe nywebo nomukuta sunu, nkaambo muyoofwa nzala, maawe nywebo nomuseka sunu, nkaambo muyoolila akuungumana.
Maawe kulindinywe bantu boonse nobamwaamba kabotu, nkaambo bamawisaabo bakacita mbubonya obo kubasinsimi babeji.
mubalongezye abamutukana, mubakombele abamuvwiya.
Oyo uukuuma kusaya, umusandwide akulilimwi, uukunyanga ngubo utamukasyi ecibaki.
Kobapa boonse abakumbila kulinduwe, oyo uukunyanga lubono utamusesi kuti aluboozye elimwi.
Mbubonya mbomuyanda kuti bantu bamucitile, anywebo amubacitile mbubonya.
Kuti mwayanda abamuyanda, ino mujisi kulumbwanzi? Abalo abacitazibi bayanda abo ababayanda.
Alimwi kuti mwacita kabotu kulibaabo abamucitila kabotu, ino kai muli akulumbwanzi? Mbobacita obo abalo abacitazibi.
Na kuti mwaabila abo mbomusyoma kuti balamupilusizya, mujisi kulumbwanzi ino? Abalo abacitazibi baabilana kuti bakapegwe mbubonya,

Pele amuyande basinkondonyoko, mucite kabotu, mwaabile, mutaleki kulindila, nkokuya bulumbu bwanu bunooli bupati, anywebo munooli bana ba-Sijulu lyamajulu, nkaambo uli aluzyalo walo kulibatalumbi akubabi.
Amweetelele mbuli Usowanu mbweetelela.
Alimwi mutabeteki, nomuti takabetekwe anywebo. Mutazuli bantu, anywebo nomuti takazulwe. Amwaangunune, anywebo nomuyooangununwa.
Amupe, anywebo munooyoopegwa. Kuyoopedwa mucamba canu iceelelo cibotu cisindaidwe, cuumidwe-umidwe, cizywide mwa. Nkaambo ceelelo ncomweelela bamwi, anywebo muyooelelwa nciconya.
Sikwiiya tali mupati kwiinda mwiiyi wakwe, pele azyulila umwi umwi ulaba mbuli mwiiyi wakwe.
Alimwi ulangilanzi katowe akali muliso lyamunyoko, anu toyeeyi isanga elyo ilili muliso lyako?

Ino ulaambila buti munyoko kuti, Mukwesu, nkooko nkufule katowe muliso lyako, anu yebo toboni isanga ulili muliso lyako omwini? Osikuupaupa ameso yebo, saanguna ugwisye isanga ilili muliso lyako, noti bonesye kufula katowe akali muliso lyamunyoko.
Nkaambo taakwe musamu mubotu uuzyala micelo mibi, nuuba musamu mubi uuzyala micelo mibotu.
Musamu umwi umwi ulazibwa kumicelo yawo, inkuyu tazicelwa kumamvwa amusaansa kukalokananondwe.
Umuntu mubotu ulagwisya zintu zibotu muciyobwedo cibotu camoyo wakwe, awalo muntu mubi muciyobwedo cibi, ugwisya zintu zibi, nkaambo mulomo wakwe uamba oko ukuzywide kumoyo.
Umwi umwi uuza kulindime, aswiilile makani aangu, aacite, ndamutondezya oyo ngwakozya.
Ulikozyene amuntu uwakayaka ŋanda. Wahsya, mwiimbi walampa, wabika ntalisyo amwala. Elyo neyakasika miyoba, maanzi akauma ŋanda eyo, kwalo taakali enguzu zyakwiizungaanya, nkaambo yakayakwa nga.
Pele uuswiilila buyo, taciti, ulikozyene amuntu uwakayaka ŋanda amusenga buyo, iitajisi ntalisyo. Amaanzi akiiumisya, ndilyonya yakawa, ubuwe bweŋanda eyo bwali bupati.
Elyo naakamvwa Jesu, wakatuma bapati baba-Juda kulinguwe, wamukumbila kuti aboole azooponye muzike wakwe.
Balo nobakasika kuli-Jesu bakamukumbilisya bati, Uleelede oyu kuti umucitile boobo,
nkaambo ulayanda mukowa wesu, nguwe uwakatuyakila cikombelo cesu.
Mpoonya Jesu wakainka abo. Naakasika afwaafwi aŋanda, silumamba wakatumwa abeenzinyina kulinguwe kuyooamba kuti, Mwami, utalikataazyi, nseelede kuti ukanjile muŋanda yangu,
alimwi ndati nseelede kuboola kulinduwe, koamba ejwi buyo, mwanaangu ulapona.

Nkaambo amebo ndi muntu uulaililwa, ndilijisi basilumamba munsi lyangu, Ndaambila oyu kuti, Koya, kai ulainka. Ndaambila umwi kuti Koboola, kai ulaboola. Ndaambila muzike wangu kuti, Cita obu, kai ulacita,
Jesu naakamvwa makani aya wakamuyoowa, wacebukila bantu abali kumucilila, wati kulimbabo, Ndamwaambila, nsinabwene lusyomo ululi bobuya nomuba mu-Israyeli.
Abakatumidwe nobakaboola kumunzi, bakajana muzike wapona kale.
Nobwakaca, wakainka kumunzi uutegwa Naini, basikwiiya bakwe bakamucilila amakamu makamu aabantu.
Naakasika afwaafwi amulyango wamunzi, kwakali kutembekedwe muntu uwakafwide, mwaalumi uwali alike kulibanyina, alimwi banyina wali mukamufu, abantu banjibanji abaamunzi bakali awe.
Nkabela Mwami naakamubona wakamufwida luzyalo, wati kulinguwe, Leka kulila,
Ndilyonya waswena afwaafwi wajata macila, abakamutembekede baima, wati, Mulombe, ndakwaambila, Buka.
Mpoonya awo uwakafwide wakabuka, wakala watalika kwaambaula. Nkabela wamupa kulibanyina.
Boonse bakayoowa, balemya Leza bati, Kwabuka musinsimi mupati akati kesu, alimwi bati, Leza wayeeya bantu bakwe,
Elyo yakamvwigwa mpuwo yakwe mu-Judaya moonse amucisi coonse icizingulukide.
Nkabela Johane wakaita basikwiiya bakwe bobile, wabatuma ku-Mwami wati, Sena nduwe oyo uuza, na tucilangila umbi?
Aba bantu nobakasika kulinguwe bakati, Johane Mubapatizi watutuma kulinduwe wati, Sena nduwe oyo uuza, na tucilangila umbi?
Kuciindi eco nciconya wakaponya banjibanji kuzilwazi akukuciswa akumyuuya mibi, aboofu banjibanji wababonunuzya.

Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya mukamwaambile Johane zintu ezi nzomwabona anzomwamvwa, kuti boofu babona, abatyokede beenda, basicinsenda basalazigwa, basinkematwi bamvwa, abafwide babusigwa, abacete bakambaukilwa Makani Mabotu.
Uli acoolwe uutajani kulindime icimulebya.
Nobakainka mbaakatumide Johane, wakatalika kwaamba Johane kubantu wati, Ino ncinzi ncomwakaakweebela munkanda? Sena ndubu ulupeka amuuwo?
Ino ncinzi ncomwakaakubona? Sena muntu uusamide masila mateteete? Amubone, abasama masila mabotu abali azilyo izilweela bakede mumaanda aabwami.
Ino mwakaakubonanzi? Sena musinsimi? Ii, ndamwaambila, mupati kwiinda musinsimi.
Oyu ngonguwe uwakalembwa kuti,
Amubone, ndatuma mutumwa wangu kumbele lyabusyu bwako, Nguuti kakululamikile nzila kumbele lyako.
Nkabela bantu boonse nobakamvwa, abalo basimutelo, bakamulemya Leza, abakabapatizidwe alubapatizyo lwa-Johane.
Anukuti ba-Farisi abasimilao bakanenya ncaakabakanzila Leza, mbobatakabapatizigwa nguwe.
Elyo Mwami wakati, Abantu basunu ndibakozyanye enzi sena? Ino balikozyene enzi?
Balikozyene abana abakede mucisambalilo abaitana kuti, Twakamwiimbila, anu tamukazyanide, twaimba cakulyeetezya, anu tamulilide.
Nkaambo Johane Mubapatizi wakasika, talyi nsima, tanywi waini, nywebo mwati, Ujisi daimona.
Eno Mwana a-Muntu wasika, walya, wanywa, nkokuya mwati, Amubone, muntu sindya, mukolwi, mweenzinyina abasimutelo abacitazibi.
Pele busongo bulazyulila kubana boonse bambubo.
Eno mumunzi omo mwakali mukaintu mucitazibi, naakamvwa kuti ulikede ulalya muŋanda yamu-Farisi, wakaleta nsazi yamafuta aanunka kabotu,
waima kumatende aakwe ulalila, imisozi yakwe yakatalika kulopya matende aakwe, waasyuuzya susu lyakwe, wamumyontesya matende aakwe, waananika mafuta,
Nkabela mu-Farisi uwakamwiita, naakabona obo, wakayeeya mumoyo wakwe wati, Oyu naali musinsimi, naamuziba mukaintu oyu uumujata kuti nguni, na uli buti, nkaambo mucitazibi.
Jesu wakamuvuwa kuti, Simoni, ndiyanda kwaamba kulinduwe, (Wakati, Koamba, Mufundisi.)
Kwakali bantu bobile abakali amulandu kumuntu umwi. Umulandu waumwi ngwamasheleni aali myaanda yosanwe, uwaumwi ngwamakumi osanwe.
Eno mbobakabula cintu cakulunga, wakabajatila boonse bobile. Ino kulibaabo nguuli uuti muyandisisye?
Simoni wakamuvuwa wati, Ndiyeeya kuti nguyooyo ngwaakajatilisya. Wakamwaambila kuti, Wayeeya kabotu,

Mpoonya wasandukila kumukaintu, wati kuliSimoni, Sena wamubona mukaintu oyu? Ndanjila muŋanda yako, tondipede maanzi aakusanzwa matende aangu, pele walo walopya matende aangu emisozi yakwe, waasyuuzya esusu lyakwe.
Tondimyontede yebo, pele walo, kuzwida ciindi ncaanjila, talekede kumyontesya matende aangu.
Umutwe wangu tounanikide mafuta, anu oyu wananika matende aangu mafuta mabotu.
Ncendakwaambila kuti, Wajatilwa zibi zyakwe zinjizinji, nkaambo wayandisisya. Pele uujatilwa kaniini, uyanda kaniini.
Mpoonya awo wakamwaambila mukaintu kuti, Wajatilwa zibi zyako.
Elyo abo mbaali kukede abo akulya batalika kubuzyanya bati, Nguni oyu uujatila zibi?
Nkabela wakaambila mukaintu kuti, Lusyomo lwako lwakufutula, koya aluumuno.
abakaintu bamwi abakaponyegwa kumyuuya mibi akuzilwazi: Maliya uutegwa Magadalene uwakagwisigwa badaimona abali musanu mubabili,
awalo Johana, muka-Cuza, mubanzi wa-Heroda, a-Susana, abamwi banjibanji abakali kumulela alubono lwabo.
Musyangi wakazwa kukuminza mbuto zyakwe, eno naakali kuya buminza zimwi zyakawida munzila, zyakalyataulwa matende, abayuni bamujulu bazilya.
Zimwi zyakawida mumabwe, nezyakamena buyo zyakapusama nkaambo zyabula musyu.
Zimwi zyakawida mumamvwa, nezyakamena antoomwe amamvwa, azifundilizya.
Zimwi zyakawida muvu bbotu, zyamena, zyazyala mwaanda. Naakaamba makani aya wakoompolola kuti, Uujisi matwi aakumvwa, amvwe.
Nkabela basikwiiya bakwe bakamubuzya kuti, Ino caamba kutinzi cikozyano eci?
Wakati, Mwapegwa nywebo kuziba izisisidwe zyaBwami bwa-Leza, kwalo kulibamwi kulaambwa muzikozyano zyalo, kuti nobabona batabonesyi akumvwa batamvwisisisyi.
Eno cikozyano nceeci: imbuto ninkani ya-Leza,
Abo abali munzila mbabaswiilila, ndilyonya wasika Saatani, wabanyanga makani mumyoyo yabo, kuti batasyomi akufutulwa,
Abaabo abali mumabwe mbabamvwa makani, baatambula akubotelwa, pele tabajisi miyanda, basyoma kaindi, elyo kwasika kutepaulwa mpoonya mpoonya balenguka.
Ezyo izyakawida akati kamamvwa, mbabamvwa makani, bazwa awo baya bweenda, bafundilizigwa makataazyo, alubono, amisobano yabuumi, tabazyali micelo.
Ezyo zyamuvu bbotu mbambabo abamvwa makani amoyo mubotu uululeme, baajatisya, bazyala micelo calunamba.
Nkaambo taakwe cisisidwe iciti takasisululwe, taakwe civumbidwe iciti takavumbululwe kuti cibe atuba.
Nkaako amucenjele mbomumvwa, nkaambo uujisi uyoopegwa, uutajisi uyoonyangwa aceeco ncayeeya kuti ulicijisi.
Nkabela wakaambilwa kuti, Banyoko abanabakwanu mpobali anze, bayanda kukubona.
Wakabavuwa kuti, Bama abanabakwesu mbabaswiilila makani aa-Leza akwaacita.
Nebacili kuya bweenda Jesu woona, Mpoonya mpoonya kwakasika iguwo ipati muziba, amaanzi akatalika kubbizya bwaato, bakali mumapenzi mapati.
Bainka bamubusya bati, O mwami, O mwami, twafwa. Mpoonya wabuka, waumuzya iguwo amayuwe amaanzi. Ndilyonya aleka, kwabatama.
Elyo wakababuzya kuti, Nduli lusyomo lwanu ino? Bakayoowa, baankamana, babuzyanya bati, Ino nguni oyu uumuzya iguwo amaanzi, mpoonya zilamumvwa?
Naakazubuka atala wakaswaana amuntu waamunzi oyo, uunjidwe badaimona. Ciindi cilamfu taakali kusama cintu, taakali kukala muŋanda pele muzyuumbwe.
Naakabona Jesu wakakwiila, wamuvundamina wati ejwi ipati, Ino ndijisi mulandunzi ayebo, Jesu, Omwana a-Leza, Sijulu lyamajulu? Ndakukumbila kuti utandipenzyi.
Nkaambo walailila muuya uusofweede kuti Zwa mulooyo muntu, Nkaambo kanjikanji wakamujisi, muntu wakalindilwa ulaangidwe enketani ezibulo, wakaziryolaula zyaanzyo, watandwa daimona kuya musokwe,
Jesu wamubuzya wati, Nduweni zina lyako? Wati, Ndime Banji, nkaambo wakanjidwe badaimona banjibanji.
Nkabela bamukombelezya kuti atabatandili mumulindi uutagoli.
Kwakaliko oko butanga bwangulube zinjizinji, izyali kucela acilundu, bakamukumbila kuti abazumizye kunjila mulinzizyo. Wakabazumizya.
Mpoonya badaimona bakazwa mumuntu oyo, banjila mungulube, nkabela butanga boonse bwakakunkulikila muziba, bwaakulobelela.
Abeembela nobakabona icakacitika bakatija, baakuluula makani mumunzi amumatungu.
Elyo bantu bakazwa kuyoobona icakacitika. Bakasika kuli-Jesu, bajana oyo muntu, uwakagwisigwa badaimona, ulikede kumatende aa-Jesu, ulisamide, uliluzi. Bayoowa.
Nkabela abo abakacibona babaambila mbwaakaponezegwa oyo uwakanjidwe badaimona.
Eno bantu boonse abali mucisi icizingulukide Gerasa bakamukumbila kuti azwe kulimbabo, nkaambo bakayoowa kapati. Nkabela walo wakanjila mubwaato wabweeda.
Pele mwaalumi uwakagwisigwa badaimona, wakamukumbilisya kuti bainke awe, Kwalo Jesu wakamupilusya wati,
Bweeda kulindinywe ukabalungulwide zyoonse Leza nzyaakucitila, Nkabela wakainka, waamba mumunzi woonse zyoonse nzyaakamucitila Jesu.
Nkabela kwakasika mwaalumi uwali kutegwa Jairo, mweendelezi wacikombelo, wakavundama kumatende aa-Jesu, wamukumbila kuti aboole kuŋanda yakwe.
Nkaambo wakali amwana musimbi, omwe pele, uwakali emyaaka iyati kabe kumi mwiibili, wakali kuciswa kapati, afwaafwi akufwa. Eno naakali kuya bweenda, makamu makamu aabantu bakamuvumpa.
Elyo mukaintu uwakali kuzwa bulowa myaaka iili kumi mwiibili, uwakasowa lubono lwakwe loonse kubasilisi, nekubaboobo taakwe uwakamuponya pe,
wakasika kusule lya-Jesu, waampa moombe wengubo yakwe, ndilyonya bulowa bwaleka kuzwa.
Jesu wati, Ino nguni uwandyaampa? Boonse nobakakazya, Petro wakati, ambaali abo, Mwami, bantu balikubunganine, balikuzingulukide, ino waamba kuti, Nguni uwandyaampa?
Pele Jesu wakateeti, Mpali uwandyaampa, nkaambo ndalimvwa kuti nguzu zyazwa kulindime.
Elyo mukaintu naakabona kuti tasisiki, wakaboola ulakankama, wamuvundamina, waamba kumbele lyabantu boonse ncaamwaampila ambwaaponyegwa ndilyonya.
Nkabela wakamwaambila kuti, Mwanaangu, kokazika buyo moyo, lusyomo lwako lwakufutula, koya aluumuno.
Naakacili kwaamba, kwakasika muntu uuzwa kumweendelezi wacikombelo, waamba kuti, Mwanaako wafwa, utamukataazyi Mufundisi.
Jesu naakamvwa obo, wakamuvuwa kuti, Utayoowi, kosyoma buyo, musimbi uyoopona,
Naakasika kuŋanda takazuminide muntu naba omwe kuti anjile, pele Petro, a-Johane, a-Jakobo, awisi abanyina musimbi.
Bali kubiizika boonse akumulila, pele walo wati, Mutalili, nkaambo tafwide pe, uloona,
Bamuseka mbobali kuzi kuti musimbi wafwa.
Pele walo wakabatanda boonse, wamujata kujanza, woompolola wati, Omusimbi, buka,
Mpoonya muuya wakwe wakaboola, wabuka ndilyonya, Jesu walailila kuti apegwe cakulya,
Abazyali bakwe bakayoowa, pele wakabalaya kuti bataambili muntu eci icakacitwa.
Wakaba­ tuma kuya bukambauka Bwami bwa-Leza, akuponya abaciswa.
Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Mutabwezi cintu calweendo, nuuba musako, niiba nkomo, nebuba bulilu, naaba mali, alimwi mutabi ezibaki zyobile.
Kufumbwa ŋanda njomuti kanjile, mukakale mumonya omo mane mukainke,
Abo abatamutambula, mwazwa kumunzi oyo, amukunkumune lusuko lwamatende enu, cibe ciluuzyo kulimbabo.
Nkabela bakainka, baya bweenda muminzi yoonse, bali kukambauka Makani Mabotu akuponya bantu mumasena oonse.
abamwi baamba kuti, Eliya walibonya, bamwi bati, Musinsimi wakalekale wabuka.
Eno Heroda wakati, Johane ndakamukosola mutwe, ino nguni oyu ngwemvwide makani aya? Nkabela wali kuyanda kumubona.
Elyo makamu makamu aabantu naakabona obo, bakamucilila, Wakabatambula, wabaambawida aa-Bwami bwa-Leza, wabaponya abali kubula kupona,
Izuba nelyakatalika kubomba abali kumi abobile bakaboola kulinguwe bati, Bamwaisye bantu, bainke kuminzi iizingulukide, bakalale bajane zyakulya, nkaambo tuli musokwe,
Pele wakabaambila kuti, Amubape nobeni, balye. Bakateeti, Tatujisi, pele mikamu yosanwe enswi zyobile, cita ambweni twiinke tukabaulile aba bantu boonse zyakulya,
Nkaambo kwakali baalumi abati kamane myaanda iili makumi osanwe. Wakaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Amubakazike zikamu zikamu zyamakumi osanwe,
Nkabela bacita mbubonya, babakazika boonse,
Elyo wakabweza mikamu yosanwe enswi zyobile, walanga kujulu walumba, wiikomona, wabatambika basikwiiya bakwe kuti baabile bantu,
Bakalya bakuta boonse, alimwi kwakayolwa bufwefwelenga ubwakasyaala, kwakazyula zisuwo izili kumi muzibili.
Bakamuvuwa kuti, Bati nduwe Johane Mubapatizi, pele bamwi bati, Ngu-Eliya, abamwi, kuti, Musinsimi wakalekale wabuka kulufu.
Nkabela wakababuzya kuti, Ino nywebo muti ndimeni? Petro wakavuwa wati, Nduwe Kristo, Mwana a-Leza.
Mpoonya awo wakabaambilisisya akubalailila kuti bataambili muntu naba omwe obo.
Wati, Mwana a-Muntu uleelede kupenga zinjizinji, akutakatwa bapati abapaizi basimutwe abalembi, akajayigwe, akabuke kubuzuba bwatatu.
Nkabela wakaambila boonse kuti, Anooli muntu uuyanda kuza musule lyangu, alilube, alitwike ciingano cakwe mazuba amazuba, anditobele.
Nkaambo umwi umwi uuyanda kuyobola buumi bwakwe uyoobusweekelwa, kwalo uusweekelwa buumi bwakwe nkaambo kangu nguuyoobuyobola,
Ino muntu uyoojananzi, kuti wavuba nyika yoonse, pele walisowa mwini, nekuba kusoogwa?
Nkaambo umwi umwi uundyuusa mebo amakani aangu, awalo Mwana a-Muntu uyoomuusa, aakuboola mubulemu bwakwe abwa-Wisi abwabaangelo bakwe abasalala,
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Mpobali bamwi abaimvwi awa, abatakooyoomvwa lufu mane babone Bwami bwa-Leza.
Naakacili kukomba, ciwa cabusyu bwakwe cakasanduka, ezyakusama zyakwe zyakatuba akunyengema.
Nkabela kwakali kwaambaula awe baalumi bobile, bakali Musa a-Eliya,
abakaboneka abulemu, bakaamba aakufwa kwakwe nkweelede kuzyulizya ku-Jerusalemu.
Eno Petro ambaakali abo bakafwide Lonzi, nobakasinsimuka babona bulemu bwakwe, abaalumi abo bobile mbaali kwiimvwi abo.
Nkokuya nobakainka, Petro wakaambila Jesu kuti, O mwami, ncibotu katucikede ano, tuyake zilao zyotatwe, cimwi cibe cako, cimwi cibe ca-Musa, cimwi cibe ca-Eliya. Pele taali kucizi ncaamba.
Naacili kwaamba obo kwakasika ikumbi, lyabavumba, bakayoowa nobakanjila mukumbi.
Elyo lyakazwa ijwi mukumbi lyati, Oyu ngomwanaangu ngwenkondwa, amukaswiilile nguwe.
Ijwi nolyakamana kwaamba, Jesu wakajanika uli alike. Nkabela bakaumuna, tabaambili muntu mazuba ayo ezintu nzobakabona.
Eno mwaalumi umwi waamakamu makamu wakoompolola wati, Mufundisi, ndakukomba, langa mwanaangu mulombe nkaambo mbwabede alike.
Kuli muuya uumujata, inga ndilyonya ulakwiila, nkabela ulamuyuminizya akumuzwisya jovu, ulamuleka anguzu mane inga wandoozapaula.
Ndakakumbila basikwiiya bako kuti bamugwisye, pele bakakakilwa.
Jesu wakavuwa wati, Akaka, nywebo nobasunu nomutasyomi, ino ciindi cilamfu cili buti ncenga njookala anywebo akumubosezya moyo? Mulete kuno mwanaako.
Naakacili kuza, daimona wamukankatila ansi, wamuyuminizya. Mpoonya Jesu wakatapatila muuya uusofweede, wakaponya kalombe, wakabweedezya kuliwisi.
Nkabela bakaankamana boonse anguzu mpati zya-Leza. Boonse nobakacili kuyoowede azyoonse nzyaali kucita Jesu, wakaambila basikwiiya bakwe,
wati, Majwi aya anjilisye mumatwi aanu, nkaambo Mwana a-Muntu uyooabwa mumaanza aabantu.
Anu tabakamvwide kabotu nkani eyi, yakasiswa kulimbabo kuti batiizibi, nkabela bakayoowa kumubuzya mbwiibede nkani eyi.
Jesu naakabona kuyeeya kwamyoyo yabo, wakabweza mwana, wamubika kumbali lyakwe.
Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Uutambula mwana oyu muzina lyangu watambula ndime, alimwi uunditambula watambula uwakandituma, nkaambo muniini akati kanu nyoonse ngomupati.
Elyo Johane wakati kulinguwe, O mwami, twakabona muntu uugwisya badaimona muzina lyako, twakamukasya, nkaambo tatweendi awe.
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Mutamukasyi nkaambo uutamulwanyi wamwiiminina.
wakatuma batumwa kumbele. Nkabela bakainka banjila mumunzi waba-Samariya kuti bamululamikile.
Pele tabakamutambwide, nkaambo busyu bwakwe bwakalanzizye ku-Jerusalemu,
Basikwiiya bakwe, Jakobo a-Johane, nobakabona obo bakati, O mwami, sena uyanda kuti tulailile mulilo useluke kujulu ubatente, mbubonya mbwaakacita Eliya?
Anu wakabacebukila, wabatapatila wati, Tamuzi muuya wanu mbuubede.
Nkabela bakainka kumunzi umwi.
Jesu wakamuvuwa wati, Bamwaaba balijisi malyango, abayuni bamujulu bali eziteente, kwalo Mwana a-Muntu taakwe mpaoneka mutwe wakwe,
Nkabela wakati kuluumwi, Ndicilila, Walo wakati, O mwami, ndileka sansi nkazike taata.
Jesu wakamuvuwa kuti, Leka bafu bazike bafu babo beni, koya yebo ukambauke Bwami bwa-Leza.
Umwi awalo wakati, O mwami, ndizookucilila, kwalo sansi undileke nkabalaye abali kumunzi.
Pele Jesu wakati kulinguwe, Taakwe muntu uwakajata jamba ejanza lyakwe akucebukila munsi, uuelede Bwami bwa-Leza.
Wakabaambila kuti, Kutebula nceo, pele basimilimo mbace, nkaako amukombelele Mwami wakutebula, kuti atume basimilimo mukutebula kwakwe.
Kamuya, ndamutuma mbuli bana bambele akati kabaumpe.
Mutabwezi zikwama, neziba nkomo, neziba ndyasyo, mutalyaanzizyi muntu munzila.
Kufumbwa ŋanda njomuti kanjile, musaangune kuti, Luumuno alube kuŋanda ino.
Kuti mwali omo siluumuno, luumuno lwanu lunookede kulinguwe, kuti tamo lulamupilukila.
Mukakale mumonya muŋanda omo, mulye munywe nzobamusomba, nkaambo similimo uleelede cilumbyo cakwe. Mutanjilauki mumaanda.
Kufumbwa munzi ngomunjila, bamutambula, mukalye nzobamusomba,
mukaponye balwazi abalimo, mukabaambawide kuti, Bwami bwa-Leza buli afwaafwi kulindinywe.
Mumunzi umwi umwi ngomunjila, batamutambula, amuzwide kunzila zyawo muteeti,
Lusuko lwamunzi wanu ulwanamatide kumatende esu, twalukunkumwina kulindinywe, nokubaboobo muzibe kuti Bwami bwa-Leza bwamuswenenena.
Ndamwaambila kuti kubuzuba obo mulandu wacisi ca-Sodoma uyooba muniini kwiinda wamunzi oyo.

Maawe kulinduwe, o-Korazini, Maawe kulinduwe, o-Betsaida. Nkaambo kakuti malele mapati aakacitwa mulindinywe, anooli naali kucitidwe mu-Turo amu-Sidoni, minzi eyo neyali kusandukide kalekale, nobali kusamide masila aakulizya, akukala mwitwe.
Kwalo kulubeta mulandu wa-Turo a-Sidoni uyooba muniini kwiinda wanu,
Ayebo, o-Kapemauma, sena uyoosumpwidwa kujulu? Pe, uyooselusigwa kucikalilo cabafwa,
Uumuswiilila waswiilila ndime, uutamuswiilili tandiswiilili ame, uutandiswiilili tamuswiilili uwakandituma.
Abali makumi aali musanu mwaabili bakaboola akubotelwa bakati, O mwami, abalo badaimona batumvwa nkaambo kezina lyako.
Wakati kulimbabo, Ndakamubona Saatani ulaloka kujulu mbuli lulabo.
Amubone, ndamupa bwami bwakulyata nzoka atubanze, abwami atala lyenguzu zyoonse zyasinkondoma, taakwe ciyoomucisa akaniini.
Nokubaboobo mutabotelwi kuti badaimona bamumvwa, pele amubotelwe kuti mazina aanu alilembedwe kujulu.
Makani oonse ndaapegwa kuli-Taata. Taakwe uuzi Mwana na nguni, pele Taata, a-Taata na nguni, pele Mwana, ayooyo ngwakanza Mwana kumuyubulwida.
Wakacebukila basikwiiya bakwe kumbali wakati, Ali acoolwe meso aabona zintu nzomubona nywebo.
Nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti, basinsimi banjibanji abami bakali kuyanda kubona zintu nzomubona, pele tabakazibwene, akumvwa nzomumvwa, pele tabakazimvwide,
Wakati kulinguwe, Kwakalembwanzi­ mumulao? Ubala kutinzi ino?
Wakavuwa wati, Yanda Jehova Leza wako amoyo wako woonse, amuuya wako woonse, anguzu zyako zyoonse amiyeeyo yako yoonse, amunamuzyaanu mbuli mboliyanda omwini,
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Wavuwa kabotu, cita obo noti pone.
Pele walo mbwaakali kuyanda kulisanzya, wakaambila Jesu kuti, Ino munamuzeesu nguni?
Jesu wakamuvuwa wati, Umwi muntu wakali kukunkulika kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu kuya ku-Jeriko, nkabela wakawida mubafumpi, bakamusamununa, bamuumisya, bamusia uli mulufu.
Kwakaba buyo kuti mupaizi umwi wakakunkulika enzila eyo, naakamubona wakamwiinda ambali.
Mbubonya obo amu-Levi, naakasika nkuko akumubona, wakainda ambali.
Anu mu-Samariya umwi uwakali kuya bweenda wakasika kulinguwe, naakamubona wakamufwida luzyalo,
wakaswena, wazyaanga zicisa zyakwe, wazitila mafuta awaini, nkokuya wamutantika ambongolo yakwe, wamutola kuŋanda yabeenzu, wamubamba.
Nobwakaca naakayeeya kweenda wakagwisya masheleni obile, wapa simeenzaakwe wati kulinguwe, Mubambe kabotu, eno kufumbwa ngati sowe kwiinda aya, ndaboola ndilakubweedezezya.
Ino yebo uyeeya buti, kulooyo uwakawida mubafumpi nguni uwakaba munamuzyaabo, kulibaabo botatwe?
Wakaamba kuti, Kai nguwenya oyo uwakamufwida luzyalo. Jesu wakati kulinguwe, Koya ayebo ucite mbubonya.
Wali kujisi mwanaakwabo uutegwa Maliya, uwali kukala kumatende aa-Mwami akuswiilila makani aakwe.
Kwalo Maata wakalikataazya akubambisya cakulya, waboola kulinguwe wati, O mwami, sena tokwe amakani mwanaakwesu mbwaandisia endike muku bamba cakulya? Komwaambila azoondigwasye.
Pele Jesu wakamuvuwa kuti, Maata, Maata, walikataazya akuyeeyesya zintu zinjizinji,
anukuti iciyandika ncintu comwe, nkaambo Maliya walisalila caabilo cibotu ncatakooyoonyangwa.
Wakati kulimbabo, Mwakomba amwaambe kuti, Taateesu, ooli kujulu, alilemekwe zina lyako. Abuze Bwami bwako. Alucitwe luyando lwako ansi ano mbubonya mbolucitwa kujulu.
Utupe zilyo zitweelede mazuba amazuba.
Utujatile milandu yesu, nkaambo aswebo tulabajatila abali emilandu kulindiswe. Utatweenzyi mukutepaulwa, utuvune kumubi.
Elyo wakabaambila kuti, Anooli umwi wanu uujisi mweenzinyina, eno wainka kulinguwe akati kamasiku wati, Mweenzuma, ndyaabila mikamu yotatwe,
nkaambo mweenzuma umwi uwali mulweendo wasika kulindime, pele nsijisi cakumusomba,
nkokuya uuli muŋanda avuwe kuti, Utandikataazyi, mulyango wajalwa kale, tuli abulo abana bangu, nsikonzya kubuka kukupa,
ndamwaambila kuti, Naakaka kubuka kumupa mbwali mweenzinyina, nekubaboobo nkaambo kakukakatila kwakwe ulabuka amupe zyoonse nzyabula.
Aboobo ndamwaambila kuti, Amukumbile muzoopegwa, amuyandaule muzoojana, amukonkomone muzoojulilwa.
Nkaambo umwi umwi uukumbila ulatambula, uuyandaula ulajana, uukonkomona ulajulilwa.
Alimwi nguuli wisi mwana akati kanu kuti mwanaakwe wakumbila nsima, sena ulamuna bbwe? Kuti wakumbila inswi, sena ulamupa nzoka, iitali nswi njiyonya na?
Kuti wakumbila iji, sena ulamupa kabanze?
Nywebo, nobabi, mbomuzi kupa bana banu zintu zibotu, Usowanu uuli kujulu sena takooindilila kubapa Muuya Uusalala abakumbila kulinguwe?
Pele bamwi bakaamba kuti, Ulagwisya badaimona kunguzu zya-Belzebule, mwami wabadaimona.
Abamwi bakamusunka, bayanda kubona kulinguwe citondezyo icizwa kujulu.
Kwalo mbwaakali kuzi kuyeeya kwabo, wakabaambila kuti, Kufumbwa cisi icilyaandaanina, cilasaalwa, eŋanda ilyaandaanina ilawa.
Awalo Saatani kuti walyaandaanina, ino bwami bwakwe bunoozooimvwi buti? Nkaambo mwaamba kuti ndagwisya badaimona enguzu zya-Belzebule.
Eno kuti mebo ndigwisya badaimona enguzu zya-Belzebule, ino bana banu babagwisya enguzu zyani? Aboobo balo bayooba babetesi banu.
Pele kuti mebo ndigwisya badaimona amunwe wa-Leza, nkokuya bwami bwa-Leza bwamusikila.
Singuzu uuli azilwanyo nalindila ŋanda yakwe, lubono lwakwe lunookede kabotu.
Pele kuti kwasika umwi umwiinda nguzu, amuzunda, ulamunyanga zyoonse zilwanyo zyakwe nzyaali kusyoma, akwaaba zisaalwa zyakwe.
Oyu ngotutali awe ulandilwanya, ayooyo ngotutabungi awe ulamwaya.
Umuuya mubi azwa kumuntu uleendeenda mumasena aatakwe maanzi, uya buyandaula cilyookezezyo, atacijana ulaamba kuti, Ndapiluka kuŋanda yangu nkwendakazwa.
Asika wiijana ilikukwidwe akubambwa kabotu.
Ndilyonya ulainka kuyooleta imwi myuuya iili musanu mwiibili, iimwiinda kubija, yanjila ilakala mumo omo, eno milimo yakusyaalila yamuntu oyo ilabijisya kwiinda yakusaanguna.
Pele walo wateeti, Ii, kwalo akapati bali acoolwe abaswiilila makani aa-Leza akwaacita.
Nkaambo mbuli Jona mbwaakaba citondezyo kulibaku-Nineve, mbubonya awalo Mwana a-Muntu mbwayooba kulibasunu.
Mwami mukaintu wakumabizi uyooima antoomwe abantu basunu mulubeta, akabazule, nkaambo wakazwa kumagolelo aanyika kuti amvwe busongo bwa-Solomoni, eno ano mpali uumwiinda Solomoni.
Abalo baalumi baku-Nineve bayooima antoomwe abasunu mulubeta, bakabazule, nkaambo bakasanduka Jona naakabakambaukila makani, eno ano mpali uumwiinda Jona.
Ilambe lyamubili ndiso, iliso lyako lyanooluzi awalo mubili wako woonse ulizywide kusalala, kwala kuti lyanooli bbi awalo mubili wako ulizywide kusia,
Nkaambo kaako kolilanga, kuti mumuni uuli mukati kako tuuli mudima.
Nkaako kuti mubili wako woonse ulizywide mumuni, kuutakwe kabala akasiasia, uzoozyula mwa akusalala, mbuli lambe mbolisalazya kukuyaka kwalyo.
Eno mu-Farisi wakayoowa naakabona kuti walya buyo, tasambide.
Pele Mwami wakamwaambila kuti, Nywebo noba-Farisi, mulasalazya cinywido amutiba kunze, anu mukati mulizywide kunyanga abubi.
Nywebo, nobafubafuba, oyo uwakacita kunze engwe ngowakacita amukati na?
Kwalo amupe zipo nzizyo zyamukati, nkokuti zyoonse zilasalala kulindinywe.
Maawe nywebo, noba-Farisi, nkaambo mulayanda zyuuno zyakumbele muzikombelo, akwaanzigwa muzisambalilo.
Maawe nywebo, nkaambo mulikozyene ezyuumbwe izitalibonyi, nkabela bantu abazilyata tabazizi kuti nzizyo.
Eno umwi wabasimilao, wakamwaambila kuti, Mufundisi, mboamba obo watutukana aswebo,
Nkabela wakati, Maawe anywebo, nobasimilao, nkaambo mutwika bantu mikuli milemu iiminya, anu nywebo nobeni tamwiijati mikuli eyo nekuba kumunwe wanu omwe.
Maawe kulindinywe, nkaambo muyaka zyuumbwe zyabasinsimi, abamauso mbabakabajaya.
Nkaambo muli bakamboni, mwiizumina milimo yabamauso, nkaambo balo bakabajaya, eno nywebo muyaka zyuumbwe zyabo.
Ncencico ncobwakaamba busongo bwa-Leza kuti, Ndiyoobatumina basinsimi abaapostolo, bamwi bayoobajaya akubapenzya,
kuti akayandaulwe kulibasunu malowa oonse aabasinsimi aakatilwa kuzwa kumatalikilo aanyika,
kuzwa kubulowa bwa-Abele mane kusikila kubulowa bwa-Zakariya, uwakajayigwa akati kacituulilo eŋanda ya-Leza, Ii, ndati kulindinywe, buyooitwa kulibasunu.
Maawe kulindinywe, nobasimilao, nkaambo mwacitola cijuzyo caluzibo, tamukwe nomwanjila nobeni, abalo abali kunjila mwabakasya.
Naakazwa omo, abalembi aba-Farisi bakatalika kumusungilizya enguzu akumuyungila kuti kacaamba zintu zinjizinji,
bakamubenda-benda kuti bajane ijwi ilizwa kumulomo wakwe, kuti bamubike mulandu.
Nkaambo taakwe civumbidwe iciti takavumbululwe, taakwe cisisidwe iciti takazibwe.
Aboobo kufumbwa ncomwaambila mukusia, ciyoomvwigwa mukusalala, aceeco ncomuvwiila-vwiila mutwaanda twamukati, ciyoompololwa aziluli zyamaanda.
Alimwi ndamwaambila, nobeenzuma, mutanoobatija abajaya mubili, elyo munsi lyakooko taakwe ncobacikonzya kucita.
Pele ndamutondezya ngomweelede kutija. Amutije oyo uujisi nguzu zyakuwaala mu-Gehena, amana kujaya. Ii, ndamwaambila, amumutije oyo.
Sena tuyuni toaanwe tatuulwa makobili obile? Eno kulintuto taakwe nekaba komwe akalubidwe kuli-Leza.
Anu nywebo, aalo masusu aakumitwe yanu alibalidwe oonse. Mutayoowi, mulayandika kwiinda tuyuni tunjitunji.
Alimwi ndamwaambila kuti, Umwi umwi uundizumina kumbele lyabantu, awalo Mwana a-Muntu uyoomuzumina kumbele lyabaangelo ba-Leza,
anukuti uunditama kumbele lyabantu uyootamwa kumbele lyabaangelo ba-Leza.
­Alimwi umwi umwi uubisya-bisya Mwana a-Muntu ulajatilwa nkuko, pele uusampaula Muuya Uusalala takoojatilwa.
Nebamuleta muzikombelo, akubabetesi, akubami, mutalikataazyi mumyoyo yanu kuti muyoovuwa kutinzi na muyooamba kutinzi,
nkaambo Muuya Uusalala uyoomuzibya nkomweelede kwaamba kuliceeco ciindi.
Elyo umwi wamunkamu yabantu wakati kulinguwe, Mufundisi, ambila mukwesu kuti twaabane awalo lukono.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Yoo muntu, ino nguni uwakandibika bubetesi abwaabi akati kanu?
Wakati kulimbabo, Amucenjele, amulilesye kukulikumbuzya koonse, nkaambo buumi bwamuntu tabuzwi kukuvuba kwazintu nzyajisi.
Eno wakabaambila cikozyano cakuti, Umwi muvubi wakajana maila manjimanji mumyuunda yakwe.
Mpoonya mpoonya wakayeeya mucamba cakwe wati, Ino ndicite buti? Nkaambo nsijisi busena bwakubikila maila aangu.
Wakati, Mbobuya mbwenjoocita. Ndilaamwaya matala aangu, ndiyake ambi mapati, ndikayobwede mumo maila aangu oonse, alubono lwangu.
Nenti ambile muuya wangu kuti, Omuuya, ulivubide lubono lunjilunji uluyobwedwe myaaka minjiminji, liibe, lya, nywa, kosobana.
Anukuti Leza wakamwaambila kuti, Yebo omufubafuba, ngoonya masiku aya muuya wako ulayandaulwa kulinduwe. Ino ezi zintu nzooyobwede zilaba zyani?
Mbwabede uuliyobweda lubono, anu tajisi buvubi kuli-Leza.
Nkaambo buumi bulainda kulicakulya, amubili ulainda kuli zyakusama.
Amuyeeye bacikwangala, tabasyangi, tabatebuli, tabajisi matala neciba ciyobwedo, kwalo Leza ulabasanina, Nywebo mulayandika kapati kwiinda bayuni.
Alimwi kukulikataazya, ino nguni kulindinywe uukonzya kulilungilila ciimo cakwe?
Eno mbocamukakila cintu ciniini, ino mucilikatazizyanzi kulizeezyo zimwi.
Amuyeeye mbwaamena malangalanga, taabeleki, taaluki, pele ndamwaambila kuti, Awalo Solomoni mwini mubulemu bwakwe boonse taakwe naakasama mbuli lyomwe lyaaya.
Eno obuya Leza mbwasamika mani aamusokwe, aaliwo sunu, ijunza aasowelwa mumulilo, sena takooyoomusamika nywebo nomujisi lusyomo luniini?
Alimwi nywebo mutayandauli ncomuzoolya ancomuzoonywa, mutalimbululi.
Nkaambo zintu ezi zyoonse nzenzizyo nzobayandaula bamasi aansi, eno Usowanu ulizi kuti mulazibula ezi zintu.
Pele amusaangune kuyandaula bwami bwa-Leza, nomuzooyungizizigwa zintu ezi.
Mutayoowi, nokatanga kaniini, nkaambo Usowanu ulakondwa kumupa bwami bwakwe.
Amuuzye nzomuisi, mukape zyaluzyalo, mulicitile zikwama izitakulumpali, lubono lwakujulu ulutamani, oko nkutasiki uubba, ukutakwe pempe ililya.
Nkaambo ukuli lubono lwanu, inooli nkuko amyoyo yanu.
Nywebo nobeni amube mbuli bantu abalindilila Mwami wabo, uuboola kupobwe lyakukwata, kuti asika akonkomona, bamujulile ndilyonya.
Bali acoolwe bazike abo, Mwami wabo asika abajane balindilide. Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Uzoolyaanga mucibuno cakwe, akabakazike akulya, aboole akabapampwide lwakwe mwini.
Kuti wasika kukulindila kwabili na kwatatu, abajana bali boobo, bali acoolwe bazike abo.
Amuzibe oku, kuti na mukamwini ŋanda anooli naakali kuzi ciindi ncasika uubba, naakalindila, naatakazumina kuti ŋanda yakwe idonkolwe.
Amukalibambe anywebo, nkaambo Mwana a-Muntu uyoosika kuciindi ncomutezi.
Elyo Petro wakaamba wati, O mwami, sena uamba cikozyano eci kulindiswe na kuliboonse?
Mwami wakamuvuwa kuti, Nguuli mubanzi uuzi uusyomekede, simalelaakwe ngwazoobika kubana bakwe, kuti abaabile zilyo zyabo kuciindi ceelede?
Uli acoolwe muzike oyo, simalelaakwe asika, amujana ulacita obo.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, ulamubika bwami kulubono lwakwe loonse.
Pele kuti muzike oyo wayeeya mumoyo wakwe kuti, Mwami wangu wamuka kusika, elyo watalika kuuma bazikenyina baalumi abakaintu, akulya akunywa akukolwa,
mwami wamuzike oyo uyoosika kubuzuba mbwatamulangili akuciindi ncatezi, uyoomukwipaulisya, amupe caabilo cakwe antoomwe abatasyomekede.
Eno muzike oyo uwakali kuzi luyando lwamwami wakwe, pele takalilulamikide, takacitide mbwaali kuyanda, uyooumwa zyuumo zinjizinji.

Kwalo oyo uwatakali kuzi, uwakacita uzyeelede kuumwa, uyooumwa zyuumo zice buyo. Kufumbwa uupegwa kunjikunji kuyooitwa kunjikunji kulinguwe, ayooyo uubikilwa kunjikunji, kulinguwe balakumbila kwiindilila.
Ndakasika kuwaala mulilo ansi, ndiyandanzi na wakutuka kale?
Pele ndijisi lubapatizyo ndwendakabapatizigwa andulo, eno ndapenga nolutanamana.
Sena muyeeya kuti ndasika kuleta luumuno ansi? Ndamwaambila pe, pele kwaandaana,
nkaambo kuzwa sunu muŋanda yomwe mulaba bosanwe abaandeene, botatwe balalwanya bobile, abobile balalwanya botatwe.
Bayooandaana, wisi amwanaakwe mulombe, amwana kuliwisi, banyina amwanaabo musimbi, amwana musimbi kulibanyina, abanyinazyala balaandaana amukwaabo, amukwaabo, kulibanyinazyala,
Alimwi mwabona muuwo wakumabizi waunga, mulaamba kuti, Lulabala lumwi. Mbokubede.
Nywebo nobasikuupaupa ameso, mulikuzi kupandulula busyu bwenyika abwakujulu, ino mwaba anzi kutaziba kupandulula ciindi cino?
Alimwi ninzi ino ncomutalikoswedi ciluleme nobeni?
Na muleenda asimulandunyoko kuya ku-Booma, nomuciya munzila, kojatisya kulivuna kulinguwe, ambweni akutole kumubetesi, amubetesi akwaabe kumupulisa, amupulisa akuwaale muntolongo.
Ndakwaambila kuti tokooyoozwa omo mane ulunge kali kakusyaalila.
Jesu wakabavuwa wati, Sena muyeeya kuti ba-Galilaya abo bakali babi kwiinda ba-Galilaya boonse, mbobakafwa obo?
Pe, ndamwaambila kuti mwatasanduka muyoofwidilila anywebo nyoonse,
Abaabo abakali kumi amusanu mubatatu abakawidwa ŋanda ndamfu yaku-Siloamu, iyakabajaya, sena muyeeya kuti abo bakali basimilandu kwiinda bantu boonse abakayakide ku-Jerusalemu?
Pe, ndamwaambila kuti mwatasanduka muyoofwidilila anywebo nyoonse.
Nkabela wakaambila mulimi kuti, Bona, myaaka yotatwe nkensika kuzoolanga micelo kulooyu mukuyu, pele nsiijani, uteme, usinkilanzi insi?
Wakamuvuwa kuti, O mwami, uleke amwaaka uno, nkuulimine nkuubike bufumba,
Kuti wazyala micelo ncibotu, kwalo kuti pe, uyooutema.
Eno wakali kwiisya mucikombelo mu-Sabata.
Nkabela kwakali mukaintu uwali kujisi muuya uumulengaula myaaka iili kumi amusanu mwiitatu, walivungene, tali kukonzya koololoka akaniini pe.
Jesu naakamubona wakamwiita, wamwaambila kuti, Bama, waangululwa kucilwazi cako,
Wakabika maanza alinguwe, woololoka ndilyonya, walumbaizya Leza.

Anu mweendelezi wacikombelo wakanyema nkaambo Jesu wamuponya ku-Sabata, wakavuwa waambila bantu kuti, Kuli mazuba aali musanu mubumwi aakubeleka, amuboole mumazuba ayo, muponyegwe, mutabooli kubuzuba bwa-Sabata.
Mwami wakamuvuwa kuti, Nywebo nobasikuupaupa ameso, sena umwi umwi wanu tasungununi ŋombe yakwe niiba mbongolo yakwe ku-Sabata, akwiitola kuyoonywa maanzi?
Ayooyu mukaintu, mwana a-Abrahamu, uwakaangwa Saatani eyi myaaka iili kumi amusanu mwiitatu, sena takweelede kuti aangululwe kuliceeco caanzyo kubuzuba bwa-Sabata?
Naakaamba obo, bakausa boonse mbaakali kukazyanya abo, amakamu makamu aabantu bakabotelwa emilimo yoonse mibotu njaakacita.
Bulikozyene enseke yamusitada njaakabweza muntu, wiisyanga mumuunda wakwe. Nkabela yakamena, lyaba samu ipati, abayuni bamujulu bali kukala kumitabi yalyo.
Alimwi wakateeti, Bwami bwa-Leza ndiyoobukozyanya anzi?
Bulikozyene amimena njaakabweza mukaintu, wiivwela muzyeelelo zyotatwe zyabusu, mane bwafufumuka boonse.
Wakali kuya bweenda akwiisya muminzi amutunzi, kuya ku-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela umwi wakamubuzya kuti, O mwami, abafutwidwe sena mbace buyo? Elyo wakabaambila kuti,
Kamusolekesya kunjila kumulyango uusyanikide, nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti banjibanji bayooyanda kunjila, pele bayookakilwa,
Mukamwini ŋanda abuka kale ajala mulyango, anywebo mutalika kwiima anze akukonkomona kucitendele muteeti, Omwami, tujulile, amuvuwe kuti, Nsimuzi nkomwazwida,
mpoonya mpoonya nomuyootalika kwaamba kuti, Twakalya akunywa kubusyu bwako, ayebo wakaiisya munzila zyesu,
pele walo uyooti, Ndamwaambila, nsimuzi nkomuzwa, amuzwe kulindime nywebo nyoonse nomucitazibi.
Kuyooba kulila akuluma ntwino, awo mwabona Abrahamu, a-Izaka, a-Jakobo, abasinsimi boonse, balikede mu-Bwami bwa-Leza, pele nywebo mwasowelwa buyo anze.
Bayoozwa kujwe akumbo, akunyika akumabizi, kuzookala mu-Bwami bwa-Leza,
Amumvwe, nkobali bamunsi abayooba bataanzi, alimwi nkobali bataanzi abayooba bamunsi.
Kuciindi eco kwakasika ba-Farisi bamwi abakamwaambila kuti, Konyamuka, uzwe okuno, nkaambo Heroda uyanda kukujaya:
Jesu wakabavuwa kuti, Kamuya mukaambile mwaaba oyo kuti, Bona, sunu ejunza ndicigwisya badaimona akuponya bantu, ezyona ndiyoozyulizya mulimo wangu.
Nokubaboobo ndileelede kuya mulweendo lwangu sunu ejunza ezyona, nkaambo takuzuminiki kuti musinsimi afwide kumbi, pele ku-Jerusalemu.

Akaka Jerusalemu, Jerusalemu, yebo oojaya basinsimi akubawaala mabwe abatumwa kulinduwe, Kanjikanji ndali kuyanda kubungika antoomwe bana bako, mbuli nkuku mbwiifukatila twana twayo mumababa aayo, pele mwakaka,
Amubone, iŋanda yanu mwiilekelelwa kiimwaikide. Eno ndamwaambila kuti, Tamukooyoondibona limbi, mane mukaambe kuti, Uli acoolwe uuboola muzina lya-Jehova.
Mwakalimo omo mwaalumi umwi simulungu.
Jesu wakavuwa, wakabuzya balembi aba-Farisi kuti, Sena kuliluzi kuponya ku-Sabata, na pe?
Pele bakaumuna buyo. Nkabela wakamujata wamuponya, ndilyonya wakamuleka wainka.
Elyo wakabaambila wakati, Nguuli akati kanu uunga imbongolo niiba ngombe yawida mucikala, sena takooigwisya cakufwambaana kubuzuba bwa-Sabata?
Nkabela tabakwe nobakacili kukonzya kuzumanana kumakani ayo.
Anooli watambwa muntu kuya kupobwe lyakukwata, utakali acuuno cabulemu, nkaambo ambweni watambwa aumwi uukwiinda bulemu,
elyo simeenzaanu aboola kulinduwe akwaambila kuti, Muswene oyo muntu abusena awa, ndilyonya yebo watalika kuzwa abuusu kuyookala acuuno icili munsi.
Kwalo kuti watambwa, koya ukale kucuuno icili munsi omwini, kuti uwakutamba asika akakwaambile kuti, Mweenzuma, nyamuka uboole kumbele, ndoti jane bulemu kumbele lyabaabo boonse mbokede abo akulya.
Nkaambo umwi umwi uulisumpula uyoofwiinsigwa, ayooyo uulifwiinsya uyoosumpulwa.

Elyo wakaambila simeenzaakwe wakati, Kuti wacita cisusulo na cilalilo, utaambi beenzinyoko, nebaba banabakwanu, nebaba basazinyoko, nebaba mboomuyakide abo bavubi, nkaambo ambweni abalo balakutamba, ujane kubweedwa.
Pele kuti wacita pobwe, kotamba abacete, ezilema, abatyokede, aboofu,
nozooba acoolwe nkaambo tabakwe cakukubweedezezya, uyoobweedezezegwa kukubuka kwabaluleme,
Pele Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Umwi muntu wakacita pobwe ipati, wakatamba banjibanji,
nkabela wakatuma muzike wakwe kuciindi cakulya kuyooambila abakatambidwe kuti, Kamuboola nkaambo zyoonse zililulamikidwe kale.
Nkabela boonse abo bakatalika kulikazizya ejwi lyomwe. Mutaanzi wakamwaambila kuti, Ndakaula muunda, ndileelede kuyooubona, ndakukumbila ukandikazizizye kabotu.
Umwi wakati, Ndakaula basune abali kumi, lino ndaya kuyoobasola, ndakukumbila ukandikazizizye kabotu.
Umwi wakati, Ndakakwata musimbi ncentakonzya kuboola.

Elyo muzike oyo wakaboola, waambila mwami wakwe makani aya, Ndilyonya mwiniŋanda wakaba mukali, waambila muzike wakwe wati, Kofwamba uinke mumigwagwa amutuzila twamumunzi, ukabalete okuno abacete, ezilema, aboofu, abatyokede,
Limwi muzike wakaamba kuti, O mwami, kwacitwa mbuli kulailila kwako, nokubaboobo mpobucili busena.
Nkabela mwami wakaambila muzike kuti, Koya kumigwagwa akumikusi ukabagubizye banjile, kuti ŋanda yangu izyule.
Nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti kubaalumi abo abakatambidwe taakwe aomwe uuti kasole cilalilo cangu.
Kwakali kweenda awe makamu makamu mapati aabantu, nkabela wakacebuka, wabaambila kuti,
Anooli muntu uuza kulindime, uutasuli wisi, abanyina, amukaintu wakwe, abana bakwe, abanabakwabo, abacizi bakwe, ii, abwalo buumi bwakwe mwini, takonzya kuba sikwiiya wangu.
Kufumbwa muntu uutabwezi ciingano cakwe mwini akundicilila, takonzya kuba sikwiiya wangu.
Ino nguuli akati kanu, uuyanda kuyaka ŋanda ndamfu, uutasaanguni kukala sansi, abale mali ngati yasye ŋanda, abone na ulijisi aakwiizyulizya?
Kuti antela amane kuyaka ntalisyo, akakilwa kwiimana, boonse abiibona banoomuseka,
banooamba kuti, Oyu muntu wakatalika kuyaka, pele taakwe naakakonzya kwiimanizya.
Nguuli mwami uuya kuyoolwanya mwami umwi, uutasaanguni kukala sansi akuyeeya na uli enguzu abasilumamba abali mwaanda wemyaanda, kulwanya oyo uumusikila uujisi abali myaanda yobile yemyaanda?
Kwataba boobo, umwi kacili kulekule, ulatuma abayoomuzibya kuti walibonzya kulinguwe.
Mbubonya obo, umwi umwi kulindinywe uutaleki zyoonse nzyajisi, takonzya kuba sikwiiya wangu.
Munyo mubotu, pele awalo munyo kuti wasampuka, ino ulalunzigwa buti?
Tuuelede mumuunda nekuba kuyobwedwa mbolela, Pele ulasoogwa buyo. Uujisi matwi aakuswiilizya, aswiilile.
Nkabela aba-Farisi abalembi bakatongauka bati, Oyu muntu utambula bacitazibi, ulalya abalo.
Elyo wakabaambila cikozyano eci cakuti,

Ino nguuli muntu akati kanu uujisi mbelele izili mwaanda, nkabela kusweeke yomwe kulinzizyo, sena inga takoozisia musokwe izili makumi aali musanu mwaane amusanu muzine, ainke kuyoolangaula iyakasweeka mane akiibone?
Aakwiibona, uliibika aziwezo zyakwe akubotelwa.
Asika kumunzi ulaita beenzinyina ambobayakide abo, ateeti kulimbabo, Amubotelwe amebo nkaambo ndiibona mbelele yangu iyali kusweekede.
Ndamwaambila kuti, Mbubonya obo akujulu kunooli kubotelwa nkaambo kaumwi mucitazibi uwasanduka, kwiinda baluleme abali makumi aali musanu mwaane amusanu mubane abatabuli kusanduka.
Mukaintu nguuli uujisi masheleni aali kumi, asweekelwa lyomwe, sena takootomeka lambe, akukulisye moonse muŋanda, akalangaulisye, mane alibone?
Alibona ulaita beenzinyina ambobayakide abo ateeti, Kamubotelwa amebo nkaambo ndaliiana isheleni lyangu ilyali kusweekede,
Mbubonya obo ndamwaambila kuti nkokuli kubotelwa kubaangelo ba-Leza nkaambo kaumwi mucitazibi uwasanduka.
Alimwi wakaamba kuti, Muntu umwi wakali kujisi bana bobile balombe.
Umuniini wakaambila wisi kuti, Taata, ndipa caabilo calubono iceelede ndime. Nkabela wakabaabanya lubono lwakwe.
Naakamana mazuba mace buyo, oyo muniini wakabungika zyakwe zyoonse, wainka kucisi icili kule, oko wakaakusowaila lubono lwakwe kubutaka,
Naakamana kulusowa loonse, kwakaba nzala mpati mucisi eco, walo wakatalika kupenga.
Nkabela wakainka walinjizya kumuntu wamucisi eco, oyo wakamutuma mumakula aakwe kuti aembele ngulube.
Wakali kuyanda kukusya ida lyakwe amakweleele aalya ngulube, kwalo taakwe muntu uwakamupa,
Pele naakayeeya wakati, Taata ulijisi bazike banjibanji abakuta nsima mane baliileka, pele mebo kuno ndafwa nzala.
Nandoobuka, ndiinke kulitaata, ndikamwaambile kuti, Taata, ndabisizya ijulu ayebo,
nsiceelede kutegwa mwanaako, undicite mbuli umwi wabazike bako,
Ndilyonya wakanyamuka wainka kuliwisi, kwalo naakacili kulekule wisi wakamubona, wamufwida luzyalo, watijaana, wawida kunsingo yakwe, wamumyontesya.
Mpoonya mwana wakamwaambila kuti, Taata, ndabisizya ijulu ayebo, nsiceelede kutegwa mwanaako.
Pele wisi wakaambila bazike bakwe kuti, Kamuleta cisamo cibotu, mumusamike, mumubike nweenwe kujanza lyakwe, mumusamike endyasyo kumatende aakwe,
alimwi mulete moombe uuneneede, mumujaye, tulye tusekelele.
Nkaambo oyu mwanaangu wakali mufu, sunu wapona, wakalisweekede, sunu wabonwa. Ndilyonya bakatalika kusekelela.
Eno mwanaakwe mupati wakali mumuunda, Naakasika afwaafwi aŋanda, wakamvwa kwiimba akuzyana.
Wakaita muzike umwi, wamubuzya kuti, Ino ninzi eco?
Wakamuvuwa kuti, Mwanaakwanu wasika, uso wajaya moombe uuneneede, mbwaamubona ucipona,
Pele wakanyema, wakaka kunjila, elyo wisi wakazwa wamukombelezya,
Kwalo mwana wakavuwa, waambila wisi kuti, Bona, imyaaka yavula njendakubelekela, nsinasotokede nuuba omwe mulao wako, nekubaboobo tonandipede nekaba kapongo kuti tusekelele abeenzuma.
Pele oyu mwanaako uwakamwaya lubono lwako antoomwe abasibaalumi, mbwaasika buyo wamujayila moombe uuneneede,
Wakati kulinguwe Mwanaangu, tuli ayebo ciindi coonse, zyoonse zyangu nzizyako.
Twaleelede kusekelela akubotelwa, nkaambo oyu mwanikaako wakalifwide, sunu wapona, wakalisweekede, sunu wabonwa.
Alimwi wakaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Kwakali muntu umwi muvubi uwakajisi mubanzi, walo wakaambilizigwa kulinguwe kuti, Ulasowaila lubono lwako.
Mpoonya mpoonya wakamwiita, wamubuzya kuti, Ino ali buti makani aya ngendamvwa kulinduwe? Koyubulula bubanzi bwako, nkaambo tokooyooba limbi mubanzi.
Elyo mubanzi wakalyaambya mucamba cakwe kuti, Ino ndiyoocita buti nkaambo simalelaangu ulanditanda kububanzi? Ukulima nsijisi nguzu pe, akukumbila ndijisi buusu,
Ndilizi mbwenti cite kuti na ndatandwa kububanzi bakanditambule mumaanda aabo.
Nkabela wakabaita boonse abakali amilandu kulisimalelaakwe. Wakabuzya mutaanzi kuti, Sena uli amulandunzi kulisimalelaangu?
Wakati, Ninsazi zyamafuta izili mwaanda. Wakamwaambila kuti, Jata lugwalo lwako, fwamba ukale, ulembe makumi osanwe.
Nkabela kuluumwi wakati, Ino yebo uli amulandunzi? Wakavuwa kuti, Nzyeelelo izili mwaanda zyamaila. Wakati kulinguwe, jata lugwalo lwako, ulembe makumi aali musanu mwaatatu.
Elyo simalelaakwe wakalumbaizya mubanzi oyo uutaluleme mbwaakacita camaanu, nkaambo bana baansi ano mbasimaanu mucizukulu cabo kwiinda bana bakusalala.
Eno ndamwaambila kuti, Kamulicitila beenzinyoko kulubono lwakutalulama, kuti lwaakumana, bamutambule mumaanda aatamani.
Uusyomekede kuciniini ulisyomekede akucipati, uutaluleme kuciniini taluleme akucipati.
Aboobo kuti tamusyomeki kulubono lwakutalulama, ino nguni uuti kamusyome kulubono lwinilwini?
Alimwi kuti tamusyomeki kulizyabamwi, ino nguni uuti kamupe canu?
Taakwe muzike uukonzya kubelekela bami bobile, Nkaambo ulasula umwi ayande umwi, na ulakakatila kuluumwi, asampaule umwi. Tamukonzya kubelekela Leza milimo antoomwe alubono.
Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Nywebo mulimbabo abalilulamika kumbele lyabantu, kwalo Leza uliizi myoyo yanu, nkaambo icilemekwa bantu ncisesemyo kuli-Leza.
Wakaliko mulao, abasinsimi, mane kusikila kuli-Johane, kuzwida ciindi eco Makani Mabotu aa-Bwami bwa-Leza alakambaukwa, eno boonse babunjila akusungilizya.
Pele ncuuba kuti imaninine nyika ejulu, kwiinda kuti kumane kazila komwe kamulao.
Kwakali muntu umwi muvubi, wakali kusama zisamo zyabwami aziteteete, Wakali kulya zibotu mazuba oonse.
Kwakaliko amukumbizi umwi uwakali kutegwa Lazaro, uwakabikwa amulyango wakwe, wakali ezicisa zinjizinji,
wakali kubwezelela bufwefwelenga ubwakali kuwida kunsi atafule lyamuvubi oyo, ii, abalo babwa bakaboola bamyankuta zicisa zyakwe.
Eno mukumbizi oyo wakafwa, abaangelo bakamutola kucamba ca-Abrahamu. Awalo muvubi wakazikwa.
Elyo kucikalilo cabafwa, mbwaakali amapenzibulanga, wakatambya meso aakwe, wabona Abrahamu kulaale, awalo Lazaro acamba cakwe.
Ndilyonya wakoompolola ejwi pati wati, Taata Abrahamu, ndifwida luzyalo, utume Lazaro kuti atompe mpela yamunwe wakwe mumaanzi, azootontozye mulaka wangu, nkaambo ndapengesya mumabangabanga aya.
Pele Abrahamu wakateeti, Mwana, koyeeya kuti wakalitambwide zibotu zyako nowakali muumi, mbubonya Lazaro mbwaakatambwide zibi. Eno muno walyokezya, pele yebo wapengesya.
Alimwi kwabikwa dindi ipati akati kesu anywebo, kuti abakokuno abayanda kuzubukila oko tabakonzya, abalo abakooko kulindinywe tabakonzya kusika okuno.
Nkabela wakateeti, Taata, ncendakukumbila nkuti ukamutume kuŋanda yataata,
nkaambo ndijisi banabakwesu bosanwe, akabaambilisye kuti batabooli kulibobuno busena bwamapenzi.
Pele Abrahamu wakamwaambila kuti, Balijisi Musa abasinsimi, abaswiilile mbabo.
Walo wakati, Pe, pe, Taata Abrahamu, kwalo anooli nokwabuka umwi kubafu, wainka kulimbabo, nobati kasanduke.
Wakamuvuwa kuti, Na tabamvwi Musa abasinsimi, tabakooyoozumina nokubuka uuzwa kubafu.
Limwi wakaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Takukonzeki kuti zilebyo zitabiwo, pele maawe kulooyo uuzileta.
Kwamubotela walo kuti aangwe bbwe munsingo yakwe awaalwe mulwizi, kwiinda kuti alebye umwi wabaniini aba.
Amukalilangisye. Kuti munyoko wakubisizya umutapatile, kuti weempa umujatile.
Kuti wakubisizya ziindi izili musanu muzibili mubuzuba bomwe, aboola kulinduwe ziindi izili musanu muzibili ati, Ndeempwa, umujatile.
Mwami wakati, Mwanoojisi lusyomo ululi mbuli nseke yamusitada, muyooambila mubula oyu kuti, Zyuka awa, ukasimpwe mulwizi, uyoomumvwa.
Pele ino nguni kulindinywe uujisi muzike uulima, na uuembela, akotoka buyo, ateeti kulinguwe, Koboola eno, ukale ulye?
Sena takoomwaambila kuti, Ndilulamikila ndilalile, libambe undipampwide, nsaangune kulya akunywa, nkokuya ayebo noti kalye akunywa?
Sena uyoomulumba muzike oyo, mbwaacita ncaakalaililwa? Ndiyeeya kuti pe.
Mbubonya obo anywebo, mwamana kucita zyoonse nzomwalaililwa, amukaambe, Tuli bazike buyo, twacita ncotwali kweelede kucita.
Naakanjila mumunzi umwi, kwakamucinga baalumi abali kumi basicinsenda. Bakaima kulaale,
boompolola bati, O mwami Jesu, tufwide luzyalo.
Naakababona wakabaambila kuti, Kamuya mukalitondezye kubapaizi, Nobakali kuya bweenda bakasalazigwa.
Nkabela umwi wabo naakabona kuti wapona, wakapiluka walumbaizya Leza ejwi ipati,
wavundama kumatende aa-Jesu, wamulumba. Walo wakali muSamariya.
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Sena tabasalede abali kumi? Ino bali kuli abali musanu mubane?
Sena taakwe uwaboola kulumbaizya Leza, pele oyu uwamasi?
Wakamwaambila kuti, Buka uende, lusyomo lwako lwakufutula.
Alimwi bantu tabakooyooamba kuti, Mboobu, na Mbobuya, nkaambo, amubone, Bwami bwa-Leza buli mukati kanu.
Nkabela wakaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Kuyoosika ciindi ncomuyooyanda kubona buzuba bumwi bwamazuba aa-Mwana a-Muntu, pele tamukooyoobubona.
Nobayoomwaambila kuti, Amubone, nguulya kuya na nguuno kuno, mutakainki mutakabacilili,
nkaambo mbubonya mbuli lulabo ululaba kubbazu limwi lyejulu, lulamweka akubbazu limwi, mbubonya obo mbwayooba Mwana a-Muntu mubuzuba bwakwe.
Pele lutaanzi uleelede kuciswa zinjizinji, akutakatwa kulibasunu.
Eno mbubonya mbokwakaba kumazuba aa-Nowa, kuyooba mbubonya obo kumazuba aa-Mwana a-Muntu,
Bakali kulya, bakali kunywa, bakali kukwata akukwasigwa, mane do kusikila kubuzuba Nowa mbwaakanjila mubwaato, imiyoba yakasika yabajaya boonse,
Kwakaba mbubonya obo kumazuba aa-Lota, bakali kulya, bakali kunywa, bakali kuula akuuzya, bakali kulima akuyaka.
Pele kubuzuba Lota mbwaakazwa mu-Sodoma, kwakaloka mulilo uwakazwa kujulu amusulufa, wakabatenta boonse.
Kuyooba mbubonya obo kubuzuba mbwati kalibonye Mwana a-Muntu.
Kubuzuba obo, oyu uuli aciluli, alubono lwakwe ululi muŋanda, atakaseluki kulutola, awalo uuli kumuunda atakapiluki.
Amuyeeye muka-Lota,
Umwi umwi uuyanda kufutula buumi bwakwe uyoobusweekelwa, kwala uusweekelwa buumi bwakwe, uyoobuyobola,
Ndamwaambila kuti kumasiku ayo kuyooba bobile abulo bomwe, umwi uyootolwa, umwi uyoosyaala.
Kuyooba bakaintu bobile abanooziila amwi, umwi uyootolwa, umwi uyoosyaala.
Kuyooba baalumi bobile mumuunda, umwi uyootolwa, umwi uyoosyaala.
Nkabela bakamuvuwa kuti, Ino nkukuli, Mwami? Wakabaambila kuti, Oko ukuli mutunta, nkokuyooyobolokela basikube.
Wakateeti, Kumunzi umwi kwakali mubetesi uwata­ kali kuyoowa Leza, nokuba kulemya bantu.
Alimwi kwakali mukamufu kumunzi oyo, walo wakaboola kulinguwe kanjikanji wakati, Ndikosweda mulandu kuluundisesa,
Eno wakakaka kaindi, pele munsi wakalyaambya mucamba cakwe kuti, Nentayoowi Leza, nentalemeki muntu,
nokubaboobo mukamufu oyo mbwaandikataazya ndamukosweda; na pe, unoondi-kataazya kwiindilila kukusika kwakwe lyoonse.
Mpoonya Mwami wakateeti, Amumvwe oku nkwaamba mubetesi uutaluleme,
Sena Leza takooyoobakosweda abo mbasalide, aboompolola kulinguwe isikati amasiku, anatola ciindi kulimbabo?
Ndamwaambila kuti uyoofwamba kubakosweda, Kwalo Mwana a-Muntu aakuboola, sena uzoojana lusyomo ansi?
Ecalo cikozyano eci wakabaambila abalisyoma kululama, abasampaula bamwi boonse, wakati,
Baalumi bobile bakanjila muntempele kuti bakombe, umwi wakali mu-Farisi, umwi wakali simutelo.
Mu-Farisi oyo wakaimikila, wakakomba obo wakati, Ndakulumba, O Leza, nkaambo nsili mbuli bantu bamwi, ababbi abataluleme abasimamambe, ambuli simutelo oyu.
Ndilaliimya kulya tobile munsondo yomwe, alimwi ndilapa cimanyakumi kulizyoonse nzyenjisi.
Pele simutelo oyo wakaima kulekule, takali kulanga kujulu, pele wakalyuumauma acamba cakwe wati, Leza, ndifwida luzyalo, ndi mucitazibi.
Ndamwaambila kuti, Oyu wakabweeda kuŋanda yakwe ulilulamikidwe kwiinda oyo umwi, nkaambo umwi umwi uulisumpula ulafwiinsigwa, uulifwiinsya ulasumpulwa.
Walo Jesu wakabaita kulinguwe wakati, Amuzumizye bana kuti baboole kulindime, mutabakasyi, nkaambo Bwami bwa-Leza mbubwabo abali bobuya.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Uutatambuli bwami bwa-Leza mbuli mwana, takooyoobunjila akaniini pe,
Jesu wakati kulinguwe, Ino uambilanzi kuti ndi mubotu? Taakwe mubotu, ngumwi pele, Leza alike,
Uliizi milazyo yakuti, Urabi simamambi, Utajayi, Utabbi, Utalengeleli umwi kaambo, Lemeka uso abanyoko.
Walo wakati, Eyi yoonse ndakiiya nkencili mwana,
Jesu naakamvwa obo, wakamwaambila kuti, Mpocili cintu comwe ncobula, koya ukauzye zyoonse nzyojisi, ukape bacete, noyoojana lubono kujulu, alimwi uboole undicilile.
Pele naakamvwa obo wakausa kapati, nkaambo wakali muntu uuvubide lubono lunjilunji.
Nkabela Jesu naakabona kuti uluuside wakati, Kulibavubide lubono nkuyumu buya kunjila mu-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Nkuuba kuti munyama mupati anjile muliso lyenyenda, kwiinda kuti muvubi anjile mu-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Elyo abakamvwa obo bakaamba kuti, Ino nguni uukonzya kufutulwa?
Ndilyonya wakati, Icikakila muntu, Leza tacimukakili pe.
Nkabela Petro wakaamba kuti, Bona, swebo twakaleka zyesu, twakucilila.
Elyo wakabaambila kuti, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Taakwe muntu uwakaleka ŋanda, naba mukaintu, nebaba banabakwabo, na bazyali, na bana, nkaambo ka-Bwami bwa-Leza,
uuti takapegwe kwiindilila kuciindi cino, akuciindi iciza buumi ubutamani.
Nkaambo uyooabwa kulibamasi, akusabwidwa, akucitwa bubi, akuswidwa mate,
bayoomuuma akumujaya, kwala mubuzuba bwatatu uyoobuka.
Eno taakwe ncobakamvwa, makani aya akasiswa kulimbabo, tabakali kuzi ncaakali kwaamba,
Naakamvwa makamu aabantu abakali kwiinda wakabuzya kuti, Ino ninzi eco?
Bakamwaambila kuti, Jesu wa-Nazareta ulainda.
Nkabela wakoompolola kuti, Jesu, Mwana a-Davida, ndifwida luzyalo,
Kwalo abali kweenda kumbele balamutapatila kuti aumune, pele walo wakoompololesya kuti, Omwana a-Davida, ndifwida luzyalo,
Mpoonya mpoonya Jesu wakaima wati, Amumulete kuno. Naakasika afwaafwi, Jesu wakamubuzya kuti,
Ino uyanda kuti ndikucitilenzi? Wakati, Mwami, ndibone.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Bona. Lusyomo lwako lwakufutula.
Ndilyonya wakabona, wamucilila uya bulumba Leza. Eno bantu boonse nobakabona obo, bakalumbaizya Leza.
Elyo wakanjila mu-Jeriko, waindilila.
Kwakaliko mwaalumi uwakali kutegwa Zakayu, wakali mupati wabasimutelo, wali muvubi.
Wali kuyanda kubona Jesu mbwabede, pele wakakilwa nkaambo kamakamu makamu aabantu nkaambo wali mufwaafwi.
Nkabela wakatijaanina kumbele, watanta mumukuyu kuti amubone, nkaambo nkwaakeelede kwiinda.
Jesu naakasika mpawo, wakaululala mujulu, wati kulinguwe, Zakayu, kofwamba useluke, nkaambo sunu ndyeelede kuyookala kuŋanda yako.
Ndilyonya wakaseluka cakufwambaana, wamutambula akubotelwa.
Elyo nobakabona obo, boonse bakatongauka bati, Wainka kuyookala kumwaalumi uucitazibi,
Ndilyonya wakaima Zakayu, waambila Mwami kuti, Langa, O mwami, ndaandula lubono lwangu muzipanzya zyobile, cimwi ndapa bacete, alimwi kuti ndakanyanga muntu cintu akumucenga, ndilamubweedezezya kone.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Sunu lufutuko lwasika kuŋanda eyi, awalo mbwali mwana a-Abrahamu.
Nkaambo Mwana a-Muntu wakaboola kulangaula akufutula abasweekede.
Aboobo wakaamba kuti, Umwi muntu, mwana amwami, wakainka kucisi cimwi icakali kule kuti akalitambwide bwami, akaboole.
Wakaita bazike bakwe abali kumi, wabapa mpondo izili kumi, wabaambila kuti, Amukapinduke mane ndikaboole.
Pele abamucisi cakwe tabakali kumuyanda, bakatuma mulomo munsi lyakwe wakuti, Tatumuyandi oyu muntu kuti abe mwami wesu.
Elyo naakaboola, ulipedwe bwami, wakalailila kuti baitigwe bazike abo mbaakapa mali, akazibe ncobakajana kukupinduka kwabo.
Wakasika mutaanzi wateeti, O mwami, impondo yako yapinduka mpondo zimwi izili kumi.
Wakati kulinguwe, Ncibotu, omuzike mubotu, nkaambo ulisyomekede kuzintu zice uyoobikwa bwami kuminzi iili kumi.
Nkabela wakasika wabili wateeti, O mwami, impondo yako yajana zimwi mpondo zyosanwe.
Wakati kulinguwe, Ayebo uyooba mwami kuminzi yosanwe.
Aumwi wakasika wati, O mwami, njeeyi mpondo yako, ndundakayobola ilivungidwe mucisila.
Ndakakuyoowa nkaambo uli mukali, ulabweza ncowatakabika, ulatebula ncowatakasyanga.
Wakati kulinguwe, Ndakubeteka kumulomo wako omwini, omuzike mubi. Ulizi kuti ndi mukali, ndilabweza ncendatakabika, ndilatebula ncendatakasyanga.
Ino wakaba anzi kutabika mali aangu muciyobwedo kuti ndaboola nendazooajana empindu yao.
Elyo wakabaambila abakali kwiimvwi ambali wati, Amumunyanga mpondo, mwiipe uuli empondo izili kumi.
Balo ­bakamuvuwa kuti, O mwami, ujisi kale mpondo izili kumi.
Ndamwaambila kuti umwi umwi uujisi uyoopegwa, kwalo uutajisi uyoonyangwa ancajisi.
Abaabo basinkondoma abatali kuyanda kuti ndibe mwami wabo, amubalete kuno, mubajaye kumbele lyangu.
Naakamana kwaamba obo wakainka kumbele, uya ku-Jerusalemu.
wakati, Kamuya kumunzi uuli kumbele, mwanjila omo mulajana mbongolo iisungidwe, iitanatantwa muntu, amwiisungulule, mwiilete kuno,
Na muntu wamubuzya kuti, Mwiisungulwidanzi? mumwaambile kuti, Mwami uliiyanda,
Bakainka abo abakatumwa, bakajana mbubonya mbwaakabaambila.
Nobakacili kwangulula mbongolo bamukamwini bakababuzya kuti, Ino mwiisungulwidanzi mbongolo?
Bakavuwa kuti, Mwami uliiyanda.
Elyo bakiileta kuli-Jesu, bayala ngubo zyabo atala ambongolo, bamukazika mpawo Jesu,
Naakacili kuya bweenda, bakayala zyakusama zyabo munzila.
Eno naakasika afwaafwi ku-Jerusalemu kucilundu ca-Elaioni, makamu oonse aabasikwiiya akatalika kusekelela akulumbaizya Leza ejwi ipati, nkaambo kamilimo yoonse mipati njobakabona,
Bakaamba kuti,
Uli acoolwe uuboola muzina lya-Jehova,
Alube luumuno kujulu abulemu kujulu lyamajulu,
Elyo bamwi ba-Farisi abamumakamu bakamwaambila kuti, Mufundisi, bakasye basikwiiya bako.
Jesu wakavuwa wati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti na balaumuna aba, mabwe aloompolola.
wati, Nowali kuzi yebo mulibobuno buzuba zintu izyeelede kuleta luumuno kulinduwe, pele eno zilisisidwe kumeso aako.
Nkaambo ciindi ciyookusikila, awo basinkondonyoko ncobayookuyakila bwaanda, bakuzingane, bakusinkile kuma­ bazu oonse,
bakumwaile ansi antoomwe abana bako abali mulinduwe, tabakooyoosia kulinduwe ibbwe neliba lyomwe ilili atala alimwi, nkaambo tokali kucizi ciindi ncookaswayidwe Leza.
wabaambila kuti, Kwakalembwa kuti, Iŋanda yangu inooli iŋanda yakukombela, pele nywebo mwiicita ikoba lyababbi.
pele bakabula mbobamucita, nkaambo bantu boonse bakali kumukakatila kumuswiilila.
bamubuzya kuti, Twaambile, ino mbwaminzi mbocitya zintu ezi? Ino nguni uwakakupa bwami obu?
Jesu wakabavuwa wateeti, Amebo ndamubuzya cintu comwe, mundyaambile.
Lubapatizyo lwaJohane sena lwakazwa kujulu na kubantu?
Elyo bakabuzyanya lwabo beni bateeti, Na twati lwakazwa kujulu ulati, Ino nkaambonzi ncomwatakamusyoma?
Pele na twati, Lwakazwa kubantu, bantu boonse balatufusa mabwe, nkaambo balasyoma kuti Johane wali musinsimi.
Nkabela bakamuvuwa kuti, Tatuluzi pe, nkolwakazwida.
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Amebo nsikoomwaambila bwami mbwencitya zintu ezi.
Nocakasika ciindi camicelo wakatuma muzike wakwe kubalimi kuti bakamupe micelo yamumuunda, kwalo balimi bakamuuma, bamupilusya buyo.
Alimwi wakatuma muzike umbi, awalo bakamuuma, bamunyansya, bamupilusya aminwe buyo.
Alimwi wakatuma watatu, walo bamuyasa, bamugwisizya anze.
Elyo mukamwini muunda wakati, Ino nkacite buti? Ndiyootuma mwanaangu uuyandwa, ambweni bayoomulemeka baakumubona.
Kwalo balimi nobakamubona, bakavwiya bati, Ngooyu mulyezina, atumujaye, lukono lube lwesu.
Ndilyonya bakamugwisizya anze amuunda, bamujaya. Ino mukamwini muunda uzoobacita buti?
Uzooboola abajaye balimi abo, ape bambi muunda wakwe, Nkabela nobakamvwa obo, bakaamba kuti, Pe, kutabi boobo.
Pele wakabalanga wati, Ino kutinzi oku ukwakalembwa kuti,
Ibbwe ndobakasowa bayaki,
Ndilyonya ndelicitwa mutwe wacooko?
Elyo bakamulindila, batuma balangi abalibejezya kuti baliluleme, kuti bakamujate kukwaamba kwakwe, nkokuya bakamwaabe kubwami akunguzu zyamweendelezi.
Balo bakamubuzya bati, Mufundisi, tulizi kuti ulaamba akwiisya cakululama, tolangilili ciimo camuntu, pele ulatwiisya nzila ya-Leza cakusinizya.
Sena kuliluleme kupa Kaisara mutelo na pe?
Pele wakaziba lucengo lwabo, wakabaambila kuti, Ino mundicengelanzi?
Amunditondezye sheleni. Ino lijisi cikozyano cani, abulembo mbubwani? Baamba kuti, Nzizya-Kaisara,
Elyo wakabaambila kuti, Mbubo, amupe Kaisara zintu zya-Kaisara, akuli-Leza zintu zya-Leza.
Nkabela bakakakilwa kujata nkani eyo kumbele lyabantu, bakayoowa kukuvuwa kwakwe, baumuna buyo.
Mufundisi, Musa wakatulembela kuti, Na muntu wafwa, uujisi mukaintu, pele tajisi bana, mwanaakwabo uleelede kumukwata oyo mukamufu, akazyalile mupati wakwe bana.
Mbombubo obo kwakali baalumi bosanwe mubabili, mutaanzi wakakwata mukaintu, wafwa tajisi mwana,
uwabili wakamukwata oyo mukamufu, awalo wafwa tasii mwana,
awalo watatu wakamukwata, mane boonse bosanwe mubabili, mbubonya bakafwa, tabasii bana.
Munsi lyabo boonse awalo mukaintu wakafwa.
Ino kukubuka uyooba mukani? Nkaambo boonse bosanwe mubabili bakali kumukwete.
Jesu wakabavuwa wati kulimbabo, Bana bacisi ecino balakwata, balakwasigwa,
pele abo abaambwa kuti baliceelede cisi eco, akukubuka kulufu, tabakwati, tabakwasigwa pe.
Nkaambo tabacikafwi limbi, bayooba mbuli baangelo, mbobakali bana babubuke bayooba bana ba-Leza.
Pele kuti bafu balabusigwa, awalo Musa wakaakutondezya mwaakalembela makani aacivuna, awo naakali kwaamba Jehova kuti, ngu-Leza wa-Abrahamu, Leza wa-Izaka, Leza wa-lakobo.
Leza tali Leza wabafu, pele ngwabaumi, nkaambo boonse balapona kulinguwe.
Elyo balembi bamwi bakamwaambila kuti, Mufu-ndi si, waamba kabotu.
Nkaambo tabakacili kukonzya kumubuzya nkani niiba yomwe.
Nkaambo Davida mwini ulaamba mubbuku lyenyimbo kuti,
Jehova wakaambila Mwami wangu,
Kala kujanza lyangu lyalulyo,
Mane nkacite basinkondonyoko
Cikabe citandabalilo camatende aako,
Aboobo Davida lwakwe mwini wakamwaamba kuti Mwami, ino waba buti Mwanaakwe?
Amucenjele kubalembi, abayanda kweendeenda balisamide zyakusama zilamfu, abayanda kwaanzigwa muzisambalilo, akukala azyuuno zyabulemu muzikombelo azyuuno zipati mumapobwe,
abatola maanda aabakaintu bamukabafu, abalikombya-kombya ciindi cilamfu kuupaupa buyo, aba bazoojana mulandu kwiindilila.
Mpoonya wakabona umwi mukaintu mukamufu mucete, uwali kubika omo tuli tuniini tobile.
Nkabela wakati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti oyu mukamufu mucete wabika kwiinda boonse,
nkaambo aba boonse bakabika muzipo zya-Leza akuvula kwalubono lwabo, pele walo abucete bwakwe wakabika coonse ncajisi, ncapona aco.
Azeezi nzomweebela, kuyoosika ciindi ncokutakooyoosiigwa awa ibbwe atala abbwe ilitakooyoowisigwa ansi.
Ndilyonya bakamubuzya bati, Mufundisi, ino makani aya ayooba lili? Kuyooba citondezyonzi naanooli afwaafwi aya?
Wakati, Amucenjele kuti muntu atamulengawidi, nkaambo banjibanji bayoosika muzina lyangu, bayooamba kuti, Ndime Kristo, na kuti, Ciindi cili afwaafwi, mutabacilili.
Alimwi kuti mwamvwa nkondo amazwanga, mutayoowi, nkaambo ezi zintu zileelede kusika lutaanzi, kwalo takunaba mamanino.
Kuyooba mizuzumo mipati, enzala ezilwazi mumasena aandeene, alimwi kuyooba iziyoosya, ezitondezyo zipati izizwa kujulu,
Pele aya oonse kataanasika, bayoomujata amaanza aabo, bamupenzye, bamwaabe kuzikombelo akumatolongo, bamusisya kubami akubeendelezi nkaambo kazina lyangu.
Kuyooba bukamboni kulindinywe.
Nkaambo kaako amukanze mumyoyo yanu kuteezeezya makani ngo-muyooamba,
nkaambo ndime enti kamupe mulomo amaanu, ngobatakooyookonzya kulwanya na kukazya basinkondonyoko boonse.
Pele abalo bazyali, abanabakwanu, abasazinyoko, abeenzinyoko bayoomwaaba, ii, nobamwi bayoomujaya.
Muyoosulwa bantu boonse nkaambo kazina lyangu.
Kwalo takukooyoofwidilila kasusu nekaba komwe kumitwe yanu.
Kulunamba lwanu munoojisi myuuya yanu.
Pele wabona kuti Jerusalemu wazinganwa mukati kempi, amukazibe kuti kusaalwa kwawo kuli afwaafwi.
Ndilyonya abo abali mu-Judaya abacijile mumalundu, abali mukati kawo abazwe, abali kumyuunda batanjili mumunzi.
Nkaambo aya ngamazuba aakubweedezya cibi kuti kuzyulile koonse ukwakalembwa.
Pele maawe kulibaabo abamisi abaabo abanyonsya kumazuba ayo. Nkaambo kuyooba mapenzi mapati ansi, abukali kubantu abo.
Bayoojayigwa amaceba, bayootolwa mbaange kuzisi zyoonse, Jerusalemu uyoolyataulwa bamasi mane cikazyulile ciindi cabamasi.
