abantu bayoomana nguzu nkaambo kakuyoowa, akulangila zintu iziciza ansi, nkaambo inguzu zyakujulu ziyoozungaanizigwa.
Nkabela elyo bayoobona Mwana a-Muntu ulaseluka mukumbi, enguzu abulemu bupati.
Pele zyatalika kucitika ezi zintu, amulange mujulu, mulungumike mitwe yanu, nkaambo kunununwa kwanu kuli afwaafwi.
Atalika buyo kusyuuka, mwabona obo, mulizi nobeni kuti mainza ali afwaafwi.
Mbubonya obo mwabona ezi zintu kuti zilacitika, amuzibe kuti Bwami bwa-Leza buli afwaafwi.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Cizukulu eci tacikooyooinda kazitanacitika zintu zyoonse.
Kuyoomaninina julu enyika, kwalo majwi aangu taakooyoomana.
Nkaambo buyoobasikila boonse abakala ansi.
Pele amulinde lyoonse, mukombe, kuti mukakonzye kuyokoka kuzintu zyoonse ezi iziyoocitika, akwiima kumbele lya-Mwana a-Muntu.
Abantu boonse bakafuma kuza kulinguwe muntempele kuzoomuswiilila.
Bapaizi bapati abalembi bakayandaula mbobati mujaye, nkaambo bakayoowa bantu.
Nkabela wakainka kuyooambaula abapaizi bapati abasilumamba, mbwati mwaabe kulimbabo.
Balo bakasekelela, bazuminana kumupa mali.
Awalo wakazumina, wayandaula ciindi cakumwaaba kulimbabo, kakutakwe makamu aabantu.
Aboobo wakatuma Petro a-Johane, wabaambila kuti, Kamuya mukatubambile Pasika, tulye.
Bakamubuzya kuti, Ino uyanda kuti tukabambile kuli?
Wakati kulimbabo, Amubone, mwanjila mumunzi, muyooswaana amuntu uuyumwide nongo yamaanzi, mumucilile muŋanda mwati kanjile.
Mukamwaambile mukamwini iŋanda kuti, Mufundisi wateeti kulinduwe, Ino njiili ŋanda mwenti lide Pasika abasikwiiya bangu?
Mpoonya uyoomutondezya ŋanda mpati yamujulu, iibambidwe kabotu, mukalulamikile mumo omo.
Bakainka, bakaakujana mbubonya mbwaakabaambila, nkabela balulamika Pasika.
Nocakasika ciindi, wakakala antoomwe abaapostolo abakali kumi abobile.
Wabaambila kuti, Ncobeni ndayandisisya kulya anywebo Pasika eli, nkentanapenga,
Nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti, Nsikooyoolilya limbi mane likazyulile mu-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Ndilyonya wakatambula cinywido, amane kulumba wati, Amutole eci, musiilane,
Nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti, Nsikooyoonywa limbi mucelo wamusaansa mane bukasike Bwami bwa-Leza.
Alimwi wakabweza mukamu, amane kulumba wuukomona, wabapa wati, Ngooyu mubili wangu uupedwe ndinywe, amukacite obo kuti mukandiyeeye.
Nobakamana kulalila, mbubonya obo wakabweza acinywido wati, Cinywido eci ngomulongo mupya wamubulowa bwangu, ubutikaikila ndinywe.
Pele amubone, ijanza lyayooyo uundyaaba lili amebo atafule.
Nkaambo Mwana a-Muntu ncobeni ulainka mbubonya mbokwakakanzwa, pele maawe kulooyo muntu uumwaaba.
Elyo bakatalika kubuzyanya kuti, Ino nguuli akati kesu uunga ulacita obo?
Walo wakabaambila wati, Bami babamasi balabalela, abo abali abwami kulimbabo baambwa kuti mbasimalelaabo.
Pele nywebo mutabi obo, anu oyo uuli mupati akati kanu abe mbuli muniini, ayooyo uli mvwambalume abe mbuli muzike.
Ino nguuli mupati, oyo uukede akulya na uubelekela? Sena tali nguwe uukede akulya? Kwalo mebo ndili akati kanu mbuli oyo uubelekela.
Pele nywebo ndinywe mwandiiminina mumapenzi aangu,
eno ndamubika bwami mbubonya Taata mbwaakandibika,
kuti mukalye akunywa atafule lyangu mubwami bwangu, alimwi muyookala azyuuno zyabwami akubeteka misyobo iili kumi ayobile ya-Israyeli.
Pele ndakukombela kuti lusyomo lwako lutamani. Awo wasanduka, ubayumye bakwanu.
Wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, ndilibambide kwiinka ayebo, nokuba kuntolongo, nokuba kulufu.
Jesu wakati, Ndakwaambila, Petro, mukombwe takoolila sunu, kotananditama totatwe kuti tondizi.
Nkabela wakateeti kulimbabo, Kwalo eno uujisi cikwama acibweze, enkomo mbubonya. Uutajisi iceba, auzye ngubo yakwe, aule iceba.
Nkaambo ndamwaambila kuti, Oku ukwakalembwa kuleelede kuzyulila mulindime kwakuti, Wakabalilwa kulibacitazibi. Nkaambo makani aandyaamba azyulila.
Nkabela bakaamba kuti, O mwami, langa, ngaaya maceba obile. Wakabaambila wati, Mbubo.
Naakasika kubusena obo, wakabaambila kuti, Amukombe kuti mutanjili mukutepaulwa.
Elyo wakabasia ambuli mawaalilo abbwe, wafugama wakomba,
wati, Taata, kuti wayanda, gwisya cinywido eci kulindime, nokubaboobo akucitwe kuyanda kwako, kutabi kwangu.
Ndilyonya kwakalibonya kulinguwe angelo uuzwa kujulu, ulamuyumya.
Eno mbwaakali mumapenzi mapati wakakombesya, enkasaalo yakwe yakaba mbuli malosi aabulowa aalondaukila ansi.
Naakabuka mukukomba wakaboola kulibasikwiiya bakwe, wabajana baloona nkaambo kabuusu, wati kulimbabo,
Moonenanzi ino? Amubuke mukombe, kuti mutanjili mukutepaulwa.
Pele Jesu wakamubuzya kuti, Judase, sena uaba Mwana a-Muntu akumyonta?
Eno abo mbaakali abo nobakabona obo, bakaamba kuti, O mwami, tuumye maceba na?
Nkabela umwi wabo wakauma muzike wamupaizi mupati, wamukosola kutwi kwakwe kwalulyo.
Pele Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Amubaleke obo. Elyo wakajata kutwi kwakwe, wamuponya,
Eno Jesu wakabaambila bapaizi basimutwe, abasilumamba bantempele, abapati abakasika kuzoomujata, wakati, Sena mweza anga muzida mubbi amaceba amakoli?
Nendakali anywebo mazuba amazuba muntempele tamukatambikide maanza aanu kundijata, pele ecino nceciindi canu, abwami bwamudima.
Elyo nobakakutula mulilo akati kabbuwa, bazooyota, awalo Petro wakala akati kabo.
Nkabela umwi musimbi naakamubona mpaakali kukede mubbalabala lyamulilo, wakamulangisisya wati, Awalo oyu wakali awe.
Pele wakakazya kuti, Yoo mukaintu, nsimuzi pe,
Munsi lyakaindi umwi wakamubona wati, Ayebo uli wabo, Petro wakati, Yoo muntu, nsili wabo mebo pe.
Nokwakainda ciindi ciniini, umwi wakasinizya wati, Nkasimpe awalo oyu wakali awe, nkaambo mu-Galilaya.
Pele Petro wakati, Yoo muntu, nsyaabwene makani aya ngoamba. Ndilyonya, naakacili kwaamba, mukombwe wakalila.
Nkabela Mwami wakacebuka, wamulanga Petro. Mpoonya awo Petro wakayeeya ijwi lya-Mwami ndyaakamwaambila kuti, Sunu mukombwe katanalila, unoonditamide totatwe.
Elyo wakazwa waakulila akulila.
Bamuvumba ameso, bamuuma kubusyu akumubuzya kuti, Sinsima, nguni uwakuuma?
Azimwi zinjizinji bakaamba kulinguwe akumutukana.
Anooli nduwe Kristo utwaambile. Pele wateeti kulimbabo, Kuti ndamwaambila tamukoosyoma,
alimwi kuti ndamubuzya tamukoovuwa.
Pele kuzwida sunu Mwana a-Muntu unooyookede kujanza lyalulyo lyanguzu zya-Leza.
Elyo boonse bakati, Sena nkokuti nduwe Mwana a-Leza? Wakati kulimbabo, Ndinywe mwaamba kuti ndili nguwe.
Mpampawo bakateeti, Tuciyandilanzi abumwi bukamboni? Twalimvwide swebo amulomo wakwe mwini.
Batalika kumubika kaambo, baamba kuti, Twakamujana oyu ulenga­ wida cisi cesu, ukasya kupa Kaisara mutelo, uamba kuti, Ndime Kristo Mwami.
Pilato wakamubuzya wakati, Nduwe Mwami waba-Juda na? Wakavuwa kuti, Waamba,
Pilato wakaambila bapaizi bapati amakamu aabantu kuti, Nsijene kaambo kulooyu muntu,
Pele balo bakaambisisya bakati, Ukopa bantu, uiisya mucisi coonse ca-Judaya, kutalikila ku-Galilaya mane kusikila akokuno.
Kwalo Pilato naakamvwa obo, wakabuzya kuti, Sena oyu muntu mu-Galilaya?
Eno naakaziba kuti ngwabwami bwaHeroda, wakamutumina kuli-Heroda, uwakali ku-Jerusalemu kuciindi eco.
Wakamubuzya majwi manjimanji, pele taakwe naakamuvuwa cintu.
Abapaizi bapati abalembi bakaima, bamutikizya mulandu eenguzu.
Heroda abasilumamba bakwe bakamunyansya, bamusabwida, bamusamika cakusama ceebeka, bamubweedezya kuli-Pilato,
Kuliboobo buzuba Pilato a-Heroda bakayanzana, nkaambo lutaanzi bakalisulene.
Eno Pilato wakayobola bapaizi bapati abeendelezi abantu,
wabaambila kuti, Mwandiletela muntu oyu mwati ulengawida bantu, eno mebo mbwendamubuzya kubusyu bwanu, nsimubwene kaambo kulaayo makani ngomutikizya,
awalo Heroda takamujene mulandu pe, mbwaakamuboozya kulindiswe. Eno amuswiilile, taakwe ncaakacita iceelede lufu,
nkaako ndiyoomuuma akumwaangununa.
Nkaambo wakeelede kubaangunwida umwi kupobwe.
Anukuti bakoompolola antoomwe bati, Azwe oyo muntu, utwaangunwide Baraba,
Walo wakabikidwe muntolongo nkaambo kalupyopyongano ulwakabusigwa mumunzi akaambo kakujaya.
Nkabela Pilato mbwaali kuyanda kumwaangununa Jesu, waindulula kwaamba kulimbabo,
pele boompolola kuti, Mubambule, mubambule.
Elyo wakabaambila alwatatu wakati, Nkaambonzi ino? Ncibinzi ncaakacita? Mebo nsimujene mulandu uuelede lufu pe, nkaako ndiyoomuuma akumwaangununa,
Pele bakajatisya koompololesya kuti, Abambulwe. Nkabela majwi aabo akazunda.
Pilato wakakosola kuti kucitwe mbuli mbobakakumbila.
Wakabaangunwida oyo ngobakakumbila, uwakabikidwe muntolongo nkaambo kalupyopyongano akujaya, pele Jesu wakamwaaba kukuyanda kwabo.
Eno kwakali kumucilila nkamu mpati yabantu abakaintu abakali kuza bulila akumuusila,
Jesu wakabacebukila wakati, Nobakaintu bakuJerusalemu, mutandilili mebo, amulilile nobeni abana banu.
Nkaambo alasika mazuba ngobazooamba mulingao kuti, Bali acoolwe abatazyali, amada aatakatumbuka, enkolo izyatakanyonkwa.
Ndilyonya bayootalika kwaambila malundu kuti, Amutuwide, akutulundu kuti, Amutuvumbe.
Kuti bacita obo kucisamu citete, ino kuyoocitwa buti kulicakayuma.
Kwakali abamwi bobile, abakabisya, abakatolwa awe kuyoojayigwa.
Elyo Jesu wakaamba kuti, Taata, ubajatile, nkaambo tabezi ncobacita. Eno bakaabana zyakusama zyakwe kukuwaala cisolo.
Abantu bakaliimvwi, balalangilila. Abalo beendelezi bakamuseka bati, Wakafutula bamwi, alifutule mwini anooli Kristo wa-Leza, musale wakwe.
Abalo basilumamba bakamusabwida, baboola kulinguwe, bamutambika waini uulula,
bati, Wanooli Mwami waba-Juda, lifutule.
Alimwi kwakali lugwalo ulwakalembwa atala lyakwe muci-Helene, amuci-Roma, amuci-Hebrayo lwakuti, oyu ngoMwami waba-Juda.
Umwi kulibaabo abakabisya, abakabambulwa, wakamutukana kuti, Sena nduwe Kristo? Lifutule omwini aswebo,
Pele umwi wakavuwa wamutapatila, wati, Sena a-Leza tomuyoowi yebo ooumwa mbubonya?
Alimwi swebo ncobeni kuliluleme nkaambo twatambula iceelede milimo yesu, pele walo taakwe naabisya cintu.
Elyo wakati kuli-Jesu, Ukandiyeeye, Mwami, waakusika mubwami bwako.
Jesu wakati kulinguwe, Ncobeni ndakwaambila kuti, Sunu tunooli ayebo mu-Paradaiso.
Izuba lyakasia, alimwi cisitilizyo camuntempele cakaanduka akati.
Jesu wakoompolola ejwi pati lyakuti, Taata, nduupeda muuya wangu mumaanza aako. Ucimana buyo kwaamba obo wafwa.
Silumamba naakabona icakacitwa, wakalumbaizya Leza wakati, Nkasimpe oyu mwaalumi waliluleme.
Amakamu oonse aabantu aakayobolokede kuzoolangilila, nobakabona izyakacitwa bakabweeda, baya bulyuumauma azyamba zyabo.
Boonse abakali kumuzi, abakaintu abakamusindikila kuzwa ku-Galilaya, bakaliimvwi kulekule balalangilila zintu ezyo.
(walo takazuminide ukukanza akucita kwabo). Wakali waku-Aremateya, munzi waba-Juda, wakali kulindilila bwami bwa-Leza.
Walo wakainka kuli-Pilato kuyookumbila mutunta wa-Jesu.
Wakuuangula wuuvunga mucisila cituba, wuubika mucuumbwe icakabezedwe mukati kabbwe pati, momwatakalinazikwa muntu.
Bwakali buzuba bwakulibamba, abuzuba bwa-Sabata bwakali afwaafwi kuca.
Abalo bakaintu abakamusindikila kuzwa ku-Galilaya bakacilila, bazoobona cuumbwe akubikwa kwamutunta wakwe.
Nkabela bakabweeda, baakubamba tununkilizyo amafuta. Elyo bakalyokezya buzuba bwa-Sabata mbuli mulazyo.
Bajana ibbwe ilyakasinkide acuumbwe lyakunkulisigwa kale.
Bakanjila mukati, pele tabakuujene mutunta wa-Mwami Jesu.
Elyo nobakacili kuzingidwe aceeci, baalumi bobile bakaima abo, balisamide izimwekesya,
Mbobakaankamene akukotamika masyu aabo aansi, baalumi abo bakabaambila kuti, Ino mulangawidanzi uupona akati kabafwide?
Tamo omuno pe, ulibukide. Amuyeeye mbwaakamwaambila naakacili kuGalilaya
kuti, Mwana a-Muntu uleelede kwaabwa mumaanza aabantu babi, abambulwe, akabuke kubuzuba bwatatu.
Ndilyonya bakayeeya majwi aakwe,
bazwa kucuumbwe, baakwaambila abali kumi muumwi makani aya, akulibamwi boonse.
Bakali Maliya Magadalene, a-Joana, a-Mariya banyina Jakobo, abakaintu bamwi abakaambila baapostolo makani aya.
Amajwi aya akaba anga ncaano kulimbabo, tabakabasyomede.
Pele Petro wakanyamuka watijaanina kucuumbwe, waakusondela, wabona masila ali alike, nkabela wabweeda uliyoowede azeezyo izyakacitika.
Bakali kuya bwaambaula zintu izyakacitika.
Eno nobakacili kuya bwaambaula akubuzyanya, Jesu mwini wakaswena afwaafwi ambabo, weenda abo.
Pele meso aabo akalivumbidwe kuti batamuzibi.
Nkabela wakababuzya kuti, Ino makaninzi aya ngomuya bwaambaula nomuya bweenda? Baima balyeetezya.
Umwi kulimbabo uwali kutegwa Kleopa wakamuvuwa kuti, Sena nduwe olike ookede muJerusalemu, ootezi makani aakacitika omo kumazuba aya ngoonya?
Wakababuzya wakati, Ino makaninzi? Bakamwaambila kuti, Makani aa-Jesu wa-Nazareta, uwakali musinsimi uujisi nguzu kumilimo akumajwi kumbele lya-Leza akubantu boonse,
pele bapaizi bapati abeendelezi besu bakamwaaba kuti abetekelwe lufu akubambulwa.
Kwalo swebo twali kusyoma kuti ngonguwe uuzoonununa Israyeli. Eno atala lyazeezyo zyoonse sunu aba mazuba otatwe kazicitidwe zintu ezi.
Alimwi bakaintu bamwi benkamu yesu batuyoosya, abali kucuumbwe cifumofumo.
Baakujana mutunta wakwe tuuwo, baboola bati, Twabona cilengaano cabaangelo abaamba kuti muumi.
Abamwi mbotwali abo bakainka kuyoobona kucuumbwe, baakujana mbubuli kwaamba kwabakaintu, pele walo mwini tabakamubwene.
Mpoonya awo wakabaambila kuti, Nywebo nobafubafuba, nomuli emyoyo iikakila kusyoma oonse ngobakaamba basinsimi.
Sena Kristo taali kweelede kuciswa obo akunjila mubulemu bwakwe?
Elyo kuzwida kuli-Musa akubasinsimi boonse, wakabapandulwida makani aamu-Magwalo oonse aamwaamba lwakwe mwini.
Nkabela nobakasika afwaafwi amunzi nkobakali kuya, walo wakaba anga wandooindilila,
pele bakamukombelela bati, Kala aswebo nkaambo lyandoobbila zuba, nkumazuba. Mpoonya wakanjila kuzookala abalo.
Naakali kukede abo akulya, wakabweza mukamu, walumba, wuukomona, wabaabila.
Mpoonya meso aabo akajuka, bamuziba, ndilyonya wabazeluka.
Eno balyaambauzya bati, Sena myoyo yesu teyali kupya muzyamba zyesu, naali kuza bwaambaula aswebo munzila, aleeliya naali kutupandulwida Magwalo?
Kuciindi eco nciconya bakanyamuka, babweeda ku-Jerusalemu, baakubajana abali kumi muumwi abakali abo balibungene antoomwe,
bati, Nkasimpe Mwami wabuka, walibonya kuli-Simoni.
Nkabela bakabalungulwida makani aamunzila, ambobakaakumuziba kukukomona mukamu.
Pele bakaankamana akuyoowa, bayeeya kuti babona musangu.
Elyo wakabaambila kuti, Ino mulikatazizyanzi? Ukuzumanana oku kuzwidai mumyoyo yanu?
Amubone maanza aangu amatende aangu, ndime ndemwini, amundijate mundibone, nkaambo musangu tajisi nyama azifuwa mbuli mbomundibona ndili azyo.
Ucimana kwaamba obo wabatondezya maanza aakwe amatende aakwe.
Nobakacili kutasyoma nkaambo kakubotelwa, anobakacili kuyoowede, wakababuzya kuti, Sena mujisi cakulya ano?
Bakamupa ntuli yanswi iyakayokwa,
Wakiibweza, walya kumbele lyabo.
Ndilyonya wakajula miyeeyo yabo kuti baamvwe Magwalo.
Alimwi wakabaambila wati, Mboobu mbokulembedwe, kuti Kristo uleelede kuciswa akubuka kulufu mubuzuba bwatatu
akwalo kuti kukambaukwe muzina lyakwe kweempwa akujatilwa kwazibi kumasi oonse, kusaanguna ku-Jerusalemu­.
Ndinywe bakamboni bamakani aya.
Eno amubone, ndiyoomutumina cisyomezyo ca-Taata, pele kamukede mumunzi wa-Jerusalemu mane mukapegwe nguzu izizwa kujulu.
Eno naakacili kubalongezya wakaandaana abo, watolwa kujulu.
Ndilyonya bamukomba, babweeda ku-Jerusalemu akubotelwa kupati,
bakali muntempele lyoonse, balalumbaizya Leza.
Ngonguwe uwakali kuli-Leza kumatalikilo.
Mulinguwe momwakali buumi, buumi obu wakali Mumuni wabantu.
Mumuni ulamweka mumudima, pele mudima tuuzundide.
Kwakali muntu uwakatumwa Leza, uwakali ezina lya-Johane.
Ngonguwe uwakazida bumboni, azoolungulule makani aa-Mumuni, kuti nkaambo kamajwi aakwe bantu boonse basyome.
Walo mwini engwe ngowakali Mumuni, pele wakazida kuzoolungulula Mumuni oyo.
Walo ngo-Mumuni mwinimwini uumunikila bantu boonse abazyalwa ansi ano.
Wakaliwo ansi, inyika yakaanzwa nguwe, pele inyika tiikamuzibide.
Wakeza kubwami bwakwe mwini, pele bana bakwe tabakamuzuminide.
Ino boonse abamuzumina, nkokuti abasyoma zina lyakwe, wabaabila nguzu zyakusanduka akuba bana ba-Leza,
kutaamba bana abakazyalwa kubantu, nokuba kukuyanda kwakuzyalana kwabuntu, nokuba kukuyanda kwamwaalumi, pele mbana abakazyalwa kuli-Leza.
Awalo Ijwi wakalifungula waba mubili wabuntu uwakakalakala akati kesu, uwakazywide luzyalo abwini, aswebo twakeebela bulemu bwakwe, bulemu ububa anga mbwa-Mwana uuzyalwa alike kuli-Wisi.
Johane wali kumulungulula, wali koompolola kuti, Ngonguwe oyu ngwendakali kumwaambila kuti, Uuza munsi lyangu uli kumbele lyangu, nkaambo ngomutaanzi kulindime.
Swebo toonse twakatambula kukuzyula kwakwe, luzyalo uluyungililwa luzyalo.
Nkaambo mulao wakapegwa Musa, pele luzyalo abwini zyakazwa kuli-Jesu Kristo.
Takukwe muntu uwakabona Leza neciba ciindi comwe, pele Mwana, simuzyalwa alike, uukede acamba ca-Wisi, ngowakatwaambila aanguwe.
Walo wakazumina takakazizye, wakazumina kuti, Endime Kristo pe.
Bakamubuzya kuti, Ino nduweni? Sena nduwe Eliya? Wakati, Endime. Sena nduwe musinsimi oyo? Wakavuwa kuti, Pe.
Nkaambo kaako bakamubuzya kuti, Ino kai nduweni? Twaambile kuti tukabalungulwide kabotu abo abakatutuma, Ulaamba buti?
Wakati, Ndime ijwi lyayooyo uuompolola munkanda uuti, Amululamike nzila ya-Jehova, mbubonya mbwaakaamba musinsimi Isaya.
Eno abo abakali kutumidwe bakazwa kubaFarisi.
Nkabela bakamubuzya kuti, Ino nkaambonzi ncobapatizya yebo, anooli toli Kristo naba Eliya, naba musinsimi oyo?
Johane wakabavuwa kuti, Mebo ndabapatizya amaanzi. Akati kanu mpali omwe uuimvwi ngomutezi,
nguwenya uuza munsi lyangu, ngwenteelede kuti ndyaangunune kaanzyo kandyasyo yakwe.
Ezi zintu zyakacitika mu-Betaniya kutala lya-Jordano, nkwaali kubapatizya Johane.
Ngonguwe oyo ngwendakali kwaamba kuti, Munsi lyangu uleza muntu uuli kumbele lyangu, nkaambo ngomutaanzi kulindime.
Eno nsendali kumuzi, pele kuti ayubululwe kuli-Israyeli, ncendakazida kuzoobapatizya amaanzi.
Alimwi Johane wakalungulula kuti, Ndakabona Muuya ulaseluka, uli mbuli nziba iizwa kujulu, wakakala alinguwe.
Nsendali kumuzi, pele oyo uwakandituma kuyoobapatizya amaan: I, walo wakandaambila kuti, Oyo ngoyoobona kuti Muuya waseluka alinguwe akumukala, ngonguwe uubapatizya a-Muuya Uusalala.
Eno ndakabona, ndakalungulula kuti oyu ngo-Mwana a-Leza,
Alimwi nobwakaca Johane wakali kwiimvwi, abasikwiiya bakwe bobile,
wakazilikila Jesu naali kuya bweenda wakati, Amulange. Mwanaambelele wa-Leza,
Abalo basikwiiya bobile bakamumvwa naakaamba, nkabela bakamucilila Jesu.
Eno Jesu wakacebuka, wakababona baza bumucilide, wakabaambila kuti, Muyandaulanzi? Bakamwaambila kuti, Rabi, (nkokuti kukupandululwa, Mwiiyi) ukala kuli?
Wakabaambila kuti, Amuboole muzoobone. Nkaambo kaako bakaboola, bakabona nkwaali kukala, bakakala awalo elyo zuba, kwali kumazuba.
Umwi wabaabo bobile abakamvwa Johane naakaamba, akumucilila Jesu, wali Andreya, mwanaakwabo Simoni Petro.
Wakasaanguna kuyoojana mwanaakwabo mwini Simoni, wamwaambila kuti, Twamujana Mesiya (nkokuti kukupandululwa, Kristo).
Wakamuleta kuli-Jesu, Jesu wakamuzilikila wakati, Nduwe Simoni mwana a-Jona, uyootegwa Kefasi (nkokuti kukupandululwa, Petro).
Eno Filipo wakali waku-Betsaida, wamumunzi wabo Andreya a-Petro.
Filipo wakajana Natanayeli, wamwaambila kuti, Twakamujana oyo ngwaakalemba Musa mumulao, abasinsimi, nguwenya Jesu waku-Nazareta, mwana a-Josefa.
Natanayeli wakamwaambila kuti, Sena kuli cintu cibotu icikonzya kuzwa mu-Nazareta Filipo wamwaambila kuti, Koboola uzoobone.
Jesu wakabona Natanayeli uza bweenda, wakamwaamba kuti, Amubone, mu-Israyeli mwinimwini uutakwe luuni.
Natanayeli wakamwaambila kuti, Ino wandiziba buti? Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Ede, katana kukwiita Filipo, ndakubona ucili kunsi abukuyu.
Natanayeli wakamuvuwa kuti, Rabi, nduwe Mwana a-Leza, nduwe Mwami wa-Israyeli,
Jesu wakavuwa wakati kulinguwe, Sena mbwendaamba kuti ndakubona ucili kunsi abukuyu, ncowasyoma na? Uzoobona zimbi zintu zipati iziinda ezi.
Wamwaambila kuti, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kuti, Muyoobona ijulu lyaba bukwazi, abaangelo ba-Leza balatanta akuseluka a-Mwana a-Muntu.
awalo Jesu wakalitambidwe abasikwiiya bakwe kupobwe.
Eno waini naakabulika, banyina Jesu bakamwaambila kuti, Tabajisi waini.
Jesu wamwaambila kuti, Yoo mwanakazi, ndili enzi eyebo? Ciindi cangu tacinasika.
Balo banyina bakabaambila basimilimo kuti, Zyoonse nzyati mwaambile, kamuzicita.
Eno kwakalibikidwe awo matalo aamabwe aali musanu mulimwi, mbubuli ciyanza cabaJuda cakusalazya, akaleelene amwi azipempa zyobile, amwi ngazipempa zyotatwe.
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Amwaazuzye maanzi matalo. Bakatila mulingao, akazyula mwa.
Nkabela wakati kulimbabo, Amuteke eno, mutole kulisimwaaba kulya, Bakatola.
Batole boobo, aasole simwaaba kulya maanzi aakasanduka akaba waini, taali kuzi nkwaakazwida (pele basimilimo abakateka maanzi mbabakali kuzi), wakamwiita sikukwata,
wakati, Bantu boonse balatalika kubika waini mubotu, banywa mubotu bantu nokugwisigwa mubi, yebo pe, wakalimuyobwede waini mubotu mane eno.
Aya ngamalele aakusaanguna Jesu ngaakacita ku-Kana waku-Galilaya, wakayubulula bulemu bwakwe, basikwiiya bakwe bakasyoma nguwe.
Mpoonya wakaakujana muntempele muli abauzya basune embelele enziba, abalo abasintana mali balikede.
Nkabela wakalicitila mitatula yaloozi, wakabatandila anze lyentempele boonse, azyalo mbelele abasune, wakamwaya mali aabasikusintana, akusowaila matafule aabo.
Alimwi wakati kulibaabo abauzya nziba, Amuzigwisye ezi zintu, mutiiciti ŋanda ya-Taata kuti ibe ŋanda yamakwebo.
Basikwiiya bakwe bakayeeya eco icakalembwa cakuti, Busungu bwakuŋanda yako bwandilya kundimaninina.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakamuvuwa bakati, Ncili citondezyo ncoti tutondezye, oocita izili bobuya?
Jesu wakabavuwa wakati, Amumwaye ntempele ino, ndiyooiyakulula kumazuba otatwe.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakaamba kuti, Myaaka iili makumi one amusanu muumwi ndeyakayakwa ntempele, anu yebo uiyakulule kumazuba otatwe sena?
Pele wali kwaamba ntempele yamubili wakwe.
Nkaambo kaako naakabusigwa kulibasikufwa, basikwiiya bakwe bakayeeya kuti wali kwaamba aya, eno bakazuminina Magwalo, alyalo ijwi ndyaakaamba Jesu.
Eno naakali mu-Jerusalemu kuciindi ca-Pasika, nokwakali pobwe, banjibanji bakazumina kuzina lyakwe, mbobakabona malele aakwe ngaakacita.
Pele Jesu taakali kulisyomena mbabo, nkaambo walibezi bantu boonse,
akwalo kuti teelede kuti aambwe bantu, nkaambo walo mwini walizi izyali mumyoyo yabantu.
Walo wakeza kuli-Jesu masiku, wakamwaambila kuti, Rabi, tulizi kuti nduwe mwiiyi uuzwa kuli-Leza, nkaambo takukwe muntu uukonzya kucita malele aya ngocita, Leza atanooli awalo,
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Ncobeni ndakwaambila kasimpe, Muntu atazyalwa akuzyalwa kwakujulu, takonzya kubona Bwami bwa-Leza,
Nikodemo wakamwaambila kuti, Ino muntu ulakonzya buti kuzyalululwa acembaala? Sena ulakonzya kunjila lwabili mwida lyabanyina, kuti azyalwe alimwi?
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Ncobeni ndakwaambila kasimpe, Muntu atazyalwa amaanzi a-Muuya, takonzya kunjila mu-Bwami bwa-Leza,
Icizyalwa mumubili, mubili, acalo icizyalwa mu-Muuya, muuya.
Utagambwi mbwendakwaambila kuti, Ulyeelede kuzyalwa akuzyalwa ukuzwa kujulu.
Luuwo lulaunga koonse nkoluyanda, eno ulamvwa kuvuuma kwale, pele tozi nkolizwida ankoluya, mbubonya mbokubede kuluumwi umwi uwazyalwa ku-Muuya.
Nikodemo wakavuwa kuti, Ino inga zintu ezi zilaba buti?
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Sena toli mwiiyi waba-Israyeli? Sena tonamvwisya aya makani?
Ncobeni ndakwaambila kasimpe, Swebo tulaamba eco ncotuzi akulungulula­ eco ncotwakabona, anywebo tamukutambuli kulungulula kwesu.
Kuti ndamwaambila zyaansi tamusyomi, iniinga mulasyoma buti ndamwaambila zyakujulu?
Nkaambo takukwe muntu uwakatanta kujulu, pele oyo uwakazwa kujulu, nguwenya Mwana a-Muntu.
Alimwi mbubonya Musa mbwaakasumpula nzoka munkanda, mbubonya awalo Mwana a-Muntu ulyeelede kuyoosumpulwa,
kuti muntu woonse uumusyoma abe abuumi ubutamani.
Nkaambo Leza taakwe naakatuma Mwanaakwe munyika kuti akiibeteke nyika, pele kuti inyika ikafutulwe nguwe.
Oyo uumusyoma tabetekwa, pele oyo uutamusyomi wabetekwa kale, nkaambo tasyomede kuzina lya-Mwana a-Leza, simuzyalwa alike,
Eno oku nkubetekwa, kuti mumuni wasika ansi, pele bantu bayanda mudima kwiinda mumuni, nkaambo milimo yabo mibi,
Nkaambo muntu umwi umwi uucita cibi uluusulide mumuni, tasiki kumumuni, kuti ambweni milimo yakwe yatopwa.
Pele oyo uucita zyabwini nguuza kumumuni, kuti milimo yakwe iboneke kuti yacitwa muli-Leza.
Awalo Johane wali kubapatizya mu-Ainoni, afwaafwi ku-Salemu, nkaambo kwali maanzi manjimanji oko. Eno bantu bakasika kulinguwe, bakabapatizigwa.
Nkaambo Johane takalina kubikwa muntolongo.
Eno akabuka makani aakusalazya akati kabasikwiiya ba-Johane amu-Juda umwi,
Bakasika kuli-Johane, bakamwaambila kuti, Rabi, oyo ngookali awalo kutala lya-Jordano, ngookazoolungulula, nguwenya oyo ulabapatizya, abantu boonse balainka kulinguwe.
Johane wakavuwa wakati, Muntu takonzya kutambula cintu, mane acijane kujulu,
Anywebo nobeni muli bakamboni bangu mbwendakati, Nsili Kristo oyo, pele kuti, Ndatumwa kumusolwedela.
Uujisi bwiinga ngusibwiinga, pele mweenzinyina sibwiinga, uuima akumuswiilila, ulabotelwa kwiindilila nkaambo kajwi lyasibwiinga, nkaambo kaako kukondwa kwangu oku kwazyulila.
Walo ulyeelede kukomezegwa, pele mebo ndyeelede kucesegwa.
Eno eco ncaakabona akumvwa, ulacilungulula, pele takukwe muntu uwatambula kulungulula kwakwe,
Oyo uwakatambula kwakwe, nguusinizya kuti Leza mbobwini.
Nkaambo oyo ngwaakatuma Leza nguuamba majwi aa-Leza, nkaambo teeleki Muuya ngwapa.
Wisi uyanda Mwana, wakamupa zintu zyoonse mujanza lyakwe.
Oyo uusyoma Mwana nguuli abuumi ubutamani, pele oyo uutamvwi Mwana takooyoobona buumi, pele bukali bwaLeza bulikede alinguwe.
(Nokuboobo tali Jesu mwini uwali kubapatizya, pele basikwiiya bakwe),
wakazwa muJudaya, wakabweeda alimwi ku-Galilaya.
Eno wakali kweelede kwiinda mu-Samariya.
Elyo wakasika kumunzi wa-Samariya, uutegwa Sukari, afwaafwi kucisi eco Jakobo ncaakapa mwanaakwe Josefa,
ecikala ca­-Jakobo cakaliwo awo, Nkaambo kaako Jesu, mbwaakakatede kukweenda kwakwe, wakakala buyo ambali acikala. Lyakali isikati.
Kwakeza mwanakazi mu-Samariya kuzooteka maanzi. Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Ndipa nywe.
(Nkaambo basikwiiya bakwe bakainkide kumunzi kuyooula zyakulya.)
Mwanakazi mu-Samariya wakamwaambila kuti, Cilakonzeka buti, kuti yebo omu-Juda undikumbile cakunywa, mbwendi mu-Samariya? (Nkaambo ba-Juda tabalidi mutiba omwe aba-Samariya).
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Nowali kuzi cipegwa ca-Leza, ayooyo uukwaambila kuti, Ndipa nywe, na nguni, nowamukumbila nguwe, awalo naakupa maanzi aabuumi.
Mwanakazi wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, tojisi cakutesya, alimwi cikala ncilamfu, ino maanzi ayo aabuumi uzooateka kuli?
Sena uli mupati kwiinda tateesu Jakobo, uwakatupa cikala eci, mwaali kunywa mwini, abana bakwe, eŋombe zyakwe?
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Umwi umwi uunywa aya maanzi ulafwa nyota alimwi,
pele oyo uuti nywe maanzi ngenti mupe, tacifwi limbi, pele maanzi ngenti mupe buyooba bulolo bwamaanzi mulinguwe, aatuntumukila kubuumi ubutamani.
Mwanakazi wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, ndipa aya maanzi, kuti nkentacifwi limbi nyota, nokuba kuti nkentacibooli kuno kuteka lyoonse.
Jesu wamwaambila kuti, Koya ukaite mwaalumaako, ayebo uze kokuno.
Mwanakazi wakavuwa kuti, Nsijisi mwaalumi. Jesu wakamwambila wati, Waamba kasimpe kuti, Nsijisi mwaalumi,
nkaambo wali kujisi baalumi bosanwe, eno oyo uukukwete sunu tali mwaalumaako, obo waamba kasimpe.
Mwanakazi wakamwaambila kuti, Mwami ndakuziba kuti uli musinsimi.
Bamatateesu bali kukomba mudundu eli, eno nywebo muamba kuti ku-Jerusalemu nkobeelede bantu kuyookombela.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Yoo mwanakazi, ndisyoma, ciindi cileza kuti nomuba mudundu eli, nokuba ku-Jerusalemu, enko nkomuyookombela Taata.
Mulakomba ncomutezi, swebo tulakomba eco ncotuzi, nkaambo lufutuko luzwa kuba-Juda.
Pele ciindi cilasika, ncencico cino, abakomba cakasimpe ncobayoomukomba Taata mumuuya amubwini, nkaambo mbambabo abo mbayanda Taata, kuti babe basikumukomba.
Leza ngo-Muuya, eno abamukomba balyeelede kumukomba mumuuya amubwini.
Mwanakazi wakamwaambila kuti, Ndilizi kuti Mesiya uleza (uutegwa Kristo), asika uyootupandulwida zintu zyoonse.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Ede kai, ndime Mesiya.
Mpoonya abalo basikwiiya bakwe bakasika, eno bakagambwa kuti ulaambaula amwanakazi, nokuboobo takukwe naba omwe uwakamubuzya kuti, Ukumbilanzi, nokuba kuti, Uambanzi awalo?
Nkaambo kaako mwanakazi wakasia nongo yakwe, wakainka kumunzi ukuyooambila bantu kuti,
Kamuboola, mukabone muntu uwandyaambila zintu zyoonse nzendakacita, inga kali ngo-Kristo?
Nkabela bakazwa mumunzi ukuya kulinguwe.
Nciconya eco ciindi basikwiiya ncobakamukombelela kuti, Rabi, kolya.
Pele wakabaambila kuti, Mebo ndijisi cakulya ncomutezi
Basikwiiya bakaamba umwi amweenzinyina bakati, Sena kuli muntu uwamuletela cakulya?
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Icakulya cangu nkucita luyando lwayooyo uwakandituma, akulondola milimo yakwe.
Sena tamwaambi kuti, Kucili myeezi yone, nkokuya kutebulwe? Amubone, ndamwaambila kuti, Amuvunune meso aanu, mulange mumyuunda, yayuma kale kuti itebulwe,
Oyo uutebula ulatambula cakuvola, ulatebula micelo iitola kubuumi ubutamani, kuti oyo uusyanga ayooyo uutebula babotelwe antoomwe.
Kalabi aka kalasinizya kakuti, Umwi ulasyanga, uutebula ngumbi.
Ndakamutuma kuti mutebule eco ncomwatakalima, abakalima mbambi, eno nywebo mwakanjila buyo mumilimo yabo.
Eno kumunzi oyo banjibanji ba-Samariya bakamusyoma nkaambo kajwi lyamwanakazi ndyaakati, Wandyaambila zintu zyoonse nzendakacita.
Eno ba-Samariya nobakasika kulinguwe, bakamukumbila kuti akale kulimbabo. Eno wakakala oko mazuba obile.
Abamwi banjibanji bakamusyoma nkaambo kajwi lyakwe,
bakamwaambila mwanakazi kuti, Eno twasyoma, kutaamba kumajwi aako aalo, pele nkaambo twalimvwide tobeni, alimwi twaziba kuti ncobeni oyu ngo-Mununuzi waansi.
Nkaambo Jesu mwini wakaamba kuti musinsimi talemekwa mucisi cakwabo,
Eno naakasika mu-Galilaya, ba-Galilaya bakamutambula, nkaambo bakabona zintu zyoonse ezyo nzyaakacita mu-Jerusalemu kuciindi capobwe, nkaambo abalo bakali kwiinkide kupobwe.
Walo naakamvwa kuti Jesu wakazwa ku-Judaya akuboola ku-Galilaya, wakeza kulinguwe, wakamukumbila kuti azoomuponye mwanaakwe, nkaambo wakali afwaafwi akufwa,
Elyo Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Mwatabona zitondezyo amalele, tamukwe nomuti kasyome.
Oyo muntu mulemu wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, koboola natanafwa mwanaangu.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Koya buyo, mwanaako wapona kale, Mwaalumi wakasyoma ijwi ndyaakamwaambila Jesu, mpoonya wakainka.
Naakacili kuya, bazike bakwe bakamucinzya bakati, Mwanaako wapona,
Nkaambo kaako wakababuzya ciindi ncaakatalika kulimvwa kabotu mwana. Bakati kulinguwe, Ijilo kuciindi cesikati kuciswa kwakamuleka.
Elyo wisi wakaziba kuti cali ciindi nciconya ncaakamwaambila Jesu kuti, Mwanaako wapona, Awalo mwini wakasyoma, abamuŋanda yakwe boonse,
Ngamalele aabili Jesu ngaakacita naakazwa mu-Judaya kuza ku-Galilaya.
Nokwakamana aya kwakali pobwe lyaba-Juda, awalo Jesu wakainka ku-Jerusalemu.
Eno mu-Jerusalemu afwaafwi amulyango wembelele kwakali kaziba akali kutegwa Betesda muci-Hebrayo, akakayakidwe ŋanda iili amakota osanwe,
Omu mwakali kulala bantu banjibanji abali kuciswa, boofu, abazilema, abamwi abapuutide mibili, abakali kulindila maanzi kuti aselauke.
Nkaambo angelo wakali kuseluka akunjila mukaziba kuziindi zimwi, akuselausya maanzi, nkabela woonse uwakasaanguna kunjila maanzi naaciselauka wakapona kucilwazi cakwe necili buti.
Eno muntu umwi uwakaliwo, wakaciswa myaaka iili makumi otatwe amusanu mwiitatu.
Elyo Jesu naakamubona ulilede, alimwi mbwaakaziba kuti wakali kukede ciindi cilamfu mbubonya buya, wakamwaambila kuti, Sena uyanda kuponyegwa?
Mulwazi oyo wakamuvuwa kuti, O mwami, nsijisi muntu wakundibika mukaziba, maanzi kaaciselauka, pele nenciya, kwainda kale umbi kumbele lyangu.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Nyamuka, bweza bulo bwako, uende.
Mpoonya mpoonya oyo muntu wakaponyegwa, wakabweza bulo bwakwe, wakeenda.
Eno bwakali buzuba bwa-Sabata obo.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakamwaambila oyo uwakaponyegwa bakati, Mbuzuba bwa-Sabata, taceelede kuti ubweze bulo bwako.
Pele walo wakabavuwa kuti, Oyo uwandiponya ngowandyaambila kuti, Bweza bulo bwako, uende.
Bakamubuzya kuti, Nguni oyo muntu uwakwaambila kuti, Bweza bulo bwako, uende?
Pele oyo uwakaponyegwa takali kumuzi na nguni, nkaambo Jesu wakafwenunuka buyo nkaambo kamakamu aabantu abakali mpawo.
Musule Jesu waakumujana muntempele, wakamwaambila kuti, Bona, waponyegwa. Utaciti cibi alimwi, antela ulajana bubi ubwiindilila.
Nkabela muntu oyo wakainka, wakabaambila ba-Juda kuti, Ngu-Jesu uwakandiponya.
Nkakaambo ako ba-Juda ncobakamupenzya Jesu, nkaambo wakacita zintu ezi abuzuba bwa-Sabata,
Pele Jesu wakabavuwa kuti, Mbubonya Taata mbwacibeleka ambuli sunu, amebo ncembeleka.
Ba-Juda ncebakali kusoleka kapati kuti bamujaye, nkaambo takuli kusotoka mulao wa-Sabata kwala pe, pele akwalo kwaamba kuti Leza ngo-Wisi mwini, nkokuti wali kulipa ka-Lezaleza.
Nkaambo Wisi ulamuyanda Mwana, wamutondezya zintu zyoonse nzyacita mwini, alimwi uyoomutondezya milimo mipati kwiinda eyi, kuti mukagambwe.
Nkaambo mbubonya Wisi mbwabusya bafwide akubapa buumi, mbubonya awalo Mwana ulapa buumi abo mbayanda.
Nkaambo Wisi tabeteki muntu, pele wakapa lubeteko loonse ku-Mwana,
kuti boonse balemye Mwana, mbuli mbobalemya Wisi. Oyo uutalemyi Mwana, talemyi Wisi uwakamutuma.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Oyo uumvwa ijwi lyangu, akumusyoma uwakandituma, uli abuumi ubutamani, alimwi takooyoosika kulubeteko, pele wakazwa kukufwa, waya kubuumi.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Ciindi cilasika, ncencico cino, abafwide nobayoomvwa ijwi lya-Mwana a-Leza, abalo abalimvwa bayoopona.
Nkaambo mbubonya Taata mbwajisi buumi mulinguwe mwini, awalo Mwana wakamupa mbubonya, kuti abe abuumi mulinguwe mwini.
Alimwi wakamupa bwami bwakubeteka, nkaambo ngonguwe Mwana a-Muntu.
Mutagambwi aliyeeyi nkani, nkaambo ciindi ciyoosika ncobati kamvwe ijwi lyakwe boonse abali muzyuumbwe,
bayoozwa mpoonya, abo abakacita kabotu bayoobusigwa kubuumi, abaabo abakacita bubi bayoobusigwa kukubetekwa.
Kuti ndalilungulula ndemwini, bukamboni bwangu tabuli bwakasimpe.
Ngumbi uundidumaizya, eno ndilizi kuti kudumaizya nkwandidumaizya ako nkwakasimpe.
Mwakatuma kuli-Johane, awalo wakaba kamboni wabwini.
Pele bukamboni mbwendatambula tabuli bwabantu, nokubaboobo ndaamba ezi zintu kuti mukafutulwe.
Walo cali cimunisyo icali kuyaka akumweka, anywebo mwali kuyanda kubotelwa mumumuni wakwe kaindi kaniini.
Pele bukamboni mbwenjisi mbupati kwiinda bwa-Johane, nkaambo milimo njaakandipa Taata kwiizyulizya, njenjiyo njencita, niiindilungulula kuti Taata ngowakandituma.
Awalo Taata uwakandituma wandilungulula. Nywebo tamumvwide ijwi lyakwe neciba ciindi comwe, nokuba kubona ciimo cakwe.
Alimwi tamujisi ijwi lyakwe ilikede mulindinywe, nkaambo tamumusyomi oyo ngwaakatuma.
Mulalangisya Magwalo nkaambo mweezeezya kuti mulijisi buumi ubutamani mulingao, ngangao aandilungulula.
Pele mwakaka kuza kulindime kuti mube abuumi.
Nsitambuli bulemu ubuzwa kubantu.
Pele ndilimuzi, kuti tamujisi luyando lwa-Leza mulindinywe.
Ndaboola muzina lya-Taata, pele tamunditambuli; kuti umbi wasika muzina lyakwe mwini, ngomuti tambule walo.
Ino inga nywebo mulasyoma buti, nomutambulana bulemu umwi kuluumwi, pele bulemu ubuzwa kuli-Leza alike tamubuyandauli?
Muteezeezyi kuti ndiyoomupa kaambo kuli-Taata, mpali uumupa kaambo, ngu-Musa, nguwenya ngomusyoma.
Nkaambo nemwalizumide Musa, nemwandizumina amebo, nkaambo wakalemba ndime.
Pele mwatazumina makani ayo ngaakalemba, mulazumina buti majwi aangu?
Eno makamu makamu aabantu bakamucilila, nkaambo bakali kubona malele ayo ngaakacita kulibaabo abakali kuciswa.
Mpoonya Jesu wakatanta atala adundu mpaakaakukala abasikwiiya bakwe.
Eno Pasika, ipobwe lyaba-Juda, lyakali afwaafwi.
Nkaambo kaako Jesu naakalanga, wakabona bantu banjibanji baleza kulinguwe, wakaambila Filipo kuti, Nkukuli nkotuti kaule mikamu kuti balye aba?
Naamba obo wali kumusola buyo, nkaambo walo mwini wali kuzi mbwati cite.
Filipo wakamuvuwa kuti, Mikamu niiulwa mpondo zili musanu muzibili tiikoobazyulizya­, kuti, umwi umwi atole kaniini buyo.
Omwe wabasikwiiya bakwe uutegwa Andreya, mwanaakwabo Simoni Petro, wamwaambila kuti,
Mpokali kalombe akajisi mikamu yosanwe yabbaale answi zyobile, ino alyalo mpaanzi kubantu banjibanji bali bobuya?
Jesu wakati, Amukazike bantu ansi. Eno kwakali bwizu bunjibunji awo mpobakabede. Nkabela baalumi bakakala, kweelekwa kwabo kwali afwaafwi kuba makumi osanwe aamyaanda.
Mpoonya Jesu wakabweza mikamu, naakamana kulumba, wakabaabanya abo bali kukede ansi, azyalo inswi mbubonya mbuli mbobali kuyanda.
Nobakakuta wakabaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Amubweze bufwefwelenga ubwasyaala, kuti kutasweeki cintu.
Nkabela bakabubweza, bakazuzya zisuwo zili kumi muzibili zyabufwefwelenga bwamikamu yosanwe yabbaale, ubwakasyaala kulibaabo abakali kulya.
Nkaambo kaako nobakabona malele ngaakacita bakati, Ncobeni oyu ngomusinsimi uuelede kusika ansi.
bakanjila mubwaato, bakazubuka lwizi akuya kutala lya-Kapemauma. Mpoonya kwakabasiila, awalo Jesu taalinasika kulimbabo.
Eno lwizi lwali kuyuuntana, nkaambo kaluuwo lupati ulwali kuunga.
Nobakakwasula bamaile botatwe na bone, bakabona Jesu uleenda atala lyalwizi, wakaswena afwaafwi abwaato, mpoonya bakayoowa,
Pele walo wakabaambila kuti, Ndime, mutayoowi.
Ncobakazumina kuti anjile mubwaato, ndilyonya bwaato bwakasika kunkomwe nkobakali kuya,

Nobwakaca, inkamu yabantu abakali kwiimvwi kutala limwi lyalwizi, bakabona kuti kwali kunyina bwaato bumbi, pele bomwe, akwalo kuti Jesu takanjilide abasikwiiya bakwe mulimbubo, pele kuti basikwiiya bakwe bakainka balike,
(nokuboobo kwakasika maato amwi aazwa ku-Tiberiya afwaafwi ebbazu mpobakali kulida mukamu Mwami naakamana kulumba),
elyo inkamu yabantu nobakabona kuti Jesu taliwo, nobaba basikwiiya bakwe, balo beni bakanjila mumaato, bakasika ku-Kapemauma kuyandaula Jesu.
Nobakamujana kutala limwi lyalwizi, bakamwaambila kuti, Rabi, wakeza lili kuno?
Jesu wakabavuwa wakati, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, mulandiyandaula, takuli kuti mwakabona malele, pele nkaambo mwakalya mikamu, mwakakuta.
Mutabelekeli kulya ukubola, pele kulya ukukalilila mane kubuumi ubutamani, oko kulya nkwati mupe Mwana aMuntu, nkaambo ngonguwe ngwaakasinizya Wisi, Leza nguwenya.
Bakamwaambila kuti, Tucite buti kuti tubeleke milimo ya-Leza?
Jesu wakavuwa wakati, Ngooyu mulimo wa-Leza, kuti mumusyome oyo ngwaakatuma,
Nkaambo kaako bakamwaambila kuti, Ino ncitondezyonzi ncocita kuti tucibone, tukusyome? Mulimonzi ngocita?
Bamataata bakalya Mana munkanda, mbuli mbokulembedwe. Wakabapa kulya ukuzwa kujulu kuti balye,
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Tali Musa uwakamupa nsima iizwa kujulu, pele Taata nguumupa nsima iini iizwa kujulu.
Nkaambo insima ya-Leza ngooyo uuzwa kujulu, uupa nyika buumi.
Bakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, kotupa lyoonse nsima eyi.
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Ndime insima yabuumi, oyo uuza kulindime takooyoofwa nzala, awalo uundisyoma takooyoofwa limbi nyota.
Pele ndakamwaambila kuti mwandibona ndime uno, nokuboobo tamusyomi.
Boonse mbandipa Taata baleza kulindime, awalo uuza kulindime nsikoomutanda akaniini pe.
Nkaambo ndaseluka kuzwa kujulu, takuli kucita ncenianda ndemwini, pele nkucita luyando lwayooyo uwakandituma.
Eno ndoolu luyando lwakwe uwakandituma, kuti entakasweekelwa naba omwe wabo boonse mbaakandipa, pele kuti nkababusye kubuzuba bwakumamanino.
Eno ndoolu luyando lwa-Taata, kuti umwi umwi uubona Mwana akumusyoma, abe abuumi ubutamani, amebo ndiyoomubusya kubuzuba bwakumamanino.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakali kutongauka aalinguwe, mbwaakati, Ndime nsima iyakazwa kujulu.
Bakati, Sena engwe Jesu, mwana a-Josefa, ngotuzi wisi abanyina? Ino uamba buti eno kuti, Ndakazwa kujulu?
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Mutatongauki akati kanu.
Takukwe muntu uukonzya kuza kulindime Taata uwakandituma atamukwela, amebo ndiyoomubusya kubuzuba bwakumamanino.
Kulilembedwe mubasinsimi kuti, Boonse bayooiisigwa Leza. Umwi umwi uwakamvwa kuli-Taata, akwiiya kulinguwe, uleza kulindime.
Takuli kuti kuli muntu uwakabona Taata, pele oyo uuzwida kuli-Leza, ngonguwe uwakabona Taata.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Oyo uusyoma uli abuumi ubutamani.
Ndime nsima yabuumi.
Bamauso bakalya Mana munkanda, bakafwa.
Njeeyi nsima iizwa kujulu, kuti muntu uuilya takooyoofwa.
Ndime nsima ngumi iyakazwa kujulu, na muntu wiilya nsima eyi unooli muumi lyoonse, alimwi insima njenti pe ngomubili wangu, kuti inyika ibe abuumi.
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Mwatalya mubili wa-Mwana a-Muntu, mwatanywa bulowa bwakwe, tamukwe buumi mulindinywe.
Oyo uulya mubili wangu, akunywa bulowa bwangu uli abuumi ubutamani, alimwi ndiyoomubusya kubuzuba bwakumamanino.
Nkaambo mubili wangu nkokulya kwinikwini, bulowa bwangu nkokunywa kwinikwini.
Oyo uulya mubili wangu akunywa bulowa bwangu nguukede mulindime, amebo ndikede mulinguwe.
Mbubonya Taata muumi mbwaakandituma, amebo mbwendi muumi nkaambo ka-Taata, mbubonya obo awalo uundilya unooli muumi nkaambo kangu.
Njeeyi nsima iyakazwa kujulu, iitali mbuli njobakalya bamauso, akufwa, oyo uulya nsima eyi unooli muumi lyoonse.
Aya makani wakaambila mucikombelo naakali kwiisya muKapemauma.
Nkaambo kaako banjibanji babasikwiiya bakwe, nobakamvwa obo bakati, Majwi aya mayumu, nguni uuti amvwe?
Pele Jesu mbwaali kuzi kuti basikwiiya bakwe bali kutongauka majwi aya, wakabaambila kuti, Sena aya alamulebya?
Ino mbuti mwaakubona Mwana a-Muntu ulatanta, ukuya nkwaakabede kusaanguna?
Muuya nguupa buumi, mubili ngwabuyo, majwi ngendakamwaambila muuya, mbuumi.
Pele mpobali bamwi banu abatasyomi. Nkaambo kuzwida kumatalikilo Jesu wakali kuzi abo abatakali kusyoma, awalo uuti kamwaabe.
Wakati, Nkaambo aka nkendakamwaambila kuti, Takukwe muntu uukonzya kuza kulindime Taata atamuzumizya.
Nkaambo kaako basikwiiya bakwe banjibanji bakapiluka, tabacili kweenda limbi awalo.
Jesu wakabaambila abali kumi mubabili kuti, Sena anywebo mulainka?
Simoni Petro wakamuvuwa wakati, O mwami, tuye kuli? Nduwe oojisi majwi aabuumi ubutamani,
Eno swebo twakasyoma, alimwi tulizi kuti nduwe Uusalala wa-Leza.
Jesu wakabavuwa wakati, Sena endime ndakamusala nomuli kumi mubabili? Pele umwi wanu mubi.
Wali kwaamba Judase mwana a-Simoni Iskariote, nkaambo ngonguwe uuti kamwaabe, wali omwe wabali kumi mubabili.
Eno ipobwe lyaba-Juda, ilitegwa lyazilao, lyakali afwaafwi.
Nkaambo kaako banabakwabo bakamwaambila kuti, Zwa kuno, uye ku-Judaya, kuti basikwiiya bako abalo bakabone milimo yako njocita.
Nkaambo takukwe muntu uuduma uucita zintu mumbali. Wanoocita zintu ezi, liyubulule mucisi.
(Nkaambo abalo banabakwabo tabakali kumusyoma.)
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Ciindi cangu tacinasika, pele ciindi canu mpocili lyoonse.
Inyika tiikonzya kumusula, pele mebo ilindisulide, nkaambo ndiilingulula kuti milimo yayo mibi.
Kamuya nywebo kupobwe, mebo nsikooinka eneeno kupobwe eli, nkaambo ciindi cangu tacinazyulila,
Naakamana kubaambila makani aya, wakacili kukede mu-Galilaya.
Pele banabakwabo kabainkide kupobwe, nkabela awalo wakainka, kutali kuya kulidunauna pele kuyubaila,
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakali kumuyandaula kupobwe, bakali kuti, Uli kuli?
Eno makamu aabantu bakali kukazyanya kapati anguwe. Bamwi bali kuti, Muntu mubotu oyu. Bamwi bati, Pe, tali boobo, pele ueneena buyo bantu.
Nokuboobo takukwe muntu uwakamwaamba antangalala, nkaambo bakali kuyoowa ba-Juda.
Pele nokwakaba akati kapobwe, Jesu wakanjila muntempele kuyooiisya.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakaankamana bakati, Ino muntu oyu ulizi buti kubala uwatakaiya?
Jesu wakabavuwa wakati, Kwiisya kwangu takuli kwangu ndemwini, nkukwakwe uwakandituma.
Kwanooli muntu uuyanda kucita luyando lwakwe, ulaziba kwiisya kuti na kuzwa kuli-Leza na ndilalyaambila buyo ndemwini.
Oyo muntu uulyaambila buyo, nguuliyandawida bulemu bwakwe mwini. Pele uuyandaula bulemu bwayooyo uwakamutuma, ngonguwe uusinizizye, tamukwe bubi mulinguwe.
Sena Musa takamupede mulao, nokuboobo takukwe omwe wanu uucita mulao? Nkaatobonzi ncomuyanda kundijaya?
Makamu akavuwa kuti, Uli adaimona, nguni uuyanda kukujaya?
Jesu wakavuwa wakati, Ndakacita mulimo omwe, eno nyoonse mwakagambwa,
Nkakaambo aka ncaakamupeda ciyanza cakupalulwa Musa (nokuboobo tacili ca-Musa, pele ncabamauso), eno kubuzuba bwa-Sabata mulapalula muntu.
Na muntu wapalulwa abuzuba bwa-Sabata kuti mulao wa-Musa utasotokwa, sena mwandikalalila nkaambo ndakaponya muntu abuzuba bwa-Sabata?
Mutabeteki aciimo, pele amubeteke cakululama.
Ede ngooyu uambila antangalala, eno takucikwe ncobaamba kulinguwe. Sena bapati balizi ncobeni kuti ngonguwe Kristo?
Nokuboobo swebo tulimuzi oyu muntu nkwazwa, pele Kristo walo asika, takukwe uumuzi nkwazwa.
Eno Jesu wakoompolola muntempele naakali kwiisya, wakati, Mulindizi ankwenzwa mulikuzi, alimwi nsikalizidide lwangu ndemwini, pele oyo uwakandituma nguusinizizye, ngomutezi,
Ndilimuzi mebo, nkaambo ndazwa kulinguwe, walo ngowakandituma,
Ncobakali kusoleka kumujata, pele taakwe muntu uwakamujata, nkaambo ciindi cakwe teecalinasika,
Pele banjibanji bankamu bakamusyoma bakati, Kristo asika, sena uzoocita malele manji aainda aya ngacita oyu muntu?
Ba-Farisi bakamvwa majwi ayo aabankamu ngobakali kwaambaula aanguwe, eno bapaizi bapati abaFarisi bakatuma bamapulisa kuyoomujata.
Jesu wakati, Kwasyaala ciindi ciniini ncencili anywebo, nkabela ndilaya kulooyo uwakandituma.
Muyoondiyandaula, pele tamukooyoondijana, alimwi nkwembede mebo tamukonzya kukusika,
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakabuzyanya abeni bakati, Nkukuli oyu muntu nkwati ye oko nkotutakwe kuyoomujana? Sena uya kuli-Bamwaikide abakede akati kaba-Helene, akuyooiisya ba-Helene?
Ndijwinzi eli ndyaamba kuti, Muyoondiyandaula pele tamukooyoondijana, akwalo kuti, Nkwembede tamukonzya kuza nkoko?
Oyo uusyoma ndime mwida lyakwe muyookunka milonga yamaanzi maumi, mbubonya mbwaamba Magwalo.
Pele majwi aya ngaali kwaamba nga-Muuya, ngobati tambule abo abakamusyoma, nkaambo Muuya towalinapegwa, nkaambo Jesu takalinanjizigwa mubulemu bwakwe.
Bamwi bankamu, nobakamvwa majwi aya bakati, Ncobeni oyu muntu ngomusinsimi oyo.
Bamwi bakati, Oyu ngu-Kristo. Pele bamwi bakati, Ena, sena Kristo inga ulazwa mu-Galilaya?
Sena Magwalo taambide kuti Kristo ulazwa kumukowa wa-Davida, ulazwa ku-Betelehemu, kumunzi nkwaakali kukede Davida?
Kwakaba kwaanzaana akati kankamu nkaambo kakwe,
Bamwi bakali kuyanda kumujata, pele takukwe muntu uwakabika maanza alinguwe.
Bamapulisa bakavuwa kuti, Takunabede muntu uuamba bobuya,
Ba-Farisi bakabavuwa kuti, Anywebo mweeneenwa kale na?
Sena mpali umwi wabapati naba waba-Farisi uwamusyoma?
Pele nkamu eyi iitezi mulao iloombwezegwa.
Nikodemo (oyo uwakazide kulinguwe ciindi, uwali umwi wambabo) wakabaambila kuti,
Sena mulao wesu ulabeteka muntu, mane tusaangune kumvwa kulinguwe mwini akuziba mbwaakacita?
Bakamuvuwa kuti, Sena ayebo uli wakuGalilaya? Kolangaula, ulabona kuti ku-Galilaya takuzwi musinsimi pe.
Mpoonya umwi umwi wakainka kumunzi wakwe.
Nkabela cifumofumo wakabweeda kuyoonjila alimwi muntempele, abalo bantu boonse bakeza kulinguwe, mpoonya wakakala, wakabaiisya.
Eno balembi aba-Farisi bakamuletela mwanakazi uwakajatwa mubumambi, bakamukazika akati,
bamwaambila kuti, Omufundisi, oyu mwanakazi wakajatwa naakacili kucita bumambi,
Eno Musa mumulao wakalailila kuti abali bobuya bafuswe mabwe, ino yebo uamba buti aalinguwe?
Bali kwaamba obo kumusola kuti bamupe mulandu, Pele Jesu wakakotama, wakalemba ansi amunwe wakwe,
Eno nobakacili kumubuzya tunjitunji, wakakotamuka, wakabaambila kuti, Oyo uutakwe cibi akati kanu, asaangune kumufusa bbwe.
Alimwi wakakotama, wakalemba ansi amunwe wakwe.
Abalo nobakamvwa majwi ayo, bakazwa omwe omwe, kutalika kumupati mane kumusyaalizi, awalo Jesu wakasiigwa alike, amwanakazi, mpoonya mpaali kubede akati,
Eno Jesu wakakotamuka, wamwaambila kuti, Omwanakazi, bali kuli abakakubejelezya? Sena takukwe muntu uwakupa mulandu?
Wakati, takukwe muntu, O mwami. Jesu wakati, Amebo nsikupi mulandu, koya buyo, kutalika sunu utaciti cibi limbi.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Farisi bakamwaambila kuti, Ulalilungulula omwini, bukamboni bwako tabusinizizye.
Jesu wakavuwa, wakati kulimbabo, Nendililungulula­ ndemwini, kulungulula kwangu kulisinizizye, nkaambo ndilizi nkwenzwa ankwenia, pele nywebo tamukuzi nkwendakazwa ankwenia.
Nywebo mubeteka aciimo, mebo nsikwe muntu ngwembeteka.
Pele nembeteka kubeteka kwangu kulisinizizye, nkaambo nsili endike, pele mpembede mebo ndili a-Taata uwakandituma.
Ii, alimwi kwakalembwa mumulao wanu kuti bukamboni bwabantu bobile bulisinizizye.
Ndime endililungulula ndemwini, awalo Taata uwakandituma ulandilungulula.
Nkaambo kaako bakamwaambila kuti, Ino Uso nguli? Jesu wakavuwa, Tamundizi mebo naba Taata, kuti nomwali kundizi, nomumuzi Taata awalo.
Aya majwi Jesu wakaambila muciyobwedo calubono, naakali kwiisya muntempele, eno takukwe muntu uwakamujata, nkaambo ciindi cakwe teecalinasika.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakati, Sena alijaye mwini, mbwaamba kuti, Nkwenja tamukonzya kuza nkuko?
Wakabaambila kuti, Nywebo muli baansi, mebo ndili wakujulu, nywebo muli benyika ino, mebo nsili wenyika ino pe.
Ncendakamwaambila kuti, Muyoofwa muzibi zyanu, nkaambo mwatazumina kuti ndime yooyo, muyoofwa muzibi zyanu.
Nkaambo kaako bakamwaambila kuti, Nduweni yebo? Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Nguwenya oyo ngwendakamwaambila kuzwa kumatalikilo,
Ndilijisi makani manjimanji aakwaamba aakubeteka ndinywe, nokuboobo oyo uwakandituma ulisinizizye, ayo ngendakamvwa kulinguwe ngangao ngeŋa-mba munyika,
Tabakamvwisizye kuti wali kwaamba Wisi.
Nkaambo kaako Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Mwaakwaanzika Mwana a-Muntu, nomuti kazibe kuti ndime yooyo, akwalo kuti nsilicitili cintu ndemwini, pele ndaamba aya mbuli mbwandiisya Taata,
Eno oyo uwakandituma uli mulindime, tandisiide endike pe, nkaambo ndacita lyoonse zintu izimubotela.
Naakali kwaamba aya, banjibanji bakamusyoma.
Eno Jesu wakabaambila ba-Juda abo abakamusyoma kuti, Mwajatisya majwi aangu, ncobeni mwaba basikwiiya bangu,
alimwi muyooziba bwini, abwalo bwini buyoomunununa.
Bakamuvuwa kuti, Swebo tuli bana ba-Abrahamu, tatunavubidwe buzike kumuntu, uamba buti kuti muyoonununwa?
Jesu wakabavuwa, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Muntu woonse uucita cibi ngomuzike wacibi.
Eno muzike takali munanda lyoonse, pele mwana nguukala lyoonse.
Nkaambo kaako kuti Mwana wamunununa, ncobeni mulaba banunukide.
Ndilizi kuti muli bana baAbrahamu, nokuboobo muyanda kundijaya, nkaambo ijwi lyangu talijisi bukalilo mulindinywe.
Ndaamba zintu nzendakabona antoomwe a-Taata. Anywebo mulacita nzomwakamvwa kumauso.
Bakamuvuwa kuti, Taateesu ngu-Abrahamu. Jesu wakabaambila wakati, Kuti nomwali bana ba-Abrahamu, nomwali kucita milimo njaakali kucita Abrahamu.
Pele eno muyanda kundijaya, ndi muntu uumwaambila bwini, mbwendakamvwa kuli-Leza. Abrahamu takacitide bobuya pe.
Nywebo mucita milimo yamauso. Bamwaambila kuti, Tatukazyalidwe mubwaamu, tulijisi Taata omwe, ngo-Leza.
Jesu wakabaambila wakati, Kuti Leza naali uso, nomwali kundiyanda, nkaambo ndakazwa kuli-Leza. Nsikalizidide ndemwini, pele wakandituma.
Ino ncinzi ncomutamvwi kwaamba kwangu? Nkaambo kakuti tamukonzya kumvwa ijwi lyangu,

Nywebo muzwa kuliuso Saatani, muyanda kucita iziyanda uso. Walo wali mujayi kuzwa kumatalikilo, alimwi takede mubwini, nkaambo takukwe bwini mulinguwe. Naamba cakubeja waamba zyakwe mwini, nkaambo nguubeja, ngowisi wababeja.
Pele nkaambo ndyaamba bwini tamundisyomi.
Nguuli mulindinywe uti ndipe mulandu wazibi? Eno anooli ndyaamba bwini, i ncomutandisyomi?
Muntu woonse wa-Leza ulamvwa majwi aa-Leza, Ncomukakilwa kwaamvwa, nkaambo tamuli bana ba-Leza,
Ba-Juda bakamuvuwa kuti, Sena tatwaambide kabotu kuti uli mu-Samariya, uli adaimona?
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Nsijisi daimona, pele ndilemya Taata, nywebo mulandyuubya.
Pele nsiliyandawidi kulidumaizya, mpali omwe uuyandaula, uubeteka,
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, kuti muntu anooyobola ijwi lyangu, takooyoobona lufu,
Nkabela ba-Juda bakamwaambila kuti, Eno twaziba kuti uli adaimona, Abrahamu wakafwa, abasinsimi, eno koamba kuti, Muntu anoobamba majwi aangu, takooyoofwa.
Sena uli mupati kwiinda mufu taata Abrahamu, abafu basinsimi? Ino ulicitani yebo?
Jesu wakavuwa wakati, Kuti ndanoolidumaizya ndemwini, bulemu bwangu mbwabuyo, ngu-Taata uundilemya, ngomuamba kuti, Ngo-Leza wesu.
Tamunamuziba, pele mebo ndilimuzi; na ndaamba kuti, Nsimuzi, ndilabeja anga ndinywe, pele ndilimuzi, ndabamba majwi aakwe.
Uso Abrahamu wakabotelwa kubona buzuba bwangu, wakabubona, wakakondwa.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakamwaambila kuti, Ootanaba amyaaka iili makumi osanwe, sena wakamubona Abrahamu?
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Abrahamu katanazyalwa mebo mpendi,
Mpoonya bakabweza mabwe kuti bamufuse, pele Jesu wakalisisa, wakazwa muntempele.
Nkabela basikwiiya bakwe bakamubuzya kuti, Rabi, ino nguni uwakacita cibi, sena nguwenya muntu oyu, na mbamuzyala, ncaakazyalwa aboofu?
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Tali oyu muntu uwakacita cibi nobaba abamuzyala, pele nkuti milimo ya-Leza iyubululwe mulinguwe.
Tulyeelede kubeleka milimo yayooyo uwakandituma, nelicili isikati, masiku alasika, nokutakwe muntu uukonzya kubeleka,
Nencili munyika ndi mumuni wanyika.
Naakamana kwaamba obo, wakaswida mate ansi, wakakanda bulongo amate aakwe, wakamunanika meso abulongo obo,
wakamwaambila kuti, Koya, ukasambe mukaziba ka-Siloamu (akategwa kukupandululwa, Kutumigwa). Mpoonya wakainka waakusamba, wakaboola ulabona.
Nkaambo kaako banamuzyaabo abalo abakamubwene ciindi kuti wali mukumbizi bakati, Sena engwe oyu uwali kukala akukumbila.
Bamwi bakati, Ngonguwe, bamwi bakati, Pe, umukozya buyo. Walo wakaamba kuti, Ndime.
Mpoonya bakamubuzya bakati, Ino meso aako akajuka buti?
Wakavuwa kuti, Mwaalumi oyo uutegwa Jesu wakakanda bulongo, wakananika meso aangu, wakandyaambila kuti, Koya ku-Siloamu, ukasambe, nkabela ndakainka, ndaakusamba, ndakakonzya kubona,
Bamwaambila kuti, Uli kuli? Wakati, Cita.
Bakamuleta kuba-Farisi muntu oyo uwakali moofu ciindi,
Eno bwakali buzuba bwa-Sabata Jesu mbwaakakanda bulongo, akumujula meso aakwe,
Aboobo ba-Farisi abalo bakamubuzya alimwi kuti, Wakakubonya buti? Wakabaambila kuti, Wakabika bulongo kumeso aangu, ndakasamba, eno ndabona.

Bamwi baba-Farisi bakati, Muntu oyu tazwi kuli-Leza, nkaambo tabambi buzuba bwa-Sabata. Pele bamwi bakati, Iniinga muntu mucitazibi ulakonzya buti kucita malele aali bobuya? Kwakaba kwaanzaana akati kabo.
Bakamubuzya moofu alimwi kuti, Ino yebo, umwaamba buti, mbwaakakujula meso aako? Wakati, Musinsimi we.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda tabakamusyomede kuti ngowakali moofu, akuti wakakonzya kubona, mane nebakaakwiita abakamuzyala oyo uwakajulwa meso,
akubabuzya kuti, Sena oyu mwaneenu, ngomwaamba kuti wakazyalwa moofu? Ino kai wabona buti sunu?
Abo abakamuzyala bakavuwa bakati, Tulizi kuti ngomwaneesu, akwalo kuti wakazyalwa moofu.
Pele tatuzi mbwaabona eno, akuti nguni uwakajula meso aakwe. Amumubuzye, wakomena kale, ulalyaambilila mwini.
Nzeezi nzobakaamba abakamuzyala, nkaambo bakali kuyoowa ba-Juda nkaambo ba-Juda bakazuminana kale kuti uuti mwaambe kuti ngu-Kristo, ulatandwa mucikombelo.
Ncobakaamba obo abakamuzyala kuti, Wakomena kale, amumubuzye.
Elyo bakamwiita alwabili muntu uwakali moofu, bakamwaambila kuti, Kolumba Leza, tulimuzi oyu muntu kuti mucitazibi.
Walo wakavuwa kuti, Na mucitazibi nsizi, pele ncintu comwe ncenzi, kuti ndakali moofu, eno ndabona.
Bakamwaambila bakati, Wakakucita buti? Wakajula buti meso aako?
Wakabavuwa kuti, Ndazwa akumwaambila eno, pele tamumvwide, Nkaambonzi ncomuyanda kumvwa alimwi? Sena anywebo muyanda kuba basikwiiya bakwe?
Bakamutukana bakati, Nduwe sikwiiya wakwe, pele swebo tuli basikwiiya ba-Musa.
Tulizi kuti Leza wakaamba kuli-Musa, pele Oyu muntu, tatumuzi nkwazwa.
Mwaalumi wakabavuwa wakati, Eno nceeci iciyoosya, mbomutezi nkwazwa, nokubaboobo wakandijula meso aangu.
Tulizi kuti Leza tamvwi bacitazibi, pele muntu woonse uukomba Leza, akucita mbwayanda, ngonguwe ngwamvwa,
Kuzwa kumatalikilo aanyika takunamvwidwe umwi wakajulide meso aamuntu uwakazyalwa moofu.
Oyo muntu naatali kuzwa kuli-Leza, naatakonzya kucita cintu,
Bakamuvuwa bakati, Wakazyalwa muzibi yebo, sena nduwe ooti twiisye? Mpoonya bakamutanda.
Jesu wakamvwa kuti bamutanda, nkabela naakamujana wakati, Sena wamusyoma Mwana a-Leza?
Wakavuwa kuti, Ino nguni, O mwami, kuti musyome?
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Ulimubwene, alimwi ngonguwe ngoambaula awalo.
Wakati, O mwami, ndasyoma, Mpoonya wakamufugamina.
Jesu wakati, Nkaambo kakubeteka ncendazida munyika eyi, kuti abo abataboni babone, akuti abo ababona babe boofu.
Abo babaFarisi abakali awalo bakamvwa majwi aya, bakamwaambila kuti, Sena aswebo tuli boofu?
Jesu wakabaambila wakati, Kuti nomwali boofu nomutajisi cibi, pele eno mwaamba kuti, Tulabona, Cibi canu mpocicili.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, oyo uutanjilili kucilyango cacaanda cambelele, pele watantila kumbi, ngonguwe mufumpi amubbi.
Pele uunjilila kucilyango ngosikweembela mbelele.
Uulindila cilyango ulamujulila, embelele zilamvwa ijwi lyakwe, alimwi ulaziita mbelele zyakwe amazina aazyo, ulazitola anze,
Amana kugwisya zyakwe zyoonse, ulazisolwedela, azyalo mbelele zilamucilila, nkaambo zililizi ijwi lyakwe.
Umweenzu tazimucilili, pele zilamutija, nkaambo tazilizi ijwi lyabeenzu.
Jesu wakabaambila kalabi aka, pele tabakamvwide makani ngaakali kwaamba kulimbabo.
Abo boonse abakasika nkentanasika mbabbi abafumpi, pele imbelele tazikabamvwide.
Ndime cilyango, mulindime muntu woonse uunjila, ulafutuka, ulanjila akuzwa, ulajana macelelo.
Mubbi uzida buyo kubba akujaya akunyonyauna, mebo ndazida kuti babe abuumi, akuti buvule.
Ndime sikweembela mubotu, sikweembela mubotu ulatulila mbelele buumi bwakwe.
Oyo uubbadelwa mali, uutali ngomukamwini mbelele, imbelele tazili zyakwe, abona umpe uleza, ulasia mbelele, ulatija, mpoonya umpe ulaziluma akuzimwaisya,
nkaambo ubbadelwa buyo, taakwe makani ambelele.
Ndime sikweembela mubotu, ndilizizi zyangu, azyalo zyangu zilindizi,
Mbubonya Taata mbwandizi, amebo ndilimuzi Taata, ndatulila mbelele buumi bwangu,
Alimwi ndijisi mbelele zimwi izitali zyacaanda cino. Azyalo ndyeelede kuzileta, ziyoolimvwa ijwi lyangu, ziyooba itanga lyomwe asikweembela omwe,
Taata ncandiyandila, nkaambo nditula buumi bwangu, kuti nkabubweze alimwi.
Takukwe uundinyanga mbubo, pele ndabutula ndemwini, Ndijisi bwami bwakubutula, alimwi ndijisi bwami bwakububweza, Ngomulao ngwendakatambula kuli-Taata,
Abanjibanji bambabo bakati, Ujisi daimona, ulisondokede, Nkaambonzi ncomumuswiilila?
Bamwi bakati, Oku takuli kwaamba kwamuntu uuli adaimona. Sena daimona ulakonzya kubonya meso aamoofu?
Kwakali ipobwe lyakusalazya ntempele ku-Jerusalemu, akali mapeyo
Eno Jesu wakali kweendeenda muntempele, mukota lya-Solomoni.
Nkaambo kaako ba-Juda bakamubunganina, bakamwaambila kuti, Ino ulaleka lili kutubikilila? Anooli nduwe Kristo, twaambile antangalala.
Jesu wakabavuwa kuti, Ndakamwaambila, pele tamusyomi. Milimo njencita muzina lya-Taata, njiindilungulula.
Pele nywebo tamusyomi, nkaambo tamuli mbelele zyangu,
Imbelele zyangu zilamvwa ijwi lyangu, ndilizizi, zilandicilila.
Ndazipa buumi ubutamani, tazikooyoofwa limbi, takukwe uuyoozikwempa mujanza lyangu.
Taata uwakandipa nzizyo, mupati kwiinda boonse, takukwe uukonzya kuzikwempa mujanza lya-Taata.
Mebo a-Taata tuli umwi.
Ba-Juda bakabweza mabwe alimwi kuti bamufuse.
Jesu wakabavuwa kuti, Ndakamutondezya milimo minjiminji mibotu iizwa kuli-Taata, ino kai nguli mulimo enaawa ngomundifusila mabwe?
Ba-Juda bakamuvuwa kuti, Kumulimo mubotu tatukufusi mabwe pe, pele nkaambo kakusanka, akuti yebo, mboli muntu, ulipa kaLezaleza.
Jesu wakabavuwa wakati, Sena takulembedwe mumulao wanu kuti, Ndati, Muli baleza?
Na ubaamba kuti mbaleza abo mbolyakazida ijwi lya-Leza (nkaambo Magwalo takonzya kususigwa),
sena mwaamba oyo ngwaakasalazya Taata, akumutuma ansi kuti, Wasanka yebo, nkaambo ndati ndi Mwana a-Leza?
Kuti nsiciti milimo ya-Taata, mutandisyomi.
Pele kuti ndiicita, nomutandisyomi mebo, amusyome milimo, kuti muzibe akumvwa kuti Taata uli mulindime, amebo ndi muli-Taata.
Bakakanza alimwi kumujata, pele wakazwa mumaanza aabo.
Banjibanji bakeza kulinguwe bakati, Ncobeni Johane takacitide citondezyo, anu zyoonse zintu zyamuntu oyu nzyaakali kwaamba Johane zyakali zyakasimpe.
Eno oko banjibanji bakasyoma nguwe.
Oyu ngu-Mariya ngu­ wenya uwakananika Mwami mafuta aanunka kabotu, akusyobya susu lyakwe kumatende aa-Jesu, ngowakali amucizi oyo Lazaro uwali kuciswa.
Nkaambo kaako abo bacizi bakwe bakatuma kulinguwe bakati, O mwami, langa, oyo ngoyanda ulaciswa.
Elyo Jesu naakamvwa obo wakati, Bulwazi obu tabuli bwalufu lwamuntu, pele mbwakulemeka Leza, kuti Mwana a-Leza alemezegwe ambubo.
Eno Jesu wakali kuyanda Maata, amwanaakwabo, awalo Lazaro.
Aboobo naakamvwa kuti ulaciswa, wakacilikede mazuba obile mpoonya awo mpaakali kubede.
Naakamana aya mazuba wakabaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti, Atubweede ku-Judaya.
Basikwiiya bakwe bakamwaambila kuti, Rabi, ba-Juda eneeno bazwa akuyanda kukufusa mabwe, sena ubweeda alimwi nkukonya?
Jesu wakavuwa wakati, Sena tazili ziindi izili kumi muzibili mubuzuba? Muntu anooenda isikati talifumpuli, nkaambo ulabona mumuni wenyika eyi,
Pele muntu anooenda masiku, ulalifumpula nkaambo tamukwe mumuni mulinguwe.
Ngaaya ngaakaamba, nkabela munsi lyakooko wakabaambila kuti, Mulongweesu Lazaro uloona, pele ndainka mebo nkamusinsimune,
Ncobakamwaambila basikwiiya kuti, Mwami, anooli uloona, uyoopona.
Nokubaboobo Jesu wali kwaamba lufu lwakwe, pele balo bali kweezeezya kuti uamba kulyokezya kwaŋonzi.
Nkabela Jesu wakabapandulwida kuti, Lazaro wazaya,
Kwalo ndabosya kutabako nkaambo kanu, kuti muzuminisye, nokubaboobo katuya kulinguwe,
Nkaambo kaako Tomaso, uutegwa ngwamayanga, wakabaambila basikwiiyanyina kuti, Atweende aswebo, tukafwe awe.
Elyo Jesu naakasika, wakajana kuti uzikidwe kale mazuba one,
Eno Betaniya kwakali kufwaafwi aku-Jerusalemu, kubaanga bamaile bobile,
aba-Juda banjibanji bakali kusikide kuli-Marta a-Mariya, kuzoobakazika myoyo aalufu lwamwanaakwabo,
Mpoonya Maata, naakamvwa kuti Jesu uleza, wakainka kuyoomucinga, pele Maliya wali kucikede muŋanda.
Nkabela Maata wakaambila Jesu kuti, O mwami, kuti nowakali kokuno, mwanaakwesu naatakafwa.
Aneeno ndilizi kuti kufumbwa ncokumbila kuli-Leza, inga Leza ulakupa ncico,
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Mwanaakwanu ulabuka.
Maata wakamwaambila kuti, Ndilizi kuti uyoobuka mubuzuba bwakubuka bwakumamanino,
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Ndime kubuka abuumi, Oyo uusyoma ndime, naanooli wakafwa, unooli muumi,
naba uli buti muumi uusyoma ndime, takooyoofwa pe. Wazumina­ obo na?
Wakamwaambila kuti, Ii, Mwami, ndazumina kuti nduwe Kristo, Mwana a-Leza, nguwenya oyo uutegwa uleza muno munyika,
Naakaamba obo wakainka, waakwiita Maliya mwanaakwabo kumbali wati, Mufundisi mpali, ulakwiita.
Awalo naakamvwa obo, wakanyamuka cakufwamba, wakainka kulinguwe.
(Jesu walo taakalinanjila mumunzi, wakacili kwiimvwi nkukonya oko nkwaakamucingila Maata.)
Eno ba-Juda mbaakali abo muŋanda, abali kumukazika moyo, nobakabona Maliya mbwaakafwambaana kuzwa anze, bakamucilila, bacita anga uya kucuumbwe kuyoolilila nkuko.
Mpoonya awo Maliya, naakasika oko ukwali Jesu, naakamubona, wakawida ansi kumatende aakwe wakati, O mwami, nowakali kokuno, mwanaakwesu naatakafwa.
Eno Jesu naakamubona ulalila, abalo ba-Juda abakali kumucilide balalila, moyo wakwe wakalenda, wakeetela,
wakati, Ino nkuli nkomwakamuzikila? Bakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, koboola ubone.
Jesu wakalila.
Aba-Juda neebakaambila kuti, Amubone mbwaali kumuyanda.
Pele bamwi babo bakati, Kai oyu nguwakabonya meso aamoofu, sena takakonzya kucita oyu muntu kuti atafwi?
Nkaambo kaako moyo wa-Jesu wakalenda alimwi, wasika kucuumbwe. Eno yakali mpangala iisinkidwe ebbwe.
Jesu wakati, Amugwisye bbwe, Maata, mwanaakwabo uwakafwa, wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, kuciindi cino ulanunka, nkaambo ulifwide mazuba one.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Sena nsikwe nendakwaambila kuti, Na wasyoma ulabona bulemu bwa-Leza?
Mpoonya bakagwisya bbwe. Nkabela Jesu wakalanga kujulu wakati, Taata, ndakulumba nkaambo kakuti wandimvwa.
Kwalo ndali kuzi kuti ulandimvwa lyoonse, pele ndaamba obo nkaambo kamakamu aandizingulukide, kuti bazumine kuti nduwe owakandituma.
Naakamana kwaamba obo, wakoompolola ejwi pati kuti, Lazaro, kozwa omo.
Mpoonya oyo uwakafwide wakazwa, ulizambaidwe kumaboko akumaulu ezisani zyakuzikwa azyalo, ulaangidwe isila kubusyu. Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Amumwaangunune, mumuleke aende.
Pele bamwi bambabo bakainka kuba-Farisi kuyoobaambila ncaakacita Jesu.
Elyo bapaizi bapati aba-Farisi bakabunganya babetesi bakati, Tucite buyani? Nkaambo muntu oyu ulacita malele manji.
Kuti twamuleka buyo, boonse balasyoma nguwe, abalo ba-Roma balasika bazootunyanga busena bwesu amusyobo wesu.
Pele umwi wambabo, uutegwa Kayafa, mbwaakali mupaizi mupati kulooyo mwaaka, wakabaambila kuti, Tamukwe ncomuzi,
nokuba kweezeezya kuti ncibotu kulindinywe kuti muntu omwe afwide bantu, kuti musyobo woonse utafwidilili.
Eno eci ncaakaamba, takalyaambilide lwakwe mwini, pele mbwaali mupaizi kulooyo mwaaka, wakasinsima kuti, Jesu uyoofwida musyobo oyo,
alimwi tuuli musyobo oyo walo, pele kuti akabunganye antoomwe boonse bana ba-Leza abamwaikide.
Nkaambo kaako kuzwida buzuba obo bakakanza kuyoomujaya.
Nkaambo kaako Jesu takacili kweendeenda antangalala akati kaba-Juda, pele wakaakuzwa oko wakainka kucisi icibambene ankanda, kumunzi uutegwa Efraimu, wakakala nkuko abasikwiiya bakwe,
Eno Pasika waba-Juda wakali afwaafwi, Bantu banji abakazwa muzisi bainka ku-Jerusalemu kuti bukalisalazye, Pasika katanasika,
Aboobo bakamuyandaula Jesu, bakali kwaambaula umwi amweenzinyina nebakali kwiimvwi muntempele bakati, Ino mweezeezya buti? Sena takoozoosika kupobwe?
Eno bapaizi bapati aba-Farisi bakalailila kuti, anooli kuli muntu uumubwene nkwabede, atwaambile kuti tukamujate.
Aboobo bakamujikila cilalilo, walo Mana ngowakali kubapa zyakulya, pele Lazaro wali umwi wabaabo abali kukede akulya awalo,
Nkabela Maliya wakabweza nsazi yamafuta aanunka kabotu, aadulisya kwiindilila, wakananika matende aa-Jesu, wakasyobya susu lyakwe kumatende aakwe. Elyo muŋanda mwakazyula bwema bwamafuta ayo.
Pele Judase Iskariote, umwi wabasikwiiya bakwe, uwakaakumwaaba wakati,
Ino mafuta aya aba anzi naataulwa mpondo izili kumi, kuti mali apegwe bacete?
Obuya mbwaakaamba tokwakali kuti uyeeya bacete, pele kuti wali mubbi, mbwaali ngonguwe uuyobola nkomo yamali, wakali kugwisya aabikwa mumo.
Mpoonya Jesu wakati, Amumuleke, alibambile buzuba bwakuzikwa kwangu,
Nkaambo bacete muli abalo lyoonse, pele mebo pe, tamuli amebo lyoonse.
Eno nkamu mpati yaba-Juda bakamvwa kuti Jesu nkwali, Bakeza, tabakazidilide Jesu walo, pele kubona awalo Lazaro ngwaakabusya kukufwa,
Pele bapaizi bapati bakakanza kujaya Lazaro awalo,
nkaambo ba-Juda banji bakasyoma Jesu nkaambo kakwe.
bakatola mitabi yatumvuma, bakainka kuyoomucinga, bakoompolola kuti,
Hosana:
Uli acoolwe uuboola muzina lya-Jehova,
Nguwenya ngo-Mwami waba-Israyeli,
Utayoowi, omwana musimbi wa-Zioni,
Bona, Mwami wako uleza,
Ulitantide amwana ambongolo,
Mpoonya awo makamu aabantu abakali awalo naakaita Lazaro mucuumbwe akumubusya kulibafwide, bakaba bakamboni.
Alimwi nkakaambo aka nkobakamwiinkila bantu banji kuyoomucinga, nkaambo bakamvwa malele aya ngaakacita.
Nkabela ba-Farisi bakalyaambauzya beni bakati, Ino mumane uli? Kamulanga, ede inyika yoonse yamucilila.
aba bakeza kuli-Fili po, waku-Betsaida uwaku-Galilaya, bakamukumbila kuti, O mwami, tuyanda kubona Jesu,
Filipo wakainka, waakwaambila Andreya, Andreya baakuboola a-Filipo, bamwaambila Jesu,
Walo Jesu wakabavuwa wakati, Ciindi casika ncati lemezegwe Mwana a-Muntu.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Kuti nseke yabulotwe yatawida mwivu, akufwida mumo, inookede buyo ilike, pele kuti yafwa, ilazyala zilyo Zinji.
Oyo uuyandisya buumi bwakwe ulabusweekelwa, awalo uusulide buumi bwakwe ansi ano, uyoobuyobola kubuumi ubutamani.
Muntu uuli buti uundibelekela andicilile, eno nkwembede mebo, awalo simulimo wangu uyooba nkuko. Muntu uundibelekela awalo Taata uyoomulemeka,
Eno muuya wangu ulipengede, nandilatinzi? Taata, undivune kuciindi cino. Nokuboobo, ncendazida kuciindi cino.
Taata, lemya zina lyako. Mpoonya awo kwakazwa ijwi kujulu ilyakati, Ndalilemya kale, ndiyoolilemya alimwi.
Bantu abakali kwiimvwi mpawo abakamvwa ijwi eli, bakaamba kuti, Lyazuma. Bamwi bati, Angelo waamba awalo.
Jesu wakavuwa wakati, Eli jwi talizidide ndime, lyazida ndinywe.
Eno inyika ino ilabetekwa, eno mwami wenyika ino uyootandwa.
Mebo kuti ndasumpulwa kuzwa ansi, ndilakwela bantu boonse kulindime.
Pele obuya mbwaakaamba, wakatondezya lufu ndwati kafwe.
Mpoonya bantu bakamuvuwa bakati, Tulimvwide mumulao kuti Kristo unookede lyoonse, eno yebo uamba buti kuti Mwana a-Muntu ulyeelede kusumpulwa? Ino Mwana a-Muntu nguni?
Nkaambo kaako Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Mumuni ucikede anywebo kaindi kaniini buyo. Kamweenda nomuci amumuni, kuti mudima utamweenzyi; uuenda mumudima tezi nkwaya.
Jesu naakaamba aya makani, mpoonya wakainka wakalisisa kulimbabo.
Pele nokuboobo nacita malele manjimanji kubusyu bwabo, tabamusyomi,
Jehova, nguni uwakasyoma makani ngotwakaamba?
Nguni uwakatondezegwa kuboko kwa-Jehova?
Wakoofwaazya meso aabo, wakayumya myoyo yabo,
Kuti bataboni ameso aabo, batamvwi mumyoyo yabo,
Batasanduki,
Kuti nkabaponye.
Nokuboobo abeendelezi banjibanji bakasyoma nguwe, pele nkaambo kaba-Farisi tabali kulyaamba, kuti batatandwi mucikombelo.
Nkaambo bali kuyanda kulumbaizigwa bantu kwiinda kulumbaizigwa Leza.
Awalo uundibona, ubona nguwe uwaku-ndituma,
Ndeza ansi ndi mumuni, kuti umwi umwi uundisyoma atakali mumudima.
Anooli uumvwa majwi aangu, pele taabambi, nsimubeteki pe, nkaambo nsizide kubeteka nyika, pele kunununa nyika.
Oyo uundikaka, akutatambula majwi aangu, ulijisi uumubeteka, ijwi ndendakali kwaamba, ndendilyo iliti kamubeteke mubuzuba bwakumamanino.
Nkaambo nsilyaambilide ndemwini, pele Taata uwakandituma, nguwakandilailila mbwenjeelede kwaamba ambwenjeelede kukanana,
Alimwi ndilizi kuti kulailila kwakwe mbobuumi ubutamani, nkaambo kaako makani ngenamba, ndaamba mbubonya mbwaakandyaambila Taata.
Nokwakali kulalilwa, Saatani wakalibikide kale mumoyo wa-Judase Iskariote, mwana a-Simoni kuti amwaabe,
Jesu, mbwaali kuzi kuti Wisi wakamupa zintu zyoonse mumaanza aakwe, akuti wakazwa kuliLeza, alimwi uya kuli-Leza,
wakanyamuka mpoonya nobali kulalila, wakatula zyakusama zyakwe ambali, wabweza cisansamuzyo walyaanga mucibuno.
Nkabela watila maanzi mumutiba, watalika kusanzya matende aabasikwiiya bakwe, akwaasansamuna acisansamuzyo ncaakali kulyaangide,
Elyo wakasika kuli-Simoni Petro. Walo wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, nduwe oosanzya matende aangu sena?
Jesu wakamuvuwa wakati, Ncencita­ tocizi eno, pele uyoocimvwisya caakuba ciindi.
Petro wakamwaambila kuti, Tokoosanzya matende aangu noliba lili, pe, pe. Jesu wakamuvuwa wakati, Ndatakusanzya, tokooswaana amebo.
Simoni Petro wamwaambila kuti, O mwami, ino kutabi matende alo, ndisanzya kumaanza akumutwe.
Jesu wamwaambila kuti, Oyo uwasamba kale tabuli pele kumatende alo, kwalo ulisalalide mubili woonse. Anywebo mwasalala, pele tamuli nyoonse.
Nkaambo wali kumuzi uuyoomwaaba, ncaali kwaamba kuti, Tamusalali nyoonse.
Mundyaamba kuti, Mufundisi, akuti, Mwami. Mwaamba kabotu, nkaambo mbwembede.
Eno ndanooli Mwami a-Mufundisi nendasanzya matende aanu, anywebo mulyeelede kusanzyanya matende aanu.
Nkaambo ndamupa citondezyo, kuti anywebo mucite mbuli mbwendamucitila.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Muzike taindi simalelaakwe, awalo uutumwa taindi uwakamutuma.
Mwanoozizi zintu ezi, muli acoolwe mwanoozicita.
Nsyaambi ndinywe nyoonse. Ndilibezi mbendakasala. Pele nkokuti Magwalo azyulile aati, Oyo uulya nsima amebo wandilyata ecisindi cakwe.
Ndamwaambila makani aya kaatanasika, kuti asika, mukasyome kuti ndime.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Uutambula ngwendatuma, watambula ndime, awalo uunditambula watambula oyo uwakandituma.
Basikwiiya bakalangana, bali kuzululwa kuti nguni ngwaamba.
Awo acilido kwakali umwi wabasikwiiya bakwe, ngwaali kuyanda Jesu, waakuyaama acamba cakwe.
Nkaambo kaako Simoni Petro wakamoobola, wakamwaambila kuti, Twaambile nguni ngwaamba.
Walo mbwali kuyeeme acamba ca-Jesu, wakamubuzya kuti, O mwami, nguni?
Jesu wakavuwa wakati, Nguwenya ngwenti sunsile akumupa. Eno naakasunsa mukusu, wakuupa Judase, mwana a-Simoni Iskariote.
Nkabela naakatambula mukusu, mpoonya Saatani wakanjila mulinguwe. Nkaambo kaako Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Eco ncocita cifwanzaanye.
Awo tokwali muntu uuzi na nkaambonzi nkaakamwaambilila boobo.
Nkaambo bamwi bali kweezeezya kuti, nkaambo Judase ngowali kujisi nkomo yamali, antela Jesu umwaambila kuti, kaule ezyo nzotwabula zyapobwe, antela kuti akape bacete zintu zimwi.
Nkabela naakamana kutambula mukusu wakazwa mpoonya, akali masiku.
Oyo naakazwa anze Jesu wakati, Eno Mwana a-Muntu walemezegwa, awalo Leza walemezegwa mulinguwe.
Kuti Leza walemezegwa mulinguwe, Leza ulamulemya mulinguwe mwini, mpoonya mpoonya ulamulemya,
Nobana baniini, kuli ciindi ciniini ncendi anywebo. Muyoondiyandaula, mbuli mbwendakaamba kuba-Juda, oko nkwenja, tamukonzya kuya nkuko, eno ndaamba kulindinywe mbubonya.
Ndamupa mulao mupya wakuti, amuyandane umwi amweenzinyina, mbuli mbwendali kumuyanda, anywebo muyandane mbubonya.
Kuliceeci bantu boonse bayoomuziba, kuti muli ba-ikwiiya bangu, mwanooyandana umwi amweenzinyina.
Petro wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, nkaambonzi ncentakonzya kukucilila neliba eno? Ndatuula buumi bwangu nkaambo kako.
Jesu wamuvuwa kuti, Sena ulatuula buumi bwako nkaambo kangu? Ncobeni ndakwaambila kasimpe, Muzingili takoolila mane unoonditamide kale totatwe.
Muŋanda ya-Taata mwaali makalilo manji, nekwatali boobo nenda­ mwaambila nkaambo ndiya kukumubambila busena,
Kuti na ndainka kuyoomubambila busena ndiyooboola alimwi, nzoomutolelele, kuti oko nkwembede anywebo mukabe nkuko.
Alimwi oko nkwenja mulikuzi, ayalo nzila iiya nkuko muliizi.
Tomaso wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, tatuzi nkoya, ino twiizibe buti nzila?
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Ndime nzila, ndime bwini, ndime buumi. Takukwe uuza kuli-Taata, pele mulindime.
Kuti nomwali kundizi, nomumuzi awalo Taata, pele kutalika sunu mulimuzi, mulimubwene,
Filipo wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, tubonye Uso, kwalo nkotuyandisya.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Cakomenesya buti ciindi ncotwakali ayebo, Filipo, tonandiziba asunu na? Oyo uwandibona, wamubona awalo Taata, eno uambilanzi kuti, Tubonye Uso?
Sena tosyomi kuti mebo ndili muli-Taata, awalo Taata uli mulindime? Majwi ngendamwaambila nsilyaambili ndemwini, pele Taata uukede mulindime nguucita milimo yakwe mwini.
Amundisyome kuti ndili muli-Taata, awalo Taata uli mulindime, nokutabi boobo amundisyome nkaambo kamilimo yalo.
Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Oyo uundisyoma, uyoocita milimo iili mbuli njencita, mane do akiicite mipati iinda eyi, nkaambo ndiya kuli-Taata.
Eno coonse icili buti ncomuti kakumbile muzina lyangu ndiyoocicita, kuti Taata akalumbaizigwe mu-Mwanaakwe,
Kufumbwa ncomuyookumbila muzina lyangu, ndiyoomucitila ncico.
Mwanoondiyanda, kamubamba milao yangu.
Amebo ndiyookumbila Taata, uyoomupa Mugwasyi umbi kuti akale anywebo lyoonse.
Ngonguwe Muuya wabwini, oyo inyika ngwiitakonzya kutambula, nkaambo tiimuboni nekuba kumuziba. Nywebo mulimuzi, nkaambo ulikede anywebo, alimwi unookede mulindinywe.
Nsikooyoomusia mbuli bamusyaala, ndileza kulindinywe.
Kwasyaala ciindi ciniini, inyika tiicindiboni limbi, pele nywebo mulandibona, Nkaambo ndi muumi, anywebo munooli baumi.
Elyo zuba muyooziba kuti ndili muli-Taata, anywebo muli mulindime, amebo ndili mulindinywe.
Oyo uujisi milao yangu, akwiibamba nguundiyanda, Awalo uundiyanda uyooyandwa Taata, amebo ndiyoomuyanda, ndiyoolitondezya kulinguwe.
Judase (kutaamba Iskariote) wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, nkaambo kanzi ncoyooliyubulula kulindiswe, kutali kunyika?
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Na muntu ulandiyanda unoobamba ijwi lyangu, awalo Taata ulamuyanda, tulasika kulinguwe, tukakale awalo,
Oyo uutandiyandi tabambi majwi aangu, alyalo ijwi ndomumvwa talili lyangu, pele ndilya-Taata uwakandituma.
Ndamwaambila makani aya, nencili anywebo.
Pele Mugwasyi, Muuya Uusalala, Taata ngwayootuma muzina lyangu, uyoomwiisya zintu zyoonse, uyoomuyeezya zyoonse nzendakamwaambila.
Ndamusiila luumuno, ndamupa luumuno lwangu, nsimupi mbuli mbwiipa nyika, Myoyo yanu itapengi nokuba kuyoowa.
Mwakamvwa mbwendakamwaambila kuti, Ndainka, alimwi ndaboola kulindinywe. Kuti nomwali kundiyanda, nomwali kukondwa nkaambo nja kuli-Taata, nkaambo Taata mupati kwiinda ndime.
Eno ndamwaambila nentanainka kuti ndaakwiinka mukasyome,
N sikooyoomwaambila limbi makani manjimanji, nkaambo mwami wenyika wasika, walo taakwe ncajisi kulindime,
Pele nkokuti inyika izibe kuti ndamuyanda Taata, akwalo kuti ndacita mbuli mbwaakandilailila Taata. Amunyamuke, tuzwe kuno.
Mitabi yoonse yangu iitazyali micelo wiitema, ayalo mitabi yoonse iizyala micelo wiikokweda kuti izyalisye micelo,
Eno nywebo mulikokwedwe kale nkaambo kejwi ndendamwaambila.
Amukalilile mulindime, amebo mulindinywe. Mbubonya mutabi mbuutakonzya kuzyala micelo wini watanooli kucisiko, anywebo mbubonya tamukonzya, mwatakalilila mulindime.
Ndime cisiko, nywebo muli mitabi. Uukalilila mulindime, amebo mulinguwe, walo ulazyala micelo minjiminji, nkaambo mwaanzaana amebo tamukonzya kucita cintu.
Na muntu takalilili mulindime, wasoogwa mbuli mutabi, wayuminina. Eno bantu biitebba, akwiisowela mumulilo, nkabela yatentwa.
Mwanookalilila mulindime, aalo majwi aangu anookalilila mulindinywe, mwaakukumbila kufumbwa cintu ncomuyanda, ciyooba mpawo,
Taata ulalemezegwa, mwazyala micelo minjiminji, ncomunooli basikwiiya bangu.
Mbubonya Taata mbwandiyanda, anywebo ndamuyanda mbubonya, kamukalilila muluyando lwangu.
Mwanoobamba milao yangu, munookalilila muluyando lwangu, mbubonya mbwembamba milao ya-Taata, akukalilila muluyando lwakwe.
Ndamwaambila makani aya, kuti kubotelwa kwangu kube kulindinywe, akwalo kuti kubotelwa kwanu kukazyulile,
Ngooyu mulao wangu kuti muyandane, mbubonya mbwendamuyanda.
Taakwe uuli aluyando ulwiinda olu, kuti muntu atulile beenzinyina buumi bwakwe.
Munooli beenzuma mwanoozicita nzemwaambila.
Nsicimwaambi limbi kuti muli bazike, nkaambo muzike tezi ncacita simalelaakwe, anu ndamwaamba kuti muli beenzuma, nkaambo zintu zyoonse nzendakamvwa kuli-Taata, ndamuzibya nzizyo.
Endinywe mundisalide, pele ndime emusalide, ndakamusala kuti mukeende akuzyala micelo iitamani, kuti zintu zyoonse nzomuyookumbila kuli-Taata muzina lyangu akamupe.
Ezi zintu ndamulailila kuti muyandane.
Na inyika yamusula, mulizi kuti yali kundisulide kale,
Nomwali bayeeyi inyika, inyika neyali kuyanda bayo, kwalo nkaambo tamuli bayeeyi nyika, pele ndakamusala kuzwa kunyika, nkakaambo ako inyika nciimusulide.
Amuyeeye ijwi ndendakamwaambila kuti, Muzike tali mupati kwiinda simalelaakwe, Kuti bakandipenzya mebo, bayoomupenzya anywebo, kuti nobakabamba ijwi lyangu, nobayoobamba alyanu.
Pele zyoonse zintu ezi bazoomucitila nzizyo nkaambo kezina lyangu, nkaambo tabamuzi uwakandituma.
Kuti nendatakasika kuzoobaambila, nobatajisi cibi. Eno tabakwe mpobati cikazizye cibi cabo.
Uundisula, wasula Taata awalo,
Kuti nendatakacita milimo akati kabo iitacitidwe umbi, nobatajisi cibi, pele eno batubona, batusula mebo a-Taata,
Nkokuti lizyulile ijwi ililembedwe mumulao wabo lyakuti, Bakandisula neentakwe kaambo,
Pele kuti Mugwasyi aboola, ngwenjoomutumina kuzwa kuli-Taata, ngonguwe Muuya wabwini uuzwa kuli-Taata, nguuyoondilungulula,
Anywebo muli bakamboni, nkaambo mwali kukede amebo kuzwida kumatalikilo.
Bayoomutanda muzikombelo, alimwi ciindi ciyoosika kuti oyo uuti kamujaye uyoocita anga, Ndamanina Leza mulimo.
Bayoomucitila zintu ezi nkaambo tabana kumuziba Taata, nemba ndime.
Pele ndamwaambila zintu ezi, kuti ciindi canzizvo caakusika, mukayeeye mbwendakamwaambila nzizyo. Nsikamwaambilide ezi zintu kusaanguna nkaambo ndakacili anywebo,
Pele eno ndainka kulooyo uwakandituma, akati kanu takukwe uundibuzya kuti, Ino uyai?
Pele nkaambo ndakamwaambila zintu ezi, myoyo yanu ilizywide buusu.
Nokubaboobo ndamwaambila kasimpe kuti, Nceceelede kulindinywe kuti ndiinke, nkaambo ndatainka Mugwasyi takooyoosika kulindinywe, pele kuti ndainka ndiyoomutumina nguwe.
Walo asika, uzooipa mulandu inyika aazibi, aabululami, aalubeteko:
aazibi, nkaambo tabandisyomi,
aabululami, nkaambo ndiya kuli-Taata, anywebo tamucindiboni limbi,
aalubeteko, nkaambo mwami wanyika eyi wabetekwa kale.
Ndicili amakani manji aakumwaambila, pele tamwaakonzya sunu,
Nokubaboobo asika oyo Muuya wabwini, uzoomweenzya mubwini boonse. Nkaambo takoozoolyaamba mwini, pele uzooamba ezyo nzyati kamvwe, alimwi uzoomuyubulwida zintu iziciza.
Uzoondilemeka nkaambo uzootola zyangu, uzooziyubulwida ndinywe,
Zintu zyoonse nzyajisi Taata, nzizyangu. Ncendaamba kuti uzootola zyangu, uzooziyubulwida ndinywe.
Kaba kaindi kaniini tamucindiboni limbi, alimwi kaba kaindi kaniini muyoondibona.
