Nkaambo kaako bamwi babasikwiiya bakwe bakabuzyanya kuti, Ino nkokutinzi obo mbwaatwaambila kuti, Kaba kaindi kaniini tamucindiboni limbi, alimwi kaba kaindi muyoondibona, aboobo mbwaamba kuti, Nkaambo ndiya kuli-Taata?
Ncobakaamba kuti, Ino nkokutinzi naamba obo kuti, Kaba kaindi kaniini? Tatuzi ncaamba.
Jesu wali kuzi kuti bali kuyandisya kumubuzya, wakabaambila kuti, Sena mulabuzyanya makani aya ngendaamba, kuti, Kaba kaindi kaniini tamucindiboni, alimwi kaba kaindi kaniini muyoondibona?
Ncobeni ndamwaambila nkasimpe kuti mulalila akoomoka, pele inyika iyoobotelwa. Alimwi muyoousa pele kuusa kwanu kuyoosanduka kubotelwa.
Mwanakazi natumbuka ulausa, nkaambo ciindi cakwe casika. Pele atumbuka, taciyeeyi limbi kuciswa kwakwe, nkaambo kakukondwa kwakwe kuti muntu wazyalwa ansi.
Anywebo mulausa eno pele ndiyoomubona alimwi, myoyo yanu iyookondwa, akwalo kukondwa kwanu takukwe uuti kamunyange.
Kubuzuba obo tamukwe ncomuyoondibuzya. Ncobeni ndamwaambila kasimpe, Kufumbwa cintu ncomuyookumbila kuli-Taata muzina lyangu uyoomupa,
Mbukwaali kuba tamunakumbila cintu muzina lyangu. Amukumbile, muyoopegwa, kuti kukondwa kwanu kuzyulile.
Kubuzuba obo muyookumbila muzina lyangu, Eno nsimwaambili kuti ndiyoomukumbilila kuli-Taata,
nkaambo Taata mwini ulamuyanda, nkaambo kakuti mwandiyanda mebo, alimwi mwasyoma kuti ndakazwida kuli-Taata.
Ndakazwa kuli-Taata, ndakeza ansi. Alimwi ndiisia nyika, ndilaya kuli-Taata.
Basikwiiya bakwe bakati, Langa, eno waamba antangalala, tocaambi mutulabi.
Eno twaziba kuti ulizizi zintu zyoonse, toelede kuti muntu akubuzye. Aboobo twasyoma kuti wakazwa kuli-Leza.
Jesu wakabavuwa kuti, Sena mwasyoma eno?
Amulange, ciindi cilasika, ncobeni ncencico cino, ncomuti mwaike umwi umwi kulizyakwe, mulandisia endike, nokubaboobo nsili endike nkaambo Taata uli amebo.
Ncendamwaambila zintu ezi kuti mulindime mube aluumuno, Munyika mulaba amapenzi, pele amulimbe myoyo, ndakiizunda nyika.
Mbubonya mbookamupa bwami kubantu boonse, kupa buumi ubutamani kulibaabo boonse mbookamupa.
Mboobu buumi ubutamani, kuti bazibe nduwe, Leza mwini-mwini, ooli olike, ayooyo ngookatuma, nguwenya Jesu Kristo.
Ndakakulemya ansi, ndazyulizya mulimo oyo ngookandipa kuti nkuucite,
Eno Taata, kondilemya antoomwe ayebo abulemu obo mbwendakali kujisi nkencili ayebo, inyika kiitanaanzwa,
Ndakazibya zina lyako kubantu mbookandipa abali ansi, Bakali bako, nkabela wabapa ndime, abalo babamba ijwi lyako.
Eno balizi kuti zyoonse nzookandipa zizwa kulinduwe,
nkaambo majwi ngookandipa ndakaapa mbabo. Bakaatambula, bakazibisya kuti nkasimpe ndakazwa kulinduwe, bakasyoma kuti nduwe owakandituma,
Ndabakombela, nsikombeli nyika pele balo mbookandipa, nkaambo mbabako.
Zyoonse zyangu nzizyako, ezyako nzizyangu amebo ndalemezegwa mulimbabo.
Nsicinoolimo limbi munyika, pele aba bacili munyika, mebo ndiza kulinduwe. Taata Oosalala, babambe muzina lyako abo mboondipede, kuti babe bamwi, mbuli mbotubede aswebo.
Nendacili ambabo, ndali kubabamba muzina lyako ndookandipa, Ndali kubatabilila, eno taakwe omwe wabo uusweekede pele mwana uuingaila walo, kuti Magwalo azyulile,
Pele eno ndiza kulinduwe, alimwi makani aya ndaamba ansi, kuti babe akukondwa kwangu ukuzyulide mulimbabo.
Ndakabapa ijwi lyako, pele inyika yakabasula, nkaambo tabali banyika, mbuli mbwentali wenyika amebo.
Nsikumbili kuti ubagwisye munyika, pele kuti ubavune kulooyo mubi.
Tabali banyika mbuli mbwentali wenyika amebo,
Ubasalazye abwini bwako, ijwi lyako mbobwini,
Mbuli mbookandituma munyika, amebo ndakabatuma munyika mbubonya.
Ndalisalazya nkaambo kabo, kuti abalo basalazigwe mubwini.
Tabali aba balo mbenkombela, pele abaabo boonse abandisyoma nkaambo kejwi lyabo,
kuti boonse babe bamwi, mbuli nduwe Taata mboli mulindime, amebo mulinduwe, kuti abalo mbubonya babe mulindiswe, kuti inyika ikasyome kuti nduwe owakandituma.
Abwalo bulemu mbookandipa ndabupa mbabo, kuti babe bamwi mbubonya mbotuli bamwi,
mebo ndibe mulimbabo, ayebo mulindime, kuti bazuzigwe kuba bamwi, kuti inyika ikazibe kuti nduwe owakandituma, nduwe owakabayanda mbubonya mbookali kundiyanda amebo,
Taata ndiyanda kuti abo mbookandipa babe antoomwe amebo nkwembede, kuti babone bulemu bwangu mbookandipa, nkaambo wakali kundiyanda inyika kiitanaanzwa,
Taata ooluleme, inyika teyali kukuzi, pele mebo ndali kukuzi, abaaba bali kuzi kuti nduwe owakandituma.
Eno ndabazibya zina lyako, alimwi ndiyoolizibya kuti luyando ndookali kundiyanda andulo lukabe mulimbabo, amebo mulimbabo.
Awalo Judase, uwakamwaaba, wali kubuzi busena obo, nkaambo Jesu nkwaali kuya kanjikanji antoomwe abasikwiiya bakwe.
Nkaambo kaako Judase, naakaakupegwa nkamu yabamapulisa abasilumamba abakazwa kubapaizi bapati akuba-Farisi, wakasika nkukonya, bakali kujisi malambe aminzenge amasumo.
Eno Jesu, mbwaakali kuzi zyoonse iziti muzide, wakainka nkukonya kubacinga, wakababuzya kuti, Ino nguni ngomuyandaula?
Bakamuvuwa kuti, Jesu waku-Nazareta, Jesu wakati kulimbabo, Ndime uno. Awalo Judase, uwakamwaaba, wakali kwiimvwi abo,
Ndilyonya naakabaambila kuti, Ndime uno, bakainka cifuteesule, bawida ansi.
Nkaambo kaako alimwi wakababuzya kuti, Nguni ngomuyandaula? Bakati, Jesu waku-Nazareta.
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Ndamwaambila kale kuti ndime uno, Na muyandaula ndime, aba abazwe.
Wakaamba obo kuti ijwi lyakwe lizyulile ndyaakaamba kuti, Nsikasweekeledwe naba omwe wabaabo mbookandipa.
Nkabela Simoni Petro uwakalijisi iceba wakalisomona, wakauma muzike wamupaizi mupati, wamukosola kutwi kwalulyo. Izina lyamuzike oyo wakali Maiko.
Mpoonya Jesu wakamwaambila Petro kuti, Bweedezya iceba mucikanda calyo. Sena cinywido ncaakandipa Taata entacinywi?
bakamutola kuli-Anasi kusaanguna, nkaambo wakali mukwe wa-Kayafa, mupaizi mupati kumwaaka oyo.
Eno ngu-Kayafa uwakalaya ba-Juda kuti, Ncecibotu kuti muntu omwe afwide bantu.
pele Petro wakaima kumulyango anze. Nkaambo kaako oyo sikwiiya umwi uwali kuzizilwe kumupaizi mupati, wakazwa anze waakwaambila musimbi uulindila mulyango waakumuleta Petro mukati.
Mpoonya musimbi oyu uwakali kulindila mulyango wakati kuli-Petro, Sena enduwe umwi wabasikwiiya bayooyu muntu? Wakati, Endime pe.
Eno bazike abasilumamba bakali kwiimvwi nkukonya oko, bakakutwide mulilo nkaambo kwali mpeyo, bali kuyota. Awalo Petro wakali abo, wali kwiimvwi ulayota.
Nkabela mupaizi mupati wakabuzya Jesu makani aabasikwiiya bakwe akwiisya kwakwe.
Jesu wakamuvuwa kuti, Ndakaamba cakutasisa kunyika, lyoonse ndali kwiisya muzikombelo amuntempele, oko nkobabunganina ba-Juda boonse, taakwe ncendali kwaambila kumbali pe.
Ino undibuzizyanzi? Buzya abo abakandimvwa makani ngendakali kubaambila, balo balizi ngendakabaambila.
Naakaamba obo umwi wabasilumamba uwali kwiimvwi afwaafwi wakauma Jesu lubayi wakati, Sena mbovuwa obo kumupaizi mupati?
Jesu wakamuvuwa wakati, Kuti nandaamba bubi, lungulula bubi, pele na cililuzi, ino wanduuminanzi?
Nkabela Anasi wakamutuma ulaangidwe kuli-Kayafa, mupaizi mupati.
Eno Simoni Petro wakaliimvwi, ulayota awo. Nkaambo kaako bakamubuzya kuti, Sena yebo toli umwi wabasikwiiya bakwe? Wakakazya wakati, Endime.
Umwi wabazike bamupaizi mupati, uwakali wamukowa wayooyo­ ngwaakakosola kutwi Petro wakati, Sena enduwe ngwendakabona mumuunda antoomwe awalo?
Alimwi Petro wakakazya, ndilyonya muzingili walila.
Mpoonya Pilato wakazwa waya kulimbabo wakati, Ino nkaambonzi nkomwamuletela muntu oyu?
Bakamuvuwa kuti, Atanooli mubi, notwatamuleta kulinduwe.
Nkaambo kaako Pilato wakabaambila wakati, Amumutole nobeni, mumubeteke mbuli mulao wanu. Ba-Juda bakamwaambila kuti, Tatuzumizigwa kujaya muntu.
Kwakaba obo kuti lizyulile ijwi ndyaakaamba Jesu, ilitondezya lufu ndwati kafwe,
Nkaambo kaako Pilato wakanjila alimwi mucibetekelo, wakamwiita Jesu wakumubuzya kuti, Sena nduwe Mwami waba-Juda?
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Sena walyaambila obo omwini, na waambilwa bambi aandime?
Pilato wakavuwa wakati, Sena ndi mu-Juda mebo? Umukowa wako abalo bapaizi bapati bakakuleta kulindime, ino wakacitanzi?
Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Bwami bwangu tabuli bwaansi ano, bwami bwangu nobwali bwaansi ano, abazike bangu nobandilwanina, kuti entatolwa ba-Juda, Pe, bwami bwangu tabuli bwakokuno.

Nkaambo kaako Pilato wakamwaambila kuti, Ena, uli Mwami na? Jesu wakavuwa kuti, Nduwe ooamba kuti ndi Mwami. Ncendakazyalilwa, ncendakasikila ansi ano, kuti nkalungulule bwini. Boonse bana bwini banoomvwa ijwi lyangu.
Pilato wakamwaambila kuti Ino bwini ninzi?
Naakaamba obo wakazwa alimwi akuya kuba-Juda, wakabaambila kuti, Nsijene kaambo mulinguwe.
Pele mulijisi ciyanza, kuti kuciindi caPasika mulaangulwidwa muntu omwe uuangidwe. Sena muyanda kuti mwaangulwide oyu uutegwa Mwami waba-Juda?
Mpoonya bakoompolola alimwi kuti, Oyu pe, pele Baraba, Eno Baraba wali mubbi.
Mpoonya Pilato wakajata Jesu, wakamukwabbaula.
Abalo basinkondo bakaluka musini wamamvwa, bakamusamika nguwo kumutwe wakwe, alimwi bakamusamika cisani cabwami,
bakaswena kulinguwe bakati, Wabonwa, O mwami waba-Juda. Bakamuumauma amaanza aabo.
Alimwi Pilato wakazwa, wabaambila kuti, Amubone, ndamuleta kulindinywe, kuti mukazibe kuti nsijene kaambo kulinguwe.
Mpoonya Jesu wakazwa, ulisamide musini wamamvwa ecisani cabwami. Pilato wakabaambila kuti, Amubone, ngooyu muntu.

Ndilyonya bapaizi bapati abasilumamba babo nobakamubona, bakoompolola bakati, Abambulwe, abambulwe aciingano. Pilato wakabaambila kuti, Amumutole nobeni mumubambule aciingano, nkaambo nsijene mulandu kulinguwe.
Ba-Juda bakamuvuwa kuti, Tulijisi mulao, kumulao oyu ulyeelede kufwa nkaambo walicita Mwana a-Leza.
Ndilyonya Pilato naakamvwa ijwi elyo, wakayoowesya.
Wakanjila alimwi mucibetekelo, wakabuzya Jesu kuti, Ino uzwa kuli yebo? Pele Jesu takamuvuwide.
Nkaambo kaako Pilato wakamubuzya kuti, Sena toambi kulindime, tozi kuti ndili abwami bwakuti ukabambulwe aciingano, abwalo bwami bwakukwaangulula?
Jesu wakamuvuwa kuti, Nowatakapegwa bwami kuzwa kujulu, nowatalijisi nguzu kulindime, nkaambo kaako oyo uwakandyaaba kulinduwe nguujisi cibi iciinda cako.

Eno kuzwa ciindi eco Pilato wali kuyanda kumwaangulula, pele ba-Juda bakoompololesya bakati, Kuti wamwaangulula muntu oyu, toli mweenzinyina Kaisara. Woonse muntu uulipa kami-kami ngusinkondonyina Kaisara.
Nkaambo kaako Pilato naakamvwa majwi aya, wakaleta Jesu anze, wakakala acuuno cabwami abusena ubutegwa Ibbuwa lyamabwe, muci-Hebrayo kutegwa Gabata,
Obu bwali buzuba bwakulibamba, ciindi caamutwe esikati, Wakabaambila ba-Juda kuti, Amubone, ngooyu Mwami wanu.
Pele bakoompololesya kuti, Azwe, azwe, mumubambule aciingano. Pilato wakabaambila kuti, Sena nkabambule Mwami wanu? Bapaizi bapati bukavuwa kuti, Tatujisi Mwami pele Kaisara walo.
Mpoonya wakabapa nguwe kuti abambulwe aciingano.
Elyo bakamujata Jesu bamutola, walo wakaliyumwida mwini ciingano, Bakaya kubusena ubutegwa Kaanza, nkokutegwa muci-Hebrayo Golgota,
nkobakamubambula aciingano, abamwi bobile abakali awalo, akumwi kubbazu omwe, akumwi omwe, walo Jesu akati.
Alimwi Pilato wakalemba­ bulembo, wakabubika aciingano. Bulembo bwali kuti, Ngooyu Jesu waku-Nazareta, Mwami waba-Juda.
Eno ba-Juda banjibanji bakabala bulembo obu, nkaambo oko nkwaakabambwidwa Jesu kwakali kufwaafwi kumunzi. Alimwi majwi aya akalembwa muci-Hebrayo, amuci-Roma, amuci-Helene,
Nkaambo kaako bapaizi bapati baba-Juda bakamwaambila Pilato bakati, Utalembi kuti, Mwami waba-Juda, pele lemba kuti, Wakaamba kuti, Ndi Mwami waba-Juda,
Pilato wakavuwa wakati, Ncendalemba ndicilembede.

Eno basinkondo, nobakamubambula Jesu aciingano, bakabweza zyakusama zyakwe, bakazicita zibeela zyone kuti baabane, umwi umwi abe acibeela comwe, acalo cibaki mbubonya, eno cibaki teecakali amuluko, cakaliswaangene coonse,
Nkaambo kaako bakalyaambya beni kuti, Tutacizapauli, pele atuwaale cisolo, na cilaba cani, Kwakaba obo kuti Lugwalo luzyulile lwakuti,
Bakaabilana zyakusama zyangu,
Bakawaalila cibaki cangu cisolo,
Nzeezi nzobakacita basinkondo.
Eno oko kuciingano ca-Jesu kwakali kwiimvwi banyina, awalo mwanaakwabo banyina, Maliya muka-Klopa, awalo Maliya Magadelene.
Nkaambo kaako Jesu naakabona banyina, awalo sikwiiya ngwaakali kuyanda, uwakali kwiimvwi mpoonya, wakaambila banyina kuti, Mwanakazi, bona, ngooyu mwanaako.
Eno wakamwaambila sikwiiya kuti, Bona, mbaaba banyoko. Kuzwida ciindi eco sikwiiya oyo wakabatola kumunzi wakwe.
Kwakali kabia akazywide waini uupapa. Nkaako bakanika nsinsa muwaini oyo uupapa, biisomeka kusumo akwiitola kumulomo wakwe.
Eno Jesu naakatambula waini oyo uupapa wakati, Kulimanide, Nkabela wakakotamika mutwe wakwe, wakosoka.
Nkaambo kaako basinkondo bakasika, bazootyolaula maulu aamutaanzi, aaumwi wabaabo abakabambwidwe awalo.
Pele nobakasika kuli-Jesu, bakabona kuti ulifwide kale, tabakamutyolawide maulu aakwe.
Nekubaboobo umwi wabasinkondo wakabweza sumo, wakamuyasa kubbazu, ndilyonya kwakazwa bulowa amaanzi.
Oyo uwakabona wakaba kamboni, bukamboni bwakwe bulisinizizye. Ulizi kuti tabeji, kuti anywebo mukasyome,
Nkaambo zintu ezi zyakacitwa kuti Magwalo azyulile aamba kuti, Cifuwa cakwe neciba comwe tacikooyootyolwa.
­Alimwi lumwi Lugwalo lwaamba kuti, Bayoomulangilila ngobayaside.
Awalo Nikodemo wakasika, nguwenya uwakazide kuliJesu masiku kusaanguna, wakaleta tununkilizyo utuvwelene, ututegwa mura aalo, mweelwe wamwaanda wampondo.
Mpoonya bakabweza mutunta wa-Jesu, bakuuzambaila zisani zituba, antoomwe amicelo iinunka kabotu, mbubonya mbuli ciyanza ncobazika ba-Juda,
Eno mpoonya awo mpaakabambwidwa akali cuumbwe cipya icitanazikidwe muntu.
Eno nkaambo kabuzuba bwakulibamba bwaba-Juda, bakamuzika Jesu mumonya omo, nkaambo cuumbwe cakali afwaafwi.
Nkaako wakazuzaana, wakaya kuli-Simoni Petro, akulooyo sikwiiya umwi ngwaali kuyanda Jesu, wabaambila kuti, Bamugwisya Mwami kucuumbwe, eno tatuzi nkobakamubika.
Nkaambo kaako Petro wakainka, ayooyo umwi sikwiiya, bakaya kucuumbwe.
Bakazuza boonse bobile, pele oyo sikwiiya umwi wakamusia Petro, wasaanguna kusika kucuumbwe,
Naakasondela mukati wakabona zisani zituba mpozili, nokubaboobo takanjide,
Simoni Petro awalo wasika, uza bumucilide, wanjila mukati mucuumbwe, wabona zisani zituba mpozili,
acalo cisani icakali kuzingulusidwe kumutwe, teecakali azyeenzinyina, pele cakali kuvungidwe aanka.
Mpoonya umwi sikwiiya uwakasaanguna kusika kucuumbwe, awalo wanjila, wabona, wasyoma.
Nkaambo tabalinaziba Magwalo, kuti ulyeelede kubuka kuzwa kukufwa.
Mpoonya basikwiiya bakabweeda kulibo.
Pele Maliya wakaliimvwi anze lyacuumbwe, ulalila, Naakacili kulila wakasondela mucuumbwe,
wabona baangelo bobile abasamide izituba balikede, umwi kumutwe, umwi kumitandabilo, mpowali kulede mutunta wa-Jesu.
Bakamubuzya kuti, Omwanakazi, ulilanzi? Wakabaambila kuti, Nkaambo bagwisya Mwami wangu, nsizinkobamubika.
Naakaamba obo, wakacebuka kusule, wabona Jesu uliimvwi, tali kuzi kuti ngu-Jesu
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Omwanakazi, ulilanzi? Nguni ngoyandaula? Walo wakayeeya kuti nguubeleka mumuunda, wamwaambila wati, Mwami, na nduwe owamugwisya kuno, ndaambila nkowamubika, nkamutole.
Jesu wati kulinguwe, Maliya. Wacebuka, wamwaambila muci-Hebrayo kuti, Raboni, nkokuti, Mufundisi.
Jesu wamwaambila wati, Utandijati, nkaambo nsinatanta kuli-Taata, Pele koya kubanabakwesu, ukabaambile kuti, Ndatanta kuli-Taata akuli-Uso, kuli-Leza wangu akuli-Leza wanu.
Maliya Magadalene wakapiluka kuyooambila basikwiiya kuti, Ndamubona Mwami, ambwaakamwaambila makani aya.
Naakaamba obo wakabatondezya maanza aakwe ebbazu lyakwe. Basikwiiya bakakondwa nobakabona Mwami.
Nkabela Jesu wakabaambila alimwi kuti, Amube aluumuno, mbubonya mbwaakandituma Taata, amebo ndamutuma mbubonya.
Naakaamba obo wakafula muuya kulimbabo, wabaambila kuti, Amutambule Muuya Uusalala,
Kufumbwa bantu mbomujatila zibi, balajatilwa nzizyo, abaabo mbomukaka kujatila zibi zyabo, banoozijisi.

Basikwiiyanyina ncobakamwaambila­ kuti, Twakamubona Mwami. Pele wakabaambila kuti, Ndatalubona lubata lwanembe mumaanza aakwe, akubika munwe wangu mucipulo canembe, akubika ijanza lyangu kulubazu lwakwe, nsikoozoosyoma pe.
Mpoonya waambila Tomaso kuti, Tambika munwe wako, ubone maanza aangu. Tambika ijanza lyako, ulibike mulubazu lwangu. Utabi muntu uutasyomi, pele uusyoma.
Tomaso wakamuvuwa kuti, O mwami wangu, Leza wangu.
Jesu wakamwaambila kuti, Tomaso, nowandibona wasyoma, bali acoolwe abo abatandibwene, nokubaboobo balasyoma.
Zitondezyo zimwi zinji Jesu wakazicita kumeso aabasikwiiya bakwe, izitalembedwe mubbuku eli.
Anu ezi zyakalembwa kuti mukasyome kuti Jesu ngu-Kristo, Mwana a-Leza, akuti kukusyoma mukabe abuumi muzina lyakwe.
Munsi lyakooko Jesu wakalibonya alimwi kulibasikwiiya kulwizi lwa-Tiberiya, mboobu mbwaakalibonya,
Kwakali antoomwe Simoni Petro, a-Tomaso uutegwa mwana wamayanga, a-Natanayeli wakuKana mu-Galilaya, abalo bana ba-Zebedayo, abamwi bobile babasikwiiya bakwe,
Simoni Petro wakabaambila kuti, Ndiya kukuzela, Bamwaambila kuti, Aswebo tulaya ayebo. Mpoonya bakainka, bakanjila mubwaato, eno masiku ayo takukwe ncobakaca,
Pele nobwakali kuya buca, Jesu wakaima ankomwe, nokubaboobo basikwiiya tabali kuzi kuti ngu-Jesu,
Nkaambo kaako Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Nobana, sena mulijisi cakulya? Bakamuvuwa kuti, Pe, pe,
Nkabela wakabaambila kuti, Amuwaale lusabwe kululyo lwabwaato, eno mulaca, Aboobo bakaluwaala nkuko, eno bakakakilwa kulukwela nkaambo kanswi zinjizinji.
Nkaambo kaako sikwiiya oyo Jesu ngwaali kuyanda wakaamba kuli-Petro kuti, Ngo-Mwami, Simoni Petro naakamvwa kuti ngo-Mwami, wakasama cibaki cakwe (nkaambo wakali ecinswe), wakasotokela mulwizi.
Pele basikwiiya bamwi bakeza mubwaato buniini (nkaambo tokwali kulekule ankomwe, pele mbuli ntaamo izili mwaanda), bali kuza bukwela lusabwe uluzywide nswi.
Nobakaakusika kunkomwe, bakabona mulilo wamasizi awo, enswi zilibikidwe mpoonya, ensima.
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Amulete nswi nzomwaca eno.
Simoni Petro wakatanta kuyookwelela kunkomwe lusabwe uluzywide nswi mpati, zyali mwaanda uuli amakumi osanwe muzitatu, nokubaboobo nezivula boobo, tazikazapwide lusabwe pe.
Jesu wakabaambila kuti, Amuboole mulye. Takukwe uwakalimba moyo wakumubuzya kuti, Nduweni? mbobali kuzi kuti ngo-Mwami.
Jesu waboola, wabweza nsima wabapa, enswi mbubonya.
Eci nceciindi catatu ncaakalibonya Jesu kulibasikwiiya bakwe, kabukide kulibafwide.
Alimwi wakamubuzya alwabili kuti, Simoni, omwana a-Jona, sena ulandiyandisya? Wakati kulinguwe, Ii, Mwami, ulizi kuti ndilakuyanda. Wakamwaambila kuti, Embela mbelele zyangu.

Wamwaambila alwatatu kuti, Simoni, omwana a-Jona, sena ulandiyanda? Petro wakausa nkaambo wakamubuzya alwatatu kuti, Sena ulandiyanda? Wakamwaambila kuti, O mwami, ulizi zintu zyoonse, ulizi kuti ndilakuyanda, Jesu wamwaambila kuti, Sanina mbelele zyangu,
Ncobeni ndakwaambila kasimpe, Nowacili mulombe, wakalyaanga omwini, wakali kweenda mbowali kuyanda. Pele waakuba munene, uyoololola maanza aako, umbi uyookwaanga akuyookutola nkotayandi,
Wakaamba obo kutondezya lufu ndwati kalemye Leza andulo. Naakaamba obo wakamwaambila kuti, Ndicilila.
Eno Petro acebuke, wabona sikwiiya oyo Jesu ngwaali kuyanda, wali kubacilide, Ngonguwe uwakayaama acamba ca-Jesu kuciindi cakulalila, naakabuzya kuti, O mwami, nguuli uuti kwaabe?
Petro naakamubona wakabuzya Jesu kuti, Mwami, ino oyu akacite buti?
Jesu wakamuvuwa kuti, Antela ndanooyanda kuti akandilindilile mane nkaboole. Ino ayo makani aako na? Ndicilila buyo yebo.

Majwi aya akabusya mpuwo akati kabeenzinyina, kuti oyo sikwiiya takooyoofwa. Nokubaboobo Jesu taakwe naakaamba kuti takooyoofwa, pele kuti, Antela ndiyanda kuti andilindilile mane nkaboole, ino ayo makani aako na?
Teofilo, mulugwalo lutaanzi ndakalungulula zintu zyoonse nzyaakasaanguna kucita Jesu akwiisya,
mane kusikila kubuzuba, mbwaakata­ mbulwa kujulu, kamanide kale kubalailila, a-Muuya Uusalala, baapostolo mbaakasalide,
Munsi lyakupenga kwakwe wakalitondezya kulimbabo, muumi, ezitondezyo zinjizinji, wakali kubonwa mbabo mazuba aali makumi one, ulaamba makani aa-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Naakali kubungene ambabo, wakabalailila kuti, Mutazwi mu-Jerusalemu, pele mucilindilile cisyomezyo ca-Taata, eco ncomwakamvwa kulindime.
Nkaambo ncobeni Johane wakabapatizya amaanzi, kwalo nywebo muyoobapatizigwaa-Muuya Uusalala kaatanainda mazuba manjimanji.
Nobakabungene bakamubuzya kuti, O mwami, sena ulabweedezya bwami ku-Israyeli kuliceecino ciindi?
Wakati kulimbabo, Takuli kwanu kuziba ziindi, naaba mazuba ngaabika Taata kubwami bwakwe mwini.
Kwalo muyootambula nguzu, wasika alindinywe Muuya Uusalala, muyooba bakamboni bangu muno mu-Jerusalemu, amu-Judaya moonse, amu-Samariya, mane kusikila kumamanino aanyika.
Naakaamba obo, kabacimulangilide, wakasumpulwa, ikumbi lyamutambula, teebakacili kumubona,
Nkabela nobakacili kuululala kujulu, naakacili kuya, baalumi bobilo bakaima abalo, balisamide masani aatuba.
Bati, Nywebo nobaalumi ba-Galilaya, mwiimvwinzi akulanga kujulu? Oyu Jesu uwatolwa kujulu uwazwa kulindinywe, uyooboola mbubonya mbomwamubona ulaya kujulu.
Elyo bakabweeda ku-Jerusalemu, bazwa kucilundu icitegwa Elaioni, icili kufwaafwi ku-Jerusalemu, kubaanga lweendo lwa-Sabata.
Eno nobakanjila, bakatanta muŋanda yamujulu, mwakakede ba-Petro, a-Johane, Jakobo, a-Andreya, Filipo a-Tomaso, Bartolomayo a-Matayo, Jakobo wa-Alifayo a-Simoni mu-Zelote, a-Judase wa-Jakobo.
Aba boonse bakajatisya kukomba amoyo omwe, bakali antoomwe abakaintu, a-Mariya banyina Jesu, abanabakwabo Jesu.
Kumazuba ayo Petro wakanyamuka, waima akati kababunyina. Bantu abakabungene awo bati kabe mwaanda uuli amakumi obile.
Wati, Nobaalumi bakwesu, kwali kweelede kuti kuzyulile Lugwalo ndwaakaamba Muuya Uusalala kumulomo wa-Davida, olo uluamba Judase, uwakali musololi wabaabo abakajata Jesu.
Nkaambo wakali kubalwa aswebo, wakatambula caabilo cakwe kumulimo oyu.
Eno walo wakaula muunda acivolo cabubi bwakwe, wakalikankata akukwamuka akati, kwakafwesuka mala aakwe oonse.
Oku kwakamvwigwa kulimbabo boonse abakali kukala mu-Jerusalemu, mane oyo muunda wakategwa Akeldama mumwaambo wabo, nkokuti, Muunda wabulowa.
Nkaambo kulilembedwe mubbuku lyantembauzyo kuti,
Iŋanda yakwe alibe tongo,
Kutakali muntu kulindilyo.
Alimwi,
Ubusena bwakwe abukale umbi.
Nkaambo kaako kuleelede kuti tusale omwe wabaalumi mbotwakali abo ciindi coonse Mwami Jesu ncali kwiilingana aswebo,
kuzwa kulubapatizo lwa-Johane, mane kusikila kubuzuba mbwaakagwisigwa kulindiswe, kuti abe kamboni wakubuka kwakwe antoomwe aswebo.
Ndilyonya bakabika bobile: Josefa uutegwa Barsaba, limwi zina lyakwe ngu-Justo, a-Matiya,
Bakakomba bati, Yebo O mwami, oozi myoyo yaboonse, tutondezye ngowasala kulibaaba bobile,
kuti atole busena kumulimo oyu wabwaapostolo, mbwaakaleya Judase, naakaya kubusena bwakwe mwini.
Nkabela bakawaala cisolo, icisolo camuwida Matiya, elyo wabalwa abaapostolo abali kumi muumwi.
Nobwakasika buzuba bwa-Pentekoste, bakali antoomwe boonse,
Ndilyonya kwakazwa mujulu muzunzumina mbuli guwo ilyuungisya, wakazuzya ŋanda yoonse mobakakede.
Kwakabasikila milaka; iili mbuli mulilo, yakabakala umwi umwi.
Boonse bakazyula Muuya Uusalala, batalika kwaamba myaambo imbi, mbubonya mbwaakabaambya Muuya.
Eno kwakaliko mu-Jerusalemu ba-Juda, bantu basyomi abakazwa kumasi oonse enyika.
Nokwakamvwigwa muzunzumina oyo, akabungana makamu makamu aabantu, bazingwa nkaambo umwi umwi wakabamvwa balaamba mwaambo wakwe mwini.
Baankamana, bayoowa bati, Sena aba abaamba tabali ba-Galilaya boonse?
Kuli buti ino, twamvwa toonse mwaambo wesu ngotwakazyalilwa?
Toba-Pati aba-Midi aba-Elami, tobamwi totukala ku-Mesopotamiya, ku-Judaya, aku-Kapadokiya, ku-Ponto aku-Asiya,
ku-Frugiya aku-Pamfuliya, ku-Egepita ezisi zya-Libiya izibambene a-Kurene, tobeenzu totuzwa ku-Roma, toba-Juda antoomwe abakasanduka,
toba-Krete aba-Arabiya, twabamvwa balaamba milimo mipati ya-Leza mumyaambo yesu,
Nkabela boonse bakaankamana, bazingwa, babuzyanya kuti, Ino eci cili buti?
Bamwi basabula bati, Bakuta mbote iilweela.
Kwalo Petro wakaima abaapostolo abali ikumi muumwi wakoompolola, wakati, Nobaalumi baku-Judaya, anywebo nyoonse nomukala mu-Jerusalemu, azibwe ndinywe makani aya, muswiilile majwi aangu.
Aba tabakoledwe pe, mbuli mbomuyeeya, ciindi cicili cacikasaalizi buyo.
Pele eci ncencico ncaakaamba musinsimi joeli kuti,
Leza ulaamba kuti, Kumazuba aakumana
Ndiyootila Muuya wangu atala lyabantu boonse,
Bana banu balombe abasimbi bayoosinsima,
Baalumi banu bapya bayoobona zilengaano,
Abanene banu bayoolota ziloto.
Atala lyabacinkombwa bangu baalumi abakaintu,
Ndiyootila Muuya wangu kumazuba ayo,
Bayoosinsima.
Ndiyootondezya malele mujulu,
Azitondezyo ansi,
Bulowa, amulilo, asikunku wabusi.
Izuba liyoosanduka kusia,
Amweezi uyoosanduka bulowa,
Kabutanasika buzuba bwa-Jehova,
Obo bupati bulemu.
Kuyooba kuti umwi umwi uukomba muzina lya-Jehova uyoofutulwa.

Nobaalumi ba-Israyeli, amuswiilile majwi aya, Ngaa-Jesu wa-Naza-reta, mwaalumi ngomwakatondekelwa Leza, emilimo mipati amalele azitondezyo, Leza nzyaakacita anguwe akati kanu, mbubonya mbuli mbomuzi nobeni.
Walo wakaabwa, mbubonya mbuli Leza mbwaakakanzide akuziba, nywebo mwakamubambuzya akumujazya maanza aabatakwe mulao.
Pele Leza wakamubusya, wamwaangulula kumapenzi aalufu, nkaambo taakwe lwali kukonzya kuti lumujate.
Davida ulaamba aanguwe kuti,
Ndakabona Jehova lyoonse uli kubusyu bwangu,
Uli kululyo lwangu kuti entazunganizigwa.
Aboobo moyo wangu wabotelwa,
Mulaka wangu wasekelela,
Alimwi mubili wangu unookede alulangililo,
Nkaambo tokooyoosia muuya wangu kucikalilo cabafwa,
Tokooyooaba Uusalala wako kuti abone kubola.
Wandizibya nzila zyabuumi,
Uyoondizuzya akubotelwa kubusyu bwako.
Nobaalumi bakwesu, ndimulungulwide aamupati Davida, kuti wakafwa akuzikwa, cuumbwe cakwe nkocili kulindiswe asunu,
Aboobo mbwaakali musinsimi, wakali kuzi kuti Leza wakakonka kulinguwe acikonko cakuti, kubana bakwe kuyoozwa umwi uuti kakale acuuno cakwe cabwami,
eno mbwaakabona obo, wakaamba aakubuka kwa-Kristo kuti muuya wakwe tuukasiidwe kucikalilo cabafwa, mubili wakwe tuukabolede.
Oyu Jesu Leza wakamubusya, swebo toonse tuli bakamboni bamakani aya.
Mbwaakasumpwidwa kujanza lyalulyo lya-Leza, alimwi mbwaakatambula kuli-Wisi cisyomezyo ca-Muuya Uusalala, watila eci ncomubona ancomwamvwa.
Nkaambo Davida takainkide kujulu, pele ulaamba mwini kuti,
Jehova wakaambila Mwami wangu wati,
Kala kujanza lyangu lyalulyo.
Mane nkacite basinkondonyoko
Babe citandabalilo camatende aako.
Aboobo iŋanda yoonse ya-Israyeli izibisye kuti oyu Jesu nguwenya ngomwakabambula, Leza wamucita abe Mwami a-Kristo.
Nobakamvwa obo bakayaswa kumyoyo, bati kuli-Petro akulibamwi baapostolo, Nobaalumi bakwesu, ino tucite buti?
Ndilyonya Petro wakabaambila kuti, Amusanduke, mubapatizigwe umwi umwi muzina lyaJesu Kristo, mujatilwe zibi zyanu, nomwati tambule cipego ca-Muuya Uusalala.
Nkaambo cisyomezyo cili kulindinywe, akubana banu, akuliboonse abali kule, mbati kaite Mwami Leza wesu,
Amakani amwi manjimanji wakabakananina akubakombelezya wati, Amulifutule kulibasunu ababisya.
Mpoonya abo abakatambula makani aakwe bakabapatizigwa, mbubonya buzuba obo bakayungililwa bantu bati kabe myaanda iili makumi otatwe,
Balo bakacilisungweede mukwiisya kwabaapostolo, amukuswaana muuya, amukukomona mukamu, amukukomba.
Bantu boonse bakasikilwa kuyoowa. Malele azitondezyo zinjizinji zyakacitwa baapostolo.
Boonse basyomi bakali antoomwe, basanganya zyoonse nzobali kujisi,
bauzya lubono lwabo ezintu zyabo, baabana boonse mbuli kubula kwaumwi umwi.
Mazuba oonse bakali kusungweede amoyo omwe muntempele, akukomona mukamu mumaanda aabo, balya zilyo zyabo akubotelwa amyoyo iituba,
balalumba Leza akukonda bantu boonse, Mazuba amazuba Mwami wakabayungilila abo abali kufutulwa.
Eno kuciindi cakukomba, cacikasaalizi, Petro a-Johane bakanjila muntempele,
Umwi mwaalumi uwakali kutyokede kuzwa mwida lyabanyina wakali kunantulwa, balamubika mazuba oonse amulyango wentempele, uutegwa Mubotu, kuti akumbile zipego kulibaabo abanjila muntempele.
Walo naakabona Petro a-Johane nobati njile muntempele, wakabakumbila kuti apegwe.
Nkabela Petro wakamulangisya, awalo Johane, wakati, Tulange,
Wakabalanga, wakayeeya kutambula cintu kulimbabo.
Ndilyonya Petro wakati kulinguwe, Insiliva niiba ngolida nsijisi pe, kwalo neenjisi ndakupa, Muzina lya-Jesu Kristo wa-Nazareta, nyamuka, uende.
Wakamujata ejanza lyalulyo, wamwiimikizya. Ndilyonya maulu aakwe engo zyakwe zyakajana nguzu,
wanyamuka, waima, weenda, wanjila abalo muntempele, bweenda akusotauka akulumbaizya Leza,
Abantu boonse bakamubona uleenda akulumbaizya Leza,
bamuziba kuti ngonguwe uwakali kukalila kupegwa ku-Mulyango Mubotu wentempele, baankamana akuyoowa kuliceeco icakacitika kulinguwe.
Eno naakacili kujatilila ba-Petro a-Johane, bantu boonse bakababunganina mukota litegwa lya-Solomoni, bakaankamanisya.
Petro naakabona obo wakabavuwa wakati, Nobaalumi ba-Israyeli, ino muyoowelanzi aceeci? Mutulangisisyanzi mboiti oyu muntu twamweenzya munguzu zyesu na kukululama kwesu?
Leza wa-Abrahamu, awa-Izaka, awa-Jakobo, Leza wamatateesu, walemya Jesu Mwanaakwe, ngomwakaaba, mwakamukazya kubusyu bwa-Pilato, walo naakali kukanza kumwaangulula,
Kwalo mwakamukazya Uusalala Uululeme, mwakakumbila kupegwa muntu mujayi.
Anu Mwami wabuumi mwakamujaya, ngwaakabusya Leza kulibasikufwa, ncotuli bakamboni swebo,
Eno nkaambo kakusyoma zina lyakwe, oyu muntu ngomubona, ngomuzi, lyamuyumya zina lyakwe, ii, lusyomo uluzwa kulinguwe lwamupa kupona oku kumbele lyanu nyoonse,
Eno bakwesu, ndilizi kuti mwakacita obo mukutaziba, abalo bami banu mbubonya,
Pele Leza wakazyulizya oko nkwaakaambide amilomo yabasinsimi boonse, kuti Kristo wakwe uleelede kupenga.
Aboobo amweempe, musanduke, kuti zibi zyanu zijatilwe, kusike ziindi zyakulyookezya izizwa kubusyu bwaJehova,
atume Kristo ngomwakaimikizizigwa, nguwe Jesu,
uuelede kutambulwa julu mane kube ziindi zyakubukulusya zintu zyoonse, nzyaakaamba Leza kumilomo yabasinsimi bakwe basalala kuzwa kumalengelo aanyika,
Ncobeni Musa wakateeti, Jehova Leza uyoomubusizya musinsimi kubanabakwanu uuli mbuli ndime, muyoomuswiilila walo kumakani oonse kufumbwa ngati kaambe kulindinywe.
Eno kuyooba kuti muntu woonse uutakooyooswiilila musinsimi oyo uyoofwidilila, takoonoociliko kubantu,
Ii, basinsimi boonse kuzwida kuli-Samueli akulibaabo abakatobela, boonse abakali kwaamba, bakasinsima mazuba aya.
Nywebo muli bana babasinsimi, abacizuminano ncaakacita Leza kumauso aanu naakaambila Abrahamu kuti, Masi oonse aanyika ayoolongezegwa kubana bako.
Leza naakabusya Mwanaakwe, wakasaanguna kumutuma kulindinywe, kuti amulongezye kukumusandula nyoonse kuzibi zyanu.
Eno nobakacili kwaamba kubantu, kwakabasikila bapaizi, asilumamba wacikombelo, aba-Saduki,
bali bakali nkaambo baiisya bantu, balaamba kubuka kwa-Jesu kubafu,
Nkabela bakabajata, bababika muntolongo mane bwaca, nkaambo kwali kumazuba,
Kwalo banjibanji abakamvwa makani bakasyoma, eno mweelwe wabaalumi wati kabe makumi osanwe emyaanda.
Nobwakaca kwakabungana mu-Jerusalemu beendelezi abaalu abalembi,
a-Ana mupaizi mupati, a-Kayafa, a-Johane, a-Alesandro, ambabo boonse basazinyina mupaizi mupati,
Nobakabaimika akati kabo, bakababuzya kuti, Ino ninguzunzi, ndizinanzi ndomwakacitya ceeci nywebo?
Mpoonya Petro mbwaakazywide Muuya Uusalala wati kulimbabo, Nywebo nobami bacisi, anobapati baba-Israyeli,
notubetekwa sunu aakucita kubotu nkwaacitilwa oyu muntu cilema mbwaaponyegwa,
akuzibwe nywebo nyoonse, acisi coonse ca-Israyeli, kuti muzina lya-Jesu Kristo wa-Nazareta, ngomwakabambula, ngwaakabusya Leza kubafu, muzina eli oyu ncaimvwi kumbele lyanu uliponede.
Oyu ndibbwe ilyakasampaulwa ndinywe nomuyaka, ilyacitwa mutwe wacooko.
Takukwe lufutuko kuluumbi naba omwe pe, nkaambo takukwe zina limbi ansi ilipegwa bantu, ndotweelede kufutulwa andilyo,
Nobakabona camba ca-Petro a-Johane, anu baziba kuti mbantu buyo abatakaiya, bayoowa, babaziba kuti bali kweenda a-Jesu.
Eno nobabona muntu oyo uwakaponyegwa uliimvwi ambabo babula ncobakazya,
Noba-kabalailila kuti bazwe alubeta, babuzyanya ulwabo beni bati,
Ino tukaba-cite buti bantu aba? Nkaambo kwalibonya kulimbabo boonse abali mu-Jerusalemu, kuti malele mapati akacitwa mbabo, eno aswebo tatukonzyi kucikazya.
Pele kuti citacimwaike akati kabantu atubaamhilisisye kuti bataambili muntu naba omwe mulileeli zina,
Nobakabaita bakalailila kuti bataambi akaniini pe nekuba kukambauka muzina lya-Jesu,
Kwalo Petro a-Johane babavuwa kuti, Na kuliluleme kumbele lya-Leza kuswiilila ndinywe kwiinda Leza, amulisalile.
Nkaambo tatukonzyi swebo kutaamba nzotwakabona akumvwa.
Nkabela nobakabaambilisisya alimwi babaleka, tabakajene cintu cakuti babaume nkaambo kabantu, nkaambo boonse bali kulumbaizya Leza aceeco icakacitwa,
Nkaambo oyo muntu uwakacitwa malele aya aakuponyegwa wakaindide kale myaka iili makumi one.
Nobakalekwa bakabweeda kubeenzinyina, balungulula oonse ngobakabaambila bapaizi bapati abaalu,
Balo nobakamvwa bakoompolola kuliLeza ejwi lyamoyo omwe bati, Osimatwangeesu, owakaanza ijulu enyika alwizi, azyoonse izili mulindulo,
owakaamba a-Muuya Uusalala kumuloma wamuzike wako Davida kuti,
Nkaambonzi ncobatingilala bamasi?
Bantu bayeeyelanzi zyabuyo?
Bami baansi bakalibamba.
Beendelezi babungana antoomwe,
Kulwanya Jehova a-Kristo wakwe.
Nkasimpe muluuno munzi kwakabungana ba-Heroda a-Ponto Pilato, antoomwe abamasi, abantu ba-Israyeli, kuti balwanye Jesu, Mwanaako Uusalala ngookananika,
bacite zyoonse zili buti izyakakanzidwe kujanza lyako akuluyando lwako, kuti zibewo.
Lino Jehova, bona inkonkomwezyo zyabo, ugwasye bazike bako, baambe makani aako akaanzambwene kanji.
Kovungununa ijanza lyako kukuponya, kuti kucitwe zitondezyo amalele muzina lya-Mwanaako Uusalala Jesu.
Lino nobakamana kukomba, cibunganino cabo cakazungaanizigwa, elyo boonse bakazuzigwa Muuya Uusalala, nkabela bakatalika kwaamba makani aa-Leza akaanzambwene.
Nkabela inkamu yoonse yabasyomi kiili amoyo omwe amuuya omwe. Kakutakwe muntu akati kabo uwakaamba kuti, Zintu nzenjisi nzizyangu ndemwini, pele zyoonse zyakali zyabanamaleya.
Nkabela baapostolo bakali kulungulula canguzu loko makani aabubuke bwa-Mwami Jesu, alimwi luzyalo lupati lwakali abo boonse.
Lino kakutakwe muntu akati kabo uwakabula cintu, nkaambo kakuti boonse abakajisi myuunda na maanda bakazyuuzya,
bakaleta mali aamakwebo, baabika kumaulu aabaapostolo, elyo umwi aumwi wakaabilwa mbubonya mbwaakabulide.
Lino Josefa, uwakaulikwa kubaapostolo izina lya-Barnaba (nkukwaamba kuti Mwana waluumbulizyo), mu-Levi uuzwa kucisi ca-Kupro,
mbwaakajisi muunda, wakauuzya, wakaleta mali aawo, waabika kumaulu aabaapostolo­.
Pele mwaalumi umwi uutegwa Hananiya, abanakwe Safira, wakauzya lubono.
Eno amwi mali ngaakauzya wakaasisa, abanakwe abalo bakazumina, amwi waaleta, waabika kumatende aabaapostolo.
Ndilyonya Petro wakaamba wati, Hananiya, nkaambonzi Saatani ncaazuzya moyo wako kuti ucenge Muuya Uusalala, usise amwi mali ngookauzya muunda?
Nowacikede sena towakali wako? Anowauzigwa, sena towali kunguzu zyako? Ino wayeeyelanzi makani ayo mumoyo wako? Tobejede kubantu pe, wabejela Leza.
Hananiya naakamvwa majwi ayo, wakawida ansi, wafwa. Nkabela bakayoowesya boonse abakamvwa makani.
Elyo bakanyamuka baalumi, bamuvunga, bamutola, baakumuzika.
Nokwakati inde maola otatwe mukaintu wakwe wakanjila, katezi icakacitwa,
Petro wamwaambila kuti, Ndyaambila na mwakauzya muunda mali aali boobu? Wakavuwa kuti, Ii, ali boobo.
Petro wakati kulinguwe, Mwazumininanzi kusunka Muuya wa-Mwami? Bona matende aabaabo abaakuzika mwaalumaako ali amulyango, bazookutola ayebo.
Ndilyonya wawa kumatende aakwe, wafwa, Baalumi banjila, bamujana ulifwide, bamutola, baakumuzika kumwaalumaakwe.
Eno kwakasika kuyoowa kupati mumbungano yoonse, akulimbabo boonse abakamvwa makani aya.
Kumaanza aabaapostolo kwakali kucitwa zitondezyo amalele manjimanji akati kabantu, boonse bakali amoyo omwe mukota lya-Solomoni.
Kwalo tokwakali muntu umbi uwakalimba camba cakukakatila kulimbabo, nokubaboobo bantu bakabalemya.
Basyomi bakaindilila kuyungililwa ku-Mwami, makamu makamu aabaalumi abakaintu,
aboobo bakatola balwazi munzila, bababika amalo amasalu, kuti ainda Petro, muzinzimwa wakwe ukabeenzye bamwi.
Alimwi kwakabungana makamu makamu aamuminzi iizingulukide Jerusalemu, balaleta baciswa abapenzegwa myuuya mibi, boonse bakaponyegwa.
Elyo kwakanyamuka mupaizi mupati ambabo boonse abakali anguwe (nkokuti ninkamu yaba-Saduki), bakazywide bbivwe,
bajata baapostolo, babanjizya muntolongo.
Kwalo masiku angelo wa-Mwami wajula milyango yantolongo, wabagwisya wati,
Kamuya mwiime mucikombelo, mwaambile bantu boonse makani aabuumi obu,

Nobakamvwa obo, bakanjila mucikombelo cifumofumo, baiisya. Elyo kwakasika mupaizi mupati ambaakali abo, wakaita bantu alubeta antoomwe abapati boonse babana ba-Israyeli, batumina kuntolongo kuyoobaleta.
Pele nobakainka bamapulisa, baakujana tabamo muntolongo, baboola baamba,
bati, Twaakujana ntolongo ilijalidwe kabotu, abalindilila baliimvwi amilyango, pele notwajula, tatujene muntu mukati pe.
Eno silumamba wentempele abapaizi bapati nobakamvwa majwi aya, bakazingwa na alagolela kuli makani.
Mpoonya kwakasika umwi wabaambila wati, Mumvwe, baalumi mbomwakanjizya muntolongo baliimvwi mucikombelo, balaiisya bantu.
Ndilyonya wakainka silumamba abamapolisa, waakubaleta, pele kacitali caluciso, nkaambo bakayoowa bantu kufuswa mabwe,
Nobakabaleta, babaimika mulubeta, mupaizi mupati wababuzya,
wati, Twamulailila akumulailila kuti mutacaambi mulileeli zina, neembo? Eno amulange, mwazuzya Jerusalemu akwiisya kwanu, mulayanda kutujanya mulandu wabulowa bwayooyu muntu,
Kwalo wakavuwa Petro abaapostolo bati, Tuleelede kumvwa Leza kwiinda bantu,
Leza wamatateesu wakabusya Jesu, ngomwakajaya, mwakamwaanzika acisamu.
Oyu, Leza wakamusumpulisya kujanza lyakwe lyalulyo, abe Mwami a-Mufutuli, ape Israyeli kweempa akujatilwa kwazibi.
Swebo tuli bakamboni bamakani aya, awalo Muuya Uusalala, ngwapa Leza kulibamumvwa,
Pele balo nobakamvwa obo yakabacisa myoyo, bakanza kubajaya.
Ndilyonya kwakaima umwi mulubeta, mu-Farisi uutegwa Gamaliyeli, mwiiyi wamulao, uwakali empuwo mucisi coonse, Walailila kuti baapostolo bagwisigwe anze kaindi.
Wateeti kulimbabo, Nobaalumi ba-Israyeli, amucenjele abantu aba mbomuti cite.
Nkaambo munsi lyamazuba aya kwakasika Teuda, uwakalipa bupati. Bakaswaangana awe bantu ababa anga myaanda yone, kwalo wakajayigwa, abaabo boonse abakamuswiilila bakamwaika, bakamana.
Munsi lyayooyo muntu kwakasika Juda, mu-Galilaya, kumazuba aakulembwa, wakabasolwedela bantu banji, bamucilila. Wakajayigwa awalo, abakamuswiilila bakamwaika.
Aboobo ndati kulindinywe, Amuzwe kubantu aba, mubaleke, nkaambo kwiisya oku amulimo oyu anooli ngwabantu ulamwaika.
Kwalo na nguwa-Leza, tamukookonzya kuumwaya, ambweni mulajanwa kuti mulwanya Leza,
Nkabela bakazumina kulinguwe. Bakaita baapostolo, babauma, babalai-lila kuti batacaambi muzina lya-Jesu, babaleka.
Aboobo bakazwa mulubeta balabotelwa kuti kwakategwa baleelede kunyansigwa nkaambo kezina lyakwe.
Mazuba oonse tabakalekede kwiisya akukambauka muntempele amumaanda kuti Jesu ngo-Kristo.
Kumazuba ayo nobakali kuya buvula basikwiiya, ba-Giriki bakatongaukila ba-Hebrayo, nkaambo bamukabafu bakulimbabo bakalengaalwa kumwaabo wabuzuba bumwi bumwi.
Nkabela abali kumi mubabili bakaita mbungano yabasikwiiya bati, Takweelede kuti swebo tuleke makani aa-Leza, tugame kwaaba zilyo.
Aboobo, bakwesu, amusale akati kanu baalumi abali musanu mubabili, abali empuwo mbotu, abazywide Muuya Uusalala abusongo, mbotuti bike mumulimo oyo,
Kwalo swebo tuyoojatisya kukukomba akumulimo wamakani.
Eno ijwi elyo lyakakonda bantu boonse, Bakasala Stefano, mwaalumi uuzywide lusyomo a-Muuya Uusalala, antoomwe a-Filipo, a-Prokoro, a-Nikanora, a-Timo, a-Parmena, a-Nikolao, musyomi waku-Antiokeya,
bakabaimika kumbele lyabaapostolo. Nkabela nobakamana kukomba, bakabika maanza alimbabo,
Elyo makani aa-Leza akaanda, basikwiiya bakavulisya mu-Jerusalemu, abapaizi banjibanji bakasyoma.
Eno Stefano mbwaakazywide luzyalo enguzu, wakali kucita ziyoosya ezitondezyo zipati akati kabantu.
Nkabela bakanyamuka bamwi bacikombelo icitegwa caba-Libertino, abaku-Kurene, abaku-Alesandreyo, abazwa ku-Kilikiya, aku-Asiya, bakazyanya a-Stefano,
Kwalo teebakali enguzu kukazya busongo a-Muuya ngwaambya.
Ndilyonya bakaleta baalumi abakati, Twakamumvwa ulaamba majwi aakusampaula Musa a-Leza,
Nkabela bakasungilizya bantu, abapati, abalembi. Baboola bamujata, bamutola alubeta.
Mpoonya bakanyamusya bakamboni bakubeja abakateeti, Oyu muntu taleki kwaamba majwi aakusampaula busena obu busalala amulao,
nkaambo twakamumvwa uti, Oyu Jesu wa-Nazareta uyoobumwaya busena obu, asandule ziyanza nzyaakatupa Musa.
Boonse abakede mulubeta bamulangisisya, babona busyu bwakwe bwaba mbuli busyu bwaangelo.
Elyo mupaizi mupati wakati, Sena mbwaabede aya?
Wakavuwa wati, Nobaalumi bakwesu anomatata, amuswiilile. Leza wabulemu wakali­ bonya kuli-Abrahamu tateesu naakali ku-Mesopotamiya, katana kukala ku-Harani,
wakamwaambila kuti, Kozwa mucisi cabanamuzeenu, akumikowa yako, uye kucisi ncenti kakutondezye ncico.
Ndilyonya wakazwa mucisi caba-Kaldayo, wakala mu-Harani. Elyo naakafwa wisi, Leza wakamulongezya muliceecino cisi ncomukede sunu.
Pele takamupede lukono omuno pe, nobuba busena bwakulyatika tende lyomwe, kwala wakamusyomezya kuyoomupa ncico cibe cakwe, ecabana bakwe munsi lyakwe, katana kuba amwana.
Eno mbombuboobo Leza mbwaakaamba kuti bana bakwe bayookala mucisi cabamasi, bayoobacita bazike bakabalele bubi myaaka iili myaanda yone.
Pele cisi iciyoobacita bazike ndiyoocibeteka, mbwaakaamba Leza, Munsi lyakooko bayoozwa bakandikombele muliboobuno busena,
Wakamupa cizuminano cakupalulwa, aboobo Abrahamu wakazyala Izaka, wakamupalula kubuzuba bwamusanu mwaatatu. Izaka wakazyala Jakobo, Jakobo wakazyala basikale abali kumi mubabili.
Eno basikale, nkaambo kebbivwe, bakamuuzya Josefa ku-Egepita, kwalo Leza wakali awe,
wamuvuna kumapenzi aakwe oonse, wamupa luzyalo abusongo kumbele lya-Farao, mwami wa-Egepita, wamucita mweendelezi wa-Egepita awaŋanda yakwe yoonse.
Elyo kwakaba nzala mucisi coonse ca-Egepita eca-Kanana, amapenzi mapati, matateesu tabakajene kulya.
Pele Jakobo, naakamvwa kuti maila nkwaali ku-Egepita, wakatuma matateesu lutaanzi.
Mulweendo lwabili Josefa wakazibwa banabakwabo, awalo mukowa wa-Josefa wakaambwa kuli-Farao,
Nkabela Josefa wakatumina wisi Jakobo, wakamwiita abeŋanda yakwe boonse, bantu abali makumi aali musanu mwaabili amusanu,
Elyo Jakobo wakalonga wainka ku-Egepita, wakafwa walo, amatateesu,
bakatolwa ku-Sekemu, bazikwa mucuumbwe ncaakaula Abrahamu muulo wensiliva kubana ba-Emori mu-Sekemu.
Pele mbecakaswena ciindi cacisyomezyo, Leza ncaakasyomezya Abrahamu, bantu bakavula, baba banjibanji mu-Egepita,
limwi kwakaba umbi mwami mu-Egepita uwatakali kumuzi Josefa.
Walo wakacitila mukowa wesu camaanu, wakapenzya matateesu kuti basowe bavwanda babo, kuti bataponi.
Ncencico ciindi ncaakazyalwa Musa, mwana uuebeka, wakalelwa myeezi yotatwe muŋanda yakwabo,
nkabela naakasowegwa, mwana a-Farao musimbi wakamubweza, wakamulela mbuli mwanaakwe.
Musa wakaiisigwa busongo boonse bwa-Egepita, wakaba anguzu kumajwi akumilimo yakwe,
Eno naakali emyaaka iili makumi one, kwakanjila mumoyo wakwe kuti aswaye banabakwabo, bana ba-Israyeli,
Elyo naakabona umwi wabo ulapenzegwa wamuvuna, wamulwanina uupenzegwa, wajaya mu-Egepita,
Wali kuyeeya kuti, banabakwabo balaziba kuti Leza ulabaangulula ajanza lyakwe, kwalo tabakazibide,
Nobwakaca wakajana bamwi balalwana, wakabakombelezya kuti balekane wati, Nobaalumi, muli babunyina, mulwaninanzi?
Pele oyo uwakasumuna mweenzinyina, wakamutonka wati, Nguni wakubika bwami abubetesi kulindiswe?
Sena uyanda kundijaya mbubonya mbookajaya mu-Egepita jilo?
Musa naakamvwa obo wakatija, waakukala mucisi ca-Midiani, nkwaakazyalila bana bobile.
Nokwakamana myaaka iili makumi one angelo wakalibonya kulinguwe mukasaka kacilundu ca-Sinai, mubbalabala lyamulilo muciteo.
Eno Musa naakacibona, wakayoowa kucilengaano, naakaswena afwaafwi kulangisisya, kwakasika ijwi lya-Jehova,
lyakati, Ndime Leza wabauso, Leza wa-Abrahamu, awa-Izaka, awa-Jakobo. Musa wakazyangama, takali ecamba cakulangisisya,
Jehova wakamwaambila kuti, Gwisya ndyasyo kumatende aako, nkaambo abusena awo mpoimvwi mpaansi aasalala,
Ncobeni ndabona mapenzi aabantu bangu abali mu­-Egepita, ndamvwa manyonausi aabo, ndaseluka kuti ndibavune. Eno koboola ndikutume ku-Egepita.
Musa oyo ngobakakaka bati, Nguni wakubika bwami abubetesi? Leza wakamutuma oyo, abe mwami amuvuni, ajanza lyaangelo uwakalibonya kulinguwe muciteo.
Walo wakabagwisya, wakacita ziyoosya azitondezyo mucisi ca-Egepita, amu-Lwizi Lusalala, amunkanda myaaka iili makumi one.
Ngonguwe Musa oyu, uwakaambila bana ba-Israyeli kuti, Jehova Leza wanu uyoomubusizya musinsimi kubanabakwanu uuli mbuli ndime.
Oyu ngonguwe uwakali mumbungano munkanda, antoomwe aangelo uwakaamba anguwe mucilundu ca-Sinai, antoomwe amatateesu. Nguwakatambula makani maumi akutupa swebo.
Pele bamatateesu tabakazumide kumuswiilila, bakamukaka, myoyo yabo yakapiluka ku-Egepita,
bakaambila Aroni kuti, Tucitile mizimo itusolwedele, nkaambo Musa oyo uwakatugwisya mucisi ca-Egepita, tatuzi na wakasikilwanzi.
Kumazuba ayo bakacita cikozyano camoombe, bakapaila cikozyano eco, babotelwa amilimo yamaanza aabo.
Leza wakabafutatila, wabasowa kuti bakombe makamu aakujulu, mbubonya mbokulembedwe mubbuku lyabasinsimi kuti,
Sena mwakandipaizya zyakajayigwa azimwi zipaizyo
Munkanda myaaka iili makumi one,
Nywebo nobeŋanda ya-Israyeli?
Mwakabweza cikombelo ca-Moloki,
Enyenyeezi yamuzimo Refano,
Zikozyano nzomwakalidtila kuzikomba.
Eno ndiyoomugwisya, ndimutole kumbele lya-Babuloni.
Bamatateesu bakali kujisi cikombelo cabukamboni, mbubonya mbuli kulailila kwayooyo uwakaambila Musa kuti acicite akucikozyanya eco ncaakabona.
Ncenciceeco njobakaletelela bamatateesu a-Joshua, nobakatola nyika yabamasi mbaakatanda Leza kubusyu bwamatateesu, mane kusikila kumazuba aa-Davida,
Walo wakajana luzyalo kumbele ya-Leza, wakakumbila kujanina Leza wa-Jakobo cikombelo.
Pele Solomoni nguwakamuyakila nganda,
Nekubaboobo Sijulu lyamajulu takali mumaanda aacitwa amaanza, mbubonya mbwaakaamba musinsimi kuti,
Ijulu ncecuuno cangu,
Inyika mbutandabalilo bwamatende aangu,
Niŋandanzi ngomuti kandiyakile, mbwaamba Jehova,
Mbubuli busena bwakulyookezezya kwangu?
Sena talili janza lyangu ilyakacita zintu ezi zyoonse?
Nywebo nobasicinguni abatapalwidwe kumyoyo akumatwi, lyoonse mulakasya Muuya Uusalala, mbubonya mbobakacita bamauso anywebo mbomucita.
Nguuli musinsimi bamauso ngobatakapenzya? Bakabajaya abakali kusinsima kusika kwa-Uululeme, oyo ngomwabeda baabi abajayi,
nywebo nomwakatambula mulao kumaanza aabaangelo, pele tamukaucitide.
Nobakamvwa obo, bakaciswa kumyoyo, bamulumina ntwino,
Pele walo, mbwaakazywide Muuya Uusalala, wakalangisisya kujulu, wabona bulemu bwa-Leza, a-Jesu uliimvwi kululyo lwa-Leza,
wati, Amulange, ndabona ijulu lili bukwazi, a-Mwana a-Muntu uliimvwi kululyo lwa-Leza,
Ndilyonya bakoompolola ejwi pati, balisinka mumatwi aabo, bamukulumukila antoomwe,
bamutandila anze amunzi, bamuwaala mabwe, Bakamboni bakabika zyakusama zyabo kumatende aamwaalumi uutegwa Saulo,
Bakamufusa mabwe Stefano, walo ulakomba uti, Mwami Jesu, tambula muuya wangu,
Nkabela wakafugama amazwi, woompolola ejwi pati wati, Mwami, utababiki mulandu acibi eci, Naakaamba obo, woona.
Saulo wakazumina akufwa kwakwe.
Kuliboobo buzuba imbungano yamu-Jerusalemu yakatalika kupenzegwa kapati, boonse bakamwaikila muzisi zya-Judaya a-Samariya, pele kwakasyaala baapostolo balike,
Baalumi basyomi bakamuzika Stefano, bakamu-bungila dilwe pati.
Kwalo Saulo wakali kuya buundunganya mbungano, wakanjila mumaanda oonse, uya bukwela baalumi abakaintu akubanjizya muntolongo.
Aboobo abakamwaika bakeendeenda baya bukambauka makani.
Ndilyonya Filipo wakasika kumunzi wa-Samariya, wabakambaukila Kristo,
Eno bantu bakaswiilila amoyo omwe kuzintu ezyo nzyaakali kwaamba Filipo nobakamvwa akubona zitondezyo nzyaakacita.
Nkaambo myuuya iisofweede yakazwa kubanji babo abakanjidwe njiyo, iloompolola ejwi pati, abanjibanji abayuminide mibili abatyokede baponyegwa.
Kwakaba kubotelwa kupati kulooyo munzi.
Eno kwakali mwaalumi uutegwa Simoni, uwali musonzi mumunzi oyo akuyoosya bantu ba-Samariya, wati muntu mupati.
Bakamuswiilila boonse, kuzwa kumuniini mane kumupati, bakati, Oyu muntu ninguzu zyaLeza ezyo izitegwa Nzipati,
Bakamumvwa nkaambo wakabayoosya ciindi cilamfu akusonda kwakwe,
Pele nobakasyoma Filipo naali kukambauka makani mabotu aa-Bwami bwa-Leza ezina lya-Jesu Kristo, bakabapatizigwa, baalumi abakaintu.
Awalo Simoni wakasyoma. Naakabapatizigwa wakakakatila kuli-Filipo, wakayoowa naakabona zitondezyo emilimo yenguzu mpati iyali kucitwa.
Elyo baapostolo bamu-Jerusalemu nobakamvwa kuti cisi ca-Samariya cakatambula makani aa-Leza, bakabatumina Petro a-Johane.
Nobakasika oko bakabakombela kuti bapegwe Muuya Uusalala,
nkaambo tuwalina kuselukila naba omwe wabo, bakabapatizigwa muzina lya-Mwami Jesu pele.
Nkabela bakababika maanza, bakapegwa Muuya Uusalala.
Eno Simoni naakabona kuti Muuya Uusalala ulapegwa akubikwa maanza aabaapostolo, wakabaletela mali,
wati, Amundipe amebo nguzu ezi, kuti kufumbwa ngwenti bike maanza atambule Muuya Uusalala,
Petro wakamwaambila wati, Mali aaka afwidilile antoomwe ayebo, nkaambo wayeeya kuti cipego ca-Leza caulwa mali.
Tojisi caabilo nebuba busena kumakani aya, nkaambo moyo wako tuululeme kumbele lya-Leza.
Sanduka kububi bwako obu, ukumbile kuli-Leza, ambweni kulajatilwa kuyeeya kwamoyo wako,
Nkaambo ndabona kuti uli mundulwe iilula amukwaangwa bubi.
Simoni wakavuwa wati, Amundikombele ku-Mwami, entasikilwa neciba comwe cazeezi zintu nzooamba.
Aboobo nobakasinizya akwaamba makani aa-Mwami, bakabweeda ku-Jerusalemu, baya bukambauka Makani Mabotu muminzi minjiminji yaba-Samariya.
Pele angelo wa-Mwami wakaambila Filipo kuti, Nyamuka uye kumusanza, kunzila iizwa ku-Jerusalemu iiya ku-Gaza, njenkanda.
Mpoonya wakanyamuka wainka, Eno mwaalumi waku-Etiopiya, muzibe wabwami bupati bwa-Kandake, mwami mukaintu waba-Etiopiya, ngowakali mulangi walubono lwakwe loonse, wakainkide ku-Jerusalemu kuyookomba,
Eno kukupiluka, wakalikede munkalaki yakwe, uza bubala kuli-Isaya musinsimi.
Nkabela Muuya wakaambila Filipo kuti, Swena afwaafwi unjile munkalaki eyo.
Ndilyonya Filipo wakamuzuzaanina, wamumvwa ulabala kuli-Isaya musinsimi. Wati, Sena ulacimvwisya eco ncobala?
Vakavuwa kuti, Ino ndilakonzya buti, aatakwe muntu uunditondezya? Mpoonya awo wakakumbila Filipo kuti atante, akale awe.
Eno caandaano ncaali kubala nceeci:
Wakeenzegwa mbuli kabelele kaya kukujayigwa,
Ambuli kabelele kaumuna kumbele lyauugela,
Mbubonya awalo takajulide mulomo wakwe,
Kukulyeetezya kwakwe takabetekedwe kabotu,
Nguni uyooamba izyalani lyakwe?
Nkaambo buumi bwakwe bwagwisigwa ansi,
Nkabela muzibe wakamuvuwa Filipo wakati, Ndakubuzya, ino nguni ngwaamba musinsimi kumakani aya? Sa ulyaamba lwakwe mwini, na uamba umbi?
Filipo wakajula mulomo wakwe, wasaanguna kulugwalo olu ndulonya kumwaambila aa-Jesu,
Nobakali kweenda munzila, bakasika kwakali maanzi. Muzibe wakati, Ngaaya maanzi, ncinzi ino icindikasya kubapatizigwa?
Filipo wateeti, Na wasyoma amoyo wako woonse ulakonzya, Wavuwa wati, Ndasyoma kuti Jesu Kristo ngu-Mwana a-Leza,
Nkabela wakalailila kuti inkalaki iime, bakaselukila mumaanzi boonse babile, Filipo amuzibe, wamubapatizya.
Nobakazwa mumaanzi Muuya wa-Mwami wakakwempa Filipo. Muzibe taakacili kumubona limbi, nkaambo wakatola munzila yakwe uya bubotelwa.
Pele Filipo wakajanwa ku-Azotu, waandulula minzi yoonse uya bukambauka Makani Mabotu, mane wasika ku-Kaisareya.
Eno Saulo mbwaakacifundilide kupenzya akujaya basikwiiya ba-Mwami, wakainka kumupaizi mupati
kuyoomukumbila magwalo aakuya kuzikombelo zyaku-Damasko, kuti aakujana benzila eyi, nobaba baalumi nobaba bakaintu, abalete ku-Jerusalemu balaangidwe.
Eno mukweenda kwakwe naakasika kufwaafwi ku-Damasko, ndilyonya kwakamumwekela mumuni uuzwa kujulu,
wakawida ansi, wamvwa ijwi liti kulinguwe, Saulo, Saulo, undipenzezyanzi?
Wabuzya kuti, Ino nduweni, Mwami? Wakavuwa wati, Ndime Jesu ngopenzya,
pele nyamuka unjile mumunzi, moyooambililwa ncoti kacite,
Eno bantu mbaakali kweenda abo bakaima kabataambi, mbobalimvwa ijwi, pele kutabona muntu.
Mpoonya Saulo wakabuka ansi, anamune meso aakwe taboni cintu, bamutembaizya ejanza, bamutola mu-Damasko,
Mazuba otatwe kataboni, katalyi, katanywi cintu,
Eno mu-Damasko kwakali sikwiiya uwali kutegwa Hananiya, Nkabela Mwami wakamwaambila mucilengaano kuti, Hananiya. Wavuwa wati, Ndimuuno, O mwami.
Mwami wakati kulinguwe, Nyamuka uinke kunzila iitegwa lisuumene, kuŋanda ya-Juda, ukabuzye muntu uutegwa Saulo waku-Tarso, nkaambo ulakomba,
walo wakabona mucilengaano mwaalumi uutegwa Hananiya ulanjila, ulamubika maanza kuti abone.
Kwalo Hananiya wakavuwa wati, O mwami, ndakamvwa banjibanji aamuntu oyo, abubi bupati mbwaakacitila basalala bako bamu-Jerusalemu,
mane akookuno ujisi bwami mbwaakapegwa kubapaizi bapati kwaanga boonse abakomba kuzina lyako.
Mwami wateeti kulinguwe, Koya nkaambo oyu ndamusala abe uutola zina lyangu kulibamasi, akubami, akubana ba-Israyeli,
nkaambo ndiyoomutondezya zinjizinji nzyeclede kuyoopengela zina lyangu,
Nkabela Hananiya wakainka, waakunjila muŋanda eyo, wamubika maanza wati, Saulo mukwesu, Mwami, nguwenya Jesu uwakalibonya kulinduwe munzila njookaleta, wandituma kuti ubone, uzyule Muuya Uusalala.
Ndilyonya kwakazwa kumeso aakwe aaba anga mapapa, wabona, Mpoonya wakanyamuka wabapatizigwa.
Naakalya zilyo wakajana nguzu.
Elyo Saulo wakakala mazuba amwi abasikwiiya bamu-Damasko,
Ndilyonya wakakambauka muzikombelo kuti Jesu Mwana a-Leza.
Boonse abakamuswiilila bakayoowa bati, Sena oyu tali nguwe uwakali kuundunganya mu-Jerusalemu abakomba kuzina eli? Akookuno wakazida kuti abatole balaangidwe kubapaizi bapati.
Kwalo Saulo wakali kuya bukomena kunguzu, wakabainda ba-Juda abakakede mu-Damasko kusinizya kuti Jesu ngu-Kristo.
Naakamana mazuba manjimanji ba-Juda bakavwiyana kumujaya,
pele Saulo wakaziba kukanza kwabo, Bakiilindilila milyango isikati amasiku kuti bamujaye,
kwalo basikwiiya bakwe bakamutola masiku, bamuselusya kubwaanda mucisuwo.
Eno Saulo naakasika ku-Jerusalemu, wakasoleka kuswaangana abasikwiiya, pele bakamuyoowa boonse, teebakali kusyoma kuti ngusikwiiya.
Kwalo Barnaba wakamubweza wamutola kubaapostolo, wabalungulwida mbwaakabona Mwami munzila, akuti wakaamba awe, ambwaakali ecamba kukukambauka mu-Damasko muzina lya-Jesu,
Elyo wakali kuya buzelengana abo mu-Jerusalemu,
ulakambauka ecamba muzina lya-Mwami. Alimwi wakaambaula akukazyanya aba-Juda aba-Helene, pele balo bali kusoleka kumujaya.
Kwalo babunyina nobakamvwa obo, bakamutola ku-Kaisareya, bamutuma ku-Tarso.
Eno imbungano yamu-Judaya moonse, amu-Galilaya, amu-Samariya, yakaba aluumuno akuyumizigwa, alimwi yakayungililwa mboyakali kweenda akumuyoowa Mwami akubotezegwa Muuya Uusalala.
Petro, naakaandulula mumasena oonse, wakasika kubasalala abakakede mu-Luda,
Oko wakaakujana muntu uutegwa Eneya, uwakalilede abulo bwakwe myaaka iili musanu mwiitatu, nkaambo kayuminide mubili.
Mpoonya awo Petro wakamwaambila kuti, Eneya, Jesu Kristo wakuponya, buka uyalule bulo bwako. Ndilyonya wakabuka.
Eno bakamubona boonse abakakede mu-Luda amu-Sarona, bakasandukila ku-Mwami.
Eno mu-Jopa kwakalimo sikwiiya uwali kutegwa Tabita nkokuti neli sandulwa, Dorika. Oyo mukaintu wakalizywide milimo mibotu, aluzyalo ndwaakali kucita,
Kumazuba ayo wakaciswa, wafwa. Nkabela bamusanzya, bamubika muŋanda yamujulu,
Eno mbokuli kufwaafwi kuzwa ku-Jopa kuya ku-Luda, basikwiiya nobakamvwa kuti Petro nkwali, bamutumina bantu bobile kuyoomukumbila kuti, Utamuki kusika kulindiswe.
Elyo Petro wakanyamuka wakainka abo. Nobakasika bakamutola muŋanda yamujulu. Kwakali awe bamukabafu boonse, balalila akumutondezya zibaki ezyakusama nzyaali kucita Dorika naacili abo.
Kwalo Petro wakabatandila anze boonse, wafugama, wakomba. Nkabela wasandukila kumutunta wati, Tabita, buka. Ndilyonya wanamuna meso aakwe, naakabona Petro wakakala.
Mpoonya awo wakamujata ejanza akumwiimika, naakaita basalala abamukabafu wakamubika kumbele lyabo muumi.
Oku kwakamvwigwa moonse mu-Jopa, elyo banjibanji bakasyoma ku-Mwami.
Eno wakakala ku-Jopa mazuba manjimanji kuli-Simoni, musuki wamasalu.
Kwakaliko ku-Kaisareya mwaalumi uwali kutegwa Koneliyo, musunguli wenkamu yabasilumamba iitegwa ya-Italiya.
Wakali muntu uukomba, uuyoowa Leza walo abeŋanda yakwe boonse, wakapa bantu zinjizinji zyaluzyalo, akukomba kuli-Leza lyoonse,
Kuciindi kati kabe acilanga nkumo wakabonesya mucilengaano angelo wa-Leza ulanjila kulinguwe akumwaambila kuti, Koneliyo.
Naakamulangisisya wakayoowa wati, Ncinzi, Mwami? Wavuwa kuti, Ukukomba kwako ezyaluzyalo zyako zyasika kujulu, nciyeezyo kumbele lya-Leza,
Eno kotuma baalumi kuJopa, bakalete Simoni uutegwa Petro.
Ukala kuli-Simoni musuki wamasalu. Iŋanda yakwe ili kumbali alwizi.
Naakainka angelo uwali kwaamba kuli-Koneliyo, wakaita bazike bobile asilumamba uukomba, umwi wabaabo mbaakali abo lyoonse,
amane kubalungulwida makani oonse wakabatuma ku-Jopa.
Nobwakaca, nobakacili kuya bweenda akusika kufwaafwi kumunzi, Petro wakatanta atala aŋanda kuti akombe, kuciindi icati kabe amutwe esikati,
Elyo wakafwa nzala, wayanda kulya, kwalo nobakacili kubamba cakulya wakanyangwa muuya.
Wakabona ijulu lyaba bukwazi, ecintu cilaseluka iciba anga ndisila pati, calengelezegwa ansi ezyooko zyone,
omo mwakali banyama boonse abali amaulu one, aboongoleka ansi, abayuni bamujulu.
Nkabela kwakamusikila ijwi ilyati, Buka, Petro, ujaye ulye,
Pele Petro wakati, Pe, O mwami, nkaambo nsinalide cintu citondwa na cisofweede.
Alwabili kwakeza ijwi liti kulinguwe, Ncaasalazya Leza utacaambi kuti cilatondwa,
Eci cakacitwa totatwe, ndilyonya cintu cakabweedezegwa kujulu.
Petro naakacili kuzingidwe kuti citinzi eci cilengaano ncaabona, baalumi abakatumwa Koneliyo bakabuzya ŋanda ya-Simoni, baliimvwi amulyango,
balaita akubuzya na mwali Simoni uutegwa Petro.
Petro naakacili kweezeezya cilengaano Muuya wakati kulinguwe, Bona, bantu botatwe balakuyanda,
Konyamuka useluke, uinke abo, utazululwi, nkaambo ndime ndabatuma,
Ndilyonya Petro wakaselukila kubaalumi abo wakati, Ndime ngomuyandaula. Ino makaninzi ngomwazida?

Balo bakati, Koneliyo, musunguli wabasilumamba, muntu uululeme uumuyoowa Leza, uulumbaizigwa cisi coonse caba-Juda, wakalaililwa angelo uusalala kuti akwiitile kuŋanda yakwe, aswiilile makani kulinduwe.
Aboobo wakabanjizya muŋanda akubayalila.
Nobwakaca Petro wakanyamuka akwiinka abo, bamusindikila babunyina bamwi bamu-Jopa.
Nobwakaca bakanjila mu-Kaisareya. Koneliyo wakali kubalangila mbwaakaita basazinyina abeenzinyina benibeni,
Eno Petro naakanjila, Koneliyo wakamucinga, wakawida kumatende aakwe akumukomba.
Pele Petro wamubusya wati, Ima, amebo ndi muntu buyo,
Nkabela wakanjila ulaambaula awalo, wakajana banjibanji bali kubungene.
Wakati kulimbabo, Nywebo nobeni mulizi mbokutondwa kumuntu muJuda kuti aswaangane awamasi, aboole kulinguwe, kwalo Leza wakanditondezya kuti entaambi muntu kuti ulatondwa na ulisofweede,
aboobo mbwendakatuminwa, ndasika cakutanyonauka. Ndabuzya, Ncinzi ncomwanditumina?

Koneliyo wakati, Mazuba one aakainda mbuli cino ciindi ndakali kuliimya kulya, ndali kukomba muŋanda yangu kuciindi cacilanga nkumo, nkabela kumbele lyangu kwakaima mwaalumi uusamide cakusama cinyengema.
Wakati, Koneliyo, kwamvwigwa kukomba kwako, ezyaluzyalo zyako zyayeeyegwa kuli-Leza.
Aboobo kotuma ku-Jopa, uliitile Simoni uutegwa Petro, ukede muŋanda ya-Simoni musuki wamasalu, kumbali alwizi.
Nkaambo kaako ndafwamba kukutumina, wacita kabotu yebo mboosika. Eno motubede toonse kubusyu bwa-Leza, kuti tumvwe makani oonse ngoolaililwa ku-Mwami,
Mpoonya awo Petro wakajula mulomo wakwe wati:
Nkasimpe ndabona kuti Leza talangi ciimo camuntu,
pele mumasi oonse uumuyoowa akucita bululami ulatambulwa kulinguwe,
Makani ngaakatuma kubana ba-Israyeli, naakakambauka Makani Mabotu aaluumuno muli-Jesu Kristo (ngo-Mwami waboonse),
ayo makani mulyeezi, aakaambwa mu-Judaya moonse, kusaanguna ku-Galilaya, munsi lyalubapatizyo ndwaakakambauka Johane.
Ngaa-Jesu wa-Nazareta, mbwaakamunanika Leza a-Muuya Uusalala enguzu. Valo wakali kuzelengana kucita zibotu, akuponya boonse abalyatidwe Saatani, nkaambo Leza wakali awe.
Aswebo tuli bakamboni bazintu zyoonse nzyaakacita mucisi caba-Juda amuJerusalemu, ngobakajaya, bamwaanzika acisamu.
Oyo, Leza wakamubusya kubuzuba bwatatu, wakamutondezya kubantu,
takuli kubantu boonse pe, pele kulibakamboni abakasalidwe Leza, kulindiswe totwakali kulya akunywa awalo kabukide kale kubafu.
Elyo wakatulailila kuti tukambaukile bantu, tulungulule kuti ngonguwe uwakabikwa Leza kuti abe mubetesi wabaumi abafwide,
Basinsimi boonse balasinizya anguwe kuti boonse abamusyoma balajatilwa zibi muzina lyakwe.
Petro naakacili kwaamba majwi aya Muuya Uusalala wakabawida boonse abakaswiilila makani.
Eno basyomi bapalule abakeza a-Petro bakagambwa kuti abalo bamasi bapegwa Muuya Uusalala.
Nkaambo bakabamvwa balaamba emilaka, balalemeka Leza. Ndilyonya Petro wakavuwa wati,
Sena kuli muntu uuti kasye maanzi kuti aba batabapatizigwi, abapegwa Muuya Uusalala mbuli ndiswe?
Nkabela wakabalailila kuti babapatizigwe muzina lya-Jesu Kristo. Elyo bakamukumbila kuti akale abo kaindi.
Eno baapostolo ababunyina abali mu-Judaya bakamvwa kuti abalo bamasi bakatambula makani aa-Leza.
Nkabela Petro naakasika ku-Jerusalemu, abo babupalule bakakazyanya anguwe,
bati, Wakanjila kubaalumi abatapalwidwe, akulya abo.
Petro wakatalika kubalungulwida kabotu wati,
Ndakali mumunzi wa-Jopa, ndali kukomba. Mbwendaka-nyangidwe muuya ndakabona cilengaano, kwakaseluka cintu mbuli sila pati, ililengelezegwa kujulu ezyooko zyone, lyeza kulindime.
Nendacilangisisya, ndeezeezya, ndabona banyama baansi abali amaulu one, abamusokwe, aboongoleka, abayuni bamujulu.
Nkabela ndakamvwa ijwi liti kulindime, Buka, Petro, ujaye, ulye.
Pele ndakateeti, Pe, O mwami, nkaambo cintu citondwa neciba cisofweede tacina kunjila mukanwa kangu.
Alwabili ijwi ilizwa kujulu lyakavuwa kuti, Ncaakasalazya Leza utacaambi kuti cilatondwa,
Eci cakaindwa totatwe, nkabela zyoonse zyakabweedezegwa kujulu.
Ndilyonya baalumi botatwe bakasika kuŋanda motwakabede, bakazwa ku-Kaisareya, batumwa kulindime.
Elyo Muuya wakandyaambila kwiinka abo cakutasalaula, Abaaba bakwesu abali musanu muumwi baka-ndisindikila, twakanjila muŋanda yamwaalumi oyo.
Wakatwaambila mbwaakabona angelo muŋanda yakwe, uliimvwi, ulati, Tuma ku-Jopa, ulete Simoni uutegwa Petro,
uzookwaambila majwi aakukufutula abeŋanda yako boonse.
Eno nendakatalika kwaamba, Muuya Uusalala wakabawida mbuli mbowakatuwida lutaanzi.
Ndilyonya ndakayeeya ijwi lya-Mwami lyakuti, Johane wakabapatizya amaanzi, pele nywebo muyoobapatizigwa a-Muuya Uusalala.
Eno anooli Leza uwakabapa cipegwa eco nciconya ncaakatupa aswebo notwakasyoma ku-Mwami Jesu Kristo, ino obo ndimeni mebo kuti ndikazye Leza?
Nobakamvwa obo bakaumuna, balemeka Leza bati, Abalo bamasi Leza wabapa kusanduka kuti bapone.
Eno abo bakamwaika nkaambo kamapenzi aakasika kuli-Stefano bakainka ku-Foinike, aku-Kupro, aku-Antiokeya, bali kuya bukambauka makani kuba-Juda balo, tabali kukambaukila bamwi pe.
Kwalo bamwi babo, bantu baku-Kupro abaku-Kurene, nobakasika ku-Antiokeya, bakaamba kubaGiriki akwalo, bakambauka Mwami Jesu,
Ijanza lya-Mwami lyakali abo, banjibanji abakasyoma bakasandukila ku-Mwami.
Impuwo yabo yakamvwigwa kumbungano yaku-Jerusalemu, nkabela bakatuma Barnaba kuti ainke ku-Antiokeya,
Naakasika akubona luzyalo lwa-Leza, wakabotelwa, wakabalaya boonse kuti bakakatile ku-Mwami emyoyo miyumu.
Nkaambo wakali muntu mubotu, uuzywide Muuya Uusalala alusyomo. Elyo kwakayungizigwa bantu banjibanji ku-Mwami.
Mpoonya Barnaba wakainka ku-Tarso, waakuyandaula Saulo.
Naakaakumujana, wakamuJeta ku-Antiokeya, Mwaaka woonse bali kubungana embungano akwiisya bantu banjibanji. Nkonkuko ku-Antiokeya nkobakasaanguna kutegwa mba-Kristo,
Mumazuba aya kwakasika ku-Antiokeya basinsimi abazwa ku-Jerusalemu.
Kwakanyamuka umwi kulimbabo, uwali kutegwa Agabo, Muuya wamusinsimya kuti kuyoosika nzala mpati munyika yoonse. Njenjiyo yakasika kumazuba aa-Klaudiya.
Nkabela basikwiiya, mbubonya mbwaali kukonzya umwi umwi kulubono lwakwe, bakasoleka kutumina cakugwasya kulibabunyina abakali mu-Judaya,
bakacita mbubonya, bakatumina kubapati kumaanza aa-Banaba a-Saulo.
Kuciindi eco Heroda mwami wakabika maanza kupenzya bamwi bembungano.
Wakajaya Jakobo eceba, mwanaakwabo Johane.
Naakabona kuti cabotezya ba-Juda, wakaakujata Petro awalo. Cakali ciindi camukamu uutakwe mimena.
Naakamujata wakamunjizya muntolongo, wamwaaba kunkamu zyone zyabasilumamba abali bone bone, kuti bamulindilile. Wakayeeya kumugwisizya kubantu lyamana pobwe lyaPasika,
Aboobo Petro wakalindililwa muntolongo, kwalo imbungano yakali kusungweede kumukombela kuli-Leza.
Heroda naati kamugwisye, ngoonya masiku ayo Petro wakalilede akati kabasilumamba bobile, ulaangidwe nketani zyobile, abasikulindila bali amulyango balalindila ntolongo.
Elyo angelo wa-Mwami wakamwiiminina, mumuni wamweka muŋanda, wakauma Petro kubbazu lyakwe, wamubusya wati, Fwamba buka. Ndilyonya kwakaloka nketani izyakali kumaboko aakwe.
Angelo wakamwaambila kuti, Liyabike, usame ndyasyo zyako, Wacita mbubonya. Alimwi wamwaambila kuti, Livumbe jansi lyako, undicilile.
Wakazwa wamucilila, katezi kuti kuli kasimpe icakacitwa angelo, pele wakayeeya kuti wabona cilengaano.
Bakabainda basikulindila bataanzi ababili, basika kucitendele calubulo icitola kumunzi, calijula cini, bazwa beenda munzila yomwe, ndilyonya angelo wakamusia,
Petro naakayeeya wakateeti, Eno nendaziba kuti nkasimpe Mwami watuma angelo wakwe, wandivuna kumaanza aa-Heroda akukulangilila koonse kwabantu baba-Juda,
Naakazibisisya wakainka kuŋanda ya-Mariya, banyina Johane uutegwa Marko, nkobakali kubungene banjibanji balakomba,
Petro naakakonkomona kucitendele camulyango, kwakazooswiilila musimbi uutegwa Roda.
Naakaliziba ijwi lya-Petro, nkaambo kakubotelwa takajulide mulyango, pele wakazuzaanina muŋanda, waamba wati, Petro mpali, uliimvwi amulyango.
Bakati kulinguwe, Wasondoka, Kwalo wasinizya wati, Nkasimpe. Bateeti, Mungelo wakwe.
Pele Petro wakali kukonkomona lyoonse. Nobakajula bakamubona, bayoowa.
Wakatambika janza kuti baumune, wabalungulwida mbwaakamugwisya Mwami muntolongo. Wati, Amwaambile Jakobo abakwesu makani aya, Nkabela wakazwa, wainka kumbi.
Eno nobwakaca kwakaba kupyopyongana kupati kulibasilumamba kuti, Ino Petro waya kuli?
Elyo Heroda naakamuyandaula akutamujana, wakababuzisisya basikulindila, walailila kuti bajayigwe. Nkabela wakazwa mu-Judaya, waselemuka kuya ku-Kaisareya, wakaakukala nkuko ciindi.

Heroda wakabanyemenesya ba-Turo aba-Sidoni. Eno bakaboola kulinguwe amoyo omwe, bakaliyanzanya a-Blasto, mubanzi mupati wakunanda yamwami, baakukumbila kuti kube luumuno, nkaambo cisi cabanamuzyaabo calelwa cisi camwami.
Kubuzuba ubwakabikwa, Heroda wakasama cakusama cabwami akukala acuuno cakwe, wabakambaukila,
Eno bantu boompolola bati, Ndijwi lya-Leza, talili lyamuntu,
Ndilyonya angelo wa-Mwami wakamuuma, takamulemekede Leza, wakaligwa mvunyu, wafwa.
Kwalo makani aa-Leza akali kuya bukomena akuvula.
Elyo Barnaba a-Saulo bakaboola kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu, nobakamana milimo yabo, baletelela a-Johane uutegwa Marko.
Eno mumbungano yaku-Antiokeya kwakali basinsimi abaiyi: baBarnaba a-Sumeoni uutegwa Nigeri, a-Lukiya mu-Kurene, a-Manayeni uwakakomena antoomwe amwami Heroda, a-Saulo.
Nobakali kucita milimo ya-Mwami akuliimya kulya, Muuya Uusalala wakati, Ndilekele eno ba-Barnaba a-Saulo kumulimo ngwendabaitila.
Nkabela nobakaliimya kulya akukomba, akubabika maanza, bakabatuma.
Balo mbobakatumwa Muuya Uusalala, bakaselemuka kuya ku-Selukeya, kuzwa oko bainka abwaato ku-Kupro.
Nobakasika ku-Salami bakaamba makani aa-Leza muzikombelo zyaba-Juda, bakali a-Johane, mugwasyi wabo.
Nobakaandulula mucilwa coonse mane kusikila ku-Pafo, bakajana musonzi, musinsimi mucengi, mu-Juda uutegwa Baŋesu,
uwakakede kumweendelezi­ wacisi, Sergio Paulo, mwaalumi musongo, Walo wakaliitila ba-Barnaba a-Saulo, wali kuyanda kuswiilila makani aa-Leza,
Pele Elima musonzi (nkaambo mbolibede zina lyakwe nolisandulwa) wakabakasya, wali kuyanda kulesya mweendelezi kulusyomo.
Kwalo Saulo, ngo-Paulo, mbwaakazywide Muuya Uusalala, wakamulangisisya,
wati, Yebo yoomwana a-Saatani, oozywide luuni loonse amaanu mabi oonse, oolwanya bululami boonse, sena tokooleka kulengawida nzila ziluleme zya-Mwami?
Eno bona, ijanza lya-Mwami lili atala lyako, ulaba moofu, tokoobona zuba kaindi. Ndilyonya lwakamuwida luubi amudima, wali kweendeenda ulayandaula uumutembaizya ejanza,
Nkabela mweendelezi naakabona cakacitwa wakasyoma, wayoowa kukwiisya kwa-Mwami.
Elyo Paulo ambaakali abo bakazwa ku-Pafo abwaato, bakainka ku-Perge wamu-Pamfiliya, pele Johane wakabasia, wabweeda ku-Jerusalemu,
Balo bakaindilila kuzwa ku-Perge, beza ku-Antiokeya wamu-Pisidiya. Buzuba bwa-Sabata bakanjila mucikombelo, bakala.
Nokwakamana kubalwa kumulao akubasinsimi, bapati bacikombelo bakatuma kulimbabo bati, Nobaalumi bakwesu anooli mujisi majwi aakulaya bantu amwaambe,
Nkabela Paulo wakanyamuka, watambika janza wati,
Nobaalumi ba-Israyeli, anywebo nomuyoowa Leza, amuswiilile.
Leza wabantu aba ba-Israyeli wakasala matateesu akusumpula bantu nobakacili kukede mucisi ca-Egepita, wakabagwisya mulincico ejanza ijumu.
Wakabalela mbuli wisi munkanda myaaka yati kabe makumi one.
Naakamwaya zisi izyali musanu muzibili munyika ya-Kanana, wakabakonya nyika yabo, kutola kumyaaka yati kabe myaanda yone amakumi osanwe,
munsi lyakooko wakabapa babetesi mane kusikila kuli-Samueli musinsimi.
Elyo bakakumbila mwami, Leza wakabapa Saulo mwana wa-Kisi, mwaalumi wamukowa wa-Benjamini, wakabalela myaaka iili makumi one.
Naakamugwisya walo, wakabika Davida kuti abe mwami wabo. Ngonguwe ngwaakasinizya kuti, Ndijene Davida, mwana wa-Jese, mwaalumi wakumoyo wangu, uyoocita zyoonse nzenjanda.
Kulunungu lwayooyu muntu Leza, mbubonya mbwaakasyomezya, waleta kuli-Israyeli Mufutuli, ngu-Jesu.
Katanasika walo, Johane wakakambaukide kale lubapatizyo lwakusanduka kubantu boonse ba-Israyeli.
Eno Johane nati kamanizye lweendo lwakwe wakati, Mweezeezya kuti ndimeni ino? Endime oyo pe. Kwalo uleza munsi lyangu oyo ngwenteelede kwaangununa ndyasyo zyakumatende aakwe,
Nobakwesu, bana baluzubo lwa-Abrahamu, abalo abali akati kanu abayoowa Leza, kulindiswe nkwaakatuminwa makani aalufutuko olu.
Abo abakala mu-Jerusalemu, abeendelezi babo, kabatamuzi walo naaba majwi aabasinsimi aabalwa muma-Sabata oonse, bakaacita kukumujanya mulandu,
anobatakajana mulandu wakuti afwe, nokubaboobo bakakumbila Pilato kuti ajayigwe.
Nobakazyulizya zyoonse izyakalembwa aanguwe, bakamugwisya acisamu, bamubika mucuumbwe.
Kwalo Leza wakamubusya kubafu,
mazuba manjimanji wakabonwa kulibaabo mbaakazwa abo ku-Galilaya kuya ku-Jerusalemu, sunu mbabakamboni bakwe kubantu,
Eno swebo twamuletela makani mabotu aacisyomezyo ncobakapegwa bamatateesu,
eco Leza wakacizuzya kulindiswe tobana babo mbwaakabusya Jesu, mbubonya mbokulembedwe mulwiimbo lwabili kuti, Yebo uli mwanaangu, sunu ndakuzyala.
Kumakani aakumubusya kwakwe kulufu kuti katacipiluki limbi kukubola wakaamba obo wati, Ndiyoomupa nywebo coolwe cisalala cisinizizye ca-Davida.
Alimwi mulwiimbo lumwi wakati, Tokoozumina kuti Uusalala wako abone kubola,
Nkaambo Davida, naakamana lukanzo lwa-Leza mucizukulu cakwe mwini, wakafwa, wazikwa kumawisi, wabola,
kwala oyo ngwaakabusya Leza takabolede pe.
Aboobo nobakwesu, amuzibe kuti nkaambo kayooyo mwaambilwa kujatilwa kwazibi,
alimwi nkaambo kakwe umwi umwi uusyoma ulalulami-kwa zyoonse nzomwatakali kukonzya kululamikilwa nzizyo kumulao waMusa.
Nkaako amucenjele kuti mutasikilwi eco icakaambwa musinsimi kuti,
Amulange, nywebo nomunenya, muyoowe, mumane,
Nkaambo ndacita mulimo kumazuba aanu,
Mulimo ngomutakoozumina, muntu namwaambila.
Nobakazwa mucikombelo, bakakumbila kuti bakambaukilwe aya majwi amu-Sabata iiza.
Mubungano nowakamwaika, banjibanji kuba-Juda akubamasi basandule abakomba bakacilila ba-Paulo a-Barnaba. Balo nobakaamba kulimbabo, bakabalailila kuti kabaceenda muluzyalo lwa-Leza.
Eno mu-Sabata iicilila, munzi woonse wati kamaninine kukubunganina kuswiilila makani aa-Leza.
Pele ba-Juda nobakabona makamu makamu aabantu bakaba ebbivwe, bakazya makani ngaali kwaamba Paulo, balasampaula.
Kwalo Paulo a-Barnaba bakaamba ecamba bati, Kwali kweelede kuti makani aa-Leza aambilwe ndinywe lutaanzi, eno mbomwaakaka buya, akuti tamweelede buumi butamani, mbubo, tulasandukila kulibamasi.
Nkaambo mbombuboobo Mwami mbwaakatulailila kuti,
Ndakubika kuti ube mumuni kulibamasi,
Kuti utole lufutuko mane kusikila kumamanino aanyika.
Nobakamvwa obo bamasi bakabotelwa, balemeka makani aa-Leza, abaabo abasalidwe buumi butamani basyoma.
Nkabela makani aa-Mwami akamwaika mucisi eco coonse,
Pele ba-Juda bakasungilizya bakaintu balemu abakomba, abapati bamunzi, bakabusizya ba-Paulo a-Barnaba mapenzi, babatanda mucisi cabo,
Balo bakabakunkumwida lusuko lwakumatende aabo, bainka ku-Ikoniyo.
Basikwiiya bakazyula kubotelwa a-Muuya Uusalala.
Mu-Ikoniyo bakanjila amwi mucikombelo caba-Juda, kukukambauka kwabo banji ba-Juda aba-Helene bakasyoma.
Pele ba-Juda basicinguni bakabusya myuuya yabamasi, babatongaukizya mane babisizya babunyina.
Nkaambo kaako bakaakukala oko ciindi cilamfu, balakambauka ecamba mu-Mwami, walo wakazibya kusinizya kwejwi lyaluzyalo lwakwe, kukupa kuti zitondezyo amalele acitwe kumaanza aabo,
Pele bantu bamumunzi bakaandaana, bamwi bakali kuba-Juda, bamwi kubaapostolo,
Nkabela bamasi, antoomwe aba-Juda abami babo, nobati kababukile kubapenzya akubafusa mabwe,
bakaakuziba, batijila ku-Lustro aku-Derbe, minzi yamu-Lukaoniya, akucisi cizingulukide,
oko bakambauka Makani Mabotu.
Eno ku-Lustro kwakali mwaalumi uwatakali kujisi nguzu kumaulu aakwe, wali kutyokede kuzwa mwida lyabanyina, taakwe naakali kweenda pe.
Oyo wakamumvwa Paulo ulaamba, walo naakamulangisisya akubona kuti ujisi lusyomo lwakuponyegwa,
wakati ejwi pati, Ima cakoololoka amaulu aako. Mpoonya wakasotoka, weendeenda.
Nkabela makamu makamu aabantu nobakabona ncaakacita Paulo, bakoompolola muci-Lukaoniya bati, Mizimo yatuselukila eziimo zyabantu,
Eno Barnaba bakamwaamba kuti ngu-Jupitere, a-Paulo kuti ngu-Merkuri, nkaambo ngowali kwiinda kukukambauka.
Nkabela mupaizi wacikombelo ca-Jupitere, icakali kumbele lyamunzi, wakaleta basune engala zyamalangalanga kumilyango, kuti apaile antoomwe amakamu makamu aabantu.
Kwale baapostolo, ba-Barnaba a-Paulo, nobakamvwa obo, bakazapaula zyakusama zyabo, basotokela mukati kabantu, baloompolola,

bati, Nobaalumi, ino mucitilanzi zintu ezi? Aswebo tuli bantu buyo mbuli ndinywe, tumukambaukila Makani Mabotu kuti muzileke ezi zintu zyabuyo, musandukile kuli-Leza uupona, uwakacita ijulu enyika, alwizi, azintu zyoonse izili mumo,
Kuciindi cakamana wakaleka masi oonse kuti aende muziyanza zyao.
Nokubaboobo takalekede kulilungulula walo, mbwaakacita kabotu akumupa imvula eziindi zyazilyo izizwa kujulu, wazuzya myoyo yanu kulya akubotelwa.
Bakaamba majwi aya, nokubaboobo kwakacili kuyumu kukasya makamu makamu aabantu kuti batabapaili.
Kwalo kwakasika ba-Juda abakazwa ku-Antiokeya aku-Ikoniyo, bakabasungilizya abo bantu, bafusa Paulo mabwe, bamukwelela kunze amunzi, bayeeya kuti wafwa,
Pele basikwiiya nobakacili kwiimvwi mumbali lyakwe, wakabuka, waima wanjila mumunzi. Nobwakaca bakainka a-Barnaba ku-Derbe,
Nobakakambauka Makani Mabotu kulooyo munzi akusandula basikwiiya banjibanji, bakabweeda ku-Lustro, aku-Ikoniyo, akuAntiokeya.
Bali kuya buyumya myoyo yabasikwiiya akubalaya kuti bajatisye kulusyomo bati, kumapenzi manjimanji inga tulanjila mu-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Mumbungano zyoonse nobakabasalila bapati, akukomba mukuliimya kulya, bakababika ku-Mwami ngobali kusyomede.
Nkabela bakaandulula mu-Pisidiya, basika ku-Pamfuliya,
Nobakakambauka makani ku-Perge, bakaselemukila ku-Ataliya,
kuzwa oko bakaboola ku-Antiokeya abwaato, nkobakapedwe kuluzyalo lwa-Leza kuya kumulimo ngobakamanide.
Nobakaakusika bakabunganya mbungano, babalungulwida zyoonse Leza nzyaakabacitila, akuti wakajulila bamasi mulyango walusyomo.
Eno bakakala abasikwiiya ciindi cilamfu-lamfu.
Elyo kwakasika bamwi abazwa ku-Judaya, bali kwiisya babunyina bati, Kuti mwatapalulwa mbuli ciyanza ca-Musa, tamukonzyi kufutulwa.
Nkabela ba-Paulo a-Barnaba nobakakazyanisya akubuzyanya abo, kwakaambwa kuti Paulo a-Barnaba abamwi babo bainke ku-Jerusalemu kubaapostolo akubapati, bakabuzye makani ayo.
Aboobo balo bakasindikilwa mbungano, bakainda mu-Foinike amu-Samariya, bali kuya bwaamba kusanduka kwabamasi, babotezesya babunyina boonse.
Nobakaakusika ku-Jerusalemu, bakatambulwa mbungano abaapostolo abapati, babalungulwida zyoonse Leza nzyaakabacitila,
Kwalo kwakanyamuka bamwi benkamu yaba-Farisi, basyomi, bati, Kuleelede kubapalula akubalailila kuti bajate mulao wa-Musa.
Nkabela bakabungana baapostolo abapati kuti baambaule makani aya.
Nobakali kubuzyanisisya, Petro wakanyamuka, wabaambila kuti:
Nobaalumi bakwesu, mulizi kuti kalekale Leza wakandisala kulindinywe, kuti amulomo wangu bamasi bakamvwe Makani Mabotu, bakasyome.
Eno Leza, uuzi myoyo, wakabasinizisya, wabapa Muuya Uusalala mbubonya mbwaakatupa aswebo,
taakwe naakatwaandaanya swebo abalo pe, wakasalazya myoyo yabo alusyomo.
Aboobo mumusunkilanzi Leza kuti mubike jokwe ansingo zyabasikwiiya, ndobatakali kukonzya kuyumuna bamatateesu notuba ndiswe.
Pele tusyoma kuti tulafutulwa aluzyalo lwa-Mwami Jesu, mbubonya mbuli mbabo.
Eno bantu boonse bakaumuna, baswiilila Barnaba a-Paulo, balalungulula zitondezyo amalele ngaakabacitya Leza kulibamasi.
Nobakaleka kwaamba, Jakobo wakavuwa kuti,
Nobaalumi bakwesu, amundiswiilile,
Simoni wakaamba mbwaakatalika Leza kuyeeya bamasi, kuti asale kulimbabo bantu kuzina lyakwe.
Aleelyo ijwi lileelene amajwi aabasinsimi, mbubonya mbokulembedwe kuti,
Munsi lyazintu ezi ndilaboola,
Ndizooyakulula ŋanda ya-Davida iiwide,
Ndizooyakulula kumwaika kwayo,
Akwiimikizya:
Kuti bantu abasyeede bayandaule Jehova,
Abamasi boonse abaitwa ezina lyangu.
Mbwaamba Jehova uucita zintu ezi
Izizibwa kuzwa kumalengelo aanyika.
Nkaako ndateeti mebo, Tutabakataazyi abazwa masi, abasandukila kuliLeza,
Pele atubalembele kuti balikasye zisofweede zyamizimo, amamambi, akulizisinwa, akubulowa.
Nkaambo Musa, kuzwa kalekale, muminzi yoonse, ulijisi abo abamukambauka, muma-Sabata oonse ulabalwa muzikombelo zyaba-Juda.

Eno kwakababotela baapostolo abapati, antoomwe embungano yoonse, kuti batumine ku-Antiokeya bantu abakasalwa kulimbabo, antoomwe abaPaulo a-Barnaba. Mbaaba: Juda uutegwa Barsaba, a-Sila, baalumi bapati kulibabunyina.
Nkabela bakalemba lugwalo kumaanza aabo kuti, Tobaapostolo ababunyina bapati tulamwaanzya nobabunyina bamasi bakuAntiokeya, aku-Suriya, aku-Kilikiya.
Mbotwakamvwa kuti bamwi abakazwa kulindiswe bakamukataazya amakani, bazungaanya myoyo yanu, kwalo takukwe notwabalailila,
mbotwaba amoyo omwe kwatubotela kuti tumutumine baalumi abakasalwa, antoomwe abayandwa besu ba-Barnaba a-Paulo,
bantu abakapeda buumi bwabo nkaambo kezina lya-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo.
Nkaako twatuma ba-Juda a-Sila, balo balamwaambila nzizyonya zintu ezi amulomo.
Nkaambo kwakabotela Muuya Uusalala, aswebo, kuti tutamubikili mukuli mulemu uuinda ezi izyeelede,
zyakuti mulikasye kulya izipailwa mizimo akubulowa, akulizisinwa, akumamambi. Kuti mwalikasya kulizeezyo mulacita kabotu. Kamupona.
Eno abo batume nobakalazigwa, bakaselemuka kuya ku-Antiokeya, babunganya bantu, babapa lugwalo,
Nobakalubala, bakabotelwa kukulaililwa oko.
Nkabela ba-Juda a-Sila, mbobali bakambausi abalo, bakalaya babunyina majwi manjimanji, babayumya.
Nobakakala oko kaindi, babunyina bakabaleka muluumuno, kuti babweede kulibaabo abakabatumide.
Kwalo kwakabotela Sila kuti asyaale oko.
Awalo Paulo a-Barnaba bakacili kukala ku-Antiokeya, balaiisya akukambauka makani aa-Mwami, antoomwe abamwi banjibanji.
Nocakaba ciindi Paulo wakati kuli-Barnaba, Atubweede eno, tukalingule babunyina bamuninzi yoonse motwakali kukambauka makani aa-Leza, tubone mbobeenda.
Eno Barnaba wakali kuyanda kutolelela a-Johane uutegwa Marko,
kwalo Paulo wali kuyeeya kuti takweelede kutolelela ayooyo uwakabasia ku-Pamfuliya akutainka abo kumulimo.
Aboobo kwakaba kukazyanya kupati mane bakaandaana. Barnaba wakatola Marko, wainka ku-Kupro abwaato,
kwalo Paulo wakasala Sila, wainka, babunyina bamubika kuluzyalo lwa-Mwami.
Wakaandulula mu-Suriya akuKilikiya, uya buyumya mbungano ezyo.
Elyo wakasika ku-Derbe aku-Lustra, oko kwakali sikwiiya uutegwa Timoteo, mwana amukaintu mu-Juda musyomi, pele wisi wali mu­ Helene.
Walo wakali empuwo mbotu kulibabunyina bamu-Lustra amuIkoniyo.
