Paulo wakamuyanda oyo kuti bainke awalo, nkabela wakamutola wamupalula nkaambo kaba-Juda abakali kulaayo masena, nkaambo boonse bali kuzi wisi wali mu-Helene.
Elyo nobakali kuya bwiinda muminzi, bali kubapa milao iyakaambwa baapostolo abapati bamu-Jerusalemu, kuti biicite.
Aboobo imbungano zyakayumizigwa kulusyomo, akuvuzigwa mazuba oonse.
Nkabela bakainda mucisi ca-Frigiya eca-Galatiya, bakakasigwa Muuya Uusalala kwaamba makani mu-Asiya,
nobakasika kumbali a-Musiya, bati kasoleke kunjila mu-Bituniya, kwalo Muuya wa-Jesu tuukabazuminide,
nkabela ku-Musiya bakaindilila buyo, baselemuka kuya ku-Trowa.
Eno masiku Paulo wakasikilwa cilengaano. Mwaalumi waku-Makedoniya wakaliimvwi, ulamukombelela kuti, Zubukila ku-Makedoniya, utugwasye.
Naakabona cilengaano, ndilyonya twakasoleka kuya ku-Makedoniya, twali kusyoma kuti Leza ngowakatwiita kuti tukabakambaukile Makani Mabotu.
Notwakazwa ku-Trowa abwaato, twakalulama kuya ku-Samotrake, buce ku-Niapoli,
kuzwa oko twakaya ku-Filipi, kumunzi wamu-Makedoniya, walo ngomunzi mupati wamucisi eco, mobali kukala ba-Roma. Mulooyo munzi twakali kulyokezya mazuba amwi.
Kubuzuba bwa-Sabata twakazwa mumunzi, twainka kumbali amulonga, nkotwali kuyeeya kuti nkokukombelwa, nkabela twakakala twakambaukila bakaintu abakali kubungene,

Eno kwakali mukaintu umwi uwakali kuswiilila uutegwa Ludiya, uwali sikuuzya masila aasia, wakumunzi wa-Tiyatira, uwali kukomba Leza. Mwami wakajula moyo wakwe kuti aswiililisye kukukambauka kwa-Paulo.
Naakabapatizigwa walo abeŋanda yakwe, wakatukumbilisya kuti, Na mwati ndisyomekede ku-Mwami amunjile muŋanda yangu, mukale. Wakatukombekzya.
Elyo notwakali kuya kubusena bukombelwa, twakaswaana musimbi uwali amuuya wakusonda, uwakavubya basimalelaakwe akusonda.
Walo wakacilila Paulo aswebo, uloompolola kuti, Aba bantu mbazike ba-Leza, Sijulu lyamajulu, abatukambaukila nzila yakufutuka.
Wakacita obo mazuba manjimanji. Kwalo Paulo wakapya moyo, wacebuka wati kumuuya, Muzina lya-Jesu Kristo ndakulailila kuti uzwe mulinguwe. Wakazwa nciconya eco ciindi.
Eno basimalelaakwe nobakabona kuti impindu njobakali kulangilila yamana, bakajata Paulo a-Sila, akubakwelela munkuta kumbele lyabami,
nobakabatola kubabetesi bakati, Aba bantu, mbobali ba-Juda, banyonyonganisya munzi wesu,
balaamba ziyanza nzotuteelede kuzitambula akuzicita, swebo toba-Roma.
Ndilyonya bantu bakababukila, ababetesi bakabazapawida zyakusama zyabo, balailila kuti baumwe milusu.
Nobakabauma mabunda mabunda bakabanjizya muntolongo, balailila uulindila ntolongo kuti abalindilisisye.
Walo alaililwe obo, wakabanjizya muntolongo iili akati, waanga maulu aabo muziliba.
Kwalo akati kamasiku ba-Paulo a-Sila bakali kukomba akwiimbila Leza nyimbo, abaange bali kubaswiilide.
Ndilyonya kwakaba muzunzumo mupati wenyika, kwakazunganyizigwa ntalisyo zyentolongo. Mpoonya milyango yoonse yakajuka, zyakaangunuka nkeetani zyabo boonse.
Uulindila ntolongo naakasinsimuka akubona milyango yentolongo ili bukwazi, wakasomona ceba lyakwe, wati kalijaye, mbwaakali kuyeeya kuti baange baloboka.
Kwalo Paulo wakoompolola ejwi pati wati, Utalibisyi, mpotuli toonse,
Nkabela wakaita mimuni, wasotokela mukati ulazyangama, wawida kumatende aaba-Paulo a-Sila,
wabagwisya wati, Nobami ino ndicirenzi kuti ndifutulwe?
Bakati, Syoma ku-Mwami Jesu, noti futulwe yebo abeŋanda yako.
Mpoonya bakamwaambila makani aa-Mwami, antoomwe abamuŋanda yakwe boonse.
Nkabela wabatola nciconya ciindi eco camasiku, wabasanzya­ mabunda aabo. Ndilyonya wabapatizigwa antoomwe abana bakwe boonse.
Wakabanjizya muŋanda yakwe akubapa cakulya, kaboteledwe kapati, abeŋanda yakwe boonse, mbobasyoma Leza.
Nobwakaca babetesi bakatuma bamapolisa bati, Amubaleke abo bantu,
Nkabela uulindila ntolongo wakaambila Paulo majwi aya wati, Babetesi batuma kuti mulekwe, eno amuzwe, mwiinke muluumuno,
Kwalo Paulo wakati kulimbabo, Bakatuumina antangalala, katutakwe mulandu pe, swebo toba-Roma, batuniizya muntolongo. Eno bayanda kutugwisizya kumbali na? Ha! pe, ababoole beni, batugwisye.
Bamapolisa bakatola majwi aya kubabetesi, balo bakayoowa nobakamvwa kuti mba-Roma,
baboola bakakombelezya. Nobakabagwisya, bakabakumbila kuti bazwe mumunzi.
Bakazwa muntolongo, bainka kuŋanda ya-Ludiya. Nobakabonana ababunyina, bakabayumya, bainka.
Nobakainda mu-Amfipoli amu-Apoloniya, bakasika ku-Tesalonika, ukwakali cikombelo caba-Juda,
Eno Paulo, mbuli mbwaakazibide, wakanjila kulimbabo, Ma-Sabata otatwe wakabandika abo makani aaMagwalo,
ulapandulula akutondezya kuti Kristo wakeelede kupenga akubuka kubafu. Alimwi wakati, Oyu Jesu ngwemwaambila, ngonguwe Kristo.
Nkabela bamwi babo bakasyoma, basangana aba-Paulo a-Sila, abanjibanji kuba-Helene abakomba, abakaintu balemu abatali bace.
Kwalo ba-Juda mbobakaba abbivwe, bakatolelela abamwi beendeendi bapelenge, balibunga nkamu, bapyopyonganya munzi, nkabela bazingana ŋanda ya-Jasoni, bayanda kubatola kulibasicisi,
Nobatakabajana ba-Paulo a-Sila, bakakwelela Jasoni abamwi babunyina kubeendelezi bamumunzi, baloompolola kuti, Abo abasandamuna nyika basika akookuno,
mbaatambula Jasoni. Abo boonse basotoka milao ya-Kaisara, balati, Kwali umwi mwami uutegwa Jesu.
Makani ayo akazinga bantu abeendelezi bamumunzi, nobakaamvwa.
Nkabela nobakatola cilesyo kuli-Jasoni akubeenzinyina, bakabaleka.
Ndilyonya masiku babunyina bakatuma ba-Paulo a-Sila ku-Bereya. Balo nobakasika oko, bakanjila mucikombelo caba-Juda.
Abakooko bakaliluleme kwiinda abo baku-Tesalonika, nkaambo bakatambula makani emyoyo ilibambide kabotu, balalingaula Magwalo mazuba oonse, kubona kuti na zintu ezi mbozibede.
Nkaako banjibanji babo bakasyoma, abalo banjibanji baba-Giriki, bakaintu balemu abaalumi.
Kwalo ba-Juda baku-Tesalonika nobakaziba kuti Paulo ukambauka ijwi lya-Leza ku-Bereya, bakasika akwalo kuzookopenganya akupenzya makamu makamu aabantu.
Ndilyonya babunyina bakatuma Paulo kuti ainke mane kusikila kulwizi, pele ba-Sila a-Timoteo bakasyaala oko.
Pele abo abakasindikila Paulo bakamusisya ku-Atene, Nkabela nobakaambilwa kuti bakaite ba-Sila a-Timoteo kuti bafwambaane kuboola kulinguwe, bakainka.
Paulo naakali kubalindila mu-Atene, moyo wakwe wakaata mucamba cakwe naakabona munzi uzywide zikozyano zyamizimo.
Aboobo mucikombelo wakabandika aba-Juda abaabo abakomba, akwalo kucisambalilo wali kubandika mazuba oonse abantu mbaali kuswaana nkuko.

Abalo basongo bamwi baba-Epikureya ababa-Stoiki bakamujanikizya. Bamwi bati, Ino oyu mubwelebwezi uambanzi? Bamwi bati, Ubaanga mukambausi wamizimo iitazibwa, Bakaamba obo nkaambo wakakambauka Jesu akubuka kwabafu.
Nkabela bakamujata, bamutola kunkuta yamu-Atene balati, Sena inga ulatuzibya oku kwiisya kupya nkokambauka ankuko?
Nkaambo waleta makani meenzu kumatwi eesu, Nkaako ncotuyanda kuziba mbwaabede aya,
Eno boonse bamu-Atene abalo bamasi abakakede oko tabakali kujisi ciindi, pele cakwaamba acakuswiilila buyo makani mapya.
Nkabela wakaima mukati kenkuta wati:
Nobaalumi bamu-Atene, kulizyoonse ndabona kuti mukombesya mizimo,
Nkaambo nendakali kuya bwiinda akweebela nzomukomba, ndakabona acalo cipaililo icilembedwe kuti, ECI NCICA-LEZA UUTAZIZILWE, Eno oyo ngomukomba cakutamuziba, ngonguwe ngwemwaambila.
Leza uwakalenga nyika azintu zyoonse izili mumo, oyu mbwali Mwami wejulu enyika, takali muzikombelo zicitwa amaanza.
Alimwi tabelekelwi maanza aabantu, tali uubula cintu pe, nkaambo ngonguwe mwini nguubapa boonse buumi, amuuya, azintu zyoonse.
Wakaacita masi oonse aabantu kukulengwa komwe, kuti akale munyika yoonse, Wakabika ziindi nzyaakaabilwa aminyinza yamakalo aao.
Kayanda kuti bamuyandaule Leza, kuti kukumwaampasya ambweni balamujana, nokubaboobo tali kule kuluumwi umwi wesu.
Nkaambo mulinguwe motupona, motuputa, motubede, mbubonya mbobakaamba bamwi balembi banu kuti, Aswebo tuli bana bakwe.
Eno mbotuli bana ba-Leza, tatweelede kucita anga Leza ulakozyanisigwa engolida, niiba nsiliva, neliba ibbwe, izyakabezwa abuuza amaanu aamuntu.
Ziindi ezyo zyakutaziba Leza wakazileka buyo, kwalo sunu ulailila bantu kuti kumasena oonse boonse basanduke,
nkaambo wabika buzuba mbwati kabeteke nyika mubululami, kumwaalumi oyo ngwasungwide. Wakabapa bantu boonse cisinizyo camakani ayo mbwaakamubusya kubafu.
Eno nobakamvwa makani aakubuka kwabafu, bamwi bakasabula, bamwi bakati, Tuyookumvwa alimwi amakani aya.
Aboobo Paulo wakazwa kulimbabo,
Pele bamwi baalumi bakakakatila kulinguwe, basyoma. Akati kabo kwakali Dionisiyo mu-Areopagi, amukaintu uutegwa Damari, abamwi mbobakali abo.
Munsi lyakooko Paulo wakazwa mu-Atene, wainka ku-Korinto,
Oko wakaakujana mu-Juda uutegwa Akula, mu-Ponto, uwakazwa akuzwa ku-Italiya a-Priskila mukaintu wakwe, nkaambo Klaudiyo wakali kulailide kuti ba-Juda boonse bamu-Roma bazwe. Wakainka kulimbabo,
Eno mulimo wabo mbuwali umwi, wakakala abo, babeleka, nkaambo bakali baluki bamatente kumulimo wabo.
Wakakambauka mucikombelo amumaSabata oonse, ukombelezya ba-Juda aba-Helene.
Elyo nobakasika ba-Sila a-Timoteo kuzwa ku-Makedoniya, Paulo wakanjidwe makani, wakabalungulwida ba-Juda kuti Jesu ngu-Kristo.
Pele nobakakazya akusampaula wakakunkumuna zyakusama zyakwe, wati kulimbabo, Bulowa bwanu abube atala amitwe yanu, ndasalala mebo, ukuzwa sunu ndaya kulibamasi.
Wakazwa awo wakanjila muŋanda yamwaalumi uukomba Leza uutegwa Tito Justo, iŋanda yakwe yakali kubambene acikombelo,
Awalo Krispo, mupati wacikombelo, wakasyoma ku-Mwami antoomwe abeŋanda yakwe boonse. Abalo banjibanji baba-Korinto abakaswiilide bakasyoma, babapatizigwa.
Nkabela masiku Mwami wakaambila Paulo mucilengaano kuti, Utayoowi, pele kocaamba, utaumuni,
nkaambo ndili ayebo, taakwe muntu uuti kubukile, akubisye, nkaambo ndijisi bantu banjibanji mununzi muno,
Elyo wakakala omo mwaaka emyeezi iili musanu muumwi, ulaiisya makani aa-Leza akati kabo.
Eno Galiyo naakali mweendelezi waku-Akaya, ba-Juda bakamubukila Paulo amoyo omwe, bamutola kulubeta,
bati, Oyu muntu usungilizya bantu kukomba Leza kuciyanza icaandeene amulao.
Kwalo Paulo naati kaambe, Galiyo wakati kuba-Juda, Nywebo noba-Juda, makani aya anooli aakubisya na aamaanu mabi nenjeelede kumuswiilila,
pele anooli aakukazyanya amajwi, amazina, amulao wanu, amulibonene nobeni kulingao, nsiyandi kubeteka ayo mebo.
Nkabela wakabatanda kulubeta,
Mpoonya awo boonse bakajata Sostene, mupati wacikombelo, bamuuma mubbetekelo. Pele Galiyo katakwe makani azintu ezyo zyoonse pe.
Paulo naakacikede oko mazuba manjimanji, nkabela wakalaya babunyina, wainka abwaato kuya ku-Suriya, antoomwe a-Priskila a-Akula, Mutwe wakwe wakalinyweedwe mu-Kenkreya, nkaambo kakulyaanga kuli-Leza,
Bakasika ku-Efese, awo wakabasia, walo wanjila mucikombelo, wabandika aba-Juda.
Nobakamukombelezya kuti akale abalo kaindi, takazuminide,
pele wakabalaya wakati, Ncobeni ndileelede kusika kumubungano uuza mu-Jerusalemu, kwalo ndizooboola kulindinywe, na Leza wayanda, Elyo wakazwa mu-Efeso abwaato.
Naakazubukila ku-Kaisareya, wakaakwaanzya mbungano, nkabela wakaselemukila ku-Antiokeya.
Naakakala oko kaindi wakainka, waandulula cisi ca-Galatiya eca-Frigiya, uya buyumya basikwiiya boonse.
Elyo kwakasika ku-Efeso mu-Juda umwi uutegwa Apolo, mu-Alesandreya, mwaalumi uuide, wali singuzu mu-Magwalo.
Oyu muntu wakaiisigwa nzila ya-Mwami, eno nkaambo kakupya kwamoyo wakwe, wakakambauka akwiisya kabotu makani aa-Jesu, wakalizi lubapatizyo lwa-Johane buyo.
Walo wakatalika kukambauka ecamba mucikombelo. Pele ba-Akula a-Priskila nobakamumvwa, bakamutola kulimbabo, bamupandulwida kabotu nzila ya-Leza.
Limwi, naakakanza kuzubukila ku-Akaya, babunyina bakamuyumya, balembela basikwiiya kuti bamutambule. Naakasika wakabagwasya kapati abo abakasyoma muluzyalo lwa-Leza,
nkaambo ba-Juda wakabazunda enguzu mukati kabantu, ulatondezya a-Magwalo kuti Jesu ngu-Kristo.
Eno Apolo naakacili ku-Korinto, Paulo wakaandulula mucisi icitabambene alwizi, wasika ku-Efese, waakujana basikwiiya bamwi oko.
Nkabela wakababuzya kuti, Sena mwakatambula Muuya Uusalala nomwakasyoma? Balo bakamuvuwa bakati, Totwakalina akumvwa kuti a-Muuya Uusalala mpuuli.
Wakati, Ino ndubapatizyonzi lwanu? Bakavuwa kuti, Ndubapatizyo lwa-Johane.
Paulo wakateeti, Ena, Johane wakabapatizya alubapatizyo lwakusanduka, wali kwaambila bantu kuti basyome kulooyo uuza munsi lyakwe, nkokuti nguwenya Jesu,
Elyo nobakamvwa obo, bakabapatizigwa muzina lya-Mwami Jesu.
Nkabela Paulo naakabika maanza alimbabo, Muuya Uusalala wakabaselukila bakaamba emilaka, basinsima.
Eno abo boonse bati kabe baalumi abali kumi mubabili.
Elyo wakanjila mucikombelo, wakakambauka ecamba myeezi yotatwe, ulasandulana akukombelela makani aa-Bwami bwa-Leza.
Pele bamwi nobakaliyumya-yumya, akukaka, akusampaula nzila eyo kumbele lyabantu, wakabasia, watola basikwiiya, mazuba oonse wali kwaambaula mucikolo ca-Turano.
Kwakacitwa obo myaaka yobile, aboobo boonse abakakede mn-Asiya bakamvwa makani aa-Mwami, ba-Juda aba-Helene,
Eno Leza wakacita malele mapati amaanza aa-Paulo,
kwakatolwa kubalwazi tusila utwali kuzwa amubili wakwe, nkabela zilwazi zyabo zyakapona, emyuuya iisofweede yakazwa.
Kwalo bamwi ba-Juda abeendeenda, basikutanda basikazwa, bakalibwezela kwaamba zina lya-Mwami Jesu atala lyabaabo abakali amyuuya mibi bakati, Ndamulailila muli-Jesu ngwakambauka Paulo.
Eno kwakali baalumi abali musanu mubabili, bana ba-Skeva, mu-Juda, mupaizi mupati, abakali kucita obo.
Pele muuya mubi wakavuwa wakati, Jesu ndilimuzi a-Paulo ndimuzi, pele nywebo ndinywe bani ino?
Ndilyonya mwaalumi oyo uwakanjidwe muuya mubi wakabasotokela, wakaba anguzu kwiinda boonse bobile, wabazunda, batija kuŋanda eyo, bali ezinswe eziliciso.
Makani ayo akazibwa kulimbabo boonse abakakede mu-Efese, ba-Juda aba-Helene, Boonse bakayoowa, izina lya-Mwami Jesu lyakalemekwa.
Abanjibanji abakasyomede bakaboola, balazumina akutondezya milimo yabo.
Alimwi banjibanji abakali basonzi bakabungika mabbuku aabo, bakaatenta kumbele lyabo boonse. Kwakabalwa mali aabukwebo bwao, kwakajanwa kuti mbwamasiliva aali myaanda yosanwe yemyaanda.
Mbombubo obo makani aa-Mwami mbwaakakomena akuzunda enguzu.
Nozyakamana ezi zintu Paulo wakakanza mumoyo wakwe kuti, aakwiinda mu-Makedoniya amu-Akaya, uyooinka ku-Jerusalemu wakati, Ndaakusika oko, ndileelede kuyoobona aku-Roma.
Nkabela wakatuma bobile babagwasyi bakwe, Timoteo a-Erasto, kuya ku-Makedoniya, walo wakacili kukede mu-Asiya kaindi.
Eno kuciindi eco kwakaba lupyopyongano lupati nkaambo kenzila ya-Mwami,
Kwakali muntu uutegwa Demetriyo, mufuzi wensiliva, uwakacita tukombelo twensiliva twa-Diana, akuvubya basimilimo mali manji.
Wakababunganya balo, antoomwe abaabo abakali kubeleka mulimo uukozyene ayooyo wakati, Nobaalumi, mulizi kuti kumulimo oyu nkotujana buvubi bwesu.
Alimwi mwabona akumvwa kuti Paulo ulya ulakombelezya akufutamuna bantu banjibanji, abatali baku-Efeso kulike, pele kuti kukabe amu-Asiya moonse, ulati abacitwa amaanza tabali baleza pe.
Eno tuuli mulimo wesu walo uti zululwe, pele ecalo cikombelo camuzimo mupati Diana cilaba cintu buyo, mane awalo ugwisigwe kubulemu bwakwe, ngobakomba bamu-Asiya boonse abamunyika yoonse.
Nobakamvwa obo, bakazula bukali, bakoompolola bakati, Diana waba-Efeso mupati,
Ndilyonya munzi woonse wakazyula lupyopyongano, bakazuzaana amoyo omwe kuya kucibunganino, bajata Gayo a-Aristarko, baalumi baku-Makedoniya, abakasindikide Paulo.
Elyo Paulo nati kanjile kubantu, basikwiiya tabakamuzuminide.
Abalo bamwi bapati bamu-Asiya, beenzinyina Paulo, bakatuma kulinguwe kuyoomukumbila kuti atalibonyi mucibunganino.
Aboobo bamwi bakoompolola cimwi, abamwi icimbi, nkaambo imbungano yakalipyopyongene, banjibanji tabakalizi ncobakali kubunganine.
Eno bakagwisya Alesandro kubantu, aba-Juda bamutonkela kumbele. Nkabela Alesandro wakatambika janza, wati kalyaambilile kubantu.
Pele nobakaziba kuti mu-Juda, boonse bakaba ciwi lyomwe, baloompolola mane ati kainde maola obile balati, Diana waba-Efeso mupati!
Elyo simagwalo wamumunzi naakabaumuzya bantu wakateeti, Nobaalumi bamu-Efeso, nguni muntu uutezi kuti munzi waba-Efeso ngonguwo uubamba cikombelo ca-Diana mupati, ecikozyano icakawa kuzwa kujulu?
Eno mbwaataka-zigwa makani aya, nywebo mweelede kuumuna, mutaciti cakufwanzya-fwanzya,
nkaambo mwaleta baalumi aba, abatabbi muzikombelo, nobaba abasampaula muzimo wesu.
Nkaako na ba-Demetriyo abasimilimo mbali abo banoojisi makani aamuntu, mazuba mpaali aakubeteka mulandu, ababetesi mpobali, kabazangana lwabo beni.
Pele mwanoojisi makani amwi ngomubuzya, ayookosolwa mumbungano iielede,
nkaambo ncobeni twati bikwe mulandu walupyopyongano lwabuzuba buno nkaambo taakwe ncolweelede pe, alimwi taakwe ncotukonzya kuvuwa akubungana oku.
Naakamana kwaamba obo wakamwaisya mbungano.
Nokwakamana lupyopyongano, Paulo naakaita basikwiiya akukalika myoyo yabo, wakabasia wainka ku-Makedoniya.
Aakwaandulula mu­ zisi ezyo akubayumya bantu amajwi manjimanji, wakanjila mucisi caba-Giriki,
oko wakaakumana myeezi yotatwe, Nati kainke abwaato ku-Suriya, ba-Juda bakavwiyana aanguwe, nkabela wakakanza kwiinda ku-Makedoniya kukubweeda.
Wakasindikilwa mane kusikila ku-Asiya, Sopatero wakuBereya, mwana a-Puro, aba-Aristarko a-Sekundu baku-Tesalonika, a-Gayo waku-Derbe, a-Timoteo, aba-Tukiko a-Trofimo baku-Asiya,
Pele abo abakainkide kumbele, baakutulindila ku-Trowa,
Swebo twakainka abwaato kuzwa ku-Filipi naakamana mazuba aamukamu uutakwe mimena, twasika kulimbabo ku-Trowa mumazuba osanwe, twaakukala oko mazuba aali musanu mwaabili.
Eno kubuzuba butaanzi bwensondo, notwakabungene kukomona mukamu, Paulo wakabakambaukila, wali kukanza kwiinka bwaca. Nkabela wakakambauka mane akati kamasiku,
Eno kwakali malambe manjimanji muŋanda yamujulu motwakali kubungene,

Acipulo cacimboni kwali kukede mulombe uutegwa Utiko, ulafukula eŋonzi mpati. Eno Paulo mbwaakatola ciindi kukambauka, oyo mbwaakazundwa ŋonzi mpati, wakawida ansi kuzwa kuŋanda yatatu yamujulu, wakabwezwa ulifwide.
Mpoonya Paulo wakaseluka, wawida alinguwe, wamubukata wati, Mutalili, nkaambo muuya wakwe mpuucili.
Nkabela wakabweeda mujulu, wakomona mukamu, walya, waambaula abo ciindi cilamfu mane bwaca, ndilyonya wakainka.
Bakakaleta kalombe ako kalapona, bakabotelwa kapati.
Pele swebo twakasolola kuya kubwaato mbotwakainka ambubo ku-Aso, nkotwakakanza kucinzya Paulo, nkaambo mbombuboobo mbwaakaamba, walo wali kuyeeya kweenda amaulu,
Naakatuswaana ku-Aso, twakamunjizya, twakasika ku-Mitilene.
Twakazwa oko abwaato, buce twakasika kubambene a-Kiyo, nobwakaca twakazubukila ku-Samo, alimwi nobwakaca twakasika ku-Melito.
Nkaambo Paulo wakakanzide kwiindilila buyo baakusika ku-Efese, kuti atamuki mu-Asiya, nkaambo wakalibindide kut kwaakukonzeka, akabe mu-Jerusalemu kubuzuba bwa-Pentekoste.
Naakali mu-Melito wakatumina ku-Efeso, kuyooita bapati bembungano.
Nobakasika wakabaambila kuti:
Nywebo nobeni mulizi mbokwali kubede kweenda kwangu akati kanu ciindi coonse, kuzwida kubuzuba mbwendakatalika kusika mu-Asiya,
Ndakabelekela Mwami akulyeetezya kwamoyo woonse, amisozi, amasunko aakandisikila nkaambo kamakanze aaba-Juda.
Nsikamusisilide akaniini kumwaambila aamweelede, ndakamwiisya mukati kabantu akunjilauka mumaanda.
Ndakali kulungulwida ba-Juda aba-Helene kuti basandukile kuli-Leza, basyome Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo,
Eno ndiya ku-Jerusalemu ndyaangidwe mumuuya, nkentezi zintu iziti kandisikile oko,
pele muminzi yoonse Muuya Uusalala ulandilungulwida kuti kulindilindilide kwaangwa amapenzi,

Kwalo nsilikataazyi neciba comwe azeezi zintu, nsiyeeyi kuti buumi bwangu ncintu pe, ndiyandisisya buyo kuti ndimanizye lweendo lwangu, amulimo oyo ngwendakapegwa ku-Mwami Jesu, kuti ndilungulule Makani Mabotu aaluzyalo lwa-Leza,
Eno ndilizi kuti nywebo nyoonse, mwendakali kweendeenda kuya bukambauka Bwami bwaLeza, tamukabuboni limbi busyu bwangu,
Nkaako ndalilungulula kulindinywe buzuba buno, kuti ndasalala kubulowa bwabantu boonse,
nkaambo nsikasiside cintu pe, ndakamwaambila luyando loonse lwa-Leza,
Amujatisye, lwanu nobeni, abutanga boonse mbuumubika Muuya Uusalala kuti mube balinguzi bambubo, mulele mbungano ya-Mwami njakaula abulowa bwakwe mwini,
Ndilizi kuti, munsi lyakwiinka kwangu, kulanjila akati kanu baumpe babutambo, tabakoobuleka butanga,
Alimwi akati kanu nobeni bayoobuka bantu abaamba zintu zyakulengawida kuti balikwelele basikwiiya.
Aboobo amulinde, muyeeye kuti eno kwaba myaaka yotatwe, nkentalekede kulaya umwi umwi wanu, masiku esikati, ndilalila emisozi,
Eno nobakwesu, ndamubika ku-Mwami, akujwi lyaluzyalo lwakwe, ilikonzya kumuyaka, akumupa lukono akati kabo boonse abasalazigwa.
Nsikalikumbuzizye nsiliva yamuntu, niiba ngolida, naaba masani pe,
pele nywebo nobeni mulizi kuti aya maanza ngaakabelekela kubula kwangu, akwabaabo mbotwakali abo.
Muzintu zyoonse ndakaba citondezyo kulindinywe kuti kukoonda mulimo muleelede kugwasya abatajisi nguzu, muyeeye ijwi ndyaakaamba Mwami Jesu mwini kuti, Kupa kuli coolwe kwiinda kupegwa.
Naakamana kwaamba abo wakafugama amazwi, wakomba abo boonse.
Bakalilisya boonse, bawida ansingo ya-Paulo, bamumyonta,
bakapenga kapati nkaambo kejwi ndyaakaamba lyakuti tabakabuboni limbi busyu bwakwe, Nkabela bakamusindikila kuya kubwaato.
Notwakaandaana abo akunjila mubwaato, twakalulama ku-Kose, buce ku-Rode, kuzwa oko ku-Patara,
Awo notwakajana bwaato bukila ku-Foinike, twakanjila twainka,
Notwakabona Kupro twakainda kulumwesi, twalulama ku-Suriya, nkokuya ku-Turo twaakuseluka, nkaambo nkokwakali kuyoogwisizigwa lubono lwamubwaato,
Awo notwakajana basikwiiya twakalyokezya mazuba aali musanu mwaabili. Eno abo Muuya wakabaambya kuli-Paulo kuti atainki ku-Jerusalemu.
Naakainda mazuba ayo, twakabweza alimwi mulweendo lwesu, bakatusindikila boonse, antoomwe abakaintu abana, mane kumafutila aamunzi, nkabela twakafugama ankomwe yalwizi, twakomba.
Twalayana, twanjila mubwaato swebo, balo babweeda kumunzi.
Notwakamanizya lweendo lwamubwaato kuzwa ku-Turo, twakasika ku-Tolemai. Nkabela twakaanzya babunyina, twalyookezya abo buzuba bomwe.
Nobwakaca twakainka, twakaya ku-Kaisareya. Oko twakanjila muŋanda ya-Filipo, mukambausi, umwi wabali musanu mubabili, twakala awe.
Eno oyu mwaalumi wakali kujisi bana basimbi bone abatezi mwaalumi, abakali kusinsima.
Nkabela notwakacili kukede oko mazuba manjimanji, kwakasika musinsimi uuzwa ku-Judaya, uutegwa Agabo,

Wakeza kulindiswe, wakabweza lutambo lwa-Paulo, walyaanga mwini kumaanza akumaulu wati, Wakaamba Muuya Uusalala kuti, Mukamwini lutambo olu, mbobuya mbobayoomwaanga ba-Juda baku-Jerusalemu, bakamwaabe kumaanza aabamasi.
Notwakamvwa obo, twakamukombelezya, swebo abankuko, kuti atainki ku-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela Paulo wakavuwa wakati, Mwaba anzi ncomulila akutyola moyo wangu? Nkaambo ndilibambilide kuti intaangwi buyo, pele akufwa ku-Jerusalemu, nkaambo kezina lya-Mwami Jesu.
Elyo mbwaatakali abusungilizye twakamuleka twakati, Luyando lwa-Mwami alucitwe.
Munsi lyamazuba ayo twakali bamba, twakaya ku-Jerusalemu,
Twakasindikilwa basikwiiya bamwi baku-Kaisareya, bautola kuli-Masoni waku-­Kupro, sikwiiya waciindi nkotwali kuyeeya kuyoolyokezya.
Notwakasika ku-Jerusalemu, babunyina bakatutambula akubotelwa.
Nobwakaca twakanjila a-Paulo kuli-Jakobo, abapati boonse bakaliwo.
Naakamana kubaanzya, wakabalungulwida comwe comwe zintu zyoonse nzyaakacita Leza akati kabamasi kumulimo wakwe.
Balo nobakamvwa obo, bakalemeka Leza, bakati kulinguwe, Wabona, mukwesu, mbwiibede myaanda yemyaanda yaba-Juda abakasyoma, alimwi boonse balajatisisya mulao,
kwalo bakaambilwa aanduwe, kuti ulaiisya ba-Juda boonse bamu-masi kuleka mulao wa-Musa, akuti ulabaambila kutapalula bana babo nokuba kweenda muziyanza zyeciindi.
Ino kucitwe buti? Ncobeni bantu balamvwa kuti wasika.
Aboobo kocita mbotukwaambila. Tulijisi baalumi bone abakalyaanga kuli-Leza,

ubatole balo, ulisalazye ambabo, ukabalungile mulandu wabo, kuti banyoolwe kumitwe yabo. Ndilyonya boonse bayooziba kuti taziwo ezyo zintu nzobakaambilwa aanduwe, pele kuti ayebo omwini uenda kabotu akubamba mulao.
Kwalo kumakani aabamasi abakasyoma, twakalemba akubeteka kuti balikasye kuzintu izipailwa mizimo, akubulowa, akulizisinwa, akumamambi.
Mpoonya awo Paulo wakatola baalumi abo, nobwakaca wakalisalazya antoomwe ambabo, wakanjila muntempele, waamba kumana kwamazuba aakulisalazya, mane kwapailwa cipaizyo caumwi umwi wabo.
Nokwati kamane mazuba ayo aali musanu mwaabili ba-Juda baku-Asiya nobakamubona muntempele, bakabusya bantu boonse, bamujata,

baloompolola kuti, Nobaalumi ba-Israyeli, amuzoogwasye. Ngooyu uuiisya boonse kumasena oonse, kuti bapambane abantu, amulao, abusena buno, Alimwi waleta aba-Helene muntempele, wabisya busena obu busalala,
Nkaambo bakalibwene kale Trofimo waku-Efeso ngwaakali awe mumunzi, ngobakacita anga kuti Paulo nguwakamuleta muntempele.
Mpoonya munzi woonse wakanyongana, bantu bakalundumukila amwi, bajata Paulo, bamukwelela anze lyentempele. Ndilyonya yakajalwa milyango.
Nobati kamujaye, kwakaambilwa musolozi mupati wabasilumamba kuti Jerusalemu woonse ulipyopyongene.
Ndilyonya wakatola basilumamba abasunguli, wabazuzaanina, nobakamubona musolozi mupati abasilumamba bakaleka kumuuma Paulo.
Nkabela musolozi oyo mupati wakaswena, wakamujata, walailila kuti aangwe enketani zyobile, wabuzya kuti nguni, na ncinzi ncaakacita­.
Kwalo bamwi bakoompolola cimwi, abamwi icimbi mukati kamakamu makamu aabantu, eno mbwaakakakilwa kuzibisya nkaambo kakuyoba, wakalailila kuti atolwe mukati.
Naakasika acitantilo, wakatembekwa basilumamba nkaambo kakutonkana kwabantu.
Nkaambo kwakatobede makamu makamu aabantu, baloompolola kuti, Azwe!
Eno Paulo naati kanjizigwe mukati, wakakumbila musolozi mupati kuti, Nkoondyaambe cintu kulinduwe. Walo wakati, Sena ulicizi ci-Giriki?
Sena toli mu-Egepita ulya uwakabusya lupyopyongano kumazuba aakainda, akusolwedela munkanda baalumi bajayi abakali makumi one eemyaanda?
Paulo wakati, Mebo ndili mu-Juda waku-Tarso wamu-Kilikiya, muntu wamumunzi uujisi mpuwo. Eno ndakumbila, kondizumizya kuti ndyaambe kubantu.
Naakazumizigwa, Paulo wakaima acitantilo, watambika janza kubantu. Nobakaumuna boonse, wakaamba mumwaambo waci-Hebrayo wakati:
Nobakwesu anomatata, amuswiilile kulikazizya kwangu nkwendika-zizya ankuko kulindinywe.
Nobakamvwa kuti ulaamba mumwaambo waci-Hebrayo, bakaumunisya. Walo wakateeti:

Ndili mu-Juda, ndakazyalilwa mu-Tarso wamu-Kilikiya, pele ndakakomenena mumunzi muno, kumatende aa-Gamaliyeli, ndakaiisigwa mumulao wamatata cakumaninina, ndali musungu kuli-Leza mbubonya mbuli ndinywe nyoonse sunu,
Ndakapenzya benzila eyi mane bakafwa, ndakaanga baalumi abakaintu akubabika muntolongo.
Mupaizi mupati nguundilungulula abapati boonse, mbendakatambula magwalo aakuya kubakwesu. Nkabela ndakainka ku-Damasko kuti ndikabalete ku-Jerusalemu balaangidwe abo abayoojanwa, kuti bazoopenzegwe.
Eno nendakali kuya bweenda akuswena ku-Damasko kuciindi caamutwe esikati, ndilyonya mumuni mupati uuzwa kujulu wakamweka cakundizinguluka.
Ndakawida ansi, ndamvwa ijwi lyati kulindime, Saulo, Saulo, undipenzezyanzi?
Ndakavuwa ndakati, Ino nduweni, O mwami? Wakandyaambila kuti, Ndime Jesu wa-Nazareta ngopenzya.
Abalo mbotwakali kweenda abo bakabona mumuni, pele tabakalimvwide ijwi lyayooyo uwakali kwaamba kulindime,
Mpoonya ndakati, O mwami, ino ndicite buti? Mwami wakandyaambila kuti, Buka, uye ku-Damasko, oko nkoti kaambilwe zyoonse nzoelede kucita.
Pele mbwendatakali kubona nkaambo kabulemu bwamumuni, ndakatembaizigwa amaanza aabaabo mbotwakali abo, aboobo ndakasika ku-Damasko.
Eno muntu uwali kutegwa Hananiya, mwaalumi uwakali kukomba akweenda mbuli mulao, uwakali kulemekwa ba-Juda boonse abakakede mumo,
wakaboola kulindime wandiiminina akundyaambila kuti, Saulo mukwesu, bona. Nciconya ciindi eco ndakabona, ndamulanga.
Walo wakateeti, Leza wamatateesu wakubika, kuti uzibe luyando lwakwe, akubona Uululeme akumvwa ijwi ilizwa kumulomo wakwe.
Nkaambo uyooba nduwe oomulungulula kubantu boonse, azeezyo nzoobona akumvwa.
Ino ucilindilanzi? Nyamuka, ubapatizigwe, usanzigwe zibi zyako, kukukomba kuzina lya-Mwami.
Elyo nendakabweeda ku-Jerusalemu, nendakali kukomba muntempele ndakanyangwa muuya,
ndakamubona Mwami ulandyaambila kuti, Kofwambaana, uzwe ndilyonya mu-Jerusalemu, nkaambo tabakootambula kusinizya kwako andime.
Ndakati, O mwami, balizi beni kuti ndali kwaanga akuuma basyomi bako muzikombelo zyoonse,
alimwi awo aakatikila bulowa bwakamboni wako Stefano, ndakaliimvwi amebo, ndakazumina lufu lwakwe, ndakalindila ngubo zyabakamujaya.
Nkabela wakandyaambila kuti, Koya, nkaambo ndiyookutuma, uye kulibamasi abali kule.
Eno bakali kumuswiilide mane kulileelyo ijwi, ndilyonya bakoompolola bakati, Uuli boobo azwe ansi! Takweelede kuti kacipona pe.
Kabacoompolola akusowaila zyakusama zyabo, akutataula lusuko mujulu,
musolozi mupati wakalailila kuti anjizigwe mukati, wakati abuzigwe akuumwa, kuti amvwe kaambo nkobamoompolweda obo.
Nobakamubambula entambo, Paulo wakabuzya musunguli uwakaimvwi awo kuti, Sena kuliluzi kuti muume mu-Roma uutajenwe mulandu?
Musunguli naakamvwa obo, wakainka kuyooambila musolozi mupati wakati, Ino uyandoocita buti? Nkaambo ulya muntu mu-Roma.
Mpoonya wakaboola musolozi mupati, wakati kulinguwe, Ndyaambila, sena uli mu-Roma yebo? Wakati, Ii,
Wakavuwa musolozi mupati kuti, Obu bwami ndakabuula amali manjimanji. Paulo wakati, Pele mebo ndakazyalwa abo.
Nkabela abo abati kamubuzye bakamuleka, awalo musolozi mupati wakayoowa naakaziba kuti mu-Roma, alimwi nkaambo wakali kumwaangide.

Eno nobwakaca, mbwaakali kuyanda kuzibisya kaambo nkobakamubika ba-Juda, wakamwaangununa, wakalailila kuti bapaizi bapati abasilubeta boonse babungane, nkabela wakamuleta Paulo, wazoomubika kumbele lyabo.
Walo Paulo wakabalangisisya basilubeta wakati, Nobakwesu, ndakeenda amoyo mubotu kumbele lya-Leza mane kusikila buzuba buno.
Mpoonya Hananiya, mupaizi mupati, wakalailila mbaakaimvwi abo kuti bamuume kumulomo,
Elyo Paulo wakati kulinguwe, Leza ulakuuma yebo obwaanda butubye, Sena ulakala kundibeteka camulao, kumwi ulailila kuti ndyuumwe icitali camulao?
Abakaimvwi mpawo batateeti, Sena utukila mupaizi mupati wa-Leza?
Paulo wakaamba kuti, Nsendali kuzi, bakwesu, kuti ngomupaizi mupati, nkaambo kwakalembwa kuti, Utaambi bubi amweendelezi wacisi cakwanu.
Pele Paulo naakabona kuti bamwi mba-Saduki abamwi mba-Farisi, wakoompolola mulubeta wakati, Nobakwesu, ndili mu-Farisi mebo, mwana aba-Farisi, ndabetekwa nkaambo kakusyoma bubuke bwabafu.
Naakaamba obo, kwakaba kukazyanya akati kabaFarisi aba-Saduki, embungano yakaandaana,
nkaambo ba-Saduki bati, Takukwe kubuka kulufu, nobaba baangelo, nuuba muuya, kwala ba-Farisi bazumina oonse aya.
Ndilyonya kwakaba kuyoba kupati, bamwi balembi bakuba-Farisi bakanyamuka, bakazya bati, Tatujene bubi kumuntu oyu. Anooli muuya uwaamba kulinguwe, na angelo, makaninzi?
Elyo nokwakaba kuzwangana kupati, musolozi oyo mupati, mbwaakayoowa kuti Paulo balamukwamuna, wakalailila basilumamba kuti bainke bakamugwisye cenguzu kulimbabo, akumutola mukati.
Eno nokwakaba masiku Mwami wakamwiiminina wakati, Kojatisya, mbuli mbokandilungulula mu-Jerusalemu, mbubonya obo uyoondilungulula aku-Roma.
Nobwakaca ba-Juda bakabungana, balyaanga akukonka kuti tabakoolya akunywa kabatana kumujaya Paulo.
Abo abakalyaanga obo bakainda kumakumi one.
Nkabela bakainka kubapaizi basimutwe akubapati bakati, Twalyaanga akukonka kuti tatukooyoolabila cintu, katutana kumujaya Paulo.
Nkaako eno nywebo, antoomwe abasilubeta, mukumbile musolozi mupati kuti akamulete kulindinywe, kubaanke kuli ncomuyanda kumubuzisya kabotu, aswebo katanaswena afwaafwi tunoolibambilide kumujaya.
Pele mwana amucizi wa-Paulo wakabamvwa akumulindila kwabo, wakainka wanjila omo mwaakabede, waambila Paulo,
Ndilyonya Paulo wakaita umwi wabasunguli wakati, Tola mulombe oyu kumusolozi mupati, nkaambo ujisi makani aakumwaambila.
Elyo wakamubweza, wamutola kumusolozi mupati wati, Paulo mwaange wandiita, wakumbila kuti ndilete mulombe oyu kulinduwe, ujisi makani aakukwaambila.
Mpoonya musolozi mupati wakamujata ejanza, wamutola, wamubuzya kumbali kuti, Ino makaninzi ngojisi kundyaambila?
Walo wakateeti, Ba-Juda bakazuminana kukumbila kulinduwe kuti ijunza umutole Paulo kulubeta, mbuli kuti bali ncobayanda kumubuzisya kabotu,

Pele utabazuminini yebo, nkaambo kulimbabo kuli baalumi abainda makumi one, abamulindilide, abakalyaanga akukonka kuti tabakoolya akunywa, kabatana kumujaya. Aneeno balilibambilide, balalangila cisyomezyo cako.
Nkabela musolozi mupati wakaleka mulombe oyo, wamulailila kuti, Utaambili muntu kuti wandizibya makani aya,

Mpoonya awo wakaita basunguli bobile wakati, Amululamike basilumamba abali myaanda yobile, abasimbizi abali makumi aali musanu mwaabili, abasimasumo abali myaanda yobile, kuti bainke kuKaisareya kuciindi caciizizyo,
mubape embelesa, kuti bamutantike Paulo, bakamusisye kabotu kuli-Felike mweendelezi.
Nkabela wakalemba lugwalo lwakuti,
Klaudiyo Lusiya nguulembela Felike, mweendelezi mulemu. Ndakwaanzya.
Oyu mwaalumi wakajatwa ba-Juda. Bati kamujaye, pele ndakasika abasilumamba ndamuvuna, nendakamvwa kuti mu-Roma.
Mbwendakali kuyanda kuziba kaambo nkobamubika, ndakamutola kulubeta lwabo.
Oko ndakajana wabikwa kaambo kamibuzyo yamulao wabo, pele tajisi mulandu uuelede kufwa na kwaangwa.
Nendakamvwa kuti bavwiyana kufumpa oyu muntu, ndilyonya ndamutumina kulinduwe, ndalailila abo abamubika kaambo kuzooamba mulandu wakwe kulinduwe. Kosyaala kabotu.
Aboobo basilumamba, mbuli mbobakalaililwa, bakamubweza Paulo bamutola masiku ku-Antipatri,
Nobwakaca balo bakabweeda kumunzi, basia basimbizi kuti bainke awe.
Nobakasika ku-Kaisareya bakamupa lugwalo mweendelezi, baimika Paulo kubusyu bwakwe.
Mweendelezi naakabala lugwalo wakabuzya kuti, Ino ngwecisinzi? Naakamvwa kuti ngwaku-Kilikiya,
wakati, Ndiyoomvwa kabotu makani aako, basika abakubika kaambo. Nkabela wakalailila kuti alindilwe muŋanda yabwami ya-Heroda.
Munsi lyamazuba osanwe, kwakasika mupaizi simutwe Hananiya, antoomwe abapati, aumwi uutegwa Tertulo, sikusumpilila. Elyo bakaamba mulandu wa-Paulo kumweendelezi.
Naakaitwa Tertulo wakasaanguna kumubika kaambo wati, O mwami mulemu Felike, mulinduwe tukede muluumuno, alimwi nkaambo kaluzibo lwako cisi cino ciya bululamikwa,
munzila zyoonse amumasena oonse tulatambula akulumbisya.
Pele, kuti intakukataazyi, ndakukumbila kuti muluzyalo lwako undiswiilile kumajwi maniini.
Nkaambo oyu muntu twakamujana kuti ngusiŋunzuunzu, unyonyonganya ba-Juda munyika yoonse, ngosimutwe wenkamu yabaNazareta,
alimwi wakasoleka kusampaula ntempele. Twakamujata, twakayanda kumubeteka amulao wesu,
pele Lusiya musolozi mupati wakamugwisya mumaanza esu enguzu mpati,
wakaambila abo abakamubika kaambo kuti baboole kulinduwe. Kukumubuzisya ulakonzya yebo kuziziba ezi zintu zyoonse nzotumubika kaambo.
Abalo ba-Juda bakamuvumpa basinizya bati, Mbwaabede aya.
Nkabela mweendelezi naakamoobola kuti aambe, Paulo wakavuwa wakati:
Oku ndilizi kuti kwaba myaaka minjiminji yebo koli mubetesi wacisi cino, aboobo ndilalyaambilila akubotelwa,
Ulakonzya kuziba kuti aba buyo mazuba aali kumi mwaabili nkenyinkide kuyookomba ku-Jerusalemu.
Tabanandijene nemuba muntempele ndilazumanana amuntu, nekuba kupyopyonganya bantu muzikombelo na mumunzi.
Alimwi tabakonzyi kusinizya azintu ezi nzobandibika kaambo eno,
Pele ndazumina oku kulinduwe kuti kunzila eyo njobaamba kuti ilaandeene, ndilamukomba mbubonya obo Leza wamatata, ndilasyoma oonse aakalembwa kumulao akubasinsimi.
Ndijisi lusyomo kuli-Leza, abalo beni mbobasyoma, kuti kulaba kubuka kwabafu, akwabaluleme akwabataluleme.
Nkaako ndilasoleka kuti lyoonse ndibe amoyo uutajisi mulandu, kuli-Leza akubantu,
Eno munsi lyamyaaka minjiminji ndakasika kuleta zipego zyaluzyalo ezituuzyo kucisi cakwesu,
nzobakandijanina muntempele ndasalazigwa, nkentajisi makamu aabantu na lupyopyongano. Pele kwakaliko ba-Juda bamwi bakuAsiya,
abakeelede kuti kabaliwo kumbele lyako, akundibika kaambo anooli bajisi makani kulindime.
Na aba abaliwo kabaamba mulandu ngobakajana nendakaimvwi alubeta,
cita uwaleeli ijwi lyomwe ndendakoompolola nendakaimvwi akati kabo, ilyakuti, Ukubuka kulufu nkwembetekelwa sunu kulindinywe.
Kwalo Felike mbwaakali kuzi kabotu Nzila eyo, wakababikilila wakati, Asika Lusiya musolozi mupati, ndizookosola makani aanu,
Elyo wakalailila musunguli kuti Paulo alindilwe, pele ajatwe kabotu, alimwi kuti kutakasigwi beenzinyina kuzoomugwasya,
Munsi lyamazuba amwi wakaboola Felike a-Drusila mukaintu wakwe, mu-Juda, Wakatumina Paulo, wakamumvwa aalusyomo lwa-Kristo.
Naakacili kwaamba aabululami, akulijata, alubeteko uluza, Felike wakazyangama, wavuwa wati, Koya eno ndajana ciindi ndilakwiita.
Kumwi wakali kulangila kuti ambweni ulapegwa mali kuli-Paulo kuti amwaangulule, ncaakamutumina lyoonse akwaambaula awalo.
Pele nokwakainda myaaka yobile, Porkiyo Festo wakalya zina lya-Felike. Eno mbwaakali kuyanda kulumbwa ba-Juda, Felike wakamusia Paulo ulaangidwe.
Festo naakanjila mubwami bwakwe, munsi lyamazuba otatwe wakazwa mu-Kaisareya, wakaya ku-Jerusalemu.
Ndilyonya bapaizi basimu­ twe abapati baba-Juda bakabejelezya Paulo kulinguwe, bamukombelezya,
bakumbila cintu anguwe, cakuti amwiite aboole ku-Jerusalemu. Bakakanza kumulindilila kuti bamujaye munzila.
Festo wakavuwa kuti, Paulo ulijiswi ku-Kaisareya, akuti, Amebo ndemwini ndaya nkuko kaba kaindi.
Wakati, Aboobo abali abwami akati kanu katuya abalo, anooli kuli mulandu kumuntu ulya, bakamubike kaambo.
Naakakala abo mazuba aatakali kwiinda musanu mwaatatu naaba ikumi, wakainka ku-Kaisareya. Mpoonya nobwakaca wakakala acuuno cakubetekela, walailila kuleta Paulo.
Naakasika walo, ba-Juda bakazwa ku-Jerusalemu­, bakamwiiminina mumbali, bamubika milandu minjiminji milemu njobatakonzya kusinizya,
Anu Paulo kukulyaambilila wakati, Nsikabisizye cintu, nuuba mulao waba-Juda, nemuba muntempele, naba Kaisara.
Pele Festo mbwaakayanda kulumbwa ba-Juda, wakavuwa Paulo wakati, Sena ulayanda kwiinka ku-Jerusalemu, ukabetekelwe nkuko kumbele lyangu emilandu eyi?
Paulo wakati, Ndiliimvwi kumbele lyacibetekelo ca­-Kaisara, kuleelede kuti ndibetekwe mpoonya. Nsibisizye cintu kuba-Juda, oku ulizi kabotu ayebo.
Anooli ndakabisya akucita cintu iceelede kufwa, nsikaki kufwa pe. Kwalo na taawo makani aya ngobandibika kaambo, taakwe muntu uukonzya kundyaaba kulimbabo. Ndalisisya kuli-Kaisara.
Ndilyonya Festo, naakaambaula abasilubeta, wakavuwa kuti, Walisisya kuli-Kaisara, ndazumina ulainka kuli-Kaisara.
Nokwakainda mazuba amwi, Mwami Agripa a-Bemike, bakasika kuKaisareya, bazooanzya Festo.
Eno mbobakakala oko mazuba manji, Festo wakaambila mwami makani aa-Paulo wakati, Nkwali muntu ngwaakasia Felike ulaangidwe.
Nendakali ku-Jerusalemu, bapaizi basimutwe abapati baba-Juda bakamubika kaambo, bakakumbila kuti apegwe mulandu.
Ndakabavuwa kuti, Tacili ciyanza caba-Roma kwaaba muntu uubikwa kaambo, katana kulangana abaabo abamubika kaambo, akujana ciindi cakulyaambilila mulandu ngobamupede.
Aboobo nobakabungana okuno nsikamukide, pele nobwakaca ndakakala acibetekelo, ndalailila kuti bamulete oyo mwaalumi.
Eno nobakanyamuka abo abamubika kaambo tabakaambide mulandu wazibi mbuli nzendakali kweezeezya.
Pele bakamwaamba emibuzyo imwi yenkombelo yabo beni, eyamuntu uutegwa Jesu, mufu ngwasinizya Paulo kuti muumi.
Eno mebo, mbwendakazingwa kubuzisya makani aali boobo, ndakabuzya na ulayanda kuya ku-Jerusalemu kuyoobetekelwa nkuko makani aya,
Pele Paulo naakakumbila kuti asisigwe kulubeta lwamwami mupati, ndakalailila kuti alindilwe, mane nkamutumine kuli-Kaisara,
Agripa wakati kuli-Festo, Amebo ndayanda kumumvwa oyo muntu. Wateeti, Ijunza mulamumvwa.
Nobwakaca Agripa a-Bemike bakasika abulemu bupati, bakanjila omo muswiilililwa, antoomwe abasilumamba bapati abaalu bamumunzi, nkabela Festo wakalailila kuti bakamulete Paulo.

Mpoonya Festo wakateeti, O mwami Agripa, anywebo nyoonse nobaalumi nomuli aswebo ano, mwamubona oyu muntu ngwendakakumbilwa boonse ba-Juda, aku-Jerusalemu akookuno, bakoompolola bakati, Teelede kuti kacipona,
Pele mebo ndakajana kuti taakwe ncaakacita iceelede lufu, alimwi mwini mbwaakalisisya kumwami mupati ndakakanza kumutuma,
Eno nsijisi ijwi ilisinizizye lyakulembela mwami aanguwe. Ncendamuletela kumbele lyanu, akapati kumbele lyako O mwami Agripa, kuti mwamubuzisisya ndijane cakulemba.
Nkaambo ndati mbufubafuba kutuma mwaange, kotalungulwide milandu niabikilwa.
Agripa wakaambila Paulo kuti, Nkooko wazumininwa kulyaambilila. Ndilyonya Paulo wakatambika janza lyakwe, walyaambilila wati:
O mwami Agripa, ndati ndi sicoolwe kuti ndalyaambilila sunu kumbele lyako, atwaambo toonse ntobandibika ba-Juda,
akapati nkaambo wazibisya ziyanza emibuzyo yoonse iili mukati lyaba-Juda. Nkaako ndakumbila kuti undiswiilile kabotu,
Ba-Juda boonse bakali kuzi kweenda kwangu kuzwida kubwana bwangu, mbokwaakabede kuzwa kumatalikilo mukati kacisi cakwesu amu-Jerusalemu,
bakandiziba kuzwa kumatalikilo, na bayanda kulungulula­, kuti ndakali mu-Farisi wamunkamu eyo yenkombelo yesu iijatisya.
Aneeno ndaima kubetekwa nkaambo kakulangila cisyomezyo Leza ncaakasyomezya matateesu.
Ncenciceeco nciilangila mikowa yesu iili kumi mwiibili, nobakomba Leza masiku esikati amoyo omwe, Nkaambo kakulangila obo neembikilwa kaambo kuba-Juda, O mwami.
Nkaambonzi, mukuyeeya kwanu, ncokutasyomeki kuti Leza ulababusya bafu?
Amebo ncobeni ndakayeeya kuti ndakeelede kucita zinjizinji izilwanya zina lya-Jesu wa-Nazareta,
Mbubonya mbwendakali kucita mu-Jerusalemu, abasalala banjibanji ndakabanjizya muntolongo, mbwendakapedwe nguzu kubapaizi bapati, anobakali kujayigwa amebo ndakazumina.
Ndakali kubapenzya lyoonse muzikombelo zyoonse, ndabasungilizya kuti batukile Leza, ambwendakali kubakalalilisya ndakabatanda mane muminzi yamasi.
Eno nendakali kuya ku-Damasko kumulimo uyo, nkenjisi bwami abutume bwabapaizi bapati,
elyo amutwe esikati, O mwami, munzila ndakabona mumuni uuzwa kujulu uuinda kumweka kwezuba, wakamweka cakundizinguluka mebo abaabo mbotwakali kweenda abo.
Notwakawida ansi toonse, ndakamvwa ijwi ilyaamba kulindime mumwaambo waci-Hebrayo lyati, Saulo, Saulo, undipenzezyanzi? Nciyumu kulinduwe kusansa cibinzyo.
Ndakabuzya kuti, Ino nduweni O mwami? Mwami wakati, Ndime Jesu ngopenzya.
Pele buka, uime amatende aako, nkaambo ndalibonya kulinduwe, kuti ndikubike ube similimo asikulungulula wazeezi zintu moondibwenene, azeezyo nzenjoolibonya azyo kulinduwe.
Ndinookuvuna kubaJuda akulibamasi, mbenkutumina,
kuti ukajule meso aabo, basanduke kuzwa mukusia, baye mukusalala, akuzwa mubwami bwa-Saatani kuya kuli-Leza, kuti bajane kujatilwa kwazibi alukono akati kabaabo abasalazigwa kukusyoma ndime.
Aboobo, O mwami Agripa, nsikwe nendakakazya cilengano cakujulu,
pele kusaanguna mu-Damasko, aku-Jerusalemu, amucisi coonse ca-Judaya, akulibamasi ndakali kukambauka kuti beempe basandukile kuli-Leza, bacite milimo iielede kusanduka.
Ncenciceeco ncobakandijatila ba-Juda muntempele, bati kandijaye.
Pele mbwendakajana kugwasigwa kuzwa kuli-Leza, ndiciimvwi asunu, ndilalungulula kubaniini akubapati, kutaamba limbi ijwi pele ayo ngobakaamba basinsimi a-Musa kuti alacitika,
kuti Kristo uleelede kupenga, akuti nguuelede kusaanguna kubuka kubafu, aambile ba-Juda abamasi makani aamumuni.
Naakacili kulyaambilila obo, Festo wakaamba ejwi pati kuti, Paulo, wasondoka, ukuliiya kwako kupati kulakusondosya,
Pele Paulo wakati, Festo omulemu, nsisondokede, pele ndaamba majwi aakasimpe akuziba,
Mwami Agripa ulyeezi aya ngemwaambila ecamba. Ndasyoma kuti kumakani aya oonse taakwe ngaatabwene, nkaambo eci tacikacitidwe kumbali pe,
O mwami Agripa, sena ulabasyoma basinsimi? Ndilizi kuti ulasyoma.
Agripa wakati kuli-Paulo, Kukucikombelezya kuniini ulandisandula kuba mu-Kristo,
Paulo wakati, Na nkuniini na nkupati, ndilakomba kuli-Leza kuti, kutabi nduwe olike pele boonse abandiswiilide sunu, babe mbuli ndime kutaamba nketani ezi.
Ndilyonya kwakanyamuka mwami, amweendelezi, a-Bemike, abaabo mbobakakede abo,
nobakazwa balike, bakabandisyanya bati, Oyu muntu tacitide cintu iceelede lufu nekuba kwaangwa.
Nkabela Agripa wakaambila Festo kuti, Oyu muntu kuti naatakalisisya kuli-Kaisara, naangununwa.
Nokwakakanzwa kuti tuye ku-Italiya abwaato, bakaaba Paulo abamwi baange kumusunguli uutegwa Juliyo, wankamu ya-Agusto,
Twa­ kanjila mubwaato bwaku-Andramutiyo ubwati kainke kuminzi yakunkomwe ya-Asiya, twakainka a-Aristarko waku-Tesalonika, munzi wamu-Makedoniya.
Nobwakaca twakasika ku-Sidoni. Juliyo wakamubamba kabotu Paulo, wamuzumizya kuswaya beenzinyina kuti akatalukwe,
Notwakazwa oko, twakeenda akusitililwa cilwa ca-Kupro, nkaambo iguwo lyakatucinjila.
Notwakazubuka lwizi ulubambene a-Kilikiya a-Pamfiliya, twakasika kuMura, munzi wamu-Lukiya.
Oko musunguli wakajana bwaato bwakuAlesandriya ubuya ku-Italiya, nkabela watunjizya mumo.
Elyo notwakeenda kaniini-niini mazuba manjimanji cakusungwaala twakasika kumbali a-Kando, nkaambo keguwo ilyakatucinjila twakeenda cakusitililwa cilwa ca-Krete kumbali a-Salmone,
Notwakainda mumbali lyenkomwe cakulikakatizya, twakasika kubusena ubutegwa Ikoba Bbotu, afwaafwi amunzi wa-Laseya.
Nokwakainda ciindi cilamfu, alimwi mbokwakaba mapenzi kuceenda abwaato, kuliimya zilyo kwaba-Juda kakumanide kale, Paulo wakabalaya,
wabaambila kuti, Nobaalumi, ndabona kuti olu lweendo lulaba akusweekelwa akumwaigwa kupati, nsyaambi kwalubono buyo abwaato, pele akwabuumi bwesu,
Kwalo musunguli wakamvwa kwaamba kwasikweenzya bwaato akwamukamwini wabo kwiinda ezyo izyakaambwa Paulo.

Eno ikoba mbolyatakali bbotu kukala mumo mapeyo, banjibanji bakati kuleelede kuti tubweze, tusoleke na tulakonzya kusika ku-Fonika akukala nkuko mapeyo, elyo ndikoba lya-Krete, lilanga kujwe kubbazu lyakunyika alyakumabizi,
Nokwaunga muuwo wakumusanza, bakayeeya anga bakujana nkobayanda, bakabweza, bainda mumbali lyenkomwe ya-Krete.
Pele munsi lyakaindi, kucilwa kwakazwa iguwo pati ilitegwa Urokulo.
Eno bwaato nobwakajatwa akukakilwa kulangana amuuwo twakabuleka twapepaulwa.
Notwakayaama kukalwa akategwa Kauda, twakakonzya, kukucita enguzu, kujata kaato.
Nobakakanantula, bakainzya zyaanzyo kunsi lyabwaato, babwaanga, nkabela mbobakayoowa kuti antela balabbila mubulobe bakaselusya sila ilyeenzya bwaato bapepulwa buyo obo.
Mbotwakali kuya buzuwaikwa enguzu, nobwakaca bakatalika kusowaila lubono mulwizi,
kubuzuba bwatatu bakasowaila zintu zyabwaato kumaanza aabo beni.
Mbolyatakali kubonwa zuba enyenyeezi mazuba manjimanji, pele iguwo pati lyakali kutusinkilide, limwi twakaleka kusyoma kuti tulafutulwa,
Elyo nocakalampa ciindi cakutalya, Paulo wakaima akati kabo wakati, Nobaalumi, mwali kweelede kundiswiilila mebo, akutazwa mu-Krete, mapenzi­ aya aakusweekelwa oku nokwatabawo.
Eno ndamukombelela kuti mukalike myoyo, nkaambo akati kanu taakwe uuti sweekelwe buumi bwakwe, pele bwaato bwalo.
Nkaambo sunu masiku wandisikila angelo wa-Leza oyo ngwendi wakwe, ngwendibelekela,
wati, Utayoowi, Paulo, uleelede kuyooima kumbele lya-Kaisara. Eno swiilila, Leza wakupa boonse aba mboenda abo,
Nkaako nobaalumi, amukalike myoyo, nkaambo ndisyoma Leza kuti kuyooba mbubonya mbuli mbwendaambilwa,
kwalo ­tuyoosowelwa acilwa cimwi.
Nokwakaba buzuba bwekumi mwaane, notwakali kuzuwaikwa oku akooku mulwizi lwa-Adriya, akati kamasiku abeenzya bwaato bakayeeya kuti, Twasika afwaafwi enyika imwi.
Nobakeeleka bulamfu bwamaanzi, bakajana mbwamaboko aalandabulwa aali makumi obile. Nobakeenda kaniini, bakeeleka alimwi, bajana mbwamaboko aali kumi mwasanu.
Nkabela mbotwakayoowa kuti ambweni tulalyuuma kumabwe, bakawaala zijasyo zyone kunkombo yamunsi lyabwaato, balangila kuti buce.
Abeenzya bwaato bakasoleka kuloboka mubwaato, bakaselusya kaato mumaanzi, babaanga bandoodumpukizya zijasyo kumbele.
Pele Paulo wakaambila musunguli abasilumamba kuti, Aba batakala mubwaato, tamukoofutulwa pe.
Ndilyonya basilumamba bakakosola zyaanzyo zyakaato, bakaleka kainka,
Eno nobwati kace, Paulo wakabakombelezya boonse kuti balye cilyo wakati, Sunu mbuzuba bwekumi mwaane kamulindila akuliimya, kamutalyi cintu.
Nkaako ndamukombelela kuti mulye, nkaambo eci ncakumufutula, nkaambo akati kanu taakwe uuti sweekelwe nekaba kasusu komwe kamutwe wakwe,
Naakaamba obo wakabweza mukamu, walumba Leza kumbele lyabo boonse, wuukomona, watalika kulya.
Ndilyonya boonse bakakalika myoyo, balya.
Swebo toonse totwakali mubwaato twakali myaanda yobile amakumi aali musanu mwaabili abantu bosanwe muumwi.
Nobakakuta, bakaubya bwaato, maila bakaasowela mulwizi.
Nkabela nobwakaca teebakali kwiizi nyika eyo, pele bakabona ikoba ilijisi nkomwe yamusenga, bakayanda kuti, na balakonzya, batole nkuko bwaato.
Bakakosola zijasyo, bazileka zyabbila mulwizi, baangununa zyaanzyo izyakali kwaangwa azintu zyakuzyuulula, bakalandabula sila lyaluuwo kumbele.
Pele nobakasika abusena aaswaanina inzi zyobile, bakapatizya bwaato ansi, inkombo yakumbele yakasimpa ilipatide, pele yamunsi yakatalika kutyoka nkaambo kenguzu zyamayuwe.
Elyo basilumamba bakakanza kujaya baange, kuti kutabi uuyamba akuloboka.
Kwalo musunguli mbwaakali kuyanda kufutula Paulo, wakakasya kukanza kwabo, walailila kuti abo abakuzi kusamba abaliwaale mumaanzi, basaangune balo kuyoosika kunkomwe,
nkokuya abasyaala baligwasye bamwi kuzisamu, bamwi kuzintu zimwi zyabwaato, Aboobo kwakaba kuti boonse bakafutulwa, basika kunkomwe.
Notwakafutuka twakaziba kuti cilwa eco cilategwa Melita,
Basicisi bakatutambula aluzyalo lwinilwini, bakutula mulilo, batutambula toonse nkaambo kemvula iyali kuwa empeyo.
Paulo naakatebba cileye cankuni akucibika amulilo, yakazwa nzoka nkaambo kakukasaala, yalamatila kujanza lyakwe.
Basicisi nobakabona muuka ulalengelela kujanza lyakwe, bakalyaambauzya beni bakati, Ncobeni oyu muntu mujayi, naafutuka mulwizi bululami tabuzumini kuti kacipona,
Nokubaboobo wakasansamwida muuka mumulilo, taakwe ambwaakaba.
Bakali kulanga bati ulazimba, na ulawida ansi afwe mpoonya, pele nobakalangila ciindi cilamfu akubona kuti taakwe ambwaaba, bakasanduka bati muzimo.
Eno kufwaafwi kubusena obo kwakali nyika yamuntu uutegwa Popliyo, mwami wacilwa, Wakatutambula akutubamba kabotu mazuba otatwe,
Pele wisi Popliyo wakalilede, wali kuciswa mutwe akupulumba. Paulo wakanjila kulinguwe, wakomba, wabika maanza alinguwe, wamuponya.
Nokwakacitwa obo, bakaboola abamwi bamucilwa abakali azilwazi, baponezegwa.
Bakatulemeka amalemeko manjimanji, alimwi notwakainka bakatubikila mubwaato kufumbwa zintu nzotwali kubula.
Eno munsi lyamyeezi yotatwe twakainka abwaato bwaku-Alesandriya, ubwakakede mucilwa mapeyo. Bulembo bwabo bwakali bwa-Bana Balombe Bamayanga.
Notwakasika ku-Surakusa, twakalyokezya mazuba otatwe,
Kuzwa awo twakeenda cakuzinguluka, twasika ku-Regiyo. Elyo nobwakaca wakaunga muuwo wakumusanza, abwabili twakasika ku-Putiyolo,
Oko twakajana babunyina, batukombelela kukala abo mazuba aali musanu mwaabili, nkokuya tusike ku-Roma,
Akwalo oko babunyina nobakatumvwa, bakazootucinga, mane basika ku-Ibbuwa lya-Apiyo aku-Maanda Otatwe. Paulo ababone buyo, walumba Leza, wakalika moyo.
Notwakanjila mu-Roma, musunguli wakaaba baange kumusolozi wabalindizi, pele Paulo wakazumizigwa kukala alike asilumamba oyo uwali kumulindila.

Nkabela munsi lyamazuba otatwe, Paulo wakaita abo abakali bapati baba-Juda. Nobakabungana wakabaambila kuti, Nobaalumi bakwesu, nentacitide cintu icaandeene abantu neziba eziyanza zyamatateesu, nokubaboobo ku-Jerusalemu ndakaabwa ndi mwaange kumaanza aaba-Roma.
Balo nobakandibuzya, bakayanda kundyaangununa, nkaambo teekwakali kaambo kulindime akeelede lufu.
Pele ba-Juda nobakakaka, ndakasungilizigwa kulisisya kuli-Kaisara, nokubaboobo takuli kuti ndakabika mulandu kucisi cakwesu pe.
Ncendamwiita nkaambo kamakani aya, kuti muzoondibone, twaambaule anywebo. Eno nkaambo kakusyoma mbuli ba-Israyeli ncendaangilwa enketani ezi.
Nkabela bakamuvuwa kuti, Tatukatambwide magwalo aazwa ku-Judaya aakulungulula, alimwi takukasikide naba omwe wabakwesu uwakatulungulwida, nokuba kwaamba cibi ayebo.
Pele tulayanda kukumvwa mboyeeya, nkaambo tulizi kuti anooli aankamu eyi, alakazigwa kumasena oonse.

Elyo kubuzuba mbobakamubikila, kwakasika banjibanji muŋanda mwakakede. Kuzwida cifumofumo mane kusikila kumazuba wakabapandulwida makani, ulalungulula aa-Bwami bwa-Leza, akubakombelezya makani aa-Jesu, aazwa kumulao akubasinsimi.
Bamwi bakasyoma ayo aakaambwa, bamwi pe tabakasyomede.
Nkabela mbobatakazuminana akati kabo bakamwaika, Paulo naakamana kwaamba ijwi eli lyomwe lyakuti, Ngakasimpe ayo Muuya Uusalala ngaakaambya Isaya musinsimi kumatateesu
aakuti,
Koya kubantu aba, ukateeti,
Ukumvwa mulamvwa, pele tamukoomvwisisisya,
Akubona mulabona, pele tamukoobonesesya.
Nkaambo myoyo yabantu aba miyumu,
Amatwi aabo alisinkide,
Ameso aabo baajala,
Kuti bataboni ameso aabo,
Bataswiilili amatwi aabo,
Batamvwisyi emyoyo yabo,
Batasanduki,
Kuti ntabafutuli.
Nkaako amuzibe kuti lufutuko olu lwa-Leza lwatuminwa kulibamasi, eno balamvwa balo.
Kacaamba obo ba-Juda bakazwa, balakazyanya: kapati akati kabo beni.
Eno Paulo wakamanizya myaaka yobile muŋanda yakwe njaakali kutelela, watambula boonse abali kumuniilila,
ulakambauka a-Bwami bwaLeza, akwiisya ecamba makani aa-Mwami Jesu Kristo, kakutakwe uumukasya.
Aya makani wakaasyomezya kale kubasinsimi bakwe mumalembe aasalala,
Ngamwanaakwe, iwakazyalwa kuzwa kumbuto zyaDavida kubuntu bwakwe,
pele wakabikwa mbuli Mwana a-Leza anguzu a-Muuya Uusalala kukubusigwa kubafu, ngu-Jesu Kristo Mwami wesu.
Kulinguwe nkundakatambula luzyalo abuapostolo bwakuswiilizya lusyomo muzisi zyoonse nkaambo kazina lyakwe,
nkabela anywebo muli baite ba-Jesu Kristo.
Ndamujuzya nyoonse nomuli mu-Roma, nobayandwa ba-Leza, basalala baite. Akube kulindinywe luzyalo aluumuno kuzwa kwaLeza Taateesu aku-Mwami Jesu Kristo.
Kamboni wangu ngu-Leza, nguwenya ngwemanina milimo amuuya wangu mu-Makani Mabotu aa-Mwanaakwe, kuti ndamwiibaluka lyoonse cakutaleka munkombyo zyangu.
Ndakomba kuti, naayanda Leza, ambweni ndakonzya kweenda kabotu, nkasike kulindinywe.
Nkaambo kakuti ndayandisya kumubona, kuti nkamwaabile cimwi cipo camuuya cakumuyumya,
nkukwaamba kuti, nikakazikwe anywe mumyoyo yesu kulusyomo lwesu toonse, nywebo ambebo.
Ikuti nsiyandi kuti mutazibi, nubakwesu, mbundakali kuyanda kanjikanji kuza kulindinywe (pele kusikila sunu ndakasigwa), kuti nkajane micelo imwi akati kandinywe anywebo, mbubonya mbuli mumasi amwi.
Ndijisi ceelelo cakucitila boonse, nibaba ba-Helene nibaba bamisyobo imbi, nibaba basongo nibaba bataiyide.
Nkaambo kaako mebo ndayandisya kumukambaukila Makani Mabotu anywebo nomuli mu-Roma.
Nkaambo mulingao bululami bwa-Leza mubuli mukuyubununwa, kulusyomo mbwalusyomo, mbuli mbukulembedwe kuti, Pele uululeme unoopona kulusyomo.
Nkaambo kuzibwa kwa-Leza kulaboneka kulimbabo, ikuti Leza nguwababonya.
Nkaambo kuzwa kumalengelo aanyika makani aakwe aatabonwi alaboneka kukumvwigwa kuncito zyakwe, nkukuti inguzu zyakwe abu-Leza bwakwe zitamani. Nkaambo kaako tabakwe bwiinsyo.
Ikuti bakalimuzi Leza, nekubaboobo teebakamulemeka nikuba kumulumba mbuli Leza, pele bakali kuyeeya miyeeyo yabuyo, nkabela myoyo yabo iitamvwi yakasizigwa.
Bakaamba kuti, Tuli basongo, anukuti bakafubaala.
Bulemu bwa-Leza uutafwi bakabulekela mituni yabantu bafwa abayuni abanyama abauka.
mbubakasintana buswini bwa-Leza kububeji, kukulemeka akukomba cilenge kwiinda cilenga, oyo uutembaulika lyoonse, Ameni.
Nciceeco Leza ncakabaabilila luciso luusya bweeme. Nkaambo banakazi babo bakasintana mulimo uuelede kumulimo uuteelede.

Mbubonya obo abaalumi babo bakaleka mulimo uuelede wabanakazi, akupya muzisusi zyabo zyakuyandana beni, nkaambo baalumi bakali kucita abaaluminyina milimo iitondwa, nkabela kabatambula mumibili yabo beni cilumbo ceelede cakulubya kwabo.
Nkabela mbuli mbubatakayeeya kuba a-Leza muluzibo lwabo, Leza wakabaabila moyo uusampaukide, kuti bacite zintu ziteelede,
bazule kutalulama, abwaamu, abubi, abutavu; akuzula ibbivwe, abujayi, alukazyanyo, alweeno, alusulo; akuba bajubi,
bavwiyi, basesemya Leza, basikasampusampu, basikulisumpula, basikubwanta, basikulenga bubi, batalemeki bazyali,
batakwe manjezeezya, bajaya cizuminano, batakwe luzyalo, basincenyena, bateeteleli,
Aba bantu balizi lubeteko lwa-Leza lwakuti abo ibacita milimo iili boobo baleelede kufwa, nekubaboobo tabaciti njiyo luzutu pele alimwi abo baicita balabakondelelwa.
Tulizi kuti lubeteko lwaLeza lwakusinizya lulawida alimbabo bacita milimo iili boobo.
Pele ulayeeya buti, muntu obeteka bamwi bacita milimo iili boobo anukuti ulaicita mbubonya ayebo omwini? Sa uyooyokoka kulubeteko lwa-Leza?
Alimwi sa ulasampaula bunji bwaluzyalo lwakwe abusicamba bwakwe abukaliki bwamoyo wakwe, kukutaziba kuti luzyalo lwa-Leza ndolukweenzya kukweempwa?
Pele mbuli buyumu bwako amoyo wako uuteempwi ulaliyobweda bukali mubuzuba bwabukali mbuluzooyubununwa lubeteko lululeme lwa-Leza.
Nkaambo uzooabila boonse mbuli milimo yabo.
Abo ibacita kabotu cabusungu akuyandaula mbubonya bulemu akulemekwa akutafwa, ulabaabila buumi butamani.
Pele abo ibakazyanya akutaswiilila lusinizyo, anukuti baswiilila kutalulama, ulabaabila lunyemo abukali.
Kulaba mapenzi amafwabi kuliboonse bantu bacita bubi, nibaba ba-Juda kukusaanguna nibaba ba-Helene,
pele bulemu akulemekwa aluumuno kuliboonse bacita bubotu, nibaba ba-Juda kukusaanguna nibaba ba-Helene,
Nkaambo kwa-Leza takulangililwi ciwa pe,
Nkaambo boonse babisya mukubula Mulao balafwidilila mukubula Mulao, nkabela boonse babisya mu-Mulao balabetekwa nkukonya ku-Mulao.
Nkaambo abo baswiilila Mulao teensi mbabo baluleme kumeso aa-Leza, pele abo bacita Mulao mbimbabo bazoolulamikwa,
Nkaambo bamasi batakwe Mulao nibacita camumoyo makani aamu-Mulao, elyo aba batakwe Mulao balibeda Mulao beni,
Aba balatondezya mulimo wa-Mulao uulembedwe mumyoyo yabo, nkabela kuciindi nciconya manjezeezya aabo aalo alazumina, amiyeeyo yabo ilabapa milandu nanka kubalubusya
mubuzuba obo mbwazoobeteka Leza makani aasisidwe aabantu muli-Jesu Kristo, mbuli Makani Mabotu nginkambauka mebo.
akuziba luyando lwakwe, akusalaula zintu zyaandeene kukwiiyigwa mu-Mulao,
alimwi kuti koliyeeya kuti ndime mweenzi waboofu, amumuni wabo bali mumudima,
amusolozi wabatayide, amwiiyi wabana, kukuba aluzibo alusinizyo luboneka mu-Mulao,
ino yebo oiisya mweenzinyoko sa toliisyi omwini? Yebo okambauka kutabba, sa ulabba?
Yebo oamba kutacita bumambi, sa ulacita bumambi? Yebo osesemwa mituni, sa ulasaala intempele
Yebo olikankaizizya Mulao, sa ulaubaansya Leza kukusotoka Mulao
Nkaambo izina lya-Leza lilasampaulwa akati kabamasi nkaambo kandinywe, mbubonya mbukulembedwe.
Lino kuti silulomo kalomya milimo iiluleme yamu-Mulao, sa lulomo lwakwe talukooyooambwa mbuli bupalule?
Alimwi oyo silulomo uulomya Mulao camumoyo sa takooyoobeteka nduwe ojisi malembe abupalule anukuti uli sikusotoka Mulao?
Nkaambo oyo wakumeso aabantu engwe mu-Juda, abwalo bupalule embo bwakunyama kumeso aabantu.
Oyo wamumoyo ngumuJuda, abwalo bupalule mbwamumoyo, ngemakani aamuuya, teensi makani aabulembe buyo, Oyu tatembauliki kubantu pele kwa-Leza.
Lino mu-Juda ulainda buti? Abwalo bupalule bulabelekanzi?
Loko muziimbo zyoonse. Kukusaanguna, bakasyomenwa makani aa-Leza,
Nkutyeni bamwi kuti, kabatasyomeki, sa kutasyomeka kwabo kulakonzya kubisizya lusyomo lwa-Leza?
Ne! Leza abe musyomesi, nikuba kuti bantu boonse mbabeji, mbubonya mbukulembedwe kuti,
Ululamikwe mumajwi aako,
Akuzunda mukubeteka kwako.
Pele kuti kutalulama kwesu kakubonekesya bululami bwa-Leza, ino twaambe buti? Sa kwa-Leza kulajanwa kutalulama kukuleta bukali? Ndaamba cabuntu,
Ne! kakuli boobo, Leza ulakonzya buti kubeteka nyika?
Pele kuti kukubeja kwangu lusinizyo lwa-Leza lulainda kuboneka cakumulemeka, ino nkaambonzi ncimbetekwa mbuli sizibi?
Sa tatukonzyi kucita bubi kuti kusike bubotu? (Mbubonya obo mbutulengelelwa kwaamba kubantu bamwi, Makani aabaaba alazulika cakululama).
mbuli mbukulembedwe kuti,
Taakwe uululeme pe, naba omwe,
Taakwe uuswiililisya akuyandaula Leza.
Boonse balipambukide, mbabisyi boonse buyo,
Taakwe uucita bubotu, naba omwe.
Andimi zyabo zileena.
Kuli buyoka bwanzoka kunsi amilomo yabo,
Munzila zyabo muli lutyoko amafwabi.
Inzila yaluumuno tabaizi.
Nkaambo kakuti kumilimo ya-Mulao taakwe muntu naba omwe uukonzya kululamikwa kumeso aakwe. Nkaambo ku-Mulao nkucizibika cibi.
Obu bululami bwa-Leza mbubwakusyoma Jesu Kristo, mbubwabo boonse buyo basyoma, taakwe bwaanka.
Nkaambo boonse babisya akulela kubulemu bwa-Leza,
pele balalulamikwa buyo kuluzyalo lwakwe kubununu bwamuli-Jesu Kristo,
Walo nguwe ngwaakabika Leza kuti abe mulungo, cakulusyomo lwamubulowa bwakwe. Ncitondezyo cabululami bwakwe, nkaambo kakuleka kwazibi ezyo izyakacitwa kalekale kuciindi cacambacilemu ca-Leza.
­Alimwi ncicitondezyo cabululami bwakwe kuciindi casunu, citondezya kuti Leza uliluleme, alimwi ulalulamika oyo muntu uumusyoma Jesu.
Ikuti tulaamba kuti kulusyomo nkwalulamikwa muntu, teensi kumilimo ya-Mulao pe.
Sa Leza ngwabaJuda luzutu? Sa tali wabamasi abalo? Ee, ngwabamasi.
Mbubo, kuli Leza omwe buyo, uululamika basibupalule kulusyomo abasilulomo kulusyomo nkukonya,
Lino sa tulalobya Mulao kulusyomo? Ne! tulayumya Mulao.
Lino twaambe buti aa-Abrahamu taateesu waku nyama?
Nkaambo Abrahamu kuti wakalulamikwa kumilimo, ulijisi cintu cakulikankaizi­ zya, anukuti kumeso aa-Leza taakwe pe.
Nkaambo malembe alaamba buti? Ati, Abrahamu wakasyoma Leza, nkabela lusyomo lwakwe lwakeclezegwa mbuli bululami.
Lino ciliyo casimilimo tacaambwi mbuli cigwasyo buyo pe, cilaambwa mbuli mulandu.
Pele oyo uutabeleki, pele ulasyoma sikululamika basizibi, kuliyooyo lusyomo lwakwe lulaambwa mbuli bululami.
Mbubonya obo alakwe Davida mbwaamba coolwe camuntu ngwaelezya Leza bululami cakutaamba milimo.
Wati,
Bali acoolwe abo balekelelwa milandu yabo,
Azibi zyabo zyavumbwa.
Uli acoolwe oyo muntu ngwateelezezyi Jehova zibi.
Lino eci coolwe sa ncabasibupalule balike, na ncabasilulomo abalo? Nkaambo tulaamba kuti kuli-Abrahamu lusyomo lwakaambwa mbuli bululami.
Pele lwakaambwa buti? Sa mbuli sibupalule nanka mbuli silulomo? Katali sibupalule pe, kali silulomo.

Nkabela lino wakapegwa citondezyo cabupalule mbuli cibonesyo cabululami buzwa kulusyomo mbwaakajisi naakacili alulomo kuti abe wisaabo boonse basyoma nibali alulomo, kuti abalo bakeelezezegwe bululami,
alimwi abe wisaabo, abo batali basibupalule buyo pele beenda munzila zyalusyomo olo ndwaakajisi taateesu Abrahamu naakacili alulomo.
Nkaambo bana ba-Mulao kuti mbabo mbibaswaana, elyo lusyomo lwasampuka, acalo cisyomezyo caba cabuyo.
Ikuti Mulao ulaleta bukali, pele kutakwe Mulao nkukonya kutakwe mulandu.
Nkaambo kaako ncalusyomo, kuti cibe caluzyalo, kuti cisyomezyo cibe calusinizyo kunyungu zyoonse; tacili cabasimulao luzutu pe, ncaboonse basilusyomo mbuli lwa-Abrahamu, nguwenya taateesu toonse,
mbubonya mbukuJembedwe kuti, Ndakubika mbuli wisaabo bamuzisi zinji, Ngutaateesu toonse kumeso aa-Leza oyo ngwaakasyoma, nguwe uuponya bafu akucita zintu zitawo mbuli ziliwo.
Nibwakamana bulangizi wakacili kulangila cakusyoma kuti abe wisaabo bazisi zinji, mbuli ijwi lyakuti, Mbubonya obo mbuzizooba inyungu zyako,
Nkabela lusyomo lwakwe teelwakakompama nikuba mukuyeeya mubili wakwe mwini mbuwakafwide kale, nkaambo kali amyaaka iili mwaanda, alyalo izyalilo lya-Sara mbulyakafwide.
Teewakadooneka kucisyomezyo ca-Leza kukutasyoma pe, pele wakayumisigwa mulusyomo, kukupa Leza bulemu,
akusyomenena kuti eco ncaakasyomezya ulakonzya kucicita ncobeni.
Nciceeco ncilwakamweelezezegwa mbuli bululami.
Nkabela teensi nkaambo kanguwe luzutu nkilyakalembwa eli ijwi lyakuti wakeelezezegwa,
lyakalembwa nkaambo kandiswe, ikuti aswebo tuzooelezezegwa, iswe tusyoma oyo iwakabusya Jesu Mwami wesu kuzwa kubafu,
Nguwe wakaabwa nkaambo kamilandu yesu, nkabela wakabusigwa kuti tukalulamikwe.
Mulinguwe mutujene lunjililo lwamu­ luzyalo olu mutubede, alimwi tulatangala mukulangila bulemu bwa-Leza,
Nkabela teensi aya luzutu, pele alimwi atutangale mumafwabi esu, nkaambo tulizi kuti mafwabi alaleta lukakatilo,
alwalo lukakatilo lulaleta ziimbo zisunke, azyalo ziimbo zisunke zilaleta bulangizi,
nkabela bulangizi tabuusyi bweeme, nkaambo kakuti luyandisyo lwa-Leza lulapaya mumyoyo yesu kuzwa ku-Muuya Uusalala ngutwapegwa.
Nkaambo nitwakacikompeme, kuciindi ceelede Kristo wakafwida basikasampusampu.
Nciyumu kumuntu kufwida muntu uululeme, nekubaboobo na wabona kuti muntu mubotu, inga ulazumina kumufwida,
Pele Leza, walo ulatondezya luyandisyo lwakwe kulindiswe boobo, nkaambo nitwakacili basizibi Kristo wakatufwida.
Nkabela lino mbutwalulamikwa kubulowa bwakwe, mulinguwe alimwi mututi inde loko kufutulwa kubukali,
Nkaambo kuti kuciindi ncitwakali basinkondonyina twakayanzanisigwa kuli-Leza kulufu lwamwanaakwe, elyo kuciindi ecino ncituyanzanisisidwe kale tulainda kufutulwa kubuumi bwakwe.
Nkabela teensi boobo luzutu, pele alimwi tulatangala muli-Leza nkaambo ka-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo, ikuti kumaanza aakwe nkutujene luyanzano.
Ikuti mane kusikila kuciindi ca-Mulao kakuli cibi munyika, pele cibi taceelezegwi ciindi ncikutakwe­ Mulao.
Pele lufu lwakali abwami kuzwa kuli-Adamu kusikila kuli-Musa, nikuba kulibaabo batakaina kucita zibi zikozyenye alusotoko lwa-Adamu, nguwenya cikozyano casikuciza.

Pele cipo tacili mbubonya mbuli mulandu pe. Nkaambo bantu banji bakafwa nkaambo kamulandu wamuntu omwe buyo, pele luzyalo lwa-Leza lwakainda loko kupaya, acalo cipo camuluzyalo camumuntu omwe Jesu Kristo, kubantu banji.
Nkabela cipo taceensi mbuli cakumaanza aamuntu omwe iwakabisya. Nkaambo olo lubeteko lwamuntu omwe ndululeta mulandu, pele cipo cizwa kunsotoko zinji cilaleta lululamiko.

Nkaambo kulusotoko lwamuntu omwe lufu lwakaba abwami kumaanza aamuntu oyo omwe, elyo abo batambula lupayo lwaluzyalo alwacipo cabululami, abo balainda kuba abwami bwamubuumi kumaanza aamuntu omwe, nguwenya Jesu Kristo.
Mbubo, mbuli kulusotoko lwamuntu omwe kwakazida bantu boonse mulandu, mbubonya obo kubululami bwamuntu omwe kulazida bantu boonse lululamiko lwabuumi.
Nkaambo mbuli kukutaswiilila kwamuntu omwe banji bakaba basizibi, mbubonya obo kukuswiilila kwamuntu omwe banji balaba baluleme.
Lino Mulao wakanjila kuti lusotoko lukomene. Pele cibi nkucakavula, nkukonya oko luzyalo nkulwakainda kuvula.
Kuti mbubonya mbuli cibi cakaba abwami bwamulufu, alwalo luzyalo lube abwami bwabululami buleta buumi butamani bwamuli-Jesu Kristo Mwami wesu.
Ne! swebo tufwidide zibi tukonzya buti kucikala mulinzizyo?
Sa tamuzi kuti toonse nitwakabapatizigwa muli-Jesu Kristo twakabapatizigwa mulufu lwakwe.
Aboobo twakazikwa awe mukubapatizigwa kwamulufu, kuti mbuli Kristo mbwaakabusigwa kuzwa kubafu kubulemu bwabawisi, mbubonya obo aswebo tukeende mubuumi bupya,
Nkaambo kuti twaba bagumene awe mucikozyano calufu lwakwe, elyo tuzooba awe mububuke bwakwe abwalo.
Nkaambo tulizi kuti muntu wesu mukulukulu wakabambulwa awe aciingano, kuti mubili wazibi ukalobesegwe, tutacibi mubuzike bwazibi,
ikuti mufu waangunwidwa mulandu wazibi.
Pele kuti twakafwa antoomwe a-Kristo, elyo tulasyoma kuti kupona akwalo tulapona awe,
nkaambo tulizi kuti Kristo mbuli mbwabukide kuzwa kubafu tacifwi limbi pe. Lufu talucili abwami bwanguwe pe,
Nkaambo kufwa wakafwida zibi, ncalumwi luzutu, pele kupona ulaponena Leza.
Mbubonya obo anywebo amuliyeeye mbuli bafwididwe zibi, pele baumi kuli-Leza muli-Kristo Jesu Mwami wesu.
Nkaambo kaako mutazuminini zibi kuti zibe abwami mumibili yanu yanyama bwakumucitya kuti muzuminine zisusi zyayo.
Alimwi mutaabili zibi zizo zyanu mbuli zicityo zyakutalulama, pele amulyaabile Leza mbuli bapononona bazwa kubafu, azizo zyanu amuzyaabile Leza mbuli zicityo zyabululami.
Nkaambo zibi tazikooba abwami bwandinywe, ikuti tamuli kumi ku-Mulao, muli kumi kuluzyalo.
Sa tamuzi kuti umwi aumwi ngumulyaabila kukuswiilila, muli bazike bayooyo ngumuswiilila, nikuba zibi zileta lufu, nikuba luswiililo luleta bululami.
Pele Leza alumbwe kuti mwakali bazike bazibi pele mwaswiilila camyoyo olo lwiiyo ndumwaabilwa,
nkabela lino mulilubulwidwe kuzibi, mwaba bazike babululami.

(Ndaamba cabuntu nkaambo kabulelu bwanyama bwanu), Lino mbuli mbumwakaabila busofwi akasampusampu zizo zyanu mbuli bazike bakasampusampu, mbubonya obo sunu amwaabile bululami zizo zyanu, mbuli bazike babusalazi.
Nkaambo nimwakali bazike bazibi mwakalubuka kubululami.
Lino kuciindi eco ncilumbonzi ncimwakajisi muzintu ezyo nzimuusila bweeme ciindi casunu? Nkaambo mamanino aazintu ezyo ndufu.
Pele sunu mbumulubukide kuzibi akuba bazike ba-Leza, mulijisi cilumbo canu cabusalazi, nkabela mamanino aaco mbuumi butamani.
Nkaambo cakuvola cazibi ndufu, pele caabilo ca-Leza mbuumi butamani bwamuli-Kristo Jesu Mwami wesu.
Alimwi sa tamuzi, bakwesu (ikuti ndaambila basikuziba Mulao) kuti Mulao uli abwami kumuntu kuciindi ncacipona,
Nkaambo mwana­ kazi uukwetwe ulaangidwe ku-Mulao amulumaakwe nacipona, pele mulumi afwa, walubuka kumulumaakwe.

Nkaambo kaako kuti waba amulumi umbi ciindi ncacipona mulumaakwe, elyo ulaambwa kuti ngusibumambi, pele mulumaakwe afwa, elyo walubuka ku-Mulao, nkabela tali sibumambi pe, nikuba kuti waba amulumi umbi.
Mbubonya obo, nubakwesu, anywebo mwakafwida Mulao kumubili wa-Kristo, kuti mukabede umbi, nkukuti oyo iwakabusigwa kuzwa kubafu, kuti tukazyalile Leza micelo,
Nkaambo kakuti nitwakacili anyama zisusi zyazibi zyaku-Mulao zyakali kubeleka muzizo zyesu akuzyazya micelo yalufu.
Pele sunu tulilubukide ku-Mulao, nkaambo tulifwidide eco ncitwakajatilwa, kuti tube abuzike bupya, nkutaamba bukulukulu bwamalembe pele bwamoyo.
Lino zibi nizyakaba aciindi ceelede, zyakabelesya oyo mulazyo akucita mulindime mabbivwe oonse. Ikuti na taakwe Mulao, zibi zilifwide.
Mebo ciindi cimwi cakutaba a-Mulao ndakali muumi, pele mulazyo niwakasika, zibi zyakapononona elyo mebo ndakafwa,
Mbuboobo mulazyo wakuleta buumi ndakaujana nguwenya kuti ngwalufu.
Nkaambo zibi nizyakajana ciindi ceelede, zyakabelesya mulazyo kuti zindeene, nkabela nguwenya nguzyakandijazya.
Ncobeni Mulao ulasalala, awalo mulazyo ulasalala, uliluleme akubota.
Lino sa cintu cibotu ncicakandibeda lufu? Ne! nzizibi, nkaambo zibi nzizyakabelesya cintu cibotu cakundetela lufu, kuti zibi ziboneke mbuzibede, nkukuti zibi zibije loko nkaambo kamulazyo.
Eco ncincita nsicizi, nkaambo eco ncinjanda kucita teensi ncico ncincita pe, eco ncinsula ncencita.
Lino kuti cintu ncintayandi ncencita, nkukuti ndazuminina Mulao kuti mubotu.
Lino teensi ndime uucicicita pe, nzizibi zindikalilide mukati.
Nkaambo ndizi kuti mulindime (nkukuti munyama yangu) tamukali cintu niciba cimwi cibotu. Ikuti kuzumina kwalo nkukuli, pele kucita cintu cibotu nsikujene pe,
Nkaambo cibotu ncinjanda nsiciciti pe, pele cibi ncintayandi ncico ncincita.
Lino kuti cintu ncintayandi ncencita, nkukuti teensi ndime uucicicita pe, nzizibi zindikalilide mukati.
Lino mbuboobo mbunjana ku-Mulao, ciindi ncinjanda kucita kabotu, nceciindi nciconya ncetuli aco cibi.
Nkaambo ndakondelwa Mulao wa-Leza mukati kamoyo wangu,
pele ndabona mulao umbi muzizo zyangu, uulwisya mulao wamoyo wangu, nkabela ndaba mwaange wamulao wazibi uuli muzizo zyangu.
Maawe! ndi muntu uusampaukide ncobeni! Ino nguni uukonzya kundivuna kumubili oyu walufu?
Ngu-Leza, Ndamulumba kuli-Jesu Kristo Mwami wesu! Mbuboobo kumoyo wangu ndabelekela Mulao wa-­Leza, pele kunyama ndabelekela mulao wazibi.
Lino sunu taakwe luzulo kulibaabo bakamantene muli-Kristo Jesu (ibateendi mbuli nyama anukuti mbuli muuya).
Nkaambo Mulao wamuuya wabuumi bwamuli-Kristo Jesu wandilubula kumulao wazibi awalufu.

Nkaambo eco icatakakonzeka ku-Mulao, ikuti wakalikompeme nkaambo kanyama, wakacicita Leza. Walo wakatuma mwanaakwe mwini mucikozyano canyama yazibi nkaambo kazibi, nkabela mbubonya wakazula zibi zyamunyama,
kuti bululami bwa-Mulao bukalondolwe mulindiswe, swebo tuteendi mbuli nyama anukuti mbuli muuya.
Nkaambo basinyama balayeeya makani aanyama, anukuti basimuuya balayeeya makani aamuuya.
Ikuti miyeeyo yanyama ndufu, anukuti miyeeyo yamuuya mbuumi, alimwi nduumuno.
Basinyama tabakonzyi kubotezya Leza pe.
Pele nywebo tamuli basinyama, muli basimuuya, nkukuti Muuya wa-Leza nuumukalilide mukati. Umwi uutajisi Muuya wa-Kristo, oyu teensi wakwe pe,
Kuti Kristo ulimukalilide mukati, elyo mubili ulifwide nkaambo kazibi, anukuti muuya muumi nkaambo kabululami,
Pele kuti ulimukalilide mukati Muuya wasikubusya Jesu kuzwa kubafu, elyo oyo sikubusya Kristo kubafu ulapononosya mibili yanu mifwisi ayalo kunguzu zya-Muuya wakwe uumukalilide mukati.
Nkaambo mwapona canyama, mulafwa, pele kuti kamujazya Muuya milimo yanyama, mulapona.
Nkaambo boonse beenzegwa ku-Muuya wa-Leza mbabonya mbibana ba-Leza.
Nkaambo teemwatambula muuya wabuzike buboozezya buyoofu pe, mwatambula muuya wabwana, mulinguwo mutuompolola kuti, Abba, Ta.
Muuya mwini ulazuminana amyuuya yesu tubeni kuti tuli bana ba-Leza.
Lino kuti tuli bana, alimwi tuli baswaana, nkukuti baswaana ba-Leza, baswaana bakwe antoomwe a-Kristo, ikuti tuli bapenzinyina kuti tukabe balemunyina.
Ikuti ludunamino lwazilenge lulalangila luyubununo lwabana ba-Leza.
Nkaambo zilenge zyakasampauzigwa, enko kubukanze bwazyo zini pele kubukanze bwayooyo iwakazisampauzya­, ikuti kali abulangizi
bwakuti azyalo zilenge zini zikalubulwe kubuzike bwabubozi, bube abulubulo bulemu bwabana ba-Leza.
Tulizi kuti kusikila sunu zilenge zyoonse zilatongela akumyongwa antoomwe.
Nkabela teensi boobo luzutu, pele alimwi aswebo tubeni, nitujisi kabaIwebalwe ka-Muuya, tulatongela mukati, katucilindila bwana bwesu, nkukuti lununuko lwamibili yesu,
Nkaambo obu bulangizi mbubonya mbutwakafutulilwa. Pele cilangilo ciboneka tacicili cilangilo. Sa cintu ncabona kale muntu ucicilangila?
Pele kuti tulalangila cintu ncitutaboni, nitulindila ncico cakukazika moyo,
Mbubonya obo awalo Muuya ulatugwasya munkompamo zyesu, Nkaambo kukomba mbutweelede tatucizi pe, pele Muuya mwini ulatukombelezezya amitongelo iitaambiki.
Nkabela oyo uugulunganya myoyo yabantu ulizi miyeeyo ya-Muuya mbwiibede, ikuti ulakombelezezya basalali kubusyu bwa-Leza.
Nkaambo abo mbaakabwene kale wakabakanza kuti bakozyanisigwe mucikozyano ca-Mwanaakwe, akabe mutaanzi akati kababunyina banji.
Lino abo mbaakakanza mbabonya mbaakaita, abaabo mbaakaita mbabonya mbaakalulamika, nkabela abo mbaakalulamika mbabonya mbaakapa bulemu.
Oyo iwatakatukasya Mwanaakwe mwini, pele wakamwaabila ndiswe toonse, sa takooyootupa buyo antoomwe anguwe zintu zimwi zyoonse?
Nguni uukonzya kubika kaambo kubasale baLeza? Leza alulamika,
ino nguni uukonzya kupa mulandu? Kristo Jesu nguwakafwa, alimwi nguwenya wakabuka kuzwa kubafu, nkwali kululyo lwa-Leza, ulakombelezezya ndiswe.
Nguni uukonzya kutwaandaanya kuluyando lwa-Kristo? Sa mapenzi naaba mapakasyo naaba mafwabi niiba inzala niciba cintanda nibuba bulowe niliba isumo?
Mbubonya mbukulembedwe kuti,
Nkaambo kanduwe tulajayigwa buzuba boonse,
Tulaambwa mbuli imbelele zyakujaya.
Nkaambo ndisinizye kuti taakwe cintu, niluba lufu nibuba buumi, nibaba baangelo nibaba basibwami nibaba basinguzu, naaba makani aasunu naaba makani aaciza,
niziba zintu zyakujulu niziba zyakunsi, niziba zilenge zimwi zyoonse, taakwe cintu niciba cimwi cikonzya kutwaandaanya kuluyando lwa-Leza lwamuli-Kristo Jesu Mwami wesu.
Ndaamba cakusinizya muli-Kristo, nsibeji pe, awalo moyo wangu ulandizuminina mu-Muuya Uusalala,
kuti ndili abuusu bupati, alimwi ndaciswa lyoonse cakutaleka mumoyo wangu,
Nkaambo nindakakonzya kukomba kuti nkabe mutakate ndemwini nkaambo kabakwesu abasiluzubo bangu bakunyama.
Balo bali ba-Israyeli, bwana mbubwabo, abwalo abulemu, ayalo milongo, ayalo milao, abwalo bukombi, azyalo zisyomezyo.
Bamataata abalo mbibabo, alimwi kulimbabo nkwaakazwa Kristo mbuli nyama, nguwe Leza uuli abwami bwazintu zyoonse uutembaulika lyoonse. Ameni.
Alimwi abo bazwa kumbuto zya-Abrahamu teensi boonse mbibana bakwe. Pe, kulaambwa kuti, Muli-Izaka muziyooambwa imbuto zyako,
nkukwaamba kuti, bana bakunyama teensi mbabo mbibana ba-Leza, pele bana balusyomezyo mbibaaba baambwa mbuli inyungu,
Nkaambo ijwi lyalusyomezyo ndeeli lyakuti, Kuciindi cili boobo ndeza, elyo Sara uyooba amwana.
Alimwi teensi boobo luzutu, pele alakwe Rebeka naakaba ada kuli-Izaka taateesu,
ciindi ncibatakaina kuzyalwa bana, alimwi kabatana kucita cintu niciba cibotu niciba cibi, kuti bwiime bukanze bwa-Leza bwakusala, butali bwamilimo pele bwayooyo uuita,
wakaambilwa kuti, Mupati ulaba muzike wamuniini.
Mbubonya obo mbukulembedwe kuti, Jakobo ndakamuyanda, pele Esau ndakamusula.
Ulaambila Musa kuti, Njooetelela kufumbwa ngunjanda kweetelela, njoofwida luzyalo kufumbwa ngunjanda kufwida luzyalo.
Aboobo, teensi makani aanyando zyamuntu naaba aakuwilana, anukuti nga-Leza uuetelela,
Ikuti malembe alaambila Farao kuti, Nciceeco nciconya ncindakakubusizya, kuti mulinduwe mukabe citondezyo canguzu zyangu, kuti izina lyangu likabe ampuwo munyika yoonse,
Mbubo, kufumbwa ngwayanda ulamweetelela, kufumbwa ngwayanda ulamuyumya.
Lino inga uwe ulandaambila kuti, Pele nkaambonzi ucitongauka? Nguni uukonzya kukaka bukanze bwakwe?
We! Nduweni uwe omuntu okazyanya a-Leza? Sa cibumbwa cilakonzya kwaambila mubumbi kuti, Wandicitilanzi boobo?
Sa mubumbi tajisi bwami bwakubulongo? Kumulwi omwe sa takonzyi kucita cilongo cimwi cibotu acimwi cibi?
Alimwi nkutyeni naayanda kuzubula buvubi bwabulemu bwakwe kuzilongo ezyo zyeelelwa luse nzyaakabambilwa kale bulemu,
nkukuti kulindiswe, swebo tubantu mbaita, nibaba bazwa kuba-Juda nibaba bazwa kubamasi?
Abo batakali bantu bangu nzoobaamba bantu bangu,
Ayooyo iwa takali kuyandwa, nzoomwaamba muyandwi wangu.
Nkukonya nkubayooambwa kuti mbana ba-Leza muumi
nkaambo Jehova ulacita bukanze bwakwe ansi cakulondola acakukosola.
Nkabela mbubonya mbwaakasinsima Isaya kuti,
Mwami wa-Makamu-makamu naakatusiila imbuto,
Nitwakaba mbuli Sodoma,
Nitwakakozyana a-Gomora.
Anukuti ba-Israyeli bakali kuyandaula mulao wabululami, nekubaboobo teebakaujana pe,
Nkaambonzi? Nkaambo kakuti teensi kulusyomo nkubakauyandaula, pele kuncito zyabo beni. Bakalebwa kubbwe lilebya,
mbuli mbukulembedwe kuti,
Amubone, ndasitikizya mu-Zioni ibbwe lilebya, amwala uufumpuzya. Oyo uumusyoma takooyoousigwa bweeme.
Ndazumina kuti bali abusungu kumakani aa-Leza, pele busungu mbubajisi teensi bwaluzibo.
Nkaambo kabatezi bululami bwa-Leza, pele bakali kusoleka kwiimika bululami bwabo beni, nciceeco ncibatakaima kulibombya kubululami bwa-Leza,
Ikuti Kristo nguumanya Mulao, nguwe uuleta bululami kuliboonse basyoma.
Nkaambo Musa ulalemba aabululami buzwa kumulao kuti, Muntu uubucita uzooponena mbubonya,
Pele bululami buzwa kulusyomo bulaamba boobo, buti, Utaambi mumoyo wako kuti, Nguni uuyootanta kujulu? (nkukuti, kuyooselusya Kristo),
nikuba kuti, Nguni uuyooselukila kunsi? (nkukuti, kuyootantika Kristo kuzwa kubafu),
Pe, mbutyeni? Buti, Ijwi lili kufwiifwi kulinduwe, lili mukanwa lyako amumoyo wako, nkukuti, ijwi lyalusyomo nditukambauka,
Iyakuti, Anooli wazumina kumulomo kuti Jesu ngu-Mwami, akusyoma mumoyo wako kuti Leza wakamubusya kubafu, noti kafutuke.
Nkaambo kumoyo kulasyomwa kuti kube bululami, akumulomo kulazuminwa kuti kube lufutuko.
Taakwe bwaanka kuba-Juda akubamasi, nkaambo Mwami wabo boonse nguumwi buyo, ulabavubila boonse bamulilila.
Ikuti umwi aumwi uulilila izina lya-Mwami ulafutuka.
Pele bamulilile buti ngubatana kusyoma? Alimwi bamusyome buti ngubatana kumvwa? Alimwi, bamvwe buti nikutakwe sikukambauka?
Alimwi, bantu bakambauke buti, batatumwa? Mbubonya mbukulembedwe kuti, Abota loko maulu aabaabo bakambauka Ivangele lyamakani mabotu.
Lino lusyomo lulazwa kunkombe, alimwi inkombe ilazwa kujwi lya-Leza.
Pele ndabuzya kuti, Sa tabana kumvwa? Balimvwide.
Ijwi lyabo lyamwaika munyika yoonse,
Makani aabo asika nikuba kumagolelo aansi.
Nzoomuzubaazya kulibaabo batali cisi,
Nzoomukalazya kucisi cifubafuba.
Ndakajanwa kulibaabo batakandiyandaula,
Ndakayubunwidwa kulibaabo batakandivwima,
Leza tatakatide cisi cakwe pe, cisi cakwe ncaakazibide kale! Sa tamuzi mbwaamba malembe aa-Eliya? Ulabikila Israyeli kaambo kubusyu bwa-Leza, kakuti,
Jehova, basinsimi bako balibajayide, azipaililo zyako balizimwayide, ambebo ndasyaala endike, alimwi buumi bwangu balabuvwima, bandinyanzye.
Pele Leza wamuvwiila buti? Wati, Ndililiyobwedede bantu bali zyuulu zili musanu azibili bamu-Israyeli abatana kufugamina Baala,
Mbubonya boobo, akwalo kuciindi casunu kuli cisyaalizyo cisalwa kuluzyalo,
Pele kuti ncaluzyalo, nkukwaamba kuti teensi cancito, cita luzyalo talucili luzyalo pe.
Mbubonya mbukulembedwe kuti,
Leza wabapa muuya waciŋonziŋonzi, Meso aakutabona, amatwi aakutamvwa,
kusikila kuciindi casunu.
Intafule yabo ibe mbuli citezyo akakole,
Ibabede cilebyo alukomyo.
Asizigwe meso aabo, bataboni.
Ongomeka masule aabo lyoonse.
Mbubo, pele luleo lwabo ndulwakabeda bantu baansi boonse buvubi, abwalo busweeki bwabo mbubwakabeda bamasi buvubi, elyo luzuzyo lwabo sa talukooyooinda loko lwalo?
Ndamwaambila nywebo nubamasi mbuli mbwendi apostolo wabamasi, ndalemeka eyi milimo yangu njiyonya,
