kuti inga ndakonzya kuzubaazya basinyamama, cita nkafutule bamwi akati kabo,
Nkaambo anooli busowe bwabo mbubwabeda bantu baansi boonse luyanzano, ino bulaba buti butambulwi bwabo? Inga bulaba mbuli buumi buzwa kulufu.
Pele mitabi imwi niyakagonkwa, elyo yebo noli kasonsela kamusokwe wakasimpikilwa akati kayo, kuti ukamantane ayo antoomwe kucisiko cini camusamu wa-olifa,
utalitembauli kumitabi eyo. Nolitembaula, uleelede kwiibaluka kuti teensi nduwe onyampula cisiko pe, cisiko ncecikunyampula webo.
Ulaamba kuti, Mitabi yakagonkwa, kuti nkasimpikilwe mebe.
Mbukubede. Kutasyoma kwayo nkuyakagonkelwa, alimwi webo, kulusyomo lwako nkoimvwi. Nekubaboobo utalisumpuli pe, ulitole ansi buyo.
Nkaambo Leza mbwaatakafwida mitabi ini-ini insoni, takooyookufwida insoni awebo.
Amubone luzyalo lwa-Leza, alimwi abwalo buyumu bwakwe. Kulibaabo bawide muyumu, anukuti kulinduwe ngusiluzyalo, nkukwaamba kuti nokakatila kuluzyalo lwakwe, pele watacita obo, ayebo ulagonkwa.
Abalo, kuti batakakatili kukutasyoma kwabo, balasimpikilwa. Leza ulakonzya kubweedela kubasimpikila.
Ikuti webo, niwakagonkwa kumusamu uulimezya wamusokwe akusimpikilwa mumusamu mubotu cakutalimezya sa tiikooyooinda­ eyi mitabi iniini kusimpikilwa mumusamu wayo ini.
nkabela elyo bazoofutuka ba-Israyeli boonse. Mbubonya mbukulembedwe kuti,
Kuzwa ku-Zioni kuzooza muvuni,
Nguwe uyootanda kasampusampu kakuli-Jakobo.
Ciindi ncinti gwisye zibi zyabo.
Ku-Makani Mabotu mbobasinkondonyina Leza, nkaambo kandinywe, pele kubusale mbayandiki nkaambo kabawisaabo.
Nkaambo zyaabilo zya-Leza abwiite bwakwe zyoonse tazilekeki pe.
Nywebo kalekale mwakali basicinguni kuli-Leza, pele sunu mulijene lweetelelo nkaambo kacinguni cabaabo.
Mbubonya obo sunu balo mbasicinguni, pele kukweetelelwa kwandinywe nkubazooetelelwa abalo.
Nkaambo Leza ulijalide bantu boonse mucinguni, kuti abeetelele boonse.
Na nguni wakaba mukanzenyina?
Ikuti kulinguwe nkuzizwida zintu zyoonse, alimwi mulinguwe muziponena, alimwi kulinguwe nkuzyeelela. Walo abe abulemu kube akutamani. Ameni!
Alimwi mutakozyanizigwi aziyanza zyaciindi ecino, pele amusanduke kukucitululwa kwamyoyo yanu, kuti mukasimpikile makani ngaayanda Leza, makani mabotu aatambulika aalondokede.
Nkaambo mbuli mbutujisi zizo zinji mumubili omwe, alimwi zizo zyoonse tazijisi mulimo omwe,
mbubonya obo swebo, notuli banji, tuli mubili omwe muli-Kristo, toonse tuli zizonyina umwi aumwi mukwesu.
Tulijisi zyaabilo zyamisyobo misyobo mbuli luzyalo ndutwapegwa. Lino oyo uujisi bulunguluzi alungulule mbuli mweelwe walusyomo lwakwe.
Ayooyo uukutaukila abike moyo kukutaukila kwakwe, alakwe mwiiyi kukwiisya kwakwe,
alakwe sikukombelezya kukukombelezya kwakwe. Oyu uupa ape cabuuya, alakwe musololi abe abusungu, ayooyo uuetelela abe alumwemwe.
Amuyandane aluyandisyo lwabunyina. Amusungwaale kukulemekana.
Mutabi batolo kubusungu, pele myoyo yanu ipye kukumanina Mwami milimo.
Amube abulangizi cakukondwa, alimwi amukakatile nikuba kuciindi camapenzi, akujatisya kukomba.
Amwaabile basalali bacete, alimwi amusamausye beenzu.
Amubalongezye abo bamupenzya, ee, amubalongezye, mutatuki pe,
Amusekelezyanye abo basekelela, akulilana abo balila.
Amukalane amoyo womwe. Mutabi amiyeeyo yakulisumpula, pele amube beenzinyina babombede myoyo. Mutaliyeeyi nubeni kuti tuli basongo.
Mutabeenzyi bubi bamweenzya bubi. Amulabilile ziimbo zibotu mumeso aabantu boonse,
Anooli kwakonzeka, nkukuti mbuli mbumukonzya nubeni, amukalane abantu boonse caluumuno.
Mutaliyi inkoto, nubayandisi, pele amulekele bukali bwa-Leza busena, nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti, Lubeteko ndulwangu, mebo njoobweedezya, mbwaamba Jehova.
Nkaambo kaako, anooli sinkondonyoko wafwa inzala, umusanine; afwa nyota, umunywisye; ikuti kukucita boobo ulalundika makala aamulilo amutwe wakwe.
Utazundwi kububi pe, uzunde bubi kukucita bubotu.
Nkaambo kaako oyo uulwisya bwami ulakazya cintu cibikwa kwa-Leza, nkabela basikukazya balalijanina kubetekwa.
Nkaambo beendelezi, teensi abo bacita bubotu mbibayoosya, pele abo bacita bubi, Kuti koyanda kutaba abuyoofu bwabwami, mbubo, cita bubotu, elyo ulatembaulilwa nciconya,
nkaambo mweendelezi ngumulanda wa-Leza wakukucitila cibotu, Anukuti wacita bubi, yoowa, nkaambo teensi cabuyo ncasaminide ipanga, nkaambo ngumulanda wa-Leza, mubetesi wakukoma abo bacitaula bubi.
Nkaambo kaako kuleelede kulibombya, teensi nkaambo kabukali bulike, pele nkaambo kamanjezeezya aalo.
Nciconya eco ncimutelela mutelo, nkaambo mbibasimilimo ba-Leza, bajatisya mulimo oyo nguwenya,
Nkaambo kaako amupe bantu boonse mbubeelede, Oyo uueledwe mutelo, amumupe mutelo; oyo uueledwe bulumbu, amumupe bulumbu; oyo uuelede kuyoowegwa, amumuyoowe; ayooyo uuelede kulemekwa, amumulemeke.

Nkaambo majwi aamba kuti, Utaciti bumambi, Utajayi, Utabbi, Utabi abbivwe, amilazyo imwi iili boobo, mitwi yamakani aya oonse ilaambwa mujwi lyomwe lyakuti, Yanda mweenzinyoko mbubonya mboliyanda omwini.
Luyandisyo talucitili mweenzinyoko cibi. Mbuboobo luyandisyo mbululondola Mulao.
Masiku aumbuluka, bwaamba kuca, Nkaambo kaako atusowe incito zyamudima, tutomene zyakulwisya zyamumuni,
Atweende muciyanza ceelede, mbuli kuciindi casikati. Tuteendi anjalalando ankolwi, abuvuule azisusi zibi, abulwani abbivwe.
Pele amulisamike ziyanza zya-Mwami Jesu Kristo, alimwi mutayeeyi kucita zisusi zyanyama.
Umwi muntu ulijisi lusyomo lwakulya zintu zyoonse, anukuti mweenzinyina uukompeme ulalya micelo luzutu.
Oyo uulya atasampauli mweenzinyina uutalyi, alakwe oyo uutalyi atabeteki uulya, nkaambo Leza ulimusamauzizye.
Ino nduweni webo nobeteka similimo wamuntu umbi? Makani aamwami wakwe mwini naaima nanka kuwa. Nkabela ulaima ncobeni, nkaambo Mwami ulakonzya kumwiimikizya.
Alimwi umwi muntu ulayeeya buzuba bumwi kwiinda buzubanyina, anukuti mweenzinyina ulayeeya kuti mazuba oonse alyeelene. Mbubo, muntu woonse alamwe mumiyeeyo yamoyo wakwe mwini.
Oyo uuyeeya obo buzuba, nkaambo ka-Mwami nkabuyeeyela. Ayooyo uulya, nkaambo ka-Mwami nkaalida, ikuti ulalumba Leza. Alakwe oyo uutalyi, nkaambo ka-Mwami nkaatalidi, ikuti ulalumba Leza alakwe.
Nkaambo taakwe muntu naba omwe akati kesu uuliponena mwini nikuba kulifwida mwini.
Nkaambo twapona, ngu-Mwami ngutuponena, alimwi twafwa, ngu-Mwami ngutufwida, Aboobo, nitupona nitufwa tuli bakwe Mwami.
Nkaambo nciconya Kristo ncaakafwida akubuka akupononona, kuti akabe Mwami waboonse, abaumi abafu,
Pele webo ubetekelanzi munyoko? alimwi webo usampaulilanzi munyoko? nkaambo toonse tuleelede kwiima kubetekelo lya-Leza.
Nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti,
Mbwendi muumi (mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova),
Ncobeni mazwi oonse alandifugamina,
Amilaka yoonse ilalumba Leza.
Nkaambo kaako tutabetekani limbi, pele amulibetekele aya, aakuti mutabiki cifumpuzyo niciba cilebyo munzila yamunyoko.
Ndiyeeyede cakutadooneka mu-Mwami Jesu kuti taakwe cintu niciba cimwi icibijide cini, pele muntu uuciyeeya kuti ncibi, kuliyooyo ncibi ncobeni.
Munyoko aku usa insoni nkaambo kazilyo nzolya, toceendi caluyandano pe. Utamunyonyooni nkaambo kazilyo zyako oyo ngwakafwida Kristo.
Eco cintu cibotu ncimujisi citatukilwi,
Nkaambo Bwami bwa-Leza teensi makani aakulya akunywa pe, ngabululami aluumuno alutangalo lwamuMuuya Uusalala,
Oyo uumanina Kristo milimo muziyanza ezi ulakonda Leza, alimwi ulatambulika kumeso aabantu.
Nkaambo kaako atutobele zintu zileta luumuno azintu zyakuyakana.
Utaakumwaya milimo yaLeza nkaambo kazilyo. Ncobeni zintu zyoonse zilasalala zini, nekubaboobo ncibi kuliyooyo uulya cakulebya.
Ncintu cibotu kuliimya kulya nyama, nikuba kunywa imbote, nikuba kucintu cimwi cili buti cikonzya kufumpuzya munyoko nikuba kumulebya nikuba kumukompamya.
Lusyomo ndojisi, ube alo omwini kumeso aa-Leza. Uli acoolwe oyo uutalibeteki aceeci ncalizuminina.
Pele oyo uudooneeka ciindi ncalya ulalibeteka, nkaambo kakuti taceensi calusyomo ncalya, nkabela cintu coonse citali calusyomo ncibi.
Lino swebo tubayumu tuleelede kuyumuna matenda aabaabo batali bayumu, tatweelede kulikondezya tubeni pe.
Umwi aumwi akati kesu akondezye mweenzinyina kukumucitila cibotu cakuyakana.
Nkaambo Kristo alakwe teewakalikondezya mwini, pele mbuli mbukulembedwe kuti, Insyolauko zyabaabo bakasyolauka nduwe zyakandiwida mebo.
Nkaambo makani aali boobo aakalembwa kalekale, nkukwiiya kwesu nkwaakalembelwa, kuti kubukakatilo akubukombelezyo bwamalembe tujane bulangizi bwaku-tontozya moyo,
Lino Leza wabukakatilo abukombelezyo amupe bujatano bwacinkaminwe mbuli Kristo Jesu,
kuti camoyo omwe acamulomo omwe mulemeke Leza wisi Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo,
Nkaambo kaako amusamausyanye, mbubonya mbuli Kristo mbwatusamausya kubulemu bwa-Leza,
Ndaamba kuti Kristo wakaba mulanda wabasibupalule nkaambo kalusinizyo lwa-Leza, kuti azuzye insyomezyo Ine nzibakapegwa bamataata,
akuti bamasi balemeke Leza nkaambo kalweetelelo lwakwe, mbuli mbukulembedwe kuti,
Nkaambo kaako nzookutembaula akati kabamasi,
Nzooimbila izina lyako.
Alimwi kuti,
Amutembaule Jehova numasi oonse,
Amumutembaulisye, numisyobo yoonse.
Kuzooba muntenga wa-Jese,
Nguzoobukila kuba abwami bwabamasi,
Nguwe ngubazoosyoma bamasi.
Lino Leza wabulangizi amuzuzye bukondwi boonse aluumuno mukusyoma kwanu, kuti mwiinde kuba abulangizi kunguzu zya-Muuya Uusalala.
Lino ime ndalamwa aandinywe, nubakwesu, kuti inywe nubeni mulizwide bubotu, mulilondokede muluzibo loonse, akukonzya kwiisyanya.
Nekubaboobo ndalitakata kumulembela, nubakweesu kumwi kuti nkamwiibalusye, nkaambo kaluzyalo ndundapegwa kwa-Leza,
lwakuti nkabe similimo wa-Jesu Kristo wabamasi, mupaizi wa-Makani Mabotu aa-Leza, kuti kutuulwa kwabamasi kutambulike, mbukusalazigwa kwaMuuya Uusalala.
Lino ndijisi cintu cakulikankaizizya muli-Kristo Jesu kumakani aangu kumeso aa-Leza.
Nkaambo nsikonzyi kulitakata kwaamba makani manji pele ayo alike Kristo ngaacitya ndime akuswiilizya bamasi, nikuba kumajwi aangu nikuba kuncito zyangu,
kunguzu zyazitondezyo azyamalele, kunguzu zya-Muuya Uusalala. Ikuti kuzwa ku-Jerusalemu kucisi coonse ceengelede nikuba kusikila ku-Iliriko ndimanine nyika yoonse kukambauka Makani Mabotu aa-Kristo,
Pele ndipangide moyo kukukambauka Makani Mabotu nkwatazibidwe izina lya-Kristo, kuti ntakayaki antalisyo yamuntu umbi,
pele mbuli mbukulembedwe,
Abo batalwiididwe impuwo yakwe, balo bazoobona,
Abaabo batamvwide, balo bazooswiililisya.
pele sunu nsicijisi milimo okuno kucisi, nkabela mbuli mbunjandide loko kuza kulindinywe myaaka minji,
kufumbwa ciindi nconzooya ku-Spanya, nzooinda kulindinywe. Ndasyoma kuti ciindi ncinzooinda nzoomubona, akusindikilwa andinywe munzila yangu, nenoozookede anywe kaindi kaniini,
Nkaambo bakazumina bana-Makedoniya abana-Akaya kupa imwi milumbo yakugwasya basalali bacete baku-Jerusalemu.
Bakazumina kucita obo, pele ncobeni balijisi mulandu abatengwana kulimbabo. Nkaambo bamasi, mbuli mbubakatambula caabilo cazintu zyamuuya zyabaabo, baleelede kubapa caabilo cazintu zyabo zyanyama.
Lino ndamana milimo eyi, akusinizya kuti eyi milumbo ili mumaanza aabo, nzooinda kulindinywe kukuya ku-Spanya.
Nkabela ndizi kuti ciindi ncinti sike kulindinywe, nzooza acoolwe cizwide ca-Kristo,
kuti nkavunwe kulibasicinguni baku-Judaya akuti milimo yangu yaku-Jerusalemu ikatambulike kubasalali,
Elyo kuti kayanda Leza ndakonzya kuza kulindinywe cakukondwa, akulyokezya antoomwe andinywe,
Leza waluumuno abe anywe nyoonse, Ameni.
Ndamunaanizizya mucizi wesu Febe. Ngusimilimo wambungano yaku-Kenekreya,
Amumusamausye mu-Mwami mbuli mbubeelede kusamausyanya basalali, alimwi amumugwasye mumakani oonse aali buti ngaabula kulindinywe, nkaambo alakwe mwini kali mugwasyi wandime awabantu banji.
Aba bakatulila buumi bwangu insingo zyabo beni. Nkabela teensi ndime endike ndabalumba, pele imbungano zyoonse zyabamasi,
Alimwi amujuzye imbungano iibungana muŋanda yabo, Amujuzye Epeneto muyandwi wangu, nguwe kabalwebalwe ka-Asiya kwa-Kristo.
Amujuzye Maliya, oyo iwakamubelekela loko cabusungu.
Amujuzye Androniko a-Juniya basiluzuboma abaangema, Aba bali ampuwo akati kabaapostolo, alimwi bakataangunina ndime muli-Kristo,
Amujuzye Ampliato muyandwi wangu wamu-Mwami.
Amujuzye Urbano similimoma wamuli-Kristo, alakwe Staku muyandwi wangu.
Amujuzye Apele muna-Kristo musunke. Amujuzye baciinga bakwe Aristobulo.
Amujuzye Herodiona siluzuboma, Amubajuzye baciinga bakwe Narkiso bali mu-Mwami.
Amujuzye Trufena a-Trufosa basimilimo basungu ba-Mwami. Amujuzye Persida muyandwi, oyo iwakabeleka loko cabusungu mu-Mwami.
Amujuzye Rufo musali wamu-Mwami, abanyina, mbabonya bama ambebo.
Amujuzye ba-Asunikrito, a-Felego, a-Herme, a-Patroba, a-Herma abakwesu mbubali abo.
Amujuzye Filologo a-Julia, a-Nerea amucizi wakwe, a-Olumpa aboonse basalali mbobakala abo.
Amujuzyanye alumyonto lusalala. Imbungano zyoonse zya-Kristo zilamujuzya.
Nkaambo bantu bali boobu tababelekeli Kristo Mwami wesu milimo, pe, balabelekela ida buyo lyabo beni, alimwi kumajwi aabo mabombe aamanya milomo baleena buyo myoyo yabantu babotu.
Pele nywebo, buswiilizi bwanu buliide impuwo kubantu boonse. Nciceeco ncindamukondelwa. Lino ndayanda kuti mube basongo kumakani aabubotu, pele mube bafubafuba kumakani aabubi.
Lino kaba kaindi buyo, Leza siluumuno ulamulyataulila Saatani kunsi lyamaulu aanu.
Luzyalo lwa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo lube anywe, Ameni.
Ndamujuzya mu-Mwami mebo Tertio, ndime ndalemba olu lugwalo.
Ulamujuzya Gayo, nguwe simeenzu wangu asimeenzu wambungano yoonse. Ulamujuzya Erasto muyoboli wamunzi, alakwe Kwarto mukwesu.
pele sunu ayubununwa, alimwi kumalembe aabasinsimi (kumulazyo wa-Leza uuteeli) azibigwa kulibamasi boonse, kuti babe akuswiilila lusyomo,
kuli-Leza musongo alike akube bulemu bwamuli-Jesu Kristo lyoonse alyoonse. Ameni.
Ndime Paulo, nendakaitwa kubukanze bwa-Leza kuba apostolo wa-Jesu Kristo, tuli a-Sositene mukwesu.

Ndamujuzya nywebo nombungano ya-Leza iili mu-Korinto nomusalazidwe muli-Kristo Jesu nobasalali baite, antoomwe abaabo boonse bali mumasena oonse balemeka izina lya-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo, nguwenya Mwami waboonse buyo balo aswebo.
Akube anywe luzyalo aluumuno kuzwa kwa-Leza Taateesu aku-Mwami Jesu Kristo.
Lyoonse ndalumba Leza wangu aandinywe, nkaambo kaluzyalo lwaLeza ndumwapegwa muli-Kristo Jesu,
Ikuti mulinguwe mwavubizigwa kumakani oonse, naaba makani aabwaambe naaba makani aaluzibo.
Mbubonya obo mbulwasimpizigwa lusillizyo lwamakani aa-Kristo aakakambaukwa akati kanu.
Nkaambo kaako taakwe caabilo ncimukonzya kubula ciindi ncimucilindila kuyubununwa kwa-Mwamr wesu Jesu Kristo.
Nguwenya uuyoomusimpizya mane kusikila kumamanino, kuti mutabikilwi kaambo mubuzuba bwa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo.
Wasyomeka Leza, oyo iwakamwiitila muciinga ca-Mwanaakwe Jesu Kristo Mwami wesu.
Nkaambo kwandisikila impuwo yandinywe, nubakwesu, iizwa kubantu ba-Kloe, yakuti kuli inkazyanyo akati kanu.
Nkukwaamba kuti, umwi ulaamba kuti, Ime ndi wa-Paulo, aumwi uti, Ime ndi wa-Apolo, aumwi uti, Ime ndi wa-Kefa, aumwi uti, Ime ndi wa-Kristo,
Ma! Sa Kristo ulyaabawidwe? Sa Paulo nguwakamubambulwa aciingano? Sa kuzina lya-Paulo nkumwakabapatizizigwa?
Ndalumba Leza kuti taakwe naba omwe akati kanu ngundakabapatizya pele Kristo a-Gayo.
Lino taakwe muntu uukonzya kwaamba kuti kuzina lyangu ndemwini nkundakabapatizizya,
Alimwi, ndakabapatizyabana ba-Stefana, pele nsikonzyi kwiibaluka umbi ngundakabapatizya,
Nkaambo teensi kubapatizya nkwaakanditumina Kristo pe, pele kukambauka Makani Mabotu, Alimwi teensi majwi aabusongo-songo nginjeelede kukambauka, pe, kuti ciingano ca-Kristo citasampuki.
Nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti,
Nzoonyonyoona busongo bwabasongo,
Aalo maanu aabasimaanu nzooalobya.
Nkaambo mbuli busongo bwa-Leza mbubwakacitya kuti bantu batakakonzyi kuziba Leza kubusongo bwabo beni, elyo Leza wakakosola kufutuzya basilusyomo bufubafuba bwalukambauko.
Nkaambo ba-Juda balayandaula citondezyo, abalo ba-Helene balalangaula busongo,
pele iswe tulakambauka Kristo iwakabambulwa aciingano. Kuliba-Juda ncilebyo, kuliba-Helene mbufubafuba buyo,
anukuti kulibaabo baitidwe, nibaba ba-Juda nibaba ba-Helene, ninguzu zya-Leza, alimwi mbusongo bwa-Leza.
Ikuti nibuba bufubafuba bwa-Leza bulainda bantu kubusongo, abwalo bukompami bwa-Leza bulainda bantu kunguzu.
Pe, Leza ulisalide zintu zifubafuba zyanyika kuti ausye insoni basongo, azyalo zintu zikompeme zyanyika Leza ulizisalide kuti ausye insoni basinguzu.
Alimwi zintu zyuubausidwe zyanyika azintu zisampaulidwe Leza ulizisalide, azyalo zintu zitawo, kuti alobye zintu ziliwo,
kuti kutabi muntu naba omwe uukonzya kulisumpula kumeso aa-Leza.
Nkaambo kanguwe nkimwaba muli-Kristo Jesu. Nguwenya wakatubeda busongo buzwa kwa-­Leza, alimwi bululami abusalazigwi abununu,
kuti kukabe mbuli mbukulembedwe, kuti, Oyo uulikankaizya alikankaizizye Jehova.
Nkaambo ndakakanza kutaziba cintu niciba comwe akati kanu pele Jesu Kristo luzutu, nkukuti Jesu Kristo iwakabambulwa aciingano.
Ndakeza kulindinywe cakukompama acakuyoowa acakuzyangama loko.
Nkabela makani aangu ngendakakambauka kaatali amajwi aabusongo akusakamika matwi pe, pele alwiimiko lwa-Muuya alwanguzu,
kuti lusyomo lwanu kalutabi mubusongo bwabantu anukuti munguzu zya-Leza.
Busongo mbutwaamba mbusongo busisidwe bwa-Leza, nkukuti obo busongo buvumbidwe mbwaakakanza Leza kalekale kuti butubede bulemu.
Bwalo taakwe naaba omwe akati kabeendelezi baciindi ecino iwakabuzi, nkaambo nibakali kubuzi nibatakamubambula aciingano Mwami wabulemu.
Pele mbuli mbukulembedwe kuti,
Ayo ngaatabwene meso,
Ayaayo ngatamvwide matwi,
Ayaayo aatana kunjila mumoyo wamuntu,
Ngaonya Leza ngaabambilide abo bamuyanda.
Nkaambo taakwe muntu naba omwe uuzi miyeeyo yamuntu pele muuya wamuntu uuli mucamba cakwe, nkabela mbubonya obo taakwe uuzi miyeeyo ya-Leza pele Muuya wa-Leza,
Pele iswe, muuya ngututambwide teensi muuya waansi ano pe, ngu-Muuya uuzwa kuli-Leza, kuti tumvwisye zintu nzitwapegwa caluzyalo lwa-Leza,
Nzizyonya nzitwaamba, nkabela tatuzyaambi amajwi aaiyide aabusongo bwamuntu, pe, tuliyide a-Muuya Uusalala, alimwi makani aa-Muuya tulaapandulula ca-Muuya,
Pele muntunsi tatambuli makani aa-Muuya wa-Leza, pe, nkaambo kumeso aakwe mbufubafuba buyo. Takonzyi kwaaziba pe, nkaambo ncamuuya ncaatwelukwa.
Anukuti muntu simuuya ulatweluka makani oonse, pele walo mwini tatwelukwi kumuntu naba umwi.
Nkaambo nguni uubwene miyeeyo ya-Jehova, abe mutoloki wakwe? Pele swebo tulijisi miyeeyo ya-Kristo.
Cintu ncindakamusanizya mukupa, teensi cilye pe, nkaambo teemwakacikonzya, nkabela asunu tamucikonzyi,
ikuti mucili basinyama. Mbuli mbumujisi ibbivwe abulwani akati kanu, sa tamucili basinyama na? Sa tamuceendi mbuli bantu buyo na?
Nkaambo umwi ulaamba kuti, Mebo ndiwa-Paulo, Aumwi ulati, Mebo ndiwa-Apolo. Lino sa tamucili basinyama na?
Mebo ndakazikila, Apolo nguwakatililila, pele Leza nguwakamenya,
Mbubo, sikuzikila taakwe makani, alakwe sikutililila taakwe makani, pele Leza uumenya nguujisi makani.
Oyo uuzikila ayooyo uutililila, boonse baleelene, nekubaboobo balavola umwi aumwi bulumbu bwakwe mwini mbuli mulimo wakwe ngwaakamana.
Kuluzyalo lwa-Leza ndundakapegwa, mbuli muyaki musongo ndakabamba intalisyo yaŋanda, lino uuyaka alinjiyo ngumbi. Pele umwi aumwi acenjele mbwayaka.
Nkaambo taakwe muntu uukonzya kubamba intalisyo imbi pele njiyonya iibambidwe kale, nguwenya Jesu Kristo.
Lino alinjiyo muntu ulakonzya kuyasya ingolida niiba insiliva naaba mabwe mayandisi naaba masamu nibuba bwizu naaba matete,
pele milimo yaumwi aumwi iyoobonwa mbwiibede. Buzuba bwalubeta mbobuyooitondezya mbwiibede, nkaambo obo buzuba buyooca amulilo, nkabela mulilo uyoosunka milimo yaumwi aumwi mbwiibede,
Muntu umwi aumwi uuyokokelwa milimo yakwe njayaka alinjiyo uyootambula bulumbu.
Pele muntu umwi aumwi uutentelwa milimo yakwe uyoosweekelwa bulumbu bwakwe, nekubaboobo walo mwini uyoofutulwa cakukwempwa kumulilo.
Lino akuli muntu uunyonyoona intempele ya-Leza, oyo muntu Leza ulamunyonyoona alakwe, nkaambo intempele yaLeza ilasalala, ndilyonya ndendinywe.
Nkaambo busongo bwaansi ano mbufubafuba buyo kumeso aa-Leza. Kulilembedwe kuti, Nguujata basongo mubuyungi bwabo.
Alimwi kulilembedwe kuti, Jehova ulizi iŋomboombo zyabasongo kuti nzyabuyo.
Nkaambo kaako kutabi muntu uulikankaizizya bantu baansi. Nkaambo zintu zyoonse nzizyanu,
naba Paulo, naba Apolo, naba Kefa, niiba nyika, nibuba buumi, niluba lufu, niciba ciindi casunu niciba ciindi cicizazyoonse buyo nzizyanu,
nkabela inywe muli ba-Kristo, alakwe Kristo nguwa-Leza.
Lino kumakani aababanzi, cintu ciyandwa nceeci, kuti muntu asyomeke.
Pele kulindime makani maniini buyo kulingulwa kulindinywe nikuba kulubeta lwabantu, Ncobeni nsililinguli ndemwini.
Nkaambo nsiliboni kaambo, nekubaboobo teensi boobo mbundulamikidwe pe. Mwami nguundilingula.

Nkaambo kaako, mutabeteki cintu niciba cimwi, ciindi nicitana kusika, mane do asike Mwami. Walo uleza kuzoomunika zintu zisisidwe zyamumudima akuyubununa makanze aamyoyo, elyo umwi aumwi uzoojana lutembaulo kuliLeza.
Nkaambo nguni uukunomona? Alimwi sa kuli cintu ncojisi ncotapedwe? Nkabela kuti wakapegwa, lino nkaambonzi ulalisumpula mbuli citali kupegwa buyo?
Ma! mwakuta kale sa? mwaba bavubi kale sa? mwajana bwami nubeni katutako swebo sa? nimwajana bwami ncobeni, aswebo nitwaba baaminyokwe.
Nkaambo ndayeeya kuti Leza ulitubikide basyaalizi, swebo tubaapostolo, mbuli abo bati fwe. Twaba ceebelo kumeso aabalengwi boonse, nibaba baangelo nibaba bantu.
Swebo tuli bafubafuba nkaambo ka-Kristo, anukuti nywebo muli basongo muli-Kristo, Swebo tuli bakompami, nywebo muli basinguzu. Nywebo muli abulemu, swebo tuli basampausi,
Nikuba kusikila kuciindi ecino tulafwa nzala, tulafwa nyota, tulapenga zyakusama, tuladinkaulwa, tuli basimutuntuli buyo,
alimwi tulacita milimo miyumu amaanza esu tubeni, Ciindi ncitwaambilwa­ cisapi tulalumba, aciindi ncitupenzegwa tulaumuna buyo,
nkabela ciindi ncitutukilwa tulakombelezya. Lyoonse buyo twacitwa mbuli bukololo bwanyika yoonse ambuli itombe lyazintu zyoonse.
Teensi kumuusya bweeme nkundembela makani aya pe, pele ndamulaya buyo mbuli bana bangu bayandika.
Nimwaakuli abasimalelo bali zyuulu zyuulu muli-Kristo, bauso banu tabali banji pe, nkaambo ndime ndamuzyazya Makani Mabotu muli-Kristo Jesu.
Nkaambo kako ndamukombelezya kuti mwiiye ndime.
Nciconya eco ncindamutumina Timoteo, mwanaangu muyandisi musyomesi wamu-Mwami. Oyo uzoomwiibalusya ziimbo zyangu zyamuli-Kristo nzindaiisya koonse koonse kumbungano zyoonse,
Bamwi balisumpula cakuyeeya kuti takoozoosika kulindiswe pe.
Nekubaboobo nzoofwambaana kusika, kuti Mwami wayanda obo, elyo abo bantu balisumpwide, teensi kwaamba kwabo nkunti zibe pe, pele inguzu zyabo.
Nkaambo Bwami bwa-Leza tabuli bwakwaamba buyo pe, mbwanguzu,
Lino ncicili ncimuyanda? Sa nze kulindinywe amulusu na caluyando acakubombya moyo?
Pele inywe mulalisumpula na? Anukuti mwaleelede kulila, kuti oyo simalweza atandwe akati kanu.
Nkaambo mebo nentali anywe kumubili, moyo wangu waliko, nkabela aboobo ndamubeteka kale oyo iwakacita obo.
Ndabeteka kale muzina lya-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo, nkaambo moyo wangu waliswaangene antoomwe andinywe anguzu zya-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo,
kuti oyo simalweza uleelede kwaabwa mumaanza aa-Saatani, kuti nyama inyonyoonwe, amuuya wakwe ufutuke mubuzuba bwa-Mwami Jesu.
Kulisumpula kwanu takuli kubotu pe. Sa tamuzi kuti tumena tuniini tulafufumusya mulwi woonse?
Amwiibule bumena bukulukulu, kuti mube mulwi mupya. Ncobeni inywe tamujisi bumena, nkaambo cipaizyo cesu caPasika cajayigwa kale, ngu-Kristo,
Lino atusekelele ipobwe, pele kusekelela kwesu kutabi abumena bukulukulu abumena bwalubijilo abubi pe, kube amikamu iitakwe bumena yabwinibwini alusinizyo.

Pele teensi kwaamba kuti mutavwelani abasibwaamu boonse baansi ano, nibaba basikulikumbuzya nibaba basilunyanzyo nibaba basikukomba mituni, nkaambo kuti kwaba boobo, ncobeni nimweelede kulongelela kuzwa ansi ano,

Ngindemba lino ngaaya. Kuti kuli muntu naba umwi uuambwa kuti sibunyina bwa-Kristo, pele uli sibwaamu na sikulikumbuzya na sikukomba mituni na simatusi na mukolwi na silunyanzyo, mutavwelani ayooyo pe nikuba kulya awe,
Nkaambo teensi makani aangu kubeteka baanze pe, Makani aanu kubeteka abo bali mukati na?
anukuti baanze Leza nguubabeteka. Lino amumutande oyo mubi kuzwa kulindinywe.
Na akuli umwi akati kanu uujisi kaambo kumweenzinyina, sa ulalimba moyo kubetekwa kulubeta lwabataluleme, akutatola makani kumbungano yabasalali?
Sa tamuzi kuti basalali bazoobeteka insi yoonse? Lino kuti ndinywe muzoobeteka insi, sa tamukonzyi kubeteka makani maniini?
Sa tamuzi kuti tuzoobeteka baangelo? Lino ncobeni tulakonzya kubeteka makani aansi ano,
Nekubaboobo, ciindi ncimujisi makani aansi ano akubetekwa, mulaatola kulubeta lwabantu batakwe makani kumeso aambungano yaba-Kristo.
Nkukumuusya bweeme nkundaambila obo. Mbukubede na? Taakwe muntu musongo naba omwe akati kanu uukonzya kubeteka makani akati kababunyina bakwe na?
Pele babunyina balasesana umwi mweenzinyina nikuba kulubeta lwabaabo batali bazumini.
Anukuti ncobeni ncintu cibi kulindinywe kusesana umwi mweenzinyina naaba kaniini. Sa taciindi kubota kuti mubisizigwe buyo? Sa taciindi kubota kuti muondongwe buyo?
Anukuti inywe nubeni mulabisizya, mulaondonga nibaba babunyina banu.
Ma! Sa tamuzi kuti bataluleme tabakonzyi kuyoovuba Bwami bwaLeza? Mutalyeeni pe. Nibaba basibwaamu nibaba basikukomba mituni nibaba basimamambe nibaba batete kuzibi nibaba baalumi boona baaluminyina
nibaba babbi nibaba basikulikumbuzya nibaba bakolwi nibaba basimatusi nibaba basilunyanzyo tabakooyoovuba Bwami bwa-Leza.
Lino mbuboobo mbubakabede kale bamwi akati kandinywe, pele sunu mulisanzizidwe, mulisalazizidwe, mulilulamikidwe muzina lya-Mwami Jesu Kristo aku-Muuya wa-Leza wesu.
Zilyo nzyada, alyalo ida ndyazilyo, pele Leza uyoozilobya zyoonse zyobile. Lino mubili tuuli wabwaamu pe, ngwa-Mwami, alakwe Mwami ngwamubili.
Nkabela Leza, iwakabusya Mwami, uyootubusya aswebo kunguzu zyakwe.
Sa tamuzi kuti mibili yanu nzezizo zya-Kristo Lino sa ndakonzya kunyanzya zizo zya-Kristo, zibe zizo zyasibwaamu? Ne! Kutabi boobo.
Alimwi, sa tamuzi kuti oyo uujatana asibwaamu waba mubili omwe anguwe? Nkaambo kulaambwa kuti, Abo bobile balaba mubili omwe.
Pele oyo uujatana a-Mwami waba omwe anguwe ku-Muuya,
Amucije bwaamu, Zibi zyoonse nzyacita muntu zili anze amubili, pele sibwaamu ulabisizya mubili wakwe mwini,
Sa tamuzi kuti mibili yanu ntotukombelo twa-Muuya wa-Leza uumukalila mukati, ngumutambwide kuli-Leza? Tamulivubi nubeni pe,
nkaambo mwakaulwa muulo. Nkaambo kaako, amulemye Leza mumibili yanu.
Lino makani ngimwakandilembela ngaaya. Ncintu cibotu kumwaalumi kutaba alulalano amwanakazi niluba luniini.
Nekubaboobo nkaambo kamamambe, umwi aumwi abe amwanakazi wakwe mwini, alakwe mwanakuzi umwi aumwi abe amulumaakwe mwini.
Mulumi uleelede kupa mwanakazi wakwe zyeelede, alakwe mwanakazi ape mulumaakwe mbubonya.
Mwanakazi takonzyi kucita mbuli mbwayanda kumubili wakwe mwini, mulumi nguujisi bwami. Mbubonya obo alakwe mulumi takonzyi kucita mbuli mbwayanda kumubili wakwe, mwanakazi nguujisi bwami.
Mutaondonganyi, cita muzuminane kucita obo ziindi zimwi kuti mubike myoyo yanu kukukomba, elyo kusule muboole kuswanaana. Saatani atamutepauli kukutalyeendelela kwanu.
Pele aya makani ngindaamba niimiyeeyo yangu, teensi mulazyo pe.
Nkaambo ninjanda kuti bantu boonse babe mbuli ndime. Nekubaboobo umwi aumwi ulijisi caabilo cakwe mwini ncapegwa kwa-Leza, umwi boobu, umwi bumbi.
Pele abo batakwete, abalo bamukabafu, ndabaambila kuti ncibotu kulimbabo kuti bakale obo, mbuli ndime ndemwini,
Nekubaboobo kuti tabakonzyi kulyeendelela, bakwate, nkaambo kukwata nkubotu kwiinda kufwa luunyaunya.
Kuti ulimulekede kale, uleelede kukala katakwetwe, nanka kuyanzana amulumaakwe. Alakwe mwaalumi teelede kuleka mukaakwe.
Pele bantu bamwi ndabaambila boobo. (Majwi aya ngaangu ndemwini, teensi aa-Mwami). Akuli umwi sibunyina uujisi mukaakwe uutali muzumini, lino moyo wakwe wanooyanda kukala kulinguwe, atamuleki.
Alimwi, akuli umwi mwanakazi uujisi mulumaakwe uutali muzumini, lino moyo wakwe wanooyanda kukala kulinguwe atamuleki,
Nkaambo mulumi uutali muzumini ulasalazigwa kumukaakwe, alakwe mukazi uutali muzumini ulasalazigwa kumulumaakwe. Kwatakuli boobo bana banu nibatasalali, anukuti lino balasalala.
Pele kuti sikutazumina ulayanda kulekana, mbubo, balekane, Kwakuli boobo, sibunyina naba mwaalumi naba mwanakazi taangidwe kulukwato, Nduumuno ndwaakatwiitila Leza.
Nkaambo webo, mwanakazi, sa tozi kuti inga ulafutula mulumaako? Ayebo, mwaalumi, sa tozi kuti inga ulafutula mukaako?
Sa kufumbwa muntu wakali mupalule ciindi ncakaitwa? Atabweedezyi lulomo lwakwe, Sa kufumbwa muntu wakali silulomo ciindi ncaakaitwa? Atapalulwi,
Bupalule tabukwe makani, alwalo lulomo talukwe makani. Kulomya milazyo ya-Leza nkokujisi makani,
Kufumbwa muntu akale mbubonya mbwaakabede ciindi ncaakaitwa.
Na koli muzike nowakaitwa, taakwe makani, Pele kuti kokonzya kuba mulubusi, konaba boobo,
Nkaambo oyo iwakali muzike kuciindi ncaakaitwa mu-Mwami ngumulubusi wa-Mwami. Mbubonya obo alakwe iwakali mulubusi kuciindi ncaakaitwa ngumuzike wa-Kristo.
Mwaakaulwa muulo. Nkaambo kaako mutabi bazike babantu.
Umwi aumwi, bakwesu, uleelede kukala kubusyu bwa-Leza mbubonya mbwaakabede kuciindi ncaakaitwa.
Lino nginjeeya ngaaya. Ncibotu nkaambo kamapenzi aasunu kuti muntu akale mbubonya mbwabede.
Sa ulaangidwe kumwanakazi? Aakuli boobo, utakanzi kwaangununwa. Sa ulaangulukide? Aakuli boobo, utakanzi kukwata.
Pele kuti kokwete, tobisizye. Alakwe musimbi kuti kakwetwe, tabisizye. Nekubaboobo abo bakwatana bayoojana mapenzi aakunyama, nkabela mebo ndayanda kumuyokola.
Ncindaamba nceeci, bakwesu. Ciindi ncifwiifwi. Kuzwa sunu abo bakwete banakazi babe mbuli batakwete.
Abaabo balila babe mbuli batalili, abaabo basekelela mbuli batasekeleli, abalo basimakwebo mbuli batakwe buvubi.
Abaabo babelesya zintu zyaansi batapangiki moyo kukubelesya nzizyo. Nkaambo ziyanza zyaansi ano zili mukwiindilila,
Ndayanda kuti mutabi amapakasyo, Oyo uutakwete ulalipakasizya kumakani aa-Mwami, kuti abotezye Mwami,
Anukuti eyo uukwete ulalipakasizya kumakani aansi, kuti abotezye mukaakwe,

Awalo mwanakazi uukwetwe amusimbi uutakwetwe balaandene mbubonya. Oyo uutakwetwe ulalipakasizya kumakani aa-Mwami, kuti asalale nikuba kumubili nikuba kumoyo. Anukuti oyo uukwetwe ulalipakasizya kumakani aansi ltuti abotezye mulumaakwe.
Ayaaya ndaamba kuti mugwasigwe ngao. Nsiyandi kumujasya kakole pe, ndayanda buyo kuti kube ziyanza zilemu, alimwi kuti mupangike moyo kumakani aa-Mwami cakutalipakasizya.
Nekubaboobo, aakuli mwaalumi uuyeeya kuti tacitili musimbi wakwe kabotu, aakuli wakubuka kale, alimwi kuleelede kuba boobo-mbubo, acite mbwayanda. Tabisizye pe, bakwatane.
Pele mwaalumi aajatisyanka mumoyo wakwe, kuti tasinikizigwa kucita ncaatayanda, pele uli anguzu mwini, akanza mumoyo wakwe kuti musimbi wakwe kakede mbwabede, mwaalumi oyo ulacita kabotu.
Lino oyo uukwata ulacita kabotu, pele oyo uutakwati ulacita kabotu cakwiinda.
Nekubaboobo cilainda kubota kuti wakala mbuli mbwabede. Mbuboobu mbunjeeya mebo, nkabela ndasyoma kuti ambebo ndijisi Muuya wa-Leza.
Muntu anooyeeya kuti ndezi makani, oyo muntu tana kuziba cintu niciba comwe mbweelede,
Pele muntu aakuyanda Leza, oyu muntu ulazibwa nguwe.
Mbubo, atubone mbwaabede aya makani aazilyo zipaizigwa mituni, Tulizi kuti taakwe mutuni naba omwe munyika yoonse, alimwi kuti taakwe Leza pele omwe buyo.
Nkaambo nikuba kuti nkubali baambwa baleza, nikuba kujulu naaba ansi, ee, mbanji-banji baleza abami,

nekubaboobo kulindiswe kuli Leza omwe buyo, Taateesu, nguzyazwida zintu zyoonse, ngutuponena aswebo, Alimwi kuli Mwami omwe Jesu Kristo, nguzyakalengesegwa zintu zyoonse, aswebo twakalengesegwa mulinguwe.

Pele teensi boonse bajisi luzibo olu. Bamwi, mbubakazibila mituni kusikila sunu, bacilya zilyo ezyo cakuyeeya kuti ncakusinizya nzizyakapaizigwa mituni, nkabela manjezeezya aabo, mbwaakompeme, alasofwaazigwa.
Pele teensi zilyo zitusisya kwa-Leza, Na tatulyi tatusweekelwi cintu, na twalya tatugwasigwi cintu.
Nekubaboobo amucenjele kuti obu bwami bwanu butabi cifumpuzyo kubakompeme.
Nkaambo kuti muntu akubona, webo ojisi luzibo, ulikede mukulya muŋanda yamituni, sa manjezeezya aakwe taakooyooyumizigwa kukulya zipaizigwa mituni?
Aboobo, kuluzibo lwako ulanyonyausigwa oyo sibunyina uukompeme ngwaakafwida Kristo.
Lino ciindi ncimubisizya boobo babunyina, akuuma-uma manjezeezya aabo aakompeme, muli mukubisizya Kristo.
Nkaambo kaako, kuti zilyo zilalebya mukwesu, nsikooyoolya limbi eyo nyama lyoonse, kuti entakalebyi mukwesu.
Ambweni kulibamwi nsili apostolo, pele kulindinywe ndi apostolo ncobeni, nkaambo cibonesyo cabuapostolo bwangu camu-Mwami ndinywe.
Lino majwi ngindivwiila abo bandilingula ngaaya,
Sa tatujisi ceelelo cakulya akunywa na?
Sa tatujisi ceelelo cakweenda amukazi sibunyina, mbuli mbubacita baapostolo bamwi, abakwabo Mwami, a-Kefa,
Mebo a­-Bamaba, sa ndiswe tobile luzutu nitutajisi ceelelo cakupona cakutabeleka?
Sa kuli silumamba naba omwe uuligwasya bulilu bwakwe mwini? Sa kuli muntu uuzikila muunda wamasaansa, nekubaboobo talyi micelo yawo? Sa kuli mweembeli uutanywi mukupa wabutanga mbwaembela?
Sa aya majwi ngindaamba ngamuntu buyo? Sa Mulao awalo tuuambi mbubonya?
Nkaambo kulilembedwe mu-Mulao wa-Musa kuti, Utamwaangi kumulomo musune uulyataula maila, Lino sa Leza ulayeeya ŋombe buyo?
Na sa nkaambo kandiswe ncaambila boobo? Ncobeni kulilembedwe nkaambo kandiswe, nkaambo sikulima uleelede kulima cabulangizi, alakwe sikusokola maila uleelede kuba abulangizi obo mbubonya,
Swebo mbutwamubyalila zintu zyamuuya, sa takweelede kuti tutebule kulindinywe zintu zyamubili?

Kuti bantu bamwi bakaabilwa ceelelo eci, sa swebo tatweelede kubainda kwaabilwa nciconya? Nekubaboobo teetwakabelesya eco ceelelo, nkaambo kakuti tulakolela mapenzi oonse kuti tutaciti lucelezyo ku-Makani Mabotu aa-Kristo.
Sa tamuzi kuti abo bacita milimo yantempele balalya zilyo zyakuntempele, abalo bakutauka kucipaililo balaabilwa nyama yazipaizyo?
Mbubonya obo, Leza wakalailila kuti abo bakambauka Makani Mabotu baleelede kuponena Makani Mabotu.
Nkaambo teensi kukambauka Makani Mabotu nkundikankaizizya pe, Nkaambo milimo eyo nsikonzyi kwiikaka. Maawe kulindime nintakambauka Makani Mabotu.
Na ndakambauka ndemwini camoyo, ndijisi bulumbu, Pele kuti eyi milimo njakusinikizigwa, ndi mubanzi buyo uucita mbaasyomenwa.
Lino mbulumbunzi mbunjisi? Mbubwakuti nkakambauke Makani Mabotu cakutavola mali, akutabelesya zintu ezyo nzinjelede mumilimo ya-Makani Mabotu,
Nindi mulubusi kubantu boonse, ndalicita muzike wabo boonse, kuti nkavube banji mbuli mbunkonzya.
Kuba-Juda ndibede mbuli mu-Juda, kuti nkavube ba-Juda, Kulibaabo bali kunsi ku-Mulao ndibede mbubabede, nintali kunsi ku-Mulao ndemwini, kuti nkabavube abo bali kunsi ku-Mulao.
Kulibaabo bali anze ku-Mulao ndibede mbubabede (nintali anze ku-Mulao wa-Leza, ndi kunsi ku-Mulao wa-Kristo), kuti nkabavube abo bali anze ku-Mulao.
Kulibakompeme ndibede mbuli mukompesi ndemwini, kuti nkabavube bakompeme. Kubantu boonse bali buti ndibede mbubabede balo, kuti nkasinizye kufutula bamwi.
Nkabela zyoonse nzincita, nkaambo ka-Makani Mabotu nkinzicitila, kuti nkabe mwaabilanwa abo mulingao.
Lino umwi aumwi uulwa muzisobano ulalikasya muziyanza zyoonse. Pele balo balacita obo kuti batambule musini uununsauka, anukuti swebo musini ngututi tambule tuununsauki pe.
Nkaambo kaako mebo ndazuza boobo, nsizuzi cakulengaana pe. Ndadinka mbubonya, nsiumi muuwo buyo pe.
Ndaumisya loko mubili wangu, ube muzike wangu, kutabi kuti, ndamana kukambaukila bamwi, ime ndemwini ndaba musowe.
Boonse bakabapatizizigwa Musa mukumbi amulwizi.
Boonse bakalya cilyo comwe camuuya.
Boonse bakanywa cakunywida comwe camuuya, nkaambo bakali kunywa kumwala oyo wamuuya wakabasindikila. Mwala oyo kali Kristo.
Nekubaboobo banji akati kabo, Leza teewakabakondelwa pe, bakagwisigwa munkanda.
Mutabi basikukomba mituni mbuli bamwi akati kabaabo, mbuli mbukulembedwe kuti, Bantu bakakala kuti balye akunywa, elyo bakabukila kusobana,
Alimwi tutaciti bwaamu mbubakacita balo, lino kwakawa mubuzuba bomwe bantu bali zyuulu zili makumi obile azitatu akati kabo.
Alimwi tutasunki Jehova mbubakamusunka bamwi babaabo, elyo bakalumwa kubazoka.
Alimwi mutatongauki mbuli mbubakatongauka bamwi babaabo, bakanyonyoonwa kuli-Sikunyonyoona.
Aya makani oonse akaba kulimbabo mbuli incenjezyo, akalembwa kuti acenjezye ndiswe nitusikilwa kumamanino aaciindi.
Nkaambo kaako oyo uuyeeya kuti ndiimvwi kabotu acenjele kuti atawi.

Taakwe lutepauzyo lumusikila cita mbuli matepauzyo ngibajana bantu lyoonse, alimwi Leza wasyomeka, ikuti takoozoozumina kuti mutepaulwe kwiinda inguzu zyanu, pele antoomwe alutepauzyo ulacita cipolelo, kuti mukabe alukolelo.
Ndaambila mbuli basongo. Amukosole nubeni makani ngindaamba.
Sa kanywido kakulumba nkotulumba takeensi kaluswanaano lwabulowa bwa-Kristo Awalo mukamu nguutukomona sa taweensi waluswanaano lwamubili waKristo?
Nkaambo tuli mukamu omwe, tuli mubili omwe, nituli banjibanji, ikuti toonse tulaabilwa kumukamu omwe.
Amulange ziyanza zyaba-Israyeli. Sa abo balya nyama iipaizigwa tabeensi basiluswaano bakucipaililo?
Lino nkutyeni ncindaamba? Sa zintu zipaizizigwa mituni zilijisi makani, nanka mituni ini sa ilijisi makani?
Pe, ngindaamba ngaaya, Zintu ezyo nzibapaizya bahedeni, nkubadaimona nkubazipaizizya, takweensi kuli-Leza pe, Pele nsiyandi kuti mube basiluswaano babadaimona,
Tamukonzyi kunywida cinywido ca-Mwami antoomwe acinywido cabadaimona. Alimwi, tamukonzyi kwaabilwa kuntafule ya-Mwami akuntafule yabadaimona abalo.
We! Sa tulamufwisya ibbivwe Mwami? Sa tuli anguzu kwiinda nguwe?
Muntu teelede kuyandaula kuligwasya mwini buyo. Umwi aumwi uleelede kuyandaula kugwasya mweenzinyina.
Zilyo zyoonse zyuulwa mumakwebo aacisambalilo amuzilye, mutadooneki nkaambo kamanjezeezya aanu pe.
Nkaambo nyika yoonse nia-Jehova, azintu zyoonse zilimo.
Pele kuti umwi wamwaambila kuti, Eyi nyama njacipaizyo camituni, elyo mutalyi pe, nkaambo kayooyo wamulwiida akaambo kamanjezeezya.
Pele manjezeezya, teensi kwaamba kuti ngaako omwini pe, nkukuti manjezeezya aayooyo mweenzinyoko. Ikuti bulubusi bwangu bubetekelwenzi kumanjezeezya aamuntu umbi?
Mebo nindalya cakulumba, ino nkaambonzi nintongaukilwa kulya zilyo ezyo nzindumbide?
Mutabiki zilebyo munzila yabantu, nibaba ba-Juda nibaba bamasi niiba imbungano ya-Leza.
Mbubonya obo ambebo ndabosezya bantu boonse muziyanza zyoonse. Nsiyandauli kuligwasya ndemwini buyo pe, ndayandaula kugwasya beenzuma banji, kuti bafutuke.
Ndamulumbaizya nkaambo kakuti lyoonse mulandiibaluka, alimwi mbuli mbundakamusiila tunsiyansiya, mulajatisya ntuto.
Mwaalumi umwi aumwi uukomba nanka kusinsima ulivumbide kumutwe ulaubausya mutwe wakwe.
Anukuti mwanakazi uukomba nanka kusinsima atanoovumbidwe kumutwe ulaubausya mutwe wakwe, nkaambo ncintu comwe akubaanga waumpulwa.
Kuti mwanakazi wakaka kuvumbwa kumutwe, elyo agelwe. Pele kuti cilatondwa kumwanakazi kugelwa nanka kuumpulwa, mbubo, avumbwe.
Ikuti mwaalumi teewakazwa kumwanakuzi pe, mwanakazi wakazwa kumwaalumi,
nkabela mwaalumi teewakalengwa nkaambo kamwanakazi, mwanakazi nguwakalengwa nkaambo kamwaalumi,
Nkaambo kaako mwanakazi uleelede kuba acitondezyo cakulibombya kumutwe wakwe nkaambo kabaangelo.
Ncobeni mu-Mwami mwanakazi taponi cita antoomwe amwaalumi, alakwe mwaalumi taponi cita antoomwe amwanakazi.
Nkaambo mbuli mwanakazi mbwaakazwa kumwaalumi, alakwe mwaalumi ulazwa kumwanakazi, azyalo zilengwa zyoense zilazwa kwa-Leza,
Lino amubeteke nubeni aya makani, Sa ncibotu kuti mwanakazi akombele Leza atanoovumbidwe kumutwe?
Sa moyo wini tuuiisyi kuti mwaalumi anoojisi masusu malamfu, nkusampuka kwakwe.
Pele mwanakazi anoojisi­ masusu malamfu, mbulemu bwakwe, nkaambo masusu aakwe waapegwa kuti cibe civumbyo.
Kuti kuli muntu uuyanda kukazya aya, ndaamba kuti tatujisi ciyanza cimbi, swebo niziba imbungano zya-Leza.
Lino kumakani aya nginti mulailile nsikonzyi kumulumbaizya pe, nkaambo kubungana kwanu takweensi kwakubosya pe, kulabisya buyo.
Kukusaanguna ndamvwa kuti ciindi ncimuyoboloka mumbungano muli mipampo mipampo akati kanu, nkabela ndayeeya buniini kuti mbukubede.
Kuleelede kuti kube inkamu zyansininsini akati kanu, kuti basunke banu baboneke mbubabede,
Lino ciindi ncimubungana antoomwe, taceensi cakulya Mulalilo wa-Mwami pe,
nkaambo mukulya kwanu umwi ulatyompokezya mweenzinyina kukulya mulalilo wakwe mwini, nkabela umwi ulafwa inzala anukuti umwi ulakolwa,
Ma! sa tamujisi maanda aakulida akunywida mumo? Sa mulayanda kusampaula imbungano ya-Leza akuusya bweeme bacete? Nkamwaambile buti? Sa ndakonzya kumulumbaizya kumakani aya? Nsikonzyi pe.
elyo naakamana kulumba, wakuukomona, wakati, Oyu ngumubili wangu ngumukomwedwa; kamucita obo kuti cibe ciibalusyo candime.
Mbubonya obo, mulalilo umane buyo, wakabweza cinywido, wati, Eci cinywido ngumulongo mupya uuli mubulowa bwangu, kamucita obo, ciindi kufumbwa ncimunywa, kuti cibe ciibalusyo candime.
Ikuti ciindi coonse kufumbwa ncimulya mukamu oyu akunywa cinywido eci munooyootondezya lufu lwa-Mwami mane do akasike,
Nkaambo kaako, umwi aumwi uulya mukamu oyu, nikuba kunywa mucinywido eci, cakutaelela, ulijisi mulandu kumubili akubulowa bwa-Mwami.
Pele muntu asaangune kulilingula, elyo nati lye mukamu akunywida mucinywido.
Nkaambo oyo uulya akunywa, na tatweluki Mubili wa-Mwami, ulalya akunywa cakulibeteka.
Nkikaako nkibalengaukila banji akati kanu, abamwi baciswa, nkabela bamwi bafwa.
Nitwali kulibeteka tubeni, nitwatali kubetekwa.
Pele lino tuli mukubetekwa, tuli mukutambisigwa ku-Mwami, kuti tutapegwi mulandu antoomwe abahedeni.
Mbubo, bakwesu, ciindi ncimubungana kukulya, amulindane,
nkabela na kuli umwi muntu uufwa inzala, alye muŋanda yakwe, kuti kubungana kwanu kutabi cakumuletela mulandu. Makani amwi ndamulailila, ndasika.
Lino kumakani aazipego zya-Muuya, nubakwesu, nsiyandi kuti mutabi aluzibo.
Mulizi kuti, ciindi ncimwakacili bahedeni kufumbwa nkumwakeenzegwa, ziyanza zyanu zyakali kumweenzya lyoonse kumituni iitaambi.
Lino ndamuzibya kuti taakwe muntu uuamba muMuuya wa-Leza uukonzya kwaamba kuti Jesu mutuke, alimwi taakwe uukonzya kwaamba kuti Jesu Mwami cita mu-Muuya Uusalala.
Ayalo milimo njeyamisyobo misyobo, pele Mwami ngoumwi luzutu.
Inguzu zibeleka mumyoyo nzezyamisyobo misyobo, pele Leza ngoumwi luzutu uuzibelesya zyoonse mubantu boonse.
Umwi aumwi ulapegwa bulaizi bwa-Muuya kukugwasya banamaleya,
Nkaambo umwi ulapegwa kuMuuya ijwi lyabusongo, nkabela umwi ulapegwa ijwi lyaluzibo ku-Muuya oyo nguwenya.
Alimwi umwi, oyo Muuya ulamupa lusyomo, aumwi ulapegwa ku-Muuya nguwenya inguzu zyakuponya.
Umwi ulijisi inguzu zyakucitya malele, umwi businsimi, umwi busongo bwakuzibya myuuya, umwi myaambo yamisyobo misyobo, aumwi busongo bwakupandulula myaambo.
Pele aya oonse, ulaacita oyo Muuya omwe, ulaabila umwi aumwi mbuli mbwayanda.
Nkaambo mu-Muuya omwe motwakabapatizigwa toonse, nibaba ba-Juda nibaba ba-Helene, nibaba bazike nibaba balubusi, kuti kube mubili omwe, nkabela toonse twakanjilwa Muuya omwe.
Awalo mubili teensi cizo comwe pele nzinji.
Na cino caamba kuti, Mbwintali ijanza, nsili wamubili, lino sa tacili camubili ncobeni?
Akwalo kutwi, na kwaamba kuti, Mbwintali liso, nsili wamubili, lino sa takuli kwamubili ncobeni?
Mubili woonse waakuli liso, ino kuswiilila nikwakaswiililika buti? Mubili woonse waakuli kutwi, ino kununkuzya nikwakanunkuzika buti?
Anukuti Leza wakabika zizo zyoonse mumubili, cimwi acimwi, mbuli mbwaakayanda.
Zyoonse nizyaakuli cizo comwe buyo, ino niwaakuli buti mubili?
Anukuti zizo nzinji, nekubaboobo mubili ngoumwi buyo.
Lino liso talikonzyi kwaambila ijanza kuti, Nsikuyandi. Awalo mutwe tokonzyi kwaambila maulu kuti, Nsimuyandi.
Pele ncobeni ezyo zizo zyamubili nzituyeeya kuti zilikompeme, azyalo zilayandika.
Azyalo zizo ezyo zyamubili nzituyeeya kuti tazilemekeki, nzizyonya nzituinda kusamika cabulemu. Aboobo zizo zyesu ziteebeka zilainda kupegwa bulemu,
anukuti zizo zyesu zyeebeka zilibujisi kale. Leza nguwakalunganya mubili, nkabela zizo ezyo zitakwe bulemu, nzizyonya nzyaakalemeka cakwiinda,
kuti kutabi mipampo kumubili pele kuti zizo zyoonse zigwasyanye.
Lino kuti caciswa cizo cimwi, zilaciswa zizonyina zyoonse azyalo. Alimwi kuti cizo cimwi calemekwa, zizonyina zyoonse zilakondwa aco.

Bantu bataanzi mbabikide Leza mumbungano yakwe mbaapostolo, alwabili bamwi mbasinsimi, alwatatu bamwi mbaiyi, alimwi bamwi mbasimalele, abamwi mbasilisi, abamwi mbagwasyi, abamwi mbeendelezi, abamwi mbasikwadmba myaambo myaambo.
Sa boonse mbaapostolo? Sa boonse mbasinsimi? Sa boonse mbaiyi? Sa boonse balacita malele?
Sa boonse balijisi busongo bwakusilika? Sa boonse balaamba myaambo? Sa boonse balakonzya kupandulula?
Lino amukasukamine zipo ziinda kugwasya. Pele ndayanda kumutondezya inzila imbotu kwiinda zyoonse.
Nikuba kuti ndaamba myaambo yabantu niiba yabaangelo, nekubaboobo nsijisi luyandisyo mumoyo wangu, elyo ndaba mbuli mulangu uulila buyo nanka cizyano cicokola-cokola.
Alimwi kuti nindalijisi businsimi akuziba makani oonse aasisidwe aluzibo loonse, nindalijisi lusyomo lunji lwakuzyula malundu, nekubaboobo nsijisi luyandisyo, nsili muntu pe.
Nindaabaula imbono zyangu zyoonse, nikuba kwaaba mubili wangu kukutentwa, nekubaboobo nsijisi luyandisyo, tacindigwasyi pe.
Luyandisyo lulakazika moyo akufwa luzyalo, Luyandisyo talukwe ibbivwe, talulikankaizyi, talulisumpuli,
talukwe cisapi, talulilangilili cintu, talufwambi kujata bukali, taluyeeyi inkoto yabubi.
Talukondelwi zitaluleme pe, lulakondelwa lusinizyo.
Lulakolela makani oonse akuba alusyomo lyoonse, lulijisi bulangilizi lyoonse akuba acamba kumapenzi oonse.
Luyandisyo talweeli. Pele masinsimi alaloba, ayalo myaambo ilamana, alwalo luzibo lulaloba.
Nkaambo luzibo ndutujisi nduce-luce, akusinsima kwesu akwalo nkuce-kuce.
Pele aakusika malondosi elyo aya makani mace-mace alaloba.
Nindakacili mucece, ndakali kwaamba macece akuyeeya macece akubuzyanya macece, pele sunu mbuli mbundaba mwaalumi, ndisowede macece.

Nkaambo makani ngetubona sunu ali mbuli zintu zyamuciboniboni, ali mbuli kalabi, pele kuciindi ciboola tuzoobonana meso kumeso. Luzibo ndunjisi sunu nduce-luce buyo, pele kuciindi eco nzoozibisya mbubonya mbundazibwa.
Lino sunu alabedelela aya otatwe, lusyomo abulangizi aluyandisyo, pele akati kayaaya dpati nduyandisyo.
Nkaambo sikwaamba myaambo, teensi bantu mbaambila pe, ulaambila Leza luzutu, nkaambo taakwe muntu uumvwa, ulaamba makani aasisidwe aa-Muuya.
Pele oyo uusinsima ulaambila bantu majwi aayaka aakusenengezya akusoozya,
Oyo uuamba myaambo ulaliyaka mwini buyo, pele oyo uusinsima ulayaka basimbunganonyina,

Lino ndayanda kuti nyoonse buyo mwaambye myaambo, pele cintu ncinjanda cakwiinda ncakuti musinsime. Nkaambo oyo uusinsima ulainda sikwaamba myaambo, cita apandulule, kuti babe abuyake abalo basimbungano.
Lino kuciindi ecino, nubakwesu, kuti ndeza kulindinywe kuza bwaamba myaambo, nkamugwasye buti, cita ndamwaambila ciyubunuzyo nanka luzibo nanka lusinsimo nanka lwiiyo?
Azyalo zintu zilila, mbuli nyeele nanka kantimbwa, kuti tazipambukanyi kabotu indilo zyazyo, ino kulazibwa buti kuti ncinzi eco cisibwa nanka cuumwa.
Mweembo wanoolila cakutamvwisigwa nguni uunga ulalibambila inkondo?
Mbukubede kulindinywe anywebo. Indimi zyanu zyatanooamba majwi aaswiililika, ino kulazibwa buti kuti makaninzi aambwa? Mulaba anga mwaambila muuwo buyo.
Mbubonya obo nkwiili myaambo yamisyobo misyobo ansi ano, nkabela taakwe uutaswiililiki,
pele kuti nsimvwisyi mwaambo mbuubede, elyo mumeso aasikwaamba ndaba mbuli ubwelebweza buyo, alakwe sikwaamba ulaba ubwelebweza buyo kulindime,
Lino anywebo, mbuli mbumusungwaala kunjilwa myuuya, amupangike myoyo yanu kuti mukainde kuya kana abasimbunganonyokwe.
Aboobo, oyo uuamba myaambo myaambo uleelede­ kukomba kuti apegwe bupanduluzi.
Nkaambo kuti ndakomba mumwaambo umbi, lino muuya wangu ulakomba ncobeni, pele miyeeyo yangu tiigwasigwi pe.
Lino nkutyeni? Nookomba kumuuya, pele nookomba kumiyeeyo yangu ayalo. Nooimba kumuuya, pele nooimba kumiyeeyo yangu ayalo.
Kwataba boobo, kuti kolumba Leza kumuuya, ino oyo uutaiyide ulakonzya buti kuzuminina kulumba kwako kuti Ameni? Nkaambo tezi mboamba.
Webo ulalumba kabotu, nekubaboobo walo tayakwi.
Ndalumba Leza kuti ndamwiinda nyoonse kukwaamba myaambo,
pele mumbungano cilandibotela kuti nkaambe majwi naba osanwe amiyeeyo yangu, kuti nkaiisye beenzuma, kwiinda kwaamba majwi aali zyuulu zili ikumi mumwaambo umbi.
Kulilembedwe mubbuku lya-Mulao kuti, Bantu aba nzoobaambila amyaambo imbi amilomo imbi, nekubaboobo tabakoozoondiswiilila pe. Mbuboobo mbwaamba Jehova.
Aboobo, eyi myaambo imbi tiili citondezyo kulibaabo bazumina pe, pele kulibaabo batazumini. Anukuti businsimi tabweensi bwabaabo batazumini pe, mbubwabaabo bazumina,
Lino kuti imbungano yanu yoonse yabungana antoomwe, nkabela boonse buyo balaamba myaambo imbi, elyo kulanjila bamwi bataiyide nanka bamwi batazumini, sa tabakonzyi kwaamba kuti mwasondoka na?
Pele kuti boonse balasinsima, elyo kulanjila umwi uutaiyide nanka umwi uutazumini, ncobeni oyo muntu ulayaswa mumoyo kuliboonse, ulalingulwa kuliboonse.
Makani aasisidwe aamumoyo wakwe alaboneka, elyo ulawida kumeso aakwe akukomba Leza, ulazumina kuti ncobeni Leza mpali akati kanu.
Kwanooli baambya myaambo imbi, abo baamba babe bobile nanka kutainda batatu, alimwi baambe omwe omwe, nkabela akube umwi uupandulula,
Pele kuti taakwe sikupandulula, elyo sikwaamba myaambo uleelede kuumuna buyo mumbungano, alyaambile mwini mumoyo akwaambila Leza.
Abalo basinsimi baambe bobile na botatwe, nkabela bamwi babuzyanye makani aambwa.
Umwi uukede aakuyubunwidwa makani, elyo oyo uuli mukwaamba aumune.
Nkaambo mulakonzya kusinsima nyoonse omwe omwe, kuti boonse baiye akuyumizigwa mumoyo.
Myuuya yabasinsimi ilakonzya kweendelezegwa kubasinsimi beni,
ikuti Leza tali Leza walupilingano pe, ngwaluumuno. Mbukubede mumbungano zyoonse zyabasalali.
Kuti balayanda kwiiya makani, babuzye baalumi babo beni kuŋanda, nkaambo masampu kuti banakazi baamba mumbungano.
Ma! Sa kulindinywe nkukwakazwa Makani aa-Leza? Na sa kulindinywe kulike nkwaakasikila?
Kufumbwa muntu uukaka, alakwe mwini uyookakwa.
Mbubo, bakwesu, amukasukamine businsimi, nkabela kwaamba myaambo imbi akwalo mutakukasyi,
pele zintu zyoonse buyo zicitwe kabotu akucililana.
Lino bakwesu, ndamuzibya Makani Mabotu ngindakamukambaukila, ngaonya ngimwakatambula, nkabela muliimvwi mulingao,
alimwi ngaonya ngimufutusizidwe, na mwakakatila makani ngindakamukambaukila, nkutaamba kuti mwakasyoma cabuyo.
Nkaambo kukusaanguna ndakamutambika eco ncindakatambula ndemwini, nkukuti kuti Kristo wakafwa nkaambo kazibi zyesu, mbuli mbwaamba Malembe,
alimwi wakazikwa, akubuka kubuzuba bwatatu, mbuli mbwaamba Malembe.
Lino wakabonwa kwa-Kefa, lumwi wakabonwa akuli bali ikumi ababili.
Kusule wakabonwa kulibabunyina bainda myaanda yosanwe ciindi comwe, akati kababunyina abo banamaleya mpobacili asunu, pele bamwi balifwide.
Lino kusule wakabonwa kwa-Jakobo, elyo kulibaapostolo boonse,
nkabela kukusyaalila wakabonwa akulindime mbuli mwana uubelulwa.
Ikuti ime ndimuniini wabo baapostolo boonse, nseeledwe izina lyaapostolo, nkaambo ndakapenzya imbungano ya-Leza.

Pele luzyalo lwa-Leza ndulwakandicita mbumbede, alimwi luzyalo lwakwe lwakulindime teelwakaba lwabuyo pe, pele ndakabeleka milimo kwiinda boonse, nekubaboobo teensi ndime pe, nduzyalo lwa-Leza lundikalide.
Pele nimba ndime nibaba mbabo taakwe makani. Mbubonya mbutukambauka, nkabela inywe mwakazumina ngaonya.
Lino na kulakambaukwa kuti Kristo wakabuka kubafu, ino balaambilanzi bamwi akati kanu kuti taakwe bubuke bwabafu?
Kwatanooli bubuke bwabafu, alakwe Kristo tabukide.
Pele Kristo naatabukide, elyo lukambauko lwesu ndwabuyo, alwalo lusyomo lwanu ndwabuyo.
Alimwi, kwanooli boobo, kulajanwa kuti tuli bakamboni ba-Leza babeji, nkaambo twakalungulula kuti Leza wakabusya Kristo kubafu, anukuti takakamubusya pe, bafu nibatabuki.
Nkaambo bafu nibatabuki, alakwe Kristo tabukide,
pele anooli Kristo tabukide, elyo lusyomo lwanu ndwabuyo, mucili mukati kazibi zyanu.
Alimwi abo bafwide muli-Kristo balifwidilide,
Kuti mubuumi obuno luzutu mutupangikide moyo ali-Kristo, tulafwidika insoni kwiinda bantu boonse.
Nkaambo mbubonya mbuli lufu mbulwakabeda ijanza lyamuntu, ndijanza lyamuntu ndibwakabeda abwalo bubuke bwabafu,
Nkaambo mbuli mbubafwa boonse muli-Adamu, mbubonya obo mbubayooponezegwa boonse muli-Kristo,
pele umwi aumwi kuciindi cakwe ceelede, Kristo ngukabalwebalwe, elyo kusule bana ba-Kristo kuciindi cakuboola kwakwe.
Ndilyonya naayooba mamanino, nayootambika bwami kumaanza aa-Leza wisi, nayoolobesezya boonse beendelezi abami abasimutwe.
Nkaambo uleelede kweendelezya mane do nanooyoobikide basinkondonyina boonse kunsi lyamaulu aakwe.
Sinkondonyina musyaalizi uuyoolobesegwa ndufu.
Nkaambo zintu zyoonse Leza wazibombya kunsi amaulu aakwe, Pele na kwaambwa kuti zintu zyoonse zilibombesedwe, ncobeni nkokuti teensi kwaamba oyo iwakamubombesezya zintu zyoonse.
Lino naamana kumubombesezya zintu zyoonse, elyo alakwe Mwana mwini uzoolibombya kuliyooyo iwakamubombesezya zintu zyoonse, kuti Leza abe malondwedo aazintu zyoonse.
Alimwi nkutyeni abo babapatizigwa nkaambo kabafu? Kuti taakwe bubuke bwabafu, ino nkaambonzi bantu nibabapatizigwa nkaambo kabafu?
Aswebo tubeni tubeda anzi mubutambo ciindi coonse?
Mebo ndili mulufu mazuba oonse. Ndaamba cakusinizya mbubonya mbuli kutangala nkwenjisi nkaambo kandinywe muli-Jesu Kristo Mwami wesu.
Kuti nindakalwa ku-Efese mbuli bantu mbubalwa abanyama bakali, cilandigwasya buti? Kuti bafu tababuki, atulye akunywa buyo, nkaambo junza tulafwa.
Mutalyeeni. Mweenda abamineme, anywebo mulaminama.
Amusinsimuke cakululama, mutabi nimucita zibi, nkaambo bamwi banu tabajisi luzibo lwa-Leza. Ndaamba cakumuusya insoni.
Pele inga umwi muntu ulaamba kuti, Ino bafu balabuka buti? Baleza amibilinzi?
We, mufubafuba! Kufumbwa cintu ncobyala webo, tacikooyooba abuumi catasaanguna kufwa.
Alimwi, eco ncobyala taceensi ngomubili uuyooba pe, ninseke buyo yabulotwe nanka imwi iili boobo,
elyo Leza uliipa mubili mbuli mbwayanda, musyobo umwi aumwi wambuto ulaupa mubili wawo wini,
Nyama yoonse tiielene pe, Kuli nyama yabantu, kuli nyama yabanyama, kuli nyama yanswi, kuli nyama yabayuni.
Alimwi kuli mibili yakujulu amibili yaansi, pele bulemu bwayakujulu mbumbi, abulemu bwayaansi mbumbi.
Nkubuli bulemu bwazuba, abulemu bwamweezi, abulemu bwanyenyeezi, nkaambo inyenyeezi imwi ilipambukene kunyenyeezinyina kubulemu.
Mbubonya obo mbububede bubuke bwabafu, Cibyalwa cilafwika, cibuka tacifwiki.
Cibyalwa cilasampaulika, cibuka cilijisi bulemu. Cibyalwa cilikompeme, cibuka cilijisi inguzu.
Cibyalwa mubili wamuntunsi, cibuka mubili wamuuya. Mubili wamuntunsi ngumbi, amubili wamuuya ngumbi.
Mbuboobu mbukulembedwe kuti, Muntu mutaanzi Adamu wakaba muntunsi muumi, Adamu musyaalizi wakaba muuya uupa buumi.
Pele uusaanguna teensi wamuuya pe, wamuntunsi nguusaanguna, elyo musule wamuuya,
Muntu mutaanzi wazwa ansi, ngwabulongo, muntu wabili wazwa kujulu,
Mbuli oyu sibulongo mbwabede, mbubonya abalo basibulongo mbubabede. Alimwi, mbuli sikujulu mbwabede, mbubonya abalo basikujulu mbubabede.
Nkabela mbuli mbutwakajisi cinkozya casibulongo, tuyooba acinkozya casikujulu mbubonya.
Amubone, ndamwaambila makani aasisidwe. Ngaaya, Tatukooyoofwa toonse pe, pele toonse buyo tuyoosanduka,
Tuyoosanduka mukaindi kaniini loko, mbuli mululabo lomwe lwaliso, nuuyoolila mweembo musyaalizi. Nkaambo mweembo uyoolila, elyo bafu bayoobuka mbuli batafwiki, aswebo nituyoosanduka.
Nkaambo eci ciboleka cileelede kusamikwa butaboli, acalo eci cifwika cileelede kusamikwa butafwiki.
Lino ciboleka nicamana kusamikwa butaboli, acalo cifwika nicamana kusamikwa butafwiki, ndilyonya ndiliyooba eli ijwi lilembedwe lyakuti, Lufu lwamenenenwa kuluzundo.
We, lufu! luli kuli luzundo lwako? We, lufu! luli kuli lumoola lwako?
Lumoola lwalufu nzibi, alimwi inguzu zyalufu ngumulao.
Pele tulalumba Leza ikuti ulatupa luzundo kunguzu zya-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo.
Lyoonse abuzuba bwansondo umwi aumwi akati kanu aliyobwede cimwi cintu, mbuli mbwajana coolwe, kuti kutabi milimo yakubunganya zipo ciindi ncenti sike.
Ndasika buyo, abo mbomuti sale nzoobapa magwalo kuti bakatole milumbo yanu ku-Jerusalemu.
Nkabela na cileelede kuti nje ambebo, elyo tulaya abo.
Ambweni nzookala kulindinywe ciindi cilamfu-lamfu, cita kumamanino aamweto, kuti mundisindikizye kulweendo luli buti ndunti tole.
Nsiyandi kumubona kuciindi ecino cakwiindilila pe, nkaambo ndasyoma kuti nzookala anywe ciindi cilamfulamfu, na Mwami ulazumina.
Ndakala omuno mu-Efese kusikila kuciindi ca-Pentekoste,
nkaambo ndajalwidwa mulyango mupati wakucita milimo mibotu, alimwi nkubali banji bakazya.
Kutabi muntu naba omwe uumusampaula. Pele amumusindikizye caluumuno, kuti akasike kulindime, nkaambo ndamulangila antoomwe abakwesu,
alakwe mukwesu Apolo, ndakamukumbila loko kuti aze kukumuswaya antoomwe abakwesu bamwi, nekubaboobo takakayanda abuniini kuza kuciindi ecino, pele uleza ajana ciindi cibotu.
Zyoonse nzimucita zibe muluyando.
Ndayanda kuti mulibombye kubantu bali boobo, kuliboonse bagwasya mukupangika moyo kumilimo.
Ndakondwa kuti basika ba-Sitefana a-Fortunato a-Akayiko, nkaambo kakuti balo balya malo aanu kulindime.
Nkaambo balatontozya moyo wangu mbuli mbubatontozya yanu, Muleelede kulemeka bantu bali boobo.
Balamujuzya babunyina boonse, Amujuzyanye alumyonto lusalala.
Akuli muntu uutayandi Mwami, atajani coolwe kuli-Leza, Mwami wesu uleza.
Luzyalo lwa-Mwami Jesu Kristo lube anywebo.
Luyando lwangu alube anywebo nyoonse muli-Kristo Jesu, Ameni.
Amube aluzyalo aluumuno kuzwa kwa-Leza Taateesu aku-Mwami Jesu Kristo.
Nguwe uutuumbulizya mumapenzi esu oonse, kuti tukakonzye kuumbulizya boonse bapengede kuluumbulizyo olo ndulonya ndutuumbulizizigwa tubeni kuli-Leza,
Nkaambo mbuli maciswe­ aa-Kristo mbwaatuvulila, alwalo luumbulizyo lwesu lulavula muliKristo mbubonya,

Nkabela na tulipengede, nkikaambo kaluumbulizyo lwanu alufutuko lwanu, nanka tuliumbulizizidwe, nkikaambo kaluumbulizyo lwanu lumupa camba cakukakatila mukati kamapenzi ayo ngaonya ngitupengela aswebo.
Aboobo, lusyomo lwangu lwakulindinywe lulijisi, nkaambo ndizi kuti mbuli mbumwaabilana ambebo maciswe, tulaabilana luumbulizyo alwalo mbubonya.
Ncobeni mumyoyo yesu twakali kuyeeya kuti ncikosolo calufu. Pele akaba boobo, kuti tutalisyomi tubeni, tusyome Leza sikubusya bafu,
Walo wakatuvuna kulufu lupati luli boobo, alimwi ucituvuna sunu, nkabela lusyomo lwesu luli kulinguwe kuti uciyootuvuna.
Anywebo muleelede kutugwasya ankombyo zyanu, kuti bantu banji batulumbile Leza nkaambo kacaabilo caluzyalo ncitwakaabilwa nkaambo kabantu banji.
Nkaambo tatumulembeli makani ambi pe, pele ngaonya ngomubala, ngomuzuminina, nkabela ndasyoma kuti mulaazuminina nikuba kusikila kumamanino,
mbubonya mbumuzuminide ndiswe muziyanza zimwi kuti tuli cililumbaizyo canu (anywebo muli cililumbaizyo cesu), mubuzuba bwa-Mwami wesu Jesu.
Lino nkaambo kakusyoma obo, kukusaanguna ndakali kukanza kuza kuzoomuswaya kuti mujane zyoolwe zyobile.
Ndakakanza kwiinda kulindinywe ciindi cakuya ku-Makedoniya, alimwi akumuswaya ciindi cakuboola kuzwa ku-Makedoniya akusindikizigwa andinywe kulweendo lwangu lwakuya ku-Judaya,
Mbuboobo mbundakakanza. Lino sa ndi sitamutamu na? Alimwi makanze nginkanza, sa ndaakanza mbuli bantu buyo? Sa ndaamba kuti, Ee, ee, alimwi, Pe, pe?
Ncobeni mbuli Leza mbwasyomeka, majwi esu aakulindinywe teensi Ee, Pe.
Nkaambo Mwana a-Leza, Jesu Kristo, oyo ngutwakakambauka kulindinywe swebo a-Silvano a-Timoteo, walo kateensi Ee, Pe. Mulinguwe muli ijwi lya-Ee luzutu.
Nkaambo zisyomezyo zya-Leza zyoonse zili buti, ijwi lya-Ee lyakuzizuzya mulili mulinguwe. Aboobo, mulinguwe mulili alyalo eli ijwi lya-Ameni nditulemekezya Leza.
Nkabela oyo uutusimpikizya swebo antoomwe anywebo muli-Kristo akutunanika ngu-Leza,
alimwi nguwe uutupa Muuya mbuli cibonesyo acitondezyo mumyoyo yesu.
Takweensi kwaamba kuti tulaba abwami kulusyomo lwanu pe, pele tulagwasyanya anywebo kuti mube akukondwa, nkaambo muliimvwi nubeni mulusyomo.
Nkaambo na ndamufwisya buusu, lino nguni uunoondikondezya sa? Teensi oyo nguwenya ngundafwisya buusu?
Nkakonya nkindakamulembela, kuti kuciindi cakuza kwangu intafwisigwi buusu kulimbabo beelede kundikondezya, nkaambo ndakalilipamikizizye kuti kukondwa kwangu nkukukondwa kwanu anywebo nyoonse:
Ndakamulembela cakupenga loko acakuciswa mumoyo amisozi minji, nkabela oku teekwakeensi kwakumufwisya buusu, pe, kwakali kwakumuzibya luyando lupati ndunjisi kulindinywe.
Citapatizyo cabanamaleya banu cilazulila muntu oyo,
aboobo kuciindi ecino muleelede kulekelela muntu oyo caluzyalo akumuumbulizya, kuti ataindi kulemenwa abuusu bunji.
Ndamukumbila kuti mumuboozye muluyando lwanu.
Nkaambo cintu ncindakamulembela nceeci, kuti nkazibe ziyanza zyanu mbuzibede, na mulacita zyoonse nzimulaililwa.
Nkabela mwalekelela muntu cintu, ndamulekelela ambebo. Nkaambo mebo, na ndamulekelela cintu, nkaambo kandinywe nkindakamulekelela kumeso aa-Kristo,
kuti tutapubbulwi kuli-Saatani, nkaambo tatuli bafubafuba batezi makanze aakwe mbwaabede.
pele moyo wangu teewakakede kabotu nkaambo kakutajana Tito mukwesu, mpawo ndakabalaya, ndakainka ku-Makedoniya.
Pele Leza alumbwe! Ikuti lyoonse buyo ulatweenzya buzunda muli-Kristo, nkabela bweema bwakuzibwa kwakwe ulabumwaisya koonse koonse kumaanza esu.
Nkaambo kumeso aa-Leza tuli bweema bubotu bwa-Kristo akati kabantu boonse, nibaba abo bali mukufutuka nibaba abo bali mukusweeka.
Kulibaabo tuli bweema bwakujaya buleta lufu, pele kulibaaba tuli bweema bwakuponya buleta buumi. Ino nguni uuzulila milimo eyi sa?
Sa teensi ndiswe? Nkaambo tatuli mbuli banjibanji babisizya makani aa-Leza, pe, tuli bantu benibeni, tuli bantu ba-Leza, tulaamba cakusinizya makani aa-Kristo mbuli kumeso aa-Leza.
Ndinywe lugwalo lwesu, lulembedwe mumyoyo yesu, luzibidwe akubalwa kubantu boonse.

Cilabonwa kumeso aabantu boonse kuti muli lugwalo lwa-Kristo lwamumilimo yesu, teensi kwaamba kuti lugwalo lulembedwe enki pe, pele lugwalo lulembedwe a-Muuya wa-Leza muumi, alimwi talulembedwe azilembyo zyamabwe pele azilembyo zyamyoyo yabantu.
Mbuboobu mbulubede lusyomo ndutujisi nkaambo ka-Kristo kumeso aa-Leza.
Teensi kwaamba kuti swebo tulazulila kubeteka makani tubeni, pe, pele buzulizi bwesu buzwa kuli-Leza.
Nguwe watuzulizizya milimo yamulongo mupya. Oyu mulongo tuuli wamakani aalembedwe buyo, pe, ngwamuuya, nkaambo makani aalembedwe alajaya, anukuti muuya ulapa buumi,

Lino milimo yamakani aalufu aaengwiidwe amabwe, niyakaba abulemu yalo, nkabela bana ba-Israyeli teebakakonzya kudunamina busyu bwa-Musa nkaambo kabulemu bubekesi bwabusyu bwakwe, nekubaboobo obo bubekesi bwakali bwakweela buyo,
sa milimo ya-Muuya tiikooinda kuba abulemu na?
Nkaambo niyakaba abulemu milimo yakulimba bantu milandu, ncobeni milimo yakubalulamya ilainda loko kuba abulemu.
Lino eco icakajisi bulemu ciindi tacicijisi sunu, nkaambo kabulemu obu buinda.
Nkaambo nicakaba abulemu eco cakati indilile, elyo cilainda kuba abulemu eci cibedelela.
Lino mbuli mbutujisi bulangilizi buli boobu, tulaamba kaanzambwene loko,
Tatuli mbuli Musa iwakabika cilisitilizyo kubusyu bwakwe, kuti bana ba-Israyeli batadunamine eco cakati indilile.
Myoyo yabo yakaliyumide, nkaambo nikuba kusikila sunu eco cilisitilizyo nciconya mpocicili kuciindi ncibabala ibbuku lya-Mulongo wakalekale, Tabayubunwidwi kuti cakaloba muli-Kristo.
Pele kusikila sunu kufumbwa ciindi ncibabala ibbuku lya-Musa, cilisitilizyo cilikede kumyoyo yabo.
Anukuti kufumbwa ciindi ncibapilukila Mwami, cilisitilizyo cilagwisigwa,
Mwami ngu-Muuya, nkabela koonse nkwabede Muuya wa-Mwami kuli bulubusi.

Pele swebo toonse mbutuli amasyu mavumbulule, tuli mbuli ciboniboni, tulabonya bulemu bwa-Leza, aboobo tuli mukuya busanduka akuba mbubonya mbwabede mwini. Tuli mukuya butabukila mubulemu, nkaambo bulemu bwesu bulazwa ku-Mwami Muuya.

Tulisowede makani, aasisidwe aausya bweeme. Tatweendi cabupyungi pe, nikuba kubisizya lusinizyo lwamakani aa-Leza, anukuti tulaamba lusinizyo antangalala, aboobo tulalilubulula kumanjezeezya aabantu boonse kubusyu bwa-Leza.
Nkabela kuti Makani Mabotu ngitukambauka alivumbidwe, kumeso aabaabo bali mukusweeka nkwaavumbidwe,
nkaambo kulimbabo muzimu waansi ano waofwaazya meso aabaabo batazumina, kuti batapaswidwi mumuni wa-Makani Mabotu aabulemu bwa-Kristo, nguwe cinkozya caLeza.
Nkaambo teensi makani aandiswe tubeni ngitukambauka, pe, tulakambauka kuti Jesu ngu-Mwami, alimwi swebo tuli bazike banu nkaambo ka-Jesu.
Leza wakaamba kuti, Mumuni ulamunikila mudima, nkabela nguwenya Leza wakamunika mumyoyo yesu kukumunikila bantu akubazibya mbububede bulemu bwa-Leza buboneka mubusyu bwa-Kristo.
Lyoonse buyo tulilemedwe, nekubaboobo tatuna kumanikililwa. Tulizingidwe nekubaboobo tatuna kuzingisigwa.
Tulipenzedwe, nekubaboobo tatusiilidwe. Tuliwisizidwe ansi, nekubaboobo tatuna kulobelela.
Lyoonse buyo tulatolelezya mumibili yesu kujayigwa kwa-Jesu, kuti buumi bwa-Jesu abwalo buboneke mumibili yesu.
Nkaambo mazuba oonse nitucilanga tulaabwa kulufu nkaambo ka-Jesu, kuti buumi bwa-Jesu abwalo buboneke mumibili yesu iifwika.
Aboobo mulindiswe mulabeleka lufu, anukuti mulindinywe mulabeleka buumi.
Tulizi kuti oyo iwakabusya Mwami Jesu ulatubusya aswebo antoomwe a-Jesu, alimwi ulatusitikizya antoomwe anywebo kubusyu bwakwe.
Nkaambo makani oonse aba nkaambo kandinywe kuti mbuli mbuluvuzigwa luzyalo kubantu banji, kulumba akwalo kuvule mbubonya akuletela Leza bulemu.
Nkaambo mapenzi esu maubauba aakaindi kaniini alainda kutucitila bulemu bupati loko butamani,
ikuti meso esu taalabilili zintu zibonwa pele zintu zitabonwa, nkaambo zintu zibonwa nzyakaindi buyo anukuti zintu zitabonwa nzeziteeli.
Omuno mutubede tulalisinsimukila, nkaambo tulasukama kusamikwa abukalo bwesu buzwa kujulu,
kuti nitwalivumbya boobo tutakajanwi mbuli basicintanda.
Nkaambo swebo nitucili omuno mucilao cesu tulalisinsimukila cakulemenwa. Teensi kwaamba kuti tulayanda kusamununwa, pe, pele tulayanda kusamikwa ajulu, kuti cifwisi cimenenenwe kubuumi.
Nkabela oyo uutubambila cintu eco ngu-Leza, nguwenya uutupa Muuya mbuli citondezyo.
Nkaambo kaako tulasyoma lyoonse mumoyo, Tulizi kuti ciindi ncitucili mumubili tatuko ku-Mwami,
Nkaambo nkulusyomo nkutweenda, takweensi kukubona pe,
Aboobo moyo wesu tuupengede, pele tulayandisya kupola kumubili akukala kuMwami,
Nciceeco ncitupangika moyo kuti tumukonde lyoonse, nanka nitucili mumubili nanka nitutamo.
Nkaambo toonse buyo tuleelede kuboneka kubetekelo lya-Kristo, kuti tukatambule umwi aumwi cakuvola ceelede camilimo yesu njitucita mumibili yesu, niiba mibotu niiba mibi.
Tatuli mukuboola kulikankaizya kulindinywe, pe, tulamupa kaambo kakutulumbaizya, kuti muvwiizye abo balilumbaizya kumakani aaboneka kumeso buyo, aatali aamoyo,
Nkaambo na tulisondokede, nkikaambo kamakani aa-Leza, nanka tulyeenzene, nkikaambo kandinywe.
Nkaambo kuyanda Kristo nkokutusinikizya, ikuti tulabeteka obo, kuti omwe wakafwida boonse, aboobo boonse bakafwa.
Nkabela wakabafwida boonse kuti abo bapona bataciliponene beni pele baponene oyo iwakabafwida akubuka.
Nkaambo kaako, kuzwa sunu tatwaambi muntu naba omwe kuti muntu buyo, Nikuha kuti twakalizi Kristo mbuli muntu nekubaboobo sunu tatucimuzi boobo pe,
Aboobo kuti muntu waba muli-Kristo, waba mulenge mupya. Zintu zikulukulu zyamaninina, zyoonse zyaba zipya.
Aya makani oonse azwa kuli-Leza, nguwe uutuyanzanya kwakwe mwini muli-Kristo akubika mumaanza esu milimo yaluyanzano,
nkukuti milimo yakwaambila bantu Leza mbwaakalibonya muli-Kristo kuti aliyanzanisizye bantu boonse, nkabela mbwatabaelezezyi milandu yabo, alimwi mbwaabika mumaanza esu inkombe yaluyanzano.
Oyo iwatakazi zibi Leza wakamucitya kuti abe zibi nkaambo kandiswe, kuti swebo tube bululami bwa-Leza mulinguwe.
Nkaambo wati,
Kuciindi ceelede ndakakuswiilila,
Akubuzuba bwalufutuko ndakakugwasya.
Lino amubone, ciindi ceelede nkukuti sunu, abwalo buzuba bwalufutuko nkukuti sunu.
Swebo tatubiki imfumpu niiba yomwe munzila yamuntu, kuti milimo yesu itasampauki,
pele muzintu zyoonse tulatondezya kuti tuli basimilimo benibeni ba-Leza, mulukakatilo lupati, mumapenzi, mumakatazyo­, mumapatizi,
muzyuumwa, mumaange, mumapyopyongano, mumapakasyo, mukufubwa lonzi, mumazala,
mubusalazi, muluzibo, mukukazika moyo, mubuuya, mu-Muuya Uusalala, muluyandisyo lwinilwini,
mumajwi aalusinizyo, munguzu zya-Leza. Tulabelesya zintu zyakulwisya zyabululami kumaanza oonse obile niliba lyalulyo niliba lyalumwensi,
nikuba kuciindi cakulemekwa nikuba kuciindi cakuubaansigwa, nikuba kuciindi campuwo imbi nikuba kuciindi campuwo imbotu, Tulaambwa kuti mbabeji, anukuti tuli bantu benibeni,
Tulaambwa kuti batazibidwe, anukuti tulizibidwe kabotu. Tulaambwa mbuli bafu, anukuti tuli baumi. Tuliumidwe, nekubaboobo tatufwide.
Tuliuside, nekubaboobo tuli mukukondwa lyoonse, Tuli bacete nekubaboobo tulaletela bantu banji buvubi. Tuli basikasokomwena, nekubaboobo tulivubide zintu zyoonse.
Teensi kulindiswe nkumusyaankene pe, mulisyaankene mumyoyo yanu nubeni.
Lino ndamwaambila mbuli bana, Atupane maanza aasokwe. Anywebo amujule myoyo yanu.
Sa Kristo a-Beliyali balakonzya kuzuminana na? Muzumini ulijisi mwaabonzi antoomwe ayooyo uutazumini?
Intempele ya-Leza ilijisi makaninzi amituni? Nkaambo swebo tuli intempele ya-Leza muumi, mbuli mbwaamba Leza kuti,
Nzookala akuya bweendeenda akati kabo,
Nzooba Leza wabo, abalo bazooba bantu bangu.
nzoomubeda mbuli Usowanu, anywebo muzoondibeda bana bangu baalumi abanakazi. Mbuboobo mbwaamba Jehova Singuzuzyoonse.
Lino nubayandiki, mbuli mbutujisi zisyomezyo ezi, atulisonzole busofwaazi boonse nibuba bwamubili nibuba bwamoyo, atulondole busalazi bwesu cakuyoowa Leza.
Teensi kumupa mulandu nkundaambila obo, pe, nkaambo mbuli mbundaamba kale, muli mumyoyo yesu, tuli anywe lyoonse nimuba mukufwa nimuba mukupona.
Nkapati kaanzambwene nkenjisi kulindinywe, nkupati kulikankaizya kwangu nkwendikankaizizya ndinywe. Ndizwide luumbulizyo, moyo wangu wafwasuka busekelezi akati kamapenzi esu oonse.
Pele Leza sikuumbulizya abo bakatede mumyoyo yabo wakatuumbulizya swebo kukusika kwa-Tito.

Nkabela kakuteensi kusika kwakwe kulike kwakatuumbulizya, pele alwalo olo luumbulizyo ndwaakaumbulizigwa kulindinywe, nkaambo wakatulwiida mbumutusukamina akutulilila akutusungwaalila, aboobo mebo ndakabotelwa loko,

Lino sunu ndakondwa. Takweensi kwaamba kuti ndakondwa nkaambo mwakafwisigwa buusu, pe, pele ndakondwa nkaambo kakuti buusu bwanu bwakamuletela lweempo. Nkaambo mwakafwisigwa buusu buzwa kwa-Leza, aboobo teemwakabisizigwa cintu kulindiswe pe.
Nkaambo buusu buzwa kwa-Leza bulaleta lweempo akucita lufutuko lutalisekwi, anukuti buusu bwaansi bulaleta lufu.

Amubone mbubwamucitila obu buusu buzwa kwa-Leza mbumwakafwisigwa. Ncobeni bwamuletela busungu, akulivwiilila, alunyemo, abuyoofu, akusukama, akuliinya, aluliyano. Muziyanza zyoonse mwalitondezya kuti tamujisi mulandu kumakani aya.

Nkabela nindakamulembela kateensi nkaambo kayooyo iwakabisya, pe, nikaba kaambo kayooyo uubisizidwe, pele ndakamulembela kuti busungu bwanu bwakulindiswe buboneke kabotu kumeso aanu nubeni kubusyu bwa-Leza.
Nciceeco ncituumbulizizidwe.
Alimwi teensi olu luumbulizyo luzutu lundibotezya pe, pele ndakainda kukondwa nkaambo kakukondwa kwa-Tito, ikuti moyo wakwe wakatontozegwa kulindinywe nyoonse.

Nkaambo na ndakamwaambila cintu cakulikankaizya aandinywe, lino sunu nsikonzyi kufwa insoni pe, nkaambo mbuli mbundaamba cakusinizya lyoonse kulindinywe, mbubonya obo makani oonse ngitwakaambila Tito cakulikankaizya aandinywe aalo aba aakusinizya.
Nkabela moyo wakwe ulaatikila lyoonse nayeeya ndinywe ciindi ncaibaluka lusyomeko lwanu ambuli mbumwakamutambula cakuyoowa acakukankama.
Ndakondwa kuti muziyanza zyoonse moyo wangu ulikede kulindinywe.
Ikuti nikuba kuciindi ncibakali mukati kalusunko lwamapenzi mapati, alimwi bakali mubucete bunji, kukondwa kwabo kwakapaya akucita kuti buuya bwabo buvule.
Ncobeni bakapa mbuli inguzu zyabo, ee, kwiinda inguzu zyabo, nkabela makani aya akazwa mumyoyo yabo beni.
Bakatukumbila camoyo woonse kuti bazumizigwe kuba acaabilo camilimo eyi yakugwasya basalali.
Nkabela teebakacita ayo luzutu ngitwakali kusyoma, pele kukusaanguna bakalipa beni mumaanza aa-Mwami, aboobo bakalipa kulindiswe, mbubonya mbwaakayanda Leza.
Nciceeco ncindakakumbila kuli-Tito kuti ailondole kulindinywe eyi milimo njiyonya njaakatalikide kale.
Lino mbuli mbumwiinda kucita kabotu muzintu zyoonse, mulusyomo amukwaamba amuluzibo amubusungu boonse amuluyando ndumujisi kulindiswe, amukainde kucita kabotu mumilimo eyo ayalo.
Nsili mukwaamba cakulailila pe, pele ndayanda kubelesya busungu bwabantu bamwi kukusunka luyando lwanu nubeni na ndwinilwini.
Mulizi mbulubede luzyalo lwa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo, nkaambo walo wakali muvubi, nekubaboobo wakaba mucete nkaambo kandinywe, kuti bucete bwakwe bumuletele buvubi nywebo.
Lino njanda kumulwiida mbunjeeya kumakani aya. Muleelede kucita milimo eyi, nkaambo mwakali ndinywe mwakaba bataanzi mulinjiyo, nikuba kukucita nikuba kukukanza.
Mbubo, lino amulondole kukwiicita, Mbuli mbumwakasungwaala kukanza, amulondole kucita mbubonya obo, nkukuti mbuli buvubi bwanu.
Nkaambo ncibotu kuti muntu asungwaale kupa mbuli buvubi bwakwe mbwajisi, takonzyi kupa ncatajisi pe.
Takweensi kwaamba kuti bamwi balalemununwa anukuti nywebo mulalemenwa, pe.
Ngemakani akweelanya buyo. Kuciindi ecino lwiindano lwanu lulazulila kubula kwabo, kuti lwiindano lwabaabo lukazulile kubula kwanu anywebo, kube lweelano,
mbuli mbukulembedwe kuti,
Oyo iwakajana zinji, taakwe ncaakasyaalilwa,
Pele oyo iwakajana ziniini buyo, taakwe ncaakabula.
Ndalumba Leza nkaambo kakuti mumoyo wa-Tito ulibikide obo busungu mbubonya bwakulindinywe mbutujisi swebo.
Nkaambo wakazumina ciindi ncitwakali kumukombelezya, pele walo mwini wakainda kusungwaala kuza kumuswaya,
Nkabela antoomwe anguwe twatuma oyo mukwesu uulumbwa kumbungano zyoonse nkaambo kamilimo yakwe njacitila Makani Mabotu,
Alimwi nguwenya wakasalwa kumbungano kuti tweende awe mukumana milimo eyi yaluzyalo niitwapegwa kukuletela Mwami bulemu, Ambebo ndakazumina,
nkaambo nkucili cintu ncincenjela, Nsiyandi kuti muntu naba omwe atupe mulandu kumakani aazilumbo ezi zipati zili mumaanza esu,
Nkaambo tulalabilila ziimbo zibotu koonse koonse, nikuba kumeso aa-Mwami nikuba kumeso aabantu.
Alimwi antoomwe ambabo ndatuma mukwesu. Oyo ndimubwene kanjikanji kuti ulisungweede mumakani manji, nkabela kuciindi ecino ulainda kusungwaala nkaambo kalusyomo lupati ndwajisi mulindinywe.
Lino Tito ngumweenzuma, ngusimilimoma kulindinywe, abalo aba bakwesu bali baapostolo bambungano balemeka Kristo.
Lino akube citondezyo kumeso aambungano zyoonse caluyando lwanu acakulikankaizya kwesu nkutulikankaizya aandinywe.
Nkaambo ndizi kale busungu bwanu, nkabela ndili mukumulumbaizya kubusyu bwaba-Makedoniya cakuti, ba-Akaya bakalilibambide kale mwakali, alimwi busungu bwanu bulibusizye banjibanji akati kabo.
Lino ndatuma aba bakwesu kuti kulikankaizya kwesu nkutulikankaizizya ndinywe kumakani aya kutabi kwabuyo. Ndakaamba kuti mulilibambide kale,
lino na ndeza abamwi ba-Makedoniya, elyo bajana kuti tamuna kulibamba, tulausigwa insoni swebo (teensi kwaamba anywebo) nkaambo kamakani aya.

Nciceeco ncindakayeeya kuti ndeelede kukumbila aba bakwesu kuti basolole kuzwa kulindinywe, bakasaangune kubamba zilumbo zyanu nzimusyomezezye. Ndayanda kuti ezi zibe zilumbo ncobeni, nsiyandi kuti zibe eoondonganyo.
Umwi aumwi uleelede kupa mbuli mbwayanda mumoyo wakwe, kutabi cakunyonosya moyo nanka cakusinikizigwa, nkaambo oyu uupa calumwemwe nguuyandwa kwa-Leza,
Leza ulakonzya kumulongezya kukumupa buvubi bunji, kuti lyoonse mukabe azintu zyoonse zyeelede zyakuligwasya nubeni, alimwi kuti mukabe azintu zyakucitila bamwi milimo mibotu.
Mbubonya mbukulembedwe kuti,
Waabila bapengede zipo cakuminza.
Buuya bwakwe tabweeli kukabe kutamani.
Muyoovubizigwa muzintu zyoonse akuba basibuuya lyoonse, nkabela obu buuya bwanu buli mumaanza esu buyoocitya kuti bantu balumbe Leza.
Nkaambo eyi milimo yabulumbu teensi yakuzuzya kubula kwabasalali luzutu, pele alimwi ilapaya kukucitya kuti bantu banji balumbe Leza.
Milimo eyi ilatondezya bantu mbumubede, aboobo balalumba Leza nkaambo kakuti mulaswiilila ayo Makani Mabotu aa-Kristo ngumuzuminina, alimwi nkaambo kabuuya bwanu bwakwaabana ambabo abantu boonse.
Nkabela balamukombela akumusukama nkaambo kaluzyalo lwa-Leza luinda loko kuboneka kulindinywe,
Alumbwe Leza nkaambo kacipo cakwe citaambiki!
Ndakumbila kuti nindasika kulindinywe nsikooyoosika cakwaamba kaanzambwene acabukali obo mbundasyoma kubakalalila bamwi bantu. Aba bantu mbibayeeya kuti ziyanza zyesu nzitweenda azyo nzyaansi buyo.
Pele nikuba kuti tweenda ansi, kulwa kwesu takweensi kwaansi pe,
nkaambo zintu zyesu zyakulwisya tazyeensi zyabantu buyo, nzyanguzu zya-Leza zyakumwaisya mampangala mayumu.
Tulamwaisya miyeeyo yoonse azintu zyoonse zili buti zilisumpula cakulwisya luzibo lwa-Leza, alimwi tulaanga makanze oonse kuti aswiilile Kristo.
Twalibamba kukubeteka muntu umwi aumwi uutaswiilili ciindi ncikuyoolondoka kuswiilila kwanu.

Lino amulange aya makani aaboneka kumeso aanu. Na muntu ulayeeya kuti, Mebo ndi muntu wa-Kristo, oyo muntu aibaluke makani aya aalo, aakuti mbuli mbwali muntu wa-Kristo walo, tuli bantu ba-Kristo aswebo mbubonya,
Nikuba kuti tulainda kulikankaizizya bwami bwesu mbutwapegwa ku-Mwami (obu bwami mbwakuyaka, takweensi bwakumwaya pe), nsikooyoofwa bweeme pe.
Pele nsiyandi kuba mbuli sikumutizizya magwalo pe.
Balaamba kuti, Magwalo aakwe alijisi bulemu anguzu, pele naaboneka kumeso, ulikompeme buyo, alimwi kwaamba kwakwe nkusampusi.
Pele muntu uuamba boobo azibe eci, kuti mbuli mbutubede kumajwi aamumagwalo esu ciindi ncetutawo, mbubonya obo mbutuzooba kumilimo yesu ciindi ncetuliwo.
Pele swebo tatulikankaizyi kwiinda mbukweelede, tulalyeelesya cipimo cakweeleka ncatwaabila Leza cakusika nikuba nkumutana inywe,
Tatulyoololi cakwiinda mbuli basikutasika nkumutana pe, nkaambo ncobeni twakasika nikuba kulindinywe mumilimo ya-Makani Mabotu aa-Kristo,
Tatulikankaizizyi kwiinda mbukweelede milimo yabamwi, pe, pele tulasyoma kuti lusyomo lwanu lulakomena aboobo tulakonzya kukomezya cipimo cesu cakwiinda,
kuti tukambauke Makani Mabotu muzisi zili kunembo lyanu, tutalikankaizizyi cipimo cabamwi cibambidwe kale.
Oyo uulikankaizya alikankaizizye mu-Mwami.
Nkaambo teensi oyo uulilubulula mwini uutambulika, oyo ngwalubulula Mwami nguutambulika.
Inga mulandizuminina kwaamba bufubafuba buniini. Ee, amundizuminine ncobeni.
Nkaambo ndamufwida bufwi-bufwi bwa-Leza, ikuti ndakamweebela mwaalumi omwe, kuti nkamutole kuli-Kristo mbuli musimbi uusalala uutanakwetwe umbi.
Pele ndayoowa kuti mbuli inzoka mbuyakalengawida Eva kubupyungi bwayo, inga myoyo yanu ilibisizidwe akuleka lukakatilo abusalazi kuli-Kristo.
Naasika muntu uukambauka umbi Jesu ngutwatakakambauka swebo, na mwatambula muuya umbi ngumwatakatambula, na Makani ambi ngimwatakatambula, ncobeni mulazumina.
Lino ndasyoma kuti mebo nsityompokezegwi nibuba buniini kubaapostolo bapati cakwiinda.
Nikuba kuti ndi mufubafuba kubwaambe, nsili mufubafuba kuluzibo pe, Lyoonse majwi aangu akaswiililika kulindinywe.
Ndakanyanzya imbungano zimwi, ndakavola kulinzizyo, kuti nkagwasye ndinywe.

Ciindi ncindakacili kulindinywe ndaka bula bulilu, nekubaboobo teendakakataazya muntu naba omwe, nkaambo babunyina bazwa ku-Makedoniya bakandiiata kabotu akundipa zintu nzindakali kubula. Aboobo ndakalikasya muziyanza zyoonse kumulemena, nkabela nzoolikasya obo lyoonse.
Mbuli lusinizyo lwa-Kristo mbululi mulindime, taakwe muntu uuyoondisinkila olu lulikankaizyo mumasi oonse aa-Akaya.
Ino nkaambonzi? Sa nkukuti nsimuyandi? Leza nguuzi.
Pe, nzooya kuya bucita mbubonya mbuncita lino, kuti nkabatesule aziimino zyabo abo bantu bayanda kulikankaizya cakwaamba kuti balyeelene aswebo,
Nkaambo aba bantu mbaapostolo babeji, mbasimilimo basilweeno, mbibalisandula mbuli baapostolo baKristo.
Nkabela aya makani taagambyi pe, nkaambo Saatani mwini alakwe ulalisandula mbuli angelo wamumuni,
Aboobo tacili cintu cipati na balanda bakwe abalo balalisandula mbuli balanda babululami. Mamanino aabaaba azooba mbuli milimo yabo.
Aya ngindaamba lino taazwide ku-Mwami, pe, ndaamba mbuli cabufubafuba buyo kumakani aya aakulikankaizya,
Bantu banji mbuli mbubalikankaizya kumakani aakumeso, ambebo ndalikankaizya mbubonya,
Bafubafuba mulabakazikila myoyo yanu cakubotelwa, inywe nubasongo.
Nkaambo mulakazikila myoyo yanu muntu uumutola kubuzike, nanka uumulida imbono, nanka uumweena, nanka uulisumpula, nanka uumuuma kumeso.
Ndafwa bweeme kwaamba kuti swebo tuli bakompeme kumakani aali boobu, Pele kumakani aali buti ngibafumba-fumba, ambebo ndafumbafumba ngaonya, Ndaamba mbuli cabufubafuba.
