Sa mba-Hebrayo? Ambebo ndi mu-Hebrayo. Sa mba-Israyeli? Ambebo ndi mu-Israyeli. Sa mbalunyungu lwa-Abrahamu? Ambebo ndi walunyungu lwa-Abrahamu­,
Sa mbasimilimo ba-Kristo? Ndaamba cabusondosi, Mebo ndainda, Ndabainda kumapakasyo, ndabainda kumaange, ndakwipaulwa zyuumo cakwiinda, kanjikanji ndili mulufu.
Kuba-Juda ndakakwipaulwa kosanwe zyuumo, kwabula cimwi buyo kuti zibe makumi one,
Ndakaumwa misako kotatwe, ndakafuswa mabwe lomwe, ndakafwidwa bwaato kotatwe, ciindi cimwi ndakali mukati kalwizi buzuba boonse isikati amasiku.

Kanjikanji ndili mumisinzo, ndajana matambo aakumilonga, matambo aabacamukwapa, matambo aakuba-Judama, matambo aakubamasi, matambo aamumunzi, matambo aamusokwe, matambo aamulwizi, amatambo aakubabunyina babeji.
Lyoonse ndili mumilimo amumakataazyo, kanjikanji ndafubwa ŋonzi, ndafwa nzala anyota, kanjikanji ndaliimya kulya, ndafwa rmpeyo akubula zyakusama.
Nkabela antoomwe azintu zimwi zyoonse nkucili cimwi cindilemena mazuba oonse, ndijisi milimo yakubambila imbungano zyoonse.
Na muntu ulikompeme, sa nsikompeme ambebo? Na muntu walebegwa, sa mebo nsipyi mucamba
Ulizi Leza, wisi Mwami Jesu, uutembaulika lyoonse, kuti nsibeji.
pele ndakaselusigwa mucizongo kuzwa kumpulungwido yakubwaanda, aboobo ndakaloboka kuzwa kumaanza aakwe.
Lino kulikankaizya takugwasyi pe, nekubaboobo ndisinikizisidwe, aboobo ndayanda kwaamba makani aazilengano aziyubunuzyo zya­ Mwami.
Ndizi umwi muntu uuli muli-Kristo, nkabela kuzwa kumyaaka iili ikumi amyaaka yone oyo muntu wakakwempelwa kujulu lyatatu. (Nsizi na kali amubili nanka kazwide mumubili, Leza nguuzi),
Ndizi kuti oyo muntu (na kali amubili nanka kazwide mumubili nsizi mebo, Leza nguuzi mbwaakabede)
wakakwempelwa ku-Paradaiso, wakaswiilila makani aataambiki aatondwa kwaambwa kumulomo wamuntu.
Muntu uuli boobo ndakonzya kulikankaizizya nguwe, pele nsikonzyi kulikankaizizya lwangu ndemwini pe, nkutaamba kuti kulikankaizizya makompami aangu,
Ninjanda kulikankaizya, nindataba mufubafuba pe, nkaambo nindaamba makani aaliwo, nekubaboobo ndalikasya, nkaambo nsiyandi kuti muntu ayeeye kuti ndainda eco ciboneka kumeso aakwe na kumatwi aakwe.

Lino nkaambo kaziyubunuzyo zipati zigambya nzindakayubunwidwa, kuti nkasigwe kulisumpula cakwiinda, ndakapegwa cisongozyo cakuyasa mubili wangu, mutumwa wa-Saatani wakundidinkaula, kuti ntakainde kulisumpula.
Nkabela ndakakumbila kotatwe ku-Mwami nkaambo kacintu eci, kuti cindizwide,

pele wakandaambila kuti, Lulakuzulila luzyalo lwangu, nkaambo inguzu zyangu zilaswiililika loko mukati kabukompami. Aboobo ndalikankaizizya makompami aangu cakukondwa, kuti inguzu zya-Kristo zindipopele.
Kaako makompami azyuumo amapakasyo amapenzi amamanikizi, ezi zyoonse buyo ndazibotelwa nkaambo ka-Kristo, ikuti ciindi ncinkompeme nciconya ncindi singuzu,
Ncobeni zitondezyo zyabuapostelo zyoonse zyakacitwa akati kanu calukakatilo, zitondezyo amalele amilimo yanguzu.
Ino sa kuli cintu niciba comwe ncimubisizidwe kwiinda imbungano zimwi? Cita ceeci, cakuti mebo ndemwini teendakamulemena. Amundilekelele mulandu oyu.
Mbubo mebo cilandibotezya kusowa zintu zyangu zyoonse akulisowa ndemwini nkaambo kamyuuya yanu. Lino na luyando ndunjanda ndinywe ndupati cakwiinda, sa luyando lulakonzya kuceya
Mbubo, teendakamulemena pe. Pele kulaambwa kuti ndakali mupyungi, aboobo ndakamunyanga calweeno.
Sa mbukubede? Sa ndakamunyanzya cintu kumaanza aabantu abo mbundakamutumina?
Ndakakumbila Tito kuti amuswaye, alimwi antoomwe anguwe ndakatuma oyo mukwesu umwi, Sa Tito wakamunyanzya cintu? Aswebo sa teetwakeenda awe mu-Muuya omwe nguwenya? Sa teetwakeenda antaamo zyomwe?
Lino mulayeeya kuti kumajwi aya manji ndalikankaizya buyo sa? Pe, tulaamba muli-Kristo kubusyu bwa-Leza, nkabela makani oonse ngotwaamba, nubayandwi, ngaakumuyaka.

Nkaambo ndayoowa kuti ciindi ncinti sike nzoojana kuti tamuli mbuli mbunjanda, ambebo ndemwini muzoondijana kuti nsili mbuli mbumuyanda nywebo, Ndayoowa kuti nzoojana lukazyanyo, ibbivwe, manyeme, mipampo mipampo, mavwiyi, majubi, kamikami, mapyopyongano,

Ndayoowa kuti ciindi ncenti sike Leza wangu uzoondifwisya bweeme kulindinywe, nkaambo nzoolilila bantu banji ibakacita zibi kalekale pele tabana kweempelwa busofwaazi abumambi azisusi zibi nzibakali kucita.

Ndakamucenjezya kale nindakaliwo kuluswayo lwangu lwabili, nkabela lino ndamucenjezya alimwi nkentana kusika, inywe nimwakacita kale zibi abamwi boonse, kuti ciindi ncenti boole alimwi nsikooyoomufwida insoni pe.
Nkaambo kakuti muli mukuyandaula citondezyo cakuti Kristo nguuamba mulindime, Walo takompeme akati kanu pe, ngusinguzu akati kanu.

Nkaanlbo nikuba kuti wakabambulwa aciingano cabukompami, sunu muumi kunguzu zya-Leza. Nkabela lino aswebo tuli mbuli nguwe kubukompami bwesu, nekubaboobo kunguzu zya-Leza tuzooba abuumi mbubonya mbuli nguwe kumeso aanu.
Amulisukusye nubeni na muliimvwi mulusyomo, amulilingule nubeni, Sa tamumvwisyi kuti Kristo ulamukalila mukati? Ikuti kwatanooli boobo, muli batakete.
Pele ndasyoma kuti mulaziba kuti swebo tatuli batakete pe.
Lino tulakumbila kuli-Leza kuti mutaciti zibi niziba ziniini. Teensi kwaamba kuti swebo tuboneke mbuli batambulika. Tulayanda kuti nywebo mucite kabotu nikuba kuti swebo tuli batakete,
Nkaambo tatukonzyi kucita cintu cakulwisya lusinizyo pe, tuleelede kulugwasya.
Nkaambo myoyo yesu ilikondedwe na muli bayumu nywebo, nikuba kuti swebo tubeni tulikompeme, Cintu ncituyandisya nceeci, nkuti buumi bwanu bubambwe kabotu.
Cintu ncindamulembela boobo nentawo nceeci, nkuti ciindi ncenti sike nsiyandi kubelesya bwami bwangu cabukali, Nkaambo obo bwami mbwaakandipa Mwami mbwakuyaka, tabweensi bwakumwaya pe.
Amujuzyanye alumyontano lusalala,
Basalali boonse balamujuzya.
Luzyalo lwa-Mwami Jesu Kristo aluyando lwa-Leza aluswaanano lwa-Muuya Uusalala zibe anywe nyoonse.
Swebu abakwesu mbotuli abo tulamujuzya nombungano yaku-Galatiya.
Amube aluzyalo aluumuno kuzwa kuli-Leza Taateesu aku-Mwami Jesu Kristo.
Walo wakalyaaba nkaambo kazibi zyesu kuti atusalulule kuzwa mububi bwaansi bwaciindi ecino, mbubonya mbwayanda Leza Taateesu,
Kulinguwe akube bulemu mazuba oonse mane kukabe kutamani. Ameni.
Ndagamba loko kuti mwafwambaana kumuleka oyo iwakamwiita muluzyalo lwa-Kristo, mwajata makani ambi.
Nkukwaamba kuti nkubali bamwi bantu bamupilinganya, balayanda kusandula-sandula Makani Mabotu aa-Kristo.
Pele na kuli muntu, notuba ndiswe naba angelo uuzwa kujulu, uumukambaukila makani ambi aatali mbuli ngitwakamukambaukila, abe mutuke.
Mbubonya mbundakaambide kale, alino ndaloolola alimwi, kuti na kuli muntu uumukambaukila makani ambi aatali mbuli ngimwakatambula abe mutuke,
Lino sa mbantu mbindi mukukombelezya na ngu-Leza? Sa njanda kubotezya bantu? Nindacili kubotezya bantu nintali muzike wa-Kristo pe.
Nkaambo ndamuzibya, bakwesu, kuti ayo Makani Mabotu nginkambauka mebo teensi makani aazwa kubantu pe.
Nkaambo teendakaatambula kubantu, alimwi teendakaaiya, pele ndakaayubunwidwa a-Jesu Kristo.
Ikuti mwakaswiilila kale mbuzyakabede ziyanza zyangu zyakale nindakacili mubu-Juda, mbundakali kupenzesya loko imbungano ya-Leza akwiindinganya.
Nkabela mubu-Juda basama banji bamusyobo wangu ndakabainda loko kukusungwaalila tunsiyansiya twamawisi esu.
Pele nkwali iwakandisalila eyi milimo kuzwa mwida lyabama akundiita kuluzyalo lwakwe,
nkabela cibe ciindi cakamubotela kundiyubunwida Mwanaakwe, kuti nkamukambauke akati kabamasi, elyo ndilyonya teendakabuzyanya makani abantu balya maila,
alimwi teendakaya ku-Jerusalemu kulibaabo ibakandisaangunina kuba baapostolo, pele ndakaya ku-Arabiya, lino nicakaba ciindi ndakaboola ku-Damasko.
Pele baapostolo bamwi taakwe ngundakabona naba omwe, cita Jakobo munyina mwami.
Aya makani ngindamulembela, ncobeni taali aakubeja kubusyu bwa-Leza.
Lino nicakaba ciindi ndakaya kuzisi zyaku-Suriya acaku-Kilikiya.
Nkentana kuzibwa kubusyu kumbungano zyabanakristo zyamu-Judaya,
Bakamvwide buyo kuti oyo iwakali kutupenzesya ulakambauka ayo makani ngaonya ngaakali kwiindinganya.
Nkabela bakalemeka Leza nkaambo kandime.

Nkaambo kaciyubunuzyo ncindakainka, nkabela ndakabapandulwida makani nginkambauka akati kabamasi, ndakaamba kumbali abapati, kukusinizya kuti teensi yabuyo milimo yangu njincita na njindakacitide kale,
Lino Tito ngutwakali awe kali mu-Helene, nekubaboobo teebakamusinikizya kuti apalulwe pe.
Pele kakuli bamwi babunyina babeji ibakasobelela kunjila kuti balangelange bulubusi bwesu mbutujisi muli-Jesu Kristo, kuti bakatunjizye mubuzike.
Kulibaaba teetwakazuminina nikaba kaindi kaniini pe, kuti lusinizyo lwa­-Makani Mabotu lusyaale kulindinywe.
Lino abo baambwa kuti mbapati (taakwe makani kulindime mbubakabede, nkaambo Leza talangilili ciwa camuntu), abo baambwa kuti mbapati kabatajisi cintu cakuyungizizya makani aangu.
Pe, pele nibakabona kuti ndakapegwa milimo yakukambaukila basilulomo Makani Mabotu mbubonya mbuli Petro mbwaakapegwa milimo yakukambaukila bapalule,
(nkaambo oyo iwakaindauka mucamba ca-­Petro kuti abe apostolo wabapalule nguwenya iwakaindauka mucamba cangu kuti mbe apostolo wabamasi),

alimwi nibakabona luzyalo ndundakapegwa, elyo Jakobo a-Kefa a-Johane, abo baambwa kuti misemu yambungano, bakatupa mebo a-Barnaba ijanza lyalulyo lyaluswanaano cakuzumina kuti swebo tuye kulibamasi, abalo baye kulibapalule.
Pele kabayanda kuti twiibaluke bacete, nkabela cintu eci ambebo ndakali kucisungwaalila.
Pele Kefa naakasika ku-Antiokeya, ndakamukazya kumeso aakwe, nkaambo wakajisi mulandu.
Ikuti nibatakalina kusika bamwi bantu bazwa kuli-Jakobo, wakali kulya abamasi, pele nibakasika wakatalika kulifunya akulipambula, nkaambo wakali kuyoowa bapalule.
Nkabela ba-Juda bamwi boonse abalo bakaupaupa ameso antoomwe anguwe, a-Barnaba alakwe wakalengawidwa abuupeupe bwabo.

Pele nindakabona kuti tabeendi cakululama mbuli lusinizyo lwa-Makani Mabotu, ndakaambila Kefa kumeso aabo boonse, ndati, Kuti webo uli mu-Juda, nekubaboobo ulacita mbuli ziyanza zyabamasi akutacita mbuli ziyanza zyaba-Juda, ino nkaambonzi ulasinikizya bamasi kuti babe mbuli ba-Juda?
Swebo tuli ba-Juda bazyale, tatuli bamasi basizibi pe,

Pele tulizi kuti teensi milimo ya­-Mulao iilulamika muntu, ndusyomo lwa-Kristo Jesu lumululamika, nkabela aswebo twakasyoma Kristo Jesu kuti tululamikwe boobo. Kululamikwa kwesu kwazwa kukusyoma Kristo, takuzwi kumilimo ya-Mulao pe, nkaambo milimo ya-Mulao tiikonzyi kululamika muntu naba omwe.
Lino na tulayandaula kululamikwa muli-Kristo nkabela kulajanwa kuti aswebo tubeni tuli basizibi, nkukwaamba kuti Kristo waba mulanda wazibi sa? Ne!
Nkaambo na zintu ezyo nzizyonya nzindakamwaya ndaziyakulula, elyo ndalibonekesya mbuli musotosi wa-Mulao,
Ikuti mebo nkaambo ka­-Mulao nkindakafwida Mulao, kuti nkaponene Leza.

Ndibambwidwe aciingano antoomwe a-Kristo, nkabela endime encipona, ngu-Kristo uundiponena mukati. Buumi bwanyama mbunjisi sunu mbwalusyomo, ndusyomo luli mu-Mwana a-Leza, nguwe wakandiyanda akulyaaba nkaambo kangu.
Nsikonzyi kulobya luzyalo lwa-Leza pe, Kuti bululami nibwali kuzwa ku-Mulao, nkukwaamba kuti kufwa kwa-Kristo nikwakaba kwabuyo.
Akaka, inywe nuba-Galatiya bafubafuba! Nguni wakamulowa? Sa Jesu Kristo mubambule teewakalembwa kumeso aanu na?
Ndayanda kumubuzya cintu comwe buyo. Sa nkaambo kamilimo ya-Mulao nkimwakatambwida Muuya na nkaambo kakusyomena Makani ngimwamvwa?
Sa mwafubaala obo? Mwakatalika mu-Muuya, lino sa mulilondwedwe sunu munyama?
Sa ncabuyo ncimwamvwida ayo mapenzi mapati? Ncabuyo na?
Lino oyo uumwaabila Muuya akucita malele akati kanu, sa ulacita obo nkaambo kamilimo ya-Mulao njimwacita na nkaambo kakusyomena Makani ngimwamvwa.
Mbubonya mbuli Abrahamu, wakasyoma Leza nkabela eci cakamweelezezegwa mbuli bululami.
Alimwi Malembe akalibwene kale kuti Leza uyoolulamika bamasi alusyomo, nkabela Abrahamu wakakambaukilwa Makani Mabotu kaatana kubawo, nkaambo wakaambilwa kuti, Masi oonse alalongezegwa mulinduwe.
Aboobo basilusyomo boonse balalongezegwa antoomwe ayooyo musyomi Abrahamu.
Ikuti boonse bali buti bayeeya kuti tuli basikucita Mulao bali alutuko, nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti, Uli alutuko umwi aumwi uutakalilili mumakani oonse aalembedwe mubbuku lya-Mulao akwaacita.
Lino kulibwenekede kuti taakwe muntu uukonzya kululamikwa kumilimo ya-Mulao, ikuti: Uululeme unoopona kulusyomo.
Nkabela Mulao teensi makani aalusyomo pe, pele, Uuzicita ulaponena nzizyonya.
Lino Kristo wakatunununa kuzwa kulutuko lwa-Mulao, ikuti walo mwini wakaba lutuko nkaambo kesu, nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti, Uli alutuko umwi aumwi uuangilidwe kumusamu.
Aboobo coolwe ca-Abrahamu casika kulibamasi muli-Jesu Kristo, kuti kulusyomo lwesu tutambule Muuya ngutwakasyomezegwa.
Lino bakwesu, ndaleta cikozyano camakani aabantu. Cizuminano camuntu, na cilijatisidwe kale, taakwe muntu uukonzya kucilobya nanka kuciyungizizya.
Lino zisyomezyo zyakaambilwa Abrahamu ambuto yakwe. Tacaambwi kuti imbuto zyako, nkukuti zinji, caambwa kuti “imbuto yako”, nkukuti yomwe, nkukuti Kristo,
Lino cintu ncindaamba nceeci. Eco cizuminano ncaakasaanguna kujatisya Leza, tuukonzyi kucilobya Mulao iwakasika kusule amyaaka iili myaanda yone amakumi otatwe, alimwi tuukonzyi kubisizya cisyomezyo.
Lukono kuti lwazwa ku-Mulao, talucizwi kucisyomezyo, pele ncisyomezyo Leza ncaakalupesya Abrahamu.
Lino ngweenzi Mulao? Wakayungizizigwa nkaambo kansotoko, mane kusikila kuciindi nciyakasika eyo Imbuto iyakapegwa cisyomezyo. Wakatumikizigwa abaangelo kujanza lyasikwiimaakati.
(Lino sikwiimaakati nkukwaamba kuti bavula bantu, pele Leza nguumwi luzutu).
Lino sa Mulao ulalwisya zisyomezyo zya-Leza na? Ne! Nkaambo Mulao niwakubede uukonzya kupa buumi, elyo ncobeni bululami nibwakuzwide ku-Mulao.
Pele Malembe akajalila boonse buyo mubwami bwazibi, kuti cisyomezyo cizwa kukusyoma Jesu Kristo bacipegwe basilusyomo boonse.
Aboobo Mulao wakatubeda mbuli simalelo mane kusikila kuciindi ncati keze Kristo, kuti tululamikwe alusyomo.
Pele lino mbulwasika lusyomo, tatucili mumaanza aasimalelo.
Nkaambo nyoonse muli bana ba-Leza nkaambo kakusyoma Kristo Jesu.
Ikuti nyoonse nimwakabapatizigwa muliKristo mwakalisamika ziyanza zya-Kristo.
Lino taakwe mu-Juda nanka mu-Helene, taakwe muzike nanka mulubusi, taakwe mwaalumi nanka mwanakazi, nkaambo nyoonse buyo muli bamwi muli-Kristo Jesu.
Nkabela mbuli mbumuli bakwe Kristo, muli inyungu zya-Abrahamu, aboobo muli baswaana mbubonya mbucaamba cisyomezyo.
Lino amwi nginti ambe ngaaya. Swaana naacili mwanikenike tabapambukene abuniini amuzike, nekubaboobo ngumwami walubono loonse.
Pele uli mumaanza aabaleli ababanzi mane kusikila kuciindi icakabikwa awisr,
Mbubonya mbutubede aswebo. Nitwakacili banikenike, twakali mubuzike bwakupaila zilenge zitaanzi zyaansi.
Pele nicakasika ciindi ceelede, Leza wakatuma Mwanaakwe, iwakazyalwa kumwanakazi, wakazyalwa mu-Mulao,
kuti akabanunune abo bakali mu-Mulao, kuti tukatambule bwana,
Lino mbuli mbumuli bana, Leza wakatuma Muuya wa-Mwanaakwe mumyoyo yanu, uuompolola kuti, Abba, Ta,
Aboobo sunu tacili muzike, pe, uli mwana muzyale. Alimwi mbuli mboli mwana muzyale, ncobeni Leza wakucitya kuti ube swaana.
Kuciindi eco ncimwatakalina kuziba Leza, mwakali mubuzike bwakupaila abo batajisi bu-Leza bwinibwini.

Pele sunu mulizi Leza, na inga ndakonzya kwaamba kuti mulizibidwe kuli-Leza. Lino mupilukilanzi kuzilenge ezyo nzizyonya zitajisi inguzu zyakugwasya? Muyandilanzi kuboola alimwi mubuzike bwakulinzizyo.
Mulalikatazizya makani aamazuba amyeezi amapobwe amyaaka.
Ndayoowa kuti ambweni milimo yangu njindakamubelekela yaba yabuyo.
Mulizi kuti nkaambo kamatenda aamubili wangu nkindakamukambaukila Makani Mabotu kukusaanguna.
Mubili wangu wakali kumukataazya, nekubaboobo teemwakandisampaula nikuba kundisesemwa, pe, mwakanditambula mbuli angelo wa-Leza, mbuli Kristo Jesu mwini.
Pele sunu luli kuli olo lukondo ndumwakandikondelelwa? Nkaambo ndazumina kuti nikwakali kukonzeka nimwakagwisya meso aanu akundipa,
Lino sunu sa ndaba sinkondonyokwe nkaambo kakumukananina lusinizyo?
Aba bantu balamusungwaalila, pele busungu bwabo tabuli bwaciyanza cibotu pe. Balayanda kumujalila anze kuti anywebo mubasungwaalile.
Lino ncintu cibotu kuti musungwaalilwe muciyanza cibotu, nkabela takweensi kwaamba kuti ciindi ncendiwo luzutu pele lyoonse.
Akaka, twana twangu! Ndamusungila lwabili mane Kristo abumbwe mukati kanu.
Nindakaliwo nkumubede akusandula ijwi, nkaambo ndazingwa kumakani aanu.
Nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti Abrahamu wakalijisi bana bobile, umwi wakazyalwa kumwanakazi muzike, umwi kumwanakazi muzyale.
Pele mwanaakwe muzike wakazyalwa kunyama buyo, anukuti mwanaakwe muzyale wakazyalwa nkaambo kacisyomezyo.
Lino aya makani nceezyanisyo. Aba banakazi bobile balikozyenye amilongo yobile. Umwi wazwa kucilundu ca-Sina, ulazyalila buzike bana, uli mbuli Hagare.
Hagare nkukuti cilundu ca-Sina cili mucisi ca-Arabiya, alimwi ulikozyenye a-Jerusalemu wasunu, uli mubuzike antoomwe abana bakwe.
Pele oyo Jerusalemu uuli kujulu muzyale, ngunyina wesu toonse.
Nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti,
Sekelela, webo omusundi uutazyali,
Uma nguluulu akoongolola, webo otasungi,
Nkaambo bana banabutema mbanji
Kwiinda bana bayooyo uujisi mulumi.
Lino nywebo, bakwesu, muli bana balusyomezyo mbuli Izaka.
Pele mbuli oyo iwakazyalwa kunyama mbwaakali kupenzya oyo iwakazyalwa ku-Muuya, mbubonya obo mbukubede asunu.
Pele malembe alaamba buti? Alaamba kuti, Tanda mwanakazi muzike amwanaakwe, nkaambo mwana wamuzike takonzyi kuba swaananyina mwanaakwe muzyale.
Aboobo, bakwesu, swebo tatuli bana bamwanakazi muzike pe, tuli bana bamuzyale.
Ndamulwiida lwabili kuti umwi aumwi uupalulwa ulijisi ceelelo cakumanizya Mulao woonse.
Na mulayanda kululamikwa ku-Mulao, elyo Kristo tacijisi milimo yakumugwasya, mwaleya kuzwa kuluzyalo.
Pele swebo nkukulusyomo nkutulindilila muli-Muuya obo bululami mbutulangila.
Nkaambo muli-Kristo Jesu bupalule tabukwe milimo, alwalo lulomo talukwe milimo, pele lusyomo lubeleka kujanza lyaluyandano ndolujisi milimo.
Mwakali kuzuzaana kabotu. Ino nguni wakamucelezya kuya buswiililisya lusinizyo?
Lusoosyo luli boobu taluzwi kuliyooyo iwakamwiita.
Tumena tuniini tulafufumusya mulwi woonse.
Moyo wangu ulisinizye aandinywe mu-Mwami kuti tamukooyootamauka. Pele oyo uumukataazya uyooba amulandu, kufumbwa na nguni.
Pele mebo, bakwesu, na ncikambauka­ kuti bantu baleelede kupalulwa, ino ncipenzezegwanzi? Sa ciingano caleka kulebya bantu na?
Abo bamupyopyonganya nibalikosola!
Nkaambo mitwe yamakani ya-Mulao yoonse ili mukati kajwi eli lyomwe lyakuti, Yanda mweenzinyoko mbubonya mboliyanda omwini.
Pele na mulalumana akulyana, amucenjele kuti mutanyonyoonani.
Nciŋamba nceeci, Inzila niimweendela ibe yamu-Muuya, aboobo mutakaciti zisusi zyanyama.
Nkaambo nyama ilijisi zisusi zilwisya Muuya, awalo Muuya ulalwisya nyama, Ezi zyobile zilasundana, aboobo mulakacilwa kucita mbuli mbwiiyanda myoyo yanu.
Pele kuti mulasungulwa a-Muuya, elyo tamuli kunsi a-Mulao.
kukomba mituni, bulozi, inkondo, bulwani, lukazyanyo, inyemo, insulano, mipampo mipampo, impilingano,
ibbivwe, inkolwi, injalalando, azimwi zili boobo. Lino ndamwaambila aazintu ezi mbubonya mbundakamwaambila kale, kuti abo bacitaula zintu zili boobo tabakooyookona Bwami bwa-Leza,
Pele micelo ya-Muuya njeeyi:— luyandano, lukondo, luumuno, busicamba, buuya, bubotu, lusyomo,
lubombo, kulyeendelela. Kulibaabo bacitaula zili boobo taakwe Mulao uubalwisya.
Lino abo ibakwe Kristo Jesu, nyama baliibambwide aciingano antoomwe aziciso zyayo azisusi zyayo.
Tutabi basikambotwembotwe, tutakalazyanyi, tutabi abbivwe umwi amweenzinyina.
Amunyampuzyanye mikuli, aboobo mulalondola mulao wa-Kristo,
Na muntu ulayeeya kuti, Ndi mulemu, anukuti tajisi bulemu abuniini, oyo muntu ulalyeena,
Pele muntu umwi aumwi alingule milimo yakwe mwini, aboobo ulajana cintu cakulikankaizizya mwini, citali camweenzinyina.
Nkaambo umwi aumwi uleelede kunyampula mukuli wakwe mwini.
Oyo uuiya uleelede kwaabilana zintu zibotu zyoonse ayooyo uumwiisya,
Mutalubi, Leza tacapwi. Kufumbwa ncabyala muntu, ulatebula eco nciconya.
Oyo uubyala zintu zyanyama ulatebula bubozi buzwa kunyama, pele oyo uubyala zintu zyamuuya ulatebula buumi butamani buzwa kuMuuya.
Lino tutalengaani mukucita kabotu, nkaambo kuciindi ceelede tulatebula, twatafunuka.
Nkaambo kaako, nitujisi ciindi cibotu, atucitile bantu boonse milimo mibotu, pele kwaambisya kulibaabo baciinga calusyomo.
Amubone mbundakomezya mabala cakumulembela ajanza lyangu ndemwini!
Abo bayanda kuba basibubotu kumeso aabantu kumakani aanyama, mbimbabo bamusinikizya kapalulwa, pele ncibacitila abo ncakuti batapenzegwi nkaambo kaciingano ca-Kristo.
Nkaambo basipalule aba beni tabalomyi Mulao pe, balayanda buyo kuti mupalulwe nywebo kuti balikankaizizye nyama yanu,

Pele mebo nsijisi cintu niciba cimwi ncinkozya kulikankaizizya pele ciingano ca-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo luzutu. Nciconya cicita kuti kumeso aangu zintu zyoonse zyaansi zilifwide aciingano, ambebo ndemwini ndifwide mbubonva kumeso aabantu baansi.
Nkaambo bupalule tabukwe makani, alwalo lulomo talukwe makani, Bulenge bupya mbubujisi makani.
Lino bantu boonse batobela cipimo eci babe aluumuno alweetelelo, abalo bana ba-Israyeli ba-Leza.
Lino luzyalo lwa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo alube amyoyo yanu, bakwesu. Ameni.
Amube aluzyalo aluumuno luzwa kwa-Leza Taateesu aku-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo.
mbubonya mbuli mbwaakatusala mulinguwe kuzwa kumatalikilo aanyika, kuti tusalale, tutabi akampenda nikaba komwe kumeso aakwe,
Nkaambo wakatuyandisya, aboobo wakatukanzila kuti tube bana bakwe mwini kujanza lya-Jesu Kristo, nkabela ncobeni obu bukanze mbwaakalita
bwacitya kuti bulemekwe loko bulemu bwaluzyalo lwakwe ndwaakatufwida mu-Muyandwi wakwe.
ndwaakatuvuzizya maanu oonse amancenjela,
akutucita kuti tuzibe makani aasisidwe aabukanze bwamoyo wakwe. Lulito lwakwe ndwaakalita kalekale mulinguwe ndoolu.
Wakabamba kuti, casika buyo ciindi ceelede, mitwe yazintu zyoonse, niziba zintu zyamujulu niziba zintu zyaansi, ibikwe antoomwe muli-Kristo,
kuti tube lutembauzyo lwabulemu bwakwe, iswe nitwakasaanguna kuzuminina Kristo.
Anywebo mwakaswiilila ijwi lyalusinizyo, Makani Mabotu aalufutuko lwanu, elyo nimwakazuminina nguwe mwakabikilwa citondezyo, nkukuti Muuya Uusalala ngutwakasyomezegwa kale.
Oyu Muuya nguwenya ncecitondezyo calukono lwesu ncitwapegwa sunu mane do kusikila kuciindi ncituzoolya lubono loonse akutembaula bulemu bwakwe.
nsileki kumulumbila lyoonse akumwaambilizya muzikombyo zyangu,
Ndakomba kuti Leza wa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo, Visi wabulemu, amupe muuya wamaanu awaciyubunuzyo, mube aluzibo lwanguwe,
kuti meso aamyoyo yanu abonesye, mumvwisye mbuzibede zintu nzimulangila nzyaamwiitila, ambwaabede manjdenjele malemu aalukono ndwaatupa akati kabasalali,
ambuzibede inguzu zyakwe impati loko ziinda nzyajisi kulindiswe, swebo nituzumina. Ezi inguzu zilabeleka muciyanza cigambya loko,
nzizyonya zyakalibonya muli-Jesu Kristo kuciindi eco ncaakamubusya kuzwa kubafu akumubika kujanza lyakwe lyalulyo mumyeenya yamujulu,
kuti ainde loko boonse beendelezi abapati abasinguzu abami, akulemekwa kwiinda mazina oonse aambwa, nikuba kuciindi ecino nikuba kuciindi ciciza,
Wakabika zintu zyoonse kunsi lyamaulu aakwe, alimwi wakamubika kuti abe simutwe wazintu zyoonse kumbungano.
Imbunganongano njiyonya ngumubili wakwe, mbobuzule bwayooyo uuzula zintu zyoonse.
nzimwakali kweendela mulinzizyo insiku, cakutobela ziimbo zyaansi ano azyamweendelezi uujisi bwami bwakumuuwo, nguwenya muuya uubeleka sunu mumyoyo yabana bakasampusampu.

Akati kabaaba mpotwakali kuponena aswebo kalekale, nkaambo twakali mumayabwe aanyama yesu, twakali kucita zisusi zibi zyanyama azyamyoyo yesu, nkabela mubwiime bwesu twakali bana babukali mbubonya mbuli bamwi.
Pele Leza, Sibuuya loko, nkaambo kaluyando lwakwe lupati, ndwaakatuyandisya,
nekuba kuti twakalifwide mumilandu, wakatubusya toonse antoomwe a-Kristo (luzyalo ndomufutuzidwe).
Wakatusumpwida antoomwe anguwe akutukazika toonse mumyeenya yamujulu muli-Kristo Jesu,
kuti mumizukulu iiza azootondezye buvubi bugambya bwaluzyalo lwakwe mulweetelelo lwakwe ndwaaetelela ndiswe muli-Kristo Jesu.
Nkaambo kakuti luzyalo ndolumufutisizye nkaambo kalusyomo, nkabela makani taazwi kulindinywe nubeni, ncipo buyo cizwa kuli-Leza.
Teensi makani aancito zyesu, pe, kuti kutabi muntu uulikankaizya.
Nkaambo iswe tuli milimo yamaanza aakwe, twakalengelwa milimo mibotu muli-Kristo Jesu, njiyo njakabambide kale, kuti tweendele mulinjiyo.

Amwiibaluke kuti kuciindi eco cakamana mwakalipambukide kwa-Kristo, kamuli bazwakule kucisi ca-Israyeli, kamuli beenzu buyo kumakani aamilongo yazisyomezyo, katakwe cintu ncimwakakonzya kulangila, nkaambo kamutakwe Leza ansi.
Pele sunu, mbuli mbumuli muli-Kristo Jesu, inywe nimwakali kule muliswenesezedwe afwiifwi nkaambo kabulowa bwa-Kristo.
Ikuti nguwe luumuno lwesu, iwakacita kuti swebo tumisyobo yobile tube bamwi, wakamwaya bulambo bwakali akati kesu ibwakatupambukenye.
Mumubili wakwe wakalobya businkondo, nkukuti milazyo iibikidwe mu-Mulao, aboobo wakacita luumuno, nkaambo kuzwa kulibaaba bobile wakalenga mukati kakwe mwini muntu omwe mupya,
alimwi boonse bobile wakabayanzanya kuli-Leza mumubili omwe kunguzu zyaciingano cakwe, nciconya ncaakajazya businkondo.
Nkabela lino wakeza kuzooamba luumuno kulindinywe nimwakali kule akulimbabo ibakavulide afwiifwi.
Nkaambo mulinguwe toonse tobile mutujene lusweno mu-Muuya omwe kuli-Taata.
Nkaambo kaako sunu tamucili beenzu na kutegwa muli bazwakule, pe, muli bamusyobonyina basalali, muli baciinga ca-Leza.
Muliyakidwe atala antalisyo yabaapostolo ayabasinsimi, nkabela Jesu Kristo mwini ndibbwe lyakuciswi caŋanda.
Mulinguwe iŋanda yoonse ili mukuyakwa ndendendende akuya bukomena kuba cikombelo cisalala icili mu-Mwami.
Nkabela mumonya anywebo mumuyakidwe antoomwe kuti mube cikalilo ca-Leza camumuuya.
Ndasyoma kuti mulimvwide makani aabubanzi bwaluzyalo lwa-Leza mbundakapegwa nkaambo kanu,
aciyubunuzyo ncindakatambula cakundizibya makani aasisidwe. (Ndimugwalilide kale majwi mace aakupandulula aya makani,
nkabela ncobeni nimubala mulakonzya kubona luzibo ndunjisi lwakumvwisya makani aasisidwe aa-Kristo.
Mumizukulu yakamana aya makani taakakazibisigwa kubantu, pele sunu Muuya waayubunwida baapostolo abasinsimi bakwe basalala).
Makani ngindakayubunwidwa ngakuti bamasi babe baswaananyokwe abasizizonyina mumubili omwe abasicaabilonyina mucisyomezyo ncitusyomezegwa muli-Kristo Jesu. Eci cakaboneka nkaambo ka-Makani Mabotu,
ngaonya makani ngendakatambwida busimilimo kucaabilo caluzyalo lwa-Leza ndundakapegwa kukoonda milimo kwanguzu zyakwe.
Ime ndimuniini kwiinda bacece boonse babasalali, nekubaboobo ndime ndakapegwa olu luzyalo, kuti nkakambauke akati kabamasi buvubi butaambiki bwa-Kristo,
akucita kuti bantu babonesye mbuzibede ezyo zintu zisisidwe izyakasisidwe kuzwa kumatalikilo aanyika muli-Leza, iwakalenga zintu zyoonse.
Aya makani akaba kuti kuciindi ecino kujanza lyambungano beendelezi abasibwami bamumasena aakujulu bazibisigwe busongo bwamisyobo misyobo bwa-Leza,
mbubonya mbuli bukanze bwamaindi mbwaakakanza muli-Kristo Jesu Mwami wesu.
Mulinguwe mutujene kaanzambwene kakuswena afwiifwi cakuzyakamana, nkaambo tulasyoma nguwe.
Aboobo ndamukumbila kuti mutalengaani nkaambo kamafwabi aangu ngindamufwabila, ikuti aya mafwabi mbobulemu bwanu.
Nkaambo kayaaya ndafugama kuli-Wisi,
mulinguwe coonse ciinga niciba cili mujulu niciba cili ansi caliulikidwe.
Ndakomba kuti bulemu bwakwe bugambya bucite kuti kujanza lya-Muuya wakwe muyumisigwe canguzu mubuntu bwanu bwamumoyo,
kuti Kristo akale mumyoyo yanu nkaambo kalusyomo, kuti muzyate akubombomana muluyandisyo,
aboobo mulakonzya kumvwisya, antoomwe abasalali boonse, mbububede busasa abulamfu, abulamfu bwamunyika abulamfu bwakujulu,
akuziba luyando lwa-Kristo ilwiinda luzibo loonse, kuti muzule luzulo loonse wa-Leza.
kulinguwe akube bulemu mumbungano amuli-Jesu Kristo mumizukulu yoonse iiciza mane kukabe kutamani. Ameni.
Amweende cakulibombya acakulitola ansi. Umwi aumwi akati kanu abe acamba cilemu akukazikila mweenzinyina moyo cakuyandana.
Kamucisolesya kulondola lujatano luzwa ku-Muuya kucaanzyo caluumuno.
Kuli mubili omwe buyo a-Muuya omwe, mbubonya mbuli bulangizi bwabwiite mbumwakaitilwa mbumwi.
Alakwe Mwami ngumwi, alusyomo ndumwi, alubapatizyo ndumwi,
Nkabela Leza ngumwi, ngonguwe Wisi wabo boonse, uubainda boonse, nguuli akati kaboonse, alimwi nguumukalila nyoonse mukati.
Nciceeco ncikwaambwa kuti,
Ciindi ncaakatanta kujulu wakasaala busaali,
Alimwi wakaabila bantu zipego,
Oyo iwakaselukide ngonguwe iwakatanta kujulu kule kwiinda majulu oonse, kuti azulile muzintu zyoonse.
kuti basitikizye bazumini, akoonda milimo ya-Leza, akuyaka mubili wa-Kristo,
mane do toonse tube abujatane bomwe bwabuzumini abwaluzibo lwa-Mwana a-Leza, tube abuntu bulondokede abwiime buzulide bwa-Kristo,
tutacibi bacete kukupepaulwa koonse koonse akupupululwa amyuuwo yanjiisyo zyamisyobo misyobo iizwa kukweena-ena kwabantu bapyungi bajisi macenjela aakucita bubeji.
Tuleelede kujatisya lusinizyo cakuyandana, aboobo tulakonzya kukula muziyanza zyoonse akujatana ayooyo uuli mutwe wesu, nkukuti Kristo.
Kunsi kulinguwe mubili woonse mbuulungene akujatana mungo zyoonse nzyuubambilidwe, kubeleka kweelede kwacizo cimwi acimwi kulagwasya mubili kuti ukule akuliyaka muluyando.
ikuti balisizidwe mumiyeeyo yabo, balipambukide kubuumi bwaLeza nkaambo kakutaziba kuli mulimbabo kuzwa kubuyumu bwamyoyo yabo.
Aba baba zitiliba, aboobo balyaabilila kuzisusi zibi, kuti babeleke milimo yoonse iisofweede cakulikumbuzya.
Pele inywe teensi boobo mbumwakaiya makani aa-Kristo, pe.
Nkukuti na mulimvwide ncobeni makani aakwe akwiisigwa ncobeni mulinguwe makani aalusinizyo mbuli mbuluboneka muli-Jesu.
Muleelede kuleka ziyanza zyanu zyaciindi abuntu bwanu bukulukulu bubisizidwe azisusi zibi zyalweeno,
muleelede kubukuluka mumuuya wakuyeeya kwanu,
akulisamika buntu bupya bulengulwidwe mucinkozya ca-Leza cabululami acabusalali bwinibwini.
Nimwaba abukali, mutabisyi. Mutabbizyi izuba bukali bwanu.
Mutapi Saatani busena abuniini,
Mubbi atabbi limbi, pele asungwaale akubelesya maanza aakwe milimo mibotu, kuti ajane cakugwasya mweenzinyina uubulide.
Mutazwi ijwi ibi niliba lyomwe kumilomo yanu, pele amwaambe kuziindi zyoonse majwi aaelede aakonzya kuyaka, kuti boonse baswiilila bagwasigwe,
Alimwi mutapenzyi Muuya Uusalala wa-Leza, nguwenya ngumwakaandwa kujanza lyakwe mane kusikila kubuzuba bwalununuko.
Azizwe kulindinywe zintu ezi zyoonse—ndutiluti zili buti, alunyemo, abukali, amaambani, akutuka, alusulo loonse.
Amuusilane buuya, mukabe batete moyo, akuba aluzyalo lwakulekelelana milandu, mbubonya mbuli Leza mbwaakalekelela ndinywe muli-Kristo.
alimwi amweende cakuyandana, mbuli Kristo alakwe mbwaakayanda ndinywe akulyaa-bilila kuba cituuzyo acipaizyo cabweema bubotu nkaambo kesu.
Pele bwaamu amisyobo yoonse yabusofwaazi akulikumbuzya, zintu ezi tazyeelede nikuba kwaambwa akati kanu, nkaambo mbuboobo mbubeelede basalali.
Azyalo zisapi akwaamba bufubafuba akucapa, zyoonse tazili zibotu, pe, Cintu cibotu nkulumba Leza.
Nkaambo mulizi kuti taakwe sibwaamu nanka sibusofwaazi nanka sikulikumbuzya (ncintu comwe asikukomba mituni) uukonzya kuba alukono mu-Bwami bwa-Kristo abwa-Leza.
Mutanoovwelani ambabo,
nkaambo kuciindi cakamana mwakalyoofwede, pele sunu muligwemukididwe mu-Mwami. Amweende mbuli bana balugwemuko,
nkaambo micelo yalugwemuko mbobubotu boonse abululami alusinizyo.
Amusunkulule, kuti muzibisye zintu zibotezya Mwami.
Mutanooyanzani amilimo yabuyo yamumudima, pe, amwiiyubunune kumeso aabantu,
Nkaambo kulausya bweeme nikuba kwaamba milimo njibacita cakusisikizya.
Pele zintu zyoonse ziyubununwa amumuni kumeso aabantu zilaba atuba, nkaambo coonse cibika atuba mumuni.
Nkikaako ncikwaambwa kuti, Sinsimuka, nosikoona, ubuke kuzwa kubafu, nkabela Kristo uzookumunikila.
Amujatisye loko ciindi canu coonse, nkaambo kakuti mazuba aasunu mabi,
aboobo tamweelede kufubaala, muleelede kumvwisya mbulubede luyando lwa-Mwami.
Mutakolwi bukoko buleta budakwi, pele amuzule Muuya.
Amulayane lyoonse antembauzyo anyimbo zya-Leza amalelebu, akuya bwiimba akutembaula Mwami mumyoyo yanu,
alimwi zintu zyoonse zili buti amuzilumbe lyoonse kuli-Leza Taateesu muzina lya-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo,
akulibombya umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina cakulemeka Kristo.
Nkaambo mulumi ngumutwe wamukakwe, mbubonya mbuli Kristo mbwali mutwe wambungano, alimwi ngumuvuni wamubili.
Pele mbuli imbungano mbwiilibombya kuli-Kristo, abalo banakazi mbubonya baleelede kulibombya kubalumi babo muzintu zyoonse.
kuti aisalazye kukusanzya amaanzi kunguzu zyajwi lyakwe,
kuti imubede imbungano indemu iitakwe impu nanka kaimba nanka kantu kamwi kali boobo, isalale akutaba akampenda nikaba komwe.
Mbuboobo balumi mbubeelede kuyanda banakazi babo mbuli mibili yabo beni. Uuyanda mukaakwe waliyanda mwini.
Nkaambo taakwe muntu uusula mubili wakwe mwini, pe, ulausanina akuubamba kuti ubote. Mbubonya obo Mwami mbwacitila imbungano,
nkaambo tuli zizo zyamubili wakwe.
Mbuboobo mwaalumi mbweelede kusia wisi abanyina kuti akakatile kumukaakwe, nkabela aba bobile babe nyama yomwe,
Aya makani aasisidwe mapati, Ndaamba makani aa-Kristo ambungano.
Nekubaboobo mwaalumi umwi aumwi akati kanu ayande mukaakwe mbuli mbwaliyanda mwini, alakwe mwanakazi alemye mulumi wakwe.
Aka kapango kakuti, Lemya uso abanyoko, ngumulazyo mutaanzi uuyungizizigwa cisyomezyo.
Kulaambwa kuti, Ukale kabotu akupona ciindi cilamfu ansi.
Anywebo numawisi, mutanooluvukili bana banu, pele amubalele mulwiiyo lwa-Mwami amumilazyo yakwe.
itabi yakumeso aabantu buyo yakubotezya bantu. Amubeleke mbuli balanda ba-Kristu akupangika moyo kukucita luyando lwa-Leza,
kuti mulimo ube walulito lubotu mbuli mulimo uucitilwa Mwami, utabi mbuli mulimo uucitilwa bantu buyo.
Nkaambo mulizi kuti kufumbwa cintu cibotu ncacita muntu unoolumbulwa mbubonya ku-Mwami, nali muzike nali muzyale.
Anywebo nubami, amubacitile mbubonya, amuleke kubakanza, nkaambo mulizi kuti anywebo mulijisi Mwami uuli kujulu, nkabela kulinguwe takulangililwi ciwa camuntu pe.
Amusame zilwanyo zyoonse zya-Leza, kuti mukonzye kwiima mumeeneeno aa-Diabolosi.
Nkaambo inkondo njitulwa tiiensi yakulwana abantu balya maila, pe, niakulwana abeendelezi abami abasinguzu bamumudima waansi ano, tulalwana amyuuya yabubi iili mumyeenya yakujulu,
Nkikaako nkindaambila kuti amuzwate zilwanyo zyoonse zya-Leza, kuti mukakonzye kulwisya mubuzuba bubi, elyo yamana buyo inkondo yoonse muzooima nji.
Lino mbuboobo mbumweelede kwiima, Amulyaange kuzikungu lutambo lwalusinizyo akulisamika kucamba cikwabilizyo cabululami.
Zituta zyanu zibambwe kukusamikwa a-Makani Mabotu aaluumuno.
Kwiinda zyoonse amubweze intobo yalusyomo, njiyonya njimukonzya kuzimya mimvwi yoonse iipya iifuswa kumubi.
Alimwi amubweze ingoani yalufutuko, apanga lya-Muuya, nkukuti ijwi lya-Leza.
Amukombe lyoonse azikombyo ankumbizyo zyoonse zyamu-Muuya, Ee, amupangike myoyo yanu cabusungu kumakani aya, mukombele basalali boonse.
Ambebo amundikombele, kuti nkapegwe majwi, nkaasame amulomo wangu akuzibya kaanzambwene zintu zisisidwe zya-Makani Mabotu,
ngaonya makani ngindi ngambela uuangidwe anketani. Amukombe kuti ngaambe aya makani kaanzambwene mbubonya mbunjelede.
Nciconya eco ncindamutumina kulindinywe, kuti muzibe makani esu, alimwi ndasyoma kuti uzootontozya myoyo yanu.
Luumuno alube kubakwesu, aluyando alusyomo, kuzwa kuli-Leza Taateesu akuli-Jesu Kristo Mwami wesu.
Luzyalo alube kulimbabo boonse ibayanda Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo aluyando lwinilwini.
Luzyalo alube anywe, aluumuno kuzwa kuli-Leza Taateesu aku-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo.
nkabela muzikombyo zyangu zyoonse nzendi mukumukombela ndakomba cakukondwa
nkaambo kalugwasyanyo lwanu lwakugwasya Makani Mabotu kuzwa kubuzuba butaanzi akusikila sunu.
Moyo wangu ulisinizye cintu comwe, cakuti oyo iwakamusaangunina mulimo mubotu unooya buulondola mane kusikila kubuzuba bwa-Jesu Kristo.

Kuleelede kuti miyeeyo yanu njinjeeya ndinywe nyoonse ibe mbubonya obo, nkaambo mumoyo wangu nsikonzyi kuluba kuti, nimuba mubwaange bwangu nimuba mumilimo yakulungulula akusimpikizya Makani Mabotu, nyoonse muli basiluswaananoma kuluzyalo.
Leza ngukamboni wangu uuzi mbwemusukeme caluyandisyo lwamumoyo wa-Jesu Kristo.
Lino cintu ncenkomba nceeci cakuti luyando lwanu kaluciya buvula, antoomwe aluzibo alumvwisyo,
kuti musalulule zintu ziinda kubota, mube bantu benibeni batakwe mulandu mane kusikila kubuzuba bwa-Kristo,
akuzula micelo yabululami iizwa kuli-Jesu Kristo iileta bulemu alutembauzyo kuli-Leza.
Nkaambo bwaange bwangu mbwengangidwe nkaambo ka-Kristo bwaboneka moonse mnganda yabasimpi akumeso aabantu bamwi boonse,
nkabela banji akati kabakwesu bamu-Mwami, nibakabona bwaange bwangu, bakainda kuyumya myoyo yabo akuba akaanzambwene kakwaamba makani aa-Leza cakutayoowa.
Bamwi nconzyo balakambauka Kristo nkaambo kabbivwe ankondo,
pele bamwi balamukambauka camyoyo mibotu. Aba bacita caluyando, mbubezi kuti ndi mulomo wakwaambilila Makani Mabotu,
pele abo balakambauka Kristo cabbivwe cakutasinizya, mbubayeeya kuti bazoondikataazye kubwaange bwangu.
Ani nkutinzi? Nkukwaamba buyo kuti muziyanza zyoonse, nikuba kukuupaupa ameso nikuba kulusinizyo, Kristo ulakambaukwa, Lino nciceeci ncenkondelwa, nkabela noozooya bucikondelwa.
Nkaambo ndizi kuti aya makani alandetela luvuno nkaambo kazikombyo zyanu acaabilo ca-Muuya wa-Jesu Kristo ncindapegwa,

aboobo moyo wangu uladunamina akukulwiila kuti ntakafwisigwi bweeme mucintu niciba comwe, pele ndasyoma kuti kuciindi ecino, mbuli lyoonse, nkabe akaanzambwene kapati, kuti Kristo alemekwe mumubili wangu, nikuba kubuumi nikuba kulufu.
Pele na ncipona ansi ano, nkukwaamba kuti nzoojana micelo yamilimo yangu, aboobo ncenzoosala nsicizi pe.
Moyo wangu wakwelwa kobile, nkaambo njandisya kwiinka kuyookala nkwabede Kristo, ikuti ncibotu loko cakwiinda,
nekubaboobo kucikala ansi ano kuleelede nkaambo kandinywe.
Lino mbundamvwa obo, ndizi kuti noozoocipona ncobeni, noozoocikala anywe nyoonse, kuti muzookule akukondwa mulusyomo lwanu,
nkabela kuzoovula kutembaula kwanu nkumuti tembauzye Kristo Jesu nkaambo kandime nenti bweede kuba anywe.
Mutabayoowi nikuba buniini basinkondonyokwe. Kutayoowa kwanu ncicilaizyo kulimbabo cakunyonyooka, pele kulindinywe ncicilaizyo calufutuko lwanu luzwa kwa-Leza,
Nkaambo coolwe ncimupedwe nkaambo ka-Kristo taceensi cakuzuminina kulike, pe, mulipedwe akuciswa nkaambo kakwe,
ikuti muli ankondo eyo njiyonya njimwakabona mulindime, alimwi sunu mulamvwa kuti ncili ayo.
Lino na mulijene lugwasyo muli-Kristo, na muli aluyando lwakutontozya moyo, na mulipedwe caabilo ca-Muuya, alimwi na muli amyoyo yabuuya alweetelelo,
ndakumbila kuti mundipe olu lukondo luzulide lwakuziba kuti mulikede abuyanzane bomwe, akuyandana aluyandisyo lomwe, camoyo omwe acakuyeeya comwe.
Mutaciti cintu niciba comwe cabbivwe nanka cakulisumpula, pele umwi aumwi akati kanu alibombye mumoyo, akuyeeya kuti mweenzuma mubotu kwiinda ndime,
Tamweelede kuyeeya kuligwasya nubeni luzutu, pe, umwi aumwi uleelede kwiingasila kugwasya mweenzinyina.
Amube amoyo oyo nguwenya iwakali muli-Kristo Jesu,
Walo wakali aciimo ca-Leza, nekubaboobo teewakayeeya kuti ncivuumuko kweelana a-Leza, pe.
Wakalilonzya, wakalisalila ciimo cabuzike akuba mbubonya mbuli bantu balya maila.
Lino naakabonwa kuti waba acikozyano camuntu, wakalibombya akuzumina nikuba kufwa, nkukuti kufwa kwakubambulwa aciingano.
Nciceeco Leza ncaakamusumpula akumupa izina ibotu kwiinda mazina oonse,
kuti boonse bafugame mazwi cakulemeka izina lya-Jesu, nibaba baansi nibaba bakujulu nibaba bali kunsi anyika,
alimwi kuti indimi zyoonse zizumine kuti Jesu Kristo ngu-Mwami cakulemeka Leza Taateesu.
Nkaambo ngu-Leza uubeleka mumyoyo yanu, mbuli mbwayanda, akumupa inguzu zyoonse nzimubula niziba zyakukanza niziba zyakucita,
Zintu zyoonse nzimucita zitabi zyakutongooka nanka zyakukazyanya,
kuti mube bantu batakwe mulandu, bantu benibeni, bana ba-Leza baluzi batakwe kampenda, mukati kabantu bapilingene baleede bamuzukulu uno. Akati kabaaba mulaba mbuli mimuni yakumunika ansi.
Amujatisye ijwi lya-Leza, kuti nkamukankaizizye lyoonse mane do kusikila kubuzuba bwa-Kristo, akuziba kuti lusiyano ndunzuzaana amilimo njimbeleka tazyeensi zyabuyo.
Ncobeni nikuba kuti buumi bwangu bwatililwa acipaizyo calusyomo lwanu ncimutuulila Leza, nzookondwa akusekelezyanya anywe.
Anywebo muleelede kukondwa mbubonya akusekelezyanya ambe.
Pele ndalangila ku-Mwami Jesu kuti nzoofwambaana kumutumina Timoteo, kuti moyo wangu uzoobe alukondo lwakumvwa makani aanu.
Nkaambo taakwe umbi uuli amoyo mbuli nguwe uukonzya kumususunkana alususunkano lwinilwini.
Ikuti boonse buyo balayeeya kuligwasya beni luzutu, tabayeeyi makani aa-Kristo Jesu pe.
Pele mulibwene ziyanza zyakwe mbuzibede, mulizi kuti mbubonya mbuli mwana mbwabelekela wisi, alakwe wabelekela ndime cakugwasya milimo ya-Makani Mabotu.
Lino ngonguwe ngunjeeya kutuma, ndabona na makani aangu alaba buti,
Pele moyo wangu ulasyoma loko mu-Mwami kuti ambebo nzoofwambaana kusika ndemwini.
Nkaambo wakali kumusukamina nyoonse, alimwi wakalizumbide loko cakuziba kuti mulimvwide makani aakuciswa kwakwe.

Ncobeni wakali kuciswa loko, kali afwiifwi akufwa, pele Leza wakamufwida lweetelelo, nkabela teensi nguwe luzutu iwakeetelelwa pe, ndakeetelelwa ambebo, kuti entayungizizigwi aamwi mapenzi atala ayaayo ngenjisi kale.
Nciceeco ncindainda kusungwaala kumutuma, kuti mwazoomubona, alimwi muzookondwe, nkabela ambebo buusu bwangu bumane.
Lino amumutambule mu-Mwami cakukondwa, Muleelede kulemeka bantu bali mbuli nguwe,
ikuti wakali afwiifwi kufwa nkaambo kamilimo ya-Kristo, wakalitakata buumi bwakwe kuti azuzye eyo milimo yakugwasya ndime niimwakakacilwa nywebo.
Amucenjele babwa, Amucenjele basimilimo mibi. Amucenjele bayupempala,
Nkaambo basibupalule bwinibwini ndiswe, nitukomba Leza camu-Muuya akulikankaizizya Jesu Kristo akutasyoma makani aakumeso buyo,
Ncobeni nindakali kuyanda kusyoma makani aakumeso, nindakakonzya kucita obo. Na kuli muntu naba omwe uuyeeya kuti ulijisi cintu cakumeso cakulikankaizya, mebo ndamwiinda,
Ndakapalulwa mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu bwakuzyalwa, ndi wamusyobo waIsrayeli, ndi wamukowa wa-Benjamini, ndi mu-Hebrayo mwinimwini, nkabela kumakani aa-Mulao ndi mu-Farisi.
Ndakasungwaala mukupenzya imbungano yabana-Kristo, alimwi kumakani aabululami bwakuMulao taakwe ngundakabisya.

Ee, mbukabede Zintu zyoonse ndaziyeeya mbuli zintu zyabuyo nkaambo ka cintu eci ciinda loko kubota cakuziba Jesu Kristo Mwami wangu, Nkaambo kanguwe nkindakalekela zintu zyoonse, ndaziyeeya kuti masifwisifwi buyo mukuyanda kuti njane Kristo,
akuba awe mazuba oonse, Mulinguwe nsikonzyi kuba abululami bwangu ndemwini buzwa ku-Mui ao, pele ndili abululami buzwa kukusyoma Kristo, Mbubonya bululami bwa-Leza buzwa kulusyomo.
Njandisya kuziba Kristo anguzu zyabubuke bwakwe alumvwanano lwamaciswe aakwe, Njanda kuba mbubonya mbwaakabede mulufu lwakwe,
kuti ambweni ambebo njooba abubuke kuzwa kulufu.
Bakwesu, nsiyeeyi kuti ndicijene kale, pe, pele cintu comwe ncencita nceeci. Ndaziluba zintu zili musule, ndadunamina zintu zili kunembo,
aboobo nja bubindaanina kumagolelo, kuti nkajane bulumbu bwakujulu mbwatwiitila Leza muli-Kristo Jesu.
Lino mbuboobo mbutweelede kuyeeya toonse notubwene twaansi, nkabela na kuli cintu niciba comwe ncimuyeeyela bumbi, Leza ulamuyubunwida makani.
Pele kweenda kwesu kuleelede kuba mbubonya mbuli makani ngitubwene kale.
Nkaambo kweenda kwabanji, mbuli mbundakamulwiida kanjikanji, alino ndamulwiida cakulila, nkwakulwanya aciingano ca-Kristo.
Mamanino aabaaba ndunyonyooko, Leza wabo ndida, zintu zifwisya bweeme nzenzizyo nzibalikankaizizya, balayeeya zyaansi luzutu.
Pele iswe munzi wesu uli kujulu, nkukonya nkutulangila Mufutuli, nkukuti Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo.
Oyo uzoosandula mibili yesu iisampaukide, kuti ikozyanisigwe amubili wakwe mulemu. Eci cizooba nkaambo kanguzu zyayooyo uukonzya kumubombezezya zintu zyoonse.
Ndamukumbila Euodiya, alakwe Suntuke ndamukumbila, kuti babe aluyanzano lomwe mu-Mwami.
Ayebo sijokoma musyomesi, ubagwasye aba banakazi, nkaambo twakali kulwa abo munkondo ya-Makani Mabotu, antoomwe a-Klemento abasimilimoma bamwi bali amazina aalembedwe mubbuku lyabuumi.
Butontozi bwanu abuzibwe kubantu boonse, Mwami uli munkombe,
Mutalibilikili cintu niciba comwe, pele muzintu zyoonse amupangike myoyo yanu kukukomba akukukombelezya cakulumba, kuti inkumbizyo zyanu zizibisigwe kuli-Leza,
elyo luumuno lwa-Leza lwiinda miyeeyo yoonse yabantu luyooyaminina myoyo yanu amiyeeyo yanu muli-Kristo Jesu.
Zintu zyoonse nzimwakaiya nanka kutambula nanka kumvwa nanka kubona kulindime, amuzicite, elyo luumuno lwa-Leza lulaba anywe.
Lino ndalumba loko Mwami nkaambo kakuti mwabukulusya miyeeyo yanu yakugwasya ndime. Ndizi kuti mwakali kundiyeeya lyoonse, pele mwakabula ciindi cibotu cakucita miyeeyo yanu,
Teensi kwaamba kuti mbulide cintu, pe, nkaambo ndicibwene kulibamba kabotu kufumbwa kubusena nkumbede.
Ndikuzi kulifwiinsya, ndikuzi kulivubya, Koonse koonse amuziyanza zyoonse ndiiyide kupona kabotu, nimuba mukukuta nimuba mukufwa inzala, nimuba mukulivubya nimuba mukulitengwaanya.
Zintu zyoonse buyo ndazikonzya nkaambo kanguzu nzimpedwe kuliKristo.
Nekubaboobo mwakacita kabotu nimwakandaabila zyakuligwasya kuciindi camapenzi aangu.

Mulizi nubeni, nywebo nuba-Filipi, kuti niyakatalika milimo ya-Makani Mabotu, ciindi ncindakazwa ku-Makedoniya, katakwe imbungano imbi niitwakali kwaabilana ayo mumakani aakupa akutambula, cita inywe luzutu.
Nkaambo nikuba kuciindi ncendakali mu-Tesalonika, mwakanditumina lomwe-pe, mwakanditumina kobilecakundigwasya kuzintu nzindakabulide,
Teensi zipo nzenjanda pe, pele ndayanda kubona kuti nkwiili micelo minji yakubotya makani aanu.

Lino ndijisi zintu zyoonse nzimbulide-pe, zilainda, Ndizulide mbuntambwide kumaanza aa-Epafrodita zintu nzimwakanditumina, Zipo zyanu ncituuzyo cabweema bubotu, ncipaizyo citambulika cakubotezya Leza.
Lino Leza wangu ulamuzulizizya zyoonse nzimubula anywebo kuzwa kubuvubi bwakwe bulemu buli muli-Kristo Jesu.
Akube bulemu kuli-Leza Taateesu lyoonse alyoonse kukabe kutamani, Ameni.
Amujuzye basalali boonse bali muli-Kristo Jesu, Balamujuzya bakwesu mbotuli abo.
Basalali boonse balamujuzya, pele kwaambisya abo bali muŋanda ya-Kaisara.
Luzyalo lwa-Mwami Jesu Kristo alube amyoyo yanu.
Tulamujuzya nywebo noba­ salali abakwesu basyomesi bamuli-Kristo nomuli ku-Kolose. Amube aluzyalo aluumuno kuzwa kuli-Leza Taateesu.
nkaambo tulimvwide makani aalusyomo lwanu ndumusyomya Jesu Kristo aluyando lwanu ndumuyandya basalali boonse,
nkaambo kabulangizi mbumuyobwedwa kujulu, Obu bulangizi mulibumvwide kale kuciindi ncimwakakambaukilwa lusinizyo lwa-Makani Mabotu,

Aya makani akasika kulindinywe mbuli mbwaasika kunyika yoonse, nkabela koonse koonse alaya buzyala micelo akuya buvula mbubonya mbwaakacita kulindinywe kuzwa kubuzuba obo mbumwakasaanguna kwaamvwa akuziba cakusinizya luzyalo lwa-Leza.
Makani aaluzyalo olu mwakaaiya kuli­-Epafra muzikema, uusyomeka kukucita milimo ya-Kristo nkaambo kandinywe,
nguwenya wakatutondezya makani aaluyando lwanu lwamuMuuya.
kuti mweende munzila iielede cakubotezya Mwami muziyanza zyoonse, muzyale micelo yamilimo mibotu yamisyobo yoonse akuya bukomena lyoonse mumakani aakuziba Leza,
Tulakumbila kuti mbuli inguzu zyakwe mbuzilemekeka, anywebo muyumisigwe mbubonya akuba abuyumu bunji bwakukakatila abwakukazika myoyo yanu abwakukondelelwa.
Amukalumbe Taateesu nkaambo wakatucita kuti tweelelwe kuba acaabilo calukono lwabasalali bali mumumuni.
Mumwanaakwe oyo mutujene lununuko abulekelelo bwazibi.
Ngonguwe cikozyano ca-Leza uutabonwi, mutaanzi kuzyalwa kuzilenge zyoonse,
nkaambo mulinguwe muzyakalengwa zintu zyoonse, zyamujulu azyaansi, zintu zibonwa azitabonwi, zyuuno zyabwami, bami, beendelezi abasinguzu, zyoonse buyo zyakalengwa anguwe kuti zibe zyakwe.
Ngumutaanzi wazintu zyoonse, nkabela mulinguwe zintu zyoonse muzijatene.
Nkaambo cintu ncaakayanda Leza nceeci cakuti bu-Leza buzulide bukale mulinguwe.
Alimwi wakabeleka kujanza lyakwe kukuliyanzanisizya zintu zyoonse, niziba zyaansi niziba zyakujulu, akucitya luumuno abulowa bwaciingano cakwe.
Wamuyanzanya kukufwa mumubili wakwe uufwika, kuti amwiimikizye kubusyu bwakwe cakusalala acakubula kampenda acakutaba amulandu,

nkukuti na mwakakatila akubombomana bombolo mulusyomo, akutazungaana kuzwa kubulangizi bwa-Makani Mabotu ngimumvwide, Ngaonya makani aakakambaukilwa bantu boonse baansi ano, nkabela ambebo nde-Paulo ngindakapegwa bufundisi.
Mebo ndi similimo wambungano eyo, nkaambo kakuti eyi milimo ndakaibikilwa a-Leza nkaambo kanu, kuti nkalungulule makani oonse aa-Leza,
makani aayubide aakasisidwe muciindi camizukulu yakalekale, pele sunu aliyubunwide kubasalali,
Kulibaaba Leza wakayanda kuyubununa mbububede buvubi bulemu bwamakani aya akati kabamasi. Makani ngaaya aakuti Kristo uli mukati kanu, alimwi ngonguwe bulangizi bwabulemu.
Nguwenya ngutukambauka swebo, mbutuli mukulungulwida bantu boonse akwiisya bantu boonse cabusongo bunji, kuti tubaimikizye boonse kubusyu bwa-Kristo cakulondoka.
Nciconya eco ncimbelekela akusolekesya mbuli inguzu zyakwe mbuzibelekesya loko mukati kangu.
Njanda kuti muzibe mbwaabede masuzubo ngindi ao nkaambo kanu akaambo kabakwesu bali ku-Laodikeya abaabo ibatana kundibona kumeso aanyama,
Ndayandisya kuti myoyo yabo isimizigwe, babe alukamantano lwakuyandana akuba alulamo luzwa kukumvwisya makani, bazibisye makani aasisidwe aa-Leza, nkukuti Kristo.
Mulinguwe muzisisidwe imbono zyoonse zyamaanu azyaluzibo.
Aya makani ngendaamba ngakuti kutabi muntu naba omwe uukonzya kumweena amajwi aakumuyunga,
nkaambo ndi kule mumubili, nekubaboobo moyo wangu nkuuli nkukonya nkumubede, nkabela ndakondwa kukubona mbumubambide kabotu buumi bwanu ambumusungide lusyomo lwanu ndumusyomya Kristo.
Miyanda yanu imusimpye, kamuciya buyakwa mulinguwe, amuliyumye mumakani aalusyomo mbuli mbumwakaiisigwa, mufwasuke kulumba.
Nkaambo muliKristo mubukede bu-Leza boonse buzulide camubili,
nkabela mulinguwe mumonya mumuzulizidwe inywe, alimwi ngonguwe simutwe waboonse basinguzu abasibwami.
Mulinguwe mwakapalulwa bupalule butali bwamaanza aabantu, butali bwakukoswedwa nyama kumubili, mwakapalulwa bupalule bwinibwini bwa-Kristo.
Mwakazikwa awe mulubapatizyo lwanu, alimwi mwakabusigwa awe nkaambo kakusyoma inguzu zyayooyo iwakamubusya kuzwa kulufu.
wakazizyanya yoonse milumbe iigwedwe amaboko iyakali kutuminya, wakaisangaula yoonse akwiibambula aciingano cakwe,
Abalo basinguzu abasibwami wakabasamununa, wakabafwisya insoni kumeso aabantu, wakabazundya kunguzu zyaciingano.
Nkaambo ezi zintu zyoonse ncimvule buyo cazintu ziciza, pele mubili wini ngu-Kristo.
Kutabi muntu uumuunina mbuli mbwayanda mumakani aakulibombya akukomba baangelo, akwaamba cakulibosezya azilengano zyamumoyo wakwe akulisumpula kumiyeeyo yakwe yanyama,
pele tajatene a-Mutwe. Kunsi kulinguwo mubili woonse, mbuulungene mungo amumilambi nzyuubambilidwe, ulakula abukule bwa-Leza.
zyakuti, Utagumi cintu, nanka Utalabili, nunka Utaampi.
Ezi zyoonse nzezyazintu ziti maninine zyabelesegwa buyo, nkabela zitondo zili boobu zilazwa kumilao akunjiisyo zyabantu.
Zilaambwa kuti nzyabusongo, mbuzili zyakulikombya beni akulibombya akulivulunganya mumubili, nekubaboobo tazijisi milimo yakutulesya kuzuminina zisusi zibi zyamyoyo yesu.
Amupangike myoyo yanu kuzintu zili kujulu, mutaipangiki kuzintu zyaansi pe.
Nkaambo mwakafwa, nkabela buumi bwanu bulisisidwe antoomwe a-Kristo muli-Leza.
Elyo Kristo nazooboneka, oyu mbubuumi bwesu, lino anywebo muzooboneka awe mubulemu,
Nkikaambo kazintu ezi nkibuzida bukali bwa-Leza kubana batamvwi.
Akati kabaaba mpomwakali kweendela anywebo kalekale nimwakacili kupona mukati kazintu ezi,
Pele sunu muleelede kuzileka zyoonse. Amuleke bukali, lunyemo, inkoyeko, kusanka, azisapi zizwa mukanwa.
Mutaambilani cakubeja, pe, nkaambo mulisamunwide buntu bukulukulu amilimo yambubo,
mulisamide buntu bupya bulengulwidwe caluzibo mbuli cikozyano cayooyo iwakabulenga.

Mubulenge obu bupya taakwe mu-Helene nanka mu-Juda, taakwe mupalule nanka silulomo, taakwe uubwelebweza, taakwe mu-Skuti, taakwe muzike nanka muzyale, pele Kristo alike nguuliwo, nguukede muzintu zyoonse.
Amukazikilane myoyo yanu akulekelelana, na umwi ulijisi kaambo kumweenzinyina. Mbuli Mwami mbwaakamulekelela milandu yanu, anywebo amucite mbubonya obo.
Nkabela kwiinda zyoonse amube aluyandano, ikuti luyandano ncecaanzyo cabuumi bulondokede.
Alimwi luumuno lwa-Leza alweendelezye mumyoyo yanu, ndulonya luumuno ndumwakaitilwa kuba zizo zyamubili omwe, Amube amyoyo yakulumba.
Makani aa-Kristo abe mbuli buvubi bukalilila mumyoyo yanu. Amwiisyanye akucenjezyanya cabusongo bunji antembauzyo anyimbo zya-Leza amalelebu, akuya bwiimba lyoonse cakulumba Leza mumyoyo yanu.
Nkabela zintu zyoonse nzimucita, nikuba kukwaamba nikuba kuncito, amuzicite zyoonse muzina lyaMwami Jesu akulumba Leza Taateesu mulinguwe.
Anywebo nubalumi, amuyandisye banakazi banu, mutanoobagutaiki.
Banike amuswiilile bazyali banu mumakani oonse, nkaambo kucita obo nkokubotezya Mwami.
Anywebo numawisi, mutanoonyenukili bana banu, kuti batanoosululwi.
Nubalanda, amumvwe basimalelo banu baansi kuzintu zyoonse nzibamulailila. Milimo yanu itabi yakumeso buyo yakubotezya bantu, ibe yamoyo omwe cakulemeka Mwami.
Kufumbwa cintu ncimucita, milimo yanu ibe yamoyo woonse, ibe mbuli milimo iicitilwa Mwami, itabi yakubelekela bantu buyo pe.
Nkaambo mulizi kuti ku-Mwami nkomuzootambula bulumbu, nkukuti lukono lwanu. Muli bazike ba-Mwami Kristo.
Nkaambo kufumbwa muntu uucita zitaluleme, ulabweedezezegwa kutalulama kwakwe, nkabela kuli-Leza takulangililwi ciwa camuntu pe.
Nkabela amutukombele aswebo, kuti Leza atujulile mulyango wakukambauka ijwi lya-Leza, kuti twaambe makani aa-Kristo, ngaonya ngingangilidwe,
Amukombe kuti nkaalungululisye kabotu mbubonya mbunjelede.
Amucenjele kuti ibe yabusongo inzila njimweenda abaabo butali basimbungano baKristo, alimwi amucibelesye loko ciindi canu coonse.
Kwaamba kwanu kulweezegwe amunyo wakulumba, kuti mube abusongo bwakutyaba kabotu kubantu boonse bamubuzya makani,
Nciconya eco ncindamutumina kuzoomuswaya, kuti amuzibye mbutubede akutontozya myoyo yanu.
Baleenda a-Onesimo, mukwesu musyomesi uuyandika, nguumwi wabakwanu nubeni. Aba bobile balamwaambila makani oonse aali okuno.
Barnaba, (Mulitambwide kale mulazyo wakuti, asika oyo, mumususunkanine),
alakwe Jesu uutegwa Justo. Aba botatwe mbombabo balike akati kabasibupalule mbutubeleka abo milimo ya-Bwami bwa-Leza. Mbibanduumbulizizya moyo,

Ulamujuzya Epafra, nguumwi wakulindinywe, ngumuzike wa-Kristo Jesu. Ulazumba lyoonse munkombyo zyakwe nkaambo kanu, cakukomba kuti mwiime nji mbuli balondokede akulamwa mbuzibede zintu zyoonse nzyayanda Leza,
Nkaambo ndibwene ndemwini busungu bwakwe mbwasungwaalila ndinywe abaku-Laodikeya abaku-Herapoli.
Ulamujuzya Luka, musiliki uuyandika, alakwe Dema.
Amujuzye bakwesu boonse bali ku-Laedikeya, a-Numfa ambungano iibungana muŋanda yakwe.
Lugwalo olu nolwamana buyo kubalwa kulindinywe, amucite kuti lubalwe akwalo kumbungano yabaku-Laodikeya, nkabela anywebo mukabale lugwalo ndundakatuma ku-Laodikeya.
Amwaambile Arkipo kuti, Langa kabotu eyo milimo njotambwide kumaanza aa-Mwami, uizuzye.
mbotuyeeya cakutaleka milimo yanu yalusyomo akubeleka kwanu kwaluyando akukakatila kwabulangizi mbumulangila Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo kumeso aa-Leza Taateesu,
Akaka nobakwesu bayandwa kuli-Leza, tulizi kuti mwakasalwa,

nkaambo Makani Mabotu ngitukambauka naakasika kulindinywe, tecakasika amajwi alike pe, akeza anguzu a-Muuya Uusalala akulamwa kunji kwamumoyo, Mulizi nobeni mbutwakabede nkaambo kandinywe nitwakakede akati kanu,
Nkabela mwakaba batobeli bandiswe aba-Mwami, mwakatambula Makani akati kamapenzi manjimanji akubotelwa kwa-Muuya Uusalala,
aboobo mwakaba zyeezyanisyo kubasyomi boonse bamu-Makedoniya abamu-Akaya.

Nkaambo kuzwa kulindinywe makani aa-Mwami akaya impuwo koonse koonse, nkabela takweensi kwaamba ku-Makedoniya aku-Akaya luzutu, pele muzisi zyoonse lusyomo lwanu lwakuli-Leza lwakaba ampuwo. Lino swebo tatweelede akulwaamba,
ikuti bantu beni balatwaambila kuswaya kwesu kulindinywe mbokwakabede, ambomwakafutatila mizimo akulanga kuli­-Leza, kuti mukombe Leza uupona mwinimwini,
akulindila kuboola kwa-Mwanaakwe kuzwa kujulu, ngwaakabusya kulufu, ngonguwe Jesu uutuvuna kubukali buza,
Nokuba kuti twakapenzegwa kale akucitilwa bubi ku-Filipi, mbomuziba, twakaba akaanzambwene muli-Leza wesu kumwaambila Makani Mabotu aa-Leza akati kankondo zinjizinji.
Nkaambo kukombelezya kwesu takuli kwakubeja nanka kwabubi nanka kwakweena-ena,
pe, pele mbuli mbotwakasunkwa kuli-Leza akusyomenwa milimo ya-Makani Mabotu, tulaamba mbubonya, Tatubotezyi bantu, pe, tulabotezya Leza, nguwenya uusunka myoyo yesu.
Ikuti tatukwe notwakaamba majwi aakutembaulatembaula (mulizi obo), nanka kuba abuliinsyo bwakulikumbuzya (Leza ngukamboni wesu kumakani aya),
alimwi tatukwe notwakaliyandawida bulemu kubantu, nokuba kulindinywe nokuba kulibamwi (nokuba kuti twakalikweelede kulibika bulemu ambuli baapostolo ba-Kristo).
Twakaba batete myoyo akati kanu, mbuli uunyonsya mbwabukata bana bakwe mwini.
Lino mbuli mbotwakali kumusukamina, cintu ncitwakali kuyanda kumwaabila kaciteensi Makani aa-Leza luzutu pele amyoyo yesu tubeni, nkaambo mwakali bayandwi besu,
Mulaibulukwa, bakwesu, milimo yesu amaminwa esu, ikuti eco ciindi ncitwakali kumukambaukila Makani aa-Leza, twakali kubeleka lyoonse, isikati amasiku, kuti tutalemeni muntu naba omwe akati kanu,
Muli bakamboni, alakwe Leza ngukamboni, mbotwakalicita cakusalala acakululama acakutaba akaambo kulindinywe nobasyomi,
Mulizi kuti twakamucitila umwi aumwi mbuli wisi mbwacitila bana bakwe. Twakali kumukombelezya akumusenengezya akumulungulwida,
kuti mweende munzila iielede kumeso aa-Leza iwakamwiitila bulemu bwakwe abwami bwakwe.
Nkaambo nywebo, nobakwesu, mwakaba abatobela imbungano zya-Leza zyamu-Judaya mwa-Jesu Kristo, ikuti mwakapenzegwa kulibasimusyobonyokwe mbubonya mbuli mbobakapenzegwa abalo kuba-Juda,
Aba ba-Juda bakajaya Mwami Jesu abasinsimi, alimwi bakatutanda aswebo. Tababotezyi Leza, pe, balakazyanya abantu boonse,
nkabela balatucelezya kwaambila bamasi makani aalufutuko, aboobo balazuzya zibi zyabo. Pele basikilwa bukali bwakuya kumamanino.
Nkabela twakakanza kuboola kuzoomuswaya, mebo nde-Paulo ndakakanza lomwe, pe, tobile, pele Saatani wakatukasya.
Nkaambo ninzi bulangizi bwesu alukondo lwesu amusini wesu wakulikankaizizya kubusyu bwa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo kukuboola kwakwe? Sa teensi ndinywe na?
Ii mbokubede, ndinywe bulemu bwesu alukondo lwesu.
twakatuma Timoteo mukwesu, similimo wa-Leza wamu­ Makani Mabotu aa-Kristo, kuti azoomuyumye akumukombelezya mumakani aalusyomo lwanu,
kuti kutabi uuzungaanizigwa kumapenzi aya. Nkaambo mulizi nobeni kuti twakabikilwa nkuko.
Ncobeni notwakali anywe twakamwaambila kuti tuleelede kuba amapenzi, nkabela kwaba boobo, mbomuziba.
Nkaambo kaako mebo nendakakacilwa kucilemenwa obo, ndakatumina kuziba lusyomo lwanu, antela sikutepaula ulimutepawide, aboobo milimo yesu yaba yabuyo.
Lino sunu, bakwesu, tuliyumizidwe anguzu mubuusu bwesu amukupenga kwesu nkaambo kalusyomo lwanu.
Tulapona ncobeni mbotwamvwa kuti muliimvwi nji mu-Mwami.
Lino tuyoolumba buti kuli-Leza aandinywe acoolwe coonse ncotubotelwa nkaambo kanu kubusyu bwa-Leza wesu?
Tulakombesya lyoonse, isikati amasiku, kuti tukabonane ameso, nkalulamike cibula kulusyomo lwanu.
Leza Taateesu mwini a-Mwami wesu Jesu batululamike munzila yakuza kulindinywe.
Mwami amuvuzizye akumufwasusya luyando lwakuyandana alwakuyanda bantu boonse, mbubonya mbuli luyando lwesu ndotuyandisya ndinywe,
kuti ayumye myoyo yanu, itazoobi akaambo mukusalala kumeso aa-Leza Taateesu kuciindi ncati boole Mwami wesu Jesu antoomwe abasalali bakwe.
Mulizi milazyo njotwakamupa iizwa kuMwami Jesu,
Cintu ncayanda Leza nceeci, ncakuti musalale, mulilesye kubwaamu.
Umwi aumwi akati kanu uleelede kuziba kuba amwanakazi wakwe mwini cakusalala acakulemeka,
Teelede kumvwa zisusi zibi mbuli mbobacita bamasi abatamuzi Leza.
Teelede kusotoka nanka kweemuzya kumweenzinyina kumakani aya, nkaambo Leza nguubweedezya kumakani aya oonse, mbubonya mbotwakamwaambila kale akumulungulwida.
Teensi busofwaazi mbwaakatwiitila Leza, pe, nkukusalala.
Nkaambo kaako oyo uunenya kumakani aya tanenyi muntu buyo, ulanenya Leza uumupa Muuya wakwe Uusalala.
nkabela ncobeni muli aluyando kulibabunyina boonse abali mu-Make doniya moonse, pele tulamukombelezya bakwesu, kuti kamuciya buvula mulindulo.
Alimwi amusungwaalile kukala caluumuno, akulilangilila makani aanu nobeni, akumana milimo kumaanza aanu mbuli mbotwakamulailila,
kuti mukacite ziyanza zibotu kumeso aabaabo bali anze akutabula kantu.
Nkaambo na tulasyoma kuti Jesu wakafwa akubukuluka, elyo abo abakoona muli-Jesu Leza ulabaletelezya awe.
Ijwi di ndituti mwaambile lyazwa ku-Mwami. Swebo tobaumi netuyoosyaalila kukuboola kwa-Mwami tatukooyoobasaanguni na aboona, pe.
Nkaambo Mwami mwini uyooseluka kuzwa kujulu amukunga ajwi lyaangelo simutwe amweembo wa-Leza, nkabela nobayoosaangu na kubuka abafwide muli-Kristo.
Elyo swebo tobaumi tobasyaalizi tuyoobwezelwa mumakumbi antoomwe ambabo, tukacingane a-Mwami mujulu aboobo tuyookala a-Mwami lyoonse.
Amugwasyanye amajwi aya.
nkaambo nywebo nobeni mulizi kabotu kuti buzuba bwa-Mwami buleza mbwasika uubba masiku.
Nobanoozoocili mukwaamba kuti, Kwatontola, kwaliiba, elyo muciindi eco nciconya lunyonyooko luzoofwambaana kubasikila mbuli insungo mbozisikila uumisi, nkabela tabakooyooloboka pe.
Pele nywebo nobakwesu tamuli mumudima, kuti buzuba obo bukamusikile mbuli uubba, pe,
nkaambo nyoonse muli bana bamumuni abana basikati, Tatuli bamasiku nanka bamudima.
Nkaambo kaako tutanooni mbuli bantu bamwi, atukalinde, tube bapakamani.
Ikuti aboona boona masiku, abalo abakolwa bakolwa masiku,
pele swebo mbotuli besikati atube bapakamani, tulisamike kucamba cikwabilizyo calusyomo aluyando, alimwi olo lufutuko ndotulangila lube ingoani yesu.
Nkaambo Leza tutakanzili bukali pe, ulakanza kuti tuvube lufutuko luzwa ku-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo,
nguwenya wakatufwida, kuti notulanga nanka notoona, tukapone antoomwe anguwe.
Nkaambo kaako kamuciya bugwasyanya akuyakana, umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina, mbubonya mbomucita.
Amukabalemekesye loko acaluyando nkaambo kamilimo yabo. Amukalane aluumuno.
Alimwi tulamukombelezya nobakwesu, kuti mubacenjezye bapilingene, mubaumbulizye batyompedwe mumyoyo, mubatabe bakompeme, amube acamba cilemu kubantu boonse,
Amubone kuti kutabi uubweedezya cibi kucibi, pele lyoonse kamuya buyandaula kucita kabotu, naaba akati kanu nobeni nikuba kubantu boonse,
Amusekelele lyoonse,
Amukombe cakutaleka,
Amube amyoyo iilumba kuzintu zyoonse, nkaambo nciconya eco bukanze bwa-Leza mbwaamukanzila muli-Jesu Kristo.
Mutazimyi Muuya.
Mutanenyi masinsimi.
Amukasunke zintu zyoonse mbuzibede, kuti mujatisye zibotu,
akulilesya kuzibi zyamisyobo yoonse.
Oyo uwakamwiita ngomusyomesi, ulacita mbubonya obo.
Ndamukonkezya ku-Mwami kuti lugwalo oluno lubalilwe bakwesu boonse.
Luzyalo lwa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo alube anywe. Ameni,
Amube alu­ zyalo aluumuno kuzwa kuli-Leza Taateesu aku-Mwami Jesu Kristo.
Ncotwalilumbaizya aandinywe swebo tobeni mumbungano zyoonse zyaLeza. Tulalumba nkaambo kakukakatila kwanu alusyomo lwanu akati kamafwabi aanu oonse amapenzi ngomupenzegwa.
Aya alatondezya kubeteka kwa-Leza kululeme, uuyanda kuti mukeelezegwe mbuli beeledwe Bwami bwa-Leza mbomupengela,
nkaambo kakuti kumeso aa-Leza kuliluleme kubweedezya mapenzi kulibaabo abamupenzya,
pele nywebo nomupenzegwa uyoomupa kulyookezya, antoomwe aswebo, kuciindi cakuyubunuka kwa-Mwami Jesu kuzwa kujulu. Uyooyubunuka antoomwe abaangelo bakwe basinguzu,
abbalabala lyamulilo, nkabela uyoobwedezya muliyano kulibaabo abatamuzi Leza akutaswiilila Makani Mabotu aa-Mwami wesu Jesu.
Aba bayoobetekelwa lunyonyooko lutamani kuzwa kubusyu bwa-Mwami akubulemu bwanguzu zyakwe,
kuciindi ncazoosika kuzoolemekwa kubasalali bakwe akulumbaizigwa kuliboonse basyoma (nkaambo bukamboni bwesu bwakasyomwa kulindinywe) kubuzuba obo.
Akube obo kuti izina lya-Mwami wesu Jesu likalemezegwe mulindinywe, anywebo mulemezegwe mulinguwe, nkaambo kaluzyalo lwa-Leza wesu alwa-Mwami Jesu Kristo.
kuti mutafwambi kuzungaana kumyoyo yanu, alimwi mutayoosegwi, nokuba kumuuya nokuba kujwi nokuba kulugwalo lubaanga luzwa kulindiswe, cakuyeeya kuti buzuba bwa-Mwami buliswenede kale.
Kutabi muntu uumweena kufumbwa muciyanza cili buti, nkaambo tabukooyoosika cita lukasaangune kuba luleyo, alimwi uyooyubunuka muntu mubi, mwana walunyonyooko.
Oyu ngusinkondonyina Leza, uulisumpula ajulu lyazyoonse zyaambwa Leza na zikombwa, waba uukala muntempele ya-Leza, walyaamba kuti, Ndime Leza.
Sa tamwiibulukwi mbuli mbundakamwaambila aya makani nendakacili anywe?
Lino mulicizi cintu cimukasya kuti atayubunuke nocitana kusika ciindi cakwe ceelede.
Nkaambo Makani aasisidwe aakusotoka milao alacita-cita kale, pele taakonzyi kuzukulika mane do akagwisigwe oyo uukasya,
elyo nayooyubununwa sikusotoka milao, ngwayoonyonyoona Mwami Jesu a-Muuya wamulomo wakwe, akumulobya akulibonya kwakuboola kwakwe.
Uyooza alweeno loonse lwabubi lwakweena baabo abali mukunyonyooka, nkaambo teebakayanda kutambula lusinizyo lwakubafutula,
aboobo Leza wabatumina kucita-cita kwalweeno, kuti basyome kububeji.
Mbuboobo mbubazoobetekwa boonse abakaka kusyoma lusinizyo, abalibotezya kumakani aataluleme.
Nciconya eco ncaakamwiitila kunguzu zya-Makani Mabotu esu, kuti muvube bulemu buzwa ku-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo.
Nkaambo kaako, nobakwesu, amwiime nji, mujatisye milao njomwakaiisigwa­, nokuba kumilomo nokuba kulugwalo lwesu,
elyo walo Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo, a-Leza Taateesu, uwakatuyanda akutupa luumbulizyo lutamani abulangizi bubotu,
aumbulizye myoyo yanu caluzyalo akumuyumya mumakani oonse mabotu, naaba aakucita naaba aakwaamba.
alimwi amukombe kuti tukavunwe kubantu abakaleya akubabi, nkaambo teensi boonse abali alusyomo pe.
Mwami nguusyomeka, nkabela nguwe nguuti muyumye akumukwabilila kumubi.
Alimwi tulasyoma ndinywe mu-Mwami, tulasyoma kuti mulacita akunooya bucita nzotwamulailila.
Lino Mwami aenzye myoyo yanu, injile muluyando lwa-Leza amulukakatilo lwa-Kristo.
Nkaambo nywebo nobeni mulizi mbomweelede kututobela, ikuti nitwakakede kulindinywe ziyanza zyesu teezyakapilingene pe.
Taakwe nitwakali kulya buyo insima zya bantu, pele twakali kubeleka akoonda milimo lyoonse, isikati amasiku, kuti tutalemeni muntu naba omwe akati kanu,
Takweensi kwaamba kuti tatujisi bwami bwakucitilwa obo, pele nkokuti tulicite ceelesyo canu, kuti mukatutobele.
Nkaambo notwakacili akati kanu twakamupa mulazyo oyu wakuti, Na kuli uukaka kubeleka, atabi nalya.
Anukuti tulaswiilila kuti nkubali bamwi akati kanu beenda cakupilingana. Tabamani milimo, pe, pele mbasyandyaabantu.
Lino bantu bali boobo twabalailila akubakombelezya mu-Mwami Jesu Kristo, kuti babeleke milimo yabo caluumuno, balye insima zyabo beni,
Na mpali muntu uutaswiilili makani ngotwalemba mulugwalo oluno, amumusale, mutavwelani awe, kuti ause bweeme,
Nokubaboobo mutamuciti mbuli sinkondonyoko, amumucenjezye mbuli mweenzinyoko.
Luzyalo lwa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo alube anywe nyoonse.
Ndakujuzya Timoteo, mwanaangu mwinimwini wamulusyomo, Ube aluzyalo alweetelelo aluumuno, zizwa kuli-Leza Taateesu akuli-Kristo Jesu Mwami wesu.

kuti bataswiilili zyamankwangwaalizya nituba tunsiyansiya twamazyalani-zyalani, nkaambo aya makani alaleta inkazyanyo buyo, taakonzyi kuyaka lusyomo lwesu lwakusyoma Leza, Lino asunu ndakulailila mbubonya.
Anu calo cintu ciyandwa nduyandano luzwa mumoyo uusalala amukweezeezya kubotu amulusyomo lwinilwini.
Nokuboobo bamwi bazileka zintu ezi zinizini, bagama zimbi zyabuyo,
Balayandisya kuba baiyi bamulao, anu tabacimvwi ancobaamba neciba ceeco ncobasinizya, pe.
Eno swebo tulizi kuti Mulao mubotu kumuntu uubamba kabotu,
kufumbwa anooyeeya kuti mulao tuucitilwi muntu uuluzi, ulacitilwa basigama abantu bapilingene, basikasampusampu abasizibi, basofweede abantu bataluzi, basikujaya bamawisi abamanyina, abajaya bantu,
basibwaamu abasikoona baaluminyina, basimuvupu ababeji abasikukonka cakubeja, abaabo bacita zintu zimwi zili boobo zitayanzene alwiisyo lubotu,
mbubonya mbuli Makani Mabotu aabulemu bwa-Leza uuli acoolwe, ngendakasyomezezegwa mebo.
Kuciindi cakamana ndakali sikasankusanku asikakomokomo asikazundozundo, nekuboobo ndakafwidwa luzyalo nkaambo teendakazi ncendakali kucita cakutazumina.
Eno luzyalo lwa-Mwami wesu lwakavula nkavulila, antoomwe alusyomo aluyandano lwamuli-Kristo Jesu.
Ijwi linilini litambulika loko ndeeli lyakuti, Kristo Jesu wakaboola ansi ano kuzoofutula bacitazibi. Lino mebo ndi sizibi kwiinda boonse,
nekuboobo ndakafwidwa luzyalo kuti Jesu Kristo abonye busicamba bwakwe boonse mulindime, kuti cibe cileezyo kulibaabo boonse baciza kukuzoomusyoma akujana buumi butamani.
Eno ku-Mwami mupati uutamani walyoonse, uutabonwa, Leza uuiide alike, akube bulemu akwaalaala lyoonse alyoonse kukabe kutamani. Ameni.
Kojatisya lusyomo ameezeezyo mabotu, ngobayumbila ambali bamwi, lino basweeka kulusyomo mbubonya mbuli bwaato ubwaloba.
Bamwi babaabo mbaaba, ba-Humenayo a-Alesandro, mbendakaaba kuli-Saatani, kuti baiye kutasampaula limbi Leza.
Amukombele bami abaabo boonse bali mubwami, kuti buumi bwesu bube bwaluumuno akutontola, tukale kabotu akulemeka Leza,
Eci ncibotu akutambulika kuli-Leza Mufutuli wesu,
uuyandisya kuti bantu boonse bafutulwe akuboola kuluzibo lwakuziba lusinizyo.
Nkaambo kuliide Leza omwe luzutu, alimwi kuli sikuyanzanya omwe uuli akati ka-Leza abantu, ngumuntu Kristo Jesu,
uwakalisanga mwini kuti anunune bantu boonse, Eci ncecintu cilyaamba cini muciindi caco.
Kumakani aya ngendakabikilwa bukambausi abuapositolo (ncobeni ndasinizya, nsibeji pe) akuba mwiiyi wabamasi mubuzumino bwini.
Eno obo ndayanda kuti baalumi kabanga kabakomba koonse koonse, kabagamine kunyamuna maboko aasalala, kakutakwe bukali akuzwangana.

Mbubonya obo abalo bakaintu kabanga kabasama cakulibombya mbubonya mbokweelede, babe aciwa cibotu. Lusakatilo ndobalisakatizya talweelede kuba lwakupesa masusu akusama ingolida neziba ingale naaba malogwe aaulwa mali manjimanji,
luleelede kuba lwakusama milimo mibotu, mbubonya mbobeelede bakaintu bana-Leza,
Mukaintu kanga kafunda cakulibatamika akuba kunsi kumulao.
Nsikonzyi kuzuminina mukaintu kwiisya nokuba kumulangila amutwe mwaalumi, pele kanga kaumwine buyo wii.
Nkaambo Adamu nguwakasaanguna kulengwa, munsi nkokuya kulengwa Eva.
Nkabela Adamu taakwe naakeenwa, pe, mukaintu nguwakeenwa, elyo aenwe boobo, wakaba mucitazibi.
Nekuboobo kuti bakujatisya kusyoma kwabo akuyandana akusalala akulibamba, uyoofutulwa kuciindi ncayootumbuka bana.

Lino bishopo uleelede kuba muntu uuta­ kwe kampenda, uugaminina mwanakazi omwe luzutu. Uleelede kuba muntu uusitikide, uulibatamika, uutakwe kancimwa, uuyobolola beenzu, akuba amaanu aakufundisya kabotu.
Teelede kuba mukolwi akukazyanya akuuma, pe, uleelede kuba mutontozi, alimwi atabi mundwane, nanka simuyandamali.
Abe muntu uubeenzya kabotu boonse bamuŋanda yakwe, uuiisya bana bakwe mbokulibambwa mukukala kabotu,
(nkaambo na muntu tajisi maanu aakubamba kabotu iŋanda yakwe mwini, ino inga ulakonzya buti kubamba makani aambungano ya-Leza?)
oyo muntu teelede kuba simbungano mupya, nkaambo awalo mwaya bulisumpwida mbokungo awalo uyoowida muzibi mbuli Saatani.
Alimwi uleelede kuba muntu uuli ampuwo imbotu kulibaabo bali anze, kuti abule abutongo mbobamwaamba, alimwi kuti atacegwi mukooze ka-Saatani,
pele kabajatisya makani aasisidwe aaluzumino camoyo uusalala ngwa,
Eno aba abasaangune kulangililwa mbobacita, elyo banjile mumulimo wabudaikona na takukwe butongo kulimbabo.
Abalo bakaintu abalome, batanoonga kabatamizya bamwi twaambo, kabagamine kulibatamika akusyomeka muzintu zyoonse,
Badaikona kabagamine kukwata mukaintu omwe luzutu, kababalela kabotu bana babo akubamba maanda aabo kabotu kabotu.
Nkaambo abo abakamana mulimo wabudaikona kabotu balalijanina bwaalu bubotu, elyo kulabula ancobayoowa mukusyoma kwabo kuli muli-Kristo Jesu.
Ndakulembela makani aya, alo nekuboobo ndilasyoma kuzookuswaya taakoovula amazuba.
Na ndilamuka kuboola, ngoonya aya makani alakutondezya mbobeelede kukala bantu muŋanda ya-Leza, eyo iŋanda njembungano ya-Leza muumi, ngomusemu, alimwi ncecisiko calusinizyo.
Ncobeni takukwe uukonzya kukazya kuti makani aasisidwe aabukombi mapati loko.
Oyo uwakabonwa mumubili wabuntu,
Uwakalondomezegwa mumuuya,
Uwakabonwa kubaangelo,
Uli amakani mabotu aakakambaukwa kumasi oonse,
Uwakazuminwa ansi ano,
Uwakatanta kujulu mubulemu.
nkaambo kakuupaupa ameso kwabantu baamba twakubeja, bali amyoyo iyakalembwa mbuli mbwiilemba insimbi ipya,
bakasya bantunyina kukwatana, akulesya kulya zilyo, nzyaakaanza Leza kuti kazinga kaziligwa buyo cakulumba kulibaabo basyoma akuziba bwini.
Nkaambo zyoonse nzyaakaanza Leza nzibotu, takukwe ceelede kukakwa, anooli catambulwa akulumba,
nkaambo inga casalazigwa kujwi lya-Leza akukukomba,
Kuti wabayeezya banabunyina makani aya, noti be simulimo mubotu wa-Kristo Jesu, uulelwa mumajwi aabuzumino aalwiisyo lubotu olo ndocilide mane kusikila sunu.
Konga kokaka makani aatali mabotu, aali mbuli bufubafuba bwamacembele. Kogamine kunyanyaala kukukomba,
nkaambo kunyanyaala kwamubili kulagwasya buniini, anu kwala kukomba kulagwasya muziyanza zyoonse, nkaambo kulijisi cisyomezyo casunu acaciindi ciciza.
Ijwi linilini litambulika loko ndeeli lyakuti,
Eno ncencico eci ncotoondela­ mulimo akulwanina, nkaambo myoyo yesu ilalangila Leza Muumi, Mufutuli wabantu boonse, kwiindilila ngwabaabo bazumina.
Kolailila akufundisya makani aya.
Kutabi uubaula bwanike bwako, pele ube ciilizyo cabaabo bazumina, mukwaamba amukweenda amukuyandana amukusyoma amukusalala.
Sungwaala kukubala akukukambauka akukufundisya, mane ndisike.
Utaleki kubelesya eco caabilo caluzyalo cikukalide mukati, ncowakapegwa kumajwi aabasinsimi, nowakabikwa maanza kubaalu bambungano.
Sungwaala kuzintu ezi, ulitakate kulinzizyo amoyo wako woonse, kuti bantu boonse babone mboya bukomena mumilimo yako.
Alimwi kolibonena omwini akufundisya kwako, Koujisi azintu ezi, utaleki pe, nkaambo wanoocita bobuya, inga ulalifutula omwini, abalo bakumvwa ulabafutula.
amacembele mbuli manyokwe, abanakalindu mbuli bacizi bako, camoyo uusalala.
Kobalemeka bamukabafu kuti ncobeni mbamukabafu benibeni.
Pele kuti umwi mukamufu kajisi bana na bazukulu, elyo kusaanguna aba abafunde kulemeka basazinyina akutontomeka baabo abakabazyala, nkaambo eci ncecikonda Leza,
Eno mukamufu mwinimwini uwakasyaala mubuumba ulasyoma kuli-Leza, ulajatisya lyoonse inkumbizyo ankombyo isikati amasiku,
Pele mukaintu sikambotwembotwe, nacipona wati wakafwa kale.
Eno konga kobaambila makani aya, kuti babule ampobatopwa.
Na muntu tabambi basazinyina, kwaambisya bamuŋanda yakwe, wati oyo ulisowede lusyomo lwakwe, ulaindilila akuliyooyo uutazumina.
Mukaintu woonse uutanasika kumyaaka iili makumi aali musanu muumwi, atanoolembwi kuti ngumukamufu. Ulakonzya kulembwa anooli taakwe naakakwetwe kumbi mbwaakafwida mwaalumi akwe,
kuti na walumbaizizigwa milimo mibotu kuti na wakakomezya bana, kuti na wali kusamausya beenzu, kuti na wali kusanzya maulu aabasalali, akugwasya bapengede, akuya bucita milimo mibotu yoonse,
Pele kulibamukabafu bacili bana, konga kokaka kuti pe. Nkaambo kuyanda kwabo kwayononoka buyo kuzwa kuli-Kristo, mpoonya balayeeya kale kukwatwa,
elyo balajana mulandu, nkaambo baleka lusyomo lwabo lwakusaanguna.
Mpoonya balazibila kuba batolo, balaba basiindwa-kabila, alimwi tabakooba batolo buyo pe, pele balaba bamalabali abasikangundengunde baamba ziteelede.
nkaambo mpobali kale abakasandukila kuli-Saatani.
Kuti kakuli mukaintu muzumini uuli amukowa wabamukabafu, kanga kabagwasya, kuti imbungano italemenwi kukugwasya bantu bali boobo, igwasye bamukabafu benibeni.
Nkaambo mumagwalo­ kulaambwa kuti, Utamwaangi kumulomo musune uulyataula maila, Alimwi kulaambwa kuti, Similimo uleelede kujana cilumbyo cakwe,
Abo abacitazibi konga kobakalalila antangalala kuti boonse bayoowele mpawo.
Utanoofwambaana kubika muntu maanza, alimwi utanoolivwela kuzibi zyabamwi. Kolibamba akubula butongo.
Utanoonga konywa maanzi alike, pe, pele konywa atuwaini twakugwasya mwida, kuti mubili wako ujane inguzu, nkaambo tobukili bulo.
Zibi zyabamwi bantu zilalibonya, zyabazolwedela kale kuya kukubetekwa, anu bamwi, zibi zyabo ziya musule lyabo.
Mbubonya obo, ayalo milimo mibotu imwi ilalibonya, nkabela eyo iitali boobo tiikonzyi kuyuba lyoonse.
Alimwi abo bali abasimalelo aabo basyoma, batanoobasampauli nkaambo mbanabakwabo, pele kabaindilizya kubamanina milimo, nkaambo abo mbobabelekela milimo mbasyomi, alimwi mbayandwa.
Aya konga koafundisya akwaakombelezya.
Kwanooli muntu uufundisya bumbi, kufundisya kutajanene amakani aaelede ngaakaamba Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo alwiisyo lwabukombi bwinibwini,
oyo walisumpula taakwe ncazi. Moyo wakwe uli abulwazi bwakuyandisya ibuzyanyo ankondo zyamajwi, nkokuzwida ibbivwe, alukazyanyo, amajwi aakusampaula, akweezeezya kubi,
akulwana kwabantu bali amiyeeyo mibi akutaba alusinizyo. Aba bayeeya kuti kukomba ncecintu cijanya lubono.
nkaambo takukwe ncotwakaleta ansi ano nociba ncotukonzya kutolelela nkuko,
aboobo kufumbwa twanoojisi cakulya acakulivumba, nciconya eco mbubo ncinji,
Pele abo bayandisya kuvuba balawida mukutepaulwa amukuteegwa amuzisusi zibi zinji zyabufubafuba zibisizya buumi akubbizya bantu mukunyonyauka amukusweeka.
Nkaambo kuyandisya lubono ngomuyanda wabubi boonse, eno nkaambo kakuluyandisya bamwi ncobaleela kulusyomo, elyo zyabajaya insoni zinjizinji.
Yasana lumamba lubotu lwalusyomo, jatisya buumi butagoli, mbowakaitilwa, niwakalilungulula lulilungululo lubotu kubusyu bwabantu boonse.
Ndakulailila kubusyu bwa-Leza, uupa buumi kuzintu zyoonse, akubusyu bwa-Kristo Jesu, uwakalyaamba lulilungululo lubotu kunembo lya-Pontiyo Pilato,
kuti uyobole aya makani ngowalaililwa, cakubula impu nanka kampenda, mane do kubuzuba mbwayoopompa Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo.
Oko kupompa kuyooba kuciindi ceelede, nkaambo uyookuleta Singuzu uutembaulika, uuiide alike, Mwami wabami, Mweendelezi wabeendelezi,
uupona amuyamyaaka, uukede mumumuni uutavulwa afwaafwi, uutanabwene nokuba kukonzeka kubonwa kumuntu. Abe abulemu anguzu zitamani. Ameni.
Kobalailila kuti bacite milimo iiluzi, kuti babe bavubi mukumana milimo mibotu, kuti kabafwamba kupa akwaabilana abeenzinyina.
Kabaliyobweda intalisyo imbotu yaciindi ciza, kuti bajatisye buumi bwinibwini.
ndobaamba bamwi kuti tuli alo, anu balileede kulusyomo.
Amube aluzyalo.
Ndime Paulo, nendakasungulwa kubukanze bwa-Leza kuba apostolo wa-Kristo Jesu wakukambauka makani aabuumi mbotusyomezegwa buli muli-Kristo Jesu,
Ndakujuzya Timoteo, mwanaangu ngwenjanda. Ube aluzyalo alweetelelo aluumuno kuzwa kuli-Leza Taateesu a-Kristo Jesu Mwami wesu.
Kufumbwa nindayeeya misozi yako, moyo wangu ulasukama kukubona, kuti nkazule lukondo,
nkaambo nsikonzyi kuluba lusyomo lwako lwinilwini. Olo lusyomo lwakasaanguna kukala muli-Loidi banyookulu bako amuliEunike banyoko, nkabela moyo wangu ulisinizizye kuti moluli amulinduwe mbubonya.
Nkakaambo ako ncendakuyeezya kuti uleelede kubukulusya eco caabilo caluzyalo lwa-Leza lukukalide mukati, ncowakatambula kuciindi ncendakakubika maanza.
Nkaambo Leza takatupede muuya wabukandu, pe, wakatupa muuya wanguzu awakuyandana awakulibamba.

uwakatufutula akutwiita akwiitwa kusalala. Takweensi kwaamba kuti twakaitwa nkaambo kamilimo njotwakacita, pe, twakaitwa nkaambo kabukanze bwakwe mwini akaambo kaluzyalo lwakwe. Olo luzyalo twakalupegwa kalekale muli-Kristo Jesu,
pele sunu lwalibonya mukupompa kwa-Mufutuli wesu Krisro Jesu, nguwenya wakazoolobya lufu akuyubulula buumi butafwiki kunguzu zya-Makani Mabotu.
Ngaonya makani ngendakabikilwa bukambausi abuapostolo abwiiyi.

Ncencico eco neempengela bobuya, nekubaboobo nsyuusi insoni, pe, nkaambo ndilimuzi oyo ngwensyoma, nkabela moyo wangu ulisinizizye kuti walo ulakonzya kuyobola ncendabika mumaanza aakwe mane kusikila kubuzuba obo.
Cintu eco cibotu ncowakapegwa, kocibamba kabotu kunguzu zya-Muuya Uusalala uutukalilide mukati.
Mwami abafwide luzyalo bana-Onesiforo, nkaambo kanjikanji wandibukulusizya moyo, nkabela taakwe anaakali kuusa insoni kunsimbi zyangu nzendakaangidwe,
pele naakali mu-Roma, wakasungwaala kundiyandaula, limwi mane wandijana.
(Mwami amujanye coolwe ca-Mwami kubuzuba obo). Ayalo milimo yoonse njaakandibelekela ku-Efese, ulizi kale yebo omwini.
Eno obe, mwanaangu, ube singuzu muluzyalo luli muli-Kristo Jesu,
Eno oonse ngowakamvwa kulindime kumeso aabakamboni banjibanji, ayo koabika kubantu basyomesi abangambela balakonzya kuyoofundisya beenzinyina.
