Kogamine kuba mupenzima mbuli silumamba mubotu wa-Kristo Jesu.
Takukwe silumamba uuli munkondo uutabanganina makani aabuumi obuno pe, kuti akonde yooyo uwakamuniizya mulumamba.
Alimwi kuti muntu wabeelela mweenzinyina mukusiana, takonzyi kusamikwa ingala atalomya milao yakusiana.
Muntu uulima mumuunda nguuelede kusaanguna kooloka.
Koayeeya aya ngendakwaambila, nkaambo Mwami ulakupa maanu kumakani oonse.
ngempengela bobuya, kuya bwaangwaangwa mbuli sinunzuunzu, pele makani aa-Leza taangidwe pe.
Eno ncenzumbaanina bobuya nkaambo kabaabo basalidwe, kuti bakajane lufutuko muli-Kristo Jesu abulemu butamani.
Ijwi linilini ndeeli lyakuti;
Na twafwa awe, tuyoopona awe mbubonya.
Kuti twamutama, aswebo uyootutama mbubonya.
Kolisungwaazya kukonda Leza, mbuli simulimo uutakwe cintu cimuusya insoni, uupandulula makani aalusinizyo mbukweelede.
Pele majwi aabuyo aakasankusanku koaenguluka, nkaambo banooya bwiindilila kubija,
nkabela majwi aabo alavwemauka mbuli cuute. Bamwi babo mbaa-Humenayo a-Fileto,
aba mbantu baleede kubwini, nkaambo balaamba kuti bubuke bwabafu bwakaba kale, aboobo balanyonyonganya lusyomo lwabamwi.
Lino muŋanda impati tamujanwa mitiba yangolida ayansiliva ilike, pe, anu mulajanwa yazisamu ayabulongo, nkabela imwi nja bulemu pele imwi tiikwe bulemu,
Eno kuti muntu walisalazya kuliyeeyi, inga ulabaanga mutiba wabulemu, uusalazidwe, uuelede kubelesegwa kulimukamwini, uubambilidwe kumilimo mibotu yoonse.
Pele kozikaka iŋomboombo zyabufubafuba kudubbwadubbwa, nkaambo ulizi kuti nzezileta inkondo,
Anu muna-Mwami teelede kulwana pe, uleelede kuba mutete moyo kubantu boonse, uulibambilide kufundisya, akubosya moyo.
Uleelede kujokolola camoyo mubombe akweenzya baabo bakazya makani, kuti antela Leza ulabapa lweempo lwakuziba lusinizyo,
alimwi kuti balisungunune mukooze ka-Saatani, mbobali baange bamuna-Mwami kuluyando lwa-Leza.
Nkaambo bantu bayooba basikuliyanda, basimuyanda mali, basima­ ntumbwaambwa, basikakomokomo, basikasankusanku, batamvwi bamawisi, batalumbi, batakombi,
basikancimwa, basimfundiilili, abasiluvuya lwakutaminizya, batalyeendeleli, basitunyetunyetu, batayandi bubotu,
basimusuzyanya, basikainya, basikulisumpula, bayandisya misalo yaansi kwiinda Leza,
balijisi ciwa cabukombi pele inguzu zyambubo balazikazya. Eno kobafutatila bali bobuya.
Nkaambo bamwi babo mbabasobelela mumaanda, akuya bujata bakaintu bafubafuba balemenwe zibi, beenzegwa azisusi zyamisyobo misyobo.
Lyoonse balafunda, pele balakacilwa kusika kukuziba lusinizyo.
Pele kutaciya kunembo, nkaambo bufubafuba bwabo bulabonwa kubantu boonse, mbubonya mbobwakabede bwabaabo.
Pele yebo ulitobelede ndime mulwiisyo lwangu amumyeendo yangu amumakanze aangu, mulusyomo amukukazika moyo amukuyandana amulukakatilo,
mukupenzegwa amukuciswa, muzintu ezyo izyakandisikila ku-Antiokeya aku-Ikoniya aku-Lustro. Akakomena mapenzi ngindakalemenwa, pele Mwami wakandinununa kuliyaaya oonse.
Ee, ncobeni boonse abo bayanda kupona cakululama muli-Kristo Jesu mbobayoopenzegwa,
pele balo bantu babi abasikulibeja balainda anka kubija, banooena akweenwa.
alimwi ulizi kuti kuzwa kuciindi niwakacili mwana ulyeezi magwalo aasalala aakonzya kukusongwaazya mukufutulwa kulusyomo luli muli-Kristo Jesu,
Magwalo aya oonse akazwa kuli-Leza, alikondede kukufundisya akukulaya, akukuolola akukupandulula makani aabululami,
kuti muna-Leza alibambe, azulile kukumana milimo mibotu yoonse.
kuti ukambauke Makani lyoonse. Koajatisya muciindi ceelede aciteelede. Sungwaala kulaya akutapatila akukombelezya. Kokazikisya loko moyo mukwiisya kwako.
Nkaambo ciindi cilasika ncobati kaleke kuzumina kufundisya kwinikwini, eno bayoogama kulijanina bafundisi bali mbuli kuyanda kwamyoyo yabo beni, kuti babotelwe kubamvwa.
Bayoosinka matwi aabo kumakani menimeni, bakagame kuswiilila zyamankwangwaalizya,
Pele yebo kolibamba kuzintu zyoonse, kofwabalika, kosungwaalila milimo yabukambausi, kokondezesya mulimo ngowakapegwa.
Ndakalwana inkondo imbotu, ndakalumana lweendo, alimwi ndakalubamba lusyomo.
Eno icasyaala ncakuuyobwedwa musini wabululami, ngwati kandipe kubuzuba obo Mwami, mubetesi uuluzi, pele nsili ndime endike, pele boonse abo bayanda kuyubuluka kwakwe.
nkaambo Dema wandisowa, nkaambo kakuyanda zintu zyaansi ano. Wakaya ku-Tesalonika, awalo Kresko wakaya ku-Galatiya, a-Tito ku-Dalimatiya,
Luka alike ngotuli awe, Muletelele Marko, muze awe, nkaambo ulandigwasya mumulimo wa-Leza.
Pele Tukiko ndakamutuma ku-Efeso.
Alimwi cibaki ncendakaluba kuli-Karpo ku-Trowa kociletelela waboola, amabuku, kwaambisya mapepa,
Eno ayebo komucenjelela, nkaambo wakali kulwanya kufundisya kwesu.
Pele Mwami ngowakandiiminina akundipa inguzu, kuti mulindime oonse aakambaukwa akondele, kuti masi oonse amvwe. Eno ndakavunwa kumeno aandavu.
Mwami ulandivuna kububi boonse; ulandipa lufutuko mubwami bwakwe bwakujulu. Kulinguwe kube bulemu lyoonse alyoonse kukabe kutamani. Ameni.
Erasto wakasyaala ku-Korinto, alakwe Trofimo ngundakasia ulaciswa mu-Melita.
Sungwaala kuboola okuno, nuutanasika mweto. Eubolo ulakujuzya, a-Pude, a-Lino, a-Klaudiya, ababunyina boonse.
Mwami abe amuuya wako. Luzyalo alube anywe.
Ndime Paulo, ndemuzike wa-Leza, nde apostolo wa-Jesu Kristo wakuyaka lusyomo lwabasalwa ba-Leza aluzibo lwinilwini lujanene akukomba,
Ndalangila buumi butamani, mbwaakasyomezya Leza, uutabeji, kalekale kakutana kuba ciindi,
eno kuciindi cakwe ncaakalisalila wakayubununa makani aakwe mukukambauka oku nkundakasyomezegwa mebo kumaanza aa-Leza Mufutuli wesu.
Ndakujuzya Tito, mwanaangu mwinimwini silusyomoma. Ube aluzyalo aluumuno luzwa kuli-Leza Taateesu akuliJesu Kristo Mufutuli wesu.
Nkakaambo ako ncendakakusiila mu-Krete, kuti umanizye kubamba oonse makani, akusala baalu muminzi yoonse, mbubonya mbundakakulailila,
kufumbwa nkojana muntu uutakwe butongo, uugaminide mwanakazi omwe luzutu, alimwi kajisi bana bazumina, batajisi mulandu wabudakwi nokuba kutaba bana batalabulaye.

Nkaambo bishopo uleelede kuba muntu uutakwe butongo, mbali mubanzi wa-Leza. Atabi sikazundozundo, nokuba kuba sikanyetunyetu, nokuba kuba mukolwi na kuyandisya kulwana, nokuba kuunya kulubono lwaansi ano.
Uleelede kuba sicimwa beenzu, uuyandisya kululama, uulibatamika, uuluzi, uutakwe kampenda, sikulyeendelezya,
alimwi abe sikujatisya makani aasyomeka aayeme kulwiisyo lwesu, kuti akonzye kukombelezya beenzinyina kulwiisyo lwinilwini, alimwi azunde basikukazyanya.
Nkaambo mpobali banjibanji bantu batalabalaya, baamba majwi aabuyo aakweena, kwaambisya abo basikupalulwa.
Aba mbabeelede kuti milomo yabo isinkwe, nkaambo batubinganya maanda aabamwi kukufundisya zintu ziteelede nkaambo kakuunya kulubono lwaansi.
Umwi musinsimi wabo beni wakati, Lyoonse bantu ba-Krete mbasikubeja, mbabi mbuli banyama, alimwi mbasindya batolo.
Makani aya ngakusinizya. Nkaambo kaako ubatapatile canguzu, kuti bakale kabotu mulusyomo,
bataswiilili zyamankwangwaalizya aa-Bujuda amilao yabantu baleede kumakani menimeni.
Kubantu basalala zyoonse zintu zilasalala, pele kubantu basofweede abatazumini takukwe cintu niciba comwe cisalala, nkaambo kuyeeya kwabo amyoyo yabo zyoonse zilisofweede.
Balalyaamba kuti, Tulizi Leza, anu kumilimo yabo balamukazya. Mbasesemyi, batamvwi, bateeledwe milimo mibotu nuuba omwe.
Baalumi bapati babe basitikide, balilemeke akulibatamika, babe bayumu mukusyoma amukuyandana amukukakatila.
Abalo bakaintu bapati mbubonya, babe aziwa zyabulemu, batanootamikizya, nokuba kwiindilizya kunywa imbote, pele babe bafundisi babululami,
kuti bafundisye bakaintu bacili bana kuyanda balumi babo akuyanda bana babo,
balibatamike, akusalala, akukutauka kabotu mumaanda aabo, kabasamauka, akumvwa balumi babo, kuti makani aa-Leza atasampaulwi.
Abalo baalumi bacili bana mbubonya, ubalaye kuti basitikile muziyanza zyoonse.
Webo omwini uleelede kuba citondezyo cabo cakoonda milimo mibotu. Kwiisya kwako kube kwalusinizyo akwabulemu,
alimwi majwi ngoamba abote, atabikiki mulandu, kuti oyo uukazya makani ngotwaamba ause, abule bubi mbwataamba.
Alimwi baambilisye bazike kuti kabalitesya kulibasimalelo aabo muzintu zyoonse, kababakonda, batanoounduluzya,
batanookuma-kuma zintu zitali zyabo, pele kabalitondezya calusyomo lubotu loko, kuti balemeke muziyanza zyoonse lwiisyo lwa-Leza Mufutuli wesu.
Nkaambo luzyalo lwa-Leza luleta lufutuko lwaboneka kubantu boonse,
kuzootwiisya kuti tuleelede kukazya kasampusampu azisusi zibi zyaansi ano, tuleelede kukala cakulibatamika acakululama acakulemeka Leza muciindi ecino casunu,
akulindila eco coolwe ncotulangila, nkokuti kupompa kwabulemu kwa-Leza wesu mupati, Mufutuli wesu Jesu Kristo,
nguwenya wakalyaaba nkaambo kesu, kuti atununune kuzibi zyoonse akulisalazizya bantu kuba banakwakwe, balisanga kumana milimo mibotu,
Batanoosampaula muntu pe, batabi bandwane, pele ababe batontozi, akuba babombe-moyo kubantu boonse.
Pele nibwakapompa buuya bwa-Leza Mufutuli wesu, aluyando lwakwe ndwayandisya bantu,
teensi kwaamba kuti nkaambo kamilimo yabululami njotwakacita swebo, pele nkaambo kalweetelelo lwakwe mwini, ncakatufutula, kukusanzigwa kwakakuzyalwa kwabili akubuumi bupya buzwa ku-Muuya Uusalala,
ngwaakatufonkweda muli-Jesu Kristo Mufutuli wesu,
kuti tululamikwe kuluzyalo lwakwe akuba basikukona balangila buumi butamani.
Ijwi linilini ndeeli, nkabela njanda kuti yebo uliyumye kuliyaaya, kuti boonse abo basyomekede kuli-Leza bajatisye milimo mibotu. Makani mabotu, alagwasya kubantu.
Pele twaŋomboombo atwaambo twamazyalani aamikowa akuzwangana akuoombolozya mui ao, kozienguluka, nkaambo ezi tazikwe ancezigwasya, nzyabuyo.
Muntu uukazya, kosaanguna kumulaya lutaanzi alwabili, elyo na tamvwi umusosoloke,
nkaambo ulizi kuti oyo muntu uuli boobo ulisweekede, alimwi ngosizibi, walibeteka mwini.
Alimwi ba-Zena, simulao, a-Apolo, ubayumbe-yumbe cabusungu mulweendo lwabo, kuti kubule ncobabula.
Alimwi bantu besu baleelede kufunda kusungwaala kumilimo mibotu yakuligwasya kuzintu ziyandika, kuti batabi bantu batazyali micelo pe.
Boonse mbotuli abo balakujuzya, Ubajuzye abo batuyanda calusyomo.
Luzyalo alube anywe nyoonse.
a-Apiya mucizi wesu, a-Arkipo silumambama, ambungano iibungana muŋanda yako.
Luzyalo alube anywe aluumuno luzwa kuliLeza Taateesu akuli-Jesu Kristo Mwami,
Ndalumba Leza wangu lyoonse ningambilizya nduwe muzikombyo zyangu,
mbundi mukumvwa luyando lwako alusyomo ndojisi kuli-Jesu Mwami akubasalali boonse.
Ndakomba kuti luswanaano lwalusyomo lwako lucite kuti bazibe cakubonesya mbububede bubotu boonse mbutujene muli-Kristo.
Nkaambo ndijene kukondwa kupati akuumbulizigwa kuluyando lwako, mukwesu, myoyo yabasalali mbuyakatalukwa mulinduwe.
Lino nenjanda ndakonzya kukulailila cabukozu kucita cintu ciluzi,
nekubaboobo wence ndakukombelela buyo caluyando, mbondi Paulo munene, alimwi sunu ndi mwaange nkaambo ka-Kristo Jesu.
Ndakukombelela wence nkaambo kamwanaangu ngundalizyalila nencili muntolongo. Ngu-Onesimo.
Ciindi cakamana katakwe mulimo kulinduwe, pele sunu uli amulimo kulinduwe akulindime.
Ndamuboozya kulinduwe, ngooyu, nekuba kuti ngumoyo wangu loko.
Ndakayanda kumulondola afwiifwi ambe, kuti andimanine milimo mumwenya wako ciindi ncencili mwaange nkaambo ka-Makani Mabotu,
pele taakwe ncenkonzya kucita kutali kuti uwe wazumina, kuti kucita kwako kubotu kutabi kwakusinikizigwa, akube kwakulita.
Ambweni nciceeco ncaakacija kulinduwe kaindi kaniini, kuti uzoomutambule abe wako lyoonse,
atacinoobi mbuli muzike buyo, ainde mubuzike, abe munyoko muyandwi. Ncobeni ulayandwa kulindime, nkabela ulayandwa loko kulinduwe, muziyanza zyoonse zyobile, ambuli muntu ambuli mu-Mwami.
Lino kuti kondijisi mbuli mweenzinyokwe, mutambule ubaanga utambula ndime.
Na wakakubisizya nanka ulijisi cikoloto cako, bika ndime mumwenya wakwe.
Ndime Paulo, ndagwala obu ajanza lyangu ndemwini, nzookuliya. Nsikwaambila ano kuti uwe ulandicenekela cakwiinda abwalo buumi bwako.
Mbubo mukwesu, nkondezegwe kwako mu-Mwami, katalusya moyo wangu muliKristo.
Ndakugwalila mbundasyoma kuti ulandiswiilila, nkabela ndizi kuti uzoocitisya kwiinda mbundaamba.
Alimwi ukandibambile ciyusilo, nkaambo ndakulwiila kuti nzoobweedezegwe kulindinywe nkaambo kazikombyo zyanu,
abalo ba-Marko a-Aristarko a-Dema a-Luka basimilimoma.
Luzyalo lwa-Mwami Jesu Kristo alube amoyo wanu.
Kuciindi cakalekale Leza wakaambila bamatata mubasinsimi ubucebuce akuziyanza zinjizinji,
pele kumamanino, sunu, cino ciindi watwaa­ mbila mu-Mwanaakwe, ngwaakasala kuti abe ngomukamwini wazintu zyoonse, alimwi kulinguwe wakaanza zintu zyoonse.

Walo, mbwali nguumwesya bulemu bwa-Leza, alimwi nguwenya ncecizibyo icizibya mbwabede Leza, nguuyumya zintu zyoonse kujwi lyakwe lili anguzu, naakamana kulituula kuti abe cituuzyo cakusalazya bantu kuzibi, wakaakukala kujulu kululyo lwacuuno ca-Leza cabupati.
Wakaba uuinda baangelo, mbubonya izina lyakwe ndyajisi mboliinda mazina aabo,
Nkaambo ino ndelili Leza naakaambide kuli-angelo umwi kuti,
Yebo nduwe Mwanaangu, Sunu ndakuzyala?
alimwi kuti,
Mebo ndilaba Wisi uwakamuzyala,
Walo ulaba Mwanaangu?
Abalo baangelo boonse ba-Leza kabayoomukomba.
Baangelo bakwe nguubacita myuuwo,
Abalo basimilimo bakwe wabacita mabangabanga aamulilo.
Cuuno cabupati bwako, Leza, ncalyoonse lyoonse,
Akalo kasako kabwami bwako bupati nkasako kakululama kwinikwini
Yebo uyandisya kululama, pele butongo tobuyandi, ulibusulide,
Aboobo Leza, Leza wako, wakunanika mafuta aali ecoolwe iciinda cabeenzinyoko.
Yebo O Mwami, nduwe wakatalika kwaanza nyika kumasokelo,
Elyalo ijulu njemilimo yamaanza aako.
Lyalo ijulu liyooloba, anu yebo pe, tokwe ankoya.
Liyookulumpala mbuli zyakusama.
Uyoolivunga mbukuvungwa cibaki,
Ii nkasimpe, mbubonya mbuli zyakusama, mpoonya ziyoosanduka akusanduka,
Pele yebo unooli mbubonya, Ayalo myaaka yako tiikooyoogola.
Kala kujanza lyangu lyalulyo,
Mane basinkondonyoko ndikabacite kuti babe njemitandabilo yamatende aako?
Aboobo tuleelede kukakatila kumakani ngotwamvwa, mbokunga tulainkila mukavwimbili,
Nkaambo na makani aaka am bwa mubaangelo akalisinizizye, na kusotoka koonse akuunduluzya kwakabweedezegwa mbobweelede,
ino swebo tulayokoka buti, twanoobausya kufutuka ukukungulukide kulindiswe? Oku kufutuka kwakasaangunwa kwaambwa Mwami mwini, kwakasinizigwa kulindiswe kuzwa kulibaabo abakamvwa.
Awalo Leza wakalungulula ambabo muzitondezyo amumalele amuzimpangaliko zinjizinji, akukwaabilwa kwa-Muuya Uusalala, mbubonya mbuli kuyanda kwakwe.
Inyika eyo iiciza, njotwaamba, takiipede baangelo kuti bakiibambe mbabo pe.
Anu umwi mulembi wakalungulula kuti,
Ino muntu ncinzi, kuti wamuyeeya?
Na mwana amuntu ncinzi kuti wamuzekelela?
Anu yebo wamucesyacesya kwiinda baangelo,
Wamusamika musini wabulemu awabwami,
Wakanmbika kumilimo yamaanza aako.
Eno obo Leza mbwaakamubonzezya zintu zyoonse, takukwe ancaakaleka kuti citamubombeli pe, Nokuboobo tatuna kubona kuti zintu zyoonse zya mu bombela mane ambuli sunu.
Anu oyo uwakacesegwa-cesegwa kwiinda baangelo nkaambo kakupenga lufu, ngu-Jesu, twamubona ulisamide musini wabulemu awabwami, kuti kuluzyalo lwa-Leza akamvwide bantu boonse lufu.
Walo wakeelelwa naakaleta bana banjibanji kubulemu, (alimwi nceziliwo zintu zyoonse nkaambo kakwe, zyoonse zili mulinguwe), kuti abe ngosibinda uulondokede wakufutuka kwabo kukupenga kwakwe.
Nkaambo kakuti oyo uusalazya abaabo abasalazigwa, boonse mbaumwi. Nkakaambo ako ncatausi kubaamba kuti mbanabakwesu,
naamba kuti,
Ndiyoolungulula zina lyako kubanabakwesu,
Alimwi ndiyookutembaula mumbungano.
Eno mbubonya bana mbobaabilwa mubili abulowa, awalo mwini mbubonya wakasangana, kuti kukufwa kwakwe akamwaye oyo uujisi nguzu zyalufu, nkokuti Saatani,
alimwi kuti akabavune boonse abo abakavubidwe buzike muciindi coonse cabuumi bwabo, nkaambo kakuyoowa lufu.
Ncobeni nkasimpe tavuni baangelo pe, pele uvuna bana ba-Abrahamu balo,
Nkaambo kaako ncaakeelela muzintu zyoonse kuti aelane abanabakwabo, kuti akabe Mupaizi Mupati, uuli aluzyalo, uusyomeka kuzintu zyoonse zya-Leza, kuti atuulile bantu cipaizyo cazibi.
Awalo mbubonya mbwaakalimvwida mwini kusunkwa akupenga, ncobeni inga ulakonzya kubagwasya abo abasunkwa.
Walo wakali kusyomekede kulooyo uwakamusala, mbubonya awalo Musa mbwaakali kusyomekede muŋanda ya-Leza yoonse.
Walo Jesu uleelede bulemu kwiinda Musa, mbubonya mbwajana bulemu muntu uwakayaka ŋanda kwiinda ŋanda njaakayaka,
Anu maanda oonse alijisi bakaayaka, pele Leza walo ngowakayaka zintu zyoonse.
anu walo Kristo ulisyomekede mbuli Mwana muzyale muŋanda ya-Leza. Ndiswe ŋanda eyo ya-Leza kuti twajatisya, akuya kumamanino, kulitakata kwesu akulindila kwesu nkotulumbaizya.
Kuti mwalimvwa ijwi lyakwe sunu, buno buzuba,
Mubuzuba bwakusunkwa munkanda,
Bamauso nkobakandisunka akundisoleka,
Alimwi bakabona milimo njendakamana kumyaaka iili makumi one,
Boobo ncendakabijilwa kumukowa oyo,
Ndakati, Lyoonse mbasweesi mumyoyo yabo,
Pele tabakwe nobakaziba nzila zyangu.
Tabakooyoonjila mukulyokezya kwangu pe.
Nobakwesu, amulangisye kuti kulindinywe kutabi muntu uuba amoyo mubi wakulimbulula, uumusowa kuzwa kuli-Leza muumi,
Nkaambo kakuti twaba beenzinyina Kristo, kuti kusyoma kwesu nkotwakali kujisi kumatalikilo katujatisya mane do kumagolelo,
Kwalo tulamvwa aya lyoonse kwategwa,
Kuti mwalimvwa ijwi lyakwe sunu, buno buzuba,
Mutanooyumya myoyo yanu, mbuli muciindi cakusumunwa.
Alimwi mbaani abo abaamukalazya Leza kumyaaka iili makumi one? Sena embo abo abakacita cibi abali amitunta iyakaalabana munkanda?
Alimwi sena takuli kulibaabo abakali kuunduluzya, nkwaakakonka kuti tabakooyoonjila mukulyokezya kwakwe?
Eno twabona kuti bakakakilwa kunjila mukulyokezya nkaambo kakutasyoma.
Nkaambo ncobeni swebo twakaambilwa Makani Mabotu mbubonya mbuli mbabo, anu abalo ijwi ndyobakamvwa lyakakakilwa kubajanya cintu, nkaambo tabakaswaanganide mukusyoma kwabo abaabo abakamvwisya.
Pele swebo notwazumina tuyootambulwa mukulyokezya oku, mbubonya mbwaakaamba kuti,
Ncendakakonka mubukali bwangu,
Kuti tabakooyoonjila mukulyokezya kwangu:
nokuba kuti milimo ya-Leza yakalondolwa kuzwa kumalengelo eenyika.
Limwi wakaamba aabuzuba bwamusanu mwaabili kumakani aya wakateeti, Leza wakalyokezya kumilimo yakwe yoonse mubuzuba bwamusanu mwaabili,
alimwi eno waamba kuti,
Tabakooyoonjila mukulyokezya kwangu.
Mbubonya obo, nkasimpe kuti bamwi bayoonjilamo, nokuba kuti abo abakasaanguna kumvwa Makani Mabotu bakakakilwa kunjila, nkaambo kakuunduluzya,
elyo necakainda ciindi cilamfu, alimwi wakabamba buzuba wati, Sunu Buno Buzuba, mbubonya mbwaakaambwa muli-Davida kuti,
Kuti mwalimvwa ijwi lyakwe sunu, buno buzuba,
Mutanooyumya myoyo yanu.
Nkokuti kucizida bantu ba-Leza kulyokezya kwa-Sabata.
Nkaambo woonse uutambulwa mukulyokezya kwakwe, walyokezya kumilimo yakwe, mbubonya mbwaakalyokezya Leza kumilimo yakwe.
Nkaambo kaako, atusungwaale kunjila mukulyokezya oko, kuti kutabi uucilila ciyanza nciconya eco cakuunduluzya.

Nkaambo ijwi lya-Leza lili abuumi, lili anguzu, lilabosya kwiinda iceba ilijisi mabemba obile, lilayasa mane kukwaanzaanya buumi amuuya, aalo maswaanganino aazifuwa amooma, alimwi lilabeteka kuyeeya akuyanda kwamoyo.
Takukwe cintu cakalengwa icitabwenekede mumeso aakwe, pele zyoonse zilivumbulwidwe, zili antangalala, kulinguwe oyo ngutujisizi makani.
Nkaambo oyo wesu tali Mupaizi Mupati uutakonzya kutweetelela mukulengauka kwesu, pele ngonguwe oyo uwakasunkwa mbubonya mbuli ndiswe, nekuboobo taakwe naakacita cibi.
Nkaambo kaako, atuswene cakutayoowa kucuuno caluzyalo, kuti tukatambule lweetelelo akujana luzyalo lutugwasya muciindi ncotubula.
Nkaambo woonse mupaizi mupati uusalwa kubantu, usalilwa kubelekela bantu mumakani aayeeme kuli-Leza, kuti ape zituuzyo azipaizyo nkaambo kazibi.
Alimwi kakonzya kweetelela bantu abaleede nkaambo kakutaziba kwabo, nkaambo awalo mwini ulizwide kulengauka,
aboobo nceelede kuti apaile cipaizyo cabantu ukuvwela acakwe mwini.
Alimwi, takukwe muntu uulipa mwini mulimo oyu mulemu, pele oyo uwaitwa Leza kulinguwo mbubonya mbwaakaitwa Arone,
Mbubonya obo, awalo Kristo takalipede bulemu ubwakuba Mupaizi Mupati pe, pele wakasalwa kulinguwo ayooyo uwakamwaambila kuti,
Nduwe Mwanaangu,
Sunu ndakuzyala,
Nduwe mupaizi walyoonse,
Mbubonya mbuli Melkisideke.
Walo nekuba kuti wali Mwana a-Leza, pele wakaiya kumvwa mumapenzi aakwe.
Eno mbwaakalondoka obo, wakaba sikubacitila lufutuko lutamani boonse abo abamumvwa,
Leza wakamwaamba kuti Mupaizi Mupati mbubonya mbuli Melkisideke.
Eno tulijisi makani manjimanji aakwaamba aanguwe, alimwi nciyumu kwaapandulula mbomuli akazilukwa,

Kwalo kukuyeeya ciindi mpomwakabeda bazumini, sunu mwali kweelede kuba baiyi, nekubaboobo anywebo muceelede kuba amuntu kuti kacimwiisya majwi aamilao mitete yakusaanguna njakatwaambila Leza, mwaba anga mbavwanda abayanda mukupa, izitali zilyo ziyumu.
Nkaambo woonse oyo uucinywa mukupa tana kusongwaala kujwi lyabululami pe, nkaambo ucili mwana muvwanda.
Anu zilyo ziyumu nzyabantu bakakomena, nkokuti nzyabaabo abali amiyeeyo iyakaiisigwa kusala cibotu ecibi.
naaba aakwiisya aakubapatizigwa aakubikwa maanza, naaba aakubuka kubafu, na aakubetekwa kutamani,
Inga tulacicita eci, na Leza wazumina.
Pele nkuyumu kulibaabo abakamunikilwa kale, abakalabila cipego cakujulu, abakali kusanganyizidwe kale ku-Muuya Uusalala,
abakalabila kale kubota kwejwi lya-Leza, enguzu zyaciindi ciciza,
elyo kuti baleya, nkuyumu kubajokolweda kukweempa, nkaambo alimwi bacibambula Mwana a-Leza aciingano, akumuubaula,
Nkaambo insi eyo iinywa maanzi aawida mpawo, yazyala micelo kuti bakondwe abo abaliminwa, insi eyo yajana coolwe kuli-Leza.
Pele kuti insi eyo kiizyala maamvwa aciyasabavwimi, ilatakatwa, ili kufwaafwi kusinganizigwa, elyo kukumana ilatentwa buyo mulilo.
Kwalo notwaamba bobuya, nomuyandwa, myoyo yesu ilasinizya aandinywe­ kuti mulatola nzila ini ini, njenzila yalufutuko.
Nkaambo Leza tali sikampenda, takonzya kuluba milimo yanu akuyanda nkomwatondezya nkaambo kezina lyakwe, mbomwakabelekela basalala, asunu mucibabelekela.
Swebo tuyandisya kuti umwi aumwi wanu ajatisye kusungwaala nkukonya, kukulindila kumaninide mane do kumamanino,
kuti mutabi baziluki, pele kamutobela baabo abayoojana ceeco icakasyomezegwa nkaambo kakusyoma akubosya moyo.
wakuti, Ncobeni kulongezya ndilakulongezya, akuvuzya ndilakuvuzya.
Eno Abrahamu wakaciiana ncaakasyomezegwa nkaambo kakubosya moyo mukulindila kwakwe,
Nkaambo bantu balakonka mupati wabo uubainda, nkabela lyoonse nobazumanikana makani ukukonka oko nkokukosola makani.
Nkaambo kaako, Leza mbwaakakanza kutondezya cakusinizya kulibaabo basikujana cisyomezyo, kuti ncaakasyomezya kale tacisanduki, wakali kusinizizye kukukonka,
kuti kumakani aya obile aatasanduki ngatakonzya kubeja Leza, tukabe aluumbulizyo luyumu, swebo notutijila kuti tujatisye bulangizi bubikidwe kumeso esu,
Obu bulangizi tulibujisi ukubaanga musemu wamuuya, umuyumu ma, uutazungaani, uuinda mukati kacisitilizyo.
Momumo omo mwaakatunjililila Jesu kubaanga musolozi naakaba Mupaizi Mupati walyoonse kuciyanza cili mbuli ca-Melkisideke.
alimwi ngonguwe ngowakaabilwa coonse cimanyakumi kuli-Abrahamu, Izina lyakwe lilasaanguna kupandululwa kuti, Mwami wabululami, alimwi Mwami wa-Salema, nkokuti Mwami waluumuno.
Walo mbwaatakwe wisi, nobaba banyina, nobaba basyaanene bakwe, mbwatakwe naaba matalikilo naaba mamanino aabuumi bwakwe, pele wakalengwa mbwaakalengwa Mwana a-Leza, unooli mupaizi amuyamyaaka.
Eno amuyeeye bupati bwamuntu oyu mbobubede, uwakapegwa kulisikale Abrahamu cimanyakumi calubono ndwaakaakusaala.
Alimwi abo babana ba-Levi abacitwa bapaizi ncobeni balaililwa mu-Mulao, kuti basangilwe cimanyakumi kubantu, nkokuti kubanabakwabo, nokuboobo abalo mbazyalwa ba-Abrahamu,
pele walo oyo uuteezeezegwa kuba wamukowa wabo wakapegwa cimanyakumi kuli-Abrahamu, wakamulongezya walo ngwaakasyomezya Leza.
Eno takukwe uzumanana kuti muniini inga ulalongezegwa mupati,
Alimwi sunu mbantu bafwa buyo mbabasangilwa cimanyakumi, kwalo oko omwe wakasangilwa ngowakabonwa kuti muumi.
Mboiti walo Levi oyo uusangilwa cimanyakumi ulasangwa muli-Abrahamu.
Nkaambo Levi wakacili mucikungu casyaanenaakwe kuciindi eco Melkisideke naakaswaangana Abrahamu.

Alimwi kuti bupaizi bwabana-Levi nobwali kulomene (nkaambo kubupaizi obu bantu nkobakatambula Mulao), ino kai nkaambonzi ncokwakali kuciyandika musyobo umbi wabupaizi, ubuli mbuli bwa-Melkisideke nobutaambwa buyo kuti buli mbuli bwa-Arone?
Nkaambo kuti bupaizi bwasandulwa, kweelede kuti awalo Mulao usandulwe,
Oyo uupandululwa boobo ngwamusyobo umbi, eno kumusyobo oyo takukwe naba omwe uwakalisangide kucipaililo.
Nkaambo kulizibidwe kuti Mwami wesu wakazwida kuli-Juda, nkabela Musa taakwe naakabwaamba bupaizi kumusyobo oyo pe.
Eno aya oonse alamvwikika cakwiinda na kwazwa mupaizi umbi uuli mbuli Melkisideke,
uutacitwa Mupaizi kumulao wabantu baansi, pele uucitwa canguzu zyabuumi butakwe nobumana.
Nkaambo mbobuya mbwaakalungululwa kuti,
Nduwe mupaizi walyoonse,
Uuli mbuli Melkisideke.
Eno Mulao wakusaanguna waloba nkaambo kakulengauka kwawo abuliwo bwawo,
(nkaambo Mulao tuukwe cintu ncowakalondola), alimwi twalerelwa bumwi bulangizi bubotu ubutuswenya afwaafwi kuli-Leza.
Eno eci cakacitilwa akukonka,
(Nkaambo bapaizi abo abakasaanguna tabakwe nobakakonkwa, bakacitwa buyo bapaizi, pele walo wakacitwa Mupaizi akukonka ukuzwa kulooyo uwakamwaambila kuti,
Jehova wakakonka, taakwe nati kasandule kumajwi ngaakaamba kuti,
Nduwe mupaizi walyoonse).
Alimwi abo bakaba bapaizi banjibanji kukubalwa, nkaambo kakuti lufu lwakali kubakasya kuti kabacicita mulimo wabo,
pele walo ulakalilila lyoonse, aboobo tajisi muntu uunga ulakala mucibaka cabupaizi bwakwe,
Nkaambo kaako, walo uli anguzu zitamani zyakubafutula abo abaswena kuli-Leza kujanza lyakwe, nkaambo lyoonse buyo mpali, ulabakombelezya.

Teelede kupaila zipaizyo mazuba oonse mbubonya mbuli abo bapaizi bapati, nkaambo balo bakali kusaanguna kupailila zibi zyabo beni, ulwabili kupailila zibi zyabantu, pele eci Jesu wakacicita lweendo lomwe naakalituula mwini.
Nkaambo Mulao nguusala bantu mubulengausi bwabo kuti babe bapaizi bapati, pele lyalo ijwi lyakukonka ilyakacitwa munsi lya-Mulao ndelisala Mwana kuba Mupaizi uulomene amuyamyaaka.
ngonguwe uubeleka mulimo uusalala wakucikombelo cinicini. Eco cikombelo cakayakwa a-Jehova, teecakayakwa kumaanza aabantu pe.
Eno bapaizi bapati boonse mbobasalwa kuti batuule budumbu azipaizyo, awalo Mupaizi Mupati oyu uleelede kuba acintu cakutuula.
Kuti naali kucili ansi, natacili mupaizi pe, nkaambo mpobali abo batuula budumbu bulaililwa mu-Mulao.

(Milimo njibamana ncecikozyano citondezya mbuzibede zintu zyakujulu, mbubonya mbwaakalaililwa Musa kuli-Leza, naakaamba kuyaka cikombelo, nkaambo wakaambilwa kuti, Konga kocita zintu zyoonse kuti zibe mbubonya mbuli eeciya ncowakatondezegwa adundu).
Pele eno ncobeni mulimo ngwaajana Kristo ngomulimo mupati winiwini, nkaambo ngowaba sikwiimaakati wa-Mulongo uuinda kubota, uwakalengwa azisyomezyo ziinda kubota.
Nkaambo kuti oyo Mulongo wakusaanguna nowatali kujisi kampenda nokutakwe kaambo kakulenga yooyu uwabili.
Eno mbwaakabeena kampenda wakabaambila kuti,
Amubone, mazuba aleza, ngo-Jehova waamba obo,
Nenti katange mulongo mupya kubana-Israyeli akubana-Juda.
Eliya nendakabajata kujanza kuya bubakwela akubeenzya kuti bazwe mucisi ca-Egepita,
Nkaambo bakakaka kukalilila mumulongo oyo,
Ncendakalekela kubabamba, ngo-Jehova waamba obo.
Eno ngooyu mulongo ngwenjandootanga kubana-Israyeli,
Munsi lyamazuba ayo, ngo-Jehova waamba obo.
Ndiyoobika milao yangu mukuyeeya kwabo,
Moonse amumyoyo yabo ndiyooilembamo,
Elyo ndikabe Leza wabo,
Abalo bakabe bantu bangu.
Nkabela takukwe uuti kaiisye mweenzinyina,
Takukwe uuti kaiisye mwanaakwabo kuti,
Amuzibe Jehova,
Nkaambo boonse bayoondiziba beni,
Ukuzwida kumwana mane kusikila kumupati.
Nkaambo ndiyoobafwida luzyalo kukubisya kwabo,
Nsikooyooziyeeya limbi zibi zyabo.
Lino Mulongo wakusaanguna wakalijisi milao yawo yakukomba, akuntu kusalala kwaansi ano.
Nkaambo kwakayakwa cikombelo citaanzi, umwakali cibikilo calampi antafule amikamu yamabonwabonwa, icaambwa kuti Mbusena busalala,
Alimwi kusule lyacisitilizyo cabili kwakali cikombelo cimwi citegwa Busena Busalalisya cakwiinda,

omu momuli cipaililo cangolida, alimwi muli Ibbokesi lya-Mulongo livumbidwe ingolida yalo mubili woonse, nkabela mukati kalyo muli cibiya cangolida cijisi Mana, amusako wa-Arone uwakasonsa, amabwe aakulembela Mulongo.
Eno atala lyabbokesi akali Bakerubimu ba-Bulemu bapopelede Cuuno caluzyalo. Pele nciyumu kulindime kukanana oonse aya ecino ciindi.
pele mucikombelo cabili teemwanjila muntu pele mupaizi alike komwe mumwaaka, nkabela omu tanjili atanoojisi bulowa bwakulituulila mwini akutuulila indubyo zyabantu.
Mbuboobo Muuya Uusalala mbwafundisya kuti inzila iiya mu-Busena Busalalisya cakwiinda tiina kujuka, mbociciimvwi cikombelo citaanzi,
(eco ncikozyano kuciindi casunu), nezili zituuzyo azipaizyo izyatuulwa, zitakonzya kulomya muntu sikukomba kuzibi zyakwe,
nkaambo nzyakulya azyakunywa azyakusamba kwamisyobo misyobo. Ezi zintu nzyaanze, nzyamubili, nzyakujatilila buyo mane kuciindi cakuyoobamba.
nkabela taakwe naakatola bulowa bwampongo nobuba bwaŋombe, wakatola bulowa bwakwe mwini, eno wakaindilila akunjila komwe luzutu mu-Busena Busalalisya cakwiinda aboobo wakaleta lununuko lutamani.
Ino kai obo, na bulowa bwampongo abwabasune etwe lyampwizi, nezisansailwa kubantu abadiinkene, inga zilabasalazya mumubili,

sena inga bwalo bulowa bwa-Kristo, uwakalituula mwini kuli-Leza mu-Muuya Uutamani mbuli cipaizyo citakwe kampenda, tabukooinda kusalazya meezeezyo aanu akumugwisizya milimo mifu, kuti mumumanine milimo Leza muumi?

Eno nkaambo kamakani aya walo ncaaba Sikwiimaakati wa-Mulongo mupya, kuti abo abakaitwa bakatambule lukono lutamani olo ulwakasyomezegwa, nkaambo lufu mpoluli lubanununa kukusotoka milao kwamumulongo wakusaanguna.
Lino kumakani aamalaililo aasikukonenwa, kuleelede kuba lufu lwasikulailila,
nkaambo malaililo alacitwa anoofwide mukamwini, taakwe mulimo nacipona sikulailila.
Nkaambo kaako, awalo mulongo mutaanzi nowatakatangwa kuti nobwatali bulowa.
Nkaambo Musa naakamana kulailila bantu boonse makani oonse aa-Mulao, wakabweza bulowa bwaboombe abwampongo, antoomwe amaanzi aboya busalala tyu ahisopo, wakabusansaila kubbuku akubantu boonse,
wakati, Mbombuboobu mbobulowa bwamulongo ngwaakamutanga Leza.
Mbubonya boobo, alimwi wakabweza bulowa, wakabusansaila kucikombelo akuzibiya zyoonse zyamoomo mukombelwa.
Ncobeni tulakonzya kwaamba kuti, mumakani aa-Mulao bulowa mbobusalazya zintu zyoonse buyo, alimwi takukwe kulekelelwa kwazibi mane do kukutila bulowa,
Nkaambo Kristo teewakanjila mu-Busena Busalala ubwakayakwa amaanza aabantu (ncifwanisyo buyo cabusena bwinibwini), pe, wakanjila kujulu kwini buya, kuti akapompe kubusyu bwa-Leza nkaambo kandiswe,
Nkabela takweensi kuyoolituula kanjikanji, mbuli mupaizi mupati mbwanjila mu-Busena Busalala myaaka yoonse, natolelela bulowa butali bwakwe,
nkaambo kakuti nokwali boobo, ukuzwida kumalengelo aanyika Kristo nataleki kupengekana lyoonse. Anu pe, walo wakaakupompa komwe buyo kuciindi camamanino kuti akalobye zibi kukulipaila mwini,
Lino mbuli mbokubede kuti bantu kabanga kabafwa lweendo lomwe, elyo babetekwe,
mbubonya obo awalo Kristo, amana kulituula komwe ukuyumuna zibi zyabanjibanji, ulapompa alimwi lwabili, azibi zitawo, kuzoofutula baabo abamulangila.
Nokwatali boobo, nezilekedwe kupailwa, nkaambo basikukomba nobakainda lumwi kusalazigwa, alimwi nobataciliswiilili limbi kuti tuli azibi.
Eno mbokuli boobo, zipaizyo ezyo zilijisi ciyeezyo buyo cazibi mumyaaka myaaka,
nkaambo bulowa bwabacende abwampongo tabukonzyi kugwisya zibi.
Cipaizyo nociba cituuzyo enzyo nzyoyanda pe,
Pele mubili ngowandibambila.
Alimwi tokondwi zipaizyo zitentwa azipaizyo zipaililwa zibi.
Eno mebo ndakati, Mebo mpaawa, ndaboola,
(Ndilivungidwe mubbuku lilembedwe makani aamba ndime).
Ndeza kuzoocita luyando lwako, O Leza.
Watalika lwaamba kuti, Yebo tokondwi zipaizyo neziba zituuzyo neziba zipaizyo zitentwa neziba zipaizyo zipaililwa zibi (nzizyo zipailwa kukuyobola Mulao),
Amane buyo kwaamba obo, alimwi wati. Mebo mpaawa, ndaboola kuzoocita luyando lwako. Eno ncaamba boobo nkulobya yaayo aakusaanguna kuti akondezye yaayo aamunsi.
Eno nkokuluyando olu nkotwasalazizigwa, nkaambo Jesu Kristo wakatuula mubili wakwe lweendo lomwe luzutu.
Alimwi mupaizi woonse ulaima mukukomba mazuba oonse, ulapaila zipaizyo nzizyonya ezyo tunjitunji, anu nokuboobo ezi zipaizyo enzyo nzezikonzya kutwaangulula kuzibi.
Anu walo Jesu naakamana kutuulila zibi cipaizyo comwe ciramani, wakaakukala kululyo lwa-Leza,
elyo kuzwa kuciindi eco unoolindila mane basinkondonyina bakabe mbobutandabilo bwamaulu aakwe.
Nkaambo kucituuzyo nciconya comwe ulibalomezezye cakutamana abo abasalazigwa.
Awalo Muuya Uusalala ulatudumaizizya, nkaambo naakamana kwaamba kuti,
Munsi lyamazuba ayo, ngo-Jehova waamba obo.
Ndiyoobika Milao yangu mumyoyo yabo,
Ndiyooilemba mumiyeeyo yabo.
Alimwi wayungizya ijwi eli lyakuti,
Lino kuti ezi zyalekelelwa kale, takucikwe cimbi cituuzyo cakupailila zibi ciciyandika.
kunzila impya iili abuumi njaakatusaangunina mucisitilizyo (nkokuti munyama yamubili wakwe),
alimwi obuya mbotujisi Mupaizi Mupati uujisi bwami bwaŋanda ya-Leza,
atuswene afwaafwi amoyo winiwini mukusyoma kutakwe kampenda, ayalo myoyo yesu kiisansailidwe kusalala kwakuziba zibi, ayalo mibili yesu kiisambide amaanzi aanjoloma, sa
Alimwi atujatisye buzumino bwa bulangizi bwesu, kuti kutabi notuzungaana, nkaambo walo oyo uwakasyomezya ulisyomekede.
Katunga katuyeeyana, kutubusyanya-busyanya mukuyandana akucita milimo mibotu,
Tutanoonga katuleka kulibunga-bunga, mbuli bamwi mbubaleka, anu kamucenjezyanya twaambo, kamucita obuya lyoonse mbomukubwene kuti buzuba bwa-Kristo buli afwaafwi.
pele kwasyaala buyo kulangila kubetekwa kuyoosya, abukali bwamulilo wakutensya basinkondonyina Leza,
Muntu uususya Mulao wa-Musa tausilwa, mane do ajayigwe, naba abakamboni bobile na botatwe, pe, pe, mpaansi buyo.

Eno kamuyeeya, ino inga kulakomena buti kubetekwa kwayooyo uumulyataula maulu Mwana a-Leza, uutabuzyi buungu bulowa bwa mulongo mbwaakasalazigwa abwalo, uutakwe ampuwo a-Muuya waluzyalo? Sena teelede kubetekwa akwiindilizigwa kuumwa?
Nkaambo tulimuzi oyo uwakati, Kukoyeka nkukwangu, mebo ndiyookoyeka. Alimwi wati, Jehova nguuyooba mubetesi wabantu bakwe.
Cilayoosya kuwida mumaanza aa-Leza muumi.
Kumwi, nywebo nobeni mwakaba ceebelo cakutukanwa acakupenzegwa, kumwi mwakali beenzinyina abaabo abakali kucitilwa boobo.
Nkaambo mwakali kubafwida luzyalo abo abakali kwaangidwe, alimwi mwakali kumweta-mweta nomwakali kunyangwa lubono lwanu, nkaambo kakuti mwakalizi kuti mulijisi lubono lumbi lubotu lutamani.
Boobo mutabi nomusowa kulitakata kwanu, nkaambo kuyoomuletela bulumbu bupati.
Nkaambo muleelede kubosya myoyo, kuti mucite luyando lwa-Leza, nomuti kajane ceeco icakasyomezegwa.
Elyo oyo sikuboola ulasika, takoomuka pe.
Kuti akapiluke cifuteesule, muuya wangu tuukooyookondwa kulinguwe pe.
Pele swebo endiswe tuyoopiluka cifuteesule akufwa pe, ndiswe baabo abajisi kusyoma kuyoofutusya myuuya yesu.
Mulusyomo olu basikale mobakajanina impuwo imbotu.
Alimwi kulusyomo lwesu tulimvwide kuti inyika yakalengwa kujwi lya-Leza, aboobo zintu zibonwa zyakalengwa kuzintu zitaboneka ameso.
Pele kuti kakwiina lusyomo tacikonzeki kukonda Leza, nkaambo woonse muntu uuswena kulinguwe uleelede kuzumina kuti Leza mpali akuti nguupa cilumbo kulibaabo bamuyandaula.
nkabela kukusyoma wakasika akuyookala-kala mucisi icakasyomezegwa mbuli citali cisi cakwe, bakali kukala mumatente, antoomwe a-Izaka a-Jakobo basikusyomezegwanyina,
nkaambo wakali kucilindila munzi mupati uujisi intalisyo injumu, uuyakwa akucitwa a-Leza,
Mbombubo obo, kumuntu omwe buyo uwakali kale mbuli mufu, kwakazwa cabantu cinjicinji cibaanga ninyenyeezi, alimwi cibaanga musee wakunkomwe yalwizi uutabaliki,
Ikuti aba baamba boobo balalibonya kuti balayandaula CISI cakwabo.
Ncobeni kuti nobakali kuyeeya cisi cabo eco ncobakapola, anu no bakabweeda alimwi,
pele bakalisukamine kuya kucisi cibotu ciinda, nkokuti kucisi cakujulu. Boobo, Leza taakwe naakausa insoni yakwaambwa kuti ngo-Leza wabo, nkaambo wakababambila kale munzi.
nguwenya ngwaakaambilidwe kuti, Bazukulu bako bayoobalwa muli-Izaka,
Nkaambo wakayeeya kuti Leza ulijisi inguzu neziba zyakubusya bantu kukufwa, elyo ncobeni wakaboozezegwa mwanaakwe mbuli muntu uwazwa kulufu.
Kulusyomo Jakobo, naakali kuyeeya kufwa, wakalongezya bana boonse bobile ba-Josefa, eno wakalisiminina amusako wakwe akulumba Leza.
Kulusyomo awalo Josefa, necakaba afwaafwi ciindi cakufwa kwakwe, wakaamba kuti caakuba ciindi bana ba-Israyeli bayoopolela ku-Egepita, nkabela wakalailila azifuwa zyakwe.
Alimwi Musa, naakakomena, lusyomo ndwaakakakila kwaambwa kuti mwana wamwana wa-Farao.
Walmsala kupenzegwa antoomwe abantu ba-Leza kwiinda kubotelwa misalo iimana buyo.
Nkaambo wakeezeezya kuti kusampuka kwakusampaulilwa Kristo mbobuvubi bwiinda lubono loonse lwamu-Egepita, nkaambo wakali kucilangila bulumbu ibwakacili kuza.
Eno kukusyoma wakapola mu-Egepita, taakwe naakayoowa bukali bwamwami wamumo, nkaambo wakalibilamine mbuli sikubona yooyo uutabonwa,
Alimwi kukusyoma wakaanza Pasika akusansaila bulowa, kuti sikujaya bana bataanzi kuzyalwa atazoojayilizya bana baba-Israyeli.
Alimwi kukusyoma Rahabu, uwakali mwaamu, taakwe naakafwida antoomwe abaabo abakali basigama, nkaambo wakatambula baabo basikutwela akubakazika kabotu muŋanda yakwe.
Aba bantu kulusyomo lwabo bakazunda masi, bakoonda milimo iiluzi, bakatambula zisyomezyo, bakamuma milomo yandavu,
bakazimya bukali bwamulilo, bakayokoka kunsonga zyamapanga, mukulengauka bakapegwa inguzu, bakaba basinguzu munkondo, bakaamwaya makamu aabazwamasi.
Bamwi banakazi abakafwidwa bakwabo baka busizigwa kuzwa kulufu. Bamwi bantu bakacitwa ipenzya-bulanga nobakayeeya kufwa, bakakaka kuvunwa, kuti bakajane buumi bwiinda buciza.
Bamwi bakalikudinkaulwa akukwabbaulwa, ncobeni bakapenzegwa kunkeetani akukwaangwa muntolongo.

Bakali kufuswa mabwe, bakali kukosolwa akati, bakali kusunkwa, bakali kujazigwa mapanga. Bakali kuya butuntulika akudabila masalu aambelele ampongo, bakali kweenda kaumbaumba akufwabizigwa akugutaikwa,
Inyika teeyakabeelede. Bakali kuya bupobaila munkanda amumalundu, limwi bakali kuya butuntumana mumampangala amumadindi.
Pele abo nobakajana boobo impuwo imbotu nkaambo kalusyomo lwabo, tabakwe nobakacijana icakasyomezegwa, pe,
nkaambo Leza wakalitubambilide swebo cintu cimwi ciinda kubota, kuti notwatakali ndiswe nebatakalondolwa.
Katuduneme kuli-Jesu musolozi uulomya lusyomo lwesu, ikuti walo, nkaambo kalukondo ndwaakabikilwa kunembo, wakazyandamana kuciingano, wakaubaula buusu, eno sunu ulikede kululyo lwacuuno ca-Leza.
Kamwiilizya nguwe uwakazyandamana mukukazyanya kuli bobuya kwabantu abamubisizya, kuti mutabombibombi nokuba kulengaala mumyoyo yanu.
Anu tamuna kulwana kukutikaisya bulowa, mucigamine kulwana azibi.
Eno sena mwaluba aya majwi aakugwasya myoyo ngomwaambilwa mbuli bana bakulizyalila? Aati,
Mwanaangu, utanoonga koubaula kukomwa nkwakukoma Jehova,
Utabi nolengauka bakutapatila.
Alimwi ulamusansaula woonse mwanaakwe ngwatambula.
Eno nkaambo kakwiisya myoyo ncomukomenwa boobo. Leza ulamucita mbuli bana bakwe, nkaambo ino mwananzi walo oyo uutakwe nakomwa kuliwisi?
Kukomwa nkokwabantu boonse, Kuti nomwatali kukomwa, nomwatali bana bakulizyalila, pe, nomuli bana bamusokwe.
Nkobeni twakali kubalemeka bamatata abakatuzyala nobatukoma. Ino kai obo, sena tatukooyooinda kubombela yooyo uuzyala myuuya, kuti tupone?
Nkaambo abo bakali kutukoma kukuyanda kwabo kwamazuba mace buyo, anu walo utukomena kuti tululame, tukaabilwe busalali bwakwe.
Eno kuciindi ncocuumwa-umwa tacitangazyi pe, cilausya, pele munsi, kukomwa oko kulatujanya micelo yakulikalila kabotu akululama.
alimwi maulu aanu amwaepele inzila ziluzi, kuti boonse abasunkuta bataleyi munzila, pele bapone.
Amutobele luumuno lwakulikalila abeenzinyoko boonse, abusalali, ubunga muntu atakujana bulamukasya kuyoobona Mwami.
Amulangisye nkuko mbokunga kulaba muntu naba omwe uuti bulile kulijanina luzyalo luzulide lwa-Leza, kuti kutabi muyanda uulula uusonsa unga ulaleta mapenzi akati kanu akusofwaazya banjibanji.
Alimwi kutabi mwaamu naba muntu uutaluzi uuli mbuli Esau, uwakauzya bupati bwakwe bwakuzyalwa kumutiba omwe wacilyo.
Nkaambo mulizi kuti, munsi naakayeeya kupegwa coolwe, wakakakwa. Cakamumanina ciindi cakweempa, pele nalila mbwaakacililila mpaansi buyo.
Tamuswenene kukulila kwamweembo nokuba kumuzungumina wamajwi, muzungumina uunga abo abakuumvwa balakumbila kuti batacuumvwi kabili.
Nkaambo inga balakakilwa kuyobola mulao wakuti, Naba munyama uulyata kudundu ulajazigwa mabwe.
Ayo akali kuyoosya naakapompa, awalo Musa wakati, Ndayoowa loko akukankama,
Pe, nywebo mwasika kudundu lya­-Zioni, akumunzi wa-Leza muumi, Jerusalemu wakujulu, akumakamu makamu aabaangelo bali myaanda myaanda.
Mwasika kumbungano njobabunganina bataanzi kuzyalwa abo balembedwe kujulu, akuli-Leza mubetesi wabantu boonse, akumyuuya yabantu baluleme balondokede.
Mwasika kuli ­Jesu sikwiimaakati wamulongo mupya, akubulowa busansailwa bulumbaizigwa kwiinda bwa-Abelo.

Amucenjele kuti mutamukazyi oyo uukanana. Nkaambo kuti nobatakayokoka eliya nobakali kuunduluzya kuliyooyo uwali kubaiisya ansi, ncobeni notwainda anka kutayokoka aswebo, notumufutatila oyo uuamba majwi aazwa kujulu.
Oyo nguuli ajwi ilyakadidimya insi, pele eno wasyomezya wati, Eno kwasyaala lumwi luzutu kudidimya. Nsikooyoodidimya insi ilike, pe, ndiyoolididimya alyalo ijulu.
Eno eli ijwi lyakuti “Kwasyaala lumwi luzutu” nkukwaamba kuti kuyoososololwa zeezyo zizungaanizigwa, mbuli zintu izyakalengwa buyo, kuti ezyo zitazungaanizikwa zikasyaale,
Eno buya mbotwatambula Bwami butazungaaniziki, katulumba akumanina Leza milimo mibotu yakumubotezya, cakulemeka acakuyoowa,
nkaambo Leza wesu oyu ncobeni mulilo uunga wakuteuta waida syukutu.
Mutalubi kuba aluyando kubeenzu, nkaambo mbombubo obo bamwi mbobakasamausya baangelo, kabatabezi kuti mbaangelo.
Kamubayeeya abo baangidwe, kamubaanga mwaangidwe limwi ambabo, abalo bacitwa bubi kamubayeeya kamubaanga muli munkamu yabo.
Boobo ncotulisyomaisya kuti,
Jehova ngomuvuni wangu, takukwe encenjoowa.
Nobaba bantu ino bandicite buti?
Mutabi nomuleya nkaambo kanjiisyo zyamisyobo misyobo, nkaambo ncecibotu kuti moyo ube anguzu zizwa kuluzyalo, kutali kuzilyo, nkobakalisanga abo abakabula ancobajana,
Swebo ndijisi cipaililo ncobateelede kulida mpawo abo bacita milimo yamucikombelo caciindi,
Nkaambo abo banyama bali abulowa butolwa amupaizi mupati mu-Busena Busalala, kuti cibe Cituuzyo cazibi, mitunta yabo ilatentelwa anze lyamalawo.
Eno awalo Jesu wakafwida anze lyamulyango, kuti asalazye bantu boonse kubulowa bwakwe mwini.
Nkaambo kaako atugame kulinguwe anze lyamalawo, kumwi katuyumwine masampu aakwe.
Nkaambo ano ansi tatukwe munzi wakukalilila, pe, tuciyandaula umhi munzi uuciza.
Eno mulinguwe arupaile Leza lyoonse cipaizyo cakulumba, nkokuti micelo yamilomo iilumba izina lyakwe.
Alimwi mutalubi kucita manga akupana, nkaambo Leza ulakondwa kuzipaizyo zili bobuya,
Eno ndamwaambilizya kucita bobuya, kuti nkafwaambaane kuboozegwa kulindinywe.
amukondezye kuzintu zyoonse kuti mucite luyando lwakwe. Abeleke mumyoyo yesu milimo iimukonda kubusyu bwakwe, kunguzu zya-Jesu Kristo. Kulinguwe akube bulemu lyoonse alyoonse. Ameni.
Mulakondwa kumvwa kuti sunu mweenzuma Timoteo wakaangununwa, tuleza awe kuzoomuswaya, aba nati sike,
Amubajuzye baalu banu abasalali boonse, Bantu ba-Italiya balamujuzya.
Luzyalo alube anywe nyoonse, Ameni.
nkaambo mulizi kuti kusukusigwa kwalusyomo lwanu nkokuleta lukakatilo.
Eno lukakatilo alukalondole mulimo walo woonse, kuti mube balondosi akuba aciimo cizulide cakutabula cintu.
Pele akumbile cakusyoma, atalimbululi akaniini, nkaambo uulimbulula ulikozyene amankwisita aalwizi aaululuka akutontwa amuuwo.
Muntu uuli boobo atayeeyi kupegwa cintu ku-Mwami, pe,
nkaambo ulijisi myoyo yobile, ulapilauka mukweenda kwakwe koonse.
pele muvubi abotelwe kukucesegwa kwakwe, nkaambo kakuti bavubi bayoomaninina mbuli malangalanga aamusokwe,
Nkaambo izuba lyapasula acisansa, cilayumya mani, nkabela malangalanga aao alayuminina, abweebesi bwao bulamaninina, Mbubonya obo amuvubi ulanyana mukweenda kwakwe.
Na muntu watepaulwa, ataambi kuti, Ndatepaulwa kuli-Leza, nkaambo Leza tatepauliki kucibi, alimwi walo mwini tatepauli muntu pe.
Muntu ulatepaulwa na alengawidwa akoongwa kuzisusi zyakwe mwini.
Eno zisusi zyamita buyo, zilazyala zibi, azyalo zibi zyakomena zilatumbuka lufu.
Muteeneki, nobakwesu bayandwa.
Zipego zibotu zyoonse azyoolwe zyoonse zilondokede zilazwa kujulu, zilaseluka kuzwa kuli-Wisi wamimuni, uutasanduki, uutajisi acenzule cakusanduka,
Mbukanze bwakwe mwini mbwaakatuzyalila mumakani aalusinizyo, kuti tukabe mbuli bakabalwebalwe babaabo mbalengede.
nkaambo bukali bwamuntu tabucityi ziluleme zya-Leza.
Nkaambo, kaako, amusowe busofwaazi boonse abubi bufwasukide mumyoyo yanu, mwaatambule cakulibombya makani ngemuzikilidwe mukati, aali anguzu zyakufutusya myuuya yanu.
Ikuti na muntu ngusikuswiilila buyo, pele tali sikucita makani, ulikozyene amuntu uulilanga mucimboni kubusyu mbwaakalengwa abo,
nkaambo amana kulilanga, ulainka, elyo ulafwambaana kuluba mbwabede.
Anukuti uusondela mumulao mulondosi wabulubusi, akukakatila kulinguwo, mbwaatali sikuswiilila amatwi buyo uuluba pele sikumana mulimo, ngonguwe uuti longezegwe mukucita kwakwe.
Busyomi busalala butakwe kampenda mumeso aa-Leza Taateesu mbombuboobu, bwakuti muntu aswaye bamusyaala abamukabafu mumapenzi aabo, akuliyobola cakutaba akabala nikaba komwe kaansi.
Na kwanjila muntu mumbungano yanu uusamine inwenwe yangolida azyakusama zyeebesi, alimwi kwanjila muntu mucete uusamine zizapaukide,
nkabela mwamulanga oyo uusamine kabotu, mwaamba kuti, Kala awa abotu, pele mucete mulamwaambila kuti, Yebo, ima okuya, na kkala awa mpentandabalide maulu aangu—
na mwacita boobo, sa takuli kusalulula? Sa teemwaba basikuyeeya miyeeyo mibi?
Pele nywebo mwamuubaula mucete. Sa bavubi embo mbobamupenzya akumutola beni kuzibetekelo?
Sa tabalisampauli izina idemu elyo ndemwaambwa alyo?
Ncobeni na mwatobela mulao wa-Mwami uujanwa mumagwalo mujwi eli lyakuti, Yanda mweenzinyoko mbuli mboliyanda omwini, elyo mwacita kabotu.
Pele na mwalanga zi ziimo zyabantu, mwabisya, nkaambo mulikonedwe kumulao kuti muli basotosi,
Nkaambo oyo uwakaamba kuti, Utabi simamambe, ngonguwe wakaamba alyalo ijwi lyakuti, Utabi nojaya, Eno wataba simamambe pele wajaya, nkokuti wasotoka mulao.
Amwaambe akucita lyoonse mbuli mbubeelede bantu bayandoobetekwa kumulao wabulubusi.
Nkaambo lubeta talujisi lweetelelo kuliyooyo uuteeteleli mweenzinyina, Lweetelelo lulalilumbaizya amulubeta.
Na musyominyina mwaalumi naba mwanakazi wabula zyakusama azilyo zyakulya,
lino umwi akati kanu abaambila kuti, Kamuya aluumuno, mujane zyakulivumba azilyo zyakumukutya, nekubaboobo tabapi zintu nzyuuyanda mubili, ino kulagwasyanzi?
Mbubonya obo lusyomo lutajisi milimo mbululi lulike, lulifwide buyo.
Wazumina kuti Leza ngumwi luzutu na? Mbukubede. Abalo badaimona balazumina obo, balakankama,
Pele yebo omuntu wabuyo, sa ulayanda kuziba kuti lusyomo lwaanzeene kumilimo lulifwide buyo?
Abrahamu taateesu sa takakalulamikwa kumilimo, mbwaakatuula Izaka mwanaakwe acipaililo?
Sa toboni kuti lusyomo lwakabeleka antoomwe amilimo yakwe, nkabela milimo yakwe njeyakamulondweda lusyomo.
Mbuboobo mbulyakasinizigwa elyo ijwi lyamumagwalo lyakuti, Abrahamu wakasyoma Leza, nkabela lusyomo lwakwe lwakeelezegwa mbuli bululami, alimwi wakaulikwa kuti mulongwaakwe Leza.
Mwabona kuti nkumilimo nkwalulamikwa muntu, teensi kulusyomo luike pe.
Mbubonya obo alakwe Rahabi sibwaamu sa teewakalulamikwa kumilimo awo naakasamausya batumwa akubapilula kunzila imbi?
Nkaambo mbuli mubili uuanzeene amuuya mbuufwide, alwalo lusyomo lwaanzeene amilimo lulifwide mbubonya.
Nkaambo toonse tulalubya muziyanza zinji, pele, na kuti muntu uutalubya kukwaamba, oyo ngomuntu mulondosi, nguukonzya kukoma mubili wakwe woonse.
Bona, twabika tomu mukanwa kambizi, kuti ituswiilile, elyo tulapilaula amubili woonse.
Alimwi amubone maato! Mapati loko, alatontwa amyuuwo mikali, nekubaboobo alapilaulwa ankasi iniini, kufumbwa nkwakanza sikweenzya.
Mbubonya obo, alwalo lulimi ncizo ciniini buyo, pele lulalilumbaizya kumakani mapati. Amubone kalilo kaniini mbukaumpa cisaka cipati!
Alwalo lulimi mulilo. Ninsi yabubi akati kazizo zyamibili yesu. Lulabisizya mubili woonse, eno lulaumpa isokwe lyesu lyoonse, alwalo lwini lulatomekwa mugehena.
Nkaambo misyobo yoonse yabanyama ayabayuni ayabauka ayazinyama zikala mulwizi ilabombezegwa, yakabombezegwa kale kubantu,
pele taakwe muntu uukonzya kubombya lulimi pe. Mbubi butakonzya kuzundwa, lulizwide musamu uujaya.
Ndondulo ndotulumbya Mwami Taateesu, alimwi ndulonya ndotutukizya bantuma abakalengwa mucikozyano ca-Leza,
Mumulomo omwe mulazwa kulumba akutukila, Bakwesu, makani aali boobo taaelede kubawo.
Sa mukasensa komwe mulazwa maanzi mabotu amaanzi aalula?
Bakwesu, sa bukuyu inga bulazyala insikili, nuuba musaansa inga ulazyala inkuyu? Aalo maanzi aalula taakoozwa antoomwe amabotu.
Pele kuti mwanoojisi ibbivwe alukazyanyo mumyoyo yanu, mutalilumbaizyi ankuko nekuba kubejezya lusinizyo.
Obo tabweensi busongo buzwa kujulu, mbwaansi buyo, mbwabunyama, mbubwabadaimona.
Nkaambo nkulibede ibbivwe alukazyanyo, nkukonya oko nkulujanwa lupyopyongano amilimo mibi yoonse,
Pele busongo buzwa kujulu, lutaanzi bulasalala, alimwi mbwaluumuno, bulatontola, bulibombede, bulizwide lweetelelo amicelo mibotu, tabujisi lwaanzaano lwamoyo niluba luupaupo ameso.
Alimwi basiluumuno basyanga muluumuno balatebula micelo yabululami.
Mulasukama pele tamukwe cintu. Mulajaya akufwa ibbivwe, pele tamukonzyi kujana. Mulaambana akulwana, pele tamulijanini cintu nkaambo kakutakumbila kuli-Leza.
Mulakumbila zimwi, pele tamupegwi, nkaambo kukumbila kwanu takweensi kwamuciyanza cibotu, Mulakumbila zintu kuti muzisowe kumisalo yanu.
Sa muyeeya kuti magwalo aamba buyo aamba kuti, Muuya ngwaakakalika mukati kesu ulizwide ibbivwe.
Pele ulapa aluzyalo luya buvula. Nkaambo kaako kulaambwa kuti,
Leza ulabakazya basikulisumpula,
Pele batete-myoyo ulabapa luzyalo.
Amuswenenene kuli-Leza, elyo alakwe ulamuswenenena. Amusanzye maanza aanu, anywebo nobasizibi. Amulisalazye kumyoyo, nywebo nobasimyoyo-yobile.
Amoomoke akuungumana akulila. Kuseka kwanu akusanduke kulila, alwalo lukondo lwanu alusanduke kuungumana.
Amukalibombye kumeso aa-Mwami, akamusumpule.
Bakwesu, mutavwiyani, nkaambo uuvwiya mweenzinyina, naba uubeteka mweenzinyina, wabisya mulao, wabeleka mulao, eno mbowabeteka mulao toli sikubamba mulao, pe, uli silubeta buyo,
Kuli umwi uulenga milao, uubeteka, ngonguwe uukonzya kufutula akufwidilizya. Ino nduweni yebo obeteka mweenzinyoko?
Anukuti tamucizi ciyooba junza. Ino buumi bwanu ninzi? Ningubi buyo iibonwa kaindi kaniini, ndilyonya yamana,
Cintu ncimweelede kwaamba nceeci cakuti, Na Mwami wayanda, tulapona, tulacita bobuya abobuya.
Ani eno mulalikankaizizya kulisumpula kwanu. Kulikankaizya kuli bobuya koonse nkubi.
Lino oyo uuzi kucita kabotu, nekubaboobo taciti, wabisya.
Buvubi bwanu bwabola, zyakusama zyanu zyaligwa mapempya,
ingolida yanu ansiliva yanu zyoonse zyafwa kulisenke, nkabela senke wazyo uyooba bumboni bwakumupa mulandu, uyoolya mibili yanu mbuli mulilo, Mwalundika lubono kumazuba aamamanino.
Amulange, bulumbu bwabasimilimo bakamutebwida mumyuunda yanu, mbumwabanyanzya calweeno, buloongolola, eno kulila kwabatebuzi kwanjila mumatwi aa-Mwami wamakamu makamu.
Mwalinonya bula, mwalijanina misalo yakambotwembotwe, mwanonya myoyo yanu mbuli mubuzuba bwapobwe.
Mwabeteka akujaya uululeme, watakamukazya.
Anywebo amukazike myoyo yanu, amuliyumye, nkaambo kuboola kwa-Mwami kuli afwaafwi.
Mutatongaukani nobakwesu, kuti mutabetekwi. Amubone, mubetesi uliimvwi amulyango.
Nobakwesu, amulange basinsimi abakakambauka muzina lya-Jehova mbubakaliyumya akati kamapenzi akukazika myoyo yabo. Amutobele mbabo.
Tulaamba kuti, Mbasicoolwe bakakatila, Mulimvwide kale aalukakatilo lwa-Jobo, alimwi mulizi mbwaakamucitila­ Jehova kumamanino. Mwabona kuti Jehova ngusibuuya, ngusiluzyalo,
Sa kuli mulwazi akati kanu? Oyu aite baalu bambungano, kuti bamukombele, bamunanike mafuta muzina lyaMwami.
Kukomba kwalusyomo kulamuponya mulwazi oyo, Mwami ulamubusya, nkabela kufumbwa zibi nzyaakacita zilajatilwa,
Amulyaambe zibi zyanu umwi aumwi kumweenzinyina, alimwi amukombelane, kuti mukapone, Kuli anguzu zinji loko kukomba kwakusinizya kwamuntu uululeme.
Elija wakali muntu uulya maila mbubonya mbuli ndiswe. Wakakomba kuti imvula itawi, nkabela ncobeni teeyakawa ansi myaaka yotatwe amyeezi iili musanu muumwi.
Alimwi wakakomba lwabili, elyo yakawa imvula, ayalo inyika yakazyala micelo yayo.
amuzibe kuti uuboozya sizibi munzila yakuleya kwakwe uyooponya muuya wakwe kulufu, alimwi ulavumba zibi zinjizinji.
nomwakasalwa kumakankilo kubukanze bwa-Leza Taateesu akusalazigwa kunguzu zya-Muuya Uusalala, kuti mumuswiililisye Jesu Kristo akusansailwa kubulowa bwakwe, Amuvuzizigwe luzyalo aluumuno.
kuti tukapegwe lukono lutafwiki, lutakwe kampenda, lutapusami. Ndulo lukono ndumuyobwedwa kujulu,
nywebo nomuyamininwa kunguzu zya-Leza, nkaambo kalusyomo lwanu, kuti mube alufutuko olo ndomubambilidwe, luti kayubununwe kuciindi camamanino.

Kwaba boobo kuti kusukusigwa kwalusyomo lwanu, mbokuli kuyandisi kwiinda ingolida iikulumpala niiba yakasukusigwa mumulilo, kamuletele lutembaulo abulemu alulemeko kuciindi cakuyubununwa kwa-Jesu Kristo.
Walo tamunamubwene pe nekubaboobo mulamuyandisya, nkabela nomutamuboni sunu mulamusyoma, aboobo mulakondwa alukondo lutaambiki luli abulemu,
alimwi mulalijanina cintu eco neeluleta lusyomo lwanu, nkokuti lufutuko lwamyuuya yanu.
Bakali kuyandisya kuziba kuti na ayo alaba lili, alaba buti, nkaambo Muuya waKristo mukati kabo wakabasinsimya aamapenzi aa-Kristo kaatana kubawo abulemu butobela ngao.

Nkabela bakayubunwidwa kuti teensi mbabo beni bati gwasigwe kumakani aya, pe, ndinywe, Ngaonya makani ngomwaambilwa sunu kulimbabo bamukambaukila Makani Mabotu mu-Muuya Uusalala uutumwa kujulu. Aya makani ngengao ngobayandisya abaangelo kwaazibisya.
Amube mbuli bana baswiilila. Ziyanza zyanu zitabi mbuli zisusi zyanu zyakalekale zyakuciindi cakutaziba kwanu,
pele mbuli mbwasalala oyo uwakamwiita, anywebo nobeni amusalale mukweenda kwanu koonse,
nkaambo kakuti kulilembedwe kuti, Amusalale, nkaambo ndasalala mebo.
Eno mbuli mbumumwaamba kuti ngu-Taateesu, uutalangi ciimo pele kufumbwa muntu ulamubeteka acamilimo yakwe, amukaende cakuyoowa ciindi coonse cabweenzu bwanu bwaansi ano.
Nkaambo mulizi kuti teensi zintu zikulumpala, mbuli insiliva niiba ingolida, nzimwakanunuzigwa kukweenda kwanu kwabuyo nkumwakasiilwa kumauso, pe,
mwakanunuzigwa abulowa buyandisi mbuli bwamwanambelele uutajisi akampenda nanka kabala, nkokuti bulowa bwa-Kristo.
Walo ncobeni wakakanzwa kukusaanguna, nyika kiitana kulengwa, pele wakayubununwa kumamanino aaciindi nkaambo kandinywe.
Kulinguwe mwaba basikusyoma Leza, uwakamubusya kulufu akumupa bulemu, kuti lusyomo lwanu abulangizi bwanu zikabe kuli-Leza
nkaambo oko kuzyalululwa nkumuzyalulwidwe takweensi kwambuto iifwika, pe, nkwambuto iitafwiki, nkokuti makani aa-Leza maumi aakalilide.
Nkaambo kakuti
Nyama yoonse ilikozyene amani,
Bulemu bwayo boonse bulikozyene amalangalanga aamusokwe,
Mani alayuminina, aalo malangalanga alakunkumuka,
Ngangao Makani Mabotu ngomwakakambaukilwa.
Amukozye mbuli bavwanda kukuyandisya mukupa wamuuya uutavwelwi acintu, kuti mukomene anguwo mulufutuko.
Mbuli mbumwalabila kale buuya bwa-Mwami,
eno amuswenenene kulinguwe, uukonya ibbwe igumi, lisowegwa kubantu pele lisale kuli-Leza, ndiyandisi,
kuti anywebo mube mbuli mabwe maumi, mukayakwe kuba iŋanda ya-Muuya, akuba bapaizi basalala, kuti mukatuule zipaizyo zyamuuya zitambulika kuli-Leza muli-Jesu Kristo.
Nkaambo mumagwalo kulaambwa kuti,
Amubone! Ndasitikizya mu-Zioni ibbwe lyakucizwi caŋanda, lisale, liyandisi,
Nkabela uumusyoma takooyoousigwa bweeme.
alimwi, Lyaba ibbwe lilebya bantu amwala uufumpuzya. Balalebesegwa kulindilyo nkaambo kakutaswiililisya Makani. Ncencico ncibakakanzilwa kale.
Pele nywebo muli musyobo musale, bapaizi bami, cisi cisalala, bantu bavubidwe kuli-Leza kuti mukatondezye milimo iitembaulika yayooyo uwakamwiita kuzwa mumudima akumunjizya mumumuni wakwe uugambya.
Kalekale teemwakali cisi, pele sunu muli cisi ca-Leza. Kalekale teemwakafwididwe lweetelelo, pele sunu mulifwididwe lweetelelo.
Amujatisye kweenda kwanu kubotu akati kabamasi, kuti nobamusendaula sunu kuti muli babi, bakamulemye Leza kubuzuba bwakulingula nkaambo kakulangilila milimo yanu mibotu.
nokuba kubeendelezi bakwe mbobali batumwa nguwe kuti babeteke babisya akulumbaizya bacita ciluleme.
Nkaambo ndondulo luyando lwa-Leza, kuti mukucita kabotu mukaumuzye bantu bafubafuba batezi makani.
Mbomuli balubusi, mutasanduli bulubusi bwanu kuba bwakusisa bubi, pele amucite mbuli bazike ba-Leza,
Amubalemeke bantu boonse. Amuyande babunyina, Amumuyoowe Leza, Amumulemye mwami wacisi.
Nkaambo kulalumbika, na muntu ayumina mapenzi akuyeeya Leza, nokuba kuti wapenzegwa aatamweelede.
Ino kuli amilimonzi na mwayumina lukomo lwakubisya kwanu? Pele na mwayumina kupenzegwa ciindi cakucita kabotu, eco ncecilumbika kuli-Leza.
Nciconya eco ncimwakaitilwa, nkaambo Kristo alakwe wakamucisilwa, wakamusiila cibonesyo, kuti mukatobele mumikondo yakwe.
Alimwi teemwakajanwa lweeno mumulomo wakwe.
Naakapenzegwa takakabbodola, pe,
pele makani aakwe wakaasia mumaanza aamubetesi mubotu.
Zibi zyesu wakazilemenenwa mumubili wakwe mwini acisamu, kuti tuzwe muzibi, tuponene bululami, Mibunda yakwe njiimuponya.
Nkaambo mwakalikozyene ambelele izyakasweeka, pele sunu mulipilukide kumweembezi wanu, sikulingula myuuya yanu.
kukulangilila inyendelo zyanu zisalala nzimweendela cakuyoowa.
Kulisakatizya kwanu kutabi kwaatala, kwakupesa masusu akusama ingolida akusamisya masini,
akube kwamukati kamoyo, nkokuti lulisakatizyo lwamoyo mubombe mutontozi, uuyandika loko mumeso aa-Leza,
Nkaambo mbubonya obo mbobakali kulisakatizya anakazi basalala baciindi abakali kusyoma kuli-Leza. Bakali kulibombya kubalumi babo.
Mulizi Sara mbwaakali kuswiilila kuli-Abrahamu akumwaamba kuti mwami, nkabela nywebo muli bana ba-Sara na mwacita kabotu akutazundwa kumacijo aali buti.
Mutabweedezyi cibi kucibi, naaba matusi kumatusi, pe, embo, pele amubweedezye kulongezya. Nkaambo nciconya eci, ncimwakaitilwa, kuti mukavube zilongezyo nobeni,
Nkaambo kulaambwa kuti,
Uuyandisya kubona buumi,
Akulijanina mazuba mabotu,
Alesye lulimi lwakwe kububi,
Amulomo wakwe utaambi calweeno,
Aleye kububi, acite kabotu.
Ayandaule luumuno akulutobela.
Nkaambo meso aa-Jehova ali kubaluleme,
Amatwi aakwe alijukide kukukomba kwabo,
Pele busyu bwa-Jehova mbukali kulibacitazibi.
Ino nguni uuti mubisye mwasungwaalila zintu zibotu?
Pele nekuba kuti mwapenzegwa nkaambo kabululami, mulaba basicoolwe. Mutayoowi kuyoosya kwabo, nikuba kulikataazya,
pele amulemeke Kristo mumyoyo yanu kuti ngo-Mwami. Amube balibambide lyoonse, kuti mubapandulwide boonse bamubuzya makani aalusyomo lumukalilide, pele amuvuwe amoyo mutete akuyoowa Leza.
Alimwi amube amanjezeezya aasalala, kuti nobamuvwiya kuti muli babi, bakausidwe bweeme abo basendaula kweenda kwanu kubotu kwabanakristo.
Mbubonya obo mbwaakainka kuyookambaukila myuuya iyakaangidwe,

njenjiyo iyakaba basicinguni kalekale, ciindi Leza ncaakacili kukazika moyo wakwe mumazuba aa-Nowa, naakacili mukuyaka bwaato. Mumonya omo mubwaato mumwakavunwa kumaanzi bantu bace, nkokuti bali musanu mubatatu.

Aya makani ncecikozyano calubapatizyo mboluvuna ndinywe sunu (taakweensi kwaamba kuti mwalisalazya kutombe lyamubili, pele nkokuti mulayandaula manjezezya mabotu mumeso aa-Leza) kububuke bwa-Jesu Kristo,
uukala kululyo lwa-Leza, nkaambo wakainka kujulu, abaangelo abasibwami abasinguzu boonse balibikidwe kunsi lyakwe.
kuti kuciindi coonse cicimusyaalide ansi ano ­mutaceendi muzisusi zyanyama pele mumakanze aa-Leza,
Nkaambo cakomena ciindi ncimwakasowa kale kukucita mbuli mbubacita bamasi. Mwakali kweenda mubumpuwe amuzisusi zibi, mukukolwa amunjalalando, muku senga bukoko amukukomba mizimo iitondwa,
lino sunu balagamba kubona kuti tamuceendi abo mukuya buvuzya butaka, nkabela balamuvwiya ankuko.
Pele bayoolivwiilila kulinguwe uuti beteke bantu boonse buyo, baumi abafwide.
Nciconya eco Makani Mabotu ncaakakambaukilwa kulibafwide, kuti nobabetekwa ambobabetekwa bantu mumibili, bakapone mbwapona Leza mumuuya.
Kwiinda zyoonse amusungwaale kuyandana, nkaambo luyando ndoluvumba zibi zinjizinji.
Amukasamausyanye, mutatongaukani.
Kufumbwa zipego zya-Muuya nzimutambwide, amugwasyanye anzizyo, nkaambo mbubonya obu mbubeelede abo baabilwa luzyalo lwa-Leza lubeleka muziyanza ziyanza.

Naakuli uukambauka, akambauke mbuli uuamba majwi aa-Leza. Naakuli uubeleka milimo, abeleke kunguzu nzyamupa Leza, kuti kumakani oonse Leza akalemekwe muli-Jesu Kristo, Ngonguwe ngusyaatwakwe abulemu abwami lyoonse alyoonse kukabe kutamani. Ameni.
pe, nkaambo mwaba bapenzinyina Kristo, aboobo muleelede kukondwa, kuti mukakondwe akusekelela kuciindi eco acalo ncibuyooyubununwa bulemu bwakwe.
Na mwasampaulwa nkaambo kazina lya-Kristo, elyo muli basicoolwe, ikuti ndilyonya ndimukalilide Muuya wabulemu, nkokuti Muuya wa-Leza.
Tacili cibotu kuti umwi wanu wapenzegwa nkaambo kabujayi na kubba na kucita zibi, nanka nkaambo kakuti ngusindimi zyobile,
pele na ulapenzegwa nkaambo kabunakristo bwakwe, eci tacili cintu cakumufwisya bweeme, pe, ncintu nceelede kulumba Leza,
Na nciyumu akubaluleme kufutulwa, ino balaba buti basikasampusampu abasizibi.
Eno abo bapenga caluyando lwa-Leza kabaya bucita milimo mibotu akupa myuuya yabo mumaanza aa-Leza Cilenga uusyomeka.
Ndati, amweembele butanga bwa-Leza buli akati kanu, alimwi kutabi kwakusinikizigwa, pe, akube camoyo omwe, Kutabi kwakuunya kulubono lwaansi, pele kwamoyo uutuba.
Mutabaciti kamikami abeembelwa ndinywe, pele amubabede citondezyo cakutobela,
eno aakuyubununwa Mweembezi Simutwe, mukajane musini uutanunsauki wabulemu.
Leza ulabakazya basikulisumpula,
Pele batete-myoyo ulabapa luzyalo.
Makataazyo aanu oonse amwaasowele kumaanza aakwe, nkaambo nguumucebuka lyoonse.
Amulwane anguwe, mube bayumu mulusyomo, nkaambo mulizi kuti mapenzi aya ngaonya alasikila kubunyina bwanu bwakumasi oonse.
Eno mwamana kupenga kaindi, Leza siluzyalo loonse, uwakamwiita mubulemu bwakwe butamani buli muli-Jesu Kristo, ulamupa inguzu akumuzyatika akumubombomeka.
Akube bwami kulinguwe lyoonse alyoonse kukabe kutamani. Ameni.
Balamujuzya basimbunganonyoko bamu-Babuloni, mbimwakasalwa obo. Alakwe mwanaangu Marko ulamujuzya.
Amujuzyanye alumyontano lwaluyando.
Luumuno alube kulindinywe nyoonse nomuli muli-Kristo.
Ndime Simoni Petro, muzike aapostolo wa-Jesu Kristo. Ndamujuzya nywebo nomuli alusyomo luyandisi mbuli lwesu, ndomulolezedwe mubululami bwa-Leza abwa-Mufutuli wesu Jesu Kristo.
Amuvuzizigwe luzyalo aluumuno mukumuzibisya Leza a-Jesu Mwami wesu.
alimwi momulinzizyo mwaakatupa zisyomezyo ziyandisi zipati loko, kuti mulinzizyo, mube acaabilo, cabu-Leza akuvunwa kubusofwaazi bwaansi ano buzwa kuzisusi zibi.
Nkaambo kaako, amusungwaale camoyo woonse, kuti kulusyomo lwanu muyungizizye bubotu, akububo, tu bwanu luzibo,
akuluzibo lwanu lulyeendelezyo, akululyeendelezyo lwanu lukakatilo, akulukakatilo lwanu kulemeka Leza,
akukulemeka Leza luyandano lwabunyina, akuluyandano lwabunyina moyo waluzyalo.
Nkaambo kakuti makani aya anoomukalilide akuvula alamukasya kuba batolo nanka kubula micelo, mukuzibisya Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo,
pele uutajisi makani aya moofu, ngusibbayibayi, mbwaakaluba kusanzigwa kwazibi zyakwe zyakalekale.
Nkaambo kaako, nobakwesu, amusungwaale kusimpizya, lusinizyo lwakwiitwa kwanu alwakusalwa kwanu, nkaambo na mwacita aya makani, tamukooyoolebwa limbi,
aboobo muyoofonkwedwa bunjilo bwakunjila mu-Bwami butamani bwa-Mwanli Mufutuli wesu Jesu Kristo.
Ndayeeya kuti ncibotu kumuyeezya obo nencili mucilao ecino,
nkaambo ndizi kuti, kaba kaindi buyo, eci cilao cangu cileelede kumwaigwa, mbubonya mbwaakandaambila Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo.
Alimwi ndasungwaalila kuti nendazwa, kamucinooya buyeeya makani aya lyoonse,

Nkaambo nitwakamuzibya makani aanguzu zya-Jesu Kristo akuboola kwakwe, teetwakali kutobela zyamankwangwaalizya zicitwa akusongwaalasongwaala kwabantu, pe, nkaambo twakabona bupati bwakwe mumeso, esu tubeni.
Twakabona naakatambula kuli-Leza Wisi lulemeko abulemu, nkabela wakasikilwa eli ijwi lizwa kubulemu bupati lyakuti, Ngooyu Mwanaangu uuyandwa ngwenkondelwa.
Eli ijwi twakalimvwa, lyakazwa kujulu notwakali awe kucilundu cisalala.

Mbubonya obo mbutwakasimpikizigwa lusinizyo lwamajwi aabasinsimi. Ayo majwi mulabotya na mwateya matwi kulingao, nkaambo ali mbuli ilampi limunika mumudima, mane kusikila kubucedo kumazwido aantanda mumyoyo yanu.
Mulizi kale kuti masinsime aamagwalo taakoopandululwa kumuntu omwe,
nkaambo teensi luyando lwamuntu lwakaleta businsimi kalekale, pe, pele bantu ba-Leza bakaamba mbobakasungulwa Muuya wa-Leza.
Lino bantu banjibanji bayoobatobela muzisusi zyabo zibi, nkabela nkaambo kabaaba inzila yabwini iyoosampaulwa.
Mululikumbuzyo lwabo bayoomunyanzya-nyanzya amajwi aalukukubiko. Nekubaboobo lubeteko ndubakabikilwa kalekale talukooyoomuka kusika, alwalo lunyonyooko lwabo talukonzyi koona,
Alimwi takailekede nyika yakalekale, pele wakamubamba Nowa, mukambausi wabululami, abamwi bali musanu mubabili, naakapazya maanzi kulibasikasampusampu boonse baansi.
Alimwi wakaibeteka minzi ya-Sodoma a-Gomora, wakaitenta amulilo mane kwakasyaala itwe luzutu, kuti cibe ciluuzyo kulibaabo beenda cakasampusampu,
pele wakamuvuna Lota uululeme, uwakali kukataazigwa akweenda kwabasizibi muzisusi zyabo zibi.
Nkaambo oyo muntu uululeme, naakali kukala akati kabo, mazuba oonse wakali kupenga mumoyo wakwe uululeme nkaambo kamilimo yabo mibi njaakali kubona akuswiilila.
Aboobo tulabona kuti Jehova ulizi kuvuna bamukomba kumasukusyo, akuyobola bataluleme mulukomo mane kusikila kubuzuba bwalubeta,
kwaambisya abo bazumina kweenda muzisusi zifosweede zyabunyama, abaabo banenya bwami.
Ma! Aba basingulumukila balalipa bupati! Tabayoowi kusampaula balemu,
anukuti baangelo, babainda kunguzu akubupati, tababikili imbeta zyakusampaula kubusyu bwa-Jehova,
Pele abo bali mbuli banyama batakwe muyeeyo bakalengwa mbuli zinyama ziteegwa akunyonyoonwa, nkabela mbobaamba ncobatezi, balafwidilila akunyonyooka,
aboobo balabisizigwa acibweedezyo cakubisya kwabo. Cintu cibabotela nkulilela lyoonse isikati. Ntotubala, ntotumpenda. Balalilela beni mumapobwe aabo ngobapobola akati kanu.
Meso aabo alizwide mamambi, taaleki kubisya. Baloonga bapilausi, Myoyo yabo ilizibilide lulinyanzizyo. Mbana balutuko.
Basia inzila iiluleme, baleya, baakutola inzila ya-­Balamu mwanaakwe Beori. Oyo musinsimi Balamu wakali kuyanda cilumbo cabutaka,
pele wakabwekelwa kubutaka bwakwe mwini, nkaambo imbongolo­ iitakwe imputo yakaamba ajwi lyabuntu, yakasinkila bufubafuba bwakwe.
Balaamba majwi aakulitunkula amakani aatawo, aboobo baloongelezya azisusi zibi zyabunyama beenzinyina bati loboke kuzwa kulibaabo bateendi munzila imbotu.
Balabasyomezya bulubusi, anukuti balo beni mbazike babubi, nkaambo kufumbwa cintu ncaazundwa muntu cilamucita muzike waco.
Nicakabota nibatakaziba inzila yabululami kwiinda kuti basaangune kwiiziba, elyo musule bafutatile mulao uusalala ngobapedwe.
Kwababeda mbubonya mbobakaamba kasimpi kenikeni kakuti,
Mubwa wabweedela bulusi bwakwe mwini,
Alakwe nkuntula uwakasambide wabweedela kwaalabana mubutimba.
kuti mukaibaluke makani aakaambwa kalekale kubasinsimi basalala amulao wa-Mwami Mufutuli ngomwaletelwa kubaapostolo banu.
cakwaamba kuti, Ino kuli kuli kuboola kwakwe ukwakasyomezegwa? Nkaambo kakuti kuzwa kuciindi nibakafwa mataateesu, zintu zyoonse zicili mbubonya mbozyakabede kuzwa kumalengelo.
Pele balilubya-lubya caali kuti, Ijulu lyakalengwa kalekale, ayalo nyika yakanunwa mumaanzi akuyobolwa akati kamaanzi, kujwi lya-Leza,
alimwi eyo nyika yaciindi eciya yakanyonyoonwa kulingao, mboyakapayizigwa maanzi.
Eno ijulu anyika nzi tu bona sunu zyayobwedwa lubeta, kujwi elyo ndilyonya, ziti kanyonyoonwe amulilo mubuzuba obo mbubayoobetekwa bantu basikasampusampu.
Jehova taamusya ngaakasyomezya kale, mbobayeeya bamwi kuti wamuka, pe, pele ucimukazikila moyo, nkaambo tayandi kuti bantu bafwidilile, ulayanda kuti boonse bajane ciindi cakweempwa.
Buzuba bwa-Jehova bulasika mbubonya mbwasika mubbi, Kulimbubo ijulu liyooindilila acamuzunzumina mupati, tunyenyeezi tuyooyaka akubomboloka, ayalo nyika iyootentwa azicitwa kulinjiyo.
Lino zintu ezi mbuziti kamaninine obo, nywebo muleelede kuba bantu bali buti mukweenda munzila iisalala amukulemeka Leza?
Mucilangila akuyandisya buzuba bwakusika kwa-Leza, mboliyoomana ijulu kukupya, atunyenyeezi notuyootentwa akweenzunuka,
Pele swebo tulangila ijulu ipya anyika impya, mbubonya mbuli mbwaakatusyomezya, Mulinzizyo momukala bululami.
Amuyeeye kuti kukazika moyo kwa-Mwami nkokuleta lufutuko, mbubonya mbwaakamulembela alakwe mukwesu uuyandwa Paulo, kubusongo mbwaakapegwa.

Wakaamba makani aya mumagwalo aakwe oonse. Ayo magwalo alijisi amakani amwi mayumu kukumvwigwa, nkabela bataiyide abapilausi balasandula-sandula ayo makani, mbubonya mbobasandula aamwi magwalo, cakulinyonyoona beni.
Kamuya bukomena kuluzyalo amuluzibo lwa-Mwami Mufutuli wesu Jesu Kristo, Kulinguwe akube bulemu sunu alyoonse kukabe kutamani, Ameni.
(Nkaambo buumi bwakayubununwa, twakabubona, nkabela lino tulalungulula akuzibisya kulindinywe obo buumi butamani ibwakali a-Taata, ibwakayubununwa kulindiswe).
Eco ncitwakabona akumvwa, nciconya, ncitumuzibisya anywebo, kuti anywebo mube aluswanaano andiswe. Ncobeni luswanaano lwesu luli a-Taata a-Mwanaakwe Jesu Kristo.
Aya makani ngitumulembela ngakuti kubotelwa kwanu kuzuzigwe.
Na twaamba kuti tulijisi luswanaano anguwe, nekubaboobo tuleenda mumudima, twabeja, tatuciti lusinizyo.
Pele na tuleenda mumumuni, mbubonya alakwe mbwali mumumuni, tulijisi luswanaano umwi aumwi, alimwi bulowa bwa-Jesu Kristo Mwana wakwe bulatusalazya kuzibi zyoonse.
Na twaamba kuti tatujisi zibi, twalyeena lwesu tubeni, elyo lusinizyo taluli mulindiswe.
Kuti twalyaamba zibi zyesu, walo ulasyomeka akululama, ulatulekelela zibi zyesu akutusalazizya zitaluleme zyoonse,
Na twaamba kuti tatukwe twakabisya, twamucita mubeji, ijwi lyakwe talili mulindiswe.
Walo ngomulungo wazibi zyesu, alimwi teensi kulindiswe akulike, pele kuzibi zyanyika yoonse.
Mbuboobo mbutuzi kuti tulimuzi, na kuti twabamba milazyo yakwe,
Oyo uuamba kuti ndimuzi, anukuti tabambi milazyo yakwe, mubeji, lusinizyo taluli mulinguwe.
Pele oyo uubamba ijwi lyakwe, ncobeni luyando lwa-Leza lulilondokede mulinguwe. Mbuboobu mbutuzi kuti tuli mulinguwe.
Oyo uuamba kuti ndi mulinguwe, uleelede kweenda mwini mbubonya mbuli mbwaakeenda walo.
Alimwi ndamulembela mulazyo mupya, ncecintu calusinizyo mulinguwe amulindinywe, nkaambo mudima wainda, nkabela mumuni mwinimwini ulamwekamweka.
Oyu uuamba kuti, Ndi mumumuni, nekubaboobo ulasula mweenzinyina, ucili mumudima ambuli sunu.
Oyo uuyandisisya mweenzinyina ulakalilila mumumuni, taakwe cilebyo mulinguwe.
Pele oyo uusula mweenzinyina uli mumudima, uleenda mumudima, alimwi tezi nkwaya, nkaambo mudima woofwaazya meso aakwe.
Ndalemba kulindinywe nomatata, nkaambo mulimuzi uuzwa kumatalikilo. Ndalemba kulindinywe, nobakubusi, nkaambo mwakamuzunda mubi. Ndamulembela, nobana bangu, nkaambo mwakamuziba Taata.
Ndakamulembela nomatata, nkaambo mulimuzi uuzwa kumatalikilo, Ndakalemba kulindinywe, nobakubusi, nkaambo muli bayumu, ijwi lya-Leza lilimukalilide mukati, alimwi mwakazunda mubi.
Mutayandi nyika, nezibazintu zyamunyika, Kuti muntu wayanda nyika, luyando lwa-Taata taluli mulinguwe.
Nkaambo zintu zyoonse zili munyika, niziba zisusi zyanyama niziba zisusi zyameso nikuba kulisumpula kwabuumi, tazili zya-Taata, pe, nzyenyika.
Alimwi nyika ilamana, azisusi zyayo, pele oyo uucita makanze aa-Taata ulakalilila kukabe kutamani.
Bakazwa kulindiswe, pele teebakali besu. Nibakali besu, nibakakalilila aswe, pele bakazwa kulindiswe kuti, kuyubununwe kuti boonse teebakali besu.
Lino nywebo mwakananikwa a-Uusalala, alimwi mulizi zintu zyoonse.
Teensi nkaambo kakuti tamuzi lusinizyo nkindamulemba, pe, nkaambo muliluzi, alimwi mulizi kuti taakwe kubeja kulusinizyo.
Ngwani mubeji cita oyu uutazumini kuti Jesu ngu-Kristo? Ngooyo SikulwanyaKristo, oyo uutama Taata a-Mwanaakwe.
Oyu uutama Mwana, nguwenya uutajisi Taata, pele oyo uuzuminina Mwana nguwenya uujisi Taata alakwe.
Nkaambo kaako amucileke cimukalilile, eco ncimwakamvwa kumatalikilo. Kuti eco ncimwakamvwa: kumatalikilo camukalilila, elyo muyoojatisisya mu-Mwana amuli-Taata.
Eci ncecisyomezyo ncaakatusyomezya, buumi butamani.
Ndamulembela makani aya nkaambo kabaabo bamweena.

Pele nywebo, kunanikwa nkumwakatambula kulinguwe, kulamukalilila, alimwi tamuyandi umwi muntu kuti amwiisye, nkaambo oku kunanikwa nkukonya kulamwiisya zintu zyoonse, nkabela nkwalusinizyo, taakwe kubeja mulinkuko. Lino mbubonya mbuli mbumwakaiisigwa, amukalilile mulinguwe.
Lino nobana bangu, amukalilile mulinguwe, kuti aakulibonya, tukabe akaanzambwene, tatukausi bweeme kumeso aakwe kukuboola kwakwe.
Kuti kamuzi kuti walo uliluleme, elyo mulizi kuti umwi aumwi uucita bululami ulizyedwe kulinguwe.
Nobayandwa, lino tuli bana ba-Leza, alimwi takuna kuyubununwa mbutuzooba, pele tulizi kuti nazoolibonya tuzooba mbuli nguwe, nkaambo tuzoomubona mbuli mbwabede.
Nkabela muntu woonse uujisi lusyomo olu mumoyo wakwe ulalisalazya mbubonya mbuli mbwasalala alakwe.
Umwi aumwi uucita zibi ulasotoka mulao, nkaambo zibi nkokusotoka mulao.
Mulizi kuti walo wakayubununwa kuti amanizye zibi zyesu, nkabela mulinguwe tamukwe zibi.
Umwi aumwi uukalilila mulinguwe tabisyi. Umwi aumwi uubisya tana kumubona nikuba kumuziba.
Nobana bangu, kutabi muntu uumweena. Oyo uucita bululami mululami, mbuli mbwali mululami alakwe.
Oyo uucita zibi nguwa-Saatani, nkaambo Saatani wakabisya kuzwa kumatalikilo. Nkabela kaambo nkaakayubunwidwa Mwana a-Leza nkaaka, kuti ajaye milimo ya-Saatani.
Umwi aumwi uuzyedwe kuli-Leza taciti zibi, nkaambo imbuto yakwe icikukalilide mukati, aboobo takonzyi kubisya, nkaambo wakazyalwa kuli-Leza.
Lino bana ba-Leza abana ba-Saatani balazibwa boobu. Umwi aumwi uutaciti bululami tali wa-Leza, naba oyo uutayanda mweenzinyina.
Aya ngimakani ngimwakamvwa kuzwa kumatalikilo, kuti tuleelede kuyandana.
Tutabi mbuli Kaini, iwakali wa-Mubi, wakajaya munyina. Ino wakamujayilanzi? Nkaambo kakuti milimo yakwe mwini yakali mibi, anukuti yamunyina yakali mibotu.
Tulizi kuti twakainda kuzwa kulufu akunjila mubuumi, nkaambo tulayanda beenzuma. Umwi aumwi uutayandi mweenzinyina ulakalilila mulufu.
Kufumbwa muntu uusula mweenzinyina, mujayi, alimwi mulizi kuti taakwe mujayi uujisi buumi butamani mulinguwe.
Lino luyando lwa-Leza tulalubona boobu, nkaambo wakatutulila buumi bwakwe, nkabela aswebo tuleelede kutula buumi bwesu nkaambo kabeenzuma.
Pele oyo uujisi imbono zyaansi ano, nekubaboobo naabona mweenzinyina uubulide ulamujalila luzyalo lwakwe, ino luyando lwa-Leza lulakala buti mulinguwe?
Nobana bangu, luyando lwesu lutabi lwamajwi buyo niluba lwalulumi, lube lwamulimo alwalusinizyo.
Mbuboobu mbutuzi kuti tuli basilusinizyo, alimwi tuzoorontozya myoyo yesu kunembo lyakwe,
kufumbwa kumakani ngiitupa mulandu myoyo yesu. Nkaambo Leza mupati kwiinda myoyo yesu, alimwi ulizi zintu zyoonse.
Nobayandwa, kuti myoyo yesu tiitupi mulandu, elyo tulijisi kaanzambwene kunembo lya-Leza.
Coonse ncitukumbila­ kulinguwe tulacitambula, nkaambo tulabamba milazyo yakwe akucita ezyo zintu zibotezya kumeso aakwe.
Nkabela mulazyo wakwe ngooyu, wakuti tuzumine kuzina lya-Mwana wakwe, Jesu Kristo, akuyandana mbubonya mbuli mbwaakatulailila.
Oyo uubamba milazyo yakwe ulakalilila mulinguwe, alakwe mulinguwe. Alimwi mbuboobu mbutuzi kuti ulakalilila mulindiswe, nkaambo ka-Muuya ngwaakatupa.
Mbuboobu mbumuti zibe Muuya wa-Leza! woonse muuya uuzumina kuti Jesu Kristo wakaboola munyama nguwa-Leza.
Pele muuya woonse uutazumina kuti Jesu Kristo wakaboola munyama tuuli wa-Leza, oyu ngomuuya wa-Sikulwanya-Kristo, nkaambo mwakamvwa kuti ulaboola, lino kuciindi ecino muuli kale munyika.
Nobana bangu, inywe muli ba-Leza, aboobo mwakabazunda, nkaambo oyo uuli mulindinywe mupati kwiinda oyo uuli munyika.
Balo mbaansi ano, nkaambo kaako balaambaula makani aansi, alimwi insi ilabaswiilila.
Swebo tuli ba-Leza. Oyo uumuzi Leza ulatumvwa, oyo uutali wa-Leza tatumvwi. Mbubonya obo mbutuzi muuya walusinizyo amuuya wabubeji.
Oyu uutayandi tamuzi Leza, nkaambo Leza nduluyando,
Luyando lwa-Leza lwamulindiswe lwakaboneka boobu, nkaambo Leza wakatuma Mwanaakwe simuzyalwa-alike munyika, kuti tujane buumi kumaanza aakwe.
Olu nduyando ncobeni, Teensi kwaamba kuti swebo twakayanda Leza, pe, pele walo nguwakatuyanda swebo akutuma Mwanaakwe kuti azoobe mulungo wazibi zyesu,
Nobayandwa, kuti Leza wakatuyanda boobo, aswebo tuleelede kuyandana umwi aumwi,
Taakwe muntu wakabwene Leza, nociba cimwi ciindi. Kuti twayandana umwi aumwi, Leza ulatukalilila, alimwi luyando lwakwe lulilondokede mulindiswe.
Tulizi kuti tulakala mulinguwe, awalo ulakala mulindiswe, nkaambo wakatwaabila muuya wakwe.
Nkabela twakabona, alimwi tulalungulula kuti Taata wakatuma Mwana kuzooba Mufutuli wanyika.
Kufumbwa muntu uuzumina kuti Jesu ngo-Mwana wa-Leza, Leza ulikalilide mulinguwe, alakwe ulikalilide muli-Leza.
Lino swebo twakaluziba akuluzuminina luyando Leza ndwaakatuyandisya. Leza nduyando, aboobo oyo uukalilila muluyando ulakalilila muli-Leza, alakwe Leza ulakalilila mulinguwe.
Lino luyando lwakulindiswe lulalondoka boobu, kuti tukabe akaanzambwene mubuzuba bwalubeta, nkaambo mbuli mbwabede walo, mbubonya mbutubede aswebo ansi ano.
Taakwe kuyoowa muluyando, pele luyando lulondokede ndolugwisya kuyoowa, nkaambo kuyoowa nkokujisi mapenzi. Oyo uuyoowa talondoledwe muluyando.
Swebo tulamuyanda nkaambo nguwakasaanguna kuyanda ndiswe.
Na muntu wati, Ndamuyanda Leza, nekubaboobo ulasula mweenzinyina, oyo mubeji, Nkaambo oyo uutayandi mweenzinyina ngwabwene takonzyi kuyanda Leza ngwatanabwene.
Nkabela ngooyu mulazyo ngutwakajana uuzwa kulinguwe, wakuti oyo uuyanda Leza uleelede kuyanda mweenzinyina alakwe.
Tulizi kuti tulabayanda bana ba-Leza, aleelyo netuyanda Leza akubamba milazyo yakwe.
Oku nkokuyanda Leza, kuti twabamba milazyo yakwe, alimwi milazyo yakwe tiili miyumu.
Coonse cili buti cizyedwe kuli-Leza cilazunda nyika, nkabela luzundo luzunda nyika ndoolu, ndusyomo lwesu.
Nguni oyo uuzunda nyika cita oyo uuzumina kuti Jesu ngu-Mwana wa-Leza.
Oyu ngonguwe wakeza amaanzi abulowa, nkukuti Jesu Kristo. Teewakeza amaanzi alike, pele amaanzi abulowa,
Nkabela Muuya nguulungulula, nkaambo Muuya ndolusinizyo.
Nkaambo nzitatu zilungulula, nkukuti Muuya amaanzi abulowa, alimwi ezi zintu zyotatwe zilazuminana.
Kuti twazumina bukamboni bwabantu, bukamboni bwa-Leza mbupati, nkabela obu mbobukamboni bwa-Leza mbwaakalungulula a-Mwana wakwe.
Oyo uuzuminina Mwana wa-Leza ulijisi bukamboni mulinguwe mwini. Oyo uutazuminina Leza wamucita mubeji, nkaambo tazuminini bukamboni obo Leza mbwaakatupa aa-Mwana wakwe.
Lino bukamboni mboobu, bwakuti Leza wakatupa buumi butamani, obu buumi buli mu-Mwana wakwe.
Oyo uujisi Mwana ulijisi buumi, pele oyo uutajisi Mwana wa-Leza tajisi buumi, pe.
Lino kaanzambwene nkitujisi kubusyu bwakwe nkaaka kakuti, na twakumbila kufumbwa cintu cili buti cili mbuli makanze aakwe, ulatumvwa.
Nkabela na tulizi kuti ulatumvwa, coonse ncotukumbila, tulizi kuti tulijisi zikumbilo nzitwamukumbila,

Na muntu wabona mweenzinyina wabisya cibi citali calufu, ulamukumbilila, elyo Leza ulamupa buumi. Nkukwaamba kuti abo batabisyi zibi zyalufu. Zimwi zibi nzyalufu, nsikwe ndaamba kuti ulakombela nzizyo.
Zyoonse zitaluleme nzezibi, pele kuli zibi zimwi zitatoli kulufu.
Tulizi kuti tuli ba-Leza anyika yoonse iikede muzibi,

Alimwi tulizi kuti Mwana wa-Leza wakasika, wakatupa busongo kuti tumuzibe silusinizyo, alimwi tuli mulinguwe oyu silusinizyo nkukuti mu-Mwana wakwe Leza, Jesu Kristo. Oyu ngu-Leza mwini mwini, mbuumi butamani.
Nobana bangu, amucenjele kuti mutavwelani amituni. Ameni.
Aceeci nkaambo kalusinizyo lukala mulindiswe, alimwi luyooba aswe akutamani.
Luzyalo luyooba kulindiswe, alweetelelo, aluumuno, kuzwa kuli-Leza Taateesu akuli-Jesu Kristo, Mwanaakwe Taateesu, mulusinizyo amuluyandano.
Ndakabotelwa loko kujana bana bako bamwi baleenda mulusinizyo, mbubonya mbuli mulazyo ngotwakatambula kuzwa kuli-Taata.
