Aneeno ndakukomba, namalelo, teensi mbuli kuti ndali kulemba mulazyo mupya, pele oyo ngotwakajisi kuzwa kumatalikilo, kuti tuyandane.
Lino olu ndoluyando, kuti tweende akutobela milazyo yakwe. Oyu ngomulazyo, mbuli mbomwakamvwa kuzwa kumatalikilo, kuti muleelede kweenda mumonya.
Nkaambo basilweeno banji mobali munyika, abo batazumini kuti Jesu Kristo ulisikide munyama. Oyu ngusilweeno, ngo-SikulwanyaKristo.
Amulilange, kuti mutasweekelwi zintu nzitwakabelekela, pele kuti mutambule bulumbu buzulide.
Umwi aumwi uusololela kumakani ambi akutakala mulwiiyo lwa-Kristo, tajisi Leza. Oyu uukala mulwiiyo ngonguwe uujisi Taata a-Mwana alakwe.
Kuti umwi wasika kulindinywe akutaleta olu lwiiyo, mutamutambuli muŋanda yanu, mutamujuzyi,
nkaambo oyu uumujuzya ulaabilwa milimo yakwe mibi.
Bana bamucizi wako musale bakujuzya.
Oyandwa, ndakomba kuti uende kabotu muzintu zyoonse akupona kumubili mbubonya mbuuenda kabotu muuya wako.
Nkaambo ndakabotelwa loko inzubo nezyakasika akuba bakamboni balusinizyo lwako, mbuli mboenda mulusinizyo.
Taakwe kubotelwa kumbi nkunjisi kupati kwiinda oku kwakumvwa kuti bana bangu baleenda mulusinizyo.
Oyandwa, wacita mulimo uusyomeka oyo woonse ngocita kunzubo akubeenzu.
Aba bakaleta bukamboni bwaluyando lwako kubusyu bwambungano, Lino ulacita kabotu kuti wabasindikizya mulweendo lwabo mbubonya mbweeledwe Leza.
Nkaambo bakainka nkaambo kezina lyakwe, kabatatambuli cintu neciba comwe cabamasi.
Nkabela swebo tuleelede kusamausya bantu mbuli baaba, kuti tube basikubelekanyina mumilimo yalusinizyo.
Ndakalemba kaniini kumbungano, pele Diotrefe oyo uuyanda kuba mupati akati kabo, tatutambuli.

Elyo, na ndasika, nzooyeeya milimo yakwe njacita, naamba majwi mabi kulindiswe, alimwi talamwi akooku, pele alimwi tatambuli inzubo mwini, abaabo bayanda kuzitambula ulabakasya akubatanda kuzwa kumbungano.
Oyandwa, utatobeli zintu zibi, tobela zintu zibotu, Oyo uucita kabotu nguwa-Leza, oyo uucita bubi tabwene Leza.
Demetrio ulijisi bukamboni bubotu bwabantu boonse abwalusi-nizyo lwini, ii, aswe tuli bakamboni, ayebo ulizi kuti bukamboni bwesu mbwanconzyo.
Ndasyoma kuti nzoofwambaana kukubona, lino tuzooambaula kubusyu abusyu. Kuumuna kube kulinduwe. Beenzinyoko bakujuzya. Juzya beenzuma aumwi aumwi.
Amuvuzizigwe luzyalo aluumuno aluyando.

Nkaambo kulisobelede akati kanu bamwi bantu, abakalembeledwe nkuko kale. Mbasikasampusampu, balasandula luzyalo lwa-Leza wesu kuba zisusi zibi, alimwi balatama Jesu Kristo, ngonguwe alike Simalelo wesu, Mwami wesu.
Abalo baangelo abatakajatisya bwami bwabo bwakusaanguna pele bakabusia busena bwabo, wakabaanga azyaanzyo zitamani mumudima uusia mbi, kuti bakalindile mane kusikila kulubeteko lwabuzuba bupati.
Mbubonya obo Sodoma a-Gomora aminzi imwi iyakabambene ayo mbuyakabisya kukucita bwaamu akuba azisusi ziteelede, nkabela yakabikwa kuti ibe citondezyo cakuciswa kwaluumo lwamulilo uutamani.
Nokubaboobo aba basikulota-lota bacibisya mbubonya, balalisofwaazya kumibili, balaubaansya bwami akusampaula malemu.
Pele abo balasampaula makani ngobatezi, alimwi makani ngobamvwa buyo mbuli banyama batajisi miyeeyo, balalibisya kulingao.
Maawe kulimbabo, nkaambo kakuti baleenda munzila yaKaini, balitakaanya kumulandu wa-Balamu cakuyandaula lubono, nkabela bafwa mukukazyanya kwa-Kore.
Mayuwe aalwizi aafutu Luka, alakovola bweeme bwao. Ntunyenyeezi tuendeenda buyo, twakayobwedwa mudinla uusia mbi uutamani.
wamusanu mubabili kuzwa
Amubone! Jehova waboola abasalali bakwe abali myaanda yamyaanda
Akubapa mulandu boonse basikasampusampu, Nkaambo kamasampu oonse ngobakasampaula
Amajwi mayumu oonse ngobakaamba aanguwe basizibi basikasampusampu.
nkaambo bakamwaambila kuti, kucindi camamanino kuyooba basabuzi, abeenzegwa muzisusi zyabo zyakasampusampu.
Mbambabo bacita mipampo mipampo. Mbasinyama buyo, tabajisi Muuya,
Pele nywebo nomuyandwa, amuliyake mulusyomo lwanu lusalala cakwiinda, akukomba mu-Muuya Uusalala,
akuliyobola muluyando lwa-Leza cakulangilila lweetelelo lwa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kristo lutola kubuumi butamani.
Lino bamwi amubeetelele nokuba kuciindi ncobakazyanya anywe,
bamwi mubafutule cakubakwempa kumulilo, abamwi amubeetelele cakuyoowa acakusesemwa niiba ingubo iisofweede amubili.
kuliLeza uuli alike, Mufutuli wesu, nkaambo ka-Jesu Kristo Mwami wesu, akube bulemu abupati anguzu abwami, kuzwa kumatalikilo, asunu, alyoonse mane kukabe kutamani. Ameni.
Alakwe Johane wakalungulula makani aa-Leza abukamboni bwa-Jesu Kristo azintu zyoonse nzyaakabona.
Uli acoolwe uubala, abaabo baswiilila majwi aabusinsimi obuno, akubamba zintu ezyo zilembedwe mulimbubo, nkaambo ciindi cili afwaafwi.
akuzwa kuli-Jesu Kristo, ngukamboni uusyomeka, iwakasaanguna kuzyalwa kuzwa kubafu, alimwi ngumweendelezi wabami banyika. Kulinguwe iwakatuyanda, akutusanzya kuzibi zyesu mubulowa bwakwe mwini,
akutubika kuba bami abapaizi kuli-Leza Wisi, kulinguwe akube bulemu abwami lyoonse kukabe kutamani, Ameni,
Amubone, uleza amakumbi, nkabela meso oonse ayoomubona, abaabo bakamuyasa, elyo mikowa yoonse yanyika iyoolila nkaambo kakwe. Akube boobo, Ameni,
Ndime Alfa a-Omega, matalikilo amamanino, mbwaamba Jehova Uuliko, Uwakaliko, Uuyoobako, Singuzuzyoonse.
Ndime johane, ndi mwanaakwanu amweenzinyoko wamumapenzi amu bwami bwa-Jesu Kristo amulukakatilo lwakwe. Ndakali mukasuwa kategwa Patmo nkaambo kamakani aa-Leza abumboni bwa-Jesu Kristo.
Ndakali mu-Muuya kubuzuba bwa-Mwami, elyo ndakamvwa kusule lyangu ijwi ipati mbuli mweembo,

lyakati, Ndime Alfa a-Omega, matalikilo amamanino, Aya makani ngoobona, uleelede kwaalemba mubbuku, akuliruma kumbungano zili musanu azibili zyamu-Asiya, nkukuti kuli­-Efeso, akuli-Smuma, akuli-Perpamo, akuli-Tuaraira, akuli-Sarde, akuliFiladelfia, akuli-Laodikeva,
Lino ndakacebuka kubona ijwi ilyakandaambila, nkabela mukucebuka kwangu ndakabona zibikilo zyamalampi zyangolida zili musanu azibili,
alimwi akati kazibikilo ezyo ndakabona umwi uuli mbuli Mwana a-Muntu, iwakasamide cikobela cilamfu, awakaangidwe kucamba lwambo lwanzolida.
Mutwe wakwe amasusu aakwe akali kutuba mbuli boya bwamhelele butuba, akatuba buu mbuli lukobo, ameso aakwe akali mbuli ibbalabala Ivamulilo.
Maulu aakwe akali mbuli mukuba uusalalisya wapya mumulilo, amwaambo wakwe wakali mbuli ijwi lyamaanzi manjimanji.
Kujanza lyakwe lyalulyo wakalijisi inyenyeezi zili musanu azibili, akumulomo wakwe kwakazwa ipanga libosya koonse koonse, nkabela busyu bwakwe bwakali kumweka mbuli izuba nolimweka canguzu zyalyo.
Lino nindakamubona, ndakawida kumaulu aakwe mbuli mufu, Elyo wakabika ijanza lyakwe lyalulyo alindime, wakandaambila kuti, Utayoowi. Ndime mutaanzi amusyaalizi.
Ndime oyu uupona, nekubaboobo ndakalifwide. Lino amubone, akupona ndapona lyoonse mane kukabe kutamani, nkabela ndijisi zijaluzyo zyalufu azya-Gehena,
Lemba makani ngobwene, amakani aaliwo, makani aazoobawo,

amakani aasisidwe aanyenyeezi zili musanu azibili nziwakabona mujanza lyangu lyalulyo, azibikilo zyamalampi zili musanu azibili. Inyenyeezi zili musanu azibili mbobaangelo bambungano zili musanu azibiti, azibikilo zyamalampi zili musanu azibili nziwakabona nzembungano zili musanu azibili.

Ndizi milimo yako mbwiibede, amapakasyo aako, akukakatila kwako. Ndizi moyo wako mbuutakonzyi kubotelwa babi, ambuwakabasoleka aba balyaamba kuti mbaapostolo, nekubaboobo tabali baapostolo, aboobo wabajana kuti mbabeji.
Ndizi kuti ulijisi lukakatilo, alimwi wakalemenwa nkaambo kazina lyangu, nekubaboobo tokwe nowakalengaana.
Pele mulandu umwi ngunjisi kulinduwe ngooyu, wakuti wakaleka luyando lwako lwakusaanguna.
Lino yeeya kuzwa nkowakawida, uempwe akucita milimo yako yakusaanguna. Kwataba boobo, nzooboola kulinduwe cakufwambaana, nkagwisye cibikilo celampi lyako kuzwa kubusena bwaco, mane uempwe.
Pele ciyanza comwe cibotu ncojisi nceeci, cakuti ulasulaika milimo yabaNikolai, njensulaika ambebo.
Oyo uujisi matwi, aswiilile Muuya ncaambila­ imbungano, Oyo uuzunda njoomupa kulya kumusamu wabuumi uuli mukati ka-Paradaiso wa-Leza.
Ndizi mapenzi aako mbwaabede, abucete bwako (nekubaboobo uli muvubi), alimwi ndizi busanke bwabaabo balyaamba kuti mba-Juda, anukuti tabali ba-Juda, bali imbungano ya-Saatani,

Mutayoowi zintu ezyo nzimuti penzegwe, Amubone, Diabolosi ulawaala bamwi banu muntolongo, kuti mukasunkwe, elyo muyooba mumapenzi mazuba aali ikumi. Kosyomeka mane do kusikila kulufu, lino njookupa musini wabuumi.
Oyo uujisi matwi, aswiilile Muuya mbwaambila imbungano, Oyo uuzunda takooyoociswa kulufu lwabili.

Ndizi nkokala, nkukuti nkukonya nkucibede cuuno ca-Sataani, alimwi nduwe uujatisya izina lyangu, tokokatama lusyomo lwangu, nikuba kumazuba aa-Antipa kamboni wangu musyomesi, iwakajayigwa akati kanu nkwakala Saatani.

Pele ndijisi milandu imwi kulinduwe, nkaambo oko nkobede ulibajisi abo batobela lwiiyo lwa-Balamu iwakamwiisya Balaka kubika cifumpuzyo kunembo lyabana ba-Israyeli, akulya zintu zipaizigwa mizimu akucita bumambi.
Mbubonya obo ulibajisi abalo abo batobela lwiiyo lwaba-Nikolai, ndwensula mebo,
Lino empwa. Kwataba boobo nzookuboolela cakufwambaana, nkabalwanye ipanga lyakumulomo wangu.

Oyo uujisi matwi, aswiilile Muuya mbwaambila imbungano. Oyo uuzunda njoomwaabila Mana aasisidwe, akalye, alimwi njoomupa ibbwe lituba, nkabela atala abbwe elyo alilembedwe izina ipya litazizilwe kumuntu naba omwe pele oyo uulitambula alike.
Ndizi milimo yako mbwiibede, aluyando lwako, alusyomo lwako, akukutauka kwako, alukakatilo lwako, alimwi milimo yako yakumasyaalizyo ilakomena kwiinda eyo yakusaanguna.

Nekubaboobo ndijisi milandu imwi kulinduwe, nkaambo wamuzumizya oyo mwanakazi jezebele, uulyaamba kuti ndi musinsimi, akwiisya akukwela-kwela bazike bangu kucita bumambi, akulya zintu zipaizigwa mizimu,
Alimwi ndakamupa ciindi cakweempwa, pele tayandi kweempwa kubumambe bwakwe.
Amubone, njoomuwaala kubulo, abaaba basimamambenyina njoobanjizya mumapenzi mapati, cita beempwe kumilimo yabo.
Abalo bana bakwe njoobajaya alufu, kuti imbungano zyoonse zikazibe kuti ndime uulingula mucamba amumoyo, nkabela umwi aumwi wanu njoomwaabila mbubonya mbwiibede milimo yakwe.
Pele nywebo nobamwi nomusyeede mu-Tuataira, nomutajisi lwiiyo olu akutana kuziba makani malamfu aabulondo bwa-Saatani, mbuli mbobaamba, ndamwaambila obu. Nsikooyoomubikila mukuli umbi.
Pele eco ncomujisi kale, amucijatisye mane do nkaboole.
Oyo uuzunda akubamba milimo yangu kusikila kumamanino, kulinguwe njoomupa bwami kubantu bamasi oonse,
nkabela uyoobalela amusako walubulo, mbuli inongo yamubumbi mbuzipwayigwa, mbubonya mbuli ambebo mbundakatambula kuli-Taata.
Alimwi njoomupa Intanda.
Oyo uujisi matwi, aswiilile Muuya mbwaambila imbungano.
Amulangile, muyumye zintu zisyaala ziti fwe, nkaambo nsijene kuti milimo yako ililomede kumeso aa-Leza pe.
Lino yeeya mbuwakatambula akuswiilila, ujatisye makani akweempwa. Na kuti kotalangili, njooboola mbuli mubbi, tokooyooziba ciindi ncenjooboola kulinduwe.
Nekubaboobo nimuba mu-Sarde ucijisi mazina mace aabantu batana kusofwaazya zikobela zyabo, Aba bayooenda andime, kabasamide zyakusama zituba nkaambo baleelede,
Oyo uuzunda uyoosamikwa zikobela zituba, nsikooyoolizimaanya izina lyakwe mubbuku lyabuumi, pele njoolizumina izina lyakwe kubusyu bwa-Taata akubusyu bwabaangelo bakwe.
Oyo uujisi matwi aswiilile Muuya mbwaambila imbungano.

Ndizi milimo yako mbwiibede, Bona, ndibikide kunembo lyako mulyango uujulidwe, nkabela taakwe muntu uukonzya kuujala, nkaambo ulijisi inguzu ziniini, wakajatisya makani aangu, alimwi tokwe nokalitama izina lyangu.
Bona, njookupa abo basimbungano ya-Saatani balyaamba kuti tuli ba-Juda, anukuti tabali ba-Juda, balabeja buyo, njoobaboozya kuti bakombe kumaulu aako, bazibe kuti ndakakuyanda.
Webo wakajatisya ijwi lyangu lyalukakatilo, aboobo mebo njookujatisya kuciindi cakusunkwa citi sikile bantu boonse banyika akubasunka boonse bakala ansi.
Njoofwambaana kuboola. Jatisya eco ncojisi, kuti kutabi muntu naba omwe uuti kunyanzye musini wako.

Oyo uuzunda njoomubika kuti abe musemu wamucikombelo ca-Leza wangu, atakazwi limbi anze, nkabela njoolemba alinguwe izina lya-Leza wangu, azina lyamunzi wa-Leza wangu, nguJerusalemu mupya, uuti seluke kuzwa kujulu kuli-Leza wangu, alimwi njoolemba alinguwe izina lyangu lipya.
Oyo uujisi matwi, aswiilile Muuya bwaambila imbungano.
Ndizi milimo yako mbwiibede, nkaambo moyo wako tuubulilili kupya, nekubaboobo tuupisyi loko. Niwabulilila kupya nanka niwapisya.
Lino moyo wako ulapya buniini buyo, tuubulilili kupya pele tuupisyi loko, aboobo ndaamba kukuswida kumulomo wangu.
Nkaambo waamba kuti, Ndi muvubi, ndivubide lubono, taakwe cintu neembula, pele tozi kuti ulipengede, ulisampaukide, uli mucete, uli moofu, alimwi uli acinswe.
Ndakubuzya kuti uule kulindime ingolida iyakasunkwa mumulilo, kuti uvube, amasani aatuba aakulisamika, kuti insoni zyacinswe cako zitaboneki, alimwi unanike meso aako amafuta, kuti ubone,
Abo mbenjanda ndababwekela akubakoma, nkaambo kaako usungwaale akweempwa.
Bona, ndiimvwi kumulyango, ndakonkomona, Na kuli muntu uuswiilila ijwi lyangu akundijulila mulyango, nzoonjila mulinguwe, nkalalile awe, alakwe ambebo.
Oyo uuzunda njoomuzuminina kukala ambe acuuno cangu, mbubonya mbuli mbundakazunda ambebo, aboobo sunu ndikede a-Taata acuuno cakwe,
Oyo uujisi matwi, aswiilile Muuya mbwaambila imbungano.
Nkabela mpawo ndakatolwa Muuya, ndabona cuuno cabwami cibikidwe kujulu, alimwi alincico ali umwi uukede.
Oyo iwakakede, ciwa cakwe cakalikozyenye amabwe aategwa jaspi asandiyo, nkabela cuuno cakalizyungulukidwe fulicoongo mbuli ibbwe litegwa smaragido.

Alimwi cuuno cabwami cakalizyungulukidwe zyuuno zili makumi obile azine, nkabela azyuuno ezi ndakabona bapati bali makumi obile abane balikede, balisamide masani aatuba, alimwi amitwe yabo bakalijisi misini yangalida.
Alimwi kunembo lyacuuno cabwami kwakali lwizi lwaciboniboni, lwakali kubalangala mbuli krustalo, nkabela mukati kacuuno akuzyunguluka ncico kwakali banyama bone bali ameso manji akunkosi,
Munyama mutaanzi wakalikozyenye amulavu, munyama wabili wakalikozyene amoombe, munyama watatu wakali abusyu mbuli muntu, nkabela munyama wane wakali mbuli musika uuluka.

Lino aba banyama bone bakalijisi umwi aumwi mababa aali musanu mulimwi, nkabela mababa aabo akalizyungulukidwe meso amunkwa, alimwi teebakali kulyokezya abuniini, isikati amasiku, kwaamba kuti, Ulasalala, ulasalala, ulasalala Jehova Leza Singuzuzyoonse, iwakaliko, Uuliko, Uuyoobako.
abalo bapati bali makumi obile abane baliwisya kubusyu bwakwe oyo uukede acuuno cabwami, akumukomba uupona lyoonse lyoonse, akuwaala misini yabo kunembo lyacuuno cakwe, akwaamba kuti,
Nduwe uuelede, O Mwami, kutambula bulemu alulemeko anguzu, nkaambo nduwe wakalenga zintu zyoonse, nkaambo kabukanze bwako nkizibeda, ankizyakalengelwa.
Lino ndakabona angelo muyumu uloongolola ajwi ipati wati, Nguni uuelede kuvununa ibbuku akunamatula zinamatizyo zyalyo?
Nkabela katakwe muntu, nikuba kujulu naaba ansi nikuba kunsi anyika, iwakakonzya kuvununa ibbuku nanka kulilanga.
Lino ndakalilisya loko nkaambo katakwe muntu wakajanwa uuelede kuvununa akubala ibbuku nanka kulilanga,
Elyo umwi wabapati wakandaambila kuti, Utalili. Bona, Mulavu wamusyobo wa-Juda, cisyuukila camuyanda wa-Davida, nguwe iwakazunda kuvununa ibbuku akunamatula zinamatizyo zili musanu azibili.
Lino Mwanambelele oyo wakasika, wabweza ibbuku kujanza lyalulyo lyayooyo uukede acuuno cabwami,

Nkabela naakalibweza ibbuku, banyama bone abapati bali makumi obile abane boonse bakaliwaala ansi kunembo lya-Mwanambelele, alimwi umwi aumwi wabo wakalijisi kantimbwa, amitiba yangolida iizwide tununkilizyo, otu nzenkombyo zyabasalali.
Mpawo bakaimba lwiimbo lupya lwakuti,
Nduwe uuelede kubweza ibbuku,
Akunamatula zinamatizyo zyalyo.
Nkaambo nduwe wakayaswa akutufutula kuli-Leza abulowa bwako,
Swebo tebantu bamisyobo yoonse amilaka yoonse amikowa yoonse,
azisi zyoonse,
Nkabela tuyooendelezya ansi.
Bakaamba ajwi ipati bati,
Uelede Mwanambelele iwakajayigwa,
Uelede kutambula bwami abuvubi abusongo,
Anguzu alulemeko abulemu azilongezyo.
Lino banyama bone bakati, Ameni. Abalo bapati bali makumi obile abane bakaliwaala ansi akukomba.
Elyo ndakabona imbizi iituba, nkabela oyo iwakakede alinjiyo wakalijisi buta, alimwi wakapegwa musini, mpawo wakainka kuya buzunda akuzunda.
Lino naakanamatula cinamatizyo cabili, ndakamvwa munyama wabili wati, Boola, uzoobone,
Mpawo kwakazwa imbizi imbi, yakali kusalala, nkabela oyo iwakakede alinjiyo wakapegwa inguzu zyakugwisya luumuno ansi, kuti bakajayane, alimwi wakapegwa ipanga ipati.
Elyo ndakamvwa ijwi mukati kabanyama bone lyakati, Mweelo wabulotwe ulaulwa isheleni, amyeelo yotatwe yabbaale ilaulwa isheleni, pele utacesyi mafuta awaini.
Lino naakanamatula cinamatizyo cane, ndakamvwa ijwi lyamunyama wane, lyakati, Boola, uzoobone,

Mpawo ndakabona imbizi iisia-sia, nkabela oyo iwakatantide alinjiyo wali kutegwa ngu-Lufu, alakwe Gehena wamutobela. Elyo bakapegwa bwami bwakujaya cipanzi cane cabantu baansi, kuti bafwe amasumo, anzala, alufu, abanyama bamusokwe.
Bakoongolola ajwi ipati, bati, O Mwami uusalala akusinizya, ino kusikila kuciindinzi ncoti takabeteki bantu baansi akubakoyeka nkaambo kabulowa bwesu?
Lino bakapegwa umwi aumwi zikobela zi tu ba, alimwi bakaambilwa kuti baleelede kucilyokezya kaindi kaniini mane bazulile bazikenyina abanabakwabo bati jayigwe mbuli mbobakajayigwaabalo.
azyalo inyenyeezi zyakujulu zyakalokela ansi mbuli mukuyu mbuuwisya micelo yawo kiitana kubizwa, niwazunganizigwa luuwo lupati.
Lino ijulu lyakali kuya buya mbuli ibbuku mbulivungililwa, azyalo zilundu zyoonse atusuwa toonse zyakalonzegwa kumasena aazyo.
Mpoonya awo bami baansi abeendelezi abasinkondo bapati abavubi abasinguzu abantu boonse nibaba bazike nibaba bazyale bakalisisa mumigodi amumampangala aamumalundu,
akwaambila malundu amandomba kuti, Amutuwide, mutusise kubusyu bwayooyo uukede acuuno cabwami akubukali bwa-Mwanambelele,
nkaambo buzuba bupati bwabukali bwakwe bwasika, lino nguni uukonzya kwiima?
Lino ndakabona angelo umbi uuya butanta kujulu kuzwa kujwe, wakalijisi cigwazyo ca-Leza muumi, nkabela wakoongolola ajwi ipati, wakaambila abo baangelo bone ibakapegwa bwami bwakucisya nyika alwizi,
wati, Mutacisyi nyika niluba lwizi naaba masamu, mane tubagwale bazike ba-Leza wesu kunkumuzabo.
Nkabela ndakaswiilila mweelwe wabaabo ibakagwalwa. Kwalagwalwa zyuulu zili mwaanda amakumi one azine akati kamisyobo yoonse yabana ba-Israyeli.
Kumusyobo wa-Juda kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili. Kumusyobo wa-Rubeni kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili. Kumusyobo wa-Gadi kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili.
Kumusyobo wa-Aseri kwakagwala zyuulu zili ikumi azibili. Kumusyobo wa-Nafitali kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili. Kumusyobo wa-Manase kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili.
Kumusyobo wa-Simeoni kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili. Kumusyobo wa-Levi kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili. Kumusyobo wa-Isakara kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili.
Kumusyobo wa-Zabulo kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili. Kumusyobo wa-Josefa kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili. Kumusyobo wa-Benjamini kwakagwalwa zyuulu zili ikumi azibili.
Lino bakoongolola ajwi ipati, bati, Lufutuko lulazwa kuli-Leza wesu uukede acuuno cabwami aku-Mwanambelele.
Nkabela baangelo boonse bakaliimvwi kuzyunguluka cuuno cabwami akuzyunguluka bapati abanyama bone, elyo bakaliwaala ansi cakuvundama kunembo lyacuuno cabwami, bamukomba Leza.
Bakati, Ameni! Zilongezyo abulemu abusongo amilumbo alulemeko anguzu abukozu azibe kuli-Leza wesu lyoonse alyoonse. Ameni!
Mpawo wakandaambila umwi wabapati kuti, Ino aba basamide zikobela zituba mbaani? Bakazwa kuli?
Lino mebo ndakamuvwiila kuti, Mwami, nduwe ozi. Nkabela wakandaambila kuti, Mbaaba bakazwa kumapenzi ayo mapati, alimwi bakasanzya zikobela zyabo akuzitubya mubulowa bwa-Mwanambelele.
Nkaambo kaako bali kunembo lyacuuno ca-Leza, balamumanina milimo isikati amasiku muntempele yakwe, nkabela oyo uukede acuuno cabwami uyookala akati kabo.
Tabakooyoofwa limbi inzala, tabakooyoofwa limbi nyota. Alyalo izuba talikooyoobabala, niiba inkasaalo.
Ikuti Mwanambelele uuli akati kacuuno ca-Leza uyoobeembela akubasololela kutusensa twamaanzi aabuumi, nkabela Leza uyoosansamuna misozi yoonse kumeso aabo.
Elyo ndakabona abo baangelo bali musanu ababili baimvwi kunembo lya-Leza mbubakapegwa myeembo iili musanu aibili.

Lino kwakeza angelo umbi, wakaima kucipaililo, wakalijisi katentelo kangolida, nkabela wakapegwa tununkilizyo tunjitunji, kuti atupaizye antoomwe ankombyo zyabasalali boonse acipaililo cangolida cili kunembo lyacuuno cabwami,
Lino busi bwatununkilizyo ankombyo zyabasalali zyakasuka kuli-Leza kuzwa mujanza lyaangelo.
Elyo angelo wakabweza katentelo, wakazuzya mulilo kuzwa kucipaililo, wausowela ansi, mpawo kwakaba mizumo amajwi andabo amuzuzumo wanyika.
Mpoonya awo baangelo bali musanu ababili ibakajisi myeembo iili musanu aibili bakalibambila kwiilizya.
alimwi cipanzi catatu cazilenge zijisi buumi zyamulwizi zyakafwa, acipanzi catatu camaato cakabisigwa.
Izina lyanyenyeezi eyo litegwa Kabindaula, nkabela cipanzi catatu camaanzi cakaba akabindaula, aboobo bantu banjibanji bakafwa kumaanzi nkaambo akaluzigwa.
Elyo wakajula mulindi uutagoli, mpawo kwakazwa busi kumulindi mbuli busi bwabbila lyamulilo, nkabela lyakasizigwa izuba, awalo muuwo, nkaambo kabusi bwamumulindi.
Elyo kubusi kwakazwa cikwikwi, cakeenda ansi, cakapegwa inguzu mbubonya mbuli inguzu zyatubanze nzitujisi ansi.
Lino eco cikwikwi cakalaililwa kuti citanoobisizyi bwizu bwaansi, niciba cintu cimwi citete, nuuba musamu uuli buti, pele abo bantu balike batajisi citondezyo ca-Leza cigwalidwe kunkumu zyabo.
Teecakazumizigwa kubajaya, pele kubapenzya-penzya buyo myeezi yosanwe, nkabela kupenzyapenzya kwaco kwakali mbuli kupenzya-penzya kwakabanze nokaluma muntu.
Mumazuba ayo bantu bayooyandaula lufu pele tabakalwani, bayooyandisya kufwa pele lufu luyoobacija.
Lino ciimo cacikwikwi cakalikozyenye ambizi zibambilwa inkondo, alimwi amitwe yaco akali misini iili mbuli ingolida, aalo masyu aaco akalikozyenye amasyu aabantu.
Masusu aaco akali mbuli masusu aabanakazi, ameno aaco akalikozyenye ameno aabalavu.
Nkabela cakalijisi zivunyo zyacamba zili mbuli zivunyo zyalubulo, alimwi muzumo wamababa aaco wakali mbuli muzumo wanola zinji ambizi zizuzaanina kunkondo,
Cakalijisi micila mbuli tubanze, yakali alumoola, nkabela mumonya mumicila yaco muzibede inguzu zyaco zyakupenzya-penzya bantu myeezi yosanwe,
Alimwi cilijisi mwami waco, ngu-angelo wamulindi uutagoli, izina lyakwe muci-Hebrayo ngu-Abadoni, pele muci-Helene nguApoliyoni.
lyamwaambila oyo angelo wamusanu aumwi iwakajisi mweembo kuti, Amwaangulule baangelo bone baangidwe mumulonga mupati Ufrate,
Mpawo bakaangululwa baangelo bone ibakabambilidwe kukaindi komwe akubuzuba bomwe akumweezi omwe akumwaaka omwe kuti bajaye cipanzi catatu cabantu.
Nkabela mweelwe wabasinkondo basimbizi bakali myaanda yobile yazyuulu zyazyuulu. Lino ndakaswiilila mweelwe wabo.

Lino mucilengano cangu mboobu mbundakabona imbizi abaabo ibakakede alinzizyo. Basimbizi bakalijisi zivunyo zyacamba, zimwi zyakasalala mbuli mulilo, zimwi zyakasia mbuli iakinte, azimwi zyakali mbuli sulufa. Alimwi mitwe yambizi yakali mbuli mitwe yabalavu, nkabela kumilomo yazyo kwakazwa mulilo abusi asulufa.
Lino cipanzi catatu cabantu cakajayigwa azipenzyo ezi zyotatwe izyakazwa kumilomo yazyo, mulilo abusi asulufa.
Nkaambo inguzu zyambizi ezyo zili mumilomo yazyo amumicila yazyo, ikuti micila yazyo ili mbuli inzoka, ilijisi mitwe, njiyonya njizicisya.

Lino kwakasyaala bamwi bantu ibatakajayigwa azipenzyo ezi, nekubaboobo teebakeempwa kumilimo yamaanza aabo, teebakaleka kukomba badaimona azibumbe zyangolida azyansiliva azyamukuba azyamabwe azyazisamu, zitakonzya kubona nikuba kweenda nikuba kumvwa,
alimwi teebakeempwa kubujayi bwabo nikuba kubulozi bwabo nikuba kumamambi aabo nikuba kububbi bwabo.
Nkabela mujanza lyakwe wakalijisi kabuku kajulidwe. Lino wakabika cituta cakwe calulyo alwizi, acituta cakwe calumwensi anyika.
Elyo wakoongolola ajwi ipati mbuli kukuluma kwamulavu, nkabela naakamana kulila, mizumo iili musanu aibili yakandindima.
Lino mizumo iili musanu aibili niyakamana kundindima, ndakati lembe, pele ndakaswiilila ijwi lyakazwa kujulu, liti, Namatika zintu ezyo nziyaamba mizumo iili musanu aibili, utazilembi pe.
Lino angelo oyo ngundakabona uliimvwi alwizi anyika wakatambika ijanza lyakwe kujulu,
wakakonka kuzina lyayooyo uupona lyoonse lyoonse, iwakalenga julu azintu zili mumo anyika azintu zili mulinjiyo alwizi azintu zili mulmdulo, kuti ciindi kacitaciyoobi limbi.
Pele mumazuba aajwi lyaangelo wamusanu ababili, nayooamba kulizya mweembo, elyo ayoomana makani aasisidwe aa-Leza, mbuli mbwaakaambila bazike bakwe basinsimi,
Lino elyo ijwi ndilyonya ndindakamvwa lizwa kujulu lyakandaambila lwabili kuti, Koya, ukabweze kabuku kajulidwe mujanza lyaangelo uuimvwi alwizi anyika.
Mpawo ndakaswenenena angelo, ndakamwaambila kuti, Ndipa kabuku aka, Wakati, Bweza, ukalye koonse, lino kayookuluzya mwida, pele mukanwa lyako kalalwela mbuli buci.
Lino ndakabweza kabuku mujanza lyaangelo, ndakalya koonse, nkabela mukanwa lyangu kakalwela mbuli buci, pele nindakamana kukalya, mwida lyangu mwakalula.
Lino ndakaambilwa kuti, Uleelede kusinsima alimwi kumisyobo minji akuzisi zinji akumyaambo minji akubami banji.
Pele lubuwa luli anze lyantempele amulusie, mutalweeleki, nkaambo lwapegwa bamasi, nkabela munzi mulemu bayooulyataula kumaulu aabo myeezi iili makumi one aibili.
Lino bakamboni bangu bobile njoobapa inguzu zyakusinsima mazuba aali cuulu amyaanda yobile amakumi aali musanu alimwi, nkabela banooyoosamide cisani camasaka.
Aba ngimasamu obile aaolifa, alimwi nzezibikilo zyobile zyamalampi ziimvwi kunembo lya-Mwami wanyika.
Na kuti kuli muntu uuyanda kubacisa, kulazwa mulilo mumilomo yabo akubaumpa basinkondonyina. Na kuti kuli muntu uuyanda kubacisa, mbuboobo mbweelede kujayigwa.
Aba mbibajisi inguzu zyakusinka julu kuti imvula itawi mazuba oonse aakusinsima kwabo, alimwi bali anguzu zyakusandula maanzi kuti abe bulowa, akuuma nyika amapenzi oonse kufumbwa ciindi ncibayanda.
Lino bamane buyo bukamboni bwabo, cinyama cizwa mumulindi uutagoli ciyoobalwanisya akubazunda akubajaya.
Nkabela mitunta yabo iyoolala mumigwagwa yamunzi oyo mupati uupedwe aya mazina aasisidwe, Sodoma a-Egepita, nkukonya nkwaakabambidwe mwami, wesu.
Lino bantu bazwa kumikowa yoonse akumisyobo yoonse akumyaambo yoonse akumasi oonse bayoobona mitunta yabo mazuba otatwe acisela, pele tabakooyoozumina kuti mitunta yabo izikwe mutubanda,
Lino abo bakala ansi bayookondwa akusekelela akupana zipego, nkaambo aba basinsimi bobile bakali kubapenzya bantu bakala ansi.
Elyo naakainda mazuba otatwe acisela, muuya wabuumi uuzwa kuli-Leza wakanjila mulimbabo, bakaimikila amaulu aabo, nkabela kwakaba kuyoowa kupati kulimbabo ibakababona.
Lino bakaswiilila ijwi ipati lizwa kujulu, lyakabaambila kuti, Amutante okuno. Mpawo bakatanta kujulu mukumbi, abalo basinkondonyina bakababona.

Lino kuciindi eco ndeonya kwakaba muzuzumo mupati wanyika, wakawisya cipanzi cakumi camunzi, nkabela mumuzuzumo oyo kwakajayigwa bantu bali zyuulu zili musanu azibili, elyo bantu ibakasyaala bakaliyoowede, bakalemeka Leza wakujulu.
Mpoonya awo bapati bali makumi obile abane ibakakede azyuuno zyabo kunembo lya-Leza bakawida ansi, bakavundama, bakamukomba Leza.
Bakati,
Twakulumba, O Mwami Leza Singuzuzyoonse, Uuliko, lwakaliko, Uuyoobako,
Nkaambo walibwezela inguzu zyako impati kuti uendelezye.
Pele sunu bwasika bukali bwako.
Casika ciindi cakubetekwa kwabafu,
Aciindi cakulumbula bazike bako basinsimi,
Abasalali aboonse bayoowa izina lyako, nibaba baniini nibaba bapati,
Acakubanyonyoona abo banyonyoona nyika.
Lino kwakaboneka cigambyo cipati mujulu. Kakuli mwanakazi iwakasamide izuba, wakalijisi mweezi kunsi amaulu aakwe, alimwi amutwe wakwe wakali amusini wanyenyeezi zili ikumi azibili.
Oyo mwanakazi wakalimisi, nkabela wakalila kukusunga, wakaciswa loko mukutumbuka.

Mpawo kwakaboneka acimwi cigambyo mujulu. Kwakalibonya Simwaaba mupati uusalalisya mbuli mulilo, wakalijisi mitwe iili musanu aibili ameja aali ikumi, alimwi amitwe yakwe wakali amisini iili musanu aibili.
Nkabela mucila wakwe wakakwela cipanzi catatu canyenyeezi zyakujulu, wakaziwisya ansi. Lino Simwaaba oyo wakaima kunembo lyamwanakazi iwakali kwaamba kutumbuka, kuti atumbuka alye mwanaakwe.
Elyo wakatumbuka mwana mulombe, nguwenya uyoolela masi oonse amusako walubulo, nkabela oyo mwanaakwe wakatolwa kujulu kuli-Leza akucuuno cakwe.
Mpoonya awo mwanakazi wakacijila kunkanda, nkwajisi busena mbwaakamubambila Leza, kuti bamusanine oko mazuba aali cuulu amyaanda yobile amakumi aali musanu alimwi.
pele teebakazunda pe, nkabela busena bwabo bwamujulu teebwakajanwa limbi.
Lino Simwaaba mupati wakawisigwa ansi, nguwenya muzoka waciindi, uutegwa Diabolosi a-Saatani, nguuena bantu boonse baansi. Wakawisigwa ansi, abalo baangelo bakwe bakawisigwa awe,

Mpoonya awo ndakaswiilila ijwi ipati mujulu, lyakati, Sunu kwasika lufutuko, anguzu, abwami bwa-Leza wesu, abwami bwa-Kristo wakwe, nkaambo sikubejelezya bakwesu twaambo wawisigwa ansi, nguwe wakali kubabejelezya kuli-Leza wesu lyoonse isikati amasiku.
Lino bakamuzunda kubulowa bwa-Mwanambelele akujwi lyabumboni bwabo, nkabela buumi bwabo teebakali kubuyandisya pe, bakazumina nikuba kufwa.

Nkaambo kaako amusekelele nomajulu, anywebo nomukala mulingao, Pele nywebo nonsi alwizi, muli mumapenzi, ikuti Diabolosi wamuselukila abukali bupati, nkaambo ulizi kuti ciindi ncacijisi nciniini buyo.
Lino Simwaaba naakabona kuti uliwisidwe ansi, wakamupenzya mwanakazi iwakatumbuka mwana mulombe.
Lino mwanakazi wakapegwa mababa obile aamusika mupati kuti auluke munkanda kubusena bwakwe nkwakaleledwe ciindi comwe aziindi zyobile acisela, cakusiswa kubusyu bwamuzoka.
Mpawo kumulomo wakwe muzoka wakaselulila mwanakazi maanzi mbuli izambangulwe, kuti mwanakazi akatolwe ndilyo.
Pele inyika yakagwasya mwanakazi, yakajula mulomo wayo, yakamena izambangulwe Simwaaba ndyaakaselula kumulomo wakwe.
Elyo Simwaaba wakanyemena mwanakazi, wakainka kuyoobalwanya bana bakwe basyaala babamba milazyo ya-Leza akujata bumboni bwa-Jesu Kristo,
Nkabela wakaima amusenga wakumbali alwizi.

Eco cinyama ncindakabona­ cakalikozyenye asiluwe, azituta zyakwe zyakali mbuli zituta zyanengo, amulomo wakwe wakali mbuli mulomo wamulavu. Nkabela Simwaaba wakamupa inguzu zyakwe acuuno cakwe abwami bunji.
Lino ndakabona kuti umwi mutwe wakwe wakaliyasidwe calufu, pele ciyaso cakwe calufu cakaponesegwa, nkabela nyika yoonse yakagamba kucinyama.
Elyo bakakomba Simwaaba iwakapa cinyama inguzu, acalo cinyama bakacikomba, bakati, Nguni uukozyenye acinyama? Nguni uukonzya kulwana aco?
Lino wakapegwa mulomo uuamba makani mapati abusanke, alimwi wakapegwa inguzu zyakucikala myeezi iili makumi one amyeezi yobile.
Mpawo wakaasamuna mulomo wakwe akusanka Leza, Wakasanka izina lyakwe aŋanda yakwe abaabo bakala mujulu.
Lino wakapegwa inguzu zyakulwanya basalali akubazunda, alimwi wakapegwa bwami bwakweendelezya misyobo yoonse amikowa yoonse amyaambo yoonse amasi oonse.
Nkabela boonse bakala ansi bayoomukomba, nkukuti abo batajisi mazina aalembedwe mubbuku lyabuumi lya-Mwanambelele iwakajayidwe kuzwa kumatalikilo aanyika,
Oyo uujisi matwi aswiilile.
Kufumbwa muntu uutola bamwi kubuzike, alakwe mwini uyootolwa kubuzike, ayooyo uujazya ipanga, alakwe uyoojayigwa apanga mbubonya. Mbuboobo mbuluboneka lukakatilo lwabasalali alusyomo lwabo.

Nkabela bwami boonse bwacinyama citaanzi, eci cabili cakabubelesya kumeso aceeco citaanzi. Cakasungilizya inyika yoonse abantu boonse bali mulinjiyo kuti bakombe cinyama citaanzi icakaponesegwa ciyaso caco calufu.
Alimwi cilacita zigambyo zipati, cilakwela ansi mulilo kuzwa kujulu kumeso aabantu,

Aboobo cabeena boonse bakala ansi nkaambo kazeezyo zigambyo nzicakazumizigwa kucita kumeso aacinyama citaanzi. Cakabaambila abo bakala ansi kuti baleelede kucita cikozyano cacinyama eco icakayasidwe apanga pele alimwi capona.
Nkabela cakapegwa inguzu zyakucipa buumi eco cikozyano cacinyama, kuti cikozyano cacinyama caambe akucitya kuti boonse ibatakombi cikozyano cacinyama bajayigwe,
Alimwi wabacitya bantu boonse, nibaba baniini nibaba bapati, nibaba bavubi nibaba bacete, nibaba bazyale nibaba bazike, kuti balembwe bulembo kumaanza aabo aalulyo nanka kunkumu zyabo,
akuti kutabi muntu naba umwi uukonzya kuula nikuba kuuzya, cita uujisi bulembo, nkukuti izina lyacinyama nuuba mweelwe wazina lyaco.
Mbuboobu busongo. Oyo uujisi maanu abale mweelwe wacinyama, nkaambo ngomweeIwe wamuntu, Mweelwe wakwe njemyaanda iili musanu aumwi amakumi aali musanu alimwi amusanu aumwi.
Alimwi ndakaswiilila ijwi lizwa kujulu, lyakali mbuli ijwi lyamaanzi manjimanji ambuli muzumo mupati. Elyo ijwi ndindakamvwa lyakali mbuli ijwi lyabasituntimbwa mbubalizya tuntimbwa twabo.

Nkabela bakaimba mbuli lwiimbo lupya kunembo lyacuuno cabwami akunembo lyabanyama bone alyabapati, Olo lwiimbo katakwe muntu iwakali kukonzya kulwiiya pele abo bantu balike bali zyuulu zili mwaanda amakumi one azine ibakanununwa kuzwa ansi.

Mbimbabo ibatakalisofwaazya kubanakazi, nkaambo mbanabutema. Mbimbabo batobela Mwanambelele koonse nkwaya. Mbimbabo bakasaanguna kunununwa akati kabantu, kuti babe kabalwebalwe ba-Leza aba-Mwanambelele,
nkabela mumilomo yabo teemwakajanwa bubeji, Tabajisi mulandu nuuba umwi.
Wakati ajwi ipati, Amuyoowe Leza akumupa bulemu, nkaambo casika ciindi calubeteko lwakwe. Amukombe oyo iwakalenga ijulu anyika alwizi atusensa twamaanzi.
oyo nguuti kanywe waini wabukali bwa-Leza, iwatuntwa cakutavwelwa amaanzi mucinywido calunyemo lwakwe, alimwi uyoopenzegwa amulilo asulufa kubusyu bwabaangelo basalala akubusyu bwa-Mwanambelele.
Lino busi bwamapenzi aabo bulasuka lyoonse kukabe kutamani, tabajisi lulyokezyo niluba luniini isikati amasiku, abo bakomba cinyama acikozyano caco, abalo boonse batambula bulembo bwazina lyakwe.
Mbuboobo mbuluboneka lukakatilo lwabasalali, mbabo babamba milazyo ya-Leza, alusyomo lwa-Jesu.

Mpawo kwakazwa angelo umbi muntempele, wakalila ajwi ipati kwaambila oyo iwakakede atala akumbi, wakati, Tola cigonsyo cako, utalike kutebula, nkaambo ciindi cakutebula casika, ikuti maila oonse aanyika abizwa.
Lino oyo iwakakede atala akumbi wakavwikulisya cigonsyo cakwe cakutebuzya nyika, elyo inyika yoonse yakatebulwa.
Lino angelo umbi wakazwa muntempele yamujulu, alakwe wakalijisi cigonsyo cibosya.

Aumwi angelo wakazwa kucipaililo, wakalijisi inguzu zyakweendelezya mulilo, nkabela wakalila acilizyo cipati kuliyooyo iwakajisi cigonsyo cibosya, wati, Tola cigonsyo cako cibosya, utebule zikama zyamusaansa waansi, nkaambo micelo yawo yabizwisya.
Mpawo angelo wakavwikulisya cigonsyo cakwe cakutebuzya nyika, wakatebula masaansa aansi akwaawaala mudindi ipati lyakusinina lyabukali bwa-Leza.
Lino mwakalyataulwa mudindi elyo lyakusinina anze lyamunzi, nkabela mumonya mudindi mwakazwa bulowa, bwakatana kuntambo zyamitwe yambizi akukunka kusikila kumamaile aali myaanda yobile.
balaimba lwiimbo lwa-Musa muzike wa-Leza alwiimbo lwa-Mwanambelele, bati,
Milimo yako mipati, ilagambya,
Mwami Leza Singuzuzyoonse.
Ziyanza zyako nzyalusinizyo, zililuleme.
Nduwe Mwami waciindi coonse,
Nkaambo nduwe olike uusalala,
Ncobeni bantu bazisi zyoonse balaboola kukukomba kunembo lyako,
Nkaambo imbeta zyako zyaboneka.
nkabela mumonya muntempele mwakazwa baangelo bali musanu ababili, bajisi zipenzyo zili musanu azibili balisamide masani aatuba aanyengema, alimwi balyaangidwe azyamba zyabo matambo aangolida.
Lino umwi wabanyama bone wakabapa abo baangelo bali musanu ababili mitiba iili musanu aibili iizwide bukali bwa-Leza uupona lyoonse kukabe kutamani.
Elyo intempele yakazula busi buzwa kubulemu bwa-Leza akunguzu zyakwe, nkabela taakwe muntu iwakakonzya kunjila muntempele mane ezyo zipenzyo zili musanu azibili zyabaangelo zyakazuzigwa.
Mpawo ndakamvwa angelo wamaanzi ulaamba kuti, Uli mululami, Mwami, Uuliko, iwakaliko, uuyoobako kukubeteka obu.
Bakatilaila bulowa bwabasalali abwabasinsimi, aboobo sunu wabapa bulowa bwakunywa, nkaambo mbubonya mbubeelede.
Acalo cipaililo ndakaciswiilila cilaamba. Cakati, Mbukubede, Mwami Leza Singuzuzyoonse, imbeta zyako nzyalusinizyo, zililuleme,
Lino angelo wane wakatila amutiba wakwe kuzuba, nkabela wakapegwa inguzu zyakutenta bantu amulilo.
Mpoonya awo bantu bakatentwa lutento lupati, elyo bakasanka izina lya-Leza uujisi inguzu zyakuleta mapenzi aali boobu. Teebakeempwa akumulemeka pe,
akusanka Leza wakujulu nkaambo kakuciswa kwabo azilonda zyabo. Teebakeempwa kumilimo yabo pe.
Lino ndakabona myuuya yotatwe iisofweede mbuli basyacaande yakazwa mukanwa lya-Simwaaba, amukanwa Jyacinyama, amukanwa lyamusinsimi mubeji,
Njemyuuya yabadaimona, ilabeleka malele, alimwi ileendeenda kuya kubami boonse banyika, kuti ibabungike kunkondo yabuzuba bupati bwa-Leza Singuzuzyoonse.
Amubone, ndaboola mbuli mubbi. Uli acoolwe oyo uulangilila akubamba zyakusama zyakwe, kuti ataendi acinswe akubonwa kuusa kwakwe.
Lino bakababungika antoomwe mubusena butegwa muci-Hebrayo Harmagedoni.
Mpoonya awo kwakaba indabo amajwi amizumo, alimwi kwakali muzuzumo mupati wanyika, Teekwakabwenwe muzuzumo uuli boobo kuzwa kuciindi bantu ncibakatalika kukala ansi, ikuti wakali anguzu, mupati loko,
Elyo munzi mupati wakapambulwa muzipanzi zyotatwe, aminzi yoonse yabamasi yakawa. Obo buzuba Babuloni mupati wakayee-yegwa kubusyu bwa-Leza, wakapegwa cinywido cawaini wabukali bwalunyemo lwakwe.
Nkabela tusuwa toonse twakamwaisigwa, azyalo zilundu teezyakajanwa limbi.

Alimwi bantu bakawidwa civulamabwe cipati kuzwa kujulu. Ibbwe limwi alimwi lyakali abulemu mbuli italenta, nkabela bantu bakasanka Leza nkaambo kacipenzyo eco cacivulamabwe, nkambo kacili cipenzyo cipati loko.
Nguwenya ngubakacira awe bumambi bami baansi, abaabo bakala ansi bakakolwa awaini wabumambi bwakwe.

Mwanakazi oyo wakalisamide zyakusama zyadowalowa azisalala tyu, alimwi walalisakatide ingolida amabwe mayandisi angale, nkabela mujanza lyakwe wakalijisi cinywido cangolida cizwide zisesemyo amatombe aabwaamu bwakwe,
Alimwi ankumu yakwe akalilembedwe izina, ndeeli, MAKANI AASISIDWE. BABULONI MUPATI UUZYALA BASIBWAAMU AZISESEMYO ZYAANSI.
Lino ndakabona kuti mwanakazi oyo ulikoledwe abulowa bwabasalali abulowa bwabaabo ibakajayigwa nkaambo ka-Jesu, elyo nindakamubona ndakagamba lugambo lupati.
Lino angelo wakandaambila kuti, Ino nkaambonzi nowagamba? Mebo ndakwaambila makani aamwanakazi oyu amakani aacinyama ncatantide cijisi mitwe iili musanu aibili ameja aali ikumi.

Eco cinyama nciwakabona cakaliko, pele sunu taciko, alimwi ciyoozwa mumulindi uutagoli akwiinka kuya kulunyonyoono, nkabela bantu bakala ansi bayoogamba, nkukuti abo batana kulembwa mazina mubbuku lyabuumi kuzwa kumatalikilo aanyika. Bayoogamba baakubona cinyama mbucakaliko, alimwi sunu taciko, nekubaboobo cilaboneka lwabili.
Ngaaya maanu abusongo. Mitwe iili musanu aibili ngemalundu aali musanu aabili nkwakala mwanakazi.
Alimwi nkubali bami bali musanu ababili. Bosanwe bakamana kale, umwi mpacili sunu, umwi tana kusika, Lino asika oyo, uleelede kukala kaindi kaniini.
Nkabela cinyama icakaliwo, pele sunu taciwo, nguucitya musanu abatatu, ngoumwi wabali musanu ababili, nkabela ulaya kulunyonyoono.
Lino meja aali ikumi ngowakabona mbami bali ikumi, Sunu aba tabana kutambula bwami, pele balatambula inguzu zyakuba mbuli bami kaindi komwe antoomwe acinyama.
Aba balijisi muyeeyo omwe. Boonse bayoopa cinyama inguzu zyabo abwami bwabo.
Alimwi bayoolwana a-Mwanambelele, pele Mwanambelele uyoobazunda, nkaambo ngonguwe mwami wabami, ngumweendelezi wabeendelezi. Abalo balazunda mbali abo, baitidwe, basale, basyomi.
Ameja aali ikumi ngowabona kucinyama, aba balamusula mwanakazi sikuvuula, balamusyaazya alike, balamusamununa, balalya mubili wakwe akumuumpa amulilo.
Nkaambo Leza wakabika mumyoyo yabo oyu muyeeyo wakulomya bukanze bwakwe. Boonse balazumina camoyo omwe kupa cinyama bwami bwabo, mane majwi aa-Leza akalondolwe.
Lino mwanakazi nguwakabona ngumunzi mupati uujisi bwami kubami boonse banyika.
Lino wakalilisya ajwi ijumu, wakati,
Wawa! Wawa Babuloni mupati!
Waba bukalo bwabadaimona.
Waba ciyobwedo camyuuya yoonse iisofweede,
Aciyobwedo cabayuni boonse basofweede abasesemya.
Bami boonse banyika bakacita awe bwaamu,
Abalo basambazi baansi bakupuka nkaambo kakulitakaazya kwakwe kupati.
Kamuzwa mulinguwe nobantu bangu,
Kuti mutavwelanizigwi azibi zyakwe,
Mutapenzegwi azipenzyo zyakwe.
Lino sunu Leza waiyeeya milandu yakwe,
Amumupe kobile mbuli milimo yakwe,
Amumunywisye alakwe mapenzi.
Anywe mucinywido nciconya ncaakanywisya bamwi,
Amumupenzye akumulizya mbubonya.
Mumoyo wakwe ulaamba kuti, Ndi namalelo,
Nsili mukamufu, nsikonzyi kujana lulilo pe.
Lufu akulila anzala.
Ncobeni uyooumpisigwa amulilo,
Nkaambo ngusinguzu Mwami Leza Mubetesi wakwe.
Bayooimikila alaale nkaambo kakuyoowa zipenzyo zyakwe, bayooti, Maawe! Maawe, munzi oyu mupati Babuloni, oyu munzi uuli ampuwo! Sunu lubeteko lwako lwafwambaana kusika!
Abalo basambazi baansi bayoomulila, bayoomumotokelwa, nkaambo taakwe muntu uuti ule limbi makwebo aabo,

makwebo aangolida ansiliva amabwe mayandisi angale, masani aatuba anamundelele amasani aadowalowa amasani aasalala tyu, zimvwalimvwali zyoonse zyamasamu aamukamba azyameja aanzovu azyamasamu mayandisi azyamindalila azyabutale azyamabweluuma,
tununkilizyo twakinamono atwaamomo atulonze alibano amura, waini amafuta aaolifa abusu busete abulotwe, iŋombe ambelele ambizi ankalaki, ayalo mibili yabantu abuumi bwabo.
Lino sunu yakumanina eyo micelo iibizwa moyo wako njiwakali kuyandisya, zyakunyonyookela zintu zyoonse zibekema zibotezesya, tokooyoozijana limbi pe.
Abo bantu ibakali kusambala zintu ezi akuvubizigwa kumaanza aakwe bayooimikila alaale nkaambo kakuyoowa zipenzyo zyakwe. Bayoolila akoomoka,
kuti,
Maawe! Maawe munzi oyo mupati!
Wakalisamide masani aatuba azyakusama zyadowalowa azisalala tyu,
Wakalisakatide ingolida amabwe mayandisi angale.
elyo nibakabona busi bwakutentwa kwakwe, bakalila, bakati, Munzinzi mupati uukozya munzi oyo?
Nkabela bakalivwikila ivu amitwe yabo, bakoongolola cakulila akoomoka, bakati,
Maawe! Maawe oyo munzi mupati!
Boonse bajisi maato mulwizi bakavubizigwa alubono lwawo.
Pele sunu wafwambaana kusaalwa.
Anywebo nobasalali abaapostolo abasinsimi,
Nkaambo sunu Leza wamubetekela lubeta kulinguwo.
Mbubonya obu mbuuyoocitigwa munzi mupati Babuloni.
Uyoowisigwa bbu, tuukooyoojanwa limbi pe.
Talikooyoomvwigwa limbi mulinduwe.
Abasimilimo kufumbwa niiba ili buti
Tabakooyoojanwa limbi.
Akuvuta kwaziyo.
Takukooyoomvwigwa limbi.
Tuukooyookumunikila limbi.
Ajwi lyasibwiinga alyanabwiinga
Talikooyoomvwigwa limbi mukati lyako.
Nkaambo basambazi bako bakali bantu bapati baansi.
Masi oonse akeenwa kumalozi aako.
Abulowa bwabantu boonse ibakajayigwa ansi.
Aleluya! Lufutuko abulemu anguzu nzezya-Leza wesu.
Nkaambo wakabeteka sikuvuula mupati iwakabisizya inyika yoonse abwaamu bwakwe,
Wamubweedezezya lubeteko nkaambo kabulowa bwabazike bakwe.
Mpawo bapati bali makumi obile abane abanyama bone bakaliwaala ansi, bakakomba Leza uukede acuuno cabwami, bakati, Ameni! Aleluya!
Lino mucuuno mwakazwa ijwi, lyakati,
Amulumbe Leza wesu nywebo nobazike bakwe,
Nywebo nyoonse nomuyoowa, nibaba baniini nibaba bapati.
Aleluya! Jehova Leza wesu Singuzuzyoonse nguuendelezya.
Atumupe bulemu,
Nkaambo buzuba bwabwiinga bwa-Mwanambelele bwasika,
Amwanakazi wakwe walibamba kale.
Lino wakandaambila kuti, Lemba obu, Bali acoolwe abo batambwa kupobwe lyabwiinga bwa-Mwanambelele. Alimwi wakati, Ngaaya majwi aasinizye aa-Leza,

Mpoonya awo ndakawida kumaulu aakwe, ndakati mukombe. Pele wakandikasya, wakati, Leka, utaciti obo, nkaambo ndi muzikenyoko buyo, ndi umwi wabanabakwanu ibajisi bumboni bwa-Jesu, Komba Leza, Nkaambo bumboni bwa-Jesu ngumuuya wabusinsimi.
Oyo uuitantide ulategwa Musyomesi Uusinizye, nguubeteka akulwa cabululami.
Meso aakwe akali mbuli mabalabala aamulilo, kumutwe wakwe kwakali misini minjiminji, alimwi wakalilembedwe izina litazibwi kumuntu naba omwe pele lwakwe mwini,
Nkabela cikobela ncaakasamide cakanikidwe mubulowa. Izina lyakwe litegwa Ijwi lya-Leza.
Abalo basinkondo boonse bakujulu bakali kumutobela, bakalitantide ambizi zituba, bakalisamide masani mabotu aatuba buu.
Mukanwa lyakwe mwakazwa ipanga libosya lyakuumya masi oonse. Uyoobalela bantu amusako walubulo, alimwi uyoolyataula mwini idindi lyakusinina waini lyabukali bwalunyemo lwa-Leza Singuzuzyoonse.
Nkabela kucikobela cakwe akucibelo cakwe kwakalilembedwe izina. Izina lyakwe ndeeli, MWAMI WABAMI, MWEENDELEZI WABEENDELEZI.

mukalye nyama yamitunta yabami amitunta yabasinkondo bapati amitunta yabaalumi basinguzu, anyama yambizi ayabantu bazitantide amitunta yabantu boonse, nibaba bazyale nibaba bazike, nibaba baniini nibaba bapati.

Lino cinyama cakajatwa, alakwe musinsimi mubeji iwakali kucita kunembo lyaco zigambyo zyakubeena abo ibakatambwide bulembo bwacinyama abaabo ibakali kukomba cikozyano caco. Aba bobile bakasowegwa bulanga muziba lyamulilo uuyakisya asulufa.
Abamwi boonse bakajayigwa apanga lyayooyo iwakatantide ambizi, nkukuti elyo ipanga ilyakazwa mukanwa lyakwe, nkabela bayuni boonse bakakuta mitunta yabo.
nkabela wakajata Simwaaba, eyo inzoka yaciindi iitegwa Diabolosi a-Saatani, akumwaanga myaaka iili cuulu.
Wakamusowela mumulindi uutagoli, wakamujalila akusinka kujulu, kuti ateeni limbi masi mane do yamana eyo myaaka iili cuulu, elyo musule lyayaaya uleelede kwaangununwa kaindi kaniini.
Pele bamwi bafu boonse ibakasyaala teebakabuka pe mane do myaaka iili cuulu imaninine. Mboobu bubuke butaanzi,

Uli acoolwe, alimwi ulasalala, kufumbwa muntu uubuka mububuke obu butaanzi, Kulibaabo bali boobo lufu lwabili talukwe inguzu, pele bayooba bapaizi ba-Leza aba-Kristo, bayooendelezya awe myaaka iili cuulu,
Lino myaaka iili cuulu yaakumana, Saatani uyooangununwa muntolongo yakwe,
elyo uyooinka kuyooena masi oonse aali muzyooko zyone zyanyika, Gogo a-Magogo, akwaabunganya antoomwe kunkondo. Mweelwe wabantu uli mbuli musee wakulwizi.
Nkabela bakeendeenda mubulamfu boonse bwanyika akuzingulula inkambe yabasalali amunzi uuyandika. Mpoonya awo kwakaseluka mulilo kuzwa kujulu, wakabaumpa.

Lino Saatani sikubeena wakasowegwa muziba lyamulilo uuyaka asulufa, nkukonya nkucibede cinyama, alakwe musinsimi mubeji nkwabede, nkabela bazoopenzegwa isikati amasiku lyoonse lyoonse kukabe kutamani.

Mpawo ndakabona bafu boonse, bapati abaniini, baliimvwi kunembo lya-Leza, elyo mabuku akavununwa, alimwi kwakavununwa ibbuku limwi, ndebbuku lyabuumi. Nkabela bafu bakabetekwa mbuli makani aalembedwe mumabuku, mbuli milimo yabo.
Nkabela lwizi lwakabweedezya bafu bali mulindulo, alwalo lufu acikalilo cabafu zyoonse zyakabweedezya bafu bali mulinzizyo. Lino bakabetekwa muntu umwi aumwi mbuli milimo yakwe.
Mpoonya awo lufu acikalilo cabafu zyoonse zyakasowelwa muziba lyamulilo. Eli iziba lyamulilo ndilyonya ndolufu lwabili.
Nkabela umwi aumwi iwatakajanwa izina lyakwe mubbuku lyabuumi wakasowelwa muziba lyamulilo.
Nkabela ndakabona munzi mulemu, Jerusalemu mupya, uuza buseluka kuzwa kujulu kwa-Leza, ulibambidwe mbuli nabwiinga mbwalisakatizizya mulumi wakwe.

Elyo ndakamvwa ijwi ipati lizwa kucuuno cabwami, lyakati, Amubone, bukalo bwa-Leza mpobuli akati kabantu, uzookala akati kabo. Bazooba bantu bakwe, alakwe Leza mwini uzookala kulimbabo, azoobe Leza wabo.
Nkabela uyoosindula misozi yoonse kumeso aabo, takukooyooba limbi lufu, nikuba kuomoka nikuba kulila nikuba kuciswa, nkaambo zintu zyakale zyamaninina.
Mpawo oyo uukede acuuno cabwami wakati, Amubone, ndalengulula zintu zyoonse, zibe zipya. Alimwi wandaambila kuti, Lemba kuti majwi aya asyomeka, alisinizye.
Lino alimwi wakati, Amana makani, Ndime Alfa a-Omega, matalikilo amamanino. Uuli anyota, njoomunywisya mebo kukasensa kamaanzi aabuumi,
Oyo uuzunda uzookona zintu ezi zyoonse. Njooba Leza wakwe, alakwe uyooba mwanaangu.
Pele bakandu abatasyomi abasesemyi abajayi abasibwaamu abalozi abakomba mituni ababeji, boonse bayoopegwa lukono lwabo muziba liyaka mulilo asulufa, ndilyonya ndolufu lwabili.
Elyo wakanditola munguzu zya-Muuya kucilundu cipati cilamfu, wakanditondezya munzi mulemu Jerusalemu uuza buseluka kuzwa kujulu kwa-Leza.
Wakalijisi bulemu bwa-Leza, nkabela bubekesi bwawo bwakali mbuli ibbwe liyandisi loko, bwakali mbuli ibbwe litegwa jaspi, libalangala ngwa mbuli krustalo.

Alimwi wakalijisi bwaanda bupati bulamfu, amilyango iili ikumi aibili. Kumilyango yawo kuli baangelo bali ikumi ababili, alimwi mpaali mazina aalembedwe alinjiyo, nge mazina aamisyobo iili ikumi aibili yabana ba-Israyeli.
Milyango yotatwe yakali kujwe, milyango yotatwe yakali kunyika, milyango yotatwe yakali kumusanza, aimwi milyango yotatwe yakali kumbo.
Alimwi bwaanda bwamunzi bwakalijisi matalikilo aali ikumi aabili, nkabela mulingao mwali mazina aali ikumi aabili aabaapostolo ba-Mwanambelele.

Munzi uliyakidwe azyooko zyone, zyoonse zileelene, bulamfu buleelene abwaamba. Nkabela wakeeleka munzi atete, wajana kuti mamaile aali myaanda iili ikumi aisanu. Bulamfu abwaamba abwiime bwawo, zyoonse zileelene.
Lino wakeeleka bwaanda bwawo, wajana kuti buli azikokola zili mwaanda amakumi one azine, mbuli kweeleka kwamuntu, nkukuti kwaangelo.
Matalikilo aabwaanda bwamunzi alisakatide amabwe mayandisi aamisyobo misyobo. Mazina aamabwe aakumatalikilo ngaaya, Itaanzi ngu-Jaspi, lyabili ngu-Safiro, lyatatu ngu-Kalikedo, lyane ngu-Smaragido,

lyasanu ngu-Sardoni, lyamusanu alimwi ngu-Sardio, lyamusanu aabili ngu-Krusolito, lyamusanu aatatu ngu-Berulo, lyamusanu aane ngu-Topazio, lyakumi ngu-Krusoprazo, lyakumi alimwi ngu-Huakinto, lyakumi aabili ngu-Amutusto,
Alimwi milyango iili ikumi aibili njangale zili ikumi azibili, umwi aumwi mulyango ngwangale yomwe, awalo mugwagwa wamunzi ngwangolida iisalala iinyengema mbuli ciboniboni cinjoloma.
Lino teendakabona cikombelo mulinguwo, pe, nkaambo Mwami Leza Singuzuzyoonse ncecikombelo cawo, alakwe Mwanambelele ncecikombelo.
Nkabela munzi tuuyandi kumunikilwa izuba nuuba mweezi, nkaambo bulemu bwa-Leza mbobuumunikila, alimwi ilampi lyawo ngu-Mwanambelele.
Nkabela bantu bamasi bayooenda mumumuni wawo, abalo bami baansi bayooleta bulemu bwabo mulinguwo.
Milyango yawo tiikooyoojalwa­ abuniini isikati, ikuti oko takukooyooba masiku pe.
Alimwi bayooleta kulinguwo bulemu azintu ziyandisi zyamasi oonse.
Lino omo mumunzi tamukooyoonjila cintu niciba comwe cisofwaazya, nibaba bantu bacita zisesemyo nanka kubeja, pele abo balike balembedwe mazina aabo mubbuku lyabuumi lya-Mwanambelele.

Mukati kamugwagwa wawo akumabazu oonse obile kwakalimenede isamu lyabuumi, lizyala misyobo yamicelo iili ikumi aibili, lyakali kweenzya micelo yalyo myeezi yoonse. Nkabela matu aasamu elyo ngaakuponya bantu.
Takukooyooba limbi kusinganya, pele cuuno ca-Leza aca-Mwanambelele ciyooba mumo, nkabela bazike bakwe bayoomubelekela milimo.
Bayoobona busyu bwakwe, alimwi izina lyakwe linooyoolembedwe kunkumu zyabo,
Takukooyooba limbi masiku, aboobo tabayandi kumunikilwa ilampi nuuba mumuni wazuba, nkaambo Mwami Leza nguuyoobamunikila, nkabela bayooendelezya lyoonse alyoonse kukabe kutamani.
Amubone, ndafwambaana kuboola, Uli acoolwe uupangika moyo wakwe kumajwi aabusinsimi bwamubbuku dino.
Pele wakandikasya, wakati, Pe, utaciti obo, nkaambo ndi muzikenyoko buyo, ndi umwi wabanabakwanu basinsimi, ndi umwi wabaabo bajatisya makani aabbuku elino. Komba Leza.
Oyo uucita zitaluleme kaciya bucita mbubonya, oyo uuli amatombe kaciba simatombe, oyo uucita bululami kaciya bucita bululami, ayooyo uusalala kacisalala.
Ndime Alfa a-Omega, matalikilo amamanino, mutaanzi amusyaalizi,
Bali acoolwe abo basanzya zikobela zyabo, kuti bazumizigwe kuswenena kucisamu cabuumi akunjila mumilyango yamunzi.
Nkaambo anze mpobabede babwa abalozi abasibwaamu abajayi abakomba mituni aboonse bayanda kubeja akucita bubeji.
Lino Muuya anabwiinga balaamba kuti, Boola. Ayooyo uuswiilila alakwe aambe kuti, Boola, Ayooyo uufwide nyota aboole. Amuntu woonse uuyanda anywe cabuyo maanzi aabuumi.
Nkabela anooli muntu uyoogwisya cintu kumajwi aabbuku lyabusinsimi obuno, Leza uyoogwisya lukono lwakwe mubbuku lyabuumi amumunzi uusalala amuzintu zilembedwe omuno mubbuku.
Walo uulungulula aya makani wati, Mbukubede! Ndafwambaana kuboola, Ameni! Koboola ncobeni, Mwami Jesu.
Luzyalo lwa-Mwami Jesu alube anywe nyoonse. Ameni.
